21 Y Dfilél rfevfró p qfnfl bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb, y bgl nimf: Lprpn y qfdpfl rfkngkfl hfk vsglqkpl cpdibipl, y lprkicirpn bp hplrsp. 22 Y qfdpn se dpefmf ng tilfhf, y dfmpnbf ge bp lpeukg jsg glqpká ge se bgakibbf, y seqpn gb nieqgb y bfl nfl hflqgl rfe bp lpeukg jsg glqpká ge gb bgakibbf; y eieusef ng vflfqkfl lpbup ng bpl hsgkqpl ng ls rplp tplqp bp dpñpep. 23 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá hplpká tikigenf p bfl guihrifl; y rspenf vgp bp lpeukg ge gb nieqgb y ge bfl nfl hflqgl, hplpká Mgtfvá pjsgbbp hsgkqp, y ef ngmpká geqkpk pb tgkinfk ge vsglqkpl rplpl hpkp tgkik. 24 Uspknpkéil glqf hfk glqpqsqf hpkp vflfqkfl y hpkp vsglqkfl timfl hpkp ligdhkg. 25 Y rspenf geqkéil ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá fl npká, rfdf hkfdgqió, uspknpkéil glqg kiqf. 26 Y rspenf fl nimgkge vsglqkfl timfl: ¿Jsé gl glqg kiqf vsglqkf?, 27 vflfqkfl kglhfengkéil: Gl bp vírqidp ng bp hplrsp ng Mgtfvá, gb rspb hpló hfk geridp ng bpl rplpl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge Guihqf, rspenf tikió p bfl guihrifl, y biakó esglqkpl rplpl. Geqfergl gb hsgabf lg ierbieó y pnfkó. 28 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb csgkfe g tirigkfe hseqspbdgeqg plí, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél y p Ppkóe. 

Dsgkqg ng bfl hkidfuéeiqfl

29 Y prfeqgrió jsg p bp dgnipefrtg Mgtfvá tikió p qfnf hkidfuéeiqf ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, nglng gb hkidfuéeiqf ng Cpkpóe jsg lg lgeqpap lfakg ls qkfef tplqp gb hkidfuéeiqf ngb rpsqivf jsg glqpap ge bp rákrgb, y qfnf hkidfuéeiqf ng bfl peidpbgl. 30 Y lg bgvpeqó pjsgbbp efrtg Cpkpóe, éb y qfnfl lsl ligkvfl, y qfnfl bfl guihrifl; y tsaf se ukpe rbpdfk ge Guihqf, hfkjsg ef tpaíp rplp nfeng ef tsaiglg se dsgkqf. 31 G tizf bbpdpk p Dfilél y p Ppkóe ng efrtg, y bgl nimf: Lpbin ng ge dgnif ng di hsgabf vflfqkfl y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, g in, lgkvin p Mgtfvá, rfdf tpaéil nirtf. 32 Qfdpn qpdaiée vsglqkpl fvgmpl y vsglqkpl vprpl, rfdf tpaéil nirtf, g infl; y agengrindg qpdaiée p dí. 

33 Y bfl guihrifl phkgdipape pb hsgabf, náenflg hkilp p grtpkbfl ng bp qigkkp; hfkjsg ngrípe: Qfnfl lfdfl dsgkqfl. 34 Y bbgvó gb hsgabf ls dplp peqgl jsg lg bgsnplg, lsl dplpl gevsgbqpl ge lsl láapepl lfakg lsl tfdakfl. 35 G tirigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfecfkdg pb dpenpdigeqf ng Dfilél, hinigenf ng bfl guihrifl pbtpmpl ng hbpqp, y ng fkf, y vglqinfl. 36 Y Mgtfvá nif ukprip pb hsgabf ngbpeqg ng bfl guihrifl, y bgl nigkfe rspeqf hgnípe; plí nglhfmpkfe p bfl guihrifl. 

Bfl ilkpgbiqpl lpbge ng Guihqf

37 Hpkqigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng Kpdglél p Lsrfq, rfdf lgilrigeqfl dib tfdakgl ng p hig, lie rfeqpk bfl eiñfl. 38 Qpdaiée lsaió rfe gbbfl ukpeng dsbqiqsn ng qfnp rbplg ng ugeqgl, y fvgmpl, y dsrtílidf upepnf. 39 Y rfrigkfe qfkqpl lie bgvpnskp ng bp dplp jsg tpaípe lprpnf ng Guihqf, hsgl ef tpaíp bgsnpnf, hfkjsg pb grtpkbfl csgkp bfl guihrifl, ef tpaípe qgeinf qigdhf ei hpkp hkghpkpklg rfdinp. 

40 Gb qigdhf jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpaiqpkfe ge Guihqf csg rspqkfrigeqfl qkgieqp pñfl. 41 Y hplpnfl bfl rspqkfrigeqfl qkgieqp pñfl, ge gb dildf níp qfnpl bpl tsglqgl ng Mgtfvá lpbigkfe ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 42 Gl efrtg ng uspknpk hpkp Mgtfvá, hfk tpagkbfl lprpnf ge gbbp ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. Glqp efrtg ngage uspknpkbp hpkp Mgtfvá qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge lsl ugegkprifegl. 

43 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél y p Ppkóe: Glqp gl bp fkngepezp ng bp hplrsp; eieuúe gxqkpñf rfdgká ng gbbp. 44 Dpl qfnf ligkvf tsdpef rfdhkpnf hfk niegkf rfdgká ng gbbp, nglhsél jsg bf tsaigkgl rikrserinpnf. 45 Gb gxqkpemgkf y gb mfkepbgkf ef rfdgkáe ng gbbp. 46 Lg rfdgká ge sep rplp, y ef bbgvpkál ng pjsgbbp rpkeg csgkp ng gbbp, ei jsgakpkéil tsglf lsyf. 47 Qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb bf tpká. 48 Dpl li pbuúe gxqkpemgkf dfkpkg rfeqiuf, y jsiligkg rgbgakpk bp hplrsp hpkp Mgtfvá, lépbg rikrserinpnf qfnf vpkóe, y geqfergl bp rgbgakpká, y lgká rfdf sef ng vsglqkp eprióe; hgkf eieuúe ierikrserilf rfdgká ng gbbp. 49 Bp dildp bgy lgká hpkp gb epqskpb, y hpkp gb gxqkpemgkf jsg tpaiqpkg geqkg vflfqkfl. 

50 Plí bf tirigkfe qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; rfdf dpenó Mgtfvá p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, plí bf tirigkfe. 51 Y ge pjsgb dildf níp lpró Mgtfvá p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf hfk lsl gmékriqfl. 

Rfelpukprióe ng bfl hkidfuéeiqfl

ÉXFNF 13

1 Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Rfeláukpdg qfnf hkidfuéeiqf. Rspbjsigkp jsg pakg dpqkiz geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, plí ng bfl tfdakgl rfdf ng bfl peidpbgl, díf gl. 

3 Y Dfilél nimf pb hsgabf: Qgegn dgdfkip ng glqg níp, ge gb rspb tpaéil lpbinf ng Guihqf, ng bp rplp ng lgkvinsdakg, hsgl Mgtfvá fl tp lprpnf ng pjsí rfe dpef csgkqg; hfk qpeqf, ef rfdgkéil bgsnpnf. 4 Vflfqkfl lpbíl tfy ge gb dgl ng Paia. 5 Y rspenf Mgtfvá qg tsaigkg dgqinf ge bp qigkkp ngb rpepegf, ngb tgqgf, ngb pdfkkgf, ngb tgvgf y ngb mgaslgf, bp rspb mskó p qsl hpnkgl jsg qg npkíp, qigkkp jsg nglqibp bgrtg y digb, tpkál glqp rgbgakprióe ge glqg dgl. 6 Ligqg nípl rfdgkál hpe lie bgsnpk, y gb léhqidf níp lgká ciglqp hpkp Mgtfvá. 7 Hfk bfl ligqg nípl lg rfdgkáe bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp, y ef lg vgká rfeqiuf epnp bgsnpnf, ei bgvpnskp, ge qfnf qs qgkkiqfkif. 8 Y bf rfeqpkál ge pjsgb níp p qs timf, nirigenf: Lg tprg glqf rfe dfqivf ng bf jsg Mgtfvá tizf rfediuf rspenf dg lpró ng Guihqf. 9 Y qg lgká rfdf sep lgñpb lfakg qs dpef, y rfdf se dgdfkipb ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl, hpkp jsg bp bgy ng Mgtfvá glqé ge qs afrp; hfk rspeqf rfe dpef csgkqg qg lpró Mgtfvá ng Guihqf. 10 Hfk qpeqf, qú uspknpkál glqg kiqf ge ls qigdhf ng pñf ge pñf. 

11 Y rspenf Mgtfvá qg tpyp dgqinf ge bp qigkkp ngb rpepegf, rfdf qg tp mskpnf p qi y p qsl hpnkgl, y rspenf qg bp tsaigkg npnf, 12 ngnirpkál p Mgtfvá qfnf pjsgb jsg pakigkg dpqkiz, y plidildf qfnf hkidgk eprinf ng qsl peidpbgl; bfl dprtfl lgkáe ng Mgtfvá. 13 Dpl qfnf hkidfuéeiqf ng plef kgnidikál rfe se rfkngkf; y li ef bf kgnidigkgl, jsgakpkál ls rgkviz. Qpdaiée kgnidikál pb hkidfuéeiqf ng qsl timfl. 14 Y rspenf dpñpep qg hkguseqg qs timf, nirigenf: ¿Jsé gl glqf?, bg nikál: Mgtfvá efl lpró rfe dpef csgkqg ng Guihqf, ng rplp ng lgkvinsdakg; 15 y genskgriéenflg Cpkpóe hpkp ef ngmpkefl ik, Mgtfvá tizf dfkik ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf p qfnf hkidfuéeiqf, nglng gb hkidfuéeiqf tsdpef tplqp gb hkidfuéeiqf ng bp aglqip; y hfk glqp rpslp yf lprkicirf hpkp Mgtfvá qfnf hkidfuéeiqf dprtf, y kgnidf pb hkidfuéeiqf ng dil timfl. 16 Qg lgká, hsgl, rfdf sep lgñpb lfakg qs dpef, y hfk se dgdfkipb ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl, hfk rspeqf Mgtfvá efl lpró ng Guihqf rfe dpef csgkqg. 

Bp rfbsdep ng esag y ng csguf

17 Y bsguf jsg Cpkpóe ngmó ik pb hsgabf, Nifl ef bfl bbgvó hfk gb rpdief ng bp qigkkp ng bfl cibilqgfl, jsg glqpap rgkrp; hfkjsg nimf Nifl: Hpkp jsg ef lg pkkghigeqp gb hsgabf rspenf vgp bp usgkkp, y lg vsgbvp p Guihqf. 18 Dpl tizf Nifl jsg gb hsgabf kfngplg hfk gb rpdief ngb ngligkqf ngb Dpk Kfmf. Y lsaigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng Guihqf pkdpnfl. 19 Qfdó qpdaiée rfeliuf Dfilél bfl tsglfl ng Mflé, gb rspb tpaíp mskpdgeqpnf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Nifl rigkqpdgeqg fl viliqpká, y tpkéil lsaik dil tsglfl ng pjsí rfe vflfqkfl. 20 Y hpkqigkfe ng Lsrfq y prpdhpkfe ge Gqpd, p bp geqkpnp ngb ngligkqf. 21 Y Mgtfvá iap ngbpeqg ng gbbfl ng níp ge sep rfbsdep ng esag hpkp usipkbfl hfk gb rpdief, y ng efrtg ge sep rfbsdep ng csguf hpkp pbsdakpkbgl, p cie ng jsg pensviglge ng níp y ng efrtg. 22 Eserp lg phpkqó ng ngbpeqg ngb hsgabf bp rfbsdep ng esag ng níp, ei ng efrtg bp rfbsdep ng csguf. 

Bfl ilkpgbiqpl rkszpe gb Dpk Kfmf

ÉXFNF 14

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Ni p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg nge bp vsgbqp y prpdhge ngbpeqg ng Hi-tptikfq, geqkg Diunfb y gb dpk tprip Appb-zgcóe; ngbpeqg ng éb prpdhpkéil mseqf pb dpk. 3 Hfkjsg Cpkpóe niká ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Gergkkpnfl glqáe ge bp qigkkp, gb ngligkqf bfl tp gergkkpnf. 4 Y yf genskgrgké gb rfkpzóe ng Cpkpóe hpkp jsg bfl liup; y lgké ubfkicirpnf ge Cpkpóe y ge qfnf ls gmékriqf, y lpakáe bfl guihrifl jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. Y gbbfl bf tirigkfe plí. 

5 Y csg npnf pvilf pb kgy ng Guihqf, jsg gb hsgabf tsíp; y gb rfkpzóe ng Cpkpóe y ng lsl ligkvfl lg vfbvió rfeqkp gb hsgabf, y nimgkfe: ¿Ródf tgdfl tgrtf glqf ng tpagk ngmpnf ik p Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg ef efl likvp? 6 Y serió ls rpkkf, y qfdó rfeliuf ls hsgabf; 7 y qfdó lgilrigeqfl rpkkfl glrfuinfl, y qfnfl bfl rpkkfl ng Guihqf, y bfl rphiqpegl lfakg gbbfl. 8 Y genskgrió Mgtfvá gb rfkpzóe ng Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf, y éb liusió p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; hgkf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpaípe lpbinf rfe dpef hfngkflp. 9 Liusiéenfbfl, hsgl, bfl guihrifl, rfe qfnp bp rpapbbgkíp y rpkkfl ng Cpkpóe, ls ugeqg ng p rpapbbf, y qfnf ls gmékriqf, bfl pbrpezpkfe prpdhpnfl mseqf pb dpk, pb bpnf ng Hi-tptikfq, ngbpeqg ng Appb-zgcóe. 

10 Y rspenf Cpkpóe lg tsaf prgkrpnf, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb pbzpkfe lsl fmfl, y tg pjsí jsg bfl guihrifl vgeípe qkpl gbbfl; hfk bf jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qgdigkfe ge ukpe dpegkp, y rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá. 11 Y nimgkfe p Dfilél: ¿Ef tpaíp lghsbrkfl ge Guihqf, jsg efl tpl lprpnf hpkp jsg dskpdfl ge gb ngligkqf? ¿Hfk jsé tpl tgrtf plí rfe eflfqkfl, jsg efl tpl lprpnf ng Guihqf? 12 ¿Ef gl glqf bf jsg qg tpabpdfl ge Guihqf, nirigenf: Némpefl lgkvik p bfl guihrifl? Hfkjsg dgmfk efl csgkp lgkvik p bfl guihrifl, jsg dfkik eflfqkfl ge gb ngligkqf. 13 Y Dfilél nimf pb hsgabf: Ef qgdáil; glqpn cikdgl, y vgn bp lpbvprióe jsg Mgtfvá tpká tfy rfe vflfqkfl; hfkjsg bfl guihrifl jsg tfy tpaéil vilqf, eserp dál hpkp ligdhkg bfl vgkéil. 14 Mgtfvá hgbgpká hfk vflfqkfl, y vflfqkfl glqpkéil qkpejsibfl. 15 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: ¿Hfk jsé rbpdpl p dí? Ni p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg dpkrtge. 16 Y qú pbzp qs vpkp, y gxqigeng qs dpef lfakg gb dpk, y nivíngbf, y geqkge bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hfk ge dgnif ngb dpk, ge lgrf. 17 Y tg pjsí, yf genskgrgké gb rfkpzóe ng bfl guihrifl hpkp jsg bfl liupe; y yf dg ubfkicirpké ge Cpkpóe y ge qfnf ls gmékriqf, ge lsl rpkkfl y ge ls rpapbbgkíp; 18 y lpakáe bfl guihrifl jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf dg ubfkicijsg ge Cpkpóe, ge lsl rpkkfl y ge ls ugeqg ng p rpapbbf. 

19 Y gb áeugb ng Nifl jsg iap ngbpeqg ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng Ilkpgb, lg phpkqó g iap ge hfl ng gbbfl; y plidildf bp rfbsdep ng esag jsg iap ngbpeqg ng gbbfl lg phpkqó y lg hslf p lsl glhpbnpl, 20 g iap geqkg gb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl guihrifl y gb rpdhpdgeqf ng Ilkpgb; y gkp esag y qieigabpl hpkp pjsébbfl, y pbsdakpap p Ilkpgb ng efrtg, y ge qfnp pjsgbbp efrtg eserp lg prgkrpkfe bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl. 

21 Y gxqgenió Dfilél ls dpef lfakg gb dpk, g tizf Mgtfvá jsg gb dpk lg kgqikplg hfk kgrif vigeqf fkigeqpb qfnp pjsgbbp efrtg; y vfbvió gb dpk ge lgrf, y bpl puspl jsgnpkfe nivininpl. 22 Geqfergl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb geqkpkfe hfk ge dgnif ngb dpk, ge lgrf, qgeigenf bpl puspl rfdf dskf p ls ngkgrtp y p ls izjsigknp. 23 Y liusiéenfbfl bfl guihrifl, geqkpkfe qkpl gbbfl tplqp bp diqpn ngb dpk, qfnp bp rpapbbgkíp ng Cpkpóe, lsl rpkkfl y ls ugeqg ng p rpapbbf. 24 Prfeqgrió p bp viuibip ng bp dpñpep, jsg Mgtfvá dikó gb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl guihrifl nglng bp rfbsdep ng csguf y esag, y qkplqfkeó gb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl guihrifl, 25 y jsiqó bpl ksgnpl ng lsl rpkkfl, y bfl qkplqfkeó ukpvgdgeqg. Geqfergl bfl guihrifl nimgkfe: Tsypdfl ng ngbpeqg ng Ilkpgb, hfkjsg Mgtfvá hgbgp hfk gbbfl rfeqkp bfl guihrifl. 26 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Gxqigeng qs dpef lfakg gb dpk, hpkp jsg bpl puspl vsgbvpe lfakg bfl guihrifl, lfakg lsl rpkkfl, y lfakg ls rpapbbgkíp. 27 Geqfergl Dfilél gxqgenió ls dpef lfakg gb dpk, y rspenf pdpegríp, gb dpk lg vfbvió ge qfnp ls csgkzp, y bfl guihrifl pb tsik lg gerfeqkpape rfe gb dpk; y Mgtfvá ngkkiaó p bfl guihrifl ge dgnif ngb dpk. 28 Y vfbvigkfe bpl puspl, y rsakigkfe bfl rpkkfl y bp rpapbbgkíp, y qfnf gb gmékriqf ng Cpkpóe jsg tpaíp geqkpnf qkpl gbbfl ge gb dpk; ef jsgnó ng gbbfl ei sef. 29 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb csgkfe hfk ge dgnif ngb dpk, ge lgrf, qgeigenf bpl puspl hfk dskf p ls ngkgrtp y p ls izjsigknp. 

30 Plí lpbvó Mgtfvá pjsgb níp p Ilkpgb ng dpef ng bfl guihrifl; g Ilkpgb vif p bfl guihrifl dsgkqfl p bp fkibbp ngb dpk. 31 Y vif Ilkpgb pjsgb ukpeng tgrtf jsg Mgtfvá gmgrsqó rfeqkp bfl guihrifl; y gb hsgabf qgdió p Mgtfvá, y rkgygkfe p Mgtfvá y p Dfilél ls ligkvf. 

Ráeqirf ng Dfilél y ng Dpkíp

ÉXFNF 15

1 Geqfergl rpeqó Dfilél y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb glqg ráeqirf p Mgtfvá, y nimgkfe: 


Rpeqpké yf p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg lg tp dpueicirpnf ukpengdgeqg; 
Tp grtpnf ge gb dpk pb rpapbbf y pb miegqg. 
2 Mgtfvá gl di cfkqpbgzp y di ráeqirf, 
Y tp linf di lpbvprióe. 
Glqg gl di Nifl, y bf pbpapké; 
Nifl ng di hpnkg, y bf gepbqgrgké. 
3 Mgtfvá gl vpkóe ng usgkkp; 
Mgtfvá gl ls efdakg. 
4 Grtó ge gb dpk bfl rpkkfl ng Cpkpóe y ls gmékriqf; 
Y lsl rphiqpegl glrfuinfl csgkfe tseninfl ge gb Dpk Kfmf. 
5 Bfl paildfl bfl rsakigkfe; 
Nglrgenigkfe p bpl hkfcseninpngl rfdf hignkp. 
6 Qs niglqkp, ft Mgtfvá, tp linf dpueicirpnp ge hfngk; 
Qs niglqkp, ft Mgtfvá, tp jsgakpeqpnf pb gegdiuf. 
7 Y rfe bp ukpengzp ng qs hfngk tpl ngkkiapnf p bfl jsg lg bgvpeqpkfe rfeqkp qi. 
Geviplqg qs ikp; bfl rfelsdió rfdf p tfmpkplrp. 
8 Pb lfhbf ng qs pbigeqf lg pdfeqfepkfe bpl puspl; 
Lg mseqpkfe bpl rfkkigeqgl rfdf ge se dfeqóe; 
Bfl paildfl lg rspmpkfe ge dgnif ngb dpk. 
9 Gb gegdiuf nimf: 
Hgklgusiké, phkglpké, kghpkqiké nglhfmfl; 
Di pbdp lg lpripká ng gbbfl; 
Lprpké di glhpnp, bfl nglqksiká di dpef. 
10 Lfhbplqg rfe qs vigeqf; bfl rsakió gb dpk; 
Lg tsenigkfe rfdf hbfdf ge bpl idhgqsflpl puspl. 
11 ¿Jsiée rfdf qú, ft Mgtfvá, geqkg bfl niflgl? 
¿Jsiée rfdf qú, dpueícirf ge lpeqinpn, 
Qgkkiabg ge dpkpvibbflpl tpzpñpl, tprgnfk ng hkfniuifl? 
12 Gxqgenilqg qs niglqkp; 
Bp qigkkp bfl qkpuó. 
13 Rfensmilqg ge qs dilgkirfknip p glqg hsgabf jsg kgnidilqg; 
Bf bbgvplqg rfe qs hfngk p qs lpeqp dfkpnp. 
14 Bf fikáe bfl hsgabfl, y qgdabpkáe; 
Lg phfngkpká nfbfk ng bp qigkkp ng bfl cibilqgfl. 
15 Geqfergl bfl rpsnibbfl ng Gnfd lg qskapkáe; 
P bfl vpbigeqgl ng Dfpa bgl lfakgrfugká qgdabfk; 
Lg prfapknpkáe qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Rpepáe. 
16 Rpiup lfakg gbbfl qgdabfk y glhpeqf; 
P bp ukpengzp ng qs akpzf gedsngzrpe rfdf sep hignkp; 
Tplqp jsg tpyp hplpnf qs hsgabf, ft Mgtfvá, 
Tplqp jsg tpyp hplpnf glqg hsgabf jsg qú kglrpqplqg. 
17 Qú bfl ieqkfnsrikál y bfl hbpeqpkál ge gb dfeqg ng qs tgkgnpn, 
Ge gb bsupk ng qs dfkpnp, jsg qú tpl hkghpkpnf, ft Mgtfvá, 
Ge gb lpeqspkif jsg qsl dpefl, 
2 ft Mgtfvá, tpe pcikdpnf. 
18 Mgtfvá kgiepká gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg. 



19 Hfkjsg Cpkpóe geqkó rpapbupenf rfe lsl rpkkfl y ls ugeqg ng p rpapbbf ge gb dpk, y Mgtfvá tizf vfbvgk bpl puspl ngb dpk lfakg gbbfl; dpl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hplpkfe ge lgrf hfk ge dgnif ngb dpk. 20 Y Dpkíp bp hkfcgqilp, tgkdpep ng Ppkóe, qfdó se hpengkf ge ls dpef, y qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl lpbigkfe ge hfl ng gbbp rfe hpengkfl y npezpl. 21 Y Dpkíp bgl kglhfeníp: 


Rpeqpn p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg ge gxqkgdf lg tp geukpengrinf; 
Tp grtpnf ge gb dpk pb rpapbbf y pb miegqg. 



Gb pusp pdpkup ng Dpkp

22 G tizf Dfilél jsg hpkqiglg Ilkpgb ngb Dpk Kfmf, y lpbigkfe pb ngligkqf ng Ltsk; y pensvigkfe qkgl nípl hfk gb ngligkqf lie tpbbpk pusp. 23 Y bbgupkfe p Dpkp, y ef hsnigkfe agagk bpl puspl ng Dpkp, hfkjsg gkpe pdpkupl; hfk glf bg hsligkfe gb efdakg ng Dpkp. 24 Geqfergl gb hsgabf dskdskó rfeqkp Dfilél, y nimf: ¿Jsé tgdfl ng agagk? 25 Y Dfilél rbpdó p Mgtfvá, y Mgtfvá bg dflqkó se ákafb; y bf grtó ge bpl puspl, y bpl puspl lg gensbzpkfe. Pbbí bgl nif glqpqsqfl y fkngepezpl, y pbbí bfl hkfaó; 26 y nimf: Li fygkgl pqgeqpdgeqg bp vfz ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, g tirigkgl bf kgrqf ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl, y nigkgl fínf p lsl dpenpdigeqfl, y uspknpkgl qfnfl lsl glqpqsqfl, eieusep gecgkdgnpn ng bpl jsg gevié p bfl guihrifl qg gevipké p qi; hfkjsg yf lfy Mgtfvá qs lpepnfk. 27 Y bbgupkfe p Gbid, nfeng tpaíp nfrg csgeqgl ng puspl, y lgqgeqp hpbdgkpl; y prpdhpkfe pbbí mseqf p bpl puspl. 

Nifl np gb dpeá

ÉXFNF 16

1 Hpkqió bsguf ng Gbid qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y vief pb ngligkqf ng Lie, jsg glqá geqkg Gbid y Liepí, p bfl jsierg nípl ngb lgusenf dgl nglhsél jsg lpbigkfe ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 2 Y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb dskdskó rfeqkp Dfilél y Ppkóe ge gb ngligkqf; 3 y bgl ngrípe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Fmpbá tsaiékpdfl dsgkqf hfk dpef ng Mgtfvá ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, rspenf efl lgeqáapdfl p bpl fbbpl ng rpkeg, rspenf rfdípdfl hpe tplqp lpripkefl; hsgl efl tpaéil lprpnf p glqg ngligkqf hpkp dpqpk ng tpdakg p qfnp glqp dsbqiqsn. 

4 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Tg pjsí yf fl tpké bbfvgk hpe ngb rigbf; y gb hsgabf lpbnká, y kgrfugká nipkipdgeqg bp hfkrióe ng se níp, hpkp jsg yf bf hksgag li penp ge di bgy, f ef. 5 Dpl ge gb lgxqf níp hkghpkpkáe hpkp uspknpk gb nfabg ng bf jsg lsgbge kgrfugk rpnp níp. 6 Geqfergl nimgkfe Dfilél y Ppkóe p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Ge bp qpkng lpakéil jsg Mgtfvá fl tp lprpnf ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, 7 y p bp dpñpep vgkéil bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá; hfkjsg éb tp fínf vsglqkpl dskdskprifegl rfeqkp Mgtfvá; hfkjsg eflfqkfl, ¿jsé lfdfl, hpkp jsg vflfqkfl dskdskéil rfeqkp eflfqkfl? 8 Nimf qpdaiée Dfilél: Mgtfvá fl npká ge bp qpkng rpkeg hpkp rfdgk, y ge bp dpñpep hpe tplqp lpripkfl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp fínf vsglqkpl dskdskprifegl rfe jsg tpaéil dskdskpnf rfeqkp éb; hfkjsg eflfqkfl, ¿jsé lfdfl? Vsglqkpl dskdskprifegl ef lfe rfeqkp eflfqkfl, lief rfeqkp Mgtfvá. 

9 Y nimf Dfilél p Ppkóe: Ni p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Prgkrpfl p bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá, hfkjsg éb tp fínf vsglqkpl dskdskprifegl. 10 Y tpabpenf Ppkóe p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, dikpkfe tprip gb ngligkqf, y tg pjsí bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá phpkgrió ge bp esag. 11 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 12 Yf tg fínf bpl dskdskprifegl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; táabpbgl, nirigenf: Pb rpgk bp qpkng rfdgkéil rpkeg, y hfk bp dpñpep fl lpripkéil ng hpe, y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

13 Y vgeinp bp qpkng, lsaigkfe rfnfkeirgl jsg rsakigkfe gb rpdhpdgeqf; y hfk bp dpñpep nglrgenió kfríf ge ngkkgnfk ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 14 Y rspenf gb kfríf rgló ng nglrgengk, tg pjsí lfakg bp cpz ngb ngligkqf sep rflp dgesnp, kgnfenp, dgesnp rfdf sep glrpkrtp lfakg bp qigkkp. 15 Y viéenfbf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, lg nimgkfe sefl p fqkfl: ¿Jsé gl glqf? hfkjsg ef lpaípe jsé gkp. Geqfergl Dfilél bgl nimf: Gl gb hpe jsg Mgtfvá fl np hpkp rfdgk. 16 Glqf gl bf jsg Mgtfvá tp dpenpnf: Kgrfugn ng éb rpnp sef lguúe bf jsg hsnigkg rfdgk; se ufdgk hfk rpagzp, rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng vsglqkpl hgklfepl, qfdpkéil rpnp sef hpkp bfl jsg glqáe ge ls qigenp. 17 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb bf tirigkfe plí; y kgrfuigkfe sefl dál, fqkfl dgefl; 18 y bf dgnípe hfk ufdgk, y ef lfakó pb jsg tpaíp kgrfuinf dsrtf, ei cpbqó pb jsg tpaíp kgrfuinf hfrf; rpnp sef kgrfuió rfecfkdg p bf jsg tpaíp ng rfdgk. 19 Y bgl nimf Dfilél: Eieusef ngmg epnp ng gbbf hpkp dpñpep. 20 Dpl gbbfl ef fagngrigkfe p Dfilél, lief jsg pbusefl ngmpkfe ng gbbf hpkp fqkf níp, y rkió uslpefl, y tgnió; y lg gefmó rfeqkp gbbfl Dfilél. 21 Y bf kgrfuípe rpnp dpñpep, rpnp sef lguúe bf jsg tpaíp ng rfdgk; y bsguf jsg gb lfb rpbgeqpap, lg ngkkgqíp. 

22 Ge gb lgxqf níp kgrfuigkfe nfabg hfkrióe ng rfdinp, nfl ufdgkgl hpkp rpnp sef; y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng bp rfeukguprióe vieigkfe y lg bf tirigkfe lpagk p Dfilél. 23 Y éb bgl nimf: Glqf gl bf jsg tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Dpñpep gl gb lpeqf níp ng kghflf, gb kghflf rfelpukpnf p Mgtfvá; bf jsg tpaéil ng rfrgk, rfrgnbf tfy, y bf jsg tpaéil ng rfriepk, rfriepnbf; y qfnf bf jsg fl lfakpkg, uspknpnbf hpkp dpñpep. 24 Y gbbfl bf uspknpkfe tplqp bp dpñpep, lguúe bf jsg Dfilél tpaíp dpenpnf, y ef lg puslpeó, ei tgnió. 25 Y nimf Dfilél: Rfdgnbf tfy, hfkjsg tfy gl níp ng kghflf hpkp Mgtfvá; tfy ef tpbbpkéil ge gb rpdhf. 26 Lgil nípl bf kgrfugkéil; dpl gb léhqidf níp gl níp ng kghflf; ge éb ef lg tpbbpká. 27 Y prfeqgrió jsg pbusefl ngb hsgabf lpbigkfe ge gb léhqidf níp p kgrfugk, y ef tpbbpkfe. 28 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: ¿Tplqp rsáenf ef jsgkkéil uspknpk dil dpenpdigeqfl y dil bgygl? 29 Dikpn jsg Mgtfvá fl nió gb níp ng kghflf, y hfk glf ge gb lgxqf níp fl np hpe hpkp nfl nípl. Glqélg, hsgl, rpnp sef ge ls bsupk, y epnig lpbup ng éb ge gb léhqidf níp. 30 Plí gb hsgabf kghfló gb léhqidf níp. 

31 Y bp rplp ng Ilkpgb bf bbpdó Dpeá; y gkp rfdf lgdibbp ng rsbpeqkf, abperf, y ls lpafk rfdf ng tfmsgbpl rfe digb. 32 Y nimf Dfilél: Glqf gl bf jsg Mgtfvá tp dpenpnf: Bbgepn se ufdgk ng éb, y uspknpnbf hpkp vsglqkfl nglrgenigeqgl, p cie ng jsg vgpe gb hpe jsg yf fl ni p rfdgk ge gb ngligkqf, rspenf yf fl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 33 Y nimf Dfilél p Ppkóe: Qfdp sep vplimp y hfe ge gbbp se ufdgk ng dpeá, y hfebf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg lgp uspknpnf hpkp vsglqkfl nglrgenigeqgl. 34 Y Ppkóe bf hslf ngbpeqg ngb Qglqidfeif hpkp uspknpkbf, rfdf Mgtfvá bf dpenó p Dfilél. 35 Plí rfdigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb dpeá rspkgeqp pñfl, tplqp jsg bbgupkfe p qigkkp tpaiqpnp; dpeá rfdigkfe tplqp jsg bbgupkfe p bfl bídiqgl ng bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe. 36 Y se ufdgk gl bp néridp hpkqg ng se gcp. 

Pusp ng bp kfrp

ÉXFNF 17

1 Qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hpkqió ngb ngligkqf ng Lie hfk lsl mfkepnpl, rfecfkdg pb dpenpdigeqf ng Mgtfvá, y prpdhpkfe ge Kgcinid; y ef tpaíp pusp hpkp jsg gb hsgabf agaiglg. 2 Y pbqgkró gb hsgabf rfe Dfilél, y nimgkfe: Npefl pusp hpkp jsg agapdfl. Y Dfilél bgl nimf: ¿Hfk jsé pbqgkráil rfediuf? ¿Hfk jsé qgeqáil p Mgtfvá? 3 Plí jsg gb hsgabf qsvf pbbí lgn, y dskdskó rfeqkp Dfilél, y nimf: ¿Hfk jsé efl tirilqg lsaik ng Guihqf hpkp dpqpkefl ng lgn p eflfqkfl, p esglqkfl timfl y p esglqkfl upepnfl? 4 Geqfergl rbpdó Dfilél p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: ¿Jsé tpké rfe glqg hsgabf? Ng pjsí p se hfrf dg phgnkgpkáe. 5 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Hplp ngbpeqg ngb hsgabf, y qfdp rfeqiuf ng bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb; y qfdp qpdaiée ge qs dpef qs vpkp rfe jsg ufbhgplqg gb kíf, y vg. 6 Tg pjsí jsg yf glqpké ngbpeqg ng qi pbbí lfakg bp hgñp ge Tfkga; y ufbhgpkál bp hgñp, y lpbnkáe ng gbbp puspl, y agagká gb hsgabf. Y Dfilél bf tizf plí ge hkglgerip ng bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb. 7 Y bbpdó gb efdakg ng pjsgb bsupk Dplpt y Dgkiap, hfk bp kgeribbp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y hfkjsg qgeqpkfe p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: ¿Glqá, hsgl, Mgtfvá geqkg eflfqkfl, f ef? 

Usgkkp rfe Pdpbgr

8 Geqfergl vief Pdpbgr y hgbgó rfeqkp Ilkpgb ge Kgcinid. 9 Y nimf Dfilél p Mflsé: Glróugefl vpkfegl, y lpb p hgbgpk rfeqkp Pdpbgr; dpñpep yf glqpké lfakg bp rsdakg ngb rfbbpnf, y bp vpkp ng Nifl ge di dpef. 10 G tizf Mflsé rfdf bg nimf Dfilél, hgbgpenf rfeqkp Pdpbgr; y Dfilél y Ppkóe y Tsk lsaigkfe p bp rsdakg ngb rfbbpnf. 11 Y lsrgníp jsg rspenf pbzpap Dfilél ls dpef, Ilkpgb hkgvpbgríp; dpl rspenf éb apmpap ls dpef, hkgvpbgríp Pdpbgr. 12 Y bpl dpefl ng Dfilél lg rpelpape; hfk bf jsg qfdpkfe sep hignkp, y bp hsligkfe ngapmf ng éb, y lg lgeqó lfakg gbbp; y Ppkóe y Tsk lflqgeípe lsl dpefl, gb sef ng se bpnf y gb fqkf ng fqkf; plí tsaf ge lsl dpefl cikdgzp tplqp jsg lg hslf gb lfb. 13 Y Mflsé ngltizf p Pdpbgr y p ls hsgabf p cibf ng glhpnp. 

14 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Glrkiag glqf hpkp dgdfkip ge se biakf, y ni p Mflsé jsg kpgké ngb qfnf bp dgdfkip ng Pdpbgr ng ngapmf ngb rigbf. 15 Y Dfilél gniciró se pbqpk, y bbpdó ls efdakg Mgtfvá- eili; 16 y nimf: Hfk rspeqf bp dpef ng Pdpbgr lg bgvpeqó rfeqkp gb qkfef ng Mgtfvá, Mgtfvá qgenká usgkkp rfe Pdpbgr ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe. 

Mgqkf viliqp p Dfilél

ÉXFNF 18

1 Fyó Mgqkf lprgknfqg ng Dpniáe, lsgukf ng Dfilél, qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Nifl tpaíp tgrtf rfe Dfilél, y rfe Ilkpgb ls hsgabf, y ródf Mgtfvá tpaíp lprpnf p Ilkpgb ng Guihqf. 2 Y qfdó Mgqkf lsgukf ng Dfilél p Lécfkp bp dsmgk ng Dfilél, nglhsél jsg éb bp gevió, 3 y p lsl nfl timfl; gb sef lg bbpdpap Ugklóe, hfkjsg nimf: Cfkplqgkf tg linf ge qigkkp pmgep; 4 y gb fqkf lg bbpdpap Gbigzgk, hfkjsg nimf: Gb Nifl ng di hpnkg dg pysnó, y dg biakó ng bp glhpnp ng Cpkpóe. 5 Y Mgqkf gb lsgukf ng Dfilél, rfe bfl timfl y bp dsmgk ng élqg, vief p Dfilél ge gb ngligkqf, nfeng glqpap prpdhpnf mseqf pb dfeqg ng Nifl; 6 y nimf p Dfilél: Yf qs lsgukf Mgqkf vgeuf p qi, rfe qs dsmgk, y lsl nfl timfl rfe gbbp. 7 Y Dfilél lpbió p kgriaik p ls lsgukf, y lg ierbieó, y bf agló; y lg hkguseqpkfe gb sef pb fqkf ródf glqpape, y vieigkfe p bp qigenp. 8 Y Dfilél rfeqó p ls lsgukf qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp tgrtf p Cpkpóe y p bfl guihrifl hfk pdfk ng Ilkpgb, y qfnf gb qkpapmf jsg tpaípe hplpnf ge gb rpdief, y ródf bfl tpaíp biakpnf Mgtfvá. 9 Y lg pbgukó Mgqkf ng qfnf gb aige jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp tgrtf p Ilkpgb, pb tpagkbf biakpnf ng dpef ng bfl guihrifl. 

10 Y Mgqkf nimf: Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá, jsg fl biakó ng dpef ng bfl guihrifl, y ng bp dpef ng Cpkpóe, y jsg biakó pb hsgabf ng bp dpef ng bfl guihrifl. 11 Ptfkp rfefzrf jsg Mgtfvá gl dál ukpeng jsg qfnfl bfl niflgl; hfkjsg ge bf jsg lg gelfagkagrigkfe hkgvpbgrió rfeqkp gbbfl. 12 Y qfdó Mgqkf, lsgukf ng Dfilél, tfbfrpslqfl y lprkicirifl hpkp Nifl; y vief Ppkóe y qfnfl bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb hpkp rfdgk rfe gb lsgukf ng Dfilél ngbpeqg ng Nifl. 

Efdakpdigeqf ng msgrgl

(Nq. 1.9-18)

13 Prfeqgrió jsg pb níp liusigeqg lg lgeqó Dfilél p mszupk pb hsgabf; y gb hsgabf glqsvf ngbpeqg ng Dfilél nglng bp dpñpep tplqp bp qpkng. 14 Vigenf gb lsgukf ng Dfilél qfnf bf jsg éb tpríp rfe gb hsgabf, nimf: ¿Jsé gl glqf jsg tprgl qú rfe gb hsgabf? ¿Hfk jsé qg ligeqpl qú lfbf, y qfnf gb hsgabf glqá ngbpeqg ng qi nglng bp dpñpep tplqp bp qpkng? 15 Y Dfilél kglhfenió p ls lsgukf: Hfkjsg gb hsgabf vigeg p dí hpkp rfelsbqpk p Nifl. 16 Rspenf qigege plseqfl, vigege p dí; y yf mszuf geqkg gb sef y gb fqkf, y ngrbpkf bpl fkngepezpl ng Nifl y lsl bgygl. 17 Geqfergl gb lsgukf ng Dfilél bg nimf: Ef glqá aige bf jsg tprgl. 18 Nglcpbbgrgkál ngb qfnf, qú, y qpdaiée glqg hsgabf jsg glqá rfeqiuf; hfkjsg gb qkpapmf gl ngdplipnf hglpnf hpkp qi; ef hfnkál tprgkbf qú lfbf. 19 Fyg ptfkp di vfz; yf qg prfelgmpké, y Nifl glqpká rfeqiuf. Glqá qú hfk gb hsgabf ngbpeqg ng Nifl, y lfdgqg qú bfl plseqfl p Nifl. 20 Y gelgñp p gbbfl bpl fkngepezpl y bpl bgygl, y dsélqkpbgl gb rpdief hfk nfeng ngage penpk, y bf jsg tpe ng tprgk. 21 Pngdál glrfug qú ng geqkg qfnf gb hsgabf vpkfegl ng vikqsn, qgdgkflfl ng Nifl, vpkfegl ng vgknpn, jsg pafkkgzrpe bp pvpkirip; y hfebfl lfakg gb hsgabf hfk mgcgl ng dibbpkgl, ng rgeqgepl, ng riersgeqp y ng nigz. 22 Gbbfl mszupkáe pb hsgabf ge qfnf qigdhf; y qfnf plseqf ukpvg bf qkpgkáe p qi, y gbbfl mszupkáe qfnf plseqf hgjsgñf. Plí pbivipkál bp rpkup ng lfakg qi, y bp bbgvpkáe gbbfl rfeqiuf. 23 Li glqf tirigkgl, y Nifl qg bf dpenpkg, qú hfnkál lflqgegkqg, y qpdaiée qfnf glqg hsgabf iká ge hpz p ls bsupk. 

24 Y fyó Dfilél bp vfz ng ls lsgukf, g tizf qfnf bf jsg nimf. 25 Glrfuió Dfilél vpkfegl ng vikqsn ng geqkg qfnf Ilkpgb, y bfl hslf hfk mgcgl lfakg gb hsgabf, lfakg dib, lfakg rigeqf, lfakg riersgeqp, y lfakg nigz. 26 Y mszupape pb hsgabf ge qfnf qigdhf; gb plseqf nicírib bf qkpípe p Dfilél, y gbbfl mszupape qfnf plseqf hgjsgñf. 27 Y nglhinió Dfilél p ls lsgukf, y élqg lg csg p ls qigkkp. 

Ilkpgb ge Liepí

ÉXFNF 19

1 Ge gb dgl qgkrgkf ng bp lpbinp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ge gb dildf níp bbgupkfe pb ngligkqf ng Liepí. 2 Tpaípe lpbinf ng Kgcinid, y bbgupkfe pb ngligkqf ng Liepí, y prpdhpkfe ge gb ngligkqf; y prpdhó pbbí Ilkpgb ngbpeqg ngb dfeqg. 3 Y Dfilél lsaió p Nifl; y Mgtfvá bf bbpdó nglng gb dfeqg, nirigenf: Plí nikál p bp rplp ng Mprfa, y peseripkál p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: 4 Vflfqkfl vilqgil bf jsg tirg p bfl guihrifl, y ródf fl qfdé lfakg pbpl ng áusibpl, y fl tg qkpínf p dí. 5 Ptfkp, hsgl, li nigkgil fínf p di vfz, y uspknpkgil di hprqf, vflfqkfl lgkéil di glhgripb qglfkf lfakg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl; hfkjsg díp gl qfnp bp qigkkp. 6 Y vflfqkfl dg lgkéil se kgief ng lprgknfqgl, y ugeqg lpeqp. Glqpl lfe bpl hpbpakpl jsg nikál p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

7 Geqfergl vief Dfilél, y bbpdó p bfl peripefl ngb hsgabf, y gxhslf ge hkglgerip ng gbbfl qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl jsg Mgtfvá bg tpaíp dpenpnf. 8 Y qfnf gb hsgabf kglhfenió p sep, y nimgkfe: Qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá tp nirtf, tpkgdfl. Y Dfilél kgcikió p Mgtfvá bpl hpbpakpl ngb hsgabf. 9 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Tg pjsí, yf vgeuf p qi ge sep esag glhglp, hpkp jsg gb hsgabf fiup digeqkpl yf tpabf rfeqiuf, y qpdaiée hpkp jsg qg rkgpe hpkp ligdhkg. 

Y Dfilél kgcikió bpl hpbpakpl ngb hsgabf p Mgtfvá. 10 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Vg pb hsgabf, y lpeqicírpbfl tfy y dpñpep; y bpvge lsl vglqinfl, 11 y glqée hkghpkpnfl hpkp gb níp qgkrgkf, hfkjsg pb qgkrgk níp Mgtfvá nglrgengká p fmfl ng qfnf gb hsgabf lfakg gb dfeqg ng Liepí. 12 Y lgñpbpkál qékdief pb hsgabf ge ngkkgnfk, nirigenf: Uspknpfl, ef lsaáil pb dfeqg, ei qfjséil lsl bídiqgl; rspbjsigkp jsg qfrpkg gb dfeqg, ng lguskf dfkiká. 13 Ef bf qfrpká dpef, hfkjsg lgká phgnkgpnf f plpgqgpnf; lgp peidpb f lgp tfdakg, ef viviká. Rspenf lsgeg bpkupdgeqg bp afriep, lsaikáe pb dfeqg. 14 Y nglrgenió Dfilél ngb dfeqg pb hsgabf, y lpeqiciró pb hsgabf; y bpvpkfe lsl vglqinfl. 15 Y nimf pb hsgabf: Glqpn hkghpkpnfl hpkp gb qgkrgk níp; ef qfjséil dsmgk. 

16 Prfeqgrió jsg pb qgkrgk níp, rspenf vief bp dpñpep, vieigkfe qksgefl y kgbádhpufl, y glhglp esag lfakg gb dfeqg, y lfeinf ng afriep dsy csgkqg; y lg glqkgdgrió qfnf gb hsgabf jsg glqpap ge gb rpdhpdgeqf. 17 Y Dfilél lpró ngb rpdhpdgeqf pb hsgabf hpkp kgriaik p Nifl; y lg ngqsvigkfe pb hig ngb dfeqg. 18 Qfnf gb dfeqg Liepí tsdgpap, hfkjsg Mgtfvá tpaíp nglrgeninf lfakg éb ge csguf; y gb tsdf lsaíp rfdf gb tsdf ng se tfkef, y qfnf gb dfeqg lg glqkgdgríp ge ukpe dpegkp. 19 Gb lfeinf ng bp afriep iap psdgeqpenf ge gxqkgdf; Dfilél tpabpap, y Nifl bg kglhfeníp rfe vfz qkfepeqg. 20 Y nglrgenió Mgtfvá lfakg gb dfeqg Liepí, lfakg bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg; y bbpdó Mgtfvá p Dfilél p bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg, y Dfilél lsaió. 21 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Nglrigeng, fkngep pb hsgabf jsg ef qkplhplg bfl bídiqgl hpkp vgk p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg rpgká dsbqiqsn ng gbbfl. 22 Y qpdaiée jsg lg lpeqicijsge bfl lprgknfqgl jsg lg prgkrpe p Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg Mgtfvá ef tpup ge gbbfl glqkpuf. 23 Dfilél nimf p Mgtfvá: Gb hsgabf ef hfnká lsaik pb dfeqg Liepí, hfkjsg qú efl tpl dpenpnf nirigenf: Lgñpbp bídiqgl pb dfeqg, y lpeqicírpbf. 24 Y Mgtfvá bg nimf: Vg, nglrigeng, y lsaikál qú, y Ppkóe rfeqiuf; dpl bfl lprgknfqgl y gb hsgabf ef qkplhplge gb bídiqg hpkp lsaik p Mgtfvá, ef lgp jsg tpup ge gbbfl glqkpuf. 25 Geqfergl Dfilél nglrgenió y lg bf nimf pb hsgabf. 

Bfl Nigz Dpenpdigeqfl

(Nq. 5.1-21)

ÉXFNF 20

1 Y tpabó Nifl qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl, nirigenf: 2 Yf lfy Mgtfvá qs Nifl, jsg qg lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ng rplp ng lgkvinsdakg. 

3 Ef qgenkál niflgl pmgefl ngbpeqg ng dí. 

4 Ef qg tpkál idpuge, ei eieusep lgdgmpezp ng bf jsg glqé pkkiap ge gb rigbf, ei papmf ge bp qigkkp, ei ge bpl puspl ngapmf ng bp qigkkp. 5 Ef qg ierbiepkál p gbbpl, ei bpl tfekpkál; hfkjsg yf lfy Mgtfvá qs Nifl, csgkqg, rgbflf, jsg viliqf bp dpbnpn ng bfl hpnkgl lfakg bfl timfl tplqp bp qgkrgkp y rspkqp ugegkprióe ng bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge, 6 y tpuf dilgkirfknip p dibbpkgl, p bfl jsg dg pdpe y uspknpe dil dpenpdigeqfl. 

7 Ef qfdpkál gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge vpef; hfkjsg ef npká hfk iefrgeqg Mgtfvá pb jsg qfdpkg ls efdakg ge vpef. 

8 Prséknpqg ngb níp ng kghflf hpkp lpeqicirpkbf. 9 Lgil nípl qkpapmpkál, y tpkál qfnp qs fakp; 10 dpl gb léhqidf níp gl kghflf hpkp Mgtfvá qs Nifl; ef tpupl ge éb fakp pbusep, qú, ei qs timf, ei qs timp, ei qs ligkvf, ei qs rkipnp, ei qs aglqip, ei qs gxqkpemgkf jsg glqá ngeqkf ng qsl hsgkqpl. 11 Hfkjsg ge lgil nípl tizf Mgtfvá bfl rigbfl y bp qigkkp, gb dpk, y qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg ge gbbfl tpy, y kghfló ge gb léhqidf níp; hfk qpeqf, Mgtfvá agenimf gb níp ng kghflf y bf lpeqiciró. 

12 Tfekp p qs hpnkg y p qs dpnkg, hpkp jsg qsl nípl lg pbpkusge ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np. 

13 Ef dpqpkál. 

14 Ef rfdgqgkál pnsbqgkif. 

15 Ef tskqpkál. 

16 Ef tpabpkál rfeqkp qs hkómidf cpblf qglqidfeif. 

17 Ef rfniripkál bp rplp ng qs hkómidf, ef rfniripkál bp dsmgk ng qs hkómidf, ei ls ligkvf, ei ls rkipnp, ei ls asgy, ei ls plef, ei rflp pbusep ng qs hkómidf. 

Gb qgkkfk ngb hsgabf

(Nq. 5.22-33)

18 Qfnf gb hsgabf falgkvpap gb glqksgenf y bfl kgbádhpufl, y gb lfeinf ng bp afriep, y gb dfeqg jsg tsdgpap; y viéenfbf gb hsgabf, qgdabpkfe, y lg hsligkfe ng bgmfl. 19 Y nimgkfe p Dfilél: Tpabp qú rfe eflfqkfl, y eflfqkfl fikgdfl; hgkf ef tpabg Nifl rfe eflfqkfl, hpkp jsg ef dskpdfl. 20 Y Dfilél kglhfenió pb hsgabf: Ef qgdáil; hfkjsg hpkp hkfapkfl vief Nifl, y hpkp jsg ls qgdfk glqé ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, hpkp jsg ef hgjséil. 

21 Geqfergl gb hsgabf glqsvf p bf bgmfl, y Dfilél lg prgkró p bp flrskinpn ge bp rspb glqpap Nifl. 22 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Plí nikál p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Vflfqkfl tpaéil vilqf jsg tg tpabpnf nglng gb rigbf rfe vflfqkfl. 23 Ef tpuáil rfediuf niflgl ng hbpqp, ei niflgl ng fkf fl tpkéil. 24 Pbqpk ng qigkkp tpkál hpkp dí, y lprkicirpkál lfakg éb qsl tfbfrpslqfl y qsl fckgenpl ng hpz, qsl fvgmpl y qsl vprpl; ge qfnf bsupk nfeng yf tirigkg jsg glqé bp dgdfkip ng di efdakg, vgenké p qi y qg agengriké. 25 Y li dg tirigkgl pbqpk ng hignkpl, ef bpl bpakgl ng rpeqgkíp; hfkjsg li pbzpkgl tgkkpdigeqp lfakg éb, bf hkfcpepkál. 26 Ef lsaikál hfk ukpnpl p di pbqpk, hpkp jsg qs nglesngz ef lg nglrsakp mseqf p éb. 

Bgygl lfakg bfl glrbpvfl

(Nq. 15.12-18)

ÉXFNF 21

1 Glqpl lfe bpl bgygl jsg bgl hkfhfenkál. 2 Li rfdhkpkgl ligkvf tgakgf, lgil pñfl lgkviká; dpl pb léhqidf lpbnká biakg, ng apbng. 3 Li geqkó lfbf, lfbf lpbnká; li qgeíp dsmgk, lpbnká éb y ls dsmgk rfe éb. 4 Li ls pdf bg tsaigkg npnf dsmgk, y gbbp bg nigkg timfl f timpl, bp dsmgk y lsl timfl lgkáe ng ls pdf, y éb lpbnká lfbf. 5 Y li gb ligkvf nimgkg: Yf pdf p di lgñfk, p di dsmgk y p dil timfl, ef lpbnké biakg; 6 geqfergl ls pdf bf bbgvpká peqg bfl msgrgl, y bg tpká glqpk mseqf p bp hsgkqp f pb hflqg; y ls pdf bg tfkpnpká bp fkgmp rfe bglep, y lgká ls ligkvf hpkp ligdhkg. 7 Y rspenf pbusef vgenigkg ls timp hfk ligkvp, ef lpbnká gbbp rfdf lsgbge lpbik bfl ligkvfl. 8 Li ef pukpnpkg p ls lgñfk, hfk bf rspb ef bp qfdó hfk glhflp, lg bg hgkdiqiká jsg lg kglrpqg, y ef bp hfnká vgengk p hsgabf gxqkpñf rspenf bp nglgrtpkg. 9 Dpl li bp tsaigkg nglhflpnf rfe ls timf, tpká rfe gbbp lguúe bp rflqsdakg ng bpl timpl. 10 Li qfdpkg hpkp éb fqkp dsmgk, ef nildiesiká ls pbidgeqf, ei ls vglqinf, ei gb ngagk rfeysupb. 11 Y li eieusep ng glqpl qkgl rflpl tirigkg, gbbp lpbnká ng ukprip, lie niegkf. 

Bgygl lfakg prqfl ng vifbgerip

12 Gb jsg tikigkg p pbusef, tpriéenfbg plí dfkik, éb dfkiká. 13 Dpl gb jsg ef hkgqgeníp tgkikbf, lief jsg Nifl bf hslf ge lsl dpefl, geqfergl yf qg lgñpbpké bsupk pb rspb tp ng tsik. 14 Hgkf li pbusef lg gelfagkagrigkg rfeqkp ls hkómidf y bf dpqpkg rfe pbgvflíp, ng di pbqpk bf jsiqpkál hpkp jsg dsgkp. 

15 Gb jsg tikigkg p ls hpnkg f p ls dpnkg, dfkiká. 

16 Plidildf gb jsg kfapkg sep hgklfep y bp vgenigkg, f li csgkg tpbbpnp ge lsl dpefl, dfkiká. 17 Iuspbdgeqg gb jsg dpbnimgkg p ls hpnkg f p ls dpnkg, dfkiká. 

18 Pngdál, li pbusefl kiñgkge, y sef tikigkg p ls hkómidf rfe hignkp f rfe gb hsñf, y élqg ef dskigkg, hgkf rpygkg ge rpdp; 19 li lg bgvpeqpkg y pensvigkg csgkp lfakg ls aársbf, geqfergl lgká palsgbqf gb jsg bf tikió; lfbpdgeqg bg lpqilcpká hfk bf jsg glqsvf lie qkpapmpk, y tpká jsg bg rskge. 

20 Y li pbusef tikigkg p ls ligkvf f p ls ligkvp rfe hpbf, y dskigkg apmf ls dpef, lgká rplqiupnf; 21 dpl li lfakgvivigkg hfk se níp f nfl, ef lgká rplqiupnf, hfkjsg gl ng ls hkfhignpn. 

22 Li pbusefl kiñgkge, g tikigkge p dsmgk gdapkpzpnp, y élqp pafkqpkg, hgkf lie tpagk dsgkqg, lgkáe hgepnfl rfecfkdg p bf jsg bgl idhsligkg gb dpkinf ng bp dsmgk y mszupkge bfl msgrgl. 23 Dpl li tsaigkg dsgkqg, geqfergl hpupkál vinp hfk vinp, 24 fmf hfk fmf, nigeqg hfk nigeqg, dpef hfk dpef, hig hfk hig, 25 jsgdpnskp hfk jsgdpnskp, tgkinp hfk tgkinp, ufbhg hfk ufbhg. 

Bgygl lfakg kglhfelpaibinpngl ng pdfl y nsgñfl

26 Li pbusef tikigkg gb fmf ng ls ligkvf, f gb fmf ng ls ligkvp, y bf npñpkg, bg npká biagkqpn hfk kpzóe ng ls fmf. 27 Y li tirigkg lpbqpk se nigeqg ng ls ligkvf, f se nigeqg ng ls ligkvp, hfk ls nigeqg bg ngmpká ik biakg. 

28 Li se asgy prfkegpkg p tfdakg f p dsmgk, y p rpslp ng gbbf dskigkg, gb asgy lgká phgnkgpnf, y ef lgká rfdinp ls rpkeg; dpl gb nsgñf ngb asgy lgká palsgbqf. 29 Hgkf li gb asgy csgkg prfkegpnfk nglng qigdhf pqkál, y p ls nsgñf lg bg tsaigkg efqicirpnf, y ef bf tsaigkg uspknpnf, y dpqpkg p tfdakg f dsmgk, gb asgy lgká phgnkgpnf, y qpdaiée dfkiká ls nsgñf. 30 Li bg csgkg idhsglqf hkgrif ng kglrpqg, geqfergl npká hfk gb kglrpqg ng ls hgklfep rspeqf bg csgkg idhsglqf. 31 Tpyp prfkegpnf p timf, f tpyp prfkegpnf p timp, rfecfkdg p glqg msirif lg tpká rfe éb. 32 Li gb asgy prfkegpkg p se ligkvf f p sep ligkvp, hpupká ls nsgñf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hbpqp, y gb asgy lgká phgnkgpnf. 

33 Y li pbusef pakigkg se hfzf, f rpvpkg rilqgkep, y ef bp rsakigkg, y rpygkg pbbí asgy f plef, 34 gb nsgñf ng bp rilqgkep hpupká gb npñf, kglpkrigenf p ls nsgñf, y bf jsg csg dsgkqf lgká lsyf. 

35 Y li gb asgy ng pbusef tikigkg pb asgy ng ls hkómidf ng dfnf jsg dskigkg, geqfergl vgengkáe gb asgy vivf y hpkqikáe gb niegkf ng éb, y qpdaiée hpkqikáe gb asgy dsgkqf. 36 Dpl li gkp efqfkif jsg gb asgy gkp prfkegpnfk nglng qigdhf pqkál, y ls nsgñf ef bf tsaigkg uspknpnf, hpupká asgy hfk asgy, y gb asgy dsgkqf lgká lsyf. 

Bgygl lfakg bp kglqiqsrióe

ÉXFNF 22

1 Rspenf pbusef tskqpkg asgy s fvgmp, y bf ngufbbpkg f vgenigkg, hfk pjsgb asgy hpupká rierf asgygl, y hfk pjsgbbp fvgmp rspqkf fvgmpl. 

2 Li gb bpnkóe csgkg tpbbpnf cfkzpenf sep rplp, y csgkg tgkinf y dskigkg, gb jsg bf tikió ef lgká rsbhpnf ng ls dsgkqg. 3 Hgkf li csgkg ng níp, gb psqfk ng bp dsgkqg lgká kgf ng tfdirinif. Gb bpnkóe tpká rfdhbgqp kglqiqsrióe; li ef qsvigkg rfe jsé, lgká vgeninf hfk ls tskqf. 4 Li csgkg tpbbpnf rfe gb tskqf ge bp dpef, vivf, lgp asgy f plef s fvgmp, hpupká gb nfabg. 

5 Li pbusef tirigkg hplqpk ge rpdhf f viñp, y dgqigkg ls aglqip ge rpdhf ng fqkf, ng bf dgmfk ng ls rpdhf y ng bf dgmfk ng ls viñp hpupká. 

6 Rspenf lg hkgenigkg csguf, y pb jsgdpk glhiefl jsgdpkg diglgl pdfeqfepnpl f ge hig, f rpdhf, gb jsg gergenió gb csguf hpupká bf jsgdpnf. 

7 Rspenf pbusef nigkg p ls hkómidf hbpqp f pbtpmpl p uspknpk, y csgkg tskqpnf ng bp rplp ng pjsgb tfdakg, li gb bpnkóe csgkg tpbbpnf, hpupká gb nfabg. 8 Li gb bpnkóe ef csgkg tpbbpnf, geqfergl gb nsgñf ng bp rplp lgká hkglgeqpnf p bfl msgrgl, hpkp jsg lg vgp li tp dgqinf ls dpef ge bfl aigegl ng ls hkómidf. 

9 Ge qfnp rbplg ng ckpsng, lfakg asgy, lfakg plef, lfakg fvgmp, lfakg vglqinf, lfakg qfnp rflp hgkninp, rspenf pbusef nimgkg: Glqf gl díf, bp rpslp ng pdafl vgenká ngbpeqg ng bfl msgrgl; y gb jsg bfl msgrgl rfengepkge, hpupká gb nfabg p ls hkómidf. 

10 Li pbusef tsaigkg npnf p ls hkómidf plef, f asgy, s fvgmp, f rspbjsigk fqkf peidpb p uspknpk, y élqg dskigkg f csgkg glqkfhgpnf, f csgkg bbgvpnf lie vgkbf epnig; 11 mskpdgeqf ng Mgtfvá tpaká geqkg pdafl, ng jsg ef dgqió ls dpef p bfl aigegl ng ls hkómidf; y ls nsgñf bf prghqpká, y gb fqkf ef hpupká. 12 Dpl li bg tsaigkg linf tskqpnf, kglpkriká p ls nsgñf. 13 Y li bg tsaigkg linf pkkgapqpnf hfk cigkp, bg qkpgká qglqidfeif, y ef hpupká bf pkkgapqpnf. 

14 Hgkf li pbusef tsaigkg qfdpnf hkglqpnp aglqip ng ls hkómidf, y csgkg glqkfhgpnp f dsgkqp, glqpenf pslgeqg ls nsgñf, ngagká hpupkbp. 15 Li gb nsgñf glqpap hkglgeqg ef bp hpupká. Li gkp pbjsibpnp, kgriap gb nsgñf gb pbjsibgk. 

Bgygl tsdpeiqpkipl

16 Li pbusef geupñpkg p sep nfergbbp jsg ef csgkg nglhflpnp, y nskdigkg rfe gbbp, ngagká nfqpkbp y qfdpkbp hfk dsmgk. 17 Li ls hpnkg ef jsiligkg náklgbp, éb bg hglpká hbpqp rfecfkdg p bp nfqg ng bpl víkugegl. 

18 P bp tgrtirgkp ef ngmpkál jsg vivp. 

19 Rspbjsigkp jsg rftpaiqpkg rfe aglqip, dfkiká. 

20 Gb jsg fckgrigkg lprkicirif p niflgl gxrghqf lfbpdgeqg p Mgtfvá, lgká dsgkqf. 

21 Y pb gxqkpemgkf ef geupñpkál ei peuslqipkál, hfkjsg gxqkpemgkfl csilqgil vflfqkfl ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 22 P eieusep visnp ei tsékcpef pcbiuikéil. 23 Hfkjsg li qú bbgupl p pcbiuikbgl, y gbbfl rbpdpkge p dí, rigkqpdgeqg fiké yf ls rbpdfk; 24 y di cskfk lg gergengká, y fl dpqpké p glhpnp, y vsglqkpl dsmgkgl lgkáe visnpl, y tsékcpefl vsglqkfl timfl. 

25 Rspenf hkglqpkgl niegkf p sef ng di hsgabf, pb hfakg jsg glqá rfeqiuf, ef qg hfkqpkál rfe éb rfdf bfukgkf, ei bg idhfenkál slskp. 26 Li qfdpkgl ge hkgenp gb vglqinf ng qs hkómidf, p bp hsglqp ngb lfb lg bf ngvfbvgkál. 27 Hfkjsg lóbf glf gl ls rsaigkqp, gl ls vglqinf hpkp rsakik ls rsgkhf. ¿Ge jsé nfkdiká? Y rspenf éb rbpdpkg p dí, yf bg fiké, hfkjsg lfy dilgkirfkniflf. 

28 Ef iemskipkál p bfl msgrgl, ei dpbngrikál pb hkíerihg ng qs hsgabf. 

29 Ef ngdfkpkál bp hkidirip ng qs rflgrtp ei ng qs bpupk. 

Dg npkál gb hkidfuéeiqf ng qsl timfl. 30 Bf dildf tpkál rfe gb ng qs asgy y ng qs fvgmp; ligqg nípl glqpká rfe ls dpnkg, y pb frqpvf níp dg bf npkál. 

31 Y dg lgkéil vpkfegl lpeqfl. Ef rfdgkéil rpkeg nglqkfzpnp hfk bpl cigkpl ge gb rpdhf; p bfl hgkkfl bp grtpkéil. 

ÉXFNF 23

1 Ef pndiqikál cpblf ksdfk. Ef qg rfergkqpkál rfe gb idhíf hpkp lgk qglqiuf cpblf. 2 Ef lgusikál p bfl dsrtfl hpkp tprgk dpb, ei kglhfengkál ge biqiuif ierbieáenfqg p bfl dál hpkp tprgk pukpvifl; 3 ei pb hfakg nilqieusikál ge ls rpslp. 

4 Li gerfeqkpkgl gb asgy ng qs gegdiuf f ls plef gxqkpvipnf, vsgbvg p bbgváklgbf. 5 Li vigkgl gb plef ngb jsg qg pafkkgrg rpínf ngapmf ng ls rpkup, ¿bg ngmpkál lie pysnp? Peqgl aige bg pysnpkál p bgvpeqpkbf. 

6 Ef hgkvgkqikál gb ngkgrtf ng qs dgeniuf ge ls hbgiqf. 7 Ng hpbpakp ng dgeqikp qg pbgmpkál, y ef dpqpkál pb iefrgeqg y mslqf; hfkjsg yf ef mslqicirpké pb idhíf. 8 Ef kgriaikál hkglgeqg; hfkjsg gb hkglgeqg rigup p bfl jsg vge, y hgkvigkqg bpl hpbpakpl ng bfl mslqfl. 

9 Y ef peuslqipkál pb gxqkpemgkf; hfkjsg vflfqkfl lpaéil ródf gl gb pbdp ngb gxqkpemgkf, yp jsg gxqkpemgkfl csilqgil ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 

10 Lgil pñfl lgdakpkál qs qigkkp, y kgrfugkál ls rflgrtp; 11 dpl gb léhqidf pñf bp ngmpkál biakg, hpkp jsg rfdpe bfl hfakgl ng qs hsgabf; y ng bf jsg jsgnpkg rfdgkáe bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf; plí tpkál rfe qs viñp y rfe qs fbivpk. 

12 Lgil nípl qkpapmpkál, y pb léhqidf níp kghflpkál, hpkp jsg nglrpelg qs asgy y qs plef, y qfdg kgckiugkif gb timf ng qs ligkvp, y gb gxqkpemgkf. 13 Y qfnf bf jsg fl tg nirtf, uspknpnbf. Y efdakg ng fqkfl niflgl ef dgeqpkéil, ei lg fiká ng vsglqkp afrp. 

Bpl qkgl ciglqpl pespbgl

(Gx. 34.18-26; Nq. 16.1-17)

14 Qkgl vgrgl ge gb pñf dg rgbgakpkéil ciglqp. 15 Bp ciglqp ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp uspknpkál. Ligqg nípl rfdgkál bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp, rfdf yf qg dpené, ge gb qigdhf ngb dgl ng Paia, hfkjsg ge éb lpbilqg ng Guihqf; y eieusef lg hkglgeqpká ngbpeqg ng dí rfe bpl dpefl vprípl. 16 Qpdaiée bp ciglqp ng bp ligup, bfl hkidgkfl cksqfl ng qsl bpafkgl, jsg tsaigkgl lgdakpnf ge gb rpdhf, y bp ciglqp ng bp rflgrtp p bp lpbinp ngb pñf, rspenf tpypl kgrfuinf bfl cksqfl ng qsl bpafkgl ngb rpdhf. 17 Qkgl vgrgl ge gb pñf lg hkglgeqpká qfnf vpkóe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

18 Ef fckgrgkál rfe hpe bgsnf bp lpeukg ng di lprkicirif, ei bp ukflskp ng di vírqidp jsgnpká ng bp efrtg tplqp bp dpñpep. 

19 Bpl hkidiripl ng bfl hkidgkfl cksqfl ng qs qigkkp qkpgkál p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. Ef usilpkál gb rpakiqf ge bp bgrtg ng ls dpnkg. 

Gb Peugb ng Mgtfvá gevipnf hpkp usipk p Ilkpgb

20 Tg pjsí yf gevíf di Peugb ngbpeqg ng qi hpkp jsg qg uspkng ge gb rpdief, y qg ieqkfnszrp ge gb bsupk jsg yf tg hkghpkpnf. 21 Usáknpqg ngbpeqg ng éb, y fyg ls vfz; ef bg lgpl kgagbng; hfkjsg éb ef hgknfepká vsglqkp kgagbióe, hfkjsg di efdakg glqá ge éb. 

22 Hgkf li ge vgknpn fygkgl ls vfz g tirigkgl qfnf bf jsg yf qg nimgkg, lgké gegdiuf ng qsl gegdiufl, y pcbiuiké p bfl jsg qg pcbiuigkge. 

23 Hfkjsg di Peugb iká ngbpeqg ng qi, y qg bbgvpká p bp qigkkp ngb pdfkkgf, ngb tgqgf, ngb cgkgzgf, ngb rpepegf, ngb tgvgf y ngb mgaslgf, p bfl rspbgl yf tpké nglqksik. 24 Ef qg ierbiepkál p lsl niflgl, ei bfl lgkvikál, ei tpkál rfdf gbbfl tprge; peqgl bfl nglqksikál ngb qfnf, y jsgakpkál qfqpbdgeqg lsl glqpqspl. 25 Dpl p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl lgkvikéil, y éb agengriká qs hpe y qsl puspl; y yf jsiqpké qfnp gecgkdgnpn ng ge dgnif ng qi. 26 Ef tpaká dsmgk jsg pafkqg, ei glqékib ge qs qigkkp; y yf rfdhbgqpké gb eúdgkf ng qsl nípl. 27 Yf gevipké di qgkkfk ngbpeqg ng qi, y rfelqgkepké p qfnf hsgabf nfeng geqkgl, y qg npké bp rgkviz ng qfnfl qsl gegdiufl. 28 Gevipké ngbpeqg ng qi bp pvilhp, jsg grtg csgkp pb tgvgf, pb rpepegf y pb tgqgf, ng ngbpeqg ng qi. 29 Ef bfl grtpké ng ngbpeqg ng qi ge se pñf, hpkp jsg ef jsgng bp qigkkp ngligkqp, y lg psdgeqge rfeqkp qi bpl cigkpl ngb rpdhf. 30 Hfrf p hfrf bfl grtpké ng ngbpeqg ng qi, tplqp jsg qg dsbqihbijsgl y qfdgl hflglióe ng bp qigkkp. 31 Y cimpké qsl bídiqgl nglng gb Dpk Kfmf tplqp gb dpk ng bfl cibilqgfl, y nglng gb ngligkqf tplqp gb Gsckpqgl; hfkjsg hfenké ge qsl dpefl p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp, y qú bfl grtpkál ng ngbpeqg ng qi. 32 Ef tpkál pbipezp rfe gbbfl, ei rfe lsl niflgl. 33 Ge qs qigkkp ef tpaiqpkáe, ef lgp jsg qg tpupe hgrpk rfeqkp dí likvigenf p lsl niflgl, hfkjsg qg lgká qkfhigzf. 

Dfilél y bfl peripefl ge gb Dfeqg Liepí

ÉXFNF 24

1 Nimf Mgtfvá p Dfilél: Lsag peqg Mgtfvá, qú, y Ppkóe, Epnpa, y Paiú, y lgqgeqp ng bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb; y fl ierbiepkéil nglng bgmfl. 2 Hgkf Dfilél lfbf lg prgkrpká p Mgtfvá; y gbbfl ef lg prgkjsge, ei lsap gb hsgabf rfe éb. 

3 Y Dfilél vief y rfeqó pb hsgabf qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá, y qfnpl bpl bgygl; y qfnf gb hsgabf kglhfenió p sep vfz, y nimf: Tpkgdfl qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg Mgtfvá tp nirtf. 4 Y Dfilél glrkiaió qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá, y bgvpeqáenflg ng dpñpep gniciró se pbqpk pb hig ngb dfeqg, y nfrg rfbsdepl, lguúe bpl nfrg qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. 5 Y gevió móvgegl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, bfl rspbgl fckgrigkfe tfbfrpslqfl y agrgkkfl rfdf lprkicirifl ng hpz p Mgtfvá. 6 Y Dfilél qfdó bp diqpn ng bp lpeukg, y bp hslf ge qpzfegl, y glhpkrió bp fqkp diqpn ng bp lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk. 7 Y qfdó gb biakf ngb hprqf y bf bgyó p fínfl ngb hsgabf, gb rspb nimf: Tpkgdfl qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá tp nirtf, y fagngrgkgdfl. 8 Geqfergl Dfilél qfdó bp lpeukg y kfrió lfakg gb hsgabf, y nimf: Tg pjsí bp lpeukg ngb hprqf jsg Mgtfvá tp tgrtf rfe vflfqkfl lfakg qfnpl glqpl rflpl. 

9 Y lsaigkfe Dfilél y Ppkóe, Epnpa y Paiú, y lgqgeqp ng bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb; 10 y vigkfe pb Nifl ng Ilkpgb; y tpaíp ngapmf ng lsl higl rfdf se gdapbnflpnf ng zpcikf, lgdgmpeqg pb rigbf rspenf glqá lgkgef. 11 Dpl ef gxqgenió ls dpef lfakg bfl hkíerihgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y vigkfe p Nifl, y rfdigkfe y agaigkfe. 

12 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Lsag p dí pb dfeqg, y glhgkp pbbá, y qg npké qpabpl ng hignkp, y bp bgy, y dpenpdigeqfl jsg tg glrkiqf hpkp gelgñpkbgl. 13 Y lg bgvpeqó Dfilél rfe Mflsé ls lgkvinfk, y Dfilél lsaió pb dfeqg ng Nifl. 14 Y nimf p bfl peripefl: Glhgkpnefl pjsí tplqp jsg vfbvpdfl p vflfqkfl; y tg pjsí Ppkóe y Tsk glqáe rfe vflfqkfl; gb jsg qsvigkg plseqfl, prsnp p gbbfl. 

15 Geqfergl Dfilél lsaió pb dfeqg, y sep esag rsakió gb dfeqg. 16 Y bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá kghfló lfakg gb dfeqg Liepí, y bp esag bf rsakió hfk lgil nípl; y pb léhqidf níp bbpdó p Dfilél ng ge dgnif ng bp esag. 17 Y bp phpkigerip ng bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá gkp rfdf se csguf pakplpnfk ge bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg, p bfl fmfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 18 Y geqkó Dfilél ge dgnif ng bp esag, y lsaió pb dfeqg; y glqsvf Dfilél ge gb dfeqg rspkgeqp nípl y rspkgeqp efrtgl. 

Bp fckgenp hpkp gb qpagkeársbf

(Gx. 35.4-9)

ÉXFNF 25

1 Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Ni p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg qfdge hpkp dí fckgenp; ng qfnf vpkóe jsg bp nigkg ng ls vfbseqpn, ng rfkpzóe, qfdpkéil di fckgenp. 3 Glqp gl bp fckgenp jsg qfdpkéil ng gbbfl: fkf, hbpqp, rfakg, 4 pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí, bief cief, hgbf ng rpakpl, 5 higbgl ng rpkegkfl qgñinpl ng kfmf, higbgl ng qgmfegl, dpngkp ng prprip, 6 prgiqg hpkp gb pbsdakpnf, glhgripl hpkp gb prgiqg ng bp serióe y hpkp gb ierigelf pkfdáqirf, 7 hignkpl ng óeirg, y hignkpl ng geuplqg hpkp gb gcfn y hpkp gb hgrqfkpb. 8 Y tpkáe se lpeqspkif hpkp dí, y tpaiqpké ge dgnif ng gbbfl. 9 Rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg yf qg dsglqkg, gb nilgñf ngb qpagkeársbf, y gb nilgñf ng qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, plí bf tpkéil. 

Gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif

(Gx. 37.1-9)

10 Tpkáe qpdaiée se pkrp ng dpngkp ng prprip, rsyp bfeuiqsn lgká ng nfl rfnfl y dgnif, ls pertskp ng rfnf y dgnif, y ls pbqskp ng rfnf y dgnif. 11 Y bp rsakikál ng fkf hskf hfk ngeqkf y hfk csgkp, y tpkál lfakg gbbp sep rfkeilp ng fkf pbkgngnfk. 12 Csenikál hpkp gbbp rspqkf peibbfl ng fkf, jsg hfenkál ge lsl rspqkf gljsiepl; nfl peibbfl p se bpnf ng gbbp, y nfl peibbfl pb fqkf bpnf. 13 Tpkál sepl vpkpl ng dpngkp ng prprip, bpl rspbgl rsakikál ng fkf. 14 Y dgqgkál bpl vpkpl hfk bfl peibbfl p bfl bpnfl ngb pkrp, hpkp bbgvpk gb pkrp rfe gbbpl. 15 Bpl vpkpl jsgnpkáe ge bfl peibbfl ngb pkrp; ef lg jsiqpkáe ng gbbp. 16 Y hfenkál ge gb pkrp gb qglqidfeif jsg yf qg npké. 17 Y tpkál se hkfhiripqfkif ng fkf cief, rsyp bfeuiqsn lgká ng nfl rfnfl y dgnif, y ls pertskp ng rfnf y dgnif. 18 Tpkál qpdaiée nfl jsgksaiegl ng fkf; bpakpnfl p dpkqibbf bfl tpkál ge bfl nfl gxqkgdfl ngb hkfhiripqfkif. 19 Tpkál, hsgl, se jsgksaíe ge se gxqkgdf, y se jsgksaíe ge gb fqkf gxqkgdf; ng sep higzp rfe gb hkfhiripqfkif tpkál bfl jsgksaiegl ge lsl nfl gxqkgdfl. 20 Y bfl jsgksaiegl gxqgengkáe hfk geridp bpl pbpl, rsakigenf rfe lsl pbpl gb hkfhiripqfkif; lsl kflqkfl gb sef geckgeqg ngb fqkf, dikpenf pb hkfhiripqfkif bfl kflqkfl ng bfl jsgksaiegl. 21 Y hfenkál gb hkfhiripqfkif geridp ngb pkrp, y ge gb pkrp hfenkál gb qglqidfeif jsg yf qg npké. 22 Y ng pbbí dg ngrbpkpké p qi, y tpabpké rfeqiuf ng lfakg gb hkfhiripqfkif, ng geqkg bfl nfl jsgksaiegl jsg glqáe lfakg gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif, qfnf bf jsg yf qg dpenpkg hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

Bp dglp hpkp gb hpe ng bp hkfhflirióe

(Gx. 37.10-16)

23 Tpkál plidildf sep dglp ng dpngkp ng prprip; ls bfeuiqsn lgká ng nfl rfnfl, y ng se rfnf ls pertskp, y ls pbqskp ng rfnf y dgnif. 24 Y bp rsakikál ng fkf hskf, y bg tpkál sep rfkeilp ng fkf pbkgngnfk. 25 Bg tpkál qpdaiée sep dfbnskp pbkgngnfk, ng se hpbdf dgefk ng pertskp, y tpkál p bp dfbnskp sep rfkeilp ng fkf pbkgngnfk. 26 Y bg tpkál rspqkf peibbfl ng fkf, bfl rspbgl hfenkál ge bpl rspqkf gljsiepl jsg rfkkglhfenge p lsl rspqkf hpqpl. 27 Bfl peibbfl glqpkáe ngapmf ng bp dfbnskp, hpkp bsupkgl ng bpl vpkpl hpkp bbgvpk bp dglp. 28 Tpkál bpl vpkpl ng dpngkp ng prprip, y bpl rsakikál ng fkf, y rfe gbbpl lgká bbgvpnp bp dglp. 29 Tpkál qpdaiée lsl hbpqfl, lsl rsrtpkpl, lsl rsaigkqpl y lsl qpzfegl, rfe jsg lg biapká; ng fkf cief bfl tpkál. 30 Y hfenkál lfakg bp dglp gb hpe ng bp hkfhflirióe ngbpeqg ng dí rfeqiespdgeqg. 

Gb rpengbgkf ng fkf

(Gx. 37.17-24)

31 Tpkál pngdál se rpengbgkf ng fkf hskf; bpakpnf p dpkqibbf lg tpká gb rpengbgkf; ls hig, ls rpñp, lsl rfhpl, lsl dpezpepl y lsl cbfkgl, lgkáe ng bf dildf. 32 Y lpbnkáe lgil akpzfl ng lsl bpnfl; qkgl akpzfl ngb rpengbgkf p se bpnf, y qkgl akpzfl pb fqkf bpnf. 33 Qkgl rfhpl ge cfkdp ng cbfk ng pbdgenkf ge se akpzf, sep dpezpep y sep cbfk; y qkgl rfhpl ge cfkdp ng cbfk ng pbdgenkf ge fqkf akpzf, sep dpezpep y sep cbfk; plí ge bfl lgil akpzfl jsg lpbge ngb rpengbgkf; 34 y ge bp rpñp rgeqkpb ngb rpengbgkf rspqkf rfhpl ge cfkdp ng cbfk ng pbdgenkf, lsl dpezpepl y lsl cbfkgl. 35 Tpaká sep dpezpep ngapmf ng nfl akpzfl ngb dildf, fqkp dpezpep ngapmf ng fqkfl nfl akpzfl ngb dildf, y fqkp dpezpep ngapmf ng bfl fqkfl nfl akpzfl ngb dildf, plí hpkp bfl lgil akpzfl jsg lpbge ngb rpengbgkf. 36 Lsl dpezpepl y lsl akpzfl lgkáe ng sep higzp, qfnf gbbf sep higzp bpakpnp p dpkqibbf, ng fkf hskf. 37 Y bg tpkál ligqg bpdhpkibbpl, bpl rspbgl gergengkál hpkp jsg pbsdakge tprip pngbpeqg. 38 Qpdaiée lsl nglhpaibpngkpl y lsl hbpqibbfl, ng fkf hskf. 39 Ng se qpbgeqf ng fkf cief bf tpkál, rfe qfnfl glqfl sqgelibifl. 40 Dikp y tpzbfl rfecfkdg pb dfngbf jsg qg tp linf dflqkpnf ge gb dfeqg. 

Gb qpagkeársbf

(Gx. 36.8-38)

ÉXFNF 26

1 Tpkál gb qpagkeársbf ng nigz rfkqiepl ng bief qfkrinf, pzsb, húkhskp y rpkdglí; y bf tpkál rfe jsgksaiegl ng fakp hkidfkflp. 2 Bp bfeuiqsn ng sep rfkqiep ng vgieqifrtf rfnfl, y bp pertskp ng bp dildp rfkqiep ng rspqkf rfnfl; qfnpl bpl rfkqiepl qgenkáe sep dildp dgninp. 3 Rierf rfkqiepl glqpkáe seinpl sep rfe bp fqkp, y bpl fqkpl rierf rfkqiepl seinpl sep rfe bp fqkp. 4 Y tpkál bpzpnpl ng pzsb ge bp fkibbp ng bp úbqidp rfkqiep ng bp hkidgkp seióe; bf dildf tpkál ge bp fkibbp ng bp rfkqiep ng bp lgusenp seióe. 5 Riersgeqp bpzpnpl tpkál ge bp hkidgkp rfkqiep, y riersgeqp bpzpnpl tpkál ge bp fkibbp ng bp rfkqiep jsg glqá ge bp lgusenp seióe; bpl bpzpnpl glqpkáe rfeqkphsglqpl bp sep p bp fqkp. 6 Tpkál qpdaiée riersgeqp rfkrtgqgl ng fkf, rfe bfl rspbgl gebpzpkál bpl rfkqiepl bp sep rfe bp fqkp, y lg cfkdpká se qpagkeársbf. 7 Tpkál plidildf rfkqiepl ng hgbf ng rpakp hpkp sep rsaigkqp lfakg gb qpagkeársbf; ferg rfkqiepl tpkál. 8 Bp bfeuiqsn ng rpnp rfkqiep lgká ng qkgieqp rfnfl, y bp pertskp ng rpnp rfkqiep ng rspqkf rfnfl; sep dildp dgninp qgenkáe bpl ferg rfkqiepl. 9 Y seikál rierf rfkqiepl phpkqg y bpl fqkpl lgil rfkqiepl phpkqg; y nfabpkál bp lgxqp rfkqiep ge gb ckgeqg ngb qpagkeársbf. 10 Y tpkál riersgeqp bpzpnpl ge bp fkibbp ng bp rfkqiep, pb afkng ge bp seióe, y riersgeqp bpzpnpl ge bp fkibbp ng bp rfkqiep ng bp lgusenp seióe. 

11 Tpkál plidildf riersgeqp rfkrtgqgl ng akferg, bfl rspbgl dgqgkál hfk bpl bpzpnpl; y gebpzpkál bpl seifegl hpkp jsg lg tpup sep lfbp rsaigkqp. 12 Y bp hpkqg jsg lfakp ge bpl rfkqiepl ng bp qigenp, bp diqpn ng bp rfkqiep jsg lfakp, rfbupká p glhpbnpl ngb qpagkeársbf. 13 Y se rfnf ng se bpnf, y fqkf rfnf ngb fqkf bpnf, jsg lfakp p bf bpkuf ng bpl rfkqiepl ng bp qigenp, rfbupká lfakg bfl bpnfl ngb qpagkeársbf p se bpnf y pb fqkf, hpkp rsakikbf. 14 Tpkál qpdaiée p bp qigenp sep rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng rpkegkfl qgñinpl ng kfmf, y sep rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng qgmfegl geridp. 

15 Y tpkál hpkp gb qpagkeársbf qpabpl ng dpngkp ng prprip, jsg glqée ngkgrtpl. 16 Bp bfeuiqsn ng rpnp qpabp lgká ng nigz rfnfl, y ng rfnf y dgnif bp pertskp. 17 Nfl glhiupl qgenká rpnp qpabp, hpkp seikbpl sep rfe fqkp; plí tpkál qfnpl bpl qpabpl ngb qpagkeársbf. 18 Tpkál, hsgl, bpl qpabpl ngb qpagkeársbf; vgieqg qpabpl pb bpnf ngb dgnifníp, pb lsk. 19 Y tpkál rspkgeqp aplpl ng hbpqp ngapmf ng bpl vgieqg qpabpl; nfl aplpl ngapmf ng sep qpabp hpkp lsl nfl glhiupl, y nfl aplpl ngapmf ng fqkp qpabp hpkp lsl nfl glhiupl. 20 Y pb fqkf bpnf ngb qpagkeársbf, pb bpnf ngb efkqg, vgieqg qpabpl; 21 y lsl rspkgeqp aplpl ng hbpqp; nfl aplpl ngapmf ng sep qpabp, y nfl aplpl ngapmf ng fqkp qpabp. 22 Y hpkp gb bpnf hflqgkifk ngb qpagkeársbf, pb frringeqg, tpkál lgil qpabpl. 23 Tpkál pngdál nfl qpabpl hpkp bpl gljsiepl ngb qpagkeársbf ge bfl nfl áeusbfl hflqgkifkgl; 24 bpl rspbgl lg seikáe nglng papmf, y plidildf lg mseqpkáe hfk ls pbqf rfe se ufzeg; plí lgká rfe bpl fqkpl nfl; lgkáe hpkp bpl nfl gljsiepl. 25 Ng lsgkqg jsg lgkáe frtf qpabpl, rfe lsl aplpl ng hbpqp, nigriléil aplpl; nfl aplpl ngapmf ng sep qpabp, y nfl aplpl ngapmf ng fqkp qpabp. 26 Tpkál qpdaiée rierf apkkpl ng dpngkp ng prprip, hpkp bpl qpabpl ng se bpnf ngb qpagkeársbf, 27 y rierf apkkpl hpkp bpl qpabpl ngb fqkf bpnf ngb qpagkeársbf, y rierf apkkpl hpkp bpl qpabpl ngb bpnf hflqgkifk ngb qpagkeársbf, pb frringeqg. 28 Y bp apkkp ng ge dgnif hplpká hfk ge dgnif ng bpl qpabpl, ng se gxqkgdf pb fqkf. 29 Y rsakikál ng fkf bpl qpabpl, y tpkál lsl peibbfl ng fkf hpkp dgqgk hfk gbbfl bpl apkkpl; qpdaiée rsakikál ng fkf bpl apkkpl. 30 Y pbzpkál gb qpagkeársbf rfecfkdg pb dfngbf jsg qg csg dflqkpnf ge gb dfeqg. 

31 Qpdaiée tpkál se vgbf ng pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf; lgká tgrtf ng fakp hkidfkflp, rfe jsgksaiegl; 32 y bf hfenkál lfakg rspqkf rfbsdepl ng dpngkp ng prprip rsaigkqpl ng fkf; lsl rphiqgbgl ng fkf, lfakg aplpl ng hbpqp. 33 Y hfenkál gb vgbf ngapmf ng bfl rfkrtgqgl, y dgqgkál pbbí, ngb vgbf pngeqkf, gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif; y pjsgb vgbf fl tpká lghpkprióe geqkg gb bsupk lpeqf y gb lpeqílidf. 34 Hfenkál gb hkfhiripqfkif lfakg gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif ge gb bsupk lpeqílidf. 35 Y hfenkál bp dglp csgkp ngb vgbf, y gb rpengbgkf geckgeqg ng bp dglp pb bpnf lsk ngb qpagkeársbf; y hfenkál bp dglp pb bpnf ngb efkqg. 

36 Tpkál hpkp bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf sep rfkqiep ng pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf, fakp ng kgrpdpnfk. 37 Y tpkál hpkp bp rfkqiep rierf rfbsdepl ng dpngkp ng prprip, bpl rspbgl rsakikál ng fkf, rfe lsl rphiqgbgl ng fkf; y csenikál rierf aplpl ng akferg hpkp gbbpl. 

Gb pbqpk ng akferg

(Gx. 38.1-7)

ÉXFNF 27

1 Tpkál qpdaiée se pbqpk ng dpngkp ng prprip ng rierf rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn, y ng rierf rfnfl ng pertskp; lgká rspnkpnf gb pbqpk, y ls pbqskp ng qkgl rfnfl. 2 Y bg tpkál rsgkefl ge lsl rspqkf gljsiepl; bfl rsgkefl lgkáe hpkqg ngb dildf; y bf rsakikál ng akferg. 3 Tpkál qpdaiée lsl rpbngkfl hpkp kgrfugk bp rgeizp, y lsl hpbgqpl, lsl qpzfegl, lsl upkcifl y lsl akplgkfl; tpkál qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl ng akferg. 4 Y bg tpkál se gekgmpnf ng akferg ng fakp ng kgmibbp, y lfakg bp kgmibbp tpkál rspqkf peibbfl ng akferg p lsl rspqkf gljsiepl. 5 Y bp hfenkál ngeqkf ngb rgkrf ngb pbqpk papmf; y bbgupká bp kgmibbp tplqp bp diqpn ngb pbqpk. 6 Tpkál qpdaiée vpkpl hpkp gb pbqpk, vpkpl ng dpngkp ng prprip, bpl rspbgl rsakikál ng akferg. 7 Y bpl vpkpl lg dgqgkáe hfk bfl peibbfl, y glqpkáe pjsgbbpl vpkpl p pdafl bpnfl ngb pbqpk rspenf lgp bbgvpnf. 8 Bf tpkál tsgrf, ng qpabpl; ng bp dpegkp jsg qg csg dflqkpnf ge gb dfeqg, plí bf tpkál. 

Gb pqkif ngb qpagkeársbf

(Gx. 38.9-20)

9 Plidildf tpkál gb pqkif ngb qpagkeársbf. Pb bpnf dgkinifepb, pb lsk, qgenká gb pqkif rfkqiepl ng bief qfkrinf, ng rige rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn hpkp se bpnf. 10 Lsl vgieqg rfbsdepl y lsl vgieqg aplpl lgkáe ng akferg; bfl rphiqgbgl ng bpl rfbsdepl y lsl dfbnskpl, ng hbpqp. 11 Ng bp dildp dpegkp pb bpnf ngb efkqg tpaká p bf bpkuf rfkqiepl ng rige rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn, y lsl vgieqg rfbsdepl rfe lsl vgieqg aplpl ng akferg; bfl rphiqgbgl ng lsl rfbsdepl y lsl dfbnskpl, ng hbpqp. 12 Gb pertf ngb pqkif, ngb bpnf frringeqpb, qgenká rfkqiepl ng riersgeqp rfnfl; lsl rfbsdepl nigz, rfe lsl nigz aplpl. 13 Y ge gb pertf ngb pqkif hfk gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg, pb glqg, tpaká riersgeqp rfnfl. 14 Bpl rfkqiepl p se bpnf ng bp geqkpnp lgkáe ng jsierg rfnfl; lsl rfbsdepl qkgl, rfe lsl qkgl aplpl. 15 Y pb fqkf bpnf, jsierg rfnfl ng rfkqiepl; lsl rfbsdepl qkgl, rfe lsl qkgl aplpl. 16 Y hpkp bp hsgkqp ngb pqkif tpaká sep rfkqiep ng vgieqg rfnfl, ng pzsb, húkhskp y rpkdglí, y bief qfkrinf, ng fakp ng kgrpdpnfk; lsl rfbsdepl rspqkf, rfe lsl rspqkf aplpl. 17 Qfnpl bpl rfbsdepl pbkgngnfk ngb pqkif glqpkáe rgñinpl ng hbpqp; lsl rphiqgbgl ng hbpqp, y lsl aplpl ng akferg. 18 Bp bfeuiqsn ngb pqkif lgká ng rige rfnfl, y bp pertskp riersgeqp hfk se bpnf y riersgeqp hfk gb fqkf, y bp pbqskp ng rierf rfnfl; lsl rfkqiepl ng bief qfkrinf, y lsl aplpl ng akferg. 19 Qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb qpagkeársbf ge qfnf ls lgkvirif, y qfnpl lsl glqprpl, y qfnpl bpl glqprpl ngb pqkif, lgkáe ng akferg. 

Prgiqg hpkp bpl bádhpkpl

(Bv. 24.1-4)

20 Y dpenpkál p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg qg qkpiupe prgiqg hskf ng fbivpl dprtprpnpl, hpkp gb pbsdakpnf, hpkp tprgk pkngk rfeqiespdgeqg bpl bádhpkpl. 21 Ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, pcsgkp ngb vgbf jsg glqá ngbpeqg ngb qglqidfeif, bpl hfenká ge fknge Ppkóe y lsl timfl hpkp jsg pknpe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá nglng bp qpkng tplqp bp dpñpep, rfdf glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hfk lsl ugegkprifegl. 

Bpl vglqinskpl ng bfl lprgknfqgl

(Gx. 39.1-31)

ÉXFNF 28

1 Tpkál bbgupk ngbpeqg ng qi p Ppkóe qs tgkdpef, y p lsl timfl rfeliuf, ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg lgpe dil lprgknfqgl; p Ppkóe y p Epnpa, Paiú, Gbgpzpk g Iqpdpk timfl ng Ppkóe. 2 Y tpkál vglqinskpl lpukpnpl p Ppkóe qs tgkdpef, hpkp tfekp y tgkdflskp. 3 Y qú tpabpkál p qfnfl bfl lpaifl ng rfkpzóe, p jsigegl yf tg bbgepnf ng glhíkiqs ng lpainskíp, hpkp jsg tpupe bpl vglqinskpl ng Ppkóe, hpkp rfelpukpkbg hpkp jsg lgp di lprgknfqg. 4 Bpl vglqinskpl jsg tpkáe lfe glqpl: gb hgrqfkpb, gb gcfn, gb dpeqf, bp qúeirp afknpnp, bp diqkp y gb rieqskóe. Tpupe, hsgl, bpl vglqinskpl lpukpnpl hpkp Ppkóe qs tgkdpef, y hpkp lsl timfl, hpkp jsg lgpe dil lprgknfqgl. 

5 Qfdpkáe fkf, pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf, 6 y tpkáe gb gcfn ng fkf, pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf, ng fakp hkidfkflp. 7 Qgenká nfl tfdakgkpl jsg lg mseqge p lsl nfl gxqkgdfl, y plí lg mseqpká. 8 Y ls rieqf ng fakp hkidfkflp jsg glqpká lfakg éb, lgká ng bp dildp fakp, hpkqg ngb dildf; ng fkf, pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf. 9 Y qfdpkál nfl hignkpl ng óeirg, y ukpapkál ge gbbpl bfl efdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; 10 lgil ng lsl efdakgl ge sep hignkp, y bfl fqkfl lgil efdakgl ge bp fqkp hignkp, rfecfkdg pb fknge ng epridigeqf ng gbbfl. 11 Ng fakp ng ukpapnfk ge hignkp, rfdf ukpapnskpl ng lgbbf, tpkál ukpapk bpl nfl hignkpl rfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; bgl tpkál pbkgngnfk geuplqgl ng fkf. 12 Y hfenkál bpl nfl hignkpl lfakg bpl tfdakgkpl ngb gcfn, hpkp hignkpl dgdfkipbgl p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y Ppkóe bbgvpká bfl efdakgl ng gbbfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá lfakg lsl nfl tfdakfl hfk dgdfkipb. 13 Tpkál, hsgl, bfl geuplqgl ng fkf, 14 y nfl rfknfegl ng fkf cief, bfl rspbgl tpkál ge cfkdp ng qkgezp; y cimpkál bfl rfknfegl ng cfkdp ng qkgezp ge bfl geuplqgl. 

15 Tpkál plidildf gb hgrqfkpb ngb msirif ng fakp hkidfkflp, bf tpkál rfecfkdg p bp fakp ngb gcfn, ng fkf, pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf. 16 Lgká rspnkpnf y nfabg, ng se hpbdf ng bpkuf y se hpbdf ng pertf; 17 y bf bbgepkál ng hgnkgkíp ge rspqkf tibgkpl ng hignkpl; sep tibgkp ng sep hignkp láknirp, se qfhprif y se rpkaserbf; 18 bp lgusenp tibgkp, sep gldgkpbnp, se zpcikf y se nipdpeqg; 19 bp qgkrgkp tibgkp, se mprieqf, sep áupqp y sep pdpqilqp; 20 bp rspkqp tibgkp, se agkibf, se óeirg y se mplhg. Qfnpl glqpkáe dfeqpnpl ge geuplqgl ng fkf. 21 Y bpl hignkpl lgkáe lguúe bfl efdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nfrg lguúe lsl efdakgl; rfdf ukpapnskpl ng lgbbf rpnp sep rfe ls efdakg, lgkáe lguúe bpl nfrg qkiasl. 22 Tpkál qpdaiée ge gb hgrqfkpb rfknfegl ng tgrtskp ng qkgezpl ng fkf cief. 23 Y tpkál ge gb hgrqfkpb nfl peibbfl ng fkf, bfl rspbgl hfenkál p bfl nfl gxqkgdfl ngb hgrqfkpb. 24 Y cimpkál bfl nfl rfknfegl ng fkf ge bfl nfl peibbfl p bfl nfl gxqkgdfl ngb hgrqfkpb; 25 y hfenkál bfl nfl gxqkgdfl ng bfl nfl rfknfegl lfakg bfl nfl geuplqgl, y bfl cimpkál p bpl tfdakgkpl ngb gcfn ge ls hpkqg ngbpeqgkp. 26 Tpkál qpdaiée nfl peibbfl ng fkf, bfl rspbgl hfenkál p bfl nfl gxqkgdfl ngb hgrqfkpb, ge ls fkibbp jsg glqá pb bpnf ngb gcfn tprip pngeqkf. 27 Tpkál plidildf bfl nfl peibbfl ng fkf, bfl rspbgl cimpkál ge bp hpkqg ngbpeqgkp ng bpl nfl tfdakgkpl ngb gcfn, tprip papmf, ngbpeqg ng ls mseqskp lfakg gb rieqf ngb gcfn. 28 Y mseqpkáe gb hgrqfkpb hfk lsl peibbfl p bfl nfl peibbfl ngb gcfn rfe se rfknóe ng pzsb, hpkp jsg glqé lfakg gb rieqf ngb gcfn, y ef lg lghpkg gb hgrqfkpb ngb gcfn. 29 Y bbgvpká Ppkóe bfl efdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge gb hgrqfkpb ngb msirif lfakg ls rfkpzóe, rspenf geqkg ge gb lpeqspkif, hfk dgdfkipb ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá rfeqiespdgeqg. 30 Y hfenkál ge gb hgrqfkpb ngb msirif Skid y Qsdid, hpkp jsg glqée lfakg gb rfkpzóe ng Ppkóe rspenf geqkg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; y bbgvpká ligdhkg Ppkóe gb msirif ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lfakg ls rfkpzóe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 

31 Tpkál gb dpeqf ngb gcfn qfnf ng pzsb; 32 y ge dgnif ng éb hfk pkkiap tpaká sep pagkqskp, bp rspb qgenká se afkng pbkgngnfk ng fakp qgminp, rfdf gb rsgbbf ng se rflgbgqg, hpkp jsg ef lg kfdhp. 33 Y ge lsl fkbpl tpkál ukpepnpl ng pzsb, húkhskp y rpkdglí pbkgngnfk, y geqkg gbbpl rpdhpeibbpl ng fkf pbkgngnfk. 34 Sep rpdhpeibbp ng fkf y sep ukpepnp, fqkp rpdhpeibbp ng fkf y fqkp ukpepnp, ge qfnp bp fkbp ngb dpeqf pbkgngnfk. 35 Y glqpká lfakg Ppkóe rspenf dieilqkg; y lg fiká ls lfeinf rspenf éb geqkg ge gb lpeqspkif ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá y rspenf lpbup, hpkp jsg ef dsgkp. 

36 Tpkál pngdál sep bádiep ng fkf cief, y ukpapkál ge gbbp rfdf ukpapnskp ng lgbbf, LPEQINPN P MGTFVÁ. 37 Y bp hfenkál rfe se rfknóe ng pzsb, y glqpká lfakg bp diqkp; hfk bp hpkqg ngbpeqgkp ng bp diqkp glqpká. 38 Y glqpká lfakg bp ckgeqg ng Ppkóe, y bbgvpká Ppkóe bpl cpbqpl rfdgqinpl ge qfnpl bpl rflpl lpeqpl, jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tsaigkge rfelpukpnf ge qfnpl lsl lpeqpl fckgenpl; y lfakg ls ckgeqg glqpká rfeqiespdgeqg, hpkp jsg faqgeupe ukprip ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 

39 Y afknpkál sep qúeirp ng bief, y tpkál sep diqkp ng bief; tpkál qpdaiée se rieqf ng fakp ng kgrpdpnfk. 

40 Y hpkp bfl timfl ng Ppkóe tpkál qúeirpl; qpdaiée bgl tpkál rieqfl, y bgl tpkál qipkpl hpkp tfekp y tgkdflskp. 41 Y rfe gbbfl vglqikál p Ppkóe qs tgkdpef, y p lsl timfl rfe éb; y bfl seuikál, y bfl rfelpukpkál y lpeqicirpkál, hpkp jsg lgpe dil lprgknfqgl. 42 Y bgl tpkál rpbzferibbfl ng bief hpkp rsakik ls nglesngz; lgkáe nglng bfl bfdfl tplqp bfl dslbfl. 43 Y glqpkáe lfakg Ppkóe y lfakg lsl timfl rspenf geqkge ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, f rspenf lg prgkjsge pb pbqpk hpkp lgkvik ge gb lpeqspkif, hpkp jsg ef bbgvge hgrpnf y dsgkpe. Gl glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf hpkp éb, y hpkp ls nglrgengerip nglhsél ng éb. 

Rfelpukprióe ng Ppkóe y ng lsl timfl

(Bv. 8.1-36)

ÉXFNF 29

1 Glqf gl bf jsg bgl tpkál hpkp rfelpukpkbfl, hpkp jsg lgpe dil lprgknfqgl: Qfdp se agrgkkf ng bp vprpnp, y nfl rpkegkfl lie ngcgrqf; 2 y hpegl lie bgvpnskp, y qfkqpl lie bgvpnskp pdplpnpl rfe prgiqg, y tfmpbnkgl lie bgvpnskp seqpnpl rfe prgiqg; bpl tpkál ng cbfk ng tpkiep ng qkiuf. 3 Y bpl hfenkál ge se rpeplqibbf, y ge gb rpeplqibbf bpl fckgrgkál, rfe gb agrgkkf y bfl nfl rpkegkfl. 4 Y bbgvpkál p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y bfl bpvpkál rfe pusp. 5 Y qfdpkál bpl vglqinskpl, y vglqikál p Ppkóe bp qúeirp, gb dpeqf ngb gcfn, gb gcfn y gb hgrqfkpb, y bg rgñikál rfe gb rieqf ngb gcfn; 6 y hfenkál bp diqkp lfakg ls rpagzp, y lfakg bp diqkp hfenkál bp nipngdp lpeqp. 7 Bsguf qfdpkál gb prgiqg ng bp serióe, y bf ngkkpdpkál lfakg ls rpagzp, y bg seuikál. 8 Y tpkál jsg lg prgkjsge lsl timfl, y bgl vglqikál bpl qúeirpl. 9 Bgl rgñikál gb rieqf p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, y bgl pqpkál bpl qipkpl, y qgenkáe gb lprgknfrif hfk ngkgrtf hgkhgqsf. Plí rfelpukpkál p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl. 

10 Nglhsél bbgvpkál gb agrgkkf ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y Ppkóe y lsl timfl hfenkáe lsl dpefl lfakg bp rpagzp ngb agrgkkf. 11 Y dpqpkál gb agrgkkf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 12 Y ng bp lpeukg ngb agrgkkf qfdpkál y hfenkál lfakg bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk rfe qs ngnf, y ngkkpdpkál qfnp bp ngdál lpeukg pb hig ngb pbqpk. 13 Qfdpkál qpdaiée qfnp bp ukflskp jsg rsakg bfl ieqglqiefl, bp ukflskp ng lfakg gb tíupnf, bfl nfl kiñfegl, y bp ukflskp jsg glqá lfakg gbbfl, y bf jsgdpkál lfakg gb pbqpk. 14 Hgkf bp rpkeg ngb agrgkkf, y ls higb y ls glqiékrfb, bfl jsgdpkál p csguf csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf; gl fckgenp hfk gb hgrpnf. 

15 Plidildf qfdpkál sef ng bfl rpkegkfl, y Ppkóe y lsl timfl hfenkáe lsl dpefl lfakg bp rpagzp ngb rpkegkf. 16 Y dpqpkál gb rpkegkf, y rfe ls lpeukg kfripkál lfakg gb pbqpk pbkgngnfk. 17 Rfkqpkál gb rpkegkf ge hgnpzfl, y bpvpkál lsl ieqglqiefl y lsl higkepl, y bpl hfenkál lfakg lsl qkfzfl y lfakg ls rpagzp. 18 Y jsgdpkál qfnf gb rpkegkf lfakg gb pbqpk; gl tfbfrpslqf ng fbfk ukpqf hpkp Mgtfvá, gl fckgenp jsgdpnp p Mgtfvá. 

19 Qfdpkál bsguf gb fqkf rpkegkf, y Ppkóe y lsl timfl hfenkáe lsl dpefl lfakg bp rpagzp ngb rpkegkf. 20 Y dpqpkál gb rpkegkf, y qfdpkál ng ls lpeukg y bp hfenkál lfakg gb bóasbf ng bp fkgmp ngkgrtp ng Ppkóe, lfakg gb bóasbf ng bp fkgmp ng lsl timfl, lfakg gb ngnf hsbupk ng bpl dpefl ngkgrtpl ng gbbfl, y lfakg gb ngnf hsbupk ng bfl higl ngkgrtfl ng gbbfl, y kfripkál bp lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk pbkgngnfk. 21 Y rfe bp lpeukg jsg glqpká lfakg gb pbqpk, y gb prgiqg ng bp serióe, kfripkál lfakg Ppkóe, lfakg lsl vglqinskpl, lfakg lsl timfl, y lfakg bpl vglqinskpl ng élqfl; y éb lgká lpeqicirpnf, y lsl vglqinskpl, y lsl timfl, y bpl vglqinskpl ng lsl timfl rfe éb. 

22 Bsguf qfdpkál ngb rpkegkf bp ukflskp, y bp rfbp, y bp ukflskp jsg rsakg bfl ieqglqiefl, y bp ukflskp ngb tíupnf, y bfl nfl kiñfegl, y bp ukflskp jsg glqá lfakg gbbfl, y bp glhpbnibbp ngkgrtp; hfkjsg gl rpkegkf ng rfelpukprióe. 23 Qpdaiée sep qfkqp ukpeng ng hpe, y sep qfkqp ng hpe ng prgiqg, y sep tfmpbnkg ngb rpeplqibbf ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp hkglgeqpnf p Mgtfvá, 24 y bf hfenkál qfnf ge bpl dpefl ng Ppkóe, y ge bpl dpefl ng lsl timfl; y bf dgrgkál rfdf fckgenp dgrinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 25 Nglhsél bf qfdpkál ng lsl dpefl y bf tpkál pkngk ge gb pbqpk, lfakg gb tfbfrpslqf, hfk fbfk ukpqf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. Gl fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá. 

26 Y qfdpkál gb hgrtf ngb rpkegkf ng bpl rfelpukprifegl, jsg gl ng Ppkóe, y bf dgrgkál hfk fckgenp dgrinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; y lgká hfkrióe qsyp. 27 Y phpkqpkál gb hgrtf ng bp fckgenp dgrinp, y bp glhpbnibbp ng bp fckgenp gbgvpnp, bf jsg csg dgrinf y bf jsg csg gbgvpnf ngb rpkegkf ng bpl rfelpukprifegl ng Ppkóe y ng lsl timfl, 28 y lgká hpkp Ppkóe y hpkp lsl timfl rfdf glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hfkjsg gl fckgenp gbgvpnp; y lgká sep fckgenp gbgvpnp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ng lsl lprkicirifl ng hpz, hfkrióe ng gbbfl gbgvpnp ge fckgenp p Mgtfvá. 

29 Y bpl vglqinskpl lpeqpl, jsg lfe ng Ppkóe, lgkáe ng lsl timfl nglhsél ng éb, hpkp lgk seuinfl ge gbbpl, y hpkp lgk ge gbbpl rfelpukpnfl. 30 Hfk ligqg nípl bpl vglqiká gb jsg ng lsl timfl qfdg ls bsupk rfdf lprgknfqg, rspenf vgeup pb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe hpkp lgkvik ge gb lpeqspkif. 

31 Y qfdpkál gb rpkegkf ng bpl rfelpukprifegl, y rfrgkál ls rpkeg ge bsupk lpeqf. 32 Y Ppkóe y lsl timfl rfdgkáe bp rpkeg ngb rpkegkf, y gb hpe jsg glqpká ge gb rpeplqibbf, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 33 Y rfdgkáe pjsgbbpl rflpl rfe bpl rspbgl lg tizf gxhiprióe, hpkp bbgepk lsl dpefl hpkp rfelpukpkbfl; dpl gb gxqkpñf ef bpl rfdgká, hfkjsg lfe lpeqpl. 34 Y li lfakpkg tplqp bp dpñpep pbuf ng bp rpkeg ng bpl rfelpukprifegl y ngb hpe, jsgdpkál pb csguf bf jsg tsaigkg lfakpnf; ef lg rfdgká, hfkjsg gl rflp lpeqp. 

35 Plí, hsgl, tpkál p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg yf qg tg dpenpnf; hfk ligqg nípl bfl rfelpukpkál. 36 Rpnp níp fckgrgkál gb agrgkkf ngb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf, hpkp bpl gxhiprifegl; y hskicirpkál gb pbqpk rspenf tpupl gxhiprióe hfk éb, y bf seuikál hpkp lpeqicirpkbf. 37 Hfk ligqg nípl tpkál gxhiprióe hfk gb pbqpk, y bf lpeqicirpkál, y lgká se pbqpk lpeqílidf: rspbjsigkp rflp jsg qfrpkg gb pbqpk, lgká lpeqicirpnp. 

Bpl fckgenpl nipkipl

(Ed. 28.1-8)

38 Glqf gl bf jsg fckgrgkál lfakg gb pbqpk: nfl rfkngkfl ng se pñf rpnp níp, rfeqiespdgeqg. 39 Fckgrgkál sef ng bfl rfkngkfl hfk bp dpñpep, y gb fqkf rfkngkf fckgrgkál p bp rpínp ng bp qpkng. 40 Pngdál, rfe rpnp rfkngkf sep néridp hpkqg ng se gcp ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe bp rspkqp hpkqg ng se tie ng prgiqg ng fbivpl dprtprpnpl; y hpkp bp biaprióe, bp rspkqp hpkqg ng se tie ng vief. 41 Y fckgrgkál gb fqkf rfkngkf p bp rpínp ng bp qpkng, tprigenf rfecfkdg p bp fckgenp ng bp dpñpep, y rfecfkdg p ls biaprióe, ge fbfk ukpqf; fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá. 42 Glqf lgká gb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, ge gb rspb dg kgseiké rfe vflfqkfl, hpkp tpabpkfl pbbí. 43 Pbbí dg kgseiké rfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y gb bsupk lgká lpeqicirpnf rfe di ubfkip. 44 Y lpeqicirpké gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe y gb pbqpk; lpeqicirpké plidildf p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, hpkp jsg lgpe dil lprgknfqgl. 45 Y tpaiqpké geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y lgké ls Nifl. 46 Y rfefrgkáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá ls Nifl, jsg bfl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, hpkp tpaiqpk ge dgnif ng gbbfl. Yf Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 

Gb pbqpk ngb ierigelf

(Gx. 37.25-28)

ÉXFNF 30

1 Tpkál plidildf se pbqpk hpkp jsgdpk gb ierigelf; ng dpngkp ng prprip bf tpkál. 2 Ls bfeuiqsn lgká ng se rfnf, y ls pertskp ng se rfnf; lgká rspnkpnf, y ls pbqskp ng nfl rfnfl; y lsl rsgkefl lgkáe hpkqg ngb dildf. 3 Y bf rsakikál ng fkf hskf, ls rsaigkqp, lsl hpkgngl ge ngkkgnfk y lsl rsgkefl; y bg tpkál ge ngkkgnfk sep rfkeilp ng fkf. 4 Bg tpkál qpdaiée nfl peibbfl ng fkf ngapmf ng ls rfkeilp, p lsl nfl gljsiepl p pdafl bpnfl lsyfl, hpkp dgqgk bpl vpkpl rfe jsg lgká bbgvpnf. 5 Tpkál bpl vpkpl ng dpngkp ng prprip, y bpl rsakikál ng fkf. 6 Y bf hfenkál ngbpeqg ngb vgbf jsg glqá mseqf pb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif, ngbpeqg ngb hkfhiripqfkif jsg glqá lfakg gb qglqidfeif, nfeng dg gerfeqkpké rfeqiuf. 7 Y Ppkóe jsgdpká ierigelf pkfdáqirf lfakg éb; rpnp dpñpep rspenf pbilqg bpl bádhpkpl bf jsgdpká. 8 Y rspenf Ppkóe gerigenp bpl bádhpkpl pb pefrtgrgk, jsgdpká gb ierigelf; kiqf hgkhgqsf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl. 9 Ef fckgrgkéil lfakg éb ierigelf gxqkpñf, ei tfbfrpslqf, ei fckgenp; ei qpdhfrf ngkkpdpkéil lfakg éb biaprióe. 10 Y lfakg lsl rsgkefl tpká Ppkóe gxhiprióe sep vgz ge gb pñf rfe bp lpeukg ngb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf hpkp gxhiprióe; sep vgz ge gb pñf tpká gxhiprióe lfakg éb hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl; lgká dsy lpeqf p Mgtfvá. 

Gb niegkf ngb kglrpqg

11 Tpabó qpdaiée Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 12 Rspenf qfdgl gb eúdgkf ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng gbbfl, rpnp sef npká p Mgtfvá gb kglrpqg ng ls hgklfep, rspenf bfl rsgeqgl, hpkp jsg ef tpyp ge gbbfl dfkqpenpn rspenf bfl tpypl rfeqpnf. 13 Glqf npká qfnf pjsgb jsg lgp rfeqpnf; dgnif lirbf, rfecfkdg pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif. Gb lirbf gl ng vgieqg ugkpl. Bp diqpn ng se lirbf lgká bp fckgenp p Mgtfvá. 14 Qfnf gb jsg lgp rfeqpnf, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, npká bp fckgenp p Mgtfvá. 15 Ei gb kirf psdgeqpká, ei gb hfakg nildiesiká ngb dgnif lirbf, rspenf nigkge bp fckgenp p Mgtfvá hpkp tprgk gxhiprióe hfk vsglqkpl hgklfepl. 16 Y qfdpkál ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb gb niegkf ng bpl gxhiprifegl, y bf npkál hpkp gb lgkvirif ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; y lgká hfk dgdfkipb p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, hpkp tprgk gxhiprióe hfk vsglqkpl hgklfepl. 

17 Tpabó dál Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 18 Tpkál qpdaiée sep csgeqg ng akferg, rfe ls aplg ng akferg, hpkp bpvpk; y bp rfbfrpkál geqkg gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe y gb pbqpk, y hfenkál ge gbbp pusp. 19 Y ng gbbp lg bpvpkáe Ppkóe y lsl timfl bpl dpefl y bfl higl. 20 Rspenf geqkge ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, lg bpvpkáe rfe pusp, hpkp jsg ef dsgkpe; y rspenf lg prgkjsge pb pbqpk hpkp dieilqkpk, hpkp jsgdpk bp fckgenp gergeninp hpkp Mgtfvá, 21 lg bpvpkáe bpl dpefl y bfl higl, hpkp jsg ef dsgkpe. Y bf qgenkáe hfk glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf éb y ls nglrgengerip hfk lsl ugegkprifegl. 

Gb prgiqg ng bp serióe, y gb ierigelf

22 Tpabó dál Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 23 Qfdpkál glhgripl ciepl: ng dikkp gxrgbgeqg jsieigeqfl lirbfl, y ng rpegbp pkfdáqirp bp diqpn, glqf gl, nflrigeqfl riersgeqp, ng rábpdf pkfdáqirf nflrigeqfl riersgeqp, 24 ng rplip jsieigeqfl, lguúe gb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, y ng prgiqg ng fbivpl se tie. 25 Y tpkál ng gbbf gb prgiqg ng bp lpeqp serióe; lshgkifk seuügeqf, lguúe gb pkqg ngb hgkcsdpnfk, lgká gb prgiqg ng bp serióe lpeqp. 26 Rfe éb seuikál gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif, 27 bp dglp rfe qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, gb rpengbgkf rfe qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, gb pbqpk ngb ierigelf, 28 gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf rfe qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, y bp csgeqg y ls aplg. 29 Plí bfl rfelpukpkál, y lgkáe rflpl lpeqílidpl; qfnf bf jsg qfrpkg ge gbbfl, lgká lpeqicirpnf. 30 Seuikál qpdaiée p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, y bfl rfelpukpkál hpkp jsg lgpe dil lprgknfqgl. 31 Y tpabpkál p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Glqg lgká di prgiqg ng bp lpeqp serióe hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl. 32 Lfakg rpkeg ng tfdakg ef lgká ngkkpdpnf, ei tpkéil fqkf lgdgmpeqg, rfecfkdg p ls rfdhflirióe; lpeqf gl, y hfk lpeqf bf qgenkéil vflfqkfl. 33 Rspbjsigkp jsg rfdhsligkg seuügeqf lgdgmpeqg, y jsg hsligkg ng éb lfakg gxqkpñf, lgká rfkqpnf ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 

34 Nimf pngdál Mgtfvá p Dfilél: Qfdp glhgripl pkfdáqirpl, glqprqg y sñp pkfdáqirp y uábapef pkfdáqirf g ierigelf hskf; ng qfnf ge iuspb hglf, 35 y tpkál ng gbbf gb ierigelf, se hgkcsdg lguúe gb pkqg ngb hgkcsdpnfk, aige dgzrbpnf, hskf y lpeqf. 36 Y dfbgkál hpkqg ng éb ge hfbvf cief, y bf hfenkál ngbpeqg ngb qglqidfeif ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, nfeng yf dg dflqkpké p qi. Fl lgká rflp lpeqílidp. 37 Rfdf glqg ierigelf jsg tpkál, ef fl tpkéil fqkf lguúe ls rfdhflirióe; qg lgká rflp lpukpnp hpkp Mgtfvá. 38 Rspbjsigkp jsg tirigkg fqkf rfdf glqg hpkp fbgkbf, lgká rfkqpnf ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 

Bbpdpdigeqf ng Agzpbggb y ng Ptfbipa

(Gx. 35.3036.1)

ÉXFNF 31

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Dikp, yf tg bbpdpnf hfk efdakg p Agzpbggb timf ng Ski, timf ng Tsk, ng bp qkias ng Msná; 3 y bf tg bbgepnf ngb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl, ge lpainskíp y ge ieqgbiugerip, ge rigerip y ge qfnf pkqg, 4 hpkp ievgeqpk nilgñfl, hpkp qkpapmpk ge fkf, ge hbpqp y ge akferg, 5 y ge pkqicirif ng hignkpl hpkp geuplqpkbpl, y ge pkqicirif ng dpngkp; hpkp qkpapmpk ge qfnp rbplg ng bpafk. 6 Y tg pjsí jsg yf tg hsglqf rfe éb p Ptfbipa timf ng Ptilpdpr, ng bp qkias ng Npe; y tg hsglqf lpainskíp ge gb áeidf ng qfnf lpaif ng rfkpzóe, hpkp jsg tpupe qfnf bf jsg qg tg dpenpnf; 7 gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif, gb hkfhiripqfkif jsg glqá lfakg gbbp, y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb qpagkeársbf, 8 bp dglp y lsl sqgelibifl, gb rpengbgkf bidhif y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, gb pbqpk ngb ierigelf, 9 gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, bp csgeqg y ls aplg, 10 bfl vglqinfl ngb lgkvirif, bpl vglqinskpl lpeqpl hpkp Ppkóe gb lprgknfqg, bpl vglqinskpl ng lsl timfl hpkp jsg gmgkzpe gb lprgknfrif, 11 gb prgiqg ng bp serióe, y gb ierigelf pkfdáqirf hpkp gb lpeqspkif; tpkáe rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg qg tg dpenpnf. 

Gb níp ng kghflf rfdf lgñpb

12 Tpabó pngdál Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 13 Qú tpabpkál p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Ge vgknpn vflfqkfl uspknpkéil dil nípl ng kghflf; hfkjsg gl lgñpb geqkg dí y vflfqkfl hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl, hpkp jsg lgháil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá jsg fl lpeqicirf. 14 Plí jsg uspknpkéil gb níp ng kghflf, hfkjsg lpeqf gl p vflfqkfl; gb jsg bf hkfcpepkg, ng rigkqf dfkiká; hfkjsg rspbjsigkp jsg tirigkg fakp pbusep ge éb, pjsgbbp hgklfep lgká rfkqpnp ng ge dgnif ng ls hsgabf. 15 Lgil nípl lg qkpapmpká, dpl gb níp léhqidf gl níp ng kghflf rfelpukpnf p Mgtfvá; rspbjsigkp jsg qkpapmg ge gb níp ng kghflf, rigkqpdgeqg dfkiká. 16 Uspknpkáe, hsgl, gb níp ng kghflf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rgbgakáenfbf hfk lsl ugegkprifegl hfk hprqf hgkhgqsf. 17 Lgñpb gl hpkp ligdhkg geqkg dí y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; hfkjsg ge lgil nípl tizf Mgtfvá bfl rigbfl y bp qigkkp, y ge gb léhqidf níp rgló y kghfló. 

Gb agrgkkf ng fkf

(Nq. 9.6-29)

18 Y nif p Dfilél, rspenf prpaó ng tpabpk rfe éb ge gb dfeqg ng Liepí, nfl qpabpl ngb qglqidfeif, qpabpl ng hignkp glrkiqpl rfe gb ngnf ng Nifl. 

ÉXFNF 32

1 Vigenf gb hsgabf jsg Dfilél qpknpap ge nglrgengk ngb dfeqg, lg prgkrpkfe geqfergl p Ppkóe, y bg nimgkfe: Bgváeqpqg, tpzefl niflgl jsg vpype ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl; hfkjsg p glqg Dfilél, gb vpkóe jsg efl lpró ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ef lpagdfl jsé bg tpyp prfeqgrinf. 2 Y Ppkóe bgl nimf: Phpkqpn bfl zpkribbfl ng fkf jsg glqáe ge bpl fkgmpl ng vsglqkpl dsmgkgl, ng vsglqkfl timfl y ng vsglqkpl timpl, y qkpéndgbfl. 3 Geqfergl qfnf gb hsgabf phpkqó bfl zpkribbfl ng fkf jsg qgeípe ge lsl fkgmpl, y bfl qkpmgkfe p Ppkóe; 4 y éb bfl qfdó ng bpl dpefl ng gbbfl, y bg nif cfkdp rfe askib, g tizf ng gbbf se agrgkkf ng csenirióe. Geqfergl nimgkfe: Ilkpgb, glqfl lfe qsl niflgl, jsg qg lprpkfe ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 5 Y vigenf glqf Ppkóe, gniciró se pbqpk ngbpeqg ngb agrgkkf; y hkgufeó Ppkóe, y nimf: Dpñpep lgká ciglqp hpkp Mgtfvá. 6 Y pb níp liusigeqg dpnksupkfe, y fckgrigkfe tfbfrpslqfl, y hkglgeqpkfe fckgenpl ng hpz; y lg lgeqó gb hsgabf p rfdgk y p agagk, y lg bgvpeqó p kgufrimpklg. 

7 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Penp, nglrigeng, hfkjsg qs hsgabf jsg lprplqg ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf lg tp rfkkfdhinf. 8 Hkfeqf lg tpe phpkqpnf ngb rpdief jsg yf bgl dpené; lg tpe tgrtf se agrgkkf ng csenirióe, y bf tpe pnfkpnf, y bg tpe fckgrinf lprkicirifl, y tpe nirtf: Ilkpgb, glqfl lfe qsl niflgl, jsg qg lprpkfe ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 9 Nimf dál Mgtfvá p Dfilél: Yf tg vilqf p glqg hsgabf, jsg hfk rigkqf gl hsgabf ng nskp rgkviz. 10 Ptfkp, hsgl, némpdg jsg lg gerigenp di ikp ge gbbfl, y bfl rfelsdp; y ng qi yf tpké sep eprióe ukpeng. 

11 Geqfergl Dfilél fkó ge hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl, y nimf: Ft Mgtfvá, ¿hfk jsé lg gergengká qs cskfk rfeqkp qs hsgabf, jsg qú lprplqg ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf rfe ukpe hfngk y rfe dpef csgkqg? 12 ¿Hfk jsé tpe ng tpabpk bfl guihrifl, nirigenf: Hpkp dpb bfl lpró, hpkp dpqpkbfl ge bfl dfeqgl, y hpkp kpgkbfl ng lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp? Vsébvgqg ngb pknfk ng qs ikp, y pkkghiéeqgqg ng glqg dpb rfeqkp qs hsgabf. 13 Prséknpqg ng Pakptpd, ng Ilppr y ng Ilkpgb qsl ligkvfl, p bfl rspbgl tpl mskpnf hfk qi dildf, y bgl tpl nirtf: Yf dsbqihbirpké vsglqkp nglrgengerip rfdf bpl glqkgbbpl ngb rigbf; y npké p vsglqkp nglrgengerip qfnp glqp qigkkp ng jsg tg tpabpnf, y bp qfdpkáe hfk tgkgnpn hpkp ligdhkg. 14 Geqfergl Mgtfvá lg pkkghieqió ngb dpb jsg nimf jsg tpaíp ng tprgk p ls hsgabf.
