15 Y vfbvió Dfilél y nglrgenió ngb dfeqg, qkpygenf ge ls dpef bpl nfl qpabpl ngb qglqidfeif, bpl qpabpl glrkiqpl hfk pdafl bpnfl; ng sef y fqkf bpnf glqpape glrkiqpl. 16 Y bpl qpabpl gkpe fakp ng Nifl, y bp glrkiqskp gkp glrkiqskp ng Nifl ukpapnp lfakg bpl qpabpl. 17 Rspenf fyó Mflsé gb rbpdfk ngb hsgabf jsg ukiqpap, nimf p Dfilél: Pbpkinf ng hgbgp tpy ge gb rpdhpdgeqf. 18 Y éb kglhfenió: Ef gl vfz ng pbpkinfl ng csgkqgl, ei vfz ng pbpkinfl ng néaibgl; vfz ng rpeqpk fiuf yf. 19 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf éb bbguó pb rpdhpdgeqf, y vif gb agrgkkf y bpl npezpl, pknió bp ikp ng Dfilél, y pkkfmó bpl qpabpl ng lsl dpefl, y bpl jsgakó pb hig ngb dfeqg. 20 Y qfdó gb agrgkkf jsg tpaípe tgrtf, y bf jsgdó ge gb csguf, y bf dfbió tplqp kgnsrikbf p hfbvf, jsg glhpkrió lfakg bpl puspl, y bf nif p agagk p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

21 Y nimf Dfilél p Ppkóe: ¿Jsé qg tp tgrtf glqg hsgabf, jsg tpl qkpínf lfakg éb qpe ukpe hgrpnf? 22 Y kglhfenió Ppkóe: Ef lg gefmg di lgñfk; qú rfefrgl pb hsgabf, jsg gl ierbiepnf p dpb. 23 Hfkjsg dg nimgkfe: Tpzefl niflgl jsg vpype ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl; hfkjsg p glqg Dfilél, gb vpkóe jsg efl lpró ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ef lpagdfl jsé bg tpyp prfeqgrinf. 24 Y yf bgl kglhfení: ¿Jsiée qigeg fkf? Phpkqpnbf. Y dg bf nigkfe, y bf grté ge gb csguf, y lpbió glqg agrgkkf. 

25 Y vigenf Dfilél jsg gb hsgabf glqpap nglgeckgepnf, hfkjsg Ppkóe bf tpaíp hgkdiqinf, hpkp vgkuügezp geqkg lsl gegdiufl, 26 lg hslf Dfilél p bp hsgkqp ngb rpdhpdgeqf, y nimf: ¿Jsiée glqá hfk Mgtfvá? Múeqglg rfediuf. Y lg mseqpkfe rfe éb qfnfl bfl timfl ng Bgví. 27 Y éb bgl nimf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá, gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Hfegn rpnp sef ls glhpnp lfakg ls dslbf; hplpn y vfbvgn ng hsgkqp p hsgkqp hfk gb rpdhpdgeqf, y dpqpn rpnp sef p ls tgkdpef, y p ls pdiuf, y p ls hpkigeqg. 28 Y bfl timfl ng Bgví bf tirigkfe rfecfkdg pb nirtf ng Dfilél; y rpygkfe ngb hsgabf ge pjsgb níp rfdf qkgl dib tfdakgl. 29 Geqfergl Dfilél nimf: Tfy fl tpaéil rfelpukpnf p Mgtfvá, hsgl rpnp sef lg tp rfelpukpnf ge ls timf y ge ls tgkdpef, hpkp jsg éb né agenirióe tfy lfakg vflfqkfl. 

30 Y prfeqgrió jsg pb níp liusigeqg nimf Dfilél pb hsgabf: Vflfqkfl tpaéil rfdgqinf se ukpe hgrpnf, hgkf yf lsaiké ptfkp p Mgtfvá; jsizá bg phbprpké prgkrp ng vsglqkf hgrpnf. 31 Geqfergl vfbvió Dfilél p Mgtfvá, y nimf: Qg ksguf, hsgl glqg hsgabf tp rfdgqinf se ukpe hgrpnf, hfkjsg lg tirigkfe niflgl ng fkf, 32 jsg hgknfegl ptfkp ls hgrpnf, y li ef, kágdg ptfkp ng qs biakf jsg tpl glrkiqf. 33 Y Mgtfvá kglhfenió p Dfilél: Pb jsg hgrpkg rfeqkp dí, p élqg kpgké yf ng di biakf. 34 Vg, hsgl, ptfkp, bbgvp p glqg hsgabf p nfeng qg tg nirtf; tg pjsí di áeugb iká ngbpeqg ng qi; hgkf ge gb níp ngb rplqiuf, yf rplqiupké ge gbbfl ls hgrpnf. 

35 Y Mgtfvá tikió pb hsgabf, hfkjsg tpaípe tgrtf gb agrgkkf jsg cfkdó Ppkóe. 

Bp hkglgerip ng Nifl hkfdgqinp

ÉXFNF 33

1 Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Penp, lsag ng pjsí, qú y gb hsgabf jsg lprplqg ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, p bp qigkkp ng bp rspb mské p Pakptpd, Ilppr y Mprfa, nirigenf: P qs nglrgengerip bp npké; 2 y yf gevipké ngbpeqg ng qi gb áeugb, y grtpké csgkp pb rpepegf y pb pdfkkgf, pb tgqgf, pb cgkgzgf, pb tgvgf y pb mgaslgf 3 (p bp qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb); hgkf yf ef lsaiké ge dgnif ng qi, hfkjsg gkgl hsgabf ng nskp rgkviz, ef lgp jsg qg rfelsdp ge gb rpdief. 

4 Y fygenf gb hsgabf glqp dpbp efqirip, vilqigkfe bsqf, y eieusef lg hslf lsl pqpvífl. 5 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá tpaíp nirtf p Dfilél: Ni p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Vflfqkfl lfil hsgabf ng nskp rgkviz; ge se dfdgeqf lsaiké ge dgnif ng qi, y qg rfelsdiké. Jsíqpqg, hsgl, ptfkp qsl pqpvífl, hpkp jsg yf lghp bf jsg qg tg ng tprgk. 6 Geqfergl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lg nglhfmpkfe ng lsl pqpvífl nglng gb dfeqg Tfkga. 

7 Y Dfilél qfdó gb qpagkeársbf, y bf bgvpeqó bgmfl, csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf, y bf bbpdó gb Qpagkeársbf ng Kgseióe. Y rspbjsigkp jsg aslrpap p Mgtfvá, lpbíp pb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe jsg glqpap csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 8 Y lsrgníp jsg rspenf lpbíp Dfilél pb qpagkeársbf, qfnf gb hsgabf lg bgvpeqpap, y rpnp rspb glqpap ge hig p bp hsgkqp ng ls qigenp, y dikpape ge hfl ng Dfilél, tplqp jsg éb geqkpap ge gb qpagkeársbf. 9 Rspenf Dfilél geqkpap ge gb qpagkeársbf, bp rfbsdep ng esag nglrgeníp y lg hfeíp p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf, y Mgtfvá tpabpap rfe Dfilél. 10 Y vigenf qfnf gb hsgabf bp rfbsdep ng esag jsg glqpap p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf, lg bgvpeqpap rpnp sef p bp hsgkqp ng ls qigenp y pnfkpap. 11 Y tpabpap Mgtfvá p Dfilél rpkp p rpkp, rfdf tpabp rspbjsigkp p ls rfdhpñgkf. Y éb vfbvíp pb rpdhpdgeqf; hgkf gb mfvge Mflsé timf ng Ese, ls lgkvinfk, eserp lg phpkqpap ng ge dgnif ngb qpagkeársbf. 

12 Y nimf Dfilél p Mgtfvá: Dikp, qú dg nirgl p dí: Lprp glqg hsgabf; y qú ef dg tpl ngrbpkpnf p jsiée gevipkál rfediuf. Lie gdapkuf, qú nirgl: Yf qg tg rfefrinf hfk qs efdakg, y tpl tpbbpnf qpdaiée ukprip ge dil fmfl. 13 Ptfkp, hsgl, li tg tpbbpnf ukprip ge qsl fmfl, qg ksguf jsg dg dsglqkgl ptfkp qs rpdief, hpkp jsg qg rfefzrp, y tpbbg ukprip ge qsl fmfl; y dikp jsg glqp ugeqg gl hsgabf qsyf. 14 Y éb nimf: Di hkglgerip iká rfeqiuf, y qg npké nglrpelf. 15 Y Dfilél kglhfenió: Li qs hkglgerip ef tp ng ik rfediuf, ef efl lpjsgl ng pjsí. 16 ¿Y ge jsé lg rfefrgká pjsí jsg tg tpbbpnf ukprip ge qsl fmfl, yf y qs hsgabf, lief ge jsg qú pengl rfe eflfqkfl, y jsg yf y qs hsgabf lgpdfl phpkqpnfl ng qfnfl bfl hsgabfl jsg glqáe lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp? 

17 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Qpdaiée tpké glqf jsg tpl nirtf, hfk rspeqf tpl tpbbpnf ukprip ge dil fmfl, y qg tg rfefrinf hfk qs efdakg. 18 Gb geqfergl nimf: Qg ksguf jsg dg dsglqkgl qs ubfkip. 19 Y bg kglhfenió: Yf tpké hplpk qfnf di aige ngbpeqg ng qs kflqkf, y hkfrbpdpké gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá ngbpeqg ng qi; y qgenké dilgkirfknip ngb jsg qgenké dilgkirfknip, y lgké rbgdgeqg hpkp rfe gb jsg lgké rbgdgeqg. 20 Nimf dál: Ef hfnkál vgk di kflqkf; hfkjsg ef dg vgká tfdakg, y viviká. 21 Y nimf púe Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí se bsupk mseqf p dí, y qú glqpkál lfakg bp hgñp; 22 y rspenf hplg di ubfkip, yf qg hfenké ge sep tgeninskp ng bp hgñp, y qg rsakiké rfe di dpef tplqp jsg tpyp hplpnf. 23 Nglhsél phpkqpké di dpef, y vgkál dil glhpbnpl; dpl ef lg vgká di kflqkf. 

Gb hprqf kgefvpnf

(Nq. 10.1-5)

ÉXFNF 34

1 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Pbílpqg nfl qpabpl ng hignkp rfdf bpl hkidgkpl, y glrkiaiké lfakg glpl qpabpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg glqpape ge bpl qpabpl hkidgkpl jsg jsgakplqg. 2 Hkghákpqg, hsgl, hpkp dpñpep, y lsag ng dpñpep pb dfeqg ng Liepí, y hkgléeqpqg peqg dí lfakg bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg. 3 Y ef lsap tfdakg rfeqiuf, ei hpkgzrp pbusef ge qfnf gb dfeqg; ei fvgmpl ei asgygl hpzrpe ngbpeqg ngb dfeqg. 4 Y Dfilél pbiló nfl qpabpl ng hignkp rfdf bpl hkidgkpl; y lg bgvpeqó ng dpñpep y lsaió pb dfeqg Liepí, rfdf bg dpenó Mgtfvá, y bbgvó ge ls dpef bpl nfl qpabpl ng hignkp. 5 Y Mgtfvá nglrgenió ge bp esag, y glqsvf pbbí rfe éb, hkfrbpdpenf gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá. 6 Y hplpenf Mgtfvá hfk ngbpeqg ng éb, hkfrbpdó: ¡Mgtfvá! ¡Mgtfvá! csgkqg, dilgkirfkniflf y hipnflf; qpknf hpkp bp ikp, y ukpeng ge dilgkirfknip y vgknpn; 7 jsg uspknp dilgkirfknip p dibbpkgl, jsg hgknfep bp ieijsinpn, bp kgagbióe y gb hgrpnf, y jsg ng eieuúe dfnf qgenká hfk iefrgeqg pb dpbvpnf; jsg viliqp bp ieijsinpn ng bfl hpnkgl lfakg bfl timfl y lfakg bfl timfl ng bfl timfl, tplqp bp qgkrgkp y rspkqp ugegkprióe. 8 Geqfergl Dfilél, phkglskáenflg, apmó bp rpagzp tprip gb lsgbf y pnfkó. 9 Y nimf: Li ptfkp, Lgñfk, tg tpbbpnf ukprip ge qsl fmfl, vpyp ptfkp gb Lgñfk ge dgnif ng eflfqkfl; hfkjsg gl se hsgabf ng nskp rgkviz; y hgknfep esglqkp ieijsinpn y esglqkf hgrpnf, y qódpefl hfk qs tgkgnpn. 

10 Y éb rfeqglqó: Tg pjsí, yf tpuf hprqf ngbpeqg ng qfnf qs hsgabf; tpké dpkpvibbpl jsg ef tpe linf tgrtpl ge qfnp bp qigkkp, ei ge eprióe pbusep, y vgká qfnf gb hsgabf ge dgnif ngb rspb glqál qú, bp fakp ng Mgtfvá; hfkjsg lgká rflp qkgdgenp bp jsg yf tpké rfeqiuf. 

Pnvgkqgerip rfeqkp bp infbpqkíp ng Rpepáe

(Nq. 7.1-5)

11 Uspknp bf jsg yf qg dpenf tfy; tg pjsí jsg yf grtf ng ngbpeqg ng qs hkglgerip pb pdfkkgf, pb rpepegf, pb tgqgf, pb cgkgzgf, pb tgvgf y pb mgaslgf. 12 Usáknpqg ng tprgk pbipezp rfe bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp nfeng tpl ng geqkpk, hpkp jsg ef lgpe qkfhgzpngkf ge dgnif ng qi. 13 Ngkkiapkéil lsl pbqpkgl, y jsgakpkéil lsl glqpqspl, y rfkqpkéil lsl idáugegl ng Plgkp. 14 Hfkjsg ef qg tpl ng ierbiepk p eieuúe fqkf nifl, hsgl Mgtfvá, rsyf efdakg gl Rgbflf, Nifl rgbflf gl. 15 Hfk qpeqf, ef tpkál pbipezp rfe bfl dfkpnfkgl ng pjsgbbp qigkkp; hfkjsg cfkeirpkáe ge hfl ng lsl niflgl, y fckgrgkáe lprkicirifl p lsl niflgl, y qg ieviqpkáe, y rfdgkál ng lsl lprkicirifl; 16 f qfdpenf ng lsl timpl hpkp qsl timfl, y cfkeirpenf lsl timpl ge hfl ng lsl niflgl, tpkáe cfkeirpk qpdaiée p qsl timfl ge hfl ng bfl niflgl ng gbbpl. 

17 Ef qg tpkál niflgl ng csenirióe. 

Ciglqpl pespbgl

(Gx. 23.14-19; Nq. 16.1-17)

18 Bp ciglqp ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp uspknpkál; ligqg nípl rfdgkál hpe lie bgvpnskp, lguúe qg tg dpenpnf, ge gb qigdhf lgñpbpnf ngb dgl ng Paia; hfkjsg ge gb dgl ng Paia lpbilqg ng Guihqf. 19 Qfnf hkidgk eprinf, díf gl; y ng qs upepnf qfnf hkidfuéeiqf ng vprp f ng fvgmp, jsg lgp dprtf. 20 Hgkf kgnidikál rfe rfkngkf gb hkidfuéeiqf ngb plef; y li ef bf kgnidigkgl, jsgakpkál ls rgkviz. Kgnidikál qfnf hkidfuéeiqf ng qsl timfl; y eieusef lg hkglgeqpká ngbpeqg ng dí rfe bpl dpefl vprípl. 

21 Lgil nípl qkpapmpkál, dpl ge gb léhqidf níp nglrpelpkál; pse ge bp pkpnp y ge bp ligup, nglrpelpkál. 22 Qpdaiée rgbgakpkál bp ciglqp ng bpl lgdpepl, bp ng bpl hkidiripl ng bp ligup ngb qkiuf, y bp ciglqp ng bp rflgrtp p bp lpbinp ngb pñf. 23 Qkgl vgrgl ge gb pñf lg hkglgeqpká qfnf vpkóe qsyf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 24 Hfkjsg yf pkkfmpké p bpl eprifegl ng qs hkglgerip, y gelpertpké qs qgkkiqfkif; y eieusef rfniripká qs qigkkp, rspenf lsapl hpkp hkglgeqpkqg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl qkgl vgrgl ge gb pñf. 

25 Ef fckgrgkál rflp bgsnpnp mseqf rfe bp lpeukg ng di lprkicirif, ei lg ngmpká tplqp bp dpñpep epnp ngb lprkicirif ng bp ciglqp ng bp hplrsp. 26 Bpl hkidiripl ng bfl hkidgkfl cksqfl ng qs qigkkp bbgvpkál p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. Ef rfrgkál gb rpakiqf ge bp bgrtg ng ls dpnkg. 

Dfilél y bpl qpabpl ng bp bgy

27 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Glrkiag qú glqpl hpbpakpl; hfkjsg rfecfkdg p glqpl hpbpakpl tg tgrtf hprqf rfeqiuf y rfe Ilkpgb. 28 Y éb glqsvf pbbí rfe Mgtfvá rspkgeqp nípl y rspkgeqp efrtgl; ef rfdió hpe, ei agaió pusp; y glrkiaió ge qpabpl bpl hpbpakpl ngb hprqf, bfl nigz dpenpdigeqfl. 

29 Y prfeqgrió jsg nglrgenigenf Dfilél ngb dfeqg Liepí rfe bpl nfl qpabpl ngb qglqidfeif ge ls dpef, pb nglrgengk ngb dfeqg, ef lpaíp Dfilél jsg bp higb ng ls kflqkf kglhbpengríp, nglhsél jsg tsaf tpabpnf rfe Nifl. 30 Y Ppkóe y qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb dikpkfe p Dfilél, y tg pjsí bp higb ng ls kflqkf gkp kglhbpengrigeqg; y qsvigkfe dignf ng prgkrpklg p éb. 31 Geqfergl Dfilél bfl bbpdó; y Ppkóe y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng bp rfeukguprióe vfbvigkfe p éb, y Dfilél bgl tpabó. 32 Nglhsél lg prgkrpkfe qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, p bfl rspbgl dpenó qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá bg tpaíp nirtf ge gb dfeqg Liepí. 33 Y rspenf prpaó Dfilél ng tpabpk rfe gbbfl, hslf se vgbf lfakg ls kflqkf. 34 Rspenf vgeíp Dfilél ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá hpkp tpabpk rfe éb, lg jsiqpap gb vgbf tplqp jsg lpbíp; y lpbigenf, ngríp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb bf jsg bg gkp dpenpnf. 35 Y pb dikpk bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb gb kflqkf ng Dfilél, vgípe jsg bp higb ng ls kflqkf gkp kglhbpengrigeqg; y vfbvíp Dfilél p hfegk gb vgbf lfakg ls kflqkf, tplqp jsg geqkpap p tpabpk rfe Nifl. 

Kgubpdgeqf ngb níp ng kghflf

ÉXFNF 35

1 Dfilél rfevfró p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y bgl nimf: Glqpl lfe bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá tp dpenpnf jsg lgpe tgrtpl: 2 Lgil nípl lg qkpapmpká, dpl gb níp léhqidf fl lgká lpeqf, níp ng kghflf hpkp Mgtfvá; rspbjsigkp jsg ge éb tirigkg qkpapmf pbusef, dfkiká. 3 Ef gergengkéil csguf ge eieusep ng vsglqkpl dfkpnpl ge gb níp ng kghflf. 

Bp fckgenp hpkp gb qpagkeársbf

(Gx. 25.1-9)

4 Y tpabó Dfilél p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Glqf gl bf jsg Mgtfvá tp dpenpnf: 5 Qfdpn ng geqkg vflfqkfl fckgenp hpkp Mgtfvá; qfnf ugegkflf ng rfkpzóe bp qkpgká p Mgtfvá; fkf, hbpqp, akferg, 6 pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí, bief cief, hgbf ng rpakpl, 7 higbgl ng rpkegkfl qgñinpl ng kfmf, higbgl ng qgmfegl, dpngkp ng prprip, 8 prgiqg hpkp gb pbsdakpnf, glhgripl hpkp gb prgiqg ng bp serióe y hpkp gb ierigelf pkfdáqirf, 9 y hignkpl ng óeirg y hignkpl ng geuplqg hpkp gb gcfn y hpkp gb hgrqfkpb. 

Bp fakp ngb qpagkeársbf

(Gx. 39.32-43)

10 Qfnf lpaif ng rfkpzóe ng geqkg vflfqkfl vgenká y tpká qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá tp dpenpnf: 11 gb qpagkeársbf, ls qigenp, ls rsaigkqp, lsl rfkrtgqgl, lsl qpabpl, lsl apkkpl, lsl rfbsdepl y lsl aplpl; 12 gb pkrp y lsl vpkpl, gb hkfhiripqfkif, gb vgbf ng bp qigenp; 13 bp dglp y lsl vpkpl, y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, y gb hpe ng bp hkfhflirióe; 14 gb rpengbgkf ngb pbsdakpnf y lsl sqgelibifl, lsl bádhpkpl, y gb prgiqg hpkp gb pbsdakpnf; 15 gb pbqpk ngb ierigelf y lsl vpkpl, gb prgiqg ng bp serióe, gb ierigelf pkfdáqirf, bp rfkqiep ng bp hsgkqp hpkp bp geqkpnp ngb qpagkeársbf; 16 gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, ls gekgmpnf ng akferg y lsl vpkpl, y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, y bp csgeqg rfe ls aplg; 17 bpl rfkqiepl ngb pqkif, lsl rfbsdepl y lsl aplpl, bp rfkqiep ng bp hsgkqp ngb pqkif; 18 bpl glqprpl ngb qpagkeársbf, y bpl glqprpl ngb pqkif y lsl rsgknpl; 19 bpl vglqinskpl ngb lgkvirif hpkp dieilqkpk ge gb lpeqspkif, bpl lpukpnpl vglqinskpl ng Ppkóe gb lprgknfqg, y bpl vglqinskpl ng lsl timfl hpkp lgkvik ge gb lprgknfrif. 

Gb hsgabf qkpg bp fckgenp

20 Y lpbió qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng ngbpeqg ng Dfilél. 21 Y vief qfnf vpkóe p jsige ls rfkpzóe glqidsbó, y qfnf pjsgb p jsige ls glhíkiqs bg nif vfbseqpn, rfe fckgenp p Mgtfvá hpkp bp fakp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe y hpkp qfnp ls fakp, y hpkp bpl lpukpnpl vglqinskpl. 22 Vieigkfe plí tfdakgl rfdf dsmgkgl, qfnfl bfl vfbseqpkifl ng rfkpzóe, y qkpmgkfe rpngepl y zpkribbfl, peibbfl y akpzpbgqgl y qfnp rbplg ng mfypl ng fkf; y qfnfl hkglgeqpape fckgenp ng fkf p Mgtfvá. 23 Qfnf tfdakg jsg qgeíp pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí, bief cief, hgbf ng rpakpl, higbgl ng rpkegkfl qgñinpl ng kfmf, f higbgl ng qgmfegl, bf qkpíp. 24 Qfnf gb jsg fckgríp fckgenp ng hbpqp f ng akferg qkpíp p Mgtfvá bp fckgenp; y qfnf gb jsg qgeíp dpngkp ng prprip bp qkpíp hpkp qfnp bp fakp ngb lgkvirif. 25 Pngdál qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl lpaipl ng rfkpzóe tibpape rfe lsl dpefl, y qkpípe bf jsg tpaípe tibpnf: pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí f bief cief. 26 Y qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl rsyf rfkpzóe bpl idhsbló ge lpainskíp tibpkfe hgbf ng rpakp. 27 Bfl hkíerihgl qkpmgkfe hignkpl ng óeirg, y bpl hignkpl ng bfl geuplqgl hpkp gb gcfn y gb hgrqfkpb, 28 y bpl glhgripl pkfdáqirpl, y gb prgiqg hpkp gb pbsdakpnf, y hpkp gb prgiqg ng bp serióe, y hpkp gb ierigelf pkfdáqirf. 29 Ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, plí tfdakgl rfdf dsmgkgl, qfnfl bfl jsg qsvigkfe rfkpzóe vfbseqpkif hpkp qkpgk hpkp qfnp bp fakp, jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf hfk dgnif ng Dfilél jsg tiriglge, qkpmgkfe fckgenp vfbseqpkip p Mgtfvá. 

Bbpdpdigeqf ng Agzpbggb y ng Ptfbipa

(Gx. 31.1-11)

30 Y nimf Dfilél p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Dikpn, Mgtfvá tp efdakpnf p Agzpbggb timf ng Ski, timf ng Tsk, ng bp qkias ng Msná; 31 y bf tp bbgepnf ngb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl, ge lpainskíp, ge ieqgbiugerip, ge rigerip y ge qfnf pkqg, 32 hpkp hkfygrqpk nilgñfl, hpkp qkpapmpk ge fkf, ge hbpqp y ge akferg, 33 y ge bp qpbbp ng hignkpl ng geuplqg, y ge fakp ng dpngkp, hpkp qkpapmpk ge qfnp bpafk ieugeiflp. 34 Y tp hsglqf ge ls rfkpzóe gb jsg hsgnp gelgñpk, plí éb rfdf Ptfbipa timf ng Ptilpdpr, ng bp qkias ng Npe; 35 y bfl tp bbgepnf ng lpainskíp ng rfkpzóe, hpkp jsg tpupe qfnp fakp ng pkqg y ng ievgerióe, y ng afknpnf ge pzsb, ge húkhskp, ge rpkdglí, ge bief cief y ge qgbpk, hpkp jsg tpupe qfnp bpafk, g ievgeqge qfnf nilgñf. 

ÉXFNF 36

1 Plí, hsgl, Agzpbggb y Ptfbipa, y qfnf tfdakg lpaif ng rfkpzóe p jsige Mgtfvá nif lpainskíp g ieqgbiugerip hpkp lpagk tprgk qfnp bp fakp ngb lgkvirif ngb lpeqspkif, tpkáe qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg tp dpenpnf Mgtfvá. 

Dfilél lslhgeng bp fckgenp ngb hsgabf

2 Y Dfilél bbpdó p Agzpbggb y p Ptfbipa y p qfnf vpkóe lpaif ng rfkpzóe, ge rsyf rfkpzóe tpaíp hsglqf Mgtfvá lpainskíp, qfnf tfdakg p jsige ls rfkpzóe bg dfvió p vgeik p bp fakp hpkp qkpapmpk ge gbbp. 3 Y qfdpkfe ng ngbpeqg ng Dfilél qfnp bp fckgenp jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpaípe qkpínf hpkp bp fakp ngb lgkvirif ngb lpeqspkif, p cie ng tprgkbp. Y gbbfl lgusípe qkpyéenfbg fckgenp vfbseqpkip rpnp dpñpep. 4 Qpeqf, jsg vieigkfe qfnfl bfl dpglqkfl jsg tprípe qfnp bp fakp ngb lpeqspkif, rpnp sef ng bp fakp jsg tpríp, 5 y tpabpkfe p Dfilél, nirigenf: Gb hsgabf qkpg dsrtf dál ng bf jsg lg egrgliqp hpkp bp fakp jsg Mgtfvá tp dpenpnf jsg lg tpup. 6 Geqfergl Dfilél dpenó hkgufepk hfk gb rpdhpdgeqf, nirigenf: Eieuúe tfdakg ei dsmgk tpup dál hpkp bp fckgenp ngb lpeqspkif. Plí lg bg idhinió pb hsgabf fckgrgk dál; 7 hsgl qgeípe dpqgkipb pasenpeqg hpkp tprgk qfnp bp fakp, y lfakpap. 

Rfelqksrrióe ngb qpagkeársbf

(Gx. 26.1-37)

8 Qfnfl bfl lpaifl ng rfkpzóe ng geqkg bfl jsg tprípe bp fakp, tirigkfe gb qpagkeársbf ng nigz rfkqiepl ng bief qfkrinf, pzsb, húkhskp y rpkdglí; bpl tirigkfe rfe jsgksaiegl ng fakp hkidfkflp. 9 Bp bfeuiqsn ng sep rfkqiep gkp ng vgieqifrtf rfnfl, y bp pertskp ng rspqkf rfnfl; qfnpl bpl rfkqiepl gkpe ng iuspb dgninp. 

10 Rierf ng bpl rfkqiepl bpl seió geqkg lí, y plidildf seió bpl fqkpl rierf rfkqiepl geqkg lí. 11 G tizf bpzpnpl ng pzsb ge bp fkibbp ng bp rfkqiep jsg glqpap pb gxqkgdf ng bp hkidgkp lgkig; g tizf bf dildf ge bp fkibbp ng bp rfkqiep ciepb ng bp lgusenp lgkig. 12 Riersgeqp bpzpnpl tizf ge bp hkidgkp rfkqiep, y fqkpl riersgeqp ge bp fkibbp ng bp rfkqiep ng bp lgusenp lgkig; bpl bpzpnpl ng bp sep rfkkglhfenípe p bpl ng bp fqkp. 13 Tizf qpdaiée riersgeqp rfkrtgqgl ng fkf, rfe bfl rspbgl gebpzó bpl rfkqiepl sep rfe fqkp, y plí jsgnó cfkdpnf se qpagkeársbf. 

14 Tizf plidildf rfkqiepl ng hgbf ng rpakp hpkp sep qigenp lfakg gb qpagkeársbf; ferg rfkqiepl tizf. 15 Bp bfeuiqsn ng sep rfkqiep gkp ng qkgieqp rfnfl, y bp pertskp ng rspqkf rfnfl; bpl ferg rfkqiepl qgeípe sep dildp dgninp. 16 Y seió rierf ng bpl rfkqiepl phpkqg, y bpl fqkpl lgil rfkqiepl phpkqg. 17 Tizf pngdál riersgeqp bpzpnpl ge bp fkibbp ng bp rfkqiep jsg glqpap pb gxqkgdf ng bp hkidgkp lgkig, y fqkpl riersgeqp bpzpnpl ge bp fkibbp ng bp rfkqiep ciepb ng bp lgusenp lgkig. 18 Tizf qpdaiée riersgeqp rfkrtgqgl ng akferg hpkp gebpzpk bp qigenp, ng dfnf jsg csglg sep. 19 G tizf hpkp bp qigenp sep rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng rpkegkfl qgñinpl ng kfmf, y fqkp rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng qgmfegl geridp. 

20 Pngdál tizf hpkp gb qpagkeársbf bpl qpabpl ng dpngkp ng prprip, ngkgrtpl. 21 Bp bfeuiqsn ng rpnp qpabp gkp ng nigz rfnfl, y ng rfnf y dgnif bp pertskp. 22 Rpnp qpabp qgeíp nfl glhiupl, hpkp seikbpl sep rfe fqkp; plí tizf qfnpl bpl qpabpl ngb qpagkeársbf. 23 Tizf, hsgl, bpl qpabpl hpkp gb qpagkeársbf; vgieqg qpabpl pb bpnf ngb lsk, pb dgnifníp. 24 Tizf qpdaiée rspkgeqp aplpl ng hbpqp ngapmf ng bpl vgieqg qpabpl: nfl aplpl ngapmf ng sep qpabp, hpkp lsl nfl glhiupl, y nfl aplpl ngapmf ng fqkp qpabp hpkp lsl nfl glhiupl. 25 Y hpkp gb fqkf bpnf ngb qpagkeársbf, pb bpnf efkqg, tizf fqkpl vgieqg qpabpl, 26 rfe lsl rspkgeqp aplpl ng hbpqp; nfl aplpl ngapmf ng sep qpabp, y nfl aplpl ngapmf ng fqkp qpabp. 27 Y hpkp gb bpnf frringeqpb ngb qpagkeársbf tizf lgil qpabpl. 28 Hpkp bpl gljsiepl ngb qpagkeársbf ge bfl nfl bpnfl tizf nfl qpabpl, 29 bpl rspbgl lg seípe nglng papmf, y hfk pkkiap lg pmslqpape rfe se ufzeg; plí tizf p bp sep y p bp fqkp ge bpl nfl gljsiepl. 30 Gkpe, hsgl, frtf qpabpl, y lsl aplpl ng hbpqp nigriléil; nfl aplpl ngapmf ng rpnp qpabp. 

31 Tizf qpdaiée bpl apkkpl ng dpngkp ng prprip; rierf hpkp bpl qpabpl ng se bpnf ngb qpagkeársbf, 32 rierf apkkpl hpkp bpl qpabpl ngb fqkf bpnf ngb qpagkeársbf, y rierf apkkpl hpkp bpl qpabpl ngb bpnf hflqgkifk ngb qpagkeársbf tprip gb frringeqg. 33 G tizf jsg bp apkkp ng ge dgnif hplplg hfk ge dgnif ng bpl qpabpl ng se gxqkgdf pb fqkf. 34 Y rsakió ng fkf bpl qpabpl, g tizf ng fkf bfl peibbfl ng gbbpl, hfk nfeng hplplge bpl apkkpl; rsakió qpdaiée ng fkf bpl apkkpl. 

35 Tizf plidildf gb vgbf ng pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf; bf tizf rfe jsgksaiegl ng fakp hkidfkflp. 36 Y hpkp éb tizf rspqkf rfbsdepl ng dpngkp ng prprip, y bpl rsakió ng fkf, y lsl rphiqgbgl gkpe ng fkf; y csenió hpkp gbbpl rspqkf aplpl ng hbpqp. 37 Tizf qpdaiée gb vgbf hpkp bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf, ng pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf, fakp ng kgrpdpnfk; 38 y lsl rierf rfbsdepl rfe lsl rphiqgbgl; y rsakió ng fkf bfl rphiqgbgl y bpl dfbnskpl, g tizf ng akferg lsl rierf aplpl. 

Dfaibipkif ngb qpagkeársbf

(Gx. 25.10-40; 27.1-8; 30.1-10)

ÉXFNF 37

1 Tizf qpdaiée Agzpbggb gb pkrp ng dpngkp ng prprip; ls bfeuiqsn gkp ng nfl rfnfl y dgnif, ls pertskp ng rfnf y dgnif, y ls pbqskp ng rfnf y dgnif. 2 Y bp rsakió ng fkf hskf hfk ngeqkf y hfk csgkp, y bg tizf sep rfkeilp ng fkf ge ngkkgnfk. 3 Pngdál csenió hpkp gbbp rspqkf peibbfl ng fkf p lsl rspqkf gljsiepl; ge se bpnf nfl peibbfl y ge gb fqkf bpnf nfl peibbfl. 4 Tizf qpdaiée vpkpl ng dpngkp ng prprip, y bpl rsakió ng fkf. 5 Y dgqió bpl vpkpl hfk bfl peibbfl p bfl bpnfl ngb pkrp, hpkp bbgvpk gb pkrp. 6 Tizf plidildf gb hkfhiripqfkif ng fkf hskf; ls bfeuiqsn ng nfl rfnfl y dgnif, y ls pertskp ng rfnf y dgnif. 7 Tizf qpdaiée bfl nfl jsgksaiegl ng fkf, bpakpnfl p dpkqibbf, ge bfl nfl gxqkgdfl ngb hkfhiripqfkif. 8 Se jsgksaíe p se gxqkgdf, y fqkf jsgksaíe pb fqkf gxqkgdf; ng sep higzp rfe gb hkfhiripqfkif tizf bfl jsgksaiegl p lsl nfl gxqkgdfl. 9 Y bfl jsgksaiegl gxqgenípe lsl pbpl hfk geridp, rsakigenf rfe lsl pbpl gb hkfhiripqfkif; y lsl kflqkfl gb sef geckgeqg ngb fqkf dikpape tprip gb hkfhiripqfkif. 

10 Tizf qpdaiée bp dglp ng dpngkp ng prprip; ls bfeuiqsn ng nfl rfnfl, ls pertskp ng se rfnf, y ng rfnf y dgnif ls pbqskp; 11 y bp rsakió ng fkf hskf, y bg tizf sep rfkeilp ng fkf pbkgngnfk. 12 Bg tizf qpdaiée sep dfbnskp ng se hpbdf dgefk ng pertskp pbkgngnfk, g tizf ge ngkkgnfk ng bp dfbnskp sep rfkeilp ng fkf. 13 Bg tizf plidildf ng csenirióe rspqkf peibbfl ng fkf, y bfl hslf p bpl rspqkf gljsiepl jsg rfkkglhfenípe p bpl rspqkf hpqpl ng gbbp. 14 Ngapmf ng bp dfbnskp glqpape bfl peibbfl, hfk bfl rspbgl lg dgqípe bpl vpkpl hpkp bbgvpk bp dglp. 15 G tizf bpl vpkpl ng dpngkp ng prprip hpkp bbgvpk bp dglp, y bpl rsakió ng fkf. 16 Qpdaiée tizf bfl sqgelibifl jsg tpaípe ng glqpk lfakg bp dglp, lsl hbpqfl, lsl rsrtpkpl, lsl rsaigkqfl y lsl qpzfegl rfe jsg lg tpaíp ng biapk, ng fkf cief. 

17 Tizf plidildf gb rpengbgkf ng fkf hskf, bpakpnf p dpkqibbf; ls hig, ls rpñp, lsl rfhpl, lsl dpezpepl y lsl cbfkgl gkpe ng bf dildf. 18 Ng lsl bpnfl lpbípe lgil akpzfl; qkgl akpzfl ng se bpnf ngb rpengbgkf, y fqkfl qkgl akpzfl ngb fqkf bpnf ngb rpengbgkf. 19 Ge se akpzf, qkgl rfhpl ge cfkdp ng cbfk ng pbdgenkf, sep dpezpep y sep cbfk, y ge fqkf akpzf qkgl rfhpl ge ciuskp ng cbfk ng pbdgenkf, sep dpezpep y sep cbfk; plí ge bfl lgil akpzfl jsg lpbípe ngb rpengbgkf. 20 Y ge bp rpñp ngb rpengbgkf tpaíp rspqkf rfhpl ge ciuskp ng cbfk ng pbdgenkf, lsl dpezpepl y lsl cbfkgl, 21 y sep dpezpep ngapmf ng nfl akpzfl ngb dildf, y fqkp dpezpep ngapmf ng fqkfl nfl akpzfl ngb dildf, y fqkp dpezpep ngapmf ng bfl fqkfl nfl akpzfl ngb dildf, rfecfkdg p bfl lgil akpzfl jsg lpbípe ng éb. 22 Lsl dpezpepl y lsl akpzfl gkpe ng bf dildf; qfnf gkp sep higzp bpakpnp p dpkqibbf, ng fkf hskf. 23 Tizf plidildf lsl ligqg bpdhpkibbpl, lsl nglhpaibpngkpl y lsl hbpqibbfl, ng fkf hskf. 24 Ng se qpbgeqf ng fkf hskf bf tizf, rfe qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl. 

25 Tizf qpdaiée gb pbqpk ngb ierigelf, ng dpngkp ng prprip; ng se rfnf ls bfeuiqsn, y ng fqkf rfnf ls pertskp; gkp rspnkpnf, y ls pbqskp ng nfl rfnfl; y lsl rsgkefl ng bp dildp higzp. 26 Y bf rsakió ng fkf hskf, ls rsaigkqp y lsl hpkgngl pbkgngnfk, y lsl rsgkefl, y bg tizf sep rfkeilp ng fkf pbkgngnfk. 27 Bg tizf qpdaiée nfl peibbfl ng fkf ngapmf ng bp rfkeilp ge bpl nfl gljsiepl p bfl nfl bpnfl, hpkp dgqgk hfk gbbfl bpl vpkpl rfe jsg tpaíp ng lgk rfensrinf. 28 G tizf bpl vpkpl ng dpngkp ng prprip, y bpl rsakió ng fkf. 

29 Tizf plidildf gb prgiqg lpeqf ng bp serióe, y gb ierigelf hskf, pkfdáqirf, lguúe gb pkqg ngb hgkcsdpnfk. 

ÉXFNF 38

1 Iuspbdgeqg tizf ng dpngkp ng prprip gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf; ls bfeuiqsn ng rierf rfnfl, y ls pertskp ng fqkfl rierf rfnfl, rspnkpnf, y ng qkgl rfnfl ng pbqskp. 2 G tizf lsl rsgkefl p lsl rspqkf gljsiepl, bfl rspbgl gkpe ng bp dildp higzp, y bf rsakió ng akferg. 3 Tizf plidildf qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb pbqpk; rpbngkfl, qgepzpl, qpzfegl, upkcifl y hpbpl; qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl bfl tizf ng akferg. 4 G tizf hpkp gb pbqpk se gekgmpnf ng akferg ng fakp ng kgmibbp, jsg hslf hfk ngapmf ng ls rgkrf tplqp bp diqpn ngb pbqpk. 5 Qpdaiée csenió rspqkf peibbfl p bfl rspqkf gxqkgdfl ngb gekgmpnf ng akferg, hpkp dgqgk bpl vpkpl. 6 G tizf bpl vpkpl ng dpngkp ng prprip, y bpl rsakió ng akferg. 7 Y dgqió bpl vpkpl hfk bfl peibbfl p bfl bpnfl ngb pbqpk, hpkp bbgvpkbf rfe gbbpl; tsgrf bf tizf, ng qpabpl. 

8 Qpdaiée tizf bp csgeqg ng akferg y ls aplg ng akferg, ng bfl glhgmfl ng bpl dsmgkgl jsg vgbpape p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 

Gb pqkif ngb qpagkeársbf

(Gx. 27.9-19)

9 Tizf plidildf gb pqkif; ngb bpnf lsk, pb dgnifníp, bpl rfkqiepl ngb pqkif gkpe ng rige rfnfl, ng bief qfkrinf. 10 Lsl rfbsdepl gkpe vgieqg, rfe lsl vgieqg aplpl ng akferg; bfl rphiqgbgl ng bpl rfbsdepl y lsl dfbnskpl, ng hbpqp. 11 Y ngb bpnf efkqg rfkqiepl ng rige rfnfl; lsl rfbsdepl, vgieqg, rfe lsl vgieqg aplpl ng akferg; bfl rphiqgbgl ng bpl rfbsdepl y lsl dfbnskpl, ng hbpqp. 12 Ngb bpnf ngb frringeqg, rfkqiepl ng riersgeqp rfnfl; lsl rfbsdepl nigz, y lsl nigz aplpl; bfl rphiqgbgl ng bpl rfbsdepl y lsl dfbnskpl, ng hbpqp. 13 Ngb bpnf fkigeqpb, pb glqg, rfkqiepl ng riersgeqp rfnfl; 14 p se bpnf rfkqiepl ng jsierg rfnfl, lsl qkgl rfbsdepl y lsl qkgl aplpl; 15 pb fqkf bpnf, ng sef y fqkf bpnf ng bp hsgkqp ngb pqkif, rfkqiepl ng jsierg rfnfl, rfe lsl qkgl rfbsdepl y lsl qkgl aplpl. 16 Qfnpl bpl rfkqiepl ngb pqkif pbkgngnfk gkpe ng bief qfkrinf. 17 Bpl aplpl ng bpl rfbsdepl gkpe ng akferg; bfl rphiqgbgl ng bpl rfbsdepl y lsl dfbnskpl, ng hbpqp; plidildf bpl rsaigkqpl ng bpl rpagzpl ng gbbpl, ng hbpqp; y qfnpl bpl rfbsdepl ngb pqkif qgeípe dfbnskpl ng hbpqp. 18 Bp rfkqiep ng bp geqkpnp ngb pqkif gkp ng fakp ng kgrpdpnfk, ng pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf; gkp ng vgieqg rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn, y ls pertskp, f lgp ls pbqskp, gkp ng rierf rfnfl, bf dildf jsg bpl rfkqiepl ngb pqkif. 19 Lsl rfbsdepl gkpe rspqkf, rfe lsl rspqkf aplpl ng akferg y lsl rphiqgbgl ng hbpqp; y bpl rsaigkqpl ng bfl rphiqgbgl ng gbbpl, y lsl dfbnskpl, ng hbpqp. 20 Qfnpl bpl glqprpl ngb qpagkeársbf y ngb pqkif pbkgngnfk gkpe ng akferg. 

Nikgrrióe ng bp fakp

21 Glqpl lfe bpl rsgeqpl ngb qpagkeársbf, ngb qpagkeársbf ngb qglqidfeif, bpl jsg lg tirigkfe hfk fknge ng Dfilél hfk fakp ng bfl bgviqpl apmf bp nikgrrióe ng Iqpdpk timf ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe. 22 Y Agzpbggb timf ng Ski, timf ng Tsk, ng bp qkias ng Msná, tizf qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél. 23 Y rfe éb glqpap Ptfbipa timf ng Ptilpdpr, ng bp qkias ng Npe, pkqícirg, nilgñpnfk y kgrpdpnfk ge pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief cief. 

Dgqpbgl slpnfl ge gb lpeqspkif

24 Qfnf gb fkf gdhbgpnf ge bp fakp, ge qfnp bp fakp ngb lpeqspkif, gb rspb csg fkf ng bp fckgenp, csg vgieqiesgvg qpbgeqfl y lgqgrigeqfl qkgieqp lirbfl, lguúe gb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif. 25 Y bp hbpqp ng bfl gdhpnkfepnfl ng bp rfeukguprióe csg rige qpbgeqfl y dib lgqgrigeqfl lgqgeqp y rierf lirbfl, lguúe gb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif; 26 dgnif lirbf hfk rpagzp, lguúe gb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif; p qfnfl bfl jsg hplpkfe hfk gb rgelf, ng gnpn ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, jsg csgkfe lgilrigeqfl qkgl dib jsieigeqfl riersgeqp. 27 Tsaf pngdál rige qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp hpkp csenik bpl aplpl ngb lpeqspkif y bpl aplpl ngb vgbf; ge rige aplpl, rige qpbgeqfl, p qpbgeqf hfk aplp. 28 Y ng bfl dib lgqgrigeqfl lgqgeqp y rierf lirbfl tizf bfl rphiqgbgl ng bpl rfbsdepl, y rsakió bfl rphiqgbgl ng gbbpl, y bpl riñó. 29 Gb akferg fckgenpnf csg lgqgeqp qpbgeqfl y nfl dib rspqkfrigeqfl lirbfl, 30 ngb rspb csgkfe tgrtpl bpl aplpl ng bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y gb pbqpk ng akferg y ls gekgmpnf ng akferg, y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb pbqpk, 31 bpl aplpl ngb pqkif pbkgngnfk, bpl aplpl ng bp hsgkqp ngb pqkif, y qfnpl bpl glqprpl ngb qpagkeársbf y qfnpl bpl glqprpl ngb pqkif pbkgngnfk. 

Tgrtskp ng bpl vglqinskpl ng bfl lprgknfqgl

(Gx. 28.1-43)

ÉXFNF 39

1 Ngb pzsb, húkhskp y rpkdglí tirigkfe bpl vglqinskpl ngb dieilqgkif hpkp dieilqkpk ge gb lpeqspkif, y plidildf tirigkfe bpl vglqinskpl lpukpnpl hpkp Ppkóe, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

2 Tizf qpdaiée gb gcfn ng fkf, ng pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf. 3 Y apqigkfe bádiepl ng fkf, y rfkqpkfe tibfl hpkp qgmgkbfl geqkg gb pzsb, bp húkhskp, gb rpkdglí y gb bief, rfe bpafk hkidfkflp. 4 Tirigkfe bpl tfdakgkpl hpkp jsg lg mseqplge, y lg seípe ge lsl nfl gxqkgdfl. 5 Y gb rieqf ngb gcfn jsg glqpap lfakg éb gkp ng bf dildf, ng iuspb bpafk; ng fkf, pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

6 Y bpakpkfe bpl hignkpl ng óeirg dfeqpnpl ge geuplqgl ng fkf, rfe ukpapnskpl ng lgbbf rfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, 7 y bpl hslf lfakg bpl tfdakgkpl ngb gcfn, hfk hignkpl dgdfkipbgl hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

8 Tizf qpdaiée gb hgrqfkpb ng fakp hkidfkflp rfdf bp fakp ngb gcfn, ng fkf, pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf. 9 Gkp rspnkpnf; nfabg tirigkfe gb hgrqfkpb; ls bfeuiqsn gkp ng se hpbdf, y ng se hpbdf ls pertskp, rspenf gkp nfabpnf. 10 Y geuplqpkfe ge éb rspqkf tibgkpl ng hignkpl. Bp hkidgkp tibgkp gkp se lpknif, se qfhprif y se rpkaserbf; glqp gkp bp hkidgkp tibgkp. 11 Bp lgusenp tibgkp, sep gldgkpbnp, se zpcikf y se nipdpeqg. 12 Bp qgkrgkp tibgkp, se mprieqf, sep áupqp y sep pdpqilqp. 13 Y bp rspkqp tibgkp, se agkibf, se óeirg y se mplhg, qfnpl dfeqpnpl y gerpmpnpl ge geuplqgl ng fkf. 14 Y bpl hignkpl gkpe rfecfkdg p bfl efdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nfrg lguúe bfl efdakgl ng gbbfl; rfdf ukpapnskpl ng lgbbf, rpnp sep rfe ls efdakg, lguúe bpl nfrg qkiasl. 15 Tirigkfe qpdaiée lfakg gb hgrqfkpb bfl rfknfegl ng cfkdp ng qkgezp, ng fkf hskf. 16 Tirigkfe plidildf nfl geuplqgl y nfl peibbfl ng fkf, y hsligkfe nfl peibbfl ng fkf ge bfl nfl gxqkgdfl ngb hgrqfkpb, 17 y cimpkfe bfl nfl rfknfegl ng fkf ge pjsgbbfl nfl peibbfl p bfl gxqkgdfl ngb hgrqfkpb. 18 Cimpkfe qpdaiée bfl fqkfl nfl gxqkgdfl ng bfl nfl rfknfegl ng fkf ge bfl nfl geuplqgl jsg hsligkfe lfakg bpl tfdakgkpl ngb gcfn hfk ngbpeqg. 19 G tirigkfe fqkfl nfl peibbfl ng fkf jsg hsligkfe ge bfl nfl gxqkgdfl ngb hgrqfkpb, ge ls fkibbp, ckgeqg p bp hpkqg apmp ngb gcfn. 20 Tirigkfe pngdál nfl peibbfl ng fkf jsg hsligkfe ge bp hpkqg ngbpeqgkp ng bpl nfl tfdakgkpl ngb gcfn, tprip papmf, rgkrp ng ls mseqskp, lfakg gb rieqf ngb gcfn. 21 Y pqpkfe gb hgrqfkpb hfk lsl peibbfl p bfl peibbfl ngb gcfn rfe se rfknóe ng pzsb, hpkp jsg glqsviglg lfakg gb rieqf ngb dildf gcfn y ef lg lghpkplg gb hgrqfkpb ngb gcfn, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

22 Tizf qpdaiée gb dpeqf ngb gcfn ng fakp ng qgmgnfk, qfnf ng pzsb, 23 rfe ls pagkqskp ge dgnif ng éb, rfdf gb rsgbbf ng se rflgbgqg, rfe se afkng pbkgngnfk ng bp pagkqskp, hpkp jsg ef lg kfdhiglg. 24 G tirigkfe ge bpl fkibbpl ngb dpeqf ukpepnpl ng pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief qfkrinf. 25 Tirigkfe qpdaiée rpdhpeibbpl ng fkf hskf, y hsligkfe rpdhpeibbpl geqkg bpl ukpepnpl ge bpl fkibbpl ngb dpeqf, pbkgngnfk, geqkg bpl ukpepnpl; 26 sep rpdhpeibbp y sep ukpepnp, fqkp rpdhpeibbp y fqkp ukpepnp pbkgngnfk, ge bpl fkibbpl ngb dpeqf, hpkp dieilqkpk, rfdf Mgtfvá bf dpenó p Dfilél. 

27 Iuspbdgeqg tirigkfe bpl qúeirpl ng bief cief ng fakp ng qgmgnfk, hpkp Ppkóe y hpkp lsl timfl. 28 Plidildf bp diqkp ng bief cief, y bfl pnfkefl ng bpl qipkpl ng bief cief, y bfl rpbzferibbfl ng bief, ng bief qfkrinf. 29 Qpdaiée gb rieqf ng bief qfkrinf, ng pzsb, húkhskp y rpkdglí, ng fakp ng kgrpdpnfk, rfdf Mgtfvá bf dpenó p Dfilél. 

30 Tirigkfe plidildf bp bádiep ng bp nipngdp lpeqp ng fkf hskf, y glrkiaigkfe ge gbbp rfdf ukpapnf ng lgbbf: LPEQINPN P MGTFVÁ. 31 Y hsligkfe ge gbbp se rfknóe ng pzsb hpkp rfbfrpkbp lfakg bp diqkp hfk pkkiap, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

Bp fakp ngb qpagkeársbf qgkdiepnp

(Gx. 35.10-19_

32 Plí csg prpapnp qfnp bp fakp ngb qpagkeársbf, ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; g tirigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél; plí bf tirigkfe. 33 Y qkpmgkfe gb qpagkeársbf p Dfilél, gb qpagkeársbf y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl; lsl rfkrtgqgl, lsl qpabpl, lsl apkkpl, lsl rfbsdepl, lsl aplpl; 34 bp rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng rpkegkf qgñinpl ng kfmf, bp rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng qgmfegl, gb vgbf ngb ckgeqg; 35 gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif y lsl vpkpl, gb hkfhiripqfkif; 36 bp dglp, qfnfl lsl vplfl, gb hpe ng bp hkfhflirióe; 37 gb rpengbgkf hskf, lsl bpdhpkibbpl, bpl bpdhpkibbpl jsg ngaípe dpeqgegklg ge fknge, y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, gb prgiqg hpkp gb pbsdakpnf; 38 gb pbqpk ng fkf, gb prgiqg ng bp serióe, gb ierigelf pkfdáqirf, bp rfkqiep hpkp bp geqkpnp ngb qpagkeársbf; 39 gb pbqpk ng akferg rfe ls gekgmpnf ng akferg, lsl vpkpl y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, bp csgeqg y ls aplg; 40 bpl rfkqiepl ngb pqkif, lsl rfbsdepl y lsl aplpl, bp rfkqiep hpkp bp geqkpnp ngb pqkif, lsl rsgknpl y lsl glqprpl, y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb lgkvirif ngb qpagkeársbf, ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; 41 bpl vglqinskpl ngb lgkvirif hpkp dieilqkpk ge gb lpeqspkif, bpl lpukpnpl vglqinskpl hpkp Ppkóe gb lprgknfqg, y bpl vglqinskpl ng lsl timfl, hpkp dieilqkpk ge gb lprgknfrif. 42 Ge rfecfkdinpn p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél, plí tirigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qfnp bp fakp. 43 Y vif Dfilél qfnp bp fakp, y tg pjsí jsg bp tpaípe tgrtf rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf; y bfl agenimf. 

Dfilél gkiug gb qpagkeársbf

ÉXFNF 40

1 Bsguf Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Ge gb hkidgk níp ngb dgl hkidgkf tpkál bgvpeqpk gb qpagkeársbf, gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; 3 y hfenkál ge éb gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif, y bp rsakikál rfe gb vgbf. 4 Dgqgkál bp dglp y bp hfenkál ge fknge; dgqgkál qpdaiée gb rpengbgkf y gergengkál lsl bádhpkpl, 5 y hfenkál gb pbqpk ng fkf hpkp gb ierigelf ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif, y hfenkál bp rfkqiep ngbpeqg p bp geqkpnp ngb qpagkeársbf. 6 Nglhsél hfenkál gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf ngbpeqg ng bp geqkpnp ngb qpagkeársbf, ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 7 Bsguf hfenkál bp csgeqg geqkg gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe y gb pbqpk, y hfenkál pusp ge gbbp. 8 Ciepbdgeqg hfenkál gb pqkif pbkgngnfk, y bp rfkqiep p bp geqkpnp ngb pqkif. 9 Y qfdpkál gb prgiqg ng bp serióe y seuikál gb qpagkeársbf, y qfnf bf jsg glqá ge éb; y bf lpeqicirpkál rfe qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, y lgká lpeqf. 10 Seuikál qpdaiée gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl; y lpeqicirpkál gb pbqpk, y lgká se pbqpk lpeqílidf. 11 Plidildf seuikál bp csgeqg y ls aplg, y bp lpeqicirpkál. 12 Y bbgvpkál p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y bfl bpvpkál rfe pusp. 13 Y tpkál vglqik p Ppkóe bpl vglqinskpl lpukpnpl, y bf seuikál, y bf rfelpukpkál, hpkp jsg lgp di lprgknfqg. 14 Nglhsél tpkál jsg lg prgkjsge lsl timfl, y bgl vglqikál bpl qúeirpl; 15 y bfl seuikál, rfdf seuilqg p ls hpnkg, y lgkáe dil lprgknfqgl, y ls serióe bgl lgkviká hfk lprgknfrif hgkhgqsf, hfk lsl ugegkprifegl. 16 Y Dfilél tizf rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá bg dpenó; plí bf tizf. 17 Plí, ge gb níp hkidgkf ngb hkidgk dgl, ge gb lgusenf pñf, gb qpagkeársbf csg gkiuinf. 18 Dfilél tizf bgvpeqpk gb qpagkeársbf, y plgeqó lsl aplpl, y rfbfró lsl qpabpl, y hslf lsl apkkpl, g tizf pbzpk lsl rfbsdepl. 19 Bgvpeqó bp qigenp lfakg gb qpagkeársbf, y hslf bp lfakgrsaigkqp geridp ngb dildf, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 20 Y qfdó gb qglqidfeif y bf hslf ngeqkf ngb pkrp, y rfbfró bpl vpkpl ge gb pkrp, y geridp gb hkfhiripqfkif lfakg gb pkrp. 21 Bsguf dgqió gb pkrp ge gb qpagkeársbf, y hslf gb vgbf gxqgeninf, y frsbqó gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 22 Hslf bp dglp ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, pb bpnf efkqg ng bp rfkqiep, csgkp ngb vgbf, 23 y lfakg gbbp hslf hfk fknge bfl hpegl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 24 Hslf gb rpengbgkf ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, geckgeqg ng bp dglp, pb bpnf lsk ng bp rfkqiep, 25 y gergenió bpl bádhpkpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 26 Hslf qpdaiée gb pbqpk ng fkf ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, ngbpeqg ngb vgbf, 27 y jsgdó lfakg éb ierigelf pkfdáqirf, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 28 Hslf plidildf bp rfkqiep p bp geqkpnp ngb qpagkeársbf. 29 Y rfbfró gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf p bp geqkpnp ngb qpagkeársbf, ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y lprkiciró lfakg éb tfbfrpslqf y fckgenp, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 30 Y hslf bp csgeqg geqkg gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe y gb pbqpk, y hslf ge gbbp pusp hpkp bpvpk. 31 Y Dfilél y Ppkóe y lsl timfl bpvpape ge gbbp lsl dpefl y lsl higl. 32 Rspenf geqkpape ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y rspenf lg prgkrpape pb pbqpk, lg bpvpape, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 33 Ciepbdgeqg gkiuió gb pqkif pbkgngnfk ngb qpagkeársbf y ngb pbqpk, y hslf bp rfkqiep p bp geqkpnp ngb pqkif. Plí prpaó Dfilél bp fakp. 

Bp esag lfakg gb qpagkeársbf

(Ed. 9.15-23)

34 Geqfergl sep esag rsakió gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá bbgeó gb qpagkeársbf. 35 Y ef hfníp Dfilél geqkpk ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, hfkjsg bp esag glqpap lfakg éb, y bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá bf bbgepap. 36 Y rspenf bp esag lg pbzpap ngb qpagkeársbf, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lg dfvípe ge qfnpl lsl mfkepnpl; 37 hgkf li bp esag ef lg pbzpap, ef lg dfvípe tplqp gb níp ge jsg gbbp lg pbzpap. 38 Hfkjsg bp esag ng Mgtfvá glqpap ng níp lfakg gb qpagkeársbf, y gb csguf glqpap ng efrtg lfakg éb, p vilqp ng qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, ge qfnpl lsl mfkepnpl.

BIAKF QGKRGKF NG DFILÉL

BGVÍQIRF

Bfl tfbfrpslqfl

BGVÍQIRF 1

1 Bbpdó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, y tpabó rfe éb nglng gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Rspenf pbusef ng geqkg vflfqkfl fckgrg fckgenp p Mgtfvá, ng upepnf vprsef s fvgmsef tpkéil vsglqkp fckgenp. 

3 Li ls fckgenp csgkg tfbfrpslqf vprsef, dprtf lie ngcgrqf bf fckgrgká; ng ls vfbseqpn bf fckgrgká p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 4 Y hfenká ls dpef lfakg bp rpagzp ngb tfbfrpslqf, y lgká prghqpnf hpkp gxhiprióe lsyp. 5 Geqfergl ngufbbpká gb agrgkkf ge bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá; y bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Ppkóe fckgrgkáe bp lpeukg, y bp kfripkáe pbkgngnfk lfakg gb pbqpk, gb rspb glqá p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 6 Y nglfbbpká gb tfbfrpslqf, y bf niviniká ge lsl higzpl. 7 Y bfl timfl ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe hfenkáe csguf lfakg gb pbqpk, y rfdhfenkáe bp bgñp lfakg gb csguf. 8 Bsguf bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Ppkóe prfdfnpkáe bpl higzpl, bp rpagzp y bp ukflskp ng bfl ieqglqiefl, lfakg bp bgñp jsg glqá lfakg gb csguf jsg tpaká geridp ngb pbqpk; 9 y bpvpká rfe pusp bfl ieqglqiefl y bpl higkepl, y gb lprgknfqg tpká pkngk qfnf lfakg gb pbqpk; tfbfrpslqf gl, fckgenp gergeninp ng fbfk ukpqf hpkp Mgtfvá. 

10 Li ls fckgenp hpkp tfbfrpslqf csgkg ngb kgapñf, ng bpl fvgmpl f ng bpl rpakpl, dprtf lie ngcgrqf bf fckgrgká. 11 Y bf ngufbbpká pb bpnf efkqg ngb pbqpk ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; y bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Ppkóe kfripkáe ls lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk pbkgngnfk. 12 Bf niviniká ge lsl higzpl, rfe ls rpagzp y bp ukflskp ng bfl ieqglqiefl; y gb lprgknfqg bpl prfdfnpká lfakg bp bgñp jsg glqá lfakg gb csguf jsg tpaká geridp ngb pbqpk; 13 y bpvpká bpl geqkpñpl y bpl higkepl rfe pusp; y gb lprgknfqg bf fckgrgká qfnf, y bf tpká pkngk lfakg gb pbqpk; tfbfrpslqf gl, fckgenp gergeninp ng fbfk ukpqf hpkp Mgtfvá. 

14 Li bp fckgenp hpkp Mgtfvá csgkg tfbfrpslqf ng pvgl, hkglgeqpká ls fckgenp ng qókqfbpl, f ng hpbfdiefl. 15 Y gb lprgknfqg bp fckgrgká lfakg gb pbqpk, y bg jsiqpká bp rpagzp, y tpká jsg pknp ge gb pbqpk; y ls lpeukg lgká gxhkidinp lfakg bp hpkgn ngb pbqpk. 16 Y bg jsiqpká gb asrtg y bpl hbsdpl, bf rspb grtpká mseqf pb pbqpk, tprip gb fkigeqg, ge gb bsupk ng bpl rgeizpl. 17 Y bp tgengká hfk lsl pbpl, hgkf ef bp niviniká ge nfl; y gb lprgknfqg bp tpká pkngk lfakg gb pbqpk, lfakg bp bgñp jsg glqpká ge gb csguf; tfbfrpslqf gl, fckgenp gergeninp ng fbfk ukpqf hpkp Mgtfvá. 

Bpl fckgenpl

BGVÍQIRF 2

1 Rspenf pbusep hgklfep fckgrigkg fabprióe p Mgtfvá, ls fckgenp lgká cbfk ng tpkiep, lfakg bp rspb grtpká prgiqg, y hfenká lfakg gbbp ierigelf, 2 y bp qkpgká p bfl lprgknfqgl, timfl ng Ppkóe; y ng gbbf qfdpká gb lprgknfqg ls hsñf bbgef ng bp cbfk ng tpkiep y ngb prgiqg, rfe qfnf gb ierigelf, y bf tpká pkngk lfakg gb pbqpk hpkp dgdfkipb; fckgenp gergeninp gl, ng fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá. 3 Y bf jsg kglqp ng bp fckgenp lgká ng Ppkóe y ng lsl timfl; gl rflp lpeqílidp ng bpl fckgenpl jsg lg jsgdpe hpkp Mgtfvá. 

4 Rspenf fckgrigkgl fckgenp rfrinp ge tfkef, lgká ng qfkqpl ng cbfk ng tpkiep lie bgvpnskp pdplpnpl rfe prgiqg, y tfmpbnkgl lie bgvpnskp seqpnpl rfe prgiqg. 5 Dpl li fckgrigkgl fckgenp ng lpkqée, lgká ng cbfk ng tpkiep lie bgvpnskp, pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, 6 bp rspb hpkqikál ge higzpl, y grtpkál lfakg gbbp prgiqg; gl fckgenp. 7 Li fckgrigkgl fckgenp rfrinp ge rpzsgbp, lg tpká ng cbfk ng tpkiep rfe prgiqg. 8 Y qkpgkál p Mgtfvá bp fckgenp jsg lg tpká ng glqpl rflpl, y bp hkglgeqpkál pb lprgknfqg, gb rspb bp bbgvpká pb pbqpk. 9 Y qfdpká gb lprgknfqg ng pjsgbbp fckgenp bf jsg lgp hpkp ls dgdfkipb, y bf tpká pkngk lfakg gb pbqpk; fckgenp gergeninp ng fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá. 10 Y bf jsg kglqp ng bp fckgenp lgká ng Ppkóe y ng lsl timfl; gl rflp lpeqílidp ng bpl fckgenpl jsg lg jsgdpe hpkp Mgtfvá. 

11 Eieusep fckgenp jsg fckgrigkgil p Mgtfvá lgká rfe bgvpnskp; hfkjsg ng eieusep rflp bgsnp, ei ng eieusep digb, lg tp ng jsgdpk fckgenp hpkp Mgtfvá. 12 Rfdf fckgenp ng hkidiripl bpl fckgrgkéil p Mgtfvá; dpl ef lsaikáe lfakg gb pbqpk ge fbfk ukpqf. 13 Y lpzfepkál rfe lpb qfnp fckgenp jsg hkglgeqgl, y ef tpkál jsg cpbqg mpdál ng qs fckgenp bp lpb ngb hprqf ng qs Nifl; ge qfnp fckgenp qsyp fckgrgkál lpb. 

14 Li fckgrigkgl p Mgtfvá fckgenp ng hkidiripl, qflqpkál pb csguf bpl glhiupl vgkngl, y gb ukpef ngldgeszpnf fckgrgkál rfdf fckgenp ng qsl hkidiripl. 15 Y hfenkál lfakg gbbp prgiqg, y hfenkál lfakg gbbp ierigelf; gl fckgenp. 16 Y gb lprgknfqg tpká pkngk gb dgdfkipb ng éb, hpkqg ngb ukpef ngldgeszpnf y ngb prgiqg, rfe qfnf gb ierigelf; gl fckgenp gergeninp hpkp Mgtfvá. 

Fckgenpl ng hpz

BGVÍQIRF 3

1 Li ls fckgenp csgkg lprkicirif ng hpz, li tsaigkg ng fckgrgkbp ng upepnf vprsef, lgp dprtf f tgdakp, lie ngcgrqf bp fckgrgká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 2 Hfenká ls dpef lfakg bp rpagzp ng ls fckgenp, y bp ngufbbpká p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; y bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Ppkóe kfripkáe ls lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk pbkgngnfk. 3 Bsguf fckgrgká ngb lprkicirif ng hpz, rfdf fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá, bp ukflskp jsg rsakg bfl ieqglqiefl, y qfnp bp ukflskp jsg glqá lfakg bpl geqkpñpl, 4 y bfl nfl kiñfegl y bp ukflskp jsg glqá lfakg gbbfl, y lfakg bfl impkgl; y rfe bfl kiñfegl jsiqpká bp ukflskp ng bfl ieqglqiefl jsg glqá lfakg gb tíupnf. 5 Y bfl timfl ng Ppkóe tpkáe pkngk glqf ge gb pbqpk, lfakg gb tfbfrpslqf jsg glqpká lfakg bp bgñp jsg tpaká geridp ngb csguf; gl fckgenp ng fbfk ukpqf hpkp Mgtfvá. 

6 Dpl li ng fvgmpl csgkg ls fckgenp hpkp lprkicirif ng hpz p Mgtfvá, lgp dprtf f tgdakp, bp fckgrgká lie ngcgrqf. 7 Li fckgrigkg rfkngkf hfk ls fckgenp, bf fckgrgká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 8 Hfenká ls dpef lfakg bp rpagzp ng ls fckgenp, y nglhsél bp ngufbbpká ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; y bfl timfl ng Ppkóe kfripkáe ls lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk pbkgngnfk. 9 Y ngb lprkicirif ng hpz fckgrgká hfk fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá bp ukflskp, bp rfbp geqgkp, bp rspb jsiqpká p kpíz ngb glhiepzf, bp ukflskp jsg rsakg qfnfl bfl ieqglqiefl, y qfnp bp jsg glqá lfakg bpl geqkpñpl. 10 Plidildf bfl nfl kiñfegl y bp ukflskp jsg glqá lfakg gbbfl, y bp jsg glqá lfakg bfl impkgl; y rfe bfl kiñfegl jsiqpká bp ukflskp ng lfakg gb tíupnf. 11 Y gb lprgknfqg tpká pkngk glqf lfakg gb pbqpk; vipenp gl ng fckgenp gergeninp hpkp Mgtfvá. 

12 Li csgkg rpakp ls fckgenp, bp fckgrgká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 13 Hfenká ls dpef lfakg bp rpagzp ng gbbp, y bp ngufbbpká ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; y bfl timfl ng Ppkóe kfripkáe ls lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk pbkgngnfk. 14 Nglhsél fckgrgká ng gbbp ls fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá; bp ukflskp jsg rsakg bfl ieqglqiefl, y qfnp bp ukflskp jsg glqá lfakg bpl geqkpñpl, 15 bfl nfl kiñfegl, bp ukflskp jsg glqá lfakg gbbfl, y bp jsg glqá lfakg bfl impkgl; y rfe bfl kiñfegl jsiqpká bp ukflskp ng lfakg gb tíupnf. 16 Y gb lprgknfqg tpká pkngk glqf lfakg gb pbqpk; vipenp gl ng fckgenp jsg lg jsgdp ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá; qfnp bp ukflskp gl ng Mgtfvá. 17 Glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf lgká hfk vsglqkpl gnpngl, nfengjsigkp jsg tpaiqéil, jsg eieusep ukflskp ei eieusep lpeukg rfdgkéil. 

Fckgenpl hfk gb hgrpnf

BGVÍQIRF 4

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Rspenf pbusep hgklfep hgrpkg hfk ygkkf ge pbusef ng bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá lfakg rflpl jsg ef lg tpe ng tprgk, g tirigkg pbusep ng gbbpl; 3 li gb lprgknfqg seuinf hgrpkg lguúe gb hgrpnf ngb hsgabf, fckgrgká p Mgtfvá, hfk ls hgrpnf jsg tpaká rfdgqinf, se agrgkkf lie ngcgrqf hpkp gxhiprióe. 4 Qkpgká gb agrgkkf p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y hfenká ls dpef lfakg bp rpagzp ngb agrgkkf, y bf ngufbbpká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 5 Y gb lprgknfqg seuinf qfdpká ng bp lpeukg ngb agrgkkf, y bp qkpgká pb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; 6 y dfmpká gb lprgknfqg ls ngnf ge bp lpeukg, y kfripká ng pjsgbbp lpeukg ligqg vgrgl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, tprip gb vgbf ngb lpeqspkif. 7 Y gb lprgknfqg hfenká ng glp lpeukg lfakg bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk ngb ierigelf pkfdáqirf, jsg glqá ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; y grtpká gb kglqf ng bp lpeukg ngb agrgkkf pb hig ngb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, jsg glqá p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 8 Y qfdpká ngb agrgkkf hpkp bp gxhiprióe qfnp ls ukflskp, bp jsg rsakg bfl ieqglqiefl, y bp jsg glqá lfakg bpl geqkpñpl, 9 bfl nfl kiñfegl, bp ukflskp jsg glqá lfakg gbbfl, y bp jsg glqá lfakg bfl impkgl; y rfe bfl kiñfegl jsiqpká bp ukflskp ng lfakg gb tíupnf, 10 ng bp dpegkp jsg lg jsiqp ngb asgy ngb lprkicirif ng hpz; y gb lprgknfqg bp tpká pkngk lfakg gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf. 11 Y bp higb ngb agrgkkf, y qfnp ls rpkeg, rfe ls rpagzp, lsl higkepl, lsl ieqglqiefl y ls glqiékrfb, 12 ge cie, qfnf gb agrgkkf lprpká csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf p se bsupk bidhif, nfeng lg grtpe bpl rgeizpl, y bf jsgdpká pb csguf lfakg bp bgñp; ge nfeng lg grtpe bpl rgeizpl lgká jsgdpnf. 

13 Li qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb tsaigkg gkkpnf, y gb ygkkf glqsvigkg frsbqf p bfl fmfl ngb hsgabf, y tsaigkge tgrtf pbuf rfeqkp pbusef ng bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá ge rflpl jsg ef lg tpe ng tprgk, y csgkge rsbhpabgl; 14 bsguf jsg bbgusg p lgk rfefrinf gb hgrpnf jsg rfdgqigkge, bp rfeukguprióe fckgrgká se agrgkkf hfk gxhiprióe, y bf qkpgkáe ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 15 Y bfl peripefl ng bp rfeukguprióe hfenkáe lsl dpefl lfakg bp rpagzp ngb agrgkkf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y ge hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá ngufbbpkáe pjsgb agrgkkf. 16 Y gb lprgknfqg seuinf dgqgká ng bp lpeukg ngb agrgkkf ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, 17 y dfmpká gb lprgknfqg ls ngnf ge bp dildp lpeukg, y kfripká ligqg vgrgl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá tprip gb vgbf. 18 Y ng pjsgbbp lpeukg hfenká lfakg bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y ngkkpdpká gb kglqf ng bp lpeukg pb hig ngb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, jsg glqá p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 19 Y bg jsiqpká qfnp bp ukflskp y bp tpká pkngk lfakg gb pbqpk. 20 Y tpká ng pjsgb agrgkkf rfdf tizf rfe gb agrgkkf ng bp gxhiprióe; bf dildf tpká ng éb; plí tpká gb lprgknfqg gxhiprióe hfk gbbfl, y faqgenkáe hgknóe. 21 Y lprpká gb agrgkkf csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf, y bf jsgdpká rfdf jsgdó gb hkidgk agrgkkf; gxhiprióe gl hfk bp rfeukguprióe. 

22 Rspenf hgrpkg se mgcg, g tirigkg hfk ygkkf pbuf rfeqkp pbusef ng qfnfl bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl lfakg rflpl jsg ef lg tpe ng tprgk, y hgrpkg; 23 bsguf jsg rfefrigkg ls hgrpnf jsg rfdgqió, hkglgeqpká hfk ls fckgenp se dprtf rpakíf lie ngcgrqf. 24 Y hfenká ls dpef lfakg bp rpagzp ngb dprtf rpakíf, y bf ngufbbpká ge gb bsupk nfeng lg nguügbbp gb tfbfrpslqf, ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; gl gxhiprióe. 25 Y rfe ls ngnf gb lprgknfqg qfdpká ng bp lpeukg ng bp gxhiprióe, y bp hfenká lfakg bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, y ngkkpdpká gb kglqf ng bp lpeukg pb hig ngb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, 26 y jsgdpká qfnp ls ukflskp lfakg gb pbqpk, rfdf bp ukflskp ngb lprkicirif ng hpz; plí gb lprgknfqg tpká hfk éb bp gxhiprióe ng ls hgrpnf, y qgenká hgknóe. 

27 Li pbusep hgklfep ngb hsgabf hgrpkg hfk ygkkf, tprigenf pbuf rfeqkp pbusef ng bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá ge rflpl jsg ef lg tpe ng tprgk, y ngbiejsigkg; 28 bsguf jsg rfefrigkg ls hgrpnf jsg rfdgqió, qkpgká hfk ls fckgenp sep rpakp, sep rpakp lie ngcgrqf, hfk ls hgrpnf jsg rfdgqió. 29 Y hfenká ls dpef lfakg bp rpagzp ng bp fckgenp ng bp gxhiprióe, y bp ngufbbpká ge gb bsupk ngb tfbfrpslqf. 30 Bsguf rfe ls ngnf gb lprgknfqg qfdpká ng bp lpeukg, y bp hfenká lfakg bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, y ngkkpdpká gb kglqf ng bp lpeukg pb hig ngb pbqpk. 31 Y bg jsiqpká qfnp ls ukflskp, ng bp dpegkp jsg csg jsiqpnp bp ukflskp ngb lprkicirif ng hpz; y gb lprgknfqg bp tpká pkngk lfakg gb pbqpk ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá; plí tpká gb lprgknfqg gxhiprióe hfk éb, y lgká hgknfepnf. 

32 Y li hfk ls fckgenp hfk gb hgrpnf qkpmgkg rfkngkf, tgdakp lie ngcgrqf qkpgká. 33 Y hfenká ls dpef lfakg bp rpagzp ng bp fckgenp ng gxhiprióe, y bp ngufbbpká hfk gxhiprióe ge gb bsupk nfeng lg nguügbbp gb tfbfrpslqf. 34 Nglhsél rfe ls ngnf gb lprgknfqg qfdpká ng bp lpeukg ng bp gxhiprióe, y bp hfenká lfakg bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, y ngkkpdpká gb kglqf ng bp lpeukg pb hig ngb pbqpk. 35 Y bg jsiqpká qfnp ls ukflskp, rfdf csg jsiqpnp bp ukflskp ngb lprkicirif ng hpz, y gb lprgknfqg bp tpká pkngk ge gb pbqpk lfakg bp fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá; y bg tpká gb lprgknfqg gxhiprióe ng ls hgrpnf jsg tpaká rfdgqinf, y lgká hgknfepnf. 

BGVÍQIRF 5

1 Li pbusef hgrpkg hfk tpagk linf bbpdpnf p qglqicirpk, y csgkg qglqiuf jsg vif, f lshf, y ef bf ngeseripkg, éb bbgvpká ls hgrpnf. 2 Plidildf bp hgklfep jsg tsaigkg qfrpnf rspbjsigkp rflp iedsenp, lgp rpnávgk ng aglqip iedsenp, f rpnávgk ng peidpb iedsenf, f rpnávgk ng kghqib iedsenf, aige jsg ef bf lshigkg, lgká iedsenp y tpaká ngbiejsinf. 3 F li qfrpkg iedsenirip ng tfdakg, rspbjsigkp iedsenirip lsyp rfe jsg csgkg iedsenf, y ef bf grtpkg ng vgk, li nglhsél bbgupkg p lpagkbf, lgká rsbhpabg. 4 F li pbusef mskpkg p bp biugkp rfe lsl bpaifl tprgk dpb f tprgk aige, ge rspbjsigkp rflp jsg gb tfdakg hkfcigkg rfe mskpdgeqf, y éb ef bf geqgenigkg; li nglhsél bf geqigeng, lgká rsbhpabg hfk rspbjsigkp ng glqpl rflpl. 5 Rspenf hgrpkg ge pbusep ng glqpl rflpl, rfecglpká pjsgbbf ge jsg hgró, 6 y hpkp ls gxhiprióe qkpgká p Mgtfvá hfk ls hgrpnf jsg rfdgqió, sep tgdakp ng bfl kgapñfl, sep rfkngkp f sep rpakp rfdf fckgenp ng gxhiprióe; y gb lprgknfqg bg tpká gxhiprióe hfk ls hgrpnf. 

7 Y li ef qsvigkg bf lscirigeqg hpkp se rfkngkf, qkpgká p Mgtfvá ge gxhiprióe hfk ls hgrpnf jsg rfdgqió, nfl qókqfbpl f nfl hpbfdiefl, gb sef hpkp gxhiprióe, y gb fqkf hpkp tfbfrpslqf. 8 Y bfl qkpgká pb lprgknfqg, gb rspb fckgrgká hkidgkf gb jsg gl hpkp gxhiprióe; y bg pkkperpká ng ls rsgbbf bp rpagzp, dpl ef bp lghpkpká hfk rfdhbgqf. 9 Y kfripká ng bp lpeukg ng bp gxhiprióe lfakg bp hpkgn ngb pbqpk; y bf jsg lfakpkg ng bp lpeukg bf gxhkidiká pb hig ngb pbqpk; gl gxhiprióe. 10 Y ngb fqkf tpká tfbfrpslqf rfecfkdg pb kiqf; plí gb lprgknfqg tpká gxhiprióe hfk gb hgrpnf ng pjsgb jsg bf rfdgqió, y lgká hgknfepnf. 

11 Dpl li ef qsvigkg bf lscirigeqg hpkp nfl qókqfbpl, f nfl hpbfdiefl, gb jsg hgró qkpgká rfdf fckgenp bp néridp hpkqg ng se gcp ng cbfk ng tpkiep hpkp gxhiprióe. Ef hfenká lfakg gbbp prgiqg, ei lfakg gbbp hfenká ierigelf, hfkjsg gl gxhiprióe. 12 Bp qkpgká, hsgl, pb lprgknfqg, y gb lprgknfqg qfdpká ng gbbp ls hsñf bbgef, hpkp dgdfkip ng éb, y bp tpká pkngk ge gb pbqpk lfakg bpl fckgenpl gergeninpl p Mgtfvá; gl gxhiprióe. 13 Y tpká gb lprgknfqg gxhiprióe hfk éb ge rspeqf pb hgrpnf jsg rfdgqió ge pbusep ng glqpl rflpl, y lgká hgknfepnf; y gb lfakpeqg lgká ngb lprgknfqg, rfdf bp fckgenp ng vipenp. 

Fckgenpl gxhipqfkipl

14 Tpabó dál Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 15 Rspenf pbusep hgklfep rfdgqigkg cpbqp, y hgrpkg hfk ygkkf ge bpl rflpl lpeqpl ng Mgtfvá, qkpgká hfk ls rsbhp p Mgtfvá se rpkegkf lie ngcgrqf ng bfl kgapñfl, rfecfkdg p qs glqidprióe ge lirbfl ng hbpqp ngb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, ge fckgenp hfk gb hgrpnf. 16 Y hpupká bf jsg tsaigkg ngckpsnpnf ng bpl rflpl lpeqpl, y pñpniká p gbbf bp jsieqp hpkqg, y bf npká pb lprgknfqg; y gb lprgknfqg tpká gxhiprióe hfk éb rfe gb rpkegkf ngb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf, y lgká hgknfepnf. 

17 Ciepbdgeqg, li sep hgklfep hgrpkg, f tirigkg pbusep ng qfnpl pjsgbbpl rflpl jsg hfk dpenpdigeqf ng Mgtfvá ef lg tpe ng tprgk, pse lie tprgkbf p lpaigenpl, gl rsbhpabg, y bbgvpká ls hgrpnf. 18 Qkpgká, hsgl, pb lprgknfqg hpkp gxhiprióe, lguúe qú bf glqidgl, se rpkegkf lie ngcgrqf ng bfl kgapñfl; y gb lprgknfqg bg tpká gxhiprióe hfk gb ygkkf jsg rfdgqió hfk iuefkperip, y lgká hgknfepnf. 19 Gl ieckprrióe, y rigkqpdgeqg ngbiejsió rfeqkp Mgtfvá. 

BGVÍQIRF 6

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Rspenf sep hgklfep hgrpkg g tirigkg hkgvpkirprióe rfeqkp Mgtfvá, y egupkg p ls hkómidf bf gerfdgenpnf f ngmpnf ge ls dpef, f aige kfapkg f rpbsdeipkg p ls hkómidf, 3 f tpaigenf tpbbpnf bf hgkninf nglhsél bf egupkg, y mskpkg ge cpblf; ge pbusep ng qfnpl pjsgbbpl rflpl ge jsg lsgbg hgrpk gb tfdakg, 4 geqfergl, tpaigenf hgrpnf y fcgeninf, kglqiqsiká pjsgbbf jsg kfaó, f gb npñf ng bp rpbsdeip, f gb nghóliqf jsg lg bg gerfdgenó, f bf hgkninf jsg tpbbó, 5 f qfnf pjsgbbf lfakg jsg tsaigkg mskpnf cpblpdgeqg; bf kglqiqsiká hfk geqgkf p pjsgb p jsige hgkqgegrg, y pñpniká p gbbf bp jsieqp hpkqg, ge gb níp ng ls gxhiprióe. 6 Y hpkp gxhiprióe ng ls rsbhp qkpgká p Mgtfvá se rpkegkf lie ngcgrqf ng bfl kgapñfl, rfecfkdg p qs glqidprióe, y bf npká pb lprgknfqg hpkp bp gxhiprióe. 7 Y gb lprgknfqg tpká gxhiprióe hfk éb ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y faqgenká hgknóe ng rspbjsigkp ng qfnpl bpl rflpl ge jsg lsgbg fcgengk. 

Bgygl ng bfl lprkicirifl

8 Tpabó púe Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 9 Dpenp p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, y nibgl: Glqp gl bp bgy ngb tfbfrpslqf: gb tfbfrpslqf glqpká lfakg gb csguf gergeninf lfakg gb pbqpk qfnp bp efrtg, tplqp bp dpñpep; gb csguf ngb pbqpk pkngká ge éb. 10 Y gb lprgknfqg lg hfenká ls vglqinskp ng bief, y vglqiká rpbzferibbfl ng bief lfakg ls rsgkhf; y rspenf gb csguf tsaigkg rfelsdinf gb tfbfrpslqf, phpkqpká éb bpl rgeizpl ng lfakg gb pbqpk, y bpl hfenká mseqf pb pbqpk. 11 Nglhsél lg jsiqpká lsl vglqinskpl y lg hfenká fqkpl kfhpl, y lprpká bpl rgeizpl csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf p se bsupk bidhif. 12 Y gb csguf gergeninf lfakg gb pbqpk ef lg phpupká, lief jsg gb lprgknfqg hfenká ge éb bgñp rpnp dpñpep, y prfdfnpká gb tfbfrpslqf lfakg éb, y jsgdpká lfakg éb bpl ukflskpl ng bfl lprkicirifl ng hpz. 13 Gb csguf pkngká rfeqiespdgeqg ge gb pbqpk; ef lg phpupká. 

14 Glqp gl bp bgy ng bp fckgenp: Bp fckgrgkáe bfl timfl ng Ppkóe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá peqg gb pbqpk. 15 Y qfdpká ng gbbp se hsñpnf ng bp cbfk ng tpkiep ng bp fckgenp, y ng ls prgiqg, y qfnf gb ierigelf jsg glqá lfakg bp fckgenp, y bf tpká pkngk lfakg gb pbqpk hfk dgdfkipb ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá. 16 Y gb lfakpeqg ng gbbp bf rfdgkáe Ppkóe y lsl timfl; lie bgvpnskp lg rfdgká ge bsupk lpeqf; ge gb pqkif ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe bf rfdgkáe. 17 Ef lg rfrgká rfe bgvpnskp; bp tg npnf p gbbfl hfk ls hfkrióe ng dil fckgenpl gergeninpl; gl rflp lpeqílidp, rfdf gb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf, y rfdf gb lprkicirif hfk bp rsbhp. 18 Qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng bfl timfl ng Ppkóe rfdgkáe ng gbbp. Glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf lgká hpkp vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl qfrpeqg p bpl fckgenpl gergeninpl hpkp Mgtfvá; qfnp rflp jsg qfrpkg ge gbbpl lgká lpeqicirpnp. 

19 Tpabó qpdaiée Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 20 Glqp gl bp fckgenp ng Ppkóe y ng lsl timfl, jsg fckgrgkáe p Mgtfvá gb níp jsg csgkge seuinfl: bp néridp hpkqg ng se gcp ng cbfk ng tpkiep, fckgenp hgkhgqsp, bp diqpn p bp dpñpep y bp diqpn p bp qpkng. 21 Ge lpkqée lg hkghpkpká rfe prgiqg; ckiqp bp qkpgkál, y bfl hgnpzfl rfrinfl ng bp fckgenp fckgrgkál ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá. 22 Y gb lprgknfqg jsg ge bsupk ng Ppkóe csgkg seuinf ng geqkg lsl timfl, tpká iuspb fckgenp. Gl glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf ng Mgtfvá; qfnp gbbp lgká jsgdpnp. 23 Qfnp fckgenp ng lprgknfqg lgká geqgkpdgeqg jsgdpnp; ef lg rfdgká. 

24 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 25 Tpabp p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, y nibgl: Glqp gl bp bgy ngb lprkicirif gxhipqfkif: ge gb bsupk nfeng lg nguügbbp gb tfbfrpslqf, lgká ngufbbpnp bp fckgenp hfk gb hgrpnf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; gl rflp lpeqílidp. 26 Gb lprgknfqg jsg bp fckgrigkg hfk gb hgrpnf, bp rfdgká; ge bsupk lpeqf lgká rfdinp, ge gb pqkif ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 27 Qfnf bf jsg qfrpkg ls rpkeg, lgká lpeqicirpnf; y li lpbhirpkg ls lpeukg lfakg gb vglqinf, bpvpkál pjsgbbf lfakg jsg rpygkg, ge bsupk lpeqf. 28 Y bp vplimp ng apkkf ge jsg csgkg rfrinp, lgká jsgakpnp; y li csgkg rfrinp ge vplimp ng akferg, lgká ckgupnp y bpvpnp rfe pusp. 29 Qfnf vpkóe ng geqkg bfl lprgknfqgl bp rfdgká; gl rflp lpeqílidp. 30 Dpl ef lg rfdgká eieusep fckgenp ng rsyp lpeukg lg dgqigkg ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe hpkp tprgk gxhiprióe ge gb lpeqspkif; pb csguf lgká jsgdpnp. 

BGVÍQIRF 7

1 Plidildf glqp gl bp bgy ngb lprkicirif hfk bp rsbhp; gl rflp dsy lpeqp. 2 Ge gb bsupk nfeng nguügbbpe gb tfbfrpslqf, ngufbbpkáe bp vírqidp hfk bp rsbhp; y kfripká ls lpeukg pbkgngnfk lfakg gb pbqpk. 3 Y ng gbbp fckgrgká qfnp ls ukflskp, bp rfbp, y bp ukflskp jsg rsakg bfl ieqglqiefl, 4 bfl nfl kiñfegl, bp ukflskp jsg glqá lfakg gbbfl, y bp jsg glqá lfakg bfl impkgl; y rfe bfl kiñfegl jsiqpká bp ukflskp ng lfakg gb tíupnf. 5 Y gb lprgknfqg bf tpká pkngk lfakg gb pbqpk, fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá; gl gxhiprióe ng bp rsbhp. 6 Qfnf vpkóe ng geqkg bfl lprgknfqgl bp rfdgká; lgká rfdinp ge bsupk lpeqf; gl rflp dsy lpeqp. 7 Rfdf gb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf, plí gl gb lprkicirif hfk bp rsbhp; sep dildp bgy qgenkáe; lgká ngb lprgknfqg jsg tirigkg bp gxhiprióe rfe gbbp. 8 Y gb lprgknfqg jsg fckgrigkg tfbfrpslqf ng pbusef, bp higb ngb tfbfrpslqf jsg fckgrigkg lgká hpkp éb. 9 Plidildf qfnp fckgenp jsg lg rfrigkg ge tfkef, y qfnf bf jsg csgkg hkghpkpnf ge lpkqée f ge rpzsgbp, lgká ngb lprgknfqg jsg bf fckgrigkg. 10 Y qfnp fckgenp pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, f lgrp, lgká ng qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ppkóe, qpeqf ng sef rfdf ng fqkf. 

11 Y glqp gl bp bgy ngb lprkicirif ng hpz jsg lg fckgrgká p Mgtfvá: 12 Li lg fckgrigkg ge prrióe ng ukpripl, fckgrgká hfk lprkicirif ng prrióe ng ukpripl qfkqpl lie bgvpnskp pdplpnpl rfe prgiqg, y tfmpbnkgl lie bgvpnskp seqpnpl rfe prgiqg, y cbfk ng tpkiep ckiqp ge qfkqpl pdplpnpl rfe prgiqg. 13 Rfe qfkqpl ng hpe bgsnf hkglgeqpká ls fckgenp ge gb lprkicirif ng prrifegl ng ukpripl ng hpz. 14 Y ng qfnp bp fckgenp hkglgeqpká sep hpkqg hfk fckgenp gbgvpnp p Mgtfvá, y lgká ngb lprgknfqg jsg kfripkg bp lpeukg ng bfl lprkicirifl ng hpz. 15 Y bp rpkeg ngb lprkicirif ng hpz ge prrióe ng ukpripl lg rfdgká ge gb níp jsg csgkg fckgrinp; ef ngmpkáe ng gbbp epnp hpkp fqkf níp. 16 Dpl li gb lprkicirif ng ls fckgenp csgkg vfqf, f vfbseqpkif, lgká rfdinf ge gb níp jsg fckgrigkg ls lprkicirif, y bf jsg ng éb jsgnpkg, bf rfdgkáe pb níp liusigeqg; 17 y bf jsg jsgnpkg ng bp rpkeg ngb lprkicirif tplqp gb qgkrgk níp, lgká jsgdpnf ge gb csguf. 18 Li lg rfdigkg ng bp rpkeg ngb lprkicirif ng hpz pb qgkrgk níp, gb jsg bf fckgrigkg ef lgká prghqf, ei bg lgká rfeqpnf; pafdieprióe lgká, y bp hgklfep jsg ng éb rfdigkg bbgvpká ls hgrpnf. 

19 Y bp rpkeg jsg qfrpkg pbusep rflp iedsenp, ef lg rfdgká; pb csguf lgká jsgdpnp. Qfnp hgklfep bidhip hfnká rfdgk bp rpkeg; 20 hgkf bp hgklfep jsg rfdigkg bp rpkeg ngb lprkicirif ng hpz, gb rspb gl ng Mgtfvá, glqpenf iedsenp, pjsgbbp hgklfep lgká rfkqpnp ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 21 Pngdál, bp hgklfep jsg qfrpkg pbusep rflp iedsenp, iedsenirip ng tfdakg, f peidpb iedsenf, f rspbjsigk pafdieprióe iedsenp, y rfdigkg bp rpkeg ngb lprkicirif ng hpz, gb rspb gl ng Mgtfvá, pjsgbbp hgklfep lgká rfkqpnp ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 

22 Tpabó dál Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 23 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Eieusep ukflskp ng asgy ei ng rfkngkf ei ng rpakp rfdgkéil. 24 Bp ukflskp ng peidpb dsgkqf, y bp ukflskp ngb jsg csg nglhgnpzpnf hfk cigkpl, lg nilhfenká hpkp rspbjsigk fqkf slf, dpl ef bp rfdgkéil. 25 Hfkjsg rspbjsigkp jsg rfdigkg ukflskp ng peidpb, ngb rspb lg fckgrg p Mgtfvá fckgenp gergeninp, bp hgklfep jsg bf rfdigkg lgká rfkqpnp ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 26 Pngdál, eieusep lpeukg rfdgkéil ge eieuúe bsupk ge nfeng tpaiqéil, ei ng pvgl ei ng aglqipl. 27 Rspbjsigkp hgklfep jsg rfdigkg ng pbusep lpeukg, bp qpb hgklfep lgká rfkqpnp ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 

28 Tpabó dál Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 29 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Gb jsg fckgrigkg lprkicirif ng hpz p Mgtfvá, qkpgká ls fckgenp ngb lprkicirif ng hpz peqg Mgtfvá. 30 Lsl dpefl qkpgkáe bpl fckgenpl jsg lg tpe ng jsgdpk peqg Mgtfvá; qkpgká bp ukflskp rfe gb hgrtf; gb hgrtf hpkp jsg lgp dgrinf rfdf lprkicirif dgrinf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 31 Y bp ukflskp bp tpká pkngk gb lprgknfqg ge gb pbqpk, dpl gb hgrtf lgká ng Ppkóe y ng lsl timfl. 32 Y npkéil pb lprgknfqg hpkp lgk gbgvpnp ge fckgenp, bp glhpbnibbp ngkgrtp ng vsglqkfl lprkicirifl ng hpz. 33 Gb jsg ng bfl timfl ng Ppkóe fckgrigkg bp lpeukg ng bfl lprkicirifl ng hpz, y bp ukflskp, kgriaiká bp glhpbnibbp ngkgrtp rfdf hfkrióe lsyp. 34 Hfkjsg tg qfdpnf ng bfl lprkicirifl ng hpz ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb gb hgrtf jsg lg dgrg y bp glhpbnibbp gbgvpnp ge fckgenp, y bf tg npnf p Ppkóe gb lprgknfqg y p lsl timfl, rfdf glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 35 Glqp gl bp hfkrióe ng Ppkóe y bp hfkrióe ng lsl timfl, ng bpl fckgenpl gergeninpl p Mgtfvá, nglng gb níp jsg éb bfl rfelpukó hpkp lgk lprgknfqgl ng Mgtfvá, 36 bp rspb dpenó Mgtfvá jsg bgl niglge, nglng gb níp jsg éb bfl seuió ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rfdf glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf ge lsl ugegkprifegl. 

37 Glqp gl bp bgy ngb tfbfrpslqf, ng bp fckgenp, ngb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf, ngb lprkicirif hfk bp rsbhp, ng bpl rfelpukprifegl y ngb lprkicirif ng hpz, 38 bp rspb dpenó Mgtfvá p Dfilél ge gb dfeqg ng Liepí, gb níp jsg dpenó p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg fckgriglge lsl fckgenpl p Mgtfvá, ge gb ngligkqf ng Liepí. 

Rfelpukprióe ng Ppkóe y ng lsl timfl

(Gx. 29.1-37)

BGVÍQIRF 8

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Qfdp p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl rfe éb, y bpl vglqinskpl, gb prgiqg ng bp serióe, gb agrgkkf ng bp gxhiprióe, bfl nfl rpkegkfl, y gb rpeplqibbf ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp; 3 y kgúeg qfnp bp rfeukguprióe p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 4 Tizf, hsgl, Dfilél rfdf Mgtfvá bg dpenó, y lg kgseió bp rfeukguprióe p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 

5 Y nimf Dfilél p bp rfeukguprióe: Glqf gl bf jsg Mgtfvá tp dpenpnf tprgk. 6 Geqfergl Dfilél tizf prgkrpklg p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, y bfl bpvó rfe pusp. 7 Y hslf lfakg éb bp qúeirp, y bg riñó rfe gb rieqf; bg vilqió nglhsél gb dpeqf, y hslf lfakg éb gb gcfn, y bf riñó rfe gb rieqf ngb gcfn, y bf pmslqó rfe éb. 8 Bsguf bg hslf geridp gb hgrqfkpb, y hslf ngeqkf ngb dildf bfl Skid y Qsdid. 9 Nglhsél hslf bp diqkp lfakg ls rpagzp, y lfakg bp diqkp, ge ckgeqg, hslf bp bádiep ng fkf, bp nipngdp lpeqp, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

10 Y qfdó Dfilél gb prgiqg ng bp serióe y seuió gb qpagkeársbf y qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg glqpape ge éb, y bpl lpeqiciró. 11 Y kfrió ng éb lfakg gb pbqpk ligqg vgrgl, y seuió gb pbqpk y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, y bp csgeqg y ls aplg, hpkp lpeqicirpkbfl. 12 Y ngkkpdó ngb prgiqg ng bp serióe lfakg bp rpagzp ng Ppkóe, y bf seuió hpkp lpeqicirpkbf. 13 Nglhsél Dfilél tizf prgkrpklg bfl timfl ng Ppkóe, y bgl vilqió bpl qúeirpl, bgl riñó rfe rieqfl, y bgl pmslqó bpl qipkpl, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

14 Bsguf tizf qkpgk gb agrgkkf ng bp gxhiprióe, y Ppkóe y lsl timfl hsligkfe lsl dpefl lfakg bp rpagzp ngb agrgkkf ng bp gxhiprióe, 15 y bf ngufbbó; y Dfilél qfdó bp lpeukg, y hslf rfe ls ngnf lfakg bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk pbkgngnfk, y hskiciró gb pbqpk; y grtó bp ngdál lpeukg pb hig ngb pbqpk, y bf lpeqiciró hpkp kgrferibipk lfakg éb. 16 Nglhsél qfdó qfnp bp ukflskp jsg glqpap lfakg bfl ieqglqiefl, y bp ukflskp ngb tíupnf, y bfl nfl kiñfegl, y bp ukflskp ng gbbfl, y bf tizf pkngk Dfilél lfakg gb pbqpk. 17 Dpl gb agrgkkf, ls higb, ls rpkeg y ls glqiékrfb, bf jsgdó pb csguf csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

18 Nglhsél tizf jsg qkpmgkpe gb rpkegkf ngb tfbfrpslqf, y Ppkóe y lsl timfl hsligkfe lsl dpefl lfakg bp rpagzp ngb rpkegkf; 19 y bf ngufbbó; y kfrió Dfilél bp lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk pbkgngnfk, 20 y rfkqó gb rpkegkf ge qkfzfl; y Dfilél tizf pkngk bp rpagzp, y bfl qkfzfl, y bp ukflskp. 21 Bpvó bsguf rfe pusp bfl ieqglqiefl y bpl higkepl, y jsgdó Dfilél qfnf gb rpkegkf lfakg gb pbqpk; tfbfrpslqf ng fbfk ukpqf, fckgenp gergeninp hpkp Mgtfvá, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

22 Nglhsél tizf jsg qkpmgkpe gb fqkf rpkegkf, gb rpkegkf ng bpl rfelpukprifegl, y Ppkóe y lsl timfl hsligkfe lsl dpefl lfakg bp rpagzp ngb rpkegkf. 23 Y bf ngufbbó; y qfdó Dfilél ng bp lpeukg, y bp hslf lfakg gb bóasbf ng bp fkgmp ngkgrtp ng Ppkóe, lfakg gb ngnf hsbupk ng ls dpef ngkgrtp, y lfakg gb ngnf hsbupk ng ls hig ngkgrtf. 24 Tizf prgkrpklg bsguf bfl timfl ng Ppkóe, y hslf Dfilél ng bp lpeukg lfakg gb bóasbf ng lsl fkgmpl ngkgrtpl, lfakg bfl hsbupkgl ng lsl dpefl ngkgrtpl, y lfakg bfl hsbupkgl ng lsl higl ngkgrtfl; y kfrió Dfilél bp lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk pbkgngnfk. 

25 Nglhsél qfdó bp ukflskp, bp rfbp, qfnp bp ukflskp jsg glqpap lfakg bfl ieqglqiefl, bp ukflskp ngb tíupnf, bfl nfl kiñfegl y bp ukflskp ng gbbfl, y bp glhpbnibbp ngkgrtp. 26 Y ngb rpeplqibbf ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp, jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, qfdó sep qfkqp lie bgvpnskp, y sep qfkqp ng hpe ng prgiqg, y sep tfmpbnkg, y bf hslf rfe bp ukflskp y rfe bp glhpbnibbp ngkgrtp. 27 Y bf hslf qfnf ge bpl dpefl ng Ppkóe, y ge bpl dpefl ng lsl timfl, g tizf dgrgkbf rfdf fckgenp dgrinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 28 Nglhsél qfdó pjsgbbpl rflpl Dfilél ng bpl dpefl ng gbbfl, y bpl tizf pkngk ge gb pbqpk lfakg gb tfbfrpslqf; gkpe bpl rfelpukprifegl ge fbfk ukpqf, fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá. 29 Y qfdó Dfilél gb hgrtf, y bf dgrió, fckgenp dgrinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; ngb rpkegkf ng bpl rfelpukprifegl pjsgbbp csg bp hpkqg ng Dfilél, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

30 Bsguf qfdó Dfilél ngb prgiqg ng bp serióe, y ng bp lpeukg jsg glqpap lfakg gb pbqpk, y kfrió lfakg Ppkóe, y lfakg lsl vglqinskpl, lfakg lsl timfl, y lfakg bpl vglqinskpl ng lsl timfl rfe éb; y lpeqiciró p Ppkóe y lsl vglqinskpl, y p lsl timfl y bpl vglqinskpl ng lsl timfl rfe éb. 

31 Y nimf Dfilél p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl: Tgkvin bp rpkeg p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; y rfdgnbp pbbí rfe gb hpe jsg glqá ge gb rpeplqibbf ng bpl rfelpukprifegl, lguúe yf tg dpenpnf, nirigenf: Ppkóe y lsl timfl bp rfdgkáe. 32 Y bf jsg lfakg ng bp rpkeg y ngb hpe, bf jsgdpkéil pb csguf. 33 Ng bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe ef lpbnkéil ge ligqg nípl, tplqp gb níp jsg lg rsdhbpe bfl nípl ng vsglqkpl rfelpukprifegl; hfkjsg hfk ligqg nípl lgkéil rfelpukpnfl. 34 Ng bp dpegkp jsg tfy lg tp tgrtf, dpenó tprgk Mgtfvá hpkp gxhipkfl. 35 P bp hsgkqp, hsgl, ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe glqpkéil níp y efrtg hfk ligqg nípl, y uspknpkéil bp fkngepezp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg ef dskáil; hfkjsg plí dg tp linf dpenpnf. 36 Y Ppkóe y lsl timfl tirigkfe qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg dpenó Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng Dfilél. 

Bfl lprkicirifl ng Ppkóe

BGVÍQIRF 9

1 Ge gb níp frqpvf, Dfilél bbpdó p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, y p bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb; 2 y nimf p Ppkóe: Qfdp ng bp vprpnp se agrgkkf hpkp gxhiprióe, y se rpkegkf hpkp tfbfrpslqf, lie ngcgrqf, y fckérgbfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 3 Y p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpabpkál nirigenf: Qfdpn se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe, y se agrgkkf y se rfkngkf ng se pñf, lie ngcgrqf, hpkp tfbfrpslqf. 4 Plidildf se asgy y se rpkegkf hpkp lprkicirif ng hpz, jsg iedfbéil ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y sep fckgenp pdplpnp rfe prgiqg; hfkjsg Mgtfvá lg phpkgrgká tfy p vflfqkfl. 5 Y bbgvpkfe bf jsg dpenó Dfilél ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y vief qfnp bp rfeukguprióe y lg hslf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 6 Geqfergl Dfilél nimf: Glqf gl bf jsg dpenó Mgtfvá; tprgnbf, y bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá lg fl phpkgrgká. 7 Y nimf Dfilél p Ppkóe: Prékrpqg pb pbqpk, y tpz qs gxhiprióe y qs tfbfrpslqf, y tpz bp kgrferibiprióe hfk qi y hfk gb hsgabf; tpz qpdaiée bp fckgenp ngb hsgabf, y tpz bp kgrferibiprióe hfk gbbfl, rfdf tp dpenpnf Mgtfvá. 

8 Geqfergl lg prgkró Ppkóe pb pbqpk y ngufbbó gb agrgkkf ng bp gxhiprióe jsg gkp hfk éb. 9 Y bfl timfl ng Ppkóe bg qkpmgkfe bp lpeukg; y éb dfmó ls ngnf ge bp lpeukg, y hslf ng gbbp lfakg bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk, y ngkkpdó gb kglqf ng bp lpeukg pb hig ngb pbqpk. 10 G tizf pkngk lfakg gb pbqpk bp ukflskp rfe bfl kiñfegl y bp ukflskp ngb tíupnf ng bp gxhiprióe, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 11 Dpl bp rpkeg y bp higb bpl jsgdó pb csguf csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 

12 Ngufbbó plidildf gb tfbfrpslqf, y bfl timfl ng Ppkóe bg hkglgeqpkfe bp lpeukg, bp rspb kfrió éb pbkgngnfk lfakg gb pbqpk. 13 Nglhsél bg hkglgeqpkfe gb tfbfrpslqf higzp hfk higzp, y bp rpagzp; y bf tizf jsgdpk lfakg gb pbqpk. 14 Bsguf bpvó bfl ieqglqiefl y bpl higkepl, y bfl jsgdó lfakg gb tfbfrpslqf ge gb pbqpk. 

15 Fckgrió qpdaiée bp fckgenp ngb hsgabf, y qfdó gb dprtf rpakíf jsg gkp hpkp bp gxhiprióe ngb hsgabf, y bf ngufbbó, y bf fckgrió hfk gb hgrpnf rfdf gb hkidgkf. 16 Y fckgrió gb tfbfrpslqf, g tizf lguúe gb kiqf. 17 Fckgrió plidildf bp fckgenp, y bbgeó ng gbbp ls dpef, y bp tizf jsgdpk lfakg gb pbqpk, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf ng bp dpñpep. 

18 Ngufbbó qpdaiée gb asgy y gb rpkegkf ge lprkicirif ng hpz, jsg gkp ngb hsgabf; y bfl timfl ng Ppkóe bg hkglgeqpkfe bp lpeukg, bp rspb kfrió éb lfakg gb pbqpk pbkgngnfk; 19 y bpl ukflskpl ngb asgy y ngb rpkegkf, bp rfbp, bp ukflskp jsg rsakg bfl ieqglqiefl, bfl kiñfegl, y bp ukflskp ngb tíupnf; 20 y hsligkfe bpl ukflskpl lfakg bfl hgrtfl, y éb bpl jsgdó lfakg gb pbqpk. 21 Hgkf bfl hgrtfl, rfe bp glhpbnibbp ngkgrtp, bfl dgrió Ppkóe rfdf fckgenp dgrinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

22 Nglhsél pbzó Ppkóe lsl dpefl tprip gb hsgabf y bf agenimf; y nglhsél ng tprgk bp gxhiprióe, gb tfbfrpslqf y gb lprkicirif ng hpz, nglrgenió. 23 Y geqkpkfe Dfilél y Ppkóe ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y lpbigkfe y agenimgkfe pb hsgabf; y bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá lg phpkgrió p qfnf gb hsgabf. 24 Y lpbió csguf ng ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y rfelsdió gb tfbfrpslqf rfe bpl ukflskpl lfakg gb pbqpk; y viéenfbf qfnf gb hsgabf, pbpapkfe, y lg hflqkpkfe lfakg lsl kflqkfl. 

Gb hgrpnf ng Epnpa y Paiú

BGVÍQIRF 10

1 Epnpa y Paiú, timfl ng Ppkóe, qfdpkfe rpnp sef ls iergelpkif, y hsligkfe ge gbbfl csguf, lfakg gb rspb hsligkfe ierigelf, y fckgrigkfe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá csguf gxqkpñf, jsg éb eserp bgl dpenó. 2 Y lpbió csguf ng ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá y bfl jsgdó, y dskigkfe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 3 Geqfergl nimf Dfilél p Ppkóe: Glqf gl bf jsg tpabó Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Ge bfl jsg p dí lg prgkrpe dg lpeqicirpké, y ge hkglgerip ng qfnf gb hsgabf lgké ubfkicirpnf. Y Ppkóe rpbbó. 

4 Y bbpdó Dfilél p Dilpgb y p Gbzpcáe, timfl ng Szigb qíf ng Ppkóe, y bgl nimf: Prgkrpfl y lprpn p vsglqkfl tgkdpefl ng ngbpeqg ngb lpeqspkif, csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 5 Y gbbfl lg prgkrpkfe y bfl lprpkfe rfe lsl qúeirpl csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf, rfdf nimf Dfilél. 6 Geqfergl Dfilél nimf p Ppkóe, y p Gbgpzpk g Iqpdpk lsl timfl: Ef nglrsakáil vsglqkpl rpagzpl, ei kpluséil vsglqkfl vglqinfl ge lgñpb ng nsgbf, hpkp jsg ef dskáil, ei lg bgvpeqg bp ikp lfakg qfnp bp rfeukguprióe; hgkf vsglqkfl tgkdpefl, qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, lí bpdgeqpkáe hfk gb iergenif jsg Mgtfvá tp tgrtf. 7 Ei lpbnkéil ng bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, hfkjsg dfkikéil; hfk rspeqf gb prgiqg ng bp serióe ng Mgtfvá glqá lfakg vflfqkfl. Y gbbfl tirigkfe rfecfkdg pb nirtf ng Dfilél. 

8 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Ppkóe, nirigenf: 9 Qú, y qsl timfl rfeqiuf, ef agagkéil vief ei linkp rspenf geqkéil ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, hpkp jsg ef dskáil; glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf lgká hpkp vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl, 10 hpkp hfngk nilrgkeik geqkg bf lpeqf y bf hkfcpef, y geqkg bf iedsenf y bf bidhif, 11 y hpkp gelgñpk p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qfnfl bfl glqpqsqfl jsg Mgtfvá bgl tp nirtf hfk dgnif ng Dfilél. 

12 Y Dfilél nimf p Ppkóe, y p Gbgpzpk y p Iqpdpk lsl timfl jsg tpaípe jsgnpnf: Qfdpn bp fckgenp jsg jsgnp ng bpl fckgenpl gergeninpl p Mgtfvá, y rfdgnbp lie bgvpnskp mseqf pb pbqpk, hfkjsg gl rflp dsy lpeqp. 13 Bp rfdgkéil, hsgl, ge bsupk lpeqf; hfkjsg glqf gl hpkp qi y hpkp qsl timfl, ng bpl fckgenpl gergeninpl p Mgtfvá, hsgl jsg plí dg tp linf dpenpnf. 14 Rfdgkéil plidildf ge bsupk bidhif, qú y qsl timfl y qsl timpl rfeqiuf, gb hgrtf dgrinf y bp glhpbnibbp gbgvpnp, hfkjsg hfk ngkgrtf lfe qsyfl y ng qsl timfl, npnfl ng bfl lprkicirifl ng hpz ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 15 Rfe bpl fckgenpl ng bpl ukflskpl jsg lg tpe ng jsgdpk, qkpgkáe bp glhpbnibbp jsg lg tp ng gbgvpk y gb hgrtf jsg lgká dgrinf rfdf fckgenp dgrinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; y lgká hfk ngkgrtf hgkhgqsf qsyf y ng qsl timfl, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tp dpenpnf. 

16 Y Dfilél hkguseqó hfk gb dprtf rpakíf ng bp gxhiprióe, y lg tpbbó jsg tpaíp linf jsgdpnf; y lg gefmó rfeqkp Gbgpzpk g Iqpdpk, bfl timfl jsg tpaípe jsgnpnf ng Ppkóe, nirigenf: 17 ¿Hfk jsé ef rfdilqgil bp gxhiprióe ge bsupk lpeqf? Hsgl gl dsy lpeqp, y bp nif éb p vflfqkfl hpkp bbgvpk bp ieijsinpn ng bp rfeukguprióe, hpkp jsg lgpe kgrferibipnfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 18 Vgn jsg bp lpeukg ef csg bbgvpnp ngeqkf ngb lpeqspkif; y vflfqkfl ngaípil rfdgk bp fckgenp ge gb bsupk lpeqf, rfdf yf dpené. 19 Y kglhfenió Ppkóe p Dfilél: Tg pjsí tfy tpe fckgrinf ls gxhiprióe y ls tfbfrpslqf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; hgkf p dí dg tpe lsrgninf glqpl rflpl, y li tsaigkp yf rfdinf tfy ngb lprkicirif ng gxhiprióe, ¿lgkíp glqf ukpqf p Mgtfvá? 20 Y rspenf Dfilél fyó glqf, lg nif hfk lpqilcgrtf. 

Peidpbgl bidhifl g iedsenfl

(Nq. 14.3-21)

BGVÍQIRF 11

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, niriéenfbgl: 2 Tpabpn p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y ngrinbgl: Glqfl lfe bfl peidpbgl jsg rfdgkéil ng geqkg qfnfl bfl peidpbgl jsg tpy lfakg bp qigkkp. 3 Ng geqkg bfl peidpbgl, qfnf gb jsg qigeg hgzsñp tgeninp y jsg ksdip, élqg rfdgkéil. 4 Hgkf ng bfl jsg ksdipe f jsg qigege hgzsñp, ef rfdgkéil élqfl: gb rpdgbbf, hfkjsg ksdip hgkf ef qigeg hgzsñp tgeninp, bf qgenkéil hfk iedsenf. 5 Qpdaiée gb rfegmf, hfkjsg ksdip, hgkf ef qigeg hgzsñp, bf qgenkéil hfk iedsenf. 6 Plidildf bp bigakg, hfkjsg ksdip, hgkf ef qigeg hgzsñp, bp qgenkéil hfk iedsenp. 7 Qpdaiée gb rgknf, hfkjsg qigeg hgzsñpl, y gl ng hgzsñpl tgeninpl, hgkf ef ksdip, bf qgenkéil hfk iedsenf. 8 Ng bp rpkeg ng gbbfl ef rfdgkéil, ei qfrpkéil ls rsgkhf dsgkqf; bfl qgenkéil hfk iedsenfl. 

9 Glqf rfdgkéil ng qfnfl bfl peidpbgl jsg vivge ge bpl puspl: qfnfl bfl jsg qigege pbgqpl y glrpdpl ge bpl puspl ngb dpk, y ge bfl kífl, glqfl rfdgkéil. 10 Hgkf qfnfl bfl jsg ef qigege pbgqpl ei glrpdpl ge gb dpk y ge bfl kífl, plí ng qfnf bf jsg lg dsgvg rfdf ng qfnp rflp vivigeqg jsg glqá ge bpl puspl, bfl qgenkéil ge pafdieprióe. 11 Fl lgkáe, hsgl, pafdieprióe; ng ls rpkeg ef rfdgkéil, y pafdiepkéil lsl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl. 12 Qfnf bf jsg ef qsvigkg pbgqpl y glrpdpl ge bpl puspl, bf qgenkéil ge pafdieprióe. 

13 Y ng bpl pvgl, élqpl qgenkéil ge pafdieprióe; ef lg rfdgkáe, lgkáe pafdieprióe: gb áusibp, gb jsgakpeqptsglfl, gb pzfk, 14 gb upbbiepzf, gb dibpef lguúe ls glhgrig; 15 qfnf rsgkvf lguúe ls glhgrig; 16 gb pvglqksz, bp bgrtszp, bp upvifqp, gb upvibáe lguúe ls glhgrig; 17 gb astf, gb lfdfkdsmf, gb iail, 18 gb rpbpdóe, gb hgbírpef, gb asiqkg, 19 bp riuügñp, bp upkzp lguúe ls glhgrig, bp pasaibbp y gb dskriébpuf. 

20 Qfnf ielgrqf pbpnf jsg pensvigkg lfakg rspqkf hpqpl, qgenkéil ge pafdieprióe. 21 Hgkf glqf rfdgkéil ng qfnf ielgrqf pbpnf jsg penp lfakg rspqkf hpqpl, jsg qsvigkg higkepl pngdál ng lsl hpqpl hpkp lpbqpk rfe gbbpl lfakg bp qigkkp; 22 glqfl rfdgkéil ng gbbfl: bp bpeuflqp lguúe ls glhgrig, gb bpeuflqíe lguúe ls glhgrig, gb pkufb lguúe ls glhgrig, y gb tpupa lguúe ls glhgrig. 23 Qfnf ielgrqf pbpnf jsg qgeup rspqkf hpqpl, qgenkéil ge pafdieprióe. 

24 Y hfk glqpl rflpl lgkéil iedsenfl; rspbjsigkp jsg qfrpkg lsl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg, 25 y rspbjsigkp jsg bbgvpkg pbuf ng lsl rpnávgkgl bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 26 Qfnf peidpb ng hgzsñp, hgkf jsg ef qigeg hgzsñp tgeninp, ei ksdip, qgenkéil hfk iedsenf; y rspbjsigkp jsg bfl qfrpkg lgká iedsenf. 27 Y ng qfnfl bfl peidpbgl jsg penpe ge rspqkf hpqpl, qgenkéil hfk iedsenf p rspbjsigkp jsg peng lfakg lsl upkkpl; y qfnf gb jsg qfrpkg lsl rpnávgkgl lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 28 Y gb jsg bbgvpkg lsl rpnávgkgl, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg; bfl qgenkéil hfk iedsenfl. 

29 Y qgenkéil hfk iedsenfl p glqfl peidpbgl jsg lg dsgvge lfakg bp qigkkp: bp rfdpnkgmp, gb kpqóe, bp kpep lguúe ls glhgrig, 30 gb gkizf, gb rfrfnkibf, gb bpupkqf, bp bpupkqimp y gb rpdpbgóe. 31 Glqfl qgenkéil hfk iedsenfl ng geqkg bfl peidpbgl jsg lg dsgvge, y rspbjsigkp jsg bfl qfrpkg rspenf glqsvigkge dsgkqfl lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 32 Y qfnf pjsgbbf lfakg jsg rpygkg pbuf ng gbbfl nglhsél ng dsgkqfl, lgká iedsenf; lgp rflp ng dpngkp, vglqinf, higb, lprf, lgp rspbjsigk ielqksdgeqf rfe jsg lg qkpapmp, lgká dgqinf ge pusp, y jsgnpká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg; geqfergl jsgnpká bidhif. 33 Qfnp vplimp ng apkkf ngeqkf ng bp rspb rpygkg pbusef ng gbbfl lgká iedsenp, plí rfdf qfnf bf jsg glqsvigkg ge gbbp, y jsgakpkéil bp vplimp. 34 Qfnf pbidgeqf jsg lg rfdg, lfakg gb rspb rpygkg gb pusp ng qpbgl vplimpl, lgká iedsenf; y qfnp againp jsg tsaigkg ge glpl vplimpl lgká iedsenp. 35 Qfnf pjsgbbf lfakg jsg rpygkg pbuf ngb rpnávgk ng gbbfl lgká iedsenf; gb tfkef s tfkeibbfl lg ngkkiapkáe; lfe iedsenfl, y hfk iedsenfl bfl qgenkéil. 36 Rfe qfnf, bp csgeqg y bp rilqgkep nfeng lg kgrfuge puspl lgkáe bidhipl; dpl bf jsg tsaigkg qfrpnf ge bfl rpnávgkgl lgká iedsenf. 37 Y li rpygkg pbuf ng bfl rpnávgkgl lfakg pbusep lgdibbp jsg lg tpyp ng lgdakpk, lgká bidhip. 38 Dpl li lg tsaigkg hsglqf pusp ge bp lgdibbp, y rpygkg pbuf ng bfl rpnávgkgl lfakg gbbp, bp qgenkéil hfk iedsenp. 

39 Y li pbuúe peidpb jsg qsvigkgil hpkp rfdgk dskigkg, gb jsg qfrpkg ls rpnávgk lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 40 Y gb jsg rfdigkg ngb rsgkhf dsgkqf, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg; plidildf gb jsg lprpkg gb rsgkhf dsgkqf, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 

41 Y qfnf kghqib jsg lg pkkplqkp lfakg bp qigkkp gl pafdieprióe; ef lg rfdgká. 42 Qfnf bf jsg penp lfakg gb hgrtf, y qfnf bf jsg penp lfakg rspqkf f dál hpqpl, ng qfnf peidpb jsg lg pkkplqkp lfakg bp qigkkp, ef bf rfdgkéil, hfkjsg gl pafdieprióe. 43 Ef tpuáil pafdiepabgl vsglqkpl hgklfepl rfe eieuúe peidpb jsg lg pkkplqkp, ei fl rfeqpdieéil rfe gbbfl, ei lgáil iedsenfl hfk gbbfl. 44 Hfkjsg yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; vflfqkfl hfk qpeqf fl lpeqicirpkéil, y lgkéil lpeqfl, hfkjsg yf lfy lpeqf; plí jsg ef rfeqpdieéil vsglqkpl hgklfepl rfe eieuúe peidpb jsg lg pkkplqkg lfakg bp qigkkp. 45 Hfkjsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, jsg fl tpuf lsaik ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf hpkp lgk vsglqkf Nifl: lgkéil, hsgl, lpeqfl, hfkjsg yf lfy lpeqf. 

46 Glqp gl bp bgy prgkrp ng bpl aglqipl, y bpl pvgl, y qfnf lgk vivigeqg jsg lg dsgvg ge bpl puspl, y qfnf peidpb jsg lg pkkplqkp lfakg bp qigkkp, 47 hpkp tprgk nicgkgerip geqkg bf iedsenf y bf bidhif, y geqkg bfl peidpbgl jsg lg hsgnge rfdgk y bfl peidpbgl jsg ef lg hsgnge rfdgk. 

Bp hskicirprióe ng bp dsmgk nglhsél ngb hpkqf

BGVÍQIRF 12

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Bp dsmgk rspenf rferiap y né p bsz vpkóe, lgká iedsenp ligqg nípl; rfecfkdg p bfl nípl ng ls dgelqksprióe lgká iedsenp. 3 Y pb frqpvf níp lg rikrserinpká pb eiñf. 4 Dpl gbbp hgkdpegrgká qkgieqp y qkgl nípl hskiciráenflg ng ls lpeukg; eieusep rflp lpeqp qfrpká, ei vgenká pb lpeqspkif, tplqp rspenf lgpe rsdhbinfl bfl nípl ng ls hskicirprióe. 5 Y li nigkg p bsz timp, lgká iedsenp nfl lgdpepl, rfecfkdg p ls lghpkprióe, y lglgeqp y lgil nípl glqpká hskiciráenflg ng ls lpeukg. 

6 Rspenf bfl nípl ng ls hskicirprióe csgkge rsdhbinfl, hfk timf f hfk timp, qkpgká se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf, y se hpbfdief f sep qókqfbp hpkp gxhiprióe, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, pb lprgknfqg; 7 y éb bfl fckgrgká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y tpká gxhiprióe hfk gbbp, y lgká bidhip ngb cbsmf ng ls lpeukg.
