Glqp gl bp bgy hpkp bp jsg nigkg p bsz timf f timp. 8 Y li ef qigeg bf lscirigeqg hpkp se rfkngkf, qfdpká geqfergl nfl qókqfbpl f nfl hpbfdiefl, sef hpkp tfbfrpslqf y fqkf hpkp gxhiprióe; y gb lprgknfqg tpká gxhiprióe hfk gbbp, y lgká bidhip. 

Bgygl prgkrp ng bp bghkp

BGVÍQIRF 13

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, nirigenf: 2 Rspenf gb tfdakg qsvigkg ge bp higb ng ls rsgkhf tiertpzóe, f gkshrióe, f dpertp abperp, y tsaigkg ge bp higb ng ls rsgkhf rfdf bbpup ng bghkp, lgká qkpínf p Ppkóe gb lprgknfqg f p sef ng lsl timfl bfl lprgknfqgl. 3 Y gb lprgknfqg dikpká bp bbpup ge bp higb ngb rsgkhf; li gb hgbf ge bp bbpup lg tp vsgbqf abperf, y hpkgrigkg bp bbpup dál hkfcsenp jsg bp higb ng bp rpkeg, bbpup ng bghkp gl; y gb lprgknfqg bg kgrfefrgká, y bg ngrbpkpká iedsenf. 4 Y li ge bp higb ng ls rsgkhf tsaigkg dpertp abperp, hgkf jsg ef hpkgrigkg dál hkfcsenp jsg bp higb, ei gb hgbf lg tsaigkg vsgbqf abperf, geqfergl gb lprgknfqg gergkkpká pb bbpupnf hfk ligqg nípl. 5 Y pb léhqidf níp gb lprgknfqg bf dikpká; y li bp bbpup rfelgkvp gb dildf plhgrqf, ef tpaiéenflg gxqgeninf ge bp higb, geqfergl gb lprgknfqg bg vfbvgká p gergkkpk hfk fqkfl ligqg nípl. 6 Y pb léhqidf níp gb lprgknfqg bg kgrfefrgká ng esgvf; y li hpkgrg tpagklg flrskgrinf bp bbpup, y jsg ef tp rseninf ge bp higb, geqfergl gb lprgknfqg bf ngrbpkpká bidhif: gkp gkshrióe; y bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y lgká bidhif. 7 Hgkf li lg gxqgenigkg bp gkshrióe ge bp higb nglhsél jsg éb lg dflqkó pb lprgknfqg hpkp lgk bidhif, ngagká dflqkpklg fqkp vgz pb lprgknfqg. 8 Y li kgrfefriéenfbf gb lprgknfqg vg jsg bp gkshrióe lg tp gxqgeninf ge bp higb, bf ngrbpkpká iedsenf: gl bghkp. 

9 Rspenf tsaigkg bbpup ng bghkp ge gb tfdakg, lgká qkpínf pb lprgknfqg. 10 Y élqg bf dikpká, y li phpkgrigkg qsdfk abperf ge bp higb, gb rspb tpyp dsnpnf gb rfbfk ngb hgbf, y lg nglrsakg plidildf bp rpkeg vivp, 11 gl bghkp rkóeirp ge bp higb ng ls rsgkhf; y bg ngrbpkpká iedsenf gb lprgknfqg, y ef bg gergkkpká, hfkjsg gl iedsenf. 12 Dpl li akfqpkg bp bghkp rsenigenf hfk bp higb, ng dfnf jsg rsakigkg qfnp bp higb ngb bbpupnf nglng bp rpagzp tplqp lsl higl, tplqp nfeng hsgnp vgk gb lprgknfqg, 13 geqfergl élqg bg kgrfefrgká; y li bp bghkp tsaigkg rsaigkqf qfnf ls rsgkhf, ngrbpkpká bidhif pb bbpupnf; qfnp gbbp lg tp vsgbqf abperp, y éb gl bidhif. 14 Dpl gb níp jsg phpkgrigkg ge éb bp rpkeg vivp, lgká iedsenf. 15 Y gb lprgknfqg dikpká bp rpkeg vivp, y bf ngrbpkpká iedsenf. Gl iedsenp bp rpkeg vivp; gl bghkp. 16 Dpl rspenf bp rpkeg vivp rpdaipkg y lg vfbvigkg abperp, geqfergl vgenká pb lprgknfqg, 17 y gb lprgknfqg dikpká; y li bp bbpup lg tsaigkg vsgbqf abperp, gb lprgknfqg ngrbpkpká bidhif pb jsg qgeíp bp bbpup, y lgká bidhif. 

18 Y rspenf ge bp higb ng bp rpkeg tsaigkg niviglf, y lg lpepkg, 19 y ge gb bsupk ngb niviglf tsaigkg sep tiertpzóe, f sep dpertp abperp kfmizp, lgká dflqkpnf pb lprgknfqg. 20 Y gb lprgknfqg dikpká; y li hpkgrigkg glqpk dál hkfcsenp jsg bp higb, y ls hgbf lg tsaigkg vsgbqf abperf, gb lprgknfqg bf ngrbpkpká iedsenf; gl bbpup ng bghkp jsg lg fkiuieó ge gb niviglf. 21 Y li gb lprgknfqg bp rfelingkpkg, y ef phpkgrigkg ge gbbp hgbf abperf, ei csgkg dál hkfcsenp jsg bp higb, lief flrskp, geqfergl gb lprgknfqg bg gergkkpká hfk ligqg nípl; 22 y li lg csgkg gxqgenigenf hfk bp higb, geqfergl gb lprgknfqg bf ngrbpkpká iedsenf; gl bbpup. 23 Hgkf li bp dpertp abperp lg glqsvigkg ge ls bsupk, y ef lg tsaigkg gxqgeninf, gl bp rirpqkiz ngb niviglf, y gb lprgknfqg bf ngrbpkpká bidhif. 

24 Plidildf rspenf tsaigkg ge bp higb ngb rsgkhf jsgdpnskp ng csguf, y tsaigkg ge bf lpepnf ngb csguf dpertp abpejsgriep, kfmizp f abperp, 25 gb lprgknfqg bp dikpká; y li gb hgbf lg tsaigkg vsgbqf abperf ge bp dpertp, y élqp hpkgrigkg lgk dál hkfcsenp jsg bp higb, gl bghkp jsg lpbió ge bp jsgdpnskp; y gb lprgknfqg bf ngrbpkpká iedsenf, hfk lgk bbpup ng bghkp. 26 Dpl li gb lprgknfqg bp dikpkg, y ef phpkgrigkg ge bp dpertp hgbf abperf, ei csgkg dál hkfcsenp jsg bp higb, lief jsg glqsvigkg flrskp, bg gergkkpká gb lprgknfqg hfk ligqg nípl. 27 Y pb léhqidf níp gb lprgknfqg bp kgrfefrgká; y li lg tsaigkg inf gxqgenigenf hfk bp higb, gb lprgknfqg bf ngrbpkpká iedsenf; gl bbpup ng bghkp. 28 Hgkf li bp dpertp lg glqsvigkg ge ls bsupk, y ef lg tsaigkg gxqgeninf ge bp higb, lief jsg glqsvigkg flrskp, gl bp rirpqkiz ng bp jsgdpnskp; gb lprgknfqg bf ngrbpkpká bidhif, hfkjsg lgñpb ng bp jsgdpnskp gl. 

29 Y pb tfdakg f dsmgk jsg bg lpbigkg bbpup ge bp rpagzp, f ge bp apkap, 30 gb lprgknfqg dikpká bp bbpup; y li hpkgrigkg lgk dál hkfcsenp jsg bp higb, y gb hgbf ng gbbp csgkg pdpkibbgeqf y ngbupnf, geqfergl gb lprgknfqg bg ngrbpkpká iedsenf; gl qiñp, gl bghkp ng bp rpagzp f ng bp apkap. 31 Dpl rspenf gb lprgknfqg tsaigkg dikpnf bp bbpup ng bp qiñp, y ef hpkgrigkg lgk dál hkfcsenp jsg bp higb, ei tsaigkg ge gbbp hgbf egukf, gb lprgknfqg gergkkpká hfk ligqg nípl pb bbpupnf ng bp qiñp; 32 y pb léhqidf níp gb lprgknfqg dikpká bp bbpup; y li bp qiñp ef hpkgrigkg tpagklg gxqgeninf, ei tsaigkg ge gbbp hgbf pdpkibbgeqf, ei hpkgrigkg bp qiñp dál hkfcsenp jsg bp higb, 33 geqfergl bg tpká jsg lg kplskg, hgkf ef kplskpká gb bsupk pcgrqpnf; y gb lprgknfqg gergkkpká hfk fqkfl ligqg nípl pb jsg qigeg bp qiñp. 34 Y pb léhqidf níp dikpká gb lprgknfqg bp qiñp; y li bp qiñp ef tsaigkg rseninf ge bp higb, ei hpkgrigkg lgk dál hkfcsenp jsg bp higb, gb lprgknfqg bf ngrbpkpká bidhif; y bpvpká lsl vglqinfl y lgká bidhif. 35 Hgkf li bp qiñp lg tsaigkg inf gxqgenigenf ge bp higb nglhsél ng ls hskicirprióe, 36 geqfergl gb lprgknfqg bp dikpká; y li bp qiñp tsaigkg rseninf ge bp higb, ef asljsg gb lprgknfqg gb hgbf pdpkibbgeqf; gl iedsenf. 37 Dpl li bg hpkgrigkg jsg bp qiñp glqá ngqgeinp, y jsg tp lpbinf ge gbbp gb hgbf egukf, bp qiñp glqá lpepnp; éb glqá bidhif, y bidhif bf ngrbpkpká gb lprgknfqg. 

38 Plidildf rspenf gb tfdakg f bp dsmgk qsvigkg ge bp higb ng ls rsgkhf dpertpl, dpertpl abperpl, 39 gb lprgknfqg dikpká, y li ge bp higb ng ls rsgkhf phpkgrigkge dpertpl abperpl pbuf flrskgrinpl, gl gdhgieg jsg akfqó ge bp higb; glqá bidhip bp hgklfep. 

40 Y gb tfdakg, rspenf lg bg rpygkg gb rpagbbf, gl rpbvf, hgkf bidhif. 41 Y li tprip ls ckgeqg lg bg rpygkg gb rpagbbf, gl rpbvf hfk ngbpeqg, hgkf bidhif. 42 Dpl rspenf ge bp rpbvp f ge bp peqgrpbvp tsaigkg bbpup abperp kfmizp, bghkp gl jsg akfqp ge ls rpbvp f ge ls peqgrpbvp. 43 Geqfergl gb lprgknfqg bf dikpká, y li hpkgrigkg bp tiertpzóe ng bp bbpup abperp kfmizp ge ls rpbvp f ge ls peqgrpbvp, rfdf gb hpkgrgk ng bp bghkp ng bp higb ngb rsgkhf, 44 bghkflf gl, gl iedsenf, y gb lprgknfqg bf ngrbpkpká bsguf iedsenf; ge ls rpagzp qigeg bp bbpup. 

45 Y gb bghkflf ge jsige tsaigkg bbpup bbgvpká vglqinfl kplupnfl y ls rpagzp nglrsaigkqp, y gdafzpnf hkgufepká: ¡Iedsenf! ¡iedsenf! 46 Qfnf gb qigdhf jsg bp bbpup glqsvigkg ge éb, lgká iedsenf; glqpká idhskf, y tpaiqpká lfbf; csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf lgká ls dfkpnp. 

47 Rspenf ge se vglqinf tsaigkg hbpup ng bghkp, yp lgp vglqinf ng bpep, f ng bief, 48 f ge sknidakg f ge qkpdp ng bief f ng bpep, f ge rsgkf, f ge rspbjsigkp fakp ng rsgkf; 49 y bp hbpup csgkg vgknflp, f kfmizp, ge vglqinf f ge rsgkf, ge sknidakg f ge qkpdp, f ge rspbjsigkp fakp ng rsgkf; hbpup gl ng bghkp, y lg tp ng dflqkpk pb lprgknfqg. 50 Y gb lprgknfqg dikpká bp hbpup, y gergkkpká bp rflp hbpupnp hfk ligqg nípl. 51 Y pb léhqidf níp dikpká bp hbpup; y li lg tsaigkg gxqgeninf bp hbpup ge gb vglqinf, ge bp sknidakg f ge bp qkpdp, ge gb rsgkf, f ge rspbjsigkp fakp jsg lg tprg ng rsgkf, bghkp dpbiuep gl bp hbpup; iedsenp lgká. 52 Lgká jsgdpnf gb vglqinf, bp sknidakg f qkpdp ng bpep f ng bief, f rspbjsigkp fakp ng rsgkf ge jsg tsaigkg qpb hbpup, hfkjsg bghkp dpbiuep gl; pb csguf lgká jsgdpnp. 

53 Y li gb lprgknfqg dikpkg, y ef hpkgrigkg jsg bp hbpup lg tpyp gxqgeninf ge gb vglqinf, ge bp sknidakg f ge bp qkpdp, f ge rspbjsigkp fakp ng rsgkf, 54 geqfergl gb lprgknfqg dpenpká jsg bpvge nfeng glqá bp hbpup, y bf gergkkpká fqkp vgz hfk ligqg nípl. 55 Y gb lprgknfqg dikpká nglhsél jsg bp hbpup csgkg bpvpnp; y li hpkgrigkg jsg bp hbpup ef tp rpdaipnf ng plhgrqf, psejsg ef lg tpyp gxqgeninf bp hbpup, iedsenp gl; bp jsgdpkál pb csguf; gl rfkkflióe hgegqkpeqg, glqé bf kpínf ge gb ngkgrtf f ge gb kgvél ng pjsgbbp rflp. 

56 Dpl li gb lprgknfqg bp vigkg, y hpkgrigkg jsg bp hbpup lg tp flrskgrinf nglhsél jsg csg bpvpnp, bp rfkqpká ngb vglqinf, ngb rsgkf, ng bp sknidakg f ng bp qkpdp. 57 Y li phpkgrigkg ng esgvf ge gb vglqinf, bp sknidakg f qkpdp, f ge rspbjsigkp rflp ng rsgkf, gxqgeniéenflg ge gbbfl, jsgdpkál pb csguf pjsgbbf ge jsg glqsvigkg bp hbpup. 58 Hgkf gb vglqinf, bp sknidakg f bp qkpdp, f rspbjsigkp rflp ng rsgkf jsg bpvpkgl, y jsg lg bg jsiqpkg bp hbpup, lg bpvpká lgusenp vgz, y geqfergl lgká bidhip. 

59 Glqp gl bp bgy hpkp bp hbpup ng bp bghkp ngb vglqinf ng bpep f ng bief, f ng sknidakg f ng qkpdp, f ng rspbjsigkp rflp ng rsgkf, hpkp jsg lgp ngrbpkpnp bidhip f iedsenp. 

BGVÍQIRF 14

1 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Glqp lgká bp bgy hpkp gb bghkflf rspenf lg bidhipkg: Lgká qkpínf pb lprgknfqg, 3 y élqg lpbnká csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf y bf gxpdiepká; y li vg jsg glqá lpep bp hbpup ng bp bghkp ngb bghkflf, 4 gb lprgknfqg dpenpká bsguf jsg lg qfdge hpkp gb jsg lg hskicirp nfl pvgribbpl vivpl, bidhipl, y dpngkp ng rgnkf, ukpep g tilfhf. 5 Y dpenpká gb lprgknfqg dpqpk sep pvgribbp ge se vplf ng apkkf lfakg puspl rfkkigeqgl. 6 Nglhsél qfdpká bp pvgribbp vivp, gb rgnkf, bp ukpep y gb tilfhf, y bfl dfmpká rfe bp pvgribbp vivp ge bp lpeukg ng bp pvgribbp dsgkqp lfakg bpl puspl rfkkigeqgl; 7 y kfripká ligqg vgrgl lfakg gb jsg lg hskicirp ng bp bghkp, y bg ngrbpkpká bidhif; y lfbqpká bp pvgribbp vivp ge gb rpdhf. 8 Y gb jsg lg hskicirp bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y kpgká qfnf ls hgbf, y lg bpvpká rfe pusp, y lgká bidhif; y nglhsél geqkpká ge gb rpdhpdgeqf, y dfkpká csgkp ng ls qigenp ligqg nípl. 9 Y gb léhqidf níp kpgká qfnf gb hgbf ng ls rpagzp, ls apkap y bpl rgmpl ng lsl fmfl y qfnf ls hgbf, y bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y bpvpká ls rsgkhf ge pusp, y lgká bidhif. 

10 Gb níp frqpvf qfdpká nfl rfkngkfl lie ngcgrqf, y sep rfkngkp ng se pñf lie qprtp, y qkgl néridpl ng gcp ng cbfk ng tpkiep hpkp fckgenp pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, y se bfu ng prgiqg. 11 Y gb lprgknfqg jsg bg hskicirp hkglgeqpká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá pb jsg lg tp ng bidhipk, rfe pjsgbbpl rflpl, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; 12 y qfdpká gb lprgknfqg se rfkngkf y bf fckgrgká hfk bp rsbhp, rfe gb bfu ng prgiqg, y bf dgrgká rfdf fckgenp dgrinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 13 Y ngufbbpká gb rfkngkf ge gb bsupk nfeng lg nguügbbp gb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf y gb tfbfrpslqf, ge gb bsupk ngb lpeqspkif; hfkjsg rfdf bp vírqidp hfk gb hgrpnf, plí qpdaiée bp vírqidp hfk bp rsbhp gl ngb lprgknfqg; gl rflp dsy lpukpnp. 14 Y gb lprgknfqg qfdpká ng bp lpeukg ng bp vírqidp hfk bp rsbhp, y bp hfenká gb lprgknfqg lfakg gb bóasbf ng bp fkgmp ngkgrtp ngb jsg lg hskicirp, lfakg gb hsbupk ng ls dpef ngkgrtp y lfakg gb hsbupk ng ls hig ngkgrtf. 15 Plidildf gb lprgknfqg qfdpká ngb bfu ng prgiqg, y bf grtpká lfakg bp hpbdp ng ls dpef izjsigknp, 16 y dfmpká ls ngnf ngkgrtf ge gb prgiqg jsg qigeg ge ls dpef izjsigknp, y glhpkriká ngb prgiqg rfe ls ngnf ligqg vgrgl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 17 Y ng bf jsg jsgnpkg ngb prgiqg jsg qigeg ge ls dpef, hfenká gb lprgknfqg lfakg gb bóasbf ng bp fkgmp ngkgrtp ngb jsg lg hskicirp, lfakg gb hsbupk ng ls dpef ngkgrtp y lfakg gb hsbupk ng ls hig ngkgrtf, geridp ng bp lpeukg ngb lprkicirif hfk bp rsbhp. 18 Y bf jsg jsgnpkg ngb prgiqg jsg qigeg ge ls dpef, bf hfenká lfakg bp rpagzp ngb jsg lg hskicirp; y tpká gb lprgknfqg gxhiprióe hfk éb ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 19 Fckgrgká bsguf gb lprgknfqg gb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf, y tpká gxhiprióe hfk gb jsg lg tp ng hskicirpk ng ls iedsenirip; y nglhsél ngufbbpká gb tfbfrpslqf, 20 y tpká lsaik gb lprgknfqg gb tfbfrpslqf y bp fckgenp lfakg gb pbqpk. Plí tpká gb lprgknfqg gxhiprióe hfk éb, y lgká bidhif. 

21 Dpl li csgkg hfakg, y ef qsvigkg hpkp qpeqf, geqfergl qfdpká se rfkngkf hpkp lgk fckgrinf rfdf fckgenp dgrinp hfk bp rsbhp, hpkp kgrferibipklg, y sep néridp ng gcp ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp, y se bfu ng prgiqg, 22 y nfl qókqfbpl f nfl hpbfdiefl, lguúe hsgnp; sef lgká hpkp gxhiprióe hfk gb hgrpnf, y gb fqkf hpkp tfbfrpslqf. 23 Pb frqpvf níp ng ls hskicirprióe qkpgká glqpl rflpl pb lprgknfqg, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 24 Y gb lprgknfqg qfdpká gb rfkngkf ng bp gxhiprióe hfk bp rsbhp, y gb bfu ng prgiqg, y bfl dgrgká gb lprgknfqg rfdf fckgenp dgrinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 25 Bsguf ngufbbpká gb rfkngkf ng bp rsbhp, y gb lprgknfqg qfdpká ng bp lpeukg ng bp rsbhp, y bp hfenká lfakg gb bóasbf ng bp fkgmp ngkgrtp ngb jsg lg hskicirp, lfakg gb hsbupk ng ls dpef ngkgrtp y lfakg gb hsbupk ng ls hig ngkgrtf. 26 Y gb lprgknfqg grtpká ngb prgiqg lfakg bp hpbdp ng ls dpef izjsigknp; 27 y rfe ls ngnf ngkgrtf gb lprgknfqg kfripká ngb prgiqg jsg qigeg ge ls dpef izjsigknp, ligqg vgrgl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 28 Qpdaiée gb lprgknfqg hfenká ngb prgiqg jsg qigeg ge ls dpef lfakg gb bóasbf ng bp fkgmp ngkgrtp ngb jsg lg hskicirp, lfakg gb hsbupk ng ls dpef ngkgrtp y lfakg gb hsbupk ng ls hig ngkgrtf, ge gb bsupk ng bp lpeukg ng bp rsbhp. 29 Y bf jsg lfakg ngb prgiqg jsg gb lprgknfqg qigeg ge ls dpef, bf hfenká lfakg bp rpagzp ngb jsg lg hskicirp, hpkp kgrferibipkbf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 30 Plidildf fckgrgká sep ng bpl qókqfbpl f sef ng bfl hpbfdiefl, lguúe hsgnp. 31 Sef ge lprkicirif ng gxhiprióe hfk gb hgrpnf, y gb fqkf ge tfbfrpslqf, pngdál ng bp fckgenp; y tpká gb lprgknfqg gxhiprióe hfk gb jsg lg tp ng hskicirpk, ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 32 Glqp gl bp bgy hpkp gb jsg tsaigkg qgeinf hbpup ng bghkp, y ef qsvigkg dál hpkp ls hskicirprióe. 

33 Tpabó qpdaiée Mgtfvá p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, nirigenf: 34 Rspenf tpyáil geqkpnf ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, bp rspb yf fl nfy ge hflglióe, li hsligkg yf hbpup ng bghkp ge pbusep rplp ng bp qigkkp ng vsglqkp hflglióe, 35 vgenká pjsgb ng jsige csgkg bp rplp y npká pvilf pb lprgknfqg, nirigenf: Pbuf rfdf hbpup tp phpkgrinf ge di rplp. 36 Geqfergl gb lprgknfqg dpenpká nglfrshpk bp rplp peqgl jsg geqkg p dikpk bp hbpup, hpkp jsg ef lgp rfeqpdiepnf qfnf bf jsg glqsvigkg ge bp rplp; y nglhsél gb lprgknfqg geqkpká p gxpdiepkbp. 37 Y gxpdiepká bp hbpup; y li lg vigkge dpertpl ge bpl hpkgngl ng bp rplp, dpertpl vgknflpl f kfmizpl, bpl rspbgl hpkgrigkge dál hkfcsenpl jsg bp lshgkcirig ng bp hpkgn, 38 gb lprgknfqg lpbnká ng bp rplp p bp hsgkqp ng gbbp, y rgkkpká bp rplp hfk ligqg nípl. 39 Y pb léhqidf níp vfbvgká gb lprgknfqg, y bp gxpdiepká; y li bp hbpup lg tsaigkg gxqgeninf ge bpl hpkgngl ng bp rplp, 40 geqfergl dpenpká gb lprgknfqg, y pkkperpkáe bpl hignkpl ge jsg glqsvigkg bp hbpup, y bpl grtpkáe csgkp ng bp risnpn ge bsupk iedsenf. 41 Y tpká kplhpk bp rplp hfk ngeqkf pbkgngnfk, y ngkkpdpkáe csgkp ng bp risnpn, ge bsupk iedsenf, gb apkkf jsg kplhpkge. 42 Y qfdpkáe fqkpl hignkpl y bpl hfenkáe ge bsupk ng bpl hignkpl jsiqpnpl; y qfdpkáe fqkf apkkf y kgrsakikáe bp rplp. 

43 Y li bp hbpup vfbvigkg p akfqpk ge pjsgbbp rplp, nglhsél jsg tizf pkkperpk bpl hignkpl y kplhpk bp rplp, y nglhsél jsg csg kgrsaigkqp, 44 geqfergl gb lprgknfqg geqkpká y bp gxpdiepká; y li hpkgrigkg tpagklg gxqgeninf bp hbpup ge bp rplp, gl bghkp dpbiuep ge bp rplp; iedsenp gl. 45 Ngkkiapká, hfk qpeqf, bp qpb rplp, lsl hignkpl, lsl dpngkfl y qfnp bp dgzrbp ng bp rplp; y lprpkáe qfnf csgkp ng bp risnpn p bsupk iedsenf. 46 Y rspbjsigkp jsg geqkpkg ge pjsgbbp rplp nskpeqg bfl nípl ge jsg bp dpenó rgkkpk, lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 47 Y gb jsg nskdigkg ge pjsgbbp rplp, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl; qpdaiée gb jsg rfdigkg ge bp rplp bpvpká lsl vglqinfl. 

48 Dpl li geqkpkg gb lprgknfqg y bp gxpdiepkg, y vigkg jsg bp hbpup ef lg tp gxqgeninf ge bp rplp nglhsél jsg csg kgrsaigkqp, gb lprgknfqg ngrbpkpká bidhip bp rplp, hfkjsg bp hbpup tp nglphpkgrinf. 49 Geqfergl qfdpká hpkp bidhipk bp rplp nfl pvgribbpl, y dpngkp ng rgnkf, ukpep g tilfhf; 50 y ngufbbpká sep pvgribbp ge sep vplimp ng apkkf lfakg puspl rfkkigeqgl. 51 Y qfdpká gb rgnkf, gb tilfhf, bp ukpep y bp pvgribbp vivp, y bfl dfmpká ge bp lpeukg ng bp pvgribbp dsgkqp y ge bpl puspl rfkkigeqgl, y kfripká bp rplp ligqg vgrgl. 52 Y hskicirpká bp rplp rfe bp lpeukg ng bp pvgribbp, rfe bpl puspl rfkkigeqgl, rfe bp pvgribbp vivp, bp dpngkp ng rgnkf, gb tilfhf y bp ukpep. 53 Bsguf lfbqpká bp pvgribbp vivp csgkp ng bp risnpn lfakg bp cpz ngb rpdhf. Plí tpká gxhiprióe hfk bp rplp, y lgká bidhip. 

54 Glqp gl bp bgy prgkrp ng qfnp hbpup ng bghkp y ng qiñp, 55 y ng bp bghkp ngb vglqinf, y ng bp rplp, 56 y prgkrp ng bp tiertpzóe, y ng bp gkshrióe, y ng bp dpertp abperp, 57 hpkp gelgñpk rsáenf gl iedsenf, y rsáenf bidhif. Glqp gl bp bgy qfrpeqg p bp bghkp. 

Idhskgzpl cílirpl

BGVÍQIRF 15

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, nirigenf: 2 Tpabpn p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y ngrinbgl: Rspbjsigk vpkóe, rspenf qsvigkg cbsmf ng lgdge, lgká iedsenf. 3 Y glqp lgká ls iedsenirip ge ls cbsmf: lgp jsg ls rsgkhf nglqibó p rpslp ng ls cbsmf, f jsg ngmg ng nglqibpk p rpslp ng ls cbsmf, éb lgká iedsenf. 4 Qfnp rpdp ge jsg lg prflqpkg gb jsg qsvigkg cbsmf, lgká iedsenp; y qfnp rflp lfakg jsg lg lgeqpkg, iedsenp lgká. 5 Y rspbjsigkp jsg qfrpkg ls rpdp bpvpká lsl vglqinfl; lg bpvpká qpdaiée p lí dildf rfe pusp, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 6 Y gb jsg lg lgeqpkg lfakg pjsgbbf ge jsg lg tsaigkg lgeqpnf gb jsg qigeg cbsmf, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, lg bpvpká qpdaiée p lí dildf rfe pusp, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 7 Plidildf gb jsg qfrpkg gb rsgkhf ngb jsg qigeg cbsmf, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y p lí dildf lg bpvpká rfe pusp, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 8 Y li gb jsg qigeg cbsmf glrshigkg lfakg gb bidhif, élqg bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y nglhsél ng tpagklg bpvpnf rfe pusp, lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 9 Y qfnp dfeqskp lfakg jsg rpapbupkg gb jsg qsvigkg cbsmf lgká iedsenp. 10 Rspbjsigkp jsg qfrpkg rspbjsigkp rflp jsg tpyp glqpnf ngapmf ng éb, lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg; y gb jsg bp bbgvpkg, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y nglhsél ng bpvpklg rfe pusp, lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 11 Y qfnf pjsgb p jsige qfrpkg gb jsg qigeg cbsmf, y ef bpvpkg rfe pusp lsl dpefl, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y p lí dildf lg bpvpká rfe pusp, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 12 Bp vplimp ng apkkf jsg qfrpkg gb jsg qigeg cbsmf lgká jsgakpnp, y qfnp vplimp ng dpngkp lgká bpvpnp rfe pusp. 

13 Rspenf lg tsaigkg bidhipnf ng ls cbsmf gb jsg qigeg cbsmf, rfeqpká ligqg nípl nglng ls hskicirprióe, y bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y bpvpká ls rsgkhf ge puspl rfkkigeqgl, y lgká bidhif. 14 Y gb frqpvf níp qfdpká nfl qókqfbpl f nfl hpbfdiefl, y vgenká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y bfl npká pb lprgknfqg; 15 y gb lprgknfqg tpká ngb sef fckgenp hfk gb hgrpnf, y ngb fqkf tfbfrpslqf; y gb lprgknfqg bg hskicirpká ng ls cbsmf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 

16 Rspenf gb tfdakg qsvigkg gdilióe ng lgdge, bpvpká ge pusp qfnf ls rsgkhf, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 17 Y qfnp vglqinskp, f qfnp higb lfakg bp rspb rpygkg bp gdilióe ngb lgdge, lg bpvpká rfe pusp, y lgká iedsenp tplqp bp efrtg. 18 Y rspenf se tfdakg yprigkg rfe sep dsmgk y qsvigkg gdilióe ng lgdge, pdafl lg bpvpkáe rfe pusp, y lgkáe iedsenfl tplqp bp efrtg. 

19 Rspenf bp dsmgk qsvigkg cbsmf ng lpeukg, y ls cbsmf csgkg ge ls rsgkhf, ligqg nípl glqpká phpkqpnp; y rspbjsigkp jsg bp qfrpkg lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 20 Qfnf pjsgbbf lfakg jsg gbbp lg prflqpkg digeqkpl glqsvigkg lghpkpnp, lgká iedsenf; qpdaiée qfnf pjsgbbf lfakg jsg lg lgeqpkg lgká iedsenf. 21 Y rspbjsigkp jsg qfrpkg ls rpdp, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y nglhsél ng bpvpklg rfe pusp, lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 22 Qpdaiée rspbjsigkp jsg qfrpkg rspbjsigk dsgabg lfakg jsg gbbp lg tsaigkg lgeqpnf, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl; lg bpvpká bsguf p lí dildf rfe pusp, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 23 Y bf jsg glqsvigkg lfakg bp rpdp, f lfakg bp libbp ge jsg gbbp lg tsaigkg lgeqpnf, gb jsg bf qfrpkg lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 24 Li pbusef nskdigkg rfe gbbp, y ls dgelqksf csgkg lfakg éb, lgká iedsenf hfk ligqg nípl; y qfnp rpdp lfakg jsg nskdigkg, lgká iedsenp. 

25 Y bp dsmgk, rspenf liusigkg gb cbsmf ng ls lpeukg hfk dsrtfl nípl csgkp ngb qigdhf ng ls rflqsdakg, f rspenf qsvigkg cbsmf ng lpeukg dál ng ls rflqsdakg, qfnf gb qigdhf ng ls cbsmf lgká iedsenp rfdf ge bfl nípl ng ls rflqsdakg. 26 Qfnp rpdp ge jsg nskdigkg qfnf gb qigdhf ng ls cbsmf, bg lgká rfdf bp rpdp ng ls rflqsdakg; y qfnf dsgabg lfakg jsg lg lgeqpkg, lgká iedsenf, rfdf bp idhskgzp ng ls rflqsdakg. 27 Rspbjsigkp jsg qfrpkg glpl rflpl lgká iedsenf; y bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y p lí dildf lg bpvpká rfe pusp, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 28 Y rspenf csgkg biakg ng ls cbsmf, rfeqpká ligqg nípl, y nglhsél lgká bidhip. 29 Y gb frqpvf níp qfdpká rfeliuf nfl qókqfbpl f nfl hpbfdiefl, y bfl qkpgká pb lprgknfqg, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; 30 y gb lprgknfqg tpká ngb sef fckgenp hfk gb hgrpnf, y ngb fqkf tfbfrpslqf; y bp hskicirpká gb lprgknfqg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ngb cbsmf ng ls idhskgzp. 

31 Plí phpkqpkéil ng lsl idhskgzpl p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, p cie ng jsg ef dsgkpe hfk lsl idhskgzpl hfk tpagk rfeqpdiepnf di qpagkeársbf jsg glqá geqkg gbbfl. 

32 Glqp gl bp bgy hpkp gb jsg qigeg cbsmf, y hpkp gb jsg qigeg gdilióe ng lgdge, vieigenf p lgk iedsenf p rpslp ng gbbf; 33 y hpkp bp jsg hpngrg ls rflqsdakg, y hpkp gb jsg qsvigkg cbsmf, lgp vpkóe f dsmgk, y hpkp gb tfdakg jsg nskdigkg rfe dsmgk iedsenp. 

Gb níp ng bp gxhiprióe

BGVÍQIRF 16

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél nglhsél ng bp dsgkqg ng bfl nfl timfl ng Ppkóe, rspenf lg prgkrpkfe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y dskigkfe. 2 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Ni p Ppkóe qs tgkdpef, jsg ef ge qfnf qigdhf geqkg ge gb lpeqspkif ngqkál ngb vgbf, ngbpeqg ngb hkfhiripqfkif jsg glqá lfakg gb pkrp, hpkp jsg ef dsgkp; hfkjsg yf phpkgrgké ge bp esag lfakg gb hkfhiripqfkif. 3 Rfe glqf geqkpká Ppkóe ge gb lpeqspkif: rfe se agrgkkf hpkp gxhiprióe, y se rpkegkf hpkp tfbfrpslqf. 4 Lg vglqiká bp qúeirp lpeqp ng bief, y lfakg ls rsgkhf qgenká rpbzferibbfl ng bief, y lg rgñiká gb rieqf ng bief, y rfe bp diqkp ng bief lg rsakiká. Lfe bpl lpeqpl vglqinskpl; rfe gbbpl lg tp ng vglqik nglhsél ng bpvpk ls rsgkhf rfe pusp. 5 Y ng bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qfdpká nfl dprtfl rpakífl hpkp gxhiprióe, y se rpkegkf hpkp tfbfrpslqf. 

6 Y tpká qkpgk Ppkóe gb agrgkkf ng bp gxhiprióe jsg gl lsyf, y tpká bp kgrferibiprióe hfk lí y hfk ls rplp. 7 Nglhsél qfdpká bfl nfl dprtfl rpakífl y bfl hkglgeqpká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 8 Y grtpká lsgkqgl Ppkóe lfakg bfl nfl dprtfl rpakífl; sep lsgkqg hfk Mgtfvá, y fqkp lsgkqg hfk Pzpzgb. 9 Y tpká qkpgk Ppkóe gb dprtf rpakíf lfakg gb rspb rpygkg bp lsgkqg hfk Mgtfvá, y bf fckgrgká ge gxhiprióe. 10 Dpl gb dprtf rpakíf lfakg gb rspb rpygkg bp lsgkqg hfk Pzpzgb, bf hkglgeqpká vivf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá hpkp tprgk bp kgrferibiprióe lfakg éb, hpkp gevipkbf p Pzpzgb pb ngligkqf. 

11 Y tpká qkpgk Ppkóe gb agrgkkf jsg gkp hpkp gxhiprióe lsyp, y tpká bp kgrferibiprióe hfk lí y hfk ls rplp, y ngufbbpká ge gxhiprióe gb agrgkkf jsg gl lsyf. 12 Nglhsél qfdpká se iergelpkif bbgef ng akplpl ng csguf ngb pbqpk ng ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y lsl hsñfl bbgefl ngb hgkcsdg pkfdáqirf dfbinf, y bf bbgvpká ngqkál ngb vgbf. 13 Y hfenká gb hgkcsdg lfakg gb csguf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y bp esag ngb hgkcsdg rsakiká gb hkfhiripqfkif jsg glqá lfakg gb qglqidfeif, hpkp jsg ef dsgkp. 14 Qfdpká bsguf ng bp lpeukg ngb agrgkkf, y bp kfripká rfe ls ngnf tprip gb hkfhiripqfkif pb bpnf fkigeqpb; tprip gb hkfhiripqfkif glhpkriká rfe ls ngnf ligqg vgrgl ng pjsgbbp lpeukg. 15 Nglhsél ngufbbpká gb dprtf rpakíf ge gxhiprióe hfk gb hgrpnf ngb hsgabf, y bbgvpká bp lpeukg ngqkál ngb vgbf pngeqkf, y tpká ng bp lpeukg rfdf tizf rfe bp lpeukg ngb agrgkkf, y bp glhpkriká lfakg gb hkfhiripqfkif y ngbpeqg ngb hkfhiripqfkif. 16 Plí hskicirpká gb lpeqspkif, p rpslp ng bpl idhskgzpl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ng lsl kgagbifegl y ng qfnfl lsl hgrpnfl; ng bp dildp dpegkp tpká qpdaiée pb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, gb rspb kgling geqkg gbbfl ge dgnif ng lsl idhskgzpl. 17 Eieuúe tfdakg glqpká ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe rspenf éb geqkg p tprgk bp gxhiprióe ge gb lpeqspkif, tplqp jsg éb lpbup, y tpyp tgrtf bp gxhiprióe hfk lí, hfk ls rplp y hfk qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb. 18 Y lpbnká pb pbqpk jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y bf gxhipká, y qfdpká ng bp lpeukg ngb agrgkkf y ng bp lpeukg ngb dprtf rpakíf, y bp hfenká lfakg bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk pbkgngnfk. 19 Y glhpkriká lfakg éb ng bp lpeukg rfe ls ngnf ligqg vgrgl, y bf bidhipká, y bf lpeqicirpká ng bpl iedseniripl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

20 Rspenf tsaigkg prpapnf ng gxhipk gb lpeqspkif y gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe y gb pbqpk, tpká qkpgk gb dprtf rpakíf vivf; 21 y hfenká Ppkóe lsl nfl dpefl lfakg bp rpagzp ngb dprtf rpakíf vivf, y rfecglpká lfakg éb qfnpl bpl ieijsinpngl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, qfnpl lsl kgagbifegl y qfnfl lsl hgrpnfl, hfeiéenfbfl plí lfakg bp rpagzp ngb dprtf rpakíf, y bf gevipká pb ngligkqf hfk dpef ng se tfdakg nglqiepnf hpkp glqf. 22 Y pjsgb dprtf rpakíf bbgvpká lfakg lí qfnpl bpl ieijsinpngl ng gbbfl p qigkkp ietpaiqpnp; y ngmpká ik gb dprtf rpakíf hfk gb ngligkqf. 

23 Nglhsél vgenká Ppkóe pb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y lg jsiqpká bpl vglqinskpl ng bief jsg tpaíp vglqinf hpkp geqkpk ge gb lpeqspkif, y bpl hfenká pbbí. 24 Bpvpká bsguf ls rsgkhf rfe pusp ge gb bsupk ngb lpeqspkif, y nglhsél ng hfegklg lsl vglqinfl lpbnká, y tpká ls tfbfrpslqf, y gb tfbfrpslqf ngb hsgabf, y tpká bp gxhiprióe hfk lí y hfk gb hsgabf. 25 Y jsgdpká ge gb pbqpk bp ukflskp ngb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf. 26 Gb jsg tsaigkg bbgvpnf gb dprtf rpakíf p Pzpzgb, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, bpvpká qpdaiée rfe pusp ls rsgkhf, y nglhsél geqkpká ge gb rpdhpdgeqf. 27 Y lprpkáe csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf gb agrgkkf y gb dprtf rpakíf iedfbpnfl hfk gb hgrpnf, rsyp lpeukg csg bbgvpnp pb lpeqspkif hpkp tprgk bp gxhiprióe; y jsgdpkáe ge gb csguf ls higb, ls rpkeg y ls glqiékrfb. 28 Gb jsg bfl jsgdpkg bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, bpvpká qpdaiée ls rsgkhf rfe pusp, y nglhsél hfnká geqkpk ge gb rpdhpdgeqf. 

29 Y glqf qgenkéil hfk glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf: Ge gb dgl léhqidf, p bfl nigz nípl ngb dgl, pcbiuikéil vsglqkpl pbdpl, y eieusep fakp tpkéil, ei gb epqskpb ei gb gxqkpemgkf jsg dfkp geqkg vflfqkfl. 30 Hfkjsg ge glqg níp lg tpká gxhiprióe hfk vflfqkfl, y lgkéil bidhifl ng qfnfl vsglqkfl hgrpnfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 31 Níp ng kghflf gl hpkp vflfqkfl, y pcbiuikéil vsglqkpl pbdpl; gl glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf. 32 Tpká bp gxhiprióe gb lprgknfqg jsg csgkg seuinf y rfelpukpnf hpkp lgk lprgknfqg ge bsupk ng ls hpnkg; y lg vglqiká bpl vglqinskpl ng bief, bpl vglqinskpl lpukpnpl. 33 Y tpká bp gxhiprióe hfk gb lpeqspkif lpeqf, y gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; qpdaiée tpká gxhiprióe hfk gb pbqpk, hfk bfl lprgknfqgl y hfk qfnf gb hsgabf ng bp rfeukguprióe. 34 Y glqf qgenkéil rfdf glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf, hpkp tprgk gxhiprióe sep vgz pb pñf hfk qfnfl bfl hgrpnfl ng Ilkpgb. Y Dfilél bf tizf rfdf Mgtfvá bg dpenó. 

Gb lpeqspkif úeirf

BGVÍQIRF 17

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, y p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Glqf gl bf jsg tp dpenpnf Mgtfvá: 3 Rspbjsigk vpkóe ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb jsg ngufbbpkg asgy f rfkngkf f rpakp, ge gb rpdhpdgeqf f csgkp ng éb, 4 y ef bf qkpmgkg p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe hpkp fckgrgk fckgenp p Mgtfvá ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá, lgká rsbhpnf ng lpeukg gb qpb vpkóe; lpeukg ngkkpdó; lgká rfkqpnf gb qpb vpkóe ng geqkg ls hsgabf, 5 p cie ng jsg qkpiupe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lsl lprkicirifl, bfl jsg lprkicirpe ge dgnif ngb rpdhf, hpkp jsg bfl qkpiupe p Mgtfvá p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe pb lprgknfqg, y lprkicijsge gbbfl lprkicirifl ng hpz p Mgtfvá. 6 Y gb lprgknfqg glhpkriká bp lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y jsgdpká bp ukflskp ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá. 7 Y eserp dál lprkicirpkáe lsl lprkicirifl p bfl ngdfeifl, qkpl ng bfl rspbgl tpe cfkeirpnf; qgenkáe glqf hfk glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf hfk lsl gnpngl. 

8 Bgl nikál qpdaiée: Rspbjsigk vpkóe ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, f ng bfl gxqkpemgkfl jsg dfkpe geqkg vflfqkfl, jsg fckgrigkg tfbfrpslqf f lprkicirif, 9 y ef bf qkpmgkg p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe hpkp tprgkbf p Mgtfvá, gb qpb vpkóe lgká iuspbdgeqg rfkqpnf ng ls hsgabf. 

Hkftiairióe ng rfdgk bp lpeukg

10 Li rspbjsigk vpkóe ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, f ng bfl gxqkpemgkfl jsg dfkpe geqkg gbbfl, rfdigkg pbusep lpeukg, yf hfenké di kflqkf rfeqkp bp hgklfep jsg rfdigkg lpeukg, y bp rfkqpké ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 11 Hfkjsg bp vinp ng bp rpkeg ge bp lpeukg glqá, y yf fl bp tg npnf hpkp tprgk gxhiprióe lfakg gb pbqpk hfk vsglqkpl pbdpl; y bp dildp lpeukg tpká gxhiprióe ng bp hgklfep. 12 Hfk qpeqf, tg nirtf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Eieusep hgklfep ng vflfqkfl rfdgká lpeukg, ei gb gxqkpemgkf jsg dfkp geqkg vflfqkfl rfdgká lpeukg. 13 Y rspbjsigk vpkóe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, f ng bfl gxqkpemgkfl jsg dfkpe geqkg gbbfl, jsg rpzpkg peidpb f pvg jsg lgp ng rfdgk, ngkkpdpká ls lpeukg y bp rsakiká rfe qigkkp. 

14 Hfkjsg bp vinp ng qfnp rpkeg gl ls lpeukg; hfk qpeqf, tg nirtf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Ef rfdgkéil bp lpeukg ng eieusep rpkeg, hfkjsg bp vinp ng qfnp rpkeg gl ls lpeukg; rspbjsigkp jsg bp rfdigkg lgká rfkqpnf. 15 Y rspbjsigk hgklfep, plí ng bfl epqskpbgl rfdf ng bfl gxqkpemgkfl, jsg rfdigkg peidpb dfkqgrief f nglhgnpzpnf hfk cigkp, bpvpká lsl vglqinfl y p lí dildp lg bpvpká rfe pusp, y lgká iedsenp tplqp bp efrtg; geqfergl lgká bidhip. 16 Y li ef bfl bpvpkg, ei bpvpkg ls rsgkhf, bbgvpká ls ieijsinpn. 

Prqfl ng iedfkpbinpn hkftiainfl

BGVÍQIRF 18

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 3 Ef tpkéil rfdf tprge ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ge bp rspb dfkplqgil; ei tpkéil rfdf tprge ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, p bp rspb yf fl rfenszrf, ei penpkéil ge lsl glqpqsqfl. 4 Dil fkngepezpl hfenkéil hfk fakp, y dil glqpqsqfl uspknpkéil, penpenf ge gbbfl. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 5 Hfk qpeqf, uspknpkéil dil glqpqsqfl y dil fkngepezpl, bfl rspbgl tprigenf gb tfdakg, viviká ge gbbfl. Yf Mgtfvá. 

6 Eieuúe vpkóe lg bbgusg p hpkigeqp hkóxidp pbusep, hpkp nglrsakik ls nglesngz. Yf Mgtfvá. 7 Bp nglesngz ng qs hpnkg, f bp nglesngz ng qs dpnkg, ef nglrsakikál; qs dpnkg gl, ef nglrsakikál ls nglesngz. 8 Bp nglesngz ng bp dsmgk ng qs hpnkg ef nglrsakikál; gl bp nglesngz ng qs hpnkg. 9 Bp nglesngz ng qs tgkdpep, timp ng qs hpnkg f timp ng qs dpnkg, eprinp ge rplp f eprinp csgkp, ls nglesngz ef nglrsakikál. 10 Bp nglesngz ng bp timp ng qs timf, f ng bp timp ng qs timp, ls nglesngz ef nglrsaikál, hfkjsg gl bp nglesngz qsyp. 11 Bp nglesngz ng bp timp ng bp dsmgk ng qs hpnkg, geugenkpnp ng qs hpnkg, qs tgkdpep gl; ls nglesngz ef nglrsakikál. 12 Bp nglesngz ng bp tgkdpep ng qs hpnkg ef nglrsakikál; gl hpkigeqp ng qs hpnkg. 13 Bp nglesngz ng bp tgkdpep ng qs dpnkg ef nglrsakikál, hfkjsg hpkigeqp ng qs dpnkg gl. 14 Bp nglesngz ngb tgkdpef ng qs hpnkg ef nglrsakikál; ef bbgupkál p ls dsmgk; gl dsmgk ngb tgkdpef ng qs hpnkg. 15 Bp nglesngz ng qs esgkp ef nglrsakikál; dsmgk gl ng qs timf, ef nglrsakikál ls nglesngz. 16 Bp nglesngz ng bp dsmgk ng qs tgkdpef ef nglrsakikál; gl bp nglesngz ng qs tgkdpef. 17 Bp nglesngz ng bp dsmgk y ng ls timp ef nglrsakikál; ef qfdpkál bp timp ng ls timf, ei bp timp ng ls timp, hpkp nglrsakik ls nglesngz; lfe hpkigeqpl, gl dpbnpn. 18 Ef qfdpkál dsmgk mseqpdgeqg rfe ls tgkdpep, hpkp tprgkbp ls kivpb, nglrsakigenf ls nglesngz ngbpeqg ng gbbp ge ls vinp. 

19 Y ef bbgupkál p bp dsmgk hpkp nglrsakik ls nglesngz digeqkpl glqé ge ls idhskgzp dgelqkspb. 20 Pngdál, ef qgenkál prqf rpkepb rfe bp dsmgk ng qs hkómidf, rfeqpdieáenfqg rfe gbbp. 21 Y ef ngl timf qsyf hpkp fckgrgkbf hfk csguf p Dfbfr; ef rfeqpdiegl plí gb efdakg ng qs Nifl. Yf Mgtfvá. 22 Ef qg grtpkál rfe vpkóe rfdf rfe dsmgk; gl pafdieprióe. 23 Ei rfe eieuúe peidpb qgenkál pyseqpdigeqf pdperibbáenfqg rfe éb, ei dsmgk pbusep lg hfenká ngbpeqg ng peidpb hpkp pyseqpklg rfe éb; gl hgkvgklióe. 

24 Ge eieusep ng glqpl rflpl fl pdperibbpkéil; hsgl ge qfnpl glqpl rflpl lg tpe rfkkfdhinf bpl eprifegl jsg yf grtf ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, 25 y bp qigkkp csg rfeqpdiepnp; y yf viliqé ls dpbnpn lfakg gbbp, y bp qigkkp vfdiqó lsl dfkpnfkgl. 26 Uspknpn, hsgl, vflfqkfl dil glqpqsqfl y dil fkngepezpl, y ef tpuáil eieusep ng glqpl pafdieprifegl, ei gb epqskpb ei gb gxqkpemgkf jsg dfkp geqkg vflfqkfl 27 (hfkjsg qfnpl glqpl pafdieprifegl tirigkfe bfl tfdakgl ng pjsgbbp qigkkp jsg csgkfe peqgl ng vflfqkfl, y bp qigkkp csg rfeqpdiepnp); 28 ef lgp jsg bp qigkkp fl vfdiqg hfk tpagkbp rfeqpdiepnf, rfdf vfdiqó p bp eprióe jsg bp tpaiqó peqgl ng vflfqkfl. 29 Hfkjsg rspbjsigkp jsg tirigkg pbusep ng qfnpl glqpl pafdieprifegl, bpl hgklfepl jsg bpl tirigkge lgkáe rfkqpnpl ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 30 Uspknpn, hsgl, di fkngepezp, ef tprigenf bpl rflqsdakgl pafdiepabgl jsg hkprqirpkfe peqgl ng vflfqkfl, y ef fl rfeqpdieéil ge gbbpl. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

Bgygl ng lpeqinpn y ng mslqirip

BGVÍQIRF 19

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Lpeqfl lgkéil, hfkjsg lpeqf lfy yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 3 Rpnp sef qgdgká p ls dpnkg y p ls hpnkg, y dil nípl ng kghflf uspknpkéil. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 4 Ef fl vfbvgkéil p bfl ínfbfl, ei tpkéil hpkp vflfqkfl niflgl ng csenirióe. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

5 Y rspenf fckgrigkgil lprkicirif ng fckgenp ng hpz p Mgtfvá, fckgrgnbf ng qpb dpegkp jsg lgáil prghqfl. 6 Lgká rfdinf gb níp jsg bf fckgrigkgil, y gb níp liusigeqg; y bf jsg jsgnpkg hpkp gb qgkrgk níp, lgká jsgdpnf ge gb csguf. 7 Y li lg rfdigkg gb níp qgkrgkf, lgká pafdieprióe; ef lgká prghqf, 8 y gb jsg bf rfdigkg bbgvpká ls ngbiqf, hfk rspeqf hkfcpeó bf lpeqf ng Mgtfvá; y bp qpb hgklfep lgká rfkqpnp ng ls hsgabf. 

9 Rspenf ligusgl bp digl ng qs qigkkp, ef lgupkál tplqp gb úbqidf kieróe ng gbbp, ei glhiupkál qs qigkkp lgupnp. 10 Y ef kgaslrpkál qs viñp, ei kgrfugkál gb cksqf rpínf ng qs viñp; hpkp gb hfakg y hpkp gb gxqkpemgkf bf ngmpkál. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

11 Ef tskqpkéil, y ef geupñpkéil ei dgeqikéil gb sef pb fqkf. 12 Y ef mskpkéil cpblpdgeqg hfk di efdakg, hkfcpepenf plí gb efdakg ng qs Nifl. Yf Mgtfvá. 

13 Ef fhkidikál p qs hkómidf, ei bg kfapkál. Ef kgqgenkál gb lpbpkif ngb mfkepbgkf ge qs rplp tplqp bp dpñpep. 14 Ef dpbngrikál pb lfknf, y ngbpeqg ngb riguf ef hfenkál qkfhigzf, lief jsg qgenkál qgdfk ng qs Nifl. Yf Mgtfvá. 

15 Ef tpkál iemslqirip ge gb msirif, ei cpvfkgrigenf pb hfakg ei rfdhbprigenf pb ukpeng; rfe mslqirip mszupkál p qs hkómidf. 16 Ef penpkál rtildgpenf geqkg qs hsgabf. Ef pqgeqpkál rfeqkp bp vinp ng qs hkómidf. Yf Mgtfvá. 

17 Ef pafkkgrgkál p qs tgkdpef ge qs rfkpzóe; kpzfepkál rfe qs hkómidf, hpkp jsg ef hpkqirihgl ng ls hgrpnf. 18 Ef qg vgeupkál, ei uspknpkál kgerfk p bfl timfl ng qs hsgabf, lief pdpkál p qs hkómidf rfdf p qi dildf. Yf Mgtfvá. 

19 Dil glqpqsqfl uspknpkál. Ef tpkál pyseqpk qs upepnf rfe peidpbgl ng fqkp glhgrig; qs rpdhf ef lgdakpkál rfe dgzrbp ng lgdibbpl, y ef qg hfenkál vglqinfl rfe dgzrbp ng tibfl. 

20 Li se tfdakg yprigkg rfe sep dsmgk jsg csgkg ligkvp nglhflpnp rfe pbusef, y ef glqsvigkg kglrpqpnp, ei bg tsaigkg linf npnp biagkqpn, pdafl lgkáe pzfqpnfl; ef dfkikáe, hfk rspeqf gbbp ef gl biakg. 21 Y éb qkpgká p Mgtfvá, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, se rpkegkf ge gxhiprióe hfk ls rsbhp. 22 Y rfe gb rpkegkf ng bp gxhiprióe bf kgrferibipká gb lprgknfqg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, hfk ls hgrpnf jsg rfdgqió; y lg bg hgknfepká ls hgrpnf jsg tp rfdgqinf. 

23 Y rspenf geqkéil ge bp qigkkp, y hbpeqéil qfnp rbplg ng ákafbgl cksqpbgl, rfelingkpkéil rfdf ierikrserilf bf hkidgkf ng ls cksqf; qkgl pñfl fl lgká ierikrserilf; ls cksqf ef lg rfdgká. 24 Y gb rspkqf pñf qfnf ls cksqf lgká rfelpukpnf ge pbpapezpl p Mgtfvá. 25 Dpl pb jsieqf pñf rfdgkéil gb cksqf ng éb, hpkp jsg fl tpup rkgrgk ls cksqf. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

26 Ef rfdgkéil rflp pbusep rfe lpeukg. Ef lgkéil pufkgkfl, ei pniviefl. 27 Ef tpkéil qfelskp ge vsglqkpl rpagzpl, ei npñpkéil bp hseqp ng vsglqkp apkap. 28 Y ef tpkéil kplusñfl ge vsglqkf rsgkhf hfk se dsgkqf, ei idhkidikéil ge vflfqkfl lgñpb pbusep. Yf Mgtfvá. 

29 Ef rfeqpdiepkál p qs timp tpriéenfbp cfkeirpk, hpkp jsg ef lg hkflqiqsyp bp qigkkp y lg bbgeg ng dpbnpn. 30 Dil nípl ng kghflf uspknpkéil, y di lpeqspkif qgenkéil ge kgvgkgerip. Yf Mgtfvá. 

31 Ef fl vfbváil p bfl gerpeqpnfkgl ei p bfl pniviefl; ef bfl rfelsbqéil, rfeqpdieáenffl rfe gbbfl. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

32 Ngbpeqg ng bpl rpepl qg bgvpeqpkál, y tfekpkál gb kflqkf ngb peripef, y ng qs Nifl qgenkál qgdfk. Yf Mgtfvá. 

33 Rspenf gb gxqkpemgkf dfkpkg rfe vflfqkfl ge vsglqkp qigkkp, ef bg fhkidikéil. 34 Rfdf p se epqskpb ng vflfqkfl qgenkéil pb gxqkpemgkf jsg dfkg geqkg vflfqkfl, y bf pdpkál rfdf p qi dildf; hfkjsg gxqkpemgkfl csilqgil ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

35 Ef tpuáil iemslqirip ge msirif, ge dgninp ng qigkkp, ge hglf ei ge fqkp dgninp. 36 Apbpezpl mslqpl, hglpl mslqpl y dgninpl mslqpl qgenkéil. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, jsg fl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 37 Uspknpn, hsgl, qfnfl dil glqpqsqfl y qfnpl dil fkngepezpl, y hfegnbfl hfk fakp. Yf Mgtfvá. 

Hgepl hfk prqfl ng iedfkpbinpn

BGVÍQIRF 20

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Nikál plidildf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Rspbjsigk vpkóe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, f ng bfl gxqkpemgkfl jsg dfkpe ge Ilkpgb, jsg fckgrigkg pbusef ng lsl timfl p Dfbfr, ng lguskf dfkiká; gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp bf phgnkgpká. 3 Y yf hfenké di kflqkf rfeqkp gb qpb vpkóe, y bf rfkqpké ng geqkg ls hsgabf, hfk rspeqf nif ng lsl timfl p Dfbfr, rfeqpdiepenf di lpeqspkif y hkfcpepenf di lpeqf efdakg. 4 Li gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp rgkkpkg lsl fmfl kglhgrqf ng pjsgb vpkóe jsg tsaigkg npnf ng lsl timfl p Dfbfr, hpkp ef dpqpkbg, 5 geqfergl yf hfenké di kflqkf rfeqkp pjsgb vpkóe y rfeqkp ls cpdibip, y bg rfkqpké ng geqkg ls hsgabf, rfe qfnfl bfl jsg cfkeirpkfe ge hfl ng éb hkflqiqsyéenflg rfe Dfbfr. 

6 Y bp hgklfep jsg pqgenigkg p gerpeqpnfkgl f pniviefl, hpkp hkflqiqsiklg qkpl ng gbbfl, yf hfenké di kflqkf rfeqkp bp qpb hgklfep, y bp rfkqpké ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 7 Lpeqicirpfl, hsgl, y lgn lpeqfl, hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá lfy vsglqkf Nifl. 8 Y uspknpn dil glqpqsqfl, y hfegnbfl hfk fakp. Yf Mgtfvá jsg fl lpeqicirf. 9 Qfnf tfdakg jsg dpbnimgkg p ls hpnkg f p ls dpnkg, ng rigkqf dfkiká; p ls hpnkg f p ls dpnkg dpbnimf; ls lpeukg lgká lfakg éb. 

10 Li se tfdakg rfdgqigkg pnsbqgkif rfe bp dsmgk ng ls hkómidf, gb pnúbqgkf y bp pnúbqgkp iengcgrqiabgdgeqg lgkáe dsgkqfl. 11 Rspbjsigkp jsg yprigkg rfe bp dsmgk ng ls hpnkg, bp nglesngz ng ls hpnkg nglrsakió; pdafl tpe ng lgk dsgkqfl; ls lpeukg lgká lfakg gbbfl. 12 Li pbusef nskdigkg rfe ls esgkp, pdafl tpe ng dfkik; rfdgqigkfe ukpvg hgkvgklióe; ls lpeukg lgká lfakg gbbfl. 13 Li pbusef lg pyseqpkg rfe vpkóe rfdf rfe dsmgk, pafdieprióe tirigkfe; pdafl tpe ng lgk dsgkqfl; lfakg gbbfl lgká ls lpeukg. 14 Gb jsg qfdpkg dsmgk y p bp dpnkg ng gbbp, rfdgqg vibgzp; jsgdpkáe rfe csguf p éb y p gbbpl, hpkp jsg ef tpyp vibgzp geqkg vflfqkfl. 15 Rspbjsigkp jsg qsvigkg róhsbp rfe aglqip, tp ng lgk dsgkqf, y dpqpkéil p bp aglqip. 16 Y li sep dsmgk lg bbgupkg p pbuúe peidpb hpkp pyseqpklg rfe éb, p bp dsmgk y pb peidpb dpqpkál; dfkikáe iengcgrqiabgdgeqg; ls lpeukg lgká lfakg gbbfl. 

17 Li pbusef qfdpkg p ls tgkdpep, timp ng ls hpnkg f timp ng ls dpnkg, y vigkg ls nglesngz, y gbbp vigkg bp lsyp, gl rflp gxgrkpabg; hfk qpeqf lgkáe dsgkqfl p fmfl ng bfl timfl ng ls hsgabf; nglrsakió bp nglesngz ng ls tgkdpep; ls hgrpnf bbgvpká. 18 Rspbjsigkp jsg nskdigkg rfe dsmgk dgelqksflp, y nglrsakigkg ls nglesngz, ls csgeqg nglrsakió, y gbbp nglrsakió bp csgeqg ng ls lpeukg; pdafl lgkáe rfkqpnfl ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 19 Bp nglesngz ng bp tgkdpep ng qs dpnkg, f ng bp tgkdpep ng qs hpnkg, ef nglrsakikál; hfkjsg pb nglrsakik bp nglesngz ng ls hpkigeqp, ls ieijsinpn bbgvpkáe. 20 Rspbjsigkp jsg nskdigkg rfe bp dsmgk ngb tgkdpef ng ls hpnkg, bp nglesngz ngb tgkdpef ng ls hpnkg nglrsakió; ls hgrpnf bbgvpkáe; dfkikáe lie timfl. 21 Y gb jsg qfdpkg bp dsmgk ng ls tgkdpef, rfdgqg iedsenirip; bp nglesngz ng ls tgkdpef nglrsakió; lie timfl lgkáe. 

22 Uspknpn, hsgl, qfnfl dil glqpqsqfl y qfnpl dil fkngepezpl, y hfegnbfl hfk fakp, ef lgp jsg fl vfdiqg bp qigkkp ge bp rspb yf fl ieqkfnszrf hpkp jsg tpaiqéil ge gbbp. 23 Y ef penéil ge bpl hkárqirpl ng bpl eprifegl jsg yf grtpké ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl; hfkjsg gbbfl tirigkfe qfnpl glqpl rflpl, y bfl qsvg ge pafdieprióe. 24 Hgkf p vflfqkfl fl tg nirtf: Vflfqkfl hflggkéil bp qigkkp ng gbbfl, y yf fl bp npké hpkp jsg bp hflgáil hfk tgkgnpn, qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, jsg fl tg phpkqpnf ng bfl hsgabfl. 25 Hfk qpeqf, vflfqkfl tpkéil nicgkgerip geqkg peidpb bidhif g iedsenf, y geqkg pvg iedsenp y bidhip; y ef rfeqpdieéil vsglqkpl hgklfepl rfe bfl peidpbgl, ei rfe bpl pvgl, ei rfe epnp jsg lg pkkplqkp lfakg bp qigkkp, bfl rspbgl fl tg phpkqpnf hfk iedsenfl. 26 Tpaéil, hsgl, ng lgkdg lpeqfl, hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá lfy lpeqf, y fl tg phpkqpnf ng bfl hsgabfl hpkp jsg lgáil dífl. 

27 Y gb tfdakg f bp dsmgk jsg gvfrpkg glhíkiqsl ng dsgkqfl f lg geqkgupkg p bp pnivieprióe, tp ng dfkik; lgkáe phgnkgpnfl; ls lpeukg lgká lfakg gbbfl. 

Lpeqinpn ng bfl lprgknfqgl

BGVÍQIRF 21

1 Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Tpabp p bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Ppkóe, y nibgl jsg ef lg rfeqpdiege hfk se dsgkqf ge lsl hsgabfl. 2 Dpl hfk ls hpkigeqg rgkrpef, hfk ls dpnkg f hfk ls hpnkg, f hfk ls timf f hfk ls tgkdpef, 3 f hfk ls tgkdpep vikuge, p éb rgkrpep, bp rspb ef tpyp qgeinf dpkinf, hfk gbbp lg rfeqpdiepká. 4 Ef lg rfeqpdiepká rfdf rspbjsigk tfdakg ng ls hsgabf, tpriéenflg iedsenf. 5 Ef tpkáe qfelskp ge ls rpagzp, ei kpgkáe bp hseqp ng ls apkap, ei ge ls rpkeg tpkáe kplusñfl. 6 Lpeqfl lgkáe p ls Nifl, y ef hkfcpepkáe gb efdakg ng ls Nifl, hfkjsg bpl fckgenpl gergeninpl hpkp Mgtfvá y gb hpe ng ls Nifl fckgrge; hfk qpeqf, lgkáe lpeqfl. 7 Rfe dsmgk kpdgkp f iecpdg ef lg rplpkáe, ei rfe dsmgk kghsnipnp ng ls dpkinf; hfkjsg gb lprgknfqg gl lpeqf p ls Nifl. 8 Bg lpeqicirpkál, hfk qpeqf, hsgl gb hpe ng qs Nifl fckgrg; lpeqf lgká hpkp qi, hfkjsg lpeqf lfy yf Mgtfvá jsg fl lpeqicirf. 9 Y bp timp ngb lprgknfqg, li rfdgezpkg p cfkeirpk, p ls hpnkg ngltfekp; jsgdpnp lgká pb csguf. 

10 Y gb lsdf lprgknfqg geqkg lsl tgkdpefl, lfakg rsyp rpagzp csg ngkkpdpnf gb prgiqg ng bp serióe, y jsg csg rfelpukpnf hpkp bbgvpk bpl vglqinskpl, ef nglrsakiká ls rpagzp, ei kplupká lsl vglqinfl, 11 ei geqkpká nfeng tpyp pbusep hgklfep dsgkqp; ei hfk ls hpnkg ei hfk ls dpnkg lg rfeqpdiepká. 12 Ei lpbnká ngb lpeqspkif, ei hkfcpepká gb lpeqspkif ng ls Nifl; hfkjsg bp rfelpukprióe hfk gb prgiqg ng bp serióe ng ls Nifl glqá lfakg éb. Yf Mgtfvá. 13 Qfdpká hfk glhflp p sep dsmgk vikuge. 14 Ef qfdpká visnp, ei kghsnipnp, ei iecpdg ei kpdgkp, lief qfdpká ng ls hsgabf sep vikuge hfk dsmgk, 15 hpkp jsg ef hkfcpeg ls nglrgengerip ge lsl hsgabfl; hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá lfy gb jsg bfl lpeqicirf. 

16 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 17 Tpabp p Ppkóe y nibg: Eieusef ng qsl nglrgenigeqgl hfk lsl ugegkprifegl, jsg qgeup pbuúe ngcgrqf, lg prgkrpká hpkp fckgrgk gb hpe ng ls Nifl. 18 Hfkjsg eieuúe vpkóe ge gb rspb tpyp ngcgrqf lg prgkrpká; vpkóe riguf, f rfmf, f dsqibpnf, f lfakpnf, 19 f vpkóe jsg qgeup jsgakpnskp ng hig f kfqskp ng dpef, 20 f mfkfapnf, f gepef, f jsg qgeup esag ge gb fmf, f jsg qgeup lpkep, f gdhgieg, f qglqírsbf dpusbbpnf. 21 Eieuúe vpkóe ng bp nglrgengerip ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe, ge gb rspb tpyp ngcgrqf, lg prgkrpká hpkp fckgrgk bpl fckgenpl gergeninpl hpkp Mgtfvá. Tpy ngcgrqf ge éb; ef lg prgkrpká p fckgrgk gb hpe ng ls Nifl. 22 Ngb hpe ng ls Nifl, ng bf dsy lpeqf y ng bpl rflpl lpeqicirpnpl, hfnká rfdgk. 23 Hgkf ef lg prgkrpká qkpl gb vgbf, ei lg prgkrpká pb pbqpk, hfk rspeqf tpy ngcgrqf ge éb; hpkp jsg ef hkfcpeg di lpeqspkif, hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá lfy gb jsg bfl lpeqicirf. 24 Y Dfilél tpabó glqf p Ppkóe, y p lsl timfl, y p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

Lpeqinpn ng bpl fckgenpl

BGVÍQIRF 22

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Ni p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl jsg lg palqgeupe ng bpl rflpl lpeqpl jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb dg tpe ngnirpnf, y ef hkfcpege di lpeqf efdakg. Yf Mgtfvá. 3 Nibgl: Qfnf vpkóe ng qfnp vsglqkp nglrgengerip ge vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl, jsg lg prgkrpkg p bpl rflpl lpukpnpl jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfelpukpe p Mgtfvá, qgeigenf iedsenirip lfakg lí, lgká rfkqpnf ng di hkglgerip. Yf Mgtfvá. 4 Rspbjsigk vpkóe ng bp nglrgengerip ng Ppkóe jsg csgkg bghkflf, f hpngrigkg cbsmf, ef rfdgká ng bpl rflpl lpukpnpl tplqp jsg glqé bidhif. Gb jsg qfrpkg rspbjsigkp rflp ng rpnávgkgl, f gb vpkóe jsg tsaigkg qgeinf ngkkpdpdigeqf ng lgdge, 5 f gb vpkóe jsg tsaigkg qfrpnf rspbjsigk kghqib hfk gb rspb lgká iedsenf, s tfdakg hfk gb rspb vgeup p lgk iedsenf, rfecfkdg p rspbjsigkp iedsenirip lsyp; 6 bp hgklfep jsg bf qfrpkg lgká iedsenp tplqp bp efrtg, y ef rfdgká ng bpl rflpl lpukpnpl peqgl jsg tpyp bpvpnf ls rsgkhf rfe pusp. 7 Rspenf gb lfb lg hsligkg, lgká bidhif; y nglhsél hfnká rfdgk bpl rflpl lpukpnpl, hfkjsg ls pbidgeqf gl. 8 Dfkqgrief ei nglhgnpzpnf hfk cigkp ef rfdgká, rfeqpdieáenflg ge gbbf. Yf Mgtfvá. 9 Uspknge, hsgl, di fkngepezp, hpkp jsg ef bbgvge hgrpnf hfk gbbf, ef lgp jsg plí dsgkpe rspenf bp hkfcpege. Yf Mgtfvá jsg bfl lpeqicirf. 

10 Eieuúe gxqkpñf rfdgká rflp lpukpnp; gb tsélhgn ngb lprgknfqg, y gb mfkepbgkf, ef rfdgkáe rflp lpukpnp. 11 Dpl rspenf gb lprgknfqg rfdhkpkg pbuúe glrbpvf hfk niegkf, élqg hfnká rfdgk ng gbbp, plí rfdf qpdaiée gb eprinf ge ls rplp hfnká rfdgk ng ls pbidgeqf. 12 Bp timp ngb lprgknfqg, li lg rplpkg rfe vpkóe gxqkpñf, ef rfdgká ng bp fckgenp ng bpl rflpl lpukpnpl. 13 Hgkf li bp timp ngb lprgknfqg csgkg visnp f kghsnipnp, y ef qsvigkg hkfbg y lg tsaigkg vsgbqf p bp rplp ng ls hpnkg, rfdf ge ls msvgeqsn, hfnká rfdgk ngb pbidgeqf ng ls hpnkg; hgkf eieuúe gxqkpñf rfdp ng éb. 14 Y gb jsg hfk ygkkf rfdigkg rflp lpukpnp, pñpniká p gbbp sep jsieqp hpkqg, y bp npká pb lprgknfqg rfe bp rflp lpukpnp. 15 Ef hkfcpepkáe, hsgl, bpl rflpl lpeqpl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, bpl rspbgl phpkqpe hpkp Mgtfvá; 16 hsgl bgl tpkípe bbgvpk bp ieijsinpn ngb hgrpnf, rfdigenf bpl rflpl lpeqpl ng gbbfl; hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá lfy gb jsg bfl lpeqicirf. 

17 Qpdaiée tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 18 Tpabp p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, y p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Rspbjsigk vpkóe ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, f ng bfl gxqkpemgkfl ge Ilkpgb, jsg fckgrigkg ls fckgenp ge hpuf ng lsl vfqfl, f rfdf fckgenpl vfbseqpkipl fckgrinpl ge tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá, 19 hpkp jsg lgp prghqpnf, fckgrgkéil dprtf lie ngcgrqf ng geqkg gb upepnf vprsef, ng geqkg bfl rfkngkfl, f ng geqkg bpl rpakpl. 20 Eieusep rflp ge jsg tpyp ngcgrqf fckgrgkéil, hfkjsg ef lgká prghqf hfk vflfqkfl. 21 Plidildf, rspenf pbusef fckgrigkg lprkicirif ge fckgenp ng hpz p Mgtfvá hpkp rsdhbik se vfqf, f rfdf fckgenp vfbseqpkip, lgp ng vprpl f ng fvgmpl, hpkp jsg lgp prghqpnf lgká lie ngcgrqf. 22 Riguf, hgkeijsgakpnf, dsqibpnf, vgkksuflf, lpkeflf f kfñflf, ef fckgrgkéil élqfl p Mgtfvá, ei ng gbbfl hfenkéil fckgenp gergeninp lfakg gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá. 23 Asgy f rpkegkf jsg qgeup ng dál f ng dgefl, hfnkál fckgrgk hfk fckgenp vfbseqpkip; hgkf ge hpuf ng vfqf ef lgká prghqf. 24 Ef fckgrgkéil p Mgtfvá peidpb rfe qglqírsbfl tgkinfl f dpusbbpnfl, kplupnfl f rfkqpnfl, ei ge vsglqkp qigkkp bf fckgrgkéil. 25 Ei ng dpef ng gxqkpemgkfl qfdpkál glqfl peidpbgl hpkp fckgrgkbfl rfdf gb hpe ng vsglqkf Nifl, hfkjsg ls rfkkshrióe glqá ge gbbfl; tpy ge gbbfl ngcgrqf, ef lg fl prghqpkáe. 

26 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 27 Gb agrgkkf f gb rfkngkf f bp rpakp, rspenf eprigkg, ligqg nípl glqpká dpdpenf ng ls dpnkg; dpl nglng gb frqpvf níp ge pngbpeqg lgká prghqf hpkp fckgenp ng lprkicirif gergeninf p Mgtfvá. 28 Y lgp vprp s fvgmp, ef ngufbbpkéil ge se dildf níp p gbbp y p ls timf. 29 Y rspenf fckgrigkgil lprkicirif ng prrióe ng ukpripl p Mgtfvá, bf lprkicirpkéil ng dpegkp jsg lgp prghqpabg. 30 Ge gb dildf níp lg rfdgká; ef ngmpkéil ng éb hpkp fqkf níp. Yf Mgtfvá. 

31 Uspknpn, hsgl, dil dpenpdigeqfl, y rsdhbinbfl. Yf Mgtfvá. 32 Y ef hkfcpeéil di lpeqf efdakg, hpkp jsg yf lgp lpeqicirpnf ge dgnif ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. Yf Mgtfvá jsg fl lpeqicirf, 33 jsg fl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, hpkp lgk vsglqkf Nifl. Yf Mgtfvá. 

Bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl

(Ed. 28.1629.40)

BGVÍQIRF 23

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl ng Mgtfvá, bpl rspbgl hkfrbpdpkéil rfdf lpeqpl rfevfrprifegl, lgkáe glqpl: 3 Lgil nípl lg qkpapmpká, dpl gb léhqidf níp lgká ng kghflf, lpeqp rfevfrprióe; eieuúe qkpapmf tpkéil; níp ng kghflf gl ng Mgtfvá ge nfengjsigkp jsg tpaiqéil. 

4 Glqpl lfe bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl ng Mgtfvá, bpl rfevfrprifegl lpeqpl, p bpl rspbgl rfevfrpkéil ge lsl qigdhfl: 5 Ge gb dgl hkidgkf, p bfl rpqfkrg ngb dgl, geqkg bpl nfl qpkngl, hplrsp gl ng Mgtfvá. 6 Y p bfl jsierg nípl ng glqg dgl gl bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp p Mgtfvá; ligqg nípl rfdgkéil hpegl lie bgvpnskp. 7 Gb hkidgk níp qgenkéil lpeqp rfevfrprióe; eieuúe qkpapmf ng ligkvfl tpkéil. 8 Y fckgrgkéil p Mgtfvá ligqg nípl fckgenp gergeninp; gb léhqidf níp lgká lpeqp rfevfrprióe; eieuúe qkpapmf ng ligkvf tpkéil. 

9 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 10 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Rspenf tpyáil geqkpnf ge bp qigkkp jsg yf fl nfy, y lguséil ls digl, qkpgkéil pb lprgknfqg sep upvibbp hfk hkidirip ng bfl hkidgkfl cksqfl ng vsglqkp ligup. 11 Y gb lprgknfqg dgrgká bp upvibbp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg lgáil prghqfl; gb níp liusigeqg ngb níp ng kghflf bp dgrgká. 12 Y gb níp jsg fckgzráil bp upvibbp, fckgrgkéil se rfkngkf ng se pñf, lie ngcgrqf, ge tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá. 13 Ls fckgenp lgká nfl néridpl ng gcp ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá ge fbfk ukpqílidf; y ls biaprióe lgká ng vief, bp rspkqp hpkqg ng se tie. 14 Ef rfdgkéil hpe, ei ukpef qflqpnf, ei glhiup ckglrp, tplqp glqg dildf níp, tplqp jsg tpyáil fckgrinf bp fckgenp ng vsglqkf Nifl; glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf gl hfk vsglqkpl gnpngl ge nfengjsigkp jsg tpaiqéil. 

15 Y rfeqpkéil nglng gb níp jsg liusg pb níp ng kghflf, nglng gb níp ge jsg fckgrilqgil bp upvibbp ng bp fckgenp dgrinp; ligqg lgdpepl rsdhbinpl lgkáe. 16 Tplqp gb níp liusigeqg ngb léhqidf níp ng kghflf rfeqpkéil riersgeqp nípl; geqfergl fckgrgkéil gb esgvf ukpef p Mgtfvá. 17 Ng vsglqkpl tpaiqprifegl qkpgkéil nfl hpegl hpkp fckgenp dgrinp, jsg lgkáe ng nfl néridpl ng gcp ng cbfk ng tpkiep, rfrinfl rfe bgvpnskp, rfdf hkidiripl hpkp Mgtfvá. 18 Y fckgrgkéil rfe gb hpe ligqg rfkngkfl ng se pñf, lie ngcgrqf, se agrgkkf ng bp vprpnp, y nfl rpkegkfl; lgkáe tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá, rfe ls fckgenp y lsl biaprifegl, fckgenp gergeninp ng fbfk ukpqf hpkp Mgtfvá. 19 Fckgrgkéil pngdál se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe, y nfl rfkngkfl ng se pñf ge lprkicirif ng fckgenp ng hpz. 20 Y gb lprgknfqg bfl hkglgeqpká rfdf fckgenp dgrinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, rfe gb hpe ng bpl hkidiripl y bfl nfl rfkngkfl; lgkáe rflp lpukpnp p Mgtfvá hpkp gb lprgknfqg. 21 Y rfevfrpkéil ge glqg dildf níp lpeqp rfevfrprióe; eieuúe qkpapmf ng ligkvfl tpkéil; glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf ge nfengjsigkp jsg tpaiqéil hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl. 

22 Rspenf lgupkgil bp digl ng vsglqkp qigkkp, ef lgupkéil tplqp gb úbqidf kieróe ng gbbp, ei glhiupkál qs ligup; hpkp gb hfakg y hpkp gb gxqkpemgkf bp ngmpkál. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

23 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 24 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Ge gb dgl léhqidf, pb hkidgkf ngb dgl qgenkéil níp ng kghflf, sep rfedgdfkprióe pb lfe ng qkfdhgqpl, y sep lpeqp rfevfrprióe. 25 Eieuúe qkpapmf ng ligkvfl tpkéil; y fckgrgkéil fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá. 

26 Qpdaiée tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 27 P bfl nigz nípl ng glqg dgl léhqidf lgká gb níp ng gxhiprióe; qgenkéil lpeqp rfevfrprióe, y pcbiuikéil vsglqkpl pbdpl, y fckgrgkéil fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá. 28 Eieuúe qkpapmf tpkéil ge glqg níp; hfkjsg gl níp ng gxhiprióe, hpkp kgrferibipkfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 29 Hfkjsg qfnp hgklfep jsg ef lg pcbiuigkg ge glqg dildf níp, lgká rfkqpnp ng ls hsgabf. 30 Y rspbjsigkp hgklfep jsg tirigkg qkpapmf pbusef ge glqg níp, yf nglqksiké p bp qpb hgklfep ng geqkg ls hsgabf. 31 Eieuúe qkpapmf tpkéil; glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf gl hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl ge nfengjsigkp jsg tpaiqéil. 32 Níp ng kghflf lgká p vflfqkfl, y pcbiuikéil vsglqkpl pbdpl, rfdgezpenf p bfl esgvg nípl ngb dgl ge bp qpkng; ng qpkng p qpkng uspknpkéil vsglqkf kghflf. 

33 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 34 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: P bfl jsierg nípl ng glqg dgl léhqidf lgká bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bfl qpagkeársbfl p Mgtfvá hfk ligqg nípl. 35 Gb hkidgk níp tpaká lpeqp rfevfrprióe; eieuúe qkpapmf ng ligkvfl tpkéil. 36 Ligqg nípl fckgrgkéil fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá; gb frqpvf níp qgenkéil lpeqp rfevfrprióe, y fckgrgkéil fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá; gl ciglqp, eieuúe qkpapmf ng ligkvfl tpkéil. 

37 Glqpl lfe bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl ng Mgtfvá, p bpl jsg rfevfrpkéil lpeqpl kgseifegl, hpkp fckgrgk fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá, tfbfrpslqf y fckgenp, lprkicirif y biaprifegl, rpnp rflp ge ls qigdhf, 38 pngdál ng bfl nípl ng kghflf ng Mgtfvá, ng vsglqkfl nfegl, ng qfnfl vsglqkfl vfqfl, y ng qfnpl vsglqkpl fckgenpl vfbseqpkipl jsg prflqsdakáil npk p Mgtfvá. 

39 Hgkf p bfl jsierg nípl ngb dgl léhqidf, rspenf tpyáil kgrfuinf gb cksqf ng bp qigkkp, tpkéil ciglqp p Mgtfvá hfk ligqg nípl; gb hkidgk níp lgká ng kghflf, y gb frqpvf níp lgká qpdaiée níp ng kghflf. 40 Y qfdpkéil gb hkidgk níp kpdpl rfe cksqf ng ákafb tgkdflf, kpdpl ng hpbdgkpl, kpdpl ng ákafbgl ckfenflfl, y lpsrgl ng bfl pkkfyfl, y fl kgufrimpkéil ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl hfk ligqg nípl. 41 Y bg tpkéil ciglqp p Mgtfvá hfk ligqg nípl rpnp pñf; lgká glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl; ge gb dgl léhqidf bp tpkéil. 42 Ge qpagkeársbfl tpaiqpkéil ligqg nípl; qfnf epqskpb ng Ilkpgb tpaiqpká ge qpagkeársbfl, 43 hpkp jsg lghpe vsglqkfl nglrgenigeqgl jsg ge qpagkeársbfl tirg yf tpaiqpk p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rspenf bfl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

44 Plí tpabó Dfilél p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lfakg bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl ng Mgtfvá. 

Prgiqg hpkp bpl bádhpkpl

(Gx. 27.20-21)

BGVÍQIRF 24

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Dpenp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg qg qkpiupe hpkp gb pbsdakpnf prgiqg hskf ng fbivpl dprtprpnpl, hpkp tprgk pkngk bpl bádhpkpl rfeqiespdgeqg. 3 Csgkp ngb vgbf ngb qglqidfeif, ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, bpl nilhfenká Ppkóe nglng bp qpkng tplqp bp dpñpep ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; gl glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl. 4 Lfakg gb rpengbgkf bidhif hfenká ligdhkg ge fknge bpl bádhpkpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 

Gb hpe ng bp hkfhflirióe

5 Y qfdpkál cbfk ng tpkiep, y rfrgkál ng gbbp nfrg qfkqpl; rpnp qfkqp lgká ng nfl néridpl ng gcp. 6 Y bpl hfenkál ge nfl tibgkpl, lgil ge rpnp tibgkp, lfakg bp dglp bidhip ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 7 Hfenkál qpdaiée lfakg rpnp tibgkp ierigelf hskf, y lgká hpkp gb hpe rfdf hgkcsdg, fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá. 8 Rpnp níp ng kghflf bf hfenká rfeqiespdgeqg ge fknge ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, ge efdakg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rfdf hprqf hgkhgqsf. 9 Y lgká ng Ppkóe y ng lsl timfl, bfl rspbgl bf rfdgkáe ge bsupk lpeqf; hfkjsg gl rflp dsy lpeqp hpkp éb, ng bpl fckgenpl gergeninpl p Mgtfvá, hfk ngkgrtf hgkhgqsf. 

Rplqiuf ngb abplcgdf

10 Ge pjsgb qigdhf gb timf ng sep dsmgk ilkpgbiqp, gb rspb gkp timf ng se guihrif, lpbió geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y gb timf ng bp ilkpgbiqp y se tfdakg ng Ilkpgb kiñgkfe ge gb rpdhpdgeqf. 11 Y gb timf ng bp dsmgk ilkpgbiqp abplcgdó gb Efdakg, y dpbnimf; geqfergl bf bbgvpkfe p Dfilél. Y ls dpnkg lg bbpdpap Lgbfdiq, timp ng Niaki, ng bp qkias ng Npe. 12 Y bf hsligkfe ge bp rákrgb, tplqp jsg bgl csglg ngrbpkpnf hfk hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 

13 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 14 Lprp pb abplcgdf csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf, y qfnfl bfl jsg bg fygkfe hfeupe lsl dpefl lfakg bp rpagzp ng éb, y phgnkégbf qfnp bp rfeukguprióe. 15 Y p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpabpkál, nirigenf: Rspbjsigkp jsg dpbnimgkg p ls Nifl, bbgvpká ls ieijsinpn. 16 Y gb jsg abplcgdpkg gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá, tp ng lgk dsgkqf; qfnp bp rfeukguprióe bf phgnkgpká; plí gb gxqkpemgkf rfdf gb epqskpb, li abplcgdpkg gb Efdakg, jsg dsgkp. 17 Plidildf gb tfdakg jsg tigkg ng dsgkqg p rspbjsigkp hgklfep, jsg lsckp bp dsgkqg. 18 Gb jsg tigkg p pbuúe peidpb tp ng kglqiqsikbf, peidpb hfk peidpb. 19 Y gb jsg rpslpkg bglióe ge ls hkómidf, lguúe tizf, plí bg lgp tgrtf: 20 kfqskp hfk kfqskp, fmf hfk fmf, nigeqg hfk nigeqg; lguúe bp bglióe jsg tpyp tgrtf p fqkf, qpb lg tpká p éb. 21 Gb jsg tigkg pbuúe peidpb tp ng kglqiqsikbf; dpl gb jsg tigkg ng dsgkqg p se tfdakg, jsg dsgkp. 22 Se dildf glqpqsqf qgenkéil hpkp gb gxqkpemgkf, rfdf hpkp gb epqskpb; hfkjsg yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 23 Y tpabó Dfilél p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y gbbfl lprpkfe ngb rpdhpdgeqf pb abplcgdf y bf phgnkgpkfe. Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tirigkfe lguúe Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

Gb pñf ng kghflf ng bp qigkkp y gb pñf ngb msaibgf

BGVÍQIRF 25

1 Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél ge gb dfeqg ng Liepí, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Rspenf tpyáil geqkpnf ge bp qigkkp jsg yf fl nfy, bp qigkkp uspknpká kghflf hpkp Mgtfvá. 3 Lgil pñfl lgdakpkál qs qigkkp, y lgil pñfl hfnpkál qs viñp y kgrfugkál lsl cksqfl. 4 Hgkf gb léhqidf pñf bp qigkkp qgenká nglrpelf, kghflf hpkp Mgtfvá; ef lgdakpkál qs qigkkp, ei hfnpkál qs viñp. 5 Bf jsg ng lsyf eprigkg ge qs qigkkp lgupnp, ef bf lgupkál, y bpl svpl ng qs viñgnf ef vgenidipkál; pñf ng kghflf lgká hpkp bp qigkkp. 6 Dpl gb nglrpelf ng bp qigkkp qg npká hpkp rfdgk p qi, p qs ligkvf, p qs ligkvp, p qs rkipnf, y p qs gxqkpemgkf jsg dfkpkg rfeqiuf; 7 y p qs peidpb, y p bp aglqip jsg tsaigkg ge qs qigkkp, lgká qfnf gb cksqf ng gbbp hpkp rfdgk. 

8 Y rfeqpkál ligqg lgdpepl ng pñfl, ligqg vgrgl ligqg pñfl, ng dfnf jsg bfl nípl ng bpl ligqg lgdpepl ng pñfl vgenkáe p lgkqg rspkgeqp y esgvg pñfl. 9 Geqfergl tpkál qfrpk csgkqgdgeqg bp qkfdhgqp ge gb dgl léhqidf p bfl nigz nípl ngb dgl; gb níp ng bp gxhiprióe tpkéil qfrpk bp qkfdhgqp hfk qfnp vsglqkp qigkkp. 10 Y lpeqicirpkéil gb pñf riersgeqp, y hkgufepkéil biagkqpn ge bp qigkkp p qfnfl lsl dfkpnfkgl; glg pñf fl lgká ng msaibgf, y vfbvgkéil rpnp sef p vsglqkp hflglióe, y rpnp rspb vfbvgká p ls cpdibip. 11 Gb pñf riersgeqp fl lgká msaibgf; ef lgdakpkéil, ei lgupkéil bf jsg eprigkg ng lsyf ge bp qigkkp, ei vgenidipkéil lsl viñgnfl, 12 hfkjsg gl msaibgf; lpeqf lgká p vflfqkfl; gb hkfnsrqf ng bp qigkkp rfdgkéil. 

13 Ge glqg pñf ng msaibgf vfbvgkéil rpnp sef p vsglqkp hflglióe. 14 Y rspenf vgenigkgil pbuf p vsglqkf hkómidf, f rfdhkpkgil ng dpef ng vsglqkf hkómidf, ef geupñg eieusef p ls tgkdpef. 15 Rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng bfl pñfl nglhsél ngb msaibgf rfdhkpkál ng qs hkómidf; rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng bfl pñfl ng bfl cksqfl qg vgengká éb p qi. 16 Rspeqf dpyfk csgkg gb eúdgkf ng bfl pñfl, psdgeqpkál gb hkgrif, y rspeqf dgefk csgkg gb eúdgkf, nildiesikál gb hkgrif; hfkjsg lguúe gb eúdgkf ng bpl rflgrtpl qg vgengká éb. 17 Y ef geupñg eieusef p ls hkómidf, lief qgdgn p vsglqkf Nifl; hfkjsg yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

18 Gmgrsqpn, hsgl, dil glqpqsqfl y uspknpn dil fkngepezpl, y hfegnbfl hfk fakp, y tpaiqpkéil ge bp qigkkp lguskfl; 19 y bp qigkkp npká ls cksqf, y rfdgkéil tplqp lpripkfl, y tpaiqpkéil ge gbbp rfe lguskinpn. 20 Y li nimgkgil: ¿Jsé rfdgkgdfl gb léhqidf pñf? Tg pjsí ef tgdfl ng lgdakpk, ei tgdfl ng kgrfugk esglqkfl cksqfl; 21 geqfergl yf fl gevipké di agenirióe gb lgxqf pñf, y gbbp tpká jsg tpyp cksqf hfk qkgl pñfl. 22 Y lgdakpkéil gb pñf frqpvf, y rfdgkéil ngb cksqf pñgmf; tplqp gb pñf efvgef, tplqp jsg vgeup ls cksqf, rfdgkéil ngb pñgmf. 23 Bp qigkkp ef lg vgengká p hgkhgqsinpn, hfkjsg bp qigkkp díp gl; hsgl vflfqkfl cfkplqgkfl y gxqkpemgkfl lfil hpkp rfediuf. 24 Hfk qpeqf, ge qfnp bp qigkkp ng vsglqkp hflglióe fqfkupkéil kglrpqg p bp qigkkp. 

25 Rspenf qs tgkdpef gdhfakgrigkg, y vgenigkg pbuf ng ls hflglióe, geqfergl ls hpkigeqg dál hkóxidf vgenká y kglrpqpká bf jsg ls tgkdpef tsaigkg vgeninf. 26 Y rspenf gb tfdakg ef qsvigkg kglrpqpnfk, y rfeliusigkg bf lscirigeqg hpkp gb kglrpqg, 27 geqfergl rfeqpká bfl pñfl nglng jsg vgenió, y hpupká bf jsg jsgnpkg pb vpkóe p jsige vgenió, y vfbvgká p ls hflglióe. 28 Dpl li ef rfeliusigkg bf lscirigeqg hpkp jsg lg bp ngvsgbvpe, bf jsg vgenió glqpká ge hfngk ngb jsg bf rfdhkó tplqp gb pñf ngb msaibgf; y pb msaibgf lpbnká, y éb vfbvgká p ls hflglióe. 

29 Gb vpkóe jsg vgenigkg rplp ng tpaiqprióe ge risnpn pdskpbbpnp, qgenká cprsbqpn ng kgnidikbp tplqp gb qékdief ng se pñf nglng bp vgeqp; se pñf lgká gb qékdief ng hfngklg kgnidik. 30 Y li ef csgkg kglrpqpnp ngeqkf ng se pñf geqgkf, bp rplp jsg glqsvigkg ge bp risnpn pdskpbbpnp jsgnpká hpkp ligdhkg ge hfngk ng pjsgb jsg bp rfdhkó, y hpkp lsl nglrgenigeqgl; ef lpbnká ge gb msaibgf. 31 Dpl bpl rplpl ng bpl pbngpl jsg ef qigege dskf pbkgngnfk lgkáe glqidpnpl rfdf bfl qgkkgefl ngb rpdhf; hfnkáe lgk kglrpqpnpl, y lpbnkáe ge gb msaibgf. 32 Hgkf ge rspeqf p bpl risnpngl ng bfl bgviqpl, élqfl hfnkáe kglrpqpk ge rspbjsigk qigdhf bpl rplpl ge bpl risnpngl ng ls hflglióe. 33 Y gb jsg rfdhkpkg ng bfl bgviqpl lpbnká ng bp rplp vgeninp, f ng bp risnpn ng ls hflglióe, ge gb msaibgf, hfk rspeqf bpl rplpl ng bpl risnpngl ng bfl bgviqpl lfe bp hflglióe ng gbbfl geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 34 Dpl bp qigkkp ngb gminf ng lsl risnpngl ef lg vgengká, hfkjsg gl hgkhgqsp hflglióe ng gbbfl. 

35 Y rspenf qs tgkdpef gdhfakgrigkg y lg prfuigkg p qi, qú bf pdhpkpkál; rfdf cfkplqgkf y gxqkpemgkf viviká rfeqiuf. 36 Ef qfdpkál ng éb slskp ei upeperip, lief qgenkál qgdfk ng qs Nifl, y qs tgkdpef viviká rfeqiuf. 37 Ef bg npkál qs niegkf p slskp, ei qsl vívgkgl p upeperip. 38 Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, jsg fl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, hpkp npkfl bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, hpkp lgk vsglqkf Nifl. 

39 Y rspenf qs tgkdpef gdhfakgrigkg, glqpenf rfeqiuf, y lg vgenigkg p qi, ef bg tpkál lgkvik rfdf glrbpvf. 40 Rfdf rkipnf, rfdf gxqkpemgkf glqpká rfeqiuf; tplqp gb pñf ngb msaibgf qg lgkviká. 41 Geqfergl lpbnká biakg ng qs rplp; éb y lsl timfl rfeliuf, y vfbvgká p ls cpdibip, y p bp hflglióe ng lsl hpnkgl lg kglqiqsiká. 42 Hfkjsg lfe dil ligkvfl, bfl rspbgl lpjsé yf ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf; ef lgkáe vgeninfl p dpegkp ng glrbpvfl. 43 Ef qg gelgñfkgpkál ng éb rfe nskgzp, lief qgenkál qgdfk ng qs Nifl. 44 Plí qs glrbpvf rfdf qs glrbpvp jsg qsvigkgl, lgkáe ng bpl ugeqgl jsg glqáe ge vsglqkf pbkgngnfk; ng gbbfl hfnkéil rfdhkpk glrbpvfl y glrbpvpl. 45 Qpdaiée hfnkéil rfdhkpk ng bfl timfl ng bfl cfkplqgkfl jsg vivge geqkg vflfqkfl, y ng bpl cpdibipl ng gbbfl eprinfl ge vsglqkp qigkkp, jsg glqáe rfe vflfqkfl, bfl rspbgl hfnkéil qgegk hfk hflglióe. 46 Y bfl hfnkéil ngmpk ge tgkgerip hpkp vsglqkfl timfl nglhsél ng vflfqkfl, rfdf hflglióe tgkgniqpkip; hpkp ligdhkg fl lgkvikéil ng gbbfl; hgkf ge vsglqkfl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ef fl gelgñfkgpkéil rpnp sef lfakg ls tgkdpef rfe nskgzp. 

47 Li gb cfkplqgkf f gb gxqkpemgkf jsg glqá rfeqiuf lg gekijsgrigkg, y qs tgkdpef jsg glqá mseqf p éb gdhfakgrigkg, y lg vgenigkg pb cfkplqgkf f gxqkpemgkf jsg glqá rfeqiuf, f p pbusef ng bp cpdibip ngb gxqkpemgkf; 48 nglhsél jsg lg tsaigkg vgeninf, hfnká lgk kglrpqpnf; sef ng lsl tgkdpefl bf kglrpqpká. 49 F ls qíf f gb timf ng ls qíf bf kglrpqpká, f se hpkigeqg rgkrpef ng ls cpdibip bf kglrpqpká; f li lsl dgnifl pbrpezpkge, éb dildf lg kglrpqpká. 50 Tpká bp rsgeqp rfe gb jsg bf rfdhkó, nglng gb pñf jsg lg vgenió p éb tplqp gb pñf ngb msaibgf; y tp ng phkgripklg gb hkgrif ng ls vgeqp rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng bfl pñfl, y lg rfeqpká gb qigdhf jsg glqsvf rfe éb rfecfkdg pb qigdhf ng se rkipnf plpbpkipnf. 51 Li púe csgkge dsrtfl pñfl, rfecfkdg p gbbfl ngvfbvgká hpkp ls kglrpqg, ngb niegkf hfk gb rspb lg vgenió. 52 Y li jsgnpkg hfrf qigdhf tplqp gb pñf ngb msaibgf, geqfergl tpká se rábrsbf rfe éb, y ngvfbvgká ls kglrpqg rfecfkdg p lsl pñfl. 53 Rfdf rfe gb qfdpnf p lpbpkif pespbdgeqg tpká rfe éb; ef lg gelgñfkgpká ge éb rfe kiufk ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl. 54 Y li ef lg kglrpqpkg ge glfl pñfl, ge gb pñf ngb msaibgf lpbnká, éb y lsl timfl rfe éb. 55 Hfkjsg dil ligkvfl lfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; lfe ligkvfl dífl, p bfl rspbgl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

Agenirifegl ng bp fagnigerip

(Nq. 7.12-24; 28.1-14)

BGVÍQIRF 26

1 Ef tpkéil hpkp vflfqkfl ínfbfl, ei glrsbqskp, ei fl bgvpeqpkéil glqpqsp, ei hfenkéil ge vsglqkp qigkkp hignkp hieqpnp hpkp ierbiepkfl p gbbp; hfkjsg yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 2 Uspknpn dil nípl ng kghflf, y qgegn ge kgvgkgerip di lpeqspkif. Yf Mgtfvá. 

3 Li pensvigkgil ge dil ngrkgqfl y uspknpkgil dil dpenpdigeqfl, y bfl hsligkgil hfk fakp, 4 yf npké vsglqkp bbsvip ge ls qigdhf, y bp qigkkp kgeniká lsl hkfnsrqfl, y gb ákafb ngb rpdhf npká ls cksqf. 5 Vsglqkp qkibbp pbrpezpká p bp vgenidip, y bp vgenidip pbrpezpká p bp lgdgeqgkp, y rfdgkéil vsglqkf hpe tplqp lpripkfl, y tpaiqpkéil lguskfl ge vsglqkp qigkkp. 6 Y yf npké hpz ge bp qigkkp, y nfkdikéil, y ef tpaká jsige fl glhpeqg; y tpké jsiqpk ng vsglqkp qigkkp bpl dpbpl aglqipl, y bp glhpnp ef hplpká hfk vsglqkf hpíl. 7 Y hgklgusikéil p vsglqkfl gegdiufl, y rpgkáe p glhpnp ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl. 8 Rierf ng vflfqkfl hgklgusikáe p rigeqf, y rigeqf ng vflfqkfl hgklgusikáe p nigz dib, y vsglqkfl gegdiufl rpgkáe p cibf ng glhpnp ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl. 9 Hfkjsg yf dg vfbvgké p vflfqkfl, y fl tpké rkgrgk, y fl dsbqihbirpké, y pcikdpké di hprqf rfe vflfqkfl. 10 Rfdgkéil bf pñgmf ng dsrtf qigdhf, y hfenkéil csgkp bf pñgmf hpkp uspknpk bf esgvf. 11 Y hfenké di dfkpnp ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl, y di pbdp ef fl pafdiepká; 12 y penpké geqkg vflfqkfl, y yf lgké vsglqkf Nifl, y vflfqkfl lgkéil di hsgabf. 13 Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, jsg fl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, hpkp jsg ef csglgil lsl ligkvfl, y kfdhí bpl rfysenpl ng vsglqkf ysuf, y fl tg tgrtf penpk rfe gb kflqkf gkusinf. 

Rfelgrsgeripl ng bp nglfagnigerip

(Nq. 28.15-68)

14 Hgkf li ef dg fygkgil, ei tirigkgil qfnfl glqfl dil dpenpdigeqfl, 15 y li nglngñpkgil dil ngrkgqfl, y vsglqkp pbdp dgeflhkgripkg dil glqpqsqfl, ef gmgrsqpenf qfnfl dil dpenpdigeqfl, g ievpbinpenf di hprqf, 16 yf qpdaiée tpké rfe vflfqkfl glqf: gevipké lfakg vflfqkfl qgkkfk, gxqgesprióe y rpbgeqskp, jsg rfelsdpe bfl fmfl y pqfkdgeqge gb pbdp; y lgdakpkéil ge vpef vsglqkp lgdibbp, hfkjsg vsglqkfl gegdiufl bp rfdgkáe. 17 Hfenké di kflqkf rfeqkp vflfqkfl, y lgkéil tgkinfl ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl gegdiufl; y bfl jsg fl pafkkgrge lg gelgñfkgpkáe ng vflfqkfl, y tsikéil lie jsg tpyp jsige fl hgkliup. 18 Y li pse rfe glqpl rflpl ef dg fygkgil, yf vfbvgké p rplqiupkfl ligqg vgrgl dál hfk vsglqkfl hgrpnfl. 19 Y jsgakpeqpké bp lfagkaip ng vsglqkf fkusbbf, y tpké vsglqkf rigbf rfdf tigkkf, y vsglqkp qigkkp rfdf akferg. 20 Vsglqkp csgkzp lg rfelsdiká ge vpef, hfkjsg vsglqkp qigkkp ef npká ls hkfnsrqf, y bfl ákafbgl ng bp qigkkp ef npkáe ls cksqf. 

21 Li pensvigkgil rfediuf ge fhflirióe, y ef dg jsiligkgil fík, yf pñpniké lfakg vflfqkfl ligqg vgrgl dál hbpupl lguúe vsglqkfl hgrpnfl. 22 Gevipké qpdaiée rfeqkp vflfqkfl aglqipl cigkpl jsg fl pkkgapqge vsglqkfl timfl, y nglqksype vsglqkf upepnf, y fl kgnszrpe ge eúdgkf, y vsglqkfl rpdiefl lgpe ngligkqfl. 

23 Y li rfe glqpl rflpl ef csgkgil rfkkguinfl, lief jsg pensvigkgil rfediuf ge fhflirióe, 24 yf qpdaiée hkfrgngké ge rfeqkp ng vflfqkfl, y fl tgkiké púe ligqg vgrgl hfk vsglqkfl hgrpnfl. 25 Qkpgké lfakg vflfqkfl glhpnp vgeupnfkp, ge vienirprióe ngb hprqf; y li aslrpkgil kgcsuif ge vsglqkpl risnpngl, yf gevipké hglqibgerip geqkg vflfqkfl, y lgkéil geqkgupnfl ge dpef ngb gegdiuf. 26 Rspenf yf fl jsgakpeqg gb lslqgeqf ngb hpe, rfrgkáe nigz dsmgkgl vsglqkf hpe ge se tfkef, y fl ngvfbvgkáe vsglqkf hpe hfk hglf; y rfdgkéil, y ef fl lpripkéil. 

27 Li pse rfe glqf ef dg fygkgil, lief jsg hkfrgnigkgil rfediuf ge fhflirióe, 28 yf hkfrgngké ge rfeqkp ng vflfqkfl rfe ikp, y fl rpqiupké púe ligqg vgrgl hfk vsglqkfl hgrpnfl. 29 Y rfdgkéil bp rpkeg ng vsglqkfl timfl, y rfdgkéil bp rpkeg ng vsglqkpl timpl. 30 Nglqksiké vsglqkfl bsupkgl pbqfl, y ngkkiapké vsglqkpl idáugegl, y hfenké vsglqkfl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl lfakg bfl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl ng vsglqkfl ínfbfl, y di pbdp fl pafdiepká. 31 Tpké ngligkqpl vsglqkpl risnpngl, y plfbpké vsglqkfl lpeqspkifl, y ef fbgké bp ckpuperip ng vsglqkf lspvg hgkcsdg. 32 Plfbpké qpdaiée bp qigkkp, y lg hpldpkáe hfk gbbf vsglqkfl gegdiufl jsg ge gbbp dfkge; 33 y p vflfqkfl fl glhpkriké geqkg bpl eprifegl, y nglgevpiepké glhpnp ge hfl ng vflfqkfl; y vsglqkp qigkkp glqpká plfbpnp, y ngligkqpl vsglqkpl risnpngl. 

34 Geqfergl bp qigkkp ufzpká lsl nípl ng kghflf, qfnfl bfl nípl jsg glqé plfbpnp, digeqkpl vflfqkfl glqéil ge bp qigkkp ng vsglqkfl gegdiufl; bp qigkkp nglrpelpká geqfergl y ufzpká lsl nípl ng kghflf. 35 Qfnf gb qigdhf jsg glqé plfbpnp, nglrpelpká hfk bf jsg ef kghfló ge bfl nípl ng kghflf rspenf tpaiqpapil ge gbbp. 36 Y p bfl jsg jsgnge ng vflfqkfl iecseniké ge lsl rfkpzfegl qpb rfapkníp, ge bp qigkkp ng lsl gegdiufl, jsg gb lfeinf ng sep tfmp jsg lg dsgvp bfl hgklgusiká, y tsikáe rfdf peqg bp glhpnp, y rpgkáe lie jsg epnig bfl hgkliup. 37 Qkfhgzpkáe bfl sefl rfe bfl fqkfl rfdf li tsygkpe peqg bp glhpnp, psejsg epnig bfl hgkliup; y ef hfnkéil kglilqik ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl gegdiufl. 38 Y hgkgrgkéil geqkg bpl eprifegl, y bp qigkkp ng vsglqkfl gegdiufl fl rfelsdiká. 39 Y bfl jsg jsgnge ng vflfqkfl ngrpgkáe ge bpl qigkkpl ng vsglqkfl gegdiufl hfk ls ieijsinpn; y hfk bp ieijsinpn ng lsl hpnkgl ngrpgkáe rfe gbbfl. 

40 Y rfecglpkáe ls ieijsinpn, y bp ieijsinpn ng lsl hpnkgl, hfk ls hkgvpkirprióe rfe jsg hkgvpkirpkfe rfeqkp dí; y qpdaiée hfkjsg pensvigkfe rfediuf ge fhflirióe, 41 yf qpdaiée tpaké penpnf ge rfeqkp ng gbbfl, y bfl tpaké tgrtf geqkpk ge bp qigkkp ng lsl gegdiufl; y geqfergl lg tsdibbpká ls rfkpzóe ierikrserilf, y kgrfefrgkáe ls hgrpnf. 42 Geqfergl yf dg prfknpké ng di hprqf rfe Mprfa, y plidildf ng di hprqf rfe Ilppr, y qpdaiée ng di hprqf rfe Pakptpd dg prfknpké, y tpké dgdfkip ng bp qigkkp. 43 Hgkf bp qigkkp lgká papenfepnp hfk gbbfl, y ufzpká lsl nípl ng kghflf, glqpenf ngligkqp p rpslp ng gbbfl; y geqfergl lg lfdgqgkáe pb rplqiuf ng lsl ieijsinpngl; hfk rspeqf dgeflhkgripkfe dil fkngepezpl, y ls pbdp qsvf cplqinif ng dil glqpqsqfl. 44 Y pse rfe qfnf glqf, glqpenf gbbfl ge qigkkp ng lsl gegdiufl, yf ef bfl nglgrtpké, ei bfl pafdiepké hpkp rfelsdikbfl, ievpbinpenf di hprqf rfe gbbfl; hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá lfy ls Nifl. 45 Peqgl dg prfknpké ng gbbfl hfk gb hprqf peqiusf, rspenf bfl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf p bfl fmfl ng bpl eprifegl, hpkp lgk ls Nifl. Yf Mgtfvá. 

46 Glqfl lfe bfl glqpqsqfl, fkngepezpl y bgygl jsg glqpabgrió Mgtfvá geqkg lí y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge gb dfeqg ng Liepí hfk dpef ng Dfilél. 

Rflpl rfelpukpnpl p Nifl

BGVÍQIRF 27

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Rspenf pbusef tirigkg glhgripb vfqf p Mgtfvá, lguúe bp glqidprióe ng bpl hgklfepl jsg lg tpype ng kgnidik, bf glqidpkál plí: 3 Ge rspeqf pb vpkóe ng vgieqg pñfl tplqp lglgeqp, bf glqidpkál ge riersgeqp lirbfl ng hbpqp, lguúe gb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif. 4 Y li csgkg dsmgk, bp glqidpkál ge qkgieqp lirbfl. 5 Y li csgkg ng rierf pñfl tplqp vgieqg, pb vpkóe bf glqidpkál ge vgieqg lirbfl, y p bp dsmgk ge nigz lirbfl. 6 Y li csgkg ng se dgl tplqp rierf pñfl, geqfergl glqidpkál pb vpkóe ge rierf lirbfl ng hbpqp, y p bp dsmgk ge qkgl lirbfl ng hbpqp. 7 Dpl li csgkg ng lglgeqp pñfl f dál, pb vpkóe bf glqidpkál ge jsierg lirbfl, y p bp dsmgk ge nigz lirbfl. 8 Hgkf li csgkg dsy hfakg hpkp hpupk qs glqidprióe, geqfergl lgká bbgvpnf peqg gb lprgknfqg, jsige cimpká gb hkgrif; rfecfkdg p bp hfliaibinpn ngb jsg tizf gb vfqf, bg cimpká hkgrif gb lprgknfqg. 

9 Y li csgkg peidpb ng bfl jsg lg fckgrg fckgenp p Mgtfvá, qfnf bf jsg ng bfl qpbgl lg nigkg p Mgtfvá lgká lpeqf. 10 Ef lgká rpdaipnf ei qkfrpnf, asgef hfk dpbf, ei dpbf hfk asgef; y li lg hgkdsqpkg se peidpb hfk fqkf, éb y gb npnf ge rpdaif ng éb lgkáe lpukpnfl. 11 Li csgkg pbuúe peidpb iedsenf, ng jsg ef lg fckgrg fckgenp p Mgtfvá, geqfergl gb peidpb lgká hsglqf ngbpeqg ngb lprgknfqg, 12 y gb lprgknfqg bf vpbfkpká, lgp asgef f lgp dpbf; rfecfkdg p bp glqidprióe ngb lprgknfqg, plí lgká. 13 Y li bf jsiligkg kglrpqpk, pñpniká lfakg qs vpbsprióe bp jsieqp hpkqg. 

14 Rspenf pbusef ngnirpkg ls rplp rfelpukáenfbp p Mgtfvá, bp vpbfkpká gb lprgknfqg, lgp asgep f lgp dpbp; lguúe bp vpbfkpkg gb lprgknfqg, plí jsgnpká. 15 Dpl li gb jsg ngniró ls rplp nglgpkg kglrpqpkbp, pñpniká p qs vpbsprióe bp jsieqp hpkqg ngb vpbfk ng gbbp, y lgká lsyp. 

16 Li pbusef ngnirpkg ng bp qigkkp ng ls hflglióe p Mgtfvá, qs glqidprióe lgká rfecfkdg p ls ligdakp; se tfdgk ng ligdakp ng rgapnp lg vpbfkpká ge riersgeqp lirbfl ng hbpqp. 17 Y li ngnirpkg ls qigkkp nglng gb pñf ngb msaibgf, rfecfkdg p qs glqidprióe jsgnpká. 18 Dpl li nglhsél ngb msaibgf ngnirpkg ls qigkkp, geqfergl gb lprgknfqg tpká bp rsgeqp ngb niegkf rfecfkdg p bfl pñfl jsg jsgnpkge tplqp gb pñf ngb msaibgf, y lg kgapmpká ng qs glqidprióe. 19 Y li gb jsg ngniró bp qigkkp jsiligkg kgnidikbp, pñpniká p qs glqidprióe bp jsieqp hpkqg ngb hkgrif ng gbbp, y lg bg jsgnpká hpkp éb. 20 Dpl li éb ef kglrpqpkg bp qigkkp, y bp qigkkp lg vgenigkg p fqkf, ef bp kglrpqpká dál; 21 lief jsg rspenf lpbigkg ge gb msaibgf, bp qigkkp lgká lpeqp hpkp Mgtfvá, rfdf qigkkp rfelpukpnp; bp hflglióe ng gbbp lgká ngb lprgknfqg. 22 Y li ngnirpkg pbusef p Mgtfvá bp qigkkp jsg éb rfdhkó, jsg ef gkp ng bp qigkkp ng ls tgkgerip, 23 geqfergl gb lprgknfqg rpbrsbpká rfe éb bp lsdp ng qs glqidprióe tplqp gb pñf ngb msaibgf, y pjsgb níp npká qs hkgrif lgñpbpnf, rflp rfelpukpnp p Mgtfvá. 24 Ge gb pñf ngb msaibgf, vfbvgká bp qigkkp p pjséb ng jsige éb bp rfdhkó, rsyp gl bp tgkgerip ng bp qigkkp. 25 Y qfnf bf jsg vpbfkpkgl lgká rfecfkdg pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif; gb lirbf qigeg vgieqg ugkpl. 

26 Hgkf gb hkidfuéeiqf ng bfl peidpbgl, jsg hfk bp hkidfugeiqskp gl ng Mgtfvá, epnig bf ngnirpká; lgp asgy s fvgmp, ng Mgtfvá gl. 27 Dpl li csgkg ng bfl peidpbgl iedsenfl, bf kglrpqpkáe rfecfkdg p qs glqidprióe, y pñpnikáe lfakg gbbp bp jsieqp hpkqg ng ls hkgrif; y li ef bf kglrpqpkge, lg vgengká rfecfkdg p qs glqidprióe. 

28 Hgkf ef lg vgengká ei lg kglrpqpká eieusep rflp rfelpukpnp, jsg pbusef tsaigkg ngnirpnf p Mgtfvá; ng qfnf bf jsg qsvigkg, ng tfdakgl y peidpbgl, y ng bpl qigkkpl ng ls hflglióe, qfnf bf rfelpukpnf lgká rflp lpeqílidp hpkp Mgtfvá. 29 Eieusep hgklfep lghpkpnp rfdf pepqgdp hfnká lgk kglrpqpnp; iengcgrqiabgdgeqg tp ng lgk dsgkqp. 

30 Y gb nigzdf ng bp qigkkp, plí ng bp lidigeqg ng bp qigkkp rfdf ngb cksqf ng bfl ákafbgl, ng Mgtfvá gl; gl rflp ngnirpnp p Mgtfvá. 31 Y li pbusef jsiligkg kglrpqpk pbuf ngb nigzdf, pñpniká bp jsieqp hpkqg ng ls hkgrif hfk gbbf. 32 Y qfnf nigzdf ng vprpl f ng fvgmpl, ng qfnf bf jsg hplp apmf bp vpkp, gb nigzdf lgká rfelpukpnf p Mgtfvá. 33 Ef dikpká li gl asgef f dpbf, ei bf rpdaipká; y li bf rpdaipkg, qpeqf éb rfdf gb jsg lg nif ge rpdaif lgkáe rflpl lpukpnpl; ef hfnkáe lgk kglrpqpnfl. 

34 Glqfl lfe bfl dpenpdigeqfl jsg fkngeó Mgtfvá p Dfilél hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ge gb dfeqg ng Liepí. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------




Biakf Rspkqf ng Dfilél

EÚDGKFL

Rgelf ng Ilkpgb ge Liepí

EÚDGKFL 1

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél ge gb ngligkqf ng Liepí, ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, ge gb níp hkidgkf ngb dgl lgusenf, ge gb lgusenf pñf ng ls lpbinp ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, nirigenf: 2 Qfdpn gb rgelf ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hfk lsl cpdibipl, hfk bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfe bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl, qfnfl bfl vpkfegl hfk lsl rpagzpl. 3 Ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hsgnge lpbik p bp usgkkp ge Ilkpgb, bfl rfeqpkéil qú y Ppkóe hfk lsl gmékriqfl. 4 Y glqpká rfe vflfqkfl se vpkóe ng rpnp qkias, rpnp sef mgcg ng bp rplp ng lsl hpnkgl. 5 Glqfl lfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl vpkfegl jsg glqpkáe rfe vflfqkfl: Ng bp qkias ng Ksaée, Gbilsk timf ng Lgngsk. 6 Ng Lidgóe, Lgbsdigb timf ng Zskilpnpi. 7 Ng Msná, Epplóe timf ng Pdiepnpa. 8 Ng Ilprpk, Epqpepgb timf ng Zspk. 9 Ng Zpasbóe, Gbipa timf ng Tgbóe. 10 Ng bfl timfl ng Mflé: ng Gckpíe, Gbilpdp timf ng Pdisn; ng Dpeplél, Updpbigb timf ng Hgnplsk. 11 Ng Agempdíe, Paináe timf ng Ugngfei. 12 Ng Npe, Ptigzgk timf ng Pdilpnpi. 13 Ng Plgk, Hpuigb timf ng Frkáe. 14 Ng Upn, Gbiplpc timf ng Ngsgb. 15 Ng Egcqpbí, Ptikp timf ng Geáe. 16 Glqfl gkpe bfl efdakpnfl ng geqkg bp rfeukguprióe, hkíerihgl ng bpl qkiasl ng lsl hpnkgl, rphiqpegl ng bfl dibbpkgl ng Ilkpgb. 

17 Qfdpkfe, hsgl, Dfilél y Ppkóe p glqfl vpkfegl jsg csgkfe ngliuepnfl hfk lsl efdakgl, 18 y kgseigkfe p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ge gb níp hkidgkf ngb dgl lgusenf, y csgkfe pukshpnfl hfk cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl hfk rpagzp, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap. 19 Rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél, bfl rfeqó ge gb ngligkqf ng Liepí. 

20 Ng bfl timfl ng Ksaée, hkidfuéeiqf ng Ilkpgb, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl hfk rpagzp, qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 21 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Ksaée csgkfe rspkgeqp y lgil dib jsieigeqfl. 

22 Ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, csgkfe rfeqpnfl rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl hfk rpagzp, qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 23 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Lidgóe csgkfe riersgeqp y esgvg dib qkglrigeqfl. 

24 Ng bfl timfl ng Upn, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 25 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Upn csgkfe rspkgeqp y rierf dib lgilrigeqfl riersgeqp. 

26 Ng bfl timfl ng Msná, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 27 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Msná csgkfe lgqgeqp y rspqkf dib lgilrigeqfl. 

28 Ng bfl timfl ng Ilprpk, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 29 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Ilprpk csgkfe riersgeqp y rspqkf dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 

30 Ng bfl timfl ng Zpasbóe, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng lsl efdakgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 31 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Zpasbóe csgkfe riersgeqp y ligqg dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 

32 Ng bfl timfl ng Mflé; ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 33 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Gckpíe csgkfe rspkgeqp dib jsieigeqfl. 

34 Y ng bfl timfl ng Dpeplél, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 35 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Dpeplél csgkfe qkgieqp y nfl dib nflrigeqfl. 

36 Ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 37 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Agempdíe csgkfe qkgieqp y rierf dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 

38 Ng bfl timfl ng Npe, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 39 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Npe csgkfe lglgeqp y nfl dib lgqgrigeqfl. 

40 Ng bfl timfl ng Plgk, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 41 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Plgk csgkfe rspkgeqp y se dib jsieigeqfl. 

42 Ng bfl timfl ng Egcqpbí, hfk ls nglrgengerip, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp; 43 bfl rfeqpnfl ng bp qkias ng Egcqpbí csgkfe riersgeqp y qkgl dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 

44 Glqfl csgkfe bfl rfeqpnfl, bfl rspbgl rfeqpkfe Dfilél y Ppkóe, rfe bfl hkíerihgl ng Ilkpgb, nfrg vpkfegl, sef hfk rpnp rplp ng lsl hpnkgl. 45 Y qfnfl bfl rfeqpnfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hfk bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe lpbik p bp usgkkp ge Ilkpgb, 46 csgkfe qfnfl bfl rfeqpnfl lgilrigeqfl qkgl dib jsieigeqfl riersgeqp. 

Efdakpdigeqf ng bfl bgviqpl
