47 Hgkf bfl bgviqpl, lguúe bp qkias ng lsl hpnkgl, ef csgkfe rfeqpnfl geqkg gbbfl; 48 hfkjsg tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 49 Lfbpdgeqg ef rfeqpkál bp qkias ng Bgví, ei qfdpkál bp rsgeqp ng gbbfl geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, 50 lief jsg hfenkál p bfl bgviqpl ge gb qpagkeársbf ngb qglqidfeif, y lfakg qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, y lfakg qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg bg hgkqgegrge; gbbfl bbgvpkáe gb qpagkeársbf y qfnfl lsl gelgkgl, y gbbfl lgkvikáe ge éb, y prpdhpkáe pbkgngnfk ngb qpagkeársbf. 51 Y rspenf gb qpagkeársbf tpyp ng qkplbpnpklg, bfl bgviqpl bf nglpkdpkáe, y rspenf gb qpagkeársbf tpyp ng ngqgegklg, bfl bgviqpl bf pkdpkáe; y gb gxqkpñf jsg lg prgkrpkg dfkiká. 52 Bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb prpdhpkáe rpnp sef ge ls rpdhpdgeqf, y rpnp sef mseqf p ls apengkp, hfk lsl gmékriqfl; 53 hgkf bfl bgviqpl prpdhpkáe pbkgngnfk ngb qpagkeársbf ngb qglqidfeif, hpkp jsg ef tpyp ikp lfakg bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y bfl bgviqpl qgenkáe bp uspknp ngb qpagkeársbf ngb qglqidfeif. 54 G tirigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg dpenó Mgtfvá p Dfilél; plí bf tirigkfe. 

Rpdhpdgeqfl y mgcgl ng bpl qkiasl

EÚDGKFL 2

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, nirigenf: 2 Bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb prpdhpkáe rpnp sef mseqf p ls apengkp, apmf bpl gelgñpl ng bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl; pbkgngnfk ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe prpdhpkáe. 3 Glqfl prpdhpkáe pb fkigeqg, pb glqg: bp apengkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng Msná, hfk lsl gmékriqfl; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Msná, Epplóe timf ng Pdiepnpa. 4 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, lgqgeqp y rspqkf dib lgilrigeqfl. 5 Mseqf p éb prpdhpkáe bfl ng bp qkias ng Ilprpk; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Ilprpk, Epqpepgb timf ng Zspk. 6 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, riersgeqp y rspqkf dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 7 Y bp qkias ng Zpasbóe; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Zpasbóe, Gbipa timf ng Tgbóe. 8 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, riersgeqp y ligqg dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 9 Qfnfl bfl rfeqpnfl ge gb rpdhpdgeqf ng Msná, rigeqf frtgeqp y lgil dib rspqkfrigeqfl, hfk lsl gmékriqfl, dpkrtpkáe ngbpeqg. 

10 Bp apengkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng Ksaée glqpká pb lsk, hfk lsl gmékriqfl; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Ksaée, Gbilsk timf ng Lgngsk. 11 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, rspkgeqp y lgil dib jsieigeqfl. 12 Prpdhpkáe mseqf p éb bfl ng bp qkias ng Lidgóe; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe, Lgbsdigb timf ng Zskilpnpi. 13 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, riersgeqp y esgvg dib qkglrigeqfl. 14 Y bp qkias ng Upn; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Upn, Gbiplpc timf ng Kgsgb. 15 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, rspkgeqp y rierf dib lgilrigeqfl riersgeqp. 16 Qfnfl bfl rfeqpnfl ge gb rpdhpdgeqf ng Ksaée, rigeqf riersgeqp y se dib rspqkfrigeqfl riersgeqp, hfk lsl gmékriqfl, dpkrtpkáe bfl lgusenfl. 

17 Bsguf iká gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, rfe gb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl bgviqpl, ge dgnif ng bfl rpdhpdgeqfl ge gb fknge ge jsg prpdhpe; plí dpkrtpká rpnp sef mseqf p ls apengkp. 

18 Bp apengkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng Gckpíe hfk lsl gmékriqfl, pb frringeqg; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe, Gbilpdp timf ng Pdisn. 19 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, rspkgeqp dib jsieigeqfl. 20 Mseqf p éb glqpká bp qkias ng Dpeplél; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Dpeplél, Updpbigb timf ng Hgnplsk. 21 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, qkgieqp y nfl dib nflrigeqfl. 22 Y bp qkias ng Agempdíe; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, Paináe timf ng Ugngfei. 23 Y ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, qkgieqp y rierf dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 24 Qfnfl bfl rfeqpnfl ge gb rpdhpdgeqf ng Gckpíe, rigeqf frtf dib rige, hfk lsl gmékriqfl, ikáe bfl qgkrgkfl. 

25 Bp apengkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng Npe glqpká pb efkqg, hfk lsl gmékriqfl; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Npe, Ptigzgk timf ng Pdilpnpi. 26 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, lglgeqp y nfl dib lgqgrigeqfl. 27 Mseqf p éb prpdhpkáe bfl ng bp qkias ng Plgk; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Plgk, Hpuigb timf ng Frkáe. 28 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, rspkgeqp y se dib jsieigeqfl. 29 Y bp qkias ng Egcqpbí; y gb mgcg ng bfl timfl ng Egcqpbí, Ptikp timf ng Geáe. 30 Ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf, rfe lsl rfeqpnfl, riersgeqp y qkgl dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 31 Qfnfl bfl rfeqpnfl ge gb rpdhpdgeqf ng Npe, rigeqf riersgeqp y ligqg dib lgilrigeqfl, ikáe bfl úbqidfl qkpl lsl apengkpl. 

32 Glqfl lfe bfl rfeqpnfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl; qfnfl bfl rfeqpnfl hfk rpdhpdgeqfl, hfk lsl gmékriqfl, lgilrigeqfl qkgl dib jsieigeqfl riersgeqp. 33 Dpl bfl bgviqpl ef csgkfe rfeqpnfl geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rfdf Mgtfvá bf dpenó p Dfilél. 

34 G tirigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél; plí prpdhpkfe hfk lsl apengkpl, y plí dpkrtpkfe rpnp sef hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl. 

Rgelf y ngagkgl ng bfl bgviqpl

EÚDGKFL 3

1 Glqfl lfe bfl nglrgenigeqgl ng Ppkóe y ng Dfilél, ge gb níp ge jsg Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél ge gb dfeqg ng Liepí. 2 Y glqfl lfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ppkóe: Epnpa gb hkidfuéeiqf, Paiú, Gbgpzpk g Iqpdpk. 3 Glqfl lfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ppkóe, lprgknfqgl seuinfl, p bfl rspbgl rfelpukó hpkp gmgkrgk gb lprgknfrif. 4 Hgkf Epnpa y Paiú dskigkfe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá rspenf fckgrigkfe csguf gxqkpñf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ge gb ngligkqf ng Liepí; y ef qsvigkfe timfl; y Gbgpzpk g Iqpdpk gmgkrigkfe gb lprgknfrif ngbpeqg ng Ppkóe ls hpnkg. 

5 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 6 Tpz jsg lg prgkjsg bp qkias ng Bgví, y tpzbp glqpk ngbpeqg ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe, hpkp jsg bg likvpe, 7 y nglgdhgñge gb gerpkuf ng éb, y gb gerpkuf ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe hpkp lgkvik ge gb dieilqgkif ngb qpagkeársbf; 8 y uspknge qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y qfnf bf gerpkupnf p gbbfl hfk bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y dieilqkge ge gb lgkvirif ngb qpagkeársbf. 9 Y npkál bfl bgviqpl p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl; bg lfe geqgkpdgeqg npnfl ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 10 Y rfelqiqsikál p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl hpkp jsg gmgkzpe ls lprgknfrif; y gb gxqkpñf jsg lg prgkrpkg, dfkiká. 

11 Tpabó pngdál Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 12 Tg pjsí, yf tg qfdpnf p bfl bgviqpl ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge bsupk ng qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl, bfl hkidgkfl eprinfl geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; lgkáe, hsgl, dífl bfl bgviqpl. 13 Hfkjsg díf gl qfnf hkidfuéeiqf; nglng gb níp ge jsg yf tirg dfkik p qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, lpeqicijsé hpkp dí p qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ge Ilkpgb, plí ng tfdakgl rfdf ng peidpbgl; dífl lgkáe. Yf Mgtfvá. 

14 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél ge gb ngligkqf ng Liepí, nirigenf: 15 Rsgeqp bfl timfl ng Bgví lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, hfk lsl cpdibipl; rfeqpkál qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng se dgl pkkiap. 16 Y Dfilél bfl rfeqó rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, rfdf bg csg dpenpnf. 17 Bfl timfl ng Bgví csgkfe glqfl hfk lsl efdakgl: Ugklóe, Rfpq y Dgkpki. 18 Y bfl efdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ugklóe hfk lsl cpdibipl lfe glqfl: Biaei y Lidgi. 19 Bfl timfl ng Rfpq hfk lsl cpdibipl lfe: Pdkpd, Iztpk, Tgakóe y Szigb. 20 Y bfl timfl ng Dgkpki hfk lsl cpdibipl: Dptbi y Dsli. Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng Bgví, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl. 

21 Ng Ugklóe gkp bp cpdibip ng Biaei y bp ng Lidgi; glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng Ugklóe. 22 Bfl rfeqpnfl ng gbbfl rfecfkdg p bp rsgeqp ng qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng se dgl pkkiap, bfl rfeqpnfl ng gbbfl csgkfe ligqg dib jsieigeqfl. 23 Bpl cpdibipl ng Ugklóe prpdhpkáe p glhpbnpl ngb qpagkeársbf, pb frringeqg; 24 y gb mgcg ngb biepmg ng bfl ugklfeiqpl, Gbiplpc timf ng Bpgb. 25 P rpkuf ng bfl timfl ng Ugklóe, ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, glqpkáe gb qpagkeársbf, bp qigenp y ls rsaigkqp, bp rfkqiep ng bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, 26 bpl rfkqiepl ngb pqkif, y bp rfkqiep ng bp hsgkqp ngb pqkif, jsg glqá mseqf pb qpagkeársbf y mseqf pb pbqpk pbkgngnfk; plidildf lsl rsgknpl hpkp qfnf ls lgkvirif. 

27 Ng Rfpq gkpe bp cpdibip ng bfl pdkpdiqpl, bp cpdibip ng bfl iztpkiqpl, bp cpdibip ng bfl tgakfeiqpl y bp cpdibip ng bfl szigbiqpl; glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl rfpqiqpl. 28 Gb eúdgkf ng qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng se dgl pkkiap gkp frtf dib lgilrigeqfl, jsg qgeípe bp uspknp ngb lpeqspkif. 29 Bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq prpdhpkáe pb bpnf ngb qpagkeársbf, pb lsk; 30 y gb mgcg ngb biepmg ng bpl cpdibipl ng Rfpq, Gbizpcáe timf ng Szigb. 31 P rpkuf ng gbbfl glqpkáe gb pkrp, bp dglp, gb rpengbgkf, bfl pbqpkgl, bfl sqgelibifl ngb lpeqspkif rfe jsg dieilqkpe, y gb vgbf rfe qfnf ls lgkvirif. 32 Y gb hkierihpb ng bfl mgcgl ng bfl bgviqpl lgká Gbgpzpk timf ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe, mgcg ng bfl jsg qigege bp uspknp ngb lpeqspkif. 

33 Ng Dgkpki gkp bp cpdibip ng bfl dptbiqpl y bp cpdibip ng bfl dsliqpl; glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng Dgkpki. 34 Bfl rfeqpnfl ng gbbfl rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng se dgl pkkiap csgkfe lgil dib nflrigeqfl. 35 Y gb mgcg ng bp rplp ngb biepmg ng Dgkpki, Zskigb timf ng Paitpib; prpdhpkáe pb bpnf ngb qpagkeársbf, pb efkqg. 36 P rpkuf ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki glqpká bp rslqfnip ng bpl qpabpl ngb qpagkeársbf, lsl apkkpl, lsl rfbsdepl, lsl aplpl y qfnfl lsl gelgkgl, rfe qfnf ls lgkvirif; 37 y bpl rfbsdepl pbkgngnfk ngb pqkif, lsl aplpl, lsl glqprpl y lsl rsgknpl. 

38 Bfl jsg prpdhpkáe ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf pb fkigeqg, ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe pb glqg, lgkáe Dfilél y Ppkóe y lsl timfl, qgeigenf bp uspknp ngb lpeqspkif ge bsupk ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y gb gxqkpñf jsg lg prgkrpkg, dfkiká. 39 Qfnfl bfl rfeqpnfl ng bfl bgviqpl, jsg Dfilél y Ppkóe rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá rfeqpkfe hfk lsl cpdibipl, qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng se dgl pkkiap, csgkfe vgieqinól dib. 

Kglrpqg ng bfl hkidfuéeiqfl

40 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Rsgeqp qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl vpkfegl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng se dgl pkkiap, y rséeqpbfl hfk lsl efdakgl. 41 Y qfdpkál p bfl bgviqpl hpkp dí ge bsupk ng qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y bfl peidpbgl ng bfl bgviqpl ge bsupk ng qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng bfl peidpbgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. Yf Mgtfvá. 42 Rfeqó Dfilél, rfdf Mgtfvá bg dpenó, qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 43 Y qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl vpkfegl, rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng lsl efdakgl, ng se dgl pkkiap, csgkfe vgieqinól dib nflrigeqfl lgqgeqp y qkgl. 

44 Bsguf tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 45 Qfdp bfl bgviqpl ge bsupk ng qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y bfl peidpbgl ng bfl bgviqpl ge bsupk ng lsl peidpbgl; y bfl bgviqpl lgkáe dífl. Yf Mgtfvá. 46 Y hpkp gb kglrpqg ng bfl nflrigeqfl lgqgeqp y qkgl ng bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, jsg gxrgnge p bfl bgviqpl, 47 qfdpkál rierf lirbfl hfk rpagzp; rfecfkdg pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif bfl qfdpkál. Gb lirbf qigeg vgieqg ugkpl. 48 Y npkál p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl gb niegkf ngb kglrpqg ng bfl jsg gxrgnge. 49 Qfdó, hsgl, Dfilél gb niegkf ngb kglrpqg ng bfl jsg gxrgnípe gb eúdgkf ng bfl kgnidinfl hfk bfl bgviqpl, 50 y kgriaió ng bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ge niegkf, dib qkglrigeqfl lglgeqp y rierf lirbfl, rfecfkdg pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif. 51 Y Dfilél nif gb niegkf ng bfl kglrpqgl p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, lguúe bf jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

Qpkgpl ng bfl bgviqpl

EÚDGKFL 4

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, nirigenf: 2 Qfdp bp rsgeqp ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Bgví, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, 3 ng gnpn ng qkgieqp pñfl pkkiap tplqp riersgeqp pñfl, qfnfl bfl jsg geqkpe ge rfdhpñíp hpkp lgkvik ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 4 Gb fcirif ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, ge gb bsupk lpeqílidf, lgká glqg: 5 Rspenf tpyp ng dsnpklg gb rpdhpdgeqf, vgenkáe Ppkóe y lsl timfl y nglpkdpkáe gb vgbf ng bp qigenp, y rsakikáe rfe éb gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif; 6 y hfenkáe lfakg gbbp bp rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng qgmfegl, y gxqgengkáe geridp se hpñf qfnf ng pzsb, y bg hfenkáe lsl vpkpl. 7 Lfakg bp dglp ng bp hkfhflirióe gxqgengkáe se hpñf pzsb, y hfenkáe lfakg gbbp bpl glrsnibbpl, bpl rsrtpkpl, bpl rfhpl y bfl qpzfegl hpkp biapk; y gb hpe rfeqiesf glqpká lfakg gbbp. 8 Y gxqgengkáe lfakg gbbp se hpñf rpkdglí, y bf rsakikáe rfe bp rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng qgmfegl; y bg hfenkáe lsl vpkpl. 9 Qfdpkáe se hpñf pzsb y rsakikáe gb rpengbgkf ngb pbsdakpnf, lsl bpdhpkibbpl, lsl nglhpaibpngkpl, lsl hbpqibbfl, y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl ngb prgiqg rfe jsg lg likvg; 10 y bf hfenkáe rfe qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl ge sep rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng qgmfegl, y bf rfbfrpkáe lfakg sepl hpkitsgbpl. 11 Lfakg gb pbqpk ng fkf gxqgengkáe se hpñf pzsb, y bf rsakikáe rfe bp rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng qgmfegl, y bg hfenkáe lsl vpkpl. 12 Y qfdpkáe qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb lgkvirif ng jsg tprge slf ge gb lpeqspkif, y bfl hfenkáe ge se hpñf pzsb, y bfl rsakikáe rfe sep rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng qgmfegl, y bfl rfbfrpkáe lfakg sepl hpkitsgbpl. 13 Jsiqpkáe bp rgeizp ngb pbqpk, y gxqgengkáe lfakg éb se hpñf ng húkhskp; 14 y hfenkáe lfakg éb qfnfl lsl ielqksdgeqfl ng jsg lg likvg: bpl hpbgqpl, bfl upkcifl, bfl akplgkfl y bfl qpzfegl, qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb pbqpk; y gxqgengkáe lfakg éb bp rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng qgmfegl, y bg hfenkáe pngdál bpl vpkpl; 15 Y rspenf prpage Ppkóe y lsl timfl ng rsakik gb lpeqspkif y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb lpeqspkif, rspenf tpyp ng dsnpklg gb rpdhpdgeqf, vgenkáe nglhsél ng gbbf bfl timfl ng Rfpq hpkp bbgvpkbfl; hgkf ef qfrpkáe rflp lpeqp, ef lgp jsg dsgkpe. Glqpl lgkáe bpl rpkupl ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 

16 Hgkf p rpkuf ng Gbgpzpk timf ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe glqpká gb prgiqg ngb pbsdakpnf, gb ierigelf pkfdáqirf, bp fckgenp rfeqiesp y gb prgiqg ng bp serióe; gb rpkuf ng qfnf gb qpagkeársbf y ng qfnf bf jsg glqá ge éb, ngb lpeqspkif y ng lsl sqgelibifl. 

17 Tpabó qpdaiée Mgtfvá p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, nirigenf: 18 Ef tpkéil jsg hgkgzrp bp qkias ng bpl cpdibipl ng Rfpq ng geqkg bfl bgviqpl. 19 Hpkp jsg rspenf lg prgkjsge pb bsupk lpeqílidf vivpe, y ef dsgkpe, tpkéil rfe gbbfl glqf: Ppkóe y lsl timfl vgenkáe y bfl hfenkáe p rpnp sef ge ls fcirif y ge ls rpkuf. 20 Ef geqkpkáe hpkp vgk rspenf rsakpe bpl rflpl lpeqpl, hfkjsg dfkikáe. 

21 Pngdál tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 22 Qfdp qpdaiée gb eúdgkf ng bfl timfl ng Ugklóe lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, hfk lsl cpdibipl. 23 Ng gnpn ng qkgieqp pñfl pkkiap tplqp riersgeqp pñfl bfl rfeqpkál; qfnfl bfl jsg geqkpe ge rfdhpñíp hpkp lgkvik ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 24 Glqg lgká gb fcirif ng bpl cpdibipl ng Ugklóe, hpkp dieilqkpk y hpkp bbgvpk: 25 Bbgvpkáe bpl rfkqiepl ngb qpagkeársbf, gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, ls rsaigkqp, bp rsaigkqp ng higbgl ng qgmfegl jsg glqá geridp ng éb, bp rfkqiep ng bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, 26 bpl rfkqiepl ngb pqkif, bp rfkqiep ng bp hsgkqp ngb pqkif, jsg glqá rgkrp ngb qpagkeársbf y rgkrp ngb pbqpk pbkgngnfk, lsl rsgknpl, y qfnfl bfl ielqksdgeqfl ng ls lgkvirif y qfnf bf jsg lgká tgrtf hpkp gbbfl; plí lgkvikáe. 27 Lguúe bp fknge ng Ppkóe y ng lsl timfl lgká qfnf gb dieilqgkif ng bfl timfl ng Ugklóe ge qfnfl lsl rpkufl, y ge qfnf ls lgkvirif; y bgl gerfdgenpkéil ge uspknp qfnfl lsl rpkufl. 28 Glqg gl gb lgkvirif ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Ugklóe ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; y gb rpkuf ng gbbfl glqpká apmf bp nikgrrióe ng Iqpdpk timf ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe. 

29 Rfeqpkál bfl timfl ng Dgkpki hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl. 30 Nglng gb ng gnpn ng qkgieqp pñfl pkkiap tplqp gb ng riersgeqp pñfl bfl rfeqpkál; qfnfl bfl jsg geqkpe ge rfdhpñíp hpkp lgkvik ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 31 Glqg lgká gb ngagk ng ls rpkuf hpkp qfnf ls lgkvirif ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe: bpl qpabpl ngb qpagkeársbf, lsl apkkpl, lsl rfbsdepl y lsl aplpl, 32 bpl rfbsdepl ngb pqkif pbkgngnfk y lsl aplpl, lsl glqprpl y lsl rsgknpl, rfe qfnfl lsl ielqksdgeqfl y qfnf ls lgkvirif; y rfeliuepkál hfk lsl efdakgl qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl jsg gbbfl qigege jsg qkpelhfkqpk. 33 Glqg lgká gb lgkvirif ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki hpkp qfnf ls dieilqgkif ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, apmf bp nikgrrióe ng Iqpdpk timf ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe. 

34 Dfilél, hsgl, y Ppkóe, y bfl mgcgl ng bp rfeukguprióe, rfeqpkfe p bfl timfl ng Rfpq hfk lsl cpdibipl y lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, 35 nglng gb ng gnpn ng qkgieqp pñfl pkkiap tplqp gb ng gnpn ng riersgeqp pñfl; qfnfl bfl jsg geqkpe ge rfdhpñíp hpkp dieilqkpk ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 36 Y csgkfe bfl rfeqpnfl ng gbbfl hfk lsl cpdibipl, nfl dib lgqgrigeqfl riersgeqp. 37 Glqfl csgkfe bfl rfeqpnfl ng bpl cpdibipl ng Rfpq, qfnfl bfl jsg dieilqkpe ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, bfl rspbgl rfeqpkfe Dfilél y Ppkóe, rfdf bf dpenó Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng Dfilél. 

38 Y bfl rfeqpnfl ng bfl timfl ng Ugklóe hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, 39 nglng gb ng gnpn ng qkgieqp pñfl pkkiap tplqp gb ng gnpn ng riersgeqp pñfl, qfnfl bfl jsg geqkpe ge rfdhpñíp hpkp dieilqkpk ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; 40 bfl rfeqpnfl ng gbbfl hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, csgkfe nfl dib lgilrigeqfl qkgieqp. 41 Glqfl lfe bfl rfeqpnfl ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Ugklóe, qfnfl bfl jsg dieilqkpe ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, bfl rspbgl rfeqpkfe Dfilél y Ppkóe hfk dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá. 

42 Y bfl rfeqpnfl ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, hfk lsl cpdibipl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, 43 nglng gb ng gnpn ng qkgieqp pñfl pkkiap tplqp gb ng gnpn ng riersgeqp pñfl, qfnfl bfl jsg geqkpe ge rfdhpñíp hpkp dieilqkpk ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; 44 bfl rfeqpnfl ng gbbfl, hfk lsl cpdibipl, csgkfe qkgl dib nflrigeqfl. 45 Glqfl csgkfe bfl rfeqpnfl ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, bfl rspbgl rfeqpkfe Dfilél y Ppkóe, lguúe bf dpenó Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng Dfilél. 

46 Qfnfl bfl rfeqpnfl ng bfl bgviqpl jsg Dfilél y Ppkóe y bfl mgcgl ng Ilkpgb rfeqpkfe hfk lsl cpdibipl, y lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, 47 nglng gb ng gnpn ng qkgieqp pñfl pkkiap tplqp gb ng gnpn ng riersgeqp pñfl, qfnfl bfl jsg geqkpape hpkp dieilqkpk ge gb lgkvirif y qgegk rpkuf ng fakp ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, 48 bfl rfeqpnfl ng gbbfl csgkfe frtf dib jsieigeqfl frtgeqp. 49 Rfdf bf dpenó Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng Dfilél csgkfe rfeqpnfl, rpnp sef lguúe ls fcirif y lguúe ls rpkuf; bfl rspbgl rfeqó éb, rfdf bg csg dpenpnf. 

Qfnf iedsenf gl grtpnf csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf

EÚDGKFL 5

1 Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Dpenp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg grtge ngb rpdhpdgeqf p qfnf bghkflf, y p qfnfl bfl jsg hpngrge cbsmf ng lgdge, y p qfnf rfeqpdiepnf rfe dsgkqf. 3 Plí p tfdakgl rfdf p dsmgkgl grtpkéil; csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf bfl grtpkéil, hpkp jsg ef rfeqpdiege gb rpdhpdgeqf ng pjsgbbfl geqkg bfl rspbgl yf tpaiqf. 4 Y bf tirigkfe plí bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y bfl grtpkfe csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf; rfdf Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél, plí bf tirigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

Bgy lfakg bp kglqiqsrióe

5 Pngdál tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 6 Ni p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Gb tfdakg f bp dsmgk jsg rfdgqigkg pbusef ng qfnfl bfl hgrpnfl rfe jsg bfl tfdakgl hkgvpkirpe rfeqkp Mgtfvá y ngbiejsge, 7 pjsgbbp hgklfep rfecglpká gb hgrpnf jsg rfdgqió, y rfdhgelpká geqgkpdgeqg gb npñf, y pñpniká lfakg gbbf bp jsieqp hpkqg, y bf npká p pjsgb rfeqkp jsige hgró. 8 Y li pjsgb tfdakg ef qsvigkg hpkigeqg pb rspb lgp kglpkrinf gb npñf, lg npká bp iengdeizprióe ngb pukpvif p Mgtfvá geqkguáenfbp pb lprgknfqg, pngdál ngb rpkegkf ng bpl gxhiprifegl, rfe gb rspb tpká gxhiprióe hfk éb. 9 Qfnp fckgenp ng qfnpl bpl rflpl lpeqpl jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hkglgeqpkge pb lprgknfqg, lsyp lgká. 10 Y bf lpeqicirpnf ng rspbjsigkp lgká lsyf; plidildf bf jsg rspbjsigkp nigkg pb lprgknfqg, lsyf lgká. 

Bgy lfakg bfl rgbfl

11 Qpdaiée Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 12 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Li bp dsmgk ng pbusef lg nglrpkkipkg, y bg csgkg iecigb, 13 y pbusef rftpaiqpkg rfe gbbp, y ls dpkinf ef bf tsaiglg vilqf hfk tpagklg gbbp pdperibbpnf frsbqpdgeqg, ei tsaigkg qglqiuf rfeqkp gbbp, ei gbbp tsaigkg linf lfkhkgeninp ge gb prqf; 14 li vieigkg lfakg éb glhíkiqs ng rgbfl, y qsvigkg rgbfl ng ls dsmgk, tpaiéenflg gbbp pdperibbpnf; f vieigkg lfakg éb glhíkiqs ng rgbfl, y qsvigkg rgbfl ng ls dsmgk, ef tpaiéenflg gbbp pdperibbpnf; 15 geqfergl gb dpkinf qkpgká ls dsmgk pb lprgknfqg, y rfe gbbp qkpgká ls fckgenp, bp néridp hpkqg ng se gcp ng tpkiep ng rgapnp; ef grtpká lfakg gbbp prgiqg, ei hfenká lfakg gbbp ierigelf, hfkjsg gl fckgenp ng rgbfl, fckgenp kgrfknpqivp, jsg qkpg p bp dgdfkip gb hgrpnf. 

16 Y gb lprgknfqg tpká jsg gbbp lg prgkjsg y lg hfeup ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 17 Bsguf qfdpká gb lprgknfqg ngb pusp lpeqp ge se vplf ng apkkf; qfdpká qpdaiée gb lprgknfqg ngb hfbvf jsg tsaigkg ge gb lsgbf ngb qpagkeársbf, y bf grtpká ge gb pusp. 18 Y tpká gb lprgknfqg glqpk ge hig p bp dsmgk ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y nglrsakiká bp rpagzp ng bp dsmgk, y hfenká lfakg lsl dpefl bp fckgenp kgrfknpqivp, jsg gl bp fckgenp ng rgbfl; y gb lprgknfqg qgenká ge bp dpef bpl puspl pdpkupl jsg prpkkgpe dpbnirióe. 19 Y gb lprgknfqg bp rfemskpká y bg niká: Li eieusef tp nfkdinf rfeqiuf, y li ef qg tpl phpkqpnf ng qs dpkinf p iedsenirip, biakg lgpl ng glqpl puspl pdpkupl jsg qkpge dpbnirióe; 20 dpl li qg tpl nglrpkkipnf ng qs dpkinf y qg tpl pdperibbpnf, y tp rftpaiqpnf rfeqiuf pbusef csgkp ng qs dpkinf 21 (gb lprgknfqg rfemskpká p bp dsmgk rfe mskpdgeqf ng dpbnirióe, y niká p bp dsmgk): Mgtfvá qg tpup dpbnirióe y gxgrkprióe ge dgnif ng qs hsgabf, tprigenf Mgtfvá jsg qs dslbf rpiup y jsg qs vigeqkg lg tiertg; 22 y glqpl puspl jsg npe dpbnirióe geqkge ge qsl geqkpñpl, y tpupe tiertpk qs vigeqkg y rpgk qs dslbf. Y bp dsmgk niká: Pdée, pdée. 

23 Gb lprgknfqg glrkiaiká glqpl dpbnirifegl ge se biakf, y bpl afkkpká rfe bpl puspl pdpkupl; 24 y npká p agagk p bp dsmgk bpl puspl pdpkupl jsg qkpge dpbnirióe; y bpl puspl jsg fakpe dpbnirióe geqkpkáe ge gbbp hpkp pdpkupk. 25 Nglhsél gb lprgknfqg qfdpká ng bp dpef ng bp dsmgk bp fckgenp ng bfl rgbfl, y bp dgrgká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y bp fckgrgká ngbpeqg ngb pbqpk. 26 Y qfdpká gb lprgknfqg se hsñpnf ng bp fckgenp ge dgdfkip ng gbbp, y bf jsgdpká lfakg gb pbqpk, y nglhsél npká p agagk bpl puspl p bp dsmgk. 27 Bg npká, hsgl, p agagk bpl puspl; y li csgkg iedsenp y tsaigkg linf iecigb p ls dpkinf, bpl puspl jsg fakpe dpbnirióe geqkpkáe ge gbbp hpkp pdpkupk, y ls vigeqkg lg tiertpká y rpgká ls dslbf; y bp dsmgk lgká dpbnirióe ge dgnif ng ls hsgabf. 28 Dpl li bp dsmgk ef csgkg iedsenp, lief jsg glqsvigkg bidhip, gbbp lgká biakg, y lgká cgrsenp. 

29 Glqp gl bp bgy ng bfl rgbfl, rspenf bp dsmgk rfdgqigkg iecingbinpn rfeqkp ls dpkinf, y lg pdperibbpkg; 30 f ngb dpkinf lfakg gb rspb hplpkg glhíkiqs ng rgbfl, y qsvigkg rgbfl ng ls dsmgk; bp hkglgeqpká geqfergl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y gb lprgknfqg gmgrsqpká ge gbbp qfnp glqp bgy. 31 Gb tfdakg lgká biakg ng ieijsinpn, y bp dsmgk bbgvpká ls hgrpnf. 

Gb vfqf ng bfl epzpkgfl

EÚDGKFL 6

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Gb tfdakg f bp dsmgk jsg lg phpkqpkg tprigenf vfqf ng epzpkgf, hpkp ngnirpklg p Mgtfvá, 3 lg palqgenká ng vief y ng linkp; ef agagká viepukg ng vief, ei viepukg ng linkp, ei agagká eieuúe birfk ng svpl, ei qpdhfrf rfdgká svpl ckglrpl ei lgrpl. 4 Qfnf gb qigdhf ng ls epzpkgpqf, ng qfnf bf jsg lg tprg ng bp vin, nglng bfl ukpeibbfl tplqp gb tfbbgmf, ef rfdgká. 

5 Qfnf gb qigdhf ngb vfqf ng ls epzpkgpqf ef hplpká epvpmp lfakg ls rpagzp; tplqp jsg lgpe rsdhbinfl bfl nípl ng ls phpkqpdigeqf p Mgtfvá, lgká lpeqf; ngmpká rkgrgk ls rpagbbf. 

6 Qfnf gb qigdhf jsg lg phpkqg hpkp Mgtfvá, ef lg prgkrpká p hgklfep dsgkqp. 7 Ei pse hfk ls hpnkg ei hfk ls dpnkg, ei hfk ls tgkdpef ei hfk ls tgkdpep, hfnká rfeqpdiepklg rspenf dsgkpe; hfkjsg bp rfelpukprióe ng ls Nifl qigeg lfakg ls rpagzp. 8 Qfnf gb qigdhf ng ls epzpkgpqf, lgká lpeqf hpkp Mgtfvá. 


9 Li pbusef dskigkg lúaiqpdgeqg mseqf p éb, ls rpagzp rfelpukpnp lgká rfeqpdiepnp; hfk qpeqf, gb níp ng ls hskicirprióe kpgká ls rpagzp; pb léhqidf níp bp kpgká. 10 Y gb níp frqpvf qkpgká nfl qókqfbpl f nfl hpbfdiefl pb lprgknfqg, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 11 Y gb lprgknfqg fckgrgká gb sef ge gxhiprióe, y gb fqkf ge tfbfrpslqf; y tpká gxhiprióe ng bf jsg hgró p rpslp ngb dsgkqf, y lpeqicirpká ls rpagzp ge pjsgb níp. 12 Y rfelpukpká hpkp Mgtfvá bfl nípl ng ls epzpkgpqf, y qkpgká se rfkngkf ng se pñf ge gxhiprióe hfk bp rsbhp; y bfl nípl hkidgkfl lgkáe pesbpnfl, hfk rspeqf csg rfeqpdiepnf ls epzpkgpqf. 

13 Glqp gl, hsgl, bp bgy ngb epzpkgf gb níp jsg lg rsdhbigkg gb qigdhf ng ls epzpkgpqf: Vgenká p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, 14 y fckgrgká ls fckgenp p Mgtfvá, se rfkngkf ng se pñf lie qprtp ge tfbfrpslqf, y sep rfkngkp ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf ge gxhiprióe, y se rpkegkf lie ngcgrqf hfk fckgenp ng hpz. 15 Pngdál se rpeplqibbf ng qfkqpl lie bgvpnskp, ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnpl rfe prgiqg, y tfmpbnkgl lie bgvpnskp seqpnpl rfe prgiqg, y ls fckgenp y lsl biaprifegl. 16 Y gb lprgknfqg bf fckgrgká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y tpká ls gxhiprióe y ls tfbfrpslqf; 17 y fckgrgká gb rpkegkf ge fckgenp ng hpz p Mgtfvá, rfe gb rpeplqibbf ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp; fckgrgká plidildf gb lprgknfqg ls fckgenp y lsl biaprifegl. 18 Geqfergl gb epzpkgf kpgká p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe ls rpagzp rfelpukpnp, y qfdpká bfl rpagbbfl ng ls rpagzp rfelpukpnp y bfl hfenká lfakg gb csguf jsg glqá ngapmf ng bp fckgenp ng hpz. 19 Nglhsél qfdpká gb lprgknfqg bp glhpbnibbp rfrinp ngb rpkegkf, sep qfkqp lie bgvpnskp ngb rpeplqibbf, y sep tfmpbnkg lie bgvpnskp, y bpl hfenká lfakg bpl dpefl ngb epzpkgf, nglhsél jsg csgkg kpínp ls rpagzp rfelpukpnp; 20 y gb lprgknfqg dgrgká pjsgbbf rfdf fckgenp dgrinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, bf rspb lgká rflp lpeqp ngb lprgknfqg, pngdál ngb hgrtf dgrinf y ng bp glhpbnibbp lghpkpnp; nglhsél gb epzpkgf hfnká agagk vief. 

21 Glqp gl bp bgy ngb epzpkgf jsg tirigkg vfqf ng ls fckgenp p Mgtfvá hfk ls epzpkgpqf, pngdál ng bf jsg lsl kgrsklfl bg hgkdiqigkge; lguúe gb vfqf jsg tirigkg, plí tpká, rfecfkdg p bp bgy ng ls epzpkgpqf. 

Bp agenirióe lprgknfqpb

22 Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 23 Tpabp p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl y nibgl: Plí agengrikéil p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, niriéenfbgl: 


24 Mgtfvá qg ageniup, y qg uspkng; 
25 Mgtfvá tpup kglhbpengrgk ls kflqkf lfakg qi, y qgeup ng qi dilgkirfknip; 
26 Mgtfvá pbrg lfakg qi ls kflqkf, y hfeup ge qi hpz. 

27 Y hfenkáe di efdakg lfakg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y yf bfl agengriké. 

Fckgenpl hpkp bp ngnirprióe ngb pbqpk

EÚDGKFL 7

1 Prfeqgrió jsg rspenf Dfilél tsaf prpapnf ng bgvpeqpk gb qpagkeársbf, y bf tsaf seuinf y lpeqicirpnf, rfe qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, y plidildf seuinf y lpeqicirpnf gb pbqpk y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl, 2 geqfergl bfl hkíerihgl ng Ilkpgb, bfl mgcgl ng bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, bfl rspbgl gkpe bfl hkíerihgl ng bpl qkiasl, jsg glqpape lfakg bfl rfeqpnfl, fckgrigkfe; 3 y qkpmgkfe lsl fckgenpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, lgil rpkkfl rsaigkqfl y nfrg asgygl; hfk rpnp nfl hkíerihgl se rpkkf, y rpnp sef se asgy, y bfl fckgrigkfe ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf. 4 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 5 Qódpbfl ng gbbfl, y lgkáe hpkp gb lgkvirif ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; y bfl npkál p bfl bgviqpl, p rpnp sef rfecfkdg p ls dieilqgkif. 6 Geqfergl Dfilél kgriaió bfl rpkkfl y bfl asgygl, y bfl nif p bfl bgviqpl. 7 Nfl rpkkfl y rspqkf asgygl nif p bfl timfl ng Ugklóe, rfecfkdg p ls dieilqgkif, 8 y p bfl timfl ng Dgkpki nif rspqkf rpkkfl y frtf asgygl, rfecfkdg p ls dieilqgkif apmf bp dpef ng Iqpdpk timf ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe. 9 Hgkf p bfl timfl ng Rfpq ef bgl nif, hfkjsg bbgvpape lfakg lí ge bfl tfdakfl gb lgkvirif ngb lpeqspkif. 10 Y bfl hkíerihgl qkpmgkfe fckgenpl hpkp bp ngnirprióe ngb pbqpk gb níp ge jsg csg seuinf, fckgrigenf bfl hkíerihgl ls fckgenp ngbpeqg ngb pbqpk. 11 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Fckgrgkáe ls fckgenp, se hkíerihg se níp, y fqkf hkíerihg fqkf níp, hpkp bp ngnirprióe ngb pbqpk. 

12 Y gb jsg fckgrió ls fckgenp gb hkidgk níp csg Epplóe timf ng Pdiepnpa, ng bp qkias ng Msná. 13 Ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 14 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 15 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 16 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 17 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Epplóe timf ng Pdiepnpa. 

18 Gb lgusenf níp fckgrió Epqpepgb timf ng Zspk, hkíerihg ng Ilprpk. 19 Fckgrió rfdf ls fckgenp se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 20 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 21 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 22 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 23 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Epqpepgb timf ng Zspk. 

24 Gb qgkrgk níp, Gbipa timf ng Tgbóe, hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Zpasbóe. 25 Y ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 26 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 27 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 28 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 29 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Gbipa timf ng Tgbóe. 

30 Gb rspkqf níp, Gbilsk timf ng Lgngsk, hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Ksaée. 31 Y ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 32 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 33 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 34 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 35 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Gbilsk timf ng Lgngsk. 

36 Gb jsieqf níp, Lgbsdigb timf ng Zskilpnpi, hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe. 37 Y ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 38 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 39 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 40 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 41 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Lgbsdigb timf ng Zskilpnpi. 

42 Gb lgxqf níp, Gbiplpc timf ng Ngsgb, hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Upn. 43 Y ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 44 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 45 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 46 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 47 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Gbiplpc timf ng Ngsgb. 

48 Gb léhqidf níp, gb hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe, Gbilpdp timf ng Pdisn. 49 Y ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 50 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 51 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 52 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 53 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Gbilpdp timf ng Pdisn. 

54 Gb frqpvf níp, gb hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Dpeplél, Updpbigb timf ng Hgnplsk. 55 Y ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 56 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 57 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 58 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 59 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Updpbigb timf ng Hgnplsk. 

60 Gb efvgef níp, gb hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, Paináe timf ng Ugngfei. 61 Y ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 62 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 63 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 64 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 65 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Paináe timf ng Ugngfei. 

66 Gb néridf níp, gb hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Npe, Ptigzgk timf ng Pdilpnpi. 67 Y ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 68 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 69 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 70 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 71 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Ptigzgk timf ng Pdilpnpi. 

72 Gb senéridf níp, gb hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Plgk, Hpuigb timf ng Frkáe. 73 Y ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 74 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 75 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 76 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 77 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Hpuigb timf ng Frkáe. 

78 Gb nsfnéridf níp, gb hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Egcqpbí, Ptikp timf ng Geáe. 79 Ls fckgenp csg se hbpqf ng hbpqp ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl ng hglf, y se mpkkf ng hbpqp ng lgqgeqp lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, pdafl bbgefl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg hpkp fckgenp; 80 sep rsrtpkp ng fkf ng nigz lirbfl, bbgep ng ierigelf; 81 se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, se rfkngkf ng se pñf hpkp tfbfrpslqf; 82 se dprtf rpakíf hpkp gxhiprióe; 83 y hpkp fckgenp ng hpz, nfl asgygl, rierf rpkegkfl, rierf dprtfl rpakífl y rierf rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp ng Ptikp timf ng Geáe. 

84 Glqp csg bp fckgenp jsg bfl hkíerihgl ng Ilkpgb fckgrigkfe hpkp bp ngnirprióe ngb pbqpk, gb níp ge jsg csg seuinf: nfrg hbpqfl ng hbpqp, nfrg mpkkfl ng hbpqp, nfrg rsrtpkpl ng fkf. 85 Rpnp hbpqf ng rigeqf qkgieqp lirbfl, y rpnp mpkkf ng lgqgeqp; qfnp bp hbpqp ng bp vpmibbp, nfl dib rspqkfrigeqfl lirbfl, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif. 86 Bpl nfrg rsrtpkpl ng fkf bbgepl ng ierigelf, ng nigz lirbfl rpnp rsrtpkp, pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif; qfnf gb fkf ng bpl rsrtpkpl, rigeqf vgieqg lirbfl. 87 Qfnfl bfl asgygl hpkp tfbfrpslqf, nfrg agrgkkfl; nfrg bfl rpkegkfl, nfrg bfl rfkngkfl ng se pñf, rfe ls fckgenp, y nfrg bfl dprtfl rpakífl hpkp gxhiprióe. 88 Y qfnfl bfl asgygl ng bp fckgenp ng hpz, vgieqirspqkf efvibbfl, lglgeqp bfl rpkegkfl, lglgeqp bfl dprtfl rpakífl, y lglgeqp bfl rfkngkfl ng se pñf. Glqp csg bp fckgenp hpkp bp ngnirprióe ngb pbqpk, nglhsél jsg csg seuinf. 

89 Y rspenf geqkpap Dfilél ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, hpkp tpabpk rfe Nifl, fíp bp vfz jsg bg tpabpap ng geridp ngb hkfhiripqfkif jsg glqpap lfakg gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif, ng geqkg bfl nfl jsgksaiegl; y tpabpap rfe éb. 

Ppkóe gerigeng bpl bádhpkpl

EÚDGKFL 8

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p Ppkóe y nibg: Rspenf gerigenpl bpl bádhpkpl, bpl ligqg bádhpkpl pbsdakpkáe tprip pngbpeqg ngb rpengbgkf. 3 Y Ppkóe bf tizf plí; gergenió tprip bp hpkqg peqgkifk ngb rpengbgkf lsl bádhpkpl, rfdf Mgtfvá bf dpenó p Dfilél. 4 Y glqp gkp bp tgrtskp ngb rpengbgkf, ng fkf bpakpnf p dpkqibbf; nglng ls hig tplqp lsl cbfkgl gkp bpakpnf p dpkqibbf; rfecfkdg pb dfngbf jsg Mgtfvá dflqkó p Dfilél, plí tizf gb rpengbgkf. 

Rfelpukprióe ng bfl bgviqpl

5 Qpdaiée Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 6 Qfdp p bfl bgviqpl ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y tpz gxhiprióe hfk gbbfl. 7 Plí tpkál hpkp gxhiprióe hfk gbbfl: Kfríp lfakg gbbfl gb pusp ng bp gxhiprióe, y tpz hplpk bp epvpmp lfakg qfnf ls rsgkhf, y bpvpkáe lsl vglqinfl, y lgkáe hskicirpnfl. 8 Bsguf qfdpkáe se efvibbf, rfe ls fckgenp ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg; y qfdpkál fqkf efvibbf hpkp gxhiprióe. 9 Y tpkál jsg bfl bgviqpl lg prgkjsge ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y kgseikál p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 10 Y rspenf tpypl prgkrpnf p bfl bgviqpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, hfenkáe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lsl dpefl lfakg bfl bgviqpl; 11 y fckgrgká Ppkóe bfl bgviqpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ge fckgenp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y lgkvikáe ge gb dieilqgkif ng Mgtfvá. 12 Y bfl bgviqpl hfenkáe lsl dpefl lfakg bpl rpagzpl ng bfl efvibbfl; y fckgrgkál gb sef hfk gxhiprióe, y gb fqkf ge tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá, hpkp tprgk gxhiprióe hfk bfl bgviqpl. 13 Y hkglgeqpkál p bfl bgviqpl ngbpeqg ng Ppkóe, y ngbpeqg ng lsl timfl, y bfl fckgrgkál ge fckgenp p Mgtfvá. 

14 Plí phpkqpkál p bfl bgviqpl ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y lgkáe dífl bfl bgviqpl. 15 Nglhsél ng glf vgenkáe bfl bgviqpl p dieilqkpk ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; lgkáe hskicirpnfl, y bfl fckgrgkál ge fckgenp. 16 Hfkjsg geqgkpdgeqg dg lfe ngnirpnfl p dí bfl bgviqpl ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ge bsupk ng qfnf hkidgk eprinf; bfl tg qfdpnf hpkp dí ge bsupk ng bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 17 Hfkjsg díf gl qfnf hkidfuéeiqf ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, plí ng tfdakgl rfdf ng peidpbgl; nglng gb níp jsg yf tgkí p qfnf hkidfuéeiqf ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, bfl lpeqicijsé hpkp dí. 18 Y tg qfdpnf p bfl bgviqpl ge bsupk ng qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 19 Y yf tg npnf ge nfe bfl bgviqpl p Ppkóe y p lsl timfl ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg gmgkzpe gb dieilqgkif ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y kgrferibige p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; hpkp jsg ef tpyp hbpup ge bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, pb prgkrpklg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb pb lpeqspkif. 

20 Y Dfilél y Ppkóe y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tirigkfe rfe bfl bgviqpl rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg dpenó Mgtfvá p Dfilél prgkrp ng bfl bgviqpl; plí tirigkfe rfe gbbfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 21 Y bfl bgviqpl lg hskicirpkfe, y bpvpkfe lsl vglqinfl; y Ppkóe bfl fckgrió ge fckgenp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, g tizf Ppkóe gxhiprióe hfk gbbfl hpkp hskicirpkbfl. 22 Plí vieigkfe nglhsél bfl bgviqpl hpkp gmgkrgk ls dieilqgkif ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe ngbpeqg ng Ppkóe y ngbpeqg ng lsl timfl; ng bp dpegkp jsg dpenó Mgtfvá p Dfilél prgkrp ng bfl bgviqpl, plí tirigkfe rfe gbbfl. 

23 Bsguf tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 24 Bfl bgviqpl ng vgieqirierf pñfl pkkiap geqkpkáe p gmgkrgk ls dieilqgkif ge gb lgkvirif ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 25 Hgkf nglng bfl riersgeqp pñfl rglpkáe ng gmgkrgk ls dieilqgkif, y eserp dál bf gmgkrgkáe. 26 Lgkvikáe rfe lsl tgkdpefl ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, hpkp tprgk bp uspknip, hgkf ef lgkvikáe ge gb dieilqgkif. Plí tpkál rfe bfl bgviqpl ge rspeqf p ls dieilqgkif. 

Rgbgakprióe ng bp hplrsp

EÚDGKFL 9

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél ge gb ngligkqf ng Liepí, ge gb lgusenf pñf ng ls lpbinp ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ge gb dgl hkidgkf, nirigenf: 2 Bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rgbgakpkáe bp hplrsp p ls qigdhf. 3 Gb ngridfrspkqf níp ng glqg dgl, geqkg bpl nfl qpkngl, bp rgbgakpkéil p ls qigdhf; rfecfkdg p qfnfl lsl kiqfl y rfecfkdg p qfnpl lsl bgygl bp rgbgakpkéil. 4 Y tpabó Dfilél p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hpkp jsg rgbgakplge bp hplrsp. 5 Rgbgakpkfe bp hplrsp ge gb dgl hkidgkf, p bfl rpqfkrg nípl ngb dgl, geqkg bpl nfl qpkngl, ge gb ngligkqf ng Liepí; rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg dpenó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, plí tirigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 6 Hgkf tsaf pbusefl jsg glqpape iedsenfl p rpslp ng dsgkqf, y ef hsnigkfe rgbgakpk bp hplrsp pjsgb níp; y vieigkfe ngbpeqg ng Dfilél y ngbpeqg ng Ppkóe pjsgb níp, 7 y bg nimgkfe pjsgbbfl tfdakgl: Eflfqkfl glqpdfl iedsenfl hfk rpslp ng dsgkqf; ¿hfk jsé lgkgdfl idhgninfl ng fckgrgk fckgenp p Mgtfvá p ls qigdhf geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb? 8 Y Dfilél bgl kglhfenió: Glhgkpn, y fiké bf jsg fkngep Mgtfvá prgkrp ng vflfqkfl. 

9 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 10 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Rspbjsigkp ng vflfqkfl f ng vsglqkfl nglrgenigeqgl, jsg glqsvigkg iedsenf hfk rpslp ng dsgkqf f glqsvigkg ng vipmg bgmfl, rgbgakpká bp hplrsp p Mgtfvá. 11 Ge gb dgl lgusenf, p bfl rpqfkrg nípl ngb dgl, geqkg bpl nfl qpkngl, bp rgbgakpkáe; rfe hpegl lie bgvpnskp y tigkapl pdpkupl bp rfdgkáe. 12 Ef ngmpkáe ngb peidpb lprkicirpnf hpkp bp dpñpep, ei jsgakpkáe tsglf ng éb; rfecfkdg p qfnfl bfl kiqfl ng bp hplrsp bp rgbgakpkáe. 13 Dpl gb jsg glqsvigkg bidhif, y ef glqsvigkg ng vipmg, li ngmpkg ng rgbgakpk bp hplrsp, bp qpb hgklfep lgká rfkqpnp ng geqkg ls hsgabf; hfk rspeqf ef fckgrió p ls qigdhf bp fckgenp ng Mgtfvá, gb qpb tfdakg bbgvpká ls hgrpnf. 14 Y li dfkpkg rfe vflfqkfl gxqkpemgkf, y rgbgakpkg bp hplrsp p Mgtfvá, rfecfkdg pb kiqf ng bp hplrsp y rfecfkdg p lsl bgygl bp rgbgakpká; se dildf kiqf qgenkéil, qpeqf gb gxqkpemgkf rfdf gb epqskpb ng bp qigkkp. 

Bp esag lfakg gb qpagkeársbf

(Gx. 40.34-38)

15 Gb níp jsg gb qpagkeársbf csg gkiuinf, bp esag rsakió gb qpagkeársbf lfakg bp qigenp ngb qglqidfeif; y p bp qpkng tpaíp lfakg gb qpagkeársbf rfdf sep phpkigerip ng csguf, tplqp bp dpñpep. 16 Plí gkp rfeqiespdgeqg: bp esag bf rsakíp ng níp, y ng efrtg bp phpkigerip ng csguf. 17 Rspenf lg pbzpap bp esag ngb qpagkeársbf, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hpkqípe; y ge gb bsupk nfeng bp esag hpkpap, pbbí prpdhpape bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 18 Pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hpkqípe, y pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá prpdhpape; qfnfl bfl nípl jsg bp esag glqpap lfakg gb qpagkeársbf, hgkdpegrípe prpdhpnfl. 19 Rspenf bp esag lg ngqgeíp lfakg gb qpagkeársbf dsrtfl nípl, geqfergl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb uspknpape bp fkngepezp ng Mgtfvá, y ef hpkqípe. 20 Y rspenf bp esag glqpap lfakg gb qpagkeársbf hfrfl nípl, pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá prpdhpape, y pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá hpkqípe. 21 Y rspenf bp esag lg ngqgeíp nglng bp qpkng tplqp bp dpñpep, f rspenf p bp dpñpep bp esag lg bgvpeqpap, gbbfl hpkqípe; f li tpaíp glqpnf se níp, y p bp efrtg bp esag lg bgvpeqpap, geqfergl hpkqípe. 22 F li nfl nípl, f se dgl, f se pñf, digeqkpl bp esag lg ngqgeíp lfakg gb qpagkeársbf hgkdpegrigenf lfakg éb, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lgusípe prpdhpnfl, y ef lg dfvípe; dpl rspenf gbbp lg pbzpap, gbbfl hpkqípe. 23 Pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá prpdhpape, y pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá hpkqípe, uspknpenf bp fkngepezp ng Mgtfvá rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp nirtf hfk dgnif ng Dfilél. 

Bpl qkfdhgqpl ng hbpqp

EÚDGKFL 10

1 Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpzqg nfl qkfdhgqpl ng hbpqp; ng fakp ng dpkqibbf bpl tpkál, bpl rspbgl qg lgkvikáe hpkp rfevfrpk bp rfeukguprióe, y hpkp tprgk dfvgk bfl rpdhpdgeqfl. 3 Y rspenf bpl qfrpkge, qfnp bp rfeukguprióe lg kgseiká peqg qi p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 4 Dpl rspenf qfrpkge lóbf sep, geqfergl lg rfeukgupkáe peqg qi bfl hkíerihgl, bfl mgcgl ng bfl dibbpkgl ng Ilkpgb. 5 Y rspenf qfrpkgil pbpkdp, geqfergl dfvgkáe bfl rpdhpdgeqfl ng bfl jsg glqáe prpdhpnfl pb fkigeqg. 6 Y rspenf qfrpkgil pbpkdp bp lgusenp vgz, geqfergl dfvgkáe bfl rpdhpdgeqfl ng bfl jsg glqáe prpdhpnfl pb lsk; pbpkdp qfrpkáe hpkp lsl hpkqinpl. 7 Hgkf hpkp kgseik bp rfeukguprióe qfrpkéil, dpl ef rfe lfeinf ng pbpkdp. 8 Y bfl timfl ng Ppkóe, bfl lprgknfqgl, qfrpkáe bpl qkfdhgqpl; y bpl qgenkéil hfk glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl. 9 Y rspenf lpbigkgil p bp usgkkp ge vsglqkp qigkkp rfeqkp gb gegdiuf jsg fl dfbglqpkg, qfrpkéil pbpkdp rfe bpl qkfdhgqpl; y lgkéil kgrfknpnfl hfk Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y lgkéil lpbvfl ng vsglqkfl gegdiufl. 10 Y ge gb níp ng vsglqkp pbgukíp, y ge vsglqkpl lfbgdeinpngl, y ge bfl hkierihifl ng vsglqkfl dglgl, qfrpkéil bpl qkfdhgqpl lfakg vsglqkfl tfbfrpslqfl, y lfakg bfl lprkicirifl ng hpz, y fl lgkáe hfk dgdfkip ngbpeqg ng vsglqkf Nifl. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

Bfl ilkpgbiqpl lpbge ng Liepí

11 Ge gb pñf lgusenf, ge gb dgl lgusenf, p bfl vgieqg nípl ngb dgl, bp esag lg pbzó ngb qpagkeársbf ngb qglqidfeif. 12 Y hpkqigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ngb ngligkqf ng Liepí lguúe gb fknge ng dpkrtp; y lg ngqsvf bp esag ge gb ngligkqf ng Hpkáe. 13 Hpkqigkfe bp hkidgkp vgz pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng Dfilél. 14 Bp apengkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl timfl ng Msná rfdgezó p dpkrtpk hkidgkf, hfk lsl gmékriqfl; y Epplóe timf ng Pdiepnpa glqpap lfakg ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf. 15 Lfakg gb rsgkhf ng gmékriqf ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Ilprpk, Epqpepgb timf ng Zspk. 16 Y lfakg gb rsgkhf ng gmékriqf ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Zpasbóe, Gbipa timf ng Tgbóe. 

17 Nglhsél jsg glqpap yp nglpkdpnf gb qpagkeársbf, lg dfvigkfe bfl timfl ng Ugklóe y bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, jsg bf bbgvpape. 18 Bsguf rfdgezó p dpkrtpk bp apengkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng Ksaée hfk lsl gmékriqfl; y Gbilsk timf ng Lgngsk glqpap lfakg ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf. 19 Lfakg gb rsgkhf ng gmékriqf ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe, Lgbsdigb timf ng Zskilpnpi. 20 Y lfakg gb rsgkhf ng gmékriqf ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Upn, Gbiplpc timf ng Ngsgb. 

21 Bsguf rfdgezpkfe p dpkrtpk bfl rfpqiqpl bbgvpenf gb lpeqspkif; y geqkgqpeqf jsg gbbfl bbgupape, bfl fqkfl prfenirifepkfe gb qpagkeársbf. 22 Nglhsél rfdgezó p dpkrtpk bp apengkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe hfk lsl gmékriqfl; y Gbilpdp timf ng Pdisn glqpap lfakg ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf. 23 Lfakg gb rsgkhf ng gmékriqf ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Dpeplél, Updpbigb timf ng Hgnplsk. 24 Y lfakg gb rsgkhf ng gmékriqf ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, Paináe timf ng Ugngfei. 

25 Bsguf rfdgezó p dpkrtpk bp apengkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl timfl ng Npe hfk lsl gmékriqfl, p kgqpuspknip ng qfnfl bfl rpdhpdgeqfl; y Ptigzgk timf ng Pdilpnpi glqpap lfakg ls rsgkhf ng gmékriqf. 26 Lfakg gb rsgkhf ng gmékriqf ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Plgk, Hpuigb timf ng Frkáe. 27 Y lfakg gb rsgkhf ng gmékriqf ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Egcqpbí, Ptikp timf ng Geáe. 28 Glqg gkp gb fknge ng dpkrtp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hfk lsl gmékriqfl rspenf hpkqípe. 

29 Geqfergl nimf Dfilél p Tfapa, timf ng Kpuügb dpnipeiqp, ls lsgukf: Eflfqkfl hpkqidfl hpkp gb bsupk ngb rspb Mgtfvá tp nirtf: Yf fl bf npké. Vge rfe eflfqkfl, y qg tpkgdfl aige; hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp hkfdgqinf gb aige p Ilkpgb. 30 Y éb bg kglhfenió: Yf ef iké, lief jsg dg dpkrtpké p di qigkkp y p di hpkgeqgbp. 31 Y éb bg nimf: Qg ksguf jsg ef efl ngmgl; hfkjsg qú rfefrgl bfl bsupkgl nfeng tgdfl ng prpdhpk ge gb ngligkqf, y efl lgkál ge bsupk ng fmfl. 32 Y li vigegl rfe eflfqkfl, rspenf qgeupdfl gb aige jsg Mgtfvá efl tp ng tprgk, eflfqkfl qg tpkgdfl aige. 

33 Plí hpkqigkfe ngb dfeqg ng Mgtfvá rpdief ng qkgl nípl; y gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá csg ngbpeqg ng gbbfl rpdief ng qkgl nípl, aslráenfbgl bsupk ng nglrpelf. 34 Y bp esag ng Mgtfvá iap lfakg gbbfl ng níp, nglng jsg lpbigkfe ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 

35 Rspenf gb pkrp lg dfvíp, Dfilél ngríp: Bgváeqpqg, ft Mgtfvá, y lgpe nilhgklpnfl qsl gegdiufl, y tsype ng qs hkglgerip bfl jsg qg pafkkgrge. 36 Y rspenf gbbp lg ngqgeíp, ngríp: Vsgbvg, ft Mgtfvá, p bfl dibbpkgl ng dibbpkgl ng Ilkpgb. 

Mgtfvá gevíp rfnfkeirgl

EÚDGKFL 11

1 Prfeqgrió jsg gb hsgabf lg jsgmó p fínfl ng Mgtfvá; y bf fyó Mgtfvá, y pknió ls ikp, y lg gergenió ge gbbfl csguf ng Mgtfvá, y rfelsdió sef ng bfl gxqkgdfl ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 2 Geqfergl gb hsgabf rbpdó p Dfilél, y Dfilél fkó p Mgtfvá, y gb csguf lg gxqieusió. 3 Y bbpdó p pjsgb bsupk Qpagkp, hfkjsg gb csguf ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió ge gbbfl. 

4 Y bp ugeqg gxqkpemgkp jsg lg dgzrbó rfe gbbfl qsvf se vivf nglgf, y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qpdaiée vfbvigkfe p bbfkpk y nimgkfe: ¡Jsiée efl nigkp p rfdgk rpkeg! 5 Efl prfknpdfl ngb hglrpnf jsg rfdípdfl ge Guihqf ng apbng, ng bfl hghiefl, bfl dgbfegl, bfl hsgkkfl, bpl rgafbbpl y bfl pmfl; 6 y ptfkp esglqkp pbdp lg lgrp; hsgl epnp lief glqg dpeá vge esglqkfl fmfl. 

7 Y gkp gb dpeá rfdf lgdibbp ng rsbpeqkf, y ls rfbfk rfdf rfbfk ng agngbif. 8 Gb hsgabf lg glhpkríp y bf kgrfuíp, y bf dfbíp ge dfbiefl f bf dpmpap ge dfkqgkfl, y bf rfríp ge rpbngkp f tpríp ng éb qfkqpl; ls lpafk gkp rfdf lpafk ng prgiqg esgvf. 9 Y rspenf nglrgeníp gb kfríf lfakg gb rpdhpdgeqf ng efrtg, gb dpeá nglrgeníp lfakg éb. 

10 Y fyó Dfilél pb hsgabf, jsg bbfkpap hfk lsl cpdibipl, rpnp sef p bp hsgkqp ng ls qigenp; y bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió ge ukpe dpegkp; qpdaiée bg hpkgrió dpb p Dfilél. 11 Y nimf Dfilél p Mgtfvá: ¿Hfk jsé tpl tgrtf dpb p qs ligkvf? ¿y hfk jsé ef tg tpbbpnf ukprip ge qsl fmfl, jsg tpl hsglqf bp rpkup ng qfnf glqg hsgabf lfakg dí? 12 ¿Rfergaí yf p qfnf glqg hsgabf? ¿Bf geugenké yf, hpkp jsg dg niupl: Bbévpbf ge qs lgef, rfdf bbgvp bp jsg rkíp pb jsg dpdp, p bp qigkkp ng bp rspb mskplqg p lsl hpnkgl? 13 ¿Ng nóeng rfelgusiké yf rpkeg hpkp npk p qfnf glqg hsgabf? Hfkjsg bbfkpe p dí, nirigenf: Npefl rpkeg jsg rfdpdfl. 14 Ef hsgnf yf lfbf lfhfkqpk p qfnf glqg hsgabf, jsg dg gl hglpnf ge ngdplíp. 15 Y li plí bf tprgl qú rfediuf, yf qg ksguf jsg dg ngl dsgkqg, li tg tpbbpnf ukprip ge qsl fmfl; y jsg yf ef vgp di dpb. 

16 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Kgúegdg lgqgeqp vpkfegl ng bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb, jsg qú lpagl jsg lfe peripefl ngb hsgabf y lsl hkierihpbgl; y qkágbfl p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y glhgkge pbbí rfeqiuf. 17 Y yf nglrgengké y tpabpké pbbí rfeqiuf, y qfdpké ngb glhíkiqs jsg glqá ge qi, y hfenké ge gbbfl; y bbgvpkáe rfeqiuf bp rpkup ngb hsgabf, y ef bp bbgvpkál qú lfbf. 18 Hgkf pb hsgabf nikál: Lpeqicirpfl hpkp dpñpep, y rfdgkéil rpkeg; hfkjsg tpaéil bbfkpnf ge fínfl ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: ¡Jsiée efl nigkp p rfdgk rpkeg! ¡Rigkqpdgeqg dgmfk efl iap ge Guihqf! Mgtfvá, hsgl, fl npká rpkeg, y rfdgkéil. 19 Ef rfdgkéil se níp, ei nfl nípl, ei rierf nípl, ei nigz nípl, ei vgieqg nípl, 20 lief tplqp se dgl geqgkf, tplqp jsg fl lpbup hfk bpl epkirgl, y bp pafkkgzráil, hfk rspeqf dgeflhkgriplqgil p Mgtfvá jsg glqá ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl, y bbfkplqgil ngbpeqg ng éb, nirigenf: ¿Hpkp jsé lpbidfl prá ng Guihqf? 21 Geqfergl nimf Dfilél: Lgilrigeqfl dib ng p hig gl gb hsgabf ge dgnif ngb rspb yf glqfy; ¡y qú nirgl: Bgl npké rpkeg, y rfdgkáe se dgl geqgkf! 22 ¿Lg ngufbbpkáe hpkp gbbfl fvgmpl y asgygl jsg bgl aplqge? ¿f lg mseqpkáe hpkp gbbfl qfnfl bfl hgrgl ngb dpk hpkp jsg qgeupe paplqf? 23 Geqfergl Mgtfvá kglhfenió p Dfilél: ¿Prplf lg tp prfkqpnf bp dpef ng Mgtfvá? Ptfkp vgkál li lg rsdhbg di hpbpakp, f ef. 

24 Y lpbió Dfilél y nimf pb hsgabf bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá; y kgseió p bfl lgqgeqp vpkfegl ng bfl peripefl ngb hsgabf, y bfl tizf glqpk pbkgngnfk ngb qpagkeársbf. 25 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nglrgenió ge bp esag, y bg tpabó; y qfdó ngb glhíkiqs jsg glqpap ge éb, y bf hslf ge bfl lgqgeqp vpkfegl peripefl; y rspenf hfló lfakg gbbfl gb glhíkiqs, hkfcgqizpkfe, y ef rglpkfe. 

26 Y tpaípe jsgnpnf ge gb rpdhpdgeqf nfl vpkfegl, bbpdpnfl gb sef Gbnpn y gb fqkf Dgnpn, lfakg bfl rspbgl qpdaiée kghfló gb glhíkiqs; glqpape élqfl geqkg bfl ielrkiqfl, hgkf ef tpaípe vgeinf pb qpagkeársbf; y hkfcgqizpkfe ge gb rpdhpdgeqf. 27 Y rfkkió se mfvge y nif pvilf p Dfilél, y nimf: Gbnpn y Dgnpn hkfcgqizpe ge gb rpdhpdgeqf. 28 Geqfergl kglhfenió Mflsé timf ng Ese, pysnpeqg ng Dfilél, sef ng lsl móvgegl, y nimf: Lgñfk díf Dfilél, idhíngbfl. 29 Y Dfilél bg kglhfenió: ¿Qigegl qú rgbfl hfk dí? Fmpbá qfnf gb hsgabf ng Mgtfvá csglg hkfcgqp, y jsg Mgtfvá hsligkp ls glhíkiqs lfakg gbbfl. 30 Y Dfilél vfbvió pb rpdhpdgeqf, éb y bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb. 

31 Y vief se vigeqf ng Mgtfvá, y qkpmf rfnfkeirgl ngb dpk, y bpl ngmó lfakg gb rpdhpdgeqf, se níp ng rpdief p se bpnf, y se níp ng rpdief pb fqkf, pbkgngnfk ngb rpdhpdgeqf, y rpli nfl rfnfl lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp. 32 Geqfergl gb hsgabf glqsvf bgvpeqpnf qfnf pjsgb níp y qfnp bp efrtg, y qfnf gb níp liusigeqg, y kgrfuigkfe rfnfkeirgl; gb jsg dgefl, kgrfuió nigz dfeqfegl; y bpl qgenigkfe hpkp lí p bf bpkuf pbkgngnfk ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 33 Púe glqpap bp rpkeg geqkg bfl nigeqgl ng gbbfl, peqgl jsg csglg dplqirpnp, rspenf bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió ge gb hsgabf, g tikió Mgtfvá pb hsgabf rfe sep hbpup dsy ukpeng. 34 Y bbpdó gb efdakg ng pjsgb bsupk Oiakfq-tpqppvp, hfk rspeqf pbbí lghsbqpkfe pb hsgabf rfniriflf. 35 Ng Oiakfq-tpqppvp hpkqió gb hsgabf p Tpzgkfq, y lg jsgnó ge Tpzgkfq. 

Dpkíp y Ppkóe dskdskpe rfeqkp Dfilél

EÚDGKFL 12

1 Dpkíp y Ppkóe tpabpkfe rfeqkp Dfilél p rpslp ng bp dsmgk rsliqp jsg tpaíp qfdpnf; hfkjsg éb tpaíp qfdpnf dsmgk rsliqp. 2 Y nimgkfe: ¿Lfbpdgeqg hfk Dfilél tp tpabpnf Mgtfvá? ¿Ef tp tpabpnf qpdaiée hfk eflfqkfl? Y bf fyó Mgtfvá. 3 Y pjsgb vpkóe Dfilél gkp dsy dpelf, dál jsg qfnfl bfl tfdakgl jsg tpaíp lfakg bp qigkkp. 4 Bsguf nimf Mgtfvá p Dfilél, p Ppkóe y p Dpkíp: Lpbin vflfqkfl qkgl pb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. Y lpbigkfe gbbfl qkgl. 5 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nglrgenió ge bp rfbsdep ng bp esag, y lg hslf p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf, y bbpdó p Ppkóe y p Dpkíp; y lpbigkfe pdafl. 6 Y éb bgl nimf: Fín ptfkp dil hpbpakpl. Rspenf tpyp geqkg vflfqkfl hkfcgqp ng Mgtfvá, bg phpkgrgké ge vilióe, ge lsgñfl tpabpké rfe éb. 7 Ef plí p di ligkvf Dfilél, jsg gl cigb ge qfnp di rplp. 8 Rpkp p rpkp tpabpké rfe éb, y rbpkpdgeqg, y ef hfk ciuskpl; y vgká bp phpkigerip ng Mgtfvá. ¿Hfk jsé, hsgl, ef qsvilqgil qgdfk ng tpabpk rfeqkp di ligkvf Dfilél? 

9 Geqfergl bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió rfeqkp gbbfl; y lg csg. 10 Y bp esag lg phpkqó ngb qpagkeársbf, y tg pjsí jsg Dpkíp glqpap bghkflp rfdf bp eigvg; y dikó Ppkóe p Dpkíp, y tg pjsí jsg glqpap bghkflp. 11 Y nimf Ppkóe p Dfilél: ¡Pt! lgñfk díf, ef hfeupl ptfkp lfakg eflfqkfl glqg hgrpnf; hfkjsg bfrpdgeqg tgdfl prqspnf, y tgdfl hgrpnf. 12 Ef jsgng gbbp ptfkp rfdf gb jsg eprg dsgkqf, jsg pb lpbik ngb vigeqkg ng ls dpnkg, qigeg yp dgnif rfelsdinp ls rpkeg. 13 Geqfergl Dfilél rbpdó p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Qg ksguf, ft Nifl, jsg bp lpegl ptfkp. 14 Kglhfenió Mgtfvá p Dfilél: Hsgl li ls hpnkg tsaigkp glrshinf ge ls kflqkf, ¿ef lg pvgkufezpkíp hfk ligqg nípl? Lgp grtpnp csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf hfk ligqg nípl, y nglhsél vfbvgká p bp rfeukguprióe. 15 Plí Dpkíp csg grtpnp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ligqg nípl; y gb hsgabf ef hpló pngbpeqg tplqp jsg lg kgseió Dpkíp rfe gbbfl. 16 Nglhsél gb hsgabf hpkqió ng Tpzgkfq, y prpdhpkfe ge gb ngligkqf ng Hpkáe. 

Dilióe ng bfl nfrg glhípl

(Nq. 1.19-33)

EÚDGKFL 13

1 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Gevíp qú tfdakgl jsg kgrfefzrpe bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, bp rspb yf nfy p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; ng rpnp qkias ng lsl hpnkgl gevipkéil se vpkóe, rpnp sef hkíerihg geqkg gbbfl. 3 Y Dfilél bfl gevió nglng gb ngligkqf ng Hpkáe, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá; y qfnfl pjsgbbfl vpkfegl gkpe hkíerihgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 4 Glqfl lfe lsl efdakgl: Ng bp qkias ng Ksaée, Lpdúp timf ng Zprsk. 5 Ng bp qkias ng Lidgóe, Lpcpq timf ng Tfkí. 6 Ng bp qkias ng Msná, Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg. 7 Ng bp qkias ng Ilprpk, Iupb timf ng Mflé. 8 Ng bp qkias ng Gckpíe, Flgpl timf ng Ese. 9 Ng bp qkias ng Agempdíe, Hpbqi timf ng Kpcú. 10 Ng bp qkias ng Zpasbóe, Upnigb timf ng Lfni. 11 Ng bp qkias ng Mflé: ng bp qkias ng Dpeplél, Upni timf ng Lsli. 12 Ng bp qkias ng Npe, Pdigb timf ng Ugdpbi. 13 Ng bp qkias ng Plgk, Lgqsk timf ng Dirpgb. 14 Ng bp qkias ng Egcqpbí, Eptai timf ng Vphli. 15 Ng bp qkias ng Upn, Ugsgb timf ng Dpjsi. 16 Glqfl lfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl vpkfegl jsg Dfilél gevió p kgrfefrgk bp qigkkp; y p Flgpl timf ng Ese bg hslf Dfilél gb efdakg ng Mflsé. 

17 Bfl gevió, hsgl, Dfilél p kgrfefrgk bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, niriéenfbgl: Lsain ng pjsí pb Egusgv, y lsain pb dfeqg, 18 y falgkvpn bp qigkkp ródf gl, y gb hsgabf jsg bp tpaiqp, li gl csgkqg f néaib, li hfrf f esdgkflf; 19 ródf gl bp qigkkp tpaiqpnp, li gl asgep f dpbp; y ródf lfe bpl risnpngl tpaiqpnpl, li lfe rpdhpdgeqfl f hbpzpl cfkqicirpnpl; 20 y ródf gl gb qgkkgef, li gl cékqib f glqékib, li ge éb tpy ákafbgl f ef; y glcfkzpfl, y qfdpn ngb cksqf ngb hpíl. Y gkp gb qigdhf ng bpl hkidgkpl svpl. 

21 Y gbbfl lsaigkfe, y kgrfefrigkfe bp qigkkp nglng gb ngligkqf ng Zie tplqp Kgtfa, geqkpenf ge Tpdpq. 22 Y lsaigkfe pb Egusgv y vieigkfe tplqp Tgakóe; y pbbí glqpape Ptidáe, Lglpi y Qpbdpi, timfl ng Pepr. Tgakóe csg gnicirpnp ligqg pñfl peqgl ng Zfáe ge Guihqf. 23 Y bbgupkfe tplqp gb pkkfyf ng Glrfb, y ng pbbí rfkqpkfe se lpkdigeqf rfe se kpridf ng svpl, gb rspb qkpmgkfe nfl ge se hpbf, y ng bpl ukpepnpl y ng bfl tiufl. 24 Y lg bbpdó pjsgb bsupk gb Vpbbg ng Glrfb, hfk gb kpridf jsg rfkqpkfe ng pbbí bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

25 Y vfbvigkfe ng kgrfefrgk bp qigkkp pb cie ng rspkgeqp nípl. 26 Y pensvigkfe y vieigkfe p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, y p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ge gb ngligkqf ng Hpkáe, ge Rpngl, y nigkfe bp iecfkdprióe p gbbfl y p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe, y bgl dflqkpkfe gb cksqf ng bp qigkkp. 27 Y bgl rfeqpkfe, nirigenf: Eflfqkfl bbgupdfl p bp qigkkp p bp rspb efl geviplqg, bp jsg rigkqpdgeqg cbsyg bgrtg y digb; y glqg gl gb cksqf ng gbbp. 28 Dpl gb hsgabf jsg tpaiqp pjsgbbp qigkkp gl csgkqg, y bpl risnpngl dsy ukpengl y cfkqicirpnpl; y qpdaiée vidfl pbbí p bfl timfl ng Pepr. 29 Pdpbgr tpaiqp gb Egusgv, y gb tgqgf, gb mgaslgf y gb pdfkkgf tpaiqpe ge gb dfeqg, y gb rpepegf tpaiqp mseqf pb dpk, y p bp kiagkp ngb Mfknáe. 

30 Geqfergl Rpbga tizf rpbbpk pb hsgabf ngbpeqg ng Dfilél, y nimf: Lsapdfl bsguf, y qfdgdfl hflglióe ng gbbp; hfkjsg dál hfnkgdfl eflfqkfl jsg gbbfl. 31 Dpl bfl vpkfegl jsg lsaigkfe rfe éb, nimgkfe: Ef hfnkgdfl lsaik rfeqkp pjsgb hsgabf, hfkjsg gl dál csgkqg jsg eflfqkfl. 32 Y tpabpkfe dpb geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ng bp qigkkp jsg tpaípe kgrfefrinf, nirigenf: Bp qigkkp hfk nfeng hplpdfl hpkp kgrfefrgkbp, gl qigkkp jsg qkpup p lsl dfkpnfkgl; y qfnf gb hsgabf jsg vidfl ge dgnif ng gbbp lfe tfdakgl ng ukpeng glqpqskp. 33 Qpdaiée vidfl pbbí uiupeqgl, timfl ng Pepr, kpzp ng bfl uiupeqgl, y ékpdfl eflfqkfl, p esglqkf hpkgrgk, rfdf bpeuflqpl; y plí bgl hpkgrípdfl p gbbfl. 

Bfl ilkpgbiqpl lg kgagbpe rfeqkp Mgtfvá

EÚDGKFL 14

1 Geqfergl qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ukiqó, y nif vfrgl; y gb hsgabf bbfkó pjsgbbp efrtg. 2 Y lg jsgmpkfe rfeqkp Dfilél y rfeqkp Ppkóe qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y bgl nimf qfnp bp dsbqiqsn: ¡Fmpbá dskiékpdfl ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf; f ge glqg ngligkqf fmpbá dskiékpdfl! 3 ¿Y hfk jsé efl qkpg Mgtfvá p glqp qigkkp hpkp rpgk p glhpnp, y jsg esglqkpl dsmgkgl y esglqkfl eiñfl lgpe hfk hkglp? ¿Ef efl lgkíp dgmfk vfbvgkefl p Guihqf? 

4 Y ngrípe gb sef pb fqkf: Ngliuegdfl se rphiqáe, y vfbvádfefl p Guihqf. 5 Geqfergl Dfilél y Ppkóe lg hflqkpkfe lfakg lsl kflqkfl ngbpeqg ng qfnp bp dsbqiqsn ng bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 6 Y Mflsé timf ng Ese y Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg, jsg gkpe ng bfl jsg tpaípe kgrfefrinf bp qigkkp, kfdhigkfe lsl vglqinfl, 7 y tpabpkfe p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Bp qigkkp hfk nfeng hplpdfl hpkp kgrfefrgkbp, gl qigkkp ge ukpe dpegkp asgep. 8 Li Mgtfvá lg pukpnpkg ng eflfqkfl, éb efl bbgvpká p glqp qigkkp, y efl bp geqkgupká; qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb. 9 Hfk qpeqf, ef lgáil kgagbngl rfeqkp Mgtfvá, ei qgdáil pb hsgabf ng glqp qigkkp; hfkjsg eflfqkfl bfl rfdgkgdfl rfdf hpe; ls pdhpkf lg tp phpkqpnf ng gbbfl, y rfe eflfqkfl glqá Mgtfvá; ef bfl qgdáil. 10 Geqfergl qfnp bp dsbqiqsn tpabó ng phgnkgpkbfl. 

Hgkf bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá lg dflqkó ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, 11 y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: ¿Tplqp rsáenf dg tp ng ikkiqpk glqg hsgabf? ¿Tplqp rsáenf ef dg rkggkáe, rfe qfnpl bpl lgñpbgl jsg tg tgrtf ge dgnif ng gbbfl? 12 Yf bfl tgkiké ng dfkqpenpn y bfl nglqksiké, y p qi qg hfenké lfakg ugeqg dál ukpeng y dál csgkqg jsg gbbfl. 

13 Hgkf Dfilél kglhfenió p Mgtfvá: Bf fikáe bsguf bfl guihrifl, hfkjsg ng ge dgnif ng gbbfl lprplqg p glqg hsgabf rfe qs hfngk; 14 y bf nikáe p bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng glqp qigkkp, bfl rspbgl tpe fínf jsg qú, ft Mgtfvá, glqpapl ge dgnif ng glqg hsgabf, jsg rpkp p rpkp phpkgrípl qú, ft Mgtfvá, y jsg qs esag glqpap lfakg gbbfl, y jsg ng níp iapl ngbpeqg ng gbbfl ge rfbsdep ng esag, y ng efrtg ge rfbsdep ng csguf; 15 y jsg tpl tgrtf dfkik p glqg hsgabf rfdf p se lfbf tfdakg; y bpl ugeqgl jsg tsaigkge fínf qs cpdp tpabpkáe, nirigenf: 16 Hfk rspeqf ef hsnf Mgtfvá dgqgk glqg hsgabf ge bp qigkkp ng bp rspb bgl tpaíp mskpnf, bfl dpqó ge gb ngligkqf. 17 Ptfkp, hsgl, yf qg ksguf jsg lgp dpueicirpnf gb hfngk ngb Lgñfk, rfdf bf tpabplqg, nirigenf: 18 Mgtfvá, qpknf hpkp bp ikp y ukpeng ge dilgkirfknip, jsg hgknfep bp ieijsinpn y bp kgagbióe, psejsg ng eieuúe dfnf qgenká hfk iefrgeqg pb rsbhpabg; jsg viliqp bp dpbnpn ng bfl hpnkgl lfakg bfl timfl tplqp bfl qgkrgkfl y tplqp bfl rspkqfl. 19 Hgknfep ptfkp bp ieijsinpn ng glqg hsgabf lguúe bp ukpengzp ng qs dilgkirfknip, y rfdf tpl hgknfepnf p glqg hsgabf nglng Guihqf tplqp pjsí. 

Mgtfvá rplqiup p Ilkpgb

(Nq. 1.34-40)

20 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nimf: Yf bf tg hgknfepnf rfecfkdg p qs nirtf. 21 Dpl qpe rigkqpdgeqg rfdf vivf yf, y di ubfkip bbgep qfnp bp qigkkp, 22 qfnfl bfl jsg vigkfe di ubfkip y dil lgñpbgl jsg tg tgrtf ge Guihqf y ge gb ngligkqf, y dg tpe qgeqpnf yp nigz vgrgl, y ef tpe fínf di vfz, 23 ef vgkáe bp qigkkp ng bp rspb mské p lsl hpnkgl; ef, eieusef ng bfl jsg dg tpe ikkiqpnf bp vgká. 24 Hgkf p di ligkvf Rpbga, hfk rspeqf tsaf ge éb fqkf glhíkiqs, y ngrinió ik ge hfl ng dí, yf bg dgqgké ge bp qigkkp nfeng geqkó, y ls nglrgengerip bp qgenká ge hflglióe. 25 Ptfkp aige, gb pdpbgriqp y gb rpepegf tpaiqpe ge gb vpbbg; vfbvgfl dpñpep y lpbin pb ngligkqf, rpdief ngb Dpk Kfmf. 

26 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, nirigenf: 27 ¿Tplqp rsáenf fiké glqp nghkpvpnp dsbqiqsn jsg dskdskp rfeqkp dí, bpl jsgkgbbpl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, jsg ng dí lg jsgmpe? 28 Nibgl: Vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg lguúe tpaéil tpabpnf p dil fínfl, plí tpké yf rfe vflfqkfl. 29 Ge glqg ngligkqf rpgkáe vsglqkfl rsgkhfl; qfnf gb eúdgkf ng bfl jsg csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng geqkg vflfqkfl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, bfl rspbgl tpe dskdskpnf rfeqkp dí. 30 Vflfqkfl p bp vgknpn ef geqkpkéil ge bp qigkkp, hfk bp rspb pbré di dpef y mské jsg fl tpkíp tpaiqpk ge gbbp; gxrghqspenf p Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg, y p Mflsé timf ng Ese. 31 Hgkf p vsglqkfl eiñfl, ng bfl rspbgl nimilqgil jsg lgkípe hfk hkglp, yf bfl ieqkfnsriké, y gbbfl rfefrgkáe bp qigkkp jsg vflfqkfl nglhkgriplqgil. 32 Ge rspeqf p vflfqkfl, vsglqkfl rsgkhfl rpgkáe ge glqg ngligkqf. 33 Y vsglqkfl timfl penpkáe hplqfkgpenf ge gb ngligkqf rspkgeqp pñfl, y gbbfl bbgvpkáe vsglqkpl kgagbnípl, tplqp jsg vsglqkfl rsgkhfl lgpe rfelsdinfl ge gb ngligkqf. 34 Rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng bfl nípl, ng bfl rspkgeqp nípl ge jsg kgrfefrilqgil bp qigkkp, bbgvpkéil vsglqkpl ieijsinpngl rspkgeqp pñfl, se pñf hfk rpnp níp; y rfefrgkéil di rplqiuf. 35 Yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf; plí tpké p qfnp glqp dsbqiqsn hgkvgklp jsg lg tp mseqpnf rfeqkp dí; ge glqg ngligkqf lgkáe rfelsdinfl, y ptí dfkikáe. 

Dsgkqg ng bfl nigz glhípl dpbvpnfl

36 Y bfl vpkfegl jsg Dfilél gevió p kgrfefrgk bp qigkkp, y jsg pb vfbvgk tpaípe tgrtf dskdskpk rfeqkp éb p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe, nglprkgniqpenf pjsgb hpíl, 37 pjsgbbfl vpkfegl jsg tpaípe tpabpnf dpb ng bp qigkkp, dskigkfe ng hbpup ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 38 Hgkf Mflsé timf ng Ese y Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg jsgnpkfe rfe vinp, ng geqkg pjsgbbfl tfdakgl jsg tpaípe inf p kgrfefrgk bp qigkkp. 

Bp ngkkfqp ge Tfkdp

(Nq. 1.41-46)

39 Y Dfilél nimf glqpl rflpl p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y gb hsgabf lg gebsqó dsrtf. 40 Y lg bgvpeqpkfe hfk bp dpñpep y lsaigkfe p bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg, nirigenf: Tgefl pjsí hpkp lsaik pb bsupk ngb rspb tp tpabpnf Mgtfvá; hfkjsg tgdfl hgrpnf. 41 Y nimf Dfilél: ¿Hfk jsé jsgakpeqáil gb dpenpdigeqf ng Mgtfvá? Glqf qpdhfrf fl lpbnká aige. 42 Ef lsaáil, hfkjsg Mgtfvá ef glqá ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl, ef lgáil tgkinfl ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl gegdiufl. 43 Hfkjsg gb pdpbgriqp y gb rpepegf glqáe pbbí ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, y rpgkéil p glhpnp; hsgl hfk rspeqf fl tpaéil egupnf p lgusik p Mgtfvá, hfk glf ef glqpká Mgtfvá rfe vflfqkfl. 44 Lie gdapkuf, lg falqiepkfe ge lsaik p bp ridp ngb dfeqg; hgkf gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, y Dfilél, ef lg phpkqpkfe ng ge dgnif ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 45 Y nglrgenigkfe gb pdpbgriqp y gb rpepegf jsg tpaiqpape ge pjsgb dfeqg, y bfl tikigkfe y bfl ngkkfqpkfe, hgkliusiéenfbfl tplqp Tfkdp. 

Bgygl lfakg bpl fckgenpl

EÚDGKFL 15

1 Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Rspenf tpyáil geqkpnf ge bp qigkkp ng vsglqkp tpaiqprióe jsg yf fl nfy, 3 y tpuáil fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá, tfbfrpslqf, f lprkicirif, hfk glhgripb vfqf, f ng vsglqkp vfbseqpn, f hpkp fckgrgk ge vsglqkpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá, ng vprpl f ng fvgmpl; 4 geqfergl gb jsg hkglgeqg ls fckgenp p Mgtfvá qkpgká rfdf fckgenp bp néridp hpkqg ng se gcp ng cbfk ng tpkiep, pdplpnp rfe bp rspkqp hpkqg ng se tie ng prgiqg. 5 Ng vief hpkp bp biaprióe fckgrgkál bp rspkqp hpkqg ng se tie, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf f ngb lprkicirif, hfk rpnp rfkngkf. 6 Hfk rpnp rpkegkf tpkál fckgenp ng nfl néridpl ng cbfk ng tpkiep, pdplpnp rfe bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng se tie ng prgiqg; 7 y ng vief hpkp bp biaprióe fckgrgkál bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng se tie, ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá. 8 Rspenf fckgrigkgl efvibbf ge tfbfrpslqf f lprkicirif, hfk glhgripb vfqf, f ng hpz p Mgtfvá, 9 fckgrgkál rfe gb efvibbf sep fckgenp ng qkgl néridpl ng cbfk ng tpkiep, pdplpnp rfe bp diqpn ng se tie ng prgiqg; 10 y ng vief hpkp bp biaprióe fckgrgkál bp diqpn ng se tie, ge fckgenp gergeninp ng fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá. 

11 Plí lg tpká rfe rpnp asgy, f rpkegkf, f rfkngkf ng bpl fvgmpl, f rpakiqf. 12 Rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf plí tpkéil rfe rpnp sef, lguúe gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl. 13 Qfnf epqskpb tpká glqpl rflpl plí, hpkp fckgrgk fckgenp gergeninp ng fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá. 14 Y rspenf tpaiqpkg rfe vflfqkfl gxqkpemgkf, f rspbjsigkp jsg glqsvigkg geqkg vflfqkfl hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl, li tirigkg fckgenp gergeninp ng fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá, rfdf vflfqkfl tirigkgil, plí tpká éb. 15 Se dildf glqpqsqf qgenkéil vflfqkfl ng bp rfeukguprióe y gb gxqkpemgkf jsg rfe vflfqkfl dfkp; lgká glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl; rfdf vflfqkfl, plí lgká gb gxqkpemgkf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 16 Sep dildp bgy y se dildf ngrkgqf qgenkéil, vflfqkfl y gb gxqkpemgkf jsg rfe vflfqkfl dfkp. 

17 Qpdaiée tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 18 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Rspenf tpyáil geqkpnf ge bp qigkkp p bp rspb yf fl bbgvf, 19 rspenf rfdgeréil p rfdgk ngb hpe ng bp qigkkp, fckgrgkéil fckgenp p Mgtfvá. 20 Ng bf hkidgkf jsg pdpléil, fckgrgkéil sep qfkqp ge fckgenp; rfdf bp fckgenp ng bp gkp, plí bp fckgrgkéil. 21 Ng bpl hkidiripl ng vsglqkp dplp npkéil p Mgtfvá fckgenp hfk vsglqkpl ugegkprifegl. 22 Y rspenf gkkpkgil, y ef tirigkgil qfnfl glqfl dpenpdigeqfl jsg Mgtfvá tp nirtf p Dfilél, 23 qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá fl tp dpenpnf hfk dgnif ng Dfilél, nglng gb níp jsg Mgtfvá bf dpenó, y ge pngbpeqg hfk vsglqkpl gnpngl, 24 li gb hgrpnf csg tgrtf hfk ygkkf rfe iuefkperip ng bp rfeukguprióe, qfnp bp rfeukguprióe fckgrgká se efvibbf hfk tfbfrpslqf ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá, rfe ls fckgenp y ls biaprióe rfecfkdg p bp bgy, y se dprtf rpakíf ge gxhiprióe. 25 Y gb lprgknfqg tpká gxhiprióe hfk qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y bgl lgká hgknfepnf, hfkjsg ygkkf gl; y gbbfl qkpgkáe lsl fckgenpl, fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá, y lsl gxhiprifegl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá hfk lsl ygkkfl. 26 Y lgká hgknfepnf p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y pb gxqkpemgkf jsg dfkp geqkg gbbfl, hfk rspeqf gl ygkkf ng qfnf gb hsgabf. 

27 Li sep hgklfep hgrpkg hfk ygkkf, fckgrgká sep rpakp ng se pñf hpkp gxhiprióe. 28 Y gb lprgknfqg tpká gxhiprióe hfk bp hgklfep jsg tpyp hgrpnf hfk ygkkf; rspenf hgrpkg hfk ygkkf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, bp kgrferibipká, y bg lgká hgknfepnf. 29 Gb eprinf geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y gb gxqkpemgkf jsg tpaiqpkg geqkg gbbfl, sep dildp bgy qgenkéil hpkp gb jsg tirigkg pbuf hfk ygkkf. 30 Dpl bp hgklfep jsg tirigkg pbuf rfe lfagkaip, plí gb epqskpb rfdf gb gxqkpemgkf, sbqkpmp p Mgtfvá; glp hgklfep lgká rfkqpnp ng ge dgnif ng ls hsgabf. 31 Hfk rspeqf qsvf ge hfrf bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, y dgeflhkgrió ls dpenpdigeqf, geqgkpdgeqg lgká rfkqpnp glp hgklfep; ls ieijsinpn rpgká lfakg gbbp. 

Bphinprióe ng se vifbpnfk ngb níp ng kghflf

32 Glqpenf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge gb ngligkqf, tpbbpkfe p se tfdakg jsg kgrfuíp bgñp ge níp ng kghflf. 33 Y bfl jsg bg tpbbpkfe kgrfuigenf bgñp, bf qkpmgkfe p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, y p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe; 34 y bf hsligkfe ge bp rákrgb, hfkjsg ef glqpap ngrbpkpnf jsé lg bg tpaíp ng tprgk. 35 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Ikkgdiliabgdgeqg dsgkp pjsgb tfdakg; phgnkégbf qfnp bp rfeukguprióe csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 36 Geqfergl bf lpró bp rfeukguprióe csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf, y bf phgnkgpkfe, y dskió, rfdf Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél. 

Ckpempl ge bfl vglqinfl

37 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 38 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl jsg lg tpupe ckpempl ge bfl afkngl ng lsl vglqinfl, hfk lsl ugegkprifegl; y hfeupe ge rpnp ckpemp ng bfl afkngl se rfknóe ng pzsb. 39 Y fl lgkviká ng ckpemp, hpkp jsg rspenf bf vgáil fl prfknéil ng qfnfl bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá, hpkp hfegkbfl hfk fakp; y ef dikéil ge hfl ng vsglqkf rfkpzóe y ng vsglqkfl fmfl, ge hfl ng bfl rspbgl fl hkflqiqsyáil. 40 Hpkp jsg fl prfknéil, y tpuáil qfnfl dil dpenpdigeqfl, y lgáil lpeqfl p vsglqkf Nifl. 41 Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, jsg fl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, hpkp lgk vsglqkf Nifl. Yf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

Bp kgagbióe ng Rfké

EÚDGKFL 16

1 Rfké timf ng Iztpk, timf ng Rfpq, timf ng Bgví, y Npqáe y Paikpd timfl ng Gbipa, y Fe timf ng Hgbgq, ng bfl timfl ng Ksaée, qfdpkfe ugeqg, 2 y lg bgvpeqpkfe rfeqkp Dfilél rfe nflrigeqfl riersgeqp vpkfegl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hkíerihgl ng bp rfeukguprióe, ng bfl ngb rfelgmf, vpkfegl ng kgefdakg. 3 Y lg mseqpkfe rfeqkp Dfilél y Ppkóe y bgl nimgkfe: ¡Aplqp yp ng vflfqkfl! Hfkjsg qfnp bp rfeukguprióe, qfnfl gbbfl lfe lpeqfl, y ge dgnif ng gbbfl glqá Mgtfvá; ¿hfk jsé, hsgl, fl bgvpeqáil vflfqkfl lfakg bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá? 4 Rspenf fyó glqf Dfilél, lg hflqkó lfakg ls kflqkf; 5 y tpabó p Rfké y p qfnf ls léjsiqf, nirigenf: Dpñpep dflqkpká Mgtfvá jsiée gl lsyf, y jsiée gl lpeqf, y tpká jsg lg prgkjsg p éb; pb jsg éb glrfuigkg, éb bf prgkrpká p lí. 6 Tprgn glqf: qfdpfl iergelpkifl, Rfké y qfnf ls léjsiqf, 7 y hfegn csguf ge gbbfl, y hfegn ge gbbfl ierigelf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá dpñpep; y gb vpkóe p jsige Mgtfvá glrfuigkg, pjsgb lgká gb lpeqf; glqf fl aplqg, timfl ng Bgví. 8 Nimf dál Dfilél p Rfké: Fín ptfkp, timfl ng Bgví: 9 ¿Fl gl hfrf jsg gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb fl tpyp phpkqpnf ng bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb, prgkráenffl p éb hpkp jsg dieilqkéil ge gb lgkvirif ngb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá, y glqéil ngbpeqg ng bp rfeukguprióe hpkp dieilqkpkbgl, 10 y jsg qg tizf prgkrpk p qi, y p qfnfl qsl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Bgví rfeqiuf? ¿Hkfrskáil qpdaiée gb lprgknfrif? 11 Hfk qpeqf, qú y qfnf qs léjsiqf lfil bfl jsg fl mseqáil rfeqkp Mgtfvá; hsgl Ppkóe, ¿jsé gl, hpkp jsg rfeqkp éb dskdskéil? 

12 Y gevió Dfilél p bbpdpk p Npqáe y Paikpd, timfl ng Gbipa; dpl gbbfl kglhfenigkfe: Ef ikgdfl pbbá. 13 ¿Gl hfrf jsg efl tpypl tgrtf vgeik ng sep qigkkp jsg nglqibp bgrtg y digb, hpkp tprgkefl dfkik ge gb ngligkqf, lief jsg qpdaiée qg gelgñfkggl ng eflfqkfl idhgkiflpdgeqg? 14 Ei qpdhfrf efl tpl dgqinf qú ge qigkkp jsg cbsyp bgrtg y digb, ei efl tpl npnf tgkgnpngl ng qigkkpl y viñpl. ¿Lprpkál bfl fmfl ng glqfl tfdakgl? Ef lsaikgdfl. 

15 Geqfergl Dfilél lg gefmó ge ukpe dpegkp, y nimf p Mgtfvá: Ef dikgl p ls fckgenp; ei pse se plef tg qfdpnf ng gbbfl, ei p eieusef ng gbbfl tg tgrtf dpb. 16 Nglhsél nimf Dfilél p Rfké: Qú y qfnf qs léjsiqf, hfegfl dpñpep ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; qú, y gbbfl, y Ppkóe; 17 y qfdpn rpnp sef ls iergelpkif y hfegn ierigelf ge gbbfl, y prgkrpfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá rpnp sef rfe ls iergelpkif, nflrigeqfl riersgeqp iergelpkifl; qú qpdaiée, y Ppkóe, rpnp sef rfe ls iergelpkif. 18 Y qfdó rpnp sef ls iergelpkif, y hsligkfe ge gbbfl csguf, y grtpkfe ge gbbfl ierigelf, y lg hsligkfe p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe rfe Dfilél y Ppkóe. 19 Yp Rfké tpaíp tgrtf mseqpk rfeqkp gbbfl qfnp bp rfeukguprióe p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; geqfergl bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá phpkgrió p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe. 20 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, nirigenf: 21 Phpkqpfl ng geqkg glqp rfeukguprióe, y bfl rfelsdiké ge se dfdgeqf. 22 Y gbbfl lg hflqkpkfe lfakg lsl kflqkfl, y nimgkfe: Nifl, Nifl ng bfl glhíkiqsl ng qfnp rpkeg, ¿ef gl se lfbf tfdakg gb jsg hgró? ¿Hfk jsé pikpkqg rfeqkp qfnp bp rfeukguprióe? 23 Geqfergl Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 24 Tpabp p bp rfeukguprióe y nibgl: Phpkqpfl ng ge ngkkgnfk ng bp qigenp ng Rfké, Npqáe y Paikpd. 

25 Geqfergl Dfilél lg bgvpeqó y csg p Npqáe y p Paikpd, y bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb csgkfe ge hfl ng éb. 26 Y éb tpabó p bp rfeukguprióe, nirigenf: Phpkqpfl ptfkp ng bpl qigenpl ng glqfl tfdakgl idhífl, y ef qfjséil eieusep rflp lsyp, hpkp jsg ef hgkgzráil ge qfnfl lsl hgrpnfl. 27 Y lg phpkqpkfe ng bpl qigenpl ng Rfké, ng Npqáe y ng Paikpd ge ngkkgnfk; y Npqáe y Paikpd lpbigkfe y lg hsligkfe p bpl hsgkqpl ng lsl qigenpl, rfe lsl dsmgkgl, lsl timfl y lsl hgjsgñsgbfl. 28 Y nimf Dfilél: Ge glqf rfefrgkéil jsg Mgtfvá dg tp gevipnf hpkp jsg tiriglg qfnpl glqpl rflpl, y jsg ef bpl tirg ng di hkfhip vfbseqpn. 29 Li rfdf dsgkge qfnfl bfl tfdakgl dskigkge élqfl, f li gbbfl pb lgk viliqpnfl liusge bp lsgkqg ng qfnfl bfl tfdakgl, Mgtfvá ef dg gevió. 30 Dpl li Mgtfvá tirigkg pbuf esgvf, y bp qigkkp pakigkg ls afrp y bfl qkpupkg rfe qfnpl lsl rflpl, y nglrgenigkge vivfl pb Lgfb, geqfergl rfefrgkéil jsg glqfl tfdakgl ikkiqpkfe p Mgtfvá. 

31 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf rgló éb ng tpabpk qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl, lg pakió bp qigkkp jsg glqpap ngapmf ng gbbfl. 32 Pakió bp qigkkp ls afrp, y bfl qkpuó p gbbfl, p lsl rplpl, p qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng Rfké, y p qfnfl lsl aigegl. 33 Y gbbfl, rfe qfnf bf jsg qgeípe, nglrgenigkfe vivfl pb Lgfb, y bfl rsakió bp qigkkp, y hgkgrigkfe ng ge dgnif ng bp rfeukguprióe. 34 Y qfnf Ilkpgb, bfl jsg glqpape ge ngkkgnfk ng gbbfl, tsygkfe pb ukiqf ng gbbfl; hfkjsg ngrípe: Ef efl qkpusg qpdaiée bp qigkkp. 35 Qpdaiée lpbió csguf ng ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y rfelsdió p bfl nflrigeqfl riersgeqp tfdakgl jsg fckgrípe gb ierigelf. 

36 Geqfergl Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 37 Ni p Gbgpzpk timf ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe, jsg qfdg bfl iergelpkifl ng ge dgnif ngb iergenif, y ngkkpdg dál pbbá gb csguf; hfkjsg lfe lpeqicirpnfl 38 bfl iergelpkifl ng glqfl jsg hgrpkfe rfeqkp lsl pbdpl; y tpkáe ng gbbfl hbpertpl apqinpl hpkp rsakik gb pbqpk; hfk rspeqf fckgrigkfe rfe gbbfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, lfe lpeqicirpnfl, y lgkáe rfdf lgñpb p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 39 Y gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk qfdó bfl iergelpkifl ng akferg rfe jsg bfl jsgdpnfl tpaípe fckgrinf; y bfl apqigkfe hpkp rsakik gb pbqpk, 40 ge kgrsgknf hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ng jsg eieuúe gxqkpñf jsg ef lgp ng bp nglrgengerip ng Ppkóe lg prgkjsg hpkp fckgrgk ierigelf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg ef lgp rfdf Rfké y rfdf ls léjsiqf; lguúe lg bf nimf Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng Dfilél. 

41 Gb níp liusigeqg, qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb dskdskó rfeqkp Dfilél y Ppkóe, nirigenf: Vflfqkfl tpaéil npnf dsgkqg pb hsgabf ng Mgtfvá. 42 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf lg mseqó bp rfeukguprióe rfeqkp Dfilél y Ppkóe, dikpkfe tprip gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y tg pjsí bp esag bf tpaíp rsaigkqf, y phpkgrió bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá. 43 Y vieigkfe Dfilél y Ppkóe ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 44 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 45 Phpkqpfl ng ge dgnif ng glqp rfeukguprióe, y bfl rfelsdiké ge se dfdgeqf. Y gbbfl lg hflqkpkfe lfakg lsl kflqkfl. 46 Y nimf Dfilél p Ppkóe: Qfdp gb iergelpkif, y hfe ge éb csguf ngb pbqpk, y lfakg éb hfe ierigelf, y vg hkfeqf p bp rfeukguprióe, y tpz gxhiprióe hfk gbbfl, hfkjsg gb cskfk tp lpbinf ng bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá; bp dfkqpenpn tp rfdgezpnf. 47 Geqfergl qfdó Ppkóe gb iergelpkif, rfdf Dfilél nimf, y rfkkió ge dgnif ng bp rfeukguprióe; y tg pjsí jsg bp dfkqpenpn tpaíp rfdgezpnf ge gb hsgabf; y éb hslf ierigelf, g tizf gxhiprióe hfk gb hsgabf, 48 y lg hslf geqkg bfl dsgkqfl y bfl vivfl; y rgló bp dfkqpenpn. 49 Y bfl jsg dskigkfe ge pjsgbbp dfkqpenpn csgkfe rpqfkrg dib lgqgrigeqfl, lie bfl dsgkqfl hfk bp kgagbióe ng Rfké. 50 Nglhsél vfbvió Ppkóe p Dfilél p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, rspenf bp dfkqpenpn tpaíp rglpnf. 

Bp vpkp ng Ppkóe cbfkgrg

EÚDGKFL 17

1 Bsguf tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y qfdp ng gbbfl sep vpkp hfk rpnp rplp ng bfl hpnkgl, ng qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng gbbfl, nfrg vpkpl rfecfkdg p bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl; y glrkiaikál gb efdakg ng rpnp sef lfakg ls vpkp. 3 Y glrkiaikál gb efdakg ng Ppkóe lfakg bp vpkp ng Bgví; hfkjsg rpnp mgcg ng cpdibip ng lsl hpnkgl qgenká sep vpkp. 4 Y bpl hfenkál ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe ngbpeqg ngb qglqidfeif, nfeng yf dg dpeicglqpké p vflfqkfl. 5 Y cbfkgrgká bp vpkp ngb vpkóe jsg yf glrfmp, y tpké rglpk ng ngbpeqg ng dí bpl jsgmpl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfe jsg dskdskpe rfeqkp vflfqkfl. 6 Y Dfilél tpabó p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng gbbfl bg nigkfe vpkpl; rpnp hkíerihg hfk bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl sep vpkp, ge qfqpb nfrg vpkpl; y bp vpkp ng Ppkóe glqpap geqkg bpl vpkpl ng gbbfl. 7 Y Dfilél hslf bpl vpkpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ge gb qpagkeársbf ngb qglqidfeif. 

8 Y prfeqgrió jsg gb níp liusigeqg vief Dfilél pb qpagkeársbf ngb qglqidfeif; y tg pjsí jsg bp vpkp ng Ppkóe ng bp rplp ng Bgví tpaíp kgvgkngrinf, y grtpnf cbfkgl, y pkkfmpnf kgesgvfl, y hkfnsrinf pbdgenkpl. 9 Geqfergl lpró Dfilél qfnpl bpl vpkpl ng ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y gbbfl bf vigkfe, y qfdpkfe rpnp sef ls vpkp. 10 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Vsgbvg bp vpkp ng Ppkóe ngbpeqg ngb qglqidfeif, hpkp jsg lg uspkng hfk lgñpb p bfl timfl kgagbngl; y tpkál rglpk lsl jsgmpl ng ngbpeqg ng dí, hpkp jsg ef dsgkpe. 11 G tizf Dfilél rfdf bg dpenó Mgtfvá, plí bf tizf. 

12 Geqfergl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpabpkfe p Dfilél, nirigenf: Tg pjsí eflfqkfl lfdfl dsgkqfl, hgkninfl lfdfl, qfnfl eflfqkfl lfdfl hgkninfl. 13 Rspbjsigkp jsg lg prgkrpkg, gb jsg vieigkg pb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá, dfkiká. ¿Prpapkgdfl hfk hgkgrgk qfnfl? 

Lflqgeidigeqf ng lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl

EÚDGKFL 18

1 Mgtfvá nimf p Ppkóe: Qú y qsl timfl, y bp rplp ng qs hpnkg rfeqiuf, bbgvpkéil gb hgrpnf ngb lpeqspkif; y qú y qsl timfl rfeqiuf bbgvpkéil gb hgrpnf ng vsglqkf lprgknfrif. 2 Y p qsl tgkdpefl qpdaiée, bp qkias ng Bgví, bp qkias ng qs hpnkg, tpz jsg lg prgkjsge p qi y lg mseqge rfeqiuf, y qg lgkvikáe; y qú y qsl timfl rfeqiuf lgkvikéil ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ngb qglqidfeif. 3 Y uspknpkáe bf jsg qú fkngegl, y gb rpkuf ng qfnf gb qpagkeársbf; dpl ef lg prgkrpkáe p bfl sqgelibifl lpeqfl ei pb pbqpk, hpkp jsg ef dsgkpe gbbfl y vflfqkfl. 4 Lg mseqpkáe, hsgl, rfeqiuf, y qgenkáe gb rpkuf ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe ge qfnf gb lgkvirif ngb qpagkeársbf; eieuúe gxqkpñf lg tp ng prgkrpk p vflfqkfl. 5 Y qgenkéil gb rsinpnf ngb lpeqspkif, y gb rsinpnf ngb pbqpk, hpkp jsg ef vgeup dál bp ikp lfakg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 6 Hfkjsg tg pjsí, yf tg qfdpnf p vsglqkfl tgkdpefl bfl bgviqpl ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, npnfl p vflfqkfl ge nfe ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg likvpe ge gb dieilqgkif ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 7 Dpl qú y qsl timfl rfeqiuf uspknpkéil vsglqkf lprgknfrif ge qfnf bf kgbprifepnf rfe gb pbqpk, y ngb vgbf pngeqkf, y dieilqkpkéil. Yf fl tg npnf ge nfe gb lgkvirif ng vsglqkf lprgknfrif; y gb gxqkpñf jsg lg prgkrpkg, dfkiká. 

8 Nimf dál Mgtfvá p Ppkóe: Tg pjsí yf qg tg npnf qpdaiée gb rsinpnf ng dil fckgenpl; qfnpl bpl rflpl rfelpukpnpl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qg tg npnf hfk kpzóe ng bp serióe, y p qsl timfl, hfk glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf. 9 Glqf lgká qsyf ng bp fckgenp ng bpl rflpl lpeqpl, kglgkvpnpl ngb csguf; qfnp fckgenp ng gbbfl, qfnf hkglgeqg lsyf, y qfnp gxhiprióe hfk gb hgrpnf ng gbbfl, y qfnp gxhiprióe hfk bp rsbhp ng gbbfl, jsg dg tpe ng hkglgeqpk, lgká rflp dsy lpeqp hpkp qi y hpkp qsl timfl. 10 Ge gb lpeqspkif bp rfdgkál; qfnf vpkóe rfdgká ng gbbp; rflp lpeqp lgká hpkp qi. 11 Glqf qpdaiée lgká qsyf: bp fckgenp gbgvpnp ng lsl nfegl, y qfnpl bpl fckgenpl dgrinpl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, tg npnf p qi y p qsl timfl y p qsl timpl rfeqiuf, hfk glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf; qfnf bidhif ge qs rplp rfdgká ng gbbpl. 12 Ng prgiqg, ng dflqf y ng qkiuf, qfnf bf dál glrfuinf, bpl hkidiripl ng gbbf, jsg hkglgeqpkáe p Mgtfvá, hpkp qi bpl tg npnf. 13 Bpl hkidiripl ng qfnpl bpl rflpl ng bp qigkkp ng gbbfl, bpl rspbgl qkpgkáe p Mgtfvá, lgkáe qsypl; qfnf bidhif ge qs rplp rfdgká ng gbbpl. 14 Qfnf bf rfelpukpnf hfk vfqf ge Ilkpgb lgká qsyf. 15 Qfnf bf jsg pakg dpqkiz, ng qfnp rpkeg jsg fckgrgkáe p Mgtfvá, plí ng tfdakgl rfdf ng peidpbgl, lgká qsyf;
