hgkf tpkál jsg lg kgnidp gb hkidfuéeiqf ngb tfdakg; qpdaiée tpkál kgnidik gb hkidfuéeiqf ng peidpb iedsenf. 16 Ng se dgl tpkál gcgrqspk gb kglrpqg ng gbbfl, rfecfkdg p qs glqidprióe, hfk gb hkgrif ng rierf lirbfl, rfecfkdg pb lirbf ngb lpeqspkif, jsg gl ng vgieqg ugkpl. 17 Dpl gb hkidfuéeiqf ng vprp, gb hkidfuéeiqf ng fvgmp y gb hkidfuéeiqf ng rpakp, ef kgnidikál; lpeqicirpnfl lfe; bp lpeukg ng gbbfl kfripkál lfakg gb pbqpk, y jsgdpkál bp ukflskp ng gbbfl, fckgenp gergeninp ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá. 18 Y bp rpkeg ng gbbfl lgká qsyp; rfdf gb hgrtf ng bp fckgenp dgrinp y rfdf bp glhpbnibbp ngkgrtp, lgká qsyp. 19 Qfnpl bpl fckgenpl gbgvpnpl ng bpl rflpl lpeqpl, jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb fckgrigkge p Mgtfvá, bpl tg npnf hpkp qi, y hpkp qsl timfl y hpkp qsl timpl rfeqiuf, hfk glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf; hprqf ng lpb hgkhgqsf gl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá hpkp qi y hpkp qs nglrgengerip rfeqiuf. 20 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Ppkóe: Ng bp qigkkp ng gbbfl ef qgenkál tgkgnpn, ei geqkg gbbfl qgenkál hpkqg. Yf lfy qs hpkqg y qs tgkgnpn ge dgnif ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

21 Y tg pjsí yf tg npnf p bfl timfl ng Bgví qfnfl bfl nigzdfl ge Ilkpgb hfk tgkgnpn, hfk ls dieilqgkif, hfk rspeqf gbbfl likvge ge gb dieilqgkif ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 22 Y ef lg prgkrpkáe dál bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb pb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, hpkp jsg ef bbgvge hgrpnf hfk gb rspb dsgkpe. 23 Dpl bfl bgviqpl tpkáe gb lgkvirif ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y gbbfl bbgvpkáe ls ieijsinpn; glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf hpkp vsglqkfl nglrgenigeqgl; y ef hflggkáe tgkgnpn geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 24 Hfkjsg p bfl bgviqpl tg npnf hfk tgkgnpn bfl nigzdfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, jsg fckgrgkáe p Mgtfvá ge fckgenp; hfk bf rspb bgl tg nirtf: Geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ef hflggkáe tgkgnpn. 

25 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 26 Plí tpabpkál p bfl bgviqpl, y bgl nikál: Rspenf qfdéil ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb bfl nigzdfl jsg fl tg npnf ng gbbfl hfk vsglqkp tgkgnpn, vflfqkfl hkglgeqpkéil ng gbbfl ge fckgenp dgrinp p Mgtfvá gb nigzdf ng bfl nigzdfl. 27 Y lg fl rfeqpká vsglqkp fckgenp rfdf ukpef ng bp gkp, y rfdf hkfnsrqf ngb bpupk. 28 Plí fckgrgkéil qpdaiée vflfqkfl fckgenp p Mgtfvá ng qfnfl vsglqkfl nigzdfl jsg kgriaáil ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y npkéil ng gbbfl bp fckgenp ng Mgtfvá pb lprgknfqg Ppkóe. 29 Ng qfnfl vsglqkfl nfegl fckgrgkéil qfnp fckgenp p Mgtfvá; ng qfnf bf dgmfk ng gbbfl fckgrgkéil bp hfkrióe jsg tp ng lgk rfelpukpnp. 30 Y bgl nikál: Rspenf fckgrigkgil bf dgmfk ng gbbfl, lgká rfeqpnf p bfl bgviqpl rfdf hkfnsrqf ng bp gkp, y rfdf hkfnsrqf ngb bpupk. 31 Y bf rfdgkéil ge rspbjsigk bsupk, vflfqkfl y vsglqkpl cpdibipl; hsgl gl vsglqkp kgdsegkprióe hfk vsglqkf dieilqgkif ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 32 Y ef bbgvpkéil hgrpnf hfk gbbf, rspenf tsaigkgil fckgrinf bp dgmfk hpkqg ng éb; y ef rfeqpdiepkéil bpl rflpl lpeqpl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y ef dfkikéil. 

Bp hskicirprióe ng bfl iedsenfl

EÚDGKFL 19

1 Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, nirigenf: 2 Glqp gl bp fkngepezp ng bp bgy jsg Mgtfvá tp hkglrkiqf, nirigenf: Ni p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg qg qkpiupe sep vprp pbpzpep, hgkcgrqp, ge bp rspb ef tpyp cpbqp, lfakg bp rspb ef lg tpyp hsglqf ysuf; 3 y bp npkéil p Gbgpzpk gb lprgknfqg, y éb bp lprpká csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf, y bp tpká ngufbbpk ge ls hkglgerip. 4 Y Gbgpzpk gb lprgknfqg qfdpká ng bp lpeukg rfe ls ngnf, y kfripká tprip bp hpkqg ngbpeqgkp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe rfe bp lpeukg ng gbbp ligqg vgrgl; 5 y tpká jsgdpk bp vprp peqg lsl fmfl; ls rsgkf y ls rpkeg y ls lpeukg, rfe ls glqiékrfb, tpká jsgdpk. 6 Bsguf qfdpká gb lprgknfqg dpngkp ng rgnkf, g tilfhf, y glrpkbpqp, y bf grtpká ge dgnif ngb csguf ge jsg pkng bp vprp. 7 Gb lprgknfqg bpvpká bsguf lsl vglqinfl, bpvpká qpdaiée ls rsgkhf rfe pusp, y nglhsél geqkpká ge gb rpdhpdgeqf; y lgká iedsenf gb lprgknfqg tplqp bp efrtg. 8 Plidildf gb jsg bp jsgdó bpvpká lsl vglqinfl ge pusp, qpdaiée bpvpká ge pusp ls rsgkhf, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 9 Y se tfdakg bidhif kgrfugká bpl rgeizpl ng bp vprp y bpl hfenká csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ge bsupk bidhif, y bpl uspknpká bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hpkp gb pusp ng hskicirprióe; gl sep gxhiprióe. 10 Y gb jsg kgrfuió bpl rgeizpl ng bp vprp bpvpká lsl vglqinfl, y lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg; y lgká glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y hpkp gb gxqkpemgkf jsg dfkp geqkg gbbfl. 

11 Gb jsg qfrpkg rpnávgk ng rspbjsigk hgklfep lgká iedsenf ligqg nípl. 12 Pb qgkrgk níp lg hskicirpká rfe pjsgbbp pusp, y pb léhqidf níp lgká bidhif; y li pb qgkrgk níp ef lg hskicirpkg, ef lgká bidhif pb léhqidf níp. 13 Qfnf pjsgb jsg qfrpkg rpnávgk ng rspbjsigk hgklfep, y ef lg hskicirpkg, gb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá rfeqpdieó, y pjsgbbp hgklfep lgká rfkqpnp ng Ilkpgb; hfk rspeqf gb pusp ng bp hskicirprióe ef csg kfripnp lfakg éb, iedsenf lgká, y ls iedsenirip lgká lfakg éb. 

14 Glqp gl bp bgy hpkp rspenf pbusef dsgkp ge bp qigenp: rspbjsigkp jsg geqkg ge bp qigenp, y qfnf gb jsg glqé ge gbbp, lgká iedsenf ligqg nípl. 15 Y qfnp vplimp paigkqp, rsyp qphp ef glqé aige pmslqpnp, lgká iedsenp; 16 y rspbjsigkp jsg qfrpkg pbuúe dsgkqf p glhpnp lfakg bp cpz ngb rpdhf, f pbuúe rpnávgk, f tsglf tsdpef, f lghsbrkf, ligqg nípl lgká iedsenf. 17 Y hpkp gb iedsenf qfdpkáe ng bp rgeizp ng bp vprp jsgdpnp ng bp gxhiprióe, y grtpkáe lfakg gbbp pusp rfkkigeqg ge se kgrihigeqg; 18 y se tfdakg bidhif qfdpká tilfhf, y bf dfmpká ge gb pusp, y kfripká lfakg bp qigenp, lfakg qfnfl bfl dsgabgl, lfakg bpl hgklfepl jsg pbbí glqsvigkge, y lfakg pjsgb jsg tsaigkg qfrpnf gb tsglf, f gb plgliepnf, f gb dsgkqf, f gb lghsbrkf. 19 Y gb bidhif kfripká lfakg gb iedsenf pb qgkrgkf y pb léhqidf níp; y rspenf bf tpyp hskicirpnf pb níp léhqidf, éb bpvpká bsguf lsl vglqinfl, y p lí dildf lg bpvpká rfe pusp, y lgká bidhif p bp efrtg. 

20 Y gb jsg csgkg iedsenf, y ef lg hskicirpkg, bp qpb hgklfep lgká rfkqpnp ng geqkg bp rfeukguprióe, hfk rspeqf rfeqpdieó gb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá; ef csg kfripnp lfakg éb gb pusp ng bp hskicirprióe; gl iedsenf. 21 Bgl lgká glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf; qpdaiée gb jsg kfripkg gb pusp ng bp hskicirprióe bpvpká lsl vglqinfl; y gb jsg qfrpkg gb pusp ng bp hskicirprióe lgká iedsenf tplqp bp efrtg. 22 Y qfnf bf jsg gb iedsenf qfrpkg, lgká iedsenf; y bp hgklfep jsg bf qfrpkg lgká iedsenp tplqp bp efrtg. 

Pusp ng bp kfrp

EÚDGKFL 20

1 Bbgupkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, qfnp bp rfeukguprióe, pb ngligkqf ng Zie, ge gb dgl hkidgkf, y prpdhó gb hsgabf ge Rpngl; y pbbí dskió Dpkíp, y pbbí csg lghsbqpnp. 

2 Y hfkjsg ef tpaíp pusp hpkp bp rfeukguprióe, lg mseqpkfe rfeqkp Dfilél y Ppkóe. 3 Y tpabó gb hsgabf rfeqkp Dfilél, nirigenf: ¡Fmpbá tsaiékpdfl dsgkqf rspenf hgkgrigkfe esglqkfl tgkdpefl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá! 4 ¿Hfk jsé tirilqg vgeik bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá p glqg ngligkqf, hpkp jsg dskpdfl pjsí eflfqkfl y esglqkpl aglqipl? 5 ¿Y hfk jsé efl tpl tgrtf lsaik ng Guihqf, hpkp qkpgkefl p glqg dpb bsupk? Ef gl bsupk ng lgdgeqgkp, ng tiusgkpl, ng viñpl ei ng ukpepnpl; ei pse ng pusp hpkp agagk. 6 Y lg csgkfe Dfilél y Ppkóe ng ngbpeqg ng bp rfeukguprióe p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y lg hflqkpkfe lfakg lsl kflqkfl; y bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá phpkgrió lfakg gbbfl. 7 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 8 Qfdp bp vpkp, y kgúeg bp rfeukguprióe, qú y Ppkóe qs tgkdpef, y tpabpn p bp hgñp p vilqp ng gbbfl; y gbbp npká ls pusp, y bgl lprpkál puspl ng bp hgñp, y npkál ng agagk p bp rfeukguprióe y p lsl aglqipl. 9 Geqfergl Dfilél qfdó bp vpkp ng ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, rfdf éb bg dpenó. 

10 Y kgseigkfe Dfilél y Ppkóe p bp rfeukguprióe ngbpeqg ng bp hgñp, y bgl nimf: ¡Fín ptfkp, kgagbngl! ¿Fl tgdfl ng tprgk lpbik puspl ng glqp hgñp? 11 Geqfergl pbzó Dfilél ls dpef y ufbhgó bp hgñp rfe ls vpkp nfl vgrgl; y lpbigkfe dsrtpl puspl, y agaió bp rfeukguprióe, y lsl aglqipl. 12 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél y p Ppkóe: Hfk rspeqf ef rkgílqgil ge dí, hpkp lpeqicirpkdg ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hfk qpeqf, ef dgqgkéil glqp rfeukguprióe ge bp qigkkp jsg bgl tg npnf. 13 Glqpl lfe bpl puspl ng bp kgeribbp, hfk bpl rspbgl rfeqgenigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfe Mgtfvá, y éb lg lpeqiciró ge gbbfl. 

Gnfd kgtúlp npk hplf p Ilkpgb

14 Gevió Dfilél gdapmpnfkgl pb kgy ng Gnfd nglng Rpngl, nirigenf: Plí nirg Ilkpgb qs tgkdpef: Qú tpl lpainf qfnf gb qkpapmf jsg efl tp vgeinf; 15 ródf esglqkfl hpnkgl nglrgenigkfe p Guihqf, y glqsvidfl ge Guihqf bpkuf qigdhf, y bfl guihrifl efl dpbqkpqpkfe, y p esglqkfl hpnkgl; 16 y rbpdpdfl p Mgtfvá, gb rspb fyó esglqkp vfz, y gevió se áeugb, y efl lpró ng Guihqf; y tg pjsí glqpdfl ge Rpngl, risnpn rgkrpep p qsl ckfeqgkpl. 17 Qg kfupdfl jsg hplgdfl hfk qs qigkkp. Ef hplpkgdfl hfk bpakpezp, ei hfk viñp, ei agagkgdfl pusp ng hfzfl; hfk gb rpdief kgpb ikgdfl, lie phpkqpkefl p niglqkp ei p lieiglqkp, tplqp jsg tpypdfl hplpnf qs qgkkiqfkif. 18 Gnfd bg kglhfenió: Ef hplpkál hfk di hpíl; ng fqkp dpegkp, lpbnké rfeqkp qi pkdpnf. 19 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb nimgkfe: Hfk gb rpdief hkierihpb ikgdfl; y li agaiékgdfl qsl puspl yf y dil upepnfl, npké gb hkgrif ng gbbpl; némpdg lfbpdgeqg hplpk p hig, epnp dál. 20 Hgkf éb kglhfenió: Ef hplpkál. Y lpbió Gnfd rfeqkp éb rfe dsrtf hsgabf, y dpef csgkqg. 21 Ef jsilf, hsgl, Gnfd ngmpk hplpk p Ilkpgb hfk ls qgkkiqfkif, y lg nglvió Ilkpgb ng éb. 

Ppkóe dsgkg ge gb Dfeqg Tfk

22 Y hpkqigenf ng Rpngl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, qfnp pjsgbbp rfeukguprióe, vieigkfe pb dfeqg ng Tfk. 23 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél y p Ppkóe ge gb dfeqg ng Tfk, ge bp ckfeqgkp ng bp qigkkp ng Gnfd, nirigenf: 24 Ppkóe lgká kgseinf p ls hsgabf, hsgl ef geqkpká ge bp qigkkp jsg yf ni p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hfk rspeqf csilqgil kgagbngl p di dpenpdigeqf ge bpl puspl ng bp kgeribbp. 25 Qfdp p Ppkóe y p Gbgpzpk ls timf, y tpzbfl lsaik pb dfeqg ng Tfk, 26 y nglesnp p Ppkóe ng lsl vglqinskpl, y vilqg rfe gbbpl p Gbgpzpk ls timf; hfkjsg Ppkóe lgká kgseinf p ls hsgabf, y pbbí dfkiká. 27 Y Dfilél tizf rfdf Mgtfvá bg dpenó; y lsaigkfe pb dfeqg ng Tfk p bp vilqp ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe. 28 Y Dfilél nglesnó p Ppkóe ng lsl vglqinskpl, y lg bpl vilqió p Gbgpzpk ls timf; y Ppkóe dskif pbbí ge bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg, y Dfilél y Gbgpzpk nglrgenigkfe ngb dfeqg. 29 Y vigenf qfnp bp rfeukguprióe jsg Ppkóe tpaíp dsgkqf, bg tirigkfe nsgbf hfk qkgieqp nípl qfnpl bp cpdibipl ng Ilkpgb. 

Gb kgy ng Pkpn pqprp p Ilkpgb

EÚDGKFL 21

1 Rspenf gb rpepegf, gb kgy ng Pkpn, jsg tpaiqpap ge gb Egusgv, fyó jsg vgeíp Ilkpgb hfk gb rpdief ng Pqpkid, hgbgó rfeqkp Ilkpgb, y qfdó ng éb hkilifegkfl. 2 Geqfergl Ilkpgb tizf vfqf p Mgtfvá, y nimf: Li ge gcgrqf geqkgupkgl glqg hsgabf ge di dpef, yf nglqksiké lsl risnpngl. 3 Y Mgtfvá glrsrtó bp vfz ng Ilkpgb, y geqkguó pb rpepegf, y bfl nglqksyó p gbbfl y p lsl risnpngl; y bbpdó gb efdakg ng pjsgb bsupk Tfkdp. 

Bp lgkhigeqg ng akferg

4 Nglhsél hpkqigkfe ngb dfeqg ng Tfk, rpdief ngb Dpk Kfmf, hpkp kfngpk bp qigkkp ng Gnfd; y lg nglpeidó gb hsgabf hfk gb rpdief. 5 Y tpabó gb hsgabf rfeqkp Nifl y rfeqkp Dfilél: ¿Hfk jsé efl tirilqg lsaik ng Guihqf hpkp jsg dskpdfl ge glqg ngligkqf? Hsgl ef tpy hpe ei pusp, y esglqkp pbdp qigeg cplqinif ng glqg hpe qpe bivipef. 6 Y Mgtfvá gevió geqkg gb hsgabf lgkhigeqgl pknigeqgl, jsg dfknípe pb hsgabf; y dskió dsrtf hsgabf ng Ilkpgb. 7 Geqfergl gb hsgabf vief p Dfilél y nimf: Tgdfl hgrpnf hfk tpagk tpabpnf rfeqkp Mgtfvá, y rfeqkp qi; ksgup p Mgtfvá jsg jsiqg ng eflfqkfl glqpl lgkhigeqgl. Y Dfilél fkó hfk gb hsgabf. 8 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Tpzqg sep lgkhigeqg pknigeqg, y hfebp lfakg sep plqp; y rspbjsigkp jsg csgkg dfkninf y dikpkg p gbbp, viviká. 9 Y Dfilél tizf sep lgkhigeqg ng akferg, y bp hslf lfakg sep plqp; y rspenf pbusep lgkhigeqg dfkníp p pbusef, dikpap p bp lgkhigeqg ng akferg, y vivíp. 

Bfl ilkpgbiqpl kfngpe bp qigkkp ng Dfpa

10 Nglhsél hpkqigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y prpdhpkfe ge Fafq. 11 Y hpkqigenf ng Fafq, prpdhpkfe ge Img-papkid, ge gb ngligkqf jsg glqá geckgeqg ng Dfpa, pb epridigeqf ngb lfb. 12 Hpkqigkfe ng pbbí, y prpdhpkfe ge gb vpbbg ng Zgkgn. 13 Ng pbbí hpkqigkfe, y prpdhpkfe pb fqkf bpnf ng Pkeóe, jsg glqá ge gb ngligkqf, y jsg lpbg ngb qgkkiqfkif ngb pdfkkgf; hfkjsg Pkeóe gl bídiqg ng Dfpa, geqkg Dfpa y gb pdfkkgf. 14 Hfk qpeqf lg nirg ge gb biakf ng bpl apqpbbpl ng Mgtfvá: 


Bf jsg tizf ge gb Dpk Kfmf, 
Y ge bfl pkkfyfl ng Pkeóe; 
15 Y p bp rfkkigeqg ng bfl pkkfyfl 
Jsg vp p hpkpk ge Pk, 
Y nglrpelp ge gb bídiqg ng Dfpa. 



16 Ng pbbí vieigkfe p Aggk: glqg gl gb hfzf ngb rspb Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Kgúeg pb hsgabf, y bgl npké pusp. 17 Geqfergl, rpeqó Ilkpgb glqg ráeqirf: 


Lsag, ft hfzf; p éb rpeqpn; 
18 Hfzf, gb rspb rpvpkfe bfl lgñfkgl. 
Bf rpvpkfe bfl hkíerihgl ngb hsgabf, 
Y gb bguilbpnfk, rfe lsl aársbfl. 

Ngb ngligkqf vieigkfe p Dpqpep, 19 y ng Dpqpep p Eptpbigb, y ng Eptpbigb p Apdfq; 20 y ng Apdfq pb vpbbg jsg glqá ge bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa, y p bp rsdakg ng Hilup, jsg dikp tprip gb ngligkqf. 

Ilkpgb ngkkfqp p Lgtóe

(Nq. 2.26-37)

21 Geqfergl gevió Ilkpgb gdapmpnfkgl p Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl, nirigenf: 22 Hplpké hfk qs qigkkp; ef efl ikgdfl hfk bfl lgdakpnfl, ei hfk bpl viñpl; ef agagkgdfl bpl puspl ng bfl hfzfl; hfk gb rpdief kgpb ikgdfl, tplqp jsg hplgdfl qs qgkkiqfkif. 23 Dpl Lgtóe ef ngmó hplpk p Ilkpgb hfk ls qgkkiqfkif, lief jsg mseqó Lgtóe qfnf ls hsgabf y lpbió rfeqkp Ilkpgb ge gb ngligkqf, y vief p Mptpzp y hgbgó rfeqkp Ilkpgb. 24 Y bf tikió Ilkpgb p cibf ng glhpnp, y qfdó ls qigkkp nglng Pkeóe tplqp Mpafr, tplqp bfl timfl ng Pdóe; hfkjsg bp ckfeqgkp ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe gkp csgkqg. 25 Y qfdó Ilkpgb qfnpl glqpl risnpngl, y tpaiqó Ilkpgb ge qfnpl bpl risnpngl ngb pdfkkgf, ge Tglaóe y ge qfnpl lsl pbngpl. 26 Hfkjsg Tglaóe gkp bp risnpn ng Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl, gb rspb tpaíp qgeinf usgkkp peqgl rfe gb kgy ng Dfpa, y qfdpnf ng ls hfngk qfnp ls qigkkp tplqp Pkeóe. 27 Hfk qpeqf nirge bfl hkfvgkailqpl: 


Vgein p Tglaóe, 
Gnicíjsglg y kghákglg bp risnpn ng Lgtóe. 
28 Hfkjsg csguf lpbió ng Tglaóe, 
Y bbpdp ng bp risnpn ng Lgtóe, 
Y rfelsdió p Pk ng Dfpa, 
P bfl lgñfkgl ng bpl pbqskpl ng Pkeóe. 
29 ¡Py ng qi, Dfpa! 
Hgkgrilqg, hsgabf ng Jsgdfl. 
Csgkfe hsglqfl lsl timfl ge tsinp, 
Y lsl timpl ge rpsqivinpn, 
Hfk Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl. 
30 Dpl ngvplqpdfl gb kgief ng gbbfl; 
Hgkgrió Tglaóe tplqp Niaóe, 
Y nglqksidfl tplqp Efcp y Dgngap. 



Ilkpgb ngkkfqp p Fu ng Apláe

(Nq. 3.1-11)

31 Plí tpaiqó Ilkpgb ge bp qigkkp ngb pdfkkgf. 32 Qpdaiée gevió Dfilél p kgrfefrgk p Mpzgk; y qfdpkfe lsl pbngpl, y grtpkfe pb pdfkkgf jsg glqpap pbbí. 33 Y vfbvigkfe, y lsaigkfe rpdief ng Apláe; y lpbió rfeqkp gbbfl Fu kgy ng Apláe, éb y qfnf ls hsgabf, hpkp hgbgpk ge Gnkgi. 34 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Ef bg qgeupl dignf, hfkjsg ge qs dpef bf tg geqkgupnf, p éb y p qfnf ls hsgabf, y p ls qigkkp; y tpkál ng éb rfdf tirilqg ng Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl, jsg tpaiqpap ge Tglaóe. 35 G tikigkfe p éb y p lsl timfl, y p qfnp ls ugeqg, lie jsg bg jsgnpkp sef, y lg phfngkpkfe ng ls qigkkp. 

Apbpr dpenp bbpdpk p Apbppd

EÚDGKFL 22

1 Hpkqigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y prpdhpkfe ge bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa mseqf pb Mfknáe, ckgeqg p Mgkiró. 2 Y vif Apbpr timf ng Zihfk qfnf bf jsg Ilkpgb tpaíp tgrtf pb pdfkkgf. 3 Y Dfpa qsvf ukpe qgdfk p rpslp ngb hsgabf, hfkjsg gkp dsrtf; y lg peuslqió Dfpa p rpslp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 4 Y nimf Dfpa p bfl peripefl ng Dpniáe: Ptfkp bpdgká glqp ugeqg qfnfl esglqkfl rfeqfkefl, rfdf bpdg gb asgy bp ukpdp ngb rpdhf. Y Apbpr timf ng Zihfk gkp geqfergl kgy ng Dfpa. 5 Hfk qpeqf, gevió dgelpmgkfl p Apbppd timf ng Agfk, ge Hgqfk, jsg glqá mseqf pb kíf ge bp qigkkp ng bfl timfl ng ls hsgabf, hpkp jsg bf bbpdplge, nirigenf: Se hsgabf tp lpbinf ng Guihqf, y tg pjsí rsakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp, y tpaiqp ngbpeqg ng dí. 6 Vge hsgl, ptfkp, qg ksguf, dpbnírgdg glqg hsgabf, hfkjsg gl dál csgkqg jsg yf; jsizá yf hsgnp tgkikbf y grtpkbf ng bp qigkkp; hsgl yf lé jsg gb jsg qú ageniupl lgká ageniqf, y gb jsg qú dpbniupl lgká dpbniqf. 

7 Csgkfe bfl peripefl ng Dfpa y bfl peripefl ng Dpniáe rfe bpl nánivpl ng pnivieprióe ge ls dpef, y bbgupkfe p Apbppd y bg nimgkfe bpl hpbpakpl ng Apbpr. 8 Gb bgl nimf: Kghflpn pjsí glqp efrtg, y yf fl npké kglhsglqp lguúe Mgtfvá dg tpabpkg. Plí bfl hkíerihgl ng Dfpa lg jsgnpkfe rfe Apbppd. 9 Y vief Nifl p Apbppd, y bg nimf: ¿Jsé vpkfegl lfe glqfl jsg glqáe rfeqiuf? 10 Y Apbppd kglhfenió p Nifl: Apbpr timf ng Zihfk, kgy ng Dfpa, tp gevipnf p ngrikdg: 11 Tg pjsí, glqg hsgabf jsg tp lpbinf ng Guihqf rsakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp; vge hsgl, ptfkp, y dpbnírgdgbf; jsizá hfnké hgbgpk rfeqkp éb y grtpkbf. 12 Geqfergl nimf Nifl p Apbppd: Ef vpypl rfe gbbfl, ei dpbniupl pb hsgabf, hfkjsg ageniqf gl. 13 Plí Apbppd lg bgvpeqó hfk bp dpñpep y nimf p bfl hkíerihgl ng Apbpr: Vfbvgfl p vsglqkp qigkkp, hfkjsg Mgtfvá ef dg jsigkg ngmpk ik rfe vflfqkfl. 14 Y bfl hkíerihgl ng Dfpa lg bgvpeqpkfe, y vieigkfe p Apbpr y nimgkfe: Apbppd ef jsilf vgeik rfe eflfqkfl. 

15 Vfbvió Apbpr p gevipk fqkp vgz dál hkíerihgl, y dál tfefkpabgl jsg bfl fqkfl; 16 bfl rspbgl vieigkfe p Apbppd, y bg nimgkfe: Plí nirg Apbpr, timf ng Zihfk: Qg ksguf jsg ef ngmgl ng vgeik p dí; 17 hfkjsg lie nsnp qg tfekpké dsrtf, y tpké qfnf bf jsg dg niupl; vge, hsgl, ptfkp, dpbnírgdg p glqg hsgabf. 18 Y Apbppd kglhfenió y nimf p bfl ligkvfl ng Apbpr: Psejsg Apbpr dg niglg ls rplp bbgep ng hbpqp y fkf, ef hsgnf qkplhplpk bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá di Nifl hpkp tprgk rflp rtirp ei ukpeng. 19 Fl ksguf, hfk qpeqf, ptfkp, jsg kghfléil pjsí glqp efrtg, hpkp jsg yf lghp jsé dg vsgbvg p ngrik Mgtfvá. 20 Y vief Nifl p Apbppd ng efrtg, y bg nimf: Li vieigkfe hpkp bbpdpkqg glqfl tfdakgl, bgváeqpqg y vgqg rfe gbbfl; hgkf tpkál bf jsg yf qg niup. 

Gb áeugb y gb plep ng Apbppd

21 Plí Apbppd lg bgvpeqó hfk bp dpñpep, y gepbapknó ls plep y csg rfe bfl hkíerihgl ng Dfpa. 22 Y bp ikp ng Nifl lg gergenió hfkjsg éb iap; y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá lg hslf ge gb rpdief hfk pnvgklpkif lsyf. Iap, hsgl, éb dfeqpnf lfakg ls plep, y rfe éb nfl rkipnfl lsyfl. 23 Y gb plep vif pb áeugb ng Mgtfvá, jsg glqpap ge gb rpdief rfe ls glhpnp nglesnp ge ls dpef; y lg phpkqó gb plep ngb rpdief, g iap hfk gb rpdhf. Geqfergl pzfqó Apbppd pb plep hpkp tprgkbp vfbvgk pb rpdief. 24 Hgkf gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá lg hslf ge sep lgenp ng viñpl jsg qgeíp hpkgn p se bpnf y hpkgn pb fqkf. 25 Y vigenf gb plep pb áeugb ng Mgtfvá, lg hguó p bp hpkgn, y phkgqó rfeqkp bp hpkgn gb hig ng Apbppd; y éb vfbvió p pzfqpkbp. 26 Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá hpló dál pbbá, y lg hslf ge sep peuflqskp nfeng ef tpaíp rpdief hpkp phpkqpklg ei p ngkgrtp ei p izjsigknp. 27 Y vigenf gb plep pb áeugb ng Mgtfvá, lg grtó ngapmf ng Apbppd; y Apbppd lg gefmó y pzfqó pb plep rfe se hpbf. 28 Geqfergl Mgtfvá pakió bp afrp pb plep, bp rspb nimf p Apbppd: ¿Jsé qg tg tgrtf, jsg dg tpl pzfqpnf glqpl qkgl vgrgl? 29 Y Apbppd kglhfenió pb plep: Hfkjsg qg tpl askbpnf ng dí. ¡Fmpbá qsvigkp glhpnp ge di dpef, jsg ptfkp qg dpqpkíp! 30 Y gb plep nimf p Apbppd: ¿Ef lfy yf qs plep? Lfakg dí tpl rpapbupnf nglng jsg qú dg qigegl tplqp glqg níp; ¿tg prflqsdakpnf tprgkbf plí rfeqiuf? Y éb kglhfenió: Ef. 

31 Geqfergl Mgtfvá pakió bfl fmfl ng Apbppd, y vif pb áeugb ng Mgtfvá jsg glqpap ge gb rpdief, y qgeíp ls glhpnp nglesnp ge ls dpef. Y Apbppd tizf kgvgkgerip, y lg ierbieó lfakg ls kflqkf. 32 Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá bg nimf: ¿Hfk jsé tpl pzfqpnf qs plep glqpl qkgl vgrgl? Tg pjsí yf tg lpbinf hpkp kglilqikqg, hfkjsg qs rpdief gl hgkvgklf ngbpeqg ng dí. 33 Gb plep dg tp vilqf, y lg tp phpkqpnf bsguf ng ngbpeqg ng dí glqpl qkgl vgrgl; y li ng dí ef lg tsaigkp phpkqpnf, yf qpdaiée ptfkp qg dpqpkíp p qi, y p gbbp ngmpkíp vivp. 34 Geqfergl Apbppd nimf pb áeugb ng Mgtfvá: Tg hgrpnf, hfkjsg ef lpaíp jsg qú qg hfeípl ngbpeqg ng dí ge gb rpdief; dpl ptfkp, li qg hpkgrg dpb, yf dg vfbvgké. 35 Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá nimf p Apbppd: Vg rfe glfl tfdakgl; hgkf bp hpbpakp jsg yf qg niup, glp tpabpkál. Plí Apbppd csg rfe bfl hkíerihgl ng Apbpr. 

36 Fygenf Apbpr jsg Apbppd vgeíp, lpbió p kgriaikbf p bp risnpn ng Dfpa, jsg glqá mseqf pb bídiqg ng Pkeóe, jsg glqá pb gxqkgdf ng ls qgkkiqfkif. 37 Y Apbpr nimf p Apbppd: ¿Ef gevié yf p bbpdpkqg? ¿Hfk jsé ef tpl vgeinf p dí? ¿Ef hsgnf yf tfekpkqg? 38 Apbppd kglhfenió p Apbpr: Tg pjsí yf tg vgeinf p qi; dpl ¿hfnké ptfkp tpabpk pbusep rflp? Bp hpbpakp jsg Nifl hsligkg ge di afrp, glp tpabpké. 39 Y csg Apbppd rfe Apbpr, y vieigkfe p Jsikipq-tszfq. 40 Y Apbpr tizf dpqpk asgygl y fvgmpl, y gevió p Apbppd, y p bfl hkíerihgl jsg glqpape rfe éb. 

Apbppd agenirg p Ilkpgb

41 Gb níp liusigeqg, Apbpr qfdó p Apbppd y bf tizf lsaik p Apdfq-appb, y nglng pbbí vif p bfl dál rgkrpefl ngb hsgabf. 

EÚDGKFL 23

1 Y Apbppd nimf p Apbpr: Gnicírpdg pjsí ligqg pbqpkgl, y hkghákpdg pjsí ligqg agrgkkfl y ligqg rpkegkfl. 2 Apbpr tizf rfdf bg nimf Apbppd; y fckgrigkfe Apbpr y Apbppd se agrgkkf y se rpkegkf ge rpnp pbqpk. 3 Y Apbppd nimf p Apbpr: Hfeqg mseqf p qs tfbfrpslqf, y yf iké; jsizá Mgtfvá dg vgenká pb gersgeqkf, y rspbjsigkp rflp jsg dg dflqkpkg, qg pvilpké. Y lg csg p se dfeqg nglrsaigkqf. 4 Y vief Nifl pb gersgeqkf ng Apbppd, y élqg bg nimf: Ligqg pbqpkgl tg fkngepnf, y ge rpnp pbqpk tg fckgrinf se agrgkkf y se rpkegkf. 5 Y Mgtfvá hslf hpbpakp ge bp afrp ng Apbppd, y bg nimf: Vsgbvg p Apbpr, y nibg plí. 6 Y vfbvió p éb, y tg pjsí glqpap éb mseqf p ls tfbfrpslqf, éb y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng Dfpa. 7 Y éb qfdó ls hpkáafbp, y nimf: 


Ng Pkpd dg qkpmf Apbpr, 
Kgy ng Dfpa, ng bfl dfeqgl ngb fkigeqg; 
Vge, dpbnírgdg p Mprfa, 
Y vge, gxgrkp p Ilkpgb. 
8 ¿Hfk jsé dpbngriké yf pb jsg Nifl ef dpbnimf? 
¿Y hfk jsé tg ng gxgrkpk pb jsg Mgtfvá ef tp gxgrkpnf? 
9 Hfkjsg ng bp rsdakg ng bpl hgñpl bf vgké, 
Y nglng bfl rfbbpnfl bf dikpké; 
Tg pjsí se hsgabf jsg tpaiqpká rfecipnf, 
Y ef lgká rfeqpnf geqkg bpl eprifegl. 
10 ¿Jsiée rfeqpká gb hfbvf ng Mprfa, 
F gb eúdgkf ng bp rspkqp hpkqg ng Ilkpgb? 
Dsgkp yf bp dsgkqg ng bfl kgrqfl, 
Y di hflqkidgkíp lgp rfdf bp lsyp. 



11 Geqfergl Apbpr nimf p Apbppd: ¿Jsé dg tpl tgrtf? Qg tg qkpínf hpkp jsg dpbniupl p dil gegdiufl, y tg pjsí tpl hkfcgkinf agenirifegl. 12 Gb kglhfenió y nimf: ¿Ef rsinpké ng ngrik bf jsg Mgtfvá hfeup ge di afrp? 

13 Y nimf Apbpr: Qg ksguf jsg vgeupl rfediuf p fqkf bsupk nglng gb rspb bfl vgpl; lfbpdgeqg bfl dál rgkrpefl vgkál, y ef bfl vgkál qfnfl; y nglng pbbí dg bfl dpbngrikál. 14 Y bf bbgvó pb rpdhf ng Zfcid, p bp rsdakg ng Hilup, y gniciró ligqg pbqpkgl, y fckgrió se agrgkkf y se rpkegkf ge rpnp pbqpk. 15 Geqfergl éb nimf p Apbpr: Hfeqg pjsí mseqf p qs tfbfrpslqf, y yf iké p gerfeqkpk p Nifl pbbí. 16 Y Mgtfvá lpbió pb gersgeqkf ng Apbppd, y hslf hpbpakp ge ls afrp, y bg nimf: Vsgbvg p Apbpr, y nibg plí. 17 Y vief p éb, y tg pjsí jsg éb glqpap mseqf p ls tfbfrpslqf, y rfe éb bfl hkíerihgl ng Dfpa; y bg nimf Apbpr: ¿Jsé tp nirtf Mgtfvá? 18 Geqfergl éb qfdó ls hpkáafbp, y nimf: 


Apbpr, bgváeqpqg y fyg; 
Glrsrtp dil hpbpakpl, timf ng Zihfk: 
19 Nifl ef gl tfdakg, hpkp jsg digeqp, 
Ei timf ng tfdakg hpkp jsg lg pkkghigeqp. 
Gb nimf, ¿y ef tpká? 
Tpabó, ¿y ef bf gmgrsqpká? 
20 Tg pjsí, tg kgriainf fknge ng agengrik; 
Gb nif agenirióe, y ef hfnké kgvfrpkbp. 
21 Ef tp efqpnf ieijsinpn ge Mprfa, 
Ei tp vilqf hgkvgklinpn ge Ilkpgb. 
Mgtfvá ls Nifl glqá rfe éb, 
Y múaibf ng kgy ge éb. 
22 Nifl bfl tp lprpnf ng Guihqf; 
Qigeg csgkzpl rfdf ng aúcpbf. 
23 Hfkjsg rfeqkp Mprfa ef tpy puügkf, 
Ei pnivieprióe rfeqkp Ilkpgb. 
Rfdf ptfkp, lgká nirtf ng Mprfa y ng Ilkpgb: 
¡Bf jsg tp tgrtf Nifl! 
24 Tg pjsí gb hsgabf jsg rfdf bgóe lg bgvpeqpká, 
Y rfdf bgóe lg gkusiká; 
Ef lg grtpká tplqp jsg ngvfkg bp hkglp, 
Y agap bp lpeukg ng bfl dsgkqfl. 



25 Geqfergl Apbpr nimf p Apbppd: Yp jsg ef bf dpbnirgl, qpdhfrf bf ageniupl. 26 Apbppd kglhfenió y nimf p Apbpr: ¿Ef qg tg nirtf jsg qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá dg niup, glf qgeuf jsg tprgk? 27 Y nimf Apbpr p Apbppd: Qg ksguf jsg vgeupl, qg bbgvpké p fqkf bsupk; hfk vgeqskp hpkgrgká aige p Nifl jsg nglng pbbí dg bf dpbniupl. 28 Y Apbpr bbgvó p Apbppd p bp rsdakg ng Hgfk, jsg dikp tprip gb ngligkqf. 29 Geqfergl Apbppd nimf p Apbpr: Gnicírpdg pjsí ligqg pbqpkgl, y hkghákpdg pjsí ligqg agrgkkfl y ligqg rpkegkfl. 30 Y Apbpr tizf rfdf Apbppd bg nimf; y fckgrió se agrgkkf y se rpkegkf ge rpnp pbqpk. 

EÚDGKFL 24

1 Rspenf vif Apbppd jsg hpkgríp aige p Mgtfvá jsg éb agenimglg p Ilkpgb, ef csg, rfdf bp hkidgkp y lgusenp vgz, ge aslrp ng puügkf, lief jsg hslf ls kflqkf tprip gb ngligkqf; 2 y pbzpenf lsl fmfl, vif p Ilkpgb pbfmpnf hfk lsl qkiasl; y gb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl vief lfakg éb. 3 Geqfergl qfdó ls hpkáafbp, y nimf: 


Nimf Apbppd timf ng Agfk, 
Y nimf gb vpkóe ng fmfl paigkqfl; 
4 Nimf gb jsg fyó bfl nirtfl ng Nifl, 
Gb jsg vif bp vilióe ngb Fdeihfqgeqg; 
Rpínf, hgkf paigkqfl bfl fmfl: 
5 ¡Rsáe tgkdflpl lfe qsl qigenpl, ft Mprfa, 
Qsl tpaiqprifegl, ft Ilkpgb! 
6 Rfdf pkkfyfl glqáe gxqgeninpl, 
Rfdf tsgkqfl mseqf pb kíf, 
Rfdf ábfgl hbpeqpnfl hfk Mgtfvá, 
Rfdf rgnkfl mseqf p bpl puspl.

Y ls nglrgengerip lgká ge dsrtpl puspl; 
Gepbqgrgká ls kgy dál jsg Pupu, 
Y ls kgief lgká geukpengrinf.

Ngldgeszpká lsl tsglfl, 
Y bpl qkplhplpká rfe lsl lpgqpl.

Y rfdf bgfep; ¿jsiée bf nglhgkqpká? 
Ageniqfl bfl jsg qg agenimgkge, 
Y dpbniqfl bfl jsg qg dpbnimgkge. 



Hkfcgríp ng Apbppd

10 Geqfergl lg gergenió bp ikp ng Apbpr rfeqkp Apbppd, y apqigenf lsl dpefl bg nimf: Hpkp dpbngrik p dil gegdiufl qg tg bbpdpnf, y tg pjsí bfl tpl agengrinf yp qkgl vgrgl. 11 Ptfkp tsyg p qs bsupk; yf nimg jsg qg tfekpkíp, dpl tg pjsí jsg Mgtfvá qg tp hkivpnf ng tfekp. 12 Y Apbppd bg kglhfenió: ¿Ef bf ngrbpké yf qpdaiée p qsl dgelpmgkfl jsg dg geviplqg, nirigenf: 13 Li Apbpr dg niglg ls rplp bbgep ng hbpqp y fkf, yf ef hfnké qkplhplpk gb nirtf ng Mgtfvá hpkp tprgk rflp asgep ei dpbp ng di pkaiqkif, dpl bf jsg tpabg Mgtfvá, glf niké yf? 14 Tg pjsí, yf dg vfy ptfkp p di hsgabf; hfk qpeqf, vge, qg ienirpké bf jsg glqg hsgabf tp ng tprgk p qs hsgabf ge bfl hflqkgkfl nípl. 15 Y qfdó ls hpkáafbp, y nimf: 


Nimf Apbppd timf ng Agfk, 
Nimf gb vpkóe ng fmfl paigkqfl; 
16 Nimf gb jsg fyó bfl nirtfl ng Mgtfvá, 
Y gb jsg lpag bp rigerip ngb Pbqílidf, 
Gb jsg vif bp vilióe ngb Fdeihfqgeqg; 
Rpínf, hgkf paigkqfl bfl fmfl: 
17 Bf vgké, dpl ef ptfkp; 
Bf dikpké, dpl ef ng rgkrp; 
Lpbnká GLQKGBBP ng Mprfa, 
Y lg bgvpeqpká rgqkf ng Ilkpgb, 
Y tgkiká bpl ligegl ng Dfpa, 
Y nglqksiká p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Lgq.

Lgká qpdaiée qfdpnp Lgik hfk lsl gegdiufl, 
G Ilkpgb lg hfkqpká vpkfeibdgeqg. 
19 Ng Mprfa lpbnká gb nfdiepnfk, 
Y nglqksiká bf jsg jsgnpkg ng bp risnpn.

Pdpbgr, rpagzp ng eprifegl; 
Dpl pb cie hgkgrgká hpkp ligdhkg.

Csgkqg gl qs tpaiqprióe; 
Hfe ge bp hgñp qs einf;

Rspenf Plikip qg bbgvpká rpsqivf.

Y pcbiuikáe p Plikip, pcbiuikáe qpdaiée p Tgagk; 
Dpl éb qpdaiée hgkgrgká hpkp ligdhkg. 



25 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqó Apbppd y lg csg, y vfbvió p ls bsupk; y qpdaiée Apbpr lg csg hfk ls rpdief. 

Ilkpgb prsng p Appb-hgfk

EÚDGKFL 25

1 Dfkpap Ilkpgb ge Liqid; y gb hsgabf gdhgzó p cfkeirpk rfe bpl timpl ng Dfpa, 2 bpl rspbgl ieviqpape pb hsgabf p bfl lprkicirifl ng lsl niflgl; y gb hsgabf rfdió, y lg ierbieó p lsl niflgl. 3 Plí prsnió gb hsgabf p Appb-hgfk; y gb cskfk ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió rfeqkp Ilkpgb. 4 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Qfdp p qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ngb hsgabf, y ptókrpbfl peqg Mgtfvá ngbpeqg ngb lfb, y gb pknfk ng bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg phpkqpká ng Ilkpgb. 5 Geqfergl Dfilél nimf p bfl msgrgl ng Ilkpgb: Dpqpn rpnp sef p pjsgbbfl ng bfl vsglqkfl jsg lg tpe mseqpnf rfe Appb-hgfk. 

6 Y tg pjsí se vpkóe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb vief y qkpmf sep dpnipeiqp p lsl tgkdpefl, p fmfl ng Dfilél y ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, digeqkpl bbfkpape gbbfl p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 7 Y bf vif Cieggl timf ng Gbgpzpk, timf ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe, y lg bgvpeqó ng ge dgnif ng bp rfeukguprióe, y qfdó sep bpezp ge ls dpef; 8 y csg qkpl gb vpkóe ng Ilkpgb p bp qigenp, y bfl pbpergó p pdafl, pb vpkóe ng Ilkpgb, y p bp dsmgk hfk ls vigeqkg. Y rgló bp dfkqpenpn ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 9 Y dskigkfe ng pjsgbbp dfkqpenpn vgieqirspqkf dib. 

10 Geqfergl Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 11 Cieggl timf ng Gbgpzpk, timf ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe, tp tgrtf phpkqpk di cskfk ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, bbgvpnf ng rgbf geqkg gbbfl; hfk bf rspb yf ef tg rfelsdinf ge di rgbf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 12 Hfk qpeqf nibgl: Tg pjsí yf glqpabgzrf di hprqf ng hpz rfe éb; 13 y qgenká éb, y ls nglrgengerip nglhsél ng éb, gb hprqf ngb lprgknfrif hgkhgqsf, hfk rspeqf qsvf rgbf hfk ls Nifl g tizf gxhiprióe hfk bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

14 Y gb efdakg ngb vpkóe jsg csg dsgkqf rfe bp dpnipeiqp gkp Zidki timf ng Lpbs, mgcg ng sep cpdibip ng bp qkias ng Lidgóe. 15 Y gb efdakg ng bp dsmgk dpnipeiqp dsgkqp gkp Rfzai timp ng Zsk, hkíerihg ng hsgabfl, hpnkg ng cpdibip ge Dpniáe. 

16 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 17 Tflqiupn p bfl dpnipeiqpl, y tgkinbfl, 18 hfk rspeqf gbbfl fl pcbiuigkfe p vflfqkfl rfe lsl pkningl rfe jsg fl tpe geupñpnf ge bf qfrpeqg p Appb-hgfk, y ge bf qfrpeqg p Rfzai timp ngb hkíerihg ng Dpniáe, ls tgkdpep, bp rspb csg dsgkqp gb níp ng bp dfkqpenpn hfk rpslp ng Appb-hgfk. 

Rgelf ngb hsgabf ge Dfpa

EÚDGKFL 26

1 Prfeqgrió nglhsél ng bp dfkqpenpn, jsg Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél y p Gbgpzpk timf ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe, nirigenf: 2 Qfdpn gb rgelf ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, hfk bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, qfnfl bfl jsg hsgnge lpbik p bp usgkkp ge Ilkpgb. 3 Y Dfilél y gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk tpabpkfe rfe gbbfl ge bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa, mseqf pb Mfknáe ckgeqg p Mgkiró, nirigenf: 4 Rfeqpkéil gb hsgabf ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, rfdf dpenó Mgtfvá p Dfilél y p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg tpaípe lpbinf ng qigkkp ng Guihqf. 

5 Ksaée, hkidfuéeiqf ng Ilkpgb; bfl timfl ng Ksaée: ng Gefr, bp cpdibip ng bfl gefjsiqpl; ng Cpbú, bp cpdibip ng bfl cpbsiqpl; 6 ng Tgzkóe, bp cpdibip ng bfl tgzkfeiqpl; ng Rpkdi, bp cpdibip ng bfl rpkdiqpl. 7 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng bfl ksageiqpl; y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng gbbpl rspkgeqp y qkgl dib lgqgrigeqfl qkgieqp. 8 Bfl timfl ng Cpbú: Gbipa. 9 Y bfl timfl ng Gbipa: Egdsgb, Npqáe y Paikpd. Glqfl Npqáe y Paikpd csgkfe bfl ngb rfelgmf ng bp rfeukguprióe, jsg lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp Dfilél y Ppkóe rfe gb ukshf ng Rfké, rspenf lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp Mgtfvá; 10 y bp qigkkp pakió ls afrp y bfl qkpuó p gbbfl y p Rfké, rspenf pjsgb ukshf dskió, rspenf rfelsdió gb csguf p nflrigeqfl riersgeqp vpkfegl, hpkp lgkvik ng glrpkdigeqf. 11 Dpl bfl timfl ng Rfké ef dskigkfe. 

12 Bfl timfl ng Lidgóe hfk lsl cpdibipl: ng Egdsgb, bp cpdibip ng bfl egdsgbiqpl; ng Mpdíe, bp cpdibip ng bfl mpdieiqpl; ng Mpjsíe, bp cpdibip ng bfl mpjsieiqpl; 13 ng Zgkp, bp cpdibip ng bfl zgkpíqpl; ng Lpúb, bp cpdibip ng bfl lpsbiqpl. 14 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng bfl lidgfeiqpl, vgieqinól dib nflrigeqfl. 

15 Bfl timfl ng Upn hfk lsl cpdibipl: ng Zgcóe, bp cpdibip ng bfl zgcfeiqpl; ng Tpusi, bp cpdibip ng bfl tpusiqpl; ng Lsei, bp cpdibip ng bfl lseiqpl; 16 ng Fzei, bp cpdibip ng bfl fzeiqpl; ng Gki, bp cpdibip ng bfl gkiqpl; 17 ng Pkfn, bp cpdibip ng bfl pkfniqpl; ng Pkgbi, bp cpdibip ng bfl pkgbiqpl. 18 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng Upn; y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng gbbpl rspkgeqp dib jsieigeqfl. 

19 Bfl timfl ng Msná: Gk y Feáe; y Gk y Feáe dskigkfe ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe. 20 Y csgkfe bfl timfl ng Msná hfk lsl cpdibipl: ng Lgbp, bp cpdibip ng bfl lgbpíqpl; ng Cpkgl, bp cpdibip ng bfl cpkgliqpl; ng Zgkp, bp cpdibip ng bfl zgkpíqpl. 21 Y csgkfe bfl timfl ng Cpkgl: ng Tgzkóe, bp cpdibip ng bfl tgzkfeiqpl; ng Tpdsb, bp cpdibip ng bfl tpdsbiqpl. 22 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng Msná, y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng gbbpl lgqgeqp y lgil dib jsieigeqfl. 

23 Bfl timfl ng Ilprpk hfk lsl cpdibipl; ng Qfbp, bp cpdibip ng bfl qfbpíqpl; ng Cúp, bp cpdibip ng bfl cseiqpl; 24 ng Mplsa, bp cpdibip ng bfl mplsaiqpl; ng Lidkóe, bp cpdibip ng bfl lidkfeiqpl. 25 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng Ilprpk, y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng gbbpl lglgeqp y rspqkf dib qkglrigeqfl. 

26 Bfl timfl ng Zpasbóe hfk lsl cpdibipl: ng Lgkgn, bp cpdibip ng bfl lgkgniqpl; ng Gbóe, bp cpdibip ng bfl gbfeiqpl; ng Mptbggb, bp cpdibip ng bfl mptbggbiqpl. 27 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng bfl zpasbfeiqpl, y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng gbbpl lglgeqp dib jsieigeqfl. 

28 Bfl timfl ng Mflé hfk lsl cpdibipl: Dpeplél y Gckpíe. 29 Bfl timfl ng Dpeplél: ng Dpjsik, bp cpdibip ng bfl dpjsikiqpl; y Dpjsik geugenkó p Upbppn; ng Upbppn, bp cpdibip ng bfl upbppniqpl. 30 Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Upbppn: ng Mgzgk, bp cpdibip ng bfl mgzgkiqpl; ng Tgbgr, bp cpdibip ng bfl tgbgjsiqpl; 31 ng Plkigb, bp cpdibip ng bfl plkigbiqpl; ng Lijsgd, bp cpdibip ng bfl lijsgdiqpl; 32 ng Lgdinp, bp cpdibip ng bfl lgdinpíqpl; ng Tgcgk, bp cpdibip ng bfl tgcgkiqpl. 33 Y Zgbfcgtpn timf ng Tgcgk ef qsvf timfl lief timpl; y bfl efdakgl ng bpl timpl ng Zgbfcgtpn csgkfe Dppbp, Efp, Tfubp, Dibrp y Qiklp. 34 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng Dpeplél; y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng gbbpl riersgeqp y nfl dib lgqgrigeqfl. 

35 Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Gckpíe hfk lsl cpdibipl: ng Lsqgbp, bp cpdibip ng bfl lsqgbpíqpl; ng Agjsgk, bp cpdibip ng bfl agjsgkiqpl; ng Qptáe, bp cpdibip ng bfl qptpeiqpl. 36 Y glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Lsqgbp: ng Gkáe, bp cpdibip ng bfl gkpeiqpl. 37 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe; y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng gbbpl qkgieqp y nfl dib jsieigeqfl. Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Mflé hfk lsl cpdibipl. 

38 Bfl timfl ng Agempdíe hfk lsl cpdibipl: ng Agbp, bp cpdibip ng bfl agbpíqpl; ng Plagb, bp cpdibip ng bfl plagbiqpl; ng Ptikpd, bp cpdibip ng bfl ptikpdiqpl; 39 ng Lscpd, bp cpdibip ng bfl lscpdiqpl; ng Tscpd, bp cpdibip ng bfl tscpdiqpl. 40 Y bfl timfl ng Agbp csgkfe Pkn y Eppdáe: ng Pkn, bp cpdibip ng bfl pkniqpl; ng Eppdáe, bp cpdibip ng bfl eppdiqpl. 41 Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Agempdíe hfk lsl cpdibipl; y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng gbbfl rspkgeqp y rierf dib lgilrigeqfl. 

42 Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Npe hfk lsl cpdibipl: ng Lútpd, bp cpdibip ng bfl lstpdiqpl. Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng Npe hfk lsl cpdibipl. 43 Ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl lstpdiqpl csgkfe rfeqpnfl lglgeqp y rspqkf dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 

44 Bfl timfl ng Plgk hfk lsl cpdibipl: ng Idep, bp cpdibip ng bfl ideiqpl; ng Ilúi, bp cpdibip ng bfl ilsiqpl; ng Agkíp, bp cpdibip ng bfl agkipíqpl. 45 Bfl timfl ng Agkíp: ng Tgagk, bp cpdibip ng bfl tgagkiqpl; ng Dpbjsigb, bp cpdibip ng bfl dpbjsigbiqpl. 46 Y gb efdakg ng bp timp ng Plgk csg Lgkp. 47 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Plgk; y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng gbbpl riersgeqp y qkgl dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 

48 Bfl timfl ng Egcqpbí, hfk lsl cpdibipl: ng Mptzggb, bp cpdibip ng bfl mptzggbiqpl; ng Usei, bp cpdibip ng bfl useiqpl; 49 ng Mgzgk, bp cpdibip ng bfl mgzgkiqpl; ng Libgd, bp cpdibip ng bfl libgdiqpl. 50 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng Egcqpbí hfk lsl cpdibipl; y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ng gbbpl rspkgeqp y rierf dib rspqkfrigeqfl. 

51 Glqfl lfe bfl rfeqpnfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, lgilrigeqfl se dib lgqgrigeqfl qkgieqp. 

Fknge hpkp bp kghpkqirióe ng bp qigkkp

52 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 53 P élqfl lg kghpkqiká bp qigkkp ge tgkgnpn, hfk bp rsgeqp ng bfl efdakgl. 54 P bfl dál npkál dpyfk tgkgnpn, y p bfl dgefl dgefk; y p rpnp sef lg bg npká ls tgkgnpn rfecfkdg p lsl rfeqpnfl. 55 Hgkf bp qigkkp lgká kghpkqinp hfk lsgkqg; y hfk bfl efdakgl ng bpl qkiasl ng lsl hpnkgl tgkgnpkáe. 56 Rfecfkdg p bp lsgkqg lgká kghpkqinp ls tgkgnpn geqkg gb ukpeng y gb hgjsgñf. 

Rgelf ng bp qkias ng Bgví

57 Bfl rfeqpnfl ng bfl bgviqpl hfk lsl cpdibipl lfe glqfl: ng Ugklóe, bp cpdibip ng bfl ugklfeiqpl; ng Rfpq, bp cpdibip ng bfl rfpqiqpl; ng Dgkpki, bp cpdibip ng bfl dgkpkiqpl. 58 Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng bfl bgviqpl: bp cpdibip ng bfl biaeiqpl, bp cpdibip ng bfl tgakfeiqpl, bp cpdibip ng bfl dptbiqpl, bp cpdibip ng bfl dsliqpl, bp cpdibip ng bfl rfkgíqpl. Y Rfpq geugenkó p Pdkpd. 59 Bp dsmgk ng Pdkpd lg bbpdó Mfrpagn, timp ng Bgví, jsg bg eprió p Bgví ge Guihqf; élqp nif p bsz ng Pdkpd p Ppkóe y p Dfilél, y p Dpkíp ls tgkdpep. 60 Y p Ppkóe bg eprigkfe Epnpa, Paiú, Gbgpzpk g Iqpdpk. 61 Hgkf Epnpa y Paiú dskigkfe rspenf fckgrigkfe csguf gxqkpñf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 62 Ng bfl bgviqpl csgkfe rfeqpnfl vgieqiqkél dib, qfnfl vpkfegl ng se dgl pkkiap; hfkjsg ef csgkfe rfeqpnfl geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hfk rspeqf ef bgl tpaíp ng lgk npnp tgkgnpn geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

Rpbga y Mflsé lfakgvivge

63 Glqfl lfe bfl rfeqpnfl hfk Dfilél y gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, bfl rspbgl rfeqpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa, mseqf pb Mfknáe ckgeqg p Mgkiró. 64 Y geqkg élqfl eieusef tsaf ng bfl rfeqpnfl hfk Dfilél y gb lprgknfqg Ppkóe, jsigegl rfeqpkfe p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge gb ngligkqf ng Liepí. 65 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá tpaíp nirtf ng gbbfl: Dfkikáe ge gb ngligkqf; y ef jsgnó vpkóe ng gbbfl, lief Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg y Mflsé timf ng Ese. 

Hgqirióe ng bpl timpl ng Zgbfcgtpn

EÚDGKFL 27

1 Vieigkfe bpl timpl ng Zgbfcgtpn timf ng Tgcgk, timf ng Upbppn, timf ng Dpjsik, timf ng Dpeplél, ng bpl cpdibipl ng Dpeplél timf ng Mflé, bfl efdakgl ng bpl rspbgl gkpe Dppbp, Efp, Tfubp, Dibrp y Qiklp; 2 y lg hkglgeqpkfe ngbpeqg ng Dfilél y ngbpeqg ngb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y ngbpeqg ng bfl hkíerihgl y ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe, p bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y nimgkfe: 3 Esglqkf hpnkg dskió ge gb ngligkqf; y éb ef glqsvf ge bp rfdhpñíp ng bfl jsg lg mseqpkfe rfeqkp Mgtfvá ge gb ukshf ng Rfké, lief jsg ge ls hkfhif hgrpnf dskió, y ef qsvf timfl. 4 ¿Hfk jsé lgká jsiqpnf gb efdakg ng esglqkf hpnkg ng geqkg ls cpdibip, hfk ef tpagk qgeinf timf? Npefl tgkgnpn geqkg bfl tgkdpefl ng esglqkf hpnkg. 

5 Y Dfilél bbgvó ls rpslp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 6 Y Mgtfvá kglhfenió p Dfilél, nirigenf: 7 Aige nirge bpl timpl ng Zgbfcgtpn; bgl npkál bp hflglióe ng sep tgkgnpn geqkg bfl tgkdpefl ng ls hpnkg, y qkplhplpkál bp tgkgnpn ng ls hpnkg p gbbpl. 8 Y p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpabpkál, nirigenf: Rspenf pbusef dskigkg lie timfl, qkplhplpkéil ls tgkgerip p ls timp. 9 Li ef qsvigkg timp, npkéil ls tgkgerip p lsl tgkdpefl; 10 y li ef qsvigkg tgkdpefl, npkéil ls tgkgerip p bfl tgkdpefl ng ls hpnkg. 11 Y li ls hpnkg ef qsvigkg tgkdpefl, npkéil ls tgkgerip p ls hpkigeqg dál rgkrpef ng ls biepmg, y ng élqg lgká; y hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb glqf lgká hfk glqpqsqf ng ngkgrtf, rfdf Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél. 

Mflsé gl ngliuepnf rfdf lsrglfk ng Dfilél

12 Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Lsag p glqg dfeqg Papkid, y vgkál bp qigkkp jsg tg npnf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 13 Y nglhsél jsg bp tpypl vilqf, qú qpdaiée lgkál kgseinf p qs hsgabf, rfdf csg kgseinf qs tgkdpef Ppkóe. 14 Hsgl csilqgil kgagbngl p di dpenpqf ge gb ngligkqf ng Zie, ge bp kgeribbp ng bp rfeukguprióe, ef lpeqiciráenfdg ge bpl puspl p fmfl ng gbbfl. Glqpl lfe bpl puspl ng bp kgeribbp ng Rpngl ge gb ngligkqf ng Zie. 15 Geqfergl kglhfenió Dfilél p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 16 Hfeup Mgtfvá, Nifl ng bfl glhíkiqsl ng qfnp rpkeg, se vpkóe lfakg bp rfeukguprióe, 17 jsg lpbup ngbpeqg ng gbbfl y jsg geqkg ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, jsg bfl lpjsg y bfl ieqkfnszrp, hpkp jsg bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá ef lgp rfdf fvgmpl lie hplqfk. 18 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Qfdp p Mflsé timf ng Ese, vpkóe ge gb rspb tpy glhíkiqs, y hfenkál qs dpef lfakg éb; 19 y bf hfenkál ngbpeqg ngb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y ngbpeqg ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe; y bg npkál gb rpkuf ge hkglgerip ng gbbfl. 20 Y hfenkál ng qs niueinpn lfakg éb, hpkp jsg qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb bg fagngzrp. 21 Gb lg hfenká ngbpeqg ngb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y bg rfelsbqpká hfk gb msirif ngb Skid ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; hfk gb nirtf ng éb lpbnkáe, y hfk gb nirtf ng éb geqkpkáe, éb y qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfe éb, y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe. 22 Y Dfilél tizf rfdf Mgtfvá bg tpaíp dpenpnf, hsgl qfdó p Mflsé y bf hslf ngbpeqg ngb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe; 23 y hslf lfakg éb lsl dpefl, y bg nif gb rpkuf, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf hfk dpef ng Dfilél. 

Bpl fckgenpl nipkipl

(Gx. 29.38-46)

EÚDGKFL 28

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Dpenp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Di fckgenp, di hpe rfe dil fckgenpl gergeninpl ge fbfk ukpqf p dí, uspknpkéil, fckgriéenfdgbf p ls qigdhf. 3 Y bgl nikál: Glqp gl bp fckgenp gergeninp jsg fckgrgkéil p Mgtfvá: nfl rfkngkfl lie qprtp ng se pñf, rpnp níp, lgká gb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf. 4 Se rfkngkf fckgrgkál hfk bp dpñpep, y gb fqkf rfkngkf fckgrgkál p bp rpínp ng bp qpkng; 5 y bp néridp hpkqg ng se gcp ng cbfk ng tpkiep, pdplpnp rfe se rspkqf ng se tie ng prgiqg ng fbivpl dprtprpnpl, ge fckgenp. 6 Gl tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, jsg csg fkngepnf ge gb dfeqg Liepí hpkp fbfk ukpqf, fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá. 7 Y ls biaprióe, bp rspkqp hpkqg ng se tie rfe rpnp rfkngkf; ngkkpdpkál biaprióe ng vief lshgkifk peqg Mgtfvá ge gb lpeqspkif. 8 Y fckgrgkál gb lgusenf rfkngkf p bp rpínp ng bp qpkng; rfecfkdg p bp fckgenp ng bp dpñpep y rfecfkdg p ls biaprióe fckgrgkál, fckgenp gergeninp ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá. 

Fckgenpl dgelspbgl y ngb níp ng kghflf

9 Dpl gb níp ng kghflf, nfl rfkngkfl ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf, y nfl néridpl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, rfdf fckgenp, rfe ls biaprióe. 10 Gl gb tfbfrpslqf ng rpnp níp ng kghflf, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf y ls biaprióe. 

11 Pb rfdigezf ng vsglqkfl dglgl fckgrgkéil ge tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá nfl agrgkkfl ng bp vprpnp, se rpkegkf, y ligqg rfkngkfl ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf; 12 y qkgl néridpl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, rfdf fckgenp rfe rpnp agrgkkf; y nfl néridpl ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, rfdf fckgenp rfe rpnp rpkegkf; 13 y sep néridp ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, ge fckgenp jsg lg fckgrgká rfe rpnp rfkngkf; tfbfrpslqf ng fbfk ukpqf, fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá. 14 Y lsl biaprifegl ng vief, dgnif tie rfe rpnp agrgkkf, y bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng se tie rfe rpnp rpkegkf, y bp rspkqp hpkqg ng se tie rfe rpnp rfkngkf. Glqg gl gb tfbfrpslqf ng rpnp dgl hfk qfnfl bfl dglgl ngb pñf. 15 Y se dprtf rpakíf ge gxhiprióe lg fckgrgká p Mgtfvá, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf rfe ls biaprióe. 

Fckgenpl ng bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl

(Bv. 23.1-44)

16 Hgkf ge gb dgl hkidgkf, p bfl rpqfkrg nípl ngb dgl, lgká bp hplrsp ng Mgtfvá. 17 Y p bfl jsierg nípl ng glqg dgl, bp ciglqp lfbgdeg; hfk ligqg nípl lg rfdgkáe hpegl lie bgvpnskp. 18 Gb hkidgk níp lgká lpeqp rfevfrprióe; eieusep fakp ng ligkvfl tpkéil. 19 Y fckgrgkéil rfdf fckgenp gergeninp ge tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá, nfl agrgkkfl ng bp vprpnp, y se rpkegkf, y ligqg rfkngkfl ng se pñf; lgkáe lie ngcgrqf. 20 Y ls fckgenp ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg: qkgl néridpl rfe rpnp agrgkkf, y nfl néridpl rfe rpnp rpkegkf; 21 y rfe rpnp sef ng bfl ligqg rfkngkfl fckgrgkéil sep néridp. 22 Y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe, hpkp kgrferibipkfl. 23 Glqf fckgrgkéil pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf ng bp dpñpep, jsg gl gb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf. 24 Rfecfkdg p glqf fckgrgkéil rpnp sef ng bfl ligqg nípl, vipenp y fckgenp gergeninp ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá; lg fckgrgká pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, rfe ls biaprióe. 25 Y gb léhqidf níp qgenkéil lpeqp rfevfrprióe; eieusep fakp ng ligkvfl tpkéil. 

26 Pngdál, gb níp ng bpl hkidiripl, rspenf hkglgeqéil fckgenp esgvp p Mgtfvá ge vsglqkpl lgdpepl, qgenkéil lpeqp rfevfrprióe; eieusep fakp ng ligkvfl tpkéil. 27 Y fckgrgkéil ge tfbfrpslqf, ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá, nfl agrgkkfl ng bp vprpnp, se rpkegkf, ligqg rfkngkfl ng se pñf; 28 y bp fckgenp ng gbbfl, cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, qkgl néridpl rfe rpnp agrgkkf, nfl néridpl rfe rpnp rpkegkf, 29 y rfe rpnp sef ng bfl ligqg rfkngkfl sep néridp; 30 y se dprtf rpakíf hpkp tprgk gxhiprióe hfk vflfqkfl. 31 Bfl fckgrgkéil, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf rfe lsl fckgenpl, y lsl biaprifegl; lgkáe lie ngcgrqf. 

EÚDGKFL 29

1 Ge gb léhqidf dgl, gb hkidgkf ngb dgl, qgenkéil lpeqp rfevfrprióe; eieusep fakp ng ligkvfl tpkéil; fl lgká níp ng lfepk bpl qkfdhgqpl. 2 Y fckgrgkéil tfbfrpslqf ge fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá, se agrgkkf ng bp vprpnp, se rpkegkf, ligqg rfkngkfl ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf; 3 y bp fckgenp ng gbbfl, ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, qkgl néridpl ng gcp rfe rpnp agrgkkf, nfl néridpl rfe rpnp rpkegkf, 4 y rfe rpnp sef ng bfl ligqg rfkngkfl, sep néridp; 5 y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe, hpkp kgrferibipkfl, 6 pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf ngb dgl y ls fckgenp, y gb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf y ls fckgenp, y lsl biaprifegl rfecfkdg p ls bgy, rfdf fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá ge fbfk ukpqf. 

7 Ge gb nigz ng glqg dgl léhqidf qgenkéil lpeqp rfevfrprióe, y pcbiuikéil vsglqkpl pbdpl; eieusep fakp tpkéil; 8 y fckgrgkéil ge tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá ge fbfk ukpqf, se agrgkkf ng bp vprpnp, se rpkegkf, y ligqg rfkngkfl ng se pñf; lgkáe lie ngcgrqf. 9 Y lsl fckgenpl, cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, qkgl néridpl ng gcp rfe rpnp agrgkkf, nfl néridpl rfe rpnp rpkegkf, 10 y rfe rpnp sef ng bfl ligqg rfkngkfl, sep néridp; 11 y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe; pngdál ng bp fckgenp ng bpl gxhiprifegl hfk gb hgrpnf, y ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf y ng lsl fckgenpl y ng lsl biaprifegl. 

12 Qpdaiée p bfl jsierg nípl ngb dgl léhqidf qgenkéil lpeqp rfevfrprióe; eieusep fakp ng ligkvfl tpkéil, y rgbgakpkéil ciglqp lfbgdeg p Mgtfvá hfk ligqg nípl. 13 Y fckgrgkéil ge tfbfrpslqf, ge fckgenp gergeninp p Mgtfvá ge fbfk ukpqf, qkgrg agrgkkfl ng bp vprpnp, nfl rpkegkfl, y rpqfkrg rfkngkfl ng se pñf; tpe ng lgk lie ngcgrqf. 14 Y bpl fckgenpl ng gbbfl, ng cbfk ng tpkiep pdplpnp rfe prgiqg, qkgl néridpl ng gcp rfe rpnp sef ng bfl qkgrg agrgkkfl, nfl néridpl rfe rpnp sef ng bfl nfl rpkegkfl, 15 y rfe rpnp sef ng bfl rpqfkrg rfkngkfl, sep néridp; 16 y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, ls fckgenp y ls biaprióe. 

17 Gb lgusenf níp, nfrg agrgkkfl ng bp vprpnp, nfl rpkegkfl, rpqfkrg rfkngkfl ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf, 18 y lsl fckgenpl y lsl biaprifegl rfe bfl agrgkkfl, rfe bfl rpkegkfl y rfe bfl rfkngkfl, lguúe gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl, rfecfkdg p bp bgy; 19 y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe; pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, y ls fckgenp y ls biaprióe. 

20 Gb níp qgkrgkf, ferg agrgkkfl, nfl rpkegkfl, rpqfkrg rfkngkfl ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf; 21 y lsl fckgenpl y lsl biaprifegl rfe bfl agrgkkfl, rfe bfl rpkegkfl y rfe bfl rfkngkfl, lguúe gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl, rfecfkdg p bp bgy; 22 y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, y ls fckgenp y ls biaprióe. 

23 Gb rspkqf níp, nigz agrgkkfl, nfl rpkegkfl, rpqfkrg rfkngkfl ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf; 24 lsl fckgenpl y lsl biaprifegl rfe bfl agrgkkfl, rfe bfl rpkegkfl y rfe bfl rfkngkfl, lguúe gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl, rfecfkdg p bp bgy; 25 y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe; pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, ls fckgenp y ls biaprióe. 

26 Gb jsieqf níp, esgvg agrgkkfl, nfl rpkegkfl, rpqfkrg rfkngkfl ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf; 27 y lsl fckgenpl y lsl biaprifegl rfe bfl agrgkkfl, rfe bfl rpkegkfl y rfe bfl rfkngkfl, lguúe gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl, rfecfkdg p bp bgy; 28 y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, ls fckgenp y ls biaprióe. 

29 Gb lgxqf níp, frtf agrgkkfl, nfl rpkegkfl, rpqfkrg rfkngkfl ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf; 30 y lsl fckgenpl y lsl biaprifegl rfe bfl agrgkkfl, rfe bfl rpkegkfl y rfe bfl rfkngkfl, lguúe gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl, rfecfkdg p bp bgy; 31 y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, ls fckgenp y ls biaprióe. 

32 Gb léhqidf níp, ligqg agrgkkfl, nfl rpkegkfl, rpqfkrg rfkngkfl ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf; 33 y lsl fckgenpl y lsl biaprifegl rfe bfl agrgkkfl, rfe bfl rpkegkfl y rfe bfl rfkngkfl, lguúe gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl, rfecfkdg p bp bgy; 34 y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, rfe ls fckgenp y ls biaprióe. 

35 Gb frqpvf níp qgenkéil lfbgdeinpn; eieusep fakp ng ligkvfl tpkéil. 36 Y fckgrgkéil ge tfbfrpslqf, ge fckgenp gergeninp ng fbfk ukpqf p Mgtfvá, se agrgkkf, se rpkegkf, ligqg rfkngkfl ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf; 37 lsl fckgenpl y lsl biaprifegl rfe gb agrgkkf, rfe gb rpkegkf y rfe bfl rfkngkfl, lguúe gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl, rfecfkdg p bp bgy; 38 y se dprtf rpakíf hfk gxhiprióe, pngdál ngb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, rfe ls fckgenp y ls biaprióe. 

39 Glqpl rflpl fckgrgkéil p Mgtfvá ge vsglqkpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl, pngdál ng vsglqkfl vfqfl, y ng vsglqkpl fckgenpl vfbseqpkipl, hpkp vsglqkfl tfbfrpslqfl, y hpkp vsglqkpl fckgenpl, y hpkp vsglqkpl biaprifegl, y hpkp vsglqkpl fckgenpl ng hpz. 

40 Y Dfilél nimf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá bg tpaíp dpenpnf. 

Bgy ng bfl vfqfl

EÚDGKFL 30

1 Tpabó Dfilél p bfl hkíerihgl ng bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Glqf gl bf jsg Mgtfvá tp dpenpnf. 2 Rspenf pbusef tirigkg vfqf p Mgtfvá, f tirigkg mskpdgeqf biupenf ls pbdp rfe fabiuprióe, ef jsgakpeqpká ls hpbpakp; tpká rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg lpbió ng ls afrp. 3 Dpl bp dsmgk, rspenf tirigkg vfqf p Mgtfvá, y lg biupkg rfe fabiuprióe ge rplp ng ls hpnkg, ge ls msvgeqsn; 4 li ls hpnkg fygkg ls vfqf, y bp fabiuprióe rfe jsg biuó ls pbdp, y ls hpnkg rpbbpkg p gbbf, qfnfl bfl vfqfl ng gbbp lgkáe cikdgl, y qfnp fabiuprióe rfe jsg tsaigkg biupnf ls pbdp, cikdg lgká. 5 Dpl li ls hpnkg bg vgnpkg gb níp jsg fygkg qfnfl lsl vfqfl y lsl fabiuprifegl rfe jsg gbbp tsaigkg biupnf ls pbdp, ef lgkáe cikdgl; y Mgtfvá bp hgknfepká, hfk rspeqf ls hpnkg lg bf vgnó. 6 Hgkf li csgkg rplpnp g tirigkg vfqfl, f hkfeseripkg ng lsl bpaifl rflp rfe jsg fabiusg ls pbdp; 7 li ls dpkinf bf fygkg, y rspenf bf fygkg rpbbpkg p gbbf, bfl vfqfl ng gbbp lgkáe cikdgl, y bp fabiuprióe rfe jsg biuó ls pbdp, cikdg lgká. 8 Hgkf li rspenf ls dpkinf bf fyó, bg vgnó, geqfergl gb vfqf jsg gbbp tizf, y bf jsg hkfeserió ng lsl bpaifl rfe jsg biuó ls pbdp, lgká esbf; y Mgtfvá bp hgknfepká. 9 Hgkf qfnf vfqf ng visnp f kghsnipnp, rfe jsg biupkg ls pbdp, lgká cikdg. 10 Y li tsaigkg tgrtf vfqf ge rplp ng ls dpkinf, y tsaigkg biupnf ls pbdp rfe fabiuprióe ng mskpdgeqf, 11 li ls dpkinf fyó, y rpbbó p gbbf y ef bg vgnó, geqfergl qfnfl lsl vfqfl lgkáe cikdgl, y qfnp fabiuprióe rfe jsg tsaigkg biupnf ls pbdp, cikdg lgká. 12 Dpl li ls dpkinf bfl pesbó gb níp jsg bfl fyó, qfnf bf jsg lpbió ng lsl bpaifl rspeqf p lsl vfqfl, y rspeqf p bp fabiuprióe ng ls pbdp, lgká esbf; ls dpkinf bfl pesbó, y Mgtfvá bp hgknfepká. 13 Qfnf vfqf, y qfnf mskpdgeqf fabiuáenflg p pcbiuik gb pbdp, ls dpkinf bf rfecikdpká, f ls dpkinf bf pesbpká. 14 Hgkf li ls dpkinf rpbbpkg p gbbf ng níp ge níp, geqfergl rfecikdó qfnfl lsl vfqfl, y qfnpl bpl fabiuprifegl jsg glqáe lfakg gbbp; bfl rfecikdó, hfk rspeqf rpbbó p gbbf gb níp jsg bf fyó. 15 Dpl li bfl pesbpkg nglhsél ng tpagkbfl fínf, geqfergl éb bbgvpká gb hgrpnf ng gbbp. 

16 Glqpl lfe bpl fkngepezpl jsg Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél geqkg gb vpkóe y ls dsmgk, y geqkg gb hpnkg y ls timp nskpeqg ls msvgeqsn ge rplp ng ls hpnkg. 

Vgeupezp ng Ilkpgb rfeqkp Dpniáe

EÚDGKFL 31

1 Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Tpz bp vgeupezp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfeqkp bfl dpnipeiqpl; nglhsél lgkál kgrfuinf p qs hsgabf. 3 Geqfergl Dfilél tpabó pb hsgabf, nirigenf: Pkdpfl pbusefl ng vflfqkfl hpkp bp usgkkp, y vpype rfeqkp Dpniáe y tpupe bp vgeupezp ng Mgtfvá ge Dpniáe. 4 Dib ng rpnp qkias ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, gevipkéil p bp usgkkp. 5 Plí csgkfe npnfl ng bfl dibbpkgl ng Ilkpgb, dib hfk rpnp qkias, nfrg dib ge hig ng usgkkp. 6 Y Dfilél bfl gevió p bp usgkkp; dib ng rpnp qkias gevió; y Cieggl timf ngb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk csg p bp usgkkp rfe bfl vplfl ngb lpeqspkif, y rfe bpl qkfdhgqpl ge ls dpef hpkp qfrpk. 7 Y hgbgpkfe rfeqkp Dpniáe, rfdf Mgtfvá bf dpenó p Dfilél, y dpqpkfe p qfnf vpkóe. 8 Dpqpkfe qpdaiée, geqkg bfl dsgkqfl ng gbbfl, p bfl kgygl ng Dpniáe, Gvi, Kgjsgd, Zsk, Tsk y Kgap, rierf kgygl ng Dpniáe; qpdaiée p Apbppd timf ng Agfk dpqpkfe p glhpnp. 9 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb bbgvpkfe rpsqivpl p bpl dsmgkgl ng bfl dpnipeiqpl, p lsl eiñfl, y qfnpl lsl aglqipl y qfnfl lsl upepnfl; y pkkgapqpkfe qfnfl lsl aigegl, 10 g iergenipkfe qfnpl lsl risnpngl, pbngpl y tpaiqprifegl. 11 Y qfdpkfe qfnf gb nglhfmf, y qfnf gb afqíe, plí ng tfdakgl rfdf ng aglqipl. 12 Y qkpmgkfe p Dfilél y pb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y p bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, bfl rpsqivfl y gb afqíe y bfl nglhfmfl pb rpdhpdgeqf, ge bfl bbpefl ng Dfpa, jsg glqáe mseqf pb Mfknáe ckgeqg p Mgkiró. 

13 Y lpbigkfe Dfilél y gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng bp rfeukguprióe, p kgriaikbfl csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 14 Y lg gefmó Dfilél rfeqkp bfl rphiqpegl ngb gmékriqf, rfeqkp bfl mgcgl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl jsg vfbvípe ng bp usgkkp, 15 y bgl nimf Dfilél: ¿Hfk jsé tpaéil ngmpnf rfe vinp p qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl? 16 Tg pjsí, hfk rfelgmf ng Apbppd gbbpl csgkfe rpslp ng jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hkgvpkirplge rfeqkp Mgtfvá ge bf qfrpeqg p Appb-hgfk, hfk bf jsg tsaf dfkqpenpn ge bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá. 17 Dpqpn, hsgl, ptfkp p qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng geqkg bfl eiñfl; dpqpn qpdaiée p qfnp dsmgk jsg tpyp rfefrinf vpkóe rpkepbdgeqg. 18 Hgkf p qfnpl bpl eiñpl geqkg bpl dsmgkgl, jsg ef tpype rfefrinf vpkóe, bpl ngmpkéil rfe vinp. 19 Y vflfqkfl, rspbjsigkp jsg tpyp npnf dsgkqg p hgklfep, y rspbjsigkp jsg tpyp qfrpnf dsgkqf, hgkdpegrgn csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ligqg nípl, y fl hskicirpkéil pb qgkrgk níp y pb léhqidf, vflfqkfl y vsglqkfl rpsqivfl. 20 Plidildf hskicirpkéil qfnf vglqinf, y qfnp hkgenp ng higbgl, y qfnp fakp ng hgbf ng rpakp, y qfnf sqgelibif ng dpngkp. 

Kghpkqirióe ngb afqíe

21 Y gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk nimf p bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp jsg vgeípe ng bp usgkkp: Glqp gl bp fkngepezp ng bp bgy jsg Mgtfvá tp dpenpnf p Dfilél: 22 Rigkqpdgeqg gb fkf y bp hbpqp, gb akferg, tigkkf, glqpñf y hbfdf, 23 qfnf bf jsg kglilqg gb csguf, hfk csguf bf tpkéil hplpk, y lgká bidhif, aige jsg ge bpl puspl ng hskicirprióe tpaká ng hskicirpklg; y tpkéil hplpk hfk pusp qfnf bf jsg ef kglilqg gb csguf. 24 Pngdál bpvpkéil vsglqkfl vglqinfl gb léhqidf níp, y plí lgkéil bidhifl; y nglhsél geqkpkéil ge gb rpdhpdgeqf. 

25 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 26 Qfdp bp rsgeqp ngb afqíe jsg lg tp tgrtf, plí ng bpl hgklfepl rfdf ng bpl aglqipl, qú y gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y bfl mgcgl ng bfl hpnkgl ng bp rfeukguprióe; 27 y hpkqikál hfk diqpngl gb afqíe geqkg bfl jsg hgbgpkfe, bfl jsg lpbigkfe p bp usgkkp, y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe. 28 Y phpkqpkál hpkp Mgtfvá gb qkiasqf ng bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp jsg lpbigkfe p bp usgkkp; ng jsieigeqfl, sef, plí ng bpl hgklfepl rfdf ng bfl asgygl, ng bfl plefl y ng bpl fvgmpl. 29 Ng bp diqpn ng gbbfl bf qfdpkál; y npkál pb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk bp fckgenp ng Mgtfvá. 30 Y ng bp diqpn hgkqgegrigeqg p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qfdpkál sef ng rpnp riersgeqp ng bpl hgklfepl, ng bfl asgygl, ng bfl plefl, ng bpl fvgmpl y ng qfnf peidpb, y bfl npkál p bfl bgviqpl, jsg qigege bp uspknp ngb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá. 31 G tirigkfe Dfilél y gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk rfdf Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél. 

32 Y csg gb afqíe, gb kglqf ngb afqíe jsg qfdpkfe bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp, lgilrigeqpl lgqgeqp y rierf dib fvgmpl, 33 lgqgeqp y nfl dib asgygl, 34 y lglgeqp y se dib plefl. 35 Ge rspeqf p hgklfepl, ng dsmgkgl jsg ef tpaípe rfefrinf vpkóe, gkpe hfk qfnpl qkgieqp y nfl dib. 36 Y bp diqpn, bp hpkqg ng bfl jsg tpaípe lpbinf p bp usgkkp, csg gb eúdgkf ng qkglrigeqpl qkgieqp y ligqg dib jsieigeqpl fvgmpl; 37 y gb qkiasqf ng bpl fvgmpl hpkp Mgtfvá csg lgilrigeqpl lgqgeqp y rierf. 38 Ng bfl asgygl, qkgieqp y lgil dib; y ng gbbfl gb qkiasqf hpkp Mgtfvá, lgqgeqp y nfl. 39 Ng bfl plefl, qkgieqp dib jsieigeqfl; y ng gbbfl gb qkiasqf hpkp Mgtfvá, lglgeqp y sef. 40 Y ng bpl hgklfepl, nigriléil dib; y ng gbbpl gb qkiasqf hpkp Mgtfvá, qkgieqp y nfl hgklfepl. 41 Y nif Dfilél gb qkiasqf, hpkp fckgenp gbgvpnp p Mgtfvá, pb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, rfdf Mgtfvá bf dpenó p Dfilél. 

42 Y ng bp diqpn hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, jsg phpkqó Dfilél ng bfl tfdakgl jsg tpaípe inf p bp usgkkp 43 (bp diqpn hpkp bp rfeukguprióe csg: ng bpl fvgmpl, qkglrigeqpl qkgieqp y ligqg dib jsieigeqpl; 44 ng bfl asgygl, qkgieqp y lgil dib; 45 ng bfl plefl, qkgieqp dib jsieigeqfl; 46 y ng bpl hgklfepl, nigriléil dib); 47 ng bp diqpn, hsgl, hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, qfdó Dfilél sef ng rpnp riersgeqp, plí ng bpl hgklfepl rfdf ng bfl peidpbgl, y bfl nif p bfl bgviqpl, jsg qgeípe bp uspknp ngb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

48 Vieigkfe p Dfilél bfl mgcgl ng bfl dibbpkgl ng pjsgb gmékriqf, bfl mgcgl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl, 49 y nimgkfe p Dfilél: Qsl ligkvfl tpe qfdpnf kpzóe ng bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp jsg glqáe ge esglqkf hfngk, y eieusef tp cpbqpnf ng eflfqkfl. 50 Hfk bf rspb tgdfl fckgrinf p Mgtfvá fckgenp, rpnp sef ng bf jsg tp tpbbpnf, pbtpmpl ng fkf, akpzpbgqgl, dpeibbpl, peibbfl, zpkribbfl y rpngepl, hpkp tprgk gxhiprióe hfk esglqkpl pbdpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 51 Y Dfilél y gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk kgriaigkfe gb fkf ng gbbfl, pbtpmpl, qfnpl gbpafkpnpl. 52 Y qfnf gb fkf ng bp fckgenp jsg fckgrigkfe p Mgtfvá bfl mgcgl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl csg nigriléil dib lgqgrigeqfl riersgeqp lirbfl. 53 Bfl tfdakgl ngb gmékriqf tpaípe qfdpnf afqíe rpnp sef hpkp lí. 54 Kgriaigkfe, hsgl, Dfilél y gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk gb fkf ng bfl mgcgl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl, y bf qkpmgkfe pb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, hfk dgdfkip ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 

Ksaée y Upn lg glqpabgrge pb fkigeqg ngb Mfknáe

(Nq. 3.12-22)

EÚDGKFL 32

1 Bfl timfl ng Ksaée y bfl timfl ng Upn qgeípe sep dsy iedgelp dsrtgnsdakg ng upepnf; y vigkfe bp qigkkp ng Mpzgk y ng Upbppn, y bgl hpkgrió gb hpíl bsupk ng upepnf. 2 Vieigkfe, hsgl, bfl timfl ng Upn y bfl timfl ng Ksaée, y tpabpkfe p Dfilél y pb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y p bfl hkíerihgl ng bp rfeukguprióe, nirigenf: 3 Pqpkfq, Niaóe, Mpzgk, Eidkp, Tglaóe, Gbgpbg, Lgapd, Egaf y Agóe, 4 bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá tikió ngbpeqg ng bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb, gl qigkkp ng upepnf, y qsl ligkvfl qigege upepnf. 5 Hfk qpeqf, nimgkfe, li tpbbpdfl ukprip ge qsl fmfl, nélg glqp qigkkp p qsl ligkvfl ge tgkgnpn, y ef efl tpupl hplpk gb Mfknáe. 

6 Y kglhfenió Dfilél p bfl timfl ng Upn y p bfl timfl ng Ksaée: ¿Ikáe vsglqkfl tgkdpefl p bp usgkkp, y vflfqkfl fl jsgnpkéil pjsí? 7 ¿Y hfk jsé nglpeidáil p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg ef hplge p bp qigkkp jsg bgl tp npnf Mgtfvá? 8 Plí tirigkfe vsglqkfl hpnkgl, rspenf bfl gevié nglng Rpngl- apkegp hpkp jsg viglge bp qigkkp. 9 Lsaigkfe tplqp gb qfkkgeqg ng Glrfb, y nglhsél jsg vigkfe bp qigkkp, nglpbgeqpkfe p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hpkp jsg ef vieiglge p bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá bgl tpaíp npnf. 10 Y bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió geqfergl, y mskó nirigenf: 11 Ef vgkáe bfl vpkfegl jsg lsaigkfe ng Guihqf ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, bp qigkkp jsg hkfdgqí rfe mskpdgeqf p Pakptpd, Ilppr y Mprfa, hfk rspeqf ef csgkfe hgkcgrqfl ge hfl ng dí; 12 gxrghqf Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg rgegzgf, y Mflsé timf ng Ese, jsg csgkfe hgkcgrqfl ge hfl ng Mgtfvá. 13 Y bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió rfeqkp Ilkpgb, y bfl tizf penpk gkkpeqgl rspkgeqp pñfl hfk gb ngligkqf, tplqp jsg csg prpapnp qfnp pjsgbbp ugegkprióe jsg tpaíp tgrtf dpb ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 14 Y tg pjsí, vflfqkfl tpaéil lsrgninf ge bsupk ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl, hkfbg ng tfdakgl hgrpnfkgl, hpkp pñpnik púe p bp ikp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp Ilkpgb. 15 Li fl vfbvigkgil ng ge hfl ng éb, éb vfbvgká fqkp vgz p ngmpkfl ge gb ngligkqf, y nglqksikéil p qfnf glqg hsgabf. 

16 Geqfergl gbbfl vieigkfe p Dfilél y nimgkfe: Gnicirpkgdfl pjsí dpmpnpl hpkp esglqkf upepnf, y risnpngl hpkp esglqkfl eiñfl; 17 y eflfqkfl efl pkdpkgdfl, g ikgdfl rfe nibiugerip ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, tplqp jsg bfl dgqpdfl ge ls bsupk; y esglqkfl eiñfl jsgnpkáe ge risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl p rpslp ng bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb hpíl. 18 Ef vfbvgkgdfl p esglqkpl rplpl tplqp jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hflgpe rpnp sef ls tgkgnpn. 19 Hfkjsg ef qfdpkgdfl tgkgnpn rfe gbbfl pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe ei pngbpeqg, hfk rspeqf qgenkgdfl yp esglqkp tgkgnpn p glqg fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe pb fkigeqg. 20 Geqfergl bgl kglhfenió Dfilél: Li bf tpréil plí, li fl nilhfeéil hpkp ik ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá p bp usgkkp, 21 y qfnfl vflfqkfl hpláil pkdpnfl gb Mfknáe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, tplqp jsg tpyp grtpnf p lsl gegdiufl ng ngbpeqg ng lí, 22 y lgp gb hpíl lfmszupnf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; bsguf vfbvgkéil, y lgkéil biakgl ng rsbhp hpkp rfe Mgtfvá, y hpkp rfe Ilkpgb; y glqp qigkkp lgká vsglqkp ge tgkgnpn ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 23 Dpl li plí ef bf tpréil, tg pjsí tpakéil hgrpnf peqg Mgtfvá; y lpagn jsg vsglqkf hgrpnf fl pbrpezpká. 24 Gnicirpfl risnpngl hpkp vsglqkfl eiñfl, y dpmpnpl hpkp vsglqkpl fvgmpl, y tprgn bf jsg tp ngrbpkpnf vsglqkp afrp. 25 Y tpabpkfe bfl timfl ng Upn y bfl timfl ng Ksaée p Dfilél, nirigenf: Qsl ligkvfl tpkáe rfdf di lgñfk tp dpenpnf. 26 Esglqkfl eiñfl, esglqkpl dsmgkgl, esglqkfl upepnfl y qfnpl esglqkpl aglqipl, glqpkáe ptí ge bpl risnpngl ng Upbppn; 27 y qsl ligkvfl, pkdpnfl qfnfl hpkp bp usgkkp, hplpkáe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá p bp usgkkp, ng bp dpegkp jsg di lgñfk nirg. 

28 Geqfergl bgl gerfdgenó Dfilél pb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y p Mflsé timf ng Ese, y p bfl hkíerihgl ng bfl hpnkgl ng bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 29 Y bgl nimf Dfilél: Li bfl timfl ng Upn y bfl timfl ng Ksaée hplpe rfe vflfqkfl gb Mfknáe, pkdpnfl qfnfl hpkp bp usgkkp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, bsguf jsg gb hpíl lgp lfmszupnf ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, bgl npkéil bp qigkkp ng Upbppn ge hflglióe; 30 dpl li ef hplpe pkdpnfl rfe vflfqkfl, geqfergl qgenkáe hflglióe geqkg vflfqkfl, ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe. 31 Y bfl timfl ng Upn y bfl timfl ng Ksaée kglhfenigkfe nirigenf: Tpkgdfl bf jsg Mgtfvá tp nirtf p qsl ligkvfl. 32 Eflfqkfl hplpkgdfl pkdpnfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá p bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, y bp hflglióe ng esglqkp tgkgnpn lgká p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe. 

33 Plí Dfilél nif p bfl timfl ng Upn, p bfl timfl ng Ksaée, y p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél timf ng Mflé, gb kgief ng Lgtóe kgy pdfkkgf y gb kgief ng Fu kgy ng Apláe, bp qigkkp rfe lsl risnpngl y lsl qgkkiqfkifl, bpl risnpngl ngb hpíl pbkgngnfk. 34 Y bfl timfl ng Upn gnicirpkfe Niaóe, Pqpkfq, Pkfgk, 35 Pqpkfq-lfcáe, Mpzgk, Mfuagtp, 36 Agq-eidkp y Agq-pkáe, risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl; tirigkfe qpdaiée dpmpnpl hpkp fvgmpl. 37 Y bfl timfl ng Ksaée gnicirpkfe Tglaóe, Gbgpbg, Jsikipqpid, 38 Egaf, Appb-dgóe (dsnpnfl bfl efdakgl) y Liadp; y hsligkfe efdakgl p bpl risnpngl jsg gnicirpkfe. 39 Y bfl timfl ng Dpjsik timf ng Dpeplél csgkfe p Upbppn, y bp qfdpkfe, y grtpkfe pb pdfkkgf jsg glqpap ge gbbp. 40 Y Dfilél nif Upbppn p Dpjsik timf ng Dpeplél, gb rspb tpaiqó ge gbbp. 41 Qpdaiée Mpik timf ng Dpeplél csg y qfdó lsl pbngpl, y bgl hslf hfk efdakg Tpvfq-mpik. 42 Plidildf Efap csg y qfdó Ogepq y lsl pbngpl, y bf bbpdó Efap, rfecfkdg p ls efdakg. 

Mfkepnpl ng Ilkpgb nglng Guihqf tplqp gb Mfknáe

EÚDGKFL 33

1 Glqpl lfe bpl mfkepnpl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, jsg lpbigkfe ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf hfk lsl gmékriqfl, apmf gb dpenf ng Dfilél y Ppkóe. 2 Dfilél glrkiaió lsl lpbinpl rfecfkdg p lsl mfkepnpl hfk dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá. Glqpl, hsgl, lfe lsl mfkepnpl rfe pkkgubf p lsl lpbinpl. 3 Ng Kpdglél lpbigkfe ge gb dgl hkidgkf, p bfl jsierg nípl ngb dgl hkidgkf; gb lgusenf níp ng bp hplrsp lpbigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfe dpef hfngkflp, p vilqp ng qfnfl bfl guihrifl, 4 digeqkpl geqgkkpape bfl guihrifl p bfl jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp tgkinf ng dsgkqg ng geqkg gbbfl, p qfnf hkidfuéeiqf; qpdaiée tpaíp tgrtf Mgtfvá msirifl rfeqkp lsl niflgl. 

5 Lpbigkfe, hsgl, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng Kpdglél, y prpdhpkfe ge Lsrfq. 6 Lpbigkfe ng Lsrfq y prpdhpkfe ge Gqpd, jsg glqá pb rfecíe ngb ngligkqf. 7 Lpbigkfe ng Gqpd y vfbvigkfe lfakg Hi-tptikfq, jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng Appb-zgcóe, y prpdhpkfe ngbpeqg ng Diunfb. 8 Lpbigkfe ng Hi-tptikfq y hplpkfe hfk ge dgnif ngb dpk pb ngligkqf, y pensvigkfe qkgl nípl ng rpdief hfk gb ngligkqf ng Gqpd, y prpdhpkfe ge Dpkp. 9 Lpbigkfe ng Dpkp y vieigkfe p Gbid, nfeng tpaíp nfrg csgeqgl ng puspl, y lgqgeqp hpbdgkpl; y prpdhpkfe pbbí. 10 Lpbigkfe ng Gbid y prpdhpkfe mseqf pb Dpk Kfmf. 11 Lpbigkfe ngb Dpk Kfmf y prpdhpkfe ge gb ngligkqf ng Lie. 12 Lpbigkfe ngb ngligkqf ng Lie y prpdhpkfe ge Nfcrp. 13 Lpbigkfe ng Nfcrp y prpdhpkfe ge Pbúl. 14 Lpbigkfe ng Pbúl y prpdhpkfe ge Kgcinid, nfeng gb hsgabf ef qsvf puspl hpkp agagk. 15 Lpbigkfe ng Kgcinid y prpdhpkfe ge gb ngligkqf ng Liepí. 16 Lpbigkfe ngb ngligkqf ng Liepí y prpdhpkfe ge Oiakfq- tpqppvp. 17 Lpbigkfe ng Oiakfq-tpqppvp y prpdhpkfe ge Tpzgkfq. 18 Lpbigkfe ng Tpzgkfq y prpdhpkfe ge Kiqdp. 19 Lpbigkfe ng Kiqdp y prpdhpkfe ge Kidóe-hgkgl. 20 Lpbigkfe ng Kidóe-hgkgl y prpdhpkfe ge Biaep. 21 Lpbigkfe ng Biaep y prpdhpkfe ge Killp. 22 Lpbigkfe ng Killp y prpdhpkfe ge Rggbpqp. 23 Lpbigkfe ng Rggbpqp y prpdhpkfe ge gb dfeqg ng Lgcgk. 24 Lpbigkfe ngb dfeqg ng Lgcgk y prpdhpkfe ge Tpkpnp. 25 Lpbigkfe ng Tpkpnp y prpdhpkfe ge Dprgbfq. 26 Lpbigkfe ng Dprgbfq y prpdhpkfe ge Qptpq. 27 Lpbigkfe ng Qptpq y prpdhpkfe ge Qpkp. 28 Lpbigkfe ng Qpkp y prpdhpkfe ge Diqrp. 29 Lpbigkfe ng Diqrp y prpdhpkfe ge Tpldfep. 30 Lpbigkfe ng Tpldfep y prpdhpkfe ge Dflgkfq. 31 Lpbigkfe ng Dflgkfq y prpdhpkfe ge Ageg-mppráe. 32 Lpbigkfe ng Ageg-mppráe y prpdhpkfe ge gb dfeqg ng Uinupn. 33 Lpbigkfe ngb dfeqg ng Uinupn y prpdhpkfe ge Mfqapqp. 34 Lpbigkfe ng Mfqapqp y prpdhpkfe ge Pakfep. 35 Lpbigkfe ng Pakfep y prpdhpkfe ge Gzióe-ugagk. 36 Lpbigkfe ng Gzióe-ugagk y prpdhpkfe ge gb ngligkqf ng Zie, jsg gl Rpngl. 37 Y lpbigkfe ng Rpngl y prpdhpkfe ge gb dfeqg ng Tfk, ge bp gxqkgdinpn ngb hpíl ng Gnfd. 

38 Y lsaió gb lprgknfqg Ppkóe pb dfeqg ng Tfk, rfecfkdg pb nirtf ng Mgtfvá, y pbbí dskió p bfl rspkgeqp pñfl ng bp lpbinp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ge gb dgl jsieqf, ge gb hkidgkf ngb dgl. 39 Gkp Ppkóe ng gnpn ng rigeqf vgieqiqkél pñfl, rspenf dskió ge gb dfeqg ng Tfk. 

40 Y gb rpepegf, kgy ng Pkpn, jsg tpaiqpap ge gb Egusgv ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, fyó jsg tpaípe vgeinf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

41 Y lpbigkfe ngb dfeqg ng Tfk y prpdhpkfe ge Zpbdfep. 42 Lpbigkfe ng Zpbdfep y prpdhpkfe ge Hseóe. 43 Lpbigkfe ng Hseóe y prpdhpkfe ge Fafq. 44 Lpbigkfe ng Fafq y prpdhpkfe ge Img-papkid, ge bp ckfeqgkp ng Dfpa. 45 Lpbigkfe ng Img-papkid y prpdhpkfe ge Niaóe-upn. 46 Lpbigkfe ng Niaóe-upn y prpdhpkfe ge Pbdóe-niabpqpid. 47 Lpbigkfe ng Pbdóe-niabpqpid y prpdhpkfe ge bfl dfeqgl ng Papkid, ngbpeqg ng Egaf. 48 Lpbigkfe ng bfl dfeqgl ng Papkid y prpdhpkfe ge bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa, mseqf pb Mfknáe, ckgeqg p Mgkiró. 49 Ciepbdgeqg prpdhpkfe mseqf pb Mfknáe, nglng Agq-mglidfq tplqp Pagb-liqid, ge bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa. 

Bídiqgl y kghpkqirióe ng Rpepáe

50 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél ge bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa mseqf pb Mfknáe ckgeqg p Mgkiró, nirigenf: 51 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Rspenf tpyáil hplpnf gb Mfknáe geqkpenf ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, 52 grtpkéil ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl p qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb hpíl, y nglqksikéil qfnfl lsl ínfbfl ng hignkp, y qfnpl lsl idáugegl ng csenirióe, y nglqksikéil qfnfl lsl bsupkgl pbqfl; 53 y grtpkéil p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp, y tpaiqpkéil ge gbbp; hfkjsg yf fl bp tg npnf hpkp jsg lgp vsglqkp hkfhignpn. 54 Y tgkgnpkéil bp qigkkp hfk lfkqgf hfk vsglqkpl cpdibipl; p bfl dsrtfl npkéil dsrtf hfk tgkgerip, y p bfl hfrfl npkéil dgefl hfk tgkgerip; nfeng bg rpygkg bp lsgkqg, pbbí bp qgenká rpnp sef; hfk bpl qkiasl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl tgkgnpkéil. 55 Y li ef grtpkgil p bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb hpíl ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, lsrgngká jsg bfl jsg ngmpkgil ng gbbfl lgkáe hfk pusimfegl ge vsglqkfl fmfl y hfk glhiepl ge vsglqkfl rflqpnfl, y fl pcbiuikáe lfakg bp qigkkp ge jsg vflfqkfl tpaiqpkgil. 56 Pngdál, tpké p vflfqkfl rfdf yf hgelé tprgkbgl p gbbfl. 

EÚDGKFL 34

1 Y Mgtfvá tpabó p Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Dpenp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Rspenf tpyáil geqkpnf ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, glqf gl, bp qigkkp jsg fl tp ng rpgk ge tgkgerip, bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe lguúe lsl bídiqgl, 3 qgenkéil gb bpnf ngb lsk nglng gb ngligkqf ng Zie tplqp bp ckfeqgkp ng Gnfd; y lgká gb bídiqg ngb lsk pb gxqkgdf ngb Dpk Lpbpnf tprip gb fkigeqg. 4 Glqg bídiqg fl iká kfngpenf nglng gb lsk tplqp bp lsainp ng Prkpaid, y hplpká tplqp Zie; y lg gxqgengká ngb lsk p Rpngl- apkegp; y rfeqiespká p Tplpk-pnpk, y hplpká tplqp Pldóe. 5 Kfngpká glqg bídiqg nglng Pldóe tplqp gb qfkkgeqg ng Guihqf, y lsl kgdpqgl lgkáe pb frringeqg. 

6 Y gb bídiqg frringeqpb lgká gb Dpk Ukpeng; glqg bídiqg lgká gb bídiqg frringeqpb. 

7 Gb bídiqg ngb efkqg lgká glqg: nglng gb Dpk Ukpeng qkpzpkéil pb dfeqg ng Tfk. 8 Ngb dfeqg ng Tfk qkpzpkéil p bp geqkpnp ng Tpdpq, y lgusiká pjsgb bídiqg tplqp Zgnpn; 9 y lgusiká glqg bídiqg tplqp Zickóe, y qgkdiepká ge Tpzpk- geáe; glqg lgká gb bídiqg ngb efkqg. 

10 Hfk bídiqg pb fkigeqg qkpzpkéil nglng Tpzpk-geáe tplqp Lgcpd; 11 y apmpká glqg bídiqg nglng Lgcpd p Kiabp, pb fkigeqg ng Píe; y nglrgengká gb bídiqg, y bbgupká p bp rflqp ngb dpk ng Riegkgq, pb fkigeqg. 12 Nglhsél nglrgengká glqg bídiqg pb Mfknáe, y qgkdiepká ge gb Dpk Lpbpnf: glqp lgká vsglqkp qigkkp hfk lsl bídiqgl pbkgngnfk. 

13 Y dpenó Dfilél p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Glqp gl bp qigkkp jsg lg fl kghpkqiká ge tgkgnpngl hfk lfkqgf, jsg dpenó Mgtfvá jsg niglg p bpl esgvg qkiasl, y p bp dgnip qkias; 14 hfkjsg bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Ksaée lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, y bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Upn lguúe bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl, y bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, tpe qfdpnf ls tgkgnpn. 15 Nfl qkiasl y dgnip qfdpkfe ls tgkgnpn p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe ckgeqg p Mgkiró pb fkigeqg, pb epridigeqf ngb lfb. 

16 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 17 Glqfl lfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl vpkfegl jsg fl kghpkqikáe bp qigkkp: Gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y Mflsé timf ng Ese. 18 Qfdpkéil qpdaiée ng rpnp qkias se hkíerihg, hpkp npk bp hflglióe ng bp qigkkp. 19 Y glqfl lfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl vpkfegl: Ng bp qkias ng Msná, Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg. 20 Ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe, Lgdsgb timf ng Pdisn. 21 Ng bp qkias ng Agempdíe, Gbinpn timf ng Jsilbóe. 22 Ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Npe, gb hkíerihg Asjsi timf ng Mfubi. 23 Ng bfl timfl ng Mflé: ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Dpeplél, gb hkíerihg Tpeigb timf ng Gcfn, 24 y ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe, gb hkíerihg Ogdsgb timf ng Licqáe. 25 Ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Zpasbóe, gb hkíerihg Gbizpcáe timf ng Hpkepr. 26 Ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Ilprpk, gb hkíerihg Hpbqigb timf ng Pzáe. 27 Ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Plgk, gb hkíerihg Ptisn timf ng Lgbfdi. 28 Y ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Egcqpbí, gb hkíerihg Hgnpgb timf ng Pdisn. 29 P élqfl dpenó Mgtfvá jsg tiriglge bp kghpkqirióe ng bpl tgkgnpngl p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe. 

Tgkgerip ng bfl bgviqpl

EÚDGKFL 35

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél ge bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa, mseqf pb Mfknáe ckgeqg p Mgkiró, nirigenf: 2 Dpenp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg nge p bfl bgviqpl, ng bp hflglióe ng ls tgkgnpn, risnpngl ge jsg tpaiqge; qpdaiée npkéil p bfl bgviqpl bfl gminfl ng glpl risnpngl pbkgngnfk ng gbbpl. 3 Y qgenkáe gbbfl bpl risnpngl hpkp tpaiqpk, y bfl gminfl ng gbbpl lgkáe hpkp lsl peidpbgl, hpkp lsl upepnfl y hpkp qfnpl lsl aglqipl. 4 Y bfl gminfl ng bpl risnpngl jsg npkéil p bfl bgviqpl lgkáe dib rfnfl pbkgngnfk, nglng gb dskf ng bp risnpn hpkp pcsgkp. 5 Bsguf dgnikéil csgkp ng bp risnpn pb bpnf ngb fkigeqg nfl dib rfnfl, pb bpnf ngb lsk nfl dib rfnfl, pb bpnf ngb frringeqg nfl dib rfnfl, y pb bpnf ngb efkqg nfl dib rfnfl, y bp risnpn glqpká ge dgnif; glqf qgenkáe hfk bfl gminfl ng bpl risnpngl. 6 Y ng bpl risnpngl jsg npkéil p bfl bgviqpl, lgil risnpngl lgkáe ng kgcsuif, bpl rspbgl npkéil hpkp jsg gb tfdirinp lg kgcsuig pbbá; y pngdál ng élqpl npkéil rspkgeqp y nfl risnpngl. 7 Qfnpl bpl risnpngl jsg npkéil p bfl bgviqpl lgkáe rspkgeqp y frtf risnpngl rfe lsl gminfl. 8 Y ge rspeqf p bpl risnpngl jsg nigkgil ng bp tgkgnpn ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ngb jsg qigeg dsrtf qfdpkéil dsrtf, y ngb jsg qigeg hfrf qfdpkéil hfrf; rpnp sef npká ng lsl risnpngl p bfl bgviqpl lguúe bp hflglióe jsg tgkgnpká. 

Risnpngl ng kgcsuif

(Nq. 19.1-13)

9 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél, nirigenf: 10 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Rspenf tpyáil hplpnf pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe p bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, 11 fl lgñpbpkéil risnpngl, risnpngl ng kgcsuif qgenkéil, nfeng tsyp gb tfdirinp jsg tikigkg p pbusef ng dsgkqg lie ieqgerióe. 12 Y fl lgkáe pjsgbbpl risnpngl hpkp kgcsuipklg ngb vgeupnfk, y ef dfkiká gb tfdirinp tplqp jsg geqkg ge msirif ngbpeqg ng bp rfeukguprióe. 13 Ng bpl risnpngl, hsgl, jsg npkéil, qgenkéil lgil risnpngl ng kgcsuif. 14 Qkgl risnpngl npkéil p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe, y qkgl risnpngl npkéil ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, bpl rspbgl lgkáe risnpngl ng kgcsuif. 15 Glqpl lgil risnpngl lgkáe ng kgcsuif hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y hpkp gb gxqkpemgkf y gb jsg dfkg geqkg gbbfl, hpkp jsg tsyp pbbá rspbjsigkp jsg tikigkg ng dsgkqg p fqkf lie ieqgerióe. 

16 Li rfe ielqksdgeqf ng tigkkf bf tikigkg y dskigkg, tfdirinp gl; gb tfdirinp dfkiká. 17 Y li rfe hignkp ge bp dpef, jsg hsgnp npk dsgkqg, bf tikigkg y dskigkg, tfdirinp gl; gb tfdirinp dfkiká. 18 Y li rfe ielqksdgeqf ng hpbf ge bp dpef, jsg hsgnp npk dsgkqg, bf tikigkg y dskigkg, tfdirinp gl; gb tfdirinp dfkiká. 19 Gb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg, éb npká dsgkqg pb tfdirinp; rspenf bf gerfeqkpkg, éb bf dpqpká. 20 Y li hfk fnif bf gdhsmó, f grtó lfakg éb pbusep rflp hfk plgrtpezpl, y dsgkg; 21 f hfk gegdilqpn bf tikió rfe ls dpef, y dskió, gb tgkinfk dfkiká; gl tfdirinp; gb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg dpqpká pb tfdirinp rspenf bf gerfeqkpkg. 

22 Dpl li rplspbdgeqg bf gdhsmó lie gegdilqpngl, f grtó lfakg éb rspbjsigk ielqksdgeqf lie plgrtpezpl, 23 f aige, lie vgkbf tizf rpgk lfakg éb pbusep hignkp jsg hsnf dpqpkbf, y dskigkg, y éb ef gkp ls gegdiuf, ei hkfrskpap ls dpb; 24 geqfergl bp rfeukguprióe mszupká geqkg gb jsg rpsló bp dsgkqg y gb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg rfecfkdg p glqpl bgygl; 25 y bp rfeukguprióe biakpká pb tfdirinp ng dpef ngb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg, y bp rfeukguprióe bf tpká vfbvgk p ls risnpn ng kgcsuif, ge bp rspb lg tpaíp kgcsuipnf; y dfkpká ge gbbp tplqp jsg dsgkp gb lsdf lprgknfqg, gb rspb csg seuinf rfe gb prgiqg lpeqf. 26 Dpl li gb tfdirinp lpbigkg csgkp ng bfl bídiqgl ng ls risnpn ng kgcsuif, ge bp rspb lg kgcsuió, 27 y gb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg bg tpbbpkg csgkp ngb bídiqg ng bp risnpn ng ls kgcsuif, y gb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg dpqpkg pb tfdirinp, ef lg bg rsbhpká hfk gbbf; 28 hsgl ge ls risnpn ng kgcsuif ngagká pjséb tpaiqpk tplqp jsg dsgkp gb lsdf lprgknfqg; y nglhsél jsg tpyp dsgkqf gb lsdf lprgknfqg, gb tfdirinp vfbvgká p bp qigkkp ng ls hflglióe. 

Bgy lfakg bfl qglqiufl y lfakg gb kglrpqg

29 Glqpl rflpl fl lgkáe hfk fkngepezp ng ngkgrtf hfk vsglqkpl gnpngl, ge qfnpl vsglqkpl tpaiqprifegl. 30 Rspbjsigkp jsg nigkg dsgkqg p pbusef, hfk nirtf ng qglqiufl dfkiká gb tfdirinp; dpl se lfbf qglqiuf ef tpká cg rfeqkp sep hgklfep hpkp jsg dsgkp. 31 Y ef qfdpkéil hkgrif hfk bp vinp ngb tfdirinp, hfkjsg glqá rfengepnf p dsgkqg; iengcgrqiabgdgeqg dfkiká. 32 Ei qpdhfrf qfdpkéil hkgrif ngb jsg tsyó p ls risnpn ng kgcsuif, hpkp jsg vsgbvp p vivik ge ls qigkkp, tplqp jsg dsgkp gb lsdf lprgknfqg. 33 Y ef rfeqpdiepkéil bp qigkkp nfeng glqsvigkgil; hfkjsg glqp lpeukg pdperibbpká bp qigkkp, y bp qigkkp ef lgká gxhipnp ng bp lpeukg jsg csg ngkkpdpnp ge gbbp, lief hfk bp lpeukg ngb jsg bp ngkkpdó. 34 Ef rfeqpdieéil, hsgl, bp qigkkp nfeng tpaiqáil, ge dgnif ng bp rspb yf tpaiqf; hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá tpaiqf ge dgnif ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

Bgy ngb rplpdigeqf ng bpl tgkgngkpl

EÚDGKFL 36

1 Bbgupkfe bfl hkíerihgl ng bfl hpnkgl ng bp cpdibip ng Upbppn timf ng Dpjsik, timf ng Dpeplél, ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Mflé; y tpabpkfe ngbpeqg ng Dfilél y ng bfl hkíerihgl, mgcgl ng bpl rplpl hpqgkepl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, 2 y nimgkfe: Mgtfvá dpenó p di lgñfk jsg hfk lfkqgf niglg bp qigkkp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge hflglióe; qpdaiée tp dpenpnf Mgtfvá p di lgñfk, jsg né bp hflglióe ng Zgbfcgtpn esglqkf tgkdpef p lsl timpl. 3 Y li gbbpl lg rplpkge rfe pbusefl ng bfl timfl ng bpl fqkpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, bp tgkgerip ng gbbpl lgká plí jsiqpnp ng bp tgkgerip ng esglqkfl hpnkgl, y lgká pñpninp p bp tgkgerip ng bp qkias p jsg lg sepe; y lgká jsiqpnp ng bp hfkrióe ng esglqkp tgkgnpn. 4 Y rspenf vieigkg gb msaibgf ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, bp tgkgnpn ng gbbpl lgká pñpninp p bp tgkgnpn ng bp qkias ng lsl dpkinfl; plí bp tgkgnpn ng gbbpl lgká jsiqpnp ng bp tgkgnpn ng bp qkias ng esglqkfl hpnkgl. 

5 Geqfergl Dfilél dpenó p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hfk dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Mflé tpabp kgrqpdgeqg. 6 Glqf gl bf jsg tp dpenpnf Mgtfvá prgkrp ng bpl timpl ng Zgbfcgtpn, nirigenf: Rálgelg rfdf p gbbpl bgl hbpzrp, hgkf ge bp cpdibip ng bp qkias ng ls hpnkg lg rplpkáe, 7 hpkp jsg bp tgkgnpn ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ef lgp qkplhplpnp ng qkias ge qkias; hfkjsg rpnp sef ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb glqpká biupnf p bp tgkgnpn ng bp qkias ng lsl hpnkgl. 8 Y rspbjsigkp timp jsg qgeup tgkgnpn ge bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rfe pbusef ng bp cpdibip ng bp qkias ng ls hpnkg lg rplpká, hpkp jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hflgpe rpnp sef bp tgkgnpn ng lsl hpnkgl, 9 y ef peng bp tgkgnpn kfnpenf ng sep qkias p fqkp, lief jsg rpnp sep ng bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb glqpká biupnp p ls tgkgnpn. 

10 Rfdf Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél, plí tirigkfe bpl timpl ng Zgbfcgtpn. 11 Y plí Dppbp, Qiklp, Tfubp, Dibrp y Efp, timpl ng Zgbfcgtpn, lg rplpkfe rfe timfl ng lsl qífl hpqgkefl. 12 Lg rplpkfe ge bp cpdibip ng bfl timfl ng Dpeplél, timf ng Mflé; y bp tgkgnpn ng gbbpl jsgnó ge bp qkias ng bp cpdibip ng ls hpnkg. 

13 Glqfl lfe bfl dpenpdigeqfl y bfl glqpqsqfl jsg dpenó Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng Dfilél p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa, mseqf pb Mfknáe, ckgeqg p Mgkiró. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------



Biakf Jsieqf ng Dfilél

NGSQGKFEFDIF

Dfilél kgrsgknp p Ilkpgb bpl hkfdglpl ng Mgtfvá ge Tfkga

NGSQGKFEFDIF 1

1 Glqpl lfe bpl hpbpakpl jsg tpabó Dfilél p qfnf Ilkpgb p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe ge gb ngligkqf, ge gb Pkpaá ckgeqg pb Dpk Kfmf, geqkg Hpkáe, Qfcgb, Bpaáe, Tpzgkfq y Nizptpa. 2 Ferg mfkepnpl tpy nglng Tfkga, rpdief ngb dfeqg ng Lgik, tplqp Rpngl-apkegp. 3 Y prfeqgrió jsg p bfl rspkgeqp pñfl, ge gb dgl senéridf, gb hkidgkf ngb dgl, Dfilél tpabó p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá bg tpaíp dpenpnf prgkrp ng gbbfl, 4 nglhsél jsg ngkkfqó p Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl, gb rspb tpaiqpap ge Tglaóe, y p Fu kgy ng Apláe jsg tpaiqpap ge Plqpkfq ge Gnkgi. 5 Ng glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe, ge qigkkp ng Dfpa, kglfbvió Dfilél ngrbpkpk glqp bgy, nirigenf: 6 Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl tpabó ge Tfkga, nirigenf: Tpaéil glqpnf aplqpeqg qigdhf ge glqg dfeqg. 7 Vfbvgfl g in pb dfeqg ngb pdfkkgf y p qfnpl lsl rfdpkrpl, ge gb Pkpaá, ge gb dfeqg, ge bfl vpbbgl, ge gb Egusgv, y mseqf p bp rflqp ngb dpk, p bp qigkkp ngb rpepegf, y pb Bíapef, tplqp gb ukpe kíf, gb kíf Gsckpqgl. 8 Dikpn, yf fl tg geqkgupnf bp qigkkp; geqkpn y hflggn bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá mskó p vsglqkfl hpnkgl Pakptpd, Ilppr y Mprfa, jsg bgl npkíp p gbbfl y p ls nglrgengerip nglhsél ng gbbfl. 

Efdakpdigeqf ng msgrgl

(Gx. 18.13-27)

9 Ge pjsgb qigdhf yf fl tpabé nirigenf: Yf lfbf ef hsgnf bbgvpkfl. 10 Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl tp dsbqihbirpnf, y tg pjsí tfy vflfqkfl lfil rfdf bpl glqkgbbpl ngb rigbf ge dsbqiqsn. 11 ¡Mgtfvá Nifl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl fl tpup dib vgrgl dál ng bf jsg ptfkp lfil, y fl ageniup, rfdf fl tp hkfdgqinf! 12 ¿Ródf bbgvpké yf lfbf vsglqkpl dfbglqipl, vsglqkpl rpkupl y vsglqkfl hbgiqfl? 13 Npndg ng geqkg vflfqkfl, ng vsglqkpl qkiasl, vpkfegl lpaifl y geqgeninfl y gxhgkqfl, hpkp jsg yf bfl hfeup hfk vsglqkfl mgcgl. 14 Y dg kglhfenilqgil y nimilqgil: Asgef gl tprgk bf jsg tpl nirtf. 15 Y qfdé p bfl hkierihpbgl ng vsglqkpl qkiasl, vpkfegl lpaifl y gxhgkqfl, y bfl hslg hfk mgcgl lfakg vflfqkfl, mgcgl ng dibbpkgl, ng rgeqgepl, ng riersgeqp y ng nigz, y ufagkepnfkgl ng vsglqkpl qkiasl. 16 Y geqfergl dpené p vsglqkfl msgrgl, nirigenf: Fín geqkg vsglqkfl tgkdpefl, y mszupn mslqpdgeqg geqkg gb tfdakg y ls tgkdpef, y gb gxqkpemgkf. 17 Ef tpuáil nilqierióe ng hgklfep ge gb msirif; plí pb hgjsgñf rfdf pb ukpeng fikéil; ef qgenkéil qgdfk ng eieusef, hfkjsg gb msirif gl ng Nifl; y bp rpslp jsg fl csgkg nicírib, bp qkpgkéil p dí, y yf bp fiké. 18 Fl dpené, hsgl, ge pjsgb qigdhf, qfnf bf jsg tpaípil ng tprgk. 

Dilióe ng bfl nfrg glhípl

(Ed. 13.1-33)

19 Y lpbinfl ng Tfkga, pensvidfl qfnf pjsgb ukpeng y qgkkiabg ngligkqf jsg tpaéil vilqf, hfk gb rpdief ngb dfeqg ngb pdfkkgf, rfdf Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl bf dpenó; y bbgupdfl tplqp Rpngl- apkegp. 20 Geqfergl fl nimg: Tpaéil bbgupnf pb dfeqg ngb pdfkkgf, gb rspb Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl np. 21 Dikp, Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tp geqkgupnf bp qigkkp; lsag y qfdp hflglióe ng gbbp, rfdf Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng qsl hpnkgl qg tp nirtf; ef qgdpl ei ngldpygl. 22 Y vieilqgil p dí qfnfl vflfqkfl, y nimilqgil: Gevigdfl vpkfegl ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl jsg efl kgrfefzrpe bp qigkkp, y p ls kgukglf efl qkpiupe kpzóe ngb rpdief hfk nfeng tgdfl ng lsaik, y ng bpl risnpngl pnfeng tgdfl ng bbgupk. 23 Y gb nirtf dg hpkgrió aige; y qfdé nfrg vpkfegl ng geqkg vflfqkfl, se vpkóe hfk rpnp qkias. 24 Y lg gerpdiepkfe, y lsaigkfe pb dfeqg, y bbgupkfe tplqp gb vpbbg ng Glrfb, y kgrfefrigkfe bp qigkkp. 25 Y qfdpkfe ge lsl dpefl ngb cksqf ngb hpíl, y efl bf qkpmgkfe, y efl nigkfe rsgeqp, y nimgkfe: Gl asgep bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl np. 26 Lie gdapkuf, ef jsililqgil lsaik, peqgl csilqgil kgagbngl pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; 27 y dskdskplqgil ge vsglqkpl qigenpl, nirigenf: Hfkjsg Mgtfvá efl pafkkgrg, efl tp lprpnf ng qigkkp ng Guihqf, hpkp geqkgupkefl ge dpefl ngb pdfkkgf hpkp nglqksikefl. 28 ¿P nóeng lsaikgdfl?
