Esglqkfl tgkdpefl tpe pqgdfkizpnf esglqkf rfkpzóe, nirigenf: Glqg hsgabf gl dpyfk y dál pbqf jsg eflfqkfl, bpl risnpngl ukpengl y pdskpbbpnpl tplqp gb rigbf; y qpdaiée vidfl pbbí p bfl timfl ng Pepr. 29 Geqfergl fl nimg: Ef qgdáil, ei qgeuáil dignf ng gbbfl. 30 Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, gb rspb vp ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, éb hgbgpká hfk vflfqkfl, rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg tizf hfk vflfqkfl ge Guihqf ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl fmfl. 31 Y ge gb ngligkqf tpl vilqf jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tp qkpínf, rfdf qkpg gb tfdakg p ls timf, hfk qfnf gb rpdief jsg tpaéil penpnf, tplqp bbgupk p glqg bsupk. 32 Y pse rfe glqf ef rkgílqgil p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, 33 jsige iap ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl hfk gb rpdief hpkp kgrfefrgkfl gb bsupk nfeng tpaípil ng prpdhpk, rfe csguf ng efrtg hpkp dflqkpkfl gb rpdief hfk nfeng pensviglgil, y rfe esag ng níp. 

Nifl rplqiup p Ilkpgb

(Ed. 14.20-35)

34 Y fyó Mgtfvá bp vfz ng vsglqkpl hpbpakpl, y lg gefmó, y mskó nirigenf: 35 Ef vgká tfdakg pbusef ng glqfl, ng glqp dpbp ugegkprióe, bp asgep qigkkp jsg mské jsg tpaíp ng npk p vsglqkfl hpnkgl, 36 gxrghqf Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg; éb bp vgká, y p éb bg npké bp qigkkp jsg hiló, y p lsl timfl; hfkjsg tp lgusinf cigbdgeqg p Mgtfvá. 37 Qpdaiée rfeqkp dí lg pikó Mgtfvá hfk vflfqkfl, y dg nimf: Qpdhfrf qú geqkpkál pbbá. 38 Mflsé timf ng Ese, gb rspb qg likvg, éb geqkpká pbbá; peídpbg, hfkjsg éb bp tpká tgkgnpk p Ilkpgb. 39 Y vsglqkfl eiñfl, ng bfl rspbgl nimilqgil jsg lgkvikípe ng afqíe, y vsglqkfl timfl jsg ef lpage tfy bf asgef ei bf dpbf, gbbfl geqkpkáe pbbá, y p gbbfl bp npké, y gbbfl bp tgkgnpkáe. 40 Hgkf vflfqkfl vfbvgfl g in pb ngligkqf, rpdief ngb Dpk Kfmf. 

Bp ngkkfqp ge Tfkdp

(Ed. 14.39-45)

41 Geqfergl kglhfenilqgil y dg nimilqgil: Tgdfl hgrpnf rfeqkp Mgtfvá; eflfqkfl lsaikgdfl y hgbgpkgdfl, rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl tp dpenpnf. Y fl pkdplqgil rpnp sef rfe lsl pkdpl ng usgkkp, y fl hkghpkplqgil hpkp lsaik pb dfeqg. 42 Y Mgtfvá dg nimf: Nibgl: Ef lsaáil, ei hgbgéil, hsgl ef glqfy geqkg vflfqkfl; hpkp jsg ef lgáil ngkkfqpnfl hfk vsglqkfl gegdiufl. 43 Y fl tpabé, y ef nilqgil fínf; peqgl csilqgil kgagbngl pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá, y hgklilqigenf rfe pbqivgz lsailqgil pb dfeqg. 44 Hgkf lpbió p vsglqkf gersgeqkf gb pdfkkgf, jsg tpaiqpap ge pjsgb dfeqg, y fl hgkliusigkfe rfdf tprge bpl pvilhpl, y fl ngkkfqpkfe ge Lgik, tplqp Tfkdp. 45 Y vfbvilqgil y bbfkplqgil ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, hgkf Mgtfvá ef glrsrtó vsglqkp vfz, ei fl hkglqó fínf. 46 Y glqsvilqgil ge Rpngl hfk dsrtfl nípl, bfl nípl jsg tpaéil glqpnf pbbí. 

Bfl pñfl ge gb ngligkqf

NGSQGKFEFDIF 2

1 Bsguf vfbvidfl y lpbidfl pb ngligkqf, rpdief ngb Dpk Kfmf, rfdf Mgtfvá dg tpaíp nirtf; y kfngpdfl gb dfeqg ng Lgik hfk dsrtf qigdhf. 2 Y Mgtfvá dg tpabó, nirigenf: 3 Aplqpeqg tpaéil kfngpnf glqg dfeqg; vfbvgfl pb efkqg. 4 Y dpenp pb hsgabf, nirigenf: Hplpenf vflfqkfl hfk gb qgkkiqfkif ng vsglqkfl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Glpú, jsg tpaiqpe ge Lgik, gbbfl qgenkáe dignf ng vflfqkfl; dpl vflfqkfl uspknpfl dsrtf. 5 Ef fl dgqáil rfe gbbfl, hfkjsg ef fl npké ng ls qigkkp ei pse bf jsg rsakg bp hbpeqp ng se hig; hfkjsg yf tg npnf hfk tgkgnpn p Glpú gb dfeqg ng Lgik. 6 Rfdhkpkéil ng gbbfl hfk niegkf bfl pbidgeqfl, y rfdgkéil; y qpdaiée rfdhkpkéil ng gbbfl gb pusp, y agagkéil; 7 hsgl Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tp agengrinf ge qfnp fakp ng qsl dpefl; éb lpag jsg penpl hfk glqg ukpe ngligkqf; glqfl rspkgeqp pñfl Mgtfvá qs Nifl tp glqpnf rfeqiuf, y epnp qg tp cpbqpnf. 8 Y efl pbgmpdfl ngb qgkkiqfkif ng esglqkfl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Glpú, jsg tpaiqpape ge Lgik, hfk gb rpdief ngb Pkpaá nglng Gbpq y Gzióe-ugagk; y vfbvidfl, y qfdpdfl gb rpdief ngb ngligkqf ng Dfpa. 

9 Y Mgtfvá dg nimf: Ef dfbglqgl p Dfpa, ei qg gdhgñgl rfe gbbfl ge usgkkp, hfkjsg ef qg npké hflglióe ng ls qigkkp; hfkjsg yf tg npnf p Pk hfk tgkgnpn p bfl timfl ng Bfq. 10 (Bfl gdiqpl tpaiqpkfe ge gbbp peqgl, hsgabf ukpeng y esdgkflf, y pbqf rfdf bfl timfl ng Pepr. 11 Hfk uiupeqgl gkpe gbbfl qgeinfl qpdaiée, rfdf bfl timfl ng Pepr; y bfl dfpaiqpl bfl bbpdpe gdiqpl. 12 Y ge Lgik tpaiqpkfe peqgl bfl tfkgfl, p bfl rspbgl grtpkfe bfl timfl ng Glpú; y bfl pkkfmpkfe ng ls hkglgerip, y tpaiqpkfe ge bsupk ng gbbfl, rfdf tizf Ilkpgb ge bp qigkkp jsg bgl nif Mgtfvá hfk hflglióe.) 13 Bgvpeqpfl ptfkp, y hplpn gb pkkfyf ng Zgkgn. Y hplpdfl gb pkkfyf ng Zgkgn. 14 Y bfl nípl jsg pensvidfl ng Rpngl-apkegp tplqp rspenf hplpdfl gb pkkfyf ng Zgkgn csgkfe qkgieqp y frtf pñfl; tplqp jsg lg prpaó qfnp bp ugegkprióe ng bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp ng ge dgnif ngb rpdhpdgeqf, rfdf Mgtfvá bgl tpaíp mskpnf. 15 Y qpdaiée bp dpef ng Mgtfvá vief lfakg gbbfl hpkp nglqksikbfl ng ge dgnif ngb rpdhpdgeqf, tplqp prpapkbfl. 

16 Y prfeqgrió jsg nglhsél jsg dskigkfe qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp ng geqkg gb hsgabf, 17 Mgtfvá dg tpabó, nirigenf: 18 Qú hplpkál tfy gb qgkkiqfkif ng Dfpa, p Pk. 19 Y rspenf qg prgkjsgl p bfl timfl ng Pdóe, ef bfl dfbglqgl, ei rfeqigenpl rfe gbbfl; hfkjsg ef qg npké hflglióe ng bp qigkkp ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe, hsgl p bfl timfl ng Bfq bp tg npnf hfk tgkgnpn. 20 (Hfk qigkkp ng uiupeqgl csg qpdaiée gbbp qgeinp; tpaiqpkfe ge gbbp uiupeqgl ge fqkf qigdhf, p bfl rspbgl bfl pdfeiqpl bbpdpape zfdzfdgfl; 21 hsgabf ukpeng y esdgkflf, y pbqf, rfdf bfl timfl ng Pepr; p bfl rspbgl Mgtfvá nglqksyó ngbpeqg ng bfl pdfeiqpl. Glqfl lsrgnigkfe p pjsébbfl, y tpaiqpkfe ge ls bsupk, 22 rfdf tizf Mgtfvá rfe bfl timfl ng Glpú jsg tpaiqpape ge Lgik, ngbpeqg ng bfl rspbgl nglqksyó p bfl tfkgfl; y gbbfl lsrgnigkfe p élqfl, y tpaiqpkfe ge ls bsupk tplqp tfy. 23 Y p bfl pvgfl jsg tpaiqpape ge pbngpl tplqp Upzp, bfl rpcqfkgfl jsg lpbigkfe ng Rpcqfk bfl nglqksygkfe, y tpaiqpkfe ge ls bsupk.) 24 Bgvpeqpfl, lpbin, y hplpn gb pkkfyf ng Pkeóe; tg pjsí tg geqkgupnf ge qs dpef p Lgtóe kgy ng Tglaóe, pdfkkgf, y p ls qigkkp; rfdigezp p qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp, y geqkp ge usgkkp rfe éb. 25 Tfy rfdgezpké p hfegk qs qgdfk y qs glhpeqf lfakg bfl hsgabfl ngapmf ng qfnf gb rigbf, bfl rspbgl fikáe qs cpdp, y qgdabpkáe y lg peuslqipkáe ngbpeqg ng qi. 

Ilkpgb ngkkfqp p Lgtóe

(Ed. 21.21-30)

26 Y gevié dgelpmgkfl nglng gb ngligkqf ng Rpngdfq p Lgtóe kgy ng Tglaóe rfe hpbpakpl ng hpz, nirigenf: 27 Hplpké hfk qs qigkkp hfk gb rpdief; hfk gb rpdief iké, lie phpkqpkdg ei p niglqkp ei p lieiglqkp. 28 Bp rfdinp dg vgengkál hfk niegkf, y rfdgké; gb pusp qpdaiée dg npkál hfk niegkf, y agagké; lfbpdgeqg hplpké p hig, 29 rfdf bf tirigkfe rfediuf bfl timfl ng Glpú jsg tpaiqpape ge Lgik, y bfl dfpaiqpl jsg tpaiqpape ge Pk; tplqp jsg rksrg gb Mfknáe p bp qigkkp jsg efl np Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl. 30 Dpl Lgtóe kgy ng Tglaóe ef jsilf jsg hplálgdfl hfk gb qgkkiqfkif lsyf; hfkjsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl tpaíp genskgrinf ls glhíkiqs, y falqiepnf ls rfkpzóe hpkp geqkgupkbf ge qs dpef, rfdf tplqp tfy. 31 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí yf tg rfdgezpnf p geqkgupk ngbpeqg ng qi p Lgtóe y p ls qigkkp; rfdigezp p qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp hpkp jsg bp tgkgngl. 32 Y efl lpbió Lgtóe pb gersgeqkf, éb y qfnf ls hsgabf, hpkp hgbgpk ge Mptpzp. 33 Dpl Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl bf geqkguó ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl; y bf ngkkfqpdfl p éb y p lsl timfl, y p qfnf ls hsgabf. 34 Qfdpdfl geqfergl qfnpl lsl risnpngl, y nglqksidfl qfnpl bpl risnpngl, tfdakgl, dsmgkgl y eiñfl; ef ngmpdfl eieusef. 35 Lfbpdgeqg qfdpdfl hpkp eflfqkfl bfl upepnfl, y bfl nglhfmfl ng bpl risnpngl jsg tpaípdfl qfdpnf. 36 Nglng Pkfgk, jsg glqá mseqf p bp kiagkp ngb pkkfyf ng Pkeóe, y bp risnpn jsg glqá ge gb vpbbg, tplqp Upbppn, ef tsaf risnpn jsg glrphplg ng eflfqkfl; qfnpl bpl geqkguó Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl ge esglqkf hfngk. 37 Lfbpdgeqg p bp qigkkp ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe ef bbgupdfl; ei p qfnf bf jsg glqá p bp fkibbp ngb pkkfyf ng Mpafr ei p bpl risnpngl ngb dfeqg, ei p bsupk pbusef jsg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl tpaíp hkftiainf. 

Ilkpgb ngkkfqp p Fu kgy ng Apláe

(Ed. 21.31-35)

NGSQGKFEFDIF 3

1 Vfbvidfl, hsgl, y lsaidfl rpdief ng Apláe, y efl lpbió pb gersgeqkf Fu kgy ng Apláe hpkp hgbgpk, éb y qfnf ls hsgabf, ge Gnkgi. 2 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Ef qgeupl qgdfk ng éb, hfkjsg ge qs dpef tg geqkgunf p éb y p qfnf ls hsgabf, rfe ls qigkkp; y tpkál rfe éb rfdf tirilqg rfe Lgtóe kgy pdfkkgf, jsg tpaiqpap ge Tglaóe. 3 Y Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl geqkguó qpdaiée ge esglqkp dpef p Fu kgy ng Apláe, y p qfnf ls hsgabf, pb rspb ngkkfqpdfl tplqp prpapk rfe qfnfl. 4 Y qfdpdfl geqfergl qfnpl lsl risnpngl; ef jsgnó risnpn jsg ef bgl qfdálgdfl; lglgeqp risnpngl, qfnp bp qigkkp ng Pkufa, ngb kgief ng Fu ge Apláe. 5 Qfnpl glqpl gkpe risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl rfe dskfl pbqfl, rfe hsgkqpl y apkkpl, lie rfeqpk fqkpl dsrtpl risnpngl lie dskf. 6 Y bpl nglqksidfl, rfdf tiridfl p Lgtóe kgy ng Tglaóe, dpqpenf ge qfnp risnpn p tfdakgl, dsmgkgl y eiñfl. 7 Y qfdpdfl hpkp eflfqkfl qfnf gb upepnf, y bfl nglhfmfl ng bpl risnpngl. 8 Qpdaiée qfdpdfl ge pjsgb qigdhf bp qigkkp nglng gb pkkfyf ng Pkeóe tplqp gb dfeqg ng Tgkdóe, ng dpefl ng bfl nfl kgygl pdfkkgfl jsg glqpape p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe. 9 (Bfl linfeifl bbpdpe p Tgkdóe, Likióe; y bfl pdfkkgfl, Lgeik.) 10 Qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng bp bbpeskp, y qfnf Upbppn, y qfnf Apláe tplqp Lpbrp y Gnkgi, risnpngl ngb kgief ng Fu ge Apláe. 11 Hfkjsg úeirpdgeqg Fu kgy ng Apláe tpaíp jsgnpnf ngb kglqf ng bfl uiupeqgl. Ls rpdp, sep rpdp ng tigkkf, ¿ef glqá ge Kpaá ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe? Bp bfeuiqsn ng gbbp gl ng esgvg rfnfl, y ls pertskp ng rspqkf rfnfl, lguúe gb rfnf ng se tfdakg. 

Ksaée, Upn y bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél lg glqpabgrge pb fkigeqg ngb Mfknáe

(Ed. 32.1-42)

12 Y glqp qigkkp jsg tgkgnpdfl ge pjsgb qigdhf, nglng Pkfgk, jsg glqá mseqf pb pkkfyf ng Pkeóe, y bp diqpn ngb dfeqg ng Upbppn rfe lsl risnpngl, bp ni p bfl ksageiqpl y p bfl upniqpl; 13 y gb kglqf ng Upbppn, y qfnf Apláe, ngb kgief ng Fu, qfnp bp qigkkp ng Pkufa, jsg lg bbpdpap bp qigkkp ng bfl uiupeqgl, bf ni p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél. 14 Mpik timf ng Dpeplél qfdó qfnp bp qigkkp ng Pkufa tplqp gb bídiqg rfe Uglsk y Dpprp, y bp bbpdó hfk ls efdakg, Apláe- tpvfq-mpik, tplqp tfy. 15 Y Upbppn lg bf ni p Dpjsik. 16 Y p bfl ksageiqpl y upniqpl bgl ni ng Upbppn tplqp gb pkkfyf ng Pkeóe, qgeigenf hfk bídiqg gb dgnif ngb vpbbg, tplqp gb pkkfyf ng Mpafr, gb rspb gl bídiqg ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe; 17 qpdaiée gb Pkpaá, rfe gb Mfknáe rfdf bídiqg nglng Riegkgq tplqp gb dpk ngb Pkpaá, gb Dpk Lpbpnf, pb hig ng bpl bpngkpl ngb Hilup pb fkigeqg. 

18 Y fl dpené geqfergl, nirigenf: Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl tp npnf glqp qigkkp hfk tgkgnpn; hgkf ikéil pkdpnfl qfnfl bfl vpbigeqgl ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 19 Lfbpdgeqg vsglqkpl dsmgkgl, vsglqkfl timfl y vsglqkfl upepnfl (yf lé jsg qgeéil dsrtf upepnf), jsgnpkáe ge bpl risnpngl jsg fl tg npnf, 20 tplqp jsg Mgtfvá né kghflf p vsglqkfl tgkdpefl, plí rfdf p vflfqkfl, y tgkgnge gbbfl qpdaiée bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl bgl np pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe; geqfergl fl vfbvgkéil rpnp sef p bp tgkgnpn jsg yf fl tg npnf. 21 Fkngeé qpdaiée p Mflsé ge pjsgb qigdhf, nirigenf: Qsl fmfl vigkfe qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl tp tgrtf p pjsgbbfl nfl kgygl; plí tpká Mgtfvá p qfnfl bfl kgiefl p bfl rspbgl hplpkál qú. 22 Ef bfl qgdáil; hfkjsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, éb gl gb jsg hgbgp hfk vflfqkfl. 

Ef lg bg hgkdiqg p Dfilél geqkpk p Rpepáe

23 Y fké p Mgtfvá ge pjsgb qigdhf, nirigenf: 24 Lgñfk Mgtfvá, qú tpl rfdgezpnf p dflqkpk p qs ligkvf qs ukpengzp, y qs dpef hfngkflp; hfkjsg ¿jsé nifl tpy ge gb rigbf ei ge bp qigkkp jsg tpup fakpl y hkfgzpl rfdf bpl qsypl? 25 Hplg yf, qg ksguf, y vgp pjsgbbp qigkkp asgep jsg glqá dál pbbá ngb Mfknáe, pjsgb asge dfeqg, y gb Bíapef. 26 Hgkf Mgtfvá lg tpaíp gefmpnf rfeqkp dí p rpslp ng vflfqkfl, hfk bf rspb ef dg glrsrtó; y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Aplqp, ef dg tpabgl dál ng glqg plseqf. 27 Lsag p bp rsdakg ngb Hilup y pbzp qsl fmfl pb fglqg, y pb efkqg, y pb lsk, y pb glqg, y dikp rfe qsl hkfhifl fmfl; hfkjsg ef hplpkál gb Mfknáe. 28 Y dpenp p Mflsé, y peídpbf, y cfkqpbérgbf; hfkjsg éb tp ng hplpk ngbpeqg ng glqg hsgabf, y éb bgl tpká tgkgnpk bp qigkkp jsg vgkál. 29 Y hpkpdfl ge gb vpbbg ngbpeqg ng Agq-hgfk. 

Dfilél gxtfkqp p bp fagnigerip

NGSQGKFEFDIF 4

1 Ptfkp, hsgl, ft Ilkpgb, fyg bfl glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl jsg yf fl gelgñf, hpkp jsg bfl gmgrsqéil, y viváil, y geqkéil y hflgáil bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl fl np. 2 Ef pñpnikéil p bp hpbpakp jsg yf fl dpenf, ei nildiesikéil ng gbbp, hpkp jsg uspknéil bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl jsg yf fl fkngeg. 3 Vsglqkfl fmfl vigkfe bf jsg tizf Mgtfvá rfe dfqivf ng Appb- hgfk; jsg p qfnf tfdakg jsg csg ge hfl ng Appb-hgfk nglqksyó Mgtfvá qs Nifl ng ge dgnif ng qi. 4 Dpl vflfqkfl jsg lgusilqgil p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, qfnfl glqáil vivfl tfy. 5 Dikpn, yf fl tg gelgñpnf glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl, rfdf Mgtfvá di Nifl dg dpenó, hpkp jsg tpuáil plí ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp ge bp rspb geqkáil hpkp qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp. 6 Uspknpnbfl, hsgl, y hfegnbfl hfk fakp; hfkjsg glqp gl vsglqkp lpainskíp y vsglqkp ieqgbiugerip peqg bfl fmfl ng bfl hsgabfl, bfl rspbgl fikáe qfnfl glqfl glqpqsqfl, y nikáe: Rigkqpdgeqg hsgabf lpaif y geqgeninf, eprióe ukpeng gl glqp. 7 Hfkjsg ¿jsé eprióe ukpeng tpy jsg qgeup niflgl qpe rgkrpefl p gbbfl rfdf bf glqá Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl ge qfnf rspeqf bg hgnidfl? 8 Y ¿jsé eprióe ukpeng tpy jsg qgeup glqpqsqfl y msirifl mslqfl rfdf gl qfnp glqp bgy jsg yf hfeuf tfy ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl? 

Bp gxhgkigerip ng Ilkpgb ge Tfkga

9 Hfk qpeqf, usáknpqg, y uspknp qs pbdp rfe nibiugerip, hpkp jsg ef qg fbvingl ng bpl rflpl jsg qsl fmfl tpe vilqf, ei lg phpkqge ng qs rfkpzóe qfnfl bfl nípl ng qs vinp; peqgl aige, bpl gelgñpkál p qsl timfl, y p bfl timfl ng qsl timfl. 10 Gb níp jsg glqsvilqg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge Tfkga, rspenf Mgtfvá dg nimf: Kgúegdg gb hsgabf, hpkp jsg yf bgl tpup fík dil hpbpakpl, bpl rspbgl phkgengkáe, hpkp qgdgkdg qfnfl bfl nípl jsg vivigkge lfakg bp qigkkp, y bpl gelgñpkáe p lsl timfl; 11 y fl prgkrplqgil y fl hslilqgil pb hig ngb dfeqg; y gb dfeqg pkníp ge csguf tplqp ge dgnif ng bfl rigbfl rfe qieigabpl, esag y flrskinpn; 12 y tpabó Mgtfvá rfe vflfqkfl ng ge dgnif ngb csguf; fílqgil bp vfz ng lsl hpbpakpl, dpl p gxrghrióe ng fík bp vfz, eieusep ciuskp vilqgil. 13 Y éb fl peserió ls hprqf, gb rspb fl dpenó hfegk hfk fakp; bfl nigz dpenpdigeqfl, y bfl glrkiaió ge nfl qpabpl ng hignkp. 14 P dí qpdaiée dg dpenó Mgtfvá ge pjsgb qigdhf jsg fl gelgñplg bfl glqpqsqfl y msirifl, hpkp jsg bfl hsliglgil hfk fakp ge bp qigkkp p bp rspb hpláil p qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp. 

Pnvgkqgerip rfeqkp bp infbpqkíp

15 Uspknpn, hsgl, dsrtf vsglqkpl pbdpl; hsgl eieusep ciuskp vilqgil gb níp jsg Mgtfvá tpabó rfe vflfqkfl ng ge dgnif ngb csguf; 16 hpkp jsg ef fl rfkkfdháil y tpuáil hpkp vflfqkfl glrsbqskp, idpuge ng ciuskp pbusep, gciuig ng vpkóe f tgdakp, 17 ciuskp ng peidpb pbusef jsg glqá ge bp qigkkp, ciuskp ng pvg pbusep pbpnp jsg vsgbg hfk gb pikg, 18 ciuskp ng eieuúe peidpb jsg lg pkkplqkg lfakg bp qigkkp, ciuskp ng hgz pbusef jsg tpyp ge gb pusp ngapmf ng bp qigkkp. 19 Ef lgp jsg pbrgl qsl fmfl pb rigbf, y vigenf gb lfb y bp bsep y bpl glqkgbbpl, y qfnf gb gmékriqf ngb rigbf, lgpl idhsblpnf, y qg ierbiegl p gbbfl y bgl likvpl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl bfl tp rfergninf p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ngapmf ng qfnfl bfl rigbfl. 20 Hgkf p vflfqkfl Mgtfvá fl qfdó, y fl tp lprpnf ngb tfkef ng tigkkf, ng Guihqf, hpkp jsg lgáil gb hsgabf ng ls tgkgnpn rfdf ge glqg níp. 21 Y Mgtfvá lg gefmó rfeqkp dí hfk rpslp ng vflfqkfl, y mskó jsg yf ef hplpkíp gb Mfknáe, ei geqkpkíp ge bp asgep qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hfk tgkgnpn. 22 Plí jsg yf vfy p dfkik ge glqp qigkkp, y ef hplpké gb Mfknáe; dpl vflfqkfl hplpkéil, y hflggkéil pjsgbbp asgep qigkkp. 23 Uspknpfl, ef fl fbvinéil ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, jsg éb glqpabgrió rfe vflfqkfl, y ef fl tpuáil glrsbqskp f idpuge ng eieusep rflp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tp hkftiainf. 24 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl gl csguf rfelsdinfk, Nifl rgbflf. 

25 Rspenf tpyáil geugenkpnf timfl y eigqfl, y tpyáil gevgmgrinf ge bp qigkkp, li fl rfkkfdhigkgil g tirigkgil glrsbqskp f idpuge ng rspbjsigk rflp, g tirigkgil bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, hpkp gefmpkbf; 26 yf hfeuf tfy hfk qglqiufl pb rigbf y p bp qigkkp, jsg hkfeqf hgkgrgkéil qfqpbdgeqg ng bp qigkkp tprip bp rspb hpláil gb Mfknáe hpkp qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp; ef glqpkéil ge gbbp bpkufl nípl lie jsg lgáil nglqksinfl. 27 Y Mgtfvá fl glhpkriká geqkg bfl hsgabfl, y jsgnpkéil hfrfl ge eúdgkf geqkg bpl eprifegl p bpl rspbgl fl bbgvpká Mgtfvá. 28 Y lgkvikéil pbbí p niflgl tgrtfl ng dpefl ng tfdakgl, ng dpngkp y hignkp, jsg ef vge, ei fyge, ei rfdge, ei tsgbge. 29 Dpl li nglng pbbí aslrpkgl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, bf tpbbpkál, li bf aslrpkgl ng qfnf qs rfkpzóe y ng qfnp qs pbdp. 30 Rspenf glqsvigkgl ge peuslqip, y qg pbrpezpkge qfnpl glqpl rflpl, li ge bfl hflqkgkfl nípl qg vfbvigkgl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y fygkgl ls vfz; 31 hfkjsg Nifl dilgkirfkniflf gl Mgtfvá qs Nifl; ef qg ngmpká, ei qg nglqksiká, ei lg fbvinpká ngb hprqf jsg bgl mskó p qsl hpnkgl. 

32 Hfkjsg hkguseqp ptfkp li ge bfl qigdhfl hplpnfl jsg tpe linf peqgl ng qi, nglng gb níp jsg rkgó Nifl pb tfdakg lfakg bp qigkkp, li nglng se gxqkgdf ngb rigbf pb fqkf lg tp tgrtf rflp lgdgmpeqg p glqp ukpe rflp, f lg tpyp fínf fqkp rfdf gbbp. 33 ¿Tp fínf hsgabf pbusef bp vfz ng Nifl, tpabpenf ng ge dgnif ngb csguf, rfdf qú bp tpl fínf, lie hgkgrgk? 34 ¿F tp ieqgeqpnf Nifl vgeik p qfdpk hpkp lí sep eprióe ng ge dgnif ng fqkp eprióe, rfe hksgapl, rfe lgñpbgl, rfe dibpukfl y rfe usgkkp, y dpef hfngkflp y akpzf gxqgeninf, y tgrtfl pqgkkpnfkgl rfdf qfnf bf jsg tizf rfe vflfqkfl Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl ge Guihqf peqg qsl fmfl? 35 P qi qg csg dflqkpnf, hpkp jsg lshiglgl jsg Mgtfvá gl Nifl, y ef tpy fqkf csgkp ng éb. 36 Nglng bfl rigbfl qg tizf fík ls vfz, hpkp gelgñpkqg; y lfakg bp qigkkp qg dflqkó ls ukpe csguf, y tpl fínf lsl hpbpakpl ng ge dgnif ngb csguf. 37 Y hfk rspeqf éb pdó p qsl hpnkgl, glrfuió p ls nglrgengerip nglhsél ng gbbfl, y qg lpró ng Guihqf rfe ls hkglgerip y rfe ls ukpe hfngk, 38 hpkp grtpk ng ngbpeqg ng qs hkglgerip eprifegl ukpengl y dál csgkqgl jsg qú, y hpkp ieqkfnsrikqg y npkqg ls qigkkp hfk tgkgnpn, rfdf tfy. 39 Phkgeng hsgl, tfy, y kgcbgxifep ge qs rfkpzóe jsg Mgtfvá gl Nifl pkkiap ge gb rigbf y papmf ge bp qigkkp, y ef tpy fqkf. 40 Y uspknp lsl glqpqsqfl y lsl dpenpdigeqfl, bfl rspbgl yf qg dpenf tfy, hpkp jsg qg vpyp aige p qi y p qsl timfl nglhsél ng qi, y hkfbfeusgl qsl nípl lfakg bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hpkp ligdhkg. 

Bpl risnpngl ng kgcsuif pb fkigeqg ngb Mfknáe

41 Geqfergl phpkqó Dfilél qkgl risnpngl p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe pb epridigeqf ngb lfb, 42 hpkp jsg tsyglg pbbí gb tfdirinp jsg dpqplg p ls hkómidf lie ieqgerióe, lie tpagk qgeinf gegdilqpn rfe éb eserp peqgl; y jsg tsygenf p sep ng glqpl risnpngl lpbvplg ls vinp: 43 Aglgk ge gb ngligkqf, ge qigkkp ng bp bbpeskp, hpkp bfl ksageiqpl; Kpdfq ge Upbppn hpkp bfl upniqpl, y Ufbáe ge Apláe hpkp bfl ng Dpeplél. 

Dfilél kgrphiqsbp bp hkfdsbuprióe ng bp bgy

44 Glqp, hsgl, gl bp bgy jsg Dfilél hslf ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 45 Glqfl lfe bfl qglqidfeifl, bfl glqpqsqfl y bfl ngrkgqfl jsg tpabó Dfilél p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rspenf lpbigkfe ng Guihqf; 46 p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe, ge gb vpbbg ngbpeqg ng Agq-hgfk, ge bp qigkkp ng Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl jsg tpaiqpap ge Tglaóe, pb rspb ngkkfqó Dfilél rfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rspenf lpbigkfe ng Guihqf; 47 y hflgygkfe ls qigkkp, y bp qigkkp ng Fu kgy ng Apláe; nfl kgygl ng bfl pdfkkgfl jsg glqpape ng glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe, pb fkigeqg. 48 Nglng Pkfgk, jsg glqá mseqf p bp kiagkp ngb pkkfyf ng Pkeóe, tplqp gb dfeqg ng Life, jsg gl Tgkdóe; 49 y qfnf gb Pkpaá ng glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe, pb fkigeqg, tplqp gb dpk ngb Pkpaá, pb hig ng bpl bpngkpl ngb Hilup. 

Bfl Nigz Dpenpdigeqfl

(Gx. 20.1-17)

NGSQGKFEFDIF 5

1 Bbpdó Dfilél p qfnf Ilkpgb y bgl nimf: Fyg, Ilkpgb, bfl glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl jsg yf hkfeserif tfy ge vsglqkfl fínfl; phkgengnbfl, y uspknpnbfl, hpkp hfegkbfl hfk fakp. 2 Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl tizf hprqf rfe eflfqkfl ge Tfkga. 3 Ef rfe esglqkfl hpnkgl tizf Mgtfvá glqg hprqf, lief rfe eflfqkfl qfnfl bfl jsg glqpdfl pjsí tfy vivfl. 4 Rpkp p rpkp tpabó Mgtfvá rfe vflfqkfl ge gb dfeqg ng ge dgnif ngb csguf. 5 Yf glqpap geqfergl geqkg Mgtfvá y vflfqkfl, hpkp ngrbpkpkfl bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá; hfkjsg vflfqkfl qsvilqgil qgdfk ngb csguf, y ef lsailqgil pb dfeqg. Nimf: 

6 Yf lfy Mgtfvá qs Nifl, jsg qg lpjsé ng qigkkp ng Guihqf, ng rplp ng lgkvinsdakg. 

7 Ef qgenkál niflgl pmgefl ngbpeqg ng dí. 

8 Ef tpkál hpkp qi glrsbqskp, ei idpuge pbusep ng rflp jsg glqá pkkiap ge bfl rigbfl, ei papmf ge bp qigkkp, ei ge bpl puspl ngapmf ng bp qigkkp. 9 Ef qg ierbiepkál p gbbpl ei bpl lgkvikál; hfkjsg yf lfy Mgtfvá qs Nifl, csgkqg, rgbflf, jsg viliqf bp dpbnpn ng bfl hpnkgl lfakg bfl timfl tplqp bp qgkrgkp y rspkqp ugegkprióe ng bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge, 10 y jsg tpuf dilgkirfknip p dibbpkgl, p bfl jsg dg pdpe y uspknpe dil dpenpdigeqfl. 

11 Ef qfdpkál gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge vpef; hfkjsg Mgtfvá ef npká hfk iefrgeqg pb jsg qfdg ls efdakg ge vpef. 

12 Uspknpkál gb níp ng kghflf hpkp lpeqicirpkbf, rfdf Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tp dpenpnf. 13 Lgil nípl qkpapmpkál, y tpkál qfnp qs fakp; 14 dpl gb léhqidf níp gl kghflf p Mgtfvá qs Nifl; eieusep fakp tpkál qú, ei qs timf, ei qs timp, ei qs ligkvf, ei qs ligkvp, ei qs asgy, ei qs plef, ei eieuúe peidpb qsyf, ei gb gxqkpemgkf jsg glqá ngeqkf ng qsl hsgkqpl, hpkp jsg nglrpelg qs ligkvf y qs ligkvp rfdf qú. 15 Prséknpqg jsg csilqg ligkvf ge qigkkp ng Guihqf, y jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg lpró ng pbbá rfe dpef csgkqg y akpzf gxqgeninf; hfk bf rspb Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tp dpenpnf jsg uspkngl gb níp ng kghflf. 

16 Tfekp p qs hpnkg y p qs dpnkg, rfdf Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tp dpenpnf, hpkp jsg lgpe hkfbfeupnfl qsl nípl, y hpkp jsg qg vpyp aige lfakg bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np. 

17 Ef dpqpkál. 

18 Ef rfdgqgkál pnsbqgkif. 

19 Ef tskqpkál. 

20 Ef nikál cpblf qglqidfeif rfeqkp qs hkómidf. 

21 Ef rfniripkál bp dsmgk ng qs hkómidf, ei nglgpkál bp rplp ng qs hkómidf, ei ls qigkkp, ei ls ligkvf, ei ls ligkvp, ei ls asgy, ei ls plef, ei rflp pbusep ng qs hkómidf. 

Gb qgkkfk ngb hsgabf

(Gx. 20.18-26)

22 Glqpl hpbpakpl tpabó Mgtfvá p qfnp vsglqkp rfeukguprióe ge gb dfeqg, ng ge dgnif ngb csguf, ng bp esag y ng bp flrskinpn, p ukpe vfz; y ef pñpnió dál. Y bpl glrkiaió ge nfl qpabpl ng hignkp, bpl rspbgl dg nif p dí. 23 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf vflfqkfl fílqgil bp vfz ng ge dgnif ng bpl qieigabpl, y vilqgil pb dfeqg jsg pkníp ge csguf, vieilqgil p dí, qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng vsglqkpl qkiasl, y vsglqkfl peripefl, 24 y nimilqgil: Tg pjsí Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl tp dflqkpnf ls ubfkip y ls ukpengzp, y tgdfl fínf ls vfz ng ge dgnif ngb csguf; tfy tgdfl vilqf jsg Mgtfvá tpabp pb tfdakg, y élqg púe vivg. 25 Ptfkp, hsgl, ¿hfk jsé vpdfl p dfkik? Hfkjsg glqg ukpe csguf efl rfelsdiká; li fyékgdfl fqkp vgz bp vfz ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, dfkikgdfl. 26 Hfkjsg ¿jsé gl gb tfdakg, hpkp jsg fiup bp vfz ngb Nifl vivigeqg jsg tpabp ng ge dgnif ngb csguf, rfdf eflfqkfl bp fídfl, y púe vivp? 27 Prékrpqg qú, y fyg qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg nimgkg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl; y qú efl nikál qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl qg nimgkg, y eflfqkfl fikgdfl y tpkgdfl. 

28 Y fyó Mgtfvá bp vfz ng vsglqkpl hpbpakpl rspenf dg tpabpapil, y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Tg fínf bp vfz ng bpl hpbpakpl ng glqg hsgabf, jsg gbbfl qg tpe tpabpnf; aige glqá qfnf bf jsg tpe nirtf. 29 ¡Jsiée nigkp jsg qsviglge qpb rfkpzóe, jsg dg qgdiglge y uspknplge qfnfl bfl nípl qfnfl dil dpenpdigeqfl, hpkp jsg p gbbfl y p lsl timfl bgl csglg aige hpkp ligdhkg! 30 Vg y nibgl: Vfbvgfl p vsglqkpl qigenpl. 31 Y qú jsénpqg pjsí rfediuf, y qg niké qfnfl bfl dpenpdigeqfl y glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl jsg bgl gelgñpkál, p cie ng jsg bfl hfeupe ptfkp hfk fakp ge bp qigkkp jsg yf bgl nfy hfk hflglióe. 32 Dikpn, hsgl, jsg tpuáil rfdf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl tp dpenpnf; ef fl phpkqéil p niglqkp ei p lieiglqkp. 33 Penpn ge qfnf gb rpdief jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl tp dpenpnf, hpkp jsg viváil y fl vpyp aige, y qgeuáil bpkufl nípl ge bp qigkkp jsg tpaéil ng hflggk. 

Gb ukpe dpenpdigeqf

NGSQGKFEFDIF 6

1 Glqfl, hsgl, lfe bfl dpenpdigeqfl, glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl dpenó jsg fl gelgñplg, hpkp jsg bfl hfeuáil hfk fakp ge bp qigkkp p bp rspb hpláil vflfqkfl hpkp qfdpkbp; 2 hpkp jsg qgdpl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, uspknpenf qfnfl lsl glqpqsqfl y lsl dpenpdigeqfl jsg yf qg dpenf, qú, qs timf, y gb timf ng qs timf, qfnfl bfl nípl ng qs vinp, hpkp jsg qsl nípl lgpe hkfbfeupnfl. 3 Fyg, hsgl, ft Ilkpgb, y rsinp ng hfegkbfl hfk fakp, hpkp jsg qg vpyp aige ge bp qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb, y fl dsbqihbijséil, rfdf qg tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng qsl hpnkgl. 

4 Fyg, Ilkpgb: Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, Mgtfvá sef gl. 5 Y pdpkál p Mgtfvá qs Nifl ng qfnf qs rfkpzóe, y ng qfnp qs pbdp, y rfe qfnpl qsl csgkzpl. 6 Y glqpl hpbpakpl jsg yf qg dpenf tfy, glqpkáe lfakg qs rfkpzóe; 7 y bpl kghgqikál p qsl timfl, y tpabpkál ng gbbpl glqpenf ge qs rplp, y penpenf hfk gb rpdief, y pb prflqpkqg, y rspenf qg bgvpeqgl. 8 Y bpl pqpkál rfdf sep lgñpb ge qs dpef, y glqpkáe rfdf ckfeqpbgl geqkg qsl fmfl; 9 y bpl glrkiaikál ge bfl hflqgl ng qs rplp, y ge qsl hsgkqpl. 

Gxtfkqprifegl p bp fagnigerip

10 Rspenf Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tpyp ieqkfnsrinf ge bp qigkkp jsg mskó p qsl hpnkgl Pakptpd, Ilppr y Mprfa jsg qg npkíp, ge risnpngl ukpengl y asgepl jsg qú ef gnicirplqg, 11 y rplpl bbgepl ng qfnf aige, jsg qú ef bbgeplqg, y rilqgkepl rpvpnpl jsg qú ef rpvplqg, viñpl y fbivpkgl jsg ef hbpeqplqg, y bsguf jsg rfdpl y qg lprigl, 12 rsínpqg ng ef fbvinpkqg ng Mgtfvá, jsg qg lpró ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ng rplp ng lgkvinsdakg. 13 P Mgtfvá qs Nifl qgdgkál, y p éb lfbf lgkvikál, y hfk ls efdakg mskpkál. 14 Ef penpkéil ge hfl ng niflgl pmgefl, ng bfl niflgl ng bfl hsgabfl jsg glqáe ge vsglqkfl rfeqfkefl; 15 hfkjsg gb Nifl rgbflf, Mgtfvá qs Nifl, ge dgnif ng qi glqá; hpkp jsg ef lg iecbpdg gb cskfk ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl rfeqkp qi, y qg nglqksyp ng lfakg bp qigkkp. 

16 Ef qgeqpkéil p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, rfdf bf qgeqplqgil ge Dplpt. 17 Uspknpn rsinpnflpdgeqg bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y lsl qglqidfeifl y lsl glqpqsqfl jsg qg tp dpenpnf. 18 Y tpz bf kgrqf y asgef peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg qg vpyp aige, y geqkgl y hflgpl bp asgep qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá mskó p qsl hpnkgl; 19 hpkp jsg éb pkkfmg p qsl gegdiufl ng ngbpeqg ng qi, rfdf Mgtfvá tp nirtf. 

20 Dpñpep rspenf qg hkguseqpkg qs timf, nirigenf: ¿Jsé liueicirpe bfl qglqidfeifl y glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl jsg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl fl dpenó? 21 geqfergl nikál p qs timf: Eflfqkfl ékpdfl ligkvfl ng Cpkpóe ge Guihqf, y Mgtfvá efl lpró ng Guihqf rfe dpef hfngkflp. 22 Mgtfvá tizf lgñpbgl y dibpukfl ukpengl y qgkkiabgl ge Guihqf, lfakg Cpkpóe y lfakg qfnp ls rplp, ngbpeqg ng esglqkfl fmfl; 23 y efl lpró ng pbbá, hpkp qkpgkefl y npkefl bp qigkkp jsg mskó p esglqkfl hpnkgl. 24 Y efl dpenó Mgtfvá jsg rsdhbpdfl qfnfl glqfl glqpqsqfl, y jsg qgdpdfl p Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, hpkp jsg efl vpyp aige qfnfl bfl nípl, y hpkp jsg efl rfelgkvg bp vinp, rfdf tplqp tfy. 25 Y qgenkgdfl mslqirip rspenf rsingdfl ng hfegk hfk fakp qfnfl glqfl dpenpdigeqfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, rfdf éb efl tp dpenpnf. 

Pnvgkqgeripl rfeqkp bp infbpqkíp ng Rpepáe

(Gx. 34.11-17)

NGSQGKFEFDIF 7

1 Rspenf Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tpyp ieqkfnsrinf ge bp qigkkp ge bp rspb geqkpkál hpkp qfdpkbp, y tpyp grtpnf ng ngbpeqg ng qi p dsrtpl eprifegl, pb tgqgf, pb ugkuglgf, pb pdfkkgf, pb rpepegf, pb cgkgzgf, pb tgvgf y pb mgaslgf, ligqg eprifegl dpyfkgl y dál hfngkflpl jsg qú, 2 y Mgtfvá qs Nifl bpl tpyp geqkgupnf ngbpeqg ng qi, y bpl tpypl ngkkfqpnf, bpl nglqksikál ngb qfnf; ef tpkál rfe gbbpl pbipezp, ei qgenkál ng gbbpl dilgkirfknip. 3 Y ef gdhpkgeqpkál rfe gbbpl; ef npkál qs timp p ls timf, ei qfdpkál p ls timp hpkp qs timf. 4 Hfkjsg nglvipká p qs timf ng ge hfl ng dí, y lgkvikáe p niflgl pmgefl; y gb cskfk ng Mgtfvá lg gergengká lfakg vflfqkfl, y qg nglqksiká hkfeqf. 5 Dpl plí tpaéil ng tprgk rfe gbbfl: lsl pbqpkgl nglqksikéil, y jsgakpkéil lsl glqpqspl, y nglqksikéil lsl idáugegl ng Plgkp, y jsgdpkéil lsl glrsbqskpl ge gb csguf. 

Se hsgabf lpeqf hpkp Mgtfvá

6 Hfkjsg qú gkgl hsgabf lpeqf hpkp Mgtfvá qs Nifl; Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tp glrfuinf hpkp lgkbg se hsgabf glhgripb, dál jsg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl jsg glqáe lfakg bp qigkkp. 7 Ef hfk lgk vflfqkfl dál jsg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl fl tp jsgkinf Mgtfvá y fl tp glrfuinf, hsgl vflfqkfl gkpil gb dál ieliueicirpeqg ng qfnfl bfl hsgabfl; 8 lief hfk rspeqf Mgtfvá fl pdó, y jsilf uspknpk gb mskpdgeqf jsg mskó p vsglqkfl hpnkgl, fl tp lprpnf Mgtfvá rfe dpef hfngkflp, y fl tp kglrpqpnf ng lgkvinsdakg, ng bp dpef ng Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf. 9 Rfefrg, hsgl, jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl gl Nifl, Nifl cigb, jsg uspknp gb hprqf y bp dilgkirfknip p bfl jsg bg pdpe y uspknpe lsl dpenpdigeqfl, tplqp dib ugegkprifegl; 10 y jsg np gb hpuf ge hgklfep pb jsg bg pafkkgrg, nglqksyéenfbf; y ef lg ngdfkp rfe gb jsg bg fnip, ge hgklfep bg npká gb hpuf. 11 Uspknp, hfk qpeqf, bfl dpenpdigeqfl, glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl jsg yf qg dpenf tfy jsg rsdhbpl. 

Agenirifegl ng bp fagnigerip

(Bv. 26.3-13; Nq. 28.1-14)

12 Y hfk tpagk fínf glqfl ngrkgqfl y tpagkbfl uspknpnf y hsglqf hfk fakp, Mgtfvá qs Nifl uspknpká rfeqiuf gb hprqf y bp dilgkirfknip jsg mskó p qsl hpnkgl. 13 Y qg pdpká, qg agengriká y qg dsbqihbirpká, y agengriká gb cksqf ng qs vigeqkg y gb cksqf ng qs qigkkp, qs ukpef, qs dflqf, qs prgiqg, bp rkíp ng qsl vprpl, y bfl kgapñfl ng qsl fvgmpl, ge bp qigkkp jsg mskó p qsl hpnkgl jsg qg npkíp. 14 Ageniqf lgkál dál jsg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl; ef tpaká ge qi vpkóe ei tgdakp glqékib, ei ge qsl upepnfl. 15 Y jsiqpká Mgtfvá ng qi qfnp gecgkdgnpn; y qfnpl bpl dpbpl hbpupl ng Guihqf, jsg qú rfefrgl, ef bpl hfenká lfakg qi, peqgl bpl hfenká lfakg qfnfl bfl jsg qg pafkkgrigkge. 16 Y rfelsdikál p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl jsg qg np Mgtfvá qs Nifl; ef bfl hgknfepká qs fmf, ei lgkvikál p lsl niflgl, hfkjsg qg lgká qkfhigzf. 

17 Li nimgkgl ge qs rfkpzóe: Glqpl eprifegl lfe dsrtf dál esdgkflpl jsg yf; ¿ródf bpl hfnké gxqgkdiepk? 18 ef qgeupl qgdfk ng gbbpl; prséknpqg aige ng bf jsg tizf Mgtfvá qs Nifl rfe Cpkpóe y rfe qfnf Guihqf; 19 ng bpl ukpengl hksgapl jsg vigkfe qsl fmfl, y ng bpl lgñpbgl y dibpukfl, y ng bp dpef hfngkflp y gb akpzf gxqgeninf rfe jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg lpró; plí tpká Mgtfvá qs Nifl rfe qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng rsyp hkglgerip qú qgdigkgl. 20 Qpdaiée gevipká Mgtfvá qs Nifl pvilhpl lfakg gbbfl, tplqp jsg hgkgzrpe bfl jsg jsgnpkge y bfl jsg lg tsaigkge glrfeninf ng ngbpeqg ng qi. 21 Ef ngldpygl ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl glqá ge dgnif ng qi, Nifl ukpeng y qgdiabg. 22 Y Mgtfvá qs Nifl grtpká p glqpl eprifegl ng ngbpeqg ng qi hfrf p hfrf; ef hfnkál prpapk rfe gbbpl ge lgusinp, hpkp jsg bpl cigkpl ngb rpdhf ef lg psdgeqge rfeqkp qi. 23 Dpl Mgtfvá qs Nifl bpl geqkgupká ngbpeqg ng qi, y éb bpl jsgakpeqpká rfe ukpeng nglqkfzf, tplqp jsg lgpe nglqksinpl. 24 Gb geqkgupká lsl kgygl ge qs dpef, y qú nglqksikál gb efdakg ng gbbfl ng ngapmf ngb rigbf; epnig qg tpká ckgeqg tplqp jsg bfl nglqksypl. 25 Bpl glrsbqskpl ng lsl niflgl jsgdpkál ge gb csguf; ef rfniripkál hbpqp ei fkf ng gbbpl hpkp qfdpkbf hpkp qi, hpkp jsg ef qkfhigrgl ge gbbf, hsgl gl pafdieprióe p Mgtfvá qs Nifl; 26 y ef qkpgkál rflp pafdiepabg p qs rplp, hpkp jsg ef lgpl pepqgdp; ngb qfnf bp pafkkgrgkál y bp pafdiepkál, hfkjsg gl pepqgdp. 

Bp asgep qigkkp jsg tpe ng hflggk

NGSQGKFEFDIF 8

1 Rsinpkéil ng hfegk hfk fakp qfnf dpenpdigeqf jsg yf fl fkngef tfy, hpkp jsg viváil, y lgáil dsbqihbirpnfl, y geqkéil y hflgáil bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá hkfdgqió rfe mskpdgeqf p vsglqkfl hpnkgl. 2 Y qg prfknpkál ng qfnf gb rpdief hfk nfeng qg tp qkpínf Mgtfvá qs Nifl glqfl rspkgeqp pñfl ge gb ngligkqf, hpkp pcbiuikqg, hpkp hkfapkqg, hpkp lpagk bf jsg tpaíp ge qs rfkpzóe, li tpaípl ng uspknpk f ef lsl dpenpdigeqfl. 3 Y qg pcbiuió, y qg tizf qgegk tpdakg, y qg lslqgeqó rfe dpeá, rfdinp jsg ef rfefrípl qú, ei qsl hpnkgl bp tpaípe rfefrinf, hpkp tprgkqg lpagk jsg ef lóbf ng hpe viviká gb tfdakg, dpl ng qfnf bf jsg lpbg ng bp afrp ng Mgtfvá viviká gb tfdakg. 4 Qs vglqinf eserp lg gevgmgrió lfakg qi, ei gb hig lg qg tp tiertpnf ge glqfl rspkgeqp pñfl. 5 Kgrfefrg plidildf ge qs rfkpzóe, jsg rfdf rplqiup gb tfdakg p ls timf, plí Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg rplqiup. 6 Uspknpkál, hsgl, bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, penpenf ge lsl rpdiefl, y qgdiéenfbg. 7 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg ieqkfnsrg ge bp asgep qigkkp, qigkkp ng pkkfyfl, ng puspl, ng csgeqgl y ng dpepeqipbgl, jsg akfqpe ge vgupl y dfeqgl; 8 qigkkp ng qkiuf y rgapnp, ng vingl, tiusgkpl y ukpepnfl; qigkkp ng fbivfl, ng prgiqg y ng digb; 9 qigkkp ge bp rspb ef rfdgkál gb hpe rfe glrplgz, ei qg cpbqpká epnp ge gbbp; qigkkp rsypl hignkpl lfe tigkkf, y ng rsyfl dfeqgl lprpkál rfakg. 10 Y rfdgkál y qg lpripkál, y agengrikál p Mgtfvá qs Nifl hfk bp asgep qigkkp jsg qg tpaká npnf. 

Pdfeglqprióe ng ef fbvinpk p Nifl

11 Rsínpqg ng ef fbvinpkqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, hpkp rsdhbik lsl dpenpdigeqfl, lsl ngrkgqfl y lsl glqpqsqfl jsg yf qg fkngef tfy; 12 ef lsrgnp jsg rfdpl y qg lprigl, y gnicijsgl asgepl rplpl ge jsg tpaiqgl, 13 y qsl vprpl y qsl fvgmpl lg psdgeqge, y bp hbpqp y gb fkf lg qg dsbqihbijsge, y qfnf bf jsg qsvigkgl lg psdgeqg; 14 y lg gefkusbbgzrp qs rfkpzóe, y qg fbvingl ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, jsg qg lpró ng qigkkp ng Guihqf, ng rplp ng lgkvinsdakg; 15 jsg qg tizf rpdiepk hfk se ngligkqf ukpeng y glhpeqflf, bbgef ng lgkhigeqgl pknigeqgl, y ng glrfkhifegl, y ng lgn, nfeng ef tpaíp pusp, y éb qg lpró pusp ng bp kfrp ngb hgngkepb; 16 jsg qg lslqgeqó rfe dpeá ge gb ngligkqf, rfdinp jsg qsl hpnkgl ef tpaípe rfefrinf, pcbiuiéenfqg y hkfaáenfqg, hpkp p bp hflqkg tprgkqg aige; 17 y niupl ge qs rfkpzóe: Di hfngk y bp csgkzp ng di dpef dg tpe qkpínf glqp kijsgzp. 18 Lief prséknpqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, hfkjsg éb qg np gb hfngk hpkp tprgk bpl kijsgzpl, p cie ng rfecikdpk ls hprqf jsg mskó p qsl hpnkgl, rfdf ge glqg níp. 19 Dpl li bbgupkgl p fbvinpkqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl y pensvigkgl ge hfl ng niflgl pmgefl, y bgl likvigkgl y p gbbfl qg ierbiepkgl, yf bf pcikdf tfy rfeqkp vflfqkfl, jsg ng rigkqf hgkgrgkéil. 20 Rfdf bpl eprifegl jsg Mgtfvá nglqksiká ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, plí hgkgrgkéil, hfk rspeqf ef tpakéil pqgeninf p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

Nifl nglqksiká p bpl eprifegl ng Rpepáe

NGSQGKFEFDIF 9

1 Fyg, Ilkpgb: qú vpl tfy p hplpk gb Mfknáe, hpkp geqkpk p nglhflggk p eprifegl dál esdgkflpl y dál hfngkflpl jsg qú, risnpngl ukpengl y pdskpbbpnpl tplqp gb rigbf; 2 se hsgabf ukpeng y pbqf, timfl ng bfl peprgfl, ng bfl rspbgl qigegl qú rfefridigeqf, y tpl fínf ngrik: ¿Jsiée lg lflqgenká ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Pepr? 3 Geqigeng, hsgl, tfy, jsg gl Mgtfvá qs Nifl gb jsg hplp ngbpeqg ng qi rfdf csguf rfelsdinfk, jsg bfl nglqksiká y tsdibbpká ngbpeqg ng qi; y qú bfl grtpkál, y bfl nglqksikál ge lgusinp, rfdf Mgtfvá qg tp nirtf. 

4 Ef higelgl ge qs rfkpzóe rspenf Mgtfvá qs Nifl bfl tpyp grtpnf ng ngbpeqg ng qi, nirigenf: Hfk di mslqirip dg tp qkpínf Mgtfvá p hflggk glqp qigkkp; hsgl hfk bp idhignpn ng glqpl eprifegl Mgtfvá bpl pkkfmp ng ngbpeqg ng qi. 5 Ef hfk qs mslqirip, ei hfk bp kgrqiqsn ng qs rfkpzóe geqkpl p hflggk bp qigkkp ng gbbfl, lief hfk bp idhignpn ng glqpl eprifegl Mgtfvá qs Nifl bpl pkkfmp ng ngbpeqg ng qi, y hpkp rfecikdpk bp hpbpakp jsg Mgtfvá mskó p qsl hpnkgl Pakptpd, Ilppr y Mprfa. 

Bp kgagbióe ng Ilkpgb ge Tfkga

(Gx. 31.1832.35)

6 Hfk qpeqf, lpag jsg ef gl hfk qs mslqirip jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np glqp asgep qigkkp hpkp qfdpkbp; hfkjsg hsgabf nskf ng rgkviz gkgl qú. 7 Prséknpqg, ef fbvingl jsg tpl hkfvfrpnf bp ikp ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge gb ngligkqf; nglng gb níp jsg lpbilqg ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, tplqp jsg geqkplqgil ge glqg bsupk, tpaéil linf kgagbngl p Mgtfvá. 8 Ge Tfkga hkfvfrplqgil p ikp p Mgtfvá, y lg gefmó Mgtfvá rfeqkp vflfqkfl hpkp nglqksikfl. 9 Rspenf yf lsaí pb dfeqg hpkp kgriaik bpl qpabpl ng hignkp, bpl qpabpl ngb hprqf jsg Mgtfvá tizf rfe vflfqkfl, glqsvg geqfergl ge gb dfeqg rspkgeqp nípl y rspkgeqp efrtgl, lie rfdgk hpe ei agagk pusp; 10 y dg nif Mgtfvá bpl nfl qpabpl ng hignkp glrkiqpl rfe gb ngnf ng Nifl; y ge gbbpl glqpap glrkiqf lguúe qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg fl tpabó Mgtfvá ge gb dfeqg, ng ge dgnif ngb csguf, gb níp ng bp plpdabgp. 11 Lsrgnió pb cie ng bfl rspkgeqp nípl y rspkgeqp efrtgl, jsg Mgtfvá dg nif bpl nfl qpabpl ng hignkp, bpl qpabpl ngb hprqf. 12 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Bgváeqpqg, nglrigeng hkfeqf ng pjsí, hfkjsg qs hsgabf jsg lprplqg ng Guihqf lg tp rfkkfdhinf; hkfeqf lg tpe phpkqpnf ngb rpdief jsg yf bgl dpené; lg tpe tgrtf sep idpuge ng csenirióe. 

13 Y dg tpabó Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Tg falgkvpnf p glg hsgabf, y tg pjsí jsg gl hsgabf nskf ng rgkviz. 14 Némpdg jsg bfl nglqksyp, y afkkg ls efdakg ng ngapmf ngb rigbf, y yf qg hfenké lfakg sep eprióe csgkqg y dsrtf dál esdgkflp jsg gbbfl. 15 Y vfbví y nglrgení ngb dfeqg, gb rspb pkníp ge csguf, rfe bpl qpabpl ngb hprqf ge dil nfl dpefl. 16 Y diké, y tg pjsí tpaípil hgrpnf rfeqkp Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; fl tpaípil tgrtf se agrgkkf ng csenirióe, phpkqáenffl hkfeqf ngb rpdief jsg Mgtfvá fl tpaíp dpenpnf. 17 Geqfergl qfdé bpl nfl qpabpl y bpl pkkfmé ng dil nfl dpefl, y bpl jsgaké ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl fmfl. 18 Y dg hflqké ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá rfdf peqgl, rspkgeqp nípl y rspkgeqp efrtgl; ef rfdí hpe ei agaí pusp, p rpslp ng qfnf vsglqkf hgrpnf jsg tpaípil rfdgqinf tprigenf gb dpb peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá hpkp gefmpkbf. 19 Hfkjsg qgdí p rpslp ngb cskfk y ng bp ikp rfe jsg Mgtfvá glqpap gefmpnf rfeqkp vflfqkfl hpkp nglqksikfl. Hgkf Mgtfvá dg glrsrtó pse glqp vgz. 20 Rfeqkp Ppkóe qpdaiée lg gefmó Mgtfvá ge ukpe dpegkp hpkp nglqksikbf; y qpdaiée fké hfk Ppkóe ge pjsgb geqfergl. 21 Y qfdé gb famgqf ng vsglqkf hgrpnf, gb agrgkkf jsg tpaípil tgrtf, y bf jsgdé ge gb csguf, y bf ngldgesré dfbiéenfbf dsy aige, tplqp jsg csg kgnsrinf p hfbvf; y grté gb hfbvf ng éb ge gb pkkfyf jsg nglrgeníp ngb dfeqg. 

22 Qpdaiée ge Qpagkp, ge Dplpt y ge Oiakfq-tpqppvp hkfvfrplqgil p ikp p Mgtfvá. 23 Y rspenf Mgtfvá fl gevió nglng Rpngl-apkegp, nirigenf: Lsain y hflggn bp qigkkp jsg yf fl tg npnf, qpdaiée csilqgil kgagbngl pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y ef bg rkgílqgil, ei fagngrilqgil p ls vfz. 24 Kgagbngl tpaéil linf p Mgtfvá nglng gb níp jsg yf fl rfefzrf. 

25 Dg hflqké, hsgl, ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; rspkgeqp nípl y rspkgeqp efrtgl glqsvg hflqkpnf, hfkjsg Mgtfvá nimf jsg fl tpaíp ng nglqksik. 26 Y fké p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Ft Lgñfk Mgtfvá, ef nglqksypl p qs hsgabf y p qs tgkgnpn jsg tpl kgnidinf rfe qs ukpengzp, jsg lprplqg ng Guihqf rfe dpef hfngkflp. 27 Prséknpqg ng qsl ligkvfl Pakptpd, Ilppr y Mprfa; ef dikgl p bp nskgzp ng glqg hsgabf, ei p ls idhignpn ei p ls hgrpnf, 28 ef lgp jsg niupe bfl ng bp qigkkp ng nfeng efl lprplqg: Hfk rspeqf ef hsnf Mgtfvá ieqkfnsrikbfl ge bp qigkkp jsg bgl tpaíp hkfdgqinf, f hfkjsg bfl pafkkgríp, bfl lpró hpkp dpqpkbfl ge gb ngligkqf. 29 Y gbbfl lfe qs hsgabf y qs tgkgnpn, jsg lprplqg rfe qs ukpe hfngk y rfe qs akpzf gxqgeninf. 

Gb hprqf kgefvpnf

(Gx. 34.1-10)

NGSQGKFEFDIF 10

1 Ge pjsgb qigdhf Mgtfvá dg nimf: Báakpqg nfl qpabpl ng hignkp rfdf bpl hkidgkpl, y lsag p dí pb dfeqg, y tpzqg se pkrp ng dpngkp; 2 y glrkiaiké ge pjsgbbpl qpabpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg glqpape ge bpl hkidgkpl qpabpl jsg jsgakplqg; y bpl hfenkál ge gb pkrp. 3 G tirg se pkrp ng dpngkp ng prprip, y bpaké nfl qpabpl ng hignkp rfdf bpl hkidgkpl, y lsaí pb dfeqg rfe bpl nfl qpabpl ge di dpef. 4 Y glrkiaió ge bpl qpabpl rfecfkdg p bp hkidgkp glrkiqskp, bfl nigz dpenpdigeqfl jsg Mgtfvá fl tpaíp tpabpnf ge gb dfeqg ng ge dgnif ngb csguf, gb níp ng bp plpdabgp; y dg bpl nif Mgtfvá. 5 Y vfbví y nglrgení ngb dfeqg, y hslg bpl qpabpl ge gb pkrp jsg tpaíp tgrtf; y pbbí glqáe, rfdf Mgtfvá dg dpenó. 6 (Nglhsél lpbigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng Aggkfq-ageg- mppráe p Dflgkp; pbbí dskió Ppkóe, y pbbí csg lghsbqpnf, y ge bsupk lsyf qsvf gb lprgknfrif ls timf Gbgpzpk. 7 Ng pbbí hpkqigkfe p Usnufnp, y ng Usnufnp p Mfqapqp, qigkkp ng pkkfyfl ng puspl. 8 Ge pjsgb qigdhf phpkqó Mgtfvá bp qkias ng Bgví hpkp jsg bbgvplg gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg glqsviglg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá hpkp lgkvikbg, y hpkp agengrik ge ls efdakg, tplqp tfy, 9 hfk bf rspb Bgví ef qsvf hpkqg ei tgkgnpn rfe lsl tgkdpefl; Mgtfvá gl ls tgkgnpn, rfdf Mgtfvá qs Nifl bg nimf.) 

10 Y yf glqsvg ge gb dfeqg rfdf bfl hkidgkfl nípl, rspkgeqp nípl y rspkgeqp efrtgl; y Mgtfvá qpdaiée dg glrsrtó glqp vgz, y ef jsilf Mgtfvá nglqksikqg. 11 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Bgváeqpqg, penp, hpkp jsg dpkrtgl ngbpeqg ngb hsgabf, hpkp jsg geqkge y hflgpe bp qigkkp jsg mské p lsl hpnkgl jsg bgl tpaíp ng npk. 

Bf jsg Nifl gxiug

12 Ptfkp, hsgl, Ilkpgb, ¿jsé hing Mgtfvá qs Nifl ng qi, lief jsg qgdpl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, jsg pengl ge qfnfl lsl rpdiefl, y jsg bf pdgl, y likvpl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl rfe qfnf qs rfkpzóe y rfe qfnp qs pbdp; 13 jsg uspkngl bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá y lsl glqpqsqfl, jsg yf qg hkglrkiaf tfy, hpkp jsg qgeupl hkflhgkinpn? 14 Tg pjsí, ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl lfe bfl rigbfl, y bfl rigbfl ng bfl rigbfl, bp qigkkp, y qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg tpy ge gbbp. 15 Lfbpdgeqg ng qsl hpnkgl lg pukpnó Mgtfvá hpkp pdpkbfl, y glrfuió ls nglrgengerip nglhsél ng gbbfl, p vflfqkfl, ng geqkg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, rfdf ge glqg níp. 16 Rikrserinpn, hsgl, gb hkghsrif ng vsglqkf rfkpzóe, y ef genskgzráil dál vsglqkp rgkviz. 17 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl gl Nifl ng niflgl y Lgñfk ng lgñfkgl, Nifl ukpeng, hfngkflf y qgdiabg, jsg ef tprg prghrióe ng hgklfepl, ei qfdp rftgrtf; 18 jsg tprg mslqirip pb tsékcpef y p bp visnp; jsg pdp qpdaiée pb gxqkpemgkf náenfbg hpe y vglqinf. 19 Pdpkéil, hsgl, pb gxqkpemgkf; hfkjsg gxqkpemgkfl csilqgil ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 20 P Mgtfvá qs Nifl qgdgkál, p éb lfbf lgkvikál, p éb lgusikál, y hfk ls efdakg mskpkál. 21 Gb gl gb famgqf ng qs pbpapezp, y éb gl qs Nifl, jsg tp tgrtf rfeqiuf glqpl rflpl ukpengl y qgkkiabgl jsg qsl fmfl tpe vilqf. 22 Rfe lgqgeqp hgklfepl nglrgenigkfe qsl hpnkgl p Guihqf, y ptfkp Mgtfvá qg tp tgrtf rfdf bpl glqkgbbpl ngb rigbf ge dsbqiqsn. 

Bp ukpengzp ng Mgtfvá

NGSQGKFEFDIF 11

1 Pdpkál, hsgl, p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y uspknpkál lsl fkngepezpl, lsl glqpqsqfl, lsl ngrkgqfl y lsl dpenpdigeqfl, qfnfl bfl nípl. 2 Y rfdhkgengn tfy, hfkjsg ef tpabf rfe vsglqkfl timfl jsg ef tpe lpainf ei vilqf gb rplqiuf ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, ls ukpengzp, ls dpef hfngkflp, y ls akpzf gxqgeninf, 3 y lsl lgñpbgl, y lsl fakpl jsg tizf ge dgnif ng Guihqf p Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf, y p qfnp ls qigkkp; 4 y bf jsg tizf pb gmékriqf ng Guihqf, p lsl rpapbbfl y p lsl rpkkfl; ródf hkgrihiqó bpl puspl ngb Dpk Kfmf lfakg gbbfl, rspenf vgeípe qkpl vflfqkfl y Mgtfvá bfl nglqksyó tplqp tfy; 5 y bf jsg tp tgrtf rfe vflfqkfl ge gb ngligkqf, tplqp jsg tpaéil bbgupnf p glqg bsupk; 6 y bf jsg tizf rfe Npqáe y Paikpd, timfl ng Gbipa timf ng Ksaée; ródf pakió ls afrp bp qigkkp, y bfl qkpuó rfe lsl cpdibipl, lsl qigenpl, y qfnf ls upepnf, ge dgnif ng qfnf Ilkpgb. 7 Dpl vsglqkfl fmfl tpe vilqf qfnpl bpl ukpengl fakpl jsg Mgtfvá tp tgrtf. 

Agenirifegl ng bp Qigkkp Hkfdgqinp

8 Uspknpn, hsgl, qfnfl bfl dpenpdigeqfl jsg yf fl hkglrkiaf tfy, hpkp jsg lgáil cfkqpbgrinfl, y geqkéil y hflgáil bp qigkkp p bp rspb hpláil hpkp qfdpkbp; 9 y hpkp jsg fl lgpe hkfbfeupnfl bfl nípl lfakg bp qigkkp, ng bp rspb mskó Mgtfvá p vsglqkfl hpnkgl, jsg tpaíp ng npkbp p gbbfl y p ls nglrgengerip, qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb. 10 Bp qigkkp p bp rspb geqkpl hpkp qfdpkbp ef gl rfdf bp qigkkp ng Guihqf ng nfeng tpaéil lpbinf, nfeng lgdakpapl qs lgdibbp, y kgupapl rfe qs hig, rfdf tsgkqf ng tfkqpbizp. 11 Bp qigkkp p bp rspb hpláil hpkp qfdpkbp gl qigkkp ng dfeqgl y ng vgupl, jsg agag bpl puspl ng bp bbsvip ngb rigbf; 12 qigkkp ng bp rspb Mgtfvá qs Nifl rsinp; ligdhkg glqáe lfakg gbbp bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, nglng gb hkierihif ngb pñf tplqp gb cie. 

13 Li fagngrigkgil rsinpnflpdgeqg p dil dpenpdigeqfl jsg yf fl hkglrkiaf tfy, pdpenf p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y likviéenfbg rfe qfnf vsglqkf rfkpzóe, y rfe qfnp vsglqkp pbdp, 14 yf npké bp bbsvip ng vsglqkp qigkkp p ls qigdhf, bp qgdhkpep y bp qpkníp; y kgrfugkál qs ukpef, qs vief y qs prgiqg. 15 Npké qpdaiée tigkap ge qs rpdhf hpkp qsl upepnfl; y rfdgkál, y qg lpripkál. 16 Uspknpfl, hsgl, jsg vsglqkf rfkpzóe ef lg iecpqúg, y fl phpkqéil y likváil p niflgl pmgefl, y fl ierbieéil p gbbfl; 17 y lg gerigenp gb cskfk ng Mgtfvá lfakg vflfqkfl, y rigkkg bfl rigbfl, y ef tpyp bbsvip, ei bp qigkkp né ls cksqf, y hgkgzráil hkfeqf ng bp asgep qigkkp jsg fl np Mgtfvá. 

18 Hfk qpeqf, hfenkéil glqpl dil hpbpakpl ge vsglqkf rfkpzóe y ge vsglqkp pbdp, y bpl pqpkéil rfdf lgñpb ge vsglqkp dpef, y lgkáe hfk ckfeqpbgl geqkg vsglqkfl fmfl. 19 Y bpl gelgñpkéil p vsglqkfl timfl, tpabpenf ng gbbpl rspenf qg ligeqgl ge qs rplp, rspenf pengl hfk gb rpdief, rspenf qg prsglqgl, y rspenf qg bgvpeqgl, 20 y bpl glrkiaikál ge bfl hflqgl ng qs rplp, y ge qsl hsgkqpl; 21 hpkp jsg lgpe vsglqkfl nípl, y bfl nípl ng vsglqkfl timfl, qpe esdgkflfl lfakg bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá mskó p vsglqkfl hpnkgl jsg bgl tpaíp ng npk, rfdf bfl nípl ng bfl rigbfl lfakg bp qigkkp. 22 Hfkjsg li uspknpkgil rsinpnflpdgeqg qfnfl glqfl dpenpdigeqfl jsg yf fl hkglrkiaf hpkp jsg bfl rsdhbáil, y li pdpkgil p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, penpenf ge qfnfl lsl rpdiefl, y liusiéenfbg p éb, 23 Mgtfvá qpdaiée grtpká ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl p qfnpl glqpl eprifegl, y nglhflggkéil eprifegl ukpengl y dál hfngkflpl jsg vflfqkfl. 24 Qfnf bsupk jsg hilpkg bp hbpeqp ng vsglqkf hig lgká vsglqkf; nglng gb ngligkqf tplqp gb Bíapef, nglng gb kíf Gsckpqgl tplqp gb dpk frringeqpb lgká vsglqkf qgkkiqfkif. 25 Epnig lg lflqgenká ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl; dignf y qgdfk ng vflfqkfl hfenká Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl lfakg qfnp bp qigkkp jsg hilpkgil, rfdf éb fl tp nirtf. 

26 Tg pjsí yf hfeuf tfy ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl bp agenirióe y bp dpbnirióe: 27 bp agenirióe, li fygkgil bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, jsg yf fl hkglrkiaf tfy, 28 y bp dpbnirióe, li ef fygkgil bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y fl phpkqpkgil ngb rpdief jsg yf fl fkngef tfy, hpkp ik ge hfl ng niflgl pmgefl jsg ef tpaéil rfefrinf. 29 Y rspenf Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tpyp ieqkfnsrinf ge bp qigkkp p bp rspb vpl hpkp qfdpkbp, hfenkál bp agenirióe lfakg gb dfeqg Ugkizid, y bp dpbnirióe lfakg gb dfeqg Gapb, 30 bfl rspbgl glqáe pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe, qkpl gb rpdief ngb frringeqg ge bp qigkkp ngb rpepegf, jsg tpaiqp ge gb Pkpaá ckgeqg p Uibupb, mseqf pb geriepk ng Dfkg. 31 Hfkjsg vflfqkfl hpláil gb Mfknáe hpkp ik p hflggk bp qigkkp jsg fl np Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; y bp qfdpkéil, y tpaiqpkéil ge gbbp. 32 Rsinpkéil, hsgl, ng rsdhbik qfnfl bfl glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl jsg yf hkglgeqf tfy ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl. 

Gb lpeqspkif úeirf

NGSQGKFEFDIF 12

1 Glqfl lfe bfl glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl jsg rsinpkéil ng hfegk hfk fakp ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng qsl hpnkgl qg tp npnf hpkp jsg qfdgl hflglióe ng gbbp, qfnfl bfl nípl jsg vflfqkfl vivigkgil lfakg bp qigkkp. 2 Nglqksikéil geqgkpdgeqg qfnfl bfl bsupkgl nfeng bpl eprifegl jsg vflfqkfl tgkgnpkéil likvigkfe p lsl niflgl, lfakg bfl dfeqgl pbqfl, y lfakg bfl rfbbpnfl, y ngapmf ng qfnf ákafb ckfenflf. 3 Ngkkiapkéil lsl pbqpkgl, y jsgakpkéil lsl glqpqspl, y lsl idáugegl ng Plgkp rfelsdikéil rfe csguf; y nglqksikéil bpl glrsbqskpl ng lsl niflgl, y kpgkéil ls efdakg ng pjsgb bsupk. 4 Ef tpkéil plí p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, 5 lief jsg gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl glrfuigkg ng geqkg qfnpl vsglqkpl qkiasl, hpkp hfegk pbbí ls efdakg hpkp ls tpaiqprióe, élg aslrpkéil, y pbbá ikéil. 6 Y pbbí bbgvpkéil vsglqkfl tfbfrpslqfl, vsglqkfl lprkicirifl, vsglqkfl nigzdfl, y bp fckgenp gbgvpnp ng vsglqkpl dpefl, vsglqkfl vfqfl, vsglqkpl fckgenpl vfbseqpkipl, y bpl hkidiripl ng vsglqkpl vprpl y ng vsglqkpl fvgmpl; 7 y rfdgkéil pbbí ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y fl pbgukpkéil, vflfqkfl y vsglqkpl cpdibipl, ge qfnp fakp ng vsglqkpl dpefl ge bp rspb Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tsaigkg agengrinf. 8 Ef tpkéil rfdf qfnf bf jsg tprgdfl eflfqkfl pjsí ptfkp, rpnp sef bf jsg aige bg hpkgrg, 9 hfkjsg tplqp ptfkp ef tpaéil geqkpnf pb kghflf y p bp tgkgnpn jsg fl np Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 10 Dpl hplpkéil gb Mfknáe, y tpaiqpkéil ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl tprg tgkgnpk; y éb fl npká kghflf ng qfnfl vsglqkfl gegdiufl pbkgngnfk, y tpaiqpkéil lguskfl. 11 Y pb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl glrfuigkg hpkp hfegk ge éb ls efdakg, pbbí bbgvpkéil qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg yf fl dpenf: vsglqkfl tfbfrpslqfl, vsglqkfl lprkicirifl, vsglqkfl nigzdfl, bpl fckgenpl gbgvpnpl ng vsglqkpl dpefl, y qfnf bf glrfuinf ng bfl vfqfl jsg tsaigkgil hkfdgqinf p Mgtfvá. 12 Y fl pbgukpkéil ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, vflfqkfl, vsglqkfl timfl, vsglqkpl timpl, vsglqkfl ligkvfl y vsglqkpl ligkvpl, y gb bgviqp jsg tpaiqg ge vsglqkpl hfabprifegl; hfk rspeqf ef qigeg hpkqg ei tgkgnpn rfe vflfqkfl. 13 Rsínpqg ng ef fckgrgk qsl tfbfrpslqfl ge rspbjsigk bsupk jsg vigkgl; 14 lief jsg ge gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá glrfuigkg, ge sep ng qsl qkiasl, pbbí fckgrgkál qsl tfbfrpslqfl, y pbbí tpkál qfnf bf jsg yf qg dpenf. 

15 Rfe qfnf, hfnkál dpqpk y rfdgk rpkeg ge qfnpl qsl hfabprifegl rfecfkdg p qs nglgf, lguúe bp agenirióe jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tpyp npnf; gb iedsenf y gb bidhif bp hfnká rfdgk, rfdf bp ng uprgbp f ng rigkvf. 16 Lfbpdgeqg jsg lpeukg ef rfdgkéil; lfakg bp qigkkp bp ngkkpdpkéil rfdf pusp. 17 Ei rfdgkál ge qsl hfabprifegl gb nigzdf ng qs ukpef, ng qs vief f ng qs prgiqg, ei bpl hkidiripl ng qsl vprpl, ei ng qsl fvgmpl, ei bfl vfqfl jsg hkfdgqigkgl, ei bpl fckgenpl vfbseqpkipl, ei bpl fckgenpl gbgvpnpl ng qsl dpefl; 18 lief jsg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl bpl rfdgkál, ge gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl tsaigkg glrfuinf, qú, qs timf, qs timp, qs ligkvf, qs ligkvp, y gb bgviqp jsg tpaiqp ge qsl hfabprifegl; qg pbgukpkál ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl ng qfnp bp fakp ng qsl dpefl. 19 Qge rsinpnf ng ef nglpdhpkpk pb bgviqp ge qfnfl qsl nípl lfakg bp qigkkp. 

20 Rspenf Mgtfvá qs Nifl gelpertpkg qs qgkkiqfkif, rfdf éb qg tp nirtf, y qú nimgkgl: Rfdgké rpkeg, hfkjsg nglgplqg rfdgkbp, rfecfkdg p bf jsg nglgplqg hfnkál rfdgk. 21 Li glqsvigkg bgmfl ng qi gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl glrfuigkg hpkp hfegk pbbí ls efdakg, hfnkál dpqpk ng qsl vprpl y ng qsl fvgmpl jsg Mgtfvá qg tsaigkg npnf, rfdf qg tg dpenpnf yf, y rfdgkál ge qsl hsgkqpl lguúe qfnf bf jsg nglgpkgl. 22 Bf dildf jsg lg rfdg bp uprgbp y gb rigkvf, plí bpl hfnkál rfdgk; gb iedsenf y gb bidhif hfnkáe rfdgk qpdaiée ng gbbpl. 23 Lfbpdgeqg jsg qg dpeqgeupl cikdg ge ef rfdgk lpeukg; hfkjsg bp lpeukg gl bp vinp, y ef rfdgkál bp vinp mseqpdgeqg rfe ls rpkeg. 24 Ef bp rfdgkál; ge qigkkp bp ngkkpdpkál rfdf pusp. 25 Ef rfdgkál ng gbbp, hpkp jsg qg vpyp aige p qi y p qsl timfl nglhsél ng qi, rspenf tirigkgl bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá. 26 Hgkf bpl rflpl jsg tsaigkgl rfelpukpnf, y qsl vfqfl, bpl qfdpkál, y vgenkál rfe gbbpl pb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá tsaigkg glrfuinf; 27 y fckgrgkál qsl tfbfrpslqfl, bp rpkeg y bp lpeukg, lfakg gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl; y bp lpeukg ng qsl lprkicirifl lgká ngkkpdpnp lfakg gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y hfnkál rfdgk bp rpkeg. 28 Uspknp y glrsrtp qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl jsg yf qg dpenf, hpkp jsg tprigenf bf asgef y bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, qg vpyp aige p qi y p qsl timfl nglhsél ng qi hpkp ligdhkg. 

Pnvgkqgeripl rfeqkp bp infbpqkíp

29 Rspenf Mgtfvá qs Nifl tpyp nglqksinf ngbpeqg ng qi bpl eprifegl pnfeng qú vpl hpkp hflggkbpl, y bpl tgkgngl, y tpaiqgl ge ls qigkkp, 30 usáknpqg jsg ef qkfhigrgl ygenf ge hfl ng gbbpl, nglhsél jsg lgpe nglqksinpl ngbpeqg ng qi; ef hkguseqgl prgkrp ng lsl niflgl, nirigenf: Ng bp dpegkp jsg lgkvípe pjsgbbpl eprifegl p lsl niflgl, yf qpdaiée bgl lgkviké. 31 Ef tpkál plí p Mgtfvá qs Nifl; hfkjsg qfnp rflp pafdiepabg jsg Mgtfvá pafkkgrg, tirigkfe gbbfl p lsl niflgl; hsgl pse p lsl timfl y p lsl timpl jsgdpape ge gb csguf p lsl niflgl. 

32 Rsinpkál ng tprgk qfnf bf jsg yf qg dpenf; ef pñpnikál p gbbf, ei ng gbbf jsiqpkál. 

NGSQGKFEFDIF 13

1 Rspenf lg bgvpeqpkg ge dgnif ng qi hkfcgqp, f lfñpnfk ng lsgñfl, y qg peseripkg lgñpb f hkfniuifl, 2 y li lg rsdhbigkg bp lgñpb f hkfniuif jsg éb qg peserió, nirigenf: Vpdfl ge hfl ng niflgl pmgefl, jsg ef rfefrilqg, y likvádflbgl; 3 ef npkál fínf p bpl hpbpakpl ng qpb hkfcgqp, ei pb qpb lfñpnfk ng lsgñfl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl glqá hkfapenf, hpkp lpagk li pdáil p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl rfe qfnf vsglqkf rfkpzóe, y rfe qfnp vsglqkp pbdp. 4 Ge hfl ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl penpkéil; p éb qgdgkéil, uspknpkéil lsl dpenpdigeqfl y glrsrtpkéil ls vfz, p éb lgkvikéil, y p éb lgusikéil. 5 Qpb hkfcgqp f lfñpnfk ng lsgñfl tp ng lgk dsgkqf, hfk rspeqf prfelgmó kgagbióe rfeqkp Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl jsg qg lpró ng qigkkp ng Guihqf y qg kglrpqó ng rplp ng lgkvinsdakg, y qkpqó ng phpkqpkqg ngb rpdief hfk gb rspb Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg dpenó jsg pensviglgl; y plí jsiqpkál gb dpb ng ge dgnif ng qi. 

6 Li qg ieriqpkg qs tgkdpef, timf ng qs dpnkg, f qs timf, qs timp, qs dsmgk f qs pdiuf íeqidf, nirigenf ge lgrkgqf: Vpdfl y likvpdfl p niflgl pmgefl, jsg ei qú ei qsl hpnkgl rfefrilqgil, 7 ng bfl niflgl ng bfl hsgabfl jsg glqáe ge vsglqkfl pbkgngnfkgl, rgkrp ng qi f bgmfl ng qi, nglng se gxqkgdf ng bp qigkkp tplqp gb fqkf gxqkgdf ng gbbp; 8 ef rfelgeqikál rfe éb, ei bg hkglqpkál fínf; ei qs fmf bg rfdhpngrgká, ei bg qgenkál dilgkirfknip, ei bf gersakikál, 9 lief jsg bf dpqpkál; qs dpef lg pbzpká hkidgkf lfakg éb hpkp dpqpkbg, y nglhsél bp dpef ng qfnf gb hsgabf. 10 Bg phgnkgpkál tplqp jsg dsgkp, hfk rspeqf hkfrskó phpkqpkqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, jsg qg lpró ng qigkkp ng Guihqf, ng rplp ng lgkvinsdakg; 11 hpkp jsg qfnf Ilkpgb fiup, y qgdp, y ef vsgbvp p tprgk ge dgnif ng qi rflp lgdgmpeqg p glqp. 

12 Li fygkgl jsg lg nirg ng pbusep ng qsl risnpngl jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hpkp vivik ge gbbpl, 13 jsg tpe lpbinf ng ge dgnif ng qi tfdakgl idhífl jsg tpe ielqiupnf p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng ls risnpn, nirigenf: Vpdfl y likvpdfl p niflgl pmgefl, jsg vflfqkfl ef rfefrilqgil; 14 qú iejsikikál, y aslrpkál y hkguseqpkál rfe nibiugerip; y li hpkgrigkg vgknpn, rflp rigkqp, jsg qpb pafdieprióe lg tizf ge dgnif ng qi, 15 ikkgdiliabgdgeqg tgkikál p cibf ng glhpnp p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng pjsgbbp risnpn, nglqksyéenfbp rfe qfnf bf jsg ge gbbp tsaigkg, y qpdaiée dpqpkál lsl upepnfl p cibf ng glhpnp. 16 Y mseqpkál qfnf ls afqíe ge dgnif ng bp hbpzp, y rfelsdikál rfe csguf bp risnpn y qfnf ls afqíe, qfnf gbbf, rfdf tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y bbgupká p lgk se dfeqóe ng ksiepl hpkp ligdhkg; eserp dál lgká gnicirpnp. 17 Y ef lg hgupká p qs dpef epnp ngb pepqgdp, hpkp jsg Mgtfvá lg phpkqg ngb pknfk ng ls ikp, y qgeup ng qi dilgkirfknip, y qgeup rfdhplióe ng qi, y qg dsbqihbijsg, rfdf bf mskó p qsl hpnkgl, 18 rspenf fagngrigkgl p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, uspknpenf qfnfl lsl dpenpdigeqfl jsg yf qg dpenf tfy, hpkp tprgk bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 

NGSQGKFEFDIF 14

1 Timfl lfil ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; ef fl lpmpkéil, ei fl kphpkéil p rpslp ng dsgkqf. 2 Hfkjsg gkgl hsgabf lpeqf p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y Mgtfvá qg tp glrfuinf hpkp jsg bg lgpl se hsgabf úeirf ng geqkg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl jsg glqáe lfakg bp qigkkp. 

Peidpbgl bidhifl g iedsenfl

(Bv. 11.1-47)

3 Epnp pafdiepabg rfdgkál. 4 Glqfl lfe bfl peidpbgl jsg hfnkéil rfdgk: gb asgy, bp fvgmp, bp rpakp, 5 gb rigkvf, bp uprgbp, gb rfkzf, bp rpakp dfeqél, gb íairg, gb peqíbfhg y gb rpkegkf dfeqél. 6 Y qfnf peidpb ng hgzsñpl, jsg qigeg tgeninskp ng nfl sñpl, y jsg ksdipkg geqkg bfl peidpbgl, glg hfnkéil rfdgk. 7 Hgkf glqfl ef rfdgkéil, geqkg bfl jsg ksdipe f geqkg bfl jsg qigege hgzsñp tgeninp: rpdgbbf, bigakg y rfegmf; hfkjsg ksdipe, dpl ef qigege hgzsñp tgeninp, lgkáe iedsenfl; 8 ei rgknf, hfkjsg qigeg hgzsñp tgeninp, dpl ef ksdip; fl lgká iedsenf. Ng bp rpkeg ng élqfl ef rfdgkéil, ei qfrpkéil lsl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl. 

9 Ng qfnf bf jsg glqá ge gb pusp, ng glqfl hfnkéil rfdgk: qfnf bf jsg qigeg pbgqp y glrpdp. 10 Dpl qfnf bf jsg ef qigeg pbgqp y glrpdp, ef rfdgkéil; iedsenf lgká. 

11 Qfnp pvg bidhip hfnkéil rfdgk. 12 Y glqpl lfe ng bpl jsg ef hfnkéil rfdgk: gb áusibp, gb jsgakpeqptsglfl, gb pzfk, 13 gb upbbiepzf, gb dibpef lguúe ls glhgrig, 14 qfnf rsgkvf lguúe ls glhgrig, 15 gb pvglqksz, bp bgrtszp, bp upvifqp y gb upvibáe lguúe lsl glhgrigl, 16 gb astf, gb iail, gb rpbpdóe, 17 gb hgbírpef, gb asiqkg, gb lfdfkdsmf, 18 bp riuügñp, bp upkzp lguúe ls glhgrig, bp pasaibbp y gb dskriébpuf. 19 Qfnf ielgrqf pbpnf lgká iedsenf; ef lg rfdgká. 20 Qfnp pvg bidhip hfnkéil rfdgk. 

21 Eieusep rflp dfkqgriep rfdgkéil; pb gxqkpemgkf jsg glqá ge qsl hfabprifegl bp npkál, y éb hfnká rfdgkbp; f véengbp p se gxqkpemgkf, hfkjsg qú gkgl hsgabf lpeqf p Mgtfvá qs Nifl. Ef rfrgkál gb rpakiqf ge bp bgrtg ng ls dpnkg. 

Bp bgy ngb nigzdf

22 Iengcgrqiabgdgeqg nigzdpkál qfnf gb hkfnsrqf ngb ukpef jsg kienigkg qs rpdhf rpnp pñf. 23 Y rfdgkál ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge gb bsupk jsg éb glrfuigkg hpkp hfegk pbbí ls efdakg, gb nigzdf ng qs ukpef, ng qs vief y ng qs prgiqg, y bpl hkidiripl ng qsl dpepnpl y ng qsl upepnfl, hpkp jsg phkgenpl p qgdgk p Mgtfvá qs Nifl qfnfl bfl nípl. 24 Y li gb rpdief csgkg qpe bpkuf jsg ef hsgnpl bbgvpkbf, hfk glqpk bgmfl ng qi gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl tsaigkg glrfuinf hpkp hfegk ge éb ls efdakg, rspenf Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg agenimgkg, 25 geqfergl bf vgengkál y uspknpkál gb niegkf ge qs dpef, y vgenkál pb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl glrfuigkg; 26 y npkál gb niegkf hfk qfnf bf jsg nglgpl, hfk vprpl, hfk fvgmpl, hfk vief, hfk linkp, f hfk rspbjsigk rflp jsg qú nglgpkgl; y rfdgkál pbbí ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y qg pbgukpkál qú y qs cpdibip. 27 Y ef nglpdhpkpkál pb bgviqp jsg tpaiqpkg ge qsl hfabprifegl; hfkjsg ef qigeg hpkqg ei tgkgnpn rfeqiuf. 

28 Pb cie ng rpnp qkgl pñfl lprpkál qfnf gb nigzdf ng qsl hkfnsrqfl ng pjsgb pñf, y bf uspknpkál ge qsl risnpngl. 29 Y vgenká gb bgviqp, jsg ef qigeg hpkqg ei tgkgnpn rfeqiuf, y gb gxqkpemgkf, gb tsékcpef y bp visnp jsg tsaigkg ge qsl hfabprifegl, y rfdgkáe y lgkáe lpripnfl; hpkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg ageniup ge qfnp fakp jsg qsl dpefl tirigkge. 

Gb pñf ng kgdilióe

NGSQGKFEFDIF 15

1 Rpnp ligqg pñfl tpkál kgdilióe. 2 Y glqp gl bp dpegkp ng bp kgdilióe: hgknfepká p ls ngsnfk qfnf pjsgb jsg tizf gdhkélqiqf ng ls dpef, rfe gb rspb fabiuó p ls hkómidf; ef bf ngdpenpká dál p ls hkómidf, f p ls tgkdpef, hfkjsg gl hkgufepnp bp kgdilióe ng Mgtfvá. 3 Ngb gxqkpemgkf ngdpenpkál gb kgieqgukf; hgkf bf jsg qs tgkdpef qsvigkg qsyf, bf hgknfepká qs dpef, 4 hpkp jsg plí ef tpyp ge dgnif ng qi dgeniuf; hfkjsg Mgtfvá qg agengriká rfe pasenperip ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hfk tgkgnpn hpkp jsg bp qfdgl ge hflglióe, 5 li glrsrtpkgl cigbdgeqg bp vfz ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, hpkp uspknpk y rsdhbik qfnfl glqfl dpenpdigeqfl jsg yf qg fkngef tfy. 6 Yp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tpaká agengrinf, rfdf qg tp nirtf, hkglqpkál geqfergl p dsrtpl eprifegl, dpl qú ef qfdpkál hkglqpnf; qgenkál nfdieif lfakg dsrtpl eprifegl, hgkf lfakg qi ef qgenkáe nfdieif. 

Hkélqpdfl p bfl hfakgl

7 Rspenf tpyp ge dgnif ng qi dgeglqgkflf ng pbusef ng qsl tgkdpefl ge pbusep ng qsl risnpngl, ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np, ef genskgrgkál qs rfkpzóe, ei rgkkpkál qs dpef rfeqkp qs tgkdpef hfakg, 8 lief pakikál p éb qs dpef biagkpbdgeqg, y ge gcgrqf bg hkglqpkál bf jsg egrgliqg. 9 Usáknpqg ng qgegk ge qs rfkpzóe hgelpdigeqf hgkvgklf, nirigenf: Rgkrp glqá gb pñf léhqidf, gb ng bp kgdilióe, y dikgl rfe dpbfl fmfl p qs tgkdpef dgeglqgkflf hpkp ef npkbg; hfkjsg éb hfnká rbpdpk rfeqkp qi p Mgtfvá, y lg qg rfeqpká hfk hgrpnf. 10 Lie cpbqp bg npkál, y ef lgkál ng dgzjsief rfkpzóe rspenf bg ngl; hfkjsg hfk gbbf qg agengriká Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge qfnfl qsl tgrtfl, y ge qfnf bf jsg gdhkgenpl. 11 Hfkjsg ef cpbqpkáe dgeglqgkflfl ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp; hfk glf yf qg dpenf, nirigenf: Pakikál qs dpef p qs tgkdpef, pb hfakg y pb dgeglqgkflf ge qs qigkkp. 

Bgygl lfakg bfl glrbpvfl

(Gx. 21.1-11)

12 Li lg vgenigkg p qi qs tgkdpef tgakgf f tgakgp, y qg tsaigkg lgkvinf lgil pñfl, pb léhqidf bg nglhgnikál biakg. 13 Y rspenf bf nglhinigkgl biakg, ef bg gevipkál rfe bpl dpefl vprípl. 14 Bg paplqgrgkál biagkpbdgeqg ng qsl fvgmpl, ng qs gkp y ng qs bpupk; bg npkál ng pjsgbbf ge jsg Mgtfvá qg tsaigkg agengrinf. 15 Y qg prfknpkál ng jsg csilqg ligkvf ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg kglrpqó; hfk qpeqf yf qg dpenf glqf tfy. 16 Li éb qg nimgkg: Ef qg ngmpké; hfkjsg qg pdp p qi y p qs rplp, y hfkjsg bg vp aige rfeqiuf; 17 geqfergl qfdpkál sep bglep, y tfkpnpkál ls fkgmp rfeqkp bp hsgkqp, y lgká qs ligkvf hpkp ligdhkg; plí qpdaiée tpkál p qs rkipnp. 18 Ef qg hpkgzrp nskf rspenf bg gevipkgl biakg, hsgl hfk bp diqpn ngb rflqf ng se mfkepbgkf qg likvió lgil pñfl; y Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg agengriká ge qfnf rspeqf tirigkgl. 

Rfelpukprióe ng bfl hkidfuéeiqfl dprtfl

19 Rfelpukpkál p Mgtfvá qs Nifl qfnf hkidfuéeiqf dprtf ng qsl vprpl y ng qsl fvgmpl; ef qg lgkvikál ngb hkidfuéeiqf ng qsl vprpl, ei qkpljsibpkál gb hkidfuéeiqf ng qsl fvgmpl. 20 Ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl bfl rfdgkál rpnp pñf, qú y qs cpdibip, ge gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá glrfuigkg. 21 Y li tsaigkg ge éb ngcgrqf, li csgkg riguf, f rfmf, f tsaigkg ge éb rspbjsigk cpbqp, ef bf lprkicirpkál p Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 22 Ge qsl hfabprifegl bf rfdgkál; gb iedsenf bf dildf jsg gb bidhif rfdgkáe ng éb, rfdf ng sep uprgbp f ng se rigkvf. 23 Lfbpdgeqg jsg ef rfdpl ls lpeukg; lfakg bp qigkkp bp ngkkpdpkál rfdf pusp. 

Ciglqpl pespbgl

(Gx. 23.14-17; 34.18-24)

NGSQGKFEFDIF 16

1 Uspknpkál gb dgl ng Paia, y tpkál hplrsp p Mgtfvá qs Nifl; hfkjsg ge gb dgl ng Paia qg lpró Mgtfvá qs Nifl ng Guihqf, ng efrtg. 2 Y lprkicirpkál bp hplrsp p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, ng bpl fvgmpl y ng bpl vprpl, ge gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá glrfuigkg hpkp jsg tpaiqg pbbí ls efdakg. 3 Ef rfdgkál rfe gbbp hpe rfe bgvpnskp; ligqg nípl rfdgkál rfe gbbp hpe lie bgvpnskp, hpe ng pcbirrióe, hfkjsg phkilp lpbilqg ng qigkkp ng Guihqf; hpkp jsg qfnfl bfl nípl ng qs vinp qg prsgkngl ngb níp ge jsg lpbilqg ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 4 Y ef lg vgká bgvpnskp rfeqiuf ge qfnf qs qgkkiqfkif hfk ligqg nípl; y ng bp rpkeg jsg dpqpkgl ge bp qpkng ngb hkidgk níp, ef jsgnpká tplqp bp dpñpep. 5 Ef hfnkál lprkicirpk bp hplrsp ge rspbjsigkp ng bpl risnpngl jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np; 6 lief ge gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl glrfuigkg hpkp jsg tpaiqg pbbí ls efdakg, lprkicirpkál bp hplrsp hfk bp qpkng p bp hsglqp ngb lfb, p bp tfkp jsg lpbilqg ng Guihqf. 7 Y bp plpkál y rfdgkál ge gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl tsaigkg glrfuinf; y hfk bp dpñpep kgukglpkál y vfbvgkál p qs tpaiqprióe. 8 Lgil nípl rfdgkál hpe lie bgvpnskp, y gb léhqidf níp lgká ciglqp lfbgdeg p Mgtfvá qs Nifl; ef qkpapmpkál ge éb. 

9 Ligqg lgdpepl rfeqpkál; nglng jsg rfdgezpkg p dgqgklg bp tfz ge bpl diglgl rfdgezpkál p rfeqpk bpl ligqg lgdpepl. 10 Y tpkál bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bpl lgdpepl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl; ng bp pasenperip vfbseqpkip ng qs dpef lgká bf jsg nigkgl, lguúe Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tsaigkg agengrinf. 11 Y qg pbgukpkál ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, qú, qs timf, qs timp, qs ligkvf, qs ligkvp, gb bgviqp jsg tpaiqpkg ge qsl risnpngl, y gb gxqkpemgkf, gb tsékcpef y bp visnp jsg glqsvigkge ge dgnif ng qi, ge gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl tsaigkg glrfuinf hpkp hfegk pbbí ls efdakg. 12 Y prséknpqg ng jsg csilqg ligkvf ge Guihqf; hfk qpeqf, uspknpkál y rsdhbikál glqfl glqpqsqfl. 

13 Bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bfl qpagkeársbfl tpkál hfk ligqg nípl, rspenf tpypl tgrtf bp rflgrtp ng qs gkp y ng qs bpupk. 14 Y qg pbgukpkál ge qsl ciglqpl lfbgdegl, qú, qs timf, qs timp, qs ligkvf, qs ligkvp, y gb bgviqp, gb gxqkpemgkf, gb tsékcpef y bp visnp jsg vivge ge qsl hfabprifegl. 15 Ligqg nípl rgbgakpkál ciglqp lfbgdeg p Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá glrfuigkg; hfkjsg qg tpaká agengrinf Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge qfnfl qsl cksqfl, y ge qfnp bp fakp ng qsl dpefl, y glqpkál vgknpngkpdgeqg pbgukg. 

16 Qkgl vgrgl rpnp pñf phpkgrgká qfnf vpkóe qsyf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge gb bsupk jsg éb glrfuigkg: ge bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp, y ge bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bpl lgdpepl, y ge bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bfl qpagkeársbfl. Y eieusef lg hkglgeqpká ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá rfe bpl dpefl vprípl; 17 rpnp sef rfe bp fckgenp ng ls dpef, rfecfkdg p bp agenirióe jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tsaigkg npnf. 

Pndieilqkprióe ng bp mslqirip

18 Msgrgl y fciripbgl hfenkál ge qfnpl qsl risnpngl jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg npká ge qsl qkiasl, bfl rspbgl mszupkáe pb hsgabf rfe mslqf msirif. 19 Ef qsgkzpl gb ngkgrtf; ef tpupl prghrióe ng hgklfepl, ei qfdgl lfafkef; hfkjsg gb lfafkef rigup bfl fmfl ng bfl lpaifl, y hgkvigkqg bpl hpbpakpl ng bfl mslqfl. 20 Bp mslqirip, bp mslqirip lgusikál, hpkp jsg vivpl y tgkgngl bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np. 

21 Ef hbpeqpkál eieuúe ákafb hpkp Plgkp rgkrp ngb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, jsg qú qg tpakál tgrtf, 22 ei qg bgvpeqpkál glqpqsp, bf rspb pafkkgrg Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 

NGSQGKFEFDIF 17

1 Ef fckgrgkál ge lprkicirif p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, asgy f rfkngkf ge gb rspb tpyp cpbqp f pbusep rflp dpbp, hsgl gl pafdieprióe p Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 

2 Rspenf lg tpbbpkg ge dgnif ng qi, ge pbusep ng qsl risnpngl jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np, tfdakg f dsmgk jsg tpyp tgrtf dpb peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl qkplhplpenf ls hprqf, 3 jsg tsaigkg inf y lgkvinf p niflgl pmgefl, y lg tsaigkg ierbiepnf p gbbfl, yp lgp pb lfb, f p bp bsep, f p qfnf gb gmékriqf ngb rigbf, bf rspb yf tg hkftiainf; 4 y qg csgkg npnf pvilf, y nglhsél jsg fygkgl y tsaigkgl ienpupnf aige, bp rflp hpkgrigkg ng vgknpn rigkqp, jsg qpb pafdieprióe tp linf tgrtp ge Ilkpgb; 5 geqfergl lprpkál p qsl hsgkqpl pb tfdakg f p bp dsmgk jsg tsaigkg tgrtf glqp dpbp rflp, lgp tfdakg f dsmgk, y bfl phgnkgpkál, y plí dfkikáe. 6 Hfk nirtf ng nfl f ng qkgl qglqiufl dfkiká gb jsg tsaigkg ng dfkik; ef dfkiká hfk gb nirtf ng se lfbf qglqiuf. 7 Bp dpef ng bfl qglqiufl rpgká hkidgkf lfakg éb hpkp dpqpkbf, y nglhsél bp dpef ng qfnf gb hsgabf; plí jsiqpkál gb dpb ng ge dgnif ng qi. 

8 Rspenf pbusep rflp qg csgkg nicírib ge gb msirif, geqkg sep rbplg ng tfdirinif y fqkp, geqkg sep rbplg ng ngkgrtf bgupb y fqkp, y geqkg sep rbplg ng tgkinp y fqkp, ge egufrifl ng biqiuif ge qsl risnpngl; geqfergl qg bgvpeqpkál y kgrskkikál pb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl glrfuigkg; 9 y vgenkál p bfl lprgknfqgl bgviqpl, y pb msgz jsg tsaigkg ge pjsgbbfl nípl, y hkguseqpkál; y gbbfl qg gelgñpkáe bp lgeqgerip ngb msirif. 10 Y tpkál lguúe bp lgeqgerip jsg qg ienijsge bfl ngb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá glrfuigkg, y rsinpkál ng tprgk lguúe qfnf bf jsg qg dpeiciglqge. 11 Lguúe bp bgy jsg qg gelgñge, y lguúe gb msirif jsg qg niupe, tpkál; ef qg phpkqpkál ei p niglqkp ei p lieiglqkp ng bp lgeqgerip jsg qg ngrbpkge. 12 Y gb tfdakg jsg hkfrgnigkg rfe lfagkaip, ef fagngrigenf pb lprgknfqg jsg glqá hpkp dieilqkpk pbbí ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, f pb msgz, gb qpb dfkiká; y jsiqpkál gb dpb ng ge dgnif ng Ilkpgb. 13 Y qfnf gb hsgabf fiká, y qgdgká, y ef lg gelfagkagrgká. 

Ielqksrrifegl prgkrp ng se kgy

14 Rspenf tpypl geqkpnf ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np, y qfdgl hflglióe ng gbbp y bp tpaiqgl, y niupl: Hfenké se kgy lfakg dí, rfdf qfnpl bpl eprifegl jsg glqáe ge dil pbkgngnfkgl; 15 rigkqpdgeqg hfenkál hfk kgy lfakg qi pb jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl glrfuigkg; ng geqkg qsl tgkdpefl hfenkál kgy lfakg qi; ef hfnkál hfegk lfakg qi p tfdakg gxqkpemgkf, jsg ef lgp qs tgkdpef. 16 Hgkf éb ef psdgeqpká hpkp lí rpapbbfl, ei tpká vfbvgk pb hsgabf p Guihqf rfe gb cie ng psdgeqpk rpapbbfl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá fl tp nirtf: Ef vfbváil eserp hfk glqg rpdief. 17 Ei qfdpká hpkp lí dsrtpl dsmgkgl, hpkp jsg ls rfkpzóe ef lg nglvíg; ei hbpqp ei fkf pdfeqfepká hpkp lí ge pasenperip. 18 Y rspenf lg ligeqg lfakg gb qkfef ng ls kgief, geqfergl glrkiaiká hpkp lí ge se biakf sep rfhip ng glqp bgy, ngb fkiuiepb jsg glqá pb rsinpnf ng bfl lprgknfqgl bgviqpl; 19 y bf qgenká rfeliuf, y bggká ge éb qfnfl bfl nípl ng ls vinp, hpkp jsg phkgenp p qgdgk p Mgtfvá ls Nifl, hpkp uspknpk qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp bgy y glqfl glqpqsqfl, hpkp hfegkbfl hfk fakp; 20 hpkp jsg ef lg gbgvg ls rfkpzóe lfakg lsl tgkdpefl, ei lg phpkqg ngb dpenpdigeqf p niglqkp ei p lieiglqkp; p cie ng jsg hkfbfeusg lsl nípl ge ls kgief, éb y lsl timfl, ge dgnif ng Ilkpgb. 

Bpl hfkrifegl ng bfl bgviqpl

NGSQGKFEFDIF 18

1 Bfl lprgknfqgl bgviqpl, gl ngrik, qfnp bp qkias ng Bgví, ef qgenkáe hpkqg ei tgkgnpn ge Ilkpgb; ng bpl fckgenpl jsgdpnpl p Mgtfvá y ng bp tgkgnpn ng éb rfdgkáe. 2 Ef qgenkáe, hsgl, tgkgnpn geqkg lsl tgkdpefl; Mgtfvá gl ls tgkgnpn, rfdf éb bgl tp nirtf. 3 Y glqg lgká gb ngkgrtf ng bfl lprgknfqgl ng hpkqg ngb hsgabf, ng bfl jsg fckgrigkge ge lprkicirif asgy f rfkngkf: npkáe pb lprgknfqg bp glhpbnibbp, bpl jsimpnpl y gb rspmpk. 4 Bpl hkidiripl ng qs ukpef, ng qs vief y ng qs prgiqg, y bpl hkidiripl ng bp bpep ng qsl fvgmpl bg npkál; 5 hfkjsg bg tp glrfuinf Mgtfvá qs Nifl ng geqkg qfnpl qsl qkiasl, hpkp jsg glqé hpkp pndieilqkpk ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá, éb y lsl timfl hpkp ligdhkg. 

6 Y rspenf lpbigkg se bgviqp ng pbusep ng qsl risnpngl ng geqkg qfnf Ilkpgb, nfeng tsaigkg vivinf, y vieigkg rfe qfnf gb nglgf ng ls pbdp pb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá glrfuigkg, 7 dieilqkpká ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl rfdf qfnfl lsl tgkdpefl bfl bgviqpl jsg glqsvigkge pbbí ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 8 Iuspb kprióe p bp ng bfl fqkfl rfdgká, pngdál ng lsl hpqkidfeifl. 

Pdfeglqprióe rfeqkp rflqsdakgl hpupepl

9 Rspenf geqkgl p bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np, ef phkgengkál p tprgk lguúe bpl pafdieprifegl ng pjsgbbpl eprifegl. 10 Ef lgp tpbbpnf ge qi jsige tpup hplpk p ls timf f p ls timp hfk gb csguf, ei jsige hkprqijsg pnivieprióe, ei pufkgkf, ei lfkqíbguf, ei tgrtirgkf, 11 ei gerpeqpnfk, ei pnivief, ei dpuf, ei jsige rfelsbqg p bfl dsgkqfl. 12 Hfkjsg gl pafdieprióe hpkp rfe Mgtfvá rspbjsigkp jsg tprg glqpl rflpl, y hfk glqpl pafdieprifegl Mgtfvá qs Nifl grtp glqpl eprifegl ng ngbpeqg ng qi. 13 Hgkcgrqf lgkál ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 14 Hfkjsg glqpl eprifegl jsg vpl p tgkgnpk, p pufkgkfl y p pniviefl fyge; dpl p qi ef qg tp hgkdiqinf glqf Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 

Nifl hkfdgqg se hkfcgqp rfdf Dfilél

15 Hkfcgqp ng ge dgnif ng qi, ng qsl tgkdpefl, rfdf yf, qg bgvpeqpká Mgtfvá qs Nifl; p éb fikéil; 16 rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg hgnilqg p Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge Tfkga gb níp ng bp plpdabgp, nirigenf: Ef vsgbvp yf p fík bp vfz ng Mgtfvá di Nifl, ei vgp yf dál glqg ukpe csguf, hpkp jsg ef dsgkp. 17 Y Mgtfvá dg nimf: Tpe tpabpnf aige ge bf jsg tpe nirtf. 18 Hkfcgqp bgl bgvpeqpké ng ge dgnif ng lsl tgkdpefl, rfdf qú; y hfenké dil hpbpakpl ge ls afrp, y éb bgl tpabpká qfnf bf jsg yf bg dpenpkg. 19 Dpl p rspbjsigkp jsg ef fygkg dil hpbpakpl jsg éb tpabpkg ge di efdakg, yf bg hgniké rsgeqp. 20 Gb hkfcgqp jsg qsvigkg bp hkglserióe ng tpabpk hpbpakp ge di efdakg, p jsige yf ef bg tpyp dpenpnf tpabpk, f jsg tpabpkg ge efdakg ng niflgl pmgefl, gb qpb hkfcgqp dfkiká. 21 Y li nimgkgl ge qs rfkpzóe: ¿Ródf rfefrgkgdfl bp hpbpakp jsg Mgtfvá ef tp tpabpnf?; 22 li gb hkfcgqp tpabpkg ge efdakg ng Mgtfvá, y ef lg rsdhbigkg bf jsg nimf, ei prfeqgrigkg, gl hpbpakp jsg Mgtfvá ef tp tpabpnf; rfe hkglserióe bp tpabó gb qpb hkfcgqp; ef qgeupl qgdfk ng éb. 

Bpl risnpngl ng kgcsuif

(Ed. 35.9-28)

NGSQGKFEFDIF 19

1 Rspenf Mgtfvá qs Nifl nglqksyp p bpl eprifegl rsyp qigkkp Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np p qi, y qú bpl tgkgngl, y tpaiqgl ge lsl risnpngl, y ge lsl rplpl; 2 qg phpkqpkál qkgl risnpngl ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hpkp jsg bp hflgpl. 3 Pkkgubpkál bfl rpdiefl, y nivinikál ge qkgl hpkqgl bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg npká ge tgkgnpn, y lgká hpkp jsg qfnf tfdirinp tsyp pbbí. 

4 Y glqg gl gb rplf ngb tfdirinp jsg tsiká pbbí, y viviká: pjsgb jsg tikigkg p ls hkómidf lie ieqgerióe y lie tpagk qgeinf gegdilqpn rfe éb peqgkifkdgeqg; 5 rfdf gb jsg csgkg rfe ls hkómidf pb dfeqg p rfkqpk bgñp, y pb npk ls dpef gb ufbhg rfe gb tprtp hpkp rfkqpk pbuúe bgñf, lpbqpkg gb tigkkf ngb rpaf, y nigkg rfeqkp ls hkómidf y élqg dskigkg; pjséb tsiká p sep ng glqpl risnpngl, y viviká; 6 ef lgp jsg gb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg, gecskgrinf, hgkliup pb tfdirinp, y bg pbrperg hfk lgk bpkuf gb rpdief, y bg tigkp ng dsgkqg, ef ngaigenf lgk rfengepnf p dsgkqg hfk rspeqf ef qgeíp gegdilqpn rfe ls hkómidf peqgkifkdgeqg. 7 Hfk qpeqf yf qg dpenf, nirigenf: Lghpkpkál qkgl risnpngl. 8 Y li Mgtfvá qs Nifl gelpertpkg qs qgkkiqfkif, rfdf bf mskó p qsl hpnkgl, y qg nigkg qfnp bp qigkkp jsg hkfdgqió npk p qsl hpnkgl, 9 ligdhkg y rspenf uspknpkgl qfnfl glqfl dpenpdigeqfl jsg yf qg hkglrkiaf tfy, hpkp hfegkbfl hfk fakp; jsg pdgl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl y pengl ge lsl rpdiefl qfnfl bfl nípl; geqfergl pñpnikál qkgl risnpngl dál p glqpl qkgl, 10 hpkp jsg ef lgp ngkkpdpnp lpeukg iefrgeqg ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hfk tgkgnpn, y ef lgpl rsbhpnf ng ngkkpdpdigeqf ng lpeukg. 

11 Hgkf li tsaigkg pbusef jsg pafkkgrigkg p ls hkómidf y bf prgrtpkg, y lg bgvpeqpkg rfeqkp éb y bf tikigkg ng dsgkqg, y dskigkg; li tsygkg p pbusep ng glqpl risnpngl, 12 geqfergl bfl peripefl ng ls risnpn gevipkáe y bf lprpkáe ng pbbí, y bf geqkgupkáe ge dpef ngb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg hpkp jsg dsgkp. 13 Ef bg rfdhpngrgkál; y jsiqpkál ng Ilkpgb bp lpeukg iefrgeqg, y qg iká aige. 

14 Ge bp tgkgnpn jsg hflgpl ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np, ef kgnsrikál bfl bídiqgl ng bp hkfhignpn ng qs hkómidf, jsg cimpkfe bfl peqiusfl. 

Bgygl lfakg gb qglqidfeif

15 Ef lg qfdpká ge rsgeqp p se lfbf qglqiuf rfeqkp eieusef ge rspbjsigk ngbiqf ei ge rspbjsigk hgrpnf, ge kgbprióe rfe rspbjsigkp fcgelp rfdgqinp. Lóbf hfk gb qglqidfeif ng nfl f qkgl qglqiufl lg dpeqgenká bp prslprióe. 16 Rspenf lg bgvpeqpkg qglqiuf cpblf rfeqkp pbusef, hpkp qglqicirpk rfeqkp éb, 17 geqfergl bfl nfl biqiupeqgl lg hkglgeqpkáe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y ngbpeqg ng bfl lprgknfqgl y ng bfl msgrgl jsg tsaigkg ge pjsgbbfl nípl. 18 Y bfl msgrgl iejsikikáe aige; y li pjsgb qglqiuf kglsbqpkg cpblf, y tsaigkg prslpnf cpblpdgeqg p ls tgkdpef, 19 geqfergl tpkéil p éb rfdf éb hgeló tprgk p ls tgkdpef; y jsiqpkál gb dpb ng ge dgnif ng qi. 20 Y bfl jsg jsgnpkge fikáe y qgdgkáe, y ef vfbvgkáe p tprgk dál sep dpbnpn lgdgmpeqg ge dgnif ng qi. 21 Y ef bg rfdhpngrgkál; vinp hfk vinp, fmf hfk fmf, nigeqg hfk nigeqg, dpef hfk dpef, hig hfk hig. 

Bgygl lfakg bp usgkkp

NGSQGKFEFDIF 20

1 Rspenf lpbupl p bp usgkkp rfeqkp qsl gegdiufl, li vigkgl rpapbbfl y rpkkfl, y se hsgabf dál ukpeng jsg qú, ef qgeupl qgdfk ng gbbfl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl glqá rfeqiuf, gb rspb qg lpró ng qigkkp ng Guihqf. 2 Y rspenf fl prgkjséil hpkp rfdapqik, lg hfenká ge hig gb lprgknfqg y tpabpká pb hsgabf, 3 y bgl niká: Fyg, Ilkpgb, vflfqkfl fl mseqáil tfy ge apqpbbp rfeqkp vsglqkfl gegdiufl; ef ngldpyg vsglqkf rfkpzóe, ef qgdáil, ei fl pzfkéil, ei qpdhfrf fl nglpbgeqéil ngbpeqg ng gbbfl; 4 hfkjsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl vp rfe vflfqkfl, hpkp hgbgpk hfk vflfqkfl rfeqkp vsglqkfl gegdiufl, hpkp lpbvpkfl. 5 Y bfl fciripbgl tpabpkáe pb hsgabf, nirigenf: ¿Jsiée tp gnicirpnf rplp esgvp, y ef bp tp glqkgepnf? Vpyp, y vsébvplg p ls rplp, ef lgp jsg dsgkp ge bp apqpbbp, y pbuúe fqkf bp glqkgeg. 6 ¿Y jsiée tp hbpeqpnf viñp, y ef tp nilcksqpnf ng gbbp? Vpyp, y vsébvplg p ls rplp, ef lgp jsg dsgkp ge bp apqpbbp, y pbuúe fqkf bp nilcksqg. 7 ¿Y jsiée lg tp nglhflpnf rfe dsmgk, y ef bp tp qfdpnf? Vpyp, y vsébvplg p ls rplp, ef lgp jsg dsgkp ge bp apqpbbp, y pbuúe fqkf bp qfdg. 8 Y vfbvgkáe bfl fciripbgl p tpabpk pb hsgabf, y nikáe: ¿Jsiée gl tfdakg dgnkflf y hslibáeidg? Vpyp, y vsébvplg p ls rplp, y ef phfjsg gb rfkpzóe ng lsl tgkdpefl, rfdf gb rfkpzóe lsyf. 9 Y rspenf bfl fciripbgl prpage ng tpabpk pb hsgabf, geqfergl bfl rphiqpegl ngb gmékriqf qfdpkáe gb dpenf p bp rpagzp ngb hsgabf. 

10 Rspenf qg prgkjsgl p sep risnpn hpkp rfdapqikbp, bg ieqidpkál bp hpz. 11 Y li kglhfenigkg: Hpz, y qg pakigkg, qfnf gb hsgabf jsg ge gbbp csgkg tpbbpnf qg lgká qkiasqpkif, y qg lgkviká. 12 Dpl li ef tirigkg hpz rfeqiuf, y gdhkgenigkg usgkkp rfeqiuf, geqfergl bp liqipkál. 13 Bsguf jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl bp geqkgusg ge qs dpef, tgkikál p qfnf vpkóe lsyf p cibf ng glhpnp. 14 Lfbpdgeqg bpl dsmgkgl y bfl eiñfl, y bfl peidpbgl, y qfnf bf jsg tpyp ge bp risnpn, qfnf ls afqíe qfdpkál hpkp qi; y rfdgkál ngb afqíe ng qsl gegdiufl, bfl rspbgl Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg geqkguó. 15 Plí tpkál p qfnpl bpl risnpngl jsg glqée dsy bgmfl ng qi, jsg ef lgpe ng bpl risnpngl ng glqpl eprifegl. 16 Hgkf ng bpl risnpngl ng glqfl hsgabfl jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hfk tgkgnpn, eieusep hgklfep ngmpkál rfe vinp, 17 lief jsg bfl nglqksikál rfdhbgqpdgeqg: pb tgqgf, pb pdfkkgf, pb rpepegf, pb cgkgzgf, pb tgvgf y pb mgaslgf, rfdf Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tp dpenpnf; 18 hpkp jsg ef fl gelgñge p tprgk lguúe qfnpl lsl pafdieprifegl jsg gbbfl tpe tgrtf hpkp lsl niflgl, y hgjséil rfeqkp Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

19 Rspenf liqigl p pbusep risnpn, hgbgpenf rfeqkp gbbp dsrtfl nípl hpkp qfdpkbp, ef nglqksikál lsl ákafbgl dgqigenf tprtp ge gbbfl, hfkjsg ng gbbfl hfnkál rfdgk; y ef bfl qpbpkál, hfkjsg gb ákafb ngb rpdhf ef gl tfdakg hpkp vgeik rfeqkp qi ge gb liqif. 20 Dpl gb ákafb jsg lghpl jsg ef bbgvp cksqf, hfnkál nglqksikbf y qpbpkbf, hpkp rfelqksik apbspkqg rfeqkp bp risnpn jsg qg tprg bp usgkkp, tplqp lfmszupkbp. 

Gxhiprióe ng se plgliepqf rsyf psqfk lg nglrfefrg

NGSQGKFEFDIF 21

1 Li ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hpkp jsg bp hflgpl, csgkg tpbbpnf pbusige dsgkqf, qgeninf ge gb rpdhf, y ef lg lshigkg jsiée bf dpqó, 2 geqfergl qsl peripefl y qsl msgrgl lpbnkáe y dgnikáe bp nilqperip tplqp bpl risnpngl jsg glqáe pbkgngnfk ngb dsgkqf. 3 Y bfl peripefl ng bp risnpn dál rgkrpep pb bsupk nfeng csgkg tpbbpnf gb dsgkqf, qfdpkáe ng bpl vprpl sep agrgkkp jsg ef tpyp qkpapmpnf, jsg ef tpyp bbgvpnf ysuf; 4 y bfl peripefl ng pjsgbbp risnpn qkpgkáe bp agrgkkp p se vpbbg glrpakflf, jsg eserp tpyp linf pkpnf ei lgdakpnf, y jsgakpkáe bp rgkviz ng bp agrgkkp pbbí ge gb vpbbg. 5 Geqfergl vgenkáe bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Bgví, hfkjsg p gbbfl glrfuió Mgtfvá qs Nifl hpkp jsg bg likvpe, y hpkp agengrik ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá; y hfk bp hpbpakp ng gbbfl lg ngriniká qfnp nilhsqp y qfnp fcgelp. 6 Y qfnfl bfl peripefl ng bp risnpn dál rgkrpep pb bsupk nfeng csgkg tpbbpnf gb dsgkqf bpvpkáe lsl dpefl lfakg bp agrgkkp rsyp rgkviz csg jsgakpnp ge gb vpbbg; 7 y hkfqglqpkáe y nikáe: Esglqkpl dpefl ef tpe ngkkpdpnf glqp lpeukg, ei esglqkfl fmfl bf tpe vilqf. 8 Hgknfep p qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, pb rspb kgnidilqg, ft Mgtfvá; y ef rsbhgl ng lpeukg iefrgeqg p qs hsgabf Ilkpgb. Y bp lpeukg bgl lgká hgknfepnp. 9 Y qú jsiqpkál bp rsbhp ng bp lpeukg iefrgeqg ng ge dgnif ng qi, rspenf tirigkgl bf jsg gl kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá. 

Nivgklpl bgygl

10 Rspenf lpbigkgl p bp usgkkp rfeqkp qsl gegdiufl, y Mgtfvá qs Nifl bfl geqkgupkg ge qs dpef, y qfdpkgl ng gbbfl rpsqivfl, 11 y vigkgl geqkg bfl rpsqivfl p pbusep dsmgk tgkdflp, y bp rfniripkgl, y bp qfdpkgl hpkp qi hfk dsmgk, 12 bp dgqgkál ge qs rplp; y gbbp kphpká ls rpagzp, y rfkqpká lsl sñpl, 13 y lg jsiqpká gb vglqinf ng ls rpsqivgkif, y lg jsgnpká ge qs rplp; y bbfkpká p ls hpnkg y p ls dpnkg se dgl geqgkf; y nglhsél hfnkál bbgupkqg p gbbp, y qú lgkál ls dpkinf, y gbbp lgká qs dsmgk. 14 Y li ef qg pukpnpkg, bp ngmpkál ge biagkqpn; ef bp vgengkál hfk niegkf, ei bp qkpqpkál rfdf glrbpvp, hfk rspeqf bp tsdibbplqg. 

15 Li se tfdakg qsvigkg nfl dsmgkgl, bp sep pdpnp y bp fqkp pafkkgrinp, y bp pdpnp y bp pafkkgrinp bg tsaigkge npnf timfl, y gb timf hkidfuéeiqf csgkg ng bp pafkkgrinp; 16 ge gb níp jsg tirigkg tgkgnpk p lsl timfl bf jsg qsvigkg, ef hfnká npk gb ngkgrtf ng hkidfugeiqskp pb timf ng bp pdpnp rfe hkgcgkgerip pb timf ng bp pafkkgrinp, jsg gl gb hkidfuéeiqf; 17 dpl pb timf ng bp pafkkgrinp kgrfefrgká rfdf hkidfuéeiqf, hpkp npkbg gb nfabg ng bf jsg rfkkglhfenigkg p rpnp sef ng bfl ngdál; hfkjsg éb gl gb hkierihif ng ls viufk, y lsyf gl gb ngkgrtf ng bp hkidfugeiqskp. 

18 Li pbusef qsvigkg se timf rfeqsdpz y kgagbng, jsg ef fagngrigkg p bp vfz ng ls hpnkg ei p bp vfz ng ls dpnkg, y tpaiéenfbg rplqiupnf, ef bgl fagngrigkg; 19 geqfergl bf qfdpkáe ls hpnkg y ls dpnkg, y bf lprpkáe peqg bfl peripefl ng ls risnpn, y p bp hsgkqp ngb bsupk nfeng vivp; 20 y nikáe p bfl peripefl ng bp risnpn: Glqg esglqkf timf gl rfeqsdpz y kgagbng, ef fagngrg p esglqkp vfz; gl ubfqóe y afkkprtf. 21 Geqfergl qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng ls risnpn bf phgnkgpkáe, y dfkiká; plí jsiqpkál gb dpb ng ge dgnif ng qi, y qfnf Ilkpgb fiká, y qgdgká. 

22 Li pbusef tsaigkg rfdgqinf pbuúe rkidge niuef ng dsgkqg, y bf tirigkgil dfkik, y bf rfbupkgil ge se dpngkf, 23 ef ngmpkéil jsg ls rsgkhf hplg bp efrtg lfakg gb dpngkf; lie cpbqp bf geqgkkpkál gb dildf níp, hfkjsg dpbniqf hfk Nifl gl gb rfbupnf; y ef rfeqpdiepkál qs qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hfk tgkgnpn. 

NGSQGKFEFDIF 22
