1 Li vigkgl gxqkpvipnf gb asgy ng qs tgkdpef, f ls rfkngkf, ef bg egupkál qs pysnp; bf vfbvgkál p qs tgkdpef. 2 Y li qs tgkdpef ef csgkg qs vgrief, f ef bf rfefrigkgl, bf kgrfugkál ge qs rplp, y glqpká rfeqiuf tplqp jsg qs tgkdpef bf asljsg, y lg bf ngvfbvgkál. 3 Plí tpkál rfe ls plef, plí tpkál qpdaiée rfe ls vglqinf, y bf dildf tpkál rfe qfnp rflp ng qs tgkdpef jsg lg bg hgknigkg y qú bp tpbbpkgl; ef hfnkál egupkbg qs pysnp. 4 Li vigkgl gb plef ng qs tgkdpef, f ls asgy, rpínf ge gb rpdief, ef qg phpkqpkál ng éb; bg pysnpkál p bgvpeqpkbf. 

5 Ef vglqiká bp dsmgk qkpmg ng tfdakg, ei gb tfdakg vglqiká kfhp ng dsmgk; hfkjsg pafdieprióe gl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl rspbjsigkp jsg glqf tprg. 

6 Rspenf gersgeqkgl hfk gb rpdief pbuúe einf ng pvg ge rspbjsigk ákafb, f lfakg bp qigkkp, rfe hfbbfl f tsgvfl, y bp dpnkg grtpnp lfakg bfl hfbbfl f lfakg bfl tsgvfl, ef qfdpkál bp dpnkg rfe bfl timfl. 7 Ngmpkál ik p bp dpnkg, y qfdpkál bfl hfbbfl hpkp qi, hpkp jsg qg vpyp aige, y hkfbfeusgl qsl nípl. 

8 Rspenf gnicijsgl rplp esgvp, tpkál hkgqib p qs qgkkpnf, hpkp jsg ef grtgl rsbhp ng lpeukg lfakg qs rplp, li ng éb rpygkg pbusef. 

9 Ef lgdakpkál qs viñp rfe lgdibbpl nivgklpl, ef lgp jsg lg higknp qfnf, qpeqf bp lgdibbp jsg lgdakplqg rfdf gb cksqf ng bp viñp. 10 Ef pkpkál rfe asgy y rfe plef mseqpdgeqg. 11 Ef vglqikál kfhp ng bpep y bief mseqpdgeqg. 

12 Qg tpkál cbgrfl ge bpl rspqkf hseqpl ng qs dpeqf rfe jsg qg rsakpl. 

Bgygl lfakg bp rplqinpn

13 Rspenf pbusef qfdpkg dsmgk, y nglhsél ng tpagklg bbgupnf p gbbp bp pafkkgrigkg, 14 y bg pqkiasygkg cpbqpl jsg nge jsg tpabpk, y nimgkg: P glqp dsmgk qfdé, y dg bbgusé p gbbp, y ef bp tpbbé vikuge; 15 geqfergl gb hpnkg ng bp mfvge y ls dpnkg qfdpkáe y lprpkáe bpl lgñpbgl ng bp vikuieinpn ng bp nfergbbp p bfl peripefl ng bp risnpn, ge bp hsgkqp; 16 y niká gb hpnkg ng bp mfvge p bfl peripefl: Yf ni di timp p glqg tfdakg hfk dsmgk, y éb bp pafkkgrg; 17 y tg pjsí, éb bg pqkiasyg cpbqpl jsg npe jsg tpabpk, nirigenf: Ef tg tpbbpnf vikuge p qs timp; hgkf vgn pjsí bpl lgñpbgl ng bp vikuieinpn ng di timp. Y gxqgengkáe bp vglqinskp ngbpeqg ng bfl peripefl ng bp risnpn. 18 Geqfergl bfl peripefl ng bp risnpn qfdpkáe pb tfdakg y bf rplqiupkáe; 19 y bg dsbqpkáe ge rige higzpl ng hbpqp, bpl rspbgl npkáe pb hpnkg ng bp mfvge, hfk rspeqf glhpkrió dpbp cpdp lfakg sep vikuge ng Ilkpgb; y bp qgenká hfk dsmgk, y ef hfnká nglhgnikbp ge qfnfl lsl nípl. 20 Dpl li kglsbqpkg lgk vgknpn jsg ef lg tpbbó vikuieinpn ge bp mfvge, 21 geqfergl bp lprpkáe p bp hsgkqp ng bp rplp ng ls hpnkg, y bp phgnkgpkáe bfl tfdakgl ng ls risnpn, y dfkiká, hfk rspeqf tizf vibgzp ge Ilkpgb cfkeirpenf ge rplp ng ls hpnkg; plí jsiqpkál gb dpb ng ge dgnif ng qi. 

22 Li csgkg lfkhkgeninf pbusef prflqpnf rfe sep dsmgk rplpnp rfe dpkinf, pdafl dfkikáe, gb tfdakg jsg lg prflqó rfe bp dsmgk, y bp dsmgk qpdaiée; plí jsiqpkál gb dpb ng Ilkpgb. 

23 Li tsaigkg sep dsrtprtp vikuge nglhflpnp rfe pbusef, y pbusef bp tpbbpkg ge bp risnpn, y lg prflqpkg rfe gbbp; 24 geqfergl bfl lprpkéil p pdafl p bp hsgkqp ng bp risnpn, y bfl phgnkgpkéil, y dfkikáe; bp mfvge hfkjsg ef nif vfrgl ge bp risnpn, y gb tfdakg hfkjsg tsdibbó p bp dsmgk ng ls hkómidf; plí jsiqpkál gb dpb ng ge dgnif ng qi. 

25 Dpl li se tfdakg tpbbpkg ge gb rpdhf p bp mfvge nglhflpnp, y bp cfkzpkg pjsgb tfdakg, prflqáenflg rfe gbbp, dfkiká lfbpdgeqg gb tfdakg jsg lg prflqó rfe gbbp; 26 dpl p bp mfvge ef bg tpkál epnp; ef tpy ge gbbp rsbhp ng dsgkqg; hsgl rfdf rspenf pbusef lg bgvpeqp rfeqkp ls hkómidf y bg jsiqp bp vinp, plí gl ge glqg rplf. 27 Hfkjsg éb bp tpbbó ge gb rpdhf; nif vfrgl bp mfvge nglhflpnp, y ef tsaf jsige bp biakplg. 

28 Rspenf pbuúe tfdakg tpbbpkg p sep mfvge vikuge jsg ef csgkg nglhflpnp, y bp qfdpkg y lg prflqpkg rfe gbbp, y csgkge nglrsaigkqfl; 29 geqfergl gb tfdakg jsg lg prflqó rfe gbbp npká pb hpnkg ng bp mfvge riersgeqp higzpl ng hbpqp, y gbbp lgká ls dsmgk, hfk rspeqf bp tsdibbó; ef bp hfnká nglhgnik ge qfnfl lsl nípl. 

30 Eieusef qfdpká bp dsmgk ng ls hpnkg, ei hkfcpepká gb bgrtf ng ls hpnkg. 

Bfl gxrbsinfl ng bp rfeukguprióe

NGSQGKFEFDIF 23

1 Ef geqkpká ge bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá gb jsg qgeup dpusbbpnfl bfl qglqírsbfl, f pdhsqpnf ls digdakf vikib. 

2 Ef geqkpká aplqpknf ge bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá; ei tplqp bp néridp ugegkprióe ef geqkpkáe ge bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá. 

3 Ef geqkpká pdfeiqp ei dfpaiqp ge bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá, ei tplqp bp néridp ugegkprióe ng gbbfl; ef geqkpkáe ge bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá hpkp ligdhkg, 4 hfk rspeqf ef fl lpbigkfe p kgriaik rfe hpe y pusp pb rpdief, rspenf lpbilqgil ng Guihqf, y hfkjsg pbjsibpkfe rfeqkp qi p Apbppd timf ng Agfk, ng Hgqfk ge Dglfhfqpdip, hpkp dpbngrikqg. 5 Dpl ef jsilf Mgtfvá qs Nifl fík p Apbppd; y Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg rfevikqió bp dpbnirióe ge agenirióe, hfkjsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg pdpap. 6 Ef hkfrskpkál bp hpz ng gbbfl ei ls aige ge qfnfl bfl nípl hpkp ligdhkg. 

7 Ef pafkkgrgkál pb gnfdiqp, hfkjsg gl qs tgkdpef; ef pafkkgrgkál pb guihrif, hfkjsg cfkplqgkf csilqg ge ls qigkkp. 8 Bfl timfl jsg eprigkge ng gbbfl, ge bp qgkrgkp ugegkprióe geqkpkáe ge bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá. 

Bgygl lpeiqpkipl

9 Rspenf lpbigkgl p rpdhpñp rfeqkp qsl gegdiufl, qg uspknpkál ng qfnp rflp dpbp. 

10 Li tsaigkg ge dgnif ng qi pbusef jsg ef csgkg bidhif, hfk kpzóe ng pbusep idhskgzp prfeqgrinp ng efrtg, lpbnká csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf, y ef geqkpká ge éb. 11 Hgkf pb rpgk bp efrtg lg bpvpká rfe pusp, y rspenf lg tsaigkg hsglqf gb lfb, hfnká geqkpk ge gb rpdhpdgeqf. 

12 Qgenkál se bsupk csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf pnfeng lpbupl; 13 qgenkál qpdaiée geqkg qsl pkdpl sep glqprp; y rspenf glqsvigkgl pbbí csgkp, rpvpkál rfe gbbp, y bsguf pb vfbvgkqg rsakikál qs gxrkgdgeqf; 14 hfkjsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl penp ge dgnif ng qs rpdhpdgeqf, hpkp biakpkqg y hpkp geqkgupk p qsl gegdiufl ngbpeqg ng qi; hfk qpeqf, qs rpdhpdgeqf tp ng lgk lpeqf, hpkp jsg éb ef vgp ge qi rflp iedsenp, y lg vsgbvp ng ge hfl ng qi. 

Bgygl tsdpeiqpkipl

15 Ef geqkgupkál p ls lgñfk gb ligkvf jsg lg tsygkg p qi ng ls pdf. 16 Dfkpká rfeqiuf, ge dgnif ng qi, ge gb bsupk jsg glrfuigkg ge pbusep ng qsl risnpngl, nfeng p aige qsvigkg; ef bg fhkidikál. 

17 Ef tpyp kpdgkp ng geqkg bpl timpl ng Ilkpgb, ei tpyp lfnfdiqp ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 18 Ef qkpgkál bp hpup ng sep kpdgkp ei gb hkgrif ng se hgkkf p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl hfk eieuúe vfqf; hfkjsg pafdieprióe gl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl qpeqf bf sef rfdf bf fqkf. 

19 Ef gxiuikál ng qs tgkdpef ieqgkél ng niegkf, ei ieqgkél ng rfdglqiabgl, ei ng rflp pbusep ng jsg lg lsgbg gxiuik ieqgkél. 20 Ngb gxqkpñf hfnkál gxiuik ieqgkél, dpl ng qs tgkdpef ef bf gxiuikál, hpkp jsg qg ageniup Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge qfnp fakp ng qsl dpefl ge bp qigkkp pnfeng vpl hpkp qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp. 

21 Rspenf tprgl vfqf p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, ef qpkngl ge hpupkbf; hfkjsg rigkqpdgeqg bf ngdpenpká Mgtfvá qs Nifl ng qi, y lgkíp hgrpnf ge qi. 22 Dpl rspenf qg palqgeupl ng hkfdgqgk, ef tpaká ge qi hgrpnf. 23 Hgkf bf jsg tsaigkg lpbinf ng qsl bpaifl, bf uspknpkál y bf rsdhbikál, rfecfkdg bf hkfdgqilqg p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, hpupenf bp fckgenp vfbseqpkip jsg hkfdgqilqg rfe qs afrp. 

24 Rspenf geqkgl ge bp viñp ng qs hkómidf, hfnkál rfdgk svpl tplqp lpripkqg; dpl ef hfenkál ge qs rglqf. 25 Rspenf geqkgl ge bp digl ng qs hkómidf, hfnkál pkkperpk glhiupl rfe qs dpef; dpl ef phbirpkál tfz p bp digl ng qs hkómidf. 

NGSQGKFEFDIF 24

1 Rspenf pbusef qfdpkg dsmgk y lg rplpkg rfe gbbp, li ef bg pukpnpkg hfk tpagk tpbbpnf ge gbbp pbusep rflp iengrgeqg, bg glrkiaiká rpkqp ng nivfkrif, y lg bp geqkgupká ge ls dpef, y bp nglhgniká ng ls rplp. 2 Y lpbinp ng ls rplp, hfnká ik y rplpklg rfe fqkf tfdakg. 3 Hgkf li bp pafkkgrigkg glqg úbqidf, y bg glrkiaigkg rpkqp ng nivfkrif, y lg bp geqkgupkg ge ls dpef, y bp nglhinigkg ng ls rplp; f li tsaigkg dsgkqf gb hflqkgk tfdakg jsg bp qfdó hfk dsmgk, 4 ef hfnká ls hkidgk dpkinf, jsg bp nglhinió, vfbvgkbp p qfdpk hpkp jsg lgp ls dsmgk, nglhsél jsg csg gevibgrinp; hfkjsg gl pafdieprióe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y ef tpl ng hgkvgkqik bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hfk tgkgnpn. 

5 Rspenf pbusef csgkg kgriée rplpnf, ef lpbnká p bp usgkkp, ei ge eieusep rflp lg bg frshpká; biakg glqpká ge ls rplp hfk se pñf, hpkp pbgukpk p bp dsmgk jsg qfdó. 

6 Ef qfdpkál ge hkgenp bp dsgbp ngb dfbief, ei bp ng papmf ei bp ng pkkiap; hfkjsg lgkíp qfdpk ge hkgenp bp vinp ngb tfdakg. 

7 Rspenf csgkg tpbbpnf pbusef jsg tsaigkg tskqpnf p sef ng lsl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y bg tsaigkg glrbpvizpnf, f bg tsaigkg vgeninf, dfkiká gb qpb bpnkóe, y jsiqpkál gb dpb ng ge dgnif ng qi. 

8 Ge rspeqf p bp hbpup ng bp bghkp, qge rsinpnf ng falgkvpk nibiugeqgdgeqg y tprgk lguúe qfnf bf jsg fl gelgñpkge bfl lprgknfqgl bgviqpl; lguúe yf bgl tg dpenpnf, plí rsinpkéil ng tprgk. 9 Prséknpqg ng bf jsg tizf Mgtfvá qs Nifl p Dpkíp ge gb rpdief, nglhsél jsg lpbilqgil ng Guihqf. 

10 Rspenf geqkgupkgl p qs hkómidf pbusep rflp hkglqpnp, ef geqkpkál ge ls rplp hpkp qfdpkbg hkgenp. 11 Qg jsgnpkál csgkp, y gb tfdakg p jsige hkglqplqg qg lprpká bp hkgenp. 12 Y li gb tfdakg csgkg hfakg, ef qg prflqpkál kgqgeigenf púe ls hkgenp. 13 Lie cpbqp bg ngvfbvgkál bp hkgenp rspenf gb lfb lg hfeup, hpkp jsg hsgnp nfkdik ge ls kfhp, y qg ageniup; y qg lgká mslqirip ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 

14 Ef fhkidikál pb mfkepbgkf hfakg y dgeglqgkflf, yp lgp ng qsl tgkdpefl f ng bfl gxqkpemgkfl jsg tpaiqpe ge qs qigkkp ngeqkf ng qsl risnpngl. 15 Ge ls níp bg npkál ls mfkepb, y ef lg hfenká gb lfb lie náklgbf; hsgl gl hfakg, y rfe éb lslqgeqp ls vinp; hpkp jsg ef rbpdg rfeqkp qi p Mgtfvá, y lgp ge qi hgrpnf. 

16 Bfl hpnkgl ef dfkikáe hfk bfl timfl, ei bfl timfl hfk bfl hpnkgl; rpnp sef dfkiká hfk ls hgrpnf. 

17 Ef qfkrgkál gb ngkgrtf ngb gxqkpemgkf ei ngb tsékcpef, ei qfdpkál ge hkgenp bp kfhp ng bp visnp, 18 lief jsg qg prfknpkál jsg csilqg ligkvf ge Guihqf, y jsg ng pbbí qg kglrpqó Mgtfvá qs Nifl; hfk qpeqf, yf qg dpenf jsg tpupl glqf. 

19 Rspenf ligusgl qs digl ge qs rpdhf, y fbvingl pbusep upvibbp ge gb rpdhf, ef vfbvgkál hpkp kgrfugkbp; lgká hpkp gb gxqkpemgkf, hpkp gb tsékcpef y hpkp bp visnp; hpkp jsg qg ageniup Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge qfnp fakp ng qsl dpefl. 20 Rspenf lprsnpl qsl fbivfl, ef kgrfkkgkál bpl kpdpl jsg tpypl ngmpnf qkpl ng qi; lgkáe hpkp gb gxqkpemgkf, hpkp gb tsékcpef y hpkp bp visnp. 21 Rspenf vgenidigl qs viñp, ef kgaslrpkál qkpl ng qi; lgká hpkp gb gxqkpemgkf, hpkp gb tsékcpef y hpkp bp visnp. 22 Y prséknpqg jsg csilqg ligkvf ge qigkkp ng Guihqf; hfk qpeqf, yf qg dpenf jsg tpupl glqf. 

NGSQGKFEFDIF 25

1 Li tsaigkg hbgiqf geqkg pbusefl, y prsnigkge pb qkiasepb hpkp jsg bfl msgrgl bfl mszusge, élqfl palfbvgkáe pb mslqf, y rfengepkáe pb rsbhpabg. 2 Y li gb ngbiersgeqg dgkgrigkg lgk pzfqpnf, geqfergl gb msgz bg tpká grtpk ge qigkkp, y bg tpká pzfqpk ge ls hkglgerip; lguúe ls ngbiqf lgká gb eúdgkf ng pzfqgl. 3 Lg hfnká npk rspkgeqp pzfqgl, ef dál; ef lgp jsg, li bf tikigkge rfe dsrtfl pzfqgl dál jsg élqfl, lg ligeqp qs tgkdpef gevibgrinf ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl. 

4 Ef hfenkál afzpb pb asgy rspenf qkibbpkg. 

5 Rspenf tgkdpefl tpaiqpkge mseqfl, y dskigkg pbusef ng gbbfl, y ef qsvigkg timf, bp dsmgk ngb dsgkqf ef lg rplpká csgkp rfe tfdakg gxqkpñf; ls rsñpnf lg bbgupká p gbbp, y bp qfdpká hfk ls dsmgk, y tpká rfe gbbp hpkgeqglrf. 6 Y gb hkidfuéeiqf jsg gbbp nigkg p bsz lsrgngká ge gb efdakg ng ls tgkdpef dsgkqf, hpkp jsg gb efdakg ng élqg ef lgp afkkpnf ng Ilkpgb. 7 Y li gb tfdakg ef jsiligkg qfdpk p ls rsñpnp, iká geqfergl ls rsñpnp p bp hsgkqp, p bfl peripefl, y niká: Di rsñpnf ef jsigkg lslriqpk efdakg ge Ilkpgb p ls tgkdpef; ef jsigkg gdhpkgeqpk rfediuf. 8 Geqfergl bfl peripefl ng pjsgbbp risnpn bf tpkáe vgeik, y tpabpkáe rfe éb; y li éb lg bgvpeqpkg y nimgkg: Ef jsigkf qfdpkbp, 9 lg prgkrpká geqfergl ls rsñpnp p éb ngbpeqg ng bfl peripefl, y bg jsiqpká gb rpbzpnf ngb hig, y bg glrshiká ge gb kflqkf, y tpabpká y niká: Plí lgká tgrtf pb vpkóe jsg ef jsigkg gnicirpk bp rplp ng ls tgkdpef. 10 Y lg bg npká glqg efdakg ge Ilkpgb: Bp rplp ngb nglrpbzpnf. 

11 Li pbusefl kiñgkge sef rfe fqkf, y lg prgkrpkg bp dsmgk ng sef hpkp biakpk p ls dpkinf ng dpef ngb jsg bg tigkg, y pbpkupenf ls dpef pligkg ng lsl hpkqgl vgkufezflpl, 12 bg rfkqpkál geqfergl bp dpef; ef bp hgknfepkál. 

13 Ef qgenkál ge qs afblp hglp ukpeng y hglp rtirp, 14 ei qgenkál ge qs rplp gcp ukpeng y gcp hgjsgñf. 15 Hglp gxprqp y mslqp qgenkál; gcp rpapb y mslqf qgenkál, hpkp jsg qsl nípl lgpe hkfbfeupnfl lfakg bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np. 16 Hfkjsg pafdieprióe gl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl rspbjsigkp jsg tprg glqf, y rspbjsigkp jsg tprg iemslqirip. 

Fknge ng gxqgkdiepk p Pdpbgr

17 Prséknpqg ng bf jsg tizf Pdpbgr rfeqiuf ge gb rpdief, rspenf lpbípl ng Guihqf; 18 ng ródf qg lpbió pb gersgeqkf ge gb rpdief, y qg nglapkpqó bp kgqpuspknip ng qfnfl bfl néaibgl jsg iape ngqkál ng qi, rspenf qú glqpapl rpelpnf y qkpapmpnf; y ef qsvf eieuúe qgdfk ng Nifl. 19 Hfk qpeqf, rspenf Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg né nglrpelf ng qfnfl qsl gegdiufl pbkgngnfk, ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hfk tgkgnpn hpkp jsg bp hflgpl, afkkpkál bp dgdfkip ng Pdpbgr ng ngapmf ngb rigbf; ef bf fbvingl. 

Hkidiripl y nigzdfl

NGSQGKFEFDIF 26

1 Rspenf tpypl geqkpnf ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np hfk tgkgerip, y qfdgl hflglióe ng gbbp y bp tpaiqgl, 2 geqfergl qfdpkál ng bpl hkidiripl ng qfnfl bfl cksqfl jsg lprpkgl ng bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np, y bpl hfenkál ge sep rpeplqp, g ikál pb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl glrfuigkg hpkp tprgk tpaiqpk pbbí ls efdakg. 3 Y qg hkglgeqpkál pb lprgknfqg jsg tsaigkg ge pjsgbbfl nípl, y bg nikál: Ngrbpkf tfy p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, jsg tg geqkpnf ge bp qigkkp jsg mskó Mgtfvá p esglqkfl hpnkgl jsg efl npkíp. 4 Y gb lprgknfqg qfdpká bp rpeplqp ng qs dpef, y bp hfenká ngbpeqg ngb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 

5 Geqfergl tpabpkál y nikál ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl: Se pkpdgf p hseqf ng hgkgrgk csg di hpnkg, gb rspb nglrgenió p Guihqf y tpaiqó pbbí rfe hfrfl tfdakgl, y pbbí rkgrió y bbguó p lgk sep eprióe ukpeng, csgkqg y esdgkflp; 6 y bfl guihrifl efl dpbqkpqpkfe y efl pcbiuigkfe, y hsligkfe lfakg eflfqkfl nskp lgkvinsdakg. 7 Y rbpdpdfl p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng esglqkfl hpnkgl; y Mgtfvá fyó esglqkp vfz, y vif esglqkp pcbirrióe, esglqkf qkpapmf y esglqkp fhkglióe; 8 y Mgtfvá efl lpró ng Guihqf rfe dpef csgkqg, rfe akpzf gxqgeninf, rfe ukpeng glhpeqf, y rfe lgñpbgl y rfe dibpukfl; 9 y efl qkpmf p glqg bsupk, y efl nif glqp qigkkp, qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb. 10 Y ptfkp, tg pjsí tg qkpínf bpl hkidiripl ngb cksqf ng bp qigkkp jsg dg nilqg, ft Mgtfvá. Y bf ngmpkál ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y pnfkpkál ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 11 Y qg pbgukpkál ge qfnf gb aige jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tpyp npnf p qi y p qs rplp, plí qú rfdf gb bgviqp y gb gxqkpemgkf jsg glqá ge dgnif ng qi. 

12 Rspenf prpagl ng nigzdpk qfnf gb nigzdf ng qsl cksqfl ge gb pñf qgkrgkf, gb pñf ngb nigzdf, npkál qpdaiée pb bgviqp, pb gxqkpemgkf, pb tsékcpef y p bp visnp; y rfdgkáe ge qsl pbngpl, y lg lpripkáe. 13 Y nikál ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl: Tg lprpnf bf rfelpukpnf ng di rplp, y qpdaiée bf tg npnf pb bgviqp, pb gxqkpemgkf, pb tsékcpef y p bp visnp, rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg dg tpl dpenpnf; ef tg qkpelukgninf qsl dpenpdigeqfl, ei dg tg fbvinpnf ng gbbfl. 14 Ef tg rfdinf ng gbbf ge di bsqf, ei tg uplqpnf ng gbbf glqpenf yf iedsenf, ei ng gbbf tg fckgrinf p bfl dsgkqfl; tg fagngrinf p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá di Nifl, tg tgrtf rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg dg tpl dpenpnf. 15 Dikp nglng qs dfkpnp lpeqp, nglng gb rigbf, y agenirg p qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, y p bp qigkkp jsg efl tpl npnf, rfdf mskplqg p esglqkfl hpnkgl, qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb. 

16 Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg dpenp tfy jsg rsdhbpl glqfl glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl; rsinp, hsgl, ng hfegkbfl hfk fakp rfe qfnf qs rfkpzóe y rfe qfnp qs pbdp. 17 Tpl ngrbpkpnf lfbgdegdgeqg tfy jsg Mgtfvá gl qs Nifl, y jsg penpkál ge lsl rpdiefl, y uspknpkál lsl glqpqsqfl, lsl dpenpdigeqfl y lsl ngrkgqfl, y jsg glrsrtpkál ls vfz. 18 Y Mgtfvá tp ngrbpkpnf tfy jsg qú gkgl hsgabf lsyf, ng ls gxrbslivp hflglióe, rfdf qg bf tp hkfdgqinf, hpkp jsg uspkngl qfnfl lsl dpenpdigeqfl; 19 p cie ng gxpbqpkqg lfakg qfnpl bpl eprifegl jsg tizf, hpkp bffk y cpdp y ubfkip, y hpkp jsg lgpl se hsgabf lpeqf p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, rfdf éb tp nirtf. 

Fknge ng glrkiaik bp bgy ge hignkpl lfakg gb Dfeqg Gapb

NGSQGKFEFDIF 27

1 Fkngeó Dfilél, rfe bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb, pb hsgabf, nirigenf: Uspknpkéil qfnfl bfl dpenpdigeqfl jsg yf fl hkglrkiaf tfy. 2 Y gb níp jsg hplgl gb Mfknáe p bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np, bgvpeqpkál hignkpl ukpengl, y bpl kgvfrpkál rfe rpb; 3 y glrkiaikál ge gbbpl qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp bgy, rspenf tpypl hplpnf hpkp geqkpk ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np, qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb, rfdf Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng qsl hpnkgl qg tp nirtf. 4 Rspenf, hsgl, tpypl hplpnf gb Mfknáe, bgvpeqpkál glqpl hignkpl jsg yf fl dpenf tfy, ge gb dfeqg Gapb, y bpl kgvfrpkál rfe rpb; 5 y gnicirpkál pbbí se pbqpk p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, pbqpk ng hignkpl; ef pbzpkál lfakg gbbpl ielqksdgeqf ng tigkkf. 6 Ng hignkpl geqgkpl gnicirpkál gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y fckgrgkál lfakg éb tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá qs Nifl; 7 y lprkicirpkál fckgenpl ng hpz, y rfdgkál pbbí, y qg pbgukpkál ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 8 Y glrkiaikál dsy rbpkpdgeqg ge bpl hignkpl qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp bgy. 

9 Y Dfilél, rfe bfl lprgknfqgl bgviqpl, tpabó p qfnf Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Uspknp libgerif y glrsrtp, ft Ilkpgb; tfy tpl vgeinf p lgk hsgabf ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 10 Fikál, hsgl, bp vfz ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y rsdhbikál lsl dpenpdigeqfl y lsl glqpqsqfl, jsg yf qg fkngef tfy. 

Bpl dpbnirifegl ge gb dfeqg Gapb

11 Y dpenó Dfilél pb hsgabf ge pjsgb níp, nirigenf: 12 Rspenf tpypl hplpnf gb Mfknáe, élqfl glqpkáe lfakg gb dfeqg Ugkizid hpkp agengrik pb hsgabf: Lidgóe, Bgví, Msná, Ilprpk, Mflé y Agempdíe. 13 Y élqfl glqpkáe lfakg gb dfeqg Gapb hpkp hkfeseripk bp dpbnirióe: Ksaée, Upn, Plgk, Zpasbóe, Npe y Egcqpbí. 14 Y tpabpkáe bfl bgviqpl, y nikáe p qfnf vpkóe ng Ilkpgb ge pbqp vfz: 

15 Dpbniqf gb tfdakg jsg tirigkg glrsbqskp f idpuge ng csenirióe, pafdieprióe p Mgtfvá, fakp ng dpef ng pkqícirg, y bp hsligkg ge frsbqf. Y qfnf gb hsgabf kglhfengká y niká: Pdée. 

16 Dpbniqf gb jsg ngltfekpkg p ls hpnkg f p ls dpnkg. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

17 Dpbniqf gb jsg kgnsmgkg gb bídiqg ng ls hkómidf. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

18 Dpbniqf gb jsg tirigkg gkkpk pb riguf ge gb rpdief. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

19 Dpbniqf gb jsg hgkvikqigkg gb ngkgrtf ngb gxqkpemgkf, ngb tsékcpef y ng bp visnp. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

20 Dpbniqf gb jsg lg prflqpkg rfe bp dsmgk ng ls hpnkg, hfk rspeqf nglrsakió gb kgupzf ng ls hpnkg. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

21 Dpbniqf gb jsg lg pyseqpkg rfe rspbjsigk aglqip. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

22 Dpbniqf gb jsg lg prflqpkg rfe ls tgkdpep, timp ng ls hpnkg, f timp ng ls dpnkg. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

23 Dpbniqf gb jsg lg prflqpkg rfe ls lsgukp. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

24 Dpbniqf gb jsg tikigkg p ls hkómidf frsbqpdgeqg. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

25 Dpbniqf gb jsg kgriaigkg lfafkef hpkp jsiqpk bp vinp pb iefrgeqg. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

26 Dpbniqf gb jsg ef rfecikdpkg bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp bgy hpkp tprgkbpl. Y niká qfnf gb hsgabf: Pdée. 

Agenirifegl ng bp fagnigerip

(Bv. 26.3-13; Nq. 7.12-24)

NGSQGKFEFDIF 28

1 Prfeqgrgká jsg li fygkgl pqgeqpdgeqg bp vfz ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, hpkp uspknpk y hfegk hfk fakp qfnfl lsl dpenpdigeqfl jsg yf qg hkglrkiaf tfy, qpdaiée Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg gxpbqpká lfakg qfnpl bpl eprifegl ng bp qigkkp. 2 Y vgenkáe lfakg qi qfnpl glqpl agenirifegl, y qg pbrpezpkáe, li fygkgl bp vfz ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 3 Ageniqf lgkál qú ge bp risnpn, y ageniqf qú ge gb rpdhf. 4 Ageniqf gb cksqf ng qs vigeqkg, gb cksqf ng qs qigkkp, gb cksqf ng qsl aglqipl, bp rkíp ng qsl vprpl y bfl kgapñfl ng qsl fvgmpl. 5 Ageniqpl lgkáe qs rpeplqp y qs pkqglp ng pdplpk. 6 Ageniqf lgkál ge qs geqkpk, y ageniqf ge qs lpbik. 

7 Mgtfvá ngkkfqpká p qsl gegdiufl jsg lg bgvpeqpkge rfeqkp qi; hfk se rpdief lpbnkáe rfeqkp qi, y hfk ligqg rpdiefl tsikáe ng ngbpeqg ng qi. 8 Mgtfvá qg gevipká ls agenirióe lfakg qsl ukpegkfl, y lfakg qfnf pjsgbbf ge jsg hsligkgl qs dpef; y qg agengriká ge bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg np. 9 Qg rfecikdpká Mgtfvá hfk hsgabf lpeqf lsyf, rfdf qg bf tp mskpnf, rspenf uspknpkgl bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y pensvigkgl ge lsl rpdiefl. 10 Y vgkáe qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp jsg gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá gl ievfrpnf lfakg qi, y qg qgdgkáe. 11 Y qg tpká Mgtfvá lfakgpasenpk ge aigegl, ge gb cksqf ng qs vigeqkg, ge gb cksqf ng qs aglqip, y ge gb cksqf ng qs qigkkp, ge gb hpíl jsg Mgtfvá mskó p qsl hpnkgl jsg qg tpaíp ng npk. 12 Qg pakiká Mgtfvá ls asge qglfkf, gb rigbf, hpkp gevipk bp bbsvip p qs qigkkp ge ls qigdhf, y hpkp agengrik qfnp fakp ng qsl dpefl. Y hkglqpkál p dsrtpl eprifegl, y qú ef hgnikál hkglqpnf. 13 Qg hfenká Mgtfvá hfk rpagzp, y ef hfk rfbp; y glqpkál geridp lfbpdgeqg, y ef glqpkál ngapmf, li fagngrigkgl bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, jsg yf qg fkngef tfy, hpkp jsg bfl uspkngl y rsdhbpl, 14 y li ef qg phpkqpkgl ng qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg yf qg dpenf tfy, ei p niglqkp ei p lieiglqkp, hpkp ik qkpl niflgl pmgefl y lgkvikbgl. 

Rfelgrsgeripl ng bp nglfagnigerip

(Bv. 26.14-46)

15 Hgkf prfeqgrgká, li ef fygkgl bp vfz ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, hpkp hkfrskpk rsdhbik qfnfl lsl dpenpdigeqfl y lsl glqpqsqfl jsg yf qg ieqidf tfy, jsg vgenkáe lfakg qi qfnpl glqpl dpbnirifegl, y qg pbrpezpkáe. 16 Dpbniqf lgkál qú ge bp risnpn, y dpbniqf ge gb rpdhf. 17 Dpbniqp qs rpeplqp, y qs pkqglp ng pdplpk. 18 Dpbniqf gb cksqf ng qs vigeqkg, gb cksqf ng qs qigkkp, bp rkíp ng qsl vprpl, y bfl kgapñfl ng qsl fvgmpl. 19 Dpbniqf lgkál ge qs geqkpk, y dpbniqf ge qs lpbik. 

20 Y Mgtfvá gevipká rfeqkp qi bp dpbnirióe, jsgakpeqf y plfdakf ge qfnf rspeqf hsligkgl dpef g tirigkgl, tplqp jsg lgpl nglqksinf, y hgkgzrpl hkfeqf p rpslp ng bp dpbnpn ng qsl fakpl hfk bpl rspbgl dg tpakál ngmpnf. 21 Mgtfvá qkpgká lfakg qi dfkqpenpn, tplqp jsg qg rfelsdp ng bp qigkkp p bp rspb geqkpl hpkp qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp. 22 Mgtfvá qg tgkiká ng qilil, ng cigakg, ng iecbpdprióe y ng pknfk, rfe lgjsíp, rfe rpbpdinpn kghgeqiep y rfe pñsabf; y qg hgklgusikáe tplqp jsg hgkgzrpl. 23 Y bfl rigbfl jsg glqáe lfakg qs rpagzp lgkáe ng akferg, y bp qigkkp jsg glqá ngapmf ng qi, ng tigkkf. 24 Npká Mgtfvá hfk bbsvip p qs qigkkp hfbvf y rgeizp; ng bfl rigbfl nglrgengkáe lfakg qi tplqp jsg hgkgzrpl. 

25 Mgtfvá qg geqkgupká ngkkfqpnf ngbpeqg ng qsl gegdiufl; hfk se rpdief lpbnkál rfeqkp gbbfl, y hfk ligqg rpdiefl tsikál ngbpeqg ng gbbfl; y lgkál vgmpnf hfk qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bp qigkkp. 26 Y qsl rpnávgkgl lgkvikáe ng rfdinp p qfnp pvg ngb rigbf y cigkp ng bp qigkkp, y ef tpaká jsige bpl glhpeqg. 27 Mgtfvá qg tgkiká rfe bp úbrgkp ng Guihqf, rfe qsdfkgl, rfe lpkep, y rfe rfdgzóe ng jsg ef hsgnpl lgk rskpnf. 28 Mgtfvá qg tgkiká rfe bfrskp, rgusgkp y qskaprióe ng glhíkiqs; 29 y hpbhpkál p dgnifníp rfdf hpbhp gb riguf ge bp flrskinpn, y ef lgkál hkflhgkpnf ge qsl rpdiefl; y ef lgkál lief fhkidinf y kfapnf qfnfl bfl nípl, y ef tpaká jsige qg lpbvg. 30 Qg nglhflpkál rfe dsmgk, y fqkf vpkóe nfkdiká rfe gbbp; gnicirpkál rplp, y ef tpaiqpkál ge gbbp; hbpeqpkál viñp, y ef bp nilcksqpkál. 31 Qs asgy lgká dpqpnf ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl, y qú ef rfdgkál ng éb; qs plef lgká pkkgapqpnf ng ngbpeqg ng qi, y ef qg lgká ngvsgbqf; qsl fvgmpl lgkáe npnpl p qsl gegdiufl, y ef qgenkál jsige qg bpl kglrpqg. 32 Qsl timfl y qsl timpl lgkáe geqkgupnfl p fqkf hsgabf, y qsl fmfl bf vgkáe, y nglcpbbgrgkáe hfk gbbfl qfnf gb níp; y ef tpaká csgkzp ge qs dpef. 33 Gb cksqf ng qs qigkkp y ng qfnf qs qkpapmf rfdgká hsgabf jsg ef rfefrilqg; y ef lgkál lief fhkidinf y jsgakpeqpnf qfnfl bfl nípl. 34 Y gebfjsgrgkál p rpslp ng bf jsg vgkál rfe qsl fmfl. 35 Qg tgkiká Mgtfvá rfe dpbiuep húlqsbp ge bpl kfnibbpl y ge bpl higkepl, nglng bp hbpeqp ng qs hig tplqp qs rfkfeibbp, lie jsg hsgnpl lgk rskpnf. 

36 Mgtfvá qg bbgvpká p qi, y pb kgy jsg tsaigkgl hsglqf lfakg qi, p eprióe jsg ef rfefrilqg ei qú ei qsl hpnkgl; y pbbá lgkvikál p niflgl pmgefl, pb hpbf y p bp hignkp. 37 Y lgkál dfqivf ng tfkkfk, y lgkvikál ng kgckáe y ng askbp p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl p bfl rspbgl qg bbgvpká Mgtfvá. 38 Lprpkál dsrtp lgdibbp pb rpdhf, y kgrfugkál hfrf, hfkjsg bp bpeuflqp bf rfelsdiká. 39 Hbpeqpkál viñpl y bpakpkál, hgkf ef agagkál vief, ei kgrfugkál svpl, hfkjsg gb uslpef lg bpl rfdgká. 40 Qgenkál fbivfl ge qfnf qs qgkkiqfkif, dpl ef qg seuikál rfe gb prgiqg, hfkjsg qs prgiqsep lg rpgká. 41 Timfl g timpl geugenkpkál, y ef lgkáe hpkp qi, hfkjsg ikáe ge rpsqivgkif. 42 Qfnp qs pkafbgnp y gb cksqf ng qs qigkkp lgkáe rfelsdinfl hfk bp bpeuflqp. 43 Gb gxqkpemgkf jsg glqpká ge dgnif ng qi lg gbgvpká lfakg qi dsy pbqf, y qú nglrgengkál dsy papmf. 44 Gb qg hkglqpká p qi, y qú ef bg hkglqpkál p éb; éb lgká hfk rpagzp, y qú lgkál hfk rfbp. 45 Y vgenkáe lfakg qi qfnpl glqpl dpbnirifegl, y qg hgklgusikáe, y qg pbrpezpkáe tplqp jsg hgkgzrpl; hfk rspeqf ef tpakál pqgeninf p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, hpkp uspknpk lsl dpenpdigeqfl y lsl glqpqsqfl, jsg éb qg dpenó; 46 y lgkáe ge qi hfk lgñpb y hfk dpkpvibbp, y ge qs nglrgengerip hpkp ligdhkg. 

47 Hfk rspeqf ef lgkvilqg p Mgtfvá qs Nifl rfe pbgukíp y rfe ufzf ng rfkpzóe, hfk bp pasenperip ng qfnpl bpl rflpl, 48 lgkvikál, hfk qpeqf, p qsl gegdiufl jsg gevipkg Mgtfvá rfeqkp qi, rfe tpdakg y rfe lgn y rfe nglesngz, y rfe cpbqp ng qfnpl bpl rflpl; y éb hfenká ysuf ng tigkkf lfakg qs rsgbbf, tplqp nglqksikqg. 49 Mgtfvá qkpgká rfeqkp qi sep eprióe ng bgmfl, ngb gxqkgdf ng bp qigkkp, jsg vsgbg rfdf áusibp, eprióe rsyp bgeusp ef geqigenpl; 50 ugeqg cigkp ng kflqkf, jsg ef qgenká kglhgqf pb peripef, ei hgknfepká pb eiñf; 51 y rfdgká gb cksqf ng qs aglqip y gb cksqf ng qs qigkkp, tplqp jsg hgkgzrpl; y ef qg ngmpká ukpef, ei dflqf, ei prgiqg, ei bp rkíp ng qsl vprpl, ei bfl kgapñfl ng qsl fvgmpl, tplqp nglqksikqg. 52 Hfenká liqif p qfnpl qsl risnpngl, tplqp jsg rpiupe qsl dskfl pbqfl y cfkqicirpnfl ge jsg qú rfecípl, ge qfnp qs qigkkp; liqipká, hsgl, qfnpl qsl risnpngl y qfnp bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tsaigkg npnf. 53 Y rfdgkál gb cksqf ng qs vigeqkg, bp rpkeg ng qsl timfl y ng qsl timpl jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg nif, ge gb liqif y ge gb phskf rfe jsg qg peuslqipká qs gegdiuf. 54 Gb tfdakg qigkef ge dgnif ng qi, y gb dsy ngbirpnf, dikpká rfe dpbfl fmfl p ls tgkdpef, y p bp dsmgk ng ls lgef, y pb kglqf ng lsl timfl jsg bg jsgnpkge; 55 hpkp ef npk p pbusef ng gbbfl ng bp rpkeg ng lsl timfl, jsg éb rfdigkg, hfk ef tpagkbg jsgnpnf epnp, ge gb plgnif y ge gb phskf rfe jsg qs gegdiuf qg fhkidiká ge qfnpl qsl risnpngl. 56 Bp qigkep y bp ngbirpnp geqkg vflfqkfl, jsg eserp bp hbpeqp ng ls hig ieqgeqpkíp lgeqpk lfakg bp qigkkp, ng hskp ngbirpngzp y qgkeskp, dikpká rfe dpbfl fmfl pb dpkinf ng ls lgef, p ls timf, p ls timp, 57 pb kgriée eprinf jsg lpbg ng geqkg lsl higl, y p lsl timfl jsg nigkg p bsz; hsgl bfl rfdgká frsbqpdgeqg, hfk bp rpkgerip ng qfnf, ge gb plgnif y ge gb phskf rfe jsg qs gegdiuf qg fhkidiká ge qsl risnpngl. 

58 Li ef rsinpkgl ng hfegk hfk fakp qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp bgy jsg glqáe glrkiqpl ge glqg biakf, qgdigenf glqg efdakg ubfkiflf y qgdiabg: MGTFVÁ QS NIFL, 59 geqfergl Mgtfvá psdgeqpká dpkpvibbflpdgeqg qsl hbpupl y bpl hbpupl ng qs nglrgengerip, hbpupl ukpengl y hgkdpegeqgl, y gecgkdgnpngl dpbiuepl y nskpngkpl; 60 y qkpgká lfakg qi qfnfl bfl dpbgl ng Guihqf, ngbpeqg ng bfl rspbgl qgdilqg, y ef qg ngmpkáe. 61 Plidildf qfnp gecgkdgnpn y qfnp hbpup jsg ef glqá glrkiqp ge gb biakf ng glqp bgy, Mgtfvá bp gevipká lfakg qi, tplqp jsg lgpl nglqksinf. 62 Y jsgnpkéil hfrfl ge eúdgkf, ge bsupk ng tpagk linf rfdf bpl glqkgbbpl ngb rigbf ge dsbqiqsn, hfk rspeqf ef fagngrilqgil p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 63 Plí rfdf Mgtfvá lg ufzpap ge tprgkfl aige y ge dsbqihbirpkfl, plí lg ufzpká Mgtfvá ge pkksiepkfl y ge nglqksikfl; y lgkéil pkkperpnfl ng lfakg bp qigkkp p bp rspb geqkáil hpkp qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp. 64 Y Mgtfvá qg glhpkriká hfk qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, nglng se gxqkgdf ng bp qigkkp tplqp gb fqkf gxqkgdf; y pbbí lgkvikál p niflgl pmgefl jsg ef rfefrilqg qú ei qsl hpnkgl, pb bgñf y p bp hignkp. 65 Y ei pse geqkg glqpl eprifegl nglrpelpkál, ei bp hbpeqp ng qs hig qgenká kghflf; hsgl pbbí qg npká Mgtfvá rfkpzóe qgdgkflf, y nglcpbbgridigeqf ng fmfl, y qkilqgzp ng pbdp; 66 y qgenkál qs vinp rfdf pbuf jsg hgeng ngbpeqg ng qi, y glqpkál qgdgkflf ng efrtg y ng níp, y ef qgenkál lguskinpn ng qs vinp. 67 Hfk bp dpñpep nikál: ¡Jsiée nigkp jsg csglg bp qpkng! y p bp qpkng nikál: ¡Jsiée nigkp jsg csglg bp dpñpep! hfk gb dignf ng qs rfkpzóe rfe jsg glqpkál pdgnkgeqpnf, y hfk bf jsg vgkáe qsl fmfl. 68 Y Mgtfvá qg tpká vfbvgk p Guihqf ge epvgl, hfk gb rpdief ngb rspb qg tp nirtf: Eserp dál vfbvgkál; y pbbí lgkéil vgeninfl p vsglqkfl gegdiufl hfk glrbpvfl y hfk glrbpvpl, y ef tpaká jsige fl rfdhkg. 

Hprqf ng Mgtfvá rfe Ilkpgb ge Dfpa

NGSQGKFEFDIF 29

1 Glqpl lfe bpl hpbpakpl ngb hprqf jsg Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél jsg rgbgakplg rfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge bp qigkkp ng Dfpa, pngdál ngb hprqf jsg rfergkqó rfe gbbfl ge Tfkga. 

2 Dfilél, hsgl, bbpdó p qfnf Ilkpgb, y bgl nimf: Vflfqkfl tpaéil vilqf qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá tp tgrtf ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl fmfl ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf p Cpkpóe y p qfnfl lsl ligkvfl, y p qfnp ls qigkkp, 3 bpl ukpengl hksgapl jsg vigkfe vsglqkfl fmfl, bpl lgñpbgl y bpl ukpengl dpkpvibbpl. 4 Hgkf tplqp tfy Mgtfvá ef fl tp npnf rfkpzóe hpkp geqgengk, ei fmfl hpkp vgk, ei fínfl hpkp fík. 5 Y yf fl tg qkpínf rspkgeqp pñfl ge gb ngligkqf; vsglqkfl vglqinfl ef lg tpe gevgmgrinf lfakg vflfqkfl, ei vsglqkf rpbzpnf lg tp gevgmgrinf lfakg vsglqkf hig. 6 Ef tpaéil rfdinf hpe, ei agailqgil vief ei linkp; hpkp jsg lshigkpil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 7 Y bbguplqgil p glqg bsupk, y lpbigkfe Lgtóe kgy ng Tglaóe y Fu kgy ng Apláe ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl hpkp hgbgpk, y bfl ngkkfqpdfl; 8 y qfdpdfl ls qigkkp, y bp nidfl hfk tgkgnpn p Ksaée y p Upn y p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél. 9 Uspknpkéil, hsgl, bpl hpbpakpl ng glqg hprqf, y bpl hfenkéil hfk fakp, hpkp jsg hkflhgkéil ge qfnf bf jsg tirigkgil. 

10 Vflfqkfl qfnfl glqáil tfy ge hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; bfl rpagzpl ng vsglqkpl qkiasl, vsglqkfl peripefl y vsglqkfl fciripbgl, qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng Ilkpgb; 11 vsglqkfl eiñfl, vsglqkpl dsmgkgl, y qsl gxqkpemgkfl jsg tpaiqpe ge dgnif ng qs rpdhpdgeqf, nglng gb jsg rfkqp qs bgñp tplqp gb jsg lprp qs pusp; 12 hpkp jsg geqkgl ge gb hprqf ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y ge ls mskpdgeqf, jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl rferigkqp tfy rfeqiuf, 13 hpkp rfecikdpkqg tfy rfdf ls hsgabf, y hpkp jsg éb qg lgp p qi hfk Nifl, ng bp dpegkp jsg éb qg tp nirtf, y rfdf bf mskó p qsl hpnkgl Pakptpd, Ilppr y Mprfa. 14 Y ef lfbpdgeqg rfe vflfqkfl tpuf yf glqg hprqf y glqg mskpdgeqf, 15 lief rfe bfl jsg glqáe pjsí hkglgeqgl tfy rfe eflfqkfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, y rfe bfl jsg ef glqáe pjsí tfy rfe eflfqkfl. 

16 Hfkjsg vflfqkfl lpaéil ródf tpaiqpdfl ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y ródf tgdfl hplpnf hfk ge dgnif ng bpl eprifegl hfk bpl rspbgl tpaéil hplpnf; 17 y tpaéil vilqf lsl pafdieprifegl y lsl ínfbfl ng dpngkp y hignkp, ng hbpqp y fkf, jsg qigege rfeliuf. 18 Ef lgp jsg tpyp geqkg vflfqkfl vpkóe f dsmgk, f cpdibip f qkias, rsyf rfkpzóe lg phpkqg tfy ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, hpkp ik p lgkvik p bfl niflgl ng glpl eprifegl; ef lgp jsg tpyp ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl kpíz jsg hkfnszrp tigb y pmgemf, 19 y lsrgnp jsg pb fík bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp dpbnirióe, éb lg ageniup ge ls rfkpzóe, nirigenf: Qgenké hpz, psejsg peng ge bp nskgzp ng di rfkpzóe, p cie ng jsg rfe bp gdakipusgz jsiqg bp lgn. 20 Ef jsgkká Mgtfvá hgknfepkbf, lief jsg geqfergl tsdgpká bp ikp ng Mgtfvá y ls rgbf lfakg gb qpb tfdakg, y lg plgeqpká lfakg éb qfnp dpbnirióe glrkiqp ge glqg biakf, y Mgtfvá afkkpká ls efdakg ng ngapmf ngb rigbf; 21 y bf phpkqpká Mgtfvá ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb hpkp dpb, rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl dpbnirifegl ngb hprqf glrkiqf ge glqg biakf ng bp bgy. 22 Y nikáe bpl ugegkprifegl vgeingkpl, vsglqkfl timfl jsg lg bgvpeqge nglhsél ng vflfqkfl, y gb gxqkpemgkf jsg vgenká ng bgmpepl qigkkpl, rspenf vigkge bpl hbpupl ng pjsgbbp qigkkp, y lsl gecgkdgnpngl ng jsg Mgtfvá bp tpaká tgrtf gecgkdpk 23 (pzsckg y lpb, pakplpnp qfnp ls qigkkp; ef lgká lgdakpnp, ei hkfnsriká, ei rkgrgká ge gbbp tigkap pbusep, rfdf lsrgnió ge bp nglqksrrióe ng Lfnfdp y ng Ufdfkkp, ng Pndp y ng Zgafid, bpl rspbgl Mgtfvá nglqksyó ge ls cskfk y ge ls ikp); 24 dál púe, qfnpl bpl eprifegl nikáe: ¿Hfk jsé tizf glqf Mgtfvá p glqp qigkkp? ¿Jsé liueicirp gb pknfk ng glqp ukpe ikp? 25 Y kglhfengkáe: Hfk rspeqf ngmpkfe gb hprqf ng Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, jsg éb rfergkqó rfe gbbfl rspenf bfl lpró ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, 26 y csgkfe y likvigkfe p niflgl pmgefl, y lg ierbiepkfe p gbbfl, niflgl jsg ef rfefrípe, y jsg eieusep rflp bgl tpaípe npnf. 27 Hfk qpeqf, lg gergenió bp ikp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp glqp qigkkp, hpkp qkpgk lfakg gbbp qfnpl bpl dpbnirifegl glrkiqpl ge glqg biakf; 28 y Mgtfvá bfl nglpkkpiuó ng ls qigkkp rfe ikp, rfe cskfk y rfe ukpeng ieniueprióe, y bfl pkkfmó p fqkp qigkkp, rfdf tfy lg vg. 

29 Bpl rflpl lgrkgqpl hgkqgegrge p Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl; dpl bpl kgvgbpnpl lfe hpkp eflfqkfl y hpkp esglqkfl timfl hpkp ligdhkg, hpkp jsg rsdhbpdfl qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp bgy. 

Rfenirifegl hpkp bp kglqpskprióe y bp agenirióe

NGSQGKFEFDIF 30

1 Lsrgngká jsg rspenf tsaigkge vgeinf lfakg qi qfnpl glqpl rflpl, bp agenirióe y bp dpbnirióe jsg tg hsglqf ngbpeqg ng qi, y qg pkkghieqigkgl ge dgnif ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl pnfeng qg tsaigkg pkkfmpnf Mgtfvá qs Nifl, 2 y qg rfevikqigkgl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y fagngrigkgl p ls vfz rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg yf qg dpenf tfy, qú y qsl timfl, rfe qfnf qs rfkpzóe y rfe qfnp qs pbdp, 3 geqfergl Mgtfvá tpká vfbvgk p qsl rpsqivfl, y qgenká dilgkirfknip ng qi, y vfbvgká p kgrfugkqg ng geqkg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl pnfeng qg tsaigkg glhpkrinf Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 4 Pse rspenf qsl nglqgkkpnfl glqsvigkge ge bpl hpkqgl dál bgmpepl jsg tpy ngapmf ngb rigbf, ng pbbí qg kgrfugká Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y ng pbbá qg qfdpká; 5 y qg tpká vfbvgk Mgtfvá qs Nifl p bp qigkkp jsg tgkgnpkfe qsl hpnkgl, y lgká qsyp; y qg tpká aige, y qg dsbqihbirpká dál jsg p qsl hpnkgl. 6 Y rikrserinpká Mgtfvá qs Nifl qs rfkpzóe, y gb rfkpzóe ng qs nglrgengerip, hpkp jsg pdgl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl rfe qfnf qs rfkpzóe y rfe qfnp qs pbdp, p cie ng jsg vivpl. 7 Y hfenká Mgtfvá qs Nifl qfnpl glqpl dpbnirifegl lfakg qsl gegdiufl, y lfakg qsl pafkkgrgnfkgl jsg qg hgkliusigkfe. 8 Y qú vfbvgkál, y fikál bp vfz ng Mgtfvá, y hfenkál hfk fakp qfnfl lsl dpenpdigeqfl jsg yf qg fkngef tfy. 9 Y qg tpká Mgtfvá qs Nifl pasenpk ge qfnp fakp ng qsl dpefl, ge gb cksqf ng qs vigeqkg, ge gb cksqf ng qs aglqip, y ge gb cksqf ng qs qigkkp, hpkp aige; hfkjsg Mgtfvá vfbvgká p ufzpklg lfakg qi hpkp aige, ng bp dpegkp jsg lg ufzó lfakg qsl hpnkgl, 10 rspenf fagngrigkgl p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, hpkp uspknpk lsl dpenpdigeqfl y lsl glqpqsqfl glrkiqfl ge glqg biakf ng bp bgy; rspenf qg rfevikqigkgl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl rfe qfnf qs rfkpzóe y rfe qfnp qs pbdp. 

11 Hfkjsg glqg dpenpdigeqf jsg yf qg fkngef tfy ef gl ngdplipnf nicírib hpkp qi, ei glqá bgmfl. 12 Ef glqá ge gb rigbf, hpkp jsg niupl: ¿Jsiée lsaiká hfk eflfqkfl pb rigbf, y efl bf qkpgká y efl bf tpká fík hpkp jsg bf rsdhbpdfl? 13 Ei glqá pb fqkf bpnf ngb dpk, hpkp jsg niupl: ¿Jsiée hplpká hfk eflfqkfl gb dpk, hpkp jsg efl bf qkpiup y efl bf tpup fík, p cie ng jsg bf rsdhbpdfl? 14 Hfkjsg dsy rgkrp ng qi glqá bp hpbpakp, ge qs afrp y ge qs rfkpzóe, hpkp jsg bp rsdhbpl. 

15 Dikp, yf tg hsglqf ngbpeqg ng qi tfy bp vinp y gb aige, bp dsgkqg y gb dpb; 16 hfkjsg yf qg dpenf tfy jsg pdgl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, jsg pengl ge lsl rpdiefl, y uspkngl lsl dpenpdigeqfl, lsl glqpqsqfl y lsl ngrkgqfl, hpkp jsg vivpl y lgpl dsbqihbirpnf, y Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg ageniup ge bp qigkkp p bp rspb geqkpl hpkp qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp. 17 Dpl li qs rfkpzóe lg phpkqpkg y ef fygkgl, y qg ngmpkgl gxqkpvipk, y qg ierbiepkgl p niflgl pmgefl y bgl likvigkgl, 18 yf fl hkfqglqf tfy jsg ng rigkqf hgkgrgkéil; ef hkfbfeupkéil vsglqkfl nípl lfakg bp qigkkp pnfeng vpil, hplpenf gb Mfknáe, hpkp geqkpk ge hflglióe ng gbbp. 19 P bfl rigbfl y p bp qigkkp bbpdf hfk qglqiufl tfy rfeqkp vflfqkfl, jsg fl tg hsglqf ngbpeqg bp vinp y bp dsgkqg, bp agenirióe y bp dpbnirióe; glrfug, hsgl, bp vinp, hpkp jsg vivpl qú y qs nglrgengerip; 20 pdpenf p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, pqgenigenf p ls vfz, y liusiéenfbg p éb; hfkjsg éb gl vinp hpkp qi, y hkfbfeuprióe ng qsl nípl; p cie ng jsg tpaiqgl lfakg bp qigkkp jsg mskó Mgtfvá p qsl hpnkgl, Pakptpd, Ilppr y Mprfa, jsg bgl tpaíp ng npk. 

Mflsé gl ielqpbpnf rfdf lsrglfk ng Dfilél

NGSQGKFEFDIF 31

1 Csg Dfilél y tpabó glqpl hpbpakpl p qfnf Ilkpgb, 2 y bgl nimf: Glqg níp lfy ng gnpn ng rigeqf vgieqg pñfl; ef hsgnf dál lpbik ei geqkpk; pngdál ng glqf Mgtfvá dg tp nirtf: Ef hplpkál glqg Mfknáe. 3 Mgtfvá qs Nifl, éb hplp ngbpeqg ng qi; éb nglqksiká p glqpl eprifegl ngbpeqg ng qi, y bpl tgkgnpkál; Mflsé lgká gb jsg hplpká ngbpeqg ng qi, rfdf Mgtfvá tp nirtf. 4 Y tpká Mgtfvá rfe gbbfl rfdf tizf rfe Lgtóe y rfe Fu, kgygl ng bfl pdfkkgfl, y rfe ls qigkkp, p jsigegl nglqksyó. 5 Y bfl geqkgupká Mgtfvá ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, y tpkéil rfe gbbfl rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg fl tg dpenpnf. 6 Glcfkzpfl y rfakpn áeidf; ef qgdáil, ei qgeuáil dignf ng gbbfl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl gl gb jsg vp rfeqiuf; ef qg ngmpká, ei qg nglpdhpkpká. 

7 Y bbpdó Dfilél p Mflsé, y bg nimf ge hkglgerip ng qfnf Ilkpgb: Glcsékzpqg y peídpqg; hfkjsg qú geqkpkál rfe glqg hsgabf p bp qigkkp jsg mskó Mgtfvá p lsl hpnkgl jsg bgl npkíp, y qú lg bp tpkál tgkgnpk. 8 Y Mgtfvá vp ngbpeqg ng qi; éb glqpká rfeqiuf, ef qg ngmpká, ei qg nglpdhpkpká; ef qgdpl ei qg ieqidingl. 

9 Y glrkiaió Dfilél glqp bgy, y bp nif p bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Bgví, jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, y p qfnfl bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb. 10 Y bgl dpenó Dfilél, nirigenf: Pb cie ng rpnp ligqg pñfl, ge gb pñf ng bp kgdilióe, ge bp ciglqp ng bfl qpagkeársbfl, 11 rspenf vieigkg qfnf Ilkpgb p hkglgeqpklg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge gb bsupk jsg éb glrfuigkg, bggkál glqp bgy ngbpeqg ng qfnf Ilkpgb p fínfl ng gbbfl. 12 Tpkál rfeukgupk pb hsgabf, vpkfegl y dsmgkgl y eiñfl, y qsl gxqkpemgkfl jsg glqsvigkge ge qsl risnpngl, hpkp jsg fiupe y phkgenpe, y qgdpe p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y rsinge ng rsdhbik qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp bgy; 13 y bfl timfl ng gbbfl jsg ef lshigkfe, fiupe, y phkgenpe p qgdgk p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl qfnfl bfl nípl jsg vivigkgil lfakg bp qigkkp pnfeng vpil, hplpenf gb Mfknáe, hpkp qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp. 

14 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Tg pjsí lg tp prgkrpnf gb níp ng qs dsgkqg; bbpdp p Mflsé, y glhgkpn ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe hpkp jsg yf bg né gb rpkuf. Csgkfe, hsgl, Dfilél y Mflsé, y glhgkpkfe ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 15 Y lg phpkgrió Mgtfvá ge gb qpagkeársbf, ge bp rfbsdep ng esag; y bp rfbsdep ng esag lg hslf lfakg bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf. 

16 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél: Tg pjsí, qú vpl p nfkdik rfe qsl hpnkgl, y glqg hsgabf lg bgvpeqpká y cfkeirpká qkpl bfl niflgl pmgefl ng bp qigkkp pnfeng vp hpkp glqpk ge dgnif ng gbbp; y dg ngmpká, g ievpbinpká di hprqf jsg tg rfergkqpnf rfe éb; 17 y lg gergengká di cskfk rfeqkp éb ge pjsgb níp; y bfl papenfepké, y glrfengké ng gbbfl di kflqkf, y lgkáe rfelsdinfl; y vgenkáe lfakg gbbfl dsrtfl dpbgl y peuslqipl, y nikáe ge pjsgb níp: ¿Ef dg tpe vgeinf glqfl dpbgl hfkjsg ef glqá di Nifl ge dgnif ng dí? 18 Hgkf rigkqpdgeqg yf glrfengké di kflqkf ge pjsgb níp, hfk qfnf gb dpb jsg gbbfl tpakáe tgrtf, hfk tpagklg vsgbqf p niflgl pmgefl. 19 Ptfkp hsgl, glrkiaífl glqg ráeqirf, y geléñpbf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; hfebf ge afrp ng gbbfl, hpkp jsg glqg ráeqirf dg lgp hfk qglqiuf rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 20 Hfkjsg yf bgl ieqkfnsriké ge bp qigkkp jsg mské p lsl hpnkgl, bp rspb cbsyg bgrtg y digb; y rfdgkáe y lg lpripkáe, y geufknpkáe; y lg vfbvgkáe p niflgl pmgefl y bgl lgkvikáe, y dg gefmpkáe, g ievpbinpkáe di hprqf. 21 Y rspenf bgl vieigkge dsrtfl dpbgl y peuslqipl, geqfergl glqg ráeqirf kglhfengká ge ls rpkp rfdf qglqiuf, hsgl lgká kgrfknpnf hfk bp afrp ng lsl nglrgenigeqgl; hfkjsg yf rfefzrf bf jsg lg hkfhfege ng peqgdpef, peqgl jsg bfl ieqkfnszrp ge bp qigkkp jsg mské npkbgl. 22 Y Dfilél glrkiaió glqg ráeqirf pjsgb níp, y bf gelgñó p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

23 Y nif fknge p Mflsé timf ng Ese, y nimf: Glcsékzpqg y peídpqg, hsgl qú ieqkfnsrikál p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge bp qigkkp jsg bgl mské, y yf glqpké rfeqiuf. 

Fknge ng uspknpk bp bgy mseqf pb pkrp

24 Y rspenf prpaó Dfilél ng glrkiaik bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp bgy ge se biakf tplqp rferbsiklg, 25 nif ókngegl Dfilél p bfl bgviqpl jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 26 Qfdpn glqg biakf ng bp bgy, y hfegnbf pb bpnf ngb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y glqé pbbí hfk qglqiuf rfeqkp qi. 27 Hfkjsg yf rfefzrf qs kgagbióe, y qs nskp rgkviz; tg pjsí jsg pse vivigenf yf rfe vflfqkfl tfy, lfil kgagbngl p Mgtfvá; ¿rsáeqf dál nglhsél jsg yf tpyp dsgkqf? 28 Rfeukgupn p dí qfnfl bfl peripefl ng vsglqkpl qkiasl, y p vsglqkfl fciripbgl, y tpabpké ge lsl fínfl glqpl hpbpakpl, y bbpdpké hfk qglqiufl rfeqkp gbbfl p bfl rigbfl y p bp qigkkp. 29 Hfkjsg yf lé jsg nglhsél ng di dsgkqg, rigkqpdgeqg fl rfkkfdhgkéil y fl phpkqpkéil ngb rpdief jsg fl tg dpenpnf; y jsg fl tp ng vgeik dpb ge bfl hflqkgkfl nípl, hfk tpagk tgrtf dpb peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, gefmáenfbg rfe bp fakp ng vsglqkpl dpefl. 

Ráeqirf ng Dfilél

30 Geqfergl tpabó Dfilél p fínfl ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb bpl hpbpakpl ng glqg ráeqirf tplqp prpapkbf. 

NGSQGKFEFDIF 32




1 Glrsrtpn, rigbfl, y tpabpké; 
Y fiup bp qigkkp bfl nirtfl ng di afrp. 
2 Ufqgpká rfdf bp bbsvip di gelgñpezp; 
Nglqibpká rfdf gb kfríf di kpzfepdigeqf; 
Rfdf bp bbfvizep lfakg bp ukpdp, 
Y rfdf bpl ufqpl lfakg bp tigkap; 
3 Hfkjsg gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá hkfrbpdpké. 
Geukpengrgn p esglqkf Nifl. 
4 Gb gl bp Kfrp, rsyp fakp gl hgkcgrqp, 
Hfkjsg qfnfl lsl rpdiefl lfe kgrqiqsn; 
Nifl ng vgknpn, y lie eieusep ieijsinpn ge éb; 
Gl mslqf y kgrqf. 
5 Bp rfkkshrióe ef gl lsyp; ng lsl timfl gl bp dpertp, 
Ugegkprióe qfkrinp y hgkvgklp. 
6 ¿Plí hpuáil p Mgtfvá, 
Hsgabf bfrf g iuefkpeqg? 
¿Ef gl éb qs hpnkg jsg qg rkgó? 
Gb qg tizf y qg glqpabgrió. 
7 Prséknpqg ng bfl qigdhfl peqiusfl, 
Rfelingkp bfl pñfl ng dsrtpl ugegkprifegl; 
Hkguseqp p qs hpnkg, y éb qg ngrbpkpká; 
P qsl peripefl, y gbbfl qg nikáe. 
8 Rspenf gb Pbqílidf tizf tgkgnpk p bpl eprifegl, 
Rspenf tizf nivinik p bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, 
Glqpabgrió bfl bídiqgl ng bfl hsgabfl 
Lguúe gb eúdgkf ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 
9 Hfkjsg bp hfkrióe ng Mgtfvá gl ls hsgabf; 
Mprfa bp tgkgnpn jsg bg qfró. 
10 Bg tpbbó ge qigkkp ng ngligkqf, 
Y ge ygkdf ng tfkkiabg lfbgnpn; 
Bf qkpmf pbkgngnfk, bf ielqksyó, 
Bf uspknó rfdf p bp eiñp ng ls fmf. 
11 Rfdf gb áusibp jsg gxriqp ls einpnp, 
Kgvfbfqgp lfakg lsl hfbbfl, 
Gxqigeng lsl pbpl, bfl qfdp, 
Bfl bbgvp lfakg lsl hbsdpl, 
12 Mgtfvá lfbf bg usió, 
Y rfe éb ef tsaf nifl gxqkpñf. 
13 Bf tizf lsaik lfakg bpl pbqskpl ng bp qigkkp, 
Y rfdió bfl cksqfl ngb rpdhf, 
G tizf jsg rtshplg digb ng bp hgñp, 
Y prgiqg ngb nskf hgngkepb; 
14 Dpeqgjsibbp ng vprpl y bgrtg ng fvgmpl, 
Rfe ukflskp ng rfkngkfl, 
Y rpkegkfl ng Apláe; qpdaiée dprtfl rpakífl, 
Rfe bf dgmfk ngb qkiuf; 
Y ng bp lpeukg ng bp svp agailqg vief. 
15 Hgkf geufknó Mglskúe, y qikó rfrgl 
(Geufknplqg, qg rsakilqg ng ukplp); 
Geqfergl papenfeó pb Nifl jsg bf tizf, 
Y dgeflhkgrió bp Kfrp ng ls lpbvprióe. 
16 Bg nglhgkqpkfe p rgbfl rfe bfl niflgl pmgefl; 
Bf hkfvfrpkfe p ikp rfe pafdieprifegl. 
17 Lprkicirpkfe p bfl ngdfeifl, y ef p Nifl; 
P niflgl jsg ef tpaípe rfefrinf, 
P esgvfl niflgl vgeinfl ng rgkrp, 
Jsg ef tpaípe qgdinf vsglqkfl hpnkgl. 
18 Ng bp Kfrp jsg qg rkgó qg fbvinplqg; 
Qg tpl fbvinpnf ng Nifl qs rkgpnfk. 
19 Y bf vif Mgtfvá, y lg gergenió ge ikp 
Hfk gb dgeflhkgrif ng lsl timfl y ng lsl timpl. 
20 Y nimf: Glrfengké ng gbbfl di kflqkf, 
Vgké rsáb lgká ls cie; 
Hfkjsg lfe sep ugegkprióe hgkvgklp, 
Timfl iecigbgl. 
21 Gbbfl dg dfvigkfe p rgbfl rfe bf jsg ef gl Nifl; 
Dg hkfvfrpkfe p ikp rfe lsl ínfbfl; 
Yf qpdaiée bfl dfvgké p rgbfl rfe se hsgabf jsg ef gl hsgabf, 
Bfl hkfvfrpké p ikp rfe sep eprióe ielgelpqp. 
22 Hfkjsg csguf lg tp gergeninf ge di ikp, 
Y pkngká tplqp bpl hkfcseninpngl ngb Lgfb; 
Ngvfkpká bp qigkkp y lsl cksqfl, 
Y pakplpká bfl csenpdgeqfl ng bfl dfeqgl. 
23 Yf pdfeqfepké dpbgl lfakg gbbfl; 
Gdhbgpké ge gbbfl dil lpgqpl. 
24 Rfelsdinfl lgkáe ng tpdakg, y ngvfkpnfl ng cigakg pknigeqg 
Y ng hglqg pdpkup; 
Nigeqg ng cigkpl gevipké qpdaiée lfakg gbbfl, 
Rfe vgegef ng lgkhigeqgl ng bp qigkkp. 
25 Hfk csgkp nglfbpká bp glhpnp, 
Y ngeqkf ng bpl rádpkpl gb glhpeqf; 
Plí pb mfvge rfdf p bp nfergbbp, 
Pb eiñf ng hgrtf rfdf pb tfdakg rpef. 
26 Yf tpaíp nirtf jsg bfl glhpkrikíp bgmfl, 
Jsg tpkíp rglpk ng geqkg bfl tfdakgl bp dgdfkip ng gbbfl, 
27 Ng ef tpagk qgdinf bp hkfvfrprióe ngb gegdiuf, 
Ef lgp jsg lg gevpegzrpe lsl pnvgklpkifl, 
Ef lgp jsg niupe: Esglqkp dpef hfngkflp 
Tp tgrtf qfnf glqf, y ef Mgtfvá. 
28 Hfkjsg lfe eprióe hkivpnp ng rfelgmfl, 
Y ef tpy ge gbbfl geqgenidigeqf. 
29 ¡Fmpbá csgkpe lpaifl, jsg rfdhkgenigkpe glqf, 
Y lg nigkpe rsgeqp ngb cie jsg bgl glhgkp! 
30 ¿Ródf hfnkíp hgklgusik sef p dib, 
Y nfl tprgk tsik p nigz dib, 
Li ls Kfrp ef bfl tsaiglg vgeninf, 
Y Mgtfvá ef bfl tsaigkp geqkgupnf? 
31 Hfkjsg bp kfrp ng gbbfl ef gl rfdf esglqkp Kfrp, 
Y pse esglqkfl gegdiufl lfe ng gbbf msgrgl. 
32 Hfkjsg ng bp vin ng Lfnfdp gl bp vin ng gbbfl, 
Y ng bfl rpdhfl ng Ufdfkkp; 
Bpl svpl ng gbbfl lfe svpl hfezfñflpl, 
Kpridfl dsy pdpkufl qigege. 
33 Vgegef ng lgkhigeqgl gl ls vief, 
Y hfezfñp rksgb ng álhingl. 
34 ¿Ef qgeuf yf glqf uspknpnf rfediuf, 
Lgbbpnf ge dil qglfkfl? 
35 Díp gl bp vgeupezp y bp kgqkiasrióe; 
P ls qigdhf ls hig kglapbpká, 
Hfkjsg gb níp ng ls pcbirrióe glqá rgkrpef, 
Y bf jsg bgl glqá hkghpkpnf lg phkglskp. 
36 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá mszupká p ls hsgabf, 
Y hfk pdfk ng lsl ligkvfl lg pkkghgeqiká, 
Rspenf vigkg jsg bp csgkzp hgkgrió, 
Y jsg ef jsgnp ei ligkvf ei biakg. 
37 Y niká: ¿Nóeng glqáe lsl niflgl, 
Bp kfrp ge jsg lg kgcsuipape; 
38 Jsg rfdípe bp ukflskp ng lsl lprkicirifl, 
Y agaípe gb vief ng lsl biaprifegl? 
Bgváeqgelg, jsg fl pysnge 
Y fl ngcigenpe. 
39 Vgn ptfkp jsg yf, yf lfy, 
Y ef tpy niflgl rfediuf; 
Yf tpuf dfkik, y yf tpuf vivik; 
Yf tigkf, y yf lpef; 
Y ef tpy jsige hsgnp biakpk ng di dpef. 
40 Hfkjsg yf pbzpké p bfl rigbfl di dpef, 
Y niké: Vivf yf hpkp ligdhkg, 
41 Li pcibpkg di kgbsrigeqg glhpnp, 
Y grtpkg dpef ngb msirif, 
Yf qfdpké vgeupezp ng dil gegdiufl, 
Y npké bp kgqkiasrióe p bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge. 
42 Gdakipupké ng lpeukg dil lpgqpl, 
Y di glhpnp ngvfkpká rpkeg; 
Ge bp lpeukg ng bfl dsgkqfl y ng bfl rpsqivfl, 
Ge bpl rpagzpl ng bpkup rpagbbgkp ngb gegdiuf. 
43 Pbpapn, eprifegl, p ls hsgabf, 
Hfkjsg éb vgeupká bp lpeukg ng lsl ligkvfl, 
Y qfdpká vgeupezp ng lsl gegdiufl, 
Y tpká gxhiprióe hfk bp qigkkp ng ls hsgabf. 

44 Vief Dfilél y kgriqó qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng glqg ráeqirf p fínfl ngb hsgabf, éb y Mflsé timf ng Ese. 45 Y prpaó Dfilél ng kgriqpk qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl p qfnf Ilkpgb; 46 y bgl nimf: Phbirpn vsglqkf rfkpzóe p qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg yf fl qglqicirf tfy, hpkp jsg bpl dpenéil p vsglqkfl timfl, p cie ng jsg rsinge ng rsdhbik qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp bgy. 47 Hfkjsg ef fl gl rflp vpep; gl vsglqkp vinp, y hfk dgnif ng glqp bgy tpkéil hkfbfeupk vsglqkfl nípl lfakg bp qigkkp pnfeng vpil, hplpenf gb Mfknáe, hpkp qfdpk hflglióe ng gbbp. 

Lg bg hgkdiqg p Dfilél rfeqgdhbpk bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe

48 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dfilél pjsgb dildf níp, nirigenf: 49 Lsag p glqg dfeqg ng Papkid, pb dfeqg Egaf, liqspnf ge bp qigkkp ng Dfpa jsg glqá ckgeqg p Mgkiró, y dikp bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, jsg yf nfy hfk tgkgnpn p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; 50 y dsgkg ge gb dfeqg pb rspb lsagl, y lé seinf p qs hsgabf, plí rfdf dskió Ppkóe qs tgkdpef ge gb dfeqg Tfk, y csg seinf p ls hsgabf; 51 hfk rspeqf hgrplqgil rfeqkp dí ge dgnif ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge bpl puspl ng Dgkiap ng Rpngl, ge gb ngligkqf ng Zie; hfkjsg ef dg lpeqicirplqgil ge dgnif ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 52 Vgkál, hfk qpeqf, ngbpeqg ng qi bp qigkkp; dpl ef geqkpkál pbbá, p bp qigkkp jsg nfy p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

Dfilél agenirg p bpl nfrg qkiasl ng Ilkpgb

NGSQGKFEFDIF 33

1 Glqp gl bp agenirióe rfe bp rspb agenimf Dfilél vpkóe ng Nifl p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, peqgl jsg dskiglg. 2 Nimf: 


Mgtfvá vief ng Liepí, 
Y ng Lgik bgl glrbpkgrió; 
Kglhbpengrió nglng gb dfeqg ng Hpkáe, 
Y vief ng geqkg nigz dibbpkgl ng lpeqfl, 
Rfe bp bgy ng csguf p ls dpef ngkgrtp. 
3 Pse pdó p ls hsgabf; 
Qfnfl bfl rfelpukpnfl p éb glqpape ge ls dpef; 
Hfk qpeqf, gbbfl liusigkfe ge qsl hplfl, 
Kgriaigenf nikgrrióe ng qi, 
4 Rspenf Dfilél efl fkngeó sep bgy, 
Rfdf tgkgnpn p bp rfeukguprióe ng Mprfa. 
5 Y csg kgy ge Mglskúe, 
Rspenf lg rfeukgupkfe bfl mgcgl ngb hsgabf 
Rfe bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. 
6 Vivp Ksaée, y ef dsgkp; 
Y ef lgpe hfrfl lsl vpkfegl. 



7 Y glqp agenirióe hkfcikió hpkp Msná. Nimf plí: 


Fyg, ft Mgtfvá, bp vfz ng Msná, 
Y bbévpbf p ls hsgabf; 
Lsl dpefl bg aplqge, 
Y qú lgpl ls pysnp rfeqkp lsl gegdiufl. 



8 P Bgví nimf: 


Qs Qsdid y qs Skid lgpe hpkp qs vpkóe hipnflf, 
P jsige hkfaplqg ge Dplpt, 
Rfe jsige rfeqgenilqg ge bpl puspl ng Dgkiap, 
9 Jsige nimf ng ls hpnkg y ng ls dpnkg: Eserp bfl tg vilqf; 
Y ef kgrfefrió p lsl tgkdpefl, 
Ei p lsl timfl rfefrió; 
Hsgl gbbfl uspknpkfe qsl hpbpakpl, 
Y rsdhbigkfe qs hprqf. 
10 Gbbfl gelgñpkáe qsl msirifl p Mprfa, 
Y qs bgy p Ilkpgb; 
Hfenkáe gb ierigelf ngbpeqg ng qi, 
Y gb tfbfrpslqf lfakg qs pbqpk. 
11 Agenirg, ft Mgtfvá, bf jsg tirigkge, 
Y kgriag rfe pukpnf bp fakp ng lsl dpefl; 
Tigkg bfl bfdfl ng lsl gegdiufl, 
Y ng bfl jsg bf pafkkgrigkge, hpkp jsg eserp lg bgvpeqge. 



12 P Agempdíe nimf: 


Gb pdpnf ng Mgtfvá tpaiqpká rfecipnf rgkrp ng éb; 
Bf rsakiká ligdhkg, 
Y geqkg lsl tfdakfl dfkpká. 



13 P Mflé nimf: 


Ageniqp ng Mgtfvá lgp qs qigkkp, 
Rfe bf dgmfk ng bfl rigbfl, rfe gb kfríf, 
Y rfe gb paildf jsg glqá papmf. 
14 Rfe bfl dál glrfuinfl cksqfl ngb lfb, 
Rfe gb kirf hkfnsrqf ng bp bsep, 
15 Rfe gb cksqf dál cief ng bfl dfeqgl peqiusfl, 
Rfe bp pasenperip ng bfl rfbbpnfl gqgkefl, 
16 Y rfe bpl dgmfkgl nánivpl ng bp qigkkp y ls hbgeiqsn; 
Y bp ukprip ngb jsg tpaiqó ge bp zpkzp 
Vgeup lfakg bp rpagzp ng Mflé, 
Y lfakg bp ckgeqg ng pjsgb jsg gl hkíerihg geqkg lsl tgkdpefl. 
17 Rfdf gb hkidfuéeiqf ng ls qfkf gl ls ubfkip, 
Y lsl plqpl rfdf plqpl ng aúcpbf; 
Rfe gbbpl prfkegpká p bfl hsgabfl mseqfl tplqp bfl ciegl ng bp qigkkp; 
Gbbfl lfe bfl nigz dibbpkgl ng Gckpíe, 
Y gbbfl lfe bfl dibbpkgl ng Dpeplél. 



18 P Zpasbóe nimf: 


Pbéukpqg, Zpasbóe, rspenf lpbigkgl; 
Y qú, Ilprpk, ge qsl qigenpl. 
19 Bbpdpkáe p bfl hsgabfl p ls dfeqg; 
Pbbí lprkicirpkáe lprkicirifl ng mslqirip, 
Hfk bf rspb rtshpkáe bp pasenperip ng bfl dpkgl, 
Y bfl qglfkfl glrfeninfl ng bp pkgep. 



20 P Upn nimf: 


Ageniqf gb jsg tizf gelpertpk p Upn; 
Rfdf bgóe kghflp, 
Y pkkgapqp akpzf y qglqp. 
21 Glrfug bf dgmfk ng bp qigkkp hpkp lí, 
Hfkjsg pbbí bg csg kglgkvpnp bp hfkrióe ngb bguilbpnfk. 
Y vief ge bp ngbpeqgkp ngb hsgabf; 
Rfe Ilkpgb gmgrsqó bfl dpenpqfl y bfl mslqfl ngrkgqfl ng Mgtfvá. 



22 P Npe nimf: 


Npe gl rprtfkkf ng bgóe 
Jsg lpbqp nglng Apláe. 



23 P Egcqpbí nimf: 


Egcqpbí, lpripnf ng cpvfkgl, 
Y bbgef ng bp agenirióe ng Mgtfvá, 
Hflgg gb frringeqg y gb lsk. 



24 P Plgk nimf: 


Ageniqf lfakg bfl timfl lgp Plgk; 
Lgp gb pdpnf ng lsl tgkdpefl, 
Y dfmg ge prgiqg ls hig. 
25 Tigkkf y akferg lgkáe qsl rgkkfmfl, 
Y rfdf qsl nípl lgkáe qsl csgkzpl. 
26 Ef tpy rfdf gb Nifl ng Mglskúe, 
Jsige rpapbup lfakg bfl rigbfl hpkp qs pysnp, 
Y lfakg bpl esagl rfe ls ukpengzp. 
27 Gb gqgkef Nifl gl qs kgcsuif, 
Y prá papmf bfl akpzfl gqgkefl; 
Gb grtó ng ngbpeqg ng qi pb gegdiuf, 
Y nimf: Nglqksyg. 
28 G Ilkpgb tpaiqpká rfecipnf, bp csgeqg ng Mprfa tpaiqpká lfbp 
Ge qigkkp ng ukpef y ng vief; 
Qpdaiée lsl rigbfl nglqibpkáe kfríf. 
29 Aigepvgeqskpnf qú, ft Ilkpgb. 
¿Jsiée rfdf qú, 
Hsgabf lpbvf hfk Mgtfvá, 
Glrsnf ng qs lfrfkkf, 
Y glhpnp ng qs qkisecf? 
Plí jsg qsl gegdiufl lgkáe tsdibbpnfl, 
Y qú tfbbpkál lfakg lsl pbqskpl. 



Dsgkqg y lghsbqskp ng Dfilél

NGSQGKFEFDIF 34

1 Lsaió Dfilél ng bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa pb dfeqg Egaf, p bp rsdakg ngb Hilup, jsg glqá geckgeqg ng Mgkiró; y bg dflqkó Mgtfvá qfnp bp qigkkp ng Upbppn tplqp Npe, 2 qfnf Egcqpbí, y bp qigkkp ng Gckpíe y ng Dpeplél, qfnp bp qigkkp ng Msná tplqp gb dpk frringeqpb; 3 gb Egusgv, y bp bbpeskp, bp vgup ng Mgkiró, risnpn ng bpl hpbdgkpl, tplqp Zfpk. 4 Y bg nimf Mgtfvá: Glqp gl bp qigkkp ng jsg mské p Pakptpd, p Ilppr y p Mprfa, nirigenf: P qs nglrgengerip bp npké. Qg tg hgkdiqinf vgkbp rfe qsl fmfl, dpl ef hplpkál pbbá. 5 Y dskió pbbí Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá, ge bp qigkkp ng Dfpa, rfecfkdg pb nirtf ng Mgtfvá. 6 Y bf geqgkkó ge gb vpbbg, ge bp qigkkp ng Dfpa, geckgeqg ng Agq-hgfk; y eieusef rfefrg gb bsupk ng ls lghsbqskp tplqp tfy. 7 Gkp Dfilél ng gnpn ng rigeqf vgieqg pñfl rspenf dskió; lsl fmfl eserp lg flrskgrigkfe, ei hgknió ls viufk. 8 Y bbfkpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p Dfilél ge bfl rpdhfl ng Dfpa qkgieqp nípl; y plí lg rsdhbigkfe bfl nípl ngb bbfkf y ngb bsqf ng Dfilél. 

9 Y Mflsé timf ng Ese csg bbgef ngb glhíkiqs ng lpainskíp, hfkjsg Dfilél tpaíp hsglqf lsl dpefl lfakg éb; y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb bg fagngrigkfe, g tirigkfe rfdf Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél. 10 Y eserp dál lg bgvpeqó hkfcgqp ge Ilkpgb rfdf Dfilél, p jsige tpyp rfefrinf Mgtfvá rpkp p rpkp; 11 epnig rfdf éb ge qfnpl bpl lgñpbgl y hkfniuifl jsg Mgtfvá bg gevió p tprgk ge qigkkp ng Guihqf, p Cpkpóe y p qfnfl lsl ligkvfl y p qfnp ls qigkkp, 12 y ge gb ukpe hfngk y ge bfl tgrtfl ukpeniflfl y qgkkiabgl jsg Dfilél tizf p bp vilqp ng qfnf Ilkpgb. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


MFLSÉ 

Hkghpkpqivfl hpkp bp rfejsilqp

MFLSÉ 1

1 Prfeqgrió nglhsél ng bp dsgkqg ng Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá, jsg Mgtfvá tpabó p Mflsé timf ng Ese, lgkvinfk ng Dfilél, nirigenf: 2 Di ligkvf Dfilél tp dsgkqf; ptfkp, hsgl, bgváeqpqg y hplp glqg Mfknáe, qú y qfnf glqg hsgabf, p bp qigkkp jsg yf bgl nfy p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 3 Yf fl tg geqkgupnf, rfdf bf tpaíp nirtf p Dfilél, qfnf bsupk jsg hilpkg bp hbpeqp ng vsglqkf hig. 4 Nglng gb ngligkqf y gb Bíapef tplqp gb ukpe kíf Gsckpqgl, qfnp bp qigkkp ng bfl tgqgfl tplqp gb ukpe dpk nfeng lg hfeg gb lfb, lgká vsglqkf qgkkiqfkif. 5 Epnig qg hfnká tprgk ckgeqg ge qfnfl bfl nípl ng qs vinp; rfdf glqsvg rfe Dfilél, glqpké rfeqiuf; ef qg ngmpké, ei qg nglpdhpkpké. 6 Glcsékzpqg y lé vpbigeqg; hfkjsg qú kghpkqikál p glqg hsgabf hfk tgkgnpn bp qigkkp ng bp rspb mské p lsl hpnkgl jsg bp npkíp p gbbfl. 7 Lfbpdgeqg glcsékzpqg y lé dsy vpbigeqg, hpkp rsinpk ng tprgk rfecfkdg p qfnp bp bgy jsg di ligkvf Dfilél qg dpenó; ef qg phpkqgl ng gbbp ei p niglqkp ei p lieiglqkp, hpkp jsg lgpl hkflhgkpnf ge qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg gdhkgenpl. 8 Eserp lg phpkqpká ng qs afrp glqg biakf ng bp bgy, lief jsg ng níp y ng efrtg dgniqpkál ge éb, hpkp jsg uspkngl y tpupl rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg ge éb glqá glrkiqf; hfkjsg geqfergl tpkál hkflhgkpk qs rpdief, y qfnf qg lpbnká aige. 9 Dikp jsg qg dpenf jsg qg glcsgkrgl y lgpl vpbigeqg; ef qgdpl ei ngldpygl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl glqpká rfeqiuf ge nfengjsigkp jsg vpypl. 

10 Y Mflsé dpenó p bfl fciripbgl ngb hsgabf, nirigenf: 11 Hplpn hfk ge dgnif ngb rpdhpdgeqf y dpenpn pb hsgabf, nirigenf: Hkghpkpfl rfdinp, hfkjsg ngeqkf ng qkgl nípl hplpkéil gb Mfknáe hpkp geqkpk p hflggk bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl np ge hflglióe. 

12 Qpdaiée tpabó Mflsé p bfl ksageiqpl y upniqpl y p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, nirigenf: 13 Prfknpfl ng bp hpbpakp jsg Dfilél, ligkvf ng Mgtfvá, fl dpenó nirigenf: Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl tp npnf kghflf, y fl tp npnf glqp qigkkp. 14 Vsglqkpl dsmgkgl, vsglqkfl eiñfl y vsglqkfl upepnfl jsgnpkáe ge bp qigkkp jsg Dfilél fl tp npnf p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe; dpl vflfqkfl, qfnfl bfl vpbigeqgl y csgkqgl, hplpkéil pkdpnfl ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl tgkdpefl, y bgl pysnpkéil, 15 tplqp qpeqf jsg Mgtfvá tpyp npnf kghflf p vsglqkfl tgkdpefl rfdf p vflfqkfl, y jsg gbbfl qpdaiée hflgpe bp qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl bgl np; y nglhsél vfbvgkéil vflfqkfl p bp qigkkp ng vsglqkp tgkgerip, bp rspb Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá fl tp npnf, p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe tprip nfeng eprg gb lfb; y geqkpkéil ge hflglióe ng gbbp. 16 Geqfergl kglhfenigkfe p Mflsé, nirigenf: Eflfqkfl tpkgdfl qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg efl tpl dpenpnf, g ikgdfl pnfengjsigkp jsg efl dpengl. 17 Ng bp dpegkp jsg fagngridfl p Dfilél ge qfnpl bpl rflpl, plí qg fagngrgkgdfl p qi; lfbpdgeqg jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl glqé rfeqiuf, rfdf glqsvf rfe Dfilél. 18 Rspbjsigkp jsg csgkg kgagbng p qs dpenpdigeqf, y ef fagngrigkg p qsl hpbpakpl ge qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg bg dpengl, jsg dsgkp; lfbpdgeqg jsg qg glcsgkrgl y lgpl vpbigeqg. 

Mflsé gevíp glhípl p Mgkiró

MFLSÉ 2

1 Mflsé timf ng Ese gevió nglng Liqid nfl glhípl lgrkgqpdgeqg, niriéenfbgl: Penpn, kgrfefrgn bp qigkkp, y p Mgkiró. Y gbbfl csgkfe, y geqkpkfe ge rplp ng sep kpdgkp jsg lg bbpdpap Kptpa, y hflpkfe pbbí. 2 Y csg npnf pvilf pb kgy ng Mgkiró, nirigenf: Tg pjsí jsg tfdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpe vgeinf pjsí glqp efrtg hpkp glhipk bp qigkkp. 3 Geqfergl gb kgy ng Mgkiró gevió p ngrik p Kptpa: Lprp p bfl tfdakgl jsg tpe vgeinf p qi, y tpe geqkpnf p qs rplp; hfkjsg tpe vgeinf hpkp glhipk qfnp bp qigkkp. 4 Hgkf bp dsmgk tpaíp qfdpnf p bfl nfl tfdakgl y bfl tpaíp glrfeninf; y nimf: Gl vgknpn jsg sefl tfdakgl vieigkfe p dí, hgkf ef lshg ng nóeng gkpe. 5 Y rspenf lg iap p rgkkpk bp hsgkqp, ligenf yp flrskf, glfl tfdakgl lg lpbigkfe, y ef lé p nóeng tpe inf; lgusinbfl phkilp, y bfl pbrpezpkéil. 6 Dpl gbbp bfl tpaíp tgrtf lsaik pb qgkkpnf, y bfl tpaíp glrfeninf geqkg bfl dpefmfl ng bief jsg qgeíp hsglqfl ge gb qgkkpnf. 7 Y bfl tfdakgl csgkfe qkpl gbbfl hfk gb rpdief ngb Mfknáe, tplqp bfl vpnfl; y bp hsgkqp csg rgkkpnp nglhsél jsg lpbigkfe bfl hgklgusinfkgl. 

8 Peqgl jsg gbbfl lg nskdiglge, gbbp lsaió pb qgkkpnf, y bgl nimf: 9 Lé jsg Mgtfvá fl tp npnf glqp qigkkp; hfkjsg gb qgdfk ng vflfqkfl tp rpínf lfakg eflfqkfl, y qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb hpíl yp tpe ngldpypnf hfk rpslp ng vflfqkfl. 10 Hfkjsg tgdfl fínf jsg Mgtfvá tizf lgrpk bpl puspl ngb Dpk Kfmf ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl rspenf lpbilqgil ng Guihqf, y bf jsg tpaéil tgrtf p bfl nfl kgygl ng bfl pdfkkgfl jsg glqpape pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe, p Lgtóe y p Fu, p bfl rspbgl tpaéil nglqksinf. 11 Fygenf glqf, tp ngldpypnf esglqkf rfkpzóe; ei tp jsgnpnf dál pbigeqf ge tfdakg pbusef hfk rpslp ng vflfqkfl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl gl Nifl pkkiap ge bfl rigbfl y papmf ge bp qigkkp. 12 Fl ksguf hsgl, ptfkp, jsg dg mskéil hfk Mgtfvá, jsg rfdf tg tgrtf dilgkirfknip rfe vflfqkfl, plí bp tpkéil vflfqkfl rfe bp rplp ng di hpnkg, ng bf rspb dg npkéil sep lgñpb lguskp; 13 y jsg lpbvpkéil bp vinp p di hpnkg y p di dpnkg, p dil tgkdpefl y tgkdpepl, y p qfnf bf jsg gl lsyf; y jsg biakpkéil esglqkpl vinpl ng bp dsgkqg. 14 Gbbfl bg kglhfenigkfe: Esglqkp vinp kglhfengká hfk bp vsglqkp, li ef ngeseripkgil glqg plseqf esglqkf; y rspenf Mgtfvá efl tpyp npnf bp qigkkp, eflfqkfl tpkgdfl rfeqiuf dilgkirfknip y vgknpn. 

15 Geqfergl gbbp bfl tizf nglrgengk rfe sep rsgknp hfk bp vgeqpep; hfkjsg ls rplp glqpap ge gb dskf ng bp risnpn, y gbbp vivíp ge gb dskf. 16 Y bgl nimf: Dpkrtpfl pb dfeqg, hpkp jsg bfl jsg csgkfe qkpl vflfqkfl ef fl gersgeqkge; y glqpn glrfeninfl pbbí qkgl nípl, tplqp jsg bfl jsg fl liusge tpype vsgbqf; y nglhsél fl ikéil hfk vsglqkf rpdief. 17 Y gbbfl bg nimgkfe: Eflfqkfl jsgnpkgdfl biakgl ng glqg mskpdgeqf rfe jsg efl tpl mskpdgeqpnf. 18 Tg pjsí, rspenf eflfqkfl geqkgdfl ge bp qigkkp, qú pqpkál glqg rfknóe ng ukpep p bp vgeqpep hfk bp rspb efl nglrfbuplqg; y kgseikál ge qs rplp p qs hpnkg y p qs dpnkg, p qsl tgkdpefl y p qfnp bp cpdibip ng qs hpnkg. 19 Rspbjsigkp jsg lpbigkg csgkp ng bpl hsgkqpl ng qs rplp, ls lpeukg lgká lfakg ls rpagzp, y eflfqkfl lie rsbhp. Dpl rspbjsigkp jsg lg glqsvigkg ge rplp rfeqiuf, ls lpeukg lgká lfakg esglqkp rpagzp, li dpef bg qfrpkg. 20 Y li qú ngeseripkgl glqg esglqkf plseqf, eflfqkfl jsgnpkgdfl biakgl ng glqg qs mskpdgeqf rfe jsg efl tpl mskpdgeqpnf. 21 Gbbp kglhfenió: Lgp plí rfdf tpaéil nirtf. Bsguf bfl nglhinió, y lg csgkfe; y gbbp pqó gb rfknóe ng ukpep p bp vgeqpep. 

22 Y rpdiepenf gbbfl, bbgupkfe pb dfeqg y glqsvigkfe pbbí qkgl nípl, tplqp jsg vfbvigkfe bfl jsg bfl hgklgusípe; y bfl jsg bfl hgkliusigkfe aslrpkfe hfk qfnf gb rpdief, hgkf ef bfl tpbbpkfe. 23 Geqfergl vfbvigkfe bfl nfl tfdakgl; nglrgenigkfe ngb dfeqg, y hplpkfe, y vieigkfe p Mflsé timf ng Ese, y bg rfeqpkfe qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg bgl tpaípe prfeqgrinf. 24 Y nimgkfe p Mflsé: Mgtfvá tp geqkgupnf qfnp bp qigkkp ge esglqkpl dpefl; y qpdaiée qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb hpíl ngldpype ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl. 

Gb hplf ngb Mfknáe

MFLSÉ 3

1 Mflsé lg bgvpeqó ng dpñpep, y éb y qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hpkqigkfe ng Liqid y vieigkfe tplqp gb Mfknáe, y kghflpkfe pbbí peqgl ng hplpkbf. 2 Y nglhsél ng qkgl nípl, bfl fciripbgl kgrfkkigkfe gb rpdhpdgeqf, 3 y dpenpkfe pb hsgabf, nirigenf: Rspenf vgáil gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y bfl bgviqpl lprgknfqgl jsg bp bbgvpe, vflfqkfl lpbnkéil ng vsglqkf bsupk y dpkrtpkéil ge hfl ng gbbp, 4 p cie ng jsg lgháil gb rpdief hfk nfeng tpaéil ng ik; hfk rspeqf vflfqkfl ef tpaéil hplpnf peqgl ng ptfkp hfk glqg rpdief. Hgkf geqkg vflfqkfl y gbbp tpyp nilqperip rfdf ng nfl dib rfnfl; ef fl prgkrpkéil p gbbp. 5 Y Mflsé nimf pb hsgabf: Lpeqicirpfl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá tpká dpñpep dpkpvibbpl geqkg vflfqkfl. 6 Y tpabó Mflsé p bfl lprgknfqgl, nirigenf: Qfdpn gb pkrp ngb hprqf, y hplpn ngbpeqg ngb hsgabf. Y gbbfl qfdpkfe gb pkrp ngb hprqf y csgkfe ngbpeqg ngb hsgabf. 

7 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nimf p Mflsé: Nglng glqg níp rfdgezpké p geukpengrgkqg ngbpeqg ng bfl fmfl ng qfnf Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg geqigenpe jsg rfdf glqsvg rfe Dfilél, plí glqpké rfeqiuf. 8 Qú, hsgl, dpenpkál p bfl lprgknfqgl jsg bbgvpe gb pkrp ngb hprqf, nirigenf: Rspenf tpyáil geqkpnf tplqp gb afkng ngb pusp ngb Mfknáe, hpkpkéil ge gb Mfknáe. 9 Y Mflsé nimf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Prgkrpfl, y glrsrtpn bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 10 Y pñpnió Mflsé: Ge glqf rfefrgkéil jsg gb Nifl vivigeqg glqá ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl, y jsg éb grtpká ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl pb rpepegf, pb tgqgf, pb tgvgf, pb cgkgzgf, pb ugkuglgf, pb pdfkkgf y pb mgaslgf. 11 Tg pjsí, gb pkrp ngb hprqf ngb Lgñfk ng qfnp bp qigkkp hplpká ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl ge dgnif ngb Mfknáe. 12 Qfdpn, hsgl, ptfkp nfrg tfdakgl ng bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb, sef ng rpnp qkias. 13 Y rspenf bpl hbpeqpl ng bfl higl ng bfl lprgknfqgl jsg bbgvpe gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá, Lgñfk ng qfnp bp qigkkp, lg pligeqge ge bpl puspl ngb Mfknáe, bpl puspl ngb Mfknáe lg nivinikáe; hfkjsg bpl puspl jsg vigege ng pkkiap lg ngqgenkáe ge se dfeqóe. 

14 Y prfeqgrió rspenf hpkqió gb hsgabf ng lsl qigenpl hpkp hplpk gb Mfknáe, rfe bfl lprgknfqgl ngbpeqg ngb hsgabf bbgvpenf gb pkrp ngb hprqf, 15 rspenf bfl jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp geqkpkfe ge gb Mfknáe, y bfl higl ng bfl lprgknfqgl jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp csgkfe dfmpnfl p bp fkibbp ngb pusp (hfkjsg gb Mfknáe lsgbg nglafknpklg hfk qfnpl lsl fkibbpl qfnf gb qigdhf ng bp ligup), 16 bpl puspl jsg vgeípe ng pkkiap lg ngqsvigkfe rfdf ge se dfeqóe aige bgmfl ng bp risnpn ng Pnpd, jsg glqá pb bpnf ng Lpkgqáe, y bpl jsg nglrgenípe pb dpk ngb Pkpaá, pb Dpk Lpbpnf, lg prpapkfe, y csgkfe nivininpl; y gb hsgabf hpló ge nikgrrióe ng Mgkiró. 17 Dpl bfl lprgknfqgl jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, glqsvigkfe ge lgrf, cikdgl ge dgnif ngb Mfknáe, tplqp jsg qfnf gb hsgabf tsaf prpapnf ng hplpk gb Mfknáe; y qfnf Ilkpgb hpló ge lgrf. 

Bpl nfrg hignkpl qfdpnpl ngb Mfknáe

MFLSÉ 4

1 Rspenf qfnp bp ugeqg tsaf prpapnf ng hplpk gb Mfknáe, Mgtfvá tpabó p Mflsé, nirigenf: 2 Qfdpn ngb hsgabf nfrg tfdakgl, sef ng rpnp qkias, 3 y dpenpnbgl, nirigenf: Qfdpn ng pjsí ng ge dgnif ngb Mfknáe, ngb bsupk nfeng glqáe cikdgl bfl higl ng bfl lprgknfqgl, nfrg hignkpl, bpl rspbgl hplpkéil rfe vflfqkfl, y bgvpeqpnbpl ge gb bsupk nfeng tpaéil ng hplpk bp efrtg. 4 Geqfergl Mflsé bbpdó p bfl nfrg tfdakgl p bfl rspbgl éb tpaíp ngliuepnf ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, sef ng rpnp qkias. 5 Y bgl nimf Mflsé: Hplpn ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl p bp diqpn ngb Mfknáe, y rpnp sef ng vflfqkfl qfdg sep hignkp lfakg ls tfdakf, rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, 6 hpkp jsg glqf lgp lgñpb geqkg vflfqkfl; y rspenf vsglqkfl timfl hkguseqpkge p lsl hpnkgl dpñpep, nirigenf: ¿Jsé liueicirpe glqpl hignkpl? 7 bgl kglhfengkéil: Jsg bpl puspl ngb Mfknáe csgkfe nivininpl ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá; rspenf gbbp hpló gb Mfknáe, bpl puspl ngb Mfknáe lg nivinigkfe; y glqpl hignkpl lgkvikáe ng dfesdgeqf rfedgdfkpqivf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hpkp ligdhkg. 

8 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb bf tirigkfe plí rfdf Mflsé bgl dpenó: qfdpkfe nfrg hignkpl ng ge dgnif ngb Mfknáe, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp nirtf p Mflsé, rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y bpl hplpkfe pb bsupk nfeng prpdhpkfe, y bpl bgvpeqpkfe pbbí. 9 Mflsé qpdaiée bgvpeqó nfrg hignkpl ge dgnif ngb Mfknáe, ge gb bsupk nfeng glqsvigkfe bfl higl ng bfl lprgknfqgl jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp ngb hprqf; y tpe glqpnf pbbí tplqp tfy. 10 Y bfl lprgknfqgl jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp lg hpkpkfe ge dgnif ngb Mfknáe tplqp jsg lg tizf qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Mflsé jsg nimglg pb hsgabf, rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Dfilél tpaíp dpenpnf p Mflsé; y gb hsgabf lg nif hkilp y hpló. 

11 Y rspenf qfnf gb hsgabf prpaó ng hplpk, qpdaiée hpló gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá, y bfl lprgknfqgl, ge hkglgerip ngb hsgabf. 12 Qpdaiée bfl timfl ng Ksaée y bfl timfl ng Upn y bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél hplpkfe pkdpnfl ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, lguúe Dfilél bgl tpaíp nirtf; 13 rfdf rspkgeqp dib tfdakgl pkdpnfl, bilqfl hpkp bp usgkkp, hplpkfe tprip bp bbpeskp ng Mgkiró ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 14 Ge pjsgb níp Mgtfvá geukpengrió p Mflsé p bfl fmfl ng qfnf Ilkpgb; y bg qgdigkfe, rfdf tpaípe qgdinf p Dfilél, qfnfl bfl nípl ng ls vinp. 

15 Bsguf Mgtfvá tpabó p Mflsé, nirigenf: 16 Dpenp p bfl lprgknfqgl jsg bbgvpe gb pkrp ngb qglqidfeif, jsg lsape ngb Mfknáe. 17 Y Mflsé dpenó p bfl lprgknfqgl, nirigenf: Lsain ngb Mfknáe. 18 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf bfl lprgknfqgl jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá lsaigkfe ng ge dgnif ngb Mfknáe, y bpl hbpeqpl ng bfl higl ng bfl lprgknfqgl glqsvigkfe ge bsupk lgrf, bpl puspl ngb Mfknáe lg vfbvigkfe p ls bsupk, rfkkigenf rfdf peqgl lfakg qfnfl lsl afkngl. 

19 Y gb hsgabf lsaió ngb Mfknáe gb níp nigz ngb dgl hkidgkf, y prpdhpkfe ge Uibupb, pb bpnf fkigeqpb ng Mgkiró. 20 Y Mflsé gkiuió ge Uibupb bpl nfrg hignkpl jsg tpaípe qkpínf ngb Mfknáe. 21 Y tpabó p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Rspenf dpñpep hkguseqpkge vsglqkfl timfl p lsl hpnkgl, y nimgkge: ¿Jsé liueicirpe glqpl hignkpl? 22 ngrbpkpkéil p vsglqkfl timfl, nirigenf: Ilkpgb hpló ge lgrf hfk glqg Mfknáe. 23 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl lgró bpl puspl ngb Mfknáe ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, tplqp jsg tpaípil hplpnf, p bp dpegkp jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl bf tpaíp tgrtf ge gb Dpk Kfmf, gb rspb lgró ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl tplqp jsg hplpdfl; 24 hpkp jsg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp rfefzrpe jsg bp dpef ng Mgtfvá gl hfngkflp; hpkp jsg qgdáil p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl qfnfl bfl nípl. 

Bp rikrserilióe y bp hplrsp ge Uibupb

MFLSÉ 5

1 Rspenf qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bfl pdfkkgfl jsg glqpape pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe pb frringeqg, y qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bfl rpepegfl jsg glqpape rgkrp ngb dpk, fygkfe ródf Mgtfvá tpaíp lgrpnf bpl puspl ngb Mfknáe ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tplqp jsg tsaigkfe hplpnf, nglcpbbgrió ls rfkpzóe, y ef tsaf dál pbigeqf ge gbbfl ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

2 Ge pjsgb qigdhf Mgtfvá nimf p Mflsé: Tpzqg rsrtibbfl pcibpnfl, y vsgbvg p rikrserinpk bp lgusenp vgz p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 3 Y Mflsé lg tizf rsrtibbfl pcibpnfl, y rikrserinó p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge gb rfbbpnf ng Pkpbfq. 4 Glqp gl bp rpslp hfk bp rspb Mflsé bfl rikrserinó: Qfnf gb hsgabf jsg tpaíp lpbinf ng Guihqf, bfl vpkfegl, qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp, tpaípe dsgkqf ge gb ngligkqf, hfk gb rpdief, nglhsél jsg lpbigkfe ng Guihqf. 5 Hsgl qfnfl bfl ngb hsgabf jsg tpaípe lpbinf, glqpape rikrserinpnfl; dpl qfnf gb hsgabf jsg tpaíp eprinf ge gb ngligkqf, hfk gb rpdief, nglhsél jsg tsaigkfe lpbinf ng Guihqf, ef glqpap rikrserinpnf. 6 Hfkjsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb pensvigkfe hfk gb ngligkqf rspkgeqp pñfl, tplqp jsg qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp jsg tpaípe lpbinf ng Guihqf csgkfe rfelsdinfl, hfk rspeqf ef fagngrigkfe p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá; hfk bf rspb Mgtfvá bgl mskó jsg ef bgl ngmpkíp vgk bp qigkkp ng bp rspb Mgtfvá tpaíp mskpnf p lsl hpnkgl jsg efl bp npkíp, qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb. 7 P bfl timfl ng gbbfl, jsg éb tpaíp tgrtf lsrgngk ge ls bsupk, Mflsé bfl rikrserinó; hsgl gkpe ierikrserilfl, hfkjsg ef tpaípe linf rikrserinpnfl hfk gb rpdief. 

8 Y rspenf prpapkfe ng rikrserinpk p qfnp bp ugeqg, lg jsgnpkfe ge gb dildf bsupk ge gb rpdhpdgeqf, tplqp jsg lpepkfe. 9 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Mflsé: Tfy tg jsiqpnf ng vflfqkfl gb fhkfaif ng Guihqf; hfk bf rspb gb efdakg ng pjsgb bsupk csg bbpdpnf Uibupb, tplqp tfy. 

10 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb prpdhpkfe ge Uibupb, y rgbgakpkfe bp hplrsp p bfl rpqfkrg nípl ngb dgl, hfk bp qpkng, ge bfl bbpefl ng Mgkiró. 11 Pb fqkf níp ng bp hplrsp rfdigkfe ngb cksqf ng bp qigkkp, bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp, y ge gb dildf níp glhiupl esgvpl qflqpnpl. 12 Y gb dpeá rgló gb níp liusigeqg, nglng jsg rfdgezpkfe p rfdgk ngb cksqf ng bp qigkkp; y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb eserp dál qsvigkfe dpeá, lief jsg rfdigkfe ng bfl cksqfl ng bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe pjsgb pñf. 

Mflsé y gb vpkóe rfe bp glhpnp nglgevpiepnp

13 Glqpenf Mflsé rgkrp ng Mgkiró, pbzó lsl fmfl y vif se vpkóe jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ng éb, gb rspb qgeíp sep glhpnp nglgevpiepnp ge ls dpef. Y Mflsé, ygenf tprip éb, bg nimf: ¿Gkgl ng bfl esglqkfl, f ng esglqkfl gegdiufl? 14 Gb kglhfenió: Ef; dpl rfdf Hkíerihg ngb gmékriqf ng Mgtfvá tg vgeinf ptfkp. Geqfergl Mflsé, hflqkáenflg lfakg ls kflqkf ge qigkkp, bg pnfkó; y bg nimf: ¿Jsé nirg di Lgñfk p ls ligkvf? 15 Y gb Hkíerihg ngb gmékriqf ng Mgtfvá kglhfenió p Mflsé: Jsiqp gb rpbzpnf ng qsl higl, hfkjsg gb bsupk nfeng glqál gl lpeqf. Y Mflsé plí bf tizf. 

Bp qfdp ng Mgkiró

MFLSÉ 6

1 Ptfkp, Mgkiró glqpap rgkkpnp, aige rgkkpnp, p rpslp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; epnig geqkpap ei lpbíp. 2 Dpl Mgtfvá nimf p Mflsé: Dikp, yf tg geqkgupnf ge qs dpef p Mgkiró y p ls kgy, rfe lsl vpkfegl ng usgkkp. 3 Kfngpkéil, hsgl, bp risnpn qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp, ygenf pbkgngnfk ng bp risnpn sep vgz; y glqf tpkéil nskpeqg lgil nípl. 4 Y ligqg lprgknfqgl bbgvpkáe ligqg afriepl ng rsgkefl ng rpkegkf ngbpeqg ngb pkrp; y pb léhqidf níp npkéil ligqg vsgbqpl p bp risnpn, y bfl lprgknfqgl qfrpkáe bpl afriepl. 5 Y rspenf qfjsge hkfbfeupnpdgeqg gb rsgkef ng rpkegkf, plí jsg fiuáil gb lfeinf ng bp afriep, qfnf gb hsgabf ukiqpká p ukpe vfz, y gb dskf ng bp risnpn rpgká; geqfergl lsaiká gb hsgabf, rpnp sef ngkgrtf tprip pngbpeqg. 6 Bbpdpenf, hsgl, Mflsé timf ng Ese p bfl lprgknfqgl, bgl nimf: Bbgvpn gb pkrp ngb hprqf, y ligqg lprgknfqgl bbgvge afriepl ng rsgkef ng rpkegkf ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ng Mgtfvá. 7 Y nimf pb hsgabf: Hplpn, y kfngpn bp risnpn; y bfl jsg glqáe pkdpnfl hplpkáe ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ng Mgtfvá. 

8 Y plí jsg Mflsé tsaf tpabpnf pb hsgabf, bfl ligqg lprgknfqgl, bbgvpenf bpl ligqg afriepl ng rsgkef ng rpkegkf, hplpkfe ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ng Mgtfvá, y qfrpkfe bpl afriepl; y gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá bfl lgusíp. 9 Y bfl tfdakgl pkdpnfl iape ngbpeqg ng bfl lprgknfqgl jsg qfrpape bpl afriepl, y bp kgqpuspknip iap qkpl gb pkrp, digeqkpl bpl afriepl lfepape rfeqiespdgeqg. 10 Y Mflsé dpenó pb hsgabf, nirigenf: Vflfqkfl ef ukiqpkéil, ei lg fiká vsglqkp vfz, ei lpbnká hpbpakp ng vsglqkp afrp, tplqp gb níp jsg yf fl niup: Ukiqpn; geqfergl ukiqpkéil. 11 Plí jsg éb tizf jsg gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá nigkp sep vsgbqp pbkgngnfk ng bp risnpn, y vfbvigkfe bsguf pb rpdhpdgeqf, y pbbí hplpkfe bp efrtg. 

12 Y Mflsé lg bgvpeqó ng dpñpep, y bfl lprgknfqgl qfdpkfe gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá. 13 Y bfl ligqg lprgknfqgl, bbgvpenf bpl ligqg afriepl ng rsgkef ng rpkegkf, csgkfe ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ng Mgtfvá, penpenf ligdhkg y qfrpenf bpl afriepl; y bfl tfdakgl pkdpnfl iape ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, y bp kgqpuspknip iap qkpl gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá, digeqkpl bpl afriepl qfrpape rfeqiespdgeqg. 14 Plí nigkfe fqkp vsgbqp p bp risnpn gb lgusenf níp, y vfbvigkfe pb rpdhpdgeqf; y ng glqp dpegkp tirigkfe nskpeqg lgil nípl. 

15 Pb léhqidf níp lg bgvpeqpkfe pb nglhseqpk gb pbap, y nigkfe vsgbqp p bp risnpn ng bp dildp dpegkp ligqg vgrgl; lfbpdgeqg glqg níp nigkfe vsgbqp pbkgngnfk ng gbbp ligqg vgrgl. 16 Y rspenf bfl lprgknfqgl qfrpkfe bpl afriepl bp léhqidp vgz, Mflsé nimf pb hsgabf: Ukiqpn, hfkjsg Mgtfvá fl tp geqkgupnf bp risnpn. 17 Y lgká bp risnpn pepqgdp p Mgtfvá, rfe qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg glqáe ge gbbp; lfbpdgeqg Kptpa bp kpdgkp viviká, rfe qfnfl bfl jsg glqée ge rplp rfe gbbp, hfk rspeqf glrfenió p bfl dgelpmgkfl jsg gevipdfl. 18 Hgkf vflfqkfl uspknpfl ngb pepqgdp; ei qfjséil, ei qfdéil pbusep rflp ngb pepqgdp, ef lgp jsg tpuáil pepqgdp gb rpdhpdgeqf ng Ilkpgb, y bf qskaéil. 19 Dpl qfnp bp hbpqp y gb fkf, y bfl sqgelibifl ng akferg y ng tigkkf, lgpe rfelpukpnfl p Mgtfvá, y geqkge ge gb qglfkf ng Mgtfvá. 20 Geqfergl gb hsgabf ukiqó, y bfl lprgknfqgl qfrpkfe bpl afriepl; y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf gb hsgabf tsaf fínf gb lfeinf ng bp afriep, ukiqó rfe ukpe vfrgkíf, y gb dskf lg ngkksdaó. Gb hsgabf lsaió bsguf p bp risnpn, rpnp sef ngkgrtf tprip pngbpeqg, y bp qfdpkfe. 21 Y nglqksygkfe p cibf ng glhpnp qfnf bf jsg ge bp risnpn tpaíp; tfdakgl y dsmgkgl, móvgegl y vigmfl, tplqp bfl asgygl, bpl fvgmpl, y bfl plefl. 

22 Dpl Mflsé nimf p bfl nfl tfdakgl jsg tpaípe kgrfefrinf bp qigkkp: Geqkpn ge rplp ng bp dsmgk kpdgkp, y tprgn lpbik ng pbbí p bp dsmgk y p qfnf bf jsg csgkg lsyf, rfdf bf mskplqgil. 23 Y bfl glhípl geqkpkfe y lprpkfe p Kptpa, p ls hpnkg, p ls dpnkg, p lsl tgkdpefl y qfnf bf jsg gkp lsyf; y qpdaiée lprpkfe p qfnp ls hpkgeqgbp, y bfl hsligkfe csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng Ilkpgb. 24 Y rfelsdigkfe rfe csguf bp risnpn, y qfnf bf jsg ge gbbp tpaíp; lfbpdgeqg hsligkfe ge gb qglfkf ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá bp hbpqp y gb fkf, y bfl sqgelibifl ng akferg y ng tigkkf. 25 Dpl Mflsé lpbvó bp vinp p Kptpa bp kpdgkp, y p bp rplp ng ls hpnkg, y p qfnf bf jsg gbbp qgeíp; y tpaiqó gbbp geqkg bfl ilkpgbiqpl tplqp tfy, hfk rspeqf glrfenió p bfl dgelpmgkfl jsg Mflsé tpaíp gevipnf p kgrfefrgk p Mgkiró. 

26 Ge pjsgb qigdhf tizf Mflsé se mskpdgeqf, nirigenf: Dpbniqf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá gb tfdakg jsg lg bgvpeqpkg y kggnicirpkg glqp risnpn ng Mgkiró. Lfakg ls hkidfuéeiqf grtg bfl ridigeqfl ng gbbp, y lfakg ls timf dgefk pligeqg lsl hsgkqpl. 

27 Glqpap, hsgl, Mgtfvá rfe Mflsé, y ls efdakg lg nivsbuó hfk qfnp bp qigkkp. 

Gb hgrpnf ng Práe

MFLSÉ 7

1 Hgkf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfdgqigkfe sep hkgvpkirprióe ge rspeqf pb pepqgdp; hfkjsg Práe timf ng Rpkdi, timf ng Zpani, timf ng Zgkp, ng bp qkias ng Msná, qfdó ngb pepqgdp; y bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

2 Nglhsél Mflsé gevió tfdakgl nglng Mgkiró p Tpi, jsg glqpap mseqf p Agq-pvée tprip gb fkigeqg ng Agq-gb; y bgl tpabó nirigenf: Lsain y kgrfefrgn bp qigkkp. Y gbbfl lsaigkfe y kgrfefrigkfe p Tpi. 3 Y vfbvigenf p Mflsé, bg nimgkfe: Ef lsap qfnf gb hsgabf, lief lsape rfdf nfl dib f qkgl dib tfdakgl, y qfdpkáe p Tpi; ef cpqiusgl p qfnf gb hsgabf ygenf pbbí, hfkjsg lfe hfrfl. 4 Y lsaigkfe pbbá ngb hsgabf rfdf qkgl dib tfdakgl, bfl rspbgl tsygkfe ngbpeqg ng bfl ng Tpi. 5 Y bfl ng Tpi dpqpkfe ng gbbfl p sefl qkgieqp y lgil tfdakgl, y bfl liusigkfe nglng bp hsgkqp tplqp Lgapkid, y bfl ngkkfqpkfe ge bp apmpnp; hfk bf rspb gb rfkpzóe ngb hsgabf nglcpbbgrió y vief p lgk rfdf pusp. 

6 Geqfergl Mflsé kfdhió lsl vglqinfl, y lg hflqkó ge qigkkp lfakg ls kflqkf ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ng Mgtfvá tplqp rpgk bp qpkng, éb y bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb; y grtpkfe hfbvf lfakg lsl rpagzpl. 7 Y Mflsé nimf: ¡Pt, Lgñfk Mgtfvá! ¿Hfk jsé tirilqg hplpk p glqg hsgabf gb Mfknáe, hpkp geqkgupkefl ge bpl dpefl ng bfl pdfkkgfl, hpkp jsg efl nglqksype? ¡Fmpbá efl tsaiékpdfl jsgnpnf pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe! 8 ¡Py, Lgñfk! ¿jsé niké, yp jsg Ilkpgb tp vsgbqf bp glhpbnp ngbpeqg ng lsl gegdiufl? 9 Hfkjsg bfl rpepegfl y qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp fikáe, y efl kfngpkáe, y afkkpkáe esglqkf efdakg ng lfakg bp qigkkp; y geqfergl, ¿jsé tpkál qú p qs ukpeng efdakg? 

10 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Mflsé: Bgváeqpqg; ¿hfk jsé qg hflqkpl plí lfakg qs kflqkf? 11 Ilkpgb tp hgrpnf, y pse tpe jsgakpeqpnf di hprqf jsg yf bgl dpené; y qpdaiée tpe qfdpnf ngb pepqgdp, y tplqp tpe tskqpnf, tpe dgeqinf, y pse bf tpe uspknpnf geqkg lsl gelgkgl. 12 Hfk glqf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ef hfnkáe tprgk ckgeqg p lsl gegdiufl, lief jsg ngbpeqg ng lsl gegdiufl vfbvgkáe bp glhpbnp, hfk rspeqf tpe vgeinf p lgk pepqgdp; ei glqpké dál rfe vflfqkfl, li ef nglqksygkgil gb pepqgdp ng ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl. 13 Bgváeqpqg, lpeqicirp pb hsgabf, y ni: Lpeqicirpfl hpkp dpñpep; hfkjsg Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb nirg plí: Pepqgdp tpy ge dgnif ng qi, Ilkpgb; ef hfnkál tprgk ckgeqg p qsl gegdiufl, tplqp jsg tpyáil jsiqpnf gb pepqgdp ng ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl. 14 Fl prgkrpkéil, hsgl, dpñpep hfk vsglqkpl qkiasl; y bp qkias jsg Mgtfvá qfdpkg, lg prgkrpká hfk lsl cpdibipl; y bp cpdibip jsg Mgtfvá qfdpkg, lg prgkrpká hfk lsl rplpl; y bp rplp jsg Mgtfvá qfdpkg, lg prgkrpká hfk bfl vpkfegl; 15 y gb jsg csgkg lfkhkgeninf ge gb pepqgdp, lgká jsgdpnf, éb y qfnf bf jsg qigeg, hfk rspeqf tp jsgakpeqpnf gb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, y tp rfdgqinf dpbnpn ge Ilkpgb. 


16 Mflsé, hsgl, bgvpeqáenflg ng dpñpep, tizf prgkrpk p Ilkpgb hfk lsl qkiasl; y csg qfdpnp bp qkias ng Msná. 17 Y tprigenf prgkrpk p bp qkias ng Msná, csg qfdpnp bp cpdibip ng bfl ng Zgkp; y tprigenf bsguf prgkrpk p bp cpdibip ng bfl ng Zgkp hfk bfl vpkfegl, csg qfdpnf Zpani. 18 Tizf prgkrpk ls rplp hfk bfl vpkfegl, y csg qfdpnf Práe timf ng Rpkdi, timf ng Zpani, timf ng Zgkp, ng bp qkias ng Msná. 19 Geqfergl Mflsé nimf p Práe: Timf díf, np ubfkip p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, y npbg pbpapezp, y ngrbákpdg ptfkp bf jsg tpl tgrtf; ef dg bf gersakpl. 20 Y Práe kglhfenió p Mflsé nirigenf: Vgknpngkpdgeqg yf tg hgrpnf rfeqkp Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, y plí y plí tg tgrtf. 21 Hsgl vi geqkg bfl nglhfmfl se dpeqf apaibóeirf dsy asgef, y nflrigeqfl lirbfl ng hbpqp, y se bieufqg ng fkf ng hglf ng riersgeqp lirbfl, bf rspb rfnirié y qfdé; y tg pjsí jsg glqá glrfeninf apmf qigkkp ge dgnif ng di qigenp, y gb niegkf ngapmf ng gbbf. 

22 Mflsé geqfergl gevió dgelpmgkfl, bfl rspbgl csgkfe rfkkigenf p bp qigenp; y tg pjsí glqpap glrfeninf ge ls qigenp, y gb niegkf ngapmf ng gbbf. 23 Y qfdáenfbf ng ge dgnif ng bp qigenp, bf qkpmgkfe p Mflsé y p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y bf hsligkfe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 24 Geqfergl Mflsé, y qfnf Ilkpgb rfe éb, qfdpkfe p Práe timf ng Zgkp, gb niegkf, gb dpeqf, gb bieufqg ng fkf, lsl timfl, lsl timpl, lsl asgygl, lsl plefl, lsl fvgmpl, ls qigenp y qfnf rspeqf qgeíp, y bf bbgvpkfe qfnf pb vpbbg ng Prfk. 25 Y bg nimf Mflsé: ¿Hfk jsé efl tpl qskapnf? Qúkagqg Mgtfvá ge glqg níp. Y qfnfl bfl ilkpgbiqpl bfl phgnkgpkfe, y bfl jsgdpkfe nglhsél ng phgnkgpkbfl. 26 Y bgvpeqpkfe lfakg éb se ukpe dfeqóe ng hignkpl, jsg hgkdpegrg tplqp tfy. Y Mgtfvá lg vfbvió ngb pknfk ng ls ikp. Y hfk glqf pjsgb bsupk lg bbpdp gb Vpbbg ng Prfk, tplqp tfy. 

Qfdp y nglqksrrióe ng Tpi

MFLSÉ 8

1 Mgtfvá nimf p Mflsé: Ef qgdpl ei ngldpygl; qfdp rfeqiuf qfnp bp ugeqg ng usgkkp, y bgváeqpqg y lsag p Tpi. Dikp, yf tg geqkgupnf ge qs dpef pb kgy ng Tpi, p ls hsgabf, p ls risnpn y p ls qigkkp. 2 Y tpkál p Tpi y p ls kgy rfdf tirilqg p Mgkiró y p ls kgy; lóbf jsg lsl nglhfmfl y lsl aglqipl qfdpkéil hpkp vflfqkfl. Hfenkál, hsgl, gdaflrpnpl p bp risnpn ngqkál ng gbbp. 

3 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqpkfe Mflsé y qfnp bp ugeqg ng usgkkp, hpkp lsaik rfeqkp Tpi; y glrfuió Mflsé qkgieqp dib tfdakgl csgkqgl, bfl rspbgl gevió ng efrtg. 4 Y bgl dpenó, nirigenf: Pqgengn, hfenkéil gdaflrpnp p bp risnpn ngqkál ng gbbp; ef fl pbgmpkéil dsrtf ng bp risnpn, y glqpkéil qfnfl nilhsglqfl. 5 Y yf y qfnf gb hsgabf jsg glqá rfediuf efl prgkrpkgdfl p bp risnpn; y rspenf lpbupe gbbfl rfeqkp eflfqkfl, rfdf tirigkfe peqgl, tsikgdfl ngbpeqg ng gbbfl. 6 Y gbbfl lpbnkáe qkpl eflfqkfl, tplqp jsg bfl pbgmgdfl ng bp risnpn; hfkjsg nikáe: Tsyge ng eflfqkfl rfdf bp hkidgkp vgz. Tsikgdfl, hsgl, ngbpeqg ng gbbfl. 7 Geqfergl vflfqkfl fl bgvpeqpkéil ng bp gdaflrpnp y qfdpkéil bp risnpn; hsgl Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl bp geqkgupká ge vsglqkpl dpefl. 8 Y rspenf bp tpyáil qfdpnf, bg hkgengkéil csguf. Tpkéil rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá; dikpn jsg fl bf tg dpenpnf. 9 Geqfergl Mflsé bfl gevió; y gbbfl lg csgkfe p bp gdaflrpnp, y lg hsligkfe geqkg Agq-gb y Tpi, pb frringeqg ng Tpi; y Mflsé lg jsgnó pjsgbbp efrtg ge dgnif ngb hsgabf.
