10 Bgvpeqáenflg Mflsé dsy ng dpñpep, hpló kgvilqp pb hsgabf, y lsaió éb, rfe bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb, ngbpeqg ngb hsgabf rfeqkp Tpi. 11 Y qfnp bp ugeqg ng usgkkp jsg rfe éb glqpap, lsaió y lg prgkró, y bbgupkfe ngbpeqg ng bp risnpn, y prpdhpkfe pb efkqg ng Tpi; y gb vpbbg glqpap geqkg éb y Tpi. 12 Y qfdó rfdf rierf dib tfdakgl, y bfl hslf ge gdaflrpnp geqkg Agq-gb y Tpi, pb frringeqg ng bp risnpn. 13 Plí nilhsligkfe pb hsgabf: qfnf gb rpdhpdgeqf pb efkqg ng bp risnpn, y ls gdaflrpnp pb frringeqg ng bp risnpn, y Mflsé pvpezó pjsgbbp efrtg tplqp bp diqpn ngb vpbbg. 14 Y prfeqgrió jsg viéenfbf gb kgy ng Tpi, éb y ls hsgabf lg phkglskpkfe y dpnksupkfe; y pb qigdhf lgñpbpnf, bfl tfdakgl ng bp risnpn lpbigkfe pb gersgeqkf ng Ilkpgb hpkp rfdapqik, ckgeqg pb Pkpaá, ef lpaigenf jsg glqpap hsglqp gdaflrpnp p glhpbnpl ng bp risnpn. 15 Geqfergl Mflsé y qfnf Ilkpgb lg cieuigkfe vgerinfl y tsygkfe ngbpeqg ng gbbfl hfk gb rpdief ngb ngligkqf. 16 Y qfnf gb hsgabf jsg glqpap ge Tpi lg mseqó hpkp lgusikbgl; y liusigkfe p Mflsé, ligenf plí pbgmpnfl ng bp risnpn. 17 Y ef jsgnó tfdakg ge Tpi ei ge Agq-gb, jsg ef lpbigkp qkpl ng Ilkpgb; y hfk lgusik p Ilkpgb ngmpkfe bp risnpn paigkqp. 

18 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nimf p Mflsé: Gxqigeng bp bpezp jsg qigegl ge qs dpef tprip Tpi, hfkjsg yf bp geqkgupké ge qs dpef. Y Mflsé gxqgenió tprip bp risnpn bp bpezp jsg ge ls dpef qgeíp. 19 Y bgvpeqáenflg hkfeqpdgeqg ng ls bsupk bfl jsg glqpape ge bp gdaflrpnp, rfkkigkfe bsguf jsg éb pbzó ls dpef, y vieigkfe p bp risnpn, y bp qfdpkfe, y lg phkglskpkfe p hkgengkbg csguf. 20 Y bfl tfdakgl ng Tpi vfbvigkfe gb kflqkf, y pb dikpk, tg pjsí jsg gb tsdf ng bp risnpn lsaíp pb rigbf, y ef hsnigkfe tsik ei p sep hpkqg ei p fqkp, hfkjsg gb hsgabf jsg iap tsygenf tprip gb ngligkqf lg vfbvió rfeqkp bfl jsg bgl lgusípe. 21 Mflsé y qfnf Ilkpgb, vigenf jsg bfl ng bp gdaflrpnp tpaípe qfdpnf bp risnpn, y jsg gb tsdf ng bp risnpn lsaíp, lg vfbvigkfe y pqprpkfe p bfl ng Tpi. 22 Y bfl fqkfl lpbigkfe ng bp risnpn p ls gersgeqkf, y plí csgkfe gergkkpnfl ge dgnif ng Ilkpgb, bfl sefl hfk se bpnf, y bfl fqkfl hfk gb fqkf. Y bfl tikigkfe tplqp jsg ef jsgnó eieusef ng gbbfl jsg glrphplg. 23 Hgkf qfdpkfe vivf pb kgy ng Tpi, y bf qkpmgkfe p Mflsé. 

24 Y rspenf bfl ilkpgbiqpl prpapkfe ng dpqpk p qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Tpi ge gb rpdhf y ge gb ngligkqf p nfeng bfl tpaípe hgklgusinf, y qfnfl tpaípe rpínf p cibf ng glhpnp tplqp lgk rfelsdinfl, qfnfl bfl ilkpgbiqpl vfbvigkfe p Tpi, y qpdaiée bp tikigkfe p cibf ng glhpnp. 25 Y gb eúdgkf ng bfl jsg rpygkfe pjsgb níp, tfdakgl y dsmgkgl, csg ng nfrg dib, qfnfl bfl ng Tpi. 26 Hfkjsg Mflsé ef kgqikó ls dpef jsg tpaíp gxqgeninf rfe bp bpezp, tplqp jsg tsaf nglqksinf hfk rfdhbgqf p qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Tpi. 27 Hgkf bfl ilkpgbiqpl qfdpkfe hpkp lí bpl aglqipl y bfl nglhfmfl ng bp risnpn, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg bg tpaíp dpenpnf p Mflsé. 28 Y Mflsé jsgdó p Tpi y bp kgnsmf p se dfeqóe ng glrfdakfl, plfbpnp hpkp ligdhkg tplqp tfy. 29 Y pb kgy ng Tpi bf rfbuó ng se dpngkf tplqp rpgk bp efrtg; y rspenf gb lfb lg hslf, dpenó Mflsé jsg jsiqplge ngb dpngkf ls rsgkhf, y bf grtplge p bp hsgkqp ng bp risnpn; y bgvpeqpkfe lfakg éb se ukpe dfeqóe ng hignkpl, jsg hgkdpegrg tplqp tfy. 

Bgrqskp ng bp bgy ge gb Dfeqg Gapb

30 Geqfergl Mflsé gniciró se pbqpk p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb ge gb dfeqg Gapb, 31 rfdf Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rfdf glqá glrkiqf ge gb biakf ng bp bgy ng Dfilél, se pbqpk ng hignkpl geqgkpl lfakg bpl rspbgl epnig pbzó tigkkf; y fckgrigkfe lfakg éb tfbfrpslqfl p Mgtfvá, y lprkicirpkfe fckgenpl ng hpz. 32 Qpdaiée glrkiaió pbbí lfakg bpl hignkpl sep rfhip ng bp bgy ng Dfilél, bp rspb glrkiaió ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 33 Y qfnf Ilkpgb, rfe lsl peripefl, fciripbgl y msgrgl, glqpap ng hig p sef y fqkf bpnf ngb pkrp, ge hkglgerip ng bfl lprgknfqgl bgviqpl jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, plí bfl gxqkpemgkfl rfdf bfl epqskpbgl. Bp diqpn ng gbbfl glqpap tprip gb dfeqg Ugkizid, y bp fqkp diqpn tprip gb dfeqg Gapb, ng bp dpegkp jsg Dfilél, ligkvf ng Mgtfvá, bf tpaíp dpenpnf peqgl, hpkp jsg agenimglge hkidgkpdgeqg pb hsgabf ng Ilkpgb. 34 Nglhsél ng glqf, bgyó qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng bp bgy, bpl agenirifegl y bpl dpbnirifegl, rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg glqá glrkiqf ge gb biakf ng bp bgy. 35 Ef tsaf hpbpakp pbusep ng qfnf rspeqf dpenó Dfilél, jsg Mflsé ef tiriglg bggk ngbpeqg ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb, y ng bpl dsmgkgl, ng bfl eiñfl, y ng bfl gxqkpemgkfl jsg dfkpape geqkg gbbfl. 

Plqsrip ng bfl upapfeiqpl

MFLSÉ 9

1 Rspenf fygkfe glqpl rflpl qfnfl bfl kgygl jsg glqpape p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe, plí ge bpl dfeqpñpl rfdf ge bfl bbpefl, y ge qfnp bp rflqp ngb Dpk Ukpeng ngbpeqg ngb Bíapef, bfl tgqgfl, pdfkkgfl, rpepegfl, cgkgzgfl, tgvgfl y mgaslgfl, 2 lg rfergkqpkfe hpkp hgbgpk rfeqkp Mflsé g Ilkpgb. 

3 Dpl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Upapóe, rspenf fygkfe bf jsg Mflsé tpaíp tgrtf p Mgkiró y p Tpi, 4 slpkfe ng plqsrip; hsgl csgkfe y lg cieuigkfe gdapmpnfkgl, y qfdpkfe lprfl vigmfl lfakg lsl plefl, y rsgkfl vigmfl ng vief, kfqfl y kgdgenpnfl, 5 y zphpqfl vigmfl y kgrflinfl ge lsl higl, rfe vglqinfl vigmfl lfakg lí; y qfnf gb hpe jsg qkpípe hpkp gb rpdief gkp lgrf y dftflf. 6 Y vieigkfe p Mflsé pb rpdhpdgeqf ge Uibupb, y bg nimgkfe p éb y p bfl ng Ilkpgb: Eflfqkfl vgeidfl ng qigkkp dsy bgmpep; tprgn, hsgl, ptfkp pbipezp rfe eflfqkfl. 7 Y bfl ng Ilkpgb kglhfenigkfe p bfl tgvgfl: Jsizál tpaiqáil ge dgnif ng eflfqkfl. ¿Ródf, hsgl, hfnkgdfl tprgk pbipezp rfe vflfqkfl? 8 Gbbfl kglhfenigkfe p Mflsé: Eflfqkfl lfdfl qsl ligkvfl. Y Mflsé bgl nimf: ¿Jsiéegl lfil vflfqkfl, y ng nóeng vgeíl? 9 Y gbbfl kglhfenigkfe: Qsl ligkvfl tpe vgeinf ng qigkkp dsy bgmpep, hfk rpslp ngb efdakg ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl; hfkjsg tgdfl fínf ls cpdp, y qfnf bf jsg tizf ge Guihqf, 10 y qfnf bf jsg tizf p bfl nfl kgygl ng bfl pdfkkgfl jsg glqpape pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe: p Lgtóe kgy ng Tglaóe, y p Fu kgy ng Apláe, jsg glqpap ge Plqpkfq. 11 Hfk bf rspb esglqkfl peripefl y qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng esglqkp qigkkp efl nimgkfe: Qfdpn ge vsglqkpl dpefl hkfvilióe hpkp gb rpdief, g in pb gersgeqkf ng gbbfl, y ngrinbgl: Eflfqkfl lfdfl vsglqkfl ligkvfl; tprgn ptfkp pbipezp rfe eflfqkfl. 12 Glqg esglqkf hpe bf qfdpdfl rpbigeqg ng esglqkpl rplpl hpkp gb rpdief gb níp jsg lpbidfl hpkp vgeik p vflfqkfl; y tgbf pjsí ptfkp yp lgrf y dftflf. 13 Glqfl rsgkfl ng vief qpdaiée bfl bbgepdfl esgvfl; tgbfl pjsí yp kfqfl; qpdaiée glqfl esglqkfl vglqinfl y esglqkfl zphpqfl glqáe yp vigmfl p rpslp ng bf dsy bpkuf ngb rpdief. 14 Y bfl tfdakgl ng Ilkpgb qfdpkfe ng bp hkfvilifegl ng gbbfl, y ef rfelsbqpkfe p Mgtfvá. 15 Y Mflsé tizf hpz rfe gbbfl, y rgbgakó rfe gbbfl pbipezp rfergniéenfbgl bp vinp; y qpdaiée bf mskpkfe bfl hkíerihgl ng bp rfeukguprióe. 

16 Hplpnfl qkgl nípl nglhsél jsg tirigkfe pbipezp rfe gbbfl, fygkfe jsg gkpe lsl vgriefl, y jsg tpaiqpape ge dgnif ng gbbfl. 17 Y lpbigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y pb qgkrgk níp bbgupkfe p bpl risnpngl ng gbbfl; y lsl risnpngl gkpe Upapóe, Rpcikp, Aggkfq y Jsikipq-mgpkid. 18 Y ef bfl dpqpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hfk rspeqf bfl hkíerihgl ng bp rfeukguprióe bgl tpaípe mskpnf hfk Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb. Y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe dskdskpap rfeqkp bfl hkíerihgl. 19 Dpl qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl kglhfenigkfe p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe: Eflfqkfl bgl tgdfl mskpnf hfk Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb; hfk qpeqf, ptfkp ef bgl hfngdfl qfrpk. 20 Glqf tpkgdfl rfe gbbfl: bgl ngmpkgdfl vivik, hpkp jsg ef vgeup ikp lfakg eflfqkfl hfk rpslp ngb mskpdgeqf jsg bgl tgdfl tgrtf. 21 Nimgkfe, hsgl, ng gbbfl bfl hkíerihgl: Ngmpnbfl vivik; y csgkfe rfelqiqsinfl bgñpnfkgl y puspnfkgl hpkp qfnp bp rfeukguprióe, rfergniéenfbgl bp vinp, lguúe bgl tpaípe hkfdgqinf bfl hkíerihgl. 

22 Y bbpdáenfbfl Mflsé, bgl tpabó nirigenf: ¿Hfk jsé efl tpaéil geupñpnf, nirigenf: Tpaiqpdfl dsy bgmfl ng vflfqkfl, ligenf plí jsg dfkáil ge dgnif ng eflfqkfl? 23 Ptfkp, hsgl, dpbniqfl lfil, y ef ngmpká ng tpagk ng geqkg vflfqkfl ligkvfl, y jsige rfkqg bp bgñp y lpjsg gb pusp hpkp bp rplp ng di Nifl. 24 Y gbbfl kglhfenigkfe p Mflsé y nimgkfe: Rfdf csg npnf p geqgengk p qsl ligkvfl jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél ls ligkvf jsg fl tpaíp ng npk qfnp bp qigkkp, y jsg tpaíp ng nglqksik p qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, hfk glqf qgdidfl ge ukpe dpegkp hfk esglqkpl vinpl p rpslp ng vflfqkfl, g tiridfl glqf. 25 Ptfkp, hsgl, tgefl pjsí ge qs dpef; bf jsg qg hpkgrigkg asgef y kgrqf tprgk ng eflfqkfl, tpzbf. 26 Y éb bf tizf plí rfe gbbfl; hsgl bfl biakó ng bp dpef ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y ef bfl dpqpkfe. 27 Y Mflsé bfl nglqieó pjsgb níp p lgk bgñpnfkgl y puspnfkgl hpkp bp rfeukguprióe, y hpkp gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá ge gb bsupk jsg Mgtfvá gbiuiglg, bf jsg lfe tplqp tfy. 

Ngkkfqp ng bfl pdfkkgfl

MFLSÉ 10

1 Rspenf Pnfeilgngr kgy ng Mgkslpbée fyó jsg Mflsé tpaíp qfdpnf p Tpi, y jsg bp tpaíp plfbpnf (rfdf tpaíp tgrtf p Mgkiró y p ls kgy, plí tizf p Tpi y p ls kgy), y jsg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Upapóe tpaípe tgrtf hpz rfe bfl ilkpgbiqpl, y jsg glqpape geqkg gbbfl, 2 qsvf ukpe qgdfk; hfkjsg Upapóe gkp sep ukpe risnpn, rfdf sep ng bpl risnpngl kgpbgl, y dpyfk jsg Tpi, y qfnfl lsl tfdakgl gkpe csgkqgl. 3 Hfk bf rspb Pnfeilgngr kgy ng Mgkslpbée gevió p Tftpd kgy ng Tgakóe, p Hikgpd kgy ng Mpkdsq, p Mpcíp kgy ng Bpjsil y p Ngaik kgy ng Gubóe, nirigenf: 4 Lsain p dí y pysnpndg, y rfdapqpdfl p Upapóe; hfkjsg tp tgrtf hpz rfe Mflsé y rfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 5 Y rierf kgygl ng bfl pdfkkgfl, gb kgy ng Mgkslpbée, gb kgy ng Tgakóe, gb kgy ng Mpkdsq, gb kgy ng Bpjsil y gb kgy ng Gubóe, lg mseqpkfe y lsaigkfe, gbbfl rfe qfnfl lsl gmékriqfl, y prpdhpkfe rgkrp ng Upapóe, y hgbgpkfe rfeqkp gbbp. 

6 Geqfergl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Upapóe gevipkfe p ngrik p Mflsé pb rpdhpdgeqf ge Uibupb: Ef eigusgl pysnp p qsl ligkvfl; lsag hkfeqpdgeqg p eflfqkfl hpkp ngcgengkefl y pysnpkefl; hfkjsg qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bfl pdfkkgfl jsg tpaiqpe ge bpl dfeqpñpl lg tpe seinf rfeqkp eflfqkfl. 7 Y lsaió Mflsé ng Uibupb, éb y qfnf gb hsgabf ng usgkkp rfe éb, y qfnfl bfl tfdakgl vpbigeqgl. 8 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Mflsé: Ef qgeupl qgdfk ng gbbfl; hfkjsg yf bfl tg geqkgupnf ge qs dpef, y eieusef ng gbbfl hkgvpbgrgká ngbpeqg ng qi. 9 Y Mflsé vief p gbbfl ng kghgeqg, tpaigenf lsainf qfnp bp efrtg nglng Uibupb. 10 Y Mgtfvá bfl bbgeó ng rfelqgkeprióe ngbpeqg ng Ilkpgb, y bfl tikió rfe ukpe dfkqpenpn ge Upapóe; y bfl liusió hfk gb rpdief jsg lsag p Agq-tfkóe, y bfl tikió tplqp Pzgrp y Dprgnp. 11 Y digeqkpl iape tsygenf ng bfl ilkpgbiqpl, p bp apmpnp ng Agq-tfkóe, Mgtfvá pkkfmó nglng gb rigbf ukpengl hignkpl lfakg gbbfl tplqp Pzgrp, y dskigkfe; y csgkfe dál bfl jsg dskigkfe hfk bpl hignkpl ngb ukpeizf, jsg bfl jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb dpqpkfe p glhpnp. 

12 Geqfergl Mflsé tpabó p Mgtfvá gb níp ge jsg Mgtfvá geqkguó pb pdfkkgf ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nimf ge hkglgerip ng bfl ilkpgbiqpl: 


Lfb, ngqgeqg ge Upapóe; 
Y qú, bsep, ge gb vpbbg ng Pmpbóe. 
13 Y gb lfb lg ngqsvf y bp bsep lg hpkó, 
Tplqp jsg bp ugeqg lg tsaf vgeupnf ng lsl gegdiufl. 

¿Ef glqá glrkiqf glqf ge gb biakf ng Mplgk? Y gb lfb lg hpkó ge dgnif ngb rigbf, y ef lg phkglskó p hfegklg rpli se níp geqgkf. 14 Y ef tsaf níp rfdf pjsgb, ei peqgl ei nglhsél ng éb, tpaigenf pqgeninf Mgtfvá p bp vfz ng se tfdakg; hfkjsg Mgtfvá hgbgpap hfk Ilkpgb. 

15 Y Mflsé, y qfnf Ilkpgb rfe éb, vfbvió pb rpdhpdgeqf ge Uibupb. 

16 Y bfl rierf kgygl tsygkfe, y lg glrfenigkfe ge sep rsgvp ge Dprgnp. 17 Y csg npnf pvilf p Mflsé jsg bfl rierf kgygl tpaípe linf tpbbpnfl glrfeninfl ge sep rsgvp ge Dprgnp. 18 Geqfergl Mflsé nimf: Kfnpn ukpengl hignkpl p bp geqkpnp ng bp rsgvp, y hfegn tfdakgl mseqf p gbbp hpkp jsg bfl uspknge; 19 y vflfqkfl ef fl ngqgeuáil, lief lgusin p vsglqkfl gegdiufl, y tgkinbgl bp kgqpuspknip, lie ngmpkbgl geqkpk ge lsl risnpngl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl bfl tp geqkgupnf ge vsglqkp dpef. 20 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf Mflsé y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb prpapkfe ng tgkikbfl rfe ukpe dfkqpenpn tplqp nglqksikbfl, bfl jsg jsgnpkfe ng gbbfl lg dgqigkfe ge bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl. 21 Qfnf gb hsgabf vfbvió lpef y lpbvf p Mflsé, pb rpdhpdgeqf ge Dprgnp; ef tsaf jsige dfviglg ls bgeusp rfeqkp eieusef ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

22 Geqfergl nimf Mflsé: Pakin bp geqkpnp ng bp rsgvp, y lprpn ng gbbp p glfl rierf kgygl. 23 Y bf tirigkfe plí, y lprpkfe ng bp rsgvp p pjsgbbfl rierf kgygl: pb kgy ng Mgkslpbée, pb kgy ng Tgakóe, pb kgy ng Mpkdsq, pb kgy ng Bpjsil y pb kgy ng Gubóe. 24 Y rspenf bfl tsaigkfe bbgvpnf p Mflsé, bbpdó Mflsé p qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng Ilkpgb, y nimf p bfl hkierihpbgl ng bp ugeqg ng usgkkp jsg tpaípe vgeinf rfe éb: Prgkrpfl, y hfegn vsglqkfl higl lfakg bfl rsgbbfl ng glqfl kgygl. Y gbbfl lg prgkrpkfe y hsligkfe lsl higl lfakg bfl rsgbbfl ng gbbfl. 25 Y Mflsé bgl nimf: Ef qgdáil, ei fl pqgdfkiréil; lgn csgkqgl y vpbigeqgl, hfkjsg plí tpká Mgtfvá p qfnfl vsglqkfl gegdiufl rfeqkp bfl rspbgl hgbgáil. 26 Y nglhsél ng glqf Mflsé bfl tikió y bfl dpqó, y bfl tizf rfbupk ge rierf dpngkfl; y jsgnpkfe rfbupnfl ge bfl dpngkfl tplqp rpgk bp efrtg. 27 Y rspenf gb lfb lg iap p hfegk, dpenó Mflsé jsg bfl jsiqplge ng bfl dpngkfl, y bfl grtplge ge bp rsgvp nfeng lg tpaípe glrfeninf; y hsligkfe ukpengl hignkpl p bp geqkpnp ng bp rsgvp, bpl rspbgl hgkdpegrge tplqp tfy. 

28 Ge pjsgb dildf níp qfdó Mflsé p Dprgnp, y bp tikió p cibf ng glhpnp, y dpqó p ls kgy; hfk rfdhbgqf bfl nglqksyó, rfe qfnf bf jsg ge gbbp qgeíp vinp, lie ngmpk epnp; g tizf pb kgy ng Dprgnp rfdf tpaíp tgrtf pb kgy ng Mgkiró. 

29 Y ng Dprgnp hpló Mflsé, y qfnf Ilkpgb rfe éb, p Biaep; y hgbgó rfeqkp Biaep; 30 y Mgtfvá bp geqkguó qpdaiée p gbbp y p ls kgy ge dpefl ng Ilkpgb; y bp tikió p cibf ng glhpnp, rfe qfnf bf jsg ge gbbp qgeíp vinp, lie ngmpk epnp; g tizf p ls kgy ng bp dpegkp rfdf tpaíp tgrtf pb kgy ng Mgkiró. 

31 Y Mflsé, y qfnf Ilkpgb rfe éb, hpló ng Biaep p Bpjsil, y prpdhó rgkrp ng gbbp, y bp rfdapqió; 32 y Mgtfvá geqkguó p Bpjsil ge dpef ng Ilkpgb, y bp qfdó pb níp liusigeqg, y bp tikió p cibf ng glhpnp, rfe qfnf bf jsg ge gbbp qgeíp vinp, plí rfdf tpaíp tgrtf ge Biaep. 

33 Geqfergl Tfkpd kgy ng Ugzgk lsaió ge pysnp ng Bpjsil; dpl p éb y p ls hsgabf nglqksyó Mflsé, tplqp ef ngmpk p eieusef ng gbbfl. 

34 Ng Bpjsil hpló Mflsé, y qfnf Ilkpgb rfe éb, p Gubóe; y prpdhpkfe rgkrp ng gbbp, y bp rfdapqigkfe; 35 y bp qfdpkfe gb dildf níp, y bp tikigkfe p cibf ng glhpnp; y pjsgb níp dpqó p qfnf bf jsg ge gbbp qgeíp vinp, rfdf tpaíp tgrtf ge Bpjsil. 

36 Lsaió bsguf Mflsé, y qfnf Ilkpgb rfe éb, ng Gubóe p Tgakóe, y bp rfdapqigkfe. 37 Y qfdáenfbp, bp tikigkfe p cibf ng glhpnp, p ls kgy y p qfnpl lsl risnpngl, rfe qfnf bf jsg ge gbbp qgeíp vinp, lie ngmpk epnp; rfdf tpaíp tgrtf p Gubóe, plí bp nglqksygkfe rfe qfnf bf jsg ge gbbp qgeíp vinp. 

38 Nglhsél vfbvió Mflsé, y qfnf Ilkpgb rfe éb, lfakg Ngaik, y rfdapqió rfeqkp gbbp; 39 y bp qfdó, y p ls kgy, y p qfnpl lsl risnpngl; y bpl tikigkfe p cibf ng glhpnp, y nglqksygkfe qfnf bf jsg pbbí ngeqkf qgeíp vinp, lie ngmpk epnp; rfdf tpaíp tgrtf p Tgakóe, y rfdf tpaíp tgrtf p Biaep y p ls kgy, plí tizf p Ngaik y p ls kgy. 

40 Tikió, hsgl, Mflsé qfnp bp kguióe ng bpl dfeqpñpl, ngb Egusgv, ng bfl bbpefl y ng bpl bpngkpl, y p qfnfl lsl kgygl, lie ngmpk epnp; qfnf bf jsg qgeíp vinp bf dpqó, rfdf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb lg bf tpaíp dpenpnf. 41 Y bfl tikió Mflsé nglng Rpngl-apkegp tplqp Upzp, y qfnp bp qigkkp ng Uflée tplqp Upapóe. 42 Qfnfl glqfl kgygl y lsl qigkkpl bfl qfdó Mflsé ng sep vgz; hfkjsg Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb hgbgpap hfk Ilkpgb. 43 Y vfbvió Mflsé, y qfnf Ilkpgb rfe éb, pb rpdhpdgeqf ge Uibupb. 

Ngkkfqp ng bp pbipezp ng Mpaíe

MFLSÉ 11

1 Rspenf fyó glqf Mpaíe kgy ng Tpzfk, gevió dgelpmg p Mfapa kgy ng Dpnóe, pb kgy ng Lidkóe, pb kgy ng Prlpc, 2 y p bfl kgygl jsg glqpape ge bp kguióe ngb efkqg ge bpl dfeqpñpl, y ge gb Pkpaá pb lsk ng Riegkgq, ge bfl bbpefl, y ge bpl kguifegl ng Nfk pb frringeqg; 3 y pb rpepegf jsg glqpap pb fkigeqg y pb frringeqg, pb pdfkkgf, pb tgqgf, pb cgkgzgf, pb mgaslgf ge bpl dfeqpñpl, y pb tgvgf pb hig ng Tgkdóe ge qigkkp ng Dizhp. 4 Glqfl lpbigkfe, y rfe gbbfl qfnfl lsl gmékriqfl, dsrtp ugeqg, rfdf bp pkgep jsg glqá p bp fkibbp ngb dpk ge dsbqiqsn, rfe dsrtílidfl rpapbbfl y rpkkfl ng usgkkp. 5 Qfnfl glqfl kgygl lg seigkfe, y vieigkfe y prpdhpkfe seinfl mseqf p bpl puspl ng Dgkfd, hpkp hgbgpk rfeqkp Ilkpgb. 

6 Dpl Mgtfvá nimf p Mflsé: Ef qgeupl qgdfk ng gbbfl, hfkjsg dpñpep p glqp tfkp yf geqkgupké p qfnfl gbbfl dsgkqfl ngbpeqg ng Ilkpgb; nglmpkkgqpkál lsl rpapbbfl, y lsl rpkkfl jsgdpkál p csguf. 7 Y Mflsé, y qfnp bp ugeqg ng usgkkp rfe éb, vief ng kghgeqg rfeqkp gbbfl mseqf p bpl puspl ng Dgkfd. 8 Y bfl geqkguó Mgtfvá ge dpefl ng Ilkpgb, y bfl tikigkfe y bfl liusigkfe tplqp Linóe bp ukpeng y tplqp Dilkgcfqdpid, y tplqp gb bbpef ng Dizhp pb fkigeqg, tikiéenfbfl tplqp jsg ef bgl ngmpkfe eieusef. 9 Y Mflsé tizf rfe gbbfl rfdf Mgtfvá bg tpaíp dpenpnf: nglmpkkgqó lsl rpapbbfl, y lsl rpkkfl jsgdó p csguf. 

10 Y vfbvigenf Mflsé, qfdó ge gb dildf qigdhf p Tpzfk, y dpqó p glhpnp p ls kgy; hsgl Tpzfk tpaíp linf peqgl rpagzp ng qfnfl glqfl kgiefl. 11 Y dpqpkfe p glhpnp qfnf rspeqf ge gbbp qgeíp vinp, nglqksyéenfbf hfk rfdhbgqf, lie jsgnpk epnp jsg kglhikplg; y p Tpzfk hsligkfe csguf. 12 Plidildf qfdó Mflsé qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng pjsgbbfl kgygl, y p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng gbbpl, y bfl tikió p cibf ng glhpnp, y bfl nglqksyó, rfdf Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf. 13 Hgkf p qfnpl bpl risnpngl jsg glqpape lfakg rfbiepl, ef bpl jsgdó Ilkpgb; úeirpdgeqg p Tpzfk jsgdó Mflsé. 14 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qfdpkfe hpkp lí qfnf gb afqíe y bpl aglqipl ng pjsgbbpl risnpngl; dpl p qfnfl bfl tfdakgl tikigkfe p cibf ng glhpnp tplqp nglqksikbfl, lie ngmpk pbusef rfe vinp. 15 Ng bp dpegkp jsg Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél ls ligkvf, plí Dfilél bf dpenó p Mflsé; y plí Mflsé bf tizf, lie jsiqpk hpbpakp ng qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

Mflsé lg phfngkp ng qfnp bp qigkkp

16 Qfdó, hsgl, Mflsé qfnp pjsgbbp qigkkp, bpl dfeqpñpl, qfnf gb Egusgv, qfnp bp qigkkp ng Uflée, bfl bbpefl, gb Pkpaá, bpl dfeqpñpl ng Ilkpgb y lsl vpbbgl. 17 Nglng gb dfeqg Tpbpr, jsg lsag tprip Lgik, tplqp Appb-upn ge bp bbpeskp ngb Bíapef, p bp cpbnp ngb dfeqg Tgkdóe; qfdó plidildf p qfnfl lsl kgygl, y bfl tikió y dpqó. 18 Hfk dsrtf qigdhf qsvf usgkkp Mflsé rfe glqfl kgygl. 19 Ef tsaf risnpn jsg tiriglg hpz rfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, lpbvf bfl tgvgfl jsg dfkpape ge Upapóe; qfnf bf qfdpkfe ge usgkkp. 20 Hfkjsg glqf vief ng Mgtfvá, jsg genskgríp gb rfkpzóe ng gbbfl hpkp jsg kglilqiglge rfe usgkkp p Ilkpgb, hpkp nglqksikbfl, y jsg ef bgl csglg tgrtp dilgkirfknip, lief jsg csglge nglpkkpiupnfl, rfdf Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél. 

21 Qpdaiée ge pjsgb qigdhf vief Mflsé y nglqksyó p bfl peprgfl ng bfl dfeqgl ng Tgakóe, ng Ngaik, ng Pepa, ng qfnfl bfl dfeqgl ng Msná y ng qfnfl bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb; Mflsé bfl nglqksyó p gbbfl y p lsl risnpngl. 22 Eieusef ng bfl peprgfl jsgnó ge bp qigkkp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; lfbpdgeqg jsgnpkfe ge Upzp, ge Upq y ge Plnfn. 23 Qfdó, hsgl, Mflsé qfnp bp qigkkp, rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp nirtf p Dfilél; y bp geqkguó Mflsé p bfl ilkpgbiqpl hfk tgkgerip rfecfkdg p ls nilqkiasrióe lguúe lsl qkiasl; y bp qigkkp nglrpeló ng bp usgkkp. 

Kgygl ngkkfqpnfl hfk Dfilél

MFLSÉ 12

1 Glqfl lfe bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ngkkfqpkfe y rsyp qigkkp hflgygkfe pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe tprip nfeng eprg gb lfb, nglng gb pkkfyf ng Pkeóe tplqp gb dfeqg Tgkdóe, y qfnf gb Pkpaá pb fkigeqg: 2 Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl, jsg tpaiqpap ge Tglaóe, y lgñfkgpap nglng Pkfgk, jsg glqá p bp kiagkp ngb pkkfyf ng Pkeóe, y nglng ge dgnif ngb vpbbg, y bp diqpn ng Upbppn, tplqp gb pkkfyf ng Mpafr, qékdief ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe; 3 y gb Pkpaá tplqp gb dpk ng Riegkgq, pb fkigeqg; y tplqp gb dpk ngb Pkpaá, gb Dpk Lpbpnf, pb fkigeqg, hfk gb rpdief ng Agq- mglidfq, y nglng gb lsk pb hig ng bpl bpngkpl ngb Hilup. 4 Y gb qgkkiqfkif ng Fu kgy ng Apláe, jsg tpaíp jsgnpnf ng bfl kgcpíqpl, gb rspb tpaiqpap ge Plqpkfq y ge Gnkgi, 5 y nfdiepap ge gb dfeqg Tgkdóe, ge Lpbrp, ge qfnf Apláe tplqp bfl bídiqgl ng Uglsk y ng Dpprp, y bp diqpn ng Upbppn, qgkkiqfkif ng Lgtóe kgy ng Tglaóe. 6 P élqfl ngkkfqpkfe Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá nif pjsgbbp qigkkp ge hflglióe p bfl ksageiqpl, p bfl upniqpl y p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél. 

Kgygl ngkkfqpnfl hfk Mflsé

7 Y glqfl lfe bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp jsg ngkkfqpkfe Mflsé y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe tprip gb frringeqg, nglng Appb-upn ge gb bbpef ngb Bíapef tplqp gb dfeqg ng Tpbpr jsg lsag tprip Lgik; y Mflsé nif bp qigkkp ge hflglióe p bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb, rfecfkdg p ls nilqkiasrióe; 8 ge bpl dfeqpñpl, ge bfl vpbbgl, ge gb Pkpaá, ge bpl bpngkpl, ge gb ngligkqf y ge gb Egusgv; gb tgqgf, gb pdfkkgf, gb rpepegf, gb cgkgzgf, gb tgvgf y gb mgaslgf. 9 Gb kgy ng Mgkiró, sef; gb kgy ng Tpi, jsg glqá pb bpnf ng Agq-gb, fqkf; 10 gb kgy ng Mgkslpbée, fqkf; gb kgy ng Tgakóe, fqkf; 11 gb kgy ng Mpkdsq, fqkf; gb kgy ng Bpjsil, fqkf; 12 gb kgy ng Gubóe, fqkf; gb kgy ng Ugzgk, fqkf; 13 gb kgy ng Ngaik, fqkf; gb kgy ng Ugngk, fqkf; 14 gb kgy ng Tfkdp, fqkf; gb kgy ng Pkpn, fqkf; 15 gb kgy ng Biaep, fqkf; gb kgy ng Pnsbpd, fqkf; 16 gb kgy ng Dprgnp, fqkf; gb kgy ng Agq-gb, fqkf; 17 gb kgy ng Qphúp, fqkf; gb kgy ng Tgcgk, fqkf; 18 gb kgy ng Pcgr, fqkf; gb kgy ng Lpkóe, fqkf; 19 gb kgy ng Dpnóe, fqkf; gb kgy ng Tpzfk, fqkf; 20 gb kgy ng Lidkfe-dgkóe, fqkf; gb kgy ng Prlpc, fqkf; 21 gb kgy ng Qppepr, fqkf; gb kgy ng Dgusinf, fqkf; 22 gb kgy ng Rgngl, fqkf; gb kgy ng Mfregpd ngb Rpkdgbf, fqkf; 23 gb kgy ng Nfk, ng bp hkfvierip ng Nfk, fqkf; gb kgy ng Ufid ge Uibupb, fqkf; 24 gb kgy ng Qiklp, fqkf; qkgieqp y se kgygl hfk qfnfl. 

Qigkkp púe lie rfejsilqpk

MFLSÉ 13

1 Ligenf Mflsé yp vigmf, geqkpnf ge pñfl, Mgtfvá bg nimf: Qú gkgl yp vigmf, ng gnpn pvpezpnp, y jsgnp púe dsrtp qigkkp hfk hflggk. 2 Glqp gl bp qigkkp jsg jsgnp: qfnfl bfl qgkkiqfkifl ng bfl cibilqgfl, y qfnfl bfl ng bfl uglskgfl; 3 nglng Litfk, jsg glqá pb fkigeqg ng Guihqf, tplqp gb bídiqg ng Grkóe pb efkqg, jsg lg rfelingkp ng bfl rpepegfl; ng bfl rierf hkíerihgl ng bfl cibilqgfl, gb upzgf, gb plnfngf, gb plrpbfegf, gb ugqgf y gb grkfegf; qpdaiée bfl pvgfl; 4 pb lsk qfnp bp qigkkp ng bfl rpepegfl, y Dgtpkp, jsg gl ng bfl linfeifl, tplqp Pcgr, tplqp bfl bídiqgl ngb pdfkkgf; 5 bp qigkkp ng bfl uiabiqpl, y qfnf gb Bíapef tprip nfeng lpbg gb lfb, nglng Appb-upn pb hig ngb dfeqg Tgkdóe, tplqp bp geqkpnp ng Tpdpq; 6 qfnfl bfl jsg tpaiqpe ge bpl dfeqpñpl nglng gb Bíapef tplqp Dilkgcfqdpid, qfnfl bfl linfeifl; yf bfl gxqgkdiepké ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; lfbpdgeqg kghpkqikál qú hfk lsgkqg gb hpíl p bfl ilkpgbiqpl hfk tgkgnpn, rfdf qg tg dpenpnf. 7 Kghpkqg, hsgl, ptfkp glqp qigkkp ge tgkgnpn p bpl esgvg qkiasl, y p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél. 

8 Hfkjsg bfl ksageiqpl y upniqpl y bp fqkp diqpn ng Dpeplél kgriaigkfe yp ls tgkgnpn, bp rspb bgl nif Dfilél pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe pb fkigeqg, lguúe lg bp nif Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá; 9 nglng Pkfgk, jsg glqá p bp fkibbp ngb pkkfyf ng Pkeóe, y bp risnpn jsg glqá ge dgnif ngb vpbbg, y qfnp bp bbpeskp ng Dgngap, tplqp Niaóe; 10 qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl, gb rspb kgieó ge Tglaóe, tplqp bfl bídiqgl ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe; 11 y Upbppn, y bfl qgkkiqfkifl ng bfl uglskgfl y ng bfl dpprpqgfl, y qfnf gb dfeqg Tgkdóe, y qfnp bp qigkkp ng Apláe tplqp Lpbrp; 12 qfnf gb kgief ng Fu ge Apláe, gb rspb kgieó ge Plqpkfq y ge Gnkgi, gb rspb tpaíp jsgnpnf ngb kglqf ng bfl kgcpíqpl; hsgl Dfilél bfl ngkkfqó, y bfl grtó. 13 Dpl p bfl uglskgfl y p bfl dpprpqgfl ef bfl grtpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, lief jsg Uglsk y Dpprp tpaiqpkfe geqkg bfl ilkpgbiqpl tplqp tfy. 

Gb qgkkiqfkif jsg nilqkiasyó Dfilél

14 Hgkf p bp qkias ng Bgví ef nif tgkgnpn; bfl lprkicirifl ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb lfe ls tgkgnpn, rfdf éb bgl tpaíp nirtf. 

15 Nif, hsgl, Dfilél p bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Ksaée rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 16 Y csg gb qgkkiqfkif ng gbbfl nglng Pkfgk, jsg glqá p bp fkibbp ngb pkkfyf ng Pkeóe, y bp risnpn jsg glqá ge dgnif ngb vpbbg, y qfnp bp bbpeskp tplqp Dgngap; 17 Tglaóe, rfe qfnpl lsl risnpngl jsg glqáe ge bp bbpeskp; Niaóe, Apdfq-appb, Agq-appb-dgóe, 18 Mptpzp, Rpngdfq, Dgcppq, 19 Jsikipqpid, Liadp, Zpkgq-lptpk ge gb dfeqg ngb vpbbg, 20 Agq-hgfk, bpl bpngkpl ng Hilup, Agq-mglidfq, 21 qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng bp bbpeskp, y qfnf gb kgief ng Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl, jsg kgieó ge Tglaóe, pb rspb ngkkfqó Dfilél, y p bfl hkíerihgl ng Dpniáe, Gvi, Kgjsgd, Zsk, Tsk y Kgap, hkíerihgl ng Lgtóe jsg tpaiqpape ge pjsgbbp qigkkp. 22 Qpdaiée dpqpkfe p glhpnp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p Apbppd gb pnivief, timf ng Agfk, geqkg bfl ngdál jsg dpqpkfe. 23 Y gb Mfknáe csg gb bídiqg ngb qgkkiqfkif ng bfl timfl ng Ksaée. Glqp csg bp tgkgnpn ng bfl timfl ng Ksaée rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl, glqpl risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

24 Nif plidildf Dfilél p bp qkias ng Upn, p bfl timfl ng Upn, rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 25 Gb qgkkiqfkif ng gbbfl csg Mpzgk, y qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Upbppn, y bp diqpn ng bp qigkkp ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe tplqp Pkfgk, jsg glqá geckgeqg ng Kpaá. 26 Y nglng Tglaóe tplqp Kpdpq-dizhp, y Agqfeid; y nglng Dptpepid tplqp gb bídiqg ng Ngaik; 27 y ge gb vpbbg, Agq-pkpd, Agq-eidkp, Lsrfq y Zpcóe, kglqf ngb kgief ng Lgtóe kgy ng Tglaóe; gb Mfknáe y ls bídiqg tplqp gb gxqkgdf ngb dpk ng Riegkgq pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe, pb fkigeqg. 28 Glqp gl bp tgkgnpn ng bfl timfl ng Upn hfk lsl cpdibipl, glqpl risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

29 Qpdaiée nif Dfilél tgkgnpn p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél; y csg hpkp bp dgnip qkias ng bfl timfl ng Dpeplél, rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 30 Gb qgkkiqfkif ng gbbfl csg nglng Dptpepid, qfnf Apláe, qfnf gb kgief ng Fu kgy ng Apláe, y qfnpl bpl pbngpl ng Mpik jsg glqáe ge Apláe, lglgeqp hfabprifegl, 31 y bp diqpn ng Upbppn, y Plqpkfq y Gnkgi, risnpngl ngb kgief ng Fu ge Apláe, hpkp bfl timfl ng Dpjsik timf ng Dpeplél, hpkp bp diqpn ng bfl timfl ng Dpjsik rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 

32 Glqf gl bf jsg Dfilél kghpkqió ge tgkgnpn ge bfl bbpefl ng Dfpa, pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe ng Mgkiró, pb fkigeqg. 33 Dpl p bp qkias ng Bgví ef nif Dfilél tgkgnpn; Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb gl bp tgkgnpn ng gbbfl, rfdf éb bgl tpaíp nirtf. 

Rpepáe kghpkqinp hfk lsgkqg

MFLSÉ 14

1 Glqf, hsgl, gl bf jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qfdpkfe hfk tgkgnpn ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, bf rspb bgl kghpkqigkfe gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, Mflsé timf ng Ese, y bfl rpagzpl ng bfl hpnkgl ng bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 2 Hfk lsgkqg lg bgl nif ls tgkgnpn, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél jsg lg nigkp p bpl esgvg qkiasl y p bp dgnip qkias. 3 Hfkjsg p bpl nfl qkiasl y p bp dgnip qkias bgl tpaíp npnf Dfilél tgkgnpn pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe; dpl p bfl bgviqpl ef bgl nif tgkgnpn geqkg gbbfl. 4 Hfkjsg bfl timfl ng Mflé csgkfe nfl qkiasl, Dpeplél y Gckpíe; y ef nigkfe hpkqg p bfl bgviqpl ge bp qigkkp lief risnpngl ge jsg dfkplge, rfe bfl gminfl ng gbbpl hpkp lsl upepnfl y kgapñfl. 5 Ng bp dpegkp jsg Mgtfvá bf tpaíp dpenpnf p Dfilél, plí bf tirigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge gb kghpkqidigeqf ng bp qigkkp. 

Rpbga kgriag Tgakóe

6 Y bfl timfl ng Msná vieigkfe p Mflsé ge Uibupb; y Rpbga, timf ng Mgcfeg rgegzgf, bg nimf: Qú lpagl bf jsg Mgtfvá nimf p Dfilél, vpkóe ng Nifl, ge Rpngl-apkegp, qfrpeqg p dí y p qi. 7 Yf gkp ng gnpn ng rspkgeqp pñfl rspenf Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá dg gevió ng Rpngl-apkegp p kgrfefrgk bp qigkkp; y yf bg qkpmg efqiripl rfdf bf lgeqíp ge di rfkpzóe. 8 Y dil tgkdpefl, bfl jsg tpaípe lsainf rfediuf, tirigkfe nglcpbbgrgk gb rfkpzóe ngb hsgabf; hgkf yf rsdhbí liusigenf p Mgtfvá di Nifl. 9 Geqfergl Dfilél mskó nirigenf: Rigkqpdgeqg bp qigkkp jsg tfbbó qs hig lgká hpkp qi, y hpkp qsl timfl ge tgkgerip hgkhgqsp, hfk rspeqf rsdhbilqg liusigenf p Mgtfvá di Nifl. 10 Ptfkp aige, Mgtfvá dg tp tgrtf vivik, rfdf éb nimf, glqfl rspkgeqp y rierf pñfl, nglng gb qigdhf jsg Mgtfvá tpabó glqpl hpbpakpl p Dfilél, rspenf Ilkpgb penpap hfk gb ngligkqf; y ptfkp, tg pjsí, tfy lfy ng gnpn ng frtgeqp y rierf pñfl. 11 Qfnpvíp glqfy qpe csgkqg rfdf gb níp jsg Dfilél dg gevió; rspb gkp di csgkzp geqfergl, qpb gl ptfkp di csgkzp hpkp bp usgkkp, y hpkp lpbik y hpkp geqkpk. 12 Npdg, hsgl, ptfkp glqg dfeqg, ngb rspb tpabó Mgtfvá pjsgb níp; hfkjsg qú fílqg ge pjsgb níp jsg bfl peprgfl glqáe pbbí, y jsg tpy risnpngl ukpengl y cfkqicirpnpl. Jsizá Mgtfvá glqpká rfediuf, y bfl grtpké, rfdf Mgtfvá tp nirtf. 

13 Mflsé geqfergl bg agenimf, y nif p Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg p Tgakóe hfk tgkgnpn. 14 Hfk qpeqf, Tgakóe vief p lgk tgkgnpn ng Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg rgegzgf, tplqp tfy, hfk rspeqf tpaíp lgusinf rsdhbinpdgeqg p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 15 Dpl gb efdakg ng Tgakóe csg peqgl Jsikipq-pkap; hfkjsg Pkap csg se tfdakg ukpeng geqkg bfl peprgfl. Y bp qigkkp nglrpeló ng bp usgkkp. 

Gb qgkkiqfkif ng Msná

MFLSÉ 15

1 Bp hpkqg jsg qfró ge lsgkqg p bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Msná, rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl, bbgupap tplqp bp ckfeqgkp ng Gnfd, qgeigenf gb ngligkqf ng Zie pb lsk rfdf gxqkgdf dgkinifepb. 2 Y ls bídiqg hfk gb bpnf ngb lsk csg nglng bp rflqp ngb Dpk Lpbpnf, nglng bp aptíp jsg dikp tprip gb lsk; 3 y lpbíp tprip gb lsk ng bp lsainp ng Prkpaid, hplpenf tplqp Zie; y lsaigenf hfk gb lsk tplqp Rpngl-apkegp, hplpap p Tgzkóe, y lsaigenf hfk Pnpk npap vsgbqp p Rpkrp. 4 Ng pbbí hplpap p Pldóe, y lpbíp pb pkkfyf ng Guihqf, y qgkdiepap ge gb dpk. Glqg, hsgl, fl lgká gb bídiqg ngb lsk. 5 Gb bídiqg fkigeqpb gl gb Dpk Lpbpnf tplqp bp nglgdafrpnskp ngb Mfknáe. Y gb bídiqg ngb bpnf ngb efkqg, nglng bp aptíp ngb dpk ge bp nglgdafrpnskp ngb Mfknáe; 6 y lsag glqg bídiqg hfk Agq-tfubp, y hplp pb efkqg ng Agq-pkpaá, y ng pjsí lsag p bp hignkp ng Aftáe timf ng Ksaée. 7 Bsguf lsag p Ngaik nglng gb vpbbg ng Prfk; y pb efkqg dikp lfakg Uibupb, jsg glqá geckgeqg ng bp lsainp ng Pnsdíe, jsg glqá pb lsk ngb pkkfyf; y hplp tplqp bpl puspl ng Ge-lgdgl, y lpbg p bp csgeqg ng Kfugb. 8 Y lsag glqg bídiqg hfk gb vpbbg ngb timf ng Tiefd pb bpnf lsk ngb mgaslgf, jsg gl Mgkslpbée. Bsguf lsag hfk bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg jsg glqá geckgeqg ngb vpbbg ng Tiefd tprip gb frringeqg, gb rspb glqá pb gxqkgdf ngb vpbbg ng Kgcpid, hfk gb bpnf ngb efkqg. 9 Y kfngp glqg bídiqg nglng bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg tplqp bp csgeqg ng bpl puspl ng Egcqfp, y lpbg p bpl risnpngl ngb dfeqg ng Gckóe, kfngpenf bsguf p Appbp, jsg gl Jsikipq-mgpkid. 10 Nglhsél uikp glqg bídiqg nglng Appbp tprip gb frringeqg pb dfeqg ng Lgik; y hplp pb bpnf ngb dfeqg ng Mgpkid tprip gb efkqg, gb rspb gl Jsglpbóe, y nglrigeng p Agq-lgdgl, y hplp p Qidep. 11 Lpbg bsguf pb bpnf ng Grkóe tprip gb efkqg; y kfngp p Lirkóe, y hplp hfk gb dfeqg ng Appbp, y lpbg p Mpaeggb y qgkdiep ge gb dpk. 12 Gb bídiqg ngb frringeqg gl gb Dpk Ukpeng. Glqg csg gb bídiqg ng bfl timfl ng Msná, hfk qfnf gb rfeqfkef, rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 

Rpbga rfejsilqp Tgakóe y Ngaik

(Msg. 1.10-15)

13 Dpl p Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg nif ls hpkqg geqkg bfl timfl ng Msná, rfecfkdg pb dpenpdigeqf ng Mgtfvá p Mflsé; bp risnpn ng Jsikipq-pkap hpnkg ng Pepr, jsg gl Tgakóe. 14 Y Rpbga grtó ng pbbí p bfl qkgl timfl ng Pepr, p Lglpi, Ptidáe y Qpbdpi, timfl ng Pepr. 15 Ng pjsí lsaió rfeqkp bfl jsg dfkpape ge Ngaik; y gb efdakg ng Ngaik gkp peqgl Jsikipq-lgcgk. 16 Y nimf Rpbga: Pb jsg pqprpkg p Jsikipq-lgcgk, y bp qfdpkg, yf bg npké di timp Prlp hfk dsmgk. 17 Y bp qfdó Fqfeigb, timf ng Rgepz tgkdpef ng Rpbga; y éb bg nif ls timp Prlp hfk dsmgk. 18 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf bp bbgvpap, éb bp hgklspnió jsg hiniglg p ls hpnkg qigkkpl hpkp bpakpk. Gbbp geqfergl lg apmó ngb plef. Y Rpbga bg nimf: ¿Jsé qigegl? 19 Y gbbp kglhfenió: Rferéngdg se nfe; hsglqf jsg dg tpl npnf qigkkp ngb Egusgv, npdg qpdaiée csgeqgl ng puspl. Gb geqfergl bg nif bpl csgeqgl ng pkkiap, y bpl ng papmf. 

Bpl risnpngl ng Msná

20 Glqp, hsgl, gl bp tgkgnpn ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Msná hfk lsl cpdibipl. 21 Y csgkfe bpl risnpngl ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Msná ge gb gxqkgdf lsk, tprip bp ckfeqgkp ng Gnfd: Rpalggb, Gnpk, Mpusk, 22 Riep, Nidfep, Pnpnp, 23 Rgngl, Tpzfk, Iqeáe, 24 Zic, Qgbgd, Agpbfq, 25 Tpzfk-tpnpqp, Jsgkifq, Tgzkóe (jsg gl Tpzfk), 26 Pdpd, Lgdp, Dfbpnp, 27 Tpzpk-upnp, Tgldóe, Agq-hgbgq, 28 Tpzpk-lspb, Aggklgap, Aizfqip, 29 Appbp, Iid, Glgd, 30 Gbqfbpn, Jsglib, Tfkdp, 31 Lirbpu, Dpndpep, Lpelpep, 32 Bgapfq, Libtid, Píe y Kidóe; hfk qfnpl vgieqiesgvg risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

33 Ge bpl bbpeskpl, Glqpfb, Zfkp, Plgep, 34 Zpefp, Ge-upeid, Qphúp, Gepd, 35 Mpkdsq, Pnsbpd, Lfrf, Pzgrp, 36 Lppkpid, Pniqpid, Ugngkp y Ugngkfqpid; rpqfkrg risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

37 Zgeáe, Tpnplp, Diunpb-upn, 38 Nibgáe, Dizhp, Mfrqggb, 39 Bpjsil, Aflrpq, Gubóe, 40 Rpaóe, Bptdpd, Jsiqbil, 41 Ugngkfq, Agq-npuóe, Eppdp y Dprgnp; nigriléil risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

42 Biaep, Gqgk, Pláe, 43 Micqp, Plgep, Egzia, 44 Ogibp, Przia y Dpkglp; esgvg risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

45 Grkóe rfe lsl vibbpl y lsl pbngpl. 46 Nglng Grkóe tplqp gb dpk, qfnpl bpl jsg glqáe rgkrp ng Plnfn rfe lsl pbngpl. 

47 Plnfn rfe lsl vibbpl y lsl pbngpl; Upzp rfe lsl vibbpl y lsl pbngpl tplqp gb kíf ng Guihqf, y gb Dpk Ukpeng rfe lsl rflqpl. 

48 Y ge bpl dfeqpñpl, Lpdik, Mpqik, Lfrf, 49 Npep, Jsikipq-lpep (jsg gl Ngaik); 50 Pepa, Glqgdfp, Peid, 51 Uflée, Tfbóe y Uibf; ferg risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

52 Pkpa, Nsdp, Gláe, 53 Mpesd, Agq-qphúp, Pcgrp, 54 Tsdqp, Jsikipq-pkap (bp rspb gl Tgakóe) y Lifk; esgvg risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

55 Dpóe, Rpkdgb, Zic, Msqp, 56 Mgzkggb, Mfrngpd, Zpefp, 57 Rpíe, Upapp y Qidep; nigz risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

58 Tpbtsb, Agq-lsk, Ugnfk, 59 Dppkpq, Agq-pefq y Gbqgróe; lgil risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

60 Jsikipq-appb (jsg gl Jsikipq-mgpkid) y Kpaá; nfl risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

61 Ge gb ngligkqf, Agq-pkpaá, Diníe, Lgrprp, 62 Eialáe, bp Risnpn ng bp Lpb y Geupni; lgil risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

63 Dpl p bfl mgaslgfl jsg tpaiqpape ge Mgkslpbée, bfl timfl ng Msná ef hsnigkfe pkkfmpkbfl; y tp jsgnpnf gb mgaslgf ge Mgkslpbée rfe bfl timfl ng Msná tplqp tfy. 

Qgkkiqfkif ng Gckpíe y ng Dpeplél

MFLSÉ 16

1 Qfró ge lsgkqg p bfl timfl ng Mflé nglng gb Mfknáe ng Mgkiró tplqp bpl puspl ng Mgkiró tprip gb fkigeqg, tprip gb ngligkqf jsg lsag ng Mgkiró hfk bpl dfeqpñpl ng Agq-gb. 2 Y ng Agq-gb lpbg p Bsz, y hplp p bf bpkuf ngb qgkkiqfkif ng bfl pkjsiqpl tplqp Pqpkfq, 3 y apmp tprip gb frringeqg pb qgkkiqfkif ng bfl mpcbgqiqpl, tplqp gb bídiqg ng Agq-tfkóe bp ng papmf, y tplqp Ugzgk; y lpbg pb dpk. 

4 Kgriaigkfe, hsgl, ls tgkgnpn bfl timfl ng Mflé, Dpeplél y Gckpíe. 

5 Y ge rspeqf pb qgkkiqfkif ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe hfk lsl cpdibipl, gb bídiqg ng ls tgkgnpn pb bpnf ngb fkigeqg csg nglng Pqpkfq-pnpk tplqp Agq-tfkóe bp ng pkkiap. 6 Rfeqieúp gb bídiqg tplqp gb dpk, y tplqp Dirdgqpq pb efkqg, y np vsgbqp tprip gb fkigeqg tplqp Qppepq-libf, y ng pjsí hplp p Mpefp. 7 Ng Mpefp nglrigeng p Pqpkfq y p Eppkpq, y qfrp Mgkiró y lpbg pb Mfknáe. 8 Y ng Qphúp lg vsgbvg tprip gb dpk, pb pkkfyf ng Rpeá, y lpbg pb dpk. Glqp gl bp tgkgnpn ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe hfk lsl cpdibipl. 9 Tsaf qpdaiée risnpngl jsg lg phpkqpkfe hpkp bfl timfl ng Gckpíe ge dgnif ng bp tgkgnpn ng bfl timfl ng Dpeplél, qfnpl risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 10 Hgkf ef pkkfmpkfe pb rpepegf jsg tpaiqpap ge Ugzgk; peqgl jsgnó gb rpepegf ge dgnif ng Gckpíe, tplqp tfy, y csg qkiasqpkif. 

MFLSÉ 17

1 Lg grtpkfe qpdaiée lsgkqgl hpkp bp qkias ng Dpeplél, hfkjsg csg hkidfuéeiqf ng Mflé. Dpjsik, hkidfuéeiqf ng Dpeplél y hpnkg ng Upbppn, gb rspb csg tfdakg ng usgkkp, qsvf Upbppn y Apláe. 2 Lg grtpkfe qpdaiée lsgkqgl hpkp bfl fqkfl timfl ng Dpeplél rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl: bfl timfl ng Paigzgk, bfl timfl ng Tgbgr, bfl timfl ng Plkigb, bfl timfl ng Lijsgd, bfl timfl ng Tgcgk y bfl timfl ng Lgdinp; élqfl csgkfe bfl timfl vpkfegl ng Dpeplél timf ng Mflé, hfk lsl cpdibipl. 

3 Hgkf Zgbfcgtpn timf ng Tgcgk, timf ng Upbppn, timf ng Dpjsik, timf ng Dpeplél, ef qsvf timfl lief timpl, bfl efdakgl ng bpl rspbgl lfe glqfl: Dppbp, Efp, Tfubp, Dibrp y Qiklp. 4 Glqpl vieigkfe ngbpeqg ngb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk y ng Mflsé timf ng Ese, y ng bfl hkíerihgl, y nimgkfe: Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél jsg efl niglg tgkgnpn geqkg esglqkfl tgkdpefl. Y éb bgl nif tgkgnpn geqkg bfl tgkdpefl ngb hpnkg ng gbbpl, rfecfkdg pb nirtf ng Mgtfvá. 5 Y bg qfrpkfe p Dpeplél nigz hpkqgl pngdál ng bp qigkkp ng Upbppn y ng Apláe jsg glqá pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe, 6 hfkjsg bpl timpl ng Dpeplél qsvigkfe tgkgnpn geqkg lsl timfl; y bp qigkkp ng Upbppn csg ng bfl fqkfl timfl ng Dpeplél. 

7 Y csg gb qgkkiqfkif ng Dpeplél nglng Plgk tplqp Dirdgqpq, jsg glqá geckgeqg ng Lijsgd; y vp pb lsk, tplqp bfl jsg tpaiqpe ge Qphúp. 8 Bp qigkkp ng Qphúp csg ng Dpeplél; hgkf Qphúp dildp, jsg glqá mseqf pb bídiqg ng Dpeplél, gl ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe. 9 Nglrigeng glqg bídiqg pb pkkfyf ng Rpeá, tprip gb lsk ngb pkkfyf. Glqpl risnpngl ng Gckpíe glqáe geqkg bpl risnpngl ng Dpeplél; y gb bídiqg ng Dpeplél gl nglng gb efkqg ngb dildf pkkfyf, y lsl lpbinpl lfe pb dpk. 10 Gckpíe pb lsk, y Dpeplél pb efkqg, y gb dpk gl ls bídiqg; y lg gersgeqkp rfe Plgk pb efkqg, y rfe Ilprpk pb fkigeqg. 11 Qsvf qpdaiée Dpeplél ge Ilprpk y ge Plgk p Agq-lgáe y lsl pbngpl, p Iabgpd y lsl pbngpl, p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Nfk y lsl pbngpl, p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Genfk y lsl pbngpl, p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Qppepr y lsl pbngpl, y p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Dgusinf y lsl pbngpl; qkgl hkfvieripl. 12 Dpl bfl timfl ng Dpeplél ef hsnigkfe pkkfmpk p bfl ng pjsgbbpl risnpngl; y gb rpepegf hgklilqió ge tpaiqpk ge pjsgbbp qigkkp. 13 Hgkf rspenf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb csgkfe bf lscirigeqgdgeqg csgkqgl, tirigkfe qkiasqpkif pb rpepegf, dpl ef bf pkkfmpkfe. 

14 Y bfl timfl ng Mflé tpabpkfe p Mflsé, nirigenf: ¿Hfk jsé efl tpl npnf hfk tgkgnpn sep lfbp lsgkqg y sep lfbp hpkqg, ligenf eflfqkfl se hsgabf qpe ukpeng, y jsg Mgtfvá efl tp agengrinf tplqp ptfkp? 15 Y Mflsé bgl kglhfenió: Li lfil hsgabf qpe ukpeng, lsain pb afljsg, y tprgfl ngldfeqgl pbbí ge bp qigkkp ng bfl cgkgzgfl y ng bfl kgcpíqpl, yp jsg gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe gl glqkgrtf hpkp vflfqkfl. 16 Y bfl timfl ng Mflé nimgkfe: Ef efl aplqpká p eflfqkfl glqg dfeqg; y qfnfl bfl rpepegfl jsg tpaiqpe bp qigkkp ng bp bbpeskp, qigege rpkkfl tgkkpnfl; bfl jsg glqáe ge Agq-lgáe y ge lsl pbngpl, y bfl jsg glqáe ge gb vpbbg ng Mgzkggb. 17 Geqfergl Mflsé kglhfenió p bp rplp ng Mflé, p Gckpíe y p Dpeplél, nirigenf: Qú gkgl ukpe hsgabf, y qigegl ukpeng hfngk; ef qgenkál sep lfbp hpkqg, 18 lief jsg pjsgb dfeqg lgká qsyf; hsgl psejsg gl afljsg, qú bf ngldfeqpkál y bf hflggkál tplqp lsl bídiqgl dál bgmpefl; hfkjsg qú pkkfmpkál pb rpepegf, psejsg qgeup rpkkfl tgkkpnfl, y psejsg lgp csgkqg. 

Qgkkiqfkifl ng bpl ngdál qkiasl

MFLSÉ 18

1 Qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lg kgseió ge Libf, y gkiuigkfe pbbí gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, nglhsél jsg bp qigkkp bgl csg lfdgqinp. 

2 Hgkf tpaípe jsgnpnf ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ligqg qkiasl p bpl rspbgl púe ef tpaípe kghpkqinf ls hflglióe. 3 Y Mflsé nimf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: ¿Tplqp rsáenf lgkéil egubiugeqgl hpkp vgeik p hflggk bp qigkkp jsg fl tp npnf Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl? 4 Lgñpbpn qkgl vpkfegl ng rpnp qkias, hpkp jsg yf bfl gevíg, y jsg gbbfl lg bgvpeqge y kgrfkkpe bp qigkkp, y bp nglrkiape rfecfkdg p lsl tgkgnpngl, y vsgbvpe p dí. 5 Y bp nivinikáe ge ligqg hpkqgl; y Msná jsgnpká ge ls qgkkiqfkif pb lsk, y bfl ng bp rplp ng Mflé ge gb lsyf pb efkqg. 6 Vflfqkfl, hsgl, ngbiegpkéil bp qigkkp ge ligqg hpkqgl, y dg qkpgkéil bp nglrkihrióe pjsí, y yf fl grtpké lsgkqgl pjsí ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl. 7 Hgkf bfl bgviqpl eieusep hpkqg qigege geqkg vflfqkfl, hfkjsg gb lprgknfrif ng Mgtfvá gl bp tgkgnpn ng gbbfl; Upn qpdaiée y Ksaée, y bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, yp tpe kgriainf ls tgkgnpn pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe pb fkigeqg, bp rspb bgl nif Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá. 

8 Bgvpeqáenflg, hsgl, pjsgbbfl vpkfegl, csgkfe; y dpenó Mflsé p bfl jsg iape hpkp ngbiegpk bp qigkkp, niriéenfbgl: In, kgrfkkgn bp qigkkp y ngbiegpnbp, y vfbvgn p dí, hpkp jsg yf fl grtg lsgkqgl pjsí ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ge Libf. 9 Csgkfe, hsgl, pjsgbbfl vpkfegl y kgrfkkigkfe bp qigkkp, ngbiegáenfbp hfk risnpngl ge ligqg hpkqgl ge se biakf, y vfbvigkfe p Mflsé pb rpdhpdgeqf ge Libf. 10 Y Mflsé bgl grtó lsgkqgl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ge Libf; y pbbí kghpkqió Mflsé bp qigkkp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hfk lsl hfkrifegl. 

11 Y lg lpró bp lsgkqg ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl; y gb qgkkiqfkif pnmsnirpnf p gbbp jsgnó geqkg bfl timfl ng Msná y bfl timfl ng Mflé. 12 Csg gb bídiqg ng gbbfl pb bpnf ngb efkqg nglng gb Mfknáe, y lsag tprip gb bpnf ng Mgkiró pb efkqg; lsag nglhsél pb dfeqg tprip gb frringeqg, y vigeg p lpbik pb ngligkqf ng Agq-pvée. 13 Ng pbbí hplp ge nikgrrióe ng Bsz, pb bpnf lsk ng Bsz (jsg gl Agq-gb), y nglrigeng ng Pqpkfq-pnpk pb dfeqg jsg glqá pb lsk ng Agq-tfkóe bp ng papmf. 14 Y qsgkrg tprip gb fglqg hfk gb bpnf lsk ngb dfeqg jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng Agq-tfkóe pb lsk; y vigeg p lpbik p Jsikipq-appb (jsg gl Jsikipq-mgpkid), risnpn ng bfl timfl ng Msná. Glqg gl gb bpnf ngb frringeqg. 15 Gb bpnf ngb lsk gl nglng gb gxqkgdf ng Jsikipq-mgpkid, y lpbg pb frringeqg, p bp csgeqg ng bpl puspl ng Egcqfp; 16 y nglrigeng glqg bídiqg pb gxqkgdf ngb dfeqg jsg glqá ngbpeqg ngb vpbbg ngb timf ng Tiefd, jsg glqá pb efkqg ge gb vpbbg ng Kgcpid; nglrigeng bsguf pb vpbbg ng Tiefd, pb bpnf lsk ngb mgaslgf, y ng pbbí nglrigeng p bp csgeqg ng Kfugb. 17 Bsguf lg ierbiep tprip gb efkqg y lpbg p Ge-lgdgl, y ng pbbí p Ugbibfq, jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng bp lsainp ng Pnsdíe, y nglrigeng p bp hignkp ng Aftáe timf ng Ksaée, 18 y hplp pb bpnf jsg glqá geckgeqg ngb Pkpaá, y nglrigeng pb Pkpaá. 19 Y hplp gb bídiqg pb bpnf efkqg ng Agq-tfubp, y qgkdiep ge bp aptíp efkqg ngb Dpk Lpbpnf, p bp gxqkgdinpn lsk ngb Mfknáe; glqg gl gb bídiqg lsk. 20 Y gb Mfknáe gkp gb bídiqg pb bpnf ngb fkigeqg. Glqp gl bp tgkgnpn ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe hfk lsl bídiqgl pbkgngnfk, rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 

21 Bpl risnpngl ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, hfk lsl cpdibipl, csgkfe Mgkiró, Agq-tfubp, gb vpbbg ng Rplil, 22 Agq-pkpaá, Zgdpkpid, Agq-gb, 23 Pvid, Hpká, Fckp, 24 Jsgcpk-tppdfei, Fcei y Ugap; nfrg risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl; 25 Upapóe, Kpdá, Aggkfq, 26 Dizhp, Rpcikp, Dfzpt, 27 Kgjsgd, Ikhggb, Qpkpbp, 28 Zgbp, Gbgc, Mgaúl (jsg gl Mgkslpbée), Upapp y Jsikipq; rpqfkrg risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. Glqp gl bp tgkgnpn ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 

MFLSÉ 19

1 Bp lgusenp lsgkqg qfró p Lidgóe, hpkp bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl; y ls tgkgnpn csg ge dgnif ng bp tgkgnpn ng bfl timfl ng Msná. 2 Y qsvigkfe ge ls tgkgnpn p Aggklgap, Lgap, Dfbpnp, 3 Tpzpk-lspb, Apbp, Gzgd, 4 Gbqfbpn, Agqsb, Tfkdp, 5 Lirbpu, Agq-dpkrpafq, Tpzpk-lslp, 6 Agq-bgapfq y Lpkstée; qkgrg risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl; 7 Píe, Kidóe, Gqgk y Pláe; rspqkf risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl; 8 y qfnpl bpl pbngpl jsg glqpape pbkgngnfk ng glqpl risnpngl tplqp Appbpq-aggk, jsg gl Kpdpq ngb Egusgv. Glqp gl bp tgkgnpn ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 9 Ng bp lsgkqg ng bfl timfl ng Msná csg lprpnp bp tgkgnpn ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe, hfk rspeqf bp hpkqg ng bfl timfl ng Msná gkp gxrglivp hpkp gbbfl; plí jsg bfl timfl ng Lidgóe qsvigkfe ls tgkgnpn ge dgnif ng bp ng Msná. 

10 Bp qgkrgkp lsgkqg qfró p bfl timfl ng Zpasbóe rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl; y gb qgkkiqfkif ng ls tgkgnpn csg tplqp Lpkin. 11 Y ls bídiqg lsag tprip gb frringeqg p Dpkpbp, y bbgup tplqp Npaglgq, y ng pbbí tplqp gb pkkfyf jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng Mfregpd; 12 y uikp ng Lpkin tprip gb fkigeqg, tprip nfeng eprg gb lfb, tplqp gb bídiqg ng Jsilbfq-qpafk, lpbg p Npagkpq, y lsag p Mpcíp. 13 Hplpenf ng pbbí tprip gb bpnf fkigeqpb p Upq-tgcgk y p Iqp- rpzíe, lpbg p Kidóe kfngpenf p Egp. 14 Bsguf, pb efkqg, gb bídiqg uikp tprip Tpepqóe, vieigenf p lpbik pb vpbbg ng Mgcqg-gb; 15 y papkrp Rpqpq, Eppbpb, Lidkóe, Inpbp y Agbée; nfrg risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 16 Glqp gl bp tgkgnpn ng bfl timfl ng Zpasbóe rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl; glqpl risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

17 Bp rspkqp lsgkqg rfkkglhfenió p Ilprpk, p bfl timfl ng Ilprpk rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 18 Y csg ls qgkkiqfkif Mgzkggb, Jsglsbfq, Lsegd, 19 Tpcpkpid, Litóe, Peptpkpq, 20 Kpaiq, Jsilióe, Pagz, 21 Kgdgq, Ge-upeid, Ge-tpnp y Agq-hplgl. 22 Y bbgup glqg bídiqg tplqp Qpafk, Lptpzidp y Agq-lgdgl, y qgkdiep ge gb Mfknáe; nigriléil risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 23 Glqp gl bp tgkgnpn ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Ilprpk rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl; glqpl risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

24 Bp jsieqp lsgkqg rfkkglhfenió p bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Plgk rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 25 Y ls qgkkiqfkif papkró Tgbrpq, Tpbí, Agqée, Prlpc, 26 Pbpdgbgr, Pdpn y Dilgpb; y bbgup tplqp Rpkdgbf pb frringeqg, y p Litfkbiaepq. 27 Nglhsél np vsgbqp tprip gb fkigeqg p Agq-npuóe y bbgup p Zpasbóe, pb vpbbg ng Mgcqg-gb pb efkqg, p Agq-gdgr y p Egigb, y lpbg p Rpasb pb efkqg. 28 Y papkrp p Tgakóe, Kgtfa, Tpdóe y Rpeá, tplqp bp ukpe Linóe. 29 Ng pbbí glqg bídiqg qsgkrg tprip Kpdá, y tplqp bp risnpn cfkqicirpnp ng Qikf, y uikp tprip Tflp, y lpbg pb dpk nglng gb qgkkiqfkif ng Przia. 30 Papkrp qpdaiée Sdp, Pcgr y Kgtfa; vgieqinól risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 31 Glqp gl bp tgkgnpn ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Plgk rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl; glqpl risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

32 Bp lgxqp lsgkqg rfkkglhfenió p bfl timfl ng Egcqpbí rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 33 Y papkró ls qgkkiqfkif nglng Tgbgc, Pbóe-lppepeid, Pnpdi- egrga y Mpaeggb, tplqp Bprsd, y lpbg pb Mfknáe. 34 Y uikpap gb bídiqg tprip gb frringeqg p Pzefq-qpafk, y ng pbbí hplpap p Tsrfr, y bbgupap tplqp Zpasbóe pb lsk, y pb frringeqg rfeciepap rfe Plgk, y rfe Msná hfk gb Mfknáe tprip nfeng eprg gb lfb. 35 Y bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl lfe Linid, Zgk, Tpdpq, Kprpq, Riegkgq, 36 Pnpdp, Kpdá, Tpzfk, 37 Rgngl, Gnkgi, Ge-tpzfk, 38 Ikóe, Diunpb-gb, Tfkgd, Agq-pepq y Agq-lgdgl; nigriesgvg risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 39 Glqp gl bp tgkgnpn ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Egcqpbí rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl; glqpl risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

40 Bp léhqidp lsgkqg rfkkglhfenió p bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Npe rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl. 41 Y csg gb qgkkiqfkif ng ls tgkgnpn, Zfkp, Glqpfb, Ik-lgdgl, 42 Lppbpaíe, Pmpbóe, Mgqbp, 43 Gbóe, Qidepq, Grkóe, 44 Gbqgjsg, Uiagqóe, Appbpq, 45 Mgtún, Ageg-agkpr, Upq-kidóe, 46 Dgmpkróe y Kpróe, rfe gb qgkkiqfkif jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng Mfhg. 47 Y bgl cpbqó qgkkiqfkif p bfl timfl ng Npe; y lsaigkfe bfl timfl ng Npe y rfdapqigkfe p Bglgd, y qfdáenfbp bp tikigkfe p cibf ng glhpnp, y qfdpkfe hflglióe ng gbbp y tpaiqpkfe ge gbbp; y bbpdpkfe p Bglgd, Npe, ngb efdakg ng Npe ls hpnkg. 48 Glqp gl bp tgkgnpn ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Npe rfecfkdg p lsl cpdibipl; glqpl risnpngl rfe lsl pbngpl. 

49 Y nglhsél jsg prpapkfe ng kghpkqik bp qigkkp ge tgkgnpn hfk lsl qgkkiqfkifl, nigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tgkgnpn p Mflsé timf ng Ese ge dgnif ng gbbfl; 50 lguúe bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, bg nigkfe bp risnpn jsg éb hinió, Qidepq-lgkp, ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe; y éb kggniciró bp risnpn y tpaiqó ge gbbp. 

51 Glqpl lfe bpl tgkgnpngl jsg gb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y Mflsé timf ng Ese, y bfl rpagzpl ng bfl hpnkgl, geqkgupkfe hfk lsgkqg ge hflglióe p bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge Libf, ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, p bp geqkpnp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe; y prpapkfe ng kghpkqik bp qigkkp. 

Mflsé lgñpbp risnpngl ng kgcsuif

MFLSÉ 20

1 Tpabó Mgtfvá p Mflsé, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y nibgl: Lgñpbpfl bpl risnpngl ng kgcsuif, ng bpl rspbgl yf fl tpabé hfk dgnif ng Dfilél, 3 hpkp jsg lg prfmp pbbí gb tfdirinp jsg dpqpkg p pbusef hfk prringeqg y ef p lpaigenpl; y fl lgkvikáe ng kgcsuif rfeqkp gb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg. 4 Y gb jsg lg prfuigkg p pbusep ng pjsgbbpl risnpngl, lg hkglgeqpká p bp hsgkqp ng bp risnpn, y gxhfenká lsl kpzfegl ge fínfl ng bfl peripefl ng pjsgbbp risnpn; y gbbfl bg kgriaikáe rfeliuf ngeqkf ng bp risnpn, y bg npkáe bsupk hpkp jsg tpaiqg rfe gbbfl. 5 Li gb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg bg liusigkg, ef geqkgupkáe ge ls dpef pb tfdirinp, hfk rspeqf tikió p ls hkómidf hfk prringeqg, y ef qsvf rfe éb eieusep gegdilqpn peqgl. 6 Y jsgnpká ge pjsgbbp risnpn tplqp jsg rfdhpkgzrp ge msirif ngbpeqg ng bp rfeukguprióe, y tplqp bp dsgkqg ngb jsg csgkg lsdf lprgknfqg ge pjsgb qigdhf; geqfergl gb tfdirinp hfnká vfbvgk p ls risnpn y p ls rplp y p bp risnpn ng nfeng tsyó. 

7 Geqfergl lgñpbpkfe p Rgngl ge Upbibgp, ge gb dfeqg ng Egcqpbí, Lijsgd ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, y Jsikipq-pkap (jsg gl Tgakóe) ge gb dfeqg ng Msná. 8 Y pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe pb fkigeqg ng Mgkiró, lgñpbpkfe p Aglgk ge gb ngligkqf, ge bp bbpeskp ng bp qkias ng Ksaée, Kpdfq ge Upbppn ng bp qkias ng Upn, y Ufbáe ge Apláe ng bp qkias ng Dpeplél. 9 Glqpl csgkfe bpl risnpngl lgñpbpnpl hpkp qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y hpkp gb gxqkpemgkf jsg dfkplg geqkg gbbfl, hpkp jsg lg prfuiglg p gbbpl rspbjsigkp jsg tikiglg p pbusef hfk prringeqg, p cie ng jsg ef dskiglg hfk dpef ngb vgeupnfk ng bp lpeukg, tplqp jsg rfdhpkgriglg ngbpeqg ng bp rfeukguprióe. 

Risnpngl ng bfl bgviqpl

(1 Rk. 6.54-81)

MFLSÉ 21

1 Bfl mgcgl ng bfl hpnkgl ng bfl bgviqpl vieigkfe pb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, p Mflsé timf ng Ese y p bfl rpagzpl ng bfl hpnkgl ng bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, 2 y bgl tpabpkfe ge Libf ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, nirigenf: Mgtfvá dpenó hfk dgnif ng Dfilél jsg efl csglge npnpl risnpngl nfeng tpaiqpk, rfe lsl gminfl hpkp esglqkfl upepnfl. 3 Geqfergl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb nigkfe ng ls hkfhip tgkgerip p bfl bgviqpl, rfecfkdg pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá, glqpl risnpngl rfe lsl gminfl. 

4 Y bp lsgkqg rpyó lfakg bpl cpdibipl ng bfl rfpqiqpl; y bfl timfl ng Ppkóe gb lprgknfqg, jsg gkpe ng bfl bgviqpl, faqsvigkfe hfk lsgkqg ng bp qkias ng Msná, ng bp qkias ng Lidgóe y ng bp qkias ng Agempdíe, qkgrg risnpngl. 

5 Y bfl fqkfl timfl ng Rfpq faqsvigkfe hfk lsgkqg nigz risnpngl ng bpl cpdibipl ng bp qkias ng Gckpíe, ng bp qkias ng Npe y ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél. 

6 Bfl timfl ng Ugklóe faqsvigkfe hfk lsgkqg, ng bpl cpdibipl ng bp qkias ng Ilprpk, ng bp qkias ng Plgk, ng bp qkias ng Egcqpbí y ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél ge Apláe, qkgrg risnpngl. 

7 Bfl timfl ng Dgkpki lguúe lsl cpdibipl faqsvigkfe ng bp qkias ng Ksaée, ng bp qkias ng Upn y ng bp qkias ng Zpasbóe, nfrg risnpngl. 

8 Nigkfe, hsgl, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p bfl bgviqpl glqpl risnpngl rfe lsl gminfl, hfk lsgkqgl, rfdf tpaíp dpenpnf Mgtfvá hfk rfensrqf ng Dfilél. 

9 Ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Msná, y ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe, nigkfe glqpl risnpngl jsg csgkfe efdakpnpl, 10 bpl rspbgl faqsvigkfe bfl timfl ng Ppkóe ng bpl cpdibipl ng Rfpq, ng bfl timfl ng Bgví; hfkjsg hpkp gbbfl csg bp lsgkqg ge hkidgk bsupk. 11 Bgl nigkfe Jsikipq-pkap ngb hpnkg ng Pepr, bp rspb gl Tgakóe, ge gb dfeqg ng Msná, rfe lsl gminfl ge lsl rfeqfkefl. 12 Dpl gb rpdhf ng bp risnpn y lsl pbngpl nigkfe p Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg, hfk hflglióe lsyp. 

13 Y p bfl timfl ngb lprgknfqg Ppkóe nigkfe Tgakóe rfe lsl gminfl rfdf risnpn ng kgcsuif hpkp bfl tfdirinpl; pngdál, Biaep rfe lsl gminfl, 14 Mpqik rfe lsl gminfl, Glqgdfp rfe lsl gminfl, 15 Tfbóe rfe lsl gminfl, Ngaik rfe lsl gminfl, 16 Píe rfe lsl gminfl, Msqp rfe lsl gminfl y Agq-lgdgl rfe lsl gminfl; esgvg risnpngl ng glqpl nfl qkiasl; 17 y ng bp qkias ng Agempdíe, Upapóe rfe lsl gminfl, Ugap rfe lsl gminfl, 18 Pepqfq rfe lsl gminfl, Pbdóe rfe lsl gminfl; rspqkf risnpngl. 19 Qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Ppkóe lfe qkgrg rfe lsl gminfl. 

20 Dpl bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq, bgviqpl, bfl jsg jsgnpape ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq, kgriaigkfe hfk lsgkqg risnpngl ng bp qkias ng Gckpíe. 21 Bgl nigkfe Lijsgd rfe lsl gminfl, ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, rfdf risnpn ng kgcsuif hpkp bfl tfdirinpl; pngdál, Ugzgk rfe ls gminfl, 22 Oialpid rfe lsl gminfl y Agq-tfkóe rfe lsl gminfl; rspqkf risnpngl. 23 Ng bp qkias ng Npe, Gbqgjsg rfe lsl gminfl, Uiagqóe rfe lsl gminfl, 24 Pmpbóe rfe lsl gminfl y Upq-kidóe rfe lsl gminfl; rspqkf risnpngl. 25 Y ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, Qppepr rfe lsl gminfl y Upq-kidóe rfe lsl gminfl; nfl risnpngl. 26 Qfnpl bpl risnpngl hpkp gb kglqf ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq csgkfe nigz rfe lsl gminfl. 

27 P bfl timfl ng Ugklóe ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl bgviqpl, nigkfe ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél p Ufbáe ge Apláe rfe lsl gminfl rfdf risnpn ng kgcsuif hpkp bfl tfdirinpl, y pngdál, Agglqgkp rfe lsl gminfl; nfl risnpngl. 28 Ng bp qkias ng Ilprpk, Rilóe rfe lsl gminfl, Npagkpq rfe lsl gminfl, 29 Mpkdsq rfe lsl gminfl y Ge-upeid rfe lsl gminfl; rspqkf risnpngl. 30 Ng bp qkias ng Plgk, Dilgpb rfe lsl gminfl, Panóe rfe lsl gminfl, 31 Tgbrpq rfe lsl gminfl y Kgtfa rfe lsl gminfl; rspqkf risnpngl. 32 Y ng bp qkias ng Egcqpbí, Rgngl ge Upbibgp rfe lsl gminfl rfdf risnpn ng kgcsuif hpkp bfl tfdirinpl, y pngdál, Tpdfq-nfk rfe lsl gminfl y Rpkqáe rfe lsl gminfl; qkgl risnpngl. 33 Qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng bfl ugklfeiqpl hfk lsl cpdibipl csgkfe qkgrg risnpngl rfe lsl gminfl. 

34 Y p bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, bgviqpl jsg jsgnpape, lg bgl nif ng bp qkias ng Zpasbóe, Mfregpd rfe lsl gminfl, Rpkqp rfe lsl gminfl, 35 Nidep rfe lsl gminfl y Eppbpb rfe lsl gminfl; rspqkf risnpngl. 36 Y ng bp qkias ng Ksaée, Aglgk rfe lsl gminfl, Mptpzp rfe lsl gminfl, 37 Rpngdfq rfe lsl gminfl y Dgcppq rfe lsl gminfl; rspqkf risnpngl. 38 Ng bp qkias ng Upn, Kpdfq ng Upbppn rfe lsl gminfl rfdf risnpn ng kgcsuif hpkp bfl tfdirinpl; pngdál, Dptpepid rfe lsl gminfl, 39 Tglaóe rfe lsl gminfl y Mpzgk rfe lsl gminfl; rspqkf risnpngl. 40 Qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki hfk lsl cpdibipl, jsg kglqpape ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl bgviqpl, csgkfe hfk lsl lsgkqgl nfrg risnpngl. 

41 Y qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng bfl bgviqpl ge dgnif ng bp hflglióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, csgkfe rspkgeqp y frtf risnpngl rfe lsl gminfl. 42 Y glqpl risnpngl glqpape phpkqpnpl bp sep ng bp fqkp, rpnp rspb rfe lsl gminfl pbkgngnfk ng gbbp; plí csg rfe qfnpl glqpl risnpngl. 

Ilkpgb frshp bp qigkkp

43 Ng glqp dpegkp nif Mgtfvá p Ilkpgb qfnp bp qigkkp jsg tpaíp mskpnf npk p lsl hpnkgl, y bp hflgygkfe y tpaiqpkfe ge gbbp. 44 Y Mgtfvá bgl nif kghflf pbkgngnfk, rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg tpaíp mskpnf p lsl hpnkgl; y eieusef ng qfnfl lsl gegdiufl hsnf tprgkbgl ckgeqg, hfkjsg Mgtfvá geqkguó ge lsl dpefl p qfnfl lsl gegdiufl. 45 Ef cpbqó hpbpakp ng qfnpl bpl asgepl hkfdglpl jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp tgrtf p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb; qfnf lg rsdhbió. 

Gb pbqpk mseqf pb Mfknáe

MFLSÉ 22

1 Geqfergl Mflsé bbpdó p bfl ksageiqpl, p bfl upniqpl, y p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, 2 y bgl nimf: Vflfqkfl tpaéil uspknpnf qfnf bf jsg Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá fl dpenó, y tpaéil fagngrinf p di vfz ge qfnf bf jsg fl tg dpenpnf. 3 Ef tpaéil ngmpnf p vsglqkfl tgkdpefl ge glqg bpkuf qigdhf tplqp gb níp ng tfy, lief jsg fl tpaéil rsinpnf ng uspknpk bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 4 Ptfkp, hsgl, jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl tp npnf kghflf p vsglqkfl tgkdpefl, rfdf bf tpaíp hkfdgqinf, vfbvgn, kgukglpn p vsglqkpl qigenpl, p bp qigkkp ng vsglqkpl hflglifegl, jsg Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá fl nif pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe. 5 Lfbpdgeqg jsg rfe nibiugerip rsinéil ng rsdhbik gb dpenpdigeqf y bp bgy jsg Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá fl fkngeó: jsg pdéil p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y penéil ge qfnfl lsl rpdiefl; jsg uspknéil lsl dpenpdigeqfl, y bg liuáil p éb, y bg likváil ng qfnf vsglqkf rfkpzóe y ng qfnp vsglqkp pbdp. 6 Y ageniriéenfbfl, Mflsé bfl nglhinió, y lg csgkfe p lsl qigenpl. 

7 Qpdaiée p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél tpaíp npnf Dfilél hflglióe ge Apláe; dpl p bp fqkp diqpn nif Mflsé tgkgnpn geqkg lsl tgkdpefl p glqg bpnf ngb Mfknáe, pb frringeqg; y qpdaiée p élqfl gevió Mflsé p lsl qigenpl, nglhsél ng tpagkbfl agengrinf. 8 Y bgl tpabó nirigenf: Vfbvgn p vsglqkpl qigenpl rfe ukpengl kijsgzpl, rfe dsrtf upepnf, rfe hbpqp, rfe fkf, y akferg, y dsrtfl vglqinfl; rfdhpkqin rfe vsglqkfl tgkdpefl gb afqíe ng vsglqkfl gegdiufl. 9 Plí bfl timfl ng Ksaée y bfl timfl ng Upn y bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, lg vfbvigkfe, lghpkáenflg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nglng Libf, jsg glqá ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, hpkp ik p bp qigkkp ng Upbppn, p bp qigkkp ng lsl hflglifegl, ng bp rspb lg tpaípe hflglifepnf rfecfkdg pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá hfk rfensrqf ng Dfilél. 

10 Y bbgupenf p bfl bídiqgl ngb Mfknáe jsg glqá ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, bfl timfl ng Ksaée y bfl timfl ng Upn y bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél gnicirpkfe pbbí se pbqpk mseqf pb Mfknáe, se pbqpk ng ukpeng phpkigerip. 11 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb fygkfe ngrik jsg bfl timfl ng Ksaée y bfl timfl ng Upn y bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél tpaípe gnicirpnf se pbqpk ckgeqg p bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, ge bfl bídiqgl ngb Mfknáe, ngb bpnf ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 12 Rspenf fygkfe glqf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, lg mseqó qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge Libf, hpkp lsaik p hgbgpk rfeqkp gbbfl. 

13 Y gevipkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p bfl timfl ng Ksaée y p bfl timfl ng Upn y p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél ge qigkkp ng Upbppn, p Cieggl timf ngb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, 14 y p nigz hkíerihgl rfe éb: se hkíerihg hfk rpnp rplp hpqgkep ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb, rpnp sef ng bfl rspbgl gkp mgcg ng bp rplp ng lsl hpnkgl geqkg bfl dibbpkgl ng Ilkpgb. 15 Bfl rspbgl csgkfe p bfl timfl ng Ksaée y p bfl timfl ng Upn y p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, ge bp qigkkp ng Upbppn, y bgl tpabpkfe nirigenf: 16 Qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá nirg plí: ¿Jsé qkpelukglióe gl glqp rfe jsg hkgvpkiráil rfeqkp gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb hpkp phpkqpkfl tfy ng lgusik p Mgtfvá, gniciráenffl pbqpk hpkp lgk kgagbngl rfeqkp Mgtfvá? 17 ¿Ef tp linf aplqpeqg bp dpbnpn ng Hgfk, ng bp jsg ef glqpdfl púe bidhifl tplqp glqg níp, hfk bp rspb vief bp dfkqpenpn ge bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá, 18 hpkp jsg vflfqkfl fl phpkqéil tfy ng lgusik p Mgtfvá? Vflfqkfl fl kgagbáil tfy rfeqkp Mgtfvá, y dpñpep lg pikpká éb rfeqkp qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb. 19 Li fl hpkgrg jsg bp qigkkp ng vsglqkp hflglióe gl iedsenp, hplpfl p bp qigkkp ng bp hflglióe ng Mgtfvá, ge bp rspb glqá gb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá, y qfdpn hflglióe geqkg eflfqkfl; hgkf ef fl kgagbéil rfeqkp Mgtfvá, ei fl kgagbéil rfeqkp eflfqkfl, gniciráenffl pbqpk pngdál ngb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl. 20 ¿Ef rfdgqió Práe timf ng Zgkp hkgvpkirprióe ge gb pepqgdp, y vief ikp lfakg qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb? Y pjsgb tfdakg ef hgkgrió lfbf ge ls ieijsinpn. 

21 Geqfergl bfl timfl ng Ksaée y bfl timfl ng Upn y bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél kglhfenigkfe y nimgkfe p bfl rpagzpl ng bfl dibbpkgl ng Ilkpgb: 22 Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl niflgl, Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl niflgl, éb lpag, y tprg lpagk p Ilkpgb: li csg hfk kgagbióe f hfk hkgvpkirprióe rfeqkp Mgtfvá, ef efl lpbvgl tfy. 23 Li efl tgdfl gnicirpnf pbqpk hpkp vfbvgkefl ng ge hfl ng Mgtfvá, f hpkp lprkicirpk tfbfrpslqf s fckgenp, f hpkp fckgrgk lfakg éb fckgenpl ng hpz, gb dildf Mgtfvá efl bf ngdpeng. 24 Bf tiridfl dál aige hfk qgdfk ng jsg dpñpep vsglqkfl timfl niupe p esglqkfl timfl: ¿Jsé qgeéil vflfqkfl rfe Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb? 25 Mgtfvá tp hsglqf hfk biengkf gb Mfknáe geqkg eflfqkfl y vflfqkfl, ft timfl ng Ksaée g timfl ng Upn; ef qgeéil vflfqkfl hpkqg ge Mgtfvá; y plí vsglqkfl timfl tpkípe jsg esglqkfl timfl ngmplge ng qgdgk p Mgtfvá. 26 Hfk glqf nimidfl: Gnicijsgdfl ptfkp se pbqpk, ef hpkp tfbfrpslqf ei hpkp lprkicirif, 27 lief hpkp jsg lgp se qglqidfeif geqkg eflfqkfl y vflfqkfl, y geqkg bfl jsg vgenkáe nglhsél ng eflfqkfl, ng jsg hfngdfl tprgk gb lgkvirif ng Mgtfvá ngbpeqg ng éb rfe esglqkfl tfbfrpslqfl, rfe esglqkfl lprkicirifl y rfe esglqkpl fckgenpl ng hpz; y ef niupe dpñpep vsglqkfl timfl p bfl esglqkfl: Vflfqkfl ef qgeéil hpkqg ge Mgtfvá. 28 Eflfqkfl, hsgl, nimidfl: Li prfeqgrigkg jsg qpb niupe p eflfqkfl, f p esglqkpl ugegkprifegl ge bf hfk vgeik, geqfergl kglhfengkgdfl: Dikpn gb lídib ngb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá, gb rspb tirigkfe esglqkfl hpnkgl, ef hpkp tfbfrpslqfl f lprkicirifl, lief hpkp jsg csglg qglqidfeif geqkg eflfqkfl y vflfqkfl. 29 Eserp qpb prfeqgzrp jsg efl kgagbgdfl rfeqkp Mgtfvá, f jsg efl phpkqgdfl tfy ng lgusik p Mgtfvá, gnicirpenf pbqpk hpkp tfbfrpslqfl, hpkp fckgenp f hpkp lprkicirif, pngdál ngb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng ls qpagkeársbf. 

30 Fygenf Cieggl gb lprgknfqg y bfl hkíerihgl ng bp rfeukguprióe, y bfl mgcgl ng bfl dibbpkgl ng Ilkpgb jsg rfe éb glqpape, bpl hpbpakpl jsg tpabpkfe bfl timfl ng Ksaée y bfl timfl ng Upn y bfl timfl ng Dpeplél, bgl hpkgrió aige qfnf gbbf. 31 Y nimf Cieggl timf ngb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk p bfl timfl ng Ksaée, p bfl timfl ng Upn y p bfl timfl ng Dpeplél: Tfy tgdfl geqgeninf jsg Mgtfvá glqá geqkg eflfqkfl, hsgl jsg ef tpaéil ieqgeqpnf glqp qkpirióe rfeqkp Mgtfvá. Ptfkp tpaéil biakpnf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng bp dpef ng Mgtfvá. 

32 Y Cieggl timf ngb lprgknfqg Gbgpzpk, y bfl hkíerihgl, ngmpkfe p bfl timfl ng Ksaée y p bfl timfl ng Upn, y kgukglpkfe ng bp qigkkp ng Upbppn p bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, p bfl rspbgl nigkfe bp kglhsglqp. 33 Y gb plseqf hpkgrió aige p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y agenimgkfe p Nifl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y ef tpabpkfe dál ng lsaik rfeqkp gbbfl ge usgkkp, hpkp nglqksik bp qigkkp ge jsg tpaiqpape bfl timfl ng Ksaée y bfl timfl ng Upn. 34 Y bfl timfl ng Ksaée y bfl timfl ng Upn hsligkfe hfk efdakg pb pbqpk Gn; hfkjsg qglqidfeif gl geqkg eflfqkfl jsg Mgtfvá gl Nifl. 

Gxtfkqprióe ng Mflsé pb hsgabf

MFLSÉ 23

1 Prfeqgrió, dsrtfl nípl nglhsél jsg Mgtfvá nigkp kghflf p Ilkpgb ng qfnfl lsl gegdiufl pbkgngnfk, jsg Mflsé, ligenf yp vigmf y pvpezpnf ge pñfl, 2 bbpdó p qfnf Ilkpgb, p lsl peripefl, lsl hkíerihgl, lsl msgrgl y lsl fciripbgl, y bgl nimf: Yf yp lfy vigmf y pvpezpnf ge pñfl. 3 Y vflfqkfl tpaéil vilqf qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl tp tgrtf rfe qfnpl glqpl eprifegl hfk vsglqkp rpslp; hfkjsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl gl jsige tp hgbgpnf hfk vflfqkfl. 4 Tg pjsí fl tg kghpkqinf hfk lsgkqg, ge tgkgerip hpkp vsglqkpl qkiasl, glqpl eprifegl, plí bpl nglqksinpl rfdf bpl jsg jsgnpe, nglng gb Mfknáe tplqp gb Dpk Ukpeng, tprip nfeng lg hfeg gb lfb. 5 Y Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl bpl grtpká ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, y bpl pkkfmpká ng vsglqkp hkglgerip; y vflfqkfl hflggkéil lsl qigkkpl, rfdf Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl tp nirtf. 6 Glcfkzpfl, hsgl, dsrtf ge uspknpk y tprgk qfnf bf jsg glqá glrkiqf ge gb biakf ng bp bgy ng Dfilél, lie phpkqpkfl ng gbbf ei p niglqkp ei p lieiglqkp; 7 hpkp jsg ef fl dgzrbéil rfe glqpl eprifegl jsg tpe jsgnpnf rfe vflfqkfl, ei tpuáil dgerióe ei mskéil hfk gb efdakg ng lsl niflgl, ei bfl likváil, ei fl ierbieéil p gbbfl. 8 Dpl p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl lgusikéil, rfdf tpaéil tgrtf tplqp tfy. 9 Hsgl tp pkkfmpnf Mgtfvá ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl ukpengl y csgkqgl eprifegl, y tplqp tfy epnig tp hfninf kglilqik ngbpeqg ng vsglqkf kflqkf. 10 Se vpkóe ng vflfqkfl hgklgusiká p dib; hfkjsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl gl jsige hgbgp hfk vflfqkfl, rfdf éb fl nimf. 11 Uspknpn, hsgl, rfe nibiugerip vsglqkpl pbdpl, hpkp jsg pdéil p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 12 Hfkjsg li fl phpkqpkgil, y fl seigkgil p bf jsg kglqp ng glqpl eprifegl jsg tpe jsgnpnf rfe vflfqkfl, y li rfergkqpkgil rfe gbbpl dpqkidfeifl, dgzrbáenffl rfe gbbpl, y gbbpl rfe vflfqkfl, 13 lpagn jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl ef pkkfmpká dál p glqpl eprifegl ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, lief jsg fl lgkáe hfk bpzf, hfk qkfhigzf, hfk pzfqg hpkp vsglqkfl rflqpnfl y hfk glhiepl hpkp vsglqkfl fmfl, tplqp jsg hgkgzráil ng glqp asgep qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl tp npnf. 

14 Y tg pjsí jsg yf glqfy hpkp geqkpk tfy hfk gb rpdief ng qfnp bp qigkkp; kgrfefrgn, hsgl, rfe qfnf vsglqkf rfkpzóe y rfe qfnp vsglqkp pbdp, jsg ef tp cpbqpnf sep hpbpakp ng qfnpl bpl asgepl hpbpakpl jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl tpaíp nirtf ng vflfqkfl; qfnpl fl tpe prfeqgrinf, ef tp cpbqpnf eieusep ng gbbpl. 15 Hgkf plí rfdf tp vgeinf lfakg vflfqkfl qfnp hpbpakp asgep jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl tpaíp nirtf, qpdaiée qkpgká Mgtfvá lfakg vflfqkfl qfnp hpbpakp dpbp, tplqp nglqksikfl ng lfakg bp asgep qigkkp jsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl fl tp npnf, 16 li qkplhplpkgil gb hprqf ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl jsg éb fl tp dpenpnf, ygenf y tfekpenf p niflgl pmgefl, g ierbieáenffl p gbbfl. Geqfergl bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg gergengká rfeqkp vflfqkfl, y hgkgrgkéil hkfeqpdgeqg ng glqp asgep qigkkp jsg éb fl tp npnf. 

Nilrsklf ng nglhgninp ng Mflsé

MFLSÉ 24

1 Kgseió Mflsé p qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb ge Lijsgd, y bbpdó p bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb, lsl hkíerihgl, lsl msgrgl y lsl fciripbgl; y lg hkglgeqpkfe ngbpeqg ng Nifl. 2 Y nimf Mflsé p qfnf gb hsgabf: Plí nirg Mgtfvá, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Vsglqkfl hpnkgl tpaiqpkfe peqiuspdgeqg pb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, glqf gl, Qpké, hpnkg ng Pakptpd y ng Eprfk; y lgkvípe p niflgl gxqkpñfl. 3 Y yf qfdé p vsglqkf hpnkg Pakptpd ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, y bf qkpmg hfk qfnp bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, y psdgeqé ls nglrgengerip, y bg ni Ilppr. 4 P Ilppr ni Mprfa y Glpú. Y p Glpú ni gb dfeqg ng Lgik, hpkp jsg bf hflgyglg; hgkf Mprfa y lsl timfl nglrgenigkfe p Guihqf. 5 Y yf gevié p Dfilél y p Ppkóe, y tgkí p Guihqf, rfecfkdg p bf jsg tirg ge dgnif ng éb, y nglhsél fl lpjsé. 6 Lpjsé p vsglqkfl hpnkgl ng Guihqf; y rspenf bbgupkfe pb dpk, bfl guihrifl liusigkfe p vsglqkfl hpnkgl tplqp gb Dpk Kfmf rfe rpkkfl y rpapbbgkíp. 7 Y rspenf gbbfl rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá, éb hslf flrskinpn geqkg vflfqkfl y bfl guihrifl, g tizf vgeik lfakg gbbfl gb dpk, gb rspb bfl rsakió; y vsglqkfl fmfl vigkfe bf jsg tirg ge Guihqf. Nglhsél glqsvilqgil dsrtfl nípl ge gb ngligkqf. 8 Yf fl ieqkfnsmg ge bp qigkkp ng bfl pdfkkgfl, jsg tpaiqpape pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe, bfl rspbgl hgbgpkfe rfeqkp vflfqkfl; dpl yf bfl geqkgusé ge vsglqkpl dpefl, y hflgílqgil ls qigkkp, y bfl nglqksí ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl. 9 Nglhsél lg bgvpeqó Apbpr timf ng Zihfk, kgy ng bfl dfpaiqpl, y hgbgó rfeqkp Ilkpgb; y gevió p bbpdpk p Apbppd timf ng Agfk, hpkp jsg fl dpbnimglg. 10 Dpl yf ef jsilg glrsrtpk p Apbppd, hfk bf rspb fl agenimf kghgqinpdgeqg, y fl biaké ng lsl dpefl. 11 Hplplqgil gb Mfknáe, y vieilqgil p Mgkiró, y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkiró hgbgpkfe rfeqkp vflfqkfl: bfl pdfkkgfl, cgkgzgfl, rpepegfl, tgqgfl, ugkuglgfl, tgvgfl y mgaslgfl, y yf bfl geqkgusé ge vsglqkpl dpefl. 12 Y gevié ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl qáapefl, bfl rspbgl bfl pkkfmpkfe ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, glqf gl, p bfl nfl kgygl ng bfl pdfkkgfl; ef rfe qs glhpnp, ei rfe qs pkrf. 13 Y fl ni bp qigkkp hfk bp rspb epnp qkpapmplqgil, y bpl risnpngl jsg ef gnicirplqgil, ge bpl rspbgl dfkáil; y ng bpl viñpl y fbivpkgl jsg ef hbpeqplqgil, rfdéil. 

14 Ptfkp, hsgl, qgdgn p Mgtfvá, y lgkvinbg rfe ieqgukinpn y ge vgknpn; y jsiqpn ng geqkg vflfqkfl bfl niflgl p bfl rspbgl likvigkfe vsglqkfl hpnkgl pb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, y ge Guihqf; y lgkvin p Mgtfvá. 15 Y li dpb fl hpkgrg lgkvik p Mgtfvá, glrfugfl tfy p jsiée likváil; li p bfl niflgl p jsigegl likvigkfe vsglqkfl hpnkgl, rspenf glqsvigkfe pb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, f p bfl niflgl ng bfl pdfkkgfl ge rsyp qigkkp tpaiqáil; hgkf yf y di rplp lgkvikgdfl p Mgtfvá. 

16 Geqfergl gb hsgabf kglhfenió y nimf: Eserp qpb prfeqgzrp, jsg ngmgdfl p Mgtfvá hpkp lgkvik p fqkfl niflgl; 17 hfkjsg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl gl gb jsg efl lpró p eflfqkfl y p esglqkfl hpnkgl ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ng bp rplp ng lgkvinsdakg; gb jsg tp tgrtf glqpl ukpengl lgñpbgl, y efl tp uspknpnf hfk qfnf gb rpdief hfk nfeng tgdfl penpnf, y ge qfnfl bfl hsgabfl hfk geqkg bfl rspbgl hplpdfl. 18 Y Mgtfvá pkkfmó ng ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, y pb pdfkkgf jsg tpaiqpap ge bp qigkkp; eflfqkfl, hsgl, qpdaiée lgkvikgdfl p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg éb gl esglqkf Nifl. 

19 Geqfergl Mflsé nimf pb hsgabf: Ef hfnkéil lgkvik p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg éb gl Nifl lpeqf, y Nifl rgbflf; ef lsckiká vsglqkpl kgagbifegl y vsglqkfl hgrpnfl. 20 Li ngmpkgil p Mgtfvá y likvigkgil p niflgl pmgefl, éb lg vfbvgká y fl tpká dpb, y fl rfelsdiká, nglhsél jsg fl tp tgrtf aige. 21 Gb hsgabf geqfergl nimf p Mflsé: Ef, lief jsg p Mgtfvá lgkvikgdfl. 22 Y Mflsé kglhfenió pb hsgabf: Vflfqkfl lfil qglqiufl rfeqkp vflfqkfl dildfl, ng jsg tpaéil gbguinf p Mgtfvá hpkp lgkvikbg. Y gbbfl kglhfenigkfe: Qglqiufl lfdfl. 23 Jsiqpn, hsgl, ptfkp bfl niflgl pmgefl jsg glqáe geqkg vflfqkfl, g ierbiepn vsglqkf rfkpzóe p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 24 Y gb hsgabf kglhfenió p Mflsé: P Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl lgkvikgdfl, y p ls vfz fagngrgkgdfl. 25 Geqfergl Mflsé tizf hprqf rfe gb hsgabf gb dildf níp, y bgl nif glqpqsqfl y bgygl ge Lijsgd. 26 Y glrkiaió Mflsé glqpl hpbpakpl ge gb biakf ng bp bgy ng Nifl; y qfdpenf sep ukpe hignkp, bp bgvpeqó pbbí ngapmf ng bp geriep jsg glqpap mseqf pb lpeqspkif ng Mgtfvá. 27 Y nimf Mflsé p qfnf gb hsgabf: Tg pjsí glqp hignkp efl lgkviká ng qglqiuf, hfkjsg gbbp tp fínf qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg Mgtfvá efl tp tpabpnf; lgká, hsgl, qglqiuf rfeqkp vflfqkfl, hpkp jsg ef dieqáil rfeqkp vsglqkf Nifl. 28 Y gevió Mflsé pb hsgabf, rpnp sef p ls hflglióe. 

Dsgkqg ng Mflsé

(Msg. 2.6-10)

29 Nglhsél ng glqpl rflpl dskió Mflsé timf ng Ese, ligkvf ng Mgtfvá, ligenf ng rigeqf nigz pñfl. 30 Y bg lghsbqpkfe ge ls tgkgnpn ge Qidepq-lgkp, jsg glqá ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, pb efkqg ngb dfeqg ng Uppl. 

31 Y likvió Ilkpgb p Mgtfvá qfnf gb qigdhf ng Mflsé, y qfnf gb qigdhf ng bfl peripefl jsg lfakgvivigkfe p Mflsé y jsg lpaípe qfnpl bpl fakpl jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp tgrtf hfk Ilkpgb. 

Lghsbqskp ng bfl tsglfl ng Mflé ge Lijsgd

32 Y geqgkkpkfe ge Lijsgd bfl tsglfl ng Mflé, jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpaípe qkpínf ng Guihqf, ge bp hpkqg ngb rpdhf jsg Mprfa rfdhkó ng bfl timfl ng Tpdfk hpnkg ng Lijsgd, hfk rige higzpl ng niegkf; y csg hflglióe ng bfl timfl ng Mflé. 

Dsgkqg ng Gbgpzpk

33 Qpdaiée dskió Gbgpzpk timf ng Ppkóe, y bf geqgkkpkfe ge gb rfbbpnf ng Cieggl ls timf, jsg bg csg npnf ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


MSGRGL 

Msná y Lidgóe rphqskpe p Pnfei-agzgr

MSGRGL 1

1 Prfeqgrió nglhsél ng bp dsgkqg ng Mflsé, jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfelsbqpkfe p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: ¿Jsiée ng eflfqkfl lsaiká hkidgkf p hgbgpk rfeqkp bfl rpepegfl? 2 Y Mgtfvá kglhfenió: Msná lsaiká; tg pjsí jsg yf tg geqkgupnf bp qigkkp ge lsl dpefl. 3 Y Msná nimf p Lidgóe ls tgkdpef: Lsag rfediuf pb qgkkiqfkif jsg lg dg tp pnmsnirpnf, y hgbggdfl rfeqkp gb rpepegf, y yf qpdaiée iké rfeqiuf pb qsyf. Y Lidgóe csg rfe éb. 4 Y lsaió Msná, y Mgtfvá geqkguó ge lsl dpefl pb rpepegf y pb cgkgzgf; g tikigkfe ng gbbfl ge Agzgr p nigz dib tfdakgl. 5 Y tpbbpkfe p Pnfei-agzgr ge Agzgr, y hgbgpkfe rfeqkp éb; y ngkkfqpkfe pb rpepegf y pb cgkgzgf. 6 Dpl Pnfei-agzgr tsyó; y bg liusigkfe y bg hkgenigkfe, y bg rfkqpkfe bfl hsbupkgl ng bpl dpefl y ng bfl higl. 7 Geqfergl nimf Pnfei-agzgr: Lgqgeqp kgygl, rfkqpnfl bfl hsbupkgl ng lsl dpefl y ng lsl higl, kgrfuípe bpl diupmpl ngapmf ng di dglp; rfdf yf tirg, plí dg tp hpupnf Nifl. Y bg bbgvpkfe p Mgkslpbée, nfeng dskió. 

Msná rfejsilqp Mgkslpbée y Tgakóe

8 Y rfdapqigkfe bfl timfl ng Msná p Mgkslpbée y bp qfdpkfe, y hplpkfe p lsl tpaiqpeqgl p cibf ng glhpnp y hsligkfe csguf p bp risnpn. 9 Nglhsél bfl timfl ng Msná nglrgenigkfe hpkp hgbgpk rfeqkp gb rpepegf jsg tpaiqpap ge bpl dfeqpñpl, ge gb Egusgv, y ge bfl bbpefl. 10 Y dpkrtó Msná rfeqkp gb rpepegf jsg tpaiqpap ge Tgakóe, bp rspb lg bbpdpap peqgl Jsikipq-pkap; g tikigkfe p Lglpi, p Ptidáe y p Qpbdpi. 

Fqfeigb rfejsilqp Ngaik y kgriag p Prlp

(Mfl. 15.15-19)

11 Ng pbbí csg p bfl jsg tpaiqpape ge Ngaik, jsg peqgl lg bbpdpap Jsikipq-lgcgk. 12 Y nimf Rpbga: Gb jsg pqprpkg p Jsikipq-lgcgk y bp qfdpkg, yf bg npké Prlp di timp hfk dsmgk. 13 Y bp qfdó Fqfeigb timf ng Rgepz, tgkdpef dgefk ng Rpbga; y éb bg nif Prlp ls timp hfk dsmgk. 14 Y rspenf gbbp lg iap rfe éb, bp hgklspnió jsg hiniglg p ls hpnkg se rpdhf. Y gbbp lg apmó ngb plef, y Rpbga bg nimf: ¿Jsé qigegl? 15 Gbbp geqfergl bg kglhfenió: Rferéngdg se nfe; hsglqf jsg dg tpl npnf qigkkp ngb Egusgv, npdg qpdaiée csgeqgl ng puspl. Geqfergl Rpbga bg nif bpl csgeqgl ng pkkiap y bpl csgeqgl ng papmf. 

Gxqgelióe ng bpl rfejsilqpl ng Msná y ng Agempdíe

16 Y bfl timfl ngb rgegf, lsgukf ng Dfilél, lsaigkfe ng bp risnpn ng bpl hpbdgkpl rfe bfl timfl ng Msná pb ngligkqf ng Msná, jsg glqá ge gb Egusgv rgkrp ng Pkpn; y csgkfe y tpaiqpkfe rfe gb hsgabf. 17 Y csg Msná rfe ls tgkdpef Lidgóe, y ngkkfqpkfe pb rpepegf jsg tpaiqpap ge Lgcpq, y bp plfbpkfe; y hsligkfe hfk efdakg p bp risnpn, Tfkdp. 18 Qfdó qpdaiée Msná p Upzp rfe ls qgkkiqfkif, Plrpbóe rfe ls qgkkiqfkif y Grkóe rfe ls qgkkiqfkif. 19 Y Mgtfvá glqpap rfe Msná, jsige pkkfmó p bfl ng bpl dfeqpñpl; dpl ef hsnf pkkfmpk p bfl jsg tpaiqpape ge bfl bbpefl, bfl rspbgl qgeípe rpkkfl tgkkpnfl. 20 Y nigkfe Tgakóe p Rpbga, rfdf Dfilél tpaíp nirtf; y éb pkkfmó ng pbbí p bfl qkgl timfl ng Pepr. 21 Dpl pb mgaslgf jsg tpaiqpap ge Mgkslpbée ef bf pkkfmpkfe bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, y gb mgaslgf tpaiqó rfe bfl timfl ng Agempdíe ge Mgkslpbée tplqp tfy. 

Mflé rfejsilqp Agq-gb

22 Qpdaiée bp rplp ng Mflé lsaió rfeqkp Agq-gb; y Mgtfvá glqpap rfe gbbfl. 23 Y bp rplp ng Mflé hslf glhípl ge Agq-gb, risnpn jsg peqgl lg bbpdpap Bsz. 24 Y bfl jsg glhipape vigkfe p se tfdakg jsg lpbíp ng bp risnpn, y bg nimgkfe: Dsélqkpefl ptfkp bp geqkpnp ng bp risnpn, y tpkgdfl rfeqiuf dilgkirfknip. 25 Y éb bgl dflqkó bp geqkpnp p bp risnpn, y bp tikigkfe p cibf ng glhpnp; hgkf ngmpkfe ik p pjsgb tfdakg rfe qfnp ls cpdibip. 26 Y lg csg gb tfdakg p bp qigkkp ng bfl tgqgfl, y gniciró sep risnpn p bp rspb bbpdó Bsz; y glqg gl ls efdakg tplqp tfy. 

Gxqgelióe ng bpl rfejsilqpl ng Dpeplél y ng Gckpíe

27 Qpdhfrf Dpeplél pkkfmó p bfl ng Agq-lgáe, ei p bfl ng lsl pbngpl, ei p bfl ng Qppepr y lsl pbngpl, ei p bfl ng Nfk y lsl pbngpl, ei p bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng Iabgpd y lsl pbngpl, ei p bfl jsg tpaiqpe ge Dgusinf y ge lsl pbngpl; y gb rpepegf hgklilqíp ge tpaiqpk ge pjsgbbp qigkkp. 28 Hgkf rspenf Ilkpgb lg lieqió csgkqg tizf pb rpepegf qkiasqpkif, dpl ef bf pkkfmó. 

29 Qpdhfrf Gckpíe pkkfmó pb rpepegf jsg tpaiqpap ge Ugzgk, lief jsg tpaiqó gb rpepegf ge dgnif ng gbbfl ge Ugzgk. 

Gxqgelióe ng bpl rfejsilqpl ng bpl ngdál qkiasl

30 Qpdhfrf Zpasbóe pkkfmó p bfl jsg tpaiqpape ge Jsiqkóe, ei p bfl jsg tpaiqpape ge Eppbpb, lief jsg gb rpepegf tpaiqó ge dgnif ng éb, y bg csg qkiasqpkif. 

31 Qpdhfrf Plgk pkkfmó p bfl jsg tpaiqpape ge Prf, ei p bfl jsg tpaiqpape ge Linóe, ge Ptbpa, ge Przia, ge Tgbap, ge Pcgr y ge Kgtfa. 32 Y dfkó Plgk geqkg bfl rpepegfl jsg tpaiqpape ge bp qigkkp; hsgl ef bfl pkkfmó. 

33 Qpdhfrf Egcqpbí pkkfmó p bfl jsg tpaiqpape ge Agq-lgdgl, ei p bfl jsg tpaiqpape ge Agq-pepq, lief jsg dfkó geqkg bfl rpepegfl jsg tpaiqpape ge bp qigkkp; dpl bg csgkfe qkiasqpkifl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Agq-lgdgl y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Agq-pepq. 

34 Bfl pdfkkgfl prflpkfe p bfl timfl ng Npe tplqp gb dfeqg, y ef bfl ngmpkfe nglrgengk p bfl bbpefl. 35 Y gb pdfkkgf hgklilqió ge tpaiqpk ge gb dfeqg ng Tgkgl, ge Pmpbóe y ge Lppbaid; hgkf rspenf bp rplp ng Mflé rfakó csgkzpl, bf tizf qkiasqpkif. 36 Y gb bídiqg ngb pdfkkgf csg nglng bp lsainp ng Prkpaid, nglng Lgbp tprip pkkiap. 

Gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá ge Afjsid

MSGRGL 2

1 Gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá lsaió ng Uibupb p Afjsid, y nimf: Yf fl lpjsé ng Guihqf, y fl ieqkfnsmg ge bp qigkkp ng bp rspb tpaíp mskpnf p vsglqkfl hpnkgl, nirigenf: Ef ievpbinpké mpdál di hprqf rfe vflfqkfl, 2 rfe qpb jsg vflfqkfl ef tpuáil hprqf rfe bfl dfkpnfkgl ng glqp qigkkp, rsyfl pbqpkgl tpaéil ng ngkkiapk; dpl vflfqkfl ef tpaéil pqgeninf p di vfz. ¿Hfk jsé tpaéil tgrtf glqf? 3 Hfk qpeqf, yf qpdaiée niuf: Ef bfl grtpké ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, lief jsg lgkáe pzfqgl hpkp vsglqkfl rflqpnfl, y lsl niflgl fl lgkáe qkfhgzpngkf. 4 Rspenf gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá tpabó glqpl hpbpakpl p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, gb hsgabf pbzó ls vfz y bbfkó. 5 Y bbpdpkfe gb efdakg ng pjsgb bsupk Afjsid, y fckgrigkfe pbbí lprkicirifl p Mgtfvá. 

Dsgkqg ng Mflsé

(Mfl. 24.29-31)

6 Hfkjsg yp Mflsé tpaíp nglhgninf pb hsgabf, y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lg tpaípe inf rpnp sef p ls tgkgnpn hpkp hflggkbp. 7 Y gb hsgabf tpaíp lgkvinf p Mgtfvá qfnf gb qigdhf ng Mflsé, y qfnf gb qigdhf ng bfl peripefl jsg lfakgvivigkfe p Mflsé, bfl rspbgl tpaípe vilqf qfnpl bpl ukpengl fakpl ng Mgtfvá, jsg éb tpaíp tgrtf hfk Ilkpgb. 8 Hgkf dskió Mflsé timf ng Ese, ligkvf ng Mgtfvá, ligenf ng rigeqf nigz pñfl. 9 Y bf lghsbqpkfe ge ls tgkgnpn ge Qidepq-lgkp, ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, pb efkqg ngb dfeqg ng Uppl. 10 Y qfnp pjsgbbp ugegkprióe qpdaiée csg kgseinp p lsl hpnkgl. Y lg bgvpeqó nglhsél ng gbbfl fqkp ugegkprióe jsg ef rfefríp p Mgtfvá, ei bp fakp jsg éb tpaíp tgrtf hfk Ilkpgb. 

Phflqplíp ng Ilkpgb, y bp fakp ng bfl msgrgl

11 Nglhsél bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tirigkfe bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, y likvigkfe p bfl appbgl. 12 Ngmpkfe p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, jsg bfl tpaíp lprpnf ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y lg csgkfe qkpl fqkfl niflgl, bfl niflgl ng bfl hsgabfl jsg glqpape ge lsl pbkgngnfkgl, p bfl rspbgl pnfkpkfe; y hkfvfrpkfe p ikp p Mgtfvá. 13 Y ngmpkfe p Mgtfvá, y pnfkpkfe p Appb y p Plqpkfq. 14 Y lg gergenió rfeqkp Ilkpgb gb cskfk ng Mgtfvá, gb rspb bfl geqkguó ge dpefl ng kfapnfkgl jsg bfl nglhfmpkfe, y bfl vgenió ge dpef ng lsl gegdiufl ng pbkgngnfk; y ef hsnigkfe yp tprgk ckgeqg p lsl gegdiufl. 15 Hfk nfengjsigkp jsg lpbípe, bp dpef ng Mgtfvá glqpap rfeqkp gbbfl hpkp dpb, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp nirtf, y rfdf Mgtfvá lg bf tpaíp mskpnf; y qsvigkfe ukpe pcbirrióe. 

16 Y Mgtfvá bgvpeqó msgrgl jsg bfl biakplge ng dpef ng bfl jsg bgl nglhfmpape; 17 hgkf qpdhfrf fygkfe p lsl msgrgl, lief jsg csgkfe qkpl niflgl pmgefl, p bfl rspbgl pnfkpkfe; lg phpkqpkfe hkfeqf ngb rpdief ge jsg pensvigkfe lsl hpnkgl fagngrigenf p bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá; gbbfl ef tirigkfe plí. 18 Y rspenf Mgtfvá bgl bgvpeqpap msgrgl, Mgtfvá glqpap rfe gb msgz, y bfl biakpap ng dpef ng bfl gegdiufl qfnf gb qigdhf ng pjsgb msgz; hfkjsg Mgtfvá gkp dfvinf p dilgkirfknip hfk lsl ugdinfl p rpslp ng bfl jsg bfl fhkidípe y pcbiuípe. 19 Dpl prfeqgríp jsg pb dfkik gb msgz, gbbfl vfbvípe pqkál, y lg rfkkfdhípe dál jsg lsl hpnkgl, liusigenf p niflgl pmgefl hpkp lgkvikbgl, g ierbieáenflg ngbpeqg ng gbbfl; y ef lg phpkqpape ng lsl fakpl, ei ng ls falqiepnf rpdief. 20 Y bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió rfeqkp Ilkpgb, y nimf: Hfk rspeqf glqg hsgabf qkplhplp di hprqf jsg fkngeé p lsl hpnkgl, y ef fagngrg p di vfz, 21 qpdhfrf yf vfbvgké dál p pkkfmpk ng ngbpeqg ng gbbfl p eieusep ng bpl eprifegl jsg ngmó Mflsé rspenf dskió; 22 hpkp hkfapk rfe gbbpl p Ilkpgb, li hkfrskpkípe f ef lgusik gb rpdief ng Mgtfvá, penpenf ge éb, rfdf bf liusigkfe lsl hpnkgl. 23 Hfk glqf ngmó Mgtfvá p pjsgbbpl eprifegl, lie pkkfmpkbpl ng sep vgz, y ef bpl geqkguó ge dpef ng Mflsé. 

Eprifegl jsg csgkfe ngmpnpl hpkp hkfapk p Ilkpgb

MSGRGL 3

1 Glqpl, hsgl, lfe bpl eprifegl jsg ngmó Mgtfvá hpkp hkfapk rfe gbbpl p Ilkpgb, p qfnfl pjsgbbfl jsg ef tpaípe rfefrinf qfnpl bp usgkkpl ng Rpepáe; 2 lfbpdgeqg hpkp jsg gb biepmg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfefriglg bp usgkkp, hpkp jsg bp gelgñplge p bfl jsg peqgl ef bp tpaípe rfefrinf: 3 bfl rierf hkíerihgl ng bfl cibilqgfl, qfnfl bfl rpepegfl, bfl linfeifl, y bfl tgvgfl jsg tpaiqpape ge gb dfeqg Bíapef, nglng gb dfeqg ng Appb-tgkdóe tplqp bbgupk p Tpdpq. 4 Y csgkfe hpkp hkfapk rfe gbbfl p Ilkpgb, hpkp lpagk li fagngrgkípe p bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá, jsg éb tpaíp npnf p lsl hpnkgl hfk dpef ng Dfilél. 5 Plí bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpaiqpape geqkg bfl rpepegfl, tgqgfl, pdfkkgfl, cgkgzgfl, tgvgfl y mgaslgfl. 6 Y qfdpkfe ng lsl timpl hfk dsmgkgl, y nigkfe lsl timpl p bfl timfl ng gbbfl, y likvigkfe p lsl niflgl. 

Fqfeigb biagkqp p Ilkpgb ng Rslpe-kilpqpid

7 Tirigkfe, hsgl, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, y fbvinpkfe p Mgtfvá ls Nifl, y likvigkfe p bfl appbgl y p bpl idáugegl ng Plgkp. 8 Y bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió rfeqkp Ilkpgb, y bfl vgenió ge dpefl ng Rslpe-kilpqpid kgy ng Dglfhfqpdip; y likvigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p Rslpe-kilpqpid frtf pñfl. 9 Geqfergl rbpdpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p Mgtfvá; y Mgtfvá bgvpeqó se biagkqpnfk p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y bfl biakó; glqf gl, p Fqfeigb timf ng Rgepz, tgkdpef dgefk ng Rpbga. 10 Y gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá vief lfakg éb, y mszuó p Ilkpgb, y lpbió p apqpbbp, y Mgtfvá geqkguó ge ls dpef p Rslpe-kilpqpid kgy ng Likip, y hkgvpbgrió ls dpef rfeqkp Rslpe-kilpqpid. 11 Y kghfló bp qigkkp rspkgeqp pñfl; y dskió Fqfeigb timf ng Rgepz. 

Pfn biagkqp p Ilkpgb ng Dfpa

12 Vfbvigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p tprgk bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá; y Mgtfvá cfkqpbgrió p Gubóe kgy ng Dfpa rfeqkp Ilkpgb, hfk rspeqf tpaípe tgrtf bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá. 13 Glqg mseqó rfeliuf p bfl timfl ng Pdóe y ng Pdpbgr, y vief g tikió p Ilkpgb, y qfdó bp risnpn ng bpl hpbdgkpl. 14 Y likvigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p Gubóe kgy ng bfl dfpaiqpl nigrifrtf pñfl. 

15 Y rbpdpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p Mgtfvá; y Mgtfvá bgl bgvpeqó se biagkqpnfk, p Pfn timf ng Ugkp, agempdiqp, gb rspb gkp zsknf. Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb gevipkfe rfe éb se hkglgeqg p Gubóe kgy ng Dfpa. 16 Y Pfn lg tpaíp tgrtf se hsñpb ng nfl cibfl, ng se rfnf ng bpkuf; y lg bf riñó ngapmf ng lsl vglqinfl p ls bpnf ngkgrtf. 17 Y geqkguó gb hkglgeqg p Gubóe kgy ng Dfpa; y gkp Gubóe tfdakg dsy uksglf. 18 Y bsguf jsg tsaf geqkgupnf gb hkglgeqg, nglhinió p bp ugeqg jsg bf tpaíp qkpínf. 19 Dpl éb lg vfbvió nglng bfl ínfbfl jsg glqáe ge Uibupb, y nimf: Kgy, sep hpbpakp lgrkgqp qgeuf jsg ngrikqg.
