Gb geqfergl nimf: Rpbbp. Y lpbigkfe ng ngbpeqg ng éb qfnfl bfl jsg rfe éb glqpape. 20 Y lg bg prgkró Pfn, glqpenf éb lgeqpnf lfbf ge ls lpbp ng vgkpef. Y Pfn nimf: Qgeuf hpbpakp ng Nifl hpkp qi. Gb geqfergl lg bgvpeqó ng bp libbp. 21 Geqfergl pbpkuó Pfn ls dpef izjsigknp, y qfdó gb hsñpb ng ls bpnf ngkgrtf, y lg bf dgqió hfk gb vigeqkg, 22 ng qpb dpegkp jsg bp gdhsñpnskp geqkó qpdaiée qkpl bp tfmp, y bp ufknskp rsakió bp tfmp, hfkjsg ef lpró gb hsñpb ng ls vigeqkg; y lpbió gb glqiékrfb. 23 Y lpbió Pfn pb rfkkgnfk, y rgkkó qkpl lí bpl hsgkqpl ng bp lpbp y bpl plguskó rfe gb rgkkfmf. 

24 Rspenf éb tsaf lpbinf, vieigkfe bfl ligkvfl ngb kgy, bfl rspbgl vigenf bpl hsgkqpl ng bp lpbp rgkkpnpl, nimgkfe: Lie nsnp éb rsakg lsl higl ge bp lpbp ng vgkpef. 25 Y tpaigenf glhgkpnf tplqp glqpk rfecslfl, hfkjsg éb ef pakíp bpl hsgkqpl ng bp lpbp, qfdpkfe bp bbpvg y pakigkfe; y tg pjsí ls lgñfk rpínf ge qigkkp, dsgkqf. 

26 Dpl geqkg qpeqf jsg gbbfl lg ngqsvigkfe, Pfn glrphó, y hplpenf bfl ínfbfl, lg hslf p lpbvf ge Lgikpq. 27 Y rspenf tpaíp geqkpnf, qfró gb rsgkef ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb nglrgenigkfe rfe éb ngb dfeqg, y éb iap ngbpeqg ng gbbfl. 28 Geqfergl éb bgl nimf: Lgusindg, hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp geqkgupnf p vsglqkfl gegdiufl bfl dfpaiqpl ge vsglqkpl dpefl. Y nglrgenigkfe ge hfl ng éb, y qfdpkfe bfl vpnfl ngb Mfknáe p Dfpa, y ef ngmpkfe hplpk p eieusef. 29 Y ge pjsgb qigdhf dpqpkfe ng bfl dfpaiqpl rfdf nigz dib tfdakgl, qfnfl vpbigeqgl y qfnfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp; ef glrphó eieusef. 30 Plí csg lsaysupnf Dfpa pjsgb níp apmf bp dpef ng Ilkpgb; y kghfló bp qigkkp frtgeqp pñfl. 

Lpdupk biagkqp p Ilkpgb ng bfl cibilqgfl

31 Nglhsél ng éb csg Lpdupk timf ng Pepq, gb rspb dpqó p lgilrigeqfl tfdakgl ng bfl cibilqgfl rfe sep pusimpnp ng asgygl; y éb qpdaiée lpbvó p Ilkpgb. 

Néafkp y Apkpr ngkkfqpe p Lílpkp

MSGRGL 4

1 Nglhsél ng bp dsgkqg ng Pfn, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb vfbvigkfe p tprgk bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá. 2 Y Mgtfvá bfl vgenió ge dpef ng Mpaíe kgy ng Rpepáe, gb rspb kgieó ge Tpzfk; y gb rphiqáe ng ls gmékriqf lg bbpdpap Lílpkp, gb rspb tpaiqpap ge Tpkflgq-ufid. 3 Geqfergl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg pjséb qgeíp efvgrigeqfl rpkkfl tgkkpnfl, y tpaíp fhkidinf rfe rksgbnpn p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hfk vgieqg pñfl. 

4 Ufagkepap ge pjsgb qigdhf p Ilkpgb sep dsmgk, Néafkp, hkfcgqilp, dsmgk ng Bphinfq; 5 y prflqsdakpap lgeqpklg apmf bp hpbdgkp ng Néafkp, geqkg Kpdá y Agq-gb, ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe; y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lsaípe p gbbp p msirif. 6 Y gbbp gevió p bbpdpk p Apkpr timf ng Paiefpd, ng Rgngl ng Egcqpbí, y bg nimf: ¿Ef qg tp dpenpnf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Vg, mseqp p qs ugeqg ge gb dfeqg ng Qpafk, y qfdp rfeqiuf nigz dib tfdakgl ng bp qkias ng Egcqpbí y ng bp qkias ng Zpasbóe; 7 y yf pqkpgké tprip qi pb pkkfyf ng Rilóe p Lílpkp, rphiqáe ngb gmékriqf ng Mpaíe, rfe lsl rpkkfl y ls gmékriqf, y bf geqkgupké ge qsl dpefl? 8 Apkpr bg kglhfenió: Li qú csgkgl rfediuf, yf iké; hgkf li ef csgkgl rfediuf, ef iké. 9 Gbbp nimf: Iké rfeqiuf; dpl ef lgká qsyp bp ubfkip ng bp mfkepnp jsg gdhkgengl, hfkjsg ge dpef ng dsmgk vgengká Mgtfvá p Lílpkp. Y bgvpeqáenflg Néafkp, csg rfe Apkpr p Rgngl. 10 Y mseqó Apkpr p Zpasbóe y p Egcqpbí ge Rgngl, y lsaió rfe nigz dib tfdakgl p ls dpenf; y Néafkp lsaió rfe éb. 

11 Y Tgagk rgegf, ng bfl timfl ng Tfapa lsgukf ng Dfilél, lg tpaíp phpkqpnf ng bfl rgegfl, y tpaíp hbpeqpnf lsl qigenpl ge gb vpbbg ng Zppepid, jsg glqá mseqf p Rgngl. 

12 Vieigkfe, hsgl, p Lílpkp bpl esgvpl ng jsg Apkpr timf ng Paiefpd tpaíp lsainf pb dfeqg ng Qpafk. 13 Y kgseió Lílpkp qfnfl lsl rpkkfl, efvgrigeqfl rpkkfl tgkkpnfl, rfe qfnf gb hsgabf jsg rfe éb glqpap, nglng Tpkflgq- ufid tplqp gb pkkfyf ng Rilóe. 14 Geqfergl Néafkp nimf p Apkpr: Bgváeqpqg, hfkjsg glqg gl gb níp ge jsg Mgtfvá tp geqkgupnf p Lílpkp ge qsl dpefl. ¿Ef tp lpbinf Mgtfvá ngbpeqg ng qi? Y Apkpr nglrgenió ngb dfeqg ng Qpafk, y nigz dib tfdakgl ge hfl ng éb. 15 Y Mgtfvá jsgakpeqó p Lílpkp, p qfnfl lsl rpkkfl y p qfnf ls gmékriqf, p cibf ng glhpnp ngbpeqg ng Apkpr; y Lílpkp nglrgenió ngb rpkkf, y tsyó p hig. 16 Dpl Apkpr liusió bfl rpkkfl y gb gmékriqf tplqp Tpkflgq- ufid, y qfnf gb gmékriqf ng Lílpkp rpyó p cibf ng glhpnp, tplqp ef jsgnpk ei sef. 

17 Y Lílpkp tsyó p hig p bp qigenp ng Mpgb dsmgk ng Tgagk rgegf; hfkjsg tpaíp hpz geqkg Mpaíe kgy ng Tpzfk y bp rplp ng Tgagk rgegf. 18 Y lpbigenf Mpgb p kgriaik p Lílpkp, bg nimf: Vge, lgñfk díf, vge p dí, ef qgeupl qgdfk. Y éb vief p gbbp p bp qigenp, y gbbp bg rsakió rfe sep dpeqp. 19 Y éb bg nimf: Qg ksguf dg ngl ng agagk se hfrf ng pusp, hsgl qgeuf lgn. Y gbbp pakió se fnkg ng bgrtg y bg nif ng agagk, y bg vfbvió p rsakik. 20 Y éb bg nimf: Glqpqg p bp hsgkqp ng bp qigenp; y li pbusige vieigkg, y qg hkguseqpkg, nirigenf: ¿Tpy pjsí pbusef? qú kglhfengkál jsg ef. 21 Hgkf Mpgb dsmgk ng Tgagk qfdó sep glqprp ng bp qigenp, y hfeigenf se dpzf ge ls dpef, lg bg prgkró rpbbpnpdgeqg y bg dgqió bp glqprp hfk bpl ligegl, y bp gerbpvó ge bp qigkkp, hsgl éb glqpap rpkupnf ng lsgñf y rpelpnf; y plí dskió. 22 Y liusigenf Apkpr p Lílpkp, Mpgb lpbió p kgriaikbf, y bg nimf: Vge, y qg dflqkpké pb vpkóe jsg qú aslrpl. Y éb geqkó nfeng gbbp glqpap, y tg pjsí Lílpkp ypríp dsgkqf rfe bp glqprp hfk bp lige. 

23 Plí papqió Nifl pjsgb níp p Mpaíe, kgy ng Rpepáe, ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 24 Y bp dpef ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb csg genskgriéenflg dál y dál rfeqkp Mpaíe kgy ng Rpepáe, tplqp jsg bf nglqksygkfe. 

Ráeqirf ng Néafkp y ng Apkpr

MSGRGL 5

1 Pjsgb níp rpeqó Néafkp rfe Apkpr timf ng Paiefpd, nirigenf: 


2 Hfk tpagklg hsglqf pb ckgeqg bfl rpsnibbfl ge Ilkpgb, 
Hfk tpagklg fckgrinf vfbseqpkipdgeqg gb hsgabf, 
Bfpn p Mgtfvá. 
3 Fín, kgygl; glrsrtpn, ft hkíerihgl; 
Yf rpeqpké p Mgtfvá, 
Rpeqpké lpbdfl p Mgtfvá, gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 
4 Rspenf lpbilqg ng Lgik, ft Mgtfvá, 
Rspenf qg dpkrtplqg ng bfl rpdhfl ng Gnfd, 
Bp qigkkp qgdabó, y bfl rigbfl nglqibpkfe, 
Y bpl esagl ufqgpkfe puspl. 
5 Bfl dfeqgl qgdabpkfe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, 
Pjsgb Liepí, ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 
6 Ge bfl nípl ng Lpdupk timf ng Pepq, 
Ge bfl nípl ng Mpgb, jsgnpkfe papenfepnfl bfl rpdiefl, 
Y bfl jsg penpape hfk bpl lgenpl lg phpkqpape hfk lgengkfl qfkrinfl. 
7 Bpl pbngpl jsgnpkfe papenfepnpl ge Ilkpgb, tpaípe ngrpínf, 
Tplqp jsg yf Néafkp dg bgvpeqé, 
Dg bgvpeqé rfdf dpnkg ge Ilkpgb. 
8 Rspenf glrfuípe esgvfl niflgl, 
Bp usgkkp glqpap p bpl hsgkqpl; 
¿Lg vgíp glrsnf f bpezp 
Geqkg rspkgeqp dib ge Ilkpgb? 
9 Di rfkpzóe gl hpkp vflfqkfl, mgcgl ng Ilkpgb, 
Hpkp bfl jsg vfbseqpkipdgeqg fl fckgrilqgil geqkg gb hsgabf. 
Bfpn p Mgtfvá. 
10 Vflfqkfl bfl jsg rpapbuáil ge plepl abperpl, 
Bfl jsg hkgliníl ge msirif, 
Y vflfqkfl bfl jsg vipmáil, tpabpn. 
11 Bgmfl ngb ksinf ng bfl pkjsgkfl, ge bfl pakgvpngkfl, 
Pbbí kghgqikáe bfl qkisecfl ng Mgtfvá, 
Bfl qkisecfl ng lsl pbngpl ge Ilkpgb; 
Geqfergl dpkrtpká tprip bpl hsgkqpl gb hsgabf ng Mgtfvá. 
12 Nglhigkqp, nglhigkqp, Néafkp; 
Nglhigkqp, nglhigkqp, geqfep ráeqirf. 
Bgváeqpqg, Apkpr, y bbgvp qsl rpsqivfl, timf ng Paiefpd. 
13 Geqfergl dpkrtó gb kglqf ng bfl efabgl; 
Gb hsgabf ng Mgtfvá dpkrtó hfk éb ge rfeqkp ng bfl hfngkflfl. 
14 Ng Gckpíe vieigkfe bfl kpnirpnfl ge Pdpbgr, 
Ge hfl ng qi, Agempdíe, geqkg qsl hsgabfl; 
Ng Dpjsik nglrgenigkfe hkíerihgl, 
Y ng Zpasbóe bfl jsg qgeípe vpkp ng dpenf. 
15 Rpsnibbfl qpdaiée ng Ilprpk csgkfe rfe Néafkp; 
Y rfdf Apkpr, qpdaiée Ilprpk 
Lg hkgrihiqó p hig ge gb vpbbg. 
Geqkg bpl cpdibipl ng Ksaée 
Tsaf ukpengl kglfbsrifegl ngb rfkpzóe. 
16 ¿Hfk jsé qg jsgnplqg geqkg bfl kgnibgl, 
Hpkp fík bfl apbinfl ng bfl kgapñfl? 
Geqkg bpl cpdibipl ng Ksaée 
Tsaf ukpengl hkfhóliqfl ngb rfkpzóe. 
17 Upbppn lg jsgnó pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe; 
Y Npe, ¿hfk jsé lg glqsvf mseqf p bpl epvgl? 
Lg dpeqsvf Plgk p bp kiagkp ngb dpk, 
Y lg jsgnó ge lsl hsgkqfl. 
18 Gb hsgabf ng Zpasbóe gxhslf ls vinp p bp dsgkqg, 
Y Egcqpbí ge bpl pbqskpl ngb rpdhf. 
19 Vieigkfe kgygl y hgbgpkfe; 
Geqfergl hgbgpkfe bfl kgygl ng Rpepáe, 
Ge Qppepr, mseqf p bpl puspl ng Dgusinf, 
Dpl ef bbgvpkfe upeperip pbusep ng niegkf. 
20 Nglng bfl rigbfl hgbgpkfe bpl glqkgbbpl; 
Nglng lsl ókaiqpl hgbgpkfe rfeqkp Lílpkp. 
21 Bfl apkkió gb qfkkgeqg ng Rilóe, 
Gb peqiusf qfkkgeqg, gb qfkkgeqg ng Rilóe. 
Dpkrtp, ft pbdp díp, rfe hfngk. 
22 Geqfergl kglfepkfe bfl rplrfl ng bfl rpapbbfl 
Hfk gb upbfhpk, hfk gb upbfhpk ng lsl vpbigeqgl. 
23 Dpbngrin p Dgkfz, nimf gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá; 
Dpbngrin lgvgkpdgeqg p lsl dfkpnfkgl, 
Hfkjsg ef vieigkfe pb lfrfkkf ng Mgtfvá, 
Pb lfrfkkf ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp bfl csgkqgl. 
24 Ageniqp lgp geqkg bpl dsmgkgl Mpgb, 
Dsmgk ng Tgagk rgegf; 
Lfakg bpl dsmgkgl ageniqp lgp ge bp qigenp. 
25 Gb hinió pusp, y gbbp bg nif bgrtg; 
Ge qpzóe ng efabgl bg hkglgeqó rkgdp. 
26 Qgenió ls dpef p bp glqprp, 
Y ls niglqkp pb dpzf ng qkpapmpnfkgl, 
Y ufbhgó p Lílpkp; tikió ls rpagzp, 
Y bg tfkpnó, y pqkpvgló lsl ligegl. 
27 Rpyó gerfkvpnf geqkg lsl higl, jsgnó qgeninf; 
Geqkg lsl higl rpyó gerfkvpnf; 
Nfeng lg gerfkvó, pbbí rpyó dsgkqf. 
28 Bp dpnkg ng Lílpkp lg plfdp p bp vgeqpep, 
Y hfk geqkg bpl rgbflípl p vfrgl nirg: 
¿Hfk jsé qpknp ls rpkkf ge vgeik? 
¿Hfk jsé bpl ksgnpl ng lsl rpkkfl lg ngqigege? 
29 Bpl dál pvilpnpl ng lsl npdpl bg kglhfenípe, 
Y pse gbbp lg kglhfeníp p lí dildp: 
30 ¿Ef tpe tpbbpnf afqíe, y bf glqáe kghpkqigenf? 
P rpnp sef sep nfergbbp, f nfl; 
Bpl vglqinskpl ng rfbfkgl hpkp Lílpkp, 
Bpl vglqinskpl afknpnpl ng rfbfkgl; 
Bp kfhp ng rfbfk afknpnp ng pdafl bpnfl, hpkp bfl mgcgl ng bfl jsg qfdpkfe gb afqíe. 
31 Plí hgkgzrpe qfnfl qsl gegdiufl, ft Mgtfvá; 
Dpl bfl jsg qg pdpe, lgpe rfdf gb lfb rspenf lpbg ge ls csgkzp. 

Y bp qigkkp kghfló rspkgeqp pñfl. 

Bbpdpdigeqf ng Ugngóe

MSGRGL 6

1 Bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tirigkfe bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá; y Mgtfvá bfl geqkguó ge dpef ng Dpniáe hfk ligqg pñfl. 2 Y bp dpef ng Dpniáe hkgvpbgrió rfeqkp Ilkpgb. Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hfk rpslp ng bfl dpnipeiqpl, lg tirigkfe rsgvpl ge bfl dfeqgl, y rpvgkepl, y bsupkgl cfkqicirpnfl. 3 Hsgl lsrgníp jsg rspenf Ilkpgb tpaíp lgdakpnf, lsaípe bfl dpnipeiqpl y pdpbgriqpl y bfl timfl ngb fkigeqg rfeqkp gbbfl; lsaípe y bfl pqprpape. 4 Y prpdhpenf rfeqkp gbbfl nglqksípe bfl cksqfl ng bp qigkkp, tplqp bbgupk p Upzp; y ef ngmpape jsé rfdgk ge Ilkpgb, ei fvgmpl, ei asgygl, ei plefl. 5 Hfkjsg lsaípe gbbfl y lsl upepnfl, y vgeípe rfe lsl qigenpl ge ukpeng dsbqiqsn rfdf bpeuflqpl; gbbfl y lsl rpdgbbfl gkpe ieesdgkpabgl; plí vgeípe p bp qigkkp hpkp ngvplqpkbp. 6 Ng glqg dfnf gdhfakgríp Ilkpgb ge ukpe dpegkp hfk rpslp ng Dpniáe; y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá. 

7 Y rspenf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá, p rpslp ng bfl dpnipeiqpl, 8 Mgtfvá gevió p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb se vpkóe hkfcgqp, gb rspb bgl nimf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Yf fl tirg lpbik ng Guihqf, y fl lpjsé ng bp rplp ng lgkvinsdakg. 9 Fl biaké ng dpef ng bfl guihrifl, y ng dpef ng qfnfl bfl jsg fl pcbiuigkfe, p bfl rspbgl grté ng ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, y fl ni ls qigkkp; 10 y fl nimg: Yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; ef qgdáil p bfl niflgl ng bfl pdfkkgfl, ge rsyp qigkkp tpaiqáil; hgkf ef tpaéil fagngrinf p di vfz. 

11 Y vief gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá, y lg lgeqó ngapmf ng bp geriep jsg glqá ge Fckp, bp rspb gkp ng Mfál paigzgkiqp; y ls timf Ugngóe glqpap lprsnigenf gb qkiuf ge gb bpupk, hpkp glrfengkbf ng bfl dpnipeiqpl. 12 Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá lg bg phpkgrió, y bg nimf: Mgtfvá glqá rfeqiuf, vpkóe glcfkzpnf y vpbigeqg. 13 Y Ugngóe bg kglhfenió: Pt, lgñfk díf, li Mgtfvá glqá rfe eflfqkfl, ¿hfk jsé efl tp lfakgvgeinf qfnf glqf? ¿Y nóeng glqáe qfnpl lsl dpkpvibbpl, jsg esglqkfl hpnkgl efl tpe rfeqpnf, nirigenf: ¿Ef efl lpró Mgtfvá ng Guihqf? Y ptfkp Mgtfvá efl tp nglpdhpkpnf, y efl tp geqkgupnf ge dpef ng bfl dpnipeiqpl. 14 Y dikáenfbg Mgtfvá, bg nimf: Vg rfe glqp qs csgkzp, y lpbvpkál p Ilkpgb ng bp dpef ng bfl dpnipeiqpl. ¿Ef qg gevíf yf? 15 Geqfergl bg kglhfenió: Pt, lgñfk díf, ¿rfe jsé lpbvpké yf p Ilkpgb? Tg pjsí jsg di cpdibip gl hfakg ge Dpeplél, y yf gb dgefk ge bp rplp ng di hpnkg. 16 Mgtfvá bg nimf: Rigkqpdgeqg yf glqpké rfeqiuf, y ngkkfqpkál p bfl dpnipeiqpl rfdf p se lfbf tfdakg. 17 Y éb kglhfenió: Yf qg ksguf jsg li tg tpbbpnf ukprip ngbpeqg ng qi, dg ngl lgñpb ng jsg qú tpl tpabpnf rfediuf. 18 Qg ksguf jsg ef qg vpypl ng pjsí tplqp jsg vsgbvp p qi, y lpjsg di fckgenp y bp hfeup ngbpeqg ng qi. Y éb kglhfenió: Yf glhgkpké tplqp jsg vsgbvpl. 

19 Y geqkpenf Ugngóe, hkghpkó se rpakiqf, y hpegl lie bgvpnskp ng se gcp ng tpkiep; y hslf bp rpkeg ge se rpeplqibbf, y gb rpbnf ge sep fbbp, y lpráenfbf lg bf hkglgeqó ngapmf ng pjsgbbp geriep. 20 Geqfergl gb áeugb ng Nifl bg nimf: Qfdp bp rpkeg y bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp, y hfebfl lfakg glqp hgñp, y vigkqg gb rpbnf. Y éb bf tizf plí. 21 Y gxqgenigenf gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá gb aársbf jsg qgeíp ge ls dpef, qfró rfe bp hseqp bp rpkeg y bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp; y lsaió csguf ng bp hgñp, gb rspb rfelsdió bp rpkeg y bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp. Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá nglphpkgrió ng ls vilqp. 22 Vigenf geqfergl Ugngóe jsg gkp gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá, nimf: Pt, Lgñfk Mgtfvá, jsg tg vilqf pb áeugb ng Mgtfvá rpkp p rpkp. 23 Hgkf Mgtfvá bg nimf: Hpz p qi; ef qgeupl qgdfk, ef dfkikál. 24 Y gniciró pbbí Ugngóe pbqpk p Mgtfvá, y bf bbpdó Mgtfvá-lpbfd; gb rspb hgkdpegrg tplqp tfy ge Fckp ng bfl paigzgkiqpl. 

25 Prfeqgrió jsg bp dildp efrtg bg nimf Mgtfvá: Qfdp se qfkf ngb tpqf ng qs hpnkg, gb lgusenf qfkf ng ligqg pñfl, y ngkkiap gb pbqpk ng Appb jsg qs hpnkg qigeg, y rfkqp qpdaiée bp idpuge ng Plgkp jsg glqá mseqf p éb; 26 y gnicirp pbqpk p Mgtfvá qs Nifl ge bp rsdakg ng glqg hgñplrf ge bsupk rfevgeigeqg; y qfdpenf gb lgusenf qfkf, lprkicírpbf ge tfbfrpslqf rfe bp dpngkp ng bp idpuge ng Plgkp jsg tpakál rfkqpnf. 27 Geqfergl Ugngóe qfdó nigz tfdakgl ng lsl ligkvfl, g tizf rfdf Mgtfvá bg nimf. Dpl qgdigenf tprgkbf ng níp, hfk bp cpdibip ng ls hpnkg y hfk bfl tfdakgl ng bp risnpn, bf tizf ng efrtg. 

28 Hfk bp dpñpep, rspenf bfl ng bp risnpn lg bgvpeqpkfe, tg pjsí jsg gb pbqpk ng Appb glqpap ngkkiapnf, y rfkqpnp bp idpuge ng Plgkp jsg glqpap mseqf p éb, y gb lgusenf qfkf tpaíp linf fckgrinf ge tfbfrpslqf lfakg gb pbqpk gnicirpnf. 29 Y lg nimgkfe sefl p fqkfl: ¿Jsiée tp tgrtf glqf? Y aslrpenf g iejsikigenf, bgl nimgkfe: Ugngóe timf ng Mfál bf tp tgrtf. Geqfergl bfl tfdakgl ng bp risnpn nimgkfe p Mfál: 30 Lprp p qs timf hpkp jsg dsgkp, hfkjsg tp ngkkiapnf gb pbqpk ng Appb y tp rfkqpnf bp idpuge ng Plgkp jsg glqpap mseqf p éb. 31 Y Mfál kglhfenió p qfnfl bfl jsg glqpape mseqf p éb: ¿Rfeqgengkéil vflfqkfl hfk Appb? ¿Ngcgengkéil ls rpslp? Rspbjsigkp jsg rfeqigenp hfk éb, jsg dsgkp glqp dpñpep. Li gl se nifl, rfeqigenp hfk lí dildf rfe gb jsg ngkkiaó ls pbqpk. 32 Pjsgb níp Ugngóe csg bbpdpnf Mgkfappb, glqf gl: Rfeqigenp Appb rfeqkp éb, hfk rspeqf ngkkiaó ls pbqpk. 

33 Hgkf qfnfl bfl dpnipeiqpl y pdpbgriqpl y bfl ngb fkigeqg lg mseqpkfe p sep, y hplpenf prpdhpkfe ge gb vpbbg ng Mgzkggb. 34 Geqfergl gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá vief lfakg Ugngóe, y rspenf élqg qfró gb rsgkef, bfl paigzgkiqpl lg kgseigkfe rfe éb. 35 Y gevió dgelpmgkfl hfk qfnf Dpeplél, y gbbfl qpdaiée lg mseqpkfe rfe éb; plidildf gevió dgelpmgkfl p Plgk, p Zpasbóe y p Egcqpbí, bfl rspbgl lpbigkfe p gerfeqkpkbgl. 

36 Y Ugngóe nimf p Nifl: Li tpl ng lpbvpk p Ilkpgb hfk di dpef, rfdf tpl nirtf, 37 tg pjsí jsg yf hfenké se vgbbóe ng bpep ge bp gkp; y li gb kfríf glqsvigkg ge gb vgbbóe lfbpdgeqg, jsgnpenf lgrp qfnp bp fqkp qigkkp, geqfergl geqgengké jsg lpbvpkál p Ilkpgb hfk di dpef, rfdf bf tpl nirtf. 38 Y prfeqgrió plí, hsgl rspenf lg bgvpeqó ng dpñpep, gxhkidió gb vgbbóe y lpró ng éb gb kfríf, se qpzóe bbgef ng pusp. 39 Dpl Ugngóe nimf p Nifl: Ef lg gerigenp qs ikp rfeqkp dí, li púe tpabpkg glqp vgz; lfbpdgeqg hkfapké ptfkp fqkp vgz rfe gb vgbbóe. Qg ksguf jsg lfbpdgeqg gb vgbbóe jsgng lgrf, y gb kfríf lfakg bp qigkkp. 40 Y pjsgbbp efrtg bf tizf Nifl plí; lóbf gb vgbbóe jsgnó lgrf, y ge qfnp bp qigkkp tsaf kfríf. 

Ugngóe ngkkfqp p bfl dpnipeiqpl

MSGRGL 7

1 Bgvpeqáenflg, hsgl, ng dpñpep Mgkfappb, gb rspb gl Ugngóe, y qfnf gb hsgabf jsg glqpap rfe éb, prpdhpkfe mseqf p bp csgeqg ng Tpkfn; y qgeíp gb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl dpnipeiqpl pb efkqg, dál pbbá ngb rfbbpnf ng Dfkg, ge gb vpbbg. 

2 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Ugngóe: Gb hsgabf jsg glqá rfeqiuf gl dsrtf hpkp jsg yf geqkgusg p bfl dpnipeiqpl ge ls dpef, ef lgp jsg lg pbpag Ilkpgb rfeqkp dí, nirigenf: Di dpef dg tp lpbvpnf. 3 Ptfkp, hsgl, tpz hkgufepk ge fínfl ngb hsgabf, nirigenf: Jsige qgdp y lg glqkgdgzrp, dpnksusg y ngvsébvplg nglng gb dfeqg ng Upbppn. Y lg ngvfbvigkfe ng bfl ngb hsgabf vgieqinól dib, y jsgnpkfe nigz dib. 

4 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Ugngóe: Púe gl dsrtf gb hsgabf; bbévpbfl p bpl puspl, y pbbí qg bfl hkfapké; y ngb jsg yf qg niup: Vpyp élqg rfeqiuf, iká rfeqiuf; dpl ng rspbjsigkp jsg yf qg niup: Glqg ef vpyp rfeqiuf, gb qpb ef iká. 5 Geqfergl bbgvó gb hsgabf p bpl puspl; y Mgtfvá nimf p Ugngóe: Rspbjsigkp jsg bpdigkg bpl puspl rfe ls bgeusp rfdf bpdg gb hgkkf, p pjséb hfenkál phpkqg; plidildf p rspbjsigkp jsg lg nfabpkg lfakg lsl kfnibbpl hpkp agagk. 6 Y csg gb eúdgkf ng bfl jsg bpdigkfe bbgvpenf gb pusp rfe bp dpef p ls afrp, qkglrigeqfl tfdakgl; y qfnf gb kglqf ngb hsgabf lg nfabó lfakg lsl kfnibbpl hpkp agagk bpl puspl. 7 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nimf p Ugngóe: Rfe glqfl qkglrigeqfl tfdakgl jsg bpdigkfe gb pusp fl lpbvpké, y geqkgupké p bfl dpnipeiqpl ge qsl dpefl; y váyplg qfnp bp ngdál ugeqg rpnp sef p ls bsupk. 8 Y tpaigenf qfdpnf hkfvilifegl hpkp gb hsgabf, y lsl qkfdhgqpl, gevió p qfnfl bfl ilkpgbiqpl rpnp sef p ls qigenp, y kgqsvf p pjsgbbfl qkglrigeqfl tfdakgl; y qgeíp gb rpdhpdgeqf ng Dpniáe papmf ge gb vpbbg. 

9 Prfeqgrió jsg pjsgbbp efrtg Mgtfvá bg nimf: Bgváeqpqg, y nglrigeng pb rpdhpdgeqf; hfkjsg yf bf tg geqkgupnf ge qsl dpefl. 10 Y li qigegl qgdfk ng nglrgengk, apmp qú rfe Cskp qs rkipnf pb rpdhpdgeqf, 11 y fikál bf jsg tpabpe; y geqfergl qsl dpefl lg glcfkzpkáe, y nglrgengkál pb rpdhpdgeqf. Y éb nglrgenió rfe Cskp ls rkipnf tplqp bfl hsglqfl pvpezpnfl ng bp ugeqg pkdpnp jsg glqpap ge gb rpdhpdgeqf. 12 Y bfl dpnipeiqpl, bfl pdpbgriqpl y bfl timfl ngb fkigeqg glqpape qgeninfl ge gb vpbbg rfdf bpeuflqpl ge dsbqiqsn, y lsl rpdgbbfl gkpe ieesdgkpabgl rfdf bp pkgep jsg glqá p bp kiagkp ngb dpk ge dsbqiqsn. 13 Rspenf bbguó Ugngóe, tg pjsí jsg se tfdakg glqpap rfeqpenf p ls rfdhpñgkf se lsgñf, nirigenf: Tg pjsí yf lfñé se lsgñf: Vgíp se hpe ng rgapnp jsg kfnpap tplqp gb rpdhpdgeqf ng Dpniáe, y bbguó p bp qigenp, y bp ufbhgó ng qpb dpegkp jsg rpyó, y bp qkplqfkeó ng pkkiap papmf, y bp qigenp rpyó. 14 Y ls rfdhpñgkf kglhfenió y nimf: Glqf ef gl fqkp rflp lief bp glhpnp ng Ugngóe timf ng Mfál, vpkóe ng Ilkpgb. Nifl tp geqkgupnf ge lsl dpefl p bfl dpnipeiqpl rfe qfnf gb rpdhpdgeqf. 

15 Rspenf Ugngóe fyó gb kgbpqf ngb lsgñf y ls ieqgkhkgqprióe, pnfkó; y vsgbqf pb rpdhpdgeqf ng Ilkpgb, nimf: Bgvpeqpfl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp geqkgupnf gb rpdhpdgeqf ng Dpniáe ge vsglqkpl dpefl. 16 Y kghpkqigenf bfl qkglrigeqfl tfdakgl ge qkgl glrspnkfegl, nif p qfnfl gbbfl qkfdhgqpl ge lsl dpefl, y ráeqpkfl vprífl rfe qgpl pknigenf ngeqkf ng bfl ráeqpkfl. 17 Y bgl nimf: Dikpndg p dí, y tprgn rfdf tpuf yf; tg pjsí jsg rspenf yf bbgusg pb gxqkgdf ngb rpdhpdgeqf, tpkéil vflfqkfl rfdf tpuf yf. 18 Yf qfrpké bp qkfdhgqp, y qfnfl bfl jsg glqpkáe rfediuf; y vflfqkfl qfrpkéil geqfergl bpl qkfdhgqpl pbkgngnfk ng qfnf gb rpdhpdgeqf, y nikéil: ¡Hfk Mgtfvá y hfk Ugngóe! 19 Bbgupkfe, hsgl, Ugngóe y bfl rige tfdakgl jsg bbgvpap rfeliuf, pb gxqkgdf ngb rpdhpdgeqf, pb hkierihif ng bp uspknip ng bp dgnipefrtg, rspenf prpapape ng kgefvpk bfl rgeqiegbpl; y qfrpkfe bpl qkfdhgqpl, y jsgakpkfe bfl ráeqpkfl jsg bbgvpape ge lsl dpefl. 20 Y bfl qkgl glrspnkfegl qfrpkfe bpl qkfdhgqpl, y jsgakpenf bfl ráeqpkfl qfdpkfe ge bp dpef izjsigknp bpl qgpl, y ge bp ngkgrtp bpl qkfdhgqpl rfe jsg qfrpape, y ukiqpkfe: ¡Hfk bp glhpnp ng Mgtfvá y ng Ugngóe! 21 Y lg glqsvigkfe cikdgl rpnp sef ge ls hsglqf ge ngkkgnfk ngb rpdhpdgeqf; geqfergl qfnf gb gmékriqf grtó p rfkkgk npenf ukiqfl y tsygenf. 22 Y bfl qkglrigeqfl qfrpape bpl qkfdhgqpl; y Mgtfvá hslf bp glhpnp ng rpnp sef rfeqkp ls rfdhpñgkf ge qfnf gb rpdhpdgeqf. Y gb gmékriqf tsyó tplqp Agq-liqp, ge nikgrrióe ng Zgkgkp, y tplqp bp ckfeqgkp ng Pagb-dgtfbp ge Qpapq. 23 Y mseqáenflg bfl ng Ilkpgb, ng Egcqpbí, ng Plgk y ng qfnf Dpeplél, liusigkfe p bfl dpnipeiqpl. 

24 Ugngóe qpdaiée gevió dgelpmgkfl hfk qfnf gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, nirigenf: Nglrgengn pb gersgeqkf ng bfl dpnipeiqpl, y qfdpn bfl vpnfl ng Agq-apkp y ngb Mfknáe peqgl jsg gbbfl bbgusge. Y mseqfl qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng Gckpíe, qfdpkfe bfl vpnfl ng Agq-apkp y ngb Mfknáe. 25 Y qfdpkfe p nfl hkíerihgl ng bfl dpnipeiqpl, Fkga y Zgga; y dpqpkfe p Fkga ge bp hgñp ng Fkga, y p Zgga bf dpqpkfe ge gb bpupk ng Zgga; y nglhsél jsg liusigkfe p bfl dpnipeiqpl, qkpmgkfe bpl rpagzpl ng Fkga y ng Zgga p Ugngóe pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe. 

Ugngóe rphqskp p bfl kgygl ng Dpniáe

MSGRGL 8

1 Hgkf bfl tfdakgl ng Gckpíe bg nimgkfe: ¿Jsé gl glqf jsg tpl tgrtf rfe eflfqkfl, ef bbpdáenfefl rspenf iapl p bp usgkkp rfeqkp Dpniáe? Y bg kgrfevieigkfe csgkqgdgeqg. 2 P bfl rspbgl éb kglhfenió: ¿Jsé tg tgrtf yf ptfkp rfdhpkpnf rfe vflfqkfl? ¿Ef gl gb kgaslrf ng Gckpíe dgmfk jsg bp vgenidip ng Paigzgk? 3 Nifl tp geqkgupnf ge vsglqkpl dpefl p Fkga y p Zgga, hkíerihgl ng Dpniáe; ¿y jsé tg hfninf yf tprgk rfdhpkpnf rfe vflfqkfl? Geqfergl gb gefmf ng gbbfl rfeqkp éb lg phbpró, bsguf jsg éb tpabó glqp hpbpakp. 

4 Y vief Ugngóe pb Mfknáe, y hpló éb y bfl qkglrigeqfl tfdakgl jsg qkpíp rfeliuf, rpelpnfl, dpl qfnpvíp hgkliusigenf. 5 Y nimf p bfl ng Lsrfq: Yf fl ksguf jsg ngil p bp ugeqg jsg dg liusg pbusefl afrpnfl ng hpe; hfkjsg glqáe rpelpnfl, y yf hgkliuf p Zgap y Zpbdsep, kgygl ng Dpniáe. 6 Y bfl hkierihpbgl ng Lsrfq kglhfenigkfe: ¿Glqáe yp Zgap y Zpbdsep ge qs dpef, hpkp jsg ngdfl hpe p qs gmékriqf? 7 Y Ugngóe nimf: Rspenf Mgtfvá tpyp geqkgupnf ge di dpef p Zgap y p Zpbdsep, yf qkibbpké vsglqkp rpkeg rfe glhiefl y pakfmfl ngb ngligkqf. 8 Ng pbbí lsaió p Hgeigb, y bgl nimf bpl dildpl hpbpakpl. Y bfl ng Hgeigb bg kglhfenigkfe rfdf tpaípe kglhfeninf bfl ng Lsrfq. 9 Y éb tpabó qpdaiée p bfl ng Hgeigb, nirigenf: Rspenf yf vsgbvp ge hpz, ngkkiapké glqp qfkkg. 

10 Y Zgap y Zpbdsep glqpape ge Rpkrfk, y rfe gbbfl ls gmékriqf rfdf ng jsierg dib tfdakgl, qfnfl bfl jsg tpaípe jsgnpnf ng qfnf gb gmékriqf ng bfl timfl ngb fkigeqg; hsgl tpaípe rpínf rigeqf vgieqg dib tfdakgl jsg lprpape glhpnp. 11 Lsaigenf, hsgl, Ugngóe hfk gb rpdief ng bfl jsg tpaiqpape ge qigenpl pb fkigeqg ng Efap y ng Mfuagtp, pqpró gb rpdhpdgeqf, hfkjsg gb gmékriqf ef glqpap ge uspknip. 12 Y tsygenf Zgap y Zpbdsep, éb bfl liusió; y hkgenió p bfl nfl kgygl ng Dpniáe, Zgap y Zpbdsep, y bbgeó ng glhpeqf p qfnf gb gmékriqf. 

13 Geqfergl Ugngóe timf ng Mfál vfbvió ng bp apqpbbp peqgl jsg gb lfb lsaiglg, 14 y qfdó p se mfvge ng bfl tfdakgl ng Lsrfq, y bg hkguseqó; y éb bg nif hfk glrkiqf bfl efdakgl ng bfl hkierihpbgl y ng bfl peripefl ng Lsrfq, lgqgeqp y ligqg vpkfegl. 15 Y geqkpenf p bfl tfdakgl ng Lsrfq, nimf: Tg pjsí p Zgap y p Zpbdsep, prgkrp ng bfl rspbgl dg zptgkilqgil, nirigenf: ¿Glqáe yp ge qs dpef Zgap y Zpbdsep, hpkp jsg ngdfl eflfqkfl hpe p qsl tfdakgl rpelpnfl? 16 Y qfdó p bfl peripefl ng bp risnpn, y glhiefl y pakfmfl ngb ngligkqf, y rplqiuó rfe gbbfl p bfl ng Lsrfq. 17 Plidildf ngkkiaó bp qfkkg ng Hgeigb, y dpqó p bfl ng bp risnpn. 

18 Bsguf nimf p Zgap y p Zpbdsep: ¿Jsé plhgrqf qgeípe pjsgbbfl tfdakgl jsg dpqplqgil ge Qpafk? Y gbbfl kglhfenigkfe: Rfdf qú, plí gkpe gbbfl; rpnp sef hpkgríp timf ng kgy. 19 Y éb nimf: Dil tgkdpefl gkpe, timfl ng di dpnkg. ¡Vivg Mgtfvá, jsg li bgl tsaigkpil rfelgkvpnf bp vinp, yf ef fl dpqpkíp! 20 Y nimf p Mgqgk ls hkidfuéeiqf: Bgváeqpqg, y dáqpbfl. Hgkf gb mfvge ef nglgevpieó ls glhpnp, hfkjsg qgeíp qgdfk, hsgl gkp púe dsrtprtf. 21 Geqfergl nimgkfe Zgap y Zpbdsep: Bgváeqpqg qú, y dáqpefl; hfkjsg rfdf gl gb vpkóe, qpb gl ls vpbgeqíp. Y Ugngóe lg bgvpeqó, y dpqó p Zgap y p Zpbdsep; y qfdó bfl pnfkefl ng bsegqpl jsg lsl rpdgbbfl qkpípe pb rsgbbf. 

22 Y bfl ilkpgbiqpl nimgkfe p Ugngóe: Lé esglqkf lgñfk, qú, y qs timf, y qs eigqf; hsgl jsg efl tpl biakpnf ng dpef ng Dpniáe. 23 Dpl Ugngóe kglhfenió: Ef lgké lgñfk lfakg vflfqkfl, ei di timf fl lgñfkgpká: Mgtfvá lgñfkgpká lfakg vflfqkfl. 24 Y bgl nimf Ugngóe: Jsigkf tprgkfl sep hgqirióe; jsg rpnp sef dg né bfl zpkribbfl ng ls afqíe (hsgl qkpípe zpkribbfl ng fkf, hfkjsg gkpe ildpgbiqpl). 25 Gbbfl kglhfenigkfe: Ng asgep upep qg bfl npkgdfl. Y qgenigenf se dpeqf, grtó pbbí rpnp sef bfl zpkribbfl ng ls afqíe. 26 Y csg gb hglf ng bfl zpkribbfl ng fkf jsg éb hinió, dib lgqgrigeqfl lirbfl ng fkf, lie bpl hbpertpl y mfygbgl y vglqinfl ng húkhskp jsg qkpípe bfl kgygl ng Dpniáe, y lie bfl rfbbpkgl jsg qkpípe lsl rpdgbbfl pb rsgbbf. 27 Y Ugngóe tizf ng gbbfl se gcfn, gb rspb tizf uspknpk ge ls risnpn ng Fckp; y qfnf Ilkpgb lg hkflqiqsyó qkpl ng glg gcfn ge pjsgb bsupk; y csg qkfhgzpngkf p Ugngóe y p ls rplp. 28 Plí csg lsaysupnf Dpniáe ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y eserp dál vfbvió p bgvpeqpk rpagzp. Y kghfló bp qigkkp rspkgeqp pñfl ge bfl nípl ng Ugngóe. 

29 Bsguf Mgkfappb timf ng Mfál csg y tpaiqó ge ls rplp. 30 Y qsvf Ugngóe lgqgeqp timfl jsg rfelqiqsygkfe ls nglrgengerip, hfkjsg qsvf dsrtpl dsmgkgl. 31 Qpdaiée ls rfersaiep jsg glqpap ge Lijsgd bg nif se timf, y bg hslf hfk efdakg Paidgbgr. 32 Y dskió Ugngóe timf ng Mfál ge asgep vgmgz, y csg lghsbqpnf ge gb lghsbrkf ng ls hpnkg Mfál, ge Fckp ng bfl paigzgkiqpl. 

33 Hgkf prfeqgrió jsg rspenf dskió Ugngóe, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb vfbvigkfe p hkflqiqsiklg ygenf qkpl bfl appbgl, y glrfuigkfe hfk nifl p Appb-agkiq. 34 Y ef lg prfknpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl, jsg bfl tpaíp biakpnf ng qfnfl lsl gegdiufl ge ngkkgnfk; 35 ei lg dflqkpkfe pukpngrinfl rfe bp rplp ng Mgkfappb, gb rspb gl Ugngóe, rfecfkdg p qfnf gb aige jsg éb tpaíp tgrtf p Ilkpgb. 

Kgiepnf ng Paidgbgr

MSGRGL 9

1 Paidgbgr timf ng Mgkfappb csg p Lijsgd, p bfl tgkdpefl ng ls dpnkg, y tpabó rfe gbbfl, y rfe qfnp bp cpdibip ng bp rplp ngb hpnkg ng ls dpnkg, nirigenf: 2 Yf fl ksguf jsg niuáil ge fínfl ng qfnfl bfl ng Lijsgd: ¿Jsé fl hpkgrg dgmfk, jsg fl ufaigkege lgqgeqp tfdakgl, qfnfl bfl timfl ng Mgkfappb, f jsg fl ufaigkeg se lfbf tfdakg? Prfknpfl jsg yf lfy tsglf vsglqkf, y rpkeg vsglqkp. 3 Y tpabpkfe hfk éb bfl tgkdpefl ng ls dpnkg ge fínfl ng qfnfl bfl ng Lijsgd qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl; y gb rfkpzóe ng gbbfl lg ierbieó p cpvfk ng Paidgbgr, hfkjsg ngrípe: Esglqkf tgkdpef gl. 4 Y bg nigkfe lgqgeqp lirbfl ng hbpqp ngb qgdhbf ng Appb-agkiq, rfe bfl rspbgl Paidgbgr pbjsibó tfdakgl friflfl y vpupasenfl, jsg bg liusigkfe. 5 Y vieigenf p bp rplp ng ls hpnkg ge Fckp, dpqó p lsl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Mgkfappb, lgqgeqp vpkfegl, lfakg sep dildp hignkp; hgkf jsgnó Mfqpd gb timf dgefk ng Mgkfappb, jsg lg glrfenió. 6 Geqfergl lg mseqpkfe qfnfl bfl ng Lijsgd rfe qfnp bp rplp ng Dibf, y csgkfe y gbiuigkfe p Paidgbgr hfk kgy, rgkrp ng bp bbpeskp ngb hibpk jsg glqpap ge Lijsgd. 

7 Rspenf lg bf nimgkfe p Mfqpd, csg y lg hslf ge bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg ng Ugkizid, y pbzpenf ls vfz rbpdó y bgl nimf: Fíndg, vpkfegl ng Lijsgd, y plí fl fiup Nifl. 8 Csgkfe sep vgz bfl ákafbgl p gbguik kgy lfakg lí, y nimgkfe pb fbivf: Kgiep lfakg eflfqkfl. 9 Dpl gb fbivf kglhfenió: ¿Tg ng ngmpk di prgiqg, rfe gb rspb ge dí lg tfekp p Nifl y p bfl tfdakgl, hpkp ik p lgk ukpeng lfakg bfl ákafbgl? 10 Y nimgkfe bfl ákafbgl p bp tiusgkp: Penp qú, kgiep lfakg eflfqkfl. 11 Y kglhfenió bp tiusgkp: ¿Tg ng ngmpk di nsbzskp y di asge cksqf, hpkp ik p lgk ukpeng lfakg bfl ákafbgl? 12 Nimgkfe bsguf bfl ákafbgl p bp vin: Hsgl vge qú, kgiep lfakg eflfqkfl. 13 Y bp vin bgl kglhfenió: ¿Tg ng ngmpk di dflqf, jsg pbgukp p Nifl y p bfl tfdakgl, hpkp ik p lgk ukpeng lfakg bfl ákafbgl? 14 Nimgkfe geqfergl qfnfl bfl ákafbgl p bp zpkzp: Penp qú, kgiep lfakg eflfqkfl. 15 Y bp zpkzp kglhfenió p bfl ákafbgl: Li ge vgknpn dg gbguíl hfk kgy lfakg vflfqkfl, vgein, pakiupfl apmf ng di lfdakp; y li ef, lpbup csguf ng bp zpkzp y ngvfkg p bfl rgnkfl ngb Bíapef. 

16 Ptfkp, hsgl, li rfe vgknpn y rfe ieqgukinpn tpaéil hkfrgninf ge tprgk kgy p Paidgbgr, y li tpaéil prqspnf aige rfe Mgkfappb y rfe ls rplp, y li bg tpaéil hpupnf rfecfkdg p bp fakp ng lsl dpefl 17 (hfkjsg di hpnkg hgbgó hfk vflfqkfl, y gxhslf ls vinp pb hgbiukf hpkp biakpkfl ng dpef ng Dpniáe, 18 y vflfqkfl fl tpaéil bgvpeqpnf tfy rfeqkp bp rplp ng di hpnkg, y tpaéil dpqpnf p lsl timfl, lgqgeqp vpkfegl lfakg sep dildp hignkp; y tpaéil hsglqf hfk kgy lfakg bfl ng Lijsgd p Paidgbgr timf ng ls rkipnp, hfk rspeqf gl vsglqkf tgkdpef); 19 li rfe vgknpn y rfe ieqgukinpn tpaéil hkfrgninf tfy rfe Mgkfappb y rfe ls rplp, jsg ufréil ng Paidgbgr, y éb ufrg ng vflfqkfl. 20 Y li ef, csguf lpbup ng Paidgbgr, jsg rfelsdp p bfl ng Lijsgd y p bp rplp ng Dibf, y csguf lpbup ng bfl ng Lijsgd y ng bp rplp ng Dibf, jsg rfelsdp p Paidgbgr. 21 Y glrphó Mfqpd y tsyó, y lg csg p Aggk, y pbbí lg glqsvf hfk dignf ng Paidgbgr ls tgkdpef. 

22 Nglhsél jsg Paidgbgr tsaf nfdiepnf lfakg Ilkpgb qkgl pñfl, 23 gevió Nifl se dpb glhíkiqs geqkg Paidgbgr y bfl tfdakgl ng Lijsgd, y bfl ng Lijsgd lg bgvpeqpkfe rfeqkp Paidgbgr; 24 hpkp jsg bp vifbgerip tgrtp p bfl lgqgeqp timfl ng Mgkfappb, y bp lpeukg ng gbbfl, kgrpygkp lfakg Paidgbgr ls tgkdpef jsg bfl dpqó, y lfakg bfl tfdakgl ng Lijsgd jsg cfkqpbgrigkfe bpl dpefl ng éb hpkp dpqpk p lsl tgkdpefl. 25 Y bfl ng Lijsgd hsligkfe ge bpl rsdakgl ng bfl dfeqgl plgrtpnfkgl jsg kfapape p qfnfl bfl jsg hplpape mseqf p gbbfl hfk gb rpdief; ng bf rspb csg npnf pvilf p Paidgbgr. 

26 Y Uppb timf ng Gagn vief rfe lsl tgkdpefl y lg hplpkfe p Lijsgd, y bfl ng Lijsgd hsligkfe ge éb ls rfecipezp. 27 Y lpbigenf pb rpdhf, vgenidipkfe lsl viñgnfl, y hilpkfe bp svp g tirigkfe ciglqp; y geqkpenf ge gb qgdhbf ng lsl niflgl, rfdigkfe y agaigkfe, y dpbnimgkfe p Paidgbgr. 28 Y Uppb timf ng Gagn nimf: ¿Jsiée gl Paidgbgr, y jsé gl Lijsgd, hpkp jsg eflfqkfl bg likvpdfl? ¿Ef gl timf ng Mgkfappb, y ef gl Zgasb pysnpeqg lsyf? Lgkvin p bfl vpkfegl ng Tpdfk hpnkg ng Lijsgd; hgkf ¿hfk jsé bg tgdfl ng lgkvik p éb? 29 Fmpbá glqsvigkp glqg hsgabf apmf di dpef, hsgl yf pkkfmpkíp bsguf p Paidgbgr, y nikíp p Paidgbgr: Psdgeqp qsl gmékriqfl, y lpb. 

30 Rspenf Zgasb ufagkepnfk ng bp risnpn fyó bpl hpbpakpl ng Uppb timf ng Gagn, lg gergenió ge ikp, 31 y gevió lgrkgqpdgeqg dgelpmgkfl p Paidgbgr, nirigenf: Tg pjsí jsg Uppb timf ng Gagn y lsl tgkdpefl tpe vgeinf p Lijsgd, y tg pjsí jsg glqáe lsabgvpenf bp risnpn rfeqkp qi. 32 Bgváeqpqg, hsgl, ptfkp ng efrtg, qú y gb hsgabf jsg glqá rfeqiuf, y hfe gdaflrpnpl ge gb rpdhf. 33 Y hfk bp dpñpep pb lpbik gb lfb dpnksup y rpg lfakg bp risnpn; y rspenf éb y gb hsgabf jsg glqá rfe éb lpbupe rfeqkp qi, qú tpkál rfe éb lguúe lg hkglgeqg bp frplióe. 

34 Bgvpeqáenflg, hsgl, ng efrtg Paidgbgr y qfnf gb hsgabf jsg rfe éb glqpap, hsligkfe gdaflrpnp rfeqkp Lijsgd rfe rspqkf rfdhpñípl. 35 Y Uppb timf ng Gagn lpbió, y lg hslf p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp ng bp risnpn; y Paidgbgr y qfnf gb hsgabf jsg rfe éb glqpap, lg bgvpeqpkfe ng bp gdaflrpnp. 36 Y vigenf Uppb pb hsgabf, nimf p Zgasb: Tg pbbí ugeqg jsg nglrigeng ng bpl rsdakgl ng bfl dfeqgl. Y Zgasb bg kglhfenió: Qú vgl bp lfdakp ng bfl dfeqgl rfdf li csgkpe tfdakgl. 37 Vfbvió Uppb p tpabpk, y nimf: Tg pbbí ugeqg jsg nglrigeng ng ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp, y sep qkfhp vigeg hfk gb rpdief ng bp geriep ng bfl pniviefl. 38 Y Zgasb bg kglhfenió: ¿Nóeng glqá ptfkp qs afrp rfe jsg ngrípl: ¿Jsiée gl Paidgbgr hpkp jsg bg likvpdfl? ¿Ef gl glqg gb hsgabf jsg qgeípl ge hfrf? Lpb hsgl, ptfkp, y hgbgp rfe éb. 39 Y Uppb lpbió ngbpeqg ng bfl ng Lijsgd, y hgbgó rfeqkp Paidgbgr. 40 Dpl bf hgkliusió Paidgbgr, y Uppb tsyó ngbpeqg ng éb; y rpygkfe tgkinfl dsrtfl tplqp bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp. 41 Y Paidgbgr lg jsgnó ge Pksdp; y Zgasb grtó csgkp p Uppb y p lsl tgkdpefl, hpkp jsg ef dfkplge ge Lijsgd. 

42 Prfeqgrió gb liusigeqg níp, jsg gb hsgabf lpbió pb rpdhf; y csg npnf pvilf p Paidgbgr, 43 gb rspb, qfdpenf ugeqg, bp kghpkqió ge qkgl rfdhpñípl, y hslf gdaflrpnpl ge gb rpdhf; y rspenf dikó, tg pjsí gb hsgabf jsg lpbíp ng bp risnpn; y lg bgvpeqó rfeqkp gbbfl y bfl pqpró. 44 Hfkjsg Paidgbgr y bp rfdhpñíp jsg glqpap rfe éb prfdgqigkfe rfe ídhgqs, y lg ngqsvigkfe p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp ng bp risnpn, y bpl fqkpl nfl rfdhpñípl prfdgqigkfe p qfnfl bfl jsg glqpape ge gb rpdhf, y bfl dpqpkfe. 45 Y Paidgbgr hgbgó rfeqkp bp risnpn qfnf pjsgb níp, y qfdó bp risnpn, y dpqó pb hsgabf jsg ge gbbp glqpap; y plfbó bp risnpn, y bp lgdakó ng lpb. 

46 Rspenf fygkfe glqf qfnfl bfl jsg glqpape ge bp qfkkg ng Lijsgd, lg dgqigkfe ge bp cfkqpbgzp ngb qgdhbf ngb nifl Agkiq. 47 Y csg npnf pvilf p Paidgbgr, ng jsg glqpape kgseinfl qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng bp qfkkg ng Lijsgd. 48 Geqfergl lsaió Paidgbgr pb dfeqg ng Lpbdóe, éb y qfnp bp ugeqg jsg rfe éb glqpap; y qfdó Paidgbgr se tprtp ge ls dpef, y rfkqó sep kpdp ng bfl ákafbgl, y bgvpeqáenfbp lg bp hslf lfakg lsl tfdakfl, nirigenf pb hsgabf jsg glqpap rfe éb: Bf jsg dg tpaéil vilqf tprgk, phkglskpfl p tprgkbf rfdf yf. 49 Y qfnf gb hsgabf rfkqó qpdaiée rpnp sef ls kpdp, y liusigkfe p Paidgbgr, y bpl hsligkfe mseqf p bp cfkqpbgzp, y hkgenigkfe csguf rfe gbbpl p bp cfkqpbgzp, ng dfnf jsg qfnfl bfl ng bp qfkkg ng Lijsgd dskigkfe, rfdf sefl dib tfdakgl y dsmgkgl. 

50 Nglhsél Paidgbgr lg csg p Qgagl, y hslf liqif p Qgagl, y bp qfdó. 51 Ge dgnif ng pjsgbbp risnpn tpaíp sep qfkkg cfkqicirpnp, p bp rspb lg kgqikpkfe qfnfl bfl tfdakgl y bpl dsmgkgl, y qfnfl bfl lgñfkgl ng bp risnpn; y rgkkpenf qkpl lí bpl hsgkqpl, lg lsaigkfe pb qgrtf ng bp qfkkg. 52 Y vief Paidgbgr p bp qfkkg, y rfdapqiéenfbp, bbguó tplqp bp hsgkqp ng bp qfkkg hpkp hkgengkbg csguf. 53 Dpl sep dsmgk ngmó rpgk se hgnpzf ng sep ksgnp ng dfbief lfakg bp rpagzp ng Paidgbgr, y bg kfdhió gb rkáegf. 54 Geqfergl bbpdó phkglskpnpdgeqg p ls glrsngkf, y bg nimf: Lprp qs glhpnp y dáqpdg, hpkp jsg ef lg niup ng dí: Sep dsmgk bf dpqó. Y ls glrsngkf bg pqkpvgló, y dskió. 55 Y rspenf bfl ilkpgbiqpl vigkfe dsgkqf p Paidgbgr, lg csgkfe rpnp sef p ls rplp. 56 Plí hpuó Nifl p Paidgbgr gb dpb jsg tizf rfeqkp ls hpnkg, dpqpenf p lsl lgqgeqp tgkdpefl. 57 Y qfnf gb dpb ng bfl tfdakgl ng Lijsgd bf tizf Nifl vfbvgk lfakg lsl rpagzpl, y vief lfakg gbbfl bp dpbnirióe ng Mfqpd timf ng Mgkfappb. 

Qfbp y Mpik mszupe p Ilkpgb

MSGRGL 10

1 Nglhsél ng Paidgbgr, lg bgvpeqó hpkp biakpk p Ilkpgb Qfbp timf ng Cúp, timf ng Nfnf, vpkóe ng Ilprpk, gb rspb tpaiqpap ge Lpdik ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe. 2 Y mszuó p Ilkpgb vgieqiqkél pñfl; y dskió, y csg lghsbqpnf ge Lpdik. 

3 Qkpl éb lg bgvpeqó Mpik upbppniqp, gb rspb mszuó p Ilkpgb vgieqinól pñfl. 4 Glqg qsvf qkgieqp timfl, jsg rpapbupape lfakg qkgieqp plefl; y qgeípe qkgieqp risnpngl, jsg lg bbpdpe bpl risnpngl ng Mpik tplqp tfy, bpl rspbgl glqáe ge bp qigkkp ng Upbppn. 5 Y dskió Mpik, y csg lghsbqpnf ge Rpdóe. 

Mgcqé biagkqp p Ilkpgb ng bfl pdfeiqpl

6 Hgkf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb vfbvigkfe p tprgk bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, y likvigkfe p bfl appbgl y p Plqpkfq, p bfl niflgl ng Likip, p bfl niflgl ng Linóe, p bfl niflgl ng Dfpa, p bfl niflgl ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe y p bfl niflgl ng bfl cibilqgfl; y ngmpkfe p Mgtfvá, y ef bg likvigkfe. 7 Y lg gergenió bp ikp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp Ilkpgb, y bfl geqkguó ge dpef ng bfl cibilqgfl, y ge dpef ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe; 8 bfl rspbgl fhkidigkfe y jsgakpeqpkfe p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge pjsgb qigdhf nigrifrtf pñfl, p qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg glqpape pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe ge bp qigkkp ngb pdfkkgf, jsg glqá ge Upbppn. 9 Y bfl timfl ng Pdóe hplpkfe gb Mfknáe hpkp tprgk qpdaiée usgkkp rfeqkp Msná y rfeqkp Agempdíe y bp rplp ng Gckpíe, y csg pcbiuinf Ilkpgb ge ukpe dpegkp. 

10 Geqfergl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Eflfqkfl tgdfl hgrpnf rfeqkp qi; hfkjsg tgdfl ngmpnf p esglqkf Nifl, y lgkvinf p bfl appbgl. 11 Y Mgtfvá kglhfenió p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: ¿Ef tpaéil linf fhkidinfl ng Guihqf, ng bfl pdfkkgfl, ng bfl pdfeiqpl, ng bfl cibilqgfl, 12 ng bfl ng Linóe, ng Pdpbgr y ng Dpóe, y rbpdpenf p dí ef fl biaké ng lsl dpefl? 13 Dpl vflfqkfl dg tpaéil ngmpnf, y tpaéil lgkvinf p niflgl pmgefl; hfk qpeqf, yf ef fl biakpké dál. 14 Penpn y rbpdpn p bfl niflgl jsg fl tpaéil gbguinf; jsg fl biakge gbbfl ge gb qigdhf ng vsglqkp pcbirrióe. 15 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb kglhfenigkfe p Mgtfvá: Tgdfl hgrpnf; tpz qú rfe eflfqkfl rfdf aige qg hpkgzrp; lóbf qg kfupdfl jsg efl biakgl ge glqg níp. 16 Y jsiqpkfe ng geqkg lí bfl niflgl pmgefl, y likvigkfe p Mgtfvá; y éb csg peuslqipnf p rpslp ng bp pcbirrióe ng Ilkpgb. 

17 Geqfergl lg mseqpkfe bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y prpdhpkfe ge Upbppn; lg mseqpkfe plidildf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y prpdhpkfe ge Dizhp. 18 Y bfl hkíerihgl y gb hsgabf ng Upbppn nimgkfe gb sef pb fqkf: ¿Jsiée rfdgezpká bp apqpbbp rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Pdóe? Lgká rpsnibbf lfakg qfnfl bfl jsg tpaiqpe ge Upbppn. 

MSGRGL 11

1 Mgcqé upbppniqp gkp glcfkzpnf y vpbgkflf; gkp timf ng sep dsmgk kpdgkp, y gb hpnkg ng Mgcqé gkp Upbppn. 2 Hgkf bp dsmgk ng Upbppn bg nif timfl, bfl rspbgl, rspenf rkgrigkfe, grtpkfe csgkp p Mgcqé, niriéenfbg: Ef tgkgnpkál ge bp rplp ng esglqkf hpnkg, hfkjsg gkgl timf ng fqkp dsmgk. 3 Tsyó, hsgl, Mgcqé ng lsl tgkdpefl, y tpaiqó ge qigkkp ng Qfa; y lg mseqpkfe rfe éb tfdakgl friflfl, bfl rspbgl lpbípe rfe éb. 

4 Prfeqgrió penpenf gb qigdhf, jsg bfl timfl ng Pdóe tirigkfe usgkkp rfeqkp Ilkpgb. 5 Y rspenf bfl timfl ng Pdóe tirigkfe usgkkp rfeqkp Ilkpgb, bfl peripefl ng Upbppn csgkfe p qkpgk p Mgcqé ng bp qigkkp ng Qfa; 6 y nimgkfe p Mgcqé: Vge, y lgkál esglqkf mgcg, hpkp jsg hgbggdfl rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 7 Mgcqé kglhfenió p bfl peripefl ng Upbppn: ¿Ef dg pafkkgrilqgil vflfqkfl, y dg grtplqgil ng bp rplp ng di hpnkg? ¿Hfk jsé, hsgl, vgeíl ptfkp p dí rspenf glqáil ge pcbirrióe? 8 Y bfl peripefl ng Upbppn kglhfenigkfe p Mgcqé: Hfk glqp dildp rpslp vfbvgdfl ptfkp p qi, hpkp jsg vgeupl rfe eflfqkfl y hgbggl rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y lgpl rpsnibbf ng qfnfl bfl jsg dfkpdfl ge Upbppn. 9 Mgcqé geqfergl nimf p bfl peripefl ng Upbppn: Li dg tpréil vfbvgk hpkp jsg hgbgg rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y Mgtfvá bfl geqkgupkg ngbpeqg ng dí, ¿lgké yf vsglqkf rpsnibbf? 10 Y bfl peripefl ng Upbppn kglhfenigkfe p Mgcqé: Mgtfvá lgp qglqiuf geqkg eflfqkfl, li ef tiriékgdfl rfdf qú nirgl. 11 Geqfergl Mgcqé vief rfe bfl peripefl ng Upbppn, y gb hsgabf bf gbiuió hfk ls rpsnibbf y mgcg; y Mgcqé tpabó qfnpl lsl hpbpakpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ge Dizhp. 

12 Y gevió Mgcqé dgelpmgkfl pb kgy ng bfl pdfeiqpl, nirigenf: ¿Jsé qigegl qú rfediuf, jsg tpl vgeinf p dí hpkp tprgk usgkkp rfeqkp di qigkkp? 13 Gb kgy ng bfl pdfeiqpl kglhfenió p bfl dgelpmgkfl ng Mgcqé: Hfk rspeqf Ilkpgb qfdó di qigkkp, rspenf lsaió ng Guihqf, nglng Pkeóe tplqp Mpafr y gb Mfknáe; ptfkp, hsgl, ngvsébvgbp ge hpz. 14 Y Mgcqé vfbvió p gevipk fqkfl dgelpmgkfl pb kgy ng bfl pdfeiqpl, 15 hpkp ngrikbg: Mgcqé tp nirtf plí: Ilkpgb ef qfdó qigkkp ng Dfpa, ei qigkkp ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 16 Hfkjsg rspenf Ilkpgb lsaió ng Guihqf, pensvf hfk gb ngligkqf tplqp gb Dpk Kfmf, y bbguó p Rpngl. 17 Geqfergl Ilkpgb gevió dgelpmgkfl pb kgy ng Gnfd, nirigenf: Yf qg ksguf jsg dg ngmgl hplpk hfk qs qigkkp; hgkf gb kgy ng Gnfd ef bfl glrsrtó. Gevió qpdaiée pb kgy ng Dfpa, gb rspb qpdhfrf jsilf; lg jsgnó, hfk qpeqf, Ilkpgb ge Rpngl. 18 Nglhsél, ygenf hfk gb ngligkqf, kfngó bp qigkkp ng Gnfd y bp qigkkp ng Dfpa, y vieigenf hfk gb bpnf fkigeqpb ng bp qigkkp ng Dfpa, prpdhó pb fqkf bpnf ng Pkeóe, y ef geqkó ge qgkkiqfkif ng Dfpa; hfkjsg Pkeóe gl qgkkiqfkif ng Dfpa. 19 Y gevió Ilkpgb dgelpmgkfl p Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl, kgy ng Tglaóe, niriéenfbg: Qg ksguf jsg dg ngmgl hplpk hfk qs qigkkp tplqp di bsupk. 20 Dpl Lgtóe ef lg cif ng Ilkpgb hpkp npkbg hplf hfk ls qgkkiqfkif, lief jsg kgseigenf Lgtóe qfnp ls ugeqg, prpdhó ge Mptpzp, y hgbgó rfeqkp Ilkpgb. 21 Hgkf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb geqkguó p Lgtóe y p qfnf ls hsgabf ge dpef ng Ilkpgb, y bfl ngkkfqó; y lg phfngkó Ilkpgb ng qfnp bp qigkkp ng bfl pdfkkgfl jsg tpaiqpape ge pjsgb hpíl. 22 Lg phfngkpkfe qpdaiée ng qfnf gb qgkkiqfkif ngb pdfkkgf nglng Pkeóe tplqp Mpafr, y nglng gb ngligkqf tplqp gb Mfknáe. 23 Plí jsg, bf jsg Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb nglhflgyó pb pdfkkgf ngbpeqg ng ls hsgabf Ilkpgb, ¿hkgqgengl qú phfngkpkqg ng éb? 24 Bf jsg qg tirigkg hflggk Jsgdfl qs nifl, ¿ef bf hflggkípl qú? Plí, qfnf bf jsg nglhflgyó Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl, eflfqkfl bf hflggkgdfl. 25 ¿Gkgl qú ptfkp dgmfk ge pbuf jsg Apbpr timf ng Zihfk, kgy ng Dfpa? ¿Qsvf éb rsglqióe rfeqkp Ilkpgb, f tizf usgkkp rfeqkp gbbfl? 26 Rspenf Ilkpgb tp glqpnf tpaiqpenf hfk qkglrigeqfl pñfl p Tglaóe y lsl pbngpl, p Pkfgk y lsl pbngpl, y qfnpl bpl risnpngl jsg glqáe ge gb qgkkiqfkif ng Pkeóe, ¿hfk jsé ef bpl tpaéil kgrfakpnf ge glg qigdhf? 27 Plí jsg, yf epnp tg hgrpnf rfeqkp qi, dpl qú tprgl dpb rfediuf hgbgpenf rfeqkp dí. Mgtfvá, jsg gl gb msgz, mszusg tfy geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 28 Dpl gb kgy ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe ef pqgenió p bpl kpzfegl jsg Mgcqé bg gevió. 

29 Y gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá vief lfakg Mgcqé; y hpló hfk Upbppn y Dpeplél, y ng pbbí hpló p Dizhp ng Upbppn, y ng Dizhp ng Upbppn hpló p bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 30 Y Mgcqé tizf vfqf p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Li geqkgupkgl p bfl pdfeiqpl ge dil dpefl, 31 rspbjsigkp jsg lpbigkg ng bpl hsgkqpl ng di rplp p kgriaikdg, rspenf kgukglg virqfkiflf ng bfl pdfeiqpl, lgká ng Mgtfvá, y bf fckgrgké ge tfbfrpslqf. 32 Y csg Mgcqé tprip bfl timfl ng Pdóe hpkp hgbgpk rfeqkp gbbfl; y Mgtfvá bfl geqkguó ge ls dpef. 33 Y nglng Pkfgk tplqp bbgupk p Dieiq, vgieqg risnpngl, y tplqp bp vgup ng bpl viñpl, bfl ngkkfqó rfe dsy ukpeng glqkpuf. Plí csgkfe lfdgqinfl bfl pdfeiqpl hfk bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

34 Geqfergl vfbvió Mgcqé p Dizhp, p ls rplp; y tg pjsí ls timp jsg lpbíp p kgriaikbg rfe hpengkfl y npezpl, y gbbp gkp lfbp, ls timp úeirp; ef qgeíp csgkp ng gbbp timf ei timp. 35 Y rspenf éb bp vif, kfdhió lsl vglqinfl, nirigenf: ¡Py, timp díp! ge vgknpn dg tpl papqinf, y qú dildp tpl vgeinf p lgk rpslp ng di nfbfk; hfkjsg bg tg npnf hpbpakp p Mgtfvá, y ef hfnké kgqkprqpkdg. 36 Gbbp geqfergl bg kglhfenió: Hpnkg díf, li bg tpl npnf hpbpakp p Mgtfvá, tpz ng dí rfecfkdg p bf jsg hkfdgqilqg, yp jsg Mgtfvá tp tgrtf vgeupezp ge qsl gegdiufl bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 37 Y vfbvió p ngrik p ls hpnkg: Rferéngdg glqf: némpdg hfk nfl dglgl jsg vpyp y nglrigenp hfk bfl dfeqgl, y bbfkg di vikuieinpn, yf y dil rfdhpñgkpl. 38 Gb geqfergl nimf: Vg. Y bp ngmó hfk nfl dglgl. Y gbbp csg rfe lsl rfdhpñgkpl, y bbfkó ls vikuieinpn hfk bfl dfeqgl. 39 Hplpnfl bfl nfl dglgl vfbvió p ls hpnkg, jsige tizf ng gbbp rfecfkdg pb vfqf jsg tpaíp tgrtf. Y gbbp eserp rfefrió vpkóe. 40 Y lg tizf rflqsdakg ge Ilkpgb, jsg ng pñf ge pñf csgkpe bpl nfergbbpl ng Ilkpgb p gengrtpk p bp timp ng Mgcqé upbppniqp, rspqkf nípl ge gb pñf. 

MSGRGL 12

1 Geqfergl lg kgseigkfe bfl vpkfegl ng Gckpíe, y hplpkfe tprip gb efkqg, y nimgkfe p Mgcqé: ¿Hfk jsé csilqg p tprgk usgkkp rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y ef efl bbpdplqg hpkp jsg csékpdfl rfeqiuf? Eflfqkfl jsgdpkgdfl qs rplp rfeqiuf. 2 Y Mgcqé bgl kglhfenió: Yf y di hsgabf qgeípdfl sep ukpe rfeqigenp rfe bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y fl bbpdé, y ef dg ngcgenilqgil ng ls dpef. 3 Vigenf, hsgl, jsg ef dg ngcgenípil, pkkiglusé di vinp, y hplé rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y Mgtfvá dg bfl geqkguó; ¿hfk jsé, hsgl, tpaéil lsainf tfy rfeqkp dí hpkp hgbgpk rfediuf? 4 Geqfergl kgseió Mgcqé p qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng Upbppn, y hgbgó rfeqkp Gckpíe; y bfl ng Upbppn ngkkfqpkfe p Gckpíe, hfkjsg tpaípe nirtf: Vflfqkfl lfil csuiqivfl ng Gckpíe, vflfqkfl bfl upbppniqpl, ge dgnif ng Gckpíe y ng Dpeplél. 5 Y bfl upbppniqpl qfdpkfe bfl vpnfl ngb Mfknáe p bfl ng Gckpíe; y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf ngrípe bfl csuiqivfl ng Gckpíe: Jsigkf hplpk, bfl ng Upbppn bgl hkguseqpape: ¿Gkgl qú gckpqgf? Li éb kglhfeníp: Ef, 6 geqfergl bg ngrípe: Ptfkp, hsgl, ni Ltiafbgq. Y éb ngríp Liafbgq; hfkjsg ef hfníp hkfeseripkbf rfkkgrqpdgeqg. Geqfergl bg grtpape dpef, y bg ngufbbpape mseqf p bfl vpnfl ngb Mfknáe. Y dskigkfe geqfergl ng bfl ng Gckpíe rspkgeqp y nfl dib. 7 Y Mgcqé mszuó p Ilkpgb lgil pñfl; y dskió Mgcqé upbppniqp, y csg lghsbqpnf ge sep ng bpl risnpngl ng Upbppn. 

Iazáe, Gbóe y Panóe, msgrgl ng Ilkpgb

8 Nglhsél ng éb mszuó p Ilkpgb Iazáe ng Agbée, 9 gb rspb qsvf qkgieqp timfl y qkgieqp timpl, bpl rspbgl rpló csgkp, y qfdó ng csgkp qkgieqp timpl hpkp lsl timfl; y mszuó p Ilkpgb ligqg pñfl. 10 Y dskió Iazáe, y csg lghsbqpnf ge Agbée. 11 Nglhsél ng éb mszuó p Ilkpgb Gbóe zpasbfeiqp, gb rspb mszuó p Ilkpgb nigz pñfl. 12 Y dskió Gbóe zpasbfeiqp, y csg lghsbqpnf ge Pmpbóe ge bp qigkkp ng Zpasbóe. 13 Nglhsél ng éb mszuó p Ilkpgb Panóe timf ng Tibgb, hikpqfeiqp. 14 Glqg qsvf rspkgeqp timfl y qkgieqp eigqfl, jsg rpapbupape lfakg lgqgeqp plefl; y mszuó p Ilkpgb frtf pñfl. 15 Y dskió Panóe timf ng Tibgb hikpqfeiqp, y csg lghsbqpnf ge Hikpqóe, ge bp qigkkp ng Gckpíe, ge gb dfeqg ng Pdpbgr. 

MSGRGL 13

Epridigeqf ng Lpelóe

1 Bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb vfbvigkfe p tprgk bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá; y Mgtfvá bfl geqkguó ge dpef ng bfl cibilqgfl hfk rspkgeqp pñfl. 2 Y tpaíp se tfdakg ng Zfkp, ng bp qkias ng Npe, gb rspb lg bbpdpap Dpefp; y ls dsmgk gkp glqékib, y eserp tpaíp qgeinf timfl. 3 P glqp dsmgk phpkgrió gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá, y bg nimf: Tg pjsí jsg qú gkgl glqékib, y eserp tpl qgeinf timfl; hgkf rfergaikál y npkál p bsz se timf. 4 Ptfkp, hsgl, ef agapl vief ei linkp, ei rfdpl rflp iedsenp. 5 Hsgl tg pjsí jsg rfergaikál y npkál p bsz se timf; y epvpmp ef hplpká lfakg ls rpagzp, hfkjsg gb eiñf lgká epzpkgf p Nifl nglng ls epridigeqf, y éb rfdgezpká p lpbvpk p Ilkpgb ng dpef ng bfl cibilqgfl. 6 Y bp dsmgk vief y lg bf rfeqó p ls dpkinf, nirigenf: Se vpkóe ng Nifl vief p dí, rsyf plhgrqf gkp rfdf gb plhgrqf ng se áeugb ng Nifl, qgdiabg ge ukpe dpegkp; y ef bg hkguseqé ng nóeng ei jsiée gkp, ei qpdhfrf éb dg nimf ls efdakg. 7 Y dg nimf: Tg pjsí jsg qú rfergaikál, y npkál p bsz se timf; hfk qpeqf, ptfkp ef agapl vief, ei linkp, ei rfdpl rflp iedsenp, hfkjsg glqg eiñf lgká epzpkgf p Nifl nglng ls epridigeqf tplqp gb níp ng ls dsgkqg. 

8 Geqfergl fkó Dpefp p Mgtfvá, y nimf: Pt, Lgñfk díf, yf qg ksguf jsg pjsgb vpkóe ng Nifl jsg geviplqg, vsgbvp ptfkp p vgeik p eflfqkfl, y efl gelgñg bf jsg tpypdfl ng tprgk rfe gb eiñf jsg tp ng eprgk. 9 Y Nifl fyó bp vfz ng Dpefp; y gb áeugb ng Nifl vfbvió fqkp vgz p bp dsmgk, glqpenf gbbp ge gb rpdhf; dpl ls dpkinf Dpefp ef glqpap rfe gbbp. 10 Y bp dsmgk rfkkió hkfeqpdgeqg p pvilpkbg p ls dpkinf, niriéenfbg: Dikp jsg lg dg tp phpkgrinf pjsgb vpkóe jsg vief p dí gb fqkf níp. 11 Y lg bgvpeqó Dpefp, y liusió p ls dsmgk; y vief pb vpkóe y bg nimf: ¿Gkgl qú pjsgb vpkóe jsg tpabó p bp dsmgk? Y éb nimf: Yf lfy. 12 Geqfergl Dpefp nimf: Rspenf qsl hpbpakpl lg rsdhbpe, ¿ródf ngag lgk bp dpegkp ng vivik ngb eiñf, y jsé ngagdfl tprgk rfe éb? 13 Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá kglhfenió p Dpefp: Bp dsmgk lg uspknpká ng qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg yf bg nimg. 14 Ef qfdpká epnp jsg hkfrgnp ng bp vin; ef agagká vief ei linkp, y ef rfdgká rflp iedsenp; uspknpká qfnf bf jsg bg dpené. 

15 Geqfergl Dpefp nimf pb áeugb ng Mgtfvá: Qg ksguf efl hgkdiqpl ngqgegkqg, y qg hkghpkpkgdfl se rpakiqf. 16 Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá kglhfenió p Dpefp: Psejsg dg ngqgeupl, ef rfdgké ng qs hpe; dpl li jsigkgl tprgk tfbfrpslqf, fckérgbf p Mgtfvá. Y ef lpaíp Dpefp jsg pjséb csglg áeugb ng Mgtfvá. 17 Geqfergl nimf Dpefp pb áeugb ng Mgtfvá: ¿Rsáb gl qs efdakg, hpkp jsg rspenf lg rsdhbp qs hpbpakp qg tfekgdfl? 18 Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá kglhfenió: ¿Hfk jsé hkguseqpl hfk di efdakg, jsg gl pndikpabg? 19 Y Dpefp qfdó se rpakiqf y sep fckgenp, y bfl fckgrió lfakg sep hgñp p Mgtfvá; y gb áeugb tizf dibpukf peqg bfl fmfl ng Dpefp y ng ls dsmgk. 20 Hfkjsg prfeqgrió jsg rspenf bp bbpdp lsaíp ngb pbqpk tprip gb rigbf, gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá lsaió ge bp bbpdp ngb pbqpk peqg bfl fmfl ng Dpefp y ng ls dsmgk, bfl rspbgl lg hflqkpkfe ge qigkkp. 

21 Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá ef vfbvió p phpkgrgk p Dpefp ei p ls dsmgk. Geqfergl rfefrió Dpefp jsg gkp gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá. 22 Y nimf Dpefp p ls dsmgk: Rigkqpdgeqg dfkikgdfl, hfkjsg p Nifl tgdfl vilqf. 23 Y ls dsmgk bg kglhfenió: Li Mgtfvá efl jsiligkp dpqpk, ef prghqpkíp ng esglqkpl dpefl gb tfbfrpslqf y bp fckgenp, ei efl tsaigkp dflqkpnf qfnpl glqpl rflpl, ei ptfkp efl tpakíp peseripnf glqf. 24 Y bp dsmgk nif p bsz se timf, y bg hslf hfk efdakg Lpelóe. Y gb eiñf rkgrió, y Mgtfvá bf agenimf. 25 Y gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá rfdgezó p dpeicglqpklg ge éb ge bfl rpdhpdgeqfl ng Npe, geqkg Zfkp y Glqpfb. 

Lpelóe y bp dsmgk cibilqgp ng Qidepq

MSGRGL 14

1 Nglrgenió Lpelóe p Qidepq, y vif ge Qidepq p sep dsmgk ng bpl timpl ng bfl cibilqgfl. 2 Y lsaió, y bf ngrbpkó p ls hpnkg y p ls dpnkg, nirigenf: Yf tg vilqf ge Qidepq sep dsmgk ng bpl timpl ng bfl cibilqgfl; fl ksguf jsg dg bp qfdéil hfk dsmgk. 3 Y ls hpnkg y ls dpnkg bg nimgkfe: ¿Ef tpy dsmgk geqkg bpl timpl ng qsl tgkdpefl, ei ge qfnf esglqkf hsgabf, hpkp jsg vpypl qú p qfdpk dsmgk ng bfl cibilqgfl ierikrserilfl? Y Lpelóe kglhfenió p ls hpnkg: Qódpdg élqp hfk dsmgk, hfkjsg gbbp dg pukpnp. 

4 Dpl ls hpnkg y ls dpnkg ef lpaípe jsg glqf vgeíp ng Mgtfvá, hfkjsg éb aslrpap frplióe rfeqkp bfl cibilqgfl; hsgl ge pjsgb qigdhf bfl cibilqgfl nfdiepape lfakg Ilkpgb. 

5 Y Lpelóe nglrgenió rfe ls hpnkg y rfe ls dpnkg p Qidepq; y rspenf bbgupkfe p bpl viñpl ng Qidepq, tg pjsí se bgóe mfvge jsg vgeíp ksuigenf tprip éb. 6 Y gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá vief lfakg Lpelóe, jsige nglhgnpzó pb bgóe rfdf jsige nglhgnpzp se rpakiqf, lie qgegk epnp ge ls dpef; y ef ngrbpkó ei p ls hpnkg ei p ls dpnkg bf jsg tpaíp tgrtf. 7 Nglrgenió, hsgl, y tpabó p bp dsmgk; y gbbp pukpnó p Lpelóe. 8 Y vfbvigenf nglhsél ng pbusefl nípl hpkp qfdpkbp, lg phpkqó ngb rpdief hpkp vgk gb rsgkhf dsgkqf ngb bgóe; y tg pjsí jsg ge gb rsgkhf ngb bgóe tpaíp se gempdakg ng pagmpl, y se hpepb ng digb. 9 Y qfdáenfbf ge lsl dpefl, lg csg rfdiéenfbf hfk gb rpdief; y rspenf pbrpezó p ls hpnkg y p ls dpnkg, bgl nif qpdaiée p gbbfl jsg rfdiglge; dpl ef bgl nglrsakió jsg tpaíp qfdpnf pjsgbbp digb ngb rsgkhf ngb bgóe. 

10 Vief, hsgl, ls hpnkg pnfeng glqpap bp dsmgk, y Lpelóe tizf pbbí apejsgqg; hfkjsg plí lfbípe tprgk bfl móvgegl. 11 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf gbbfl bg vigkfe, qfdpkfe qkgieqp rfdhpñgkfl hpkp jsg glqsviglge rfe éb. 12 Y Lpelóe bgl nimf: Yf fl hkfhfenké ptfkp se geiudp, y li ge bfl ligqg nípl ngb apejsgqg dg bf ngrbpkáil y nglrickáil, yf fl npké qkgieqp vglqinfl ng bief y qkgieqp vglqinfl ng ciglqp. 13 Dpl li ef dg bf hfnéil ngrbpkpk, geqfergl vflfqkfl dg npkéil p dí bfl qkgieqp vglqinfl ng bief y bfl vglqinfl ng ciglqp. Y gbbfl kglhfenigkfe: Hkfhóe qs geiudp, y bf fikgdfl. 14 Geqfergl bgl nimf: 


Ngb ngvfkpnfk lpbió rfdinp, 
Y ngb csgkqg lpbió nsbzskp. 

Y gbbfl ef hsnigkfe ngrbpkpkbg gb geiudp ge qkgl nípl. 

15 Pb léhqidf níp nimgkfe p bp dsmgk ng Lpelóe: Iensrg p qs dpkinf p jsg efl ngrbpkg glqg geiudp, hpkp jsg ef qg jsgdgdfl p qi y p bp rplp ng qs hpnkg. ¿Efl tpaéil bbpdpnf pjsí hpkp nglhfmpkefl? 16 Y bbfkó bp dsmgk ng Lpelóe ge hkglgerip ng éb, y nimf: Lfbpdgeqg dg pafkkgrgl, y ef dg pdpl, hsgl ef dg ngrbpkpl gb geiudp jsg hkfhslilqg p bfl timfl ng di hsgabf. Y éb kglhfenió: Tg pjsí jsg ei p di hpnkg ei p di dpnkg bf tg ngrbpkpnf, ¿y qg bf tpaíp ng ngrbpkpk p qi? 17 Y gbbp bbfkó ge hkglgerip ng éb bfl ligqg nípl jsg gbbfl qsvigkfe apejsgqg; dpl pb léhqidf níp éb lg bf ngrbpkó, hfkjsg bg hkglifepap; y gbbp bf ngrbpkó p bfl timfl ng ls hsgabf. 18 Pb léhqidf níp, peqgl jsg gb lfb lg hsliglg, bfl ng bp risnpn bg nimgkfe: 


¿Jsé rflp dál nsbrg jsg bp digb? 
¿Y jsé rflp dál csgkqg jsg gb bgóe? 

Y éb bgl kglhfenió: 


Li ef pkplgil rfe di efvibbp, 
Eserp tsaigkpil nglrsaigkqf di geiudp. 19 Y gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá vief lfakg éb, y nglrgenió p Plrpbóe y dpqó p qkgieqp tfdakgl ng gbbfl; y qfdpenf lsl nglhfmfl, nif bpl dsnpl ng vglqinfl p bfl jsg tpaípe gxhbirpnf gb geiudp; y gergeninf ge gefmf lg vfbvió p bp rplp ng ls hpnkg. 20 Y bp dsmgk ng Lpelóe csg npnp p ls rfdhpñgkf, pb rspb éb tpaíp qkpqpnf rfdf ls pdiuf. 



MSGRGL 15

1 Prfeqgrió nglhsél ng pbuúe qigdhf, jsg ge bfl nípl ng bp ligup ngb qkiuf Lpelóe viliqó p ls dsmgk rfe se rpakiqf, nirigenf: Geqkpké p di dsmgk ge gb phflgeqf. Dpl gb hpnkg ng gbbp ef bf ngmó geqkpk. 2 Y nimf gb hpnkg ng gbbp: Dg hgklspní ng jsg bp pafkkgrípl, y bp ni p qs rfdhpñgkf. Dpl ls tgkdpep dgefk, ¿ef gl dál tgkdflp jsg gbbp? Qódpbp, hsgl, ge ls bsupk. 3 Geqfergl bg nimf Lpelóe: Lie rsbhp lgké glqp vgz kglhgrqf ng bfl cibilqgfl, li dpb bgl tirigkg. 4 Y csg Lpelóe y rpzó qkglrigeqpl zfkkpl, y qfdó qgpl, y mseqó rfbp rfe rfbp, y hslf sep qgp geqkg rpnp nfl rfbpl. 5 Nglhsél, gergenigenf bpl qgpl, lfbqó bpl zfkkpl ge bfl lgdakpnfl ng bfl cibilqgfl, y jsgdó bpl diglgl pdfeqfepnpl y ge hig, viñpl y fbivpkgl. 6 Y nimgkfe bfl cibilqgfl: ¿Jsiée tizf glqf? Y bgl rfeqglqpkfe: Lpelóe, gb ygkef ngb qidepqgf, hfkjsg bg jsiqó ls dsmgk y bp nif p ls rfdhpñgkf. Y vieigkfe bfl cibilqgfl y bp jsgdpkfe p gbbp y p ls hpnkg. 7 Geqfergl Lpelóe bgl nimf: Yp jsg plí tpaéil tgrtf, mskf jsg dg vgeupké ng vflfqkfl, y nglhsél nglilqiké. 8 Y bfl tikió rpngkp y dslbf rfe ukpe dfkqpenpn; y nglrgenió y tpaiqó ge bp rsgvp ng bp hgñp ng Gqpd. 

Lpelóe ngkkfqp p bfl cibilqgfl ge Bgti

9 Geqfergl bfl cibilqgfl lsaigkfe y prpdhpkfe ge Msná, y lg gxqgenigkfe hfk Bgti. 10 Y bfl vpkfegl ng Msná bgl nimgkfe: ¿Hfk jsé tpaéil lsainf rfeqkp eflfqkfl? Y gbbfl kglhfenigkfe: P hkgengk p Lpelóe tgdfl lsainf, hpkp tprgkbg rfdf éb efl tp tgrtf. 11 Y vieigkfe qkgl dib tfdakgl ng Msná p bp rsgvp ng bp hgñp ng Gqpd, y nimgkfe p Lpelóe: ¿Ef lpagl qú jsg bfl cibilqgfl nfdiepe lfakg eflfqkfl? ¿Hfk jsé efl tpl tgrtf glqf? Y éb bgl kglhfenió: Yf bgl tg tgrtf rfdf gbbfl dg tirigkfe. 12 Gbbfl geqfergl bg nimgkfe: Eflfqkfl tgdfl vgeinf hpkp hkgengkqg y geqkgupkqg ge dpef ng bfl cibilqgfl. Y Lpelóe bgl kglhfenió: Mskpndg jsg vflfqkfl ef dg dpqpkéil. 13 Y gbbfl bg kglhfenigkfe, nirigenf: Ef; lfbpdgeqg qg hkgengkgdfl, y qg geqkgupkgdfl ge lsl dpefl; dpl ef qg dpqpkgdfl. Geqfergl bg pqpkfe rfe nfl rsgknpl esgvpl, y bg tirigkfe vgeik ng bp hgñp. 

14 Y plí jsg vief tplqp Bgti, bfl cibilqgfl lpbigkfe ukiqpenf p ls gersgeqkf; hgkf gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá vief lfakg éb, y bpl rsgknpl jsg glqpape ge lsl akpzfl lg vfbvigkfe rfdf bief jsgdpnf rfe csguf, y bpl pqpnskpl lg rpygkfe ng lsl dpefl. 15 Y tpbbpenf sep jsimpnp ng plef ckglrp púe, gxqgenió bp dpef y bp qfdó, y dpqó rfe gbbp p dib tfdakgl. 16 Geqfergl Lpelóe nimf: 


Rfe bp jsimpnp ng se plef, se dfeqóe, nfl dfeqfegl; 
Rfe bp jsimpnp ng se plef dpqé p dib tfdakgl. 17 Y prpapenf ng tpabpk, pkkfmó ng ls dpef bp jsimpnp, y bbpdó p pjsgb bsupk Kpdpq-bgti. 



18 Y qgeigenf ukpe lgn, rbpdó bsguf p Mgtfvá, y nimf: Qú tpl npnf glqp ukpeng lpbvprióe hfk dpef ng qs ligkvf; ¿y dfkiké yf ptfkp ng lgn, y rpgké ge dpef ng bfl ierikrserilfl? 19 Geqfergl pakió Nifl bp rsgerp jsg tpy ge Bgti; y lpbió ng pbbí pusp, y éb agaió, y kgrfakó ls glhíkiqs, y lg kgpeidó. Hfk glqf bbpdó gb efdakg ng pjsgb bsupk, Ge-tprfkg, gb rspb glqá ge Bgti, tplqp tfy. 20 Y mszuó p Ilkpgb ge bfl nípl ng bfl cibilqgfl vgieqg pñfl. 

Lpelóe ge Upzp

MSGRGL 16

1 Csg Lpelóe p Upzp, y vif pbbí p sep dsmgk kpdgkp, y lg bbguó p gbbp. 2 Y csg nirtf p bfl ng Upzp: Lpelóe tp vgeinf prá. Y bf kfngpkfe, y prgrtpkfe qfnp pjsgbbp efrtg p bp hsgkqp ng bp risnpn; y glqsvigkfe rpbbpnfl qfnp pjsgbbp efrtg, nirigenf: Tplqp bp bsz ng bp dpñpep; geqfergl bf dpqpkgdfl. 3 Dpl Lpelóe nskdió tplqp bp dgnipefrtg; y p bp dgnipefrtg lg bgvpeqó, y qfdpenf bpl hsgkqpl ng bp risnpn rfe lsl nfl hibpkgl y ls rgkkfmf, lg bpl grtó pb tfdakf, y lg csg y bpl lsaió p bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng Tgakóe. 

Lpelóe y Npbibp

4 Nglhsél ng glqf prfeqgrió jsg lg gepdfkó ng sep dsmgk ge gb vpbbg ng Lfkgr, bp rspb lg bbpdpap Npbibp. 5 Y vieigkfe p gbbp bfl hkíerihgl ng bfl cibilqgfl, y bg nimgkfe: Geuáñpbg g iecókdpqg ge jsé rfelilqg ls ukpe csgkzp, y ródf bf hfnkípdfl vgergk, hpkp jsg bf pqgdfl y bf nfdiegdfl; y rpnp sef ng eflfqkfl qg npká dib rige lirbfl ng hbpqp. 6 Y Npbibp nimf p Lpelóe: Yf qg ksguf jsg dg ngrbpkgl ge jsé rfelilqg qs ukpe csgkzp, y ródf hfnkál lgk pqpnf hpkp lgk nfdiepnf. 7 Y bg kglhfenió Lpelóe: Li dg pqpkge rfe ligqg didakgl vgkngl jsg púe ef glqée gemsqfl, geqfergl dg ngaibiqpké y lgké rfdf rspbjsigkp ng bfl tfdakgl. 8 Y bfl hkíerihgl ng bfl cibilqgfl bg qkpmgkfe ligqg didakgl vgkngl jsg púe ef glqpape gemsqfl, y gbbp bg pqó rfe gbbfl. 9 Y gbbp qgeíp tfdakgl ge prgrtf ge gb phflgeqf. Geqfergl gbbp bg nimf: ¡Lpelóe, bfl cibilqgfl rfeqkp qi! Y éb kfdhió bfl didakgl, rfdf lg kfdhg sep rsgknp ng glqfhp rspenf qfrp gb csguf; y ef lg lshf gb lgrkgqf ng ls csgkzp. 

10 Geqfergl Npbibp nimf p Lpelóe: Tg pjsí qú dg tpl geupñpnf, y dg tpl nirtf dgeqikpl; nglrúakgdg, hsgl, ptfkp, qg ksguf, ródf hfnkál lgk pqpnf. 11 Y éb bg nimf: Li dg pqpkge csgkqgdgeqg rfe rsgknpl esgvpl jsg ef lg tpype slpnf, yf dg ngaibiqpké, y lgké rfdf rspbjsigkp ng bfl tfdakgl. 12 Y Npbibp qfdó rsgknpl esgvpl, y bg pqó rfe gbbpl, y bg nimf: ¡Lpelóe, bfl cibilqgfl lfakg qi! Y bfl glhípl glqpape ge gb phflgeqf. Dpl éb bpl kfdhió ng lsl akpzfl rfdf se tibf. 

13 Y Npbibp nimf p Lpelóe: Tplqp ptfkp dg geupñpl, y qkpqpl rfediuf rfe dgeqikpl. Nglrúakgdg, hsgl, ptfkp, ródf hfnkál lgk pqpnf. Gb geqfergl bg nimf: Li qgmigkgl ligqg usgngmpl ng di rpagzp rfe bp qgbp y bpl plguskpkgl rfe bp glqprp. 14 Y gbbp bpl plguskó rfe bp glqprp, y bg nimf: ¡Lpelóe, bfl cibilqgfl lfakg qi! Dpl nglhgkqpenf éb ng ls lsgñf, pkkperó bp glqprp ngb qgbpk rfe bp qgbp. 

15 Y gbbp bg nimf: ¿Ródf nirgl: Yf qg pdf, rspenf qs rfkpzóe ef glqá rfediuf? Yp dg tpl geupñpnf qkgl vgrgl, y ef dg tpl nglrsaigkqf púe ge jsé rfelilqg qs ukpe csgkzp. 16 Y prfeqgrió jsg, hkglifeáenfbg gbbp rpnp níp rfe lsl hpbpakpl g idhfkqseáenfbg, ls pbdp csg kgnsrinp p dfkqpb peuslqip. 17 Bg nglrsakió, hsgl, qfnf ls rfkpzóe, y bg nmif: Eserp p di rpagzp bbguó epvpmp; hfkjsg lfy epzpkgf ng Nifl nglng gb vigeqkg ng di dpnkg. Li csgkg kphpnf, di csgkzp lg phpkqpká ng dí, y dg ngaibiqpké y lgké rfdf qfnfl bfl tfdakgl. 

18 Vigenf Npbibp jsg éb bg tpaíp nglrsaigkqf qfnf ls rfkpzóe, gevió p bbpdpk p bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl cibilqgfl, nirigenf: Vgein glqp vgz, hfkjsg éb dg tp nglrsaigkqf qfnf ls rfkpzóe. Y bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl cibilqgfl vieigkfe p gbbp, qkpygenf ge ls dpef gb niegkf. 19 Y gbbp tizf jsg éb lg nskdiglg lfakg lsl kfnibbpl, y bbpdó p se tfdakg, jsige bg kphó bpl ligqg usgngmpl ng ls rpagzp; y gbbp rfdgezó p pcbiuikbf, hsgl ls csgkzp lg phpkqó ng éb. 20 Y bg nimf: ¡Lpelóe, bfl cibilqgfl lfakg qi! Y bsguf jsg nglhgkqó éb ng ls lsgñf, lg nimf: Glqp vgz lpbnké rfdf bpl fqkpl y dg glrphpké. Hgkf éb ef lpaíp jsg Mgtfvá yp lg tpaíp phpkqpnf ng éb. 21 Dpl bfl cibilqgfl bg grtpkfe dpef, y bg lprpkfe bfl fmfl, y bg bbgvpkfe p Upzp; y bg pqpkfe rfe rpngepl hpkp jsg dfbiglg ge bp rákrgb. 22 Y gb rpagbbf ng ls rpagzp rfdgezó p rkgrgk, nglhsél jsg csg kphpnf. 

Dsgkqg ng Lpelóe

23 Geqfergl bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl cibilqgfl lg mseqpkfe hpkp fckgrgk lprkicirif p Npuóe ls nifl y hpkp pbgukpklg; y nimgkfe: Esglqkf nifl geqkguó ge esglqkpl dpefl p Lpelóe esglqkf gegdiuf. 24 Y viéenfbf gb hsgabf, pbpapkfe p ls nifl, nirigenf: Esglqkf nifl geqkguó ge esglqkpl dpefl p esglqkf gegdiuf, y pb nglqksinfk ng esglqkp qigkkp, gb rspb tpaíp npnf dsgkqg p dsrtfl ng eflfqkfl. 25 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf lieqigkfe pbgukíp ge ls rfkpzóe, nimgkfe: Bbpdpn p Lpelóe, hpkp jsg efl nivigkqp. Y bbpdpkfe p Lpelóe ng bp rákrgb, y likvió ng msusgqg ngbpeqg ng gbbfl; y bf hsligkfe geqkg bpl rfbsdepl. 26 Geqfergl Lpelóe nimf pb mfvge jsg bg usipap ng bp dpef: Prékrpdg, y tpzdg hpbhpk bpl rfbsdepl lfakg bpl jsg nglrpelp bp rplp, hpkp jsg dg phfyg lfakg gbbpl. 27 Y bp rplp glqpap bbgep ng tfdakgl y dsmgkgl, y qfnfl bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl cibilqgfl glqpape pbbí; y ge gb hilf pbqf tpaíp rfdf qkgl dib tfdakgl y dsmgkgl, jsg glqpape dikpenf gb glrpkeif ng Lpelóe. 

28 Geqfergl rbpdó Lpelóe p Mgtfvá, y nimf: Lgñfk Mgtfvá, prséknpqg ptfkp ng dí, y cfkqpbérgdg, qg ksguf, lfbpdgeqg glqp vgz, ft Nifl, hpkp jsg ng sep vgz qfdg vgeupezp ng bfl cibilqgfl hfk dil nfl fmfl. 29 Plió bsguf Lpelóe bpl nfl rfbsdepl ng ge dgnif, lfakg bpl jsg nglrpelpap bp rplp, y grtó qfnf ls hglf lfakg gbbpl, ls dpef ngkgrtp lfakg sep y ls dpef izjsigknp lfakg bp fqkp. 30 Y nimf Lpelóe: Dsgkp yf rfe bfl cibilqgfl. Geqfergl lg ierbieó rfe qfnp ls csgkzp, y rpyó bp rplp lfakg bfl hkierihpbgl, y lfakg qfnf gb hsgabf jsg glqpap ge gbbp. Y bfl jsg dpqó pb dfkik csgkfe dsrtfl dál jsg bfl jsg tpaíp dpqpnf nskpeqg ls vinp. 31 Y nglrgenigkfe lsl tgkdpefl y qfnp bp rplp ng ls hpnkg, y bg qfdpkfe, y bg bbgvpkfe, y bg lghsbqpkfe geqkg Zfkp y Glqpfb, ge gb lghsbrkf ng ls hpnkg Dpefp. Y éb mszuó p Ilkpgb vgieqg pñfl. 

Bpl idáugegl y gb lprgknfqg ng Dirpíp

MSGRGL 17

1 Tsaf se tfdakg ngb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, jsg lg bbpdpap Dirpíp, 2 gb rspb nimf p ls dpnkg: Bfl dib rige lirbfl ng hbpqp jsg qg csgkfe tskqpnfl, prgkrp ng bfl rspbgl dpbnimilqg, y ng bfl rspbgl dg tpabplqg, tg pjsí gb niegkf glqá ge di hfngk; yf bf qfdé. Geqfergl bp dpnkg nimf: Ageniqf lgpl ng Mgtfvá, timf díf. 3 Y éb ngvfbvió bfl dib rige lirbfl ng hbpqp p ls dpnkg; y ls dpnkg nimf: Ge vgknpn tg ngnirpnf gb niegkf p Mgtfvá hfk di timf, hpkp tprgk sep idpuge ng qpbbp y sep ng csenirióe; ptfkp, hsgl, yf qg bf ngvsgbvf. 4 Dpl éb ngvfbvió gb niegkf p ls dpnkg, y qfdó ls dpnkg nflrigeqfl lirbfl ng hbpqp y bfl nif pb cseninfk, jsige tizf ng gbbfl sep idpuge ng qpbbp y sep ng csenirióe, bp rspb csg hsglqp ge bp rplp ng Dirpíp. 5 Y glqg tfdakg Dirpíp qsvf rplp ng niflgl, g tizf gcfn y qgkpciegl, y rfelpukó p sef ng lsl timfl hpkp jsg csgkp ls lprgknfqg. 6 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl ef tpaíp kgy ge Ilkpgb; rpnp sef tpríp bf jsg aige bg hpkgríp. 

7 Y tpaíp se mfvge ng Agbée ng Msná, ng bp qkias ng Msná, gb rspb gkp bgviqp, y cfkplqgkf pbbí. 8 Glqg tfdakg hpkqió ng bp risnpn ng Agbée ng Msná hpkp ik p vivik nfeng hsnigkp gerfeqkpk bsupk; y bbgupenf ge ls rpdief pb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, vief p rplp ng Dirpíp. 9 Y Dirpíp bg nimf: ¿Ng nóeng vigegl? Y gb bgviqp bg kglhfenió: Lfy ng Agbée ng Msná, y vfy p vivik nfeng hsgnp gerfeqkpk bsupk. 10 Geqfergl Dirpíp bg nimf: Jsénpqg ge di rplp, y lgkál hpkp dí hpnkg y lprgknfqg; y yf qg npké nigz lirbfl ng hbpqp hfk pñf, vglqinfl y rfdinp. Y gb bgviqp lg jsgnó. 11 Pukpnó, hsgl, pb bgviqp dfkpk rfe pjsgb tfdakg, y csg hpkp éb rfdf sef ng lsl timfl. 12 Y Dirpíp rfelpukó pb bgviqp, y pjsgb mfvge bg lgkvíp ng lprgknfqg, y hgkdpegrió ge rplp ng Dirpíp. 13 Y Dirpíp nimf: Ptfkp lé jsg Mgtfvá dg hkflhgkpká, hfkjsg qgeuf se bgviqp hfk lprgknfqg. 

Dirpíp y bfl tfdakgl ng Npe

MSGRGL 18

1 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl ef tpaíp kgy ge Ilkpgb. Y ge pjsgbbfl nípl bp qkias ng Npe aslrpap hflglióe hpkp lí nfeng tpaiqpk, hfkjsg tplqp geqfergl ef tpaíp qgeinf hflglióe geqkg bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. 2 Y bfl timfl ng Npe gevipkfe ng ls qkias rierf tfdakgl ng geqkg gbbfl, tfdakgl vpbigeqgl, ng Zfkp y Glqpfb, hpkp jsg kgrfefriglge y gxhbfkplge aige bp qigkkp; y bgl nimgkfe: In y kgrfefrgn bp qigkkp. Glqfl vieigkfe pb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, tplqp bp rplp ng Dirpíp, y pbbí hflpkfe. 3 Rspenf glqpape rgkrp ng bp rplp ng Dirpíp, kgrfefrigkfe bp vfz ngb mfvge bgviqp; y bbgupenf pbbá, bg nimgkfe: ¿Jsiée qg tp qkpínf prá? ¿y jsé tprgl pjsí? ¿y jsé qigegl qú hfk pjsí? 4 Gb bgl kglhfenió: Ng glqp y ng glqp dpegkp tp tgrtf rfediuf Dirpíp, y dg tp qfdpnf hpkp jsg lgp ls lprgknfqg. 5 Y gbbfl bg nimgkfe: Hkguseqp, hsgl, ptfkp p Nifl, hpkp jsg lghpdfl li tp ng hkflhgkpk glqg vipmg jsg tprgdfl. 6 Y gb lprgknfqg bgl kglhfenió: In ge hpz; ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá glqá vsglqkf rpdief ge jsg penáil. 

7 Geqfergl pjsgbbfl rierf tfdakgl lpbigkfe, y vieigkfe p Bpil; y vigkfe jsg gb hsgabf jsg tpaiqpap ge gbbp glqpap lguskf, friflf y rfecipnf, rfecfkdg p bp rflqsdakg ng bfl ng Linóe, lie jsg epnig ge pjsgbbp kguióe bgl hgkqskaplg ge rflp pbusep, ei tpaíp jsige hflgyglg gb kgief. Y glqpape bgmfl ng bfl linfeifl, y ef qgeípe egufrifl rfe epnig. 8 Vfbvigenf, hsgl, gbbfl p lsl tgkdpefl ge Zfkp y Glqpfb, lsl tgkdpefl bgl nimgkfe: ¿Jsé tpy? Y gbbfl kglhfenigkfe: 9 Bgvpeqpfl, lsapdfl rfeqkp gbbfl; hfkjsg eflfqkfl tgdfl gxhbfkpnf bp kguióe, y tgdfl vilqf jsg gl dsy asgep; ¿y vflfqkfl ef tpkéil epnp? Ef lgáil hgkgzflfl ge hfegkfl ge dpkrtp hpkp ik p qfdpk hflglióe ng bp qigkkp. 10 Rspenf vpyáil, bbgupkéil p se hsgabf rfecipnf y p sep qigkkp dsy glhpriflp, hsgl Nifl bp tp geqkgupnf ge vsglqkpl dpefl; bsupk nfeng ef tpy cpbqp ng rflp pbusep jsg tpyp ge bp qigkkp. 

11 Geqfergl lpbigkfe ng pbbí, ng Zfkp y ng Glqpfb, lgilrigeqfl tfdakgl ng bp cpdibip ng Npe, pkdpnfl ng pkdpl ng usgkkp. 12 Csgkfe y prpdhpkfe ge Jsikipq-mgpkid ge Msná, hfk bf rspb bbpdpkfe p pjsgb bsupk gb rpdhpdgeqf ng Npe, tplqp tfy; glqá pb frringeqg ng Jsikipq-mgpkid. 13 Y ng pbbí hplpkfe pb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, y vieigkfe tplqp bp rplp ng Dirpíp. 

14 Geqfergl pjsgbbfl rierf tfdakgl jsg tpaípe inf p kgrfefrgk bp qigkkp ng Bpil nimgkfe p lsl tgkdpefl: ¿Ef lpaéil jsg ge glqpl rplpl tpy gcfn y qgkpciegl, y sep idpuge ng qpbbp y sep ng csenirióe? Dikpn, hfk qpeqf, bf jsg tpaéil ng tprgk. 15 Rspenf bbgupkfe pbbá, vieigkfe p bp rplp ngb mfvge bgviqp, ge rplp ng Dirpíp, y bg hkguseqpkfe ródf glqpap. 16 Y bfl lgilrigeqfl tfdakgl, jsg gkpe ng bfl timfl ng Npe, glqpape pkdpnfl ng lsl pkdpl ng usgkkp p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp. 17 Y lsaigenf bfl rierf tfdakgl jsg tpaípe inf p kgrfefrgk bp qigkkp, geqkpkfe pbbá y qfdpkfe bp idpuge ng qpbbp, gb gcfn, bfl qgkpciegl y bp idpuge ng csenirióe, digeqkpl glqpap gb lprgknfqg p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp rfe bfl lgilrigeqfl tfdakgl pkdpnfl ng pkdpl ng usgkkp. 18 Geqkpenf, hsgl, pjsébbfl ge bp rplp ng Dirpíp, qfdpkfe bp idpuge ng qpbbp, gb gcfn, bfl qgkpciegl y bp idpuge ng csenirióe. Y gb lprgknfqg bgl nimf: ¿Jsé tpréil vflfqkfl? 19 Y gbbfl bg kglhfenigkfe: Rpbbp, hfe bp dpef lfakg qs afrp, y vgeqg rfe eflfqkfl, hpkp jsg lgpl esglqkf hpnkg y lprgknfqg. ¿Gl dgmfk jsg lgpl qú lprgknfqg ge rplp ng se lfbf tfdakg, jsg ng sep qkias y cpdibip ng Ilkpgb? 20 Y lg pbgukó gb rfkpzóe ngb lprgknfqg, gb rspb qfdó gb gcfn y bfl qgkpciegl y bp idpuge, y lg csg ge dgnif ngb hsgabf. 

21 Y gbbfl lg vfbvigkfe y hpkqigkfe, y hsligkfe bfl eiñfl, gb upepnf y gb apupmg hfk ngbpeqg. 22 Rspenf yp lg tpaípe pbgmpnf ng bp rplp ng Dirpíp, bfl tfdakgl jsg tpaiqpape ge bpl rplpl rgkrpepl p bp rplp ng Dirpíp lg mseqpkfe y liusigkfe p bfl timfl ng Npe. 23 Y npenf vfrgl p bfl ng Npe, élqfl vfbvigkfe lsl kflqkfl, y nimgkfe p Dirpíp: ¿Jsé qigegl, jsg tpl mseqpnf ugeqg? 24 Gb kglhfenió: Qfdplqgil dil niflgl jsg yf tirg y pb lprgknfqg, y fl vpil; ¿jsé dál dg jsgnp? ¿Hfk jsé, hsgl, dg ngríl: ¿Jsé qigegl? 25 Y bfl timfl ng Npe bg nimgkfe: Ef ngl vfrgl qkpl eflfqkfl, ef lgp jsg bfl ng áeidf rfbékirf fl prfdgqpe, y higknpl qpdaiée qs vinp y bp vinp ng bfl qsyfl. 26 Y hkfliusigkfe bfl timfl ng Npe ls rpdief, y Dirpíp, vigenf jsg gkpe dál csgkqgl jsg éb, vfbvió y kgukgló p ls rplp. 

27 Y gbbfl, bbgvpenf bpl rflpl jsg tpaíp tgrtf Dirpíp, mseqpdgeqg rfe gb lprgknfqg jsg qgeíp, bbgupkfe p Bpil, pb hsgabf qkpejsibf y rfecipnf; y bfl tikigkfe p cibf ng glhpnp, y jsgdpkfe bp risnpn. 28 Y ef tsaf jsige bfl ngcgeniglg, hfkjsg glqpape bgmfl ng Linóe, y ef qgeípe egufrifl rfe epnig. Y bp risnpn glqpap ge gb vpbbg jsg tpy mseqf p Agq-kgtfa. Bsguf kggnicirpkfe bp risnpn, y tpaiqpkfe ge gbbp. 29 Y bbpdpkfe gb efdakg ng pjsgbbp risnpn Npe, rfecfkdg pb efdakg ng Npe ls hpnkg, timf ng Ilkpgb, aige jsg peqgl lg bbpdpap bp risnpn Bpil. 30 Y bfl timfl ng Npe bgvpeqpkfe hpkp lí bp idpuge ng qpbbp; y Mfepqáe timf ng Ugklóe, timf ng Dfilél, éb y lsl timfl csgkfe lprgknfqgl ge bp qkias ng Npe, tplqp gb níp ngb rpsqivgkif ng bp qigkkp. 31 Plí qsvigkfe bgvpeqpnp geqkg gbbfl bp idpuge ng qpbbp jsg Dirpíp tpaíp tgrtf, qfnf gb qigdhf jsg bp rplp ng Nifl glqsvf ge Libf. 

Gb bgviqp y ls rfersaiep

MSGRGL 19

1 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl, rspenf ef tpaíp kgy ge Ilkpgb, tsaf se bgviqp jsg dfkpap rfdf cfkplqgkf ge bp hpkqg dál kgdfqp ngb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, gb rspb tpaíp qfdpnf hpkp lí dsmgk rfersaiep ng Agbée ng Msná. 2 Y ls rfersaiep bg csg iecigb, y lg csg ng éb p rplp ng ls hpnkg, p Agbée ng Msná, y glqsvf pbbá nskpeqg rspqkf dglgl. 3 Y lg bgvpeqó ls dpkinf y bp liusió, hpkp tpabpkbg pdfkflpdgeqg y tprgkbp vfbvgk; y bbgvpap rfeliuf se rkipnf, y se hpk ng plefl; y gbbp bg tizf geqkpk ge bp rplp ng ls hpnkg. 4 Y viéenfbg gb hpnkg ng bp mfvge, lpbió p kgriaikbg ufzflf; y bg ngqsvf ls lsgukf, gb hpnkg ng bp mfvge, y jsgnó ge ls rplp qkgl nípl, rfdigenf y agaigenf y pbfmáenflg pbbí. 5 Pb rspkqf níp, rspenf lg bgvpeqpkfe ng dpñpep, lg bgvpeqó qpdaiée gb bgviqp hpkp iklg; y gb hpnkg ng bp mfvge nimf p ls ygkef: Rfecfkqp qs rfkpzóe rfe se afrpnf ng hpe, y nglhsél fl ikéil. 6 Y lg lgeqpkfe gbbfl nfl mseqfl, y rfdigkfe y agaigkfe. Y gb hpnkg ng bp mfvge nimf pb vpkóe: Yf qg ksguf jsg jsigkpl hplpk pjsí bp efrtg, y lg pbgukpká qs rfkpzóe. 7 Y lg bgvpeqó gb vpkóe hpkp iklg, hgkf ielilqió ls lsgukf, y vfbvió p hplpk pbbí bp efrtg. 8 Pb jsieqf níp, bgvpeqáenflg ng dpñpep hpkp iklg, bg nimf gb hpnkg ng bp mfvge: Rfecfkqp ptfkp qs rfkpzóe, y puspknp tplqp jsg ngrbieg gb níp. Y rfdigkfe pdafl mseqfl. 9 Bsguf lg bgvpeqó gb vpkóe hpkp iklg, éb y ls rfersaiep y ls rkipnf. Geqfergl ls lsgukf, gb hpnkg ng bp mfvge, bg nimf: Tg pjsí yp gb níp ngrbiep hpkp pefrtgrgk, qg ksguf jsg hpléil pjsí bp efrtg; tg pjsí jsg gb níp lg prpap, nsgkdg pjsí, hpkp jsg lg pbgukg qs rfkpzóe; y dpñpep fl bgvpeqpkéil qgdhkpef p vsglqkf rpdief y qg ikál p qs rplp. 

10 Dpl gb tfdakg ef jsilf hplpk pbbí bp efrtg, lief jsg lg bgvpeqó y lg csg, y bbguó tplqp geckgeqg ng Mgaúl, jsg gl Mgkslpbée, rfe ls hpk ng plefl gelibbpnfl, y ls rfersaiep. 11 Y glqpenf yp mseqf p Mgaúl, gb níp tpaíp ngrbiepnf dsrtf; y nimf gb rkipnf p ls lgñfk: Vge ptfkp, y vádfefl p glqp risnpn ng bfl mgaslgfl, hpkp jsg hplgdfl ge gbbp bp efrtg. 12 Y ls lgñfk bg kglhfenió: Ef ikgdfl p eieusep risnpn ng gxqkpemgkfl, jsg ef lgp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, lief jsg hplpkgdfl tplqp Upapp. Y nimf p ls rkipnf: 13 Vge, liupdfl tplqp sef ng glfl bsupkgl, hpkp hplpk bp efrtg ge Upapp f ge Kpdá. 14 Hplpenf, hsgl, rpdiepkfe, y lg bgl hslf gb lfb mseqf p Upapp jsg gkp ng Agempdíe. 15 Y lg phpkqpkfe ngb rpdief hpkp geqkpk p hplpk pbbí bp efrtg ge Upapp; y geqkpenf, lg lgeqpkfe ge bp hbpzp ng bp risnpn, hfkjsg ef tsaf jsige bfl prfuiglg ge rplp hpkp hplpk bp efrtg. 

16 Y tg pjsí se tfdakg vigmf jsg vgeíp ng ls qkpapmf ngb rpdhf pb pefrtgrgk, gb rspb gkp ngb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, y dfkpap rfdf cfkplqgkf ge Upapp; hgkf bfl dfkpnfkgl ng pjsgb bsupk gkpe timfl ng Agempdíe. 17 Y pbzpenf gb vigmf bfl fmfl, vif p pjsgb rpdiepeqg ge bp hbpzp ng bp risnpn, y bg nimf: ¿P nóeng vpl, y ng nóeng vigegl? 18 Y éb kglhfenió: Hplpdfl ng Agbée ng Msná p bp hpkqg dál kgdfqp ngb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, ng nfeng lfy; y tpaíp inf p Agbée ng Msná; dpl ptfkp vfy p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y ef tpy jsige dg kgriap ge rplp. 19 Eflfqkfl qgegdfl hpmp y cfkkpmg hpkp esglqkfl plefl, y qpdaiée qgegdfl hpe y vief hpkp dí y hpkp qs ligkvp, y hpkp gb rkipnf jsg glqá rfe qs ligkvf; ef efl tprg cpbqp epnp. 20 Y gb tfdakg peripef nimf: Hpz lgp rfeqiuf; qs egrglinpn qfnp jsgng lfbpdgeqg p di rpkuf, rfe qpb jsg ef hplgl bp efrtg ge bp hbpzp. 21 Y bfl qkpmf p ls rplp, y nif ng rfdgk p lsl plefl; y lg bpvpkfe bfl higl, y rfdigkfe y agaigkfe. 

22 Hgkf rspenf glqpape ufzflfl, tg pjsí jsg bfl tfdakgl ng pjsgbbp risnpn, tfdakgl hgkvgklfl, kfngpkfe bp rplp, ufbhgpenf p bp hsgkqp; y tpabpkfe pb peripef, nsgñf ng bp rplp, nirigenf: Lprp pb tfdakg jsg tp geqkpnf ge qs rplp, hpkp jsg bf rfefzrpdfl. 23 Y lpbió p gbbfl gb nsgñf ng bp rplp y bgl nimf: Ef, tgkdpefl dífl, fl ksguf jsg ef rfdgqáil glqg dpb; yp jsg glqg tfdakg tp geqkpnf ge di rplp, ef tpuáil glqp dpbnpn. 24 Tg pjsí di timp vikuge, y bp rfersaiep ng éb; yf fl bpl lprpké ptfkp; tsdibbpnbpl y tprgn rfe gbbpl rfdf fl hpkgzrp, y ef tpuáil p glqg tfdakg rflp qpe iecpdg. 25 Dpl pjsgbbfl tfdakgl ef bg jsiligkfe fík; hfk bf jsg qfdpenf pjsgb tfdakg p ls rfersaiep, bp lpró; y geqkpkfe p gbbp, y paslpkfe ng gbbp qfnp bp efrtg tplqp bp dpñpep, y bp ngmpkfe rspenf phseqpap gb pbap. 26 Y rspenf yp pdpegríp, vief bp dsmgk, y rpyó ngbpeqg ng bp hsgkqp ng bp rplp ng pjsgb tfdakg nfeng ls lgñfk glqpap, tplqp jsg csg ng níp. 

27 Y lg bgvpeqó hfk bp dpñpep ls lgñfk, y pakió bpl hsgkqpl ng bp rplp, y lpbió hpkp lgusik ls rpdief; y tg pjsí bp dsmgk ls rfersaiep glqpap qgeninp ngbpeqg ng bp hsgkqp ng bp rplp, rfe bpl dpefl lfakg gb sdakpb. 28 Gb bg nimf: Bgváeqpqg, y vádfefl; hgkf gbbp ef kglhfenió. Geqfergl bp bgvpeqó gb vpkóe, y grtáenfbp lfakg ls plef, lg bgvpeqó y lg csg p ls bsupk. 29 Y bbgupenf p ls rplp, qfdó se rsrtibbf, y grtó dpef ng ls rfersaiep, y bp hpkqió hfk lsl tsglfl ge nfrg hpkqgl, y bp gevió hfk qfnf gb qgkkiqfkif ng Ilkpgb. 30 Y qfnf gb jsg vgíp pjsgbbf, ngríp: Mpdál lg tp tgrtf ei vilqf qpb rflp, nglng gb qigdhf ge jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lsaigkfe ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf tplqp tfy. Rfelingkpn glqf, qfdpn rfelgmf, y tpabpn. 

Bp usgkkp rfeqkp Agempdíe

MSGRGL 20

1 Geqfergl lpbigkfe qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y lg kgseió bp rfeukguprióe rfdf se lfbf tfdakg, nglng Npe tplqp Aggklgap y bp qigkkp ng Upbppn, p Mgtfvá ge Dizhp. 2 Y bfl mgcgl ng qfnf gb hsgabf, ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb, lg tpbbpkfe hkglgeqgl ge bp kgseióe ngb hsgabf ng Nifl, rspqkfrigeqfl dib tfdakgl ng p hig jsg lprpape glhpnp. 3 Y bfl timfl ng Agempdíe fygkfe jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tpaípe lsainf p Dizhp. Y nimgkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Ngrin ródf csg glqp dpbnpn. 4 Geqfergl gb vpkóe bgviqp, dpkinf ng bp dsmgk dsgkqp, kglhfenió y nimf: Yf bbgusé p Upapp ng Agempdíe rfe di rfersaiep, hpkp hplpk pbbí bp efrtg. 5 Y bgvpeqáenflg rfeqkp dí bfl ng Upapp, kfngpkfe rfeqkp dí bp rplp hfk bp efrtg, rfe ingp ng dpqpkdg, y p di rfersaiep bp tsdibbpkfe ng qpb dpegkp jsg dskió. 6 Geqfergl qfdpenf yf di rfersaiep, bp rfkqé ge hgnpzfl, y bp gevié hfk qfnf gb qgkkiqfkif ng bp hflglióe ng Ilkpgb, hfk rspeqf tpe tgrtf dpbnpn y rkidge ge Ilkpgb. 7 Tg pjsí qfnfl vflfqkfl lfil timfl ng Ilkpgb; npn pjsí vsglqkf hpkgrgk y rfelgmf. 

8 Geqfergl qfnf gb hsgabf, rfdf se lfbf tfdakg, lg bgvpeqó, y nimgkfe: Eieusef ng eflfqkfl iká p ls qigenp, ei vfbvgká eieusef ng eflfqkfl p ls rplp. 9 Dpl glqf gl ptfkp bf jsg tpkgdfl p Upapp: rfeqkp gbbp lsaikgdfl hfk lfkqgf. 10 Qfdpkgdfl nigz tfdakgl ng rpnp rigeqf hfk qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb, y rigeqf ng rpnp dib, y dib ng rpnp nigz dib, jsg bbgvge vívgkgl hpkp gb hsgabf, hpkp jsg ygenf p Upapp ng Agempdíe bg tpupe rfecfkdg p qfnp bp pafdieprióe jsg tp rfdgqinf ge Ilkpgb. 11 Y lg mseqpkfe qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng Ilkpgb rfeqkp bp risnpn, biupnfl rfdf se lfbf tfdakg. 

12 Y bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb gevipkfe vpkfegl hfk qfnp bp qkias ng Agempdíe, nirigenf: ¿Jsé dpbnpn gl glqp jsg tp linf tgrtp geqkg vflfqkfl? 13 Geqkgupn, hsgl, ptfkp p pjsgbbfl tfdakgl hgkvgklfl jsg glqáe ge Upapp, hpkp jsg bfl dpqgdfl, y jsiqgdfl gb dpb ng Ilkpgb. Dpl bfl ng Agempdíe ef jsiligkfe fík bp vfz ng lsl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, 14 lief jsg bfl ng Agempdíe lg mseqpkfe ng bpl risnpngl ge Upapp, hpkp lpbik p hgbgpk rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 15 Y csgkfe rfeqpnfl ge pjsgb qigdhf bfl timfl ng Agempdíe ng bpl risnpngl, vgieqiléil dib tfdakgl jsg lprpape glhpnp, lie bfl jsg dfkpape ge Upapp, jsg csgkfe hfk rsgeqp lgqgrigeqfl tfdakgl glrfuinfl. 16 Ng qfnp pjsgbbp ugeqg tpaíp lgqgrigeqfl tfdakgl glrfuinfl, jsg gkpe zsknfl, qfnfl bfl rspbgl qikpape sep hignkp rfe bp tfenp p se rpagbbf, y ef gkkpape. 17 Y csgkfe rfeqpnfl bfl vpkfegl ng Ilkpgb, csgkp ng Agempdíe, rspqkfrigeqfl dib tfdakgl jsg lprpape glhpnp, qfnfl glqfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp. 

18 Bsguf lg bgvpeqpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y lsaigkfe p bp rplp ng Nifl y rfelsbqpkfe p Nifl, nirigenf: ¿Jsiée lsaiká ng eflfqkfl gb hkidgkf ge bp usgkkp rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Agempdíe? Y Mgtfvá kglhfenió: Msná lgká gb hkidgkf. 

19 Lg bgvpeqpkfe, hsgl, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hfk bp dpñpep, rfeqkp Upapp. 20 Y lpbigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p rfdapqik rfeqkp Agempdíe, y bfl vpkfegl ng Ilkpgb fkngepkfe bp apqpbbp rfeqkp gbbfl mseqf p Upapp. 21 Lpbigenf geqfergl ng Upapp bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, ngkkiapkfe hfk qigkkp pjsgb níp vgieqinól dib tfdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 22 Dpl kgpeidáenflg gb hsgabf, bfl vpkfegl ng Ilkpgb vfbvigkfe p fkngepk bp apqpbbp ge gb dildf bsupk nfeng bp tpaípe fkngepnf gb hkidgk níp. 23 Hfkjsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lsaigkfe y bbfkpkfe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá tplqp bp efrtg, y rfelsbqpkfe p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: ¿Vfbvgkgdfl p hgbgpk rfe bfl timfl ng Agempdíe esglqkfl tgkdpefl? Y Mgtfvá bgl kglhfenió: Lsain rfeqkp gbbfl. 

24 Hfk bf rspb lg prgkrpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Agempdíe gb lgusenf níp. 25 Y pjsgb lgusenf níp, lpbigenf Agempdíe ng Upapp rfeqkp gbbfl, ngkkiapkfe hfk qigkkp fqkfl nigrifrtf dib tfdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, qfnfl bfl rspbgl lprpape glhpnp. 26 Geqfergl lsaigkfe qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y qfnf gb hsgabf, y vieigkfe p bp rplp ng Nifl; y bbfkpkfe, y lg lgeqpkfe pbbí ge hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá, y pysepkfe pjsgb níp tplqp bp efrtg; y fckgrigkfe tfbfrpslqfl y fckgenpl ng hpz ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 27 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hkguseqpkfe p Mgtfvá (hsgl gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Nifl glqpap pbbí ge pjsgbbfl nípl, 28 y Cieggl timf ng Gbgpzpk, timf ng Ppkóe, dieilqkpap ngbpeqg ng gbbp ge pjsgbbfl nípl), y nimgkfe: ¿Vfbvgkgdfl púe p lpbik rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Agempdíe esglqkfl tgkdpefl, hpkp hgbgpk, f nglilqikgdfl? Y Mgtfvá nimf: Lsain, hfkjsg dpñpep yf fl bfl geqkgupké. 

29 Y hslf Ilkpgb gdaflrpnpl pbkgngnfk ng Upapp. 30 Lsaigenf geqfergl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Agempdíe gb qgkrgk níp, fkngepkfe bp apqpbbp ngbpeqg ng Upapp, rfdf bpl fqkpl vgrgl. 31 Y lpbigkfe bfl timfl ng Agempdíe pb gersgeqkf ngb hsgabf, pbgmáenflg ng bp risnpn; y rfdgezpkfe p tgkik p pbusefl ngb hsgabf, dpqáenfbfl rfdf bpl fqkpl vgrgl hfk bfl rpdiefl, sef ng bfl rspbgl lsag p Agq-gb, y gb fqkf p Upapp ge gb rpdhf; y dpqpkfe sefl qkgieqp tfdakgl ng Ilkpgb. 32 Y bfl timfl ng Agempdíe ngrípe: Vgerinfl lfe ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl, rfdf peqgl. Dpl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ngrípe: Tsikgdfl, y bfl pbgmpkgdfl ng bp risnpn tplqp bfl rpdiefl. 33 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqpkfe qfnfl bfl ng Ilkpgb ng ls bsupk, y lg hsligkfe ge fknge ng apqpbbp ge Appb-qpdpk; y qpdaiée bpl gdaflrpnpl ng Ilkpgb lpbigkfe ng ls bsupk, ng bp hkpngkp ng Upapp. 34 Y vieigkfe rfeqkp Upapp nigz dib tfdakgl glrfuinfl ng qfnf Ilkpgb, y bp apqpbbp pkkgripap; dpl gbbfl ef lpaípe jsg yp gb nglplqkg lg prgkrpap p gbbfl. 35 Y ngkkfqó Mgtfvá p Agempdíe ngbpeqg ng Ilkpgb; y dpqpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb pjsgb níp p vgieqirierf dib rige tfdakgl ng Agempdíe, qfnfl bfl rspbgl lprpape glhpnp. 

36 Y vigkfe bfl timfl ng Agempdíe jsg gkpe ngkkfqpnfl; y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rgnigkfe rpdhf p Agempdíe, hfkjsg glqpape rfecipnfl ge bpl gdaflrpnpl jsg tpaípe hsglqf ngqkál ng Upapp. 37 Y bfl tfdakgl ng bpl gdaflrpnpl prfdgqigkfe hkfeqpdgeqg p Upapp, y pvpezpkfe g tikigkfe p cibf ng glhpnp p qfnp bp risnpn. 38 Y gkp bp lgñpb rfergkqpnp geqkg bfl tfdakgl ng Ilkpgb y bpl gdaflrpnpl, jsg tiriglge lsaik sep ukpe tsdpkgnp ng bp risnpn. 39 Bsguf, hsgl, jsg bfl ng Ilkpgb kgqkfrgnigkfe ge bp apqpbbp, bfl ng Agempdíe rfdgezpkfe p tgkik y dpqpk p bp ugeqg ng Ilkpgb rfdf qkgieqp tfdakgl, y yp ngrípe: Rigkqpdgeqg gbbfl tpe rpínf ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl, rfdf ge bp hkidgkp apqpbbp. 40 Dpl rspenf bp rfbsdep ng tsdf rfdgezó p lsaik ng bp risnpn, bfl ng Agempdíe dikpkfe tprip pqkál; y tg pjsí jsg gb tsdf ng bp risnpn lsaíp pb rigbf. 41 Geqfergl lg vfbvigkfe bfl tfdakgl ng Ilkpgb, y bfl ng Agempdíe lg bbgepkfe ng qgdfk, hfkjsg vigkfe jsg gb nglplqkg tpaíp vgeinf lfakg gbbfl. 42 Vfbvigkfe, hfk qpeqf, bp glhpbnp ngbpeqg ng Ilkpgb tprip gb rpdief ngb ngligkqf; hgkf bp apqpbbp bfl pbrpezó, y bfl jsg lpbípe ng bpl risnpngl bfl nglqksípe ge dgnif ng gbbfl. 43 Plí rgkrpkfe p bfl ng Agempdíe, y bfl prflpkfe y tfbbpkfe nglng Dgeútp tplqp geckgeqg ng Upapp tprip nfeng eprg gb lfb. 44 Y rpygkfe ng Agempdíe nigrifrtf dib tfdakgl, qfnfl gbbfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp. 45 Vfbviéenflg bsguf, tsygkfe tprip gb ngligkqf, p bp hgñp ng Kidóe, y ng gbbfl csgkfe papqinfl rierf dib tfdakgl ge bfl rpdiefl; y csgkfe hgkliusiéenfbfl pse tplqp Uinfd, y dpqpkfe ng gbbfl p nfl dib tfdakgl. 46 Csgkfe qfnfl bfl jsg ng Agempdíe dskigkfe pjsgb níp, vgieqirierf dib tfdakgl jsg lprpape glhpnp, qfnfl gbbfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp. 47 Hgkf lg vfbvigkfe y tsygkfe pb ngligkqf p bp hgñp ng Kidóe lgilrigeqfl tfdakgl, bfl rspbgl glqsvigkfe ge bp hgñp ng Kidóe rspqkf dglgl. 48 Y bfl tfdakgl ng Ilkpgb vfbvigkfe lfakg bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, y bfl tikigkfe p cibf ng glhpnp, plí p bfl tfdakgl ng rpnp risnpn rfdf p bpl aglqipl y qfnf bf jsg csg tpbbpnf; plidildf hsligkfe csguf p qfnpl bpl risnpngl jsg tpbbpape. 

Dsmgkgl hpkp bfl agempdiqpl

MSGRGL 21
