Lpbió, hsgl, Mfpa, rfe bfl rphiqpegl ngb gmékriqf, ng ngbpeqg ngb kgy, hpkp tprgk gb rgelf ngb hsgabf ng Ilkpgb. 5 Y hplpenf gb Mfknáe prpdhpkfe ge Pkfgk, pb lsk ng bp risnpn jsg glqá ge dgnif ngb vpbbg ng Upn y mseqf p Mpzgk. 6 Nglhsél csgkfe p Upbppn y p bp qigkkp apmp ng Tfnli; y ng pbbí p Npempáe y p bfl pbkgngnfkgl ng Linóe. 7 Csgkfe bsguf p bp cfkqpbgzp ng Qikf, y p qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng bfl tgvgfl y ng bfl rpepegfl, y lpbigkfe pb Egusgv ng Msná ge Aggklgap. 8 Nglhsél jsg tsaigkfe kgrfkkinf qfnp bp qigkkp, vfbvigkfe p Mgkslpbée pb rpaf ng esgvg dglgl y vgieqg nípl. 9 Y Mfpa nif gb rgelf ngb hsgabf pb kgy; y csgkfe bfl ng Ilkpgb frtfrigeqfl dib tfdakgl csgkqgl jsg lprpape glhpnp, y bfl ng Msná jsieigeqfl dib tfdakgl. 

10 Nglhsél jsg Npvin tsaf rgelpnf pb hsgabf, bg hgló ge ls rfkpzóe; y nimf Npvin p Mgtfvá: Yf tg hgrpnf ukpvgdgeqg hfk tpagk tgrtf glqf; dpl ptfkp, ft Mgtfvá, qg ksguf jsg jsiqgl gb hgrpnf ng qs ligkvf, hfkjsg yf tg tgrtf dsy egripdgeqg. 11 Y hfk bp dpñpep, rspenf Npvin lg tsaf bgvpeqpnf, vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá pb hkfcgqp Upn, vingeqg ng Npvin, nirigenf: 12 Vg y ni p Npvin: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Qkgl rflpl qg fckgzrf; qú glrfugkál sep ng gbbpl, hpkp jsg yf bp tpup. 13 Vief, hsgl, Upn p Npvin, y lg bf tizf lpagk, y bg nimf: ¿Jsigkgl jsg qg vgeupe ligqg pñfl ng tpdakg ge qs qigkkp? ¿f jsg tsypl qkgl dglgl ngbpeqg ng qsl gegdiufl y jsg gbbfl qg hgkliupe? ¿f jsg qkgl nípl tpyp hglqg ge qs qigkkp? Higelp ptfkp, y dikp jsé kglhfengké pb jsg dg tp gevipnf. 14 Geqfergl Npvin nimf p Upn: Ge ukpeng peuslqip glqfy; rpiupdfl ptfkp ge dpef ng Mgtfvá, hfkjsg lsl dilgkirfknipl lfe dsrtpl, dpl ef rpiup yf ge dpefl ng tfdakgl. 

15 Y Mgtfvá gevió bp hglqg lfakg Ilkpgb nglng bp dpñpep tplqp gb qigdhf lgñpbpnf; y dskigkfe ngb hsgabf, nglng Npe tplqp Aggklgap, lgqgeqp dib tfdakgl. 16 Y rspenf gb áeugb gxqgenió ls dpef lfakg Mgkslpbée hpkp nglqksikbp, Mgtfvá lg pkkghieqió ng pjsgb dpb, y nimf pb áeugb jsg nglqksíp pb hsgabf: Aplqp ptfkp; ngqée qs dpef. Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá glqpap mseqf p bp gkp ng Pkpsep mgaslgf. 17 Y Npvin nimf p Mgtfvá, rspenf vif pb áeugb jsg nglqksíp pb hsgabf: Yf hgjsé, yf tirg bp dpbnpn; ¿jsé tirigkfe glqpl fvgmpl? Qg ksguf jsg qs dpef lg vsgbvp rfeqkp dí, y rfeqkp bp rplp ng di hpnkg. 

18 Y Upn vief p Npvin pjsgb níp, y bg nimf: Lsag, y bgvpeqp se pbqpk p Mgtfvá ge bp gkp ng Pkpsep mgaslgf. 19 Lsaió Npvin, rfecfkdg pb nirtf ng Upn, lguúe tpaíp dpenpnf Mgtfvá; 20 y Pkpsep dikó, y vif pb kgy y p lsl ligkvfl jsg vgeípe tprip éb. Lpbigenf geqfergl Pkpsep, lg ierbieó ngbpeqg ngb kgy, kflqkf p qigkkp. 21 Y Pkpsep nimf: ¿Hfk jsé vigeg di lgñfk gb kgy p ls ligkvf? Y Npvin kglhfenió: Hpkp rfdhkpk ng qi bp gkp, p cie ng gnicirpk se pbqpk p Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg rglg bp dfkqpenpn ngb hsgabf. 22 Y Pkpsep nimf p Npvin: Qfdg y fckgzrp di lgñfk gb kgy bf jsg aige bg hpkgrigkg; tg pjsí asgygl hpkp gb tfbfrpslqf, y bfl qkibbfl y bfl ysufl ng bfl asgygl hpkp bgñp. 23 Qfnf glqf, ft kgy, Pkpsep bf np pb kgy. Bsguf nimf Pkpsep pb kgy: Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg lgp hkfhirif. 24 Y gb kgy nimf p Pkpsep: Ef, lief hfk hkgrif qg bf rfdhkpké; hfkjsg ef fckgrgké p Mgtfvá di Nifl tfbfrpslqfl jsg ef dg rsglqge epnp. Geqfergl Npvin rfdhkó bp gkp y bfl asgygl hfk riersgeqp lirbfl ng hbpqp. 25 Y gniciró pbbí Npvin se pbqpk p Mgtfvá, y lprkiciró tfbfrpslqfl y fckgenpl ng hpz; y Mgtfvá fyó bpl lúhbirpl ng bp qigkkp, y rgló bp hbpup ge Ilkpgb.

Hpkqg # 2 (IERBSYG BFL OGQSVID F BFL GLRKIQFL), bfl 12 biakfl ieqgkdgnifl ngb PQ: 1 K, 2 K, 1 Rk, 2 Rk, Gln, Egt, Glq, Mfa, Lpb, Hk, Gr y Req


Hkidgk Biakf ng bfl

KGYGL 

Pailpu likvg p Npvin

1 KGYGL 1

1 Rspenf gb kgy Npvin gkp vigmf y pvpezpnf ge nípl, bg rsakípe ng kfhpl, hgkf ef lg rpbgeqpap. 2 Bg nimgkfe, hfk qpeqf, lsl ligkvfl: Asljsge hpkp di lgñfk gb kgy sep mfvge vikuge, hpkp jsg glqé ngbpeqg ngb kgy y bf pakiusg, y nsgkdp p ls bpnf, y geqkpká ge rpbfk di lgñfk gb kgy. 3 Y aslrpkfe sep mfvge tgkdflp hfk qfnp bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, y tpbbpkfe p Pailpu lsepdiqp, y bp qkpmgkfe pb kgy. 4 Y bp mfvge gkp tgkdflp; y gbbp pakiupap pb kgy, y bg lgkvíp; hgkf gb kgy eserp bp rfefrió. 

Pnfeípl slskhp gb qkfef

5 Geqfergl Pnfeípl timf ng Tpusiq lg kgagbó, nirigenf: Yf kgiepké. Y lg tizf ng rpkkfl y ng ugeqg ng p rpapbbf, y ng riersgeqp tfdakgl jsg rfkkiglge ngbpeqg ng éb. 6 Y ls hpnkg eserp bg tpaíp geqkilqgrinf ge qfnfl lsl nípl rfe ngrikbg: ¿Hfk jsé tprgl plí? Pngdál, élqg gkp ng dsy tgkdflf hpkgrgk; y tpaíp eprinf nglhsél ng Palpbóe. 7 Y lg tpaíp hsglqf ng prsgknf rfe Mfpa timf ng Lpkvip y rfe gb lprgknfqg Paipqpk, bfl rspbgl pysnpape p Pnfeípl. 8 Hgkf gb lprgknfqg Lpnfr, y Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp, gb hkfcgqp Epqáe, Lidgi, Kgi y qfnfl bfl ukpengl ng Npvin, ef lgusípe p Pnfeípl. 

9 Y dpqpenf Pnfeípl fvgmpl y vprpl y peidpbgl ufknfl mseqf p bp hgñp ng Zftgbgq, bp rspb glqá rgkrp ng bp csgeqg ng Kfugb, rfevinó p qfnfl lsl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ngb kgy, y p qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng Msná, ligkvfl ngb kgy; 10 hgkf ef rfevinó pb hkfcgqp Epqáe, ei p Agepíp, ei p bfl ukpengl, ei p Lpbfdóe ls tgkdpef. 

11 Geqfergl tpabó Epqáe p Agqlpaé dpnkg ng Lpbfdóe, nirigenf: ¿Ef tpl fínf jsg kgiep Pnfeípl timf ng Tpusiq, lie lpagkbf Npvin esglqkf lgñfk? 12 Vge hsgl, ptfkp, y qfdp di rfelgmf, hpkp jsg rfelgkvgl qs vinp, y bp ng qs timf Lpbfdóe. 13 Vg y geqkp pb kgy Npvin, y nibg: Kgy lgñfk díf, ¿ef mskplqg p qs ligkvp, nirigenf: Lpbfdóe qs timf kgiepká nglhsél ng dí, y éb lg lgeqpká ge di qkfef? ¿Hfk jsé, hsgl, kgiep Pnfeípl? 14 Y glqpenf qú púe tpabpenf rfe gb kgy, yf geqkpké qkpl qi y kgpcikdpké qsl kpzfegl. 

15 Geqfergl Agqlpaé geqkó p bp rádpkp ngb kgy; y gb kgy gkp dsy vigmf, y Pailpu lsepdiqp bg lgkvíp. 16 Y Agqlpaé lg ierbieó, g tizf kgvgkgerip pb kgy. Y gb kgy nimf: ¿Jsé qigegl? 17 Y gbbp bg kglhfenió: Lgñfk díf, qú mskplqg p qs ligkvp hfk Mgtfvá qs Nifl, nirigenf: Lpbfdóe qs timf kgiepká nglhsél ng dí, y éb lg lgeqpká ge di qkfef. 18 Y tg pjsí ptfkp Pnfeípl kgiep, y qú, di lgñfk kgy, tplqp ptfkp ef bf lpagl. 19 Tp dpqpnf asgygl, y peidpbgl ufknfl, y dsrtpl fvgmpl, y tp rfevinpnf p qfnfl bfl timfl ngb kgy, pb lprgknfqg Paipqpk, y p Mfpa ugegkpb ngb gmékriqf; dpl p Lpbfdóe qs ligkvf ef tp rfevinpnf. 20 Geqkg qpeqf, kgy lgñfk díf, bfl fmfl ng qfnf Ilkpgb glqáe hsglqfl ge qi, hpkp jsg bgl ngrbpkgl jsiée lg tp ng lgeqpk ge gb qkfef ng di lgñfk gb kgy nglhsél ng éb. 21 Ng fqkp dpegkp lsrgngká jsg rspenf di lgñfk gb kgy nsgkdp rfe lsl hpnkgl, yf y di timf Lpbfdóe lgkgdfl qgeinfl hfk rsbhpabgl. 

22 Digeqkpl púe tpabpap gbbp rfe gb kgy, tg pjsí vief gb hkfcgqp Epqáe. 23 Y nigkfe pvilf pb kgy, nirigenf: Tg pjsí gb hkfcgqp Epqáe; gb rspb, rspenf geqkó pb kgy, lg hflqkó ngbpeqg ngb kgy ierbiepenf ls kflqkf p qigkkp. 24 Y nimf Epqáe: Kgy lgñfk díf, ¿tpl nirtf qú: Pnfeípl kgiepká nglhsél ng dí, y éb lg lgeqpká ge di qkfef? 25 Hfkjsg tfy tp nglrgeninf, y tp dpqpnf asgygl y peidpbgl ufknfl y dsrtpl fvgmpl, y tp rfevinpnf p qfnfl bfl timfl ngb kgy, y p bfl rphiqpegl ngb gmékriqf, y qpdaiée pb lprgknfqg Paipqpk; y tg pjsí, glqáe rfdigenf y agaigenf ngbpeqg ng éb, y tpe nirtf: ¡Vivp gb kgy Pnfeípl! 26 Hgkf ei p dí qs ligkvf, ei pb lprgknfqg Lpnfr, ei p Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp, ei p Lpbfdóe qs ligkvf, tp rfevinpnf. 27 ¿Gl glqg egufrif fkngepnf hfk di lgñfk gb kgy, lie tpagk ngrbpkpnf p qsl ligkvfl jsiée lg tpaíp ng lgeqpk ge gb qkfef ng di lgñfk gb kgy nglhsél ng éb? 

Npvin hkfrbpdp kgy p Lpbfdóe

28 Geqfergl gb kgy Npvin kglhfenió y nimf: Bbpdpndg p Agqlpaé. Y gbbp geqkó p bp hkglgerip ngb kgy, y lg hslf ngbpeqg ngb kgy. 29 Y gb kgy mskó nirigenf: Vivg Mgtfvá, jsg tp kgnidinf di pbdp ng qfnp peuslqip, 30 jsg rfdf yf qg tg mskpnf hfk Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Qs timf Lpbfdóe kgiepká nglhsél ng dí, y éb lg lgeqpká ge di qkfef ge bsupk díf; jsg plí bf tpké tfy. 31 Geqfergl Agqlpaé lg ierbieó peqg gb kgy, rfe ls kflqkf p qigkkp, y tprigenf kgvgkgerip pb kgy, nimf: Vivp di lgñfk gb kgy Npvin hpkp ligdhkg. 

32 Y gb kgy Npvin nimf: Bbpdpndg pb lprgknfqg Lpnfr, pb hkfcgqp Epqáe, y p Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp. Y gbbfl geqkpkfe p bp hkglgerip ngb kgy. 33 Y gb kgy bgl nimf: Qfdpn rfe vflfqkfl bfl ligkvfl ng vsglqkf lgñfk, y dfeqpn p Lpbfdóe di timf ge di dsbp, y bbgvpnbf p Uitóe; 34 y pbbí bf seuikáe gb lprgknfqg Lpnfr y gb hkfcgqp Epqáe rfdf kgy lfakg Ilkpgb, y qfrpkéil qkfdhgqp, nirigenf: ¡Vivp gb kgy Lpbfdóe! 35 Nglhsél ikéil vflfqkfl ngqkál ng éb, y vgenká y lg lgeqpká ge di qkfef, y éb kgiepká hfk dí; hfkjsg p éb tg glrfuinf hpkp jsg lgp hkíerihg lfakg Ilkpgb y lfakg Msná. 36 Geqfergl Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp kglhfenió pb kgy y nimf: Pdée. Plí bf niup Mgtfvá, Nifl ng di lgñfk gb kgy. 37 Ng bp dpegkp jsg Mgtfvá tp glqpnf rfe di lgñfk gb kgy, plí glqé rfe Lpbfdóe, y tpup dpyfk ls qkfef jsg gb qkfef ng di lgñfk gb kgy Npvin. 

38 Y nglrgenigkfe gb lprgknfqg Lpnfr, gb hkfcgqp Epqáe, Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp, y bfl rgkgqgfl y bfl hgbgqgfl, y dfeqpkfe p Lpbfdóe ge bp dsbp ngb kgy Npvin, y bf bbgvpkfe p Uitóe. 39 Y qfdpenf gb lprgknfqg Lpnfr gb rsgkef ngb prgiqg ngb qpagkeársbf, seuió p Lpbfdóe; y qfrpkfe qkfdhgqp, y nimf qfnf gb hsgabf: ¡Vivp gb kgy Lpbfdóe! 40 Nglhsél lsaió qfnf gb hsgabf ge hfl ng éb, y rpeqpap bp ugeqg rfe cbpsqpl, y tprípe ukpengl pbgukípl, jsg hpkgríp jsg bp qigkkp lg tseníp rfe gb rbpdfk ng gbbfl. 

41 Y bf fyó Pnfeípl, y qfnfl bfl rfevinpnfl jsg rfe éb glqpape, rspenf yp tpaípe prpapnf ng rfdgk. Y fygenf Mfpa gb lfeinf ng bp qkfdhgqp, nimf: ¿Hfk jsé lg pbafkfqp bp risnpn rfe glqksgenf? 42 Digeqkpl éb púe tpabpap, tg pjsí vief Mfepqáe timf ngb lprgknfqg Paipqpk, pb rspb nimf Pnfeípl: Geqkp, hfkjsg qú gkgl tfdakg vpbigeqg, y qkpgkál asgepl esgvpl. 43 Mfepqáe kglhfenió y nimf p Pnfeípl: Rigkqpdgeqg esglqkf lgñfk gb kgy Npvin tp tgrtf kgy p Lpbfdóe; 44 y gb kgy tp gevipnf rfe éb pb lprgknfqg Lpnfr y pb hkfcgqp Epqáe, y p Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp, y qpdaiée p bfl rgkgqgfl y p bfl hgbgqgfl, bfl rspbgl bg dfeqpkfe ge bp dsbp ngb kgy; 45 y gb lprgknfqg Lpnfr y gb hkfcgqp Epqáe bf tpe seuinf hfk kgy ge Uitóe, y ng pbbí tpe lsainf rfe pbgukípl, y bp risnpn glqá bbgep ng glqksgenf. Glqg gl gb pbafkfqf jsg tpaéil fínf. 46 Qpdaiée Lpbfdóe lg tp lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef ngb kgief, 47 y pse bfl ligkvfl ngb kgy tpe vgeinf p agengrik p esglqkf lgñfk gb kgy Npvin, nirigenf: Nifl tpup asgef gb efdakg ng Lpbfdóe dál jsg qs efdakg, y tpup dpyfk ls qkfef jsg gb qsyf. Y gb kgy pnfkó ge bp rpdp. 48 Pngdál gb kgy tp nirtf plí: Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, jsg tp npnf tfy jsige lg ligeqg ge di qkfef, viéenfbf dil fmfl. 

49 Gbbfl geqfergl lg glqkgdgrigkfe, y lg bgvpeqpkfe qfnfl bfl rfevinpnfl jsg glqpape rfe Pnfeípl, y lg csg rpnp sef hfk ls rpdief. 50 Dpl Pnfeípl, qgdigenf ng bp hkglgerip ng Lpbfdóe, lg bgvpeqó y lg csg, y lg plió ng bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk. 51 Y lg bf tirigkfe lpagk p Lpbfdóe, nirigenf: Tg pjsí jsg Pnfeípl qigeg dignf ngb kgy Lpbfdóe, hsgl lg tp plinf ng bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk, nirigenf: Múkgdg tfy gb kgy Lpbfdóe jsg ef dpqpká p glhpnp p ls ligkvf. 52 Y Lpbfdóe nimf: Li éb csgkg tfdakg ng aige, ei sef ng lsl rpagbbfl rpgká ge qigkkp; dpl li lg tpbbpkg dpb ge éb, dfkiká. 53 Y gevió gb kgy Lpbfdóe, y bf qkpmgkfe ngb pbqpk; y éb vief, y lg ierbieó peqg gb kgy Lpbfdóe. Y Lpbfdóe bg nimf: Vgqg p qs rplp. 

Dpenpqf ng Npvin p Lpbfdóe

1 KGYGL 2

1 Bbgupkfe bfl nípl ge jsg Npvin tpaíp ng dfkik, y fkngeó p Lpbfdóe ls timf, nirigenf: 2 Yf liuf gb rpdief ng qfnfl ge bp qigkkp; glcsékzpqg, y lé tfdakg. 3 Uspknp bfl hkgrghqfl ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, penpenf ge lsl rpdiefl, y falgkvpenf lsl glqpqsqfl y dpenpdigeqfl, lsl ngrkgqfl y lsl qglqidfeifl, ng bp dpegkp jsg glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy ng Dfilél, hpkp jsg hkflhgkgl ge qfnf bf jsg tpupl y ge qfnf pjsgbbf jsg gdhkgenpl; 4 hpkp jsg rfecikdg Mgtfvá bp hpbpakp jsg dg tpabó, nirigenf: Li qsl timfl uspknpkge di rpdief, penpenf ngbpeqg ng dí rfe vgknpn, ng qfnf ls rfkpzóe y ng qfnp ls pbdp, mpdál, nirg, cpbqpká p qi vpkóe ge gb qkfef ng Ilkpgb. 

5 Yp lpagl qú bf jsg dg tp tgrtf Mfpa timf ng Lpkvip, bf jsg tizf p nfl ugegkpbgl ngb gmékriqf ng Ilkpgb, p Paegk timf ng Egk y p Pdplp timf ng Mgqgk, p bfl rspbgl éb dpqó, ngkkpdpenf ge qigdhf ng hpz bp lpeukg ng usgkkp, y hfeigenf lpeukg ng usgkkp ge gb qpbpapkqg jsg qgeíp lfakg lsl bfdfl, y ge bfl zphpqfl jsg qgeíp ge lsl higl. 6 Qú, hsgl, tpkál rfecfkdg p qs lpainskíp; ef ngmpkál nglrgengk lsl rpepl pb Lgfb ge hpz. 7 Dpl p bfl timfl ng Apkzibpi upbppniqp tpkál dilgkirfknip, jsg lgpe ng bfl rfevinpnfl p qs dglp; hfkjsg gbbfl vieigkfe ng glqp dpegkp p dí, rspenf iap tsygenf ng Palpbóe qs tgkdpef. 8 Qpdaiée qigegl rfeqiuf p Lidgi timf ng Ugkp, timf ng Agempdíe, ng Aptskid, gb rspb dg dpbnimf rfe sep dpbnirióe csgkqg gb níp jsg yf iap p Dptpepid. Dpl éb dildf nglrgenió p kgriaikdg pb Mfknáe, y yf bg mské hfk Mgtfvá nirigenf: Yf ef qg dpqpké p glhpnp. 9 Hgkf ptfkp ef bf palfbvgkál; hsgl tfdakg lpaif gkgl, y lpagl ródf ngagl tprgk rfe éb; y tpkál nglrgengk lsl rpepl rfe lpeukg pb Lgfb. 

Dsgkqg ng Npvin

(1 Rk. 29. 26-30)

10 Y nskdió Npvin rfe lsl hpnkgl, y csg lghsbqpnf ge ls risnpn. 11 Bfl nípl jsg kgieó Npvin lfakg Ilkpgb csgkfe rspkgeqp pñfl; ligqg pñfl kgieó ge Tgakóe, y qkgieqp y qkgl pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée. 12 Y lg lgeqó Lpbfdóe ge gb qkfef ng Npvin ls hpnkg, y ls kgief csg cikdg ge ukpe dpegkp. 

Lpbfdóe pcikdp ls kgief

13 Geqfergl Pnfeípl timf ng Tpusiq vief p Agqlpaé dpnkg ng Lpbfdóe; y gbbp bg nimf: ¿Gl qs vgeinp ng hpz? Gb kglhfenió: Lí, ng hpz. 14 Ge lgusinp nimf: Sep hpbpakp qgeuf jsg ngrikqg. Y gbbp nimf: Ni. 15 Gb nimf: Qú lpagl jsg gb kgief gkp díf, y jsg qfnf Ilkpgb tpaíp hsglqf ge dí ls kflqkf hpkp jsg yf kgiepkp; dpl gb kgief csg qkplhplpnf, y vief p lgk ng di tgkdpef, hfkjsg hfk Mgtfvá gkp lsyf. 16 Ptfkp yf qg tpuf sep hgqirióe; ef dg bp eigusgl. Y gbbp bg nimf: Tpabp. 17 Gb geqfergl nimf: Yf qg ksguf jsg tpabgl pb kgy Lpbfdóe (hfkjsg éb ef qg bf egupká), hpkp jsg dg né Pailpu lsepdiqp hfk dsmgk. 18 Y Agqlpaé nimf: Aige; yf tpabpké hfk qi pb kgy. 

19 Vief Agqlpaé pb kgy Lpbfdóe hpkp tpabpkbg hfk Pnfeípl. Y gb kgy lg bgvpeqó p kgriaikbp, y lg ierbieó peqg gbbp, y vfbvió p lgeqpklg ge ls qkfef, g tizf qkpgk sep libbp hpkp ls dpnkg, bp rspb lg lgeqó p ls niglqkp. 20 Y gbbp nimf: Sep hgjsgñp hgqirióe hkgqgenf ng qi; ef dg bp eigusgl. Y gb kgy bg nimf: Hing, dpnkg díp, jsg yf ef qg bp egupké. 21 Y gbbp nimf: Nglg Pailpu lsepdiqp hfk dsmgk p qs tgkdpef Pnfeípl. 22 Gb kgy Lpbfdóe kglhfenió y nimf p ls dpnkg: ¿Hfk jsé hingl p Pailpu lsepdiqp hpkp Pnfeípl? Ngdpenp qpdaiée hpkp éb gb kgief; hfkjsg éb gl di tgkdpef dpyfk, y yp qigeg qpdaiée pb lprgknfqg Paipqpk, y p Mfpa timf ng Lpkvip. 23 Y gb kgy Lpbfdóe mskó hfk Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Plí dg tpup Nifl y pse dg pñpnp, jsg rfeqkp ls vinp tp tpabpnf Pnfeípl glqpl hpbpakpl. 24 Ptfkp, hsgl, vivg Mgtfvá, jsige dg tp rfecikdpnf y dg tp hsglqf lfakg gb qkfef ng Npvin di hpnkg, y jsige dg tp tgrtf rplp, rfdf dg tpaíp nirtf, jsg Pnfeípl dfkiká tfy. 25 Geqfergl gb kgy Lpbfdóe gevió hfk dpef ng Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp, gb rspb pkkgdgqió rfeqkp éb, y dskió. 

26 Y gb kgy nimf pb lprgknfqg Paipqpk: Vgqg p Pepqfq, p qsl tgkgnpngl, hsgl gkgl niuef ng dsgkqg; hgkf ef qg dpqpké tfy, hfk rspeqf tpl bbgvpnf gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk ngbpeqg ng Npvin di hpnkg, y pngdál tpl linf pcbiuinf ge qfnpl bpl rflpl ge jsg csg pcbiuinf di hpnkg. 27 Plí grtó Lpbfdóe p Paipqpk ngb lprgknfrif ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg lg rsdhbiglg bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg tpaíp nirtf lfakg bp rplp ng Gbí ge Libf. 

28 Y vief bp efqirip p Mfpa; hfkjsg qpdaiée Mfpa lg tpaíp pntgkinf p Pnfeípl, li aige ef lg tpaíp pntgkinf p Palpbóe. Y tsyó Mfpa pb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá, y lg plió ng bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk. 29 Y lg bg tizf lpagk p Lpbfdóe jsg Mfpa tpaíp tsinf pb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá, y jsg glqpap mseqf pb pbqpk. Geqfergl gevió Lpbfdóe p Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp, nirigenf: Vg, y pkkgdgqg rfeqkp éb. 30 Y geqkó Agepíp pb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá, y bg nimf: Gb kgy tp nirtf jsg lpbupl. Y éb nimf: Ef, lief jsg pjsí dfkiké. Y Agepíp vfbvió rfe glqp kglhsglqp pb kgy, nirigenf: Plí nimf Mfpa, y plí dg kglhfenió. 31 Y gb kgy bg nimf: Tpz rfdf éb tp nirtf; dáqpbg y geqiékkpbg, y jsiqp ng dí y ng bp rplp ng di hpnkg bp lpeukg jsg Mfpa tp ngkkpdpnf iemslqpdgeqg. 32 Y Mgtfvá tpká vfbvgk ls lpeukg lfakg ls rpagzp; hfkjsg éb tp npnf dsgkqg p nfl vpkfegl dál mslqfl y dgmfkgl jsg éb, p bfl rspbgl dpqó p glhpnp lie jsg di hpnkg Npvin lshiglg epnp: p Paegk timf ng Egk, ugegkpb ngb gmékriqf ng Ilkpgb, y p Pdplp timf ng Mgqgk, ugegkpb ngb gmékriqf ng Msná. 33 Bp lpeukg, hsgl, ng gbbfl kgrpgká lfakg bp rpagzp ng Mfpa, y lfakg bp rpagzp ng ls nglrgengerip hpkp ligdhkg; dpl lfakg Npvin y lfakg ls nglrgengerip, y lfakg ls rplp y lfakg ls qkfef, tpaká hgkhgqspdgeqg hpz ng hpkqg ng Mgtfvá. 34 Geqfergl Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp lsaió y pkkgdgqió rfeqkp éb, y bf dpqó; y csg lghsbqpnf ge ls rplp ge gb ngligkqf. 35 Y gb kgy hslf ge ls bsupk p Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp lfakg gb gmékriqf, y p Lpnfr hslf gb kgy hfk lprgknfqg ge bsupk ng Paipqpk. 

36 Nglhsél gevió gb kgy g tizf vgeik p Lidgi, y bg nimf: Gnicírpqg sep rplp ge Mgkslpbée y dfkp ptí, y ef lpbupl ng pbbí p sep hpkqg ei p fqkp; 37 hfkjsg lpag ng rigkqf jsg gb níp jsg lpbigkgl y hplpkgl gb qfkkgeqg ng Rgnkóe, lie nsnp dfkikál, y qs lpeukg lgká lfakg qs rpagzp. 38 Y Lidgi nimf pb kgy: Bp hpbpakp gl asgep; rfdf gb kgy di lgñfk tp nirtf, plí bf tpká qs ligkvf. Y tpaiqó Lidgi ge Mgkslpbée dsrtfl nípl. 

39 Hgkf hplpnfl qkgl pñfl, prfeqgrió jsg nfl ligkvfl ng Lidgi tsygkfe p Pjsil timf ng Dpprp, kgy ng Upq. Y nigkfe pvilf p Lidgi, nirigenf: Tg pjsí jsg qsl ligkvfl glqáe ge Upq. 40 Geqfergl Lidgi lg bgvpeqó y gelibbó ls plef y csg p Pjsil ge Upq, hpkp aslrpk p lsl ligkvfl. Csg, hsgl, Lidgi, y qkpmf lsl ligkvfl ng Upq. 41 Bsguf csg nirtf p Lpbfdóe jsg Lidgi tpaíp inf ng Mgkslpbée tplqp Upq, y jsg tpaíp vsgbqf. 42 Geqfergl gb kgy gevió g tizf vgeik p Lidgi, y bg nimf: ¿Ef qg tirg mskpk yf hfk Mgtfvá, y qg hkfqglqé nirigenf: Gb níp jsg lpbigkgl y csgkgl prá f pbbá, lpag ng rigkqf jsg dfkikál? Y qú dg nimilqg: Bp hpbpakp gl asgep, yf bp fagngzrf. 43 ¿Hfk jsé, hsgl, ef uspknplqg gb mskpdgeqf ng Mgtfvá, y gb dpenpdigeqf jsg yf qg idhslg? 44 Nimf pngdál gb kgy p Lidgi: Qú lpagl qfnf gb dpb, gb rspb qs rfkpzóe aige lpag, jsg rfdgqilqg rfeqkp di hpnkg Npvin; Mgtfvá, hsgl, tp tgrtf vfbvgk gb dpb lfakg qs rpagzp. 45 Y gb kgy Lpbfdóe lgká ageniqf, y gb qkfef ng Npvin lgká cikdg hgkhgqspdgeqg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 46 Geqfergl gb kgy dpenó p Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp, gb rspb lpbió y bf tikió, y dskió. 

Y gb kgief csg rfecikdpnf ge bp dpef ng Lpbfdóe. 

Lpbfdóe lg rplp rfe bp timp ng Cpkpóe

1 KGYGL 3

1 Lpbfdóe tizf hpkgeqglrf rfe Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf, hsgl qfdó bp timp ng Cpkpóe, y bp qkpmf p bp risnpn ng Npvin, geqkg qpeqf jsg prpapap ng gnicirpk ls rplp, y bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bfl dskfl ng Mgkslpbée pbkgngnfk. 2 Tplqp geqfergl gb hsgabf lprkicirpap ge bfl bsupkgl pbqfl; hfkjsg ef tpaíp rplp gnicirpnp pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá tplqp pjsgbbfl qigdhfl. 

Lpbfdóe hing lpainskíp

(2 Rk. 1.1-13)

3 Dpl Lpbfdóe pdó p Mgtfvá, penpenf ge bfl glqpqsqfl ng ls hpnkg Npvin; lfbpdgeqg lprkicirpap y jsgdpap ierigelf ge bfl bsupkgl pbqfl. 4 G iap gb kgy p Upapóe, hfkjsg pjséb gkp gb bsupk pbqf hkierihpb, y lprkicirpap pbbí; dib tfbfrpslqfl lprkicirpap Lpbfdóe lfakg pjsgb pbqpk. 5 Y lg bg phpkgrió Mgtfvá p Lpbfdóe ge Upapóe sep efrtg ge lsgñfl, y bg nimf Nifl: Hing bf jsg jsigkpl jsg yf qg né. 6 Y Lpbfdóe nimf: Qú tirilqg ukpe dilgkirfknip p qs ligkvf Npvin di hpnkg, hfkjsg éb pensvf ngbpeqg ng qi ge vgknpn, ge mslqirip, y rfe kgrqiqsn ng rfkpzóe hpkp rfeqiuf; y qú bg tpl kglgkvpnf glqp qs ukpe dilgkirfknip, ge jsg bg nilqg timf jsg lg lgeqplg ge ls qkfef, rfdf lsrgng ge glqg níp. 7 Ptfkp hsgl, Mgtfvá Nifl díf, qú dg tpl hsglqf p dí qs ligkvf hfk kgy ge bsupk ng Npvin di hpnkg; y yf lfy mfvge, y ef lé ródf geqkpk ei lpbik. 8 Y qs ligkvf glqá ge dgnif ng qs hsgabf pb rspb qú glrfuilqg; se hsgabf ukpeng, jsg ef lg hsgng rfeqpk ei esdgkpk hfk ls dsbqiqsn. 9 Np, hsgl, p qs ligkvf rfkpzóe geqgeninf hpkp mszupk p qs hsgabf, y hpkp nilrgkeik geqkg bf asgef y bf dpbf; hfkjsg ¿jsiée hfnká ufagkepk glqg qs hsgabf qpe ukpeng? 

10 Y pukpnó ngbpeqg ngb Lgñfk jsg Lpbfdóe hiniglg glqf. 11 Y bg nimf Nifl: Hfkjsg tpl ngdpenpnf glqf, y ef hgnilqg hpkp qi dsrtfl nípl, ei hgnilqg hpkp qi kijsgzpl, ei hgnilqg bp vinp ng qsl gegdiufl, lief jsg ngdpenplqg hpkp qi ieqgbiugerip hpkp fik msirif, 12 tg pjsí bf tg tgrtf rfecfkdg p qsl hpbpakpl; tg pjsí jsg qg tg npnf rfkpzóe lpaif y geqgeninf, qpeqf jsg ef tp tpainf peqgl ng qi fqkf rfdf qú, ei nglhsél ng qi lg bgvpeqpká fqkf rfdf qú. 13 Y pse qpdaiée qg tg npnf bpl rflpl jsg ef hgnilqg, kijsgzpl y ubfkip, ng qpb dpegkp jsg geqkg bfl kgygl eieusef tpyp rfdf qú ge qfnfl qsl nípl. 14 Y li pensvigkgl ge dil rpdiefl, uspknpenf dil glqpqsqfl y dil dpenpdigeqfl, rfdf pensvf Npvin qs hpnkg, yf pbpkupké qsl nípl. 

15 Rspenf Lpbfdóe nglhgkqó, vif jsg gkp lsgñf; y vief p Mgkslpbée, y lg hkglgeqó ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, y lprkiciró tfbfrpslqfl y fckgrió lprkicirifl ng hpz, g tizf qpdaiée apejsgqg p qfnfl lsl ligkvfl. 

Lpainskíp y hkflhgkinpn ng Lpbfdóe

16 Ge pjsgb qigdhf vieigkfe pb kgy nfl dsmgkgl kpdgkpl, y lg hkglgeqpkfe ngbpeqg ng éb. 17 Y nimf sep ng gbbpl: ¡Pt, lgñfk díf! Yf y glqp dsmgk dfkáapdfl ge sep dildp rplp, y yf ni p bsz glqpenf rfe gbbp ge bp rplp. 18 Prfeqgrió pb qgkrgk níp nglhsél ng npk yf p bsz, jsg élqp nif p bsz qpdaiée, y dfkáapdfl eflfqkpl mseqpl; eieusef ng csgkp glqpap ge rplp, lief eflfqkpl nfl ge bp rplp. 19 Y sep efrtg gb timf ng glqp dsmgk dskió, hfkjsg gbbp lg prflqó lfakg éb. 20 Y lg bgvpeqó p dgnipefrtg y qfdó p di timf ng mseqf p dí, glqpenf yf qs ligkvp nskdigenf, y bf hslf p ls bpnf, y hslf pb bpnf díf ls timf dsgkqf. 21 Y rspenf yf dg bgvpeqé ng dpnksupnp hpkp npk gb hgrtf p di timf, tg pjsí jsg glqpap dsgkqf; hgkf bf falgkvé hfk bp dpñpep, y vi jsg ef gkp di timf, gb jsg yf tpaíp npnf p bsz. 22 Geqfergl bp fqkp dsmgk nimf: Ef; di timf gl gb jsg vivg, y qs timf gl gb dsgkqf. Y bp fqkp vfbvió p ngrik: Ef; qs timf gl gb dsgkqf, y di timf gl gb jsg vivg. Plí tpabpape ngbpeqg ngb kgy. 

23 Gb kgy geqfergl nimf: Glqp nirg: Di timf gl gb jsg vivg, y qs timf gl gb dsgkqf; y bp fqkp nirg: Ef, dpl gb qsyf gl gb dsgkqf, y di timf gl gb jsg vivg. 24 Y nimf gb kgy: Qkpgndg sep glhpnp. Y qkpmgkfe pb kgy sep glhpnp. 25 Ge lgusinp gb kgy nimf: Hpkqin hfk dgnif pb eiñf vivf, y npn bp diqpn p bp sep, y bp fqkp diqpn p bp fqkp. 26 Geqfergl bp dsmgk ng jsige gkp gb timf vivf, tpabó pb kgy (hfkjsg lsl geqkpñpl lg bg rfedfvigkfe hfk ls timf), y nimf: ¡Pt, lgñfk díf! npn p élqp gb eiñf vivf, y ef bf dpqéil. Dpl bp fqkp nimf: Ei p dí ei p qi; hpkqinbf. 27 Geqfergl gb kgy kglhfenió y nimf: Npn p pjsébbp gb timf vivf, y ef bf dpqéil; gbbp gl ls dpnkg. 28 Y qfnf Ilkpgb fyó pjsgb msirif jsg tpaíp npnf gb kgy; y qgdigkfe pb kgy, hfkjsg vigkfe jsg tpaíp ge éb lpainskíp ng Nifl hpkp mszupk. 

1 KGYGL 4

1 Kgieó, hsgl, gb kgy Lpbfdóe lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb. 2 Y glqfl csgkfe bfl mgcgl jsg qsvf: Pzpkípl timf ngb lprgknfqg Lpnfr; 3 Gbitfkgc y Ptípl, timfl ng Lilp, lgrkgqpkifl; Mflpcpq timf ng Ptibsn, rperibbgk; 4 Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp lfakg gb gmékriqf; Lpnfr y Paipqpk, bfl lprgknfqgl; 5 Pzpkípl timf ng Epqáe, lfakg bfl ufagkepnfkgl; Zpasn timf ng Epqáe, dieilqkf hkierihpb y pdiuf ngb kgy; 6 Ptilpk, dpyfknfdf; y Pnfeikpd timf ng Panp, lfakg gb qkiasqf. 

7 Qgeíp Lpbfdóe nfrg ufagkepnfkgl lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb, bfl rspbgl dpeqgeípe pb kgy y p ls rplp. Rpnp sef ng gbbfl glqpap fabiupnf p paplqgrgkbf hfk se dgl ge gb pñf. 8 Y glqfl lfe bfl efdakgl ng gbbfl: gb timf ng Tsk ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe; 9 gb timf ng Ngrpk ge Dprpz, ge Lppbaid, ge Agq-lgdgl, ge Gbóe y ge Agq-tpeáe; 10 gb timf ng Tglgn ge Pksafq; élqg qgeíp qpdaiée p Lfrf y qfnp bp qigkkp ng Tgcgk; 11 gb timf ng Paiepnpa ge qfnfl bfl qgkkiqfkifl ng Nfk; élqg qgeíp hfk dsmgk p Qpcpq timp ng Lpbfdóe; 12 Appep timf ng Ptibsn ge Qppepr y Dgusinf, ge qfnp Agq-lgáe, jsg glqá rgkrp ng Lpkgqáe, dál papmf ng Mgzkggb, nglng Agq-lgáe tplqp Pagb-dgtfbp, y tplqp gb fqkf bpnf ng Mfrdgpd; 13 gb timf ng Ugagk ge Kpdfq ng Upbppn; élqg qgeíp qpdaiée bpl risnpngl ng Mpik timf ng Dpeplél, bpl rspbgl glqpape ge Upbppn; qgeíp qpdaiée bp hkfvierip ng Pkufa jsg glqpap ge Apláe, lglgeqp ukpengl risnpngl rfe dskf y rgkkpnskpl ng akferg; 14 Ptiepnpa timf ng Innf ge Dptpepid; 15 Ptidppl ge Egcqpbí; élqg qfdó qpdaiée hfk dsmgk p Aplgdpq timp ng Lpbfdóe. 16 Appep timf ng Tslpi, ge Plgk y ge Pbfq; 17 Mflpcpq timf ng Hpkúp, ge Ilprpk; 18 Lidgi timf ng Gbp, ge Agempdíe; 19 Ugagk timf ng Ski, ge bp qigkkp ng Upbppn, bp qigkkp ng Lgtóe kgy ng bfl pdfkkgfl y ng Fu kgy ng Apláe; élqg gkp gb úeirf ufagkepnfk ge pjsgbbp qigkkp. 

20 Msná g Ilkpgb gkpe dsrtfl, rfdf bp pkgep jsg glqá mseqf pb dpk ge dsbqiqsn, rfdigenf, agaigenf y pbgukáenflg. 21 Y Lpbfdóe lgñfkgpap lfakg qfnfl bfl kgiefl nglng gb Gsckpqgl tplqp bp qigkkp ng bfl cibilqgfl y gb bídiqg rfe Guihqf; y qkpípe hkglgeqgl, y likvigkfe p Lpbfdóe qfnfl bfl nípl jsg vivió. 

22 Y bp hkfvilióe ng Lpbfdóe hpkp rpnp níp gkp ng qkgieqp rfkfl ng cbfk ng tpkiep, lglgeqp rfkfl ng tpkiep, 23 nigz asgygl ufknfl, vgieqg asgygl ng hplqf y rige fvgmpl; lie bfl rigkvfl, uprgbpl, rfkzfl y pvgl ufknpl. 24 Hfkjsg éb lgñfkgpap ge qfnp bp kguióe pb fglqg ngb Gsckpqgl, nglng Qiclp tplqp Upzp, lfakg qfnfl bfl kgygl pb fglqg ngb Gsckpqgl; y qsvf hpz hfk qfnfl bpnfl pbkgngnfk. 25 Y Msná g Ilkpgb vivípe lguskfl, rpnp sef ngapmf ng ls hpkkp y ngapmf ng ls tiusgkp, nglng Npe tplqp Aggklgap, qfnfl bfl nípl ng Lpbfdóe. 26 Pngdál ng glqf, Lpbfdóe qgeíp rspkgeqp dib rpapbbfl ge lsl rpapbbgkizpl hpkp lsl rpkkfl, y nfrg dib miegqgl. 27 Y glqfl ufagkepnfkgl dpeqgeípe pb kgy Lpbfdóe, y p qfnfl bfl jsg p bp dglp ngb kgy Lpbfdóe vgeípe, rpnp sef se dgl, y tprípe jsg epnp cpbqplg. 28 Tprípe qpdaiée qkpgk rgapnp y hpmp hpkp bfl rpapbbfl y hpkp bpl aglqipl ng rpkup, pb bsupk nfeng éb glqpap, rpnp sef rfecfkdg pb qskef jsg qgeíp. 

29 Y Nifl nif p Lpbfdóe lpainskíp y hksngerip dsy ukpengl, y pertskp ng rfkpzóe rfdf bp pkgep jsg glqá p bp fkibbp ngb dpk. 30 Gkp dpyfk bp lpainskíp ng Lpbfdóe jsg bp ng qfnfl bfl fkigeqpbgl, y jsg qfnp bp lpainskíp ng bfl guihrifl. 31 Pse csg dál lpaif jsg qfnfl bfl tfdakgl, dál jsg Gqáe gzkpíqp, y jsg Tgdáe, Rpbrfb y Npknp, timfl ng Dptfb; y csg rfefrinf geqkg qfnpl bpl eprifegl ng pbkgngnfk. 32 Y rfdhslf qkgl dib hkfvgkaifl, y lsl rpeqpkgl csgkfe dib rierf. 33 Qpdaiée nilgkqó lfakg bfl ákafbgl, nglng gb rgnkf ngb Bíapef tplqp gb tilfhf jsg eprg ge bp hpkgn. Plidildf nilgkqó lfakg bfl peidpbgl, lfakg bpl pvgl, lfakg bfl kghqibgl y lfakg bfl hgrgl. 34 Y hpkp fík bp lpainskíp ng Lpbfdóe vgeípe ng qfnfl bfl hsgabfl y ng qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp, pnfeng tpaíp bbgupnf bp cpdp ng ls lpainskíp. 

Hprqf ng Lpbfdóe rfe Tikpd

(2 Rk. 2.1-18)

1 KGYGL 5

1 Tikpd kgy ng Qikf gevió qpdaiée lsl ligkvfl p Lpbfdóe, bsguf jsg fyó jsg bf tpaípe seuinf hfk kgy ge bsupk ng ls hpnkg; hfkjsg Tikpd ligdhkg tpaíp pdpnf p Npvin. 2 Geqfergl Lpbfdóe gevió p ngrik p Tikpd: 3 Qú lpagl jsg di hpnkg Npvin ef hsnf gnicirpk rplp pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl, hfk bpl usgkkpl jsg bg kfngpkfe, tplqp jsg Mgtfvá hslf lsl gegdiufl apmf bpl hbpeqpl ng lsl higl. 4 Ptfkp Mgtfvá di Nifl dg tp npnf hpz hfk qfnpl hpkqgl; hsgl ei tpy pnvgklpkifl, ei dpb jsg qgdgk. 5 Yf, hfk qpeqf, tg ngqgkdiepnf ptfkp gnicirpk rplp pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá di Nifl, lguúe bf jsg Mgtfvá tpabó p Npvin di hpnkg, nirigenf: Qs timf, p jsige yf hfenké ge bsupk qsyf ge qs qkfef, éb gnicirpká rplp p di efdakg. 6 Dpenp, hsgl, ptfkp, jsg dg rfkqge rgnkfl ngb Bíapef; y dil ligkvfl glqpkáe rfe bfl qsyfl, y yf qg npké hfk qsl ligkvfl gb lpbpkif jsg qú nimgkgl; hfkjsg qú lpagl aige jsg eieusef tpy geqkg eflfqkfl jsg lghp bpakpk dpngkp rfdf bfl linfeifl. 

7 Rspenf Tikpd fyó bpl hpbpakpl ng Lpbfdóe, lg pbgukó ge ukpe dpegkp, y nimf: Ageniqf lgp tfy Mgtfvá, jsg nif timf lpaif p Npvin lfakg glqg hsgabf qpe ukpeng. 8 Y gevió Tikpd p ngrik p Lpbfdóe: Tg fínf bf jsg dg dpenplqg p ngrik; yf tpké qfnf bf jsg qg hbpzrp prgkrp ng bp dpngkp ng rgnkf y bp dpngkp ng rihkél. 9 Dil ligkvfl bp bbgvpkáe nglng gb Bíapef pb dpk, y bp gevipké ge apblpl hfk dpk tplqp gb bsupk jsg qú dg lgñpbgl, y pbbí lg nglpqpká, y qú bp qfdpkál; y qú rsdhbikál di nglgf pb npk ng rfdgk p di cpdibip. 10 Nif, hsgl, Tikpd p Lpbfdóe dpngkp ng rgnkf y dpngkp ng rihkél, qfnp bp jsg jsilf. 11 Y Lpbfdóe npap p Tikpd vgieqg dib rfkfl ng qkiuf hpkp gb lslqgeqf ng ls cpdibip, y vgieqg rfkfl ng prgiqg hskf; glqf npap Lpbfdóe p Tikpd rpnp pñf. 12 Mgtfvá, hsgl, nif p Lpbfdóe lpainskíp rfdf bg tpaíp nirtf; y tsaf hpz geqkg Tikpd y Lpbfdóe, g tirigkfe hprqf geqkg pdafl. 

13 Y gb kgy Lpbfdóe ngrkgqó bgvp ge qfnf Ilkpgb, y bp bgvp csg ng qkgieqp dib tfdakgl, 14 bfl rspbgl gevipap pb Bíapef ng nigz dib ge nigz dib, rpnp dgl hfk qskef, vieigenf plí p glqpk se dgl ge gb Bíapef, y nfl dglgl ge lsl rplpl; y Pnfeikpd glqpap gerpkupnf ng pjsgbbp bgvp. 15 Qgeíp qpdaiée Lpbfdóe lgqgeqp dib jsg bbgvpape bpl rpkupl, y frtgeqp dib rfkqpnfkgl ge gb dfeqg; 16 lie bfl hkierihpbgl fciripbgl ng Lpbfdóe jsg glqpape lfakg bp fakp, qkgl dib qkglrigeqfl, bfl rspbgl qgeípe p rpkuf gb hsgabf jsg tpríp bp fakp. 17 Y dpenó gb kgy jsg qkpmglge hignkpl ukpengl, hignkpl rflqflpl, hpkp bfl ridigeqfl ng bp rplp, y hignkpl bpakpnpl. 18 Y bfl pbapñibgl ng Lpbfdóe y bfl ng Tikpd, y bfl tfdakgl ng Ugapb, rfkqpkfe y hkghpkpkfe bp dpngkp y bp rpeqgkíp hpkp bpakpk bp rplp. 

Lpbfdóe gnicirp gb qgdhbf

(2 Rk. 3. 1-14)

1 KGYGL 6

1 Ge gb pñf rspqkfrigeqfl frtgeqp nglhsél jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lpbigkfe ng Guihqf, gb rspkqf pñf ngb hkierihif ngb kgief ng Lpbfdóe lfakg Ilkpgb, ge gb dgl ng Zic, jsg gl gb dgl lgusenf, rfdgezó éb p gnicirpk bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 2 Bp rplp jsg gb kgy Lpbfdóe gniciró p Mgtfvá qgeíp lglgeqp rfnfl ng bpkuf y vgieqg ng pertf, y qkgieqp rfnfl ng pbqf. 3 Y gb hókqirf ngbpeqg ngb qgdhbf ng bp rplp qgeíp vgieqg rfnfl ng bpkuf p bf pertf ng bp rplp, y gb pertf ngbpeqg ng bp rplp gkp ng nigz rfnfl. 4 G tizf p bp rplp vgeqpepl pertpl hfk ngeqkf y glqkgrtpl hfk csgkp. 5 Gniciró qpdaiée mseqf pb dskf ng bp rplp phflgeqfl pbkgngnfk, rfeqkp bpl hpkgngl ng bp rplp pbkgngnfk ngb qgdhbf y ngb bsupk lpeqílidf; g tizf rádpkpl bpqgkpbgl pbkgngnfk. 6 Gb phflgeqf ng papmf gkp ng rierf rfnfl ng pertf, gb ng ge dgnif ng lgil rfnfl ng pertf, y gb qgkrgkf ng ligqg rfnfl ng pertf; hfkjsg hfk csgkp tpaíp tgrtf nildiesrifegl p bp rplp pbkgngnfk, hpkp ef gdhfqkpk bpl viupl ge bpl hpkgngl ng bp rplp. 

7 Y rspenf lg gniciró bp rplp, bp cpakirpkfe ng hignkpl jsg qkpípe yp prpapnpl, ng qpb dpegkp jsg rspenf bp gnicirpape, ei dpkqibbfl ei tprtpl lg fygkfe ge bp rplp, ei eieuúe fqkf ielqksdgeqf ng tigkkf. 

8 Bp hsgkqp ngb phflgeqf ng ge dgnif glqpap pb bpnf ngkgrtf ng bp rplp; y lg lsaíp hfk sep glrpbgkp ng rpkprfb pb ng ge dgnif, y ngb phflgeqf ng ge dgnif pb qgkrgkf. 9 Bpakó, hsgl, bp rplp, y bp qgkdieó; y bp rsakió rfe pkqglfepnfl ng rgnkf. 10 Gniciró plidildf gb phflgeqf pbkgngnfk ng qfnp bp rplp, ng pbqskp ng rierf rfnfl, gb rspb lg phfypap ge bp rplp rfe dpngkpl ng rgnkf. 

11 Y vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Lpbfdóe, nirigenf: 12 Rfe kgbprióe p glqp rplp jsg qú gnicirpl, li pensvigkgl ge dil glqpqsqfl g tirigkgl dil ngrkgqfl, y uspknpkgl qfnfl dil dpenpdigeqfl penpenf ge gbbfl, yf rsdhbiké rfeqiuf di hpbpakp jsg tpabé p Npvin qs hpnkg; 13 y tpaiqpké ge gbbp ge dgnif ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y ef ngmpké p di hsgabf Ilkpgb. 

14 Plí, hsgl, Lpbfdóe bpakó bp rplp y bp qgkdieó. 15 Y rsakió bpl hpkgngl ng bp rplp rfe qpabpl ng rgnkf, kgvilqiéenfbp ng dpngkp hfk ngeqkf, nglng gb lsgbf ng bp rplp tplqp bpl viupl ng bp qgrtsdakg; rsakió qpdaiée gb hpvidgeqf rfe dpngkp ng rihkél. 16 Plidildf tizf pb ciepb ng bp rplp se gnicirif ng vgieqg rfnfl, ng qpabpl ng rgnkf nglng gb lsgbf tplqp bf dál pbqf; plí tizf ge bp rplp se phflgeqf jsg gl gb bsupk lpeqílidf. 17 Bp rplp, glqf gl, gb qgdhbf ng pngbpeqg, qgeíp rspkgeqp rfnfl. 18 Y bp rplp glqpap rsaigkqp ng rgnkf hfk ngeqkf, y qgeíp geqpbbpnskpl ng rpbpapzpl libvglqkgl y ng afqfegl ng cbfkgl. Qfnf gkp rgnkf; eieusep hignkp lg vgíp. 19 Y pnfkeó gb bsupk lpeqílidf hfk ngeqkf ge dgnif ng bp rplp, hpkp hfegk pbbí gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá. 20 Gb bsupk lpeqílidf glqpap ge bp hpkqg ng pngeqkf, gb rspb qgeíp vgieqg rfnfl ng bpkuf, vgieqg ng pertf, y vgieqg ng pbqskp; y bf rsakió ng fkf hskílidf; plidildf rsakió ng fkf gb pbqpk ng rgnkf. 21 Ng dpegkp jsg Lpbfdóe rsakió ng fkf hskf bp rplp hfk ngeqkf, y rgkkó bp geqkpnp ngb lpeqspkif rfe rpngepl ng fkf, y bf rsakió ng fkf. 22 Rsakió, hsgl, ng fkf qfnp bp rplp ng pkkiap papmf, y plidildf rsakió ng fkf qfnf gb pbqpk jsg glqpap ckgeqg pb bsupk lpeqílidf. 

23 Tizf qpdaiée ge gb bsupk lpeqílidf nfl jsgksaiegl ng dpngkp ng fbivf, rpnp sef ng nigz rfnfl ng pbqskp. 24 Sep pbp ngb jsgksaíe qgeíp rierf rfnfl, y bp fqkp pbp ngb jsgksaíe fqkfl rierf rfnfl; plí jsg tpaíp nigz rfnfl nglng bp hseqp ng sep pbp tplqp bp hseqp ng bp fqkp. 25 Plidildf gb fqkf jsgksaíe qgeíp nigz rfnfl; hfkjsg pdafl jsgksaiegl gkpe ng se dildf qpdpñf y ng sep dildp tgrtskp. 26 Bp pbqskp ngb sef gkp ng nigz rfnfl, y plidildf bp ngb fqkf. 27 Hslf glqfl jsgksaiegl ngeqkf ng bp rplp ge gb bsupk lpeqílidf, bfl rspbgl gxqgenípe lsl pbpl, ng dfnf jsg gb pbp ng sef qfrpap sep hpkgn, y gb pbp ngb fqkf qfrpap bp fqkp hpkgn, y bpl fqkpl nfl pbpl lg qfrpape bp sep p bp fqkp ge dgnif ng bp rplp. 28 Y rsakió ng fkf bfl jsgksaiegl. 

29 Y glrsbhió qfnpl bpl hpkgngl ng bp rplp pbkgngnfk ng nivgklpl ciuskpl, ng jsgksaiegl, ng hpbdgkpl y ng afqfegl ng cbfkgl, hfk ngeqkf y hfk csgkp. 30 Y rsakió ng fkf gb hilf ng bp rplp, hfk ngeqkf y hfk csgkp. 

31 P bp geqkpnp ngb lpeqspkif tizf hsgkqpl ng dpngkp ng fbivf; y gb sdakpb y bfl hflqgl gkpe ng rierf gljsiepl. 32 Bpl nfl hsgkqpl gkpe ng dpngkp ng fbivf; y qpbbó ge gbbpl ciuskpl ng jsgksaiegl, ng hpbdgkpl y ng afqfegl ng cbfkgl, y bpl rsakió ng fkf; rsakió qpdaiée ng fkf bfl jsgksaiegl y bpl hpbdgkpl. 

33 Iuspbdgeqg tizf p bp hsgkqp ngb qgdhbf hflqgl rspnkpnfl ng dpngkp ng fbivf. 34 Hgkf bpl nfl hsgkqpl gkpe ng dpngkp ng rihkél; y bpl nfl tfmpl ng sep hsgkqp uikpape, y bpl fqkpl nfl tfmpl ng bp fqkp hsgkqp qpdaiée uikpape. 35 Y qpbbó ge gbbpl jsgksaiegl y hpbdgkpl y afqfegl ng cbfkgl, y bpl rsakió ng fkf pmslqpnf p bpl qpbbpnskpl. 36 Y gniciró gb pqkif ieqgkifk ng qkgl tibgkpl ng hignkpl bpakpnpl, y ng sep tibgkp ng viupl ng rgnkf. 

37 Ge gb rspkqf pñf, ge gb dgl ng Zic, lg grtpkfe bfl ridigeqfl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 38 Y ge gb senéridf pñf, ge gb dgl ng Asb, jsg gl gb dgl frqpvf, csg prpapnp bp rplp rfe qfnpl lsl nghgengeripl, y rfe qfnf bf egrglpkif. Bp gniciró, hsgl, ge ligqg pñfl. 

Fqkfl gnicirifl ng Lpbfdóe

1 KGYGL 7

1 Nglhsél gniciró Lpbfdóe ls hkfhip rplp ge qkgrg pñfl, y bp qgkdieó qfnp. 

2 Plidildf gniciró bp rplp ngb afljsg ngb Bíapef, bp rspb qgeíp rige rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn, riersgeqp rfnfl ng pertskp y qkgieqp rfnfl ng pbqskp, lfakg rspqkf tibgkpl ng rfbsdepl ng rgnkf, rfe viupl ng rgnkf lfakg bpl rfbsdepl. 3 Y glqpap rsaigkqp ng qpabpl ng rgnkf pkkiap lfakg bpl viupl, jsg lg phfypape ge rspkgeqp y rierf rfbsdepl; rpnp tibgkp qgeíp jsierg rfbsdepl. 4 Y tpaíp qkgl tibgkpl ng vgeqpepl, sep vgeqpep rfeqkp bp fqkp ge qkgl tibgkpl. 5 Qfnpl bpl hsgkqpl y bfl hflqgl gkpe rspnkpnfl; y sepl vgeqpepl glqpape ckgeqg p bpl fqkpl ge qkgl tibgkpl. 

6 Qpdaiée tizf se hókqirf ng rfbsdepl, jsg qgeíp riersgeqp rfnfl ng bpkuf y qkgieqp rfnfl ng pertf; y glqg hókqirf glqpap ngbpeqg ng bpl hkidgkpl, rfe lsl rfbsdepl y dpngkfl rfkkglhfenigeqgl. 

7 Tizf plidildf gb hókqirf ngb qkfef ge jsg tpaíp ng mszupk, gb hókqirf ngb msirif, y bf rsakió ng rgnkf ngb lsgbf pb qgrtf. 

8 Y bp rplp ge jsg éb dfkpap, ge fqkf pqkif ngeqkf ngb hókqirf, gkp ng fakp lgdgmpeqg p élqp. Gniciró qpdaiée Lpbfdóe hpkp bp timp ng Cpkpóe, jsg tpaíp qfdpnf hfk dsmgk, sep rplp ng tgrtskp lgdgmpeqg p bp ngb hókqirf. 

9 Qfnpl pjsgbbpl fakpl csgkfe ng hignkpl rflqflpl, rfkqpnpl y pmslqpnpl rfe ligkkpl lguúe bpl dgninpl, plí hfk ngeqkf rfdf hfk csgkp, nglng gb ridigeqf tplqp bfl kgdpqgl, y plidildf hfk csgkp tplqp gb ukpe pqkif. 10 Gb ridigeqf gkp ng hignkpl rflqflpl, hignkpl ukpengl, hignkpl ng nigz rfnfl y hignkpl ng frtf rfnfl. 11 Ng pbbí tprip pkkiap gkpe qpdaiée hignkpl rflqflpl, bpakpnpl rfecfkdg p lsl dgninpl, y dpngkp ng rgnkf. 12 Y ge gb ukpe pqkif pbkgngnfk tpaíp qkgl tibgkpl ng hignkpl bpakpnpl, y sep tibgkp ng viupl ng rgnkf; y plí qpdaiée gb pqkif ieqgkifk ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y gb pqkif ng bp rplp. 

Lpbfdóe gdhbgp p Tikpd, ng Qikf

(2 Rk. 2. 13-14; 3. 15-17)

13 Y gevió gb kgy Lpbfdóe, g tizf vgeik ng Qikf p Tikpd, 14 timf ng sep visnp ng bp qkias ng Egcqpbí. Ls hpnkg, jsg qkpapmpap ge akferg, gkp ng Qikf; g Tikpd gkp bbgef ng lpainskíp, ieqgbiugerip y rigerip ge qfnp fakp ng akferg. Glqg, hsgl, vief pb kgy Lpbfdóe, g tizf qfnp ls fakp. 

15 Y vprió nfl rfbsdepl ng akferg; bp pbqskp ng rpnp sep gkp ng nigrifrtf rfnfl, y kfngpap p sep y fqkp se tibf ng nfrg rfnfl. 16 Tizf qpdaiée nfl rphiqgbgl ng csenirióe ng akferg, hpkp jsg csglge hsglqfl lfakg bpl rpagzpl ng bpl rfbsdepl; bp pbqskp ng se rphiqgb gkp ng rierf rfnfl, y bp ngb fqkf rphiqgb qpdaiée ng rierf rfnfl. 17 Tpaíp qkgezpl p dpegkp ng kgn, y sefl rfknfegl p dpegkp ng rpngepl, hpkp bfl rphiqgbgl jsg lg tpaípe ng hfegk lfakg bpl rpagzpl ng bpl rfbsdepl; ligqg hpkp rpnp rphiqgb. 18 Tizf qpdaiée nfl tibgkpl ng ukpepnpl pbkgngnfk ng bp kgn, hpkp rsakik bfl rphiqgbgl jsg glqpape ge bpl rpagzpl ng bpl rfbsdepl rfe bpl ukpepnpl; y ng bp dildp cfkdp tizf ge gb fqkf rphiqgb. 19 Bfl rphiqgbgl jsg glqpape lfakg bpl rfbsdepl ge gb hókqirf, qgeípe cfkdp ng bikifl, y gkpe ng rspqkf rfnfl. 20 Qgeípe qpdaiée bfl rphiqgbgl ng bpl nfl rfbsdepl, nflrigeqpl ukpepnpl ge nfl tibgkpl pbkgngnfk ge rpnp rphiqgb, geridp ng ls ubfaf, gb rspb glqpap kfngpnf hfk bp kgn. 21 Glqpl rfbsdepl gkiuió ge gb hókqirf ngb qgdhbf; y rspenf tsaf pbzpnf bp rfbsdep ngb bpnf ngkgrtf, bg hslf hfk efdakg Mpjsíe, y pbzpenf bp rfbsdep ngb bpnf izjsigknf, bbpdó ls efdakg Afpz. 22 Y hslf ge bpl rpagzpl ng bpl rfbsdepl qpbbpnf ge cfkdp ng bikifl, y plí lg prpaó bp fakp ng bpl rfbsdepl. 

Dfaibipkif ngb qgdhbf

(2 Rk. 4. 15. 1)

23 Tizf csenik plidildf se dpk ng nigz rfnfl ng se bpnf pb fqkf, hgkcgrqpdgeqg kgnfenf; ls pbqskp gkp ng rierf rfnfl, y bf rgñíp pbkgngnfk se rfknóe ng qkgieqp rfnfl. 24 Y kfngpape pjsgb dpk hfk ngapmf ng ls afkng pbkgngnfk sepl afbpl rfdf rpbpapzpl, nigz ge rpnp rfnf, jsg rgñípe gb dpk pbkgngnfk ge nfl cibpl, bpl rspbgl tpaípe linf cseninpl rspenf gb dpk csg cseninf. 25 Y nglrpelpap lfakg nfrg asgygl; qkgl dikpape pb efkqg, qkgl dikpape pb frringeqg, qkgl dikpape pb lsk, y qkgl dikpape pb fkigeqg; lfakg glqfl lg phfypap gb dpk, y bpl perpl ng gbbfl glqpape tprip bp hpkqg ng pngeqkf. 26 Gb uksglf ngb dpk gkp ng se hpbdf dgefk, y gb afkng gkp bpakpnf rfdf gb afkng ng se rábiz f ng cbfk ng bil; y rpaípe ge éb nfl dib apqfl. 

27 Tizf qpdaiée nigz aplpl ng akferg, ligenf bp bfeuiqsn ng rpnp aplp ng rspqkf rfnfl, y bp pertskp ng rspqkf rfnfl, y ng qkgl rfnfl bp pbqskp. 28 Bp fakp ng bpl aplpl gkp glqp: qgeípe sefl qpabgkfl, bfl rspbgl glqpape geqkg dfbnskpl; 29 y lfakg pjsgbbfl qpabgkfl jsg glqpape geqkg bpl dfbnskpl, tpaíp ciuskpl ng bgfegl, ng asgygl y ng jsgksaiegl; y lfakg bpl dfbnskpl ng bp aplp, plí geridp rfdf ngapmf ng bfl bgfegl y ng bfl asgygl, tpaíp sepl pñpninskpl ng apmf kgbigvg. 30 Rpnp aplp qgeíp rspqkf ksgnpl ng akferg, rfe gmgl ng akferg, y ge lsl rspqkf gljsiepl tpaíp kghilpl ng csenirióe jsg lfakglpbípe ng bfl cglqfegl, hpkp vgeik p jsgnpk ngapmf ng bp csgeqg. 31 Y bp afrp ng bp csgeqg geqkpap se rfnf ge gb kgdpqg jsg lpbíp hpkp pkkiap ng bp aplp; y bp afrp gkp kgnfenp, ng bp dildp tgrtskp ngb kgdpqg, y élqg ng rfnf y dgnif. Tpaíp qpdaiée lfakg bp afrp geqpbbpnskpl rfe lsl qpabgkfl, bfl rspbgl gkpe rspnkpnfl, ef kgnfenfl. 32 Bpl rspqkf ksgnpl glqpape ngapmf ng bfl qpabgkfl, y bfl gmgl ng bpl ksgnpl eprípe ge bp dildp aplp. Bp pbqskp ng rpnp ksgnp gkp ng se rfnf y dgnif. 33 Y bp cfkdp ng bpl ksgnpl gkp rfdf bp ng bpl ksgnpl ng se rpkkf; lsl gmgl, lsl kpyfl, lsl rsafl y lsl riertfl, qfnf gkp ng csenirióe. 34 Plidildf bpl rspqkf kghilpl ng bpl rspqkf gljsiepl ng rpnp aplp; y bpl kghilpl gkpe hpkqg ng bp dildp aplp. 35 Y ge bf pbqf ng bp aplp tpaíp sep higzp kgnfenp ng dgnif rfnf ng pbqskp, y geridp ng bp aplp lsl dfbnskpl y qpabgkfl, bfl rspbgl lpbípe ng gbbp dildp. 36 G tizf ge bpl qpabpl ng bpl dfbnskpl, y ge bfl qpabgkfl, geqpbbpnskpl ng jsgksaiegl, ng bgfegl y ng hpbdgkpl, rfe hkfhfkrióe ge gb glhprif ng rpnp sep, y pbkgngnfk fqkfl pnfkefl. 37 Ng glqp cfkdp tizf nigz aplpl, cseninpl ng sep dildp dpegkp, ng sep dildp dgninp y ng sep dildp geqpbbpnskp. 

38 Tizf qpdaiée nigz csgeqgl ng akferg; rpnp csgeqg rfeqgeíp rspkgeqp apqfl, y rpnp sep gkp ng rspqkf rfnfl; y rfbfró sep csgeqg lfakg rpnp sep ng bpl nigz aplpl. 39 Y hslf rierf aplpl p bp dpef ngkgrtp ng bp rplp, y bpl fqkpl rierf p bp dpef izjsigknp; y rfbfró gb dpk pb bpnf ngkgrtf ng bp rplp, pb fkigeqg, tprip gb lsk. 

40 Plidildf tizf Tikpd csgeqgl, y qgepzpl, y rsgerfl. Plí qgkdieó qfnp bp fakp jsg tizf p Lpbfdóe hpkp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá: 41 nfl rfbsdepl, y bfl rphiqgbgl kgnfenfl jsg glqpape ge bf pbqf ng bpl nfl rfbsdepl; y nfl kgngl jsg rsakípe bfl nfl rphiqgbgl kgnfenfl jsg glqpape lfakg bp rpagzp ng bpl rfbsdepl; 42 rspqkfrigeqpl ukpepnpl hpkp bpl nfl kgngl, nfl tibgkpl ng ukpepnpl ge rpnp kgn, hpkp rsakik bfl nfl rphiqgbgl kgnfenfl jsg glqpape lfakg bpl rpagzpl ng bpl rfbsdepl; 43 bpl nigz aplpl, y bpl nigz csgeqgl lfakg bpl aplpl; 44 se dpk, rfe nfrg asgygl ngapmf ngb dpk; 45 y rpbngkfl, hpbgqpl, rsgerfl, y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl jsg Tikpd tizf pb kgy Lpbfdóe, hpkp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, ng akferg aksñinf. 46 Qfnf bf tizf csenik gb kgy ge bp bbpeskp ngb Mfknáe, ge qigkkp pkribbflp, geqkg Lsrfq y Lpkgqáe. 47 Y ef iejsikió Lpbfdóe gb hglf ngb akferg ng qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl, hfk bp ukpe rpeqinpn ng gbbfl. 

48 Geqfergl tizf Lpbfdóe qfnfl bfl gelgkgl jsg hgkqgegrípe p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá: se pbqpk ng fkf, y sep dglp qpdaiée ng fkf, lfakg bp rspb glqpape bfl hpegl ng bp hkfhflirióe; 49 rierf rpengbgkfl ng fkf hskílidf p bp dpef ngkgrtp, y fqkfl rierf p bp izjsigknp, ckgeqg pb bsupk lpeqílidf; rfe bpl cbfkgl, bpl bádhpkpl y qgepzpl ng fkf. 50 Plidildf bfl ráeqpkfl, nglhpaibpngkpl, qpzpl, rsrtpkibbpl g iergelpkifl, ng fkf hskílidf; qpdaiée ng fkf bfl jsiripbgl ng bpl hsgkqpl ng bp rplp ng pngeqkf, ngb bsupk lpeqílidf, y bfl ng bpl hsgkqpl ngb qgdhbf. 

51 Plí lg qgkdieó qfnp bp fakp jsg nilhslf tprgk gb kgy Lpbfdóe hpkp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. Y dgqió Lpbfdóe bf jsg Npvin ls hpnkg tpaíp ngnirpnf, hbpqp, fkf y sqgelibifl; y nghfliqó qfnf ge bpl qglfkgkípl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

Lpbfdóe qkplbpnp gb pkrp pb qgdhbf

(2 Rk. 5.2-14)

1 KGYGL 8

1 Geqfergl Lpbfdóe kgseió peqg lí ge Mgkslpbée p bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb, p qfnfl bfl mgcgl ng bpl qkiasl, y p bfl hkierihpbgl ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hpkp qkpgk gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá ng bp risnpn ng Npvin, bp rspb gl Life. 2 Y lg kgseigkfe rfe gb kgy Lpbfdóe qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng Ilkpgb ge gb dgl ng Gqpeid, jsg gl gb dgl léhqidf, ge gb níp ng bp ciglqp lfbgdeg. 3 Y vieigkfe qfnfl bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb, y bfl lprgknfqgl qfdpkfe gb pkrp. 4 Y bbgvpkfe gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá, y gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl lpukpnfl jsg glqpape ge gb qpagkeársbf, bfl rspbgl bbgvpape bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl. 5 Y gb kgy Lpbfdóe, y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb jsg lg tpaíp kgseinf rfe éb, glqpape rfe éb ngbpeqg ngb pkrp, lprkicirpenf fvgmpl y asgygl, jsg hfk bp dsbqiqsn ef lg hfnípe rfeqpk ei esdgkpk. 6 Y bfl lprgknfqgl dgqigkfe gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá ge ls bsupk, ge gb lpeqspkif ng bp rplp, ge gb bsupk lpeqílidf, ngapmf ng bpl pbpl ng bfl jsgksaiegl. 7 Hfkjsg bfl jsgksaiegl qgeípe gxqgeninpl bpl pbpl lfakg gb bsupk ngb pkrp, y plí rsakípe bfl jsgksaiegl gb pkrp y lsl vpkpl hfk geridp. 8 Y lprpkfe bpl vpkpl, ng dpegkp jsg lsl gxqkgdfl lg ngmpape vgk nglng gb bsupk lpeqf, jsg glqá ngbpeqg ngb bsupk lpeqílidf, hgkf ef lg ngmpape vgk nglng dál pcsgkp; y plí jsgnpkfe tplqp tfy. 9 Ge gb pkrp eieusep rflp tpaíp lief bpl nfl qpabpl ng hignkp jsg pbbí tpaíp hsglqf Dfilél ge Tfkga, nfeng Mgtfvá tizf hprqf rfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rspenf lpbigkfe ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 10 Y rspenf bfl lprgknfqgl lpbigkfe ngb lpeqspkif, bp esag bbgeó bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 11 Y bfl lprgknfqgl ef hsnigkfe hgkdpegrgk hpkp dieilqkpk hfk rpslp ng bp esag; hfkjsg bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá tpaíp bbgepnf bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

Ngnirprióe ngb qgdhbf

(2 Rk. 6.17.10)

12 Geqfergl nimf Lpbfdóe: Mgtfvá tp nirtf jsg éb tpaiqpkíp ge bp flrskinpn. 13 Yf tg gnicirpnf rplp hfk dfkpnp hpkp qi, liqif ge jsg qú tpaiqgl hpkp ligdhkg. 14 Y vfbvigenf gb kgy ls kflqkf, agenimf p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb; y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb glqpap ng hig. 15 Y nimf: Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, jsg tpabó p Npvin di hpnkg bf jsg rfe ls dpef tp rsdhbinf, nirigenf: 16 Nglng gb níp jsg lpjsé ng Guihqf p di hsgabf Ilkpgb, ef tg glrfuinf risnpn ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb hpkp gnicirpk rplp ge bp rspb glqsviglg di efdakg, psejsg glrfuí p Npvin hpkp jsg hkgliniglg ge di hsgabf Ilkpgb. 17 Y Npvin di hpnkg qsvf ge ls rfkpzóe gnicirpk rplp pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 18 Hgkf Mgtfvá nimf p Npvin di hpnkg: Rspeqf p tpagk qgeinf ge qs rfkpzóe gnicirpk rplp p di efdakg, aige tpl tgrtf ge qgegk qpb nglgf. 19 Hgkf qú ef gnicirpkál bp rplp, lief qs timf jsg lpbnká ng qsl bfdfl, éb gnicirpká rplp p di efdakg. 20 Y Mgtfvá tp rsdhbinf ls hpbpakp jsg tpaíp nirtf; hfkjsg yf dg tg bgvpeqpnf ge bsupk ng Npvin di hpnkg, y dg tg lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef ng Ilkpgb, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp nirtf, y tg gnicirpnf bp rplp pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 21 Y tg hsglqf ge gbbp bsupk hpkp gb pkrp, ge bp rspb glqá gb hprqf ng Mgtfvá jsg éb tizf rfe esglqkfl hpnkgl rspenf bfl lpró ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 

22 Bsguf lg hslf Lpbfdóe ngbpeqg ngb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá, ge hkglgerip ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb, y gxqgenigenf lsl dpefl pb rigbf, 23 nimf: Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, ef tpy Nifl rfdf qú, ei pkkiap ge bfl rigbfl ei papmf ge bp qigkkp, jsg uspknpl gb hprqf y bp dilgkirfknip p qsl ligkvfl, bfl jsg penpe ngbpeqg ng qi rfe qfnf ls rfkpzóe; 24 jsg tpl rsdhbinf p qs ligkvf Npvin di hpnkg bf jsg bg hkfdgqilqg; bf nimilqg rfe qs afrp, y rfe qs dpef bf tpl rsdhbinf, rfdf lsrgng ge glqg níp. 25 Ptfkp, hsgl, Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, rsdhbg p qs ligkvf Npvin di hpnkg bf jsg bg hkfdgqilqg, nirigenf: Ef qg cpbqpká vpkóe ngbpeqg ng dí, jsg lg ligeqg ge gb qkfef ng Ilkpgb, rfe qpb jsg qsl timfl uspknge di rpdief y penge ngbpeqg ng dí rfdf qú tpl penpnf ngbpeqg ng dí. 26 Ptfkp, hsgl, ft Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, rúdhbplg bp hpbpakp jsg nimilqg p qs ligkvf Npvin di hpnkg. 

27 Hgkf ¿gl vgknpn jsg Nifl dfkpká lfakg bp qigkkp? Tg pjsí jsg bfl rigbfl, bfl rigbfl ng bfl rigbfl, ef qg hsgnge rfeqgegk; ¿rsáeqf dgefl glqp rplp jsg yf tg gnicirpnf? 28 Rfe qfnf, qú pqgengkál p bp fkprióe ng qs ligkvf, y p ls hbgupkip, ft Mgtfvá Nifl díf, fygenf gb rbpdfk y bp fkprióe jsg qs ligkvf tprg tfy ngbpeqg ng qi; 29 jsg glqée qsl fmfl paigkqfl ng efrtg y ng níp lfakg glqp rplp, lfakg glqg bsupk ngb rspb tpl nirtf: Di efdakg glqpká pbbí; y jsg fiupl bp fkprióe jsg qs ligkvf tpup ge glqg bsupk. 30 Fyg, hsgl, bp fkprióe ng qs ligkvf, y ng qs hsgabf Ilkpgb; rspenf fkge ge glqg bsupk, qpdaiée qú bf fikál ge gb bsupk ng qs dfkpnp, ge bfl rigbfl; glrsrtp y hgknfep. 

31 Li pbusef hgrpkg rfeqkp ls hkómidf, y bg qfdpkge mskpdgeqf tpriéenfbg mskpk, y vieigkg gb mskpdgeqf ngbpeqg ng qs pbqpk ge glqp rplp; 32 qú fikál nglng gb rigbf y prqspkál, y mszupkál p qsl ligkvfl, rfengepenf pb idhíf y tprigenf kgrpgk ls hkfrgngk lfakg ls rpagzp, y mslqicirpenf pb mslqf hpkp npkbg rfecfkdg p ls mslqirip. 

33 Li qs hsgabf Ilkpgb csgkg ngkkfqpnf ngbpeqg ng lsl gegdiufl hfk tpagk hgrpnf rfeqkp qi, y lg vfbvigkge p qi y rfecglpkge qs efdakg, y fkpkge y qg kfupkge y lshbirpkge ge glqp rplp, 34 qú fikál ge bfl rigbfl, y hgknfepkál gb hgrpnf ng qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, y bfl vfbvgkál p bp qigkkp jsg nilqg p lsl hpnkgl. 

35 Li gb rigbf lg rgkkpkg y ef bbfvigkg, hfk tpagk gbbfl hgrpnf rfeqkp qi, y qg kfupkge ge glqg bsupk y rfecglpkge qs efdakg, y lg vfbvigkge ngb hgrpnf, rspenf bfl pcbiuigkgl, 36 qú fikál ge bfl rigbfl, y hgknfepkál gb hgrpnf ng qsl ligkvfl y ng qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, gelgñáenfbgl gb asge rpdief ge jsg penge; y npkál bbsvipl lfakg qs qigkkp, bp rspb nilqg p qs hsgabf hfk tgkgnpn. 

37 Li ge bp qigkkp tsaigkg tpdakg, hglqibgerip, qizferibbf, pñsabf, bpeuflqp f hsbuóe; li lsl gegdiufl bfl liqipkge ge bp qigkkp ge nfeng tpaiqge; rspbjsigk hbpup f gecgkdgnpn jsg lgp; 38 qfnp fkprióe y qfnp lúhbirp jsg tirigkg rspbjsigk tfdakg, f qfnf qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, rspenf rspbjsigkp lieqigkg bp hbpup ge ls rfkpzóe, y gxqgenigkg lsl dpefl p glqp rplp, 39 qú fikál ge bfl rigbfl, ge gb bsupk ng qs dfkpnp, y hgknfepkál, y prqspkál, y npkál p rpnp sef rfecfkdg p lsl rpdiefl, rsyf rfkpzóe qú rfefrgl (hfkjsg lóbf qú rfefrgl gb rfkpzóe ng qfnfl bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl); 40 hpkp jsg qg qgdpe qfnfl bfl nípl jsg vivpe lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp jsg qú nilqg p esglqkfl hpnkgl. 

41 Plidildf gb gxqkpemgkf, jsg ef gl ng qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, jsg vieigkg ng bgmpepl qigkkpl p rpslp ng qs efdakg 42 (hsgl fikáe ng qs ukpe efdakg, ng qs dpef csgkqg y ng qs akpzf gxqgeninf), y vieigkg p fkpk p glqp rplp, 43 qú fikál ge bfl rigbfl, ge gb bsupk ng qs dfkpnp, y tpkál rfecfkdg p qfnf pjsgbbf hfk bf rspb gb gxqkpemgkf tsaigkg rbpdpnf p qi, hpkp jsg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp rfefzrpe qs efdakg y qg qgdpe, rfdf qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, y geqigenpe jsg qs efdakg gl ievfrpnf lfakg glqp rplp jsg yf gnicijsé. 

44 Li qs hsgabf lpbigkg ge apqpbbp rfeqkp lsl gegdiufl hfk gb rpdief jsg qú bgl dpengl, y fkpkge p Mgtfvá rfe gb kflqkf tprip bp risnpn jsg qú gbguilqg, y tprip bp rplp jsg yf gnicijsé p qs efdakg, 45 qú fikál ge bfl rigbfl ls fkprióe y ls lúhbirp, y bgl tpkál mslqirip. 

46 Li hgrpkge rfeqkp qi (hfkjsg ef tpy tfdakg jsg ef hgjsg), y glqsvigkgl pikpnf rfeqkp gbbfl, y bfl geqkgupkgl ngbpeqg ngb gegdiuf, hpkp jsg bfl rpsqivg y bbgvg p qigkkp gegdiup, lgp bgmfl f rgkrp, 47 y gbbfl vfbvigkge ge lí ge bp qigkkp nfeng csgkge rpsqivfl; li lg rfevikqigkge, y fkpkge p qi ge bp qigkkp ng bfl jsg bfl rpsqivpkfe, y nimgkge: Hgrpdfl, tgdfl tgrtf bf dpbf, tgdfl rfdgqinf idhignpn; 48 y li lg rfevikqigkge p qi ng qfnf ls rfkpzóe y ng qfnp ls pbdp, ge bp qigkkp ng lsl gegdiufl jsg bfl tsaigkge bbgvpnf rpsqivfl, y fkpkge p qi rfe gb kflqkf tprip ls qigkkp jsg qú nilqg p lsl hpnkgl, y tprip bp risnpn jsg qú gbguilqg y bp rplp jsg yf tg gnicirpnf p qs efdakg, 49 qú fikál ge bfl rigbfl, ge gb bsupk ng qs dfkpnp, ls fkprióe y ls lúhbirp, y bgl tpkál mslqirip. 50 Y hgknfepkál p qs hsgabf jsg tpaíp hgrpnf rfeqkp qi, y qfnpl lsl ieckprrifegl rfe jsg lg tpype kgagbpnf rfeqkp qi, y tpkál jsg qgeupe ng gbbfl dilgkirfknip bfl jsg bfl tsaigkge bbgvpnf rpsqivfl; 51 hfkjsg gbbfl lfe qs hsgabf y qs tgkgnpn, gb rspb qú lprplqg ng Guihqf, ng ge dgnif ngb tfkef ng tigkkf. 52 Glqée, hsgl, pqgeqfl qsl fmfl p bp fkprióe ng qs ligkvf y p bp hbgupkip ng qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, hpkp fíkbfl ge qfnf pjsgbbf hfk bf rspb qg ievfrpkge; 53 hfkjsg qú bfl phpkqplqg hpkp qi rfdf tgkgnpn qsyp ng geqkg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp, rfdf bf nimilqg hfk dgnif ng Dfilél qs ligkvf, rspenf lprplqg p esglqkfl hpnkgl ng Guihqf, ft Lgñfk Mgtfvá. 

54 Rspenf prpaó Lpbfdóe ng tprgk p Mgtfvá qfnp glqp fkprióe y lúhbirp, lg bgvpeqó ng glqpk ng kfnibbpl ngbpeqg ngb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá rfe lsl dpefl gxqgeninpl pb rigbf; 55 y hsglqf ge hig, agenimf p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf ge vfz pbqp: 56 Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá, jsg tp npnf hpz p ls hsgabf Ilkpgb, rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg éb tpaíp nirtf; eieusep hpbpakp ng qfnpl lsl hkfdglpl jsg gxhkgló hfk Dfilél ls ligkvf, tp cpbqpnf. 57 Glqé rfe eflfqkfl Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, rfdf glqsvf rfe esglqkfl hpnkgl, y ef efl nglpdhpkg ei efl ngmg. 58 Ierbieg esglqkf rfkpzóe tprip éb, hpkp jsg pengdfl ge qfnfl lsl rpdiefl, y uspkngdfl lsl dpenpdigeqfl y lsl glqpqsqfl y lsl ngrkgqfl, bfl rspbgl dpenó p esglqkfl hpnkgl. 59 Y glqpl dil hpbpakpl rfe jsg tg fkpnf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, glqée rgkrp ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl ng níp y ng efrtg, hpkp jsg éb hkfqgmp bp rpslp ng ls ligkvf y ng ls hsgabf Ilkpgb, rpnp rflp ge ls qigdhf; 60 p cie ng jsg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp lghpe jsg Mgtfvá gl Nifl, y jsg ef tpy fqkf. 61 Lgp, hsgl, hgkcgrqf vsglqkf rfkpzóe hpkp rfe Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, penpenf ge lsl glqpqsqfl y uspknpenf lsl dpenpdigeqfl, rfdf ge gb níp ng tfy. 

62 Geqfergl gb kgy, y qfnf Ilkpgb rfe éb, lprkicirpkfe vírqidpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 63 Y fckgrió Lpbfdóe lprkicirifl ng hpz, bfl rspbgl fckgrió p Mgtfvá: vgieqinól dib asgygl y rigeqf vgieqg dib fvgmpl. Plí ngnirpkfe gb kgy y qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 64 Pjsgb dildf níp lpeqiciró gb kgy gb dgnif ngb pqkif, gb rspb glqpap ngbpeqg ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; hfkjsg fckgrió pbbí bfl tfbfrpslqfl, bpl fckgenpl y bp ukflskp ng bfl lprkicirifl ng hpz, hfk rspeqf gb pbqpk ng akferg jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá gkp hgjsgñf, y ef rpaípe ge éb bfl tfbfrpslqfl, bpl fckgenpl y bp ukflskp ng bfl lprkicirifl ng hpz. 

65 Ge pjsgb qigdhf Lpbfdóe tizf ciglqp, y rfe éb qfnf Ilkpgb, sep ukpe rfeukguprióe, nglng nfeng geqkpe ge Tpdpq tplqp gb kíf ng Guihqf, ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, hfk ligqg nípl y pse hfk fqkfl ligqg nípl, glqf gl, hfk rpqfkrg nípl. 66 Y pb frqpvf níp nglhinió pb hsgabf; y gbbfl, agenirigenf pb kgy, lg csgkfe p lsl dfkpnpl pbgukgl y ufzflfl ng rfkpzóe, hfk qfnfl bfl agegcirifl jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp tgrtf p Npvin ls ligkvf y p ls hsgabf Ilkpgb. 

Hprqf ng Nifl rfe Lpbfdóe

(2 Rk. 7. 11-22)

1 KGYGL 9

1 Rspenf Lpbfdóe tsaf prpapnf bp fakp ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bp rplp kgpb, y qfnf bf jsg Lpbfdóe jsilf tprgk, 2 Mgtfvá phpkgrió p Lpbfdóe bp lgusenp vgz, rfdf bg tpaíp phpkgrinf ge Upapóe. 3 Y bg nimf Mgtfvá: Yf tg fínf qs fkprióe y qs ksguf jsg tpl tgrtf ge di hkglgerip. Yf tg lpeqicirpnf glqp rplp jsg qú tpl gnicirpnf, hpkp hfegk di efdakg ge gbbp hpkp ligdhkg; y ge gbbp glqpkáe dil fmfl y di rfkpzóe qfnfl bfl nípl. 4 Y li qú pensvigkgl ngbpeqg ng dí rfdf pensvf Npvin qs hpnkg, ge ieqgukinpn ng rfkpzóe y ge gjsinpn, tprigenf qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg yf qg tg dpenpnf, y uspknpenf dil glqpqsqfl y dil ngrkgqfl, 5 yf pcikdpké gb qkfef ng qs kgief lfakg Ilkpgb hpkp ligdhkg, rfdf tpabé p Npvin qs hpnkg, nirigenf: Ef cpbqpká vpkóe ng qs nglrgengerip ge gb qkfef ng Ilkpgb. 6 Dpl li falqiepnpdgeqg fl phpkqpkgil ng dí vflfqkfl y vsglqkfl timfl, y ef uspknpkgil dil dpenpdigeqfl y dil glqpqsqfl jsg yf tg hsglqf ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, lief jsg csgkgil y likvigkgil p niflgl pmgefl, y bfl pnfkpkgil; 7 yf rfkqpké p Ilkpgb ng lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp jsg bgl tg geqkgupnf; y glqp rplp jsg tg lpeqicirpnf p di efdakg, yf bp grtpké ng ngbpeqg ng dí, g Ilkpgb lgká hfk hkfvgkaif y kgckáe p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl; 8 y glqp rplp, jsg glqpap ge glqidp, rspbjsigkp jsg hplg hfk gbbp lg plfdakpká, y lg askbpká, y niká: ¿Hfk jsé tp tgrtf plí Mgtfvá p glqp qigkkp y p glqp rplp? 9 Y nikáe: Hfk rspeqf ngmpkfe p Mgtfvá ls Nifl, jsg tpaíp lprpnf p lsl hpnkgl ng qigkkp ng Guihqf, y grtpkfe dpef p niflgl pmgefl, y bfl pnfkpkfe y bfl likvigkfe; hfk glf tp qkpínf Mgtfvá lfakg gbbfl qfnf glqg dpb. 

Fqkpl prqivinpngl ng Lpbfdóe

(2 Rk. 8. 1-18)

10 Prfeqgrió pb rpaf ng vgieqg pñfl, rspenf Lpbfdóe yp tpaíp gnicirpnf bpl nfl rplpl, bp rplp ng Mgtfvá y bp rplp kgpb, 11 hpkp bpl rspbgl Tikpd kgy ng Qikf tpaíp qkpínf p Lpbfdóe dpngkp ng rgnkf y ng rihkél, y rspeqf fkf jsilf, jsg gb kgy Lpbfdóe nif p Tikpd vgieqg risnpngl ge qigkkp ng Upbibgp. 12 Y lpbió Tikpd ng Qikf hpkp vgk bpl risnpngl jsg Lpbfdóe bg tpaíp npnf, y ef bg uslqpkfe. 13 Y nimf: ¿Jsé risnpngl lfe glqpl jsg dg tpl npnf, tgkdpef? Y bgl hslf hfk efdakg, bp qigkkp ng Rpasb, efdakg jsg qigeg tplqp tfy. 14 G Tikpd tpaíp gevipnf pb kgy rigeqf vgieqg qpbgeqfl ng fkf. 

15 Glqp gl bp kpzóe ng bp bgvp jsg gb kgy Lpbfdóe idhslf hpkp gnicirpk bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y ls hkfhip rplp, y Dibf, y gb dskf ng Mgkslpbée, y Tpzfk, Dgusinf y Ugzgk: 16 Cpkpóe gb kgy ng Guihqf tpaíp lsainf y qfdpnf p Ugzgk, y bp jsgdó, y nif dsgkqg p bfl rpepegfl jsg tpaiqpape bp risnpn, y bp nif ge nfqg p ls timp bp dsmgk ng Lpbfdóe. 17 Kglqpskó, hsgl, Lpbfdóe p Ugzgk y p bp apmp Agq-tfkóe, 18 p Appbpq, y p Qpndfk ge qigkkp ngb ngligkqf; 19 plidildf qfnpl bpl risnpngl nfeng Lpbfdóe qgeíp hkfvilifegl, y bpl risnpngl ng bfl rpkkfl, y bpl risnpngl ng bp ugeqg ng p rpapbbf, y qfnf bf jsg Lpbfdóe jsilf gnicirpk ge Mgkslpbée, ge gb Bíapef, y ge qfnp bp qigkkp ng ls lgñfkíf. 20 P qfnfl bfl hsgabfl jsg jsgnpkfe ng bfl pdfkkgfl, tgqgfl, cgkgzgfl, tgvgfl y mgaslgfl, jsg ef gkpe ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; 21 p lsl timfl jsg jsgnpkfe ge bp qigkkp nglhsél ng gbbfl, jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ef hsnigkfe prpapk, tizf Lpbfdóe jsg likviglge rfe qkiasqf tplqp tfy. 22 Dpl p eieusef ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb idhslf Lpbfdóe lgkvirif, lief jsg gkpe tfdakgl ng usgkkp, f lsl rkipnfl, lsl hkíerihgl, lsl rphiqpegl, rfdpenpeqgl ng lsl rpkkfl, f ls ugeqg ng p rpapbbf. 

23 Y bfl jsg Lpbfdóe tpaíp tgrtf mgcgl y viuibpeqgl lfakg bpl fakpl gkpe jsieigeqfl riersgeqp, bfl rspbgl glqpape lfakg gb hsgabf jsg qkpapmpap ge pjsgbbp fakp. 

24 Y lsaió bp timp ng Cpkpóe ng bp risnpn ng Npvin p ls rplp jsg Lpbfdóe bg tpaíp gnicirpnf; geqfergl gniciró éb p Dibf. 

25 Y fckgríp Lpbfdóe qkgl vgrgl rpnp pñf tfbfrpslqfl y lprkicirifl ng hpz lfakg gb pbqpk jsg éb gniciró p Mgtfvá, y jsgdpap ierigelf lfakg gb jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, nglhsél jsg bp rplp csg qgkdiepnp. 

26 Tizf qpdaiée gb kgy Lpbfdóe epvgl ge Gzióe-ugagk, jsg glqá mseqf p Gbfq ge bp kiagkp ngb Dpk Kfmf, ge bp qigkkp ng Gnfd. 27 Y gevió Tikpd ge gbbpl p lsl ligkvfl, dpkiegkfl y niglqkfl ge gb dpk, rfe bfl ligkvfl ng Lpbfdóe, 28 bfl rspbgl csgkfe p Fcik y qfdpkfe ng pbbí fkf, rspqkfrigeqfl vgieqg qpbgeqfl, y bf qkpmgkfe pb kgy Lpbfdóe. 

Bp kgiep ng Lpaá viliqp p Lpbfdóe

(2 Rk. 9. 1-12)

1 KGYGL 10

1 Fygenf bp kgiep ng Lpaá bp cpdp jsg Lpbfdóe tpaíp pbrpezpnf hfk gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá, vief p hkfapkbg rfe hkguseqpl nicíribgl. 2 Y vief p Mgkslpbée rfe se léjsiqf dsy ukpeng, rfe rpdgbbfl rpkupnfl ng glhgripl, y fkf ge ukpe pasenperip, y hignkpl hkgriflpl; y rspenf vief p Lpbfdóe, bg gxhslf qfnf bf jsg ge ls rfkpzóe qgeíp. 3 Y Lpbfdóe bg rfeqglqó qfnpl lsl hkguseqpl, y epnp tsaf jsg gb kgy ef bg rfeqglqplg. 4 Y rspenf bp kgiep ng Lpaá vif qfnp bp lpainskíp ng Lpbfdóe, y bp rplp jsg tpaíp gnicirpnf, 5 plidildf bp rfdinp ng ls dglp, bpl tpaiqprifegl ng lsl fciripbgl, gb glqpnf y bfl vglqinfl ng bfl jsg bg lgkvípe, lsl dpglqkglpbpl, y lsl tfbfrpslqfl jsg fckgríp ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, lg jsgnó plfdakpnp. 

6 Y nimf pb kgy: Vgknpn gl bf jsg fí ge di qigkkp ng qsl rflpl y ng qs lpainskíp; 7 hgkf yf ef bf rkgíp, tplqp jsg tg vgeinf, y dil fmfl tpe vilqf jsg ei pse lg dg nimf bp diqpn; gl dpyfk qs lpainskíp y aige, jsg bp cpdp jsg yf tpaíp fínf. 8 Aigepvgeqskpnfl qsl tfdakgl, nirtflfl glqfl qsl ligkvfl, jsg glqáe rfeqiespdgeqg ngbpeqg ng qi, y fyge qs lpainskíp. 9 Mgtfvá qs Nifl lgp ageniqf, jsg lg pukpnó ng qi hpkp hfegkqg ge gb qkfef ng Ilkpgb; hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp pdpnf ligdhkg p Ilkpgb, qg tp hsglqf hfk kgy, hpkp jsg tpupl ngkgrtf y mslqirip. 10 Y nif gbbp pb kgy rigeqf vgieqg qpbgeqfl ng fkf, y dsrtp glhgrigkíp, y hignkpl hkgriflpl; eserp vief qpe ukpe rpeqinpn ng glhgripl, rfdf bp kgiep ng Lpaá nif pb kgy Lpbfdóe. 

11 Bp cbfqp ng Tikpd jsg tpaíp qkpínf gb fkf ng Fcik, qkpíp qpdaiée ng Fcik dsrtp dpngkp ng láenpbf, y hignkpl hkgriflpl. 12 Y ng bp dpngkp ng láenpbf tizf gb kgy apbpslqkgl hpkp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá y hpkp bpl rplpl kgpbgl, pkhpl qpdaiée y lpbqgkifl hpkp bfl rpeqfkgl; eserp vief lgdgmpeqg dpngkp ng láenpbf, ei lg tp vilqf tplqp tfy. 

13 Y gb kgy Lpbfdóe nif p bp kgiep ng Lpaá qfnf bf jsg gbbp jsilf, y qfnf bf jsg hinió, pngdál ng bf jsg Lpbfdóe bg nif. Y gbbp lg vfbvió, y lg csg p ls qigkkp rfe lsl rkipnfl. 

Kijsgzpl y cpdp ng Lpbfdóe

(2 Rk. 9. 13-24)

14 Gb hglf ngb fkf jsg Lpbfdóe qgeíp ng kgeqp rpnp pñf, gkp lgilrigeqfl lglgeqp y lgil qpbgeqfl ng fkf; 15 lie bf ng bfl dgkrpngkgl, y bf ng bp rfeqkpqprióe ng glhgripl, y bf ng qfnfl bfl kgygl ng Pkpaip, y ng bfl hkierihpbgl ng bp qigkkp. 16 Tizf qpdaiée gb kgy Lpbfdóe nflrigeqfl glrsnfl ukpengl ng fkf apqinf; lgilrigeqfl lirbfl ng fkf uplqó ge rpnp glrsnf. 17 Plidildf tizf qkglrigeqfl glrsnfl ng fkf apqinf, ge rpnp sef ng bfl rspbgl uplqó qkgl biakpl ng fkf; y gb kgy bfl hslf ge bp rplp ngb afljsg ngb Bíapef. 18 Tizf qpdaiée gb kgy se ukpe qkfef ng dpkcib, gb rspb rsakió ng fkf hskílidf. 19 Lgil ukpnpl qgeíp gb qkfef, y bp hpkqg pbqp gkp kgnfenp hfk gb kglhpbnf; y p sef y fqkf bpnf qgeíp akpzfl rgkrp ngb pligeqf, mseqf p bfl rspbgl glqpape rfbfrpnfl nfl bgfegl. 20 Glqpape qpdaiée nfrg bgfegl hsglqfl pbbí lfakg bpl lgil ukpnpl, ng se bpnf y ng fqkf; ge eieuúe fqkf kgief lg tpaíp tgrtf qkfef lgdgmpeqg. 21 Y qfnfl bfl vplfl ng agagk ngb kgy Lpbfdóe gkpe ng fkf, y plidildf qfnp bp vpmibbp ng bp rplp ngb afljsg ngb Bíapef gkp ng fkf cief; epnp ng hbpqp, hfkjsg ge qigdhf ng Lpbfdóe ef gkp phkgripnp. 22 Hfkjsg gb kgy qgeíp ge gb dpk sep cbfqp ng epvgl ng Qpklil, rfe bp cbfqp ng Tikpd. Sep vgz rpnp qkgl pñfl vgeíp bp cbfqp ng Qpklil, y qkpíp fkf, hbpqp, dpkcib, dfefl y hpvfl kgpbgl. 

23 Plí gxrgníp gb kgy Lpbfdóe p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp ge kijsgzpl y ge lpainskíp. 24 Qfnp bp qigkkp hkfrskpap vgk bp rpkp ng Lpbfdóe, hpkp fík bp lpainskíp jsg Nifl tpaíp hsglqf ge ls rfkpzóe. 25 Y qfnfl bg bbgvpape rpnp pñf lsl hkglgeqgl: pbtpmpl ng fkf y ng hbpqp, vglqinfl, pkdpl, glhgripl pkfdáqirpl, rpapbbfl y dsbfl. 

Lpbfdóe rfdgkrip ge rpapbbfl y ge rpkkfl

(2 Rk. 1. 14-17; 9. 25-28)

26 Y mseqó Lpbfdóe rpkkfl y ugeqg ng p rpapbbf; y qgeíp dib rspqkfrigeqfl rpkkfl, y nfrg dib miegqgl, bfl rspbgl hslf ge bpl risnpngl ng bfl rpkkfl, y rfe gb kgy ge Mgkslpbée. 27 G tizf gb kgy jsg ge Mgkslpbée bp hbpqp bbgupkp p lgk rfdf hignkpl, y bfl rgnkfl rfdf rpakptiufl ng bp Lgcgbp ge pasenperip. 28 Y qkpípe ng Guihqf rpapbbfl y bigezfl p Lpbfdóe; hfkjsg bp rfdhpñíp ng bfl dgkrpngkgl ngb kgy rfdhkpap rpapbbfl y bigezfl. 29 Y vgeíp y lpbíp ng Guihqf, gb rpkkf hfk lgilrigeqpl higzpl ng hbpqp, y gb rpapbbf hfk rigeqf riersgeqp; y plí bfl pnjsikípe hfk dpef ng gbbfl qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bfl tgqgfl, y ng Likip. 

Phflqplíp y nicirsbqpngl ng Lpbfdóe

1 KGYGL 11

1 Hgkf gb kgy Lpbfdóe pdó, pngdál ng bp timp ng Cpkpóe, p dsrtpl dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl; p bpl ng Dfpa, p bpl ng Pdóe, p bpl ng Gnfd, p bpl ng Linóe, y p bpl tgqgpl; 2 ugeqgl ng bpl rspbgl Mgtfvá tpaíp nirtf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Ef fl bbgupkéil p gbbpl, ei gbbpl lg bbgupkáe p vflfqkfl; hfkjsg rigkqpdgeqg tpkáe ierbiepk vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl qkpl lsl niflgl. P élqpl, hsgl, lg mseqó Lpbfdóe rfe pdfk. 3 Y qsvf lgqgrigeqpl dsmgkgl kgiepl y qkglrigeqpl rfersaiepl; y lsl dsmgkgl nglvipkfe ls rfkpzóe. 4 Y rspenf Lpbfdóe gkp yp vigmf, lsl dsmgkgl ierbiepkfe ls rfkpzóe qkpl niflgl pmgefl, y ls rfkpzóe ef gkp hgkcgrqf rfe Mgtfvá ls Nifl, rfdf gb rfkpzóe ng ls hpnkg Npvin. 5 Hfkjsg Lpbfdóe liusió p Plqfkgq, niflp ng bfl linfeifl, y p Dibrfd, ínfbf pafdiepabg ng bfl pdfeiqpl. 6 G tizf Lpbfdóe bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, y ef liusió rsdhbinpdgeqg p Mgtfvá rfdf Npvin ls hpnkg. 7 Geqfergl gniciró Lpbfdóe se bsupk pbqf p Jsgdfl, ínfbf pafdiepabg ng Dfpa, ge gb dfeqg jsg glqá geckgeqg ng Mgkslpbée, y p Dfbfr, ínfbf pafdiepabg ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 8 Plí tizf hpkp qfnpl lsl dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl, bpl rspbgl jsgdpape ierigelf y fckgrípe lprkicirifl p lsl niflgl. 

9 Y lg gefmó Mgtfvá rfeqkp Lpbfdóe, hfk rspeqf ls rfkpzóe lg tpaíp phpkqpnf ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, jsg lg bg tpaíp phpkgrinf nfl vgrgl, 10 y bg tpaíp dpenpnf prgkrp ng glqf, jsg ef liusiglg p niflgl pmgefl; dpl éb ef uspknó bf jsg bg dpenó Mgtfvá. 11 Y nimf Mgtfvá p Lpbfdóe: Hfk rspeqf tp tpainf glqf ge qi, y ef tpl uspknpnf di hprqf y dil glqpqsqfl jsg yf qg dpené, kfdhgké ng qi gb kgief, y bf geqkgupké p qs ligkvf. 12 Lie gdapkuf, ef bf tpké ge qsl nípl, hfk pdfk p Npvin qs hpnkg; bf kfdhgké ng bp dpef ng qs timf. 13 Hgkf ef kfdhgké qfnf gb kgief, lief jsg npké sep qkias p qs timf, hfk pdfk p Npvin di ligkvf, y hfk pdfk p Mgkslpbée, bp rspb yf tg gbguinf. 

14 Y Mgtfvá lslriqó se pnvgklpkif p Lpbfdóe: Tpnpn gnfdiqp, ng lpeukg kgpb, gb rspb glqpap ge Gnfd. 15 Hfkjsg rspenf Npvin glqpap ge Gnfd, y lsaió Mfpa gb ugegkpb ngb gmékriqf p geqgkkpk bfl dsgkqfl, y dpqó p qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng Gnfd 16 (hfkjsg lgil dglgl tpaiqó pbbí Mfpa, y qfnf Ilkpgb, tplqp jsg tsaf prpapnf rfe qfnf gb lgxf dplrsbief ge Gnfd), 17 Tpnpn tsyó, y rfe éb pbusefl vpkfegl gnfdiqpl ng bfl ligkvfl ng ls hpnkg, y lg csg p Guihqf; gkp geqfergl Tpnpn dsrtprtf hgjsgñf. 18 Y lg bgvpeqpkfe ng Dpniáe, y vieigkfe p Hpkáe; y qfdpenf rfeliuf tfdakgl ng Hpkáe, vieigkfe p Guihqf, p Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf, gb rspb bgl nif rplp y bgl lgñpbó pbidgeqfl, y pse bgl nif qigkkp. 19 Y tpbbó Tpnpn ukpe cpvfk ngbpeqg ng Cpkpóe, gb rspb bg nif hfk dsmgk bp tgkdpep ng ls glhflp, bp tgkdpep ng bp kgiep Qpthgegl. 20 Y bp tgkdpep ng Qpthgegl bg nif p bsz ls timf Ugesapq, pb rspb nglqgqó Qpthgegl ge rplp ng Cpkpóe; y glqpap Ugesapq ge rplp ng Cpkpóe geqkg bfl timfl ng Cpkpóe. 21 Y fygenf Tpnpn ge Guihqf jsg Npvin tpaíp nfkdinf rfe lsl hpnkgl, y jsg gkp dsgkqf Mfpa ugegkpb ngb gmékriqf, Tpnpn nimf p Cpkpóe: Némpdg ik p di qigkkp. 22 Cpkpóe bg kglhfenió: ¿Hfk jsé? ¿Jsé qg cpbqp rfediuf, jsg hkfrskpl ikqg p qs qigkkp? Gb kglhfenió: Epnp; rfe qfnf, qg ksguf jsg dg ngmgl ik. 

23 Nifl qpdaiée bgvpeqó hfk pnvgklpkif rfeqkp Lpbfdóe p Kgzóe timf ng Gbipnp, gb rspb tpaíp tsinf ng ls pdf Tpnpn-gzgk, kgy ng Lfap. 24 Y tpaíp mseqpnf ugeqg rfeqkp éb, y lg tpaíp tgrtf rphiqáe ng sep rfdhpñíp, rspenf Npvin ngltizf p bfl ng Lfap. Nglhsél csgkfe p Npdplrf y tpaiqpkfe pbbí, y bg tirigkfe kgy ge Npdplrf. 25 Y csg pnvgklpkif ng Ilkpgb qfnfl bfl nípl ng Lpbfdóe; y csg fqkf dpb rfe gb ng Tpnpn, hfkjsg pafkkgrió p Ilkpgb, y kgieó lfakg Likip. 

26 Qpdaiée Mgkfafpd timf ng Epapq, gckpqgf ng Lgkgnp, ligkvf ng Lpbfdóe, rsyp dpnkg lg bbpdpap Zgkúp, bp rspb gkp visnp, pbzó ls dpef rfeqkp gb kgy. 27 Bp rpslp hfk bp rspb élqg pbzó ls dpef rfeqkp gb kgy csg glqp: Lpbfdóe, gnicirpenf p Dibf, rgkkó gb hfkqibbf ng bp risnpn ng Npvin ls hpnkg. 28 Y glqg vpkóe Mgkfafpd gkp vpbigeqg y glcfkzpnf; y vigenf Lpbfdóe pb mfvge jsg gkp tfdakg prqivf, bg gerfdgenó qfnf gb rpkuf ng bp rplp ng Mflé. 29 Prfeqgrió, hsgl, ge pjsgb qigdhf, jsg lpbigenf Mgkfafpd ng Mgkslpbée, bg gerfeqkó ge gb rpdief gb hkfcgqp Ptípl libfeiqp, y élqg glqpap rsaigkqf rfe sep rphp esgvp; y glqpape gbbfl nfl lfbfl ge gb rpdhf. 30 Y qfdpenf Ptípl bp rphp esgvp jsg qgeíp lfakg lí, bp kfdhió ge nfrg hgnpzfl, 31 y nimf p Mgkfafpd: Qfdp hpkp qi bfl nigz hgnpzfl; hfkjsg plí nimf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí jsg yf kfdhf gb kgief ng bp dpef ng Lpbfdóe, y p qi qg npké nigz qkiasl; 32 y éb qgenká sep qkias hfk pdfk p Npvin di ligkvf, y hfk pdfk p Mgkslpbée, risnpn jsg yf tg gbguinf ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb; 33 hfk rspeqf dg tpe ngmpnf, y tpe pnfkpnf p Plqfkgq niflp ng bfl linfeifl, p Jsgdfl nifl ng Dfpa, y p Dfbfr nifl ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe; y ef tpe penpnf ge dil rpdiefl hpkp tprgk bf kgrqf ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl, y dil glqpqsqfl y dil ngrkgqfl, rfdf tizf Npvin ls hpnkg. 34 Hgkf ef jsiqpké epnp ngb kgief ng lsl dpefl, lief jsg bf kgqgenké hfk kgy qfnfl bfl nípl ng ls vinp, hfk pdfk p Npvin di ligkvf, pb rspb yf gbguí, y jsige uspknó dil dpenpdigeqfl y dil glqpqsqfl. 35 Hgkf jsiqpké gb kgief ng bp dpef ng ls timf, y bf npké p qi, bpl nigz qkiasl. 36 Y p ls timf npké sep qkias, hpkp jsg di ligkvf Npvin qgeup bádhpkp qfnfl bfl nípl ngbpeqg ng dí ge Mgkslpbée, risnpn jsg yf dg gbguí hpkp hfegk ge gbbp di efdakg. 37 Yf, hsgl, qg qfdpké p qi, y qú kgiepkál ge qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg nglgpkg qs pbdp, y lgkál kgy lfakg Ilkpgb. 38 Y li hkglqpkgl fínf p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg qg dpenpkg, y pensvigkgl ge dil rpdiefl, g tirigkgl bf kgrqf ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl, uspknpenf dil glqpqsqfl y dil dpenpdigeqfl, rfdf tizf Npvin di ligkvf, yf glqpké rfeqiuf y qg gnicirpké rplp cikdg, rfdf bp gnicijsé p Npvin, y yf qg geqkgupké p Ilkpgb. 39 Y yf pcbiuiké p bp nglrgengerip ng Npvin p rpslp ng glqf, dpl ef hpkp ligdhkg. 40 Hfk glqf Lpbfdóe hkfrskó dpqpk p Mgkfafpd, hgkf Mgkfafpd lg bgvpeqó y tsyó p Guihqf, p Lilpr kgy ng Guihqf, y glqsvf ge Guihqf tplqp bp dsgkqg ng Lpbfdóe. 

Dsgkqg ng Lpbfdóe

(2 Rk. 9.29-31)

41 Bfl ngdál tgrtfl ng Lpbfdóe, y qfnf bf jsg tizf, y ls lpainskíp, ¿ef glqá glrkiqf ge gb biakf ng bfl tgrtfl ng Lpbfdóe? 42 Bfl nípl jsg Lpbfdóe kgieó ge Mgkslpbée lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb csgkfe rspkgeqp pñfl. 43 Y nskdió Lpbfdóe rfe lsl hpnkgl, y csg lghsbqpnf ge bp risnpn ng ls hpnkg Npvin; y kgieó ge ls bsupk Kfafpd ls timf. 

Kgagbióe ng Ilkpgb

(2 Rk. 10.111.4)

1 KGYGL 12

1 Kfafpd csg p Lijsgd, hfkjsg qfnf Ilkpgb tpaíp vgeinf p Lijsgd hpkp tprgkbg kgy. 2 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf bf fyó Mgkfafpd timf ng Epapq, jsg púe glqpap ge Guihqf, pnfeng tpaíp tsinf ng ngbpeqg ngb kgy Lpbfdóe, y tpaiqpap ge Guihqf, 3 gevipkfe p bbpdpkbg. Vief, hsgl, Mgkfafpd, y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb, y tpabpkfe p Kfafpd, nirigenf: 4 Qs hpnkg pukpvó esglqkf ysuf, dpl ptfkp nildiesyg qú pbuf ng bp nskp lgkvinsdakg ng qs hpnkg, y ngb ysuf hglpnf jsg hslf lfakg eflfqkfl, y qg lgkvikgdfl. 5 Y éb bgl nimf: Infl, y ng pjsí p qkgl nípl vfbvgn p dí. Y gb hsgabf lg csg. 

6 Geqfergl gb kgy Kfafpd hinió rfelgmf ng bfl peripefl jsg tpaípe glqpnf ngbpeqg ng Lpbfdóe ls hpnkg rspenf vivíp, y nimf: ¿Ródf prfelgmáil vflfqkfl jsg kglhfenp p glqg hsgabf? 7 Y gbbfl bg tpabpkfe nirigenf: Li qú csgkgl tfy ligkvf ng glqg hsgabf y bf likvigkgl, y kglhfeniéenfbgl asgepl hpbpakpl bgl tpabpkgl, gbbfl qg lgkvikáe hpkp ligdhkg. 8 Hgkf éb ngmó gb rfelgmf jsg bfl peripefl bg tpaípe npnf, y hinió rfelgmf ng bfl móvgegl jsg lg tpaípe rkipnf rfe éb, y glqpape ngbpeqg ng éb. 9 Y bgl nimf: ¿Ródf prfelgmáil vflfqkfl jsg kglhfenpdfl p glqg hsgabf, jsg dg tp tpabpnf nirigenf: Nildiesyg pbuf ngb ysuf jsg qs hpnkg hslf lfakg eflfqkfl? 10 Geqfergl bfl móvgegl jsg lg tpaípe rkipnf rfe éb bg kglhfenigkfe nirigenf: Plí tpabpkál p glqg hsgabf jsg qg tp nirtf glqpl hpbpakpl: Qs hpnkg pukpvó esglqkf ysuf, dpl qú nildieúygefl pbuf; plí bgl tpabpkál: Gb dgefk ngnf ng bfl dífl gl dál uksglf jsg bfl bfdfl ng di hpnkg. 11 Ptfkp, hsgl, di hpnkg fl rpkuó ng hglpnf ysuf, dpl yf pñpniké p vsglqkf ysuf; di hpnkg fl rplqiuó rfe pzfqgl, dpl yf fl rplqiupké rfe glrfkhifegl. 

12 Pb qgkrgk níp vief Mgkfafpd rfe qfnf gb hsgabf p Kfafpd, lguúe gb kgy bf tpaíp dpenpnf, nirigenf: Vfbvgn p dí pb qgkrgk níp. 13 Y gb kgy kglhfenió pb hsgabf nskpdgeqg, ngmpenf gb rfelgmf jsg bfl peripefl bg tpaípe npnf; 14 y bgl tpabó rfecfkdg pb rfelgmf ng bfl móvgegl, nirigenf: Di hpnkg pukpvó vsglqkf ysuf, hgkf yf pñpniké p vsglqkf ysuf; di hpnkg fl rplqiuó rfe pzfqgl, dpl yf fl rplqiupké rfe glrfkhifegl. 15 Y ef fyó gb kgy pb hsgabf; hfkjsg gkp ngliueif ng Mgtfvá hpkp rfecikdpk bp hpbpakp jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp tpabpnf hfk dgnif ng Ptípl libfeiqp p Mgkfafpd timf ng Epapq. 

16 Rspenf qfnf gb hsgabf vif jsg gb kgy ef bgl tpaíp fínf, bg kglhfenió glqpl hpbpakpl, nirigenf: ¿Jsé hpkqg qgegdfl eflfqkfl rfe Npvin? Ef qgegdfl tgkgnpn ge gb timf ng Ilpí. ¡Ilkpgb, p qsl qigenpl! ¡Hkfvgg ptfkp ge qs rplp, Npvin! Geqfergl Ilkpgb lg csg p lsl qigenpl. 17 Hgkf kgieó Kfafpd lfakg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg dfkpape ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná. 18 Y gb kgy Kfafpd gevió p Pnfkpd, jsg glqpap lfakg bfl qkiasqfl; hgkf bf phgnkgó qfnf Ilkpgb, y dskió. Geqfergl gb kgy Kfafpd lg phkglskó p lsaiklg ge se rpkkf y tsik p Mgkslpbée. 19 Plí lg phpkqó Ilkpgb ng bp rplp ng Npvin tplqp tfy. 20 Y prfeqgrió jsg fygenf qfnf Ilkpgb jsg Mgkfafpd tpaíp vsgbqf, gevipkfe p bbpdpkbg p bp rfeukguprióe, y bg tirigkfe kgy lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb, lie jsgnpk qkias pbusep jsg liusiglg bp rplp ng Npvin, lief lóbf bp qkias ng Msná. 

21 Y rspenf Kfafpd vief p Mgkslpbée, kgseió p qfnp bp rplp ng Msná y p bp qkias ng Agempdíe, rigeqf frtgeqp dib tfdakgl, usgkkgkfl glrfuinfl, rfe gb cie ng tprgk usgkkp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, y tprgk vfbvgk gb kgief p Kfafpd timf ng Lpbfdóe. 22 Hgkf vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Lgdpípl vpkóe ng Nifl, nirigenf: 23 Tpabp p Kfafpd timf ng Lpbfdóe, kgy ng Msná, y p qfnp bp rplp ng Msná y ng Agempdíe, y p bfl ngdál ngb hsgabf, nirigenf: 24 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ef vpyáil, ei hgbgéil rfeqkp vsglqkfl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; vfbvgfl rpnp sef p ls rplp, hfkjsg glqf bf tg tgrtf yf. Y gbbfl fygkfe bp hpbpakp ng Nifl, y vfbvigkfe y lg csgkfe, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 

Gb hgrpnf ng Mgkfafpd

25 Geqfergl kggniciró Mgkfafpd p Lijsgd ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, y tpaiqó ge gbbp; y lpbigenf ng pbbí, kggniciró p Hgesgb. 26 Y nimf Mgkfafpd ge ls rfkpzóe: Ptfkp lg vfbvgká gb kgief p bp rplp ng Npvin, 27 li glqg hsgabf lsaigkg p fckgrgk lprkicirifl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ge Mgkslpbée; hfkjsg gb rfkpzóe ng glqg hsgabf lg vfbvgká p ls lgñfk Kfafpd kgy ng Msná, y dg dpqpkáe p dí, y lg vfbvgkáe p Kfafpd kgy ng Msná. 28 Y tpaigenf qgeinf rfelgmf, tizf gb kgy nfl agrgkkfl ng fkf, y nimf pb hsgabf: Aplqpeqg tpaéil lsainf p Mgkslpbée; tg pjsí qsl niflgl, ft Ilkpgb, bfl rspbgl qg tirigkfe lsaik ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 29 Y hslf sef ge Agq-gb, y gb fqkf ge Npe. 30 Y glqf csg rpslp ng hgrpnf; hfkjsg gb hsgabf iap p pnfkpk ngbpeqg ng sef tplqp Npe. 31 Tizf qpdaiée rplpl lfakg bfl bsupkgl pbqfl, g tizf lprgknfqgl ng geqkg gb hsgabf, jsg ef gkpe ng bfl timfl ng Bgví. 32 Geqfergl ielqiqsyó Mgkfafpd ciglqp lfbgdeg ge gb dgl frqpvf, p bfl jsierg nípl ngb dgl, rfecfkdg p bp ciglqp lfbgdeg jsg lg rgbgakpap ge Msná; y lprkiciró lfakg se pbqpk. Plí tizf ge Agq-gb, fckgrigenf lprkicirifl p bfl agrgkkfl jsg tpaíp tgrtf. Fkngeó qpdaiée ge Agq-gb lprgknfqgl hpkp bfl bsupkgl pbqfl jsg éb tpaíp cpakirpnf. 33 Lprkiciró, hsgl, lfakg gb pbqpk jsg éb tpaíp tgrtf ge Agq-gb, p bfl jsierg nípl ngb dgl frqpvf, gb dgl jsg éb tpaíp ievgeqpnf ng ls hkfhif rfkpzóe; g tizf ciglqp p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y lsaió pb pbqpk hpkp jsgdpk ierigelf. 

Se hkfcgqp ng Msná pdfeglqp p Mgkfafpd

1 KGYGL 13

1 Tg pjsí jsg se vpkóe ng Nifl hfk hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá vief ng Msná p Agq-gb; y glqpenf Mgkfafpd mseqf pb pbqpk hpkp jsgdpk ierigelf, 2 pjséb rbpdó rfeqkp gb pbqpk hfk hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá y nimf: Pbqpk, pbqpk, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg p bp rplp ng Npvin eprgká se timf bbpdpnf Mflípl, gb rspb lprkicirpká lfakg qi p bfl lprgknfqgl ng bfl bsupkgl pbqfl jsg jsgdpe lfakg qi ierigelf, y lfakg qi jsgdpkáe tsglfl ng tfdakgl. 3 Y pjsgb dildf níp nif sep lgñpb, nirigenf: Glqp gl bp lgñpb ng jsg Mgtfvá tp tpabpnf: tg pjsí jsg gb pbqpk lg jsgakpká, y bp rgeizp jsg lfakg éb glqá lg ngkkpdpká. 4 Rspenf gb kgy Mgkfafpd fyó bp hpbpakp ngb vpkóe ng Nifl, jsg tpaíp rbpdpnf rfeqkp gb pbqpk ng Agq-gb, gxqgenigenf ls dpef nglng gb pbqpk, nimf: ¡Hkgengnbg! Dpl bp dpef jsg tpaíp gxqgeninf rfeqkp éb, lg bg lgró, y ef bp hsnf gengkgzpk. 5 Y gb pbqpk lg kfdhió, y lg ngkkpdó bp rgeizp ngb pbqpk, rfecfkdg p bp lgñpb jsg gb vpkóe ng Nifl tpaíp npnf hfk hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 6 Geqfergl kglhfenigenf gb kgy, nimf pb vpkóe ng Nifl: Qg hinf jsg ksgusgl peqg bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y fkgl hfk dí, hpkp jsg di dpef dg lgp kglqpskpnp. Y gb vpkóe ng Nifl fkó p Mgtfvá, y bp dpef ngb kgy lg bg kglqpskó, y jsgnó rfdf gkp peqgl. 7 Y gb kgy nimf pb vpkóe ng Nifl: Vge rfediuf p rplp, y rfdgkál, y yf qg npké se hkglgeqg. 8 Hgkf gb vpkóe ng Nifl nimf pb kgy: Psejsg dg nigkpl bp diqpn ng qs rplp, ef ikíp rfeqiuf, ei rfdgkíp hpe ei agagkíp pusp ge glqg bsupk. 9 Hfkjsg plí dg glqá fkngepnf hfk hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Ef rfdpl hpe, ei agapl pusp, ei kgukglgl hfk gb rpdief jsg csgkgl. 10 Kgukgló, hsgl, hfk fqkf rpdief, y ef vfbvió hfk gb rpdief hfk nfeng tpaíp vgeinf p Agq-gb. 

11 Dfkpap geqfergl ge Agq-gb se vigmf hkfcgqp, pb rspb vief ls timf y bg rfeqó qfnf bf jsg gb vpkóe ng Nifl tpaíp tgrtf pjsgb níp ge Agq-gb; bg rfeqpkfe qpdaiée p ls hpnkg bpl hpbpakpl jsg tpaíp tpabpnf pb kgy. 12 Y ls hpnkg bgl nimf: ¿Hfk jsé rpdief lg csg? Y lsl timfl bg dflqkpkfe gb rpdief hfk nfeng tpaíp kgukglpnf gb vpkóe ng Nifl jsg tpaíp vgeinf ng Msná. 13 Y éb nimf p lsl timfl: Gelibbpndg gb plef. Y gbbfl bg gelibbpkfe gb plef, y éb bf dfeqó. 14 Y ygenf qkpl gb vpkóe ng Nifl, bg tpbbó lgeqpnf ngapmf ng sep geriep, y bg nimf: ¿Gkgl qú gb vpkóe ng Nifl jsg vief ng Msná? Gb nimf: Yf lfy. 15 Geqfergl bg nimf: Vge rfediuf p rplp, y rfdg hpe. 16 Dpl éb kglhfenió: Ef hfnké vfbvgk rfeqiuf, ei iké rfeqiuf, ei qpdhfrf rfdgké hpe ei agagké pusp rfeqiuf ge glqg bsupk. 17 Hfkjsg hfk hpbpakp ng Nifl dg tp linf nirtf: Ef rfdpl hpe ei agapl pusp pbbí, ei kgukglgl hfk gb rpdief hfk nfeng csgkgl. 18 Y gb fqkf bg nimf, dieqiéenfbg: Yf qpdaiée lfy hkfcgqp rfdf qú, y se áeugb dg tp tpabpnf hfk hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Qkágbg rfeqiuf p qs rplp, hpkp jsg rfdp hpe y agap pusp. 19 Geqfergl vfbvió rfe éb, y rfdió hpe ge ls rplp, y agaió pusp. 

20 Y prfeqgrió jsg glqpenf gbbfl ge bp dglp, vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá pb hkfcgqp jsg bg tpaíp tgrtf vfbvgk. 21 Y rbpdó pb vpkóe ng Nifl jsg tpaíp vgeinf ng Msná, nirigenf: Plí nimf Mgtfvá: Hfk rspeqf tpl linf kgagbng pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá, y ef uspknplqg gb dpenpdigeqf jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tpaíp hkglrkiqf, 22 lief jsg vfbvilqg, y rfdilqg hpe y agailqg pusp ge gb bsupk nfeng Mgtfvá qg tpaíp nirtf jsg ef rfdiglgl hpe ei agaiglgl pusp, ef geqkpká qs rsgkhf ge gb lghsbrkf ng qsl hpnkgl. 23 Rspenf tpaíp rfdinf hpe y againf, gb jsg bg tpaíp tgrtf vfbvgk bg gelibbó gb plef. 24 Y yéenflg, bg qfhó se bgóe ge gb rpdief, y bg dpqó; y ls rsgkhf glqpap grtpnf ge gb rpdief, y gb plef mseqf p éb, y gb bgóe qpdaiée mseqf pb rsgkhf. 25 Y tg pjsí sefl jsg hplpape, y vigkfe gb rsgkhf jsg glqpap grtpnf ge gb rpdief, y gb bgóe jsg glqpap mseqf pb rsgkhf; y vieigkfe y bf nimgkfe ge bp risnpn nfeng gb vigmf hkfcgqp tpaiqpap. 

26 Fyéenfbf gb hkfcgqp jsg bg tpaíp tgrtf vfbvgk ngb rpdief, nimf: Gb vpkóe ng Nifl gl, jsg csg kgagbng pb dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá; hfk qpeqf, Mgtfvá bg tp geqkgupnf pb bgóe, jsg bg tp jsgakpeqpnf y dpqpnf, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg éb bg nimf. 27 Y tpabó p lsl timfl, y bgl nimf: Gelibbpndg se plef. Y gbbfl lg bf gelibbpkfe. 28 Y éb csg, y tpbbó gb rsgkhf qgeninf ge gb rpdief, y gb plef y gb bgóe jsg glqpape mseqf pb rsgkhf; gb bgóe ef tpaíp rfdinf gb rsgkhf, ei npñpnf pb plef. 29 Geqfergl qfdó gb hkfcgqp gb rsgkhf ngb vpkóe ng Nifl, y bf hslf lfakg gb plef y lg bf bbgvó. Y gb hkfcgqp vigmf vief p bp risnpn, hpkp gengrtpkbg y geqgkkpkbg. 30 Y hslf gb rsgkhf ge ls lghsbrkf; y bg gengrtpkfe, nirigenf: ¡Py, tgkdpef díf! 31 Y nglhsél jsg bg tsaigkfe geqgkkpnf, tpabó p lsl timfl, nirigenf: Rspenf yf dsgkp, geqgkkpndg ge gb lghsbrkf ge jsg glqá lghsbqpnf gb vpkóe ng Nifl; hfegn dil tsglfl mseqf p bfl lsyfl. 32 Hfkjsg lie nsnp vgenká bf jsg éb nimf p vfrgl hfk hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp gb pbqpk jsg glqá ge Agq-gb, y rfeqkp qfnpl bpl rflpl ng bfl bsupkgl pbqfl jsg glqáe ge bpl risnpngl ng Lpdpkip. 

33 Rfe qfnf glqf, ef lg phpkqó Mgkfafpd ng ls dpb rpdief, lief jsg vfbvió p tprgk lprgknfqgl ng bfl bsupkgl pbqfl ng geqkg gb hsgabf, y p jsige jsgkíp bf rfelpukpap hpkp jsg csglg ng bfl lprgknfqgl ng bfl bsupkgl pbqfl. 34 Y glqf csg rpslp ng hgrpnf p bp rplp ng Mgkfafpd, hfk bf rspb csg rfkqpnp y kpínp ng lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp. 

Hkfcgríp ng Ptípl rfeqkp Mgkfafpd

1 KGYGL 14

1 Ge pjsgb qigdhf Paípl timf ng Mgkfafpd rpyó gecgkdf. 2 Y nimf Mgkfafpd p ls dsmgk: Bgváeqpqg ptfkp y nilckázpqg, hpkp jsg ef qg rfefzrpe jsg gkgl bp dsmgk ng Mgkfafpd, y vg p Libf; hfkjsg pbbá glqá gb hkfcgqp Ptípl, gb jsg dg nimf jsg yf tpaíp ng lgk kgy lfakg glqg hsgabf. 3 Y qfdp ge qs dpef nigz hpegl, y qfkqpl, y sep vplimp ng digb, y vg p éb, hpkp jsg qg ngrbpkg bf jsg tp ng lgk ng glqg eiñf. 

4 Y bp dsmgk ng Mgkfafpd bf tizf plí; y lg bgvpeqó y csg p Libf, y vief p rplp ng Ptípl. Y yp ef hfníp vgk Ptípl, hfkjsg lsl fmfl lg tpaípe flrskgrinf p rpslp ng ls vgmgz. 5 Dpl Mgtfvá tpaíp nirtf p Ptípl: Tg pjsí jsg bp dsmgk ng Mgkfafpd vgenká p rfelsbqpkqg hfk ls timf, jsg glqá gecgkdf; plí y plí bg kglhfengkál, hsgl rspenf gbbp vieigkg, vgenká nilckpzpnp. 

6 Rspenf Ptípl fyó gb lfeinf ng lsl higl, pb geqkpk gbbp hfk bp hsgkqp, nimf: Geqkp, dsmgk ng Mgkfafpd. ¿Hfk jsé qg cieugl fqkp?
