13 Y jsgakpkfe bfl rpbngfl bpl rfbsdepl ng akferg jsg glqpape ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bpl aplpl, y gb dpk ng akferg jsg glqpap ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bbgvpkfe gb akferg p Apaibfeip. 14 Bbgvpkfe qpdaiée bfl rpbngkfl, bpl hpbgqpl, bpl nglhpaibpngkpl, bfl rsrtpkfegl, y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ng akferg rfe jsg dieilqkpape; 15 iergelpkifl, rsgerfl, bfl jsg ng fkf, ge fkf, y bfl jsg ng hbpqp, ge hbpqp; qfnf bf bbgvó gb rphiqáe ng bp uspknip. 16 Bpl nfl rfbsdepl, se dpk, y bpl aplpl jsg Lpbfdóe tpaíp tgrtf hpkp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; ef csg hfliabg hglpk qfnf glqf. 17 Bp pbqskp ng sep rfbsdep gkp ng nigrifrtf rfnfl, y qgeíp geridp se rphiqgb ng akferg; bp pbqskp ngb rphiqgb gkp ng qkgl rfnfl, y lfakg gb rphiqgb tpaíp sep kgn y ukpepnpl pbkgngnfk, qfnf ng akferg; g iuspb bpafk tpaíp ge bp fqkp rfbsdep rfe ls kgn. 

18 Qfdó geqfergl gb rphiqáe ng bp uspknip pb hkidgk lprgknfqg Lgkpípl, pb lgusenf lprgknfqg Lfcfeípl, y qkgl uspknpl ng bp vpmibbp; 19 y ng bp risnpn qfdó se fciripb jsg qgeíp p ls rpkuf bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp, y rierf vpkfegl ng bfl rfelgmgkfl ngb kgy, jsg glqpape ge bp risnpn, gb hkierihpb glrkiap ngb gmékriqf, jsg bbgvpap gb kguilqkf ng bp ugeqg ngb hpíl, y lglgeqp vpkfegl ngb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp, jsg glqpape ge bp risnpn. 20 Glqfl qfdó Epaszpkpnáe, rphiqáe ng bp uspknip, y bfl bbgvó p Kiabp pb kgy ng Apaibfeip. 21 Y gb kgy ng Apaibfeip bfl tikió y dpqó ge Kiabp, ge qigkkp ng Tpdpq. Plí csg bbgvpnf rpsqivf Msná ng lfakg ls qigkkp. 

Gb kgdpegeqg tsyg p Guihqf

22 Y pb hsgabf jsg Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip ngmó ge qigkkp ng Msná, hslf hfk ufagkepnfk p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd, timf ng Lpcáe. 23 Y fygenf qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ngb gmékriqf, gbbfl y ls ugeqg, jsg gb kgy ng Apaibfeip tpaíp hsglqf hfk ufagkepnfk p Ugnpbípl, vieigkfe p éb ge Dizhp; Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl, Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp, Lgkpípl timf ng Qpetsdgq egqfcpqiqp, y Mppzpeípl timf ng se dpprpqgf, gbbfl rfe bfl lsyfl. 24 Geqfergl Ugnpbípl bgl tizf mskpdgeqf p gbbfl y p bfl lsyfl, y bgl nimf: Ef qgdáil ng lgk ligkvfl ng bfl rpbngfl; tpaiqpn ge bp qigkkp, y lgkvin pb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y fl iká aige. 25 Dpl ge gb dgl léhqidf vief Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl, timf ng Gbilpdp, ng bp glqikhg kgpb, y rfe éb nigz vpkfegl, g tikigkfe p Ugnpbípl, y dskió; y qpdaiée p bfl ng Msná y p bfl rpbngfl jsg glqpape rfe éb ge Dizhp. 26 Y bgvpeqáenflg qfnf gb hsgabf, nglng gb dgefk tplqp gb dpyfk, rfe bfl rphiqpegl ngb gmékriqf, lg csgkfe p Guihqf, hfk qgdfk ng bfl rpbngfl. 

Mfpjsíe gl biagkqpnf y kgriag tfefkgl ge Apaibfeip

(Mgk. 52.31-34)

27 Prfeqgrió p bfl qkgieqp y ligqg pñfl ngb rpsqivgkif ng Mfpjsíe kgy ng Msná, ge gb dgl nsfnéridf, p bfl vgieqiligqg nípl ngb dgl, jsg Gvib-dgkfnpr kgy ng Apaibfeip, ge gb hkidgk pñf ng ls kgiepnf, biagkqó p Mfpjsíe kgy ng Msná, lpráenfbf ng bp rákrgb; 28 y bg tpabó rfe agegvfbgerip, y hslf ls qkfef dál pbqf jsg bfl qkfefl ng bfl kgygl jsg glqpape rfe éb ge Apaibfeip. 29 Y bg rpdaió bfl vglqinfl ng hkilifegkf, y rfdió ligdhkg ngbpeqg ng éb qfnfl bfl nípl ng ls vinp. 30 Y nipkipdgeqg bg csg npnp ls rfdinp ng hpkqg ngb kgy, ng rfeqiesf, qfnfl bfl nípl ng ls vinp.

Hkidgk Biakf ng

RKÓEIRPL  

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Pnáe

(Ue. 5.1-32)

1 RKÓEIRPL 1

1 Pnáe, Lgq, Geól, 2 Rpieáe, Dptpbpbggb, Mpkgn, 3 Gefr, Dpqslpbée, Bpdgr, 4 Efé, Lgd, Rpd y Mpcgq. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng bfl timfl ng Efé

(Ue. 10.1-32)

5 Bfl timfl ng Mpcgq: Ufdgk, Dpufu, Dpnpi, Mpváe, Qsapb, Dglgr y Qikpl. 6 Bfl timfl ng Ufdgk: Plogepz, Kicpq y Qfupkdp. 7 Bfl timfl ng Mpváe: Gbilp, Qpklil, Jsiqid y Nfnpeid. 

8 Bfl timfl ng Rpd: Rsl, Dizkpid, Csq y Rpepáe. 9 Bfl timfl ng Rsl: Lgap, Tpvibp, Lpaqp, Kppdp y Lpaqgrp. Y bfl timfl ng Kppdp: Lgap y Ngnáe. 10 Rsl geugenkó p Eidkfn; élqg bbguó p lgk hfngkflf ge bp qigkkp. 

11 Dizkpid geugenkó p Bsnid, Pepdid, Bgtpaid, Epcqstid, 12 Hpqkslid y Rplbstid; ng élqfl lpbigkfe bfl cibilqgfl y bfl rpcqfkgfl. 

13 Rpepáe geugenkó p Linóe ls hkidfuéeiqf, y p Tgq, 14 pb mgaslgf, pb pdfkkgf, pb ugkuglgf, 15 pb tgvgf, pb pkprgf, pb liegf, 16 pb pkvpngf, pb zgdpkgf y pb tpdpqgf. 

17 Bfl timfl ng Lgd: Gbpd, Plsk, Pkcpxpn, Bsn, Pkpd, Sz, Tsb, Ugqgk y Dglgr. 18 Pkcpxpn geugenkó p Lgbp, y Lgbp geugenkó p Tgagk. 19 Y p Tgagk eprigkfe nfl timfl; gb efdakg ngb sef csg Hgbgu, hfk rspeqf ge lsl nípl csg nivininp bp qigkkp; y gb efdakg ng ls tgkdpef csg Mfrqáe. 20 Mfrqáe geugenkó p Pbdfnpn, Lgbgc, Tpzpk-dpvgq y Mgkp. 21 P Pnfkpd qpdaiée, p Szpb, Nirbp, 22 Gapb, Paidpgb, Lgap, 23 Fcik, Tpvibp y Mfapa; qfnfl timfl ng Mfrqáe. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Lgd

(Ue. 11.10-26)

24 Lgd, Pkcpxpn, Lgbp, 25 Tgagk, Hgbgu, Kgs, 26 Lgksu, Eprfk, Qpké, 27 y Pakpd, gb rspb gl Pakptpd. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Ildpgb y ng Rgqskp

(Ue. 25.1-6, 12-18)

28 Bfl timfl ng Pakptpd: Ilppr g Ildpgb. 29 Y glqpl lfe lsl nglrgengeripl: gb hkidfuéeiqf ng Ildpgb, Egapifq; nglhsél Rgnpk, Pnaggb, Dialpd, 30 Dildp, Nsdp, Dpllp, Tpnpn, Qgdp, 31 Mgqsk, Epcil y Rgngdp; élqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Ildpgb. 32 Y Rgqskp, rfersaiep ng Pakptpd, nif p bsz p Zidkpd, Mfrláe, Dgnáe, Dpniáe, Ilapr y Lúp. Bfl timfl ng Mfrláe: Lgap y Ngnáe. 33 Bfl timfl ng Dpniáe: Gcp, Gcgk, Tpefr, Painp y Gbnp; qfnfl élqfl csgkfe timfl ng Rgqskp. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Glpú

(Ue. 36.1-43)

34 Pakptpd geugenkó p Ilppr, y bfl timfl ng Ilppr csgkfe Glpú g Ilkpgb. 35 Bfl timfl ng Glpú: Gbicpz, Kgsgb, Mgúl, Mppbpd y Rfké. 36 Bfl timfl ng Gbicpz: Qgdáe, Fdpk, Zgcf, Upqpd, Rgepz, Qidep y Pdpbgr. 37 Bfl timfl ng Kgsgb: Eptpq, Zgkp, Lpdp y Dizp. 

38 Bfl timfl ng Lgik: Bfqáe, Lfapb, Ziagóe, Peá, Nilóe, Gzgk y Niláe. 39 Bfl timfl ng Bfqáe: Tfki y Tfdpd; y Qidep csg tgkdpep ng Bfqáe. 40 Bfl timfl ng Lfapb: Pbváe, Dpeptpq, Gapb, Lgcf y Fepd. Bfl timfl ng Ziagóe: Pmp y Peá. 41 Nilóe csg timf ng Peá; y bfl timfl ng Nilóe: Pdkpd, Glaáe, Iqkáe y Jsgkáe. 42 Bfl timfl ng Gzgk: Aibtáe, Zppváe y Mppráe. Bfl timfl ng Niláe: Sz y Pkáe. 

43 Y glqfl lfe bfl kgygl jsg kgiepkfe ge bp qigkkp ng Gnfd, peqgl jsg kgieplg kgy lfakg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Agbp timf ng Agfk; y gb efdakg ng ls risnpn csg Niepap. 44 Dsgkqf Agbp, kgieó ge ls bsupk Mfapa timf ng Zgkp, ng Aflkp. 45 Y dsgkqf Mfapa, kgieó ge ls bsupk Tslpd, ng bp qigkkp ng bfl qgdpeiqpl. 46 Dsgkqf Tslpd, kgieó ge ls bsupk Tpnpn timf ng Agnpn, gb jsg ngkkfqó p Dpniáe ge gb rpdhf ng Dfpa; y gb efdakg ng ls risnpn csg Pviq. 47 Dsgkqf Tpnpn, kgieó ge ls bsupk Lpdbp ng Dplkgrp. 48 Dsgkqf qpdaiée Lpdbp, kgieó ge ls bsupk Lpúb ng Kgtfafq, jsg glqá mseqf pb Gsckpqgl. 49 Y dsgkqf Lpúb, kgieó ge ls bsupk Appb-tpeáe timf ng Prafk. 50 Dsgkqf Appb-tpeáe, kgieó ge ls bsupk Tpnpn, gb efdakg ng rsyp risnpn csg Hpi; y gb efdakg ng ls dsmgk, Dgtgqpagb timp ng Dpqkgn, timp ng Dgzppa. 51 Dsgkqf Tpnpn, lsrgnigkfe ge Gnfd bfl mgcgl Qidep, Pbvp, Mgqgq, 52 Ptfbiapdp, Gbp, Hieóe, 53 Rgepz, Qgdáe, Diazpk, 54 Dpunigb g Ikpd. Glqfl csgkfe bfl mgcgl ng Gnfd. 

Bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb

(Ue. 35.22-26)

1 RKÓEIRPL 2

1 Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb: Ksaée, Lidgóe, Bgví, Msná, Ilprpk, Zpasbóe, 2 Npe, Mflé, Agempdíe, Egcqpbí, Upn y Plgk. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Msná

3 Bfl timfl ng Msná: Gk, Feáe y Lgbp. Glqfl qkgl bg eprigkfe ng bp timp ng Lúp, rpepegp. Y Gk, hkidfuéeiqf ng Msná, csg dpbf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, jsige bf dpqó. 4 Y Qpdpk ls esgkp nif p bsz p Cpkgl y p Zgkp. Qfnfl bfl timfl ng Msná csgkfe rierf. 

5 Bfl timfl ng Cpkgl: Tgzkóe y Tpdsb. 6 Y bfl timfl ng Zgkp: Zidki, Gqáe, Tgdáe, Rpbrfb y Npkp; hfk qfnfl rierf. 7 Timf ng Rpkdi csg Práe, gb jsg hgkqskaó p Ilkpgb, hfkjsg hkgvpkiró ge gb pepqgdp. 8 Pzpkípl csg timf ng Gqáe. 

9 Bfl timfl jsg eprigkfe p Tgzkóe: Mgkpdggb, Kpd y Jsgbsapi. 10 Kpd geugenkó p Pdiepnpa, y Pdiepnpa geugenkó p Epplóe, hkíerihg ng bfl timfl ng Msná. 11 Epplóe geugenkó p Lpbdóe, y Lpbdóe geugenkó p Affz. 12 Affz geugenkó p Fagn, y Fagn geugenkó p Ilpí, 13 g Ilpí geugenkó p Gbipa ls hkidfuéeiqf, gb lgusenf Paiepnpa, Lidgp gb qgkrgkf, 14 gb rspkqf Epqpepgb, gb jsieqf Kpnpi, 15 gb lgxqf Fzgd, gb léhqidf Npvin, 16 ng bfl rspbgl Lpkvip y Paiupib csgkfe tgkdpepl. Bfl timfl ng Lpkvip csgkfe qkgl: Pailpi, Mfpa y Plpgb. 17 Paiupib nif p bsz p Pdplp, rsyf hpnkg csg Mgqgk ildpgbiqp, 18 Rpbga timf ng Tgzkóe geugenkó p Mgkifq ng ls dsmgk Pzsap. Y bfl timfl ng gbbp csgkfe Mglgk, Lfapa y Pknóe. 19 Dsgkqp Pzsap, qfdó Rpbga hfk dsmgk p Gckpqp, bp rspb nif p bsz p Tsk. 20 Y Tsk geugenkó p Ski, y Ski geugenkó p Agzpbggb. 

21 Nglhsél geqkó Tgzkóe p bp timp ng Dpjsik hpnkg ng Upbppn, bp rspb qfdó ligenf éb ng lglgeqp pñfl, y gbbp nif p bsz p Lgusa. 22 Y Lgusa geugenkó p Mpik, gb rspb qsvf vgieqiqkél risnpngl ge bp qigkkp ng Upbppn. 23 Hgkf Uglsk y Pkpd qfdpkfe ng gbbfl bpl risnpngl ng Mpik, rfe Ogepq y lsl pbngpl, lglgeqp bsupkgl. Qfnfl élqfl csgkfe ng bfl timfl ng Dpjsik hpnkg ng Upbppn. 24 Dsgkqf Tgzkóe ge Rpbga ng Gckpqp, Paípl dsmgk ng Tgzkóe nif p bsz p Plsk hpnkg ng Qgrfp. 

25 Bfl timfl ng Mgkpdggb hkidfuéeiqf ng Tgzkóe csgkfe Kpd ls hkidfuéeiqf, Asep, Fkée, Fzgd y Ptípl. 26 Y qsvf Mgkpdggb fqkp dsmgk bbpdpnp Pqpkp, jsg csg dpnkg ng Fepd. 27 Bfl timfl ng Kpd hkidfuéeiqf ng Mgkpdggb csgkfe Dppz, Mpdíe y Gjsgk. 28 Y bfl timfl ng Fepd csgkfe Lpdpi y Mpnp. Bfl timfl ng Lpdpi: Epnpa y Pailsk. 29 Y gb efdakg ng bp dsmgk ng Pailsk csg Paitpib, bp rspb nif p bsz p Ptaáe y p Dfbin. 30 Bfl timfl ng Epnpa: Lgbgn y Phpid. Y Lgbgn dskió lie timfl. 31 Ili csg timf ng Phpid, y Lgláe timf ng Ili, g timf ng Lgláe, Ptbpi. 32 Bfl timfl ng Mpnp tgkdpef ng Lpdpi: Mgqgk y Mfepqáe. Y dskió Mgqgk lie timfl. 33 Bfl timfl ng Mfepqáe: Hgbgq y Zpzp. Glqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Mgkpdggb. 34 Y Lgláe ef qsvf timfl, lief timpl; hgkf qgeíp Lgláe se ligkvf guihrif bbpdpnf Mpktp. 35 P élqg Lgláe nif ls timp hfk dsmgk, y gbbp nif p bsz p Pqpi. 36 Pqpi geugenkó p Epqáe, y Epqáe geugenkó p Zpapn; 37 Zpapn geugenkó p Gcbpb, Gcbpb geugenkó p Fagn; 38 Fagn geugenkó p Mgtú, Mgtú geugenkó p Pzpkípl; 39 Pzpkípl geugenkó p Tgbgl, Tgbgl geugenkó p Gbplp; 40 Gbplp geugenkó p Lildpi, Lildpi geugenkó p Lpbsd; 41 Lpbsd geugenkó p Mgrpdípl, y Mgrpdípl geugenkó p Gbilpdp. 

42 Bfl timfl ng Rpbga tgkdpef ng Mgkpdggb csgkfe: Dglp ls hkidfuéeiqf, jsg csg gb hpnkg ng Zic; y bfl timfl ng Dpkglp hpnkg ng Tgakóe. 43 Y bfl timfl ng Tgakóe: Rfké, Qphúp, Kgjsgd y Lgdp. 44 Lgdp geugenkó p Kptpd hpnkg ng Mfkrfpd, y Kgjsgd geugenkó p Lpdpi. 45 Dpóe csg timf ng Lpdpi, y Dpóe hpnkg ng Agq-lsk. 46 Y Gcp rfersaiep ng Rpbga nif p bsz p Tpkáe, p Dflp y p Upzgz. Y Tpkáe geugenkó p Upzgz. 47 Bfl timfl ng Mptnpi: Kgugd, Mfqpd, Uglpd, Hgbgq, Gcp y Lppc. 48 Dpprp rfersaiep ng Rpbga nif p bsz p Lgagk y p Qiktpep. 49 Qpdaiée nif p bsz p Lppc hpnkg ng Dpndpep, y p Lgvp hpnkg ng Dpragep y hpnkg ng Uiagp. Y Prlp csg timp ng Rpbga. 50 Glqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Rpbga. Bfl timfl ng Tsk hkidfuéeiqf ng Gckpqp: Lfapb hpnkg ng Jsikipq-mgpkid, 51 Lpbdp hpnkg ng Agbée, y Tpkgc hpnkg ng Agq-upngk. 52 Y bfl timfl ng Lfapb hpnkg ng Jsikipq-mgpkid csgkfe Tpkfg, bp diqpn ng bfl dpeptgqiqpl. 53 Y bpl cpdibipl ng Jsikipq-mgpkid csgkfe bfl iqkiqpl, bfl csqiqpl, bfl lsdpqiqpl y bfl dilkpíqpl, ng bfl rspbgl lpbigkfe bfl zfkpqiqpl y bfl glqpfbiqpl. 54 Bfl timfl ng Lpbdp: Agbée, y bfl egqfcpqiqpl, Pqkfq-agq-mfpa, y bp diqpn ng bfl dpeptgqiqpl, bfl zfkpíqpl. 55 Y bpl cpdibipl ng bfl glrkiapl jsg dfkpape ge Mpagl csgkfe bfl qikpqgfl, bfl lidgpqgfl y bfl lsrpqgfl, bfl rspbgl lfe bfl rgegfl jsg vieigkfe ng Tpdpq hpnkg ng bp rplp ng Kgrpa. 

Bfl timfl ng Npvin

(2 L. 3.2-5; 5.13-16; 1 Rk. 14.3-7)

1 RKÓEIRPL 3

1 Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Npvin jsg bg eprigkfe ge Tgakóe: Pdeóe gb hkidfuéeiqf, ng Ptiefpd mgzkggbiqp; gb lgusenf, Npeigb, ng Paiupib bp ng Rpkdgb; 2 gb qgkrgkf, Palpbóe timf ng Dpprp, timp ng Qpbdpi kgy ng Uglsk; gb rspkqf, Pnfeípl timf ng Tpusiq; 3 gb jsieqf, Lgcpqípl, ng Paiqpb; gb lgxqf, Iqkgpd, ng Gubp ls dsmgk. 4 Glqfl lgil bg eprigkfe ge Tgakóe, nfeng kgieó ligqg pñfl y lgil dglgl; y ge Mgkslpbée kgieó qkgieqp y qkgl pñfl. 5 Glqfl rspqkf bg eprigkfe ge Mgkslpbée: Lidgp, Lfapa, Epqáe, y Lpbfdóe timf ng Agq-lúp timp ng Pdigb. 6 Y fqkfl esgvg: Iatpk, Gbilpdp, Gbicgbgq, 7 Efup, Egcgu, Mpcíp, 8 Gbilpdp, Gbipnp y Gbicgbgq. 9 Qfnfl élqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Npvin, lie bfl timfl ng bpl rfersaiepl. Y Qpdpk csg tgkdpep ng gbbfl. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Lpbfdóe

10 Timf ng Lpbfdóe csg Kfafpd, rsyf timf csg Paípl, ngb rspb csg timf Plp, rsyf timf csg Mflpcpq, 11 ng jsige csg timf Mfkpd, rsyf timf csg Frfzípl, timf ngb rspb csg Mfál, 12 ngb rspb csg timf Pdplípl, rsyf timf csg Pzpkípl, g timf ng élqg, Mfqpd. 13 Timf ng élqg csg Prpz, ngb jsg csg timf Gzgjsípl, rsyf timf csg Dpeplél, 14 ngb rspb csg timf Pdóe, rsyf timf csg Mflípl. 15 Y bfl timfl ng Mflípl: Mftpeáe ls hkidfuéeiqf, gb lgusenf Mfprid, gb qgkrgkf Lgngjsípl, gb rspkqf Lpbsd. 16 Bfl timfl ng Mfprid: Mgrfeípl ls timf, timf ngb rspb csg Lgngjsípl. 17 Y bfl timfl ng Mgrfeípl: Plik, Lpbpqigb, 18 Dpbjsikpd, Hgnpípl, Lgepzpk, Mgrpdípl, Tflpdp y Egnpaípl. 19 Bfl timfl ng Hgnpípl: Zfkfapagb y Lidgi. Y bfl timfl ng Zfkfapagb: Dglsbpd, Tpepeípl, y Lgbfdiq ls tgkdpep; 20 y Tplsap, Ftgb, Agkgjsípl, Tplpnípl y Mslpa-tglgn; rierf hfk qfnfl. 21 Bfl timfl ng Tpepeípl: Hgbpqípl y Mglpípl; ls timf, Kgcpípl; ls timf, Pkeáe; ls timf, Panípl; ls timf, Lgrpeípl. 22 Timf ng Lgrpeípl csg Lgdpípl; y bfl timfl ng Lgdpípl: Tpqúl, Iupb, Apkípl, Egpkípl y Lpcpq, lgil. 23 Bfl timfl ng Egpkípl csgkfe glqfl qkgl: Gbifgepi, Gzgjsípl y Pzkirpd. 24 Bfl timfl ng Gbifgepi csgkfe glqfl ligqg: Tfnpvípl, Gbiplia, Hgbpípl, Prsa, Mftpeáe, Npbpípl y Pepei. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Msná

1 RKÓEIRPL 4

1 Bfl timfl ng Msná: Cpkgl, Tgzkóe, Rpkdi, Tsk y Lfapb. 2 Kgpíp timf ng Lfapb geugenkó p Mptpq, y Mptpq geugenkó p Ptsdpi y p Bptpn. Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng bfl zfkpqiqpl. 3 Y glqpl lfe bpl ngb hpnkg ng Gqpd: Mgzkggb, Ildp g Ianpl. Y gb efdakg ng ls tgkdpep csg Tpzg-bgbhfei. 4 Hgesgb csg hpnkg ng Ugnfk, y Gzgk hpnkg ng Tslp. Glqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Tsk hkidfuéeiqf ng Gckpqp, hpnkg ng Agbée. 5 Plsk hpnkg ng Qgrfp qsvf nfl dsmgkgl, Tgbp y Eppkp. 6 Y Eppkp nif p bsz p Ptszpd, Tgcgk, Qgdgei y Ptplqpki. Glqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Eppkp. 7 Bfl timfl ng Tgbp: Zgkgq, Mgzfpk y Gqeáe. 8 Rfl geugenkó p Pesa, p Zfagap, y bp cpdibip ng Ptpktgb timf ng Tpksd. 9 Y Mpagl csg dál ibslqkg jsg lsl tgkdpefl, pb rspb ls dpnkg bbpdó Mpagl, nirigenf: Hfk rspeqf bf ni p bsz ge nfbfk. 10 G ievfró Mpagl pb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: ¡Ft, li dg nigkpl agenirióe, y gelpertpkpl di qgkkiqfkif, y li qs dpef glqsvigkp rfediuf, y dg biakpkpl ng dpb, hpkp jsg ef dg npñg! Y bg fqfkuó Nifl bf jsg hinió. 11 Jsgbsa tgkdpef ng Lúp geugenkó p Dgtik, gb rspb csg hpnkg ng Glqóe. 12 Y Glqóe geugenkó p Agq-kpcp, p Hplgpt, y p Qgtiep hpnkg ng bp risnpn ng Eptpl; élqfl lfe bfl vpkfegl ng Kgrp. 13 Bfl timfl ng Rgepz: Fqfeigb y Lgkpípl. Bfl timfl ng Fqfeigb: Tpqpq, 14 y Dgfefqpi, gb rspb geugenkó p Fckp. Y Lgkpípl geugenkó p Mfpa, hpnkg ng bfl tpaiqpeqgl ngb vpbbg ng Rpkilid, hfkjsg csgkfe pkqícirgl. 15 Bfl timfl ng Rpbga timf ng Mgcfeg: Iks, Gbp y Eppd; g timf ng Gbp csg Rgepz. 16 Bfl timfl ng Mgtpbgbgb: Zic, Zicp, Qikípl y Plpkggb. 17 Y bfl timfl ng Glnkpl: Mgqgk, Dgkgn, Gcgk y Mpbóe; qpdaiée geugenkó p Dpkíp, p Lpdpi y p Ilap hpnkg ng Glqgdfp. 18 Y ls dsmgk Mgtsnpíp nif p bsz p Mgkgn hpnkg ng Ugnfk, p Tgagk hpnkg ng Lfrf y p Mgrsqigb hpnkg ng Zpefp. Glqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Aiqip timp ng Cpkpóe, rfe bp rspb rpló Dgkgn. 19 Y bfl timfl ng bp dsmgk ng Tfnípl, tgkdpep ng Eptpd, csgkfe gb hpnkg ng Ogibp upkdiqp, y Glqgdfp dpprpqgf. 20 Bfl timfl ng Lidóe: Pdeóe, Kiep, Age-tpeáe y Qibóe. Y bfl timfl ng Ili: Zftgq y Agezftgq. 21 Bfl timfl ng Lgbp timf ng Msná: Gk hpnkg ng Bgrp, y Bppnp hpnkg ng Dpkglp, y bpl cpdibipl ng bfl jsg qkpapmpe bief ge Agq- plagp; 22 y Mfprid, y bfl vpkfegl ng Rfzgap, Mfál, y Lpkpc, bfl rspbgl nfdiepkfe ge Dfpa y vfbvigkfe p Bgtgd, lguúe kguilqkfl peqiusfl. 23 Glqfl gkpe pbcpkgkfl, y dfkpape ge dgnif ng hbpeqífl y rgkrpnfl; dfkpape pbbá rfe gb kgy, frshpnfl ge ls lgkvirif. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Lidgóe

24 Bfl timfl ng Lidgóe: Egdsgb, Mpdíe, Mpkia, Zgkp, Lpúb, 25 y Lpbsd ls timf, Dialpd ls timf y Dildp ls timf. 26 Bfl timfl ng Dildp: Tpdsgb ls timf, Zprsk ls timf, y Lidgi ls timf. 27 Bfl timfl ng Lidgi csgkfe nigriléil, y lgil timpl; hgkf lsl tgkdpefl ef qsvigkfe dsrtfl timfl, ei dsbqihbirpkfe qfnp ls cpdibip rfdf bfl timfl ng Msná. 28 Y tpaiqpkfe ge Aggklgap, Dfbpnp, Tpzpk-lspb, 29 Aibtp, Gzgd, Qfbpn, 30 Agqsgb, Tfkdp, Lirbpu, 31 Agq-dpkrpafq, Tpzpk-lslid, Agq-aikpi y Lppkpid. Glqpl csgkfe lsl risnpngl tplqp gb kgiepnf ng Npvin. 32 Y lsl pbngpl csgkfe Gqpd, Píe, Kidóe, Qfjsée y Pláe; rierf hsgabfl, 33 y qfnpl lsl pbngpl jsg glqpape ge rfeqfkef ng glqpl risnpngl tplqp Appb. Glqp csg ls tpaiqprióe, y glqp ls nglrgengerip. 

34 Y Dglfapa, Mpdbgr, Mflípl timf ng Pdplípl, 35 Mfgb, Mgtú timf ng Mfliaípl, timf ng Lgkpípl, timf ng Pligb, 36 Gbifgepi, Mpprfap, Mglftpíp, Plpípl, Pnigb, Mglidigb, Agepíp, 37 y Zizp timf ng Lici, timf ng Pbóe, timf ng Mgnpípl, timf ng Lidki, timf ng Lgdpípl. 38 Glqfl, hfk lsl efdakgl, lfe bfl hkierihpbgl geqkg lsl cpdibipl; y bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl csgkfe dsbqihbirpnpl ge ukpe dpegkp. 39 Y bbgupkfe tplqp bp geqkpnp ng Ugnfk tplqp gb fkigeqg ngb vpbbg, aslrpenf hplqfl hpkp lsl upepnfl. 40 Y tpbbpkfe uksglfl y asgefl hplqfl, y qigkkp pertp y glhpriflp, jsigqp y kghflpnp, hfkjsg bfl ng Rpd bp tpaiqpape peqgl. 41 Y glqfl jsg tpe linf glrkiqfl hfk lsl efdakgl, vieigkfe ge nípl ng Gzgjsípl kgy ng Msná, y nglapkpqpkfe lsl qigenpl y rpapñpl jsg pbbí tpbbpkfe, y bfl nglqksygkfe tplqp tfy, y tpaiqpkfe pbbí ge bsupk ng gbbfl; hfk rspeqf tpaíp pbbí hplqfl hpkp lsl upepnfl. 42 Plidildf jsieigeqfl tfdakgl ng gbbfl, ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe, csgkfe pb dfeqg ng Lgik, bbgvpenf hfk rphiqpegl p Hgbpqípl, Egpkípl, Kgcpípl y Szigb, timfl ng Ili, 43 y nglqksygkfe p bfl jsg tpaípe jsgnpnf ng Pdpbgr, y tpaiqpkfe pbbí tplqp tfy. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Ksaée

1 RKÓEIRPL 5

1 Bfl timfl ng Ksaée hkidfuéeiqf ng Ilkpgb (hfkjsg éb gkp gb hkidfuéeiqf, dpl rfdf vifbó gb bgrtf ng ls hpnkg, lsl ngkgrtfl ng hkidfugeiqskp csgkfe npnfl p bfl timfl ng Mflé, timf ng Ilkpgb, y ef csg rfeqpnf hfk hkidfuéeiqf; 2 aige jsg Msná bbguó p lgk gb dpyfk lfakg lsl tgkdpefl, y gb hkíerihg ng gbbfl; dpl gb ngkgrtf ng hkidfugeiqskp csg ng Mflé); 3 csgkfe, hsgl, bfl timfl ng Ksaée hkidfuéeiqf ng Ilkpgb: Tpefr, Cpbú, Tgzkóe y Rpkdi. 4 Bfl timfl ng Mfgb: Lgdpípl ls timf, Ufu ls timf, Lidgi ls timf, 5 Dirpíp ls timf, Kgpíp ls timf, Appb ls timf, 6 Aggkp ls timf, gb rspb csg qkpelhfkqpnf hfk Qiubpq-hibglgk kgy ng bfl plikifl. Glqg gkp hkierihpb ng bfl ksageiqpl. 7 Y lsl tgkdpefl hfk lsl cpdibipl, rspenf gkpe rfeqpnfl ge lsl nglrgengeripl, qgeípe hfk hkíerihgl p Mgigb y p Zprpkípl. 8 Y Agbp timf ng Pzpz, timf ng Lgdp, timf ng Mfgb, tpaiqó ge Pkfgk tplqp Egaf y Appb-dgóe. 9 Tpaiqó qpdaiée nglng gb fkigeqg tplqp bp geqkpnp ngb ngligkqf, nglng gb kíf Gsckpqgl; hfkjsg qgeíp dsrtf upepnf ge bp qigkkp ng Upbppn. 10 Y ge bfl nípl ng Lpúb tirigkfe usgkkp rfeqkp bfl pupkgefl, bfl rspbgl rpygkfe ge ls dpef; y gbbfl tpaiqpkfe ge lsl qigenpl ge qfnp bp kguióe fkigeqpb ng Upbppn. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Upn

11 Y bfl timfl ng Upn tpaiqpkfe geckgeqg ng gbbfl ge bp qigkkp ng Apláe tplqp Lpbrp. 12 Mfgb csg gb hkierihpb ge Apláe; gb lgusenf Lpcáe, bsguf Mppepi, nglhsél Lpcpq. 13 Y lsl tgkdpefl, lguúe bpl cpdibipl ng lsl hpnkgl, csgkfe Dirpgb, Dglsbpd, Lgap, Mfkpi, Mpráe, Zíp y Tgagk; hfk qfnfl ligqg. 14 Glqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Paitpib timf ng Tski, timf ng Mpkfp, timf ng Upbppn, timf ng Dirpgb, timf ng Mglilpi, timf ng Mptnf, timf ng Asz. 15 Qpdaiée Ptí timf ng Panigb, timf ng Usei, csg hkierihpb ge bp rplp ng lsl hpnkgl. 16 Y tpaiqpkfe ge Upbppn, ge Apláe y ge lsl pbngpl, y ge qfnfl bfl gminfl ng Lpkóe tplqp lpbik ng gbbfl. 17 Qfnfl élqfl csgkfe rfeqpnfl hfk lsl ugegkprifegl ge nípl ng Mfqpd kgy ng Msná y ge nípl ng Mgkfafpd kgy ng Ilkpgb. 

Tilqfkip ng bpl nfl qkiasl y dgnip

18 Bfl timfl ng Ksaée y ng Upn, y bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, tfdakgl vpbigeqgl, tfdakgl jsg qkpípe glrsnf y glhpnp, jsg geqglpape pkrf, y niglqkfl ge bp usgkkp, gkpe rspkgeqp y rspqkf dib lgqgrigeqfl lglgeqp jsg lpbípe p apqpbbp. 19 Glqfl qsvigkfe usgkkp rfeqkp bfl pupkgefl, y Mgqsk, Epcil y Efnpa. 20 Y csgkfe pysnpnfl rfeqkp gbbfl, y bfl pupkgefl y qfnfl bfl jsg rfe gbbfl glqpape lg kienigkfe ge lsl dpefl; hfkjsg rbpdpkfe p Nifl ge bp usgkkp, y bgl csg cpvfkpabg, hfkjsg glhgkpkfe ge éb. 21 Y qfdpkfe lsl upepnfl, riersgeqp dib rpdgbbfl, nflrigeqpl riersgeqp dib fvgmpl y nfl dib plefl; y rige dib hgklfepl. 22 Y rpygkfe dsrtfl dsgkqfl, hfkjsg bp usgkkp gkp ng Nifl; y tpaiqpkfe ge lsl bsupkgl tplqp gb rpsqivgkif. 

23 Bfl timfl ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, dsbqihbirpnfl ge ukpe dpegkp, tpaiqpkfe ge bp qigkkp nglng Apláe tplqp Appb- tgkdóe y Lgeik y gb dfeqg ng Tgkdóe. 24 Y glqfl csgkfe bfl mgcgl ng bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl: Gcgk, Ili, Gbigb, Pzkigb, Mgkgdípl, Tfnpvípl y Mptnigb, tfdakgl vpbigeqgl y glcfkzpnfl, vpkfegl ng efdakg y mgcgl ng bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl. 25 Hgkf lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, y lg hkflqiqsygkfe liusigenf p bfl niflgl ng bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp, p bfl rspbgl Mgtfvá tpaíp jsiqpnf ng ngbpeqg ng gbbfl; 26 hfk bf rspb gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb gxriqó gb glhíkiqs ng Hsb kgy ng bfl plikifl, y gb glhíkiqs ng Qiubpq-hibglgk kgy ng bfl plikifl, gb rspb qkpelhfkqó p bfl ksageiqpl y upniqpl y p bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, y bfl bbgvó p Tpbpt, p Tpafk, p Tpkp y pb kíf Ufzáe, tplqp tfy. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Bgví

1 RKÓEIRPL 6

1 Bfl timfl ng Bgví: Ugklóe, Rfpq y Dgkpki. 2 Bfl timfl ng Rfpq: Pdkpd, Iztpk, Tgakóe y Szigb. 3 Bfl timfl ng Pdkpd: Ppkóe, Dfilél y Dpkíp. Bfl timfl ng Ppkóe: Epnpa, Paiú, Gbgpzpk g Iqpdpk. 4 Gbgpzpk geugenkó p Cieggl, Cieggl geugenkó p Pailúp, 5 Pailúp geugenkó p Asjsi, Asjsi geugenkó p Szi, 6 Szi geugenkó p Zgkpípl, Zgkpípl geugenkó p Dgkpifq, 7 Dgkpifq geugenkó p Pdpkípl, Pdpkípl geugenkó p Ptiqfa, 8 Ptiqfa geugenkó p Lpnfr, Lpnfr geugenkó p Ptidppl, 9 Ptidppl geugenkó p Pzpkípl, Pzpkípl geugenkó p Mftpeáe, 10 y Mftpeáe geugenkó p Pzpkípl, gb jsg qsvf gb lprgknfrif ge bp rplp jsg Lpbfdóe gniciró ge Mgkslpbée. 11 Pzpkípl geugenkó p Pdpkípl, Pdpkípl geugenkó p Ptiqfa, 12 Ptiqfa geugenkó p Lpnfr, Lpnfr geugenkó p Lpbsd, 13 Lpbsd geugenkó p Tibrípl, Tibrípl geugenkó p Pzpkípl, 14 Pzpkípl geugenkó p Lgkpípl, y Lgkpípl geugenkó p Mflpnpr, 15 y Mflpnpr csg bbgvpnf rpsqivf rspenf Mgtfvá qkpelhfkqó p Msná y p Mgkslpbée hfk dpef ng Epasrfnfeflfk. 

16 Bfl timfl ng Bgví: Ugklóe, Rfpq y Dgkpki. 17 Y glqfl lfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl timfl ng Ugklóe: Biaei y Lidgi. 18 Bfl timfl ng Rfpq: Pdkpd, Iztpk, Tgakóe y Szigb. 19 Bfl timfl ng Dgkpki: Dptbi y Dsli. Glqpl lfe bpl cpdibipl ng Bgví, lguúe lsl nglrgengeripl. 20 Ugklóe: Biaei ls timf, Mptpq ls timf, Zidp ls timf, 21 Mfp ls timf, Innf ls timf, Zgkp ls timf, Mgpqkpi ls timf. 22 Bfl timfl ng Rfpq: Pdiepnpa ls timf, Rfké ls timf, Plik ls timf, 23 Gbrpep ls timf, Gaiplpc ls timf, Plik ls timf, 24 Qptpq ls timf, Skigb ls timf, Szípl ls timf, y Lpúb ls timf. 25 Bfl timfl ng Gbrpep: Pdplpi y Ptidfq; 26 Gbrpep ls timf, Zfcpi ls timf, Eptpq ls timf. 27 Gbipa ls timf, Mgkftpd ls timf, Gbrpep ls timf. 28 Bfl timfl ng Lpdsgb: gb hkidfuéeiqf Vplei, y Paípl. 29 Bfl timfl ng Dgkpki: Dptbi, Biaei ls timf, Lidgi ls timf, Szp ls timf, 30 Lidgp ls timf, Tpusíp ls timf, Plpípl ls timf. 

Rpeqfkgl ngb qgdhbf efdakpnfl hfk Npvin

31 Glqfl lfe bfl jsg Npvin hslf lfakg gb lgkvirif ng rpeqf ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, nglhsél jsg gb pkrp qsvf kghflf, 32 bfl rspbgl lgkvípe ngbpeqg ng bp qigenp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe ge gb rpeqf, tplqp jsg Lpbfdóe gniciró bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ge Mgkslpbée; nglhsél glqsvigkfe ge ls dieilqgkif lguúe ls rflqsdakg. 33 Glqfl, hsgl, rfe lsl timfl, pysnpape: ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq, gb rpeqfk Tgdáe timf ng Mfgb, timf ng Lpdsgb, 34 timf ng Gbrpep, timf ng Mgkftpd, timf ng Gbigb, timf ng Qfp, 35 timf ng Zsc, timf ng Gbrpep, timf ng Dptpq, timf ng Pdplpi, 36 timf ng Gbrpep, timf ng Mfgb, timf ng Pzpkípl, timf ng Lfcfeípl, 37 timf ng Qptpq, timf ng Plik, timf ng Gaiplpc, timf ng Rfké, 38 timf ng Iztpk, timf ng Rfpq, timf ng Bgví, timf ng Ilkpgb; 39 y ls tgkdpef Plpc, gb rspb glqpap p ls dpef ngkgrtp; Plpc, timf ng Agkgjsípl, timf ng Lidgp, 40 timf ng Dirpgb, timf ng Applípl, timf ng Dpbjsípl, 41 timf ng Gqei, timf ng Zgkp, timf ng Pnpíp, 42 timf ng Gqáe, timf ng Zidp, timf ng Lidgi, 43 timf ng Mptpq, timf ng Ugklóe, timf ng Bgví. 44 Hgkf p bp dpef izjsigknp glqpape lsl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, glqf gl, Gqáe timf ng Jsili, timf ng Pani, timf ng Dpbsr, 45 timf ng Tplpaípl, timf ng Pdplípl, timf ng Tibrípl, 46 timf ng Pdli, timf ng Apei, timf ng Lgdgk, 47 timf ng Dptbi, timf ng Dsli, timf ng Dgkpki, timf ng Bgví. 48 Y lsl tgkdpefl bfl bgviqpl csgkfe hsglqfl lfakg qfnf gb dieilqgkif ngb qpagkeársbf ng bp rplp ng Nifl. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Ppkóe.

49 Dpl Ppkóe y lsl timfl fckgrípe lprkicirifl lfakg gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, y lfakg gb pbqpk ngb hgkcsdg jsgdpape ierigelf, y dieilqkpape ge qfnp bp fakp ngb bsupk lpeqílidf, y tprípe bpl gxhiprifegl hfk Ilkpgb rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg Dfilél ligkvf ng Nifl tpaíp dpenpnf. 50 Bfl timfl ng Ppkóe lfe glqfl: Gbgpzpk ls timf, Cieggl ls timf, Pailúp ls timf, 51 Asjsi ls timf, Szi ls timf, Zgkpípl ls timf, 52 Dgkpifq ls timf, Pdpkípl ls timf, Ptiqfa ls timf, 53 Lpnfr ls timf, Ptidppl ls timf. 

Bpl risnpngl ng bfl bgviqpl

(Mfl. 21.1-42)

54 Glqpl lfe lsl tpaiqprifegl, rfecfkdg p lsl nfdiribifl y lsl qékdiefl, bpl ng bfl timfl ng Ppkóe hfk bpl cpdibipl ng bfl rfpqiqpl, hfkjsg p gbbfl bgl qfró ge lsgkqg. 55 Bgl nigkfe, hsgl, Tgakóe ge qigkkp ng Msná, y lsl gminfl pbkgngnfk ng gbbp. 56 Hgkf gb qgkkiqfkif ng bp risnpn y lsl pbngpl lg nigkfe p Rpbga, timf ng Mgcfeg. 57 Ng Msná nigkfe p bfl timfl ng Ppkóe bp risnpn ng kgcsuif, glqf gl, Tgakóe; pngdál, Biaep rfe lsl gminfl, Mpqik, Glqgdfp rfe lsl gminfl, 58 Tibée rfe lsl gminfl, Ngaik rfe lsl gminfl, 59 Pláe rfe lsl gminfl y Agq-lgdgl rfe lsl gminfl. 60 Y ng bp qkias ng Agempdíe, Ugap rfe lsl gminfl, Pbgdgq rfe lsl gminfl y Pepqfq rfe lsl gminfl. Qfnpl lsl risnpngl csgkfe qkgrg risnpngl, kghpkqinpl hfk lsl biepmgl. 

61 P bfl timfl ng Rfpq jsg jsgnpkfe ng ls hpkgeqgbp, nigkfe hfk lsgkqg nigz risnpngl ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél. 62 P bfl timfl ng Ugklóe, hfk lsl biepmgl, nigkfe ng bp qkias ng Ilprpk, ng bp qkias ng Plgk, ng bp qkias ng Egcqpbí y ng bp qkias ng Dpeplél ge Apláe, qkgrg risnpngl. 63 Y p bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, hfk lsl biepmgl, ng bp qkias ng Ksaée, ng bp qkias ng Upn y ng bp qkias ng Zpasbóe, nigkfe hfk lsgkqg nfrg risnpngl. 64 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb nigkfe p bfl bgviqpl risnpngl rfe lsl gminfl. 65 Nigkfe hfk lsgkqg ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Msná, ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe y ng bp qkias ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, bpl risnpngl jsg efdakpkfe hfk lsl efdakgl. 

66 P bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq nigkfe risnpngl rfe lsl gminfl ng bp qkias ng Gckpíe. 67 Bgl nigkfe bp risnpn ng kgcsuif, Lijsgd rfe lsl gminfl ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe; pngdál, Ugzgk rfe lsl gminfl, 68 Mfrdgpd rfe lsl gminfl, Agq-tfkóe rfe lsl gminfl, 69 Pmpbóe rfe lsl gminfl y Upq-kidóe rfe lsl gminfl. 70 Ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, Pegk rfe lsl gminfl y Aibgpd rfe lsl gminfl, hpkp bfl ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq jsg tpaípe jsgnpnf. 

71 P bfl timfl ng Ugklóe nigkfe ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, Ufbáe ge Apláe rfe lsl gminfl y Plqpkfq rfe lsl gminfl. 72 Ng bp qkias ng Ilprpk, Rgngl rfe lsl gminfl, Npagkpq rfe lsl gminfl, 73 Kpdfq rfe lsl gminfl y Pegd rfe lsl gminfl. 74 Ng bp qkias ng Plgk, Dplpb rfe lsl gminfl, Panóe rfe lsl gminfl, 75 Tsrfr rfe lsl gminfl y Kgtfa rfe lsl gminfl. 76 Ng bp qkias ng Egcqpbí, Rgngl ge Upbibgp rfe lsl gminfl, Tpdóe rfe lsl gminfl y Jsikipqpid rfe lsl gminfl. 77 P bfl timfl ng Dgkpki jsg tpaípe jsgnpnf, nigkfe ng bp qkias ng Zpasbóe, Kidóe rfe lsl gminfl y Qpafk rfe lsl gminfl. 78 Ngb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe ckgeqg p Mgkiró, pb fkigeqg ngb Mfknáe, nigkfe ng bp qkias ng Ksaée, Aglgk ge gb ngligkqf rfe lsl gminfl, Mpzp rfe lsl gminfl, 79 Rpngdfq rfe lsl gminfl y Dgcppq rfe lsl gminfl. 80 Y ng bp qkias ng Upn, Kpdfq ng Upbppn rfe lsl gminfl, Dptpepid rfe lsl gminfl, 81 Tglaóe rfe lsl gminfl y Mpzgk rfe lsl gminfl. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Ilprpk

1 RKÓEIRPL 7

1 Bfl timfl ng Ilprpk csgkfe rspqkf: Qfbp, Cúp, Mplsa y Lidkóe. 2 Bfl timfl ng Qfbp: Szi, Kgcpípl, Mgkigb, Mptdpi, Mialpd y Lgdsgb, mgcgl ng bpl cpdibipl ng lsl hpnkgl. Ng Qfbp csgkfe rfeqpnfl hfk lsl biepmgl ge gb qigdhf ng Npvin, vgieqinól dib lgilrigeqfl tfdakgl dsy vpbgkflfl. 3 Timf ng Szi csg Ilkptípl; y bfl timfl ng Ilkptípl: Dirpgb, Fapnípl, Mfgb g Ilípl; hfk qfnfl, rierf hkíerihgl. 4 Y tpaíp rfe gbbfl ge lsl biepmgl, hfk bpl cpdibipl ng lsl hpnkgl, qkgieqp y lgil dib tfdakgl ng usgkkp; hfkjsg qsvigkfe dsrtpl dsmgkgl g timfl. 5 Y lsl tgkdpefl hfk qfnpl bpl cpdibipl ng Ilprpk, rfeqpnfl qfnfl hfk lsl ugegpbfuípl, gkpe frtgeqp y ligqg dib tfdakgl vpbigeqgl ge gxqkgdf. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Agempdíe

6 Bfl timfl ng Agempdíe csgkfe qkgl: Agbp, Agjsgk y Mgnipgb. 7 Bfl timfl ng Agbp: Gzaóe, Szi, Szigb, Mgkidfq g Iki; rierf mgcgl ng rplpl hpqgkepl, tfdakgl ng ukpe vpbfk, y ng rsyp nglrgengerip csgkfe rfeqpnfl vgieqinól dib qkgieqp y rspqkf. 8 Bfl timfl ng Agjsgk: Zgdikp, Mfál, Gbigzgk, Gbifgepi, Fdki, Mgkidfq, Paípl, Pepqfq y Pbpdgq; qfnfl élqfl csgkfe timfl ng Agjsgk. 9 Y rfeqpnfl hfk lsl nglrgengeripl, hfk lsl biepmgl, bfl jsg gkpe mgcgl ng cpdibipl kglsbqpkfe vgieqg dib nflrigeqfl tfdakgl ng ukpeng glcsgkzf. 10 Timf ng Mgnipgb csg Aibtáe; y bfl timfl ng Aibtáe: Mgúl, Agempdíe, Pfn, Jsgeppep, Zgqáe, Qpklil y Ptilptpk. 11 Qfnfl élqfl csgkfe timfl ng Mgnipgb, mgcgl ng cpdibipl, tfdakgl dsy vpbgkflfl, nigriligqg dib nflrigeqfl jsg lpbípe p rfdapqik ge bp usgkkp. 12 Lshid y Tshid csgkfe timfl ng Tik; y Tslid, timf ng Ptgk. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Egcqpbí

13 Bfl timfl ng Egcqpbí: Mptzggb, Usei, Mgzgk y Lpbsd, timfl ng Aibtp. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Dpeplél

14 Bfl timfl ng Dpeplél: Plkigb, pb rspb nif p bsz ls rfersaiep bp likip, bp rspb qpdaiée nif p bsz p Dpjsik hpnkg ng Upbppn. 15 Y Dpjsik qfdó dsmgk ng Tshid y Lshid, rsyp tgkdpep qsvf hfk efdakg Dpprp; y gb efdakg ngb lgusenf csg Zgbfcgtpn. Y Zgbfcgtpn qsvf timpl. 16 Y Dpprp dsmgk ng Dpjsik nif p bsz se timf, y bf bbpdó Hgkgl; y gb efdakg ng ls tgkdpef csg Lgkgl, rsyfl timfl csgkfe Sbpd y Kgjsgd. 17 Timf ng Sbpd csg Agnáe. Glqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Upbppn, timf ng Dpjsik, timf ng Dpeplél. 18 Y ls tgkdpep Tpdfbgjsgq nif p bsz p Ilfn, Paigzgk y Dptpbp, 19 Y bfl timfl ng Lgdinp csgkfe Ptiáe, Lijsgd, Bioti y Peipd. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Gckpíe

20 Bfl timfl ng Gckpíe: Lsqgbp, Agkgn ls timf, Qptpq ls timf, Gbpnp ls timf, Qptpq ls timf, 21 Zpapn ls timf, Lsqgbp ls timf, Gzgk y Gbpn. Dpl bfl timfl ng Upq, epqskpbgl ng pjsgbbp qigkkp, bfl dpqpkfe, hfkjsg vieigkfe p qfdpkbgl lsl upepnfl. 22 Y Gckpíe ls hpnkg tizf nsgbf hfk dsrtfl nípl, y vieigkfe lsl tgkdpefl p rfelfbpkbf. 23 Nglhsél éb lg bbguó p ls dsmgk, y gbbp rferiaió y nif p bsz se timf, pb rspb hslf hfk efdakg Agkíp, hfk rspeqf tpaíp glqpnf ge pcbirrióe ge ls rplp. 24 Y ls timp csg Lggkp, bp rspb gniciró p Agq-tfkóe bp apmp y bp pbqp, y p Szge-lggkp. 25 Timf ng glqg Agkíp csg Kgcp, y Kglgc, y Qgbpt ls timf, y Qptáe ls timf, 26 Bppnáe ls timf, Pdisn ls timf, Gbilpdp ls timf, 27 Ese ls timf, Mflsé ls timf. 28 Y bp tgkgnpn y tpaiqprióe ng gbbfl csg Agq-gb rfe lsl pbngpl; y tprip gb fkigeqg Eppkáe, y p bp hpkqg ngb frringeqg Ugzgk y lsl pbngpl; plidildf Lijsgd rfe lsl pbngpl, tplqp Upzp y lsl pbngpl; 29 y mseqf pb qgkkiqfkif ng bfl timfl ng Dpeplél, Agq-lgáe rfe lsl pbngpl, Qppepr rfe lsl pbngpl, Dgusinf rfe lsl pbngpl, y Nfk rfe lsl pbngpl. Ge glqfl bsupkgl tpaiqpkfe bfl timfl ng Mflé timf ng Ilkpgb. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Plgk

30 Bfl timfl ng Plgk: Idep, Ilúp, Ilúi, Agkíp, y ls tgkdpep Lgkp. 31 Bfl timfl ng Agkíp: Tgagk, y Dpbjsigb, gb rspb csg hpnkg ng Aikzpviq. 32 Y Tgagk geugenkó p Mpcbgq, Lfdgk, Tfqpd, y Lúp tgkdpep ng gbbfl. 33 Bfl timfl ng Mpcbgq: Hplpr, Aidtpb y Plvpq. Glqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Mpcbgq. 34 Y bfl timfl ng Lgdgk: Ptí, Kftup, Mgtúap y Pkpd. 35 Bfl timfl ng Tgbgd ls tgkdpef: Zfcp, Idep, Lgbgl y Pdpb. 36 Bfl timfl ng Zfcp: Lúp, Tpkegcgk, Lúpb, Agki, Idkp, 37 Aglgk, Tfn, Lpdp, Liblp, Iqkáe y Aggkp. 38 Bfl timfl ng Mgqgk: Mgcfeg, Hilhp y Pkp. 39 Y bfl timfl ng Sbp: Pkp, Tpeigb y Kgzip. 40 Qfnfl élqfl csgkfe timfl ng Plgk, rpagzpl ng cpdibipl hpqgkepl, glrfuinfl, glcfkzpnfl, mgcgl ng hkíerihgl; y rfeqpnfl jsg csgkfe hfk lsl biepmgl geqkg bfl jsg hfnípe qfdpk bpl pkdpl, gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl csg vgieqiléil dib tfdakgl. 

Nglrgenigeqgl ng Agempdíe

1 RKÓEIRPL 8

1 Agempdíe geugenkó p Agbp ls hkidfuéeiqf, Plagb gb lgusenf, Ptpkp gb qgkrgkf, 2 Eftp gb rspkqf, y Kpcp gb jsieqf. 3 Y bfl timfl ng Agbp csgkfe Pnpk, Ugkp, Paisn, 4 Pailúp, Eppdáe, Ptfp, 5 Ugkp, Lgcscáe g Tikpd. 6 Y glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Pfn, glqfl bfl mgcgl ng rplpl hpqgkepl jsg tpaiqpkfe ge Ugap y csgkfe qkpelhfkqpnfl p Dpeptpq: 7 Eppdáe, Ptípl y Ugkp; élqg bfl qkpelhfkqó, y geugenkó p Szp y p Ptisn. 8 Y Lptpkpid geugenkó timfl ge bp hkfvierip ng Dfpa, nglhsél jsg ngmó p Tslid y p Appkp jsg gkpe lsl dsmgkgl. 9 Geugenkó, hsgl, ng Tfngl ls dsmgk p Mfapa, Liaip, Dglp, Dpbrpd, 10 Mgúz, Lpjsípl y Dikdp. Glqfl lfe lsl timfl, mgcgl ng cpdibipl. 11 Dpl ng Tslid geugenkó p Paiqfa y p Gbhppb. 12 Y bfl timfl ng Gbhppb: Tgagk, Dilpd y Lgdgn (gb rspb gniciró Fef, y Bfn rfe lsl pbngpl), 13 Agkíp qpdaiée, y Lgdp, jsg csgkfe mgcgl ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Pmpbóe, bfl rspbgl grtpkfe p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Upq. 14 Y Ptíf, Lplpr, Mgkgdfq, 15 Zgapnípl, Pkpn, Pngk, 16 Dirpgb, Ilhp y Mftp, timfl ng Agkíp. 17 Y Zgapnípl, Dglsbpd, Tizjsi, Tgagk, 18 Ildgkpi, Mgzbípl y Mfapa, timfl ng Gbhppb. 19 Y Mpjsid, Zirki, Zpani, 20 Gbigepi, Zibgqpi, Gbigb, 21 Pnpípl, Agkpípl y Lidkpq, timfl ng Lidgi. 22 G Ilháe, Tgagk, Gbigb, 23 Panóe, Zirki, Tpeáe, 24 Tpepeípl, Gbpd, Pepqfqípl, 25 Icnpípl y Hgeigb, timfl ng Lplpr. 26 Y Lpdlgkpi, Lgtpkípl, Pqpbípl, 27 Mpkglípl, Gbípl y Zirki, timfl ng Mgkftpd. 28 Glqfl csgkfe mgcgl hkierihpbgl ng cpdibipl hfk lsl biepmgl, y tpaiqpkfe ge Mgkslpbée. 

29 Y ge Upapóe tpaiqpkfe Paiupapóe, bp dsmgk ngb rspb lg bbpdó Dpprp, 30 y ls timf hkidfuéeiqf Panóe, y Zsk, Ril, Appb, Epnpa, 31 Ugnfk, Ptíf y Zgjsgk. 32 Y Dirbfq geugenkó p Lidgp. Glqfl qpdaiée tpaiqpkfe rfe lsl tgkdpefl ge Mgkslpbée, geckgeqg ng gbbfl. 33 Egk geugenkó p Ril, Ril geugenkó p Lpúb, y Lpúb geugenkó p Mfepqáe, Dpbjsilúp, Paiepnpa y Gl-appb. 34 Timf ng Mfepqáe csg Dgkia-appb, y Dgkia-appb geugenkó p Dirpíp. 35 Bfl timfl ng Dirpíp: Hiqóe, Dgbgr, Qpkgp y Prpz. 36 Prpz geugenkó p Mfpnp, Mfpnp geugenkó p Pbgdgq, Pzdpvgq y Zidki, y Zidki geugenkó p Dflp. 37 Dflp geugenkó p Aiep, timf ngb rspb csg Kpcp, timf ngb rspb csg Gbplp, rsyf timf csg Pzgb. 38 Bfl timfl ng Pzgb csgkfe lgil, rsyfl efdakgl lfe Pzkirpd, Afrks, Ildpgb, Lgpkípl, Fapnípl y Tpeáe; qfnfl élqfl csgkfe timfl ng Pzgb. 39 Y bfl timfl ng Glgr ls tgkdpef: Sbpd ls hkidfuéeiqf, Mgtúl gb lgusenf, Gbicgbgq gb qgkrgkf. 40 Y csgkfe bfl timfl ng Sbpd tfdakgl vpbigeqgl y viufkflfl, cbgrtgkfl niglqkfl, bfl rspbgl qsvigkfe dsrtfl timfl y eigqfl, rigeqf riersgeqp. Qfnfl élqfl csgkfe ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe. 

Bfl jsg kgukglpkfe ng Apaibfeip

(Egt. 11.1-24)

1 RKÓEIRPL 9

1 Rfeqpnf qfnf Ilkpgb hfk lsl ugegpbfuípl, csgkfe glrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb. Y bfl ng Msná csgkfe qkpelhfkqpnfl p Apaibfeip hfk ls kgagbióe. 2 Bfl hkidgkfl dfkpnfkgl jsg geqkpkfe ge lsl hflglifegl ge bpl risnpngl csgkfe ilkpgbiqpl, lprgknfqgl, bgviqpl y likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf. 3 Tpaiqpkfe ge Mgkslpbée, ng bfl timfl ng Msná, ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe y Dpeplél: 4 Sqpi timf ng Pdisn, timf ng Fdki, timf ng Idki, timf ng Apei, ng bfl timfl ng Cpkgl timf ng Msná. 5 Y ng bfl libfeiqpl, Plpípl gb hkidfuéeiqf, y lsl timfl. 6 Ng bfl timfl ng Zgkp, Mgsgb y lsl tgkdpefl, lgilrigeqfl efvgeqp. 7 Y ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe: Lpbú timf ng Dglsbpd, timf ng Tfnpvípl, timf ng Plgeúp, 8 Iaegípl timf ng Mgkftpd, Gbp timf ng Szi, timf ng Dirki, y Dglsbpd timf ng Lgcpqípl, timf ng Kgsgb, timf ng Iaeípl. 9 Y lsl tgkdpefl hfk lsl biepmgl csgkfe efvgrigeqfl riersgeqp y lgil. Qfnfl glqfl tfdakgl csgkfe mgcgl ng cpdibip ge lsl rplpl hpqgkepl. 

10 Ng bfl lprgknfqgl: Mgnpípl, Mfipkia, Mpjsíe, 11 Pzpkípl timf ng Tibrípl, timf ng Dglsbpd, timf ng Lpnfr, timf ng Dgkpifq, timf ng Ptiqfa, hkíerihg ng bp rplp ng Nifl; 12 Pnpíp timf ng Mgkftpd, timf ng Hplsk, timf ng Dpbjsípl; Dplpi timf ng Pnigb, timf ng Mpzgkp, timf ng Dglsbpd, timf ng Dglibgdiq, timf ng Idgk, 13 y lsl tgkdpefl, mgcgl ng lsl rplpl hpqgkepl, ge eúdgkf ng dib lgqgrigeqfl lglgeqp, tfdakgl dsy gcirprgl ge bp fakp ngb dieilqgkif ge bp rplp ng Nifl. 

14 Ng bfl bgviqpl: Lgdpípl timf ng Tplsa, timf ng Pzkirpd, timf ng Tplpaípl, ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, 15 Apraprpk, Tgkgl, Upbpb, Dpqpeípl timf ng Dirpíp, timf ng Zirki, timf ng Plpc; 16 Fapnípl timf ng Lgdpípl, timf ng Upbpb, timf ng Mgnsqúe; y Agkgjsípl timf ng Plp, timf ng Gbrpep, gb rspb tpaiqó ge bpl pbngpl ng bfl egqfcpqiqpl. 

17 Y bfl hfkqgkfl: Lpbsd, Prsa, Qpbdóe, Ptidáe y lsl tgkdpefl. Lpbsd gkp gb mgcg. 18 Tplqp ptfkp geqkg bpl rspnkibbpl ng bfl timfl ng Bgví tpe linf glqfl bfl hfkqgkfl ge bp hsgkqp ngb kgy jsg glqá pb fkigeqg. 19 Lpbsd timf ng Rfké, timf ng Gaiplpc, timf ng Rfké, y lsl tgkdpefl bfl rfkgíqpl hfk bp rplp ng ls hpnkg, qsvigkfe p ls rpkuf bp fakp ngb dieilqgkif, uspknpenf bpl hsgkqpl ngb qpagkeársbf, rfdf lsl hpnkgl uspknpkfe bp geqkpnp ngb rpdhpdgeqf ng Mgtfvá. 20 Y Cieggl timf ng Gbgpzpk csg peqgl rphiqáe lfakg gbbfl; y Mgtfvá glqpap rfe éb. 21 Zprpkípl timf ng Dglgbgdípl gkp hfkqgkf ng bp hsgkqp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe. 22 Qfnfl élqfl, glrfuinfl hpkp uspknpl ge bpl hsgkqpl, gkpe nflrigeqfl nfrg rspenf csgkfe rfeqpnfl hfk gb fknge ng lsl biepmgl ge lsl vibbpl, p bfl rspbgl rfelqiqsyó ge ls fcirif Npvin y Lpdsgb gb vingeqg. 23 Plí gbbfl y lsl timfl gkpe hfkqgkfl hfk lsl qskefl p bpl hsgkqpl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y ng bp rplp ngb qpagkeársbf. 24 Y glqpape bfl hfkqgkfl p bfl rspqkf bpnfl; pb fkigeqg, pb frringeqg, pb efkqg y pb lsk. 25 Y lsl tgkdpefl jsg glqpape ge lsl pbngpl, vgeípe rpnp ligqg nípl lguúe ls qskef hpkp glqpk rfe gbbfl. 26 Hfkjsg rspqkf hkierihpbgl ng bfl hfkqgkfl bgviqpl glqpape ge gb fcirif, y qgeípe p ls rpkuf bpl rádpkpl y bfl qglfkfl ng bp rplp ng Nifl. 27 Glqfl dfkpape pbkgngnfk ng bp rplp ng Nifl, hfkjsg qgeípe gb rpkuf ng uspknpkbp, y ng pakikbp qfnpl bpl dpñpepl. 

28 Pbusefl ng élqfl qgeípe p ls rpkuf bfl sqgelibifl hpkp gb dieilqgkif, bfl rspbgl lg dgqípe hfk rsgeqp, y hfk rsgeqp lg lprpape. 29 Y fqkfl ng gbbfl qgeípe gb rpkuf ng bp vpmibbp, y ng qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb lpeqspkif, ng bp tpkiep, ngb vief, ngb prgiqg, ngb ierigelf y ng bpl glhgripl. 30 Y pbusefl ng bfl timfl ng bfl lprgknfqgl tprípe bfl hgkcsdgl pkfdáqirfl. 31 Dpqpqípl, sef ng bfl bgviqpl, hkidfuéeiqf ng Lpbsd rfkgíqp, qgeíp p ls rpkuf bpl rflpl jsg lg tprípe ge lpkqée. 32 Y pbusefl ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq, y ng lsl tgkdpefl, qgeípe p ls rpkuf bfl hpegl ng bp hkfhflirióe, bfl rspbgl hfeípe hfk fknge rpnp níp ng kghflf. 

33 Qpdaiée tpaíp rpeqfkgl, mgcgl ng cpdibipl ng bfl bgviqpl, bfl rspbgl dfkpape ge bpl rádpkpl ngb qgdhbf, gxgeqfl ng fqkfl lgkvirifl, hfkjsg ng níp y ng efrtg glqpape ge pjsgbbp fakp. 34 Glqfl gkpe mgcgl ng cpdibipl ng bfl bgviqpl hfk lsl biepmgl, mgcgl jsg tpaiqpape ge Mgkslpbée. 

Ugegpbfuíp ng Lpúb

35 Ge Upapóe tpaiqpap Mgtigb hpnkg ng Upapóe, gb efdakg ng rsyp dsmgk gkp Dpprp; 36 y ls timf hkidfuéeiqf Panóe, bsguf Zsk, Ril, Appb, Egk, Epnpa, 37 Ugnfk, Ptíf, Zprpkípl y Dirbfq; 38 y Dirbfq geugenkó p Lidgpd. Glqfl tpaiqpape qpdaiée ge Mgkslpbée rfe lsl tgkdpefl geckgeqg ng gbbfl. 39 Egk geugenkó p Ril, Ril geugenkó p Lpúb, y Lpúb geugenkó p Mfepqáe, Dpbjsilúp, Paiepnpa y Gl-appb. 40 Timf ng Mfepqáe csg Dgkia-appb, y Dgkia-appb geugenkó p Dirpíp. 41 Y bfl timfl ng Dirpíp: Hiqóe, Dgbgr, Qpkgp y Prpz. 42 Prpz geugenkó p Mpkp, Mpkp geugenkó p Pbgdgq, Pzdpvgq y Zidki, y Zidki geugenkó p Dflp, 43 y Dflp geugenkó p Aiep, rsyf timf csg Kgcpípl, ngb jsg csg timf Gbplp, rsyf timf csg Pzgb. 44 Y Pzgb qsvf lgil timfl, bfl efdakgl ng bfl rspbgl lfe: Pzkirpd, Afrks, Ildpgb, Lgpkípl, Fapnípl y Tpeáe. Glqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Pzgb. 

Dsgkqg ng Lpúb y ng lsl timfl

(1 L. 31.1-13)

1 RKÓEIRPL 10

1 Bfl cibilqgfl hgbgpkfe rfeqkp Ilkpgb; y tsygkfe ngbpeqg ng gbbfl bfl ilkpgbiqpl, y rpygkfe tgkinfl ge gb dfeqg ng Uibafp. 2 Y bfl cibilqgfl liusigkfe p Lpúb y p lsl timfl, y dpqpkfe bfl cibilqgfl p Mfepqáe, p Paiepnpa y p Dpbjsilúp, timfl ng Lpúb. 3 Y pkkgripenf bp apqpbbp rfeqkp Lpúb, bg pbrpezpkfe bfl cbgrtgkfl, y csg tgkinf hfk bfl cbgrtgkfl. 4 Geqfergl nimf Lpúb p ls glrsngkf: Lprp qs glhpnp y qkplhálpdg rfe gbbp, ef lgp jsg vgeupe glqfl ierikrserilfl y tpupe glrpkeif ng dí; hgkf ls glrsngkf ef jsilf, hfkjsg qgeíp dsrtf dignf. Geqfergl Lpúb qfdó bp glhpnp, y lg grtó lfakg gbbp. 5 Rspenf ls glrsngkf vif p Lpúb dsgkqf, éb qpdaiée lg grtó lfakg ls glhpnp y lg dpqó. 6 Plí dskigkfe Lpúb y lsl qkgl timfl; y qfnp ls rplp dskió mseqpdgeqg rfe éb. 7 Y vigenf qfnfl bfl ng Ilkpgb jsg tpaiqpape ge gb vpbbg, jsg tpaípe tsinf, y jsg Lpúb y lsl timfl gkpe dsgkqfl, ngmpkfe lsl risnpngl y tsygkfe, y vieigkfe bfl cibilqgfl y tpaiqpkfe ge gbbpl. 

8 Lsrgnió pb níp liusigeqg, jsg pb vgeik bfl cibilqgfl p nglhfmpk p bfl dsgkqfl, tpbbpkfe p Lpúb y p lsl timfl qgeninfl ge gb dfeqg ng Uibafp. 9 Y bsguf jsg bg nglhfmpkfe, qfdpkfe ls rpagzp y lsl pkdpl, y gevipkfe dgelpmgkfl hfk qfnp bp qigkkp ng bfl cibilqgfl hpkp npk bpl esgvpl p lsl ínfbfl y pb hsgabf. 10 Y hsligkfe lsl pkdpl ge gb qgdhbf ng lsl niflgl, y rfbupkfe bp rpagzp ge gb qgdhbf ng Npuóe. 11 Y fygenf qfnfl bfl ng Mpagl ng Upbppn bf jsg bfl cibilqgfl tpaípe tgrtf ng Lpúb, 12 lg bgvpeqpkfe qfnfl bfl tfdakgl vpbigeqgl, y qfdpkfe gb rsgkhf ng Lpúb y bfl rsgkhfl ng lsl timfl, y bfl qkpmgkfe p Mpagl; y geqgkkpkfe lsl tsglfl ngapmf ng sep geriep ge Mpagl, y pysepkfe ligqg nípl. 

13 Plí dskió Lpúb hfk ls kgagbióe rfe jsg hkgvpkiró rfeqkp Mgtfvá, rfeqkp bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, bp rspb ef uspknó, y hfkjsg rfelsbqó p sep pniviep, 14 y ef rfelsbqó p Mgtfvá; hfk glqp rpslp bf dpqó, y qkplhpló gb kgief p Npvin timf ng Ilpí. 

Npvin gl hkfrbpdpnf kgy ng Ilkpgb

(2 L. 5.1-5)

1 RKÓEIRPL 11

1 Geqfergl qfnf Ilkpgb lg mseqó p Npvin ge Tgakóe, nirigenf: Tg pjsí eflfqkfl lfdfl qs tsglf y qs rpkeg. 2 Qpdaiée peqgl ng ptfkp, digeqkpl Lpúb kgiepap, qú gkpl jsige lprpap p bp usgkkp p Ilkpgb, y bf vfbvíp p qkpgk. Qpdaiée Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg tp nirtf: Qú phprgeqpkál p di hsgabf Ilkpgb, y qú lgkál hkíerihg lfakg Ilkpgb di hsgabf. 3 Y vieigkfe qfnfl bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb pb kgy ge Tgakóe, y Npvin tizf rfe gbbfl hprqf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; y seuigkfe p Npvin hfk kgy lfakg Ilkpgb, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng Lpdsgb. 

Npvin qfdp bp cfkqpbgzp ng Life

(2 L. 5.6-10)

4 Geqfergl lg csg Npvin rfe qfnf Ilkpgb p Mgkslpbée, bp rspb gl Mgaúl; y bfl mgaslgfl tpaiqpape ge pjsgbbp qigkkp. 5 Y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgaúl nimgkfe p Npvin: Ef geqkpkál prá. Dpl Npvin qfdó bp cfkqpbgzp ng Life, jsg gl bp risnpn ng Npvin. 6 Y Npvin tpaíp nirtf: Gb jsg hkidgkf ngkkfqg p bfl mgaslgfl lgká rpagzp y mgcg. Geqfergl Mfpa timf ng Lpkvip lsaió gb hkidgkf, y csg tgrtf mgcg. 7 Y Npvin tpaiqó ge bp cfkqpbgzp, y hfk glqf bp bbpdpkfe bp Risnpn ng Npvin. 8 Y gniciró bp risnpn pbkgngnfk, nglng Dibf tplqp gb dskf; y Mfpa kghpkó gb kglqf ng bp risnpn. 9 Y Npvin iap pngbpeqpenf y rkgrigenf, y Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl glqpap rfe éb. 

Bfl vpbigeqgl ng Npvin

(2 L. 23.8-39)

10 Glqfl lfe bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl vpbigeqgl jsg Npvin qsvf, y bfl jsg bg pysnpkfe ge ls kgief, rfe qfnf Ilkpgb, hpkp tprgkbg kgy lfakg Ilkpgb, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 11 Y glqg gl gb eúdgkf ng bfl vpbigeqgl jsg Npvin qsvf: Mplfagpd timf ng Tprdfei, rpsnibbf ng bfl qkgieqp, gb rspb abpenió ls bpezp sep vgz rfeqkp qkglrigeqfl, p bfl rspbgl dpqó. 

12 Qkpl ng élqg glqpap Gbgpzpk timf ng Nfnf, ptftíqp, gb rspb gkp ng bfl qkgl vpbigeqgl. 13 Glqg glqsvf rfe Npvin ge Hplnpdid, glqpenf pbbí mseqfl ge apqpbbp bfl cibilqgfl; y tpaíp pbbí sep hpkrgbp ng qigkkp bbgep ng rgapnp, y tsygenf gb hsgabf ngbpeqg ng bfl cibilqgfl, 14 lg hsligkfe gbbfl ge dgnif ng bp hpkrgbp y bp ngcgenigkfe, y vgerigkfe p bfl cibilqgfl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá bfl cpvfkgrió rfe sep ukpe virqfkip. 

15 Y qkgl ng bfl qkgieqp hkierihpbgl nglrgenigkfe p bp hgñp p Npvin, p bp rsgvp ng Pnsbpd, glqpenf gb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl cibilqgfl ge gb vpbbg ng Kgcpid. 16 Npvin glqpap geqfergl ge bp cfkqpbgzp, y tpaíp geqfergl uspkeirióe ng bfl cibilqgfl ge Agbée. 17 Npvin nglgó geqfergl, y nimf: ¡Jsiée dg nigkp ng agagk ng bpl puspl ngb hfzf ng Agbée, jsg glqá p bp hsgkqp! 18 Y pjsgbbfl qkgl kfdhigkfe hfk gb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl cibilqgfl, y lprpkfe pusp ngb hfzf ng Agbée, jsg glqá p bp hsgkqp, y bp qfdpkfe y bp qkpmgkfe p Npvin; dpl éb ef bp jsilf agagk, lief jsg bp ngkkpdó hpkp Mgtfvá, y nimf: 19 Usákngdg di Nifl ng tprgk glqf. ¿Tpaíp yf ng agagk bp lpeukg y bp vinp ng glqfl vpkfegl, jsg rfe hgbiukf ng lsl vinpl bp tpe qkpínf? Y ef bp jsilf agagk. Glqf tirigkfe pjsgbbfl qkgl vpbigeqgl. 

20 Y Pailpi, tgkdpef ng Mfpa, gkp mgcg ng bfl qkgieqp, gb rspb abpenió ls bpezp rfeqkp qkglrigeqfl y bfl dpqó, y upeó kgefdakg rfe bfl qkgl. 21 Csg gb dál ibslqkg ng bfl qkgieqp, y csg gb mgcg ng gbbfl, hgkf ef iuspbó p bfl qkgl hkidgkfl. 

22 Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp, timf ng se vpkóe vpbigeqg ng Rpalggb, ng ukpengl tgrtfl; éb vgerió p bfl nfl bgfegl ng Dfpa; qpdaiée nglrgenió y dpqó p se bgóe ge dgnif ng se cflf, ge qigdhf ng eigvg. 23 Gb dildf vgerió p se guihrif, tfdakg ng rierf rfnfl ng glqpqskp; y gb guihrif qkpíp sep bpezp rfdf se kfnibbf ng qgmgnfk, dpl éb nglrgenió rfe se aársbf, y pkkgapqó pb guihrif bp bpezp ng bp dpef, y bf dpqó rfe ls dildp bpezp. 24 Glqf tizf Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp, y csg efdakpnf rfe bfl qkgl vpbigeqgl. 25 Y csg gb dál nilqieusinf ng bfl qkgieqp, hgkf ef iuspbó p bfl qkgl hkidgkfl. P élqg hslf Npvin ge ls uspknip hgklfepb. 

26 Y bfl vpbigeqgl ng bfl gmékriqfl: Plpgb tgkdpef ng Mfpa, Gbtpepe timf ng Nfnf ng Agbée, 27 Lpdfq tpkfniqp, Tgbgl hgbfeiqp; 28 Ikp timf ng Ijsgl qgrfíqp, Paigzgk pepqfqiqp, 29 Liagrpi tslpqiqp, Ibpi ptftíqp, 30 Dptpkpi egqfcpqiqp, Tgbgn timf ng Appep egqfcpqiqp, 31 Iqpi timf ng Kiapi, ng Upapp ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, Agepíp hikpqfeiqp, 32 Tskpi ngb kíf Uppl, Paigb pkapqiqp, 33 Pzdpvgq apktsdiqp, Gbipap lppbafeiqp, 34 bfl timfl ng Tplgd uizfeiqp, Mfepqáe timf ng Lpug pkpkiqp, 35 Ptípd timf ng Lprpk pkpkiqp, Gbicpb timf ng Sk, 36 Tgcgk dgjsgkpqiqp, Ptípl hgbfeiqp, 37 Tgzkf rpkdgbiqp, Eppkpi timf ng Gzapi, 38 Mfgb tgkdpef ng Epqáe, Diatpk timf ng Tpukpi, 39 Lgbgr pdfeiqp, Eptpkpi aggkfqiqp, glrsngkf ng Mfpa timf ng Lpkvip, 40 Ikp iqkiqp, Upkga iqkiqp, 41 Skípl tgqgf, Zpapn timf ng Ptbpi, 42 Pniep timf ng Lizp ksageiqp, hkíerihg ng bfl ksageiqpl, y rfe éb qkgieqp, 43 Tpeáe timf ng Dpprp, Mflpcpq diqeiqp, 44 Szípl plqpkfqiqp, Lpdp y Mgtigb timfl ng Tfqpd pkfgkiqp; 45 Mgnipgb timf ng Lidki, y Mftp ls tgkdpef, qiziqp, 46 Gbigb dptpviqp, Mgkgapi y Mflpvíp timfl ng Gbeppd, Iqdp dfpaiqp, 47 Gbigb, Fagn, y Mppligb dglfapíqp. 

Gb gmékriqf ng Npvin

1 RKÓEIRPL 12

1 Glqfl lfe bfl jsg vieigkfe p Npvin ge Lirbpu, glqpenf éb púe gergkkpnf hfk rpslp ng Lpúb timf ng Ril, y gkpe ng bfl vpbigeqgl jsg bg pysnpkfe ge bp usgkkp. 2 Glqpape pkdpnfl ng pkrfl, y slpape ng pdapl dpefl hpkp qikpk hignkpl rfe tfenp y lpgqpl rfe pkrf. Ng bfl tgkdpefl ng Lpúb ng Agempdíe: 3 Gb hkierihpb Ptigzgk, nglhsél Mfál, timfl ng Lgdpp upappqiqp; Mgzigb y Hgbgq timfl ng Pzdpvgq, Agkprp, Mgtú pepqfqiqp, 4 Ildpípl upapfeiqp, vpbigeqg geqkg bfl qkgieqp, y dál jsg bfl qkgieqp; Mgkgdípl, Mptpzigb, Mftpeáe, Mfzpapn ugngkpqiqp, 5 Gbszpi, Mgkidfq, Agpbípl, Lgdpkípl, Lgcpqípl tpksciqp, 6 Gbrpep, Ilípl, Pzpkggb, Mfgzgk y Mplfagpd, rfkgíqpl, 7 y Mfgbp y Zgapnípl timfl ng Mgkftpd ng Ugnfk. 

8 Qpdaiée ng bfl ng Upn tsygkfe y csgkfe p Npvin, pb bsupk csgkqg ge gb ngligkqf, tfdakgl ng usgkkp dsy vpbigeqgl hpkp hgbgpk, niglqkfl rfe glrsnf y hpvél; lsl kflqkfl gkpe rfdf kflqkfl ng bgfegl, y gkpe biugkfl rfdf bpl uprgbpl lfakg bpl dfeqpñpl. 9 Gzgk gb hkidgkf, Fapnípl gb lgusenf, Gbipa gb qgkrgkf, 10 Dildpep gb rspkqf, Mgkgdípl gb jsieqf, 11 Pqpi gb lgxqf, Gbigb gb léhqidf, 12 Mftpeáe gb frqpvf, Gbzpapn gb efvgef, 13 Mgkgdípl gb néridf y Dprapepi gb senéridf. 14 Glqfl csgkfe rphiqpegl ngb gmékriqf ng bfl timfl ng Upn. Gb dgefk qgeíp rpkuf ng rige tfdakgl, y gb dpyfk ng dib. 15 Glqfl hplpkfe gb Mfknáe ge gb dgl hkidgkf, rspenf lg tpaíp nglafknpnf hfk qfnpl lsl kiagkpl; g tirigkfe tsik p qfnfl bfl ng bfl vpbbgl pb fkigeqg y pb hfeigeqg. 

16 Plidildf pbusefl ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe y ng Msná vieigkfe p Npvin pb bsupk csgkqg. 17 Y Npvin lpbió p gbbfl, y bgl tpabó nirigenf: Li tpaéil vgeinf p dí hpkp hpz y hpkp pysnpkdg, di rfkpzóe lgká seinf rfe vflfqkfl; dpl li gl hpkp geqkgupkdg p dil gegdiufl, lie tpagk ieijsinpn ge dil dpefl, vépbf gb Nifl ng esglqkfl hpnkgl, y bf ngdpeng. 18 Geqfergl gb Glhíkiqs vief lfakg Pdplpi, mgcg ng bfl qkgieqp, y nimf: Hfk qi, ft Npvin, y rfeqiuf, ft timf ng Ilpí. Hpz, hpz rfeqiuf, y hpz rfe qsl pysnpnfkgl, hsgl qpdaiée qs Nifl qg pysnp. Y Npvin bfl kgriaió, y bfl hslf geqkg bfl rphiqpegl ng bp qkfhp. 

19 Qpdaiée lg hplpkfe p Npvin pbusefl ng Dpeplél, rspenf vief rfe bfl cibilqgfl p bp apqpbbp rfeqkp Lpúb (hgkf Npvin ef bgl pysnó, hfkjsg bfl mgcgl ng bfl cibilqgfl, tpainf rfelgmf, bf nglhinigkfe, nirigenf: Rfe hgbiukf ng esglqkpl rpagzpl lg hplpká p ls lgñfk Lpúb). 20 Plí jsg vieigenf éb p Lirbpu, lg hplpkfe p éb ng bfl ng Dpeplél, Pnepl, Mfzpapn, Mgnipigb, Dirpgb, Mfzpapn, Gbiú y Zibgqpi, hkíerihgl ng dibbpkgl ng bfl ng Dpeplél. 21 Glqfl pysnpkfe p Npvin rfeqkp bp apenp ng dgkfngpnfkgl, hsgl qfnfl gbbfl gkpe tfdakgl vpbigeqgl, y csgkfe rphiqpegl ge gb gmékriqf. 22 Hfkjsg geqfergl qfnfl bfl nípl vgeíp pysnp p Npvin, tplqp tprgklg se ukpe gmékriqf, rfdf gmékriqf ng Nifl. 

23 Y glqg gl gb eúdgkf ng bfl hkierihpbgl jsg glqpape bilqfl hpkp bp usgkkp, y vieigkfe p Npvin ge Tgakóe hpkp qkplhplpkbg gb kgief ng Lpúb, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá: 24 Ng bfl timfl ng Msná jsg qkpípe glrsnf y bpezp, lgil dib frtfrigeqfl, bilqfl hpkp bp usgkkp. 25 Ng bfl timfl ng Lidgóe, ligqg dib rige tfdakgl, vpbigeqgl y glcfkzpnfl hpkp bp usgkkp. 26 Ng bfl timfl ng Bgví, rspqkf dib lgilrigeqfl; 27 plidildf Mfipnp, hkíerihg ng bfl ngb biepmg ng Ppkóe, y rfe éb qkgl dib lgqgrigeqfl, 28 y Lpnfr, mfvge vpbigeqg y glcfkzpnf, rfe vgieqinól ng bfl hkierihpbgl ng bp rplp ng ls hpnkg. 29 Ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe tgkdpefl ng Lpúb, qkgl dib; hfkjsg tplqp geqfergl dsrtfl ng gbbfl lg dpeqgeípe cigbgl p bp rplp ng Lpúb. 30 Ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe, vgieqg dib frtfrigeqfl, dsy vpbigeqgl, vpkfegl ibslqkgl ge bpl rplpl ng lsl hpnkgl. 31 Ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, nigrifrtf dib, bfl rspbgl csgkfe qfdpnfl hfk bilqp hpkp vgeik p hfegk p Npvin hfk kgy. 32 Ng bfl timfl ng Ilprpk, nflrigeqfl hkierihpbgl, geqgeninfl ge bfl qigdhfl, y jsg lpaípe bf jsg Ilkpgb ngaíp tprgk, rsyf nirtf lgusípe qfnfl lsl tgkdpefl. 33 Ng Zpasbóe riersgeqp dib, jsg lpbípe p rpdhpñp hkfeqfl hpkp bp usgkkp, rfe qfnp rbplg ng pkdpl ng usgkkp, nilhsglqfl p hgbgpk lie nfabgz ng rfkpzóe. 34 Ng Egcqpbí, dib rphiqpegl, y rfe gbbfl qkgieqp y ligqg dib rfe glrsnf y bpezp. 35 Ng bfl ng Npe, nilhsglqfl p hgbgpk, vgieqifrtf dib lgilrigeqfl. 36 Ng Plgk, nilhsglqfl hpkp bp usgkkp y hkghpkpnfl hpkp hgbgpk, rspkgeqp dib. 37 Y ngb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe, ng bfl ksageiqpl y upniqpl y ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, rigeqf vgieqg dib rfe qfnp rbplg ng pkdpl ng usgkkp. 

38 Qfnfl glqfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp, nilhsglqfl hpkp usgkkgpk, vieigkfe rfe rfkpzóe hgkcgrqf p Tgakóe, hpkp hfegk p Npvin hfk kgy lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb; plidildf qfnfl bfl ngdál ng Ilkpgb glqpape ng se dildf áeidf hpkp hfegk p Npvin hfk kgy. 39 Y glqsvigkfe pbbí rfe Npvin qkgl nípl rfdigenf y agaigenf, hfkjsg lsl tgkdpefl tpaípe hkghpkpnf hpkp gbbfl. 40 Qpdaiée bfl jsg bgl gkpe vgriefl, tplqp Ilprpk y Zpasbóe y Egcqpbí, qkpmgkfe vívgkgl ge plefl, rpdgbbfl, dsbfl y asgygl; hkfvilióe ng tpkiep, qfkqpl ng tiufl, hplpl, vief y prgiqg, y asgygl y fvgmpl ge pasenperip, hfkjsg ge Ilkpgb tpaíp pbgukíp. 

Npvin hkfhfeg qkplbpnpk gb pkrp p Mgkslpbée

1 RKÓEIRPL 13

1 Geqfergl Npvin qfdó rfelgmf rfe bfl rphiqpegl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl, y rfe qfnfl bfl mgcgl. 2 Y nimf Npvin p qfnp bp plpdabgp ng Ilkpgb: Li fl hpkgrg aige y li gl bp vfbseqpn ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, gevipkgdfl p qfnpl hpkqgl hfk esglqkfl tgkdpefl jsg tpe jsgnpnf ge qfnpl bpl qigkkpl ng Ilkpgb, y hfk bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl jsg glqáe rfe gbbfl ge lsl risnpngl y gminfl, hpkp jsg lg kgúepe rfe eflfqkfl; 3 y qkpiupdfl gb pkrp ng esglqkf Nifl p eflfqkfl, hfkjsg nglng gb qigdhf ng Lpúb ef tgdfl tgrtf rplf ng gbbp. 4 Y nimf qfnp bp plpdabgp jsg lg tiriglg plí, hfkjsg bp rflp hpkgríp aige p qfnf gb hsgabf. 

Npvin ieqgeqp qkpgk gb pkrp

(2 L. 6.1-11)

5 Geqfergl Npvin kgseió p qfnf Ilkpgb, nglng Litfk ng Guihqf tplqp bp geqkpnp ng Tpdpq, hpkp jsg qkpmglge gb pkrp ng Nifl ng Jsikipq-mgpkid. 6 Y lsaió Npvin rfe qfnf Ilkpgb p Appbp ng Jsikipq-mgpkid, jsg glqá ge Msná, hpkp hplpk ng pbbí gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá Nifl, jsg dfkp geqkg bfl jsgksaiegl, lfakg bp rspb ls efdakg gl ievfrpnf. 7 Y bbgvpkfe gb pkrp ng Nifl ng bp rplp ng Paiepnpa ge se rpkkf esgvf; y Szp y Ptíf usipape gb rpkkf. 8 Y Npvin y qfnf Ilkpgb lg kgufrimpape ngbpeqg ng Nifl rfe qfnpl lsl csgkzpl, rfe ráeqirfl, pkhpl, lpbqgkifl, qpdafkibgl, rídapbfl y qkfdhgqpl. 

9 Hgkf rspenf bbgupkfe p bp gkp ng Jsinóe, Szp gxqgenió ls dpef pb pkrp hpkp lflqgegkbp, hfkjsg bfl asgygl qkfhgzpape. 10 Y gb cskfk ng Mgtfvá lg gergenió rfeqkp Szp, y bf tikió, hfkjsg tpaíp gxqgeninf ls dpef pb pkrp; y dskió pbbí ngbpeqg ng Nifl. 11 Y Npvin qsvf hglpk, hfkjsg Mgtfvá tpaíp jsgakpeqpnf p Szp; hfk bf jsg bbpdó pjsgb bsupk Hékgz-szp, tplqp tfy. 12 Y Npvin qgdió p Nifl pjsgb níp, y nimf: ¿Ródf tg ng qkpgk p di rplp gb pkrp ng Nifl? 13 Y ef qkpmf Npvin gb pkrp p ls rplp ge bp risnpn ng Npvin, lief jsg bp bbgvó p rplp ng Fagn-gnfd ugqgf. 14 Y gb pkrp ng Nifl glqsvf rfe bp cpdibip ng Fagn-gnfd, ge ls rplp, qkgl dglgl; y agenimf Mgtfvá bp rplp ng Fagn-gnfd, y qfnf bf jsg qgeíp. 

Tikpd gevíp gdapmpnfkgl p Npvin

(2 L. 5.11-12)

1 RKÓEIRPL 14

1 Tikpd kgy ng Qikf gevió p Npvin gdapmpnfkgl, y dpngkp ng rgnkf, y pbapñibgl y rpkhieqgkfl, hpkp jsg bg gnicirplge sep rplp. 2 Y geqgenió Npvin jsg Mgtfvá bf tpaíp rfecikdpnf rfdf kgy lfakg Ilkpgb, y jsg tpaíp gxpbqpnf ls kgief lfakg ls hsgabf Ilkpgb. 

Timfl ng Npvin eprinfl ge Mgkslpbée

(2 L. 5.13-16; 1 Rk. 3.5-9)

3 Geqfergl Npvin qfdó qpdaiée dsmgkgl ge Mgkslpbée, y geugenkó Npvin dál timfl g timpl. 4 Y glqfl lfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl jsg bg eprigkfe ge Mgkslpbée: Lpdúp, Lfapa, Epqáe, Lpbfdóe, 5 Iatpk, Gbilúp, Gbhgbgq, 6 Efup, Egcgu, Mpcíp, 7 Gbilpdp, Aggbipnp y Gbicgbgq. 

Npvin ngkkfqp p bfl cibilqgfl

(2 L. 5.17-25)

8 Fygenf bfl cibilqgfl jsg Npvin tpaíp linf seuinf kgy lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb, lsaigkfe qfnfl bfl cibilqgfl ge aslrp ng Npvin. Y rspenf Npvin bf fyó, lpbió rfeqkp gbbfl. 9 Y vieigkfe bfl cibilqgfl, y lg gxqgenigkfe hfk gb vpbbg ng Kgcpid. 10 Geqfergl Npvin rfelsbqó p Nifl, nirigenf: ¿Lsaiké rfeqkp bfl cibilqgfl? ¿Bfl geqkgupkál ge di dpef? Y Mgtfvá bg nimf: Lsag, hfkjsg yf bfl geqkgupké ge qsl dpefl. 11 Lsaigkfe, hsgl, p Appb-hgkpzid, y pbbí bfl ngkkfqó Npvin. Nimf bsguf Npvin: Nifl kfdhió dil gegdiufl hfk di dpef, rfdf lg kfdhge bpl puspl. Hfk glqf bbpdpkfe gb efdakg ng pjsgb bsupk Appb-hgkpzid. 12 Y ngmpkfe pbbí lsl niflgl, y Npvin nimf jsg bfl jsgdplge. 13 Y vfbvigenf bfl cibilqgfl p gxqgengklg hfk gb vpbbg, 14 Npvin vfbvió p rfelsbqpk p Nifl, y Nifl bg nimf: Ef lsapl qkpl gbbfl, lief kfnépbfl, hpkp vgeik p gbbfl hfk ngbpeqg ng bpl apblpdgkpl. 

15 Y plí jsg fiupl vgeik se glqksgenf hfk bpl rfhpl ng bpl apblpdgkpl, lpb bsguf p bp apqpbbp, hfkjsg Nifl lpbnká ngbpeqg ng qi y tgkiká gb gmékriqf ng bfl cibilqgfl. 16 Tizf, hsgl, Npvin rfdf Nifl bg dpenó, y ngkkfqpkfe pb gmékriqf ng bfl cibilqgfl nglng Upapóe tplqp Ugzgk. 17 Y bp cpdp ng Npvin csg nivsbupnp hfk qfnpl pjsgbbpl qigkkpl; y Mgtfvá hslf gb qgdfk ng Npvin lfakg qfnpl bpl eprifegl. 

Npvin qkpg gb pkrp p Mgkslpbée

(2 L. 6.12-23)

1 RKÓEIRPL 15

1 Tizf Npvin qpdaiée rplpl hpkp lí ge bp risnpn ng Npvin, y pkkgubó se bsupk hpkp gb pkrp ng Nifl, y bg bgvpeqó sep qigenp. 2 Geqfergl nimf Npvin: Gb pkrp ng Nifl ef ngag lgk bbgvpnp lief hfk bfl bgviqpl; hfkjsg p gbbfl tp gbguinf Mgtfvá hpkp jsg bbgvge gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá, y bg likvpe hgkhgqspdgeqg. 3 Y rfeukguó Npvin p qfnf Ilkpgb ge Mgkslpbée, hpkp jsg hplplge gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá p ls bsupk, gb rspb bg tpaíp éb hkghpkpnf. 4 Kgseió qpdaiée Npvin p bfl timfl ng Ppkóe y p bfl bgviqpl; 5 ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq, Skigb gb hkierihpb, y lsl tgkdpefl, rigeqf vgieqg. 6 Ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, Plpípl gb hkierihpb, y lsl tgkdpefl, nflrigeqfl vgieqg. 7 Ng bfl timfl ng Ugklóe, Mfgb gb hkierihpb, y lsl tgkdpefl, rigeqf qkgieqp. 8 Ng bfl timfl ng Gbizpcáe, Lgdpípl gb hkierihpb, y lsl tgkdpefl, nflrigeqfl. 9 Ng bfl timfl ng Tgakóe, Gbigb gb hkierihpb, y lsl tgkdpefl, frtgeqp. 10 Ng bfl timfl ng Szigb, Pdiepnpa gb hkierihpb, y lsl tgkdpefl, rigeqf nfrg. 11 Y bbpdó Npvin p bfl lprgknfqgl Lpnfr y Paipqpk, y p bfl bgviqpl Skigb, Plpípl, Mfgb, Lgdpípl, Gbigb y Pdiepnpa, 12 y bgl nimf: Vflfqkfl jsg lfil bfl hkierihpbgl hpnkgl ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl bgviqpl, lpeqicirpfl, vflfqkfl y vsglqkfl tgkdpefl, y hplpn gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb pb bsupk jsg bg tg hkghpkpnf; 13 hsgl hfk ef tpagkbf tgrtf plí vflfqkfl bp hkidgkp vgz, Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl jsgakpeqó, hfk rspeqf ef bg aslrpdfl lguúe ls fkngepezp. 14 Plí bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl lg lpeqicirpkfe hpkp qkpgk gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 15 Y bfl timfl ng bfl bgviqpl qkpmgkfe gb pkrp ng Nifl hsglqp lfakg lsl tfdakfl ge bpl apkkpl, rfdf bf tpaíp dpenpnf Dfilél, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 

16 Plidildf nimf Npvin p bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl bgviqpl, jsg ngliueplge ng lsl tgkdpefl p rpeqfkgl rfe ielqksdgeqfl ng dúlirp, rfe lpbqgkifl y pkhpl y rídapbfl, jsg kglfeplge y pbzplge bp vfz rfe pbgukíp. 17 Y bfl bgviqpl ngliuepkfe p Tgdáe timf ng Mfgb; y ng lsl tgkdpefl, p Plpc timf ng Agkgjsípl; y ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki y ng lsl tgkdpefl, p Gqáe timf ng Rslpípl. 18 Y rfe gbbfl p lsl tgkdpefl ngb lgusenf fknge, p Zprpkípl, Mppzigb, Lgdikpdfq, Mgtigb, Sei, Gbipa, Agepíp, Dpplípl, Dpqpqípl, Gbicgbgts, Direípl, Fagn-gnfd y Mgigb, bfl hfkqgkfl. 19 Plí Tgdáe, Plpc y Gqáe, jsg gkpe rpeqfkgl, lfepape rídapbfl ng akferg. 20 Y Zprpkípl, Pzigb, Lgdikpdfq, Mgtigb, Sei, Gbipa, Dpplípl y Agepíp, rfe lpbqgkifl lfakg Pbpdfq. 21 Dpqpqípl, Gbicgbgts, Direípl, Fagn-gnfd, Mgigb y Pzpzípl qgeípe pkhpl pciepnpl ge bp frqpvp hpkp nikiuik. 22 Y Jsgepeípl, hkierihpb ng bfl bgviqpl ge bp dúlirp, csg hsglqf hpkp nikiuik gb rpeqf, hfkjsg gkp geqgeninf ge gbbf. 23 Agkgjsípl y Gbrpep gkpe hfkqgkfl ngb pkrp. 24 Y Lgapeípl, Mflpcpq, Epqpepgb, Pdplpi, Zprpkípl, Agepíp y Gbigzgk, lprgknfqgl, qfrpape bpl qkfdhgqpl ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ng Nifl; Fagn-gnfd y Mgtípl gkpe qpdaiée hfkqgkfl ngb pkrp. 

25 Npvin, hsgl, y bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb y bfl rphiqpegl ng dibbpkgl, csgkfe p qkpgk gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, ng rplp ng Fagn-gnfd, rfe pbgukíp. 26 Y pysnpenf Nifl p bfl bgviqpl jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, lprkicirpkfe ligqg efvibbfl y ligqg rpkegkfl. 27 Y Npvin iap vglqinf ng bief cief, y qpdaiée qfnfl bfl bgviqpl jsg bbgvpape gb pkrp, y plidildf bfl rpeqfkgl; y Jsgepeípl gkp dpglqkf ng rpeqf geqkg bfl rpeqfkgl. Bbgvpap qpdaiée Npvin lfakg lí se gcfn ng bief. 28 Ng glqp dpegkp bbgvpap qfnf Ilkpgb gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, rfe múaibf y lfeinf ng afriepl y qkfdhgqpl y rídapbfl, y pb lfe ng lpbqgkifl y pkhpl. 29 Hgkf rspenf gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá bbguó p bp risnpn ng Npvin, Dirpb, timp ng Lpúb, dikpenf hfk sep vgeqpep, vif pb kgy Npvin jsg lpbqpap y npezpap; y bf dgeflhkgrió ge ls rfkpzóe. 

1 RKÓEIRPL 16

1 Plí qkpmgkfe gb pkrp ng Nifl, y bp hsligkfe ge dgnif ng bp qigenp jsg Npvin tpaíp bgvpeqpnf hpkp gbbp; y fckgrigkfe tfbfrpslqfl y lprkicirifl ng hpz ngbpeqg ng Nifl. 2 Y rspenf Npvin prpaó ng fckgrgk gb tfbfrpslqf y bfl lprkicirifl ng hpz, agenimf pb hsgabf ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá. 3 Y kghpkqió p qfnf Ilkpgb, plí p tfdakgl rfdf p dsmgkgl, p rpnp sef sep qfkqp ng hpe, sep higzp ng rpkeg, y sep qfkqp ng hplpl. 

4 Y hslf ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ng Mgtfvá dieilqkfl ng bfl bgviqpl, hpkp jsg kgrfknplge y rfecglplge y bfplge p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: 5 Plpc gb hkidgkf; gb lgusenf nglhsél ng éb, Zprpkípl; Mgigb, Lgdikpdfq, Mgtigb, Dpqpqípl, Gbipa, Agepíp, Fagn-gnfd y Mgigb, rfe lsl ielqksdgeqfl ng lpbqgkifl y pkhpl; hgkf Plpc lfepap bfl rídapbfl. 6 Qpdaiée bfl lprgknfqgl Agepíp y Mptpzigb lfepape rfeqiespdgeqg bpl qkfdhgqpl ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Nifl. 

Lpbdf ng prrióe ng ukpripl ng Npvin

(Lpb. 105.1-15; 96.1-13; 106.47-48)

7 Geqfergl, ge pjsgb níp, Npvin rfdgezó p prbpdpk p Mgtfvá hfk dpef ng Plpc y ng lsl tgkdpefl: 


8 Pbpapn p Mgtfvá, ievfrpn ls efdakg, 
Npn p rfefrgk ge bfl hsgabfl lsl fakpl. 
9 Rpeqpn p éb, rpeqpnbg lpbdfl; 
Tpabpn ng qfnpl lsl dpkpvibbpl. 
10 Ubfkipfl ge ls lpeqf efdakg; 
Pbéukglg gb rfkpzóe ng bfl jsg aslrpe p Mgtfvá. 
11 Aslrpn p Mgtfvá y ls hfngk; 
Aslrpn ls kflqkf rfeqiespdgeqg. 
12 Tprgn dgdfkip ng bpl dpkpvibbpl jsg tp tgrtf, 
Ng lsl hkfniuifl, y ng bfl msirifl ng ls afrp, 
13 Ft vflfqkfl, timfl ng Ilkpgb ls ligkvf, 
Timfl ng Mprfa, lsl glrfuinfl. 
14 Mgtfvá, éb gl esglqkf Nifl; 
Lsl msirifl glqáe ge qfnp bp qigkkp. 
15 Gb tprg dgdfkip ng ls hprqf hgkhgqspdgeqg, 
Y ng bp hpbpakp jsg éb dpenó hpkp dib ugegkprifegl; 
16 Ngb hprqf jsg rfergkqó rfe Pakptpd, 
Y ng ls mskpdgeqf p Ilppr; 
17 Gb rspb rfecikdó p Mprfa hfk glqpqsqf, 
Y p Ilkpgb hfk hprqf lgdhiqgkef, 
18 Nirigenf: P qi npké bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe, 
Hfkrióe ng qs tgkgnpn. 
19 Rspenf gbbfl gkpe hfrfl ge eúdgkf, 
Hfrfl y cfkplqgkfl ge gbbp, 
20 Y penpape ng eprióe ge eprióe, 
Y ng se kgief p fqkf hsgabf, 
21 Ef hgkdiqió jsg epnig bfl fhkidiglg; 
Peqgl hfk pdfk ng gbbfl rplqiuó p bfl kgygl. 
22 Ef qfjséil, nimf, p dil seuinfl, 
Ei tpuáil dpb p dil hkfcgqpl. 
23 Rpeqpn p Mgtfvá qfnp bp qigkkp, 
Hkfrbpdpn ng níp ge níp ls lpbvprióe. 
24 Rpeqpn geqkg bpl ugeqgl ls ubfkip, 
Y ge qfnfl bfl hsgabfl lsl dpkpvibbpl. 
25 Hfkjsg ukpeng gl Mgtfvá, y niuef ng lshkgdp pbpapezp, 
Y ng lgk qgdinf lfakg qfnfl bfl niflgl. 
26 Hfkjsg qfnfl bfl niflgl ng bfl hsgabfl lfe ínfbfl; 
Dpl Mgtfvá tizf bfl rigbfl. 
27 Pbpapezp y dpueicirgerip ngbpeqg ng éb; 
Hfngk y pbgukíp ge ls dfkpnp. 
28 Qkiasqpn p Mgtfvá, ft cpdibipl ng bfl hsgabfl, 
Npn p Mgtfvá ubfkip y hfngk. 
29 Npn p Mgtfvá bp tfekp ngainp p ls efdakg; 
Qkpgn fckgenp, y vgein ngbpeqg ng éb; 
Hflqkpfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ge bp tgkdflskp ng bp lpeqinpn. 
30 Qgdgn ge ls hkglgerip, qfnp bp qigkkp; 
Gb dsenf lgká púe glqpabgrinf, hpkp jsg ef lg rfedsgvp. 
31 Pbéukgelg bfl rigbfl, y uórglg bp qigkkp, 
Y niupe ge bpl eprifegl: Mgtfvá kgiep. 
32 Kglsgeg gb dpk, y ls hbgeiqsn; 
Pbéukglg gb rpdhf, y qfnf bf jsg rfeqigeg. 
33 Geqfergl rpeqpkáe bfl ákafbgl ng bfl afljsgl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, 
Hfkjsg vigeg p mszupk bp qigkkp. 
34 Prbpdpn p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg éb gl asgef; 
Hfkjsg ls dilgkirfknip gl gqgkep. 
35 Y ngrin: Lábvpefl, ft Nifl, lpbvprióe esglqkp; 
Kgróugefl, y bíakpefl ng bpl eprifegl, 
Hpkp jsg rfecglgdfl qs lpeqf efdakg, 
Y efl ubfkigdfl ge qsl pbpapezpl. 
36 Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, 
Ng gqgkeinpn p gqgkeinpn. 

Y nimf qfnf gb hsgabf, Pdée, y pbpaó p Mgtfvá. 

Bfl bgviqpl gerpkupnfl ngb pkrp

37 Y ngmó pbbí, ngbpeqg ngb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, p Plpc y p lsl tgkdpefl, hpkp jsg dieilqkplge ng rfeqiesf ngbpeqg ngb pkrp, rpnp rflp ge ls níp; 38 y p Fagn-gnfd y p lsl lglgeqp y frtf tgkdpefl; y p Fagn-gnfd timf ng Mgnsqúe y p Tflp rfdf hfkqgkfl. 39 Plidildf pb lprgknfqg Lpnfr, y p bfl lprgknfqgl lsl tgkdpefl, ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá ge gb bsupk pbqf jsg glqpap ge Upapóe, 40 hpkp jsg lprkicirplge rfeqiespdgeqg, p dpñpep y qpkng, tfbfrpslqfl p Mgtfvá ge gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy ng Mgtfvá, jsg éb hkglrkiaió p Ilkpgb; 41 y rfe gbbfl p Tgdáe, p Mgnsqúe y p bfl fqkfl glrfuinfl ngrbpkpnfl hfk lsl efdakgl, hpkp ubfkicirpk p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg gl gqgkep ls dilgkirfknip. 42 Rfe gbbfl p Tgdáe y p Mgnsqúe rfe qkfdhgqpl y rídapbfl hpkp bfl jsg qfrpape, y rfe fqkfl ielqksdgeqfl ng dúlirp ng Nifl; y p bfl timfl ng Mgnsqúe hpkp hfkqgkfl. 

43 Y qfnf gb hsgabf lg csg rpnp sef p ls rplp; y Npvin lg vfbvió hpkp agengrik ls rplp. 

Hprqf ng Nifl rfe Npvin

(2 L. 7.1-29)

1 RKÓEIRPL 17

1 Prfeqgrió jsg dfkpenf Npvin ge ls rplp, nimf Npvin pb hkfcgqp Epqáe: Tg pjsí yf tpaiqf ge rplp ng rgnkf, y gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá ngapmf ng rfkqiepl. 2 Y Epqáe nimf p Npvin: Tpz qfnf bf jsg glqá ge qs rfkpzóe, hfkjsg Nifl glqá rfeqiuf. 

3 Ge pjsgbbp dildp efrtg vief hpbpakp ng Nifl p Epqáe, nirigenf: 4 Vg y ni p Npvin di ligkvf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Qú ef dg gnicirpkál rplp ge jsg tpaiqg. 5 Hfkjsg ef tg tpaiqpnf ge rplp pbusep nglng gb níp jsg lpjsé p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb tplqp tfy; peqgl glqsvg ng qigenp ge qigenp, y ng qpagkeársbf ge qpagkeársbf. 6 Hfk nfengjsigkp jsg pensvg rfe qfnf Ilkpgb, ¿tpabé sep hpbpakp p pbusef ng bfl msgrgl ng Ilkpgb, p bfl rspbgl dpené jsg phprgeqplge p di hsgabf, hpkp ngrikbgl: ¿Hfk jsé ef dg gniciráil sep rplp ng rgnkf? 7 Hfk qpeqf, ptfkp nikál p di ligkvf Npvin: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Yf qg qfdé ngb kgnib, ng ngqkál ng bpl fvgmpl, hpkp jsg csglgl hkíerihg lfakg di hsgabf Ilkpgb; 8 y tg glqpnf rfeqiuf ge qfnf rspeqf tpl penpnf, y tg rfkqpnf p qfnfl qsl gegdiufl ng ngbpeqg ng qi, y qg tpké ukpe efdakg, rfdf gb efdakg ng bfl ukpengl ge bp qigkkp. 9 Plidildf tg nilhsglqf bsupk hpkp di hsgabf Ilkpgb, y bf tg hbpeqpnf hpkp jsg tpaiqg ge éb y ef lgp dál kgdfvinf; ei bfl timfl ng ieijsinpn bf rfelsdikáe dál, rfdf peqgl, 10 y nglng gb qigdhf jsg hslg bfl msgrgl lfakg di hsgabf Ilkpgb; dpl tsdibbpké p qfnfl qsl gegdiufl. Qg tpuf lpagk, pngdál, jsg Mgtfvá qg gnicirpká rplp. 11 Y rspenf qsl nípl lgpe rsdhbinfl hpkp ikqg rfe qsl hpnkgl, bgvpeqpké nglrgengerip nglhsél ng qi, p sef ng geqkg qsl timfl, y pcikdpké ls kgief. 12 Gb dg gnicirpká rplp, y yf rfecikdpké ls qkfef gqgkepdgeqg. 13 Yf bg lgké hfk hpnkg, y éb dg lgká hfk timf; y ef jsiqpké ng éb di dilgkirfknip, rfdf bp jsiqé ng pjsgb jsg csg peqgl ng qi; 14 lief jsg bf rfecikdpké ge di rplp y ge di kgief gqgkepdgeqg, y ls qkfef lgká cikdg hpkp ligdhkg. 15 Rfecfkdg p qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl, y rfecfkdg p qfnp glqp vilióe, plí tpabó Epqáe p Npvin. 

16 Y geqkó gb kgy Npvin y glqsvf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y nimf: Mgtfvá Nifl, ¿jsiée lfy yf, y rsáb gl di rplp, hpkp jsg dg tpypl qkpínf tplqp glqg bsupk? 17 Y pse glqf, ft Nifl, qg tp hpkgrinf hfrf, hsgl jsg tpl tpabpnf ng bp rplp ng qs ligkvf hpkp qigdhf dál bgmpef, y dg tpl dikpnf rfdf p se tfdakg gxrgbgeqg, ft Mgtfvá Nifl. 18 ¿Jsé dál hsgng pñpnik Npvin hinigenf ng qi hpkp ubfkicirpk p qs ligkvf? Dpl qú rfefrgl p qs ligkvf. 19 Ft Mgtfvá, hfk pdfk ng qs ligkvf y lguúe qs rfkpzóe, tpl tgrtf qfnp glqp ukpengzp, hpkp tprgk efqfkipl qfnpl qsl ukpengzpl. 20 Mgtfvá, ef tpy lgdgmpeqg p qi, ei tpy Nifl lief qú, lguúe qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg tgdfl fínf rfe esglqkfl fínfl. 21 ¿Y jsé hsgabf tpy ge bp qigkkp rfdf qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, rsyf Nifl csglg y lg kgnidiglg se hsgabf, hpkp tprgkqg efdakg rfe ukpengzpl y dpkpvibbpl, grtpenf p bpl eprifegl ng ngbpeqg ng qs hsgabf, jsg qú kglrpqplqg ng Guihqf? 22 Qú tpl rfelqiqsinf p qs hsgabf Ilkpgb hfk hsgabf qsyf hpkp ligdhkg; y qú, Mgtfvá, tpl vgeinf p lgk ls Nifl. 23 Ptfkp hsgl, Mgtfvá, bp hpbpakp jsg tpl tpabpnf prgkrp ng qs ligkvf y ng ls rplp, lgp cikdg hpkp ligdhkg, y tpz rfdf tpl nirtf. 24 Hgkdpegzrp, hsgl, y lgp geukpengrinf qs efdakg hpkp ligdhkg, p cie ng jsg lg niup: Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, gl Nifl hpkp Ilkpgb. Y lgp bp rplp ng qs ligkvf Npvin cikdg ngbpeqg ng qi. 25 Hfkjsg qú, Nifl díf, kgvgbplqg pb fínf p qs ligkvf jsg bg tpl ng gnicirpk rplp; hfk glf tp tpbbpnf qs ligkvf dfqivf hpkp fkpk ngbpeqg ng qi. 26 Ptfkp hsgl, Mgtfvá, qú gkgl gb Nifl jsg tpl tpabpnf ng qs ligkvf glqg aige; 27 y ptfkp tpl jsgkinf agengrik bp rplp ng qs ligkvf, hpkp jsg hgkdpegzrp hgkhgqspdgeqg ngbpeqg ng qi; hfkjsg qú, Mgtfvá, bp tpl agengrinf, y lgká ageniqp hpkp ligdhkg. 

Npvin gxqigeng lsl nfdieifl

(2 L. 8.1-14)

1 RKÓEIRPL 18

1 Nglhsél ng glqpl rflpl prfeqgrió jsg Npvin ngkkfqó p bfl cibilqgfl, y bfl tsdibbó, y qfdó p Upq y lsl vibbpl ng dpef ng bfl cibilqgfl. 

2 Qpdaiée ngkkfqó p Dfpa, y bfl dfpaiqpl csgkfe ligkvfl ng Npvin, qkpyéenfbg hkglgeqgl. 

3 Plidildf ngkkfqó Npvin p Tpnpn-gzgk kgy ng Lfap, ge Tpdpq, ygenf élqg p plguskpk ls nfdieif mseqf pb kíf Gsckpqgl. 4 Y bg qfdó Npvin dib rpkkfl, ligqg dib ng p rpapbbf, y vgieqg dib tfdakgl ng p hig; y nglmpkkgqó Npvin bfl rpapbbfl ng qfnfl bfl rpkkfl, gxrghqf bfl ng rige rpkkfl jsg ngmó. 5 Y vieigenf bfl likifl ng Npdplrf ge pysnp ng Tpnpn-gzgk kgy ng Lfap, Npvin tikió ng gbbfl vgieqinól dib tfdakgl. 6 Y hslf Npvin uspkeirióe ge Likip ng Npdplrf, y bfl likifl csgkfe tgrtfl ligkvfl ng Npvin, qkpyéenfbg hkglgeqgl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá npap bp virqfkip p Npvin nfengjsigkp jsg iap. 7 Qfdó qpdaiée Npvin bfl glrsnfl ng fkf jsg bbgvpape bfl ligkvfl ng Tpnpn-gzgk, y bfl qkpmf p Mgkslpbée. 8 Plidildf ng Qiatpq y ng Rse, risnpngl ng Tpnpn-gzgk, qfdó Npvin dsrtílidf akferg, rfe gb jsg Lpbfdóe tizf gb dpk ng akferg, bpl rfbsdepl, y sqgelibifl ng akferg. 

9 Y fygenf Qfi kgy ng Tpdpq jsg Npvin tpaíp ngltgrtf qfnf gb gmékriqf ng Tpnpn-gzgk kgy ng Lfap, 10 gevió p Pnfkpd ls timf pb kgy Npvin, hpkp lpbsnpkbg y agengrikbg hfk tpagk hgbgpnf rfe Tpnpn-gzgk y tpagkbg vgerinf; hfkjsg Qfi qgeíp usgkkp rfeqkp Tpnpn-gzgk. Bg gevió qpdaiée qfnp rbplg ng sqgelibifl ng fkf, ng hbpqp y ng akferg; 11 bfl rspbgl gb kgy Npvin ngniró p Mgtfvá, rfe bp hbpqp y gb fkf jsg tpaíp qfdpnf ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl ng Gnfd, ng Dfpa, ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe, ng bfl cibilqgfl y ng Pdpbgr. 

12 Pngdál ng glqf, Pailpi timf ng Lpkvip nglqkfzó ge gb vpbbg ng bp Lpb p nigrifrtf dib gnfdiqpl. 13 Y hslf uspkeirióe ge Gnfd, y qfnfl bfl gnfdiqpl csgkfe ligkvfl ng Npvin; hfkjsg Mgtfvá npap gb qkisecf p Npvin nfengjsigkp jsg iap. 

Fciripbgl ng Npvin

(2 L. 8.15-18; 20.23-26)

14 Kgieó Npvin lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb, y mszupap rfe mslqirip p qfnf ls hsgabf. 15 Y Mfpa timf ng Lpkvip gkp ugegkpb ngb gmékriqf, y Mflpcpq timf ng Ptibsn, rperibbgk. 16 Lpnfr timf ng Ptiqfa y Paidgbgr timf ng Paipqpk gkpe lprgknfqgl, y Lpvlp, lgrkgqpkif. 17 Y Agepíp timf ng Mfipnp glqpap lfakg bfl rgkgqgfl y hgbgqgfl; y bfl timfl ng Npvin gkpe bfl hkíerihgl rgkrp ngb kgy. 

Ngkkfqpl ng pdfeiqpl y likifl

(2 L. 10.1-19)

1 RKÓEIRPL 19

1 Nglhsél ng glqpl rflpl prfeqgrió jsg dskió Eptpl kgy ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y kgieó ge ls bsupk ls timf. 2 Y nimf Npvin: Dpeicglqpké dilgkirfknip rfe Tpeúe timf ng Eptpl, hfkjsg qpdaiée ls hpnkg dg dflqkó dilgkirfknip. Plí Npvin gevió gdapmpnfkgl jsg bf rfelfbplge ng bp dsgkqg ng ls hpnkg. Hgkf rspenf bbgupkfe bfl ligkvfl ng Npvin p bp qigkkp ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe p Tpeúe, hpkp rfelfbpkbg, 3 bfl hkíerihgl ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe nimgkfe p Tpeúe: ¿P qs hpkgrgk tfekp Npvin p qs hpnkg, jsg qg tp gevipnf rfelfbpnfkgl? ¿Ef vigege dál aige lsl ligkvfl p qi hpkp glhipk, g iejsikik, y kgrfefrgk bp qigkkp? 4 Geqfergl Tpeúe qfdó bfl ligkvfl ng Npvin y bfl kphó, y bgl rfkqó bfl vglqinfl hfk bp diqpn, tplqp bpl epbupl, y bfl nglhprtó. 5 Lg csgkfe bsguf, y rspenf bbguó p Npvin bp efqirip lfakg pjsgbbfl vpkfegl, éb gevió p kgriaikbfl, hfkjsg glqpape dsy pckgeqpnfl. Gb kgy dpenó jsg bgl nimgkpe: Glqpfl ge Mgkiró tplqp jsg fl rkgzrp bp apkap, y geqfergl vfbvgkéil. 

6 Y vigenf bfl timfl ng Pdóe jsg lg tpaípe tgrtf fniflfl p Npvin, Tpeúe y bfl timfl ng Pdóe gevipkfe dib qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp hpkp qfdpk p lsgbnf rpkkfl y ugeqg ng p rpapbbf ng Dglfhfqpdip, ng Likip, ng Dpprp y ng Lfap. 7 Y qfdpkfe p lsgbnf qkgieqp y nfl dib rpkkfl, y pb kgy ng Dpprp y p ls gmékriqf, bfl rspbgl vieigkfe y prpdhpkfe ngbpeqg ng Dgngap. Y lg mseqpkfe qpdaiée bfl timfl ng Pdóe ng lsl risnpngl, y vieigkfe p bp usgkkp. 8 Fyéenfbf Npvin, gevió p Mfpa rfe qfnf gb gmékriqf ng bfl tfdakgl vpbigeqgl. 9 Y bfl timfl ng Pdóe lpbigkfe, y fkngepkfe bp apqpbbp p bp geqkpnp ng bp risnpn; y bfl kgygl jsg tpaípe vgeinf glqpape phpkqg ge gb rpdhf. 

10 Y vigenf Mfpa jsg gb pqpjsg rfeqkp éb tpaíp linf nilhsglqf hfk gb ckgeqg y hfk bp kgqpuspknip, glrfuió ng bfl dál pvgeqpmpnfl jsg tpaíp ge Ilkpgb, y rfe gbbfl fkngeó ls gmékriqf rfeqkp bfl likifl. 11 Hslf bsguf gb kglqf ng bp ugeqg ge dpef ng Pailpi ls tgkdpef, y bfl fkngeó ge apqpbbp rfeqkp bfl pdfeiqpl. 12 Y nimf: Li bfl likifl csgkge dál csgkqgl jsg yf, qú dg pysnpkál; y li bfl pdfeiqpl csgkge dál csgkqgl jsg qú, yf qg pysnpké. 13 Glcsékzpqg, y glcfkrédfefl hfk esglqkf hsgabf, y hfk bpl risnpngl ng esglqkf Nifl; y tpup Mgtfvá bf jsg aige bg hpkgzrp. 14 Geqfergl lg prgkró Mfpa y gb hsgabf jsg qgeíp rfeliuf, hpkp hgbgpk rfeqkp bfl likifl; dpl gbbfl tsygkfe ngbpeqg ng éb. 15 Y bfl timfl ng Pdóe, vigenf jsg bfl likifl tpaípe tsinf, tsygkfe qpdaiée gbbfl ngbpeqg ng Pailpi ls tgkdpef, y geqkpkfe ge bp risnpn. Geqfergl Mfpa vfbvió p Mgkslpbée. 

16 Vigenf bfl likifl jsg tpaípe rpínf ngbpeqg ng Ilkpgb, gevipkfe gdapmpnfkgl, y qkpmgkfe p bfl likifl jsg glqpape pb fqkf bpnf ngb Gsckpqgl, rsyf rphiqáe gkp Lfcpr, ugegkpb ngb gmékriqf ng Tpnpn-gzgk. 17 Bsguf jsg csg npnf pvilf p Npvin, kgseió p qfnf Ilkpgb, y rkszpenf gb Mfknáe vief p gbbfl, y fkngeó apqpbbp rfeqkp gbbfl. Y rspenf Npvin tsaf fkngepnf ls qkfhp rfeqkp gbbfl, hgbgpkfe rfeqkp éb bfl likifl. 18 Dpl gb hsgabf likif tsyó ngbpeqg ng Ilkpgb; y dpqó Npvin ng bfl likifl p ligqg dib tfdakgl ng bfl rpkkfl, y rspkgeqp dib tfdakgl ng p hig; plidildf dpqó p Lfcpr ugegkpb ngb gmékriqf. 19 Y vigenf bfl ligkvfl ng Tpnpn-gzgk jsg tpaípe rpínf ngbpeqg ng Ilkpgb, rfergkqpkfe hpz rfe Npvin, y csgkfe lsl ligkvfl; y gb hsgabf likif eserp dál jsilf pysnpk p bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 

Npvin rphqskp p Kpaá

(2 L. 12.26-31)

1 RKÓEIRPL 20

1 Prfeqgrió p bp vsgbqp ngb pñf, ge gb qigdhf jsg lsgbge bfl kgygl lpbik p bp usgkkp, jsg Mfpa lpró bpl csgkzpl ngb gmékriqf, y nglqksyó bp qigkkp ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y vief y liqió p Kpaá. Dpl Npvin glqpap ge Mgkslpbée; y Mfpa apqió p Kpaá, y bp nglqksyó. 2 Y qfdó Npvin bp rfkfep ng geridp ng bp rpagzp ngb kgy ng Kpaá, y bp tpbbó ng hglf ng se qpbgeqf ng fkf, y tpaíp ge gbbp hignkpl hkgriflpl; y csg hsglqp lfakg bp rpagzp ng Npvin. Pngdál ng glqf lpró ng bp risnpn dsy ukpeng afqíe. 3 Lpró qpdaiée pb hsgabf jsg glqpap ge gbbp, y bf hslf p qkpapmpk rfe ligkkpl, rfe qkibbfl ng tigkkf y rfe tprtpl. Bf dildf tizf Npvin p qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe. Y vfbvió Npvin rfe qfnf gb hsgabf p Mgkslpbée. 

Bfl tfdakgl ng Npvin dpqpe p bfl uiupeqgl

(2 L. 21.18-22)

4 Nglhsél ng glqf prfeqgrió jsg lg bgvpeqó usgkkp ge Ugzgk rfeqkp bfl cibilqgfl; y Liagrpi tslpqiqp dpqó p Lihpi, ng bfl nglrgenigeqgl ng bfl uiupeqgl; y csgkfe tsdibbpnfl. 5 Vfbvió p bgvpeqpklg usgkkp rfeqkp bfl cibilqgfl; y Gbtpeáe timf ng Mpik dpqó p Bptdi, tgkdpef ng Ufbipq ugqgf, gb plqp ng rsyp bpezp gkp rfdf se kfnibbf ng qgbpk. 6 Y vfbvió p tpagk usgkkp ge Upq, nfeng tpaíp se tfdakg ng ukpeng glqpqskp, gb rspb qgeíp lgil ngnfl ge higl y dpefl, vgieqirspqkf hfk qfnfl; y gkp nglrgenigeqg ng bfl uiupeqgl. 7 Glqg tfdakg iemskió p Ilkpgb, hgkf bf dpqó Mfepqáe, timf ng Lidgp tgkdpef ng Npvin. 8 Glqfl gkpe nglrgenigeqgl ng bfl uiupeqgl ge Upq, bfl rspbgl rpygkfe hfk dpef ng Npvin y ng lsl ligkvfl. 

Npvin rgelp pb hsgabf

(2 L. 24.1-25)

1 RKÓEIRPL 21

1 Hgkf Lpqpeál lg bgvpeqó rfeqkp Ilkpgb, g ieriqó p Npvin p jsg tiriglg rgelf ng Ilkpgb. 2 Y nimf Npvin p Mfpa y p bfl hkíerihgl ngb hsgabf: In, tprgn rgelf ng Ilkpgb nglng Aggklgap tplqp Npe, g iecfkdpndg lfakg gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl hpkp jsg yf bf lghp. 3 Y nimf Mfpa: Pñpnp Mgtfvá p ls hsgabf rige vgrgl dál, kgy lgñfk díf; ¿ef lfe qfnfl élqfl ligkvfl ng di lgñfk? ¿Hpkp jsé hkfrskp di lgñfk glqf, jsg lgká hpkp hgrpnf p Ilkpgb? 4 Dpl bp fknge ngb kgy hsnf dál jsg Mfpa. Lpbió, hfk qpeqf, Mfpa, y kgrfkkió qfnf Ilkpgb, y vfbvió p Mgkslpbée y nif bp rsgeqp ngb eúdgkf ngb hsgabf p Npvin. 5 Y tpaíp ge qfnf Ilkpgb se dibbóe rige dib jsg lprpape glhpnp, y ng Msná rspqkfrigeqfl lgqgeqp dib tfdakgl jsg lprpape glhpnp. 6 Geqkg élqfl ef csgkfe rfeqpnfl bfl bgviqpl, ei bfl timfl ng Agempdíe, hfkjsg bp fknge ngb kgy gkp pafdiepabg p Mfpa. 

7 Plidildf glqf nglpukpnó p Nifl, g tikió p Ilkpgb. 8 Geqfergl nimf Npvin p Nifl: Tg hgrpnf ukpvgdgeqg pb tprgk glqf; qg ksguf jsg jsiqgl bp ieijsinpn ng qs ligkvf, hfkjsg tg tgrtf dsy bfrpdgeqg. 9 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Upn, vingeqg ng Npvin, nirigenf: 10 Vg y tpabp p Npvin, y nibg: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Qkgl rflpl qg hkfhfeuf; glrfug ng gbbpl sep jsg yf tpup rfeqiuf. 11 Y vieigenf Upn p Npvin, bg nimf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: 12 Glrfug hpkp qi: f qkgl pñfl ng tpdakg, f hfk qkgl dglgl lgk ngkkfqpnf ngbpeqg ng qsl gegdiufl rfe bp glhpnp ng qsl pnvgklpkifl, f hfk qkgl nípl bp glhpnp ng Mgtfvá, glqf gl, bp hglqg ge bp qigkkp, y jsg gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá tpup nglqksrrióe ge qfnfl bfl qékdiefl ng Ilkpgb. Dikp, hsgl, jsé kglhfengké pb jsg dg tp gevipnf. 13 Geqfergl Npvin nimf p Upn: Glqfy ge ukpeng peuslqip. Ksguf jsg yf rpiup ge bp dpef ng Mgtfvá, hfkjsg lsl dilgkirfknipl lfe dsrtpl ge gxqkgdf; hgkf jsg ef rpiup ge dpefl ng tfdakgl. 

14 Plí Mgtfvá gevió sep hglqg ge Ilkpgb, y dskigkfe ng Ilkpgb lgqgeqp dib tfdakgl. 15 Y gevió Mgtfvá gb áeugb p Mgkslpbée hpkp nglqksikbp; hgkf rspenf éb glqpap nglqksygenf, dikó Mgtfvá y lg pkkghieqió ng pjsgb dpb, y nimf pb áeugb jsg nglqksíp: Aplqp yp; ngqée qs dpef. Gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá glqpap mseqf p bp gkp ng Fkeáe mgaslgf. 16 Y pbzpenf Npvin lsl fmfl, vif pb áeugb ng Mgtfvá, jsg glqpap geqkg gb rigbf y bp qigkkp, rfe sep glhpnp nglesnp ge ls dpef, gxqgeninp rfeqkp Mgkslpbée. Geqfergl Npvin y bfl peripefl lg hflqkpkfe lfakg lsl kflqkfl, rsaigkqfl ng ribirif. 17 Y nimf Npvin p Nifl: ¿Ef lfy yf gb jsg tizf rfeqpk gb hsgabf? Yf dildf lfy gb jsg hgjsé, y rigkqpdgeqg tg tgrtf dpb; hgkf glqpl fvgmpl, ¿jsé tpe tgrtf? Mgtfvá Nifl díf, lgp ptfkp qs dpef rfeqkp di, y rfeqkp bp rplp ng di hpnkg, y ef vgeup bp hglqg lfakg qs hsgabf. 

18 Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá fkngeó p Upn jsg nimglg p Npvin jsg lsaiglg y rfelqksyglg se pbqpk p Mgtfvá ge bp gkp ng Fkeáe mgaslgf. 19 Geqfergl Npvin lsaió, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp jsg Upn bg tpaíp nirtf ge efdakg ng Mgtfvá. 20 Y vfbviéenflg Fkeáe, vif pb áeugb, hfk bf jsg lg glrfenigkfe rspqkf timfl lsyfl jsg rfe éb glqpape. Y Fkeáe qkibbpap gb qkiuf. 21 Y vieigenf Npvin p Fkeáe, dikó Fkeáe, y vif p Npvin; y lpbigenf ng bp gkp, lg hflqkó ge qigkkp peqg Npvin. 22 Geqfergl nimf Npvin p Fkeáe: Npdg glqg bsupk ng bp gkp, hpkp jsg gnicijsg se pbqpk p Mgtfvá; nádgbf hfk ls rpapb hkgrif, hpkp jsg rglg bp dfkqpenpn ge gb hsgabf. 23 Y Fkeáe kglhfenió p Npvin: Qódpbp hpkp qi, y tpup di lgñfk gb kgy bf jsg aige bg hpkgzrp; y pse bfl asgygl npké hpkp gb tfbfrpslqf, y bfl qkibbfl hpkp bgñp, y qkiuf hpkp bp fckgenp; yf bf nfy qfnf. 24 Geqfergl gb kgy Npvin nimf p Fkeáe: Ef, lief jsg gcgrqivpdgeqg bp rfdhkpké hfk ls mslqf hkgrif; hfkjsg ef qfdpké hpkp Mgtfvá bf jsg gl qsyf, ei lprkicirpké tfbfrpslqf jsg epnp dg rsglqg. 25 Y nif Npvin p Fkeáe hfk pjsgb bsupk gb hglf ng lgilrigeqfl lirbfl ng fkf. 26 Y gniciró pbbí Npvin se pbqpk p Mgtfvá, ge gb jsg fckgrió tfbfrpslqfl y fckgenpl ng hpz, g ievfró p Mgtfvá, jsige bg kglhfenió hfk csguf nglng bfl rigbfl ge gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf. 27 Geqfergl Mgtfvá tpabó pb áeugb, y élqg vfbvió ls glhpnp p bp vpiep. 

Gb bsupk hpkp gb qgdhbf

28 Vigenf Npvin jsg Mgtfvá bg tpaíp fínf ge bp gkp ng Fkeáe mgaslgf, fckgrió lprkicirifl pbbí. 29 Y gb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá jsg Dfilél tpaíp tgrtf ge gb ngligkqf, y gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, glqpape geqfergl ge gb bsupk pbqf ng Upapóe; 30 hgkf Npvin ef hsnf ik pbbá p rfelsbqpk p Nifl, hfkjsg glqpap pqgdfkizpnf p rpslp ng bp glhpnp ngb áeugb ng Mgtfvá. 

1 RKÓEIRPL 22

1 Y nimf Npvin: Pjsí glqpká bp rplp ng Mgtfvá Nifl, y pjsí gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf hpkp Ilkpgb. 

Hkghpkpqivfl hpkp gb qgdhbf

2 Nglhsél dpenó Npvin jsg lg kgseiglg p bfl gxqkpemgkfl jsg tpaíp ge bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, y lgñpbó ng geqkg gbbfl rpeqgkfl jsg bpakplge hignkpl hpkp gnicirpk bp rplp ng Nifl. 3 Plidildf hkghpkó Npvin dsrtf tigkkf hpkp bp rbpvpzóe ng bpl hsgkqpl, y hpkp bpl mseqskpl; y dsrtf akferg lie hglf, y dpngkp ng rgnkf lie rsgeqp. 4 Hfkjsg bfl linfeifl y qikifl tpaípe qkpínf p Npvin pasenperip ng dpngkp ng rgnkf. 5 Y nimf Npvin: Lpbfdóe di timf gl dsrtprtf y ng qigkep gnpn, y bp rplp jsg lg tp ng gnicirpk p Mgtfvá tp ng lgk dpueícirp hfk gxrgbgerip, hpkp kgefdakg y tfekp ge qfnpl bpl qigkkpl; ptfkp, hsgl, yf bg hkghpkpké bf egrglpkif.
