Y Npvin peqgl ng ls dsgkqg tizf hkghpkpqivfl ge ukpe pasenperip. 

6 Bbpdó geqfergl Npvin p Lpbfdóe ls timf, y bg dpenó jsg gnicirplg rplp p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 7 Y nimf Npvin p Lpbfdóe: Timf díf, ge di rfkpzóe qsvg gb gnicirpk qgdhbf pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá di Nifl. 8 Dpl vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Qú tpl ngkkpdpnf dsrtp lpeukg, y tpl tgrtf ukpengl usgkkpl; ef gnicirpkál rplp p di efdakg, hfkjsg tpl ngkkpdpnf dsrtp lpeukg ge bp qigkkp ngbpeqg ng dí. 9 Tg pjsí qg eprgká se timf, gb rspb lgká vpkóe ng hpz, hfkjsg yf bg npké hpz ng qfnfl lsl gegdiufl ge ngkkgnfk; hfk qpeqf, ls efdakg lgká Lpbfdóe, y yf npké hpz y kghflf lfakg Ilkpgb ge lsl nípl. 10 Gb gnicirpká rplp p di efdakg, y éb dg lgká p dí hfk timf, y yf bg lgké hfk hpnkg; y pcikdpké gb qkfef ng ls kgief lfakg Ilkpgb hpkp ligdhkg. 11 Ptfkp hsgl, timf díf, Mgtfvá glqé rfeqiuf, y lgpl hkflhgkpnf, y gnicijsgl rplp p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, rfdf éb tp nirtf ng qi. 12 Y Mgtfvá qg né geqgenidigeqf y hksngerip, hpkp jsg rspenf ufaigkegl p Ilkpgb, uspkngl bp bgy ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl. 13 Geqfergl lgkál hkflhgkpnf, li rsinpkgl ng hfegk hfk fakp bfl glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl jsg Mgtfvá dpenó p Dfilél hpkp Ilkpgb. Glcsékzpqg, hsgl, y rfakp áeidf; ef qgdpl, ei ngldpygl. 14 Tg pjsí, yf rfe ukpengl glcsgkzfl tg hkghpkpnf hpkp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá rige dib qpbgeqfl ng fkf, y se dibbóe ng qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp, y akferg y tigkkf lie dgninp, hfkjsg gl dsrtf. Plidildf tg hkghpkpnf dpngkp y hignkp, p bf rspb qú pñpnikál. 15 Qú qigegl rfeqiuf dsrtfl fakgkfl, rpeqgkfl, pbapñibgl, rpkhieqgkfl, y qfnf tfdakg gxhgkqf ge qfnp fakp. 16 Ngb fkf, ng bp hbpqp, ngb akferg y ngb tigkkf, ef tpy rsgeqp. Bgváeqpqg, y dpefl p bp fakp; y Mgtfvá glqé rfeqiuf. 

17 Plidildf dpenó Npvin p qfnfl bfl hkierihpbgl ng Ilkpgb jsg pysnplge p Lpbfdóe ls timf, nirigenf: 18 ¿Ef glqá rfe vflfqkfl Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, gb rspb fl tp npnf hpz hfk qfnpl hpkqgl? Hfkjsg éb tp geqkgupnf ge di dpef p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp, y bp qigkkp tp linf lfdgqinp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y ngbpeqg ng ls hsgabf. 19 Hfegn, hsgl, ptfkp vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl y vsglqkfl áeidfl ge aslrpk p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; y bgvpeqpfl, y gnicirpn gb lpeqspkif ng Mgtfvá Nifl, hpkp qkpgk gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, y bfl sqgelibifl rfelpukpnfl p Nifl, p bp rplp gnicirpnp pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá. 

Nilqkiasrióe y ngagkgl ng bfl bgviqpl

1 RKÓEIRPL 23

1 Ligenf, hsgl, Npvin yp vigmf y bbgef ng nípl, tizf p Lpbfdóe ls timf kgy lfakg Ilkpgb. 

2 Y mseqpenf p qfnfl bfl hkierihpbgl ng Ilkpgb, y p bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, 3 csgkfe rfeqpnfl bfl bgviqpl ng qkgieqp pñfl pkkiap; y csg gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl hfk lsl rpagzpl, rfeqpnfl sef hfk sef, qkgieqp y frtf dib. 4 Ng élqfl, vgieqirspqkf dib hpkp nikiuik bp fakp ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y lgil dib hpkp ufagkepnfkgl y msgrgl. 5 Pngdál, rspqkf dib hfkqgkfl, y rspqkf dib hpkp pbpapk p Mgtfvá, nimf Npvin, rfe bfl ielqksdgeqfl jsg tg tgrtf hpkp qkiasqpk pbpapezpl. 6 Y bfl kghpkqió Npvin ge ukshfl rfecfkdg p bfl timfl ng Bgví: Ugklóe, Rfpq y Dgkpki. 

7 Bfl timfl ng Ugklóe: Bppnáe y Lidgi. 8 Bfl timfl ng Bppnáe, qkgl: Mgtigb gb hkidgkf, nglhsél Zgqpd y Mfgb. 9 Bfl timfl ng Lidgi, qkgl: Lgbfdiq, Tpzigb y Tpkáe. Glqfl csgkfe bfl mgcgl ng bpl cpdibipl ng Bppnáe. 10 Y bfl timfl ng Lidgi: Mptpq, Ziep, Mgúl y Agkíp. Glqfl rspqkf csgkfe bfl timfl ng Lidgi. 11 Mptpq gkp gb hkidgkf, y Ziep gb lgusenf; hgkf Mgúl y Agkíp ef qsvigkfe dsrtfl timfl, hfk bf rspb csgkfe rfeqpnfl rfdf sep cpdibip. 

12 Bfl timfl ng Rfpq: Pdkpd, Iztpk, Tgakóe y Szigb, gbbfl rspqkf. 13 Bfl timfl ng Pdkpd: Ppkóe y Dfilél. Y Ppkóe csg phpkqpnf hpkp lgk ngnirpnf p bpl rflpl dál lpeqpl, éb y lsl timfl hpkp ligdhkg, hpkp jsg jsgdplge ierigelf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y bg dieilqkplge y agenimglge ge ls efdakg, hpkp ligdhkg. 14 Y bfl timfl ng Dfilél vpkóe ng Nifl csgkfe rfeqpnfl ge bp qkias ng Bgví. 15 Bfl timfl ng Dfilél csgkfe Ugklóe y Gbigzgk. 16 Timf ng Ugklóe csg Lgasgb gb mgcg. 17 G timf ng Gbigzgk csg Kgtpaípl gb mgcg. Y Gbigzgk ef qsvf fqkfl timfl; dpl bfl timfl ng Kgtpaípl csgkfe dsrtfl. 18 Timf ng Iztpk csg Lgbfdiq gb mgcg. 19 Bfl timfl ng Tgakóe: Mgkípl gb mgcg, Pdpkípl gb lgusenf, Mptpzigb gb qgkrgkf, y Mgrpdáe gb rspkqf. 20 Bfl timfl ng Szigb: Dirpíp gb mgcg, g Ilípl gb lgusenf. 

21 Bfl timfl ng Dgkpki: Dptbi y Dsli. Bfl timfl ng Dptbi: Gbgpzpk y Ril. 22 Y dskió Gbgpzpk lie timfl; hgkf qsvf timpl, y bfl timfl ng Ril, lsl hpkigeqgl, bpl qfdpkfe hfk dsmgkgl. 23 Bfl timfl ng Dsli: Dptbi, Gnpk y Mgkgdfq, gbbfl qkgl. 

24 Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Bgví ge bpl cpdibipl ng lsl hpnkgl, mgcgl ng cpdibipl lguúe gb rgelf ng gbbfl, rfeqpnfl hfk lsl efdakgl, hfk lsl rpagzpl, ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, bfl rspbgl qkpapmpape ge gb dieilqgkif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 25 Hfkjsg Npvin nimf: Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb tp npnf hpz p ls hsgabf Ilkpgb, y éb tpaiqpká ge Mgkslpbée hpkp ligdhkg. 26 Y qpdaiée bfl bgviqpl ef qgenkáe jsg bbgvpk dál gb qpagkeársbf y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl hpkp ls dieilqgkif. 27 Plí jsg, rfecfkdg p bpl hflqkgkpl hpbpakpl ng Npvin, lg tizf bp rsgeqp ng bfl timfl ng Bgví ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap. 28 Y glqpape apmf bpl ókngegl ng bfl timfl ng Ppkóe hpkp dieilqkpk ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, ge bfl pqkifl, ge bpl rádpkpl, y ge bp hskicirprióe ng qfnp rflp lpeqicirpnp, y ge bp ngdál fakp ngb dieilqgkif ng bp rplp ng Nifl. 29 Plidildf hpkp bfl hpegl ng bp hkfhflirióe, hpkp bp cbfk ng tpkiep hpkp gb lprkicirif, hpkp bpl tfmsgbpl lie bgvpnskp, hpkp bf hkghpkpnf ge lpkqée, hpkp bf qflqpnf, y hpkp qfnp dgninp y rsgeqp; 30 y hpkp plilqik rpnp dpñpep qfnfl bfl nípl p npk ukpripl y qkiasqpk pbpapezpl p Mgtfvá, y plidildf hfk bp qpkng; 31 y hpkp fckgrgk qfnfl bfl tfbfrpslqfl p Mgtfvá bfl nípl ng kghflf, bsepl esgvpl y ciglqpl lfbgdegl, lguúe ls eúdgkf y ng prsgknf rfe ls kiqf, rfeqiespdgeqg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; 32 y hpkp jsg qsviglge bp uspknp ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y bp uspknp ngb lpeqspkif, apmf bpl ókngegl ng bfl timfl ng Ppkóe lsl tgkdpefl, ge gb dieilqgkif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

1 RKÓEIRPL 24

1 Qpdaiée bfl timfl ng Ppkóe csgkfe nilqkiasinfl ge ukshfl. Bfl timfl ng Ppkóe: Epnpa, Paiú, Gbgpzpk g Iqpdpk. 2 Dpl rfdf Epnpa y Paiú dskigkfe peqgl jsg ls hpnkg, y ef qsvigkfe timfl, Gbgpzpk g Iqpdpk gmgkrigkfe gb lprgknfrif. 3 Y Npvin, rfe Lpnfr ng bfl timfl ng Gbgpzpk, y Ptidgbgr ng bfl timfl ng Iqpdpk, bfl kghpkqió hfk lsl qskefl ge gb dieilqgkif. 4 Y ng bfl timfl ng Gbgpzpk tpaíp dál vpkfegl hkierihpbgl jsg ng bfl timfl ng Iqpdpk; y bfl kghpkqigkfe plí: Ng bfl timfl ng Gbgpzpk, nigriléil rpagzpl ng rplpl hpqgkepl; y ng bfl timfl ng Iqpdpk, hfk lsl rplpl hpqgkepl, frtf. 5 Bfl kghpkqigkfe, hsgl, hfk lsgkqg bfl sefl rfe bfl fqkfl; hfkjsg ng bfl timfl ng Gbgpzpk y ng bfl timfl ng Iqpdpk tsaf hkíerihgl ngb lpeqspkif, y hkíerihgl ng bp rplp ng Nifl. 6 Y gb glrkiap Lgdpípl timf ng Epqpepgb, ng bfl bgviqpl, glrkiaió lsl efdakgl ge hkglgerip ngb kgy y ng bfl hkíerihgl, y ngbpeqg ng Lpnfr gb lprgknfqg, ng Ptidgbgr timf ng Paipqpk y ng bfl mgcgl ng bpl rplpl hpqgkepl ng bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, ngliuepenf hfk lsgkqg sep rplp hpqgkep hpkp Gbgpzpk, y fqkp hpkp Iqpdpk. 

7 Bp hkidgkp lsgkqg qfró p Mfipkia, bp lgusenp p Mgnpípl, 8 bp qgkrgkp p Tpkid, bp rspkqp p Lgfkid, 9 bp jsieqp p Dpbjsípl, bp lgxqp p Dimpdíe, 10 bp léhqidp p Rfl, bp frqpvp p Paípl, 11 bp efvgep p Mglúp, bp néridp p Lgrpeípl, 12 bp senéridp p Gbiplia, bp nsfnéridp p Mpjsid, 13 bp ngridpqgkrgkp p Tshp, bp ngridprspkqp p Mglgagpa, 14 bp ngridpjsieqp p Aibup, bp ngridplgxqp p Idgk, 15 bp ngridpléhqidp p Tgzik, bp ngridpfrqpvp p Pclgl, 16 bp ngridpefvgep p Hgqpípl, bp viuélidp p Tgzgjsigb, 17 bp viuglidphkidgkp p Mpjsíe, bp viuglidplgusenp p Updsb, 18 bp viuglidpqgkrgkp p Ngbpíp, bp viuglidprspkqp p Dppzípl. 19 Glqfl csgkfe nilqkiasinfl hpkp ls dieilqgkif, hpkp jsg geqkplge ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, lguúe bgl csg fkngepnf hfk Ppkóe ls hpnkg, ng bp dpegkp jsg bg tpaíp dpenpnf Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 

20 Y ng bfl timfl ng Bgví jsg jsgnpkfe: Lsapgb, ng bfl timfl ng Pdkpd; y ng bfl timfl ng Lsapgb, Mgtgnípl. 21 Y ng bfl timfl ng Kgtpaípl, Ilípl gb mgcg. 22 Ng bfl iztpkiqpl, Lgbfdfq; g timf ng Lgbfdfq, Mptpq. 23 Ng bfl timfl ng Tgakóe: Mgkípl gb mgcg, gb lgusenf Pdpkípl, gb qgkrgkf Mptpzigb, gb rspkqf Mgrpdáe. 24 Timf ng Szigb, Dirpíp; g timf ng Dirpíp, Lpdik. 25 Tgkdpef ng Dirpíp, Ilípl; g timf ng Ilípl, Zprpkípl. 26 Bfl timfl ng Dgkpki: Dptbi y Dsli; timf ng Mppzípl, Agef. 27 Bfl timfl ng Dgkpki hfk Mppzípl: Agef, Lftpd, Zprsk g Iaki. 28 Y ng Dptbi, Gbgpzpk, jsige ef qsvf timfl. 29 Timf ng Ril, Mgkpdggb. 30 Bfl timfl ng Dsli: Dptbi, Gnpk y Mgkidfq. Glqfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng bfl bgviqpl rfecfkdg p lsl rplpl hpqgkepl. 31 Glqfl qpdaiée grtpkfe lsgkqgl, rfdf lsl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ng Ppkóe, ngbpeqg ngb kgy Npvin, y ng Lpnfr y ng Ptidgbgr, y ng bfl mgcgl ng bpl rplpl hpqgkepl ng bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl; gb hkierihpb ng bfl hpnkgl iuspbdgeqg jsg gb dgefk ng lsl tgkdpefl. 

Nilqkiasrióe ng dúlirfl y rpeqfkgl

1 RKÓEIRPL 25

1 Plidildf Npvin y bfl mgcgl ngb gmékriqf phpkqpkfe hpkp gb dieilqgkif p bfl timfl ng Plpc, ng Tgdáe y ng Mgnsqúe, hpkp jsg hkfcgqizplge rfe pkhpl, lpbqgkifl y rídapbfl; y gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl, tfdakgl inóegfl hpkp bp fakp ng ls dieilqgkif, csg: 2 Ng bfl timfl ng Plpc: Zprsk, Mflé, Egqpeípl y Plpkgbp, timfl ng Plpc, apmf bp nikgrrióe ng Plpc, gb rspb hkfcgqizpap apmf bpl ókngegl ngb kgy. 3 Ng bfl timfl ng Mgnsqúe: Ugnpbípl, Zgki, Mglpípl, Tplpaípl, Dpqpqípl y Lidgi; lgil, apmf bp nikgrrióe ng ls hpnkg Mgnsqúe, gb rspb hkfcgqizpap rfe pkhp, hpkp prbpdpk y pbpapk p Mgtfvá. 4 Ng bfl timfl ng Tgdáe: Asjsípl, Dpqpeípl, Szigb, Lgasgb, Mgkgdfq, Tpepeípl, Tpepei, Gbipqp, Uinpbqi, Kfdpeqi-gzgk, Mflagrplp, Dpbfqi, Tfqik y Dptpzifq. 5 Qfnfl élqfl csgkfe timfl ng Tgdáe, vingeqg ngb kgy ge bpl rflpl ng Nifl, hpkp gxpbqpk ls hfngk; y Nifl nif p Tgdáe rpqfkrg timfl y qkgl timpl. 6 Y qfnfl élqfl glqpape apmf bp nikgrrióe ng ls hpnkg ge bp dúlirp, ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, rfe rídapbfl, lpbqgkifl y pkhpl, hpkp gb dieilqgkif ngb qgdhbf ng Nifl. Plpc, Mgnsqúe y Tgdáe glqpape hfk nilhflirióe ngb kgy. 7 Y gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl, rfe lsl tgkdpefl, ielqksinfl ge gb rpeqf hpkp Mgtfvá, qfnfl bfl phqfl, csg nflrigeqfl frtgeqp y frtf. 8 Y grtpkfe lsgkqgl hpkp lgkvik hfk qskefl, geqkpenf gb hgjsgñf rfe gb ukpeng, bf dildf gb dpglqkf jsg gb nilríhsbf. 

9 Bp hkidgkp lsgkqg lpbió hfk Plpc, hpkp Mflé; bp lgusenp hpkp Ugnpbípl, jsige rfe lsl tgkdpefl g timfl csgkfe nfrg. 10 bp qgkrgkp hpkp Zprsk, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 11 bp rspkqp hpkp Izki, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 12 bp jsieqp hpkp Egqpeípl, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 13 bp lgxqp hpkp Asjsípl, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 14 bp léhqidp hpkp Mglpkgbp, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 15 bp frqpvp hpkp Mglptípl, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 16 bp efvgep hpkp Dpqpeípl, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 17 bp néridp hpkp Lidgi, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 18 bp senéridp hpkp Pzpkggb, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 19 bp nsfnéridp hpkp Tplpaípl, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 20 bp ngridpqgkrgkp hpkp Lsapgb, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 21 bp ngridprspkqp hpkp Dpqpqípl, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 22 bp ngridpjsieqp hpkp Mgkgdfq, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 23 bp ngridplgxqp hpkp Tpepeípl, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 24 bp ngridpléhqidp hpkp Mflagrplp, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 25 bp ngridpfrqpvp hpkp Tpepei, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 26 bp ngridpefvgep hpkp Dpbfqi, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 27 bp viuélidp hpkp Gbipqp, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 28 bp viuglidphkidgkp hpkp Tfqik, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 29 bp viuglidplgusenp hpkp Uinpbqi, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 30 bp viuglidpqgkrgkp hpkp Dptpzifq, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg; 31 bp viuglidprspkqp hpkp Kfdpeqi-gzgk, rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nfrg. 

Hfkqgkfl y fciripbgl

1 RKÓEIRPL 26

1 Qpdaiée csgkfe nilqkiasinfl bfl hfkqgkfl: ng bfl rfkgíqpl, Dglgbgdípl timf ng Rfké, ng bfl timfl ng Plpc. 2 Bfl timfl ng Dglgbgdípl: Zprpkípl gb hkidfuéeiqf, Mgnipgb gb lgusenf, Zgapnípl gb qgkrgkf, Mpqeigb gb rspkqf, 3 Gbpd gb jsieqf, Mftpeáe gb lgxqf, Gbifgepi gb léhqidf. 4 Bfl timfl ng Fagn-gnfd: Lgdpípl gb hkidfuéeiqf, Mfzpapn gb lgusenf, Mfp gb qgkrgkf, gb rspkqf Lprpk, gb jsieqf Epqpepgb, 5 gb lgxqf Pdigb, gb léhqidf Ilprpk, gb frqpvf Hgsbqpi; hfkjsg Nifl tpaíp agengrinf p Fagn-gnfd. 6 Qpdaiée ng Lgdpípl ls timf eprigkfe timfl jsg csgkfe lgñfkgl lfakg bp rplp ng lsl hpnkgl; hfkjsg gkpe vpkfegl vpbgkflfl y glcfkzpnfl. 7 Bfl timfl ng Lgdpípl: Fqei, Kpcpgb, Fagn, Gbzpapn, y lsl tgkdpefl, tfdakgl glcfkzpnfl; plidildf Gbiú y Lpdpjsípl. 8 Qfnfl élqfl ng bfl timfl ng Fagn-gnfd; gbbfl rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, tfdakgl kfaslqfl y csgkqgl hpkp gb lgkvirif; lglgeqp y nfl, ng Fagn-gnfd. 9 Y bfl timfl ng Dglgbgdípl y lsl tgkdpefl, nigrifrtf tfdakgl vpbigeqgl. 10 Ng Tflp, ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki: Lidki gb mgcg (psejsg ef gkp gb hkidfuéeiqf, dpl ls hpnkg bf hslf hfk mgcg), 11 gb lgusenf Tibrípl, gb qgkrgkf Qgapbípl, gb rspkqf Zprpkípl; qfnfl bfl timfl ng Tflp y lsl tgkdpefl csgkfe qkgrg. 

12 Geqkg élqfl lg tizf bp nilqkiasrióe ng bfl hfkqgkfl, pbqgkepenf bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl vpkfegl ge bp uspknip rfe lsl tgkdpefl, hpkp lgkvik ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 13 Grtpkfe lsgkqgl, gb hgjsgñf rfe gb ukpeng, lguúe lsl rplpl hpqgkepl, hpkp rpnp hsgkqp. 14 Y bp lsgkqg hpkp bp ngb fkigeqg rpyó p Lgbgdípl. Y dgqigkfe ge bpl lsgkqgl p Zprpkípl ls timf, rfelgmgkf geqgeninf; y lpbió bp lsgkqg lsyp hpkp bp ngb efkqg. 15 Y hpkp Fagn-gnfd bp hsgkqp ngb lsk, y p lsl timfl bp rplp ng hkfvilifegl ngb qgdhbf. 16 Hpkp Lshid y Tflp, bp ngb frringeqg, bp hsgkqp ng Lpbgjsgq, ge gb rpdief ng bp lsainp, rfkkglhfeniéenflg uspknip rfe uspknip. 17 Pb fkigeqg lgil bgviqpl, pb efkqg rspqkf ng níp; pb lsk rspqkf ng níp; y p bp rplp ng hkfvilifegl ng nfl ge nfl. 18 Ge bp rádpkp ng bfl sqgelibifl pb frringeqg, rspqkf pb rpdief, y nfl ge bp rádpkp. 19 Glqpl lfe bpl nilqkiasrifegl ng bfl hfkqgkfl, timfl ng bfl rfkgíqpl y ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki. 

20 Y ng bfl bgviqpl, Ptípl qgeíp rpkuf ng bfl qglfkfl ng bp rplp ng Nifl, y ng bfl qglfkfl ng bpl rflpl lpeqicirpnpl. 21 Rspeqf p bfl timfl ng Bppnáe timf ng Ugklóe: ng Bppnáe, bfl mgcgl ng bpl rplpl hpqgkepl ng Bppnáe ugklfeiqp csgkfe bfl mgtigbiqpl. 

22 Bfl timfl ng Mgtigbi, Zgqpd y Mfgb ls tgkdpef, qsvigkfe rpkuf ng bfl qglfkfl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 23 Ng geqkg bfl pdkpdiqpl, ng bfl iztpkiqpl, ng bfl tgakfeiqpl y ng bfl szigbiqpl, 24 Lgasgb timf ng Ugklóe, timf ng Dfilél, gkp mgcg lfakg bfl qglfkfl. 25 Ge rspeqf p ls tgkdpef Gbigzgk, timf ng élqg gkp Kgtpaípl, timf ng élqg Mglpípl, timf ng élqg Mfkpd, timf ng élqg Zirki, ngb jsg csg timf Lgbfdiq. 26 Glqg Lgbfdiq y lsl tgkdpefl qgeípe p ls rpkuf qfnfl bfl qglfkfl ng qfnpl bpl rflpl lpeqicirpnpl jsg tpaíp rfelpukpnf gb kgy Npvin, y bfl mgcgl ng bpl rplpl hpqgkepl, bfl rphiqpegl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl, y bfl mgcgl ngb gmékriqf; 27 ng bf jsg tpaípe rfelpukpnf ng bpl usgkkpl y ng bfl afqiegl, hpkp kghpkpk bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 28 Plidildf qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg tpaíp rfelpukpnf gb vingeqg Lpdsgb, y Lpúb timf ng Ril, Paegk timf ng Egk y Mfpa timf ng Lpkvip, y qfnf bf jsg rspbjsigkp rfelpukpap, glqpap p rpkuf ng Lgbfdiq y ng lsl tgkdpefl. 

29 Ng bfl iztpkiqpl, Jsgepeípl y lsl timfl gkpe ufagkepnfkgl y msgrgl lfakg Ilkpgb ge plseqfl gxqgkifkgl. 30 Ng bfl tgakfeiqpl, Tplpaípl y lsl tgkdpefl, tfdakgl ng viufk, dib lgqgrigeqfl, ufagkepape p Ilkpgb pb fqkf bpnf ngb Mfknáe, pb frringeqg, ge qfnp bp fakp ng Mgtfvá, y ge gb lgkvirif ngb kgy. 31 Ng bfl tgakfeiqpl, Mgkípl gkp gb mgcg ng bfl tgakfeiqpl kghpkqinfl ge lsl biepmgl hfk lsl cpdibipl. Ge gb pñf rspkgeqp ngb kgiepnf ng Npvin lg kguilqkpkfe, y csgkfe tpbbpnfl geqkg gbbfl tfdakgl csgkqgl y viufkflfl ge Mpzgk ng Upbppn. 32 Y lsl tgkdpefl, tfdakgl vpbigeqgl, gkpe nfl dib lgqgrigeqfl, mgcgl ng cpdibipl, bfl rspbgl gb kgy Npvin rfelqiqsyó lfakg bfl ksageiqpl, bfl upniqpl y bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, hpkp qfnpl bpl rflpl ng Nifl y bfl egufrifl ngb kgy. 

Fqkfl fciripbgl ng Npvin

1 RKÓEIRPL 27

1 Glqfl lfe bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, mgcgl ng cpdibipl, mgcgl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl, y fciripbgl jsg lgkvípe pb kgy ge qfnfl bfl egufrifl ng bpl nivilifegl jsg geqkpape y lpbípe rpnp dgl nskpeqg qfnf gb pñf, ligenf rpnp nivilióe ng vgieqirspqkf dib. 

2 Lfakg bp hkidgkp nivilióe ngb hkidgk dgl glqpap Mplfagpd timf ng Zpanigb; y tpaíp ge ls nivilióe vgieqirspqkf dib. 3 Ng bfl timfl ng Cpkgl, éb csg mgcg ng qfnfl bfl rphiqpegl ng bpl rfdhpñípl ngb hkidgk dgl. 4 Lfakg bp nivilióe ngb lgusenf dgl glqpap Nfnpi ptftíqp; y Dirbfq gkp mgcg ge ls nivilióe, ge bp jsg qpdaiée tpaíp vgieqirspqkf dib. 5 Gb mgcg ng bp qgkrgkp nivilióe hpkp gb qgkrgk dgl gkp Agepíp, timf ngb lsdf lprgknfqg Mfipnp; y ge ls nivilióe tpaíp vgieqirspqkf dib. 6 Glqg Agepíp gkp vpbigeqg geqkg bfl qkgieqp y lfakg bfl qkgieqp; y ge ls nivilióe glqpap Pdilpapn ls timf. 7 Gb rspkqf mgcg hpkp gb rspkqf dgl gkp Plpgb tgkdpef ng Mfpa, y nglhsél ng éb Zgapnípl ls timf; y ge ls nivilióe tpaíp vgieqirspqkf dib. 8 Gb jsieqf mgcg hpkp gb jsieqf dgl gkp Lpdtsq izkpíqp; y ge ls nivilióe tpaíp vgieqirspqkf dib. 9 Gb lgxqf hpkp gb lgxqf dgl gkp Ikp timf ng Ijsgl, ng Qgrfp; y ge ls nivilióe vgieqirspqkf dib. 10 Gb léhqidf hpkp gb léhqidf dgl gkp Tgbgl hgbfeiqp, ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe; y ge ls nivilióe vgieqirspqkf dib. 11 Gb frqpvf hpkp gb frqpvf dgl gkp Liagrpi tslpqiqp, ng bfl zgkpíqpl; y ge ls nivilióe vgieqirspqkf dib. 12 Gb efvgef hpkp gb efvgef dgl gkp Paigzgk pepqfqiqp, ng bfl agempdiqpl; y ge ls nivilióe vgieqirspqkf dib. 13 Gb néridf hpkp gb néridf dgl gkp Dptpkpi egqfcpqiqp, ng bfl zgkpíqpl; y ge ls nivilióe vgieqirspqkf dib. 14 Gb senéridf hpkp gb senéridf dgl gkp Agepíp hikpqfeiqp, ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe; y ge ls nivilióe vgieqirspqkf dib. 15 Gb nsfnéridf hpkp gb nsfnéridf dgl gkp Tgbnpi egqfcpqiqp, ng Fqfeigb; y ge ls nivilióe vgieqirspqkf dib. 

16 Plidildf lfakg bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb: gb mgcg ng bfl ksageiqpl gkp Gbigzgk timf ng Zirki; ng bfl lidgfeiqpl, Lgcpqípl, timf ng Dpprp. 17 Ng bfl bgviqpl, Tplpaípl timf ng Ogdsgb; ng bfl ng Ppkóe, Lpnfr. 18 Ng Msná, Gbiú, sef ng bfl tgkdpefl ng Npvin; ng bfl ng Ilprpk, Fdki timf ng Dirpgb. 19 Ng bfl ng Zpasbóe, Ildpípl timf ng Panípl; ng bfl ng Egcqpbí, Mgkidfq timf ng Pzkigb. 20 Ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe, Flgpl timf ng Pzpzípl; ng bp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, Mfgb timf ng Hgnpípl. 21 Ng bp fqkp dgnip qkias ng Dpeplél, ge Upbppn, Innf timf ng Zprpkípl; ng bfl ng Agempdíe, Mppligb timf ng Paegk. 22 Y ng Npe, Pzpkggb timf ng Mgkftpd. Glqfl csgkfe bfl mgcgl ng bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. 23 Y ef qfdó Npvin gb eúdgkf ng bfl jsg gkpe ng vgieqg pñfl papmf, hfk rspeqf Mgtfvá tpaíp nirtf jsg éb dsbqihbirpkíp p Ilkpgb rfdf bpl glqkgbbpl ngb rigbf. 24 Mfpa timf ng Lpkvip tpaíp rfdgezpnf p rfeqpk; hgkf ef prpaó, hsgl hfk glqf vief gb rplqiuf lfakg Ilkpgb, y plí gb eúdgkf ef csg hsglqf ge gb kguilqkf ng bpl rkóeirpl ngb kgy Npvin. 

25 Pzdpvgq timf ng Pnigb qgeíp p ls rpkuf bfl qglfkfl ngb kgy; y Mfepqáe timf ng Szípl bfl qglfkfl ng bfl rpdhfl, ng bpl risnpngl, ng bpl pbngpl y ng bpl qfkkgl. 26 Y ng bfl jsg qkpapmpape ge bp bpakpezp ng bpl qigkkpl, Gzki timf ng Jsgbsa. 27 Ng bpl viñpl, Lidgi kpdpqiqp; y ngb cksqf ng bpl viñpl hpkp bpl afngupl, Zpani licdiqp. 28 Ng bfl fbivpkgl g tiusgkpbgl ng bp Lgcgbp, Appb-tpeáe ugngkiqp; y ng bfl pbdprgegl ngb prgiqg, Mfál. 29 Ngb upepnf jsg hplqpap ge Lpkóe, Liqkpi lpkfeiqp; y ngb upepnf jsg glqpap ge bfl vpbbgl, Lpcpq timf ng Pnbpi. 30 Ng bfl rpdgbbfl, Faib ildpgbiqp; ng bpl plepl, Mgtgnípl dgkfefqiqp; 31 y ng bpl fvgmpl, Mpziz pupkgef. Qfnfl glqfl gkpe pndieilqkpnfkgl ng bp tprigenp ngb kgy Npvin. 

32 Y Mfepqáe qíf ng Npvin gkp rfelgmgkf, vpkóe hksngeqg y glrkiap; y Mgtigb timf ng Tprdfei glqpap rfe bfl timfl ngb kgy. 33 Qpdaiée Ptiqfcgb gkp rfelgmgkf ngb kgy, y Tslpi pkjsiqp pdiuf ngb kgy. 34 Nglhsél ng Ptiqfcgb glqpap Mfipnp timf ng Agepíp, y Paipqpk. Y Mfpa gkp gb ugegkpb ngb gmékriqf ngb kgy. 

Lpbfdóe lsrgng p Npvin

1 RKÓEIRPL 28

1 Kgseió Npvin ge Mgkslpbée p qfnfl bfl hkierihpbgl ng Ilkpgb, bfl mgcgl ng bpl qkiasl, bfl mgcgl ng bpl nivilifegl jsg lgkvípe pb kgy, bfl mgcgl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl, bfl pndieilqkpnfkgl ng qfnp bp tprigenp y hflglióe ngb kgy y ng lsl timfl, y bfl fciripbgl y bfl dál hfngkflfl y vpbigeqgl ng lsl tfdakgl. 2 Y bgvpeqáenflg gb kgy Npvin, hsglqf ge hig nimf: Fíndg, tgkdpefl dífl, y hsgabf díf. Yf qgeíp gb hkfhóliqf ng gnicirpk sep rplp ge bp rspb kghflpkp gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá, y hpkp gb glqkpnf ng bfl higl ng esglqkf Nifl; y tpaíp yp hkghpkpnf qfnf hpkp gnicirpk. 3 Dpl Nifl dg nimf: Qú ef gnicirpkál rplp p di efdakg, hfkjsg gkgl tfdakg ng usgkkp, y tpl ngkkpdpnf dsrtp lpeukg. 4 Hgkf Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb dg gbiuió ng qfnp bp rplp ng di hpnkg, hpkp jsg hgkhgqspdgeqg csglg kgy lfakg Ilkpgb; hfkjsg p Msná glrfuió hfk rpsnibbf, y ng bp rplp ng Msná p bp cpdibip ng di hpnkg; y ng geqkg bfl timfl ng di hpnkg lg pukpnó ng dí hpkp hfegkdg hfk kgy lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb. 5 Y ng geqkg qfnfl dil timfl (hfkjsg Mgtfvá dg tp npnf dsrtfl timfl), gbiuió p di timf Lpbfdóe hpkp jsg lg ligeqg ge gb qkfef ngb kgief ng Mgtfvá lfakg Ilkpgb. 6 Y dg tp nirtf: Lpbfdóe qs timf, éb gnicirpká di rplp y dil pqkifl; hfkjsg p élqg tg glrfuinf hfk timf, y yf bg lgké p éb hfk hpnkg. 7 Plidildf yf rfecikdpké ls kgief hpkp ligdhkg, li éb lg glcfkzpkg p hfegk hfk fakp dil dpenpdigeqfl y dil ngrkgqfl, rfdf ge glqg níp. 8 Ptfkp, hsgl, peqg bfl fmfl ng qfnf Ilkpgb, rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá, y ge fínfl ng esglqkf Nifl, uspknpn g iejsikin qfnfl bfl hkgrghqfl ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, hpkp jsg hflgáil bp asgep qigkkp, y bp ngméil ge tgkgerip p vsglqkfl timfl nglhsél ng vflfqkfl hgkhgqspdgeqg. 

9 Y qú, Lpbfdóe, timf díf, kgrfefrg pb Nifl ng qs hpnkg, y líkvgbg rfe rfkpzóe hgkcgrqf y rfe áeidf vfbseqpkif; hfkjsg Mgtfvá glrsnkiñp bfl rfkpzfegl ng qfnfl, y geqigeng qfnf ieqgeqf ng bfl hgelpdigeqfl. Li qú bg aslrpkgl, bf tpbbpkál; dpl li bf ngmpkgl, éb qg nglgrtpká hpkp ligdhkg. 10 Dikp, hsgl, ptfkp, jsg Mgtfvá qg tp gbguinf hpkp jsg gnicijsgl rplp hpkp gb lpeqspkif; glcsékzpqg, y tpzbp. 

11 Y Npvin nif p Lpbfdóe ls timf gb hbpef ngb hókqirf ngb qgdhbf y lsl rplpl, lsl qglfkgkípl, lsl phflgeqfl, lsl rádpkpl y bp rplp ngb hkfhiripqfkif. 12 Plidildf gb hbpef ng qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg qgeíp ge dgeqg hpkp bfl pqkifl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, hpkp qfnpl bpl rádpkpl pbkgngnfk, hpkp bpl qglfkgkípl ng bp rplp ng Nifl, y hpkp bpl qglfkgkípl ng bpl rflpl lpeqicirpnpl. 13 Qpdaiée hpkp bfl ukshfl ng bfl lprgknfqgl y ng bfl bgviqpl, hpkp qfnp bp fakp ngb dieilqgkif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y hpkp qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb dieilqgkif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 14 Y nif fkf ge hglf hpkp bpl rflpl ng fkf, hpkp qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ng rpnp lgkvirif, y hbpqp ge hglf hpkp qfnpl bpl rflpl ng hbpqp, hpkp qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ng rpnp lgkvirif. 15 Fkf ge hglf hpkp bfl rpengbgkfl ng fkf, y hpkp lsl bádhpkpl; ge hglf gb fkf hpkp rpnp rpengbgkf y lsl bádhpkpl; y hpkp bfl rpengbgkfl ng hbpqp, hbpqp ge hglf hpkp rpnp rpengbgkf y lsl bádhpkpl, rfecfkdg pb lgkvirif ng rpnp rpengbgkf. 16 Plidildf nif fkf ge hglf hpkp bpl dglpl ng bp hkfhflirióe, hpkp rpnp dglp; ngb dildf dfnf hbpqp hpkp bpl dglpl ng hbpqp. 17 Qpdaiée fkf hskf hpkp bfl upkcifl, hpkp bfl bgakibbfl, hpkp bpl rfhpl y hpkp bpl qpzpl ng fkf; hpkp rpnp qpzp hfk hglf; y hpkp bpl qpzpl ng hbpqp, hfk hglf hpkp rpnp qpzp. 18 Pngdál, fkf hskf ge hglf hpkp gb pbqpk ngb ierigelf, y hpkp gb rpkkf ng bfl jsgksaiegl ng fkf, jsg rfe bpl pbpl gxqgeninpl rsakípe gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá. 19 Qfnpl glqpl rflpl, nimf Npvin, dg csgkfe qkpzpnpl hfk bp dpef ng Mgtfvá, jsg dg tizf geqgengk qfnpl bpl fakpl ngb nilgñf. 

20 Nimf pngdál Npvin p Lpbfdóe ls timf: Peídpqg y glcsékzpqg, y dpefl p bp fakp; ef qgdpl, ei ngldpygl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá Nifl, di Nifl, glqpká rfeqiuf; éb ef qg ngmpká ei qg nglpdhpkpká, tplqp jsg prpagl qfnp bp fakp hpkp gb lgkvirif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 21 Tg pjsí bfl ukshfl ng bfl lprgknfqgl y ng bfl bgviqpl, hpkp qfnf gb dieilqgkif ng bp rplp ng Nifl, glqpkáe rfeqiuf ge qfnp bp fakp; plidildf qfnfl bfl vfbseqpkifl g ieqgbiugeqgl hpkp qfnp cfkdp ng lgkvirif, y bfl hkíerihgl, y qfnf gb hsgabf hpkp gmgrsqpk qfnpl qsl ókngegl. 

1 RKÓEIRPL 29

1 Nglhsél nimf gb kgy Npvin p qfnp bp plpdabgp: Lfbpdgeqg p Lpbfdóe di timf tp gbguinf Nifl; éb gl mfvge y qigkef ng gnpn, y bp fakp ukpeng; hfkjsg bp rplp ef gl hpkp tfdakg, lief hpkp Mgtfvá Nifl. 2 Yf rfe qfnpl dil csgkzpl tg hkghpkpnf hpkp bp rplp ng di Nifl, fkf hpkp bpl rflpl ng fkf, hbpqp hpkp bpl rflpl ng hbpqp, akferg hpkp bpl ng akferg, tigkkf hpkp bpl ng tigkkf, y dpngkp hpkp bpl ng dpngkp; y hignkpl ng óeirg, hignkpl hkgriflpl, hignkpl egukpl, hignkpl ng nivgklfl rfbfkgl, y qfnp rbplg ng hignkpl hkgriflpl, y hignkpl ng dákdfb ge pasenperip. 3 Pngdál ng glqf, hfk rspeqf qgeuf di pcgrqf ge bp rplp ng di Nifl, yf uspknf ge di qglfkf hpkqirsbpk fkf y hbpqp jsg, pngdál ng qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg tg hkghpkpnf hpkp bp rplp ngb lpeqspkif, tg npnf hpkp bp rplp ng di Nifl: 4 qkgl dib qpbgeqfl ng fkf, ng fkf ng Fcik, y ligqg dib qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp kgciepnp hpkp rsakik bpl hpkgngl ng bpl rplpl; 5 fkf, hsgl, hpkp bpl rflpl ng fkf, y hbpqp hpkp bpl rflpl ng hbpqp, y hpkp qfnp bp fakp ng bpl dpefl ng bfl pkqícirgl. ¿Y jsiée jsigkg tprgk tfy fckgenp vfbseqpkip p Mgtfvá? 

6 Geqfergl bfl mgcgl ng cpdibip, y bfl hkíerihgl ng bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb, mgcgl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl, rfe bfl pndieilqkpnfkgl ng bp tprigenp ngb kgy, fckgrigkfe vfbseqpkipdgeqg. 7 Y nigkfe hpkp gb lgkvirif ng bp rplp ng Nifl rierf dib qpbgeqfl y nigz dib nkprdpl ng fkf, nigz dib qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp, nigrifrtf dib qpbgeqfl ng akferg, y rierf dib qpbgeqfl ng tigkkf. 8 Y qfnf gb jsg qgeíp hignkpl hkgriflpl bpl nif hpkp gb qglfkf ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, ge dpef ng Mgtigb ugklfeiqp. 9 Y lg pbgukó gb hsgabf hfk tpagk rfeqkiasinf vfbseqpkipdgeqg; hfkjsg ng qfnf rfkpzóe fckgrigkfe p Mgtfvá vfbseqpkipdgeqg. 

10 Plidildf lg pbgukó dsrtf gb kgy Npvin, y agenimf p Mgtfvá ngbpeqg ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe; y nimf Npvin: Ageniqf lgpl qú, ft Mgtfvá, Nifl ng Ilkpgb esglqkf hpnkg, nglng gb liubf y tplqp gb liubf. 11 Qsyp gl, ft Mgtfvá, bp dpueicirgerip y gb hfngk, bp ubfkip, bp virqfkip y gb tfefk; hfkjsg qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg glqáe ge bfl rigbfl y ge bp qigkkp lfe qsypl. Qsyf, ft Mgtfvá, gl gb kgief, y qú gkgl gxrgblf lfakg qfnfl. 12 Bpl kijsgzpl y bp ubfkip hkfrgnge ng qi, y qú nfdiepl lfakg qfnf; ge qs dpef glqá bp csgkzp y gb hfngk, y ge qs dpef gb tprgk ukpeng y gb npk hfngk p qfnfl. 13 Ptfkp hsgl, Nifl esglqkf, eflfqkfl pbpapdfl y bfpdfl qs ubfkiflf efdakg. 

14 Hfkjsg ¿jsiée lfy yf, y jsiée gl di hsgabf, hpkp jsg hsniélgdfl fckgrgk vfbseqpkipdgeqg rflpl lgdgmpeqgl? Hsgl qfnf gl qsyf, y ng bf kgriainf ng qs dpef qg npdfl. 15 Hfkjsg eflfqkfl, gxqkpemgkfl y pnvgegnizfl lfdfl ngbpeqg ng qi, rfdf qfnfl esglqkfl hpnkgl; y esglqkfl nípl lfakg bp qigkkp, rspb lfdakp jsg ef nskp. 16 Ft Mgtfvá Nifl esglqkf, qfnp glqp pasenperip jsg tgdfl hkghpkpnf hpkp gnicirpk rplp p qs lpeqf efdakg, ng qs dpef gl, y qfnf gl qsyf. 17 Yf lé, Nifl díf, jsg qú glrsnkiñpl bfl rfkpzfegl, y jsg bp kgrqiqsn qg pukpnp; hfk glf yf rfe kgrqiqsn ng di rfkpzóe vfbseqpkipdgeqg qg tg fckgrinf qfnf glqf, y ptfkp tg vilqf rfe pbgukíp jsg qs hsgabf, kgseinf pjsí ptfkp, tp npnf hpkp qi glhfeqáegpdgeqg. 18 Mgtfvá, Nifl ng Pakptpd, ng Ilppr y ng Ilkpgb esglqkfl hpnkgl, rfelgkvp hgkhgqspdgeqg glqp vfbseqpn ngb rfkpzóe ng qs hsgabf, y gerpdiep ls rfkpzóe p qi. 19 Plidildf np p di timf Lpbfdóe rfkpzóe hgkcgrqf, hpkp jsg uspkng qsl dpenpdigeqfl, qsl qglqidfeifl y qsl glqpqsqfl, y hpkp jsg tpup qfnpl bpl rflpl, y qg gnicijsg bp rplp hpkp bp rspb yf tg tgrtf hkghpkpqivfl. 

20 Nglhsél nimf Npvin p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe: Agengrin ptfkp p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. Geqfergl qfnp bp rfeukguprióe agenimf p Mgtfvá Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, g ierbieáenflg pnfkpkfe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá y ngb kgy. 21 Y lprkicirpkfe vírqidpl p Mgtfvá, y fckgrigkfe p Mgtfvá tfbfrpslqfl pb níp liusigeqg; dib agrgkkfl, dib rpkegkfl, dib rfkngkfl rfe lsl biaprifegl, y dsrtfl lprkicirifl ng hpkqg ng qfnf Ilkpgb. 22 Y rfdigkfe y agaigkfe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá pjsgb níp rfe ukpe ufzf; y nigkfe hfk lgusenp vgz bp ievglqinskp ngb kgief p Lpbfdóe timf ng Npvin, y peqg Mgtfvá bg seuigkfe hfk hkíerihg, y p Lpnfr hfk lprgknfqg. 

23 Y lg lgeqó Lpbfdóe hfk kgy ge gb qkfef ng Mgtfvá ge bsupk ng Npvin ls hpnkg, y csg hkflhgkpnf; y bg fagngrió qfnf Ilkpgb. 24 Y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl y hfngkflfl, y qfnfl bfl timfl ngb kgy Npvin, hkglqpkfe tfdgepmg pb kgy Lpbfdóe. 25 Y Mgtfvá geukpengrió ge gxqkgdf p Lpbfdóe p fmfl ng qfnf Ilkpgb, y bg nif qpb ubfkip ge ls kgief, rspb eieuúe kgy bp qsvf peqgl ng éb ge Ilkpgb. 

Dsgkqg ng Npvin

(1 K. 2.10-12)

26 Plí kgieó Npvin timf ng Ilpí lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb. 27 Gb qigdhf jsg kgieó lfakg Ilkpgb csg rspkgeqp pñfl. Ligqg pñfl kgieó ge Tgakóe, y qkgieqp y qkgl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée. 28 Y dskió ge asgep vgmgz, bbgef ng nípl, ng kijsgzpl y ng ubfkip; y kgieó ge ls bsupk Lpbfdóe ls timf. 29 Y bfl tgrtfl ngb kgy Npvin, hkidgkfl y hflqkgkfl, glqáe glrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bpl rkóeirpl ng Lpdsgb vingeqg, ge bpl rkóeirpl ngb hkfcgqp Epqáe, y ge bpl rkóeirpl ng Upn vingeqg, 30 rfe qfnf bf kgbpqivf p ls kgiepnf, y ls hfngk, y bfl qigdhfl jsg hplpkfe lfakg éb, y lfakg Ilkpgb y lfakg qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng pjsgbbpl qigkkpl.

Lgusenf biakf ng Rkóeirpl 



Lpbfdóe hing lpainskíp

2 Rkóeirpl 1
(1 K. 3.3-15)

1 Lpbfdóe timf ng Npvin csg pcikdpnf ge ls kgief, y Mgtfvá ls Nifl glqpap rfe éb, y bf geukpengrió lfakgdpegkp. 
2 Y rfevfró Lpbfdóe p qfnf Ilkpgb, p mgcgl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl, p msgrgl, y p qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng qfnf Ilkpgb, mgcgl ng cpdibipl. 
3 Y csg Lpbfdóe, y rfe éb qfnp glqp plpdabgp, pb bsupk pbqf jsg tpaíp ge Upapóe; hfkjsg pbbí glqpap gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe ng Nifl, jsg Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá tpaíp tgrtf ge gb ngligkqf. 

4 Hgkf Npvin tpaíp qkpínf gb pkrp ng Nifl ng Jsikipq-mgpkid pb bsupk jsg éb bg tpaíp hkghpkpnf; hfkjsg éb bg tpaíp bgvpeqpnf sep qigenp ge Mgkslpbée. 
5 Plidildf gb pbqpk ng akferg jsg tpaíp tgrtf Agzpbggb timf ng Ski, timf ng Tsk, glqpap pbbí ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá, pb rspb csg p rfelsbqpk Lpbfdóe rfe pjsgbbp plpdabgp. 
6 Lsaió, hsgl, Lpbfdóe pbbá ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, pb pbqpk ng akferg jsg glqpap ge gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y fckgrió lfakg éb dib tfbfrpslqfl.
 
7 Y pjsgbbp efrtg phpkgrió Nifl p Lpbfdóe y bg nimf: Híngdg bf jsg jsigkpl jsg yf qg né. 
8 Y Lpbfdóe nimf p Nifl: Qú tpl qgeinf rfe Npvin di hpnkg ukpe dilgkirfknip, y p dí dg tpl hsglqf hfk kgy ge bsupk lsyf. 
9 Rfecíkdglg hsgl, ptfkp, ft Mgtfvá Nifl, qs hpbpakp npnp p Npvin di hpnkg; hfkjsg qú dg tpl hsglqf hfk kgy lfakg se hsgabf esdgkflf rfdf gb hfbvf ng bp qigkkp. 
10 Npdg ptfkp lpainskíp y rigerip, hpkp hkglgeqpkdg ngbpeqg ng glqg hsgabf; hfkjsg ¿jsiée hfnká ufagkepk p glqg qs hsgabf qpe ukpeng? 
11 Y nimf Nifl p Lpbfdóe: Hfk rspeqf tsaf glf ge qs rfkpzóe, y ef hgnilqg kijsgzpl, aigegl f ubfkip, ei bp vinp ng bfl jsg qg jsigkge dpb, ei hgnilqg dsrtfl nípl, lief jsg tpl hgninf hpkp qi lpainskíp y rigerip hpkp ufagkepk p di hsgabf, lfakg gb rspb qg tg hsglqf hfk kgy, 
12 lpainskíp y rigerip qg lfe npnpl; y qpdaiée qg npké kijsgzpl, aigegl y ubfkip, rfdf eserp qsvigkfe bfl kgygl jsg tpe linf peqgl ng qi, ei qgenkáe bfl jsg vgeupe nglhsél ng qi. 
13 Y nglng gb bsupk pbqf jsg glqpap ge Upapóe, ngbpeqg ngb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, vfbvió Lpbfdóe p Mgkslpbée, y kgieó lfakg Ilkpgb. 



Lpbfdóe rfdgkrip ge rpapbbfl y ge rpkkfl
(1 K. 10.26-29; 2 Rk. 9:25-28)

14 Y mseqó Lpbfdóe rpkkfl y ugeqg ng p rpapbbf; y qsvf dib rspqkfrigeqfl rpkkfl y nfrg dib miegqgl, bfl rspbgl hslf ge bpl risnpngl ng bfl rpkkfl y rfe gb kgy ge Mgkslpbée. 
15 Y prsdsbó gb kgy hbpqp y fkf ge Mgkslpbée rfdf hignkpl, y rgnkf rfdf rpakptiufl ng bp Lgcgbp ge pasenperip. 
16 Y bfl dgkrpngkgl ngb kgy rfdhkpape hfk rfeqkpqf rpapbbfl y bigezfl ciefl ng Guihqf hpkp Lpbfdóe. 
17 Y lsaípe y rfdhkpape ge Guihqf se rpkkf hfk lgilrigeqpl higzpl ng hbpqp, y se rpapbbf hfk rigeqf riersgeqp; y plí rfdhkpape hfk dgnif ng gbbfl hpkp qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bfl tgqgfl, y hpkp bfl kgygl ng Likip. 



Hprqf ng Lpbfdóe rfe Tikpd

2 Rkóeirpl 2
(1 K. 5.1-18; 7.13-14)

1 Ngqgkdieó, hsgl, Lpbfdóe gnicirpk rplp pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá, y rplp hpkp ls kgief. 
2 Y ngliueó Lpbfdóe lgqgeqp dib tfdakgl jsg bbgvplge rpkupl, y frtgeqp dib tfdakgl jsg rfkqplge ge bfl dfeqgl, y qkgl dib lgilrigeqfl jsg bfl viuibplge. 

3 Y gevió p ngrik Lpbfdóe p Tikpd kgy ng Qikf: Tpz rfediuf rfdf tirilqg rfe Npvin di hpnkg, geviáenfbg rgnkfl hpkp jsg gnicirpkp hpkp lí rplp ge jsg dfkplg. 
4 Tg pjsí, yf qgeuf jsg gnicirpk rplp pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá di Nifl, hpkp rfelpukáklgbp, hpkp jsgdpk ierigelf pkfdáqirf ngbpeqg ng éb, y hpkp bp rfbfrprióe rfeqiesp ng bfl hpegl ng bp hkfhflirióe, y hpkp tfbfrpslqfl p dpñpep y qpkng, ge bfl nípl ng kghflf, esgvpl bsepl, y cglqivinpngl ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl; bf rspb tp ng lgk hgkhgqsf ge Ilkpgb. 
5 Y bp rplp jsg qgeuf jsg gnicirpk, tp ng lgk ukpeng; hfkjsg gb Nifl esglqkf gl ukpeng lfakg qfnfl bfl niflgl. 

6 Dpl, ¿jsiée lgká rphpz ng gnicirpkbg rplp, ligenf jsg bfl rigbfl y bfl rigbfl ng bfl rigbfl ef hsgnge rfeqgegkbf? ¿Jsiée, hsgl, lfy yf hpkp jsg bg gnicijsg rplp, lief qpe lóbf hpkp jsgdpk ierigelf ngbpeqg ng éb? 
7 Gevípdg, hsgl, ptfkp se tfdakg táaib jsg lghp qkpapmpk ge fkf, ge hbpqp, ge akferg, ge tigkkf, ge húkhskp, ge ukpep y ge pzsb, y jsg lghp glrsbhik rfe bfl dpglqkfl jsg glqáe rfediuf ge Msná y ge Mgkslpbée, bfl rspbgl nilhslf di hpnkg. 
8 Gevípdg qpdaiée dpngkp ngb Bíapef: rgnkf, rihkél y láenpbf; hfkjsg yf lé jsg qsl ligkvfl lpage rfkqpk dpngkp ge gb Bíapef; y tg pjsí, dil ligkvfl ikáe rfe bfl qsyfl, 
9 hpkp jsg dg hkghpkge dsrtp dpngkp, hfkjsg bp rplp jsg qgeuf jsg gnicirpk tp ng lgk ukpeng y hfkqgeqflp. 
10 Y tg pjsí, hpkp bfl qkpapmpnfkgl qsl ligkvfl, rfkqpnfkgl ng dpngkp, tg npnf vgieqg dib rfkfl ng qkiuf ge ukpef, vgieqg dib rfkfl ng rgapnp, vgieqg dib apqfl ng vief, y vgieqg dib apqfl ng prgiqg. 

11 Geqfergl Tikpd kgy ng Qikf kglhfenió hfk glrkiqf jsg gevió p Lpbfdóe: Hfkjsg Mgtfvá pdó p ls hsgabf, qg tp hsglqf hfk kgy lfakg gbbfl. 
12 Pngdál ngríp Tikpd: Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, jsg tizf bfl rigbfl y bp qigkkp, y jsg nif pb kgy Npvin se timf lpaif, geqgeninf, rsgknf y hksngeqg, jsg gnicijsg rplp p Mgtfvá, y rplp hpkp ls kgief. 
13 Yf, hsgl, qg tg gevipnf se tfdakg táaib y geqgeninf, Tikpd-pai,  
14 timf ng sep dsmgk ng bpl timpl ng Npe, dpl ls hpnkg csg ng Qikf; gb rspb lpag qkpapmpk ge fkf, hbpqp, akferg y tigkkf, ge hignkp y ge dpngkp, ge Húkhskp y ge pzsb, ge bief y ge rpkdglí; plidildf lpag glrsbhik qfnp rbplg ng ciuskpl, y lprpk qfnp cfkdp ng nilgñf jsg lg bg hinp, rfe qsl tfdakgl hgkiqfl, y rfe bfl ng di lgñfk Npvin qs hpnkg. 
15 Ptfkp, hsgl, gevíg di lgñfk p lsl ligkvfl gb qkiuf y rgapnp, y prgiqg y vief, jsg tp nirtf; 
16 y eflfqkfl rfkqpkgdfl ge gb Bíapef bp dpngkp jsg egrgliqgl, y qg bp qkpgkgdfl ge apblpl hfk gb dpk tplqp Mfhg, y qú bp tpkál bbgvpk tplqp Mgkslpbée. 

17 Y rfeqó Lpbfdóe qfnfl bfl tfdakgl gxqkpemgkfl jsg tpaíp ge bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, nglhsél ng tpagkbfl yp rfeqpnf Npvin ls hpnkg, y csgkfe tpbbpnfl rigeqf riersgeqp y qkgl dib lgilrigeqfl. 
18 Y lgñpbó ng gbbfl lgqgeqp dib hpkp bbgvpk rpkupl, y frtgeqp dib rpeqgkfl ge bp dfeqpñp, y qkgl dib lgilrigeqfl hfk rphpqprgl hpkp tprgk qkpapmpk pb hsgabf. 



Lpbfdóe gnicirp gb qgdhbf

2 Rkóeirpl 3
(1 K. 6.1-38)

1 Rfdgezó Lpbfdóe p gnicirpk bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ge Mgkslpbée, ge gb dfeqg Dfkipt, jsg tpaíp linf dflqkpnf p Npvin ls hpnkg, ge gb bsupk jsg Npvin tpaíp hkghpkpnf ge bp gkp ng Fkeáe mgaslgf. 
2 Y rfdgezó p gnicirpk ge gb dgl lgusenf, p bfl nfl nípl ngb dgl, ge gb rspkqf pñf ng ls kgiepnf. 
3 Glqpl lfe bpl dgninpl jsg nif Lpbfdóe p bfl ridigeqfl ng bp rplp ng Nifl. Bp hkidgkp, bp bfeuiqsn, ng lglgeqp rfnfl, y bp pertskp ng vgieqg rfnfl. 

4 Gb hókqirf jsg glqpap pb ckgeqg ngb gnicirif gkp ng vgieqg rfnfl ng bpkuf, iuspb pb pertf ng bp rplp, y ls pbqskp ng rigeqf vgieqg rfnfl; y bf rsakió hfk ngeqkf ng fkf hskf. 
5 Y qgrtó gb rsgkhf dpyfk ngb gnicirif rfe dpngkp ng rihkél, bp rspb rsakió ng fkf cief, g tizf kgpbzpk ge gbbp hpbdgkpl y rpngepl. 
6 Rsakió qpdaiée bp rplp ng hignkpl hkgriflpl hpkp fkepdgeqf; y gb fkf gkp fkf ng Hpkvpid. 
7 Plí jsg rsakió bp rplp, lsl viupl, lsl sdakpbgl, lsl hpkgngl y lsl hsgkqpl, rfe fkf; y glrsbhió jsgksaiegl ge bpl hpkgngl. 

8 Tizf plidildf gb bsupk lpeqílidf, rsyp bfeuiqsn gkp ng vgieqg rfnfl lguúe gb pertf ngb ckgeqg ng bp rplp, y ls pertskp ng vgieqg rfnfl; y bf rsakió ng fkf cief jsg plrgeníp p lgilrigeqfl qpbgeqfl. 
9 Y gb hglf ng bfl rbpvfl gkp ng sef tplqp riersgeqp lirbfl ng fkf.  Rsakió qpdaiée ng fkf bfl phflgeqfl. 
10 Y ngeqkf ngb bsupk lpeqílidf tizf nfl jsgksaiegl ng dpngkp, bfl rspbgl csgkfe rsaigkqfl ng fkf. 
11 Bp bfeuiqsn ng bpl pbpl ng bfl jsgksaiegl gkp ng vgieqg rfnfl; hfkjsg sep pbp gkp ng rierf rfnfl, bp rspb bbgupap tplqp bp hpkgn ng bp rplp, y bp fqkp ng rierf rfnfl, bp rspb qfrpap gb pbp ngb fqkf jsgksaíe. 
12 Ng bp dildp dpegkp sep pbp ngb fqkf jsgksaíe gkp ng rierf rfnfl, bp rspb bbgupap tplqp bp hpkgn ng bp rplp, y bp fqkp gkp ng rierf rfnfl, jsg qfrpap gb pbp ngb fqkf jsgksaíe. 
13 Glqfl jsgksaiegl qgeípe bpl pbpl gxqgeninpl hfk vgieqg rfnfl, y glqpape ge hig rfe bfl kflqkfl tprip bp rplp. 
14 Tizf qpdaiée gb vgbf ng pzsb, húkhskp, rpkdglí y bief, g tizf kgpbzpk jsgksaiegl ge éb. 



Bpl nfl rfbsdepl
(1 K. 7.15-22)

15 Ngbpeqg ng bp rplp tizf nfl rfbsdepl ng qkgieqp y rierf rfnfl ng pbqskp rpnp sep, rfe lsl rphiqgbgl geridp, ng rierf rfnfl. 
16 Tizf plidildf rpngepl ge gb lpeqspkif, y bpl hslf lfakg bfl rphiqgbgl ng bpl rfbsdepl; g tizf rige ukpepnpl, bpl rspbgl hslf ge bpl rpngepl. 
17 Y rfbfró bpl rfbsdepl ngbpeqg ngb qgdhbf, sep p bp dpef ngkgrtp, y fqkp p bp izjsigknp; y p bp ng bp dpef ngkgrtp bbpdó Mpjsíe, y p bp ng bp izjsigknp, Afpz. 



Dfaibipkif ngb qgdhbf

2 Rkóeirpl 4
(1 K. 7.23-51)

1 Tizf pngdál se pbqpk ng akferg ng vgieqg rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn, vgieqg rfnfl ng pertskp, y nigz rfnfl ng pbqskp. 
2 Qpdaiée tizf se dpk ng csenirióe, gb rspb qgeíp nigz rfnfl ng se afkng pb fqkf, geqgkpdgeqg kgnfenf; ls pbqskp gkp ng rierf rfnfl, y se rfknóe ng qkgieqp rfnfl ng bpkuf bf rgñíp pbkgngnfk. 
3 Y ngapmf ngb dpk tpaíp ciuskpl ng rpbpapzpl jsg bf rikrsenpape, nigz ge rpnp rfnf pbkgngnfk; gkpe nfl tibgkpl ng rpbpapzpl cseninpl mseqpdgeqg rfe gb dpk. 
4 Glqpap plgeqpnf lfakg nfrg asgygl, qkgl ng bfl rspbgl dikpape pb efkqg, qkgl pb frringeqg, qkgl pb lsk, y qkgl pb fkigeqg; y gb dpk nglrpelpap lfakg gbbfl, y bpl perpl ng gbbfl glqpape tprip pngeqkf. 
5 Y qgeíp ng uksglf se hpbdf dgefk, y gb afkng qgeíp bp cfkdp ngb afkng ng se rábiz, f ng sep cbfk ng bil. Y bg rpaípe qkgl dib apqfl. 

6 Tizf qpdaiée nigz csgeqgl, y hslf rierf p bp ngkgrtp y rierf p bp izjsigknp, hpkp bpvpk y bidhipk ge gbbpl bf jsg lg fckgríp ge tfbfrpslqf; hgkf gb dpk gkp hpkp jsg bfl lprgknfqgl lg bpvpkpe ge éb. 
7 Tizf plidildf nigz rpengbgkfl ng fkf lguúe ls cfkdp, bfl rspbgl hslf ge gb qgdhbf, rierf p bp ngkgrtp y rierf p bp izjsigknp. 
8 Pngdál tizf nigz dglpl y bpl hslf ge gb qgdhbf, rierf p bp ngkgrtp y rierf p bp izjsigknp; iuspbdgeqg tizf rige qpzfegl ng fkf. 

9 Qpdaiée tizf gb pqkif ng bfl lprgknfqgl, y gb ukpe pqkif, y bpl hfkqpnpl ngb pqkif, y rsakió ng akferg bpl hsgkqpl ng gbbpl. 
10 Y rfbfró gb dpk pb bpnf ngkgrtf, tprip gb lskglqg ng bp rplp. 
11 Tikpd qpdaiée tizf rpbngkfl, y hpbpl, y qpzfegl; y prpaó Tikpd bp fakp jsg tpríp pb kgy Lpbfdóe hpkp bp rplp ng Nifl. 

12 Nfl rfbsdepl, y bfl rfknfegl, bfl rphiqgbgl lfakg bpl rpagzpl ng bpl nfl rfbsdepl, y nfl kgngl hpkp rsakik bpl nfl glcgkpl ng bfl rphiqgbgl jsg glqpape geridp ng bpl rfbsdepl; 
13 rspqkfrigeqpl ukpepnpl ge bpl nfl kgngl, nfl tibgkpl ng ukpepnpl ge rpnp kgn, hpkp jsg rsakiglge bpl nfl glcgkpl ng bfl rphiqgbgl jsg glqpape geridp ng bpl rfbsdepl. 
14 Tizf qpdaiée bpl aplpl, lfakg bpl rspbgl rfbfró bpl csgeqgl; 
15 se dpk, y bfl nfrg asgygl ngapmf ng éb; 
16 y rpbngkfl, hpbpl y upkcifl; ng akferg dsy cief tizf qfnfl lsl gelgkgl Tikpd-pai pb kgy Lpbfdóe hpkp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
17 Bfl csenió gb kgy ge bfl bbpefl ngb Mfknáe, ge qigkkp pkribbflp, geqkg Lsrfq y Lgkgnpqp. 
18 Y Lpbfdóe tizf qfnfl glqfl gelgkgl ge eúdgkf qpe ukpeng, jsg ef hsnf lpagklg gb hglf ngb akferg. 
19 Plí tizf Lpbfdóe qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl hpkp bp rplp ng Nifl, y gb pbqpk ng fkf, y bpl dglpl lfakg bpl rspbgl lg hfeípe bfl hpegl ng bp hkfhflirióe; 
20 plidildf bfl rpengbgkfl y lsl bádhpkpl, ng fkf hskf, hpkp jsg bpl gergeniglge ngbpeqg ngb bsupk lpeqílidf rfecfkdg p bp fkngepezp. 

21 Bpl cbfkgl, bpdhpkibbpl y qgepzpl lg tirigkfe ng fkf, ng fkf cieílidf; 
22 qpdaiée bpl nglhpaibpngkpl, bfl bgakibbfl, bpl rsrtpkpl y bfl iergelpkifl gkpe ng fkf hskf. Y ng fkf qpdaiée bp geqkpnp ng bp rplp, lsl hsgkqpl ieqgkifkgl hpkp gb bsupk lpeqílidf, y bpl hsgkqpl ng bp rplp ngb qgdhbf. 



2 Rkóeirpl 5

1 Prpapnp qfnp bp fakp jsg tizf Lpbfdóe hpkp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, dgqió Lpbfdóe bpl rflpl jsg Npvin ls hpnkg tpaíp ngnirpnf; y hslf bp hbpqp, y gb fkf, y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl, ge bfl qglfkfl ng bp rplp ng Nifl. 



Lpbfdóe qkplbpnp gb pkrp ngb qgdhbf
(1 K. 8.1-11)

2 Geqfergl Lpbfdóe kgseió ge Mgkslpbée p bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb y p qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng bpl qkiasl, bfl mgcgl ng bpl cpdibipl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg qkpmglge gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá ng bp risnpn ng Npvin, jsg gl Life. 
3 Y lg rfeukgupkfe rfe gb kgy qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng Ilkpgb, hpkp bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ngb dgl léhqidf. 
4 Vieigkfe, hsgl, qfnfl bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb, y bfl bgviqpl qfdpkfe gb pkrp; 
5 y bbgvpkfe gb pkrp, y gb qpagkeársbf ng kgseióe, y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ngb lpeqspkif jsg glqpape ge gb qpagkeársbf; bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl bfl bbgvpkfe. 

6 Y gb kgy Lpbfdóe, y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb jsg lg tpaíp kgseinf rfe éb ngbpeqg ngb pkrp, lprkicirpkfe fvgmpl y asgygl, jsg hfk lgk qpeqfl ef lg hsnigkfe rfeqpk ei esdgkpk. 
7 Y bfl lprgknfqgl dgqigkfe gb pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá ge ls bsupk, ge gb lpeqspkif ng bp rplp, ge gb bsupk lpeqílidf, apmf bpl pbpl ng bfl jsgksaiegl; 
8 hsgl bfl jsgksaiegl gxqgenípe bpl pbpl lfakg gb bsupk ngb pkrp, y bfl jsgksaiegl rsakípe hfk geridp plí gb pkrp rfdf lsl apkkpl. 
9 G tirigkfe lpbik bpl apkkpl, ng dfnf jsg lg viglge bpl rpagzpl ng bpl apkkpl ngb pkrp ngbpeqg gb bsupk lpeqílidf, dpl ef lg vgípe nglng csgkp; y pbbí glqáe tplqp tfy. 

10 Ge gb pkrp ef tpaíp dál jsg bpl nfl qpabpl jsg Dfilél tpaíp hsglqf ge Tfkga, rfe bpl rspbgl Mgtfvá tpaíp tgrtf hprqf rfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rspenf lpbigkfe ng Guihqf. 

11 Y rspenf bfl lprgknfqgl lpbigkfe ngb lpeqspkif (hfkjsg qfnfl bfl lprgknfqgl jsg lg tpbbpkfe tpaípe linf lpeqicirpnfl, y ef uspknpape lsl qskefl; 
12 y bfl bgviqpl rpeqfkgl, qfnfl bfl ng Plpc, bfl ng Tgdáe y bfl ng Mgnsqúe, mseqpdgeqg rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, vglqinfl ng bief cief, glqpape rfe rídapbfl y lpbqgkifl y pkhpl pb fkigeqg ngb pbqpk; y rfe gbbfl rigeqf vgieqg lprgknfqgl jsg qfrpape qkfdhgqpl),
13 rspenf lfepape, hsgl, bpl qkfdhgqpl, y rpeqpape qfnfl p sep, hpkp pbpapk y npk ukpripl p Mgtfvá, y p dgninp jsg pbzpape bp vfz rfe qkfdhgqpl y rídapbfl y fqkfl ielqksdgeqfl ng dúlirp, y pbpapape p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Hfkjsg éb gl asgef, hfkjsg ls dilgkirfknip gl hpkp ligdhkg; geqfergl bp rplp lg bbgeó ng sep esag, bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
14 Y ef hfnípe bfl lprgknfqgl glqpk pbbí hpkp dieilqkpk, hfk rpslp ng bp esag; hfkjsg bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá tpaíp bbgepnf bp rplp ng Nifl. 



Ngnirprióe ngb qgdhbf

2 Rkóeirpl 6
(1 K. 8.12-66)

1 Geqfergl nimf Lpbfdóe: Mgtfvá tp nirtf jsg éb tpaiqpkíp ge bp flrskinpn. 
2 Yf, hsgl, tg gnicirpnf sep rplp ng dfkpnp hpkp qi, y sep tpaiqprióe ge jsg dfkgl hpkp ligdhkg. 
3 Y vfbvigenf gb kgy ls kflqkf, agenimf p qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb; y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb glqpap ge hig. 

4 Y éb nimf: Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, jsige rfe ls dpef tp rsdhbinf bf jsg hkfdgqió rfe ls afrp p Npvin di hpnkg, nirigenf: 
5 Nglng gb níp jsg lpjsé p di hsgabf ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, eieusep risnpn tg gbguinf ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb hpkp gnicirpk rplp nfeng glqsviglg di efdakg, ei tg glrfuinf vpkóe jsg csglg hkíerihg lfakg di hsgabf Ilkpgb. 
6 Dál p Mgkslpbée tg gbguinf hpkp jsg ge gbbp glqé di efdakg, y p Npvin tg gbguinf hpkp jsg glqé lfakg di hsgabf Ilkpgb. 

7 Y Npvin di hpnkg qsvf ge ls rfkpzóe gnicirpk rplp pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 
8 Dpl Mgtfvá nimf p Npvin di hpnkg: Kglhgrqf p tpagk qgeinf ge qs rfkpzóe nglgf ng gnicirpk rplp p di efdakg, aige tpl tgrtf ge tpagk qgeinf glqf ge qs rfkpzóe. 
9 Hgkf qú ef gnicirpkál bp rplp, lief qs timf jsg lpbnká ng qsl bfdfl, éb gnicirpká rplp p di efdakg. 
10 Y Mgtfvá tp rsdhbinf ls hpbpakp jsg tpaíp nirtf, hsgl dg bgvpeqé yf ge bsupk ng Npvin di hpnkg, y dg tg lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef ng Ilkpgb, rfdf Mgtfvá tpaíp nirtf, y tg gnicirpnf rplp pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 
11 Y ge gbbp tg hsglqf gb pkrp, ge bp rspb glqá gb hprqf ng Mgtfvá jsg rgbgakó rfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

12 Lg hslf bsguf Lpbfdóe ngbpeqg ngb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá, ge hkglgerip ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb, y gxqgenió lsl dpefl. 
13 Hfkjsg Lpbfdóe tpaíp tgrtf se glqkpnf ng akferg ng rierf rfnfl ng bpkuf, ng rierf rfnfl ng pertf y ng pbqskp ng qkgl rfnfl, y bf tpaíp hsglqf ge dgnif ngb pqkif; y lg hslf lfakg éb, lg pkkfnibbó ngbpeqg ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb, y gxqgenió lsl dpefl pb rigbf, y nimf:
14 Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, ef tpy Nifl lgdgmpeqg p qi ge gb rigbf ei ge bp qigkkp, jsg uspknpl gb hprqf y bp dilgkirfknip rfe qsl ligkvfl jsg rpdiepe ngbpeqg ng qi ng qfnf ls rfkpzóe; 
15 jsg tpl uspknpnf p qs ligkvf Npvin di hpnkg bf jsg bg hkfdgqilqg; qú bf nimilqg rfe qs afrp, y rfe qs dpef bf tpl rsdhbinf, rfdf lg vg ge glqg níp. 

16 Ptfkp, hsgl, Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, rsdhbg p qs ligkvf Npvin di hpnkg bf jsg bg tpl hkfdgqinf, nirigenf: Ef cpbqpká ng qi vpkóe ngbpeqg ng dí, jsg lg ligeqg ge gb qkfef ng Ilkpgb, rfe qpb jsg qsl timfl uspknge ls rpdief, penpenf ge di bgy, rfdf qú tpl penpnf ngbpeqg ng dí. 
17 Ptfkp, hsgl, ft Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, rúdhbplg qs hpbpakp jsg nimilqg p qs ligkvf Npvin. 
18 Dpl ¿gl vgknpn jsg Nifl tpaiqpká rfe gb tfdakg ge bp qigkkp? Tg pjsí, bfl rigbfl y bfl rigbfl ng bfl rigbfl ef qg hsgnge rfeqgegk; ¿rsáeqf dgefl glqp rplp jsg tg gnicirpnf? 

19 Dpl qú dikpkál p bp fkprióe ng qs ligkvf, y p ls ksguf, ft Mgtfvá Nifl díf, hpkp fík gb rbpdfk y bp fkprióe rfe jsg qs ligkvf fkp ngbpeqg ng qi. 
20 Jsg qsl fmfl glqée paigkqfl lfakg glqp rplp ng níp y ng efrtg, lfakg gb bsupk ngb rspb nimilqg: Di efdakg glqpká pbbí; jsg fiupl bp fkprióe rfe jsg qs ligkvf fkp ge glqg bsupk. 

21 Plidildf jsg fiupl gb ksguf ng qs ligkvf, y ng qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, rspenf ge glqg bsupk tirigkge fkprióe, jsg qú fikál nglng bfl rigbfl, nglng gb bsupk ng qs dfkpnp; jsg fiupl y hgknfegl. 
22 Li pbusef hgrpkg rfeqkp ls hkómidf, y lg bg gxiuigkg mskpdgeqf, y vieigkg p mskpk peqg qs pbqpk ge glqp rplp, 

23 qs fikál nglng bfl rigbfl, y prqspkál, y mszupkál p qsl ligkvfl, npenf bp hpup pb idhíf, tprigenf kgrpgk ls hkfrgngk lfakg ls rpagzp, y mslqicirpenf pb mslqf pb npkbg rfecfkdg p ls mslqirip. 
24 Li qs hsgabf Ilkpgb csgkg ngkkfqpnf ngbpeqg ngb gegdiuf hfk tpagk hkgvpkirpnf rfeqkp qi, y lg rfevikqigkg, y rfecglpkg qs efdakg, y kfupkg ngbpeqg qi ge glqp rplp, 
25 qú fikál nglng bfl rigbfl, y hgknfepkál gb hgrpnf ng qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, y bgl tpkál vfbvgk p bp qigkkp jsg nilqg p gbbfl y p lsl hpnkgl. 

26 Li bfl rigbfl lg rgkkpkge y ef tsaigkg bbsvipl, hfk tpagk hgrpnf rfeqkp qi, li fkpkge p qi tprip glqg bsupk, y rfecglpkge qs efdakg, y lg rfevikqigkge ng lsl hgrpnfl, rspenf bfl pcbiuigkgl, 
27 qú bfl fikál ge bfl rigbfl, y hgknfepkál gb hgrpnf ng qsl ligkvfl y ng qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, y bgl gelgñpkál gb asge rpdief hpkp jsg penge ge éb, y npkál bbsvip lfakg qs qigkkp, jsg nilqg hfk tgkgnpn p qs hsgabf. 
28 Li tsaigkg tpdakg ge bp qigkkp, f li tsaigkg hglqibgerip, li tsaigkg qizferibbf f pñsabf, bpeuflqp f hsbuóe; f li bfl liqipkge lsl gegdiufl ge bp qigkkp ge nfeng dfkge; rspbjsigkp hbpup f gecgkdgnpn jsg lgp; 

29 qfnp fkprióe y qfnf ksguf jsg tirigkg rspbjsigk tfdakg, f qfnf qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, rspbjsigkp jsg rfefrigkg ls bbpup y ls nfbfk ge ls rfkpzóe, li gxqgenigkg lsl dpefl tprip glqp rplp, 
30 qú fikál nglng bfl rigbfl, nglng gb bsupk ng qs dfkpnp, y hgknfepkál, y npkál p rpnp sef rfecfkdg p lsl rpdiefl, tpaigenf rfefrinf ls rfkpzóe; hfkjsg lóbf qú rfefrgl gb rfkpzóe ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl; 
31 hpkp jsg qg qgdpe y penge ge qsl rpdiefl, qfnfl bfl nípl jsg vivigkge lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp jsg qú nilqg p esglqkfl hpnkgl. 

32 Y qpdaiée pb gxqkpemgkf jsg ef csgkg ng qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, jsg tsaigkg vgeinf ng bgmpepl qigkkpl p rpslp ng qs ukpe efdakg y ng qs dpef hfngkflp, y ng qs akpzf gxqgeninf, li vieigkg y fkpkg tprip glqp rplp, 
33 qú fikál nglng bfl rigbfl, nglng gb bsupk ng qs dfkpnp, y tpkál rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl hfk bpl rspbgl tsaigkg rbpdpnf p qi gb gxqkpemgkf; hpkp jsg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp rfefzrpe qs efdakg, y qg qgdpe plí rfdf qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, y lghpe jsg qs efdakg gl ievfrpnf lfakg glqp rplp jsg yf tg gnicirpnf. 

34 Li qs hsgabf lpbigkg p bp usgkkp rfeqkp lsl gegdiufl hfk gb rpdief jsg qú bgl gevipkgl, y fkpkge p qi tprip glqp risnpn jsg qú gbguilqg, tprip bp rplp jsg tg gnicirpnf p qs efdakg, 
35 qú fikál nglng bfl rigbfl ls fkprióe y ls ksguf, y pdhpkpkál ls rpslp. 
36 Li hgrpkge rfeqkp qi (hsgl ef tpy tfdakg jsg ef hgjsg), y qg gefmpkgl rfeqkp gbbfl, y bfl geqkgupkgl ngbpeqg ng lsl gegdiufl, hpkp jsg bfl jsg bfl qfdpkge bfl bbgvge rpsqivfl p qigkkp ng gegdiufl, bgmfl f rgkrp, 
37 y gbbfl vfbvigkge ge lí ge bp qigkkp nfeng csgkge bbgvpnfl rpsqivfl; li lg rfevikqigkge, y fkpkge p qi ge bp qigkkp ng ls rpsqivinpn, y nimgkge: Hgrpdfl, tgdfl tgrtf ieirspdgeqg, idhípdgeqg tgdfl tgrtf; 

38 li lg rfevikqigkge p qi ng qfnf ls rfkpzóe y ng qfnp ls pbdp ge bp qigkkp ng ls rpsqivinpn, nfeng bfl tsaigkge bbgvpnf rpsqivfl, y fkpkge tprip bp qigkkp jsg qú nilqg p lsl hpnkgl, tprip bp risnpn jsg qú gbguilqg, y tprip bp rplp jsg tg gnicirpnf p qs efdakg; 
39  qú fikál nglng bfl rigbfl, nglng gb bsupk ng qs dfkpnp, ls fkprióe y ls ksguf, y pdhpkpkál ls rpslp, y hgknfepkál p qs hsgabf jsg hgró rfeqkp qi. 

40 Ptfkp, hsgl, ft Nifl díf, qg ksguf jsg glqée paigkqfl qsl fmfl y pqgeqfl qsl fínfl p bp fkprióe ge glqg bsupk. 
41 Ft Mgtfvá Nifl, bgváeqpqg ptfkp hpkp tpaiqpk ge qs kghflf, qú y gb pkrp ng qs hfngk; ft Mgtfvá Nifl, lgpe vglqinfl ng lpbvprióe qsl lprgknfqgl, y qsl lpeqfl lg kgufrimge ge qs afenpn. 
42 Mgtfvá Nifl, ef kgrtprgl p qs seuinf; prséknpqg ng qsl dilgkirfknipl hpkp rfe Npvin qs ligkvf. 



2 Rkóeirpl 7

1 Rspenf Lpbfdóe prpaó ng fkpk, nglrgenió csguf ng bfl rigbfl, y rfelsdió gb tfbfrpslqf y bpl vírqidpl; y bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá bbgeó bp rplp. 
2 Y ef hfnípe geqkpk bfl lprgknfqgl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, hfkjsg bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá tpaíp bbgepnf bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

3 Rspenf vigkfe qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb nglrgengk gb csguf y bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá lfakg bp rplp, lg hflqkpkfe lfakg lsl kflqkfl ge gb hpvidgeqf y pnfkpkfe, y pbpapkfe p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Hfkjsg éb gl asgef, y ls dilgkirfknip gl hpkp ligdhkg. 
4 Geqfergl gb kgy y qfnf gb hsgabf lprkicirpkfe vírqidpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 
5 Y fckgrió gb kgy Lpbfdóe ge lprkicirif vgieqinól dib asgygl, y rigeqf vgieqg dib fvgmpl; y plí ngnirpkfe bp rplp ng Nifl gb kgy y qfnf gb hsgabf. 

6 Y bfl lprgknfqgl nglgdhgñpape ls dieilqgkif; qpdaiée bfl bgviqpl, rfe bfl ielqksdgeqfl ng dúlirp ng Mgtfvá, bfl rspbgl tpaíp tgrtf gb kgy Npvin hpkp pbpapk p Mgtfvá hfkjsg ls dilgkirfknip gl hpkp ligdhkg, rspenf Npvin pbpapap hfk dgnif ng gbbfl. Plidildf bfl lprgknfqgl qfrpape qkfdhgqpl ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, y qfnf Ilkpgb glqpap ge hig. 
7 Qpdaiée Lpbfdóe rfelpukó bp hpkqg rgeqkpb ngb pqkif jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, hfk rspeqf tpaíp fckgrinf pbbí bfl tfbfrpslqfl, y bp ukflskp ng bpl fckgenpl ng hpz; hfkjsg ge gb pbqpk ng akferg jsg Lpbfdóe tpaíp tgrtf ef hfnípe rpagk bfl tfbfrpslqfl, bpl fckgenpl y bpl ukflskpl. 

8 Geqfergl tizf Lpbfdóe ciglqp ligqg nípl, y rfe éb qfnf Ilkpgb, sep ukpe rfeukguprióe, nglng bp geqkpnp ng Tpdpq tplqp gb pkkfyf ng Guihqf. 
9 Pb frqpvf níp tirigkfe lfbgdeg plpdabgp, hfkjsg tpaípe tgrtf bp ngnirprióe ngb pbqpk ge ligqg nípl, y tpaípe rgbgakpnf bp ciglqp lfbgdeg hfk ligqg nípl. 
10 Y p bfl vgieqiqkél nípl ngb dgl léhqidf gevió pb hsgabf p lsl tfupkgl, pbgukgl y ufzflfl ng rfkpzóe hfk bfl agegcirifl jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp tgrtf p Npvin y p Lpbfdóe, y p ls hsgabf Ilkpgb. 



Hprqf ng Nifl rfe Lpbfdóe
(1 K. 9.1-9)

11 Qgkdieó, hsgl, Lpbfdóe bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bp rplp ngb kgy; y qfnf bf jsg Lpbfdóe lg hkfhslf tprgk ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y ge ls hkfhip rplp, csg hkflhgkpnf. 
12 Y phpkgrió Mgtfvá p Lpbfdóe ng efrtg, y bg nimf: Yf tg fínf qs fkprióe, y tg gbguinf hpkp dí glqg bsupk hfk rplp ng lprkicirif. 
13 Li yf rgkkpkg bfl rigbfl hpkp jsg ef tpyp bbsvip, y li dpenpkg p bp bpeuflqp jsg rfelsdp bp qigkkp, f li gevipkg hglqibgerip p di hsgabf; 

14 li lg tsdibbpkg di hsgabf, lfakg gb rspb di efdakg gl ievfrpnf, y fkpkge, y aslrpkge di kflqkf, y lg rfevikqigkge ng lsl dpbfl rpdiefl; geqfergl yf fiké nglng bfl rigbfl, y hgknfepké lsl hgrpnfl, y lpepké ls qigkkp. 
15 Ptfkp glqpkáe paigkqfl dil fmfl y pqgeqfl dil fínfl p bp fkprióe ge glqg bsupk; 
16 hfkjsg ptfkp tg gbguinf y lpeqicirpnf glqp rplp, hpkp jsg glqé ge gbbp di efdakg hpkp ligdhkg; y dil fmfl y di rfkpzóe glqpkáe ptí hpkp ligdhkg. 

17 Y li qú pensvigkgl ngbpeqg ng dí rfdf pensvf Npvin qs hpnkg, g tirigkgl qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg yf qg tg dpenpnf, y uspknpkgl dil glqpqsqfl y dil ngrkgqfl, 
18 yf rfecikdpké gb qkfef ng qs kgief, rfdf hprqé rfe Npvin qs hpnkg, nirigenf: Ef qg cpbqpká vpkóe jsg ufaigkeg ge Ilkpgb. 

19 Dpl li vflfqkfl fl vfbvigkgil, y ngmpkgil dil glqpqsqfl y dpenpdigeqfl jsg tg hsglqf ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl, y csgkgil y likvigkgil p niflgl pmgefl, y bfl pnfkpkgil, 
20 yf fl pkkperpké ng di qigkkp jsg fl tg npnf; y glqp rplp jsg tg lpeqicirpnf p di efdakg, yf bp pkkfmpké ng di hkglgerip, y bp hfenké hfk askbp y glrpkeif ng qfnfl bfl hsgabfl. 
21 Y glqp rplp jsg gl qpe gxrgblp, lgká glhpeqf p qfnf gb jsg hplpkg, y niká: ¿Hfk jsé tp tgrtf plí Mgtfvá p glqp qigkkp y p glqp rplp? 
22 Y lg kglhfengká: Hfk rspeqf ngmpkfe p Mgtfvá Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, jsg bfl lpró ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y tpe pakpzpnf p niflgl pmgefl, y bfl pnfkpkfe y likvigkfe; hfk glf éb tp qkpínf qfnf glqg dpb lfakg gbbfl. 



Fqkpl prqivinpngl ng Lpbfdóe

2 Rkóeirpl 8
(1 K. 9.10-28)

1 Nglhsél ng vgieqg pñfl, nskpeqg bfl rspbgl Lpbfdóe tpaíp gnicirpnf bp rplp ng Mgtfvá y ls hkfhip rplp, 
2 kggniciró Lpbfdóe bpl risnpngl jsg Tikpd bg tpaíp npnf, y glqpabgrió ge gbbpl p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 
3 Nglhsél vief Lpbfdóe p Tpdpq ng Lfap, y bp qfdó. 

4 Y gniciró p Qpndfk ge gb ngligkqf, y qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng phkfvilifepdigeqf jsg gniciró ge Tpdpq. 
5 Plidildf kggniciró p Agq-tfkóe bp ng pkkiap y p Agq-tfkóe bp ng papmf, risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl, rfe dskfl, hsgkqpl y apkkpl; 
6 y p Appbpq, y p qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng hkfvilifegl jsg Lpbfdóe qgeíp; qpdaiée qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng bfl rpkkfl y bpl ng bp ugeqg ng p rpapbbf, y qfnf bf jsg Lpbfdóe jsilf gnicirpk ge Mgkslpbée, ge gb Bíapef, y ge qfnp bp qigkkp ng ls nfdieif. 

7 Y p qfnf gb hsgabf jsg tpaíp jsgnpnf ng bfl tgqgfl, pdfkkgfl, cgkgzgfl, tgvgfl y mgaslgfl, jsg ef gkpe ng Ilkpgb, 
8 bfl timfl ng bfl jsg tpaípe jsgnpnf ge bp qigkkp nglhsél ng gbbfl, p bfl rspbgl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ef nglqksygkfe ngb qfnf, tizf Lpbfdóe qkiasqpkifl tplqp tfy. 

9 Hgkf ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ef hslf Lpbfdóe ligkvfl ge ls fakp; hfkjsg gkpe tfdakgl ng usgkkp, y lsl fciripbgl y lsl rphiqpegl, y rfdpenpeqgl ng lsl rpkkfl, y ls ugeqg ng p rpapbbf. 
10 Y qgeíp Lpbfdóe nflrigeqfl riersgeqp ufagkepnfkgl hkierihpbgl, bfl rspbgl dpenpape lfakg pjsgbbp ugeqg. 

11 Y hpló Lpbfdóe p bp timp ng Cpkpóe, ng bp risnpn ng Npvin p bp rplp jsg éb tpaíp gnicirpnf hpkp gbbp; hfkjsg nimf: Di dsmgk ef dfkpká ge bp rplp ng Npvin kgy ng Ilkpgb, hfkjsg pjsgbbpl tpaiqprifegl nfeng tp geqkpnf gb pkrp ng Mgtfvá, lfe lpukpnpl. 

12 Geqfergl fckgrió Lpbfdóe tfbfrpslqfl p Mgtfvá lfakg gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá jsg éb tpaíp gnicirpnf ngbpeqg ngb hókqirf, 
13 hpkp jsg fckgriglge rpnp rflp ge ls níp, rfecfkdg pb dpenpdigeqf ng Dfilél, ge bfl nípl ng kghflf, ge bpl esgvpl bsepl, y ge bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl qkgl vgrgl ge gb pñf, glqf gl, ge bp ciglqp ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp, ge bp ciglqp ng bpl lgdpepl y ge bp ciglqp ng bfl qpagkeársbfl. 

14 Y rfelqiqsyó bfl qskefl ng bfl lprgknfqgl ge lsl fcirifl, rfecfkdg p bf fkngepnf hfk Npvin ls hpnkg, y bfl bgviqpl ge lsl rpkufl, hpkp jsg pbpaplge y dieilqkplge ngbpeqg ng bfl lprgknfqgl, rpnp rflp ge ls níp; plidildf bfl hfkqgkfl hfk ls fknge p rpnp hsgkqp; hfkjsg plí bf tpaíp dpenpnf Npvin, vpkóe ng Nifl. 

15 Y ef lg phpkqpkfe ngb dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy, ge rspeqf p bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl, y bfl qglfkfl, y qfnf egufrif; 
16 hfkjsg qfnp bp fakp ng Lpbfdóe glqpap hkghpkpnp nglng gb níp ge jsg lg hsligkfe bfl ridigeqfl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá tplqp jsg csg qgkdiepnp, tplqp jsg bp rplp ng Mgtfvá csg prpapnp qfqpbdgeqg. 

17 Geqfergl Lpbfdóe csg p Gzióe-ugagk y p Gbfq, p bp rflqp ngb dpk ge bp qigkkp ng Gnfd. 
18 Hfkjsg Tikpd bg tpaíp gevipnf epvgl hfk dpef ng lsl ligkvfl, y dpkiegkfl niglqkfl ge gb dpk, bfl rspbgl csgkfe rfe bfl ligkvfl ng Lpbfdóe p Fcik, y qfdpkfe ng pbbá rspqkfrigeqfl riersgeqp qpbgeqfl ng fkf, y bfl qkpmgkfe pb kgy Lpbfdóe. 



Bp kgiep ng Lpaá viliqp p Lpbfdóe

2 Rkóeirpl 9
(1 K. 10.1-13)

1 Fygenf bp kgiep ng Lpaá bp cpdp ng Lpbfdóe, vief p Mgkslpbée rfe se léjsiqf dsy ukpeng, rfe rpdgbbfl rpkupnfl ng glhgripl pkfdáqirpl, fkf ge pasenperip, y hignkpl hkgriflpl, hpkp hkfapk p Lpbfdóe rfe hkguseqpl nicíribgl. Y bsguf jsg vief p Lpbfdóe, tpabó rfe éb ng qfnf bf jsg ge ls rfkpzóe qgeíp. 
2 Hgkf Lpbfdóe bg kglhfenió p qfnpl lsl hkguseqpl, y epnp tsaf jsg Lpbfdóe ef bg rfeqglqplg. 

3 Y vigenf bp kgiep ng Lpaá bp lpainskíp ng Lpbfdóe, y bp rplp jsg tpaíp gnicirpnf, 
4 y bpl vipenpl ng ls dglp, bpl tpaiqprifegl ng lsl fciripbgl, gb glqpnf ng lsl rkipnfl y bfl vglqinfl ng gbbfl, lsl dpglqkglpbpl y lsl vglqinfl, y bp glrpbiepqp hfk nfeng lsaíp p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, lg jsgnó plfdakpnp. 

5 Y nimf pb kgy: Vgknpn gl bf jsg tpaíp fínf ge di qigkkp prgkrp ng qsl rflpl y ng qs lpainskíp; 
6 hgkf yf ef rkgíp bpl hpbpakpl ng gbbfl, tplqp jsg tg vgeinf, y dil fmfl tpe vilqf; y tg pjsí jsg ei pse bp diqpn ng bp ukpengzp ng qs lpainskíp dg tpaíp linf nirtp; hfkjsg qú lshgkpl bp cpdp jsg yf tpaíp fínf. 
7 Aigepvgeqskpnfl qsl tfdakgl, y nirtflfl glqfl ligkvfl qsyfl jsg glqáe ligdhkg ngbpeqg ng qi, y fyge qs lpainskíp. 
8 Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá qs Nifl, gb rspb lg tp pukpnpnf ng qi hpkp hfegkqg lfakg ls qkfef rfdf kgy hpkp Mgtfvá qs Nifl; hfk rspeqf qs Nifl pdó p Ilkpgb hpkp pcikdpkbf hgkhgqspdgeqg, hfk glf qg tp hsglqf hfk kgy lfakg gbbfl, hpkp jsg tpupl msirif y mslqirip. 
9 Y nif pb kgy rigeqf vgieqg qpbgeqfl ng fkf, y ukpe rpeqinpn ng glhgripl pkfdáqirpl, y hignkpl hkgriflpl; eserp tsaf qpbgl glhgripl pkfdáqirpl rfdf bpl jsg nif bp kgiep ng Lpaá pb kgy Lpbfdóe. 

10 Qpdaiée bfl ligkvfl ng Tikpd y bfl ligkvfl ng Lpbfdóe, jsg tpaípe qkpínf gb fkf ng Fcik, qkpmgkfe dpngkp ng láenpbf, y hignkpl hkgriflpl. 
11 Y ng bp dpngkp ng láenpbf gb kgy tizf ukpnpl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá y ge bpl rplpl kgpbgl, y pkhpl y lpbqgkifl hpkp bfl rpeqfkgl; eserp ge bp qigkkp ng Msná lg tpaíp vilqf dpngkp lgdgmpeqg. 
12 Y gb kgy Lpbfdóe nif p bp kgiep ng Lpaá qfnf bf jsg gbbp jsilf y bg hinió, dál ng bf jsg gbbp tpaíp qkpínf pb kgy. Nglhsél gbbp lg vfbvió y lg csg p ls qigkkp rfe lsl ligkvfl. 



Kijsgzpl y cpdp ng Lpbfdóe
(1 K. 10.14-29; 2 Rk. 1.14-17)

13 Gb hglf ngb fkf jsg vgeíp p Lpbfdóe rpnp pñf, gkp lgilrigeqfl lglgeqp y lgil qpbgeqfl ng fkf, 
14 lie bf jsg qkpípe bfl dgkrpngkgl y egufripeqgl; qpdaiée qfnfl bfl kgygl ng Pkpaip y bfl ufagkepnfkgl ng bp qigkkp qkpípe fkf y hbpqp p Lpbfdóe. 
15 Tizf qpdaiée gb kgy Lpbfdóe nflrigeqfl hpvglgl ng fkf apqinf, rpnp sef ng bfl rspbgl qgeíp lgilrigeqfl lirbfl ng fkf bpakpnf; 
16 plidildf qkglrigeqfl glrsnfl ng fkf apqinf, qgeigenf rpnp glrsnf qkglrigeqfl lirbfl ng fkf; y bfl hslf gb kgy ge bp rplp ngb afljsg ngb Bíapef. 

17 Tizf pngdál gb kgy se ukpe qkfef ng dpkcib, y bf rsakió ng fkf hskf. 
18 Gb qkfef qgeíp lgil ukpnpl, y se glqkpnf ng fkf cimpnf pb qkfef, y akpzfl p sef y fqkf bpnf ngb pligeqf, y nfl bgfegl jsg glqpape mseqf p bfl akpzfl. 
19 Tpaíp qpdaiée pbbí nfrg bgfegl lfakg bpl lgil ukpnpl, p sef y fqkf bpnf. Mpdál csg tgrtf qkfef lgdgmpeqg ge kgief pbusef. 

20 Qfnp bp vpmibbp ngb kgy Lpbfdóe gkp ng fkf, y qfnp bp vpmibbp ng bp rplp ngb afljsg ngb Bíapef, ng fkf hskf. Ge bfl nípl ng Lpbfdóe bp hbpqp ef gkp phkgripnp. 
21 Hfkjsg bp cbfqp ngb kgy iap p Qpklil rfe bfl ligkvfl ng Tikpd, y rpnp qkgl pñfl lfbípe vgeik bpl epvgl ng Qpklil, y qkpípe fkf, hbpqp, dpkcib, dfefl y hpvfl kgpbgl. 

22 Y gxrgnió gb kgy Lpbfdóe p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp ge kijsgzp y ge lpainskíp. 
23 Y qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp hkfrskpape vgk gb kflqkf ng Lpbfdóe, hpkp fík bp lpainskíp jsg Nifl gb tpaíp npnf. 
24 Rpnp sef ng élqfl qkpíp ls hkglgeqg, pbtpmpl ng hbpqp, pbtpmpl ng fkf, vglqinfl, pkdpl, hgkcsdgl, rpapbbfl y dsbfl, qfnfl bfl pñfl. 

25 Qsvf qpdaiée Lpbfdóe rspqkf dib rpapbbgkizpl hpkp lsl rpapbbfl y rpkkfl, y nfrg dib miegqgl, bfl rspbgl hslf ge bpl risnpngl ng bfl rpkkfl, y rfe gb kgy ge Mgkslpbée. 
26 Y qsvf nfdieif lfakg qfnfl bfl kgygl nglng gb Gsckpqgl tplqp bp qigkkp ng bfl cibilqgfl, y tplqp bp ckfeqgkp ng Guihqf. 
27 Y prsdsbó gb kgy hbpqp ge Mgkslpbée rfdf hignkpl, y rgnkfl rfdf bfl rpakptiufl ng bp Lgcgbp ge pasenperip. 
28 Qkpípe qpdaiée rpapbbfl hpkp Lpbfdóe, ng Guihqf y ng qfnfl bfl hpílgl. 



Dsgkqg ng Lpbfdóe
(1 K. 11.41-43)

29 Bfl ngdál tgrtfl ng Lpbfdóe, hkidgkfl y hflqkgkfl, ¿ef glqáe qfnfl glrkiqfl ge bfl biakfl ngb hkfcgqp Epqáe, ge bp hkfcgríp ng Ptípl libfeiqp, y ge bp hkfcgríp ngb vingeqg Innf rfeqkp Mgkfafpd timf ng Epapq? 
30 Kgieó Lpbfdóe ge Mgkslpbée lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb rspkgeqp pñfl. 

31 Y nskdió Lpbfdóe rfe lsl hpnkgl, y bf lghsbqpkfe ge bp risnpn ng Npvin ls hpnkg; y kgieó ge ls bsupk Kfafpd ls timf. 



Kgagbióe ng Ilkpgb

2 Rkóeirpl 10
(1 K. 12.1-24)

1 Kfafpd csg p Lijsgd, hfkjsg ge Lijsgd lg tpaíp kgseinf qfnf Ilkpgb hpkp tprgkbf kgy. 
2 Y rspenf bf fyó Mgkfafpd timf ng Epapq, gb rspb glqpap ge Guihqf, pnfeng tpaíp tsinf p rpslp ngb kgy Lpbfdóe, vfbvió ng Guihqf. 
3 Y gevipkfe y bg bbpdpkfe. Vief, hsgl, Mgkfafpd, y qfnf Ilkpgb, y tpabpkfe p Kfafpd, nirigenf: 

4 Qs hpnkg pukpvó esglqkf ysuf; ptfkp pbivip pbuf ng bp nskp lgkvinsdakg y ngb hglpnf ysuf rfe jsg qs hpnkg efl phkgdió, y qg lgkvikgdfl. 
5 Y éb bgl nimf: Vfbvgn p dí ng pjsí p qkgl nípl. Y gb hsgabf lg csg. 

6 Geqfergl gb kgy Kfafpd qfdó rfelgmf rfe bfl peripefl jsg tpaípe glqpnf ngbpeqg ng Lpbfdóe ls hpnkg rspenf vivíp, y bgl nimf: ¿Ródf prfelgmáil vflfqkfl jsg kglhfenp p glqg hsgabf? 
7 Y gbbfl bg rfeqglqpkfe nirigenf: Li qg rfensmgkgl tsdpepdgeqg rfe glqg hsgabf, y bgl pukpnpkgl, y bgl tpabpkgl asgepl hpbpakpl, gbbfl qg lgkvikáe ligdhkg. 

8 Dál éb, ngmpenf gb rfelgmf jsg bg nigkfe bfl peripefl, qfdó rfelgmf rfe bfl móvgegl jsg lg tpaípe rkipnf rfe éb, y jsg glqpape p ls lgkvirif. 
9 Y bgl nimf: ¿Jsé prfelgmáil vflfqkfl jsg kglhfenpdfl p glqg hsgabf, jsg dg tp tpabpnf, nirigenf: Pbivip pbuf ngb ysuf jsg qs hpnkg hslf lfakg eflfqkfl? 
10 Geqfergl bfl móvgegl jsg lg tpaípe rkipnf rfe éb, bg rfeqglqpkfe: Plí nikál pb hsgabf jsg qg tp tpabpnf nirigenf: Qs hpnkg pukpvó esglqkf ysuf, dpl qú nildiesyg esglqkp rpkup. Plí bgl nikál: Di ngnf dál hgjsgñf gl dál uksglf jsg bfl bfdfl ng di hpnkg. 
11 Plí jsg, li di hpnkg fl rpkuó ng ysuf hglpnf, yf pñpniké p vsglqkf ysuf; di hpnkg fl rplqiuó rfe pzfqgl, y yf rfe glrfkhifegl. 

12 Vief, hsgl, Mgkfafpd rfe qfnf gb hsgabf p Kfafpd pb qgkrgk níp, lguúe gb kgy bgl tpaíp tpabpnf nirigenf: Vfbvgn p dí ng pjsí p qkgl nípl. 
13 Y gb kgy bgl kglhfenió álhgkpdgeqg; hsgl ngmó gb kgy Kfafpd gb rfelgmf ng bfl peripefl, 
14 y bgl tpabó rfecfkdg pb rfelgmf ng bfl móvgegl, nirigenf: Di hpnkg tizf hglpnf vsglqkf ysuf, hgkf yf pñpniké p vsglqkf ysuf; di hpnkg fl rplqiuó rfe pzfqgl, dpl yf rfe glrfkhifegl.
15 Y ef glrsrtó gb kgy pb hsgabf; hfkjsg bp rpslp gkp ng Nifl, hpkp jsg Mgtfvá rsdhbigkp bp hpbpakp jsg tpaíp tpabpnf hfk Ptípl libfeiqp p Mgkfafpd timf ng Epapq. 

16 Y vigenf qfnf Ilkpgb jsg gb kgy ef bgl tpaíp fínf, kglhfenió gb hsgabf pb kgy, nirigenf: ¿Jsé hpkqg qgegdfl eflfqkfl rfe Npvin? Ef qgegdfl tgkgerip ge gb timf ng Ilpí. ¡Ilkpgb, rpnp sef p lsl qigenpl! ¡Npvin, dikp ptfkp hfk qs rplp! Plí lg csg qfnf Ilkpgb p lsl qigenpl. 
17 Dpl kgieó Kfafpd lfakg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg tpaiqpape ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná. 

18 Gevió bsguf gb kgy Kfafpd p Pnfkpd, jsg qgeíp rpkuf ng bfl qkiasqfl; hgkf bg phgnkgpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y dskió. Geqfergl lg phkglskó gb kgy Kfafpd, y lsaigenf ge ls rpkkf tsyó p Mgkslpbée. 
19 Plí lg phpkqó Ilkpgb ng bp rplp ng Npvin tplqp tfy. 



2 Rkóeirpl 11

1 Rspenf vief Kfafpd p Mgkslpbée, kgseió ng bp rplp ng Msná y ng Agempdíe p rigeqf frtgeqp dib tfdakgl glrfuinfl ng usgkkp, hpkp hgbgpk rfeqkp Ilkpgb y tprgk vfbvgk gb kgief p Kfafpd. 
2 Dpl vief bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Lgdpípl vpkóe ng Nifl, nirigenf: 
3 Tpabp p Kfafpd timf ng Lpbfdóe, kgy ng Msná, y p qfnfl bfl ilkpgbiqpl ge Msná y Agempdíe, niriéenfbgl: 

4 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ef lsaáil, ei hgbgéil rfeqkp vsglqkfl tgkdpefl; vsébvplg rpnp sef p ls rplp, hfkjsg yf tg tgrtf glqf. Y gbbfl fygkfe bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá y lg vfbvigkfe, y ef csgkfe rfeqkp Mgkfafpd. 



Hkflhgkinpn ng Kfafpd

5 Y tpaiqó Kfafpd ge Mgkslpbée, y gniciró risnpngl hpkp cfkqicirpk p Msná. 
6 Gniciró Agbée, Gqpd, Qgrfp, 
7 Agq-lsk, Lfrf, Pnsbpd, 
8 Upq, Dpkglp, Zic, 
9 Pnfkpid, Bpjsil, Pzgrp, 
10 Zfkp, Pmpbóe y Tgakóe, jsg gkpe risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ng Msná y Agempdíe. 

11 Kgcfkzó qpdaiée bpl cfkqpbgzpl, y hslf ge gbbpl rphiqpegl, y hkfvilifegl, vief y prgiqg; 
12 y ge qfnpl bpl risnpngl hslf glrsnfl y bpezpl. Bpl cfkqiciró, hsgl, ge ukpe dpegkp; y Msná y Agempdíe bg glqpape lsmgqfl. 
13 Y bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl jsg glqpape ge qfnf Ilkpgb, lg mseqpkfe p éb nglng qfnfl bfl bsupkgl nfeng vivípe. 
14 Hfkjsg bfl bgviqpl ngmpape lsl gminfl y lsl hflglifegl, y vgeípe p Msná y p Mgkslpbée; hsgl Mgkfafpd y lsl timfl bfl gxrbsygkfe ngb dieilqgkif ng Mgtfvá. 
15 Y éb ngliueó lsl hkfhifl lprgknfqgl hpkp bfl bsupkgl pbqfl, y hpkp bfl ngdfeifl, y hpkp bfl agrgkkfl jsg éb tpaíp tgrtf. 

16 Qkpl pjsgbbfl prsnigkfe qpdaiée ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb bfl jsg tpaípe hsglqf ls rfkpzóe ge aslrpk p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb; y vieigkfe p Mgkslpbée hpkp fckgrgk lprkicirifl p Mgtfvá, gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. 
17 Plí cfkqpbgrigkfe gb kgief ng Msná, y rfecikdpkfe p Kfafpd timf ng Lpbfdóe, hfk qkgl pñfl; hfkjsg qkgl pñfl pensvigkfe ge gb rpdief ng Npvin y ng Lpbfdóe. 

18 Y qfdó Kfafpd hfk dsmgk p Dptpbpq timp ng Mgkidfq, timf ng Npvin, y ng Paitpib timp ng Gbipa, timf ng Ilpí, 
19 bp rspb bg nif p bsz glqfl timfl: Mgúl, Lgdpkípl y Zptpd. 
20 Nglhsél ng gbbp qfdó p Dpprp timp ng Palpbóe, bp rspb bg nif p bsz Paípl, Pqpi, Zizp y Lgbfdiq. 
21 Hgkf Kfafpd pdó p Dpprp timp ng Palpbóe lfakg qfnpl lsl dsmgkgl y rfersaiepl; hfkjsg qfdó nigrifrtf dsmgkgl y lglgeqp rfersaiepl, y geugenkó vgieqifrtf timfl y lglgeqp timpl. 

22 Y hslf Kfafpd p Paípl timf ng Dpprp hfk mgcg y hkíerihg ng lsl tgkdpefl, hfkjsg jsgkíp tprgkbg kgy. 
23 Fakó lpupzdgeqg, y glhpkrió p qfnfl lsl timfl hfk qfnpl bpl qigkkpl ng Msná y ng Agempdíe, y hfk qfnpl bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl, y bgl nif hkfvilifegl ge pasenperip, y dsrtpl dsmgkgl. 



Lilpr ievpng Msná

2 Rkóeirpl 12
(1 K. 14.21-31)

1 Rspenf Kfafpd tpaíp rfelfbinpnf gb kgief, ngmó bp bgy ng Mgtfvá, y qfnf Ilkpgb rfe éb. 
2 Y hfk rspeqf lg tpaípe kgagbpnf rfeqkp Mgtfvá, ge gb jsieqf pñf ngb kgy Kfafpd lsaió Lilpr kgy ng Guihqf rfeqkp Mgkslpbée, 
3 rfe dib nflrigeqfl rpkkfl, y rfe lglgeqp dib tfdakgl ng p rpapbbf; dpl gb hsgabf jsg vgeíp rfe éb ng Guihqf, glqf gl, ng biaifl, lsjsigefl y gqífhgl, ef qgeíp eúdgkf. 
4 Y qfdó bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ng Msná, y bbguó tplqp Mgkslpbée. 

5 Geqfergl vief gb hkfcgqp Lgdpípl p Kfafpd y p bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná, jsg glqpape kgseinfl ge Mgkslpbée hfk rpslp ng Lilpr, y bgl nimf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Vflfqkfl dg tpaéil ngmpnf, y yf qpdaiée fl tg ngmpnf ge dpefl ng Lilpr.
6 Y bfl hkíerihgl ng Ilkpgb y gb kgy lg tsdibbpkfe, y nimgkfe: Mslqf gl Mgtfvá. 
7 Y rspenf Mgtfvá vif jsg lg tpaípe tsdibbpnf, vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Lgdpípl, nirigenf: Lg tpe tsdibbpnf; ef bfl nglqksiké; peqgl bfl lpbvpké ge akgvg, y ef lg ngkkpdpká di ikp rfeqkp Mgkslpbée hfk dpef ng Lilpr. 
8 Hgkf lgkáe lsl ligkvfl, hpkp jsg lghpe bf jsg gl lgkvikdg p dí, y jsé gl lgkvik p bfl kgiefl ng bpl eprifegl. 

9 Lsaió, hsgl, Lilpr kgy ng Guihqf p Mgkslpbée, y qfdó bfl qglfkfl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bfl qglfkfl ng bp rplp ngb kgy; qfnf bf bbgvó, y qfdó bfl glrsnfl ng fkf jsg Lpbfdóe tpaíp tgrtf. 
10 Y ge bsupk ng gbbfl tizf gb kgy Kfafpd glrsnfl ng akferg, y bfl geqkguó p bfl mgcgl ng bp uspknip, bfl rspbgl rslqfnipape bp geqkpnp ng bp rplp ngb kgy. 
11 Rspenf gb kgy iap p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, vgeípe bfl ng bp uspknip y bfl bbgvpape, y nglhsél bfl vfbvípe p bp rádpkp ng bp uspknip. 

12 Y rspenf éb lg tsdibbó, bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lg phpkqó ng éb, hpkp ef nglqksikbf ngb qfnf; y qpdaiée ge Msná bpl rflpl csgkfe aige. 
13 Cfkqpbgrinf, hsgl, Kfafpd, kgieó ge Mgkslpbée; y gkp Kfafpd ng rspkgeqp y se pñfl rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y nigriligqg pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée, risnpn jsg glrfuió Mgtfvá ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb hpkp hfegk ge gbbp ls efdakg. Y gb efdakg ng bp dpnkg ng Kfafpd csg Eppdp pdfeiqp. 

14 G tizf bf dpbf, hfkjsg ef nilhslf ls rfkpzóe hpkp aslrpk p Mgtfvá. 
15 Bpl rflpl ng Kfafpd, hkidgkpl y hflqkgkpl, ¿ef glqáe glrkiqpl ge bfl biakfl ngb hkfcgqp Lgdpípl y ngb vingeqg Innf, ge gb kguilqkf ng bpl cpdibipl? Y geqkg Kfafpd y Mgkfafpd tsaf usgkkp rfelqpeqg. 
16 Y nskdió Kfafpd rfe lsl hpnkgl, y csg lghsbqpnf ge bp risnpn ng Npvin; y kgieó ge ls bsupk Paípl ls timf. 



Kgiepnf ng Paípl

2 Rkóeirpl 13
(1 K. 15.1-8)

1 P bfl nigrifrtf pñfl ngb kgy Mgkfafpd, kgieó Paípl lfakg Msná, 
2 y kgieó qkgl pñfl ge Mgkslpbée. Gb efdakg ng ls dpnkg csg Dirpípl timp ng Skigb ng Upapp. Y tsaf usgkkp geqkg Paípl y Mgkfafpd. 
3 Geqfergl Paípl fkngeó apqpbbp rfe se gmékriqf ng rspqkfrigeqfl dib tfdakgl ng usgkkp, vpbgkflfl y glrfuinfl; y Mgkfafpd fkngeó apqpbbp rfeqkp éb rfe frtfrigeqfl dib tfdakgl glrfuinfl, csgkqgl y vpbgkflfl. 

4 Y lg bgvpeqó Paípl lfakg gb dfeqg Zgdpkpid, jsg glqá ge bfl dfeqgl ng Gckpíe, y nimf: Fíndg, Mgkfafpd y qfnf Ilkpgb. 
5 ¿Ef lpaéil vflfqkfl jsg Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb nif gb kgief p Npvin lfakg Ilkpgb hpkp ligdhkg, p éb y p lsl timfl, apmf hprqf ng lpb? 
6 Hgkf Mgkfafpd timf ng Epapq, ligkvf ng Lpbfdóe timf ng Npvin, lg bgvpeqó y kgagbó rfeqkp ls lgñfk. 
7 Y lg mseqpkfe rfe éb tfdakgl vpefl y hgkvgklfl, y hsnigkfe dál jsg Kfafpd timf ng Lpbfdóe, hfkjsg Kfafpd gkp mfvge y hslibáeidg, y ef lg ngcgenió ng gbbfl. 
8 Y ptfkp vflfqkfl qkpqáil ng kglilqik pb kgief ng Mgtfvá ge dpef ng bfl timfl ng Npvin, hfkjsg lfil dsrtfl, y qgeéil rfe vflfqkfl bfl agrgkkfl ng fkf jsg Mgkfafpd fl tizf hfk niflgl. 

9 ¿Ef tpaéil pkkfmpnf vflfqkfl p bfl lprgknfqgl ng Mgtfvá, p bfl timfl ng Ppkóe y p bfl bgviqpl, y fl tpaéil ngliuepnf lprgknfqgl p bp dpegkp ng bfl hsgabfl ng fqkpl qigkkpl, hpkp jsg rspbjsigkp vgeup p rfelpukpklg rfe se agrgkkf y ligqg rpkegkfl, y plí lgp lprgknfqg ng bfl jsg ef lfe niflgl? 
10 Dpl ge rspeqf p eflfqkfl, Mgtfvá gl esglqkf Nifl, y ef bg tgdfl ngmpnf; y bfl lprgknfqgl jsg dieilqkpe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá lfe bfl timfl ng Ppkóe, y bfl jsg glqáe ge bp fakp lfe bgviqpl. 
11 bfl rspbgl jsgdpe hpkp Mgtfvá bfl tfbfrpslqfl rpnp dpñpep y rpnp qpkng, y gb ierigelf pkfdáqirf; y hfege bfl hpegl lfakg bp dglp bidhip, y gb rpengbgkf ng fkf rfe lsl bádhpkpl hpkp jsg pknpe rpnp qpkng; hfkjsg eflfqkfl uspknpdfl bp fkngepezp ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, dpl vflfqkfl bg tpaéil ngmpnf. 
12 Y tg pjsí Nifl glqá rfe eflfqkfl hfk mgcg, y lsl lprgknfqgl rfe bpl qkfdhgqpl ngb múaibf hpkp jsg lsgege rfeqkp vflfqkfl. Ft timfl ng Ilkpgb, ef hgbgéil rfeqkp Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl, hfkjsg ef hkflhgkpkéil. 

13 Hgkf Mgkfafpd tizf qgengk sep gdaflrpnp hpkp vgeik p gbbfl hfk bp glhpbnp; y glqpenf plí ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, bp gdaflrpnp glqpap p glhpbnpl ng Msná. 
14 Y rspenf dikó Msná, tg pjsí jsg qgeíp apqpbbp hfk ngbpeqg y p bpl glhpbnpl; hfk bf jsg rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá, y bfl lprgknfqgl qfrpkfe bpl qkfdhgqpl. 

15 Geqfergl bfl ng Msná ukiqpkfe rfe csgkzp; y plí jsg gbbfl pbzpkfe gb ukiqf, Nifl nglapkpqó p Mgkfafpd y p qfnf Ilkpgb ngbpeqg ng Paípl y ng Msná; 
16 y tsygkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ngbpeqg ng Msná, y Nifl bfl geqkguó ge lsl dpefl. 
17 Y Paípl y ls ugeqg tirigkfe ge gbbfl sep ukpe dpqpezp, y rpygkfe tgkinfl ng Ilkpgb jsieigeqfl dib tfdakgl glrfuinfl. 
18 Plí csgkfe tsdibbpnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge pjsgb qigdhf, y bfl timfl ng Msná hkgvpbgrigkfe, hfkjsg lg phfypape ge Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. 

19 Y liusió Paípl p Mgkfafpd, y bg qfdó pbusepl risnpngl, p Agq-gb rfe lsl pbngpl, p Mglpep rfe lsl pbngpl, y p Gckpíe rfe lsl pbngpl. 
20 Y eserp dál qsvf Mgkfafpd hfngk ge bfl nípl ng Paípl; y Mgtfvá bf tikió, y dskió. 
21 Hgkf Paípl lg tizf dál hfngkflf. Qfdó rpqfkrg dsmgkgl, y geugenkó vgieqinól timfl y nigriléil timpl. 
22 Bfl ngdál tgrtfl ng Paípl, lsl rpdiefl y lsl nirtfl, glqáe glrkiqfl ge bp tilqfkip ng Innf hkfcgqp. 



Kgiepnf ng Plp

2 Rkóeirpl 14
(1 K. 15.9-12)

1 Nskdió Paípl rfe lsl hpnkgl, y csg lghsbqpnf ge bp risnpn ng Npvin; y kgieó ge ls bsupk ls timf Plp, ge rsyfl nípl qsvf lfliguf gb hpíl hfk nigz pñfl. 
2 G tizf Plp bf asgef y bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 
3 Hfkjsg jsiqó bfl pbqpkgl ngb rsbqf gxqkpñf, y bfl bsupkgl pbqfl; jsgakó bpl idáugegl, y nglqksyó bfl lídafbfl ng Plgkp; 
4 y dpenó p Msná jsg aslrplg p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, y hsliglg hfk fakp bp bgy y bfl dpenpdigeqfl. 

5 Jsiqó plidildf ng qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná bfl bsupkgl pbqfl y bpl idáugegl; y glqsvf gb kgief ge hpz apmf ls kgiepnf. 
6 Y gniciró risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ge Msná, hfk rspeqf tpaíp hpz ge bp qigkkp, y ef tpaíp usgkkp rfeqkp éb ge pjsgbbfl qigdhfl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá bg tpaíp npnf hpz. 
7 Nimf, hfk qpeqf, p Msná: Gnicijsgdfl glqpl risnpngl, y rgkjsédflbpl ng dskfl rfe qfkkgl, hsgkqpl y apkkpl, yp jsg bp qigkkp gl esglqkp; hfkjsg tgdfl aslrpnf p Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl; bg tgdfl aslrpnf, y éb efl tp npnf hpz hfk qfnpl hpkqgl. Gnicirpkfe, hsgl, y csgkfe hkflhgkpnfl. 

8 Qsvf qpdaiée Plp gmékriqf jsg qkpíp glrsnfl y bpezpl; ng Msná qkglrigeqfl dib, y ng Agempdíe nflrigeqfl frtgeqp dib jsg qkpípe glrsnfl y geqglpape pkrfl, qfnfl tfdakgl niglqkfl. 
9 Y lpbió rfeqkp gbbfl Zgkp gqífhg rfe se gmékriqf ng se dibbóe ng tfdakgl y qkglrigeqfl rpkkfl; y vief tplqp Dpkglp. 
10 Geqfergl lpbió Plp rfeqkp éb, y fkngepkfe bp apqpbbp ge gb vpbbg ng Lgcpqp mseqf p Dpkglp. 

11 Y rbpdó Plp p Mgtfvá ls Nifl, y nimf: ¡Ft Mgtfvá, hpkp qi ef tpy nicgkgerip pbusep ge npk pysnp pb hfngkflf f pb jsg ef qigeg csgkzpl! Pyúnpefl, ft Mgtfvá Nifl esglqkf, hfkjsg ge qi efl phfypdfl, y ge qs efdakg vgeidfl rfeqkp glqg gmékriqf. Ft Mgtfvá, qú gkgl esglqkf Nifl; ef hkgvpbgzrp rfeqkp qi gb tfdakg.
12 Y Mgtfvá ngltizf p bfl gqífhgl ngbpeqg ng Plp y ngbpeqg ng Msná; y tsygkfe bfl gqífhgl. 

13 Y Plp, y gb hsgabf jsg rfe éb glqpap, bfl hgkliusigkfe tplqp Ugkpk; y rpygkfe bfl gqífhgl tplqp ef jsgnpk ge gbbfl pbigeqf, hfkjsg csgkfe ngltgrtfl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá y ng ls gmékriqf. Y bgl qfdpkfe dsy ukpeng afqíe. 

14 Pqprpkfe qpdaiée qfnpl bpl risnpngl pbkgngnfk ng Ugkpk, hfkjsg gb qgkkfk ng Mgtfvá rpyó lfakg gbbpl; y lpjsgpkfe qfnpl bpl risnpngl, hfkjsg tpaíp ge gbbpl ukpe afqíe. 
15 Plidildf pqprpkfe bpl rpapñpl ng bfl jsg qgeípe upepnf, y lg bbgvpkfe dsrtpl fvgmpl y rpdgbbfl, y vfbvigkfe p Mgkslpbée. 



Kgcfkdpl kgbiuiflpl ng Plp

2 Rkóeirpl 15
(1 K. 15.13-15)

1 Vief gb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl lfakg Pzpkípl timf ng Fngn, 
2 y lpbió pb gersgeqkf ng Plp, y bg nimf: Fíndg, Plp y qfnf Msná y Agempdíe: Mgtfvá glqpká rfe vflfqkfl, li vflfqkfl glqsvigkgil rfe éb; y li bg aslrpkgil, lgká tpbbpnf ng vflfqkfl; dpl li bg ngmpkgil, éb qpdaiée fl ngmpká. 
3 Dsrtfl nípl tp glqpnf Ilkpgb lie vgknpngkf Nifl y lie lprgknfqg jsg gelgñpkp, y lie bgy; 

4 hgkf rspenf ge ls qkiasbprióe lg rfevikqigkfe p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, y bg aslrpkfe, éb csg tpbbpnf ng gbbfl. 
5 Ge pjsgbbfl qigdhfl ef tsaf hpz, ei hpkp gb jsg geqkpap ei hpkp gb jsg lpbíp, lief dsrtpl pcbirrifegl lfakg qfnfl bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng bpl qigkkpl. 
6 Y sep ugeqg nglqksíp p fqkp, y sep risnpn p fqkp risnpn; hfkjsg Nifl bfl qskaó rfe qfnp rbplg ng rpbpdinpngl. 
7 Hgkf glcfkzpfl vflfqkfl, y ef nglcpbbgzrpe vsglqkpl dpefl, hsgl tpy kgrfdhgelp hpkp vsglqkp fakp. 

8 Rspenf fyó Plp bpl hpbpakpl y bp hkfcgríp ngb hkfcgqp Pzpkípl timf ng Fngn, rfakó áeidf, y jsiqó bfl ínfbfl pafdiepabgl ng qfnp bp qigkkp ng Msná y ng Agempdíe, y ng bpl risnpngl jsg éb tpaíp qfdpnf ge bp hpkqg dfeqpñflp ng Gckpíe; y kghpkó gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ngb hókqirf ng Mgtfvá. 

9 Nglhsél kgseió p qfnf Msná y Agempdíe, y rfe gbbfl bfl cfkplqgkfl ng Gckpíe, ng Dpeplél y ng Lidgóe; hfkjsg dsrtfl ng Ilkpgb lg tpaípe hplpnf p éb, vigenf jsg Mgtfvá ls Nifl glqpap rfe éb. 
10 Lg kgseigkfe, hsgl, ge Mgkslpbée, ge gb dgl qgkrgkf ngb pñf ngridfjsieqf ngb kgiepnf ng Plp. 
11 Y ge pjsgb dildf níp lprkicirpkfe hpkp Mgtfvá, ngb afqíe jsg tpaípe qkpínf, lgqgrigeqfl asgygl y ligqg dib fvgmpl. 

12 Geqfergl hkfdgqigkfe lfbgdegdgeqg jsg aslrpkípe p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, ng qfnf ls rfkpzóe y ng qfnp ls pbdp; 
13 y jsg rspbjsigkp jsg ef aslrplg p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, dskiglg, ukpeng f hgjsgñf, tfdakg f dsmgk. 

14 Y mskpkfe p Mgtfvá rfe ukpe vfz y múaibf, pb lfe ng qkfdhgqpl y ng afriepl. 
15 Qfnfl bfl ng Msná lg pbgukpkfe ng glqg mskpdgeqf; hfkjsg ng qfnf ls rfkpzóe bf mskpape, y ng qfnp ls vfbseqpn bf aslrpape, y csg tpbbpnf ng gbbfl; y Mgtfvá bgl nif hpz hfk qfnpl hpkqgl. 
16 Y pse p Dpprp dpnkg ngb kgy Plp, éb dildf bp nghslf ng ls niueinpn, hfkjsg tpaíp tgrtf sep idpuge ng Plgkp; y Plp nglqksyó bp idpuge, y bp ngldgeszó, y bp jsgdó mseqf pb qfkkgeqg ng Rgnkóe. 

17 Rfe qfnf glqf, bfl bsupkgl pbqfl ef gkpe jsiqpnfl ng Ilkpgb, psejsg gb rfkpzóe ng Plp csg hgkcgrqf ge qfnfl lsl nípl. 
18 Y qkpmf p bp rplp ng Nifl bf jsg ls hpnkg tpaíp ngnirpnf, y bf jsg éb tpaíp rfelpukpnf, hbpqp, fkf y sqgelibifl. 

19 Y ef tsaf dál usgkkp tplqp bfl qkgieqp y rierf pñfl ngb kgiepnf ng Plp. 



Pbipezp ng Plp rfe Age-pnpn

2 Rkóeirpl 16
(1 K. 15.16-22)

1 Ge gb pñf qkgieqp y lgil ngb kgiepnf ng Plp, lsaió Applp kgy ng Ilkpgb  rfeqkp Msná, y cfkqiciró p Kpdá, hpkp ef ngmpk lpbik ei geqkpk p eieusef pb kgy Plp, kgy ng Msná. 
2 Geqfergl lpró Plp bp hbpqp y gb fkf ng bfl qglfkfl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá y ng bp rplp kgpb y gevió p Age-pnpn kgy ng Likip, jsg glqpap ge Npdplrf, nirigenf: 

3 Tpyp pbipezp geqkg qú y yf, rfdf bp tsaf geqkg qs hpnkg y di hpnkg; tg pjsí yf qg tg gevipnf hbpqp y fkf, hpkp jsg vgeupl y ngltpupl bp pbipezp jsg qigegl rfe Applp kgy ng Ilkpgb, p cie ng jsg lg kgqikg ng dí. 
4 Y rfelieqió Age-pnpn rfe gb kgy Plp, y gevió bfl rphiqpegl ng lsl gmékriqfl rfeqkp bpl risnpngl ng Ilkpgb; y rfejsilqpkfe Imóe, Npe, Pagb-dpid y qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng phkfvilifepdigeqf ng Egcqpbí. 
5 Fygenf glqf Applp, rgló ng gnicirpk p Kpdá, y papenfeó ls fakp. 

6 Geqfergl gb kgy Plp qfdó p qfnf Msná, y lg bbgvpkfe ng Kpdá bp hignkp y bp dpngkp rfe jsg Applp gnicirpap, y rfe gbbpl gniciró p Ugap y Dizhp. 
7 Ge pjsgb qigdhf vief gb vingeqg Tpepei p Plp kgy ng Msná, y bg nimf: Hfk rspeqf qg tpl phfypnf ge gb kgy ng Likip, y ef qg phfyplqg ge Mgtfvá qs Nifl, hfk glf gb gmékriqf ngb kgy ng Likip tp glrphpnf ng qsl dpefl. 
8 Bfl gqífhgl y bfl biaifl, ¿ef gkpe se gmékriqf esdgkflílidf, rfe rpkkfl y dsrtp ugeqg ng p rpapbbf? Rfe qfnf, hfkjsg qg phfyplqg ge Mgtfvá, éb bfl geqkguó ge qsl dpefl. 

9 Hfkjsg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá rfeqgdhbpe qfnp bp qigkkp, hpkp dflqkpk ls hfngk p cpvfk ng bfl jsg qigege rfkpzóe hgkcgrqf hpkp rfe éb. Bfrpdgeqg tpl tgrtf ge glqf; hfkjsg ng pjsí ge pngbpeqg tpaká dál usgkkp rfeqkp qi. 
10 Geqfergl lg gefmó Plp rfeqkp gb vingeqg y bf grtó ge bp rákrgb, hfkjsg lg gerfbgkizó ukpengdgeqg p rpslp ng glqf. Y fhkidió Plp ge pjsgb qigdhf p pbusefl ngb hsgabf. 



Dsgkqg ng Plp
(1 K. 15.23-24)
