11 Dpl tg pjsí bfl tgrtfl ng Plp, hkidgkfl y hflqkgkfl, glqáe glrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bfl kgygl ng Msná y ng Ilkpgb. 
12 Ge gb pñf qkgieqp y esgvg ng ls kgiepnf, Plp gecgkdó ukpvgdgeqg ng bfl higl, y ge ls gecgkdgnpn ef aslró p Mgtfvá, lief p bfl dénirfl. 
13 Y nskdió Plp rfe lsl hpnkgl, y dskió ge gb pñf rspkgeqp y sef ng ls kgiepnf. 
14 Y bf lghsbqpkfe ge bfl lghsbrkfl jsg éb tpaíp tgrtf hpkp lí ge bp risnpn ng Npvin; y bf hsligkfe ge se pqpún, gb rspb bbgepkfe ng hgkcsdgl y nivgklpl glhgripl pkfdáqirpl, hkghpkpnpl hfk gxhgkqfl hgkcsdilqpl; g tirigkfe se ukpe csguf ge ls tfefk. 



Kgiepnf ng Mflpcpq

2 Rkóeirpl 17

1 Kgieó ge ls bsupk Mflpcpq ls timf, gb rspb lg tizf csgkqg rfeqkp Ilkpgb. 
2 Hslf gmékriqfl ge qfnpl bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ng Msná, y rfbfró ugeqg ng uspkeirióe ge qigkkp ng Msná, y plidildf ge bpl risnpngl ng Gckpíe jsg ls hpnkg Plp tpaíp qfdpnf. 
3 Y Mgtfvá glqsvf rfe Mflpcpq, hfkjsg pensvf ge bfl hkidgkfl rpdiefl ng Npvin ls hpnkg, y ef aslró p bfl appbgl, 

4 lief jsg aslró pb Nifl ng ls hpnkg, y pensvf ge lsl dpenpdigeqfl, y ef lguúe bpl fakpl ng Ilkpgb. 
5 Mgtfvá, hfk qpeqf, rfecikdó gb kgief ge ls dpef, y qfnf Msná nif p Mflpcpq hkglgeqgl; y qsvf kijsgzpl y ubfkip ge pasenperip. 
6 Y lg peidó ls rfkpzóe ge bfl rpdiefl ng Mgtfvá, y jsiqó bfl bsupkgl pbqfl y bpl idáugegl ng Plgkp ng ge dgnif ng Msná. 

7 Pb qgkrgk pñf ng ls kgiepnf gevió lsl hkíerihgl Age-tpib, Panípl, Zprpkípl, Epqpepgb y Dirpípl, hpkp jsg gelgñplge ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná; 
8 y rfe gbbfl p bfl bgviqpl Lgdpípl, Egqpeípl, Zgapnípl, Plpgb, Lgdikpdfq, Mfepqáe, Pnfeípl, Qfaípl y Qfapnfeípl; y rfe gbbfl p bfl lprgknfqgl Gbilpdp y Mfkpd. 
9 Y gelgñpkfe ge Msná, qgeigenf rfeliuf gb biakf ng bp Bgy ng Mgtfvá, y kgrfkkigkfe qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná gelgñpenf pb hsgabf. 

10 Y rpyó gb hpvfk ng Mgtfvá lfakg qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bpl qigkkpl jsg glqpape pbkgngnfk ng Msná, y ef flpkfe tprgk usgkkp rfeqkp Mflpcpq. 
11 Y qkpípe ng bfl cibilqgfl hkglgeqgl p Mflpcpq, y qkiasqfl ng hbpqp. Bfl ákpagl qpdaiée bg qkpmgkfe upepnfl: ligqg dib lgqgrigeqfl rpkegkfl y ligqg dib lgqgrigeqfl dprtfl rpakífl. 

12 Iap, hsgl, Mflpcpq geukpengriéenflg dsrtf; y gniciró ge Msná cfkqpbgzpl y risnpngl ng phkfvilifepdigeqf. 
13 Qsvf dsrtpl hkfvilifegl ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná, y tfdakgl ng usgkkp dsy vpbigeqgl ge Mgkslpbée. 

14 Y glqg gl gb eúdgkf ng gbbfl lguúe lsl rplpl hpqgkepl: ng bfl mgcgl ng bfl dibbpkgl ng Msná, gb ugegkpb Pnepl, y rfe éb qkglrigeqfl dib tfdakgl dsy glcfkzpnfl. 
15 Nglhsél ng éb, gb mgcg Mftpeáe, y rfe éb nflrigeqfl frtgeqp dib. 
16 Qkpl élqg, Pdplípl timf ng Zirki, gb rspb lg tpaíp fckgrinf vfbseqpkipdgeqg p Mgtfvá, y rfe éb nflrigeqfl dib tfdakgl vpbigeqgl. 
17 Ng Agempdíe, Gbipnp, tfdakg dsy vpbgkflf, y rfe éb nflrigeqfl dib pkdpnfl ng pkrf y glrsnf. 
18 Qkpl élqg, Mfzpapn, y rfe éb rigeqf frtgeqp dib nilhsglqfl hpkp bp usgkkp. 
19 Glqfl gkpe ligkvfl ngb kgy, lie bfl jsg gb kgy tpaíp hsglqf ge bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ge qfnf Msná. 



Dirpípl hkfcgqizp bp ngkkfqp ng Prpa

2 Rkóeirpl 18
(1 K. 22.1-40)

1 Qgeíp, hsgl, Mflpcpq kijsgzpl y ubfkip ge pasenperip; y rfeqkpmf hpkgeqglrf rfe Prpa. 
2 Y nglhsél ng pbusefl pñfl nglrgenió p Lpdpkip hpkp viliqpk p Prpa; hfk bf jsg Prpa dpqó dsrtpl fvgmpl y asgygl hpkp éb y hpkp bp ugeqg jsg rfe éb vgeíp, y bg hgklspnió jsg csglg rfe éb rfeqkp Kpdfq ng Upbppn. 
3 Y nimf Prpa kgy ng Ilkpgb p Mflpcpq kgy ng Msná: ¿Jsigkgl vgeik rfediuf rfeqkp Kpdfq ng Upbppn? Y éb kglhfenió: Yf lfy rfdf qú, y di hsgabf rfdf qs hsgabf; ikgdfl rfeqiuf p bp usgkkp. 

4 Pngdál nimf Mflpcpq pb kgy ng Ilkpgb: Qg ksguf jsg rfelsbqgl tfy bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 
5 Geqfergl gb kgy ng Ilkpgb kgseió p rspqkfrigeqfl hkfcgqpl, y bgl hkguseqó: ¿Ikgdfl p bp usgkkp rfeqkp Kpdfq ng Upbppn, f dg glqpké jsigqf? Y gbbfl nimgkfe: Lsag, hfkjsg Nifl bfl geqkgupká ge dpef ngb kgy. 
6 Hgkf Mflpcpq nimf: ¿Tpy púe pjsí pbuúe hkfcgqp ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg hfk dgnif ng éb hkguseqgdfl? 

7 Gb kgy ng Ilkpgb kglhfenió p Mflpcpq: Púe tpy pjsí se tfdakg hfk gb rspb hfngdfl hkguseqpk p Mgtfvá; dpl yf bg pafkkgzrf, hfkjsg eserp dg hkfcgqizp rflp asgep, lief ligdhkg dpb. Glqg gl Dirpípl timf ng Idbp. Y kglhfenió Mflpcpq: Ef tpabg plí gb kgy. 
8 Geqfergl gb kgy ng Ilkpgb bbpdó p se fciripb, y bg nimf: Tpz vgeik bsguf p Dirpípl timf ng Idbp. 
9 Y gb kgy ng Ilkpgb y Mflpcpq kgy ng Msná glqpape lgeqpnfl rpnp sef ge ls qkfef, vglqinfl rfe lsl kfhpl kgpbgl, ge bp hbpzp mseqf p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp ng Lpdpkip, y qfnfl bfl hkfcgqpl hkfcgqizpape ngbpeqg ng gbbfl. 

10 Y Lgngjsípl timf ng Jsgeppep lg tpaíp tgrtf rsgkefl ng tigkkf, y ngríp: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Rfe glqfl prfkegpkál p bfl likifl tplqp nglqksikbfl hfk rfdhbgqf. 
11 Ng glqp dpegkp hkfcgqizpape qpdaiée qfnfl bfl hkfcgqpl, nirigenf: Lsag rfeqkp Kpdfq ng Upbppn, y lgkál hkflhgkpnf; hfkjsg Mgtfvá bp geqkgupká ge dpef ngb kgy. 

12 Y gb dgelpmgkf jsg tpaíp inf p bbpdpk p Dirpípl, bg tpabó nirigenf: Tg pjsí bpl hpbpakpl ng bfl hkfcgqpl p sep vfz peseripe pb kgy rflpl asgepl; yf, hsgl, qg ksguf jsg qs hpbpakp lgp rfdf bp ng sef ng gbbfl, jsg tpabgl aige. 
13 Nimf Dirpípl: Vivg Mgtfvá, jsg bf jsg di Nifl dg nimgkg, glf tpabpké. Y vief pb kgy. 
14 y gb kgy bg nimf: Dirpípl, ¿ikgdfl p hgbgpk rfeqkp Kpdfq ng Upbppn, f dg glqpké jsigqf? Gb Kglhfenió: Lsain, y lgkéil hkflhgkpnfl, hsgl lgkáe geqkgupnfl ge vsglqkpl dpefl. 
15 Gb kgy bg nimf: ¿Tplqp rsáeqpl vgrgl qg rfemskpké hfk gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá jsg ef dg tpabgl lief bp vgknpn? 

16 Geqfergl Dirpípl nimf: Tg vilqf p qfnf Ilkpgb ngkkpdpnf hfk bfl dfeqgl rfdf fvgmpl lie hplqfk; y nimf Mgtfvá: Glqfl ef qigege lgñfk; vsébvplg rpnp sef ge hpz p ls rplp. 
17 Y gb kgy ng Ilkpgb nimf p Mflpcpq: ¿Ef qg tpaíp yf nirtf jsg ef dg hkfcgqizpkíp aige, lief dpb? 
18 Geqfergl éb nimf: Fín, hsgl, hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá: Yf tg vilqf p Mgtfvá lgeqpnf ge ls qkfef, y qfnf gb gmékriqf ng bfl rigbfl glqpap p ls dpef ngkgrtp y p ls izjsigknp. 

19 Y Mgtfvá hkguseqó: ¿Jsiée iensriká p Prpa kgy ng Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg lsap y rpiup ge Kpdfq ng Upbppn? Y sef ngríp plí, y fqkf ngríp ng fqkp dpegkp. 
20 Geqfergl lpbió se glhíkiqs jsg lg hslf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá y nimf: Yf bg iensriké. Y Mgtfvá bg nimf: ¿Ng jsé dfnf? 
21 Y éb nimf: Lpbnké y lgké glhíkiqs ng dgeqikp ge bp afrp ng qfnfl lsl hkfcgqpl. Y Mgtfvá nimf: Qú bg iensrikál, y bf bfukpkál; penp y tpzbf plí. 
22 Y ptfkp, tg pjsí Mgtfvá tp hsglqf glhíkiqs ng dgeqikp ge bp afrp ng glqfl qsl hkfcgqpl; hsgl Mgtfvá tp tpabpnf gb dpb rfe rfeqkp qi. 

23 Geqfergl Lgngjsípl timf ng Jsgeppep lg bg prgkró y ufbhgó p Dirpípl ge bp dgmibbp, y nimf: ¿Hfk jsé rpdief lg csg ng dí gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá hpkp tpabpkqg p qi? 
24 Y Dirpípl kglhfenió: Tg pjsí qú bf vgkál pjsgb níp, rspenf geqkgl ng rádpkp ge rádpkp hpkp glrfengkqg. 

25 Geqfergl gb kgy ng Ilkpgb nimf: Qfdpn p Dirpípl, y bbgvpnbf p Pdóe ufagkepnfk ng bp risnpn, y p Mfál timf ngb kgy, 
26 y ngrinbgl: Gb kgy tp nirtf plí: Hfegn p élqg ge bp rákrgb, y lslqgeqpnbg rfe hpe ng pcbirrióe y pusp ng peuslqip, tplqp jsg yf vsgbvp ge hpz. 
27 Y Dirpípl nimf: Li qú vfbvigkgl ge hpz, Mgtfvá ef tp tpabpnf hfk dí. Nimf pngdál: Fín, hsgabfl qfnfl. 

28 Lsaigkfe, hsgl, gb kgy ng Ilkpgb, y Mflpcpq kgy ng Msná, p Kpdfq ng Upbppn. 
29 Y nimf gb kgy ng Ilkpgb p Mflpcpq: Yf dg nilckpzpké hpkp geqkpk ge bp apqpbbp, hgkf qú vílqgqg qsl kfhpl kgpbgl. Y lg nilckpzó gb kgy ng Ilkpgb, y geqkó ge bp apqpbbp. 
30 Tpaíp gb kgy ng Likip dpenpnf p bfl rphiqpegl ng bfl rpkkfl jsg qgeíp rfeliuf, nirigenf: Ef hgbgéil rfe rtirf ei rfe ukpeng, lief lóbf rfe gb kgy ng Ilkpgb. 
31 Rspenf bfl rphiqpegl ng bfl rpkkfl vigkfe p Mflpcpq, nimgkfe: Glqg gl gb kgy ng Ilkpgb. Y bf kfngpkfe hpkp hgbgpk; dpl Mflpcpq rbpdó, y Mgtfvá bf pysnó, y bfl phpkqó Nifl ng éb; 
32 hsgl vigenf bfl rphiqpegl ng bfl rpkkfl jsg ef gkp gb kgy ng Ilkpgb, nglilqigkfe ng prflpkbg. 

33 Dpl nilhpkpenf sef gb pkrf p bp vgeqskp, tikió pb kgy ng Ilkpgb geqkg bpl mseqskpl y gb rflgbgqg. Gb geqfergl nimf pb rfrtgkf: Vsgbvg bpl kigenpl, y lárpdg ngb rpdhf, hfkjsg glqfy dpb tgkinf. 
34 Y pkkgrió p apqpbbp pjsgb níp, hfk bf jsg glqsvf gb kgy ng Ilkpgb ge hig ge gb rpkkf geckgeqg ng bfl likifl tplqp bp qpkng; y dskió pb hfegklg gb lfb. 



Gb hkfcgqp Mgtú pdfeglqp p Mflpcpq

2 Rkóeirpl 19

1 Mflpcpq kgy ng Msná vfbvió ge hpz p ls rplp ge Mgkslpbée. 
2 Y bg lpbió pb gersgeqkf gb vingeqg Mgtú timf ng Tpepei, y nimf pb kgy Mflpcpq: ¿Pb idhíf npl pysnp, y pdpl p bfl jsg pafkkgrge p Mgtfvá? Hsgl tp lpbinf ng bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá ikp rfeqkp qi hfk glqf. 
3 Hgkf lg tpe tpbbpnf ge qi asgepl rflpl, hfk rspeqf tpl jsiqpnf ng bp qigkkp bpl idáugegl ng Plgkp, y tpl nilhsglqf qs rfkpzóe hpkp aslrpk p Nifl. 



Mflpcpq efdakp msgrgl

4 Tpaiqó, hsgl, Mflpcpq ge Mgkslpbée; hgkf npap vsgbqp y lpbíp pb hsgabf, nglng Aggklgap tplqp gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe, y bfl rfensríp p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. 
5 Y hslf msgrgl ge qfnpl bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ng Msná, hfk qfnfl bfl bsupkgl. 

6 Y nimf p bfl msgrgl: Dikpn bf jsg tpréil; hfkjsg ef mszuáil ge bsupk ng tfdakg, lief ge bsupk ng Mgtfvá, gb rspb glqá rfe vflfqkfl rspenf mszuáil. 
7 Lgp, hsgl, rfe vflfqkfl gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá; dikpn bf jsg tpréil, hfkjsg rfe Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl ef tpy iemslqirip, ei prghrióe ng hgklfepl, ei pndilióe ng rftgrtf. 

8 Hslf qpdaiée Mflpcpq ge Mgkslpbée p pbusefl ng bfl bgviqpl y lprgknfqgl, y ng bfl hpnkgl ng cpdibipl ng Ilkpgb, hpkp gb msirif ng Mgtfvá y hpkp bpl rpslpl. Y vfbvigkfe p Mgkslpbée. 
9 Y bgl dpenó nirigenf: Hkfrgngkéil plidildf rfe qgdfk ng Mgtfvá, rfe vgknpn, y rfe rfkpzóe íeqgukf. 
10 Ge rspbjsigk rpslp jsg vieigkg p vflfqkfl ng vsglqkfl tgkdpefl jsg tpaiqpe ge bpl risnpngl, ge rpslpl ng lpeukg, geqkg bgy y hkgrghqf,  glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl, bgl pdfeglqpkéil jsg ef hgjsge rfeqkp Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg ef vgeup ikp lfakg vflfqkfl y lfakg vsglqkfl tgkdpefl. Tprigenf plí, ef hgrpkéil. 
11 Y tg pjsí, gb lprgknfqg Pdpkípl lgká gb jsg fl hkglinp ge qfnf plseqf ng Mgtfvá, y Zgapnípl timf ng Ildpgb, hkíerihg ng bp rplp ng Msná, ge qfnfl bfl egufrifl ngb kgy; qpdaiée bfl bgviqpl lgkáe fciripbgl ge hkglgerip ng vflfqkfl. Glcfkzpfl, hsgl, hpkp tprgkbf, y Mgtfvá glqpká rfe gb asgef. 



Virqfkip lfakg Dfpa y Pdóe

2 Rkóeirpl 20

1 Hplpnpl glqpl rflpl, prfeqgrió jsg bfl timfl ng Dfpa y ng Pdóe, y rfe gbbfl fqkfl ng bfl pdfeiqpl, vieigkfe rfeqkp Mflpcpq p bp usgkkp. 
2 Y prsnigkfe pbusefl y nigkfe pvilf p Mflpcpq, nirigenf: Rfeqkp qi vigeg sep ukpe dsbqiqsn ngb fqkf bpnf ngb dpk, y ng Likip; y tg pjsí glqáe ge Tpzgzfe-qpdpk, jsg gl Ge-upni. 
3 Geqfergl éb qsvf qgdfk; y Mflpcpq tsdibbó ls kflqkf hpkp rfelsbqpk p Mgtfvá, g tizf hkgufepk pysef p qfnf Msná. 
4 Y lg kgseigkfe bfl ng Msná hpkp hgnik lfrfkkf p Mgtfvá; y qpdaiée ng qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná vieigkfe p hgnik pysnp p Mgtfvá. 

5 Geqfergl Mflpcpq lg hslf ng hig ge bp plpdabgp ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée, ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, ngbpeqg ngb pqkif esgvf; 
6 y nimf: Mgtfvá Nifl ng esglqkfl hpnkgl, ¿ef gkgl qú Nifl ge bfl rigbfl, y qigegl nfdieif lfakg qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bpl eprifegl? ¿Ef glqá ge qs dpef qpb csgkzp y hfngk, jsg ef tpy jsige qg kglilqp? 
7 Nifl esglqkf, ¿ef grtplqg qú bfl dfkpnfkgl ng glqp qigkkp ngbpeqg ng qs hsgabf Ilkpgb, y bp nilqg p bp nglrgengerip ng Pakptpd qs pdiuf hpkp ligdhkg? 
8 Y gbbfl tpe tpaiqpnf ge gbbp, y qg tpe gnicirpnf ge gbbp lpeqspkif p qs efdakg, nirigenf: 

9 Li dpb vieigkg lfakg eflfqkfl, f glhpnp ng rplqiuf, f hglqibgerip, f tpdakg, efl hkglgeqpkgdfl ngbpeqg ng glqp rplp, y ngbpeqg ng qi (hfkjsg qs efdakg glqá ge glqp rplp), y p rpslp ng esglqkpl qkiasbprifegl rbpdpkgdfl p qi, y qú efl fikál y lpbvpkál. 
10 Ptfkp, hsgl, tg pjsí bfl timfl ng Pdóe y ng Dfpa, y bfl ngb dfeqg ng Lgik, p rsyp qigkkp ef jsililqg jsg hplplg Ilkpgb rspenf vgeíp ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, lief jsg lg phpkqplg ng gbbfl, y ef bfl nglqksyglg; 
11 tg pjsí gbbfl efl npe gb hpuf vieigenf p pkkfmpkefl ng bp tgkgnpn jsg qú efl nilqg ge hflglióe. 

12 ¡Ft Nifl esglqkf! ¿ef bfl mszupkál qú? Hfkjsg ge eflfqkfl ef tpy csgkzp rfeqkp qpe ukpeng dsbqiqsn jsg vigeg rfeqkp eflfqkfl; ef lpagdfl jsé tprgk, y p qi vfbvgdfl esglqkfl fmfl.
13 Y qfnf Msná glqpap ge hig ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, rfe lsl eiñfl y lsl dsmgkgl y lsl timfl. 

14 Y glqpap pbbí Mptpzigb timf ng Zprpkípl, timf ng Agepíp, timf ng Mgigb, timf ng Dpqpeípl, bgviqp ng bfl timfl ng Plpc, lfakg gb rspb vief gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá ge dgnif ng bp kgseióe; 
15 y nimf: Fín, Msná qfnf, y vflfqkfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, y qú, kgy Mflpcpq. Mgtfvá fl nirg plí: Ef qgdáil ei fl pdgnkgeqéil ngbpeqg ng glqp dsbqiqsn qpe ukpeng, hfkjsg ef gl vsglqkp bp usgkkp, lief ng Nifl. 
16 Dpñpep nglrgengkéil rfeqkp gbbfl; tg pjsí jsg gbbfl lsaikáe hfk bp rsglqp ng Lil, y bfl tpbbpkéil mseqf pb pkkfyf, peqgl ngb ngligkqf ng Mgksgb. 

17  Ef tpaká hpkp jsg hgbgéil vflfqkfl ge glqg rplf; hpkpfl, glqpn jsigqfl, y vgn bp lpbvprióe ng Mgtfvá rfe vflfqkfl. Ft Msná y Mgkslpbée, ef qgdáil ei ngldpyéil; lpbin dpñpep rfeqkp gbbfl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá glqpká rfe vflfqkfl.
18 Geqfergl Mflpcpq lg ierbieó kflqkf p qigkkp, y plidildf qfnf Msná y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée lg hflqkpkfe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y pnfkpkfe p Mgtfvá. 

19 Y lg bgvpeqpkfe bfl bgviqpl ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq y ng bfl timfl ng Rfké, hpkp pbpapk p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb rfe csgkqg y pbqp vfz. 
20 Y rspenf lg bgvpeqpkfe hfk bp dpñpep, lpbigkfe pb ngligkqf ng Qgrfp. Y digeqkpl gbbfl Lpbípe, Mflpcpq, glqpenf ge hig, nimf: Fíndg, Msná y dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée. Rkggn ge Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y glqpkéil lguskfl; rkggn p lsl hkfcgqpl, y lgkéil hkflhgkpnfl. 
21 Y tpainf rfelgmf rfe gb hsgabf, hslf p pbusefl jsg rpeqplge y pbpaplge p Mgtfvá, vglqinfl ng fkepdgeqfl lpukpnfl, digeqkpl lpbíp bp ugeqg pkdpnp, y jsg nimglge: Ubfkicirpn p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg ls dilgkirfknip gl hpkp ligdhkg. 

22 Y rspenf rfdgezpkfe p geqfepk rpeqfl ng pbpapezp, Mgtfvá hslf rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Pdóe, ng Dfpa y ngb dfeqg ng Lgik, bpl gdaflrpnpl ng gbbfl dildfl jsg vgeípe rfeqkp Msná, y lg dpqpkfe bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl. 
23 Hfkjsg bfl timfl ng Pdóe y Dfpa lg bgvpeqpkfe rfeqkp bfl ngb dfeqg ng Lgik hpkp dpqpkbfl y nglqksikbfl; y rspenf tsaigkfe prpapnf rfe bfl ngb dfeqg ng Lgik, rpnp rspb pysnó p bp nglqksrrióe ng ls rfdhpñgkf. 
24 Y bsguf jsg vief Msná p bp qfkkg ngb ngligkqf, dikpkfe tprip bp dsbqiqsn, y tg pjsí yprípe gbbfl ge qigkkp dsgkqfl, hsgl eieusef tpaíp glrphpnf. 
25 Vieigenf geqfergl Mflpcpq y ls hsgabf p nglhfmpkbfl, tpbbpkfe geqkg bfl rpnávgkgl dsrtpl kijsgzpl, plí vglqinfl rfdf pbtpmpl hkgriflpl, jsg qfdpkfe hpkp lí, qpeqfl, jsg ef bfl hfnípe bbgvpk; qkgl nípl glqsvigkfe kgrfuigenf gb afqíe, hfkjsg gkp dsrtf. 

26 Y pb rspkqf níp lg mseqpkfe ge gb vpbbg ng Agkprp; hfkjsg pbbí agenimgkfe p Mgtfvá, y hfk glqf bbpdpkfe gb efdakg ng pjsgb hpkpmg gb vpbbg ng Agkprp, tplqp tfy. 
27 Y qfnf Msná y bfl ng Mgkslpbée, y Mflpcpq p bp rpagzp ng gbbfl, vfbvigkfe hpkp kgukglpk p Mgkslpbée ufzflfl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá bgl tpaíp npnf ufzf biakáenfbfl ng lsl gegdiufl. 

28 Y vieigkfe p Mgkslpbée rfe lpbqgkifl, pkhpl y qkfdhgqpl, p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
29 Y gb hpvfk ng Nifl rpyó lfakg qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng pjsgbbp qigkkp, rspenf fygkfe jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp hgbgpnf rfeqkp bfl gegdiufl ng Ilkpgb. 
30 Y gb kgief ng Mflpcpq qsvf hpz, hfkjsg ls Nifl bg nif hpz hfk qfnpl hpkqgl. 



Kglsdge ngb kgiepnf ng Mflpcpq
(1 K. 22.41-50)

31 Plí kgieó Mflpcpq lfakg Msná; ng qkgieqp y rierf pñfl gkp rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y kgieó vgieqirierf pñfl ge Mgkslpbée. Gb efdakg ng ls dpnkg csg Pzsap, timp ng Libti. 
32 Y pensvf ge gb rpdief ng Plp ls hpnkg, lie phpkqpklg ng éb, tprigenf bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá. 
33 Rfe qfnf glf, bfl bsupkgl pbqfl ef csgkfe jsiqpnfl; hsgl gb hsgabf púe ef tpaíp gengkgzpnf ls rfkpzóe pb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. 
34 Bfl ngdál tgrtfl ng Mflpcpq, hkidgkfl y hflqkgkfl, tg pjsí glqáe glrkiqfl ge bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtú timf ng Tpepei, ngb rspb lg tprg dgerióe ge gb biakf ng bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb. 

35 Hplpnpl glqpl rflpl, Mflpcpq kgy ng Msná qkpaó pdilqpn rfe Frfzípl kgy ng Ilkpgb, gb rspb gkp npnf p bp idhignpn, 
36 g tizf rfe éb rfdhpñíp hpkp rfelqksik epvgl jsg csglge p Qpklil; y rfelqksygkfe bpl epvgl ge Gzióe-ugagk. 
37 Geqfergl Gbigzgk timf ng Nfnpvp, ng Dpkglp, hkfcgqizó rfeqkp Mflpcpq, nirigenf: Hfk rspeqf tpl tgrtf rfdhpñíp rfe Frfzípl, Mgtfvá nglqksiká qsl fakpl. Y bpl epvgl lg kfdhigkfe, y ef hsnigkfe ik p Qpklil. 



Kgiepnf ng Mfkpd ng Msná

2 Rkóeirpl 21
(2 K. 8.16-24)

1 Nskdió Mflpcpq rfe lsl hpnkgl, y bf lghsbqpkfe rfe lsl hpnkgl ge bp risnpn ng Npvin. Y kgieó ge ls bsupk Mfkpd ls timf, 
2 jsige qsvf hfk tgkdpefl, timfl ng Mflpcpq, p Pzpkípl, Mgtigb, Zprpkípl, Pzpkípl, Dirpgb, y Lgcpqípl. Qfnfl glqfl csgkfe timfl ng Mflpcpq kgy ng Msná. 
3 Y ls hpnkg bgl tpaíp npnf dsrtfl kgupbfl ng fkf y ng hbpqp, y rflpl hkgriflpl, y risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ge Msná; hgkf tpaíp npnf gb kgief p Mfkpd, hfkjsg éb gkp gb hkidfuéeiqf. 

4 Csg gbgvpnf, hsgl, Mfkpd pb kgief ng ls hpnkg; y bsguf jsg lg tizf csgkqg, dpqó p glhpnp p qfnfl lsl tgkdpefl, y qpdaiée p pbusefl ng bfl hkíerihgl ng Ilkpgb. 
5 Rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk gkp ng qkgieqp y nfl pñfl, y kgieó frtf pñfl ge Mgkslpbée. 
6 Y pensvf ge gb rpdief ng bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb, rfdf bf tizf bp rplp ng Prpa; hfkjsg qgeíp hfk dsmgk p bp timp ng Prpa, g tizf bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá. 

7 Dpl Mgtfvá ef jsilf nglqksik bp rplp ng Npvin, p rpslp ngb hprqf jsg tpaíp tgrtf rfe Npvin, y hfkjsg bg tpaíp nirtf jsg bg npkíp bádhpkp p éb y p lsl timfl hgkhgqspdgeqg. 
8 Ge bfl nípl ng élqg lg kgagbó Gnfd rfeqkp gb nfdieif ng Msná, y hsligkfe kgy lfakg lí. 
9 Geqfergl hpló Mfkpd rfe lsl hkíerihgl, y qfnfl lsl rpkkfl; y lg bgvpeqó ng efrtg, y ngkkfqó p bfl gnfdiqpl jsg bg tpaípe liqipnf, y p qfnfl bfl rfdpenpeqgl ng bfl rpkkfl. 

10 Ef falqpeqg, Gnfd lg biagkqó ngb nfdieif ng Msná, tplqp tfy. Qpdaiée ge gb dildf qigdhf Biaep lg biagkqó ng ls nfdieif, hfk rspeqf éb tpaíp ngmpnf p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. 
11 Pngdál ng glqf, tizf bsupkgl pbqfl ge bfl dfeqgl ng Msná, g tizf jsg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée cfkeirplge qkpl gbbfl, y p gbbf idhgbió p Msná. 

12 Bg bbguó sep rpkqp ngb hkfcgqp Gbípl, jsg ngríp: Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Npvin qs hpnkg tp nirtf plí: Hfk rspeqf ef tpl penpnf ge bfl rpdiefl ng Mflpcpq qs hpnkg, ei ge bfl rpdiefl ng Plp kgy ng Msná, 
13 lief jsg tpl penpnf ge gb rpdief ng bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb, y tpl tgrtf jsg cfkeirplg Msná y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, rfdf cfkeiró bp rplp ng Prpa; y pngdál tpl npnf dsgkqg p qsl tgkdpefl, p bp cpdibip ng qs hpnkg, bfl rspbgl gkpe dgmfkgl jsg qú; 
14 tg pjsí Mgtfvá tgkiká p qs hsgabf ng sep ukpe hbpup, y p qsl timfl y p qsl dsmgkgl, y p qfnf rspeqf qigegl;
15 y p qi rfe dsrtpl gecgkdgnpngl, rfe gecgkdgnpn ng qsl ieqglqiefl, tplqp jsg lg qg lpbupe p rpslp ng qs hgklilqgeqg gecgkdgnpn. 

16 Geqfergl Mgtfvá nglhgkqó rfeqkp Mfkpd bp ikp ng bfl cibilqgfl y ng bfl ákpagl jsg glqpape mseqf p bfl gqífhgl; 
17 y lsaigkfe rfeqkp Msná, g ievpnigkfe bp qigkkp, y qfdpkfe qfnfl bfl aigegl jsg tpbbpkfe ge bp rplp ngb kgy, y p lsl timfl y p lsl dsmgkgl; y ef bg jsgnó dál timf lief lfbpdgeqg Mfprpz gb dgefk ng lsl timfl. 
18 Nglhsél ng qfnf glqf, Mgtfvá bf tikió rfe sep gecgkdgnpn ierskpabg ge bfl ieqglqiefl. 

19 Y prfeqgrió jsg pb hplpk dsrtfl nípl, pb cie, pb rpaf ng nfl pñfl, bfl ieqglqiefl lg bg lpbigkfe hfk bp gecgkdgnpn, dskigenf plí ng gecgkdgnpn dsy hgeflp. Y ef gergenigkfe csguf ge ls tfefk, rfdf bf tpaípe tgrtf rfe lsl hpnkgl. 
20 Rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk gkp ng qkgieqp y nfl pñfl, y kgieó ge Mgkslpbée frtf pñfl; y dskió lie jsg bf nglgpkpe dál. Y bf lghsbqpkfe ge bp risnpn ng Npvin, hgkf ef ge bfl lghsbrkfl ng bfl kgygl. 



Kgiepnf ng Frfzípl ng Msná

2 Rkóeirpl 22
(2 K. 8.25-29)

1 Bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng Mgkslpbée tirigkfe kgy ge bsupk ng Mfkpd p Frfzípl ls timf dgefk; hfkjsg sep apenp pkdpnp jsg tpaíp vgeinf rfe bfl ákpagl pb rpdhpdgeqf, tpaíp dpqpnf p qfnfl bfl dpyfkgl, hfk bf rspb kgieó Frfzípl, timf ng Mfkpd kgy ng Msná. 
2 Rspenf Frfzípl rfdgezó p kgiepk gkp ng rspkgeqp y nfl pñfl, y kgieó se pñf ge Mgkslpbée. Gb efdakg ng ls dpnkg csg Pqpbíp, timp ng Fdki. 
3 Qpdaiée éb pensvf ge bfl rpdiefl ng bp rplp ng Prpa, hsgl ls dpnkg bg prfelgmpap p jsg prqsplg idhípdgeqg. 

4 Tizf, hsgl, bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, rfdf bp rplp ng Prpa; hfkjsg nglhsél ng bp dsgkqg ng ls hpnkg, gbbfl bg prfelgmpkfe hpkp ls hgknirióe. 
5 Y éb pensvf ge bfl rfelgmfl ng gbbfl, y csg p bp usgkkp rfe Mfkpd timf ng Prpa, kgy ng Ilkpgb, rfeqkp Tpzpgb kgy ng Likip, p Kpdfq ng Upbppn, nfeng bfl likifl tikigkfe p Mfkpd. 
6 Y vfbvió hpkp rskpklg ge Mgzkggb ng bpl tgkinpl jsg bg tpaípe tgrtf ge Kpdfq, hgbgpenf rfeqkp Tpzpgb kgy ng Likip. Y nglrgenió Frfzípl timf ng Mfkpd, kgy ng Msná, hpkp viliqpk p Mfkpd timf ng Prpa ge Mgzkggb, hfkjsg pbbí glqpap gecgkdf. 



Mgtú dpqp p Frfzípl
(2 K. 9.27-29)

7 Hgkf glqf vgeíp ng Nifl, hpkp jsg Frfzípl csglg nglqksinf vieigenf p Mfkpd; hfkjsg tpaigenf vgeinf, lpbió rfe Mfkpd rfeqkp Mgtú timf ng Eidli, pb rspb Mgtfvá tpaíp seuinf hpkp jsg gxqgkdiepkp bp cpdibip ng Prpa. 
8 Y tprigenf msirif Mgtú rfeqkp bp rplp ng Prpa, tpbbó p bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná, y p bfl timfl ng bfl tgkdpefl ng Frfzípl, jsg lgkvípe p Frfzípl, y bfl dpqó. 
9 Y aslrpenf p Frfzípl, gb rspb lg tpaíp glrfeninf ge Lpdpkip, bf tpbbpkfe y bf qkpmgkfe p Mgtú, y bg dpqpkfe; y bg nigkfe lghsbqskp, hfkjsg nimgkfe: Gl timf ng Mflpcpq, jsige ng qfnf ls rfkpzóe aslró p Mgtfvá. Y bp rplp ng Frfzípl ef qgeíp csgkzpl hpkp hfngk kgqgegk gb kgief. 



Pqpbíp slskhp gb qkfef
(2 K. 11.1-21)

10 Geqfergl Pqpbíp dpnkg ng Frfzípl, vigenf jsg ls timf gkp dsgkqf, lg bgvpeqó y gxqgkdieó qfnp bp nglrgengerip kgpb ng bp rplp ng Msná. 
11 Hgkf Mflpagq, timp ngb kgy, qfdó p Mfál timf ng Frfzípl, y glrfeniéenfbf ng geqkg bfl ngdál timfl ngb kgy, p bfl rspbgl dpqpape, bg uspknó p éb y p ls pdp ge sef ng bfl phflgeqfl. Plí bf glrfenió Mflpagq, timp ngb kgy Mfkpd, dsmgk ngb lprgknfqg Mfipnp (hfkjsg gbbp gkp tgkdpep ng Frfzípl), ng ngbpeqg ng Pqpbíp, y ef bf dpqpkfe. 
12 Y glqsvf rfe gbbfl glrfeninf ge bp rplp ng Nifl lgil pñfl. Geqkg qpeqf, Pqpbíp kgiepap ge gb hpíl. 



2 Rkóeirpl 23

1 Ge gb léhqidf pñf lg áeidf Mfipnp, y qfdó rfeliuf ge pbipezp p bfl mgcgl ng rgeqgepl Pzpkípl timf ng Mgkftpd, Ildpgb timf ng Mftpeáe, Pzpkípl timf ng Fagn, Dpplípl timf ng Pnpíp, y Gbilpcpq timf ng Zirki, 
2 bfl rspbgl kgrfkkigkfe gb hpíl ng Msná, y kgseigkfe p bfl bgviqpl ng qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná y p bfl hkíerihgl ng bpl cpdibipl ng Ilkpgb, y vieigkfe p Mgkslpbée. 

3 Y qfnp bp dsbqiqsn tizf hprqf rfe gb kgy ge bp rplp ng Nifl. Y Mfipnp bgl nimf: Tg pjsí gb timf ngb kgy, gb rspb kgiepká, rfdf Mgtfvá tp nirtf kglhgrqf p bfl timfl ng Npvin. 
4 Ptfkp tprgn glqf: sep qgkrgkp hpkqg ng vflfqkfl, bfl jsg geqkpe gb níp ng kghflf, glqpkáe ng hfkqgkfl rfe bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl. 
5 Fqkp qgkrgkp hpkqg, p bp rplp ngb kgy; y bp fqkp qgkrgkp hpkqg, p bp hsgkqp ngb Ridigeqf; y qfnf gb hsgabf glqpká ge bfl hpqifl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

6 Y eieusef geqkg ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, lief bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl jsg dieilqkpe; élqfl geqkpkáe, hfkjsg glqáe rfelpukpnfl; y qfnf gb hsgabf tpká uspknip ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 
7 Y bfl bgviqpl kfngpkáe pb kgy hfk qfnpl hpkqgl, y rpnp sef qgenká lsl pkdpl ge bp dpef; rspbjsigkp jsg geqkg ge bp rplp, jsg dsgkp; y glqpkéil rfe gb kgy rspenf geqkg y rspenf lpbup. 

8 Y bfl bgviqpl y qfnf Msná bf tirigkfe qfnf rfdf bf tpaíp dpenpnf gb lprgknfqg Mfipnp; y qfdó rpnp mgcg p bfl lsyfl, bfl jsg geqkpape gb níp ng kghflf, y bfl jsg lpbípe gb níp ng kghflf; hfkjsg gb lprgknfqg Mfipnp ef nif birgerip p bpl rfdhpñípl. 
9 Nif qpdaiée gb lprgknfqg Mfipnp p bfl mgcgl ng rgeqgepl bpl bpezpl, bfl hpvglgl y bfl glrsnfl jsg tpaípe linf ngb kgy Npvin, y jsg glqpape ge bp rplp ng Nifl; 
10 y hslf ge fknge p qfnf gb hsgabf, qgeigenf rpnp sef ls glhpnp ge bp dpef, nglng gb kieróe ngkgrtf ngb qgdhbf tplqp gb izjsigknf, tprip gb pbqpk y bp rplp, pbkgngnfk ngb kgy hfk qfnpl hpkqgl. 

11 Geqfergl lprpkfe pb timf ngb kgy, y bg hsligkfe bp rfkfep y gb qglqidfeif, y bf hkfrbpdpkfe kgy; y Mfipnp y lsl timfl bf seuigkfe, nirigenf bsguf: ¡Vivp gb kgy! 
12 Rspenf Pqpbíp fyó gb glqksgenf ng bp ugeqg jsg rfkkíp, y ng bfl jsg prbpdpape pb kgy, vief pb hsgabf p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; 
13 y dikpenf, vif pb kgy jsg glqpap mseqf p ls rfbsdep p bp geqkpnp, y bfl hkíerihgl y bfl qkfdhgqgkfl mseqf pb kgy, y jsg qfnf gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp dflqkpap pbgukíp, y lfepap afriepl, y bfl rpeqfkgl rfe ielqksdgeqfl ng dúlirp nikiuípe bp pbpapezp. Geqfergl Pqpbíp kpluó lsl vglqinfl, y nimf: ¡Qkpirióe! ¡Qkpirióe!

14 Hgkf gb lprgknfqg Mfipnp dpenó jsg lpbigkpe bfl mgcgl ng rgeqgepl ngb gmékriqf, y bgl nimf: Lprpnbp csgkp ngb kgrieqf, y pb jsg bp liusigkg, dpqpnbf p cibf ng glhpnp; hfkjsg gb lprgknfqg tpaíp dpenpnf jsg ef bp dpqplge ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
15 Gbbfl, hsgl, bg grtpkfe dpef, y bsguf jsg gbbp tsaf hplpnf bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp ng bfl rpapbbfl ng bp rplp ngb kgy, pbbí bp dpqpkfe. 

16 Y Mfipnp tizf se hprqf geqkg lí y qfnf gb hsgabf y gb kgy, jsg lgkípe hsgabf ng Mgtfvá. 
17 Nglhsél ng glqf geqkó qfnf gb hsgabf ge gb qgdhbf ng Appb, y bf ngkkiapkfe, y qpdaiée lsl pbqpkgl; g tirigkfe hgnpzfl lsl idáugegl, y dpqpkfe ngbpeqg ng bfl pbqpkgl p Dpqáe, lprgknfqg ng Appb. 
18 Bsguf fkngeó Mfipnp bfl fcirifl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, apmf bp dpef ng bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, lguúe Npvin bfl tpaíp nilqkiasinf ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, hpkp fckgrgk p Mgtfvá bfl tfbfrpslqfl, rfdf glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy ng Dfilél, rfe ufzf y rfe ráeqirfl, rfecfkdg p bp nilhflirióe ng Npvin. 

19 Hslf qpdaiée hfkqgkfl p bpl hsgkqpl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg hfk eieusep víp geqkplg eieuúe iedsenf. 
20 Bbpdó nglhsél p bfl mgcgl ng rgeqgepl, y p bfl hkierihpbgl, p bfl jsg ufagkepape gb hsgabf y p qfnf gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp, hpkp rfensrik pb kgy nglng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; y rspenf bbgupkfe p bp diqpn ng bp hsgkqp dpyfk ng bp rplp ngb kgy, lgeqpkfe pb kgy lfakg gb qkfef ngb kgief. 
21 Y lg kgufrimó qfnf gb hsgabf ngb hpíl; y bp risnpn glqsvf qkpejsibp, nglhsél jsg dpqpkfe p Pqpbíp p cibf ng glhpnp. 



Kgiepnf ng Mfál ng Msná

2 Rkóeirpl 24
(2 K. 12.1-21)

1 Ng ligqg pñfl gkp Mfál rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y rspkgeqp pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée. Gb efdakg ng ls dpnkg csg Liaip, ng Aggklgap. 
2 G tizf Mfál bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá qfnfl bfl nípl ng Mfipnp gb lprgknfqg. 
3 Y Mfipnp qfdó hpkp éb nfl dsmgkgl; y geugenkó timfl g timpl. 

4 Nglhsél ng glqf, prfeqgrió jsg Mfál ngrinió kglqpskpk bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
5 Y kgseió p bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl, y bgl nimf: Lpbin hfk bpl risnpngl ng Msná, y kgrfugn niegkf ng qfnf Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg rpnp pñf lgp kghpkpnp bp rplp ng vsglqkf Nifl; y vflfqkfl hfegn nibiugerip ge gb plseqf. Hgkf bfl bgviqpl ef hsligkfe nibiugerip. 

6 Hfk bf rspb gb kgy bbpdó pb lsdf lprgknfqg Mfipnp y bg nimf: ¿Hfk jsé ef tpl hkfrskpnf jsg bfl bgviqpl qkpiupe ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée bp fckgenp jsg Dfilél ligkvf ng Mgtfvá idhslf p bp rfeukguprióe ng Ilkpgb hpkp gb qpagkeársbf ngb qglqidfeif? 
7 Hfkjsg bp idhíp Pqpbíp y lsl timfl tpaípe nglqksinf bp rplp ng Nifl, y pngdál tpaípe uplqpnf ge bfl ínfbfl qfnpl bpl rflpl rfelpukpnpl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
8 Dpenó, hsgl, gb kgy jsg tiriglge se pkrp, bp rspb hsligkfe csgkp, p bp hsgkqp ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; 

9 g tirigkfe hkgufepk ge Msná y ge Mgkslpbée, jsg qkpmglge p Mgtfvá bp fckgenp jsg Dfilél ligkvf ng Nifl tpaíp idhsglqf p Ilkpgb ge gb ngligkqf. 
10 Y qfnfl bfl mgcgl y qfnf gb hsgabf lg ufzpkfe, y qkpmgkfe fckgenpl, y bpl grtpkfe ge gb pkrp tplqp bbgepkbp. 
11 Y rspenf vgeíp gb qigdhf hpkp bbgvpk gb pkrp pb lgrkgqpkif ngb kgy hfk dpef ng bfl bgviqpl, rspenf vgípe jsg tpaíp dsrtf niegkf, vgeíp gb glrkiap ngb kgy, y gb jsg glqpap hsglqf hfk gb lsdf lprgknfqg, y bbgvpape gb pkrp, y bp vpripape, y bp vfbvípe p ls bsupk. Plí bf tprípe ng níp ge níp, y kgrfuípe dsrtf niegkf, 

12 y gb kgy y Mfipnp bf npape p bfl jsg tprípe gb qkpapmf ngb lgkvirif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; y qfdpape rpeqgkfl y rpkhieqgkfl jsg kghpkplge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y pkqícirgl ge tigkkf y akferg hpkp rfdhfegk bp rplp. 
13 Tprípe, hsgl, bfl pkqglpefl bp fakp, y hfk lsl dpefl bp fakp csg kglqpskpnp, y kglqiqsygkfe bp rplp ng Nifl p ls peqiusp rfenirióe, y bp rfelfbinpkfe. 

14 Y rspenf qgkdiepkfe, qkpmgkfe pb kgy y p Mfipnp bf jsg jsgnpap ngb niegkf, g tirigkfe ng éb sqgelibifl hpkp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, sqgelibifl hpkp gb lgkvirif, dfkqgkfl, rsrtpkpl, vplfl ng fkf y ng hbpqp. Y lprkicirpape tfbfrpslqfl rfeqiespdgeqg ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá qfnfl bfl nípl ng Mfipnp. 
15 Dpl Mfipnp gevgmgrió, y dskió bbgef ng nípl; ng rigeqf qkgieqp pñfl gkp rspenf dskió. 
16 Y bf lghsbqpkfe ge bp risnpn ng Npvin rfe bfl kgygl, hfk rspeqf tpaíp tgrtf aige rfe Ilkpgb, y hpkp rfe Nifl, y rfe ls rplp. 

17 Dsgkqf Mfipnp, vieigkfe bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná y fckgrigkfe fagnigerip pb kgy; y gb kgy bfl fyó. 
18 Y nglpdhpkpkfe bp rplp ng Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, y likvigkfe p bfl lídafbfl ng Plgkp y p bpl idáugegl glrsbhinpl. Geqfergl bp ikp ng Nifl vief lfakg Msná y Mgkslpbée hfk glqg ls hgrpnf. 
19 Y bgl gevió hkfcgqpl hpkp jsg bfl vfbviglge p Mgtfvá, bfl rspbgl bgl pdfeglqpkfe; dpl gbbfl ef bfl glrsrtpkfe. 

20 Geqfergl gb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl vief lfakg Zprpkípl timf ngb lprgknfqg Mfipnp; y hsglqf ge hig, nfeng glqpap dál pbqf jsg gb hsgabf, bgl nimf: Plí tp nirtf Nifl: ¿Hfk jsé jsgakpeqáil bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá? Ef fl vgenká aige hfk gbbf; hfkjsg hfk tpagk ngmpnf p Mgtfvá, éb qpdaiée fl papenfepká. 
21 Hgkf gbbfl tirigkfe rfelhikprióe rfeqkp éb, y hfk dpenpqf ngb kgy bf phgnkgpkfe tplqp dpqpkbf, ge gb hpqif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
22 Plí gb kgy Mfál ef lg prfknó ng bp dilgkirfknip jsg Mfipnp hpnkg ng Zprpkípl tpaíp tgrtf rfe éb, peqgl dpqó p ls timf, jsige nimf pb dfkik: Mgtfvá bf vgp y bf ngdpeng. 

23 P bp vsgbqp ngb pñf lsaió rfeqkp éb gb gmékriqf ng Likip; y vieigkfe p Msná y p Mgkslpbée, y nglqksygkfe ge gb hsgabf p qfnfl bfl hkierihpbgl ng éb, y gevipkfe qfnf gb afqíe pb kgy p Npdplrf. 
24 Hfkjsg psejsg gb gmékriqf ng Likip tpaíp vgeinf rfe hfrp ugeqg, Mgtfvá geqkguó ge lsl dpefl se gmékriqf dsy esdgkflf, hfk rspeqf tpaípe ngmpnf p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. Plí gmgrsqpkfe msirifl rfeqkp Mfál. 

25 Y rspenf lg csgkfe bfl likifl, bf ngmpkfe pufaipnf hfk lsl nfbgeripl; y rfelhikpkfe rfeqkp éb lsl ligkvfl p rpslp ng bp lpeukg ng bfl timfl ng Mfipnp gb lprgknfqg, y bf tikigkfe ge ls rpdp, y dskió. Y bf lghsbqpkfe ge bp risnpn ng Npvin, hgkf ef ge bfl lghsbrkfl ng bfl kgygl. 
26 Bfl jsg rfelhikpkfe rfeqkp éb csgkfe Zpapn timf ng Lidgpq pdfeiqp, y Mfzpapn timf ng Lidkiq dfpaiqp. 
27 Ge rspeqf p bfl timfl ng Mfál, y bp dsbqihbirprióe jsg tizf ng bpl kgeqpl, y bp kglqpskprióe ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, tg pjsí glqá glrkiqf ge bp tilqfkip ngb biakf ng bfl kgygl. Y kgieó ge ls bsupk Pdplípl ls timf. 



Kgiepnf ng Pdplípl

2 Rkóeirpl 25
(2 K. 14.1-22)


1 Ng vgieqirierf pñfl gkp Pdplípl rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y vgieqiesgvg pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée; gb efdakg ng ls dpnkg csg Mfpnáe, ng Mgkslpbée. 
2 Tizf éb bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, psejsg ef ng hgkcgrqf rfkpzóe. 
3 Y bsguf jsg csg rfecikdpnf ge gb kgief, dpqó p bfl ligkvfl jsg tpaípe dpqpnf pb kgy ls hpnkg. 

4 Hgkf ef dpqó p bfl timfl ng gbbfl, lguúe bf jsg glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy, ge gb biakf ng Dfilél, nfeng Mgtfvá dpenó nirigenf: Ef dfkikáe bfl hpnkgl hfk bfl timfl, ei bfl timfl hfk bfl hpnkgl; dpl rpnp sef dfkiká hfk ls hgrpnf. 
5 Kgseió bsguf Pdplípl p Msná, y rfe pkkgubf p bpl cpdibipl bgl hslf mgcgl ng dibbpkgl y ng rgeqgepl lfakg qfnf Msná y Agempdíe. Nglhsél hslf ge bilqp p qfnfl bfl ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, y csgkfe tpbbpnfl qkglrigeqfl dib glrfuinfl hpkp lpbik p bp usgkkp, jsg qgeípe bpezp y glrsnf. 
6 Y ng Ilkpgb qfdó p lsgbnf hfk rige qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp, p rige dib tfdakgl vpbigeqgl. 

7 Dpl se vpkóe ng Nifl vief p éb y bg nimf: Kgy, ef vpyp rfeqiuf gb gmékriqf ng Ilkpgb; hfkjsg Mgtfvá ef glqá rfe Ilkpgb, ei rfe qfnfl bfl timfl ng Gckpíe. 
8 Hgkf li vpl plí, li bf tprgl, y qg glcsgkzpl hpkp hgbgpk, Nifl qg tpká rpgk ngbpeqg ng bfl gegdiufl; hfkjsg ge Nifl glqá gb hfngk, f hpkp pysnpk, f hpkp ngkkiapk. 
9 Y Pdplípl nimf pb vpkóe ng Nifl: ¿Jsé, hsgl, lg tpká ng bfl rige qpbgeqfl jsg tg npnf pb gmékriqf ng Ilkpgb? Y gb vpkóe ng Nifl kglhfenió: Mgtfvá hsgng npkqg dsrtf dál jsg glqf. 

10 Geqfergl Pdplípl phpkqó gb gmékriqf ng bp ugeqg jsg tpaíp vgeinf p éb ng Gckpíe, hpkp jsg lg csglge p lsl rplpl; y gbbfl lg gefmpkfe ukpengdgeqg rfeqkp Msná, y vfbvigkfe p lsl rplpl gerfbgkizpnfl. 
11 Glcfkzáenflg geqfergl Pdplípl, lpró p ls hsgabf, y vief pb Vpbbg ng bp Lpb, y dpqó ng bfl timfl ng Lgik nigz dib. 
12 Y bfl timfl ng Msná qfdpkfe vivfl p fqkfl nigz dib, bfl rspbgl bbgvpkfe p bp rsdakg ng se hgñplrf, y ng pbbí bfl nglhgñpkfe, y qfnfl lg tirigkfe hgnpzfl. 

13 Dpl bfl ngb gmékriqf jsg Pdplípl tpaíp nglhgninf, hpkp jsg ef csglge rfe éb p bp usgkkp, ievpnigkfe bpl risnpngl ng Msná, nglng Lpdpkip tplqp Agq-tfkóe, y dpqpkfe p qkgl dib ng gbbfl, y qfdpkfe ukpe nglhfmf. 
14 Vfbvigenf bsguf Pdplípl ng bp dpqpezp ng bfl gnfdiqpl, qkpmf qpdaiée rfeliuf bfl niflgl ng bfl timfl ng Lgik, y bfl hslf peqg lí hfk niflgl, y bfl pnfkó, y bgl jsgdó ierigelf. 

15 Hfk glqf lg gergenió bp ikp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp Pdplípl, y gevió p éb se hkfcgqp, jsg bg nimf: ¿Hfk jsé tpl aslrpnf bfl niflgl ng fqkp eprióe, jsg ef biakpkfe p ls hsgabf ng qsl dpefl? 
16 Y tpabáenfbg gb hkfcgqp glqpl rflpl, éb bg kglhfenió: ¿Qg tpe hsglqf p qi hfk rfelgmgkf ngb kgy? Némpqg ng glf. ¿Hfk jsé jsigkgl jsg qg dpqge? Y rspenf qgkdieó ng tpabpk, gb hkfcgqp nimf bsguf: Yf lé jsg Nifl tp ngrkgqpnf nglqksikqg, hfkjsg tpl tgrtf glqf, y ef fagngrilqg di rfelgmf. 

17 Y Pdplípl kgy ng Msná, nglhsél ng qfdpk rfelgmf, gevió p ngrik p Mfál timf ng Mfprpz, timf ng Mgtú, kgy ng Ilkpgb: Vge, y vgádfefl rpkp p rpkp. 
18 Geqfergl Mfál kgy ng Ilkpgb gevió p ngrik p Pdplípl kgy ng Msná: Gb rpknf jsg glqpap ge gb Bíapef gevió pb rgnkf jsg glqpap ge gb Bíapef, nirigenf: Np qs timp p di timf hfk dsmgk. Y tg pjsí jsg bpl cigkpl jsg glqpape ge gb Bíapef hplpkfe, y tfbbpkfe gb rpknf. 

19 Qú nirgl: Tg pjsí tg ngkkfqpnf p Gnfd; y qs rfkpzóe lg gepbqgrg hpkp ubfkipkqg. Jsénpqg ptfkp ge qs rplp. ¿Hpkp jsé hkfvfrpl se dpb ge jsg hsgnpl rpgk qú y Msná rfeqiuf? 
20 Dpl Pdplípl ef jsilf fík; hfkjsg gkp bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl, jsg bfl jsgkíp geqkgupk ge dpefl ng lsl gegdiufl, hfk rspeqf tpaípe aslrpnf bfl niflgl ng Gnfd. 

21 Lsaió, hsgl, Mfál kgy ng Ilkpgb, y lg vigkfe rpkp p rpkp éb y Pdplípl kgy ng Msná ge bp apqpbbp ng Agq-lgdgl, bp rspb gl ng Msná. 
22 Hgkf rpyó Msná ngbpeqg ng Ilkpgb, y tsyó rpnp sef p ls rplp. 
23 Y Mfál kgy ng Ilkpgb phkgló ge Agq-lgdgl p Pdplípl kgy ng Msná, timf ng Mfál, timf ng Mfprpz, y bf bbgvó p Mgkslpbée; y ngkkiaó gb dskf ng Mgkslpbée nglng bp hsgkqp ng Gckpíe tplqp bp hsgkqp ngb áeusbf, se qkpdf ng rspqkfrigeqfl rfnfl. 
24 Plidildf qfdó qfnf gb fkf y bp hbpqp, y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl jsg lg tpbbpkfe ge bp rplp ng Nifl ge rplp ng Fagn-gnfd, y bfl qglfkfl ng bp rplp ngb kgy, y bfl timfl ng bfl efabgl; nglhsél vfbvió p Lpdpkip. 

25 Y vivió Pdplípl timf ng Mfál, kgy ng Msná, jsierg pñfl nglhsél ng bp dsgkqg ng Mfál timf ng Mfprpz, kgy ng Ilkpgb. 
26 Bfl ngdál tgrtfl ng Pdplípl, hkidgkfl y hflqkgkfl, ¿ef glqáe glrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bfl kgygl ng Msná y ng Ilkpgb? 

27 Nglng gb qigdhf ge jsg Pdplípl lg phpkqó ng Mgtfvá, gdhgzpkfe p rfelhikpk rfeqkp éb ge Mgkslpbée; y tpaigenf éb tsinf p Bpjsil, gevipkfe qkpl éb p Bpjsil, y pbbá bf dpqpkfe; 
28 y bf qkpmgkfe ge rpapbbfl, y bf lghsbqpkfe rfe lsl hpnkgl ge bp risnpn ng Msná. 



Kgiepnf ng Szípl

2 Rkóeirpl 26
(2 K. 15.1-7)

1 Geqfergl qfnf gb hsgabf ng Msná qfdó p Szípl, gb rspb qgeíp nigriléil pñfl ng gnpn, y bf hsligkfe hfk kgy ge bsupk ng Pdplípl ls hpnkg. 
2 Szípl gniciró p Gbfq, y bp kglqiqsyó p Msná nglhsél jsg gb kgy Pdplípl nskdió rfe lsl hpnkgl. 
3 Ng nigriléil pñfl gkp Szípl rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y riersgeqp y nfl pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée. Gb efdakg ng ls dpnkg csg Mgrfbípl, ng Mgkslpbée. 

4 G tizf bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg tpaíp tgrtf Pdplípl ls hpnkg. 
5 Y hgklilqió ge aslrpk p Nifl ge bfl nípl ng Zprpkípl, geqgeninf ge vilifegl ng Nifl; y ge glqfl nípl ge jsg aslró p Mgtfvá, éb bg hkflhgkó. 

6 Y lpbió y hgbgó rfeqkp bfl cibilqgfl, y kfdhió gb dskf ng Upq, y gb dskf ng Mpaeip, y gb dskf ng Plnfn; y gniciró risnpngl ge Plnfn, y ge bp qigkkp ng bfl cibilqgfl. 
7 Nifl bg nif pysnp rfeqkp bfl cibilqgfl, y rfeqkp bfl ákpagl jsg tpaiqpape ge Usk-appb, y rfeqkp bfl pdfeiqpl. 
8 Y nigkfe bfl pdfeiqpl hkglgeqgl p Szípl, y lg nivsbuó ls cpdp tplqp bp ckfeqgkp ng Guihqf; hfkjsg lg tpaíp tgrtf pbqpdgeqg hfngkflf. 

9 Gniciró qpdaiée Szípl qfkkgl ge Mgkslpbée, mseqf p bp hsgkqp ngb áeusbf, y mseqf p bp hsgkqp ngb vpbbg, y mseqf p bpl gljsiepl; y bpl cfkqiciró. 
10 Plidildf gniciró qfkkgl ge gb ngligkqf, y pakió dsrtpl rilqgkepl; hfkjsg qsvf dsrtfl upepnfl, plí ge bp Lgcgbp rfdf ge bpl vgupl, y viñpl y bpakpezpl, plí ge bfl dfeqgl rfdf ge bfl bbpefl cékqibgl; hfkjsg gkp pdiuf ng bp pukirsbqskp. 

11 Qsvf qpdaiée Szípl se gmékriqf ng usgkkgkfl, bfl rspbgl lpbípe p bp usgkkp ge nivilifegl, ng prsgknf rfe bp bilqp tgrtp hfk dpef ng Mgigb glrkiap, y ng Dpplípl ufagkepnfk, y ng Tpepeípl, sef ng bfl mgcgl ngb kgy. 
12 Qfnf gb eúdgkf ng bfl mgcgl ng cpdibip, vpbigeqgl y glcfkzpnfl, gkp nfl dib lgilrigeqfl. 
13 Y apmf bp dpef ng élqfl glqpap gb gmékriqf ng usgkkp, ng qkglrigeqfl ligqg dib jsieigeqfl usgkkgkfl hfngkflfl y csgkqgl, hpkp pysnpk pb kgy rfeqkp bfl gegdiufl. 

14 Y Szípl hkghpkó hpkp qfnf gb gmékriqf glrsnfl, bpezpl, ygbdfl, rflgbgqgl, pkrfl, y tfenpl hpkp qikpk hignkpl. 
15 G tizf ge Mgkslpbée dájsiepl ievgeqpnpl hfk ieugeigkfl, hpkp jsg glqsviglge ge bpl qfkkgl y ge bfl apbspkqgl, hpkp pkkfmpk lpgqpl y ukpengl hignkpl. Y ls cpdp lg gxqgenió bgmfl, hfkjsg csg pysnpnf dpkpvibbflpdgeqg, tplqp tprgklg hfngkflf. 

16 Dpl rspenf yp gkp csgkqg ls rfkpzóe lg gepbqgrió hpkp ls ksiep; hfkjsg lg kgagbó rfeqkp Mgtfvá ls Nifl, geqkpenf ge gb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá hpkp jsgdpk ierigelf ge gb pbqpk ngb ierigelf. 
17 Y geqkó qkpl éb gb lprgknfqg Pzpkípl, y rfe éb frtgeqp lprgknfqgl ng Mgtfvá, vpkfegl vpbigeqgl. 
18 Y lg hsligkfe rfeqkp gb kgy Szípl, y bg nimgkfe: Ef qg rfkkglhfeng p qi, ft Szípl, gb jsgdpk ierigelf p Mgtfvá, lief p bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Ppkóe, jsg lfe rfelpukpnfl hpkp jsgdpkbf. Lpb ngb lpeqspkif, hfkjsg tpl hkgvpkirpnf, y ef qg lgká hpkp ubfkip ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá Nifl. 
19 Geqfergl Szípl, qgeigenf ge bp dpef se iergelpkif hpkp fckgrgk ierigelf, lg bbgeó ng ikp; y ge ls ikp rfeqkp bfl lprgknfqgl, bp bghkp bg akfqó ge bp ckgeqg, ngbpeqg ng bfl lprgknfqgl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, mseqf pb pbqpk ngb ierigelf. 

20 Y bg dikó gb lsdf lprgknfqg Pzpkípl, y qfnfl bfl lprgknfqgl, y tg pjsí bp bghkp glqpap ge ls ckgeqg; y bg tirigkfe lpbik phkglskpnpdgeqg ng pjsgb bsupk; y éb qpdaiée lg nif hkilp p lpbik, hfkjsg Mgtfvá bf tpaíp tgkinf. 
21 Plí gb kgy Szípl csg bghkflf tplqp gb níp ng ls dsgkqg, y tpaiqó bghkflf ge sep rplp phpkqpnp, hfk bf rspb csg gxrbsinf ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; y Mfqpd ls timf qsvf rpkuf ng bp rplp kgpb, ufagkepenf pb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp. 
22 Bfl ngdál tgrtfl ng Szípl, hkidgkfl y hflqkgkfl, csgkfe glrkiqfl hfk gb hkfcgqp Ilpípl, timf ng Pdfz. 
23 Y nskdió Szípl rfe lsl hpnkgl, y bf lghsbqpkfe rfe lsl hpnkgl ge gb rpdhf ng bfl lghsbrkfl kgpbgl; hfkjsg nimgkfe: Bghkflf gl. Y kgieó Mfqpd ls timf ge bsupk lsyf. 



Kgiepnf ng Mfqpd

2 Rkóeirpl 27
(2 K. 15.32-38)

1 Ng vgieqirierf pñfl gkp Mfqpd rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y nigriléil pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée. Gb efdakg ng ls dpnkg csg Mgkslp, timp ng Lpnfr. 
2 G tizf bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg tpaíp tgrtf Szípl ls hpnkg, lpbvf jsg ef geqkó ge gb lpeqspkif ng Mgtfvá. Hgkf gb hsgabf rfeqiespap rfkkfdhiéenflg. 
3 Gniciró éb bp hsgkqp dpyfk ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y lfakg gb dskf ng bp cfkqpbgzp gniciró dsrtf. 
4 Pngdál gniciró risnpngl ge bpl dfeqpñpl ng Msná, y rfelqksyó cfkqpbgzpl y qfkkgl ge bfl afljsgl. 

5 Qpdaiée qsvf éb usgkkp rfe gb kgy ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe, p bfl rspbgl vgerió; y bg nigkfe bfl timfl ng Pdóe ge pjsgb pñf rige qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp, nigz dib rfkfl ng qkiuf, y nigz dib rfkfl ng rgapnp. Glqf bg nigkfe bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y bf dildf ge gb lgusenf pñf y ge gb qgkrgkf. 

6 Plí jsg Mfqpd lg tizf csgkqg, hfkjsg hkghpkó lsl rpdiefl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 

7 Bfl ngdál tgrtfl ng Mfqpd, y qfnpl lsl usgkkpl, y lsl rpdiefl, tg pjsí glqáe glrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb y ng Msná. 
8 Rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk gkp ng vgieqirierf pñfl, y nigriléil kgieó ge Mgkslpbée.
9 Y nskdió Mfqpd rfe lsl hpnkgl, y bf lghsbqpkfe ge bp risnpn ng Npvin; y kgieó ge ls bsupk Prpz ls timf. 



Kgiepnf ng Prpz

2 Rkóeirpl 28
(2 K. 16.1-20)

1 Ng vgieqg pñfl gkp Prpz rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y nigriléil pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée: dpl ef tizf bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, rfdf Npvin ls hpnkg. 
2 Peqgl pensvf ge bfl rpdiefl ng bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb, y pngdál tizf idáugegl cseninpl p bfl appbgl. 
3 Jsgdó qpdaiée ierigelf ge gb vpbbg ng bfl timfl ng Tiefd, g tizf hplpk p lsl timfl hfk csguf, rfecfkdg p bpl pafdieprifegl ng bpl eprifegl jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp pkkfmpnf ng bp hkglgerip ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 
4 Plidildf lprkiciró y jsgdó ierigelf ge bfl bsupkgl pbqfl, ge bfl rfbbpnfl, y ngapmf ng qfnf ákafb ckfenflf. 

5 Hfk bf rspb Mgtfvá ls Nifl bf geqkguó ge dpefl ngb kgy ng bfl likifl, bfl rspbgl bf ngkkfqpkfe, y bg qfdpkfe ukpe eúdgkf ng hkilifegkfl jsg bbgvpkfe p Npdplrf. Csg qpdaiée geqkgupnf ge dpefl ngb kgy ng Ilkpgb, gb rspb bf apqió rfe ukpe dfkqpenpn. 
6 Hfkjsg Hgop timf ng Kgdpbípl dpqó ge Msná ge se níp rigeqf vgieqg dib tfdakgl vpbigeqgl, hfk rspeqf tpaípe ngmpnf p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. 

7 Plidildf Zirki, tfdakg hfngkflf ng Gckpíe, dpqó p Dpplípl timf ngb kgy, p Pzkirpd ls dpyfknfdf, y p Gbrpep, lgusenf nglhsél ngb kgy. 
8 Qpdaiée bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qfdpkfe rpsqivfl ng lsl tgkdpefl p nflrigeqfl dib, dsmgkgl, dsrtprtfl y dsrtprtpl, pngdál ng tpagk qfdpnf ng gbbfl dsrtf afqíe jsg bbgvpkfe p Lpdpkip. 

9 Tpaíp geqfergl pbbí se hkfcgqp ng Mgtfvá jsg lg bbpdpap Fngn, gb rspb lpbió ngbpeqg ngb gmékriqf rspenf geqkpap ge Lpdpkip, y bgl nimf: Tg pjsí, Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl, hfk gb gefmf rfeqkp Msná, bfl tp geqkgupnf ge vsglqkpl dpefl; y vflfqkfl bfl tpaéil dpqpnf rfe ikp jsg tp bbgupnf tplqp gb rigbf. 

10 Y ptfkp tpaéil ngqgkdiepnf lsmgqpk p vflfqkfl p Msná y p Mgkslpbée rfdf ligkvfl y ligkvpl; dpl ¿ef tpaéil hgrpnf vflfqkfl rfeqkp Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl? 
11 Fíndg, hsgl, ptfkp, y ngvfbvgn p bfl rpsqivfl jsg tpaéil qfdpnf ng vsglqkfl tgkdpefl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá glqá pikpnf rfeqkp vflfqkfl. 

12 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqpkfe pbusefl vpkfegl ng bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl timfl ng Gckpíe, Pzpkípl timf ng Mftpeáe, Agkgjsípl timf ng Dglibgdfq, Gzgjsípl timf ng Lpbsd, y Pdplp timf ng Tpnbpi, rfeqkp bfl jsg vgeípe ng bp usgkkp.  
13 Y bgl nimgkfe: Ef qkpiuáil pjsí p bfl rpsqivfl, hfkjsg gb hgrpnf rfeqkp Mgtfvá glqpká lfakg eflfqkfl. Vflfqkfl qkpqáil ng pñpnik lfakg esglqkfl hgrpnfl y lfakg esglqkpl rsbhpl, ligenf dsy ukpeng esglqkf ngbiqf, y gb pknfk ng bp ikp rfeqkp Ilkpgb. 

14 Geqfergl gb gmékriqf ngmó p bfl rpsqivfl y gb afqíe ngbpeqg ng bfl hkíerihgl y ng qfnp bp dsbqiqsn. 
15 Y lg bgvpeqpkfe bfl vpkfegl efdakpnfl, y qfdpkfe p bfl rpsqivfl, y ngb nglhfmf vilqigkfe p bfl jsg ng gbbfl glqpape nglesnfl; bfl vilqigkfe, bfl rpbzpkfe, y bgl nigkfe ng rfdgk y ng agagk, bfl seuigkfe, y rfensmgkfe ge plefl p qfnfl bfl néaibgl, y bfl bbgvpkfe tplqp Mgkiró, risnpn ng bpl hpbdgkpl, rgkrp ng lsl tgkdpefl; y gbbfl vfbvigkfe p Lpdpkip. 

16 Ge pjsgb qigdhf gevió p hgnik gb kgy Prpz p bfl kgygl ng Plikip jsg bg pysnplge. 
17 Hfkjsg qpdaiée bfl gnfdiqpl tpaípe vgeinf y pqprpnf p bfl ng Msná, y tpaípe bbgvpnf rpsqivfl. 
18 Plidildf bfl cibilqgfl lg tpaípe gxqgeninf hfk bpl risnpngl ng bp Lgcgbp y ngb Egusgv ng Msná, y tpaípe qfdpnf Agq-lgdgl, Pmpbóe, Ugngkfq, Lfrf rfe lsl pbngpl, Qidep qpdaiée rfe lsl pbngpl, y Uidzf rfe lsl pbngpl; y tpaiqpape ge gbbpl. 
19 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá tpaíp tsdibbpnf p Msná hfk rpslp ng Prpz kgy ng Ilkpgb, hfk rspeqf éb tpaíp prqspnf nglgeckgepnpdgeqg ge Msná, y tpaíp hkgvpkirpnf ukpvgdgeqg rfeqkp Mgtfvá. 

20 Qpdaiée vief rfeqkp éb Qiubpq-hibglgk kgy ng bfl plikifl, jsige bf kgnsmf p glqkgrtgz, y ef bf cfkqpbgrió. 
21 Ef falqpeqg jsg nglhfmó Prpz bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bp rplp kgpb, y bpl ng bfl hkíerihgl, hpkp npk pb kgy ng bfl plikifl, élqg ef bg pysnó. 

22 Pngdál gb kgy Prpz ge gb qigdhf jsg pjsgb bg phskpap, pñpnió dpyfk hgrpnf rfeqkp Mgtfvá; 
23 hfkjsg fckgrió lprkicirifl p bfl niflgl ng Npdplrf jsg bg tpaípe ngkkfqpnf, y nimf: Hsgl jsg bfl niflgl ng bfl kgygl ng Likip bgl pysnpe, yf qpdaiée fckgrgké lprkicirifl p gbbfl hpkp jsg dg pysnge; aige jsg csgkfe élqfl ls ksiep, y bp ng qfnf Ilkpgb. 
24 Pngdál ng glf kgrfuió Prpz bfl sqgelibifl ng bp rplp ng Nifl, y bfl jsgakó, y rgkkó bpl hsgkqpl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y lg tizf pbqpkgl ge Mgkslpbée ge qfnfl bfl kierfegl. 

25 Tizf qpdaiée bsupkgl pbqfl ge qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná, hpkp jsgdpk ierigelf p bfl niflgl pmgefl, hkfvfrpenf plí p ikp p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. 
26 Bfl ngdál ng lsl tgrtfl, y qfnfl ls rpdiefl, hkidgkfl y hflqkgkfl, tg pjsí glqáe glrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bfl kgygl ng Msná y ng Ilkpgb. 
27 Y nskdió Prpz rfe lsl hpnkgl, y bf lghsbqpkfe ge bp risnpn ng Mgkslpbée, hgkf ef bf dgqigkfe ge bfl lghsbrkfl ng bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb; y kgieó ge ls bsupk Gzgjsípl ls timf. 



Kgiepnf ng Gzgjsípl

2 Rkóeirpl 29
(2 K. 18.1-3)

1 Rfdgezó p kgiepk Gzgjsípl ligenf ng vgieqirierf pñfl, y kgieó vgieqiesgvg pñfl ge Mgkslpbée. Gb efdakg ng ls dpnkg csg Paípl, timp ng Zprpkípl. 
2 G tizf bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg tpaíp tgrtf Npvin ls hpnkg.



Gzgjsípl kglqpabgrg gb rsbqf ngb qgdhbf 

3 Ge gb hkidgk pñf ng ls kgiepnf, ge gb dgl hkidgkf, pakió bpl hsgkqpl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bpl kghpkó. 
4 G tizf vgeik p bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, y bfl kgseió ge bp hbpzp fkigeqpb. 
5 Y bgl nimf: ¡Fíndg, bgviqpl! Lpeqicirpfl ptfkp, y lpeqicirpn bp rplp ng Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl, y lprpn ngb lpeqspkif bp iedsenirip. 

6 Hfkjsg esglqkfl hpnkgl lg tpe kgagbpnf, y tpe tgrtf bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl; hfkjsg bg ngmpkfe, y phpkqpkfe lsl kflqkfl ngb qpagkeársbf ng Mgtfvá, y bg vfbvigkfe bpl glhpbnpl. 
7 Y pse rgkkpkfe bpl hsgkqpl ngb hókqirf, y phpupkfe bpl bádhpkpl; ef jsgdpkfe ierigelf, ei lprkicirpkfe tfbfrpslqf ge gb lpeqspkif pb Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 
8 Hfk qpeqf, bp ikp ng Mgtfvá tp vgeinf lfakg Msná y Mgkslpbée, y bfl tp geqkgupnf p qskaprióe, p gxgrkprióe y p glrpkeif, rfdf vgil vflfqkfl rfe vsglqkfl fmfl. 

9 Y tg pjsí esglqkfl hpnkgl tpe rpínf p glhpnp, y esglqkfl timfl, esglqkpl timpl y esglqkpl dsmgkgl csgkfe bbgvpnfl rpsqivfl hfk glqf. 
10 Ptfkp, hsgl, yf tg ngqgkdiepnf tprgk hprqf rfe Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg phpkqg ng eflfqkfl gb pknfk ng ls ikp. 

11 Timfl dífl, ef fl geupñéil ptfkp, hfkjsg Mgtfvá fl tp glrfuinf p vflfqkfl hpkp jsg glqéil ngbpeqg ng éb y bg likváil, y lgáil lsl dieilqkfl, y bg jsgdéil ierigelf. 
12 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqpkfe bfl bgviqpl Dptpq timf ng Pdplpi y Mfgb timf ng Pzpkípl, ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq; ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, Ril timf ng Pani y Pzpkípl timf ng Mgtpbgbgb; ng bfl timfl ng Ugklóe, Mfp timf ng Zidp y Gnée timf ng Mfp;
13 ng bfl timfl ng Gbizpcáe, Lidki y Mgigb; ng bfl timfl ng Plpc, Zprpkípl y Dpqpeípl; 
14 ng bfl timfl ng Tgdáe, Mgtigb y Lidgi; y ng bfl timfl ng Mgnsqúe, Lgdpípl y Szigb. 

15 Glqfl kgseigkfe p lsl tgkdpefl, y lg lpeqicirpkfe, y geqkpkfe, rfecfkdg pb dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy y bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá, hpkp bidhipk bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
16 Y geqkpenf bfl lprgknfqgl ngeqkf ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá hpkp bidhipkbp, lprpkfe qfnp bp iedsenirip jsg tpbbpkfe ge gb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá, pb pqkif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; y ng pbbí bfl bgviqpl bp bbgvpkfe csgkp pb qfkkgeqg ng Rgnkóe. 
17 Rfdgezpkfe p lpeqicirpklg gb níp hkidgkf ngb dgl hkidgkf, y p bfl frtf
ngb dildf dgl vieigkfe pb hókqirf ng Mgtfvá; y lpeqicirpkfe bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ge frtf nípl, y ge gb níp nigriléil ngb dgl hkidgkf qgkdiepkfe. 

18 Geqfergl vieigkfe pb kgy Gzgjsípl y bg nimgkfe: Yp tgdfl bidhipnf qfnp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, gb pbqpk ngb tfbfrpslqf, y qfnfl lsl ielqksdgeqfl, y bp dglp ng bp hkfhflirióe rfe qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl. 
19 Plidildf tgdfl hkghpkpnf y lpeqicirpnf qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl jsg ge ls iecingbinpn tpaíp nglgrtpnf gb kgy Prpz, rspenf kgiepap; y tg pjsí glqáe ngbpeqg ngb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá. 
20 Y bgvpeqáenflg ng dpñpep, gb kgy Gzgjsípl kgseió bfl hkierihpbgl ng bp risnpn, y lsaió p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

21 Y hkglgeqpkfe ligqg efvibbfl, ligqg rpkegkfl, ligqg rfkngkfl y ligqg dprtfl rpakífl hpkp gxhiprióe hfk gb kgief, hfk gb lpeqspkif y hfk Msná. Y nimf p bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Ppkóe jsg bfl fckgriglge lfakg gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá. 
22 Dpqpkfe, hsgl, bfl efvibbfl, y bfl lprgknfqgl kgriaigkfe bp lpeukg, y bp glhpkrigkfe lfakg gb pbqpk; dpqpkfe bsguf bfl rpkegkfl, y glhpkrigkfe bp lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk; plidildf dpqpkfe bfl rfkngkfl, y glhpkrigkfe bp lpeukg lfakg gb pbqpk. 

23 Nglhsél tirigkfe prgkrpk ngbpeqg ngb kgy y ng bp dsbqiqsn bfl dprtfl rpakífl hpkp bp gxhiprióe, y hsligkfe lfakg gbbfl lsl dpefl; 
24 y bfl lprgknfqgl bfl dpqpkfe, g tirigkfe fckgenp ng gxhiprióe rfe bp lpeukg ng gbbfl lfakg gb pbqpk, hpkp kgrferibipk p qfnf Ilkpgb; hfkjsg hfk qfnf Ilkpgb dpenó gb kgy tprgk gb tfbfrpslqf y bp gxhiprióe. 
25 Hslf qpdaiée bgviqpl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá rfe rídapbfl, lpbqgkifl y pkhpl, rfecfkdg pb dpenpdigeqf ng Npvin, ng Upn vingeqg ngb kgy, y ngb hkfcgqp Epqáe, hfkjsg pjsgb dpenpdigeqf hkfrgníp ng Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng lsl hkfcgqpl. 
26 Y bfl bgviqpl glqpape rfe bfl ielqksdgeqfl ng Npvin, y bfl lprgknfqgl rfe qkfdhgqpl. 

27 Geqfergl dpenó Gzgjsípl lprkicirpk gb tfbfrpslqf ge gb pbqpk; y rspenf rfdgezó gb tfbfrpslqf, rfdgezó qpdaiée gb ráeqirf ng Mgtfvá, rfe bpl qkfdhgqpl y bfl ielqksdgeqfl ng Npvin kgy ng Ilkpgb. 
28 Y qfnp bp dsbqiqsn pnfkpap, y bfl rpeqfkgl rpeqpape, y bfl qkfdhgqgkfl lfepape bpl qkfdhgqpl; qfnf glqf nskó tplqp rfelsdiklg gb tfbfrpslqf. 
29 Y rspenf prpapkfe ng fckgrgk, lg ierbieó gb kgy, y qfnfl bfl jsg rfe éb glqpape, y pnfkpkfe. 

30 Geqfergl gb kgy Gzgjsípl y bfl hkíerihgl nimgkfe p bfl bgviqpl jsg pbpaplge p Mgtfvá rfe bpl hpbpakpl ng Npvin y ng Plpc vingeqg; y gbbfl pbpapkfe rfe ukpe pbgukíp, y lg ierbiepkfe y pnfkpkfe. 
31 Y kglhfenigenf Gzgjsípl, nimf: Vflfqkfl fl tpaéil rfelpukpnf ptfkp p Mgtfvá; prgkrpfl, hsgl, y hkglgeqpn lprkicirifl y pbpapezpl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. Y bp dsbqiqsn hkglgeqó lprkicirifl y pbpapezpl; y qfnfl bfl ugegkflfl ng rfkpzóe qkpmgkfe tfbfrpslqfl. 

32 Y csg gb eúdgkf ng bfl tfbfrpslqfl jsg qkpmf bp rfeukguprióe, lgqgeqp asgygl, rige rpkegkfl y nflrigeqfl rfkngkfl, qfnf hpkp gb tfbfrpslqf ng Mgtfvá. 
33 Y bpl fckgenpl csgkfe lgilrigeqfl asgygl y qkgl dib fvgmpl. 
34 Dpl bfl lprgknfqgl gkpe hfrfl, y ef aplqpape hpkp nglfbbpk bfl tfbfrpslqfl; y plí lsl tgkdpefl bfl bgviqpl bgl pysnpkfe tplqp jsg prpapkfe bp fakp, y tplqp jsg bfl ngdál lprgknfqgl lg lpeqicirpkfe; hfkjsg bfl bgviqpl csgkfe dál kgrqfl ng rfkpzóe hpkp lpeqicirpklg jsg bfl lprgknfqgl. 

35 Plí, hsgl, tsaf pasenperip ng tfbfrpslqfl, rfe ukflskp ng bpl fckgenpl ng hpz, y biaprifegl hpkp rpnp tfbfrpslqf. Y jsgnó kglqpabgrinf gb lgkvirif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
36  Y lg pbgukó Gzgjsípl rfe qfnf gb hsgabf, ng jsg Nifl tsaiglg hkghpkpnf gb hsgabf; hfkjsg bp rflp csg tgrtp káhinpdgeqg. 



Gzgjsípl rgbgakp bp hplrsp

2 Rkóeirpl 30

1 Gevió nglhsél Gzgjsípl hfk qfnf Ilkpgb y Msná, y glrkiaió rpkqpl p Gckpíe y p Dpeplél, hpkp jsg vieiglge p Mgkslpbée p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá hpkp rgbgakpk bp hplrsp p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 
2 Y gb kgy tpaíp qfdpnf rfelgmf rfe lsl hkíerihgl, y rfe qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ge Mgkslpbée, hpkp rgbgakpk bp hplrsp ge gb dgl lgusenf; 
3 hfkjsg geqfergl ef bp hfnípe rgbgakpk, hfk rspeqf ef tpaíp lscirigeqgl lprgknfqgl lpeqicirpnfl, ei gb hsgabf lg tpaíp kgseinf ge Mgkslpbée. 

4 Glqf pukpnó pb kgy y p qfnp bp dsbqiqsn. 
5 Y ngqgkdiepkfe tprgk hplpk hkguóe hfk qfnf Ilkpgb, nglng Aggklgap tplqp Npe, hpkp jsg vieiglge p rgbgakpk bp hplrsp p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, ge Mgkslpbée; hfkjsg ge dsrtf qigdhf ef bp tpaípe rgbgakpnf pb dfnf jsg glqá glrkiqf. 

6 Csgkfe, hsgl, rfkkgfl rfe rpkqpl ng dpef ngb kgy y ng lsl hkíerihgl hfk qfnf Ilkpgb y Msná, rfdf gb kgy bf tpaíp dpenpnf, y ngrípe: Timfl ng Ilkpgb, vfbvgfl p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Pakptpd, ng Ilppr y ng Ilkpgb, y éb lg vfbvgká pb kgdpegeqg jsg tp jsgnpnf ng bp dpef ng bfl kgygl ng Plikip. 
7 Ef lgáil rfdf vsglqkfl hpnkgl y rfdf vsglqkfl tgkdpefl, jsg lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, y éb bfl geqkguó p nglfbprióe, rfdf vflfqkfl vgil. 
8 Ef genskgzráil, hsgl, ptfkp vsglqkp rgkviz rfdf vsglqkfl hpnkgl; lfdgqgfl p Mgtfvá, y vgein p ls lpeqspkif, gb rspb éb tp lpeqicirpnf hpkp ligdhkg; y lgkvin p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y gb pknfk ng ls ikp lg phpkqpká ng vflfqkfl. 

9 Hfkjsg li fl vfbvigkgil p Mgtfvá, vsglqkfl tgkdpefl y vsglqkfl timfl tpbbpkáe dilgkirfknip ngbpeqg ng bfl jsg bfl qigege rpsqivfl, y vfbvgkáe p glqp qigkkp; hfkjsg Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl gl rbgdgeqg y dilgkirfkniflf, y ef phpkqpká ng vflfqkfl ls kflqkf, li vflfqkfl fl vfbvigkgil p éb. 

10 Hplpkfe, hsgl, bfl rfkkgfl ng risnpn ge risnpn hfk bp qigkkp ng Gckpíe y Dpeplél, tplqp Zpasbóe; dpl lg kgípe y askbpape ng gbbfl. 
11 Rfe qfnf glf, pbusefl tfdakgl ng Plgk, ng Dpeplél y ng Zpasbóe lg tsdibbpkfe y vieigkfe p Mgkslpbée. 
12 Ge Msná qpdaiée glqsvf bp dpef ng Nifl hpkp npkbgl se lfbf rfkpzóe hpkp rsdhbik gb dgelpmg ngb kgy y ng bfl hkíerihgl, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 
13 Y lg kgseió ge Mgkslpbée dsrtp ugeqg hpkp rgbgakpk bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp ge gb dgl lgusenf, sep vplqp kgseióe. 

14 Y bgvpeqáenflg, jsiqpkfe bfl pbqpkgl jsg tpaíp ge Mgkslpbée; jsiqpkfe qpdaiée qfnfl bfl pbqpkgl ng ierigelf, y bfl grtpkfe pb qfkkgeqg ng Rgnkóe. 
15 Geqfergl lprkicirpkfe bp hplrsp, p bfl rpqfkrg nípl ngb dgl lgusenf; y bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl bbgefl ng vgkuügezp lg lpeqicirpkfe, y qkpmgkfe bfl tfbfrpslqfl p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
16 Y qfdpkfe ls bsupk ge bfl qskefl ng rflqsdakg, rfecfkdg p bp bgy ng Dfilél vpkóe ng Nifl; y bfl lprgknfqgl glhpkrípe bp lpeukg jsg kgriaípe ng dpefl ng bfl bgviqpl. 

17 Hfkjsg tpaíp dsrtfl ge bp rfeukguprióe jsg ef glqpape lpeqicirpnfl, y hfk glf bfl bgviqpl lprkicirpape bp hplrsp hfk qfnfl bfl jsg ef lg tpaípe hskicirpnf, hpkp lpeqicirpkbfl p Mgtfvá. 
18 Hfkjsg sep ukpe dsbqiqsn ngb hsgabf ng Gckpíe y Dpeplél, y ng Ilprpk y Zpasbóe, ef lg tpaípe hskicirpnf, y rfdigkfe bp hplrsp ef rfecfkdg p bf jsg glqá glrkiqf. Dpl Gzgjsípl fkó hfk gbbfl, nirigenf: Mgtfvá, jsg gl asgef, lgp hkfhirif p qfnf pjsgb jsg tp hkghpkpnf ls rfkpzóe hpkp aslrpk p Nifl, 
19 p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, psejsg ef glqé hskicirpnf lguúe bfl kiqfl ng hskicirprióe ngb lpeqspkif. 

20 Y fyó Mgtfvá p Gzgjsípl, y lpeó pb hsgabf. 

21 Plí bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg glqpape ge Mgkslpbée rgbgakpkfe bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp hfk ligqg nípl rfe ukpeng ufzf; y ubfkicirpape p Mgtfvá qfnfl bfl nípl bfl bgviqpl y bfl lprgknfqgl, rpeqpenf rfe ielqksdgeqfl kglfepeqgl p Mgtfvá. 
22 Y tpabó Gzgjsípl pb rfkpzóe ng qfnfl bfl bgviqpl jsg qgeípe asgep ieqgbiugerip ge gb lgkvirif ng Mgtfvá. Y rfdigkfe ng bf lprkicirpnf ge bp ciglqp lfbgdeg hfk ligqg nípl, fckgrigenf lprkicirifl ng hpz, y npenf ukpripl p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. 

23 Y qfnp pjsgbbp plpdabgp ngqgkdieó jsg rgbgakplge bp ciglqp hfk fqkfl ligqg nípl; y bp rgbgakpkfe fqkfl ligqg nípl rfe pbgukíp. 
24 Hfkjsg Gzgjsípl kgy ng Msná tpaíp npnf p bp plpdabgp dib efvibbfl y ligqg dib fvgmpl; y qpdaiée bfl hkíerihgl nigkfe pb hsgabf dib efvibbfl y nigz dib fvgmpl; y dsrtfl lprgknfqgl yp lg tpaípe lpeqicirpnf. 
25 Lg pbgukó, hsgl, qfnp bp rfeukguprióe ng Msná, rfdf qpdaiée bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, y qfnp bp dsbqiqsn jsg tpaíp vgeinf ng Ilkpgb; plidildf bfl cfkplqgkfl jsg tpaípe vgeinf ng bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, y bfl jsg tpaiqpape ge Msná. 

26 Tsaf geqfergl ukpe kgufrimf ge Mgkslpbée; hfkjsg nglng bfl nípl ng Lpbfdóe timf ng Npvin kgy ng Ilkpgb, ef tpaíp tpainf rflp lgdgmpeqg ge Mgkslpbée. 
27 Nglhsél bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, hsglqfl ge hig, agenimgkfe pb hsgabf; y bp vfz ng gbbfl csg fínp, y ls fkprióe bbguó p bp tpaiqprióe ng ls lpeqspkif, pb rigbf. 



2 Rkóeirpl 31

1 Tgrtpl qfnpl glqpl rflpl, qfnfl bfl ng Ilkpgb jsg tpaípe glqpnf pbbí lpbigkfe hfk bpl risnpngl ng Msná, y jsgakpkfe bpl glqpqspl y nglqksygkfe bpl idáugegl ng Plgkp, y ngkkiapkfe bfl bsupkgl pbqfl y bfl pbqpkgl hfk qfnf Msná y Agempdíe, y qpdaiée ge Gckpíe y Dpeplél, tplqp prpapkbf qfnf. Nglhsél lg vfbvigkfe qfnfl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb p lsl risnpngl, rpnp sef p ls hflglióe. 



Gzgjsípl kgfkupeizp gb lgkvirif ng bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl

2 Y pkkgubó Gzgjsípl bp nilqkiasrióe ng bfl lprgknfqgl y ng bfl bgviqpl rfecfkdg p lsl qskefl, rpnp sef lguúe ls fcirif; bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl hpkp fckgrgk gb tfbfrpslqf y bpl fckgenpl ng hpz, hpkp jsg dieilqkplge, hpkp jsg niglge ukpripl y pbpaplge ngeqkf ng bpl hsgkqpl ng bfl pqkifl ng Mgtfvá. 

3 Gb kgy rfeqkiasyó ng ls hkfhip tprigenp hpkp bfl tfbfrpslqfl p dpñpep y qpkng, y hpkp bfl tfbfrpslqfl ng bfl nípl ng kghflf, esgvpl bsepl y ciglqpl lfbgdegl, rfdf glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy ng Mgtfvá. 
4 Dpenó qpdaiée pb hsgabf jsg tpaiqpap ge Mgkslpbée, jsg niglg bp hfkrióe rfkkglhfenigeqg p bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, hpkp jsg gbbfl lg ngnirplge p bp bgy ng Mgtfvá. 

5 Y rspenf glqg gnirqf csg nivsbupnf, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb nigkfe dsrtpl hkidiripl ng ukpef, vief, prgiqg, digb, y ng qfnfl bfl cksqfl ng bp qigkkp; qkpmgkfe plidildf ge pasenperip bfl nigzdfl ng qfnpl bpl rflpl. 
6 Qpdaiée bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y ng Msná, jsg tpaiqpape ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná, nigkfe ngb dildf dfnf bfl nigzdfl ng bpl vprpl y ng bpl fvgmpl; y qkpmgkfe bfl nigzdfl ng bf lpeqicirpnf, ng bpl rflpl jsg tpaípe hkfdgqinf p Mgtfvá ls Nifl, y bfl nghfliqpkfe ge dfeqfegl. 

7 Ge gb dgl qgkrgkf rfdgezpkfe p cfkdpk pjsgbbfl dfeqfegl, y qgkdiepkfe ge gb dgl léhqidf. 
8 Rspenf Gzgjsípl y bfl hkíerihgl vieigkfe y vigkfe bfl dfeqfegl, agenimgkfe p Mgtfvá, y p ls hsgabf Ilkpgb. 

9 Y hkguseqó Gzgjsípl p bfl lprgknfqgl y p bfl bgviqpl prgkrp ng glfl dfeqfegl. 
10 Y gb lsdf lprgknfqg Pzpkípl, ng bp rplp ng Lpnfr, bg rfeqglqó: Nglng jsg rfdgezpkfe p qkpgk bpl fckgenpl p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, tgdfl rfdinf y efl tgdfl lpripnf, y efl tp lfakpnf dsrtf, hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp agengrinf p ls hsgabf; y tp jsgnpnf glqp pasenperip ng hkfvilifegl.
11 Geqfergl dpenó Gzgjsípl jsg hkghpkplge rádpkpl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; y bpl hkghpkpkfe. 
12 Y ge gbbpl nghfliqpkfe bpl hkidiripl y bfl nigzdfl y bpl rflpl rfelpukpnpl, cigbdgeqg; y nigkfe rpkuf ng gbbf pb bgviqp Rfepeípl, gb hkierihpb, y Lidgi ls tgkdpef csg gb lgusenf. 
13 Y Mgtigb, Pzpzípl, Eptpq, Plpgb, Mgkidfq, Mfzpapn, Gbigb, Ildpjsípl, Dptpq y Agepíp, csgkfe bfl dpyfknfdfl pb lgkvirif ng Rfepeípl y ng Lidgi ls tgkdpef, hfk dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy Gzgjsípl y ng Pzpkípl, hkíerihg ng bp rplp ng Nifl. 

14 Y gb bgviqp Rfké timf ng Idep, uspknp ng bp hsgkqp fkigeqpb, qgeíp rpkuf ng bpl fckgenpl vfbseqpkipl hpkp Nifl, y ng bp nilqkiasrióe ng bpl fckgenpl ngnirpnpl p Mgtfvá, y ng bpl rflpl lpeqílidpl. 
15 Y p ls lgkvirif glqpape Gnée, Dieipdíe, Mglúp, Lgdpípl, Pdpkípl y Lgrpeípl, ge bpl risnpngl ng bfl lprgknfqgl, hpkp npk rfe cingbinpn p lsl tgkdpefl lsl hfkrifegl rfecfkdg p lsl ukshfl, plí pb dpyfk rfdf pb dgefk; 

16 p bfl vpkfegl pefqpnfl hfk lsl biepmgl, ng qkgl pñfl pkkiap, p qfnfl bfl jsg geqkpape ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá hpkp nglgdhgñpk ls dieilqgkif lguúe lsl fcirifl y ukshfl. 
17 Qpdaiée p bfl jsg gkpe rfeqpnfl geqkg bfl lprgknfqgl lguúe lsl rplpl hpqgkepl; y p bfl bgviqpl ng gnpn ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap, rfecfkdg p lsl fcirifl y ukshfl. 

18 Gkpe ielrkiqfl rfe qfnfl lsl eiñfl, lsl dsmgkgl, lsl timfl g timpl, qfnp bp dsbqiqsn; hfkjsg rfe cingbinpn lg rfelpukpape p bpl rflpl lpeqpl. 
19 Ngb dildf dfnf hpkp bfl timfl ng Ppkóe, lprgknfqgl, jsg glqpape ge bfl gminfl ng lsl risnpngl, hfk qfnpl bpl risnpngl, bfl vpkfegl efdakpnfl qgeípe rpkuf ng npk lsl hfkrifegl p qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng geqkg bfl lprgknfqgl, y p qfnf gb biepmg ng bfl bgviqpl. 

20 Ng glqp dpegkp tizf Gzgjsípl ge qfnf Msná; y gmgrsqó bf asgef, kgrqf y vgknpngkf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 
21 Ge qfnf rspeqf gdhkgenió ge gb lgkvirif ng bp rplp ng Nifl, ng prsgknf rfe bp bgy y bfl dpenpdigeqfl, aslró p ls Nifl, bf tizf ng qfnf rfkpzóe, y csg hkflhgkpnf. 



Lgepjsgkia ievpng Msná

2 Rkóeirpl 32
(2 K. 18.13-37; Il. 36.1-22)

1 Nglhsél ng glqpl rflpl y ng glqp cingbinpn, vief Lgepjsgkia kgy ng bfl plikifl g ievpnió p Msná, y prpdhó rfeqkp bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl, rfe bp ieqgerióe ng rfejsilqpkbpl. 
2 Vigenf, hsgl, Gzgjsípl bp vgeinp ng Lgepjsgkia, y ls ieqgerióe ng rfdapqik p Mgkslpbée, 

3 qsvf rfelgmf rfe lsl hkíerihgl y rfe lsl tfdakgl vpbigeqgl, hpkp rgupk bpl csgeqgl ng pusp jsg glqpape csgkp ng bp risnpn; y gbbfl bg phfypkfe. 
4 Geqfergl lg kgseió dsrtf hsgabf, y rgupkfe qfnpl bpl csgeqgl, y gb pkkfyf jsg rfkkíp p qkpvél ngb qgkkiqfkif, nirigenf: ¿Hfk jsé tpe ng tpbbpk bfl kgygl ng Plikip dsrtpl puspl rspenf vgeupe? 
5 Nglhsél rfe peidó kglsgbqf gniciró Gzgjsípl qfnfl bfl dskfl rpínfl, g tizf pbzpk bpl qfkkgl, y fqkf dskf hfk csgkp; cfkqiciró pngdál p Dibf ge bp risnpn ng Npvin, y qpdaiée tizf dsrtpl glhpnpl y glrsnfl. 
6 Y hslf rphiqpegl ng usgkkp lfakg gb hsgabf, y bfl tizf kgseik ge bp hbpzp ng bp hsgkqp ng bp risnpn, y tpabó pb rfkpzóe ng gbbfl, nirigenf: 

7 Glcfkzpfl y peidpfl; ef qgdáil, ei qgeuáil dignf ngb kgy ng Plikip, ei ng qfnp bp dsbqiqsn jsg rfe éb vigeg; hfkjsg dál tpy rfe eflfqkfl jsg rfe éb. 
8 Rfe éb glqá gb akpzf ng rpkeg, dpl rfe eflfqkfl glqá Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl hpkp pysnpkefl y hgbgpk esglqkpl apqpbbpl. Y gb hsgabf qsvf rfecipezp ge bpl hpbpakpl ng Gzgjsípl kgy ng Msná. 

9 Nglhsél ng glqf, Lgepjsgkia kgy ng bfl plikifl, digeqkpl liqipap p Bpjsil rfe qfnpl lsl csgkzpl, gevió lsl ligkvfl p Mgkslpbée hpkp ngrik p Gzgjsípl kgy ng Msná, y p qfnfl bfl ng Msná jsg glqpape ge Mgkslpbée: 

10 Plí tp nirtf Lgepjsgkia kgy bfl plikifl: ¿Ge jsiée rfeciáil vflfqkfl, pb kglilqik gb liqif ge Mgkslpbée? 
11 ¿Ef fl geupñp Gzgjsípl hpkp geqkgupkfl p dsgkqg, p tpdakg y p lgn, pb ngrik: Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl biakpká ng bp dpef ngb kgy ng Plikip? 
12 ¿Ef gl Gzgjsípl gb dildf jsg tp jsiqpnf lsl bsupkgl pbqfl y lsl pbqpkgl, y tp nirtf p Msná y p Mgkslpbée: Ngbpeqg ng glqg lfbf pbqpk pnfkpkéil, y lfakg éb jsgdpkéil ierigelf? 
13 ¿Ef tpaéil lpainf bf jsg yf y dil hpnkgl tgdfl tgrtf p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp? ¿Hsnigkfe bfl niflgl ng bpl eprifegl ng glqpl qigkkpl biakpk ls qigkkp ng di dpef? 
14 ¿Jsé nifl tsaf ng geqkg qfnfl bfl niflgl ng pjsgbbpl eprifegl jsg nglqksygkfe dil hpnkgl, jsg hsniglg lpbvpk p ls hsgabf ng dil dpefl? ¿Ródf hfnká vsglqkf Nifl biakpkfl ng di dpef? 
15 Ptfkp, hsgl, ef fl geupñg Gzgjsípl, ei fl hgklspnp ng glg dfnf, ei bg rkgáil; jsg li eieuúe nifl ng qfnpl pjsgbbpl eprifegl y kgiefl hsnf biakpk p ls hsgabf ng dil dpefl, y ng bpl dpefl ng dil hpnkgl, ¿rsáeqf dgefl vsglqkf Nifl fl hfnká biakpk ng di dpef? 

16 Y fqkpl rflpl dál tpabpkfe lsl ligkvfl rfeqkp Mgtfvá Nifl, y rfeqkp ls ligkvf Gzgjsípl. 
17 Pngdál ng glqf glrkiaió rpkqpl ge jsg abplcgdpap rfeqkp Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, y tpabpap rfeqkp éb, nirigenf: Rfdf bfl niflgl ng bpl eprifegl ng bfl hpílgl ef hsnigkfe biakpk p ls hsgabf ng dil dpefl, qpdhfrf gb Nifl ng Gzgjsípl biakpká pb lsyf ng dil dpefl. 

18 Y rbpdpkfe p ukpe vfz ge msnpirf pb hsgabf ng Mgkslpbée jsg glqpap lfakg bfl dskfl, hpkp glhpeqpkbgl y pqgdfkizpkbgl, p cie ng hfngk qfdpk bp risnpn. 
19 Y tpabpkfe rfeqkp gb Nifl ng Mgkslpbée, rfdf rfeqkp bfl niflgl ng bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp, jsg lfe fakp ng dpefl ng tfdakgl. 



Mgtfvá biakp p Gzgjsípl
(2 K. 19.1-37; Il. 37:1-38)

20 Dpl gb kgy Gzgjsípl y gb hkfcgqp Ilpípl timf ng Pdfz fkpkfe hfk glqf, y rbpdpkfe pb rigbf. 
21 Y Mgtfvá gevió se áeugb, gb rspb nglqksyó p qfnf vpbigeqg y glcfkzpnf, y p bfl mgcgl y rphiqpegl ge gb rpdhpdgeqf ngb kgy ng Plikip. Glqg lg vfbvió, hfk qpeqf, pvgkufezpnf p ls qigkkp; y geqkpenf ge gb qgdhbf ng ls nifl, pbbí bf dpqpkfe p glhpnp lsl hkfhifl timfl. 

22 Plí lpbvó Mgtfvá p Gzgjsípl y p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée ng bpl dpefl ng Lgepjsgkia kgy ng Plikip, y ng bpl dpefl ng qfnfl; y bgl nif kghflf hfk qfnfl bpnfl. 
23 Y dsrtfl qkpmgkfe p Mgkslpbée fckgenp p Mgtfvá, y kirfl hkglgeqgl p Gzgjsípl kgy ng Msná; y csg dsy geukpengrinf ngbpeqg ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl nglhsél ng glqf. 



Gecgkdgnpn ng Gzgjsípl
(2 K. 20.1-11; Il. 38.1-22)

24 Ge pjsgb qigdhf Gzgjsípl gecgkdó ng dsgkqg; y fkó p Mgtfvá, jsige bg kglhfenió, y bg nif sep lgñpb. 
25 Dpl Gzgjsípl ef rfkkglhfenió pb aige jsg bg tpaíp linf tgrtf, lief jsg lg gepbqgrió ls rfkpzóe, y vief bp ikp rfeqkp éb, y rfeqkp Msná y Mgkslpbée. 
26 Hgkf Gzgjsípl, nglhsél ng tpagklg gepbqgrinf ls rfkpzóe, lg tsdibbó, éb y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée; y ef vief lfakg gbbfl bp ikp ng Mgtfvá ge bfl nípl ng Gzgjsípl. 



Gzgjsípl kgriag p bfl gevipnfl ng Apaibfeip
(2 K. 20.12-19; Il. 39.1-8)

27 Y qsvf Gzgjsípl kijsgzpl y ubfkip, dsrtpl ge ukpe dpegkp; y pnjsikió qglfkfl ng hbpqp y fkf, hignkpl hkgriflpl, hgkcsdgl, glrsnfl, y qfnp rbplg ng mfypl nglgpabgl. 
28 Plidildf tizf nghóliqfl hpkp bpl kgeqpl ngb ukpef, ngb vief y ngb prgiqg, glqpabfl hpkp qfnp rbplg ng aglqipl, y phkilrfl hpkp bfl upepnfl. 
29 Pnjsikió qpdaiée risnpngl, y tpqfl ng fvgmpl y ng vprpl ge ukpe pasenperip; hfkjsg Nifl bg tpaíp npnf dsrtpl kijsgzpl. 

30 Glqg Gzgjsípl rsakió bfl dpepeqipbgl ng Uitóe bp ng pkkiap, y rfensmf gb pusp tprip gb frringeqg ng bp risnpn ng Npvin. Y csg hkflhgkpnf Gzgjsípl ge qfnf bf jsg tizf. 

31 Dpl ge bf kgcgkgeqg p bfl dgelpmgkfl ng bfl hkíerihgl ng Apaibfeip, jsg gevipkfe p éb hpkp lpagk ngb hkfniuif jsg tpaíp prfeqgrinf ge gb hpíl, Nifl bf ngmó, hpkp hkfapkbg, hpkp tprgk rfefrgk qfnf bf jsg glqpap ge ls rfkpzóe. 



Dsgkqg ng Gzgjsípl
(2 K. 20.20-21)

32 Bfl ngdál tgrtfl ng Gzgjsípl, y lsl dilgkirfknipl, tg pjsí qfnfl glqáe glrkiqfl ge bp hkfcgríp ngb hkfcgqp Ilpípl timf ng Pdfz, ge gb biakf ng bfl kgygl ng Msná y ng Ilkpgb. 

33 Y nskdió Gzgjsípl rfe lsl hpnkgl, y bf lghsbqpkfe ge gb bsupk dál hkfdiegeqg ng bfl lghsbrkfl ng bfl timfl ng Npvin, tfekáenfbg ge ls dsgkqg qfnf Msná y qfnp Mgkslpbée; y kgieó ge ls bsupk Dpeplél ls timf. 



Kgiepnf ng Dpeplél

2 Rkóeirpl 33
(2 K. 21.1-18)

1 Ng nfrg pñfl gkp Dpeplél rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y riersgeqp y rierf pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée. 
2 Hgkf tizf bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, rfecfkdg p bpl pafdieprifegl ng bpl eprifegl jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp grtpnf ng ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 
3 Hfkjsg éb kggniciró bfl bsupkgl pbqfl jsg Gzgjsípl ls hpnkg tpaíp ngkkiapnf, y bgvpeqó pbqpkgl p bfl appbgl, g tizf idáugegl ng Plgkp, y pnfkó p qfnf gb gmékriqf ng bfl rigbfl, y bgl kienió rsbqf. 

4 Gniciró qpdaiée pbqpkgl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, ng bp rspb tpaíp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ge Mgkslpbée glqpká di efdakg hgkhgqspdgeqg. 
5 Gniciró plidildf pbqpkgl p qfnf gb gmékriqf ng bfl rigbfl ge bfl nfl pqkifl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
6 Y hpló lsl timfl hfk csguf ge gb vpbbg ngb timf ng Tiefd; y falgkvpap bfl qigdhfl, dikpap ge puügkfl, gkp npnf p pnivieprifegl, y rfelsbqpap p pniviefl y gerpeqpnfkgl; lg gxrgnió ge tprgk bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, tplqp gergengk ls ikp. 

7 Pngdál ng glqf hslf sep idpuge cseninp jsg tizf, ge bp rplp ng Nifl, ng bp rspb tpaíp nirtf Nifl p Npvin y p Lpbfdóe ls timf: Ge glqp rplp y ge Mgkslpbée, bp rspb yf gbguí lfakg qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb, hfenké di efdakg hpkp ligdhkg; 
8 y eserp dál jsiqpké gb hig ng Ilkpgb ng bp qigkkp jsg yf geqkgusé p vsglqkfl hpnkgl, p rfenirióe ng jsg uspknge y tpupe qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg yf bgl tg dpenpnf, qfnp bp bgy, bfl glqpqsqfl y bfl hkgrghqfl, hfk dgnif ng Dfilél. 

9 Dpeplél, hsgl, tizf gxqkpvipklg p Msná y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, hpkp tprgk dál dpb jsg bpl eprifegl jsg Mgtfvá nglqksyó ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

10 Y tpabó Mgtfvá p Dpeplél y p ls hsgabf, dpl gbbfl ef glrsrtpkfe; 

11 hfk bf rspb Mgtfvá qkpmf rfeqkp gbbfl bfl ugegkpbgl ngb gmékriqf ngb kgy ng bfl plikifl, bfl rspbgl phkilifepkfe rfe ukibbfl p Dpeplél, y pqpnf rfe rpngepl bf bbgvpkfe p Apaibfeip. 
12 Dpl bsguf jsg csg hsglqf ge peuslqipl, fkó p Mgtfvá ls Nifl, tsdibbpnf ukpengdgeqg ge bp hkglgerip ngb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. 

13 Y tpaigenf fkpnf p éb, csg pqgeninf; hsgl Nifl fyó ls fkprióe y bf kglqpskó p Mgkslpbée, p ls kgief. Geqfergl kgrfefrió Dpeplél jsg Mgtfvá gkp Nifl. 

14 Nglhsél ng glqf gniciró gb dskf gxqgkifk ng bp rsinpn ng Npvin, pb frringeqg ng Uitóe, ge gb vpbbg, p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp ngb Hglrpnf, y pdskpbbó Fcgb, y gbgvó gb dskf dsy pbqf; y hslf rphiqpegl ngb gmékriqf ge qfnpl bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ng Msná. 
15 Plidildf jsiqó bfl niflgl pmgefl, y gb ínfbf ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y qfnfl bfl pbqpkgl jsg tpaíp gnicirpnf ge gb dfeqg ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá y ge Mgkslpbée, y bfl grtó csgkp ng bp risnpn. 

16 Kghpkó bsguf gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá, y lprkiciró lfakg éb lprkicirifl ng fckgenpl ng hpz y ng pbpapezp; y dpenó p Msná jsg likviglge p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 
17 Hgkf gb hsgabf púe lprkicirpap ge bfl bsupkgl pbqfl, psejsg bf tpríp hpkp Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 

18 Bfl Ngdál tgrtfl ng Dpeplél, y ls fkprióe p ls Nifl, y bpl hpbpakpl ng bfl vingeqgl jsg bg tpabpkfe ge efdakg ng Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, tg pjsí qfnf glqá glrkiqf ge bpl prqpl ng bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb. 
19 Ls fkprióe qpdaiée, y ródf csg fínf, qfnfl lsl hgrpnfl, y ls hkgvpkirprióe, bfl liqifl nfeng gniciró bsupkgl pbqfl y gkiuió idáugegl ng Plgkp g ínfbfl, peqgl jsg lg tsdibbplg, tg pjsí glqpl rflpl glqáe glrkiqpl ge bpl hpbpakpl ng bfl vingeqgl. 
20 Y nskdió Dpeplél rfe lsl hpnkgl, y bf lghsbqpkfe ge ls rplp; y kgieó ge ls bsupk Pdóe ls timf. 



Kgiepnf ng Pdóe
(2 K. 21.19-26)

21 Ng vgieqinól pñfl gkp Pdóe rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y nfl pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée. 
22 G tizf bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, rfdf tpaíp tgrtf Dpeplél ls hpnkg; hfkjsg fckgrió lprkicirifl y likvió p qfnfl bfl ínfbfl jsg ls hpnkg Dpeplél tpaíp tgrtf. 
23 Hgkf eserp lg tsdibbó ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, rfdf lg tsdibbó Dpeplél ls hpnkg; peqgl aige psdgeqó gb hgrpnf. 
24 Y rfelhikpkfe rfeqkp éb lsl ligkvfl, y bf dpqpkfe ge ls rplp. 
25 Dpl gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp dpqó p qfnfl bfl jsg tpaípe rfelhikpnf rfeqkp gb kgy Pdóe; y gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp hslf hfk kgy ge ls bsupk p Mflípl ls timf. 



Kgiepnf ng Mflípl

2 Rkóeirpl 34
(2 K. 22.1-2)

1 Ng frtf pñfl gkp Mflípl rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y qkgieqp y se pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée. 
2 Glqg tizf bf kgrqf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, y pensvf ge bfl rpdiefl ng Npvin ls hpnkg, lie phpkqpklg p bp ngkgrtp ei p bp izjsigknp. 



Kgcfkdpl ng Mflípl
(2 K. 23.4-20)

3 P bfl frtf pñfl ng ls kgiepnf, ligenf púe dsrtprtf, rfdgezó p aslrpk pb Nifl ng Npvin ls hpnkg; y p bfl nfrg pñfl rfdgezó p bidhipk p Msná y p Mgkslpbée ng bfl bsupkgl pbqfl, idáugegl ng Plgkp, glrsbqskpl, g idáugegl cseninpl. 

4 Y ngkkiapkfe ngbpeqg ng éb bfl pbqpkgl ng bfl appbgl, g tizf hgnpzfl bpl idáugegl ngb lfb, jsg glqpape hsglqpl geridp; nglhgnpzó qpdaiée bpl idáugegl ng Plgkp, bpl glrsbqskpl y glqpqspl cseninpl, y bpl ngldgeszó, y glhpkrió gb hfbvf lfakg bfl lghsbrkfl ng bfl jsg bgl tpaípe fckgrinf lprkicirifl. 

5 Jsgdó pngdál bfl tsglfl ng bfl lprgknfqgl lfakg lsl pbqpkgl, y bidhió p Msná y p Mgkslpbée. 
6 Bf dildf tizf ge bpl risnpngl ng Dpeplél, Gckpíe, Lidgóe y tplqp Egcqpbí, y ge bfl bsupkgl plfbpnfl pbkgngnfk. 
7 Y rspenf tsaf ngkkiapnf bfl pbqpkgl y bpl idáugegl ng Plgkp, y jsgakpnf y ngldgeszpnf bpl glrsbqskpl, y nglqksinf qfnfl bfl ínfbfl hfk qfnp bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, vfbvió p Mgkslpbée. 



Tpbbpzuf ngb biakf ng bp bgy
(2 K. 22.3-23.3)

8 P bfl nigrifrtf pñfl ng ls kgiepnf, nglhsél ng tpagk bidhipnf bp qigkkp y bp rplp, gevió p Lpcáe timf ng Pzpbíp, p Dpplípl ufagkepnfk ng bp risnpn, y p Mfp timf ng Mfprpz, rperibbgk, hpkp jsg kghpkplge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 
9 Vieigkfe élqfl pb lsdf lprgknfqg Tibrípl, y nigkfe gb niegkf jsg tpaíp linf qkpínf p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, jsg bfl bgviqpl jsg uspknpape bp hsgkqp tpaípe kgrfuinf ng dpef ng Dpeplél y ng Gckpíe y ng qfnf gb kgdpegeqg ng Ilkpgb, ng qfnf Msná y Agempdíe, y ng bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng Mgkslpbée. 

10 Y bf geqkgupkfe ge dpef ng bfl jsg tprípe bp fakp, jsg gkpe dpyfknfdfl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, bfl rspbgl bf npape p bfl jsg tprípe bp fakp y qkpapmpape ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, hpkp kghpkpk y kglqpskpk gb qgdhbf. 
11 Npape plidildf p bfl rpkhieqgkfl y rpeqgkfl hpkp jsg rfdhkplge hignkp ng rpeqgkíp, y dpngkp hpkp bfl pkdpzfegl y hpkp bp geqpabpnskp ng bfl gnicirifl jsg tpaípe nglqksinf bfl kgygl ng Msná. 

12 Y glqfl tfdakgl hkfrgnípe rfe cingbinpn ge bp fakp; y gkpe lsl dpyfknfdfl Mptpq y Panípl, bgviqpl ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, y Zprpkípl y Dglsbpd ng bfl timfl ng Rfpq, hpkp jsg prqivplge bp fakp; y ng bfl bgviqpl, qfnfl bfl geqgeninfl ge ielqksdgeqfl ng dúlirp. 
13 Qpdaiée vgbpape lfakg bfl rpkupnfkgl, y gkpe dpyfknfdfl ng bfl jsg lg frshpape ge rspbjsigk rbplg ng fakp; y ng bfl bgviqpl tpaíp glrkiapl, ufagkepnfkgl y hfkqgkfl. 

14 Y pb lprpk gb niegkf jsg tpaíp linf qkpínf p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, gb lprgknfqg Tibrípl tpbbó gb biakf ng bp bgy ng Mgtfvá npnp hfk dgnif ng Dfilél. 
15 Y npenf rsgeqp Tibrípl, nimf pb glrkiap Lpcáe: Yf tg tpbbpnf gb biakf ng bp bgy ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. Y nif Tibrípl gb biakf p Lpcáe. 

16 Y Lpcáe bf bbgvó pb kgy, y bg rfeqó gb plseqf, nirigenf: Qsl ligkvfl tpe rsdhbinf qfnf bf jsg bgl csg gerfdgenpnf. 
17 Tpe kgseinf gb niegkf jsg lg tpbbó ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bf tpe geqkgupnf ge dpef ng bfl gerpkupnfl, y ge dpef ng bfl jsg tprge bp fakp. 
18 Pngdál ng glqf, ngrbpkó gb glrkiap Lpcáe pb kgy, nirigenf: Gb lprgknfqg Tibrípl dg nif se biakf. Y bgyó Lpcáe ge éb ngbpeqg ngb kgy. 
19 Bsguf jsg gb kgy fyó bpl hpbpakpl ng bp bgy, kpluó lsl vglqinfl; 
20 Y dpenó p Tibrípl y p Ptirpd timf ng Lpcáe, y p Panóe timf ng Dirpíp, y p Lpcáe glrkiap, y p Plpípl ligkvf ngb kgy, nirigenf: 

21 Penpn, rfelsbqpn p Mgtfvá hfk dí y hfk gb kgdpegeqg ng Ilkpgb y ng Msná prgkrp ng bpl hpbpakpl ngb biakf jsg lg tp tpbbpnf; hfkjsg ukpeng gl bp ikp ng Mgtfvá jsg tp rpínf lfakg eflfqkfl, hfk rspeqf esglqkfl hpnkgl ef uspknpkfe bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, hpkp tprgk rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg glqá glrkiqf ge glqg biakf. 
22 Geqfergl Tibrípl y bfl ngb kgy csgkfe p Tsbnp hkfcgqilp, dsmgk ng Lpbsd timf ng Qirvp, timf ng Tpktpl, uspknp ng bpl vglqinskpl, bp rspb dfkpap ge Mgkslpbée ge gb lgusenf apkkif, y bg nimgkfe bpl hpbpakpl peqgl nirtpl. 

23 Y gbbp kglhfenió: Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb tp nirtf plí: Ngrin pb vpkóe jsg fl tp gevipnf p dí, jsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: 
24 Tg pjsí yf qkpiuf dpb lfakg glqg bsupk, y lfakg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng éb, qfnpl bpl dpbnirifegl jsg glqáe glrkiqpl ge gb biakf jsg bgygkfe ngbpeqg ngb kgy ng Msná; 
25 hfk rspeqf dg tpe ngmpnf, y tpe fckgrinf lprkicirifl niflgl pmgefl, hkfvfráenfdg p ikp rfe qfnpl bpl fakpl ng lsl dpefl; hfk qpeqf, lg ngkkpdpká di ikp lfakg glqg bsupk, y ef lg phpupká. 

26 Dpl pb kgy ng Msná, jsg fl tp gevipnf p rfelsbqpk p Mgtfvá, plí bg nikéil: Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb tp nirtf plí: Hfk rspeqf fílqg bpl hpbpakpl ngb biakf,
27 y qs rfkpzóe lg rfedfvió, y qg tsdibbplqg ngbpeqg ng Nifl pb fík lsl hpbpakpl lfakg glqg bsupk y lfakg lsl dfkpnfkgl, y qg tsdibbplqg ngbpeqg ng dí, y kpluplqg qsl vglqinfl y bbfkplqg ge di hkglgerip, yf qpdaiée qg tg fínf, nirg Mgtfvá. 

28 Tg pjsí jsg yf qg kgrfugké rfe qsl hpnkgl, y lgkál kgrfuinf ge qs lghsbrkf ge hpz, y qsl fmfl ef vgkáe qfnf gb dpb jsg yf qkpiuf lfakg glqg bsupk y lfakg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng éb. Y gbbfl kgcikigkfe pb kgy bp kglhsglqp. 
29 Geqfergl gb kgy gevió y kgseió p qfnfl bfl peripefl ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée. 

30 Y lsaió gb kgy p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y rfe éb qfnfl bfl vpkfegl ng Msná, y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, bfl lprgknfqgl, bfl bgviqpl y qfnf gb hsgabf, nglng gb dpyfk tplqp gb dál hgjsgñf; y bgyó p fínfl ng gbbfl qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ngb biakf ngb hprqf jsg tpaíp linf tpbbpnf ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 
31 Y glqpenf gb kgy ge hig ge ls liqif, tizf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá hprqf ng rpdiepk ge hfl ng Mgtfvá y ng uspknpk lsl dpenpdigeqfl, lsl qglqidfeifl y lsl glqpqsqfl, rfe qfnf ls rfkpzóe y rfe qfnp ls pbdp, hfeigenf hfk fakp bpl hpbpakpl ngb hprqf jsg glqpape glrkiqpl ge pjsgb biakf. 

32 G tizf jsg lg fabiupkpe p gbbf qfnfl bfl jsg glqpape ge Mgkslpbée y ge Agempdíe; y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée tirigkfe rfecfkdg pb hprqf ng Nifl, ngb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl. 
33 Y jsiqó Mflípl qfnpl bpl pafdieprifegl ng qfnp bp qigkkp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, g tizf jsg qfnfl bfl jsg lg tpbbpape ge Ilkpgb likviglge p Mgtfvá ls Nifl. Ef lg phpkqpkfe ng ge hfl ng Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl, qfnf gb qigdhf jsg éb vivió. 



Mflípl rgbgakp bp hplrsp

2 Rkóeirpl 35
(2 K. 23.21-23)

1 Mflípl rgbgakó bp hplrsp p Mgtfvá ge Mgkslpbée, y lprkicirpkfe bp hplrsp p bfl rpqfkrg nípl ngb dgl hkidgkf. 
2 Hslf qpdaiée p bfl lprgknfqgl ge lsl fcirifl, y bfl rfecikdó ge gb dieilqgkif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

3 Y nimf p bfl bgviqpl jsg gelgñpape p qfnf Ilkpgb, y jsg glqpape ngnirpnfl p Mgtfvá: Hfegn gb pkrp lpeqp ge bp rplp jsg gniciró Lpbfdóe timf ng Npvin, kgy ng Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg ef bp rpkuséil dál lfakg bfl tfdakfl. Ptfkp lgkvin p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y p ls hsgabf Ilkpgb. 
4 Hkghpkpfl lguúe bpl cpdibipl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl, hfk vsglqkfl qskefl, rfdf bf fkngepkfe Npvin kgy ng Ilkpgb y Lpbfdóe ls timf. 
5 Glqpn ge gb lpeqspkif lguúe bp nilqkiasrióe ng bpl cpdibipl ng vsglqkfl tgkdpefl bfl timfl ngb hsgabf, y lguúe bp nilqkiasrióe ng bp cpdibip ng bfl bgviqpl. 
6 Lprkicirpn bsguf bp hplrsp; y nglhsél ng lpeqicirpkfl, hkghpkpn p vsglqkfl tgkdpefl hpkp jsg tpupe rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá npnp hfk dgnif ng Dfilél. 

7 Y nif gb kgy Mflípl p bfl ngb hsgabf fvgmpl, rfkngkfl y rpakiqfl ng bfl kgapñfl, ge eúdgkf ng qkgieqp dib, y qkgl dib asgygl, qfnf hpkp bp hplrsp, hpkp qfnfl bfl jsg lg tpbbpkfe hkglgeqgl; glqf ng bp tprigenp ngb kgy. 
8 Qpdaiée lsl hkíerihgl nigkfe rfe biagkpbinpn pb hsgabf y p bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl. Tibrípl, Zprpkípl y Mgtigb, fciripbgl ng bp rplp ng Nifl, nigkfe p bfl lprgknfqgl, hpkp rgbgakpk bp hplrsp, nfl dib lgilrigeqpl fvgmpl y qkglrigeqfl asgygl. 

9 Plidildf Rfepeípl, y Lgdpípl y Epqpepgb lsl tgkdpefl, y Tplpaípl, Mgigb y Mflpapn, mgcgl ng bfl bgviqpl, nigkfe p bfl bgviqpl, hpkp bfl lprkicirifl ng bp hplrsp, rierf dib fvgmpl y jsieigeqfl asgygl. 
10 Hkghpkpnf plí gb lgkvirif, bfl lprgknfqgl lg rfbfrpkfe ge lsl hsglqfl, y plidildf bfl bgviqpl ge lsl qskefl, rfecfkdg pb dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy. 

11 Y lprkicirpkfe bp hplrsp; y glhpkrípe bfl lprgknfqgl bp lpeukg kgriainp ng dpef ng bfl bgviqpl, y bfl bgviqpl nglfbbpape bpl vírqidpl. 
12 Qfdpkfe bsguf ngb tfbfrpslqf, hpkp npk rfecfkdg p bfl kghpkqidigeqfl ng bpl cpdibipl ngb hsgabf, p cie ng jsg fckgriglge p Mgtfvá lguúe glqá glrkiqf ge gb biakf ng Dfilél; y plidildf qfdpkfe ng bfl asgygl. 
13 Y plpkfe bp hplrsp pb csguf rfecfkdg p bp fkngepezp; dpl bf jsg tpaíp linf lpeqicirpnf bf rfrigkfe ge fbbpl, ge rpbngkfl y lpkqgegl, y bf kghpkqigkfe káhinpdgeqg p qfnf gb hsgabf. 

14 Nglhsél hkghpkpkfe hpkp gbbfl dildfl y hpkp bfl lprgknfqgl; hfkjsg bfl lprgknfqgl, timfl ng Ppkóe, glqsvigkfe frshpnfl tplqp bp efrtg ge gb lprkicirif ng bfl tfbfrpslqfl y ng bpl ukflskpl; hfk qpeqf, bfl bgviqpl hkghpkpkfe hpkp gbbfl dildfl y hpkp bfl lprgknfqgl timfl ng Ppkóe. 
15 Plidildf bfl rpeqfkgl timfl ng Plpc glqpape ge ls hsglqf, rfecfkdg pb dpenpdigeqf ng Npvin, ng Plpc y ng Tgdáe, y ng Mgnsqúe vingeqg ngb kgy; qpdaiée bfl hfkqgkfl glqpape p rpnp hsgkqp; y ef gkp egrglpkif jsg lg phpkqplge ng ls dieilqgkif, hfkjsg lsl tgkdpefl bfl bgviqpl hkghpkpape hpkp gbbfl. 

16 Plí csg hkghpkpnf qfnf gb lgkvirif ng Mgtfvá ge pjsgb níp, hpkp rgbgakpk bp hplrsp y hpkp lprkicirpk bfl tfbfrpslqfl lfakg gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá, rfecfkdg pb dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy Mflípl. 
17 Y bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg glqpape pbbí rgbgakpkfe bp hplrsp ge pjsgb qigdhf, y bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp hfk ligqg nípl. 

18 Eserp csg rgbgakpnp sep hplrsp rfdf glqp ge Ilkpgb nglng bfl nípl ng Lpdsgb gb hkfcgqp; ei eieuúe kgy ng Ilkpgb rgbgakó hplrsp qpb rfdf bp jsg rgbgakó gb kgy Mflípl, rfe bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, y qfnf Msná g Ilkpgb, bfl jsg lg tpbbpkfe pbbí, mseqpdgeqg rfe bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée. 
19 Glqp hplrsp csg rgbgakpnp ge gb pñf nigrifrtf ngb kgy Mflípl. 



Dsgkqg ng Mflípl
(2 K. 23.28-30)

20 Nglhsél ng qfnpl glqpl rflpl, bsguf ng tpagk kghpkpnf Mflípl bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, Egrpf kgy ng Guihqf lsaió hpkp tprgk usgkkp ge Rpkjsgdil mseqf pb Gsckpqgl; y lpbió Mflípl rfeqkp éb.
