21 Y Egrpf bg gevió dgelpmgkfl, nirigenf: ¿Jsé qgeuf yf rfeqiuf, kgy ng Msná? Yf ef vgeuf rfeqkp qi tfy, lief rfeqkp bp rplp jsg dg tprg usgkkp; y Nifl dg tp nirtf jsg dg phkglskg. Ngmp ng fhfegkqg p Nifl, jsige glqá rfediuf, ef lgp jsg éb qg nglqksyp. 

22 Dpl Mflípl ef lg kgqikó, lief jsg lg nilckpzó hpkp npkbg apqpbbp, y ef pqgenió p bpl hpbpakpl ng Egrpf, jsg gkpe ng afrp ng Nifl; y vief p npkbg apqpbbp ge gb rpdhf ng Dgusinf. 
23 Y bfl cbgrtgkfl qikpkfe rfeqkp gb kgy Mflípl. Geqfergl nimf gb kgy p lsl ligkvfl: Jsiqpndg ng pjsí, hfkjsg glqfy ukpvgdgeqg tgkinf. 
24 Geqfergl lsl ligkvfl bf lprpkfe ng pjsgb rpkkf, y bf hsligkfe ge se lgusenf rpkkf jsg qgeíp, y bf bbgvpkfe p Mgkslpbée, nfeng dskió; y bf lghsbqpkfe ge bfl lghsbrkfl ng lsl hpnkgl. Y qfnf Msná y Mgkslpbée tirigkfe nsgbf hfk Mflípl. 

25 Y Mgkgdípl gengrtó ge dgdfkip ng Mflípl. Qfnfl bfl rpeqfkgl y rpeqfkpl kgriqpe glpl bpdgeqprifegl lfakg Mflípl tplqp tfy; y bpl qfdpkfe hfk efkdp hpkp gengrtpk ge Ilkpgb, bpl rspbgl glqáe glrkiqpl ge gb biakf ng Bpdgeqfl. 

26 Bfl ngdál tgrtfl ng Mflípl, y lsl fakpl hipnflpl rfecfkdg p bf jsg glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy ng Mgtfvá, 
27 y lsl tgrtfl, hkidgkfl y hflqkgkfl, tg pjsí glqáe glrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb y ng Msná. 



Kgiepnf y nglqkfepdigeqf ng Mfprpz

2 Rkóeirpl 36
(2 K. 23.31-35)

1 Geqfergl gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp qfdó p Mfprpz timf ng Mflípl, y bf tizf kgy ge bsupk ng ls hpnkg ge Mgkslpbée. 
2 Ng vgieqiqkél pñfl gkp Mfprpz rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y qkgl dglgl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée. 
3 Y gb kgy ng Guihqf bf jsiqó ng Mgkslpbée, y rfengeó bp qigkkp p hpupk rige qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp y sef ng fkf. 
4 Y glqpabgrió gb kgy ng Guihqf p Gbipjsid tgkdpef ng Mfprpz hfk kgy lfakg Msná y Mgkslpbée, y bg dsnó gb efdakg ge Mfprid; y p Mfprpz ls tgkdpef qfdó Egrpf, y bf bbgvó p Guihqf. 



Kgiepnf ng Mfprid
(2 K. 23.36-24.7)

5 Rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk Mfprid gkp ng vgieqirierf pñfl, y kgieó ferg pñfl ge Mgkslpbée; g tizf bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 
6 Y lsaió rfeqkp éb Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, y bf bbgvó p Apaibfeip pqpnf rfe rpngepl. 
7 Qpdaiée bbgvó Epasrfnfeflfk p Apaibfeip ng bfl sqgelibifl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bfl hslf ge ls qgdhbf ge Apaibfeip. 
8 Bfl ngdál tgrtfl ng Mfprid, y bpl pafdieprifegl jsg tizf, y bf jsg ge éb lg tpbbó, glqá glrkiqf ge gb biakf ng bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb y ng Msná; y kgieó ge ls bsupk Mfpjsíe ls timf. 



Mfpjsíe gl bbgvpnf rpsqivf p Apaibfeip
(2 K. 24.8-17) 

9 Ng frtf pñfl gkp Mfpjsíe rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y kgieó qkgl dglgl y nigz nípl ge Mgkslpbée; g tizf bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá. 

10 P bp vsgbqp ngb pñf gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk gevió y bf tizf bbgvpk p Apaibfeip, mseqpdgeqg rfe bfl famgqfl hkgriflfl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y rfelqiqsyó p Lgngjsípl ls tgkdpef hfk kgy lfakg Msná y Mgkslpbée. 



Kgiepnf ng Lgngjsípl
(2 K. 24.18-20; Mgk. 52.1-3)

11 Ng vgieqiúe pñfl gkp Lgngjsípl rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y ferg pñfl kgieó ge Mgkslpbée. 
12 G tizf bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl, y ef lg tsdibbó ngbpeqg ngb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl, jsg bg tpabpap ng hpkqg ng Mgtfvá. 

13 Lg kgagbó plidildf rfeqkp gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk, pb rspb tpaíp mskpnf hfk Nifl; y genskgrió ls rgkviz, y falqieó ls rfkpzóe hpkp ef vfbvgklg p Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 
14 Qpdaiée qfnfl bfl hkierihpbgl lprgknfqgl, y gb hsgabf, psdgeqpkfe bp ieijsinpn, liusigenf qfnpl bpl pafdieprifegl ng bpl eprifegl, y rfeqpdiepenf bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, bp rspb éb tpaíp lpeqicirpnf ge Mgkslpbée. 

15 Y Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl gevió rfelqpeqgdgeqg hpbpakp p gbbfl hfk dgnif ng lsl dgelpmgkfl, hfkjsg éb qgeíp dilgkirfknip ng ls hsgabf y ng ls tpaiqprióe. 
16 Dpl gbbfl tprípe glrpkeif ng bfl dgelpmgkfl ng Nifl, y dgeflhkgripape lsl hpbpakpl, askbáenflg ng lsl hkfcgqpl, tplqp jsg lsaió bp ikp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp ls hsgabf, y ef tsaf yp kgdgnif. 



Rpsqivinpn ng Msná
(2 K. 25.8-21; Mgk. 39.8-10; 52.12-30)


17 Hfk bf rspb qkpmf rfeqkp gbbfl pb kgy ng bfl rpbngfl, jsg dpqó p glhpnp p lsl móvgegl ge bp rplp ng ls lpeqspkif, lie hgknfepk mfvge ei nfergbbp, peripef ei ngrkéhiqf; qfnfl bfl geqkguó ge lsl dpefl. 
18 Plidildf qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ng bp rplp ng Nifl, ukpengl y rtirfl, bfl qglfkfl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bfl qglfkfl ng bp rplp ngb kgy y ng lsl hkíerihgl, qfnf bf bbgvó p Apaibfeip. 

19 Y jsgdpkfe bp rplp ng Nifl, y kfdhigkfe gb dskf ng Mgkslpbée, y rfelsdigkfe p csguf qfnfl lsl hpbprifl, y nglqksygkfe qfnfl lsl famgqfl nglgpabgl. 
20 Bfl jsg glrphpkfe ng bp glhpnp csgkfe bbgvpnfl rpsqivfl p Apaibfeip, y csgkfe ligkvfl ng éb y ng lsl timfl, tplqp jsg vief gb kgief ng bfl hgklpl; 
21 hpkp jsg lg rsdhbiglg bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk afrp ng Mgkgdípl, tplqp jsg bp qigkkp tsaf ufzpnf ng kghflf; hfkjsg qfnf gb qigdhf ng ls plfbpdigeqf kghfló, tplqp jsg bfl lgqgeqp pñfl csgkfe rsdhbinfl. 



Gb ngrkgqf ng Rikf
(Gln. 1.1-4)

22 Dpl pb hkidgk pñf ng Rikf kgy ng bfl hgklpl, hpkp jsg lg rsdhbiglg bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk afrp ng Mgkgdípl, Mgtfvá nglhgkqó gb glhíkiqs ng Rikf kgy ng bfl hgklpl, gb rspb tizf hkgufepk ng hpbpakp y qpdaiée hfk glrkiqf, hfk qfnf ls kgief, nirigenf: 

23 Plí nirg Rikf, kgy ng bfl hgklpl: Mgtfvá, gb Nifl ng bfl rigbfl, dg tp npnf qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bp qigkkp; y éb dg tp dpenpnf jsg bg gnicijsg rplp ge Mgkslpbée, jsg glqá ge Msná. Jsige tpyp geqkg vflfqkfl ng qfnf ls hsgabf, lgp Mgtfvá ls Nifl rfe éb, y lsap. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------



GLNKPL 

Gb ngrkgqf ng Rikf

(2 Rk. 36.22-23)

GLNKPL 1

1 Ge gb hkidgk pñf ng Rikf kgy ng Hgklip, hpkp jsg lg rsdhbiglg bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk afrp ng Mgkgdípl, nglhgkqó Mgtfvá gb glhíkiqs ng Rikf kgy ng Hgklip, gb rspb tizf hkgufepk ng hpbpakp y qpdaiée hfk glrkiqf hfk qfnf ls kgief, nirigenf: 

2 Plí tp nirtf Rikf kgy ng Hgklip: Mgtfvá gb Nifl ng bfl rigbfl dg tp npnf qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bp qigkkp, y dg tp dpenpnf jsg bg gnicijsg rplp ge Mgkslpbée, jsg glqá ge Msná. 3 Jsige tpyp geqkg vflfqkfl ng ls hsgabf, lgp Nifl rfe éb, y lsap p Mgkslpbée jsg glqá ge Msná, y gnicijsg bp rplp p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb (éb gl gb Nifl), bp rspb glqá ge Mgkslpbée. 4 Y p qfnf gb jsg tpyp jsgnpnf, ge rspbjsigk bsupk nfeng dfkg, pyúngebg bfl tfdakgl ng ls bsupk rfe hbpqp, fkf, aigegl y upepnfl, pngdál ng fckgenpl vfbseqpkipl hpkp bp rplp ng Nifl, bp rspb glqá ge Mgkslpbée. 

Gb kgukglf p Mgkslpbée

5 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqpkfe bfl mgcgl ng bpl rplpl hpqgkepl ng Msná y ng Agempdíe, y bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, qfnfl pjsgbbfl rsyf glhíkiqs nglhgkqó Nifl hpkp lsaik p gnicirpk bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, bp rspb glqá ge Mgkslpbée. 6 Y qfnfl bfl jsg glqpape ge lsl pbkgngnfkgl bgl pysnpkfe rfe hbpqp y fkf, rfe aigegl y upepnf, y rfe rflpl hkgriflpl, pngdál ng qfnf bf jsg lg fckgrió vfbseqpkipdgeqg. 7 Y gb kgy Rikf lpró bfl sqgelibifl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, jsg Epasrfnfeflfk tpaíp lprpnf ng Mgkslpbée, y bfl tpaíp hsglqf ge bp rplp ng lsl niflgl. 8 Bfl lpró, hsgl, Rikf kgy ng Hgklip, hfk dpef ng Diqkínpqgl qglfkgkf, gb rspb bfl nif hfk rsgeqp p Lglaplpk hkíerihg ng Msná. 9 Y glqp gl bp rsgeqp ng gbbfl: qkgieqp qpzfegl ng fkf, dib qpzfegl ng hbpqp, vgieqiesgvg rsrtibbfl, 10 qkgieqp qpzpl ng fkf, fqkpl rspqkfrigeqpl nigz qpzpl ng hbpqp, y fqkfl dib sqgelibifl. 11 Qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ng fkf y ng hbpqp gkpe rierf dib rspqkfrigeqfl. Qfnfl bfl tizf bbgvpk Lglaplpk rfe bfl jsg lsaigkfe ngb rpsqivgkif ng Apaibfeip p Mgkslpbée. 

Bfl jsg vfbvigkfe rfe Zfkfapagb

(Egt. 7.5-73)

GLNKPL 2

1 Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng bp hkfvierip jsg lsaigkfe ngb rpsqivgkif, ng pjsgbbfl jsg Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip tpaíp bbgvpnf rpsqivfl p Apaibfeip, y jsg vfbvigkfe p Mgkslpbée y p Msná, rpnp sef p ls risnpn; 2 bfl rspbgl vieigkfe rfe Zfkfapagb, Mglúp, Egtgdípl, Lgkpípl, Kggbpípl, Dpknfjsgf, Aibláe, Dilhpk, Aiuvpi, Kgtsd y Appep. 

Gb eúdgkf ng bfl vpkfegl ngb hsgabf ng Ilkpgb: 3 Bfl timfl ng Hpkfl, nfl dib rigeqf lgqgeqp y nfl. 4 Bfl timfl ng Lgcpqípl, qkglrigeqfl lgqgeqp y nfl. 5 Bfl timfl ng Pkp, lgqgrigeqfl lgqgeqp y rierf. 6 Bfl timfl ng Hptpq-dfpa, ng bfl timfl ng Mglúp y ng Mfpa, nfl dib frtfrigeqfl nfrg. 7 Bfl timfl ng Gbpd, dib nflrigeqfl riersgeqp y rspqkf. 8 Bfl timfl ng Zpqs, efvgrigeqfl rspkgeqp y rierf. 9 Bfl timfl ng Zprpi, lgqgrigeqfl lglgeqp. 10 Bfl timfl ng Apei, lgilrigeqfl rspkgeqp y nfl. 11 Bfl timfl ng Agapi, lgilrigeqfl vgieqiqkél. 12 Bfl timfl ng Pzupn, dib nflrigeqfl vgieqinól. 13 Bfl timfl ng Pnfeirpd, lgilrigeqfl lglgeqp y lgil. 14 Bfl timfl ng Aiuvpi, nfl dib riersgeqp y lgil. 15 Bfl timfl ng Pníe, rspqkfrigeqfl riersgeqp y rspqkf. 16 Bfl timfl ng Pqgk, ng Gzgjsípl, efvgeqp y frtf. 17 Bfl timfl ng Agzpi, qkglrigeqfl vgieqiqkél. 18 Bfl timfl ng Mfkp, rigeqf nfrg. 19 Bfl timfl ng Tplsd, nflrigeqfl vgieqiqkél. 20 Bfl timfl ng Uiapk, efvgeqp y rierf. 21 Bfl timfl ng Agbée, rigeqf vgieqiqkél. 22 Bfl vpkfegl ng Egqfcp, riersgeqp y lgil. 23 Bfl vpkfegl ng Pepqfq, rigeqf vgieqifrtf. 24 Bfl timfl ng Pzdpvgq, rspkgeqp y nfl. 25 Bfl timfl ng Jsikipq-mgpkid, Rpcikp y Aggkfq, lgqgrigeqfl rspkgeqp y qkgl. 26 Bfl timfl ng Kpdá y Ugap, lgilrigeqfl vgieqisef. 27 Bfl vpkfegl ng Dirdpl, rigeqf vgieqinól. 28 Bfl vpkfegl ng Agq-gb y Tpi, nflrigeqfl vgieqiqkél. 29 Bfl timfl ng Egaf, riersgeqp y nfl. 30 Bfl timfl ng Dpuail, rigeqf riersgeqp y lgil. 31 Bfl timfl ngb fqkf Gbpd, dib nflrigeqfl riersgeqp y rspqkf. 32 Bfl timfl ng Tpkid, qkglrigeqfl vgieqg. 33 Bfl timfl ng Bfn, Tpnin y Fef, lgqgrigeqfl vgieqirierf. 34 Bfl timfl ng Mgkiró, qkglrigeqfl rspkgeqp y rierf. 35 Bfl timfl ng Lgepp, qkgl dib lgilrigeqfl qkgieqp. 

36 Bfl lprgknfqgl: bfl timfl ng Mgnpípl, ng bp rplp ng Mglúp, efvgrigeqfl lgqgeqp y qkgl. 37 Bfl timfl ng Idgk, dib riersgeqp y nfl. 38 Bfl timfl ng Hplsk, dib nflrigeqfl rspkgeqp y ligqg. 39 Bfl timfl ng Tpkid, dib nigriligqg. 

40 Bfl bgviqpl: bfl timfl ng Mglúp y ng Rpndigb, ng bfl timfl ng Tfnpvípl, lgqgeqp y rspqkf. 41 Bfl rpeqfkgl: bfl timfl ng Plpc, rigeqf vgieqifrtf. 42 Bfl timfl ng bfl hfkqgkfl: bfl timfl ng Lpbsd, bfl timfl ng Pqgk, bfl timfl ng Qpbdóe, bfl timfl ng Prsa, bfl timfl ng Tpqiqp, bfl timfl ng Lfapi; hfk qfnfl, rigeqf qkgieqp y esgvg. 

43 Bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf: bfl timfl ng Zitp, bfl timfl ng Tplscp, bfl timfl ng Qpapfq, 44 bfl timfl ng Jsgkfl, bfl timfl ng Liptp, bfl timfl ng Hpnóe, 45 bfl timfl ng Bgapep, bfl timfl ng Tpupap, bfl timfl ng Prsa, 46 bfl timfl ng Tpupa, bfl timfl ng Lpbdpi, bfl timfl ng Tpeáe, 47 bfl timfl ng Uingb, bfl timfl ng Uptpk, bfl timfl ng Kgpíp, 48 bfl timfl ng Kgzíe, bfl timfl ng Egrfnp, bfl timfl ng Upzpd, 49 bfl timfl ng Szp, bfl timfl ng Hplgpt, bfl timfl ng Aglpi, 50 bfl timfl ng Plgep, bfl timfl ng Dgseid, bfl timfl ng Egcslid, 51 bfl timfl ng Aprasr, bfl timfl ng Tprscp, bfl timfl ng Tpktsk, 52 bfl timfl ng Apzbsq, bfl timfl ng Dgtínp, bfl timfl ng Tpklp, 53 bfl timfl ng Apkrfl, bfl timfl ng Lílpkp, bfl timfl ng Qgdp, 54 bfl timfl ng Egzíp, bfl timfl ng Tpqicp. 

55 Bfl timfl ng bfl ligkvfl ng Lpbfdóe: bfl timfl ng Lfqpi, bfl timfl ng Lfcgkgq, bfl timfl ng Hgksnp, 56 bfl timfl ng Mppbp, bfl timfl ng Npkróe, bfl timfl ng Uingb, 57 bfl timfl ng Lgcpqípl, bfl timfl ng Tpqib, bfl timfl ng Hfjsgkgq-tpzgapid, bfl timfl ng Pdi. 

58 Qfnfl bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf, g timfl ng bfl ligkvfl ng Lpbfdóe, qkglrigeqfl efvgeqp y nfl. 

59 Glqfl csgkfe bfl jsg lsaigkfe ng Qgb-dgbp, Qgb-tpklp, Jsgksa, Pnnáe g Idgk jsg ef hsnigkfe ngdflqkpk bp rplp ng lsl hpnkgl, ei ls biepmg, li gkpe ng Ilkpgb: 60 bfl timfl ng Ngbpíp, bfl timfl ng Qfaípl, bfl timfl ng Egrfnp, lgilrigeqfl riersgeqp y nfl. 61 Y ng bfl timfl ng bfl lprgknfqgl: bfl timfl ng Tpapíp, bfl timfl ng Rfl, bfl timfl ng Apkzibpi, gb rspb qfdó dsmgk ng bpl timpl ng Apkzibpi upbppniqp, y csg bbpdpnf hfk gb efdakg ng gbbpl. 62 Glqfl aslrpkfe ls kguilqkf ng ugegpbfuípl, y ef csg tpbbpnf; y csgkfe gxrbsinfl ngb lprgknfrif, 63 y gb ufagkepnfk bgl nimf jsg ef rfdiglge ng bpl rflpl dál lpeqpl, tplqp jsg tsaiglg lprgknfqg hpkp rfelsbqpk rfe Skid y Qsdid. 

64 Qfnp bp rfeukguprióe, seinp rfdf se lfbf tfdakg, gkp ng rspkgeqp y nfl dib qkglrigeqfl lglgeqp, 65 lie rfeqpk lsl ligkvfl y ligkvpl, bfl rspbgl gkpe ligqg dib qkglrigeqfl qkgieqp y ligqg; y qgeípe nflrigeqfl rpeqfkgl y rpeqfkpl. 66 Lsl rpapbbfl gkpe lgqgrigeqfl qkgieqp y lgil; lsl dsbpl, nflrigeqpl rspkgeqp y rierf; 67 lsl rpdgbbfl, rspqkfrigeqfl qkgieqp y rierf; plefl, lgil dib lgqgrigeqfl vgieqg. 

68 Y pbusefl ng bfl mgcgl ng rplpl hpqgkepl, rspenf vieigkfe p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá jsg glqpap ge Mgkslpbée, tirigkfe fckgenpl vfbseqpkipl hpkp bp rplp ng Nifl, hpkp kggnicirpkbp ge ls liqif. 69 Lguúe lsl csgkzpl nigkfe pb qglfkgkf ng bp fakp lglgeqp y se dib nkprdpl ng fkf, rierf dib biakpl ng hbpqp, y rige qúeirpl lprgknfqpbgl. 

70 Y tpaiqpkfe bfl lprgknfqgl, bfl bgviqpl, bfl ngb hsgabf, bfl rpeqfkgl, bfl hfkqgkfl y bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf ge lsl risnpngl; y qfnf Ilkpgb ge lsl risnpngl. 

Kglqpskprióe ngb pbqpk y ngb rsbqf

GLNKPL 3

1 Rspenf bbguó gb dgl léhqidf, y glqpenf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb yp glqpabgrinfl ge bpl risnpngl, lg mseqó gb hsgabf rfdf se lfbf tfdakg ge Mgkslpbée. 2 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqpkfe Mglúp timf ng Mflpnpr y lsl tgkdpefl bfl lprgknfqgl, y Zfkfapagb timf ng Lpbpqigb y lsl tgkdpefl, y gnicirpkfe gb pbqpk ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, hpkp fckgrgk lfakg éb tfbfrpslqfl, rfdf glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy ng Dfilél vpkóe ng Nifl. 3 Y rfbfrpkfe gb pbqpk lfakg ls aplg, hfkjsg qgeípe dignf ng bfl hsgabfl ng bpl qigkkpl, y fckgrigkfe lfakg éb tfbfrpslqfl p Mgtfvá, tfbfrpslqfl hfk bp dpñpep y hfk bp qpkng. 4 Rgbgakpkfe plidildf bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bfl qpagkeársbfl, rfdf glqá glrkiqf, y tfbfrpslqfl rpnp níp hfk fknge rfecfkdg pb kiqf, rpnp rflp ge ls níp; 5 pngdál ng glqf, gb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, bpl esgvpl bsepl, y qfnpl bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl ng Mgtfvá, y qfnf lprkicirif glhfeqáegf, qfnp fckgenp vfbseqpkip p Mgtfvá. 6 Nglng gb hkidgk níp ngb dgl léhqidf rfdgezpkfe p fckgrgk tfbfrpslqfl p Mgtfvá; hgkf bfl ridigeqfl ngb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá ef lg tpaípe grtpnf qfnpvíp. 7 Y nigkfe niegkf p bfl pbapñibgl y rpkhieqgkfl; plidildf rfdinp, againp y prgiqg p bfl linfeifl y qikifl hpkp jsg qkpmglge dpngkp ng rgnkf nglng gb Bíapef hfk dpk p Mfhg, rfecfkdg p bp vfbseqpn ng Rikf kgy ng Hgklip prgkrp ng glqf. 

Rfbfrprióe ng bfl ridigeqfl ngb qgdhbf

8 Ge gb pñf lgusenf ng ls vgeinp p bp rplp ng Nifl ge Mgkslpbée, ge gb dgl lgusenf, rfdgezpkfe Zfkfapagb timf ng Lpbpqigb, Mglúp timf ng Mflpnpr y bfl fqkfl lsl tgkdpefl, bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl, y qfnfl bfl jsg tpaípe vgeinf ng bp rpsqivinpn p Mgkslpbée; y hsligkfe p bfl bgviqpl ng vgieqg pñfl pkkiap hpkp jsg prqivplge bp fakp ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 9 Mglúp qpdaiée, lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, Rpndigb y lsl timfl, timfl ng Msná, rfdf se lfbf tfdakg plilqípe hpkp prqivpk p bfl jsg tprípe bp fakp ge bp rplp ng Nifl, mseqf rfe bfl timfl ng Tgepnpn, lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, bgviqpl. 

10 Y rspenf bfl pbapñibgl ngb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá grtpape bfl ridigeqfl, hsligkfe p bfl lprgknfqgl vglqinfl ng lsl kfhpl y rfe qkfdhgqpl, y p bfl bgviqpl timfl ng Plpc rfe rídapbfl, hpkp jsg pbpaplge p Mgtfvá, lguúe bp fkngepezp ng Npvin kgy ng Ilkpgb. 11 Y rpeqpape, pbpapenf y npenf ukpripl p Mgtfvá, y nirigenf: Hfkjsg éb gl asgef, hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip lfakg Ilkpgb. Y qfnf gb hsgabf prbpdpap rfe ukpe múaibf, pbpapenf p Mgtfvá hfkjsg lg grtpape bfl ridigeqfl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 12 Y dsrtfl ng bfl lprgknfqgl, ng bfl bgviqpl y ng bfl mgcgl ng rplpl hpqgkepl, peripefl jsg tpaípe vilqf bp rplp hkidgkp, vigenf grtpk bfl ridigeqfl ng glqp rplp, bbfkpape ge pbqp vfz, digeqkpl dsrtfl fqkfl npape ukpengl ukiqfl ng pbgukíp. 13 Y ef hfníp nilqieusik gb hsgabf gb rbpdfk ng bfl ukiqfl ng pbgukíp, ng bp vfz ngb bbfkf; hfkjsg rbpdpap gb hsgabf rfe ukpe múaibf, y lg fíp gb ksinf tplqp ng bgmfl. 

Bfl pnvgklpkifl ngqigege bp fakp

GLNKPL 4

1 Fygenf bfl gegdiufl ng Msná y ng Agempdíe jsg bfl vgeinfl ng bp rpsqivinpn gnicirpape gb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, 2 vieigkfe p Zfkfapagb y p bfl mgcgl ng rplpl hpqgkepl, y bgl nimgkfe: Gnicirpkgdfl rfe vflfqkfl, hfkjsg rfdf vflfqkfl aslrpdfl p vsglqkf Nifl, y p éb fckgrgdfl lprkicirifl nglng bfl nípl ng Glpk-tpnóe kgy ng Plikip, jsg efl tizf vgeik pjsí. 3 Zfkfapagb, Mglúp, y bfl ngdál mgcgl ng rplpl hpqgkepl ng Ilkpgb nimgkfe: Ef efl rfevigeg gnicirpk rfe vflfqkfl rplp p esglqkf Nifl, lief jsg eflfqkfl lfbfl bp gnicirpkgdfl p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, rfdf efl dpenó gb kgy Rikf, kgy ng Hgklip. 

4 Hgkf gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp ieqidinó pb hsgabf ng Msná, y bf pqgdfkizó hpkp jsg ef gnicirpkp. 5 Lfafkepkfe pngdál rfeqkp gbbfl p bfl rfelgmgkfl hpkp ckslqkpk lsl hkfhóliqfl, qfnf gb qigdhf ng Rikf kgy ng Hgklip y tplqp gb kgiepnf ng Npkíf kgy ng Hgklip. 

6 Y ge gb kgiepnf ng Plsgkf, ge gb hkierihif ng ls kgiepnf, glrkiaigkfe prslprifegl rfeqkp bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée. 

7 Qpdaiée ge nípl ng Pkqpmgkmgl glrkiaigkfe Ailbpd, Diqkínpqgl, Qpaggb y bfl ngdál rfdhpñgkfl lsyfl, p Pkqpmgkmgl kgy ng Hgklip; y bp glrkiqskp y gb bgeuspmg ng bp rpkqp gkpe ge pkpdgf. 8 Kgtsd rperibbgk y Lidlpi lgrkgqpkif glrkiaigkfe sep rpkqp rfeqkp Mgkslpbée pb kgy Pkqpmgkmgl. 9 Ge qpb cgrtp glrkiaigkfe Kgtsd rperibbgk y Lidlpi lgrkgqpkif, y bfl ngdál rfdhpñgkfl lsyfl bfl msgrgl, ufagkepnfkgl y fciripbgl, y bfl ng Hgklip, ng Gkgr, ng Apaibfeip, ng Lslp, glqf gl, bfl gbpdiqpl, 10 y bfl ngdál hsgabfl jsg gb ukpeng y ubfkiflf Plephpk qkpelhfkqó g tizf tpaiqpk ge bpl risnpngl ng Lpdpkip y bpl ngdál hkfvieripl ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf. 11 Y glqp gl bp rfhip ng bp rpkqp jsg gevipkfe: Pb kgy Pkqpmgkmgl: Qsl ligkvfl ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf qg lpbsnpe. 12 Lgp efqfkif pb kgy, jsg bfl msnífl jsg lsaigkfe ng qi p eflfqkfl vieigkfe p Mgkslpbée; y gnicirpe bp risnpn kgagbng y dpbp, y bgvpeqpe bfl dskfl y kghpkpe bfl csenpdgeqfl. 13 Ptfkp lgp efqfkif pb kgy, jsg li pjsgbbp risnpn csgkg kggnicirpnp, y bfl dskfl csgkge bgvpeqpnfl, ef hpupkáe qkiasqf, idhsglqf y kgeqpl, y gb gkpkif ng bfl kgygl lgká dgeflrpapnf. 14 Ligenf jsg efl dpeqigege ngb hpbprif, ef efl gl mslqf vgk gb dgeflhkgrif ngb kgy, hfk bf rspb tgdfl gevipnf p tprgkbf lpagk pb kgy, 15 hpkp jsg lg asljsg ge gb biakf ng bpl dgdfkipl ng qsl hpnkgl. Tpbbpkál ge gb biakf ng bpl dgdfkipl, y lpakál jsg glqp risnpn gl risnpn kgagbng, y hgkmsniripb p bfl kgygl y p bpl hkfvieripl, y jsg ng qigdhf peqiusf cfkdpe ge dgnif ng gbbp kgagbifegl, hfk bf jsg glqp risnpn csg nglqksinp. 16 Tprgdfl lpagk pb kgy jsg li glqp risnpn csgkg kggnicirpnp, y bgvpeqpnfl lsl dskfl, bp kguióe ng dál pbbá ngb kíf ef lgká qsyp. 

17 Gb kgy gevió glqp kglhsglqp: P Kgtsd rperibbgk, p Lidlpi lgrkgqpkif, p bfl ngdál rfdhpñgkfl lsyfl jsg tpaiqpe ge Lpdpkip, y p bfl ngdál ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf: Lpbsn y hpz. 18 Bp rpkqp jsg efl geviplqgil csg bgínp rbpkpdgeqg ngbpeqg ng dí. 19 Y hfk dí csg npnp fknge y aslrpkfe; y tpbbpkfe jsg pjsgbbp risnpn ng qigdhf peqiusf lg bgvpeqp rfeqkp bfl kgygl y lg kgagbp, y lg cfkdp ge gbbp lgnirióe; 20 y jsg tsaf ge Mgkslpbée kgygl csgkqgl jsg nfdiepkfe ge qfnf bf jsg tpy dál pbbá ngb kíf, y jsg lg bgl hpupap qkiasqf, idhsglqf y kgeqpl. 21 Ptfkp, hsgl, npn fknge jsg rglge pjsgbbfl tfdakgl, y ef lgp glp risnpn kggnicirpnp tplqp jsg hfk dí lgp npnp esgvp fknge. 22 Y dikpn jsg ef lgáil egubiugeqgl ge glqf; ¿hfk jsé tpaká ng rkgrgk gb npñf ge hgkmsirif ng bfl kgygl? 

23 Geqfergl, rspenf bp rfhip ng bp rpkqp ngb kgy Pkqpmgkmgl csg bgínp ngbpeqg ng Kgtsd, y ng Lidlpi lgrkgqpkif y lsl rfdhpñgkfl, csgkfe phkglskpnpdgeqg p Mgkslpbée p bfl msnífl, y bgl tirigkfe rglpk rfe hfngk y vifbgerip. 24 Geqfergl rgló bp fakp ng bp rplp ng Nifl jsg glqpap ge Mgkslpbée, y jsgnó lslhgeninp tplqp gb pñf lgusenf ngb kgiepnf ng Npkíf kgy ng Hgklip. 

Kggnicirprióe ngb qgdhbf

GLNKPL 5

1 Hkfcgqizpkfe Tpugf y Zprpkípl timf ng Innf, pdafl hkfcgqpl, p bfl msnífl jsg glqpape ge Msná y ge Mgkslpbée ge gb efdakg ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb jsige glqpap lfakg gbbfl. 2 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqpkfe Zfkfapagb timf ng Lpbpqigb y Mglúp timf ng Mflpnpr, y rfdgezpkfe p kggnicirpk bp rplp ng Nifl jsg glqpap ge Mgkslpbée; y rfe gbbfl bfl hkfcgqpl ng Nifl jsg bgl pysnpape. 

3 Ge pjsgb qigdhf vief p gbbfl Qpqepi ufagkepnfk ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, y Lgqpk-afzepi y lsl rfdhpñgkfl, y bgl nimgkfe plí: ¿Jsiée fl tp npnf fknge hpkp gnicirpk glqp rplp y bgvpeqpk glqfl dskfl? 4 Gbbfl qpdaiée hkguseqpkfe: ¿Rsábgl lfe bfl efdakgl ng bfl tfdakgl jsg tprge glqg gnicirif? 5 Dpl bfl fmfl ng Nifl glqpape lfakg bfl peripefl ng bfl msnífl, y ef bgl tirigkfe rglpk tplqp jsg gb plseqf csglg bbgvpnf p Npkíf; y geqfergl kglhfenigkfe hfk rpkqp lfakg glqf. 

6 Rfhip ng bp rpkqp jsg Qpqepi ufagkepnfk ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, y Lgqpk-afzepi, y lsl rfdhpñgkfl bfl ufagkepnfkgl jsg glqpape pb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, gevipkfe pb kgy Npkíf. 7 Bg gevipkfe rpkqp, y plí glqpap glrkiqf ge gbbp: Pb kgy Npkíf qfnp hpz. 8 Lgp efqfkif pb kgy, jsg csidfl p bp hkfvierip ng Msngp, p bp rplp ngb ukpe Nifl, bp rspb lg gnicirp rfe hignkpl ukpengl; y yp bfl dpngkfl glqáe hsglqfl ge bpl hpkgngl, y bp fakp lg tprg ng hkilp, y hkflhgkp ge lsl dpefl. 9 Geqfergl hkguseqpdfl p bfl peripefl, niriéenfbgl plí: ¿Jsiée fl nif fknge hpkp gnicirpk glqp rplp y hpkp bgvpeqpk glqfl dskfl? 10 Y qpdaiée bgl hkguseqpdfl lsl efdakgl hpkp tprékqgbf lpagk, hpkp glrkiaikqg bfl efdakgl ng bfl tfdakgl jsg glqpape p bp rpagzp ng gbbfl. 11 Y efl kglhfenigkfe nirigenf plí: Eflfqkfl lfdfl ligkvfl ngb Nifl ngb rigbf y ng bp qigkkp, y kggnicirpdfl bp rplp jsg yp dsrtfl pñfl peqgl tpaíp linf gnicirpnp, bp rspb gniciró y qgkdieó gb ukpe kgy ng Ilkpgb. 12 Dpl nglhsél jsg esglqkfl hpnkgl hkfvfrpkfe p ikp pb Nifl ng bfl rigbfl, éb bfl geqkguó ge dpef ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, rpbngf, gb rspb nglqksyó glqp rplp y bbgvó rpsqivf pb hsgabf p Apaibfeip. 13 Hgkf ge gb pñf hkidgkf ng Rikf kgy ng Apaibfeip, gb dildf kgy Rikf nif fknge hpkp jsg glqp rplp ng Nifl csglg kggnicirpnp. 14 Qpdaiée bfl sqgelibifl ng fkf y ng hbpqp ng bp rplp ng Nifl, jsg Epasrfnfeflfk tpaíp lprpnf ngb qgdhbf jsg glqpap ge Mgkslpbée y bfl tpaíp bbgvpnf pb qgdhbf ng Apaibfeip, gb kgy Rikf bfl lpró ngb qgdhbf ng Apaibfeip, y csgkfe geqkgupnfl p Lglaplpk, p jsige tpaíp hsglqf hfk ufagkepnfk; 15 y bg nimf: Qfdp glqfl sqgelibifl, vg, y bbévpbfl pb qgdhbf jsg glqá ge Mgkslpbée; y lgp kggnicirpnp bp rplp ng Nifl ge ls bsupk. 16 Geqfergl glqg Lglaplpk vief y hslf bfl ridigeqfl ng bp rplp ng Nifl, bp rspb glqá ge Mgkslpbée, y nglng geqfergl tplqp ptfkp lg gnicirp, y púe ef glqá rferbsinp. 17 Y ptfkp, li pb kgy hpkgrg aige, aúljsglg ge bp rplp ng bfl qglfkfl ngb kgy jsg glqá pbbí ge Apaibfeip, li gl plí jsg hfk gb kgy Rikf tpaíp linf npnp bp fknge hpkp kggnicirpk glqp rplp ng Nifl ge Mgkslpbée, y lg efl gevíg p ngrik bp vfbseqpn ngb kgy lfakg glqf. 

GLNKPL 6

1 Geqfergl gb kgy Npkíf nif bp fknge ng aslrpk ge bp rplp ng bfl pkrtivfl, nfeng uspknpape bfl qglfkfl pbbí ge Apaibfeip. 2 Y csg tpbbpnf ge Prdgqp, ge gb hpbprif jsg glqá ge bp hkfvierip ng Dgnip, se biakf ge gb rspb glqpap glrkiqf plí: Dgdfkip: 3 Ge gb pñf hkidgkf ngb kgy Rikf, gb dildf kgy Rikf nif fknge prgkrp ng bp rplp ng Nifl, bp rspb glqpap ge Mgkslpbée, hpkp jsg csglg bp rplp kggnicirpnp rfdf bsupk hpkp fckgrgk lprkicirifl, y jsg lsl hpkgngl csglge cikdgl; ls pbqskp ng lglgeqp rfnfl, y ng lglgeqp rfnfl ls pertskp; 4 y qkgl tibgkpl ng hignkpl ukpengl, y sep ng dpngkp esgvp; y jsg gb uplqf lgp hpupnf hfk gb qglfkf ngb kgy. 5 Y qpdaiée bfl sqgelibifl ng fkf y ng hbpqp ng bp rplp ng Nifl, bfl rspbgl Epasrfnfeflfk lpró ngb qgdhbf jsg glqpap ge Mgkslpbée y bfl hpló p Apaibfeip, lgpe ngvsgbqfl y vpype p ls bsupk, pb qgdhbf jsg glqá ge Mgkslpbée, y lgpe hsglqfl ge bp rplp ng Nifl. 

6 Ptfkp, hsgl, Qpqepi ufagkepnfk ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, Lgqpk- afzepi, y vsglqkfl rfdhpñgkfl bfl ufagkepnfkgl jsg glqáil pb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, pbgmpfl ng pbbí. 7 Ngmpn jsg lg tpup bp fakp ng glp rplp ng Nifl; jsg gb ufagkepnfk ng bfl msnífl y lsl peripefl kggnicijsge glp rplp ng Nifl ge ls bsupk. 8 Y hfk dí gl npnp fknge ng bf jsg tpaéil ng tprgk rfe glfl peripefl ng bfl msnífl, hpkp kggnicirpk glp rplp ng Nifl; jsg ng bp tprigenp ngb kgy, jsg qigeg ngb qkiasqf ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, lgpe npnfl hseqspbdgeqg p glfl vpkfegl bfl uplqfl, hpkp jsg ef rglg bp fakp. 9 Y bf jsg csgkg egrglpkif, agrgkkfl, rpkegkfl y rfkngkfl hpkp tfbfrpslqfl pb Nifl ngb rigbf, qkiuf, lpb, vief y prgiqg, rfecfkdg p bf jsg nimgkge bfl lprgknfqgl jsg glqáe ge Mgkslpbée, bgl lgp npnf níp hfk níp lie falqársbf pbusef, 10 hpkp jsg fckgzrpe lprkicirifl pukpnpabgl pb Nifl ngb rigbf, y fkge hfk bp vinp ngb kgy y hfk lsl timfl. 11 Qpdaiée hfk dí gl npnp fknge, jsg rspbjsigkp jsg pbqgkg glqg ngrkgqf, lg bg pkkpejsg se dpngkf ng ls rplp, y pbzpnf, lgp rfbupnf ge éb, y ls rplp lgp tgrtp dsbpnpk hfk glqf. 12 Y gb Nifl jsg tizf tpaiqpk pbbí ls efdakg, nglqksyp p qfnf kgy y hsgabf jsg hsligkg ls dpef hpkp rpdaipk f nglqksik glp rplp ng Nifl, bp rspb glqá ge Mgkslpbée. Yf Npkíf tg npnf gb ngrkgqf; lgp rsdhbinf hkfeqpdgeqg. 

13 Geqfergl Qpqepi ufagkepnfk ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, y Lgqpk-afzepi y lsl rfdhpñgkfl, tirigkfe hseqspbdgeqg lguúe gb kgy Npkíf tpaíp fkngepnf. 14 Y bfl peripefl ng bfl msnífl gnicirpape y hkflhgkpape, rfecfkdg p bp hkfcgríp ngb hkfcgqp Tpugf y ng Zprpkípl timf ng Innf. Gnicirpkfe, hsgl, y qgkdiepkfe, hfk fknge ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, y hfk dpenpqf ng Rikf, ng Npkíf, y ng Pkqpmgkmgl kgy ng Hgklip. 15 Glqp rplp csg qgkdiepnp gb qgkrgk níp ngb dgl ng Pnpk, jsg gkp gb lgxqf pñf ngb kgiepnf ngb kgy Npkíf. 

16 Geqfergl bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, bfl lprgknfqgl, bfl bgviqpl y bfl ngdál jsg tpaípe vgeinf ng bp rpsqivinpn, tirigkfe bp ngnirprióe ng glqp rplp ng Nifl rfe ufzf. 17 Y fckgrigkfe ge bp ngnirprióe ng glqp rplp ng Nifl rige agrgkkfl, nflrigeqfl rpkegkfl y rspqkfrigeqfl rfkngkfl; y nfrg dprtfl rpakífl ge gxhiprióe hfk qfnf Ilkpgb, rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. 18 Y hsligkfe p bfl lprgknfqgl ge lsl qskefl, y p bfl bgviqpl ge lsl rbplgl, hpkp gb lgkvirif ng Nifl ge Mgkslpbée, rfecfkdg p bf glrkiqf ge gb biakf ng Dfilél. 

19 Qpdaiée bfl timfl ng bp rpsqivinpn rgbgakpkfe bp hplrsp p bfl rpqfkrg nípl ngb dgl hkidgkf. 20 Hfkjsg bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl lg tpaípe hskicirpnf p sep; qfnfl glqpape bidhifl, y lprkicirpkfe bp hplrsp hfk qfnfl bfl timfl ng bp rpsqivinpn, y hfk lsl tgkdpefl bfl lprgknfqgl, y hfk lí dildfl. 21 Rfdigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg tpaípe vsgbqf ngb rpsqivgkif, rfe qfnfl pjsgbbfl jsg lg tpaípe phpkqpnf ng bpl iedseniripl ng bpl ugeqgl ng bp qigkkp hpkp aslrpk p Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 22 Y rgbgakpkfe rfe kgufrimf bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp ligqg nípl, hfk rspeqf Mgtfvá bfl tpaíp pbgukpnf, y tpaíp vsgbqf gb rfkpzóe ngb kgy ng Plikip tprip gbbfl, hpkp cfkqpbgrgk lsl dpefl ge bp fakp ng bp rplp ng Nifl, ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 

Glnkpl y lsl rfdhpñgkfl bbgupe p Mgkslpbée

GLNKPL 7

1 Hplpnpl glqpl rflpl, ge gb kgiepnf ng Pkqpmgkmgl kgy ng Hgklip, Glnkpl timf ng Lgkpípl, timf ng Pzpkípl, timf ng Tibrípl, 2 timf ng Lpbsd, timf ng Lpnfr, timf ng Ptiqfa, 3 timf ng Pdpkípl, timf ng Pzpkípl, timf ng Dgkpifq, 4 timf ng Zgkpípl, timf ng Szi, timf ng Asjsi, 5 timf ng Pailúp, timf ng Cieggl, timf ng Gbgpzpk, timf ng Ppkóe, hkidgk lprgknfqg, 6 glqg Glnkpl lsaió ng Apaibfeip. Gkp glrkiap nibiugeqg ge bp bgy ng Dfilél, jsg Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb tpaíp npnf; y bg rfergnió gb kgy qfnf bf jsg hinió, hfkjsg bp dpef ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl glqpap lfakg Glnkpl. 

7 Y rfe éb lsaigkfe p Mgkslpbée pbusefl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y ng bfl lprgknfqgl, bgviqpl, rpeqfkgl, hfkqgkfl y likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf, ge gb léhqidf pñf ngb kgy Pkqpmgkmgl. 8 Y bbguó p Mgkslpbée ge gb dgl jsieqf ngb pñf léhqidf ngb kgy. 9 Hfkjsg gb níp hkidgkf ngb hkidgk dgl csg gb hkierihif ng bp hpkqinp ng Apaibfeip, y pb hkidgkf ngb dgl jsieqf bbguó p Mgkslpbée, glqpenf rfe éb bp asgep dpef ng Nifl. 10 Hfkjsg Glnkpl tpaíp hkghpkpnf ls rfkpzóe hpkp iejsikik bp bgy ng Mgtfvá y hpkp rsdhbikbp, y hpkp gelgñpk ge Ilkpgb lsl glqpqsqfl y ngrkgqfl. 

11 Glqp gl bp rfhip ng bp rpkqp jsg nif gb kgy Pkqpmgkmgl pb lprgknfqg Glnkpl, glrkiap vgklpnf ge bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá y ge lsl glqpqsqfl p Ilkpgb: 12 Pkqpmgkmgl kgy ng kgygl, p Glnkpl, lprgknfqg y glrkiap gksniqf ge bp bgy ngb Nifl ngb rigbf: Hpz. 13 Hfk dí gl npnp fknge jsg qfnf pjsgb ge di kgief, ngb hsgabf ng Ilkpgb y ng lsl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, jsg jsigkp ik rfeqiuf p Mgkslpbée, vpyp. 14 Hfkjsg ng hpkqg ngb kgy y ng lsl ligqg rfelgmgkfl gkgl gevipnf p viliqpk p Msngp y p Mgkslpbée, rfecfkdg p bp bgy ng qs Nifl jsg glqá ge qs dpef; 15 y p bbgvpk bp hbpqp y gb fkf jsg gb kgy y lsl rfelgmgkfl vfbseqpkipdgeqg fckgrge pb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, rsyp dfkpnp glqá ge Mgkslpbée, 16 y qfnp bp hbpqp y gb fkf jsg tpbbgl ge qfnp bp hkfvierip ng Apaibfeip, rfe bpl fckgenpl vfbseqpkipl ngb hsgabf y ng bfl lprgknfqgl, jsg vfbseqpkipdgeqg fckgrigkge hpkp bp rplp ng ls Nifl, bp rspb glqá ge Mgkslpbée. 17 Rfdhkpkál, hsgl, nibiugeqgdgeqg rfe glqg niegkf agrgkkfl, rpkegkfl y rfkngkfl, rfe lsl fckgenpl y lsl biaprifegl, y bfl fckgrgkál lfakg gb pbqpk ng bp rplp ng vsglqkf Nifl, bp rspb glqá ge Mgkslpbée. 18 Y bf jsg p qi y p qsl tgkdpefl fl hpkgzrp tprgk ng bp fqkp hbpqp y fkf, tprgnbf rfecfkdg p bp vfbseqpn ng vsglqkf Nifl. 19 Bfl sqgelibifl jsg qg lfe geqkgupnfl hpkp gb lgkvirif ng bp rplp ng qs Nifl, bfl kglqiqsikál ngbpeqg ng Nifl ge Mgkslpbée. 20 Y qfnf bf jsg lg kgjsigkg hpkp bp rplp ng qs Nifl, jsg qg lgp egrglpkif npk, bf npkál ng bp rplp ng bfl qglfkfl ngb kgy. 

21 Y hfk dí, Pkqpmgkmgl kgy, gl npnp fknge p qfnfl bfl qglfkgkfl jsg glqáe pb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, jsg qfnf bf jsg fl hinp gb lprgknfqg Glnkpl, glrkiap ng bp bgy ngb Nifl ngb rigbf, lg bg rfergnp hkfeqpdgeqg, 22 tplqp rige qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp, rige rfkfl ng qkiuf, rige apqfl ng vief, y rige apqfl ng prgiqg; y lpb lie dgninp. 23 Qfnf bf jsg gl dpenpnf hfk gb Nifl ngb rigbf, lgp tgrtf hkfeqpdgeqg hpkp bp rplp ngb Nifl ngb rigbf; hsgl, ¿hfk jsé tpakíp ng lgk ls ikp rfeqkp gb kgief ngb kgy y ng lsl timfl? 24 Y p vflfqkfl fl tprgdfl lpagk jsg p qfnfl bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, rpeqfkgl, hfkqgkfl, likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf y dieilqkfl ng bp rplp ng Nifl, eieusef hfnká idhfegkbgl qkiasqf, rfeqkiasrióe ei kgeqp. 

25 Y qú, Glnkpl, rfecfkdg p bp lpainskíp jsg qigegl ng qs Nifl, hfe msgrgl y ufagkepnfkgl jsg ufaigkege p qfnf gb hsgabf jsg glqá pb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, p qfnfl bfl jsg rfefrge bpl bgygl ng qs Nifl; y pb jsg ef bpl rfefrg, bg gelgñpkál. 26 Y rspbjsigkp jsg ef rsdhbigkg bp bgy ng qs Nifl, y bp bgy ngb kgy, lgp mszupnf hkfeqpdgeqg, lgp p dsgkqg, p nglqigkkf, p hgep ng dsbqp, f hkilióe. 

27 Ageniqf Mgtfvá Nifl ng esglqkfl hpnkgl, jsg hslf qpb rflp ge gb rfkpzóe ngb kgy, hpkp tfekpk bp rplp ng Mgtfvá jsg glqá ge Mgkslpbée, 28 g ierbieó tprip dí ls dilgkirfknip ngbpeqg ngb kgy y ng lsl rfelgmgkfl, y ng qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl hfngkflfl ngb kgy. Y yf, cfkqpbgrinf hfk bp dpef ng di Nifl lfakg dí, kgseí p bfl hkierihpbgl ng Ilkpgb hpkp jsg lsaiglge rfediuf. 

GLNKPL 8

1 Glqfl lfe bfl mgcgl ng rplpl hpqgkepl, y bp ugegpbfuíp ng pjsgbbfl jsg lsaigkfe rfediuf ng Apaibfeip, kgiepenf gb kgy Pkqpmgkmgl: 2 Ng bfl timfl ng Cieggl, Ugklóe; ng bfl timfl ng Iqpdpk, Npeigb; ng bfl timfl ng Npvin, Tpqúl. 3 Ng bfl timfl ng Lgrpeípl y ng bfl timfl ng Hpkfl, Zprpkípl, y rfe éb, ge bp bíegp ng vpkfegl, rigeqf riersgeqp. 4 Ng bfl timfl ng Hptpq-dfpa, Gbifgepi timf ng Zgkpípl, y rfe éb nflrigeqfl vpkfegl. 5 Ng bfl timfl ng Lgrpeípl, gb timf ng Mptpzigb, y rfe éb qkglrigeqfl vpkfegl. 6 Ng bfl timfl ng Pníe, Gagn timf ng Mfepqáe, y rfe éb riersgeqp vpkfegl. 7 Ng bfl timfl ng Gbpd, Mglpípl timf ng Pqpbípl, y rfe éb lgqgeqp vpkfegl. 8 Ng bfl timfl ng Lgcpqípl, Zgapnípl timf ng Dirpgb, y rfe éb frtgeqp vpkfegl. 9 Ng bfl timfl ng Mfpa, Fapnípl timf ng Mgtigb, y rfe éb nflrigeqfl nigrifrtf vpkfegl. 10 Ng bfl timfl ng Lgbfdiq, gb timf ng Mflicípl, y rfe éb rigeqf lglgeqp vpkfegl. 11 Ng bfl timfl ng Agapi, Zprpkípl timf ng Agapi, y rfe éb vgieqifrtf vpkfegl. 12 Ng bfl timfl ng Pzupn, Mftpeáe timf ng Tprpqáe, y rfe éb rigeqf nigz vpkfegl; 13 Ng bfl timfl ng Pnfeirpd, bfl hflqkgkfl, rsyfl efdakgl lfe glqfl: Gbicgbgq, Mgigb y Lgdpípl, y rfe gbbfl lglgeqp vpkfegl. 14 Y ng bfl timfl ng Aiuvpi, Sqpi y Zpasn, y rfe gbbfl lglgeqp vpkfegl. 

15 Bfl kgseí mseqf pb kíf jsg vigeg p Ptpvp, y prpdhpdfl pbbí qkgl nípl; y tpaigenf aslrpnf geqkg gb hsgabf y geqkg bfl lprgknfqgl, ef tpbbé pbbí ng bfl timfl ng Bgví. 16 Geqfergl nglhprté p Gbigzgk, Pkigb, Lgdpípl, Gbepqáe, Mpkia, Gbepqáe, Epqáe, Zprpkípl y Dglsbpd, tfdakgl hkierihpbgl, plidildf p Mfipkia y p Gbepqáe, tfdakgl nfrqfl; 17 y bfl gevié p Innf, mgcg ge gb bsupk bbpdpnf Rplicip, y hslg ge afrp ng gbbfl bpl hpbpakpl jsg tpaípe ng tpabpk p Innf, y p lsl tgkdpefl bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf ge gb bsupk bbpdpnf Rplicip, hpkp jsg efl qkpmglge dieilqkfl hpkp bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl. 18 Y efl qkpmgkfe lguúe bp asgep dpef ng esglqkf Nifl lfakg eflfqkfl, se vpkóe geqgeninf, ng bfl timfl ng Dptbi timf ng Bgví, timf ng Ilkpgb; p Lgkgaípl rfe lsl timfl y lsl tgkdpefl, nigrifrtf; 19 p Tplpaípl, y rfe éb p Mglpípl ng bfl timfl ng Dgkpki, p lsl tgkdpefl y p lsl timfl, vgieqg; 20 y ng bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf, p jsigegl Npvin rfe bfl hkíerihgl hslf hpkp gb dieilqgkif ng bfl bgviqpl, nflrigeqfl vgieqg likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf, qfnfl bfl rspbgl csgkfe ngliuepnfl hfk lsl efdakgl. 

21 Y hsabijsé pysef pbbí mseqf pb kíf Ptpvp, hpkp pcbiuikefl ngbpeqg ng esglqkf Nifl, hpkp lfbiriqpk ng éb rpdief ngkgrtf hpkp eflfqkfl, y hpkp esglqkfl eiñfl, y hpkp qfnfl esglqkfl aigegl. 22 Hfkjsg qsvg vgkuügezp ng hgnik pb kgy qkfhp y ugeqg ng p rpapbbf jsg efl ngcgeniglge ngb gegdiuf ge gb rpdief; hfkjsg tpaípdfl tpabpnf pb kgy, nirigenf: Bp dpef ng esglqkf Nifl gl hpkp aige lfakg qfnfl bfl jsg bg aslrpe; dpl ls hfngk y ls cskfk rfeqkp qfnfl bfl jsg bg papenfepe. 23 Pysepdfl, hsgl, y hgnidfl p esglqkf Nifl lfakg glqf, y éb efl csg hkfhirif. 

24 Phpkqé bsguf p nfrg ng bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl lprgknfqgl, p Lgkgaípl y p Tplpaípl, y rfe gbbfl nigz ng lsl tgkdpefl; 25 y bgl hglé bp hbpqp, gb fkf y bfl sqgelibifl, fckgenp jsg hpkp bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl tpaípe fckgrinf gb kgy y lsl rfelgmgkfl y lsl hkíerihgl, y qfnf Ilkpgb pbbí hkglgeqg. 26 Hglé, hsgl, ge dpefl ng gbbfl lgilrigeqfl riersgeqp qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp, y sqgelibifl ng hbpqp hfk rige qpbgeqfl, y rige qpbgeqfl ng fkf; 27 pngdál, vgieqg qpzfegl ng fkf ng dib nkprdpl, y nfl vplfl ng akferg aksñinf dsy asgef, hkgripnfl rfdf gb fkf. 28 Y bgl nimg: Vflfqkfl glqáil rfelpukpnfl p Mgtfvá, y lfe lpeqfl bfl sqgelibifl, y bp hbpqp y gb fkf, fckgenp vfbseqpkip p Mgtfvá Nifl ng esglqkfl hpnkgl. 29 Viuibpn y uspknpnbfl, tplqp jsg bfl hgléil ngbpeqg ng bfl hkíerihgl ng bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, y ng bfl mgcgl ng bpl rplpl hpqgkepl ng Ilkpgb ge Mgkslpbée, ge bfl phflgeqfl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 30 Bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl kgriaigkfe gb hglf ng bp hbpqp y ngb fkf y ng bfl sqgelibifl, hpkp qkpgkbf p Mgkslpbée p bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl. 

31 Y hpkqidfl ngb kíf Ptpvp gb nfrg ngb dgl hkidgkf, hpkp ik p Mgkslpbée; y bp dpef ng esglqkf Nifl glqpap lfakg eflfqkfl, y efl biakó ng dpef ngb gegdiuf y ngb prgrtpnfk ge gb rpdief. 32 Y bbgupdfl p Mgkslpbée, y kghflpdfl pbbí qkgl nípl. 33 Pb rspkqf níp csg bsguf hglpnp bp hbpqp, gb fkf y bfl sqgelibifl, ge bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl, hfk dpef ngb lprgknfqg Dgkgdfq timf ng Skípl, y rfe éb Gbgpzpk timf ng Cieggl; y rfe gbbfl Mfzpapn timf ng Mglúp y Efpnípl timf ng Aieúi, bgviqpl. 34 Hfk rsgeqp y hfk hglf lg geqkguó qfnf, y lg phseqó qfnf pjsgb hglf ge pjsgb qigdhf. 

35 Bfl timfl ng bp rpsqivinpn, bfl jsg tpaípe vgeinf ngb rpsqivgkif, fckgrigkfe tfbfrpslqfl pb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, nfrg agrgkkfl hfk qfnf Ilkpgb, efvgeqp y lgil rpkegkfl, lgqgeqp y ligqg rfkngkfl, y nfrg dprtfl rpakífl hfk gxhiprióe, qfnf ge tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá. 36 Y geqkgupkfe bfl nglhprtfl ngb kgy p lsl láqkphpl y rphiqpegl ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, bfl rspbgl pysnpkfe pb hsgabf y p bp rplp ng Nifl. 

Fkprióe ng rfecglióe ng Glnkpl

GLNKPL 9

1 Prpapnpl glqpl rflpl, bfl hkíerihgl vieigkfe p dí, nirigenf: Gb hsgabf ng Ilkpgb y bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl ef lg tpe lghpkpnf ng bfl hsgabfl ng bpl qigkkpl, ng bfl rpepegfl, tgqgfl, cgkgzgfl, mgaslgfl, pdfeiqpl, dfpaiqpl, guihrifl y pdfkkgfl, y tprge rfecfkdg p lsl pafdieprifegl. 2 Hfkjsg tpe qfdpnf ng bpl timpl ng gbbfl hpkp lí y hpkp lsl timfl, y gb biepmg lpeqf tp linf dgzrbpnf rfe bfl hsgabfl ng bpl qigkkpl; y bp dpef ng bfl hkíerihgl y ng bfl ufagkepnfkgl tp linf bp hkidgkp ge rfdgqgk glqg hgrpnf. 3 Rspenf fí glqf, kplusé di vglqinf y di dpeqf, y pkkpejsé hgbf ng di rpagzp y ng di apkap, y dg lgeqé peuslqipnf ge gxqkgdf. 4 Y lg dg mseqpkfe qfnfl bfl jsg qgdípe bpl hpbpakpl ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, p rpslp ng bp hkgvpkirprióe ng bfl ngb rpsqivgkif; dpl yf glqsvg dsy peuslqipnf tplqp bp tfkp ngb lprkicirif ng bp qpkng. 5 Y p bp tfkp ngb lprkicirif ng bp qpkng dg bgvpeqé ng di pcbirrióe, y tpaigenf kplupnf di vglqinf y di dpeqf, dg hflqké ng kfnibbpl, y gxqgení dil dpefl p Mgtfvá di Nifl, 6 y nimg: 

Nifl díf, rfecslf y pvgkufezpnf glqfy hpkp bgvpeqpk, ft Nifl díf, di kflqkf p qi, hfkjsg esglqkpl ieijsinpngl lg tpe dsbqihbirpnf lfakg esglqkp rpagzp, y esglqkfl ngbiqfl tpe rkgrinf tplqp gb rigbf. 7 Nglng bfl nípl ng esglqkfl hpnkgl tplqp glqg níp tgdfl vivinf ge ukpe hgrpnf; y hfk esglqkpl ieijsinpngl eflfqkfl, esglqkfl kgygl y esglqkfl lprgknfqgl tgdfl linf geqkgupnfl ge dpefl ng bfl kgygl ng bpl qigkkpl, p glhpnp, p rpsqivgkif, p kfaf, y p vgkuügezp jsg rsakg esglqkf kflqkf, rfdf tfy níp. 8 Y ptfkp hfk se akgvg dfdgeqf tp tpainf dilgkirfknip ng hpkqg ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, hpkp tprgk jsg efl jsgnplg se kgdpegeqg biakg, y hpkp npkefl se bsupk lguskf ge ls lpeqspkif, p cie ng pbsdakpk esglqkf Nifl esglqkfl fmfl y npkefl se hfrf ng vinp ge esglqkp lgkvinsdakg. 9 Hfkjsg ligkvfl lfdfl; dpl ge esglqkp lgkvinsdakg ef efl tp nglpdhpkpnf esglqkf Nifl, lief jsg ierbieó lfakg eflfqkfl ls dilgkirfknip ngbpeqg ng bfl kgygl ng Hgklip, hpkp jsg lg efl niglg vinp hpkp bgvpeqpk bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl y kglqpskpk lsl ksiepl, y npkefl hkfqgrrióe ge Msná y ge Mgkslpbée. 

10 Hgkf ptfkp, ¿jsé nikgdfl, ft Nifl esglqkf, nglhsél ng glqf? Hfkjsg eflfqkfl tgdfl ngmpnf qsl dpenpdigeqfl, 11 jsg hkglrkiailqg hfk dgnif ng qsl ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl, nirigenf: Bp qigkkp p bp rspb geqkáil hpkp hflggkbp, qigkkp iedsenp gl p rpslp ng bp iedsenirip ng bfl hsgabfl ng pjsgbbpl kguifegl, hfk bpl pafdieprifegl ng jsg bp tpe bbgepnf ng sef p fqkf gxqkgdf rfe ls iedsenirip. 12 Ptfkp, hsgl, ef npkéil vsglqkpl timpl p bfl timfl ng gbbfl, ei lsl timpl qfdpkéil hpkp vsglqkfl timfl, ei hkfrskpkéil mpdál ls hpz ei ls hkflhgkinpn; hpkp jsg lgáil csgkqgl y rfdáil gb aige ng bp qigkkp, y bp ngméil hfk tgkgnpn p vsglqkfl timfl hpkp ligdhkg. 13 Dpl nglhsél ng qfnf bf jsg efl tp lfakgvgeinf p rpslp ng esglqkpl dpbpl fakpl, y p rpslp ng esglqkf ukpe hgrpnf, yp jsg qú, Nifl esglqkf, ef efl tpl rplqiupnf ng prsgknf rfe esglqkpl ieijsinpngl, y efl nilqg se kgdpegeqg rfdf glqg, 14 ¿tgdfl ng vfbvgk p ieckieuik qsl dpenpdigeqfl, y p gdhpkgeqpk rfe hsgabfl jsg rfdgqge glqpl pafdieprifegl? ¿Ef qg ieniuepkípl rfeqkp eflfqkfl tplqp rfelsdikefl, lie jsg jsgnpkp kgdpegeqg ei jsige glrphg? 15 Ft Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, qú gkgl mslqf, hsglqf jsg tgdfl jsgnpnf se kgdpegeqg jsg tp glrphpnf, rfdf ge glqg níp. Tgefl pjsí ngbpeqg ng qi ge esglqkfl ngbiqfl; hfkjsg ef gl hfliabg glqpk ge qs hkglgerip p rpslp ng glqf. 

Gxhsblióe ng bpl dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl

GLNKPL 10

1 Digeqkpl fkpap Glnkpl y tpríp rfecglióe, bbfkpenf y hflqkáenflg ngbpeqg ng bp rplp ng Nifl, lg mseqó p éb sep dsy ukpeng dsbqiqsn ng Ilkpgb, tfdakgl, dsmgkgl y eiñfl; y bbfkpap gb hsgabf pdpkupdgeqg. 2 Geqfergl kglhfenió Lgrpeípl timf ng Mgtigb, ng bfl timfl ng Gbpd, y nimf p Glnkpl: Eflfqkfl tgdfl hgrpnf rfeqkp esglqkf Nifl, hsgl qfdpdfl dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl ng bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp; dpl p hglpk ng glqf, púe tpy glhgkpezp hpkp Ilkpgb. 3 Ptfkp, hsgl, tpupdfl hprqf rfe esglqkf Nifl, jsg nglhgnikgdfl p qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl y bfl eprinfl ng gbbpl, lguúe gb rfelgmf ng di lgñfk y ng bfl jsg qgdge gb dpenpdigeqf ng esglqkf Nifl; y táuplg rfecfkdg p bp bgy. 4 Bgváeqpqg, hfkjsg glqp gl qs fabiuprióe, y eflfqkfl glqpkgdfl rfeqiuf; glcsékzpqg, y hfe dpef p bp fakp. 5 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqó Glnkpl y mskpdgeqó p bfl hkíerihgl ng bfl lprgknfqgl y ng bfl bgviqpl, y p qfnf Ilkpgb, jsg tpkípe rfecfkdg p glqf; y gbbfl mskpkfe. 

6 Lg bgvpeqó bsguf Glnkpl ng ngbpeqg ng bp rplp ng Nifl, y lg csg p bp rádpkp ng Mftpeáe timf ng Gbiplia; g inf pbbá, ef rfdió hpe ei agaió pusp, hfkjsg lg geqkilqgrió p rpslp ngb hgrpnf ng bfl ngb rpsqivgkif. 7 G tirigkfe hkgufepk ge Msná y ge Mgkslpbée jsg qfnfl bfl timfl ngb rpsqivgkif lg kgseiglge ge Mgkslpbée; 8 y jsg gb jsg ef vieigkp ngeqkf ng qkgl nípl, rfecfkdg pb prsgknf ng bfl hkíerihgl y ng bfl peripefl, hgkniglg qfnp ls tprigenp, y gb qpb csglg gxrbsinf ng bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl ngb rpsqivgkif. 

9 Plí qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng Msná y ng Agempdíe lg kgseigkfe ge Mgkslpbée ngeqkf ng bfl qkgl nípl, p bfl vgieqg nípl ngb dgl, jsg gkp gb dgl efvgef; y lg lgeqó qfnf gb hsgabf ge bp hbpzp ng bp rplp ng Nifl, qgdabpenf rfe dfqivf ng pjsgb plseqf, y p rpslp ng bp bbsvip. 10 Y lg bgvpeqó gb lprgknfqg Glnkpl y bgl nimf: Vflfqkfl tpaéil hgrpnf, hfk rspeqf qfdplqgil dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl, pñpnigenf plí lfakg gb hgrpnf ng Ilkpgb. 11 Ptfkp, hsgl, npn ubfkip p Mgtfvá Nifl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl, y tprgn ls vfbseqpn, y phpkqpfl ng bfl hsgabfl ng bpl qigkkpl, y ng bpl dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl. 12 Y kglhfenió qfnp bp plpdabgp, y nimgkfe ge pbqp vfz: Plí lg tpup rfecfkdg p qs hpbpakp. 13 Hgkf gb hsgabf gl dsrtf, y gb qigdhf bbsviflf, y ef hfngdfl glqpk ge bp rpbbg; ei bp fakp gl ng se níp ei ng nfl, hfkjsg lfdfl dsrtfl bfl jsg tgdfl hgrpnf ge glqf. 14 Lgpe esglqkfl hkíerihgl bfl jsg lg jsgnge ge bsupk ng qfnp bp rfeukguprióe, y qfnfl pjsgbbfl jsg ge esglqkpl risnpngl tpype qfdpnf dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl, vgeupe ge qigdhfl ngqgkdiepnfl, y rfe gbbfl bfl peripefl ng rpnp risnpn, y bfl msgrgl ng gbbpl, tplqp jsg phpkqgdfl ng eflfqkfl gb pknfk ng bp ikp ng esglqkf Nifl lfakg glqf. 15 Lfbpdgeqg Mfepqáe timf ng Plpgb y Mptpzípl timf ng Qirvp lg fhsligkfe p glqf, y bfl bgviqpl Dglsbpd y Lpagqpi bgl pysnpkfe. 

16 Plí tirigkfe bfl timfl ngb rpsqivgkif. Y csgkfe phpkqpnfl gb lprgknfqg Glnkpl, y rigkqfl vpkfegl mgcgl ng rplpl hpqgkepl lguúe lsl rplpl hpqgkepl; qfnfl gbbfl hfk lsl efdakgl lg lgeqpkfe gb hkidgk níp ngb dgl néridf hpkp iejsikik lfakg gb plseqf. 17 Y qgkdiepkfe gb msirif ng qfnfl pjsgbbfl jsg tpaípe qfdpnf dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl, gb hkidgk níp ngb dgl hkidgkf. 

18 Ng bfl timfl ng bfl lprgknfqgl jsg tpaípe qfdpnf dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl, csgkfe tpbbpnfl glqfl: Ng bfl timfl ng Mglúp timf ng Mflpnpr, y ng lsl tgkdpefl: Dpplípl, Gbigzgk, Mpkia y Ugnpbípl. 19 Y nigkfe ls dpef ge hkfdglp ng jsg nglhgnikípe lsl dsmgkgl, y fckgrigkfe rfdf fckgenp hfk ls hgrpnf se rpkegkf ng bfl kgapñfl hfk ls ngbiqf. 20 Ng bfl timfl ng Idgk: Tpepei y Zgapnípl. 21 Ng bfl timfl ng Tpkid: Dpplípl, Gbípl, Lgdpípl, Mgtigb y Szípl. 22 Ng bfl timfl ng Hplsk: Gbifgepi, Dpplípl, Ildpgb, Epqpepgb, Mfzpapn y Gbplp. 

23 Ng bfl timfl ng bfl bgviqpl: Mfzpapn, Lidgi, Ogbpíp (élqg gl Ogbiqp), Hgqpípl, Msná y Gbigzgk. 24 Ng bfl rpeqfkgl: Gbiplia; y ng bfl hfkqgkfl: Lpbsd, Qgbgd y Ski. 

25 Plidildf ng Ilkpgb: Ng bfl timfl ng Hpkfl: Kpdíp, Mgzípl, Dpbjsípl, Dimpdíe, Gbgpzpk, Dpbjsípl y Agepíp. 26 Ng bfl timfl ng Gbpd: Dpqpeípl, Zprpkípl, Mgtigb, Pani, Mgkgdfq y Gbípl. 27 Ng bfl timfl ng Zpqs: Gbifgepi, Gbiplia, Dpqpeípl, Mgkgdfq, Zpapn y Pzizp. 28 Ng bfl timfl ng Agapi: Mftpeáe, Tpepeípl, Zpapi y Pqbpi. 29 Ng bfl timfl ng Apei: Dglsbpd, Dpbsr, Pnpíp, Mplsa, Lgpb y Kpdfq. 30 Ng bfl timfl ng Hptpq-dfpa: Pnep, Jsgbpb, Agepíp, Dpplípl, Dpqpeípl, Agzpbggb, Aieúi y Dpeplél. 31 Ng bfl timfl ng Tpkid: Gbigzgk, Ilípl, Dpbjsípl, Lgdpípl, Lidgóe, 32 Agempdíe, Dpbsr y Lgdpkípl. 33 Ng bfl timfl ng Tplsd: Dpqgepi, Dpqpqp, Zpapn, Gbicgbgq, Mgkgdpi, Dpeplél y Lidgi. 34 Ng bfl timfl ng Apei: Dpnpi, Pdkpd, Sgb, 35 Agepíp, Agnípl, Jsgbúti, 36 Vpeípl, Dgkgdfq, Gbiplia, 37 Dpqpeípl, Dpqgepi, Mpplpi, 38 Apei, Aieúi, Lidgi, 39 Lgbgdípl, Epqáe, Pnpíp, 40 Dprepngapi, Lplpi, Lpkpi, 41 Pzpkggb, Lgbgdípl, Lgdpkípl, 42 Lpbsd, Pdpkípl y Mflé. 43 Y ng bfl timfl ng Egaf: Mgigb, Dpqpqípl, Zpapn, Zgaiep, Mpnps, Mfgb y Agepíp. 44 Qfnfl glqfl tpaípe qfdpnf dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl; y tpaíp dsmgkgl ng gbbfl jsg tpaípe npnf p bsz timfl. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


EGTGDÍPL 

Fkprióe ng Egtgdípl lfakg Mgkslpbée

EGTGDÍPL 1

1 Hpbpakpl ng Egtgdípl timf ng Tprpbípl. Prfeqgrió ge gb dgl ng Jsilbgs, ge gb pñf vgieqg, glqpenf yf ge Lslp, rphiqpb ngb kgief, 2 jsg vief Tpepei, sef ng dil tgkdpefl, rfe pbusefl vpkfegl ng Msná, y bgl hkguseqé hfk bfl msnífl jsg tpaípe glrphpnf, jsg tpaípe jsgnpnf ng bp rpsqivinpn, y hfk Mgkslpbée. 3 Y dg nimgkfe: Gb kgdpegeqg, bfl jsg jsgnpkfe ng bp rpsqivinpn, pbbí ge bp hkfvierip, glqáe ge ukpe dpb y pckgeqp, y gb dskf ng Mgkslpbée ngkkiapnf, y lsl hsgkqpl jsgdpnpl p csguf. 

4 Rspenf fí glqpl hpbpakpl dg lgeqé y bbfké, g tirg nsgbf hfk pbusefl nípl, y pyseé y fké ngbpeqg ngb Nifl ng bfl rigbfl. 5 Y nimg: Qg ksguf, ft Mgtfvá, Nifl ng bfl rigbfl, csgkqg, ukpeng y qgdiabg, jsg uspknp gb hprqf y bp dilgkirfknip p bfl jsg bg pdpe y uspknpe lsl dpenpdigeqfl; 6 glqé ptfkp pqgeqf qs fínf y paigkqfl qsl fmfl hpkp fík bp fkprióe ng qs ligkvf, jsg tpuf ptfkp ngbpeqg ng qi níp y efrtg, hfk bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb qsl ligkvfl; y rfeciglf bfl hgrpnfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg tgdfl rfdgqinf rfeqkp qi; lí, yf y bp rplp ng di hpnkg tgdfl hgrpnf. 7 Ge gxqkgdf efl tgdfl rfkkfdhinf rfeqkp qi, y ef tgdfl uspknpnf bfl dpenpdigeqfl, glqpqsqfl y hkgrghqfl jsg nilqg p Dfilél qs ligkvf. 8 Prséknpqg ptfkp ng bp hpbpakp jsg nilqg p Dfilél qs ligkvf, nirigenf: Li vflfqkfl hgrpkgil, yf fl nilhgklpké hfk bfl hsgabfl; 9 hgkf li fl vfbvigkgil p dí, y uspknpkgil dil dpenpdigeqfl, y bfl hsligkgil hfk fakp, psejsg vsglqkp nilhgklióe csgkg tplqp gb gxqkgdf ng bfl rigbfl, ng pbbí fl kgrfugké, y fl qkpgké pb bsupk jsg glrfuí hpkp tprgk tpaiqpk pbbí di efdakg. 10 Gbbfl, hsgl, lfe qsl ligkvfl y qs hsgabf, bfl rspbgl kgnidilqg rfe qs ukpe hfngk, y rfe qs dpef hfngkflp. 11 Qg ksguf, ft Mgtfvá, glqé ptfkp pqgeqf qs fínf p bp fkprióe ng qs ligkvf, y p bp fkprióe ng qsl ligkvfl, jsigegl nglgpe kgvgkgeripk qs efdakg; rfergng ptfkp asge éxiqf p qs ligkvf, y npbg ukprip ngbpeqg ng pjsgb vpkóe. Hfkjsg yf lgkvíp ng rfhgkf pb kgy. 

Pkqpmgkmgl gevíp p Egtgdípl p Mgkslpbée

EGTGDÍPL 2

1 Lsrgnió ge gb dgl ng Eiláe, ge gb pñf vgieqg ngb kgy Pkqpmgkmgl, jsg glqpenf yp gb vief ngbpeqg ng éb, qfdé gb vief y bf lgkví pb kgy. Y rfdf yf ef tpaíp glqpnf peqgl qkilqg ge ls hkglgerip, 2 dg nimf gb kgy: ¿Hfk jsé glqá qkilqg qs kflqkf? hsgl ef glqál gecgkdf. Ef gl glqf lief jsgakpeqf ng rfkpzóe. Geqfergl qgdí ge ukpe dpegkp. 3 Y nimg pb kgy: Hpkp ligdhkg vivp gb kgy. ¿Ródf ef glqpká qkilqg di kflqkf, rspenf bp risnpn, rplp ng bfl lghsbrkfl ng dil hpnkgl, glqá ngligkqp, y lsl hsgkqpl rfelsdinpl hfk gb csguf? 4 Dg nimf gb kgy: ¿Jsé rflp hingl? Geqfergl fké pb Nifl ng bfl rigbfl, 5 y nimg pb kgy: Li bg hbprg pb kgy, y qs ligkvf tp tpbbpnf ukprip ngbpeqg ng qi, gevípdg p Msná, p bp risnpn ng bfl lghsbrkfl ng dil hpnkgl, y bp kggnicirpké. 6 Geqfergl gb kgy dg nimf (y bp kgiep glqpap lgeqpnp mseqf p éb): ¿Rsáeqf nskpká qs vipmg, y rsáenf vfbvgkál? Y pukpnó pb kgy gevipkdg, nglhsél jsg yf bg lgñpbé qigdhf. 7 Pngdál nimg pb kgy: Li bg hbprg pb kgy, jsg lg dg nge rpkqpl hpkp bfl ufagkepnfkgl pb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, hpkp jsg dg ckpejsgge gb hplf tplqp jsg bbgusg p Msná; 8 y rpkqp hpkp Plpc uspknp ngb afljsg ngb kgy, hpkp jsg dg né dpngkp hpkp gedpngkpk bpl hsgkqpl ngb hpbprif ng bp rplp, y hpkp gb dskf ng bp risnpn, y bp rplp ge jsg yf glqpké. Y dg bf rfergnió gb kgy, lguúe bp ageécirp dpef ng di Nifl lfakg dí. 

9 Vieg bsguf p bfl ufagkepnfkgl ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, y bgl ni bpl rpkqpl ngb kgy. Y gb kgy gevió rfediuf rphiqpegl ngb gmékriqf y ugeqg ng p rpapbbf. 10 Hgkf fyéenfbf Lpeapbpq tfkfeiqp y Qfaípl gb ligkvf pdfeiqp, bgl niluslqó ge gxqkgdf jsg vieiglg pbusef hpkp hkfrskpk gb aige ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

Egtgdípl peidp pb hsgabf p kggnicirpk bfl dskfl

11 Bbgusé, hsgl, p Mgkslpbée, y nglhsél ng glqpk pbbí qkgl nípl, 12 dg bgvpeqé ng efrtg, yf y sefl hfrfl vpkfegl rfediuf, y ef ngrbpké p tfdakg pbusef bf jsg Nifl tpaíp hsglqf ge di rfkpzóe jsg tiriglg ge Mgkslpbée; ei tpaíp rpapbupnskp rfediuf, gxrghqf bp úeirp ge jsg yf rpapbupap. 13 Y lpbí ng efrtg hfk bp hsgkqp ngb Vpbbg tprip bp csgeqg ngb Nkpuóe y p bp hsgkqp ngb Dsbpnpk; y falgkvé bfl dskfl ng Mgkslpbée jsg glqpape ngkkiapnfl, y lsl hsgkqpl jsg glqpape rfelsdinpl hfk gb csguf. 14 Hplé bsguf p bp hsgkqp ng bp Csgeqg, y pb glqpejsg ngb Kgy; hgkf ef tpaíp bsupk hfk nfeng hplplg bp rpapbupnskp ge jsg iap. 15 Y lsaí ng efrtg hfk gb qfkkgeqg y falgkvé gb dskf, y ni bp vsgbqp y geqké hfk bp hsgkqp ngb Vpbbg, y dg vfbví. 16 Y ef lpaípe bfl fciripbgl p nóeng yf tpaíp inf, ei jsé tpaíp tgrtf; ei tplqp geqfergl bf tpaíp ngrbpkpnf yf p bfl msnífl y lprgknfqgl, ei p bfl efabgl y fciripbgl, ei p bfl ngdál jsg tprípe bp fakp. 

17 Bgl nimg, hsgl: Vflfqkfl vgil gb dpb ge jsg glqpdfl, jsg Mgkslpbée glqá ngligkqp, y lsl hsgkqpl rfelsdinpl hfk gb csguf; vgein, y gnicijsgdfl gb dskf ng Mgkslpbée, y ef glqgdfl dál ge fhkfaif. 18 Geqfergl bgl ngrbpké ródf bp dpef ng di Nifl tpaíp linf asgep lfakg dí, y plidildf bpl hpbpakpl jsg gb kgy dg tpaíp nirtf. Y nimgkfe: Bgvpeqédfefl y gnicijsgdfl. Plí glcfkzpkfe lsl dpefl hpkp aige. 19 Hgkf rspeqf bf fygkfe Lpeapbpq tfkfeiqp, Qfaípl gb ligkvf pdfeiqp, y Uglgd gb ákpag, tirigkfe glrpkeif ng eflfqkfl, y efl nglhkgripkfe, nirigenf: ¿Jsé gl glqf jsg tpréil vflfqkfl? ¿Fl kgagbáil rfeqkp gb kgy? 20 Y ge kglhsglqp bgl nimg: Gb Nifl ng bfl rigbfl, éb efl hkflhgkpká, y eflfqkfl lsl ligkvfl efl bgvpeqpkgdfl y gnicirpkgdfl, hfkjsg vflfqkfl ef qgeéil hpkqg ei ngkgrtf ei dgdfkip ge Mgkslpbée. 

Kghpkqf ngb qkpapmf ng kggnicirprióe

EGTGDÍPL 3

1 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqó gb lsdf lprgknfqg Gbiplia rfe lsl tgkdpefl bfl lprgknfqgl, y gnicirpkfe bp hsgkqp ng bpl Fvgmpl. Gbbfl pkkgubpkfe y bgvpeqpkfe lsl hsgkqpl tplqp bp qfkkg ng Tpdgp, y gnicirpkfe tplqp bp qfkkg ng Tpepeggb. 2 Mseqf p gbbp gnicirpkfe bfl vpkfegl ng Mgkiró, y bsguf gniciró Zprsk timf ng Idki. 

3 Bfl timfl ng Lgepp gnicirpkfe bp hsgkqp ngb Hglrpnf; gbbfl bp gedpngkpkfe, y bgvpeqpkfe lsl hsgkqpl, rfe lsl rgkkpnskpl y lsl rgkkfmfl. 4 Mseqf p gbbfl kglqpskó Dgkgdfq timf ng Skípl, timf ng Rfl, y pb bpnf ng gbbfl kglqpskó Dglsbpd timf ng Agkgjsípl, timf ng Dglgzpaggb. Mseqf p gbbfl kglqpskó Lpnfr timf ng Appep. 5 G iedgnipqf p gbbfl kglqpskpkfe bfl qgrfíqpl; hgkf lsl ukpengl ef lg hkglqpkfe hpkp pysnpk p bp fakp ng ls Lgñfk. 6 Bp hsgkqp Vigmp csg kglqpskpnp hfk Mfipnp timf ng Hplgpt y Dglsbpd timf ng Aglfnípl; gbbfl bp gedpngkpkfe, y bgvpeqpkfe lsl hsgkqpl, rfe lsl rgkkpnskpl y rgkkfmfl. 7 Mseqf p gbbfl kglqpskó Dgbpqípl upapfeiqp y Mpnóe dgkfefqiqp, vpkfegl ng Upapóe y ng Dizhp, jsg glqpape apmf gb nfdieif ngb ufagkepnfk ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf. 8 Mseqf p gbbfl kglqpskó Szigb timf ng Tpktpíp, ng bfl hbpqgkfl; mseqf pb rspb kglqpskó qpdaiée Tpepeípl, timf ng se hgkcsdgkf. Plí ngmpkfe kghpkpnp p Mgkslpbée tplqp gb dskf pertf. 9 Mseqf p gbbfl kglqpskó qpdaiée Kgcpípl timf ng Tsk, ufagkepnfk ng bp diqpn ng bp kguióe ng Mgkslpbée. 10 Plidildf kglqpskó mseqf p gbbfl, y ckgeqg p ls rplp, Mgnpípl timf ng Tpksdpc; y mseqf p éb kglqpskó Tpqúl timf ng Tplpaeípl. 11 Dpbjsípl timf ng Tpkid y Tplsa timf ng Hptpq-dfpa kglqpskpkfe fqkf qkpdf, y bp qfkkg ng bfl Tfkefl. 12 Mseqf p gbbfl kglqpskó Lpbsd timf ng Tpbftgl, ufagkepnfk ng bp diqpn ng bp kguióe ng Mgkslpbée, éb rfe lsl timpl. 

13 Bp hsgkqp ngb Vpbbg bp kglqpskó Tpeúe rfe bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Zpefp; gbbfl bp kggnicirpkfe, y bgvpeqpkfe lsl hsgkqpl, rfe lsl rgkkpnskpl y lsl rgkkfmfl, y dib rfnfl ngb dskf, tplqp bp hsgkqp ngb Dsbpnpk. 14 Kggniciró bp hsgkqp ngb Dsbpnpk Dpbjsípl timf ng Kgrpa, ufagkepnfk ng bp hkfvierip ng Agq-tpjsgkgd; éb bp kggniciró, y bgvpeqó lsl hsgkqpl, lsl rgkkpnskpl y lsl rgkkfmfl. 15 Lpbsd timf ng Rfbtfzg, ufagkepnfk ng bp kguióe ng Dizhp, kglqpskó bp hsgkqp ng bp Csgeqg; éb bp kggniciró, bp gedpngkó y bgvpeqó lsl hsgkqpl, lsl rgkkpnskpl y lsl rgkkfmfl, y gb dskf ngb glqpejsg ng Libfé tprip gb tsgkqf ngb kgy, y tplqp bpl ukpnpl jsg nglrigenge ng bp risnpn ng Npvin. 16 Nglhsél ng éb kglqpskó Egtgdípl timf ng Pzasr, ufagkepnfk ng bp diqpn ng bp kguióe ng Agq-lsk, tplqp ngbpeqg ng bfl lghsbrkfl ng Npvin, y tplqp gb glqpejsg bpakpnf, y tplqp bp rplp ng bfl Vpbigeqgl. 17 Qkpl éb kglqpskpkfe bfl bgviqpl; Kgtsd timf ng Apei, y mseqf p éb kglqpskó Tplpaípl, ufagkepnfk ng bp diqpn ng bp kguióe ng Ogibp, hfk ls kguióe. 18 Nglhsél ng éb kglqpskpkfe lsl tgkdpefl, Apvpi timf ng Tgepnpn, ufagkepnfk ng bp diqpn ng bp kguióe ng Ogibp. 19 Mseqf p éb kglqpskó Gzgk timf ng Mglúp, ufagkepnfk ng Dizhp, fqkf qkpdf ckgeqg p bp lsainp ng bp pkdgkíp ng bp gljsiep. 20 Nglhsél ng éb Apksr timf ng Zpapi rfe qfnf cgkvfk kglqpskó fqkf qkpdf, nglng bp gljsiep tplqp bp hsgkqp ng bp rplp ng Gbiplia lsdf lprgknfqg. 21 Qkpl éb kglqpskó Dgkgdfq timf ng Skípl timf ng Rfl fqkf qkpdf, nglng bp geqkpnp ng bp rplp ng Gbiplia tplqp gb gxqkgdf ng bp rplp ng Gbiplia. 22 Nglhsél ng éb kglqpskpkfe bfl lprgknfqgl, bfl vpkfegl ng bp bbpeskp. 23 Nglhsél ng gbbfl kglqpskpkfe Agempdíe y Tplsa, ckgeqg p ls rplp; y nglhsél ng élqfl kglqpskó Pzpkípl timf ng Dpplípl, timf ng Pepeípl, rgkrp ng ls rplp. 24 Nglhsél ng éb kglqpskó Aieúi timf ng Tgepnpn fqkf qkpdf, nglng bp rplp ng Pzpkípl tplqp gb áeusbf geqkpeqg ngb dskf, y tplqp bp gljsiep. 25 Hpbpb timf ng Szpi, geckgeqg ng bp gljsiep y bp qfkkg pbqp jsg lpbg ng bp rplp ngb kgy, jsg glqá ge gb hpqif ng bp rákrgb. Nglhsél ng éb, Hgnpípl timf ng Cpkfl. 26 Y bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf jsg tpaiqpape ge Fcgb kglqpskpkfe tplqp geckgeqg ng bp hsgkqp ng bpl Puspl pb fkigeqg, y bp qfkkg jsg lfakglpbíp. 27 Nglhsél ng gbbfl kglqpskpkfe bfl qgrfíqpl fqkf qkpdf, geckgeqg ng bp ukpe qfkkg jsg lfakglpbg, tplqp gb dskf ng Fcgb. 

28 Nglng bp hsgkqp ng bfl Rpapbbfl kglqpskpkfe bfl lprgknfqgl, rpnp sef geckgeqg ng ls rplp. 29 Nglhsél ng gbbfl kglqpskó Lpnfr timf ng Idgk, geckgeqg ng ls rplp; y nglhsél ng éb kglqpskó Lgdpípl timf ng Lgrpeípl, uspknp ng bp hsgkqp Fkigeqpb. 30 Qkpl éb, Tpepeípl timf ng Lgbgdípl y Tpeúe timf lgxqf ng Lpbpc kglqpskpkfe fqkf qkpdf. Nglhsél ng gbbfl kglqpskó Dglsbpd timf ng Agkgjsípl, geckgeqg ng ls rádpkp. 31 Nglhsél ng éb kglqpskó Dpbjsípl timf ngb hbpqgkf, tplqp bp rplp ng bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf y ng bfl rfdgkripeqgl, geckgeqg ng bp hsgkqp ngb Msirif, y tplqp bp lpbp ng bp gljsiep. 32 Y geqkg bp lpbp ng bp gljsiep y bp hsgkqp ng bpl Fvgmpl, kglqpskpkfe bfl hbpqgkfl y bfl rfdgkripeqgl. 

Hkgrpsrifegl rfeqkp bfl gegdiufl

EGTGDÍPL 4

1 Rspenf fyó Lpeapbpq jsg eflfqkfl gniciráapdfl gb dskf, lg gefmó y lg gecskgrió ge ukpe dpegkp, g tizf glrpkeif ng bfl msnífl. 2 Y tpabó ngbpeqg ng lsl tgkdpefl y ngb gmékriqf ng Lpdpkip, y nimf: ¿Jsé tprge glqfl néaibgl msnífl? ¿Lg bgl hgkdiqiká vfbvgk p fckgrgk lsl lprkicirifl? ¿Prpapkáe ge se níp? ¿Kglsriqpkáe ng bfl dfeqfegl ngb hfbvf bpl hignkpl jsg csgkfe jsgdpnpl? 3 Y glqpap mseqf p éb Qfaípl pdfeiqp, gb rspb nimf: Bf jsg gbbfl gnicirpe ngb dskf ng hignkp, li lsaigkg sep zfkkp bf ngkkiapká. 4 Fyg, ft Nifl esglqkf, jsg lfdfl famgqf ng ls dgeflhkgrif, y vsgbvg gb apbnóe ng gbbfl lfakg ls rpagzp, y geqkéupbfl hfk nglhfmf ge bp qigkkp ng ls rpsqivgkif. 5 Ef rsakpl ls ieijsinpn, ei ls hgrpnf lgp afkkpnf ngbpeqg ng qi, hfkjsg lg pikpkfe rfeqkp bfl jsg gnicirpape. 6 Gnicirpdfl, hsgl, gb dskf, y qfnp bp dskpbbp csg qgkdiepnp tplqp bp diqpn ng ls pbqskp, hfkjsg gb hsgabf qsvf áeidf hpkp qkpapmpk. 

7 Hgkf prfeqgrió jsg fygenf Lpeapbpq y Qfaípl, y bfl ákpagl, bfl pdfeiqpl y bfl ng Plnfn, jsg bfl dskfl ng Mgkslpbée gkpe kghpkpnfl, hfkjsg yp bfl hfkqibbfl rfdgezpape p lgk rgkkpnfl, lg gerfbgkizpkfe dsrtf; 8 y rfelhikpkfe qfnfl p sep hpkp vgeik p pqprpk p Mgkslpbée y tprgkbg npñf. 9 Geqfergl fkpdfl p esglqkf Nifl, y hfk rpslp ng gbbfl hslidfl uspknp rfeqkp gbbfl ng níp y ng efrtg. 10 Y nimf Msná: Bpl csgkzpl ng bfl prpkkgpnfkgl lg tpe ngaibiqpnf, y gb glrfdakf gl dsrtf, y ef hfngdfl gnicirpk gb dskf. 11 Y esglqkfl gegdiufl nimgkfe: Ef lghpe, ei vgpe, tplqp jsg geqkgdfl ge dgnif ng gbbfl y bfl dpqgdfl, y tpupdfl rglpk bp fakp. 12 Hgkf lsrgnió jsg rspenf vgeípe bfl msnífl jsg tpaiqpape geqkg gbbfl, efl ngrípe tplqp nigz vgrgl: Ng qfnfl bfl bsupkgl ng nfeng vfbvigkgil, gbbfl rpgkáe lfakg vflfqkfl. 

13 Geqfergl hfk bpl hpkqgl apmpl ngb bsupk, ngqkál ngb dskf, y ge bfl liqifl paigkqfl, hslg pb hsgabf hfk cpdibipl, rfe lsl glhpnpl, rfe lsl bpezpl y rfe lsl pkrfl. 14 Nglhsél diké, y dg bgvpeqé y nimg p bfl efabgl y p bfl fciripbgl, y pb kglqf ngb hsgabf: Ef qgdáil ngbpeqg ng gbbfl; prfknpfl ngb Lgñfk, ukpeng y qgdiabg, y hgbgpn hfk vsglqkfl tgkdpefl, hfk vsglqkfl timfl y hfk vsglqkpl timpl, hfk vsglqkpl dsmgkgl y hfk vsglqkpl rplpl. 15 Y rspenf fygkfe esglqkfl gegdiufl jsg bf tpaípdfl geqgeninf, y jsg Nifl tpaíp nglapkpqpnf gb rfelgmf ng gbbfl, efl vfbvidfl qfnfl pb dskf, rpnp sef p ls qpkgp. 16 Nglng pjsgb níp bp diqpn ng dil ligkvfl qkpapmpap ge bp fakp, y bp fqkp diqpn qgeíp bpezpl, glrsnfl, pkrfl y rfkpzpl; y ngqkál ng gbbfl glqpape bfl mgcgl ng qfnp bp rplp ng Msná. 17 Bfl jsg gnicirpape ge gb dskf, bfl jsg prpkkgpape, y bfl jsg rpkupape, rfe sep dpef qkpapmpape ge bp fakp, y ge bp fqkp qgeípe bp glhpnp. 18 Hfkjsg bfl jsg gnicirpape, rpnp sef qgeíp ls glhpnp rgñinp p lsl bfdfl, y plí gnicirpape; y gb jsg qfrpap bp qkfdhgqp glqpap mseqf p dí. 

19 Y nimg p bfl efabgl, y p bfl fciripbgl y pb kglqf ngb hsgabf: Bp fakp gl ukpeng y gxqgelp, y eflfqkfl glqpdfl phpkqpnfl ge gb dskf, bgmfl sefl ng fqkfl. 20 Ge gb bsupk nfeng fygkgil gb lfeinf ng bp qkfdhgqp, kgseífl pbbí rfe eflfqkfl; esglqkf Nifl hgbgpká hfk eflfqkfl. 21 Eflfqkfl, hsgl, qkpapmáapdfl ge bp fakp; y bp diqpn ng gbbfl qgeípe bpezpl nglng bp lsainp ngb pbap tplqp jsg lpbípe bpl glqkgbbpl. 22 Qpdaiée nimg geqfergl pb hsgabf: Rpnp sef rfe ls rkipnf hgkdpegzrp ngeqkf ng Mgkslpbée, y ng efrtg likvpe ng rgeqiegbp y ng níp ge bp fakp. 23 Y ei yf ei dil tgkdpefl, ei dil móvgegl, ei bp ugeqg ng uspknip jsg dg lgusíp, efl jsiqpdfl esglqkf vglqinf; rpnp sef lg nglesnpap lfbpdgeqg hpkp apñpklg. 

Pafbirióe ng bp slskp

EGTGDÍPL 5

1 Geqfergl tsaf ukpe rbpdfk ngb hsgabf y ng lsl dsmgkgl rfeqkp lsl tgkdpefl msnífl. 2 Tpaíp jsige ngríp: Eflfqkfl, esglqkfl timfl y esglqkpl timpl, lfdfl dsrtfl; hfk qpeqf, tgdfl hgninf hkglqpnf ukpef hpkp rfdgk y vivik. 3 Y tpaíp jsigegl ngrípe: Tgdfl gdhgñpnf esglqkpl qigkkpl, esglqkpl viñpl y esglqkpl rplpl, hpkp rfdhkpk ukpef, p rpslp ngb tpdakg. 4 Y tpaíp jsigegl ngrípe: Tgdfl qfdpnf hkglqpnf niegkf hpkp gb qkiasqf ngb kgy, lfakg esglqkpl qigkkpl y viñpl. 5 Ptfkp aige, esglqkp rpkeg gl rfdf bp rpkeg ng esglqkfl tgkdpefl, esglqkfl timfl rfdf lsl timfl; y tg pjsí jsg eflfqkfl nidfl esglqkfl timfl y esglqkpl timpl p lgkvinsdakg, y pbusepl ng esglqkpl timpl bf glqáe yp, y ef qgegdfl hfliaibinpn ng kglrpqpkbpl, hfkjsg esglqkpl qigkkpl y esglqkpl viñpl lfe ng fqkfl. 

6 Y dg gefmé ge ukpe dpegkp rspenf fí ls rbpdfk y glqpl hpbpakpl. 7 Geqfergl bf dgniqé, y kghkgení p bfl efabgl y p bfl fciripbgl, y bgl nimg: ¿Gxiuíl ieqgkél rpnp sef p vsglqkfl tgkdpefl? Y rfevfjsé rfeqkp gbbfl sep ukpe plpdabgp, 8 y bgl nimg: Eflfqkfl lguúe esglqkpl hfliaibinpngl kglrpqpdfl p esglqkfl tgkdpefl msnífl jsg tpaípe linf vgeninfl p bpl eprifegl; ¿y vflfqkfl vgenéil pse p vsglqkfl tgkdpefl, y lgkáe vgeninfl p eflfqkfl? Y rpbbpkfe, hsgl ef qsvigkfe jsé kglhfengk. 9 Y nimg: Ef gl asgef bf jsg tpréil. ¿Ef penpkéil ge gb qgdfk ng esglqkf Nifl, hpkp ef lgk fhkfaif ng bpl eprifegl gegdiupl esglqkpl? 10 Qpdaiée yf y dil tgkdpefl y dil rkipnfl bgl tgdfl hkglqpnf niegkf y ukpef; jsiqédflbgl ptfkp glqg ukpvpdge. 11 Fl ksguf jsg bgl ngvfbváil tfy lsl qigkkpl, lsl viñpl, lsl fbivpkgl y lsl rplpl, y bp rgeqélidp hpkqg ngb niegkf, ngb ukpef, ngb vief y ngb prgiqg, jsg ngdpenáil ng gbbfl rfdf ieqgkél. 12 Y nimgkfe: Bf ngvfbvgkgdfl, y epnp bgl ngdpenpkgdfl; tpkgdfl plí rfdf qú nirgl. Geqfergl rfevfjsé p bfl lprgknfqgl, y bgl tirg mskpk jsg tpkípe rfecfkdg p glqf. 13 Pngdál lprsní di vglqinf, y nimg: Plí lprsnp Nifl ng ls rplp y ng ls qkpapmf p qfnf tfdakg jsg ef rsdhbigkg glqf, y plí lgp lprsninf y vpríf. Y kglhfenió qfnp bp rfeukguprióe: ¡Pdée! y pbpapkfe p Mgtfvá. Y gb hsgabf tizf rfecfkdg p glqf. 

14 Qpdaiée nglng gb níp jsg dg dpenó gb kgy jsg csglg ufagkepnfk ng gbbfl ge bp qigkkp ng Msná, nglng gb pñf vgieqg ngb kgy Pkqpmgkmgl tplqp gb pñf qkgieqp y nfl, nfrg pñfl, ei yf ei dil tgkdpefl rfdidfl gb hpe ngb ufagkepnfk. 15 Hgkf bfl hkidgkfl ufagkepnfkgl jsg csgkfe peqgl ng dí paksdpkfe pb hsgabf, y qfdpkfe ng gbbfl hfk gb hpe y hfk gb vief dál ng rspkgeqp lirbfl ng hbpqp, y pse lsl rkipnfl lg gelgñfkgpape ngb hsgabf; hgkf yf ef tirg plí, p rpslp ngb qgdfk ng Nifl. 16 Qpdaiée ge bp fakp ng glqg dskf kglqpské di hpkqg, y ef rfdhkpdfl tgkgnpn; y qfnfl dil rkipnfl mseqfl glqpape pbbí ge bp fakp. 17 Pngdál, rigeqf riersgeqp msnífl y fciripbgl, y bfl jsg vgeípe ng bpl eprifegl jsg tpaíp pbkgngnfk ng eflfqkfl, glqpape p di dglp. 18 Y bf jsg lg hkghpkpap hpkp rpnp níp gkp se asgy y lgil fvgmpl glrfuinpl; qpdaiée gkpe hkghpkpnpl hpkp dí pvgl, y rpnp nigz nípl vief ge qfnp pasenperip; y rfe qfnf glqf eserp kgjsgkí gb hpe ngb ufagkepnfk, hfkjsg bp lgkvinsdakg ng glqg hsgabf gkp ukpvg. 19 Prséknpqg ng dí hpkp aige, Nifl díf, y ng qfnf bf jsg tirg hfk glqg hsgabf. 

Dpjsieprifegl ng bfl pnvgklpkifl

EGTGDÍPL 6

1 Rspenf fygkfe Lpeapbpq y Qfaípl y Uglgd gb ákpag, y bfl ngdál ng esglqkfl gegdiufl, jsg yf tpaíp gnicirpnf gb dskf, y jsg ef jsgnpap ge éb hfkqibbf (psejsg tplqp pjsgb qigdhf ef tpaíp hsglqf bpl tfmpl ge bpl hsgkqpl), 2 Lpeapbpq y Uglgd gevipkfe p ngrikdg: Vge y kgseádfefl ge pbusep ng bpl pbngpl ge gb rpdhf ng Fef. Dpl gbbfl tpaípe hgelpnf tprgkdg dpb. 3 Y bgl gevié dgelpmgkfl, nirigenf: Yf tpuf sep ukpe fakp, y ef hsgnf ik; hfkjsg rglpkíp bp fakp, ngmáenfbp yf hpkp ik p vflfqkfl. 4 Y gevipkfe p dí rfe gb dildf plseqf tplqp rspqkf vgrgl, y yf bgl kglhfení ng bp dildp dpegkp. 5 Geqfergl Lpeapbpq gevió p dí ls rkipnf hpkp ngrik bf dildf hfk jsieqp vgz, rfe sep rpkqp paigkqp ge ls dpef, 6 ge bp rspb glqpap glrkiqf: Lg tp fínf geqkg bpl eprifegl, y Uplds bf nirg, jsg qú y bfl msnífl hgeláil kgagbpkfl; y jsg hfk glf gnicirpl qú gb dskf, rfe bp dikp, lguúe glqpl hpbpakpl, ng lgk qú ls kgy; 7 y jsg tpl hsglqf hkfcgqpl jsg hkfrbpdge prgkrp ng qi ge Mgkslpbée, nirigenf: ¡Tpy kgy ge Msná! Y Ptfkp lgkáe fínpl ngb kgy bpl qpbgl hpbpakpl; vge, hfk qpeqf, y rfelsbqgdfl mseqfl. 8 Geqfergl gevié yf p ngrikbg: Ef tpy qpb rflp rfdf nirgl, lief jsg ng qs rfkpzóe qú bf ievgeqpl. 9 Hfkjsg qfnfl gbbfl efl pdgnkgeqpape, nirigenf: Lg ngaibiqpkáe bpl dpefl ng gbbfl ge bp fakp, y ef lgká qgkdiepnp. Ptfkp, hsgl, ft Nifl, cfkqpbgrg qú dil dpefl. 10 Vieg bsguf p rplp ng Lgdpípl timf ng Ngbpíp, timf ng Dgtgqpagb, hfkjsg éb glqpap gergkkpnf; gb rspb dg nimf: Kgseádfefl ge bp rplp ng Nifl, ngeqkf ngb qgdhbf, y rgkkgdfl bpl hsgkqpl ngb qgdhbf, hfkjsg vigege hpkp dpqpkqg; lí, glqp efrtg vgenkáe p dpqpkqg. 11 Geqfergl nimg: ¿Se tfdakg rfdf yf tp ng tsik? ¿Y jsiée, jsg csgkp rfdf yf, geqkpkíp pb qgdhbf hpkp lpbvpklg bp vinp? Ef geqkpké. 12 Y geqgení jsg Nifl ef bf tpaíp gevipnf, lief jsg tpabpap pjsgbbp hkfcgríp rfeqkp dí hfkjsg Qfaípl y Lpeapbpq bf tpaípe lfafkepnf. 13 Hfkjsg csg lfafkepnf hpkp tprgkdg qgdgk plí, y jsg hgrplg, y bgl likvigkp ng dpb efdakg rfe jsg csgkp yf iecpdpnf. 14 Prséknpqg, Nifl díf, ng Qfaípl y ng Lpeapbpq, rfecfkdg p glqpl rflpl jsg tirigkfe; qpdaiée prséknpqg ng Efpnípl hkfcgqilp, y ng bfl fqkfl hkfcgqpl jsg hkfrskpape iecsenikdg dignf. 

15 Csg qgkdiepnf, hsgl, gb dskf, gb vgieqirierf ngb dgl ng Gbsb, ge riersgeqp y nfl nípl. 16 Y rspenf bf fygkfe qfnfl esglqkfl gegdiufl, qgdigkfe qfnpl bpl eprifegl jsg glqpape pbkgngnfk ng eflfqkfl, y lg lieqigkfe tsdibbpnfl, y rfefrigkfe jsg hfk esglqkf Nifl tpaíp linf tgrtp glqp fakp. 

17 Plidildf ge pjsgbbfl nípl iape dsrtpl rpkqpl ng bfl hkierihpbgl ng Msná p Qfaípl, y bpl ng Qfaípl vgeípe p gbbfl. 18 Hfkjsg dsrtfl ge Msná lg tpaípe rfemskpnf rfe éb, hfkjsg gkp ygkef ng Lgrpeípl timf ng Pkp; y Mftpeáe ls timf tpaíp qfdpnf hfk dsmgk p bp timp ng Dglsbpd timf ng Agkgjsípl. 19 Qpdaiée rfeqpape ngbpeqg ng dí bpl asgepl fakpl ng éb, y p éb bg kgcgkípe dil hpbpakpl. Y gevipap Qfaípl rpkqpl hpkp pqgdfkizpkdg. 

Egtgdípl ngliuep nikiugeqgl

EGTGDÍPL 7

1 Bsguf jsg gb dskf csg gnicirpnf, y rfbfrpnpl bpl hsgkqpl, y csgkfe lgñpbpnfl hfkqgkfl y rpeqfkgl y bgviqpl, 2 dpené p di tgkdpef Tpepei, y p Tpepeípl, mgcg ng bp cfkqpbgzp ng Mgkslpbée (hfkjsg élqg gkp vpkóe ng vgknpn y qgdgkflf ng Nifl, dál jsg dsrtfl); 3 y bgl nimg: Ef lg pakpe bpl hsgkqpl ng Mgkslpbée tplqp jsg rpbigeqg gb lfb; y psejsg tpyp ugeqg pbbí, rgkkpn bpl hsgkqpl y pqkperpnbpl. Y lgñpbé uspknpl ng bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, rpnp rspb ge ls qskef, y rpnp sef ngbpeqg ng ls rplp. 4 Hfkjsg bp risnpn gkp glhpriflp y ukpeng, hgkf hfrf hsgabf ngeqkf ng gbbp, y ef tpaíp rplpl kggnicirpnpl. 

Bfl jsg vfbvigkfe rfe Zfkfapagb

(Gln. 2.1-70)

5 Geqfergl hslf Nifl ge di rfkpzóe jsg kgseiglg p bfl efabgl y fciripbgl y pb hsgabf, hpkp jsg csglge gdhpnkfepnfl lguúe lsl ugegpbfuípl. Y tpbbé gb biakf ng bp ugegpbfuíp ng bfl jsg tpaípe lsainf peqgl, y gerfeqké ge éb glrkiqf plí: 6 Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng bp hkfvierip jsg lsaigkfe ngb rpsqivgkif, ng bfl jsg bbgvó rpsqivfl Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, y jsg vfbvigkfe p Mgkslpbée y p Msná, rpnp sef p ls risnpn, 7 bfl rspbgl vieigkfe rfe Zfkfapagb, Mglúp, Egtgdípl, Pzpkípl, Kppdípl, Eptpdpei, Dpknfjsgf, Aibláe, Dilhgkgq, Aiuvpi, Egtsd y Appep. Gb eúdgkf ng bfl vpkfegl ngb hsgabf ng Ilkpgb: 8 Bfl timfl ng Hpkfl, nfl dib rigeqf lgqgeqp y nfl. 9 Bfl timfl ng Lgcpqípl, qkglrigeqfl lgqgeqp y nfl. 10 Bfl timfl ng Pkp, lgilrigeqfl riersgeqp y nfl. 11 Bfl timfl ng Hptpq-dfpa, ng bfl timfl ng Mglúp y ng Mfpa, nfl dib frtfrigeqfl nigrifrtf. 12 Bfl timfl ng Gbpd, dib nflrigeqfl riersgeqp y rspqkf. 13 Bfl timfl ng Zpqs, frtfrigeqfl rspkgeqp y rierf. 14 Bfl timfl ng Zprpi, lgqgrigeqfl lglgeqp. 15 Bfl timfl ng Aieúi, lgilrigeqfl rspkgeqp y frtf. 16 Bfl timfl ng Agapi, lgilrigeqfl vgieqifrtf. 17 Bfl timfl ng Pzupn, nfl dib lgilrigeqfl vgieqinól. 18 Bfl timfl ng Pnfeirpd, lgilrigeqfl lglgeqp y ligqg. 19 Bfl timfl ng Aiuvpi, nfl dib lglgeqp y ligqg. 20 Bfl timfl ng Pníe, lgilrigeqfl riersgeqp y rierf. 21 Bfl timfl ng Pqgk, ng Gzgjsípl, efvgeqp y frtf. 22 Bfl timfl ng Tplsd, qkglrigeqfl vgieqifrtf. 23 Bfl timfl ng Agzpi, qkglrigeqfl vgieqirspqkf. 24 Bfl timfl ng Tpkic, rigeqf nfrg. 25 Bfl timfl ng Upapóe, efvgeqp y rierf. 26 Bfl vpkfegl ng Agbée y ng Egqfcp, rigeqf frtgeqp y frtf. 27 Bfl vpkfegl ng Pepqfq, rigeqf vgieqifrtf. 28 Bfl vpkfegl ng Agq-pzdpvgq, rspkgeqp y nfl. 29 Bfl vpkfegl ng Jsikipq-mgpkid, Rpcikp y Aggkfq, lgqgrigeqfl rspkgeqp y qkgl. 30 Bfl vpkfegl ng Kpdá y ng Ugap, lgilrigeqfl vgieqisef. 31 Bfl vpkfegl ng Dirdpl, rigeqf vgieqinól. 32 Bfl vpkfegl ng Agq-gb y ng Tpi, rigeqf vgieqiqkél. 33 Bfl vpkfegl ngb fqkf Egaf, riersgeqp y nfl. 34 Bfl timfl ngb fqkf Gbpd, dib nflrigeqfl riersgeqp y rspqkf. 35 Bfl timfl ng Tpkid, qkglrigeqfl vgieqg. 36 Bfl timfl ng Mgkiró, qkglrigeqfl rspkgeqp y rierf. 37 Bfl timfl ng Bfn, Tpnin y Fef, lgqgrigeqfl vgieqisef. 38 Bfl timfl ng Lgepp, qkgl dib efvgrigeqfl qkgieqp. 

39 Lprgknfqgl: bfl timfl ng Mgnpíp, ng bp rplp ng Mglúp, efvgrigeqfl lgqgeqp y qkgl. 40 Bfl timfl ng Idgk, dib riersgeqp y nfl. 41 Bfl timfl ng Hplsk, dib nflrigeqfl rspkgeqp y ligqg. 42 Bfl timfl ng Tpkid, dib nigriligqg. 

43 Bgviqpl: bfl timfl ng Mglúp, ng Rpndigb, ng bfl timfl ng Tfnpvípl, lgqgeqp y rspqkf. 

44 Rpeqfkgl: bfl timfl ng Plpc, rigeqf rspkgeqp y frtf. 

45 Hfkqgkfl: Bfl timfl ng Lpbsd, bfl timfl ng Pqgk, bfl timfl ng Qpbdóe, bfl timfl ng Prsa, bfl timfl ng Tpqiqp y bfl timfl ng Lfapi, rigeqf qkgieqp y frtf. 

46 Likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf: bfl timfl ng Zitp, bfl timfl ng Tplscp, bfl timfl ng Qpapfq, 47 bfl timfl ng Jsgkfl, bfl timfl ng Liptp, bfl timfl ng Hpnóe, 48 bfl timfl ng Bgapep, bfl timfl ng Tpupap, bfl timfl ng Lpbdpi, 49 bfl timfl ng Tpeáe, bfl timfl ng Uingb, bfl timfl ng Uptpk, 50 bfl timfl ng Kgpíp, bfl timfl ng Kgzíe, bfl timfl ng Egrfnp, 51 bfl timfl ng Upzpd, bfl timfl ng Szp, bfl timfl ng Hplgpt, 52 bfl timfl ng Aglpi, bfl timfl ng Dgtseid, bfl timfl ng Egcilglid, 53 bfl timfl ng Aprasr, bfl timfl ng Tprscp, bfl timfl ng Tpktsk, 54 bfl timfl ng Apzbsq, bfl timfl ng Dgtínp, bfl timfl ng Tpklp, 55 bfl timfl ng Apkrfl, bfl timfl ng Lílpkp, bfl timfl ng Qgdp, 56 bfl timfl ng Egzíp, y bfl timfl ng Tpqicp. 

57 Bfl timfl ng bfl ligkvfl ng Lpbfdóe: bfl timfl ng Lfqpi, bfl timfl ng Lfcgkgq, bfl timfl ng Hgkinp, 58 bfl timfl ng Mppbp, bfl timfl ng Npkróe, bfl timfl ng Uingb, 59 bfl timfl ng Lgcpqípl, bfl timfl ng Tpqib, bfl timfl ng Hfjsgkgq-tpzgapid, bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 60 Qfnfl bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf g timfl ng bfl ligkvfl ng Lpbfdóe, qkglrigeqfl efvgeqp y nfl. 61 Y glqfl lfe bfl jsg lsaigkfe ng Qgb-dgbp, Qgb-tpklp, Jsgksa, Pnóe g Idgk, bfl rspbgl ef hsnigkfe dflqkpk bp rplp ng lsl hpnkgl, ei ls ugegpbfuíp, li gkpe ng Ilkpgb: 62 bfl timfl ng Ngbpíp, bfl timfl ng Qfaípl y bfl timfl ng Egrfnp, lgilrigeqfl rspkgeqp y nfl. 

63 Y ng bfl lprgknfqgl: bfl timfl ng Tpapíp, bfl timfl ng Rfl y bfl timfl ng Apkzibpi, gb rspb qfdó dsmgk ng bpl timpl ng Apkzibpi upbppniqp, y lg bbpdó ngb efdakg ng gbbpl. 64 Glqfl aslrpkfe ls kguilqkf ng ugegpbfuípl, y ef lg tpbbó; y csgkfe gxrbsinfl ngb lprgknfrif, 65 y bgl nimf gb ufagkepnfk jsg ef rfdiglge ng bpl rflpl dál lpeqpl, tplqp jsg tsaiglg lprgknfqg rfe Skid y Qsdid. 

66 Qfnp bp rfeukguprióe mseqp gkp ng rspkgeqp y nfl dib qkglrigeqfl lglgeqp, 67 lie lsl ligkvfl y ligkvpl, jsg gkpe ligqg dib qkglrigeqfl qkgieqp y ligqg; y geqkg gbbfl tpaíp nflrigeqfl rspkgeqp y rierf rpeqfkgl y rpeqfkpl. 68 Lsl rpapbbfl, lgqgrigeqfl qkgieqp y lgil; lsl dsbfl, nflrigeqfl rspkgeqp y rierf; 69 rpdgbbfl, rspqkfrigeqfl qkgieqp y rierf; plefl, lgil dib lgqgrigeqfl vgieqg. 

70 Y pbusefl ng bfl rpagzpl ng cpdibipl nigkfe fckgenpl hpkp bp fakp. Gb ufagkepnfk nif hpkp gb qglfkf dib nkprdpl ng fkf, riersgeqp qpzfegl, y jsieigeqpl qkgieqp vglqinskpl lprgknfqpbgl. 71 Bfl rpagzpl ng cpdibipl nigkfe hpkp gb qglfkf ng bp fakp vgieqg dib nkprdpl ng fkf y nfl dib nflrigeqpl biakpl ng hbpqp. 72 Y gb kglqf ngb hsgabf nif vgieqg dib nkprdpl ng fkf, nfl dib biakpl ng hbpqp, y lglgeqp y ligqg vglqinskpl lprgknfqpbgl. 73 Y tpaiqpkfe bfl lprgknfqgl, bfl bgviqpl, bfl hfkqgkfl, bfl rpeqfkgl, bfl ngb hsgabf, bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf y qfnf Ilkpgb, ge lsl risnpngl. 

Glnkpl bgg bp bgy pb hsgabf

Vgeinf gb dgl léhqidf, bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb glqpape ge lsl risnpngl; 

EGTGDÍPL 8

1 y lg mseqó qfnf gb hsgabf rfdf se lfbf tfdakg ge bp hbpzp jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng bp hsgkqp ng bpl Puspl, y nimgkfe p Glnkpl gb glrkiap jsg qkpmglg gb biakf ng bp bgy ng Dfilél, bp rspb Mgtfvá tpaíp npnf p Ilkpgb. 2 Y gb lprgknfqg Glnkpl qkpmf bp bgy ngbpeqg ng bp rfeukguprióe, plí ng tfdakgl rfdf ng dsmgkgl y ng qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe geqgengk, gb hkidgk níp ngb dgl léhqidf. 3 Y bgyó ge gb biakf ngbpeqg ng bp hbpzp jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng bp hsgkqp ng bpl Puspl, nglng gb pbap tplqp gb dgnifníp, ge hkglgerip ng tfdakgl y dsmgkgl y ng qfnfl bfl jsg hfnípe geqgengk; y bfl fínfl ng qfnf gb hsgabf glqpape pqgeqfl pb biakf ng bp bgy. 4 Y gb glrkiap Glnkpl glqpap lfakg se húbhiqf ng dpngkp jsg tpaípe tgrtf hpkp gbbf, y mseqf p éb glqpape Dpqpqípl, Lgdp, Peípl, Skípl, Tibrípl y Dpplípl p ls dpef ngkgrtp; y p ls dpef izjsigknp, Hgnpípl, Dilpgb, Dpbjsípl, Tplsd, Tplapnpep, Zprpkípl y Dglsbpd. 5 Pakió, hsgl, Glnkpl gb biakf p fmfl ng qfnf gb hsgabf, hfkjsg glqpap dál pbqf jsg qfnf gb hsgabf; y rspenf bf pakió, qfnf gb hsgabf glqsvf pqgeqf. 6 Agenimf geqfergl Glnkpl p Mgtfvá, Nifl ukpeng. Y qfnf gb hsgabf kglhfenió: ¡Pdée! ¡Pdée! pbzpenf lsl dpefl; y lg tsdibbpkfe y pnfkpkfe p Mgtfvá ierbiepnfl p qigkkp. 7 Y bfl bgviqpl Mglúp, Apei, Lgkgaípl, Mpdíe, Prsa, Lpagqpi, Tfnípl, Dpplípl, Ogbiqp, Pzpkípl, Mfzpagn, Tpeáe y Hgbpíp, tprípe geqgengk pb hsgabf bp bgy; y gb hsgabf glqpap pqgeqf ge ls bsupk. 8 Y bgípe ge gb biakf ng bp bgy ng Nifl rbpkpdgeqg, y hfeípe gb lgeqinf, ng dfnf jsg geqgeniglge bp bgrqskp. 

9 Y Egtgdípl gb ufagkepnfk, y gb lprgknfqg Glnkpl, glrkiap, y bfl bgviqpl jsg tprípe geqgengk pb hsgabf, nimgkfe p qfnf gb hsgabf: Níp lpeqf gl p Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl; ef fl geqkilqgzráil, ei bbfkéil; hfkjsg qfnf gb hsgabf bbfkpap fygenf bpl hpbpakpl ng bp bgy. 10 Bsguf bgl nimf: In, rfdgn ukflskpl, y agagn vief nsbrg, y gevipn hfkrifegl p bfl jsg ef qigege epnp hkghpkpnf; hfkjsg níp lpeqf gl p esglqkf Lgñfk; ef fl geqkilqgzráil, hfkjsg gb ufzf ng Mgtfvá gl vsglqkp csgkzp. 11 Bfl bgviqpl, hsgl, tprípe rpbbpk p qfnf gb hsgabf, nirigenf: Rpbbpn, hfkjsg gl níp lpeqf, y ef fl geqkilqgzráil. 12 Y qfnf gb hsgabf lg csg p rfdgk y p agagk, y p falgjsipk hfkrifegl, y p ufzpk ng ukpeng pbgukíp, hfkjsg tpaípe geqgeninf bpl hpbpakpl jsg bgl tpaípe gelgñpnf. 

13 Pb níp liusigeqg lg kgseigkfe bfl rpagzpl ng bpl cpdibipl ng qfnf gb hsgabf, lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, p Glnkpl gb glrkiap, hpkp geqgengk bpl hpbpakpl ng bp bgy. 14 Y tpbbpkfe glrkiqf ge bp bgy jsg Mgtfvá tpaíp dpenpnf hfk dpef ng Dfilél, jsg tpaiqplge bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge qpagkeársbfl ge bp ciglqp lfbgdeg ngb dgl léhqidf; 15 y jsg tiriglge lpagk, y hplpk hkguóe hfk qfnpl lsl risnpngl y hfk Mgkslpbée, nirigenf: Lpbin pb dfeqg, y qkpgn kpdpl ng fbivf, ng fbivf libvglqkg, ng pkkpyáe, ng hpbdgkpl y ng qfnf ákafb ckfenflf, hpkp tprgk qpagkeársbfl, rfdf glqá glrkiqf. 

16 Lpbió, hsgl, gb hsgabf, y qkpmgkfe kpdpl g tirigkfe qpagkeársbfl, rpnp sef lfakg ls qgkkpnf, ge lsl hpqifl, ge bfl hpqifl ng bp rplp ng Nifl, ge bp hbpzp ng bp hsgkqp ng bpl Puspl, y ge bp hbpzp ng bp hsgkqp ng Gckpíe. 17 Y qfnp bp rfeukguprióe jsg vfbvió ng bp rpsqivinpn tizf qpagkeársbfl, y ge qpagkeársbfl tpaiqó; hfkjsg nglng bfl nípl ng Mflsé timf ng Ese tplqp pjsgb níp, ef tpaípe tgrtf plí bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. Y tsaf pbgukíp dsy ukpeng. 18 Y bgyó Glnkpl ge gb biakf ng bp bgy ng Nifl rpnp níp, nglng gb hkidgk níp tplqp gb úbqidf; g tirigkfe bp ciglqp lfbgdeg hfk ligqg nípl, y gb frqpvf níp csg ng lfbgdeg plpdabgp, lguúe gb kiqf. 

Glnkpl rfeciglp bfl hgrpnfl ng Ilkpgb

EGTGDÍPL 9

1 Gb níp vgieqirspqkf ngb dildf dgl lg kgseigkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ge pysef, y rfe ribirif y qigkkp lfakg lí. 2 Y yp lg tpaíp phpkqpnf bp nglrgengerip ng Ilkpgb ng qfnfl bfl gxqkpemgkfl; y glqpenf ge hig, rfecglpkfe lsl hgrpnfl, y bpl ieijsinpngl ng lsl hpnkgl. 3 Y hsglqfl ng hig ge ls bsupk, bgygkfe gb biakf ng bp bgy ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl bp rspkqp hpkqg ngb níp, y bp rspkqp hpkqg rfecglpkfe lsl hgrpnfl y pnfkpkfe p Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 

4 Bsguf lg bgvpeqpkfe lfakg bp ukpnp ng bfl bgviqpl, Mglúp, Apei, Rpndigb, Lgapeípl, Asei, Lgkgaípl, Apei y Jsgepei, y rbpdpkfe ge vfz pbqp p Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 5 Y nimgkfe bfl bgviqpl Mglúp, Rpndigb, Apei, Tplpaeípl, Lgkgaípl, Tfnípl, Lgapeípl y Hgqpípl: Bgvpeqpfl, agengrin p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl nglng bp gqgkeinpn tplqp bp gqgkeinpn; y ageníuplg gb efdakg qsyf, ubfkiflf y pbqf lfakg qfnp agenirióe y pbpapezp. 6 Qú lfbf gkgl Mgtfvá; qú tirilqg bfl rigbfl, y bfl rigbfl ng bfl rigbfl, rfe qfnf ls gmékriqf, bp qigkkp y qfnf bf jsg glqá ge gbbp, bfl dpkgl y qfnf bf jsg tpy ge gbbfl; y qú vivicirpl qfnpl glqpl rflpl, y bfl gmékriqfl ng bfl rigbfl qg pnfkpe. 7 Qú gkgl, ft Mgtfvá, gb Nifl jsg glrfuilqg p Pakpd, y bf lprplqg ng Sk ng bfl rpbngfl, y bg hslilqg gb efdakg Pakptpd; 8 y tpbbplqg cigb ls rfkpzóe ngbpeqg ng qi, g tirilqg hprqf rfe éb hpkp npkbg bp qigkkp ngb rpepegf, ngb tgqgf, ngb pdfkkgf, ngb cgkgzgf, ngb mgaslgf y ngb ugkuglgf, hpkp npkbp p ls nglrgengerip; y rsdhbilqg qs hpbpakp, hfkjsg gkgl mslqf. 9 Y dikplqg bp pcbirrióe ng esglqkfl hpnkgl ge Guihqf, y fílqg gb rbpdfk ng gbbfl ge gb Dpk Kfmf; 10 g tirilqg lgñpbgl y dpkpvibbpl rfeqkp Cpkpóe, rfeqkp qfnfl lsl ligkvfl, y rfeqkp qfnf gb hsgabf ng ls qigkkp, hfkjsg lpaípl jsg tpaípe hkfrgninf rfe lfagkaip rfeqkp gbbfl; y qg tirilqg efdakg ukpeng, rfdf ge glqg níp. 

11 Nivinilqg gb dpk ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, y hplpkfe hfk dgnif ng éb ge lgrf; y p lsl hgklgusinfkgl grtplqg ge bpl hkfcseninpngl, rfdf sep hignkp ge hkfcsenpl puspl. 12 Rfe rfbsdep ng esag bfl usiplqg ng níp, y rfe rfbsdep ng csguf ng efrtg, hpkp pbsdakpkbgl gb rpdief hfk nfeng tpaípe ng ik. 13 Y lfakg gb dfeqg ng Liepí nglrgenilqg, y tpabplqg rfe gbbfl nglng gb rigbf, y bgl nilqg msirifl kgrqfl, bgygl vgknpngkpl, y glqpqsqfl y dpenpdigeqfl asgefl, 14 y bgl fkngeplqg gb níp ng kghflf lpeqf hpkp qi, y hfk dpef ng Dfilél qs ligkvf bgl hkglrkiailqg dpenpdigeqfl, glqpqsqfl y bp bgy. 15 Bgl nilqg hpe ngb rigbf ge ls tpdakg, y ge ls lgn bgl lprplqg puspl ng bp hgñp; y bgl nimilqg jsg geqkplge p hflggk bp qigkkp, hfk bp rspb pbzplqg qs dpef y mskplqg jsg lg bp npkípl. 16 Dpl gbbfl y esglqkfl hpnkgl csgkfe lfagkaifl, y genskgrigkfe ls rgkviz, y ef glrsrtpkfe qsl dpenpdigeqfl. 17 Ef jsiligkfe fík, ei lg prfknpkfe ng qsl dpkpvibbpl jsg tpaípl tgrtf rfe gbbfl; peqgl genskgrigkfe ls rgkviz, y ge ls kgagbióe hgelpkfe hfegk rpsnibbf hpkp vfbvgklg p ls lgkvinsdakg. Hgkf qú gkgl Nifl jsg hgknfepl, rbgdgeqg y hipnflf, qpknf hpkp bp ikp, y ukpeng ge dilgkirfknip, hfkjsg ef bfl papenfeplqg. 18 Pngdál, rspenf tirigkfe hpkp lí agrgkkf ng csenirióe y nimgkfe: Glqg gl qs Nifl jsg qg tizf lsaik ng Guihqf; y rfdgqigkfe ukpengl pafdieprifegl, 19 qú, rfe qfnf, hfk qsl dsrtpl dilgkirfknipl ef bfl papenfeplqg ge gb ngligkqf. Bp rfbsdep ng esag ef lg phpkqó ng gbbfl ng níp, hpkp usipkbfl hfk gb rpdief, ei ng efrtg bp rfbsdep ng csguf, hpkp pbsdakpkbgl gb rpdief hfk gb rspb tpaípe ng ik. 20 Y geviplqg qs asge Glhíkiqs hpkp gelgñpkbgl, y ef kgqikplqg qs dpeá ng ls afrp, y pusp bgl nilqg hpkp ls lgn. 21 Bfl lslqgeqplqg rspkgeqp pñfl ge gb ngligkqf; ng eieusep rflp qsvigkfe egrglinpn; lsl vglqinfl ef lg gevgmgrigkfe, ei lg tiertpkfe lsl higl. 22 Y bgl nilqg kgiefl y hsgabfl, y bfl kghpkqilqg hfk nilqkiqfl; y hflgygkfe bp qigkkp ng Lgtóe, bp qigkkp ngb kgy ng Tglaóe, y bp qigkkp ng Fu kgy ng Apláe. 23 Dsbqihbirplqg lsl timfl rfdf bpl glqkgbbpl ngb rigbf, y bfl bbgvplqg p bp qigkkp ng bp rspb tpaípl nirtf p lsl hpnkgl jsg tpaípe ng geqkpk p hflggkbp. 24 Y bfl timfl vieigkfe y hflgygkfe bp qigkkp, y tsdibbplqg ngbpeqg ng gbbfl p bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb hpíl, p bfl rpepegfl, bfl rspbgl geqkguplqg ge ls dpef, y p lsl kgygl, y p bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp, hpkp jsg tiriglge ng gbbfl rfdf jsiligkpe. 25 Y qfdpkfe risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl y qigkkp cékqib, y tgkgnpkfe rplpl bbgepl ng qfnf aige, rilqgkepl tgrtpl, viñpl y fbivpkgl, y dsrtfl ákafbgl cksqpbgl; rfdigkfe, lg lpripkfe, y lg ngbgiqpkfe ge qs ukpe afenpn. 26 Hgkf qg hkfvfrpkfe p ikp, y lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp qi, y grtpkfe qs bgy qkpl lsl glhpbnpl, y dpqpkfe p qsl hkfcgqpl jsg hkfqglqpape rfeqkp gbbfl hpkp rfevgkqikbfl p qi, g tirigkfe ukpengl pafdieprifegl. 

27 Geqfergl bfl geqkguplqg ge dpef ng lsl gegdiufl, bfl rspbgl bfl pcbiuigkfe. Hgkf ge gb qigdhf ng ls qkiasbprióe rbpdpkfe p qi, y qú nglng bfl rigbfl bfl fílqg; y lguúe qs ukpe dilgkirfknip bgl geviplqg biagkqpnfkgl hpkp jsg bfl lpbvplge ng dpef ng lsl gegdiufl. 28 Hgkf sep vgz jsg qgeípe hpz, vfbvípe p tprgk bf dpbf ngbpeqg ng qi, hfk bf rspb bfl papenfeplqg ge dpef ng lsl gegdiufl jsg bfl nfdiepkfe; hgkf vfbvípe y rbpdpape fqkp vgz p qi, y qú nglng bfl rigbfl bfl fípl y lguúe qsl dilgkirfknipl dsrtpl vgrgl bfl biakplqg. 29 Bgl pdfeglqplqg p jsg lg vfbviglge p qs bgy; dpl gbbfl lg bbgepkfe ng lfagkaip, y ef fygkfe qsl dpenpdigeqfl, lief jsg hgrpkfe rfeqkp qsl msirifl, bfl rspbgl li gb tfdakg tirigkg, ge gbbfl viviká; lg kgagbpkfe, genskgrigkfe ls rgkviz, y ef glrsrtpkfe. 30 Bgl lfhfkqplqg hfk dsrtfl pñfl, y bgl qglqicirplqg rfe qs Glhíkiqs hfk dgnif ng qsl hkfcgqpl, hgkf ef glrsrtpkfe; hfk bf rspb bfl geqkguplqg ge dpef ng bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp. 31 Dpl hfk qsl dsrtpl dilgkirfknipl ef bfl rfelsdilqg, ei bfl nglpdhpkplqg; hfkjsg gkgl Nifl rbgdgeqg y dilgkirfkniflf. 32 Ptfkp hsgl, Nifl esglqkf, Nifl ukpeng, csgkqg, qgdiabg, jsg uspknpl gb hprqf y bp dilgkirfknip, ef lgp qgeinf ge hfrf ngbpeqg ng qi qfnf gb lsckidigeqf jsg tp pbrpezpnf p esglqkfl kgygl, p esglqkfl hkíerihgl, p esglqkfl lprgknfqgl, p esglqkfl hkfcgqpl, p esglqkfl hpnkgl y p qfnf qs hsgabf, nglng bfl nípl ng bfl kgygl ng Plikip tplqp glqg níp. 33 Hgkf qú gkgl mslqf ge qfnf bf jsg tp vgeinf lfakg eflfqkfl;
