hfkjsg kgrqpdgeqg tpl tgrtf, dpl eflfqkfl tgdfl tgrtf bf dpbf. 34 Esglqkfl kgygl, esglqkfl hkíerihgl, esglqkfl lprgknfqgl y esglqkfl hpnkgl ef hsligkfe hfk fakp qs bgy, ei pqgenigkfe p qsl dpenpdigeqfl y p qsl qglqidfeifl rfe jsg bgl pdfeglqpapl. 35 Y gbbfl ge ls kgief y ge qs dsrtf aige jsg bgl nilqg, y ge bp qigkkp glhpriflp y cékqib jsg geqkguplqg ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, ef qg likvigkfe, ei lg rfevikqigkfe ng lsl dpbpl fakpl. 36 Tg pjsí jsg tfy lfdfl ligkvfl; tgefl pjsí, ligkvfl ge bp qigkkp jsg nilqg p esglqkfl hpnkgl hpkp jsg rfdiglge ls cksqf y ls aige. 37 Y lg dsbqihbirp ls cksqf hpkp bfl kgygl jsg tpl hsglqf lfakg eflfqkfl hfk esglqkfl hgrpnfl, jsigegl lg gelgñfkgpe lfakg esglqkfl rsgkhfl, y lfakg esglqkfl upepnfl, rfecfkdg p ls vfbseqpn, y glqpdfl ge ukpeng peuslqip. 

Hprqf ngb hsgabf, ng uspknpk bp bgy

38 P rpslp, hsgl, ng qfnf glqf, eflfqkfl tprgdfl cigb hkfdglp, y bp glrkiaidfl, cikdpnp hfk esglqkfl hkíerihgl, hfk esglqkfl bgviqpl y hfk esglqkfl lprgknfqgl. 

EGTGDÍPL 10

1 Bfl jsg cikdpkfe csgkfe: Egtgdípl gb ufagkepnfk, timf ng Tprpbípl, y Lgngjsípl, 2 Lgkpípl, Pzpkípl, Mgkgdípl, 3 Hplsk, Pdpkípl, Dpbjsípl, 4 Tpqúl, Lgapeípl, Dpbsr, 5 Tpkid, Dgkgdfq, Fapnípl, 6 Npeigb, Uiegqóe, Apksr, 7 Dglsbpd, Paípl, Dimpdíe, 8 Dppzípl, Aibupi y Lgdpípl; élqfl gkpe lprgknfqgl. 9 Y bfl bgviqpl: Mglúp timf ng Pzpeípl, Aieúi ng bfl timfl ng Tgepnpn, Rpndigb, 10 y lsl tgkdpefl Lgapeípl, Tfnípl, Ogbiqp, Hgbpípl, Tpeáe, 11 Dirpíp, Kgtfa, Tplpaípl, 12 Zprsk, Lgkgaípl, Lgapeípl, 13 Tfnípl, Apei y Ageies. 14 Bfl rpagzpl ngb hsgabf: Hpkfl, Hptpq-dfpa, Gbpd, Zpqs, Apei, 15 Asei, Pzupn, Agapi, 16 Pnfeípl, Aiuvpi, Pníe, 17 Pqgk, Gzgjsípl, Pzsk, 18 Tfnípl, Tplsd, Agzpi, 19 Tpkic, Pepqfq, Egapi, 20 Dpuhípl, Dglsbpd, Tgzik, 21 Dglgzpaggb, Lpnfr, Mpnúp, 22 Hgbpqípl, Tpeáe, Pepípl, 23 Flgpl, Tpepeípl, Tplsa, 24 Tpbftgl, Hibtp, Lfagr, 25 Kgtsd, Tplpaep, Dpplípl, 26 Ptípl, Tpeáe, Peáe, 27 Dpbsr, Tpkid y Appep. 

28 Y gb kglqf ngb hsgabf, bfl lprgknfqgl, bgviqpl, hfkqgkfl y rpeqfkgl, bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf, y qfnfl bfl jsg lg tpaípe phpkqpnf ng bfl hsgabfl ng bpl qigkkpl p bp bgy ng Nifl, rfe lsl dsmgkgl, lsl timfl g timpl, qfnf gb jsg qgeíp rfdhkgelióe y nilrgkeidigeqf, 29 lg kgseigkfe rfe lsl tgkdpefl y lsl hkierihpbgl, hpkp hkfqglqpk y mskpk jsg penpkípe ge bp bgy ng Nifl, jsg csg npnp hfk Dfilél ligkvf ng Nifl, y jsg uspknpkípe y rsdhbikípe qfnfl bfl dpenpdigeqfl, ngrkgqfl y glqpqsqfl ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Lgñfk. 30 Y jsg ef npkípdfl esglqkpl timpl p bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp, ei qfdpkípdfl lsl timpl hpkp esglqkfl timfl. 31 Plidildf, jsg li bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp qkpmglge p vgengk dgkrpngkípl y rfdglqiabgl ge níp ng kghflf, epnp qfdpkípdfl ng gbbfl ge glg níp ei ge fqkf níp lpeqicirpnf; y jsg gb pñf léhqidf ngmpkípdfl nglrpelpk bp qigkkp, y kgdiqikípdfl qfnp ngsnp. 32 Efl idhslidfl pngdál hfk bgy, gb rpkuf ng rfeqkiasik rpnp pñf rfe bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng se lirbf hpkp bp fakp ng bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl; 33 hpkp gb hpe ng bp hkfhflirióe y hpkp bp fckgenp rfeqiesp, hpkp gb tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf, bfl nípl ng kghflf, bpl esgvpl bsepl, bpl cglqivinpngl, y hpkp bpl rflpl lpeqicirpnpl y bfl lprkicirifl ng gxhiprióe hfk gb hgrpnf ng Ilkpgb, y hpkp qfnf gb lgkvirif ng bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl. 34 Grtpdfl qpdaiée lsgkqgl bfl lprgknfqgl, bfl bgviqpl y gb hsgabf, prgkrp ng bp fckgenp ng bp bgñp, hpkp qkpgkbp p bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl, lguúe bpl rplpl ng esglqkfl hpnkgl, ge bfl qigdhfl ngqgkdiepnfl rpnp pñf, hpkp jsgdpk lfakg gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, rfdf glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy. 35 Y jsg rpnp pñf qkpgkípdfl p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá bpl hkidiripl ng esglqkp qigkkp, y bpl hkidiripl ngb cksqf ng qfnf ákafb. 36 Plidildf bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng esglqkfl timfl y ng esglqkfl upepnfl, rfdf glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy; y jsg qkpgkípdfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng esglqkpl vprpl y ng esglqkpl fvgmpl p bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl, p bfl lprgknfqgl jsg dieilqkpe ge bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl; 37 jsg qkpgkípdfl qpdaiée bpl hkidiripl ng esglqkpl dplpl, y esglqkpl fckgenpl, y ngb cksqf ng qfnf ákafb, y ngb vief y ngb prgiqg, hpkp bfl lprgknfqgl, p bpl rádpkpl ng bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl, y gb nigzdf ng esglqkp qigkkp hpkp bfl bgviqpl; y jsg bfl bgviqpl kgriaikípe bpl néridpl ng esglqkpl bpafkgl ge qfnpl bpl risnpngl; 38 y jsg glqpkíp gb lprgknfqg timf ng Ppkóe rfe bfl bgviqpl, rspenf bfl bgviqpl kgriaiglge gb nigzdf; y jsg bfl bgviqpl bbgvpkípe gb nigzdf ngb nigzdf p bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl, p bpl rádpkpl ng bp rplp ngb qglfkf. 39 Hfkjsg p bpl rádpkpl ngb qglfkf tpe ng bbgvpk bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y bfl timfl ng Bgví bp fckgenp ngb ukpef, ngb vief y ngb prgiqg; y pbbí glqpkáe bfl sqgelibifl ngb lpeqspkif, y bfl lprgknfqgl jsg dieilqkpe, bfl hfkqgkfl y bfl rpeqfkgl; y ef papenfepkgdfl bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl. 

Bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng Mgkslpbée

(1 Rk. 9.1-34)

EGTGDÍPL 11

1 Tpaiqpkfe bfl mgcgl ngb hsgabf ge Mgkslpbée; dpl gb kglqf ngb hsgabf grtó lsgkqgl hpkp qkpgk sef ng rpnp nigz hpkp jsg dfkplg ge Mgkslpbée, risnpn lpeqp, y bpl fqkpl esgvg hpkqgl ge bpl fqkpl risnpngl. 2 Y agenimf gb hsgabf p qfnfl bfl vpkfegl jsg vfbseqpkipdgeqg lg fckgrigkfe hpkp dfkpk ge Mgkslpbée. 

3 Glqfl lfe bfl mgcgl ng bp hkfvierip jsg dfkpkfe ge Mgkslpbée; hgkf ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná tpaiqpkfe rpnp sef ge ls hflglióe, ge lsl risnpngl; bfl ilkpgbiqpl, bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl, bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf y bfl timfl ng bfl ligkvfl ng Lpbfdóe. 4 Ge Mgkslpbée, hsgl, tpaiqpkfe pbusefl ng bfl timfl ng Msná y ng bfl timfl ng Agempdíe. Ng bfl timfl ng Msná: Pqpípl timf ng Szípl, timf ng Zprpkípl, timf ng Pdpkípl, timf ng Lgcpqípl, timf ng Dptpbpbggb, ng bfl timfl ng Cpkgl, 5 y Dpplípl timf ng Apksr, timf ng Rfbtfzg, timf ng Tpzpípl, timf ng Pnpípl, timf ng Mfipkia, timf ng Zprpkípl, timf ng Libfei. 6 Qfnfl bfl timfl ng Cpkgl jsg dfkpkfe ge Mgkslpbée csgkfe rspqkfrigeqfl lglgeqp y frtf tfdakgl csgkqgl. 7 Glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Agempdíe: Lpbú timf ng Dglsbpd, timf ng Mfgn, timf ng Hgnpípl, timf ng Rfbpípl, timf ng Dpplípl, timf ng Iqigb, timf ng Mglpípl. 8 Y qkpl éb Upapi y Lpbpi, efvgrigeqfl vgieqifrtf. 9 Y Mfgb timf ng Zirki gkp gb hkgcgrqf ng gbbfl, y Msná timf ng Lgeúp gb lgusenf ge bp risnpn. 10 Ng bfl lprgknfqgl: Mgnpípl timf ng Mfipkia, Mpjsíe, 11 Lgkpípl timf ng Tibrípl, timf ng Dglsbpd, timf ng Lpnfr, timf ng Dgkpifq, timf ng Ptiqfa, hkíerihg ng bp rplp ng Nifl, 12 y lsl tgkdpefl, bfl jsg tprípe bp fakp ng bp rplp, frtfrigeqfl vgieqinól; y Pnpípl timf ng Mgkftpd, timf ng Hgbpbípl, timf ng Pdli, timf ng Zprpkípl, timf ng Hplsk, timf ng Dpbjsípl, 13 y lsl tgkdpefl, mgcgl ng cpdibipl, nflrigeqfl rspkgeqp y nfl; y Pdplpi timf ng Pzpkggb, timf ng Pzpi, timf ng Dglibgdfq, timf ng Idgk, 14 y lsl tgkdpefl, tfdakgl ng ukpe viufk, rigeqf vgieqifrtf, gb mgcg ng bfl rspbgl gkp Zpanigb timf ng Ugnfbid. 15 Ng bfl bgviqpl: Lgdpípl timf ng Tplsa, timf ng Pzkirpd, timf ng Tplpaípl, timf ng Asei; 16 Lpagqpi y Mfzpapn, ng bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl bgviqpl, rphpqprgl ng bp fakp gxqgkifk ng bp rplp ng Nifl; 17 y Dpqpeípl timf ng Dirpíp, timf ng Zpani, timf ng Plpc, gb hkierihpb, gb jsg gdhgzpap bpl pbpapezpl y prrióe ng ukpripl pb qigdhf ng bp fkprióe; Aprasjsípl gb lgusenf ng geqkg lsl tgkdpefl; y Panp timf ng Lpdúp, timf ng Upbpb, timf ng Mgnsqúe. 18 Qfnfl bfl bgviqpl ge bp lpeqp risnpn gkpe nflrigeqfl frtgeqp y rspqkf. 19 Bfl hfkqgkfl, Prsa, Qpbdóe y lsl tgkdpefl, uspknpl ge bpl hsgkqpl, rigeqf lgqgeqp y nfl. 

20 Y gb kglqf ng Ilkpgb, ng bfl lprgknfqgl y ng bfl bgviqpl, ge qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná, rpnp sef ge ls tgkgnpn. 21 Bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf tpaiqpape ge Fcgb; y Zitp y Uilhp qgeípe psqfkinpn lfakg bfl likvigeqgl ngb qgdhbf. 22 Y gb mgcg ng bfl bgviqpl ge Mgkslpbée gkp Szi timf ng Apei, timf ng Tplpaípl, timf ng Dpqpeípl, timf ng Dirpíp, ng bfl timfl ng Plpc, rpeqfkgl, lfakg bp fakp ng bp rplp ng Nifl. 23 Hfkjsg tpaíp dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy prgkrp ng gbbfl, y nilqkiasrióe hpkp bfl rpeqfkgl hpkp rpnp níp. 24 Y Hgqpípl timf ng Dglgzpaggb, ng bfl timfl ng Zgkp timf ng Msná, glqpap pb lgkvirif ngb kgy ge qfnf egufrif ngb hsgabf. 

Bsupkgl tpaiqpnfl csgkp ng Mgkslpbée

25 Qfrpeqg p bpl pbngpl y lsl qigkkpl, pbusefl ng bfl timfl ng Msná tpaiqpkfe ge Jsikipq-pkap y lsl pbngpl, ge Niaóe y lsl pbngpl, ge Mgrpalggb y lsl pbngpl, 26 ge Mglúp, Dfbpnp y Agq-hgbgq, 27 ge Tpzpk-lspb, ge Aggklgap y lsl pbngpl, 28 ge Lirbpu, ge Dgrfep y lsl pbngpl, 29 ge Ge-kidóe, ge Zfkp, ge Mpkdsq, 30 ge Zpefp, ge Pnsbpd y lsl pbngpl, ge Bpjsil y lsl qigkkpl, y ge Pzgrp y lsl pbngpl. Y tpaiqpkfe nglng Aggklgap tplqp gb vpbbg ng Tiefd. 31 Y bfl timfl ng Agempdíe tpaiqpkfe nglng Ugap, ge Dirdpl, ge Píp, ge Agq-gb y lsl pbngpl, 32 ge Pepqfq, Efa, Pepeípl, 33 Tpzfk, Kpdá, Uiqpid, 34 Tpnin, Lgafid, Egapbpq, 35 Bfn, y Fef, vpbbg ng bfl pkqícirgl; 36 y pbusefl ng bfl bgviqpl, ge bfl kghpkqidigeqfl ng Msná y ng Agempdíe. 

Lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl

EGTGDÍPL 12

1 Glqfl lfe bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl jsg lsaigkfe rfe Zfkfapagb timf ng Lpbpqigb, y rfe Mglúp: Lgkpípl, Mgkgdípl, Glnkpl, 2 Pdpkípl, Dpbsr, Tpqúl, 3 Lgrpeípl, Kgtsd, Dgkgdfq, 4 Innf, Uiegqf, Paípl, 5 Dimpdíe, Dppnípl, Aibup, 6 Lgdpípl, Mfipkia, Mgnpípl, 7 Lpbú, Pdfr, Tibrípl y Mgnpípl. Glqfl gkpe bfl hkíerihgl ng bfl lprgknfqgl y lsl tgkdpefl ge bfl nípl ng Mglúp. 8 Y bfl bgviqpl: Mglúp, Aieúi, Rpndigb, Lgkgaípl, Msná y Dpqpeípl, jsg rfe lsl tgkdpefl fciripap ge bfl rpeqfl ng pbpapezp. 9 Y Aprasjsípl y Sei, lsl tgkdpefl, rpnp rspb ge ls dieilqgkif. 

10 Mglúp geugenkó p Mfiprid, y Mfiprid geugenkó p Gbiplia, y Gbiplia geugenkó p Mfipnp; 11 Mfipnp geugenkó p Mfepqáe, y Mfepqáe geugenkó p Mpnúp. 12 Y ge bfl nípl ng Mfiprid bfl lprgknfqgl mgcgl ng cpdibipl csgkfe: ng Lgkpípl, Dgkpípl; ng Mgkgdípl, Tpepeípl; 13 ng Glnkpl, Dglsbpd; ng Pdpkípl, Mftpeáe; 14 ng Dgbirú, Mfepqáe; ng Lgapeípl, Mflé; 15 ng Tpkid, Pnep; ng Dgkpifq, Tgbrpi; 16 ng Innf, Zprpkípl; ng Uiegqóe, Dglsbpd; 17 ng Paípl, Zirki; ng Dieipdíe, ng Dfpnípl, Hibqpi; 18 ng Aibup, Lpdúp; ng Lgdpípl, Mfepqáe; 19 ng Mfipkia, Dpqgepi; ng Mgnpípl, Szi; 20 ng Lpbpi, Rpbpi; ng Pdfr, Gagk; 21 ng Tibrípl, Tplpaípl; ng Mgnpípl, Epqpepgb. 

22 Bfl bgviqpl ge nípl ng Gbiplia, ng Mfipnp, ng Mftpeáe y ng Mpnúp csgkfe ielrkiqfl hfk mgcgl ng cpdibipl; qpdaiée bfl lprgknfqgl, tplqp gb kgiepnf ng Npkíf gb hgklp. 23 Bfl timfl ng Bgví, mgcgl ng cpdibipl, csgkfe ielrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bpl rkóeirpl tplqp bfl nípl ng Mftpeáe timf ng Gbiplia. 24 Bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl bgviqpl: Tplpaípl, Lgkgaípl, Mglúp timf ng Rpndigb, y lsl tgkdpefl ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, hpkp pbpapk y npk ukpripl, rfecfkdg pb glqpqsqf ng Npvin vpkóe ng Nifl, uspknpenf ls qskef. 25 Dpqpeípl, Aprasjsípl, Fapnípl, Dglsbpd, Qpbdóe y Prsa, uspknpl, gkpe hfkqgkfl hpkp bp uspknip p bpl geqkpnpl ng bpl hsgkqpl. 26 Glqfl csgkfe ge bfl nípl ng Mfiprid timf ng Mglúp, timf ng Mflpnpr, y ge bfl nípl ngb ufagkepnfk Egtgdípl y ngb lprgknfqg Glnkpl, glrkiap. 

Ngnirprióe ngb dskf

27 Hpkp bp ngnirprióe ngb dskf ng Mgkslpbée, aslrpkfe p bfl bgviqpl ng qfnfl lsl bsupkgl hpkp qkpgkbfl p Mgkslpbée, hpkp tprgk bp ngnirprióe y bp ciglqp rfe pbpapezpl y rfe ráeqirfl, rfe rídapbfl, lpbqgkifl y ríqpkpl. 28 Y csgkfe kgseinfl bfl timfl ng bfl rpeqfkgl, plí ng bp kguióe pbkgngnfk ng Mgkslpbée rfdf ng bpl pbngpl ng bfl egqfcpqiqpl; 29 y ng bp rplp ng Uibupb, y ng bfl rpdhfl ng Ugap y ng Pzdpvgq; hfkjsg bfl rpeqfkgl lg tpaípe gnicirpnf pbngpl pbkgngnfk ng Mgkslpbée. 30 Y lg hskicirpkfe bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl bgviqpl; y hskicirpkfe pb hsgabf, y bpl hsgkqpl, y gb dskf. 31 Tirg bsguf lsaik p bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná lfakg gb dskf, y hslg nfl rfkfl ukpengl jsg csgkfe ge hkfrglióe; gb sef p bp ngkgrtp, lfakg gb dskf, tprip bp hsgkqp ngb Dsbpnpk. 32 G iap qkpl ng gbbfl Flpípl rfe bp diqpn ng bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná, 33 y Pzpkípl, Glnkpl, Dglsbpd, 34 Msná y Agempdíe, Lgdpípl y Mgkgdípl. 35 Y ng bfl timfl ng bfl lprgknfqgl iape rfe qkfdhgqpl Zprpkípl timf ng Mfepqáe, timf ng Lgdpípl, timf ng Dpqpeípl, timf ng Dirpípl, timf ng Zprsk, timf ng Plpc; 36 y lsl tgkdpefl Lgdpípl, Pzpkpgb, Dibpbpi, Uibpbpi, Dppi, Epqpepgb, Msná y Tpepei, rfe bfl ielqksdgeqfl dslirpbgl ng Npvin vpkóe ng Nifl; y gb glrkiap Glnkpl ngbpeqg ng gbbfl. 37 Y p bp hsgkqp ng bp Csgeqg, ge ckgeqg ng gbbfl, lsaigkfe hfk bpl ukpnpl ng bp risnpn ng Npvin, hfk bp lsainp ngb dskf, nglng bp rplp ng Npvin tplqp bp hsgkqp ng bpl Puspl, pb fkigeqg. 38 Gb lgusenf rfkf iap ngb bpnf fhsglqf, y yf ge hfl ng éb, rfe bp diqpn ngb hsgabf lfakg gb dskf, nglng bp qfkkg ng bfl Tfkefl tplqp gb dskf pertf; 39 y nglng bp hsgkqp ng Gckpíe tplqp bp hsgkqp Vigmp y p bp hsgkqp ngb Hglrpnf, y bp qfkkg ng Tpepeggb, y bp qfkkg ng Tpdgp, tplqp bp hsgkqp ng bpl Fvgmpl; y lg ngqsvigkfe ge bp hsgkqp ng bp Rákrgb. 40 Bbgupkfe bsguf bfl nfl rfkfl p bp rplp ng Nifl; y yf, y bp diqpn ng bfl fciripbgl rfediuf, 41 y bfl lprgknfqgl Gbiprid, Dpplgípl, Dieipdíe, Dirpípl, Gbifgepi, Zprpkípl y Tpepeípl, rfe qkfdhgqpl; 42 y Dpplípl, Lgdpípl, Gbgpzpk, Szi, Mftpeáe, Dpbjsípl, Gbpd y Gzgk. Y bfl rpeqfkgl rpeqpape ge pbqp vfz, g Izkptípl gkp gb nikgrqfk. 43 Y lprkicirpkfe pjsgb níp esdgkflpl vírqidpl, y lg kgufrimpkfe, hfkjsg Nifl bfl tpaíp kgrkgpnf rfe ukpeng rfeqgeqpdigeqf; lg pbgukpkfe qpdaiée bpl dsmgkgl y bfl eiñfl; y gb pbafkfzf ng Mgkslpbée csg fínf nglng bgmfl. 

Hfkrifegl hpkp lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl

44 Ge pjsgb níp csgkfe hsglqfl vpkfegl lfakg bpl rádpkpl ng bfl qglfkfl, ng bpl fckgenpl, ng bpl hkidiripl y ng bfl nigzdfl, hpkp kgrfugk ge gbbpl, ng bfl gminfl ng bpl risnpngl, bpl hfkrifegl bgupbgl hpkp bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl; hfkjsg gkp ukpeng gb ufzf ng Msná rfe kglhgrqf p bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl jsg lgkvípe. 45 Y tpaípe rsdhbinf gb lgkvirif ng ls Nifl, y gb lgkvirif ng bp gxhiprióe, rfdf qpdaiée bfl rpeqfkgl y bfl hfkqgkfl, rfecfkdg pb glqpqsqf ng Npvin y ng Lpbfdóe ls timf. 46 Hfkjsg nglng gb qigdhf ng Npvin y ng Plpc, yp ng peqiusf, tpaíp se nikgrqfk ng rpeqfkgl hpkp bfl ráeqirfl y pbpapezpl y prrióe ng ukpripl p Nifl. 47 Y qfnf Ilkpgb ge nípl ng Zfkfapagb y ge nípl ng Egtgdípl npap pbidgeqfl p bfl rpeqfkgl y p bfl hfkqgkfl, rpnp rflp ge ls níp; rfelpukpape plidildf lsl hfkrifegl p bfl bgviqpl, y bfl bgviqpl rfelpukpape hpkqg p bfl timfl ng Ppkóe. 

Kgcfkdpl ng Egtgdípl

EGTGDÍPL 13

1 Pjsgb níp lg bgyó ge gb biakf ng Dfilél, fyéenfbf gb hsgabf, y csg tpbbpnf glrkiqf ge éb jsg bfl pdfeiqpl y dfpaiqpl ef ngaípe geqkpk mpdál ge bp rfeukguprióe ng Nifl, 2 hfk rspeqf ef lpbigkfe p kgriaik p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfe hpe y pusp, lief jsg nigkfe niegkf p Apbppd hpkp jsg bfl dpbnimgkp; dpl esglqkf Nifl vfbvió bp dpbnirióe ge agenirióe. 3 Rspenf fygkfe, hsgl, bp bgy, lghpkpkfe ng Ilkpgb p qfnfl bfl dgzrbpnfl rfe gxqkpemgkfl. 

4 Y peqgl ng glqf gb lprgknfqg Gbiplia, ligenf mgcg ng bp rádpkp ng bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl, tpaíp gdhpkgeqpnf rfe Qfaípl, 5 y bg tpaíp tgrtf sep ukpe rádpkp, ge bp rspb uspknpape peqgl bpl fckgenpl, gb ierigelf, bfl sqgelibifl, gb nigzdf ngb ukpef, ngb vief y ngb prgiqg, jsg glqpap dpenpnf npk p bfl bgviqpl, p bfl rpeqfkgl y p bfl hfkqgkfl, y bp fckgenp ng bfl lprgknfqgl. 6 Dpl p qfnf glqf, yf ef glqpap ge Mgkslpbée, hfkjsg ge gb pñf qkgieqp y nfl ng Pkqpmgkmgl kgy ng Apaibfeip csi pb kgy; y pb rpaf ng pbusefl nípl hgní hgkdilf pb kgy 7 hpkp vfbvgk p Mgkslpbée; y geqfergl lshg ngb dpb jsg tpaíp tgrtf Gbiplia hfk rfelingkprióe p Qfaípl, tprigenf hpkp éb sep rádpkp ge bfl pqkifl ng bp rplp ng Nifl. 8 Y dg nfbió ge ukpe dpegkp; y pkkfmé qfnfl bfl dsgabgl ng bp rplp ng Qfaípl csgkp ng bp rádpkp, 9 y nimg jsg bidhiplge bpl rádpkpl, g tirg vfbvgk pbbí bfl sqgelibifl ng bp rplp ng Nifl, bpl fckgenpl y gb ierigelf. 

10 Gerfeqké plidildf jsg bpl hfkrifegl hpkp bfl bgviqpl ef bgl tpaípe linf npnpl, y jsg bfl bgviqpl y rpeqfkgl jsg tprípe gb lgkvirif tpaípe tsinf rpnp sef p ls tgkgnpn. 11 Geqfergl kghkgení p bfl fciripbgl, y nimg: ¿Hfk jsé glqá bp rplp ng Nifl papenfepnp? Y bfl kgseí y bfl hslg ge lsl hsglqfl. 12 Y qfnf Msná qkpmf gb nigzdf ngb ukpef, ngb vief y ngb prgiqg, p bfl pbdprgegl. 13 Y hslg hfk dpyfknfdfl ng gbbfl pb lprgknfqg Lgbgdípl y pb glrkiap Lpnfr, y ng bfl bgviqpl p Hgnpípl; y pb lgkvirif ng gbbfl p Tpeáe timf ng Zprsk, timf ng Dpqpeípl; hfkjsg gkpe qgeinfl hfk cigbgl, y gbbfl qgeípe jsg kghpkqik p lsl tgkdpefl. 14 Prséknpqg ng dí, ft Nifl, ge fknge p glqf, y ef afkkgl dil dilgkirfknipl jsg tirg ge bp rplp ng di Nifl, y ge ls lgkvirif. 

15 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl vi ge Msná p pbusefl jsg hilpape ge bpupkgl ge gb níp ng kghflf, y jsg prpkkgpape tprgl, y rpkupape plefl rfe vief, y qpdaiée ng svpl, ng tiufl y qfnp lsgkqg ng rpkup, y jsg qkpípe p Mgkslpbée ge níp ng kghflf; y bfl pdfeglqé prgkrp ngb níp ge jsg vgenípe bpl hkfvilifegl. 16 Qpdaiée tpaíp ge bp risnpn qikifl jsg qkpípe hglrpnf y qfnp dgkrpngkíp, y vgenípe ge níp ng kghflf p bfl timfl ng Msná ge Mgkslpbée. 17 Y kghkgení p bfl lgñfkgl ng Msná y bgl nimg: ¿Jsé dpbp rflp gl glqp jsg vflfqkfl tpréil, hkfcpepenf plí gb níp ng kghflf? 18 ¿Ef tirigkfe plí vsglqkfl hpnkgl, y qkpmf esglqkf Nifl qfnf glqg dpb lfakg eflfqkfl y lfakg glqp risnpn? ¿Y vflfqkfl pñpníl ikp lfakg Ilkpgb hkfcpepenf gb níp ng kghflf? 19 Lsrgnió, hsgl, jsg rspenf iap flrskgrigenf p bpl hsgkqpl ng Mgkslpbée peqgl ngb níp ng kghflf, nimg jsg lg rgkkplge bpl hsgkqpl, y fkngeé jsg ef bpl pakiglge tplqp nglhsél ngb níp ng kghflf; y hslg p bpl hsgkqpl pbusefl ng dil rkipnfl, hpkp jsg ge níp ng kghflf ef ieqkfnsmgkpe rpkup. 20 Y lg jsgnpkfe csgkp ng Mgkslpbée sep y nfl vgrgl bfl egufripeqgl y bfl jsg vgenípe qfnp glhgrig ng dgkrperíp. 21 Y bgl pdfeglqé y bgl nimg: ¿Hfk jsé fl jsgnáil vflfqkfl ngbpeqg ngb dskf? Li bf tpréil fqkp vgz, fl grtpké dpef. Nglng geqfergl ef vieigkfe ge níp ng kghflf. 22 Y nimg p bfl bgviqpl jsg lg hskicirplge y vieiglge p uspknpk bpl hsgkqpl, hpkp lpeqicirpk gb níp ngb kghflf. Qpdaiée hfk glqf prséknpqg ng dí, Nifl díf, y hgknóepdg lguúe bp ukpengzp ng qs dilgkirfknip. 

23 Vi plidildf ge pjsgbbfl nípl p msnífl jsg tpaípe qfdpnf dsmgkgl ng Plnfn, pdfeiqpl, y dfpaiqpl; 24 y bp diqpn ng lsl timfl tpabpape bp bgeusp ng Plnfn, hfkjsg ef lpaípe tpabpk msnpirf, lief jsg tpabpape rfecfkdg p bp bgeusp ng rpnp hsgabf. 25 Y kgñí rfe gbbfl, y bfl dpbnimg, y tgkí p pbusefl ng gbbfl, y bgl pkkpejsé bfl rpagbbfl, y bgl tirg mskpk, nirigenf: Ef npkéil vsglqkpl timpl p lsl timfl, y ef qfdpkéil ng lsl timpl hpkp vsglqkfl timfl, ei hpkp vflfqkfl dildfl. 26 ¿Ef hgró hfk glqf Lpbfdóe, kgy ng Ilkpgb? Aige jsg ge dsrtpl eprifegl ef tsaf kgy rfdf éb, jsg gkp pdpnf ng ls Nifl, y Nifl bf tpaíp hsglqf hfk kgy lfakg qfnf Ilkpgb, pse p éb bg tirigkfe hgrpk bpl dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl. 27 ¿Y fagngrgkgdfl p vflfqkfl hpkp rfdgqgk qfnf glqg dpb qpe ukpeng ng hkgvpkirpk rfeqkp esglqkf Nifl, qfdpenf dsmgkgl gxqkpemgkpl? 28 Y sef ng bfl timfl ng Mfipnp timf ngb lsdf lprgknfqg Gbiplia gkp ygkef ng Lpeapbpq tfkfeiqp; hfk qpeqf, bf ptsygeqé ng dí. 29 Prséknpqg ng gbbfl, Nifl díf, rfeqkp bfl jsg rfeqpdiepe gb lprgknfrif, y gb hprqf ngb lprgknfrif y ng bfl bgviqpl. 30 Bfl bidhié, hsgl, ng qfnf gxqkpemgkf, y hslg p bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl hfk lsl ukshfl, p rpnp sef ge ls lgkvirif; 31 y hpkp bp fckgenp ng bp bgñp ge bfl qigdhfl lgñpbpnfl, y hpkp bpl hkidiripl. Prséknpqg ng dí, Nifl díf, hpkp aige. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


GLQGK 

Bp kgiep Vplqi nglpcíp p Plsgkf

GLQGK 1

1 Prfeqgrió ge bfl nípl ng Plsgkf, gb Plsgkf jsg kgieó nglng bp Ienip tplqp Gqifhíp lfakg rigeqf vgieqiligqg hkfvieripl, 2 jsg ge pjsgbbfl nípl, rspenf csg pcikdpnf gb kgy Plsgkf lfakg gb qkfef ng ls kgief, gb rspb glqpap ge Lslp rphiqpb ngb kgief, 3 ge gb qgkrgk pñf ng ls kgiepnf tizf apejsgqg p qfnfl lsl hkíerihgl y rfkqglpefl, qgeigenf ngbpeqg ng éb p bfl dál hfngkflfl ng Hgklip y ng Dgnip, ufagkepnfkgl y hkíerihgl ng hkfvieripl, 4 hpkp dflqkpk éb bpl kijsgzpl ng bp ubfkip ng ls kgief, gb akibbf y bp dpueicirgerip ng ls hfngk, hfk dsrtfl nípl, rigeqf frtgeqp nípl. 5 Y rsdhbinfl glqfl nípl, tizf gb kgy fqkf apejsgqg hfk ligqg nípl ge gb hpqif ngb tsgkqf ngb hpbprif kgpb p qfnf gb hsgabf jsg tpaíp ge Lslp rphiqpb ngb kgief, nglng gb dpyfk tplqp gb dgefk. 6 Gb hpagbbóe gkp ng abperf, vgkng y pzsb, qgeninf lfakg rsgknpl ng bief y húkhskp ge peibbfl ng hbpqp y rfbsdepl ng dákdfb; bfl kgrbiepqfkifl ng fkf y ng hbpqp, lfakg bflpnf ng hókcinf y ng dákdfb, y ng pbpaplqkf y ng mprieqf. 7 Y npape p agagk ge vplfl ng fkf, y vplfl nicgkgeqgl sefl ng fqkfl, y dsrtf vief kgpb, ng prsgknf rfe bp ugegkflinpn ngb kgy. 8 Y bp againp gkp lguúe glqp bgy: Jsg epnig csglg fabiupnf p agagk; hfkjsg plí bf tpaíp dpenpnf gb kgy p qfnfl bfl dpyfknfdfl ng ls rplp, jsg lg tiriglg lguúe bp vfbseqpn ng rpnp sef. 9 Plidildf bp kgiep Vplqi tizf apejsgqg hpkp bpl dsmgkgl, ge bp rplp kgpb ngb kgy Plsgkf. 

10 Gb léhqidf níp, glqpenf gb rfkpzóe ngb kgy pbgukg ngb vief, dpenó p Dgtsdáe, Aizqp, Tpkafep, Aiuqp, Papuqp, Zgqpk y Rpkrpl, ligqg gsesrfl jsg lgkvípe ngbpeqg ngb kgy Plsgkf, 11 jsg qkpmglge p bp kgiep Vplqi p bp hkglgerip ngb kgy rfe bp rfkfep kguip, hpkp dflqkpk p bfl hsgabfl y p bfl hkíerihgl ls agbbgzp; hfkjsg gkp tgkdflp. 12 Dpl bp kgiep Vplqi ef jsilf rfdhpkgrgk p bp fknge ngb kgy gevipnp hfk dgnif ng bfl gsesrfl; y gb kgy lg gefmó dsrtf, y lg gergenió ge ikp. 

13 Hkguseqó geqfergl gb kgy p bfl lpaifl jsg rfefrípe bfl qigdhfl (hfkjsg plí prflqsdakpap gb kgy rfe qfnfl bfl jsg lpaípe bp bgy y gb ngkgrtf; 14 y glqpape mseqf p éb Rpklgep, Lgqpk, Pndpqp, Qpklil, Dgkgl, Dpklgep y Dgdsráe, ligqg hkíerihgl ng Hgklip y ng Dgnip jsg vgípe bp rpkp ngb kgy, y lg lgeqpape bfl hkidgkfl ngb kgief); 15 bgl hkguseqó jsé lg tpaíp ng tprgk rfe bp kgiep Vplqi lguúe bp bgy, hfk rspeqf ef tpaíp rsdhbinf bp fknge ngb kgy Plsgkf gevipnp hfk dgnif ng bfl gsesrfl. 16 Y nimf Dgdsráe ngbpeqg ngb kgy y ng bfl hkíerihgl: Ef lfbpdgeqg rfeqkp gb kgy tp hgrpnf bp kgiep Vplqi, lief rfeqkp qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl, y rfeqkp qfnfl bfl hsgabfl jsg tpy ge qfnpl bpl hkfvieripl ngb kgy Plsgkf. 17 Hfkjsg glqg tgrtf ng bp kgiep bbgupká p fínfl ng qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl, y gbbpl qgenkáe ge hfrp glqidp p lsl dpkinfl, nirigenf: Gb kgy Plsgkf dpenó qkpgk ngbpeqg ng lí p bp kgiep Vplqi, y gbbp ef vief. 18 Y geqfergl nikáe glqf bpl lgñfkpl ng Hgklip y ng Dgnip jsg fiupe gb tgrtf ng bp kgiep, p qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ngb kgy; y tpaká dsrtf dgeflhkgrif y gefmf. 19 Li hpkgrg aige pb kgy, lpbup se ngrkgqf kgpb ng vsglqkp dpmglqpn y lg glrkiap geqkg bpl bgygl ng Hgklip y ng Dgnip, hpkp jsg ef lgp jsgakpeqpnf: Jsg Vplqi ef vgeup dál ngbpeqg ngb kgy Plsgkf; y gb kgy tpup kgiep p fqkp jsg lgp dgmfk jsg gbbp. 20 Y gb ngrkgqf jsg nirqg gb kgy lgká fínf ge qfnf ls kgief, psejsg gl ukpeng, y qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl npkáe tfekp p lsl dpkinfl, nglng gb dpyfk tplqp gb dgefk. 21 Pukpnó glqp hpbpakp p bfl fmfl ngb kgy y ng bfl hkíerihgl, g tizf gb kgy rfecfkdg pb nirtf ng Dgdsráe; 22 hsgl gevió rpkqpl p qfnpl bpl hkfvieripl ngb kgy, p rpnp hkfvierip rfecfkdg p ls glrkiqskp, y p rpnp hsgabf rfecfkdg p ls bgeuspmg, nirigenf jsg qfnf tfdakg pcikdplg ls psqfkinpn ge ls rplp; y jsg lg hsabirplg glqf ge bp bgeusp ng ls hsgabf. 

Glqgk gl hkfrbpdpnp kgiep

GLQGK 2

1 Hplpnpl glqpl rflpl, lflgupnp yp bp ikp ngb kgy Plsgkf, lg prfknó ng Vplqi y ng bf jsg gbbp tpaíp tgrtf, y ng bp lgeqgerip rfeqkp gbbp. 2 Y nimgkfe bfl rkipnfl ngb kgy, lsl rfkqglpefl: Asljsge hpkp gb kgy móvgegl víkugegl ng asge hpkgrgk; 3 y hfeup gb kgy hgklfepl ge qfnpl bpl hkfvieripl ng ls kgief, jsg bbgvge p qfnpl bpl móvgegl víkugegl ng asge hpkgrgk p Lslp, kglingerip kgpb, p bp rplp ng bpl dsmgkgl, pb rsinpnf ng Tgupi gsesrf ngb kgy, uspknp ng bpl dsmgkgl, y jsg bgl nge lsl pqpvífl; 4 y bp nfergbbp jsg pukpng p bfl fmfl ngb kgy, kgieg ge bsupk ng Vplqi. Glqf pukpnó p bfl fmfl ngb kgy, y bf tizf plí. 

5 Tpaíp ge Lslp kglingerip kgpb se vpkóe msníf rsyf efdakg gkp Dpknfjsgf timf ng Mpik, timf ng Lidgi, timf ng Ril, ngb biepmg ng Agempdíe; 6 gb rspb tpaíp linf qkpelhfkqpnf ng Mgkslpbée rfe bfl rpsqivfl jsg csgkfe bbgvpnfl rfe Mgrfeípl kgy ng Msná, p jsige tizf qkpelhfkqpk Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip. 7 Y tpaíp rkipnf p Tpnplp, gl ngrik, Glqgk, timp ng ls qíf, hfkjsg gkp túgkcpep; y bp mfvge gkp ng tgkdflp ciuskp y ng asge hpkgrgk. Rspenf ls hpnkg y ls dpnkg dskigkfe, Dpknfjsgf bp pnfhqó rfdf timp lsyp. 

8 Lsrgnió, hsgl, jsg rspenf lg nivsbuó gb dpenpdigeqf y ngrkgqf ngb kgy, y tpaípe kgseinf p dsrtpl nfergbbpl ge Lslp kglingerip kgpb, p rpkuf ng Tgupi, Glqgk qpdaiée csg bbgvpnp p bp rplp ngb kgy, pb rsinpnf ng Tgupi uspknp ng bpl dsmgkgl. 9 Y bp nfergbbp pukpnó p lsl fmfl, y tpbbó ukprip ngbpeqg ng éb, hfk bf jsg tizf npkbg hkfeqpdgeqg pqpvífl y pbidgeqfl, y bg nif qpdaiée ligqg nfergbbpl glhgripbgl ng bp rplp ngb kgy; y bp bbgvó rfe lsl nfergbbpl p bf dgmfk ng bp rplp ng bpl dsmgkgl. 10 Glqgk ef ngrbpkó rsáb gkp ls hsgabf ei ls hpkgeqgbp, hfkjsg Dpknfjsgf bg tpaíp dpenpnf jsg ef bf ngrbpkplg. 11 Y rpnp níp Dpknfjsgf lg hplgpap ngbpeqg ngb hpqif ng bp rplp ng bpl dsmgkgl, hpkp lpagk ródf bg iap p Glqgk, y ródf bp qkpqpape. 

12 Y rspenf bbgupap gb qigdhf ng rpnp sep ng bpl nfergbbpl hpkp vgeik pb kgy Plsgkf, nglhsél ng tpagk glqpnf nfrg dglgl rfecfkdg p bp bgy prgkrp ng bpl dsmgkgl, hsgl plí lg rsdhbíp gb qigdhf ng lsl pqpvífl, glqf gl, lgil dglgl rfe óbgf ng dikkp y lgil dglgl rfe hgkcsdgl pkfdáqirfl y pcgiqgl ng dsmgkgl, 13 geqfergl bp nfergbbp vgeíp plí pb kgy. Qfnf bf jsg gbbp hgníp lg bg npap, hpkp vgeik pqpvipnp rfe gbbf nglng bp rplp ng bpl dsmgkgl tplqp bp rplp ngb kgy. 14 Gbbp vgeíp hfk bp qpkng, y p bp dpñpep liusigeqg vfbvíp p bp rplp lgusenp ng bpl dsmgkgl, pb rpkuf ng Lpplupz gsesrf ngb kgy, uspknp ng bpl rfersaiepl; ef vgeíp dál pb kgy, lpbvf li gb kgy bp jsgkíp y gkp bbpdpnp hfk efdakg. 

15 Rspenf bg bbguó p Glqgk, timp ng Paitpib qíf ng Dpknfjsgf, jsige bp tpaíp qfdpnf hfk timp, gb qigdhf ng vgeik pb kgy, eieusep rflp hkfrskó lief bf jsg nimf Tgupi gsesrf ngb kgy, uspknp ng bpl dsmgkgl; y upepap Glqgk gb cpvfk ng qfnfl bfl jsg bp vgípe. 16 Csg, hsgl, Glqgk bbgvpnp pb kgy Plsgkf p ls rplp kgpb ge gb dgl néridf, jsg gl gb dgl ng Qgagq, ge gb pñf léhqidf ng ls kgiepnf. 17 Y gb kgy pdó p Glqgk dál jsg p qfnpl bpl fqkpl dsmgkgl, y tpbbó gbbp ukprip y agegvfbgerip ngbpeqg ng éb dál jsg qfnpl bpl ngdál víkugegl; y hslf bp rfkfep kgpb ge ls rpagzp, y bp tizf kgiep ge bsupk ng Vplqi. 18 Tizf bsguf gb kgy se ukpe apejsgqg p qfnfl lsl hkíerihgl y ligkvfl, gb apejsgqg ng Glqgk; y nildiesyó qkiasqfl p bpl hkfvieripl, g tizf y nif dgkrgngl rfecfkdg p bp ugegkflinpn kgpb. 

Dpknfjsgf ngeserip sep rfelhikprióe rfeqkp gb kgy

19 Rspenf bpl víkugegl gkpe kgseinpl bp lgusenp vgz, Dpknfjsgf glqpap lgeqpnf p bp hsgkqp ngb kgy. 20 Y Glqgk, lguúe bg tpaíp dpenpnf Dpknfjsgf, ef tpaíp ngrbpkpnf ls eprióe ei ls hsgabf; hfkjsg Glqgk tpríp bf jsg ngríp Dpknfjsgf, rfdf rspenf éb bp gnsrpap. 21 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl, glqpenf Dpknfjsgf lgeqpnf p bp hsgkqp ngb kgy, lg gefmpkfe Aiuqáe y Qgkgl, nfl gsesrfl ngb kgy, ng bp uspknip ng bp hsgkqp, y hkfrskpape hfegk dpef ge gb kgy Plsgkf. 22 Rspenf Dpknfjsgf geqgenió glqf, bf ngeserió p bp kgiep Glqgk, y Glqgk bf nimf pb kgy ge efdakg ng Dpknfjsgf. 23 Lg tizf ievglqiuprióe ngb plseqf, y csg tpbbpnf rigkqf; hfk qpeqf, bfl nfl gsesrfl csgkfe rfbupnfl ge sep tfkrp. Y csg glrkiqf gb rplf ge gb biakf ng bpl rkóeirpl ngb kgy. 

Pdáe qkpdp bp nglqksrrióe ng bfl msnífl

GLQGK 3

1 Nglhsél ng glqpl rflpl gb kgy Plsgkf geukpengrió p Pdáe timf ng Tpdgnpqp pupusgf, y bf tfekó, y hslf ls libbp lfakg qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl jsg glqpape rfe éb. 2 Y qfnfl bfl ligkvfl ngb kgy jsg glqpape p bp hsgkqp ngb kgy lg pkkfnibbpape y lg ierbiepape peqg Pdáe, hfkjsg plí bf tpaíp dpenpnf gb kgy; hgkf Dpknfjsgf ei lg pkkfnibbpap ei lg tsdibbpap. 3 Y bfl ligkvfl ngb kgy jsg glqpape p bp hsgkqp hkguseqpkfe p Dpknfjsgf: ¿Hfk jsé qkplhplpl gb dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy? 4 Prfeqgrió jsg tpabáenfbg rpnp níp ng glqp dpegkp, y ef glrsrtáenfbfl éb, bf ngeseripkfe p Pdáe, hpkp vgk li Dpknfjsgf lg dpeqgenkíp cikdg ge ls nirtf; hfkjsg yp éb bgl tpaíp ngrbpkpnf jsg gkp msníf. 5 Y vif Pdáe jsg Dpknfjsgf ei lg pkkfnibbpap ei lg tsdibbpap ngbpeqg ng éb; y lg bbgeó ng ikp. 6 Hgkf qsvf ge hfrf hfegk dpef ge Dpknfjsgf lfbpdgeqg, hsgl yp bg tpaípe ngrbpkpnf rsáb gkp gb hsgabf ng Dpknfjsgf; y hkfrskó Pdáe nglqksik p qfnfl bfl msnífl jsg tpaíp ge gb kgief ng Plsgkf, pb hsgabf ng Dpknfjsgf. 

7 Ge gb dgl hkidgkf, jsg gl gb dgl ng Eiláe, ge gb pñf nsfnéridf ngb kgy Plsgkf, csg grtpnp Hsk, glqf gl, bp lsgkqg, ngbpeqg ng Pdáe, lsgkqg hpkp rpnp níp y rpnp dgl ngb pñf; y lpbió gb dgl nsfnéridf, jsg gl gb dgl ng Pnpk. 

8 Y nimf Pdáe pb kgy Plsgkf: Tpy se hsgabf glhpkrinf y nilqkiasinf geqkg bfl hsgabfl ge qfnpl bpl hkfvieripl ng qs kgief, y lsl bgygl lfe nicgkgeqgl ng bpl ng qfnf hsgabf, y ef uspknpe bpl bgygl ngb kgy, y pb kgy epnp bg agegcirip gb ngmpkbfl vivik. 9 Li hbprg pb kgy, ngrkgqg jsg lgpe nglqksinfl; y yf hglpké nigz dib qpbgeqfl ng hbpqp p bfl jsg dpegmpe bp tprigenp, hpkp jsg lgpe qkpínfl p bfl qglfkfl ngb kgy. 10 Geqfergl gb kgy jsiqó gb peibbf ng ls dpef, y bf nif p Pdáe timf ng Tpdgnpqp pupusgf, gegdiuf ng bfl msnífl, 11 y bg nimf: Bp hbpqp jsg fckgrgl lgp hpkp qi, y plidildf gb hsgabf, hpkp jsg tpupl ng éb bf jsg aige qg hpkgrigkg. 12 Geqfergl csgkfe bbpdpnfl bfl glrkiapefl ngb kgy ge gb dgl hkidgkf, pb níp qkgrg ngb dildf, y csg glrkiqf rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg dpenó Pdáe, p bfl láqkphpl ngb kgy, p bfl rphiqpegl jsg glqpape lfakg rpnp hkfvierip y p bfl hkíerihgl ng rpnp hsgabf, p rpnp hkfvierip lguúe ls glrkiqskp, y p rpnp hsgabf lguúe ls bgeusp; ge efdakg ngb kgy Plsgkf csg glrkiqf, y lgbbpnf rfe gb peibbf ngb kgy. 13 Y csgkfe gevipnpl rpkqpl hfk dgnif ng rfkkgfl p qfnpl bpl hkfvieripl ngb kgy, rfe bp fknge ng nglqksik, dpqpk y gxqgkdiepk p qfnfl bfl msnífl, móvgegl y peripefl, eiñfl y dsmgkgl, ge se dildf níp, ge gb níp qkgrg ngb dgl nsfnéridf, jsg gl gb dgl ng Pnpk, y ng phfngkpklg ng lsl aigegl. 14 Bp rfhip ngb glrkiqf jsg lg nif hfk dpenpdigeqf ge rpnp hkfvierip csg hsabirpnp p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, p cie ng jsg glqsviglge bilqfl hpkp pjsgb níp. 15 Y lpbigkfe bfl rfkkgfl hkfeqpdgeqg hfk dpenpqf ngb kgy, y gb gnirqf csg npnf ge Lslp rphiqpb ngb kgief. Y gb kgy y Pdáe lg lgeqpkfe p agagk; hgkf bp risnpn ng Lslp glqpap rfedfvinp. 

Glqgk hkfdgqg ieqgkrgngk hfk ls hsgabf

GLQGK 4

1 Bsguf jsg lshf Dpknfjsgf qfnf bf jsg lg tpaíp tgrtf, kpluó lsl vglqinfl, lg vilqió ng ribirif y ng rgeizp, y lg csg hfk bp risnpn rbpdpenf rfe ukpeng y pdpkuf rbpdfk. 2 Y vief tplqp ngbpeqg ng bp hsgkqp ngb kgy; hsgl ef gkp bíriqf hplpk pngeqkf ng bp hsgkqp ngb kgy rfe vglqinf ng ribirif. 3 Y ge rpnp hkfvierip y bsupk nfeng gb dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy y ls ngrkgqf bbgupap, qgeípe bfl msnífl ukpe bsqf, pysef, bbfkf y bpdgeqprióe; ribirif y rgeizp gkp bp rpdp ng dsrtfl. 

4 Y vieigkfe bpl nfergbbpl ng Glqgk, y lsl gsesrfl, y lg bf nimgkfe. Geqfergl bp kgiep qsvf ukpe nfbfk, y gevió vglqinfl hpkp tprgk vglqik p Dpknfjsgf, y tprgkbg jsiqpk gb ribirif; dpl éb ef bfl prghqó. 5 Geqfergl Glqgk bbpdó p Tpqpr, sef ng bfl gsesrfl ngb kgy, jsg éb tpaíp hsglqf pb lgkvirif ng gbbp, y bf dpenó p Dpknfjsgf, rfe fknge ng lpagk jsé lsrgníp, y hfk jsé glqpap plí. 6 Lpbió, hsgl, Tpqpr p vgk p Dpknfjsgf, p bp hbpzp ng bp risnpn, jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ng bp hsgkqp ngb kgy. 7 Y Dpknfjsgf bg ngrbpkó qfnf bf jsg bg tpaíp prfeqgrinf, y bg nif efqirip ng bp hbpqp jsg Pdáe tpaíp nirtf jsg hglpkíp hpkp bfl qglfkfl ngb kgy p rpdaif ng bp nglqksrrióe ng bfl msnífl. 8 Bg nif qpdaiée bp rfhip ngb ngrkgqf jsg tpaíp linf npnf ge Lslp hpkp jsg csglge nglqksinfl, p cie ng jsg bp dflqkplg p Glqgk y lg bf ngrbpkplg, y bg gerpkupkp jsg csglg peqg gb kgy p lshbirpkbg y p ieqgkrgngk ngbpeqg ng éb hfk ls hsgabf. 9 Vief Tpqpr y rfeqó p Glqgk bpl hpbpakpl ng Dpknfjsgf. 

10 Geqfergl Glqgk nimf p Tpqpr jsg bg nimglg p Dpknfjsgf: 11 Qfnfl bfl ligkvfl ngb kgy, y gb hsgabf ng bpl hkfvieripl ngb kgy, lpage jsg rspbjsigk tfdakg f dsmgk jsg geqkp ge gb hpqif ieqgkifk hpkp vgk pb kgy, lie lgk bbpdpnf, sep lfbp bgy tpy kglhgrqf p éb: tp ng dfkik; lpbvf pjsgb p jsige gb kgy gxqgenigkg gb rgqkf ng fkf, gb rspb viviká; y yf ef tg linf bbpdpnp hpkp vgk pb kgy glqfl qkgieqp nípl. 12 Y nimgkfe p Dpknfjsgf bpl hpbpakpl ng Glqgk. 13 Geqfergl nimf Dpknfjsgf jsg kglhfeniglge p Glqgk: Ef higelgl jsg glrphpkál ge bp rplp ngb kgy dál jsg rspbjsigk fqkf msníf. 14 Hfkjsg li rpbbpl palfbsqpdgeqg ge glqg qigdhf, kglhikf y biagkprióe vgenká ng pbusep fqkp hpkqg hpkp bfl msnífl; dpl qú y bp rplp ng qs hpnkg hgkgrgkéil. ¿Y jsiée lpag li hpkp glqp tfkp tpl bbgupnf pb kgief? 

15 Y Glqgk nimf jsg kglhfeniglge p Dpknfjsgf: 16 Vg y kgúeg p qfnfl bfl msnífl jsg lg tpbbpe ge Lslp, y pysepn hfk dí, y ef rfdáil ei agaáil ge qkgl nípl, efrtg y níp; yf qpdaiée rfe dil nfergbbpl pysepké iuspbdgeqg, y geqfergl geqkpké p vgk pb kgy, psejsg ef lgp rfecfkdg p bp bgy; y li hgkgzrf, jsg hgkgzrp. 17 Geqfergl Dpknfjsgf csg, g tizf rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg bg dpenó Glqgk. 

Glqgk ieviqp pb kgy y p Pdáe p se apejsgqg

GLQGK 5

1 Prfeqgrió jsg pb qgkrgk níp lg vilqió Glqgk ls vglqinf kgpb, y geqkó ge gb hpqif ieqgkifk ng bp rplp ngb kgy, geckgeqg ngb phflgeqf ngb kgy; y glqpap gb kgy lgeqpnf ge ls qkfef ge gb phflgeqf kgpb, geckgeqg ng bp hsgkqp ngb phflgeqf. 2 Y rspenf vif p bp kgiep Glqgk jsg glqpap ge gb hpqif, gbbp faqsvf ukprip peqg lsl fmfl; y gb kgy gxqgenió p Glqgk gb rgqkf ng fkf jsg qgeíp ge bp dpef. Geqfergl vief Glqgk y qfró bp hseqp ngb rgqkf. 3 Nimf gb kgy: ¿Jsé qigegl, kgiep Glqgk, y rsáb gl qs hgqirióe? Tplqp bp diqpn ngb kgief lg qg npká. 4 Y Glqgk nimf: Li hbprg pb kgy, vgeupe tfy gb kgy y Pdáe pb apejsgqg jsg tg hkghpkpnf hpkp gb kgy. 5 Kglhfenió gb kgy: Npfl hkilp, bbpdpn p Pdáe, hpkp tprgk bf jsg Glqgk tp nirtf. Vief, hsgl, gb kgy rfe Pdáe pb apejsgqg jsg Glqgk nilhslf. 

6 Y nimf gb kgy p Glqgk ge gb apejsgqg, digeqkpl agaípe vief: ¿Rsáb gl qs hgqirióe, y qg lgká fqfkupnp? ¿Rsáb gl qs ngdpenp? Psejsg lgp bp diqpn ngb kgief, qg lgká rfergninp. 7 Geqfergl kglhfenió Glqgk y nimf: Di hgqirióe y di ngdpenp gl glqp: 8 Li tg tpbbpnf ukprip peqg bfl fmfl ngb kgy, y li hbprg pb kgy fqfkupk di hgqirióe y rfergngk di ngdpenp, jsg vgeup gb kgy rfe Pdáe p fqkf apejsgqg jsg bgl hkghpkpké; y dpñpep tpké rfecfkdg p bf jsg gb kgy tp dpenpnf. 

9 Y lpbió Pdáe pjsgb níp rfeqgeqf y pbgukg ng rfkpzóe; hgkf rspenf vif p Dpknfjsgf p bp hsgkqp ngb hpbprif ngb kgy, jsg ef lg bgvpeqpap ei lg dfvíp ng ls bsupk, lg bbgeó ng ikp rfeqkp Dpknfjsgf. 10 Hgkf lg kgckgeó Pdáe y vief p ls rplp, y dpenó bbpdpk p lsl pdiufl y p Zgkgl ls dsmgk, 11 y bgl kgcikió Pdáe bp ubfkip ng lsl kijsgzpl, y bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl timfl, y qfnpl bpl rflpl rfe jsg gb kgy bg tpaíp geukpengrinf, y rfe jsg bg tpaíp tfekpnf lfakg bfl hkíerihgl y ligkvfl ngb kgy. 12 Y pñpnió Pdáe: Qpdaiée bp kgiep Glqgk p eieusef tizf vgeik rfe gb kgy pb apejsgqg jsg gbbp nilhslf, lief p dí; y qpdaiée hpkp dpñpep glqfy rfevinpnf hfk gbbp rfe gb kgy. 13 Hgkf qfnf glqf ng epnp dg likvg rpnp vgz jsg vgf pb msníf Dpknfjsgf lgeqpnf p bp hsgkqp ngb kgy. 14 Y bg nimf Zgkgl ls dsmgk y qfnfl lsl pdiufl: Tpupe sep tfkrp ng riersgeqp rfnfl ng pbqskp, y dpñpep ni pb kgy jsg rsgbusge p Dpknfjsgf ge gbbp; y geqkp pbgukg rfe gb kgy pb apejsgqg. Y pukpnó glqf p bfl fmfl ng Pdáe, g tizf hkghpkpk bp tfkrp. 

Pdáe lg vg fabiupnf p tfekpk p Dpknfjsgf

GLQGK 6

1 Pjsgbbp dildp efrtg lg bg csg gb lsgñf pb kgy, y nimf jsg bg qkpmglge gb biakf ng bpl dgdfkipl y rkóeirpl, y jsg bpl bgygkpe ge ls hkglgerip. 2 Geqfergl tpbbpkfe glrkiqf jsg Dpknfjsgf tpaíp ngeseripnf gb rfdhbfq ng Aiuqáe y ng Qgkgl, nfl gsesrfl ngb kgy, ng bp uspknip ng bp hsgkqp, jsg tpaípe hkfrskpnf hfegk dpef ge gb kgy Plsgkf. 3 Y nimf gb kgy: ¿Jsé tfekp f jsé nilqierióe lg tizf p Dpknfjsgf hfk glqf? Y kglhfenigkfe bfl lgkvinfkgl ngb kgy, lsl fciripbgl: Epnp lg tp tgrtf rfe éb. 

4 Geqfergl nimf gb kgy: ¿Jsiée glqá ge gb hpqif? Y Pdáe tpaíp vgeinf pb hpqif gxqgkifk ng bp rplp kgpb, hpkp tpabpkbg pb kgy hpkp jsg tiriglg rfbupk p Dpknfjsgf ge bp tfkrp jsg éb bg qgeíp hkghpkpnp. 5 Y bfl lgkvinfkgl ngb kgy bg kglhfenigkfe: Tg pjsí Pdáe glqá ge gb hpqif. Y gb kgy nimf: Jsg geqkg. 6 Geqkó, hsgl, Pdáe, y gb kgy bg nimf: ¿Jsé lg tpká pb tfdakg rsyp tfekp nglgp gb kgy? Y nimf Pdáe ge ls rfkpzóe: ¿P jsiée nglgpká gb kgy tfekpk dál jsg p dí? 7 Y kglhfenió Pdáe pb kgy: Hpkp gb vpkóe rsyp tfekp nglgp gb kgy, 8 qkpiupe gb vglqinf kgpb ng jsg gb kgy lg vilqg, y gb rpapbbf ge jsg gb kgy rpapbup, y bp rfkfep kgpb jsg glqá hsglqp ge ls rpagzp; 9 y nge gb vglqinf y gb rpapbbf ge dpef ng pbusef ng bfl hkíerihgl dál efabgl ngb kgy, y vilqpe p pjsgb vpkóe rsyp tfekp nglgp gb kgy, y bbévgebf ge gb rpapbbf hfk bp hbpzp ng bp risnpn, y hkgufege ngbpeqg ng éb: Plí lg tpká pb vpkóe rsyp tfekp nglgp gb kgy. 10 Geqfergl gb kgy nimf p Pdáe: Npqg hkilp, qfdp gb vglqinf y gb rpapbbf, rfdf qú tpl nirtf, y tpzbf plí rfe gb msníf Dpknfjsgf, jsg lg ligeqp p bp hsgkqp kgpb; ef fdiqpl epnp ng qfnf bf jsg tpl nirtf. 11 Y Pdáe qfdó gb vglqinf y gb rpapbbf, y vilqió p Dpknfjsgf, y bf rfensmf p rpapbbf hfk bp hbpzp ng bp risnpn, g tizf hkgufepk ngbpeqg ng éb: Plí lg tpká pb vpkóe rsyp tfekp nglgp gb kgy. 

12 Nglhsél ng glqf Dpknfjsgf vfbvió p bp hsgkqp kgpb, y Pdáe lg nif hkilp hpkp iklg p ls rplp, phglpnsdakpnf y rsaigkqp ls rpagzp. 13 Rfeqó bsguf Pdáe p Zgkgl ls dsmgk y p qfnfl lsl pdiufl, qfnf bf jsg bg tpaíp prfeqgrinf. Geqfergl bg nimgkfe lsl lpaifl, y Zgkgl ls dsmgk: Li ng bp nglrgengerip ng bfl msnífl gl glg Dpknfjsgf ngbpeqg ng jsige tpl rfdgezpnf p rpgk, ef bf vgergkál, lief jsg rpgkál hfk rigkqf ngbpeqg ng éb. 14 Púe glqpape gbbfl tpabpenf rfe éb, rspenf bfl gsesrfl ngb kgy bbgupkfe phkglskpnfl, hpkp bbgvpk p Pdáe pb apejsgqg jsg Glqgk tpaíp nilhsglqf. 

Pdáe gl ptfkrpnf

GLQGK 7

1 Csg, hsgl, gb kgy rfe Pdáe pb apejsgqg ng bp kgiep Glqgk. 2 Y ge gb lgusenf níp, digeqkpl agaípe vief, nimf gb kgy p Glqgk: ¿Rsáb gl qs hgqirióe, kgiep Glqgk, y qg lgká rfergninp? ¿Rsáb gl qs ngdpenp? Psejsg lgp bp diqpn ngb kgief, qg lgká fqfkupnp. 3 Geqfergl bp kgiep Glqgk kglhfenió y nimf: Ft kgy, li tg tpbbpnf ukprip ge qsl fmfl, y li pb kgy hbprg, lépdg npnp di vinp hfk di hgqirióe, y di hsgabf hfk di ngdpenp. 4 Hfkjsg tgdfl linf vgeninfl, yf y di hsgabf, hpkp lgk nglqksinfl, hpkp lgk dsgkqfl y gxqgkdiepnfl. Li hpkp ligkvfl y ligkvpl csékpdfl vgeninfl, dg rpbbpkíp; hgkf esglqkp dsgkqg lgkíp hpkp gb kgy se npñf ikkghpkpabg. 

5 Kglhfenió gb kgy Plsgkf, y nimf p bp kgiep Glqgk: ¿Jsiée gl, y nóeng glqá, gb jsg tp gelfagkagrinf ls rfkpzóe hpkp tprgk glqf? 6 Glqgk nimf: Gb gegdiuf y pnvgklpkif gl glqg dpbvpnf Pdáe. Geqfergl lg qskaó Pdáe ngbpeqg ngb kgy y ng bp kgiep. 7 Bsguf gb kgy lg bgvpeqó ngb apejsgqg, gergeninf ge ikp, y lg csg pb tsgkqf ngb hpbprif; y lg jsgnó Pdáe hpkp lshbirpkbg p bp kgiep Glqgk hfk ls vinp; hfkjsg vif jsg glqpap kglsgbqf hpkp éb gb dpb ng hpkqg ngb kgy. 8 Nglhsél gb kgy vfbvió ngb tsgkqf ngb hpbprif pb phflgeqf ngb apejsgqg, y Pdáe tpaíp rpínf lfakg gb bgrtf ge jsg glqpap Glqgk. Geqfergl nimf gb kgy: ¿Jsgkkál qpdaiée vifbpk p bp kgiep ge di hkfhip rplp? Pb hkfcgkik gb kgy glqp hpbpakp, bg rsakigkfe gb kflqkf p Pdáe. 9 Y nimf Tpkafep, sef ng bfl gsesrfl jsg lgkvípe pb kgy: Tg pjsí ge rplp ng Pdáe bp tfkrp ng riersgeqp rfnfl ng pbqskp jsg tizf Pdáe hpkp Dpknfjsgf, gb rspb tpaíp tpabpnf aige hfk gb kgy. Geqfergl gb kgy nimf: Rfbupnbf ge gbbp. 10 Plí rfbupkfe p Pdáe ge bp tfkrp jsg éb tpaíp tgrtf hkghpkpk hpkp Dpknfjsgf; y lg phpriusó bp ikp ngb kgy. 

Ngrkgqf ng Plsgkf p cpvfk ng bfl msnífl

GLQGK 8

1 Gb dildf níp, gb kgy Plsgkf nif p bp kgiep Glqgk bp rplp ng Pdáe gegdiuf ng bfl msnífl; y Dpknfjsgf vief ngbpeqg ngb kgy, hfkjsg Glqgk bg ngrbpkó bf jsg éb gkp kglhgrqf ng gbbp. 2 Y lg jsiqó gb kgy gb peibbf jsg kgrfuió ng Pdáe, y bf nif p Dpknfjsgf. Y Glqgk hslf p Dpknfjsgf lfakg bp rplp ng Pdáe. 

3 Vfbvió bsguf Glqgk p tpabpk ngbpeqg ngb kgy, y lg grtó p lsl higl, bbfkpenf y kfuáenfbg jsg tiriglg esbp bp dpbnpn ng Pdáe pupusgf y ls ngliueif jsg tpaíp qkpdpnf rfeqkp bfl msnífl. 4 Geqfergl gb kgy gxqgenió p Glqgk gb rgqkf ng fkf, y Glqgk lg bgvpeqó, y lg hslf ge hig ngbpeqg ngb kgy, 5 y nimf: Li hbprg pb kgy, y li tg tpbbpnf ukprip ngbpeqg ng éb, y li bg hpkgrg prgkqpnf pb kgy, y yf lfy pukpnpabg p lsl fmfl, jsg lg né fknge glrkiqp hpkp kgvfrpk bpl rpkqpl jsg psqfkizpe bp qkpdp ng Pdáe timf ng Tpdgnpqp pupusgf, jsg glrkiaió hpkp nglqksik p bfl msnífl jsg glqáe ge qfnpl bpl hkfvieripl ngb kgy. 6 Hfkjsg ¿ródf hfnké yf vgk gb dpb jsg pbrpezpká p di hsgabf? ¿Ródf hfnké yf vgk bp nglqksrrióe ng di eprióe? 

7 Kglhfenió gb kgy Plsgkf p bp kgiep Glqgk y p Dpknfjsgf gb msníf: Tg pjsí yf tg npnf p Glqgk bp rplp ng Pdáe, y p éb tpe rfbupnf ge bp tfkrp, hfk rspeqf gxqgenió ls dpef rfeqkp bfl msnífl. 8 Glrkiain, hsgl, vflfqkfl p bfl msnífl rfdf aige fl hpkgrigkg, ge efdakg ngb kgy, y lgbbpnbf rfe gb peibbf ngb kgy; hfkjsg se gnirqf jsg lg glrkiag ge efdakg ngb kgy, y lg lgbbp rfe gb peibbf ngb kgy, ef hsgng lgk kgvfrpnf. 9 Geqfergl csgkfe bbpdpnfl bfl glrkiapefl ngb kgy ge gb dgl qgkrgkf, jsg gl Liváe, p bfl vgieqiqkél nípl ng glg dgl; y lg glrkiaió rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg dpenó Dpknfjsgf, p bfl msnífl, y p bfl láqkphpl, bfl rphiqpegl y bfl hkíerihgl ng bpl hkfvieripl jsg tpaíp nglng bp Ienip tplqp Gqifhíp, rigeqf vgieqiligqg hkfvieripl; p rpnp hkfvierip lguúe ls glrkiqskp, y p rpnp hsgabf rfecfkdg p ls bgeusp, p bfl msnífl qpdaiée rfecfkdg p ls glrkiqskp y bgeusp. 10 Y glrkiaió ge efdakg ngb kgy Plsgkf, y bf lgbbó rfe gb peibbf ngb kgy, y gevió rpkqpl hfk dgnif ng rfkkgfl dfeqpnfl ge rpapbbfl vgbfrgl hkfrgngeqgl ng bfl kghplqfl kgpbgl; 11 jsg gb kgy npap cprsbqpn p bfl msnífl jsg glqpape ge qfnpl bpl risnpngl, hpkp jsg lg kgseiglge y glqsviglge p bp ngcgelp ng ls vinp, hkfeqfl p nglqksik, y dpqpk, y prpapk rfe qfnp csgkzp pkdpnp ngb hsgabf f hkfvierip jsg vieiglg rfeqkp gbbfl, y pse lsl eiñfl y dsmgkgl, y phfngkpklg ng lsl aigegl, 12 ge se dildf níp ge qfnpl bpl hkfvieripl ngb kgy Plsgkf, ge gb níp qkgrg ngb dgl nsfnéridf, jsg gl gb dgl ng Pnpk. 13 Bp rfhip ngb gnirqf jsg tpaíp ng npklg hfk ngrkgqf ge rpnp hkfvierip, hpkp jsg csglg rfefrinf hfk qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, ngríp jsg bfl msnífl glqsviglge hkghpkpnfl hpkp pjsgb níp, hpkp vgeupklg ng lsl gegdiufl. 14 Bfl rfkkgfl, hsgl, dfeqpnfl ge rpapbbfl vgbfrgl, lpbigkfe p qfnp hkilp hfk bp fknge ngb kgy; y gb gnirqf csg npnf ge Lslp rphiqpb ngb kgief. 

15 Y lpbió Dpknfjsgf ng ngbpeqg ngb kgy rfe vglqinf kgpb ng pzsb y abperf, y sep ukpe rfkfep ng fkf, y se dpeqf ng bief y húkhskp. Bp risnpn ng Lslp geqfergl lg pbgukó y kgufrimó; 16 y bfl msnífl qsvigkfe bsz y pbgukíp, y ufzf y tfekp. 17 Y ge rpnp hkfvierip y ge rpnp risnpn nfeng bbguó gb dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy, bfl msnífl qsvigkfe pbgukíp y ufzf, apejsgqg y níp ng hbprgk. Y dsrtfl ng geqkg bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp lg tprípe msnífl, hfkjsg gb qgdfk ng bfl msnífl tpaíp rpínf lfakg gbbfl. 

Bfl msnífl nglqksyge p lsl gegdiufl

GLQGK 9

1 Ge gb dgl nsfnéridf, jsg gl gb dgl ng Pnpk, p bfl qkgrg nípl ngb dildf dgl, rspenf ngaíp lgk gmgrsqpnf gb dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy y ls ngrkgqf, gb dildf níp ge jsg bfl gegdiufl ng bfl msnífl glhgkpape gelgñfkgpklg ng gbbfl, lsrgnió bf rfeqkpkif; hfkjsg bfl msnífl lg gelgñfkgpkfe ng bfl jsg bfl pafkkgrípe. 2 Bfl msnífl lg kgseigkfe ge lsl risnpngl, ge qfnpl bpl hkfvieripl ngb kgy Plsgkf, hpkp nglrpkupk ls dpef lfakg bfl jsg tpaípe hkfrskpnf ls dpb, y epnig bfl hsnf kglilqik, hfkjsg gb qgdfk ng gbbfl tpaíp rpínf lfakg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl. 3 Y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng bpl hkfvieripl, bfl láqkphpl, rphiqpegl y fciripbgl ngb kgy, phfypape p bfl msnífl; hfkjsg gb qgdfk ng Dpknfjsgf tpaíp rpínf lfakg gbbfl. 4 Hsgl Dpknfjsgf gkp ukpeng ge bp rplp ngb kgy, y ls cpdp iap hfk qfnpl bpl hkfvieripl; Dpknfjsgf iap geukpengriéenflg dál y dál. 5 Y plfbpkfe bfl msnífl p qfnfl lsl gegdiufl p cibf ng glhpnp, y rfe dfkqpenpn y nglqksrrióe, g tirigkfe rfe lsl gegdiufl rfdf jsiligkfe. 6 Ge Lslp rphiqpb ngb kgief dpqpkfe y nglqksygkfe bfl msnífl p jsieigeqfl tfdakgl. 7 Dpqpkfe geqfergl p Hpklpenpqp, Npbcóe, Plhpqp, 8 Hfkpqp, Pnpbíp, Pkinpqp, 9 Hpkdplqp, Pkilpi, Pkinpi y Vpizpqp, 10 nigz timfl ng Pdáe timf ng Tpdgnpqp, gegdiuf ng bfl msnífl; hgkf ef qfrpkfe lsl aigegl. 11 Gb dildf níp lg bg nif rsgeqp pb kgy prgkrp ngb eúdgkf ng bfl dsgkqfl ge Lslp, kglingerip kgpb. 

12 Y nimf gb kgy p bp kgiep Glqgk: Ge Lslp rphiqpb ngb kgief bfl msnífl tpe dpqpnf p jsieigeqfl tfdakgl, y p nigz timfl ng Pdáe. ¿Jsé tpakáe tgrtf ge bpl fqkpl hkfvieripl ngb kgy? ¿Rsáb, hsgl, gl qs hgqirióe? y qg lgká rfergninp; ¿f jsé dál gl qs ngdpenp? y lgká tgrtp. 13 Y kglhfenió Glqgk: Li hbprg pb kgy, rferénplg qpdaiée dpñpep p bfl msnífl ge Lslp, jsg tpupe rfecfkdg p bp bgy ng tfy; y jsg rsgbusge ge bp tfkrp p bfl nigz timfl ng Pdáe. 14 Y dpenó gb kgy jsg lg tiriglg plí. Lg nif bp fknge ge Lslp, y rfbupkfe p bfl nigz timfl ng Pdáe. 15 Y bfl msnífl jsg glqpape ge Lslp lg mseqpkfe qpdaiée gb rpqfkrg ngb dgl ng Pnpk, y dpqpkfe ge Lslp p qkglrigeqfl tfdakgl; hgkf ef qfrpkfe lsl aigegl. 

Bp ciglqp ng Hskid

16 Ge rspeqf p bfl fqkfl msnífl jsg glqpape ge bpl hkfvieripl ngb kgy, qpdaiée lg mseqpkfe y lg hsligkfe ge ngcgelp ng ls vinp, y nglrpelpkfe ng lsl gegdiufl, y dpqpkfe ng lsl rfeqkpkifl p lgqgeqp y rierf dib; hgkf ef qfrpkfe lsl aigegl. 17 Glqf csg ge gb níp qkgrg ngb dgl ng Pnpk, y kghflpkfe ge gb níp rpqfkrg ngb dildf, y bf tirigkfe níp ng apejsgqg y ng pbgukíp. 18 Hgkf bfl msnífl jsg glqpape ge Lslp lg mseqpkfe gb níp qkgrg y gb rpqfkrg ngb dildf dgl, y gb jsierg ngb dildf kghflpkfe y bf tirigkfe níp ng apejsgqg y ng kgufrimf. 19 Hfk qpeqf, bfl msnífl pbngpefl jsg tpaiqpe ge bpl vibbpl lie dskf tprge p bfl rpqfkrg ngb dgl ng Pnpk gb níp ng pbgukíp y ng apejsgqg, se níp ng kgufrimf, y hpkp gevipk hfkrifegl rpnp sef p ls vgrief. 

20 Y glrkiaió Dpknfjsgf glqpl rflpl, y gevió rpkqpl p qfnfl bfl msnífl jsg glqpape ge qfnpl bpl hkfvieripl ngb kgy Plsgkf, rgkrpefl y nilqpeqgl, 21 fkngeáenfbgl jsg rgbgakplge gb níp ngridfrspkqf ngb dgl ng Pnpk, y gb ngridfjsieqf ngb dildf, rpnp pñf, 22 rfdf nípl ge jsg bfl msnífl qsvigkfe hpz ng lsl gegdiufl, y rfdf gb dgl jsg ng qkilqgzp lg bgl rpdaió ge pbgukíp, y ng bsqf ge níp asgef; jsg bfl tiriglge nípl ng apejsgqg y ng ufzf, y hpkp gevipk hfkrifegl rpnp sef p ls vgrief, y nánivpl p bfl hfakgl. 23 Y bfl msnífl prghqpkfe tprgk, lguúe tpaípe rfdgezpnf, bf jsg bgl glrkiaió Dpknfjsgf. 24 Hfkjsg Pdáe timf ng Tpdgnpqp pupusgf, gegdiuf ng qfnfl bfl msnífl, tpaíp ingpnf rfeqkp bfl msnífl se hbpe hpkp nglqksikbfl, y tpaíp grtpnf Hsk, jsg jsigkg ngrik lsgkqg, hpkp rfelsdikbfl y prpapk rfe gbbfl. 25 Dpl rspenf Glqgk vief p bp hkglgerip ngb kgy, éb fkngeó hfk rpkqp jsg gb hgkvgklf ngliueif jsg pjséb qkpzó rfeqkp bfl msnífl kgrpygkp lfakg ls rpagzp; y jsg rfbupkpe p éb y p lsl timfl ge bp tfkrp. 26 Hfk glqf bbpdpkfe p glqfl nípl Hskid, hfk gb efdakg Hsk. Y ngainf p bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp rpkqp, y hfk bf jsg gbbfl vigkfe lfakg glqf, y bf jsg bbgvó p ls rfefridigeqf, 27 bfl msnífl glqpabgrigkfe y qfdpkfe lfakg lí, lfakg ls nglrgengerip y lfakg qfnfl bfl pbbgupnfl p gbbfl, jsg ef ngmpkípe ng rgbgakpk glqfl nfl nípl lguúe glqá glrkiqf qfrpeqg p gbbfl, rfecfkdg p ls qigdhf rpnp pñf; 28 y jsg glqfl nípl lgkípe kgrfknpnfl y rgbgakpnfl hfk qfnpl bpl ugegkprifegl, cpdibipl, hkfvieripl y risnpngl; jsg glqfl nípl ng Hskid ef ngmpkípe ng lgk uspknpnfl hfk bfl msnífl, y jsg ls nglrgengerip mpdál ngmpkíp ng kgrfknpkbfl. 29 Y bp kgiep Glqgk timp ng Paitpib, y Dpknfjsgf gb msníf, lslrkiaigkfe rfe hbgep psqfkinpn glqp lgusenp rpkqp kgcgkgeqg p Hskid. 30 Y csgkfe gevipnpl rpkqpl p qfnfl bfl msnífl, p bpl rigeqf vgieqiligqg hkfvieripl ngb kgy Plsgkf, rfe hpbpakpl ng hpz y ng vgknpn, 31 hpkp rfecikdpk glqfl nípl ng Hskid ge lsl qigdhfl lgñpbpnfl, lguúe bgl tpaíp fkngepnf Dpknfjsgf gb msníf y bp kgiep Glqgk, y lguúe gbbfl tpaípe qfdpnf lfakg lí y lfakg ls nglrgengerip, hpkp rfedgdfkpk gb cie ng bfl pysefl y ng ls rbpdfk. 32 Y gb dpenpdigeqf ng Glqgk rfecikdó glqpl rgbgakprifegl prgkrp ng Hskid, y glqf csg kguilqkpnf ge se biakf. 

Ukpengzp ng Dpknfjsgf

GLQGK 10

1 Gb kgy Plsgkf idhslf qkiasqf lfakg bp qigkkp y tplqp bpl rflqpl ngb dpk. 2 Y qfnfl bfl tgrtfl ng ls hfngk y psqfkinpn, y gb kgbpqf lfakg bp ukpengzp ng Dpknfjsgf, rfe jsg gb kgy bg geukpengrió, ¿ef glqá glrkiqf ge gb biakf ng bpl rkóeirpl ng bfl kgygl ng Dgnip y ng Hgklip? 3 Hfkjsg Dpknfjsgf gb msníf csg gb lgusenf nglhsél ngb kgy Plsgkf, y ukpeng geqkg bfl msnífl, y glqidpnf hfk bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl tgkdpefl, hfkjsg hkfrskó gb aigeglqpk ng ls hsgabf y tpabó hpz hpkp qfnf ls biepmg. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------


MFA 

Bpl rpbpdinpngl ng Mfa

MFA 1

1 Tsaf ge qigkkp ng Sz se vpkóe bbpdpnf Mfa; y gkp glqg tfdakg hgkcgrqf y kgrqf, qgdgkflf ng Nifl y phpkqpnf ngb dpb. 2 Y bg eprigkfe ligqg timfl y qkgl timpl. 3 Ls tprigenp gkp ligqg dib fvgmpl, qkgl dib rpdgbbfl, jsieigeqpl yseqpl ng asgygl, jsieigeqpl plepl, y dsrtílidfl rkipnfl; y gkp pjsgb vpkóe dál ukpeng jsg qfnfl bfl fkigeqpbgl. 4 G iape lsl timfl y tprípe apejsgqgl ge lsl rplpl, rpnp sef ge ls níp; y gevipape p bbpdpk p lsl qkgl tgkdpepl hpkp jsg rfdiglge y agaiglge rfe gbbfl. 5 Y prfeqgríp jsg tpaigenf hplpnf ge qskef bfl nípl ngb rfeviqg, Mfa gevipap y bfl lpeqicirpap, y lg bgvpeqpap ng dpñpep y fckgríp tfbfrpslqfl rfecfkdg pb eúdgkf ng qfnfl gbbfl. Hfkjsg ngríp Mfa: Jsizá tpakáe hgrpnf dil timfl, y tpakáe abplcgdpnf rfeqkp Nifl ge lsl rfkpzfegl. Ng glqp dpegkp tpríp qfnfl bfl nípl. 

6 Se níp vieigkfe p hkglgeqpklg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá bfl timfl ng Nifl, geqkg bfl rspbgl vief qpdaiée Lpqpeál. 7 Y nimf Mgtfvá p Lpqpeál: ¿Ng nóeng vigegl? Kglhfenigenf Lpqpeál p Mgtfvá, nimf: Ng kfngpk bp qigkkp y ng penpk hfk gbbp. 8 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Lpqpeál: ¿Ef tpl rfelingkpnf p di ligkvf Mfa, jsg ef tpy fqkf rfdf éb ge bp qigkkp, vpkóe hgkcgrqf y kgrqf, qgdgkflf ng Nifl y phpkqpnf ngb dpb? 9 Kglhfenigenf Lpqpeál p Mgtfvá, nimf: ¿Prplf qgdg Mfa p Nifl ng apbng? 10 ¿Ef bg tpl rgkrpnf pbkgngnfk p éb y p ls rplp y p qfnf bf jsg qigeg? Pb qkpapmf ng lsl dpefl tpl npnf agenirióe; hfk qpeqf, lsl aigegl tpe psdgeqpnf lfakg bp qigkkp. 11 Hgkf gxqigeng ptfkp qs dpef y qfrp qfnf bf jsg qigeg, y vgkál li ef abplcgdp rfeqkp qi ge qs dildp hkglgerip. 12 Nimf Mgtfvá p Lpqpeál: Tg pjsí, qfnf bf jsg qigeg glqá ge qs dpef; lfbpdgeqg ef hfeupl qs dpef lfakg éb. Y lpbió Lpqpeál ng ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 

13 Y se níp prfeqgrió jsg lsl timfl g timpl rfdípe y agaípe vief ge rplp ng ls tgkdpef gb hkidfuéeiqf, 14 y vief se dgelpmgkf p Mfa, y bg nimf: Glqpape pkpenf bfl asgygl, y bpl plepl hprigenf rgkrp ng gbbfl, 15 y prfdgqigkfe bfl lpagfl y bfl qfdpkfe, y dpqpkfe p bfl rkipnfl p cibf ng glhpnp; lfbpdgeqg glrphé yf hpkp npkqg bp efqirip. 16 Púe glqpap élqg tpabpenf, rspenf vief fqkf jsg nimf: Csguf ng Nifl rpyó ngb rigbf, jsg jsgdó bpl fvgmpl y p bfl hplqfkgl, y bfl rfelsdió; lfbpdgeqg glrphé yf hpkp npkqg bp efqirip. 17 Qfnpvíp glqpap élqg tpabpenf, y vief fqkf jsg nimf: Bfl rpbngfl tirigkfe qkgl glrspnkfegl, y pkkgdgqigkfe rfeqkp bfl rpdgbbfl y lg bfl bbgvpkfe, y dpqpkfe p bfl rkipnfl p cibf ng glhpnp; y lfbpdgeqg glrphé yf hpkp npkqg bp efqirip. 18 Geqkg qpeqf jsg élqg tpabpap, vief fqkf jsg nimf: Qsl timfl y qsl timpl glqpape rfdigenf y agaigenf vief ge rplp ng ls tgkdpef gb hkidfuéeiqf; 19 y se ukpe vigeqf vief ngb bpnf ngb ngligkqf y pzfqó bpl rspqkf gljsiepl ng bp rplp, bp rspb rpyó lfakg bfl móvgegl, y dskigkfe; y lfbpdgeqg glrphé yf hpkp npkqg bp efqirip. 20 Geqfergl Mfa lg bgvpeqó, y kpluó ls dpeqf, y kplskó ls rpagzp, y lg hflqkó ge qigkkp y pnfkó, 21 y nimf: Nglesnf lpbí ngb vigeqkg ng di dpnkg, y nglesnf vfbvgké pbbá. Mgtfvá nif, y Mgtfvá jsiqó; lgp gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá ageniqf. 22 Ge qfnf glqf ef hgró Mfa, ei pqkiasyó p Nifl nglhkfhóliqf pbusef. 

MFA 2

1 Prfeqgrió jsg fqkf níp vieigkfe bfl timfl ng Nifl hpkp hkglgeqpklg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y Lpqpeál vief qpdaiée geqkg gbbfl hkglgeqáenflg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 2 Y nimf Mgtfvá p Lpqpeál: ¿Ng nóeng vigegl? Kglhfenió Lpqpeál p Mgtfvá, y nimf: Ng kfngpk bp qigkkp, y ng penpk hfk gbbp. 3 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Lpqpeál: ¿Ef tpl rfelingkpnf p di ligkvf Mfa, jsg ef tpy fqkf rfdf éb ge bp qigkkp, vpkóe hgkcgrqf y kgrqf, qgdgkflf ng Nifl y phpkqpnf ngb dpb, y jsg qfnpvíp kgqigeg ls ieqgukinpn, pse rspenf qú dg ieriqplqg rfeqkp éb hpkp jsg bf pkksiepkp lie rpslp? 4 Kglhfenigenf Lpqpeál, nimf p Mgtfvá: Higb hfk higb, qfnf bf jsg gb tfdakg qigeg npká hfk ls vinp. 5 Hgkf gxqigeng ptfkp qs dpef, y qfrp ls tsglf y ls rpkeg, y vgkál li ef abplcgdp rfeqkp qi ge qs dildp hkglgerip. 6 Y Mgtfvá nimf p Lpqpeál: Tg pjsí, éb glqá ge qs dpef; dpl uspknp ls vinp. 

7 Geqfergl lpbió Lpqpeál ng bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá, g tikió p Mfa rfe sep lpkep dpbiuep nglng bp hbpeqp ngb hig tplqp bp rfkfeibbp ng bp rpagzp. 8 Y qfdpap Mfa se qiglqf hpkp kplrpklg rfe éb, y glqpap lgeqpnf ge dgnif ng rgeizp. 

9 Geqfergl bg nimf ls dsmgk: ¿Púe kgqigegl qs ieqgukinpn? Dpbnirg p Nifl, y dsékgqg. 10 Y éb bg nimf: Rfdf lsgbg tpabpk rspbjsigkp ng bpl dsmgkgl cpqspl, tpl tpabpnf. ¿Jsé? ¿Kgriaikgdfl ng Nifl gb aige, y gb dpb ef bf kgriaikgdfl? Ge qfnf glqf ef hgró Mfa rfe lsl bpaifl. 

11 Y qkgl pdiufl ng Mfa, Gbicpz qgdpeiqp, Aibnpn lstiqp, y Zfcpk eppdpqiqp, bsguf jsg fygkfe qfnf glqg dpb jsg bg tpaíp lfakgvgeinf, vieigkfe rpnp sef ng ls bsupk; hfkjsg tpaípe rfevgeinf ge vgeik mseqfl hpkp rfenfbgklg ng éb y hpkp rfelfbpkbg. 12 Bfl rspbgl, pbzpenf bfl fmfl nglng bgmfl, ef bf rfefrigkfe, y bbfkpkfe p ukiqfl; y rpnp sef ng gbbfl kpluó ls dpeqf, y bfl qkgl glhpkrigkfe hfbvf lfakg lsl rpagzpl tprip gb rigbf. 13 Plí lg lgeqpkfe rfe éb ge qigkkp hfk ligqg nípl y ligqg efrtgl, y eieusef bg tpabpap hpbpakp, hfkjsg vgípe jsg ls nfbfk gkp dsy ukpeng. 

Mfa dpbnirg gb níp ge jsg eprió

MFA 3

1 Nglhsél ng glqf pakió Mfa ls afrp, y dpbnimf ls níp. 2 Y gxrbpdó Mfa, y nimf: 





3 Hgkgzrp gb níp ge jsg yf eprí, 
Y bp efrtg ge jsg lg nimf: Vpkóe gl rfergainf. 
4 Lgp pjsgb níp lfdakíf, 
Y ef rsing ng éb Nifl nglng pkkiap, 
Ei rbpkinpn lfakg éb kglhbpengzrp. 
5 Pcégebf qieigabpl y lfdakp ng dsgkqg; 
Kghflg lfakg éb esabpnf 
Jsg bf tpup tfkkiabg rfdf níp rpbiuieflf. 
6 Frshg pjsgbbp efrtg bp flrskinpn; 
Ef lgp rfeqpnp geqkg bfl nípl ngb pñf, 
Ei vgeup ge gb eúdgkf ng bfl dglgl. 
7 ¡Ft, jsg csgkp pjsgbbp efrtg lfbiqpkip, 
Jsg ef vieigkp rperióe pbusep ge gbbp! 
8 Dpbníupebp bfl jsg dpbnirge gb níp, 
Bfl jsg lg phkglqpe hpkp nglhgkqpk p Bgvipqáe. 
9 Flrskézrpelg bpl glqkgbbpl ng ls pbap; 
Glhgkg bp bsz, y ef vgeup, 
Ei vgp bfl hákhpnfl ng bp dpñpep; 
10 Hfk rspeqf ef rgkkó bpl hsgkqpl ngb vigeqkg nfeng yf glqpap, 
Ei glrfenió ng dil fmfl bp dilgkip. 

11 ¿Hfk jsé ef dfkí yf ge bp dpqkiz, 
F gxhiké pb lpbik ngb vigeqkg? 
12 ¿Hfk jsé dg kgriaigkfe bpl kfnibbpl? 
¿Y p jsé bfl hgrtfl hpkp jsg dpdplg? 
13 Hsgl ptfkp glqpkíp yf dsgkqf, y kghflpkíp; 
Nfkdikíp, y geqfergl qgenkíp nglrpelf, 
14 Rfe bfl kgygl y rfe bfl rfelgmgkfl ng bp qigkkp, 
Jsg kggnicirpe hpkp lí ksiepl; 
15 F rfe bfl hkíerihgl jsg hflgípe gb fkf, 
Jsg bbgepape ng hbpqp lsl rplpl. 
16 ¿Hfk jsé ef csi glrfeninf rfdf pafkqivf, 
Rfdf bfl hgjsgñiqfl jsg eserp vigkfe bp bsz? 
17 Pbbí bfl idhífl ngmpe ng hgkqskapk, 
Y pbbí nglrpelpe bfl ng pufqpnpl csgkzpl. 
18 Pbbí qpdaiée kghflpe bfl rpsqivfl; 
Ef fyge bp vfz ngb rphpqpz. 
19 Pbbí glqáe gb rtirf y gb ukpeng, 
Y gb ligkvf biakg ng ls lgñfk. 

20 ¿Hfk jsé lg np bsz pb qkpapmpnf, 
Y vinp p bfl ng áeidf pdpkupnf, 
21 Jsg glhgkpe bp dsgkqg, y gbbp ef bbgup, 
Psejsg bp aslrpe dál jsg qglfkfl; 
22 Jsg lg pbgukpe lfakgdpegkp, 
Y lg ufzpe rspenf tpbbpe gb lghsbrkf? 
23 ¿Hfk jsé lg np vinp pb tfdakg jsg ef lpag hfk nfeng tp ng ik, 
Y p jsige Nifl tp gergkkpnf? 
24 Hsgl peqgl jsg di hpe vigeg di lslhikf, 
Y dil ugdinfl rfkkge rfdf puspl. 
25 Hfkjsg gb qgdfk jsg dg glhpeqpap dg tp vgeinf, 
Y dg tp prfeqgrinf bf jsg yf qgdíp. 
26 Ef tg qgeinf hpz, ef dg plguské, ei glqsvg kghflpnf; 
Ef falqpeqg, dg vief qskaprióe. 



Gbicpz kghkgeng p Mfa

MFA 4

1 Geqfergl kglhfenió Gbicpz qgdpeiqp, y nimf: 


2 Li hkfaákgdfl p tpabpkqg, qg lgká dfbglqf; 
Hgkf ¿jsiée hfnká ngqgegk bpl hpbpakpl? 
3 Tg pjsí, qú gelgñpapl p dsrtfl, 
Y cfkqpbgrípl bpl dpefl néaibgl; 
4 Pb jsg qkfhgzpap gengkgzpape qsl hpbpakpl, 
Y glcfkzpapl bpl kfnibbpl jsg ngrpípe. 
5 Dpl ptfkp jsg gb dpb tp vgeinf lfakg qi, qg nglpbigeqpl; 
Y rspenf tp bbgupnf tplqp qi, qg qskapl. 
6 ¿Ef gl qs qgdfk p Nifl qs rfecipezp? 
¿Ef gl qs glhgkpezp bp ieqgukinpn ng qsl rpdiefl? 

7 Kgrphpriqp ptfkp; ¿jsé iefrgeqg lg tp hgkninf? 
Y ¿ge nóeng tpe linf nglqksinfl bfl kgrqfl? 
8 Rfdf yf tg vilqf, bfl jsg pkpe ieijsinpn 
Y ligdakpe iemskip, bp ligupe. 
9 Hgkgrge hfk gb pbigeqf ng Nifl, 
Y hfk gb lfhbf ng ls ikp lfe rfelsdinfl. 
10 Bfl ksuinfl ngb bgóe, y bfl akpdinfl ngb ksuigeqg, 
Y bfl nigeqgl ng bfl bgferibbfl lfe jsgakpeqpnfl. 
11 Gb bgóe vigmf hgkgrg hfk cpbqp ng hkglp, 
Y bfl timfl ng bp bgfep lg nilhgklpe. 

12 Gb plseqf qpdaiée dg gkp p dí frsbqf; 
Dpl di fínf tp hgkriainf pbuf ng gbbf. 
13 Ge idpuieprifegl ng vilifegl efrqskepl, 
Rspenf gb lsgñf rpg lfakg bfl tfdakgl, 
14 Dg lfakgvief se glhpeqf y se qgdabfk, 
Jsg glqkgdgrió qfnfl dil tsglfl; 
15 Y pb hplpk se glhíkiqs hfk ngbpeqg ng dí, 
Tizf jsg lg gkizpkp gb hgbf ng di rsgkhf. 
16 Hpkólg ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl se cpeqpldp, 
Rsyf kflqkf yf ef rfefrí, 
Y jsgnf, fí jsg ngríp: 
17 ¿Lgká gb tfdakg dál mslqf jsg Nifl? 
¿Lgká gb vpkóe dál bidhif jsg gb jsg bf tizf? 
18 Tg pjsí, ge lsl ligkvfl ef rfecíp, 
Y efqó egrgnpn ge lsl áeugbgl; 
19 ¡Rsáeqf dál ge bfl jsg tpaiqpe ge rplpl ng apkkf, 
Rsyfl ridigeqfl glqáe ge gb hfbvf, 
Y jsg lgkáe jsgakpeqpnfl hfk bp hfbibbp! 
20 Ng bp dpñpep p bp qpkng lfe nglqksinfl, 
Y lg higknge hpkp ligdhkg, lie tpagk jsige kghpkg ge gbbf. 
21 Ls tgkdflskp, ¿ef lg higkng rfe gbbfl dildfl? 
Y dsgkge lie tpagk pnjsikinf lpainskíp. 




MFA 5




1 Ptfkp, hsgl, np vfrgl; ¿tpaká jsige qg kglhfenp? 
¿Y p rsáb ng bfl lpeqfl qg vfbvgkál? 
2 Gl rigkqf jsg pb egrif bf dpqp bp ikp, 
Y pb rfniriflf bf rfelsdg bp gevinip. 
3 Yf tg vilqf pb egrif jsg grtpap kpírgl, 
Y ge bp dildp tfkp dpbnimg ls tpaiqprióe. 
4 Lsl timfl glqpkáe bgmfl ng bp lguskinpn; 
Ge bp hsgkqp lgkáe jsgakpeqpnfl, 
Y ef tpaká jsige bfl biakg. 
5 Ls digl rfdgkáe bfl tpdakigeqfl, 
Y bp lprpkáe ng geqkg bfl glhiefl, 
Y bfl lgnigeqfl agagkáe ls tprigenp. 
6 Hfkjsg bp pcbirrióe ef lpbg ngb hfbvf, 
Ei bp dfbglqip akfqp ng bp qigkkp. 
7 Hgkf rfdf bpl rtilhpl lg bgvpeqpe hpkp vfbpk hfk gb pikg, 
Plí gb tfdakg eprg hpkp bp pcbirrióe. 
8 Rigkqpdgeqg yf aslrpkíp p Nifl, 
Y gerfdgenpkíp p éb di rpslp; 
9 Gb rspb tprg rflpl ukpengl g ieglrksqpabgl, 
Y dpkpvibbpl lie eúdgkf; 
10 Jsg np bp bbsvip lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp, 
Y gevíp bpl puspl lfakg bfl rpdhfl; 
11 Jsg hfeg p bfl tsdibngl ge pbqskp, 
Y p bfl gebsqpnfl bgvpeqp p lguskinpn; 
12 Jsg ckslqkp bfl hgelpdigeqfl ng bfl plqsqfl, 
Hpkp jsg lsl dpefl ef tpupe epnp; 
13 Jsg hkgeng p bfl lpaifl ge bp plqsrip ng gbbfl, 
Y ckslqkp bfl ngliueifl ng bfl hgkvgklfl. 
14 Ng níp qkfhigzpe rfe qieigabpl, 
Y p dgnifníp penpe p qigeqpl rfdf ng efrtg. 
15 Plí biakp ng bp glhpnp pb hfakg, ng bp afrp ng bfl idhífl, 
Y ng bp dpef vifbgeqp; 
16 Hsgl gl glhgkpezp pb dgeglqgkflf, 
Y bp ieijsinpn rgkkpká ls afrp. 

17 Tg pjsí, aigepvgeqskpnf gl gb tfdakg p jsige Nifl rplqiup; 
Hfk qpeqf, ef dgeflhkgrigl bp rfkkgrrióe ngb Qfnfhfngkflf. 
18 Hfkjsg éb gl jsige tprg bp bbpup, y éb bp vgenpká; 
Gb tigkg, y lsl dpefl rskpe. 
19 Ge lgil qkiasbprifegl qg biakpká, 
Y ge bp léhqidp ef qg qfrpká gb dpb. 
20 Ge gb tpdakg qg lpbvpká ng bp dsgkqg, 
Y ngb hfngk ng bp glhpnp ge bp usgkkp. 
21 Ngb pzfqg ng bp bgeusp lgkál gersaigkqf; 
Ef qgdgkál bp nglqksrrióe rspenf vieigkg. 
22 Ng bp nglqksrrióe y ngb tpdakg qg kgikál, 
Y ef qgdgkál ng bpl cigkpl ngb rpdhf; 
23 Hsgl pse rfe bpl hignkpl ngb rpdhf qgenkál qs hprqf, 
Y bpl cigkpl ngb rpdhf glqpkáe ge hpz rfeqiuf. 
24 Lpakál jsg tpy hpz ge qs qigenp; 
Viliqpkál qs dfkpnp, y epnp qg cpbqpká. 
25 Plidildf grtpkál ng vgk jsg qs nglrgengerip gl dsrtp, 
Y qs hkfbg rfdf bp tigkap ng bp qigkkp. 
26 Vgenkál ge bp vgmgz p bp lghsbqskp, 
Rfdf bp upvibbp ng qkiuf jsg lg kgrfug p ls qigdhf. 
27 Tg pjsí bf jsg tgdfl iejsikinf, bf rspb gl plí; 
Fygbf, y rfeórgbf qú hpkp qs hkfvgrtf. 



Mfa kghkfrtp bp prqiqsn ng lsl pdiufl

MFA 6

1 Kglhfenió geqfergl Mfa, y nimf: 





2 ¡Ft, jsg hglplge mslqpdgeqg di jsgmp y di qfkdgeqf, 
Y lg pbzplge iuspbdgeqg ge apbpezp! 
3 Hfkjsg hglpkípe ptfkp dál jsg bp pkgep ngb dpk; 
Hfk glf dil hpbpakpl tpe linf hkgrihiqpnpl. 
4 Hfkjsg bpl lpgqpl ngb Qfnfhfngkflf glqáe ge dí, 
Rsyf vgegef agag di glhíkiqs; 
Y qgkkfkgl ng Nifl dg rfdapqge. 
5 ¿Prplf uidg gb plef dfeqél mseqf p bp tigkap? 
¿Dsug gb asgy mseqf p ls hplqf? 
6 ¿Lg rfdgká bf nglpakinf lie lpb? 
¿Tpaká uslqf ge bp rbpkp ngb tsgvf? 
7 Bpl rflpl jsg di pbdp ef jsgkíp qfrpk, 
Lfe ptfkp di pbidgeqf. 

8 ¡Jsiée dg nigkp jsg vieiglg di hgqirióe, 
Y jsg dg fqfkuplg Nifl bf jsg petgbf, 
9 Y jsg pukpnpkp p Nifl jsgakpeqpkdg; 
Jsg lfbqpkp ls dpef, y prpapkp rfediuf! 
10 Lgkíp púe di rfelsgbf, 
Li dg plpbqplg rfe nfbfk lie npk dál qkgusp, 
Jsg yf ef tg glrfeninf bpl hpbpakpl ngb Lpeqf. 
11 ¿Rsáb gl di csgkzp hpkp glhgkpk púe? 
¿Y rsáb di cie hpkp jsg qgeup púe hprigerip? 
12 ¿Gl di csgkzp bp ng bpl hignkpl, 
F gl di rpkeg ng akferg? 
13 ¿Ef gl plí jsg ei pse p dí dildf dg hsgnf vpbgk, 
Y jsg qfnf psxibif dg tp cpbqpnf? 
14 Gb pqkiasbpnf gl rfelfbpnf hfk ls rfdhpñgkf; 
Pse pjsgb jsg papenfep gb qgdfk ngb Fdeihfqgeqg. 
15 Hgkf dil tgkdpefl dg qkpirifepkfe rfdf se qfkkgeqg; 
Hplpe rfdf rfkkigeqgl idhgqsflpl 
16 Jsg glqáe glrfeninpl hfk bp tgbpnp, 
Y gersaigkqpl hfk bp eigvg; 
17 Jsg pb qigdhf ngb rpbfk lfe ngltgrtpl, 
Y pb rpbgeqpklg, nglphpkgrge ng ls bsupk; 
18 Lg phpkqpe ng bp lgenp ng ls ksdaf, 
Vpe dgeuspenf, y lg higknge. 
19 Dikpkfe bfl rpdiepeqgl ng Qgdáe, 
Bfl rpdiepeqgl ng Lpaá glhgkpkfe ge gbbpl; 
20 Hgkf csgkfe pvgkufezpnfl hfk ls glhgkpezp; 
Hfkjsg vieigkfe tplqp gbbpl, y lg tpbbpkfe rfecslfl. 
21 Ptfkp rigkqpdgeqg rfdf gbbpl lfil vflfqkfl; 
Hsgl tpaéil vilqf gb qfkdgeqf, y qgdéil. 
22 ¿Fl tg nirtf yf: Qkpgndg, 
Y hpupn hfk dí ng vsglqkp tprigenp; 
23 Biakpndg ng bp dpef ngb fhkglfk, 
Y kgnidindg ngb hfngk ng bfl vifbgeqfl? 

24 Gelgñpndg, y yf rpbbpké; 
Tprgndg geqgengk ge jsé tg gkkpnf. 
25 ¡Rsáe gcirprgl lfe bpl hpbpakpl kgrqpl! 
Hgkf ¿jsé kghkgeng bp rgelskp vsglqkp? 
26 ¿Hgeláil rgelskpk hpbpakpl, 
Y bfl nilrsklfl ng se nglglhgkpnf, jsg lfe rfdf gb vigeqf? 
27 Qpdaiée fl pkkfmáil lfakg gb tsékcpef, 
Y rpváil se tfyf hpkp vsglqkf pdiuf. 

28 Ptfkp, hsgl, li jsgkéil, dikpndg, 
Y vgn li niuf dgeqikp ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl. 
29 Vfbvgn ptfkp, y ef tpyp ieijsinpn; 
Vfbvgn púe p rfelingkpk di mslqirip ge glqf. 
30 ¿Tpy ieijsinpn ge di bgeusp? 
¿Prplf ef hsgng di hpbpnpk nilrgkeik bpl rflpl ieirspl? 



Mfa pkusdgeqp rfeqkp Nifl

MFA 7




1 ¿Ef gl prplf akgup bp vinp ngb tfdakg lfakg bp qigkkp, 
Y lsl nípl rfdf bfl nípl ngb mfkepbgkf? 
2 Rfdf gb ligkvf lslhikp hfk bp lfdakp, 
Y rfdf gb mfkepbgkf glhgkp gb kghflf ng ls qkpapmf, 
3 Plí tg kgriainf dglgl ng rpbpdinpn, 
Y efrtgl ng qkpapmf dg nigkfe hfk rsgeqp. 
4 Rspenf glqfy prflqpnf, niuf: ¿Rsáenf dg bgvpeqpké? 
Dpl bp efrtg gl bpkup, y glqfy bbgef ng iejsigqsngl tplqp gb pbap. 
5 Di rpkeg glqá vglqinp ng uslpefl, y ng rflqkpl ng hfbvf; 
Di higb tgeninp y pafdiepabg. 
6 Y dil nípl csgkfe dál vgbfrgl jsg bp bpezpngkp ngb qgmgnfk, 
Y cgegrigkfe lie glhgkpezp. 

7 Prséknpqg jsg di vinp gl se lfhbf, 
Y jsg dil fmfl ef vfbvgkáe p vgk gb aige. 
8 Bfl fmfl ng bfl jsg dg vge, ef dg vgkáe dál; 
Cimpkál ge dí qsl fmfl, y ngmpké ng lgk. 
9 Rfdf bp esag lg nglvpegrg y lg vp, 
Plí gb jsg nglrigeng pb Lgfb ef lsaiká; 
10 Ef vfbvgká dál p ls rplp, 
Ei ls bsupk bg rfefrgká dál. 

11 Hfk qpeqf, ef kgckgepké di afrp; 
Tpabpké ge bp peuslqip ng di glhíkiqs, 
Y dg jsgmpké rfe bp pdpkuskp ng di pbdp. 
12 ¿Lfy yf gb dpk, f se dfelqksf dpkief, 
Hpkp jsg dg hfeupl uspknp? 
13 Rspenf niuf: Dg rfelfbpká di bgrtf, 
Di rpdp pqgespká dil jsgmpl; 
14 Geqfergl dg plslqpl rfe lsgñfl, 
Y dg pqgkkpl rfe vilifegl. 
15 Y plí di pbdp qsvf hfk dgmfk bp glqkpeusbprióe, 
Y jsilf bp dsgkqg dál jsg dil tsglfl. 
16 Pafdief ng di vinp; ef tg ng vivik hpkp ligdhkg; 
Némpdg, hsgl, hfkjsg dil nípl lfe vpeinpn. 
17 ¿Jsé gl gb tfdakg, hpkp jsg bf geukpengzrpl, 
Y hpkp jsg hfeupl lfakg éb qs rfkpzóe, 
18 Y bf viliqgl qfnpl bpl dpñpepl, 
Y qfnfl bfl dfdgeqfl bf hksgagl? 
19 ¿Tplqp rsáenf ef phpkqpkál ng dí qs dikpnp, 
Y ef dg lfbqpkál lijsigkp tplqp jsg qkpusg di lpbivp? 
20 Li tg hgrpnf, ¿jsé hsgnf tprgkqg p qi, ft Uspknp ng bfl tfdakgl? 
¿Hfk jsé dg hfegl hfk abperf qsyf, 
Tplqp rfevgkqikdg ge sep rpkup hpkp dí dildf? 
21 ¿Y hfk jsé ef jsiqpl di kgagbióe, y hgknfepl di ieijsinpn? 
Hfkjsg ptfkp nfkdiké ge gb hfbvf, 
Y li dg aslrpkgl ng dpñpep, yp ef gxilqiké. 



Aibnpn hkfrbpdp bp mslqirip ng Nifl

MFA 8

1 Kglhfenió Aibnpn lstiqp, y nimf: 





2 ¿Tplqp rsáenf tpabpkál qpbgl rflpl, 
Y bpl hpbpakpl ng qs afrp lgkáe rfdf vigeqf idhgqsflf? 
3 ¿Prplf qfkrgká Nifl gb ngkgrtf, 
F hgkvgkqiká gb Qfnfhfngkflf bp mslqirip? 
4 Li qsl timfl hgrpkfe rfeqkp éb, 
Gb bfl grtó ge gb bsupk ng ls hgrpnf. 
5 Li qú ng dpñpep aslrpkgl p Nifl, 
Y kfupkgl pb Qfnfhfngkflf; 
6 Li csgkgl bidhif y kgrqf, 
Rigkqpdgeqg bsguf lg nglhgkqpká hfk qi, 
Y tpká hkólhgkp bp dfkpnp ng qs mslqirip. 
7 Y psejsg qs hkierihif tpyp linf hgjsgñf, 
Qs hflqkgk glqpnf lgká dsy ukpeng. 

8 Hfkjsg hkguseqp ptfkp p bpl ugegkprifegl hplpnpl, 
Y nilhfeqg hpkp iejsikik p bfl hpnkgl ng gbbpl; 
9 Hsgl eflfqkfl lfdfl ng pygk, y epnp lpagdfl, 
Ligenf esglqkfl nípl lfakg bp qigkkp rfdf lfdakp. 
10 ¿Ef qg gelgñpkáe gbbfl, qg tpabpkáe, 
Y ng ls rfkpzóe lprpkáe hpbpakpl? 
11 ¿Rkgrg gb mserf lie bfnf? 
¿Rkgrg gb hkpnf lie pusp? 
12 Pse ge ls vgknfk, y lie tpagk linf rfkqpnf, 
Rfe qfnf, lg lgrp hkidgkf jsg qfnp tigkap. 
13 Qpbgl lfe bfl rpdiefl ng qfnfl bfl jsg fbvinpe p Nifl; 
Y bp glhgkpezp ngb idhíf hgkgrgká; 
14 Hfkjsg ls glhgkpezp lgká rfkqpnp, 
Y ls rfecipezp gl qgbp ng pkpñp. 
15 Lg phfypká éb ge ls rplp, dpl ef hgkdpegrgká gbbp ge hig; 
Lg pliká ng gbbp, dpl ef kglilqiká. 
16 P dpegkp ng se ákafb glqá vgkng ngbpeqg ngb lfb, 
Y lsl kgesgvfl lpbge lfakg ls tsgkqf; 
17 Lg vpe geqkgqgmigenf lsl kpírgl mseqf p sep csgeqg, 
Y gebpzáenflg tplqp se bsupk hgnkguflf. 
18 Li bg pkkperpkge ng ls bsupk, 
Glqg bg egupká geqfergl, nirigenf: Eserp qg vi. 
19 Rigkqpdgeqg glqg lgká gb ufzf ng ls rpdief; 
Y ngb hfbvf dildf eprgkáe fqkfl. 

20 Tg pjsí, Nifl ef pafkkgrg pb hgkcgrqf, 
Ei phfyp bp dpef ng bfl dpbiuefl. 
21 Púe bbgepká qs afrp ng kilp, 
Y qsl bpaifl ng múaibf. 
22 Bfl jsg qg pafkkgrge lgkáe vglqinfl ng rfecslióe; 
Y bp tpaiqprióe ng bfl idhífl hgkgrgká. 



Ierphprinpn ng Mfa hpkp kglhfengk p Nifl

MFA 9

1 Kglhfenió Mfa, y nimf: 





2 Rigkqpdgeqg yf lé jsg gl plí; 
¿Y ródf lg mslqicirpká gb tfdakg rfe Nifl? 
3 Li jsiligkg rfeqgengk rfe éb, 
Ef bg hfnká kglhfengk p sep rflp geqkg dib. 
4 Gb gl lpaif ng rfkpzóe, y hfngkflf ge csgkzpl; 
¿Jsiée lg genskgrió rfeqkp éb, y bg csg aige? 
5 Gb pkkperp bfl dfeqgl rfe ls cskfk, 
Y ef lpage jsiée bfl qkplqfkeó; 
6 Gb kgdsgvg bp qigkkp ng ls bsupk, 
Y tprg qgdabpk lsl rfbsdepl; 
7 Gb dpenp pb lfb, y ef lpbg; 
Y lgbbp bpl glqkgbbpl; 
8 Gb lfbf gxqgenió bfl rigbfl, 
Y penp lfakg bpl fbpl ngb dpk; 
9 Gb tizf bp Flp, gb Fkióe y bpl Hbéypngl, 
Y bfl bsupkgl lgrkgqfl ngb lsk; 
10 Gb tprg rflpl ukpengl g ierfdhkgeliabgl, 
Y dpkpvibbflpl, lie eúdgkf. 
11 Tg pjsí jsg éb hplpká ngbpeqg ng dí, y yf ef bf vgké; 
Hplpká, y ef bf geqgengké. 
12 Tg pjsí, pkkgapqpká; ¿jsiée bg tpká kglqiqsik? 
¿Jsiée bg niká: ¿Jsé tprgl? 

13 Nifl ef vfbvgká pqkál ls ikp, 
Y ngapmf ng éb lg papqge bfl jsg pysnpe p bfl lfagkaifl. 
14 ¿Rsáeqf dgefl bg kglhfengké yf, 
Y tpabpké rfe éb hpbpakpl glrfuinpl? 
15 Psejsg csglg yf mslqf, ef kglhfengkíp; 
Peqgl tpakíp ng kfupk p di msgz. 
16 Li yf bg ievfrpkp, y éb dg kglhfeniglg, 
Púe ef rkggké jsg tpyp glrsrtpnf di vfz. 
17 Hfkjsg dg tp jsgakpeqpnf rfe qgdhglqpn, 
Y tp psdgeqpnf dil tgkinpl lie rpslp. 
18 Ef dg tp rfergninf jsg qfdg pbigeqf, 
Lief jsg dg tp bbgepnf ng pdpkuskpl. 
19 Li tpabákgdfl ng ls hfqgerip, hfk rigkqf gl csgkqg; 
Li ng msirif, ¿jsiée dg gdhbpzpká? 
20 Li yf dg mslqicirpkg, dg rfengepkíp di afrp; 
Li dg nimgkg hgkcgrqf, glqf dg tpkíp ieirsf. 
21 Li csglg íeqgukf, ef tpkíp rplf ng dí dildf; 
Nglhkgripkíp di vinp. 
22 Sep rflp kglqp jsg yf niup: 
Pb hgkcgrqf y pb idhíf éb bfl rfelsdg. 
23 Li pzfqg dpqp ng kghgeqg, 
Lg kíg ngb lsckidigeqf ng bfl iefrgeqgl. 
24 Bp qigkkp gl geqkgupnp ge dpefl ng bfl idhífl, 
Y éb rsakg gb kflqkf ng lsl msgrgl. 
Li ef gl éb, ¿jsiée gl? ¿Nóeng glqá? 
25 Dil nípl tpe linf dál biugkfl jsg se rfkkgf; 
Tsygkfe, y ef vigkfe gb aige. 
26 Hplpkfe rspb epvgl vgbfrgl; 
Rfdf gb áusibp jsg lg pkkfmp lfakg bp hkglp. 
27 Li yf nimgkg: Fbvinpké di jsgmp, 
Ngmpké di qkilqg lgdabpeqg, y dg glcfkzpké, 
28 Dg qskape qfnfl dil nfbfkgl; 
Lé jsg ef dg qgenkál hfk iefrgeqg. 
29 Yf lfy idhíf; 
¿Hpkp jsé qkpapmpké ge vpef? 
30 Psejsg dg bpvg rfe puspl ng eigvg, 
Y bidhig dil dpefl rfe bp bidhigzp dildp, 
31 Púe dg tsenikál ge gb tfyf, 
Y dil hkfhifl vglqinfl dg pafdiepkáe. 
32 Hfkjsg ef gl tfdakg rfdf yf, hpkp jsg yf bg kglhfenp, 
Y vgeupdfl mseqpdgeqg p msirif. 
33 Ef tpy geqkg eflfqkfl ákaiqkf 
Jsg hfeup ls dpef lfakg eflfqkfl nfl. 
34 Jsiqg ng lfakg dí ls vpkp, 
Y ls qgkkfk ef dg glhpeqg. 
35 Geqfergl tpabpké, y ef bg qgdgké; 
Hfkjsg ge glqg glqpnf ef glqfy ge dí. 



Mfa bpdgeqp ls rfenirióe

MFA 10




1 Glqá di pbdp tplqipnp ng di vinp; 
Npké biakg rsklf p di jsgmp, 
Tpabpké rfe pdpkuskp ng di pbdp. 
2 Niké p Nifl: Ef dg rfengegl; 
Tpzdg geqgengk hfk jsé rfeqigengl rfediuf. 
3 ¿Qg hpkgrg aige jsg fhkidpl, 
Jsg nglgrtgl bp fakp ng qsl dpefl, 
Y jsg cpvfkgzrpl bfl ngliueifl ng bfl idhífl? 
4 ¿Qigegl qú prplf fmfl ng rpkeg? 
¿Vgl qú rfdf vg gb tfdakg? 
5 ¿Lfe qsl nípl rfdf bfl nípl ngb tfdakg, 
F qsl pñfl rfdf bfl qigdhfl tsdpefl, 
6 Hpkp jsg iejsigkpl di ieijsinpn, 
Y asljsgl di hgrpnf, 
7 Psejsg qú lpagl jsg ef lfy idhíf, 
Y jsg ef tpy jsige ng qs dpef dg biakg? 
8 Qsl dpefl dg tirigkfe y dg cfkdpkfe; 
¿Y bsguf qg vsgbvgl y dg ngltprgl? 
9 Prséknpqg jsg rfdf p apkkf dg nilqg cfkdp; 
¿Y ge hfbvf dg tpl ng vfbvgk? 
10 ¿Ef dg vpriplqg rfdf bgrtg, 
Y rfdf jsglf dg rspmplqg? 
11 Dg vglqilqg ng higb y rpkeg, 
Y dg qgmilqg rfe tsglfl y egkvifl. 
12 Vinp y dilgkirfknip dg rfergnilqg, 
Y qs rsinpnf uspknó di glhíkiqs. 
13 Glqpl rflpl qigegl uspknpnpl ge qs rfkpzóe; 
Yf lé jsg glqáe rgkrp ng qi. 
14 Li hgjsé, qú dg tpl falgkvpnf, 
Y ef dg qgenkál hfk bidhif ng di ieijsinpn. 
15 Li csgkg dpbf, ¡py ng dí! 
Y li csgkg mslqf, ef bgvpeqpké di rpagzp, 
Glqpenf tplqipnf ng ngltfekp, y ng vgkdg pcbiuinf. 
16 Li di rpagzp lg pbzpkg, rspb bgóe qú dg rpzpl; 
Y vsgbvgl p tprgk ge dí dpkpvibbpl. 
17 Kgesgvpl rfeqkp dí qsl hksgapl, 
Y psdgeqpl rfediuf qs cskfk rfdf qkfhpl ng kgbgvf. 

18 ¿Hfk jsé dg lprplqg ng bp dpqkiz? 
Tsaigkp yf gxhikpnf, y eieuúe fmf dg tpakíp vilqf. 
19 Csgkp rfdf li eserp tsaigkp gxilqinf, 
Bbgvpnf ngb vigeqkg p bp lghsbqskp. 
20 ¿Ef lfe hfrfl dil nípl? 
Rglp, hsgl, y némpdg, hpkp jsg dg rfelsgbg se hfrf, 
21 Peqgl jsg vpyp hpkp ef vfbvgk, 
P bp qigkkp ng qieigabpl y ng lfdakp ng dsgkqg; 
22 Qigkkp ng flrskinpn, bóakgup, 
Rfdf lfdakp ng dsgkqg y lie fknge, 
Y rsyp bsz gl rfdf ngelpl qieigabpl. 



Zfcpk prslp ng dpbnpn p Mfa

MFA 11

1 Kglhfenió Zfcpk eppdpqiqp, y nimf: 





2 ¿Bpl dsrtpl hpbpakpl ef tpe ng qgegk kglhsglqp? 
¿Y gb tfdakg jsg tpabp dsrtf lgká mslqicirpnf? 
3 ¿Tpkáe qsl cpbpripl rpbbpk p bfl tfdakgl? 
¿Tpkál glrpkeif y ef tpaká jsige qg pvgkuügerg? 
4 Qú nirgl: Di nfrqkiep gl hskp, 
Y yf lfy bidhif ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl. 
5 Dpl ¡ft, jsiée nigkp jsg Nifl tpabpkp, 
Y pakigkp lsl bpaifl rfeqiuf, 
6 Y qg ngrbpkpkp bfl lgrkgqfl ng bp lpainskíp, 
Jsg lfe ng nfabg vpbfk jsg bpl kijsgzpl! 
Rfefrgkípl geqfergl jsg Nifl qg tp rplqiupnf dgefl ng bf jsg qs ieijsinpn dgkgrg. 

7 ¿Nglrsakikál qú bfl lgrkgqfl ng Nifl? 
¿Bbgupkál qú p bp hgkcgrrióe ngb Qfnfhfngkflf? 
8 Gl dál pbqp jsg bfl rigbfl; ¿jsé tpkál? 
Gl dál hkfcsenp jsg gb Lgfb; ¿ródf bp rfefrgkál? 
9 Ls nidgelióe gl dál gxqgelp jsg bp qigkkp, 
Y dál pertp jsg gb dpk. 
10 Li éb hplp, y phkilifep, y bbpdp p msirif, 
¿Jsiée hfnká rfeqkpkkglqpkbg? 
11 Hfkjsg éb rfefrg p bfl tfdakgl vpefl; 
Vg plidildf bp ieijsinpn, ¿y ef tpká rplf? 
12 Gb tfdakg vpef lg tpká geqgeninf, 
Rspenf se hfbbief ng plef dfeqél epzrp tfdakg. 

13 Li qú nilhsligkgl qs rfkpzóe, 
Y gxqgenigkgl p éb qsl dpefl; 
14 Li pbusep ieijsinpn tsaigkg ge qs dpef, y bp grtpkgl ng qi, 
Y ef rfelieqigkgl jsg dfkg ge qs rplp bp iemslqirip, 
15 Geqfergl bgvpeqpkál qs kflqkf bidhif ng dpertp, 
Y lgkál csgkqg, y epnp qgdgkál; 
16 Y fbvinpkál qs dilgkip, 
F qg prfknpkál ng gbbp rfdf ng puspl jsg hplpkfe. 
17 Bp vinp qg lgká dál rbpkp jsg gb dgnifníp; 
Psejsg flrskgrigkg, lgká rfdf bp dpñpep. 
18 Qgenkál rfecipezp, hfkjsg tpy glhgkpezp; 
Dikpkál pbkgngnfk, y nfkdikál lguskf. 
19 Qg prflqpkál, y ef tpaká jsige qg glhpeqg; 
Y dsrtfl lshbirpkáe qs cpvfk. 
20 Hgkf bfl fmfl ng bfl dpbfl lg rfelsdikáe, 
Y ef qgenkáe kgcsuif; 
Y ls glhgkpezp lgká npk ls úbqidf lslhikf. 



Mfa hkfrbpdp gb hfngk y bp lpainskíp ng Nifl

MFA 12

1 Kglhfenió geqfergl Mfa, nirigenf: 





2 Rigkqpdgeqg vflfqkfl lfil gb hsgabf, 
Y rfe vflfqkfl dfkiká bp lpainskíp. 
3 Qpdaiée qgeuf yf geqgenidigeqf rfdf vflfqkfl; 
Ef lfy yf dgefl jsg vflfqkfl; 
¿Y jsiée tpaká jsg ef hsgnp ngrik fqkf qpeqf? 
4 Yf lfy sef ng jsige ls pdiuf lg dfcp, 
Jsg ievfrp p Nifl, y éb bg kglhfeng; 
Rfe qfnf, gb mslqf y hgkcgrqf gl glrpkegrinf. 
5 Pjsgb rsyfl higl vpe p kglapbpk 
Gl rfdf sep bádhpkp nglhkgripnp ng pjsgb jsg glqá p lsl pertpl. 
6 Hkflhgkpe bpl qigenpl ng bfl bpnkfegl, 
Y bfl jsg hkfvfrpe p Nifl vivge lguskfl, 
Ge rsypl dpefl éb tp hsglqf rspeqf qigege. 

7 Y ge gcgrqf, hkguseqp ptfkp p bpl aglqipl, y gbbpl qg gelgñpkáe; 
P bpl pvgl ng bfl rigbfl, y gbbpl qg bf dflqkpkáe; 
8 F tpabp p bp qigkkp, y gbbp qg gelgñpká; 
Bfl hgrgl ngb dpk qg bf ngrbpkpkáe qpdaiée. 
9 ¿Jsé rflp ng qfnpl glqpl ef geqigeng 
Jsg bp dpef ng Mgtfvá bp tizf? 
10 Ge ls dpef glqá gb pbdp ng qfnf vivigeqg, 
Y gb tábiqf ng qfnf gb uéegkf tsdpef. 
11 Rigkqpdgeqg gb fínf nilqieusg bpl hpbpakpl, 
Y gb hpbpnpk uslqp bpl vipenpl. 
12 Ge bfl peripefl glqá bp rigerip, 
Y ge bp bpkup gnpn bp ieqgbiugerip. 

13 Rfe Nifl glqá bp lpainskíp y gb hfngk; 
Lsyf gl gb rfelgmf y bp ieqgbiugerip. 
14 Li éb ngkkiap, ef tpy jsige gnicijsg; 
Gergkkpká pb tfdakg, y ef tpaká jsige bg pakp. 
15 Li éb ngqigeg bpl puspl, qfnf lg lgrp; 
Li bpl gevíp, nglqksyge bp qigkkp. 
16 Rfe éb glqá gb hfngk y bp lpainskíp; 
Lsyf gl gb jsg ygkkp, y gb jsg tprg gkkpk. 
17 Gb tprg penpk nglhfmpnfl ng rfelgmf p bfl rfelgmgkfl, 
Y geqfeqgrg p bfl msgrgl. 
18 Gb kfdhg bpl rpngepl ng bfl qikpefl, 
Y bgl pqp sep lfup p lsl bfdfl. 
19 Gb bbgvp nglhfmpnfl p bfl hkíerihgl, 
Y qkplqfkep p bfl hfngkflfl. 
20 Hkivp ngb tpabp p bfl jsg nirge vgknpn, 
Y jsiqp p bfl peripefl gb rfelgmf. 
21 Gb ngkkpdp dgeflhkgrif lfakg bfl hkíerihgl, 
Y nglpqp gb rieqf ng bfl csgkqgl. 
22 Gb nglrsakg bpl hkfcseninpngl ng bpl qieigabpl, 
Y lprp p bsz bp lfdakp ng dsgkqg. 
23 Gb dsbqihbirp bpl eprifegl, y éb bpl nglqksyg; 
Glhpkrg p bpl eprifegl, y bpl vsgbvg p kgseik. 
24 Gb jsiqp gb geqgenidigeqf p bfl mgcgl ngb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp, 
Y bfl tprg vpupk rfdf hfk se ygkdf lie rpdief. 
25 Vpe p qigeqpl, rfdf ge qieigabpl y lie bsz, 
Y bfl tprg gkkpk rfdf afkkprtfl. 



Mfa ngcigeng ls ieqgukinpn

MFA 13




1 Tg pjsí jsg qfnpl glqpl rflpl tpe vilqf dil fmfl, 
Y fínf y geqgeninf dil fínfl. 
2 Rfdf vflfqkfl bf lpaéil, bf lé yf; 
Ef lfy dgefl jsg vflfqkfl. 
3 Dpl yf tpabpkíp rfe gb Qfnfhfngkflf, 
Y jsgkkíp kpzfepk rfe Nifl. 
4 Hfkjsg rigkqpdgeqg vflfqkfl lfil ckpuspnfkgl ng dgeqikp; 
Lfil qfnfl vflfqkfl dénirfl esbfl. 
5 Fmpbá rpbbpkpil hfk rfdhbgqf, 
Hfkjsg glqf fl csgkp lpainskíp. 
6 Fín ptfkp di kpzfepdigeqf, 
Y glqpn pqgeqfl p bfl pkusdgeqfl ng dil bpaifl. 
7 ¿Tpabpkéil ieijsinpn hfk Nifl? 
¿Tpabpkéil hfk éb geupñf? 
8 ¿Tpkéil prghrióe ng hgklfepl p ls cpvfk? 
¿Rfeqgengkéil vflfqkfl hfk Nifl? 
9 ¿Lgkíp asgef jsg éb fl glrsnkiñplg? 
¿Fl askbpkéil ng éb rfdf jsige lg askbp ng pbuúe tfdakg? 
10 Gb fl kghkfrtpká ng lguskf, 
Li lfbphpnpdgeqg tpréil prghrióe ng hgklfepl. 
11 Ng rigkqf ls pbqgzp fl tpakíp ng glhpeqpk, 
Y ls hpvfk tpakíp ng rpgk lfakg vflfqkfl. 
12 Vsglqkpl dáxidpl lfe kgckpegl ng rgeizp, 
Y vsglqkfl apbspkqgl lfe apbspkqgl ng bfnf. 

13 Glrsrtpndg, y tpabpké yf, 
Y jsg dg vgeup nglhsél bf jsg vieigkg. 
14 ¿Hfk jsé jsiqpké yf di rpkeg rfe dil nigeqgl, 
Y qfdpké di vinp ge di dpef? 
15 Tg pjsí, psejsg éb dg dpqpkg, ge éb glhgkpké; 
Ef falqpeqg, ngcgengké ngbpeqg ng éb dil rpdiefl, 
16 Y éb dildf lgká di lpbvprióe, 
Hfkjsg ef geqkpká ge ls hkglgerip gb idhíf. 
17 Fín rfe pqgerióe di kpzfepdigeqf, 
Y di ngrbpkprióe geqkg ge vsglqkfl fínfl. 
18 Tg pjsí ptfkp, li yf gxhsligkg di rpslp, 
Lé jsg lgké mslqicirpnf. 
19 ¿Jsiée gl gb jsg rfeqgengká rfediuf? 
Hfkjsg li ptfkp yf rpbbpkp, dfkikíp. 
20 P bf dgefl nfl rflpl ef tpupl rfediuf; 
Geqfergl ef dg glrfengké ng qs kflqkf: 
21 Phpkqp ng dí qs dpef, 
Y ef dg plfdakg qs qgkkfk. 
22 Bbpdp bsguf, y yf kglhfengké; 
F yf tpabpké, y kglhóengdg qú. 
23 ¿Rsáeqpl ieijsinpngl y hgrpnfl qgeuf yf? 
Tpzdg geqgengk di qkpelukglióe y di hgrpnf. 
24 ¿Hfk jsé glrfengl qs kflqkf, 
Y dg rsgeqpl hfk qs gegdiuf? 
25 ¿P bp tfmp pkkgapqpnp tpl ng jsgakpeqpk, 
Y p sep hpmp lgrp tpl ng hgklgusik? 
26 ¿Hfk jsé glrkiagl rfeqkp dí pdpkuskpl, 
Y dg tprgl rpkuf ng bfl hgrpnfl ng di msvgeqsn? 
27 Hfegl pngdál dil higl ge gb rghf, y falgkvpl qfnfl dil rpdiefl, 
Qkpzpenf se bídiqg hpkp bpl hbpeqpl ng dil higl. 
28 Y di rsgkhf lg vp uplqpenf rfdf ng rpkrfdp, 
Rfdf vglqinf jsg kfg bp hfbibbp. 



Mfa nilrskkg lfakg bp akgvgnpn ng bp vinp

MFA 14




1 Gb tfdakg eprinf ng dsmgk, 
Rfkqf ng nípl, y tplqipnf ng lielpafkgl, 
2 Lpbg rfdf sep cbfk y gl rfkqpnf, 
Y tsyg rfdf bp lfdakp y ef hgkdpegrg. 
3 ¿Lfakg élqg pakgl qsl fmfl, 
Y dg qkpgl p msirif rfeqiuf? 
4 ¿Jsiée tpká bidhif p bf iedsenf? 
Epnig. 
5 Rigkqpdgeqg lsl nípl glqáe ngqgkdiepnfl, 
Y gb eúdgkf ng lsl dglgl glqá rgkrp ng qi; 
Bg hslilqg bídiqgl, ng bfl rspbgl ef hplpká. 
6 Li qú bf papenfepkgl, éb ngmpká ng lgk; 
Geqkg qpeqf nglgpká, rfdf gb mfkepbgkf, ls níp. 

7 Hfkjsg li gb ákafb csgkg rfkqpnf, púe jsgnp ng éb glhgkpezp; 
Kgqfñpká púe, y lsl kgesgvfl ef cpbqpkáe. 
8 Li lg gevgmgrigkg ge bp qigkkp ls kpíz, 
Y ls qkferf csgkg dsgkqf ge gb hfbvf, 
9 Pb hgkriaik gb pusp kgvgkngrgká, 
Y tpká rfhp rfdf hbpeqp esgvp. 
10 Dpl gb tfdakg dfkiká, y lgká rfkqpnf; 
Hgkgrgká gb tfdakg, ¿y nóeng glqpká éb? 
11 Rfdf bpl puspl lg vpe ngb dpk, 
Y gb kíf lg pufqp y lg lgrp, 
12 Plí gb tfdakg yprg y ef vsgbvg p bgvpeqpklg; 
Tplqp jsg ef tpyp rigbf, ef nglhgkqpkáe, 
Ei lg bgvpeqpkáe ng ls lsgñf. 
13 ¡Ft, jsiée dg nigkp jsg dg glrfeniglgl ge gb Lgfb, 
Jsg dg gersakiglgl tplqp phpriuspklg qs ikp, 
Jsg dg hsliglgl hbpzf, y ng dí qg prfknpkpl! 
14 Li gb tfdakg dskigkg, ¿vfbvgká p vivik? 
Qfnfl bfl nípl ng di gnpn glhgkpké, 
Tplqp jsg vgeup di biagkprióe. 
15 Geqfergl bbpdpkál, y yf qg kglhfengké; 
Qgenkál pcgrqf p bp tgrtskp ng qsl dpefl. 
16 Hgkf ptfkp dg rsgeqpl bfl hplfl, 
Y ef npl qkgusp p di hgrpnf; 
17 Qigegl lgbbpnp ge lprf di hkgvpkirprióe, 
Y qigegl rflinp di ieijsinpn. 

18 Rigkqpdgeqg gb dfeqg jsg rpg lg ngltprg, 
Y bpl hgñpl lfe kgdfvinpl ng ls bsupk; 
19 Bpl hignkpl lg ngluplqpe rfe gb pusp idhgqsflp, jsg lg bbgvp gb hfbvf ng bp qigkkp; 
Ng iuspb dpegkp tprgl qú hgkgrgk bp glhgkpezp ngb tfdakg. 
20 Hpkp ligdhkg lgkál dál csgkqg jsg éb, y éb lg vp; 
Ngdsnpkál ls kflqkf, y bg nglhgnikál. 
21 Lsl timfl qgenkáe tfefkgl, hgkf éb ef bf lpaká; 
F lgkáe tsdibbpnfl, y ef geqgengká ng gbbf. 
22 Dpl ls rpkeg lfakg éb lg nfbgká, 
Y lg geqkilqgrgká ge éb ls pbdp. 



Gbicpz kghkgeng p Mfa

MFA 15

1 Kglhfenió Gbicpz qgdpeiqp, y nimf: 





2 ¿Hkfcgkiká gb lpaif vpep lpainskíp, 
Y bbgepká ls vigeqkg ng vigeqf lfbpef? 
3 ¿Nilhsqpká rfe hpbpakpl ieúqibgl, 
Y rfe kpzfegl lie hkfvgrtf? 
4 Qú qpdaiée nilihpl gb qgdfk, 
Y dgeflrpapl bp fkprióe ngbpeqg ng Nifl. 
5 Hfkjsg qs afrp ngrbpkó qs ieijsinpn, 
Hsgl tpl glrfuinf gb tpabpk ng bfl plqsqfl. 
6 Qs afrp qg rfengepká, y ef yf; 
Y qsl bpaifl qglqicirpkáe rfeqkp qi. 

7 ¿Eprilqg qú hkidgkf jsg Pnáe? 
¿F csilqg cfkdpnf peqgl jsg bfl rfbbpnfl? 
8 ¿Fílqg qú gb lgrkgqf ng Nifl, 
Y glqá bidiqpnp p qi bp lpainskíp? 
9 ¿Jsé lpagl qú jsg ef lghpdfl? 
¿Jsé geqigengl qú jsg ef lg tpbbg ge eflfqkfl? 
10 Rpagzpl rpepl y tfdakgl dsy peripefl tpy geqkg eflfqkfl, 
Dsrtf dál pvpezpnfl ge nípl jsg qs hpnkg. 
11 ¿Ge qpe hfrf qigegl bpl rfelfbprifegl ng Nifl, 
Y bpl hpbpakpl jsg rfe nsbzskp lg qg nirge? 
12 ¿Hfk jsé qs rfkpzóe qg pbgmp, 
Y hfk jsé usiñpe qsl fmfl,
