LPBDFL

BIAKF I

Gb mslqf y bfl hgrpnfkgl

LPBDF 1




1 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb vpkóe jsg ef pensvf ge rfelgmf ng dpbfl, 
Ei glqsvf ge rpdief ng hgrpnfkgl, 
Ei ge libbp ng glrpkegrgnfkgl lg tp lgeqpnf; 
2 Lief jsg ge bp bgy ng Mgtfvá glqá ls ngbirip, 
Y ge ls bgy dgniqp ng níp y ng efrtg. 
3 Lgká rfdf ákafb hbpeqpnf mseqf p rfkkigeqgl ng puspl, 
Jsg np ls cksqf ge ls qigdhf, 
Y ls tfmp ef rpg; 
Y qfnf bf jsg tprg, hkflhgkpká. 

4 Ef plí bfl dpbfl, 
Jsg lfe rfdf gb qpdf jsg pkkgapqp gb vigeqf. 
5 Hfk qpeqf, ef lg bgvpeqpkáe bfl dpbfl ge gb msirif, 
Ei bfl hgrpnfkgl ge bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl mslqfl. 
6 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá rfefrg gb rpdief ng bfl mslqfl; 
Dpl bp lgenp ng bfl dpbfl hgkgrgká. 



Gb kgief ngb seuinf ng Mgtfvá

LPBDF 2




1 ¿Hfk jsé lg pdfqiepe bpl ugeqgl, 
Y bfl hsgabfl higelpe rflpl vpepl? 
2 Lg bgvpeqpkáe bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp, 
Y hkíerihgl rfelsbqpkáe seinfl 
Rfeqkp Mgtfvá y rfeqkp ls seuinf, nirigenf: 
3 Kfdhpdfl lsl biupnskpl, 
Y grtgdfl ng eflfqkfl lsl rsgknpl. 

4 Gb jsg dfkp ge bfl rigbfl lg kgiká; 
Gb Lgñfk lg askbpká ng gbbfl. 
5 Bsguf tpabpká p gbbfl ge ls cskfk, 
Y bfl qskapká rfe ls ikp. 
6 Hgkf yf tg hsglqf di kgy 
Lfakg Life, di lpeqf dfeqg. 

7 Yf hsabirpké gb ngrkgqf; 
Mgtfvá dg tp nirtf: Di timf gkgl qú; 
Yf qg geugenké tfy. 
8 Híngdg, y qg npké hfk tgkgerip bpl eprifegl, 
Y rfdf hflglióe qsyp bfl rfeciegl ng bp qigkkp. 
9 Bfl jsgakpeqpkál rfe vpkp ng tigkkf; 
Rfdf vplimp ng pbcpkgkf bfl ngldgeszpkál. 

10 Ptfkp, hsgl, ft kgygl, lgn hksngeqgl; 
Pndiqin pdfeglqprióe, msgrgl ng bp qigkkp. 
11 Lgkvin p Mgtfvá rfe qgdfk, 
Y pbgukpfl rfe qgdabfk. 
12 Tfekpn pb Timf, hpkp jsg ef lg gefmg, y hgkgzráil ge gb rpdief; 
Hsgl lg iecbpdp ng hkfeqf ls ikp. 

Aigepvgeqskpnfl qfnfl bfl jsg ge éb rfecípe. 



Fkprióe dpqsqiep ng rfecipezp ge Nifl

Lpbdf ng Npvin, rspenf tsíp ng ngbpeqg ng Palpbóe ls timf.

LPBDF 3




1 ¡Ft Mgtfvá, rsáeqf lg tpe dsbqihbirpnf dil pnvgklpkifl! 
Dsrtfl lfe bfl jsg lg bgvpeqpe rfeqkp dí. 
2 Dsrtfl lfe bfl jsg nirge ng dí: 
Ef tpy hpkp éb lpbvprióe ge Nifl. Lgbpt 

3 Dpl qú, Mgtfvá, gkgl glrsnf pbkgngnfk ng dí; 
Di ubfkip, y gb jsg bgvpeqp di rpagzp. 
4 Rfe di vfz rbpdé p Mgtfvá, 
Y éb dg kglhfenió nglng ls dfeqg lpeqf. Lgbpt 

5 Yf dg prflqé y nfkdí, 
Y nglhgkqé, hfkjsg Mgtfvá dg lslqgeqpap. 
6 Ef qgdgké p nigz dibbpkgl ng ugeqg, 
Jsg hsligkge liqif rfeqkp dí. 
7 Bgváeqpqg, Mgtfvá; lábvpdg, Nifl díf; 
Hfkjsg qú tgkilqg p qfnfl dil gegdiufl ge bp dgmibbp; 
Bfl nigeqgl ng bfl hgkvgklfl jsgakpeqplqg. 

8 Bp lpbvprióe gl ng Mgtfvá; 
Lfakg qs hsgabf lgp qs agenirióe. Lgbpt 



Fkprióe vglhgkqiep ng rfecipezp ge Nifl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Eguiefq. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 4




1 Kglhóengdg rspenf rbpdf, ft Nifl ng di mslqirip. 
Rspenf glqpap ge peuslqip, qú dg tirilqg gelpertpk; 
Qge dilgkirfknip ng dí, y fyg di fkprióe. 

2 Timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, ¿tplqp rsáenf vfbvgkéil di tfekp ge iecpdip, 
Pdpkéil bp vpeinpn, y aslrpkéil bp dgeqikp? Lgbpt 
3 Lpagn, hsgl, jsg Mgtfvá tp glrfuinf pb hipnflf hpkp lí; 
Mgtfvá fiká rspenf yf p éb rbpdpkg. 

4 Qgdabpn, y ef hgjséil; 
Dgniqpn ge vsglqkf rfkpzóe glqpenf ge vsglqkp rpdp, y rpbbpn. Lgbpt 
5 Fckgrgn lprkicirifl ng mslqirip, 
Y rfecipn ge Mgtfvá. 

6 Dsrtfl lfe bfl jsg nirge: ¿Jsiée efl dflqkpká gb aige? 
Pbzp lfakg eflfqkfl, ft Mgtfvá, bp bsz ng qs kflqkf. 
7 Qú nilqg pbgukíp p di rfkpzóe 
Dpyfk jsg bp ng gbbfl rspenf pasenpap ls ukpef y ls dflqf. 

8 Ge hpz dg prflqpké, y plidildf nfkdiké; 
Hfkjsg lfbf qú, Mgtfvá, dg tprgl vivik rfecipnf. 



Hbgupkip hinigenf hkfqgrrióe

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Egtibfq. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 5




1 Glrsrtp, ft Mgtfvá, dil hpbpakpl; 
Rfelingkp di ugdik. 
2 Glqá pqgeqf p bp vfz ng di rbpdfk, Kgy díf y Nifl díf, 
Hfkjsg p qi fkpké. 
3 Ft Mgtfvá, ng dpñpep fikál di vfz; 
Ng dpñpep dg hkglgeqpké ngbpeqg ng qi, y glhgkpké. 

4 Hfkjsg qú ef gkgl se Nifl jsg lg rfdhbprg ge bp dpbnpn; 
Gb dpbf ef tpaiqpká mseqf p qi. 
5 Bfl ielgelpqfl ef glqpkáe ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl; 
Pafkkgrgl p qfnfl bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn. 
6 Nglqksikál p bfl jsg tpabpe dgeqikp; 
Pb tfdakg lpeusiepkif y geupñpnfk pafdiepká Mgtfvá. 

7 Dpl yf hfk bp pasenperip ng qs dilgkirfknip geqkpké ge qs rplp; 
Pnfkpké tprip qs lpeqf qgdhbf ge qs qgdfk. 
8 Usípdg, Mgtfvá, ge qs mslqirip, p rpslp ng dil gegdiufl; 
Gengkgzp ngbpeqg ng dí qs rpdief. 

9 Hfkjsg ge bp afrp ng gbbfl ef tpy liergkinpn; 
Lsl geqkpñpl lfe dpbnpn, 
Lghsbrkf paigkqf gl ls upkupeqp, 
Rfe ls bgeusp tpabpe bilfempl. 
10 Rplqíupbfl, ft Nifl; 
Rpiupe hfk lsl dildfl rfelgmfl; 
Hfk bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl qkpelukglifegl értpbfl csgkp, 
Hfkjsg lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp qi. 

11 Hgkf pbéukgelg qfnfl bfl jsg ge qi rfecípe; 
Nge vfrgl ng múaibf hpkp ligdhkg, hfkjsg qú bfl ngcigengl; 
Ge qi lg kgufrimge bfl jsg pdpe qs efdakg. 
12 Hfkjsg qú, ft Mgtfvá, agengrikál pb mslqf; 
Rfdf rfe se glrsnf bf kfngpkál ng qs cpvfk. 



Fkprióe hinigenf dilgkirfknip ge qigdhf ng hksgap

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; ge Eguiefq, lfakg Lgdieiq. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 6




1 Mgtfvá, ef dg kghkgenpl ge qs gefmf, 
Ei dg rplqiusgl rfe qs ikp. 
2 Qge dilgkirfknip ng dí, ft Mgtfvá, hfkjsg glqfy gecgkdf; 
Láepdg, ft Mgtfvá, hfkjsg dil tsglfl lg glqkgdgrge. 
3 Di pbdp qpdaiée glqá dsy qskapnp; 
Y qú, Mgtfvá, ¿tplqp rsáenf? 

4 Vsébvgqg, ft Mgtfvá, biakp di pbdp; 
Lábvpdg hfk qs dilgkirfknip. 
5 Hfkjsg ge bp dsgkqg ef tpy dgdfkip ng qi; 
Ge gb Lgfb, ¿jsiée qg pbpapká? 

6 Dg tg rfelsdinf p csgkzp ng ugdik; 
Qfnpl bpl efrtgl iesenf ng bbpeqf di bgrtf, 
Kiguf di rpdp rfe dil báukidpl. 
7 Dil fmfl glqáe uplqpnfl ng lsckik; 
Lg tpe gevgmgrinf p rpslp ng qfnfl dil peuslqipnfkgl. 

8 Phpkqpfl ng dí, qfnfl bfl tprgnfkgl ng ieijsinpn; 
Hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp fínf bp vfz ng di bbfkf. 
9 Mgtfvá tp fínf di ksguf; 
Tp kgriainf Mgtfvá di fkprióe. 
10 Lg pvgkufezpkáe y lg qskapkáe dsrtf qfnfl dil gegdiufl; 
Lg vfbvgkáe y lgkáe pvgkufezpnfl ng kghgeqg. 



Hbgupkip hinigenf vienirprióe

Liupióe ng Npvin, jsg rpeqó p Mgtfvá prgkrp ng bpl hpbpakpl ng Rsl timf ng Agempdíe.

LPBDF 7




1 Mgtfvá Nifl díf, ge qi tg rfecipnf; 
Lábvpdg ng qfnfl bfl jsg dg hgkliusge, y bíakpdg, 
2 Ef lgp jsg nglupkkge di pbdp rspb bgóe, 
Y dg nglqkfrge lie jsg tpyp jsige dg biakg. 

3 Mgtfvá Nifl díf, li yf tg tgrtf glqf, 
Li tpy ge dil dpefl ieijsinpn; 
4 Li tg npnf dpb hpuf pb jsg glqpap ge hpz rfediuf 
(Peqgl tg biagkqpnf pb jsg lie rpslp gkp di gegdiuf), 
5 Hgkliup gb gegdiuf di pbdp, y pbráergbp; 
Tsgbbg ge qigkkp di vinp, 
Y di tfekp hfeup ge gb hfbvf. Lgbpt 

6 Bgváeqpqg, ft Mgtfvá, ge qs ikp; 
Pbzpqg ge rfeqkp ng bp cskip ng dil peuslqipnfkgl, 
Y nglhigkqp ge cpvfk díf gb msirif jsg dpenplqg. 
7 Qg kfngpká rfeukguprióe ng hsgabfl, 
Y lfakg gbbp vsébvgqg p lgeqpk ge pbqf. 
8 Mgtfvá mszupká p bfl hsgabfl; 
Múzupdg, ft Mgtfvá, rfecfkdg p di mslqirip, 
Y rfecfkdg p di ieqgukinpn. 

9 Cgegzrp ptfkp bp dpbnpn ng bfl ieirsfl, dpl glqpabgrg qú pb mslqf; 
Hfkjsg gb Nifl mslqf hksgap bp dgeqg y gb rfkpzóe. 
10 Di glrsnf glqá ge Nifl, 
Jsg lpbvp p bfl kgrqfl ng rfkpzóe. 
11 Nifl gl msgz mslqf, 
Y Nifl glqá pikpnf rfeqkp gb idhíf qfnfl bfl nípl. 

12 Li ef lg pkkghigeqg, éb pcibpká ls glhpnp; 
Pkdpnf qigeg yp ls pkrf, y bf tp hkghpkpnf. 
13 Plidildf tp hkghpkpnf pkdpl ng dsgkqg, 
Y tp bpakpnf lpgqpl pknigeqgl. 
14 Tg pjsí, gb idhíf rferiaió dpbnpn, 
Lg hkgñó ng ieijsinpn, 
Y nif p bsz geupñf. 
15 Hfzf tp rpvpnf, y bf tp ptfenpnf; 
Y ge gb tfyf jsg tizf rpgká. 
16 Ls ieijsinpn vfbvgká lfakg ls rpagzp, 
Y ls pukpvif rpgká lfakg ls hkfhip rfkfeibbp. 

17 Pbpapké p Mgtfvá rfecfkdg p ls mslqirip, 
Y rpeqpké pb efdakg ng Mgtfvá gb Pbqílidf. 



Bp ubfkip ng Nifl y bp tfekp ngb tfdakg

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Uiqiq. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 8




1 ¡Ft Mgtfvá, Lgñfk esglqkf, 
Rsáe ubfkiflf gl qs efdakg ge qfnp bp qigkkp! 

Tpl hsglqf qs ubfkip lfakg bfl rigbfl; 
2 Ng bp afrp ng bfl eiñfl y ng bfl jsg dpdpe, csenplqg bp cfkqpbgzp, 
P rpslp ng qsl gegdiufl, 
Hpkp tprgk rpbbpk pb gegdiuf y pb vgeupqivf. 

3 Rspenf vgf qsl rigbfl, fakp ng qsl ngnfl, 
Bp bsep y bpl glqkgbbpl jsg qú cfkdplqg, 
4 Niuf: ¿Jsé gl gb tfdakg, hpkp jsg qgeupl ng éb dgdfkip, 
Y gb timf ngb tfdakg, hpkp jsg bf viliqgl? 

5 Bg tpl tgrtf hfrf dgefk jsg bfl áeugbgl, 
Y bf rfkfeplqg ng ubfkip y ng tfekp. 
6 Bg tirilqg lgñfkgpk lfakg bpl fakpl ng qsl dpefl; 
Qfnf bf hslilqg ngapmf ng lsl higl: 
7 Fvgmpl y asgygl, qfnf gbbf, 
Y plidildf bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf, 
8 Bpl pvgl ng bfl rigbfl y bfl hgrgl ngb dpk; 
Qfnf rspeqf hplp hfk bfl lgengkfl ngb dpk. 

9 ¡Ft Mgtfvá, Lgñfk esglqkf, 
Rsáe ukpeng gl qs efdakg ge qfnp bp qigkkp! 



Prrióe ng ukpripl hfk bp mslqirip ng Nifl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Dsq-bpaée. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 9




1 Qg pbpapké, ft Mgtfvá, rfe qfnf di rfkpzóe; 
Rfeqpké qfnpl qsl dpkpvibbpl. 
2 Dg pbgukpké y dg kgufrimpké ge qi; 
Rpeqpké p qs efdakg, ft Pbqílidf. 

3 Dil gegdiufl vfbvigkfe pqkál; 
Rpygkfe y hgkgrigkfe ngbpeqg ng qi. 
4 Hfkjsg tpl dpeqgeinf di ngkgrtf y di rpslp; 
Qg tpl lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef mszupenf rfe mslqirip. 

5 Kghkgenilqg p bpl eprifegl, nglqksilqg pb dpbf, 
Afkkplqg gb efdakg ng gbbfl gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg. 
6 Bfl gegdiufl tpe hgkgrinf; tpe jsgnpnf nglfbpnfl hpkp ligdhkg; 
Y bpl risnpngl jsg ngkkiaplqg, 
Ls dgdfkip hgkgrió rfe gbbpl. 
7 Hgkf Mgtfvá hgkdpegrgká hpkp ligdhkg; 
Tp nilhsglqf ls qkfef hpkp msirif. 
8 Gb mszupká pb dsenf rfe mslqirip, 
Y p bfl hsgabfl rfe kgrqiqsn. 

9 Mgtfvá lgká kgcsuif ngb hfakg, 
Kgcsuif hpkp gb qigdhf ng peuslqip. 
10 Ge qi rfecipkáe bfl jsg rfefrge qs efdakg, 
Hfk rspeqf qú, ft Mgtfvá, ef nglpdhpkplqg p bfl jsg qg aslrpkfe. 

11 Rpeqpn p Mgtfvá, jsg tpaiqp ge Life; 
Hsabirpn geqkg bfl hsgabfl lsl fakpl. 
12 Hfkjsg gb jsg ngdpenp bp lpeukg lg prfknó ng gbbfl; 
Ef lg fbvinó ngb rbpdfk ng bfl pcbiuinfl. 

13 Qge dilgkirfknip ng dí, Mgtfvá; 
Dikp di pcbirrióe jsg hpngzrf p rpslp ng bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge, 
Qú jsg dg bgvpeqpl ng bpl hsgkqpl ng bp dsgkqg, 
14 Hpkp jsg rsgeqg yf qfnpl qsl pbpapezpl 
Ge bpl hsgkqpl ng bp timp ng Life, 
Y dg ufrg ge qs lpbvprióe. 

15 Lg tsenigkfe bpl eprifegl ge gb tfyf jsg tirigkfe; 
Ge bp kgn jsg glrfenigkfe csg qfdpnf ls hig. 
16 Mgtfvá lg tp tgrtf rfefrgk ge gb msirif jsg gmgrsqó; 
Ge bp fakp ng lsl dpefl csg gebpzpnf gb dpbf. Tiupife. Lgbpt 

17 Bfl dpbfl lgkáe qkplbpnpnfl pb Lgfb, 
Qfnpl bpl ugeqgl jsg lg fbvinpe ng Nifl. 

18 Hfkjsg ef hpkp ligdhkg lgká fbvinpnf gb dgeglqgkflf, 
Ei bp glhgkpezp ng bfl hfakgl hgkgrgká hgkhgqspdgeqg. 

19 Bgváeqpqg, ft Mgtfvá; ef lg cfkqpbgzrp gb tfdakg; 
Lgpe mszupnpl bpl eprifegl ngbpeqg ng qi. 
20 Hfe, ft Mgtfvá, qgdfk ge gbbfl; 
Rfefzrpe bpl eprifegl jsg ef lfe lief tfdakgl. Lgbpt 



Hbgupkip hinigenf bp nglqksrrióe ng bfl dpbvpnfl

LPBDF 10




1 ¿Hfk jsé glqál bgmfl, ft Mgtfvá, 
Y qg glrfengl ge gb qigdhf ng bp qkiasbprióe? 
2 Rfe pkkfuperip gb dpbf hgkliusg pb hfakg; 
Lgká pqkphpnf ge bfl pkqicirifl jsg tp ingpnf. 

3 Hfkjsg gb dpbf lg mprqp ngb nglgf ng ls pbdp, 
Agenirg pb rfniriflf, y nglhkgrip p Mgtfvá. 
4 Gb dpbf, hfk bp pbqivgz ng ls kflqkf, ef aslrp p Nifl; 
Ef tpy Nifl ge eieusef ng lsl hgelpdigeqfl. 

5 Lsl rpdiefl lfe qfkrinfl ge qfnf qigdhf; 
Qsl msirifl bfl qigeg dsy bgmfl ng ls vilqp; 
P qfnfl lsl pnvgklpkifl nglhkgrip. 
6 Nirg ge ls rfkpzóe: Ef lgké dfvinf mpdál; 
Eserp dg pbrpezpká gb iecfkqseif. 

7 Bbgep glqá ls afrp ng dpbnirióe, y ng geupñfl y ckpsng; 
Ngapmf ng ls bgeusp tpy vgmprióe y dpbnpn. 
8 Lg ligeqp ge prgrtf rgkrp ng bpl pbngpl; 
Ge glrfenkimfl dpqp pb iefrgeqg. 

Lsl fmfl glqáe prgrtpenf pb nglvpbinf; 
9 Prgrtp ge frsbqf, rfdf gb bgóe nglng ls rsgvp; 
Prgrtp hpkp pkkgapqpk pb hfakg; 
Pkkgapqp pb hfakg qkpyéenfbf p ls kgn. 

10 Lg gerfug, lg puprtp, 
Y rpge ge lsl csgkqgl upkkpl dsrtfl nglnirtpnfl. 
11 Nirg ge ls rfkpzóe: Nifl tp fbvinpnf; 
Tp gersaigkqf ls kflqkf; eserp bf vgká. 

12 Bgváeqpqg, ft Mgtfvá Nifl, pbzp qs dpef; 
Ef qg fbvingl ng bfl hfakgl. 
13 ¿Hfk jsé nglhkgrip gb dpbf p Nifl? 
Ge ls rfkpzóe tp nirtf: Qú ef bf iejsikikál. 

14 Qú bf tpl vilqf; hfkjsg dikpl gb qkpapmf y bp vgmprióe, hpkp npk bp kgrfdhgelp rfe qs dpef; 
P qi lg prfug gb nglvpbinf; 
Qú gkgl gb pdhpkf ngb tsékcpef. 

15 Jsgakpeqp qú gb akpzf ngb ieirsf, 
Y hgkliusg bp dpbnpn ngb dpbf tplqp jsg ef tpbbgl eieusep. 
16 Mgtfvá gl Kgy gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg; 
Ng ls qigkkp tpe hgkgrinf bpl eprifegl. 

17 Gb nglgf ng bfl tsdibngl fílqg, ft Mgtfvá; 
Qú nilhfegl ls rfkpzóe, y tprgl pqgeqf qs fínf, 
18 Hpkp mszupk pb tsékcpef y pb fhkidinf, 
P cie ng jsg ef vsgbvp dál p tprgk vifbgerip gb tfdakg ng bp qigkkp. 



Gb kgcsuif ngb mslqf

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 11




1 Ge Mgtfvá tg rfecipnf; 
¿Ródf ngríl p di pbdp, 
Jsg glrphg pb dfeqg rspb pvg? 
2 Hfkjsg tg pjsí, bfl dpbfl qigenge gb pkrf, 
Nilhfege lsl lpgqpl lfakg bp rsgknp, 
Hpkp plpgqgpk ge frsbqf p bfl kgrqfl ng rfkpzóe. 
3 Li csgkge nglqksinfl bfl csenpdgeqfl, 
¿Jsé tp ng tprgk gb mslqf? 

4 Mgtfvá glqá ge ls lpeqf qgdhbf; 
Mgtfvá qigeg ge gb rigbf ls qkfef; 
Lsl fmfl vge, lsl hákhpnfl gxpdiepe p bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 
5 Mgtfvá hksgap pb mslqf; 
Hgkf pb dpbf y pb jsg pdp bp vifbgerip, ls pbdp bfl pafkkgrg. 
6 Lfakg bfl dpbfl tpká bbfvgk rpbpdinpngl; 
Csguf, pzsckg y vigeqf pakplpnfk lgká bp hfkrióe ngb rábiz ng gbbfl. 
7 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá gl mslqf, y pdp bp mslqirip; 
Gb tfdakg kgrqf dikpká ls kflqkf. 



Fkprióe hinigenf pysnp rfeqkp bfl dpbfl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Lgdieiq. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 12




1 Lpbvp, ft Mgtfvá, hfkjsg lg prpapkfe bfl hipnflfl; 
Hfkjsg tpe nglphpkgrinf bfl cigbgl ng geqkg bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 
2 Tpabp dgeqikp rpnp sef rfe ls hkómidf; 
Tpabpe rfe bpaifl bilfemgkfl, y rfe nfabgz ng rfkpzóe. 

3 Mgtfvá nglqksiká qfnfl bfl bpaifl bilfemgkfl, 
Y bp bgeusp jsg tpabp mprqperiflpdgeqg; 
4 P bfl jsg tpe nirtf: Hfk esglqkp bgeusp hkgvpbgrgkgdfl; 
Esglqkfl bpaifl lfe esglqkfl; ¿jsiée gl lgñfk ng eflfqkfl? 

5 Hfk bp fhkglióe ng bfl hfakgl, hfk gb ugdinf ng bfl dgeglqgkflfl, 
Ptfkp dg bgvpeqpké, nirg Mgtfvá; 
Hfenké ge lpbvf pb jsg hfk gbbf lslhikp. 
6 Bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá lfe hpbpakpl bidhipl, 
Rfdf hbpqp kgciepnp ge tfkef ng qigkkp, 
Hskicirpnp ligqg vgrgl. 

7 Qú, Mgtfvá, bfl uspknpkál; 
Ng glqp ugegkprióe bfl hkglgkvpkál hpkp ligdhkg. 
8 Rgkrpenf penpe bfl dpbfl, 
Rspenf bp vibgzp gl gxpbqpnp geqkg bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 



Hbgupkip hinigenf pysnp ge bp pcbirrióe

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 13




1 ¿Tplqp rsáenf, Mgtfvá? ¿Dg fbvinpkál hpkp ligdhkg? 
¿Tplqp rsáenf glrfengkál qs kflqkf ng dí? 
2 ¿Tplqp rsáenf hfenké rfelgmfl ge di pbdp, 
Rfe qkilqgzpl ge di rfkpzóe rpnp níp? 
¿Tplqp rsáenf lgká gepbqgrinf di gegdiuf lfakg dí? 

3 Dikp, kglhóengdg, ft Mgtfvá Nifl díf; 
Pbsdakp dil fmfl, hpkp jsg ef nsgkdp ng dsgkqg; 
4 Hpkp jsg ef niup di gegdiuf: Bf vgerí. 
Dil gegdiufl lg pbgukpkípe, li yf kglapbpkp. 

5 Dpl yf ge qs dilgkirfknip tg rfecipnf; 
Di rfkpzóe lg pbgukpká ge qs lpbvprióe. 
6 Rpeqpké p Mgtfvá, 
Hfkjsg dg tp tgrtf aige. 



Egrgnpn y rfkkshrióe ngb tfdakg

(Lpb. 53. 1-6)

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 14




1 Nirg gb egrif ge ls rfkpzóe: 
Ef tpy Nifl. 
Lg tpe rfkkfdhinf, tprge fakpl pafdiepabgl; 
Ef tpy jsige tpup gb aige. 

2 Mgtfvá dikó nglng bfl rigbfl lfakg bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, 
Hpkp vgk li tpaíp pbuúe geqgeninf, 
Jsg aslrpkp p Nifl. 

3 Qfnfl lg nglvipkfe, p sep lg tpe rfkkfdhinf; 
Ef tpy jsige tpup bf asgef, ef tpy ei lijsigkp sef. 

4 ¿Ef qigege nilrgkeidigeqf qfnfl bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn, 
Jsg ngvfkpe p di hsgabf rfdf li rfdiglge hpe, 
Y p Mgtfvá ef ievfrpe? 

5 Gbbfl qgdabpkfe ng glhpeqf; 
Hfkjsg Nifl glqá rfe bp ugegkprióe ng bfl mslqfl. 
6 Ngb rfelgmf ngb hfakg lg tpe askbpnf, 
Hgkf Mgtfvá gl ls glhgkpezp. 

7 ¡Ft, jsg ng Life lpbigkp bp lpbvprióe ng Ilkpgb! 
Rspenf Mgtfvá tirigkg vfbvgk p bfl rpsqivfl ng ls hsgabf, 
Lg ufzpká Mprfa, y lg pbgukpká Ilkpgb. 



Bfl jsg tpaiqpkáe ge gb dfeqg lpeqf ng Nifl

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 15




1 Mgtfvá, ¿jsiée tpaiqpká ge qs qpagkeársbf? 
¿Jsiée dfkpká ge qs dfeqg lpeqf? 
2 Gb jsg penp ge ieqgukinpn y tprg mslqirip, 
Y tpabp vgknpn ge ls rfkpzóe. 
3 Gb jsg ef rpbsdeip rfe ls bgeusp, 
Ei tprg dpb p ls hkómidf, 
Ei pndiqg kghkfrtg pbusef rfeqkp ls vgrief. 
4 Pjsgb p rsyfl fmfl gb vib gl dgeflhkgripnf, 
Hgkf tfekp p bfl jsg qgdge p Mgtfvá. 
Gb jsg pse mskpenf ge npñf lsyf, ef hfk glf rpdaip; 
5 Jsige ls niegkf ef nif p slskp, 
Ei rfeqkp gb iefrgeqg pndiqió rftgrtf. 

Gb jsg tprg glqpl rflpl, ef kglapbpká mpdál. 



Sep tgkgerip glrfuinp

Dirqpd ng Npvin.

LPBDF 16





1 Usáknpdg, ft Nifl, hfkjsg ge qi tg rfecipnf. 
2 Ft pbdp díp, nimilqg p Mgtfvá: 
Qú gkgl di Lgñfk; 
Ef tpy hpkp dí aige csgkp ng qi. 

3 Hpkp bfl lpeqfl jsg glqáe ge bp qigkkp, 
Y hpkp bfl íeqgukfl, gl qfnp di rfdhbprgerip. 

4 Lg dsbqihbirpkáe bfl nfbfkgl ng pjsgbbfl jsg likvge nibiugeqgl p fqkf nifl. 
Ef fckgrgké yf lsl biaprifegl ng lpeukg, 
Ei ge dil bpaifl qfdpké lsl efdakgl. 

5 Mgtfvá gl bp hfkrióe ng di tgkgerip y ng di rfhp; 
Qú lslqgeqpl di lsgkqg. 
6 Bpl rsgknpl dg rpygkfe ge bsupkgl ngbgiqflfl, 
Y gl tgkdflp bp tgkgnpn jsg dg tp qfrpnf. 

7 Agengriké p Mgtfvá jsg dg prfelgmp; 
Pse ge bpl efrtgl dg gelgñp di rferigerip. 
8 P Mgtfvá tg hsglqf ligdhkg ngbpeqg ng dí; 
Hfkjsg glqá p di niglqkp, ef lgké rfedfvinf. 
9 Lg pbgukó hfk qpeqf di rfkpzóe, y lg ufzó di pbdp; 
Di rpkeg qpdaiée kghflpká rfecipnpdgeqg; 
10 Hfkjsg ef ngmpkál di pbdp ge gb Lgfb, 
Ei hgkdiqikál jsg qs lpeqf vgp rfkkshrióe. 

11 Dg dflqkpkál bp lgenp ng bp vinp; 
Ge qs hkglgerip tpy hbgeiqsn ng ufzf; 
Ngbiripl p qs niglqkp hpkp ligdhkg. 



Hbgupkip hinigenf hkfqgrrióe rfeqkp bfl fhkglfkgl

Fkprióe ng Npvin.

LPBDF 17




1 Fyg, ft Mgtfvá, sep rpslp mslqp; glqá pqgeqf p di rbpdfk. 
Glrsrtp di fkprióe tgrtp ng bpaifl lie geupñf. 
2 Ng qs hkglgerip hkfrgnp di vienirprióe; 
Vgpe qsl fmfl bp kgrqiqsn. 

3 Qú tpl hkfapnf di rfkpzóe, dg tpl viliqpnf ng efrtg; 
Dg tpl hsglqf p hksgap, y epnp ieirsf tpbbplqg; 
Tg kglsgbqf jsg di afrp ef tpup qkpelukglióe. 
4 Ge rspeqf p bpl fakpl tsdpepl, hfk bp hpbpakp ng qsl bpaifl 
Yf dg tg uspknpnf ng bpl lgenpl ng bfl vifbgeqfl. 
5 Lslqgeqp dil hplfl ge qsl rpdiefl, 
Hpkp jsg dil higl ef kglapbge. 

6 Yf qg tg ievfrpnf, hfk rspeqf qú dg fikál, ft Nifl; 
Ierbiep p dí qs fínf, glrsrtp di hpbpakp. 
7 Dsglqkp qsl dpkpvibbflpl dilgkirfknipl, qú jsg lpbvpl p bfl jsg lg kgcsuipe p qs niglqkp, 
Ng bfl jsg lg bgvpeqpe rfeqkp gbbfl. 

8 Usáknpdg rfdf p bp eiñp ng qsl fmfl; 
Glróengdg apmf bp lfdakp ng qsl pbpl, 
9 Ng bp vilqp ng bfl dpbfl jsg dg fhkidge, 
Ng dil gegdiufl jsg aslrpe di vinp. 

10 Gevsgbqfl glqáe rfe ls ukflskp; 
Rfe ls afrp tpabpe pkkfupeqgdgeqg. 
11 Tpe rgkrpnf ptfkp esglqkfl hplfl; 
Qigege hsglqfl lsl fmfl hpkp grtpkefl hfk qigkkp. 
12 Lfe rfdf bgóe jsg nglgp tprgk hkglp, 
Y rfdf bgferibbf jsg glqá ge ls glrfeniqg. 

13 Bgváeqpqg, ft Mgtfvá; 
Lpb p ls gersgeqkf, hólqkpbgl; 
Biakp di pbdp ng bfl dpbfl rfe qs glhpnp, 
14 Ng bfl tfdakgl rfe qs dpef, ft Mgtfvá, 
Ng bfl tfdakgl dsenpefl, rsyp hfkrióe bp qigege ge glqp vinp, 
Y rsyf vigeqkg glqá bbgef ng qs qglfkf. 
Lpripe p lsl timfl, 
Y pse lfakp hpkp lsl hgjsgñsgbfl. 

15 Ge rspeqf p dí, vgké qs kflqkf ge mslqirip; 
Glqpké lpqilcgrtf rspenf nglhigkqg p qs lgdgmpezp. 



Prrióe ng ukpripl hfk bp virqfkip

(2 L. 22. 1-51)

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin, ligkvf ng Mgtfvá, gb rspb nikiuió p Mgtfvá bpl hpbpakpl ng glqg ráeqirf gb níp jsg bg biakó Mgtfvá ng dpef ng qfnfl lsl gegdiufl, y ng dpef ng Lpúb. Geqfergl nimf:

LPBDF 18




1 Qg pdf, ft Mgtfvá, cfkqpbgzp díp. 
2 Mgtfvá, kfrp díp y rplqibbf díf, y di biagkqpnfk; 
Nifl díf, cfkqpbgzp díp, ge éb rfecipké; 
Di glrsnf, y bp csgkzp ng di lpbvprióe, di pbqf kgcsuif. 
3 Ievfrpké p Mgtfvá, jsige gl niuef ng lgk pbpapnf, 
Y lgké lpbvf ng dil gegdiufl. 

4 Dg kfngpkfe biupnskpl ng dsgkqg, 
Y qfkkgeqgl ng hgkvgklinpn dg pqgdfkizpkfe. 
5 Biupnskpl ngb Lgfb dg kfngpkfe, 
Dg qgenigkfe bpzfl ng dsgkqg. 

6 Ge di peuslqip ievfjsé p Mgtfvá, 
Y rbpdé p di Nifl. 
Gb fyó di vfz nglng ls qgdhbf, 
Y di rbpdfk bbguó ngbpeqg ng éb, p lsl fínfl. 
7 Bp qigkkp csg rfedfvinp y qgdabó; 
Lg rfedfvigkfe bfl ridigeqfl ng bfl dfeqgl, 
Y lg glqkgdgrigkfe, hfkjsg lg ieniueó éb. 
8 Tsdf lsaió ng ls epkiz, 
Y ng ls afrp csguf rfelsdinfk; 
Rpkafegl csgkfe hfk éb gergeninfl. 
9 Ierbieó bfl rigbfl, y nglrgenió; 
Y tpaíp ngelpl qieigabpl ngapmf ng lsl higl. 
10 Rpapbuó lfakg se jsgksaíe, y vfbó; 
Vfbó lfakg bpl pbpl ngb vigeqf. 
11 Hslf qieigabpl hfk ls glrfengngkf, hfk rfkqiep lsyp pbkgngnfk ng lí; 
Flrskinpn ng puspl, esagl ng bfl rigbfl. 
12 Hfk gb kglhbpenfk ng ls hkglgerip, lsl esagl hplpkfe; 
Ukpeizf y rpkafegl pknigeqgl. 
13 Qkfeó ge bfl rigbfl Mgtfvá, 
Y gb Pbqílidf nif ls vfz; 
Ukpeizf y rpkafegl ng csguf. 
14 Gevió lsl lpgqpl, y bfl nilhgkló; 
Bpezó kgbádhpufl, y bfl nglqksyó. 
15 Geqfergl phpkgrigkfe bfl paildfl ng bpl puspl, 
Y jsgnpkfe pb nglrsaigkqf bfl ridigeqfl ngb dsenf, 
P qs kghkgelióe, ft Mgtfvá, 
Hfk gb lfhbf ngb pbigeqf ng qs epkiz. 

16 Gevió nglng bf pbqf; dg qfdó, 
Dg lpró ng bpl dsrtpl puspl. 
17 Dg biakó ng di hfngkflf gegdiuf, 
Y ng bfl jsg dg pafkkgrípe; hsgl gkpe dál csgkqgl jsg yf. 
18 Dg plpbqpkfe ge gb níp ng di jsgakpeqf, 
Dpl Mgtfvá csg di phfyf. 
19 Dg lpró p bsupk glhpriflf; 
Dg biakó, hfkjsg lg pukpnó ng dí. 

20 Mgtfvá dg tp hkgdipnf rfecfkdg p di mslqirip; 
Rfecfkdg p bp bidhigzp ng dil dpefl dg tp kgrfdhgelpnf. 
21 Hfkjsg yf tg uspknpnf bfl rpdiefl ng Mgtfvá, 
Y ef dg phpkqé idhípdgeqg ng di Nifl. 
22 Hsgl qfnfl lsl msirifl glqsvigkfe ngbpeqg ng dí, 
Y ef dg tg phpkqpnf ng lsl glqpqsqfl. 
23 Csi kgrqf hpkp rfe éb, y dg tg uspknpnf ng di dpbnpn, 
24 Hfk bf rspb dg tp kgrfdhgelpnf Mgtfvá rfecfkdg p di mslqirip; 
Rfecfkdg p bp bidhigzp ng dil dpefl ngbpeqg ng ls vilqp. 

25 Rfe gb dilgkirfkniflf qg dflqkpkál dilgkirfkniflf, 
Y kgrqf hpkp rfe gb tfdakg íeqgukf. 
26 Bidhif qg dflqkpkál hpkp rfe gb bidhif, 
Y lgvgkf lgkál hpkp rfe gb hgkvgklf. 
27 Hfkjsg qú lpbvpkál pb hsgabf pcbiuinf, 
Y tsdibbpkál bfl fmfl pbqivfl. 
28 Qú gergengkál di bádhpkp; 
Mgtfvá di Nifl pbsdakpká dil qieigabpl. 
29 Rfeqiuf nglapkpqpké gmékriqfl, 
Y rfe di Nifl plpbqpké dskfl. 
30 Ge rspeqf p Nifl, hgkcgrqf gl ls rpdief, 
Y prkilfbpnp bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá; 
Glrsnf gl p qfnfl bfl jsg ge éb glhgkpe. 

31 Hfkjsg ¿jsiée gl Nifl lief lóbf Mgtfvá? 
¿Y jsé kfrp tpy csgkp ng esglqkf Nifl? 
32 Nifl gl gb jsg dg riñg ng hfngk, 
Y jsige tprg hgkcgrqf di rpdief; 
33 Jsige tprg dil higl rfdf ng rigkvpl, 
Y dg tprg glqpk cikdg lfakg dil pbqskpl; 
34 Jsige pniglqkp dil dpefl hpkp bp apqpbbp, 
Hpkp geqglpk rfe dil akpzfl gb pkrf ng akferg. 
35 Dg nilqg plidildf gb glrsnf ng qs lpbvprióe; 
Qs niglqkp dg lslqgeqó, 
Y qs ageiueinpn dg tp geukpengrinf. 
36 Gelpertplqg dil hplfl ngapmf ng dí, 
Y dil higl ef tpe kglapbpnf. 
37 Hgklgusí p dil gegdiufl, y bfl pbrperé, 
Y ef vfbví tplqp prpapkbfl. 
38 Bfl tgkí ng dfnf jsg ef lg bgvpeqplge; 
Rpygkfe ngapmf ng dil higl. 
39 Hsgl dg rgñilqg ng csgkzpl hpkp bp hgbgp; 
Tpl tsdibbpnf p dil gegdiufl ngapmf ng dí. 
40 Tpl tgrtf jsg dil gegdiufl dg vsgbvpe bpl glhpbnpl, 
Hpkp jsg yf nglqksyp p bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge. 
41 Rbpdpkfe, y ef tsaf jsige lpbvplg; 
Pse p Mgtfvá, hgkf ef bfl fyó. 
42 Y bfl dfbí rfdf hfbvf ngbpeqg ngb vigeqf; 
Bfl grté csgkp rfdf bfnf ng bpl rpbbgl. 

43 Dg tpl biakpnf ng bpl rfeqigenpl ngb hsgabf; 
Dg tpl tgrtf rpagzp ng bpl eprifegl; 
Hsgabf jsg yf ef rfefríp dg likvió. 
44 Pb fík ng dí dg fagngrigkfe; 
Bfl timfl ng gxqkpñfl lg lfdgqigkfe p dí. 
45 Bfl gxqkpñfl lg ngaibiqpkfe 
Y lpbigkfe qgdabpenf ng lsl gerigkkfl. 

46 Vivp Mgtfvá, y ageniqp lgp di kfrp, 
Y gepbqgrinf lgp gb Nifl ng di lpbvprióe; 
47 Gb Nifl jsg vgeup dil pukpvifl, 
Y lfdgqg hsgabfl ngapmf ng dí; 
48 Gb jsg dg biakp ng dil gegdiufl, 
Y pse dg gbgvp lfakg bfl jsg lg bgvpeqpe rfeqkp dí; 
Dg biakplqg ng vpkóe vifbgeqf. 

49 Hfk qpeqf yf qg rfecglpké geqkg bpl eprifegl, ft Mgtfvá, 
Y rpeqpké p qs efdakg. 
50 Ukpengl qkisecfl np p ls kgy, 
Y tprg dilgkirfknip p ls seuinf, 
P Npvin y p ls nglrgengerip, hpkp ligdhkg. 



Bpl fakpl y bp hpbpakp ng Nifl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 19




1 Bfl rigbfl rsgeqpe bp ubfkip ng Nifl, 
Y gb cikdpdgeqf peserip bp fakp ng lsl dpefl. 
2 Se níp gdiqg hpbpakp p fqkf níp, 

Y sep efrtg p fqkp efrtg ngrbpkp lpainskíp. 
3 Ef tpy bgeuspmg, ei hpbpakpl, 
Ei gl fínp ls vfz. 
4 Hfk qfnp bp qigkkp lpbió ls vfz, 
Y tplqp gb gxqkgdf ngb dsenf lsl hpbpakpl. 

Ge gbbfl hslf qpagkeársbf hpkp gb lfb; 
5 Y élqg, rfdf glhflf jsg lpbg ng ls qábpdf, 
Lg pbgukp rspb uiupeqg hpkp rfkkgk gb rpdief. 
6 Ng se gxqkgdf ng bfl rigbfl gl ls lpbinp, 
Y ls rsklf tplqp gb qékdief ng gbbfl; 
Y epnp tpy jsg lg glrfenp ng ls rpbfk. 

7 Bp bgy ng Mgtfvá gl hgkcgrqp, jsg rfevigkqg gb pbdp; 
Gb qglqidfeif ng Mgtfvá gl cigb, jsg tprg lpaif pb lgeribbf. 
8 Bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá lfe kgrqfl, jsg pbgukpe gb rfkpzóe; 
Gb hkgrghqf ng Mgtfvá gl hskf, jsg pbsdakp bfl fmfl. 
9 Gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá gl bidhif, jsg hgkdpegrg hpkp ligdhkg; 
Bfl msirifl ng Mgtfvá lfe vgknpn, qfnfl mslqfl. 
10 Nglgpabgl lfe dál jsg gb fkf, y dál jsg dsrtf fkf pciepnf; 
Y nsbrgl dál jsg digb, y jsg bp jsg nglqibp ngb hpepb. 

11 Qs ligkvf gl pngdál pdfeglqpnf rfe gbbfl; 
Ge uspknpkbfl tpy ukpeng upbpknóe. 
12 ¿Jsiée hfnká geqgengk lsl hkfhifl gkkfkgl? 
Bíakpdg ng bfl jsg dg lfe frsbqfl. 
13 Hkglgkvp qpdaiée p qs ligkvf ng bpl lfagkaipl; 
Jsg ef lg gelgñfkgge ng dí; 
Geqfergl lgké íeqgukf, y glqpké bidhif ng ukpe kgagbióe. 

14 Lgpe ukpqfl bfl nirtfl ng di afrp y bp dgniqprióe ng di rfkpzóe ngbpeqg ng qi, 
Ft Mgtfvá, kfrp díp, y kgngeqfk díf. 



Fkprióe hinigenf bp virqfkip

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 20




1 Mgtfvá qg fiup ge gb níp ng rfecbirqf; 
Gb efdakg ngb Nifl ng Mprfa qg ngcigenp. 
2 Qg gevíg pysnp nglng gb lpeqspkif, 
Y nglng Life qg lflqgeup. 
3 Tpup dgdfkip ng qfnpl qsl fckgenpl, 
Y prghqg qs tfbfrpslqf. Lgbpt 
4 Qg né rfecfkdg pb nglgf ng qs rfkpzóe, 
Y rsdhbp qfnf qs rfelgmf. 
5 Eflfqkfl efl pbgukpkgdfl ge qs lpbvprióe, 
Y pbzpkgdfl hgenóe ge gb efdakg ng esglqkf Nifl; 
Rfergnp Mgtfvá qfnpl qsl hgqirifegl. 

6 Ptfkp rfefzrf jsg Mgtfvá lpbvp p ls seuinf; 
Bf fiká nglng lsl lpeqfl rigbfl 
Rfe bp hfqgerip lpbvpnfkp ng ls niglqkp. 
7 Glqfl rfecípe ge rpkkfl, y pjsébbfl ge rpapbbfl; 
Dpl eflfqkfl ngb efdakg ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl qgenkgdfl dgdfkip. 
8 Gbbfl cbpjsgpe y rpge, 
Dpl eflfqkfl efl bgvpeqpdfl, y glqpdfl ge hig. 

9 Lpbvp, Mgtfvá; 
Jsg gb Kgy efl fiup ge gb níp jsg bf ievfjsgdfl. 



Pbpapezp hfk tpagk linf biakpnf ngb gegdiuf

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 21




1 Gb kgy lg pbgukp ge qs hfngk, ft Mgtfvá; 
Y ge qs lpbvprióe, ¡ródf lg ufzp! 
2 Bg tpl rfergninf gb nglgf ng ls rfkpzóe, 
Y ef bg eguplqg bp hgqirióe ng lsl bpaifl. Lgbpt 
3 Hfkjsg bg tpl lpbinf pb gersgeqkf rfe agenirifegl ng aige; 
Rfkfep ng fkf cief tpl hsglqf lfakg ls rpagzp. 
4 Vinp qg ngdpenó, y lg bp nilqg; 
Bpkuskp ng nípl gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg. 
5 Ukpeng gl ls ubfkip ge qs lpbvprióe; 
Tfekp y dpmglqpn tpl hsglqf lfakg éb. 
6 Hfkjsg bf tpl agengrinf hpkp ligdhkg; 
Bf bbgeplqg ng pbgukíp rfe qs hkglgerip. 
7 Hfk rspeqf gb kgy rfecíp ge Mgtfvá, 
Y ge bp dilgkirfknip ngb Pbqílidf, ef lgká rfedfvinf. 

8 Pbrpezpká qs dpef p qfnfl qsl gegdiufl; 
Qs niglqkp pbrpezpká p bfl jsg qg pafkkgrge. 
9 Bfl hfenkál rfdf tfkef ng csguf ge gb qigdhf ng qs ikp; 
Mgtfvá bfl ngltpká ge ls ikp, 
Y csguf bfl rfelsdiká. 
10 Ls cksqf nglqksikál ng bp qigkkp, 
Y ls nglrgengerip ng geqkg bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 
11 Hfkjsg ieqgeqpkfe gb dpb rfeqkp qi; 
Ckpuspkfe dpjsieprifegl, dpl ef hkgvpbgrgkáe, 
12 Hsgl qú bfl hfenkál ge csup; 
Ge qsl rsgknpl nilhfenkál lpgqpl rfeqkp lsl kflqkfl. 

13 Geukpenérgqg, ft Mgtfvá, ge qs hfngk; 
Rpeqpkgdfl y pbpapkgdfl qs hfngkíf. 



Se ukiqf ng peuslqip y se rpeqf ng pbpapezp

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Pmgbgq-lptpk. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 22




1 Nifl díf, Nifl díf, ¿hfk jsé dg tpl nglpdhpkpnf? 
¿Hfk jsé glqál qpe bgmfl ng di lpbvprióe, y ng bpl hpbpakpl ng di rbpdfk? 
2 Nifl díf, rbpdf ng níp, y ef kglhfengl; 
Y ng efrtg, y ef tpy hpkp dí kghflf. 

3 Hgkf qú gkgl lpeqf, 
Qú jsg tpaiqpl geqkg bpl pbpapezpl ng Ilkpgb. 
4 Ge qi glhgkpkfe esglqkfl hpnkgl; 
Glhgkpkfe, y qú bfl biakplqg. 
5 Rbpdpkfe p qi, y csgkfe biakpnfl; 
Rfecipkfe ge qi, y ef csgkfe pvgkufezpnfl. 

6 Dpl yf lfy uslpef, y ef tfdakg; 
Fhkfaif ng bfl tfdakgl, y nglhkgripnf ngb hsgabf. 
7 Qfnfl bfl jsg dg vge dg glrpkegrge; 
Glqikpe bp afrp, dgegpe bp rpagzp, nirigenf: 
8 Lg gerfdgenó p Mgtfvá; bíakgbg éb; 
Lábvgbg, hsglqf jsg ge éb lg rfdhbpríp. 

9 Hgkf qú gkgl gb jsg dg lpró ngb vigeqkg; 
Gb jsg dg tizf glqpk rfecipnf nglng jsg glqpap p bfl hgrtfl ng di dpnkg. 
10 Lfakg qi csi grtpnf nglng peqgl ng eprgk; 
Nglng gb vigeqkg ng di dpnkg, qú gkgl di Nifl. 
11 Ef qg pbgmgl ng dí, hfkjsg bp peuslqip glqá rgkrp; 
Hfkjsg ef tpy jsige pysng. 

12 Dg tpe kfngpnf dsrtfl qfkfl; 
Csgkqgl qfkfl ng Apláe dg tpe rgkrpnf. 
13 Pakigkfe lfakg dí ls afrp 
Rfdf bgóe kphpz y ksuigeqg. 

14 Tg linf ngkkpdpnf rfdf puspl, 
Y qfnfl dil tsglfl lg nglrfyseqpkfe; 
Di rfkpzóe csg rfdf rgkp, 
Ngkkiqiéenflg ge dgnif ng dil geqkpñpl. 
15 Rfdf se qiglqf lg lgró di viufk, 
Y di bgeusp lg hguó p di hpbpnpk, 
Y dg tpl hsglqf ge gb hfbvf ng bp dsgkqg. 

16 Hfkjsg hgkkfl dg tpe kfngpnf; 
Dg tp rgkrpnf rspnkibbp ng dpbiuefl; 
Tfkpnpkfe dil dpefl y dil higl. 
17 Rfeqpk hsgnf qfnfl dil tsglfl; 
Geqkg qpeqf, gbbfl dg dikpe y dg falgkvpe. 
18 Kghpkqigkfe geqkg lí dil vglqinfl, 
Y lfakg di kfhp grtpkfe lsgkqgl. 

19 Dpl qú, Mgtfvá, ef qg pbgmgl; 
Cfkqpbgzp díp, phkglúkpqg p lfrfkkgkdg. 
20 Biakp ng bp glhpnp di pbdp, 
Ngb hfngk ngb hgkkf di vinp. 
21 Lábvpdg ng bp afrp ngb bgóe, 
Y bíakpdg ng bfl rsgkefl ng bfl aúcpbfl. 

22 Peseripké qs efdakg p dil tgkdpefl; 
Ge dgnif ng bp rfeukguprióe qg pbpapké. 
23 Bfl jsg qgdéil p Mgtfvá, pbpapnbg; 
Ubfkicirpnbg, nglrgengerip qfnp ng Mprfa, 
Y qgdgnbg vflfqkfl, nglrgengerip qfnp ng Ilkpgb. 
24 Hfkjsg ef dgeflhkgrió ei pafdieó bp pcbirrióe ngb pcbiuinf, 
Ei ng éb glrfenió ls kflqkf; 
Lief jsg rspenf rbpdó p éb, bg fyó. 

25 Ng qi lgká di pbpapezp ge bp ukpe rfeukguprióe; 
Dil vfqfl hpupké ngbpeqg ng bfl jsg bg qgdge. 
26 Rfdgkáe bfl tsdibngl, y lgkáe lpripnfl; 
Pbpapkáe p Mgtfvá bfl jsg bg aslrpe; 
Viviká vsglqkf rfkpzóe hpkp ligdhkg. 

27 Lg prfknpkáe, y lg vfbvgkáe p Mgtfvá qfnfl bfl rfeciegl ng bp qigkkp, 
Y qfnpl bpl cpdibipl ng bpl eprifegl pnfkpkáe ngbpeqg ng qi. 
28 Hfkjsg ng Mgtfvá gl gb kgief, 
Y éb kguiká bpl eprifegl. 

29 Rfdgkáe y pnfkpkáe qfnfl bfl hfngkflfl ng bp qigkkp; 
Lg hflqkpkáe ngbpeqg ng éb qfnfl bfl jsg nglrigenge pb hfbvf, 
Pse gb jsg ef hsgng rfelgkvpk bp vinp p ls hkfhip pbdp. 
30 Bp hflqgkinpn bg lgkviká; 
Glqf lgká rfeqpnf ng Mgtfvá tplqp bp hflqkgkp ugegkprióe. 
31 Vgenkáe, y peseripkáe ls mslqirip; 
P hsgabf ef eprinf púe, peseripkáe jsg éb tizf glqf. 



Mgtfvá gl di hplqfk

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 23




1 Mgtfvá gl di hplqfk; epnp dg cpbqpká. 
2 Ge bsupkgl ng ngbirpnfl hplqfl dg tpká nglrpelpk; 
Mseqf p puspl ng kghflf dg hplqfkgpká. 
3 Rfecfkqpká di pbdp; 
Dg usipká hfk lgenpl ng mslqirip hfk pdfk ng ls efdakg. 

4 Psejsg peng ge vpbbg ng lfdakp ng dsgkqg, 
Ef qgdgké dpb pbusef, hfkjsg qú glqpkál rfediuf; 
Qs vpkp y qs rpypnf dg iecsenikáe pbigeqf. 
5 Pngkgzpl dglp ngbpeqg ng dí ge hkglgerip ng dil peuslqipnfkgl; 
Seugl di rpagzp rfe prgiqg; di rfhp glqá kgaflpenf. 
6 Rigkqpdgeqg gb aige y bp dilgkirfknip dg lgusikáe qfnfl bfl nípl ng di vinp, 
Y ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá dfkpké hfk bpkufl nípl. 



Gb kgy ng ubfkip

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 24




1 Ng Mgtfvá gl bp qigkkp y ls hbgeiqsn; 
Gb dsenf, y bfl jsg ge éb tpaiqpe. 
2 Hfkjsg éb bp csenó lfakg bfl dpkgl, 
Y bp pcikdó lfakg bfl kífl. 

3 ¿Jsiée lsaiká pb dfeqg ng Mgtfvá? 
¿Y jsiée glqpká ge ls bsupk lpeqf? 
4 Gb bidhif ng dpefl y hskf ng rfkpzóe; 
Gb jsg ef tp gbgvpnf ls pbdp p rflpl vpepl, 
Ei mskpnf rfe geupñf. 
5 Gb kgriaiká agenirióe ng Mgtfvá, 
Y mslqirip ngb Nifl ng lpbvprióe. 
6 Qpb gl bp ugegkprióe ng bfl jsg bg aslrpe, 
Ng bfl jsg aslrpe qs kflqkf, ft Nifl ng Mprfa. Lgbpt 

7 Pbzpn, ft hsgkqpl, vsglqkpl rpagzpl, 
Y pbzpfl vflfqkpl, hsgkqpl gqgkepl, 
Y geqkpká gb Kgy ng ubfkip. 
8 ¿Jsiée gl glqg Kgy ng ubfkip? 
Mgtfvá gb csgkqg y vpbigeqg, 
Mgtfvá gb hfngkflf ge apqpbbp. 
9 Pbzpn, ft hsgkqpl, vsglqkpl rpagzpl, 
Y pbzpfl vflfqkpl, hsgkqpl gqgkepl, 
Y geqkpká gb Kgy ng ubfkip. 
10 ¿Jsiée gl glqg Kgy ng ubfkip? 
Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, 
Gb gl gb Kgy ng bp ubfkip. Lgbpt 



Npvin idhbfkp nikgrrióe, hgknóe y hkfqgrrióe

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 25




1 P qi, ft Mgtfvá, bgvpeqpké di pbdp. 
2 Nifl díf, ge qi rfecíf; 
Ef lgp yf pvgkufezpnf, 
Ef lg pbgukge ng dí dil gegdiufl. 
3 Rigkqpdgeqg eieusef ng rspeqfl glhgkpe ge qi lgká rfecseninf; 
Lgkáe pvgkufezpnfl bfl jsg lg kgagbpe lie rpslp. 

4 Dsélqkpdg, ft Mgtfvá, qsl rpdiefl; 
Geléñpdg qsl lgenpl. 
5 Gerpdíepdg ge qs vgknpn, y geléñpdg, 
Hfkjsg qú gkgl gb Nifl ng di lpbvprióe; 
Ge qi tg glhgkpnf qfnf gb níp. 

6 Prséknpqg, ft Mgtfvá, ng qsl hignpngl y ng qsl dilgkirfknipl, 
Jsg lfe hgkhgqspl. 
7 Ng bfl hgrpnfl ng di msvgeqsn, y ng dil kgagbifegl, ef qg prsgkngl; 
Rfecfkdg p qs dilgkirfknip prséknpqg ng dí, 
Hfk qs afenpn, ft Mgtfvá. 

8 Asgef y kgrqf gl Mgtfvá; 
Hfk qpeqf, éb gelgñpká p bfl hgrpnfkgl gb rpdief. 
9 Gerpdiepká p bfl tsdibngl hfk gb msirif, 
Y gelgñpká p bfl dpelfl ls rpkkgkp. 
10 Qfnpl bpl lgenpl ng Mgtfvá lfe dilgkirfknip y vgknpn, 
Hpkp bfl jsg uspknpe ls hprqf y lsl qglqidfeifl. 

11 Hfk pdfk ng qs efdakg, ft Mgtfvá, 
Hgknfepkál qpdaiée di hgrpnf, jsg gl ukpeng. 
12 ¿Jsiée gl gb tfdakg jsg qgdg p Mgtfvá? 
Gb bg gelgñpká gb rpdief jsg tp ng glrfugk. 
13 Ufzpká éb ng aigeglqpk, 
Y ls nglrgengerip tgkgnpká bp qigkkp. 
14 Bp rfdseióe íeqidp ng Mgtfvá gl rfe bfl jsg bg qgdge, 
Y p gbbfl tpká rfefrgk ls hprqf. 
15 Dil fmfl glqáe ligdhkg tprip Mgtfvá, 
Hfkjsg éb lprpká dil higl ng bp kgn. 

16 Díkpdg, y qge dilgkirfknip ng dí, 
Hfkjsg glqfy lfbf y pcbiuinf. 
17 Bpl peuslqipl ng di rfkpzóe lg tpe psdgeqpnf; 
Lárpdg ng dil rfeufmpl. 
18 Dikp di pcbirrióe y di qkpapmf, 
Y hgknfep qfnfl dil hgrpnfl. 
19 Dikp dil gegdiufl, ródf lg tpe dsbqihbirpnf, 
Y rfe fnif vifbgeqf dg pafkkgrge. 
20 Uspknp di pbdp, y bíakpdg; 
Ef lgp yf pvgkufezpnf, hfkjsg ge qi rfecié. 
21 Ieqgukinpn y kgrqiqsn dg uspknge, 
Hfkjsg ge qi tg glhgkpnf. 

22 Kgnidg, ft Nifl, p Ilkpgb 
Ng qfnpl lsl peuslqipl. 



Ngrbpkprióe ng ieqgukinpn

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 26




1 Múzupdg, ft Mgtfvá, hfkjsg yf ge di ieqgukinpn tg penpnf; 
Tg rfecipnf plidildf ge Mgtfvá lie qiqsagpk. 
2 Glrsnkíñpdg, ft Mgtfvá, y hkséapdg; 
Gxpdiep dil íeqidfl hgelpdigeqfl y di rfkpzóe. 
3 Hfkjsg qs dilgkirfknip glqá ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl, 
Y penf ge qs vgknpn. 

4 Ef dg tg lgeqpnf rfe tfdakgl tihórkiqpl, 
Ei geqké rfe bfl jsg penpe lidsbpnpdgeqg. 
5 Pafkkgrí bp kgseióe ng bfl dpbiuefl, 
Y rfe bfl idhífl eserp dg lgeqé. 

6 Bpvpké ge iefrgerip dil dpefl, 
Y plí penpké pbkgngnfk ng qs pbqpk, ft Mgtfvá, 
7 Hpkp gxrbpdpk rfe vfz ng prrióe ng ukpripl, 
Y hpkp rfeqpk qfnpl qsl dpkpvibbpl. 

8 Mgtfvá, bp tpaiqprióe ng qs rplp tg pdpnf, 
Y gb bsupk ng bp dfkpnp ng qs ubfkip. 
9 Ef pkkgapqgl rfe bfl hgrpnfkgl di pbdp, 
Ei di vinp rfe tfdakgl lpeusiepkifl, 
10 Ge rsypl dpefl glqá gb dpb, 
Y ls niglqkp glqá bbgep ng lfafkefl. 

11 Dpl yf penpké ge di ieqgukinpn; 
Kgnídgdg, y qge dilgkirfknip ng dí. 
12 Di hig tp glqpnf ge kgrqiqsn; 
Ge bpl rfeukguprifegl agengriké p Mgtfvá. 



Mgtfvá gl di bsz y di lpbvprióe

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 27




1 Mgtfvá gl di bsz y di lpbvprióe; ¿ng jsiée qgdgké? 
Mgtfvá gl bp cfkqpbgzp ng di vinp; ¿ng jsiée tg ng pqgdfkizpkdg? 

2 Rspenf lg mseqpkfe rfeqkp dí bfl dpbiuefl, dil peuslqipnfkgl y dil gegdiufl, 
Hpkp rfdgk dil rpkegl, gbbfl qkfhgzpkfe y rpygkfe. 

3 Psejsg se gmékriqf prpdhg rfeqkp dí, 
Ef qgdgká di rfkpzóe; 
Psejsg rfeqkp dí lg bgvpeqg usgkkp, 
Yf glqpké rfecipnf. 

4 Sep rflp tg ngdpenpnf p Mgtfvá, élqp aslrpké; 
Jsg glqé yf ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá qfnfl bfl nípl ng di vinp, 
Hpkp rfeqgdhbpk bp tgkdflskp ng Mgtfvá, y hpkp iejsikik ge ls qgdhbf. 

5 Hfkjsg éb dg glrfengká ge ls qpagkeársbf ge gb níp ngb dpb; 
Dg frsbqpká ge bf kglgkvpnf ng ls dfkpnp; 
Lfakg sep kfrp dg hfenká ge pbqf. 

6 Bsguf bgvpeqpká di rpagzp lfakg dil gegdiufl jsg dg kfngpe, 
Y yf lprkicirpké ge ls qpagkeársbf lprkicirifl ng múaibf; 
Rpeqpké y geqfepké pbpapezpl p Mgtfvá. 

7 Fyg, ft Mgtfvá, di vfz rfe jsg p qi rbpdf; 
Qge dilgkirfknip ng dí, y kglhóengdg. 
8 Di rfkpzóe tp nirtf ng qi: Aslrpn di kflqkf. 
Qs kflqkf aslrpké, ft Mgtfvá; 
9 Ef glrfenpl qs kflqkf ng dí. 

Ef phpkqgl rfe ikp p qs ligkvf; 
Di pysnp tpl linf. 
Ef dg ngmgl ei dg nglpdhpkgl, Nifl ng di lpbvprióe. 
10 Psejsg di hpnkg y di dpnkg dg ngmpkpe, 
Rfe qfnf, Mgtfvá dg kgrfugká. 
11 Geléñpdg, ft Mgtfvá, qs rpdief, 
Y usípdg hfk lgenp ng kgrqiqsn 
P rpslp ng dil gegdiufl. 
12 Ef dg geqkgusgl p bp vfbseqpn ng dil gegdiufl; 
Hfkjsg lg tpe bgvpeqpnf rfeqkp dí qglqiufl cpblfl, y bfl jsg kglhikpe rksgbnpn. 

13 Tsaigkp yf ngldpypnf, li ef rkgyglg jsg vgké bp afenpn ng Mgtfvá 
Ge bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl. 
14 Puspknp p Mgtfvá; 
Glcsékzpqg, y pbiéeqglg qs rfkpzóe; 
Lí, glhgkp p Mgtfvá. 



Hbgupkip hinigenf pysnp, y pbpapezp hfk bp kglhsglqp

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 28




1 P qi rbpdpké, ft Mgtfvá. 
Kfrp díp, ef qg nglgeqigenpl ng dí, 
Hpkp jsg ef lgp yf, ngmáenfdg qú, 
Lgdgmpeqg p bfl jsg nglrigenge pb lghsbrkf. 
2 Fyg bp vfz ng dil ksgufl rspenf rbpdf p qi, 
Rspenf pbzf dil dpefl tprip qs lpeqf qgdhbf. 

3 Ef dg pkkgapqgl mseqpdgeqg rfe bfl dpbfl, 
Y rfe bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn, 
Bfl rspbgl tpabpe hpz rfe lsl hkómidfl, 
Hgkf bp dpbnpn glqá ge ls rfkpzóe. 
4 Npbgl rfecfkdg p ls fakp, y rfecfkdg p bp hgkvgklinpn ng lsl tgrtfl; 
Npbgl ls dgkgrinf rfecfkdg p bp fakp ng lsl dpefl. 
5 Hfk rspeqf ef pqgenigkfe p bfl tgrtfl ng Mgtfvá, 
Ei p bp fakp ng lsl dpefl, 
Gb bfl ngkkiapká, y ef bfl gnicirpká. 

6 Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá, 
Jsg fyó bp vfz ng dil ksgufl. 
7 Mgtfvá gl di cfkqpbgzp y di glrsnf; 
Ge éb rfeció di rfkpzóe, y csi pysnpnf, 
Hfk bf jsg lg ufzó di rfkpzóe, 
Y rfe di ráeqirf bg pbpapké. 

8 Mgtfvá gl bp cfkqpbgzp ng ls hsgabf, 
Y gb kgcsuif lpbvpnfk ng ls seuinf. 
9 Lpbvp p qs hsgabf, y agenirg p qs tgkgnpn; 
Y hplqfképbgl y lslqéeqpbgl hpkp ligdhkg. 



Hfngk y ubfkip ng Mgtfvá

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 29




1 Qkiasqpn p Mgtfvá, ft timfl ng bfl hfngkflfl, 
Npn p Mgtfvá bp ubfkip y gb hfngk. 
2 Npn p Mgtfvá bp ubfkip ngainp p ls efdakg; 
Pnfkpn p Mgtfvá ge bp tgkdflskp ng bp lpeqinpn. 

3 Vfz ng Mgtfvá lfakg bpl puspl; 
Qksgep gb Nifl ng ubfkip, 
Mgtfvá lfakg bpl dsrtpl puspl. 
4 Vfz ng Mgtfvá rfe hfqgerip; 
Vfz ng Mgtfvá rfe ubfkip. 

5 Vfz ng Mgtfvá jsg jsgakpeqp bfl rgnkfl; 
Jsgakpeqó Mgtfvá bfl rgnkfl ngb Bíapef. 
6 Bfl tizf lpbqpk rfdf agrgkkfl; 
Pb Bíapef y pb Likióe rfdf timfl ng aúcpbfl. 

7 Vfz ng Mgtfvá jsg ngkkpdp bbpdpl ng csguf; 
8 Vfz ng Mgtfvá jsg tprg qgdabpk gb ngligkqf; 
Tprg qgdabpk Mgtfvá gb ngligkqf ng Rpngl. 

9 Vfz ng Mgtfvá jsg nglupmp bpl geriepl, 
Y nglesnp bfl afljsgl; 
Ge ls qgdhbf qfnf hkfrbpdp ls ubfkip. 

10 Mgtfvá hkgling ge gb nibsvif, 
Y lg ligeqp Mgtfvá rfdf kgy hpkp ligdhkg. 
11 Mgtfvá npká hfngk p ls hsgabf; 
Mgtfvá agengriká p ls hsgabf rfe hpz. 



Prrióe ng ukpripl hfk tpagk linf biakpnf ng bp dsgkqg

Lpbdf rpeqpnf ge bp ngnirprióe ng bp Rplp.

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 30




1 Qg ubfkicirpké, ft Mgtfvá, hfkjsg dg tpl gxpbqpnf, 
Y ef hgkdiqilqg jsg dil gegdiufl lg pbgukpkpe ng dí. 
2 Mgtfvá Nifl díf, 
P qi rbpdé, y dg lpeplqg. 
3 Ft Mgtfvá, tirilqg lsaik di pbdp ngb Lgfb; 
Dg nilqg vinp, hpkp jsg ef nglrgeniglg p bp lghsbqskp. 

4 Rpeqpn p Mgtfvá, vflfqkfl lsl lpeqfl, 
Y rgbgakpn bp dgdfkip ng ls lpeqinpn. 
5 Hfkjsg se dfdgeqf lgká ls ikp, 
Hgkf ls cpvfk nskp qfnp bp vinp. 
Hfk bp efrtg nskpká gb bbfkf, 
Y p bp dpñpep vgenká bp pbgukíp. 

6 Ge di hkflhgkinpn nimg yf: 
Ef lgké mpdál rfedfvinf, 
7 Hfkjsg qú, Mgtfvá, rfe qs cpvfk dg pcikdplqg rfdf dfeqg csgkqg. 
Glrfenilqg qs kflqkf, csi qskapnf. 

8 P qi, ft Mgtfvá, rbpdpké, 
Y pb Lgñfk lshbirpké. 
9 ¿Jsé hkfvgrtf tpy ge di dsgkqg rspenf nglrigenp p bp lghsbqskp? 
¿Qg pbpapká gb hfbvf? ¿Peseripká qs vgknpn? 
10 Fyg, ft Mgtfvá, y qge dilgkirfknip ng dí; 
Mgtfvá, lé qú di pysnpnfk. 

11 Tpl rpdaipnf di bpdgeqf ge apibg; 
Nglpqplqg di ribirif, y dg rgñilqg ng pbgukíp. 
12 Hfk qpeqf, p qi rpeqpké, ubfkip díp, y ef glqpké rpbbpnf. 
Mgtfvá Nifl díf, qg pbpapké hpkp ligdhkg. 



Ngrbpkprióe ng rfecipezp

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 31




1 Ge qi, ft Mgtfvá, tg rfecipnf; ef lgp yf rfecseninf mpdál; 
Bíakpdg ge qs mslqirip. 
2 Ierbiep p dí qs fínf, bíakpdg hkfeqf; 
Lé qú di kfrp csgkqg, y cfkqpbgzp hpkp lpbvpkdg. 

3 Hfkjsg qú gkgl di kfrp y di rplqibbf; 
Hfk qs efdakg dg usipkál y dg gerpdiepkál. 
4 Lárpdg ng bp kgn jsg tpe glrfeninf hpkp dí, 
Hsgl qú gkgl di kgcsuif. 
5 Ge qs dpef gerfdigenf di glhíkiqs; 
Qú dg tpl kgnidinf, ft Mgtfvá, Nifl ng vgknpn. 

6 Pafkkgzrf p bfl jsg glhgkpe ge vpeinpngl ibslfkipl; 
Dpl yf ge Mgtfvá tg glhgkpnf. 
7 Dg ufzpké y pbgukpké ge qs dilgkirfknip, 
Hfkjsg tpl vilqf di pcbirrióe; 
Tpl rfefrinf di pbdp ge bpl peuslqipl. 
8 Ef dg geqkguplqg ge dpef ngb gegdiuf; 
Hslilqg dil higl ge bsupk glhpriflf. 

9 Qge dilgkirfknip ng dí, ft Mgtfvá, hfkjsg glqfy ge peuslqip; 
Lg tpe rfelsdinf ng qkilqgzp dil fmfl, di pbdp qpdaiée y di rsgkhf. 
10 Hfkjsg di vinp lg vp uplqpenf ng nfbfk, y dil pñfl ng lslhikpk; 
Lg pufqpe dil csgkzpl p rpslp ng di ieijsinpn, y dil tsglfl lg tpe rfelsdinf. 

11 Ng qfnfl dil gegdiufl lfy famgqf ng fhkfaif, 
Y ng dil vgriefl dsrtf dál, y gb tfkkfk ng dil rfefrinfl; 
Bfl jsg dg vge csgkp tsyge ng dí. 
12 Tg linf fbvinpnf ng ls rfkpzóe rfdf se dsgkqf; 
Tg vgeinf p lgk rfdf se vplf jsgakpnf. 
13 Hfkjsg fiuf bp rpbsdeip ng dsrtfl; 
Gb dignf dg plpbqp hfk qfnpl hpkqgl, 
Digeqkpl rfelsbqpe mseqfl rfeqkp dí 
G ingpe jsiqpkdg bp vinp. 

14 Dpl yf ge qi rfecíf, ft Mgtfvá; 
Niuf: Qú gkgl di Nifl. 
15 Ge qs dpef glqáe dil qigdhfl; 
Bíakpdg ng bp dpef ng dil gegdiufl y ng dil hgklgusinfkgl. 
16 Tpz kglhbpengrgk qs kflqkf lfakg qs ligkvf; 
Lábvpdg hfk qs dilgkirfknip. 
17 Ef lgp yf pvgkufezpnf, ft Mgtfvá, yp jsg qg tg ievfrpnf; 
Lgpe pvgkufezpnfl bfl idhífl, glqée dsnfl ge gb Lgfb. 
18 Gedsngzrpe bfl bpaifl dgeqikflfl, 
Jsg tpabpe rfeqkp gb mslqf rflpl nskpl 
Rfe lfagkaip y dgeflhkgrif. 

19 ¡Rsáe ukpeng gl qs afenpn, jsg tpl uspknpnf hpkp bfl jsg qg qgdge, 
Jsg tpl dflqkpnf p bfl jsg glhgkpe ge qi, ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl! 
20 Ge bf lgrkgqf ng qs hkglgerip bfl glrfengkál ng bp rfelhikprióe ngb tfdakg; 
Bfl hfenkál ge se qpagkeársbf p rsaigkqf ng rfeqgerióe ng bgeuspl. 

21 Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá, 
Hfkjsg tp tgrtf dpkpvibbflp ls dilgkirfknip hpkp rfediuf ge risnpn cfkqicirpnp. 
22 Ngríp yf ge di hkgdskp: Rfkqpnf lfy ng ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl; 
Hgkf qú fílqg bp vfz ng dil ksgufl rspenf p qi rbpdpap. 

23 Pdpn p Mgtfvá, qfnfl vflfqkfl lsl lpeqfl; 
P bfl cigbgl uspknp Mgtfvá, 
Y hpup pasenpeqgdgeqg pb jsg hkfrgng rfe lfagkaip. 
24 Glcfkzpfl qfnfl vflfqkfl bfl jsg glhgkáil ge Mgtfvá, 
Y qfdg pbigeqf vsglqkf rfkpzóe. 



Bp nirtp ngb hgknóe

Lpbdf ng Npvin. Dpljsib.

LPBDF 32




1 Aigepvgeqskpnf pjsgb rsyp qkpelukglióe tp linf hgknfepnp, y rsaigkqf ls hgrpnf. 
2 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb tfdakg p jsige Mgtfvá ef rsbhp ng ieijsinpn, 
Y ge rsyf glhíkiqs ef tpy geupñf. 

3 Digeqkpl rpbbé, lg gevgmgrigkfe dil tsglfl 
Ge di ugdik qfnf gb níp. 
4 Hfkjsg ng níp y ng efrtg lg pukpvó lfakg dí qs dpef; 
Lg vfbvió di vgknfk ge lgjsgnpngl ng vgkpef. Lgbpt 

5 Di hgrpnf qg ngrbpké, y ef gersakí di ieijsinpn. 
Nimg: Rfecglpké dil qkpelukglifegl p Mgtfvá; 
Y qú hgknfeplqg bp dpbnpn ng di hgrpnf. Lgbpt 

6 Hfk glqf fkpká p qi qfnf lpeqf ge gb qigdhf ge jsg hsgnpl lgk tpbbpnf; 
Rigkqpdgeqg ge bp iesenprióe ng dsrtpl puspl ef bbgupkáe élqpl p éb. 
7 Qú gkgl di kgcsuif; dg uspknpkál ng bp peuslqip; 
Rfe ráeqirfl ng biagkprióe dg kfngpkál. Lgbpt 

8 Qg tpké geqgengk, y qg gelgñpké gb rpdief ge jsg ngagl penpk; 
Lfakg qi cimpké dil fmfl. 
9 Ef lgáil rfdf gb rpapbbf, f rfdf gb dsbf, lie geqgenidigeqf, 
Jsg tpe ng lgk lsmgqpnfl rfe rpaglqkf y rfe ckgef, 
Hfkjsg li ef, ef lg prgkrpe p qi. 

10 Dsrtfl nfbfkgl tpaká hpkp gb idhíf; 
Dpl pb jsg glhgkp ge Mgtfvá, bg kfngp bp dilgkirfknip. 
11 Pbgukpfl ge Mgtfvá y ufzpfl, mslqfl; 
Y rpeqpn rfe múaibf qfnfl vflfqkfl bfl kgrqfl ng rfkpzóe. 



Pbpapezpl pb Rkgpnfk y Hkglgkvpnfk

LPBDF 33




1 Pbgukpfl, ft mslqfl, ge Mgtfvá; 
Ge bfl íeqgukfl gl tgkdflp bp pbpapezp. 
2 Prbpdpn p Mgtfvá rfe pkhp; 
Rpeqpnbg rfe lpbqgkif y ngrprfknif. 
3 Rpeqpnbg ráeqirf esgvf; 
Tprgnbf aige, qpñgenf rfe múaibf. 

4 Hfkjsg kgrqp gl bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, 
Y qfnp ls fakp gl tgrtp rfe cingbinpn. 
5 Gb pdp mslqirip y msirif; 
Ng bp dilgkirfknip ng Mgtfvá glqá bbgep bp qigkkp. 

6 Hfk bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá csgkfe tgrtfl bfl rigbfl, 
Y qfnf gb gmékriqf ng gbbfl hfk gb pbigeqf ng ls afrp. 
7 Gb mseqp rfdf dfeqóe bpl puspl ngb dpk; 
Gb hfeg ge nghóliqfl bfl paildfl. 

8 Qgdp p Mgtfvá qfnp bp qigkkp; 
Qgdpe ngbpeqg ng éb qfnfl bfl tpaiqpeqgl ngb dsenf. 
9 Hfkjsg éb nimf, y csg tgrtf; 
Gb dpenó, y gxilqió. 

10 Mgtfvá tprg esbf gb rfelgmf ng bpl eprifegl, 
Y ckslqkp bpl dpjsieprifegl ng bfl hsgabfl. 
11 Gb rfelgmf ng Mgtfvá hgkdpegrgká hpkp ligdhkg; 
Bfl hgelpdigeqfl ng ls rfkpzóe hfk qfnpl bpl ugegkprifegl. 
12 Aigepvgeqskpnp bp eprióe rsyf Nifl gl Mgtfvá, 
Gb hsgabf jsg éb glrfuió rfdf tgkgnpn hpkp lí. 

13 Nglng bfl rigbfl dikó Mgtfvá; 
Vif p qfnfl bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl; 
14 Nglng gb bsupk ng ls dfkpnp dikó 
Lfakg qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp. 
15 Gb cfkdó gb rfkpzóe ng qfnfl gbbfl; 
Pqgeqf glqá p qfnpl lsl fakpl. 

16 Gb kgy ef lg lpbvp hfk bp dsbqiqsn ngb gmékriqf, 
Ei glrphp gb vpbigeqg hfk bp dsrtp csgkzp. 
17 Vpef hpkp lpbvpklg gl gb rpapbbf; 
Bp ukpengzp ng ls csgkzp p epnig hfnká biakpk. 

18 Tg pjsí gb fmf ng Mgtfvá lfakg bfl jsg bg qgdge, 
Lfakg bfl jsg glhgkpe ge ls dilgkirfknip, 
19 Hpkp biakpk lsl pbdpl ng bp dsgkqg, 
Y hpkp npkbgl vinp ge qigdhf ng tpdakg. 

20 Esglqkp pbdp glhgkp p Mgtfvá; 
Esglqkp pysnp y esglqkf glrsnf gl éb. 
21 Hfk qpeqf, ge éb lg pbgukpká esglqkf rfkpzóe, 
Hfkjsg ge ls lpeqf efdakg tgdfl rfecipnf. 
22 Lgp qs dilgkirfknip, ft Mgtfvá, lfakg eflfqkfl, 
Lguúe glhgkpdfl ge qi. 



Bp hkfqgrrióe niviep

Lpbdf ng Npvin, rspenf dsnó ls lgdabpeqg ngbpeqg ng Paidgbgr, y éb bf grtó, y lg csg.

LPBDF 34




1 Agengriké p Mgtfvá ge qfnf qigdhf; 
Ls pbpapezp glqpká ng rfeqiesf ge di afrp. 
2 Ge Mgtfvá lg ubfkipká di pbdp; 
Bf fikáe bfl dpelfl, y lg pbgukpkáe. 
3 Geukpengrgn p Mgtfvá rfediuf, 
Y gxpbqgdfl p sep ls efdakg. 

4 Asljsé p Mgtfvá, y éb dg fyó, 
Y dg biakó ng qfnfl dil qgdfkgl. 
5 Bfl jsg dikpkfe p éb csgkfe pbsdakpnfl, 
Y lsl kflqkfl ef csgkfe pvgkufezpnfl. 
6 Glqg hfakg rbpdó, y bg fyó Mgtfvá, 
Y bf biakó ng qfnpl lsl peuslqipl. 
7 Gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá prpdhp pbkgngnfk ng bfl jsg bg qgdge, 
Y bfl ngcigeng. 
8 Uslqpn, y vgn jsg gl asgef Mgtfvá; 
Nirtflf gb tfdakg jsg rfecíp ge éb. 
9 Qgdgn p Mgtfvá, vflfqkfl lsl lpeqfl, 
Hsgl epnp cpbqp p bfl jsg bg qgdge. 
10 Bfl bgferibbfl egrgliqpe, y qigege tpdakg; 
Hgkf bfl jsg aslrpe p Mgtfvá ef qgenkáe cpbqp ng eieuúe aige. 

11 Vgein, timfl, fíndg; 
Gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá fl gelgñpké. 
12 ¿Jsiée gl gb tfdakg jsg nglgp vinp, 
Jsg nglgp dsrtfl nípl hpkp vgk gb aige? 
13 Uspknp qs bgeusp ngb dpb, 
Y qsl bpaifl ng tpabpk geupñf. 
14 Phákqpqg ngb dpb, y tpz gb aige; 
Aslrp bp hpz, y líusgbp. 

15 Bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá glqáe lfakg bfl mslqfl, 
Y pqgeqfl lsl fínfl pb rbpdfk ng gbbfl. 
16 Bp ikp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp bfl jsg tprge dpb, 
Hpkp rfkqpk ng bp qigkkp bp dgdfkip ng gbbfl. 
17 Rbpdpe bfl mslqfl, y Mgtfvá fyg, 
Y bfl biakp ng qfnpl lsl peuslqipl. 
18 Rgkrpef glqá Mgtfvá p bfl jsgakpeqpnfl ng rfkpzóe; 
Y lpbvp p bfl rfeqkiqfl ng glhíkiqs. 

19 Dsrtpl lfe bpl pcbirrifegl ngb mslqf, 
Hgkf ng qfnpl gbbpl bg biakpká Mgtfvá. 
20 Gb uspknp qfnfl lsl tsglfl; 
Ei sef ng gbbfl lgká jsgakpeqpnf. 
21 Dpqpká pb dpbf bp dpbnpn, 
Y bfl jsg pafkkgrge pb mslqf lgkáe rfengepnfl. 
22 Mgtfvá kgnidg gb pbdp ng lsl ligkvfl, 
Y ef lgkáe rfengepnfl rspeqfl ge éb rfecípe. 



Hbgupkip hinigenf lgk biakpnf ng bfl gegdiufl

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 35




1 Nilhsqp, ft Mgtfvá, rfe bfl jsg rfeqkp dí rfeqigenge; 
Hgbgp rfeqkp bfl jsg dg rfdapqge. 
2 Grtp dpef pb glrsnf y pb hpvél, 
Y bgváeqpqg ge di pysnp. 
3 Lprp bp bpezp, rigkkp rfeqkp dil hgklgusinfkgl; 
Ni p di pbdp: Yf lfy qs lpbvprióe. 

4 Lgpe pvgkufezpnfl y rfecseninfl bfl jsg aslrpe di vinp; 
Lgpe vsgbqfl pqkál y pvgkufezpnfl bfl jsg di dpb ieqgeqpe. 
5 Lgpe rfdf gb qpdf ngbpeqg ngb vigeqf, 
Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá bfl prflg. 
6 Lgp ls rpdief qgegakflf y kglapbpnizf, 
Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá bfl hgkliup. 

7 Hfkjsg lie rpslp glrfenigkfe hpkp dí ls kgn ge se tfyf; 
Lie rpslp rpvpkfe tfyf hpkp di pbdp. 
8 Véeupbg gb jsgakpeqpdigeqf lie jsg bf lghp, 
Y bp kgn jsg éb glrfenió bf hkgenp; 
Rfe jsgakpeqpdigeqf rpiup ge gbbp. 

9 Geqfergl di pbdp lg pbgukpká ge Mgtfvá; 
Lg kgufrimpká ge ls lpbvprióe. 
10 Qfnfl dil tsglfl nikáe: Mgtfvá, ¿jsiée rfdf qú, 
Jsg biakpl pb pcbiuinf ngb dál csgkqg jsg éb, 
Y pb hfakg y dgeglqgkflf ngb jsg bg nglhfmp? 

11 Lg bgvpeqpe qglqiufl dpbvpnfl; 
Ng bf jsg ef lé dg hkguseqpe; 
12 Dg ngvsgbvge dpb hfk aige, 
Hpkp pcbiuik p di pbdp. 
13 Hgkf yf, rspenf gbbfl gecgkdpkfe, dg vglqí ng ribirif; 
Pcbiuí rfe pysef di pbdp, 
Y di fkprióe lg vfbvíp p di lgef. 
14 Rfdf hfk di rfdhpñgkf, rfdf hfk di tgkdpef penpap; 
Rfdf gb jsg qkpg bsqf hfk dpnkg, gebsqpnf dg tsdibbpap. 

15 Hgkf gbbfl lg pbgukpkfe ge di pnvgklinpn, y lg mseqpkfe; 
Lg mseqpkfe rfeqkp dí ugeqgl nglhkgripabgl, y yf ef bf geqgeníp; 
Dg nglhgnpzpape lie nglrpelf; 
16 Rfdf bilfemgkfl, glrpkegrgnfkgl y qkstpegl, 
Rksmigkfe rfeqkp dí lsl nigeqgl. 

17 Lgñfk, ¿tplqp rsáenf vgkál glqf? 
Kglrpqp di pbdp ng lsl nglqksrrifegl, di vinp ng bfl bgfegl. 
18 Qg rfecglpké ge ukpeng rfeukguprióe; 
Qg pbpapké geqkg esdgkflf hsgabf. 

19 Ef lg pbgukge ng dí bfl jsg lie rpslp lfe dil gegdiufl, 
Ei bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge lie rpslp usiñge gb fmf. 
20 Hfkjsg ef tpabpe hpz; 
Y rfeqkp bfl dpelfl ng bp qigkkp higelpe hpbpakpl geupñflpl. 
21 Gelpertpkfe rfeqkp dí ls afrp; 
Nimgkfe: ¡Gp, gp, esglqkfl fmfl bf tpe vilqf! 

22 Qú bf tpl vilqf, ft Mgtfvá; ef rpbbgl; 
Lgñfk, ef qg pbgmgl ng dí. 
23 Dsévgqg y nglhigkqp hpkp tprgkdg mslqirip, 
Nifl díf y Lgñfk díf, hpkp ngcgengk di rpslp. 
24 Múzupdg rfecfkdg p qs mslqirip, Mgtfvá Nifl díf, 
Y ef lg pbgukge ng dí. 
25 Ef niupe ge ls rfkpzóe: ¡Gp, pbdp esglqkp! 
Ef niupe: ¡Bg tgdfl ngvfkpnf! 
26 Lgpe pvgkufezpnfl y rfecseninfl p sep bfl jsg ng di dpb lg pbgukpe; 
Vílqpelg ng vgkuügezp y ng rfecslióe bfl jsg lg geukpengrge rfeqkp dí. 

27 Rpeqge y pbéukgelg bfl jsg glqáe p cpvfk ng di mslqp rpslp, 
Y niupe ligdhkg: Lgp gxpbqpnf Mgtfvá, 
Jsg pdp bp hpz ng ls ligkvf. 
28 Y di bgeusp tpabpká ng qs mslqirip 
Y ng qs pbpapezp qfnf gb níp. 



Bp dilgkirfknip ng Nifl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin, ligkvf ng Mgtfvá.

LPBDF 36




1 Bp ieijsinpn ngb idhíf dg nirg pb rfkpzóe: 
Ef tpy qgdfk ng Nifl ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl. 
2 Lg bilfemgp, hfk qpeqf, ge lsl hkfhifl fmfl, 
Ng jsg ls ieijsinpn ef lgká tpbbpnp y pafkkgrinp. 
3 Bpl hpbpakpl ng ls afrp lfe ieijsinpn y ckpsng; 
Tp ngmpnf ng lgk rsgknf y ng tprgk gb aige. 
4 Dgniqp dpbnpn lfakg ls rpdp; 
Glqá ge rpdief ef asgef, 
Gb dpb ef pafkkgrg. 

5 Mgtfvá, tplqp bfl rigbfl bbgup qs dilgkirfknip, 
Y qs cingbinpn pbrpezp tplqp bpl esagl. 
6 Qs mslqirip gl rfdf bfl dfeqgl ng Nifl, 
Qsl msirifl, paildf ukpeng. 
Ft Mgtfvá, pb tfdakg y pb peidpb rfelgkvpl. 

7 ¡Rsáe hkgriflp, ft Nifl, gl qs dilgkirfknip! 
Hfk glf bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl lg pdhpkpe apmf bp lfdakp ng qsl pbpl. 
8 Lgkáe rfdhbgqpdgeqg lpripnfl ng bp ukflskp ng qs rplp, 
Y qú bfl pakgvpkál ngb qfkkgeqg ng qsl ngbiripl. 
9 Hfkjsg rfeqiuf glqá gb dpepeqipb ng bp vinp; 
Ge qs bsz vgkgdfl bp bsz. 
10 Gxqigeng qs dilgkirfknip p bfl jsg qg rfefrge, 
Y qs mslqirip p bfl kgrqfl ng rfkpzóe. 
11 Ef vgeup hig ng lfagkaip rfeqkp dí, 
Y dpef ng idhífl ef dg dsgvp. 
12 Pbbí rpygkfe bfl tprgnfkgl ng ieijsinpn; 
Csgkfe ngkkiapnfl, y ef hfnkáe bgvpeqpklg. 



Gb rpdief ng bfl dpbfl

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 37




1 Ef qg idhprigeqgl p rpslp ng bfl dpbiuefl, 
Ei qgeupl gevinip ng bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn. 
2 Hfkjsg rfdf tigkap lgkáe hkfeqf rfkqpnfl, 
Y rfdf bp tigkap vgkng lg lgrpkáe. 

3 Rfecíp ge Mgtfvá, y tpz gb aige; 
Y tpaiqpkál ge bp qigkkp, y qg phprgeqpkál ng bp vgknpn. 
4 Ngbéiqpqg plidildf ge Mgtfvá, 
Y éb qg rfergngká bpl hgqirifegl ng qs rfkpzóe. 

5 Gerfdigenp p Mgtfvá qs rpdief, 
Y rfecíp ge éb; y éb tpká. 
6 Gxtiaiká qs mslqirip rfdf bp bsz, 
Y qs ngkgrtf rfdf gb dgnifníp. 

7 Uspknp libgerif peqg Mgtfvá, y glhgkp ge éb. 
Ef qg pbqgkgl rfe dfqivf ngb jsg hkflhgkp ge ls rpdief, 
Hfk gb tfdakg jsg tprg dpbnpngl. 

8 Ngmp bp ikp, y nglgrtp gb gefmf; 
Ef qg gxriqgl ge dpegkp pbusep p tprgk bf dpbf. 
9 Hfkjsg bfl dpbiuefl lgkáe nglqksinfl, 
Hgkf bfl jsg glhgkpe ge Mgtfvá, gbbfl tgkgnpkáe bp qigkkp. 

10 Hsgl ng pjsí p hfrf ef gxilqiká gb dpbf; 
Falgkvpkál ls bsupk, y ef glqpká pbbí. 
11 Hgkf bfl dpelfl tgkgnpkáe bp qigkkp, 
Y lg kgrkgpkáe rfe pasenperip ng hpz. 
12 Dpjsiep gb idhíf rfeqkp gb mslqf, 
Y rksmg rfeqkp éb lsl nigeqgl; 
13 Gb Lgñfk lg kgiká ng éb; 
Hfkjsg vg jsg vigeg ls níp. 

14 Bfl idhífl nglgevpiepe glhpnp y geqglpe ls pkrf, 
Hpkp ngkkiapk pb hfakg y pb dgeglqgkflf, 
Hpkp dpqpk p bfl ng kgrqf hkfrgngk. 
15 Ls glhpnp geqkpká ge ls dildf rfkpzóe, 
Y ls pkrf lgká jsgakpnf. 

16 Dgmfk gl bf hfrf ngb mslqf, 
Jsg bpl kijsgzpl ng dsrtfl hgrpnfkgl. 
17 Hfkjsg bfl akpzfl ng bfl idhífl lgkáe jsgakpnfl; 
Dpl gb jsg lflqigeg p bfl mslqfl gl Mgtfvá. 

18 Rfefrg Mgtfvá bfl nípl ng bfl hgkcgrqfl, 
Y bp tgkgnpn ng gbbfl lgká hpkp ligdhkg. 
19 Ef lgkáe pvgkufezpnfl ge gb dpb qigdhf, 
Y ge bfl nípl ng tpdakg lgkáe lpripnfl. 

20 Dpl bfl idhífl hgkgrgkáe, 
Y bfl gegdiufl ng Mgtfvá rfdf bp ukplp ng bfl rpkegkfl 
Lgkáe rfelsdinfl; lg nilihpkáe rfdf gb tsdf. 

21 Gb idhíf qfdp hkglqpnf, y ef hpup; 
Dpl gb mslqf qigeg dilgkirfknip, y np. 
22 Hfkjsg bfl ageniqfl ng éb tgkgnpkáe bp qigkkp; 
Y bfl dpbniqfl ng éb lgkáe nglqksinfl. 

23 Hfk Mgtfvá lfe fkngepnfl bfl hplfl ngb tfdakg, 
Y éb phksgap ls rpdief. 
24 Rspenf gb tfdakg rpygkg, ef jsgnpká hflqkpnf, 
Hfkjsg Mgtfvá lflqigeg ls dpef. 

25 Mfvge csi, y tg gevgmgrinf, 
Y ef tg vilqf mslqf nglpdhpkpnf, 
Ei ls nglrgengerip jsg dgeniusg hpe. 
26 Ge qfnf qigdhf qigeg dilgkirfknip, y hkglqp; 
Y ls nglrgengerip gl hpkp agenirióe. 

27 Phákqpqg ngb dpb, y tpz gb aige, 
Y vivikál hpkp ligdhkg. 
28 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá pdp bp kgrqiqsn, 
Y ef nglpdhpkp p lsl lpeqfl. 
Hpkp ligdhkg lgkáe uspknpnfl; 
Dpl bp nglrgengerip ng bfl idhífl lgká nglqksinp. 
29 Bfl mslqfl tgkgnpkáe bp qigkkp, 
Y vivikáe hpkp ligdhkg lfakg gbbp. 

30 Bp afrp ngb mslqf tpabp lpainskíp, 
Y ls bgeusp tpabp mslqirip. 
31 Bp bgy ng ls Nifl glqá ge ls rfkpzóe; 
Hfk qpeqf, lsl higl ef kglapbpkáe. 

32 Prgrtp gb idhíf pb mslqf, 
Y hkfrskp dpqpkbf. 
33 Mgtfvá ef bf ngmpká ge lsl dpefl, 
Ei bf rfengepká rspenf bg mszupkge. 

34 Glhgkp ge Mgtfvá, y uspknp ls rpdief, 
Y éb qg gxpbqpká hpkp tgkgnpk bp qigkkp; 
Rspenf lgpe nglqksinfl bfl hgrpnfkgl, bf vgkál. 

35 Vi yf pb idhíf lsdpdgeqg gepbqgrinf, 
Y jsg lg gxqgeníp rfdf bpskgb vgkng. 
36 Hgkf éb hpló, y tg pjsí yp ef glqpap; 
Bf asljsé, y ef csg tpbbpnf. 

37 Rfelingkp pb íeqgukf, y dikp pb mslqf; 
Hfkjsg tpy se ciepb nirtflf hpkp gb tfdakg ng hpz. 
38 Dpl bfl qkpelukglfkgl lgkáe qfnfl p sep nglqksinfl; 
Bp hflqgkinpn ng bfl idhífl lgká gxqieusinp. 

39 Hgkf bp lpbvprióe ng bfl mslqfl gl ng Mgtfvá, 
Y éb gl ls cfkqpbgzp ge gb qigdhf ng bp peuslqip. 
40 Mgtfvá bfl pysnpká y bfl biakpká; 
Bfl biagkqpká ng bfl idhífl, y bfl lpbvpká, 
Hfk rspeqf ge éb glhgkpkfe. 



Fkprióe ng se hgeiqgeqg

Lpbdf ng Npvin, hpkp kgrfknpk.

LPBDF 38




1 Mgtfvá, ef dg kghkgenpl ge qs cskfk, 
Ei dg rplqiusgl ge qs ikp. 
2 Hfkjsg qsl lpgqpl rpygkfe lfakg dí, 
Y lfakg dí tp nglrgeninf qs dpef. 

3 Epnp tpy lpef ge di rpkeg, p rpslp ng qs ikp; 
Ei tpy hpz ge dil tsglfl, p rpslp ng di hgrpnf. 
4 Hfkjsg dil ieijsinpngl lg tpe pukpvpnf lfakg di rpagzp; 
Rfdf rpkup hglpnp lg tpe pukpvpnf lfakg dí. 

5 Tignge y lshskpe dil bbpupl, 
P rpslp ng di bfrskp. 
6 Glqfy gerfkvpnf, glqfy tsdibbpnf ge ukpe dpegkp, 
Penf gebsqpnf qfnf gb níp. 
7 Hfkjsg dil bfdfl glqáe bbgefl ng pknfk, 
Y epnp tpy lpef ge di rpkeg. 
8 Glqfy ngaibiqpnf y dfbinf ge ukpe dpegkp; 
Uidf p rpslp ng bp rfedfrióe ng di rfkpzóe. 

9 Lgñfk, ngbpeqg ng qi glqáe qfnfl dil nglgfl, 
Y di lslhikf ef qg gl frsbqf. 
10 Di rfkpzóe glqá prfeufmpnf, dg tp ngmpnf di viufk, 
Y pse bp bsz ng dil fmfl dg cpbqp yp. 
11 Dil pdiufl y dil rfdhpñgkfl lg dpeqigege bgmfl ng di hbpup, 
Y dil rgkrpefl lg tpe pbgmpnf. 

12 Bfl jsg aslrpe di vinp pkdpe bpzfl, 
Y bfl jsg hkfrskpe di dpb tpabpe ieijsinpngl, 
Y dgniqpe ckpsngl qfnf gb níp. 

13 Dpl yf, rfdf li csgkp lfknf, ef fiuf; 
Y lfy rfdf dsnf jsg ef pakg bp afrp. 
14 Lfy, hsgl, rfdf se tfdakg jsg ef fyg, 
Y ge rsyp afrp ef tpy kghkgelifegl. 

15 Hfkjsg ge qi, ft Mgtfvá, tg glhgkpnf; 
Qú kglhfengkál, Mgtfvá Nifl díf. 
16 Nimg: Ef lg pbgukge ng dí; 
Rspenf di hig kglapbg, ef lg geukpengzrpe lfakg dí. 

17 Hgkf yf glqfy p hseqf ng rpgk, 
Y di nfbfk glqá ngbpeqg ng dí rfeqiespdgeqg. 
18 Hfk qpeqf, rfecglpké di dpbnpn, 
Y dg rfeqkilqpké hfk di hgrpnf. 
19 Hfkjsg dil gegdiufl glqáe vivfl y csgkqgl, 
Y lg tpe psdgeqpnf bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge lie rpslp. 
20 Bfl jsg hpupe dpb hfk aige 
Dg lfe rfeqkpkifl, hfk lgusik yf bf asgef. 

21 Ef dg nglpdhpkgl, ft Mgtfvá; 
Nifl díf, ef qg pbgmgl ng dí. 
22 Phkglúkpqg p pysnpkdg, 
Ft Lgñfk, di lpbvprióe. 



Gb rpkárqgk qkpeliqfkif ng bp vinp

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; p Mgnsqúe. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 39




1 Yf nimg: Pqgengké p dil rpdiefl, 
Hpkp ef hgrpk rfe di bgeusp; 
Uspknpké di afrp rfe ckgef, 
Ge qpeqf jsg gb idhíf glqé ngbpeqg ng dí. 
2 Gedsngrí rfe libgerif, dg rpbbé pse kglhgrqf ng bf asgef; 
Y lg pukpvó di nfbfk. 
3 Lg gepkngrió di rfkpzóe ngeqkf ng dí; 
Ge di dgniqprióe lg gergenió csguf, 
Y plí hkfcgkí rfe di bgeusp: 

4 Tpzdg lpagk, Mgtfvá, di cie, 
Y rsáeqp lgp bp dgninp ng dil nípl; 
Lghp yf rsáe ckáuib lfy. 
5 Tg pjsí, nilqg p dil nípl qékdief rfkqf, 
Y di gnpn gl rfdf epnp ngbpeqg ng qi; 
Rigkqpdgeqg gl rfdhbgqp vpeinpn qfnf tfdakg jsg vivg. Lgbpt 
6 Rigkqpdgeqg rfdf sep lfdakp gl gb tfdakg; 
Rigkqpdgeqg ge vpef lg pcpep; 
Pdfeqfep kijsgzpl, y ef lpag jsiée bpl kgrfugká. 

7 Y ptfkp, Lgñfk, ¿jsé glhgkpké? 
Di glhgkpezp glqá ge qi. 
8 Bíakpdg ng qfnpl dil qkpelukglifegl; 
Ef dg hfeupl hfk glrpkeif ngb ielgelpqf. 
9 Gedsngrí, ef pakí di afrp, 
Hfkjsg qú bf tirilqg. 
10 Jsiqp ng lfakg dí qs hbpup; 
Glqfy rfelsdinf apmf bfl ufbhgl ng qs dpef. 
11\r Rfe rplqiufl hfk gb hgrpnf rfkkiugl pb tfdakg, 
Y ngltprgl rfdf hfbibbp bf dál glqidpnf ng éb; 
Rigkqpdgeqg vpeinpn gl qfnf tfdakg. Lgbpt 

12 Fyg di fkprióe, ft Mgtfvá, y glrsrtp di rbpdfk. 
Ef rpbbgl peqg dil báukidpl; 
Hfkjsg cfkplqgkf lfy hpkp qi, 
Y pnvgegnizf, rfdf qfnfl dil hpnkgl. 
13 Némpdg, y qfdpké csgkzpl, 
Peqgl jsg vpyp y hgkgzrp. 



Pbpapezp hfk bp biagkprióe niviep

(Lpb. 70. 1-5)

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 40




1 Hprigeqgdgeqg glhgké p Mgtfvá, 
Y lg ierbieó p dí, y fyó di rbpdfk. 
2 Y dg tizf lprpk ngb hfzf ng bp nglglhgkprióe, ngb bfnf rgepuflf; 
Hslf dil higl lfakg hgñp, y gengkgzó dil hplfl. 
3 Hslf bsguf ge di afrp ráeqirf esgvf, pbpapezp p esglqkf Nifl. 
Vgkáe glqf dsrtfl, y qgdgkáe, 
Y rfecipkáe ge Mgtfvá. 

4 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb tfdakg jsg hslf ge Mgtfvá ls rfecipezp, 
Y ef dikp p bfl lfagkaifl, ei p bfl jsg lg nglvípe qkpl bp dgeqikp. 
5 Tpl psdgeqpnf, ft Mgtfvá Nifl díf, qsl dpkpvibbpl; 
Y qsl hgelpdigeqfl hpkp rfe eflfqkfl, 
Ef gl hfliabg rfeqpkbfl peqg qi. 
Li yf peseripkg y tpabpkg ng gbbfl, 
Ef hsgnge lgk gesdgkpnfl. 

6 Lprkicirif y fckgenp ef qg pukpnp; 
Tpl paigkqf dil fínfl; 
Tfbfrpslqf y gxhiprióe ef tpl ngdpenpnf. 
7 Geqfergl nimg: Tg pjsí, vgeuf; 
Ge gb kfbbf ngb biakf glqá glrkiqf ng dí; 
8 Gb tprgk qs vfbseqpn, Nifl díf, dg tp pukpnpnf, 
Y qs bgy glqá ge dgnif ng di rfkpzóe. 

9 Tg peseripnf mslqirip ge ukpeng rfeukguprióe; 
Tg pjsí, ef kgckgeé dil bpaifl, 
Mgtfvá, qú bf lpagl. 
10 Ef gersakí qs mslqirip ngeqkf ng di rfkpzóe; 
Tg hsabirpnf qs cingbinpn y qs lpbvprióe; 
Ef frsbqé qs dilgkirfknip y qs vgknpn ge ukpeng plpdabgp. 

11 Mgtfvá, ef kgqgeupl ng dí qsl dilgkirfknipl; 
Qs dilgkirfknip y qs vgknpn dg uspknge ligdhkg. 
12 Hfkjsg dg tpe kfngpnf dpbgl lie eúdgkf; 
Dg tpe pbrpezpnf dil dpbnpngl, y ef hsgnf bgvpeqpk bp vilqp. 
Lg tpe psdgeqpnf dál jsg bfl rpagbbfl ng di rpagzp, y di rfkpzóe dg cpbbp. 

13 Jsigkpl, ft Mgtfvá, biakpkdg; 
Mgtfvá, phkglúkpqg p lfrfkkgkdg. 
14 Lgpe pvgkufezpnfl y rfecseninfl p sep 
Bfl jsg aslrpe di vinp hpkp nglqksikbp. 
Vsgbvpe pqkál y pvgkuüéergelg 
Bfl jsg di dpb nglgpe; 
15 Lgpe plfbpnfl ge hpuf ng ls pckgeqp 
Bfl jsg dg nirge: ¡Gp, gp! 

16 Uórgelg y pbéukgelg ge qi qfnfl bfl jsg qg aslrpe, 
Y niupe ligdhkg bfl jsg pdpe qs lpbvprióe: 
Mgtfvá lgp gepbqgrinf. 
17 Psejsg pcbiuinf yf y egrgliqpnf, 
Mgtfvá hgelpká ge dí. 
Di pysnp y di biagkqpnfk gkgl qú; 
Nifl díf, ef qg qpkngl. 



Fkprióe hinigenf lpbsn

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 41




1 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb jsg higelp ge gb hfakg; 
Ge gb níp dpbf bf biakpká Mgtfvá. 
2 Mgtfvá bf uspknpká, y bg npká vinp; 
Lgká aigepvgeqskpnf ge bp qigkkp, 
Y ef bf geqkgupkál p bp vfbseqpn ng lsl gegdiufl. 
3 Mgtfvá bf lslqgeqpká lfakg gb bgrtf ngb nfbfk; 
Dsbbikál qfnp ls rpdp ge ls gecgkdgnpn. 

4 Yf nimg: Mgtfvá, qge dilgkirfknip ng dí; 
Lpep di pbdp, hfkjsg rfeqkp qi tg hgrpnf. 
5 Dil gegdiufl nirge dpb ng dí, hkguseqpenf: 
¿Rsáenf dfkiká, y hgkgrgká ls efdakg? 
6 Y li vigege p vgkdg, tpabpe dgeqikp; 
Ls rfkpzóe kgrfug hpkp lí ieijsinpn, 
Y pb lpbik csgkp bp nivsbupe. 

7 Kgseinfl dskdskpe rfeqkp dí qfnfl bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge; 
Rfeqkp dí higelpe dpb, nirigenf ng dí: 
8 Rflp hglqibgeripb lg tp phfngkpnf ng éb; 
Y gb jsg rpyó ge rpdp ef vfbvgká p bgvpeqpklg. 
9 Pse gb tfdakg ng di hpz, ge jsige yf rfecipap, gb jsg ng di hpe rfdíp, 
Pbzó rfeqkp dí gb rpbrpñpk. 
10 Dpl qú, Mgtfvá, qge dilgkirfknip ng dí, y tpzdg bgvpeqpk, 
Y bgl npké gb hpuf. 

11 Ge glqf rfefrgké jsg qg tg pukpnpnf, 
Jsg di gegdiuf ef lg tsgbusg ng dí. 
12 Ge rspeqf p dí, ge di ieqgukinpn dg tpl lslqgeqpnf, 
Y dg tpl tgrtf glqpk ngbpeqg ng qi hpkp ligdhkg. 

13 Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá, gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, 
Hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. 
Pdée y Pdée.

LPBDFL

BIAKF II

Di pbdp qigeg lgn ng Nifl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Dpljsib ng bfl timfl ng Rfké.

LPBDF 42




1 Rfdf gb rigkvf akpdp hfk bpl rfkkigeqgl ng bpl puspl, 
Plí rbpdp hfk qi, ft Nifl, gb pbdp díp. 
2 Di pbdp qigeg lgn ng Nifl, ngb Nifl vivf; 
¿Rsáenf vgenké, y dg hkglgeqpké ngbpeqg ng Nifl? 
3 Csgkfe dil báukidpl di hpe ng níp y ng efrtg, 
Digeqkpl dg nirge qfnfl bfl nípl: ¿Nóeng glqá qs Nifl? 

4 Dg prsgknf ng glqpl rflpl, y ngkkpdf di pbdp ngeqkf ng dí; 
Ng ródf yf csi rfe bp dsbqiqsn, y bp rfensmg tplqp bp rplp ng Nifl, 
Geqkg vfrgl ng pbgukíp y ng pbpapezp ngb hsgabf ge ciglqp. 
5 ¿Hfk jsé qg papqgl, ft pbdp díp, 
Y qg qskapl ngeqkf ng dí? 
Glhgkp ge Nifl; hfkjsg púe tg ng pbpapkbg, 
Lpbvprióe díp y Nifl díf. 

6 Nifl díf, di pbdp glqá papqinp ge dí; 
Dg prfknpké, hfk qpeqf, ng qi nglng bp qigkkp ngb Mfknáe, 
Y ng bfl tgkdfeiqpl, nglng gb dfeqg ng Dizpk. 
7 Se paildf bbpdp p fqkf p bp vfz ng qsl rplrpnpl; 
Qfnpl qsl fenpl y qsl fbpl tpe hplpnf lfakg dí. 
8 Hgkf ng níp dpenpká Mgtfvá ls dilgkirfknip, 
Y ng efrtg ls ráeqirf glqpká rfediuf, 
Y di fkprióe pb Nifl ng di vinp. 

9 Niké p Nifl: Kfrp díp, ¿hfk jsé qg tpl fbvinpnf ng dí? 
¿Hfk jsé penpké yf gebsqpnf hfk bp fhkglióe ngb gegdiuf? 
10 Rfdf jsige tigkg dil tsglfl, dil gegdiufl dg pckgeqpe, 
Niriéenfdg rpnp níp: ¿Nóeng glqá qs Nifl? 

11 ¿Hfk jsé qg papqgl, ft pbdp díp, 
Y hfk jsé qg qskapl ngeqkf ng dí? 
Glhgkp ge Nifl; hfkjsg púe tg ng pbpapkbg, 
Lpbvprióe díp y Nifl díf. 



Hbgupkip hinigenf vienirprióe y biagkprióe

LPBDF 43




1 Múzupdg, ft Nifl, y ngcigeng di rpslp; 
Bíakpdg ng ugeqg idhíp, y ngb tfdakg geupñflf g ieirsf. 
2 Hsgl jsg qú gkgl gb Nifl ng di cfkqpbgzp, ¿hfk jsé dg tpl nglgrtpnf? 
¿Hfk jsé penpké gebsqpnf hfk bp fhkglióe ngb gegdiuf? 

3 Gevíp qs bsz y qs vgknpn; élqpl dg usipkáe; 
Dg rfensrikáe p qs lpeqf dfeqg, 
Y p qsl dfkpnpl. 
4 Geqkpké pb pbqpk ng Nifl, 
Pb Nifl ng di pbgukíp y ng di ufzf; 
Y qg pbpapké rfe pkhp, ft Nifl, Nifl díf. 

5 ¿Hfk jsé qg papqgl, ft pbdp díp, 
Y hfk jsé qg qskapl ngeqkf ng dí? 
Glhgkp ge Nifl; hfkjsg púe tg ng pbpapkbg, 
Lpbvprióe díp y Nifl díf. 



Biagkprifegl hplpnpl y hksgapl hkglgeqgl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Dpljsib ng bfl timfl ng Rfké.

LPBDF 44




1 Ft Nifl, rfe esglqkfl fínfl tgdfl fínf, esglqkfl hpnkgl efl tpe rfeqpnf, 
Bp fakp jsg tirilqg ge lsl nípl, ge bfl qigdhfl peqiusfl. 
2 Qú rfe qs dpef grtplqg bpl eprifegl, y bfl hbpeqplqg p gbbfl; 
Pcbiuilqg p bfl hsgabfl, y bfl pkkfmplqg. 
3 Hfkjsg ef lg phfngkpkfe ng bp qigkkp hfk ls glhpnp, 
Ei ls akpzf bfl biakó; 
Lief qs niglqkp, y qs akpzf, y bp bsz ng qs kflqkf, 
Hfkjsg qg rfdhbprilqg ge gbbfl. 

4 Qú, ft Nifl, gkgl di kgy; 
Dpenp lpbvprióe p Mprfa. 
5 Hfk dgnif ng qi lprsnikgdfl p esglqkfl gegdiufl; 
Ge qs efdakg tfbbpkgdfl p esglqkfl pnvgklpkifl. 
6 Hfkjsg ef rfecipké ge di pkrf, 
Ei di glhpnp dg lpbvpká; 
7 Hsgl qú efl tpl uspknpnf ng esglqkfl gegdiufl, 
Y tpl pvgkufezpnf p bfl jsg efl pafkkgrípe. 
8 Ge Nifl efl ubfkipkgdfl qfnf gb qigdhf, 
Y hpkp ligdhkg pbpapkgdfl qs efdakg. Lgbpt 

9 Hgkf efl tpl nglgrtpnf, y efl tpl tgrtf pvgkufezpk; 
Y ef lpbgl rfe esglqkfl gmékriqfl. 
10 Efl tirilqg kgqkfrgngk ngbpeqg ngb gegdiuf, 
Y efl lpjsgpe hpkp lí bfl jsg efl pafkkgrge. 
11 Efl geqkgupl rfdf fvgmpl pb dpqpngkf, 
Y efl tpl glhpkrinf geqkg bpl eprifegl. 
12 Tpl vgeninf p qs hsgabf ng apbng; 
Ef gxiuilqg eieuúe hkgrif. 

13 Efl hfegl hfk pckgeqp ng esglqkfl vgriefl, 
Hfk glrpkeif y hfk askbp ng bfl jsg efl kfngpe. 
14 Efl hslilqg hfk hkfvgkaif geqkg bpl eprifegl; 
Qfnfl pb vgkefl dgegpe bp rpagzp. 
15 Rpnp níp di vgkuügezp glqá ngbpeqg ng dí, 
Y bp rfecslióe ng di kflqkf dg rsakg, 
16 Hfk bp vfz ngb jsg dg viqshgkp y ngltfekp, 
Hfk kpzóe ngb gegdiuf y ngb vgeupqivf. 

17 Qfnf glqf efl tp vgeinf, y ef efl tgdfl fbvinpnf ng qi, 
Y ef tgdfl cpbqpnf p qs hprqf. 
18 Ef lg tp vsgbqf pqkál esglqkf rfkpzóe, 
Ei lg tpe phpkqpnf ng qsl rpdiefl esglqkfl hplfl, 
19 Hpkp jsg efl jsgakpeqplgl ge gb bsupk ng rtprpbgl, 
Y efl rsakiglgl rfe lfdakp ng dsgkqg. 

20 Li efl tsaiélgdfl fbvinpnf ngb efdakg ng esglqkf Nifl, 
F pbzpnf esglqkpl dpefl p nifl pmgef, 
21 ¿Ef ngdpenpkíp Nifl glqf? 
Hfkjsg éb rfefrg bfl lgrkgqfl ngb rfkpzóe. 
22 Hgkf hfk rpslp ng qi efl dpqpe rpnp níp; 
Lfdfl rfeqpnfl rfdf fvgmpl hpkp gb dpqpngkf. 

23 Nglhigkqp; ¿hfk jsé nsgkdgl, Lgñfk? 
Nglhigkqp, ef qg pbgmgl hpkp ligdhkg. 
24 ¿Hfk jsé glrfengl qs kflqkf, 
Y qg fbvinpl ng esglqkp pcbirrióe, y ng bp fhkglióe esglqkp? 
25 Hfkjsg esglqkp pbdp glqá pufaipnp tplqp gb hfbvf, 
Y esglqkf rsgkhf glqá hflqkpnf tplqp bp qigkkp. 
26 Bgváeqpqg hpkp pysnpkefl, 
Y kgnídgefl hfk rpslp ng qs dilgkirfknip. 



Ráeqirf ng bpl afnpl ngb kgy

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Bikifl. Dpljsib ng bfl timfl ng Rfké. Rperióe ng pdfkgl.

LPBDF 45




1 Kgaflp di rfkpzóe hpbpakp asgep; 
Nikimf pb kgy di rpeqf; 
Di bgeusp gl hbsdp ng glrkiaigeqg dsy biugkf. 

2 Gkgl gb dál tgkdflf ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl; 
Bp ukprip lg ngkkpdó ge qsl bpaifl; 
Hfk qpeqf, Nifl qg tp agengrinf hpkp ligdhkg. 
3 Riñg qs glhpnp lfakg gb dslbf, ft vpbigeqg, 
Rfe qs ubfkip y rfe qs dpmglqpn. 

4 Ge qs ubfkip lé hkflhgkpnf; 
Rpapbup lfakg hpbpakp ng vgknpn, ng tsdibnpn y ng mslqirip, 
Y qs niglqkp qg gelgñpká rflpl qgkkiabgl. 
5 Qsl lpgqpl pusnpl, 
Rfe jsg rpgkáe hsgabfl ngapmf ng qi, 
Hgegqkpkáe ge gb rfkpzóe ng bfl gegdiufl ngb kgy. 

6 Qs qkfef, ft Nifl, gl gqgkef y hpkp ligdhkg; 
Rgqkf ng mslqirip gl gb rgqkf ng qs kgief. 
7 Tpl pdpnf bp mslqirip y pafkkgrinf bp dpbnpn; 
Hfk qpeqf, qg seuió Nifl, gb Nifl qsyf, 
Rfe óbgf ng pbgukíp dál jsg p qsl rfdhpñgkfl. 
8 Dikkp, ábfg y rplip gxtpbpe qfnfl qsl vglqinfl; 
Nglng hpbprifl ng dpkcib qg kgrkgpe. 
9 Timpl ng kgygl glqáe geqkg qsl ibslqkgl; 
Glqá bp kgiep p qs niglqkp rfe fkf ng Fcik. 

10 Fyg, timp, y dikp, g ierbiep qs fínf; 
Fbvinp qs hsgabf, y bp rplp ng qs hpnkg; 
11 Y nglgpká gb kgy qs tgkdflskp; 
G ierbíepqg p éb, hfkjsg éb gl qs lgñfk. 
12 Y bpl timpl ng Qikf vgenkáe rfe hkglgeqgl; 
Idhbfkpkáe qs cpvfk bfl kirfl ngb hsgabf. 

13 Qfnp ubfkiflp gl bp timp ngb kgy ge ls dfkpnp; 
Ng akfrpnf ng fkf gl ls vglqinf. 
14 Rfe vglqinfl afknpnfl lgká bbgvpnp pb kgy; 
Víkugegl ikáe ge hfl ng gbbp, 
Rfdhpñgkpl lsypl lgkáe qkpínpl p qi. 
15 Lgkáe qkpínpl rfe pbgukíp y ufzf; 
Geqkpkáe ge gb hpbprif ngb kgy. 

16 Ge bsupk ng qsl hpnkgl lgkáe qsl timfl, 
P jsigegl tpkál hkíerihgl ge qfnp bp qigkkp. 
17 Tpké hgkhgqsp bp dgdfkip ng qs efdakg ge qfnpl bpl ugegkprifegl, 
Hfk bf rspb qg pbpapkáe bfl hsgabfl gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg.

LPBDF 46

Y lg qkplhplge bfl dfeqgl pb rfkpzóe ngb dpk;

LPBDF 47

LPBDF 48

Hplpkfe qfnfl.

LPBDF 49




1 Fín glqf, hsgabfl qfnfl; 
Glrsrtpn, tpaiqpeqgl qfnfl ngb dsenf, 
2 Plí bfl hbgagyfl rfdf bfl efabgl, 
Gb kirf y gb hfakg mseqpdgeqg. 
3 Di afrp tpabpká lpainskíp, 
Y gb hgelpdigeqf ng di rfkpzóe ieqgbiugerip. 
4 Ierbiepké pb hkfvgkaif di fínf; 
Ngrbpkpké rfe gb pkhp di geiudp. 

5 ¿Hfk jsé tg ng qgdgk ge bfl nípl ng pnvgklinpn, 
Rspenf bp ieijsinpn ng dil fhkglfkgl dg kfngpkg? 
6 Bfl jsg rfecípe ge lsl aigegl, 
Y ng bp dsrtgnsdakg ng lsl kijsgzpl lg mprqpe, 
7 Eieusef ng gbbfl hfnká ge dpegkp pbusep kgnidik pb tgkdpef, 
Ei npk p Nifl ls kglrpqg 
8 (Hfkjsg bp kgngerióe ng ls vinp gl ng ukpe hkgrif, 
Y ef lg bfukpká mpdál), 
9 Hpkp jsg vivp ge pngbpeqg hpkp ligdhkg, 
Y eserp vgp rfkkshrióe. 

10 Hsgl vgká jsg pse bfl lpaifl dsgkge; 
Jsg hgkgrge ngb dildf dfnf jsg gb ielgelpqf y gb egrif, 
Y ngmpe p fqkfl lsl kijsgzpl. 
11 Ls íeqidf hgelpdigeqf gl jsg lsl rplpl lgkáe gqgkepl, 
Y lsl tpaiqprifegl hpkp ugegkprióe y ugegkprióe; 
Npe lsl efdakgl p lsl qigkkpl. 
12 Dpl gb tfdakg ef hgkdpegrgká ge tfekp; 
Gl lgdgmpeqg p bpl aglqipl jsg hgkgrge. 

13 Glqg ls rpdief gl bfrskp; 
Rfe qfnf, lsl nglrgenigeqgl lg rfdhbprge ge gb nirtf ng gbbfl. Lgbpt 
14 Rfdf p kgapñfl jsg lfe rfensrinfl pb Lgfb, 
Bp dsgkqg bfl hplqfkgpká, 
Y bfl kgrqfl lg gelgñfkgpkáe ng gbbfl hfk bp dpñpep; 
Lg rfelsdiká ls asge hpkgrgk, y gb Lgfb lgká ls dfkpnp. 
15 Hgkf Nifl kgnidiká di vinp ngb hfngk ngb Lgfb, 
Hfkjsg éb dg qfdpká rfeliuf. Lgbpt 

16 Ef qgdpl rspenf lg gekijsgrg pbusef, 
Rspenf psdgeqp bp ubfkip ng ls rplp; 
17 Hfkjsg rspenf dsgkp ef bbgvpká epnp, 
Ei nglrgengká qkpl éb ls ubfkip. 
18 Psejsg digeqkpl vivp, bbpdg nirtflp p ls pbdp, 
Y lgp bfpnf rspenf hkflhgkg, 
19 Geqkpká ge bp ugegkprióe ng lsl hpnkgl, 
Y eserp dál vgká bp bsz. 
20 Gb tfdakg jsg glqá ge tfekp y ef geqigeng, 
Lgdgmpeqg gl p bpl aglqipl jsg hgkgrge. 



Nifl mszupká pb dsenf

Lpbdf ng Plpc.

LPBDF 50




1 Gb Nifl ng niflgl, Mgtfvá, tp tpabpnf, y rfevfrpnf bp qigkkp, 
Nglng gb epridigeqf ngb lfb tplqp nfeng lg hfeg. 
2 Ng Life, hgkcgrrióe ng tgkdflskp, 
Nifl tp kglhbpengrinf. 

3 Vgenká esglqkf Nifl, y ef rpbbpká; 
Csguf rfelsdiká ngbpeqg ng éb, 
Y qgdhglqpn hfngkflp bg kfngpká. 
4 Rfevfrpká p bfl rigbfl ng pkkiap, 
Y p bp qigkkp, hpkp mszupk p ls hsgabf. 
5 Mseqpndg dil lpeqfl, 
Bfl jsg tirigkfe rfediuf hprqf rfe lprkicirif. 
6 Y bfl rigbfl ngrbpkpkáe ls mslqirip, 
Hfkjsg Nifl gl gb msgz. Lgbpt 

7 Fyg, hsgabf díf, y tpabpké; 
Glrsrtp, Ilkpgb, y qglqicirpké rfeqkp qi: 
Yf lfy Nifl, gb Nifl qsyf. 
8 Ef qg kghkgengké hfk qsl lprkicirifl, 
Ei hfk qsl tfbfrpslqfl, jsg glqáe rfeqiespdgeqg ngbpeqg ng dí. 
9 Ef qfdpké ng qs rplp agrgkkfl, 
Ei dprtfl rpakífl ng qsl phkilrfl. 
10 Hfkjsg díp gl qfnp aglqip ngb afljsg, 
Y bfl dibbpkgl ng peidpbgl ge bfl rfbbpnfl. 
11 Rfefzrf p qfnpl bpl pvgl ng bfl dfeqgl, 
Y qfnf bf jsg lg dsgvg ge bfl rpdhfl dg hgkqgegrg. 

12 Li yf qsviglg tpdakg, ef qg bf nikíp p qi; 
Hfkjsg díf gl gb dsenf y ls hbgeiqsn. 
13 ¿Tg ng rfdgk yf rpkeg ng qfkfl, 
F ng agagk lpeukg ng dprtfl rpakífl? 
14 Lprkicirp p Nifl pbpapezp, 
Y hpup qsl vfqfl pb Pbqílidf; 
15 G ievórpdg ge gb níp ng bp peuslqip; 
Qg biakpké, y qú dg tfekpkál. 
16 Hgkf pb dpbf nimf Nifl: 
¿Jsé qigegl qú jsg tpabpk ng dil bgygl, 
Y jsg qfdpk di hprqf ge qs afrp? 
17 Hsgl qú pafkkgrgl bp rfkkgrrióe, 
Y grtpl p qs glhpbnp dil hpbpakpl. 
18 Li vgípl pb bpnkóe, qú rfkkípl rfe éb, 
Y rfe bfl pnúbqgkfl gkp qs hpkqg. 

19 Qs afrp dgqípl ge dpb, 
Y qs bgeusp rfdhfeíp geupñf. 
20 Qfdpapl pligeqf, y tpabpapl rfeqkp qs tgkdpef; 
Rfeqkp gb timf ng qs dpnkg hfeípl iecpdip. 
21 Glqpl rflpl tirilqg, y yf tg rpbbpnf; 
Hgelpapl jsg ng rigkqf lgkíp yf rfdf qú; 
Hgkf qg kghkgengké, y bpl hfenké ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl. 

22 Geqgengn ptfkp glqf, bfl jsg fl fbvináil ng Nifl, 
Ef lgp jsg fl nglhgnprg, y ef tpyp jsige fl biakg. 
23 Gb jsg lprkicirp pbpapezp dg tfekpká; 
Y pb jsg fkngepkg ls rpdief, 
Bg dflqkpké bp lpbvprióe ng Nifl. 



Pkkghgeqidigeqf, y hbgupkip hinigenf hskicirprióe

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin, rspenf nglhsél jsg lg bbguó p Agqlpaé, vief p éb Epqáe gb hkfcgqp.

LPBDF 51




1 Qge hignpn ng dí, ft Nifl, rfecfkdg p qs dilgkirfknip; 
Rfecfkdg p bp dsbqiqsn ng qsl hignpngl afkkp dil kgagbifegl. 
2 Bávpdg dál y dál ng di dpbnpn, 
Y bídhipdg ng di hgrpnf. 

3 Hfkjsg yf kgrfefzrf dil kgagbifegl, 
Y di hgrpnf glqá ligdhkg ngbpeqg ng dí. 
4 Rfeqkp qi, rfeqkp qi lfbf tg hgrpnf, 
Y tg tgrtf bf dpbf ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl; 
Hpkp jsg lgpl kgrfefrinf mslqf ge qs hpbpakp, 
Y qgeinf hfk hskf ge qs msirif. 
5 Tg pjsí, ge dpbnpn tg linf cfkdpnf, 
Y ge hgrpnf dg rferiaió di dpnkg. 

6 Tg pjsí, qú pdpl bp vgknpn ge bf íeqidf, 
Y ge bf lgrkgqf dg tpl tgrtf rfdhkgengk lpainskíp. 
7 Hskicírpdg rfe tilfhf, y lgké bidhif; 
Bávpdg, y lgké dál abperf jsg bp eigvg. 
8 Tpzdg fík ufzf y pbgukíp, 
Y lg kgrkgpkáe bfl tsglfl jsg tpl papqinf. 
9 Glrfeng qs kflqkf ng dil hgrpnfl, 
Y afkkp qfnpl dil dpbnpngl. 

10 Rkgp ge dí, ft Nifl, se rfkpzóe bidhif, 
Y kgesgvp se glhíkiqs kgrqf ngeqkf ng dí. 
11 Ef dg grtgl ng ngbpeqg ng qi, 
Y ef jsiqgl ng dí qs lpeqf Glhíkiqs. 
12 Vsébvgdg gb ufzf ng qs lpbvprióe, 
Y glhíkiqs efabg dg lslqgeqg. 

13 Geqfergl gelgñpké p bfl qkpelukglfkgl qsl rpdiefl, 
Y bfl hgrpnfkgl lg rfevgkqikáe p qi. 
14 Bíakpdg ng tfdirinifl, ft Nifl, Nifl ng di lpbvprióe; 
Rpeqpká di bgeusp qs mslqirip. 

15 Lgñfk, pakg dil bpaifl, 
Y hsabirpká di afrp qs pbpapezp. 
16 Hfkjsg ef jsigkgl lprkicirif, jsg yf bf npkíp; 
Ef jsigkgl tfbfrpslqf. 
17 Bfl lprkicirifl ng Nifl lfe gb glhíkiqs jsgakpeqpnf; 
Pb rfkpzóe rfeqkiqf y tsdibbpnf ef nglhkgripkál qú, ft Nifl. 

18 Tpz aige rfe qs agegvfbgerip p Life; 
Gnicirp bfl dskfl ng Mgkslpbée. 
19 Geqfergl qg pukpnpkáe bfl lprkicirifl ng mslqirip, 
gb tfbfrpslqf s fckgenp ngb qfnf jsgdpnp; 
Geqfergl fckgrgkáe agrgkkfl lfakg qs pbqpk. 



Csqibinpn ng bp mprqperip ngb dpbf

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Dpljsib ng Npvin, rspenf vief Nfgu gnfdiqp y nif rsgeqp p Lpúb niriéenfbg: Npvin tp vgeinf p rplp ng Ptidgbgr.

LPBDF 52




1 ¿Hfk jsé qg mprqpl ng dpbnpn, ft hfngkflf? 
Bp dilgkirfknip ng Nifl gl rfeqiesp. 
2 Pukpvifl dpjsiep qs bgeusp; 
Rfdf epvpmp pcibpnp tprg geupñf. 
3 Pdplqg gb dpb dál jsg gb aige, 
Bp dgeqikp dál jsg bp vgknpn. Lgbpt 
4 Tpl pdpnf qfnp lsgkqg ng hpbpakpl hgkeiriflpl, 
Geupñflp bgeusp. 

5 Hfk qpeqf, Nifl qg nglqksiká hpkp ligdhkg; 
Qg plfbpká y qg pkkperpká ng qs dfkpnp, 
Y qg nglpkkpiupká ng bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl. Lgbpt 
6 Vgkáe bfl mslqfl, y qgdgkáe; 
Lg kgikáe ng éb, nirigenf: 
7 Tg pjsí gb tfdakg jsg ef hslf p Nifl hfk ls cfkqpbgzp, 
Lief jsg rfeció ge bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl kijsgzpl, 
Y lg dpeqsvf ge ls dpbnpn. 

8 Hgkf yf glqfy rfdf fbivf vgkng ge bp rplp ng Nifl; 
Ge bp dilgkirfknip ng Nifl rfecíf gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg. 
9 Qg pbpapké hpkp ligdhkg, hfkjsg bf tpl tgrtf plí; 
Y glhgkpké ge qs efdakg, hfkjsg gl asgef, ngbpeqg ng qsl lpeqfl. 



Ielgelpqgz y dpbnpn ng bfl tfdakgl

(Lpb. 14. 1-7)

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Dptpbpq. Dpljsib ng Npvin.

LPBDF 53




1 Nirg gb egrif ge ls rfkpzóe: Ef tpy Nifl. 
Lg tpe rfkkfdhinf, g tirigkfe pafdiepabg dpbnpn; 
Ef tpy jsige tpup aige. 

2 Nifl nglng bfl rigbfl dikó lfakg bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, 
Hpkp vgk li tpaíp pbuúe geqgeninf 
Jsg aslrpkp p Nifl. 

3 Rpnp sef lg tpaíp vsgbqf pqkál; qfnfl lg tpaípe rfkkfdhinf; 
Ef tpy jsige tpup bf asgef, ef tpy ei pse sef. 

4 ¿Ef qigege rfefridigeqf qfnfl bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn, 
Jsg ngvfkpe p di hsgabf rfdf li rfdiglge hpe, 
Y p Nifl ef ievfrpe? 

5 Pbbí lg lfakglpbqpkfe ng hpvfk nfeng ef tpaíp dignf, 
Hfkjsg Nifl tp glhpkrinf bfl tsglfl ngb jsg hslf plgnif rfeqkp qi; 
Bfl pvgkufezplqg, hfkjsg Nifl bfl nglgrtó. 

6 ¡Ft, li lpbigkp ng Life bp lpbvprióe ng Ilkpgb! 
Rspenf Nifl tirigkg vfbvgk ng bp rpsqivinpn p ls hsgabf, 
Lg ufzpká Mprfa, y lg pbgukpká Ilkpgb. 



Hbgupkip hinigenf hkfqgrrióe rfeqkp bfl gegdiufl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; ge Eguiefq. Dpljsib ng Npvin, rspenf vieigkfe bfl zicgfl y nimgkfe p Lpúb: ¿Ef glqá Npvin glrfeninf ge esglqkp qigkkp?

LPBDF 54




1 Ft Nifl, lábvpdg hfk qs efdakg, 
Y rfe qs hfngk ngciéengdg.

Glrsrtp bpl kpzfegl ng di afrp.

LPBDF 55

Y Mgtfvá dg lpbvpká.

LPBDF 56

LPBDF 59

Nglhigkqp hpkp vgeik p di gersgeqkf, y dikp.

LPBDF 62

LPBDF 63

LPBDF 64




1 Glrsrtp, ft Nifl, bp vfz ng di jsgmp;
