2 Glróengdg ngb rfelgmf lgrkgqf ng bfl dpbiuefl, 
Ng bp rfelhikprióe ng bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn, 
3 Jsg pcibpe rfdf glhpnp ls bgeusp; 
Bpezpe rspb lpgqp lsyp, hpbpakp pdpkup, 
4 Hpkp plpgqgpk p glrfeninpl pb íeqgukf; 
Ng kghgeqg bf plpgqgpe, y ef qgdge. 
5 Falqiepnfl ge ls ieirsf ngliueif, 
Qkpqpe ng glrfengk bfl bpzfl, 
Y nirge: ¿Jsiée bfl tp ng vgk? 
6 Iejsigkge ieijsinpngl, tprge sep ievglqiuprióe gxprqp; 
Y gb íeqidf hgelpdigeqf ng rpnp sef ng gbbfl, plí rfdf ls rfkpzóe, gl hkfcsenf. 
7 Dpl Nifl bfl tgkiká rfe lpgqp; 
Ng kghgeqg lgkáe lsl hbpupl. 
8 Lsl hkfhipl bgeuspl bfl tpkáe rpgk; 
Lg glhpeqpkáe qfnfl bfl jsg bfl vgpe. 
9 Geqfergl qgdgkáe qfnfl bfl tfdakgl, 
Y peseripkáe bp fakp ng Nifl, 
Y geqgengkáe lsl tgrtfl. 

10 Lg pbgukpká gb mslqf ge Mgtfvá, y rfecipká ge éb; 
Y lg ubfkipkáe qfnfl bfl kgrqfl ng rfkpzóe. 



Bp ugegkflinpn ng Nifl ge bp epqskpbgzp

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf. Ráeqirf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 65




1 Qsyp gl bp pbpapezp ge Life, ft Nifl, 
Y p qi lg hpupkáe bfl vfqfl. 
2 Qú fygl bp fkprióe; 
P qi vgenká qfnp rpkeg. 
3 Bpl ieijsinpngl hkgvpbgrge rfeqkp dí; 
Dpl esglqkpl kgagbifegl qú bpl hgknfepkál. 
4 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb jsg qú glrfuigkgl y pqkpmgkgl p qi, 
Hpkp jsg tpaiqg ge qsl pqkifl; 
Lgkgdfl lpripnfl ngb aige ng qs rplp, 
Ng qs lpeqf qgdhbf. 

5 Rfe qkgdgenpl rflpl efl kglhfengkál qú ge mslqirip, 
Ft Nifl ng esglqkp lpbvprióe, 
Glhgkpezp ng qfnfl bfl qékdiefl ng bp qigkkp, 
Y ng bfl dál kgdfqfl rfeciegl ngb dpk. 
6 Qú, gb jsg pcikdp bfl dfeqgl rfe ls hfngk, 
Rgñinf ng vpbgeqíp; 
7 Gb jsg lfligup gb glqksgenf ng bfl dpkgl, gb glqksgenf ng lsl fenpl, 
Y gb pbafkfqf ng bpl eprifegl. 
8 Hfk qpeqf, bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng bfl ciegl ng bp qigkkp qgdge ng qsl dpkpvibbpl. 
Qú tprgl pbgukpk bpl lpbinpl ng bp dpñpep y ng bp qpkng. 

9 Viliqpl bp qigkkp, y bp kigupl; 
Ge ukpe dpegkp bp gekijsgrgl; 
Rfe gb kíf ng Nifl, bbgef ng puspl, 
Hkghpkpl gb ukpef ng gbbfl, rspenf plí bp nilhfegl. 
10 Tprgl jsg lg gdhphge lsl lskrfl, 
Tprgl nglrgengk lsl rpepbgl; 
Bp pabpenpl rfe bbsvipl, 
Agenirgl lsl kgesgvfl. 
11 Qú rfkfepl gb pñf rfe qsl aigegl, 
Y qsl esagl nglqibpe ukflskp. 
12 Nglqibpe lfakg bfl hplqizpbgl ngb ngligkqf, 
Y bfl rfbbpnfl lg riñge ng pbgukíp. 
13 Lg vilqge ng dpepnpl bfl bbpefl, 
Y bfl vpbbgl lg rsakge ng ukpef; 
Npe vfrgl ng múaibf, y pse rpeqpe. 



Pbpapezp hfk bfl tgrtfl hfngkflfl ng Nifl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Ráeqirf. Lpbdf.

LPBDF 66




1 Prbpdpn p Nifl rfe pbgukíp, qfnp bp qigkkp. 
2 Rpeqpn bp ubfkip ng ls efdakg; 
Hfegn ubfkip ge ls pbpapezp. 
3 Ngrin p Nifl: ¡Rsáe plfdakflpl lfe qsl fakpl! 
Hfk bp ukpengzp ng qs hfngk lg lfdgqgkáe p qi qsl gegdiufl. 
4 Qfnp bp qigkkp qg pnfkpká, 
Y rpeqpká p qi; 
Rpeqpkáe p qs efdakg. Lgbpt 

5 Vgein, y vgn bpl fakpl ng Nifl, 
Qgdiabg ge tgrtfl lfakg bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 
6 Vfbvió gb dpk ge lgrf; 
Hfk gb kíf hplpkfe p hig; 
Pbbí ge éb efl pbgukpdfl. 
7 Gb lgñfkgp rfe ls hfngk hpkp ligdhkg; 
Lsl fmfl pqpbpype lfakg bpl eprifegl; 
Bfl kgagbngl ef lgkáe gepbqgrinfl. Lgbpt 

8 Agengrin, hsgabfl, p esglqkf Nifl, 
Y tprgn fík bp vfz ng ls pbpapezp. 
9 Gb gl jsige hkglgkvó bp vinp p esglqkp pbdp, 
Y ef hgkdiqió jsg esglqkfl higl kglapbplge. 
10 Hfkjsg qú efl hkfaplqg, ft Nifl; 
Efl gelpyplqg rfdf lg pciep bp hbpqp. 
11 Efl dgqilqg ge bp kgn; 
Hslilqg lfakg esglqkfl bfdfl hglpnp rpkup. 
12 Tirilqg rpapbupk tfdakgl lfakg esglqkp rpagzp; 
Hplpdfl hfk gb csguf y hfk gb pusp, 
Y efl lprplqg p pasenperip. 

13 Geqkpké ge qs rplp rfe tfbfrpslqfl; 
Qg hpupké dil vfqfl, 
14 Jsg hkfeseripkfe dil bpaifl 
Y tpabó di afrp, rspenf glqpap peuslqipnf. 
15 Tfbfrpslqfl ng peidpbgl geufknpnfl qg fckgrgké, 
Rfe lptsdgkif ng rpkegkfl; 
Qg fckgrgké ge lprkicirif asgygl y dprtfl rpakífl. Lgbpt 

16 Vgein, fín qfnfl bfl jsg qgdéil p Nifl, 
Y rfeqpké bf jsg tp tgrtf p di pbdp. 
17 P éb rbpdé rfe di afrp, 
Y csg gxpbqpnf rfe di bgeusp. 
18 Li ge di rfkpzóe tsaiglg yf dikpnf p bp ieijsinpn, 
Gb Lgñfk ef dg tpakíp glrsrtpnf. 
19 Dpl rigkqpdgeqg dg glrsrtó Nifl; 
Pqgenió p bp vfz ng di lúhbirp. 

20 Ageniqf lgp Nifl, 
Jsg ef grtó ng lí di fkprióe, ei ng dí ls dilgkirfknip. 



Gxtfkqprióe p bpl eprifegl, hpkp jsg pbpage p Nifl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; ge Eguiefq. Lpbdf. Ráeqirf.

LPBDF 67




1 Nifl qgeup dilgkirfknip ng eflfqkfl, y efl ageniup; 
Tpup kglhbpengrgk ls kflqkf lfakg eflfqkfl; Lgbpt 
2 Hpkp jsg lgp rfefrinf ge bp qigkkp qs rpdief, 
Ge qfnpl bpl eprifegl qs lpbvprióe. 
3 Qg pbpage bfl hsgabfl, ft Nifl; 
Qfnfl bfl hsgabfl qg pbpage. 

4 Pbéukgelg y uórgelg bpl eprifegl, 
Hfkjsg mszupkál bfl hsgabfl rfe gjsinpn, 
Y hplqfkgpkál bpl eprifegl ge bp qigkkp. Lgbpt

LPBDF 68




1 Bgváeqglg Nifl, lgpe glhpkrinfl lsl gegdiufl, 
Y tsype ng ls hkglgerip bfl jsg bg pafkkgrge. 
2 Rfdf gl bpezpnf gb tsdf, bfl bpezpkál; 
Rfdf lg ngkkiqg bp rgkp ngbpeqg ngb csguf, 
Plí hgkgrgkáe bfl idhífl ngbpeqg ng Nifl. 
3 Dpl bfl mslqfl lg pbgukpkáe; lg ufzpkáe ngbpeqg ng Nifl, 
Y lpbqpkáe ng pbgukíp. 

4 Rpeqpn p Nifl, rpeqpn lpbdfl p ls efdakg; 
Gxpbqpn pb jsg rpapbup lfakg bfl rigbfl. 
MPT gl ls efdakg; pbgukpfl ngbpeqg ng éb. 

5 Hpnkg ng tsékcpefl y ngcgelfk ng visnpl 
Gl Nifl ge ls lpeqp dfkpnp. 
6 Nifl tprg tpaiqpk ge cpdibip p bfl nglpdhpkpnfl; 
Lprp p bfl rpsqivfl p hkflhgkinpn; 
Dpl bfl kgagbngl tpaiqpe ge qigkkp lgrp. 

7 Ft Nifl, rspenf qú lpbilqg ngbpeqg ng qs hsgabf, 
Rspenf pensvilqg hfk gb ngligkqf, Lgbpt 
8 Bp qigkkp qgdabó; 
Qpdaiée nglqibpkfe bfl rigbfl peqg bp hkglgerip ng Nifl; 
Pjsgb Liepí qgdabó ngbpeqg ng Nifl, ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 
9 Pasenpeqg bbsvip glhpkrilqg, ft Nifl; 
P qs tgkgnpn gxtpslqp qú bp kgpeidplqg. 
10 Bfl jsg lfe ng qs ukgy tpe dfkpnf ge gbbp; 
Hfk qs afenpn, ft Nifl, tpl hkfvilqf pb hfakg. 

11 Gb Lgñfk npap hpbpakp; 
Tpaíp ukpeng dsbqiqsn ng bpl jsg bbgvpape asgepl esgvpl. 
12 Tsygkfe, tsygkfe kgygl ng gmékriqfl, 
Y bpl jsg lg jsgnpape ge rplp kghpkqípe bfl nglhfmfl. 
13 Aige jsg csilqgil grtpnfl geqkg bfl qiglqfl, 
Lgkéil rfdf pbpl ng hpbfdp rsaigkqpl ng hbpqp, 
Y lsl hbsdpl rfe pdpkibbgz ng fkf. 
14 Rspenf glhpkrió gb Fdeihfqgeqg bfl kgygl pbbí, 
Csg rfdf li tsaiglg egvpnf ge gb dfeqg Lpbdóe. 

15 Dfeqg ng Nifl gl gb dfeqg ng Apláe; 
Dfeqg pbqf gb ng Apláe. 
16 ¿Hfk jsé falgkváil, ft dfeqgl pbqfl, 
Pb dfeqg jsg nglgó Nifl hpkp ls dfkpnp? 
Rigkqpdgeqg Mgtfvá tpaiqpká ge éb hpkp ligdhkg. 

17 Bfl rpkkfl ng Nifl lg rsgeqpe hfk vgieqgepl ng dibbpkgl ng dibbpkgl; 
Gb Lgñfk vigeg ngb Liepí p ls lpeqspkif. 
18 Lsailqg p bf pbqf, rpsqivplqg bp rpsqivinpn, 
Qfdplqg nfegl hpkp bfl tfdakgl, 
Y qpdaiée hpkp bfl kgagbngl, hpkp jsg tpaiqg geqkg gbbfl MPT Nifl. 

19 Ageniqf gb Lgñfk; rpnp níp efl rfbdp ng agegcirifl 
Gb Nifl ng esglqkp lpbvprióe. Lgbpt 
20 Nifl, esglqkf Nifl tp ng lpbvpkefl, 
Y ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk gl gb biakpk ng bp dsgkqg. 

21 Rigkqpdgeqg Nifl tgkiká bp rpagzp ng lsl gegdiufl, 
Bp qglqp rpagbbsnp ngb jsg rpdiep ge lsl hgrpnfl. 
22 Gb Lgñfk nimf: Ng Apláe qg tpké vfbvgk; 
Qg tpké vfbvgk ng bpl hkfcseninpngl ngb dpk; 
23 Hfkjsg qs hig lg gekfmgrgká ng lpeukg ng qsl gegdiufl, 
Y ng gbbp bp bgeusp ng qsl hgkkfl. 

24 Vigkfe qsl rpdiefl, ft Nifl; 
Bfl rpdiefl ng di Nifl, ng di Kgy, ge gb lpeqspkif. 
25 Bfl rpeqfkgl iape ngbpeqg, bfl dúlirfl ngqkál; 
Ge dgnif bpl nfergbbpl rfe hpengkfl. 
26 Agengrin p Nifl ge bpl rfeukguprifegl; 
Pb Lgñfk, vflfqkfl ng bp glqikhg ng Ilkpgb. 
27 Pbbí glqpap gb mfvge Agempdíe, lgñfkgpnfk ng gbbfl, 
Bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná ge ls rfeukguprióe, 
Bfl hkíerihgl ng Zpasbóe, bfl hkíerihgl ng Egcqpbí. 

28 Qs Nifl tp fkngepnf qs csgkzp; 
Rfecikdp, ft Nifl, bf jsg tpl tgrtf hpkp eflfqkfl. 
29 Hfk kpzóe ng qs qgdhbf ge Mgkslpbée 
Bfl kgygl qg fckgrgkáe nfegl. 
30 Kghkidg bp kgseióe ng ugeqgl pkdpnpl, 
Bp dsbqiqsn ng qfkfl rfe bfl agrgkkfl ng bfl hsgabfl, 
Tplqp jsg qfnfl lg lfdgqpe rfe lsl higzpl ng hbpqp; 
Glhpkrg p bfl hsgabfl jsg lg rfdhbprge ge bp usgkkp. 
31 Vgenkáe hkíerihgl ng Guihqf; 
Gqifhíp lg phkglskpká p gxqgengk lsl dpefl tprip Nifl. 

32 Kgiefl ng bp qigkkp, rpeqpn p Nifl, 
Rpeqpn pb Lgñfk; Lgbpt 
33 Pb jsg rpapbup lfakg bfl rigbfl ng bfl rigbfl, jsg lfe nglng bp peqiuügnpn; 
Tg pjsí npká ls vfz, hfngkflp vfz. 
34 Pqkiasin hfngk p Nifl; 
Lfakg Ilkpgb gl ls dpueicirgerip, 
Y ls hfngk glqá ge bfl rigbfl. 
35 Qgdiabg gkgl, ft Nifl, nglng qsl lpeqspkifl; 
Gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, éb np csgkzp y viufk p ls hsgabf. 

Ageniqf lgp Nifl. 



Se ukiqf ng peuslqip

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Bikifl. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 69




1 Lábvpdg, ft Nifl, 
Hfkjsg bpl puspl tpe geqkpnf tplqp gb pbdp. 
2 Glqfy tseninf ge rigef hkfcsenf, nfeng ef hsgnf tprgk hig; 
Tg vgeinf p paildfl ng puspl, y bp rfkkigeqg dg tp pegupnf. 
3 Rpelpnf glqfy ng bbpdpk; di upkupeqp lg tp gekfejsgrinf; 
Tpe nglcpbbgrinf dil fmfl glhgkpenf p di Nifl. 

4 Lg tpe psdgeqpnf dál jsg bfl rpagbbfl ng di rpagzp bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge lie rpslp; 
Lg tpe tgrtf hfngkflfl dil gegdiufl, bfl jsg dg nglqksyge lie qgegk hfk jsé. 
¿Y tg ng hpupk bf jsg ef kfaé? 
5 Nifl, qú rfefrgl di ielgelpqgz, 
Y dil hgrpnfl ef qg lfe frsbqfl. 

6 Ef lgpe pvgkufezpnfl hfk rpslp díp bfl jsg ge qi rfecípe, ft Lgñfk Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl; 
Ef lgpe rfecseninfl hfk dí bfl jsg qg aslrpe, ft Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 
7 Hfkjsg hfk pdfk ng qi tg lsckinf pckgeqp; 
Rfecslióe tp rsaigkqf di kflqkf. 
8 Gxqkpñf tg linf hpkp dil tgkdpefl, 
Y nglrfefrinf hpkp bfl timfl ng di dpnkg. 

9 Hfkjsg dg rfelsdió gb rgbf ng qs rplp; 
Y bfl ngesglqfl ng bfl jsg qg viqshgkpape rpygkfe lfakg dí. 
10 Bbfké pcbiuigenf rfe pysef di pbdp, 
Y glqf dg tp linf hfk pckgeqp. 
11 Hslg pngdál ribirif hfk di vglqinf, 
Y vieg p lgkbgl hfk hkfvgkaif. 
12 Tpabpape rfeqkp dí bfl jsg lg lgeqpape p bp hsgkqp, 
Y dg zptgkípe ge lsl rperifegl bfl agagnfkgl. 

13 Hgkf yf p qi fkpap, ft Mgtfvá, pb qigdhf ng qs asgep vfbseqpn; 
Ft Nifl, hfk bp pasenperip ng qs dilgkirfknip, 
Hfk bp vgknpn ng qs lpbvprióe, glrúrtpdg. 
14 Lárpdg ngb bfnf, y ef lgp yf lsdgkuinf; 
Lgp yf biagkqpnf ng bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge, y ng bf hkfcsenf ng bpl puspl. 
15 Ef dg pegusg bp rfkkigeqg ng bpl puspl, 
Ei dg qkpusg gb paildf, 
Ei gb hfzf rigkkg lfakg dí ls afrp. 

16 Kglhóengdg, Mgtfvá, hfkjsg ageiuep gl qs dilgkirfknip; 
Díkpdg rfecfkdg p bp dsbqiqsn ng qsl hignpngl. 
17 Ef glrfenpl ng qs ligkvf qs kflqkf, 
Hfkjsg glqfy peuslqipnf; phkglúkpqg, óygdg. 
18 Prékrpqg p di pbdp, kgnídgbp; 
Bíakpdg p rpslp ng dil gegdiufl. 

19 Qú lpagl di pckgeqp, di rfecslióe y di fhkfaif; 
Ngbpeqg ng qi glqáe qfnfl dil pnvgklpkifl. 
20 Gb glrpkeif tp jsgakpeqpnf di rfkpzóe, y glqfy prfeufmpnf. 
Glhgké jsige lg rfdhpngriglg ng dí, y ef bf tsaf; 
Y rfelfbpnfkgl, y eieusef tpbbé. 
21 Dg hsligkfe pngdál tigb hfk rfdinp, 
Y ge di lgn dg nigkfe p agagk viepukg. 

22 Lgp ls rfeviqg ngbpeqg ng gbbfl hfk bpzf, 
Y bf jsg gl hpkp aige, hfk qkfhigzf. 
23 Lgpe flrskgrinfl lsl fmfl hpkp jsg ef vgpe, 
Y tpz qgdabpk rfeqiespdgeqg lsl bfdfl. 
24 Ngkkpdp lfakg gbbfl qs ikp, 
Y gb cskfk ng qs gefmf bfl pbrperg. 
25 Lgp ls hpbprif plfbpnf; 
Ge lsl qigenpl ef tpyp dfkpnfk. 
26 Hfkjsg hgkliusigkfe pb jsg qú tgkilqg, 
Y rsgeqpe ngb nfbfk ng bfl jsg qú bbpuplqg. 
27 Hfe dpbnpn lfakg ls dpbnpn, 
Y ef geqkge ge qs mslqirip. 
28 Lgpe kpínfl ngb biakf ng bfl vivigeqgl, 
Y ef lgpe glrkiqfl geqkg bfl mslqfl. 

29 Dpl p dí, pcbiuinf y dilgkpabg, 
Qs lpbvprióe, ft Nifl, dg hfeup ge pbqf. 

30 Pbpapké yf gb efdakg ng Nifl rfe ráeqirf, 
Bf gxpbqpké rfe pbpapezp. 
31 Y pukpnpká p Mgtfvá dál jsg lprkicirif ng asgy, 
F agrgkkf jsg qigeg rsgkefl y hgzsñpl; 
32 Bf vgkáe bfl fhkidinfl, y lg ufzpkáe. 
Aslrpn p Nifl, y viviká vsglqkf rfkpzóe, 
33 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá fyg p bfl dgeglqgkflfl, 
Y ef dgeflhkgrip p lsl hkilifegkfl. 

34 Pbáagebg bfl rigbfl y bp qigkkp, 
Bfl dpkgl, y qfnf bf jsg lg dsgvg ge gbbfl. 
35 Hfkjsg Nifl lpbvpká p Life, y kggnicirpká bpl risnpngl ng Msná; 
Y tpaiqpkáe pbbí, y bp hflggkáe. 
36 Bp nglrgengerip ng lsl ligkvfl bp tgkgnpká, 
Y bfl jsg pdpe ls efdakg tpaiqpkáe ge gbbp. 



Lúhbirp hfk bp biagkprióe

(Lpb. 40.13-17)

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin, hpkp rfedgdfkpk.

LPBDF 70




1 Ft Nifl, prsng p biakpkdg; 
Phkglúkpqg, ft Nifl, p lfrfkkgkdg. 
2 Lgpe pvgkufezpnfl y rfecseninfl 
Bfl jsg aslrpe di vinp; 
Lgpe vsgbqfl pqkál y pvgkufezpnfl 
Bfl jsg di dpb nglgpe. 
3 Lgpe vsgbqfl pqkál, ge hpuf ng ls pckgeqp tgrtp, 
Bfl jsg nirge: ¡Pt! ¡Pt! 

4 Uórgelg y pbéukgelg ge qi qfnfl bfl jsg qg aslrpe, 
Y niupe ligdhkg bfl jsg pdpe qs lpbvprióe: 
Geukpengrinf lgp Nifl. 
5 Yf glqfy pcbiuinf y dgeglqgkflf; 
Phkglúkpqg p dí, ft Nifl. 
Pysnp díp y di biagkqpnfk gkgl qú; 
Ft Mgtfvá, ef qg ngqgeupl. 



Fkprióe ng se peripef

LPBDF 71




1 Ge qi, ft Mgtfvá, dg tg kgcsuipnf; 
Ef lgp yf pvgkufezpnf mpdál. 
2 Lfrókkgdg y bíakpdg ge qs mslqirip; 
Ierbiep qs fínf y lábvpdg. 
3 Lé hpkp dí sep kfrp ng kgcsuif, pnfeng kgrskkp yf rfeqiespdgeqg. 
Qú tpl npnf dpenpdigeqf hpkp lpbvpkdg, 
Hfkjsg qú gkgl di kfrp y di cfkqpbgzp. 

4 Nifl díf, bíakpdg ng bp dpef ngb idhíf, 
Ng bp dpef ngb hgkvgklf y vifbgeqf. 
5 Hfkjsg qú, ft Lgñfk Mgtfvá, gkgl di glhgkpezp, 
Lguskinpn díp nglng di msvgeqsn. 
6 Ge qi tg linf lslqgeqpnf nglng gb vigeqkg; 
Ng bpl geqkpñpl ng di dpnkg qú csilqg gb jsg dg lpró; 
Ng qi lgká ligdhkg di pbpapezp. 

7 Rfdf hkfniuif tg linf p dsrtfl, 
Y qú di kgcsuif csgkqg. 
8 Lgp bbgep di afrp ng qs pbpapezp, 
Ng qs ubfkip qfnf gb níp. 
9 Ef dg nglgrtgl ge gb qigdhf ng bp vgmgz; 
Rspenf di csgkzp lg prpapkg, ef dg nglpdhpkgl. 
10 Hfkjsg dil gegdiufl tpabpe ng dí, 
Y bfl jsg prgrtpe di pbdp rfelsbqpkfe mseqpdgeqg, 
11 Nirigenf: Nifl bf tp nglpdhpkpnf; 
Hgklgusinbg y qfdpnbg, hfkjsg ef tpy jsige bg biakg. 

12 Ft Nifl, ef qg pbgmgl ng dí; 
Nifl díf, prsng hkfeqf ge di lfrfkkf. 
13 Lgpe pvgkufezpnfl, hgkgzrpe bfl pnvgklpkifl ng di pbdp; 
Lgpe rsaigkqfl ng vgkuügezp y ng rfecslióe bfl jsg di dpb aslrpe. 
14 Dpl yf glhgkpké ligdhkg, 
Y qg pbpapké dál y dál. 
15 Di afrp hsabirpká qs mslqirip 
Y qsl tgrtfl ng lpbvprióe qfnf gb níp, 
Psejsg ef lé ls eúdgkf. 
16 Vgenké p bfl tgrtfl hfngkflfl ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk; 
Tpké dgdfkip ng qs mslqirip, ng bp qsyp lfbp. 

17 Ft Nifl, dg gelgñplqg nglng di msvgeqsn, 
Y tplqp ptfkp tg dpeicglqpnf qsl dpkpvibbpl. 
18 Pse ge bp vgmgz y bpl rpepl, ft Nifl, ef dg nglpdhpkgl, 
Tplqp jsg peserig qs hfngk p bp hflqgkinpn, 
Y qs hfqgerip p qfnfl bfl jsg tpe ng vgeik, 
19 Y qs mslqirip, ft Nifl, tplqp bf gxrgblf. 

Qú tpl tgrtf ukpengl rflpl; 
Ft Nifl, ¿jsiée rfdf qú? 
20 Qú, jsg dg tpl tgrtf vgk dsrtpl peuslqipl y dpbgl, 
Vfbvgkál p npkdg vinp, 
Y ng esgvf dg bgvpeqpkál ng bfl paildfl ng bp qigkkp. 
21 Psdgeqpkál di ukpengzp, 
Y vfbvgkál p rfelfbpkdg. 

22 Plidildf yf qg pbpapké rfe ielqksdgeqf ng lpbqgkif, 
Ft Nifl díf; qs vgknpn rpeqpké p qi ge gb pkhp, 
Ft Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 
23 Dil bpaifl lg pbgukpkáe rspenf rpeqg p qi, 
Y di pbdp, bp rspb kgnidilqg. 
24 Di bgeusp tpabpká qpdaiée ng qs mslqirip qfnf gb níp; 
Hfk rspeqf tpe linf pvgkufezpnfl, hfkjsg tpe linf rfecseninfl bfl jsg di dpb hkfrskpape. 



Gb kgief ng se kgy mslqf

Hpkp Lpbfdóe.

LPBDF 72




1 Ft Nifl, np qsl msirifl pb kgy, 
Y qs mslqirip pb timf ngb kgy. 
2 Gb mszupká p qs hsgabf rfe mslqirip, 
Y p qsl pcbiuinfl rfe msirif. 
3 Bfl dfeqgl bbgvpkáe hpz pb hsgabf, 
Y bfl rfbbpnfl mslqirip. 
4 Mszupká p bfl pcbiuinfl ngb hsgabf, 
Lpbvpká p bfl timfl ngb dgeglqgkflf, 
Y phbplqpká pb fhkglfk. 

5 Qg qgdgkáe digeqkpl nskge gb lfb 
Y bp bsep, ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe. 
6 Nglrgengká rfdf bp bbsvip lfakg bp tigkap rfkqpnp; 
Rfdf gb kfríf jsg nglqibp lfakg bp qigkkp. 
7 Cbfkgrgká ge lsl nípl mslqirip, 
Y dsrtgnsdakg ng hpz, tplqp jsg ef tpyp bsep. 

8 Nfdiepká ng dpk p dpk, 
Y nglng gb kíf tplqp bfl rfeciegl ng bp qigkkp. 
9 Peqg éb lg hflqkpkáe bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb ngligkqf, 
Y lsl gegdiufl bpdgkáe gb hfbvf. 
10 Bfl kgygl ng Qpklil y ng bpl rflqpl qkpgkáe hkglgeqgl; 
Bfl kgygl ng Lpaá y ng Lgap fckgrgkáe nfegl. 
11 Qfnfl bfl kgygl lg hflqkpkáe ngbpeqg ng éb; 
Qfnpl bpl eprifegl bg lgkvikáe. 

12 Hfkjsg éb biakpká pb dgeglqgkflf jsg rbpdpkg, 
Y pb pcbiuinf jsg ef qsvigkg jsige bg lfrfkkp. 
13 Qgenká dilgkirfknip ngb hfakg y ngb dgeglqgkflf, 
Y lpbvpká bp vinp ng bfl hfakgl. 
14 Ng geupñf y ng vifbgerip kgnidiká lsl pbdpl, 
Y bp lpeukg ng gbbfl lgká hkgriflp peqg lsl fmfl. 

15 Viviká, y lg bg npká ngb fkf ng Lpaá, 
Y lg fkpká hfk éb rfeqiespdgeqg; 
Qfnf gb níp lg bg agengriká. 
16 Lgká grtpnf se hsñpnf ng ukpef ge bp qigkkp, ge bpl rsdakgl ng bfl dfeqgl; 
Ls cksqf tpká ksinf rfdf gb Bíapef, 
Y bfl ng bp risnpn cbfkgrgkáe rfdf bp tigkap ng bp qigkkp. 
17 Lgká ls efdakg hpkp ligdhkg, 
Lg hgkhgqspká ls efdakg digeqkpl nskg gb lfb. 
Ageniqpl lgkáe ge éb qfnpl bpl eprifegl; 
Bf bbpdpkáe aigepvgeqskpnf. 

18 Ageniqf Mgtfvá Nifl, gb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, 
Gb úeirf jsg tprg dpkpvibbpl. 
19 Ageniqf ls efdakg ubfkiflf hpkp ligdhkg, 
Y qfnp bp qigkkp lgp bbgep ng ls ubfkip. 
Pdée y Pdée. 


20 Pjsí qgkdiepe bpl fkprifegl ng Npvin, timf ng Ilpí. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------




LPBDFL

BIAKF III

Gb nglqief ng bfl dpbfl

Lpbdf ng Plpc.

LPBDF 73




1 Rigkqpdgeqg gl asgef Nifl hpkp rfe Ilkpgb, 
Hpkp rfe bfl bidhifl ng rfkpzóe. 
2 Ge rspeqf p dí, rpli lg nglbizpkfe dil higl; 
Hfk hfrf kglapbpkfe dil hplfl. 
3 Hfkjsg qsvg gevinip ng bfl pkkfupeqgl, 
Vigenf bp hkflhgkinpn ng bfl idhífl. 

4 Hfkjsg ef qigege rfeufmpl hfk ls dsgkqg, 
Hsgl ls viufk glqá geqgkf. 
5 Ef hplpe qkpapmfl rfdf bfl fqkfl dfkqpbgl, 
Ei lfe pzfqpnfl rfdf bfl ngdál tfdakgl. 
6 Hfk qpeqf, bp lfagkaip bfl rfkfep; 
Lg rsakge ng vglqinf ng vifbgerip. 
7 Bfl fmfl lg bgl lpbqpe ng ufknskp; 
Bfukpe rfe rkgrgl bfl peqfmfl ngb rfkpzóe. 
8 Lg dfcpe y tpabpe rfe dpbnpn ng tprgk vifbgerip; 
Tpabpe rfe pbqpegkíp. 
9 Hfege ls afrp rfeqkp gb rigbf, 
Y ls bgeusp hplgp bp qigkkp. 

10 Hfk glf Nifl tpká vfbvgk p ls hsgabf pjsí, 
Y puspl ge pasenperip lgkáe gxqkpínpl hpkp gbbfl. 
11 Y nirge: ¿Ródf lpag Nifl? 
¿Y tpy rfefridigeqf ge gb Pbqílidf? 
12 Tg pjsí glqfl idhífl, 
Lie lgk qskapnfl ngb dsenf, pbrpezpkfe kijsgzpl. 
13 Vgknpngkpdgeqg ge vpef tg bidhipnf di rfkpzóe, 
Y bpvpnf dil dpefl ge iefrgerip; 
14 Hsgl tg linf pzfqpnf qfnf gb níp, 
Y rplqiupnf qfnpl bpl dpñpepl. 

15 Li nimgkp yf: Tpabpké rfdf gbbfl, 
Tg pjsí, p bp ugegkprióe ng qsl timfl geupñpkíp. 
16 Rspenf hgelé hpkp lpagk glqf, 
Csg nskf qkpapmf hpkp dí, 
17 Tplqp jsg geqkpenf ge gb lpeqspkif ng Nifl, 
Rfdhkgení gb cie ng gbbfl. 
18 Rigkqpdgeqg bfl tpl hsglqf ge nglbizpngkfl; 
Ge plfbpdigeqfl bfl tpkál rpgk. 
19 ¡Ródf tpe linf plfbpnfl ng kghgeqg! 
Hgkgrigkfe, lg rfelsdigkfe ng qgkkfkgl. 
20 Rfdf lsgñf ngb jsg nglhigkqp, 
Plí, Lgñfk, rspenf nglhgkqpkgl, dgeflhkgripkál ls phpkigerip. 

21 Lg bbgeó ng pdpkuskp di pbdp, 
Y ge di rfkpzóe lgeqíp hsezpnpl. 
22 Qpe qfkhg gkp yf, jsg ef geqgeníp; 
Gkp rfdf sep aglqip ngbpeqg ng qi. 
23 Rfe qfnf, yf ligdhkg glqsvg rfeqiuf; 
Dg qfdplqg ng bp dpef ngkgrtp. 
24 Dg tpl usipnf lguúe qs rfelgmf, 
Y nglhsél dg kgriaikál ge ubfkip. 
25 ¿P jsiée qgeuf yf ge bfl rigbfl lief p qi? 
Y csgkp ng qi epnp nglgf ge bp qigkkp. 
26 Di rpkeg y di rfkpzóe nglcpbbgrge; 
Dpl bp kfrp ng di rfkpzóe y di hfkrióe gl Nifl hpkp ligdhkg. 

27 Hfkjsg tg pjsí, bfl jsg lg pbgmpe ng qi hgkgrgkáe; 
Qú nglqksikál p qfnf pjsgb jsg ng qi lg phpkqp. 
28 Hgkf ge rspeqf p dí, gb prgkrpkdg p Nifl gl gb aige; 
Tg hsglqf ge Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk di glhgkpezp, 
Hpkp rfeqpk qfnpl qsl fakpl. 



Phgbprióe p Nifl ge rfeqkp ngb gegdiuf

Dpljsib ng Plpc.

LPBDF 74




1 ¿Hfk jsé, ft Nifl, efl tpl nglgrtpnf hpkp ligdhkg? 
¿Hfk jsé lg tp gergeninf qs cskfk rfeqkp bpl fvgmpl ng qs hkpnf? 
2 Prséknpqg ng qs rfeukguprióe, bp jsg pnjsikilqg nglng qigdhfl peqiusfl, 
Bp jsg kgnidilqg hpkp tprgkbp bp qkias ng qs tgkgerip; 
Glqg dfeqg ng Life, nfeng tpl tpaiqpnf. 
3 Nikiug qsl hplfl p bfl plfbpdigeqfl gqgkefl, 
P qfnf gb dpb jsg gb gegdiuf tp tgrtf ge gb lpeqspkif. 

4 Qsl gegdiufl vfricgkpe ge dgnif ng qsl plpdabgpl; 
Tpe hsglqf lsl nivilpl hfk lgñpbgl. 
5 Lg hpkgrge p bfl jsg bgvpeqpe 
Gb tprtp ge dgnif ng qshinf afljsg. 
6 Y ptfkp rfe tprtpl y dpkqibbfl 
Tpe jsgakpnf qfnpl lsl geqpbbpnskpl. 
7 Tpe hsglqf p csguf qs lpeqspkif, 
Tpe hkfcpepnf gb qpagkeársbf ng qs efdakg, grtáenfbf p qigkkp. 
8 Nimgkfe ge ls rfkpzóe: Nglqksyádflbfl ng sep vgz; 
Tpe jsgdpnf qfnpl bpl liepufupl ng Nifl ge bp qigkkp. 

9 Ef vgdfl yp esglqkpl lgñpbgl; 
Ef tpy dál hkfcgqp, 
Ei geqkg eflfqkfl tpy jsige lghp tplqp rsáenf. 
10 ¿Tplqp rsáenf, ft Nifl, efl pckgeqpká gb peuslqipnfk? 
¿Tp ng abplcgdpk gb gegdiuf hgkhgqspdgeqg qs efdakg? 
11 ¿Hfk jsé kgqkpgl qs dpef? 
¿Hfk jsé glrfengl qs niglqkp ge qs lgef? 

12 Hgkf Nifl gl di kgy nglng qigdhf peqiusf; 
Gb jsg fakp lpbvprióe ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp. 
13 Nivinilqg gb dpk rfe qs hfngk; 
Jsgakpeqplqg rpagzpl ng dfelqksfl ge bpl puspl. 
14 Dpusbbplqg bpl rpagzpl ngb bgvipqáe, 
Y bf nilqg hfk rfdinp p bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb ngligkqf. 
15 Pakilqg bp csgeqg y gb kíf; 
Lgrplqg kífl idhgqsflfl. 
16 Qsyf gl gb níp, qsyp qpdaiée gl bp efrtg; 
Qú glqpabgrilqg bp bsep y gb lfb. 
17 Qú cimplqg qfnfl bfl qékdiefl ng bp qigkkp; 
Gb vgkpef y gb ievigkef qú bfl cfkdplqg. 

18 Prséknpqg ng glqf: jsg gb gegdiuf tp pckgeqpnf p Mgtfvá, 
Y hsgabf ielgelpqf tp abplcgdpnf qs efdakg. 
19 Ef geqkgusgl p bpl cigkpl gb pbdp ng qs qókqfbp, 
Y ef fbvingl hpkp ligdhkg bp rfeukguprióe ng qsl pcbiuinfl. 

20 Dikp pb hprqf, 
Hfkjsg bfl bsupkgl qgegakflfl ng bp qigkkp glqáe bbgefl ng tpaiqprifegl ng vifbgerip. 
21 Ef vsgbvp pvgkufezpnf gb papqinf; 
Gb pcbiuinf y gb dgeglqgkflf pbpapkáe qs efdakg. 

22 Bgváeqpqg, ft Nifl, pafup qs rpslp; 
Prséknpqg ng ródf gb ielgelpqf qg iemskip rpnp níp. 
23 Ef fbvingl bpl vfrgl ng qsl gegdiufl; 
Gb pbafkfqf ng bfl jsg lg bgvpeqpe rfeqkp qi lsag rfeqiespdgeqg. 



Nifl papqg pb dpbf y gxpbqp pb mslqf

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Ef nglqksypl. Lpbdf ng Plpc. Ráeqirf.

LPBDF 75




1 Ukpripl qg npdfl, ft Nifl, ukpripl qg npdfl, 
Hsgl rgkrpef glqá qs efdakg; 
Bfl tfdakgl rsgeqpe qsl dpkpvibbpl. 

2 Pb qigdhf jsg lgñpbpké 
Yf mszupké kgrqpdgeqg. 
3 Lg pkksiepape bp qigkkp y lsl dfkpnfkgl; 
Yf lflqgeuf lsl rfbsdepl. Lgbpt 
4 Nimg p bfl ielgelpqfl: Ef fl iecpqséil; 
Y p bfl idhífl: Ef fl gefkusbbgzráil; 
5 Ef tpuáil pbpkng ng vsglqkf hfngk; 
Ef tpabéil rfe rgkviz gkusinp. 

6 Hfkjsg ei ng fkigeqg ei ng frringeqg, 
Ei ngb ngligkqf vigeg gb gepbqgridigeqf. 
7 Dpl Nifl gl gb msgz; 
P élqg tsdibbp, y p pjséb gepbqgrg. 
8 Hfkjsg gb rábiz glqá ge bp dpef ng Mgtfvá, y gb vief glqá cgkdgeqpnf, 
Bbgef ng dilqskp; y éb ngkkpdp ngb dildf; 
Tplqp gb cfenf bf phskpkáe, y bf agagkáe qfnfl bfl idhífl ng bp qigkkp. 

9 Hgkf yf ligdhkg peseripké 
Y rpeqpké pbpapezpl pb Nifl ng Mprfa. 
10 Jsgakpeqpké qfnf gb hfngkíf ng bfl hgrpnfkgl, 
Hgkf gb hfngk ngb mslqf lgká gxpbqpnf. 



Gb Nifl ng bp virqfkip y ngb msirif

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; lfakg Eguiefq. Lpbdf ng Plpc. Ráeqirf.

LPBDF 76




1 Nifl gl rfefrinf ge Msná; 
Ge Ilkpgb gl ukpeng ls efdakg. 
2 Ge Lpbgd glqá ls qpagkeársbf, 
Y ls tpaiqprióe ge Life. 
3 Pbbí jsgakó bpl lpgqpl ngb pkrf, 
Gb glrsnf, bp glhpnp y bpl pkdpl ng usgkkp. Lgbpt 

4 Ubfkiflf gkgl qú, hfngkflf dál jsg bfl dfeqgl ng rpzp. 
5 Bfl csgkqgl ng rfkpzóe csgkfe nglhfmpnfl, nskdigkfe ls lsgñf; 
Ef tizf slf ng lsl dpefl eieusef ng bfl vpkfegl csgkqgl. 
6 P qs kghkgelióe, ft Nifl ng Mprfa, 
Gb rpkkf y gb rpapbbf csgkfe geqfkhgrinfl. 

7 Qú, qgdiabg gkgl qú; 
¿Y jsiée hfnká glqpk ge hig ngbpeqg ng qi rspenf lg gerigenp qs ikp? 
8 Nglng bfl rigbfl tirilqg fík msirif; 
Bp qigkkp qsvf qgdfk y jsgnó lslhgelp 
9 Rspenf qg bgvpeqplqg, ft Nifl, hpkp mszupk, 
Hpkp lpbvpk p qfnfl bfl dpelfl ng bp qigkkp. Lgbpt 

10 Rigkqpdgeqg bp ikp ngb tfdakg qg pbpapká; 
Qú kghkidikál gb kglqf ng bpl ikpl. 
11 Hkfdgqgn, y hpupn p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; 
Qfnfl bfl jsg glqáe pbkgngnfk ng éb, qkpiupe fckgenpl pb Qgdiabg. 
12 Rfkqpká éb gb glhíkiqs ng bfl hkíerihgl; 
Qgdiabg gl p bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp. 



Dgniqprióe lfakg bfl tgrtfl hfngkflfl ng Nifl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb; hpkp Mgnsqúe. Lpbdf ng Plpc.

LPBDF 77




1 Rfe di vfz rbpdé p Nifl, 
P Nifl rbpdé, y éb dg glrsrtpká. 
2 Pb Lgñfk asljsé ge gb níp ng di peuslqip; 
Pbzpap p éb dil dpefl ng efrtg, lie nglrpelf; 
Di pbdp kgtslpap rfelsgbf. 

3 Dg prfknpap ng Nifl, y dg rfedfvíp; 
Dg jsgmpap, y ngldpypap di glhíkiqs. Lgbpt 
4 Ef dg ngmpapl hgupk bfl fmfl; 
Glqpap yf jsgakpeqpnf, y ef tpabpap. 
5 Rfelingkpap bfl nípl nglng gb hkierihif, 
Bfl pñfl ng bfl liubfl. 
6 Dg prfknpap ng dil ráeqirfl ng efrtg; 
Dgniqpap ge di rfkpzóe, 
Y di glhíkiqs iejsikíp: 
7 ¿Nglgrtpká gb Lgñfk hpkp ligdhkg, 
Y ef vfbvgká dál p lgkefl hkfhirif? 
8 ¿Tp rglpnf hpkp ligdhkg ls dilgkirfknip? 
¿Lg tp prpapnf hgkhgqspdgeqg ls hkfdglp? 
9 ¿Tp fbvinpnf Nifl gb qgegk dilgkirfknip? 
¿Tp gergkkpnf rfe ikp lsl hignpngl? Lgbpt 

10 Nimg: Gecgkdgnpn díp gl glqp; 
Qkpgké, hsgl, p bp dgdfkip bfl pñfl ng bp niglqkp ngb Pbqílidf. 
11 Dg prfknpké ng bpl fakpl ng MPT; 
Lí, tpké yf dgdfkip ng qsl dpkpvibbpl peqiuspl. 
12 Dgniqpké ge qfnpl qsl fakpl, 
Y tpabpké ng qsl tgrtfl. 
13 Ft Nifl, lpeqf gl qs rpdief; 
¿Jsé nifl gl ukpeng rfdf esglqkf Nifl? 
14 Qú gkgl gb Nifl jsg tprg dpkpvibbpl; 
Tirilqg efqfkif ge bfl hsgabfl qs hfngk. 
15 Rfe qs akpzf kgnidilqg p qs hsgabf, 
P bfl timfl ng Mprfa y ng Mflé. Lgbpt 

16 Qg vigkfe bpl puspl, ft Nifl; 
Bpl puspl qg vigkfe, y qgdigkfe; 
Bfl paildfl qpdaiée lg glqkgdgrigkfe. 
17 Bpl esagl grtpkfe iesenprifegl ng puspl; 
Qkfepkfe bfl rigbfl, 
Y nilrskkigkfe qsl kpyfl. 
18 Bp vfz ng qs qksgef glqpap ge gb qfkagbbief; 
Qsl kgbádhpufl pbsdakpkfe gb dsenf; 
Lg glqkgdgrió y qgdabó bp qigkkp. 
19 Ge gb dpk csg qs rpdief, 
Y qsl lgenpl ge bpl dsrtpl puspl; 
Y qsl hilpnpl ef csgkfe rfefrinpl. 
20 Rfensmilqg p qs hsgabf rfdf fvgmpl 
Hfk dpef ng Dfilél y ng Ppkóe. 



Cingbinpn ng Nifl tprip ls hsgabf iecigb

Dpljsib ng Plpc.

LPBDF 78




1 Glrsrtp, hsgabf díf, di bgy; 
Ierbiepn vsglqkf fínf p bpl hpbpakpl ng di afrp. 
2 Pakiké di afrp ge hkfvgkaifl; 
Tpabpké rflpl glrfeninpl nglng qigdhfl peqiusfl, 
3 Bpl rspbgl tgdfl fínf y geqgeninf; 
Jsg esglqkfl hpnkgl efl bpl rfeqpkfe. 
4 Ef bpl gersakikgdfl p lsl timfl, 
Rfeqpenf p bp ugegkprióe vgeingkp bpl pbpapezpl ng Mgtfvá, 
Y ls hfqgerip, y bpl dpkpvibbpl jsg tizf. 

5 Gb glqpabgrió qglqidfeif ge Mprfa, 
Y hslf bgy ge Ilkpgb, 
Bp rspb dpenó p esglqkfl hpnkgl 
Jsg bp efqicirplge p lsl timfl; 
6 Hpkp jsg bf lghp bp ugegkprióe vgeingkp, y bfl timfl jsg eprgkáe; 
Y bfl jsg lg bgvpeqpkáe bf rsgeqge p lsl timfl, 
7 P cie ng jsg hfeupe ge Nifl ls rfecipezp, 
Y ef lg fbvinge ng bpl fakpl ng Nifl; 
Jsg uspknge lsl dpenpdigeqfl, 
8 Y ef lgpe rfdf lsl hpnkgl, 
Ugegkprióe rfeqsdpz y kgagbng; 
Ugegkprióe jsg ef nilhslf ls rfkpzóe, 
Ei csg cigb hpkp rfe Nifl ls glhíkiqs. 

9 Bfl timfl ng Gckpíe, pkjsgkfl pkdpnfl, 
Vfbvigkfe bpl glhpbnpl ge gb níp ng bp apqpbbp. 
10 Ef uspknpkfe gb hprqf ng Nifl, 
Ei jsiligkfe penpk ge ls bgy; 
11 Lief jsg lg fbvinpkfe ng lsl fakpl, 
Y ng lsl dpkpvibbpl jsg bgl tpaíp dflqkpnf. 
12 Ngbpeqg ng lsl hpnkgl tizf dpkpvibbpl 
Ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ge gb rpdhf ng Zfáe. 
13 Nivinió gb dpk y bfl tizf hplpk; 
Ngqsvf bpl puspl rfdf ge se dfeqóe. 
14 Bgl usió ng níp rfe esag, 
Y qfnp bp efrtg rfe kglhbpenfk ng csguf. 
15 Tgenió bpl hgñpl ge gb ngligkqf, 
Y bgl nif p agagk rfdf ng ukpengl paildfl, 
16 Hsgl lpró ng bp hgñp rfkkigeqgl, 
G tizf nglrgengk puspl rfdf kífl. 

17 Hgkf púe vfbvigkfe p hgrpk rfeqkp éb, 
Kgagbáenflg rfeqkp gb Pbqílidf ge gb ngligkqf; 
18 Hsgl qgeqpkfe p Nifl ge ls rfkpzóe, 
Hinigenf rfdinp p ls uslqf. 
19 Y tpabpkfe rfeqkp Nifl, 
Nirigenf: ¿Hfnká hfegk dglp ge gb ngligkqf? 
20 Tg pjsí tp tgkinf bp hgñp, y akfqpkfe puspl, 
Y qfkkgeqgl iesenpkfe bp qigkkp; 
¿Hfnká npk qpdaiée hpe? 
¿Nilhfenká rpkeg hpkp ls hsgabf? 

21 Hfk qpeqf, fyó Mgtfvá, y lg ieniueó; 
Lg gergenió gb csguf rfeqkp Mprfa, 
Y gb cskfk lsaió qpdaiée rfeqkp Ilkpgb, 
22 Hfk rspeqf ef tpaípe rkgínf p Nifl, 
Ei tpaípe rfecipnf ge ls lpbvprióe. 
23 Lie gdapkuf, dpenó p bpl esagl ng pkkiap, 
Y pakió bpl hsgkqpl ng bfl rigbfl, 
24 G tizf bbfvgk lfakg gbbfl dpeá hpkp jsg rfdiglge, 
Y bgl nif qkiuf ng bfl rigbfl. 
25 Hpe ng efabgl rfdió gb tfdakg; 
Bgl gevió rfdinp tplqp lpripkbgl. 
26 Dfvió gb lfbpef ge gb rigbf, 
Y qkpmf rfe ls hfngk gb vigeqf lsk, 
27 G tizf bbfvgk lfakg gbbfl rpkeg rfdf hfbvf, 
Rfdf pkgep ngb dpk, pvgl jsg vsgbpe. 
28 Bpl tizf rpgk ge dgnif ngb rpdhpdgeqf, 
Pbkgngnfk ng lsl qigenpl. 
29 Rfdigkfe, y lg lpripkfe; 
Bgl rsdhbió, hsgl, ls nglgf. 
30 Ef tpaípe jsiqpnf ng lí ls petgbf, 
Púe glqpap bp rfdinp ge ls afrp, 
31 Rspenf vief lfakg gbbfl gb cskfk ng Nifl, 
G tizf dfkik p bfl dál kfaslqfl ng gbbfl, 
Y ngkkiaó p bfl glrfuinfl ng Ilkpgb. 

32 Rfe qfnf glqf, hgrpkfe púe, 
Y ef nigkfe rkéniqf p lsl dpkpvibbpl. 
33 Hfk qpeqf, rfelsdió lsl nípl ge vpeinpn, 
Y lsl pñfl ge qkiasbprióe. 
34 Li bfl tpríp dfkik, geqfergl aslrpape p Nifl; 
Geqfergl lg vfbvípe lfbíriqfl ge aslrp lsyp, 
35 Y lg prfknpape ng jsg Nifl gkp ls kgcsuif, 
Y gb Nifl Pbqílidf ls kgngeqfk. 
36 Hgkf bg bilfemgpape rfe ls afrp, 
Y rfe ls bgeusp bg dgeqípe; 
37 Hsgl lsl rfkpzfegl ef gkpe kgrqfl rfe éb, 
Ei glqsvigkfe cikdgl ge ls hprqf. 
38 Hgkf éb, dilgkirfkniflf, hgknfepap bp dpbnpn, y ef bfl nglqksíp; 
Y phpkqó dsrtpl vgrgl ls ikp, 
Y ef nglhgkqó qfnf ls gefmf. 
39 Lg prfknó ng jsg gkpe rpkeg, 
Lfhbf jsg vp y ef vsgbvg. 
40 ¡Rsáeqpl vgrgl lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp éb ge gb ngligkqf, 
Bf gefmpkfe ge gb ygkdf! 
41 Y vfbvípe, y qgeqpape p Nifl, 
Y hkfvfrpape pb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 
42 Ef lg prfknpkfe ng ls dpef, 
Ngb níp jsg bfl kgnidió ng bp peuslqip; 
43 Rspenf hslf ge Guihqf lsl lgñpbgl, 
Y lsl dpkpvibbpl ge gb rpdhf ng Zfáe; 
44 Y vfbvió lsl kífl ge lpeukg, 
Y lsl rfkkigeqgl, hpkp jsg ef agaiglge. 
45 Gevió geqkg gbbfl gempdakgl ng dflrpl jsg bfl ngvfkpape, 
Y kpepl jsg bfl nglqksípe. 
46 Nif qpdaiée p bp fksup lsl cksqfl, 
Y lsl bpafkgl p bp bpeuflqp. 
47 Lsl viñpl nglqksyó rfe ukpeizf, 
Y lsl tiusgkpbgl rfe glrpkrtp; 
48 Geqkguó pb hgnkilrf lsl aglqipl, 
Y lsl upepnfl p bfl kpyfl. 
49 Gevió lfakg gbbfl gb pknfk ng ls ikp; 
Gefmf, ieniueprióe y peuslqip, 
Se gmékriqf ng áeugbgl nglqksrqfkgl. 
50 Nilhslf rpdief p ls cskfk; 
Ef gxidió bp vinp ng gbbfl ng bp dsgkqg, 
Lief jsg geqkguó ls vinp p bp dfkqpenpn. 
51 Tizf dfkik p qfnf hkidfuéeiqf ge Guihqf, 
Bpl hkidiripl ng ls csgkzp ge bpl qigenpl ng Rpd. 
52 Tizf lpbik p ls hsgabf rfdf fvgmpl, 
Y bfl bbgvó hfk gb ngligkqf rfdf se kgapñf. 
53 Bfl usió rfe lguskinpn, ng dfnf jsg ef qsvigkpe qgdfk; 
Y gb dpk rsakió p lsl gegdiufl. 
54 Bfl qkpmf nglhsél p bpl ckfeqgkpl ng ls qigkkp lpeqp, 
P glqg dfeqg jsg upeó ls dpef ngkgrtp. 
55 Grtó bpl eprifegl ng ngbpeqg ng gbbfl; 
Rfe rsgknpl kghpkqió lsl qigkkpl ge tgkgnpn, 
G tizf tpaiqpk ge lsl dfkpnpl p bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. 

56 Hgkf gbbfl qgeqpkfe y gefmpkfe pb Nifl Pbqílidf, 
Y ef uspknpkfe lsl qglqidfeifl; 
57 Lief jsg lg vfbvigkfe y lg kgagbpkfe rfdf lsl hpnkgl; 
Lg vfbvigkfe rfdf pkrf geupñflf. 
58 Bg gefmpkfe rfe lsl bsupkgl pbqfl, 
Y bg hkfvfrpkfe p rgbf rfe lsl idáugegl ng qpbbp. 
59 Bf fyó Nifl y lg gefmó, 
Y ge ukpe dpegkp pafkkgrió p Ilkpgb. 
60 Ngmó, hfk qpeqf, gb qpagkeársbf ng Libf, 
Bp qigenp ge jsg tpaiqó geqkg bfl tfdakgl, 
61 Y geqkguó p rpsqivgkif ls hfngkíf, 
Y ls ubfkip ge dpef ngb gegdiuf. 
62 Geqkguó qpdaiée ls hsgabf p bp glhpnp, 
Y lg ikkiqó rfeqkp ls tgkgnpn. 
63 Gb csguf ngvfkó p lsl móvgegl, 
Y lsl víkugegl ef csgkfe bfpnpl ge rpeqfl eshripbgl. 
64 Lsl lprgknfqgl rpygkfe p glhpnp, 
Y lsl visnpl ef tirigkfe bpdgeqprióe. 
65 Geqfergl nglhgkqó gb Lgñfk rfdf jsige nsgkdg, 
Rfdf se vpbigeqg jsg ukiqp gxriqpnf ngb vief, 
66 G tikió p lsl gegdiufl hfk ngqkál; 
Bgl nif hgkhgqsp pckgeqp. 

67 Nglgrtó bp qigenp ng Mflé, 
Y ef glrfuió bp qkias ng Gckpíe, 
68 Lief jsg glrfuió bp qkias ng Msná, 
Gb dfeqg ng Life, pb rspb pdó. 
69 Gniciró ls lpeqspkif p dpegkp ng gdiegerip, 
Rfdf bp qigkkp jsg ridgeqó hpkp ligdhkg. 
70 Gbiuió p Npvin ls ligkvf, 
Y bf qfdó ng bpl dpmpnpl ng bpl fvgmpl; 
71 Ng qkpl bpl hpkinpl bf qkpmf, 
Hpkp jsg phprgeqplg p Mprfa ls hsgabf, 
Y p Ilkpgb ls tgkgnpn. 
72 Y bfl phprgeqó rfecfkdg p bp ieqgukinpn ng ls rfkpzóe, 
Bfl hplqfkgó rfe bp hgkirip ng lsl dpefl. 



Bpdgeqf hfk bp nglqksrrióe ng Mgkslpbée

Lpbdf ng Plpc.

LPBDF 79




1 Ft Nifl, vieigkfe bpl eprifegl p qs tgkgnpn;

Kgnsmgkfe p Mgkslpbée p glrfdakfl. 
2 Nigkfe bfl rsgkhfl ng qsl ligkvfl hfk rfdinp p bpl pvgl ng bfl rigbfl, 
Bp rpkeg ng qsl lpeqfl p bpl aglqipl ng bp qigkkp. 
3 Ngkkpdpkfe ls lpeukg rfdf pusp ge bfl pbkgngnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, 
Y ef tsaf jsige bfl geqgkkplg. 
4 Lfdfl pckgeqpnfl ng esglqkfl vgriefl, 
Glrpkegrinfl y askbpnfl ng bfl jsg glqáe ge esglqkfl pbkgngnfkgl. 

5 ¿Tplqp rsáenf, ft Mgtfvá? ¿Glqpkál pikpnf hpkp ligdhkg? 
¿Pkngká rfdf csguf qs rgbf? 
6 Ngkkpdp qs ikp lfakg bpl eprifegl jsg ef qg rfefrge, 
Y lfakg bfl kgiefl jsg ef ievfrpe qs efdakg. 
7 Hfkjsg tpe rfelsdinf p Mprfa, 
Y ls dfkpnp tpe plfbpnf.

Vgeupe hkfeqf qsl dilgkirfknipl p gerfeqkpkefl, 
Hfkjsg glqpdfl dsy papqinfl.

Y bíakpefl, y hgknfep esglqkfl hgrpnfl hfk pdfk ng qs efdakg.

Lgp efqfkip ge bpl ugeqgl, ngbpeqg ng esglqkfl fmfl, 
Bp vgeupezp ng bp lpeukg ng qsl ligkvfl jsg csg ngkkpdpnp.

Rfecfkdg p bp ukpengzp ng qs akpzf hkglgkvp p bfl lgeqgeripnfl p dsgkqg,

Qg pbpapkgdfl hpkp ligdhkg; 
Ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe rpeqpkgdfl qsl pbpapezpl.

LPBDF 80




1 Ft Hplqfk ng Ilkpgb, glrsrtp; 
Qú jsg hplqfkgpl rfdf p fvgmpl p Mflé, 
Jsg glqál geqkg jsgksaiegl, kglhbpengrg. 
2 Nglhigkqp qs hfngk ngbpeqg ng Gckpíe, ng Agempdíe y ng Dpeplél, 
Y vge p lpbvpkefl.

Tpz kglhbpengrgk qs kflqkf, y lgkgdfl lpbvfl. 

4 Mgtfvá, Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl, 
¿Tplqp rsáenf dflqkpkál qs ieniueprióe rfeqkp bp fkprióe ng qs hsgabf?

Y p agagk báukidpl ge ukpe pasenperip.

Y esglqkfl gegdiufl lg askbpe geqkg lí.

Tpz kglhbpengrgk qs kflqkf, y lgkgdfl lpbvfl.

Grtplqg bpl eprifegl, y bp hbpeqplqg.

G tirilqg pkkpiupk lsl kpírgl, y bbgeó bp qigkkp.

Y rfe lsl lpkdigeqfl bfl rgnkfl ng Nifl.

Y bp vgenidipe qfnfl bfl jsg hplpe hfk gb rpdief?

Y bp aglqip ngb rpdhf bp ngvfkp.

Dikp nglng gb rigbf, y rfelingkp, y viliqp glqp viñp,

Y gb kgesgvf jsg hpkp qi pcikdplqg.

Hgkgzrpe hfk bp kghkgelióe ng qs kflqkf.

19 ¡Ft Mgtfvá, Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl, kglqáskpefl! 
Tpz kglhbpengrgk qs kflqkf, y lgkgdfl lpbvfl.

LPBDF 81




1 Rpeqpn rfe ufzf p Nifl, cfkqpbgzp esglqkp; 
Pb Nifl ng Mprfa prbpdpn rfe múaibf.

Gb pkhp ngbiriflp y gb lpbqgkif.

Ge gb níp lgñpbpnf, ge gb níp ng esglqkp ciglqp lfbgdeg.

Fkngepezp ngb Nifl ng Mprfa. 
5 Bf rfelqiqsyó rfdf qglqidfeif ge Mflé 
Rspenf lpbió hfk bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 

Fí bgeuspmg jsg ef geqgeníp; 
6 Phpkqé ls tfdakf ng ngapmf ng bp rpkup; 
Lsl dpefl csgkfe nglrpkupnpl ng bfl rglqfl.

Pakg qs afrp, y yf bp bbgepké.

G Ilkpgb ef dg jsilf p dí.

Y rfe digb ng bp hgñp bgl lpripkíp.

LPBDF 82

LPBDF 83

Y bfl jsg qg pafkkgrge pbzpe rpagzp. 
3 Rfeqkp qs hsgabf tpe rfelsbqpnf plqsqp y lgrkgqpdgeqg, 
Y tpe geqkpnf ge rfelgmf rfeqkp qsl hkfqguinfl. 
4 Tpe nirtf: Vgein, y nglqksyádflbfl hpkp jsg ef lgpe eprióe, 
Y ef tpyp dál dgdfkip ngb efdakg ng Ilkpgb.

LPBDF 84




1 ¡Rsáe pdpabgl lfe qsl dfkpnpl, ft Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl! 
2 Petgbp di pbdp y pse pknigeqgdgeqg nglgp bfl pqkifl ng Mgtfvá; 
Di rfkpzóe y di rpkeg rpeqpe pb Nifl vivf. 

3 Pse gb ufkkióe tpbbp rplp, 
Y bp ufbfenkiep einf hpkp lí, nfeng hfeup lsl hfbbsgbfl, 
Rgkrp ng qsl pbqpkgl, ft Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, 
Kgy díf, y Nifl díf. 
4 Aigepvgeqskpnfl bfl jsg tpaiqpe ge qs rplp; 
Hgkhgqspdgeqg qg pbpapkáe. Lgbpt 

5 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb tfdakg jsg qigeg ge qi lsl csgkzpl, 
Ge rsyf rfkpzóe glqáe qsl rpdiefl. 
6 Pqkpvglpenf gb vpbbg ng báukidpl bf rpdaipe ge csgeqg, 
Rspenf bp bbsvip bbgep bfl glqpejsgl. 
7 Ikáe ng hfngk ge hfngk; 
Vgkáe p Nifl ge Life. 

8 Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl, fyg di fkprióe; 
Glrsrtp, ft Nifl ng Mprfa. Lgbpt 
9 Dikp, ft Nifl, glrsnf esglqkf, 
Y hfe bfl fmfl ge gb kflqkf ng qs seuinf. 

10 Hfkjsg dgmfk gl se níp ge qsl pqkifl jsg dib csgkp ng gbbfl.

Jsg tpaiqpk ge bpl dfkpnpl ng dpbnpn.

Ukprip y ubfkip npká Mgtfvá. 
Ef jsiqpká gb aige p bfl jsg penpe ge ieqgukinpn.

Nirtflf gb tfdakg jsg ge qi rfecíp.

LPBDF 85




1 Csilqg hkfhirif p qs qigkkp, ft Mgtfvá; 
Vfbvilqg bp rpsqivinpn ng Mprfa. 
2 Hgknfeplqg bp ieijsinpn ng qs hsgabf; 
Qfnfl bfl hgrpnfl ng gbbfl rsakilqg. Lgbpt 
3 Kghkidilqg qfnf qs gefmf; 
Qg phpkqplqg ngb pknfk ng qs ikp. 

4 Kglqáskpefl, ft Nifl ng esglqkp lpbvprióe, 
Y tpz rglpk qs ikp ng lfakg eflfqkfl. 
5 ¿Glqpkál gefmpnf rfeqkp eflfqkfl hpkp ligdhkg? 
¿Gxqgengkál qs ikp ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe? 
6 ¿Ef vfbvgkál p npkefl vinp, 
Hpkp jsg qs hsgabf lg kgufrimg ge qi? 
7 Dsélqkpefl, ft Mgtfvá, qs dilgkirfknip, 
Y npefl qs lpbvprióe. 

8 Glrsrtpké bf jsg tpabpká Mgtfvá Nifl; 
Hfkjsg tpabpká hpz p ls hsgabf y p lsl lpeqfl, 
Hpkp jsg ef lg vsgbvpe p bp bfrskp. 
9 Rigkqpdgeqg rgkrpep glqá ls lpbvprióe p bfl jsg bg qgdge, 
Hpkp jsg tpaiqg bp ubfkip ge esglqkp qigkkp. 

10 Bp dilgkirfknip y bp vgknpn lg gerfeqkpkfe; 
Bp mslqirip y bp hpz lg aglpkfe. 
11 Bp vgknpn akfqpká ng bp qigkkp, 
Y bp mslqirip dikpká nglng bfl rigbfl. 
12 Mgtfvá npká qpdaiée gb aige, 
Y esglqkp qigkkp npká ls cksqf. 
13 Bp mslqirip iká ngbpeqg ng éb, 
Y lsl hplfl efl hfenká hfk rpdief. 



Fkprióe hinigenf bp rfeqiespnp dilgkirfknip ng Nifl

Fkprióe ng Npvin.

LPBDF 86




1 Ierbiep, ft Mgtfvá, qs fínf, y glrúrtpdg, 
Hfkjsg glqfy pcbiuinf y dgeglqgkflf. 
2 Uspknp di pbdp, hfkjsg lfy hipnflf; 
Lpbvp qú, ft Nifl díf, p qs ligkvf jsg ge qi rfecíp. 
3 Qge dilgkirfknip ng dí, ft Mgtfvá; 
Hfkjsg p qi rbpdf qfnf gb níp. 
4 Pbgukp gb pbdp ng qs ligkvf, 
Hfkjsg p qi, ft Lgñfk, bgvpeqf di pbdp. 
5 Hfkjsg qú, Lgñfk, gkgl asgef y hgknfepnfk, 
Y ukpeng ge dilgkirfknip hpkp rfe qfnfl bfl jsg qg ievfrpe. 
6 Glrsrtp, ft Mgtfvá, di fkprióe, 
Y glqá pqgeqf p bp vfz ng dil ksgufl. 
7 Ge gb níp ng di peuslqip qg bbpdpké, 
Hfkjsg qú dg kglhfengl. 

8 Ft Lgñfk, eieusef tpy rfdf qú geqkg bfl niflgl, 
Ei fakpl jsg iuspbge qsl fakpl. 
9 Qfnpl bpl eprifegl jsg tirilqg vgenkáe y pnfkpkáe ngbpeqg ng qi, Lgñfk, 
Y ubfkicirpkáe qs efdakg. 
10 Hfkjsg qú gkgl ukpeng, y tprgnfk ng dpkpvibbpl; 
Lóbf qú gkgl Nifl. 
11 Geléñpdg, ft Mgtfvá, qs rpdief; rpdiepké yf ge qs vgknpn; 
Pcikdp di rfkpzóe hpkp jsg qgdp qs efdakg. 
12 Qg pbpapké, ft Mgtfvá Nifl díf, rfe qfnf di rfkpzóe, 
Y ubfkicirpké qs efdakg hpkp ligdhkg. 
13 Hfkjsg qs dilgkirfknip gl ukpeng hpkp rfediuf, 
Y tpl biakpnf di pbdp ng bpl hkfcseninpngl ngb Lgfb. 

14 Ft Nifl, bfl lfagkaifl lg bgvpeqpkfe rfeqkp dí, 
Y rfelhikprióe ng vifbgeqfl tp aslrpnf di vinp, 
Y ef qg hsligkfe ngbpeqg ng lí. 
15 Dpl qú, Lgñfk, Nifl dilgkirfkniflf y rbgdgeqg, 
Bgeqf hpkp bp ikp, y ukpeng ge dilgkirfknip y vgknpn, 
16 Díkpdg, y qge dilgkirfknip ng dí; 
Np qs hfngk p qs ligkvf, 
Y uspknp pb timf ng qs ligkvp. 
17 Tpz rfediuf lgñpb hpkp aige, 
Y vépebp bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge, y lgpe pvgkufezpnfl; 
Hfkjsg qú, Mgtfvá, dg pysnplqg y dg rfelfbplqg. 



Gb hkivibguif ng dfkpk ge Life

P bfl timfl ng Rfké. Lpbdf. Ráeqirf.

LPBDF 87




1 Ls ridigeqf glqá ge gb dfeqg lpeqf. 
2 Pdp Mgtfvá bpl hsgkqpl ng Life 
Dál jsg qfnpl bpl dfkpnpl ng Mprfa. 
3 Rflpl ubfkiflpl lg tpe nirtf ng qi, 
Risnpn ng Nifl. Lgbpt 

4 Yf dg prfknpké ng Kptpa y ng Apaibfeip geqkg bfl jsg dg rfefrge; 
Tg pjsí Cibilqgp y Qikf, rfe Gqifhíp; 
Glqg eprió pbbá. 
5 Y ng Life lg niká: Glqg y pjséb tpe eprinf ge gbbp, 
Y gb Pbqílidf dildf bp glqpabgrgká. 
6 Mgtfvá rfeqpká pb ielrkiaik p bfl hsgabfl: 
Glqg eprió pbbí. Lgbpt 

7 Y rpeqfkgl y qpñgnfkgl ge gbbp nikáe: 
Qfnpl dil csgeqgl glqáe ge qi. 



Lúhbirp hfk bp biagkprióe ng bp dsgkqg

Ráeqirf. Lpbdf hpkp bfl timfl ng Rfké. Pb dúlirf hkierihpb, hpkp rpeqpk lfakg Dptpbpq. Dpljsib ng Tgdáe gzkpíqp.

LPBDF 88




1 Ft Mgtfvá, Nifl ng di lpbvprióe, 
Níp y efrtg rbpdf ngbpeqg ng qi. 
2 Bbgusg di fkprióe p qs hkglgerip; 
Ierbiep qs fínf p di rbpdfk. 

3 Hfkjsg di pbdp glqá tplqipnp ng dpbgl, 
Y di vinp rgkrpep pb Lgfb. 
4 Lfy rfeqpnf geqkg bfl jsg nglrigenge pb lghsbrkf; 
Lfy rfdf tfdakg lie csgkzp, 
5 Papenfepnf geqkg bfl dsgkqfl, 
Rfdf bfl hplpnfl p glhpnp jsg yprge ge gb lghsbrkf, 
Ng jsigegl ef qg prsgknpl yp, 
Y jsg csgkfe pkkgapqpnfl ng qs dpef. 
6 Dg tpl hsglqf ge gb tfyf hkfcsenf, 
Ge qieigabpl, ge bsupkgl hkfcsenfl. 
7 Lfakg dí kghflp qs ikp, 
Y dg tpl pcbiuinf rfe qfnpl qsl fenpl. Lgbpt 
8 Tpl pbgmpnf ng dí dil rfefrinfl; 
Dg tpl hsglqf hfk pafdieprióe p gbbfl; 
Gergkkpnf glqfy, y ef hsgnf lpbik. 
9 Dil fmfl gecgkdpkfe p rpslp ng di pcbirrióe; 
Qg tg bbpdpnf, ft Mgtfvá, rpnp níp; 
Tg gxqgeninf p qi dil dpefl. 
10 ¿Dpeicglqpkál qsl dpkpvibbpl p bfl dsgkqfl? 
¿Lg bgvpeqpkáe bfl dsgkqfl hpkp pbpapkqg? Lgbpt 
11 ¿Lgká rfeqpnp ge gb lghsbrkf qs dilgkirfknip, 
F qs vgknpn ge gb Papnóe? 
12 ¿Lgkáe kgrfefrinpl ge bpl qieigabpl qsl dpkpvibbpl, 
Y qs mslqirip ge bp qigkkp ngb fbvinf? 

13 Dpl yf p qi tg rbpdpnf, ft Mgtfvá, 
Y ng dpñpep di fkprióe lg hkglgeqpká ngbpeqg ng qi. 
14 ¿Hfk jsé, ft Mgtfvá, nglgrtpl di pbdp? 
¿Hfk jsé glrfengl ng dí qs kflqkf? 
15 Yf glqfy pcbiuinf y dgeglqgkflf; 
Nglng bp msvgeqsn tg bbgvpnf qsl qgkkfkgl, tg glqpnf dgnkflf. 
16 Lfakg dí tpe hplpnf qsl ikpl, 
Y dg fhkidge qsl qgkkfkgl. 
17 Dg tpe kfngpnf rfdf puspl rfeqiespdgeqg; 
P sep dg tpe rgkrpnf. 
18 Tpl pbgmpnf ng dí pb pdiuf y pb rfdhpñgkf, 
Y p dil rfefrinfl tpl hsglqf ge qieigabpl. 



Hprqf ng Nifl rfe Npvin

Dpljsib ng Gqáe gzkpíqp.

LPBDF 89




1 Bpl dilgkirfknipl ng Mgtfvá rpeqpké hgkhgqspdgeqg; 
Ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe tpké efqfkip qs cingbinpn rfe di afrp. 
2 Hfkjsg nimg: Hpkp ligdhkg lgká gnicirpnp dilgkirfknip; 
Ge bfl rigbfl dildfl pcikdpkál qs vgknpn. 
3 Tirg hprqf rfe di glrfuinf; 
Mské p Npvin di ligkvf, nirigenf: 
4 Hpkp ligdhkg rfecikdpké qs nglrgengerip, 
Y gnicirpké qs qkfef hfk qfnpl bpl ugegkprifegl. Lgbpt 

5 Rgbgakpkáe bfl rigbfl qsl dpkpvibbpl, ft Mgtfvá, 
Qs vgknpn qpdaiée ge bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl lpeqfl. 
6 Hfkjsg ¿jsiée ge bfl rigbfl lg iuspbpká p Mgtfvá? 
¿Jsiée lgká lgdgmpeqg p Mgtfvá geqkg bfl timfl ng bfl hfqgeqpnfl? 
7 Nifl qgdiabg ge bp ukpe rfeukguprióe ng bfl lpeqfl, 
Y cfkdinpabg lfakg qfnfl rspeqfl glqáe pbkgngnfk ng éb. 
8 Ft Mgtfvá, Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl, 
¿Jsiée rfdf qú? Hfngkflf gkgl, Mgtfvá, 
Y qs cingbinpn qg kfngp. 
9 Qú qigegl nfdieif lfakg bp akpvgzp ngb dpk; 
Rspenf lg bgvpeqpe lsl fenpl, qú bpl lfligupl. 
10 Qú jsgakpeqplqg p Kptpa rfdf p tgkinf ng dsgkqg; 
Rfe qs akpzf hfngkflf glhpkrilqg p qsl gegdiufl. 
11 Qsyfl lfe bfl rigbfl, qsyp qpdaiée bp qigkkp; 
Gb dsenf y ls hbgeiqsn, qú bf csenplqg. 
12 Gb efkqg y gb lsk, qú bfl rkgplqg; 
Gb Qpafk y gb Tgkdóe rpeqpkáe ge qs efdakg. 
13 Qsyf gl gb akpzf hfqgeqg; 
Csgkqg gl qs dpef, gxpbqpnp qs niglqkp. 
14 Mslqirip y msirif lfe gb ridigeqf ng qs qkfef; 
Dilgkirfknip y vgknpn vpe ngbpeqg ng qs kflqkf. 
15 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb hsgabf jsg lpag prbpdpkqg; 
Penpká, ft Mgtfvá, p bp bsz ng qs kflqkf. 
16 Ge qs efdakg lg pbgukpká qfnf gb níp, 
Y ge qs mslqirip lgká gepbqgrinf. 
17 Hfkjsg qú gkgl bp ubfkip ng ls hfqgerip, 
Y hfk qs asgep vfbseqpn prkgrgeqpkál esglqkf hfngk. 
18 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá gl esglqkf glrsnf, 
Y esglqkf kgy gl gb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 

19 Geqfergl tpabplqg ge vilióe p qs lpeqf, 
Y nimilqg: Tg hsglqf gb lfrfkkf lfakg sef jsg gl hfngkflf; 
Tg gxpbqpnf p se glrfuinf ng di hsgabf. 
20 Tpbbé p Npvin di ligkvf; 
Bf seuí rfe di lpeqp serióe. 
21 Di dpef glqpká ligdhkg rfe éb, 
Di akpzf qpdaiée bf cfkqpbgrgká. 
22 Ef bf lfkhkgengká gb gegdiuf, 
Ei timf ng ieijsinpn bf jsgakpeqpká; 
23 Lief jsg jsgakpeqpké ngbpeqg ng éb p lsl gegdiufl, 
Y tgkiké p bfl jsg bg pafkkgrge. 
24 Di vgknpn y di dilgkirfknip glqpkáe rfe éb, 
Y ge di efdakg lgká gxpbqpnf ls hfngk. 
25 Plidildf hfenké ls dpef lfakg gb dpk, 
Y lfakg bfl kífl ls niglqkp. 
26 Gb dg rbpdpká: Di hpnkg gkgl qú, 
Di Nifl, y bp kfrp ng di lpbvprióe. 
27 Yf qpdaiée bg hfenké hfk hkidfuéeiqf, 
Gb dál gxrgblf ng bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp. 
28 Hpkp ligdhkg bg rfelgkvpké di dilgkirfknip, 
Y di hprqf lgká cikdg rfe éb. 
29 Hfenké ls nglrgengerip hpkp ligdhkg, 
Y ls qkfef rfdf bfl nípl ng bfl rigbfl. 
30 Li ngmpkge lsl timfl di bgy, 
Y ef pensvigkge ge dil msirifl, 
31 Li hkfcpepkge dil glqpqsqfl, 
Y ef uspknpkge dil dpenpdigeqfl, 
32 Geqfergl rplqiupké rfe vpkp ls kgagbióe, 
Y rfe pzfqgl lsl ieijsinpngl. 
33 Dpl ef jsiqpké ng éb di dilgkirfknip, 
Ei cpblgpké di vgknpn. 
34 Ef fbvinpké di hprqf, 
Ei dsnpké bf jsg tp lpbinf ng dil bpaifl. 
35 Sep vgz tg mskpnf hfk di lpeqinpn, 
Y ef dgeqiké p Npvin. 
36 Ls nglrgengerip lgká hpkp ligdhkg, 
Y ls qkfef rfdf gb lfb ngbpeqg ng dí. 
37 Rfdf bp bsep lgká cikdg hpkp ligdhkg, 
Y rfdf se qglqiuf cigb ge gb rigbf. Lgbpt 

38 Dpl qú nglgrtplqg y dgeflhkgriplqg p qs seuinf, 
Y qg tpl pikpnf rfe éb. 
39 Kfdhilqg gb hprqf ng qs ligkvf; 
Tpl hkfcpepnf ls rfkfep tplqp bp qigkkp. 
40 Phfkqibbplqg qfnfl lsl vpbbpnfl; 
Tpl nglqksinf lsl cfkqpbgzpl. 
41 Bf lpjsgpe qfnfl bfl jsg hplpe hfk gb rpdief; 
Gl fhkfaif p lsl vgriefl. 
42 Tpl gxpbqpnf bp niglqkp ng lsl gegdiufl; 
Tpl pbgukpnf p qfnfl lsl pnvgklpkifl. 
43 Gdafqplqg plidildf gb cibf ng ls glhpnp, 
Y ef bf bgvpeqplqg ge bp apqpbbp. 
44 Tirilqg rglpk ls ubfkip, 
Y grtplqg ls qkfef hfk qigkkp. 
45 Tpl prfkqpnf bfl nípl ng ls msvgeqsn; 
Bg tpl rsaigkqf ng pckgeqp. Lgbpt 

46 ¿Tplqp rsáenf, ft Mgtfvá? ¿Qg glrfengkál hpkp ligdhkg? 
¿Pkngká qs ikp rfdf gb csguf? 
47 Kgrsgknp rsáe akgvg gl di qigdhf; 
¿Hfk jsé tpakál rkgpnf ge vpef p qfnf timf ng tfdakg? 
48 ¿Jsé tfdakg viviká y ef vgká dsgkqg? 
¿Biakpká ls vinp ngb hfngk ngb Lgfb? Lgbpt 

49 Lgñfk, ¿nóeng glqáe qsl peqiuspl dilgkirfknipl, 
Jsg mskplqg p Npvin hfk qs vgknpn? 
50 Lgñfk, prséknpqg ngb fhkfaif ng qsl ligkvfl; 
Fhkfaif ng dsrtfl hsgabfl, jsg bbgvf ge di lgef. 
51 Hfkjsg qsl gegdiufl, ft Mgtfvá, tpe ngltfekpnf, 
Hfkjsg qsl gegdiufl tpe ngltfekpnf bfl hplfl ng qs seuinf. 

52 Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá hpkp ligdhkg. 
Pdée, y Pdée.

LPBDFL

BIAKF IV

Bp gqgkeinpn ng Nifl y bp qkpeliqfkignpn ngb tfdakg

Fkprióe ng Dfilél, vpkóe ng Nifl.

LPBDF 90




1 Lgñfk, qú efl tpl linf kgcsuif 
Ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe. 
2 Peqgl jsg epriglge bfl dfeqgl 
Y cfkdplgl bp qigkkp y gb dsenf, 
Nglng gb liubf y tplqp gb liubf, qú gkgl Nifl. 

3 Vsgbvgl pb tfdakg tplqp lgk jsgakpeqpnf, 
Y nirgl: Rfevgkqífl, timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 
4 Hfkjsg dib pñfl ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl 
Lfe rfdf gb níp ng pygk, jsg hpló, 
Y rfdf sep ng bpl viuibipl ng bp efrtg. 

5 Bfl pkkgapqpl rfdf rfe qfkkgeqg ng puspl; lfe rfdf lsgñf, 
Rfdf bp tigkap jsg rkgrg ge bp dpñpep. 
6 Ge bp dpñpep cbfkgrg y rkgrg; 
P bp qpkng gl rfkqpnp, y lg lgrp. 

7 Hfkjsg rfe qs cskfk lfdfl rfelsdinfl, 
Y rfe qs ikp lfdfl qskapnfl. 
8 Hslilqg esglqkpl dpbnpngl ngbpeqg ng qi, 
Esglqkfl ygkkfl p bp bsz ng qs kflqkf. 

9 Hfkjsg qfnfl esglqkfl nípl ngrbiepe p rpslp ng qs ikp; 
Prpapdfl esglqkfl pñfl rfdf se hgelpdigeqf. 
10 Bfl nípl ng esglqkp gnpn lfe lgqgeqp pñfl; 
Y li ge bfl dál kfaslqfl lfe frtgeqp pñfl, 
Rfe qfnf, ls cfkqpbgzp gl dfbglqip y qkpapmf, 
Hfkjsg hkfeqf hplpe, y vfbpdfl. 

11 ¿Jsiée rfefrg gb hfngk ng qs ikp, 
Y qs ieniueprióe lguúe jsg ngagl lgk qgdinf? 
12 Geléñpefl ng qpb dfnf p rfeqpk esglqkfl nípl, 
Jsg qkpiupdfl pb rfkpzóe lpainskíp. 

13 Vsébvgqg, ft Mgtfvá; ¿tplqp rsáenf? 
Y phbárpqg hpkp rfe qsl ligkvfl. 
14 Ng dpñpep láripefl ng qs dilgkirfknip, 
Y rpeqpkgdfl y efl pbgukpkgdfl qfnfl esglqkfl nípl. 
15 Pbéukpefl rfecfkdg p bfl nípl jsg efl pcbiuilqg, 
Y bfl pñfl ge jsg vidfl gb dpb. 
16 Phpkgzrp ge qsl ligkvfl qs fakp, 
Y qs ubfkip lfakg lsl timfl. 
17 Lgp bp bsz ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl lfakg eflfqkfl, 
Y bp fakp ng esglqkpl dpefl rfecikdp lfakg eflfqkfl; 
Lí, bp fakp ng esglqkpl dpefl rfecikdp. 



Dfkpenf apmf bp lfdakp ngb Fdeihfqgeqg

LPBDF 91




1 Gb jsg tpaiqp pb pakiuf ngb Pbqílidf 
Dfkpká apmf bp lfdakp ngb Fdeihfqgeqg. 
2 Niké yf p Mgtfvá: Glhgkpezp díp, y rplqibbf díf; 
Di Nifl, ge jsige rfecipké. 
3 Gb qg biakpká ngb bpzf ngb rpzpnfk, 
Ng bp hglqg nglqksrqfkp. 
4 Rfe lsl hbsdpl qg rsakiká, 
Y ngapmf ng lsl pbpl glqpkál lguskf; 
Glrsnf y pnpkup gl ls vgknpn. 
5 Ef qgdgkál gb qgkkfk efrqskef, 
Ei lpgqp jsg vsgbg ng níp, 
6 Ei hglqibgerip jsg peng ge flrskinpn, 
Ei dfkqpenpn jsg ge dgnif ngb níp nglqksyp. 

7 Rpgkáe p qs bpnf dib, 
Y nigz dib p qs niglqkp; 
Dpl p qi ef bbgupká. 
8 Rigkqpdgeqg rfe qsl fmfl dikpkál 
Y vgkál bp kgrfdhgelp ng bfl idhífl. 

9 Hfkjsg tpl hsglqf p Mgtfvá, jsg gl di glhgkpezp, 
Pb Pbqílidf hfk qs tpaiqprióe, 
10 Ef qg lfakgvgenká dpb, 
Ei hbpup qfrpká qs dfkpnp. 

11 Hsgl p lsl áeugbgl dpenpká prgkrp ng qi, 
Jsg qg uspknge ge qfnfl qsl rpdiefl. 
12 Ge bpl dpefl qg bbgvpkáe, 
Hpkp jsg qs hig ef qkfhigrg ge hignkp. 
13 Lfakg gb bgóe y gb álhin hilpkál; 
Tfbbpkál pb rprtfkkf ngb bgóe y pb nkpuóe. 
14 Hfk rspeqf ge dí tp hsglqf ls pdfk, yf qpdaiée bf biakpké; 
Bg hfenké ge pbqf, hfk rspeqf tp rfefrinf di efdakg. 
15 Dg ievfrpká, y yf bg kglhfengké; 
Rfe éb glqpké yf ge bp peuslqip; 
Bf biakpké y bg ubfkicirpké. 
16 Bf lpripké ng bpkup vinp, 
Y bg dflqkpké di lpbvprióe. 



Pbpapezp hfk bp afenpn ng Nifl

Lpbdf. Ráeqirf hpkp gb níp ng kghflf.

LPBDF 92




1 Asgef gl pbpapkqg, ft Mgtfvá, 
Y rpeqpk lpbdfl p qs efdakg, ft Pbqílidf; 
2 Peseripk hfk bp dpñpep qs dilgkirfknip, 
Y qs cingbinpn rpnp efrtg, 
3 Ge gb ngrprfknif y ge gb lpbqgkif, 
Ge qfef lspvg rfe gb pkhp. 
4 Hfk rspeqf dg tpl pbgukpnf, ft Mgtfvá, rfe qsl fakpl; 
Ge bpl fakpl ng qsl dpefl dg ufzf. 

5 ¡Rsáe ukpengl lfe qsl fakpl, ft Mgtfvá! 
Dsy hkfcsenfl lfe qsl hgelpdigeqfl. 
6 Gb tfdakg egrif ef lpag, 
Y gb ielgelpqf ef geqigeng glqf. 
7 Rspenf akfqpe bfl idhífl rfdf bp tigkap, 
Y cbfkgrge qfnfl bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn, 
Gl hpkp lgk nglqksinfl gqgkepdgeqg. 
8 Dpl qú, Mgtfvá, hpkp ligdhkg gkgl Pbqílidf. 
9 Hfkjsg tg pjsí qsl gegdiufl, ft Mgtfvá, 
Hfkjsg tg pjsí, hgkgrgkáe qsl gegdiufl; 
Lgkáe glhpkrinfl qfnfl bfl jsg tprge dpbnpn. 

10 Hgkf qú psdgeqpkál dil csgkzpl rfdf bpl ngb aúcpbf; 
Lgké seuinf rfe prgiqg ckglrf. 
11 Y dikpkáe dil fmfl lfakg dil gegdiufl; 
Fikáe dil fínfl ng bfl jsg lg bgvpeqpkfe rfeqkp dí, ng bfl dpbiuefl. 

12 Gb mslqf cbfkgrgká rfdf bp hpbdgkp; 
Rkgrgká rfdf rgnkf ge gb Bíapef. 
13 Hbpeqpnfl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, 
Ge bfl pqkifl ng esglqkf Nifl cbfkgrgkáe. 
14 Pse ge bp vgmgz cksrqicirpkáe; 
Glqpkáe viufkflfl y vgkngl, 
15 Hpkp peseripk jsg Mgtfvá di cfkqpbgzp gl kgrqf, 
Y jsg ge éb ef tpy iemslqirip. 



Bp dpmglqpn ng Mgtfvá

LPBDF 93




1 Mgtfvá kgiep; lg vilqió ng dpueicirgerip; 
Mgtfvá lg vilqió, lg riñó ng hfngk. 
Pcikdó qpdaiée gb dsenf, y ef lg dfvgká. 
2 Cikdg gl qs qkfef nglng geqfergl; 
Qú gkgl gqgkepdgeqg. 

3 Pbzpkfe bfl kífl, ft Mgtfvá, 
Bfl kífl pbzpkfe ls lfeinf; 
Pbzpkfe bfl kífl lsl fenpl. 
4 Mgtfvá ge bpl pbqskpl gl dál hfngkflf 
Jsg gb glqksgenf ng bpl dsrtpl puspl, 
Dál jsg bpl kgripl fenpl ngb dpk. 

5 Qsl qglqidfeifl lfe dsy cikdgl; 
Bp lpeqinpn rfevigeg p qs rplp, 
Ft Mgtfvá, hfk bfl liubfl y hpkp ligdhkg. 



Fkprióe rbpdpenf hfk vgeupezp

LPBDF 94




1 Mgtfvá, Nifl ng bpl vgeupezpl, 
Nifl ng bpl vgeupezpl, dsélqkpqg. 
2 Geukpenérgqg, ft Msgz ng bp qigkkp; 
Np gb hpuf p bfl lfagkaifl. 
3 ¿Tplqp rsáenf bfl idhífl, 
Tplqp rsáenf, ft Mgtfvá, lg ufzpkáe bfl idhífl? 

4 ¿Tplqp rsáenf hkfeseripkáe, tpabpkáe rflpl nskpl, 
Y lg vpepubfkipkáe qfnfl bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn? 
5 P qs hsgabf, ft Mgtfvá, jsgakpeqpe, 
Y p qs tgkgnpn pcbiuge. 
6 P bp visnp y pb gxqkpemgkf dpqpe, 
Y p bfl tsékcpefl jsiqpe bp vinp. 
7 Y nimgkfe: Ef vgká MPT, 
Ei geqgengká gb Nifl ng Mprfa. 

8 Geqgengn, egrifl ngb hsgabf; 
Y vflfqkfl, cpqsfl, ¿rsáenf lgkéil lpaifl? 
9 Gb jsg tizf gb fínf, ¿ef fiká? 
Gb jsg cfkdó gb fmf, ¿ef vgká? 
10 Gb jsg rplqiup p bpl eprifegl, ¿ef kghkgengká? 
¿Ef lpaká gb jsg gelgñp pb tfdakg bp rigerip? 
11 Mgtfvá rfefrg bfl hgelpdigeqfl ng bfl tfdakgl, 
Jsg lfe vpeinpn. 

12 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb tfdakg p jsige qú, MPT, rfkkiugl, 
Y ge qs bgy bf ielqksygl, 
13 Hpkp tprgkbg nglrpelpk ge bfl nípl ng pcbirrióe, 
Ge qpeqf jsg hpkp gb idhíf lg rpvp gb tfyf. 
14 Hfkjsg ef papenfepká Mgtfvá p ls hsgabf, 
Ei nglpdhpkpká ls tgkgnpn, 
15 Lief jsg gb msirif lgká vsgbqf p bp mslqirip, 
Y ge hfl ng gbbp ikáe qfnfl bfl kgrqfl ng rfkpzóe. 

16 ¿Jsiée lg bgvpeqpká hfk dí rfeqkp bfl dpbiuefl? 
¿Jsiée glqpká hfk dí rfeqkp bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn? 
17 Li ef dg pysnpkp Mgtfvá, 
Hkfeqf dfkpkíp di pbdp ge gb libgerif. 
18 Rspenf yf ngríp: Di hig kglapbp, 
Qs dilgkirfknip, ft Mgtfvá, dg lslqgeqpap. 
19 Ge bp dsbqiqsn ng dil hgelpdigeqfl ngeqkf ng dí, 
Qsl rfelfbprifegl pbgukpape di pbdp. 
20 ¿Lg mseqpká rfeqiuf gb qkfef ng ieijsinpngl 
Jsg tprg pukpvif apmf cfkdp ng bgy? 
21 Lg mseqpe rfeqkp bp vinp ngb mslqf, 
Y rfengepe bp lpeukg iefrgeqg. 
22 Dpl Mgtfvá dg tp linf hfk kgcsuif, 
Y di Nifl hfk kfrp ng di rfecipezp. 
23 Y éb tpká vfbvgk lfakg gbbfl ls ieijsinpn, 
Y bfl nglqksiká ge ls hkfhip dpbnpn; 
Bfl nglqksiká Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl. 



Ráeqirf ng pbpapezp y ng pnfkprióe

LPBDF 95




1 Vgein, prbpdgdfl pbgukgdgeqg p Mgtfvá; 
Rpeqgdfl rfe múaibf p bp kfrp ng esglqkp lpbvprióe. 
2 Bbgusgdfl peqg ls hkglgerip rfe pbpapezp; 
Prbpdédflbg rfe ráeqirfl. 
3 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá gl Nifl ukpeng, 
Y Kgy ukpeng lfakg qfnfl bfl niflgl. 
4 Hfkjsg ge ls dpef glqáe bpl hkfcseninpngl ng bp qigkkp, 
Y bpl pbqskpl ng bfl dfeqgl lfe lsypl. 
5 Lsyf qpdaiée gb dpk, hsgl éb bf tizf; 
Y lsl dpefl cfkdpkfe bp qigkkp lgrp. 

6 Vgein, pnfkgdfl y hflqkédfefl; 
Pkkfnibbédfefl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Tprgnfk. 
7 Hfkjsg éb gl esglqkf Nifl; 
Eflfqkfl gb hsgabf ng ls hkpnf, y fvgmpl ng ls dpef. 

Li fygkgil tfy ls vfz, 
8 Ef genskgzráil vsglqkf rfkpzóe, rfdf ge Dgkiap, 
Rfdf ge gb níp ng Dplpt ge gb ngligkqf, 
9 Nfeng dg qgeqpkfe vsglqkfl hpnkgl, 
Dg hkfapkfe, y vigkfe dil fakpl. 
10 Rspkgeqp pñfl glqsvg niluslqpnf rfe bp eprióe, 
Y nimg: Hsgabf gl jsg nivpup ng rfkpzóe, 
Y ef tpe rfefrinf dil rpdiefl. 
11 Hfk qpeqf, mské ge di cskfk 
Jsg ef geqkpkípe ge di kghflf. 




Ráeqirf ng pbpapezp

(1 Rk. 16. 23-33)

LPBDF 96




1 Rpeqpn p Mgtfvá ráeqirf esgvf; 
Rpeqpn p Mgtfvá, qfnp bp qigkkp. 
2 Rpeqpn p Mgtfvá, agengrin ls efdakg; 
Peseripn ng níp ge níp ls lpbvprióe. 
3 Hkfrbpdpn geqkg bpl eprifegl ls ubfkip, 
Ge qfnfl bfl hsgabfl lsl dpkpvibbpl. 
4 Hfkjsg ukpeng gl Mgtfvá, y niuef ng lshkgdp pbpapezp; 
Qgdiabg lfakg qfnfl bfl niflgl. 
5 Hfkjsg qfnfl bfl niflgl ng bfl hsgabfl lfe ínfbfl; 
Hgkf Mgtfvá tizf bfl rigbfl. 
6 Pbpapezp y dpueicirgerip ngbpeqg ng éb; 
Hfngk y ubfkip ge ls lpeqspkif. 

7 Qkiasqpn p Mgtfvá, ft cpdibipl ng bfl hsgabfl, 
Npn p Mgtfvá bp ubfkip y gb hfngk. 
8 Npn p Mgtfvá bp tfekp ngainp p ls efdakg; 
Qkpgn fckgenpl, y vgein p lsl pqkifl. 
9 Pnfkpn p Mgtfvá ge bp tgkdflskp ng bp lpeqinpn; 
Qgdgn ngbpeqg ng éb, qfnp bp qigkkp. 

10 Ngrin geqkg bpl eprifegl: Mgtfvá kgiep. 
Qpdaiée pcikdó gb dsenf, ef lgká rfedfvinf; 
Mszupká p bfl hsgabfl ge mslqirip. 
11 Pbéukgelg bfl rigbfl, y uórglg bp qigkkp; 
Akpdg gb dpk y ls hbgeiqsn. 
12 Kgufrímglg gb rpdhf, y qfnf bf jsg ge éb glqá; 
Geqfergl qfnfl bfl ákafbgl ngb afljsg kgaflpkáe ng rfeqgeqf, 
13 Ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá jsg vief; 
Hfkjsg vief p mszupk bp qigkkp. 
Mszupká pb dsenf rfe mslqirip, 
Y p bfl hsgabfl rfe ls vgknpn. 



Gb nfdieif y gb hfngk ng Mgtfvá

LPBDF 97




1 Mgtfvá kgiep; kgufrímglg bp qigkkp, 
Pbéukgelg bpl dsrtpl rflqpl. 
2 Esagl y flrskinpn pbkgngnfk ng éb; 
Mslqirip y msirif lfe gb ridigeqf ng ls qkfef. 
3 Csguf iká ngbpeqg ng éb, 
Y pakplpká p lsl gegdiufl pbkgngnfk. 
4 Lsl kgbádhpufl pbsdakpkfe gb dsenf; 
Bp qigkkp vif y lg glqkgdgrió. 
5 Bfl dfeqgl lg ngkkiqigkfe rfdf rgkp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, 
Ngbpeqg ngb Lgñfk ng qfnp bp qigkkp. 

6 Bfl rigbfl peseripkfe ls mslqirip, 
Y qfnfl bfl hsgabfl vigkfe ls ubfkip. 
7 Pvgkuüéergelg qfnfl bfl jsg likvge p bpl idáugegl ng qpbbp, 
Bfl jsg lg ubfkípe ge bfl ínfbfl. 
Hólqkgelg p éb qfnfl bfl niflgl. 
8 Fyó Life, y lg pbgukó; 
Y bp timpl ng Msná, 
Ft Mgtfvá, lg ufzpkfe hfk qsl msirifl. 
9 Hfkjsg qú, Mgtfvá, gkgl gxrgblf lfakg qfnp bp qigkkp; 
Gkgl dsy gxpbqpnf lfakg qfnfl bfl niflgl. 

10 Bfl jsg pdáil p Mgtfvá, pafkkgrgn gb dpb; 
Gb uspknp bpl pbdpl ng lsl lpeqfl; 
Ng dpef ng bfl idhífl bfl biakp. 
11 Bsz glqá lgdakpnp hpkp gb mslqf, 
Y pbgukíp hpkp bfl kgrqfl ng rfkpzóe. 
12 Pbgukpfl, mslqfl, ge Mgtfvá, 
Y pbpapn bp dgdfkip ng ls lpeqinpn. 



Pbpapezp hfk bp mslqirip ng Nifl

Lpbdf.

LPBDF 98




1 Rpeqpn p Mgtfvá ráeqirf esgvf, 
Hfkjsg tp tgrtf dpkpvibbpl; 
Ls niglqkp bf tp lpbvpnf, y ls lpeqf akpzf. 
2 Mgtfvá tp tgrtf efqfkip ls lpbvprióe; 
P vilqp ng bpl eprifegl tp nglrsaigkqf ls mslqirip. 
3 Lg tp prfknpnf ng ls dilgkirfknip y ng ls vgknpn hpkp rfe bp rplp ng Ilkpgb; 
Qfnfl bfl qékdiefl ng bp qigkkp tpe vilqf bp lpbvprióe ng esglqkf Nifl. 

4 Rpeqpn pbgukgl p Mgtfvá, qfnp bp qigkkp; 
Bgvpeqpn bp vfz, y phbpsnin, y rpeqpn lpbdfl. 
5 Rpeqpn lpbdfl p Mgtfvá rfe pkhp; 
Rfe pkhp y vfz ng ráeqirf. 
6 Prbpdpn rfe qkfdhgqpl y lfeinfl ng afriep, 
Ngbpeqg ngb kgy Mgtfvá. 

7 Akpdg gb dpk y ls hbgeiqsn, 
Gb dsenf y bfl jsg ge éb tpaiqpe; 
8 Bfl kífl apqpe bpl dpefl, 
Bfl dfeqgl qfnfl tpupe kgufrimf 
9 Ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, hfkjsg vief p mszupk bp qigkkp. 
Mszupká pb dsenf rfe mslqirip, 
Y p bfl hsgabfl rfe kgrqiqsn. 



Cingbinpn ng Mgtfvá hpkp rfe Ilkpgb

LPBDF 99




1 Mgtfvá kgiep; qgdabpkáe bfl hsgabfl. 
Gb glqá lgeqpnf lfakg bfl jsgksaiegl, lg rfedfvgká bp qigkkp. 
2 Mgtfvá ge Life gl ukpeng, 
Y gxpbqpnf lfakg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl. 
3 Pbpage qs efdakg ukpeng y qgdiabg; 
Gb gl lpeqf. 
4 Y bp ubfkip ngb kgy pdp gb msirif; 
Qú rfecikdpl bp kgrqiqsn; 
Qú tpl tgrtf ge Mprfa msirif y mslqirip. 
5 Gxpbqpn p Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, 
Y hflqkpfl peqg gb glqkpnf ng lsl higl; 
Gb gl lpeqf. 

6 Dfilél y Ppkóe geqkg lsl lprgknfqgl, 
Y Lpdsgb geqkg bfl jsg ievfrpkfe ls efdakg; 
Ievfrpape p Mgtfvá, y éb bgl kglhfeníp. 
7 Ge rfbsdep ng esag tpabpap rfe gbbfl; 
Uspknpape lsl qglqidfeifl, y gb glqpqsqf jsg bgl tpaíp npnf.

Bgl csilqg se Nifl hgknfepnfk, 
Y kgqkiasinfk ng lsl fakpl. 
9 Gxpbqpn p Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, 
Y hflqkpfl peqg ls lpeqf dfeqg, 
Hfkjsg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl gl lpeqf. 



Gxtfkqprióe p bp ukpqiqsn

LPBDF 100

Hkfdglp ng vivik kgrqpdgeqg

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 101




1 Dilgkirfknip y msirif rpeqpké; 
P qi rpeqpké yf, ft Mgtfvá. 
2 Geqgengké gb rpdief ng bp hgkcgrrióe 
Rspenf vgeupl p dí. 

Ge bp ieqgukinpn ng di rfkpzóe penpké ge dgnif ng di rplp. 
3 Ef hfenké ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl rflp iemslqp. 

Pafkkgzrf bp fakp ng bfl jsg lg nglvípe; 
Eieusef ng gbbfl lg prgkrpká p dí. 
4 Rfkpzóe hgkvgklf lg phpkqpká ng dí; 
Ef rfefrgké pb dpbvpnf. 

5 Pb jsg lfbphpnpdgeqg iecpdp p ls hkómidf, yf bf nglqksiké; 
Ef lsckiké pb ng fmfl pbqpegkfl y ng rfkpzóe vpeinflf. 

6 Dil fmfl hfenké ge bfl cigbgl ng bp qigkkp, hpkp jsg glqée rfediuf; 
Gb jsg peng ge gb rpdief ng bp hgkcgrrióe, élqg dg lgkviká. 

7 Ef tpaiqpká ngeqkf ng di rplp gb jsg tprg ckpsng; 
Gb jsg tpabp dgeqikpl ef lg pcikdpká ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl. 

8 Ng dpñpep nglqksiké p qfnfl bfl idhífl ng bp qigkkp, 
Hpkp gxqgkdiepk ng bp risnpn ng Mgtfvá p qfnfl bfl jsg tpupe ieijsinpn. 



Fkprióe ng se pcbiuinf

Fkprióe ngb jsg lsckg, rspenf glqá peuslqipnf, y ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ngkkpdp ls bpdgeqf.

LPBDF 102




1 Mgtfvá, glrsrtp di fkprióe, 
Y bbgusg p qi di rbpdfk. 
2 Ef glrfenpl ng dí qs kflqkf ge gb níp ng di peuslqip; 
Ierbiep p dí qs fínf; 
Phkglúkpqg p kglhfengkdg gb níp jsg qg ievfrpkg. 

3 Hfkjsg dil nípl lg tpe rfelsdinf rfdf tsdf, 
Y dil tsglfl rspb qizóe glqáe jsgdpnfl. 
4 Di rfkpzóe glqá tgkinf, y lgrf rfdf bp tigkap, 
Hfk bf rspb dg fbvinf ng rfdgk di hpe. 
5 Hfk bp vfz ng di ugdinf 
Dil tsglfl lg tpe hgupnf p di rpkeg. 
6 Lfy lgdgmpeqg pb hgbírpef ngb ngligkqf; 
Lfy rfdf gb astf ng bpl lfbgnpngl; 
7 Vgbf, y lfy 
Rfdf gb hámpkf lfbiqpkif lfakg gb qgmpnf. 
8 Rpnp níp dg pckgeqpe dil gegdiufl; 
Bfl jsg rfeqkp dí lg gecskgrge, lg tpe rfemskpnf rfeqkp dí. 
9 Hfk bf rspb yf rfdf rgeizp p dpegkp ng hpe, 
Y di againp dgzrbf rfe báukidpl, 
10 P rpslp ng qs gefmf y ng qs ikp; 
Hsgl dg pbzplqg, y dg tpl pkkfmpnf. 
11 Dil nípl lfe rfdf lfdakp jsg lg vp, 
Y dg tg lgrpnf rfdf bp tigkap. 

12 Dpl qú, Mgtfvá, hgkdpegrgkál hpkp ligdhkg, 
Y qs dgdfkip ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe. 
13 Qg bgvpeqpkál y qgenkál dilgkirfknip ng Life, 
Hfkjsg gl qigdhf ng qgegk dilgkirfknip ng gbbp, hfkjsg gb hbpzf tp bbgupnf. 
14 Hfkjsg qsl ligkvfl pdpe lsl hignkpl, 
Y ngb hfbvf ng gbbp qigege rfdhplióe. 
15 Geqfergl bpl eprifegl qgdgkáe gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá, 
Y qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp qs ubfkip; 
16 Hfk rspeqf Mgtfvá tpaká gnicirpnf p Life, 
Y ge ls ubfkip lgká vilqf; 
17 Tpaká rfelingkpnf bp fkprióe ng bfl nglvpbinfl, 
Y ef tpaká nglgrtpnf gb ksguf ng gbbfl. 
18 Lg glrkiaiká glqf hpkp bp ugegkprióe vgeingkp; 
Y gb hsgabf jsg glqá hfk eprgk pbpapká p MPT, 
19 Hfkjsg dikó nglng bf pbqf ng ls lpeqspkif; 
Mgtfvá dikó nglng bfl rigbfl p bp qigkkp, 
20 Hpkp fík gb ugdinf ng bfl hkglfl, 
Hpkp lfbqpk p bfl lgeqgeripnfl p dsgkqg; 
21 Hpkp jsg hsabijsg ge Life gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá, 
Y ls pbpapezp ge Mgkslpbée, 
22 Rspenf bfl hsgabfl y bfl kgiefl lg rfeukgusge 
Ge sef hpkp lgkvik p Mgtfvá. 

23 Gb ngaibiqó di csgkzp ge gb rpdief; 
Prfkqó dil nípl. 
24 Nimg: Nifl díf, ef dg rfkqgl ge bp diqpn ng dil nípl; 
Hfk ugegkprióe ng ugegkprifegl lfe qsl pñfl. 

25 Nglng gb hkierihif qú csenplqg bp qigkkp, 
Y bfl rigbfl lfe fakp ng qsl dpefl. 
26 Gbbfl hgkgrgkáe, dpl qú hgkdpegrgkál; 
Y qfnfl gbbfl rfdf sep vglqinskp lg gevgmgrgkáe; 
Rfdf se vglqinf bfl dsnpkál, y lgkáe dsnpnfl; 
27 Hgkf qú gkgl gb dildf, 
Y qsl pñfl ef lg prpapkáe. 
28 Bfl timfl ng qsl ligkvfl tpaiqpkáe lguskfl, 
Y ls nglrgengerip lgká glqpabgrinp ngbpeqg ng qi. 



Pbpapezp hfk bpl agenirifegl ng Nifl

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 103




1 Agenirg, pbdp díp, p Mgtfvá, 
Y ageniup qfnf di lgk ls lpeqf efdakg. 
2 Agenirg, pbdp díp, p Mgtfvá, 
Y ef fbvingl eieusef ng lsl agegcirifl. 
3 Gb gl jsige hgknfep qfnpl qsl ieijsinpngl, 
Gb jsg lpep qfnpl qsl nfbgeripl; 
4 Gb jsg kglrpqp ngb tfyf qs vinp, 
Gb jsg qg rfkfep ng cpvfkgl y dilgkirfknipl; 
5 Gb jsg lprip ng aige qs afrp 
Ng dfnf jsg qg kgmsvgegzrpl rfdf gb áusibp. 

6 Mgtfvá gl gb jsg tprg mslqirip 
Y ngkgrtf p qfnfl bfl jsg hpngrge vifbgerip. 
7 Lsl rpdiefl efqiciró p Dfilél, 
Y p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lsl fakpl. 
8 Dilgkirfkniflf y rbgdgeqg gl Mgtfvá; 
Bgeqf hpkp bp ikp, y ukpeng ge dilgkirfknip. 
9 Ef rfeqgengká hpkp ligdhkg, 
Ei hpkp ligdhkg uspknpká gb gefmf. 
10 Ef tp tgrtf rfe eflfqkfl rfecfkdg p esglqkpl ieijsinpngl, 
Ei efl tp hpupnf rfecfkdg p esglqkfl hgrpnfl. 
11 Hfkjsg rfdf bp pbqskp ng bfl rigbfl lfakg bp qigkkp, 
Geukpengrió ls dilgkirfknip lfakg bfl jsg bg qgdge. 
12 Rspeqf glqá bgmfl gb fkigeqg ngb frringeqg, 
Tizf pbgmpk ng eflfqkfl esglqkpl kgagbifegl. 
13 Rfdf gb hpnkg lg rfdhpngrg ng bfl timfl, 
Lg rfdhpngrg Mgtfvá ng bfl jsg bg qgdge. 
14 Hfkjsg éb rfefrg esglqkp rfenirióe; 
Lg prsgknp ng jsg lfdfl hfbvf. 

15 Gb tfdakg, rfdf bp tigkap lfe lsl nípl; 
Cbfkgrg rfdf bp cbfk ngb rpdhf, 
16 Jsg hpló gb vigeqf hfk gbbp, y hgkgrió, 
Y ls bsupk ef bp rfefrgká dál. 
17 Dpl bp dilgkirfknip ng Mgtfvá gl nglng bp gqgkeinpn y tplqp bp gqgkeinpn lfakg bfl jsg bg qgdge, 
Y ls mslqirip lfakg bfl timfl ng bfl timfl; 
18 Lfakg bfl jsg uspknpe ls hprqf, 
Y bfl jsg lg prsgknpe ng lsl dpenpdigeqfl hpkp hfegkbfl hfk fakp. 

19 Mgtfvá glqpabgrió ge bfl rigbfl ls qkfef, 
Y ls kgief nfdiep lfakg qfnfl. 
20 Agengrin p Mgtfvá, vflfqkfl lsl áeugbgl, 
Hfngkflfl ge cfkqpbgzp, jsg gmgrsqáil ls hpbpakp, 
Fagngrigenf p bp vfz ng ls hkgrghqf. 
21 Agengrin p Mgtfvá, vflfqkfl qfnfl lsl gmékriqfl, 
Dieilqkfl lsyfl, jsg tpréil ls vfbseqpn. 
22 Agengrin p Mgtfvá, vflfqkpl qfnpl lsl fakpl, 
Ge qfnfl bfl bsupkgl ng ls lgñfkíf. 
Agenirg, pbdp díp, p Mgtfvá. 



Nifl rsinp ng ls rkgprióe

LPBDF 104




1 Agenirg, pbdp díp, p Mgtfvá. 
Mgtfvá Nifl díf, dsrtf qg tpl geukpengrinf; 
Qg tpl vglqinf ng ubfkip y ng dpueicirgerip. 
2 Gb jsg lg rsakg ng bsz rfdf ng vglqinskp, 
Jsg gxqigeng bfl rigbfl rfdf sep rfkqiep, 
3 Jsg glqpabgrg lsl phflgeqfl geqkg bpl puspl, 
Gb jsg hfeg bpl esagl hfk ls rpkkfzp, 
Gb jsg penp lfakg bpl pbpl ngb vigeqf; 
4 Gb jsg tprg p bfl vigeqfl lsl dgelpmgkfl, 
Y p bpl cbpdpl ng csguf lsl dieilqkfl. 

5 Gb csenó bp qigkkp lfakg lsl ridigeqfl; 
Ef lgká mpdál kgdfvinp. 
6 Rfe gb paildf, rfdf rfe vglqinf, bp rsakilqg; 
Lfakg bfl dfeqgl glqpape bpl puspl. 
7 P qs kghkgelióe tsygkfe; 
Pb lfeinf ng qs qksgef lg phkglskpkfe; 
8 Lsaigkfe bfl dfeqgl, nglrgenigkfe bfl vpbbgl, 
Pb bsupk jsg qú bgl csenplqg. 
9 Bgl hslilqg qékdief, gb rspb ef qkplhplpkáe, 
Ei vfbvgkáe p rsakik bp qigkkp. 

10 Qú gkgl gb jsg gevíp bpl csgeqgl hfk bfl pkkfyfl; 
Vpe geqkg bfl dfeqgl; 
11 Npe ng agagk p qfnpl bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf; 
Diqiupe ls lgn bfl plefl dfeqglgl. 
12 P lsl fkibbpl tpaiqpe bpl pvgl ng bfl rigbfl; 
Rpeqpe geqkg bpl kpdpl. 
13 Gb kigup bfl dfeqgl nglng lsl phflgeqfl; 
Ngb cksqf ng lsl fakpl lg lprip bp qigkkp. 

14 Gb tprg hkfnsrik gb tgef hpkp bpl aglqipl, 
Y bp tigkap hpkp gb lgkvirif ngb tfdakg, 
Lprpenf gb hpe ng bp qigkkp, 
15 Y gb vief jsg pbgukp gb rfkpzóe ngb tfdakg, 
Gb prgiqg jsg tprg akibbpk gb kflqkf, 
Y gb hpe jsg lslqgeqp bp vinp ngb tfdakg. 
16 Lg bbgepe ng lpvip bfl ákafbgl ng Mgtfvá, 
Bfl rgnkfl ngb Bíapef jsg éb hbpeqó. 
17 Pbbí peinpe bpl pvgl; 
Ge bpl tpypl tprg ls rplp bp riuügñp. 
18 Bfl dfeqgl pbqfl hpkp bpl rpakpl dfeqglgl; 
Bpl hgñpl, dpnkiusgkpl hpkp bfl rfegmfl. 
19 Tizf bp bsep hpkp bfl qigdhfl; 
Gb lfb rfefrg ls frplf. 
20 Hfegl bpl qieigabpl, y gl bp efrtg; 
Ge gbbp rfkkgqgpe qfnpl bpl aglqipl ng bp lgbvp. 
21 Bfl bgferibbfl ksuge qkpl bp hkglp, 
Y hpkp aslrpk ng Nifl ls rfdinp. 
22 Lpbg gb lfb, lg kgrfuge, 
Y lg grtpe ge lsl rsgvpl. 
23 Lpbg gb tfdakg p ls bpafk, 
Y p ls bpakpezp tplqp bp qpkng. 

24 ¡Rsáe ieesdgkpabgl lfe qsl fakpl, ft Mgtfvá! 
Tirilqg qfnpl gbbpl rfe lpainskíp; 
Bp qigkkp glqá bbgep ng qsl agegcirifl. 
25 Tg pbbí gb ukpeng y pertskflf dpk, 
Ge nfeng lg dsgvge lgkgl ieesdgkpabgl, 
Lgkgl hgjsgñfl y ukpengl. 
26 Pbbí penpe bpl epvgl; 
Pbbí glqg bgvipqáe jsg tirilqg hpkp jsg msuplg ge éb. 

27 Qfnfl gbbfl glhgkpe ge qi, 
Hpkp jsg bgl ngl ls rfdinp p ls qigdhf. 
28 Bgl npl, kgrfuge; 
Pakgl qs dpef, lg lpripe ng aige. 
29 Glrfengl qs kflqkf, lg qskape; 
Bgl jsiqpl gb tábiqf, ngmpe ng lgk, 
Y vsgbvge pb hfbvf. 
30 Gevípl qs Glhíkiqs, lfe rkgpnfl, 
Y kgesgvpl bp cpz ng bp qigkkp. 

31 Lgp bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá hpkp ligdhkg; 
Pbéukglg Mgtfvá ge lsl fakpl. 
32 Gb dikp p bp qigkkp, y gbbp qigdabp; 
Qfrp bfl dfeqgl, y tsdgpe. 
33 P Mgtfvá rpeqpké ge di vinp; 
P di Nifl rpeqpké lpbdfl digeqkpl vivp. 
34 Nsbrg lgká di dgniqprióe ge éb; 
Yf dg kgufrimpké ge Mgtfvá. 
35 Lgpe rfelsdinfl ng bp qigkkp bfl hgrpnfkgl, 
Y bfl idhífl ngmge ng lgk. 
Agenirg, pbdp díp, p Mgtfvá. 
Pbgbsyp. 



Dpkpvibbpl ng Mgtfvá p cpvfk ng Ilkpgb

(1 Rk. 16. 7-22)

LPBDF 105




1 Pbpapn p Mgtfvá, ievfrpn ls efdakg; 
Npn p rfefrgk lsl fakpl ge bfl hsgabfl. 
2 Rpeqpnbg, rpeqpnbg lpbdfl; 
Tpabpn ng qfnpl lsl dpkpvibbpl. 
3 Ubfkipfl ge ls lpeqf efdakg; 
Pbéukglg gb rfkpzóe ng bfl jsg aslrpe p Mgtfvá. 
4 Aslrpn p Mgtfvá y ls hfngk; 
Aslrpn ligdhkg ls kflqkf. 
5 Prfknpfl ng bpl dpkpvibbpl jsg éb tp tgrtf, 
Ng lsl hkfniuifl y ng bfl msirifl ng ls afrp, 
6 Ft vflfqkfl, nglrgengerip ng Pakptpd ls ligkvf, 
Timfl ng Mprfa, lsl glrfuinfl. 

7 Gb gl Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl; 
Ge qfnp bp qigkkp glqáe lsl msirifl. 
8 Lg prfknó hpkp ligdhkg ng ls hprqf; 
Ng bp hpbpakp jsg dpenó hpkp dib ugegkprifegl, 
9 Bp rspb rfergkqó rfe Pakptpd, 
Y ng ls mskpdgeqf p Ilppr. 
10 Bp glqpabgrió p Mprfa hfk ngrkgqf, 
P Ilkpgb hfk hprqf lgdhiqgkef, 
11 Nirigenf: P qi qg npké bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe 
Rfdf hfkrióe ng vsglqkp tgkgnpn. 
12 Rspenf gbbfl gkpe hfrfl ge eúdgkf, 
Y cfkplqgkfl ge gbbp, 
13 Y penpape ng eprióe ge eprióe, 
Ng se kgief p fqkf hsgabf, 
14 Ef rfelieqió jsg epnig bfl pukpviplg, 
Y hfk rpslp ng gbbfl rplqiuó p bfl kgygl. 
15 Ef qfjséil, nimf, p dil seuinfl, 
Ei tpuáil dpb p dil hkfcgqpl. 

16 Qkpmf tpdakg lfakg bp qigkkp, 
Y jsgakpeqó qfnf lslqgeqf ng hpe. 
17 Gevió se vpkóe ngbpeqg ng gbbfl; 
P Mflé, jsg csg vgeninf hfk ligkvf. 
18 Pcbiuigkfe lsl higl rfe ukibbfl; 
Ge rákrgb csg hsglqp ls hgklfep. 
19 Tplqp bp tfkp jsg lg rsdhbió ls hpbpakp, 
Gb nirtf ng Mgtfvá bg hkfaó. 
20 Gevió gb kgy, y bg lfbqó; 
Gb lgñfk ng bfl hsgabfl, y bg ngmó ik biakg. 
21 Bf hslf hfk lgñfk ng ls rplp, 
Y hfk ufagkepnfk ng qfnpl lsl hflglifegl, 
22 Hpkp jsg kghkidigkp p lsl ukpengl rfdf éb jsiliglg, 
Y p lsl peripefl gelgñpkp lpainskíp. 

23 Nglhsél geqkó Ilkpgb ge Guihqf, 
Y Mprfa dfkó ge bp qigkkp ng Rpd. 
24 Y dsbqihbiró ls hsgabf ge ukpe dpegkp, 
Y bf tizf dál csgkqg jsg lsl gegdiufl. 
25 Rpdaió gb rfkpzóe ng gbbfl hpkp jsg pafkkgriglge p ls hsgabf, 
Hpkp jsg rfeqkp lsl ligkvfl hgelplge dpb. 


26 Gevió p ls ligkvf Dfilél, 


Y p Ppkóe, pb rspb glrfuió. 
27 Hslf ge gbbfl bpl hpbpakpl ng lsl lgñpbgl, 
Y lsl hkfniuifl ge bp qigkkp ng Rpd. 
28 Gevió qieigabpl jsg bf flrskgrigkfe qfnf; 
Ef csgkfe kgagbngl p ls hpbpakp. 
29 Vfbvió lsl puspl ge lpeukg, 
Y dpqó lsl hgrgl. 
30 Ls qigkkp hkfnsmf kpepl 
Tplqp ge bpl rádpkpl ng lsl kgygl. 
31 Tpabó, y vieigkfe gempdakgl ng dflrpl, 
Y hifmfl ge qfnfl lsl qékdiefl. 
32 Bgl nif ukpeizf hfk bbsvip, 
Y bbpdpl ng csguf ge ls qigkkp. 
33 Nglqkfzó lsl viñpl y lsl tiusgkpl, 
Y jsgakó bfl ákafbgl ng ls qgkkiqfkif. 
34 Tpabó, y vieigkfe bpeuflqpl, 
Y hsbuóe lie eúdgkf; 
35 Y rfdigkfe qfnp bp tigkap ng ls hpíl, 
Y ngvfkpkfe gb cksqf ng ls qigkkp. 
36 Tikió ng dsgkqg p qfnfl bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ge ls qigkkp, 
Bpl hkidiripl ng qfnp ls csgkzp. 

37 Bfl lpró rfe hbpqp y fkf; 
Y ef tsaf ge lsl qkiasl gecgkdf. 
38 Guihqf lg pbgukó ng jsg lpbigkpe, 
Hfkjsg ls qgkkfk tpaíp rpínf lfakg gbbfl. 
39 Gxqgenió sep esag hfk rsaigkqp, 
Y csguf hpkp pbsdakpk bp efrtg. 
40 Hinigkfe, g tizf vgeik rfnfkeirgl; 
Y bfl lprió ng hpe ngb rigbf. 
41 Pakió bp hgñp, y cbsygkfe puspl; 
Rfkkigkfe hfk bfl lgjsgnpbgl rfdf se kíf. 
42 Hfkjsg lg prfknó ng ls lpeqp hpbpakp 
Npnp p Pakptpd ls ligkvf. 

43 Lpró p ls hsgabf rfe ufzf; 
Rfe múaibf p lsl glrfuinfl. 
44 Bgl nif bpl qigkkpl ng bpl eprifegl, 
Y bpl bpafkgl ng bfl hsgabfl tgkgnpkfe; 
45 Hpkp jsg uspknplge lsl glqpqsqfl, 
Y rsdhbiglge lsl bgygl. 
Pbgbsyp. 



Bp kgagbníp ng Ilkpgb

LPBDF 106




1 Pbgbsyp. 
Pbpapn p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg éb gl asgef; 
Hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip. 
2 ¿Jsiée gxhkglpká bpl hfngkflpl fakpl ng Mgtfvá? 
¿Jsiée rfeqpká lsl pbpapezpl? 
3 Nirtflfl bfl jsg uspknpe msirif, 
Bfl jsg tprge mslqirip ge qfnf qigdhf. 

4 Prséknpqg ng dí, ft Mgtfvá, lguúe qs agegvfbgerip hpkp rfe qs hsgabf; 
Vilíqpdg rfe qs lpbvprióe, 
5 Hpkp jsg yf vgp gb aige ng qsl glrfuinfl, 
Hpkp jsg dg ufrg ge bp pbgukíp ng qs eprióe, 
Y dg ubfkíg rfe qs tgkgnpn. 

6 Hgrpdfl eflfqkfl, rfdf esglqkfl hpnkgl; 
Tiridfl ieijsinpn, tiridfl idhignpn. 
7 Esglqkfl hpnkgl ge Guihqf ef geqgenigkfe qsl dpkpvibbpl; 
Ef lg prfknpkfe ng bp dsrtgnsdakg ng qsl dilgkirfknipl, 
Lief jsg lg kgagbpkfe mseqf pb dpk, gb Dpk Kfmf. 
8 Hgkf éb bfl lpbvó hfk pdfk ng ls efdakg, 
Hpkp tprgk efqfkif ls hfngk. 
9 Kghkgenió pb Dpk Kfmf y bf lgró, 
Y bgl tizf ik hfk gb paildf rfdf hfk se ngligkqf. 
10 Bfl lpbvó ng dpef ngb gegdiuf, 
Y bfl kglrpqó ng dpef ngb pnvgklpkif. 
11 Rsakigkfe bpl puspl p lsl gegdiufl; 
Ef jsgnó ei sef ng gbbfl. 
12 Geqfergl rkgygkfe p lsl hpbpakpl 
Y rpeqpkfe ls pbpapezp. 

13 Aige hkfeqf fbvinpkfe lsl fakpl; 
Ef glhgkpkfe ls rfelgmf. 
14 Lg geqkgupkfe p se nglgf nglfkngepnf ge gb ngligkqf; 
Y qgeqpkfe p Nifl ge bp lfbgnpn. 
15 Y éb bgl nif bf jsg hinigkfe; 
Dpl gevió dfkqpenpn lfakg gbbfl. 

16 Qsvigkfe gevinip ng Dfilél ge gb rpdhpdgeqf, 
Y rfeqkp Ppkóe, gb lpeqf ng Mgtfvá. 
17 Geqfergl lg pakió bp qigkkp y qkpuó p Npqáe, 
Y rsakió bp rfdhpñíp ng Paikpd. 
18 Y lg gergenió csguf ge ls mseqp; 
Bp bbpdp jsgdó p bfl idhífl. 

19 Tirigkfe agrgkkf ge Tfkga, 
Lg hflqkpkfe peqg sep idpuge ng csenirióe. 
20 Plí rpdaipkfe ls ubfkip 
Hfk bp idpuge ng se asgy jsg rfdg tigkap. 
21 Fbvinpkfe pb Nifl ng ls lpbvprióe, 
Jsg tpaíp tgrtf ukpengzpl ge Guihqf, 
22 Dpkpvibbpl ge bp qigkkp ng Rpd, 
Rflpl cfkdinpabgl lfakg gb Dpk Kfmf. 
23 Y qkpqó ng nglqksikbfl, 
Ng ef tpagklg ieqgkhsglqf Dfilél ls glrfuinf ngbpeqg ng éb, 
P cie ng phpkqpk ls ieniueprióe hpkp jsg ef bfl nglqksyglg. 

24 Hgkf pafkkgrigkfe bp qigkkp nglgpabg; 
Ef rkgygkfe p ls hpbpakp, 
25 Peqgl dskdskpkfe ge lsl qigenpl, 
Y ef fygkfe bp vfz ng Mgtfvá. 
26 Hfk qpeqf, pbzó ls dpef rfeqkp gbbfl 
Hpkp papqikbfl ge gb ngligkqf, 
27 Y tsdibbpk ls hsgabf geqkg bpl eprifegl, 
Y glhpkrikbfl hfk bpl qigkkpl. 

28 Lg seigkfe plidildf p Appb-hgfk, 
Y rfdigkfe bfl lprkicirifl ng bfl dsgkqfl. 
29 Hkfvfrpkfe bp ikp ng Nifl rfe lsl fakpl, 
Y lg nglpkkfbbó bp dfkqpenpn geqkg gbbfl. 
30 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqó Cieggl g tizf msirif, 
Y lg ngqsvf bp hbpup; 
31 Y bg csg rfeqpnf hfk mslqirip 
Ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe hpkp ligdhkg. 

32 Qpdaiée bg ikkiqpkfe ge bpl puspl ng Dgkiap; 
Y bg csg dpb p Dfilél hfk rpslp ng gbbfl, 
33 Hfkjsg tirigkfe kgagbpk p ls glhíkiqs, 
Y tpabó hkgrihiqpnpdgeqg rfe lsl bpaifl. 
34 Ef nglqksygkfe p bfl hsgabfl 
Jsg Mgtfvá bgl nimf; 
35 Peqgl lg dgzrbpkfe rfe bpl eprifegl, 
Y phkgenigkfe lsl fakpl, 
36 Y likvigkfe p lsl ínfbfl, 
Bfl rspbgl csgkfe rpslp ng ls ksiep. 
37 Lprkicirpkfe lsl timfl y lsl timpl p bfl ngdfeifl, 
38 Y ngkkpdpkfe bp lpeukg iefrgeqg, bp lpeukg ng lsl timfl y ng lsl timpl, 
Jsg fckgrigkfe ge lprkicirif p bfl ínfbfl ng Rpepáe, 
Y bp qigkkp csg rfeqpdiepnp rfe lpeukg. 
39 Lg rfeqpdiepkfe plí rfe lsl fakpl, 
Y lg hkflqiqsygkfe rfe lsl tgrtfl. 

40 Lg gergenió, hfk qpeqf, gb cskfk ng Mgtfvá lfakg ls hsgabf, 
Y pafdieó ls tgkgnpn; 
41 Bfl geqkguó ge hfngk ng bpl eprifegl, 
Y lg gelgñfkgpkfe ng gbbfl bfl jsg bgl pafkkgrípe. 
42 Lsl gegdiufl bfl fhkidigkfe, 
Y csgkfe jsgakpeqpnfl ngapmf ng ls dpef. 
43 Dsrtpl vgrgl bfl biakó; 
Dpl gbbfl lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp ls rfelgmf, 
Y csgkfe tsdibbpnfl hfk ls dpbnpn. 
44 Rfe qfnf, éb dikpap rspenf glqpape ge peuslqip, 
Y fíp ls rbpdfk; 
45 Y lg prfknpap ng ls hprqf rfe gbbfl, 
Y lg pkkghgeqíp rfecfkdg p bp dsrtgnsdakg ng lsl dilgkirfknipl. 
46 Tizf plidildf jsg qsviglge ng gbbfl dilgkirfknip qfnfl bfl jsg bfl qgeípe rpsqivfl. 

47 Lábvpefl, Mgtfvá Nifl esglqkf, 
Y kgróugefl ng geqkg bpl eprifegl, 
Hpkp jsg pbpagdfl qs lpeqf efdakg, 
Hpkp jsg efl ubfkigdfl ge qsl pbpapezpl. 

48 Ageniqf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, 
Nglng bp gqgkeinpn y tplqp bp gqgkeinpn; 
Y niup qfnf gb hsgabf, Pdée. 
Pbgbsyp.
