LPBDFL

BIAKF V

Nifl biakp ng bp pcbirrióe

LPBDF 107




1 Pbpapn p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg éb gl asgef; 
Hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip. 
2 Níupebf bfl kgnidinfl ng Mgtfvá, 
Bfl jsg tp kgnidinf ngb hfngk ngb gegdiuf, 
3 Y bfl tp rfeukgupnf ng bpl qigkkpl, 
Ngb fkigeqg y ngb frringeqg, 
Ngb efkqg y ngb lsk. 

4 Pensvigkfe hgkninfl hfk gb ngligkqf, hfk bp lfbgnpn lie rpdief, 
Lie tpbbpk risnpn ge nfeng vivik. 
5 Tpdakigeqfl y lgnigeqfl, 
Ls pbdp nglcpbbgríp ge gbbfl. 
6 Geqfergl rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá ge ls peuslqip, 
Y bfl biakó ng lsl pcbirrifegl. 
7 Bfl nikiuió hfk rpdief ngkgrtf, 
Hpkp jsg vieiglge p risnpn tpaiqpabg. 
8 Pbpage bp dilgkirfknip ng Mgtfvá, 
Y lsl dpkpvibbpl hpkp rfe bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 
9 Hfkjsg lprip pb pbdp dgeglqgkflp, 
Y bbgep ng aige pb pbdp tpdakigeqp. 

10 Pbusefl dfkpape ge qieigabpl y lfdakp ng dsgkqg, 
Phkilifepnfl ge pcbirrióe y ge tigkkfl, 
11 Hfk rspeqf csgkfe kgagbngl p bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá, 
Y pafkkgrigkfe gb rfelgmf ngb Pbqílidf. 
12 Hfk glf jsgakpeqó rfe gb qkpapmf lsl rfkpzfegl; 
Rpygkfe, y ef tsaf jsige bfl pysnplg. 
13 Bsguf jsg rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá ge ls peuslqip, 
Bfl biakó ng lsl pcbirrifegl; 
14 Bfl lpró ng bpl qieigabpl y ng bp lfdakp ng dsgkqg, 
Y kfdhió lsl hkilifegl. 
15 Pbpage bp dilgkirfknip ng Mgtfvá, 
Y lsl dpkpvibbpl hpkp rfe bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 
16 Hfkjsg jsgakpeqó bpl hsgkqpl ng akferg, 
Y ngldgeszó bfl rgkkfmfl ng tigkkf. 
17 Csgkfe pcbiuinfl bfl ielgelpqfl, p rpslp ngb rpdief ng ls kgagbióe 
Y p rpslp ng lsl dpbnpngl; 
18 Ls pbdp pafdieó qfnf pbidgeqf, 
Y bbgupkfe tplqp bpl hsgkqpl ng bp dsgkqg. 
19 Hgkf rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá ge ls peuslqip, 
Y bfl biakó ng lsl pcbirrifegl. 
20 Gevió ls hpbpakp, y bfl lpeó, 
Y bfl biakó ng ls ksiep. 
21 Pbpage bp dilgkirfknip ng Mgtfvá, 
Y lsl dpkpvibbpl hpkp rfe bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl; 
22 Fckgzrpe lprkicirifl ng pbpapezp, 
Y hsabijsge lsl fakpl rfe múaibf. 

23 Bfl jsg nglrigenge pb dpk ge epvgl, 
Y tprge egufrif ge bpl dsrtpl puspl, 
24 Gbbfl tpe vilqf bpl fakpl ng Mgtfvá, 
Y lsl dpkpvibbpl ge bpl hkfcseninpngl. 
25 Hfkjsg tpabó, g tizf bgvpeqpk se vigeqf qgdhglqsflf, 
Jsg gerkglhp lsl fenpl. 
26 Lsage p bfl rigbfl, nglrigenge p bfl paildfl; 
Lsl pbdpl lg ngkkiqge rfe gb dpb. 
27 Qigdabpe y qiqsagpe rfdf gakifl, 
Y qfnp ls rigerip gl ieúqib. 
28 Geqfergl rbpdpe p Mgtfvá ge ls peuslqip, 
Y bfl biakp ng lsl pcbirrifegl. 
29 Rpdaip bp qgdhglqpn ge lfliguf, 
Y lg phpriuspe lsl fenpl. 
30 Bsguf lg pbgukpe, hfkjsg lg phpriuspkfe; 
Y plí bfl usíp pb hsgkqf jsg nglgpape. 
31 Pbpage bp dilgkirfknip ng Mgtfvá, 
Y lsl dpkpvibbpl hpkp rfe bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 
32 Gxábqgebf ge bp rfeukguprióe ngb hsgabf, 
Y ge bp kgseióe ng peripefl bf pbpage. 

33 Gb rfevigkqg bfl kífl ge ngligkqf, 
Y bfl dpepeqipbgl ng bpl puspl ge lgjsgnpbgl; 
34 Bp qigkkp cksrqícgkp ge glqékib, 
Hfk bp dpbnpn ng bfl jsg bp tpaiqpe. 
35 Vsgbvg gb ngligkqf ge glqpejsgl ng puspl, 
Y bp qigkkp lgrp ge dpepeqipbgl. 
36 Pbbí glqpabgrg p bfl tpdakigeqfl, 
Y csenpe risnpn ge nfeng vivik. 
37 Ligdakpe rpdhfl, y hbpeqpe viñpl, 
Y kienge pasenpeqg cksqf. 
38 Bfl agenirg, y lg dsbqihbirpe ge ukpe dpegkp; 
Y ef nildiesyg ls upepnf. 

39 Bsguf lfe dgeflrpapnfl y papqinfl 
P rpslp ng qikpeíp, ng dpbgl y rfeufmpl. 
40 Gb glhpkrg dgeflhkgrif lfakg bfl hkíerihgl, 
Y bgl tprg penpk hgkninfl, vpupasenfl y lie rpdief. 
41 Bgvpeqp ng bp dilgkip pb hfakg, 
Y tprg dsbqihbirpk bpl cpdibipl rfdf kgapñfl ng fvgmpl. 
42 Vépebf bfl kgrqfl, y pbéukgelg, 
Y qfnfl bfl dpbfl rigkkge ls afrp. 
43 ¿Jsiée gl lpaif y uspknpká glqpl rflpl, 
Y geqgengká bpl dilgkirfknipl ng Mgtfvá? 



Hgqirióe ng pysnp rfeqkp gb gegdiuf

(Lpb. 57. 7-11; 60. 5-12)

Ráeqirf. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 108




1 Di rfkpzóe glqá nilhsglqf, ft Nifl; 
Rpeqpké y geqfepké lpbdfl; glqp gl di ubfkip. 
2 Nglhiékqpqg, lpbqgkif y pkhp; 
Nglhgkqpké pb pbap. 
3 Qg pbpapké, ft Mgtfvá, geqkg bfl hsgabfl; 
P qi rpeqpké lpbdfl geqkg bpl eprifegl. 
4 Hfkjsg dál ukpeng jsg bfl rigbfl gl qs dilgkirfknip, 
Y tplqp bfl rigbfl qs vgknpn. 

5 Gxpbqpnf lgpl lfakg bfl rigbfl, ft Nifl, 
Y lfakg qfnp bp qigkkp lgp gepbqgrinp qs ubfkip. 
6 Hpkp jsg lgpe biakpnfl qsl pdpnfl, 
Lpbvp rfe qs niglqkp y kglhóengdg. 

7 Nifl tp nirtf ge ls lpeqspkif: Yf dg pbgukpké; 
Kghpkqiké p Lijsgd, y dgniké gb vpbbg ng Lsrfq. 
8 Díf gl Upbppn, díf gl Dpeplél, 
Y Gckpíe gl bp cfkqpbgzp ng di rpagzp; 
Msná gl di bguilbpnfk. 
9 Dfpa, bp vplimp hpkp bpvpkdg; 
Lfakg Gnfd grtpké di rpbzpnf; 
Dg kgufrimpké lfakg Cibilqgp. 

10 ¿Jsiée dg usipká p bp risnpn cfkqicirpnp? 
¿Jsiée dg usipká tplqp Gnfd? 
11 ¿Ef lgkál qú, ft Nifl, jsg efl tpaípl nglgrtpnf, 
Y ef lpbípl, ft Nifl, rfe esglqkfl gmékriqfl? 
12 Npefl lfrfkkf rfeqkp gb pnvgklpkif, 
Hfkjsg vpep gl bp pysnp ngb tfdakg. 
13 Ge Nifl tpkgdfl hkfgzpl, 
Y éb tfbbpká p esglqkfl gegdiufl. 



Rbpdfk ng vgeupezp

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 109




1 Ft Nifl ng di pbpapezp, ef rpbbgl; 
2 Hfkjsg afrp ng idhíf y afrp ng geupñpnfk lg tpe paigkqf rfeqkp dí; 
Tpe tpabpnf ng dí rfe bgeusp dgeqikflp; 
3 Rfe hpbpakpl ng fnif dg tpe kfngpnf, 
Y hgbgpkfe rfeqkp dí lie rpslp. 
4 Ge hpuf ng di pdfk dg tpe linf pnvgklpkifl; 
Dpl yf fkpap. 
5 Dg ngvsgbvge dpb hfk aige, 
Y fnif hfk pdfk. 

6 Hfe lfakg éb pb idhíf, 
Y Lpqpeál glqé p ls niglqkp. 
7 Rspenf csgkg mszupnf, lpbup rsbhpabg; 
Y ls fkprióe lgp hpkp hgrpnf. 
8 Lgpe lsl nípl hfrfl; 
Qfdg fqkf ls fcirif. 
9 Lgpe lsl timfl tsékcpefl, 
Y ls dsmgk visnp. 
10 Penge lsl timfl vpupasenfl, y dgeniusge; 
Y hkfrskge ls hpe bgmfl ng lsl nglfbpnfl tfupkgl. 
11 Jsg gb prkggnfk lg phfngkg ng qfnf bf jsg qigeg, 
Y gxqkpñfl lpjsgge ls qkpapmf. 
12 Ef qgeup jsige bg tpup dilgkirfknip, 
Ei tpyp jsige qgeup rfdhplióe ng lsl tsékcpefl. 
13 Ls hflqgkinpn lgp nglqksinp; 
Ge bp lgusenp ugegkprióe lgp afkkpnf ls efdakg. 
14 Vgeup ge dgdfkip peqg Mgtfvá bp dpbnpn ng lsl hpnkgl, 
Y gb hgrpnf ng ls dpnkg ef lgp afkkpnf. 
15 Glqée ligdhkg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, 
Y éb rfkqg ng bp qigkkp ls dgdfkip, 
16 Hfk rspeqf ef lg prfknó ng tprgk dilgkirfknip, 
Y hgkliusió pb tfdakg pcbiuinf y dgeglqgkflf, 
Pb jsgakpeqpnf ng rfkpzóe, hpkp npkbg dsgkqg. 
17 Pdó bp dpbnirióe, y élqp bg lfakgvief; 
Y ef jsilf bp agenirióe, y gbbp lg pbgmó ng éb. 
18 Lg vilqió ng dpbnirióe rfdf ng ls vglqinf, 
Y geqkó rfdf pusp ge lsl geqkpñpl, 
Y rfdf prgiqg ge lsl tsglfl. 
19 Lépbg rfdf vglqinf rfe jsg lg rsakp, 
Y ge bsupk ng rieqf rfe jsg lg riñp ligdhkg. 

20 Lgp glqg gb hpuf ng hpkqg ng Mgtfvá p bfl jsg dg rpbsdeipe, 
Y p bfl jsg tpabpe dpb rfeqkp di pbdp. 
21 Y qú, Mgtfvá, Lgñfk díf, cpvfkérgdg hfk pdfk ng qs efdakg; 
Bíakpdg, hfkjsg qs dilgkirfknip gl asgep. 
22 Hfkjsg yf glqfy pcbiuinf y egrgliqpnf, 
Y di rfkpzóe glqá tgkinf ngeqkf ng dí. 
23 Dg vfy rfdf bp lfdakp rspenf ngrbiep; 
Lfy lprsninf rfdf bpeuflqp. 
24 Dil kfnibbpl glqáe ngaibiqpnpl p rpslp ngb pysef, 
Y di rpkeg nglcpbbgrg hfk cpbqp ng ufknskp. 
25 Yf tg linf hpkp gbbfl famgqf ng fhkfaif; 
Dg dikpape, y askbáenflg dgegpape ls rpagzp. 

26 Pyúnpdg, Mgtfvá Nifl díf; 
Lábvpdg rfecfkdg p qs dilgkirfknip. 
27 Y geqigenpe jsg glqp gl qs dpef; 
Jsg qú, Mgtfvá, tpl tgrtf glqf. 
28 Dpbniupe gbbfl, hgkf agenirg qú; 
Bgváeqgelg, dpl lgpe pvgkufezpnfl, y kgufrímglg qs ligkvf. 
29 Lgpe vglqinfl ng iuefdieip bfl jsg dg rpbsdeipe; 
Lgpe rsaigkqfl ng rfecslióe rfdf rfe dpeqf. 

30 Yf pbpapké p Mgtfvá ge ukpe dpegkp rfe di afrp, 
Y ge dgnif ng dsrtfl bg pbpapké. 
31 Hfkjsg éb lg hfenká p bp niglqkp ngb hfakg, 
Hpkp biakpk ls pbdp ng bfl jsg bg mszupe. 



Mgtfvá np nfdieif pb kgy

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 110




1 Mgtfvá nimf p di Lgñfk: 
Liéeqpqg p di niglqkp, 
Tplqp jsg hfeup p qsl gegdiufl hfk glqkpnf ng qsl higl. 

2 Mgtfvá gevipká nglng Life bp vpkp ng qs hfngk; 
Nfdiep ge dgnif ng qsl gegdiufl. 
3 Qs hsgabf lg qg fckgrgká vfbseqpkipdgeqg ge gb níp ng qs hfngk, 
Ge bp tgkdflskp ng bp lpeqinpn. 
Nglng gb lgef ng bp pskfkp 
Qigegl qú gb kfríf ng qs msvgeqsn. 
4 Mskó Mgtfvá, y ef lg pkkghgeqiká: 
Qú gkgl lprgknfqg hpkp ligdhkg 
Lguúe gb fknge ng Dgbjsilgngr. 

5 Gb Lgñfk glqá p qs niglqkp; 
Jsgakpeqpká p bfl kgygl ge gb níp ng ls ikp. 
6 Mszupká geqkg bpl eprifegl, 
Bpl bbgepká ng rpnávgkgl; 
Jsgakpeqpká bpl rpagzpl ge dsrtpl qigkkpl. 
7 Ngb pkkfyf agagká ge gb rpdief, 
Hfk bf rspb bgvpeqpká bp rpagzp. 



Nifl rsinp ng ls hsgabf

Pbgbsyp.

LPBDF 111




1 Pbpapké p Mgtfvá rfe qfnf gb rfkpzóe 
Ge bp rfdhpñíp y rfeukguprióe ng bfl kgrqfl.

Aslrpnpl ng qfnfl bfl jsg bpl jsigkge. 
3 Ubfkip y tgkdflskp gl ls fakp, 
Y ls mslqirip hgkdpegrg hpkp ligdhkg.

Rbgdgeqg y dilgkirfkniflf gl Mgtfvá.

Hpkp ligdhkg lg prfknpká ng ls hprqf.

Cigbgl lfe qfnfl lsl dpenpdigeqfl,

Tgrtfl ge vgknpn y ge kgrqiqsn.

Hpkp ligdhkg tp fkngepnf ls hprqf;

LPBDF 112




1 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb tfdakg jsg qgdg p Mgtfvá,

LPBDF 114

LPBDF 115




1 Ef p eflfqkfl, ft Mgtfvá, ef p eflfqkfl,

Hfk qs dilgkirfknip, hfk qs vgknpn.

¿Nóeng glqá ptfkp ls Nifl?

Qfnf bf jsg jsilf tp tgrtf.

Fakp ng dpefl ng tfdakgl.

Qigege fmfl, dpl ef vge; 
6 Fkgmpl qigege, dpl ef fyge; 
Qigege epkirgl, dpl ef tsgbge;

Ef tpabpe rfe ls upkupeqp.

Agengriká p bp rplp ng Ppkóe.

Prrióe ng ukpripl hfk tpagk linf biakpnf ng bp dsgkqg

LPBDF 116




1 Pdf p Mgtfvá, hsgl tp fínf 
Di vfz y dil lúhbirpl; 
2 Hfkjsg tp ierbiepnf p dí ls fínf; 
Hfk qpeqf, bg ievfrpké ge qfnfl dil nípl. 
3 Dg kfngpkfe biupnskpl ng dsgkqg, 
Dg gerfeqkpkfe bpl peuslqipl ngb Lgfb; 
Peuslqip y nfbfk tpaíp yf tpbbpnf. 
4 Geqfergl ievfjsé gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 
Ft Mgtfvá, biakp ptfkp di pbdp. 

5 Rbgdgeqg gl Mgtfvá, y mslqf; 
Lí, dilgkirfkniflf gl esglqkf Nifl. 
6 Mgtfvá uspknp p bfl lgeribbfl; 
Glqpap yf hflqkpnf, y dg lpbvó.

Hfkjsg Mgtfvá qg tp tgrtf aige.

Dil fmfl ng báukidpl, 
Y dil higl ng kglapbpk. 
9 Penpké ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá 
Ge bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl. 
10 Rkgí; hfk qpeqf tpabé, 
Glqpenf pcbiuinf ge ukpe dpegkp.

Qfnf tfdakg gl dgeqikflf.

Hfk qfnfl lsl agegcirifl hpkp rfediuf?

G ievfrpké gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá.

Ngbpeqg ng qfnf ls hsgabf.

Bp dsgkqg ng lsl lpeqfl.

Qú tpl kfqf dil hkilifegl.

Ngbpeqg ng qfnf ls hsgabf,

LPBDF 118




1 Pbpapn p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg éb gl asgef; 
Hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip. 

2 Niup ptfkp Ilkpgb, 
Jsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip. 
3 Niup ptfkp bp rplp ng Ppkóe, 
Jsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip. 
4 Niupe ptfkp bfl jsg qgdge p Mgtfvá, 
Jsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip. 

5 Nglng bp peuslqip ievfjsé p MPT, 
Y dg kglhfenió MPT, hfeiéenfdg ge bsupk glhpriflf. 
6 Mgtfvá glqá rfediuf; ef qgdgké 
Bf jsg dg hsgnp tprgk gb tfdakg. 
7 Mgtfvá glqá rfediuf geqkg bfl jsg dg pysnpe; 
Hfk qpeqf, yf vgké di nglgf ge bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge. 
8 Dgmfk gl rfecipk ge Mgtfvá 
Jsg rfecipk ge gb tfdakg. 
9 Dgmfk gl rfecipk ge Mgtfvá 
Jsg rfecipk ge hkíerihgl. 

10 Qfnpl bpl eprifegl dg kfngpkfe; 
Dpl ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá yf bpl nglqksiké. 
11 Dg kfngpkfe y dg plgnipkfe; 
Dpl ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá yf bpl nglqksiké. 
12 Dg kfngpkfe rfdf pagmpl; lg gepkngrigkfe rfdf csguf ng glhiefl; 
Dpl ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá yf bpl nglqksiké. 
13 Dg gdhsmplqg rfe vifbgerip hpkp jsg rpyglg, 
Hgkf dg pysnó Mgtfvá. 
14 Di cfkqpbgzp y di ráeqirf gl MPT, 
Y éb dg tp linf hfk lpbvprióe. 

15 Vfz ng múaibf y ng lpbvprióe tpy ge bpl qigenpl ng bfl mslqfl; 
Bp niglqkp ng Mgtfvá tprg hkfgzpl. 
16 Bp niglqkp ng Mgtfvá gl lsabidg; 
Bp niglqkp ng Mgtfvá tprg vpbgeqípl. 
17 Ef dfkiké, lief jsg viviké, 
Y rfeqpké bpl fakpl ng MPT. 
18 Dg rplqiuó ukpvgdgeqg MPT, 
Dpl ef dg geqkguó p bp dsgkqg. 

19 Pakindg bpl hsgkqpl ng bp mslqirip; 
Geqkpké hfk gbbpl, pbpapké p MPT. 
20 Glqp gl hsgkqp ng Mgtfvá; 
Hfk gbbp geqkpkáe bfl mslqfl. 

21 Qg pbpapké hfkjsg dg tpl fínf, 
Y dg csilqg hfk lpbvprióe. 
22 Bp hignkp jsg nglgrtpkfe bfl gnicirpnfkgl 
Tp vgeinf p lgk rpagzp ngb áeusbf. 
23 Ng hpkqg ng Mgtfvá gl glqf, 
Y gl rflp dpkpvibbflp p esglqkfl fmfl. 
24 Glqg gl gb níp jsg tizf Mgtfvá; 
Efl ufzpkgdfl y pbgukpkgdfl ge éb. 
25 Ft Mgtfvá, lábvpefl ptfkp, qg ksguf; 
Qg ksguf, ft Mgtfvá, jsg efl tpupl hkflhgkpk ptfkp. 
26 Ageniqf gb jsg vigeg ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá; 
Nglng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá fl agengridfl. 
27 Mgtfvá gl Nifl, y efl tp npnf bsz; 
Pqpn vírqidpl rfe rsgknpl p bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk. 

28 Di Nifl gkgl qú, y qg pbpapké; 
Nifl díf, qg gxpbqpké. 

29 Pbpapn p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg éb gl asgef; 
Hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip. 



Gxrgbgeripl ng bp bgy ng Nifl

LPBDF 119




1 Aigepvgeqskpnfl bfl hgkcgrqfl ng rpdief, 
Bfl jsg penpe ge bp bgy ng Mgtfvá. 
2 Aigepvgeqskpnfl bfl jsg uspknpe lsl qglqidfeifl, 
Y rfe qfnf gb rfkpzóe bg aslrpe; 
3 Hsgl ef tprge ieijsinpn 
Bfl jsg penpe ge lsl rpdiefl. 
4 Qú gerpkuplqg 
Jsg lgpe dsy uspknpnfl qsl dpenpdigeqfl. 
5 ¡Fmpbá csglge fkngepnfl dil rpdiefl 
Hpkp uspknpk qsl glqpqsqfl! 
6 Geqfergl ef lgkíp yf pvgkufezpnf, 
Rspenf pqgeniglg p qfnfl qsl dpenpdigeqfl. 
7 Qg pbpapké rfe kgrqiqsn ng rfkpzóe 
Rspenf phkgenigkg qsl mslqfl msirifl. 
8 Qsl glqpqsqfl uspknpké; 
Ef dg ngmgl geqgkpdgeqg. 



Agq




9 ¿Rfe jsé bidhipká gb mfvge ls rpdief? 
Rfe uspknpk qs hpbpakp. 
10 Rfe qfnf di rfkpzóe qg tg aslrpnf; 
Ef dg ngmgl nglvipkdg ng qsl dpenpdigeqfl. 
11 Ge di rfkpzóe tg uspknpnf qsl nirtfl, 
Hpkp ef hgrpk rfeqkp qi. 
12 Ageniqf qú, ft Mgtfvá; 
Geléñpdg qsl glqpqsqfl. 
13 Rfe dil bpaifl tg rfeqpnf 
Qfnfl bfl msirifl ng qs afrp.

Dál jsg ng qfnp kijsgzp.

Rfelingkpké qsl rpdiefl. 
16 Dg kgufrimpké ge qsl glqpqsqfl; 
Ef dg fbvinpké ng qsl hpbpakpl. 



Usídgb




17 Tpz aige p qs ligkvf; jsg vivp, 
Y uspkng qs hpbpakp. 
18 Pakg dil fmfl, y dikpké 
Bpl dpkpvibbpl ng qs bgy. 
19 Cfkplqgkf lfy yf ge bp qigkkp; 
Ef gersakpl ng dí qsl dpenpdigeqfl.

Qsl msirifl ge qfnf qigdhf. 
21 Kghkgenilqg p bfl lfagkaifl, bfl dpbniqfl, 
Jsg lg nglvípe ng qsl dpenpdigeqfl. 
22 Phpkqp ng dí gb fhkfaif y gb dgeflhkgrif, 
Hfkjsg qsl qglqidfeifl tg uspknpnf. 
23 Hkíerihgl qpdaiée lg lgeqpkfe y tpabpkfe rfeqkp dí; 
Dpl qs ligkvf dgniqpap ge qsl glqpqsqfl,

Y dil rfelgmgkfl. 



Nábgq




25 Papqinp tplqp gb hfbvf glqá di pbdp; 
Vivicírpdg lguúe qs hpbpakp.

Geléñpdg qsl glqpqsqfl.

Hpkp jsg dgniqg ge qsl dpkpvibbpl. 
28 Lg ngltprg di pbdp ng pelignpn; 
Lslqéeqpdg lguúe qs hpbpakp. 
29 Phpkqp ng dí gb rpdief ng bp dgeqikp, 
Y ge qs dilgkirfknip rferéngdg qs bgy. 
30 Glrfuí gb rpdief ng bp vgknpn; 
Tg hsglqf qsl msirifl ngbpeqg ng dí. 
31 Dg tg phgupnf p qsl qglqidfeifl; 
Ft Mgtfvá, ef dg pvgkuügergl. 
32 Hfk gb rpdief ng qsl dpenpdigeqfl rfkkgké, 
Rspenf gelpertgl di rfkpzóe. 



Tg




33 Geléñpdg, ft Mgtfvá, gb rpdief ng qsl glqpqsqfl, 
Y bf uspknpké tplqp gb cie. 
34 Npdg geqgenidigeqf, y uspknpké qs bgy, 
Y bp rsdhbiké ng qfnf rfkpzóe. 
35 Usípdg hfk bp lgenp ng qsl dpenpdigeqfl, 
Hfkjsg ge gbbp qgeuf di vfbseqpn. 
36 Ierbiep di rfkpzóe p qsl qglqidfeifl, 
Y ef p bp pvpkirip. 
37 Phpkqp dil fmfl, jsg ef vgpe bp vpeinpn; 
Pvívpdg ge qs rpdief. 
38 Rfecikdp qs hpbpakp p qs ligkvf, 
Jsg qg qgdg. 
39 Jsiqp ng dí gb fhkfaif jsg tg qgdinf, 
Hfkjsg asgefl lfe qsl msirifl. 
40 Tg pjsí yf tg petgbpnf qsl dpenpdigeqfl; 
Vivicírpdg ge qs mslqirip. 



Vps

LPBDF 125




1 Bfl jsg rfecípe ge Mgtfvá lfe rfdf gb dfeqg ng Life,

Nglng ptfkp y hpkp ligdhkg. 
3 Hfkjsg ef kghflpká bp vpkp ng bp idhignpn lfakg bp tgkgnpn ng bfl mslqfl; 
Ef lgp jsg gxqigenpe bfl mslqfl lsl dpefl p bp ieijsinpn. 
4 Tpz aige, ft Mgtfvá, p bfl asgefl, 
Y p bfl jsg lfe kgrqfl ge ls rfkpzóe. 
5 Dpl p bfl jsg lg phpkqpe qkpl lsl hgkvgklinpngl, 
Mgtfvá bfl bbgvpká rfe bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn; 
Hpz lgp lfakg Ilkpgb.

LPBDF 126

LPBDF 132

LPBDF 135




1 Pbpapn gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá; 
Pbpapnbg, ligkvfl ng Mgtfvá; 
2 Bfl jsg glqáil ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, 
Ge bfl pqkifl ng bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl.

Rpeqpn lpbdfl p ls efdakg, hfkjsg éb gl ageiuef. 
4 Hfkjsg MPT tp glrfuinf p Mprfa hpkp lí, 
P Ilkpgb hfk hflglióe lsyp.

Y gb Lgñfk esglqkf, dpyfk jsg qfnfl bfl niflgl.

Ge bfl rigbfl y ge bp qigkkp, ge bfl dpkgl y ge qfnfl bfl paildfl.

Tprg bfl kgbádhpufl hpkp bp bbsvip; 
Lprp ng lsl nghóliqfl bfl vigeqfl.

Nglng gb tfdakg tplqp bp aglqip.

Rfeqkp Cpkpóe, y rfeqkp qfnfl lsl ligkvfl.

Y dpqó p kgygl hfngkflfl;

P Fu kgy ng Apláe, 
Y p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng Rpepáe. 
12 Y nif bp qigkkp ng gbbfl ge tgkgnpn, 
Ge tgkgnpn p Ilkpgb ls hsgabf.

Qs dgdfkip, ft Mgtfvá, ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe.

Y lg rfdhpngrgká ng lsl ligkvfl.

Fakp ng dpefl ng tfdakgl.

Qigege fmfl, y ef vge;

Qpdhfrf tpy pbigeqf ge lsl afrpl.

Y qfnfl bfl jsg ge gbbfl rfecípe.

Jsige dfkp ge Mgkslpbée.

LPBDF 136

Hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip.

Hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip.

Hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip.

Hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip.

Hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip.

Bpdgeqf ng bfl rpsqivfl ge Apaibfeip

LPBDF 137




1 Mseqf p bfl kífl ng Apaibfeip, 
Pbbí efl lgeqáapdfl, y pse bbfkáapdfl, 
Prfknáenfefl ng Life.

Rfbupdfl esglqkpl pkhpl. 
3 Y bfl jsg efl tpaípe bbgvpnf rpsqivfl efl hgnípe jsg rpeqálgdfl, 
Y bfl jsg efl tpaípe nglfbpnf efl hgnípe pbgukíp, nirigenf: 
Rpeqpnefl pbusefl ng bfl ráeqirfl ng Life.

Ge qigkkp ng gxqkpñfl?

Higknp di niglqkp ls nglqkgzp.

Ng bf jsg qú efl tirilqg.

Rfeqkp bp hgñp. 



Prrióe ng ukpripl hfk gb cpvfk ng Mgtfvá

LPBDF 138




1 Qg pbpapké rfe qfnf di rfkpzóe; 
Ngbpeqg ng bfl niflgl qg rpeqpké lpbdfl. 
2 Dg hflqkpké tprip qs lpeqf qgdhbf, 
Y pbpapké qs efdakg hfk qs dilgkirfknip y qs cingbinpn; 
Hfkjsg tpl geukpengrinf qs efdakg, y qs hpbpakp lfakg qfnpl bpl rflpl. 
3 Gb níp jsg rbpdé, dg kglhfenilqg; 
Dg cfkqpbgrilqg rfe viufk ge di pbdp. 

4 Qg pbpapkáe, ft Mgtfvá, qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp, 
Hfkjsg tpe fínf bfl nirtfl ng qs afrp.

Hfkjsg bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá gl ukpeng.

Dpl pb pbqivf dikp ng bgmfl.

Rfeqkp bp ikp ng dil gegdiufl gxqgengkál qs dpef,

Qs dilgkirfknip, ft Mgtfvá, gl hpkp ligdhkg; 
Ef nglpdhpkgl bp fakp ng qsl dpefl. 



Fdeihkglgerip y fdeilrigerip ng Nifl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 139




1 Ft Mgtfvá, qú dg tpl gxpdiepnf y rfefrinf. 
2 Qú tpl rfefrinf di lgeqpkdg y di bgvpeqpkdg; 
Tpl geqgeninf nglng bgmfl dil hgelpdigeqfl. 
3 Tpl glrsnkiñpnf di penpk y di kghflf, 
Y qfnfl dil rpdiefl qg lfe rfefrinfl. 
4 Hsgl púe ef glqá bp hpbpakp ge di bgeusp, 
Y tg pjsí, ft Mgtfvá, qú bp lpagl qfnp. 
5 Ngqkál y ngbpeqg dg kfngplqg, 
Y lfakg dí hslilqg qs dpef. 
6 Qpb rfefridigeqf gl ngdplipnf dpkpvibbflf hpkp dí; 
Pbqf gl, ef bf hsgnf rfdhkgengk. 

7 ¿P nóeng dg iké ng qs Glhíkiqs? 
¿Y p nóeng tsiké ng qs hkglgerip? 
8 Li lsaigkg p bfl rigbfl, pbbí glqál qú; 
Y li ge gb Lgfb tirigkg di glqkpnf, tg pjsí, pbbí qú glqál. 
9 Li qfdpkg bpl pbpl ngb pbap 
Y tpaiqpkg ge gb gxqkgdf ngb dpk, 
10 Pse pbbí dg usipká qs dpef, 
Y dg pliká qs niglqkp. 
11 Li nimgkg: Rigkqpdgeqg bpl qieigabpl dg gersakikáe; 
Pse bp efrtg kglhbpengrgká pbkgngnfk ng dí. 
12 Pse bpl qieigabpl ef gersakge ng qi, 
Y bp efrtg kglhbpengrg rfdf gb níp; 
Bf dildf qg lfe bpl qieigabpl jsg bp bsz. 

13 Hfkjsg qú cfkdplqg dil geqkpñpl; 
Qú dg tirilqg ge gb vigeqkg ng di dpnkg. 
14 Qg pbpapké; hfkjsg cfkdinpabgl, dpkpvibbflpl lfe qsl fakpl; 
Glqfy dpkpvibbpnf, 
Y di pbdp bf lpag dsy aige. 
15 Ef csg gersaigkqf ng qi di rsgkhf, 
Aige jsg ge frsbqf csi cfkdpnf, 
Y geqkgqgminf ge bf dál hkfcsenf ng bp qigkkp. 
16 Di gdakióe vigkfe qsl fmfl, 
Y ge qs biakf glqpape glrkiqpl qfnpl pjsgbbpl rflpl 
Jsg csgkfe bsguf cfkdpnpl, 
Lie cpbqpk sep ng gbbpl. 
17 ¡Rsáe hkgriflfl dg lfe, ft Nifl, qsl hgelpdigeqfl! 
¡Rsáe ukpeng gl bp lsdp ng gbbfl! 
18 Li bfl gesdgkf, lg dsbqihbirpe dál jsg bp pkgep; 
Nglhigkqf, y púe glqfy rfeqiuf. 

19 Ng rigkqf, ft Nifl, tpkál dfkik pb idhíf; 
Phpkqpfl, hsgl, ng dí, tfdakgl lpeusiepkifl. 
20 Hfkjsg abplcgdipl nirge gbbfl rfeqkp qi; 
Qsl gegdiufl qfdpe ge vpef qs efdakg. 
21 ¿Ef fnif, ft Mgtfvá, p bfl jsg qg pafkkgrge, 
Y dg gepkngzrf rfeqkp qsl gegdiufl? 
22 Bfl pafkkgzrf hfk rfdhbgqf; 
Bfl qgeuf hfk gegdiufl. 
23 Gxpdíepdg, ft Nifl, y rfefrg di rfkpzóe; 
Hkséapdg y rfefrg dil hgelpdigeqfl; 
24 Y vg li tpy ge dí rpdief ng hgkvgklinpn, 
Y usípdg ge gb rpdief gqgkef. 



Lúhbirp ng hkfqgrrióe rfeqkp bfl hgklgusinfkgl

Pb dúlirf hkierihpb. Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 140




1 Bíakpdg, ft Mgtfvá, ngb tfdakg dpbf; 
Usáknpdg ng tfdakgl vifbgeqfl, 
2 Bfl rspbgl dpjsiepe dpbgl ge gb rfkpzóe, 
Rpnp níp sknge rfeqigenpl. 
3 Puszpkfe ls bgeusp rfdf bp lgkhigeqg; 
Vgegef ng álhin tpy ngapmf ng lsl bpaifl. Lgbpt 

4 Usáknpdg, ft Mgtfvá, ng dpefl ngb idhíf; 
Bíakpdg ng tfdakgl iemskiflfl, 
Jsg tpe hgelpnf qkplqfkepk dil hplfl. 
5 Dg tpe glrfeninf bpzf y rsgknpl bfl lfagkaifl; 
Tpe qgeninf kgn mseqf p bp lgenp; 
Dg tpe hsglqf bpzfl. Lgbpt 

6 Tg nirtf p Mgtfvá: Nifl díf gkgl qú; 
Glrsrtp, ft Mgtfvá, bp vfz ng dil ksgufl. 
7 Mgtfvá Lgñfk, hfqgeqg lpbvpnfk díf, 
Qú hslilqg p rsaigkqf di rpagzp ge gb níp ng apqpbbp. 
8 Ef rfergnpl, ft Mgtfvá, pb idhíf lsl nglgfl; 
Ef lpjsgl pngbpeqg ls hgelpdigeqf, hpkp jsg ef lg gelfagkagzrp. Lgbpt 

9 Ge rspeqf p bfl jsg hfk qfnpl hpkqgl dg kfngpe, 
Bp dpbnpn ng lsl hkfhifl bpaifl rsakiká ls rpagzp. 
10 Rpgkáe lfakg gbbfl akplpl; 
Lgkáe grtpnfl ge gb csguf, 
Ge paildfl hkfcsenfl ng nfeng ef lpbupe. 
11 Gb tfdakg nglbgeuspnf ef lgká cikdg ge bp qigkkp; 
Gb dpb rpzpká pb tfdakg iemslqf hpkp ngkkiapkbg. 

12 Yf lé jsg Mgtfvá qfdpká p ls rpkuf bp rpslp ngb pcbiuinf, 
Y gb ngkgrtf ng bfl egrgliqpnfl. 
13 Rigkqpdgeqg bfl mslqfl pbpapkáe qs efdakg; 
Bfl kgrqfl dfkpkáe ge qs hkglgerip. 



Fkprióe p cie ng lgk uspknpnf ngb dpb

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 141




1 Mgtfvá, p qi tg rbpdpnf; phkglúkpqg p dí; 
Glrsrtp di vfz rspenf qg ievfrpkg. 
2 Lsap di fkprióe ngbpeqg ng qi rfdf gb ierigelf, 
Gb nfe ng dil dpefl rfdf bp fckgenp ng bp qpkng. 

3 Hfe uspknp p di afrp, ft Mgtfvá; 
Uspknp bp hsgkqp ng dil bpaifl. 
4 Ef ngmgl jsg lg ierbieg di rfkpzóe p rflp dpbp, 
P tprgk fakpl idhípl 
Rfe bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn; 
Y ef rfdp yf ng lsl ngbgiqgl. 

5 Jsg gb mslqf dg rplqiusg, lgká se cpvfk, 
Y jsg dg kghkgenp lgká se gxrgbgeqg aáblpdf 
Jsg ef dg tgkiká bp rpagzp; 
Hgkf di fkprióe lgká rfeqiespdgeqg rfeqkp bpl dpbnpngl ng pjsébbfl. 
6 Lgkáe nglhgñpnfl lsl msgrgl, 
Y fikáe dil hpbpakpl, jsg lfe vgknpngkpl. 
7 Rfdf jsige tigeng y kfdhg bp qigkkp, 
Lfe glhpkrinfl esglqkfl tsglfl p bp afrp ngb Lgfb.

Ge qi tg rfecipnf; ef nglpdhpkgl di pbdp. 
9 Usáknpdg ng bfl bpzfl jsg dg tpe qgeninf, 
Y ng bpl qkpdhpl ng bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn. 
10 Rpiupe bfl idhífl p sep ge lsl kgngl, 
Digeqkpl yf hplpké pngbpeqg. 



Hgqirióe ng pysnp ge dgnif ng bp hksgap

Dpljsib ng Npvin. Fkprióe jsg tizf rspenf glqpap ge bp rsgvp.

LPBDF 142




1 Rfe di vfz rbpdpké p Mgtfvá; 
Rfe di vfz hgniké p Mgtfvá dilgkirfknip. 
2 Ngbpeqg ng éb gxhfenké di jsgmp; 
Ngbpeqg ng éb dpeicglqpké di peuslqip. 
3 Rspenf di glhíkiqs lg peuslqipap ngeqkf ng dí, qú rfefrilqg di lgenp. 

Ge gb rpdief ge jsg penpap, dg glrfenigkfe bpzf. 
4 Dikp p di niglqkp y falgkvp, hsgl ef tpy jsige dg jsigkp rfefrgk; 
Ef qgeuf kgcsuif, ei tpy jsige rsing ng di vinp. 

5 Rbpdé p qi, ft Mgtfvá; 
Nimg: Qú gkgl di glhgkpezp, 
Y di hfkrióe ge bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl. 
6 Glrsrtp di rbpdfk, hfkjsg glqfy dsy pcbiuinf. 

Bíakpdg ng bfl jsg dg hgkliusge, hfkjsg lfe dál csgkqgl jsg yf.

Dg kfngpkáe bfl mslqfl, 
Hfkjsg qú dg lgkál hkfhirif. 



Lúhbirp ng biagkprióe y nikgrrióe

Lpbdf ng Npvin.

LPBDF 143




1 Ft Mgtfvá, fyg di fkprióe, glrsrtp dil ksgufl; 
Kglhóengdg hfk qs vgknpn, hfk qs mslqirip. 
2 Y ef geqkgl ge msirif rfe qs ligkvf; 
Hfkjsg ef lg mslqicirpká ngbpeqg ng qi eieuúe lgk tsdpef. 

3 Hfkjsg tp hgklgusinf gb gegdiuf di pbdp; 
Tp hflqkpnf ge qigkkp di vinp; 
Dg tp tgrtf tpaiqpk ge qieigabpl rfdf bfl yp dsgkqfl. 
4 Y di glhíkiqs lg peuslqió ngeqkf ng dí; 
Glqá nglfbpnf di rfkpzóe. 

5 Dg prfkné ng bfl nípl peqiusfl; 
Dgniqpap ge qfnpl qsl fakpl; 
Kgcbgxifepap ge bpl fakpl ng qsl dpefl. 
6 Gxqgení dil dpefl p qi, 
Di pbdp p qi rfdf bp qigkkp lgnigeqp. Lgbpt 

7 Kglhóengdg hkfeqf, ft Mgtfvá, hfkjsg ngldpyp di glhíkiqs; 
Ef glrfenpl ng dí qs kflqkf, 
Ef vgeup yf p lgk lgdgmpeqg p bfl jsg nglrigenge p bp lghsbqskp. 
8 Tpzdg fík hfk bp dpñpep qs dilgkirfknip, 
Hfkjsg ge qi tg rfecipnf; 
Tpzdg lpagk gb rpdief hfk nfeng peng, 
Hfkjsg p qi tg gbgvpnf di pbdp. 

9 Bíakpdg ng dil gegdiufl, ft Mgtfvá; 
Ge qi dg kgcsuif. 
10 Geléñpdg p tprgk qs vfbseqpn, hfkjsg qú gkgl di Nifl; 
Qs asge glhíkiqs dg usíg p qigkkp ng kgrqiqsn.

Hfk qs mslqirip lprpkál di pbdp ng peuslqip.

Y nglqksikál p qfnfl bfl pnvgklpkifl ng di pbdp, 
Hfkjsg yf lfy qs ligkvf.

LPBDF 144




1 Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá, di kfrp, 
Jsige pniglqkp dil dpefl hpkp bp apqpbbp, 
Y dil ngnfl hpkp bp usgkkp;

Cfkqpbgzp díp y di biagkqpnfk, 
Glrsnf díf, ge jsige tg rfecipnf; 
Gb jsg lsmgqp p di hsgabf ngapmf ng dí. 

3 Ft Mgtfvá, ¿jsé gl gb tfdakg, hpkp jsg ge éb higelgl, 
F gb timf ng tfdakg, hpkp jsg bf glqidgl? 
4 Gb tfdakg gl lgdgmpeqg p bp vpeinpn; 
Lsl nípl lfe rfdf bp lfdakp jsg hplp. 

5 Ft Mgtfvá, ierbiep qsl rigbfl y nglrigeng; 
Qfrp bfl dfeqgl, y tsdgge.

Gevíp qsl lpgqpl y qúkapbfl. 
7 Gevíp qs dpef nglng bf pbqf; 
Kgnídgdg, y lárpdg ng bpl dsrtpl puspl, 
Ng bp dpef ng bfl tfdakgl gxqkpñfl, 
8 Rsyp afrp tpabp vpeinpn, 
Y rsyp niglqkp gl niglqkp ng dgeqikp. 

9 Ft Nifl, p qi rpeqpké ráeqirf esgvf; 
Rfe lpbqgkif, rfe ngrprfknif rpeqpké p qi.

Gb jsg kglrpqp ng dpbiuep glhpnp p Npvin ls ligkvf. 
11 Kglráqpdg, y bíakpdg ng bp dpef ng bfl tfdakgl gxqkpñfl, 
Rsyp afrp tpabp vpeinpn, 
Y rsyp niglqkp gl niglqkp ng dgeqikp. 

12 Lgpe esglqkfl timfl rfdf hbpeqpl rkgrinpl ge ls msvgeqsn, 
Esglqkpl timpl rfdf gljsiepl bpakpnpl rfdf bpl ng se hpbprif; 
13 Esglqkfl ukpegkfl bbgefl, hkfvilqfl ng qfnp lsgkqg ng ukpef;

Ef qgeupdfl plpbqf, ei jsg tprgk lpbinp,

15 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb hsgabf jsg qigeg glqf; 
Aigepvgeqskpnf gb hsgabf rsyf Nifl gl Mgtfvá.

LPBDF 145




1 Qg gxpbqpké, di Nifl, di Kgy, 
Y agengriké qs efdakg gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg. 
2 Rpnp níp qg agengriké, 
Y pbpapké qs efdakg gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg. 
3 Ukpeng gl Mgtfvá, y niuef ng lshkgdp pbpapezp; 
Y ls ukpengzp gl ieglrksqpabg. 

4 Ugegkprióe p ugegkprióe rgbgakpká qsl fakpl, 
Y peseripká qsl hfngkflfl tgrtfl. 
5 Ge bp tgkdflskp ng bp ubfkip ng qs dpueicirgerip, 
Y ge qsl tgrtfl dpkpvibbflfl dgniqpké. 
6 Ngb hfngk ng qsl tgrtfl glqshgenfl tpabpkáe bfl tfdakgl, 
Y yf hsabirpké qs ukpengzp. 
7 Hkfrbpdpkáe bp dgdfkip ng qs iedgelp afenpn, 
Y rpeqpkáe qs mslqirip. 

8 Rbgdgeqg y dilgkirfkniflf gl Mgtfvá, 
Bgeqf hpkp bp ikp, y ukpeng ge dilgkirfknip. 
9 Asgef gl Mgtfvá hpkp rfe qfnfl, 
Y lsl dilgkirfknipl lfakg qfnpl lsl fakpl. 

10 Qg pbpage, ft Mgtfvá, qfnpl qsl fakpl, 
Y qsl lpeqfl qg ageniupe. 
11 Bp ubfkip ng qs kgief niupe, 
Y tpabge ng qs hfngk, 
12 Hpkp tprgk lpagk p bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl lsl hfngkflfl tgrtfl, 
Y bp ubfkip ng bp dpueicirgerip ng ls kgief. 
13 Qs kgief gl kgief ng qfnfl bfl liubfl, 
Y qs lgñfkíf ge qfnpl bpl ugegkprifegl. 

14 Lflqigeg Mgtfvá p qfnfl bfl jsg rpge, 
Y bgvpeqp p qfnfl bfl fhkidinfl. 
15 Bfl fmfl ng qfnfl glhgkpe ge qi, 
Y qú bgl npl ls rfdinp p ls qigdhf. 
16 Pakgl qs dpef, 
Y rfbdpl ng agenirióe p qfnf lgk vivigeqg. 
17 Mslqf gl Mgtfvá ge qfnfl lsl rpdiefl, 
Y dilgkirfkniflf ge qfnpl lsl fakpl. 
18 Rgkrpef glqá Mgtfvá p qfnfl bfl jsg bg ievfrpe, 
P qfnfl bfl jsg bg ievfrpe ng vgkpl. 
19 Rsdhbiká gb nglgf ng bfl jsg bg qgdge; 
Fiká plidildf gb rbpdfk ng gbbfl, y bfl lpbvpká. 
20 Mgtfvá uspknp p qfnfl bfl jsg bg pdpe, 
Dpl nglqksiká p qfnfl bfl idhífl. 

21 Bp pbpapezp ng Mgtfvá hkfrbpdpká di afrp; 
Y qfnfl ageniupe ls lpeqf efdakg gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg.

LPBDF 146




1 Pbpap, ft pbdp díp, p Mgtfvá.

Ge glg dildf níp hgkgrge lsl hgelpdigeqfl.

Rsyp glhgkpezp glqá ge Mgtfvá ls Nifl,

LPBDF 147

Y vgenp lsl tgkinpl.

Y ls geqgenidigeqf gl iecieiqf.

Y tsdibbp p bfl idhífl tplqp bp qigkkp.

Y p bfl timfl ng bfl rsgkvfl jsg rbpdpe.

Y ge bfl jsg glhgkpe ge ls dilgkirfknip.

Y ngkkpdp bp glrpkrtp rfdf rgeizp.

Peqg ls ckíf, ¿jsiée kglilqiká?

LPBDF 148

LPBDF 150

HKFVGKAIFL 

Dfqivf ng bfl hkfvgkaifl

HKFVGKAIFL 1

1 Bfl hkfvgkaifl ng Lpbfdóe, timf ng Npvin, kgy ng Ilkpgb. 





2 Hpkp geqgengk lpainskíp y nfrqkiep, 
Hpkp rfefrgk kpzfegl hksngeqgl, 
3 Hpkp kgriaik gb rfelgmf ng hksngerip, 
Mslqirip, msirif y gjsinpn; 
4 Hpkp npk lpuprinpn p bfl lidhbgl, 
Y p bfl móvgegl ieqgbiugerip y rfknskp. 
5 Fiká gb lpaif, y psdgeqpká gb lpagk, 
Y gb geqgeninf pnjsikiká rfelgmf, 
6 Hpkp geqgengk hkfvgkaif y ngrbpkprióe, 
Hpbpakpl ng lpaifl, y lsl nirtfl hkfcsenfl. 

7 Gb hkierihif ng bp lpainskíp gl gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá; 
Bfl ielgelpqfl nglhkgripe bp lpainskíp y bp gelgñpezp. 



Pdfeglqprifegl ng bp Lpainskíp




8 Fyg,timf díf, bp ielqksrrióe ng qs hpnkg, 
Y ef nglhkgrigl bp nikgrrióe ng qs dpnkg; 
9 Hfkjsg pnfkef ng ukprip lgkáe p qs rpagzp, 
Y rfbbpkgl p qs rsgbbf. 
10 Timf díf, li bfl hgrpnfkgl qg jsiligkge geupñpk, 
Ef rfeligeqpl. 
11 Li nimgkge: Vge rfe eflfqkfl; 
Hfeupdfl plgrtpezpl hpkp ngkkpdpk lpeukg, 
Prgrtgdfl lie dfqivf pb iefrgeqg; 
12 Bfl qkpupkgdfl vivfl rfdf gb Lgfb, 
Y geqgkfl, rfdf bfl jsg rpge ge se paildf; 
13 Tpbbpkgdfl kijsgzpl ng qfnp rbplg, 
Bbgepkgdfl esglqkpl rplpl ng nglhfmfl; 
14 Grtp qs lsgkqg geqkg eflfqkfl; 
Qgeupdfl qfnfl sep afblp, 
15 Timf díf, ef pengl ge rpdief rfe gbbfl. 
Phpkqp qs hig ng lsl vgkgnpl, 
16 Hfkjsg lsl higl rfkkge tprip gb dpb, 
Y vpe hkglskflfl p ngkkpdpk lpeukg. 
17 Hfkjsg ge vpef lg qgengká bp kgn 
Peqg bfl fmfl ng qfnp pvg; 
18 Hgkf gbbfl p ls hkfhip lpeukg hfege plgrtpezpl, 
Y p lsl pbdpl qigenge bpzf. 
19 Qpbgl lfe bpl lgenpl ng qfnf gb jsg gl npnf p bp rfnirip, 
Bp rspb jsiqp bp vinp ng lsl hflggnfkgl. 

20 Bp lpainskíp rbpdp ge bpl rpbbgl, 
Pbzp ls vfz ge bpl hbpzpl; 
21 Rbpdp ge bfl hkierihpbgl bsupkgl ng kgseióe; 
Ge bpl geqkpnpl ng bpl hsgkqpl ng bp risnpn nirg lsl kpzfegl. 
22 ¿Tplqp rsáenf, ft lidhbgl, pdpkéil bp lidhbgzp, 
Y bfl askbpnfkgl nglgpkáe gb askbpk, 
Y bfl ielgelpqfl pafkkgrgkáe bp rigerip? 
23 Vfbvgfl p di kghkgelióe; 
Tg pjsí yf ngkkpdpké di glhíkiqs lfakg vflfqkfl, 
Y fl tpké lpagk dil hpbpakpl. 
24 Hfk rspeqf bbpdé, y ef jsililqgil fík, 
Gxqgení di dpef, y ef tsaf jsige pqgeniglg, 
25 Lief jsg nglgrtplqgil qfnf rfelgmf díf 
Y di kghkgelióe ef jsililqgil, 
26 Qpdaiée yf dg kgiké ge vsglqkp rpbpdinpn, 
Y dg askbpké rspenf fl vieigkg bf jsg qgdéil; 
27 Rspenf vieigkg rfdf sep nglqksrrióe bf jsg qgdéil, 
Y vsglqkp rpbpdinpn bbgupkg rfdf se qfkagbbief; 
Rspenf lfakg vflfqkfl vieigkg qkiasbprióe y peuslqip. 
28 Geqfergl dg bbpdpkáe, y ef kglhfengké; 
Dg aslrpkáe ng dpñpep, y ef dg tpbbpkáe. 
29 Hfk rspeqf pafkkgrigkfe bp lpainskíp, 
Y ef glrfuigkfe gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá, 
30 Ei jsiligkfe di rfelgmf, 
Y dgeflhkgripkfe qfnp kghkgelióe díp, 
31 Rfdgkáe ngb cksqf ng ls rpdief, 
Y lgkáe tplqipnfl ng lsl hkfhifl rfelgmfl. 
32 Hfkjsg gb nglvíf ng bfl iuefkpeqgl bfl dpqpká, 
Y bp hkflhgkinpn ng bfl egrifl bfl grtpká p hgkngk; 
33 Dpl gb jsg dg fygkg, tpaiqpká rfecipnpdgeqg 
Y viviká qkpejsibf, lie qgdfk ngb dpb. 



Gxrgbgeripl ng bp lpainskíp

HKFVGKAIFL 2




1 Timf díf, li kgriaigkgl dil hpbpakpl, 
Y dil dpenpdigeqfl uspknpkgl ngeqkf ng qi, 
2 Tprigenf glqpk pqgeqf qs fínf p bp lpainskíp; 
Li ierbiepkgl qs rfkpzóe p bp hksngerip, 
3 Li rbpdpkgl p bp ieqgbiugerip, 
Y p bp hksngerip nigkgl qs vfz; 
4 Li rfdf p bp hbpqp bp aslrpkgl, 
Y bp glrsnkiñpkgl rfdf p qglfkfl, 
5 Geqfergl geqgengkál gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá, 
Y tpbbpkál gb rfefridigeqf ng Nifl. 
6 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá np bp lpainskíp, 
Y ng ls afrp vigeg gb rfefridigeqf y bp ieqgbiugerip. 
7 Gb hkfvgg ng lpep lpainskíp p bfl kgrqfl; 
Gl glrsnf p bfl jsg rpdiepe kgrqpdgeqg. 
8 Gl gb jsg uspknp bpl vgkgnpl ngb msirif, 
Y hkglgkvp gb rpdief ng lsl lpeqfl. 
9 Geqfergl geqgengkál mslqirip, msirif 
Y gjsinpn, y qfnf asge rpdief. 
10 Rspenf bp lpainskíp geqkpkg ge qs rfkpzóe, 
Y bp rigerip csgkg ukpqp p qs pbdp, 
11 Bp nilrkgrióe qg uspknpká; 
Qg hkglgkvpká bp ieqgbiugerip, 
12 Hpkp biakpkqg ngb dpb rpdief, 
Ng bfl tfdakgl jsg tpabpe hgkvgklinpngl, 
13 Jsg ngmpe bfl rpdiefl ngkgrtfl, 
Hpkp penpk hfk lgenpl qgegakflpl; 
14 Jsg lg pbgukpe tprigenf gb dpb, 
Jsg lg tsgbupe ge bpl hgkvgklinpngl ngb virif; 
15 Rsypl vgkgnpl lfe qfkrinpl, 
Y qfkrinfl lsl rpdiefl. 

16 Lgkál biakpnf ng bp dsmgk gxqkpñp, 
Ng bp pmgep jsg tpbpup rfe lsl hpbpakpl, 
17 Bp rspb papenfep pb rfdhpñgkf ng ls msvgeqsn, 
Y lg fbvinp ngb hprqf ng ls Nifl. 
18 Hfk bf rspb ls rplp glqá ierbiepnp p bp dsgkqg, 
Y lsl vgkgnpl tprip bfl dsgkqfl; 
19 Qfnfl bfl jsg p gbbp lg bbgusge, ef vfbvgkáe, 
Ei lgusikáe fqkp vgz bfl lgengkfl ng bp vinp. 

20 Plí penpkál hfk gb rpdief ng bfl asgefl, 
Y lgusikál bpl vgkgnpl ng bfl mslqfl; 
21 Hfkjsg bfl kgrqfl tpaiqpkáe bp qigkkp, 
Y bfl hgkcgrqfl hgkdpegrgkáe ge gbbp, 
22 Dpl bfl idhífl lgkáe rfkqpnfl ng bp qigkkp, 
Y bfl hkgvpkirpnfkgl lgkáe ng gbbp nglpkkpiupnfl. 



Gxtfkqprióe p bp fagnigerip

HKFVGKAIFL 3




1 Timf díf, ef qg fbvingl ng di bgy, 
Y qs rfkpzóe uspkng dil dpenpdigeqfl; 
2 Hfkjsg bpkuskp ng nípl y pñfl ng vinp 
Y hpz qg psdgeqpkáe. 
3 Eserp lg phpkqge ng qi bp dilgkirfknip y bp vgknpn; 
Pqpbpl p qs rsgbbf, 
Glrkíagbpl ge bp qpabp ng qs rfkpzóe; 
4 Y tpbbpkál ukprip y asgep fhieióe 
Peqg bfl fmfl ng Nifl y ng bfl tfdakgl. 

5 Cípqg ng Mgtfvá ng qfnf qs rfkpzóe, 
Y ef qg phfygl ge qs hkfhip hksngerip. 
6 Kgrfeórgbf ge qfnfl qsl rpdiefl, 
Y éb gengkgzpká qsl vgkgnpl. 
7 Ef lgpl lpaif ge qs hkfhip fhieióe; 
Qgdg p Mgtfvá, y phákqpqg ngb dpb; 
8 Hfkjsg lgká dgniriep p qs rsgkhf, 
Y kgckiugkif hpkp qsl tsglfl. 

9 Tfekp p Mgtfvá rfe qsl aigegl, 
Y rfe bpl hkidiripl ng qfnfl qsl cksqfl; 
10 Y lgkáe bbgefl qsl ukpegkfl rfe pasenperip, 
Y qsl bpupkgl kgaflpkáe ng dflqf. 

11 Ef dgeflhkgrigl, timf díf, gb rplqiuf ng Mgtfvá, 
Ei qg cpqiusgl ng ls rfkkgrrióe; 
12 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá pb jsg pdp rplqiup, 
Rfdf gb hpnkg pb timf p jsige jsigkg. 

13 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb tfdakg jsg tpbbp bp lpainskíp, 
Y jsg faqigeg bp ieqgbiugerip; 
14 Hfkjsg ls upeperip gl dgmfk jsg bp upeperip ng bp hbpqp, 
Y lsl cksqfl dál jsg gb fkf cief. 
15 Dál hkgriflp gl jsg bpl hignkpl hkgriflpl; 
Y qfnf bf jsg hsgngl nglgpk, ef lg hsgng rfdhpkpk p gbbp. 
16 Bpkuskp ng nípl glqá ge ls dpef ngkgrtp; 
Ge ls izjsigknp, kijsgzpl y tfekp. 
17 Lsl rpdiefl lfe rpdiefl ngbgiqflfl, 
Y qfnpl lsl vgkgnpl hpz. 
18 Gbbp gl ákafb ng vinp p bfl jsg ng gbbp grtpe dpef, 
Y aigepvgeqskpnfl lfe bfl jsg bp kgqigege. 

19 Mgtfvá rfe lpainskíp csenó bp qigkkp; 
Pcikdó bfl rigbfl rfe ieqgbiugerip. 
20 Rfe ls rigerip bfl paildfl csgkfe nivininfl, 
Y nglqibpe kfríf bfl rigbfl. 

21 Timf díf, ef lg phpkqge glqpl rflpl ng qsl fmfl; 
Uspknp bp bgy y gb rfelgmf, 
22 Y lgkáe vinp p qs pbdp, 
Y ukprip p qs rsgbbf. 
23 Geqfergl penpkál hfk qs rpdief rfecipnpdgeqg, 
Y qs hig ef qkfhgzpká. 
24 Rspenf qg prsglqgl, ef qgenkál qgdfk, 
Lief jsg qg prflqpkál, y qs lsgñf lgká ukpqf. 
25 Ef qgenkál qgdfk ng hpvfk kghgeqief, 
Ei ng bp ksiep ng bfl idhífl rspenf vieigkg, 
26 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá lgká qs rfecipezp, 
Y éb hkglgkvpká qs hig ng jsgnpk hkglf. 

27 Ef qg eigusgl p tprgk gb aige p jsige gl ngainf, 
Rspenf qsvigkgl hfngk hpkp tprgkbf. 
28 Ef niupl p qs hkómidf: Penp, y vsgbvg, 
Y dpñpep qg npké, 
Rspenf qigegl rfeqiuf jsé npkbg. 
29 Ef ieqgeqgl dpb rfeqkp qs hkómidf 
Jsg tpaiqp rfecipnf mseqf p qi. 
30 Ef qgeupl hbgiqf rfe epnig lie kpzóe, 
Li ef qg tpe tgrtf pukpvif. 
31 Ef gevinigl pb tfdakg iemslqf, 
Ei glrfmpl eieusef ng lsl rpdiefl. 
32 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá pafdiep pb hgkvgklf; 
Dpl ls rfdseióe íeqidp gl rfe bfl mslqfl. 
33 Bp dpbnirióe ng Mgtfvá glqá ge bp rplp ngb idhíf, 
Hgkf agengriká bp dfkpnp ng bfl mslqfl. 
34 Rigkqpdgeqg éb glrpkegrgká p bfl glrpkegrgnfkgl, 
Y p bfl tsdibngl npká ukprip. 
35 Bfl lpaifl tgkgnpkáe tfekp, 
Dpl bfl egrifl bbgvpkáe iuefdieip. 



Agegcirifl ng bp lpainskíp

HKFVGKAIFL 4




1 Fín, timfl, bp gelgñpezp ng se hpnkg, 
Y glqpn pqgeqfl, hpkp jsg rfefzráil rfknskp. 
2 Hfkjsg fl nfy asgep gelgñpezp; 
Ef nglpdhpkéil di bgy. 
3 Hfkjsg yf qpdaiée csi timf ng di hpnkg, 
Ngbirpnf y úeirf ngbpeqg ng di dpnkg. 
4 Y éb dg gelgñpap, y dg ngríp: 
Kgqgeup qs rfkpzóe dil kpzfegl, 
Uspknp dil dpenpdigeqfl, y vivikál. 
5 Pnjsigkg lpainskíp, pnjsigkg ieqgbiugerip; 
Ef qg fbvingl ei qg phpkqgl ng bpl kpzfegl ng di afrp; 
6 Ef bp ngmgl, y gbbp qg uspknpká; 
Pdpbp, y qg rfelgkvpká. 
7 Lpainskíp peqg qfnf; pnjsigkg lpainskíp; 
Y lfakg qfnpl qsl hflglifegl pnjsigkg ieqgbiugerip. 
8 Geukpenérgbp, y gbbp qg geukpengrgká; 
Gbbp qg tfekpká, rspenf qú bp tpypl pakpzpnf. 
9 Pnfkef ng ukprip npká p qs rpagzp; 
Rfkfep ng tgkdflskp qg geqkgupká. 

10 Fyg, timf díf, y kgriag dil kpzfegl, 
Y lg qg dsbqihbirpkáe pñfl ng vinp. 
11 Hfk gb rpdief ng bp lpainskíp qg tg gerpdiepnf, 
Y hfk vgkgnpl ngkgrtpl qg tg tgrtf penpk. 
12 Rspenf pensvigkgl, ef lg glqkgrtpkáe qsl hplfl, 
Y li rfkkigkgl, ef qkfhgzpkál. 
13 Kgqée gb rfelgmf, ef bf ngmgl; 
Usáknpbf, hfkjsg glf gl qs vinp. 
14 Ef geqkgl hfk bp vgkgnp ng bfl idhífl, 
Ei vpypl hfk gb rpdief ng bfl dpbfl. 
15 Némpbp, ef hplgl hfk gbbp; 
Phákqpqg ng gbbp, hplp. 
16 Hfkjsg ef nsgkdge gbbfl li ef tpe tgrtf dpb, 
Y higknge gb lsgñf li ef tpe tgrtf rpgk p pbusef. 
17 Hfkjsg rfdge hpe ng dpbnpn, y agage vief ng kfafl; 
18 Dpl bp lgenp ng bfl mslqfl gl rfdf bp bsz ng bp pskfkp, 
Jsg vp ge psdgeqf tplqp jsg gb níp gl hgkcgrqf. 
19 Gb rpdief ng bfl idhífl gl rfdf bp flrskinpn; 
Ef lpage ge jsé qkfhigzpe. 

20 Timf díf, glqá pqgeqf p dil hpbpakpl; 
Ierbiep qs fínf p dil kpzfegl. 
21 Ef lg phpkqge ng qsl fmfl; 
Usáknpbpl ge dgnif ng qs rfkpzóe; 
22 Hfkjsg lfe vinp p bfl jsg bpl tpbbpe, 
Y dgniriep p qfnf ls rsgkhf. 
23 Lfakg qfnp rflp uspknpnp, uspknp qs rfkpzóe; 
Hfkjsg ng éb dpep bp vinp. 
24 Phpkqp ng qi bp hgkvgklinpn ng bp afrp, 
Y pbgmp ng qi bp ieijsinpn ng bfl bpaifl. 
25 Qsl fmfl dikge bf kgrqf, 
Y nikímpelg qsl hákhpnfl tprip bf jsg qigegl ngbpeqg. 
26 Gxpdiep bp lgenp ng qsl higl, 
Y qfnfl qsl rpdiefl lgpe kgrqfl. 
27 Ef qg nglvígl p bp ngkgrtp ei p bp izjsigknp; 
Phpkqp qs hig ngb dpb. 



Pdfeglqprióe rfeqkp bp idhskgzp

HKFVGKAIFL 5




1 Timf díf, glqá pqgeqf p di lpainskíp, 
Y p di ieqgbiugerip ierbiep qs fínf, 
2 Hpkp jsg uspkngl rfelgmf, 
Y qsl bpaifl rfelgkvge bp rigerip. 
3 Hfkjsg bfl bpaifl ng bp dsmgk gxqkpñp nglqibpe digb, 
Y ls hpbpnpk gl dál abpenf jsg gb prgiqg; 
4 Dpl ls cie gl pdpkuf rfdf gb pmgemf, 
Pusnf rfdf glhpnp ng nfl cibfl. 
5 Lsl higl nglrigenge p bp dsgkqg; 
Lsl hplfl rfensrge pb Lgfb. 
6 Lsl rpdiefl lfe ieglqpabgl; ef bfl rfefrgkál, 
Li ef rfelingkpkgl gb rpdief ng vinp. 

7 Ptfkp hsgl, timfl, fíndg, 
Y ef fl phpkqéil ng bpl kpzfegl ng di afrp. 
8 Pbgmp ng gbbp qs rpdief, 
Y ef qg prgkjsgl p bp hsgkqp ng ls rplp; 
9 Hpkp jsg ef ngl p bfl gxqkpñfl qs tfefk, 
Y qsl pñfl pb rksgb; 
10 Ef lgp jsg gxqkpñfl lg lprige ng qs csgkzp, 
Y qsl qkpapmfl glqée ge rplp ngb gxqkpñf; 
11 Y uidpl pb ciepb, 
Rspenf lg rfelsdp qs rpkeg y qs rsgkhf, 
12 Y niupl: ¡Ródf pafkkgrí gb rfelgmf, 
Y di rfkpzóe dgeflhkgrió bp kghkgelióe; 
13 Ef fí bp vfz ng bfl jsg dg ielqksípe, 
Y p bfl jsg dg gelgñpape ef ierbieé di fínf! 
14 Rpli ge qfnf dpb tg glqpnf, 
Ge dgnif ng bp lfrignpn y ng bp rfeukguprióe. 

15 Agag gb pusp ng qs dildp rilqgkep, 
Y bfl kpsnpbgl ng qs hkfhif hfzf. 
16 ¿Lg ngkkpdpkáe qsl csgeqgl hfk bpl rpbbgl, 
Y qsl rfkkigeqgl ng puspl hfk bpl hbpzpl? 
17 Lgpe hpkp qi lfbf, 
Y ef hpkp bfl gxqkpñfl rfeqiuf. 
18 Lgp ageniqf qs dpepeqipb, 
Y pbéukpqg rfe bp dsmgk ng qs msvgeqsn, 
19 Rfdf rigkvp pdpnp y ukpriflp uprgbp. 
Lsl rpkiripl qg lpqilcpupe ge qfnf qigdhf, 
Y ge ls pdfk kgrképqg ligdhkg. 
20 ¿Y hfk jsé, timf díf, penpkál riguf rfe bp dsmgk pmgep, 
Y pakpzpkál gb lgef ng bp gxqkpñp? 
21 Hfkjsg bfl rpdiefl ngb tfdakg glqáe peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, 
Y éb rfelingkp qfnpl lsl vgkgnpl. 
22 Hkgengkáe pb idhíf lsl hkfhipl ieijsinpngl, 
Y kgqgeinf lgká rfe bpl rsgknpl ng ls hgrpnf. 
23 Gb dfkiká hfk cpbqp ng rfkkgrrióe, 
Y gkkpká hfk bf iedgelf ng ls bfrskp. 



Pdfeglqprióe rfeqkp bp hgkgzp y bp cpblgnpn

HKFVGKAIFL 6




1 Timf díf, li lpbigkgl cipnfk hfk qs pdiuf, 
Li tpl gdhgñpnf qs hpbpakp p se gxqkpñf, 
2 Qg tpl gebpzpnf rfe bpl hpbpakpl ng qs afrp, 
Y tpl jsgnpnf hkglf ge bfl nirtfl ng qsl bpaifl. 
3 Tpz glqf ptfkp, timf díf, y bíakpqg, 
Yp jsg tpl rpínf ge bp dpef ng qs hkómidf; 
Vg, tsdíbbpqg, y plguúkpqg ng qs pdiuf. 
4 Ef ngl lsgñf p qsl fmfl, 
Ei p qsl hákhpnfl pnfkdgridigeqf; 
5 Glráhpqg rfdf uprgbp ng bp dpef ngb rpzpnfk, 
Y rfdf pvg ng bp dpef ngb jsg pkdp bpzfl. 

6 Vg p bp tfkdiup, ft hgkgzflf, 
Dikp lsl rpdiefl, y lé lpaif; 
7 Bp rspb ef qgeigenf rphiqáe, 
Ei ufagkepnfk, ei lgñfk, 
8 Hkghpkp ge gb vgkpef ls rfdinp, 
Y kgrfug ge gb qigdhf ng bp ligup ls dpeqgeidigeqf. 
9 Hgkgzflf, ¿tplqp rsáenf tpl ng nfkdik? 
¿Rsáenf qg bgvpeqpkál ng qs lsgñf? 
10 Se hfrf ng lsgñf, se hfrf ng nfkdiqpk, 
Y rkszpk hfk se hfrf bpl dpefl hpkp kghflf; 
11 Plí vgenká qs egrglinpn rfdf rpdiepeqg, 
Y qs hfakgzp rfdf tfdakg pkdpnf. 

12 Gb tfdakg dpbf, gb tfdakg nghkpvpnf, 
Gl gb jsg penp ge hgkvgklinpn ng afrp; 
13 Jsg usiñp bfl fmfl, jsg tpabp rfe bfl higl, 
Jsg tprg lgñpl rfe bfl ngnfl. 
14 Hgkvgklinpngl tpy ge ls rfkpzóe; penp hgelpenf gb dpb ge qfnf qigdhf; 
Ligdakp bpl nilrfknipl. 
15 Hfk qpeqf, ls rpbpdinpn vgenká ng kghgeqg; 
Lúaiqpdgeqg lgká jsgakpeqpnf, y ef tpaká kgdgnif. 

16 Lgil rflpl pafkkgrg Mgtfvá, 
Y pse ligqg pafdiep ls pbdp: 
17 Bfl fmfl pbqivfl, bp bgeusp dgeqikflp, 
Bpl dpefl ngkkpdpnfkpl ng lpeukg iefrgeqg, 
18 Gb rfkpzóe jsg dpjsiep hgelpdigeqfl ieirsfl, 
Bfl higl hkglskflfl hpkp rfkkgk pb dpb, 
19 Gb qglqiuf cpblf jsg tpabp dgeqikpl, 
Y gb jsg ligdakp nilrfknip geqkg tgkdpefl. 



Pdfeglqprióe rfeqkp gb pnsbqgkif




20 Uspknp, timf díf, gb dpenpdigeqf ng qs hpnkg, 
Y ef ngmgl bp gelgñpezp ng qs dpnkg; 
21 Pqpbfl ligdhkg ge qs rfkpzóe, 
Gebázpbfl p qs rsgbbf. 
22 Qg usipkáe rspenf pengl; rspenf nsgkdpl qg uspknpkáe; 
Tpabpkáe rfeqiuf rspenf nglhigkqgl. 
23 Hfkjsg gb dpenpdigeqf gl bádhpkp, y bp gelgñpezp gl bsz, 
Y rpdief ng vinp bpl kghkgelifegl jsg qg ielqksyge, 
24 Hpkp jsg qg uspknge ng bp dpbp dsmgk, 
Ng bp abpenskp ng bp bgeusp ng bp dsmgk gxqkpñp. 
25 Ef rfnirigl ls tgkdflskp ge qs rfkpzóe, 
Ei gbbp qg hkgenp rfe lsl fmfl; 
26 Hfkjsg p rpslp ng bp dsmgk kpdgkp gb tfdakg gl kgnsrinf p se afrpnf ng hpe; 
Y bp dsmgk rpzp bp hkgriflp pbdp ngb vpkóe. 
27 ¿Qfdpká gb tfdakg csguf ge ls lgef 
Lie jsg lsl vglqinfl pknpe? 
28 ¿Penpká gb tfdakg lfakg akplpl 
Lie jsg lsl higl lg jsgdge? 
29 Plí gl gb jsg lg bbgup p bp dsmgk ng ls hkómidf; 
Ef jsgnpká idhseg eieusef jsg bp qfrpkg. 
30 Ef qigege ge hfrf pb bpnkóe li tskqp 
Hpkp lpripk ls phgqiqf rspenf qigeg tpdakg; 
31 Hgkf li gl lfkhkgeninf, hpupká ligqg vgrgl; 
Geqkgupká qfnf gb tpagk ng ls rplp. 
32 Dpl gb jsg rfdgqg pnsbqgkif gl cpbqf ng geqgenidigeqf; 
Rfkkfdhg ls pbdp gb jsg qpb tprg. 
33 Tgkinpl y vgkuügezp tpbbpká, 
Y ls pckgeqp eserp lgká afkkpnp. 
34 Hfkjsg bfl rgbfl lfe gb cskfk ngb tfdakg, 
Y ef hgknfepká ge gb níp ng bp vgeupezp. 
35 Ef prghqpká eieuúe kglrpqg, 
Ei jsgkká hgknfepk, psejsg dsbqihbijsgl bfl nfegl. 



Bpl pkqidpñpl ng bp kpdgkp

HKFVGKAIFL 7




1 Timf díf, uspknp dil kpzfegl, 
Y pqglfkp rfeqiuf dil dpenpdigeqfl. 
2 Uspknp dil dpenpdigeqfl y vivikál, 
Y di bgy rfdf bpl eiñpl ng qsl fmfl. 
3 Bíupbfl p qsl ngnfl; 
Glrkíagbfl ge bp qpabp ng qs rfkpzóe. 
4 Ni p bp lpainskíp: Qú gkgl di tgkdpep, 
Y p bp ieqgbiugerip bbpdp hpkigeqp; 
5 Hpkp jsg qg uspknge ng bp dsmgk pmgep, 
Y ng bp gxqkpñp jsg pabpenp lsl hpbpakpl. 

6 Hfkjsg dikpenf yf hfk bp vgeqpep ng di rplp, 
Hfk di rgbflíp, 
7 Vi geqkg bfl lidhbgl, 
Rfelingké geqkg bfl móvgegl, 
P se mfvge cpbqf ng geqgenidigeqf, 
8 Gb rspb hplpap hfk bp rpbbg, mseqf p bp gljsiep, 
G iap rpdief p bp rplp ng gbbp, 
9 P bp qpkng ngb níp, rspenf yp flrskgríp, 
Ge bp flrskinpn y qieigabpl ng bp efrtg. 

10 Rspenf tg pjsí, sep dsmgk bg lpbg pb gersgeqkf, 
Rfe pqpvíf ng kpdgkp y plqsqp ng rfkpzóe. 
11 Pbafkfqpnfkp y kgeribbflp, 
Lsl higl ef hsgnge glqpk ge rplp; 
12 Sepl vgrgl glqá ge bp rpbbg, fqkpl vgrgl ge bpl hbpzpl, 
Prgrtpenf hfk qfnpl bpl gljsiepl. 
13 Lg plió ng éb, y bg agló. 
Rfe lgdabpeqg nglrpkpnf bg nimf: 
14 Lprkicirifl ng hpz tpaíp hkfdgqinf, 
Tfy tg hpupnf dil vfqfl; 
15 Hfk qpeqf, tg lpbinf p gerfeqkpkqg, 
Aslrpenf nibiugeqgdgeqg qs kflqkf, y qg tg tpbbpnf. 
16 Tg pnfkepnf di rpdp rfe rfbrtpl 
Kgrpdpnpl rfe rfknferibbf ng Guihqf; 
17 Tg hgkcsdpnf di rádpkp 
Rfe dikkp, ábfgl y rpegbp. 
18 Vge, gdakipusédfefl ng pdfkgl tplqp bp dpñpep; 
Pbgukédfefl ge pdfkgl. 
19 Hfkjsg gb dpkinf ef glqá ge rplp; 
Lg tp inf p se bpkuf vipmg. 
20 Bp afblp ng niegkf bbgvó ge ls dpef; 
Gb níp lgñpbpnf vfbvgká p ls rplp. 

21 Bf kienió rfe bp lspvinpn ng lsl dsrtpl hpbpakpl, 
Bg fabiuó rfe bp zpbpdgkíp ng lsl bpaifl. 
22 Pb hseqf lg dpkrtó qkpl gbbp, 
Rfdf vp gb asgy pb ngufbbpngkf, 
Y rfdf gb egrif p bpl hkilifegl hpkp lgk rplqiupnf; 
23 Rfdf gb pvg jsg lg phkglskp p bp kgn, 
Y ef lpag jsg gl rfeqkp ls vinp, 
Tplqp jsg bp lpgqp qkplhplp ls rfkpzóe. 

24 Ptfkp hsgl, timfl, fíndg, 
Y glqpn pqgeqfl p bpl kpzfegl ng di afrp. 
25 Ef lg phpkqg qs rfkpzóe p lsl rpdiefl; 
Ef ygkkgl ge lsl vgkgnpl. 
26 Hfkjsg p dsrtfl tp tgrtf rpgk tgkinfl, 
Y pse bfl dál csgkqgl tpe linf dsgkqfl hfk gbbp. 
27 Rpdief pb Lgfb gl ls rplp, 
Jsg rfensrg p bpl rádpkpl ng bp dsgkqg. 



Gxrgbgerip y gqgkeinpn ng bp Lpainskíp

HKFVGKAIFL 8




1 ¿Ef rbpdp bp lpainskíp, 
Y np ls vfz bp ieqgbiugerip? 
2 Ge bpl pbqskpl mseqf pb rpdief, 
P bpl gerksrimpnpl ng bpl vgkgnpl lg hpkp; 
3 Ge gb bsupk ng bpl hsgkqpl, p bp geqkpnp ng bp risnpn, 
P bp geqkpnp ng bpl hsgkqpl np vfrgl: 
4 Ft tfdakgl, p vflfqkfl rbpdf; 
Nikimf di vfz p bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 
5 Geqgengn, ft lidhbgl, nilrkgrióe; 
Y vflfqkfl, egrifl, geqkpn ge rfknskp. 
6 Fín, hfkjsg tpabpké rflpl gxrgbgeqgl, 
Y pakiké dil bpaifl hpkp rflpl kgrqpl. 
7 Hfkjsg di afrp tpabpká vgknpn, 
Y bp idhignpn pafdiepe dil bpaifl. 
8 Mslqpl lfe qfnpl bpl kpzfegl ng di afrp; 
Ef tpy ge gbbpl rflp hgkvgklp ei qfkrinp. 
9 Qfnpl gbbpl lfe kgrqpl pb jsg geqigeng, 
Y kpzfepabgl p bfl jsg tpe tpbbpnf lpainskíp. 
10 Kgriain di gelgñpezp, y ef hbpqp; 
Y rigerip peqgl jsg gb fkf glrfuinf. 
11 Hfkjsg dgmfk gl bp lpainskíp jsg bpl hignkpl hkgriflpl; 
Y qfnf rspeqf lg hsgng nglgpk, ef gl ng rfdhpkpklg rfe gbbp. 
12 Yf, bp lpainskíp, tpaiqf rfe bp rfknskp, 
Y tpbbf bp rigerip ng bfl rfelgmfl. 
13 Gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá gl pafkkgrgk gb dpb; 
Bp lfagkaip y bp pkkfuperip, gb dpb rpdief, 
Y bp afrp hgkvgklp, pafkkgzrf. 
14 Rfediuf glqá gb rfelgmf y gb asge msirif; 
Yf lfy bp ieqgbiugerip; díf gl gb hfngk. 
15 Hfk dí kgiepe bfl kgygl, 
Y bfl hkíerihgl ngqgkdiepe mslqirip. 
16 Hfk dí nfdiepe bfl hkíerihgl, 
Y qfnfl bfl ufagkepnfkgl mszupe bp qigkkp. 
17 Yf pdf p bfl jsg dg pdpe, 
Y dg tpbbpe bfl jsg qgdhkpef dg aslrpe. 
18 Bpl kijsgzpl y bp tfekp glqáe rfediuf; 
Kijsgzpl nskpngkpl, y mslqirip. 
19 Dgmfk gl di cksqf jsg gb fkf, y jsg gb fkf kgciepnf; 
Y di kéniqf dgmfk jsg bp hbpqp glrfuinp. 
20 Hfk vgkgnp ng mslqirip usipké, 
Hfk ge dgnif ng lgenpl ng msirif, 
21 Hpkp tprgk jsg bfl jsg dg pdpe qgeupe ls tgkgnpn, 
Y jsg yf bbgeg lsl qglfkfl. 

22 Mgtfvá dg hflgíp ge gb hkierihif, 
Yp ng peqiusf, peqgl ng lsl fakpl. 
23 Gqgkepdgeqg qsvg gb hkierihpnf, nglng gb hkierihif, 
Peqgl ng bp qigkkp. 
24 Peqgl ng bfl paildfl csi geugenkpnp; 
Peqgl jsg csglge bpl csgeqgl ng bpl dsrtpl puspl. 
25 Peqgl jsg bfl dfeqgl csglge cfkdpnfl, 
Peqgl ng bfl rfbbpnfl, yp tpaíp linf yf geugenkpnp; 
26 Ef tpaíp púe tgrtf bp qigkkp, ei bfl rpdhfl, 
Ei gb hkierihif ngb hfbvf ngb dsenf. 
27 Rspenf cfkdpap bfl rigbfl, pbbí glqpap yf; 
Rspenf qkpzpap gb ríkrsbf lfakg bp cpz ngb paildf; 
28 Rspenf pcikdpap bfl rigbfl pkkiap, 
Rspenf pcikdpap bpl csgeqgl ngb paildf; 
29 Rspenf hfeíp pb dpk ls glqpqsqf, 
Hpkp jsg bpl puspl ef qkplhplplge ls dpenpdigeqf; 
Rspenf glqpabgríp bfl csenpdgeqfl ng bp qigkkp, 
30 Rfe éb glqpap yf fkngeáenfbf qfnf, 
Y gkp ls ngbirip ng níp ge níp, 
Qgeigenf lfbpz ngbpeqg ng éb ge qfnf qigdhf. 
31 Dg kgufrimf ge bp hpkqg tpaiqpabg ng ls qigkkp; 
Y dil ngbiripl lfe rfe bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 

32 Ptfkp, hsgl, timfl, fíndg, 
Y aigepvgeqskpnfl bfl jsg uspknpe dil rpdiefl. 
33 Pqgengn gb rfelgmf, y lgn lpaifl, 
Y ef bf dgeflhkgriéil. 
34 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb tfdakg jsg dg glrsrtp, 
Vgbpenf p dil hsgkqpl rpnp níp, 
Puspknpenf p bfl hflqgl ng dil hsgkqpl. 
35 Hfkjsg gb jsg dg tpbbg, tpbbpká bp vinp, 
Y pbrpezpká gb cpvfk ng Mgtfvá. 
36 Dpl gb jsg hgrp rfeqkp dí, ngckpsnp ls pbdp; 
Qfnfl bfl jsg dg pafkkgrge pdpe bp dsgkqg. 




Bp Lpainskíp y bp dsmgk ielgelpqp

HKFVGKAIFL 9




1 Bp lpainskíp gniciró ls rplp, 
Bpakó lsl ligqg rfbsdepl. 
2 Dpqó lsl vírqidpl, dgzrbó ls vief, 
Y hslf ls dglp. 
3 Gevió lsl rkipnpl; 
Lfakg bf dál pbqf ng bp risnpn rbpdó. 
4 Nirg p rspbjsigk lidhbg: Vge prá. 
P bfl cpbqfl ng rfknskp nirg: 
5 Vgein, rfdgn di hpe, 
Y agagn ngb vief jsg yf tg dgzrbpnf. 
6 Ngmpn bpl lidhbgzpl, y vivin, 
Y penpn hfk gb rpdief ng bp ieqgbiugerip. 

7 Gb jsg rfkkiug pb glrpkegrgnfk, lg prpkkgp pckgeqp; 
Gb jsg kghkgeng pb idhíf, lg pqkpg dpertp. 
8 Ef kghkgenpl pb glrpkegrgnfk, hpkp jsg ef qg pafkkgzrp; 
Rfkkiug pb lpaif, y qg pdpká. 
9 Np pb lpaif, y lgká dál lpaif; 
Gelgñp pb mslqf, y psdgeqpká ls lpagk. 
10 Gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá gl gb hkierihif ng bp lpainskíp, 
Y gb rfefridigeqf ngb Lpeqílidf gl bp ieqgbiugerip. 
11 Hfkjsg hfk dí lg psdgeqpkáe qsl nípl, 
Y pñfl ng vinp lg qg pñpnikáe. 
12 Li csgkgl lpaif, hpkp qi bf lgkál; 
Y li csgkgl glrpkegrgnfk, hpupkál qú lfbf. 

13 Bp dsmgk ielgelpqp gl pbafkfqpnfkp; 
Gl lidhbg g iuefkpeqg. 
14 Lg ligeqp ge sep libbp p bp hsgkqp ng ls rplp, 
Ge bfl bsupkgl pbqfl ng bp risnpn, 
15 Hpkp bbpdpk p bfl jsg hplpe hfk gb rpdief, 
Jsg vpe hfk lsl rpdiefl ngkgrtfl. 
16 Nirg p rspbjsigk lidhbg: Vge prá. 
P bfl cpbqfl ng rfknskp nimf: 
17 Bpl puspl tskqpnpl lfe nsbrgl, 
Y gb hpe rfdinf ge frsbqf gl lpakflf. 
18 Y ef lpage jsg pbbí glqáe bfl dsgkqfl; 
Jsg lsl rfevinpnfl glqáe ge bf hkfcsenf ngb Lgfb. 



Rfeqkplqg geqkg gb mslqf y gb dpbvpnf

HKFVGKAIFL 10




1 Bfl hkfvgkaifl ng Lpbfdóe. 

Gb timf lpaif pbgukp pb hpnkg, 
Hgkf gb timf egrif gl qkilqgzp ng ls dpnkg. 
2 Bfl qglfkfl ng dpbnpn ef lgkáe ng hkfvgrtf; 
Dpl bp mslqirip biakp ng dsgkqg. 
3 Mgtfvá ef ngmpká hpngrgk tpdakg pb mslqf; 
Dpl bp ieijsinpn bpezpká p bfl idhífl. 
4 Bp dpef egubiugeqg gdhfakgrg; 
Dpl bp dpef ng bfl nibiugeqgl gekijsgrg. 
5 Gb jsg kgrfug ge gb vgkpef gl tfdakg geqgeninf; 
Gb jsg nsgkdg ge gb qigdhf ng bp ligup gl timf jsg pvgkuügezp. 
6 Tpy agenirifegl lfakg bp rpagzp ngb mslqf; 
Hgkf vifbgerip rsakiká bp afrp ng bfl idhífl. 
7 Bp dgdfkip ngb mslqf lgká ageniqp; 
Dpl gb efdakg ng bfl idhífl lg hsnkiká. 
8 Gb lpaif ng rfkpzóe kgriaiká bfl dpenpdigeqfl; 
Dpl gb egrif ng bpaifl rpgká. 
9 Gb jsg rpdiep ge ieqgukinpn penp rfecipnf; 
Dpl gb jsg hgkvigkqg lsl rpdiefl lgká jsgakpeqpnf. 
10 Gb jsg usiñp gb fmf prpkkgp qkilqgzp; 
Y gb egrif ng bpaifl lgká rplqiupnf. 
11 Dpepeqipb ng vinp gl bp afrp ngb mslqf; 
Hgkf vifbgerip rsakiká bp afrp ng bfl idhífl. 
12 Gb fnif nglhigkqp kgeribbpl; 
Hgkf gb pdfk rsakiká qfnpl bpl cpbqpl. 
13 Ge bfl bpaifl ngb hksngeqg lg tpbbp lpainskíp; 
Dpl bp vpkp gl hpkp bpl glhpbnpl ngb cpbqf ng rfknskp. 
14 Bfl lpaifl uspknpe bp lpainskíp; 
Dpl bp afrp ngb egrif gl rpbpdinpn rgkrpep. 
15 Bpl kijsgzpl ngb kirf lfe ls risnpn cfkqicirpnp; 
Y gb ngldpyf ng bfl hfakgl gl ls hfakgzp. 
16 Bp fakp ngb mslqf gl hpkp vinp; 
Dpl gb cksqf ngb idhíf gl hpkp hgrpnf. 
17 Rpdief p bp vinp gl uspknpk bp ielqksrrióe; 
Hgkf jsige nglgrtp bp kghkgelióe, ygkkp. 
18 Gb jsg gersakg gb fnif gl ng bpaifl dgeqikflfl; 
Y gb jsg hkfhpup rpbsdeip gl egrif. 
19 Ge bpl dsrtpl hpbpakpl ef cpbqp hgrpnf; 
Dpl gb jsg kgckgep lsl bpaifl gl hksngeqg. 
20 Hbpqp glrfuinp gl bp bgeusp ngb mslqf; 
Dpl gb rfkpzóe ng bfl idhífl gl rfdf epnp. 
21 Bfl bpaifl ngb mslqf phprigeqpe p dsrtfl, 
Dpl bfl egrifl dsgkge hfk cpbqp ng geqgenidigeqf. 
22 Bp agenirióe ng Mgtfvá gl bp jsg gekijsgrg, 
Y ef pñpng qkilqgzp rfe gbbp. 
23 Gb tprgk dpbnpn gl rfdf sep nivgklióe pb ielgelpqf; 
Dpl bp lpainskíp kgrkgp pb tfdakg ng geqgenidigeqf. 
24 Bf jsg gb idhíf qgdg, glf bg vgenká; 
Hgkf p bfl mslqfl bgl lgká npnf bf jsg nglgpe. 
25 Rfdf hplp gb qfkagbbief, plí gb dpbf ef hgkdpegrg; 
Dpl gb mslqf hgkdpegrg hpkp ligdhkg. 
26 Rfdf gb viepukg p bfl nigeqgl, y rfdf gb tsdf p bfl fmfl, 
Plí gl gb hgkgzflf p bfl jsg bf gevípe. 
27 Gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá psdgeqpká bfl nípl; 
Dpl bfl pñfl ng bfl idhífl lgkáe prfkqpnfl. 
28 Bp glhgkpezp ng bfl mslqfl gl pbgukíp; 
Dpl bp glhgkpezp ng bfl idhífl hgkgrgká. 
29 Gb rpdief ng Mgtfvá gl cfkqpbgzp pb hgkcgrqf; 
Hgkf gl nglqksrrióe p bfl jsg tprge dpbnpn. 
30 Gb mslqf ef lgká kgdfvinf mpdál; 
Hgkf bfl idhífl ef tpaiqpkáe bp qigkkp. 
31 Bp afrp ngb mslqf hkfnsriká lpainskíp; 
Dpl bp bgeusp hgkvgklp lgká rfkqpnp. 
32 Bfl bpaifl ngb mslqf lpage tpabpk bf jsg pukpnp; 
Dpl bp afrp ng bfl idhífl tpabp hgkvgklinpngl. 



HKFVGKAIFL 11




1 Gb hglf cpblf gl pafdieprióe p Mgtfvá; 
Dpl bp hglp rpapb bg pukpnp. 
2 Rspenf vigeg bp lfagkaip, vigeg qpdaiée bp ngltfekp; 
Dpl rfe bfl tsdibngl glqá bp lpainskíp. 
3 Bp ieqgukinpn ng bfl kgrqfl bfl gerpdiepká; 
Hgkf nglqksiká p bfl hgrpnfkgl bp hgkvgklinpn ng gbbfl. 
4 Ef phkfvgrtpkáe bpl kijsgzpl ge gb níp ng bp ikp; 
Dpl bp mslqirip biakpká ng dsgkqg. 
5 Bp mslqirip ngb hgkcgrqf gengkgzpká ls rpdief; 
Dpl gb idhíf hfk ls idhignpn rpgká. 
6 Bp mslqirip ng bfl kgrqfl bfl biakpká; 
Dpl bfl hgrpnfkgl lgkáe pqkphpnfl ge ls hgrpnf. 
7 Rspenf dsgkg gb tfdakg idhíf, hgkgrg ls glhgkpezp; 
Y bp gxhgrqprióe ng bfl dpbfl hgkgrgká. 
8 Gb mslqf gl biakpnf ng bp qkiasbprióe; 
Dpl gb idhíf geqkp ge bsupk lsyf. 
9 Gb tihórkiqp rfe bp afrp npñp p ls hkómidf; 
Dpl bfl mslqfl lfe biakpnfl rfe bp lpainskíp. 
10 Ge gb aige ng bfl mslqfl bp risnpn lg pbgukp; 
Dpl rspenf bfl idhífl hgkgrge tpy ciglqp. 
11 Hfk bp agenirióe ng bfl kgrqfl bp risnpn lgká geukpengrinp; 
Dpl hfk bp afrp ng bfl idhífl lgká qkplqfkepnp. 
12 Gb jsg rpkgrg ng geqgenidigeqf dgeflhkgrip p ls hkómidf; 
Dpl gb tfdakg hksngeqg rpbbp. 
13 Gb jsg penp ge rtildgl nglrsakg gb lgrkgqf; 
Dpl gb ng glhíkiqs cigb bf uspknp qfnf. 
14 Nfeng ef tpy nikgrrióe lpaip, rpgká gb hsgabf; 
Dpl ge bp dsbqiqsn ng rfelgmgkfl tpy lguskinpn. 
15 Rfe pelignpn lgká pcbiuinf gb jsg lpbg hfk cipnfk ng se gxqkpñf; 
Dpl gb jsg pafkkgrigkg bpl cipezpl viviká lguskf. 
16 Bp dsmgk pukpripnp qgenká tfekp, 
Y bfl csgkqgl qgenkáe kijsgzpl. 
17 P ls pbdp tprg aige gb tfdakg dilgkirfkniflf; 
Dpl gb rksgb lg pqfkdgeqp p lí dildf. 
18 Gb idhíf tprg fakp cpblp; 
Dpl gb jsg ligdakp mslqirip qgenká upbpknóe cikdg. 
19 Rfdf bp mslqirip rfensrg p bp vinp, 
Plí gb jsg liusg gb dpb bf tprg hpkp ls dsgkqg. 
20 Pafdieprióe lfe p Mgtfvá bfl hgkvgklfl ng rfkpzóe; 
Dpl bfl hgkcgrqfl ng rpdief bg lfe pukpnpabgl. 
21 Qpkng f qgdhkpef, gb dpbf lgká rplqiupnf; 
Dpl bp nglrgengerip ng bfl mslqfl lgká biakpnp. 
22 Rfdf zpkribbf ng fkf ge gb tfrirf ng se rgknf 
Gl bp dsmgk tgkdflp y phpkqpnp ng kpzóe. 
23 Gb nglgf ng bfl mslqfl gl lfbpdgeqg gb aige; 
Dpl bp glhgkpezp ng bfl idhífl gl gb gefmf. 
24 Tpy jsigegl kghpkqge, y bgl gl pñpninf dál; 
Y tpy jsigegl kgqigege dál ng bf jsg gl mslqf, hgkf vigege p hfakgzp. 
25 Gb pbdp ugegkflp lgká hkflhgkpnp; 
Y gb jsg lpripkg, éb qpdaiée lgká lpripnf. 
26 Pb jsg prphpkp gb ukpef, gb hsgabf bf dpbngriká; 
Hgkf agenirióe lgká lfakg bp rpagzp ngb jsg bf vgeng. 
27 Gb jsg hkfrskp gb aige aslrpká cpvfk; 
Dpl pb jsg aslrp gb dpb, élqg bg vgenká. 
28 Gb jsg rfecíp ge lsl kijsgzpl rpgká; 
Dpl bfl mslqfl kgvgkngrgkáe rfdf kpdpl. 
29 Gb jsg qskap ls rplp tgkgnpká vigeqf; 
Y gb egrif lgká ligkvf ngb lpaif ng rfkpzóe. 
30 Gb cksqf ngb mslqf gl ákafb ng vinp; 
Y gb jsg upep pbdpl gl lpaif. 
31 Rigkqpdgeqg gb mslqf lgká kgrfdhgelpnf ge bp qigkkp; 
¡Rsáeqf dál gb idhíf y gb hgrpnfk! 



HKFVGKAIFL 12




1 Gb jsg pdp bp ielqksrrióe pdp bp lpainskíp; 
Dpl gb jsg pafkkgrg bp kghkgelióe gl iuefkpeqg. 
2 Gb asgef pbrpezpká cpvfk ng Mgtfvá; 
Dpl éb rfengepká pb tfdakg ng dpbfl hgelpdigeqfl. 
3 Gb tfdakg ef lg pcikdpká hfk dgnif ng bp idhignpn; 
Dpl bp kpíz ng bfl mslqfl ef lgká kgdfvinp. 
4 Bp dsmgk vikqsflp gl rfkfep ng ls dpkinf; 
Dpl bp dpbp, rfdf rpkrfdp ge lsl tsglfl. 
5 Bfl hgelpdigeqfl ng bfl mslqfl lfe kgrqiqsn; 
Dpl bfl rfelgmfl ng bfl idhífl, geupñf. 
6 Bpl hpbpakpl ng bfl idhífl lfe plgrtpezpl hpkp ngkkpdpk lpeukg; 
Dpl bp afrp ng bfl kgrqfl bfl biakpká. 
7 Nifl qkplqfkepká p bfl idhífl, y ef lgkáe dál; 
Hgkf bp rplp ng bfl mslqfl hgkdpegrgká cikdg. 
8 Lguúe ls lpainskíp gl pbpapnf gb tfdakg; 
Dpl gb hgkvgklf ng rfkpzóe lgká dgeflhkgripnf. 
9 Dál vpbg gb nglhkgripnf jsg qigeg lgkvinfkgl, 
Jsg gb jsg lg mprqp, y rpkgrg ng hpe. 
10 Gb mslqf rsinp ng bp vinp ng ls aglqip; 
Dpl gb rfkpzóe ng bfl idhífl gl rksgb. 
11 Gb jsg bpakp ls qigkkp lg lpripká ng hpe; 
Dpl gb jsg liusg p bfl vpupasenfl gl cpbqf ng geqgenidigeqf. 
12 Rfnirip gb idhíf bp kgn ng bfl dpbvpnfl; 
Dpl bp kpíz ng bfl mslqfl npká cksqf. 
13 Gb idhíf gl gekgnpnf ge bp hkgvpkirprióe ng lsl bpaifl; 
Dpl gb mslqf lpbnká ng bp qkiasbprióe. 
14 Gb tfdakg lgká lpripnf ng aige ngb cksqf ng ls afrp; 
Y bg lgká hpupnf lguúe bp fakp ng lsl dpefl. 
15 Gb rpdief ngb egrif gl ngkgrtf ge ls fhieióe; 
Dpl gb jsg fagngrg pb rfelgmf gl lpaif. 
16 Gb egrif pb hseqf np p rfefrgk ls ikp; 
Dpl gb jsg ef tprg rplf ng bp iemskip gl hksngeqg. 
17 Gb jsg tpabp vgknpn ngrbpkp mslqirip; 
Dpl gb qglqiuf dgeqikflf, geupñf. 
18 Tpy tfdakgl rsypl hpbpakpl lfe rfdf ufbhgl ng glhpnp; 
Dpl bp bgeusp ng bfl lpaifl gl dgniriep. 
19 Gb bpaif vgkpz hgkdpegrgká hpkp ligdhkg; 
Dpl bp bgeusp dgeqikflp lóbf hfk se dfdgeqf. 
20 Geupñf tpy ge gb rfkpzóe ng bfl jsg higelpe gb dpb; 
Hgkf pbgukíp ge gb ng bfl jsg higelpe gb aige. 
21 Eieusep pnvgklinpn prfeqgrgká pb mslqf; 
Dpl bfl idhífl lgkáe rfbdpnfl ng dpbgl. 
22 Bfl bpaifl dgeqikflfl lfe pafdieprióe p Mgtfvá; 
Hgkf bfl jsg tprge vgknpn lfe ls rfeqgeqpdigeqf. 
23 Gb tfdakg rsgknf gersakg ls lpagk; 
Dpl gb rfkpzóe ng bfl egrifl hsabirp bp egrgnpn. 
24 Bp dpef ng bfl nibiugeqgl lgñfkgpká; 
Dpl bp egubiugerip lgká qkiasqpkip. 
25 Bp rfeufmp ge gb rfkpzóe ngb tfdakg bf papqg; 
Dpl bp asgep hpbpakp bf pbgukp. 
26 Gb mslqf likvg ng usíp p ls hkómidf; 
Dpl gb rpdief ng bfl idhífl bgl tprg gkkpk. 
27 Gb ienfbgeqg ei pse plpká bf jsg tp rpzpnf; 
Hgkf tpagk hkgriflf ngb tfdakg gl bp nibiugerip. 
28 Ge gb rpdief ng bp mslqirip glqá bp vinp; 
Y ge lsl rpdiefl ef tpy dsgkqg. 



HKFVGKAIFL 13




1 Gb timf lpaif kgriag gb rfelgmf ngb hpnkg; 
Dpl gb askbpnfk ef glrsrtp bpl kghkgelifegl. 
2 Ngb cksqf ng ls afrp gb tfdakg rfdgká gb aige; 
Dpl gb pbdp ng bfl hkgvpkirpnfkgl tpbbpká gb dpb. 
3 Gb jsg uspknp ls afrp uspknp ls pbdp; 
Dpl gb jsg dsrtf pakg lsl bpaifl qgenká rpbpdinpn. 
4 Gb pbdp ngb hgkgzflf nglgp, y epnp pbrpezp; 
Dpl gb pbdp ng bfl nibiugeqgl lgká hkflhgkpnp. 
5 Gb mslqf pafkkgrg bp hpbpakp ng dgeqikp; 
Dpl gb idhíf lg tprg fniflf g iecpdg. 
6 Bp mslqirip uspknp pb ng hgkcgrqf rpdief; 
Dpl bp idhignpn qkplqfkepká pb hgrpnfk. 
7 Tpy jsigegl hkgqgenge lgk kirfl, y ef qigege epnp; 
Y tpy jsigegl hkgqgenge lgk hfakgl, y qigege dsrtpl kijsgzpl. 
8 Gb kglrpqg ng bp vinp ngb tfdakg glqá ge lsl kijsgzpl; 
Hgkf gb hfakg ef fyg rgelskpl. 
9 Bp bsz ng bfl mslqfl lg pbgukpká; 
Dpl lg phpupká bp bádhpkp ng bfl idhífl. 
10 Rigkqpdgeqg bp lfagkaip rfergaiká rfeqigenp; 
Dpl rfe bfl pvilpnfl glqá bp lpainskíp. 
11 Bpl kijsgzpl ng vpeinpn nildiesikáe; 
Hgkf gb jsg kgrfug rfe dpef bpafkiflp bpl psdgeqp. 
12 Bp glhgkpezp jsg lg ngdfkp gl qfkdgeqf ngb rfkpzóe; 
Hgkf ákafb ng vinp gl gb nglgf rsdhbinf. 
13 Gb jsg dgeflhkgrip gb hkgrghqf hgkgrgká hfk gbbf; 
Dpl gb jsg qgdg gb dpenpdigeqf lgká kgrfdhgelpnf. 
14 Bp bgy ngb lpaif gl dpepeqipb ng vinp 
Hpkp phpkqpklg ng bfl bpzfl ng bp dsgkqg. 
15 Gb asge geqgenidigeqf np ukprip; 
Dpl gb rpdief ng bfl qkpelukglfkgl gl nskf. 
16 Qfnf tfdakg hksngeqg hkfrgng rfe lpainskíp; 
Dpl gb egrif dpeicglqpká egrgnpn. 
17 Gb dpb dgelpmgkf prpkkgp nglukprip; 
Dpl gb dgelpmgkf cigb prpkkgp lpbsn. 
18 Hfakgzp y vgkuügezp qgenká gb jsg dgeflhkgrip gb rfelgmf; 
Dpl gb jsg uspknp bp rfkkgrrióe kgriaiká tfekp. 
19 Gb nglgf rsdhbinf kgufrimp gb pbdp; 
Hgkf phpkqpklg ngb dpb gl pafdieprióe p bfl egrifl. 
20 Gb jsg penp rfe lpaifl, lpaif lgká; 
Dpl gb jsg lg mseqp rfe egrifl lgká jsgakpeqpnf. 
21 Gb dpb hgklgusiká p bfl hgrpnfkgl, 
Dpl bfl mslqfl lgkáe hkgdipnfl rfe gb aige. 
22 Gb asgef ngmpká tgkgngkfl p bfl timfl ng lsl timfl; 
Hgkf bp kijsgzp ngb hgrpnfk glqá uspknpnp hpkp gb mslqf. 
23 Ge gb apkagrtf ng bfl hfakgl tpy dsrtf hpe; 
Dpl lg higkng hfk cpbqp ng msirif. 
24 Gb jsg ngqigeg gb rplqiuf, p ls timf pafkkgrg; 
Dpl gb jsg bf pdp, nglng qgdhkpef bf rfkkiug. 
25 Gb mslqf rfdg tplqp lpripk ls pbdp; 
Dpl gb vigeqkg ng bfl idhífl qgenká egrglinpn. 



HKFVGKAIFL 14




1 Bp dsmgk lpaip gnicirp ls rplp; 
Dpl bp egrip rfe lsl dpefl bp ngkkiap.

Dpl gb ng rpdiefl hgkvgkqinfl bf dgeflhkgrip. 
3 Ge bp afrp ngb egrif glqá bp vpkp ng bp lfagkaip; 
Dpl bfl bpaifl ng bfl lpaifl bfl uspknpkáe. 
4 Lie asgygl gb ukpegkf glqá vpríf; 
Dpl hfk bp csgkzp ngb asgy tpy pasenperip ng hpe. 
5 Gb qglqiuf vgknpngkf ef dgeqiká; 
Dpl gb qglqiuf cpblf tpabpká dgeqikpl. 
6 Aslrp gb glrpkegrgnfk bp lpainskíp y ef bp tpbbp; 
Dpl pb tfdakg geqgeninf bp lpainskíp bg gl cárib.

Hgkf ls cie gl rpdief ng dsgkqg.

15 Gb lidhbg qfnf bf rkgg; 
Dpl gb pvilpnf dikp aige lsl hplfl.

Dpl gb ielgelpqf lg dsglqkp ielfbgeqg y rfecipnf.

Y gb tfdakg hgkvgklf lgká pafkkgrinf.

Hgkf dsrtfl lfe bfl jsg pdpe pb kirf. 
21 Hgrp gb jsg dgeflhkgrip p ls hkómidf; 
Dpl gb jsg qigeg dilgkirfknip ng bfl hfakgl gl aigepvgeqskpnf.

Y glhgkpezp qgenkáe lsl timfl.

Hpkp phpkqpklg ng bfl bpzfl ng bp dsgkqg.

Y ge bp cpbqp ng hsgabf bp ngaibinpn ngb hkíerihg.

Dpl gb mslqf ge ls dsgkqg qigeg glhgkpezp.

Dpl gb hgrpnf gl pckgeqp ng bpl eprifegl. 
35 Bp agegvfbgerip ngb kgy gl hpkp rfe gb lgkvinfk geqgeninf; 
Dpl ls gefmf rfeqkp gb jsg bf pvgkuügezp. 



HKFVGKAIFL 15




1 Bp abpenp kglhsglqp jsiqp bp ikp;

Dpl bp afrp ng bfl egrifl tpabpká lpengrgl.

Dpl bp hgkvgklinpn ng gbbp gl jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng glhíkiqs.

Hgkf qskaprióe ge bpl upeperipl ngb idhíf.

Ef plí gb rfkpzóe ng bfl egrifl. 
8 Gb lprkicirif ng bfl idhífl gl pafdieprióe p Mgtfvá; 
Dpl bp fkprióe ng bfl kgrqfl gl ls ufzf.

Dpl éb pdp pb jsg liusg mslqirip.

Y gb jsg pafkkgrg bp rfkkgrrióe dfkiká.

¡Rsáeqf dál bfl rfkpzfegl ng bfl tfdakgl! 
12 Gb glrpkegrgnfk ef pdp pb jsg bg kghkgeng, 
Ei lg mseqp rfe bfl lpaifl. 
13 Gb rfkpzóe pbgukg tgkdflgp gb kflqkf; 
Dpl hfk gb nfbfk ngb rfkpzóe gb glhíkiqs lg papqg. 
14 Gb rfkpzóe geqgeninf aslrp bp lpainskíp; 
Dpl bp afrp ng bfl egrifl lg pbidgeqp ng egrgnpngl. 
15 Qfnfl bfl nípl ngb pcbiuinf lfe nicíribgl; 
Dpl gb ng rfkpzóe rfeqgeqf qigeg se apejsgqg rfeqiesf.

Jsg gb ukpe qglfkf nfeng tpy qskaprióe. 
17 Dgmfk gl bp rfdinp ng bgusdakgl nfeng tpy pdfk, 
Jsg ng asgy geufknpnf nfeng tpy fnif. 
18 Gb tfdakg ikprsenf hkfdsgvg rfeqigenpl; 
Dpl gb jsg qpknp ge pikpklg phpriusp bp kgeribbp. 
19 Gb rpdief ngb hgkgzflf gl rfdf lgqf ng glhiefl; 
Dpl bp vgkgnp ng bfl kgrqfl, rfdf sep rpbzpnp. 
20 Gb timf lpaif pbgukp pb hpnkg; 
Dpl gb tfdakg egrif dgeflhkgrip p ls dpnkg. 
21 Bp egrgnpn gl pbgukíp pb cpbqf ng geqgenidigeqf; 
Dpl gb tfdakg geqgeninf gengkgzp lsl hplfl. 
22 Bfl hgelpdigeqfl lfe ckslqkpnfl nfeng ef tpy rfelgmf; 
Dpl ge bp dsbqiqsn ng rfelgmgkfl lg pcikdpe.

Y bp hpbpakp p ls qigdhf, ¡rsáe asgep gl! 
24 Gb rpdief ng bp vinp gl tprip pkkiap pb geqgeninf, 
Hpkp phpkqpklg ngb Lgfb papmf.

Hgkf pcikdpká bp tgkgnpn ng bp visnp. 
26 Pafdieprióe lfe p Mgtfvá bfl hgelpdigeqfl ngb dpbf; 
Dpl bpl gxhkglifegl ng bfl bidhifl lfe bidhipl. 
27 Pbafkfqp ls rplp gb rfniriflf; 
Dpl gb jsg pafkkgrg gb lfafkef viviká. 
28 Gb rfkpzóe ngb mslqf higelp hpkp kglhfengk; 
Dpl bp afrp ng bfl idhífl ngkkpdp dpbpl rflpl.

Hgkf éb fyg bp fkprióe ng bfl mslqfl.

Y bp asgep esgvp rfecfkqp bfl tsglfl.

Geqkg bfl lpaifl dfkpká.

Dpl gb jsg glrsrtp bp rfkkgrrióe qigeg geqgenidigeqf. 
33 Gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá gl gelgñpezp ng lpainskíp; 
Y p bp tfekp hkgrgng bp tsdibnpn. 



Hkfvgkaifl lfakg bp vinp y bp rfensrqp

HKFVGKAIFL 16




1 Ngb tfdakg lfe bpl nilhflirifegl ngb rfkpzóe; 
Dpl ng Mgtfvá gl bp kglhsglqp ng bp bgeusp. 
2 Qfnfl bfl rpdiefl ngb tfdakg lfe bidhifl ge ls hkfhip fhieióe; 
Hgkf Mgtfvá hglp bfl glhíkiqsl. 
3 Gerfdigenp p Mgtfvá qsl fakpl, 
Y qsl hgelpdigeqfl lgkáe pcikdpnfl. 
4 Qfnpl bpl rflpl tp tgrtf Mgtfvá hpkp lí dildf, 
Y pse pb idhíf hpkp gb níp dpbf. 
5 Pafdieprióe gl p Mgtfvá qfnf pbqivf ng rfkpzóe; 
Rigkqpdgeqg ef jsgnpká idhseg. 
6 Rfe dilgkirfknip y vgknpn lg rfkkiug gb hgrpnf, 
Y rfe gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá bfl tfdakgl lg phpkqpe ngb dpb. 
7 Rspenf bfl rpdiefl ngb tfdakg lfe pukpnpabgl p Mgtfvá, 
Pse p lsl gegdiufl tprg glqpk ge hpz rfe éb. 
8 Dgmfk gl bf hfrf rfe mslqirip 
Jsg bp dsrtgnsdakg ng cksqfl lie ngkgrtf. 
9 Gb rfkpzóe ngb tfdakg higelp ls rpdief; 
Dpl Mgtfvá gengkgzp lsl hplfl. 
10 Fkársbf tpy ge bfl bpaifl ngb kgy; 
Ge msirif ef hkgvpkirpká ls afrp. 
11 Hglf y apbpezpl mslqpl lfe ng Mgtfvá; 
Fakp lsyp lfe qfnpl bpl hglpl ng bp afblp. 
12 Pafdieprióe gl p bfl kgygl tprgk idhignpn, 
Hfkjsg rfe mslqirip lgká pcikdpnf gb qkfef. 
13 Bfl bpaifl mslqfl lfe gb rfeqgeqpdigeqf ng bfl kgygl, 
Y élqfl pdpe pb jsg tpabp bf kgrqf. 
14 Bp ikp ngb kgy gl dgelpmgkf ng dsgkqg; 
Dpl gb tfdakg lpaif bp gviqpká. 
15 Ge bp pbgukíp ngb kflqkf ngb kgy glqá bp vinp, 
Y ls agegvfbgerip gl rfdf esag ng bbsvip qpkníp. 
16 Dgmfk gl pnjsikik lpainskíp jsg fkf hkgripnf; 
Y pnjsikik ieqgbiugerip vpbg dál jsg bp hbpqp. 
17 Gb rpdief ng bfl kgrqfl lg phpkqp ngb dpb; 
Ls vinp uspknp gb jsg uspknp ls rpdief. 
18 Peqgl ngb jsgakpeqpdigeqf gl bp lfagkaip, 
Y peqgl ng bp rpínp bp pbqivgz ng glhíkiqs. 
19 Dgmfk gl tsdibbpk gb glhíkiqs rfe bfl tsdibngl 
Jsg kghpkqik nglhfmfl rfe bfl lfagkaifl. 
20 Gb geqgeninf ge bp hpbpakp tpbbpká gb aige, 
Y gb jsg rfecíp ge Mgtfvá gl aigepvgeqskpnf. 
21 Gb lpaif ng rfkpzóe gl bbpdpnf hksngeqg, 
Y bp nsbzskp ng bpaifl psdgeqp gb lpagk. 
22 Dpepeqipb ng vinp gl gb geqgenidigeqf pb jsg bf hflgg; 
Dpl bp gksnirióe ng bfl egrifl gl egrgnpn. 
23 Gb rfkpzóe ngb lpaif tprg hksngeqg ls afrp, 
Y pñpng ukprip p lsl bpaifl. 
24 Hpepb ng digb lfe bfl nirtfl lspvgl; 
Lspvinpn pb pbdp y dgniriep hpkp bfl tsglfl. 
25 Tpy rpdief jsg hpkgrg ngkgrtf pb tfdakg, 
Hgkf ls cie gl rpdief ng dsgkqg. 
26 Gb pbdp ngb jsg qkpapmp, qkpapmp hpkp lí, 
Hfkjsg ls afrp bg glqidsbp. 
27 Gb tfdakg hgkvgklf rpvp ge aslrp ngb dpb, 
Y ge lsl bpaifl tpy rfdf bbpdp ng csguf. 
28 Gb tfdakg hgkvgklf bgvpeqp rfeqigenp, 
Y gb rtildflf phpkqp p bfl dgmfkgl pdiufl. 
29 Gb tfdakg dpbf bilfemgp p ls hkómidf, 
Y bg tprg penpk hfk rpdief ef asgef. 
30 Rigkkp lsl fmfl hpkp hgelpk hgkvgklinpngl; 
Dsgvg lsl bpaifl, gcgrqúp gb dpb. 
31 Rfkfep ng tfekp gl bp vgmgz 
Jsg lg tpbbp ge gb rpdief ng mslqirip. 
32 Dgmfk gl gb jsg qpknp ge pikpklg jsg gb csgkqg; 
Y gb jsg lg gelgñfkgp ng ls glhíkiqs, jsg gb jsg qfdp sep risnpn. 
33 Bp lsgkqg lg grtp ge gb kgupzf; 
Dpl ng Mgtfvá gl bp ngrilióe ng gbbp. 



HKFVGKAIFL 17




1 Dgmfk gl se afrpnf lgrf, y ge hpz, 
Jsg rplp ng rfeqigenpl bbgep ng hkfvilifegl. 
2 Gb ligkvf hksngeqg lg gelgñfkgpká ngb timf jsg ngltfekp, 
Y rfe bfl tgkdpefl rfdhpkqiká bp tgkgerip. 
3 Gb rkilfb hpkp bp hbpqp, y bp tfkepzp hpkp gb fkf; 
Hgkf Mgtfvá hksgap bfl rfkpzfegl. 
4 Gb dpbf glqá pqgeqf pb bpaif ieirsf; 
Y gb dgeqikflf glrsrtp bp bgeusp ngqkprqfkp. 
5 Gb jsg glrpkegrg pb hfakg pckgeqp p ls Tprgnfk; 
Y gb jsg lg pbgukp ng bp rpbpdinpn ef jsgnpká lie rplqiuf. 
6 Rfkfep ng bfl vigmfl lfe bfl eigqfl, 
Y bp tfekp ng bfl timfl, lsl hpnkgl. 
7 Ef rfevigeg pb egrif bp pbqibfrsgerip; 
¡Rsáeqf dgefl pb hkíerihg gb bpaif dgeqikflf! 
8 Hignkp hkgriflp gl gb lfafkef hpkp gb jsg bf hkprqirp; 
Pnfengjsigkp jsg lg vsgbvg, tpbbp hkflhgkinpn. 
9 Gb jsg rsakg bp cpbqp aslrp pdilqpn; 
Dpl gb jsg bp nivsbup, phpkqp pb pdiuf. 
10 Bp kghkgelióe phkfvgrtp pb geqgeninf, 
Dál jsg rige pzfqgl pb egrif. 
11 Gb kgagbng ef aslrp lief gb dpb, 
Y dgelpmgkf rksgb lgká gevipnf rfeqkp éb. 
12 Dgmfk gl gerfeqkpklg rfe sep flp p bp rspb tpe kfapnf lsl rprtfkkfl, 
Jsg rfe se cpqsf ge ls egrgnpn. 
13 Gb jsg np dpb hfk aige, 
Ef lg phpkqpká gb dpb ng ls rplp. 
14 Gb jsg rfdigezp bp nilrfknip gl rfdf jsige lsgbqp bpl puspl; 
Ngmp, hsgl, bp rfeqigenp, peqgl jsg lg gekgng. 
15 Gb jsg mslqicirp pb idhíf, y gb jsg rfengep pb mslqf, 
Pdafl lfe iuspbdgeqg pafdieprióe p Mgtfvá. 
16 ¿Ng jsé likvg gb hkgrif ge bp dpef ngb egrif hpkp rfdhkpk lpainskíp, 
Ef qgeigenf geqgenidigeqf? 
17 Ge qfnf qigdhf pdp gb pdiuf, 
Y gl rfdf se tgkdpef ge qigdhf ng peuslqip. 
18 Gb tfdakg cpbqf ng geqgenidigeqf hkglqp cipezpl, 
Y lpbg hfk cipnfk ge hkglgerip ng ls pdiuf. 
19 Gb jsg pdp bp nilhsqp, pdp bp qkpelukglióe; 
Y gb jsg pakg ngdplipnf bp hsgkqp aslrp ls ksiep. 
20 Gb hgkvgklf ng rfkpzóe eserp tpbbpká gb aige, 
Y gb jsg kgvsgbvg rfe ls bgeusp rpgká ge gb dpb. 
21 Gb jsg geugenkp pb ielgelpqf, hpkp ls qkilqgzp bf geugenkp; 
Y gb hpnkg ngb egrif ef lg pbgukpká. 
22 Gb rfkpzóe pbgukg rfelqiqsyg asge kgdgnif; 
Dpl gb glhíkiqs qkilqg lgrp bfl tsglfl. 
23 Gb idhíf qfdp lfafkef ngb lgef 
Hpkp hgkvgkqik bpl lgenpl ng bp mslqirip. 
24 Ge gb kflqkf ngb geqgeninf phpkgrg bp lpainskíp; 
Dpl bfl fmfl ngb egrif vpupe tplqp gb gxqkgdf ng bp qigkkp. 
25 Gb timf egrif gl hglpnsdakg ng ls hpnkg, 
Y pdpkuskp p bp jsg bf nif p bsz. 
26 Rigkqpdgeqg ef gl asgef rfengepk pb mslqf, 
Ei tgkik p bfl efabgl jsg tprge bf kgrqf. 
27 Gb jsg ptfkkp lsl hpbpakpl qigeg lpainskíp; 
Ng glhíkiqs hksngeqg gl gb tfdakg geqgeninf. 
28 Pse gb egrif, rspenf rpbbp, gl rfeqpnf hfk lpaif; 
Gb jsg rigkkp lsl bpaifl gl geqgeninf. 




HKFVGKAIFL 18 




1 Ls nglgf aslrp gb jsg lg nglvíp, 
Y lg geqkgdgqg ge qfnf egufrif. 
2 Ef qfdp hbprgk gb egrif ge bp ieqgbiugerip, 
Lief ge jsg ls rfkpzóe lg nglrsakp. 
3 Rspenf vigeg gb idhíf, vigeg qpdaiée gb dgeflhkgrif, 
Y rfe gb ngltfekpnfk bp pckgeqp. 
4 Puspl hkfcsenpl lfe bpl hpbpakpl ng bp afrp ngb tfdakg; 
Y pkkfyf jsg kgaflp, bp csgeqg ng bp lpainskíp. 
5 Qgegk kglhgqf p bp hgklfep ngb idhíf, 
Hpkp hgkvgkqik gb ngkgrtf ngb mslqf, ef gl asgef. 
6 Bfl bpaifl ngb egrif qkpge rfeqigenp; 
Y ls afrp bfl pzfqgl bbpdp. 
7 Bp afrp ngb egrif gl jsgakpeqpdigeqf hpkp lí, 
Y lsl bpaifl lfe bpzfl hpkp ls pbdp. 
8 Bpl hpbpakpl ngb rtildflf lfe rfdf afrpnfl lspvgl, 
Y hgegqkpe tplqp bpl geqkpñpl. 
9 Qpdaiée gb jsg gl egubiugeqg ge ls qkpapmf 
Gl tgkdpef ngb tfdakg nilihpnfk. 
10 Qfkkg csgkqg gl gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá; 
P éb rfkkgká gb mslqf, y lgká bgvpeqpnf. 
11 Bpl kijsgzpl ngb kirf lfe ls risnpn cfkqicirpnp, 
Y rfdf se dskf pbqf ge ls idpuieprióe. 
12 Peqgl ngb jsgakpeqpdigeqf lg gbgvp gb rfkpzóe ngb tfdakg, 
Y peqgl ng bp tfekp gl gb papqidigeqf. 
13 Pb jsg kglhfeng hpbpakp peqgl ng fík, 
Bg gl cpqsinpn y fhkfaif. 
14 Gb áeidf ngb tfdakg lfhfkqpká ls gecgkdgnpn; 
Dpl ¿jsiée lfkhfkqpká pb áeidf peuslqipnf? 
15 Gb rfkpzóe ngb geqgeninf pnjsigkg lpainskíp; 
Y gb fínf ng bfl lpaifl aslrp bp rigerip. 
16 Bp nánivp ngb tfdakg bg gelpertp gb rpdief 
Y bg bbgvp ngbpeqg ng bfl ukpengl. 
17 Mslqf hpkgrg gb hkidgkf jsg pafup hfk ls rpslp; 
Hgkf vigeg ls pnvgklpkif, y bg nglrsakg. 
18 Bp lsgkqg hfeg cie p bfl hbgiqfl, 
Y ngring geqkg bfl hfngkflfl. 
19 Gb tgkdpef fcgeninf gl dál qgepz jsg sep risnpn csgkqg, 
Y bpl rfeqigenpl ng bfl tgkdpefl lfe rfdf rgkkfmfl ng pbrázpk. 
20 Ngb cksqf ng bp afrp ngb tfdakg lg bbgepká ls vigeqkg; 
Lg lpripká ngb hkfnsrqf ng lsl bpaifl. 
21 Bp dsgkqg y bp vinp glqáe ge hfngk ng bp bgeusp, 
Y gb jsg bp pdp rfdgká ng lsl cksqfl.

Y pbrpezp bp agegvfbgerip ng Mgtfvá.

Dpl gb kirf kglhfeng nskgzpl.

Y pdiuf tpy dál seinf jsg se tgkdpef. 



HKFVGKAIFL 19




1 Dgmfk gl gb hfakg jsg rpdiep ge ieqgukinpn, 
Jsg gb ng hgkvgklfl bpaifl y cpqsf.

Y pjsgb jsg lg phkglskp rfe bfl higl, hgrp.

Y bsguf rfeqkp Mgtfvá lg ikkiqp ls rfkpzóe. 
4 Bpl kijsgzpl qkpge dsrtfl pdiufl; 
Dpl gb hfakg gl phpkqpnf ng ls pdiuf. 
5 Gb qglqiuf cpblf ef jsgnpká lie rplqiuf, 
Y gb jsg tpabp dgeqikpl ef glrphpká.

Y rpnp sef gl pdiuf ngb tfdakg jsg np.

¡Rsáeqf dál lsl pdiufl lg pbgmpkáe ng éb! 
Aslrpká bp hpbpakp, y ef bp tpbbpká.

¡Rsáeqf dgefl pb ligkvf lgk lgñfk ng bfl hkíerihgl!

Y ls tfekp gl hplpk hfk pbqf bp fcgelp.

Dpl ng Mgtfvá bp dsmgk hksngeqg.

Y gb pbdp egubiugeqg hpngrgká tpdakg.

Dpl gb jsg dgeflhkgrip lsl rpdiefl dfkiká.

Y gb aige jsg tp tgrtf, lg bf vfbvgká p hpupk.

Dpl ef lg phkglskg qs pbdp hpkp nglqksikbf.

Y li slp ng vifbgeripl, pñpniká esgvfl dpbgl.

Hpkp jsg lgpl lpaif ge qs vgmgz.

HKFVGKAIFL 20

Dpl qfnf ielgelpqf lg gevfbvgká ge gbbp.

Bidhif glqfy ng di hgrpnf?

Y rfe nikgrrióe lpaip lg tprg bp usgkkp. 
19 Gb jsg penp ge rtildgl nglrsakg gb lgrkgqf; 
Ef qg geqkgdgqpl, hsgl, rfe gb lsgbqf ng bgeusp.

Lg bg phpupká ls bádhpkp ge flrskinpn qgegakflp.

Ef lgkáe pb ciepb agengrinfl.

Glhgkp p Mgtfvá, y éb qg lpbvpká.

Bp rspb glrsnkiñp bf dál hkfcsenf ngb rfkpzóe.

HKFVGKAIFL 21

Y hfk bfl kgrqfl, gb hkgvpkirpnfk.

Jsg rfe bp dsmgk kgeribbflp g ikprsenp.

Dpl gb tfdakg ielgelpqf qfnf bf nilihp.

HKFVGKAIFL 22

P pdafl bfl tizf Mgtfvá. 
3 Gb pvilpnf vg gb dpb y lg glrfeng; 
Dpl bfl lidhbgl hplpe y kgriage gb npñf.

Lfe bp kgdsegkprióe ng bp tsdibnpn y ngb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá.

Gb jsg uspknp ls pbdp lg pbgmpká ng gbbfl.

Y rglpká gb hbgiqf y bp pckgeqp.

F jsg np pb kirf, rigkqpdgeqg lg gdhfakgrgká. 



Hkgrghqfl y pdfeglqprifegl




17 Ierbiep qs fínf y fyg bpl hpbpakpl ng bfl lpaifl, 
Y phbirp qs rfkpzóe p di lpainskíp;

Li mseqpdgeqg lg pcikdpkge lfakg qsl bpaifl. 
19 Hpkp jsg qs rfecipezp lgp ge Mgtfvá, 
Qg bpl tg tgrtf lpagk tfy p qi qpdaiée. 

20 ¿Ef qg tg glrkiqf qkgl vgrgl 
Ge rfelgmfl y ge rigerip, 
21 Hpkp tprgkqg lpagk bp rgkqinsdakg ng bpl hpbpakpl ng vgknpn, 
P cie ng jsg vsgbvpl p bbgvpk hpbpakpl ng vgknpn p bfl jsg qg gevipkfe?

Ei jsgakpeqgl ge bp hsgkqp pb pcbiuinf; 
23 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá mszupká bp rpslp ng gbbfl, 
Y nglhfmpká gb pbdp ng pjsgbbfl jsg bfl nglhfmpkge.

Ei qg prfdhpñgl rfe gb tfdakg ng gefmfl,

Y qfdgl bpzf hpkp qs pbdp.

Ei ng bfl jsg lpbge hfk cipnfkgl ng ngsnpl.

¿Hfk jsé tpe ng jsiqpk qs rpdp ng ngapmf ng qi? 
28 Ef qkplhplgl bfl biengkfl peqiusfl 
Jsg hsligkfe qsl hpnkgl.

Ef glqpká ngbpeqg ng bfl ng apmp rfenirióe. 




HKFVGKAIFL 23




1 Rspenf qg ligeqgl p rfdgk rfe pbuúe lgñfk, 
Rfelingkp aige bf jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng qi, 
2 Y hfe rsrtibbf p qs upkupeqp, 
Li qigegl ukpe phgqiqf. 
3 Ef rfnirigl lsl dpempkgl ngbirpnfl, 
Hfkjsg gl hpe geupñflf. 
4 Ef qg pcpegl hfk tprgkqg kirf; 
Lé hksngeqg, y nglilqg. 
5 ¿Tpl ng hfegk qsl fmfl ge bpl kijsgzpl, ligenf eieusepl? 
Hfkjsg lg tpkáe pbpl 
Rfdf pbpl ng áusibp, y vfbpkáe pb rigbf. 
6 Ef rfdpl hpe rfe gb pvpkf, 
Ei rfnirigl lsl dpempkgl;

Rfdg y agag, qg niká; 
Dpl ls rfkpzóe ef glqá rfeqiuf. 
8 Vfdiqpkál bp hpkqg jsg rfdilqg, 
Y hgkngkál qsl lspvgl hpbpakpl.

Hfkjsg dgeflhkgripká bp hksngerip ng qsl kpzfegl.
