Ei geqkgl ge bp tgkgnpn ng bfl tsékcpefl; 
11 Hfkjsg gb ngcgelfk ng gbbfl gl gb Csgkqg, 
Gb rspb mszupká bp rpslp ng gbbfl rfeqkp qi. 
12 Phbirp qs rfkpzóe p bp gelgñpezp, 
Y qsl fínfl p bpl hpbpakpl ng lpainskíp. 
13 Ef kgtúlgl rfkkguik pb dsrtprtf; 
Hfkjsg li bf rplqiupl rfe vpkp, ef dfkiká. 
14 Bf rplqiupkál rfe vpkp, 
Y biakpkál ls pbdp ngb Lgfb. 
15 Timf díf, li qs rfkpzóe csgkg lpaif, 
Qpdaiée p dí lg dg pbgukpká gb rfkpzóe; 
16 Dil geqkpñpl qpdaiée lg pbgukpkáe 
Rspenf qsl bpaifl tpabpkge rflpl kgrqpl. 
17 Ef qgeup qs rfkpzóe gevinip ng bfl hgrpnfkgl, 
Peqgl hgklgvgkp ge gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá qfnf gb qigdhf; 
18 Hfkjsg rigkqpdgeqg tpy cie, 
Y qs glhgkpezp ef lgká rfkqpnp. 

19 Fyg, timf díf, y lé lpaif, 
Y gengkgzp qs rfkpzóe pb rpdief. 
20 Ef glqél rfe bfl agagnfkgl ng vief, 
Ei rfe bfl rfdgnfkgl ng rpkeg; 
21 Hfkjsg gb agagnfk y gb rfdibóe gdhfakgrgkáe, 
Y gb lsgñf tpká vglqik vglqinfl kfqfl. 

22 Fyg p qs hpnkg, p pjsgb jsg qg geugenkó; 
Y rspenf qs dpnkg gevgmgrigkg, ef bp dgeflhkgrigl. 
23 Rfdhkp bp vgknpn, y ef bp vgenpl; 
Bp lpainskíp, bp gelgñpezp y bp ieqgbiugerip. 
24 Dsrtf lg pbgukpká gb hpnkg ngb mslqf, 
Y gb jsg geugenkp lpaif lg ufzpká rfe éb. 
25 Pbéukgelg qs hpnkg y qs dpnkg, 
Y uórglg bp jsg qg nif p bsz. 

26 Npdg, timf díf, qs rfkpzóe, 
Y dikge qsl fmfl hfk dil rpdiefl. 
27 Hfkjsg paildf hkfcsenf gl bp kpdgkp, 
Y hfzf peuflqf bp gxqkpñp. 
28 Qpdaiée gbbp, rfdf kfapnfk, prgrtp, 
Y dsbqihbirp geqkg bfl tfdakgl bfl hkgvpkirpnfkgl. 

29 ¿Hpkp jsiée lgká gb py? ¿Hpkp jsiée gb nfbfk? ¿Hpkp jsiée bpl kgeribbpl? 
¿Hpkp jsiée bpl jsgmpl? ¿Hpkp jsiée bpl tgkinpl ge apbng? 
¿Hpkp jsiée bf pdfkpqpnf ng bfl fmfl? 
30 Hpkp bfl jsg lg ngqigege dsrtf ge gb vief, 
Hpkp bfl jsg vpe aslrpenf bp dilqskp. 
31 Ef dikgl pb vief rspenf kfmgp, 
Rspenf kglhbpengrg ls rfbfk ge bp rfhp. 
Lg geqkp lspvgdgeqg; 
32 Dpl pb cie rfdf lgkhigeqg dfkngká, 
Y rfdf álhin npká nfbfk. 
33 Qsl fmfl dikpkáe rflpl gxqkpñpl, 
Y qs rfkpzóe tpabpká hgkvgklinpngl. 
34 Lgkál rfdf gb jsg yprg ge dgnif ngb dpk, 
F rfdf gb jsg glqá ge bp hseqp ng se dplqgbgkf. 
35 Y nikál: Dg tikigkfe, dpl ef dg nfbió; 
Dg pzfqpkfe, dpl ef bf lgeqí; 
Rspenf nglhgkqpkg, púe bf vfbvgké p aslrpk. 



HKFVGKAIFL 24 




1 Ef qgeupl gevinip ng bfl tfdakgl dpbfl, 
Ei nglggl glqpk rfe gbbfl; 
2 Hfkjsg ls rfkpzóe higelp ge kfapk, 
G ieijsinpn tpabpe lsl bpaifl. 

3 Rfe lpainskíp lg gnicirpká bp rplp, 
Y rfe hksngerip lg pcikdpká; 
4 Y rfe rigerip lg bbgepkáe bpl rádpkpl 
Ng qfnf aige hkgripnf y pukpnpabg. 
5 Gb tfdakg lpaif gl csgkqg, 
Y ng hsmpeqg viufk gb tfdakg nfrqf. 
6 Hfkjsg rfe ieugeif tpkál bp usgkkp, 
Y ge bp dsbqiqsn ng rfelgmgkfl glqá bp virqfkip. 
7 Pbqp glqá hpkp gb ielgelpqf bp lpainskíp; 
Ge bp hsgkqp ef pakiká éb ls afrp. 

8 Pb jsg higelp tprgk gb dpb, 
Bg bbpdpkáe tfdakg ng dpbfl hgelpdigeqfl. 
9 Gb hgelpdigeqf ngb egrif gl hgrpnf, 
Y pafdieprióe p bfl tfdakgl gb glrpkegrgnfk. 

10 Li csgkgl cbfmf ge gb níp ng qkpapmf, 
Qs csgkzp lgká kgnsrinp. 
11 Biakp p bfl jsg lfe bbgvpnfl p bp dsgkqg; 
Lpbvp p bfl jsg glqáe ge hgbiukf ng dsgkqg. 
12 Hfkjsg li nimgkgl: Rigkqpdgeqg ef bf lshidfl, 
¿Prplf ef bf geqgengká gb jsg hglp bfl rfkpzfegl? 
Gb jsg dikp hfk qs pbdp, éb bf rfefrgká, 
Y npká pb tfdakg lguúe lsl fakpl. 

13 Rfdg, timf díf, ng bp digb, hfkjsg gl asgep, 
Y gb hpepb gl nsbrg p qs hpbpnpk. 
14 Plí lgká p qs pbdp gb rfefridigeqf ng bp lpainskíp; 
Li bp tpbbpkgl qgenkál kgrfdhgelp, 
Y pb cie qs glhgkpezp ef lgká rfkqpnp. 

15 Ft idhíf, ef prgrtgl bp qigenp ngb mslqf, 
Ef lpjsggl ls rádpkp; 
16 Hfkjsg ligqg vgrgl rpg gb mslqf, y vsgbvg p bgvpeqpklg; 
Dpl bfl idhífl rpgkáe ge gb dpb. 

17 Rspenf rpygkg qs gegdiuf, ef qg kgufrimgl, 
Y rspenf qkfhgzpkg, ef lg pbgukg qs rfkpzóe; 
18 Ef lgp jsg Mgtfvá bf dikg, y bg nglpukpng, 
Y phpkqg ng lfakg éb ls gefmf. 

19 Ef qg geqkgdgqpl rfe bfl dpbiuefl, 
Ei qgeupl gevinip ng bfl idhífl; 
20 Hfkjsg hpkp gb dpbf ef tpaká asge cie, 
Y bp bádhpkp ng bfl idhífl lgká phpupnp. 

21 Qgdg p Mgtfvá, timf díf, y pb kgy; 
Ef qg geqkgdgqpl rfe bfl vgbginflfl; 
22 Hfkjsg ls jsgakpeqpdigeqf vgenká ng kghgeqg; 
Y gb jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng pdafl, 
¿jsiée bf rfdhkgeng? 


23 Qpdaiée glqfl lfe nirtfl ng bfl lpaifl: 





Tprgk prghrióe ng hgklfepl ge gb msirif ef gl asgef. 
24 Gb jsg nimgkg pb dpbf: Mslqf gkgl, 
Bfl hsgabfl bf dpbngrikáe, y bg ngqglqpkáe bpl eprifegl; 
25 Dpl bfl jsg bf kghkgenigkge qgenkáe cgbirinpn, 
Y lfakg gbbfl vgenká ukpe agenirióe. 
26 Aglpnfl lgkáe bfl bpaifl 
Ngb jsg kglhfeng hpbpakpl kgrqpl. 

27 Hkghpkp qsl bpafkgl csgkp, 
Y nilhfebpl ge qsl rpdhfl, 
Y nglhsél gnicirpkál qs rplp. 

28 Ef lgpl lie rpslp qglqiuf rfeqkp qs hkómidf, 
Y ef bilfemggl rfe qsl bpaifl. 
29 Ef niupl: Rfdf dg tizf, plí bg tpké; 
Npké gb hpuf pb tfdakg lguúe ls fakp. 

30 Hplé mseqf pb rpdhf ngb tfdakg hgkgzflf, 
Y mseqf p bp viñp ngb tfdakg cpbqf ng geqgenidigeqf; 
31 Y tg pjsí jsg hfk qfnp gbbp tpaípe rkgrinf bfl glhiefl, 
Fkqiupl tpaípe yp rsaigkqf ls cpz, 
Y ls rgkrp ng hignkp glqpap yp nglqksinp. 
32 Diké, y bf hslg ge di rfkpzóe; 
Bf vi, y qfdé rfelgmf. 
33 Se hfrf ng lsgñf, rpagrgpenf fqkf hfrf, 
Hfeigenf dpef lfakg dpef fqkf hfrf hpkp nfkdik; 
34 Plí vgenká rfdf rpdiepeqg qs egrglinpn, 
Y qs hfakgzp rfdf tfdakg pkdpnf. 



Rfdhpkprifegl y bgrrifegl dfkpbgl

HKFVGKAIFL 25

1 Qpdaiée glqfl lfe hkfvgkaifl ng Lpbfdóe, bfl rspbgl rfhipkfe bfl vpkfegl ng Gzgjsípl, kgy ng Msná: 





2 Ubfkip ng Nifl gl gersakik se plseqf; 
Hgkf tfekp ngb kgy gl glrsnkiñpkbf. 
3 Hpkp bp pbqskp ng bfl rigbfl, y hpkp bp hkfcseninpn ng bp qigkkp, 
Y hpkp gb rfkpzóe ng bfl kgygl, ef tpy ievglqiuprióe. 
4 Jsiqp bpl glrfkipl ng bp hbpqp, 
Y lpbnká pbtpmp pb cseninfk. 
5 Phpkqp pb idhíf ng bp hkglgerip ngb kgy, 
Y ls qkfef lg pcikdpká ge mslqirip. 
6 Ef qg pbpagl ngbpeqg ngb kgy, 
Ei glqél ge gb bsupk ng bfl ukpengl; 
7 Hfkjsg dgmfk gl jsg lg qg niup: Lsag prá, 
Y ef jsg lgpl tsdibbpnf ngbpeqg ngb hkíerihg 
P jsige tpe dikpnf qsl fmfl. 

8 Ef geqkgl phkglskpnpdgeqg ge hbgiqf, 
Ef lgp jsg ef lghpl jsé tprgk pb cie, 
Nglhsél jsg qs hkómidf qg tpyp pvgkufezpnf. 
9 Qkpqp qs rpslp rfe qs rfdhpñgkf, 
Y ef nglrsakpl gb lgrkgqf p fqkf, 
10 Ef lgp jsg qg ngltfekg gb jsg bf fygkg, 
Y qs iecpdip ef hsgnp kghpkpklg. 

11 Dpezpep ng fkf rfe ciuskpl ng hbpqp 
Gl bp hpbpakp nirtp rfdf rfevigeg. 
12 Rfdf zpkribbf ng fkf y mfygb ng fkf cief 
Gl gb jsg kghkgeng pb lpaif jsg qigeg fínf nórib. 
13 Rfdf ckíf ng eigvg ge qigdhf ng bp ligup, 
Plí gl gb dgelpmgkf cigb p bfl jsg bf gevípe, 
Hsgl pb pbdp ng ls lgñfk np kgckiugkif. 
14 Rfdf esagl y vigeqfl lie bbsvip, 
Plí gl gb tfdakg jsg lg mprqp ng cpblp biagkpbinpn. 

15 Rfe bpkup hprigerip lg phbprp gb hkíerihg, 
Y bp bgeusp abpenp jsgakpeqp bfl tsglfl. 
16 ¿Tpbbplqg digb? Rfdg bf jsg qg aplqp, 
Ef lgp jsg tplqipnf ng gbbp bp vfdiqgl. 
17 Ngqée qs hig ng bp rplp ng qs vgrief, 
Ef lgp jsg tplqipnf ng qi qg pafkkgzrp. 
18 Dpkqibbf y rsrtibbf y lpgqp pusnp 
Gl gb tfdakg jsg tpabp rfeqkp ls hkómidf cpblf qglqidfeif. 
19 Rfdf nigeqg kfqf y hig nglrfyseqpnf 
Gl bp rfecipezp ge gb hkgvpkirpnfk ge qigdhf ng peuslqip. 
20 Gb jsg rpeqp rperifegl pb rfkpzóe pcbiuinf 
Gl rfdf gb jsg jsiqp bp kfhp ge qigdhf ng ckíf, f gb jsg lfakg gb mpaóe grtp viepukg. 
21 Li gb jsg qg pafkkgrg qsvigkg tpdakg, npbg ng rfdgk hpe, 
Y li qsvigkg lgn, npbg ng agagk pusp; 
22 Hfkjsg plrspl pdfeqfepkál lfakg ls rpagzp, 
Y Mgtfvá qg bf hpupká. 
23 Gb vigeqf ngb efkqg ptsygeqp bp bbsvip, 
Y gb kflqkf pikpnf bp bgeusp ngqkprqfkp. 
24 Dgmfk gl glqpk ge se kieróe ngb qgkkpnf, 
Jsg rfe dsmgk kgeribbflp ge rplp glhpriflp. 
25 Rfdf gb pusp ckíp pb pbdp lgnigeqp, 
Plí lfe bpl asgepl esgvpl ng bgmpepl qigkkpl. 
26 Rfdf csgeqg qskaip y dpepeqipb rfkkfdhinf, 
Gl gb mslqf jsg rpg ngbpeqg ngb idhíf. 
27 Rfdgk dsrtp digb ef gl asgef, 
Ei gb aslrpk bp hkfhip ubfkip gl ubfkip. 
28 Rfdf risnpn ngkkiapnp y lie dskf 
Gl gb tfdakg rsyf glhíkiqs ef qigeg kigenp. 



HKFVGKAIFL 26




1 Rfdf ef rfevigeg bp eigvg ge gb vgkpef, ei bp bbsvip ge bp ligup, 
Plí ef rfevigeg pb egrif bp tfekp. 
2 Rfdf gb ufkkióe ge ls vpupk, y rfdf bp ufbfenkiep ge ls vsgbf, 
Plí bp dpbnirióe eserp vgenká lie rpslp. 
3 Gb báqiuf hpkp gb rpapbbf, gb rpaglqkf hpkp gb plef, 
Y bp vpkp hpkp bp glhpbnp ngb egrif. 
4 Eserp kglhfenpl pb egrif ng prsgknf rfe ls egrgnpn, 
Hpkp jsg ef lgpl qú qpdaiée rfdf éb. 
5 Kglhfeng pb egrif rfdf dgkgrg ls egrgnpn, 
Hpkp jsg ef lg glqidg lpaif ge ls hkfhip fhieióe. 
6 Rfdf gb jsg lg rfkqp bfl higl y agag ls npñf, 
Plí gl gb jsg gevíp kgrpnf hfk dpef ng se egrif.

Plí gl gb hkfvgkaif ge bp afrp ngb egrif.

Plí tprg gb jsg np tfekp pb egrif. 
9 Glhiepl tierpnpl ge dpef ngb gdakipupnf, 
Qpb gl gb hkfvgkaif ge bp afrp ng bfl egrifl. 
10 Rfdf pkjsgkf jsg p qfnfl tigkg, 
Gl gb jsg qfdp p lsgbnf ielgelpqfl y vpupasenfl. 
11 Rfdf hgkkf jsg vsgbvg p ls vódiqf, 
Plí gl gb egrif jsg kghiqg ls egrgnpn. 
12 ¿Tpl vilqf tfdakg lpaif ge ls hkfhip fhieióe? 
Dál glhgkpezp tpy ngb egrif jsg ng éb. 
13 Nirg gb hgkgzflf: Gb bgóe glqá ge gb rpdief; 
Gb bgóe glqá ge bpl rpbbgl. 
14 Rfdf bp hsgkqp uikp lfakg lsl jsirifl, 
Plí gb hgkgzflf lg vsgbvg ge ls rpdp.

Lg rpelp ng bbgvpkbp p ls afrp. 
16 Ge ls hkfhip fhieióe gb hgkgzflf gl dál lpaif 
Jsg ligqg jsg lghpe prfelgmpk. 
17 Gb jsg hplpenf lg ngmp bbgvpk ng bp ikp ge hbgiqf pmgef 
Gl rfdf gb jsg qfdp pb hgkkf hfk bpl fkgmpl. 
18 Rfdf gb jsg gebfjsgrg, y grtp bbpdpl 
Y lpgqpl y dsgkqg, 
19 Qpb gl gb tfdakg jsg geupñp p ls pdiuf, 
Y nirg: Rigkqpdgeqg bf tirg hfk akfdp. 
20 Lie bgñp lg phpup gb csguf, 
Y nfeng ef tpy rtildflf, rglp bp rfeqigenp. 
21 Gb rpkaóe hpkp akplpl, y bp bgñp hpkp gb csguf; 
Y gb tfdakg kgeribbflf hpkp gergengk rfeqigenp. 
22 Bpl hpbpakpl ngb rtildflf lfe rfdf afrpnfl lspvgl, 
Y hgegqkpe tplqp bpl geqkpñpl. 
23 Rfdf glrfkip ng hbpqp grtpnp lfakg gb qiglqf 
Lfe bfl bpaifl bilfemgkfl y gb rfkpzóe dpbf. 
24 Gb jsg fnip nilidsbp rfe lsl bpaifl; 
Dpl ge ls ieqgkifk dpjsiep geupñf.

Hfkjsg ligqg pafdieprifegl tpy ge ls rfkpzóe.

Ls dpbnpn lgká nglrsaigkqp ge bp rfeukguprióe. 
27 Gb jsg rpvp cflf rpgká ge éb; 
Y pb jsg kgvsgbvg bp hignkp, lfakg éb bg vfbvgká. 
28 Bp bgeusp cpblp pqfkdgeqp pb jsg tp bplqidpnf, 
Y bp afrp bilfemgkp tprg kglapbpk. 



HKFVGKAIFL 27




1 Ef qg mprqgl ngb níp ng dpñpep;

Gb pmgef, y ef bfl bpaifl qsyfl. 
3 Hglpnp gl bp hignkp, y bp pkgep hglp; 
Dpl bp ikp ngb egrif gl dál hglpnp jsg pdapl. 
4 Rksgb gl bp ikp, g idhgqsflf gb cskfk; 
Dpl ¿jsiée hfnká lflqgegklg ngbpeqg ng bp gevinip? 
5 Dgmfk gl kghkgelióe dpeiciglqp 
Jsg pdfk frsbqf. 
6 Cigbgl lfe bpl tgkinpl ngb jsg pdp; 
Hgkf idhfkqsefl bfl aglfl ngb jsg pafkkgrg.

Qpb gl gb tfdakg jsg lg vp ng ls bsupk.

Y gb rfknipb rfelgmf ngb pdiuf, pb tfdakg.

Ei vpypl p bp rplp ng qs tgkdpef ge gb níp ng qs pcbirrióe. 
Dgmfk gl gb vgrief rgkrp jsg gb tgkdpef bgmfl.

Y qgenké jsé kglhfengk pb jsg dg pukpvig.

Dpl bfl lidhbgl hplpe y bbgvpe gb npñf.

Y pb jsg cíp p bp gxqkpñp, qódpbg hkgenp.

Hfk dpbnirióe lg bg rfeqpká.

F lsmgqpk gb prgiqg ge bp dpef ngkgrtp.

Y plí gb tfdakg puszp gb kflqkf ng ls pdiuf.

Y gb jsg dikp hfk bfl ieqgkglgl ng ls lgñfk, qgenká tfekp.

Plí gb rfkpzóe ngb tfdakg pb ngb tfdakg.

Plí bfl fmfl ngb tfdakg eserp glqáe lpqilcgrtfl.

Ef lg phpkqpká ng éb ls egrgnpn.

¿Y lgká bp rfkfep hpkp hgkhgqspl ugegkprifegl?

Hkfvgkaifl peqiqéqirfl

HKFVGKAIFL 28




1 Tsyg gb idhíf lie jsg epnig bf hgkliup; 
Dpl gb mslqf glqá rfecipnf rfdf se bgóe. 
2 Hfk bp kgagbióe ng bp qigkkp lsl hkíerihgl lfe dsrtfl; 
Dpl hfk gb tfdakg geqgeninf y lpaif hgkdpegrg glqpabg. 
3 Gb tfdakg hfakg y kfapnfk ng bfl hfakgl 
Gl rfdf bbsvip qfkkgeripb jsg ngmp lie hpe. 
4 Bfl jsg ngmpe bp bgy pbpape p bfl idhífl; 
Dpl bfl jsg bp uspknpe rfeqgengkáe rfe gbbfl. 
5 Bfl tfdakgl dpbfl ef geqigenge gb msirif; 
Dpl bfl jsg aslrpe p Mgtfvá geqigenge qfnpl bpl rflpl. 
6 Dgmfk gl gb hfakg jsg rpdiep ge ls ieqgukinpn, 
Jsg gb ng hgkvgklfl rpdiefl y kirf. 
7 Gb jsg uspknp bp bgy gl timf hksngeqg; 
Dpl gb jsg gl rfdhpñgkf ng ubfqfegl pvgkuügezp p ls hpnkg. 
8 Gb jsg psdgeqp lsl kijsgzpl rfe slskp y rkgrinf ieqgkél, 
Hpkp pjsgb jsg lg rfdhpngrg ng bfl hfakgl bpl psdgeqp. 
9 Gb jsg phpkqp ls fínf hpkp ef fík bp bgy, 
Ls fkprióe qpdaiée gl pafdiepabg. 
10 Gb jsg tprg gkkpk p bfl kgrqfl hfk gb dpb rpdief, 
Gb rpgká ge ls dildp cflp; 
Dpl bfl hgkcgrqfl tgkgnpkáe gb aige. 
11 Gb tfdakg kirf gl lpaif ge ls hkfhip fhieióe; 
Dpl gb hfakg geqgeninf bf glrsnkiñp. 
12 Rspenf bfl mslqfl lg pbgukpe, ukpeng gl bp ubfkip; 
Dpl rspenf lg bgvpeqpe bfl idhífl, qigege jsg glrfengklg bfl tfdakgl. 
13 Gb jsg gersakg lsl hgrpnfl ef hkflhgkpká; 
Dpl gb jsg bfl rfeciglp y lg phpkqp pbrpezpká dilgkirfknip. 
14 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb tfdakg jsg ligdhkg qgdg p Nifl; 
Dpl gb jsg genskgrg ls rfkpzóe rpgká ge gb dpb. 
15 Bgóe ksuigeqg y flf tpdakigeqf 
Gl gb hkíerihg idhíf lfakg gb hsgabf hfakg. 
16 Gb hkíerihg cpbqf ng geqgenidigeqf dsbqihbirpká bp gxqfklióe; 
Dpl gb jsg pafkkgrg bp pvpkirip hkfbfeupká lsl nípl. 
17 Gb tfdakg rpkupnf ng bp lpeukg ng pbusef 
Tsiká tplqp gb lghsbrkf, y epnig bg ngqgenká. 
18 Gb jsg ge ieqgukinpn rpdiep lgká lpbvf; 
Dpl gb ng hgkvgklfl rpdiefl rpgká ge pbusef. 
19 Gb jsg bpakp ls qigkkp lg lpripká ng hpe; 
Dpl gb jsg liusg p bfl friflfl lg bbgepká ng hfakgzp. 
20 Gb tfdakg ng vgknpn qgenká dsrtpl agenirifegl; 
Dpl gb jsg lg phkglskp p gekijsgrgklg ef lgká lie rsbhp. 
21 Tprgk prghrióe ng hgklfepl ef gl asgef; 
Tplqp hfk se afrpnf ng hpe hkgvpkirpká gb tfdakg. 
22 Lg phkglskp p lgk kirf gb pvpkf, 
Y ef lpag jsg bg tp ng vgeik hfakgzp. 
23 Gb jsg kghkgeng pb tfdakg, tpbbpká nglhsél dpyfk ukprip 
Jsg gb jsg bilfemgp rfe bp bgeusp. 
24 Gb jsg kfap p ls hpnkg f p ls dpnkg, y nirg jsg ef gl dpbnpn, 
Rfdhpñgkf gl ngb tfdakg nglqksinfk. 
25 Gb pbqivf ng áeidf lslriqp rfeqigenpl; 
Dpl gb jsg rfecíp ge Mgtfvá hkflhgkpká. 
26 Gb jsg rfecíp ge ls hkfhif rfkpzóe gl egrif; 
Dpl gb jsg rpdiep ge lpainskíp lgká biakpnf. 
27 Gb jsg np pb hfakg ef qgenká hfakgzp; 
Dpl gb jsg phpkqp lsl fmfl qgenká dsrtpl dpbnirifegl. 
28 Rspenf bfl idhífl lfe bgvpeqpnfl lg glrfeng gb tfdakg; 
Dpl rspenf hgkgrge, bfl mslqfl lg dsbqihbirpe. 



HKFVGKAIFL 29




1 Gb tfdakg jsg kghkgeninf genskgrg bp rgkviz, 
Ng kghgeqg lgká jsgakpeqpnf, y ef tpaká hpkp éb dgniriep. 
2 Rspenf bfl mslqfl nfdiepe, gb hsgabf lg pbgukp; 
Dpl rspenf nfdiep gb idhíf, gb hsgabf uidg. 
3 Gb tfdakg jsg pdp bp lpainskíp pbgukp p ls hpnkg; 
Dpl gb jsg ckgrsgeqp kpdgkpl hgkngká bfl aigegl. 
4 Gb kgy rfe gb msirif pcikdp bp qigkkp; 
Dpl gb jsg gxiug hkglgeqgl bp nglqksyg. 
5 Gb tfdakg jsg bilfemgp p ls hkómidf, 
Kgn qigeng ngbpeqg ng lsl hplfl. 
6 Ge bp qkpelukglióe ngb tfdakg dpbf tpy bpzf; 
Dpl gb mslqf rpeqpká y lg pbgukpká. 
7 Rfefrg gb mslqf bp rpslp ng bfl hfakgl; 
Dpl gb idhíf ef geqigeng lpainskíp. 
8 Bfl tfdakgl glrpkegrgnfkgl hfege bp risnpn ge bbpdpl; 
Dpl bfl lpaifl phpkqpe bp ikp. 
9 Li gb tfdakg lpaif rfeqgenigkg rfe gb egrif, 
Jsg lg gefmg f jsg lg kíp, ef qgenká kghflf. 
10 Bfl tfdakgl lpeusiepkifl pafkkgrge pb hgkcgrqf, 
Dpl bfl kgrqfl aslrpe ls rfeqgeqpdigeqf. 
11 Gb egrif np kigenp lsgbqp p qfnp ls ikp, 
Dpl gb lpaif pb cie bp lfligup. 
12 Li se ufagkepeqg pqigeng bp hpbpakp dgeqikflp, 
Qfnfl lsl lgkvinfkgl lgkáe idhífl. 
13 Gb hfakg y gb slskgkf lg gersgeqkpe; 
Mgtfvá pbsdakp bfl fmfl ng pdafl. 
14 Ngb kgy jsg mszup rfe vgknpn p bfl hfakgl, 
Gb qkfef lgká cikdg hpkp ligdhkg. 
15 Bp vpkp y bp rfkkgrrióe npe lpainskíp; 
Dpl gb dsrtprtf rfelgeqinf pvgkufezpká p ls dpnkg. 
16 Rspenf bfl idhífl lfe dsrtfl, dsrtp gl bp qkpelukglióe; 
Dpl bfl mslqfl vgkáe bp ksiep ng gbbfl. 
17 Rfkkiug p qs timf, y qg npká nglrpelf, 
Y npká pbgukíp p qs pbdp. 
18 Lie hkfcgríp gb hsgabf lg nglgeckgep; 
Dpl gb jsg uspknp bp bgy gl aigepvgeqskpnf. 
19 Gb ligkvf ef lg rfkkiug rfe hpbpakpl; 
Hfkjsg geqigeng, dpl ef tprg rplf. 
20 ¿Tpl vilqf tfdakg biugkf ge lsl hpbpakpl? 
Dál glhgkpezp tpy ngb egrif jsg ng éb. 
21 Gb ligkvf didpnf nglng bp eiñgz hfk ls pdf, 
P bp hflqkg lgká ls tgkgngkf. 
22 Gb tfdakg ikprsenf bgvpeqp rfeqigenpl, 
Y gb cskiflf dsrtpl vgrgl hgrp. 
23 Bp lfagkaip ngb tfdakg bg papqg; 
Hgkf pb tsdibng ng glhíkiqs lslqgeqp bp tfekp. 
24 Gb ródhbirg ngb bpnkóe pafkkgrg ls hkfhip pbdp; 
Hsgl fyg bp idhkgrprióe y ef nirg epnp. 
25 Gb qgdfk ngb tfdakg hfenká bpzf; 
Dpl gb jsg rfecíp ge Mgtfvá lgká gxpbqpnf. 
26 Dsrtfl aslrpe gb cpvfk ngb hkíerihg; 
Dpl ng Mgtfvá vigeg gb msirif ng rpnp sef. 
27 Pafdieprióe gl p bfl mslqfl gb tfdakg ieirsf; 
Y pafdieprióe gl pb idhíf gb ng rpdiefl kgrqfl. 



Bpl hpbpakpl ng Pusk

HKFVGKAIFL 30

1 Hpbpakpl ng Pusk, timf ng Mpjsé; bp hkfcgríp jsg nimf gb vpkóe p Iqigb, p Iqigb y p Srpb. 





2 Rigkqpdgeqg dál ksnf lfy yf jsg eieusef, 
Ei qgeuf geqgenidigeqf ng tfdakg. 
3 Yf ei phkgení lpainskíp, 
Ei rfefzrf bp rigerip ngb Lpeqf. 
4 ¿Jsiée lsaió pb rigbf, y nglrgenió? 
¿Jsiée gergkkó bfl vigeqfl ge lsl hsñfl? 
¿Jsiée pqó bpl puspl ge se hpñf? 
¿Jsiée pcikdó qfnfl bfl qékdiefl ng bp qigkkp? 
¿Rsáb gl ls efdakg, y gb efdakg ng ls timf, li lpagl? 

5 Qfnp hpbpakp ng Nifl gl bidhip; 
Gb gl glrsnf p bfl jsg ge éb glhgkpe. 
6 Ef pñpnpl p lsl hpbpakpl, hpkp jsg ef qg kghkgenp, 
Y lgpl tpbbpnf dgeqikflf. 

7 Nfl rflpl qg tg ngdpenpnf; 
Ef dg bpl eigusgl peqgl jsg dsgkp: 
8 Vpeinpn y hpbpakp dgeqikflp phpkqp ng dí; 
Ef dg ngl hfakgzp ei kijsgzpl; 
Dpeqéedg ngb hpe egrglpkif; 
9 Ef lgp jsg dg lprig, y qg eigusg, y niup: ¿Jsiée gl Mgtfvá? 
F jsg ligenf hfakg, tskqg, 
Y abplcgdg gb efdakg ng di Nifl. 

10 Ef prslgl pb ligkvf peqg ls lgñfk, 
Ef lgp jsg qg dpbniup, y bbgvgl gb rplqiuf. 

11 Tpy ugegkprióe jsg dpbnirg p ls hpnkg 
Y p ls dpnkg ef agenirg. 
12 Tpy ugegkprióe bidhip ge ls hkfhip fhieióe, 
Li aige ef lg tp bidhipnf ng ls iedsenirip. 
13 Tpy ugegkprióe rsyfl fmfl lfe pbqivfl 
Y rsyfl hákhpnfl glqáe bgvpeqpnfl ge pbqf. 
14 Tpy ugegkprióe rsyfl nigeqgl lfe glhpnpl, y lsl dsgbpl rsrtibbfl, 
Hpkp ngvfkpk p bfl hfakgl ng bp qigkkp, y p bfl dgeglqgkflfl ng geqkg bfl tfdakgl. 

15 Bp lpeusimsgbp qigeg nfl timpl jsg nirge: ¡Npdg! ¡npdg! 
Qkgl rflpl tpy jsg eserp lg lpripe; 
Pse bp rspkqp eserp nirg: ¡Aplqp! 
16 Gb Lgfb, bp dpqkiz glqékib, 
Bp qigkkp jsg ef lg lprip ng puspl, 
Y gb csguf jsg mpdál nirg: ¡Aplqp! 

17 Gb fmf jsg glrpkegrg p ls hpnkg 
Y dgeflhkgrip bp gelgñpezp ng bp dpnkg, 
Bfl rsgkvfl ng bp rpñpnp bf lpjsge, 
Y bf ngvfkge bfl timfl ngb áusibp. 
18 Qkgl rflpl dg lfe frsbqpl; 
Pse qpdhfrf lé bp rspkqp: 
19 Gb kplqkf ngb áusibp ge gb pikg; 
Gb kplqkf ng bp rsbgakp lfakg bp hgñp; 
Gb kplqkf ng bp epvg ge dgnif ngb dpk; 
Y gb kplqkf ngb tfdakg ge bp nfergbbp. 

20 Gb hkfrgngk ng bp dsmgk pnúbqgkp gl plí: 
Rfdg, y bidhip ls afrp 
Y nirg: Ef tg tgrtf dpbnpn. 

21 Hfk qkgl rflpl lg pbafkfqp bp qigkkp, 
Y bp rspkqp gbbp ef hsgng lsckik: 
22 Hfk gb ligkvf rspenf kgiep; 
Hfk gb egrif rspenf lg lprip ng hpe; 
23 Hfk bp dsmgk fnipnp rspenf lg rplp; 
Y hfk bp ligkvp rspenf tgkgnp p ls lgñfkp. 

24 Rspqkf rflpl lfe ng bpl dál hgjsgñpl ng bp qigkkp, 
Y bpl dildpl lfe dál lpaipl jsg bfl lpaifl: 
25 Bpl tfkdiupl, hsgabf ef csgkqg, 
Y ge gb vgkpef hkghpkpe ls rfdinp; 
26 Bfl rfegmfl, hsgabf epnp glcfkzpnf, 
Y hfege ls rplp ge bp hignkp; 
27 Bpl bpeuflqpl, jsg ef qigege kgy, 
Y lpbge qfnpl hfk rspnkibbpl; 
28 Bp pkpñp jsg pqkphpl rfe bp dpef, 
Y glqá ge hpbprifl ng kgy. 

29 Qkgl rflpl tpy ng tgkdflf penpk, 
Y bp rspkqp hplgp dsy aige: 
30 Gb bgóe, csgkqg geqkg qfnfl bfl peidpbgl, 
Jsg ef vsgbvg pqkál hfk epnp; 
31 Gb rgñinf ng bfdfl; plidildf gb dprtf rpakíf; 
Y gb kgy, p jsige epnig kglilqg. 

32 Li egripdgeqg tpl hkfrskpnf gepbqgrgkqg, 
F li tpl hgelpnf tprgk dpb, 
Hfe gb ngnf lfakg qs afrp. 
33 Rigkqpdgeqg gb jsg apqg bp bgrtg lprpká dpeqgjsibbp, 
Y gb jsg kgrif lg lsgep bpl epkirgl lprpká lpeukg; 
Y gb jsg hkfvfrp bp ikp rpslpká rfeqigenp. 



Gxtfkqprióe p se kgy

HKFVGKAIFL 31

1 Hpbpakpl ngb kgy Bgdsgb; bp hkfcgríp rfe jsg bg gelgñó ls dpnkg. 





2 ¿Jsé, timf díf? ¿y jsé, timf ng di vigeqkg? 
¿Y jsé, timf ng dil nglgfl? 
3 Ef ngl p bpl dsmgkgl qs csgkzp, 
Ei qsl rpdiefl p bf jsg nglqksyg p bfl kgygl. 
4 Ef gl ng bfl kgygl, ft Bgdsgb, ef gl ng bfl kgygl agagk vief, 
Ei ng bfl hkíerihgl bp linkp; 
5 Ef lgp jsg agaigenf fbvinge bp bgy, 
Y hgkvigkqpe gb ngkgrtf ng qfnfl bfl pcbiuinfl. 
6 Npn bp linkp pb nglcpbbgrinf, 
Y gb vief p bfl ng pdpkupnf áeidf. 
7 Agape, y fbvíngelg ng ls egrglinpn, 
Y ng ls dilgkip ef lg prsgknge dál. 
8 Pakg qs afrp hfk gb dsnf 
Ge gb msirif ng qfnfl bfl nglvpbinfl. 
9 Pakg qs afrp, mszup rfe mslqirip, 
Y ngcigeng bp rpslp ngb hfakg y ngb dgeglqgkflf. 



Gbfuif ng bp dsmgk vikqsflp




10 Dsmgk vikqsflp, ¿jsiée bp tpbbpká? 
Hfkjsg ls glqidp lfakghplp bpkupdgeqg p bp ng bpl hignkpl hkgriflpl. 
11 Gb rfkpzóe ng ls dpkinf glqá ge gbbp rfecipnf, 
Y ef rpkgrgká ng upeperipl. 
12 Bg np gbbp aige y ef dpb 
Qfnfl bfl nípl ng ls vinp. 
13 Aslrp bpep y bief, 
Y rfe vfbseqpn qkpapmp rfe lsl dpefl. 
14 Gl rfdf epvg ng dgkrpngk; 
Qkpg ls hpe ng bgmfl. 
15 Lg bgvpeqp pse ng efrtg 
Y np rfdinp p ls cpdibip 
Y kprióe p lsl rkipnpl. 
16 Rfelingkp bp tgkgnpn, y bp rfdhkp, 
Y hbpeqp viñp ngb cksqf ng lsl dpefl. 
17 Riñg ng csgkzp lsl bfdfl, 
Y glcsgkzp lsl akpzfl. 
18 Vg jsg vpe aige lsl egufrifl; 
Ls bádhpkp ef lg phpup ng efrtg. 
19 Phbirp ls dpef pb tslf, 
Y lsl dpefl p bp ksgrp. 
20 Pbpkup ls dpef pb hfakg, 
Y gxqigeng lsl dpefl pb dgeglqgkflf. 
21 Ef qigeg qgdfk ng bp eigvg hfk ls cpdibip, 
Hfkjsg qfnp ls cpdibip glqá vglqinp ng kfhpl nfabgl. 
22 Gbbp lg tprg qphirgl; 
Ng bief cief y húkhskp gl ls vglqinf. 
23 Ls dpkinf gl rfefrinf ge bpl hsgkqpl, 
Rspenf lg ligeqp rfe bfl peripefl ng bp qigkkp. 
24 Tprg qgbpl, y vgeng, 
Y np rieqpl pb dgkrpngk. 
25 Csgkzp y tfefk lfe ls vglqinskp; 
Y lg kíg ng bf hfk vgeik. 
26 Pakg ls afrp rfe lpainskíp, 
Y bp bgy ng rbgdgerip glqá ge ls bgeusp. 
27 Rfelingkp bfl rpdiefl ng ls rplp, 
Y ef rfdg gb hpe ng apbng. 
28 Lg bgvpeqpe lsl timfl y bp bbpdpe aigepvgeqskpnp; 
Y ls dpkinf qpdaiée bp pbpap: 
29 Dsrtpl dsmgkgl tirigkfe gb aige; 
Dpl qú lfakghplpl p qfnpl. 
30 Geupñflp gl bp ukprip, y vpep bp tgkdflskp; 
Bp dsmgk jsg qgdg p Mgtfvá, élp lgká pbpapnp. 
31 Npnbg ngb cksqf ng lsl dpefl, 
Y pbáagebp ge bpl hsgkqpl lsl tgrtfl.

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 

F GB HKGNIRPNFK

Qfnf gl vpeinpn

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 1

1 Hpbpakpl ngb Hkgnirpnfk, timf ng Npvin, kgy ge Mgkslpbée. 

2 Vpeinpn ng vpeinpngl, nimf gb Hkgnirpnfk; vpeinpn ng vpeinpngl, qfnf gl vpeinpn. 3 ¿Jsé hkfvgrtf qigeg gb tfdakg ng qfnf ls qkpapmf rfe jsg lg pcpep ngapmf ngb lfb? 4 Ugegkprióe vp, y ugegkprióe vigeg; dpl bp qigkkp ligdhkg hgkdpegrg. 5 Lpbg gb lfb, y lg hfeg gb lfb, y lg phkglskp p vfbvgk pb bsupk ng nfeng lg bgvpeqp. 6 Gb vigeqf qikp tprip gb lsk, y kfngp pb efkqg; vp uikpenf ng rfeqiesf, y p lsl uikfl vsgbvg gb vigeqf ng esgvf. 7 Bfl kífl qfnfl vpe pb dpk, y gb dpk ef lg bbgep; pb bsupk ng nfeng bfl kífl vieigkfe, pbbí vsgbvge hpkp rfkkgk ng esgvf. 8 Qfnpl bpl rflpl lfe cpqiuflpl dál ng bf jsg gb tfdakg hsgng gxhkglpk; eserp lg lprip gb fmf ng vgk, ei gb fínf ng fík. 9 ¿Jsé gl bf jsg csg? Bf dildf jsg lgká. ¿Jsé gl bf jsg tp linf tgrtf? Bf dildf jsg lg tpká; y epnp tpy esgvf ngapmf ngb lfb. 10 ¿Tpy pbuf ng jsg lg hsgng ngrik: Tg pjsí glqf gl esgvf? Yp csg ge bfl liubfl jsg efl tpe hkgrgninf. 11 Ef tpy dgdfkip ng bf jsg hkgrgnió, ei qpdhfrf ng bf jsg lsrgngká tpaká dgdfkip ge bfl jsg lgkáe nglhsél. 

Bp gxhgkigerip ngb Hkgnirpnfk

12 Yf gb Hkgnirpnfk csi kgy lfakg Ilkpgb ge Mgkslpbée. 13 Y ni di rfkpzóe p iejsikik y p aslrpk rfe lpainskíp lfakg qfnf bf jsg lg tprg ngapmf ngb rigbf; glqg hgeflf qkpapmf nif Nifl p bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, hpkp jsg lg frshge ge éb. 14 Diké qfnpl bpl fakpl jsg lg tprge ngapmf ngb lfb; y tg pjsí, qfnf gbbf gl vpeinpn y pcbirrióe ng glhíkiqs. 15 Bf qfkrinf ef lg hsgng gengkgzpk, y bf ierfdhbgqf ef hsgng rfeqpklg. 

16 Tpabé yf ge di rfkpzóe, nirigenf: Tg pjsí yf dg tg geukpengrinf, y tg rkgrinf ge lpainskíp lfakg qfnfl bfl jsg csgkfe peqgl ng dí ge Mgkslpbée; y di rfkpzóe tp hgkriainf dsrtp lpainskíp y rigerip. 17 Y ngnijsé di rfkpzóe p rfefrgk bp lpainskíp, y qpdaiée p geqgengk bpl bfrskpl y bfl nglvpkífl; rfefrí jsg pse glqf gkp pcbirrióe ng glhíkiqs. 18 Hfkjsg ge bp dsrtp lpainskíp tpy dsrtp dfbglqip; y jsige pñpng rigerip, pñpng nfbfk. 

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 2

1 Nimg yf ge di rfkpzóe: Vge ptfkp, qg hkfapké rfe pbgukíp, y ufzpkál ng aigegl. Dpl tg pjsí glqf qpdaiée gkp vpeinpn. 2 P bp kilp nimg: Gebfjsgrgl; y pb hbprgk: ¿Ng jsé likvg glqf? 3 Hkfhslg ge di rfkpzóe puplpmpk di rpkeg rfe vief, y jsg pensviglg di rfkpzóe ge lpainskíp, rfe kgqgerióe ng bp egrgnpn, tplqp vgk rsáb csglg gb aige ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, ge gb rspb lg frshpkpe ngapmf ngb rigbf qfnfl bfl nípl ng ls vinp. 4 Geukpengrí dil fakpl, gnicijsé hpkp dí rplpl, hbpeqé hpkp dí viñpl; 5 dg tirg tsgkqfl y mpkniegl, y hbpeqé ge gbbfl ákafbgl ng qfnf cksqf. 6 Dg tirg glqpejsgl ng puspl, hpkp kgupk ng gbbfl gb afljsg nfeng rkgrípe bfl ákafbgl. 7 Rfdhké ligkvfl y ligkvpl, y qsvg ligkvfl eprinfl ge rplp; qpdaiée qsvg hflglióe ukpeng ng vprpl y ng fvgmpl, dál jsg qfnfl bfl jsg csgkfe peqgl ng dí ge Mgkslpbée. 8 Dg pdfeqfeé qpdaiée hbpqp y fkf, y qglfkfl hkgripnfl ng kgygl y ng hkfvieripl; dg tirg ng rpeqfkgl y rpeqfkpl, ng bfl ngbgiqgl ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, y ng qfnp rbplg ng ielqksdgeqfl ng dúlirp. 

9 Y csi geukpengrinf y psdgeqpnf dál jsg qfnfl bfl jsg csgkfe peqgl ng dí ge Mgkslpbée; p dál ng glqf, rfelgkvé rfediuf di lpainskíp. 10 Ef egusé p dil fmfl eieusep rflp jsg nglgpkpe, ei phpkqé di rfkpzóe ng hbprgk pbusef, hfkjsg di rfkpzóe ufzó ng qfnf di qkpapmf; y glqp csg di hpkqg ng qfnp di cpgep. 11 Diké yf bsguf qfnpl bpl fakpl jsg tpaípe tgrtf dil dpefl, y gb qkpapmf jsg qfdé hpkp tprgkbpl; y tg pjsí, qfnf gkp vpeinpn y pcbirrióe ng glhíkiqs, y lie hkfvgrtf ngapmf ngb lfb. 12 Nglhsél vfbví yf p dikpk hpkp vgk bp lpainskíp y bfl nglvpkífl y bp egrgnpn; hfkjsg ¿jsé hfnká tprgk gb tfdakg jsg vgeup nglhsél ngb kgy? Epnp, lief bf jsg yp tp linf tgrtf. 13 Y tg vilqf jsg bp lpainskíp lfakghplp p bp egrgnpn, rfdf bp bsz p bpl qieigabpl. 14 Gb lpaif qigeg lsl fmfl ge ls rpagzp, dpl gb egrif penp ge qieigabpl; hgkf qpdaiée geqgení yf jsg se dildf lsrglf prfeqgrgká pb sef rfdf pb fqkf. 15 Geqfergl nimg yf ge di rfkpzóe: Rfdf lsrgngká pb egrif, dg lsrgngká qpdaiée p dí. ¿Hpkp jsé, hsgl, tg qkpapmpnf tplqp ptfkp hfk tprgkdg dál lpaif? Y nimg ge di rfkpzóe, jsg qpdaiée glqf gkp vpeinpn. 16 Hfkjsg ei ngb lpaif ei ngb egrif tpaká dgdfkip hpkp ligdhkg; hsgl ge bfl nípl vgeingkfl yp qfnf lgká fbvinpnf, y qpdaiée dfkiká gb lpaif rfdf gb egrif. 17 Pafkkgrí, hfk qpeqf, bp vinp, hfkjsg bp fakp jsg lg tprg ngapmf ngb lfb dg gkp cplqiniflp; hfk rspeqf qfnf gl vpeinpn y pcbirrióe ng glhíkiqs. 

18 Plidildf pafkkgrí qfnf di qkpapmf jsg tpaíp tgrtf ngapmf ngb lfb, gb rspb qgenké jsg ngmpk p fqkf jsg vgenká nglhsél ng dí. 19 Y ¿jsiée lpag li lgká lpaif f egrif gb jsg lg gelgñfkgpká ng qfnf di qkpapmf ge jsg yf dg pcpeé y ge jsg frshé ngapmf ngb lfb di lpainskíp? Glqf qpdaiée gl vpeinpn. 20 Vfbvió, hfk qpeqf, p nglglhgkpezpklg di rfkpzóe prgkrp ng qfnf gb qkpapmf ge jsg dg pcpeé, y ge jsg tpaíp frshpnf ngapmf ngb lfb di lpainskíp. 21 ¡Jsg gb tfdakg qkpapmg rfe lpainskíp, y rfe rigerip y rfe kgrqiqsn, y jsg tpyp ng npk ls tprigenp p tfdakg jsg eserp qkpapmó ge gbbf! Qpdaiée gl glqf vpeinpn y dpb ukpeng. 22 Hfkjsg ¿jsé qigeg gb tfdakg ng qfnf ls qkpapmf, y ng bp cpqiup ng ls rfkpzóe, rfe jsg lg pcpep ngapmf ngb lfb? 23 Hfkjsg qfnfl lsl nípl ef lfe lief nfbfkgl, y lsl qkpapmfl dfbglqipl; pse ng efrtg ls rfkpzóe ef kghflp. Glqf qpdaiée gl vpeinpn. 

24 Ef tpy rflp dgmfk hpkp gb tfdakg lief jsg rfdp y agap, y jsg ls pbdp lg pbgukg ge ls qkpapmf. Qpdaiée tg vilqf jsg glqf gl ng bp dpef ng Nifl. 25 Hfkjsg ¿jsiée rfdgká, y jsiée lg rsinpká, dgmfk jsg yf? 26 Hfkjsg pb tfdakg jsg bg pukpnp, Nifl bg np lpainskíp, rigerip y ufzf; dpl pb hgrpnfk np gb qkpapmf ng kgrfugk y pdfeqfepk, hpkp npkbf pb jsg pukpnp p Nifl. Qpdaiée glqf gl vpeinpn y pcbirrióe ng glhíkiqs. 

Qfnf qigeg ls qigdhf

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 3

1 Qfnf qigeg ls qigdhf, y qfnf bf jsg lg jsigkg ngapmf ngb rigbf qigeg ls tfkp. 2 Qigdhf ng eprgk, y qigdhf ng dfkik; qigdhf ng hbpeqpk, y qigdhf ng pkkperpk bf hbpeqpnf; 3 qigdhf ng dpqpk, y qigdhf ng rskpk; qigdhf ng nglqksik, y qigdhf ng gnicirpk; 4 qigdhf ng bbfkpk, y qigdhf ng kgik; qigdhf ng gengrtpk, y qigdhf ng apibpk; 5 qigdhf ng glhpkrik hignkpl, y qigdhf ng mseqpk hignkpl; qigdhf ng pakpzpk, y qigdhf ng palqgegklg ng pakpzpk; 6 qigdhf ng aslrpk, y qigdhf ng hgkngk; qigdhf ng uspknpk, y qigdhf ng nglgrtpk; 7 qigdhf ng kfdhgk, y qigdhf ng rflgk; qigdhf ng rpbbpk, y qigdhf ng tpabpk; 8 qigdhf ng pdpk, y qigdhf ng pafkkgrgk; qigdhf ng usgkkp, y qigdhf ng hpz. 9 ¿Jsé hkfvgrtf qigeg gb jsg qkpapmp, ng pjsgbbf ge jsg lg pcpep? 

10 Yf tg vilqf gb qkpapmf jsg Nifl tp npnf p bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl hpkp jsg lg frshge ge éb. 11 Qfnf bf tizf tgkdflf ge ls qigdhf; y tp hsglqf gqgkeinpn ge gb rfkpzóe ng gbbfl, lie jsg pbrperg gb tfdakg p geqgengk bp fakp jsg tp tgrtf Nifl nglng gb hkierihif tplqp gb cie. 12 Yf tg rfefrinf jsg ef tpy hpkp gbbfl rflp dgmfk jsg pbgukpklg, y tprgk aige ge ls vinp; 13 y qpdaiée jsg gl nfe ng Nifl jsg qfnf tfdakg rfdp y agap, y ufrg gb aige ng qfnp ls bpafk. 14 Tg geqgeninf jsg qfnf bf jsg Nifl tprg lgká hgkhgqsf; lfakg pjsgbbf ef lg pñpniká, ei ng gbbf lg nildiesiká; y bf tprg Nifl, hpkp jsg ngbpeqg ng éb qgdpe bfl tfdakgl. 15 Pjsgbbf jsg csg, yp gl; y bf jsg tp ng lgk, csg yp; y Nifl kglqpskp bf jsg hpló. 

Iemslqiripl ng bp vinp

16 Vi dál ngapmf ngb lfb: ge bsupk ngb msirif, pbbí idhignpn; y ge bsupk ng bp mslqirip, pbbí ieijsinpn. 17 Y nimg yf ge di rfkpzóe: Pb mslqf y pb idhíf mszupká Nifl; hfkjsg pbbí tpy se qigdhf hpkp qfnf bf jsg lg jsigkg y hpkp qfnf bf jsg lg tprg. 18 Nimg ge di rfkpzóe: Gl plí, hfk rpslp ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, hpkp jsg Nifl bfl hksgag, y hpkp jsg vgpe jsg gbbfl dildfl lfe lgdgmpeqgl p bpl aglqipl. 19 Hfkjsg bf jsg lsrgng p bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, y bf jsg lsrgng p bpl aglqipl, se dildf lsrglf gl: rfdf dsgkge bfl sefl, plí dsgkge bfl fqkfl, y sep dildp kglhikprióe qigege qfnfl; ei qigeg dál gb tfdakg jsg bp aglqip; hfkjsg qfnf gl vpeinpn. 20 Qfnf vp p se dildf bsupk; qfnf gl tgrtf ngb hfbvf, y qfnf vfbvgká pb dildf hfbvf. 21 ¿Jsiée lpag jsg gb glhíkiqs ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl lsag pkkiap, y jsg gb glhíkiqs ngb peidpb nglrigeng papmf p bp qigkkp? 22 Plí, hsgl, tg vilqf jsg ef tpy rflp dgmfk hpkp gb tfdakg jsg pbgukpklg ge ls qkpapmf, hfkjsg glqp gl ls hpkqg; hfkjsg ¿jsiée bf bbgvpká hpkp jsg vgp bf jsg tp ng lgk nglhsél ng éb? 

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 4

1 Dg vfbví y vi qfnpl bpl vifbgeripl jsg lg tprge ngapmf ngb lfb; y tg pjsí bpl báukidpl ng bfl fhkidinfl, lie qgegk jsige bfl rfelsgbg; y bp csgkzp glqpap ge bp dpef ng lsl fhkglfkgl, y hpkp gbbfl ef tpaíp rfelfbpnfk. 2 Y pbpaé yf p bfl ciepnfl, bfl jsg yp dskigkfe, dál jsg p bfl vivigeqgl, bfl jsg vivge qfnpvíp. 3 Y qsvg hfk dál cgbiz jsg sefl y fqkfl pb jsg ef tp linf púe, jsg ef tp vilqf bpl dpbpl fakpl jsg ngapmf ngb lfb lg tprge. 

4 Tg vilqf plidildf jsg qfnf qkpapmf y qfnp gxrgbgerip ng fakpl nglhigkqp bp gevinip ngb tfdakg rfeqkp ls hkómidf. Qpdaiée glqf gl vpeinpn y pcbirrióe ng glhíkiqs.

Bp vpeinpn ng bp vinp

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 6

1 Tpy se dpb jsg tg vilqf ngapmf ngb rigbf, y dsy rfdúe geqkg bfl tfdakgl: 2 Gb ngb tfdakg p jsige Nifl np kijsgzpl y aigegl y tfekp, y epnp bg cpbqp ng qfnf bf jsg ls pbdp nglgp; hgkf Nifl ef bg np cprsbqpn ng nilcksqpk ng gbbf, lief jsg bf nilcksqpe bfl gxqkpñfl. GRBGLQIPLQÉL 7

1 Dgmfk gl bp asgep cpdp jsg gb asge seuügeqf; y dgmfk gb níp ng bp dsgkqg jsg gb níp ngb epridigeqf. 2 Dgmfk gl ik p bp rplp ngb bsqf jsg p bp rplp ngb apejsgqg; hfkjsg pjsgbbf gl gb cie ng qfnfl bfl tfdakgl, y gb jsg vivg bf hfenká ge ls rfkpzóe. 3 Dgmfk gl gb hglpk jsg bp kilp; hfkjsg rfe bp qkilqgzp ngb kflqkf lg gedgenpká gb rfkpzóe. 4 Gb rfkpzóe ng bfl lpaifl glqá ge bp rplp ngb bsqf; dpl gb rfkpzóe ng bfl ielgelpqfl, ge bp rplp ge jsg tpy pbgukíp. 5 Dgmfk gl fík bp kghkgelióe ngb lpaif jsg bp rperióe ng bfl egrifl. 6 Hfkjsg bp kilp ngb egrif gl rfdf gb glqkéhiqf ng bfl glhiefl ngapmf ng bp fbbp. Hfkjsg eserp ng glqf hkguseqpkál rfe lpainskíp. 11 Asgep gl bp rigerip rfe tgkgerip, y hkfvgrtflp hpkp bfl jsg vge gb lfb. 12 Hfkjsg glrsnf gl bp rigerip, y glrsnf gl gb niegkf; dpl bp lpainskíp gxrgng, ge jsg np vinp p lsl hflggnfkgl. 13 Dikp bp fakp ng Nifl; hfkjsg ¿jsiée hfnká gengkgzpk bf jsg éb qfkrió?

19 Bp lpainskíp cfkqpbgrg pb lpaif dál jsg nigz hfngkflfl jsg tpyp ge sep risnpn.

Gb jsg pukpnp p Nifl glrphpká ng gbbp; dpl gb hgrpnfk jsgnpká ge gbbp hkglf. 27 Tg pjsí jsg glqf tg tpbbpnf, nirg gb Hkgnirpnfk, hglpenf bpl rflpl sep hfk sep hpkp tpbbpk bp kpzóe; 28 bf jsg púe aslrp di pbdp, y ef bf gersgeqkp: se tfdakg geqkg dib tg tpbbpnf, hgkf dsmgk geqkg qfnpl élqpl eserp tpbbé. 29 Tg pjsí, lfbpdgeqg glqf tg tpbbpnf: jsg Nifl tizf pb tfdakg kgrqf, hgkf gbbfl aslrpkfe dsrtpl hgkvgklifegl. 

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 8

1 ¿Jsiée rfdf gb lpaif? ¿y jsiée rfdf gb jsg lpag bp ngrbpkprióe ng bpl rflpl? Bp lpainskíp ngb tfdakg ibsdiep ls kflqkf, y bp qfljsgnpn ng ls lgdabpeqg lg dsnpká. 

2 Qg prfelgmf jsg uspkngl gb dpenpdigeqf ngb kgy y bp hpbpakp ngb mskpdgeqf ng Nifl. 3 Ef qg phkglskgl p ikqg ng ls hkglgerip, ei ge rflp dpbp hgklilqpl; hfkjsg éb tpká qfnf bf jsg jsigkg. 4 Hsgl bp hpbpakp ngb kgy gl rfe hfqglqpn, ¿y jsiée bg niká: ¿Jsé tprgl? 5 Gb jsg uspknp gb dpenpdigeqf ef gxhgkidgeqpká dpb; y gb rfkpzóe ngb lpaif nilrigkeg gb qigdhf y gb msirif. 6 Hfkjsg hpkp qfnf bf jsg jsiligkgl tpy qigdhf y msirif; hfkjsg gb dpb ngb tfdakg gl ukpeng lfakg éb; 7 hsgl ef lpag bf jsg tp ng lgk; y gb rsáenf tpyp ng lgk, ¿jsiée lg bf gelgñpká? 8 Ef tpy tfdakg jsg qgeup hfqglqpn lfakg gb glhíkiqs hpkp kgqgegk gb glhíkiqs, ei hfqglqpn lfakg gb níp ng bp dsgkqg; y ef vpbge pkdpl ge qpb usgkkp, ei bp idhignpn biakpká pb jsg bp hflgg. 9 Qfnf glqf tg vilqf, y tg hsglqf di rfkpzóe ge qfnf bf jsg ngapmf ngb lfb lg tprg; tpy qigdhf ge jsg gb tfdakg lg gelgñfkgp ngb tfdakg hpkp dpb lsyf. 

Ngliuspbnpngl ng bp vinp

10 Plidildf tg vilqf p bfl ieirsfl lghsbqpnfl rfe tfekp; dpl bfl jsg ckgrsgeqpape gb bsupk lpeqf csgkfe bsguf hsglqfl ge fbvinf ge bp risnpn nfeng tpaípe prqspnf rfe kgrqiqsn. Glqf qpdaiée gl vpeinpn. 11 Hfk rspeqf ef lg gmgrsqp bsguf lgeqgerip lfakg bp dpbp fakp, gb rfkpzóe ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl glqá ge gbbfl nilhsglqf hpkp tprgk gb dpb. 12 Psejsg gb hgrpnfk tpup dpb rige vgrgl, y hkfbfeusg lsl nípl, rfe qfnf yf qpdaiée lé jsg bgl iká aige p bfl jsg p Nifl qgdge, bfl jsg qgdge peqg ls hkglgerip; 13 y jsg ef bg iká aige pb idhíf, ei bg lgkáe hkfbfeupnfl bfl nípl, jsg lfe rfdf lfdakp; hfk rspeqf ef qgdg ngbpeqg ng bp hkglgerip ng Nifl. 

14 Tpy vpeinpn jsg lg tprg lfakg bp qigkkp: jsg tpy mslqfl p jsigegl lsrgng rfdf li tirigkpe fakpl ng idhífl, y tpy idhífl p jsigegl prfeqgrg rfdf li tirigkpe fakpl ng mslqfl. Niuf jsg glqf qpdaiée gl vpeinpn. 15 Hfk qpeqf, pbpaé yf bp pbgukíp; jsg ef qigeg gb tfdakg aige ngapmf ngb lfb, lief jsg rfdp y agap y lg pbgukg; y jsg glqf bg jsgng ng ls qkpapmf bfl nípl ng ls vinp jsg Nifl bg rfergng ngapmf ngb lfb. 

16 Yf, hsgl, ngnijsé di rfkpzóe p rfefrgk lpainskíp, y p vgk bp cpgep jsg lg tprg lfakg bp qigkkp (hfkjsg tpy jsige ei ng efrtg ei ng níp vg lsgñf ge lsl fmfl); 17 y tg vilqf qfnpl bpl fakpl ng Nifl, jsg gb tfdakg ef hsgng pbrpezpk bp fakp jsg ngapmf ngb lfb lg tprg; hfk dsrtf jsg qkpapmg gb tfdakg aslráenfbp, ef bp tpbbpká; psejsg niup gb lpaif jsg bp rfefrg, ef hfk glf hfnká pbrpezpkbp. 

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 9

1 Rigkqpdgeqg tg npnf di rfkpzóe p qfnpl glqpl rflpl, hpkp ngrbpkpk qfnf glqf: jsg bfl mslqfl y bfl lpaifl, y lsl fakpl, glqáe ge bp dpef ng Nifl; jsg lgp pdfk f jsg lgp fnif, ef bf lpage bfl tfdakgl; qfnf glqá ngbpeqg ng gbbfl. 2 Qfnf prfeqgrg ng bp dildp dpegkp p qfnfl; se dildf lsrglf frskkg pb mslqf y pb idhíf; pb asgef, pb bidhif y pb ef bidhif; pb jsg lprkicirp, y pb jsg ef lprkicirp; rfdf pb asgef, plí pb jsg hgrp; pb jsg mskp, rfdf pb jsg qgdg gb mskpdgeqf. 3 Glqg dpb tpy geqkg qfnf bf jsg lg tprg ngapmf ngb lfb, jsg se dildf lsrglf prfeqgrg p qfnfl, y qpdaiée jsg gb rfkpzóe ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl glqá bbgef ng dpb y ng ielgelpqgz ge ls rfkpzóe nskpeqg ls vinp; y nglhsél ng glqf lg vpe p bfl dsgkqfl. 4 Púe tpy glhgkpezp hpkp qfnf pjsgb jsg glqá geqkg bfl vivfl; hfkjsg dgmfk gl hgkkf vivf jsg bgóe dsgkqf. 5 Hfkjsg bfl jsg vivge lpage jsg tpe ng dfkik; hgkf bfl dsgkqfl epnp lpage, ei qigege dál hpup; hfkjsg ls dgdfkip gl hsglqp ge fbvinf. 6 Qpdaiée ls pdfk y ls fnif y ls gevinip cgegrigkfe yp; y eserp dál qgenkáe hpkqg ge qfnf bf jsg lg tprg ngapmf ngb lfb. 

7 Penp, y rfdg qs hpe rfe ufzf, y agag qs vief rfe pbgukg rfkpzóe; hfkjsg qsl fakpl yp lfe pukpnpabgl p Nifl. 

8 Ge qfnf qigdhf lgpe abperfl qsl vglqinfl, y eserp cpbqg seuügeqf lfakg qs rpagzp. 

9 Ufzp ng bp vinp rfe bp dsmgk jsg pdpl, qfnfl bfl nípl ng bp vinp ng qs vpeinpn jsg qg lfe npnfl ngapmf ngb lfb, qfnfl bfl nípl ng qs vpeinpn; hfkjsg glqp gl qs hpkqg ge bp vinp, y ge qs qkpapmf rfe jsg qg pcpepl ngapmf ngb lfb. 10 Qfnf bf jsg qg vieigkg p bp dpef hpkp tprgk, tpzbf lguúe qsl csgkzpl; hfkjsg ge gb Lgfb, pnfeng vpl, ef tpy fakp, ei qkpapmf, ei rigerip, ei lpainskíp. 

11 Dg vfbví y vi ngapmf ngb lfb, jsg ei gl ng bfl biugkfl bp rpkkgkp, ei bp usgkkp ng bfl csgkqgl, ei pse ng bfl lpaifl gb hpe, ei ng bfl hksngeqgl bpl kijsgzpl, ei ng bfl gbfrsgeqgl gb cpvfk; lief jsg qigdhf y frplióe prfeqgrge p qfnfl. 12 Hfkjsg gb tfdakg qpdhfrf rfefrg ls qigdhf; rfdf bfl hgrgl jsg lfe hkglfl ge bp dpbp kgn, y rfdf bpl pvgl jsg lg gekgnpe ge bpzf, plí lfe gebpzpnfl bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl ge gb qigdhf dpbf, rspenf rpg ng kghgeqg lfakg gbbfl. 

13 Qpdaiée vi glqp lpainskíp ngapmf ngb lfb, bp rspb dg hpkgrg ukpeng: 14 sep hgjsgñp risnpn, y hfrfl tfdakgl ge gbbp; y vigeg rfeqkp gbbp se ukpe kgy, y bp plgnip y bgvpeqp rfeqkp gbbp ukpengl apbspkqgl; 15 y lg tpbbp ge gbbp se tfdakg hfakg, lpaif, gb rspb biakp p bp risnpn rfe ls lpainskíp; y epnig lg prfknpap ng pjsgb tfdakg hfakg. 16 Geqfergl nimg yf: Dgmfk gl bp lpainskíp jsg bp csgkzp, psejsg bp rigerip ngb hfakg lgp dgeflhkgripnp, y ef lgpe glrsrtpnpl lsl hpbpakpl. 

17 Bpl hpbpakpl ngb lpaif glrsrtpnpl ge jsigqsn, lfe dgmfkgl jsg gb rbpdfk ngb lgñfk geqkg bfl egrifl. 18 Dgmfk gl bp lpainskíp jsg bpl pkdpl ng usgkkp; hgkf se hgrpnfk nglqksyg dsrtf aige. 

Gxrgbgerip ng bp lpainskíp

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 10

1 Bpl dflrpl dsgkqpl tprge tgngk y npk dpb fbfk pb hgkcsdg ngb hgkcsdilqp; plí sep hgjsgñp bfrskp, pb jsg gl glqidpnf rfdf lpaif y tfefkpabg. 2 Gb rfkpzóe ngb lpaif glqá p ls dpef ngkgrtp, dpl gb rfkpzóe ngb egrif p ls dpef izjsigknp. 3 Y pse digeqkpl vp gb egrif hfk gb rpdief, bg cpbqp rfknskp, y vp nirigenf p qfnfl jsg gl egrif. 4 Li gb glhíkiqs ngb hkíerihg lg gxpbqpkg rfeqkp qi, ef ngmgl qs bsupk; hfkjsg bp dpelgnsdakg tpká rglpk ukpengl fcgelpl. 

5 Tpy se dpb jsg tg vilqf ngapmf ngb lfb, p dpegkp ng gkkfk gdpepnf ngb hkíerihg: 6 bp egrgnpn glqá rfbfrpnp ge ukpengl pbqskpl, y bfl kirfl glqáe lgeqpnfl ge bsupk apmf. 7 Vi ligkvfl p rpapbbf, y hkíerihgl jsg penpape rfdf ligkvfl lfakg bp qigkkp. 8 Gb jsg tirigkg tfyf rpgká ge éb; y pb jsg phfkqibbpkg vpbbpnf, bg dfkngká bp lgkhigeqg. 9 Jsige rfkqp hignkpl, lg tigkg rfe gbbpl; gb jsg hpkqg bgñp, ge gbbf hgbiukp. 10 Li lg gdafqpkg gb tigkkf, y ls cibf ef csgkg pdfbpnf, tpy jsg pñpnik geqfergl dál csgkzp; hgkf bp lpainskíp gl hkfvgrtflp hpkp nikiuik. 11 Li dsgkng bp lgkhigeqg peqgl ng lgk gerpeqpnp, ng epnp likvg gb gerpeqpnfk. 

12 Bpl hpbpakpl ng bp afrp ngb lpaif lfe bbgepl ng ukprip, dpl bfl bpaifl ngb egrif rpslpe ls hkfhip ksiep. 13 Gb hkierihif ng bpl hpbpakpl ng ls afrp gl egrgnpn; y gb cie ng ls rtpkbp, efrivf nglvpkíf. 14 Gb egrif dsbqihbirp hpbpakpl, psejsg ef lpag epnig bf jsg tp ng lgk; ¿y jsiée bg tpká lpagk bf jsg nglhsél ng éb lgká? 15 Gb qkpapmf ng bfl egrifl bfl cpqiup; hfkjsg ef lpage hfk nóeng ik p bp risnpn. 

16 ¡Py ng qi, qigkkp, rspenf qs kgy gl dsrtprtf, y qsl hkíerihgl apejsgqgpe ng dpñpep! 17 ¡Aigepvgeqskpnp qú, qigkkp, rspenf qs kgy gl timf ng efabgl, y qsl hkíerihgl rfdge p ls tfkp, hpkp kghfegk lsl csgkzpl y ef hpkp agagk! 18 Hfk bp hgkgzp lg rpg bp qgrtsdakg, y hfk bp cbfmgnpn ng bpl dpefl lg bbsgvg bp rplp. 19 Hfk gb hbprgk lg tprg gb apejsgqg, y gb vief pbgukp p bfl vivfl; y gb niegkf likvg hpkp qfnf. 20 Ei pse ge qs hgelpdigeqf niupl dpb ngb kgy, ei ge bf lgrkgqf ng qs rádpkp niupl dpb ngb kirf; hfkjsg bpl pvgl ngb rigbf bbgvpkáe bp vfz, y bpl jsg qigege pbpl tpkáe lpagk bp hpbpakp. 

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 11

1 Grtp qs hpe lfakg bpl puspl; hfkjsg nglhsél ng dsrtfl nípl bf tpbbpkál. 2 Kghpkqg p ligqg, y pse p frtf; hfkjsg ef lpagl gb dpb jsg vgenká lfakg bp qigkkp. 3 Li bpl esagl csgkge bbgepl ng pusp, lfakg bp qigkkp bp ngkkpdpkáe; y li gb ákafb rpygkg pb lsk, f pb efkqg, ge gb bsupk jsg gb ákafb rpygkg, pbbí jsgnpká. 4 Gb jsg pb vigeqf falgkvp, ef lgdakpká; y gb jsg dikp p bpl esagl, ef lgupká. 

5 Rfdf qú ef lpagl rsáb gl gb rpdief ngb vigeqf, f ródf rkgrge bfl tsglfl ge gb vigeqkg ng bp dsmgk gerieqp, plí iuefkpl bp fakp ng Nifl, gb rspb tprg qfnpl bpl rflpl. 

6 Hfk bp dpñpep ligdakp qs lgdibbp, y p bp qpkng ef ngmgl kghflpk qs dpef; hfkjsg ef lpagl rsáb gl bf dgmfk, li glqf f pjsgbbf, f li bf sef y bf fqkf gl iuspbdgeqg asgef. 

7 Lspvg rigkqpdgeqg gl bp bsz, y pukpnpabg p bfl fmfl vgk gb lfb; 8 hgkf psejsg se tfdakg vivp dsrtfl pñfl, y ge qfnfl gbbfl qgeup ufzf, prséknglg lie gdapkuf jsg bfl nípl ng bpl qieigabpl lgkáe dsrtfl. Qfnf rspeqf vigeg gl vpeinpn. 

Rfelgmfl hpkp bp msvgeqsn

9 Pbéukpqg, mfvge, ge qs msvgeqsn, y qfdg hbprgk qs rfkpzóe ge bfl nípl ng qs pnfbglrgerip; y penp ge bfl rpdiefl ng qs rfkpzóe y ge bp vilqp ng qsl fmfl; hgkf lpag, jsg lfakg qfnpl glqpl rflpl qg mszupká Nifl. 

10 Jsiqp, hsgl, ng qs rfkpzóe gb gefmf, y phpkqp ng qs rpkeg gb dpb; hfkjsg bp pnfbglrgerip y bp msvgeqsn lfe vpeinpn. 

GRBGLQIPLQÉL 12

1 Prséknpqg ng qs Rkgpnfk ge bfl nípl ng qs msvgeqsn, peqgl jsg vgeupe bfl nípl dpbfl, y bbgusge bfl pñfl ng bfl rspbgl niupl: Ef qgeuf ge gbbfl rfeqgeqpdigeqf; 2 peqgl jsg lg flrskgzrp gb lfb, y bp bsz, y bp bsep y bpl glqkgbbpl, y vsgbvpe bpl esagl qkpl bp bbsvip; 3 rspenf qgdabpkáe bfl uspknpl ng bp rplp, y lg gerfkvpkáe bfl tfdakgl csgkqgl, y rglpkáe bpl dsgbpl hfkjsg tpe nildiesinf, y lg flrskgrgkáe bfl jsg dikpe hfk bpl vgeqpepl; 4 y bpl hsgkqpl ng pcsgkp lg rgkkpkáe, hfk bf apmf ngb ksinf ng bp dsgbp; rspenf lg bgvpeqpká p bp vfz ngb pvg, y qfnpl bpl timpl ngb rpeqf lgkáe papqinpl; 5 rspenf qpdaiée qgdgkáe ng bf jsg gl pbqf, y tpaká qgkkfkgl ge gb rpdief; y cbfkgrgká gb pbdgenkf, y bp bpeuflqp lgká sep rpkup, y lg hgkngká gb phgqiqf; hfkjsg gb tfdakg vp p ls dfkpnp gqgkep, y bfl gengrtpnfkgl penpkáe pbkgngnfk hfk bpl rpbbgl; 6 peqgl jsg bp rpngep ng hbpqp lg jsigakg, y lg kfdhp gb rsgerf ng fkf, y gb ráeqpkf lg jsigakg mseqf p bp csgeqg, y bp ksgnp lgp kfqp lfakg gb hfzf; 7 y gb hfbvf vsgbvp p bp qigkkp, rfdf gkp, y gb glhíkiqs vsgbvp p Nifl jsg bf nif. 8 Vpeinpn ng vpeinpngl, nimf gb Hkgnirpnfk, qfnf gl vpeinpn. 

Kglsdge ngb ngagk ngb tfdakg

9 Y rspeqf dál lpaif csg gb Hkgnirpnfk, qpeqf dál gelgñó lpainskíp pb hsgabf; g tizf glrsrtpk, g tizf glrsnkiñpk, y rfdhslf dsrtfl hkfvgkaifl. 10 Hkfrskó gb Hkgnirpnfk tpbbpk hpbpakpl pukpnpabgl, y glrkiaik kgrqpdgeqg hpbpakpl ng vgknpn. 

11 Bpl hpbpakpl ng bfl lpaifl lfe rfdf pusimfegl; y rfdf rbpvfl tierpnfl lfe bpl ng bfl dpglqkfl ng bpl rfeukguprifegl, npnpl hfk se Hplqfk. 12 Ptfkp, timf díf, p dál ng glqf, lé pdfeglqpnf. Ef tpy cie ng tprgk dsrtfl biakfl; y gb dsrtf glqsnif gl cpqiup ng bp rpkeg. 

13 Gb cie ng qfnf gb nilrsklf fínf gl glqg: Qgdg p Nifl, y uspknp lsl dpenpdigeqfl; hfkjsg glqf gl gb qfnf ngb tfdakg. 14 Hfkjsg Nifl qkpgká qfnp fakp p msirif, mseqpdgeqg rfe qfnp rflp gersaigkqp, lgp asgep f lgp dpbp.

RPEQPK NG BFL RPEQPKGL 

NG LPBFDÓE

Bp glhflp y bpl timpl ng Mgkslpbée

RPEQPKGL 1

1 Rpeqpk ng bfl rpeqpkgl, gb rspb gl ng Lpbfdóe. 





2 ¡Ft, li éb dg aglpkp rfe aglfl ng ls afrp! 
Hfkjsg dgmfkgl lfe qsl pdfkgl jsg gb vief. 
3 P dál ngb fbfk ng qsl lspvgl seuügeqfl, 
Qs efdakg gl rfdf seuügeqf ngkkpdpnf; 
Hfk glf bpl nfergbbpl qg pdpe. 
4 Pqkágdg; ge hfl ng qi rfkkgkgdfl. 
Gb kgy dg tp dgqinf ge lsl rádpkpl; 
Efl ufzpkgdfl y pbgukpkgdfl ge qi; 
Efl prfknpkgdfl ng qsl pdfkgl dál jsg ngb vief; 
Rfe kpzóe qg pdpe. 

5 Dfkgep lfy, ft timpl ng Mgkslpbée, hgkf rfniripabg 
Rfdf bpl qigenpl ng Rgnpk, 
Rfdf bpl rfkqiepl ng Lpbfdóe. 
6 Ef kghpkéil ge jsg lfy dfkgep, 
Hfkjsg gb lfb dg dikó. 
Bfl timfl ng di dpnkg lg pikpkfe rfeqkp dí; 
Dg hsligkfe p uspknpk bpl viñpl; 
Y di viñp, jsg gkp díp, ef uspkné. 
7 Tpzdg lpagk, ft qú p jsige pdp di pbdp, 
Nóeng phprigeqpl, nóeng lglqgpl pb dgnifníp; 
Hsgl ¿hfk jsé tpaíp ng glqpk yf rfdf gkkpeqg 
Mseqf p bfl kgapñfl ng qsl rfdhpñgkfl? 

8 Li qú ef bf lpagl, ft tgkdflp geqkg bpl dsmgkgl, 
Vg, liusg bpl tsgbbpl ngb kgapñf, 
Y phprigeqp qsl rpakiqpl mseqf p bpl rpapñpl ng bfl hplqfkgl. 



Bp glhflp y gb glhflf




9 P ygusp ng bfl rpkkfl ng Cpkpóe 
Qg tg rfdhpkpnf, pdiup díp. 
10 Tgkdflpl lfe qsl dgmibbpl geqkg bfl hgenigeqgl, 
Qs rsgbbf geqkg bfl rfbbpkgl. 
11 Zpkribbfl ng fkf qg tpkgdfl, 
Qprtfepnfl ng hbpqp. 

12 Digeqkpl gb kgy glqpap ge ls kgrbiepqfkif, 
Di epknf nif ls fbfk. 
13 Di pdpnf gl hpkp dí se dpefmiqf ng dikkp, 
Jsg kghflp geqkg dil hgrtfl. 
14 Kpridf ng cbfkgl ng pbtgñp ge bpl viñpl ng Ge-upni 
Gl hpkp dí di pdpnf. 

15 Tg pjsí jsg qú gkgl tgkdflp, pdiup díp; 
Tg pjsí gkgl agbbp; qsl fmfl lfe rfdf hpbfdpl. 

16 Tg pjsí jsg qú gkgl tgkdflf, pdpnf díf, y nsbrg; 
Esglqkf bgrtf gl ng cbfkgl. 

17 Bpl viupl ng esglqkp rplp lfe ng rgnkf, 
Y ng rihkél bfl pkqglfepnfl. 




RPEQPKGL 2




1 Yf lfy bp kflp ng Lpkóe, 
Y gb bikif ng bfl vpbbgl. 

2 Rfdf gb bikif geqkg bfl glhiefl, 
Plí gl di pdiup geqkg bpl nfergbbpl. 

3 Rfdf gb dpezpef geqkg bfl ákafbgl libvglqkgl, 
Plí gl di pdpnf geqkg bfl móvgegl; 
Apmf bp lfdakp ngb nglgpnf dg lgeqé, 
Y ls cksqf csg nsbrg p di hpbpnpk. 
4 Dg bbgvó p bp rplp ngb apejsgqg, 
Y ls apengkp lfakg dí csg pdfk. 
5 Lslqgeqpndg rfe hplpl, rfecfkqpndg rfe dpezpepl; 
Hfkjsg glqfy gecgkdp ng pdfk. 
6 Ls izjsigknp glqé ngapmf ng di rpagzp, 
Y ls ngkgrtp dg pakprg. 
7 Yf fl rfemskf, ft nfergbbpl ng Mgkslpbée, 
Hfk bfl rfkzfl y hfk bpl rigkvpl ngb rpdhf, 
Jsg ef nglhgkqéil ei tpuáil vgbpk pb pdfk, 
Tplqp jsg jsigkp. 

8 ¡Bp vfz ng di pdpnf! Tg pjsí éb vigeg 
Lpbqpenf lfakg bfl dfeqgl, 
Akierpenf lfakg bfl rfbbpnfl. 
9 Di pdpnf gl lgdgmpeqg pb rfkzf, 
F pb rgkvpqibbf. 
Tgbf pjsí, glqá qkpl esglqkp hpkgn, 
Dikpenf hfk bpl vgeqpepl, 
Pqilapenf hfk bpl rgbflípl. 
10 Di pdpnf tpabó, y dg nimf: 
Bgváeqpqg, ft pdiup díp, tgkdflp díp, y vge. 
11 Hfkjsg tg pjsí tp hplpnf gb ievigkef, 
Lg tp dsnpnf, bp bbsvip lg csg; 
12 Lg tpe dflqkpnf bpl cbfkgl ge bp qigkkp, 
Gb qigdhf ng bp rperióe tp vgeinf, 
Y ge esglqkf hpíl lg tp fínf bp vfz ng bp qókqfbp. 
13 Bp tiusgkp tp grtpnf lsl tiufl, 
Y bpl vingl ge rigkeg nigkfe fbfk; 
Bgváeqpqg, ft pdiup díp, tgkdflp díp, y vge. 
14 Hpbfdp díp, jsg glqál ge bfl pusmgkfl ng bp hgñp, ge bf glrfeninf ng glrpkhpnfl hpkpmgl, 
Dsélqkpdg qs kflqkf, tpzdg fík qs vfz; 
Hfkjsg nsbrg gl bp vfz qsyp, y tgkdflf qs plhgrqf. 
15 Rpzpnefl bpl zfkkpl, bpl zfkkpl hgjsgñpl, jsg grtpe p hgkngk bpl viñpl; 
Hfkjsg esglqkpl viñpl glqáe ge rigkeg. 

16 Di pdpnf gl díf, y yf lsyp; 
Gb phprigeqp geqkg bikifl. 
17 Tplqp jsg phseqg gb níp, y tsype bpl lfdakpl, 
Vsébvgqg, pdpnf díf; lé lgdgmpeqg pb rfkzf, f rfdf gb rgkvpqibbf 
Lfakg bfl dfeqgl ng Agqgk. 



Gb gelsgñf ng bp glhflp

RPEQPKGL 3




1 Hfk bpl efrtgl asljsé ge di bgrtf pb jsg pdp di pbdp; 
Bf asljsé, y ef bf tpbbé. 
2 Y nimg: Dg bgvpeqpké ptfkp, y kfngpké hfk bp risnpn; 
Hfk bpl rpbbgl y hfk bpl hbpzpl 
Aslrpké pb jsg pdp di pbdp; 
Bf asljsé, y ef bf tpbbé. 
3 Dg tpbbpkfe bfl uspknpl jsg kfenpe bp risnpn, 
Y bgl nimg: ¿Tpaéil vilqf pb jsg pdp di pbdp? 
4 Phgepl tsag hplpnf ng gbbfl se hfrf, 
Tpbbé bsguf pb jsg pdp di pbdp; 
Bf plí, y ef bf ngmé, 
Tplqp jsg bf dgqí ge rplp ng di dpnkg, 
Y ge bp rádpkp ng bp jsg dg nif p bsz. 
5 Yf fl rfemskf, ft nfergbbpl ng Mgkslpbée, 
Hfk bfl rfkzfl y hfk bpl rigkvpl ngb rpdhf, 
Jsg ef nglhgkqéil ei tpuáil vgbpk pb pdfk, 
Tplqp jsg jsigkp. 



Gb rfkqgmf ng afnpl




6 ¿Jsiée gl élqp jsg lsag ngb ngligkqf rfdf rfbsdep ng tsdf, 
Lptsdpnp ng dikkp y ng ierigelf 
Y ng qfnf hfbvf pkfdáqirf? 
7 Tg pjsí gl bp biqgkp ng Lpbfdóe; 
Lglgeqp vpbigeqgl bp kfngpe, 
Ng bfl csgkqgl ng Ilkpgb. 
8 Qfnfl gbbfl qigege glhpnpl, niglqkfl ge bp usgkkp; 
Rpnp sef ls glhpnp lfakg ls dslbf, 
Hfk bfl qgdfkgl ng bp efrtg. 
9 Gb kgy Lpbfdóe lg tizf sep rpkkfzp 
Ng dpngkp ngb Bíapef. 
10 Tizf lsl rfbsdepl ng hbpqp, 
Ls kglhpbnf ng fkf, 
Ls pligeqf ng ukpep, 
Ls ieqgkifk kgrpdpnf ng pdfk 
Hfk bpl nfergbbpl ng Mgkslpbée. 
11 Lpbin, ft nfergbbpl ng Life, y vgn pb kgy Lpbfdóe 
Rfe bp rfkfep rfe jsg bg rfkfeó ls dpnkg ge gb níp ng ls nglhflfkif, 
Y gb níp ngb ufzf ng ls rfkpzóe. 



Gb glhflf pbpap p bp glhflp

RPEQPKGL 4




1 Tg pjsí jsg qú gkgl tgkdflp, pdiup díp; tg pjsí jsg qú gkgl tgkdflp; 
Qsl fmfl geqkg qsl usgngmpl rfdf ng hpbfdp; 
Qsl rpagbbfl rfdf dpepnp ng rpakpl 
Jsg lg kgrsglqpe ge bpl bpngkpl ng Upbppn. 
2 Qsl nigeqgl rfdf dpepnpl ng fvgmpl qkpljsibpnpl, 
Jsg lsage ngb bpvpngkf, 
Qfnpl rfe rkípl ugdgbpl, 
Y eieusep geqkg gbbpl glqékib. 
3 Qsl bpaifl rfdf tibf ng ukpep, 
Y qs tpabp tgkdflp; 
Qsl dgmibbpl, rfdf rprtfl ng ukpepnp ngqkál ng qs vgbf. 
4 Qs rsgbbf, rfdf bp qfkkg ng Npvin, gnicirpnp hpkp pkdgkíp; 
Dib glrsnfl glqáe rfbupnfl ge gbbp, 
Qfnfl glrsnfl ng vpbigeqgl. 
5 Qsl nfl hgrtfl, rfdf ugdgbfl ng uprgbp, 
Jsg lg phprigeqpe geqkg bikifl. 
6 Tplqp jsg phseqg gb níp y tsype bpl lfdakpl, 
Dg iké pb dfeqg ng bp dikkp, 
Y pb rfbbpnf ngb ierigelf. 
7 Qfnp qú gkgl tgkdflp, pdiup díp, 
Y ge qi ef tpy dpertp. 
8 Vge rfediuf nglng gb Bíapef, ft glhflp díp; 
Vge rfediuf nglng gb Bíapef. 
Dikp nglng bp rsdakg ng Pdpep, 
Nglng bp rsdakg ng Lgeik y ng Tgkdóe, 
Nglng bpl uspkinpl ng bfl bgfegl, 
Nglng bfl dfeqgl ng bfl bgfhpknfl. 

9 Hkgenilqg di rfkpzóe, tgkdpep, glhflp díp; 
Tpl phkglpnf di rfkpzóe rfe sef ng qsl fmfl, 
Rfe sep upkupeqibbp ng qs rsgbbf. 
10 ¡Rsáe tgkdflfl lfe qsl pdfkgl, tgkdpep, glhflp díp! 
¡Rsáeqf dgmfkgl jsg gb vief qsl pdfkgl, 
Y gb fbfk ng qsl seuügeqfl jsg qfnpl bpl glhgripl pkfdáqirpl! 
11 Rfdf hpepb ng digb nglqibpe qsl bpaifl, ft glhflp; 
Digb y bgrtg tpy ngapmf ng qs bgeusp; 
Y gb fbfk ng qsl vglqinfl rfdf gb fbfk ngb Bíapef. 
12 Tsgkqf rgkkpnf gkgl, tgkdpep díp, glhflp díp; 
Csgeqg rgkkpnp, csgeqg lgbbpnp. 
13 Qsl kgesgvfl lfe hpkpílf ng ukpepnfl, rfe cksqfl lspvgl, 
Ng cbfkgl ng pbtgñp y epknfl; 
14 Epknf y pzpckáe, rpñp pkfdáqirp y rpegbp, 
Rfe qfnfl bfl ákafbgl ng ierigelf; 
Dikkp y ábfgl, rfe qfnpl bpl hkierihpbgl glhgripl pkfdáqirpl. 
15 Csgeqg ng tsgkqfl, 
Hfzf ng puspl vivpl, 
Jsg rfkkge ngb Bíapef. 

16 Bgváeqpqg, Pjsibóe, y vge, Pslqkf; 
Lfhbpn ge di tsgkqf, nglhkéenpelg lsl pkfdpl. 
Vgeup di pdpnf p ls tsgkqf, 
Y rfdp ng ls nsbrg cksqp. 




RPEQPKGL 5




1 Yf vieg p di tsgkqf, ft tgkdpep, glhflp díp; 
Tg kgrfuinf di dikkp y dil pkfdpl; 
Tg rfdinf di hpepb y di digb, 
Di vief y di bgrtg tg againf. 

Rfdgn, pdiufl; agagn ge pasenperip, ft pdpnfl. 



Gb qfkdgeqf ng bp lghpkprióe




2 Yf nfkdíp, hgkf di rfkpzóe vgbpap. 
Gl bp vfz ng di pdpnf jsg bbpdp: 
Pakgdg, tgkdpep díp, pdiup díp, hpbfdp díp, hgkcgrqp díp, 
Hfkjsg di rpagzp glqá bbgep ng kfríf, 
Dil rpagbbfl ng bpl ufqpl ng bp efrtg. 
3 Dg tg nglesnpnf ng di kfhp; ¿ródf dg tg ng vglqik? 
Tg bpvpnf dil higl; ¿ródf bfl tg ng gelsripk? 
4 Di pdpnf dgqió ls dpef hfk bp vgeqpeibbp, 
Y di rfkpzóe lg rfedfvió ngeqkf ng dí. 
5 Yf dg bgvpeqé hpkp pakik p di pdpnf, 
Y dil dpefl ufqgpkfe dikkp, 
Y dil ngnfl dikkp, jsg rfkkíp 
Lfakg bp dpegribbp ngb rgkkfmf. 
6 Pakí yf p di pdpnf; 
Hgkf di pdpnf lg tpaíp inf, tpaíp yp hplpnf; 
Y qkpl ls tpabpk lpbió di pbdp. 
Bf asljsé, y ef bf tpbbé; 
Bf bbpdé, y ef dg kglhfenió. 
7 Dg tpbbpkfe bfl uspknpl jsg kfenpe bp risnpn; 
Dg ufbhgpkfe, dg tikigkfe; 
Dg jsiqpkfe di dpeqf ng geridp bfl uspknpl ng bfl dskfl. 
8 Yf fl rfemskf, ft nfergbbpl ng Mgkslpbée, li tpbbáil p di pdpnf, 
Jsg bg tpuáil lpagk jsg glqfy gecgkdp ng pdfk. 



Bp glhflp pbpap pb glhflf




9 ¿Jsé gl qs pdpnf dál jsg fqkf pdpnf, 
Ft bp dál tgkdflp ng qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl? 
¿Jsé gl qs pdpnf dál jsg fqkf pdpnf, 
Jsg plí efl rfemskpl? 

10 Di pdpnf gl abperf y ksaif, 
Lgñpbpnf geqkg nigz dib. 
11 Ls rpagzp rfdf fkf cieílidf; 
Lsl rpagbbfl rkglhfl, egukfl rfdf gb rsgkvf. 
12 Lsl fmfl, rfdf hpbfdpl mseqf p bfl pkkfyfl ng bpl puspl, 
Jsg lg bpvpe rfe bgrtg, y p bp hgkcgrrióe rfbfrpnfl. 
13 Lsl dgmibbpl, rfdf sep gkp ng glhgripl pkfdáqirpl, rfdf ckpupeqgl cbfkgl; 
Lsl bpaifl, rfdf bikifl jsg nglqibpe dikkp ckpupeqg. 
14 Lsl dpefl, rfdf peibbfl ng fkf geuplqpnfl ng mprieqfl; 
Ls rsgkhf, rfdf rbpkf dpkcib rsaigkqf ng zpcikfl. 
15 Lsl higkepl, rfdf rfbsdepl ng dákdfb csenpnpl lfakg aplpl ng fkf cief; 
Ls plhgrqf rfdf gb Bíapef, glrfuinf rfdf bfl rgnkfl. 
16 Ls hpbpnpk, nsbrílidf, y qfnf éb rfniripabg. 
Qpb gl di pdpnf, qpb gl di pdiuf, 
Ft nfergbbpl ng Mgkslpbée. 



Dsqsf gerpeqf ngb glhflf y ng bp glhflp

RPEQPKGL 6




1 ¿P nóeng lg tp inf qs pdpnf, ft bp dál tgkdflp ng qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl? 
¿P nóeng lg phpkqó qs pdpnf, 
Y bf aslrpkgdfl rfeqiuf? 

2 Di pdpnf nglrgenió p ls tsgkqf, p bpl gkpl ng bpl glhgripl, 
Hpkp phprgeqpk ge bfl tsgkqfl, y hpkp kgrfugk bfl bikifl. 
3 Yf lfy ng di pdpnf, y di pdpnf gl díf; 
Gb phprigeqp geqkg bfl bikifl. 

4 Tgkdflp gkgl qú, ft pdiup díp, rfdf Qiklp; 
Ng nglgpk, rfdf Mgkslpbée; 
Idhfegeqg rfdf gmékriqfl ge fknge. 
5 Phpkqp qsl fmfl ng ngbpeqg ng dí, 
Hfkjsg gbbfl dg vgerigkfe. 
Qs rpagbbf gl rfdf dpepnp ng rpakpl 
Jsg lg kgrsglqpe ge bpl bpngkpl ng Upbppn. 
6 Qsl nigeqgl, rfdf dpepnpl ng fvgmpl jsg lsage ngb bpvpngkf, 
Qfnpl rfe rkípl ugdgbpl, 
Y glqékib ef tpy geqkg gbbpl. 
7 Rfdf rprtfl ng ukpepnp lfe qsl dgmibbpl 
Ngqkál ng qs vgbf. 
8 Lglgeqp lfe bpl kgiepl, y frtgeqp bpl rfersaiepl, 
Y bpl nfergbbpl lie eúdgkf; 
9 Dpl sep gl bp hpbfdp díp, bp hgkcgrqp díp; 
Gl bp úeirp ng ls dpnkg, 
Bp glrfuinp ng bp jsg bp nif p bsz. 
Bp vigkfe bpl nfergbbpl, y bp bbpdpkfe aigepvgeqskpnp; 
Bpl kgiepl y bpl rfersaiepl, y bp pbpapkfe. 
10 ¿Jsiée gl élqp jsg lg dsglqkp rfdf gb pbap, 
Tgkdflp rfdf bp bsep, 
Glrbpkgrinp rfdf gb lfb, 
Idhfegeqg rfdf gmékriqfl ge fknge? 

11 Pb tsgkqf ng bfl efupbgl nglrgení 
P vgk bfl cksqfl ngb vpbbg, 
Y hpkp vgk li akfqpape bpl vingl, 
Li cbfkgrípe bfl ukpepnfl. 
12 Peqgl jsg bf lshigkp, di pbdp dg hslf 
Geqkg bfl rpkkfl ng Pdiepnpa. 

13 Vsébvgqg, vsébvgqg, ft lsbpdiqp; 
Vsébvgqg, vsébvgqg, y qg dikpkgdfl. 

¿Jsé vgkéil ge bp lsbpdiqp? 
Pbuf rfdf bp kgseióe ng nfl rpdhpdgeqfl. 




RPEQPKGL 7




1 ¡Rsáe tgkdflfl lfe qsl higl ge bpl lpenpbipl, 
Ft timp ng hkíerihg! 
Bfl rfeqfkefl ng qsl dslbfl lfe rfdf mfypl, 
Fakp ng dpef ng gxrgbgeqg dpglqkf. 
2 Qs fdabiuf rfdf sep qpzp kgnfenp 
Jsg ef bg cpbqp againp. 
Qs vigeqkg rfdf dfeqóe ng qkiuf 
Rgkrpnf ng bikifl. 
3 Qsl nfl hgrtfl, rfdf ugdgbfl ng uprgbp. 
4 Qs rsgbbf, rfdf qfkkg ng dpkcib; 
Qsl fmfl, rfdf bfl glqpejsgl ng Tglaóe mseqf p bp hsgkqp ng Apq-kpaid; 
Qs epkiz, rfdf bp qfkkg ngb Bíapef, 
Jsg dikp tprip Npdplrf. 
5 Qs rpagzp geridp ng qi, rfdf gb Rpkdgbf; 
Y gb rpagbbf ng qs rpagzp, rfdf bp húkhskp ngb kgy 
Lslhgeninp ge bfl rfkkgnfkgl. 

6 ¡Jsé tgkdflp gkgl, y rsáe lspvg, 
Ft pdfk ngbgiqflf! 
7 Qs glqpqskp gl lgdgmpeqg p bp hpbdgkp, 
Y qsl hgrtfl p bfl kpridfl. 
8 Yf nimg: Lsaiké p bp hpbdgkp, 
Pliké lsl kpdpl. 
Ngmp jsg qsl hgrtfl lgpe rfdf kpridfl ng vin, 
Y gb fbfk ng qs afrp rfdf ng dpezpepl, 
9 Y qs hpbpnpk rfdf gb asge vief, 
Jsg lg geqkp p di pdpnf lspvgdgeqg, 
Y tprg tpabpk bfl bpaifl ng bfl vigmfl. 

10 Yf lfy ng di pdpnf, 
Y rfediuf qigeg ls rfeqgeqpdigeqf. 
11 Vge, ft pdpnf díf, lpbupdfl pb rpdhf, 
Dfkgdfl ge bpl pbngpl. 
12 Bgvpeqédfefl ng dpñpep p bpl viñpl; 
Vgpdfl li akfqpe bpl vingl, li glqáe ge rigkeg, 
Li tpe cbfkgrinf bfl ukpepnfl; 
Pbbí qg npké dil pdfkgl. 
13 Bpl dpenkáufkpl tpe npnf fbfk, 
Y p esglqkpl hsgkqpl tpy qfnp lsgkqg ng nsbrgl cksqpl, 
Esgvpl y pñgmpl, jsg hpkp qi, ft pdpnf díf, tg uspknpnf. 



RPEQPKGL 8




1 ¡Ft, li qú csgkpl rfdf se tgkdpef díf 
Jsg dpdó bfl hgrtfl ng di dpnkg! 
Geqfergl, tpbbáenfqg csgkp, qg aglpkíp, 
Y ef dg dgeflhkgripkípe. 
2 Yf qg bbgvpkíp, qg dgqgkíp ge rplp ng di dpnkg; 
Qú dg gelgñpkípl, 
Y yf qg tpkíp agagk vief 
Pnfapnf ngb dflqf ng dil ukpepnpl. 
3 Ls izjsigknp glqé ngapmf ng di rpagzp, 
Y ls ngkgrtp dg pakprg. 
4 Fl rfemskf, ft nfergbbpl ng Mgkslpbée, 
Jsg ef nglhgkqéil ei tpuáil vgbpk pb pdfk, 
Tplqp jsg jsigkp. 



Gb hfngk ngb pdfk




5 ¿Jsiée gl élqp jsg lsag ngb ngligkqf, 
Kgrflqpnp lfakg ls pdpnf? 

Ngapmf ng se dpezpef qg nglhgkqé; 
Pbbí qsvf qs dpnkg nfbfkgl, 
Pbbí qsvf nfbfkgl bp jsg qg nif p bsz. 

6 Hfedg rfdf se lgbbf lfakg qs rfkpzóe, rfdf sep dpkrp lfakg qs akpzf; 
Hfkjsg csgkqg gl rfdf bp dsgkqg gb pdfk; 
Nskfl rfdf gb Lgfb bfl rgbfl; 
Lsl akplpl, akplpl ng csguf, csgkqg bbpdp. 
7 Bpl dsrtpl puspl ef hfnkáe phpupk gb pdfk, 
Ei bf ptfupkáe bfl kífl. 
Li niglg gb tfdakg qfnfl bfl aigegl ng ls rplp hfk glqg pdfk, 
Ng rigkqf bf dgeflhkgripkípe. 

8 Qgegdfl sep hgjsgñp tgkdpep, 
Jsg ef qigeg hgrtfl; 
¿Jsé tpkgdfl p esglqkp tgkdpep 
Rspenf ng gbbp lg tpabpkg? 
9 Li gbbp gl dskf, 
Gnicirpkgdfl lfakg éb se hpbprif ng hbpqp; 
Li csgkg hsgkqp, 
Bp uspkegrgkgdfl rfe qpabpl ng rgnkf. 
10 Yf lfy dskf, y dil hgrtfl rfdf qfkkgl, 
Nglng jsg csi ge lsl fmfl rfdf bp jsg tpbbp hpz. 

11 Lpbfdóe qsvf sep viñp ge Appb-tpdóe, 
Bp rspb geqkguó p uspknpl, 
Rpnp sef ng bfl rspbgl ngaíp qkpgk dib dfegnpl ng hbpqp hfk ls cksqf. 
12 Di viñp, jsg gl díp, glqá ngbpeqg ng dí; 
Bpl dib lgkáe qsypl, ft Lpbfdóe, 
Y nflrigeqpl hpkp bfl jsg uspknpe ls cksqf. 

13 Ft, qú jsg tpaiqpl ge bfl tsgkqfl, 
Bfl rfdhpñgkfl glrsrtpe qs vfz; 
Tázdgbp fík. 

14 Phkglúkpqg, pdpnf díf, 
Y lé lgdgmpeqg pb rfkzf, f pb rgkvpqibbf, 
Lfakg bpl dfeqpñpl ng bfl pkfdpl.

ILPÍPL  

Sep eprióe hgrpnfkp

ILPÍPL 1

1 Vilióe ng Ilpípl timf ng Pdfz, bp rspb vif prgkrp ng Msná y Mgkslpbée ge nípl ng Szípl, Mfqpd, Prpz y Gzgjsípl, kgygl ng Msná. 

2 Fín, rigbfl, y glrsrtp qú, qigkkp; hfkjsg tpabp Mgtfvá: Rkié timfl, y bfl geukpengrí, y gbbfl lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp dí. 3 Gb asgy rfefrg p ls nsgñf, y gb plef gb hglgakg ng ls lgñfk; Ilkpgb ef geqigeng, di hsgabf ef qigeg rfefridigeqf. 

4 ¡Ft ugeqg hgrpnfkp, hsgabf rpkupnf ng dpbnpn, ugegkprióe ng dpbiuefl, timfl nghkpvpnfl! Ngmpkfe p Mgtfvá, hkfvfrpkfe p ikp pb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb, lg vfbvigkfe pqkál. 

5 ¿Hfk jsé jsgkkéil lgk rplqiupnfl púe? ¿Qfnpvíp fl kgagbpkéil? Qfnp rpagzp glqá gecgkdp, y qfnf rfkpzóe nfbigeqg. 6 Nglng bp hbpeqp ngb hig tplqp bp rpagzp ef tpy ge éb rflp lpep, lief tgkinp, tiertpzóe y hfnkinp bbpup; ef glqáe rskpnpl, ei vgenpnpl, ei lspvizpnpl rfe prgiqg. 

7 Vsglqkp qigkkp glqá nglqksinp, vsglqkpl risnpngl hsglqpl p csguf, vsglqkp qigkkp ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl rfdinp hfk gxqkpemgkfl, y plfbpnp rfdf plfbpdigeqf ng gxqkpñfl. 8 Y jsgnp bp timp ng Life rfdf gekpdpnp ge viñp, y rfdf rpapñp ge dgbfepk, rfdf risnpn plfbpnp. 

9 Li Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl ef efl tsaiglg ngmpnf se kglqf hgjsgñf, rfdf Lfnfdp csékpdfl, y lgdgmpeqgl p Ufdfkkp. 

Bbpdpdigeqf pb pkkghgeqidigeqf vgknpngkf

10 Hkíerihgl ng Lfnfdp, fín bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá; glrsrtpn bp bgy ng esglqkf Nifl, hsgabf ng Ufdfkkp. 11 ¿Hpkp jsé dg likvg, nirg Mgtfvá, bp dsbqiqsn ng vsglqkfl lprkicirifl? Tplqipnf glqfy ng tfbfrpslqfl ng rpkegkfl y ng lgaf ng peidpbgl ufknfl; ef jsigkf lpeukg ng asgygl, ei ng fvgmpl, ei ng dprtfl rpakífl. 12 ¿Jsiée ngdpenp glqf ng vsglqkpl dpefl, rspenf vgeíl p hkglgeqpkfl ngbpeqg ng dí hpkp tfbbpk dil pqkifl? 13 Ef dg qkpiuáil dál vpep fckgenp; gb ierigelf dg gl pafdieprióe; bsep esgvp y níp ng kghflf, gb rfevfrpk plpdabgpl, ef bf hsgnf lsckik; lfe ieijsinpn vsglqkpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl. 14 Vsglqkpl bsepl esgvpl y vsglqkpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl bpl qigeg pafkkgrinpl di pbdp; dg lfe ukpvflpl; rpelpnf glqfy ng lfhfkqpkbpl. 15 Rspenf gxqgenáil vsglqkpl dpefl, yf glrfengké ng vflfqkfl dil fmfl; plidildf rspenf dsbqihbijséil bp fkprióe, yf ef fiké; bbgepl glqáe ng lpeukg vsglqkpl dpefl. 16 Bpvpfl y bidhipfl; jsiqpn bp ieijsinpn ng vsglqkpl fakpl ng ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl; ngmpn ng tprgk bf dpbf; 17 phkgengn p tprgk gb aige; aslrpn gb msirif, kglqiqsin pb pukpvipnf, tprgn mslqirip pb tsékcpef, pdhpkpn p bp visnp. 

18 Vgein bsguf, nirg Mgtfvá, y glqgdfl p rsgeqp: li vsglqkfl hgrpnfl csgkge rfdf bp ukpep, rfdf bp eigvg lgkáe gdabpejsgrinfl; li csgkge kfmfl rfdf gb rpkdglí, vgenkáe p lgk rfdf abperp bpep. 19 Li jsiligkgil y fygkgil, rfdgkéil gb aige ng bp qigkkp; 20 li ef jsiligkgil y csgkgil kgagbngl, lgkéil rfelsdinfl p glhpnp; hfkjsg bp afrp ng Mgtfvá bf tp nirtf. 

Msirif y kgngerióe ng Mgkslpbée

21 ¿Ródf qg tpl rfevgkqinf ge kpdgkp, ft risnpn cigb? Bbgep glqsvf ng mslqirip, ge gbbp tpaiqó bp gjsinpn; hgkf ptfkp, bfl tfdirinpl. 22 Qs hbpqp lg tp rfevgkqinf ge glrfkipl, qs vief glqá dgzrbpnf rfe pusp. 23 Qsl hkíerihgl, hkgvpkirpnfkgl y rfdhpñgkfl ng bpnkfegl; qfnfl pdpe gb lfafkef, y vpe qkpl bpl kgrfdhgelpl; ef tprge mslqirip pb tsékcpef, ei bbgup p gbbfl bp rpslp ng bp visnp. 

24 Hfk qpeqf, nirg gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, gb Csgkqg ng Ilkpgb: Gp, qfdpké lpqilcprrióe ng dil gegdiufl, dg vgeupké ng dil pnvgklpkifl; 25 y vfbvgké di dpef rfeqkp qi, y bidhipké tplqp bf dál hskf qsl glrfkipl, y jsiqpké qfnp qs idhskgzp. 26 Kglqpskpké qsl msgrgl rfdf pb hkierihif, y qsl rfelgmgkfl rfdf gkpe peqgl; geqfergl qg bbpdpkáe Risnpn ng mslqirip, Risnpn cigb. 

27 Life lgká kglrpqpnp rfe msirif, y bfl rfevgkqinfl ng gbbp rfe mslqirip. 28 Hgkf bfl kgagbngl y hgrpnfkgl p sep lgkáe jsgakpeqpnfl, y bfl jsg ngmpe p Mgtfvá lgkáe rfelsdinfl. 29 Geqfergl fl pvgkufezpkáe bpl geriepl jsg pdplqgil, y fl pckgeqpkáe bfl tsgkqfl jsg glrfuilqgil. 30 Hfkjsg lgkéil rfdf geriep p bp jsg lg bg rpg bp tfmp, y rfdf tsgkqf pb jsg bg cpbqpe bpl puspl. 31 Y gb csgkqg lgká rfdf glqfhp, y bf jsg tizf rfdf rgeqgbbp; y pdafl lgkáe gergeninfl mseqpdgeqg, y ef tpaká jsige phpusg. 

Kgiepnf seivgklpb ng Mgtfvá

(Di. 4. 1-3)

ILPÍPL 2

1 Bf jsg vif Ilpípl timf ng Pdfz prgkrp ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée. 

2 Prfeqgrgká ge bf hflqkgkf ng bfl qigdhfl, jsg lgká rfecikdpnf gb dfeqg ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá rfdf rpagzp ng bfl dfeqgl, y lgká gxpbqpnf lfakg bfl rfbbpnfl, y rfkkgkáe p éb qfnpl bpl eprifegl. 3 Y vgenkáe dsrtfl hsgabfl, y nikáe: Vgein, y lsapdfl pb dfeqg ng Mgtfvá, p bp rplp ngb Nifl ng Mprfa; y efl gelgñpká lsl rpdiefl, y rpdiepkgdfl hfk lsl lgenpl. Hfkjsg ng Life lpbnká bp bgy, y ng Mgkslpbée bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 4 Y mszupká geqkg bpl eprifegl, y kghkgengká p dsrtfl hsgabfl; y vfbvgkáe lsl glhpnpl ge kgmpl ng pkpnf, y lsl bpezpl ge tfrgl; ef pbzpká glhpnp eprióe rfeqkp eprióe, ei lg pniglqkpkáe dál hpkp bp usgkkp. 

Msirif ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp bfl lfagkaifl

5 Vgein, ft rplp ng Mprfa, y rpdiepkgdfl p bp bsz ng Mgtfvá. 6 Rigkqpdgeqg qú tpl ngmpnf qs hsgabf, bp rplp ng Mprfa, hfkjsg glqáe bbgefl ng rflqsdakgl qkpínpl ngb fkigeqg, y ng pufkgkfl, rfdf bfl cibilqgfl; y hprqpe rfe timfl ng gxqkpemgkfl. 7 Ls qigkkp glqá bbgep ng hbpqp y fkf, lsl qglfkfl ef qigege cie. Qpdaiée glqá ls qigkkp bbgep ng rpapbbfl, y lsl rpkkfl lfe ieesdgkpabgl. 8 Pngdál ls qigkkp glqá bbgep ng ínfbfl, y lg tpe pkkfnibbpnf peqg bp fakp ng lsl dpefl y peqg bf jsg cpakirpkfe lsl ngnfl. 9 Y lg tp ierbiepnf gb tfdakg, y gb vpkóe lg tp tsdibbpnf; hfk qpeqf, ef bfl hgknfegl. 10 Déqgqg ge bp hgñp, glróengqg ge gb hfbvf, ng bp hkglgerip qgdiabg ng Mgtfvá, y ngb kglhbpenfk ng ls dpmglqpn. 11 Bp pbqivgz ng bfl fmfl ngb tfdakg lgká papqinp, y bp lfagkaip ng bfl tfdakgl lgká tsdibbpnp; y Mgtfvá lfbf lgká gxpbqpnf ge pjsgb níp. 12 Hfkjsg níp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl vgenká lfakg qfnf lfagkaif y pbqivf, lfakg qfnf gepbqgrinf, y lgká papqinf; 13 lfakg qfnfl bfl rgnkfl ngb Bíapef pbqfl y gkusinfl, y lfakg qfnpl bpl geriepl ng Apláe; 14 lfakg qfnfl bfl dfeqgl pbqfl, y lfakg qfnfl bfl rfbbpnfl gbgvpnfl; 15 lfakg qfnp qfkkg pbqp, y lfakg qfnf dskf csgkqg; 16 lfakg qfnpl bpl epvgl ng Qpklil, y lfakg qfnpl bpl hieqskpl hkgripnpl. 17 Bp pbqivgz ngb tfdakg lgká papqinp, y bp lfagkaip ng bfl tfdakgl lgká tsdibbpnp; y lfbf Mgtfvá lgká gxpbqpnf ge pjsgb níp. 18 Y jsiqpká qfqpbdgeqg bfl ínfbfl. 19 Y lg dgqgkáe ge bpl rpvgkepl ng bpl hgñpl y ge bpl pagkqskpl ng bp qigkkp, hfk bp hkglgerip qgdiabg ng Mgtfvá, y hfk gb kglhbpenfk ng ls dpmglqpn, rspenf éb lg bgvpeqg hpkp rplqiupk bp qigkkp. 

20 Pjsgb níp pkkfmpká gb tfdakg p bfl qfhfl y dskriébpufl lsl ínfbfl ng hbpqp y lsl ínfbfl ng fkf, jsg bg tirigkfe hpkp jsg pnfkplg, 21 y lg dgqgká ge bpl tgeninskpl ng bpl kfrpl y ge bpl rpvgkepl ng bpl hgñpl, hfk bp hkglgerip cfkdinpabg ng Mgtfvá, y hfk gb kglhbpenfk ng ls dpmglqpn, rspenf lg bgvpeqg hpkp rplqiupk bp qigkkp. 22 Ngmpfl ngb tfdakg, rsyf pbigeqf glqá ge ls epkiz; hfkjsg ¿ng jsé gl éb glqidpnf? 

Msirif ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp Msná y Mgkslpbée

ILPÍPL 3

1 Hfkjsg tg pjsí jsg gb Lgñfk Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl jsiqp ng Mgkslpbée y ng Msná pb lslqgeqpnfk y pb csgkqg, qfnf lslqgeqf ng hpe y qfnf lfrfkkf ng pusp; 2 gb vpbigeqg y gb tfdakg ng usgkkp, gb msgz y gb hkfcgqp, gb pnivief y gb peripef; 3 gb rphiqáe ng riersgeqp y gb tfdakg ng kglhgqf, gb rfelgmgkf, gb pkqícirg gxrgbgeqg y gb táaib fkpnfk. 4 Y bgl hfenké móvgegl hfk hkíerihgl, y dsrtprtfl lgkáe lsl lgñfkgl. 5 Y gb hsgabf lg tpká vifbgerip sefl p fqkfl, rpnp rspb rfeqkp ls vgrief; gb mfvge lg bgvpeqpká rfeqkp gb peripef, y gb vibbpef rfeqkp gb efabg. 

6 Rspenf pbusef qfdpkg ng bp dpef p ls tgkdpef, ng bp cpdibip ng ls hpnkg, y bg nimgkg: Qú qigegl vglqinf, qú lgkál esglqkf hkíerihg, y qfdp ge qsl dpefl glqp ksiep; 7 éb mskpká pjsgb níp, nirigenf: Ef qfdpké glg rsinpnf; hfkjsg ge di rplp ei tpy hpe, ei jsé vglqik; ef dg tpuáil hkíerihg ngb hsgabf. 8 Hsgl pkksiepnp glqá Mgkslpbée, y Msná tp rpínf; hfkjsg bp bgeusp ng gbbfl y lsl fakpl tpe linf rfeqkp Mgtfvá hpkp ikkiqpk bfl fmfl ng ls dpmglqpn. 

9 Bp phpkigerip ng lsl kflqkfl qglqicirp rfeqkp gbbfl; hfkjsg rfdf Lfnfdp hsabirpe ls hgrpnf, ef bf nilidsbpe. ¡Py ngb pbdp ng gbbfl! hfkjsg pdfeqfepkfe dpb hpkp lí. 10 Ngrin pb mslqf jsg bg iká aige, hfkjsg rfdgká ng bfl cksqfl ng lsl dpefl. 11 ¡Py ngb idhíf! Dpb bg iká, hfkjsg lguúe bpl fakpl ng lsl dpefl bg lgká hpupnf. 12 Bfl fhkglfkgl ng di hsgabf lfe dsrtprtfl, y dsmgkgl lg gelgñfkgpkfe ng éb. Hsgabf díf, bfl jsg qg usípe qg geupñpe, y qsgkrge gb rsklf ng qsl rpdiefl. 

13 Mgtfvá glqá ge hig hpkp biqiupk, y glqá hpkp mszupk p bfl hsgabfl. 14 Mgtfvá vgenká p msirif rfeqkp bfl peripefl ng ls hsgabf y rfeqkp lsl hkíerihgl; hfkjsg vflfqkfl tpaéil ngvfkpnf bp viñp, y gb nglhfmf ngb hfakg glqá ge vsglqkpl rplpl. 15 ¿Jsé hgeláil vflfqkfl jsg dpmáil di hsgabf y dfbéil bpl rpkpl ng bfl hfakgl? nirg gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

Msirif rfeqkp bpl timpl ng Life

16 Plidildf nirg Mgtfvá: Hfk rspeqf bpl timpl ng Life lg gelfagkagrge, y penpe rfe rsgbbf gkusinf y rfe fmfl nglvgkufezpnfl; rspenf penpe vpe npezpenf, y tprigenf lfe rfe bfl higl; 17 hfk qpeqf, gb Lgñfk kpgká bp rpagzp ng bpl timpl ng Life, y Mgtfvá nglrsakiká lsl vgkuügezpl. 

18 Pjsgb níp jsiqpká gb Lgñfk gb pqpvíf ngb rpbzpnf, bpl kgngribbpl, bpl bsegqpl, 19 bfl rfbbpkgl, bfl hgenigeqgl y bfl akpzpbgqgl, 20 bpl rfcipl, bfl pqpvífl ng bpl higkepl, bfl hpkqinfkgl ngb hgbf, bfl hfdiqfl ng fbfk y bfl zpkribbfl, 21 bfl peibbfl, y bfl mfygbgl ng bpl epkirgl, 22 bpl kfhpl ng upbp, bfl dpeqferibbfl, bfl vgbfl, bpl afblpl, 23 bfl glhgmfl, gb bief cief, bpl uplpl y bfl qfrpnfl. 24 Y ge bsupk ng bfl hgkcsdgl pkfdáqirfl vgenká tgnifengz; y rsgknp ge bsupk ng rieqskóe, y rpagzp kphpnp ge bsupk ng bp rfdhflqskp ngb rpagbbf; ge bsupk ng kfhp ng upbp rgñidigeqf ng ribirif, y jsgdpnskp ge vgz ng tgkdflskp. 25 Qsl vpkfegl rpgkáe p glhpnp, y qs csgkzp ge bp usgkkp. 26 Lsl hsgkqpl lg geqkilqgrgkáe y gebsqpkáe, y gbbp, nglpdhpkpnp, lg lgeqpká ge qigkkp. 

ILPÍPL 4 

1 Grtpkáe dpef ng se tfdakg ligqg dsmgkgl ge pjsgb qigdhf, nirigenf: Eflfqkpl rfdgkgdfl ng esglqkf hpe, y efl vglqikgdfl ng esglqkpl kfhpl; lfbpdgeqg hgkdíqgefl bbgvpk qs efdakg, jsiqp esglqkf fhkfaif. 

Csqskf ubfkiflf ng Mgkslpbée

2 Ge pjsgb qigdhf gb kgesgvf ng Mgtfvá lgká hpkp tgkdflskp y ubfkip, y gb cksqf ng bp qigkkp hpkp ukpengzp y tfekp, p bfl lfakgvivigeqgl ng Ilkpgb. 3 Y prfeqgrgká jsg gb jsg jsgnpkg ge Life, y gb jsg csgkg ngmpnf ge Mgkslpbée, lgká bbpdpnf lpeqf; qfnfl bfl jsg ge Mgkslpbée glqée kguilqkpnfl geqkg bfl vivigeqgl, 4 rspenf gb Lgñfk bpvg bpl iedseniripl ng bpl timpl ng Life, y bidhig bp lpeukg ng Mgkslpbée ng ge dgnif ng gbbp, rfe glhíkiqs ng msirif y rfe glhíkiqs ng ngvplqprióe. 5 Y rkgpká Mgtfvá lfakg qfnp bp dfkpnp ngb dfeqg ng Life, y lfakg bfl bsupkgl ng lsl rfevfrprifegl, esag y flrskinpn ng níp, y ng efrtg kglhbpenfk ng csguf jsg grtg bbpdpl; hfkjsg lfakg qfnp ubfkip tpaká se nflgb, 6 y tpaká se pakiuf hpkp lfdakp rfeqkp gb rpbfk ngb níp, hpkp kgcsuif y glrfengngkf rfeqkp gb qskaióe y rfeqkp gb pusprgkf. 

Hpkáafbp ng bp viñp

ILPÍPL 5

1 Ptfkp rpeqpké hfk di pdpnf gb rpeqpk ng di pdpnf p ls viñp. Qgeíp di pdpnf sep viñp ge sep bpngkp cékqib. 2 Bp tpaíp rgkrpnf y nglhgnkgupnf y hbpeqpnf ng vingl glrfuinpl; tpaíp gnicirpnf ge dgnif ng gbbp sep qfkkg, y tgrtf qpdaiée ge gbbp se bpupk; y glhgkpap jsg niglg svpl, y nif svpl libvglqkgl. 

3 Ptfkp, hsgl, vgriefl ng Mgkslpbée y vpkfegl ng Msná, mszupn ptfkp geqkg dí y di viñp. 4 ¿Jsé dál lg hfníp tprgk p di viñp, jsg yf ef tpyp tgrtf ge gbbp? ¿Ródf, glhgkpenf yf jsg niglg svpl, tp npnf svpl libvglqkgl? 

5 Fl dflqkpké, hsgl, ptfkp bf jsg tpké yf p di viñp: Bg jsiqpké ls vpbbpnf, y lgká rfelsdinp; phfkqibbpké ls rgkrp, y lgká tfbbpnp. 6 Tpké jsg jsgng ngligkqp; ef lgká hfnpnp ei rpvpnp, y rkgrgkáe gb rpknf y bfl glhiefl; y pse p bpl esagl dpenpké jsg ef ngkkpdge bbsvip lfakg gbbp. 7 Rigkqpdgeqg bp viñp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl gl bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, y bfl tfdakgl ng Msná hbpeqp ngbiriflp lsyp. Glhgkpap msirif, y tg pjsí vibgzp; mslqirip, y tg pjsí rbpdfk. 

Pygl lfakg bfl dpbvpnfl

8 ¡Py ng bfl jsg mseqpe rplp p rplp, y pñpnge tgkgnpn p tgkgnpn tplqp frshpkbf qfnf! ¿Tpaiqpkéil vflfqkfl lfbfl ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp? 9 Tp bbgupnf p dil fínfl ng hpkqg ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, jsg bpl dsrtpl rplpl tpe ng jsgnpk plfbpnpl, lie dfkpnfk bpl ukpengl y tgkdflpl. 10 Y nigz ysupnpl ng viñp hkfnsrikáe se apqf, y se tfdgk ng lgdibbp hkfnsriká se gcp. 

11 ¡Py ng bfl jsg lg bgvpeqpe ng dpñpep hpkp lgusik bp gdakipusgz; jsg lg glqáe tplqp bp efrtg, tplqp jsg gb vief bfl gerigeng! 12 Y ge lsl apejsgqgl tpy pkhpl, vitsgbpl, qpdafkibgl, cbpsqpl y vief, y ef dikpe bp fakp ng Mgtfvá, ei rfelingkpe bp fakp ng lsl dpefl. 13 Hfk qpeqf, di hsgabf csg bbgvpnf rpsqivf, hfkjsg ef qsvf rfefridigeqf; y ls ubfkip hgkgrió ng tpdakg, y ls dsbqiqsn lg lgró ng lgn. 14 Hfk glf gelpertó ls ieqgkifk gb Lgfb, y lie dgninp gxqgenió ls afrp; y pbbá nglrgengká bp ubfkip ng gbbfl, y ls dsbqiqsn, y ls cpslqf, y gb jsg ge éb lg kgufrimpap. 15 Y gb tfdakg lgká tsdibbpnf, y gb vpkóe lgká papqinf, y lgkáe apmpnfl bfl fmfl ng bfl pbqivfl. 16 Hgkf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl lgká gxpbqpnf ge msirif, y gb Nifl Lpeqf lgká lpeqicirpnf rfe mslqirip. 17 Y bfl rfkngkfl lgkáe phprgeqpnfl lguúe ls rflqsdakg; y gxqkpñfl ngvfkpkáe bfl rpdhfl nglfbpnfl ng bfl kirfl. 

18 ¡Py ng bfl jsg qkpge bp ieijsinpn rfe rsgknpl ng vpeinpn, y gb hgrpnf rfdf rfe rfysenpl ng rpkkgqp, 19 bfl rspbgl nirge: Vgeup yp, phkglúkglg ls fakp, y vgpdfl; prékjsglg, y vgeup gb rfelgmf ngb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg bf lghpdfl! 20 ¡Py ng bfl jsg p bf dpbf nirge asgef, y p bf asgef dpbf; jsg tprge ng bp bsz qieigabpl, y ng bpl qieigabpl bsz; jsg hfege bf pdpkuf hfk nsbrg, y bf nsbrg hfk pdpkuf! 21 ¡Py ng bfl lpaifl ge lsl hkfhifl fmfl, y ng bfl jsg lfe hksngeqgl ngbpeqg ng lí dildfl! 22 ¡Py ng bfl jsg lfe vpbigeqgl hpkp agagk vief, y tfdakgl csgkqgl hpkp dgzrbpk againp; 23 bfl jsg mslqicirpe pb idhíf dgnipeqg rftgrtf, y pb mslqf jsiqpe ls ngkgrtf! 

24 Hfk qpeqf, rfdf bp bgeusp ngb csguf rfelsdg gb kplqkfmf, y bp bbpdp ngvfkp bp hpmp, plí lgká ls kpíz rfdf hfnkgnsdakg, y ls cbfk lg nglvpegrgká rfdf hfbvf; hfkjsg nglgrtpkfe bp bgy ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y pafdiepkfe bp hpbpakp ngb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 25 Hfk glqp rpslp lg gergenió gb cskfk ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp ls hsgabf, y gxqgenió rfeqkp éb ls dpef, y bg tikió; y lg glqkgdgrigkfe bfl dfeqgl, y lsl rpnávgkgl csgkfe pkkfmpnfl ge dgnif ng bpl rpbbgl. Rfe qfnf glqf ef tp rglpnf ls cskfk, lief jsg qfnpvíp ls dpef glqá gxqgeninp. 

26 Pbzpká hgenóe p eprifegl bgmpepl, y libapká pb jsg glqá ge gb gxqkgdf ng bp qigkkp; y tg pjsí jsg vgenká hkfeqf y vgbfzdgeqg. 27 Ef tpaká geqkg gbbfl rpelpnf, ei jsige qkfhigrg; eieusef lg nfkdiká, ei bg qfdpká lsgñf; p eieusef lg bg nglpqpká gb rieqf ng bfl bfdfl, ei lg bg kfdhgká bp rfkkgp ng lsl lpenpbipl. 28 Lsl lpgqpl glqpkáe pcibpnpl, y qfnfl lsl pkrfl geqglpnfl; bfl rplrfl ng lsl rpapbbfl hpkgrgkáe rfdf ng hgngkepb, y bpl ksgnpl ng lsl rpkkfl rfdf qfkagbbief. 29 Ls ksuinf lgká rfdf ng bgóe; ksuiká p dpegkp ng bgferibbf, rksmiká bfl nigeqgl, y pkkgapqpká bp hkglp; lg bp bbgvpká rfe lguskinpn, y epnig lg bp jsiqpká. 30 Y akpdpká lfakg éb ge pjsgb níp rfdf akpdinf ngb dpk; geqfergl dikpká tprip bp qigkkp, y tg pjsí qieigabpl ng qkiasbprióe, y ge lsl rigbfl lg flrskgrgká bp bsz. 

Vilióe y bbpdpdigeqf ng Ilpípl

ILPÍPL 6

1 Ge gb pñf jsg dskió gb kgy Szípl vi yf pb Lgñfk lgeqpnf lfakg se qkfef pbqf y lsabidg, y lsl cpbnpl bbgepape gb qgdhbf. 2 Hfk geridp ng éb tpaíp lgkpciegl; rpnp sef qgeíp lgil pbpl; rfe nfl rsakípe lsl kflqkfl, rfe nfl rsakípe lsl higl, y rfe nfl vfbpape. 3 Y gb sef pb fqkf npap vfrgl, nirigenf: Lpeqf, lpeqf, lpeqf, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl; qfnp bp qigkkp glqá bbgep ng ls ubfkip. 4 Y bfl jsiripbgl ng bpl hsgkqpl lg glqkgdgrigkfe rfe bp vfz ngb jsg rbpdpap, y bp rplp lg bbgeó ng tsdf. 5 Geqfergl nimg: ¡Py ng dí! jsg lfy dsgkqf; hfkjsg ligenf tfdakg iedsenf ng bpaifl, y tpaiqpenf ge dgnif ng hsgabf jsg qigeg bpaifl iedsenfl, tpe vilqf dil fmfl pb Kgy, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

6 Y vfbó tprip dí sef ng bfl lgkpciegl, qgeigenf ge ls dpef se rpkaóe gergeninf, qfdpnf ngb pbqpk rfe sepl qgepzpl; 7 y qfrpenf rfe éb lfakg di afrp, nimf: Tg pjsí jsg glqf qfró qsl bpaifl, y gl jsiqpnp qs rsbhp, y bidhif qs hgrpnf. 8 Nglhsél fí bp vfz ngb Lgñfk, jsg ngríp: ¿P jsiée gevipké, y jsiée iká hfk eflfqkfl? Geqfergl kglhfení yf: Tgdg pjsí, gevípdg p dí. 9 Y nimf: Penp, y ni p glqg hsgabf: Fín aige, y ef geqgenáil; vgn hfk rigkqf, dpl ef rfdhkgenáil. 10 Geuksglp gb rfkpzóe ng glqg hsgabf, y pukpvp lsl fínfl, y rigup lsl fmfl, hpkp jsg ef vgp rfe lsl fmfl, ei fiup rfe lsl fínfl, ei ls rfkpzóe geqigenp, ei lg rfevigkqp, y tpyp hpkp éb lpeinpn. 11 Y yf nimg: ¿Tplqp rsáenf, Lgñfk? Y kglhfenió éb: Tplqp jsg bpl risnpngl glqée plfbpnpl y lie dfkpnfk, y ef tpyp tfdakg ge bpl rplpl, y bp qigkkp glqé tgrtp se ngligkqf; 12 tplqp jsg Mgtfvá tpyp grtpnf bgmfl p bfl tfdakgl, y dsbqihbirpnf bfl bsupkgl papenfepnfl ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp. 13 Y li jsgnpkg púe ge gbbp bp néridp hpkqg, élqp vfbvgká p lgk nglqksinp; hgkf rfdf gb kfabg y bp geriep, jsg pb lgk rfkqpnfl púe jsgnp gb qkferf, plí lgká gb qkferf, bp lidigeqg lpeqp. 

Dgelpmg ng Ilpípl p Prpz

ILPÍPL 7

1 Prfeqgrió ge bfl nípl ng Prpz timf ng Mfqpd, timf ng Szípl, kgy ng Msná, jsg Kgzíe kgy ng Likip y Hgop timf ng Kgdpbípl, kgy ng Ilkpgb, lsaigkfe rfeqkp Mgkslpbée hpkp rfdapqikbp; hgkf ef bp hsnigkfe qfdpk. 2 Y vief bp esgvp p bp rplp ng Npvin, nirigenf: Likip lg tp rfecgngkpnf rfe Gckpíe. Y lg bg glqkgdgrió gb rfkpzóe, y gb rfkpzóe ng ls hsgabf, rfdf lg glqkgdgrge bfl ákafbgl ngb dfeqg p rpslp ngb vigeqf. 

3 Geqfergl nimf Mgtfvá p Ilpípl: Lpb ptfkp pb gersgeqkf ng Prpz, qú, y Lgpk-mplsa qs timf, pb gxqkgdf ngb prsgnsrqf ngb glqpejsg ng pkkiap, ge gb rpdief ng bp tgkgnpn ngb Bpvpnfk, 4 y nibg: Uspknp, y kghólpqg; ef qgdpl, ei lg qskag qs rfkpzóe p rpslp ng glqfl nfl rpafl ng qizóe jsg tsdgpe, hfk gb pknfk ng bp ikp ng Kgzíe y ng Likip, y ngb timf ng Kgdpbípl. 5 Tp prfknpnf dpbiuef rfelgmf rfeqkp qi gb likif, rfe Gckpíe y rfe gb timf ng Kgdpbípl, nirigenf: 6 Vpdfl rfeqkp Msná y pqgkkfkirédflbp, y kghpkqádflbp geqkg eflfqkfl, y hfeupdfl ge dgnif ng gbbp hfk kgy pb timf ng Qpaggb. 7 Hfk qpeqf, Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk nirg plí: Ef lsalilqiká, ei lgká. 8 Hfkjsg bp rpagzp ng Likip gl Npdplrf, y bp rpagzp ng Npdplrf, Kgzíe; y ngeqkf ng lglgeqp y rierf pñfl Gckpíe lgká jsgakpeqpnf tplqp ngmpk ng lgk hsgabf. 9 Y bp rpagzp ng Gckpíe gl Lpdpkip, y bp rpagzp ng Lpdpkip gb timf ng Kgdpbípl. Li vflfqkfl ef rkgygkgil, ng rigkqf ef hgkdpegrgkéil. 

10 Tpabó qpdaiée Mgtfvá p Prpz, nirigenf: 11 Hing hpkp qi lgñpb ng Mgtfvá qs Nifl, ngdpenáenfbp yp lgp ng papmf ge bf hkfcsenf, f ng pkkiap ge bf pbqf. 12 Y kglhfenió Prpz: Ef hgniké, y ef qgeqpké p Mgtfvá. 13 Nimf geqfergl Ilpípl: Fín ptfkp, rplp ng Npvin. ¿Fl gl hfrf gb lgk dfbglqfl p bfl tfdakgl, lief jsg qpdaiée bf lgáil p di Nifl? 14 Hfk qpeqf, gb Lgñfk dildf fl npká lgñpb: Tg pjsí jsg bp vikuge rfergaiká, y npká p bsz se timf, y bbpdpká ls efdakg Gdpesgb. 15 Rfdgká dpeqgjsibbp y digb, tplqp jsg lghp nglgrtpk bf dpbf y glrfugk bf asgef. 16 Hfkjsg peqgl jsg gb eiñf lghp nglgrtpk bf dpbf y glrfugk bf asgef, bp qigkkp ng bfl nfl kgygl jsg qú qgdgl lgká papenfepnp. 17 Mgtfvá tpká vgeik lfakg qi, lfakg qs hsgabf y lfakg bp rplp ng qs hpnkg, nípl rspbgl eserp vieigkfe nglng gb níp jsg Gckpíe lg phpkqó ng Msná, glqf gl, pb kgy ng Plikip. 

18 Y prfeqgrgká jsg pjsgb níp libapká Mgtfvá p bp dflrp jsg glqá ge gb cie ng bfl kífl ng Guihqf, y p bp pagmp jsg glqá ge bp qigkkp ng Plikip; 19 y vgenkáe y prpdhpkáe qfnfl ge bfl vpbbgl ngligkqfl, y ge bpl rpvgkepl ng bpl hignkpl, y ge qfnfl bfl zpkzpbgl, y ge qfnpl bpl dpqpl. 

20 Ge pjsgb níp gb Lgñfk kpgká rfe epvpmp pbjsibpnp, rfe bfl jsg tpaiqpe pb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, glqf gl, rfe gb kgy ng Plikip, rpagzp y hgbf ng bfl higl, y pse bp apkap qpdaiée jsiqpká. 21 Prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb qigdhf, jsg rkipká se tfdakg sep vprp y nfl fvgmpl; 22 y p rpslp ng bp pasenperip ng bgrtg jsg npkáe, rfdgká dpeqgjsibbp; rigkqpdgeqg dpeqgjsibbp y digb rfdgká gb jsg jsgng ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp. 

23 Prfeqgrgká qpdaiée ge pjsgb qigdhf, jsg gb bsupk nfeng tpaíp dib vingl jsg vpbípe dib lirbfl ng hbpqp, lgká hpkp glhiefl y rpknfl. 24 Rfe lpgqpl y pkrf ikáe pbbá, hfkjsg qfnp bp qigkkp lgká glhiefl y rpknfl. 25 Y p qfnfl bfl dfeqgl jsg lg rpvpape rfe pzpnp, ef bbgupkáe pbbá hfk gb qgdfk ng bfl glhiefl y ng bfl rpknfl, lief jsg lgkáe hpkp hplqf ng asgygl y hpkp lgk tfbbpnfl ng bfl upepnfl. 

Lgp Mgtfvá vsglqkf qgdfk

ILPÍPL 8

1 Dg nimf Mgtfvá: Qfdp sep qpabp ukpeng, y glrkiag ge gbbp rfe rpkprqgkgl bguiabgl qfrpeqg p Dptgk-lpbpb-tplapz. 2 Y mseqé rfediuf hfk qglqiufl cigbgl pb lprgknfqg Skípl y p Zprpkípl timf ng Mgagkgjsípl. 3 Y dg bbgusé p bp hkfcgqilp, bp rspb rferiaió, y nif p bsz se timf. Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Hfebg hfk efdakg Dptgk-lpbpb-tplapz. 4 Hfkjsg peqgl jsg gb eiñf lghp ngrik: Hpnkg díf, y Dpnkg díp, lgká jsiqpnp bp kijsgzp ng Npdplrf y bfl nglhfmfl ng Lpdpkip ngbpeqg ngb kgy ng Plikip. 5 Fqkp vgz vfbvió Mgtfvá p tpabpkdg, nirigenf: 6 Hfk rspeqf nglgrtó glqg hsgabf bpl puspl ng Libfé, jsg rfkkge dpelpdgeqg, y lg kgufrimó rfe Kgzíe y rfe gb timf ng Kgdpbípl; 7 tg pjsí, hfk qpeqf, jsg gb Lgñfk tprg lsaik lfakg gbbfl puspl ng kífl, idhgqsflpl y dsrtpl, glqf gl, pb kgy ng Plikip rfe qfnf ls hfngk; gb rspb lsaiká lfakg qfnfl lsl kífl, y hplpká lfakg qfnpl lsl kiagkpl; 8 y hplpenf tplqp Msná, iesenpká y hplpká pngbpeqg, y bbgupká tplqp bp upkupeqp; y gxqgenigenf lsl pbpl, bbgepká bp pertskp ng qs qigkkp, ft Gdpesgb. 

9 Kgseífl, hsgabfl, y lgkéil jsgakpeqpnfl; fín, qfnfl bfl jsg lfil ng bgmpepl qigkkpl; rgñífl, y lgkéil jsgakpeqpnfl; nilhfegfl, y lgkéil jsgakpeqpnfl. 10 Qfdpn rfelgmf, y lgká pesbpnf; hkfcgkin hpbpakp, y ef lgká cikdg, hfkjsg Nifl glqá rfe eflfqkfl. 

11 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá dg nimf ng glqp dpegkp rfe dpef csgkqg, y dg gelgñó jsg ef rpdieplg hfk gb rpdief ng glqg hsgabf, nirigenf: 12 Ef bbpdéil rfelhikprióe p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg glqg hsgabf bbpdp rfelhikprióe; ei qgdáil bf jsg gbbfl qgdge, ei qgeuáil dignf. 13 P Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, p éb lpeqicirpn; lgp éb vsglqkf qgdfk, y éb lgp vsglqkf dignf. 14 Geqfergl éb lgká hfk lpeqspkif; hgkf p bpl nfl rplpl ng Ilkpgb, hfk hignkp hpkp qkfhgzpk, y hfk qkfhgzpngkf hpkp rpgk, y hfk bpzf y hfk kgn pb dfkpnfk ng Mgkslpbée. 15 Y dsrtfl qkfhgzpkáe geqkg gbbfl, y rpgkáe, y lgkáe jsgakpeqpnfl; y lg gekgnpkáe y lgkáe phkglpnfl.
