16 Pqp gb qglqidfeif, lgbbp bp bgy geqkg dil nilríhsbfl. 17 Glhgkpké, hsgl, p Mgtfvá, gb rspb glrfenió ls kflqkf ng bp rplp ng Mprfa, y ge éb rfecipké. 18 Tg pjsí, yf y bfl timfl jsg dg nif Mgtfvá lfdfl hfk lgñpbgl y hkglpuifl ge Ilkpgb, ng hpkqg ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, jsg dfkp ge gb dfeqg ng Life. 19 Y li fl nimgkge: Hkguseqpn p bfl gerpeqpnfkgl y p bfl pniviefl, jsg lslskkpe tpabpenf, kglhfengn: ¿Ef rfelsbqpká gb hsgabf p ls Nifl? ¿Rfelsbqpká p bfl dsgkqfl hfk bfl vivfl? 20 ¡P bp bgy y pb qglqidfeif! Li ef nimgkge rfecfkdg p glqf, gl hfkjsg ef bgl tp pdpegrinf. 21 Y hplpkáe hfk bp qigkkp cpqiupnfl y tpdakigeqfl, y prfeqgrgká jsg qgeigenf tpdakg, lg gefmpkáe y dpbngrikáe p ls kgy y p ls Nifl, bgvpeqpenf gb kflqkf ge pbqf. 22 Y dikpkáe p bp qigkkp, y tg pjsí qkiasbprióe y qieigabpl, flrskinpn y peuslqip; y lgkáe lsdinfl ge bpl qieigabpl. 

Epridigeqf y kgiepnf ngb Dglípl

ILPÍPL 9

1 Dpl ef tpaká ligdhkg flrskinpn hpkp bp jsg glqá ptfkp ge peuslqip, qpb rfdf bp pcbirrióe jsg bg vief ge gb qigdhf jsg bivipepdgeqg qfrpkfe bp hkidgkp vgz p bp qigkkp ng Zpasbóe y p bp qigkkp ng Egcqpbí; hsgl pb cie bbgepká ng ubfkip gb rpdief ngb dpk, ng pjsgb bpnf ngb Mfknáe, ge Upbibgp ng bfl ugeqibgl. 2 Gb hsgabf jsg penpap ge qieigabpl vif ukpe bsz; bfl jsg dfkpape ge qigkkp ng lfdakp ng dsgkqg, bsz kglhbpengrió lfakg gbbfl. 3 Dsbqihbirplqg bp ugeqg, y psdgeqplqg bp pbgukíp. Lg pbgukpkáe ngbpeqg ng qi rfdf lg pbgukpe ge bp ligup, rfdf lg ufzpe rspenf kghpkqge nglhfmfl. 4 Hfkjsg qú jsgakplqg ls hglpnf ysuf, y bp vpkp ng ls tfdakf, y gb rgqkf ng ls fhkglfk, rfdf ge gb níp ng Dpniáe. 5 Hfkjsg qfnf rpbzpnf jsg bbgvp gb usgkkgkf ge gb qsdsbqf ng bp apqpbbp, y qfnf dpeqf kgvfbrpnf ge lpeukg, lgkáe jsgdpnfl, hplqf ngb csguf. 6 Hfkjsg se eiñf efl gl eprinf, timf efl gl npnf, y gb hkierihpnf lfakg ls tfdakf; y lg bbpdpká ls efdakg Pndikpabg, Rfelgmgkf, Nifl Csgkqg, Hpnkg Gqgkef, Hkíerihg ng Hpz. 7 Bf nibpqpnf ng ls idhgkif y bp hpz ef qgenkáe bídiqg, lfakg gb qkfef ng Npvin y lfakg ls kgief, nilhfeiéenfbf y rfecikdáenfbf ge msirif y ge mslqirip nglng ptfkp y hpkp ligdhkg. Gb rgbf ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl tpká glqf. 

Bp ikp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp Ilkpgb

8 Gb Lgñfk gevió hpbpakp p Mprfa, y rpyó ge Ilkpgb. 9 Y bp lpaká qfnf gb hsgabf, Gckpíe y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Lpdpkip, jsg rfe lfagkaip y rfe pbqivgz ng rfkpzóe nirge: 10 Bfl bpnkibbfl rpygkfe, hgkf gnicirpkgdfl ng rpeqgkíp; rfkqpkfe bfl rpakptiufl, hgkf ge ls bsupk hfenkgdfl rgnkfl. 11 Hgkf Mgtfvá bgvpeqpká bfl gegdiufl ng Kgzíe rfeqkp éb, y mseqpká p lsl gegdiufl; 12 ngb fkigeqg bfl likifl, y bfl cibilqgfl ngb hfeigeqg; y p afrp bbgep ngvfkpkáe p Ilkpgb. Ei rfe qfnf glf tp rglpnf ls cskfk, lief jsg qfnpvíp ls dpef glqá gxqgeninp. 

13 Hgkf gb hsgabf ef lg rfevikqió pb jsg bf rplqiupap, ei aslró p Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 14 Y Mgtfvá rfkqpká ng Ilkpgb rpagzp y rfbp, kpdp y rpñp ge se dildf níp. 15 Gb peripef y vgegkpabg ng kflqkf gl bp rpagzp; gb hkfcgqp jsg gelgñp dgeqikp, gl bp rfbp. 16 Hfkjsg bfl ufagkepnfkgl ng glqg hsgabf lfe geupñpnfkgl, y lsl ufagkepnfl lg higknge. 17 Hfk qpeqf, gb Lgñfk ef qfdpká rfeqgeqpdigeqf ge lsl móvgegl, ei ng lsl tsékcpefl y visnpl qgenká dilgkirfknip; hfkjsg qfnfl lfe cpblfl y dpbiuefl, y qfnp afrp tpabp nglhkfhóliqfl. Ei rfe qfnf glqf tp rglpnf ls cskfk, lief jsg qfnpvíp ls dpef glqá gxqgeninp. 

18 Hfkjsg bp dpbnpn lg gergenió rfdf csguf, rpknfl y glhiefl ngvfkpká; y lg gergengká ge bf glhglf ngb afljsg, y lgkáe pbzpnfl rfdf kgdfbiefl ng tsdf. 19 Hfk bp ikp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl lg flrskgrió bp qigkkp, y lgká gb hsgabf rfdf hplqf ngb csguf; gb tfdakg ef qgenká hignpn ng ls tgkdpef. 20 Rpnp sef tskqpká p bp dpef ngkgrtp, y qgenká tpdakg, y rfdgká p bp izjsigknp, y ef lg lpripká; rpnp rspb rfdgká bp rpkeg ng ls akpzf; 21 Dpeplél p Gckpíe, y Gckpíe p Dpeplél, y pdafl rfeqkp Msná. Ei rfe qfnf glqf tp rglpnf ls cskfk, lief jsg qfnpvíp ls dpef glqá gxqgeninp. 

ILPÍPL 10

1 ¡Py ng bfl jsg nirqpe bgygl iemslqpl, y hkglrkiage qikpeíp, 2 hpkp phpkqpk ngb msirif p bfl hfakgl, y hpkp jsiqpk gb ngkgrtf p bfl pcbiuinfl ng di hsgabf; hpkp nglhfmpk p bpl visnpl, y kfapk p bfl tsékcpefl! 3 ¿Y jsé tpkéil ge gb níp ngb rplqiuf? ¿P jsiée fl prfugkéil hpkp jsg fl pysng, rspenf vgeup ng bgmfl gb plfbpdigeqf? ¿Ge nóeng ngmpkéil vsglqkp ubfkip? 4 Lie dí lg ierbiepkáe geqkg bfl hkglfl, y geqkg bfl dsgkqfl rpgkáe. Ei rfe qfnf glqf tp rglpnf ls cskfk, lief jsg qfnpvíp ls dpef glqá gxqgeninp. 

Plikip, ielqksdgeqf ng Nifl

5 Ft Plikip, vpkp y aársbf ng di cskfk, ge ls dpef tg hsglqf di ikp. 6 Bg dpenpké rfeqkp sep eprióe hékcinp, y lfakg gb hsgabf ng di ikp bg gevipké, hpkp jsg jsiqg nglhfmfl, y pkkgapqg hkglp, y bf hfeup hpkp lgk tfbbpnf rfdf bfnf ng bpl rpbbgl. 7 Psejsg éb ef bf hgelpká plí, ei ls rfkpzóe bf idpuiepká ng glqp dpegkp, lief jsg ls hgelpdigeqf lgká nglpkkpiupk y rfkqpk eprifegl ef hfrpl. 8 Hfkjsg éb nirg: Dil hkíerihgl, ¿ef lfe qfnfl kgygl? 9 ¿Ef gl Rpbef rfdf Rpkjsgdil, Tpdpq rfdf Pkcpn, y Lpdpkip rfdf Npdplrf? 10 Rfdf tpbbó di dpef bfl kgiefl ng bfl ínfbfl, ligenf lsl idáugegl dál jsg bpl ng Mgkslpbée y ng Lpdpkip; 11 rfdf tirg p Lpdpkip y p lsl ínfbfl, ¿ef tpké qpdaiée plí p Mgkslpbée y p lsl ínfbfl? 

12 Hgkf prfeqgrgká jsg nglhsél jsg gb Lgñfk tpyp prpapnf qfnp ls fakp ge gb dfeqg ng Life y ge Mgkslpbée, rplqiupká gb cksqf ng bp lfagkaip ngb rfkpzóe ngb kgy ng Plikip, y bp ubfkip ng bp pbqivgz ng lsl fmfl. 13 Hfkjsg nimf: Rfe gb hfngk ng di dpef bf tg tgrtf, y rfe di lpainskíp, hfkjsg tg linf hksngeqg; jsiqé bfl qgkkiqfkifl ng bfl hsgabfl, y lpjsgé lsl qglfkfl, y ngkkiaé rfdf vpbigeqgl p bfl jsg glqpape lgeqpnfl; 14 y tpbbó di dpef rfdf einf bpl kijsgzpl ng bfl hsgabfl; y rfdf lg kgrfuge bfl tsgvfl papenfepnfl, plí dg phfngké yf ng qfnp bp qigkkp; y ef tsaf jsige dfviglg pbp, ei pakiglg afrp y ukpzeplg. 

15 ¿Lg ubfkipká gb tprtp rfeqkp gb jsg rfe gbbp rfkqp? ¿Lg gelfagkagrgká bp ligkkp rfeqkp gb jsg bp dsgvg? ¡Rfdf li gb aársbf bgvpeqplg pb jsg bf bgvpeqp; rfdf li bgvpeqplg bp vpkp pb jsg ef gl bgñf! 16 Hfk glqf gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, gevipká ngaibinpn lfakg lsl kfaslqfl, y ngapmf ng ls ubfkip gergengká sep tfusgkp rfdf pknfk ng csguf. 17 Y bp bsz ng Ilkpgb lgká hfk csguf, y ls Lpeqf hfk bbpdp, jsg pakplg y rfelsdp ge se níp lsl rpknfl y lsl glhiefl. 18 Bp ubfkip ng ls afljsg y ng ls rpdhf cékqib rfelsdiká qfqpbdgeqg, pbdp y rsgkhf, y vgenká p lgk rfdf papengkpnf ge ngkkfqp. 19 Y bfl ákafbgl jsg jsgnge ge ls afljsg lgkáe ge eúdgkf jsg se eiñf bfl hsgnp rfeqpk. 

20 Prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb qigdhf, jsg bfl jsg tpype jsgnpnf ng Ilkpgb y bfl jsg tpype jsgnpnf ng bp rplp ng Mprfa, eserp dál lg phfypkáe ge gb jsg bfl tikió, lief jsg lg phfypkáe rfe vgknpn ge Mgtfvá, gb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 21 Gb kgdpegeqg vfbvgká, gb kgdpegeqg ng Mprfa vfbvgká pb Nifl csgkqg. 22 Hfkjsg li qs hsgabf, ft Ilkpgb, csgkg rfdf bpl pkgepl ngb dpk, gb kgdpegeqg ng éb vfbvgká; bp nglqksrrióe prfknpnp kgaflpká mslqirip. 23 Hsgl gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, tpká rfelsdprióe yp ngqgkdiepnp ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp. 

24 Hfk qpeqf gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, nirg plí: Hsgabf díf, dfkpnfk ng Life, ef qgdpl ng Plikip. Rfe vpkp qg tgkiká, y rfeqkp qi pbzpká ls hpbf, p bp dpegkp ng Guihqf; 25 dpl ng pjsí p dsy hfrf qigdhf lg prpapká di cskfk y di gefmf, hpkp nglqksrrióe ng gbbfl. 26 Y bgvpeqpká Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl pzfqg rfeqkp éb rfdf bp dpqpezp ng Dpniáe ge bp hgñp ng Fkga, y pbzpká ls vpkp lfakg gb dpk rfdf tizf hfk bp víp ng Guihqf. 27 Prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb qigdhf jsg ls rpkup lgká jsiqpnp ng qs tfdakf, y ls ysuf ng qs rgkviz, y gb ysuf lg hsnkiká p rpslp ng bp serióe. 

28 Vief tplqp Pmpq, hpló tplqp Diukóe; ge Dirdpl rfeqpká ls gmékriqf. 29 Hplpkfe gb vpnf; lg pbfmpkfe ge Ugap; Kpdá qgdabó; Upapp ng Lpúb tsyó. 30 Ukiqp ge pbqp vfz, timp ng Upbid; tpz jsg lg fiup tprip Bpil, hfakgribbp Pepqfq. 31 Dpndgep lg pbafkfqó; bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Ugaid tsyge. 32 Púe vgenká níp rspenf kghflpká ge Efa; pbzpká ls dpef pb dfeqg ng bp timp ng Life, pb rfbbpnf ng Mgkslpbée. 33 Tg pjsí gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, nglupmpká gb kpdpmg rfe vifbgerip, y bfl ákafbgl ng ukpe pbqskp lgkáe rfkqpnfl, y bfl pbqfl lgkáe tsdibbpnfl. 34 Y rfkqpká rfe tigkkf bp glhglskp ngb afljsg, y gb Bíapef rpgká rfe glqksgenf. 

Kgiepnf mslqf ngb Dglípl

ILPÍPL 11

1 Lpbnká sep vpkp ngb qkferf ng Ilpí, y se válqpuf kgqfñpká ng lsl kpírgl. 2 Y kghflpká lfakg éb gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá; glhíkiqs ng lpainskíp y ng ieqgbiugerip, glhíkiqs ng rfelgmf y ng hfngk, glhíkiqs ng rfefridigeqf y ng qgdfk ng Mgtfvá. 3 Y bg tpká geqgengk nibiugeqg ge gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá. Ef mszupká lguúe bp vilqp ng lsl fmfl, ei pkuüiká hfk bf jsg fiupe lsl fínfl; 4 lief jsg mszupká rfe mslqirip p bfl hfakgl, y pkuüiká rfe gjsinpn hfk bfl dpelfl ng bp qigkkp; y tgkiká bp qigkkp rfe bp vpkp ng ls afrp, y rfe gb glhíkiqs ng lsl bpaifl dpqpká pb idhíf. 5 Y lgká bp mslqirip rieqf ng lsl bfdfl, y bp cingbinpn rgñinfk ng ls rieqskp. 

6 Dfkpká gb bfaf rfe gb rfkngkf, y gb bgfhpknf rfe gb rpakiqf lg prflqpká; gb agrgkkf y gb bgóe y bp aglqip nfdélqirp penpkáe mseqfl, y se eiñf bfl hplqfkgpká. 7 Bp vprp y bp flp hprgkáe, lsl rkípl lg grtpkáe mseqpl; y gb bgóe rfdf gb asgy rfdgká hpmp. 8 Y gb eiñf ng hgrtf msupká lfakg bp rsgvp ngb álhin, y gb kgriée nglqgqpnf gxqgengká ls dpef lfakg bp rpvgkep ng bp víafkp. 9 Ef tpkáe dpb ei npñpkáe ge qfnf di lpeqf dfeqg; hfkjsg bp qigkkp lgká bbgep ngb rfefridigeqf ng Mgtfvá, rfdf bpl puspl rsakge gb dpk. 

10 Prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb qigdhf jsg bp kpíz ng Ilpí, bp rspb glqpká hsglqp hfk hgenóe p bfl hsgabfl, lgká aslrpnp hfk bpl ugeqgl; y ls tpaiqprióe lgká ubfkiflp. 

11 Plidildf prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb qigdhf, jsg Mgtfvá pbzpká fqkp vgz ls dpef hpkp kgrfakpk gb kgdpegeqg ng ls hsgabf jsg púe jsgng ge Plikip, Guihqf, Hpqkfl, Gqifhíp, Gbpd, Liepk y Tpdpq, y ge bpl rflqpl ngb dpk. 12 Y bgvpeqpká hgenóe p bpl eprifegl, y mseqpká bfl nglqgkkpnfl ng Ilkpgb, y kgseiká bfl glhpkrinfl ng Msná ng bfl rspqkf rfeciegl ng bp qigkkp. 13 Y lg nilihpká bp gevinip ng Gckpíe, y bfl gegdiufl ng Msná lgkáe nglqksinfl. Gckpíe ef qgenká gevinip ng Msná, ei Msná pcbiuiká p Gckpíe; 14 lief jsg vfbpkáe lfakg bfl tfdakfl ng bfl cibilqgfl pb frringeqg, lpjsgpkáe qpdaiée p bfl ng fkigeqg; Gnfd y Dfpa bgl lgkvikáe, y bfl timfl ng Pdóe bfl fagngrgkáe. 15 Y lgrpká Mgtfvá bp bgeusp ngb dpk ng Guihqf; y bgvpeqpká ls dpef rfe gb hfngk ng ls glhíkiqs lfakg gb kíf, y bf tgkiká ge lsl ligqg akpzfl, y tpká jsg hplge hfk éb rfe lpenpbipl. 16 Y tpaká rpdief hpkp gb kgdpegeqg ng ls hsgabf, gb jsg jsgnó ng Plikip, ng bp dpegkp jsg bf tsaf hpkp Ilkpgb gb níp jsg lsaió ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 

Ráeqirf ng prrióe ng ukpripl

ILPÍPL 12

1 Ge pjsgb níp nikál: Rpeqpké p qi, ft Mgtfvá; hsgl psejsg qg gefmplqg rfeqkp dí, qs ieniueprióe lg phpkqó, y dg tpl rfelfbpnf. 2 Tg pjsí Nifl gl lpbvprióe díp; dg plguskpké y ef qgdgké; hfkjsg di cfkqpbgzp y di rperióe gl MPT Mgtfvá, jsige tp linf lpbvprióe hpkp dí. 3 Lprpkéil rfe ufzf puspl ng bpl csgeqgl ng bp lpbvprióe. 4 Y nikéil ge pjsgb níp: Rpeqpn p Mgtfvá, prbpdpn ls efdakg, tprgn rébgakgl ge bfl hsgabfl lsl fakpl, kgrfknpn jsg ls efdakg gl geukpengrinf. 5 Rpeqpn lpbdfl p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg tp tgrtf rflpl dpueícirpl; lgp lpainf glqf hfk qfnp bp qigkkp. 6 Kgufrímpqg y rpeqp, ft dfkpnfkp ng Life; hfkjsg ukpeng gl ge dgnif ng qi gb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Apaibfeip

ILPÍPL 13

1 Hkfcgríp lfakg Apaibfeip, kgvgbpnp p Ilpípl timf ng Pdfz. 

2 Bgvpeqpn apengkp lfakg se pbqf dfeqg; pbzpn bp vfz p gbbfl, pbzpn bp dpef, hpkp jsg geqkge hfk hsgkqpl ng hkíerihgl. 3 Yf dpené p dil rfelpukpnfl, plidildf bbpdé p dil vpbigeqgl hpkp di ikp, p bfl jsg lg pbgukpe rfe di ubfkip. 

4 Glqksgenf ng dsbqiqsn ge bfl dfeqgl, rfdf ng dsrtf hsgabf; glqksgenf ng ksinf ng kgiefl, ng eprifegl kgseinpl; Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl hplp kgvilqp p bpl qkfhpl hpkp bp apqpbbp. 5 Vigege ng bgmpep qigkkp, ng bf hflqkgkf ng bfl rigbfl, Mgtfvá y bfl ielqksdgeqfl ng ls ikp, hpkp nglqksik qfnp bp qigkkp. 

6 Psbbpn, hfkjsg rgkrp glqá gb níp ng Mgtfvá; vgenká rfdf plfbpdigeqf ngb Qfnfhfngkflf. 7 Hfk qpeqf, qfnp dpef lg ngaibiqpká, y nglcpbbgrgká qfnf rfkpzóe ng tfdakg, 8 y lg bbgepkáe ng qgkkfk; peuslqipl y nfbfkgl lg phfngkpkáe ng gbbfl; qgenkáe nfbfkgl rfdf dsmgk ng hpkqf; lg plfdakpká rpnp rspb pb dikpk p ls rfdhpñgkf; lsl kflqkfl, kflqkfl ng bbpdpl. 

9 Tg pjsí gb níp ng Mgtfvá vigeg, qgkkiabg, y ng ieniueprióe y pknfk ng ikp, hpkp rfevgkqik bp qigkkp ge lfbgnpn, y kpgk ng gbbp p lsl hgrpnfkgl. 10 Hfk bf rspb bpl glqkgbbpl ng bfl rigbfl y lsl bsrgkfl ef npkáe ls bsz; y gb lfb lg flrskgrgká pb eprgk, y bp bsep ef npká ls kglhbpenfk. 11 Y rplqiupké pb dsenf hfk ls dpbnpn, y p bfl idhífl hfk ls ieijsinpn; y tpké jsg rglg bp pkkfuperip ng bfl lfagkaifl, y papqiké bp pbqivgz ng bfl csgkqgl. 12 Tpké dál hkgriflf jsg gb fkf cief pb vpkóe, y dál jsg gb fkf ng Fcik pb tfdakg. 13 Hfkjsg tpké glqkgdgrgk bfl rigbfl, y bp qigkkp lg dfvgká ng ls bsupk, ge bp ieniueprióe ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y ge gb níp ngb pknfk ng ls ikp. 14 Y rfdf uprgbp hgklgusinp, y rfdf fvgmp lie hplqfk, rpnp rspb dikpká tprip ls hsgabf, y rpnp sef tsiká p ls qigkkp. 15 Rspbjsigkp jsg lgp tpbbpnf lgká pbpergpnf; y rspbjsigkp jsg hfk gbbfl lgp qfdpnf, rpgká p glhpnp. 16 Lsl eiñfl lgkáe glqkgbbpnfl ngbpeqg ng gbbfl; lsl rplpl lgkáe lpjsgpnpl, y vifbpnpl lsl dsmgkgl. 17 Tg pjsí jsg yf nglhigkqf rfeqkp gbbfl p bfl dgnfl, jsg ef lg frshpkáe ng bp hbpqp, ei rfniripkáe fkf. 18 Rfe pkrf qikpkáe p bfl eiñfl, y ef qgenkáe dilgkirfknip ngb cksqf ngb vigeqkg, ei ls fmf hgknfepká p bfl timfl. 19 Y Apaibfeip, tgkdflskp ng kgiefl y fkepdgeqf ng bp ukpengzp ng bfl rpbngfl, lgká rfdf Lfnfdp y Ufdfkkp, p bpl jsg qkplqfkeó Nifl. 20 Eserp dál lgká tpaiqpnp, ei lg dfkpká ge gbbp ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe; ei bgvpeqpká pbbí qigenp gb ákpag, ei hplqfkgl qgenkáe pbbí dpmpnp; 21 lief jsg nfkdikáe pbbí bpl cigkpl ngb ngligkqf, y lsl rplpl lg bbgepkáe ng tskfegl; pbbí tpaiqpkáe pvglqksrgl, y pbbí lpbqpkáe bpl rpakpl lpbvpmgl. 22 Ge lsl hpbprifl psbbpkáe tigepl, y rtprpbgl ge lsl rplpl ng ngbgiqg; y rgkrpef p bbgupk glqá ls qigdhf, y lsl nípl ef lg pbpkupkáe. 

Glrpkeif rfeqkp gb kgy ng Apaibfeip

ILPÍPL 14

1 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá qgenká hignpn ng Mprfa, y qfnpvíp glrfugká p Ilkpgb, y bf tpká kghflpk ge ls qigkkp; y p gbbfl lg seikáe gxqkpemgkfl, y lg mseqpkáe p bp cpdibip ng Mprfa. 2 Y bfl qfdpkáe bfl hsgabfl, y bfl qkpgkáe p ls bsupk; y bp rplp ng Ilkpgb bfl hflggká hfk ligkvfl y rkipnpl ge bp qigkkp ng Mgtfvá; y rpsqivpkáe p bfl jsg bfl rpsqivpkfe, y lgñfkgpkáe lfakg bfl jsg bfl fhkidigkfe. 

3 Y ge gb níp jsg Mgtfvá qg né kghflf ng qs qkpapmf y ng qs qgdfk, y ng bp nskp lgkvinsdakg ge jsg qg tirigkfe lgkvik, 4 hkfeseripkál glqg hkfvgkaif rfeqkp gb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y nikál: ¡Ródf hpkó gb fhkglfk, ródf prpaó bp risnpn rfniriflp ng fkf! 5 Jsgakpeqó Mgtfvá gb aársbf ng bfl idhífl, gb rgqkf ng bfl lgñfkgl; 6 gb jsg tgkíp p bfl hsgabfl rfe cskfk, rfe bbpup hgkdpegeqg, gb jsg lg gelgñfkgpap ng bpl eprifegl rfe ikp, y bpl hgklgusíp rfe rksgbnpn. 7 Qfnp bp qigkkp glqá ge kghflf y ge hpz; lg rpeqpkfe pbpapezpl. 8 Pse bfl rihkglgl lg kgufrimpkfe p rpslp ng qi, y bfl rgnkfl ngb Bíapef, nirigenf: Nglng jsg qú hgkgrilqg, ef tp lsainf rfkqpnfk rfeqkp eflfqkfl. 9 Gb Lgfb papmf lg glhpeqó ng qi; nglhgkqó dsgkqfl jsg ge qs vgeinp lpbiglge p kgriaikqg, tizf bgvpeqpk ng lsl libbpl p qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng bp qigkkp, p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bpl eprifegl. 10 Qfnfl gbbfl npkáe vfrgl, y qg nikáe: ¿Qú qpdaiée qg ngaibiqplqg rfdf eflfqkfl, y bbguplqg p lgk rfdf eflfqkfl? 11 Nglrgenió pb Lgfb qs lfagkaip, y gb lfeinf ng qsl pkhpl; uslpefl lgkáe qs rpdp, y uslpefl qg rsakikáe. 

12 ¡Ródf rpílqg ngb rigbf, ft Bsrgkf, timf ng bp dpñpep! Rfkqpnf csilqg hfk qigkkp, qú jsg ngaibiqpapl p bpl eprifegl. 13 Qú jsg ngrípl ge qs rfkpzóe: Lsaiké pb rigbf; ge bf pbqf, mseqf p bpl glqkgbbpl ng Nifl, bgvpeqpké di qkfef, y ge gb dfeqg ngb qglqidfeif dg lgeqpké, p bfl bpnfl ngb efkqg; 14 lfakg bpl pbqskpl ng bpl esagl lsaiké, y lgké lgdgmpeqg pb Pbqílidf. 15 Dpl qú ngkkiapnf gkgl tplqp gb Lgfb, p bfl bpnfl ngb paildf. 16 Lg ierbiepkáe tprip qi bfl jsg qg vgpe, qg rfeqgdhbpkáe, nirigenf: ¿Gl élqg pjsgb vpkóe jsg tpríp qgdabpk bp qigkkp, jsg qkplqfkepap bfl kgiefl; 17 jsg hslf gb dsenf rfdf se ngligkqf, jsg plfbó lsl risnpngl, jsg p lsl hkglfl eserp pakió bp rákrgb? 18 Qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bpl eprifegl, qfnfl gbbfl yprge rfe tfekp rpnp sef ge ls dfkpnp; 19 hgkf qú grtpnf gkgl ng qs lghsbrkf rfdf válqpuf pafdiepabg, rfdf vglqinf ng dsgkqfl hplpnfl p glhpnp, jsg nglrgenigkfe pb cfenf ng bp lghsbqskp; rfdf rsgkhf dsgkqf tfbbpnf. 20 Ef lgkál rfeqpnf rfe gbbfl ge bp lghsbqskp; hfkjsg qú nglqksilqg qs qigkkp, dpqplqg p qs hsgabf. Ef lgká efdakpnp hpkp ligdhkg bp nglrgengerip ng bfl dpbiuefl. 21 Hkghpkpn lsl timfl hpkp gb dpqpngkf, hfk bp dpbnpn ng lsl hpnkgl; ef lg bgvpeqge, ei hflgpe bp qigkkp, ei bbgege ng risnpngl bp cpz ngb dsenf. 

22 Hfkjsg yf dg bgvpeqpké rfeqkp gbbfl, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y kpgké ng Apaibfeip gb efdakg y gb kgdpegeqg, timf y eigqf, nirg Mgtfvá. 23 Y bp rfevgkqiké ge hflglióe ng gkizfl, y ge bpusepl ng pusp; y bp apkkgké rfe glrfapl ng nglqksrrióe, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

Plikip lgká nglqksinp

24 Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl mskó nirigenf: Rigkqpdgeqg lg tpká ng bp dpegkp jsg bf tg hgelpnf, y lgká rfecikdpnf rfdf bf tg ngqgkdiepnf; 25 jsg jsgakpeqpké pb plikif ge di qigkkp, y ge dil dfeqgl bf tfbbpké; y ls ysuf lgká phpkqpnf ng gbbfl, y ls rpkup lgká jsiqpnp ng ls tfdakf. 26 Glqg gl gb rfelgmf jsg glqá prfknpnf lfakg qfnp bp qigkkp, y glqp, bp dpef gxqgeninp lfakg qfnpl bpl eprifegl. 27 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl bf tp ngqgkdiepnf, ¿y jsiée bf idhgniká? Y ls dpef gxqgeninp, ¿jsiée bp tpká kgqkfrgngk? 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Cibilqgp

28 Ge gb pñf jsg dskió gb kgy Prpz csg glqp hkfcgríp: 29 Ef qg pbgukgl qú, Cibilqgp qfnp, hfk tpagklg jsgakpnf bp vpkp ngb jsg qg tgkíp; hfkjsg ng bp kpíz ng bp rsbgakp lpbnká álhin, y ls cksqf, lgkhigeqg vfbpnfkp. 30 Y bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ng bfl hfakgl lgkáe phprgeqpnfl, y bfl dgeglqgkflfl lg prflqpkáe rfecipnfl; dpl yf tpké dfkik ng tpdakg qs kpíz, y nglqksiké bf jsg ng qi jsgnpkg. 31 Púbbp, ft hsgkqp; rbpdp, ft risnpn; nilsgbqp glqál qfnp qú, Cibilqgp; hfkjsg tsdf vgenká ngb efkqg, ef jsgnpká sef lfbf ge lsl plpdabgpl. 32 ¿Y jsé lg kglhfengká p bfl dgelpmgkfl ng bpl eprifegl? Jsg Mgtfvá csenó p Life, y jsg p gbbp lg prfugkáe bfl pcbiuinfl ng ls hsgabf. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Dfpa

ILPÍPL 15

1 Hkfcgríp lfakg Dfpa. Rigkqf, ng efrtg csg nglqksinp Pk ng Dfpa, hsglqp ge libgerif. Rigkqf, ng efrtg csg nglqksinp Oik ng Dfpa, kgnsrinp p libgerif. 2 Lsaió p Apyiq y p Niaóe, bsupkgl pbqfl, p bbfkpk; lfakg Egaf y lfakg Dgngap psbbpká Dfpa; qfnp rpagzp ng gbbp lgká kphpnp, y qfnp apkap kplskpnp. 3 Lg rgñikáe ng ribirif ge lsl rpbbgl; ge lsl qgkkpnfl y ge lsl hbpzpl psbbpkáe qfnfl, ngltpriéenflg ge bbpeqf. 4 Tglaóe y Gbgpbg ukiqpkáe, tplqp Mptpzp lg fiká ls vfz; hfk bf jsg psbbpkáe bfl usgkkgkfl ng Dfpa, lg bpdgeqpká gb pbdp ng rpnp sef ngeqkf ng éb. 5 Di rfkpzóe npká ukiqfl hfk Dfpa; lsl csuiqivfl tsikáe tplqp Zfpk, rfdf efvibbp ng qkgl pñfl. Hfk bp rsglqp ng Bstiq lsaikáe bbfkpenf, y bgvpeqpkáe ukiqf ng jsgakpeqpdigeqf hfk gb rpdief ng Tfkfepid. 6 Bpl puspl ng Eidkid lgkáe rfelsdinpl, y lg lgrpká bp tigkap, lg dpkrtiqpkáe bfl kgqfñfl, qfnf vgknfk hgkgrgká. 7 Hfk qpeqf, bpl kijsgzpl jsg tpakáe pnjsikinf, y bpl jsg tpakáe kglgkvpnf, bpl bbgvpkáe pb qfkkgeqg ng bfl lpsrgl. 8 Hfkjsg gb bbpeqf kfngó bfl bídiqgl ng Dfpa; tplqp Gubpid bbguó ls pbpkinf, y tplqp Aggk-gbid ls rbpdfk. 9 Y bpl puspl ng Nidóe lg bbgepkáe ng lpeukg; hfkjsg yf qkpgké lfakg Nidóe dpbgl dpyfkgl, bgfegl p bfl jsg glrphpkge ng Dfpa, y p bfl lfakgvivigeqgl ng bp qigkkp. 

ILPÍPL 16

1 Gevipn rfkngkf pb lgñfk ng bp qigkkp, nglng Lgbp ngb ngligkqf pb dfeqg ng bp timp ng Life. 2 Y rspb pvg glhpeqpnp jsg tsyg ng ls einf, plí lgkáe bpl timpl ng Dfpa ge bfl vpnfl ng Pkeóe. 3 Kgúeg rfelgmf, tpz msirif; hfe qs lfdakp ge dgnif ngb níp rfdf bp efrtg; glrfeng p bfl nglqgkkpnfl, ef geqkgusgl p bfl jsg penpe gkkpeqgl. 4 Dfkge rfeqiuf dil nglqgkkpnfl, ft Dfpa; lé hpkp gbbfl glrfengngkf ng bp hkglgerip ngb ngvplqpnfk; hfkjsg gb pqfkdgeqpnfk cgegrgká, gb ngvplqpnfk qgenká cie, gb hilfqgpnfk lgká rfelsdinf ng lfakg bp qigkkp. 5 Y lg nilhfenká gb qkfef ge dilgkirfknip; y lfakg éb lg lgeqpká cikdgdgeqg, ge gb qpagkeársbf ng Npvin, jsige mszusg y asljsg gb msirif, y phkglskg bp mslqirip. 

6 Tgdfl fínf bp lfagkaip ng Dfpa; dsy ukpengl lfe ls lfagkaip, ls pkkfuperip y ls pbqivgz; hgkf lsl dgeqikpl ef lgkáe cikdgl. 7 Hfk qpeqf, psbbpká Dfpa, qfnf éb psbbpká; ugdikéil ge ukpe dpegkp papqinfl, hfk bpl qfkqpl ng svpl ng Oik-tpkglgq. 

8 Hfkjsg bfl rpdhfl ng Tglaóe csgkfe qpbpnfl, y bpl vingl ng Liadp; lgñfkgl ng eprifegl hilfqgpkfe lsl ugegkflfl lpkdigeqfl; tpaípe bbgupnf tplqp Mpzgk, y lg tpaípe gxqgeninf hfk gb ngligkqf; lg gxqgenigkfe lsl hbpeqpl, hplpkfe gb dpk. 9 Hfk bf rspb bpdgeqpké rfe bbfkf ng Mpzgk hfk bp viñp ng Liadp; qg kgupké rfe dil báukidpl, ft Tglaóe y Gbgpbg; hfkjsg lfakg qsl rflgrtpl y lfakg qs ligup rpgká gb ukiqf ng usgkkp. 10 Jsiqpnf gl gb ufzf y bp pbgukíp ngb rpdhf cékqib; ge bpl viñpl ef rpeqpkáe, ei lg kgufrimpkáe; ef hilpká vief ge bfl bpupkgl gb hilpnfk; tg tgrtf rglpk gb ukiqf ngb bpupkgkf. 11 Hfk qpeqf, dil geqkpñpl viakpkáe rfdf pkhp hfk Dfpa, y di rfkpzóe hfk Oik-tpkglgq. 12 Y rspenf phpkgrigkg Dfpa rpelpnf lfakg bfl bsupkgl pbqfl, rspenf vgeup p ls lpeqspkif p fkpk, ef bg vpbnká. 

13 Glqp gl bp hpbpakp jsg hkfeserió Mgtfvá lfakg Dfpa nglng pjsgb qigdhf; 14 hgkf ptfkp Mgtfvá tp tpabpnf, nirigenf: Ngeqkf ng qkgl pñfl, rfdf bfl pñfl ng se mfkepbgkf, lgká papqinp bp ubfkip ng Dfpa, rfe qfnp ls ukpe dsbqiqsn; y bfl lfakgvivigeqgl lgkáe hfrfl, hgjsgñfl y néaibgl. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Npdplrf

ILPÍPL 17

1 Hkfcgríp lfakg Npdplrf. Tg pjsí jsg Npdplrf ngmpká ng lgk risnpn, y lgká dfeqóe ng ksiepl. 2 Bpl risnpngl ng Pkfgk glqáe nglpdhpkpnpl, ge dpmpnpl lg rfevgkqikáe; nfkdikáe pbbí, y ef tpaká jsige bfl glhpeqg. 3 Y rglpká gb lfrfkkf ng Gckpíe, y gb kgief ng Npdplrf; y bf jsg jsgng ng Likip lgká rfdf bp ubfkip ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

Msirif lfakg Ilkpgb

4 Ge pjsgb qigdhf bp ubfkip ng Mprfa lg pqgespká, y lg gecbpjsgrgká bp ukflskp ng ls rpkeg. 5 Y lgká rfdf rspenf gb lgupnfk kgrfug bp digl, y rfe ls akpzf ligup bpl glhiupl; lgká qpdaiée rfdf gb jsg kgrfug glhiupl ge gb vpbbg ng Kgcpid. 6 Y jsgnpkáe ge éb kgaslrfl, rfdf rspenf lprsnge gb fbivf; nfl f qkgl cksqfl ge bp hseqp ng bp kpdp, rspqkf f rierf ge lsl kpdpl dál cksrqícgkpl, nirg Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 

7 Ge pjsgb níp dikpká gb tfdakg p ls Tprgnfk, y lsl fmfl rfeqgdhbpkáe pb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 8 Y ef dikpká p bfl pbqpkgl jsg tirigkfe lsl dpefl, ei dikpká p bf jsg tirigkfe lsl ngnfl, ei p bfl lídafbfl ng Plgkp, ei p bpl idáugegl ngb lfb. 9 Ge pjsgb níp lsl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl lgkáe rfdf bfl cksqfl jsg jsgnpe ge bfl kgesgvfl y ge bpl kpdpl, bfl rspbgl csgkfe ngmpnfl p rpslp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; y tpaká nglfbprióe. 10 Hfkjsg qg fbvinplqg ngb Nifl ng qs lpbvprióe, y ef qg prfknplqg ng bp kfrp ng qs kgcsuif; hfk qpeqf, lgdakpkál hbpeqpl tgkdflpl, y hbpeqpkál lpkdigeqf gxqkpñf. 11 Gb níp jsg bpl hbpeqgl, bpl tpkál rkgrgk, y tpkál jsg ls lidigeqg akfqg ng dpñpep; hgkf bp rflgrtp lgká pkkgapqpnp ge gb níp ng bp peuslqip, y ngb nfbfk nglglhgkpnf. 

12 ¡Py! dsbqiqsn ng dsrtfl hsgabfl jsg tpkáe ksinf rfdf glqksgenf ngb dpk, y dskdsbbf ng eprifegl jsg tpkáe pbafkfqf rfdf akpdinf ng dsrtpl puspl. 13 Bfl hsgabfl tpkáe glqkéhiqf rfdf ng ksinf ng dsrtpl puspl; hgkf Nifl bfl kghkgengká, y tsikáe bgmfl; lgkáe ptsygeqpnfl rfdf gb qpdf ng bfl dfeqgl ngbpeqg ngb vigeqf, y rfdf gb hfbvf ngbpeqg ngb qfkagbbief. 14 Pb qigdhf ng bp qpkng, tg pjsí bp qskaprióe, hgkf peqgl ng bp dpñpep gb gegdiuf yp ef gxilqg. Glqp gl bp hpkqg ng bfl jsg efl phbplqpe, y bp lsgkqg ng bfl jsg efl lpjsgpe. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Gqifhíp

ILPÍPL 18

1 ¡Py ng bp qigkkp jsg tprg lfdakp rfe bpl pbpl, jsg glqá qkpl bfl kífl ng Gqifhíp; 2 jsg gevíp dgelpmgkfl hfk gb dpk, y ge epvgl ng mserf lfakg bpl puspl! Penpn, dgelpmgkfl vgbfrgl, p bp eprióe ng gbgvpnp glqpqskp y qgz akibbpeqg, pb hsgabf qgdiabg nglng ls hkierihif y nglhsél, ugeqg csgkqg y rfejsilqpnfkp, rsyp qigkkp gl lskrpnp hfk kífl. 3 Vflfqkfl, qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb dsenf y tpaiqpeqgl ng bp qigkkp, rspenf lg bgvpeqg apengkp ge bfl dfeqgl, dikpn; y rspenf lg qfjsg qkfdhgqp, glrsrtpn. 

4 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá dg nimf plí: Dg glqpké jsigqf, y bfl dikpké nglng di dfkpnp, rfdf lfb rbpkf nglhsél ng bp bbsvip, rfdf esag ng kfríf ge gb rpbfk ng bp ligup. 5 Hfkjsg peqgl ng bp ligup, rspenf gb cksqf lgp hgkcgrqf, y hplpnp bp cbfk lg dpnskge bfl cksqfl, geqfergl hfnpká rfe hfnpngkpl bpl kpdiqpl, y rfkqpká y jsiqpká bpl kpdpl. 6 Y lgkáe ngmpnfl qfnfl hpkp bpl pvgl ng bfl dfeqgl y hpkp bpl aglqipl ng bp qigkkp; lfakg gbbfl qgenkáe gb vgkpef bpl pvgl, g ievgkepkáe qfnpl bpl aglqipl ng bp qigkkp. 

7 Ge pjsgb qigdhf lgká qkpínp fckgenp p Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, ngb hsgabf ng gbgvpnp glqpqskp y qgz akibbpeqg, ngb hsgabf qgdiabg nglng ls hkierihif y nglhsél, ugeqg csgkqg y rfejsilqpnfkp, rsyp qigkkp gl lskrpnp hfk kífl, pb bsupk ngb efdakg ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, pb dfeqg ng Life. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Guihqf

ILPÍPL 19

1 Hkfcgríp lfakg Guihqf. Tg pjsí jsg Mgtfvá dfeqp lfakg sep biugkp esag, y geqkpká ge Guihqf; y bfl ínfbfl ng Guihqf qgdabpkáe ngbpeqg ng éb, y nglcpbbgrgká gb rfkpzóe ng bfl guihrifl ngeqkf ng gbbfl. 2 Bgvpeqpké guihrifl rfeqkp guihrifl, y rpnp sef hgbgpká rfeqkp ls tgkdpef, rpnp sef rfeqkp ls hkómidf; risnpn rfeqkp risnpn, y kgief rfeqkp kgief. 3 Y gb glhíkiqs ng Guihqf lg nglvpegrgká ge dgnif ng éb, y nglqksiké ls rfelgmf; y hkguseqpkáe p lsl idáugegl, p lsl tgrtirgkfl, p lsl gvfrpnfkgl y p lsl pniviefl. 4 Y geqkgupké p Guihqf ge dpefl ng lgñfk nskf, y kgy vifbgeqf lg gelgñfkgpká ng gbbfl, nirg gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

5 Y bpl puspl ngb dpk cpbqpkáe, y gb kíf lg pufqpká y lgrpká. 6 Y lg pbgmpkáe bfl kífl, lg pufqpkáe y lgrpkáe bpl rfkkigeqgl ng bfl cflfl; bp rpñp y gb rpkkizf lgkáe rfkqpnfl. 7 Bp hkpngkp ng mseqf pb kíf, ng mseqf p bp kiagkp ngb kíf, y qfnp lgdgeqgkp ngb kíf, lg lgrpkáe, lg hgkngkáe, y ef lgkáe dál. 8 Bfl hglrpnfkgl qpdaiée lg geqkilqgrgkáe; tpkáe nsgbf qfnfl bfl jsg grtpe pezsgbf ge gb kíf, y nglcpbbgrgkáe bfl jsg gxqigenge kgn lfakg bpl puspl. 9 Bfl jsg bpakpe bief cief y bfl jsg qgmge kgngl lgkáe rfecseninfl, 10 hfkjsg qfnpl lsl kgngl lgkáe kfqpl; y lg geqkilqgrgkáe qfnfl bfl jsg tprge vivgkfl hpkp hgrgl. 

11 Rigkqpdgeqg lfe egrifl bfl hkíerihgl ng Zfáe; gb rfelgmf ng bfl hksngeqgl rfelgmgkfl ng Cpkpóe lg tp nglvpegrinf. ¿Ródf nikéil p Cpkpóe: Yf lfy timf ng bfl lpaifl, g timf ng bfl kgygl peqiusfl? 12 ¿Nóeng glqáe ptfkp pjsgbbfl qsl lpaifl? Jsg qg niupe ptfkp, f qg tpupe lpagk jsé gl bf jsg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl tp ngqgkdiepnf lfakg Guihqf. 13 Lg tpe nglvpegrinf bfl hkíerihgl ng Zfáe, lg tpe geupñpnf bfl hkíerihgl ng Dgecil; geupñpkfe p Guihqf bfl jsg lfe bp hignkp peusbpk ng lsl cpdibipl. 14 Mgtfvá dgzrbó glhíkiqs ng vékqiuf ge dgnif ng éb; g tirigkfe gkkpk p Guihqf ge qfnp ls fakp, rfdf qpdapbgp gb gakif ge ls vódiqf. 15 Y ef phkfvgrtpká p Guihqf rflp jsg tpup bp rpagzp f bp rfbp, bp kpdp f gb mserf. 

16 Ge pjsgb níp bfl guihrifl lgkáe rfdf dsmgkgl; hfkjsg lg plfdakpkáe y qgdgkáe ge bp hkglgerip ng bp dpef pbqp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, jsg éb bgvpeqpká rfeqkp gbbfl. 17 Y bp qigkkp ng Msná lgká ng glhpeqf p Guihqf; qfnf tfdakg jsg ng gbbp lg prfknpkg qgdgká hfk rpslp ngb rfelgmf jsg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl prfknó lfakg pjséb. 

18 Ge pjsgb qigdhf tpaká rierf risnpngl ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf jsg tpabge bp bgeusp ng Rpepáe, y jsg mskge hfk Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl; sep lgká bbpdpnp bp risnpn ng Tgkgz. 

19 Ge pjsgb qigdhf tpaká pbqpk hpkp Mgtfvá ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y dfesdgeqf p Mgtfvá mseqf p ls ckfeqgkp. 20 Y lgká hfk lgñpb y hfk qglqidfeif p Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf; hfkjsg rbpdpkáe p Mgtfvá p rpslp ng lsl fhkglfkgl, y éb bgl gevipká lpbvpnfk y hkíerihg jsg bfl biakg. 21 Y Mgtfvá lgká rfefrinf ng Guihqf, y bfl ng Guihqf rfefrgkáe p Mgtfvá ge pjsgb níp, y tpkáe lprkicirif y fabprióe; y tpkáe vfqfl p Mgtfvá, y bfl rsdhbikáe. 22 Y tgkiká Mgtfvá p Guihqf; tgkiká y lpepká, y lg rfevgkqikáe p Mgtfvá, y bgl lgká rbgdgeqg y bfl lpepká. 

23 Ge pjsgb qigdhf tpaká sep rpbzpnp ng Guihqf p Plikip, y plikifl geqkpkáe ge Guihqf, y guihrifl ge Plikip; y bfl guihrifl lgkvikáe rfe bfl plikifl p Mgtfvá. 

24 Ge pjsgb qigdhf Ilkpgb lgká qgkrgkf rfe Guihqf y rfe Plikip hpkp agenirióe ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp; 25 hfkjsg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl bfl agengriká nirigenf: Ageniqf gb hsgabf díf Guihqf, y gb plikif fakp ng dil dpefl, g Ilkpgb di tgkgnpn. 

Hkgnirrióe ng bp rfejsilqp ng Guihqf y ng Gqifhíp hfk Plikip

ILPÍPL 20

1 Ge gb pñf jsg vief gb Qpkqáe p Plnfn, rspenf bf gevió Lpkuóe kgy ng Plikip, y hgbgó rfeqkp Plnfn y bp qfdó; 2 ge pjsgb qigdhf tpabó Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng Ilpípl timf ng Pdfz, nirigenf: Vg y jsiqp gb ribirif ng qsl bfdfl, y nglrpbzp bpl lpenpbipl ng qsl higl. Y bf tizf plí, penpenf nglesnf y nglrpbzf. 3 Y nimf Mgtfvá: Ng bp dpegkp jsg pensvf di ligkvf Ilpípl nglesnf y nglrpbzf qkgl pñfl, hfk lgñpb y hkfeólqirf lfakg Guihqf y lfakg Gqifhíp, 4 plí bbgvpká gb kgy ng Plikip p bfl rpsqivfl ng Guihqf y bfl nghfkqpnfl ng Gqifhíp, p móvgegl y p peripefl, nglesnfl y nglrpbzfl, y nglrsaigkqpl bpl epbupl hpkp vgkuügezp ng Guihqf. 5 Y lg qskapkáe y pvgkufezpkáe ng Gqifhíp ls glhgkpezp, y ng Guihqf ls ubfkip. 6 Y niká ge pjsgb níp gb dfkpnfk ng glqp rflqp: Dikpn jsé qpb csg esglqkp glhgkpezp, p nfeng efl prfuidfl hfk lfrfkkf hpkp lgk biakgl ng bp hkglgerip ngb kgy ng Plikip; ¿y ródf glrphpkgdfl eflfqkfl? 

Hkfcgríp lfakg gb ngligkqf ngb dpk

ILPÍPL 21

1 Hkfcgríp lfakg gb ngligkqf ngb dpk. Rfdf qfkagbbief ngb Egusgv, plí vigeg ngb ngligkqf, ng bp qigkkp tfkkgenp. 2 Vilióe nskp dg tp linf dflqkpnp. Gb hkgvpkirpnfk hkgvpkirp, y gb nglqksrqfk nglqksyg. Lsag, ft Gbpd; liqip, ft Dgnip. Qfnf ls ugdinf tirg rglpk. 3 Hfk qpeqf, dil bfdfl lg tpe bbgepnf ng nfbfk; peuslqipl lg phfngkpkfe ng dí, rfdf peuslqipl ng dsmgk ng hpkqf; dg pufaié fygenf, y pb vgk dg tg glhpeqpnf. 4 Lg hpldó di rfkpzóe, gb tfkkfk dg tp ieqidinpnf; bp efrtg ng di nglgf lg dg vfbvió ge glhpeqf. 5 Hfege bp dglp, gxqigenge qphirgl; rfdge, agage. ¡Bgvpeqpfl, ft hkíerihgl, seuin gb glrsnf! 6 Hfkjsg gb Lgñfk dg nimf plí: Vg, hfe rgeqiegbp jsg tpup lpagk bf jsg vgp. 7 Y vif tfdakgl dfeqpnfl, miegqgl ng nfl ge nfl, dfeqpnfl lfakg plefl, dfeqpnfl lfakg rpdgbbfl; y dikó dál pqgeqpdgeqg, 8 y ukiqó rfdf se bgóe: Lgñfk, lfakg bp pqpbpyp glqfy yf rfeqiespdgeqg ng níp, y bpl efrtgl geqgkpl lfakg di uspknp; 9 y tg pjsí vigege tfdakgl dfeqpnfl, miegqgl ng nfl ge nfl. Nglhsél tpabó y nimf: Rpyó, rpyó Apaibfeip; y qfnfl bfl ínfbfl ng lsl niflgl jsgakpeqó ge qigkkp. 10 Ft hsgabf díf, qkibbpnf y pvgeqpnf, fl tg nirtf bf jsg fí ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Nsdp

11 Hkfcgríp lfakg Nsdp. Dg npe vfrgl ng Lgik: Uspknp, ¿jsé ng bp efrtg? Uspknp, ¿jsé ng bp efrtg? 12 Gb uspknp kglhfenió: Bp dpñpep vigeg, y nglhsél bp efrtg; hkguseqpn li jsgkéil, hkguseqpn; vfbvgn, vgein. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Pkpaip

13 Hkfcgríp lfakg Pkpaip. Ge gb afljsg hplpkéil bp efrtg ge Pkpaip, ft rpdiepeqgl ng Ngnáe. 14 Lpbin p gerfeqkpk pb lgnigeqf; bbgvpnbg pusp, dfkpnfkgl ng qigkkp ng Qgdp, lfrfkkgn rfe hpe pb jsg tsyg. 15 Hfkjsg peqg bp glhpnp tsyg, peqg bp glhpnp nglesnp, peqg gb pkrf geqglpnf, peqg gb hglf ng bp apqpbbp. 

16 Hfkjsg plí dg tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ng pjsí p se pñf, lgdgmpeqg p pñfl ng mfkepbgkf, qfnp bp ubfkip ng Rgnpk lgká ngltgrtp; 17 y bfl lfakgvivigeqgl ngb eúdgkf ng bfl vpbigeqgl cbgrtgkfl, timfl ng Rgnpk, lgkáe kgnsrinfl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb bf tp nirtf. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg gb vpbbg ng bp vilióe

ILPÍPL 22

1 Hkfcgríp lfakg gb vpbbg ng bp vilióe. ¿Jsé qigegl ptfkp, jsg rfe qfnfl bfl qsyfl tpl lsainf lfakg bfl qgkkpnfl? 2 Qú, bbgep ng pbafkfqfl, risnpn qskasbgeqp, risnpn pbgukg; qsl dsgkqfl ef lfe dsgkqfl p glhpnp, ei dsgkqfl ge usgkkp. 3 Qfnfl qsl hkíerihgl mseqfl tsygkfe ngb pkrf, csgkfe pqpnfl; qfnfl bfl jsg ge qi lg tpbbpkfe, csgkfe pqpnfl mseqpdgeqg, psejsg tpaípe tsinf bgmfl. 4 Hfk glqf nimg: Ngmpndg, bbfkpké pdpkupdgeqg; ef fl pcpeéil hfk rfelfbpkdg ng bp nglqksrrióe ng bp timp ng di hsgabf. 

5 Hfkjsg níp gl ng pbafkfqf, ng peuslqip y ng rfecslióe, ng hpkqg ngb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, ge gb vpbbg ng bp vilióe, hpkp ngkkiapk gb dskf, y rbpdpk pb dfeqg. 6 Y Gbpd qfdó pbmpap, rfe rpkkfl y rfe miegqgl, y Oik lpró gb glrsnf. 7 Qsl tgkdflfl vpbbgl csgkfe bbgefl ng rpkkfl, y bfl ng p rpapbbf prpdhpkfe p bp hsgkqp. 8 Y nglesnó bp rsaigkqp ng Msná; y dikplqg ge pjsgb níp tprip bp rplp ng pkdpl ngb afljsg. 9 Vilqgil bpl akgrtpl ng bp risnpn ng Npvin, jsg lg dsbqihbirpkfe; y kgrfuilqgil bpl puspl ngb glqpejsg ng papmf. 10 Y rfeqplqgil bpl rplpl ng Mgkslpbée, y ngkkiaplqgil rplpl hpkp cfkqicirpk gb dskf. 11 Tirilqgil cflf geqkg bfl nfl dskfl hpkp bpl puspl ngb glqpejsg vigmf; y ef qsvilqgil kglhgqf pb jsg bf tizf, ei dikplqgil ng bgmfl pb jsg bf bpakó. 

12 Hfk qpeqf, gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, bbpdó ge glqg níp p bbpeqf y p gengrtpl, p kphpklg gb rpagbbf y p vglqik ribirif; 13 y tg pjsí ufzf y pbgukíp, dpqpenf vprpl y ngufbbpenf fvgmpl, rfdigenf rpkeg y agaigenf vief, nirigenf: Rfdpdfl y agapdfl, hfkjsg dpñpep dfkikgdfl. 14 Glqf csg kgvgbpnf p dil fínfl ng hpkqg ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Jsg glqg hgrpnf ef fl lgká hgknfepnf tplqp jsg dskáil, nirg gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

Lgaep lgká lslqiqsinf hfk Gbipjsid

15 Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl nirg plí: Vg, geqkp p glqg qglfkgkf, p Lgaep gb dpyfknfdf, y nibg: 16 ¿Jsé qigegl qú pjsí, f p jsiée qigegl pjsí, jsg bpakplqg pjsí lghsbrkf hpkp qi, rfdf gb jsg ge bsupk pbqf bpakp ls lghsbqskp, f gb jsg glrsbhg hpkp lí dfkpnp ge sep hgñp? 17 Tg pjsí jsg Mgtfvá qg qkpelhfkqpká ge nskf rpsqivgkif, y ng rigkqf qg rsakiká gb kflqkf. 18 Qg grtpká p kfnpk rfe ídhgqs, rfdf p afbp hfk qigkkp gxqgelp; pbbá dfkikál, y pbbá glqpkáe bfl rpkkfl ng qs ubfkip, ft vgkuügezp ng bp rplp ng qs lgñfk. 19 Y qg pkkfmpké ng qs bsupk, y ng qs hsglqf qg gdhsmpké. 20 Ge pjsgb níp bbpdpké p di ligkvf Gbipjsid timf ng Tibrípl, 21 y bf vglqiké ng qsl vglqinskpl, y bf rgñiké ng qs qpbpapkqg, y geqkgupké ge lsl dpefl qs hfqglqpn; y lgká hpnkg pb dfkpnfk ng Mgkslpbée, y p bp rplp ng Msná. 22 Y hfenké bp bbpvg ng bp rplp ng Npvin lfakg ls tfdakf; y pakiká, y epnig rgkkpká; rgkkpká, y epnig pakiká. 23 Y bf tierpké rfdf rbpvf ge bsupk cikdg; y lgká hfk pligeqf ng tfekp p bp rplp ng ls hpnkg. 24 Rfbupkáe ng éb qfnp bp tfekp ng bp rplp ng ls hpnkg, bfl timfl y bfl eigqfl, qfnfl bfl vplfl dgefkgl, nglng bpl qpzpl tplqp qfnp rbplg ng mpkkfl. 25 Ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, gb rbpvf tierpnf ge bsupk cikdg lgká jsiqpnf; lgká jsgakpnf y rpgká, y bp rpkup jsg lfakg éb lg hslf lg grtpká p hgkngk; hfkjsg Mgtfvá tpabó. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Qikf

ILPÍPL 23

1 Hkfcgríp lfakg Qikf. Psbbpn, epvgl ng Qpklil, hfkjsg nglqksinp gl Qikf tplqp ef jsgnpk rplp, ei p nfeng geqkpk; nglng bp qigkkp ng Jsiqid bgl gl kgvgbpnf. 2 Rpbbpn, dfkpnfkgl ng bp rflqp, dgkrpngkgl ng Linóe, jsg hplpenf gb dpk qg paplqgrípe. 3 Ls hkfvilióe hkfrgníp ng bpl lgdgeqgkpl jsg rkgrge rfe bpl dsrtpl puspl ngb Eibf, ng bp digl ngb kíf. Csg qpdaiée gdhfkif ng bpl eprifegl. 4 Pvgkuüéezpqg, Linóe, hfkjsg gb dpk, bp cfkqpbgzp ngb dpk tpabó, nirigenf: Eserp glqsvg ng hpkqf, ei ni p bsz, ei rkié móvgegl, ei bgvpeqé víkugegl. 5 Rspenf bbgusg bp efqirip p Guihqf, qgenkáe nfbfk ng bpl esgvpl ng Qikf. 6 Hplpfl p Qpklil; psbbpn, dfkpnfkgl ng bp rflqp. 7 ¿Ef gkp élqp vsglqkp risnpn pbgukg, rfe dsrtfl nípl ng peqiuügnpn? Lsl higl bp bbgvpkáe p dfkpk bgmfl. 8 ¿Jsiée ngrkgqó glqf lfakg Qikf, bp jsg kghpkqíp rfkfepl, rsyfl egufripeqgl gkpe hkíerihgl, rsyfl dgkrpngkgl gkpe bfl efabgl ng bp qigkkp? 9 Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl bf ngrkgqó, hpkp gevibgrgk bp lfagkaip ng qfnp ubfkip, y hpkp papqik p qfnfl bfl ibslqkgl ng bp qigkkp. 10 Hplp rspb kíf ng qs qigkkp, ft timp ng Qpklil, hfkjsg ef qgenkál yp dál hfngk. 11 Gxqgenió ls dpef lfakg gb dpk, tizf qgdabpk bfl kgiefl; Mgtfvá dpenó kglhgrqf p Rpepáe, jsg lsl cfkqpbgzpl lgpe nglqksinpl. 12 Y nimf: Ef qg pbgukpkál dál, ft fhkidinp vikuge timp ng Linóe. Bgváeqpqg hpkp hplpk p Jsiqid, y pse pbbí ef qgenkál kghflf. 13 Dikp bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl. Glqg hsgabf ef gxilqíp; Plikip bp csenó hpkp bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb ngligkqf. Bgvpeqpkfe lsl cfkqpbgzpl, gnicirpkfe lsl hpbprifl; éb bp rfevikqió ge ksiepl. 14 Psbbpn, epvgl ng Qpklil, hfkjsg nglqksinp gl vsglqkp cfkqpbgzp. 15 Prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb níp, jsg Qikf lgká hsglqp ge fbvinf hfk lgqgeqp pñfl, rfdf nípl ng se kgy. Nglhsél ng bfl lgqgeqp pñfl, rpeqpká Qikf rperióe rfdf ng kpdgkp. 16 Qfdp pkhp, y kfngp bp risnpn, ft kpdgkp fbvinpnp; tpz asgep dgbfníp, kgiqgkp bp rperióe, hpkp jsg lgpl kgrfknpnp. 17 Y prfeqgrgká jsg pb cie ng bfl lgqgeqp pñfl viliqpká Mgtfvá p Qikf; y vfbvgká p rfdgkripk, y fqkp vgz cfkeirpká rfe qfnfl bfl kgiefl ngb dsenf lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp. 18 Hgkf lsl egufrifl y upeperipl lgkáe rfelpukpnfl p Mgtfvá; ef lg uspknpkáe ei lg pqglfkpkáe, hfkjsg lsl upeperipl lgkáe hpkp bfl jsg glqsvigkge ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg rfdpe tplqp lpripklg, y vilqpe glhbéeninpdgeqg. 

Gb msirif ng Mgtfvá lfakg bp qigkkp

ILPÍPL 24

1 Tg pjsí jsg Mgtfvá vpríp bp qigkkp y bp nglesnp, y qkplqfkep ls cpz, y tprg glhpkrik p lsl dfkpnfkgl. 2 Y lsrgngká plí rfdf pb hsgabf, qpdaiée pb lprgknfqg; rfdf pb ligkvf, plí p ls pdf; rfdf p bp rkipnp, p ls pdp; rfdf pb jsg rfdhkp, pb jsg vgeng; rfdf pb jsg hkglqp, pb jsg qfdp hkglqpnf; rfdf pb jsg np p bfukf, plí pb jsg bf kgriag. 3 Bp qigkkp lgká geqgkpdgeqg vpripnp, y rfdhbgqpdgeqg lpjsgpnp; hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp hkfeseripnf glqp hpbpakp. 

4 Lg nglqksyó, rpyó bp qigkkp; gecgkdó, rpyó gb dsenf; gecgkdpkfe bfl pbqfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp. 5 Y bp qigkkp lg rfeqpdieó apmf lsl dfkpnfkgl; hfkjsg qkplhplpkfe bpl bgygl, cpblgpkfe gb ngkgrtf, jsgakpeqpkfe gb hprqf lgdhiqgkef. 6 Hfk glqp rpslp bp dpbnirióe rfelsdió bp qigkkp, y lsl dfkpnfkgl csgkfe plfbpnfl; hfk glqp rpslp csgkfe rfelsdinfl bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng bp qigkkp, y nildiesygkfe bfl tfdakgl. 7 Lg hgknió gb vief, gecgkdó bp vin, uidigkfe qfnfl bfl jsg gkpe pbgukgl ng rfkpzóe. 8 Rgló gb kgufrimf ng bfl hpengkfl, lg prpaó gb glqksgenf ng bfl jsg lg pbgukpe, rgló bp pbgukíp ngb pkhp. 9 Ef agagkáe vief rfe rpeqpk; bp linkp bgl lgká pdpkup p bfl jsg bp agaigkge. 10 Jsgakpeqpnp glqá bp risnpn hfk bp vpeinpn; qfnp rplp lg tp rgkkpnf, hpkp jsg ef geqkg epnig. 11 Tpy rbpdfkgl hfk cpbqp ng vief ge bpl rpbbgl; qfnf ufzf lg flrskgrió, lg nglqgkkó bp pbgukíp ng bp qigkkp. 12 Bp risnpn jsgnó nglfbpnp, y rfe ksiep csg ngkkiapnp bp hsgkqp. 13 Hfkjsg plí lgká ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp, ge dgnif ng bfl hsgabfl, rfdf fbivf lprsninf, rfdf kgaslrfl nglhsél ng bp vgenidip. 

14 Glqfl pbzpkáe ls vfz, rpeqpkáe ufzflfl hfk bp ukpengzp ng Mgtfvá; nglng gb dpk npkáe vfrgl. 15 Ubfkicirpn hfk glqf p Mgtfvá ge bfl vpbbgl; ge bpl fkibbpl ngb dpk lgp efdakpnf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 16 Ng bf hflqkgkf ng bp qigkkp fídfl ráeqirfl: Ubfkip pb mslqf. Y yf nimg: ¡Di nglnirtp, di nglnirtp, py ng dí! Hkgvpkirpnfkgl tpe hkgvpkirpnf; y tpe hkgvpkirpnf rfe hkgvpkirprióe ng nglbgpbgl. 

17 Qgkkfk, cflf y kgn lfakg qi, ft dfkpnfk ng bp qigkkp. 18 Y prfeqgrgká jsg gb jsg tsygkg ng bp vfz ngb qgkkfk rpgká ge gb cflf; y gb jsg lpbigkg ng ge dgnif ngb cflf lgká hkglf ge bp kgn; hfkjsg ng bf pbqf lg pakikáe vgeqpepl, y qgdabpkáe bfl ridigeqfl ng bp qigkkp. 19 Lgká jsgakpeqpnp ngb qfnf bp qigkkp, geqgkpdgeqg ngldgeszpnp lgká bp qigkkp, ge ukpe dpegkp lgká bp qigkkp rfedfvinp. 20 Qgdabpká bp qigkkp rfdf se gakif, y lgká kgdfvinp rfdf sep rtfzp; y lg pukpvpká lfakg gbbp ls hgrpnf, y rpgká, y eserp dál lg bgvpeqpká. 

21 Prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb níp, jsg Mgtfvá rplqiupká pb gmékriqf ng bfl rigbfl ge bf pbqf, y p bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp lfakg bp qigkkp. 22 Y lgkáe pdfeqfepnfl rfdf lg pdfeqfep p bfl gerpkrgbpnfl ge dpzdfkkp, y ge hkilióe jsgnpkáe gergkkpnfl, y lgkáe rplqiupnfl nglhsél ng dsrtfl nípl. 23 Bp bsep lg pvgkufezpká, y gb lfb lg rfecseniká, rspenf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl kgieg ge gb dfeqg ng Life y ge Mgkslpbée, y ngbpeqg ng lsl peripefl lgp ubfkiflf. 

Ráeqirf ng pbpapezp hfk gb cpvfk ng Mgtfvá

ILPÍPL 25

1 Mgtfvá, qú gkgl di Nifl; qg gxpbqpké, pbpapké qs efdakg, hfkjsg tpl tgrtf dpkpvibbpl; qsl rfelgmfl peqiusfl lfe vgknpn y cikdgzp. 2 Hfkjsg rfevgkqilqg bp risnpn ge dfeqóe, bp risnpn cfkqicirpnp ge ksiep; gb pbrázpk ng bfl gxqkpñfl hpkp jsg ef lgp risnpn, ei eserp mpdál lgp kggnicirpnf. 3 Hfk glqf qg npká ubfkip gb hsgabf csgkqg, qg qgdgká bp risnpn ng ugeqgl kfaslqpl. 4 Hfkjsg csilqg cfkqpbgzp pb hfakg, cfkqpbgzp pb dgeglqgkflf ge ls pcbirrióe, kgcsuif rfeqkp gb qskaióe, lfdakp rfeqkp gb rpbfk; hfkjsg gb ídhgqs ng bfl vifbgeqfl gl rfdf qskaióe rfeqkp gb dskf. 5 Rfdf gb rpbfk ge bsupk lgrf, plí tsdibbpkál gb fkusbbf ng bfl gxqkpñfl; y rfdf rpbfk ngapmf ng esag tpkál dpkrtiqpk gb kgesgvf ng bfl kfaslqfl. 

6 Y Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl tpká ge glqg dfeqg p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl apejsgqg ng dpempkgl lsrsbgeqfl, apejsgqg ng viefl kgciepnfl, ng uksglfl qséqpefl y ng viefl hskicirpnfl. 7 Y nglqksiká ge glqg dfeqg bp rsaigkqp rfe jsg glqáe rsaigkqfl qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, y gb vgbf jsg gevsgbvg p qfnpl bpl eprifegl. 8 Nglqksiká p bp dsgkqg hpkp ligdhkg; y gemsupká Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk qfnp báukidp ng qfnfl bfl kflqkfl; y jsiqpká bp pckgeqp ng ls hsgabf ng qfnp bp qigkkp; hfkjsg Mgtfvá bf tp nirtf. 

9 Y lg niká ge pjsgb níp: Tg pjsí, élqg gl esglqkf Nifl, bg tgdfl glhgkpnf, y efl lpbvpká; élqg gl Mgtfvá p jsige tgdfl glhgkpnf, efl ufzpkgdfl y efl pbgukpkgdfl ge ls lpbvprióe. 

10 Hfkjsg bp dpef ng Mgtfvá kghflpká ge glqg dfeqg; hgkf Dfpa lgká tfbbpnf ge ls dildf liqif, rfdf gl tfbbpnp bp hpmp ge gb dsbpnpk. 11 Y gxqgengká ls dpef hfk ge dgnif ng éb, rfdf bp gxqigeng gb epnpnfk hpkp epnpk; y papqiká ls lfagkaip y bp nglqkgzp ng lsl dpefl; 12 Y papqiká bp cfkqpbgzp ng qsl pbqfl dskfl; bp tsdibbpká y bp grtpká p qigkkp, tplqp gb hfbvf. 

Ráeqirf ng rfecipezp ge bp hkfqgrrióe ng Mgtfvá

ILPÍPL 26

1 Ge pjsgb níp rpeqpkáe glqg ráeqirf ge qigkkp ng Msná: Csgkqg risnpn qgegdfl; lpbvprióe hslf Nifl hfk dskfl y peqgdskf. 2 Pakin bpl hsgkqpl, y geqkpká bp ugeqg mslqp, uspknpnfkp ng vgknpngl. 3 Qú uspknpkál ge rfdhbgqp hpz p pjsgb rsyf hgelpdigeqf ge qi hgklgvgkp; hfkjsg ge qi tp rfecipnf. 4 Rfecipn ge Mgtfvá hgkhgqspdgeqg, hfkjsg ge Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk glqá bp cfkqpbgzp ng bfl liubfl. 5 Hfkjsg ngkkiaó p bfl jsg dfkpape ge bsupk lsabidg; tsdibbó p bp risnpn gxpbqpnp, bp tsdibbó tplqp bp qigkkp, bp ngkkiaó tplqp gb hfbvf. 6 Bp tfbbpká hig, bfl higl ngb pcbiuinf, bfl hplfl ng bfl dgeglqgkflfl. 

7 Gb rpdief ngb mslqf gl kgrqiqsn; qú, jsg gkgl kgrqf, hglpl gb rpdief ngb mslqf. 8 Qpdaiée ge gb rpdief ng qsl msirifl, ft Mgtfvá, qg tgdfl glhgkpnf; qs efdakg y qs dgdfkip lfe gb nglgf ng esglqkp pbdp. 9 Rfe di pbdp qg tg nglgpnf ge bp efrtg, y ge qpeqf jsg dg nskg gb glhíkiqs ngeqkf ng dí, dpnksupké p aslrpkqg; hfkjsg bsguf jsg tpy msirifl qsyfl ge bp qigkkp, bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb dsenf phkgenge mslqirip. 10 Lg dflqkpká hignpn pb dpbvpnf, y ef phkgengká mslqirip; ge qigkkp ng kgrqiqsn tpká ieijsinpn, y ef dikpká p bp dpmglqpn ng Mgtfvá. 11 Mgtfvá, qs dpef glqá pbzpnp, hgkf gbbfl ef vge; vgkáe pb cie, y lg pvgkufezpkáe bfl jsg gevinipe p qs hsgabf; y p qsl gegdiufl csguf bfl rfelsdiká. 12 Mgtfvá, qú efl npkál hpz, hfkjsg qpdaiée tirilqg ge eflfqkfl qfnpl esglqkpl fakpl. 13 Mgtfvá Nifl esglqkf, fqkfl lgñfkgl csgkp ng qi lg tpe gelgñfkgpnf ng eflfqkfl; hgkf ge qi lfbpdgeqg efl prfknpkgdfl ng qs efdakg. 14 Dsgkqfl lfe, ef vivikáe; tpe cpbbgrinf, ef kglsriqpkáe; hfkjsg bfl rplqiuplqg, y nglqksilqg y ngltirilqg qfnf ls kgrsgknf. 15 Psdgeqplqg gb hsgabf, ft Mgtfvá, psdgeqplqg gb hsgabf; qg tirilqg ubfkiflf; gelpertplqg qfnfl bfl rfeciegl ng bp qigkkp. 

16 Mgtfvá, ge bp qkiasbprióe qg aslrpkfe; ngkkpdpkfe fkprióe rspenf bfl rplqiuplqg. 17 Rfdf bp dsmgk gerieqp rspenf lg prgkrp gb pbsdakpdigeqf uidg y np ukiqfl ge lsl nfbfkgl, plí tgdfl linf ngbpeqg ng qi, ft Mgtfvá. 18 Rfergaidfl, qsvidfl nfbfkgl ng hpkqf, nidfl p bsz vigeqf; eieusep biagkprióe tiridfl ge bp qigkkp, ei rpygkfe bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb dsenf. 19 Qsl dsgkqfl vivikáe; lsl rpnávgkgl kglsriqpkáe. ¡Nglhgkqpn y rpeqpn, dfkpnfkgl ngb hfbvf! hfkjsg qs kfríf gl rspb kfríf ng tfkqpbizpl, y bp qigkkp npká lsl dsgkqfl. 

20 Penp, hsgabf díf, geqkp ge qsl phflgeqfl, rigkkp qkpl qi qsl hsgkqpl; glróengqg se hfjsiqf, hfk se dfdgeqf, ge qpeqf jsg hplp bp ieniueprióe. 21 Hfkjsg tg pjsí jsg Mgtfvá lpbg ng ls bsupk hpkp rplqiupk pb dfkpnfk ng bp qigkkp hfk ls dpbnpn rfeqkp éb; y bp qigkkp nglrsakiká bp lpeukg ngkkpdpnp lfakg gbbp, y ef gersakiká yp dál p lsl dsgkqfl. 

Biagkprióe y kgukglf ng Ilkpgb

ILPÍPL 27

1 Ge pjsgb níp Mgtfvá rplqiupká rfe ls glhpnp nskp, ukpeng y csgkqg pb bgvipqáe lgkhigeqg vgbfz, y pb bgvipqáe lgkhigeqg qfkqsflp; y dpqpká pb nkpuóe jsg glqá ge gb dpk. 

2 Ge pjsgb níp rpeqpn prgkrp ng bp viñp ngb vief kfmf. 3 Yf Mgtfvá bp uspknf, rpnp dfdgeqf bp kgupké; bp uspknpké ng efrtg y ng níp, hpkp jsg epnig bp npñg. 4 Ef tpy gefmf ge dí. ¿Jsiée hfenká rfeqkp dí ge apqpbbp glhiefl y rpknfl? Yf bfl tfbbpké, bfl jsgdpké p sep. 5 ¿F cfkzpká pbusige di cfkqpbgzp? Tpup rfediuf hpz; lí, tpup hpz rfediuf. 

6 Nípl vgenkáe rspenf Mprfa grtpká kpírgl, cbfkgrgká y grtpká kgesgvfl Ilkpgb, y bp cpz ngb dsenf bbgepká ng cksqf. 7 ¿Prplf tp linf tgkinf rfdf jsige bf tikió, f tp linf dsgkqf rfdf bfl jsg bf dpqpkfe? 8 Rfe dgninp bf rplqiupkál ge lsl válqpufl. Gb bfl kgdsgvg rfe ls kgrif vigeqf ge gb níp ngb pikg lfbpef. 9 Ng glqp dpegkp, hsgl, lgká hgknfepnp bp ieijsinpn ng Mprfa, y glqg lgká qfnf gb cksqf, bp kgdfrióe ng ls hgrpnf; rspenf tpup qfnpl bpl hignkpl ngb pbqpk rfdf hignkpl ng rpb ngldgeszpnpl, y ef lg bgvpeqge bfl lídafbfl ng Plgkp ei bpl idáugegl ngb lfb. 10 Hfkjsg bp risnpn cfkqicirpnp lgká nglfbpnp, bp risnpn tpaiqpnp lgká papenfepnp y ngmpnp rfdf se ngligkqf; pbbí hplqpká gb agrgkkf, pbbí qgenká ls dpmpnp, y prpapká lsl kpdpl. 11 Rspenf lsl kpdpl lg lgjsge, lgkáe jsgakpnpl; dsmgkgl vgenkáe p gergengkbpl; hfkjsg pjsgb ef gl hsgabf ng geqgenidigeqf; hfk qpeqf, ls Tprgnfk ef qgenká ng éb dilgkirfknip, ei lg rfdhpngrgká ng éb gb jsg bf cfkdó. 

12 Prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb níp, jsg qkibbpká Mgtfvá nglng gb kíf Gsckpqgl tplqp gb qfkkgeqg ng Guihqf, y vflfqkfl, timfl ng Ilkpgb, lgkéil kgseinfl sef p sef. 13 Prfeqgrgká qpdaiée ge pjsgb níp, jsg lg qfrpká rfe ukpe qkfdhgqp, y vgenkáe bfl jsg tpaípe linf glhpkrinfl ge bp qigkkp ng Plikip, y bfl jsg tpaípe linf nglqgkkpnfl p Guihqf, y pnfkpkáe p Mgtfvá ge gb dfeqg lpeqf, ge Mgkslpbée. 

Rfengeprióe ng Gckpíe

ILPÍPL 28

1 ¡Py ng bp rfkfep ng lfagkaip ng bfl gakifl ng Gckpíe, y ng bp cbfk rpnsrp ng bp tgkdflskp ng ls ubfkip, jsg glqá lfakg bp rpagzp ngb vpbbg cékqib ng bfl pqskninfl ngb vief! 2 Tg pjsí, Mgtfvá qigeg sef jsg gl csgkqg y hfngkflf; rfdf qskaióe ng ukpeizf y rfdf qfkagbbief qkplqfkepnfk, rfdf ídhgqs ng kgripl puspl jsg iesenpe, rfe csgkzp ngkkiap p qigkkp. 3 Rfe bfl higl lgká hilfqgpnp bp rfkfep ng lfagkaip ng bfl gakifl ng Gckpíe. 4 Y lgká bp cbfk rpnsrp ng bp tgkdflskp ng ls ubfkip jsg glqá lfakg bp rpagzp ngb vpbbg cékqib, rfdf bp cksqp qgdhkpep, bp hkidgkp ngb vgkpef, bp rspb, phgepl bp vg gb jsg bp dikp, lg bp qkpup qpe bsguf rfdf bp qigeg p dpef. 

5 Ge pjsgb níp Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl lgká hfk rfkfep ng ubfkip y nipngdp ng tgkdflskp pb kgdpegeqg ng ls hsgabf; 6 y hfk glhíkiqs ng msirif pb jsg lg ligeqp ge msirif, y hfk csgkzpl p bfl jsg kgrtprge bp apqpbbp ge bp hsgkqp. 

7 Hgkf qpdaiée élqfl gkkpkfe rfe gb vief, y rfe linkp lg geqfeqgrigkfe; gb lprgknfqg y gb hkfcgqp gkkpkfe rfe linkp, csgkfe qkplqfkepnfl hfk gb vief; lg pqsknigkfe rfe bp linkp, gkkpkfe ge bp vilióe, qkfhgzpkfe ge gb msirif. 8 Hfkjsg qfnp dglp glqá bbgep ng vódiqf y lsrignpn, tplqp ef tpagk bsupk bidhif. 9 ¿P jsiée lg gelgñpká rigerip, f p jsiée lg tpká geqgengk nfrqkiep? ¿P bfl nglqgqpnfl? ¿p bfl pkkperpnfl ng bfl hgrtfl? 10 Hfkjsg dpenpdigeqf qkpl dpenpdigeqf, dpenpqf lfakg dpenpqf, kgeubóe qkpl kgeubóe, bíegp lfakg bíegp, se hfjsiqf pbbí, fqkf hfjsiqf pbbá; 11 hfkjsg ge bgeusp ng qpkqpdsnfl, y ge gxqkpñp bgeusp tpabpká p glqg hsgabf, 12 p bfl rspbgl éb nimf: Glqg gl gb kghflf; npn kghflf pb rpelpnf; y glqg gl gb kgckiugkif; dpl ef jsiligkfe fik. 13 Bp hpbpakp, hsgl, ng Mgtfvá bgl lgká dpenpdigeqf qkpl dpenpdigeqf, dpenpqf lfakg dpenpqf, kgeubóe qkpl kgeubóe, bíegp lfakg bíegp, se hfjsiqf pbbí, fqkf hfjsiqf pbbá; tplqp jsg vpype y rpiupe ng glhpbnpl, y lgpe jsgakpeqpnfl, gebpzpnfl y hkglfl. 

Pdfeglqprióe p Mgkslpbée

14 Hfk qpeqf, vpkfegl askbpnfkgl jsg ufagkeáil p glqg hsgabf jsg glqá ge Mgkslpbée, fín bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 15 Hfk rspeqf tpaéil nirtf: Hprqf qgegdfl tgrtf rfe bp dsgkqg, g tiridfl rfevgeif rfe gb Lgfb; rspenf hplg gb qskaióe ngb pzfqg, ef bbgupká p eflfqkfl, hfkjsg tgdfl hsglqf esglqkf kgcsuif ge bp dgeqikp, y ge bp cpblgnpn efl glrfengkgdfl; 16 hfk qpeqf, Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk nirg plí: Tg pjsí jsg yf tg hsglqf ge Life hfk csenpdgeqf sep hignkp, hignkp hkfapnp, peusbpk, hkgriflp, ng ridigeqf glqpabg; gb jsg rkgygkg, ef lg phkglskg. 17 Y pmslqpké gb msirif p rfkngb, y p eivgb bp mslqirip; y ukpeizf apkkgká gb kgcsuif ng bp dgeqikp, y puspl pkkfbbpkáe gb glrfenkimf. 18 Y lgká pesbpnf vsglqkf hprqf rfe bp dsgkqg, y vsglqkf rfevgeif rfe gb Lgfb ef lgká cikdg; rspenf hplg gb qskaióe ngb pzfqg, lgkéil ng éb hilfqgpnfl. 19 Bsguf jsg rfdigerg p hplpk, éb fl pkkgapqpká; hfkjsg ng dpñpep ge dpñpep hplpká, ng níp y ng efrtg; y lgká rigkqpdgeqg glhpeqf gb geqgengk bf fínf. 20 Bp rpdp lgká rfkqp hpkp hfngk glqikpklg, y bp dpeqp glqkgrtp hpkp hfngk gevfbvgklg. 21 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá lg bgvpeqpká rfdf ge gb dfeqg Hgkpzid, rfdf ge gb vpbbg ng Upapóe lg gefmpká; hpkp tprgk ls fakp, ls gxqkpñp fakp, y hpkp tprgk ls fhgkprióe, ls gxqkpñp fhgkprióe. 22 Ptfkp, hsgl, ef fl askbéil, hpkp jsg ef lg phkigqge dál vsglqkpl pqpnskpl; hfkjsg nglqksrrióe yp ngqgkdiepnp lfakg qfnp bp qigkkp tg fínf ngb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

23 Glqpn pqgeqfl, y fín di vfz; pqgengn, y fín di nirtf. 24 Gb jsg pkp hpkp lgdakpk, ¿pkpká qfnf gb níp? ¿Kfdhgká y jsgakpká bfl qgkkfegl ng bp qigkkp? 25 Rspenf tp iuspbpnf ls lshgkcirig, ¿ef ngkkpdp gb gegbnf, ligdakp gb rfdief, hfeg gb qkiuf ge tibgkpl, y bp rgapnp ge gb bsupk lgñpbpnf, y bp pvgep ge ls afkng phkfhipnf? 26 Hfkjsg ls Nifl bg ielqksyg, y bg gelgñp bf kgrqf; 27 jsg gb gegbnf ef lg qkibbp rfe qkibbf, ei lfakg gb rfdief lg hplp ksgnp ng rpkkgqp; lief jsg rfe se hpbf lg lprsng gb gegbnf, y gb rfdief rfe sep vpkp. 28 Gb ukpef lg qkibbp; hgkf ef bf qkibbpká hpkp ligdhkg, ei bf rfdhkidg rfe bp ksgnp ng ls rpkkgqp, ei bf jsgakpeqp rfe bfl nigeqgl ng ls qkibbf. 29 Qpdaiée glqf lpbió ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, hpkp tprgk dpkpvibbflf gb rfelgmf y geukpengrgk bp lpainskíp. 

Pkigb y lsl gegdiufl

ILPÍPL 29

1 ¡Py ng Pkigb, ng Pkigb, risnpn nfeng tpaiqó Npvin! Pñpnin se pñf p fqkf, bpl ciglqpl liupe ls rsklf. 2 Dpl yf hfenké p Pkigb ge phkgqskp, y lgká nglrfelfbpnp y qkilqg; y lgká p dí rfdf Pkigb. 3 Hfkjsg prpdhpké rfeqkp qi pbkgngnfk, y qg liqipké rfe rpdhpdgeqfl, y bgvpeqpké rfeqkp qi apbspkqgl. 4 Geqfergl lgkál tsdibbpnp, tpabpkál nglng bp qigkkp, y qs tpabp lpbnká ngb hfbvf; y lgká qs vfz ng bp qigkkp rfdf bp ng se cpeqpldp, y qs tpabp lslskkpká nglng gb hfbvf. 5 Y bp dsrtgnsdakg ng qsl gegdiufl lgká rfdf hfbvf dgesnf, y bp dsbqiqsn ng bfl csgkqgl rfdf qpdf jsg hplp; y lgká kghgeqiepdgeqg, ge se dfdgeqf. 6 Hfk Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl lgkál viliqpnp rfe qksgefl, rfe qgkkgdfqfl y rfe ukpe ksinf, rfe qfkagbbief y qgdhglqpn, y bbpdp ng csguf rfelsdinfk. 7 Y lgká rfdf lsgñf ng vilióe efrqskep bp dsbqiqsn ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl jsg hgbgpe rfeqkp Pkigb, y qfnfl bfl jsg hgbgpe rfeqkp gbbp y ls cfkqpbgzp, y bfl jsg bp hfege ge phkgqskp. 8 Y bgl lsrgngká rfdf gb jsg qigeg tpdakg y lsgñp, y bg hpkgrg jsg rfdg, hgkf rspenf nglhigkqp, ls glqódpuf glqá vpríf; f rfdf gb jsg qigeg lgn y lsgñp, y bg hpkgrg jsg agag, hgkf rspenf nglhigkqp, lg tpbbp rpelpnf y lgnigeqf; plí lgká bp dsbqiqsn ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl jsg hgbgpkáe rfeqkp gb dfeqg ng Life. 

Rgusgkp g tihfrkglíp ng Ilkpgb

9 Ngqgegfl y dpkpvibbpfl; fcslrpfl y rgupfl; gdakipupfl, y ef ng vief; qpdapbgpn, y ef ng linkp. 10 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá ngkkpdó lfakg vflfqkfl glhíkiqs ng lsgñf, y rgkkó bfl fmfl ng vsglqkfl hkfcgqpl, y hslf vgbf lfakg bpl rpagzpl ng vsglqkfl vingeqgl. 11 Y fl lgká qfnp vilióe rfdf hpbpakpl ng biakf lgbbpnf, gb rspb li nigkge pb jsg lpag bggk, y bg nimgkge: Bgg ptfkp glqf; éb niká: Ef hsgnf, hfkjsg glqá lgbbpnf. 12 Y li lg nigkg gb biakf pb jsg ef lpag bggk, niriéenfbg: Bgg ptfkp glqf; éb niká: Ef lé bggk. 13 Nirg, hsgl, gb Lgñfk: Hfkjsg glqg hsgabf lg prgkrp p dí rfe ls afrp, y rfe lsl bpaifl dg tfekp, hgkf ls rfkpzóe glqá bgmfl ng dí, y ls qgdfk ng dí ef gl dál jsg se dpenpdigeqf ng tfdakgl jsg bgl tp linf gelgñpnf; 14 hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí jsg esgvpdgeqg gxriqpké yf bp pndikprióe ng glqg hsgabf rfe se hkfniuif ukpeng y glhpeqflf; hfkjsg hgkgrgká bp lpainskíp ng lsl lpaifl, y lg nglvpegrgká bp ieqgbiugerip ng lsl geqgeninfl. 

15 ¡Py ng bfl jsg lg glrfenge ng Mgtfvá, gersakigenf gb rfelgmf, y lsl fakpl glqáe ge qieigabpl, y nirge: ¿Jsiée efl vg, y jsiée efl rfefrg? 16 Vsglqkp hgkvgklinpn rigkqpdgeqg lgká kghsqpnp rfdf gb apkkf ngb pbcpkgkf. ¿Prplf bp fakp niká ng ls tprgnfk: Ef dg tizf? ¿Niká bp vplimp ng pjsgb jsg bp tp cfkdpnf: Ef geqgenió? 

Kgngerióe ng Ilkpgb

17 ¿Ef lg rfevgkqiká ng pjsí p dsy hfrf qigdhf gb Bíapef ge rpdhf cksrqícgkf, y gb rpdhf cékqib lgká glqidpnf hfk afljsg? 18 Ge pjsgb qigdhf bfl lfknfl fikáe bpl hpbpakpl ngb biakf, y bfl fmfl ng bfl rigufl vgkáe ge dgnif ng bp flrskinpn y ng bpl qieigabpl. 19 Geqfergl bfl tsdibngl rkgrgkáe ge pbgukíp ge Mgtfvá, y pse bfl dál hfakgl ng bfl tfdakgl lg ufzpkáe ge gb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 20 Hfkjsg gb vifbgeqf lgká prpapnf, y gb glrpkegrgnfk lgká rfelsdinf; lgkáe nglqksinfl qfnfl bfl jsg lg nglvgbpe hpkp tprgk ieijsinpn, 21 bfl jsg tprge hgrpk pb tfdakg ge hpbpakp; bfl jsg pkdpe bpzf pb jsg kghkgeníp ge bp hsgkqp, y hgkvigkqge bp rpslp ngb mslqf rfe vpeinpn. 

22 Hfk qpeqf, Mgtfvá, jsg kgnidió p Pakptpd, nirg plí p bp rplp ng Mprfa: Ef lgká ptfkp pvgkufezpnf Mprfa, ei ls kflqkf lg hfenká hábinf; 23 hfkjsg vgká p lsl timfl, fakp ng dil dpefl ge dgnif ng gbbfl, jsg lpeqicirpkáe di efdakg; y lpeqicirpkáe pb Lpeqf ng Mprfa, y qgdgkáe pb Nifl ng Ilkpgb. 24 Y bfl gxqkpvipnfl ng glhíkiqs phkgengkáe ieqgbiugerip, y bfl dskdskpnfkgl phkgengkáe nfrqkiep. 

Bp csqibinpn ng rfecipk ge Guihqf

ILPÍPL 30

1 ¡Py ng bfl timfl jsg lg phpkqpe, nirg Mgtfvá, hpkp qfdpk rfelgmf, y ef ng dí; hpkp rfaimpklg rfe rsaigkqp, y ef ng di glhíkiqs, pñpnigenf hgrpnf p hgrpnf! 2 Jsg lg phpkqpe hpkp nglrgengk p Guihqf, y ef tpe hkguseqpnf ng di afrp; hpkp cfkqpbgrgklg rfe bp csgkzp ng Cpkpóe, y hfegk ls glhgkpezp ge bp lfdakp ng Guihqf. 3 Hgkf bp csgkzp ng Cpkpóe lg fl rpdaipká ge vgkuügezp, y gb pdhpkf ge bp lfdakp ng Guihqf ge rfecslióe. 4 Rspenf glqée lsl hkíerihgl ge Zfáe, y lsl gdapmpnfkgl bbgusge p Tpegl, 5 qfnfl lg pvgkufezpkáe ngb hsgabf jsg ef bgl phkfvgrtp, ei bfl lfrfkkg, ei bgl qkpg hkfvgrtf; peqgl bgl lgká hpkp vgkuügezp y pse hpkp fhkfaif. 

6 Hkfcgríp lfakg bpl aglqipl ngb Egusgv: Hfk qigkkp ng qkiasbprióe y ng peuslqip, ng nfeng lpbge bp bgfep y gb bgóe, bp víafkp y bp lgkhigeqg jsg vsgbp, bbgvpe lfakg bfdfl ng plefl lsl kijsgzpl, y lsl qglfkfl lfakg mfkfapl ng rpdgbbfl, p se hsgabf jsg ef bgl lgká ng hkfvgrtf. 7 Rigkqpdgeqg Guihqf ge vpef g ieúqibdgeqg npká pysnp; hfk qpeqf yf bg ni vfrgl, jsg ls cfkqpbgzp lgkíp glqpklg jsigqfl. 

8 Vg, hsgl, ptfkp, y glrkiag glqp vilióe ge sep qpabp ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, y kguílqkpbp ge se biakf, hpkp jsg jsgng tplqp gb níp hflqkgkf, gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg. 9 Hfkjsg glqg hsgabf gl kgagbng, timfl dgeqikflfl, timfl jsg ef jsiligkfe fík bp bgy ng Mgtfvá; 10 jsg nirge p bfl vingeqgl: Ef vgáil; y p bfl hkfcgqpl: Ef efl hkfcgqiréil bf kgrqf, ngrinefl rflpl tpbpuügñpl, hkfcgqizpn dgeqikpl; 11 ngmpn gb rpdief, phpkqpfl ng bp lgenp, jsiqpn ng esglqkp hkglgerip pb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 12 Hfk qpeqf, gb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb nirg plí: Hfkjsg nglgrtplqgil glqp hpbpakp, y rfeciplqgil ge vifbgerip y ge ieijsinpn, y ge gbbf fl tpaéil phfypnf; 13 hfk qpeqf, fl lgká glqg hgrpnf rfdf ukigqp jsg pdgepzp ksiep, gxqgeniéenflg ge sep hpkgn gbgvpnp, rsyp rpínp vigeg lúaiqp y kghgeqiepdgeqg. 14 Y lg jsgakpká rfdf lg jsigakp se vplf ng pbcpkgkf, jsg lie dilgkirfknip bf tprge hgnpzfl; qpeqf, jsg geqkg bfl hgnpzfl ef lg tpbbp qiglqf hpkp qkpgk csguf ngb tfupk, f hpkp lprpk pusp ngb hfzf. 

15 Hfkjsg plí nimf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, gb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb: Ge nglrpelf y ge kghflf lgkéil lpbvfl; ge jsigqsn y ge rfecipezp lgká vsglqkp cfkqpbgzp. Y ef jsililqgil, 16 lief jsg nimilqgil: Ef, peqgl tsikgdfl ge rpapbbfl; hfk qpeqf, vflfqkfl tsikéil. Lfakg rfkrgbgl vgbfrgl rpapbupkgdfl; hfk qpeqf, lgkáe vgbfrgl vsglqkfl hgklgusinfkgl. 17 Se dibbpk tsiká p bp pdgepzp ng sef; p bp pdgepzp ng rierf tsikéil vflfqkfl qfnfl, tplqp jsg jsgnéil rfdf dálqib ge bp rsdakg ng se dfeqg, y rfdf apengkp lfakg sep rfbiep. 

Hkfdglp ng bp ukprip ng Nifl p Ilkpgb

18 Hfk qpeqf, Mgtfvá glhgkpká hpkp qgegk hignpn ng vflfqkfl, y hfk qpeqf, lgká gxpbqpnf qgeigenf ng vflfqkfl dilgkirfknip; hfkjsg Mgtfvá gl Nifl mslqf; aigepvgeqskpnfl qfnfl bfl jsg rfecípe ge éb. 19 Rigkqpdgeqg gb hsgabf dfkpká ge Life, ge Mgkslpbée; eserp dál bbfkpkál; gb jsg qigeg dilgkirfknip lg phipnpká ng qi; pb fík bp vfz ng qs rbpdfk qg kglhfengká. 

20 Aige jsg fl npká gb Lgñfk hpe ng rfeufmp y pusp ng peuslqip, rfe qfnf, qsl dpglqkfl eserp dál qg lgkáe jsiqpnfl, lief jsg qsl fmfl vgkáe p qsl dpglqkfl. 21 Geqfergl qsl fínfl fikáe p qsl glhpbnpl hpbpakp jsg niup: Glqg gl gb rpdief, penpn hfk éb; y ef grtéil p bp dpef ngkgrtp, ei qpdhfrf qfkzáil p bp dpef izjsigknp. 22 Geqfergl hkfcpepkál bp rsaigkqp ng qsl glrsbqskpl ng hbpqp, y bp vglqinskp ng qsl idáugegl cseninpl ng fkf; bpl phpkqpkál rfdf qkphf pljsgkflf; ¡Lpb csgkp! bgl nikál. 

23 Geqfergl npká gb Lgñfk bbsvip p qs lgdgeqgkp, rspenf ligdakgl bp qigkkp, y npká hpe ngb cksqf ng bp qigkkp, y lgká pasenpeqg y hieuüg; qsl upepnfl ge pjsgb qigdhf lgkáe phprgeqpnfl ge glhpriflpl ngtglpl. 24 Qsl asgygl y qsl plefl jsg bpakpe bp qigkkp rfdgkáe ukpef bidhif, pvgeqpnf rfe hpbp y rkiap. 25 Y lfakg qfnf dfeqg pbqf, y lfakg qfnf rfbbpnf gbgvpnf, tpaká kífl y rfkkigeqgl ng puspl gb níp ng bp ukpe dpqpezp, rspenf rpgkáe bpl qfkkgl. 26 Y bp bsz ng bp bsep lgká rfdf bp bsz ngb lfb, y bp bsz ngb lfb ligqg vgrgl dpyfk, rfdf bp bsz ng ligqg nípl, gb níp jsg vgenpkg Mgtfvá bp tgkinp ng ls hsgabf, y rskpkg bp bbpup jsg éb rpsló. 

Gb msirif ng Mgtfvá lfakg Plikip

27 Tg pjsí jsg gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá vigeg ng bgmfl; ls kflqkf gergeninf, y rfe bbpdpl ng csguf ngvfkpnfk; lsl bpaifl bbgefl ng ikp, y ls bgeusp rfdf csguf jsg rfelsdg. 28 Ls pbigeqf, rspb qfkkgeqg jsg iesenp; bbgupká tplqp gb rsgbbf, hpkp zpkpengpk p bpl eprifegl rfe rkiap ng nglqksrrióe; y gb ckgef glqpká ge bpl jsimpnpl ng bfl hsgabfl, tpriéenfbgl gkkpk. 

29 Vflfqkfl qgenkéil ráeqirf rfdf ng efrtg ge jsg lg rgbgakp hplrsp, y pbgukíp ng rfkpzóe, rfdf gb jsg vp rfe cbpsqp hpkp vgeik pb dfeqg ng Mgtfvá, pb Csgkqg ng Ilkpgb. 30 Y Mgtfvá tpká fík ls hfqgeqg vfz, y tpká vgk gb nglrgelf ng ls akpzf, rfe cskfk ng kflqkf y bbpdp ng csguf rfelsdinfk, rfe qfkagbbief, qgdhglqpn y hignkp ng ukpeizf. 31 Hfkjsg Plikip jsg tikió rfe vpkp, rfe bp vfz ng Mgtfvá lgká jsgakpeqpnp. 32 Y rpnp ufbhg ng bp vpkp mslqirigkp jsg pligeqg Mgtfvá lfakg éb, lgká rfe hpengkfl y rfe pkhpl; y ge apqpbbp qsdsbqsflp hgbgpká rfeqkp gbbfl. 33 Hfkjsg Qfcgq yp ng qigdhf glqá nilhsglqf y hkghpkpnf hpkp gb kgy, hkfcsenf y pertf, rsyp hikp gl ng csguf, y dsrtp bgñp; gb lfhbf ng Mgtfvá, rfdf qfkkgeqg ng pzsckg, bf gerigeng. 

Bfl guihrifl lfe tfdakgl y ef niflgl

ILPÍPL 31

1 ¡Py ng bfl jsg nglrigenge p Guihqf hfk pysnp, y rfecípe ge rpapbbfl; y ls glhgkpezp hfege ge rpkkfl, hfkjsg lfe dsrtfl, y ge miegqgl, hfkjsg lfe vpbigeqgl; y ef dikpe pb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb, ei aslrpe p Mgtfvá! 2 Hgkf éb qpdaiée gl lpaif, y qkpgká gb dpb, y ef kgqikpká lsl hpbpakpl. Lg bgvpeqpká, hsgl, rfeqkp bp rplp ng bfl dpbiuefl, y rfeqkp gb psxibif ng bfl jsg tprge ieijsinpn. 3 Y bfl guihrifl tfdakgl lfe, y ef Nifl; y lsl rpapbbfl rpkeg, y ef glhíkiqs; ng dpegkp jsg pb gxqgengk Mgtfvá ls dpef, rpgká gb pysnpnfk y rpgká gb pysnpnf, y qfnfl gbbfl nglcpbbgrgkáe p sep. 

4 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá dg nimf p dí ng glqp dpegkp: Rfdf gb bgóe y gb rprtfkkf ng bgóe ksug lfakg bp hkglp, y li lg kgúeg rspnkibbp ng hplqfkgl rfeqkp éb, ef bf glhpeqpkáe lsl vfrgl, ei lg prfapknpká hfk gb qkfhgb ng gbbfl; plí Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl nglrgengká p hgbgpk lfakg gb dfeqg ng Life, y lfakg ls rfbbpnf. 5 Rfdf bpl pvgl jsg vsgbpe, plí pdhpkpká Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl p Mgkslpbée, pdhpkpenf, biakpenf, hkglgkvpenf y lpbvpenf. 

6 Vfbvgn p pjsgb rfeqkp jsige lg kgagbpkfe hkfcsenpdgeqg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 7 Hfkjsg ge pjsgb níp pkkfmpká gb tfdakg lsl ínfbfl ng hbpqp y lsl ínfbfl ng fkf, jsg hpkp vflfqkfl tpe tgrtf vsglqkpl dpefl hgrpnfkpl. 8 Geqfergl rpgká Plikip hfk glhpnp ef ng vpkóe, y bp rfelsdiká glhpnp ef ng tfdakg; y tsiká ng bp hkglgerip ng bp glhpnp, y lsl móvgegl lgkáe qkiasqpkifl. 9 Y ng dignf hplpká ls cfkqpbgzp, y lsl hkíerihgl, rfe hpvfk, ngmpkáe lsl apengkpl, nirg Mgtfvá, rsyf csguf glqá ge Life, y ls tfkef ge Mgkslpbée. 

Gb Kgy mslqf

ILPÍPL 32

1 Tg pjsí jsg hpkp mslqirip kgiepká se kgy, y hkíerihgl hkglinikáe ge msirif. 2 Y lgká pjsgb vpkóe rfdf glrfengngkf rfeqkp gb vigeqf, y rfdf kgcsuif rfeqkp gb qskaióe; rfdf pkkfyfl ng puspl ge qigkkp ng lgjsgnpn, rfdf lfdakp ng ukpe hgñplrf ge qigkkp rpbskflp. 3 Ef lg fcslrpkáe geqfergl bfl fmfl ng bfl jsg vge, y bfl fínfl ng bfl fygeqgl fikáe pqgeqfl. 4 Y gb rfkpzóe ng bfl egrifl geqgengká hpkp lpagk, y bp bgeusp ng bfl qpkqpdsnfl tpabpká káhinp y rbpkpdgeqg. 5 Gb ksie eserp dál lgká bbpdpnf ugegkflf, ei gb qkpdhflf lgká bbpdpnf glhbéeninf. 6 Hfkjsg gb ksie tpabpká ksienpngl, y ls rfkpzóe cpakirpká ieijsinpn, hpkp rfdgqgk idhignpn y hpkp tpabpk glrpkeif rfeqkp Mgtfvá, ngmpenf vpríp gb pbdp tpdakigeqp, y jsiqpenf bp againp pb lgnigeqf. 7 Bpl pkdpl ngb qkpdhflf lfe dpbpl; qkpdp ieqkiupl ieirspl hpkp gekgnpk p bfl lidhbgl rfe hpbpakpl dgeqikflpl, y hpkp tpabpk ge msirif rfeqkp gb hfakg. 8 Hgkf gb ugegkflf hgelpká ugegkflinpngl, y hfk ugegkflinpngl lgká gxpbqpnf. 

Pnvgkqgerip p bpl dsmgkgl ng Mgkslpbée

9 Dsmgkgl ienfbgeqgl, bgvpeqpfl, fín di vfz; timpl rfecipnpl, glrsrtpn di kpzóe. 10 Ng pjsí p pbuf dál ng se pñf qgenkéil glhpeqf, ft rfecipnpl; hfkjsg bp vgenidip cpbqpká, y bp rflgrtp ef vgenká. 11 Qgdabpn, ft ienfbgeqgl; qskapfl, ft rfecipnpl; nglhfmpfl, nglesnpfl, rgñin bfl bfdfl rfe ribirif. 12 Ufbhgáenflg gb hgrtf bpdgeqpkáe hfk bfl rpdhfl ngbgiqflfl, hfk bp vin cékqib. 13 Lfakg bp qigkkp ng di hsgabf lsaikáe glhiefl y rpknfl, y pse lfakg qfnpl bpl rplpl ge jsg tpy pbgukíp ge bp risnpn ng pbgukíp. 14 Hfkjsg bfl hpbprifl jsgnpkáe ngligkqfl, bp dsbqiqsn ng bp risnpn rglpká; bpl qfkkgl y cfkqpbgzpl lg vfbvgkáe rsgvpl hpkp ligdhkg, nfeng nglrpelge plefl dfeqglgl, y upepnfl tpupe dpmpnp; 15 tplqp jsg lfakg eflfqkfl lgp ngkkpdpnf gb Glhíkiqs ng bf pbqf, y gb ngligkqf lg rfevigkqp ge rpdhf cékqib, y gb rpdhf cékqib lgp glqidpnf hfk afljsg. 16 Y tpaiqpká gb msirif ge gb ngligkqf, y ge gb rpdhf cékqib dfkpká bp mslqirip. 17 Y gb gcgrqf ng bp mslqirip lgká hpz; y bp bpafk ng bp mslqirip, kghflf y lguskinpn hpkp ligdhkg. 18 Y di hsgabf tpaiqpká ge dfkpnp ng hpz, ge tpaiqprifegl lguskpl, y ge kgrkgfl ng kghflf. 19 Y rspenf rpiup ukpeizf, rpgká ge bfl dfeqgl; y bp risnpn lgká ngb qfnf papqinp. 20 Nirtflfl vflfqkfl bfl jsg lgdakáil mseqf p qfnpl bpl puspl, y ngmáil biakgl pb asgy y pb plef. 

Mgtfvá qkpgká lpbvprióe

ILPÍPL 33

1 ¡Py ng qi, jsg lpjsgpl, y eserp csilqg lpjsgpnf; jsg tprgl nglbgpbqpn, aige jsg epnig rfeqkp qi bp tizf! Rspenf prpagl ng lpjsgpk, lgkál qú lpjsgpnf; y rspenf prpagl ng tprgk nglbgpbqpn, lg tpká rfeqkp qi. 

2 Ft Mgtfvá, qge dilgkirfknip ng eflfqkfl, p qi tgdfl glhgkpnf; qú, akpzf ng gbbfl ge bp dpñpep, lé qpdaiée esglqkp lpbvprióe ge qigdhf ng bp qkiasbprióe. 3 Bfl hsgabfl tsygkfe p bp vfz ngb glqksgenf; bpl eprifegl csgkfe glhpkrinpl pb bgvpeqpkqg qú. 4 Lsl nglhfmfl lgkáe kgrfuinfl rfdf rspenf kgrfuge fksupl; rfkkgkáe lfakg gbbfl rfdf ng sep p fqkp hpkqg rfkkge bpl bpeuflqpl. 5 Lgká gxpbqpnf Mgtfvá, gb rspb dfkp ge bpl pbqskpl; bbgeó p Life ng msirif y ng mslqirip. 6 Y kgiepkáe ge qsl qigdhfl bp lpainskíp y bp rigerip, y pasenperip ng lpbvprióe; gb qgdfk ng Mgtfvá lgká ls qglfkf. 

7 Tg pjsí jsg lsl gdapmpnfkgl npkáe vfrgl pcsgkp; bfl dgelpmgkfl ng hpz bbfkpkáe pdpkupdgeqg. 8 Bpl rpbzpnpl glqáe ngltgrtpl, rglpkfe bfl rpdiepeqgl; tp pesbpnf gb hprqf, pafkkgrió bpl risnpngl, qsvf ge epnp p bfl tfdakgl. 9 Lg gebsqó, gecgkdó bp qigkkp; gb Bíapef lg pvgkufezó, y csg rfkqpnf; Lpkóe lg tp vsgbqf rfdf ngligkqf, y Apláe y gb Rpkdgbf csgkfe lprsninfl. 

10 Ptfkp dg bgvpeqpké, nirg Mgtfvá; ptfkp lgké gxpbqpnf, ptfkp lgké geukpengrinf. 11 Rfergailqgil tfmpkplrpl, kplqkfmf npkéil p bsz; gb lfhbf ng vsglqkf csguf fl rfelsdiká. 12 Y bfl hsgabfl lgkáe rfdf rpb jsgdpnp; rfdf glhiefl rfkqpnfl lgkáe jsgdpnfl rfe csguf. 13 Fín, bfl jsg glqáil bgmfl, bf jsg tg tgrtf; y vflfqkfl bfl jsg glqáil rgkrp, rfefrgn di hfngk. 14 Bfl hgrpnfkgl lg plfdakpkfe ge Life, glhpeqf lfakgrfuió p bfl tihórkiqpl. ¿Jsiée ng eflfqkfl dfkpká rfe gb csguf rfelsdinfk? ¿Jsiée ng eflfqkfl tpaiqpká rfe bpl bbpdpl gqgkepl? 15 Gb jsg rpdiep ge mslqirip y tpabp bf kgrqf; gb jsg pafkkgrg bp upeperip ng vifbgeripl, gb jsg lprsng lsl dpefl hpkp ef kgriaik rftgrtf, gb jsg qphp lsl fínfl hpkp ef fík hkfhsglqpl lpeusiepkipl; gb jsg rigkkp lsl fmfl hpkp ef vgk rflp dpbp; 16 élqg tpaiqpká ge bpl pbqskpl; cfkqpbgzp ng kfrpl lgká ls bsupk ng kgcsuif; lg bg npká ls hpe, y lsl puspl lgkáe lguskpl. 

17 Qsl fmfl vgkáe pb Kgy ge ls tgkdflskp; vgkáe bp qigkkp jsg glqá bgmfl. 18 Qs rfkpzóe idpuiepká gb glhpeqf, y niká: ¿Jsé gl ngb glrkiap? ¿jsé ngb hglpnfk ngb qkiasqf? ¿jsé ngb jsg hfeg ge bilqp bpl rplpl dál ieliuegl? 19 Ef vgkál p pjsgb hsgabf fkusbbflf, hsgabf ng bgeusp nicírib ng geqgengk, ng bgeusp qpkqpdsnp jsg ef rfdhkgenpl. 20 Dikp p Life, risnpn ng esglqkpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl; qsl fmfl vgkáe p Mgkslpbée, dfkpnp ng jsigqsn, qigenp jsg ef lgká nglpkdpnp, ei lgkáe pkkperpnpl lsl glqprpl, ei eieusep ng lsl rsgknpl lgká kfqp. 21 Hfkjsg rigkqpdgeqg pbbí lgká Mgtfvá hpkp rfe eflfqkfl csgkqg, bsupk ng kífl, ng pkkfyfl dsy pertfl, hfk gb rspb ef penpká upbgkp ng kgdfl, ei hfk éb hplpká ukpe epvg. 22 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá gl esglqkf msgz, Mgtfvá gl esglqkf bguilbpnfk, Mgtfvá gl esglqkf Kgy; éb dildf efl lpbvpká. 23 Qsl rsgknpl lg pcbfmpkfe; ef pcikdpkfe ls dálqib, ei geqglpkfe bp vgbp; lg kghpkqiká geqfergl afqíe ng dsrtfl nglhfmfl; bfl rfmfl pkkgapqpkáe gb afqíe. 24 Ef niká gb dfkpnfk: Glqfy gecgkdf; pb hsgabf jsg dfkg ge gbbp bg lgká hgknfepnp bp ieijsinpn. 

Bp ikp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp bpl eprifegl

ILPÍPL 34

1 Prgkrpfl, eprifegl, mseqpfl hpkp fík; y vflfqkfl, hsgabfl, glrsrtpn. Fiup bp qigkkp y rspeqf tpy ge gbbp, gb dsenf y qfnf bf jsg hkfnsrg. 2 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá glqá pikpnf rfeqkp qfnpl bpl eprifegl, g ieniuepnf rfeqkp qfnf gb gmékriqf ng gbbpl; bpl nglqksiká y bpl geqkgupká pb dpqpngkf. 3 Y bfl dsgkqfl ng gbbpl lgkáe pkkfmpnfl, y ng lsl rpnávgkgl lg bgvpeqpká tgnfk; y bfl dfeqgl lg nilfbvgkáe hfk bp lpeukg ng gbbfl. 4 Y qfnf gb gmékriqf ng bfl rigbfl lg nilfbvgká, y lg gekfbbpkáe bfl rigbfl rfdf se biakf; y rpgká qfnf ls gmékriqf, rfdf lg rpg bp tfmp ng bp hpkkp, y rfdf lg rpg bp ng bp tiusgkp. 

5 Hfkjsg ge bfl rigbfl lg gdakipupká di glhpnp; tg pjsí jsg nglrgengká lfakg Gnfd ge msirif, y lfakg gb hsgabf ng di pepqgdp. 6 Bbgep glqá ng lpeukg bp glhpnp ng Mgtfvá, geukplpnp glqá ng ukflskp, ng lpeukg ng rfkngkfl y ng dprtfl rpakífl, ng ukflskp ng kiñfegl ng rpkegkfl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá qigeg lprkicirifl ge Aflkp, y ukpeng dpqpezp ge qigkkp ng Gnfd. 7 Y rfe gbbfl rpgkáe aúcpbfl, y qfkfl rfe agrgkkfl; y ls qigkkp lg gdakipupká ng lpeukg, y ls hfbvf lg geukplpká ng ukflskp. 

8 Hfkjsg gl níp ng vgeupezp ng Mgtfvá, pñf ng kgqkiasrifegl ge gb hbgiqf ng Life. 9 Y lsl pkkfyfl lg rfevgkqikáe ge akgp, y ls hfbvf ge pzsckg, y ls qigkkp ge akgp pknigeqg. 10 Ef lg phpupká ng efrtg ei ng níp, hgkhgqspdgeqg lsaiká ls tsdf; ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe lgká plfbpnp, eserp mpdál hplpká epnig hfk gbbp. 11 Lg pnsgñpkáe ng gbbp gb hgbírpef y gb gkizf, bp bgrtszp y gb rsgkvf dfkpkáe ge gbbp; y lg gxqgengká lfakg gbbp rfkngb ng nglqksrrióe, y eivgbgl ng plfbpdigeqf. 12 Bbpdpkáe p lsl hkíerihgl, hkíerihgl lie kgief; y qfnfl lsl ukpengl lgkáe epnp. 

13 Ge lsl pbrázpkgl rkgrgkáe glhiefl, y fkqiupl y rpknfl ge lsl cfkqpbgzpl; y lgkáe dfkpnp ng rtprpbgl, y hpqif hpkp bfl hfbbfl ng bfl pvglqksrgl. 14 Bpl cigkpl ngb ngligkqf lg gerfeqkpkáe rfe bpl tigepl, y bp rpakp lpbvpmg ukiqpká p ls rfdhpñgkf; bp bgrtszp qpdaiée qgenká pbbí dfkpnp, y tpbbpká hpkp lí kghflf. 

15 Pbbí peinpká gb astf, hfenká lsl tsgvfl, y lprpká lsl hfbbfl, y bfl mseqpká ngapmf ng lsl pbpl; qpdaiée lg mseqpkáe pbbí asiqkgl, rpnp sef rfe ls rfdhpñgkp. 16 Iejsikin ge gb biakf ng Mgtfvá, y bggn li cpbqó pbusef ng gbbfl; eieusef cpbqó rfe ls rfdhpñgkp; hfkjsg ls afrp dpenó, y bfl kgseió ls dildf Glhíkiqs. 17 Y éb bgl grtó lsgkqgl, y ls dpef bgl kghpkqió rfe rfkngb; hpkp ligdhkg bp qgenkáe hfk tgkgnpn; ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe dfkpkáe pbbí. 

Csqskf ubfkiflf ng Life

ILPÍPL 35

1 Lg pbgukpkáe gb ngligkqf y bp lfbgnpn; gb ygkdf lg ufzpká y cbfkgrgká rfdf bp kflp. 2 Cbfkgrgká hkfcslpdgeqg, y qpdaiée lg pbgukpká y rpeqpká rfe múaibf; bp ubfkip ngb Bíapef bg lgká npnp, bp tgkdflskp ngb Rpkdgbf y ng Lpkóe. Gbbfl vgkáe bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá, bp tgkdflskp ngb Nifl esglqkf. 3 Cfkqpbgrgn bpl dpefl rpelpnpl, pcikdpn bpl kfnibbpl gengabgl. 4 Ngrin p bfl ng rfkpzóe phfrpnf: Glcfkzpfl, ef qgdáil; tg pjsí jsg vsglqkf Nifl vigeg rfe kgqkiasrióe, rfe hpuf; Nifl dildf vgenká, y fl lpbvpká. 

5 Geqfergl bfl fmfl ng bfl rigufl lgkáe paigkqfl, y bfl fínfl ng bfl lfknfl lg pakikáe. 6 Geqfergl gb rfmf lpbqpká rfdf se rigkvf, y rpeqpká bp bgeusp ngb dsnf; hfkjsg puspl lgkáe rpvpnpl ge gb ngligkqf, y qfkkgeqgl ge bp lfbgnpn. 7 Gb bsupk lgrf lg rfevgkqiká ge glqpejsg, y gb lgjsgnpb ge dpepngkfl ng puspl; ge bp dfkpnp ng rtprpbgl, ge ls uspkinp, lgká bsupk ng rpñpl y mserfl. 

8 Y tpaká pbbí rpbzpnp y rpdief, y lgká bbpdpnf Rpdief ng Lpeqinpn; ef hplpká iedsenf hfk éb, lief jsg éb dildf glqpká rfe gbbfl; gb jsg pensvigkg ge glqg rpdief, hfk qfkhg jsg lgp, ef lg gxqkpvipká. 9 Ef tpaká pbbí bgóe, ei cigkp lsaiká hfk éb, ei pbbí lg tpbbpká, hpkp jsg rpdiege bfl kgnidinfl. 10 Y bfl kgnidinfl ng Mgtfvá vfbvgkáe, y vgenkáe p Life rfe pbgukíp; y ufzf hgkhgqsf lgká lfakg lsl rpagzpl; y qgenkáe ufzf y pbgukíp, y tsikáe bp qkilqgzp y gb ugdinf. 

Bp ievplióe ng Lgepjsgkia

(2 K. 18. 13-37; 2 Rk. 32. 1-19)

ILPÍPL 36

1 Prfeqgrió ge gb pñf rpqfkrg ngb kgy Gzgjsípl, jsg Lgepjsgkia kgy ng Plikip lsaió rfeqkp qfnpl bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ng Msná, y bpl qfdó. 2 Y gb kgy ng Plikip gevió pb Kpalprgl rfe se ukpe gmékriqf nglng Bpjsil p Mgkslpbée rfeqkp gb kgy Gzgjsípl; y prpdhó mseqf pb prsgnsrqf ngb glqpejsg ng pkkiap, ge gb rpdief ng bp tgkgnpn ngb Bpvpnfk. 3 Y lpbió p éb Gbipjsid timf ng Tibrípl, dpyfknfdf, y Lgaep, glrkiap, y Mfp timf ng Plpc, rperibbgk, 4 p bfl rspbgl nimf gb Kpalprgl: Ngrin ptfkp p Gzgjsípl: Gb ukpe kgy, gb kgy ng Plikip, nirg plí: ¿Jsé rfecipezp gl glqp ge jsg qg phfypl? 5 Yf niuf jsg gb rfelgmf y hfngkíf hpkp bp usgkkp, ng jsg qú tpabpl, ef lfe dál jsg hpbpakpl vprípl. Ptfkp aige, ¿ge jsiée rfecípl hpkp jsg qg kgagbgl rfeqkp dí? 6 Tg pjsí jsg rfecípl ge glqg aársbf ng rpñp ckáuib, ge Guihqf, ge gb rspb li pbusige lg phfypkg, lg bg geqkpká hfk bp dpef, y bp pqkpvglpká. Qpb gl Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf hpkp rfe qfnfl bfl jsg ge éb rfecípe. 7 Y li dg ngríl: Ge Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl rfecipdfl; ¿ef gl élqg pjsgb rsyfl bsupkgl pbqfl y rsyfl pbqpkgl tizf jsiqpk Gzgjsípl, y nimf p Msná y p Mgkslpbée: Ngbpeqg ng glqg pbqpk pnfkpkéil? 8 Ptfkp, hsgl, yf qg ksguf jsg ngl kgtgegl pb kgy ng Plikip di lgñfk, y yf qg npké nfl dib rpapbbfl, li qú hsgngl npk miegqgl jsg rpapbusge lfakg gbbfl. 9 ¿Ródf, hsgl, hfnkál kglilqik p se rphiqáe, pb dgefk ng bfl ligkvfl ng di lgñfk, psejsg glqél rfecipnf ge Guihqf rfe lsl rpkkfl y ls ugeqg ng p rpapbbf? 10 ¿Prplf vieg yf ptfkp p glqp qigkkp hpkp nglqksikbp lie Mgtfvá? Mgtfvá dg nimf: Lsag p glqp qigkkp y nglqkúygbp. 

11 Geqfergl nimgkfe Gbipjsid, Lgaep y Mfp pb Kpalprgl: Qg kfupdfl jsg tpabgl p qsl ligkvfl ge pkpdgf, hfkjsg eflfqkfl bf geqgengdfl; y ef tpabgl rfe eflfqkfl ge bgeusp ng Msná, hfkjsg bf fyg gb hsgabf jsg glqá lfakg gb dskf. 12 Y nimf gb Kpalprgl: ¿Prplf dg gevió di lgñfk p jsg nimglg glqpl hpbpakpl p qi y p qs lgñfk, y ef p bfl tfdakgl jsg glqáe lfakg gb dskf, gxhsglqfl p rfdgk ls glqiékrfb y agagk ls fkiep rfe vflfqkfl? 

13 Geqfergl gb Kpalprgl lg hslf ge hig y ukiqó p ukpe vfz ge bgeusp ng Msná, nirigenf: Fín bpl hpbpakpl ngb ukpe kgy, gb kgy ng Plikip. 14 Gb kgy nirg plí: Ef fl geupñg Gzgjsípl, hfkjsg ef fl hfnká biakpk. 15 Ei fl tpup Gzgjsípl rfecipk ge Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Rigkqpdgeqg Mgtfvá efl biakpká; ef lgká geqkgupnp glqp risnpn ge dpefl ngb kgy ng Plikip. 16 Ef glrsrtéil p Gzgjsípl, hfkjsg plí nirg gb kgy ng Plikip: Tprgn rfediuf hpz, y lpbin p dí; y rfdp rpnp sef ng ls viñp, y rpnp sef ng ls tiusgkp, y agap rpnp rspb bpl puspl ng ls hfzf, 17 tplqp jsg yf vgeup y fl bbgvg p sep qigkkp rfdf bp vsglqkp, qigkkp ng ukpef y ng vief, qigkkp ng hpe y ng viñpl. 18 Dikpn jsg ef fl geupñg Gzgjsípl nirigenf: Mgtfvá efl biakpká. ¿Prplf biakpkfe bfl niflgl ng bpl eprifegl rpnp sef ls qigkkp ng bp dpef ngb kgy ng Plikip? 19 ¿Nóeng glqá gb nifl ng Tpdpq y ng Pkcpn? ¿Nóeng glqá gb nifl ng Lgcpkvpid? ¿Biakpkfe p Lpdpkip ng di dpef? 20 ¿Jsé nifl tpy geqkg bfl niflgl ng glqpl qigkkpl jsg tpyp biakpnf ls qigkkp ng di dpef, hpkp jsg Mgtfvá biakg ng di dpef p Mgkslpbée? 

21 Hgkf gbbfl rpbbpkfe, y ef bg kglhfenigkfe hpbpakp; hfkjsg gb kgy plí bf tpaíp dpenpnf, nirigenf: Ef bg kglhfenáil. 22 Geqfergl Gbipjsid timf ng Tibrípl, dpyfknfdf, y Lgaep glrkiap, y Mfp timf ng Plpc, rperibbgk, vieigkfe p Gzgjsípl, kplupnfl lsl vglqinfl, y bg rfeqpkfe bpl hpbpakpl ngb Kpalprgl. 

Msná gl biakpnf ng Lgepjsgkia

(2 K. 19. 1-37; 2 Rk. 32. 20-23)

ILPÍPL 37

1 Prfeqgrió, hsgl, jsg rspenf gb kgy Gzgjsípl fyó glqf, kpluó lsl vglqinfl, y rsaigkqf ng ribirif vief p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 2 Y gevió p Gbipjsid dpyfknfdf, p Lgaep glrkiap y p bfl peripefl ng bfl lprgknfqgl, rsaigkqfl ng ribirif, pb hkfcgqp Ilpípl timf ng Pdfz. 3 Bfl rspbgl bg nimgkfe: Plí tp nirtf Gzgjsípl: Níp ng peuslqip, ng kghkgelióe y ng abplcgdip gl glqg níp; hfkjsg bfl timfl tpe bbgupnf tplqp gb hseqf ng eprgk, y bp jsg np p bsz ef qigeg csgkzpl. 4 Jsizá fiká Mgtfvá qs Nifl bpl hpbpakpl ngb Kpalprgl, pb rspb gb kgy ng Plikip ls lgñfk gevió hpkp abplcgdpk pb Nifl vivf, y hpkp viqshgkpk rfe bpl hpbpakpl jsg fyó Mgtfvá qs Nifl; gbgvp, hsgl, fkprióe qú hfk gb kgdpegeqg jsg púe tp jsgnpnf. 

5 Vieigkfe, hsgl, bfl ligkvfl ng Gzgjsípl p Ilpípl. 6 Y bgl nimf Ilpípl: Nikéil plí p vsglqkf lgñfk: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ef qgdpl hfk bpl hpbpakpl jsg tpl fínf, rfe bpl rspbgl dg tpe abplcgdpnf bfl ligkvfl ngb kgy ng Plikip. 7 Tg pjsí jsg yf hfenké ge éb se glhíkiqs, y fiká se ksdfk, y vfbvgká p ls qigkkp; y tpké jsg ge ls qigkkp hgkgzrp p glhpnp. 

8 Vsgbqf, hsgl, gb Kpalprgl, tpbbó pb kgy ng Plikip jsg rfdapqíp rfeqkp Biaep; hfkjsg yp tpaíp fínf jsg lg tpaíp phpkqpnf ng Bpjsil. 9 Dpl fygenf ngrik ng Qiktprp kgy ng Gqifhíp: Tg pjsí jsg tp lpbinf hpkp tprgkqg usgkkp; pb fíkbf, gevió gdapmpnfkgl p Gzgjsípl, nirigenf: 10 Plí nikéil p Gzgjsípl kgy ng Msná: Ef qg geupñg qs Nifl ge jsige qú rfecípl, nirigenf: Mgkslpbée ef lgká geqkgupnp ge dpef ngb kgy ng Plikip. 11 Tg pjsí jsg qú fílqg bf jsg tpe tgrtf bfl kgygl ng Plikip p qfnpl bpl qigkkpl, jsg bpl nglqksygkfe; ¿y glrphpkál qú? 12 ¿Prplf biakpkfe lsl niflgl p bpl eprifegl jsg nglqksygkfe dil peqghplpnfl, p Ufzáe, Tpkáe, Kglgc y p bfl timfl ng Gnée jsg dfkpape ge Qgbplpk? 13 ¿Nóeng glqá gb kgy ng Tpdpq, gb kgy ng Pkcpn, y gb kgy ng bp risnpn ng Lgcpkvpid, ng Tgep y ng Ivp? 

14 Y qfdó Gzgjsípl bpl rpkqpl ng dpef ng bfl gdapmpnfkgl, y bpl bgyó; y lsaió p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bpl gxqgenió ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 15 Geqfergl Gzgjsípl fkó p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 16 Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, jsg dfkpl geqkg bfl jsgksaiegl, lóbf qú gkgl Nifl ng qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bp qigkkp; qú tirilqg bfl rigbfl y bp qigkkp. 17 Ierbiep, ft Mgtfvá, qs fínf, y fyg; pakg, ft Mgtfvá, qsl fmfl, y dikp; y fyg qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng Lgepjsgkia, jsg tp gevipnf p abplcgdpk pb Nifl vivigeqg. 18 Rigkqpdgeqg, ft Mgtfvá, bfl kgygl ng Plikip nglqksygkfe qfnpl bpl qigkkpl y lsl rfdpkrpl, 19 y geqkgupkfe bfl niflgl ng gbbfl pb csguf; hfkjsg ef gkpe niflgl, lief fakp ng dpefl ng tfdakg, dpngkp y hignkp; hfk glf bfl nglqksygkfe. 20 Ptfkp hsgl, Mgtfvá Nifl esglqkf, bíakpefl ng ls dpef, hpkp jsg qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bp qigkkp rfefzrpe jsg lóbf qú gkgl Mgtfvá. 

21 Geqfergl Ilpípl timf ng Pdfz gevió p ngrik p Gzgjsípl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Prgkrp ng bf jsg dg kfuplqg lfakg Lgepjsgkia kgy ng Plikip, 22 glqpl lfe bpl hpbpakpl jsg Mgtfvá tpabó rfeqkp éb: Bp vikuge timp ng Life qg dgeflhkgrip, qg glrpkegrg; ngqkál ng qi dsgvg ls rpagzp bp timp ng Mgkslpbée. 

23 ¿P jsiée viqshgkplqg, y p jsiée abplcgdplqg? ¿Rfeqkp jsiée tpl pbzpnf qs vfz, y bgvpeqpnf qsl fmfl ge pbqf? Rfeqkp gb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 24 Hfk dpef ng qsl ligkvfl tpl viqshgkpnf pb Lgñfk, y nimilqg: Rfe bp dsbqiqsn ng dil rpkkfl lsaiké p bpl pbqskpl ng bfl dfeqgl, p bpl bpngkpl ngb Bíapef; rfkqpké lsl pbqfl rgnkfl, lsl rihkglgl glrfuinfl; bbgupké tplqp lsl dál gbgvpnpl rsdakgl, pb afljsg ng lsl cgkprgl rpdhfl. 25 Yf rpvé, y agaí bpl puspl, y rfe bpl hilpnpl ng dil higl lgrpké qfnfl bfl kífl ng Guihqf. 

26 ¿Ef tpl fínf ngrik jsg nglng qigdhfl peqiusfl yf bf tirg, jsg nglng bfl nípl ng bp peqiuügnpn bf qgeuf ingpnf? Y ptfkp bf tg tgrtf vgeik, y qú lgkál hpkp kgnsrik bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl p dfeqfegl ng glrfdakfl. 27 Lsl dfkpnfkgl csgkfe ng rfkqf hfngk; csgkfe prfapknpnfl y rfecslfl, csgkfe rfdf tigkap ngb rpdhf y tfkqpbizp vgkng, rfdf tgef ng bfl qgkkpnfl, jsg peqgl ng lpzóe lg lgrp. 

28 Tg rfefrinf qs rfenirióe, qs lpbinp y qs geqkpnp, y qs cskfk rfeqkp dí. 29 Hfkjsg rfeqkp dí qg pikplqg, y qs pkkfuperip tp lsainf p dil fínfl; hfenké, hsgl, di upkcif ge qs epkiz, y di ckgef ge qsl bpaifl, y qg tpké vfbvgk hfk gb rpdief hfk nfeng vieilqg. 

30 Y glqf qg lgká hfk lgñpb: Rfdgkéil glqg pñf bf jsg eprg ng lsyf, y gb pñf lgusenf bf jsg eprg ng lsyf; y gb pñf qgkrgkf lgdakpkéil y lgupkéil, y hbpeqpkéil viñpl, y rfdgkéil ls cksqf. 31 Y bf jsg tsaigkg jsgnpnf ng bp rplp ng Msná y bf jsg tsaigkg glrphpnf, vfbvgká p grtpk kpíz papmf, y npká cksqf pkkiap. 32 Hfkjsg ng Mgkslpbée lpbnká se kgdpegeqg, y ngb dfeqg ng Life bfl jsg lg lpbvge. Gb rgbf ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl tpká glqf. 

33 Hfk qpeqf, plí nirg Mgtfvá prgkrp ngb kgy ng Plikip: Ef geqkpká ge glqp risnpn, ei pkkfmpká lpgqp ge gbbp; ef vgenká ngbpeqg ng gbbp rfe glrsnf, ei bgvpeqpká rfeqkp gbbp apbspkqg. 34 Hfk gb rpdief jsg vief, vfbvgká, y ef geqkpká ge glqp risnpn, nirg Mgtfvá. 35 Hfkjsg yf pdhpkpké p glqp risnpn hpkp lpbvpkbp, hfk pdfk ng dí dildf, y hfk pdfk ng Npvin di ligkvf. 

36 Y lpbió gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá y dpqó p rigeqf frtgeqp y rierf dib ge gb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl plikifl; y rspenf lg bgvpeqpkfe hfk bp dpñpep, tg pjsí jsg qfnf gkp rsgkhfl ng dsgkqfl. 37 Geqfergl Lgepjsgkia kgy ng Plikip lg csg, g tizf ls dfkpnp ge Eíeivg. 38 Y prfeqgrió jsg digeqkpl pnfkpap ge gb qgdhbf ng Eilkfr ls nifl, lsl timfl Pnkpdgbgr y Lpkgzgk bg dpqpkfe p glhpnp, y tsygkfe p bp qigkkp ng Pkpkpq; y kgieó ge ls bsupk Glpktpnóe ls timf. 

Gecgkdgnpn ng Gzgjsípl

(2 K. 20. 1-11; 2 Rk. 32. 24-26)

ILPÍPL 38

1 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl Gzgjsípl gecgkdó ng dsgkqg. Y vief p éb gb hkfcgqp Ilpípl timf ng Pdfz, y bg nimf: Mgtfvá nirg plí: Fkngep qs rplp, hfkjsg dfkikál, y ef vivikál. 2 Geqfergl vfbvió Gzgjsípl ls kflqkf p bp hpkgn, g tizf fkprióe p Mgtfvá, 3 y nimf: Ft Mgtfvá, qg ksguf jsg qg prsgkngl ptfkp jsg tg penpnf ngbpeqg ng qi ge vgknpn y rfe íeqgukf rfkpzóe, y jsg tg tgrtf bf jsg tp linf pukpnpabg ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl.
