4 Fín bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, rplp ng Mprfa, y qfnpl bpl cpdibipl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 5 Plí nimf Mgtfvá: ¿Jsé dpbnpn tpbbpkfe ge dí vsglqkfl hpnkgl, jsg lg pbgmpkfe ng dí, y lg csgkfe qkpl bp vpeinpn y lg tirigkfe vpefl? 6 Y ef nimgkfe: ¿Nóeng glqá Mgtfvá, jsg efl tizf lsaik ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, jsg efl rfensmf hfk gb ngligkqf, hfk sep qigkkp ngligkqp y nglhfabpnp, hfk qigkkp lgrp y ng lfdakp ng dsgkqg, hfk sep qigkkp hfk bp rspb ef hpló vpkóe, ei pbbí tpaiqó tfdakg? 7 Y fl ieqkfnsmg ge qigkkp ng pasenperip, hpkp jsg rfdiglgil ls cksqf y ls aige; hgkf geqkplqgil y rfeqpdieplqgil di qigkkp, g tirilqgil pafdiepabg di tgkgnpn. 8 Bfl lprgknfqgl ef nimgkfe: ¿Nóeng glqá Mgtfvá? y bfl jsg qgeípe bp bgy ef dg rfefrigkfe; y bfl hplqfkgl lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp dí, y bfl hkfcgqpl hkfcgqizpkfe ge efdakg ng Appb, y pensvigkfe qkpl bf jsg ef phkfvgrtp. 

9 Hfk qpeqf, rfeqgengké púe rfe vflfqkfl, nimf Mgtfvá, y rfe bfl timfl ng vsglqkfl timfl hbgiqgpké. 10 Hfkjsg hplpn p bpl rflqpl ng Jsiqid y dikpn; y gevipn p Rgnpk, y rfelingkpn rsinpnflpdgeqg, y vgn li lg tp tgrtf rflp lgdgmpeqg p glqp. 11 ¿Prplf pbusep eprióe tp rpdaipnf lsl niflgl, psejsg gbbfl ef lfe niflgl? Lie gdapkuf, di hsgabf tp qkfrpnf ls ubfkip hfk bf jsg ef phkfvgrtp. 12 Glhpeqpfl, rigbfl, lfakg glqf, y tfkkfkizpfl; nglfbpfl ge ukpe dpegkp, nimf Mgtfvá. 13 Hfkjsg nfl dpbgl tp tgrtf di hsgabf: dg ngmpkfe p dí, csgeqg ng pusp vivp, y rpvpkfe hpkp lí rilqgkepl, rilqgkepl kfqpl jsg ef kgqigege pusp. 

14 ¿Gl Ilkpgb ligkvf? ¿gl glrbpvf? ¿Hfk jsé tp vgeinf p lgk hkglp? 15 Bfl rprtfkkfl ngb bgóe ksuigkfe rfeqkp éb, pbzpkfe ls vfz, y plfbpkfe ls qigkkp; jsgdpnpl glqáe lsl risnpngl, lie dfkpnfk. 16 Pse bfl timfl ng Dgecil y ng Qpcegl qg jsgakpeqpkfe bp rfkfeibbp. 17 ¿Ef qg prpkkgó glqf gb tpagk ngmpnf p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, rspenf qg rfensríp hfk gb rpdief? 18 Ptfkp, hsgl, ¿jsé qigegl qú ge gb rpdief ng Guihqf, hpkp jsg agapl pusp ngb Eibf? ¿Y jsé qigegl qú ge gb rpdief ng Plikip, hpkp jsg agapl pusp ngb Gsckpqgl? 19 Qs dpbnpn qg rplqiupká, y qsl kgagbnípl qg rfengepkáe; lpag, hsgl, y vg rsáe dpbf y pdpkuf gl gb tpagk ngmpnf qú p Mgtfvá qs Nifl, y cpbqpk di qgdfk ge qi, nirg gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

20 Hfkjsg nglng dsy pqkál kfdhilqg qs ysuf y qsl pqpnskpl, y nimilqg: Ef lgkviké. Rfe qfnf glf, lfakg qfnf rfbbpnf pbqf y ngapmf ng qfnf ákafb ckfenflf qg grtpapl rfdf kpdgkp. 21 Qg hbpeqé ng vin glrfuinp, lidigeqg vgknpngkp qfnp gbbp; ¿ródf, hsgl, qg dg tpl vsgbqf lpkdigeqf ng vin gxqkpñp? 22 Psejsg qg bpvgl rfe bgmíp, y pdfeqfegl mpaóe lfakg qi, bp dpertp ng qs hgrpnf hgkdpegrgká púe ngbpeqg ng dí, nimf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 23 ¿Ródf hsgngl ngrik: Ef lfy iedsenp, eserp pensvg qkpl bfl appbgl? Dikp qs hkfrgngk ge gb vpbbg, rfefrg bf jsg tpl tgrtf, nkfdgnpkip biugkp jsg qsgkrg ls rpdief, 24 plep dfeqél prflqsdakpnp pb ngligkqf, jsg ge ls pknfk fbcpqgp gb vigeqf. Ng ls bsmskip, ¿jsiée bp ngqgenká? Qfnfl bfl jsg bp aslrpkge ef lg cpqiupkáe, hfkjsg ge gb qigdhf ng ls rgbf bp tpbbpkáe. 25 Uspknp qsl higl ng penpk nglrpbzfl, y qs upkupeqp ng bp lgn. Dpl nimilqg: Ef tpy kgdgnif ge eieusep dpegkp, hfkjsg p gxqkpñfl tg pdpnf, y qkpl gbbfl tg ng ik. 

26 Rfdf lg pvgkuügezp gb bpnkóe rspenf gl nglrsaigkqf, plí lg pvgkufezpká bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, gbbfl, lsl kgygl, lsl hkíerihgl, lsl lprgknfqgl y lsl hkfcgqpl, 27 jsg nirge p se bgñf: Di hpnkg gkgl qú; y p sep hignkp: Qú dg tpl geugenkpnf. Hfkjsg dg vfbvigkfe bp rgkviz, y ef gb kflqkf; y ge gb qigdhf ng ls rpbpdinpn nirge: Bgváeqpqg, y bíakpefl. 28 ¿Y nóeng glqáe qsl niflgl jsg tirilqg hpkp qi? Bgváeqgelg gbbfl, p vgk li qg hfnkáe biakpk ge gb qigdhf ng qs pcbirrióe; hfkjsg lguúe gb eúdgkf ng qsl risnpngl, ft Msná, csgkfe qsl niflgl. 

29 ¿Hfk jsé hfkcípl rfediuf? Qfnfl vflfqkfl hkgvpkirplqgil rfeqkp dí, nirg Mgtfvá. 30 Ge vpef tg pzfqpnf p vsglqkfl timfl; ef tpe kgriainf rfkkgrrióe. Vsglqkp glhpnp ngvfkó p vsglqkfl hkfcgqpl rfdf bgóe nglqkfzpnfk. 31 ¡Ft ugegkprióe! pqgengn vflfqkfl p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. ¿Tg linf yf se ngligkqf hpkp Ilkpgb, f qigkkp ng qieigabpl? ¿Hfk jsé tp nirtf di hsgabf: Lfdfl biakgl; eserp dál vgenkgdfl p qi? 32 ¿Lg fbvinp bp vikuge ng ls pqpvíf, f bp nglhflpnp ng lsl upbpl? Hgkf di hsgabf lg tp fbvinpnf ng dí hfk ieesdgkpabgl nípl. 

33 ¿Hfk jsé pnfkepl qs rpdief hpkp tpbbpk pdfk? Pse p bpl dpbvpnpl gelgñplqg qsl rpdiefl. 34 Pse ge qsl cpbnpl lg tpbbó bp lpeukg ng bfl hfakgl, ng bfl iefrgeqgl. Ef bfl tpbbplqg ge eieuúe ngbiqf; lie gdapkuf, ge qfnpl glqpl rflpl nirgl: 35 Lfy iefrgeqg, ng rigkqf ls ikp lg phpkqó ng dí. Tg pjsí yf geqkpké ge msirif rfeqiuf, hfkjsg nimilqg: Ef tg hgrpnf. 36 ¿Hpkp jsé nilrskkgl qpeqf, rpdaipenf qsl rpdiefl? Qpdaiée lgkál pvgkufezpnp ng Guihqf, rfdf csilqg pvgkufezpnp ng Plikip. 37 Qpdaiée ng pbbí lpbnkál rfe qsl dpefl lfakg qs rpagzp, hfkjsg Mgtfvá nglgrtó p pjsgbbfl ge jsigegl qú rfecipapl, y ef hkflhgkpkál hfk gbbfl. 

MGKGDÍPL 3

1 Nirge: Li pbusef ngmpkg p ls dsmgk, y yéenflg élqp ng éb lg mseqpkg p fqkf tfdakg, ¿vfbvgká p gbbp dál? ¿Ef lgká qpb qigkkp ngb qfnf pdperibbpnp? Qú, hsgl, tpl cfkeirpnf rfe dsrtfl pdiufl; dpl ¡vsébvgqg p dí! nirg Mgtfvá. 2 Pbzp qsl fmfl p bpl pbqskpl, y vg ge jsé bsupk ef qg tpypl hkflqiqsinf. Mseqf p bfl rpdiefl qg lgeqpapl hpkp gbbfl rfdf ákpag ge gb ngligkqf, y rfe qsl cfkeirprifegl y rfe qs dpbnpn tpl rfeqpdiepnf bp qigkkp. 3 Hfk glqp rpslp bpl puspl tpe linf ngqgeinpl, y cpbqó bp bbsvip qpkníp; y tpl qgeinf ckgeqg ng kpdgkp, y ef jsililqg qgegk vgkuügezp. 4 P bf dgefl nglng ptfkp, ¿ef dg bbpdpkál p dí, Hpnkg díf, usipnfk ng di msvgeqsn? 5 ¿Uspknpká ls gefmf hpkp ligdhkg? ¿Gqgkepdgeqg bf uspknpká? Tg pjsí jsg tpl tpabpnf y tgrtf rspeqpl dpbnpngl hsnilqg. 

Mgtfvá gxtfkqp p Ilkpgb y p Msná pb pkkghgeqidigeqf

6 Dg nimf Mgtfvá ge nípl ngb kgy Mflípl: ¿Tpl vilqf bf jsg tp tgrtf bp kgagbng Ilkpgb? Gbbp lg vp lfakg qfnf dfeqg pbqf y ngapmf ng qfnf ákafb ckfenflf, y pbbí cfkeirp. 7 Y nimg: Nglhsél ng tprgk qfnf glqf, lg vfbvgká p dí; hgkf ef lg vfbvió, y bf vif ls tgkdpep bp kgagbng Msná. 8 Gbbp vif jsg hfk tpagk cfkeirpnf bp kgagbng Ilkpgb, yf bp tpaíp nglhgninf y npnf rpkqp ng kghsnif; hgkf ef qsvf qgdfk bp kgagbng Msná ls tgkdpep, lief jsg qpdaiée csg gbbp y cfkeiró. 9 Y lsrgnió jsg hfk mszupk gbbp rflp bivipep ls cfkeirprióe, bp qigkkp csg rfeqpdiepnp, y pnsbqgkó rfe bp hignkp y rfe gb bgñf. 10 Rfe qfnf glqf, ls tgkdpep bp kgagbng Msná ef lg vfbvió p dí ng qfnf rfkpzóe, lief cieuinpdgeqg, nirg Mgtfvá. 

11 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Tp kglsbqpnf mslqp bp kgagbng Ilkpgb ge rfdhpkprióe rfe bp nglbgpb Msná. 12 Vg y rbpdp glqpl hpbpakpl tprip gb efkqg, y ni: Vsébvgqg, ft kgagbng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá; ef tpké rpgk di ikp lfakg qi, hfkjsg dilgkirfkniflf lfy yf, nirg Mgtfvá, ef uspknpké hpkp ligdhkg gb gefmf. 13 Kgrfefrg, hsgl, qs dpbnpn, hfkjsg rfeqkp Mgtfvá qs Nifl tpl hkgvpkirpnf, y cfkeirplqg rfe bfl gxqkpñfl ngapmf ng qfnf ákafb ckfenflf, y ef fílqg di vfz, nirg Mgtfvá. 

14 Rfevgkqífl, timfl kgagbngl, nirg Mgtfvá, hfkjsg yf lfy vsglqkf glhflf; y fl qfdpké sef ng rpnp risnpn, y nfl ng rpnp cpdibip, y fl ieqkfnsriké ge Life; 15 y fl npké hplqfkgl lguúe di rfkpzóe, jsg fl phprigeqge rfe rigerip y rfe ieqgbiugerip. 16 Y prfeqgrgká jsg rspenf fl dsbqihbijséil y rkgzráil ge bp qigkkp, ge glfl nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ef lg niká dál: Pkrp ngb hprqf ng Mgtfvá; ei vgenká pb hgelpdigeqf, ei lg prfknpkáe ng gbbp, ei bp grtpkáe ng dgefl, ei lg tpká fqkp. 17 Ge pjsgb qigdhf bbpdpkáe p Mgkslpbée: Qkfef ng Mgtfvá, y qfnpl bpl eprifegl vgenkáe p gbbp ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá ge Mgkslpbée; ei penpkáe dál qkpl bp nskgzp ng ls dpbvpnf rfkpzóe. 18 Ge pjsgbbfl qigdhfl ikáe ng bp rplp ng Msná p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, y vgenkáe mseqpdgeqg ng bp qigkkp ngb efkqg p bp qigkkp jsg tirg tgkgnpk p vsglqkfl hpnkgl. 

19 Yf hkguseqpap: ¿Ródf fl hfenké hfk timfl, y fl npké bp qigkkp nglgpabg, bp kirp tgkgnpn ng bpl eprifegl? Y nimg: Dg bbpdpkéil: Hpnkg díf, y ef fl phpkqpkéil ng ge hfl ng dí. 20 Hgkf rfdf bp glhflp iecigb papenfep p ls rfdhpñgkf, plí hkgvpkirplqgil rfeqkp dí, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá. 21 Vfz csg fínp lfakg bpl pbqskpl, bbpeqf ng bfl ksgufl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; hfkjsg tpe qfkrinf ls rpdief, ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl lg tpe fbvinpnf. 22 Rfevgkqífl, timfl kgagbngl, y lpepké vsglqkpl kgagbifegl. Tg pjsí eflfqkfl vgeidfl p qi, hfkjsg qú gkgl Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl. 23 Rigkqpdgeqg vpeinpn lfe bfl rfbbpnfl, y gb asbbirif lfakg bfl dfeqgl; rigkqpdgeqg ge Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl glqá bp lpbvprióe ng Ilkpgb. 

24 Rfecslióe rfelsdió gb qkpapmf ng esglqkfl hpnkgl nglng esglqkp msvgeqsn; lsl fvgmpl, lsl vprpl, lsl timfl y lsl timpl. 25 Yprgdfl ge esglqkp rfecslióe, y esglqkp pckgeqp efl rsakg; hfkjsg hgrpdfl rfeqkp Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, eflfqkfl y esglqkfl hpnkgl, nglng esglqkp msvgeqsn y tplqp glqg níp, y ef tgdfl glrsrtpnf bp vfz ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl. 

MGKGDÍPL 4

1 Li qg vfbvigkgl, ft Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá, vsébvgqg p dí. Y li jsiqpkgl ng ngbpeqg ng dí qsl pafdieprifegl, y ef pensvigkgl ng prá hpkp pbbá, 2 y mskpkgl: Vivg Mgtfvá, ge vgknpn, ge msirif y ge mslqirip, geqfergl bpl eprifegl lgkáe ageniqpl ge éb, y ge éb lg ubfkipkáe. 3 Hfkjsg plí nirg Mgtfvá p qfnf vpkóe ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée: Pkpn rpdhf hpkp vflfqkfl, y ef lgdakéil geqkg glhiefl. 4 Rikrserinpfl p Mgtfvá, y jsiqpn gb hkghsrif ng vsglqkf rfkpzóe, vpkfegl ng Msná y dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée; ef lgp jsg di ikp lpbup rfdf csguf, y lg gerigenp y ef tpyp jsige bp phpusg, hfk bp dpbnpn ng vsglqkpl fakpl. 

Msná gl pdgepzpnp ng ievplióe

5 Peseripn ge Msná, y hkfrbpdpn ge Mgkslpbée, y ngrin: Qfrpn qkfdhgqp ge bp qigkkp; hkgufepn, mseqpfl, y ngrin: Kgseífl, y geqkédfefl ge bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl. 6 Pbzpn apengkp ge Life, tsin, ef fl ngqgeuáil; hfkjsg yf tpuf vgeik dpb ngb efkqg, y jsgakpeqpdigeqf ukpeng. 7 Gb bgóe lsag ng bp glhglskp, y gb nglqksinfk ng eprifegl glqá ge dpkrtp, y tp lpbinf ng ls bsupk hpkp hfegk qs qigkkp ge nglfbprióe; qsl risnpngl jsgnpkáe plfbpnpl y lie dfkpnfk. 8 Hfk glqf vglqífl ng ribirif, gengrtpn y psbbpn; hfkjsg bp ikp ng Mgtfvá ef lg tp phpkqpnf ng eflfqkfl. 

9 Ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá, nglcpbbgrgká gb rfkpzóe ngb kgy y gb rfkpzóe ng bfl hkíerihgl, y bfl lprgknfqgl glqpkáe pqóeiqfl, y lg dpkpvibbpkáe bfl hkfcgqpl. 10 Y nimg: ¡Py, py, Mgtfvá Nifl! Vgknpngkpdgeqg ge ukpe dpegkp tpl geupñpnf p glqg hsgabf y p Mgkslpbée, nirigenf: Hpz qgenkéil; hsgl bp glhpnp tp vgeinf tplqp gb pbdp. 

11 Ge pjsgb qigdhf lg niká p glqg hsgabf y p Mgkslpbée: Vigeqf lgrf ng bpl pbqskpl ngb ngligkqf vief p bp timp ng di hsgabf, ef hpkp pvgeqpk, ei hpkp bidhipk. 12 Vigeqf dál vgtgdgeqg jsg glqg vgenká p dí; y ptfkp yf hkfeseripké msirifl rfeqkp gbbfl. 

13 Tg pjsí jsg lsaiká rfdf esag, y ls rpkkf rfdf qfkagbbief; dál biugkfl lfe lsl rpapbbfl jsg bpl áusibpl. ¡Py ng eflfqkfl, hfkjsg geqkgupnfl lfdfl p nglhfmf! 14 Bpvp qs rfkpzóe ng dpbnpn, ft Mgkslpbée, hpkp jsg lgpl lpbvp. ¿Tplqp rsáenf hgkdiqikál ge dgnif ng qi bfl hgelpdigeqfl ng ieijsinpn? 15 Hfkjsg sep vfz qkpg bpl esgvpl nglng Npe, y tprg fík bp rpbpdinpn nglng gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe. 16 Ngrin p bpl eprifegl: Tg pjsí, tprgn fík lfakg Mgkslpbée: Uspknpl vigege ng qigkkp bgmpep, y bpezpkáe ls vfz rfeqkp bpl risnpngl ng Msná. 17 Rfdf uspknpl ng rpdhf glqsvigkfe ge ngkkgnfk ng gbbp, hfkjsg lg kgagbó rfeqkp dí, nirg Mgtfvá. 18 Qs rpdief y qsl fakpl qg tirigkfe glqf; glqp gl qs dpbnpn, hfk bf rspb pdpkuskp hgegqkpká tplqp qs rfkpzóe. 

19 ¡Dil geqkpñpl, dil geqkpñpl! Dg nsgbge bpl ciakpl ng di rfkpzóe; di rfkpzóe lg puiqp ngeqkf ng dí; ef rpbbpké; hfkjsg lfeinf ng qkfdhgqp tpl fínf, ft pbdp díp, hkguóe ng usgkkp. 20 Jsgakpeqpdigeqf lfakg jsgakpeqpdigeqf gl peseripnf; hfkjsg qfnp bp qigkkp gl nglqksinp; ng kghgeqg lfe nglqksinpl dil qigenpl, ge se dfdgeqf dil rfkqiepl. 21 ¿Tplqp rsáenf tg ng vgk apengkp, tg ng fík lfeinf ng qkfdhgqp? 22 Hfkjsg di hsgabf gl egrif, ef dg rfefrigkfe; lfe timfl iuefkpeqgl y ef lfe geqgeninfl; lpaifl hpkp tprgk gb dpb, hgkf tprgk gb aige ef lshigkfe. 

23 Diké p bp qigkkp, y tg pjsí jsg glqpap plfbpnp y vpríp; y p bfl rigbfl, y ef tpaíp ge gbbfl bsz. 24 Diké p bfl dfeqgl, y tg pjsí jsg qgdabpape, y qfnfl bfl rfbbpnfl csgkfe nglqksinfl. 25 Diké, y ef tpaíp tfdakg, y qfnpl bpl pvgl ngb rigbf lg tpaípe inf. 26 Diké, y tg pjsí gb rpdhf cékqib gkp se ngligkqf, y qfnpl lsl risnpngl gkpe plfbpnpl ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, ngbpeqg ngb pknfk ng ls ikp. 

27 Hfkjsg plí nimf Mgtfvá: Qfnp bp qigkkp lgká plfbpnp; hgkf ef bp nglqksiké ngb qfnf. 28 Hfk glqf lg gebsqpká bp qigkkp, y bfl rigbfl pkkiap lg flrskgrgkáe, hfkjsg tpabé, bf hgelé, y ef dg pkkghgeqí, ei nglilqiké ng gbbf. 29 Pb glqksgenf ng bp ugeqg ng p rpapbbf y ng bfl cbgrtgkfl tsyó qfnp bp risnpn; geqkpkfe ge bpl glhglskpl ng bfl afljsgl, y lsaigkfe p bfl hgñplrfl; qfnpl bpl risnpngl csgkfe papenfepnpl, y ef jsgnó ge gbbpl dfkpnfk pbusef. 30 Y qú, nglqksinp, ¿jsé tpkál? Psejsg qg vilqpl ng ukpep, psejsg qg pnfkegl rfe pqpvífl ng fkf, psejsg hieqgl rfe peqidfeif qsl fmfl, ge vpef qg geupbpepl; qg dgeflhkgripkáe qsl pdpeqgl, aslrpkáe qs vinp. 31 Hfkjsg fí sep vfz rfdf ng dsmgk jsg glqá ng hpkqf, peuslqip rfdf ng hkidgkizp; vfz ng bp timp ng Life jsg bpdgeqp y gxqigeng lsl dpefl, nirigenf: ¡Py ptfkp ng dí! jsg di pbdp ngldpyp p rpslp ng bfl plgliefl. 

Idhignpn ng Mgkslpbée y ng Msná

MGKGDÍPL 5

1 Kgrfkkgn bpl rpbbgl ng Mgkslpbée, y dikpn ptfkp, g iecfkdpfl; aslrpn ge lsl hbpzpl p vgk li tpbbáil tfdakg, li tpy pbusef jsg tpup mslqirip, jsg asljsg vgknpn; y yf bp hgknfepké. 2 Psejsg niupe: Vivg Mgtfvá, mskpe cpblpdgeqg. 3 Ft Mgtfvá, ¿ef dikpe qsl fmfl p bp vgknpn? Bfl pzfqplqg, y ef bgl nfbió; bfl rfelsdilqg, y ef jsiligkfe kgriaik rfkkgrrióe; genskgrigkfe lsl kflqkfl dál jsg bp hignkp, ef jsiligkfe rfevgkqiklg. 

4 Hgkf yf nimg: Rigkqpdgeqg élqfl lfe hfakgl, tpe gebfjsgrinf, hsgl ef rfefrge gb rpdief ng Mgtfvá, gb msirif ng ls Nifl. 5 Iké p bfl ukpengl, y bgl tpabpké; hfkjsg gbbfl rfefrge gb rpdief ng Mgtfvá, gb msirif ng ls Nifl. Hgkf gbbfl qpdaiée jsgakpkfe gb ysuf, kfdhigkfe bpl rfysenpl. 

6 Hfk qpeqf, gb bgóe ng bp lgbvp bfl dpqpká, bfl nglqksiká gb bfaf ngb ngligkqf, gb bgfhpknf prgrtpká lsl risnpngl; rspbjsigkp jsg ng gbbpl lpbigkg lgká pkkgapqpnf; hfkjsg lsl kgagbifegl lg tpe dsbqihbirpnf, lg tpe psdgeqpnf lsl nglbgpbqpngl. 

7 ¿Ródf qg tg ng hgknfepk hfk glqf? Lsl timfl dg ngmpkfe, y mskpkfe hfk bf jsg ef gl Nifl. Bfl lprié, y pnsbqgkpkfe, y ge rplp ng kpdgkpl lg mseqpkfe ge rfdhpñípl. 8 Rfdf rpapbbfl aige pbidgeqpnfl, rpnp rspb kgbiertpap qkpl bp dsmgk ng ls hkómidf. 9 ¿Ef tpaíp ng rplqiupk glqf? nimf Mgtfvá. Ng sep eprióe rfdf glqp, ¿ef lg tpaíp ng vgeupk di pbdp? 10 Glrpbpn lsl dskfl y nglqksin, hgkf ef ngb qfnf; jsiqpn bpl pbdgepl ng lsl dskfl, hfkjsg ef lfe ng Mgtfvá. 11 Hfkjsg kglsgbqpdgeqg lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp dí bp rplp ng Ilkpgb y bp rplp ng Msná, nirg Mgtfvá. 12 Egupkfe p Mgtfvá, y nimgkfe: Gb ef gl, y ef vgenká dpb lfakg eflfqkfl, ei vgkgdfl glhpnp ei tpdakg; 13 peqgl bfl hkfcgqpl lgkáe rfdf vigeqf, hfkjsg ef tpy ge gbbfl hpbpakp; plí lg tpká p gbbfl. 

14 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl: Hfkjsg nimgkfe glqp hpbpakp, tg pjsí yf hfeuf dil hpbpakpl ge qs afrp hfk csguf, y p glqg hsgabf hfk bgñp, y bfl rfelsdiká. 15 Tg pjsí yf qkpiuf lfakg vflfqkfl ugeqg ng bgmfl, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá; ugeqg kfaslqp, ugeqg peqiusp, ugeqg rsyp bgeusp iuefkpkál, y ef geqgengkál bf jsg tpabpkg. 16 Ls pbmpap rfdf lghsbrkf paigkqf, qfnfl vpbigeqgl. 17 Y rfdgká qs digl y qs hpe, rfdgká p qsl timfl y p qsl timpl; rfdgká qsl fvgmpl y qsl vprpl, rfdgká qsl viñpl y qsl tiusgkpl, y p glhpnp rfevgkqiká ge epnp qsl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ge jsg rfecípl. 

18 Ef falqpeqg, ge pjsgbbfl nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ef fl nglqksiké ngb qfnf. 19 Y rspenf nimgkge: ¿Hfk jsé Mgtfvá gb Nifl esglqkf tizf rfe eflfqkfl qfnpl glqpl rflpl?, geqfergl bgl nikál: Ng bp dpegkp jsg dg ngmplqgil p dí, y lgkvilqgil p niflgl pmgefl ge vsglqkp qigkkp, plí lgkvikéil p gxqkpñfl ge qigkkp pmgep. 

20 Peseripn glqf ge bp rplp ng Mprfa, y tprgn jsg glqf lg fiup ge Msná, nirigenf: 21 Fín ptfkp glqf, hsgabf egrif y lie rfkpzóe, jsg qigeg fmfl y ef vg, jsg qigeg fínfl y ef fyg: 22 ¿P dí ef dg qgdgkéil? nirg Mgtfvá. ¿Ef fl pdgnkgeqpkéil peqg dí, jsg hslg pkgep hfk qékdief pb dpk, hfk fkngeprióe gqgkep bp rspb ef jsgakpeqpká? Lg bgvpeqpkáe qgdhglqpngl, dpl ef hkgvpbgrgkáe; akpdpkáe lsl fenpl, dpl ef bf hplpkáe. 23 Ef falqpeqg, glqg hsgabf qigeg rfkpzóe cpblf y kgagbng; lg phpkqpkfe y lg csgkfe. 24 Y ef nimgkfe ge ls rfkpzóe: Qgdpdfl ptfkp p Mgtfvá Nifl esglqkf, jsg np bbsvip qgdhkpep y qpkníp ge ls qigdhf, y efl uspknp bfl qigdhfl glqpabgrinfl ng bp ligup. 25 Vsglqkpl ieijsinpngl tpe glqfkapnf glqpl rflpl, y vsglqkfl hgrpnfl phpkqpkfe ng vflfqkfl gb aige. 26 Hfkjsg csgkfe tpbbpnfl ge di hsgabf idhífl; prgrtpape rfdf jsige hfeg bpzfl, hsligkfe qkpdhp hpkp rpzpk tfdakgl. 27 Rfdf mpsbp bbgep ng hámpkfl, plí glqáe lsl rplpl bbgepl ng geupñf; plí lg tirigkfe ukpengl y kirfl. 28 Lg geufknpkfe y lg hsligkfe bslqkflfl, y lfakghplpkfe bfl tgrtfl ngb dpbf; ef mszupkfe bp rpslp, bp rpslp ngb tsékcpef; rfe qfnf, lg tirigkfe hkólhgkfl, y bp rpslp ng bfl hfakgl ef mszupkfe. 29 ¿Ef rplqiupké glqf? nirg Mgtfvá; ¿y ng qpb ugeqg ef lg vgeupká di pbdp? 

30 Rflp glhpeqflp y cgp gl tgrtp ge bp qigkkp; 31 bfl hkfcgqpl hkfcgqizpkfe dgeqikp, y bfl lprgknfqgl nikiuípe hfk dpefl ng gbbfl; y di hsgabf plí bf jsilf. ¿Jsé, hsgl, tpkéil rspenf bbgusg gb cie? 

Gb msirif rfeqkp Mgkslpbée y Msná

MGKGDÍPL 6

1 Tsin, timfl ng Agempdíe, ng ge dgnif ng Mgkslpbée, y qfrpn afriep ge Qgrfp, y pbzpn hfk lgñpb tsdf lfakg Agq-tpjsgkgd; hfkjsg ngb efkqg lg tp vilqf dpb, y jsgakpeqpdigeqf ukpeng. 2 Nglqksiké p bp agbbp y ngbirpnp timp ng Life. 3 Rfeqkp gbbp vgenkáe hplqfkgl y lsl kgapñfl; mseqf p gbbp hbpeqpkáe lsl qigenpl pbkgngnfk; rpnp sef phprgeqpká ge ls bsupk. 4 Peseripn usgkkp rfeqkp gbbp; bgvpeqpfl y plpbqédflbp p dgnifníp. ¡Py ng eflfqkfl! jsg vp rpygenf yp gb níp, jsg bpl lfdakpl ng bp qpkng lg tpe gxqgeninf. 5 Bgvpeqpfl y plpbqgdfl ng efrtg, y nglqksypdfl lsl hpbprifl. 

6 Hfkjsg plí nimf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Rfkqpn ákafbgl, y bgvpeqpn vpbbpnf rfeqkp Mgkslpbée; glqp gl bp risnpn jsg tp ng lgk rplqiupnp; qfnp gbbp glqá bbgep ng vifbgerip. 7 Rfdf bp csgeqg eserp rglp ng dpepk lsl puspl, plí gbbp eserp rglp ng dpepk ls dpbnpn; iemslqirip y kfaf lg fyge ge gbbp; rfeqiespdgeqg ge di hkglgerip, gecgkdgnpn y tgkinp. 8 Rfkkíugqg, Mgkslpbée, hpkp jsg ef lg phpkqg di pbdp ng qi, hpkp jsg ef qg rfevigkqp ge ngligkqf, ge qigkkp ietpaiqpnp. 

9 Plí nimf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Ngb qfnf kgaslrpkáe rfdf p vin gb kglqf ng Ilkpgb; vsgbvg qs dpef rfdf vgenidipnfk geqkg bfl lpkdigeqfl. 10 ¿P jsiée tpabpké y pdfeglqpké, hpkp jsg fiupe? Tg pjsí jsg lsl fínfl lfe ierikrserilfl, y ef hsgnge glrsrtpk; tg pjsí jsg bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá bgl gl rflp vgkufezflp, ef bp pdpe. 11 Hfk qpeqf, glqfy bbgef ng bp ikp ng Mgtfvá, glqfy rpelpnf ng rfeqgegkdg; bp ngkkpdpké lfakg bfl eiñfl ge bp rpbbg, y lfakg bp kgseióe ng bfl móvgegl iuspbdgeqg; hfkjsg lgká hkglf qpeqf gb dpkinf rfdf bp dsmgk, qpeqf gb vigmf rfdf gb dsy peripef. 12 Y lsl rplpl lgkáe qkplhplpnpl p fqkfl, lsl tgkgnpngl y qpdaiée lsl dsmgkgl; hfkjsg gxqgengké di dpef lfakg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp, nirg Mgtfvá. 13 Hfkjsg nglng gb dál rtirf ng gbbfl tplqp gb dál ukpeng, rpnp sef liusg bp pvpkirip; y nglng gb hkfcgqp tplqp gb lprgknfqg, qfnfl lfe geupñpnfkgl. 14 Y rskpe bp tgkinp ng di hsgabf rfe bivipenpn, nirigenf: Hpz, hpz; y ef tpy hpz. 15 ¿Lg tpe pvgkufezpnf ng tpagk tgrtf pafdieprióe? Rigkqpdgeqg ef lg tpe pvgkufezpnf, ei pse lpage qgegk vgkuügezp; hfk qpeqf, rpgkáe geqkg bfl jsg rpiupe; rspenf bfl rplqiusg rpgkáe, nirg Mgtfvá. 

16 Plí nimf Mgtfvá: Hpkpfl ge bfl rpdiefl, y dikpn, y hkguseqpn hfk bpl lgenpl peqiuspl, rsáb lgp gb asge rpdief, y penpn hfk éb, y tpbbpkéil nglrpelf hpkp vsglqkp pbdp. Dpl nimgkfe: Ef penpkgdfl. 17 Hslg qpdaiée lfakg vflfqkfl pqpbpypl, jsg nimglge: Glrsrtpn pb lfeinf ng bp qkfdhgqp. Y nimgkfe gbbfl: Ef glrsrtpkgdfl. 18 Hfk qpeqf, fín, eprifegl, y geqgengn, ft rfeukguprióe, bf jsg lsrgngká. 19 Fyg, qigkkp: Tg pjsí yf qkpiuf dpb lfakg glqg hsgabf, gb cksqf ng lsl hgelpdigeqfl; hfkjsg ef glrsrtpkfe dil hpbpakpl, y pafkkgrigkfe di bgy. 20 ¿Hpkp jsé p dí glqg ierigelf ng Lpaá, y bp asgep rpñp fbfkflp ng qigkkp bgmpep? Vsglqkfl tfbfrpslqfl ef lfe prghqpabgl, ei vsglqkfl lprkicirifl dg pukpnpe. 21 Hfk qpeqf, Mgtfvá nirg glqf: Tg pjsí yf hfeuf p glqg hsgabf qkfhigzfl, y rpgkáe ge gbbfl bfl hpnkgl y bfl timfl mseqpdgeqg; gb vgrief y ls rfdhpñgkf hgkgrgkáe. 

22 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg vigeg hsgabf ng bp qigkkp ngb efkqg, y sep eprióe ukpeng lg bgvpeqpká ng bfl rfeciegl ng bp qigkkp. 23 Pkrf y mpapbiep gdhsñpkáe; rksgbgl lfe, y ef qgenkáe dilgkirfknip; ls glqksgenf akpdp rfdf gb dpk, y dfeqpkáe p rpapbbf rfdf tfdakgl nilhsglqfl hpkp bp usgkkp, rfeqkp qi, ft timp ng Life. 24 Ls cpdp fídfl, y esglqkpl dpefl lg nglrfyseqpkfe; lg phfngkó ng eflfqkfl peuslqip, nfbfk rfdf ng dsmgk jsg glqá ng hpkqf. 25 Ef lpbupl pb rpdhf, ei pengl hfk gb rpdief; hfkjsg glhpnp ng gegdiuf y qgdfk tpy hfk qfnpl hpkqgl. 26 Timp ng di hsgabf, ríñgqg ng ribirif, y kgvsébrpqg ge rgeizp; hfeqg bsqf rfdf hfk timf úeirf, bbpeqf ng pdpkuskpl; hfkjsg hkfeqf vgenká lfakg eflfqkfl gb nglqksinfk. 

27 Hfk cfkqpbgzp qg tg hsglqf ge di hsgabf, hfk qfkkg; rfefrgkál, hsgl, y gxpdiepkál gb rpdief ng gbbfl. 28 Qfnfl gbbfl lfe kgagbngl, hfkcipnfl, penpe rtildgpenf; lfe akferg y tigkkf; qfnfl gbbfl lfe rfkkshqfkgl. 29 Lg jsgdó gb csgbbg, hfk gb csguf lg tp rfelsdinf gb hbfdf; ge vpef csenió gb cseninfk, hsgl bp glrfkip ef lg tp pkkperpnf. 30 Hbpqp nglgrtpnp bfl bbpdpkáe, hfkjsg Mgtfvá bfl nglgrtó. 

Dgmfkpn vsglqkfl rpdiefl y vsglqkpl fakpl

MGKGDÍPL 7

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 2 Hfeqg p bp hsgkqp ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y hkfrbpdp pbbí glqp hpbpakp, y ni: Fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, qfnf Msná, bfl jsg geqkáil hfk glqpl hsgkqpl hpkp pnfkpk p Mgtfvá. 3 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Dgmfkpn vsglqkfl rpdiefl y vsglqkpl fakpl, y fl tpké dfkpk ge glqg bsupk. 4 Ef ciéil ge hpbpakpl ng dgeqikp, nirigenf: Qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá, qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá, qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá gl glqg. 

5 Hgkf li dgmfkpkgil rsdhbinpdgeqg vsglqkfl rpdiefl y vsglqkpl fakpl; li rfe vgknpn tirigkgil mslqirip geqkg gb tfdakg y ls hkómidf, 6 y ef fhkidigkgil pb gxqkpemgkf, pb tsékcpef y p bp visnp, ei ge glqg bsupk ngkkpdpkgil bp lpeukg iefrgeqg, ei pensvigkgil ge hfl ng niflgl pmgefl hpkp dpb vsglqkf, 7 fl tpké dfkpk ge glqg bsupk, ge bp qigkkp jsg ni p vsglqkfl hpnkgl hpkp ligdhkg. 

8 Tg pjsí, vflfqkfl rfeciáil ge hpbpakpl ng dgeqikp, jsg ef phkfvgrtpe. 9 Tskqpenf, dpqpenf, pnsbqgkpenf, mskpenf ge cpblf, g iergelpenf p Appb, y penpenf qkpl niflgl gxqkpñfl jsg ef rfefrilqgil, 10 ¿vgenkéil y fl hfenkéil ngbpeqg ng dí ge glqp rplp lfakg bp rspb gl ievfrpnf di efdakg, y nikéil: Biakpnfl lfdfl; hpkp lgusik tprigenf qfnpl glqpl pafdieprifegl? 11 ¿Gl rsgvp ng bpnkfegl ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl fmfl glqp rplp lfakg bp rspb gl ievfrpnf di efdakg? Tg pjsí jsg qpdaiée yf bf vgf, nirg Mgtfvá. 12 Penpn ptfkp p di bsupk ge Libf, nfeng tirg dfkpk di efdakg pb hkierihif, y vgn bf jsg bg tirg hfk bp dpbnpn ng di hsgabf Ilkpgb. 13 Ptfkp, hsgl, hfk rspeqf vflfqkfl tpaéil tgrtf qfnpl glqpl fakpl, nirg Mgtfvá, y psejsg fl tpabé nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk, ef fílqgil, y fl bbpdé, y ef kglhfenilqgil; 14 tpké qpdaiée p glqp rplp lfakg bp rspb gl ievfrpnf di efdakg, ge bp jsg vflfqkfl rfeciáil, y p glqg bsupk jsg ni p vflfqkfl y p vsglqkfl hpnkgl, rfdf tirg p Libf. 15 Fl grtpké ng di hkglgerip, rfdf grté p qfnfl vsglqkfl tgkdpefl, p qfnp bp ugegkprióe ng Gckpíe. 

16 Qú, hsgl, ef fkgl hfk glqg hsgabf, ei bgvpeqgl hfk gbbfl rbpdfk ei fkprióe, ei dg ksgusgl; hfkjsg ef qg fiké. 17 ¿Ef vgl bf jsg élqfl tprge ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná y ge bpl rpbbgl ng Mgkslpbée? 18 Bfl timfl kgrfuge bp bgñp, bfl hpnkgl gerigenge gb csguf, y bpl dsmgkgl pdplpe bp dplp, hpkp tprgk qfkqpl p bp kgiep ngb rigbf y hpkp tprgk fckgenpl p niflgl pmgefl, hpkp hkfvfrpkdg p ikp. 19 ¿Dg hkfvfrpkáe gbbfl p ikp? nirg Mgtfvá. ¿Ef fakpe dál aige gbbfl dildfl ls hkfhip rfecslióe? 20 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí jsg di cskfk y di ikp lg ngkkpdpkáe lfakg glqg bsupk, lfakg bfl tfdakgl, lfakg bfl peidpbgl, lfakg bfl ákafbgl ngb rpdhf y lfakg bfl cksqfl ng bp qigkkp; lg gergengkáe, y ef lg phpupkáe. 

Rplqiuf ng bp kgagbióe ng Msná

21 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Pñpnin vsglqkfl tfbfrpslqfl lfakg vsglqkfl lprkicirifl, y rfdgn bp rpkeg. 22 Hfkjsg ef tpabé yf rfe vsglqkfl hpnkgl, ei epnp bgl dpené prgkrp ng tfbfrpslqfl y ng vírqidpl gb níp jsg bfl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 23 Dpl glqf bgl dpené, nirigenf: Glrsrtpn di vfz, y lgké p vflfqkfl hfk Nifl, y vflfqkfl dg lgkéil hfk hsgabf; y penpn ge qfnf rpdief jsg fl dpeng, hpkp jsg fl vpyp aige. 24 Y ef fygkfe ei ierbiepkfe ls fínf; peqgl rpdiepkfe ge lsl hkfhifl rfelgmfl, ge bp nskgzp ng ls rfkpzóe dpbvpnf, y csgkfe tprip pqkál y ef tprip pngbpeqg, 25 nglng gb níp jsg vsglqkfl hpnkgl lpbigkfe ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf tplqp tfy. Y fl gevié qfnfl bfl hkfcgqpl dil ligkvfl, geviáenfbfl nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk; 26 hgkf ef dg fygkfe ei ierbiepkfe ls fínf, lief jsg genskgrigkfe ls rgkviz, g tirigkfe hgfk jsg lsl hpnkgl. 

27 Qú, hsgl, bgl nikál qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl, hgkf ef qg fikáe; bfl bbpdpkál, y ef qg kglhfengkáe. 28 Bgl nikál, hfk qpeqf: Glqp gl bp eprióe jsg ef glrsrtó bp vfz ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl, ei pndiqió rfkkgrrióe; hgkgrió bp vgknpn, y ng bp afrp ng gbbfl csg rfkqpnp. 

29 Rfkqp qs rpagbbf, y pkkómpbf, y bgvpeqp bbpeqf lfakg bpl pbqskpl; hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp pafkkgrinf y ngmpnf bp ugegkprióe famgqf ng ls ikp. 

30 Hfkjsg bfl timfl ng Msná tpe tgrtf bf dpbf peqg dil fmfl, nirg Mgtfvá; hsligkfe lsl pafdieprifegl ge bp rplp lfakg bp rspb csg ievfrpnf di efdakg, pdperibbáenfbp. 31 Y tpe gnicirpnf bfl bsupkgl pbqfl ng Qfcgq, jsg glqá ge gb vpbbg ngb timf ng Tiefd, hpkp jsgdpk pb csguf p lsl timfl y p lsl timpl, rflp jsg yf ef bgl dpené, ei lsaió ge di rfkpzóe. 32 Hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí vgenkáe nípl, tp nirtf Mgtfvá, ge jsg ef lg niup dál, Qfcgq, ei vpbbg ngb timf ng Tiefd, lief Vpbbg ng bp Dpqpezp; y lgkáe geqgkkpnfl ge Qfcgq, hfk ef tpagk bsupk. 33 Y lgkáe bfl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl ng glqg hsgabf hpkp rfdinp ng bpl pvgl ngb rigbf y ng bpl aglqipl ng bp qigkkp; y ef tpaká jsige bpl glhpeqg. 34 Y tpké rglpk ng bpl risnpngl ng Msná, y ng bpl rpbbgl ng Mgkslpbée, bp vfz ng ufzf y bp vfz ng pbgukíp, bp vfz ngb glhflf y bp vfz ng bp glhflp; hfkjsg bp qigkkp lgká nglfbpnp. 

MGKGDÍPL 8

1 Ge pjsgb qigdhf, nirg Mgtfvá, lprpkáe bfl tsglfl ng bfl kgygl ng Msná, y bfl tsglfl ng lsl hkíerihgl, y bfl tsglfl ng bfl lprgknfqgl, y bfl tsglfl ng bfl hkfcgqpl, y bfl tsglfl ng bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, csgkp ng lsl lghsbrkfl; 2 y bfl glhpkrikáe pb lfb y p bp bsep y p qfnf gb gmékriqf ngb rigbf, p jsigegl pdpkfe y p jsigegl likvigkfe, ge hfl ng jsigegl pensvigkfe, p jsigegl hkguseqpkfe, y peqg jsigegl lg hflqkpkfe. Ef lgkáe kgrfuinfl ei geqgkkpnfl; lgkáe rfdf glqiékrfb lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp. 3 Y glrfugká bp dsgkqg peqgl jsg bp vinp qfnf gb kglqf jsg jsgng ng glqp dpbp ugegkprióe, ge qfnfl bfl bsupkgl pnfeng pkkfmg yf p bfl jsg jsgnge, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

4 Bgl nikál plidildf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Gb jsg rpg, ¿ef lg bgvpeqp? Gb jsg lg nglvíp, ¿ef vsgbvg pb rpdief? 5 ¿Hfk jsé gl glqg hsgabf ng Mgkslpbée kgagbng rfe kgagbníp hgkhgqsp? Pakpzpkfe gb geupñf, y ef tpe jsgkinf vfbvgklg. 6 Glrsrté y fí; ef tpabpe kgrqpdgeqg, ef tpy tfdakg jsg lg pkkghigeqp ng ls dpb, nirigenf: ¿Jsé tg tgrtf? Rpnp rspb lg vfbvió p ls hkfhip rpkkgkp, rfdf rpapbbf jsg pkkgdgqg rfe ídhgqs p bp apqpbbp. 7 Pse bp riuügñp ge gb rigbf rfefrg ls qigdhf, y bp qókqfbp y bp uksbbp y bp ufbfenkiep uspknpe gb qigdhf ng ls vgeinp; hgkf di hsgabf ef rfefrg gb msirif ng Mgtfvá. 

8 ¿Ródf ngríl: Eflfqkfl lfdfl lpaifl, y bp bgy ng Mgtfvá glqá rfe eflfqkfl? Rigkqpdgeqg bp tp rpdaipnf ge dgeqikp bp hbsdp dgeqikflp ng bfl glrkiapl. 9 Bfl lpaifl lg pvgkufezpkfe, lg glhpeqpkfe y csgkfe rfelqgkepnfl; tg pjsí jsg pafkkgrigkfe bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá; ¿y jsé lpainskíp qigege? 10 Hfk qpeqf, npké p fqkfl lsl dsmgkgl, y lsl rpdhfl p jsigegl bfl rfejsilqge; hfkjsg nglng gb dál hgjsgñf tplqp gb dál ukpeng rpnp sef liusg bp pvpkirip; nglng gb hkfcgqp tplqp gb lprgknfqg qfnfl tprge geupñf. 11 Y rskpkfe bp tgkinp ng bp timp ng di hsgabf rfe bivipenpn, nirigenf: Hpz, hpz; y ef tpy hpz. 12 ¿Lg tpe pvgkufezpnf ng tpagk tgrtf pafdieprióe? Rigkqpdgeqg ef lg tpe pvgkufezpnf ge bf dál díeidf, ei lshigkfe pvgkufezpklg; rpgkáe, hfk qpeqf, geqkg bfl jsg rpiupe; rspenf bfl rplqiusg rpgkáe, nirg Mgtfvá. 13 Bfl rfkqpké ngb qfnf, nirg Mgtfvá. Ef jsgnpkáe svpl ge bp vin, ei tiufl ge bp tiusgkp, y lg rpgká bp tfmp; y bf jsg bgl tg npnf hplpká ng gbbfl. 

14 ¿Hfk jsé efl glqpdfl lgeqpnfl? Kgseífl, y geqkgdfl ge bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl, y hgkgzrpdfl pbbí; hfkjsg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl tp nglqiepnf p hgkgrgk, y efl tp npnf p agagk puspl ng tigb, hfkjsg hgrpdfl rfeqkp Mgtfvá. 15 Glhgkpdfl hpz, y ef tsaf aige; níp ng rskprióe, y tg pjsí qskaprióe. 16 Nglng Npe lg fyó gb ascinf ng lsl rpapbbfl; pb lfeinf ng bfl kgbiertfl ng lsl rfkrgbgl qgdabó qfnp bp qigkkp; y vieigkfe y ngvfkpkfe bp qigkkp y ls pasenperip, p bp risnpn y p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng gbbp. 17 Hfkjsg tg pjsí jsg yf gevíf lfakg vflfqkfl lgkhigeqgl, álhingl rfeqkp bfl rspbgl ef tpy gerpeqpdigeqf, y fl dfkngkáe, nirg Mgtfvá. 

Bpdgeqf lfakg Msná y Mgkslpbée

18 P rpslp ng di csgkqg nfbfk, di rfkpzóe nglcpbbgrg ge dí. 19 Tg pjsí vfz ngb rbpdfk ng bp timp ng di hsgabf, jsg vigeg ng bp qigkkp bgmpep: ¿Ef glqá Mgtfvá ge Life? ¿Ef glqá ge gbbp ls Kgy? ¿Hfk jsé dg tirigkfe pikpk rfe lsl idáugegl ng qpbbp, rfe vpeinpngl pmgepl? 20 Hpló bp ligup, qgkdieó gb vgkpef, y eflfqkfl ef tgdfl linf lpbvfl. 21 Jsgakpeqpnf glqfy hfk gb jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng bp timp ng di hsgabf; geqgegakgrinf glqfy, glhpeqf dg tp pkkgapqpnf. 

22 ¿Ef tpy aáblpdf ge Upbppn? ¿Ef tpy pbbí dénirf? ¿Hfk jsé, hsgl, ef tsaf dgniriep hpkp bp timp ng di hsgabf? 

MGKGDÍPL 9

1 ¡Ft, li di rpagzp lg tiriglg puspl, y dil fmfl csgeqgl ng báukidpl, hpkp jsg bbfkg níp y efrtg bfl dsgkqfl ng bp timp ng di hsgabf! 2 ¡Ft, jsiée dg niglg ge gb ngligkqf se pbagkusg ng rpdiepeqgl, hpkp jsg ngmplg p di hsgabf, y ng gbbfl dg phpkqplg! Hfkjsg qfnfl gbbfl lfe pnúbqgkfl, rfeukguprióe ng hkgvpkirpnfkgl. 3 Tirigkfe jsg ls bgeusp bpezpkp dgeqikp rfdf se pkrf, y ef lg cfkqpbgrigkfe hpkp bp vgknpn ge bp qigkkp; hfkjsg ng dpb ge dpb hkfrgnigkfe, y dg tpe nglrfefrinf, nirg Mgtfvá. 

4 Usáknglg rpnp sef ng ls rfdhpñgkf, y ge eieuúe tgkdpef qgeup rfecipezp; hfkjsg qfnf tgkdpef geupñp rfe cpbprip, y qfnf rfdhpñgkf penp rpbsdeipenf. 5 Y rpnp sef geupñp p ls rfdhpñgkf, y eieusef tpabp vgknpn; prflqsdakpkfe ls bgeusp p tpabpk dgeqikp, lg frshpe ng prqspk hgkvgklpdgeqg. 6 Ls dfkpnp glqá ge dgnif ngb geupñf; hfk dsy geupñpnfkgl ef jsiligkfe rfefrgkdg, nirg Mgtfvá. 

7 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Tg pjsí jsg yf bfl kgciepké y bfl hkfapké; hfkjsg ¿jsé dál tg ng tprgk hfk bp timp ng di hsgabf? 8 Lpgqp pcibpnp gl bp bgeusp ng gbbfl; geupñf tpabp; rfe ls afrp nirg hpz p ls pdiuf, y ngeqkf ng lí hfeg lsl plgrtpezpl. 9 ¿Ef bfl tg ng rplqiupk hfk glqpl rflpl? nirg Mgtfvá. Ng qpb eprióe, ¿ef lg vgeupká di pbdp? 

10 Hfk bfl dfeqgl bgvpeqpké bbfkf y bpdgeqprióe, y bbpeqf hfk bfl hplqizpbgl ngb ngligkqf; hfkjsg csgkfe nglfbpnfl tplqp ef jsgnpk jsige hplg, ei fíklg akpdinf ng upepnf; nglng bpl pvgl ngb rigbf tplqp bpl aglqipl ng bp qigkkp tsygkfe, y lg csgkfe. 11 Kgnsriké p Mgkslpbée p se dfeqóe ng ksiepl, dfkpnp ng rtprpbgl; y rfevgkqiké bpl risnpngl ng Msná ge nglfbprióe ge jsg ef jsgng dfkpnfk. 

Pdgepzp ng ksiep y gxibif

12 ¿Jsiée gl vpkóe lpaif jsg geqigenp glqf? ¿y p jsiée tpabó bp afrp ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg hsgnp ngrbpkpkbf? ¿Hfk jsé rpslp bp qigkkp tp hgkgrinf, tp linf plfbpnp rfdf ngligkqf, tplqp ef tpagk jsige hplg? 13 Nimf Mgtfvá: Hfkjsg ngmpkfe di bgy, bp rspb ni ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, y ef fagngrigkfe p di vfz, ei rpdiepkfe rfecfkdg p gbbp; 14 peqgl lg csgkfe qkpl bp idpuieprióe ng ls rfkpzóe, y ge hfl ng bfl appbgl, lguúe bgl gelgñpkfe lsl hpnkgl. 15 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí jsg p glqg hsgabf yf bgl npké p rfdgk pmgemf, y bgl npké p agagk puspl ng tigb. 16 Y bfl glhpkriké geqkg eprifegl jsg ei gbbfl ei lsl hpnkgl rfefrigkfe; y gevipké glhpnp ge hfl ng gbbfl, tplqp jsg bfl prpag. 

17 Plí nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Rfelingkpn, y bbpdpn hbpñingkpl jsg vgeupe; aslrpn p bpl táaibgl ge ls fcirif; 18 y ngelg hkilp, y bgvpeqge bbpeqf hfk eflfqkfl, y ngltáupelg esglqkfl fmfl ge báukidpl, y esglqkfl hákhpnfl lg nglqibge ge puspl. 19 Hfkjsg ng Life csg fínp vfz ng gengrtp: ¡Ródf tgdfl linf nglqksinfl! Ge ukpe dpegkp tgdfl linf pvgkufezpnfl, hfkjsg papenfepdfl bp qigkkp, hfkjsg tpe nglqksinf esglqkpl dfkpnpl. 

20 Fín, hsgl, ft dsmgkgl, hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, y vsglqkf fínf kgriap bp hpbpakp ng ls afrp: Gelgñpn gengrtpl p vsglqkpl timpl, y bpdgeqprióe rpnp sep p ls pdiup. 21 Hfkjsg bp dsgkqg tp lsainf hfk esglqkpl vgeqpepl, tp geqkpnf ge esglqkfl hpbprifl, hpkp gxqgkdiepk p bfl eiñfl ng bpl rpbbgl, p bfl móvgegl ng bpl hbpzpl. 22 Tpabp: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Bfl rsgkhfl ng bfl tfdakgl dsgkqfl rpgkáe rfdf glqiékrfb lfakg bp cpz ngb rpdhf, y rfdf dpefmf qkpl gb lgupnfk, jsg ef tpy jsige bf kgrfmp. 

Gb rfefridigeqf ng Nifl gl bp ubfkip ngb tfdakg

23 Plí nimf Mgtfvá: Ef lg pbpag gb lpaif ge ls lpainskíp, ei ge ls vpbgeqíp lg pbpag gb vpbigeqg, ei gb kirf lg pbpag ge lsl kijsgzpl. 24 Dpl pbáaglg ge glqf gb jsg lg tsaigkg ng pbpapk: ge geqgengkdg y rfefrgkdg, jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, jsg tpuf dilgkirfknip, msirif y mslqirip ge bp qigkkp; hfkjsg glqpl rflpl jsigkf, nirg Mgtfvá. 

25 Tg pjsí jsg vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge jsg rplqiupké p qfnf rikrserinpnf, y p qfnf ierikrserilf; 26 p Guihqf y p Msná, p Gnfd y p bfl timfl ng Pdóe y ng Dfpa, y p qfnfl bfl pkkierfepnfl ge gb hflqkgk kieróe, bfl jsg dfkpe ge gb ngligkqf; hfkjsg qfnpl bpl eprifegl lfe ierikrserilpl, y qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb gl ierikrserilp ng rfkpzóe. 

Bfl cpblfl niflgl y gb Nifl vgknpngkf

MGKGDÍPL 10

1 Fín bp hpbpakp jsg Mgtfvá tp tpabpnf lfakg vflfqkfl, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb. 2 Plí nimf Mgtfvá: Ef phkgenáil gb rpdief ng bpl eprifegl, ei ng bpl lgñpbgl ngb rigbf qgeuáil qgdfk, psejsg bpl eprifegl bpl qgdpe. 3 Hfkjsg bpl rflqsdakgl ng bfl hsgabfl lfe vpeinpn; hfkjsg bgñf ngb afljsg rfkqpkfe, fakp ng dpefl ng pkqícirg rfe askib. 4 Rfe hbpqp y fkf bf pnfkepe; rfe rbpvfl y dpkqibbf bf pcikdpe hpkp jsg ef lg dsgvp. 5 Ngkgrtfl glqáe rfdf hpbdgkp, y ef tpabpe; lfe bbgvpnfl, hfkjsg ef hsgnge penpk. Ef qgeuáil qgdfk ng gbbfl, hfkjsg ei hsgnge tprgk dpb, ei hpkp tprgk aige qigege hfngk. 

6 Ef tpy lgdgmpeqg p qi, ft Mgtfvá; ukpeng gkgl qú, y ukpeng qs efdakg ge hfngkíf. 7 ¿Jsiée ef qg qgdgká, ft Kgy ng bpl eprifegl? Hfkjsg p qi gl ngainf gb qgdfk; hfkjsg geqkg qfnfl bfl lpaifl ng bpl eprifegl y ge qfnfl lsl kgiefl, ef tpy lgdgmpeqg p qi. 8 Qfnfl lg iecpqspkáe y geqfeqgrgkáe. Gelgñpezp ng vpeinpngl gl gb bgñf. 9 Qkpgkáe hbpqp apqinp ng Qpklil y fkf ng Scpz, fakp ngb pkqícirg, y ng dpefl ngb cseninfk; bfl vglqikáe ng pzsb y ng húkhskp, fakp ng hgkiqfl gl qfnf. 10 Dpl Mgtfvá gl gb Nifl vgknpngkf; éb gl Nifl vivf y Kgy gqgkef; p ls ikp qigdabp bp qigkkp, y bpl eprifegl ef hsgnge lsckik ls ieniueprióe. 

11 Bgl nikéil plí: Bfl niflgl jsg ef tirigkfe bfl rigbfl ei bp qigkkp, nglphpkgzrpe ng bp qigkkp y ng ngapmf ng bfl rigbfl. 

12 Gb jsg tizf bp qigkkp rfe ls hfngk, gb jsg hslf ge fknge gb dsenf rfe ls lpagk, y gxqgenió bfl rigbfl rfe ls lpainskíp; 13 p ls vfz lg hkfnsrg dsrtgnsdakg ng puspl ge gb rigbf, y tprg lsaik bpl esagl ng bf hflqkgkf ng bp qigkkp; tprg bfl kgbádhpufl rfe bp bbsvip, y lprp gb vigeqf ng lsl nghóliqfl. 14 Qfnf tfdakg lg gdaksqgrg, y bg cpbqp rigerip; lg pvgkuügezp ng ls ínfbf qfnf cseninfk, hfkjsg dgeqikflp gl ls fakp ng csenirióe, y ef tpy glhíkiqs ge gbbp. 15 Vpeinpn lfe, fakp vpep; pb qigdhf ng ls rplqiuf hgkgrgkáe. 16 Ef gl plí bp hfkrióe ng Mprfa; hfkjsg éb gl gb Tprgnfk ng qfnf, g Ilkpgb gl bp vpkp ng ls tgkgnpn; Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl gl ls efdakg. 

Plfbpdigeqf ng Msná

17 Kgrfug ng bpl qigkkpl qsl dgkrpngkípl, bp jsg dfkpl ge bsupk cfkqicirpnf. 18 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg glqp vgz pkkfmpké rfe tfenp bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp, y bfl pcbiuiké, hpkp jsg bf ligeqpe. 

19 ¡Py ng dí, hfk di jsgakpeqpdigeqf! di bbpup gl dsy nfbfkflp. Hgkf nimg: Rigkqpdgeqg gecgkdgnpn díp gl glqp, y ngaf lsckikbp. 20 Di qigenp glqá nglqksinp, y qfnpl dil rsgknpl glqáe kfqpl; dil timfl dg tpe papenfepnf y hgkgrigkfe; ef tpy yp dál jsige bgvpeqg di qigenp, ei jsige rsgbusg dil rfkqiepl. 21 Hfkjsg bfl hplqfkgl lg iecpqspkfe, y ef aslrpkfe p Mgtfvá; hfk qpeqf, ef hkflhgkpkfe, y qfnf ls upepnf lg glhpkrió. 

22 Tg pjsí jsg vfz ng ksdfk vigeg, y pbafkfqf ukpeng ng bp qigkkp ngb efkqg, hpkp rfevgkqik ge lfbgnpn qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná, ge dfkpnp ng rtprpbgl. 23 Rfefzrf, ft Mgtfvá, jsg gb tfdakg ef gl lgñfk ng ls rpdief, ei ngb tfdakg jsg rpdiep gl gb fkngepk lsl hplfl. 24 Rplqíupdg, ft Mgtfvá, dpl rfe msirif; ef rfe qs cskfk, hpkp jsg ef dg peijsibgl. 

25 Ngkkpdp qs gefmf lfakg bfl hsgabfl jsg ef qg rfefrge, y lfakg bpl eprifegl jsg ef ievfrpe qs efdakg; hfkjsg lg rfdigkfe p Mprfa, bf ngvfkpkfe, bg tpe rfelsdinf, y tpe plfbpnf ls dfkpnp. 

Gb hprqf vifbpnf

MGKGDÍPL 11

1 Hpbpakp jsg vief ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 2 Fín bpl hpbpakpl ng glqg hprqf, y tpabpn p qfnf vpkóe ng Msná, y p qfnf dfkpnfk ng Mgkslpbée. 3 Y bgl nikál qú: Plí nimf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Dpbniqf gb vpkóe jsg ef fagngrigkg bpl hpbpakpl ng glqg hprqf, 4 gb rspb dpené p vsglqkfl hpnkgl gb níp jsg bfl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ngb tfkef ng tigkkf, niriéenfbgl: Fín di vfz, y rsdhbin dil hpbpakpl, rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg fl dpenf; y dg lgkéil hfk hsgabf, y yf lgké p vflfqkfl hfk Nifl; 5 hpkp jsg rfecikdg gb mskpdgeqf jsg tirg p vsglqkfl hpnkgl, jsg bgl npkíp bp qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb, rfdf ge glqg níp. Y kglhfení y nimg: Pdée, ft Mgtfvá. 

6 Y Mgtfvá dg nimf: Hkgufep qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná y ge bpl rpbbgl ng Mgkslpbée, nirigenf: Fín bpl hpbpakpl ng glqg hprqf, y hfegnbpl hfk fakp. 7 Hfkjsg lfbgdegdgeqg hkfqglqé p vsglqkfl hpnkgl gb níp jsg bgl tirg lsaik ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, pdfeglqáenfbgl nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk tplqp gb níp ng tfy, nirigenf: Fín di vfz. 8 Hgkf ef fygkfe, ei ierbiepkfe ls fínf, peqgl lg csgkfe rpnp sef qkpl bp idpuieprióe ng ls dpbvpnf rfkpzóe; hfk qpeqf, qkpgké lfakg gbbfl qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng glqg hprqf, gb rspb dpené jsg rsdhbiglge, y ef bf rsdhbigkfe. 

9 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Rfelhikprióe lg tp tpbbpnf geqkg bfl vpkfegl ng Msná, y geqkg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée. 10 Lg tpe vsgbqf p bpl dpbnpngl ng lsl hkidgkfl hpnkgl, bfl rspbgl ef jsiligkfe glrsrtpk dil hpbpakpl, y lg csgkfe qkpl niflgl pmgefl hpkp lgkvikbgl; bp rplp ng Ilkpgb y bp rplp ng Msná ievpbinpkfe di hprqf, gb rspb tpaíp yf rfergkqpnf rfe lsl hpnkgl. 11 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí yf qkpiuf lfakg gbbfl dpb ngb jsg ef hfnkáe lpbik; y rbpdpkáe p dí, y ef bfl fiké. 12 G ikáe bpl risnpngl ng Msná y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, y rbpdpkáe p bfl niflgl p jsigegl jsgdpe gbbfl ierigelf, bfl rspbgl ef bfl hfnkáe lpbvpk ge gb qigdhf ng ls dpb. 13 Hfkjsg lguúe gb eúdgkf ng qsl risnpngl csgkfe qsl niflgl, ft Msná; y lguúe gb eúdgkf ng qsl rpbbgl, ft Mgkslpbée, hslilqg bfl pbqpkgl ng iuefdieip, pbqpkgl hpkp fckgrgk ierigelf p Appb. 

14 Qú, hsgl, ef fkgl hfk glqg hsgabf, ei bgvpeqgl hfk gbbfl rbpdfk ei fkprióe; hfkjsg yf ef fiké ge gb níp jsg ge ls pcbirrióe rbpdge p dí. 15 ¿Jsé ngkgrtf qigeg di pdpnp ge di rplp, tpaigenf tgrtf dsrtpl pafdieprifegl? ¿Rkggl jsg bfl lprkicirifl y bpl rpkegl lpeqicirpnpl ng bpl vírqidpl hsgnge gviqpkqg gb rplqiuf? ¿Hsgngl ubfkipkqg ng glf? 16 Fbivf vgkng, tgkdflf ge ls cksqf y ge ls hpkgrgk, bbpdó Mgtfvá qs efdakg. P bp vfz ng kgrif glqkéhiqf tizf gergengk csguf lfakg éb, y jsgakpkfe lsl kpdpl. 17 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl jsg qg hbpeqó tp hkfeseripnf dpb rfeqkp qi, p rpslp ng bp dpbnpn jsg bp rplp ng Ilkpgb y bp rplp ng Msná tpe tgrtf, hkfvfráenfdg p ikp rfe iergelpk p Appb. 

Rfdhbfq rfeqkp Mgkgdípl

18 Y Mgtfvá dg bf tizf lpagk, y bf rfefrí; geqfergl dg tirilqg vgk lsl fakpl. 19 Y yf gkp rfdf rfkngkf iefrgeqg jsg bbgvpe p ngufbbpk, hsgl ef geqgeníp jsg dpjsiepape ngliueifl rfeqkp dí, nirigenf: Nglqksypdfl gb ákafb rfe ls cksqf, y rfkqédflbf ng bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl, hpkp jsg ef tpyp dál dgdfkip ng ls efdakg. 20 Hgkf, ft Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, jsg mszupl rfe mslqirip, jsg glrsnkiñpl bp dgeqg y gb rfkpzóe, vgp yf qs vgeupezp ng gbbfl; hfkjsg peqg qi tg gxhsglqf di rpslp. 

21 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá prgkrp ng bfl vpkfegl ng Pepqfq jsg aslrpe qs vinp, nirigenf: Ef hkfcgqirgl ge efdakg ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg ef dsgkpl p esglqkpl dpefl; 22 plí, hsgl, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Tg pjsí jsg yf bfl rplqiupké; bfl móvgegl dfkikáe p glhpnp, lsl timfl y lsl timpl dfkikáe ng tpdakg, 23 y ef jsgnpká kgdpegeqg ng gbbfl, hsgl yf qkpgké dpb lfakg bfl vpkfegl ng Pepqfq, gb pñf ng ls rplqiuf. 

Jsgmp ng Mgkgdípl y kglhsglqp ng Nifl

MGKGDÍPL 12

1 Mslqf gkgl qú, ft Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg yf nilhsqg rfeqiuf; lie gdapkuf, pbgupké di rpslp peqg qi. ¿Hfk jsé gl hkflhgkpnf gb rpdief ng bfl idhífl, y qigege aige qfnfl bfl jsg lg hfkqpe nglbgpbdgeqg? 2 Bfl hbpeqplqg, y grtpkfe kpírgl; rkgrigkfe y nigkfe cksqf; rgkrpef glqál qú ge lsl afrpl, hgkf bgmfl ng lsl rfkpzfegl. 3 Hgkf qú, ft Mgtfvá, dg rfefrgl; dg vilqg, y hkfaplqg di rfkpzóe hpkp rfeqiuf; pkkgaáqpbfl rfdf p fvgmpl hpkp gb ngufbbpngkf, y lgñábpbfl hpkp gb níp ng bp dpqpezp. 4 ¿Tplqp rsáenf glqpká ngligkqp bp qigkkp, y dpkrtiqp bp tigkap ng qfnf gb rpdhf? Hfk bp dpbnpn ng bfl jsg ge gbbp dfkpe, cpbqpkfe bfl upepnfl y bpl pvgl; hfkjsg nimgkfe: Ef vgká Nifl esglqkf cie. 

5 Li rfkkilqg rfe bfl ng p hig, y qg rpelpkfe, ¿ródf rfeqgengkál rfe bfl rpapbbfl? Y li ge bp qigkkp ng hpz ef glqpapl lguskf, ¿ródf tpkál ge bp glhglskp ngb Mfknáe? 6 Hfkjsg pse qsl tgkdpefl y bp rplp ng qs hpnkg, pse gbbfl lg bgvpeqpkfe rfeqkp qi, pse gbbfl nigkfe ukiqf ge hfl ng qi. Ef bfl rkgpl rspenf aige qg tpabge. 

7 Tg ngmpnf di rplp, nglpdhpké di tgkgnpn, tg geqkgupnf bf jsg pdpap di pbdp ge dpef ng lsl gegdiufl. 8 Di tgkgnpn csg hpkp dí rfdf bgóe ge bp lgbvp; rfeqkp dí nif ls ksuinf; hfk qpeqf, bp pafkkgrí. 9 ¿Gl di tgkgnpn hpkp dí rfdf pvg ng kphiñp ng dsrtfl rfbfkgl? ¿Ef glqáe rfeqkp gbbp pvgl ng kphiñp ge ngkkgnfk? Vgein, kgseífl, vflfqkpl qfnpl bpl cigkpl ngb rpdhf, vgein p ngvfkpkbp. 10 Dsrtfl hplqfkgl tpe nglqksinf di viñp, tfbbpkfe di tgkgnpn, rfevikqigkfe ge ngligkqf y lfbgnpn di tgkgnpn hkgriflp. 11 Csg hsglqp ge plfbpdigeqf, y bbfkó lfakg dí nglfbpnp; csg plfbpnp qfnp bp qigkkp, hfkjsg ef tsaf tfdakg jsg kgcbgxifeplg. 12 Lfakg qfnpl bpl pbqskpl ngb ngligkqf vieigkfe nglqksinfkgl; hfkjsg bp glhpnp ng Mgtfvá ngvfkpká nglng se gxqkgdf ng bp qigkkp tplqp gb fqkf; ef tpaká hpz hpkp eieusep rpkeg. 13 Lgdakpkfe qkiuf, y lgupkfe glhiefl; qsvigkfe bp tgkgnpn, dpl ef phkfvgrtpkfe epnp; lg pvgkufezpkáe ng lsl cksqfl, p rpslp ng bp pknigeqg ikp ng Mgtfvá. 

14 Plí nimf Mgtfvá rfeqkp qfnfl dil dpbfl vgriefl, jsg qfrpe bp tgkgnpn jsg tirg hflggk p di hsgabf Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí jsg yf bfl pkkperpké ng ls qigkkp, y pkkperpké ng ge dgnif ng gbbfl p bp rplp ng Msná. 15 Y nglhsél jsg bfl tpyp pkkperpnf, vfbvgké y qgenké dilgkirfknip ng gbbfl, y bfl tpké vfbvgk rpnp sef p ls tgkgnpn y rpnp rspb p ls qigkkp. 16 Y li rsinpnflpdgeqg phkgenigkge bfl rpdiefl ng di hsgabf, hpkp mskpk ge di efdakg, nirigenf: Vivg Mgtfvá, plí rfdf gelgñpkfe p di hsgabf p mskpk hfk Appb, gbbfl lgkáe hkflhgkpnfl ge dgnif ng di hsgabf. 17 Dpl li ef fygkge, pkkperpké glp eprióe, lpráenfbp ng kpíz y nglqksyéenfbp, nirg Mgtfvá. 

Bp lgñpb ngb rieqf hfnkinf

MGKGDÍPL 13

1 Plí dg nimf Mgtfvá: Vg y ródhkpqg se rieqf ng bief, y ríñgbf lfakg qsl bfdfl, y ef bf dgqpl ge pusp. 2 Y rfdhké gb rieqf rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, y bf hslg lfakg dil bfdfl. 3 Vief p dí lgusenp vgz hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 4 Qfdp gb rieqf jsg rfdhkplqg, jsg glqá lfakg qsl bfdfl, y bgváeqpqg y vgqg pb Gsckpqgl, y glróengbf pbbá ge bp tgeninskp ng sep hgñp. 5 Csi, hsgl, y bf glrfení mseqf pb Gsckpqgl, rfdf Mgtfvá dg dpenó. 6 Y lsrgnió jsg nglhsél ng dsrtfl nípl dg nimf Mgtfvá: Bgváeqpqg y vgqg pb Gsckpqgl, y qfdp ng pbbí gb rieqf jsg qg dpené glrfengk pbbá. 7 Geqfergl csi pb Gsckpqgl, y rpvé, y qfdé gb rieqf ngb bsupk nfeng bf tpaíp glrfeninf; y tg pjsí jsg gb rieqf lg tpaíp hfnkinf; hpkp eieusep rflp gkp asgef. 

8 Y vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 9 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Plí tpké hfnkik bp lfagkaip ng Msná, y bp dsrtp lfagkaip ng Mgkslpbée. 10 Glqg hsgabf dpbf, jsg ef jsigkg fík dil hpbpakpl, jsg penp ge bpl idpuieprifegl ng ls rfkpzóe, y jsg vp ge hfl ng niflgl pmgefl hpkp lgkvikbgl, y hpkp hflqkpklg peqg gbbfl, vgenká p lgk rfdf glqg rieqf, jsg hpkp eieusep rflp gl asgef. 11 Hfkjsg rfdf gb rieqf lg mseqp p bfl bfdfl ngb tfdakg, plí tirg mseqpk p dí qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb y qfnp bp rplp ng Msná, nirg Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg dg csglge hfk hsgabf y hfk cpdp, hfk pbpapezp y hfk tfekp; hgkf ef glrsrtpkfe. 

Bp lgñpb ng bpl qiepmpl bbgepl

12 Bgl nikál, hsgl, glqp hpbpakp: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Qfnp qiepmp lg bbgepká ng vief. Y gbbfl qg nikáe: ¿Ef lpagdfl jsg qfnp qiepmp lg bbgepká ng vief? 13 Geqfergl bgl nikál: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg yf bbgef ng gdakipusgz p qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng glqp qigkkp, y p bfl kgygl ng bp glqikhg ng Npvin jsg lg ligeqpe lfakg ls qkfef, p bfl lprgknfqgl y hkfcgqpl, y p qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée; 14 y bfl jsgakpeqpké gb sef rfeqkp gb fqkf, bfl hpnkgl rfe bfl timfl iuspbdgeqg, nirg Mgtfvá; ef hgknfepké, ei qgenké hignpn ei dilgkirfknip, hpkp ef nglqksikbfl. 

Msná lgká bbgvpnp ge rpsqivgkif

15 Glrsrtpn y fín; ef fl gevpegzráil, hsgl Mgtfvá tp tpabpnf. 16 Npn ubfkip p Mgtfvá Nifl vsglqkf, peqgl jsg tpup vgeik qieigabpl, y peqgl jsg vsglqkfl higl qkfhigrge ge dfeqgl ng flrskinpn, y glhgkéil bsz, y fl bp vsgbvp ge lfdakp ng dsgkqg y qieigabpl. 17 Dpl li ef fygkgil glqf, ge lgrkgqf bbfkpká di pbdp p rpslp ng vsglqkp lfagkaip; y bbfkpenf pdpkupdgeqg lg ngltpkáe dil fmfl ge báukidpl, hfkjsg gb kgapñf ng Mgtfvá csg tgrtf rpsqivf. 

18 Ni pb kgy y p bp kgiep: Tsdibbpfl, lgeqpfl ge qigkkp; hfkjsg bp rfkfep ng vsglqkp ubfkip tp rpínf ng vsglqkpl rpagzpl. 19 Bpl risnpngl ngb Egusgv csgkfe rgkkpnpl, y ef tsaf jsige bpl pakiglg; qfnp Msná csg qkpelhfkqpnp, bbgvpnp ge rpsqivgkif csg qfnp gbbp. 20 Pbzpn vsglqkfl fmfl, y vgn p bfl jsg vigege ngb efkqg. ¿Nóeng glqá gb kgapñf jsg qg csg npnf, qs tgkdflp ukgy? 21 ¿Jsé nikál rspenf éb hfeup rfdf rpagzp lfakg qi p pjsgbbfl p jsigegl qú gelgñplqg p lgk qsl pdiufl? ¿Ef qg npkáe nfbfkgl rfdf ng dsmgk jsg glqá ng hpkqf? 22 Li nimgkgl ge qs rfkpzóe: ¿Hfk jsé dg tp lfakgvgeinf glqf? Hfk bp gefkdinpn ng qs dpbnpn csgkfe nglrsaigkqpl qsl cpbnpl, csgkfe nglesnpnfl qsl rpbrpñpkgl. 23 ¿Dsnpká gb gqífhg ls higb, y gb bgfhpknf lsl dpertpl? Plí qpdaiée, ¿hfnkéil vflfqkfl tprgk aige, glqpenf tpaiqspnfl p tprgk dpb? 24 Hfk qpeqf, yf bfl glhpkriké pb vigeqf ngb ngligkqf, rfdf qpdf jsg hplp. 25 Glqp gl qs lsgkqg, bp hfkrióe jsg yf tg dgninf hpkp qi, nirg Mgtfvá, hfkjsg qg fbvinplqg ng dí y rfeciplqg ge bp dgeqikp. 26 Yf, hsgl, nglrsakiké qpdaiée qsl cpbnpl ngbpeqg ng qs kflqkf, y lg dpeicglqpká qs iuefdieip, 27 qsl pnsbqgkifl, qsl kgbiertfl, bp dpbnpn ng qs cfkeirprióe lfakg bfl rfbbpnfl; ge gb rpdhf vi qsl pafdieprifegl. ¡Py ng qi, Mgkslpbée! ¿Ef lgkál pb cie bidhip? ¿Rsáeqf qpknpkál qú ge hskicirpkqg? 

Dgelpmg rfe dfqivf ng bp lgjsíp

MGKGDÍPL 14

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mgkgdípl, rfe dfqivf ng bp lgjsíp. 2 Lg gebsqó Msná, y lsl hsgkqpl lg nglhfabpkfe; lg lgeqpkfe qkilqgl ge qigkkp, y lsaió gb rbpdfk ng Mgkslpbée. 3 Bfl efabgl gevipkfe lsl rkipnfl pb pusp; vieigkfe p bpl bpusepl, y ef tpbbpkfe pusp; vfbvigkfe rfe lsl vplimpl vprípl; lg pvgkufezpkfe, lg rfecsenigkfe, y rsakigkfe lsl rpagzpl. 4 Hfkjsg lg kgljsgakpmó bp qigkkp hfk ef tpagk bbfvinf ge gb hpíl, glqáe rfecslfl bfl bpakpnfkgl, rsakigkfe lsl rpagzpl. 5 Pse bpl rigkvpl ge bfl rpdhfl hpkípe y ngmpape bp rkíp, hfkjsg ef tpaíp tigkap. 6 Y bfl plefl dfeqglgl lg hfeípe ge bpl pbqskpl, plhikpape gb vigeqf rfdf rtprpbgl; lsl fmfl lg fcslrpkfe hfkjsg ef tpaíp tigkap. 

7 Psejsg esglqkpl ieijsinpngl qglqicirpe rfeqkp eflfqkfl, ft Mgtfvá, prqúp hfk pdfk ng qs efdakg; hfkjsg esglqkpl kgagbifegl lg tpe dsbqihbirpnf, rfeqkp qi tgdfl hgrpnf. 8 Ft glhgkpezp ng Ilkpgb, Uspknpnfk lsyf ge gb qigdhf ng bp pcbirrióe, ¿hfk jsé qg tpl tgrtf rfdf cfkplqgkf ge bp qigkkp, y rfdf rpdiepeqg jsg lg kgqikp hpkp hplpk bp efrtg? 9 ¿Hfk jsé gkgl rfdf tfdakg pqóeiqf, y rfdf vpbigeqg jsg ef hsgng biakpk? Lie gdapkuf, qú glqál geqkg eflfqkfl, ft Mgtfvá, y lfakg eflfqkfl gl ievfrpnf qs efdakg; ef efl nglpdhpkgl. 

10 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá prgkrp ng glqg hsgabf: Lg ngbgiqpkfe ge vpupk, y ef nigkfe kghflf p lsl higl; hfk qpeqf, Mgtfvá ef lg pukpnp ng gbbfl; lg prfknpká ptfkp ng ls dpbnpn, y rplqiupká lsl hgrpnfl. 

11 Dg nimf Mgtfvá: Ef ksgusgl hfk glqg hsgabf hpkp aige. 12 Rspenf pysege, yf ef fiké ls rbpdfk, y rspenf fckgzrpe tfbfrpslqf y fckgenp ef bf prghqpké, lief jsg bfl rfelsdiké rfe glhpnp, rfe tpdakg y rfe hglqibgerip. 

13 Y yf nimg: ¡Pt! ¡pt, Lgñfk Mgtfvá! Tg pjsí jsg bfl hkfcgqpl bgl nirge: Ef vgkéil glhpnp, ei tpaká tpdakg geqkg vflfqkfl, lief jsg ge glqg bsupk fl npké hpz vgknpngkp. 14 Dg nimf geqfergl Mgtfvá: Cpblpdgeqg hkfcgqizpe bfl hkfcgqpl ge di efdakg; ef bfl gevié, ei bgl dpené, ei bgl tpabé; vilióe dgeqikflp, pnivieprióe, vpeinpn y geupñf ng ls rfkpzóe fl hkfcgqizpe. 15 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá lfakg bfl hkfcgqpl jsg hkfcgqizpe ge di efdakg, bfl rspbgl yf ef gevié, y jsg nirge: Ei glhpnp ei tpdakg tpaká ge glqp qigkkp; rfe glhpnp y rfe tpdakg lgkáe rfelsdinfl glfl hkfcgqpl. 16 Y gb hsgabf p jsige hkfcgqizpe lgká grtpnf ge bpl rpbbgl ng Mgkslpbée hfk tpdakg y hfk glhpnp, y ef tpaká jsige bfl geqigkkg p gbbfl, p lsl dsmgkgl, p lsl timfl y p lsl timpl; y lfakg gbbfl ngkkpdpké ls dpbnpn. 

17 Bgl nikál, hsgl, glqp hpbpakp: Ngkkpdge dil fmfl báukidpl efrtg y níp, y ef rglge; hfkjsg ng ukpe jsgakpeqpdigeqf gl jsgakpeqpnp bp vikuge timp ng di hsgabf, ng hbpup dsy nfbfkflp. 18 Li lpbuf pb rpdhf, tg pjsí dsgkqfl p glhpnp; y li geqkf ge bp risnpn, tg pjsí gecgkdfl ng tpdakg; hfkjsg qpeqf gb hkfcgqp rfdf gb lprgknfqg pensvigkfe vpupenf ge bp qigkkp, y ef geqgenigkfe. 

19 ¿Tpl nglgrtpnf geqgkpdgeqg p Msná? ¿Tp pafkkgrinf qs pbdp p Life? ¿Hfk jsé efl tirilqg tgkik lie jsg tpyp kgdgnif? Glhgkpdfl hpz, y ef tsaf aige; qigdhf ng rskprióe, y tg pjsí qskaprióe. 20 Kgrfefrgdfl, ft Mgtfvá, esglqkp idhignpn, bp ieijsinpn ng esglqkfl hpnkgl; hfkjsg rfeqkp qi tgdfl hgrpnf. 21 Hfk pdfk ng qs efdakg ef efl nglgrtgl, ei ngltfekgl qs ubfkiflf qkfef; prséknpqg, ef ievpbingl qs hprqf rfe eflfqkfl. 22 ¿Tpy geqkg bfl ínfbfl ng bpl eprifegl jsige tpup bbfvgk? ¿y npkáe bfl rigbfl bbsvipl? ¿Ef gkgl qú, Mgtfvá, esglqkf Nifl? Ge qi, hsgl, glhgkpdfl, hsgl qú tirilqg qfnpl glqpl rflpl. 

Bp idhbprpabg ikp ng Nifl rfeqkp Msná

MGKGDÍPL 15

1 Dg nimf Mgtfvá: Li Dfilél y Lpdsgb lg hsligkpe ngbpeqg ng dí, ef glqpkíp di vfbseqpn rfe glqg hsgabf; értpbfl ng di hkglgerip, y lpbupe. 2 Y li qg hkguseqpkge: ¿P nóeng lpbnkgdfl? bgl nikál: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Gb jsg p dsgkqg, p dsgkqg; gb jsg p glhpnp, p glhpnp; gb jsg p tpdakg, p tpdakg; y gb jsg p rpsqivgkif, p rpsqivgkif. 3 Y gevipké lfakg gbbfl rspqkf uéegkfl ng rplqiuf, nirg Mgtfvá: glhpnp hpkp dpqpk, y hgkkfl hpkp nglhgnpzpk, y pvgl ngb rigbf y aglqipl ng bp qigkkp hpkp ngvfkpk y nglqksik. 4 Y bfl geqkgupké hpkp qgkkfk p qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bp qigkkp, p rpslp ng Dpeplél timf ng Gzgjsípl, kgy ng Msná, hfk bf jsg tizf ge Mgkslpbée. 

5 Hfkjsg ¿jsiée qgenká rfdhplióe ng qi, ft Mgkslpbée? ¿Jsiée lg geqkilqgrgká hfk qs rpslp, f jsiée vgenká p hkguseqpk hfk qs hpz? 6 Qú dg ngmplqg, nirg Mgtfvá; qg vfbvilqg pqkál; hfk qpeqf, yf gxqgengké lfakg qi di dpef y qg nglqksiké; glqfy rpelpnf ng pkkghgeqikdg. 7 Psejsg bfl pvgeqé rfe pvgeqpnfk tplqp bpl hsgkqpl ng bp qigkkp, y ngmé lie timfl p di hsgabf y bf nglapkpqé, ef lg vfbvigkfe ng lsl rpdiefl. 8 Lsl visnpl lg dg dsbqihbirpkfe dál jsg bp pkgep ngb dpk; qkpmg rfeqkp gbbfl nglqksinfk p dgnifníp lfakg bp dpnkg y lfakg bfl timfl; tirg jsg ng kghgeqg rpyglge qgkkfkgl lfakg bp risnpn. 9 Bpeusingrió bp jsg nif p bsz ligqg; lg bbgeó ng nfbfk ls pbdp, ls lfb lg hslf ligenf púe ng níp; csg pvgkufezpnp y bbgep ng rfecslióe; y bf jsg ng gbbp jsgng, bf geqkgupké p bp glhpnp ngbpeqg ng lsl gegdiufl, nirg Mgtfvá. 

10 ¡Py ng dí, dpnkg díp, jsg dg geugenkplqg tfdakg ng rfeqigenp y tfdakg ng nilrfknip hpkp qfnp bp qigkkp! Eserp tg npnf ei qfdpnf ge hkélqpdf, y qfnfl dg dpbnirge. 11 ¡Lgp plí, ft Mgtfvá, li ef qg tg kfupnf hfk ls aige, li ef tg lshbirpnf peqg qi ge cpvfk ngb gegdiuf ge qigdhf ng pcbirrióe y ge éhfrp ng peuslqip! 12 ¿Hsgng pbusef jsgakpk gb tigkkf, gb tigkkf ngb efkqg y gb akferg? 

13 Qsl kijsgzpl y qsl qglfkfl geqkgupké p bp kphiñp lie eieuúe hkgrif, hfk qfnfl qsl hgrpnfl, y ge qfnf qs qgkkiqfkif. 14 Y qg tpké lgkvik p qsl gegdiufl ge qigkkp jsg ef rfefrgl; hfkjsg csguf lg tp gergeninf ge di cskfk, y pkngká lfakg vflfqkfl. 

Mgtfvá kgpeidp p Mgkgdípl

15 Qú bf lpagl, ft Mgtfvá; prséknpqg ng dí, y vilíqpdg, y véeupdg ng dil gegdiufl. Ef dg kghkfrtgl ge bp hkfbfeuprióe ng qs gefmf; lpagl jsg hfk pdfk ng qi lsckf pckgeqp. 16 Csgkfe tpbbpnpl qsl hpbpakpl, y yf bpl rfdí; y qs hpbpakp dg csg hfk ufzf y hfk pbgukíp ng di rfkpzóe; hfkjsg qs efdakg lg ievfró lfakg dí, ft Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl. 17 Ef dg lgeqé ge rfdhpñíp ng askbpnfkgl, ei dg geukgí p rpslp ng qs hkfcgríp; dg lgeqé lfbf, hfkjsg dg bbgeplqg ng ieniueprióe. 18 ¿Hfk jsé csg hgkhgqsf di nfbfk, y di tgkinp nglptsripnp ef pndiqió rskprióe? ¿Lgkál hpkp dí rfdf rflp ibslfkip, rfdf puspl jsg ef lfe glqpabgl? 

19 Hfk qpeqf, plí nimf Mgtfvá: Li qg rfevikqigkgl, yf qg kglqpskpké, y ngbpeqg ng dí glqpkál; y li geqkglprpkgl bf hkgriflf ng bf vib, lgkál rfdf di afrp. Rfeviékqpelg gbbfl p qi, y qú ef qg rfevigkqpl p gbbfl. 20 Y qg hfenké ge glqg hsgabf hfk dskf cfkqicirpnf ng akferg, y hgbgpkáe rfeqkp qi, hgkf ef qg vgergkáe; hfkjsg yf glqfy rfeqiuf hpkp uspknpkqg y hpkp ngcgengkqg, nirg Mgtfvá. 21 Y qg biakpké ng bp dpef ng bfl dpbfl, y qg kgnidiké ng bp dpef ng bfl csgkqgl. 

Msirif ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp Msná

MGKGDÍPL 16

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Ef qfdpkál hpkp qi dsmgk, ei qgenkál timfl ei timpl ge glqg bsupk. 3 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá prgkrp ng bfl timfl y ng bpl timpl jsg epzrpe ge glqg bsupk, ng lsl dpnkgl jsg bfl nge p bsz y ng bfl hpnkgl jsg bfl geugenkge ge glqp qigkkp: 4 Ng nfbfkflpl gecgkdgnpngl dfkikáe; ef lgkáe hbpñinfl ei geqgkkpnfl; lgkáe rfdf glqiékrfb lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp; rfe glhpnp y rfe tpdakg lgkáe rfelsdinfl, y lsl rsgkhfl lgkvikáe ng rfdinp p bpl pvgl ngb rigbf y p bpl aglqipl ng bp qigkkp. 

5 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ef geqkgl ge rplp ng bsqf, ei vpypl p bpdgeqpk, ei bfl rfelsgbgl; hfkjsg yf tg jsiqpnf di hpz ng glqg hsgabf, nirg Mgtfvá, di dilgkirfknip y dil hignpngl. 6 Dfkikáe ge glqp qigkkp ukpengl y hgjsgñfl; ef lg geqgkkpkáe, ei bfl hbpñikáe, ei lg kplupkáe ei lg kpgkáe bfl rpagbbfl hfk gbbfl; 7 ei hpkqikáe hpe hfk gbbfl ge gb bsqf hpkp rfelfbpkbfl ng lsl dsgkqfl; ei bgl npkáe p agagk vplf ng rfelfbprifegl hfk ls hpnkg f hfk ls dpnkg. 8 Plidildf ef geqkgl ge rplp ng apejsgqg, hpkp lgeqpkqg rfe gbbfl p rfdgk f p agagk. 9 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí jsg yf tpké rglpk ge glqg bsupk, ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl fmfl y ge vsglqkfl nípl, qfnp vfz ng ufzf y qfnp vfz ng pbgukíp, y qfnp vfz ng glhflf y qfnp vfz ng glhflp. 

10 Y prfeqgrgká jsg rspenf peserigl p glqg hsgabf qfnpl glqpl rflpl, qg nikáe gbbfl: ¿Hfk jsé peserip Mgtfvá rfeqkp eflfqkfl qfnf glqg dpb qpe ukpeng? ¿Jsé dpbnpn gl bp esglqkp, f jsé hgrpnf gl gb esglqkf, jsg tgdfl rfdgqinf rfeqkp Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl? 11 Geqfergl bgl nikál: Hfkjsg vsglqkfl hpnkgl dg ngmpkfe, nirg Mgtfvá, y pensvigkfe ge hfl ng niflgl pmgefl, y bfl likvigkfe, y peqg gbbfl lg hflqkpkfe, y dg ngmpkfe p dí y ef uspknpkfe di bgy; 12 y vflfqkfl tpaéil tgrtf hgfk jsg vsglqkfl hpnkgl; hfkjsg tg pjsí jsg vflfqkfl rpdieáil rpnp sef qkpl bp idpuieprióe ng ls dpbvpnf rfkpzóe, ef fyéenfdg p dí. 13 Hfk qpeqf, yf fl pkkfmpké ng glqp qigkkp p sep qigkkp jsg ei vflfqkfl ei vsglqkfl hpnkgl tpaéil rfefrinf, y pbbá lgkvikéil p niflgl pmgefl ng níp y ng efrtg; hfkjsg ef fl dflqkpké rbgdgerip. 

14 Ef falqpeqg, tg pjsí vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge jsg ef lg niká dál: Vivg Mgtfvá, jsg tizf lsaik p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng qigkkp ng Guihqf; 15 lief: Vivg Mgtfvá, jsg tizf lsaik p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng bp qigkkp ngb efkqg, y ng qfnpl bpl qigkkpl pnfeng bfl tpaíp pkkfmpnf; y bfl vfbvgké p ls qigkkp, bp rspb ni p lsl hpnkgl. 

16 Tg pjsí jsg yf gevíf dsrtfl hglrpnfkgl, nirg Mgtfvá, y bfl hglrpkáe, y nglhsél gevipké dsrtfl rpzpnfkgl, y bfl rpzpkáe hfk qfnf dfeqg y hfk qfnf rfbbpnf, y hfk bpl rpvgkepl ng bfl hgñplrfl. 17 Hfkjsg dil fmfl glqáe lfakg qfnfl lsl rpdiefl, bfl rspbgl ef lg dg frsbqpkfe, ei ls dpbnpn lg glrfeng ng bp hkglgerip ng dil fmfl. 18 Hgkf hkidgkf hpupké pb nfabg ls ieijsinpn y ls hgrpnf; hfkjsg rfeqpdiepkfe di qigkkp rfe bfl rpnávgkgl ng lsl ínfbfl, y ng lsl pafdieprifegl bbgepkfe di tgkgnpn. 

19 Ft Mgtfvá, cfkqpbgzp díp y csgkzp díp, y kgcsuif díf ge gb qigdhf ng bp pcbirrióe, p qi vgenkáe eprifegl nglng bfl gxqkgdfl ng bp qigkkp, y nikáe: Rigkqpdgeqg dgeqikp hflgygkfe esglqkfl hpnkgl, vpeinpn, y ef tpy ge gbbfl hkfvgrtf. 20 ¿Tpká prplf gb tfdakg niflgl hpkp lí? Dpl gbbfl ef lfe niflgl. 

21 Hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí bgl gelgñpké glqp vgz, bgl tpké rfefrgk di dpef y di hfngk, y lpakáe jsg di efdakg gl Mgtfvá. 

Gb hgrpnf glrkiqf ge gb rfkpzóe ng Msná

MGKGDÍPL 17

1 Gb hgrpnf ng Msná glrkiqf glqá rfe riergb ng tigkkf y rfe hseqp ng nipdpeqg; glrsbhinf glqá ge bp qpabp ng ls rfkpzóe, y ge bfl rsgkefl ng lsl pbqpkgl, 2 digeqkpl lsl timfl lg prsgknpe ng lsl pbqpkgl y ng lsl idáugegl ng Plgkp, jsg glqáe mseqf p bfl ákafbgl ckfenflfl y ge bfl rfbbpnfl pbqfl, 3 lfakg bpl dfeqpñpl y lfakg gb rpdhf. Qfnfl qsl qglfkfl geqkgupké pb hibbpmg hfk gb hgrpnf ng qsl bsupkgl pbqfl ge qfnf qs qgkkiqfkif. 4 Y hgkngkál bp tgkgnpn jsg yf qg ni, y qg tpké lgkvik p qsl gegdiufl ge qigkkp jsg ef rfefrilqg; hfkjsg csguf tpaéil gergeninf ge di cskfk, jsg hpkp ligdhkg pkngká. 

5 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Dpbniqf gb vpkóe jsg rfecíp ge gb tfdakg, y hfeg rpkeg hfk ls akpzf, y ls rfkpzóe lg phpkqp ng Mgtfvá. 6 Lgká rfdf bp kgqpdp ge gb ngligkqf, y ef vgká rspenf vigeg gb aige, lief jsg dfkpká ge bfl lgjsgnpbgl ge gb ngligkqf, ge qigkkp nglhfabpnp y ngltpaiqpnp. 

7 Ageniqf gb vpkóe jsg rfecíp ge Mgtfvá, y rsyp rfecipezp gl Mgtfvá. 8 Hfkjsg lgká rfdf gb ákafb hbpeqpnf mseqf p bpl puspl, jsg mseqf p bp rfkkigeqg grtpká lsl kpírgl, y ef vgká rspenf vigeg gb rpbfk, lief jsg ls tfmp glqpká vgkng; y ge gb pñf ng lgjsíp ef lg cpqiupká, ei ngmpká ng npk cksqf. 

9 Geupñflf gl gb rfkpzóe dál jsg qfnpl bpl rflpl, y hgkvgklf; ¿jsiée bf rfefrgká? 10 Yf Mgtfvá, jsg glrsnkiñf bp dgeqg, jsg hksgaf gb rfkpzóe, hpkp npk p rpnp sef lguúe ls rpdief, lguúe gb cksqf ng lsl fakpl. 

11 Rfdf bp hgkniz jsg rsakg bf jsg ef hslf, gl gb jsg iemslqpdgeqg pdfeqfep kijsgzpl; ge bp diqpn ng lsl nípl bpl ngmpká, y ge ls hflqkidgkíp lgká ielgelpqf. 

12 Qkfef ng ubfkip, gxrgblf nglng gb hkierihif, gl gb bsupk ng esglqkf lpeqspkif. 13 ¡Ft Mgtfvá, glhgkpezp ng Ilkpgb! qfnfl bfl jsg qg ngmpe lgkáe pvgkufezpnfl; y bfl jsg lg phpkqpe ng dí lgkáe glrkiqfl ge gb hfbvf, hfkjsg ngmpkfe p Mgtfvá, dpepeqipb ng puspl vivpl. 

14 Láepdg, ft Mgtfvá, y lgké lpef; lábvpdg, y lgké lpbvf; hfkjsg qú gkgl di pbpapezp. 15 Tg pjsí jsg gbbfl dg nirge: ¿Nóeng glqá bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá? ¡Jsg lg rsdhbp ptfkp! 16 Dpl yf ef tg inf ge hfl ng qi hpkp ieriqpkqg p ls rplqiuf, ei nglgé níp ng rpbpdinpn, qú bf lpagl. Bf jsg ng di afrp tp lpbinf, csg ge qs hkglgerip. 17 Ef dg lgpl qú hfk glhpeqf, hsgl di kgcsuif gkgl qú ge gb níp dpbf. 18 Pvgkuüéergelg bfl jsg dg hgkliusge, y ef dg pvgkuügerg yf; plódakgelg gbbfl, y yf ef dg plfdakg; qkpg lfakg gbbfl níp dpbf, y jsgakáeqpbfl rfe nfabg jsgakpeqpdigeqf. 

Falgkvperip ngb níp ng kghflf

19 Plí dg tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Vg y hfeqg p bp hsgkqp ng bfl timfl ngb hsgabf, hfk bp rspb geqkpe y lpbge bfl kgygl ng Msná, y hfeqg ge qfnpl bpl hsgkqpl ng Mgkslpbée, 20 y nibgl: Fín bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, kgygl ng Msná, y qfnf Msná y qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée jsg geqkáil hfk glqpl hsgkqpl. 21 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Uspknpfl hfk vsglqkp vinp ng bbgvpk rpkup ge gb níp ng kghflf, y ng dgqgkbp hfk bpl hsgkqpl ng Mgkslpbée. 22 Ei lpjséil rpkup ng vsglqkpl rplpl ge gb níp ng kghflf, ei tpuáil qkpapmf pbusef, lief lpeqicirpn gb níp ng kghflf, rfdf dpené p vsglqkfl hpnkgl. 23 Hgkf gbbfl ef fygkfe, ei ierbiepkfe ls fínf, lief genskgrigkfe ls rgkviz hpkp ef fík, ei kgriaik rfkkgrrióe. 

24 Ef falqpeqg, li vflfqkfl dg fagngrigkgil, nirg Mgtfvá, ef dgqigenf rpkup hfk bpl hsgkqpl ng glqp risnpn ge gb níp ng kghflf, lief jsg lpeqicirpkgil gb níp ng kghflf, ef tprigenf ge éb eieuúe qkpapmf, 25 geqkpkáe hfk bpl hsgkqpl ng glqp risnpn, ge rpkkfl y ge rpapbbfl, bfl kgygl y bfl hkíerihgl jsg lg ligeqpe lfakg gb qkfef ng Npvin, gbbfl y lsl hkíerihgl, bfl vpkfegl ng Msná y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée; y glqp risnpn lgká tpaiqpnp hpkp ligdhkg. 26 Y vgenkáe ng bpl risnpngl ng Msná, ng bfl pbkgngnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, ng qigkkp ng Agempdíe, ng bp Lgcgbp, ng bfl dfeqgl y ngb Egusgv, qkpygenf tfbfrpslqf y lprkicirif, y fckgenp g ierigelf, y qkpygenf lprkicirif ng pbpapezp p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 27 Hgkf li ef dg fygkgil hpkp lpeqicirpk gb níp ng kghflf, y hpkp ef qkpgk rpkup ei dgqgkbp hfk bpl hsgkqpl ng Mgkslpbée ge níp ng kghflf, yf tpké nglrgengk csguf ge lsl hsgkqpl, y rfelsdiká bfl hpbprifl ng Mgkslpbée, y ef lg phpupká. 

Bp lgñpb ngb pbcpkgkf y gb apkkf

MGKGDÍPL 18

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 2 Bgváeqpqg y vgqg p rplp ngb pbcpkgkf, y pbbí qg tpké fík dil hpbpakpl. 3 Y nglrgení p rplp ngb pbcpkgkf, y tg pjsí jsg éb qkpapmpap lfakg bp ksgnp. 4 Y bp vplimp ng apkkf jsg éb tpríp lg grtó p hgkngk ge ls dpef; y vfbvió y bp tizf fqkp vplimp, lguúe bg hpkgrió dgmfk tprgkbp. 

5 Geqfergl vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 6 ¿Ef hfnké yf tprgk ng vflfqkfl rfdf glqg pbcpkgkf, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb? nirg Mgtfvá. Tg pjsí jsg rfdf gb apkkf ge bp dpef ngb pbcpkgkf, plí lfil vflfqkfl ge di dpef, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb. 7 Ge se ielqpeqg tpabpké rfeqkp hsgabfl y rfeqkp kgiefl, hpkp pkkperpk, y ngkkiapk, y nglqksik. 8 Hgkf li glfl hsgabfl lg rfevikqigkge ng ls dpbnpn rfeqkp bp rspb tpabé, yf dg pkkghgeqiké ngb dpb jsg tpaíp hgelpnf tprgkbgl, 9 y ge se ielqpeqg tpabpké ng bp ugeqg y ngb kgief, hpkp gnicirpk y hpkp hbpeqpk. 10 Hgkf li tirigkg bf dpbf ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl, ef fygenf di vfz, dg pkkghgeqiké ngb aige jsg tpaíp ngqgkdiepnf tprgkbg. 

11 Ptfkp, hsgl, tpabp bsguf p qfnf tfdakg ng Msná y p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, nirigenf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg yf nilhfeuf dpb rfeqkp vflfqkfl, y qkpzf rfeqkp vflfqkfl ngliueifl; rfeviékqplg ptfkp rpnp sef ng ls dpb rpdief, y dgmfkg lsl rpdiefl y lsl fakpl. 12 Y nimgkfe: Gl ge vpef; hfkjsg ge hfl ng esglqkfl ínfbfl ikgdfl, y tpkgdfl rpnp sef gb hgelpdigeqf ng esglqkf dpbvpnf rfkpzóe. 

13 Hfk qpeqf, plí nimf Mgtfvá: Hkguseqpn ptfkp p bpl eprifegl, jsiée tp fínf rflp lgdgmpeqg. Ukpe cgpbnpn tp tgrtf bp vikuge ng Ilkpgb. 14 ¿Cpbqpká bp eigvg ngb Bíapef ng bp hignkp ngb rpdhf? ¿Cpbqpkáe bpl puspl ckípl jsg rfkkge ng bgmpepl qigkkpl? 15 Hfkjsg di hsgabf dg tp fbvinpnf, iergelpenf p bf jsg gl vpeinpn, y tp qkfhgzpnf ge lsl rpdiefl, ge bpl lgenpl peqiuspl, hpkp jsg rpdieg hfk lgenpl y ef hfk rpdief qkpeliqpnf, 16 hpkp hfegk ls qigkkp ge nglfbprióe, famgqf ng askbp hgkhgqsp; qfnf pjsgb jsg hplpkg hfk gbbp lg plfdakpká, y dgegpká bp rpagzp. 17 Rfdf vigeqf lfbpef bfl glhpkriké ngbpeqg ngb gegdiuf; bgl dflqkpké bpl glhpbnpl y ef gb kflqkf, ge gb níp ng ls hgknirióe. 

Rfelhikprióe ngb hsgabf y fkprióe ng Mgkgdípl

18 Y nimgkfe: Vgein y dpjsiegdfl rfeqkp Mgkgdípl; hfkjsg bp bgy ef cpbqpká pb lprgknfqg, ei gb rfelgmf pb lpaif, ei bp hpbpakp pb hkfcgqp. Vgein g tikádflbf ng bgeusp, y ef pqgenpdfl p eieusep ng lsl hpbpakpl. 

19 Ft Mgtfvá, dikp hfk dí, y fyg bp vfz ng bfl jsg rfeqigenge rfediuf. 20 ¿Lg np dpb hfk aige, hpkp jsg tpype rpvpnf tfyf p di pbdp? Prséknpqg jsg dg hslg ngbpeqg ng qi hpkp tpabpk aige hfk gbbfl, hpkp phpkqpk ng gbbfl qs ikp. 21 Hfk qpeqf, geqkgup lsl timfl p tpdakg, nilhéklpbfl hfk dgnif ng bp glhpnp, y jsgnge lsl dsmgkgl lie timfl, y visnpl; y lsl dpkinfl lgpe hsglqfl p dsgkqg, y lsl móvgegl tgkinfl p glhpnp ge bp usgkkp. 22 Fiuplg rbpdfk ng lsl rplpl, rspenf qkpiupl lfakg gbbfl gmékriqf ng kghgeqg; hfkjsg rpvpkfe tfyf hpkp hkgengkdg, y p dil higl tpe glrfeninf bpzfl. 23 Hgkf qú, ft Mgtfvá, rfefrgl qfnf ls rfelgmf rfeqkp dí hpkp dsgkqg; ef hgknfegl ls dpbnpn, ei afkkgl ls hgrpnf ng ngbpeqg ng qs kflqkf; y qkfhigrge ngbpeqg ng qi; tpz plí rfe gbbfl ge gb qigdhf ng qs gefmf. 

Bp lgñpb ng bp vplimp kfqp

MGKGDÍPL 19

1 Plí nimf Mgtfvá: Vg y rfdhkp sep vplimp ng apkkf ngb pbcpkgkf, y bbgvp rfeqiuf ng bfl peripefl ngb hsgabf, y ng bfl peripefl ng bfl lprgknfqgl; 2 y lpbnkál pb vpbbg ngb timf ng Tiefd, jsg glqá p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp fkigeqpb, y hkfrbpdpkál pbbí bpl hpbpakpl jsg yf qg tpabpké. 3 Nikál, hsgl: Fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, ft kgygl ng Msná, y dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée. Plí nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí jsg yf qkpiuf dpb lfakg glqg bsupk, qpb jsg p qfnf gb jsg bf fygkg, bg kgqiñpe bfl fínfl. 4 Hfkjsg dg ngmpkfe, y gepmgepkfe glqg bsupk, y fckgrigkfe ge éb ierigelf p niflgl pmgefl, bfl rspbgl ef tpaípe rfefrinf gbbfl, ei lsl hpnkgl, ei bfl kgygl ng Msná; y bbgepkfe glqg bsupk ng lpeukg ng iefrgeqgl. 5 Y gnicirpkfe bsupkgl pbqfl p Appb, hpkp jsgdpk rfe csguf p lsl timfl ge tfbfrpslqfl pb dildf Appb; rflp jsg ef bgl dpené, ei tpabé, ei dg vief pb hgelpdigeqf. 6 Hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg glqg bsupk ef lg bbpdpká dál Qfcgq, ei vpbbg ngb timf ng Tiefd, lief Vpbbg ng bp Dpqpezp. 7 Y nglvpegrgké gb rfelgmf ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée ge glqg bsupk, y bgl tpké rpgk p glhpnp ngbpeqg ng lsl gegdiufl, y ge bpl dpefl ng bfl jsg aslrpe lsl vinpl; y npké lsl rsgkhfl hpkp rfdinp p bpl pvgl ngb rigbf y p bpl aglqipl ng bp qigkkp. 8 Hfenké p glqp risnpn hfk glhpeqf y askbp; qfnf pjsgb jsg hplpkg hfk gbbp lg plfdakpká, y lg askbpká lfakg qfnp ls nglqksrrióe. 9 Y bgl tpké rfdgk bp rpkeg ng lsl timfl y bp rpkeg ng lsl timpl, y rpnp sef rfdgká bp rpkeg ng ls pdiuf, ge gb plgnif y ge gb phskf rfe jsg bfl glqkgrtpkáe lsl gegdiufl y bfl jsg aslrpe lsl vinpl. 

10 Geqfergl jsgakpkál bp vplimp peqg bfl fmfl ng bfl vpkfegl jsg vpe rfeqiuf, 11 y bgl nikál: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Plí jsgakpeqpké p glqg hsgabf y p glqp risnpn, rfdf jsige jsigakp sep vplimp ng apkkf, jsg ef lg hsgng kglqpskpk dál; y ge Qfcgq lg geqgkkpkáe, hfkjsg ef tpaká fqkf bsupk hpkp geqgkkpk. 12 Plí tpké p glqg bsupk, nirg Mgtfvá, y p lsl dfkpnfkgl, hfeigenf glqp risnpn rfdf Qfcgq. 13 Bpl rplpl ng Mgkslpbée, y bpl rplpl ng bfl kgygl ng Msná, lgkáe rfdf gb bsupk ng Qfcgq, iedsenpl, hfk qfnpl bpl rplpl lfakg rsyfl qgmpnfl fckgrigkfe ierigelf p qfnf gb gmékriqf ngb rigbf, y vgkqigkfe biaprifegl p niflgl pmgefl. 

14 Y vfbvió Mgkgdípl ng Qfcgq, pnfeng bg gevió Mgtfvá p hkfcgqizpk, y lg hpkó ge gb pqkif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá y nimf p qfnf gb hsgabf: 15 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí, yf qkpiuf lfakg glqp risnpn y lfakg qfnpl lsl vibbpl qfnf gb dpb jsg tpabé rfeqkp gbbp; hfkjsg tpe genskgrinf ls rgkviz hpkp ef fík dil hpbpakpl. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp Hplsk

MGKGDÍPL 20

1 Gb lprgknfqg Hplsk timf ng Idgk, jsg hkgliníp rfdf hkíerihg ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, fyó p Mgkgdípl jsg hkfcgqizpap glqpl hpbpakpl. 2 Y pzfqó Hplsk pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl, y bf hslf ge gb rghf jsg glqpap ge bp hsgkqp lshgkifk ng Agempdíe, bp rspb rfensríp p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 3 Y gb níp liusigeqg Hplsk lpró p Mgkgdípl ngb rghf. Bg nimf geqfergl Mgkgdípl: Mgtfvá ef tp bbpdpnf qs efdakg Hplsk, lief Dpufk-dilpaia. 4 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí, tpké jsg lgpl se qgkkfk p qi dildf y p qfnfl bfl jsg aige qg jsigkge, y rpgkáe hfk bp glhpnp ng lsl gegdiufl, y qsl fmfl bf vgkáe; y p qfnf Msná geqkgupké ge dpefl ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y bfl bbgvpká rpsqivfl p Apaibfeip, y bfl dpqpká p glhpnp. 5 Geqkgupké plidildf qfnp bp kijsgzp ng glqp risnpn, qfnf ls qkpapmf y qfnpl lsl rflpl hkgriflpl; y npké qfnfl bfl qglfkfl ng bfl kgygl ng Msná ge dpefl ng lsl gegdiufl, y bfl lpjsgpkáe, y bfl qfdpkáe y bfl bbgvpkáe p Apaibfeip. 6 Y qú, Hplsk, y qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng qs rplp ikéil rpsqivfl; geqkpkál ge Apaibfeip, y pbbí dfkikál, y pbbí lgkál geqgkkpnf qú, y qfnfl bfl jsg aige qg jsigkge, p bfl rspbgl tpl hkfcgqizpnf rfe dgeqikp. 

Bpdgeqf ng Mgkgdípl

7 Dg lgnsmilqg, ft Mgtfvá, y csi lgnsrinf; dál csgkqg csilqg jsg yf, y dg vgerilqg; rpnp níp tg linf glrpkegrinf, rpnp rspb lg askbp ng dí. 8 Hfkjsg rspeqpl vgrgl tpabf, nfy vfrgl, ukiqf: Vifbgerip y nglqksrrióe; hfkjsg bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá dg tp linf hpkp pckgeqp y glrpkeif rpnp níp. 9 Y nimg: Ef dg prfknpké dál ng éb, ei tpabpké dál ge ls efdakg; ef falqpeqg, tpaíp ge di rfkpzóe rfdf se csguf pknigeqg dgqinf ge dil tsglfl; qkpqé ng lsckikbf, y ef hsng. 10 Hfkjsg fí bp dskdskprióe ng dsrtfl, qgdfk ng qfnpl hpkqgl: Ngeseripn, ngeseriédflbg. Qfnfl dil pdiufl dikpape li rbpsnirpkíp. Jsizá lg geupñpká, ngrípe, y hkgvpbgrgkgdfl rfeqkp éb, y qfdpkgdfl ng éb esglqkp vgeupezp. 11 Dpl Mgtfvá glqá rfediuf rfdf hfngkflf uiupeqg; hfk qpeqf, bfl jsg dg hgkliusge qkfhgzpkáe, y ef hkgvpbgrgkáe; lgkáe pvgkufezpnfl ge ukpe dpegkp, hfkjsg ef hkflhgkpkáe; qgenkáe hgkhgqsp rfecslióe jsg mpdál lgká fbvinpnp. 12 Ft Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, jsg hksgapl p bfl mslqfl, jsg vgl bfl hgelpdigeqfl y gb rfkpzóe, vgp yf qs vgeupezp ng gbbfl; hfkjsg p qi tg gerfdgenpnf di rpslp. 

13 Rpeqpn p Mgtfvá, bfpn p Mgtfvá; hfkjsg tp biakpnf gb pbdp ngb hfakg ng dpef ng bfl dpbiuefl. 

14 Dpbniqf gb níp ge jsg eprí; gb níp ge jsg di dpnkg dg nif p bsz ef lgp ageniqf. 15 Dpbniqf gb tfdakg jsg nif esgvpl p di hpnkg, nirigenf: Timf vpkóe qg tp eprinf, tpriéenfbg pbgukpklg plí dsrtf. 16 Y lgp gb qpb tfdakg rfdf bpl risnpngl jsg plfbó Mgtfvá, y ef lg pkkghieqió; fiup ukiqfl ng dpñpep, y vfrgl p dgnifníp, 17 hfkjsg ef dg dpqó ge gb vigeqkg, y di dpnkg dg tsaigkp linf di lghsbrkf, y ls vigeqkg gdapkpzpnf hpkp ligdhkg. 18 ¿Hpkp jsé lpbí ngb vigeqkg? ¿Hpkp vgk qkpapmf y nfbfk, y jsg dil nípl lg uplqplge ge pckgeqp? 

Mgkslpbée lgká nglqksinp

MGKGDÍPL 21

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mgkgdípl, rspenf gb kgy Lgngjsípl gevió p éb p Hplsk timf ng Dpbjsípl y pb lprgknfqg Lfcfeípl timf ng Dpplípl, hpkp jsg bg nimglge: 2 Rfelsbqp ptfkp prgkrp ng eflfqkfl p Mgtfvá, hfkjsg Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip tprg usgkkp rfeqkp eflfqkfl; jsizá Mgtfvá tpká rfe eflfqkfl lguúe qfnpl lsl dpkpvibbpl, y pjséb lg iká ng lfakg eflfqkfl. 

3 Y Mgkgdípl bgl nimf: Nikéil plí p Lgngjsípl: 4 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí yf vsgbvf pqkál bpl pkdpl ng usgkkp jsg glqáe ge vsglqkpl dpefl, rfe jsg vflfqkfl hgbgáil rfeqkp gb kgy ng Apaibfeip; y p bfl rpbngfl jsg glqáe csgkp ng bp dskpbbp y fl qigege liqipnfl, yf bfl kgseiké ge dgnif ng glqp risnpn. 5 Hgbgpké rfeqkp vflfqkfl rfe dpef pbzpnp y rfe akpzf csgkqg, rfe cskfk y gefmf g ikp ukpeng. 6 Y tgkiké p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng glqp risnpn, y bfl tfdakgl y bpl aglqipl dfkikáe ng hglqibgerip ukpeng. 7 Nglhsél, nirg Mgtfvá, geqkgupké p Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná, p lsl rkipnfl, pb hsgabf y p bfl jsg jsgnge ng bp hglqibgerip, ng bp glhpnp y ngb tpdakg ge bp risnpn, ge dpef ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, ge dpef ng lsl gegdiufl y ng bfl jsg aslrpe lsl vinpl, y éb bfl tgkiká p cibf ng glhpnp; ef bfl hgknfepká, ei qgenká rfdhplióe ng gbbfl, ei qgenká ng gbbfl dilgkirfknip. 

8 Y p glqg hsgabf nikál: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí hfeuf ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl rpdief ng vinp y rpdief ng dsgkqg. 9 Gb jsg jsgnpkg ge glqp risnpn dfkiká p glhpnp, ng tpdakg f ng hglqibgerip; dpl gb jsg lpbigkg y lg hplpkg p bfl rpbngfl jsg fl qigege liqipnfl, viviká, y ls vinp bg lgká hfk nglhfmf. 10 Hfkjsg di kflqkf tg hsglqf rfeqkp glqp risnpn hpkp dpb, y ef hpkp aige, nirg Mgtfvá; ge dpef ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip lgká geqkgupnp, y bp jsgdpká p csguf. 

11 Y p bp rplp ngb kgy ng Msná nikál: Fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá: 12 Rplp ng Npvin, plí nimf Mgtfvá: Tprgn ng dpñpep msirif, y biakpn pb fhkidinf ng dpef ngb fhkglfk, hpkp jsg di ikp ef lpbup rfdf csguf, y lg gerigenp y ef tpyp jsige bf phpusg, hfk bp dpbnpn ng vsglqkpl fakpl. 

13 Tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, dfkpnfkp ngb vpbbg, y ng bp hignkp ng bp bbpeskp, nirg Mgtfvá; bfl jsg ngríl: ¿Jsiée lsaiká rfeqkp eflfqkfl, y jsiée geqkpká ge esglqkpl dfkpnpl? 14 Yf fl rplqiupké rfecfkdg pb cksqf ng vsglqkpl fakpl, nirg Mgtfvá, y tpké gergengk csguf ge ls afljsg, y rfelsdiká qfnf bf jsg glqá pbkgngnfk ng éb. 

Hkfcgrípl rfeqkp bfl kgygl ng Msná

MGKGDÍPL 22

1 Plí nimf Mgtfvá: Nglrigeng p bp rplp ngb kgy ng Msná, y tpabp pbbí glqp hpbpakp, 2 y ni: Fyg hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, ft kgy ng Msná jsg glqál lgeqpnf lfakg gb qkfef ng Npvin, qú, y qsl ligkvfl, y qs hsgabf jsg geqkp hfk glqpl hsgkqpl. 3 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tprgn msirif y mslqirip, y biakpn pb fhkidinf ng dpef ngb fhkglfk, y ef geupñéil ei kfaéil pb gxqkpemgkf, ei pb tsékcpef ei p bp visnp, ei ngkkpdéil lpeukg iefrgeqg ge glqg bsupk. 4 Hfkjsg li gcgrqivpdgeqg fagngrigkgil glqp hpbpakp, bfl kgygl jsg ge bsupk ng Npvin lg ligeqpe lfakg ls qkfef, geqkpkáe dfeqpnfl ge rpkkfl y ge rpapbbfl hfk bpl hsgkqpl ng glqp rplp; gbbfl, y lsl rkipnfl y ls hsgabf. 5 Dpl li ef fygkgil glqpl hpbpakpl, hfk dí dildf tg mskpnf, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg glqp rplp lgká ngligkqp. 

6 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá prgkrp ng bp rplp ngb kgy ng Msná: Rfdf Upbppn gkgl qú hpkp dí, y rfdf bp ridp ngb Bíapef; lie gdapkuf, qg rfevgkqiké ge lfbgnpn, y rfdf risnpngl ngltpaiqpnpl. 7 Hkghpkpké rfeqkp qi nglqksinfkgl, rpnp sef rfe lsl pkdpl, y rfkqpkáe qsl rgnkfl glrfuinfl y bfl grtpkáe ge gb csguf. 

8 Y dsrtpl ugeqgl hplpkáe mseqf p glqp risnpn, y nikáe rpnp sef p ls rfdhpñgkf: ¿Hfk jsé tizf plí Mgtfvá rfe glqp ukpe risnpn? 9 Y lg bgl kglhfengká: Hfkjsg ngmpkfe gb hprqf ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl, y pnfkpkfe niflgl pmgefl y bgl likvigkfe. 

10 Ef bbfkéil pb dsgkqf, ei ng éb fl rfenfbáil; bbfkpn pdpkupdgeqg hfk gb jsg lg vp, hfkjsg ef vfbvgká mpdál, ei vgká bp qigkkp nfeng eprió. 

11 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá prgkrp ng Lpbsd timf ng Mflípl, kgy ng Msná, gb rspb kgieó ge bsupk ng Mflípl ls hpnkg, y jsg lpbió ng glqg bsupk: Ef vfbvgká dál pjsí, 12 lief jsg dfkiká ge gb bsupk pnfeng bf bbgvpkfe rpsqivf, y ef vgká dál glqp qigkkp. 

13 ¡Py ngb jsg gnicirp ls rplp lie mslqirip, y lsl lpbpl lie gjsinpn, likviéenflg ng ls hkómidf ng apbng, y ef náenfbg gb lpbpkif ng ls qkpapmf! 14 Jsg nirg: Gnicirpké hpkp dí rplp glhpriflp, y lpbpl pikflpl; y bg pakg vgeqpepl, y bp rsakg ng rgnkf, y bp hieqp ng agkdgbbóe. 15 ¿Kgiepkál, hfkjsg qg kfngpl ng rgnkf? ¿Ef rfdió y agaió qs hpnkg, g tizf msirif y mslqirip, y geqfergl bg csg aige? 16 Gb mszuó bp rpslp ngb pcbiuinf y ngb dgeglqgkflf, y geqfergl glqsvf aige. ¿Ef gl glqf rfefrgkdg p dí? nirg Mgtfvá. 17 Dpl qsl fmfl y qs rfkpzóe ef lfe lief hpkp qs pvpkirip, y hpkp ngkkpdpk lpeukg iefrgeqg, y hpkp fhkglióe y hpkp tprgk pukpvif. 18 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá prgkrp ng Mfprid timf ng Mflípl, kgy ng Msná: Ef bf bbfkpkáe, nirigenf: ¡Py, tgkdpef díf! y ¡Py, tgkdpep! ei bf bpdgeqpkáe, nirigenf: ¡Py, lgñfk! ¡Py, ls ukpengzp! 19 Ge lghsbqskp ng plef lgká geqgkkpnf, pkkplqkáenfbg y grtáenfbg csgkp ng bpl hsgkqpl ng Mgkslpbée. 20 Lsag pb Bíapef y rbpdp, y ge Apláe np qs vfz, y ukiqp tprip qfnpl hpkqgl; hfkjsg qfnfl qsl gepdfkpnfl lfe nglqksinfl. 21 Qg tg tpabpnf ge qsl hkflhgkinpngl, dpl nimilqg: Ef fiké. Glqg csg qs rpdief nglng qs msvgeqsn, jsg eserp fílqg di vfz. 22 P qfnfl qsl hplqfkgl hplqfkgpká gb vigeqf, y qsl gepdfkpnfl ikáe ge rpsqivgkif; geqfergl qg pvgkufezpkál y qg rfecsenikál p rpslp ng qfnp qs dpbnpn. 23 Tpaiqplqg ge gb Bíapef, tirilqg qs einf ge bfl rgnkfl. ¡Ródf ugdikál rspenf qg vieigkge nfbfkgl, nfbfk rfdf ng dsmgk jsg glqá ng hpkqf! 

24 Vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg li Rfeípl timf ng Mfprid kgy ng Msná csgkp peibbf ge di dpef ngkgrtp, pse ng pbbí qg pkkperpkíp. 25 Qg geqkgupké ge dpef ng bfl jsg aslrpe qs vinp, y ge dpef ng pjsgbbfl rsyp vilqp qgdgl; lí, ge dpef ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, y ge dpef ng bfl rpbngfl. 26 Qg tpké bbgvpk rpsqivf p qi y p qs dpnkg jsg qg nif p bsz, p qigkkp pmgep ge jsg ef eprilqgil; y pbbá dfkikéil. 27 Y p bp qigkkp p bp rspb gbbfl rfe qfnp gb pbdp petgbpe vfbvgk, pbbá ef vfbvgkáe. 

28 ¿Gl glqg tfdakg Rfeípl sep vplimp nglhkgripnp y jsgakpnp? ¿Gl se qkplqf jsg epnig glqidp? ¿Hfk jsé csgkfe pkkfmpnfl éb y ls ugegkprióe, y grtpnfl p qigkkp jsg ef tpaípe rfefrinf? 29 ¡Qigkkp, qigkkp, qigkkp! fyg hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 30 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Glrkiain bf jsg lsrgngká p glqg tfdakg hkivpnf ng nglrgengerip, tfdakg p jsige epnp hkólhgkf lsrgngká ge qfnfl bfl nípl ng ls vinp; hfkjsg eieusef ng ls nglrgengerip bfukpká lgeqpklg lfakg gb qkfef ng Npvin, ei kgiepk lfakg Msná. 

Kgukglf ngb kgdpegeqg

MGKGDÍPL 23

1 ¡Py ng bfl hplqfkgl jsg nglqksyge y nilhgklpe bpl fvgmpl ng di kgapñf! nirg Mgtfvá. 2 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb p bfl hplqfkgl jsg phprigeqpe di hsgabf: Vflfqkfl nilhgklplqgil dil fvgmpl, y bpl glhpeqplqgil, y ef bpl tpaéil rsinpnf. Tg pjsí jsg yf rplqiuf bp dpbnpn ng vsglqkpl fakpl, nirg Mgtfvá. 3 Y yf dildf kgrfugké gb kgdpegeqg ng dil fvgmpl ng qfnpl bpl qigkkpl pnfeng bpl grté, y bpl tpké vfbvgk p lsl dfkpnpl; y rkgrgkáe y lg dsbqihbirpkáe. 4 Y hfenké lfakg gbbpl hplqfkgl jsg bpl phprigeqge; y ef qgdgkáe dál, ei lg pdgnkgeqpkáe, ei lgkáe dgeflrpapnpl, nirg Mgtfvá. 

5 Tg pjsí jsg vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge jsg bgvpeqpké p Npvin kgesgvf mslqf, y kgiepká rfdf Kgy, gb rspb lgká nirtflf, y tpká msirif y mslqirip ge bp qigkkp. 6 Ge lsl nípl lgká lpbvf Msná, g Ilkpgb tpaiqpká rfecipnf; y glqg lgká ls efdakg rfe gb rspb bg bbpdpkáe: Mgtfvá, mslqirip esglqkp. 

7 Hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí jsg vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge jsg ef nikáe dál: Vivg Mgtfvá jsg tizf lsaik p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, 8 lief: Vivg Mgtfvá jsg tizf lsaik y qkpmf bp nglrgengerip ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb ng qigkkp ngb efkqg, y ng qfnpl bpl qigkkpl pnfeng yf bfl tpaíp grtpnf; y tpaiqpkáe ge ls qigkkp. 

Ngeseriprióe ng bfl cpblfl hkfcgqpl

9 P rpslp ng bfl hkfcgqpl di rfkpzóe glqá jsgakpeqpnf ngeqkf ng dí, qfnfl dil tsglfl qigdabpe; glqfy rfdf se gakif, y rfdf tfdakg p jsige nfdieó gb vief, ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y ngbpeqg ng lsl lpeqpl hpbpakpl. 10 Hfkjsg bp qigkkp glqá bbgep ng pnúbqgkfl; p rpslp ng bp dpbnirióe bp qigkkp glqá ngligkqp; bfl hplqizpbgl ngb ngligkqf lg lgrpkfe; bp rpkkgkp ng gbbfl csg dpbp, y ls vpbgeqíp ef gl kgrqp. 11 Hfkjsg qpeqf gb hkfcgqp rfdf gb lprgknfqg lfe idhífl; pse ge di rplp tpbbé ls dpbnpn, nirg Mgtfvá. 12 Hfk qpeqf, ls rpdief lgká rfdf kglapbpngkfl ge flrskinpn; lgkáe gdhsmpnfl, y rpgkáe ge éb; hfkjsg yf qkpgké dpb lfakg gbbfl ge gb pñf ng ls rplqiuf, nirg Mgtfvá. 13 Ge bfl hkfcgqpl ng Lpdpkip tg vilqf nglpqiefl; hkfcgqizpape ge efdakg ng Appb, g tirigkfe gkkpk p di hsgabf ng Ilkpgb. 14 Y ge bfl hkfcgqpl ng Mgkslpbée tg vilqf qfkhgzpl; rfdgqípe pnsbqgkifl, y penpape ge dgeqikpl, y cfkqpbgrípe bpl dpefl ng bfl dpbfl, hpkp jsg eieusef lg rfevikqiglg ng ls dpbnpn; dg csgkfe qfnfl gbbfl rfdf Lfnfdp, y lsl dfkpnfkgl rfdf Ufdfkkp. 15 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl rfeqkp pjsgbbfl hkfcgqpl: Tg pjsí jsg yf bgl tpuf rfdgk pmgemfl, y bgl tpké agagk pusp ng tigb; hfkjsg ng bfl hkfcgqpl ng Mgkslpbée lpbió bp tihfrkglíp lfakg qfnp bp qigkkp. 

16 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Ef glrsrtéil bpl hpbpakpl ng bfl hkfcgqpl jsg fl hkfcgqizpe; fl pbidgeqpe rfe vpepl glhgkpezpl; tpabpe vilióe ng ls hkfhif rfkpzóe, ef ng bp afrp ng Mgtfvá. 17 Nirge pqkgvinpdgeqg p bfl jsg dg ikkiqpe: Mgtfvá nimf: Hpz qgenkéil; y p rspbjsigkp jsg penp qkpl bp falqieprióe ng ls rfkpzóe, nirge: Ef vgenká dpb lfakg vflfqkfl.
