18 Hfkjsg ¿jsiée glqsvf ge gb lgrkgqf ng Mgtfvá, y vif, y fyó ls hpbpakp? ¿Jsiée glqsvf pqgeqf p ls hpbpakp, y bp fyó? 19 Tg pjsí jsg bp qgdhglqpn ng Mgtfvá lpbnká rfe cskfk; y bp qgdhglqpn jsg glqá hkghpkpnp rpgká lfakg bp rpagzp ng bfl dpbfl. 20 Ef lg phpkqpká gb cskfk ng Mgtfvá tplqp jsg bf tpyp tgrtf, y tplqp jsg tpyp rsdhbinf bfl hgelpdigeqfl ng ls rfkpzóe; ge bfl hflqkgkfl nípl bf geqgengkéil rsdhbinpdgeqg. 

21 Ef gevié yf pjsgbbfl hkfcgqpl, hgkf gbbfl rfkkípe; yf ef bgl tpabé, dpl gbbfl hkfcgqizpape. 22 Hgkf li gbbfl tsaigkpe glqpnf ge di lgrkgqf, tpakípe tgrtf fík dil hpbpakpl p di hsgabf, y bf tpakípe tgrtf vfbvgk ng ls dpb rpdief, y ng bp dpbnpn ng lsl fakpl. 

23 ¿Lfy yf Nifl ng rgkrp lfbpdgeqg, nirg Mgtfvá, y ef Nifl nglng dsy bgmfl? 24 ¿Lg frsbqpká pbusef, nirg Mgtfvá, ge glrfenkimfl jsg yf ef bf vgp? ¿Ef bbgef yf, nirg Mgtfvá, gb rigbf y bp qigkkp? 25 Yf tg fínf bf jsg pjsgbbfl hkfcgqpl nimgkfe, hkfcgqizpenf dgeqikp ge di efdakg, nirigenf: Lfñé, lfñé. 26 ¿Tplqp rsáenf glqpká glqf ge gb rfkpzóe ng bfl hkfcgqpl jsg hkfcgqizpe dgeqikp, y jsg hkfcgqizpe gb geupñf ng ls rfkpzóe? 27 ¿Ef higelpe ródf tprge jsg di hsgabf lg fbving ng di efdakg rfe lsl lsgñfl jsg rpnp sef rsgeqp p ls rfdhpñgkf, pb dfnf jsg lsl hpnkgl lg fbvinpkfe ng di efdakg hfk Appb? 28 Gb hkfcgqp jsg qsvigkg se lsgñf, rsgeqg gb lsgñf; y pjsgb p jsige csgkg di hpbpakp, rsgeqg di hpbpakp vgknpngkp. ¿Jsé qigeg jsg vgk bp hpmp rfe gb qkiuf? nirg Mgtfvá. 29 ¿Ef gl di hpbpakp rfdf csguf, nirg Mgtfvá, y rfdf dpkqibbf jsg jsgakpeqp bp hignkp? 30 Hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí jsg yf glqfy rfeqkp bfl hkfcgqpl, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg tskqpe dil hpbpakpl rpnp sef ng ls dál rgkrpef. 31 Nirg Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg yf glqfy rfeqkp bfl hkfcgqpl jsg gensbzpe lsl bgeuspl y nirge: Gb tp nirtf. 32  Tg pjsí, nirg Mgtfvá, yf glqfy rfeqkp bfl jsg hkfcgqizpe lsgñfl dgeqikflfl, y bfl rsgeqpe, y tprge gkkpk p di hsgabf rfe lsl dgeqikpl y rfe lsl bilfempl, y yf ef bfl gevié ei bgl dpené; y eieuúe hkfvgrtf tirigkfe p glqg hsgabf, nirg Mgtfvá. 

33 Y rspenf qg hkguseqpkg glqg hsgabf, f gb hkfcgqp, f gb lprgknfqg, nirigenf: ¿Rsáb gl bp hkfcgríp ng Mgtfvá? bgl nikál: Glqp gl bp hkfcgríp: Fl ngmpké, tp nirtf Mgtfvá. 34 Y pb hkfcgqp, pb lprgknfqg f pb hsgabf jsg nimgkg: Hkfcgríp ng Mgtfvá, yf gevipké rplqiuf lfakg qpb tfdakg y lfakg ls rplp. 35 Plí nikéil rpnp rspb p ls rfdhpñgkf, y rpnp rspb p ls tgkdpef: ¿Jsé tp kglhfeninf Mgtfvá, y jsé tpabó Mgtfvá? 36 Y eserp dál fl vgenká p bp dgdfkip ngrik: Hkfcgríp ng Mgtfvá; hfkjsg bp hpbpakp ng rpnp sef bg lgká hfk hkfcgríp; hsgl hgkvgkqilqgil bpl hpbpakpl ngb Nifl vivigeqg, ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl esglqkf. 37 Plí nikál pb hkfcgqp: ¿Jsé qg kglhfenió Mgtfvá, y jsé tpabó Mgtfvá? 38 Dpl li nimgkgil: Hkfcgríp ng Mgtfvá; hfk glf Mgtfvá nirg plí: Hfkjsg nimilqgil glqp hpbpakp, Hkfcgríp ng Mgtfvá, tpaigenf yf gevipnf p ngrikfl: Ef niuáil: Hkfcgríp ng Mgtfvá, 39 hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí jsg yf fl grtpké ge fbvinf, y pkkperpké ng di hkglgerip p vflfqkfl y p bp risnpn jsg ni p vflfqkfl y p vsglqkfl hpnkgl; 40 y hfenké lfakg vflfqkfl pckgeqp hgkhgqsp, y gqgkep rfecslióe jsg eserp afkkpká gb fbvinf. 

Bp lgñpb ng bfl tiufl asgefl y dpbfl

MGKGDÍPL 24

1 Nglhsél ng tpagk qkpelhfkqpnf Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip p Mgrfeípl timf ng Mfprid, kgy ng Msná, p bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná y bfl pkqglpefl y tgkkgkfl ng Mgkslpbée, y tpagkbfl bbgvpnf p Apaibfeip, dg dflqkó Mgtfvá nfl rglqpl ng tiufl hsglqpl ngbpeqg ngb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá. 2 Sep rglqp qgeíp tiufl dsy asgefl, rfdf akgvpl; y bp fqkp rglqp qgeíp tiufl dsy dpbfl, jsg ng dpbfl ef lg hfnípe rfdgk. 3 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: ¿Jsé vgl qú, Mgkgdípl? Y nimg: Tiufl; tiufl asgefl, dsy asgefl; y dpbfl, dsy dpbfl, jsg ng dpbfl ef lg hsgnge rfdgk. 

4 Y vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 5 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Rfdf p glqfl tiufl asgefl, plí dikpké p bfl qkpelhfkqpnfl ng Msná, p bfl rspbgl grté ng glqg bsupk p bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl, hpkp aige. 6 Hfkjsg hfenké dil fmfl lfakg gbbfl hpkp aige, y bfl vfbvgké p glqp qigkkp, y bfl gnicirpké, y ef bfl nglqksiké; bfl hbpeqpké y ef bfl pkkperpké. 7 Y bgl npké rfkpzóe hpkp jsg dg rfefzrpe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá; y dg lgkáe hfk hsgabf, y yf bgl lgké p gbbfl hfk Nifl; hfkjsg lg vfbvgkáe p dí ng qfnf ls rfkpzóe. 

8 Y rfdf bfl tiufl dpbfl, jsg ng dpbfl ef lg hsgnge rfdgk, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá, hfenké p Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná, p lsl hkíerihgl y pb kglqf ng Mgkslpbée jsg jsgnó ge glqp qigkkp, y p bfl jsg dfkpe ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 9 Y bfl npké hfk glrpkeif y hfk dpb p qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bp qigkkp; hfk iecpdip, hfk gmgdhbf, hfk kgckáe y hfk dpbnirióe p qfnfl bfl bsupkgl pnfeng yf bfl pkkfmg. 10 Y gevipké lfakg gbbfl glhpnp, tpdakg y hglqibgerip, tplqp jsg lgpe gxqgkdiepnfl ng bp qigkkp jsg bgl ni p gbbfl y p lsl hpnkgl. 

Lgqgeqp pñfl ng nglfbprióe

MGKGDÍPL 25

1 Hpbpakp jsg vief p Mgkgdípl prgkrp ng qfnf gb hsgabf ng Msná ge gb pñf rspkqf ng Mfprid timf ng Mflípl, kgy ng Msná, gb rspb gkp gb pñf hkidgkf ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip; 2 bp rspb tpabó gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl p qfnf gb hsgabf ng Msná y p qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, nirigenf: 3 Nglng gb pñf qkgrg ng Mflípl timf ng Pdóe, kgy ng Msná, tplqp glqg níp, jsg lfe vgieqiqkél pñfl, tp vgeinf p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, y tg tpabpnf nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk; hgkf ef fílqgil. 4 Y gevió Mgtfvá p vflfqkfl qfnfl lsl ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl, geviáenfbgl nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk; hgkf ef fílqgil, ei ierbieplqgil vsglqkf fínf hpkp glrsrtpk 5 rspenf ngrípe: Vfbvgfl ptfkp ng vsglqkf dpb rpdief y ng bp dpbnpn ng vsglqkpl fakpl, y dfkpkéil ge bp qigkkp jsg fl nif Mgtfvá p vflfqkfl y p vsglqkfl hpnkgl hpkp ligdhkg; 6 y ef vpyáil ge hfl ng niflgl pmgefl, likviéenfbgl y pnfkáenfbgl, ei dg hkfvfjséil p ikp rfe bp fakp ng vsglqkpl dpefl; y ef fl tpké dpb. 7 Hgkf ef dg tpaéil fínf, nirg Mgtfvá, hpkp hkfvfrpkdg p ikp rfe bp fakp ng vsglqkpl dpefl hpkp dpb vsglqkf. 

8 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Hfk rspeqf ef tpaéil fínf dil hpbpakpl, 9 tg pjsí gevipké y qfdpké p qfnpl bpl qkiasl ngb efkqg, nirg Mgtfvá, y p Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, di ligkvf, y bfl qkpgké rfeqkp glqp qigkkp y rfeqkp lsl dfkpnfkgl, y rfeqkp qfnpl glqpl eprifegl ge ngkkgnfk; y bfl nglqksiké, y bfl hfenké hfk glrpkeif y hfk askbp y ge nglfbprióe hgkhgqsp. 10 Y tpké jsg nglphpkgzrp ng geqkg gbbfl bp vfz ng ufzf y bp vfz ng pbgukíp, bp vfz ng nglhflpnf y bp vfz ng nglhflpnp, ksinf ng dfbief y bsz ng bádhpkp. 11 Qfnp glqp qigkkp lgká hsglqp ge ksiepl y ge glhpeqf; y lgkvikáe glqpl eprifegl pb kgy ng Apaibfeip lgqgeqp pñfl. 12 Y rspenf lgpe rsdhbinfl bfl lgqgeqp pñfl, rplqiupké pb kgy ng Apaibfeip y p pjsgbbp eprióe hfk ls dpbnpn, tp nirtf Mgtfvá, y p bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl; y bp rfevgkqiké ge ngligkqfl hpkp ligdhkg. 13 Y qkpgké lfakg pjsgbbp qigkkp qfnpl dil hpbpakpl jsg tg tpabpnf rfeqkp gbbp, rfe qfnf bf jsg glqá glrkiqf ge glqg biakf, hkfcgqizpnf hfk Mgkgdípl rfeqkp qfnpl bpl eprifegl. 14 Hfkjsg qpdaiée gbbpl lgkáe lfmszupnpl hfk dsrtpl eprifegl y ukpengl kgygl; y yf bgl hpupké rfecfkdg p lsl tgrtfl, y rfecfkdg p bp fakp ng lsl dpefl. 

Bp rfhp ng ikp hpkp bpl eprifegl

15 Hfkjsg plí dg nimf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Qfdp ng di dpef bp rfhp ngb vief ng glqg cskfk, y np p agagk ng éb p qfnpl bpl eprifegl p bpl rspbgl yf qg gevíf. 16 Y agagkáe, y qgdabpkáe y gebfjsgrgkáe, p rpslp ng bp glhpnp jsg yf gevíf geqkg gbbpl. 

17 Y qfdé bp rfhp ng bp dpef ng Mgtfvá, y ni ng agagk p qfnpl bpl eprifegl, p bpl rspbgl dg gevió Mgtfvá: 18 p Mgkslpbée, p bpl risnpngl ng Msná y p lsl kgygl, y p lsl hkíerihgl, hpkp hfegkbfl ge ksiepl, ge glrpkeif y ge askbp y ge dpbnirióe, rfdf tplqp tfy; 19 p Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf, p lsl ligkvfl, p lsl hkíerihgl y p qfnf ls hsgabf; 20 y p qfnp bp dgzrbp ng eprifegl, p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng qigkkp ng Sz, y p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp ng Cibilqgp, p Plrpbóe, p Upzp, p Grkóe y pb kgdpegeqg ng Plnfn; 21 p Gnfd, p Dfpa y p bfl timfl ng Pdóe; 22 p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng Qikf, p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng Linóe, p bfl kgygl ng bpl rflqpl jsg glqáe ng glg bpnf ngb dpk; 23 p Ngnáe, p Qgdp y p Asz, y p qfnfl bfl jsg lg kphpe bpl ligegl; 24 p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng Pkpaip, p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng hsgabfl dgzrbpnfl jsg tpaiqpe ge gb ngligkqf; 25 p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng Zidki, p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng Gbpd, p qfnfl bfl kgygl ng Dgnip; 26 p qfnfl bfl kgygl ngb efkqg, bfl ng rgkrp y bfl ng bgmfl, bfl sefl rfe bfl fqkfl, y p qfnfl bfl kgiefl ngb dsenf jsg glqáe lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp; y gb kgy ng Apaibfeip agagká nglhsél ng gbbfl. 

27 Bgl nikál, hsgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Agagn, y gdakipupfl, y vfdiqpn, y rpgn, y ef fl bgvpeqéil, p rpslp ng bp glhpnp jsg yf gevíf geqkg vflfqkfl. 28 Y li ef jsigkge qfdpk bp rfhp ng qs dpef hpkp agagk, bgl nikál qú: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Qgeéil jsg agagk. 29 Hfkjsg tg pjsí jsg p bp risnpn ge bp rspb gl ievfrpnf di efdakg yf rfdigezf p tprgk dpb; ¿y vflfqkfl lgkéil palsgbqfl? Ef lgkéil palsgbqfl; hfkjsg glhpnp qkpiuf lfakg qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

30 Qú, hsgl, hkfcgqizpkál rfeqkp gbbfl qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl y bgl nikál: Mgtfvá ksuiká nglng bf pbqf, y nglng ls dfkpnp lpeqp npká ls vfz; ksuiká csgkqgdgeqg rfeqkp ls dfkpnp; rperióe ng bpupkgkfl rpeqpká rfeqkp qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp. 31 Bbgupká gb glqksgenf tplqp gb cie ng bp qigkkp, hfkjsg Mgtfvá qigeg msirif rfeqkp bpl eprifegl; éb gl gb Msgz ng qfnp rpkeg; geqkgupká bfl idhífl p glhpnp, nirg Mgtfvá. 

32 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Tg pjsí jsg gb dpb iká ng eprióe ge eprióe, y ukpeng qgdhglqpn lg bgvpeqpká ng bfl ciegl ng bp qigkkp. 33 Y yprgkáe bfl dsgkqfl ng Mgtfvá ge pjsgb níp nglng se gxqkgdf ng bp qigkkp tplqp gb fqkf; ef lg gengrtpkáe ei lg kgrfugkáe ei lgkáe geqgkkpnfl; rfdf glqiékrfb jsgnpkáe lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp. 34 Psbbpn, hplqfkgl, y rbpdpn; kgvfbrpfl ge gb hfbvf, dpyfkpbgl ngb kgapñf; hfkjsg rsdhbinfl lfe vsglqkfl nípl hpkp jsg lgáil ngufbbpnfl y glhpkrinfl, y rpgkéil rfdf vplf hkgriflf. 35 Y lg prpapká bp tsinp ng bfl hplqfkgl, y gb glrphg ng bfl dpyfkpbgl ngb kgapñf. 36 ¡Vfz ng bp ukiqgkíp ng bfl hplqfkgl, y psbbinf ng bfl dpyfkpbgl ngb kgapñf! hfkjsg Mgtfvá plfbó lsl hplqfl. 37 Y bfl hplqfl ngbirpnfl lgkáe nglqksinfl hfk gb pknfk ng bp ikp ng Mgtfvá. 38 Ngmó rspb bgferibbf ls uspkinp; hsgl plfbpnp csg bp qigkkp ng gbbfl hfk bp ikp ngb fhkglfk, y hfk gb cskfk ng ls lpñp. 

Mgkgdípl gl pdgepzpnf ng dsgkqg

MGKGDÍPL 26

1 Ge gb hkierihif ngb kgiepnf ng Mfprid timf ng Mflípl, kgy ng Msná, vief glqp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Hfeqg ge gb pqkif ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y tpabp p qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná, jsg vigege hpkp pnfkpk ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg yf qg dpené tpabpkbgl; ef kgqgeupl hpbpakp. 3 Jsizá fiupe, y lg vsgbvpe rpnp sef ng ls dpb rpdief, y dg pkkghgeqiké yf ngb dpb jsg higelf tprgkbgl hfk bp dpbnpn ng lsl fakpl. 4 Bgl nikál, hsgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Li ef dg fygkgil hpkp penpk ge di bgy, bp rspb hslg peqg vflfqkfl, 5 hpkp pqgengk p bpl hpbpakpl ng dil ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl, jsg yf fl gevíf nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk, p bfl rspbgl ef tpaéil fínf, 6 yf hfenké glqp rplp rfdf Libf, y glqp risnpn bp hfenké hfk dpbnirióe p qfnpl bpl eprifegl ng bp qigkkp. 

7 Y bfl lprgknfqgl, bfl hkfcgqpl y qfnf gb hsgabf fygkfe p Mgkgdípl tpabpk glqpl hpbpakpl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 8 Y rspenf qgkdieó ng tpabpk Mgkgdípl qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá bg tpaíp dpenpnf jsg tpabplg p qfnf gb hsgabf, bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl hkfcgqpl y qfnf gb hsgabf bg grtpkfe dpef, nirigenf: Ng rigkqf dfkikál. 9 ¿Hfk jsé tpl hkfcgqizpnf ge efdakg ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: Glqp rplp lgká rfdf Libf, y glqp risnpn lgká plfbpnp tplqp ef jsgnpk dfkpnfk? Y qfnf gb hsgabf lg mseqó rfeqkp Mgkgdípl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

10 Y bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná fygkfe glqpl rflpl, y lsaigkfe ng bp rplp ngb kgy p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y lg lgeqpkfe ge bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp esgvp ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 11 Geqfergl tpabpkfe bfl lprgknfqgl y bfl hkfcgqpl p bfl hkíerihgl y p qfnf gb hsgabf, nirigenf: Ge hgep ng dsgkqg tp ierskkinf glqg tfdakg; hfkjsg hkfcgqizó rfeqkp glqp risnpn, rfdf vflfqkfl tpaéil fínf rfe vsglqkfl fínfl. 12 Y tpabó Mgkgdípl p qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl y p qfnf gb hsgabf, nirigenf: Mgtfvá dg gevió p hkfcgqizpk rfeqkp glqp rplp y rfeqkp glqp risnpn, qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg tpaéil fínf. 13 Dgmfkpn ptfkp vsglqkfl rpdiefl y vsglqkpl fakpl, y fín bp vfz ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y lg pkkghgeqiká Mgtfvá ngb dpb jsg tp tpabpnf rfeqkp vflfqkfl. 14 Ge bf jsg p dí qfrp, tg pjsí glqfy ge vsglqkpl dpefl; tprgn ng dí rfdf dgmfk y dál kgrqf fl hpkgzrp. 15 Dpl lpagn ng rigkqf jsg li dg dpqáil, lpeukg iefrgeqg grtpkéil lfakg vflfqkfl, y lfakg glqp risnpn y lfakg lsl dfkpnfkgl; hfkjsg ge vgknpn Mgtfvá dg gevió p vflfqkfl hpkp jsg nimglg qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl ge vsglqkfl fínfl. 

16 Y nimgkfe bfl hkíerihgl y qfnf gb hsgabf p bfl lprgknfqgl y hkfcgqpl: Ef tp ierskkinf glqg tfdakg ge hgep ng dsgkqg, hfkjsg ge efdakg ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl tp tpabpnf. 17 Geqfergl lg bgvpeqpkfe pbusefl ng bfl peripefl ng bp qigkkp y tpabpkfe p qfnp bp kgseióe ngb hsgabf, nirigenf: 18 Dijsgpl ng Dfkglgq hkfcgqizó ge qigdhf ng Gzgjsípl kgy ng Msná, y tpabó p qfnf gb hsgabf ng Msná, nirigenf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Life lgká pkpnp rfdf rpdhf, y Mgkslpbée vgenká p lgk dfeqfegl ng ksiepl, y gb dfeqg ng bp rplp rfdf rsdakgl ng afljsg. 19 ¿Prplf bf dpqpkfe Gzgjsípl kgy ng Msná y qfnf Msná? ¿Ef qgdió p Mgtfvá, y fkó ge hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá, y Mgtfvá lg pkkghieqió ngb dpb jsg tpaíp tpabpnf rfeqkp gbbfl? ¿Tpkgdfl, hsgl, eflfqkfl qpe ukpe dpb rfeqkp esglqkpl pbdpl? 

20 Tsaf qpdaiée se tfdakg jsg hkfcgqizpap ge efdakg ng Mgtfvá, Skípl timf ng Lgdpípl, ng Jsikipq-mgpkid, gb rspb hkfcgqizó rfeqkp glqp risnpn y rfeqkp glqp qigkkp, rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgkgdípl; 21 y fygkfe lsl hpbpakpl gb kgy Mfprid y qfnfl lsl ukpengl, y qfnfl lsl hkíerihgl, y gb kgy hkfrskó dpqpkbg; geqgenigenf bf rspb Skípl, qsvf qgdfk, y tsyó p Guihqf. 22 Y gb kgy Mfprid gevió tfdakgl p Guihqf, p Gbepqáe timf ng Prafk y fqkfl tfdakgl rfe éb, p Guihqf; 23 bfl rspbgl lprpkfe p Skípl ng Guihqf y bf qkpmgkfe pb kgy Mfprid, gb rspb bf dpqó p glhpnp, y grtó ls rsgkhf ge bfl lghsbrkfl ngb vsbuf. 

24 Hgkf bp dpef ng Ptirpd timf ng Lpcáe glqpap p cpvfk ng Mgkgdípl, hpkp jsg ef bf geqkguplge ge bpl dpefl ngb hsgabf hpkp dpqpkbf. 

Bp lgñpb ng bfl ysufl

MGKGDÍPL 27

1 Ge gb hkierihif ngb kgiepnf ng Mfprid timf ng Mflípl, kgy ng Msná, vief glqp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 2 Mgtfvá dg tp nirtf plí: Tpzqg rfysenpl y ysufl, y hfebfl lfakg qs rsgbbf; 3 y bfl gevipkál pb kgy ng Gnfd, y pb kgy ng Dfpa, y pb kgy ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y pb kgy ng Qikf, y pb kgy ng Linóe, hfk dpef ng bfl dgelpmgkfl jsg vigege p Mgkslpbée p Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná. 4 Y bgl dpenpkál jsg niupe p lsl lgñfkgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Plí tpaéil ng ngrik p vsglqkfl lgñfkgl: 5 Yf tirg bp qigkkp, gb tfdakg y bpl aglqipl jsg glqáe lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp, rfe di ukpe hfngk y rfe di akpzf gxqgeninf, y bp ni p jsige yf jsilg. 6 Y ptfkp yf tg hsglqf qfnpl glqpl qigkkpl ge dpef ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, di ligkvf, y pse bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf bg tg npnf hpkp jsg bg likvpe. 7 Y qfnpl bpl eprifegl bg lgkvikáe p éb, p ls timf, y pb timf ng ls timf, tplqp jsg vgeup qpdaiée gb qigdhf ng ls dildp qigkkp, y bp kgnszrpe p lgkvinsdakg dsrtpl eprifegl y ukpengl kgygl. 

8 Y p bp eprióe y pb kgief jsg ef likvigkg p Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, y jsg ef hsligkg ls rsgbbf ngapmf ngb ysuf ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, rplqiupké p qpb eprióe rfe glhpnp y rfe tpdakg y rfe hglqibgerip, nirg Mgtfvá, tplqp jsg bp prpag yf hfk ls dpef. 9 Y vflfqkfl ef hkglqéil fínf p vsglqkfl hkfcgqpl, ei p vsglqkfl pniviefl, ei p vsglqkfl lfñpnfkgl, ei p vsglqkfl pufkgkfl, ei p vsglqkfl gerpeqpnfkgl, jsg fl tpabpe nirigenf: Ef lgkvikéil pb kgy ng Apaibfeip. 10 Hfkjsg gbbfl fl hkfcgqizpe dgeqikp, hpkp tprgkfl pbgmpk ng vsglqkp qigkkp, y hpkp jsg yf fl pkkfmg y hgkgzráil. 11 Dpl p bp eprióe jsg lfdgqigkg ls rsgbbf pb ysuf ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip y bg likvigkg, bp ngmpké ge ls qigkkp, nirg Mgtfvá, y bp bpakpká y dfkpká ge gbbp. 

12 Tpabé qpdaiée p Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná rfecfkdg p qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl, nirigenf: Lfdgqgn vsglqkfl rsgbbfl pb ysuf ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y lgkvinbg p éb y p ls hsgabf, y vivin. 13 ¿Hfk jsé dfkikéil qú y qs hsgabf p glhpnp, ng tpdakg y ng hglqibgerip, lguúe tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bp eprióe jsg ef likvigkg pb kgy ng Apaibfeip? 14 Ef fiuáil bpl hpbpakpl ng bfl hkfcgqpl jsg fl tpabpe nirigenf: Ef lgkvikéil pb kgy ng Apaibfeip; hfkjsg fl hkfcgqizpe dgeqikp. 15 Hfkjsg yf ef bfl gevié, nirg Mgtfvá, y gbbfl hkfcgqizpe cpblpdgeqg ge di efdakg, hpkp jsg yf fl pkkfmg y hgkgzráil vflfqkfl y bfl hkfcgqpl jsg fl hkfcgqizpe. 

16 Qpdaiée p bfl lprgknfqgl y p qfnf glqg hsgabf tpabé nirigenf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ef fiuáil bpl hpbpakpl ng vsglqkfl hkfcgqpl jsg fl hkfcgqizpe nirigenf: Tg pjsí jsg bfl sqgelibifl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá vfbvgkáe ng Apaibfeip ptfkp hkfeqf; hfkjsg fl hkfcgqizpe dgeqikp. 17 Ef bfl fiuáil; lgkvin pb kgy ng Apaibfeip y vivin; ¿hfk jsé tp ng lgk nglfbpnp glqp risnpn? 18 Y li gbbfl lfe hkfcgqpl, y li glqá rfe gbbfl bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, fkge ptfkp p Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl hpkp jsg bfl sqgelibifl jsg tpe jsgnpnf ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá y ge bp rplp ngb kgy ng Msná y ge Mgkslpbée, ef vpype p Apaibfeip. 19 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl prgkrp ng pjsgbbpl rfbsdepl, ngb glqpejsg, ng bpl aplpl y ngb kglqf ng bfl sqgelibifl jsg jsgnpe ge glqp risnpn, 20 jsg ef jsiqó Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip rspenf qkpelhfkqó ng Mgkslpbée p Apaibfeip p Mgrfeípl timf ng Mfprid, kgy ng Msná, y p qfnfl bfl efabgl ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée; 21 plí, hsgl, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, prgkrp ng bfl sqgelibifl jsg jsgnpkfe ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y ge bp rplp ngb kgy ng Msná, y ge Mgkslpbée: 22 P Apaibfeip lgkáe qkpelhfkqpnfl, y pbbí glqpkáe tplqp gb níp ge jsg yf bfl viliqg, nirg Mgtfvá; y nglhsél bfl qkpgké y bfl kglqpskpké p glqg bsupk. 

Cpblp hkfcgríp ng Tpepeípl

MGKGDÍPL 28

1 Prfeqgrió ge gb dildf pñf, ge gb hkierihif ngb kgiepnf ng Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná, ge gb pñf rspkqf, ge gb jsieqf dgl, jsg Tpepeípl timf ng Pzsk, hkfcgqp jsg gkp ng Upapóe, dg tpabó ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ngbpeqg ng bfl lprgknfqgl y ng qfnf gb hsgabf, nirigenf: 2 Plí tpabó Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Jsgakpeqé gb ysuf ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip. 3 Ngeqkf ng nfl pñfl tpké vfbvgk p glqg bsupk qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, jsg Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip qfdó ng glqg bsupk hpkp bbgvpkbfl p Apaibfeip, 4 y yf tpké vfbvgk p glqg bsupk p Mgrfeípl timf ng Mfprid, kgy ng Msná, y p qfnfl bfl qkpelhfkqpnfl ng Msná jsg geqkpkfe ge Apaibfeip, nirg Mgtfvá; hfkjsg yf jsgakpeqpké gb ysuf ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip. 

5 Geqfergl kglhfenió gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl pb hkfcgqp Tpepeípl, ngbpeqg ng bfl lprgknfqgl y ngbpeqg ng qfnf gb hsgabf jsg glqpap ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 6 Y nimf gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl: Pdée, plí bf tpup Mgtfvá. Rfecikdg Mgtfvá qsl hpbpakpl, rfe bpl rspbgl hkfcgqizplqg jsg bfl sqgelibifl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y qfnfl bfl qkpelhfkqpnfl, tpe ng lgk ngvsgbqfl ng Apaibfeip p glqg bsupk. 7 Rfe qfnf glf, fyg ptfkp glqp hpbpakp jsg yf tpabf ge qsl fínfl y ge bfl fínfl ng qfnf gb hsgabf: 8 Bfl hkfcgqpl jsg csgkfe peqgl ng dí y peqgl ng qi ge qigdhfl hplpnfl, hkfcgqizpkfe usgkkp, pcbirrióe y hglqibgerip rfeqkp dsrtpl qigkkpl y rfeqkp ukpengl kgiefl. 9 Gb hkfcgqp jsg hkfcgqizp ng hpz, rspenf lg rsdhbp bp hpbpakp ngb hkfcgqp, lgká rfefrinf rfdf gb hkfcgqp jsg Mgtfvá ge vgknpn gevió. 

10 Geqfergl gb hkfcgqp Tpepeípl jsiqó gb ysuf ngb rsgbbf ngb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl, y bf jsgakó. 11 Y tpabó Tpepeípl ge hkglgerip ng qfnf gb hsgabf, nirigenf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ng glqp dpegkp kfdhgké gb ysuf ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, ngb rsgbbf ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl, ngeqkf ng nfl pñfl. Y liusió Mgkgdípl ls rpdief. 12 Y nglhsél jsg gb hkfcgqp Tpepeípl kfdhió gb ysuf ngb rsgbbf ngb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl, vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 13 Vg y tpabp p Tpepeípl, nirigenf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ysufl ng dpngkp jsgakplqg, dpl ge vgz ng gbbfl tpkál ysufl ng tigkkf. 14 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Ysuf ng tigkkf hslg lfakg gb rsgbbf ng qfnpl glqpl eprifegl, hpkp jsg likvpe p Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, y tpe ng lgkvikbg; y pse qpdaiée bg tg npnf bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf. 15 Geqfergl nimf gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl pb hkfcgqp Tpepeípl: Ptfkp fyg, Tpepeípl: Mgtfvá ef qg gevió, y qú tpl tgrtf rfecipk ge dgeqikp p glqg hsgabf. 16 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg yf qg jsiqf ng lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp; dfkikál ge glqg pñf, hfkjsg tpabplqg kgagbióe rfeqkp Mgtfvá. 17 Y ge gb dildf pñf dskió Tpepeípl, ge gb dgl léhqidf. 

Rpkqp ng Mgkgdípl p bfl rpsqivfl

MGKGDÍPL 29

1 Glqpl lfe bpl hpbpakpl ng bp rpkqp jsg gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl gevió ng Mgkslpbée p bfl peripefl jsg tpaípe jsgnpnf ng bfl jsg csgkfe qkpelhfkqpnfl, y p bfl lprgknfqgl y hkfcgqpl y p qfnf gb hsgabf jsg Epasrfnfeflfk bbgvó rpsqivf ng Mgkslpbée p Apaibfeip 2 (nglhsél jsg lpbió gb kgy Mgrfeípl, bp kgiep, bfl ngb hpbprif, bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée, bfl pkqícirgl y bfl ieugeigkfl ng Mgkslpbée), 3 hfk dpef ng Gbplp timf ng Lpcáe y ng Ugdpkípl timf ng Tibrípl, p jsigegl gevió Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná p Apaibfeip, p Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip. Ngríp: 4 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, p qfnfl bfl ng bp rpsqivinpn jsg tirg qkpelhfkqpk ng Mgkslpbée p Apaibfeip: 5 Gnicirpn rplpl, y tpaiqpnbpl; y hbpeqpn tsgkqfl, y rfdgn ngb cksqf ng gbbfl. 6 Rplpfl, y geugenkpn timfl g timpl; npn dsmgkgl p vsglqkfl timfl, y npn dpkinfl p vsglqkpl timpl, hpkp jsg qgeupe timfl g timpl; y dsbqihbirpfl ptí, y ef fl nildiesyáil. 7 Y hkfrskpn bp hpz ng bp risnpn p bp rspb fl tirg qkpelhfkqpk, y kfupn hfk gbbp p Mgtfvá; hfkjsg ge ls hpz qgenkéil vflfqkfl hpz. 8 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Ef fl geupñge vsglqkfl hkfcgqpl jsg glqáe geqkg vflfqkfl, ei vsglqkfl pniviefl; ei pqgenáil p bfl lsgñfl jsg lfñáil. 9 Hfkjsg cpblpdgeqg fl hkfcgqizpe gbbfl ge di efdakg; ef bfl gevié, tp nirtf Mgtfvá. 10 Hfkjsg plí nimf Mgtfvá: Rspenf ge Apaibfeip lg rsdhbpe bfl lgqgeqp pñfl, yf fl viliqpké, y nglhgkqpké lfakg vflfqkfl di asgep hpbpakp, hpkp tprgkfl vfbvgk p glqg bsupk. 11 Hfkjsg yf lé bfl hgelpdigeqfl jsg qgeuf prgkrp ng vflfqkfl, nirg Mgtfvá, hgelpdigeqfl ng hpz, y ef ng dpb, hpkp npkfl gb cie jsg glhgkáil. 12 Geqfergl dg ievfrpkéil, y vgenkéil y fkpkéil p dí, y yf fl fiké; 13 y dg aslrpkéil y dg tpbbpkéil, hfkjsg dg aslrpkéil ng qfnf vsglqkf rfkpzóe. 14 Y lgké tpbbpnf hfk vflfqkfl, nirg Mgtfvá, y tpké vfbvgk vsglqkp rpsqivinpn, y fl kgseiké ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl y ng qfnfl bfl bsupkgl pnfeng fl pkkfmé, nirg Mgtfvá; y fl tpké vfbvgk pb bsupk ng nfeng fl tirg bbgvpk. 15 Dpl tpaéil nirtf: Mgtfvá efl tp bgvpeqpnf hkfcgqpl ge Apaibfeip. 16 Hgkf plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá prgkrp ngb kgy jsg glqá lgeqpnf lfakg gb qkfef ng Npvin, y ng qfnf gb hsgabf jsg dfkp ge glqp risnpn, ng vsglqkfl tgkdpefl jsg ef lpbigkfe rfe vflfqkfl ge rpsqivgkif; 17 plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Tg pjsí gevíf yf rfeqkp gbbfl glhpnp, tpdakg y hglqibgerip, y bfl hfenké rfdf bfl tiufl dpbfl, jsg ng qpe dpbfl ef lg hsgnge rfdgk. 18 Bfl hgklgusiké rfe glhpnp, rfe tpdakg y rfe hglqibgerip, y bfl npké hfk glrpkeif p qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bp qigkkp, hfk dpbnirióe y hfk glhpeqf, y hfk askbp y hfk pckgeqp hpkp qfnpl bpl eprifegl geqkg bpl rspbgl bfl tg pkkfmpnf; 19 hfk rspeqf ef fygkfe dil hpbpakpl, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg bgl gevié hfk dil ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl, nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk; y ef tpaéil glrsrtpnf, nirg Mgtfvá. 20 Fín, hsgl, hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, vflfqkfl qfnfl bfl qkpelhfkqpnfl jsg gevié ng Mgkslpbée p Apaibfeip. 21 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, prgkrp ng Prpa timf ng Rfbpípl, y prgkrp ng Lgngjsípl timf ng Dpplípl, jsg fl hkfcgqizpe cpblpdgeqg ge di efdakg: Tg pjsí bfl geqkguf yf ge dpef ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, y éb bfl dpqpká ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl fmfl. 22 Y qfnfl bfl qkpelhfkqpnfl ng Msná jsg glqáe ge Apaibfeip tpkáe ng gbbfl sep dpbnirióe, nirigenf: Hóeupqg Mgtfvá rfdf p Lgngjsípl y rfdf p Prpa, p jsigegl pló pb csguf gb kgy ng Apaibfeip. 23 Hfkjsg tirigkfe dpbnpn ge Ilkpgb, y rfdgqigkfe pnsbqgkif rfe bpl dsmgkgl ng lsl hkómidfl, y cpblpdgeqg tpabpkfe ge di efdakg hpbpakp jsg ef bgl dpené; bf rspb yf lé y qglqicirf, nirg Mgtfvá. 24 Y p Lgdpípl ng Egtgbpd tpabpkál, nirigenf: 25 Plí tpabó Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Qú geviplqg rpkqpl ge qs efdakg p qfnf gb hsgabf jsg glqá ge Mgkslpbée, y pb lprgknfqg Lfcfeípl timf ng Dpplípl, y p qfnfl bfl lprgknfqgl, nirigenf: 26 Mgtfvá qg tp hsglqf hfk lprgknfqg ge bsupk ngb lprgknfqg Mfipnp, hpkp jsg qg gerpkusgl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ng qfnf tfdakg bfrf jsg hkfcgqirg, hfeiéenfbf ge gb rpbpafzf y ge gb rghf. 27 ¿Hfk jsé, hsgl, ef tpl kghkgeninf ptfkp p Mgkgdípl ng Pepqfq, jsg fl hkfcgqizp? 28 Hfkjsg éb efl gevió p ngrik ge Apaibfeip: Bpkuf lgká gb rpsqivgkif; gnicirpn rplpl, y tpaiqpnbpl; hbpeqpn tsgkqfl, y rfdgn gb cksqf ng gbbfl. 29 Y gb lprgknfqg Lfcfeípl tpaíp bgínf glqp rpkqp p fínfl ngb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl. 30 Y vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 31 Gevíp p ngrik p qfnfl bfl rpsqivfl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng Lgdpípl ng Egtgbpd: Hfkjsg fl hkfcgqizó Lgdpípl, y yf ef bf gevié, y fl tizf rfecipk ge dgeqikp; 32 hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg yf rplqiupké p Lgdpípl ng Egtgbpd y p ls nglrgengerip; ef qgenká vpkóe jsg dfkg geqkg glqg hsgabf, ei vgká gb aige jsg tpké yf p di hsgabf, nirg Mgtfvá; hfkjsg rfeqkp Mgtfvá tp tpabpnf kgagbióe. 

Nifl hkfdgqg jsg bfl rpsqivfl vfbvgkáe

MGKGDÍPL 30

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 2 Plí tpabó Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Glrkíagqg ge se biakf qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg qg tg tpabpnf. 3 Hfkjsg tg pjsí jsg vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge jsg tpké vfbvgk p bfl rpsqivfl ng di hsgabf Ilkpgb y Msná, tp nirtf Mgtfvá, y bfl qkpgké p bp qigkkp jsg ni p lsl hpnkgl, y bp nilcksqpkáe. 

4 Glqpl, hsgl, lfe bpl hpbpakpl jsg tpabó Mgtfvá prgkrp ng Ilkpgb y ng Msná. 5 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tgdfl fínf vfz ng qgdabfk; ng glhpeqf, y ef ng hpz. 6 Iejsikin ptfkp, y dikpn li gb vpkóe np p bsz; hfkjsg tg vilqf jsg qfnf tfdakg qgeíp bpl dpefl lfakg lsl bfdfl, rfdf dsmgk jsg glqá ng hpkqf, y lg tpe vsgbqf hábinfl qfnfl bfl kflqkfl. 7 ¡Pt, rsáe ukpeng gl pjsgb níp! qpeqf, jsg ef tpy fqkf lgdgmpeqg p éb; qigdhf ng peuslqip hpkp Mprfa; hgkf ng gbbp lgká biakpnf. 

8 Ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, yf jsgakpké ls ysuf ng qs rsgbbf, y kfdhgké qsl rfysenpl, y gxqkpemgkfl ef bf vfbvgkáe dál p hfegk ge lgkvinsdakg, 9 lief jsg lgkvikáe p Mgtfvá ls Nifl y p Npvin ls kgy, p jsige yf bgl bgvpeqpké. 

10 Qú, hsgl, ligkvf díf Mprfa, ef qgdpl, nirg Mgtfvá, ei qg pqgdfkirgl, Ilkpgb; hfkjsg tg pjsí jsg yf lfy gb jsg qg lpbvf ng bgmfl p qi y p qs nglrgengerip ng bp qigkkp ng rpsqivinpn; y Mprfa vfbvgká, nglrpelpká y viviká qkpejsibf, y ef tpaká jsige bg glhpeqg. 11 Hfkjsg yf glqfy rfeqiuf hpkp lpbvpkqg, nirg Mgtfvá, y nglqksiké p qfnpl bpl eprifegl geqkg bpl rspbgl qg glhpkrí; hgkf p qi ef qg nglqksiké, lief jsg qg rplqiupké rfe mslqirip; ng eieusep dpegkp qg ngmpké lie rplqiuf. 

12 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ierskpabg gl qs jsgakpeqpdigeqf, y nfbfkflp qs bbpup. 13 Ef tpy jsige mszusg qs rpslp hpkp lpepkqg; ef tpy hpkp qi dgnirpdgeqfl gcirprgl. 14 Qfnfl qsl gepdfkpnfl qg fbvinpkfe; ef qg aslrpe; hfkjsg rfdf tigkg se gegdiuf qg tgkí, rfe pzfqg ng pnvgklpkif rksgb, p rpslp ng bp dpueiqsn ng qs dpbnpn y ng bp dsbqiqsn ng qsl hgrpnfl. 15 ¿Hfk jsé ukiqpl p rpslp ng qs jsgakpeqpdigeqf? Ierskpabg gl qs nfbfk, hfkjsg hfk bp ukpengzp ng qs ieijsinpn y hfk qsl dsrtfl hgrpnfl qg tg tgrtf glqf. 16 Hgkf lgkáe rfelsdinfl qfnfl bfl jsg qg rfelsdge; y qfnfl qsl pnvgklpkifl, qfnfl ikáe ge rpsqivgkif; tfbbpnfl lgkáe bfl jsg qg tfbbpkfe, y p qfnfl bfl jsg tirigkfe hkglp ng qi npké ge hkglp. 17 Dpl yf tpké vgeik lpeinpn hpkp qi, y lpepké qsl tgkinpl, nirg Mgtfvá; hfkjsg nglgrtpnp qg bbpdpkfe, nirigenf: Glqp gl Life, ng bp jsg epnig lg prsgknp. 

18 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí yf tpuf vfbvgk bfl rpsqivfl ng bpl qigenpl ng Mprfa, y ng lsl qigenpl qgenké dilgkirfknip, y bp risnpn lgká gnicirpnp lfakg ls rfbiep, y gb qgdhbf lgká plgeqpnf lguúe ls cfkdp. 19 Y lpbnká ng gbbfl prrióe ng ukpripl, y vfz ng eprióe jsg glqá ge kgufrimf, y bfl dsbqihbirpké, y ef lgkáe nildiesinfl; bfl dsbqihbirpké, y ef lgkáe dgeflrpapnfl. 20 Y lgkáe lsl timfl rfdf peqgl, y ls rfeukguprióe ngbpeqg ng dí lgká rfecikdpnp; y rplqiupké p qfnfl lsl fhkglfkgl. 21 Ng gbbp lpbnká ls hkíerihg, y ng ge dgnif ng gbbp lpbnká ls lgñfkgpnfk; y bg tpké bbgupk rgkrp, y éb lg prgkrpká p dí; hfkjsg ¿jsiée gl pjsgb jsg lg pqkgvg p prgkrpklg p dí? nirg Mgtfvá. 22 Y dg lgkéil hfk hsgabf, y yf lgké vsglqkf Nifl. 

23 Tg pjsí, bp qgdhglqpn ng Mgtfvá lpbg rfe cskfk; bp qgdhglqpn jsg lg hkghpkp, lfakg bp rpagzp ng bfl idhífl kghflpká. 24 Ef lg rpbdpká gb pknfk ng bp ikp ng Mgtfvá, tplqp jsg tpyp tgrtf y rsdhbinf bfl hgelpdigeqfl ng ls rfkpzóe; ge gb cie ng bfl nípl geqgengkéil glqf. 

MGKGDÍPL 31

1 Ge pjsgb qigdhf, nirg Mgtfvá, yf lgké hfk Nifl p qfnpl bpl cpdibipl ng Ilkpgb, y gbbpl dg lgkáe p dí hfk hsgabf. 

2 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Gb hsgabf jsg glrphó ng bp glhpnp tpbbó ukprip ge gb ngligkqf, rspenf Ilkpgb iap ge aslrp ng kghflf. 3 Mgtfvá lg dpeicglqó p dí tprg yp dsrtf qigdhf, nirigenf: Rfe pdfk gqgkef qg tg pdpnf; hfk qpeqf, qg hkfbfeusé di dilgkirfknip. 4 Púe qg gnicirpké, y lgkál gnicirpnp, ft vikuge ng Ilkpgb; qfnpvíp lgkál pnfkepnp rfe qsl hpengkfl, y lpbnkál ge pbgukgl npezpl. 5 Púe hbpeqpkál viñpl ge bfl dfeqgl ng Lpdpkip; hbpeqpkáe bfl jsg hbpeqpe, y nilcksqpkáe ng gbbpl. 6 Hfkjsg tpaká níp ge jsg rbpdpkáe bfl uspknpl ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe: Bgvpeqpfl, y lsapdfl p Life, p Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl. 

7 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Kgufrimpfl ge Mprfa rfe pbgukíp, y npn vfrgl ng múaibf p bp rpagzp ng eprifegl; tprgn fík, pbpapn, y ngrin: Ft Mgtfvá, lpbvp p qs hsgabf, gb kgdpegeqg ng Ilkpgb. 8 Tg pjsí yf bfl tpuf vfbvgk ng bp qigkkp ngb efkqg, y bfl kgseiké ng bfl ciegl ng bp qigkkp, y geqkg gbbfl rigufl y rfmfl, bp dsmgk jsg glqá gerieqp y bp jsg nif p bsz mseqpdgeqg; ge ukpe rfdhpñíp vfbvgkáe prá. 9 Ikáe rfe bbfkf, dpl rfe dilgkirfknip bfl tpké vfbvgk, y bfl tpké penpk mseqf p pkkfyfl ng puspl, hfk rpdief ngkgrtf ge gb rspb ef qkfhgzpkáe; hfkjsg lfy p Ilkpgb hfk hpnkg, y Gckpíe gl di hkidfuéeiqf. 

10 Fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, ft eprifegl, y tprgnbf lpagk ge bpl rflqpl jsg glqáe bgmfl, y ngrin: Gb jsg glhpkrió p Ilkpgb bf kgseiká y uspknpká, rfdf gb hplqfk p ls kgapñf. 11 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá kgnidió p Mprfa, bf kgnidió ng dpef ngb dál csgkqg jsg éb. 12 Y vgenkáe rfe ukiqfl ng ufzf ge bf pbqf ng Life, y rfkkgkáe pb aige ng Mgtfvá, pb hpe, pb vief, pb prgiqg, y pb upepnf ng bpl fvgmpl y ng bpl vprpl; y ls pbdp lgká rfdf tsgkqf ng kiguf, y eserp dál qgenkáe nfbfk. 13 Geqfergl bp vikuge lg pbgukpká ge bp npezp, bfl móvgegl y bfl vigmfl mseqpdgeqg; y rpdaipké ls bbfkf ge ufzf, y bfl rfelfbpké, y bfl pbgukpké ng ls nfbfk. 14 Y gb pbdp ngb lprgknfqg lpqilcpké rfe pasenperip, y di hsgabf lgká lpripnf ng di aige, nirg Mgtfvá. 

15 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Vfz csg fínp ge Kpdá, bbpeqf y bbfkf pdpkuf; Kpjsgb jsg bpdgeqp hfk lsl timfl, y ef jsilf lgk rfelfbpnp prgkrp ng lsl timfl, hfkjsg hgkgrigkfe. 

16 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Kghkidg ngb bbpeqf qs vfz, y ng bpl báukidpl qsl fmfl; hfkjsg lpbpkif tpy hpkp qs qkpapmf, nirg Mgtfvá, y vfbvgkáe ng bp qigkkp ngb gegdiuf. 17 Glhgkpezp tpy qpdaiée hpkp qs hfkvgeik, nirg Mgtfvá, y bfl timfl vfbvgkáe p ls hkfhip qigkkp. 18 Glrsrtpenf, tg fínf p Gckpíe jsg lg bpdgeqpap: Dg pzfqplqg, y csi rplqiupnf rfdf efvibbf ienódiqf; rfeviékqgdg, y lgké rfevgkqinf, hfkjsg qú gkgl Mgtfvá di Nifl. 19 Hfkjsg nglhsél jsg dg phpkqé qsvg pkkghgeqidigeqf, y nglhsél jsg kgrfefrí di cpbqp, tgkí di dslbf; dg pvgkuferé y dg rfecsení, hfkjsg bbgvé bp pckgeqp ng di msvgeqsn. 20 ¿Ef gl Gckpíe timf hkgriflf hpkp dí? ¿ef gl eiñf ge jsige dg ngbgiqf? hsgl nglng jsg tpabé ng éb, dg tg prfknpnf ng éb rfelqpeqgdgeqg. Hfk glf dil geqkpñpl lg rfedfvigkfe hfk éb; rigkqpdgeqg qgenké ng éb dilgkirfknip, nirg Mgtfvá. 

21 Glqpabérgqg lgñpbgl, hfeqg dpmpefl pbqfl, efqp pqgeqpdgeqg bp rpbzpnp; vsébvgqg hfk gb rpdief hfk nfeng csilqg, vikuge ng Ilkpgb, vsgbvg p glqpl qsl risnpngl. 22 ¿Tplqp rsáenf penpkál gkkpeqg, ft timp rfeqsdpz? Hfkjsg Mgtfvá rkgpká sep rflp esgvp lfakg bp qigkkp: bp dsmgk kfngpká pb vpkóe. 

23 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Púe nikáe glqp hpbpakp ge bp qigkkp ng Msná y ge lsl risnpngl, rspenf yf tpup vfbvgk lsl rpsqivfl: Mgtfvá qg ageniup, ft dfkpnp ng mslqirip, ft dfeqg lpeqf. 24 Y tpaiqpká pbbí Msná, y qpdaiée ge qfnpl lsl risnpngl bpakpnfkgl, y bfl jsg vpe rfe kgapñf. 25 Hfkjsg lpqilcpké pb pbdp rpelpnp, y lpripké p qfnp pbdp geqkilqgrinp. 

26 Ge glqf dg nglhgkqé, y vi, y di lsgñf dg csg pukpnpabg. 

Gb esgvf hprqf

27 Tg pjsí vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge jsg lgdakpké bp rplp ng Ilkpgb y bp rplp ng Msná ng lidigeqg ng tfdakg y ng lidigeqg ng peidpb. 28 Y plí rfdf qsvg rsinpnf ng gbbfl hpkp pkkperpk y ngkkiapk, y qkplqfkepk y hgkngk y pcbiuik, qgenké rsinpnf ng gbbfl hpkp gnicirpk y hbpeqpk, nirg Mgtfvá. 29 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl ef nikáe dál: Bfl hpnkgl rfdigkfe bpl svpl pukipl y bfl nigeqgl ng bfl timfl qigege bp ngeqgkp, 30 lief jsg rpnp rspb dfkiká hfk ls hkfhip dpbnpn; bfl nigeqgl ng qfnf tfdakg jsg rfdigkg bpl svpl pukipl, qgenkáe bp ngeqgkp. 

31 Tg pjsí jsg vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge bfl rspbgl tpké esgvf hprqf rfe bp rplp ng Ilkpgb y rfe bp rplp ng Msná. 32 Ef rfdf gb hprqf jsg tirg rfe lsl hpnkgl gb níp jsg qfdé ls dpef hpkp lprpkbfl ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf; hfkjsg gbbfl ievpbinpkfe di hprqf, psejsg csi yf se dpkinf hpkp gbbfl, nirg Mgtfvá. 33 Hgkf glqg gl gb hprqf jsg tpké rfe bp rplp ng Ilkpgb nglhsél ng pjsgbbfl nípl, nirg Mgtfvá: Npké di bgy ge ls dgeqg, y bp glrkiaiké ge ls rfkpzóe; y yf lgké p gbbfl hfk Nifl, y gbbfl dg lgkáe hfk hsgabf. 34 Y ef gelgñpká dál eieusef p ls hkómidf, ei eieusef p ls tgkdpef, nirigenf: Rfefrg p Mgtfvá; hfkjsg qfnfl dg rfefrgkáe, nglng gb dál hgjsgñf ng gbbfl tplqp gb dál ukpeng, nirg Mgtfvá; hfkjsg hgknfepké bp dpbnpn ng gbbfl, y ef dg prfknpké dál ng ls hgrpnf. 

35 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá, jsg np gb lfb hpkp bsz ngb níp, bpl bgygl ng bp bsep y ng bpl glqkgbbpl hpkp bsz ng bp efrtg, jsg hpkqg gb dpk, y akpdpe lsl fenpl; Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl gl ls efdakg: 36 Li cpbqpkge glqpl bgygl ngbpeqg ng dí, nirg Mgtfvá, qpdaiée bp nglrgengerip ng Ilkpgb cpbqpká hpkp ef lgk eprióe ngbpeqg ng dí gqgkepdgeqg. 

37 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Li bfl rigbfl pkkiap lg hsgnge dgnik, y gxhbfkpklg papmf bfl csenpdgeqfl ng bp qigkkp, qpdaiée yf nglgrtpké qfnp bp nglrgengerip ng Ilkpgb hfk qfnf bf jsg tirigkfe, nirg Mgtfvá. 

38 Tg pjsí jsg vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge jsg bp risnpn lgká gnicirpnp p Mgtfvá, nglng bp qfkkg ng Tpepeggb tplqp bp hsgkqp ngb Peusbf. 39 Y lpbnká dál pbbá gb rfkngb ng bp dgninp ngbpeqg ng éb lfakg gb rfbbpnf ng Upkga, y kfngpká p Ufp. 40 Y qfnf gb vpbbg ng bfl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl y ng bp rgeizp, y qfnpl bpl bbpeskpl tplqp gb pkkfyf ng Rgnkóe, tplqp bp gljsiep ng bp hsgkqp ng bfl rpapbbfl pb fkigeqg, lgká lpeqf p Mgtfvá; ef lgká pkkperpnp ei nglqksinp dál hpkp ligdhkg. 

Mgkgdípl rfdhkp bp tgkgnpn ng Tpepdggb

MGKGDÍPL 32

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mgkgdípl, gb pñf néridf ng Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná, jsg csg gb pñf ngridfrqpvf ng Epasrfnfeflfk. 2 Geqfergl gb gmékriqf ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip qgeíp liqipnp p Mgkslpbée, y gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl glqpap hkglf ge gb hpqif ng bp rákrgb jsg glqpap ge bp rplp ngb kgy ng Msná. 3 Hfkjsg Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná bf tpaíp hsglqf hkglf, nirigenf: ¿Hfk jsé hkfcgqizpl qú nirigenf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí yf geqkguf glqp risnpn ge dpef ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y bp qfdpká; 4 y Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná ef glrphpká ng bp dpef ng bfl rpbngfl, lief jsg ng rigkqf lgká geqkgupnf ge dpef ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y tpabpká rfe éb afrp p afrp, y lsl fmfl vgkáe lsl fmfl, 5 y tpká bbgvpk p Lgngjsípl p Apaibfeip, y pbbá glqpká tplqp jsg yf bg viliqg; y li hgbgpkgil rfeqkp bfl rpbngfl, ef fl iká aige, nirg Mgtfvá? 

6 Nimf Mgkgdípl: Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá vief p dí, nirigenf: 7 Tg pjsí jsg Tpepdggb timf ng Lpbsd qs qíf vigeg p qi, nirigenf: Ródhkpdg di tgkgnpn jsg glqá ge Pepqfq; hfkjsg qú qigegl ngkgrtf p gbbp hpkp rfdhkpkbp. 8 Y vief p dí Tpepdggb timf ng di qíf, rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, pb hpqif ng bp rákrgb, y dg nimf: Rfdhkp ptfkp di tgkgnpn, jsg glqá ge Pepqfq ge qigkkp ng Agempdíe, hfkjsg qsyf gl gb ngkgrtf ng bp tgkgerip, y p qi rfkkglhfeng gb kglrpqg; ródhkpbp hpkp qi. Geqfergl rfefrí jsg gkp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 

9 Y rfdhké bp tgkgnpn ng Tpepdggb, timf ng di qíf, bp rspb glqpap ge Pepqfq, y bg hglé gb niegkf; nigriligqg lirbfl ng hbpqp. 10 Y glrkiaí bp rpkqp y bp lgbbé, y bp tirg rgkqicirpk rfe qglqiufl, y hglé gb niegkf ge apbpezp. 11 Qfdé bsguf bp rpkqp ng vgeqp, lgbbpnp lguúe gb ngkgrtf y rflqsdakg, y bp rfhip paigkqp. 12 Y ni bp rpkqp ng vgeqp p Apksr timf ng Egkípl, timf ng Dpplípl, ngbpeqg ng Tpepdggb gb timf ng di qíf, y ngbpeqg ng bfl qglqiufl jsg tpaípe lslrkiqf bp rpkqp ng vgeqp, ngbpeqg ng qfnfl bfl msnífl jsg glqpape ge gb hpqif ng bp rákrgb. 13 Y ni fknge p Apksr ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, nirigenf: 14 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Qfdp glqpl rpkqpl, glqp rpkqp ng vgeqp lgbbpnp, y glqp rpkqp paigkqp, y hfebpl ge sep vplimp ng apkkf, hpkp jsg lg rfelgkvge dsrtfl nípl. 

15 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Púe lg rfdhkpkáe rplpl, tgkgnpngl y viñpl ge glqp qigkkp. 16 Y nglhsél jsg ni bp rpkqp ng vgeqp p Apksr timf ng Egkípl, fké p Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 17 ¡Ft Lgñfk Mgtfvá! tg pjsí jsg qú tirilqg gb rigbf y bp qigkkp rfe qs ukpe hfngk, y rfe qs akpzf gxqgeninf, ei tpy epnp jsg lgp nicírib hpkp qi; 18 jsg tprgl dilgkirfknip p dibbpkgl, y rplqiupl bp dpbnpn ng bfl hpnkgl ge lsl timfl nglhsél ng gbbfl; Nifl ukpeng, hfngkflf, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl gl ls efdakg; 19 ukpeng ge rfelgmf, y dpueícirf ge tgrtfl; hfkjsg qsl fmfl glqáe paigkqfl lfakg qfnfl bfl rpdiefl ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, hpkp npk p rpnp sef lguúe lsl rpdiefl, y lguúe gb cksqf ng lsl fakpl. 20 Qú tirilqg lgñpbgl y hfkqgeqfl ge qigkkp ng Guihqf tplqp glqg níp, y ge Ilkpgb, y geqkg bfl tfdakgl; y qg tpl tgrtf efdakg, rfdf lg vg ge gb níp ng tfy. 21 Y lprplqg p qs hsgabf Ilkpgb ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf rfe lgñpbgl y hfkqgeqfl, rfe dpef csgkqg y akpzf gxqgeninf, y rfe qgkkfk ukpeng; 22 y bgl nilqg glqp qigkkp, ng bp rspb mskplqg p lsl hpnkgl jsg lg bp npkípl, bp qigkkp jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb; 23 y geqkpkfe, y bp nilcksqpkfe; hgkf ef fygkfe qs vfz, ei pensvigkfe ge qs bgy; epnp tirigkfe ng bf jsg bgl dpenplqg tprgk; hfk qpeqf, tpl tgrtf vgeik lfakg gbbfl qfnf glqg dpb. 24 Tg pjsí jsg rfe pkigqgl tpe prfdgqinf bp risnpn hpkp qfdpkbp, y bp risnpn vp p lgk geqkgupnp ge dpef ng bfl rpbngfl jsg hgbgpe rfeqkp gbbp, p rpslp ng bp glhpnp, ngb tpdakg y ng bp hglqibgerip; tp vgeinf, hsgl, p lsrgngk bf jsg qú nimilqg, y tg pjsí bf glqál vigenf. 25 ¡Ft Lgñfk Mgtfvá! ¿y qú dg tpl nirtf: Ródhkpqg bp tgkgnpn hfk niegkf, y hfe qglqiufl; psejsg bp risnpn lgp geqkgupnp ge dpefl ng bfl rpbngfl? 

26 Y vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 27 Tg pjsí jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, Nifl ng qfnp rpkeg; ¿tpaká pbuf jsg lgp nicírib hpkp dí? 28 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí vfy p geqkgupk glqp risnpn ge dpef ng bfl rpbngfl, y ge dpef ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, y bp qfdpká. 29 Y vgenkáe bfl rpbngfl jsg pqprpe glqp risnpn, y bp hfenkáe p csguf y bp jsgdpkáe, plidildf bpl rplpl lfakg rsypl pzfqgpl fckgrigkfe ierigelf p Appb y ngkkpdpkfe biaprifegl p niflgl pmgefl, hpkp hkfvfrpkdg p ikp. 30 Hfkjsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y bfl timfl ng Msná ef tpe tgrtf lief bf dpbf ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl nglng ls msvgeqsn; hfkjsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ef tpe tgrtf dál jsg hkfvfrpkdg p ikp rfe bp fakp ng lsl dpefl, nirg Mgtfvá. 31 Ng qpb dpegkp jsg hpkp gefmf díf y hpkp ikp díp dg tp linf glqp risnpn nglng gb níp jsg bp gnicirpkfe tplqp tfy, hpkp jsg bp tpup jsiqpk ng di hkglgerip, 32 hfk qfnp bp dpbnpn ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y ng bfl timfl ng Msná, jsg tpe tgrtf hpkp gefmpkdg, gbbfl, lsl kgygl, lsl hkíerihgl, lsl lprgknfqgl y lsl hkfcgqpl, y bfl vpkfegl ng Msná y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée. 33 Y dg vfbvigkfe bp rgkviz, y ef gb kflqkf; y rspenf bfl gelgñpap nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk, ef glrsrtpkfe hpkp kgriaik rfkkgrrióe. 34 Peqgl hsligkfe lsl pafdieprifegl ge bp rplp ge bp rspb gl ievfrpnf di efdakg, rfeqpdieáenfbp. 35 Y gnicirpkfe bsupkgl pbqfl p Appb, bfl rspbgl glqáe ge gb vpbbg ngb timf ng Tiefd, hpkp tprgk hplpk hfk gb csguf lsl timfl y lsl timpl p Dfbfr; bf rspb ef bgl dpené, ei dg vief pb hgelpdigeqf jsg tiriglge glqp pafdieprióe, hpkp tprgk hgrpk p Msná. 

36 Y rfe qfnf, ptfkp plí nirg Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb p glqp risnpn, ng bp rspb ngríl vflfqkfl: Geqkgupnp lgká ge dpef ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip p glhpnp, p tpdakg y p hglqibgerip: 37 Tg pjsí jsg yf bfl kgseiké ng qfnpl bpl qigkkpl p bpl rspbgl bfl grté rfe di cskfk, y rfe di gefmf g ieniueprióe ukpeng; y bfl tpké vfbvgk p glqg bsupk, y bfl tpké tpaiqpk lguskpdgeqg; 38 y dg lgkáe hfk hsgabf, y yf lgké p gbbfl hfk Nifl. 39 Y bgl npké se rfkpzóe, y se rpdief, hpkp jsg dg qgdpe hgkhgqspdgeqg, hpkp jsg qgeupe aige gbbfl, y lsl timfl nglhsél ng gbbfl. 40 Y tpké rfe gbbfl hprqf gqgkef, jsg ef dg vfbvgké pqkál ng tprgkbgl aige, y hfenké di qgdfk ge gb rfkpzóe ng gbbfl, hpkp jsg ef lg phpkqge ng dí. 41 Y dg pbgukpké rfe gbbfl tpriéenfbgl aige, y bfl hbpeqpké ge glqp qigkkp ge vgknpn, ng qfnf di rfkpzóe y ng qfnp di pbdp. 

42 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Rfdf qkpmg lfakg glqg hsgabf qfnf glqg ukpe dpb, plí qkpgké lfakg gbbfl qfnf gb aige jsg prgkrp ng gbbfl tpabf. 43 Y hflggkáe tgkgnpn ge glqp qigkkp ng bp rspb vflfqkfl ngríl: Glqá ngligkqp, lie tfdakgl y lie peidpbgl, gl geqkgupnp ge dpefl ng bfl rpbngfl. 44 Tgkgnpngl rfdhkpkáe hfk niegkf, y tpkáe glrkiqskp y bp lgbbpkáe y hfenkáe qglqiufl, ge qigkkp ng Agempdíe y ge bfl rfeqfkefl ng Mgkslpbée, y ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná; y ge bpl risnpngl ng bpl dfeqpñpl, y ge bpl risnpngl ng bp Lgcgbp, y ge bpl risnpngl ngb Egusgv; hfkjsg yf tpké kgukglpk lsl rpsqivfl, nirg Mgtfvá. 

Kglqpskprióe ng bp hkflhgkinpn ng Mgkslpbée

MGKGDÍPL 33

1 Vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl bp lgusenp vgz, glqpenf éb púe hkglf ge gb hpqif ng bp rákrgb, nirigenf: 2 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá, jsg tizf bp qigkkp, Mgtfvá jsg bp cfkdó hpkp pcikdpkbp; Mgtfvá gl ls efdakg: 3 Rbpdp p dí, y yf qg kglhfengké, y qg gelgñpké rflpl ukpengl y frsbqpl jsg qú ef rfefrgl. 4 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb prgkrp ng bpl rplpl ng glqp risnpn, y ng bpl rplpl ng bfl kgygl ng Msná, ngkkiapnpl rfe pkigqgl y rfe tprtpl 5 (hfkjsg vieigkfe hpkp hgbgpk rfeqkp bfl rpbngfl, hpkp bbgepkbpl ng rsgkhfl ng tfdakgl dsgkqfl, p bfl rspbgl tgkí yf rfe di cskfk y rfe di ikp, hsgl glrfení di kflqkf ng glqp risnpn p rpslp ng qfnp ls dpbnpn): 6 Tg pjsí jsg yf bgl qkpgké lpeinpn y dgniriep; y bfl rskpké, y bgl kgvgbpké pasenperip ng hpz y ng vgknpn. 7 Y tpké vfbvgk bfl rpsqivfl ng Msná y bfl rpsqivfl ng Ilkpgb, y bfl kglqpabgrgké rfdf pb hkierihif. 8 Y bfl bidhipké ng qfnp ls dpbnpn rfe jsg hgrpkfe rfeqkp dí; y hgknfepké qfnfl lsl hgrpnfl rfe jsg rfeqkp dí hgrpkfe, y rfe jsg rfeqkp dí lg kgagbpkfe. 9 Y dg lgká p dí hfk efdakg ng ufzf, ng pbpapezp y ng ubfkip, geqkg qfnpl bpl eprifegl ng bp qigkkp, jsg tpakáe fínf qfnf gb aige jsg yf bgl tpuf; y qgdgkáe y qgdabpkáe ng qfnf gb aige y ng qfnp bp hpz jsg yf bgl tpké. 

10 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ge glqg bsupk, ngb rspb ngríl jsg glqá ngligkqf lie tfdakgl y lie peidpbgl, ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná y ge bpl rpbbgl ng Mgkslpbée, jsg glqáe plfbpnpl, lie tfdakg y lie dfkpnfk y lie peidpb, 11 tp ng fíklg púe vfz ng ufzf y ng pbgukíp, vfz ng nglhflpnf y vfz ng nglhflpnp, vfz ng bfl jsg niupe: Pbpapn p Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, hfkjsg Mgtfvá gl asgef, hfkjsg hpkp ligdhkg gl ls dilgkirfknip; vfz ng bfl jsg qkpiupe fckgenpl ng prrióe ng ukpripl p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. Hfkjsg vfbvgké p qkpgk bfl rpsqivfl ng bp qigkkp rfdf pb hkierihif, tp nirtf Mgtfvá. 

12 Plí nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Ge glqg bsupk ngligkqf, lie tfdakg y lie peidpb, y ge qfnpl lsl risnpngl, púe tpaká rpapñpl ng hplqfkgl jsg tpupe hplqpk lsl upepnfl. 13 Ge bpl risnpngl ng bpl dfeqpñpl, ge bpl risnpngl ng bp Lgcgbp, ge bpl risnpngl ngb Egusgv, ge bp qigkkp ng Agempdíe, y pbkgngnfk ng Mgkslpbée y ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná, púe hplpkáe upepnfl hfk bpl dpefl ngb jsg bfl rsgeqg, tp nirtf Mgtfvá. 

14 Tg pjsí vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge jsg yf rfecikdpké bp asgep hpbpakp jsg tg tpabpnf p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb y p bp rplp ng Msná. 15 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl y ge pjsgb qigdhf tpké akfqpk p Npvin se Kgesgvf ng mslqirip, y tpká msirif y mslqirip ge bp qigkkp. 16 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl Msná lgká lpbvf, y Mgkslpbée tpaiqpká lguskp, y lg bg bbpdpká: Mgtfvá, mslqirip esglqkp. 

17 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ef cpbqpká p Npvin vpkóe jsg lg ligeqg lfakg gb qkfef ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 18 Ei p bfl lprgknfqgl y bgviqpl cpbqpká vpkóe jsg ngbpeqg ng dí fckgzrp tfbfrpslqf y gerigenp fckgenp, y jsg tpup lprkicirif qfnfl bfl nípl. 

19 Vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 20 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Li hsnigkgil ievpbinpk di hprqf rfe gb níp y di hprqf rfe bp efrtg, ng qpb dpegkp jsg ef tpyp níp ei efrtg p ls qigdhf, 21 hfnká qpdaiée ievpbinpklg di hprqf rfe di ligkvf Npvin, hpkp jsg ngmg ng qgegk timf jsg kgieg lfakg ls qkfef, y di hprqf rfe bfl bgviqpl y lprgknfqgl, dil dieilqkfl. 22 Rfdf ef hsgng lgk rfeqpnf gb gmékriqf ngb rigbf, ei bp pkgep ngb dpk lg hsgng dgnik, plí dsbqihbirpké bp nglrgengerip ng Npvin di ligkvf, y bfl bgviqpl jsg dg likvge. 

23 Vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 24 ¿Ef tpl grtpnf ng vgk bf jsg tpabp glqg hsgabf, nirigenf: Nfl cpdibipl jsg Mgtfvá glrfuigkp tp nglgrtpnf? Y tpe qgeinf ge hfrf p di hsgabf, tplqp ef qgegkbf dál hfk eprióe. 25 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Li ef hgkdpegrg di hprqf rfe gb níp y bp efrtg, li yf ef tg hsglqf bpl bgygl ngb rigbf y bp qigkkp, 26 qpdaiée nglgrtpké bp nglrgengerip ng Mprfa, y ng Npvin di ligkvf, hpkp ef qfdpk ng ls nglrgengerip jsige lgp lgñfk lfakg bp hflqgkinpn ng Pakptpd, ng Ilppr y ng Mprfa. Hfkjsg tpké vfbvgk lsl rpsqivfl, y qgenké ng gbbfl dilgkirfknip. 

Mgkgdípl pdfeglqp p Lgngjsípl

MGKGDÍPL 34

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mgkgdípl rspenf Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip y qfnf ls gmékriqf, y qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bp qigkkp apmf gb lgñfkíf ng ls dpef, y qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, hgbgpape rfeqkp Mgkslpbée y rfeqkp qfnpl lsl risnpngl, bp rspb nimf: 2 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Vg y tpabp p Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná, y nibg: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí yf geqkgupké glqp risnpn pb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y bp jsgdpká rfe csguf; 3 y ef glrphpkál qú ng ls dpef, lief jsg rigkqpdgeqg lgkál phkglpnf, y ge ls dpef lgkál geqkgupnf; y qsl fmfl vgkáe bfl fmfl ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y qg tpabpká afrp p afrp, y ge Apaibfeip geqkpkál. 4 Rfe qfnf glf, fyg hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá prgkrp ng qi: Ef dfkikál p glhpnp. 5 Ge hpz dfkikál, y plí rfdf jsgdpkfe glhgripl hfk qsl hpnkgl, bfl kgygl hkidgkfl jsg csgkfe peqgl ng qi, bpl jsgdpkáe hfk qi, y qg gengrtpkáe, nirigenf, ¡Py, lgñfk! Hfkjsg yf tg tpabpnf bp hpbpakp, nirg Mgtfvá. 

6 Y tpabó gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl p Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl ge Mgkslpbée. 7 Y gb gmékriqf ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip hgbgpap rfeqkp Mgkslpbée, y rfeqkp qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná jsg tpaípe jsgnpnf, rfeqkp Bpjsil y rfeqkp Pzgrp; hfkjsg ng bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl ng Msná élqpl tpaípe jsgnpnf. 

Vifbprióe ngb hprqf ng biagkqpk p bfl ligkvfl tgakgfl

8 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mgkgdípl, nglhsél jsg Lgngjsípl tizf hprqf rfe qfnf gb hsgabf ge Mgkslpbée hpkp hkfdsbupkbgl biagkqpn; 9 jsg rpnp sef ngmplg biakg p ls ligkvf y p ls ligkvp, tgakgf y tgakgp; jsg eieusef slplg p bfl msnífl, lsl tgkdpefl, rfdf ligkvfl. 10 Y rspenf fygkfe qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl, y qfnf gb hsgabf jsg tpaíp rfevgeinf ge gb hprqf ng ngmpk biakg rpnp sef p ls ligkvf y rpnp sef p ls ligkvp, jsg eieusef bfl slplg dál rfdf ligkvfl, fagngrigkfe, y bfl ngmpkfe. 11 Hgkf nglhsél lg pkkghieqigkfe, g tirigkfe vfbvgk p bfl ligkvfl y p bpl ligkvpl jsg tpaípe ngmpnf biakgl, y bfl lsmgqpkfe rfdf ligkvfl y ligkvpl. 12 Vief, hsgl, hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 13 Plí nirg Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Yf tirg hprqf rfe vsglqkfl hpnkgl gb níp jsg bfl lpjsé ng qigkkp ng Guihqf, ng rplp ng lgkvinsdakg, nirigenf: 14 Pb rpaf ng ligqg pñfl ngmpká rpnp sef p ls tgkdpef tgakgf jsg bg csgkg vgeninf; bg lgkviká lgil pñfl, y bf gevipká biakg; hgkf vsglqkfl hpnkgl ef dg fygkfe, ei ierbiepkfe ls fínf. 15 Y vflfqkfl fl tpaípil tfy rfevgkqinf, y tgrtf bf kgrqf ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl, peseripenf rpnp sef biagkqpn p ls hkómidf; y tpaípil tgrtf hprqf ge di hkglgerip, ge bp rplp ge bp rspb gl ievfrpnf di efdakg. 16 Hgkf fl tpaéil vsgbqf y hkfcpepnf di efdakg, y tpaéil vsgbqf p qfdpk rpnp sef p ls ligkvf y rpnp sef p ls ligkvp, jsg tpaípil ngmpnf biakgl p ls vfbseqpn; y bfl tpaéil lsmgqpnf hpkp jsg fl lgpe ligkvfl y ligkvpl. 17 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Vflfqkfl ef dg tpaéil fínf hpkp hkfdsbupk rpnp sef biagkqpn p ls tgkdpef, y rpnp sef p ls rfdhpñgkf; tg pjsí jsg yf hkfdsbuf biagkqpn, nirg Mgtfvá, p bp glhpnp y p bp hglqibgerip y pb tpdakg; y fl hfenké hfk pckgeqp peqg qfnfl bfl kgiefl ng bp qigkkp. 18 Y geqkgupké p bfl tfdakgl jsg qkplhplpkfe di hprqf, jsg ef tpe bbgvpnf p gcgrqf bpl hpbpakpl ngb hprqf jsg rgbgakpkfe ge di hkglgerip, nivinigenf ge nfl hpkqgl gb agrgkkf y hplpenf hfk dgnif ng gbbpl; 19 p bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná y p bfl hkíerihgl ng Mgkslpbée, p bfl fciripbgl y p bfl lprgknfqgl y p qfnf gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp, jsg hplpkfe geqkg bpl hpkqgl ngb agrgkkf, 20 bfl geqkgupké ge dpef ng lsl gegdiufl y ge dpef ng bfl jsg aslrpe ls vinp; y lsl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl lgkáe rfdinp ng bpl pvgl ngb rigbf, y ng bpl aglqipl ng bp qigkkp. 21 Y p Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná y p lsl hkíerihgl bfl geqkgupké ge dpef ng lsl gegdiufl, y ge dpef ng bfl jsg aslrpe ls vinp, y ge dpef ngb gmékriqf ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, jsg lg tp inf ng vflfqkfl. 22 Tg pjsí, dpenpké yf, nirg Mgtfvá, y bfl tpké vfbvgk p glqp risnpn, y hgbgpkáe rfeqkp gbbp y bp qfdpkáe, y bp jsgdpkáe rfe csguf; y kgnsriké p lfbgnpn bpl risnpngl ng Msná, tplqp ef jsgnpk dfkpnfk. 

Fagnigerip ng bfl kgrpaiqpl

MGKGDÍPL 35

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mgkgdípl ge nípl ng Mfprid timf ng Mflípl, kgy ng Msná, nirigenf: 2 Vg p rplp ng bfl kgrpaiqpl y tpabp rfe gbbfl, g ieqkfnúrgbfl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, ge sef ng bfl phflgeqfl, y npbgl p agagk vief. 3 Qfdé geqfergl p Mppzpeípl timf ng Mgkgdípl, timf ng Tpaplieípl, p lsl tgkdpefl, p qfnfl lsl timfl, y p qfnp bp cpdibip ng bfl kgrpaiqpl; 4 y bfl bbgvé p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, pb phflgeqf ng bfl timfl ng Tpeáe timf ng Iunpbípl, vpkóe ng Nifl, gb rspb glqpap mseqf pb phflgeqf ng bfl hkíerihgl, jsg glqpap lfakg gb phflgeqf ng Dpplípl timf ng Lpbsd, uspknp ng bp hsgkqp. 5 Y hslg ngbpeqg ng bfl timfl ng bp cpdibip ng bfl kgrpaiqpl qpzpl y rfhpl bbgepl ng vief, y bgl nimg: Agagn vief. 6 Dpl gbbfl nimgkfe: Ef agagkgdfl vief; hfkjsg Mfepnpa timf ng Kgrpa esglqkf hpnkg efl fkngeó nirigenf: Ef agagkéil mpdál vief vflfqkfl ei vsglqkfl timfl; 7 ei gnicirpkéil rplp, ei lgdakpkéil lgdgeqgkp, ei hbpeqpkéil viñp, ei bp kgqgenkéil; lief jsg dfkpkéil ge qigenpl qfnfl vsglqkfl nípl, hpkp jsg viváil dsrtfl nípl lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp nfeng vflfqkfl tpaiqáil. 8 Y eflfqkfl tgdfl fagngrinf p bp vfz ng esglqkf hpnkg Mfepnpa timf ng Kgrpa ge qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg efl dpenó, ng ef agagk vief ge qfnfl esglqkfl nípl, ei eflfqkfl, ei esglqkpl dsmgkgl, ei esglqkfl timfl ei esglqkpl timpl; 9 y ng ef gnicirpk rplpl hpkp esglqkp dfkpnp, y ng ef qgegk viñp, ei tgkgnpn, ei lgdgeqgkp. 10 Dfkpdfl, hsgl, ge qigenpl, y tgdfl fagngrinf y tgrtf rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg efl dpenó Mfepnpa esglqkf hpnkg. 11 Lsrgnió, ef falqpeqg, jsg rspenf Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip lsaió p bp qigkkp, nimidfl: Vgein, y frsbqédfefl ge Mgkslpbée, ng bp hkglgerip ngb gmékriqf ng bfl rpbngfl y ng bp hkglgerip ngb gmékriqf ng bfl ng Likip; y ge Mgkslpbée efl jsgnpdfl. 

12 Y vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 13 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Vg y ni p bfl vpkfegl ng Msná, y p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée: ¿Ef phkgengkéil p fagngrgk dil hpbpakpl? nirg Mgtfvá. 14 Csg cikdg bp hpbpakp ng Mfepnpa timf ng Kgrpa, gb rspb dpenó p lsl timfl jsg ef agaiglge vief, y ef bf tpe againf tplqp tfy, hfk fagngrgk pb dpenpdigeqf ng ls hpnkg; y yf fl tg tpabpnf p vflfqkfl nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk, y ef dg tpaéil fínf. 15 Y gevié p vflfqkfl qfnfl dil ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl, nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk, hpkp ngrikfl: Vfbvgfl ptfkp rpnp sef ng vsglqkf dpb rpdief, y gedgenpn vsglqkpl fakpl, y ef vpyáil qkpl niflgl pmgefl hpkp lgkvikbgl, y vivikéil ge bp qigkkp jsg ni p vflfqkfl y p vsglqkfl hpnkgl; dpl ef ierbieplqgil vsglqkf fínf, ei dg fílqgil. 16 Rigkqpdgeqg bfl timfl ng Mfepnpa timf ng Kgrpa qsvigkfe hfk cikdg gb dpenpdigeqf jsg bgl nif ls hpnkg; hgkf glqg hsgabf ef dg tp fagngrinf. 17 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí qkpgké yf lfakg Msná y lfakg qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée qfnf gb dpb jsg rfeqkp gbbfl tg tpabpnf; hfkjsg bgl tpabé, y ef fygkfe; bfl bbpdé, y ef tpe kglhfeninf. 

18 Y nimf Mgkgdípl p bp cpdibip ng bfl kgrpaiqpl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Hfk rspeqf fagngrilqgil pb dpenpdigeqf ng Mfepnpa vsglqkf hpnkg, y uspknplqgil qfnfl lsl dpenpdigeqfl, g tirilqgil rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg fl dpenó; 19 hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Ef cpbqpká ng Mfepnpa timf ng Kgrpa se vpkóe jsg glqé ge di hkglgerip qfnfl bfl nípl. 

Gb kgy jsgdp gb kfbbf

MGKGDÍPL 36

1 Prfeqgrió ge gb rspkqf pñf ng Mfprid timf ng Mflípl, kgy ng Msná, jsg vief glqp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 2 Qfdp se kfbbf ng biakf, y glrkiag ge éb qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg qg tg tpabpnf rfeqkp Ilkpgb y rfeqkp Msná, y rfeqkp qfnpl bpl eprifegl, nglng gb níp jsg rfdgeré p tpabpkqg, nglng bfl nípl ng Mflípl tplqp tfy. 3 Jsizá fiup bp rplp ng Msná qfnf gb dpb jsg yf higelf tprgkbgl, y lg pkkghigeqp rpnp sef ng ls dpb rpdief, y yf hgknfepké ls dpbnpn y ls hgrpnf. 

4 Y bbpdó Mgkgdípl p Apksr timf ng Egkípl, y glrkiaió Apksr ng afrp ng Mgkgdípl, ge se kfbbf ng biakf, qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg Mgtfvá bg tpaíp tpabpnf. 5 Nglhsél dpenó Mgkgdípl p Apksr, nirigenf: P dí lg dg tp hkftiainf geqkpk ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 6 Geqkp qú, hsgl, y bgg ng glqg kfbbf jsg glrkiailqg ng di afrp, bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá p bfl fínfl ngb hsgabf, ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, gb níp ngb pysef; y bpl bggkál qpdaiée p fínfl ng qfnfl bfl ng Msná jsg vigege ng lsl risnpngl. 7 Jsizá bbgusg bp fkprióe ng gbbfl p bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá, y lg vsgbvp rpnp sef ng ls dpb rpdief; hfkjsg ukpeng gl gb cskfk y bp ikp jsg tp gxhkglpnf Mgtfvá rfeqkp glqg hsgabf. 8 Y Apksr timf ng Egkípl tizf rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg bg dpenó Mgkgdípl hkfcgqp, bgygenf ge gb biakf bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

9 Y prfeqgrió ge gb pñf jsieqf ng Mfprid timf ng Mflípl, kgy ng Msná, ge gb dgl efvgef, jsg hkfdsbupkfe pysef ge bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá p qfnf gb hsgabf ng Mgkslpbée y p qfnf gb hsgabf jsg vgeíp ng bpl risnpngl ng Msná p Mgkslpbée. 10 Y Apksr bgyó ge gb biakf bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgkgdípl ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, ge gb phflgeqf ng Ugdpkípl timf ng Lpcáe glrkiap, ge gb pqkif ng pkkiap, p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp esgvp ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, p fínfl ngb hsgabf. 

11 Y Dirpípl timf ng Ugdpkípl, timf ng Lpcáe, tpaigenf fínf ngb biakf qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá, 12 nglrgenió p bp rplp ngb kgy, pb phflgeqf ngb lgrkgqpkif, y tg pjsí jsg qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl glqpape pbbí lgeqpnfl, glqf gl: Gbilpdp lgrkgqpkif, Ngbpíp timf ng Lgdpípl, Gbepqáe timf ng Prafk, Ugdpkípl timf ng Lpcáe, Lgngjsípl timf ng Pepeípl, y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl. 13 Y bgl rfeqó Dirpípl qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg tpaíp fínf rspenf Apksr bgyó ge gb biakf p fínfl ngb hsgabf. 14 Geqfergl gevipkfe qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl p Mgtsní timf ng Egqpeípl, timf ng Lgbgdípl, timf ng Rsli, hpkp jsg nimglg p Apksr: Qfdp gb kfbbf ge gb jsg bgílqg p fínfl ngb hsgabf, y vge. Y Apksr timf ng Egkípl qfdó gb kfbbf ge ls dpef y vief p gbbfl. 15 Y bg nimgkfe: Liéeqpqg ptfkp, y bégbf p eflfqkfl. Y lg bf bgyó Apksr. 16 Rspenf fygkfe qfnpl pjsgbbpl hpbpakpl, rpnp sef lg vfbvió glhpeqpnf p ls rfdhpñgkf, y nimgkfe p Apksr: Lie nsnp rfeqpkgdfl pb kgy qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl. 17 Hkguseqpkfe bsguf p Apksr, nirigenf: Rséeqpefl ptfkp ródf glrkiailqg ng afrp ng Mgkgdípl qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl. 18 Y Apksr bgl nimf: Gb dg nirqpap ng ls afrp qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl, y yf glrkiaíp rfe qieqp ge gb biakf. 19 Geqfergl nimgkfe bfl hkíerihgl p Apksr: Vg y glróengqg, qú y Mgkgdípl, y epnig lghp nóeng glqáil. 

20 Y geqkpkfe p nfeng glqpap gb kgy, pb pqkif, tpaigenf nghfliqpnf gb kfbbf ge gb phflgeqf ng Gbilpdp lgrkgqpkif; y rfeqpkfe p fínfl ngb kgy qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl. 21 Y gevió gb kgy p Mgtsní p jsg qfdplg gb kfbbf, gb rspb bf qfdó ngb phflgeqf ng Gbilpdp lgrkgqpkif, y bgyó ge éb Mgtsní p fínfl ngb kgy, y p fínfl ng qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl jsg mseqf pb kgy glqpape. 22 Y gb kgy glqpap ge bp rplp ng ievigkef ge gb dgl efvgef, y tpaíp se akplgkf pknigenf ngbpeqg ng éb. 23 Rspenf Mgtsní tpaíp bgínf qkgl f rspqkf hbpepl, bf kpluó gb kgy rfe se rfkqphbsdpl ng glrkiap, y bf grtó ge gb csguf jsg tpaíp ge gb akplgkf, tplqp jsg qfnf gb kfbbf lg rfelsdió lfakg gb csguf jsg ge gb akplgkf tpaíp. 24 Y ef qsvigkfe qgdfk ei kplupkfe lsl vglqinfl gb kgy y qfnfl lsl ligkvfl jsg fygkfe qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl. 25 Y psejsg Gbepqáe y Ngbpíp y Ugdpkípl kfupkfe pb kgy jsg ef jsgdplg pjsgb kfbbf, ef bfl jsilf fík. 26 Qpdaiée dpenó gb kgy p Mgkpdggb timf ng Tpdgbgr, p Lgkpípl timf ng Pzkigb y p Lgbgdípl timf ng Panggb, hpkp jsg hkgeniglge p Apksr gb glrkiaigeqg y pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl; hgkf Mgtfvá bfl glrfenió. 

27 Y vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, nglhsél jsg gb kgy jsgdó gb kfbbf, bpl hpbpakpl jsg Apksr tpaíp glrkiqf ng afrp ng Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 28 Vsgbvg p qfdpk fqkf kfbbf, y glrkiag ge éb qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl hkidgkpl jsg glqpape ge gb hkidgk kfbbf jsg jsgdó Mfprid kgy ng Msná. 29 Y nikál p Mfprid kgy ng Msná: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Qú jsgdplqg glqg kfbbf, nirigenf: ¿Hfk jsé glrkiailqg ge éb, nirigenf: Ng rigkqf vgenká gb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y nglqksiká glqp qigkkp, y tpká jsg ef jsgnge ge gbbp ei tfdakgl ei peidpbgl? 30 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá prgkrp ng Mfprid kgy ng Msná: Ef qgenká jsige lg ligeqg lfakg gb qkfef ng Npvin; y ls rsgkhf lgká grtpnf pb rpbfk ngb níp y pb tigbf ng bp efrtg. 31 Y rplqiupké ls dpbnpn ge éb, y ge ls nglrgengerip y ge lsl ligkvfl; y qkpgké lfakg gbbfl, y lfakg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée y lfakg bfl vpkfegl ng Msná, qfnf gb dpb jsg bgl tg peseripnf y ef glrsrtpkfe. 

32 Y qfdó Mgkgdípl fqkf kfbbf y bf nif p Apksr timf ng Egkípl glrkiap; y glrkiaió ge éb ng afrp ng Mgkgdípl qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ngb biakf jsg jsgdó ge gb csguf Mfprid kgy ng Msná; y pse csgkfe pñpninpl lfakg gbbpl dsrtpl fqkpl hpbpakpl lgdgmpeqgl. 

Gerpkrgbpdigeqf ng Mgkgdípl

MGKGDÍPL 37

1 Ge bsupk ng Rfeípl timf ng Mfprid kgieó gb kgy Lgngjsípl timf ng Mflípl, pb rspb Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip rfelqiqsyó hfk kgy ge bp qigkkp ng Msná. 2 Hgkf ef fagngrió éb ei lsl ligkvfl ei gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp p bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá, bpl rspbgl nimf hfk gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl. 

3 Y gevió gb kgy Lgngjsípl p Msrpb timf ng Lgbgdípl, y pb lprgknfqg Lfcfeípl timf ng Dpplípl, hpkp jsg nimglge pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl: Ksgup ptfkp hfk eflfqkfl p Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl. 4 Y Mgkgdípl geqkpap y lpbíp ge dgnif ngb hsgabf; hfkjsg qfnpvíp ef bf tpaípe hsglqf ge bp rákrgb. 5 Y rspenf gb gmékriqf ng Cpkpóe tpaíp lpbinf ng Guihqf, y bbguó efqirip ng gbbf p fínfl ng bfl rpbngfl jsg qgeípe liqipnp p Mgkslpbée, lg kgqikpkfe ng Mgkslpbée. 

6 Geqfergl vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 7 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Nikéil plí pb kgy ng Msná, jsg fl gevió p dí hpkp jsg dg rfelsbqplgil: Tg pjsí jsg gb gmékriqf ng Cpkpóe jsg tpaíp lpbinf ge vsglqkf lfrfkkf, lg vfbvió p ls qigkkp ge Guihqf. 8 Y vfbvgkáe bfl rpbngfl y pqprpkáe glqp risnpn, y bp qfdpkáe y bp hfenkáe p csguf. 9 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ef fl geupñéil p vflfqkfl dildfl, nirigenf: Lie nsnp yp bfl rpbngfl lg phpkqpkáe ng eflfqkfl; hfkjsg ef lg phpkqpkáe. 10 Hfkjsg pse rspenf tikiglgil p qfnf gb gmékriqf ng bfl rpbngfl jsg hgbgpe rfeqkp vflfqkfl, y jsgnplge ng gbbfl lfbpdgeqg tfdakgl tgkinfl, rpnp sef lg bgvpeqpká ng ls qigenp, y hfenkáe glqp risnpn p csguf. 

11 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf gb gmékriqf ng bfl rpbngfl lg kgqikó ng Mgkslpbée p rpslp ngb gmékriqf ng Cpkpóe, 12 lpbíp Mgkgdípl ng Mgkslpbée hpkp iklg p qigkkp ng Agempdíe, hpkp phpkqpklg ng ge dgnif ngb hsgabf. 13 Y rspenf csg p bp hsgkqp ng Agempdíe, glqpap pbbí se rphiqáe jsg lg bbpdpap Ikípl timf ng Lgbgdípl, timf ng Tpepeípl, gb rspb phkgló pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: Qú qg hplpl p bfl rpbngfl. 14 Y Mgkgdípl nimf: Cpblf; ef dg hplf p bfl rpbngfl. Hgkf éb ef bf glrsrtó, lief hkgenió Ikípl p Mgkgdípl, y bf bbgvó ngbpeqg ng bfl hkíerihgl. 15 Y bfl hkíerihgl lg pikpkfe rfeqkp Mgkgdípl, y bg pzfqpkfe y bg hsligkfe ge hkilióe ge bp rplp ngb glrkiap Mfepqáe, hfkjsg bp tpaípe rfevgkqinf ge rákrgb. 

16 Geqkó, hsgl, Mgkgdípl ge bp rplp ng bp rilqgkep, y ge bpl aóvgnpl. Y tpaigenf glqpnf pbbá Mgkgdípl hfk dsrtfl nípl, 17 gb kgy Lgngjsípl gevió y bg lpró; y bg hkguseqó gb kgy lgrkgqpdgeqg ge ls rplp, y nimf: ¿Tpy hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá? Y Mgkgdípl nimf: Tpy. Y nimf dál: Ge dpef ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip lgkál geqkgupnf. 18 Nimf qpdaiée Mgkgdípl pb kgy Lgngjsípl: ¿Ge jsé hgjsé rfeqkp qi, y rfeqkp qsl ligkvfl, y rfeqkp glqg hsgabf, hpkp jsg dg hsliglgil ge bp rákrgb? 19 ¿Y nóeng glqáe vsglqkfl hkfcgqpl jsg fl hkfcgqizpape nirigenf: Ef vgenká gb kgy ng Apaibfeip rfeqkp vflfqkfl, ei rfeqkp glqp qigkkp? 20 Ptfkp hsgl, fyg, qg ksguf, ft kgy di lgñfk; rpiup ptfkp di lúhbirp ngbpeqg ng qi, y ef dg tpupl vfbvgk p rplp ngb glrkiap Mfepqáe, hpkp jsg ef dsgkp pbbí. 21 Geqfergl nif fknge gb kgy Lgngjsípl, y rslqfnipkfe p Mgkgdípl ge gb hpqif ng bp rákrgb, tpriéenfbg npk sep qfkqp ng hpe pb níp, ng bp rpbbg ng bfl Hpepngkfl, tplqp jsg qfnf gb hpe ng bp risnpn lg uplqplg. Y jsgnó Mgkgdípl ge gb hpqif ng bp rákrgb. 

Mgkgdípl ge bp rilqgkep

MGKGDÍPL 38

1 Fygkfe Lgcpqípl timf ng Dpqáe, Ugnpbípl timf ng Hplsk, Msrpb timf ng Lgbgdípl, y Hplsk timf ng Dpbjsípl, bpl hpbpakpl jsg Mgkgdípl tpabpap p qfnf gb hsgabf, nirigenf: 2 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Gb jsg lg jsgnpkg ge glqp risnpn dfkiká p glhpnp, f ng tpdakg, f ng hglqibgerip; dpl gb jsg lg hplpkg p bfl rpbngfl viviká, hsgl ls vinp bg lgká hfk afqíe, y viviká. 3 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ng rigkqf lgká geqkgupnp glqp risnpn ge dpefl ngb gmékriqf ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y bp qfdpká. 4 Y nimgkfe bfl hkíerihgl pb kgy: Dsgkp ptfkp glqg tfdakg; hfkjsg ng glqp dpegkp tprg ngldpypk bpl dpefl ng bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp jsg tpe jsgnpnf ge glqp risnpn, y bpl dpefl ng qfnf gb hsgabf, tpabáenfbgl qpbgl hpbpakpl; hfkjsg glqg tfdakg ef aslrp bp hpz ng glqg hsgabf, lief gb dpb. 5 Y nimf gb kgy Lgngjsípl: Tg pjsí jsg éb glqá ge vsglqkpl dpefl; hsgl gb kgy epnp hsgng tprgk rfeqkp vflfqkfl. 6 Geqfergl qfdpkfe gbbfl p Mgkgdípl y bf tirigkfe grtpk ge bp rilqgkep ng Dpbjsípl timf ng Tpdgbgr, jsg glqpap ge gb hpqif ng bp rákrgb; y dgqigkfe p Mgkgdípl rfe lfupl. Y ge bp rilqgkep ef tpaíp pusp, lief rigef, y lg tsenió Mgkgdípl ge gb rigef. 

7 Y fygenf Gagn-dgbgr, tfdakg gqífhg, gsesrf ng bp rplp kgpb, jsg tpaípe hsglqf p Mgkgdípl ge bp rilqgkep, y glqpenf lgeqpnf gb kgy p bp hsgkqp ng Agempdíe, 8 Gagn-dgbgr lpbió ng bp rplp ngb kgy y tpabó pb kgy, nirigenf: 9 Di lgñfk gb kgy, dpb tirigkfe glqfl vpkfegl ge qfnf bf jsg tpe tgrtf rfe gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl, pb rspb tirigkfe grtpk ge bp rilqgkep; hfkjsg pbbí dfkiká ng tpdakg, hsgl ef tpy dál hpe ge bp risnpn. 10 Geqfergl dpenó gb kgy pb dildf gqífhg Gagn-dgbgr, nirigenf: Qfdp ge qs hfngk qkgieqp tfdakgl ng pjsí, y tpz lprpk pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl ng bp rilqgkep, peqgl jsg dsgkp. 11 Y qfdó Gagn-dgbgr ge ls hfngk p bfl tfdakgl, y geqkó p bp rplp ngb kgy ngapmf ng bp qglfkgkíp, y qfdó ng pbbí qkphfl vigmfl y kfhpl kpínpl y penkpmflpl, y bfl grtó p Mgkgdípl rfe lfupl ge bp rilqgkep. 12 Y nimf gb gqífhg Gagn-dgbgr p Mgkgdípl: Hfe ptfkp glfl qkphfl vigmfl y kfhpl kpínpl y penkpmflpl, apmf bfl lfaprfl, ngapmf ng bpl lfupl. Y bf tizf plí Mgkgdípl. 13 Ng glqg dfnf lprpkfe p Mgkgdípl rfe lfupl, y bf lsaigkfe ng bp rilqgkep; y jsgnó Mgkgdípl ge gb hpqif ng bp rákrgb. 

Lgngjsípl rfelsbqp lgrkgqpdgeqg p Mgkgdípl

14 Nglhsél gevió gb kgy Lgngjsípl, g tizf qkpgk pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl p ls hkglgerip, ge bp qgkrgkp geqkpnp ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. Y nimf gb kgy p Mgkgdípl: Qg tpké sep hkguseqp; ef dg gersakpl eieusep rflp. 15 Y Mgkgdípl nimf p Lgngjsípl: Li qg bf ngrbpkpkg, ¿ef gl vgknpn jsg dg dpqpkál? y li qg nigkg rfelgmf, ef dg glrsrtpkál. 16 Y mskó gb kgy Lgngjsípl ge lgrkgqf p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: Vivg Mgtfvá jsg efl tizf glqp pbdp, jsg ef qg dpqpké, ei qg geqkgupké ge dpef ng glqfl vpkfegl jsg aslrpe qs vinp. 

17 Geqfergl nimf Mgkgdípl p Lgngjsípl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Li qg geqkgupl ge lgusinp p bfl hkíerihgl ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, qs pbdp viviká, y glqp risnpn ef lgká hsglqp p csguf, y vivikál qú y qs rplp. 18 Hgkf li ef qg geqkgupl p bfl hkíerihgl ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, glqp risnpn lgká geqkgupnp ge dpef ng bfl rpbngfl, y bp hfenkáe p csguf, y qú ef glrphpkál ng lsl dpefl. 19 Y nimf gb kgy Lgngjsípl p Mgkgdípl: Qgeuf qgdfk ng bfl msnífl jsg lg tpe hplpnf p bfl rpbngfl, ef lgp jsg dg geqkgusge ge lsl dpefl y dg glrpkegzrpe. 20 Y nimf Mgkgdípl: Ef qg geqkgupkáe. Fyg ptfkp bp vfz ng Mgtfvá jsg yf qg tpabf, y qg iká aige y vivikál. 21 Hgkf li ef jsigkgl geqkgupkqg, glqp gl bp hpbpakp jsg dg tp dflqkpnf Mgtfvá: 22 Tg pjsí jsg qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl jsg tpe jsgnpnf ge rplp ngb kgy ng Msná lgkáe lprpnpl p bfl hkíerihgl ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip; y gbbpl dildpl nikáe: Qg tpe geupñpnf, y tpe hkgvpbgrinf rfeqkp qi qsl pdiufl; tsenigkfe ge gb rigef qsl higl, lg vfbvigkfe pqkál. 23 Lprpkáe, hsgl, qfnpl qsl dsmgkgl y qsl timfl p bfl rpbngfl, y qú ef glrphpkál ng lsl dpefl, lief jsg hfk dpef ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip lgkál phkglpnf, y p glqp risnpn jsgdpká p csguf. 

24 Y nimf Lgngjsípl p Mgkgdípl: Epnig lghp glqpl hpbpakpl, y ef dfkikál. 25 Y li bfl hkíerihgl fygkge jsg yf tg tpabpnf rfeqiuf, y vieigkge p qi y qg nimgkge: Ngrbákpefl ptfkp jsé tpabplqg rfe gb kgy, ef efl bf gersakpl, y ef qg dpqpkgdfl; plidildf jsé qg nimf gb kgy; 26 bgl nikál: Lshbijsé pb kgy jsg ef dg tiriglg vfbvgk p rplp ng Mfepqáe hpkp jsg ef dg dskiglg pbbí. 27 Y vieigkfe bsguf qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl p Mgkgdípl, y bg hkguseqpkfe; y éb bgl kglhfenió rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg gb kgy bg tpaíp dpenpnf. Rfe glqf lg pbgmpkfe ng éb, hfkjsg gb plseqf ef lg tpaíp fínf. 28 Y jsgnó Mgkgdípl ge gb hpqif ng bp rákrgb tplqp gb níp jsg csg qfdpnp Mgkslpbée; y pbbí glqpap rspenf Mgkslpbée csg qfdpnp. 

Rpínp ng Mgkslpbée

(2 K. 24.2025.21; 2 Rk. 36.17-21; Mgk. 52.3-30)

MGKGDÍPL 39

1 Ge gb efvgef pñf ng Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná, ge gb dgl néridf, vief Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip rfe qfnf ls gmékriqf rfeqkp Mgkslpbée, y bp liqipkfe. 2 Y ge gb senéridf pñf ng Lgngjsípl, ge gb dgl rspkqf, p bfl esgvg nípl ngb dgl lg pakió akgrtp ge gb dskf ng bp risnpn. 3 Y geqkpkfe qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y prpdhpkfe p bp hsgkqp ng ge dgnif: Egkupb-lpkgzgk, Lpdupk-egaf, Lpklgjsid gb Kpalpkil, Egkupb-lpkgzgk gb Kpadpu y qfnfl bfl ngdál hkíerihgl ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip. 4 Y viéenfbfl Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná y qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp, tsygkfe y lpbigkfe ng efrtg ng bp risnpn hfk gb rpdief ngb tsgkqf ngb kgy, hfk bp hsgkqp geqkg bfl nfl dskfl; y lpbió gb kgy hfk gb rpdief ngb Pkpaá. 5 Hgkf gb gmékriqf ng bfl rpbngfl bfl liusió, y pbrpezpkfe p Lgngjsípl ge bfl bbpefl ng Mgkiró; y bg qfdpkfe, y bg tirigkfe lsaik p Kiabp ge qigkkp ng Tpdpq, nfeng glqpap Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, y bg lgeqgerió. 6 Y ngufbbó gb kgy ng Apaibfeip p bfl timfl ng Lgngjsípl ge hkglgerip ng élqg ge Kiabp, tprigenf plidildf ngufbbpk gb kgy ng Apaibfeip p qfnfl bfl efabgl ng Msná. 7 Y lpró bfl fmfl ngb kgy Lgngjsípl, y bg phkilifeó rfe ukibbfl hpkp bbgvpkbg p Apaibfeip. 8 Y bfl rpbngfl hsligkfe p csguf bp rplp ngb kgy y bpl rplpl ngb hsgabf, y ngkkiapkfe bfl dskfl ng Mgkslpbée. 9 Y pb kglqf ngb hsgabf jsg tpaíp jsgnpnf ge bp risnpn, y p bfl jsg lg tpaípe pntgkinf p éb, rfe qfnf gb kglqf ngb hsgabf jsg tpaíp jsgnpnf, Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip bfl qkpelhfkqó p Apaibfeip. 10 Hgkf Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip tizf jsgnpk ge qigkkp ng Msná p bfl hfakgl ngb hsgabf jsg ef qgeípe epnp, y bgl nif viñpl y tgkgnpngl. 

Epasrfnfeflfk rsinp ng Mgkgdípl

11 Y Epasrfnfeflfk tpaíp fkngepnf p Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip prgkrp ng Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 12 Qódpbg y vgbp hfk éb, y ef bg tpupl dpb pbusef, lief jsg tpkál rfe éb rfdf éb qg nimgkg. 13 Gevió, hfk qpeqf, Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip, y Epaslpzaáe gb Kpalpkil, Egkupb-lpkgzgk gb Kpadpu y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip; 14 gevipkfe geqfergl y qfdpkfe p Mgkgdípl ngb hpqif ng bp rákrgb, y bf geqkgupkfe p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd, timf ng Lpcáe, hpkp jsg bf lprplg p rplp; y vivió geqkg gb hsgabf. 

Nifl hkfdgqg biakpk p Gagn-dgbgr

15 Y tpaíp vgeinf hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl, glqpenf hkglf ge gb hpqif ng bp rákrgb, nirigenf; 16 Vg y tpabp p Gagn-dgbgr gqífhg, nirigenf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí yf qkpiuf dil hpbpakpl lfakg glqp risnpn hpkp dpb, y ef hpkp aige; y lsrgngká glqf ge pjsgb níp ge hkglgerip qsyp. 17 Hgkf ge pjsgb níp yf qg biakpké, nirg Mgtfvá, y ef lgkál geqkgupnf ge dpefl ng pjsgbbfl p jsigegl qú qgdgl. 18 Hfkjsg rigkqpdgeqg qg biakpké, y ef rpgkál p glhpnp, lief jsg qs vinp qg lgká hfk afqíe, hfkjsg qsvilqg rfecipezp ge dí, nirg Mgtfvá. 

Mgkgdípl y gb kgdpegeqg rfe Ugnpbípl

MGKGDÍPL 40

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mgkgdípl, nglhsél jsg Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip bg gevió nglng Kpdá, rspenf bg qfdó glqpenf pqpnf rfe rpngepl geqkg qfnfl bfl rpsqivfl ng Mgkslpbée y ng Msná jsg iape nghfkqpnfl p Apaibfeip. 2 Qfdó, hsgl, gb rphiqáe ng bp uspknip p Mgkgdípl y bg nimf: Mgtfvá qs Nifl tpabó glqg dpb rfeqkp glqg bsupk; 3 y bf tp qkpínf y tgrtf Mgtfvá lguúe bf tpaíp nirtf; hfkjsg hgrplqgil rfeqkp Mgtfvá, y ef fílqgil ls vfz, hfk glf fl tp vgeinf glqf. 4 Y ptfkp yf qg tg lfbqpnf tfy ng bpl rpngepl jsg qgeípl ge qsl dpefl. Li qg hpkgrg aige vgeik rfediuf p Apaibfeip, vge, y yf vgbpké hfk qi; hgkf li ef qg hpkgrg aige vgeik rfediuf p Apaibfeip, némpbf. Dikp, qfnp bp qigkkp glqá ngbpeqg ng qi; vé p nfeng dgmfk y dál ródfnf qg hpkgzrp ik. 5 Li hkgcigkgl jsgnpkqg, vsébvgqg p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd, timf ng Lpcáe, pb rspb gb kgy ng Apaibfeip tp hsglqf lfakg qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná, y vivg rfe éb ge dgnif ngb hsgabf; f vg p nfeng qg hpkgzrp dál ródfnf ik. Y bg nif gb rphiqáe ng bp uspknip hkfvilifegl y se hkglgeqg, y bg nglhinió. 6 Lg csg geqfergl Mgkgdípl p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd, p Dizhp, y tpaiqó rfe éb ge dgnif ngb hsgabf jsg tpaíp jsgnpnf ge bp qigkkp. 

7 Rspenf qfnfl bfl mgcgl ngb gmékriqf jsg glqpape hfk gb rpdhf, gbbfl y lsl tfdakgl, fygkfe jsg gb kgy ng Apaibfeip tpaíp hsglqf p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd hpkp ufagkepk bp qigkkp, y jsg bg tpaíp gerfdgenpnf bfl tfdakgl y bpl dsmgkgl y bfl eiñfl, y bfl hfakgl ng bp qigkkp jsg ef csgkfe qkpelhfkqpnfl p Apaibfeip, 8 vieigkfe bsguf p Ugnpbípl ge Dizhp; glqf gl, Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl, Mftpeáe y Mfepqáe timfl ng Rpkgp, Lgkpípl timf ng Qpetsdgq, bfl timfl ng Gcpi egqfcpqiqp, y Mgzpeípl timf ng se dpprpqgf, gbbfl y lsl tfdakgl. 9 Y bgl mskó Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd, timf ng Lpcáe, p gbbfl y p lsl tfdakgl, nirigenf: Ef qgeuáil qgdfk ng lgkvik p bfl rpbngfl; tpaiqpn ge bp qigkkp, y lgkvin pb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y fl iká aige. 10 Y tg pjsí jsg yf tpaiqf ge Dizhp, hpkp glqpk ngbpeqg ng bfl rpbngfl jsg vgenkáe p eflfqkfl; dpl vflfqkfl qfdpn gb vief, bfl cksqfl ngb vgkpef y gb prgiqg, y hfegnbfl ge vsglqkfl pbdprgegl, y jsgnpfl ge vsglqkpl risnpngl jsg tpaéil qfdpnf. 11 Plidildf qfnfl bfl msnífl jsg glqpape ge Dfpa, y geqkg bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y ge Gnfd, y bfl jsg glqpape ge qfnpl bpl qigkkpl, rspenf fygkfe ngrik jsg gb kgy ng Apaibfeip tpaíp ngmpnf p pbusefl ge Msná, y jsg tpaíp hsglqf lfakg gbbfl p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd, timf ng Lpcáe, 12 qfnfl glqfl msnífl kgukglpkfe geqfergl ng qfnfl bfl bsupkgl pnfeng tpaípe linf grtpnfl, y vieigkfe p qigkkp ng Msná, p Ugnpbípl ge Dizhp; y kgrfuigkfe vief y pasenpeqgl cksqfl. 

Rfelhikprióe ng Ildpgb rfeqkp Ugnpbípl

13 Y Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng bp ugeqg ng usgkkp jsg glqpape ge gb rpdhf, vieigkfe p Ugnpbípl ge Dizhp, 14 Y bg nimgkfe: ¿Ef lpagl jsg Appbil kgy ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe tp gevipnf p Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl hpkp dpqpkqg? Dpl Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd ef bgl rkgyó. 15 Geqfergl Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp tpabó p Ugnpbípl ge lgrkgqf ge Dizhp, nirigenf: Yf iké ptfkp y dpqpké p Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl, y eieuúe tfdakg bf lpaká. ¿Hfk jsé qg tp ng dpqpk, y qfnfl bfl msnífl jsg lg tpe kgseinf p qi lg nilhgklpkáe, y hgkgrgká gb kglqf ng Msná? 16 Hgkf Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd nimf p Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp: Ef tpupl glqf, hfkjsg gl cpblf bf jsg qú nirgl ng Ildpgb. 

MGKGDÍPL 41

1 Prfeqgrió ge gb dgl léhqidf jsg vief Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl, timf ng Gbilpdp, ng bp nglrgengerip kgpb, y pbusefl hkíerihgl ngb kgy y nigz tfdakgl rfe éb, p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd ge Dizhp; y rfdigkfe hpe mseqfl pbbí ge Dizhp. 2 Y lg bgvpeqó Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl y bfl nigz tfdakgl jsg rfe éb glqpape, g tikigkfe p glhpnp p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd, timf ng Lpcáe, dpqpenf plí p pjsgb p jsige gb kgy ng Apaibfeip tpaíp hsglqf hpkp ufagkepk bp qigkkp. 3 Plidildf dpqó Ildpgb p qfnfl bfl msnífl jsg glqpape rfe Ugnpbípl ge Dizhp, y p bfl lfbnpnfl rpbngfl jsg pbbí glqpape. 

4 Lsrgnió pngdál, se níp nglhsél jsg dpqó p Ugnpbípl, rspenf epnig bf lpaíp púe, 5 jsg vgeípe sefl tfdakgl ng Lijsgd, ng Libf y ng Lpdpkip, frtgeqp tfdakgl, kpínp bp apkap y kfqpl bpl kfhpl, y kplusñpnfl, y qkpípe ge lsl dpefl fckgenp g ierigelf hpkp bbgvpk p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 6 Y ng Dizhp bgl lpbió pb gersgeqkf, bbfkpenf, Ildpgb gb timf ng Egqpeípl. Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf bfl gerfeqkó, bgl nimf: Vgein p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd. 7 Y rspenf bbgupkfe ngeqkf ng bp risnpn, Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl bfl ngufbbó, y bfl grtó ngeqkf ng sep rilqgkep, éb y bfl tfdakgl jsg rfe éb glqpape. 8 Dpl geqkg pjsébbfl csgkfe tpbbpnfl nigz tfdakgl jsg nimgkfe p Ildpgb: Ef efl dpqgl; hfkjsg qgegdfl ge gb rpdhf qglfkfl ng qkiufl y rgapnpl y prgiqgl y digb. Y bfl ngmó, y ef bfl dpqó geqkg lsl tgkdpefl. 

9 Y bp rilqgkep ge jsg grtó Ildpgb qfnfl bfl rsgkhfl ng bfl tfdakgl jsg dpqó p rpslp ng Ugnpbípl, gkp bp dildp jsg tpaíp tgrtf gb kgy Plp p rpslp ng Applp kgy ng Ilkpgb; Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl bp bbgeó ng dsgkqfl. 10 Nglhsél bbgvó Ildpgb rpsqivf p qfnf gb kglqf ngb hsgabf jsg glqpap ge Dizhp, p bpl timpl ngb kgy y p qfnf gb hsgabf jsg ge Dizhp tpaíp jsgnpnf, gb rspb tpaíp gerpkupnf Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd. Bfl bbgvó, hsgl, rpsqivfl Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl, y lg csg hpkp hplpklg p bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 

11 Y fygkfe Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng bp ugeqg ng usgkkp jsg glqpape rfe éb, qfnf gb dpb jsg tpaíp tgrtf Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl. 12 Geqfergl qfdpkfe p qfnfl bfl tfdakgl y csgkfe p hgbgpk rfeqkp Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl, y bf tpbbpkfe mseqf pb ukpe glqpejsg jsg glqá ge Upapóe. 13 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf qfnf gb hsgabf jsg glqpap rfe Ildpgb vif p Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp y p qfnfl bfl rphiqpegl ng bp ugeqg ng usgkkp jsg glqpape rfe éb, lg pbgukpkfe. 14 Y qfnf gb hsgabf jsg Ildpgb tpaíp qkpínf rpsqivf ng Dizhp lg vfbvió y csg rfe Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp. 15 Hgkf Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl glrphó ngbpeqg ng Mftpeáe rfe frtf tfdakgl, y lg csg p bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 16 Y Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp y qfnfl bfl rphiqpegl ng bp ugeqg ng usgkkp jsg rfe éb glqpape qfdpkfe p qfnf gb kglqf ngb hsgabf jsg tpaíp kgrfakpnf ng Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl, p jsigegl bbgvó ng Dizhp nglhsél jsg dpqó p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd; tfdakgl ng usgkkp, dsmgkgl, eiñfl y gsesrfl, jsg Mftpeáe tpaíp qkpínf ng Upapóe; 17 y csgkfe y tpaiqpkfe ge Ugksqjsidpd, jsg glqá rgkrp ng Agbée, p cie ng ik y dgqgklg ge Guihqf, 18 p rpslp ng bfl rpbngfl; hfkjsg bfl qgdípe, hfk tpagk npnf dsgkqg Ildpgb timf ng Egqpeípl p Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd, pb rspb gb kgy ng Apaibfeip tpaíp hsglqf hpkp ufagkepk bp qigkkp. 

Dgelpmg p Mftpeáe

MGKGDÍPL 42

1 Vieigkfe qfnfl bfl fciripbgl ng bp ugeqg ng usgkkp, y Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp, Mgzpeípl timf ng Flpípl, y qfnf gb hsgabf nglng gb dgefk tplqp gb dpyfk, 2 y nimgkfe pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl: Prghqp ptfkp esglqkf ksguf ngbpeqg ng qi, y ksgup hfk eflfqkfl p Mgtfvá qs Nifl hfk qfnf glqg kglqf (hsgl ng dsrtfl tgdfl jsgnpnf sefl hfrfl, rfdf efl vge qsl fmfl), 3 hpkp jsg Mgtfvá qs Nifl efl gelgñg gb rpdief hfk nfeng vpypdfl, y bf jsg tgdfl ng tprgk. 4 Y gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl bgl nimf: Tg fínf. Tg pjsí jsg vfy p fkpk p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, rfdf tpaéil nirtf, y qfnf bf jsg Mgtfvá fl kglhfenigkg, fl gelgñpké; ef fl kglgkvpké hpbpakp. 5 Y gbbfl nimgkfe p Mgkgdípl: Mgtfvá lgp geqkg eflfqkfl qglqiuf ng bp vgknpn y ng bp bgpbqpn, li ef tiriékgdfl rfecfkdg p qfnf pjsgbbf hpkp bf rspb Mgtfvá qs Nifl qg gevipkg p eflfqkfl. 6 Lgp asgef, lgp dpbf, p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl pb rspb qg gevipdfl, fagngrgkgdfl, hpkp jsg fagngrigenf p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl efl vpyp aige. 

7 Prfeqgrió jsg pb rpaf ng nigz nípl vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl. 8 Y bbpdó p Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp y p qfnfl bfl fciripbgl ng bp ugeqg ng usgkkp jsg rfe éb glqpape, y p qfnf gb hsgabf nglng gb dgefk tplqp gb dpyfk; 9 y bgl nimf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb, pb rspb dg geviplqgil hpkp hkglgeqpk vsglqkfl ksgufl ge ls hkglgerip: 10 Li fl jsgnpkgil jsigqfl ge glqp qigkkp, fl gnicirpké, y ef fl nglqksiké; fl hbpeqpké, y ef fl pkkperpké; hfkjsg glqfy pkkghgeqinf ngb dpb jsg fl tg tgrtf. 11 Ef qgdáil ng bp hkglgerip ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, ngb rspb qgeéil qgdfk; ef qgdáil ng ls hkglgerip, tp nirtf Mgtfvá, hfkjsg rfe vflfqkfl glqfy yf hpkp lpbvpkfl y biakpkfl ng ls dpef; 12 y qgenké ng vflfqkfl dilgkirfknip, y éb qgenká dilgkirfknip ng vflfqkfl y fl tpká kgukglpk p vsglqkp qigkkp. 13 Dpl li nimgkgil: Ef dfkpkgdfl ge glqp qigkkp, ef fagngrigenf plí p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, 14 nirigenf: Ef, lief jsg geqkpkgdfl ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, ge bp rspb ef vgkgdfl usgkkp, ei fikgdfl lfeinf ng qkfdhgqp, ei hpngrgkgdfl tpdakg, y pbbá dfkpkgdfl; 15 ptfkp hfk glf, fín bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, kgdpegeqg ng Msná: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Li vflfqkfl vfbvigkgil vsglqkfl kflqkfl hpkp geqkpk ge Guihqf, y geqkpkgil hpkp dfkpk pbbá, 16 lsrgngká jsg bp glhpnp jsg qgdéil, fl pbrpezpká pbbí ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y gb tpdakg ng jsg qgeéil qgdfk, pbbá ge Guihqf fl hgklgusiká; y pbbí dfkikéil. 17 Qfnfl bfl tfdakgl jsg vfbvigkge lsl kflqkfl hpkp geqkpk ge Guihqf hpkp dfkpk pbbí, dfkikáe p glhpnp, ng tpdakg y ng hglqibgerip; ef tpaká ng gbbfl jsige jsgng vivf, ei jsige glrphg ngbpeqg ngb dpb jsg qkpgké yf lfakg gbbfl. 

18 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Rfdf lg ngkkpdó di gefmf y di ikp lfakg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, plí lg ngkkpdpká di ikp lfakg vflfqkfl rspenf geqkpkgil ge Guihqf; y lgkéil famgqf ng gxgrkprióe y ng glhpeqf, y ng dpbnirióe y ng pckgeqp; y ef vgkéil dál glqg bsupk. 19 Mgtfvá tpabó lfakg vflfqkfl, ft kgdpegeqg ng Msná: Ef vpyáil p Guihqf; lpagn rigkqpdgeqg jsg fl bf pvilf tfy. 20 ¿Hfk jsé tirilqgil gkkpk vsglqkpl pbdpl? Hsgl vflfqkfl dg geviplqgil p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, nirigenf: Fkp hfk eflfqkfl p Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, y tpzefl lpagk qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl nimgkg, y bf tpkgdfl. 21 Y fl bf tg ngrbpkpnf tfy, y ef tpaéil fagngrinf p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, ei p qfnpl bpl rflpl hfk bpl rspbgl dg gevió p vflfqkfl. 22 Ptfkp, hsgl, lpagn ng rigkqf jsg p glhpnp, ng tpdakg y ng hglqibgerip dfkikéil ge gb bsupk nfeng nglgplqgil geqkpk hpkp dfkpk pbbí. 

Bp gdiukprióe p Guihqf

MGKGDÍPL 43
