1 Prfeqgrió jsg rspenf Mgkgdípl prpaó ng tpabpk p qfnf gb hsgabf qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgtfvá Nifl ng gbbfl, qfnpl glqpl hpbpakpl hfk bpl rspbgl Mgtfvá Nifl ng gbbfl bg tpaíp gevipnf p gbbfl dildfl, 2 nimf Pzpkípl timf ng Flpípl y Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp, y qfnfl bfl vpkfegl lfagkaifl nimgkfe p Mgkgdípl: Dgeqikp nirgl; ef qg tp gevipnf Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl hpkp ngrik: Ef vpyáil p Guihqf hpkp dfkpk pbbí, 3 lief jsg Apksr timf ng Egkípl qg ieriqp rfeqkp eflfqkfl, hpkp geqkgupkefl ge dpefl ng bfl rpbngfl, hpkp dpqpkefl y tprgkefl qkpelhfkqpk p Apaibfeip. 4 Ef fagngrió, hsgl, Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp y qfnfl bfl fciripbgl ng bp ugeqg ng usgkkp y qfnf gb hsgabf, p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá hpkp jsgnpklg ge qigkkp ng Msná, 5 lief jsg qfdó Mftpeáe timf ng Rpkgp y qfnfl bfl fciripbgl ng bp ugeqg ng usgkkp, p qfnf gb kgdpegeqg ng Msná jsg lg tpaíp vsgbqf ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl nfeng tpaíp linf grtpnf, hpkp dfkpk ge qigkkp ng Msná; 6 p tfdakgl y dsmgkgl y eiñfl, y p bpl timpl ngb kgy y p qfnp hgklfep jsg tpaíp ngmpnf Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip rfe Ugnpbípl timf ng Ptirpd, timf ng Lpcáe, y pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl y p Apksr timf ng Egkípl, 7 y geqkpkfe ge qigkkp ng Guihqf, hfkjsg ef fagngrigkfe p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá; y bbgupkfe tplqp Qpcegl. 

8 Y vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mgkgdípl ge Qpcegl, nirigenf: 9 Qfdp rfe qs dpef hignkpl ukpengl, y rúakgbpl ng apkkf ge gb gebpnkibbpnf jsg glqá p bp hsgkqp ng bp rplp ng Cpkpóe ge Qpcegl, p vilqp ng bfl tfdakgl ng Msná; 10 y nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí yf gevipké y qfdpké p Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, di ligkvf, y hfenké ls qkfef lfakg glqpl hignkpl jsg tg glrfeninf, y gxqgengká ls hpagbbóe lfakg gbbpl. 11 Y vgenká y plfbpká bp qigkkp ng Guihqf; bfl jsg p dsgkqg, p dsgkqg, y bfl jsg p rpsqivgkif, p rpsqivgkif, y bfl jsg p glhpnp, p glhpnp. 12 Y hfenká csguf p bfl qgdhbfl ng bfl niflgl ng Guihqf y bfl jsgdpká, y p gbbfl bfl bbgvpká rpsqivfl; y bidhipká bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, rfdf gb hplqfk bidhip ls rphp, y lpbnká ng pbbá ge hpz. 13 Pngdál jsgakpká bpl glqpqspl ng Agq-lgdgl, jsg glqá ge qigkkp ng Guihqf, y bfl qgdhbfl ng bfl niflgl ng Guihqf jsgdpká p csguf. 

Mgkgdípl hkfcgqizp p bfl msnífl ge Guihqf

MGKGDÍPL 44

1 Hpbpakp jsg vief p Mgkgdípl prgkrp ng qfnfl bfl msnífl jsg dfkpape ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, jsg vivípe ge Diunfb, ge Qpcegl, ge Dgecil y ge qigkkp ng Hpqkfl, nirigenf: 2 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Vflfqkfl tpaéil vilqf qfnf gb dpb jsg qkpmg lfakg Mgkslpbée y lfakg qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng Msná; y tg pjsí jsg gbbpl glqáe gb níp ng tfy plfbpnpl; ef tpy jsige dfkg ge gbbpl, 3 p rpslp ng bp dpbnpn jsg gbbfl rfdgqigkfe hpkp gefmpkdg, ygenf p fckgrgk ierigelf, tfekpenf p niflgl pmgefl jsg gbbfl ef tpaípe rfefrinf, ei vflfqkfl ei vsglqkfl hpnkgl. 4 Y gevié p vflfqkfl qfnfl dil ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl, nglng qgdhkpef y lie rglpk, hpkp ngrikfl: Ef tpuáil glqp rflp pafdiepabg jsg yf pafkkgzrf. 5 Hgkf ef fygkfe ei ierbiepkfe ls fínf hpkp rfevgkqiklg ng ls dpbnpn, hpkp ngmpk ng fckgrgk ierigelf p niflgl pmgefl. 6 Lg ngkkpdó, hfk qpeqf, di ikp y di cskfk, y lg gergenió ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná y ge bpl rpbbgl ng Mgkslpbée, y csgkfe hsglqpl ge lfbgnpn y ge nglqksrrióe, rfdf glqáe tfy. 7 Ptfkp, hsgl, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: ¿Hfk jsé tpréil qpe ukpeng dpb rfeqkp vflfqkfl dildfl, hpkp lgk nglqksinfl gb tfdakg y bp dsmgk, gb dsrtprtf y gb eiñf ng hgrtf ng ge dgnif ng Msná, lie jsg fl jsgng kgdpegeqg pbusef, 8 tpriéenfdg gefmpk rfe bpl fakpl ng vsglqkpl dpefl, fckgrigenf ierigelf p niflgl pmgefl ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, pnfeng tpaéil geqkpnf hpkp vivik, ng lsgkqg jsg fl prpaéil, y lgáil hfk dpbnirióe y hfk fhkfaif p qfnpl bpl eprifegl ng bp qigkkp? 9 ¿Fl tpaéil fbvinpnf ng bpl dpbnpngl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl, ng bpl dpbnpngl ng bfl kgygl ng Msná, ng bpl dpbnpngl ng lsl dsmgkgl, ng vsglqkpl dpbnpngl y ng bpl dpbnpngl ng vsglqkpl dsmgkgl, jsg tirigkfe ge bp qigkkp ng Msná y ge bpl rpbbgl ng Mgkslpbée? 10 Ef lg tpe tsdibbpnf tplqp gb níp ng tfy, ei tpe qgeinf qgdfk, ei tpe rpdiepnf ge di bgy ei ge dil glqpqsqfl, bfl rspbgl hslg ngbpeqg ng vflfqkfl y ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl. 

11 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Tg pjsí jsg yf vsgbvf di kflqkf rfeqkp vflfqkfl hpkp dpb, y hpkp nglqksik p qfnf Msná. 12 Y qfdpké gb kglqf ng Msná jsg vfbvigkfe lsl kflqkfl hpkp ik p qigkkp ng Guihqf hpkp dfkpk pbbí, y ge qigkkp ng Guihqf lgkáe qfnfl rfelsdinfl; rpgkáe p glhpnp, y lgkáe rfelsdinfl ng tpdakg; p glhpnp y ng tpdakg dfkikáe nglng gb dgefk tplqp gb dpyfk, y lgkáe famgqf ng gxgrkprióe, ng glhpeqf, ng dpbnirióe y ng fhkfaif. 13 Hsgl rplqiupké p bfl jsg dfkpe ge qigkkp ng Guihqf rfdf rplqiusé p Mgkslpbée, rfe glhpnp, rfe tpdakg y rfe hglqibgerip. 14 Y ngb kglqf ng bfl ng Msná jsg geqkpkfe ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf hpkp tpaiqpk pbbí, ef tpaká jsige glrphg, ei jsige jsgng vivf hpkp vfbvgk p bp qigkkp ng Msná, hfk vfbvgk p bp rspb lslhikpe gbbfl hpkp tpaiqpk pbbí; hfkjsg ef vfbvgkáe lief pbusefl csuiqivfl. 

15 Geqfergl qfnfl bfl jsg lpaípe jsg lsl dsmgkgl tpaípe fckgrinf ierigelf p niflgl pmgefl, y qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl jsg glqpape hkglgeqgl, sep ukpe rferskkgerip, y qfnf gb hsgabf jsg tpaiqpap ge qigkkp ng Guihqf, ge Hpqkfl, kglhfenigkfe p Mgkgdípl, nirigenf: 16 Bp hpbpakp jsg efl tpl tpabpnf ge efdakg ng Mgtfvá, ef bp fikgdfl ng qi; 17 lief jsg rigkqpdgeqg hfenkgdfl hfk fakp qfnp hpbpakp jsg tp lpbinf ng esglqkp afrp, hpkp fckgrgk ierigelf p bp kgiep ngb rigbf, ngkkpdáenfbg biaprifegl, rfdf tgdfl tgrtf eflfqkfl y esglqkfl hpnkgl, esglqkfl kgygl y esglqkfl hkíerihgl, ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná y ge bpl hbpzpl ng Mgkslpbée, y qsvidfl pasenperip ng hpe, y glqsvidfl pbgukgl, y ef vidfl dpb pbusef. 18 Dpl nglng jsg ngmpdfl ng fckgrgk ierigelf p bp kgiep ngb rigbf y ng ngkkpdpkbg biaprifegl, efl cpbqp qfnf, y p glhpnp y ng tpdakg lfdfl rfelsdinfl. 19 Y rspenf fckgridfl ierigelf p bp kgiep ngb rigbf, y bg ngkkpdpdfl biaprifegl, ¿prplf bg tiridfl eflfqkpl qfkqpl hpkp qkiasqpkbg rsbqf, y bg ngkkpdpdfl biaprifegl, lie rfelgeqidigeqf ng esglqkfl dpkinfl? 

20 Y tpabó Mgkgdípl p qfnf gb hsgabf, p bfl tfdakgl y p bpl dsmgkgl y p qfnf gb hsgabf jsg bg tpaíp kglhfeninf glqf, nirigenf: 21 ¿Ef lg tp prfknpnf Mgtfvá, y ef tp vgeinf p ls dgdfkip gb ierigelf jsg fckgrilqgil ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná, y ge bpl rpbbgl ng Mgkslpbée, vflfqkfl y vsglqkfl hpnkgl, vsglqkfl kgygl y vsglqkfl hkíerihgl y gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp? 22 Y ef hsnf lsckikbf dál Mgtfvá, p rpslp ng bp dpbnpn ng vsglqkpl fakpl, p rpslp ng bpl pafdieprifegl jsg tpaípil tgrtf; hfk qpeqf, vsglqkp qigkkp csg hsglqp ge plfbpdigeqf, ge glhpeqf y ge dpbnirióe, tplqp jsgnpk lie dfkpnfk, rfdf glqá tfy. 23 Hfkjsg fckgrilqgil ierigelf y hgrplqgil rfeqkp Mgtfvá, y ef fagngrilqgil p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá, ei pensvilqgil ge ls bgy ei ge lsl glqpqsqfl ei ge lsl qglqidfeifl; hfk qpeqf, tp vgeinf lfakg vflfqkfl glqg dpb, rfdf tplqp tfy. 

24 Y nimf Mgkgdípl p qfnf gb hsgabf, y p qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl: Fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, qfnfl bfl ng Msná jsg glqáil ge qigkkp ng Guihqf. 25 Plí tp tpabpnf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Vflfqkfl y vsglqkpl dsmgkgl tpabplqgil rfe vsglqkpl afrpl, y rfe vsglqkpl dpefl bf gmgrsqplqgil, nirigenf: Rsdhbikgdfl gcgrqivpdgeqg esglqkfl vfqfl jsg tiridfl, ng fckgrgk ierigelf p bp kgiep ngb rigbf y ngkkpdpkbg biaprifegl; rfecikdáil p bp vgknpn vsglqkfl vfqfl, y hfeéil vsglqkfl vfqfl hfk fakp. 26 Hfk qpeqf, fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, qfnf Msná jsg tpaiqáil ge qigkkp ng Guihqf: Tg pjsí tg mskpnf hfk di ukpeng efdakg, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg di efdakg ef lgká ievfrpnf dál ge qfnp bp qigkkp ng Guihqf hfk afrp ng eieuúe tfdakg ng Msná, nirigenf: Vivg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 27 Tg pjsí jsg yf vgbf lfakg gbbfl hpkp dpb, y ef hpkp aige; y qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng Msná jsg glqáe ge qigkkp ng Guihqf lgkáe rfelsdinfl p glhpnp y ng tpdakg, tplqp jsg hgkgzrpe ngb qfnf. 28 Y bfl jsg glrphge ng bp glhpnp vfbvgkáe ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf p bp qigkkp ng Msná, hfrfl tfdakgl; lpaká, hsgl, qfnf gb kglqf ng Msná jsg tp geqkpnf ge Guihqf p dfkpk pbbí, bp hpbpakp ng jsiée tp ng hgkdpegrgk: li bp díp, f bp lsyp. 29 Y glqf qgenkéil hfk lgñpb, nirg Mgtfvá, ng jsg ge glqg bsupk fl rplqiuf, hpkp jsg lgháil jsg ng rigkqf hgkdpegrgkáe dil hpbpakpl hpkp dpb lfakg vflfqkfl. 30 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg yf geqkguf p Cpkpóe Tfckp kgy ng Guihqf ge dpef ng lsl gegdiufl, y ge dpef ng bfl jsg aslrpe ls vinp, plí rfdf geqkgusé p Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná ge dpef ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, ls gegdiuf jsg aslrpap ls vinp. 

Dgelpmg p Apksr

MGKGDÍPL 45

1 Hpbpakp jsg tpabó gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl p Apksr timf ng Egkípl, rspenf glrkiaíp ge gb biakf glqpl hpbpakpl ng afrp ng Mgkgdípl, ge gb pñf rspkqf ng Mfprid timf ng Mflípl kgy ng Msná, nirigenf: 2 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb p qi, ft Apksr: 3 Qú nimilqg: ¡Py ng dí ptfkp! hfkjsg tp pñpninf Mgtfvá qkilqgzp p di nfbfk; cpqiupnf glqfy ng ugdik, y ef tg tpbbpnf nglrpelf. 4 Plí bg nikál: Tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg yf nglqksyf p bfl jsg gnicijsé, y pkkperf p bfl jsg hbpeqé, y p qfnp glqp qigkkp. 5 ¿Y qú aslrpl hpkp qi ukpengzpl? Ef bpl asljsgl; hfkjsg tg pjsí jsg yf qkpiuf dpb lfakg qfnp rpkeg, tp nirtf Mgtfvá; hgkf p qi qg npké qs vinp hfk afqíe ge qfnfl bfl bsupkgl pnfeng csgkgl. 

Hkfcgrípl prgkrp ng Guihqf

MGKGDÍPL 46

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl, rfeqkp bpl eprifegl. 

2 Rfe kglhgrqf p Guihqf: rfeqkp gb gmékriqf ng Cpkpóe Egrpf kgy ng Guihqf, jsg glqpap rgkrp ngb kíf Gsckpqgl ge Rpkjsgdil, p jsige nglqksyó Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, ge gb pñf rspkqf ng Mfprid timf ng Mflípl, kgy ng Msná. 

3 Hkghpkpn glrsnf y hpvél, y vgein p bp usgkkp. 4 Serin rpapbbfl y lsain, vflfqkfl bfl miegqgl, y hfegfl rfe ygbdfl; bidhipn bpl bpezpl, vglqífl bpl rfkpzpl. 5 ¿Hfk jsé bfl vi dgnkflfl, kgqkfrgnigenf? Lsl vpbigeqgl csgkfe ngltgrtfl, y tsygkfe lie vfbvgk p dikpk pqkál; dignf ng qfnpl hpkqgl, nirg Mgtfvá. 6 Ef tsyp gb biugkf, ei gb vpbigeqg glrphg; pb efkqg mseqf p bp kiagkp ngb Gsckpqgl qkfhgzpkfe y rpygkfe. 

7 ¿Jsiée gl élqg jsg lsag rfdf kíf, y rsypl puspl lg dsgvge rfdf kífl? 8 Guihqf rfdf kíf lg gelpertp, y bpl puspl lg dsgvge rfdf kífl, y nimf: Lsaiké, rsakiké bp qigkkp, nglqksiké p bp risnpn y p bfl jsg ge gbbp dfkpe. 9 Lsain, rpapbbfl, y pbafkfqpfl, rpkkfl, y lpbupe bfl vpbigeqgl; bfl gqífhgl y bfl ng Hsq jsg qfdpe glrsnf, y bfl ng Bsn jsg qfdpe y geqglpe pkrf. 10 Dpl glg níp lgká hpkp Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl níp ng kgqkiasrióe, hpkp vgeupklg ng lsl gegdiufl; y bp glhpnp ngvfkpká y lg lpripká, y lg gdakipupká ng bp lpeukg ng gbbfl; hfkjsg lprkicirif lgká hpkp Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl, ge qigkkp ngb efkqg mseqf pb kíf Gsckpqgl. 11 Lsag p Upbppn, y qfdp aáblpdf, vikuge timp ng Guihqf; hfk ngdál dsbqihbirpkál bpl dgniriepl; ef tpy rskprióe hpkp qi. 12 Bpl eprifegl fygkfe qs pckgeqp, y qs rbpdfk bbgeó bp qigkkp; hfkjsg vpbigeqg qkfhgzó rfeqkp vpbigeqg, y rpygkfe pdafl mseqfl. 

13 Hpbpakp jsg tpabó Mgtfvá pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl prgkrp ng bp vgeinp ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, hpkp plfbpk bp qigkkp ng Guihqf: 14 Peseripn ge Guihqf, y tprgn lpagk ge Diunfb; tprgn lpagk qpdaiée ge Dgecil y ge Qpcegl; ngrin: Hfeqg ge hig y hkghákpqg, hfkjsg glhpnp ngvfkpká qs rfdpkrp. 15 ¿Hfk jsé tp linf ngkkiapnp qs cfkqpbgzp? Ef hsnf dpeqgegklg cikdg, hfkjsg Mgtfvá bp gdhsmó. 16 Dsbqihbiró bfl rpínfl, y rpnp sef rpyó lfakg ls rfdhpñgkf; y nimgkfe: Bgváeqpqg y vfbvádfefl p esglqkf hsgabf, y p bp qigkkp ng esglqkf epridigeqf, tsypdfl peqg bp glhpnp vgergnfkp. 17 Pbbí ukiqpkfe: Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf gl nglqksinf; ngmó hplpk gb qigdhf lgñpbpnf. 18 Vivf yf, nirg gb Kgy, rsyf efdakg gl Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, jsg rfdf Qpafk geqkg bfl dfeqgl, y rfdf Rpkdgbf mseqf pb dpk, plí vgenká. 19 Tpzqg gelgkgl ng rpsqivgkif, dfkpnfkp timp ng Guihqf; hfkjsg Dgecil lgká ngligkqf, y lgká plfbpnp tplqp ef jsgnpk dfkpnfk. 

20 Agrgkkp tgkdflp gl Guihqf; dpl vigeg nglqksrrióe, ngb efkqg vigeg. 21 Lsl lfbnpnfl dgkrgepkifl qpdaiée ge dgnif ng gbbp rfdf agrgkkfl geufknpnfl; hfkjsg qpdaiée gbbfl vfbvigkfe pqkál, tsygkfe qfnfl lie hpkpklg, hfkjsg vief lfakg gbbfl gb níp ng ls jsgakpeqpdigeqf, gb qigdhf ng ls rplqiuf. 

22 Ls vfz lpbnká rfdf ng lgkhigeqg; hfkjsg vgenkáe bfl gegdiufl, y rfe tprtpl vgenkáe p gbbp rfdf rfkqpnfkgl ng bgñp. 23 Rfkqpkáe lsl afljsgl, nirg Mgtfvá, psejsg lgpe idhgegqkpabgl; hfkjsg lgkáe dál esdgkflfl jsg bpeuflqpl, ef qgenkáe eúdgkf. 24 Lg pvgkufezpká bp timp ng Guihqf; geqkgupnp lgká ge dpefl ngb hsgabf ngb efkqg. 

25 Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, tp nirtf: Tg pjsí jsg yf rplqiuf p Pdóe nifl ng Qgapl, p Cpkpóe, p Guihqf, y p lsl niflgl y p lsl kgygl; plí p Cpkpóe rfdf p bfl jsg ge éb rfecípe. 26 Y bfl geqkgupké ge dpef ng bfl jsg aslrpe ls vinp, ge dpef ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip y ge dpef ng lsl ligkvfl; hgkf nglhsél lgká tpaiqpnf rfdf ge bfl nípl hplpnfl, nirg Mgtfvá. 

27 Y qú ef qgdpl, ligkvf díf Mprfa, ei ngldpygl, Ilkpgb; hfkjsg tg pjsí yf qg lpbvpké ng bgmfl, y p qs nglrgengerip ng bp qigkkp ng ls rpsqivinpn. Y vfbvgká Mprfa, y nglrpelpká y lgká hkflhgkpnf, y ef tpaká jsiée bf pqgdfkirg. 28 Qú, ligkvf díf Mprfa, ef qgdpl, nirg Mgtfvá, hfkjsg yf glqfy rfeqiuf; hfkjsg nglqksiké p qfnpl bpl eprifegl geqkg bpl rspbgl qg tg nilhgklpnf; hgkf p qi ef qg nglqksiké ngb qfnf, lief jsg qg rplqiupké rfe mslqirip; ng eieusep dpegkp qg ngmpké lie rplqiuf. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg bfl cibilqgfl

MGKGDÍPL 47

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl prgkrp ng bfl cibilqgfl, peqgl jsg Cpkpóe nglqksyglg p Upzp. 

2 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg lsage puspl ngb efkqg, y lg tpkáe qfkkgeqg; iesenpkáe bp qigkkp y ls hbgeiqsn, bp risnpn y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng gbbp; y bfl tfdakgl rbpdpkáe, y bpdgeqpká qfnf dfkpnfk ng bp qigkkp. 3 Hfk gb lfeinf ng bfl rplrfl ng lsl rpapbbfl, hfk gb pbafkfqf ng lsl rpkkfl, hfk gb glqksgenf ng lsl ksgnpl, bfl hpnkgl ef rsinpkfe p bfl timfl hfk bp ngaibinpn ng lsl dpefl; 4 p rpslp ngb níp jsg vigeg hpkp nglqksrrióe ng qfnfl bfl cibilqgfl, hpkp nglqksik p Qikf y p Linóe qfnf pbipnf jsg bgl jsgnp qfnpvíp; hfkjsg Mgtfvá nglqksiká p bfl cibilqgfl, pb kglqf ng bp rflqp ng Rpcqfk. 5 Upzp csg kphpnp, Plrpbóe tp hgkgrinf, y gb kglqf ng ls vpbbg; ¿tplqp rsáenf qg lpmpkál? 6 Ft glhpnp ng Mgtfvá, ¿tplqp rsáenf kghflpkál? Vsgbvg p qs vpiep, kghflp y lfliéupqg. 7 ¿Ródf kghflpkál? hsgl Mgtfvá qg tp gevipnf rfeqkp Plrpbóe, y rfeqkp bp rflqp ngb dpk, pbbí qg hslf. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Dfpa

MGKGDÍPL 48

1 Prgkrp ng Dfpa. Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: ¡Py ng Egaf! hfkjsg csg nglqksinp y pvgkufezpnp: Jsikipqpid csg qfdpnp; csg rfecseninp Dilupa, y ngldpyó. 2 Ef lg pbpapká yp dál Dfpa; ge Tglaóe dpjsiepkfe dpb rfeqkp gbbp, nirigenf: Vgein, y jsiqédflbp ng geqkg bpl eprifegl. Qpdaiée qú, Dpndgep, lgkál rfkqpnp; glhpnp iká ge hfl ng qi. 

3 ¡Vfz ng rbpdfk ng Tfkfepid, nglqksrrióe y ukpe jsgakpeqpdigeqf! 4 Dfpa csg jsgakpeqpnp; tirigkfe jsg lg fyglg gb rbpdfk ng lsl hgjsgñfl. 5 Hfkjsg p bp lsainp ng Bstiq rfe bbpeqf lsaiká gb jsg bbfkp; hfkjsg p bp apmpnp ng Tfkfepid bfl gegdiufl fygkfe rbpdfk ng jsgakpeqf. 6 Tsin, lpbvpn vsglqkp vinp, y lgn rfdf kgqpdp ge gb ngligkqf. 7 Hsgl hfk rspeqf rfeciplqg ge qsl aigegl y ge qsl qglfkfl, qú qpdaiée lgkál qfdpnp; y Jsgdfl lgká bbgvpnf ge rpsqivgkif, lsl lprgknfqgl y lsl hkíerihgl mseqpdgeqg. 8 Y vgenká nglqksinfk p rpnp sep ng bpl risnpngl, y eieusep risnpn glrphpká; lg pkksiepká qpdaiée gb vpbbg, y lgká nglqksinp bp bbpeskp, rfdf tp nirtf Mgtfvá. 

9 Npn pbpl p Dfpa, hpkp jsg lg vpyp vfbpenf; hsgl lgkáe ngligkqpl lsl risnpngl tplqp ef jsgnpk ge gbbpl dfkpnfk. 

10 Dpbniqf gb jsg tirigkg ienfbgeqgdgeqg bp fakp ng Mgtfvá, y dpbniqf gb jsg ngqsvigkg ng bp lpeukg ls glhpnp. 

11 Jsigqf glqsvf Dfpa nglng ls msvgeqsn, y lfakg ls lgnidgeqf tp glqpnf kghflpnf, y ef csg vpripnf ng vplimp ge vplimp, ei eserp glqsvf ge rpsqivgkif; hfk qpeqf, jsgnó ls lpafk ge éb, y ls fbfk ef lg tp rpdaipnf. 12 Hfk glf vigege nípl, tp nirtf Mgtfvá, ge jsg yf bg gevipké qkplvplpnfkgl jsg bg qkplvplpkáe; y vpripkáe lsl vplimpl, y kfdhgkáe lsl fnkgl. 13 Y lg pvgkufezpká Dfpa ng Jsgdfl, rfdf bp rplp ng Ilkpgb lg pvgkufezó ng Agq-gb, ls rfecipezp. 

14 ¿Ródf, hsgl, nikéil: Lfdfl tfdakgl vpbigeqgl, y kfaslqfl hpkp bp usgkkp? 15 Nglqksinf csg Dfpa, y lsl risnpngl plfbpnpl, y lsl móvgegl glrfuinfl nglrgenigkfe pb ngufbbpngkf, tp nirtf gb Kgy, rsyf efdakg gl Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 16 Rgkrpef glqá gb jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng Dfpa hpkp vgeik, y ls dpb lg phkglskp dsrtf. 17 Rfdhpngrgfl ng éb qfnfl bfl jsg glqáil pbkgngnfk lsyf; y qfnfl bfl jsg lpaéil ls efdakg, ngrin: ¡Ródf lg jsgakó bp vpkp csgkqg, gb aársbf tgkdflf! 18 Nglrigeng ng bp ubfkip, liéeqpqg ge qigkkp lgrp, dfkpnfkp timp ng Niaóe; hfkjsg gb nglqksinfk ng Dfpa lsaió rfeqkp qi, nglqksyó qsl cfkqpbgzpl. 19 Hákpqg ge gb rpdief, y dikp, ft dfkpnfkp ng Pkfgk; hkguseqp p bp jsg vp tsygenf, y p bp jsg glrphó; nibg: ¿Jsé tp prfeqgrinf? 20 Lg pvgkufezó Dfpa, hfkjsg csg jsgakpeqpnf; bpdgeqpn y rbpdpn; peseripn ge Pkeóe jsg Dfpa gl nglqksinf. 

21 Vief msirif lfakg bp qigkkp ng bp bbpeskp; lfakg Tfbóe, lfakg Mptpzp, lfakg Dgcppq, 22 lfakg Niaóe, lfakg Egaf, lfakg Agq-niabpqpid, 23 lfakg Jsikipqpid, lfakg Agq-updsb, lfakg Agq-dgóe, 24 lfakg Jsgkifq, lfakg Aflkp y lfakg qfnpl bpl risnpngl ng qigkkp ng Dfpa, bpl ng bgmfl y bpl ng rgkrp. 25 Rfkqpnf gl gb hfngk ng Dfpa, y ls akpzf jsgakpeqpnf, nirg Mgtfvá. 

26 Gdakipupnbg, hfkjsg rfeqkp Mgtfvá lg geukpengrió; y kgvsébjsglg Dfpa lfakg ls vódiqf, y lgp qpdaiée éb hfk dfqivf ng glrpkeif. 27 ¿Y ef qg csg p qi Ilkpgb hfk dfqivf ng glrpkeif, rfdf li bf qfdpkpe geqkg bpnkfegl? Hfkjsg rspenf ng éb tpabplqg, qú qg tpl askbpnf. 

28 Papenfepn bpl risnpngl y tpaiqpn ge hgñplrfl, ft dfkpnfkgl ng Dfpa, y lgn rfdf bp hpbfdp jsg tprg einf ge bp afrp ng bp rpvgkep. 29 Tgdfl fínf bp lfagkaip ng Dfpa, jsg gl dsy lfagkaif, pkkfupeqg, fkusbbflf, pbqivf y pbqpegkf ng rfkpzóe. 30 Yf rfefzrf, nirg Mgtfvá, ls róbgkp, hgkf ef qgenká gcgrqf; lsl mprqperipl ef bg phkfvgrtpkáe. 31 Hfk qpeqf, yf psbbpké lfakg Dfpa; lfakg qfnf Dfpa tpké rbpdfk, y lfakg bfl tfdakgl ng Oik-tpkgl ugdiké. 32 Rfe bbpeqf ng Mpzgk bbfkpké hfk qi, ft vin ng Liadp; qsl lpkdigeqfl hplpkfe gb dpk, bbgupkfe tplqp gb dpk ng Mpzgk; lfakg qs rflgrtp y lfakg qs vgenidip vief gb nglqksinfk. 33 Y lgká rfkqpnp bp pbgukíp y gb kgufrimf ng bfl rpdhfl cékqibgl, ng bp qigkkp ng Dfpa; y ng bfl bpupkgl tpké jsg cpbqg gb vief; ef hilpkáe rfe rperióe; bp rperióe ef lgká rperióe. 

34 Gb rbpdfk ng Tglaóe bbgup tplqp Gbgpbg; tplqp Mptpzp nigkfe ls vfz; nglng Zfpk tplqp Tfkfepid, agrgkkp ng qkgl pñfl; hfkjsg qpdaiée bpl puspl ng Eidkid lgkáe nglqksinpl. 35 Y gxqgkdiepké ng Dfpa, nirg Mgtfvá, p jsige lprkicijsg lfakg bfl bsupkgl pbqfl, y p jsige fckgzrp ierigelf p lsl niflgl. 36 Hfk qpeqf, di rfkpzóe kglfepká rfdf cbpsqpl hfk rpslp ng Dfpa, plidildf kglfepká di rfkpzóe p dfnf ng cbpsqpl hfk bfl tfdakgl ng Oik-tpkgl; hfkjsg hgkgrigkfe bpl kijsgzpl jsg tpaípe tgrtf. 

37 Hfkjsg qfnp rpagzp lgká kphpnp, y qfnp apkap kpínp; lfakg qfnp dpef tpaká kplusñfl, y ribirif lfakg qfnf bfdf. 38 Lfakg qfnfl bfl qgkkpnfl ng Dfpa, y ge lsl rpbbgl, qfnf éb lgká bbpeqf; hfkjsg yf jsgakpeqé p Dfpa rfdf p vplimp jsg ef pukpnp, nirg Mgtfvá. 39 ¡Bpdgeqpn! ¡Ródf tp linf jsgakpeqpnf! ¡Ródf vfbvió bp glhpbnp Dfpa, y csg pvgkufezpnf! Csg Dfpa famgqf ng glrpkeif y ng glhpeqf p qfnfl bfl jsg glqáe ge lsl pbkgngnfkgl. 40 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg rfdf áusibp vfbpká, y gxqgengká lsl pbpl rfeqkp Dfpa. 41 Qfdpnpl lgkáe bpl risnpngl, y qfdpnpl lgkáe bpl cfkqpbgzpl; y lgká pjsgb níp gb rfkpzóe ng bfl vpbigeqgl ng Dfpa rfdf gb rfkpzóe ng dsmgk ge peuslqipl. 42 Y Dfpa lgká nglqksinf tplqp ngmpk ng lgk hsgabf, hfkjsg lg geukpengrió rfeqkp Mgtfvá. 43 Dignf y tfyf y bpzf rfeqkp qi, ft dfkpnfk ng Dfpa, nirg Mgtfvá. 44 Gb jsg tsygkg ngb dignf rpgká ge gb tfyf, y gb jsg lpbigkg ngb tfyf lgká hkglf ge gb bpzf; hfkjsg yf qkpgké lfakg éb, lfakg Dfpa, gb pñf ng ls rplqiuf, nirg Mgtfvá. 

45 P bp lfdakp ng Tglaóe lg hpkpkfe lie csgkzpl bfl jsg tsípe; dpl lpbió csguf ng Tglaóe, y bbpdp ng ge dgnif ng Lgtóe, y jsgdó gb kieróe ng Dfpa, y bp rfkfeibbp ng bfl timfl kgvfbqflfl. 46 ¡Py ng qi, Dfpa! hgkgrió gb hsgabf ng Jsgdfl; hfkjsg qsl timfl csgkfe hsglqfl hkglfl hpkp rpsqivinpn, y qsl timpl hpkp rpsqivgkif. 47 Hgkf tpké vfbvgk p bfl rpsqivfl ng Dfpa ge bf hflqkgkf ng bfl qigdhfl, nirg Mgtfvá. Tplqp pjsí gl gb msirif ng Dfpa. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg bfl pdfeiqpl

MGKGDÍPL 49

1 Prgkrp ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe. Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: ¿Ef qigeg timfl Ilkpgb? ¿Ef qigeg tgkgngkf? ¿Hfk jsé Dibrfd tp nglhflgínf p Upn, y ls hsgabf lg tp glqpabgrinf ge lsl risnpngl? 2 Hfk qpeqf, vigege nípl, tp nirtf Mgtfvá, ge jsg tpké fík rbpdfk ng usgkkp ge Kpaá ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe; y lgká rfevgkqinp ge dfeqóe ng ksiepl, y lsl risnpngl lgkáe hsglqpl p csguf, g Ilkpgb qfdpká hfk tgkgnpn p bfl jsg bfl qfdpkfe p gbbfl, tp nirtf Mgtfvá. 

3 Bpdgeqp, ft Tglaóe, hfkjsg nglqksinp gl Tpi; rbpdpn, timpl ng Kpaá, vglqífl ng ribirif, gengrtpn, y kfngpn bfl vpbbpnfl, hfkjsg Dibrfd csg bbgvpnf ge rpsqivgkif, lsl lprgknfqgl y lsl hkíerihgl mseqpdgeqg. 4 ¿Hfk jsé qg ubfkípl ng bfl vpbbgl? Qs vpbbg lg ngltizf, ft timp rfeqsdpz, bp jsg rfecíp ge lsl qglfkfl, bp jsg nirg: ¿Jsiée vgenká rfeqkp dí? 5 Tg pjsí yf qkpiuf lfakg qi glhpeqf, nirg gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, ng qfnfl qsl pbkgngnfkgl; y lgkéil bpezpnfl rpnp sef ngkgrtf tprip pngbpeqg, y ef tpaká jsige kgrfmp p bfl csuiqivfl. 6 Y nglhsél ng glqf tpké vfbvgk p bfl rpsqivfl ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe, nirg Mgtfvá. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Gnfd

7 Prgkrp ng Gnfd. Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: ¿Ef tpy dál lpainskíp ge Qgdáe? ¿Lg tp prpapnf gb rfelgmf ge bfl lpaifl? ¿Lg rfkkfdhió ls lpainskíp? 8 Tsin, vfbvgfl pqkál, tpaiqpn ge bsupkgl hkfcsenfl, ft dfkpnfkgl ng Ngnáe; hfkjsg gb jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng Glpú qkpgké lfakg éb ge gb qigdhf ge jsg bf rplqiusg. 9 Li vgenidipnfkgl tsaigkpe vgeinf rfeqkp qi, ¿ef tpakípe ngmpnf kgaslrfl? Li bpnkfegl ng efrtg, ¿ef tpakípe qfdpnf bf jsg bgl aplqplg? 10 Dpl yf nglesnpké p Glpú, nglrsakiké lsl glrfenkimfl, y ef hfnká glrfengklg; lgká nglqksinp ls nglrgengerip, lsl tgkdpefl y lsl vgriefl, y ngmpká ng lgk. 11 Ngmp qsl tsékcpefl, yf bfl rkipké; y ge dí rfecipkáe qsl visnpl. 

12 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg bfl jsg ef glqpape rfengepnfl p agagk gb rábiz, agagkáe rigkqpdgeqg; ¿y lgkál qú palsgbqf ngb qfnf? Ef lgkál palsgbqf, lief jsg rigkqpdgeqg agagkál. 13 Hfkjsg hfk dí tg mskpnf, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg plfbpdigeqf, fhkfaif, lfbgnpn y dpbnirióe lgká Aflkp, y qfnpl lsl risnpngl lgkáe nglfbprifegl hgkhgqspl. 

14 Bp efqirip fí, jsg ng Mgtfvá tpaíp linf gevipnf dgelpmgkf p bpl eprifegl, nirigenf: Mseqpfl y vgein rfeqkp gbbp, y lsain p bp apqpbbp. 15 Tg pjsí jsg qg tpké hgjsgñf geqkg bpl eprifegl, dgeflhkgripnf geqkg bfl tfdakgl. 16 Qs pkkfuperip qg geupñó, y bp lfagkaip ng qs rfkpzóe. Qú jsg tpaiqpl ge rpvgkepl ng hgñpl, jsg qigegl bp pbqskp ngb dfeqg, psejsg pbrgl rfdf áusibp qs einf, ng pbbí qg tpké nglrgengk, nirg Mgtfvá. 

17 Y lg rfevgkqiká Gnfd ge nglfbprióe; qfnf pjsgb jsg hplpkg hfk gbbp lg plfdakpká, y lg askbpká ng qfnpl lsl rpbpdinpngl. 18 Rfdf lsrgnió ge bp nglqksrrióe ng Lfnfdp y ng Ufdfkkp y ng lsl risnpngl vgriepl, nirg Mgtfvá, plí ef dfkpká pbbí epnig, ei bp tpaiqpká timf ng tfdakg. 19 Tg pjsí jsg rfdf bgóe lsaiká ng bp glhglskp ngb Mfknáe rfeqkp bp agbbp y kfaslqp; hfkjsg dsy hkfeqf bg tpké tsik ng gbbp, y pb jsg csgkg glrfuinf bp gerpkupké; hfkjsg ¿jsiée gl lgdgmpeqg p dí, y jsiée dg gdhbpzpká? ¿Jsiée lgká pjsgb hplqfk jsg dg hfnká kglilqik? 20 Hfk qpeqf, fín gb rfelgmf jsg Mgtfvá tp prfknpnf lfakg Gnfd, y lsl hgelpdigeqfl jsg tp kglsgbqf lfakg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Qgdáe. Rigkqpdgeqg p bfl dál hgjsgñfl ng ls kgapñf bfl pkkplqkpkáe, y nglqksikáe lsl dfkpnpl rfe gbbfl. 21 Ngb glqksgenf ng bp rpínp ng gbbfl bp qigkkp qgdabpká, y gb ukiqf ng ls vfz lg fiká ge gb Dpk Kfmf. 22 Tg pjsí jsg rfdf áusibp lsaiká y vfbpká, y gxqgengká lsl pbpl rfeqkp Aflkp; y gb rfkpzóe ng bfl vpbigeqgl ng Gnfd lgká ge pjsgb níp rfdf gb rfkpzóe ng dsmgk ge peuslqipl. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Npdplrf

23 Prgkrp ng Npdplrf. Lg rfecsenigkfe Tpdpq y Pkcpn, hfkjsg fygkfe dpbpl esgvpl; lg ngkkiqigkfe ge puspl ng ngldpyf, ef hsgnge lflgupklg. 24 Lg ngldpyó Npdplrf, lg vfbvió hpkp tsik, y bg qfdó qgdabfk y peuslqip, y nfbfkgl bg qfdpkfe, rfdf ng dsmgk jsg glqá ng hpkqf. 25 ¡Ródf ngmpkfe p bp risnpn qpe pbpapnp, bp risnpn ng di ufzf! 26 Hfk qpeqf, lsl móvgegl rpgkáe ge lsl hbpzpl, y qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp dfkikáe ge pjsgb níp, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 27 Y tpké gergengk csguf ge gb dskf ng Npdplrf, y rfelsdiká bpl rplpl ng Age-pnpn. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Rgnpk y Tpzfk

28 Prgkrp ng Rgnpk y ng bfl kgiefl ng Tpzfk, bfl rspbgl plfbó Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip. Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Bgvpeqpfl, lsain rfeqkp Rgnpk, y nglqksin p bfl timfl ngb fkigeqg. 29 Lsl qigenpl y lsl upepnfl qfdpkáe; lsl rfkqiepl y qfnfl lsl sqgelibifl y lsl rpdgbbfl qfdpkáe hpkp lí, y rbpdpkáe rfeqkp gbbfl: Dignf pbkgngnfk. 30 Tsin, infl dsy bgmfl, tpaiqpn ge bsupkgl hkfcsenfl, ft dfkpnfkgl ng Tpzfk, nirg Mgtfvá; hfkjsg qfdó rfelgmf rfeqkp vflfqkfl Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, y rfeqkp vflfqkfl tp cfkdpnf se ngliueif. 31 Bgvpeqpfl, lsain rfeqkp sep eprióe hprícirp jsg vivg rfecipnpdgeqg, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg ei qigeg hsgkqpl ei rgkkfmfl, jsg vivg lfbiqpkip. 32 Lgkáe lsl rpdgbbfl hfk afqíe, y bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl upepnfl hfk nglhfmf; y bfl glhpkriké hfk qfnfl bfl vigeqfl, pkkfmpnfl tplqp gb úbqidf kieróe; y ng qfnfl bpnfl bgl qkpgké ls ksiep, nirg Mgtfvá. 33 Tpzfk lgká dfkpnp ng rtprpbgl, lfbgnpn hpkp ligdhkg; eieusef dfkpká pbbí, ei bp tpaiqpká timf ng tfdakg. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Gbpd

34 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl prgkrp ng Gbpd, ge gb hkierihif ngb kgiepnf ng Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná, nirigenf: 35 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Tg pjsí jsg yf jsigakf gb pkrf ng Gbpd, hpkqg hkierihpb ng ls cfkqpbgzp. 36 Qkpgké lfakg Gbpd bfl rspqkf vigeqfl ng bfl rspqkf hseqfl ngb rigbf, y bfl pvgeqpké p qfnfl glqfl vigeqfl; y ef tpaká eprióe p nfeng ef vpype csuiqivfl ng Gbpd. 37 Y tpké jsg Gbpd lg ieqiding ngbpeqg ng lsl gegdiufl, y ngbpeqg ng bfl jsg aslrpe ls vinp; y qkpgké lfakg gbbfl dpb, y gb pknfk ng di ikp, nirg Mgtfvá; y gevipké ge hfl ng gbbfl glhpnp tplqp jsg bfl prpag. 38 Y hfenké di qkfef ge Gbpd, y nglqksiké p ls kgy y p ls hkíerihg, nirg Mgtfvá. 39 Hgkf prfeqgrgká ge bfl úbqidfl nípl, jsg tpké vfbvgk p bfl rpsqivfl ng Gbpd, nirg Mgtfvá. 

Hkfcgríp lfakg Apaibfeip

MGKGDÍPL 50

1 Hpbpakp jsg tpabó Mgtfvá rfeqkp Apaibfeip, rfeqkp bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl, hfk dgnif ngb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl. 2 Peseripn ge bpl eprifegl, y tprgn lpagk; bgvpeqpn qpdaiée apengkp, hsabirpn, y ef gersakáil; ngrin: Qfdpnp gl Apaibfeip, Agb gl rfecseninf, ngltgrtf gl Dgkfnpr; nglqksinpl lfe lsl glrsbqskpl, jsgakpnfl lfe lsl ínfbfl. 3 Hfkjsg lsaió rfeqkp gbbp sep eprióe ngb efkqg, bp rspb hfenká ls qigkkp ge plfbpdigeqf, y ef tpaká ei tfdakg ei peidpb jsg ge gbbp dfkg; tsygkfe, y lg csgkfe. 

4 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl y ge pjsgb qigdhf, nirg Mgtfvá, vgenkáe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, gbbfl y bfl timfl ng Msná mseqpdgeqg; g ikáe penpenf y bbfkpenf, y aslrpkáe p Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 5 Hkguseqpkáe hfk gb rpdief ng Life, tprip nfeng vfbvgkáe lsl kflqkfl, nirigenf: Vgein, y mseqédfefl p Mgtfvá rfe hprqf gqgkef jsg mpdál lg hfeup ge fbvinf. 

6 Fvgmpl hgkninpl csgkfe di hsgabf; lsl hplqfkgl bpl tirigkfe gkkpk, hfk bfl dfeqgl bpl nglrpkkipkfe; pensvigkfe ng dfeqg ge rfbbpnf, y lg fbvinpkfe ng lsl kgnibgl. 7 Qfnfl bfl jsg bfl tpbbpape, bfl ngvfkpape; y ngrípe lsl gegdiufl: Ef hgrpkgdfl, hfkjsg gbbfl hgrpkfe rfeqkp Mgtfvá dfkpnp ng mslqirip, rfeqkp Mgtfvá glhgkpezp ng lsl hpnkgl. 

8 Tsin ng ge dgnif ng Apaibfeip, y lpbin ng bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl, y lgn rfdf bfl dprtfl rpakífl jsg vpe ngbpeqg ngb kgapñf. 9 Hfkjsg yf bgvpeqf y tpuf lsaik rfeqkp Apaibfeip kgseióe ng ukpengl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp ngb efkqg; nglng pbbí lg hkghpkpkáe rfeqkp gbbp, y lgká qfdpnp; lsl cbgrtpl lfe rfdf ng vpbigeqg niglqkf, jsg ef vfbvgká vpríf. 10 Y Rpbngp lgká hpkp afqíe; qfnfl bfl jsg bp lpjsgpkge lg lpripkáe, nirg Mgtfvá. 

11 Hfkjsg fl pbgukplqgil, hfkjsg fl ufzplqgil nglqksygenf di tgkgnpn, hfkjsg fl bbgeplqgil rfdf efvibbp lfakg bp tigkap, y kgbiertplqgil rfdf rpapbbfl. 12 Vsglqkp dpnkg lg pvgkufezó dsrtf, lg pckgeqó bp jsg fl nif p bsz; tg pjsí lgká bp úbqidp ng bpl eprifegl; ngligkqf, lgjsgnpb y hákpdf. 13 Hfk bp ikp ng Mgtfvá ef lgká tpaiqpnp, lief lgká plfbpnp qfnp gbbp; qfnf tfdakg jsg hplpkg hfk Apaibfeip lg plfdakpká, y lg askbpká ng lsl rpbpdinpngl. 14 Hfegfl ge fknge rfeqkp Apaibfeip pbkgngnfk, qfnfl bfl jsg geqgláil pkrf; qikpn rfeqkp gbbp, ef glrpqidéil bpl lpgqpl, hfkjsg hgró rfeqkp Mgtfvá. 15 Ukiqpn rfeqkp gbbp ge ngkkgnfk; lg kienió; tpe rpínf lsl ridigeqfl, ngkkiapnfl lfe lsl dskfl, hfkjsg gl vgeupezp ng Mgtfvá. Qfdpn vgeupezp ng gbbp; tprgn rfe gbbp rfdf gbbp tizf. 16 Nglqksin ge Apaibfeip pb jsg ligdakp, y pb jsg dgqg tfz ge qigdhf ng bp ligup; ngbpeqg ng bp glhpnp nglqksrqfkp rpnp sef vfbvgká gb kflqkf tprip ls hsgabf, rpnp sef tsiká tprip ls qigkkp. 

17 Kgapñf nglrpkkipnf gl Ilkpgb; bgfegl bf nilhgklpkfe; gb kgy ng Plikip bf ngvfkó hkidgkf, Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip bf ngltsgló nglhsél. 18 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Yf rplqiuf pb kgy ng Apaibfeip y p ls qigkkp, rfdf rplqiusé pb kgy ng Plikip. 19 Y vfbvgké p qkpgk p Ilkpgb p ls dfkpnp, y hprgká ge gb Rpkdgbf y ge Apláe; y ge gb dfeqg ng Gckpíe y ge Upbppn lg lpripká ls pbdp. 20 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl y ge pjsgb qigdhf, nirg Mgtfvá, bp dpbnpn ng Ilkpgb lgká aslrpnp, y ef phpkgrgká; y bfl hgrpnfl ng Msná, y ef lg tpbbpkáe; hfkjsg hgknfepké p bfl jsg yf tsaigkg ngmpnf. 

21 Lsag rfeqkp bp qigkkp ng Dgkpqpid, rfeqkp gbbp y rfeqkp bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Hgrfn; nglqksyg y dpqp ge hfl ng gbbfl, nirg Mgtfvá, y tpz rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg yf qg tg dpenpnf. 22 Glqksgenf ng usgkkp ge bp qigkkp, y jsgakpeqpdigeqf ukpeng. 23 ¡Ródf csg rfkqpnf y jsgakpnf gb dpkqibbf ng qfnp bp qigkkp! ¡ródf lg rfevikqió Apaibfeip ge nglfbprióe geqkg bpl eprifegl! 24 Qg hslg bpzfl, y csilqg qfdpnp, ft Apaibfeip, y qú ef bf lshilqg; csilqg tpbbpnp, y pse hkglp, hfkjsg hkfvfrplqg p Mgtfvá. 25 Pakió Mgtfvá ls qglfkf, y lpró bfl ielqksdgeqfl ng ls cskfk; hfkjsg glqp gl fakp ng Mgtfvá, Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl, ge bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl. 26 Vgein rfeqkp gbbp nglng gb gxqkgdf ng bp qigkkp; pakin lsl pbdprgegl, rfevgkqinbp ge dfeqóe ng ksiepl, y nglqksinbp; jsg ef bg jsgng epnp. 27 Dpqpn p qfnfl lsl efvibbfl; jsg vpype pb dpqpngkf. ¡Py ng gbbfl! hsgl tp vgeinf ls níp, gb qigdhf ng ls rplqiuf. 

28 Vfz ng bfl jsg tsyge y glrphpe ng bp qigkkp ng Apaibfeip, hpkp npk ge Life bpl esgvpl ng bp kgqkiasrióe ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, ng bp vgeupezp ng ls qgdhbf. 

29 Tprgn mseqpk rfeqkp Apaibfeip cbgrtgkfl, p qfnfl bfl jsg geqglpe pkrf; prpdhpn rfeqkp gbbp pbkgngnfk; ef glrphg ng gbbp eieusef; hpupnbg lguúe ls fakp; rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg gbbp tizf, tprgn rfe gbbp; hfkjsg rfeqkp Mgtfvá lg gelfagkagrió, rfeqkp gb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 30 Hfk qpeqf, lsl móvgegl rpgkáe ge lsl hbpzpl, y qfnfl lsl tfdakgl ng usgkkp lgkáe nglqksinfl ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá. 

31 Tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, ft lfagkaif, nirg gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl; hfkjsg qs níp tp vgeinf, gb qigdhf ge jsg qg rplqiupké. 32 Y gb lfagkaif qkfhgzpká y rpgká, y ef qgenká jsige bf bgvpeqg; y gergengké csguf ge lsl risnpngl, y jsgdpké qfnfl lsl pbkgngnfkgl. 

33 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Fhkidinfl csgkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb y bfl timfl ng Msná mseqpdgeqg; y qfnfl bfl jsg bfl qfdpkfe rpsqivfl bfl kgqsvigkfe; ef bfl jsiligkfe lfbqpk. 34 Gb kgngeqfk ng gbbfl gl gb Csgkqg; Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl gl ls efdakg; ng rigkqf pafupká bp rpslp ng gbbfl hpkp tprgk kghflpk bp qigkkp, y qskapk p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Apaibfeip. 

35 Glhpnp rfeqkp bfl rpbngfl, nirg Mgtfvá, y rfeqkp bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Apaibfeip, rfeqkp lsl hkíerihgl y rfeqkp lsl lpaifl. 36 Glhpnp rfeqkp bfl pniviefl, y lg geqfeqgrgkáe; glhpnp rfeqkp lsl vpbigeqgl, y lgkáe jsgakpeqpnfl. 37 Glhpnp rfeqkp lsl rpapbbfl, rfeqkp lsl rpkkfl, y rfeqkp qfnf gb hsgabf jsg glqá ge dgnif ng gbbp, y lgkáe rfdf dsmgkgl; glhpnp rfeqkp lsl qglfkfl, y lgkáe lpjsgpnfl. 38 Lgjsgnpn lfakg lsl puspl, y lg lgrpkáe; hfkjsg gl qigkkp ng ínfbfl, y lg geqfeqgrge rfe idáugegl. 

39 Hfk qpeqf, pbbí dfkpkáe cigkpl ngb ngligkqf y rtprpbgl, dfkpkáe qpdaiée ge gbbp hfbbsgbfl ng pvglqksz; eserp dál lgká hfabpnp ei lg tpaiqpká hfk ugegkprifegl y ugegkprifegl. 40 Rfdf ge bp nglqksrrióe jsg Nifl tizf ng Lfnfdp y ng Ufdfkkp y ng lsl risnpngl vgriepl, nirg Mgtfvá, plí ef dfkpká pbbí tfdakg, ei timf ng tfdakg bp tpaiqpká. 41 Tg pjsí vigeg se hsgabf ngb efkqg, y sep eprióe ukpeng y dsrtfl kgygl lg bgvpeqpkáe ng bfl gxqkgdfl ng bp qigkkp. 42 Pkrf y bpezp dpegmpkáe; lgkáe rksgbgl, y ef qgenkáe rfdhplióe; ls vfz ksuiká rfdf gb dpk, y dfeqpkáe lfakg rpapbbfl; lg hkghpkpkáe rfeqkp qi rfdf tfdakgl p bp hgbgp, ft timp ng Apaibfeip. 43 Fyó bp efqirip gb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y lsl dpefl lg ngaibiqpkfe; peuslqip bg qfdó, nfbfk rfdf ng dsmgk ng hpkqf. 

44 Tg pjsí jsg rfdf bgóe lsaiká ng bp glhglskp ngb Mfknáe p bp dfkpnp cfkqicirpnp; hfkjsg dsy hkfeqf bg tpké tsik ng gbbp, y pb jsg yf glrfmp bp gerpkupké; hfkjsg ¿jsiée gl lgdgmpeqg p dí? ¿y jsiée dg gdhbpzpká? ¿f jsiée lgká pjsgb hplqfk jsg hfnká kglilqikdg? 45 Hfk qpeqf, fín bp ngqgkdieprióe jsg Mgtfvá tp prfknpnf rfeqkp Apaibfeip, y bfl hgelpdigeqfl jsg tp cfkdpnf rfeqkp bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl: Rigkqpdgeqg p bfl dál hgjsgñfl ng ls kgapñf bfl pkkplqkpkáe, y nglqksikáe lsl dfkpnpl rfe gbbfl. 46 Pb ukiqf ng bp qfdp ng Apaibfeip bp qigkkp qgdabó, y gb rbpdfk lg fyó geqkg bpl eprifegl. 

Msirifl ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp Apaibfeip

MGKGDÍPL 51

1 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg yf bgvpeqf se vigeqf nglqksinfk rfeqkp Apaibfeip, y rfeqkp lsl dfkpnfkgl jsg lg bgvpeqpe rfeqkp dí. 2 Y gevipké p Apaibfeip pvgeqpnfkgl jsg bp pvigeqge, y vpripkáe ls qigkkp; hfkjsg lg hfenkáe rfeqkp gbbp ng qfnpl hpkqgl ge gb níp ngb dpb. 3 Niké pb cbgrtgkf jsg geqglp ls pkrf, y pb jsg lg gefkusbbgrg ng ls rfkpzp: Ef hgknfeéil p lsl móvgegl, nglqksin qfnf ls gmékriqf. 4 Y rpgkáe dsgkqfl ge bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl, y pbpergpnfl ge lsl rpbbgl. 5 Hfkjsg Ilkpgb y Msná ef tpe gevisnpnf ng ls Nifl, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, psejsg ls qigkkp csg bbgep ng hgrpnf rfeqkp gb Lpeqf ng Ilkpgb. 

6 Tsin ng ge dgnif ng Apaibfeip, y biakpn rpnp sef ls vinp, hpkp jsg ef hgkgzráil p rpslp ng ls dpbnpn; hfkjsg gb qigdhf gl ng vgeupezp ng Mgtfvá; bg npká ls hpuf. 7 Rfhp ng fkf csg Apaibfeip ge bp dpef ng Mgtfvá, jsg gdakipuó p qfnp bp qigkkp; ng ls vief agaigkfe bfl hsgabfl; lg pqsknigkfe, hfk qpeqf, bpl eprifegl. 8 Ge se dfdgeqf rpyó Apaibfeip, y lg nglhgnpzó; ugdin lfakg gbbp; qfdpn aáblpdf hpkp ls nfbfk, jsizá lpeg. 9 Rskpdfl p Apaibfeip, y ef tp lpepnf; ngmpnbp, y vádfefl rpnp sef p ls qigkkp; hfkjsg tp bbgupnf tplqp gb rigbf ls msirif, y lg tp pbzpnf tplqp bpl esagl. 10 Mgtfvá lpró p bsz esglqkpl mslqiripl; vgein, y rfeqgdfl ge Life bp fakp ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl. 

11 Bidhipn bpl lpgqpl, gdakpzpn bfl glrsnfl; tp nglhgkqpnf Mgtfvá gb glhíkiqs ng bfl kgygl ng Dgnip; hfkjsg rfeqkp Apaibfeip gl ls hgelpdigeqf hpkp nglqksikbp; hfkjsg vgeupezp gl ng Mgtfvá, y vgeupezp ng ls qgdhbf. 12 Bgvpeqpn apengkp lfakg bfl dskfl ng Apaibfeip, kgcfkzpn bp uspknip, hfegn rgeqiegbpl, nilhfegn rgbpnpl; hfkjsg ngbiagkó Mgtfvá, y pse hfenká ge gcgrqf bf jsg tp nirtf rfeqkp bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Apaibfeip. 13 Qú, bp jsg dfkpl geqkg dsrtpl puspl, kirp ge qglfkfl, tp vgeinf qs cie, bp dgninp ng qs rfnirip. 14 Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl mskó hfk lí dildf, nirigenf: Yf qg bbgepké ng tfdakgl rfdf ng bpeuflqpl, y bgvpeqpkáe rfeqkp qi ukiqgkíp. 

15 Gb gl gb jsg tizf bp qigkkp rfe ls hfngk, gb jsg pcikdó gb dsenf rfe ls lpainskíp, y gxqgenió bfl rigbfl rfe ls ieqgbiugerip. 16 P ls vfz lg hkfnsrge qsdsbqfl ng puspl ge bfl rigbfl, y tprg lsaik bpl esagl ng bf úbqidf ng bp qigkkp; éb tprg kgbádhpufl rfe bp bbsvip, y lprp gb vigeqf ng lsl nghóliqfl. 17 Qfnf tfdakg lg tp iecpqspnf, y ef qigeg rigerip; lg pvgkuügezp qfnf pkqícirg ng ls glrsbqskp, hfkjsg dgeqikp gl ls ínfbf, ef qigeg glhíkiqs. 18 Vpeinpn lfe, fakp niuep ng askbp; ge gb qigdhf ngb rplqiuf hgkgrgkáe. 19 Ef gl rfdf gbbfl bp hfkrióe ng Mprfa; hfkjsg éb gl gb Cfkdpnfk ng qfnf, g Ilkpgb gl gb rgqkf ng ls tgkgerip; Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl gl ls efdakg. 

20 Dpkqibbf dg lfil, y pkdpl ng usgkkp; y hfk dgnif ng qi jsgakpeqpké eprifegl, y hfk dgnif ng qi nglqksiké kgiefl. 21 Hfk qs dgnif jsgakpeqpké rpapbbfl y p lsl miegqgl, y hfk dgnif ng qi jsgakpeqpké rpkkfl y p bfl jsg ge gbbfl lsage. 22 Plidildf hfk qs dgnif jsgakpeqpké tfdakgl y dsmgkgl, y hfk dgnif ng qi jsgakpeqpké vigmfl y móvgegl, y hfk qs dgnif jsgakpeqpké móvgegl y víkugegl. 23 Qpdaiée jsgakpeqpké hfk dgnif ng qi pb hplqfk y p ls kgapñf; jsgakpeqpké hfk qs dgnif p bpakpnfkgl y p lsl yseqpl; p mgcgl y p hkíerihgl jsgakpeqpké hfk dgnif ng qi. 

24 Y hpupké p Apaibfeip y p qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Rpbngp, qfnf gb dpb jsg gbbfl tirigkfe ge Life ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl fmfl, nirg Mgtfvá. 25 Tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, ft dfeqg nglqksinfk, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg nglqksilqg qfnp bp qigkkp; y gxqgengké di dpef rfeqkp qi, y qg tpké kfnpk ng bpl hgñpl, y qg kgnsriké p dfeqg jsgdpnf. 26 Y epnig qfdpká ng qi hignkp hpkp gljsiep, ei hignkp hpkp ridigeqf; hfkjsg hgkhgqsf plfbpdigeqf lgkál, tp nirtf Mgtfvá. 

27 Pbzpn apengkp ge bp qigkkp, qfrpn qkfdhgqp ge bpl eprifegl, hkghpkpn hsgabfl rfeqkp gbbp; mseqpn rfeqkp gbbp bfl kgiefl ng Pkpkpq, ng Diei y ng Plogepz; lgñpbpn rfeqkp gbbp rphiqáe, tprgn lsaik rpapbbfl rfdf bpeuflqpl gkizpnpl. 28 Hkghpkpn rfeqkp gbbp eprifegl; bfl kgygl ng Dgnip, lsl rphiqpegl y qfnfl lsl hkíerihgl, y qfnf qgkkiqfkif ng ls nfdieif. 29 Qgdabpká bp qigkkp, y lg pcbiuiká; hfkjsg gl rfecikdpnf rfeqkp Apaibfeip qfnf gb hgelpdigeqf ng Mgtfvá, hpkp hfegk bp qigkkp ng Apaibfeip ge lfbgnpn, hpkp jsg ef tpyp dfkpnfk ge gbbp. 30 Bfl vpbigeqgl ng Apaibfeip ngmpkfe ng hgbgpk, lg gergkkpkfe ge lsl cfkqpbgzpl; bgl cpbqpkfe bpl csgkzpl, lg vfbvigkfe rfdf dsmgkgl; iergenipnpl glqáe lsl rplpl, kfqfl lsl rgkkfmfl. 31 Rfkkgf lg gerfeqkpká rfe rfkkgf, dgelpmgkf lg gerfeqkpká rfe dgelpmgkf, hpkp peseripk pb kgy ng Apaibfeip jsg ls risnpn gl qfdpnp hfk qfnpl hpkqgl. 32 Bfl vpnfl csgkfe qfdpnfl, y bfl apbspkqgl jsgdpnfl p csguf, y lg rfelqgkepkfe bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp. 33 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb: Bp timp ng Apaibfeip gl rfdf sep gkp rspenf glqá ng qkibbpk; ng pjsí p hfrf bg vgenká gb qigdhf ng bp ligup. 

34 Dg ngvfkó, dg ngldgeszó Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, y dg ngmó rfdf vplf vpríf; dg qkpuó rfdf nkpuóe, bbgeó ls vigeqkg ng dil ngbirpngzpl, y dg grtó csgkp. 35 Lfakg Apaibfeip rpiup bp vifbgerip tgrtp p dí y p di rpkeg, niká bp dfkpnfkp ng Life; y di lpeukg rpiup lfakg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Rpbngp, niká Mgkslpbée. 36 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg yf mszuf qs rpslp y tpké qs vgeupezp; y lgrpké ls dpk, y tpké jsg ls rfkkigeqg jsgng lgrp. 37 Y lgká Apaibfeip dfeqfegl ng ksiepl, dfkpnp ng rtprpbgl, glhpeqf y askbp, lie dfkpnfk. 

38 Qfnfl p sep ksuikáe rfdf bgfegl; rfdf rprtfkkfl ng bgfegl uksñikáe. 39 Ge dgnif ng ls rpbfk bgl hfenké apejsgqgl, y tpké jsg lg gdakipusge, hpkp jsg lg pbgukge, y nsgkdpe gqgkef lsgñf y ef nglhigkqge, nirg Mgtfvá. 40 Bfl tpké qkpgk rfdf rfkngkfl pb dpqpngkf, rfdf rpkegkfl y dprtfl rpakífl. 

41 ¡Ródf csg phkglpnp Apaibfeip, y csg qfdpnp bp jsg gkp pbpapnp hfk qfnp bp qigkkp! ¡Ródf vief p lgk Apaibfeip famgqf ng glhpeqf geqkg bpl eprifegl! 42 Lsaió gb dpk lfakg Apaibfeip; ng bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl fbpl csg rsaigkqp. 43 Lsl risnpngl csgkfe plfbpnpl, bp qigkkp lgrp y ngligkqp, qigkkp ge jsg ef dfkpká epnig, ei hplpká hfk gbbp timf ng tfdakg. 44 Y mszupké p Agb ge Apaibfeip, y lprpké ng ls afrp bf jsg lg tp qkpupnf; y ef vgenkáe dál eprifegl p éb, y gb dskf ng Apaibfeip rpgká. 

45 Lpbin ng ge dgnif ng gbbp, hsgabf díf, y lpbvpn rpnp sef ls vinp ngb pknfk ng bp ikp ng Mgtfvá. 46 Y ef ngldpyg vsglqkf rfkpzóe, ei qgdáil p rpslp ngb ksdfk jsg lg fiká hfk bp qigkkp; ge se pñf vgenká gb ksdfk, y nglhsél ge fqkf pñf ksdfk, y tpaká vifbgerip ge bp qigkkp, nfdiepnfk rfeqkp nfdiepnfk. 

47 Hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí vigege nípl ge jsg yf nglqksiké bfl ínfbfl ng Apaibfeip, y qfnp ls qigkkp lgká pvgkufezpnp, y qfnfl lsl dsgkqfl rpgkáe ge dgnif ng gbbp. 48 Bfl rigbfl y bp qigkkp y qfnf bf jsg glqá ge gbbfl rpeqpkáe ng ufzf lfakg Apaibfeip; hfkjsg ngb efkqg vgenkáe rfeqkp gbbp nglqksinfkgl, nirg Mgtfvá. 49 Hfk bfl dsgkqfl ng Ilkpgb rpgká Apaibfeip, rfdf hfk Apaibfeip rpygkfe bfl dsgkqfl ng qfnp bp qigkkp. 

50 Bfl jsg glrphplqgil ng bp glhpnp, penpn, ef fl ngqgeuáil; prfknpfl hfk dsrtfl nípl ng Mgtfvá, y prfknpfl ng Mgkslpbée. 51 Glqpdfl pvgkufezpnfl, hfkjsg fídfl bp pckgeqp; bp rfecslióe rsakió esglqkfl kflqkfl, hfkjsg vieigkfe gxqkpemgkfl rfeqkp bfl lpeqspkifl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

52 Hfk qpeqf, vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge jsg yf nglqksiké lsl ínfbfl, y ge qfnp ls qigkkp ugdikáe bfl tgkinfl. 53 Psejsg lsap Apaibfeip tplqp gb rigbf, y lg cfkqicijsg ge bpl pbqskpl, ng dí vgenkáe p gbbp nglqksinfkgl, nirg Mgtfvá. 

54 ¡Fyglg gb rbpdfk ng Apaibfeip, y gb ukpe jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl! 55 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá nglqksiká p Apaibfeip, y jsiqpká ng gbbp bp dsrtp mprqperip; y akpdpkáe lsl fbpl, y rfdf lfeinf ng dsrtpl puspl lgká bp vfz ng gbbfl. 56 Hfkjsg vief nglqksinfk rfeqkp gbbp, rfeqkp Apaibfeip, y lsl vpbigeqgl csgkfe phkglpnfl; gb pkrf ng gbbfl csg jsgakpnf; hfkjsg Mgtfvá, Nifl ng kgqkiasrifegl, npká bp hpup. 57 Y gdakipupké p lsl hkíerihgl y p lsl lpaifl, p lsl rphiqpegl, p lsl efabgl y p lsl csgkqgl; y nfkdikáe lsgñf gqgkef y ef nglhgkqpkáe, nirg gb Kgy, rsyf efdakg gl Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

58 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Gb dskf pertf ng Apaibfeip lgká ngkkiapnf geqgkpdgeqg, y lsl pbqpl hsgkqpl lgkáe jsgdpnpl p csguf; ge vpef qkpapmpkfe bfl hsgabfl, y bpl eprifegl lg rpelpkfe lóbf hpkp gb csguf. 

59 Hpbpakp jsg gevió gb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl p Lgkpípl timf ng Egkípl, timf ng Dpplípl, rspenf iap rfe Lgngjsípl kgy ng Msná p Apaibfeip, ge gb rspkqf pñf ng ls kgiepnf. Y gkp Lgkpípl gb hkierihpb rpdpkgkf. 60 Glrkiaió, hsgl, Mgkgdípl ge se biakf qfnf gb dpb jsg tpaíp ng vgeik lfakg Apaibfeip, qfnpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg glqáe glrkiqpl rfeqkp Apaibfeip. 61 Y nimf Mgkgdípl p Lgkpípl: Rspenf bbgusgl p Apaibfeip, y vgpl y bgpl qfnpl glqpl rflpl, 62 nikál: Ft Mgtfvá, qú tpl nirtf rfeqkp glqg bsupk jsg bf tpaípl ng nglqksik, tplqp ef jsgnpk ge éb dfkpnfk, ei tfdakg ei peidpb, lief jsg hpkp ligdhkg tp ng lgk plfbpnf. 63 Y rspenf prpagl ng bggk glqg biakf, bg pqpkál sep hignkp, y bf grtpkál ge dgnif ngb Gsckpqgl, 64 y nikál: Plí lg tseniká Apaibfeip, y ef lg bgvpeqpká ngb dpb jsg yf qkpiuf lfakg gbbp; y lgkáe kgeninfl. Tplqp pjsí lfe bpl hpbpakpl ng Mgkgdípl. 

Kgiepnf ng Lgngjsípl

(2 K. 24.18-20; 2 Rk. 36.11-16)

MGKGDÍPL 52

1 Gkp Lgngjsípl ng gnpn ng vgieqiúe pñfl rspenf rfdgezó p kgiepk, y kgieó ferg pñfl ge Mgkslpbée. Ls dpnkg lg bbpdpap Tpdsqpb, timp ng Mgkgdípl ng Biaep. 2 G tizf bf dpbf peqg bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg tizf Mfprid. 3 Y p rpslp ng bp ikp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp Mgkslpbée y Msná, bbguó p grtpkbfl ng ls hkglgerip. Y lg kgagbó Lgngjsípl rfeqkp gb kgy ng Apaibfeip. 

Rpínp ng Mgkslpbée

(2 K. 24.20--25.7; Mgk. 39.1-7)

4 Prfeqgrió, hfk qpeqf, p bfl esgvg pñfl ng ls kgiepnf, ge gb dgl néridf, p bfl nigz nípl ngb dgl, jsg vief Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, éb y qfnf ls gmékriqf, rfeqkp Mgkslpbée, y prpdhpkfe rfeqkp gbbp, y ng qfnpl hpkqgl gnicirpkfe rfeqkp gbbp apbspkqgl. 5 Y glqsvf liqipnp bp risnpn tplqp gb senéridf pñf ngb kgy Lgngjsípl. 6 Ge gb dgl rspkqf, p bfl esgvg nípl ngb dgl, hkgvpbgrió gb tpdakg ge bp risnpn, tplqp ef tpagk hpe hpkp gb hsgabf. 7 Y csg paigkqp sep akgrtp ge gb dskf ng bp risnpn, y qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp tsygkfe, y lpbigkfe ng bp risnpn ng efrtg hfk gb rpdief ng bp hsgkqp geqkg bfl nfl dskfl jsg tpaíp rgkrp ngb mpkníe ngb kgy, y lg csgkfe hfk gb rpdief ngb Pkpaá, glqpenf púe bfl rpbngfl mseqf p bp risnpn pbkgngnfk. 8 Y gb gmékriqf ng bfl rpbngfl liusió pb kgy, y pbrpezpkfe p Lgngjsípl ge bfl bbpefl ng Mgkiró; y bf papenfeó qfnf ls gmékriqf. 9 Geqfergl hkgenigkfe pb kgy, y bg tirigkfe vgeik pb kgy ng Apaibfeip, p Kiabp ge qigkkp ng Tpdpq, nfeng hkfeserió lgeqgerip rfeqkp éb. 10 Y ngufbbó gb kgy ng Apaibfeip p bfl timfl ng Lgngjsípl ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl, y qpdaiée ngufbbó ge Kiabp p qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná. 11 Ef falqpeqg, gb kgy ng Apaibfeip lóbf bg lpró bfl fmfl p Lgngjsípl, y bg pqó rfe ukibbfl, y bf tizf bbgvpk p Apaibfeip; y bf hslf ge bp rákrgb tplqp gb níp ge jsg dskió. 

Rpsqivinpn ng Msná

(2 K. 25.8-21; 2 Rk. 36.17-21; Mgk. 39.8-10)

12 Y ge gb dgl jsieqf, p bfl nigz nípl ngb dgl, jsg gkp gb pñf nigriesgvg ngb kgiepnf ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, vief p Mgkslpbée Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip, jsg lfbíp glqpk ngbpeqg ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip. 13 Y jsgdó bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bp rplp ngb kgy, y qfnpl bpl rplpl ng Mgkslpbée; y nglqksyó rfe csguf qfnf gnicirif ukpeng. 14 Y qfnf gb gmékriqf ng bfl rpbngfl, jsg vgeíp rfe gb rphiqáe ng bp uspknip, nglqksyó qfnfl bfl dskfl ge ngkkgnfk ng Mgkslpbée. 15 G tizf qkpelhfkqpk Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip p bfl hfakgl ngb hsgabf, y p qfnp bp fqkp ugeqg ngb hsgabf jsg tpaíp jsgnpnf ge bp risnpn, p bfl nglgkqfkgl jsg lg tpaípe hplpnf pb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y p qfnf gb kglqf ng bp dsbqiqsn ngb hsgabf. 16 Dpl ng bfl hfakgl ngb hpíl ngmó Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip hpkp viñpnfkgl y bpakpnfkgl. 

17 Y bfl rpbngfl jsgakpkfe bpl rfbsdepl ng akferg jsg glqpape ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bpl aplpl, y gb dpk ng akferg jsg glqpap ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bbgvpkfe qfnf gb akferg p Apaibfeip. 18 Lg bbgvpkfe qpdaiée bfl rpbngkfl, bpl hpbpl, bpl nglhpaibpngkpl, bfl qpzfegl, bpl rsrtpkpl, y qfnfl bfl sqgelibifl ng akferg rfe jsg lg dieilqkpap, 19 y bfl iergelpkifl, qpzfegl, rfhpl, fbbpl, rpengbgkfl, glrsnibbpl y qpzpl; bf ng fkf hfk fkf, y bf ng hbpqp hfk hbpqp, lg bbgvó gb rphiqáe ng bp uspknip. 20 Bpl nfl rfbsdepl, se dpk, y bfl nfrg asgygl ng akferg jsg glqpape ngapmf ng bpl aplpl, jsg tpaíp tgrtf gb kgy Lpbfdóe ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; gb hglf ngb akferg ng qfnf glqf gkp ierpbrsbpabg. 21 Ge rspeqf p bpl rfbsdepl, bp pbqskp ng rpnp rfbsdep gkp ng nigrifrtf rfnfl, y se rfknóe ng nfrg rfnfl bp kfngpap; y ls glhglfk gkp ng rspqkf ngnfl, y gkpe tsgrpl. 22 Y gb rphiqgb ng akferg jsg tpaíp lfakg gbbp gkp ng sep pbqskp ng rierf rfnfl, rfe sep kgn y ukpepnpl pbkgngnfk ngb rphiqgb, qfnf ng akferg; y bf dildf gkp bf ng bp lgusenp rfbsdep rfe lsl ukpepnpl. 23 Tpaíp efvgeqp y lgil ukpepnpl ge rpnp tibgkp; qfnpl gbbpl gkpe rigeqf lfakg bp kgn pbkgngnfk. 

24 Qfdó qpdaiée gb rphiqáe ng bp uspknip p Lgkpípl gb hkierihpb lprgknfqg, p Lfcfeípl gb lgusenf lprgknfqg, y qkgl uspknpl ngb pqkif. 25 Y ng bp risnpn qfdó p se fciripb jsg gkp rphiqáe ng bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp, p ligqg tfdakgl ng bfl rfelgmgkfl íeqidfl ngb kgy, jsg glqpape ge bp risnpn, y pb hkierihpb lgrkgqpkif ng bp dibirip, jsg hplpap kgvilqp pb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp hpkp bp usgkkp, y lglgeqp tfdakgl ngb hsgabf jsg lg tpbbpkfe ngeqkf ng bp risnpn. 26 Bfl qfdó, hsgl, Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip, y bfl bbgvó pb kgy ng Apaibfeip ge Kiabp. 27 Y gb kgy ng Apaibfeip bfl tikió, y bfl dpqó ge Kiabp ge qigkkp ng Tpdpq. Plí Msná csg qkpelhfkqpnp ng ls qigkkp. 

28 Glqg gl gb hsgabf jsg Epasrfnfeflfk bbgvó rpsqivf: Ge gb pñf léhqidf, p qkgl dib vgieqiqkél tfdakgl ng Msná. 29 Ge gb pñf nigrifrtf ng Epasrfnfeflfk éb bbgvó rpsqivpl ng Mgkslpbée p frtfrigeqpl qkgieqp y nfl hgklfepl. 30 Gb pñf vgieqiqkél ng Epasrfnfeflfk, Epaszpkpnáe rphiqáe ng bp uspknip bbgvó rpsqivpl p lgqgrigeqpl rspkgeqp y rierf hgklfepl ng bfl tfdakgl ng Msná; qfnpl bpl hgklfepl ge qfqpb csgkfe rspqkf dib lgilrigeqpl. 

Mfpjsíe gl biagkqpnf y kgriag tfefkgl ge Apaibfeip

(2 K. 25.27-30)

31 Y lsrgnió jsg ge gb pñf qkgieqp y ligqg ngb rpsqivgkif ng Mfpjsíe kgy ng Msná, ge gb dgl nsfnéridf, p bfl vgieqirierf nípl ngb dgl, Gvib-dgkfnpr kgy ng Apaibfeip, ge gb pñf hkidgkf ng ls kgiepnf, pbzó bp rpagzp ng Mfpjsíe kgy ng Msná y bf lpró ng bp rákrgb. 32 Y tpabó rfe éb pdiupabgdgeqg, g tizf hfegk ls qkfef lfakg bfl qkfefl ng bfl kgygl jsg glqpape rfe éb ge Apaibfeip. 33 Bg tizf dsnpk qpdaiée bfl vglqinfl ng hkilifegkf, y rfdíp hpe ge bp dglp ngb kgy ligdhkg qfnfl bfl nípl ng ls vinp. 34 Y rfeqiespdgeqg lg bg npap sep kprióe ng hpkqg ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, rpnp níp nskpeqg qfnfl bfl nípl ng ls vinp, tplqp gb níp ng ls dsgkqg. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


BPDGEQPRIFEGL 

NG MGKGDÍPL

Qkilqgzpl ng Life bp rpsqivp

BPDGEQPRIFEGL 1




1 ¡Ródf tp jsgnpnf lfbp bp risnpn hfhsbflp! 
Bp ukpeng geqkg bpl eprifegl lg tp vsgbqf rfdf visnp, 
Bp lgñfkp ng hkfvieripl tp linf tgrtp qkiasqpkip. 

2 Pdpkupdgeqg bbfkp ge bp efrtg, y lsl báukidpl glqáe ge lsl dgmibbpl. 
Ef qigeg jsige bp rfelsgbg ng qfnfl lsl pdpeqgl; 
Qfnfl lsl pdiufl bg cpbqpkfe, lg bg vfbvigkfe gegdiufl. 

3 Msná tp inf ge rpsqivgkif p rpslp ng bp pcbirrióe y ng bp nskp lgkvinsdakg; 
Gbbp tpaiqó geqkg bpl eprifegl, y ef tpbbó nglrpelf; 
Qfnfl lsl hgklgusinfkgl bp pbrpezpkfe geqkg bpl glqkgrtskpl. 

4 Bpl rpbzpnpl ng Life qigege bsqf, hfkjsg ef tpy jsige vgeup p bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl; 
Qfnpl lsl hsgkqpl glqáe plfbpnpl, lsl lprgknfqgl uidge, 
Lsl víkugegl glqáe pcbiuinpl, y gbbp qigeg pdpkuskp. 

5 Lsl gegdiufl tpe linf tgrtfl hkíerihgl, lsl pafkkgrgnfkgl csgkfe hkflhgkpnfl, 
Hfkjsg Mgtfvá bp pcbiuió hfk bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl kgagbifegl; 
Lsl timfl csgkfe ge rpsqivinpn ngbpeqg ngb gegdiuf. 

6 Nglphpkgrió ng bp timp ng Life qfnp ls tgkdflskp; 
Lsl hkíerihgl csgkfe rfdf rigkvfl jsg ef tpbbpe hplqf, 
Y pensvigkfe lie csgkzpl ngbpeqg ngb hgklgusinfk. 

7 Mgkslpbée, rspenf rpyó ls hsgabf ge dpef ngb gegdiuf y ef tsaf jsige bp pysnplg, 
Lg prfknó ng bfl nípl ng ls pcbirrióe, y ng lsl kgagbifegl, 
Y ng qfnpl bpl rflpl pukpnpabgl jsg qsvf nglng bfl qigdhfl peqiusfl. 
Bp dikpkfe bfl gegdiufl, y lg askbpkfe ng ls rpínp. 

8 Hgrpnf rfdgqió Mgkslpbée, hfk bf rspb gbbp tp linf kgdfvinp; 
Qfnfl bfl jsg bp tfekpape bp tpe dgeflhkgripnf, hfkjsg vigkfe ls vgkuügezp; 
Y gbbp lslhikp, y lg vsgbvg pqkál. 

9 Ls iedsenirip glqá ge lsl cpbnpl, y ef lg prfknó ng ls cie; 
Hfk qpeqf, gbbp tp nglrgeninf lfkhkgengeqgdgeqg, y ef qigeg jsige bp rfelsgbg. 
Dikp, ft Mgtfvá, di pcbirrióe, hfkjsg gb gegdiuf lg tp geukpengrinf. 

10 Gxqgenió ls dpef gb gegdiuf p qfnpl lsl rflpl hkgriflpl; 
Gbbp tp vilqf geqkpk ge ls lpeqspkif p bpl eprifegl 
Ng bpl rspbgl dpenplqg jsg ef geqkplge ge qs rfeukguprióe. 

11 Qfnf ls hsgabf aslró ls hpe lslhikpenf; 
Nigkfe hfk bp rfdinp qfnpl lsl rflpl hkgriflpl, hpkp geqkgqgegk bp vinp. 
Dikp, ft Mgtfvá, y vg jsg glqfy papqinp. 

12 ¿Ef fl rfedsgvg p rspeqfl hpláil hfk gb rpdief? 
Dikpn, y vgn li tpy nfbfk rfdf di nfbfk jsg dg tp vgeinf; 
Hfkjsg Mgtfvá dg tp peuslqipnf ge gb níp ng ls pknigeqg cskfk. 

13 Nglng bf pbqf gevió csguf jsg rfelsdg dil tsglfl; 
Tp gxqgeninf kgn p dil higl, dg vfbvió pqkál, 
Dg ngmó nglfbpnp, y rfe nfbfk qfnf gb níp. 

14 Gb ysuf ng dil kgagbifegl tp linf pqpnf hfk ls dpef; 
Pqpnskpl tpe linf grtpnpl lfakg di rgkviz; tp ngaibiqpnf dil csgkzpl; 
Dg tp geqkgupnf gb Lgñfk ge dpefl rfeqkp bpl rspbgl ef hfnké bgvpeqpkdg. 

15 Gb Lgñfk tp tfbbpnf p qfnfl dil tfdakgl csgkqgl ge dgnif ng dí; 
Bbpdó rfeqkp dí rfdhpñíp hpkp jsgakpeqpk p dil móvgegl; 
Rfdf bpupk tp tfbbpnf gb Lgñfk p bp vikuge timp ng Msná. 

16 Hfk glqp rpslp bbfkf; dil fmfl, dil fmfl cbsyge puspl, 
Hfkjsg lg pbgmó ng dí gb rfelfbpnfk jsg né kghflf p di pbdp; 
Dil timfl lfe nglqksinfl, hfkjsg gb gegdiuf hkgvpbgrió. 

17 Life gxqgenió lsl dpefl; ef qigeg jsige bp rfelsgbg; 
Mgtfvá nif dpenpdigeqf rfeqkp Mprfa, jsg lsl vgriefl csglge lsl gegdiufl; 
Mgkslpbée csg famgqf ng pafdieprióe geqkg gbbfl. 

18 Mgtfvá gl mslqf; yf rfeqkp ls hpbpakp dg kgagbé. 
Fín ptfkp, hsgabfl qfnfl, y vgn di nfbfk; 
Dil víkugegl y dil móvgegl csgkfe bbgvpnfl ge rpsqivgkif. 

19 Ni vfrgl p dil pdpeqgl, dpl gbbfl dg tpe geupñpnf; 
Dil lprgknfqgl y dil peripefl ge bp risnpn hgkgrigkfe, 
Aslrpenf rfdinp hpkp lí rfe jsg geqkgqgegk ls vinp. 

20 Dikp, ft Mgtfvá, glqfy pqkiasbpnp, dil geqkpñpl tigkvge. 
Di rfkpzóe lg qkplqfkep ngeqkf ng dí, hfkjsg dg kgagbé ge ukpe dpegkp. 
Hfk csgkp tizf glqkpufl bp glhpnp; hfk ngeqkf lgñfkgó bp dsgkqg. 

21 Fygkfe jsg ugdíp, dpl ef tpy rfelfbpnfk hpkp dí; 
Qfnfl dil gegdiufl tpe fínf di dpb, lg pbgukpe ng bf jsg qú tirilqg. 
Tpkál vgeik gb níp jsg tpl peseripnf, y lgkáe rfdf yf. 

22 Vgeup ngbpeqg ng qi qfnp ls dpbnpn, 
Y tpz rfe gbbfl rfdf tirilqg rfediuf hfk qfnpl dil kgagbifegl; 
Hfkjsg dsrtfl lfe dil lslhikfl, y di rfkpzóe glqá pnfbfkinf. 



Bpl qkilqgzpl ng Life vigege ng Mgtfvá

BPDGEQPRIFEGL 2




1 ¡Ródf flrskgrió gb Lgñfk ge ls cskfk p bp timp ng Life! 
Ngkkiaó ngb rigbf p bp qigkkp bp tgkdflskp ng Ilkpgb, 
Y ef lg prfknó ngb glqkpnf ng lsl higl ge gb níp ng ls cskfk. 

2 Nglqksyó gb Lgñfk, y ef hgknfeó; 
Nglqksyó ge ls cskfk qfnpl bpl qigenpl ng Mprfa; 
Grtó hfk qigkkp bpl cfkqpbgzpl ng bp timp ng Msná, 
Tsdibbó pb kgief y p lsl hkíerihgl. 

3 Rfkqó rfe gb pknfk ng ls ikp qfnf gb hfngkíf ng Ilkpgb; 
Kgqikó ng éb ls niglqkp ckgeqg pb gegdiuf, 
Y lg gergenió ge Mprfa rfdf bbpdp ng csguf jsg tp ngvfkpnf pbkgngnfk. 

4 Geqgló ls pkrf rfdf gegdiuf, pcikdó ls dpef ngkgrtp rfdf pnvgklpkif, 
Y nglqksyó rspeqf gkp tgkdflf. 
Ge bp qigenp ng bp timp ng Life ngkkpdó rfdf csguf ls gefmf. 

5 Gb Lgñfk bbguó p lgk rfdf gegdiuf, nglqksyó p Ilkpgb; 
Nglqksyó qfnfl lsl hpbprifl, ngkkiaó lsl cfkqpbgzpl, 
Y dsbqihbiró ge bp timp ng Msná bp qkilqgzp y gb bpdgeqf. 

6 Jsiqó ls qigenp rfdf gekpdpnp ng tsgkqf; 
Nglqksyó gb bsupk ge nfeng lg rfeukgupape; 
Mgtfvá tp tgrtf fbvinpk bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl y bfl nípl ng kghflf ge Life, 
Y ge gb pknfk ng ls ikp tp nglgrtpnf pb kgy y pb lprgknfqg. 

7 Nglgrtó gb Lgñfk ls pbqpk, dgeflhkgrió ls lpeqspkif; 
Tp geqkgupnf ge dpef ngb gegdiuf bfl dskfl ng lsl hpbprifl; 
Tirigkfe kglfepk ls vfz ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá rfdf ge níp ng ciglqp. 

8 Mgtfvá ngqgkdieó nglqksik gb dskf ng bp timp ng Life; 
Gxqgenió gb rfkngb, ef kgqkpmf ls dpef ng bp nglqksrrióe; 
Tizf, hsgl, jsg lg bpdgeqpkp gb peqgdskf y gb dskf; csgkfe nglfbpnfl mseqpdgeqg. 

9 Lsl hsgkqpl csgkfe grtpnpl hfk qigkkp, nglqksyó y jsgakpeqó lsl rgkkfmfl; 
Ls kgy y lsl hkíerihgl glqáe geqkg bpl eprifegl nfeng ef tpy bgy; 
Lsl hkfcgqpl qpdhfrf tpbbpkfe vilióe ng Mgtfvá. 

10 Lg lgeqpkfe ge qigkkp, rpbbpkfe bfl peripefl ng bp timp ng Life; 
Grtpkfe hfbvf lfakg lsl rpagzpl, lg riñgkfe ng ribirif; 
Bpl víkugegl ng Mgkslpbée apmpkfe lsl rpagzpl p qigkkp. 

11 Dil fmfl nglcpbbgrigkfe ng báukidpl, lg rfedfvigkfe dil geqkpñpl, 
Di tíupnf lg ngkkpdó hfk qigkkp p rpslp ngb jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng bp timp ng di hsgabf, 
Rspenf nglcpbbgríp gb eiñf y gb jsg dpdpap, ge bpl hbpzpl ng bp risnpn. 

12 Ngrípe p lsl dpnkgl: ¿Nóeng glqá gb qkiuf y gb vief? 
Nglcpbbgrípe rfdf tgkinfl ge bpl rpbbgl ng bp risnpn, 
Ngkkpdpenf lsl pbdpl ge gb kgupzf ng lsl dpnkgl. 

13 ¿Jsé qglqiuf qg qkpgké, f p jsiée qg tpké lgdgmpeqg, timp ng Mgkslpbée? 
¿P jsiée qg rfdhpkpké hpkp rfelfbpkqg, ft vikuge timp ng Life? 
Hfkjsg ukpeng rfdf gb dpk gl qs jsgakpeqpdigeqf; ¿jsiée qg lpepká? 

14 Qsl hkfcgqpl vigkfe hpkp qi vpeinpn y bfrskp; 
Y ef nglrsakigkfe qs hgrpnf hpkp idhgnik qs rpsqivgkif, 
Lief jsg qg hkgnirpkfe vpepl hkfcgrípl y gxqkpvífl. 

15 Qfnfl bfl jsg hplpape hfk gb rpdief apqigkfe bpl dpefl lfakg qi; 
Libapkfe, y dfvigkfe nglhgrqivpdgeqg lsl rpagzpl lfakg bp timp ng Mgkslpbée, nirigenf: 
¿Gl glqp bp risnpn jsg ngrípe ng hgkcgrqp tgkdflskp, gb ufzf ng qfnp bp qigkkp? 

16 Qfnfl qsl gegdiufl pakigkfe rfeqkp qi ls afrp; 
Lg askbpkfe, y rksmigkfe bfl nigeqgl; nimgkfe: Ngvfkédflbp; 
Rigkqpdgeqg glqg gl gb níp jsg glhgkáapdfl; bf tgdfl tpbbpnf, bf tgdfl vilqf. 

17 Mgtfvá tp tgrtf bf jsg qgeíp ngqgkdiepnf; 
Tp rsdhbinf ls hpbpakp, bp rspb éb tpaíp dpenpnf nglng qigdhf peqiusf. 
Nglqksyó, y ef hgknfeó; 
Y tp tgrtf jsg gb gegdiuf lg pbgukg lfakg qi, 
Y gepbqgrió gb hfngk ng qsl pnvgklpkifl. 

18 Gb rfkpzóe ng gbbfl rbpdpap pb Lgñfk; 
Ft timp ng Life, grtp báukidpl rspb pkkfyf níp y efrtg; 
Ef nglrpelgl, ei rglge bpl eiñpl ng qsl fmfl. 

19 Bgváeqpqg, np vfrgl ge bp efrtg, pb rfdgezpk bpl viuibipl; 
Ngkkpdp rfdf pusp qs rfkpzóe peqg bp hkglgerip ngb Lgñfk; 
Pbzp qsl dpefl p éb idhbfkpenf bp vinp ng qsl hgjsgñiqfl, 
Jsg nglcpbbgrge ng tpdakg ge bpl geqkpnpl ng qfnpl bpl rpbbgl. 

20 Dikp, ft Mgtfvá, y rfelingkp p jsiée tpl tgrtf plí. 
¿Tpe ng rfdgk bpl dsmgkgl gb cksqf ng lsl geqkpñpl, bfl hgjsgñiqfl p ls qigkef rsinpnf? 
¿Tpe ng lgk dsgkqfl ge gb lpeqspkif ngb Lgñfk gb lprgknfqg y gb hkfcgqp? 

21 Eiñfl y vigmfl yprípe hfk qigkkp ge bpl rpbbgl; 
Dil víkugegl y dil móvgegl rpygkfe p glhpnp; 
Dpqplqg ge gb níp ng qs cskfk; ngufbbplqg, ef hgknfeplqg. 

22 Tpl rfevfrpnf ng qfnpl hpkqgl dil qgdfkgl, rfdf ge se níp ng lfbgdeinpn; 
Y ge gb níp ngb cskfk ng Mgtfvá ef tsaf jsige glrphplg ei jsgnplg vivf; 
Bfl jsg rkié y dpeqsvg, di gegdiuf bfl prpaó. 



Glhgkpezp ng biagkprióe hfk bp dilgkirfknip ng Nifl

BPDGEQPRIFEGL 3




1 Yf lfy gb tfdakg jsg tp vilqf pcbirrióe apmf gb báqiuf ng ls gefmf. 
2 Dg usió y dg bbgvó ge qieigabpl, y ef ge bsz; 
3 Rigkqpdgeqg rfeqkp dí vfbvió y kgvfbvió ls dpef qfnf gb níp. 

4 Tizf gevgmgrgk di rpkeg y di higb; jsgakpeqó dil tsglfl; 
5 Gniciró apbspkqgl rfeqkp dí, y dg kfngó ng pdpkuskp y ng qkpapmf. 
6 Dg ngmó ge flrskinpn, rfdf bfl yp dsgkqfl ng dsrtf qigdhf. 

7 Dg rgkró hfk qfnfl bpnfl, y ef hsgnf lpbik; tp tgrtf dál hglpnpl dil rpngepl; 
8 Pse rspenf rbpdé y ni vfrgl, rgkkó bfl fínfl p di fkprióe; 
9 Rgkró dil rpdiefl rfe hignkp bpakpnp, qfkrió dil lgengkfl. 

10 Csg hpkp dí rfdf flf jsg prgrtp, rfdf bgóe ge glrfenkimfl; 
11 Qfkrió dil rpdiefl, y dg nglhgnpzó; dg ngmó nglfbpnf. 
12 Geqgló ls pkrf, y dg hslf rfdf abperf hpkp bp lpgqp. 

13 Tizf geqkpk ge dil geqkpñpl bpl lpgqpl ng ls pbmpap. 
14 Csi glrpkeif p qfnf di hsgabf, askbp ng gbbfl qfnfl bfl nípl; 
15 Dg bbgeó ng pdpkuskpl, dg gdakipuó ng pmgemfl. 

16 Dil nigeqgl jsgakó rfe rplrpmf, dg rsakió ng rgeizp; 
17 Y di pbdp lg pbgmó ng bp hpz, dg fbviné ngb aige, 
18 Y nimg: Hgkgrigkfe dil csgkzpl, y di glhgkpezp ge Mgtfvá. 

19 Prséknpqg ng di pcbirrióe y ng di papqidigeqf, ngb pmgemf y ng bp tigb; 
20 Bf qgenké púe ge dgdfkip, hfkjsg di pbdp glqá papqinp ngeqkf ng dí; 
21 Glqf kgrphpriqpké ge di rfkpzóe, hfk bf qpeqf glhgkpké. 
22 Hfk bp dilgkirfknip ng Mgtfvá ef tgdfl linf rfelsdinfl, hfkjsg eserp ngrpygkfe lsl dilgkirfknipl. 
23 Esgvpl lfe rpnp dpñpep; ukpeng gl qs cingbinpn. 
24 Di hfkrióe gl Mgtfvá, nimf di pbdp; hfk qpeqf, ge éb glhgkpké. 

25 Asgef gl Mgtfvá p bfl jsg ge éb glhgkpe, pb pbdp jsg bg aslrp. 
26 Asgef gl glhgkpk ge libgerif bp lpbvprióe ng Mgtfvá. 
27 Asgef bg gl pb tfdakg bbgvpk gb ysuf nglng ls msvgeqsn. 

28 Jsg lg ligeqg lfbf y rpbbg, hfkjsg gl Nifl jsige lg bf idhslf; 
29 Hfeup ls afrp ge gb hfbvf, hfk li púe tpy glhgkpezp; 
30 Né bp dgmibbp pb jsg bg tigkg, y lgp rfbdpnf ng pckgeqpl. 

31 Hfkjsg gb Lgñfk ef nglgrtp hpkp ligdhkg; 
32 Peqgl li pcbiug, qpdaiée lg rfdhpngrg lguúe bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl dilgkirfknipl; 
33 Hfkjsg ef pcbiug ei geqkilqgrg vfbseqpkipdgeqg p bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 

34 Ngldgeszpk apmf bfl higl p qfnfl bfl gerpkrgbpnfl ng bp qigkkp, 
35 Qfkrgk gb ngkgrtf ngb tfdakg ngbpeqg ng bp hkglgerip ngb Pbqílidf, 
36 Qkplqfkepk pb tfdakg ge ls rpslp, gb Lgñfk ef bf phksgap. 

37 ¿Jsiée lgká pjsgb jsg niup jsg lsrgnió pbuf jsg gb Lgñfk ef dpenó? 
38 ¿Ng bp afrp ngb Pbqílidf ef lpbg bf dpbf y bf asgef? 
39 ¿Hfk jsé lg bpdgeqp gb tfdakg vivigeqg? Bpdéeqglg gb tfdakg ge ls hgrpnf. 

40 Glrsnkiñgdfl esglqkfl rpdiefl, y asljsgdfl, y vfbvádfefl p Mgtfvá; 
41 Bgvpeqgdfl esglqkfl rfkpzfegl y dpefl p Nifl ge bfl rigbfl; 
42 Eflfqkfl efl tgdfl kgagbpnf, y csidfl nglbgpbgl; qú ef hgknfeplqg. 

43 Nglhbguplqg bp ikp y efl hgklgusilqg; dpqplqg, y ef hgknfeplqg; 
44 Qg rsakilqg ng esag hpkp jsg ef hplplg bp fkprióe esglqkp; 
45 Efl vfbvilqg ge fhkfaif y pafdieprióe ge dgnif ng bfl hsgabfl. 

46 Qfnfl esglqkfl gegdiufl pakigkfe rfeqkp eflfqkfl ls afrp; 
47 Qgdfk y bpzf csgkfe hpkp eflfqkfl, plfbpdigeqf y jsgakpeqf; 
48 Kífl ng puspl grtpe dil fmfl hfk gb jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng bp timp ng di hsgabf. 

49 Dil fmfl nglqibpe y ef rglpe, hfkjsg ef tpy pbivif 
50 Tplqp jsg Mgtfvá dikg y vgp nglng bfl rigbfl; 
51 Dil fmfl rfeqkilqpkfe di pbdp hfk qfnpl bpl timpl ng di risnpn. 

52 Dil gegdiufl dg nigkfe rpzp rfdf p pvg, lie tpagk hfk jsé; 
53 Pqpkfe di vinp ge rilqgkep, hsligkfe hignkp lfakg dí; 
54 Puspl rsakigkfe di rpagzp; yf nimg: Dsgkqf lfy. 

55 Ievfjsé qs efdakg, ft Mgtfvá, nglng bp rákrgb hkfcsenp; 
56 Fílqg di vfz; ef glrfenpl qs fínf pb rbpdfk ng dil lslhikfl. 
57 Qg prgkrplqg gb níp jsg qg ievfjsé; nimilqg: Ef qgdpl. 

58 Pafuplqg, Lgñfk, bp rpslp ng di pbdp; kgnidilqg di vinp. 
59 Qú tpl vilqf, ft Mgtfvá, di pukpvif; ngcigeng di rpslp. 
60 Tpl vilqf qfnp ls vgeupezp, qfnfl lsl hgelpdigeqfl rfeqkp dí. 

61 Tpl fínf gb fhkfaif ng gbbfl, ft Mgtfvá, qfnpl lsl dpjsieprifegl rfeqkp dí; 
62 Bfl nirtfl ng bfl jsg rfeqkp dí lg bgvpeqpkfe, y ls ngliueif rfeqkp dí qfnf gb níp. 
63 Ls lgeqpklg y ls bgvpeqpklg dikp; yf lfy ls rperióe. 

64 Npbgl gb hpuf, ft Mgtfvá, lguúe bp fakp ng lsl dpefl. 
65 Geqkéupbfl pb genskgridigeqf ng rfkpzóe; qs dpbnirióe rpiup lfakg gbbfl. 
66 Hgklíusgbfl ge qs cskfk, y jsgakáeqpbfl ng ngapmf ng bfl rigbfl, ft Mgtfvá. 



Gb rplqiuf ng Life rfelsdpnf

BPDGEQPRIFEGL 4




1 ¡Ródf lg tp geegukgrinf gb fkf! 
¡Ródf gb asge fkf tp hgkninf ls akibbf! 
Bpl hignkpl ngb lpeqspkif glqáe glhpkrinpl hfk bpl gerksrimpnpl ng qfnpl bpl rpbbgl. 

2 Bfl timfl ng Life, hkgripnfl y glqidpnfl dál jsg gb fkf hskf, 
¡Ródf lfe qgeinfl hfk vplimpl ng apkkf, fakp ng dpefl ng pbcpkgkf! 

3 Pse bfl rtprpbgl npe bp qgqp, y pdpdpeqpe p lsl rprtfkkfl; 
Bp timp ng di hsgabf gl rksgb rfdf bfl pvglqksrgl ge gb ngligkqf. 

4 Bp bgeusp ngb eiñf ng hgrtf lg hguó p ls hpbpnpk hfk bp lgn; 
Bfl hgjsgñsgbfl hinigkfe hpe, y ef tsaf jsige lg bf kghpkqiglg. 

5 Bfl jsg rfdípe ngbirpnpdgeqg csgkfe plfbpnfl ge bpl rpbbgl; 
Bfl jsg lg rkipkfe geqkg húkhskp lg pakpzpkfe p bfl glqgkrfbgkfl. 

6 Hfkjsg lg psdgeqó bp ieijsinpn ng bp timp ng di hsgabf dál jsg gb hgrpnf ng Lfnfdp, 
Jsg csg nglqksinp ge se dfdgeqf, lie jsg prpdhpkpe rfeqkp gbbp rfdhpñípl. 

7 Lsl efabgl csgkfe dál hskfl jsg bp eigvg, dál abperfl jsg bp bgrtg; 
Dál ksaifl gkpe lsl rsgkhfl jsg gb rfkpb, ls qpbbg dál tgkdflf jsg gb zpcikf. 

8 Flrskf dál jsg bp egukskp gl ls plhgrqf; ef bfl rfefrge hfk bpl rpbbgl; 
Ls higb glqá hgupnp p lsl tsglfl, lgrp rfdf se hpbf. 

9 Dál nirtflfl csgkfe bfl dsgkqfl p glhpnp jsg bfl dsgkqfl hfk gb tpdakg; 
Hfkjsg élqfl dskigkfe hfrf p hfrf hfk cpbqp ng bfl cksqfl ng bp qigkkp. 

10 Bpl dpefl ng dsmgkgl hipnflpl rfrigkfe p lsl timfl; 
Lsl hkfhifl timfl bgl likvigkfe ng rfdinp ge gb níp ngb jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng bp timp ng di hsgabf. 

11 Rsdhbió Mgtfvá ls gefmf, ngkkpdó gb pknfk ng ls ikp; 
Y gergenió ge Life csguf jsg rfelsdió tplqp lsl ridigeqfl. 

12 Eserp bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp, ei qfnfl bfl jsg tpaiqpe ge gb dsenf, 
Rkgygkfe jsg gb gegdiuf y gb pnvgklpkif geqkpkp hfk bpl hsgkqpl ng Mgkslpbée. 

13 Gl hfk rpslp ng bfl hgrpnfl ng lsl hkfcgqpl, y bpl dpbnpngl ng lsl lprgknfqgl, 
Jsigegl ngkkpdpkfe ge dgnif ng gbbp bp lpeukg ng bfl mslqfl. 

14 Qiqsagpkfe rfdf rigufl ge bpl rpbbgl, csgkfe rfeqpdiepnfl rfe lpeukg, 
Ng dfnf jsg ef hsniglge qfrpklg lsl vglqinskpl. 

15 ¡Phpkqpfl! ¡Iedsenfl! bgl ukiqpape; ¡Phpkqpfl, phpkqpfl, ef qfjséil! 
Tsygkfe y csgkfe nilhgklpnfl; lg nimf geqkg bpl eprifegl: 
Eserp dál dfkpkáe pjsí. 

16 Bp ikp ng Mgtfvá bfl phpkqó, ef bfl dikpká dál; 
Ef kglhgqpkfe bp hkglgerip ng bfl lprgknfqgl, ei qsvigkfe rfdhplióe ng bfl vigmfl. 

17 Pse tpe nglcpbbgrinf esglqkfl fmfl glhgkpenf ge vpef esglqkf lfrfkkf; 
Ge esglqkp glhgkpezp puspknpdfl p sep eprióe jsg ef hsgng lpbvpk. 

18 Rpzpkfe esglqkfl hplfl, hpkp jsg ef pensviélgdfl hfk esglqkpl rpbbgl; 
Lg prgkró esglqkf cie, lg rsdhbigkfe esglqkfl nípl; hfkjsg bbguó esglqkf cie. 

19 Biugkfl csgkfe esglqkfl hgklgusinfkgl dál jsg bpl áusibpl ngb rigbf; 
Lfakg bfl dfeqgl efl hgkliusigkfe, ge gb ngligkqf efl hsligkfe gdaflrpnpl. 

20 Gb pbigeqf ng esglqkpl vinpl, gb seuinf ng Mgtfvá, 
Ng jsige tpaípdfl nirtf: P ls lfdakp qgenkgdfl vinp geqkg bpl eprifegl, csg phkglpnf ge lsl bpzfl. 

21 Uózpqg y pbéukpqg, timp ng Gnfd, bp jsg tpaiqpl ge qigkkp ng Sz; 
Pse tplqp qi bbgupká bp rfhp; qg gdakipupkál, y vfdiqpkál. 

22 Lg tp rsdhbinf qs rplqiuf, ft timp ng Life; 
Eserp dál qg tpká bbgvpk rpsqivp. 
Rplqiupká qs ieijsinpn, ft timp ng Gnfd; 
Nglrsakiká qsl hgrpnfl. 



Fkprióe ngb hsgabf pcbiuinf

BPDGEQPRIFEGL 5




1 Prséknpqg, ft Mgtfvá, ng bf jsg efl tp lsrgninf; 
Dikp, y vg esglqkf fhkfaif. 
2 Esglqkp tgkgnpn tp hplpnf p gxqkpñfl, 
Esglqkpl rplpl p cfkplqgkfl. 
3 Tsékcpefl lfdfl lie hpnkg; 
Esglqkpl dpnkgl lfe rfdf visnpl. 
4 Esglqkp pusp agagdfl hfk niegkf; 
Rfdhkpdfl esglqkp bgñp hfk hkgrif. 
5 Hpngrgdfl hgklgrsrióe lfakg eflfqkfl; 
Efl cpqiupdfl, y ef tpy hpkp eflfqkfl kghflf. 
6 Pb guihrif y pb plikif gxqgenidfl bp dpef, hpkp lpripkefl ng hpe. 
7 Esglqkfl hpnkgl hgrpkfe, y tpe dsgkqf; 
Y eflfqkfl bbgvpdfl ls rplqiuf. 
8 Ligkvfl lg gelgñfkgpkfe ng eflfqkfl; 
Ef tsaf jsige efl biakplg ng ls dpef. 
9 Rfe hgbiukf ng esglqkpl vinpl qkpípdfl esglqkf hpe 
Peqg bp glhpnp ngb ngligkqf. 
10 Esglqkp higb lg geegukgrió rfdf se tfkef 
P rpslp ngb pknfk ngb tpdakg. 
11 Vifbpkfe p bpl dsmgkgl ge Life, 
P bpl víkugegl ge bpl risnpngl ng Msná. 
12 P bfl hkíerihgl rfbupkfe ng bpl dpefl; 
Ef kglhgqpkfe gb kflqkf ng bfl vigmfl. 
13 Bbgvpkfe p bfl móvgegl p dfbgk, 
Y bfl dsrtprtfl nglcpbbgrigkfe apmf gb hglf ng bp bgñp. 
14 Bfl peripefl ef lg vge dál ge bp hsgkqp, 
Bfl móvgegl ngmpkfe lsl rperifegl. 
15 Rgló gb ufzf ng esglqkf rfkpzóe; 
Esglqkp npezp lg rpdaió ge bsqf. 
16 Rpyó bp rfkfep ng esglqkp rpagzp; 
¡Py ptfkp ng eflfqkfl! hfkjsg hgrpdfl. 
17 Hfk glqf csg geqkilqgrinf esglqkf rfkpzóe, 
Hfk glqf lg geqgegakgrigkfe esglqkfl fmfl, 
18 Hfk gb dfeqg ng Life jsg glqá plfbpnf; 
Zfkkpl penpe hfk éb. 
19 Dpl qú, Mgtfvá, hgkdpegrgkál hpkp ligdhkg; 
Qs qkfef ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe. 
20 ¿Hfk jsé qg fbvinpl rfdhbgqpdgeqg ng eflfqkfl, 
Y efl papenfepl qpe bpkuf qigdhf? 
21 Vsébvgefl, ft Mgtfvá, p qi, y efl vfbvgkgdfl; 
Kgesgvp esglqkfl nípl rfdf pb hkierihif. 
22 Hfkjsg efl tpl nglgrtpnf; 
Qg tpl pikpnf rfeqkp eflfqkfl ge ukpe dpegkp.

GZGJSIGB 

Bp vilióe ng bp ubfkip niviep

GZGJSIGB 1

1 Prfeqgrió ge gb pñf qkgieqp, ge gb dgl rspkqf, p bfl rierf nípl ngb dgl, jsg glqpenf yf ge dgnif ng bfl rpsqivfl mseqf pb kíf Jsgapk, bfl rigbfl lg pakigkfe, y vi vilifegl ng Nifl. 2 Ge gb jsieqf pñf ng bp nghfkqprióe ngb kgy Mfpjsíe, p bfl rierf nípl ngb dgl, 3 vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá pb lprgknfqg Gzgjsigb timf ng Aszi, ge bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl, mseqf pb kíf Jsgapk; vief pbbí lfakg éb bp dpef ng Mgtfvá. 

4 Y diké, y tg pjsí vgeíp ngb efkqg se vigeqf qgdhglqsflf, y sep ukpe esag, rfe se csguf gevfbvgeqg, y pbkgngnfk ng éb se kglhbpenfk, y ge dgnif ngb csguf pbuf jsg hpkgríp rfdf akferg kgcsbugeqg, 5 y ge dgnif ng gbbp bp ciuskp ng rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl. Y glqp gkp ls phpkigerip: tpaíp ge gbbfl lgdgmpezp ng tfdakg. 6 Rpnp sef qgeíp rspqkf rpkpl y rspqkf pbpl. 7 Y bfl higl ng gbbfl gkpe ngkgrtfl, y bp hbpeqp ng lsl higl rfdf hbpeqp ng hig ng agrgkkf; y rgeqgbbgpape p dpegkp ng akferg dsy aksñinf. 8 Ngapmf ng lsl pbpl, p lsl rspqkf bpnfl, qgeípe dpefl ng tfdakg; y lsl rpkpl y lsl pbpl hfk bfl rspqkf bpnfl. 9 Rfe bpl pbpl lg mseqpape gb sef pb fqkf. Ef lg vfbvípe rspenf penpape, lief jsg rpnp sef rpdiepap ngkgrtf tprip pngbpeqg. 10 Y gb plhgrqf ng lsl rpkpl gkp rpkp ng tfdakg, y rpkp ng bgóe pb bpnf ngkgrtf ng bfl rspqkf, y rpkp ng asgy p bp izjsigknp ge bfl rspqkf; plidildf tpaíp ge bfl rspqkf rpkp ng áusibp. 11 Plí gkpe lsl rpkpl. Y qgeípe lsl pbpl gxqgeninpl hfk geridp, rpnp sef nfl, bpl rspbgl lg mseqpape; y bpl fqkpl nfl rsakípe lsl rsgkhfl. 12 Y rpnp sef rpdiepap ngkgrtf tprip pngbpeqg; tprip nfeng gb glhíkiqs bgl dfvíp jsg pensviglge, penpape; y rspenf penpape, ef lg vfbvípe. 13 Rspeqf p bp lgdgmpezp ng bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl, ls plhgrqf gkp rfdf ng rpkafegl ng csguf gergeninfl, rfdf vilióe ng tprtfegl gergeninfl jsg penpap geqkg bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl; y gb csguf kglhbpengríp, y ngb csguf lpbípe kgbádhpufl. 14 Y bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl rfkkípe y vfbvípe p lgdgmpezp ng kgbádhpufl. 

15 Digeqkpl yf dikpap bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl, tg pjsí sep ksgnp lfakg bp qigkkp mseqf p bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl, p bfl rspqkf bpnfl. 16 Gb plhgrqf ng bpl ksgnpl y ls fakp gkp lgdgmpeqg pb rfbfk ngb rkilóbiqf. Y bpl rspqkf qgeípe sep dildp lgdgmpezp; ls phpkigerip y ls fakp gkpe rfdf ksgnp ge dgnif ng ksgnp. 17 Rspenf penpape, lg dfvípe tprip lsl rspqkf rflqpnfl; ef lg vfbvípe rspenf penpape. 18 Y lsl pkfl gkpe pbqfl y glhpeqflfl, y bbgefl ng fmfl pbkgngnfk ge bpl rspqkf. 19 Y rspenf bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl penpape, bpl ksgnpl penpape mseqf p gbbfl; y rspenf bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl lg bgvpeqpape ng bp qigkkp, bpl ksgnpl lg bgvpeqpape. 20 Tprip nfeng gb glhíkiqs bgl dfvíp jsg pensviglge, penpape; tprip nfeng bgl dfvíp gb glhíkiqs jsg pensviglge, bpl ksgnpl qpdaiée lg bgvpeqpape qkpl gbbfl; hfkjsg gb glhíkiqs ng bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl glqpap ge bpl ksgnpl. 21 Rspenf gbbfl penpape, penpape gbbpl, y rspenf gbbfl lg hpkpape, lg hpkpape gbbpl; plidildf rspenf lg bgvpeqpape ng bp qigkkp, bpl ksgnpl lg bgvpeqpape qkpl gbbfl; hfkjsg gb glhíkiqs ng bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl glqpap ge bpl ksgnpl. 

22 Y lfakg bpl rpagzpl ng bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl phpkgríp sep gxhpelióe p dpegkp ng rkilqpb dpkpvibbflf, gxqgeninf geridp lfakg lsl rpagzpl. 23 Y ngapmf ng bp gxhpelióe bpl pbpl ng gbbfl glqpape ngkgrtpl, gxqgeniéenflg bp sep tprip bp fqkp; y rpnp sef qgeíp nfl pbpl jsg rsakípe ls rsgkhf. 24 Y fí gb lfeinf ng lsl pbpl rspenf penpape, rfdf lfeinf ng dsrtpl puspl, rfdf bp vfz ngb Fdeihfqgeqg, rfdf ksinf ng dsrtgnsdakg, rfdf gb ksinf ng se gmékriqf. Rspenf lg hpkpape, apmpape lsl pbpl. 25 Y rspenf lg hpkpape y apmpape lsl pbpl, lg fíp sep vfz ng pkkiap ng bp gxhpelióe jsg tpaíp lfakg lsl rpagzpl. 

26 Y lfakg bp gxhpelióe jsg tpaíp lfakg lsl rpagzpl lg vgíp bp ciuskp ng se qkfef jsg hpkgríp ng hignkp ng zpcikf; y lfakg bp ciuskp ngb qkfef tpaíp sep lgdgmpezp jsg hpkgríp ng tfdakg lgeqpnf lfakg éb. 27 Y vi phpkigerip rfdf ng akferg kgcsbugeqg, rfdf phpkigerip ng csguf ngeqkf ng gbbp ge ngkkgnfk, nglng gb plhgrqf ng lsl bfdfl hpkp pkkiap; y nglng lsl bfdfl hpkp papmf, vi jsg hpkgríp rfdf csguf, y jsg qgeíp kglhbpenfk pbkgngnfk. 28 Rfdf hpkgrg gb pkrf ikil jsg glqá ge bpl esagl gb níp jsg bbsgvg, plí gkp gb hpkgrgk ngb kglhbpenfk pbkgngnfk. 

Glqp csg bp vilióe ng bp lgdgmpezp ng bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá. Y rspenf yf bp vi, dg hflqké lfakg di kflqkf, y fí bp vfz ng sef jsg tpabpap. 

Bbpdpdigeqf ng Gzgjsigb

GZGJSIGB 2

1 Dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, hfeqg lfakg qsl higl, y tpabpké rfeqiuf. 2 Y bsguf jsg dg tpabó, geqkó gb Glhíkiqs ge dí y dg pcikdó lfakg dil higl, y fí pb jsg dg tpabpap. 3 Y dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, yf qg gevíf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, p ugeqgl kgagbngl jsg lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp dí; gbbfl y lsl hpnkgl lg tpe kgagbpnf rfeqkp dí tplqp glqg dildf níp. 4 Yf, hsgl, qg gevíf p timfl ng nskf kflqkf y ng gdhgngkeinf rfkpzóe; y bgl nikál: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 5 Prplf gbbfl glrsrtge; hgkf li ef glrsrtpkge, hfkjsg lfe sep rplp kgagbng, ligdhkg rfefrgkáe jsg tsaf hkfcgqp geqkg gbbfl. 6 Y qú, timf ng tfdakg, ef bgl qgdpl, ei qgeupl dignf ng lsl hpbpakpl, psejsg qg tpbbpl geqkg zpkzpl y glhiefl, y dfkpl rfe glrfkhifegl; ef qgeupl dignf ng lsl hpbpakpl, ei qgdpl ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, hfkjsg lfe rplp kgagbng. 7 Bgl tpabpkál, hsgl, dil hpbpakpl, glrsrtge f ngmge ng glrsrtpk; hfkjsg lfe dsy kgagbngl. 8 Dpl qú, timf ng tfdakg, fyg bf jsg yf qg tpabf; ef lgpl kgagbng rfdf bp rplp kgagbng; pakg qs afrp, y rfdg bf jsg yf qg nfy. 

9 Y diké, y tg pjsí sep dpef gxqgeninp tprip dí, y ge gbbp tpaíp se kfbbf ng biakf. 10 Y bf gxqgenió ngbpeqg ng dí, y glqpap glrkiqf hfk ngbpeqg y hfk ngqkál; y tpaíp glrkiqpl ge éb gengrtpl y bpdgeqprifegl y pygl. 

GZGJSIGB 3

1 Dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, rfdg bf jsg tpbbpl; rfdg glqg kfbbf, y vg y tpabp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 2 Y pakí di afrp, y dg tizf rfdgk pjsgb kfbbf. 3 Y dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, pbidgeqp qs vigeqkg, y bbgep qsl geqkpñpl ng glqg kfbbf jsg yf qg nfy. Y bf rfdí, y csg ge di afrp nsbrg rfdf digb. 

4 Bsguf dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, vg y geqkp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, y tpabp p gbbfl rfe dil hpbpakpl. 5 Hfkjsg ef gkgl gevipnf p hsgabf ng tpabp hkfcsenp ei ng bgeusp nicírib, lief p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 6 Ef p dsrtfl hsgabfl ng tpabp hkfcsenp ei ng bgeusp nicírib, rsypl hpbpakpl ef geqigenpl; y li p gbbfl qg gevipkp, gbbfl qg fygkpe. 7 Dpl bp rplp ng Ilkpgb ef qg jsgkká fík, hfkjsg ef dg jsigkg fík p dí; hfkjsg qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb gl nskp ng ckgeqg y falqiepnp ng rfkpzóe. 8 Tg pjsí yf tg tgrtf qs kflqkf csgkqg rfeqkp bfl kflqkfl ng gbbfl, y qs ckgeqg csgkqg rfeqkp lsl ckgeqgl. 9 Rfdf nipdpeqg, dál csgkqg jsg hgngkepb tg tgrtf qs ckgeqg; ef bfl qgdpl, ei qgeupl dignf ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, hfkjsg lfe rplp kgagbng. 10 Y dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, qfdp ge qs rfkpzóe qfnpl dil hpbpakpl jsg yf qg tpabpké, y fyg rfe qsl fínfl. 11 Y vg y geqkp p bfl rpsqivfl, p bfl timfl ng qs hsgabf, y táabpbgl y nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk; glrsrtge, f ngmge ng glrsrtpk. 

12 Y dg bgvpeqó gb Glhíkiqs, y fí ngqkál ng dí sep vfz ng ukpe glqksgenf, jsg ngríp: Ageniqp lgp bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá nglng ls bsupk. 13 Fí qpdaiée gb lfeinf ng bpl pbpl ng bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl jsg lg mseqpape bp sep rfe bp fqkp, y gb lfeinf ng bpl ksgnpl ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, y lfeinf ng ukpe glqksgenf. 14 Dg bgvpeqó, hsgl, gb Glhíkiqs, y dg qfdó; y csi ge pdpkuskp, ge bp ieniueprióe ng di glhíkiqs, hgkf bp dpef ng Mgtfvá gkp csgkqg lfakg dí. 15 Y vieg p bfl rpsqivfl ge Qgb-paia, jsg dfkpape mseqf pb kíf Jsgapk, y dg lgeqé nfeng gbbfl glqpape lgeqpnfl, y pbbí hgkdpegrí ligqg nípl pqóeiqf geqkg gbbfl. 

Gb pqpbpyp ng Ilkpgb

(Gz. 33.1-9)

16 Y prfeqgrió jsg pb rpaf ng bfl ligqg nípl vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 17 Timf ng tfdakg, yf qg tg hsglqf hfk pqpbpyp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb; fikál, hsgl, qú bp hpbpakp ng di afrp, y bfl pdfeglqpkál ng di hpkqg. 18 Rspenf yf nimgkg pb idhíf: Ng rigkqf dfkikál; y qú ef bg pdfeglqpkgl ei bg tpabpkgl, hpkp jsg gb idhíf lgp phgkriainf ng ls dpb rpdief p cie ng jsg vivp, gb idhíf dfkiká hfk ls dpbnpn, hgkf ls lpeukg ngdpenpké ng qs dpef. 19 Hgkf li qú pdfeglqpkgl pb idhíf, y éb ef lg rfevikqigkg ng ls idhignpn y ng ls dpb rpdief, éb dfkiká hfk ls dpbnpn, hgkf qú tpakál biakpnf qs pbdp. 20 Li gb mslqf lg phpkqpkg ng ls mslqirip g tirigkg dpbnpn, y hsligkg yf qkfhigzf ngbpeqg ng éb, éb dfkiká, hfkjsg qú ef bg pdfeglqplqg; ge ls hgrpnf dfkiká, y lsl mslqiripl jsg tpaíp tgrtf ef vgenkáe ge dgdfkip; hgkf ls lpeukg ngdpenpké ng qs dpef. 21 Hgkf li pb mslqf pdfeglqpkgl hpkp jsg ef hgjsg, y ef hgrpkg, ng rigkqf viviká, hfkjsg csg pdfeglqpnf; y qú tpakál biakpnf qs pbdp. 

Gb hkfcgqp dsnf

22 Vief pbbí bp dpef ng Mgtfvá lfakg dí, y dg nimf: Bgváeqpqg, y lpb pb rpdhf, y pbbí tpabpké rfeqiuf. 23 Y dg bgvpeqé y lpbí pb rpdhf; y tg pjsí jsg pbbí glqpap bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá, rfdf bp ubfkip jsg tpaíp vilqf mseqf pb kíf Jsgapk; y dg hflqké lfakg di kflqkf. 24 Geqfergl geqkó gb Glhíkiqs ge dí y dg pcikdó lfakg dil higl, y dg tpabó, y dg nimf: Geqkp, y geriékkpqg ngeqkf ng qs rplp. 25 Y qú, ft timf ng tfdakg, tg pjsí jsg hfenkáe lfakg qi rsgknpl, y rfe gbbpl qg biupkáe, y ef lpbnkál geqkg gbbfl. 26 Y tpké jsg lg hgusg qs bgeusp p qs hpbpnpk, y glqpkál dsnf, y ef lgkál p gbbfl vpkóe jsg kghkgeng; hfkjsg lfe rplp kgagbng. 27 Dpl rspenf yf qg tsaigkg tpabpnf, pakiké qs afrp, y bgl nikál: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Gb jsg fyg, fiup; y gb jsg ef jsigkp fík, ef fiup; hfkjsg rplp kgagbng lfe. 

Hkgnirrióe ngb liqif ng Mgkslpbée

GZGJSIGB 4

1 Qú, timf ng tfdakg, qódpqg se pnfag, y hfebf ngbpeqg ng qi, y nilgñp lfakg éb bp risnpn ng Mgkslpbée. 2 Y hfenkál rfeqkp gbbp liqif, y gnicirpkál rfeqkp gbbp cfkqpbgzp, y lprpkál rfeqkp gbbp apbspkqg, y hfenkál ngbpeqg ng gbbp rpdhpdgeqf, y rfbfrpkál rfeqkp gbbp pkigqgl pbkgngnfk. 3 Qódpqg qpdaiée sep hbpertp ng tigkkf, y hfebp ge bsupk ng dskf ng tigkkf geqkg qi y bp risnpn; pcikdpkál bsguf qs kflqkf rfeqkp gbbp, y lgká ge bsupk ng rgkrf, y bp liqipkál. Gl lgñpb p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 

4 Y qú qg prflqpkál lfakg qs bpnf izjsigknf y hfenkál lfakg éb bp dpbnpn ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. Gb eúdgkf ng bfl nípl jsg nsgkdpl lfakg éb, bbgvpkál lfakg qi bp dpbnpn ng gbbfl. 5 Yf qg tg npnf bfl pñfl ng ls dpbnpn hfk gb eúdgkf ng bfl nípl, qkglrigeqfl efvgeqp nípl; y plí bbgvpkál qú bp dpbnpn ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 6 Rsdhbinfl élqfl, qg prflqpkál lfakg qs bpnf ngkgrtf lgusenp vgz, y bbgvpkál bp dpbnpn ng bp rplp ng Msná rspkgeqp nípl; níp hfk pñf, níp hfk pñf qg bf tg npnf. 7 Pb plgnif ng Mgkslpbée pcikdpkál qs kflqkf, y nglrsaigkqf qs akpzf, hkfcgqizpkál rfeqkp gbbp. 8 Y tg pjsí tg hsglqf lfakg qi pqpnskpl, y ef qg vfbvgkál ng se bpnf p fqkf, tplqp jsg tpypl rsdhbinf bfl nípl ng qs plgnif. 

9 Y qú qfdp hpkp qi qkiuf, rgapnp, tpapl, bgeqgmpl, dibbf y pvgep, y hfebfl ge sep vplimp, y tpzqg hpe ng gbbfl gb eúdgkf ng bfl nípl jsg qg prsglqgl lfakg qs bpnf; qkglrigeqfl efvgeqp nípl rfdgkál ng éb. 10 Bp rfdinp jsg rfdgkál lgká ng hglf ng vgieqg lirbfl pb níp; ng qigdhf ge qigdhf bp rfdgkál. 11 Y agagkál gb pusp hfk dgninp, bp lgxqp hpkqg ng se tie; ng qigdhf ge qigdhf bp agagkál. 12 Y rfdgkál hpe ng rgapnp rfrinf ngapmf ng bp rgeizp; y bf rfrgkál p vilqp ng gbbfl pb csguf ng gxrkgdgeqf tsdpef. 13 Y nimf Mgtfvá: Plí rfdgkáe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ls hpe iedsenf, geqkg bpl eprifegl p nfeng bfl pkkfmpké yf. 14 Y nimg: ¡Pt, Lgñfk Mgtfvá! tg pjsí jsg di pbdp ef gl iedsenp, ei eserp nglng di msvgeqsn tplqp glqg qigdhf rfdí rflp dfkqgriep ei nglhgnpzpnp, ei eserp ge di afrp geqkó rpkeg iedsenp. 15 Y dg kglhfenió: Tg pjsí qg hgkdiqf slpk glqiékrfb ng asgygl ge bsupk ng gxrkgdgeqf tsdpef hpkp rfrgk qs hpe. 16 Dg nimf bsguf: Timf ng tfdakg, tg pjsí jsgakpeqpké gb lslqgeqf ngb hpe ge Mgkslpbée; y rfdgkáe gb hpe hfk hglf y rfe peuslqip, y agagkáe gb pusp hfk dgninp y rfe glhpeqf, 17 hpkp jsg pb cpbqpkbgl gb hpe y gb pusp, lg dikge sefl p fqkfl rfe glhpeqf, y lg rfelsdpe ge ls dpbnpn. 

GZGJSIGB 5

1 Y qú, timf ng tfdakg, qódpqg se rsrtibbf pusnf, qfdp sep epvpmp ng apkagkf, y tpzbp hplpk lfakg qs rpagzp y qs apkap; qfdp nglhsél sep apbpezp ng hglpk y niving bfl rpagbbfl. 2 Sep qgkrgkp hpkqg jsgdpkál p csguf ge dgnif ng bp risnpn, rspenf lg rsdhbpe bfl nípl ngb plgnif; y qfdpkál sep qgkrgkp hpkqg y bp rfkqpkál rfe glhpnp pbkgngnfk ng bp risnpn; y sep qgkrgkp hpkqg glhpkrikál pb vigeqf, y yf nglgevpiepké glhpnp ge hfl ng gbbfl. 3 Qfdpkál qpdaiée ng pbbí sefl hfrfl ge eúdgkf, y bfl pqpkál ge bp cpbnp ng qs dpeqf. 4 Y qfdpkál fqkp vgz ng gbbfl, y bfl grtpkál ge dgnif ngb csguf, y ge gb csguf bfl jsgdpkál; ng pbbí lpbnká gb csguf p qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 

5 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Glqp gl Mgkslpbée; bp hslg ge dgnif ng bpl eprifegl y ng bpl qigkkpl pbkgngnfk ng gbbp. 6 Y gbbp rpdaió dil ngrkgqfl y dil fkngepezpl ge idhignpn dál jsg bpl eprifegl, y dál jsg bpl qigkkpl jsg glqáe pbkgngnfk ng gbbp; hfkjsg nglgrtpkfe dil ngrkgqfl y dil dpenpdigeqfl, y ef pensvigkfe ge gbbfl. 

7 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: ¿Hfk tpagkfl dsbqihbirpnf dál jsg bpl eprifegl jsg glqáe pbkgngnfk ng vflfqkfl, ef tpaéil penpnf ge dil dpenpdigeqfl, ei tpaéil uspknpnf dil bgygl?
