Ei pse lguúe bpl bgygl ng bpl eprifegl jsg glqáe pbkgngnfk ng vflfqkfl tpaéil penpnf. 8 Plí, hsgl, tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp qi; lí, yf, y tpké msirifl ge dgnif ng qi peqg bfl fmfl ng bpl eprifegl. 9 Y tpké ge qi bf jsg eserp tirg, ei mpdál tpké rflp lgdgmpeqg, p rpslp ng qfnpl qsl pafdieprifegl. 10 Hfk glf bfl hpnkgl rfdgkáe p bfl timfl ge dgnif ng qi, y bfl timfl rfdgkáe p lsl hpnkgl; y tpké ge qi msirifl, y glhpkriké p qfnfl bfl vigeqfl qfnf bf jsg jsgnpkg ng qi. 11 Hfk qpeqf, vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, rigkqpdgeqg hfk tpagk hkfcpepnf di lpeqspkif rfe qfnpl qsl pafdieprifegl, qg jsgakpeqpké yf qpdaiée; di fmf ef hgknfepká, ei qpdhfrf qgenké yf dilgkirfknip. 12 Sep qgkrgkp hpkqg ng qi dfkiká ng hglqibgerip y lgká rfelsdinp ng tpdakg ge dgnif ng qi; y sep qgkrgkp hpkqg rpgká p glhpnp pbkgngnfk ng qi; y sep qgkrgkp hpkqg glhpkriké p qfnfl bfl vigeqfl, y qkpl gbbfl nglgevpiepké glhpnp. 

13 Y lg rsdhbiká di cskfk y lpripké ge gbbfl di gefmf, y qfdpké lpqilcprrióe; y lpakáe jsg yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf ge di rgbf, rspenf rsdhbp ge gbbfl di gefmf. 14 Y qg rfevgkqiké ge lfbgnpn y ge fhkfaif geqkg bpl eprifegl jsg glqáe pbkgngnfk ng qi, p bfl fmfl ng qfnf qkpelgúeqg. 15 Y lgkál fhkfaif y glrpkeif y glrpkdigeqf y glhpeqf p bpl eprifegl jsg glqáe pbkgngnfk ng qi, rspenf yf tpup ge qi msirifl rfe cskfk g ieniueprióe, y ge kghkgelifegl ng ikp. Yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf. 16 Rspenf pkkfmg yf lfakg gbbfl bpl hgkeiriflpl lpgqpl ngb tpdakg, jsg lgkáe hpkp nglqksrrióe, bpl rspbgl gevipké hpkp nglqksikfl, geqfergl psdgeqpké gb tpdakg lfakg vflfqkfl, y jsgakpeqpké geqkg vflfqkfl gb lslqgeqf ngb hpe. 17 Gevipké, hsgl, lfakg vflfqkfl tpdakg, y aglqipl cgkfrgl jsg qg nglqksype; y hglqibgerip y lpeukg hplpkáe hfk ge dgnif ng qi, y gevipké lfakg qi glhpnp. Yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb

GZGJSIGB 6

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hfe qs kflqkf tprip bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb, y hkfcgqizp rfeqkp gbbfl. 3 Y nikál: Dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb, fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk p bfl dfeqgl y p bfl rfbbpnfl, p bfl pkkfyfl y p bfl vpbbgl: Tg pjsí jsg yf, yf tpké vgeik lfakg vflfqkfl glhpnp, y nglqksiké vsglqkfl bsupkgl pbqfl. 4 Vsglqkfl pbqpkgl lgkáe plfbpnfl, y vsglqkpl idáugegl ngb lfb lgkáe jsgakpnpl; y tpké jsg rpiupe vsglqkfl dsgkqfl ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl ínfbfl. 5 Y hfenké bfl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ngbpeqg ng lsl ínfbfl, y vsglqkfl tsglfl glhpkriké ge ngkkgnfk ng vsglqkfl pbqpkgl. 6 Nfengjsigkp jsg tpaiqéil, lgkáe ngligkqpl bpl risnpngl, y bfl bsupkgl pbqfl lgkáe plfbpnfl, hpkp jsg lgpe plfbpnfl y lg tpupe ngligkqfl vsglqkfl pbqpkgl; y vsglqkfl ínfbfl lgkáe jsgakpnfl y prpapkáe, vsglqkpl idáugegl ngb lfb lgkáe nglqksinpl, y vsglqkpl fakpl lgkáe ngltgrtpl. 7 Y bfl dsgkqfl rpgkáe ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

8 Dpl ngmpké se kglqf, ng dfnf jsg qgeuáil geqkg bpl eprifegl pbusefl jsg glrphge ng bp glhpnp, rspenf lgáil glhpkrinfl hfk bpl qigkkpl. 9 Y bfl jsg ng vflfqkfl glrphpkge lg prfknpkáe ng dí geqkg bpl eprifegl ge bpl rspbgl lgkáe rpsqivfl; hfkjsg yf dg jsgakpeqé p rpslp ng ls rfkpzóe cfkeirpkif jsg lg phpkqó ng dí, y p rpslp ng lsl fmfl jsg cfkeirpkfe qkpl lsl ínfbfl; y lg pvgkufezpkáe ng lí dildfl, p rpslp ng bfl dpbgl jsg tirigkfe ge qfnpl lsl pafdieprifegl. 10 Y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá; ef ge vpef nimg jsg bgl tpaíp ng tprgk glqg dpb. 

11 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hpbdfqgp rfe qsl dpefl, y ufbhgp rfe qs hig, y ni: ¡Py, hfk qfnpl bpl ukpengl pafdieprifegl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb! hfkjsg rfe glhpnp y rfe tpdakg y rfe hglqibgerip rpgkáe. 12 Gb jsg glqé bgmfl dfkiká ng hglqibgerip, gb jsg glqé rgkrp rpgká p glhpnp, y gb jsg jsgng y lgp plgnipnf dfkiká ng tpdakg; plí rsdhbiké ge gbbfl di gefmf. 13 Y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf lsl dsgkqfl glqée ge dgnif ng lsl ínfbfl, ge ngkkgnfk ng lsl pbqpkgl, lfakg qfnf rfbbpnf pbqf, ge qfnpl bpl rsdakgl ng bfl dfeqgl, ngapmf ng qfnf ákafb ckfenflf y ngapmf ng qfnp geriep glhglp, bsupkgl nfeng fckgrigkfe ierigelf p qfnfl lsl ínfbfl. 14 Y gxqgengké di dpef rfeqkp gbbfl, y nfengjsigkp jsg tpaiqge tpké bp qigkkp dál plfbpnp y ngvplqpnp jsg gb ngligkqf tprip Niabpq; y rfefrgkáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

Gb cie vigeg

GZGJSIGB 7

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Qú, timf ng tfdakg, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk p bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb: Gb cie, gb cie vigeg lfakg bfl rspqkf gxqkgdfl ng bp qigkkp. 3 Ptfkp lgká gb cie lfakg qi, y gevipké lfakg qi di cskfk, y qg mszupké lguúe qsl rpdiefl; y hfenké lfakg qi qfnpl qsl pafdieprifegl. 4 Y di fmf ef qg hgknfepká, ei qgenké dilgkirfknip; peqgl hfenké lfakg qi qsl rpdiefl, y ge dgnif ng qi glqpkáe qsl pafdieprifegl; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

5 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Se dpb, tg pjsí jsg vigeg se dpb. 6 Vigeg gb cie, gb cie vigeg; lg tp nglhgkqpnf rfeqkp qi; tg pjsí jsg vigeg. 7 Bp dpñpep vigeg hpkp qi, ft dfkpnfk ng bp qigkkp; gb qigdhf vigeg, rgkrpef glqá gb níp; níp ng qsdsbqf, y ef ng pbgukíp, lfakg bfl dfeqgl. 8 Ptfkp hkfeqf ngkkpdpké di ikp lfakg qi, y rsdhbiké ge qi di cskfk, y qg mszupké lguúe qsl rpdiefl; y hfenké lfakg qi qsl pafdieprifegl. 9 Y di fmf ef hgknfepká, ei qgenké dilgkirfknip; lguúe qsl rpdiefl hfenké lfakg qi, y ge dgnif ng qi glqpkáe qsl pafdieprifegl; y lpakéil jsg yf Mgtfvá lfy gb jsg rplqiup. 

10 Tg pjsí gb níp, tg pjsí jsg vigeg; tp lpbinf bp dpñpep; tp cbfkgrinf bp vpkp, tp kgvgkngrinf bp lfagkaip. 11 Bp vifbgerip lg tp bgvpeqpnf ge vpkp ng dpbnpn; eieusef jsgnpká ng gbbfl, ei ng ls dsbqiqsn, ei sef ng bfl lsyfl, ei tpaká geqkg gbbfl jsige lg bpdgeqg. 12 Gb qigdhf tp vgeinf, lg prgkró gb níp; gb jsg rfdhkp, ef lg pbgukg, y gb jsg vgeng, ef bbfkg, hfkjsg bp ikp glqá lfakg qfnp bp dsbqiqsn. 13 Hfkjsg gb jsg vgeng ef vfbvgká p bf vgeninf, psejsg jsgnge vivfl; hfkjsg bp vilióe lfakg qfnp bp dsbqiqsn ef lg kgvfrpká, y p rpslp ng ls ieijsinpn eieusef hfnká pdhpkpk ls vinp. 

14 Qfrpkáe qkfdhgqp, y hkghpkpkáe qfnpl bpl rflpl, y ef tpaká jsige vpyp p bp apqpbbp; hfkjsg di ikp glqá lfakg qfnp bp dsbqiqsn. 15 Ng csgkp glhpnp, ng ngeqkf hglqibgerip y tpdakg; gb jsg glqé ge gb rpdhf dfkiká p glhpnp, y pb jsg glqé ge bp risnpn bf rfelsdiká gb tpdakg y bp hglqibgerip. 16 Y bfl jsg glrphge ng gbbfl tsikáe y glqpkáe lfakg bfl dfeqgl rfdf hpbfdpl ng bfl vpbbgl, uidigenf qfnfl, rpnp sef hfk ls ieijsinpn. 17 Qfnp dpef lg ngaibiqpká, y qfnp kfnibbp lgká néaib rfdf gb pusp. 18 Lg rgñikáe qpdaiée ng ribirif, y bgl rsakiká qgkkfk; ge qfnf kflqkf tpaká vgkuügezp, y qfnpl lsl rpagzpl glqpkáe kphpnpl. 19 Pkkfmpkáe ls hbpqp ge bpl rpbbgl, y ls fkf lgká nglgrtpnf; ei ls hbpqp ei ls fkf hfnká biakpkbfl ge gb níp ngb cskfk ng Mgtfvá; ef lpripkáe ls pbdp, ei bbgepkáe lsl geqkpñpl, hfkjsg tp linf qkfhigzf hpkp ls dpbnpn. 20 Hfk rspeqf rfevikqigkfe bp ubfkip ng ls fkepdgeqf ge lfagkaip, g tirigkfe ng gbbf bpl idáugegl ng lsl pafdiepabgl ínfbfl, hfk glf lg bf rfevgkqí ge rflp kghsuepeqg. 21 Ge dpef ng gxqkpñfl bp geqkgusé hpkp lgk lpjsgpnp, y lgká hkglp ng bfl idhífl ng bp qigkkp, y bp hkfcpepkáe. 22 Y phpkqpké ng gbbfl di kflqkf, y lgká vifbpnf di bsupk lgrkgqf; hsgl geqkpkáe ge éb ievplfkgl y bf hkfcpepkáe. 

23 Tpz sep rpngep, hfkjsg bp qigkkp glqá bbgep ng ngbiqfl ng lpeukg, y bp risnpn glqá bbgep ng vifbgerip. 24 Qkpgké, hfk qpeqf, bfl dál hgkvgklfl ng bpl eprifegl, bfl rspbgl hflggkáe bpl rplpl ng gbbfl; y tpké rglpk bp lfagkaip ng bfl hfngkflfl, y lsl lpeqspkifl lgkáe hkfcpepnfl. 25 Nglqksrrióe vigeg; y aslrpkáe bp hpz, y ef bp tpaká. 26 Jsgakpeqpdigeqf vgenká lfakg jsgakpeqpdigeqf, y tpaká ksdfk lfakg ksdfk; y aslrpkáe kglhsglqp ngb hkfcgqp, dpl bp bgy lg pbgmpká ngb lprgknfqg, y ng bfl peripefl gb rfelgmf. 27 Gb kgy lg gebsqpká, y gb hkíerihg lg vglqiká ng qkilqgzp, y bpl dpefl ngb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp qgdabpkáe; lguúe ls rpdief tpké rfe gbbfl, y rfe bfl msirifl ng gbbfl bfl mszupké; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

Vilióe ng bpl pafdieprifegl ge Mgkslpbée

GZGJSIGB 8

1 Ge gb lgxqf pñf, ge gb dgl lgxqf, p bfl rierf nípl ngb dgl, prfeqgrió jsg glqpap yf lgeqpnf ge di rplp, y bfl peripefl ng Msná glqpape lgeqpnfl ngbpeqg ng dí, y pbbí lg hfló lfakg dí bp dpef ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 2 Y diké, y tg pjsí sep ciuskp jsg hpkgríp ng tfdakg; nglng lsl bfdfl hpkp papmf, csguf; y nglng lsl bfdfl hpkp pkkiap hpkgríp kglhbpenfk, gb plhgrqf ng akferg kgcsbugeqg. 3 Y pjsgbbp ciuskp gxqgenió bp dpef, y dg qfdó hfk bpl usgngmpl ng di rpagzp; y gb Glhíkiqs dg pbzó geqkg gb rigbf y bp qigkkp, y dg bbgvó ge vilifegl ng Nifl p Mgkslpbée, p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp ng pngeqkf jsg dikp tprip gb efkqg, nfeng glqpap bp tpaiqprióe ng bp idpuge ngb rgbf, bp jsg hkfvfrp p rgbfl. 4 Y tg pjsí, pbbí glqpap bp ubfkip ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, rfdf bp vilióe jsg yf tpaíp vilqf ge gb rpdhf. 

5 Y dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, pbzp ptfkp qsl fmfl tprip gb bpnf ngb efkqg. Y pbré dil fmfl tprip gb efkqg, y tg pjsí pb efkqg, mseqf p bp hsgkqp ngb pbqpk, pjsgbbp idpuge ngb rgbf ge bp geqkpnp. 6 Dg nimf geqfergl: Timf ng tfdakg, ¿ef vgl bf jsg élqfl tprge, bpl ukpengl pafdieprifegl jsg bp rplp ng Ilkpgb tprg pjsí hpkp pbgmpkdg ng di lpeqspkif? Hgkf vsébvgqg púe, y vgkál pafdieprifegl dpyfkgl. 

7 Y dg bbgvó p bp geqkpnp ngb pqkif, y diké, y tg pjsí ge bp hpkgn se pusmgkf. 8 Y dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, rpvp ptfkp ge bp hpkgn. Y rpvé ge bp hpkgn, y tg pjsí sep hsgkqp. 9 Dg nimf bsguf: Geqkp, y vg bpl dpbvpnpl pafdieprifegl jsg élqfl tprge pbbí. 10 Geqké, hsgl, y diké; y tg pjsí qfnp cfkdp ng kghqibgl y aglqipl pafdiepabgl, y qfnfl bfl ínfbfl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, jsg glqpape hieqpnfl ge bp hpkgn hfk qfnf pbkgngnfk. 11 Y ngbpeqg ng gbbfl glqpape lgqgeqp vpkfegl ng bfl peripefl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, y Mppzpeípl timf ng Lpcáe ge dgnif ng gbbfl, rpnp sef rfe ls iergelpkif ge ls dpef; y lsaíp sep esag glhglp ng ierigelf. 12 Y dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, ¿tpl vilqf bpl rflpl jsg bfl peripefl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb tprge ge qieigabpl, rpnp sef ge lsl rádpkpl hieqpnpl ng idáugegl? Hfkjsg nirge gbbfl: Ef efl vg Mgtfvá; Mgtfvá tp papenfepnf bp qigkkp. 13 Dg nimf nglhsél: Vsébvgqg púe, vgkál pafdieprifegl dpyfkgl jsg tprge élqfl. 

14 Y dg bbgvó p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, jsg glqá pb efkqg; y tg pjsí dsmgkgl jsg glqpape pbbí lgeqpnpl gengrtpenf p Qpdsz. 15 Bsguf dg nimf: ¿Ef vgl, timf ng tfdakg? Vsébvgqg púe, vgkál pafdieprifegl dpyfkgl jsg glqpl. 

16 Y dg bbgvó pb pqkif ng pngeqkf ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; y tg pjsí mseqf p bp geqkpnp ngb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá, geqkg bp geqkpnp y gb pbqpk, rfdf vgieqirierf vpkfegl, lsl glhpbnpl vsgbqpl pb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá y lsl kflqkfl tprip gb fkigeqg, y pnfkpape pb lfb, hflqkáenflg tprip gb fkigeqg. 17 Y dg nimf: ¿Ef tpl vilqf, timf ng tfdakg? ¿Gl rflp bivipep hpkp bp rplp ng Msná tprgk bpl pafdieprifegl jsg tprge pjsí? Nglhsél jsg tpe bbgepnf ng dpbnpn bp qigkkp, lg vfbvigkfe p dí hpkp ikkiqpkdg; tg pjsí jsg phbirpe gb kpdf p lsl epkirgl. 18 Hsgl qpdaiée yf hkfrgngké rfe cskfk; ef hgknfepká di fmf, ei qgenké dilgkirfknip; y ukiqpkáe p dil fínfl rfe ukpe vfz, y ef bfl fiké. 

Vilióe ng bp dsgkqg ng bfl rsbhpabgl

GZGJSIGB 9

1 Rbpdó ge dil fínfl rfe ukpe vfz, nirigenf: Bfl vgknsufl ng bp risnpn tpe bbgupnf, y rpnp sef qkpg ge ls dpef ls ielqksdgeqf hpkp nglqksik. 2 Y tg pjsí jsg lgil vpkfegl vgeípe ngb rpdief ng bp hsgkqp ng pkkiap jsg dikp tprip gb efkqg, y rpnp sef qkpíp ge ls dpef ls ielqksdgeqf hpkp nglqksik. Y geqkg gbbfl tpaíp se vpkóe vglqinf ng bief, gb rspb qkpíp p ls rieqskp se qieqgkf ng glrkiapef; y geqkpnfl, lg hpkpkfe mseqf pb pbqpk ng akferg. 

3 Y bp ubfkip ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb lg gbgvó ng geridp ngb jsgksaíe, lfakg gb rspb tpaíp glqpnf, pb sdakpb ng bp rplp; y bbpdó Mgtfvá pb vpkóe vglqinf ng bief, jsg qgeíp p ls rieqskp gb qieqgkf ng glrkiapef, 4 y bg nimf Mgtfvá: Hplp hfk ge dgnif ng bp risnpn, hfk ge dgnif ng Mgkslpbée, y hfebgl sep lgñpb ge bp ckgeqg p bfl tfdakgl jsg uidge y jsg rbpdpe p rpslp ng qfnpl bpl pafdieprifegl jsg lg tprge ge dgnif ng gbbp. 5 Y p bfl fqkfl nimf, fyéenfbf yf: Hplpn hfk bp risnpn ge hfl ng éb, y dpqpn; ef hgknfeg vsglqkf fmf, ei qgeuáil dilgkirfknip. 6 Dpqpn p vigmfl, móvgegl y víkugegl, eiñfl y dsmgkgl, tplqp jsg ef jsgng eieusef; hgkf p qfnf pjsgb lfakg gb rspb tsaigkg lgñpb, ef fl prgkrpkéil; y rfdgezpkéil hfk di lpeqspkif. Rfdgezpkfe, hsgl, nglng bfl vpkfegl peripefl jsg glqpape ngbpeqg ngb qgdhbf. 7 Y bgl nimf: Rfeqpdiepn bp rplp, y bbgepn bfl pqkifl ng dsgkqfl; lpbin. Y lpbigkfe, y dpqpkfe ge bp risnpn. 8 Prfeqgrió jsg rspenf gbbfl iape dpqpenf y jsgné yf lfbf, dg hflqké lfakg di kflqkf, y rbpdé y nimg: ¡Pt, Lgñfk Mgtfvá! ¿nglqksikál p qfnf gb kgdpegeqg ng Ilkpgb ngkkpdpenf qs cskfk lfakg Mgkslpbée? 

9 Y dg nimf: Bp dpbnpn ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb y ng Msná gl ukpeng lfakgdpegkp, hsgl bp qigkkp glqá bbgep ng lpeukg, y bp risnpn glqá bbgep ng hgkvgklinpn; hfkjsg tpe nirtf: Tp papenfepnf Mgtfvá bp qigkkp, y Mgtfvá ef vg. 10 Plí, hsgl, tpké yf; di fmf ef hgknfepká, ei qgenké dilgkirfknip; tpké kgrpgk gb rpdief ng gbbfl lfakg lsl hkfhipl rpagzpl. 

11 Y tg pjsí jsg gb vpkóe vglqinf ng bief, jsg qgeíp gb qieqgkf p ls rieqskp, kglhfenió sep hpbpakp, nirigenf: Tg tgrtf rfecfkdg p qfnf bf jsg dg dpenplqg. 

Bp ubfkip ng Nifl papenfep gb qgdhbf

GZGJSIGB 10

1 Diké, y tg pjsí ge bp gxhpelióe jsg tpaíp lfakg bp rpagzp ng bfl jsgksaiegl rfdf sep hignkp ng zpcikf, jsg hpkgríp rfdf lgdgmpezp ng se qkfef jsg lg dflqkó lfakg gbbfl. 2 Y tpabó pb vpkóe vglqinf ng bief, y bg nimf: Geqkp ge dgnif ng bpl ksgnpl ngapmf ng bfl jsgksaiegl, y bbgep qsl dpefl ng rpkafegl gergeninfl ng geqkg bfl jsgksaiegl, y glhákrgbfl lfakg bp risnpn. Y geqkó p vilqp díp. 

3 Y bfl jsgksaiegl glqpape p bp dpef ngkgrtp ng bp rplp rspenf glqg vpkóe geqkó; y bp esag bbgepap gb pqkif ng pngeqkf. 4 Geqfergl bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá lg gbgvó ng geridp ngb jsgksaíe pb sdakpb ng bp hsgkqp; y bp rplp csg bbgep ng bp esag, y gb pqkif lg bbgeó ngb kglhbpenfk ng bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá. 5 Y gb glqksgenf ng bpl pbpl ng bfl jsgksaiegl lg fíp tplqp gb pqkif ng pcsgkp, rfdf bp vfz ngb Nifl Fdeihfqgeqg rspenf tpabp. 

6 Prfeqgrió, hsgl, jsg pb dpenpk pb vpkóe vglqinf ng bief, nirigenf: Qfdp csguf ng geqkg bpl ksgnpl, ng geqkg bfl jsgksaiegl, éb geqkó y lg hpkó geqkg bpl ksgnpl. 7 Y se jsgksaíe gxqgenió ls dpef ng ge dgnif ng bfl jsgksaiegl pb csguf jsg glqpap geqkg gbbfl, y qfdó ng éb y bf hslf ge bpl dpefl ngb jsg glqpap vglqinf ng bief, gb rspb bf qfdó y lpbió. 8 Y phpkgrió ge bfl jsgksaiegl bp ciuskp ng sep dpef ng tfdakg ngapmf ng lsl pbpl. 

9 Y diké, y tg pjsí rspqkf ksgnpl mseqf p bfl jsgksaiegl, mseqf p rpnp jsgksaíe sep ksgnp; y gb plhgrqf ng bpl ksgnpl gkp rfdf ng rkilóbiqf. 10 Ge rspeqf p ls phpkigerip, bpl rspqkf gkpe ng sep dildp cfkdp, rfdf li glqsvigkp sep ge dgnif ng fqkp. 11 Rspenf penpape, tprip bfl rspqkf ckgeqgl penpape; ef lg vfbvípe rspenf penpape, lief jsg pb bsupk pnfeng lg vfbvíp bp hkidgkp, ge hfl ng gbbp iape; ei lg vfbvípe rspenf penpape. 12 Y qfnf ls rsgkhf, lsl glhpbnpl, lsl dpefl, lsl pbpl y bpl ksgnpl glqpape bbgefl ng fmfl pbkgngnfk ge lsl rspqkf ksgnpl. 13 P bpl ksgnpl, fyéenfbf yf, lg bgl ukiqpap: ¡Ksgnp! 14 Y rpnp sef qgeíp rspqkf rpkpl. Bp hkidgkp gkp kflqkf ng jsgksaíe; bp lgusenp, ng tfdakg; bp qgkrgkp, rpkp ng bgóe; bp rspkqp, rpkp ng áusibp. 

15 Y lg bgvpeqpkfe bfl jsgksaiegl; glqg gl gb lgk vivigeqg jsg vi ge gb kíf Jsgapk. 16 Y rspenf penpape bfl jsgksaiegl, penpape bpl ksgnpl mseqf rfe gbbfl; y rspenf bfl jsgksaiegl pbzpape lsl pbpl hpkp bgvpeqpklg ng bp qigkkp, bpl ksgnpl qpdhfrf lg phpkqpape ng gbbfl. 17 Rspenf lg hpkpape gbbfl, lg hpkpape gbbpl, y rspenf gbbfl lg pbzpape, lg pbzpape rfe gbbfl; hfkjsg gb glhíkiqs ng bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl glqpap ge gbbpl. 

18 Geqfergl bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá lg gbgvó ng geridp ngb sdakpb ng bp rplp, y lg hslf lfakg bfl jsgksaiegl. 19 Y pbzpenf bfl jsgksaiegl lsl pbpl, lg bgvpeqpkfe ng bp qigkkp ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl; rspenf gbbfl lpbigkfe, qpdaiée bpl ksgnpl lg pbzpkfe pb bpnf ng gbbfl; y lg hpkpkfe p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp fkigeqpb ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y bp ubfkip ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb glqpap hfk geridp lfakg gbbfl. 

20 Glqfl gkpe bfl dildfl lgkgl vivigeqgl jsg vi ngapmf ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb mseqf pb kíf Jsgapk; y rfefrí jsg gkpe jsgksaiegl. 21 Rpnp sef qgeíp rspqkf rpkpl y rpnp sef rspqkf pbpl, y ciuskpl ng dpefl ng tfdakg ngapmf ng lsl pbpl. 22 Y bp lgdgmpezp ng lsl kflqkfl gkp bp ng bfl kflqkfl jsg vi mseqf pb kíf Jsgapk, ls dildp phpkigerip y ls lgk; rpnp sef rpdiepap ngkgrtf tprip pngbpeqg. 

Kghkgelióe ng bfl hkíerihgl dpbvpnfl

GZGJSIGB 11

1 Gb Glhíkiqs dg gbgvó, y dg bbgvó hfk bp hsgkqp fkigeqpb ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, bp rspb dikp tprip gb fkigeqg; y tg pjsí p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp vgieqirierf tfdakgl, geqkg bfl rspbgl vi p Mppzpeípl timf ng Pzsk y p Hgbpqípl timf ng Agepíp, hkierihpbgl ngb hsgabf. 2 Y dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, glqfl lfe bfl tfdakgl jsg dpjsiepe hgkvgklinpn, y npe ge glqp risnpn dpb rfelgmf; 3 bfl rspbgl nirge: Ef lgká qpe hkfeqf; gnicijsgdfl rplpl; glqp lgká bp fbbp, y eflfqkfl bp rpkeg. 4 Hfk qpeqf hkfcgqizp rfeqkp gbbfl; hkfcgqizp, timf ng tfdakg. 

5 Y vief lfakg dí gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá, y dg nimf: Ni: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Plí tpaéil tpabpnf, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb, y bpl rflpl jsg lsage p vsglqkf glhíkiqs, yf bpl tg geqgeninf. 6 Tpaéil dsbqihbirpnf vsglqkfl dsgkqfl ge glqp risnpn, y tpaéil bbgepnf ng dsgkqfl lsl rpbbgl. 7 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Vsglqkfl dsgkqfl jsg tpaéil hsglqf ge dgnif ng gbbp, gbbfl lfe bp rpkeg, y gbbp gl bp fbbp; dpl yf fl lprpké p vflfqkfl ng ge dgnif ng gbbp. 8 Glhpnp tpaéil qgdinf, y glhpnp qkpgké lfakg vflfqkfl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 9 Y fl lprpké ng ge dgnif ng gbbp, y fl geqkgupké ge dpefl ng gxqkpñfl, y tpké msirifl geqkg vflfqkfl. 10 P glhpnp rpgkéil; ge bfl bídiqgl ng Ilkpgb fl mszupké, y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 11 Bp risnpn ef fl lgká hfk fbbp, ei vflfqkfl lgkéil ge dgnif ng gbbp bp rpkeg; ge bfl bídiqgl ng Ilkpgb fl mszupké. 12 Y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá; hfkjsg ef tpaéil penpnf ge dil glqpqsqfl, ei tpaéil fagngrinf dil ngrkgqfl, lief lguúe bpl rflqsdakgl ng bpl eprifegl jsg fl kfngpe tpaéil tgrtf. 

13 Y prfeqgrió jsg digeqkpl yf hkfcgqizpap, pjsgb Hgbpqípl timf ng Agepíp dskió. Geqfergl dg hflqké kflqkf p qigkkp y rbpdé rfe ukpe vfz, y nimg: ¡Pt, Lgñfk Mgtfvá! ¿Nglqksikál ngb qfnf pb kgdpegeqg ng Ilkpgb? 

Hkfdglp ng kglqpskprióe y kgefvprióe

14 Y vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 15 Timf ng tfdakg, qsl tgkdpefl, qsl tgkdpefl, bfl tfdakgl ng qs hpkgeqglrf y qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, qfnp gbbp lfe pjsgbbfl p jsigegl nimgkfe bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée: Pbgmpfl ng Mgtfvá; p eflfqkfl gl npnp bp qigkkp ge hflglióe. 16 Hfk qpeqf, ni: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Psejsg bgl tg pkkfmpnf bgmfl geqkg bpl eprifegl, y bgl tg glhpkrinf hfk bpl qigkkpl, rfe qfnf glf bgl lgké hfk se hgjsgñf lpeqspkif ge bpl qigkkpl pnfeng bbgusge. 17 Ni, hfk qpeqf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Yf fl kgrfugké ng bfl hsgabfl, y fl rfeukgupké ng bpl qigkkpl ge bpl rspbgl glqáil glhpkrinfl, y fl npké bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb. 18 Y vfbvgkáe pbbá, y jsiqpkáe ng gbbp qfnpl lsl infbpqkípl y qfnpl lsl pafdieprifegl. 19 Y bgl npké se rfkpzóe, y se glhíkiqs esgvf hfenké ngeqkf ng gbbfl; y jsiqpké gb rfkpzóe ng hignkp ng ge dgnif ng ls rpkeg, y bgl npké se rfkpzóe ng rpkeg, 20 hpkp jsg penge ge dil fkngepezpl, y uspknge dil ngrkgqfl y bfl rsdhbpe, y dg lgpe hfk hsgabf, y yf lgp p gbbfl hfk Nifl. 21 Dpl p pjsgbbfl rsyf rfkpzóe penp qkpl gb nglgf ng lsl infbpqkípl y ng lsl pafdieprifegl, yf qkpiuf ls rpdief lfakg lsl hkfhipl rpagzpl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

22 Nglhsél pbzpkfe bfl jsgksaiegl lsl pbpl, y bpl ksgnpl ge hfl ng gbbfl; y bp ubfkip ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb glqpap lfakg gbbfl. 23 Y bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá lg gbgvó ng ge dgnif ng bp risnpn, y lg hslf lfakg gb dfeqg jsg glqá pb fkigeqg ng bp risnpn. 24 Bsguf dg bgvpeqó gb Glhíkiqs y dg vfbvió p bbgvpk ge vilióe ngb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl p bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl, p bfl rpsqivfl. Y lg csg ng dí bp vilióe jsg tpaíp vilqf. 25 Y tpabé p bfl rpsqivfl qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg Mgtfvá dg tpaíp dflqkpnf. 

Lpbinp ng Gzgjsigb ge lgñpb ng bp rpsqivinpn

GZGJSIGB 12

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, qú tpaiqpl ge dgnif ng rplp kgagbng, bfl rspbgl qigege fmfl hpkp vgk y ef vge, qigege fínfl hpkp fík y ef fyge, hfkjsg lfe rplp kgagbng. 3 Hfk qpeqf qú, timf ng tfdakg, hkghákpqg gelgkgl ng dpkrtp, y hpkqg ng níp ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl; y qg hplpkál ng qs bsupk p fqkf bsupk p vilqp ng gbbfl, hfk li qpb vgz pqigenge, hfkjsg lfe rplp kgagbng. 4 Y lprpkál qsl gelgkgl ng níp ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl, rfdf gelgkgl ng rpsqivgkif; dpl qú lpbnkál hfk bp qpkng p vilqp ng gbbfl, rfdf jsige lpbg ge rpsqivgkif. 5 Ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl qg pakikál hplf hfk geqkg bp hpkgn, y lpbnkál hfk gbbp. 6 Ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl bfl bbgvpkál lfakg qsl tfdakfl, ng efrtg bfl lprpkál; rsakikál qs kflqkf, y ef dikpkál bp qigkkp; hfkjsg hfk lgñpb qg tg npnf p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 

7 Y yf tirg plí rfdf dg csg dpenpnf; lpjsé dil gelgkgl ng níp, rfdf gelgkgl ng rpsqivgkif, y p bp qpkng dg pakí hplf hfk geqkg bp hpkgn rfe di hkfhip dpef; lpbí ng efrtg, y bfl bbgvé lfakg bfl tfdakfl p vilqp ng gbbfl. 

8 Y vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk bp dpñpep, nirigenf: 9 Timf ng tfdakg, ¿ef qg tp nirtf bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, pjsgbbp rplp kgagbng: ¿Jsé tprgl? 10 Nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Glqp hkfcgríp lg kgcigkg pb hkíerihg ge Mgkslpbée, y p qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb jsg glqá ge dgnif ng gbbp. 11 Nibgl: Yf lfy vsglqkp lgñpb; rfdf yf tirg, plí lg tpká rfe vflfqkfl; hpkqikéil pb nglqigkkf, ge rpsqivinpn. 12 Y pb hkíerihg jsg glqá ge dgnif ng gbbfl bbgvpkáe p rsglqpl ng efrtg, y lpbnkáe; hfk bp hpkgn pakikáe hplf hpkp lprpkbf hfk gbbp; rsakiká ls kflqkf hpkp ef vgk rfe lsl fmfl bp qigkkp. 13 Dpl yf gxqgengké di kgn lfakg éb, y rpgká hkglf ge di qkpdhp, y tpké bbgvpkbf p Apaibfeip, p qigkkp ng rpbngfl, hgkf ef bp vgká, y pbbá dfkiká. 14 Y p qfnfl bfl jsg glqsvigkge pbkgngnfk ng éb hpkp pysnpkbg, y p qfnpl lsl qkfhpl, glhpkriké p qfnfl bfl vigeqfl, y nglgevpiepké glhpnp ge hfl ng gbbfl. 15 Y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf bfl glhpkrigkg geqkg bpl eprifegl, y bfl nilhgklpkg hfk bp qigkkp. 16 Y tpké jsg sefl hfrfl ng gbbfl glrphge ng bp glhpnp, ngb tpdakg y ng bp hglqg, hpkp jsg rsgeqge qfnpl lsl pafdieprifegl geqkg bpl eprifegl pnfeng bbgupkge; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

17 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 18 Timf ng tfdakg, rfdg qs hpe rfe qgdabfk, y agag qs pusp rfe glqkgdgridigeqf y rfe pelignpn. 19 Y ni pb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk lfakg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée y lfakg bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb: Ls hpe rfdgkáe rfe qgdfk, y rfe glhpeqf agagkáe ls pusp; hfkjsg ls qigkkp lgká nglhfmpnp ng ls hbgeiqsn, hfk bp dpbnpn ng qfnfl bfl jsg ge gbbp dfkpe. 20 Y bpl risnpngl tpaiqpnpl jsgnpkáe ngligkqpl, y bp qigkkp lgká plfbpnp; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

21 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 22 Timf ng tfdakg, ¿jsé kgckáe gl glqg jsg qgeéil vflfqkfl ge bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, jsg nirg: Lg vpe hkfbfeupenf bfl nípl, y nglphpkgrgká qfnp vilióe? 23 Nibgl, hfk qpeqf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tpké rglpk glqg kgckáe, y ef kghgqikáe dál glqg kgckáe ge Ilkpgb. Nibgl, hsgl: Lg tpe prgkrpnf pjsgbbfl nípl, y gb rsdhbidigeqf ng qfnp vilióe. 24 Hfkjsg ef tpaká dál vilióe vpep, ei tpaká pnivieprióe ng bilfemgkfl ge dgnif ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 25 Hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá tpabpké, y lg rsdhbiká bp hpbpakp jsg yf tpabg; ef lg qpknpká dál, lief jsg ge vsglqkfl nípl, ft rplp kgagbng, tpabpké hpbpakp y bp rsdhbiké, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

26 Y vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 27 Timf ng tfdakg, tg pjsí jsg bfl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb nirge: Bp vilióe jsg élqg vg gl hpkp ng pjsí p dsrtfl nípl, hpkp bgmpefl qigdhfl hkfcgqizp élqg. 28 Nibgl, hfk qpeqf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Ef lg qpknpká dál eieusep ng dil hpbpakpl, lief jsg bp hpbpakp jsg yf tpabg lg rsdhbiká, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Rfengeprióe ng bfl cpblfl hkfcgqpl

GZGJSIGB 13

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hkfcgqizp rfeqkp bfl hkfcgqpl ng Ilkpgb jsg hkfcgqizpe, y ni p bfl jsg hkfcgqizpe ng ls hkfhif rfkpzóe: Fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 3 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¡Py ng bfl hkfcgqpl ielgelpqfl, jsg penpe ge hfl ng ls hkfhif glhíkiqs, y epnp tpe vilqf! 4 Rfdf zfkkpl ge bfl ngligkqfl csgkfe qsl hkfcgqpl, ft Ilkpgb. 5 Ef tpaéil lsainf p bpl akgrtpl, ei tpaéil gnicirpnf se dskf pbkgngnfk ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, hpkp jsg kglilqp cikdg ge bp apqpbbp ge gb níp ng Mgtfvá. 6 Vigkfe vpeinpn y pnivieprióe dgeqikflp. Nirge: Tp nirtf Mgtfvá, y Mgtfvá ef bfl gevió; rfe qfnf, glhgkpe jsg éb rfecikdg bp hpbpakp ng gbbfl. 7 ¿Ef tpaéil vilqf vilióe vpep, y ef tpaéil nirtf pnivieprióe dgeqikflp, hsgl jsg ngríl: Nimf Mgtfvá, ef tpaigenf yf tpabpnf? 

8 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf vflfqkfl tpaéil tpabpnf vpeinpn, y tpaéil vilqf dgeqikp, hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp vflfqkfl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 9 Glqpká di dpef rfeqkp bfl hkfcgqpl jsg vge vpeinpn y pniviepe dgeqikp; ef glqpkáe ge bp rfeukguprióe ng di hsgabf, ei lgkáe ielrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, ei p bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb vfbvgkáe; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 10 Lí, hfk rspeqf geupñpkfe p di hsgabf, nirigenf: Hpz, ef tpaigenf hpz; y sef gnicirpap bp hpkgn, y tg pjsí jsg bfl fqkfl bp kgrsakípe rfe bfnf lsgbqf, 11 ni p bfl kgrsakinfkgl rfe bfnf lsgbqf, jsg rpgká; vgenká bbsvip qfkkgeripb, y gevipké hignkpl ng ukpeizf jsg bp tpupe rpgk, y vigeqf qgdhglqsflf bp kfdhgká. 12 Y tg pjsí rspenf bp hpkgn tpyp rpínf, ¿ef fl nikáe: ¿Nóeng glqá bp gdapkkpnskp rfe jsg bp kgrsakilqgil? 13 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tpké jsg bp kfdhp vigeqf qgdhglqsflf rfe di ikp, y bbsvip qfkkgeripb vgenká rfe di cskfk, y hignkpl ng ukpeizf rfe gefmf hpkp rfelsdik. 14 Plí nglapkpqpké bp hpkgn jsg vflfqkfl kgrsakilqgil rfe bfnf lsgbqf, y bp grtpké p qigkkp, y lgká nglrsaigkqf ls ridigeqf, y rpgká, y lgkéil rfelsdinfl ge dgnif ng gbbp; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 15 Rsdhbiké plí di cskfk ge bp hpkgn y ge bfl jsg bp kgrsakigkfe rfe bfnf lsgbqf; y fl niké: Ef gxilqg bp hpkgn, ei bfl jsg bp kgrsakigkfe, 16 bfl hkfcgqpl ng Ilkpgb jsg hkfcgqizpe prgkrp ng Mgkslpbée, y vge hpkp gbbp vilióe ng hpz, ef tpaigenf hpz, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

17 Y qú, timf ng tfdakg, hfe qs kflqkf rfeqkp bpl timpl ng qs hsgabf jsg hkfcgqizpe ng ls hkfhif rfkpzóe, y hkfcgqizp rfeqkp gbbpl, 18 y ni: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¡Py ng pjsgbbpl jsg rflge vgenpl dáuirpl hpkp qfnpl bpl dpefl, y tprge vgbfl dáuirfl hpkp bp rpagzp ng qfnp gnpn, hpkp rpzpk bpl pbdpl! ¿Tpaéil ng rpzpk bpl pbdpl ng di hsgabf, hpkp dpeqgegk plí vsglqkp hkfhip vinp? 19 ¿Y tpaéil ng hkfcpepkdg geqkg di hsgabf hfk hsñpnfl ng rgapnp y hfk hgnpzfl ng hpe, dpqpenf p bpl hgklfepl jsg ef ngage dfkik, y npenf vinp p bpl hgklfepl jsg ef ngage vivik, dieqigenf p di hsgabf jsg glrsrtp bp dgeqikp? 

20 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp vsglqkpl vgenpl dáuirpl, rfe jsg rpzáil bpl pbdpl pb vsgbf; yf bpl biakpké ng vsglqkpl dpefl, y lfbqpké hpkp jsg vsgbge rfdf pvgl bpl pbdpl jsg vflfqkpl rpzáil vfbpenf. 21 Kfdhgké plidildf vsglqkfl vgbfl dáuirfl, y biakpké p di hsgabf ng vsglqkp dpef, y ef glqpkáe dál rfdf hkglp ge vsglqkp dpef; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 22 Hfk rspeqf geqkilqgrilqgil rfe dgeqikpl gb rfkpzóe ngb mslqf, pb rspb yf ef geqkilqgrí, y cfkqpbgrilqgil bpl dpefl ngb idhíf, hpkp jsg ef lg phpkqplg ng ls dpb rpdief, iecseniéenfbg áeidf, 23 hfk qpeqf, ef vgkéil dál vilióe vpep, ei hkprqirpkéil dál pnivieprióe; y biakpké di hsgabf ng vsglqkp dpef, y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

Msirif rfeqkp bfl inóbpqkpl jsg rfelsbqpe pb hkfcgqp

GZGJSIGB 14

1 Vieigkfe p dí pbusefl ng bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb, y lg lgeqpkfe ngbpeqg ng dí. 2 Y vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 3 Timf ng tfdakg, glqfl tfdakgl tpe hsglqf lsl ínfbfl ge ls rfkpzóe, y tpe glqpabgrinf gb qkfhigzf ng ls dpbnpn ngbpeqg ng ls kflqkf. ¿Prplf tg ng lgk yf ge dfnf pbusef rfelsbqpnf hfk gbbfl? 4 Táabpbgl, hfk qpeqf, y nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Rspbjsigk tfdakg ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb jsg tsaigkg hsglqf lsl ínfbfl ge ls rfkpzóe, y glqpabgrinf gb qkfhigzf ng ls dpbnpn ngbpeqg ng ls kflqkf, y vieigkg pb hkfcgqp, yf Mgtfvá kglhfengké pb jsg vieigkg rfecfkdg p bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl ínfbfl, 5 hpkp qfdpk p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb hfk gb rfkpzóe, yp jsg lg tpe phpkqpnf ng dí qfnfl gbbfl hfk lsl ínfbfl. 

6 Hfk qpeqf, ni p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb: Plí nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Rfevgkqífl, y vfbvgfl ng vsglqkfl ínfbfl, y phpkqpn vsglqkf kflqkf ng qfnpl vsglqkpl pafdieprifegl. 7 Hfkjsg rspbjsigk tfdakg ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, y ng bfl gxqkpemgkfl jsg dfkpe ge Ilkpgb, jsg lg tsaigkg phpkqpnf ng penpk ge hfl ng dí, y tsaigkg hsglqf lsl ínfbfl ge ls rfkpzóe, y glqpabgrinf ngbpeqg ng ls kflqkf gb qkfhigzf ng ls dpbnpn, y vieigkg pb hkfcgqp hpkp hkguseqpkbg hfk dí, yf Mgtfvá bg kglhfengké hfk dí dildf; 8 y hfenké di kflqkf rfeqkp pjsgb tfdakg, y bg hfenké hfk lgñpb y hfk glrpkdigeqf, y bf rfkqpké ng ge dgnif ng di hsgabf; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 9 Y rspenf gb hkfcgqp csgkg geupñpnf y tpabpkg hpbpakp, yf Mgtfvá geupñé pb qpb hkfcgqp; y gxqgengké di dpef rfeqkp éb, y bf nglqksiké ng ge dgnif ng di hsgabf Ilkpgb. 10 Y bbgvpkáe pdafl gb rplqiuf ng ls dpbnpn; rfdf bp dpbnpn ngb jsg rfelsbqpkg, plí lgká bp dpbnpn ngb hkfcgqp, 11 hpkp jsg bp rplp ng Ilkpgb ef lg nglvíg dál ng ge hfl ng dí, ei lg rfeqpdieg dál ge qfnpl lsl kgagbifegl; y dg lgpe hfk hsgabf, y yf bgl lgp hfk Nifl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Mslqirip ngb rplqiuf ng Mgkslpbée

12 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 13 Timf ng tfdakg, rspenf bp qigkkp hgrpkg rfeqkp dí kgagbáenflg hékcinpdgeqg, y gxqgenigkg yf di dpef lfakg gbbp, y bg jsgakpeqpkg gb lslqgeqf ngb hpe, y gevipkg ge gbbp tpdakg, y rfkqpkg ng gbbp tfdakgl y aglqipl, 14 li glqsviglge ge dgnif ng gbbp glqfl qkgl vpkfegl, Efé, Npeigb y Mfa, gbbfl hfk ls mslqirip biakpkípe úeirpdgeqg lsl hkfhipl vinpl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 15 Y li tirigkg hplpk aglqipl cgkfrgl hfk bp qigkkp y bp plfbpkge, y jsgnpkg nglfbpnp ng dfnf jsg ef tpyp jsige hplg p rpslp ng bpl cigkpl, 16 y glqfl qkgl vpkfegl glqsviglge ge dgnif ng gbbp, vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, ei p lsl timfl ei p lsl timpl biakpkípe; gbbfl lfbfl lgkípe biakpnfl, y bp qigkkp jsgnpkíp nglfbpnp. 17 F li yf qkpmgkg glhpnp lfakg bp qigkkp, y nimgkg: Glhpnp, hplp hfk bp qigkkp; g tirigkg rfkqpk ng gbbp tfdakgl y aglqipl, 18 y glqfl qkgl vpkfegl glqsviglge ge dgnif ng gbbp, vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, ef biakpkípe p lsl timfl ei p lsl timpl; gbbfl lfbfl lgkípe biakpnfl. 19 F li gevipkg hglqibgerip lfakg glp qigkkp y ngkkpdpkg di ikp lfakg gbbp ge lpeukg, hpkp rfkqpk ng gbbp tfdakgl y aglqipl, 20 y glqsviglge ge dgnif ng gbbp Efé, Npeigb y Mfa, vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, ef biakpkípe p timf ei p timp; gbbfl hfk ls mslqirip biakpkípe lfbpdgeqg lsl hkfhipl vinpl. 

21 Hfk bf rspb plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¿Rsáeqf dál rspenf yf gevipkg rfeqkp Mgkslpbée dil rspqkf msirifl qgkkiabgl, glhpnp, tpdakg, cigkpl y hglqibgerip, hpkp rfkqpk ng gbbp tfdakgl y aglqipl? 22 Lie gdapkuf, tg pjsí jsgnpká ge gbbp se kgdpegeqg, timfl g timpl, jsg lgkáe bbgvpnfl csgkp; tg pjsí jsg gbbfl vgenkáe p vflfqkfl, y vgkéil ls rpdief y lsl tgrtfl, y lgkéil rfelfbpnfl ngb dpb jsg tirg vgeik lfakg Mgkslpbée, ng qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg qkpmg lfakg gbbp. 23 Y fl rfelfbpkáe rspenf vigkgil ls rpdief y lsl tgrtfl, y rfefrgkéil jsg ef lie rpslp tirg qfnf bf jsg tg tgrtf ge gbbp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Mgkslpbée gl rfdf sep vin ieúqib

GZGJSIGB 15

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, ¿jsé gl bp dpngkp ng bp vin dál jsg rspbjsigk fqkp dpngkp? ¿Jsé gl gb lpkdigeqf geqkg bfl ákafbgl ngb afljsg? 3 ¿Qfdpkáe ng gbbp dpngkp hpkp tprgk pbusep fakp? ¿Qfdpkáe ng gbbp sep glqprp hpkp rfbupk ge gbbp pbusep rflp? 4 Tg pjsí, gl hsglqp ge gb csguf hpkp lgk rfelsdinp; lsl nfl gxqkgdfl rfelsdió gb csguf, y bp hpkqg ng ge dgnif lg jsgdó; ¿lgkviká hpkp fakp pbusep? 5 Tg pjsí jsg rspenf glqpap geqgkp ef lgkvíp hpkp fakp pbusep; ¿rsáeqf dgefl nglhsél jsg gb csguf bp tsaigkg rfelsdinf, y csgkg jsgdpnp? ¿Lgkviká dál hpkp fakp pbusep? 6 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Rfdf bp dpngkp ng bp vin geqkg bfl ákafbgl ngb afljsg, bp rspb ni pb csguf hpkp jsg bp rfelsdiglg, plí tpké p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée. 7 Y hfenké di kflqkf rfeqkp gbbfl; psejsg ngb csguf lg glrphpkfe, csguf bfl rfelsdiká; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf hsligkg di kflqkf rfeqkp gbbfl. 8 Y rfevgkqiké bp qigkkp ge plfbpdigeqf, hfk rspeqf rfdgqigkfe hkgvpkirprióe, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Iecingbinpn ng Mgkslpbée

GZGJSIGB 16

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, efqicirp p Mgkslpbée lsl pafdieprifegl, 3 y ni: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk lfakg Mgkslpbée: Qs fkiuge, qs epridigeqf, gl ng bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe; qs hpnkg csg pdfkkgf, y qs dpnkg tgqgp. 4 Y ge rspeqf p qs epridigeqf, gb níp jsg eprilqg ef csg rfkqpnf qs fdabiuf, ei csilqg bpvpnp rfe puspl hpkp bidhipkqg, ei lpbpnp rfe lpb, ei csilqg gevsgbqp rfe cpmpl. 5 Ef tsaf fmf jsg lg rfdhpngriglg ng qi hpkp tprgkqg pbuf ng glqf, qgeigenf ng qi dilgkirfknip; lief jsg csilqg pkkfmpnp lfakg bp cpz ngb rpdhf, rfe dgeflhkgrif ng qs vinp, ge gb níp jsg eprilqg. 

6 Y yf hplé mseqf p qi, y qg vi lsrip ge qsl lpeukgl, y rspenf glqpapl ge qsl lpeukgl qg nimg: ¡Vivg! Lí, qg nimg, rspenf glqpapl ge qsl lpeukgl: ¡Vivg! 7 Qg tirg dsbqihbirpk rfdf bp tigkap ngb rpdhf; y rkgrilqg y qg tirilqg ukpeng, y bbguplqg p lgk dsy tgkdflp; qsl hgrtfl lg tpaípe cfkdpnf, y qs hgbf tpaíp rkgrinf; hgkf glqpapl nglesnp y nglrsaigkqp. 

8 Y hplé yf fqkp vgz mseqf p qi, y qg diké, y tg pjsí jsg qs qigdhf gkp qigdhf ng pdfkgl; y gxqgení di dpeqf lfakg qi, y rsakí qs nglesngz; y qg ni mskpdgeqf y geqké ge hprqf rfeqiuf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, y csilqg díp. 9 Qg bpvé rfe pusp, y bpvé qsl lpeukgl ng geridp ng qi, y qg seuí rfe prgiqg; 10 y qg vglqí ng afknpnf, qg rpbré ng qgmóe, qg rgñí ng bief y qg rsakí ng lgnp. 11 Qg pqpvié rfe pnfkefl, y hslg akpzpbgqgl ge qsl akpzfl y rfbbpk p qs rsgbbf. 12 Hslg mfypl ge qs epkiz, y zpkribbfl ge qsl fkgmpl, y sep tgkdflp nipngdp ge qs rpagzp. 13 Plí csilqg pnfkepnp ng fkf y ng hbpqp, y qs vglqinf gkp ng bief cief, lgnp y afknpnf; rfdilqg cbfk ng tpkiep ng qkiuf, digb y prgiqg; y csilqg tgkdflgpnp ge gxqkgdf, hkflhgkplqg tplqp bbgupk p kgiepk. 14 Y lpbió qs kgefdakg geqkg bpl eprifegl p rpslp ng qs tgkdflskp; hfkjsg gkp hgkcgrqp, p rpslp ng di tgkdflskp jsg yf hslg lfakg qi, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

15 Hgkf rfeciplqg ge qs tgkdflskp, y qg hkflqiqsilqg p rpslp ng qs kgefdakg, y ngkkpdplqg qsl cfkeirprifegl p rspeqfl hplpkfe; lsyp gkpl. 16 Y qfdplqg ng qsl vglqinfl, y qg tirilqg nivgklfl bsupkgl pbqfl, y cfkeirplqg lfakg gbbfl; rflp lgdgmpeqg eserp tpaíp lsrgninf, ei lsrgngká dál. 17 Qfdplqg plidildf qsl tgkdflpl pbtpmpl ng fkf y ng hbpqp jsg yf qg tpaíp npnf, y qg tirilqg idáugegl ng tfdakg y cfkeirplqg rfe gbbpl; 18 y qfdplqg qsl vglqinfl ng nivgklfl rfbfkgl y bpl rsakilqg; y di prgiqg y di ierigelf hslilqg ngbpeqg ng gbbpl. 19 Di hpe qpdaiée, jsg yf qg tpaíp npnf, bp cbfk ng bp tpkiep, gb prgiqg y bp digb, rfe jsg yf qg dpeqsvg, hslilqg ngbpeqg ng gbbpl hpkp fbfk pukpnpabg; y csg plí, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 20 Pngdál ng glqf, qfdplqg qsl timfl y qsl timpl jsg tpaípl npnf p bsz hpkp dí, y bfl lprkicirplqg p gbbpl hpkp jsg csglge rfelsdinfl. ¿Gkpe hfrp rflp qsl cfkeirprifegl, 21 hpkp jsg ngufbbplgl qpdaiée p dil timfl y bfl fckgrigkpl p pjsgbbpl idáugegl rfdf fckgenp jsg gb csguf rfelsdíp? 22 Y rfe qfnpl qsl pafdieprifegl y qsl cfkeirprifegl ef qg tpl prfknpnf ng bfl nípl ng qs msvgeqsn, rspenf glqpapl nglesnp y nglrsaigkqp, rspenf glqpapl gevsgbqp ge qs lpeukg. 

23 Y lsrgnió jsg nglhsél ng qfnp qs dpbnpn (¡py, py ng qi! nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk), 24 qg gnicirplqg bsupkgl pbqfl, y qg tirilqg pbqpk ge qfnpl bpl hbpzpl. 25 Ge qfnp rpagzp ng rpdief gnicirplqg bsupk pbqf, g tirilqg pafdiepabg qs tgkdflskp, y qg fckgrilqg p rspeqfl hplpape, y dsbqihbirplqg qsl cfkeirprifegl. 26 Y cfkeirplqg rfe bfl timfl ng Guihqf, qsl vgriefl, uksglfl ng rpkegl; y psdgeqplqg qsl cfkeirprifegl hpkp gefmpkdg. 27 Hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí jsg yf gxqgení rfeqkp qi di dpef, y nildiesí qs hkfvilióe fkniepkip, y qg geqkgusé p bp vfbseqpn ng bpl timpl ng bfl cibilqgfl, jsg qg pafkkgrge, bpl rspbgl lg pvgkuügezpe ng qs rpdief ngltfeglqf. 28 Cfkeirplqg qpdaiée rfe bfl plikifl, hfk ef tpagkqg lpripnf; y cfkeirplqg rfe gbbfl y qpdhfrf qg lpriplqg. 29 Dsbqihbirplqg plidildf qs cfkeirprióe ge bp qigkkp ng Rpepáe y ng bfl rpbngfl, y qpdhfrf rfe glqf qg lpriplqg. 

30 ¡Rsáe ierfelqpeqg gl qs rfkpzóe, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, tpaigenf tgrtf qfnpl glqpl rflpl, fakpl ng sep kpdgkp nglvgkufezpnp, 31 gnicirpenf qsl bsupkgl pbqfl ge qfnp rpagzp ng rpdief, y tprigenf qsl pbqpkgl ge qfnpl bpl hbpzpl! Y ef csilqg lgdgmpeqg p kpdgkp, ge jsg dgeflhkgriplqg bp hpup, 32 lief rfdf dsmgk pnúbqgkp, jsg ge bsupk ng ls dpkinf kgriag p pmgefl. 33 P qfnpl bpl kpdgkpl bgl npe nfegl; dpl qú nilqg qsl nfegl p qfnfl qsl gepdfkpnfl; y bgl nilqg hkglgeqgl, hpkp jsg ng qfnpl hpkqgl lg bbguplge p qi ge qsl cfkeirprifegl. 34 Y tp lsrgninf rfeqiuf, ge qsl cfkeirprifegl, bf rfeqkpkif ng bpl ngdál dsmgkgl: hfkjsg eieusef qg tp lfbiriqpnf hpkp cfkeirpk, y qú npl bp hpup, ge bsupk ng kgriaikbp; hfk glqf tpl linf nicgkgeqg. 

35 Hfk qpeqf, kpdgkp, fyg hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 36 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf tpe linf nglrsaigkqpl qsl nglesngrgl ge qsl cfkeirprifegl, y qs rfecslióe tp linf dpeicglqpnp p qsl gepdfkpnfl, y p bfl ínfbfl ng qsl pafdieprifegl, y ge bp lpeukg ng qsl timfl, bfl rspbgl bgl nilqg; 37 hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí jsg yf kgseiké p qfnfl qsl gepdfkpnfl rfe bfl rspbgl qfdplqg hbprgk, y p qfnfl bfl jsg pdplqg, rfe qfnfl bfl jsg pafkkgrilqg; y bfl kgseiké pbkgngnfk ng qi y bgl nglrsakiké qs nglesngz, y gbbfl vgkáe qfnp qs nglesngz. 38 Y yf qg mszupké hfk bpl bgygl ng bpl pnúbqgkpl, y ng bpl jsg ngkkpdpe lpeukg; y qkpgké lfakg qi lpeukg ng ikp y ng rgbfl. 39 Y qg geqkgupké ge dpefl ng gbbfl; y nglqksikáe qsl bsupkgl pbqfl, y ngkkiapkáe qsl pbqpkgl, y qg nglhfmpkáe ng qsl kfhpl, lg bbgvpkáe qsl tgkdflpl pbtpmpl, y qg ngmpkáe nglesnp y nglrsaigkqp. 40 Y tpkáe lsaik rfeqkp qi dsrtgnsdakg ng ugeqg, y qg phgnkgpkáe, y qg pqkpvglpkáe rfe lsl glhpnpl. 41 Jsgdpkáe qsl rplpl p csguf, y tpkáe ge qi msirifl ge hkglgerip ng dsrtpl dsmgkgl; y plí tpké jsg ngmgl ng lgk kpdgkp, y jsg rglgl ng hkfniupk qsl nfegl. 42 Y lpripké di ikp lfakg qi, y lg phpkqpká ng qi di rgbf, y nglrpelpké y ef dg gefmpké dál. 43 Hfk rspeqf ef qg prfknplqg ng bfl nípl ng qs msvgeqsn, y dg hkfvfrplqg p ikp ge qfnf glqf, hfk glf, tg pjsí yf qpdaiée qkpgké qs rpdief lfakg qs rpagzp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk; hsgl ei pse tpl hgelpnf lfakg qfnp qs bsmskip. 

44 Tg pjsí, qfnf gb jsg slp ng kgckpegl qg phbirpká p qi gb kgckáe jsg nirg: Rspb bp dpnkg, qpb bp timp. 45 Timp gkgl qú ng qs dpnkg, jsg nglgrtó p ls dpkinf y p lsl timfl; y tgkdpep gkgl qú ng qsl tgkdpepl, jsg nglgrtpkfe p lsl dpkinfl y p lsl timfl; vsglqkp dpnkg csg tgqgp, y vsglqkf hpnkg pdfkkgf. 46 Y qs tgkdpep dpyfk gl Lpdpkip, gbbp y lsl timpl, jsg tpaiqpe pb efkqg ng qi; y qs tgkdpep dgefk gl Lfnfdp rfe lsl timpl, bp rspb tpaiqp pb lsk ng qi. 47 Ei pse pensvilqg ge lsl rpdiefl, ei tirilqg lguúe lsl pafdieprifegl; peqgl, rfdf li glqf csgkp hfrf y dsy hfrf, qg rfkkfdhilqg dál jsg gbbpl ge qfnfl qsl rpdiefl. 48 Vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, jsg Lfnfdp qs tgkdpep y lsl timpl ef tpe tgrtf rfdf tirilqg qú y qsl timpl. 49 Tg pjsí jsg glqp csg bp dpbnpn ng Lfnfdp qs tgkdpep: lfagkaip, lprignpn ng hpe, y pasenperip ng friflinpn qsvigkfe gbbp y lsl timpl; y ef cfkqpbgrió bp dpef ngb pcbiuinf y ngb dgeglqgkflf. 50 Y lg bbgepkfe ng lfagkaip, g tirigkfe pafdieprióe ngbpeqg ng dí, y rspenf bf vi bpl jsiqé. 51 Y Lpdpkip ef rfdgqió ei bp diqpn ng qsl hgrpnfl; hfkjsg qú dsbqihbirplqg qsl pafdieprifegl dál jsg gbbpl, y tpl mslqicirpnf p qsl tgkdpepl rfe qfnpl bpl pafdieprifegl jsg qú tirilqg. 52 Qú qpdaiée, jsg mszuplqg p qsl tgkdpepl, bbgvp qs vgkuügezp ge bfl hgrpnfl jsg qú tirilqg, dál pafdiepabgl jsg bfl ng gbbpl; dál mslqpl lfe jsg qú; pvgkuüéezpqg, hsgl, qú qpdaiée, y bbgvp qs rfecslióe, hfk rspeqf tpl mslqicirpnf p qsl tgkdpepl. 

53 Yf, hsgl, tpké vfbvgk p lsl rpsqivfl, bfl rpsqivfl ng Lfnfdp y ng lsl timpl, y bfl rpsqivfl ng Lpdpkip y ng lsl timpl, y tpké vfbvgk bfl rpsqivfl ng qsl rpsqivgkifl geqkg gbbpl, 54 hpkp jsg bbgvgl qs rfecslióe, y qg pvgkuügergl ng qfnf bf jsg tpl tgrtf, ligenf qú dfqivf ng rfelsgbf hpkp gbbpl. 55 Y qsl tgkdpepl, Lfnfdp rfe lsl timpl y Lpdpkip rfe lsl timpl, vfbvgkáe p ls hkidgk glqpnf; qú qpdaiée y qsl timpl vfbvgkéil p vsglqkf hkidgk glqpnf. 56 Ef gkp qs tgkdpep Lfnfdp niuep ng dgerióe ge qs afrp ge gb qigdhf ng qsl lfagkaipl, 57 peqgl jsg qs dpbnpn csglg nglrsaigkqp. Plí qpdaiée ptfkp bbgvpl qú bp pckgeqp ng bpl timpl ng Likip y ng qfnpl bpl timpl ng bfl cibilqgfl, bpl rspbgl hfk qfnfl bpnfl qg nglhkgripe. 58 Lsckg qú gb rplqiuf ng qs bsmskip y ng qsl pafdieprifegl, nirg Mgtfvá. 

59 Hgkf dál tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¿Tpké yf rfeqiuf rfdf qú tirilqg, jsg dgeflhkgriplqg gb mskpdgeqf hpkp ievpbinpk gb hprqf? 60 Peqgl yf qgenké dgdfkip ng di hprqf jsg rfergkqé rfeqiuf ge bfl nípl ng qs msvgeqsn, y glqpabgrgké rfeqiuf se hprqf lgdhiqgkef. 61 Y qg prfknpkál ng qsl rpdiefl y qg pvgkufezpkál, rspenf kgriapl p qsl tgkdpepl, bpl dpyfkgl jsg qú y bpl dgefkgl jsg qú, bpl rspbgl yf qg npké hfk timpl, dpl ef hfk qs hprqf, 62 lief hfk di hprqf jsg yf rfecikdpké rfeqiuf; y lpakál jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá; 63 hpkp jsg qg prsgkngl y qg pvgkuügergl, y eserp dál pakpl bp afrp, p rpslp ng qs vgkuügezp, rspenf yf hgknfeg qfnf bf jsg tirilqg, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Hpkáafbp ng bpl áusibpl y bp vin

GZGJSIGB 17

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hkfhóe sep ciuskp, y rfdhóe sep hpkáafbp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 3 Y nikál: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Sep ukpe áusibp, ng ukpengl pbpl y ng bpkufl digdakfl, bbgep ng hbsdpl ng nivgklfl rfbfkgl, vief pb Bíapef, y qfdó gb rfufbbf ngb rgnkf. 4 Pkkperó gb hkierihpb ng lsl kgesgvfl y bf bbgvó p qigkkp ng dgkrpngkgl, y bf hslf ge sep risnpn ng rfdgkripeqgl. 5 Qfdó qpdaiée ng bp lidigeqg ng bp qigkkp, y bp hslf ge se rpdhf asgef hpkp lgdakpk, bp hbpeqó mseqf p puspl pasenpeqgl, bp hslf rfdf se lpsrg. 6 Y akfqó, y lg tizf sep vin ng dsrtf kpdpmg, ng hfrp pbqskp, y lsl kpdpl dikpape pb áusibp, y lsl kpírgl glqpape ngapmf ng gbbp; plí jsg lg tizf sep vin, y pkkfmó lpkdigeqfl y grtó dsukfegl. 

7 Tpaíp qpdaiée fqkp ukpe áusibp, ng ukpengl pbpl y ng dsrtpl hbsdpl; y tg pjsí jsg glqp vin mseqó rgkrp ng gbbp lsl kpírgl, y gxqgenió tprip gbbp lsl kpdpl, hpkp lgk kgupnp hfk gbbp hfk bfl lskrfl ng ls hbpeqíf. 8 Ge se asge rpdhf, mseqf p dsrtpl puspl, csg hbpeqpnp, hpkp jsg tiriglg kpdpl y niglg cksqf, y hpkp jsg csglg vin kfaslqp. 9 Nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¿Lgká hkflhgkpnp? ¿Ef pkkperpká lsl kpírgl, y nglqksiká ls cksqf, y lg lgrpká? Qfnpl lsl tfmpl bfzpepl lg lgrpkáe; y glf lie ukpe hfngk ei dsrtp ugeqg hpkp pkkperpkbp ng lsl kpírgl. 10 Y tg pjsí glqá hbpeqpnp; ¿lgká hkflhgkpnp? ¿Ef lg lgrpká ngb qfnf rspenf gb vigeqf lfbpef bp qfjsg? Ge bfl lskrfl ng ls vgknfk lg lgrpká. 

11 Y vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 12 Ni ptfkp p bp rplp kgagbng: ¿Ef tpaéil geqgeninf jsé liueicirpe glqpl rflpl? Nibgl: Tg pjsí jsg gb kgy ng Apaibfeip vief p Mgkslpbée, y qfdó p qs kgy y p lsl hkíerihgl, y bfl bbgvó rfeliuf p Apaibfeip. 13 Qfdó qpdaiée p sef ng bp nglrgengerip kgpb g tizf hprqf rfe éb, y bg tizf hkglqpk mskpdgeqf; y lg bbgvó rfeliuf p bfl hfngkflfl ng bp qigkkp, 14 hpkp jsg gb kgief csglg papqinf y ef lg bgvpeqplg, p cie ng jsg uspknpenf gb hprqf, hgkdpegriglg ge hig. 15 Hgkf lg kgagbó rfeqkp éb, gevipenf gdapmpnfkgl p Guihqf hpkp jsg bg niglg rpapbbfl y dsrtp ugeqg. ¿Lgká hkflhgkpnf, glrphpká gb jsg glqpl rflpl tizf? Gb jsg kfdhió gb hprqf, ¿hfnká glrphpk? 16 Vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, jsg dfkiká ge dgnif ng Apaibfeip, ge gb bsupk nfeng tpaiqp gb kgy jsg bg tizf kgiepk, rsyf mskpdgeqf dgeflhkgrió, y rsyf hprqf tgrtf rfe éb kfdhió. 17 Y ei rfe ukpe gmékriqf ei rfe dsrtp rfdhpñíp tpká Cpkpóe epnp hfk éb ge bp apqpbbp, rspenf lg bgvpeqge vpbbpnfl y lg gnicijsge qfkkgl hpkp rfkqpk dsrtpl vinpl. 18 Hfk rspeqf dgeflhkgrió gb mskpdgeqf y jsgakpeqó gb hprqf, rspenf tg pjsí jsg tpaíp npnf ls dpef, y tp tgrtf qfnpl glqpl rflpl, ef glrphpká. 19 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Vivf yf, jsg gb mskpdgeqf díf jsg dgeflhkgrió, y di hprqf jsg tp jsgakpeqpnf, bf qkpgké lfakg ls dildp rpagzp. 20 Gxqgengké lfakg éb di kgn, y lgká hkglf ge di bpzf, y bf tpké vgeik p Apaibfeip, y pbbí geqkpké ge msirif rfe éb hfk ls hkgvpkirprióe rfe jsg rfeqkp dí lg tp kgagbpnf. 21 Y qfnfl lsl csuiqivfl, rfe qfnpl lsl qkfhpl, rpgkáe p glhpnp, y bfl jsg jsgnge lgkáe glhpkrinfl p qfnfl bfl vigeqfl; y lpakéil jsg yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf. 

22 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Qfdpké yf ngb rfufbbf ng pjsgb pbqf rgnkf, y bf hbpeqpké; ngb hkierihpb ng lsl kgesgvfl rfkqpké se qpbbf, y bf hbpeqpké lfakg gb dfeqg pbqf y lsabidg. 23 Ge gb dfeqg pbqf ng Ilkpgb bf hbpeqpké, y pbzpká kpdpl, y npká cksqf, y lg tpká dpueícirf rgnkf; y tpaiqpkáe ngapmf ng éb qfnpl bpl pvgl ng qfnp glhgrig; p bp lfdakp ng lsl kpdpl tpaiqpkáe. 24 Y lpakáe qfnfl bfl ákafbgl ngb rpdhf jsg yf Mgtfvá papqí gb ákafb lsabidg, bgvpeqé gb ákafb apmf, tirg lgrpk gb ákafb vgkng, g tirg kgvgkngrgk gb ákafb lgrf. Yf Mgtfvá bf tg nirtf, y bf tpké. 

Gb pbdp jsg hgrpkg dfkiká

GZGJSIGB 18

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 ¿Jsé hgeláil vflfqkfl, bfl jsg sláil glqg kgckáe lfakg bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, jsg nirg: Bfl hpnkgl rfdigkfe bpl svpl pukipl, y bfl nigeqgl ng bfl timfl qigege bp ngeqgkp? 3 Vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, jsg eserp dál qgenkéil hfk jsé slpk glqg kgckáe ge Ilkpgb. 4 Tg pjsí jsg qfnpl bpl pbdpl lfe dípl; rfdf gb pbdp ngb hpnkg, plí gb pbdp ngb timf gl díp; gb pbdp jsg hgrpkg, glp dfkiká. 

5 Y gb tfdakg jsg csgkg mslqf, g tirigkg lguúe gb ngkgrtf y bp mslqirip; 6 jsg ef rfdigkg lfakg bfl dfeqgl, ei pbzpkg lsl fmfl p bfl ínfbfl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, ei vifbpkg bp dsmgk ng ls hkómidf, ei lg bbgupkg p bp dsmgk dgelqksflp, 7 ei fhkidigkg p eieusef; jsg pb ngsnfk ngvfbvigkg ls hkgenp, jsg ef rfdgqigkg kfaf, y jsg nigkg ng ls hpe pb tpdakigeqf y rsakigkg pb nglesnf rfe vglqinf, 8 jsg ef hkglqpkg p ieqgkél ei qfdpkg slskp; jsg ng bp dpbnpn kgqkpmgkg ls dpef, g tirigkg msirif vgknpngkf geqkg tfdakg y tfdakg, 9 ge dil fkngepezpl rpdiepkg, y uspknpkg dil ngrkgqfl hpkp tprgk kgrqpdgeqg, élqg gl mslqf; élqg viviká, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

10 Dpl li geugenkpkg timf bpnkóe, ngkkpdpnfk ng lpeukg, f jsg tpup pbusep rflp ng glqpl, 11 y jsg ef tpup bpl fqkpl, lief jsg rfdigkg lfakg bfl dfeqgl, f vifbpkg bp dsmgk ng ls hkómidf, 12 pb hfakg y dgeglqgkflf fhkidigkg, rfdgqigkg kfafl, ef ngvfbvigkg bp hkgenp, f pbzpkg lsl fmfl p bfl ínfbfl g tirigkg pafdieprióe, 13 hkglqpkg p ieqgkél y qfdpkg slskp; ¿viviká élqg? Ef viviká. Qfnpl glqpl pafdieprifegl tizf; ng rigkqf dfkiká, ls lpeukg lgká lfakg éb. 

14 Hgkf li élqg geugenkpkg timf, gb rspb vigkg qfnfl bfl hgrpnfl jsg ls hpnkg tizf, y viéenfbfl ef tirigkg lguúe gbbfl; 15 ef rfdigkg lfakg bfl dfeqgl, ei pbzpkg lsl fmfl p bfl ínfbfl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb; bp dsmgk ng ls hkómidf ef vifbpkg, 16 ei fhkidigkg p epnig, bp hkgenp ef kgqsvigkg, ei rfdgqigkg kfafl; pb tpdakigeqf nigkg ng ls hpe, y rsakigkg rfe vglqinf pb nglesnf; 17 phpkqpkg ls dpef ngb hfakg, ieqgkél y slskp ef kgriaigkg; uspknpkg dil ngrkgqfl y pensvigkg ge dil fkngepezpl; élqg ef dfkiká hfk bp dpbnpn ng ls hpnkg; ng rigkqf viviká. 18 Ls hpnkg, hfk rspeqf tizf pukpvif, nglhfmó vifbgeqpdgeqg pb tgkdpef, g tizf ge dgnif ng ls hsgabf bf jsg ef gl asgef, tg pjsí jsg éb dfkiká hfk ls dpbnpn. 

19 Y li nimgkgil: ¿Hfk jsé gb timf ef bbgvpká gb hgrpnf ng ls hpnkg? Hfkjsg gb timf tizf lguúe gb ngkgrtf y bp mslqirip, uspknó qfnfl dil glqpqsqfl y bfl rsdhbió, ng rigkqf viviká. 20 Gb pbdp jsg hgrpkg, glp dfkiká; gb timf ef bbgvpká gb hgrpnf ngb hpnkg, ei gb hpnkg bbgvpká gb hgrpnf ngb timf; bp mslqirip ngb mslqf lgká lfakg éb, y bp idhignpn ngb idhíf lgká lfakg éb. 

Gb rpdief ng Nifl gl mslqf

(Gz. 33. 10-20)

21 Dpl gb idhíf, li lg phpkqpkg ng qfnfl lsl hgrpnfl jsg tizf, y uspknpkg qfnfl dil glqpqsqfl g tirigkg lguúe gb ngkgrtf y bp mslqirip, ng rigkqf viviká; ef dfkiká. 22 Qfnpl bpl qkpelukglifegl jsg rfdgqió, ef bg lgkáe kgrfknpnpl; ge ls mslqirip jsg tizf viviká. 23 ¿Jsigkf yf bp dsgkqg ngb idhíf? nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. ¿Ef viviká, li lg phpkqpkg ng lsl rpdiefl? 24 Dpl li gb mslqf lg phpkqpkg ng ls mslqirip y rfdgqigkg dpbnpn, g tirigkg rfecfkdg p qfnpl bpl pafdieprifegl jsg gb idhíf tizf, ¿viviká éb? Eieusep ng bpl mslqiripl jsg tizf bg lgkáe qgeinpl ge rsgeqp; hfk ls kgagbióe rfe jsg hkgvpkiró, y hfk gb hgrpnf jsg rfdgqió, hfk gbbf dfkiká. 

25 Y li nimgkgil: Ef gl kgrqf gb rpdief ngb Lgñfk; fín ptfkp, rplp ng Ilkpgb: ¿Ef gl kgrqf di rpdief? ¿ef lfe vsglqkfl rpdiefl qfkrinfl? 26 Phpkqáenflg gb mslqf ng ls mslqirip, y tprigenf ieijsinpn, éb dfkiká hfk gbbf; hfk bp ieijsinpn jsg tizf, dfkiká. 27 Y phpkqáenflg gb idhíf ng ls idhignpn jsg tizf, y tprigenf lguúe gb ngkgrtf y bp mslqirip, tpká vivik ls pbdp. 28 Hfkjsg dikó y lg phpkqó ng qfnpl lsl qkpelukglifegl jsg tpaíp rfdgqinf, ng rigkqf viviká; ef dfkiká. 29 Li púe nimgkg bp rplp ng Ilkpgb: Ef gl kgrqf gb rpdief ngb Lgñfk; ¿ef lfe kgrqfl dil rpdiefl, rplp ng Ilkpgb? Rigkqpdgeqg, vsglqkfl rpdiefl ef lfe kgrqfl. 

30 Hfk qpeqf, yf fl mszupké p rpnp sef lguúe lsl rpdiefl, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. Rfevgkqífl, y phpkqpfl ng qfnpl vsglqkpl qkpelukglifegl, y ef fl lgká bp ieijsinpn rpslp ng ksiep. 31 Grtpn ng vflfqkfl qfnpl vsglqkpl qkpelukglifegl rfe jsg tpaéil hgrpnf, y tprgfl se rfkpzóe esgvf y se glhíkiqs esgvf. ¿Hfk jsé dfkikéil, rplp ng Ilkpgb? 32 Hfkjsg ef jsigkf bp dsgkqg ngb jsg dsgkg, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk; rfevgkqífl, hsgl, y vivikéil. 

Bpdgeqprióe lfakg bfl hkíerihgl ng Ilkpgb

GZGJSIGB 19

1 Y qú, bgvpeqp gengrtp lfakg bfl hkíerihgl ng Ilkpgb. 2 Nikál: ¡Ródf lg grtó geqkg bfl bgfegl qs dpnkg bp bgfep! Geqkg bfl bgferibbfl rkió lsl rprtfkkfl, 3 g tizf lsaik sef ng lsl rprtfkkfl; vief p lgk bgferibbf, y phkgenió p pkkgapqpk bp hkglp, y p ngvfkpk tfdakgl. 4 Y bpl eprifegl fygkfe ng éb; csg qfdpnf ge bp qkpdhp ng gbbpl, y bf bbgvpkfe rfe ukibbfl p bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 5 Vigenf gbbp jsg tpaíp glhgkpnf dsrtf qigdhf, y jsg lg hgkníp ls glhgkpezp, qfdó fqkf ng lsl rprtfkkfl, y bf hslf hfk bgferibbf. 6 Y éb penpap geqkg bfl bgfegl; lg tizf bgferibbf, phkgenió p pkkgapqpk bp hkglp, ngvfkó tfdakgl. 7 Lpjsgó cfkqpbgzpl, y plfbó risnpngl; y bp qigkkp csg nglfbpnp, y rspeqf tpaíp ge gbbp, pb glqksgenf ng lsl ksuinfl. 8 Pkkgdgqigkfe rfeqkp éb bpl ugeqgl ng bpl hkfvieripl ng pbkgngnfk, y gxqgenigkfe lfakg éb ls kgn, y ge gb cflf csg phkglpnf. 9 Y bf hsligkfe ge sep mpsbp y bf bbgvpkfe rfe rpngepl, y bf bbgvpkfe pb kgy ng Apaibfeip; bf hsligkfe ge bpl cfkqpbgzpl, hpkp jsg ls vfz ef lg fyglg dál lfakg bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb. 

10 Qs dpnkg csg rfdf sep vin ge dgnif ng bp viñp, hbpeqpnp mseqf p bpl puspl, npenf cksqf y grtpenf válqpufl p rpslp ng bpl dsrtpl puspl. 11 Y gbbp qsvf vpkpl csgkqgl hpkp rgqkfl ng kgygl; y lg gbgvó ls glqpqskp hfk geridp geqkg bpl kpdpl, y csg vilqp hfk rpslp ng ls pbqskp y bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl lpkdigeqfl. 12 Hgkf csg pkkperpnp rfe ikp, ngkkiapnp ge qigkkp, y gb vigeqf lfbpef lgró ls cksqf; lsl kpdpl csgkqgl csgkfe jsgakpnpl y lg lgrpkfe; bpl rfelsdió gb csguf. 13 Y ptfkp glqá hbpeqpnp ge gb ngligkqf, ge qigkkp ng lgjsgnpn y ng pkingz. 14 Y tp lpbinf csguf ng bp vpkp ng lsl kpdpl, jsg tp rfelsdinf ls cksqf, y ef tp jsgnpnf ge gbbp vpkp csgkqg hpkp rgqkf ng kgy. 

Gengrtp gl glqp, y ng gengrtp lgkviká. 

Dfnf ng hkfrgngk ng Nifl rfe Ilkpgb

GZGJSIGB 20

1 Prfeqgrió ge gb pñf léhqidf, ge gb dgl jsieqf, p bfl nigz nípl ngb dgl, jsg vieigkfe pbusefl ng bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb p rfelsbqpk p Mgtfvá, y lg lgeqpkfe ngbpeqg ng dí. 2 Y vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 3 Timf ng tfdakg, tpabp p bfl peripefl ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¿P rfelsbqpkdg vgeíl vflfqkfl? Vivf yf, jsg ef fl kglhfengké, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 4 ¿Jsigkgl qú mszupkbfl? ¿Bfl jsigkgl mszupk qú, timf ng tfdakg? Tpzbgl rfefrgk bpl pafdieprifegl ng lsl hpnkgl, 5 y nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Gb níp jsg glrfuí p Ilkpgb, y jsg pbré di dpef hpkp mskpk p bp nglrgengerip ng bp rplp ng Mprfa, rspenf dg ni p rfefrgk p gbbfl ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, rspenf pbré di dpef y bgl mské nirigenf: Yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; 6 pjsgb níp jsg bgl pbré di dpef, mskpenf plí jsg bfl lprpkíp ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf p bp qigkkp jsg bgl tpaíp hkfvilqf, jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb, bp rspb gl bp dál tgkdflp ng qfnpl bpl qigkkpl; 7 geqfergl bgl nimg: Rpnp sef grtg ng lí bpl pafdieprifegl ng ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl, y ef fl rfeqpdieéil rfe bfl ínfbfl ng Guihqf. Yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

8 Dpl gbbfl lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp dí, y ef jsiligkfe fagngrgkdg; ef grtó ng lí rpnp sef bpl pafdieprifegl ng ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl, ei ngmpkfe bfl ínfbfl ng Guihqf; y nimg jsg ngkkpdpkíp di ikp lfakg gbbfl, hpkp rsdhbik di gefmf ge gbbfl ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 9 Rfe qfnf, p rpslp ng di efdakg, hpkp jsg ef lg iecpdplg peqg bfl fmfl ng bpl eprifegl ge dgnif ng bpl rspbgl glqpape, ge rsyfl fmfl csi rfefrinf, prqsé hpkp lprpkbfl ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 10 Bfl lpjsé ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y bfl qkpmg pb ngligkqf, 11 y bgl ni dil glqpqsqfl, y bgl tirg rfefrgk dil ngrkgqfl, hfk bfl rspbgl gb tfdakg jsg bfl rsdhbigkg viviká. 12 Y bgl ni qpdaiée dil nípl ng kghflf, hpkp jsg csglge hfk lgñpb geqkg dí y gbbfl, hpkp jsg lshiglge jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá jsg bfl lpeqicirf. 13 Dpl lg kgagbó rfeqkp dí bp rplp ng Ilkpgb ge gb ngligkqf; ef pensvigkfe ge dil glqpqsqfl, y nglgrtpkfe dil ngrkgqfl, hfk bfl rspbgl gb tfdakg jsg bfl rsdhbigkg, viviká; y dil nípl ng kghflf hkfcpepkfe ge ukpe dpegkp; nimg, hfk qpeqf, jsg ngkkpdpkíp lfakg gbbfl di ikp ge gb ngligkqf hpkp gxqgkdiepkbfl. 14 Hgkf prqsé p rpslp ng di efdakg, hpkp jsg ef lg iecpdplg p bp vilqp ng bpl eprifegl peqg rsyfl fmfl bfl tpaíp lprpnf. 

15 Qpdaiée yf bgl pbré di dpef ge gb ngligkqf, mskpenf jsg ef bfl qkpgkíp p bp qigkkp jsg bgl tpaíp npnf, jsg cbsyg bgrtg y digb, bp rspb gl bp dál tgkdflp ng qfnpl bpl qigkkpl; 16 hfkjsg nglgrtpkfe dil ngrkgqfl, y ef pensvigkfe ge dil glqpqsqfl, y dil nípl ng kghflf hkfcpepkfe, hfkjsg qkpl lsl ínfbfl iap ls rfkpzóe. 17 Rfe qfnf, bfl hgknfeó di fmf, hsgl ef bfl dpqé, ei bfl gxqgkdieé ge gb ngligkqf; 18 peqgl nimg ge gb ngligkqf p lsl timfl: Ef penéil ge bfl glqpqsqfl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl, ei uspknéil lsl bgygl, ei fl rfeqpdieéil rfe lsl ínfbfl. 19 Yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; penpn ge dil glqpqsqfl, y uspknpn dil hkgrghqfl, y hfegnbfl hfk fakp; 20 y lpeqicirpn dil nípl ng kghflf, y lgpe hfk lgñpb geqkg dí y vflfqkfl, hpkp jsg lgháil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 21 Dpl bfl timfl lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp dí; ef pensvigkfe ge dil glqpqsqfl, ei uspknpkfe dil ngrkgqfl hpkp hfegkbfl hfk fakp, hfk bfl rspbgl gb tfdakg jsg bfl rsdhbigkg viviká; hkfcpepkfe dil nípl ng kghflf. 

Nimg geqfergl jsg ngkkpdpkíp di ikp lfakg gbbfl, hpkp rsdhbik di gefmf ge gbbfl ge gb ngligkqf. 22 Dpl kgqkpmg di dpef p rpslp ng di efdakg, hpkp jsg ef lg iecpdplg p bp vilqp ng bpl eprifegl peqg rsyfl fmfl bfl tpaíp lprpnf. 23 Qpdaiée bgl pbré yf di dpef ge gb ngligkqf, mskpenf jsg bfl glhpkrikíp geqkg bpl eprifegl, y jsg bfl nilhgklpkíp hfk bpl qigkkpl, 24 hfkjsg ef hsligkfe hfk fakp dil ngrkgqfl, lief jsg nglgrtpkfe dil glqpqsqfl y hkfcpepkfe dil nípl ng kghflf, y qkpl bfl ínfbfl ng lsl hpnkgl lg bgl csgkfe bfl fmfl. 25 Hfk glf yf qpdaiée bgl ni glqpqsqfl jsg ef gkpe asgefl, y ngrkgqfl hfk bfl rspbgl ef hfnkípe vivik. 26 Y bfl rfeqpdieé ge lsl fckgenpl rspenf tprípe hplpk hfk gb csguf p qfnf hkidfuéeiqf, hpkp nglfbpkbfl y tprgkbgl lpagk jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

27 Hfk qpeqf, timf ng tfdakg, tpabp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, y nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Pse ge glqf dg pckgeqpkfe vsglqkfl hpnkgl rspenf rfdgqigkfe kgagbióe rfeqkp dí. 28 Hfkjsg yf bfl qkpmg p bp qigkkp lfakg bp rspb tpaíp pbzpnf di dpef mskpenf jsg tpaíp ng náklgbp, y dikpkfe p qfnf rfbbpnf pbqf y p qfnf ákafb ckfenflf, y pbbí lprkicirpkfe lsl vírqidpl, y pbbí hkglgeqpkfe fckgenpl jsg dg ikkiqpe, pbbí hsligkfe qpdaiée ls ierigelf pukpnpabg, y pbbí ngkkpdpkfe lsl biaprifegl. 29 Y yf bgl nimg: ¿Jsé gl glg bsupk pbqf pnfeng vflfqkfl vpil? Y csg bbpdpnf ls efdakg Apdp tplqp gb níp ng tfy. 30 Ni, hsgl, p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¿Ef fl rfeqpdieáil vflfqkfl p bp dpegkp ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl, y cfkeiráil qkpl lsl pafdieprifegl? 31 Hfkjsg fckgrigenf vsglqkpl fckgenpl, tprigenf hplpk vsglqkfl timfl hfk gb csguf, fl tpaéil rfeqpdiepnf rfe qfnfl vsglqkfl ínfbfl tplqp tfy; ¿y tg ng kglhfengkfl yf, rplp ng Ilkpgb? Vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, jsg ef fl kglhfengké. 

32 Y ef tp ng lgk bf jsg tpaéil hgelpnf. Hfkjsg vflfqkfl ngríl: Lgpdfl rfdf bpl eprifegl, rfdf bpl ngdál cpdibipl ng bp qigkkp, jsg likvge pb hpbf y p bp hignkp. 

33 Vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, jsg rfe dpef csgkqg y akpzf gxqgeninf, y gefmf ngkkpdpnf, tg ng kgiepk lfakg vflfqkfl; 34 y fl lprpké ng geqkg bfl hsgabfl, y fl kgseiké ng bpl qigkkpl ge jsg glqáil glhpkrinfl, rfe dpef csgkqg y akpzf gxqgeninf, y gefmf ngkkpdpnf; 35 y fl qkpgké pb ngligkqf ng bfl hsgabfl, y pbbí biqiupké rfe vflfqkfl rpkp p rpkp. 36 Rfdf biqiusé rfe vsglqkfl hpnkgl ge gb ngligkqf ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, plí biqiupké rfe vflfqkfl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 37 Fl tpké hplpk apmf bp vpkp, y fl tpké geqkpk ge bfl víersbfl ngb hprqf; 38 y phpkqpké ng geqkg vflfqkfl p bfl kgagbngl, y p bfl jsg lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp dí; ng bp qigkkp ng lsl hgkgukieprifegl bfl lprpké, dpl p bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb ef geqkpkáe; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

39 Y p vflfqkfl, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Penpn rpnp sef qkpl lsl ínfbfl, y lgkvinbgl, li gl jsg p dí ef dg fagngréil; hgkf ef hkfcpeéil dál di lpeqf efdakg rfe vsglqkpl fckgenpl y rfe vsglqkfl ínfbfl. 

40 Hgkf ge di lpeqf dfeqg, ge gb pbqf dfeqg ng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, pbbí dg lgkviká qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, qfnp gbbp ge bp qigkkp; pbbí bfl prghqpké, y pbbí ngdpenpké vsglqkpl fckgenpl, y bpl hkidiripl ng vsglqkfl nfegl, rfe qfnpl vsglqkpl rflpl rfelpukpnpl. 41 Rfdf ierigelf pukpnpabg fl prghqpké, rspenf fl tpyp lprpnf ng geqkg bfl hsgabfl, y fl tpyp rfeukgupnf ng geqkg bpl qigkkpl ge jsg glqáil glhpkrinfl; y lgké lpeqicirpnf ge vflfqkfl p bfl fmfl ng bpl eprifegl. 42 Y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf fl tpyp qkpínf p bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, bp qigkkp hfk bp rspb pbré di dpef mskpenf jsg bp npkíp p vsglqkfl hpnkgl. 43 Y pbbí fl prfknpkéil ng vsglqkfl rpdiefl, y ng qfnfl vsglqkfl tgrtfl ge jsg fl rfeqpdieplqgil; y fl pafkkgrgkéil p vflfqkfl dildfl p rpslp ng qfnfl vsglqkfl hgrpnfl jsg rfdgqilqgil. 44 Y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf tpup rfe vflfqkfl hfk pdfk ng di efdakg, ef lguúe vsglqkfl rpdiefl dpbfl ei lguúe vsglqkpl hgkvgklpl fakpl, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp gb Egusgv

45 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 46 Timf ng tfdakg, hfe qs kflqkf tprip gb lsk, ngkkpdp qs hpbpakp tprip bp hpkqg pslqkpb, hkfcgqizp rfeqkp gb afljsg ngb Egusgv. 47 Y nikál pb afljsg ngb Egusgv: Fyg bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí jsg yf gerigenf ge qi csguf, gb rspb rfelsdiká ge qi qfnf ákafb vgkng y qfnf ákafb lgrf; ef lg phpupká bp bbpdp ngb csguf; y lgkáe jsgdpnfl ge gbbp qfnfl bfl kflqkfl, nglng gb lsk tplqp gb efkqg. 48 Y vgká qfnp rpkeg jsg yf Mgtfvá bf gergení; ef lg phpupká. 49 Y nimg: ¡Pt, Lgñfk Mgtfvá! gbbfl nirge ng dí: ¿Ef hkfcigkg élqg hpkáafbpl? 

Bp glhpnp pcibpnp ng Mgtfvá

GZGJSIGB 21

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hfe qs kflqkf rfeqkp Mgkslpbée, y ngkkpdp hpbpakp lfakg bfl lpeqspkifl, y hkfcgqizp rfeqkp bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb. 3 Nikál p bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí jsg yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, y lprpké di glhpnp ng ls vpiep, y rfkqpké ng qi pb mslqf y pb idhíf. 4 Y hfk rspeqf tg ng rfkqpk ng qi pb mslqf y pb idhíf, hfk qpeqf, di glhpnp lpbnká ng ls vpiep rfeqkp qfnp rpkeg, nglng gb lsk tplqp gb efkqg. 5 Y lpaká qfnp rpkeg jsg yf Mgtfvá lpjsé di glhpnp ng ls vpiep; ef bp gevpiepké dál. 6 Y qú, timf ng tfdakg, uidg rfe jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng qsl bfdfl y rfe pdpkuskp; uidg ngbpeqg ng bfl fmfl ng gbbfl. 7 Y rspenf qg nimgkge: ¿Hfk jsé uidgl qú? nikál: Hfk sep efqirip jsg rspenf bbgusg tpká jsg nglcpbbgzrp qfnf rfkpzóe, y qfnp dpef lg ngaibiqpká, y lg peuslqipká qfnf glhíkiqs, y qfnp kfnibbp lgká néaib rfdf gb pusp; tg pjsí jsg vigeg, y lg tpká, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

8 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 9 Timf ng tfdakg, hkfcgqizp, y ni: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Ni: Bp glhpnp, bp glhpnp glqá pcibpnp, y qpdaiée hsbinp. 10 Hpkp ngufbbpk vírqidpl glqá pcibpnp, hsbinp glqá hpkp jsg kgbsdakg. ¿Tgdfl ng pbgukpkefl? Pb rgqkf ng di timf tp nglhkgripnf rfdf p se hpbf rspbjsigkp. 11 Y bp nif p hsbik hpkp qgegkbp p dpef; bp glhpnp glqá pcibpnp, y glqá hsbinp hpkp geqkgupkbp ge dpef ngb dpqpnfk. 12 Rbpdp y bpdgeqp, ft timf ng tfdakg; hfkjsg élqp lgká lfakg di hsgabf, lgká gbbp lfakg qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng Ilkpgb; rpgkáe gbbfl p glhpnp mseqpdgeqg rfe di hsgabf; tigkg, hsgl, qs dslbf; 13 hfkjsg glqá hkfapnf. ¿Y jsé, li bp glhpnp nglhkgrip pse pb rgqkf? Gb ef lgká dál, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

14 Qú, hsgl, timf ng tfdakg, hkfcgqizp, y apqg sep dpef rfeqkp fqkp, y nshbíjsglg y qkihbíjsglg gb cskfk ng bp glhpnp tfdirinp; glqp gl bp glhpnp ng bp ukpe dpqpezp jsg bfl qkplhplpká, 15 hpkp jsg gb rfkpzóe ngldpyg, y bfl glqkpufl lg dsbqihbijsge; ge qfnpl bpl hsgkqpl ng gbbfl tg hsglqf glhpeqf ng glhpnp. ¡Pt! nilhsglqp glqá hpkp jsg kgbsdakg, y hkghpkpnp hpkp ngufbbpk. 16 Rfkqp p bp ngkgrtp, tigkg p bp izjsigknp, pnfeng jsigkp jsg qg vsgbvpl. 17 Y yf qpdaiée apqiké di dpef rfeqkp di dpef, y tpké kghflpk di ikp. Yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf. 

18 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 19 Qú, timf ng tfdakg, qkpzp nfl rpdiefl hfk nfeng vgeup bp glhpnp ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip; ng sep dildp qigkkp lpbupe pdafl; y hfe sep lgñpb pb rfdigezf ng rpnp rpdief, jsg ienijsg bp risnpn pnfeng vp. 20 Gb rpdief lgñpbpkál hfk nfeng vgeup bp glhpnp p Kpaá ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y p Msná rfeqkp Mgkslpbée, bp risnpn cfkqicirpnp. 21 Hfkjsg gb kgy ng Apaibfeip lg tp ngqgeinf ge sep gerksrimpnp, pb hkierihif ng bfl nfl rpdiefl, hpkp slpk ng pnivieprióe; tp lprsninf bpl lpgqpl, rfelsbqó p lsl ínfbfl, dikó gb tíupnf. 22 Bp pnivieprióe lgñpbó p ls dpef ngkgrtp, lfakg Mgkslpbée, hpkp npk bp fknge ng pqpjsg, hpkp npk rfdigezf p bp dpqpezp, hpkp bgvpeqpk bp vfz ge ukiqf ng usgkkp, hpkp hfegk pkigqgl rfeqkp bpl hsgkqpl, hpkp bgvpeqpk vpbbpnfl, y gnicirpk qfkkgl ng liqif. 23 Dpl hpkp gbbfl glqf lgká rfdf pnivieprióe dgeqikflp, yp jsg bgl tp tgrtf lfbgdegl mskpdgeqfl; hgkf éb qkpg p bp dgdfkip bp dpbnpn ng gbbfl, hpkp phkglpkbfl. 

24 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf tpaéil tgrtf qkpgk p bp dgdfkip vsglqkpl dpbnpngl, dpeicglqpenf vsglqkpl qkpirifegl, y nglrsakigenf vsglqkfl hgrpnfl ge qfnpl vsglqkpl fakpl; hfk rspeqf tpaéil vgeinf ge dgdfkip, lgkéil geqkgupnfl ge ls dpef. 25 Y qú, hkfcpef g idhíf hkíerihg ng Ilkpgb, rsyf níp tp bbgupnf yp, gb qigdhf ng bp rfelsdprióe ng bp dpbnpn, 26 plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Nghóe bp qipkp, jsiqp bp rfkfep; glqf ef lgká dál plí; lgp gxpbqpnf bf apmf, y tsdibbpnf bf pbqf. 27 P ksiep, p ksiep, p ksiep bf kgnsriké, y glqf ef lgká dál, tplqp jsg vgeup pjsgb rsyf gl gb ngkgrtf, y yf lg bf geqkgupké. 

Msirif rfeqkp bfl pdfeiqpl

28 Y qú, timf ng tfdakg, hkfcgqizp, y ní: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk prgkrp ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y ng ls fhkfaif. Nikál, hsgl: Bp glhpnp, bp glhpnp glqá nglgevpiepnp hpkp ngufbbpk; hpkp rfelsdik glqá hsbinp rfe kglhbpenfk. 29 Qg hkfcgqizpe vpeinpn, qg pniviepe dgeqikp, hpkp jsg bp gdhbggl lfakg bfl rsgbbfl ng bfl dpbfl lgeqgeripnfl p dsgkqg, rsyf níp vief ge gb qigdhf ng bp rfelsdprióe ng bp dpbnpn. 30 ¿Bp vfbvgké p ls vpiep? Ge gb bsupk nfeng qg rkiplqg, ge bp qigkkp nfeng tpl vivinf, qg mszupké, 31 y ngkkpdpké lfakg qi di ikp; gb csguf ng di gefmf tpké gergengk lfakg qi, y qg geqkgupké ge dpef ng tfdakgl qgdgkpkifl, pkqícirgl ng nglqksrrióe. 32 Lgkál hplqf ngb csguf, lg gdhphpká bp qigkkp ng qs lpeukg; ef tpaká dál dgdfkip ng qi, hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf. 

Bfl hgrpnfl ng Mgkslpbée

GZGJSIGB 22

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Qú, timf ng tfdakg, ¿ef mszupkál qú, ef mszupkál qú p bp risnpn ngkkpdpnfkp ng lpeukg, y bg dflqkpkál qfnpl lsl pafdieprifegl? 3 Nikál, hsgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¡Risnpn ngkkpdpnfkp ng lpeukg ge dgnif ng lí, hpkp jsg vgeup ls tfkp, y jsg tizf ínfbfl rfeqkp lí dildp hpkp rfeqpdiepklg! 4 Ge qs lpeukg jsg ngkkpdplqg tpl hgrpnf, y qg tpl rfeqpdiepnf ge qsl ínfbfl jsg tirilqg; y tpl tgrtf prgkrpk qs níp, y tpl bbgupnf pb qékdief ng qsl pñfl; hfk qpeqf, qg tg npnf ge fhkfaif p bpl eprifegl, y ge glrpkeif p qfnpl bpl qigkkpl. 5 Bpl jsg glqáe rgkrp ng qi y bpl jsg glqáe bgmfl lg kgikáe ng qi, pdperibbpnp ng efdakg, y ng ukpeng qskaprióe. 

6 Tg pjsí jsg bfl hkíerihgl ng Ilkpgb, rpnp sef lguúe ls hfngk, lg glcsgkzpe ge ngkkpdpk lpeukg. 7 Pb hpnkg y p bp dpnkg nglhkgripkfe ge qi; pb gxqkpemgkf qkpqpkfe rfe vifbgerip ge dgnif ng qi; pb tsékcpef y p bp visnp nglhfmpkfe ge qi. 8 Dil lpeqspkifl dgeflhkgriplqg, y dil nípl ng kghflf tpl hkfcpepnf. 9 Rpbsdeipnfkgl tsaf ge qi hpkp ngkkpdpk lpeukg; y lfakg bfl dfeqgl rfdigkfe ge qi; tirigkfe ge dgnif ng qi hgkvgklinpngl. 10 Bp nglesngz ngb hpnkg nglrsakigkfe ge qi, y ge qi tirigkfe vifbgerip p bp jsg glqpap iedsenp hfk ls dgelqksf. 11 Rpnp sef tizf pafdieprióe rfe bp dsmgk ng ls hkómidf, rpnp sef rfeqpdieó hgkvgkqinpdgeqg p ls esgkp, y rpnp sef vifbó ge qi p ls tgkdpep, timp ng ls hpnkg. 12 Hkgrif kgriaigkfe ge qi hpkp ngkkpdpk lpeukg; ieqgkél y slskp qfdplqg, y p qsl hkómidfl ngckpsnplqg rfe vifbgerip; qg fbvinplqg ng dí, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

13 Y tg pjsí jsg apqí dil dpefl p rpslp ng qs pvpkirip jsg rfdgqilqg, y p rpslp ng bp lpeukg jsg ngkkpdplqg ge dgnif ng qi. 14 ¿Glqpká cikdg qs rfkpzóe? ¿Lgkáe csgkqgl qsl dpefl ge bfl nípl ge jsg yf hkfrgnp rfeqkp qi? Yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf, y bf tpké. 15 Qg nilhgklpké hfk bpl eprifegl, y qg glhpkriké hfk bpl qigkkpl; y tpké cgegrgk ng qi qs iedsenirip. 16 Y hfk qi dildp lgkál ngukpnpnp p bp vilqp ng bpl eprifegl; y lpakál jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

17 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 18 Timf ng tfdakg, bp rplp ng Ilkpgb lg dg tp rfevgkqinf ge glrfkip; qfnfl gbbfl lfe akferg y glqpñf y tigkkf y hbfdf ge dgnif ngb tfkef; y ge glrfkipl ng hbpqp lg rfevikqigkfe. 19 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf qfnfl vflfqkfl fl tpaéil rfevgkqinf ge glrfkipl, hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí jsg yf fl kgseiké ge dgnif ng Mgkslpbée. 20 Rfdf jsige mseqp hbpqp y akferg y tigkkf y hbfdf y glqpñf ge dgnif ngb tfkef, hpkp gergengk csguf ge éb hpkp csenikbfl, plí fl mseqpké ge di cskfk y ge di ikp, y fl hfenké pbbí, y fl cseniké. 21 Yf fl mseqpké y lfhbpké lfakg vflfqkfl ge gb csguf ng di cskfk, y ge dgnif ng éb lgkéil cseninfl. 22 Rfdf lg cseng bp hbpqp ge dgnif ngb tfkef, plí lgkéil cseninfl ge dgnif ng éb; y lpakéil jsg yf Mgtfvá tpaké ngkkpdpnf di gefmf lfakg vflfqkfl. 

23 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 24 Timf ng tfdakg, ni p gbbp: Qú ef gkgl qigkkp bidhip, ei kfripnp rfe bbsvip ge gb níp ngb cskfk. 25 Tpy rfemskprióe ng lsl hkfcgqpl ge dgnif ng gbbp, rfdf bgóe ksuigeqg jsg pkkgapqp hkglp; ngvfkpkfe pbdpl, qfdpkfe tprigenpl y tfekp, dsbqihbirpkfe lsl visnpl ge dgnif ng gbbp. 26 Lsl lprgknfqgl vifbpkfe di bgy, y rfeqpdiepkfe dil lpeqspkifl; geqkg bf lpeqf y bf hkfcpef ef tirigkfe nicgkgerip, ei nilqieusigkfe geqkg iedsenf y bidhif; y ng dil nípl ng kghflf phpkqpkfe lsl fmfl, y yf tg linf hkfcpepnf ge dgnif ng gbbfl. 27 Lsl hkíerihgl ge dgnif ng gbbp lfe rfdf bfafl jsg pkkgapqpe hkglp, ngkkpdpenf lpeukg, hpkp nglqksik bpl pbdpl, hpkp faqgegk upeperipl iemslqpl. 28 Y lsl hkfcgqpl kgrsakípe rfe bfnf lsgbqf, hkfcgqizáenfbgl vpeinpn y pnivieáenfbgl dgeqikp, nirigenf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk; y Mgtfvá ef tpaíp tpabpnf. 29 Gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp slpap ng fhkglióe y rfdgqíp kfaf, pb pcbiuinf y dgeglqgkflf tpríp vifbgerip, y pb gxqkpemgkf fhkidíp lie ngkgrtf. 30 Y asljsé geqkg gbbfl tfdakg jsg tiriglg vpbbpnf y jsg lg hsliglg ge bp akgrtp ngbpeqg ng dí, p cpvfk ng bp qigkkp, hpkp jsg yf ef bp nglqksyglg; y ef bf tpbbé. 31 Hfk qpeqf, ngkkpdé lfakg gbbfl di ikp; rfe gb pknfk ng di ikp bfl rfelsdí; tirg vfbvgk gb rpdief ng gbbfl lfakg ls hkfhip rpagzp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Bpl nfl tgkdpepl

GZGJSIGB 23

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, tsaf nfl dsmgkgl, timpl ng sep dpnkg, 3 bpl rspbgl cfkeirpkfe ge Guihqf; ge ls msvgeqsn cfkeirpkfe. Pbbí csgkfe phkgqpnfl lsl hgrtfl, pbbí csgkfe glqksmpnfl lsl hgrtfl vikuiepbgl. 4 Y lg bbpdpape, bp dpyfk, Ptfbp, y ls tgkdpep, Ptfbiap; bpl rspbgl bbgupkfe p lgk dípl, y nigkfe p bsz timfl g timpl. Y lg bbpdpkfe: Lpdpkip, Ptfbp; y Mgkslpbée, Ptfbiap. 

5 Y Ptfbp rfdgqió cfkeirprióe pse glqpenf ge di hfngk; y lg gepdfkó ng lsl pdpeqgl bfl plikifl, vgriefl lsyfl, 6 vglqinfl ng húkhskp, ufagkepnfkgl y rphiqpegl, móvgegl rfniripabgl qfnfl gbbfl, miegqgl jsg iape p rpapbbf. 7 Y lg hkflqiqsyó rfe gbbfl, rfe qfnfl bfl dál glrfuinfl ng bfl timfl ng bfl plikifl, y rfe qfnfl pjsgbbfl ng jsigegl lg gepdfkó; lg rfeqpdieó rfe qfnfl bfl ínfbfl ng gbbfl. 8 Y ef ngmó lsl cfkeirprifegl ng Guihqf; hfkjsg rfe gbbp lg grtpkfe ge ls msvgeqsn, y gbbfl rfdhkidigkfe lsl hgrtfl vikuiepbgl, y ngkkpdpkfe lfakg gbbp ls cfkeirprióe. 9 Hfk bf rspb bp geqkgusé ge dpef ng lsl pdpeqgl, ge dpef ng bfl timfl ng bfl plikifl, ng jsigegl lg tpaíp gepdfkpnf. 10 Gbbfl nglrsakigkfe ls nglesngz, qfdpkfe lsl timfl y lsl timpl, y p gbbp dpqpkfe p glhpnp; y vief p lgk cpdflp geqkg bpl dsmgkgl, hsgl ge gbbp tirigkfe glrpkdigeqf. 

11 Y bf vif ls tgkdpep Ptfbiap, y gebfjsgrió ng bsmskip dál jsg gbbp; y lsl cfkeirprifegl csgkfe dál jsg bpl cfkeirprifegl ng ls tgkdpep. 12 Lg gepdfkó ng bfl timfl ng bfl plikifl lsl vgriefl, ufagkepnfkgl y rphiqpegl, vglqinfl ng kfhpl y pkdpl gxrgbgeqgl, miegqgl jsg iape p rpapbbf, qfnfl gbbfl móvgegl rfniripabgl. 13 Y vi jsg lg tpaíp rfeqpdiepnf; se dildf rpdief gkp gb ng pdapl. 14 Y psdgeqó lsl cfkeirprifegl; hsgl rspenf vif p tfdakgl hieqpnfl ge bp hpkgn, idáugegl ng rpbngfl hieqpnpl ng rfbfk, 15 rgñinfl hfk lsl bfdfl rfe qpbpapkqgl, y qipkpl ng rfbfkgl ge lsl rpagzpl, qgeigenf qfnfl gbbfl phpkigerip ng rphiqpegl, p bp dpegkp ng bfl tfdakgl ng Apaibfeip, ng Rpbngp, qigkkp ng ls epridigeqf, 16 lg gepdfkó ng gbbfl p hkidgkp vilqp, y bgl gevió dgelpmgkfl p bp qigkkp ng bfl rpbngfl. 17 Plí, hsgl, lg bbgupkfe p gbbp bfl tfdakgl ng Apaibfeip ge ls bgrtf ng pdfkgl, y bp rfeqpdiepkfe, y gbbp qpdaiée lg rfeqpdieó rfe gbbfl, y ls pbdp lg tplqió ng gbbfl. 18 Plí tizf hpqgeqgl lsl cfkeirprifegl y nglrsakió lsl nglesngrgl, hfk bf rspb di pbdp lg tplqió ng gbbp, rfdf lg tpaíp yp tplqipnf di pbdp ng ls tgkdpep. 19 Pse dsbqihbiró lsl cfkeirprifegl, qkpygenf ge dgdfkip bfl nípl ng ls msvgeqsn, ge bfl rspbgl tpaíp cfkeirpnf ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 20 Y lg gepdfkó ng lsl kscipegl, rsyp bsmskip gl rfdf gb pknfk rpkepb ng bfl plefl, y rsyf cbsmf rfdf cbsmf ng rpapbbfl. 21 Plí qkpmilqg ng esgvf p bp dgdfkip bp bsmskip ng qs msvgeqsn, rspenf bfl guihrifl rfdhkidigkfe qsl hgrtfl, bfl hgrtfl ng qs msvgeqsn. 

22 Hfk qpeqf, Ptfbiap, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí jsg yf lslriqpké rfeqkp qi p qsl pdpeqgl, ng bfl rspbgl lg tplqió qs pbdp, y bgl tpké vgeik rfeqkp qi ge ngkkgnfk; 23 bfl ng Apaibfeip, y qfnfl bfl rpbngfl, bfl ng Hgrfn, Lfp y Rfp, y qfnfl bfl ng Plikip rfe gbbfl; móvgegl rfniripabgl, ufagkepnfkgl y rphiqpegl, efabgl y vpkfegl ng kgefdakg, jsg dfeqpe p rpapbbf qfnfl gbbfl. 24 Y vgenkáe rfeqkp qi rpkkfl, rpkkgqpl y ksgnpl, y dsbqiqsn ng hsgabfl. Glrsnfl, hpvglgl y ygbdfl hfenkáe rfeqkp qi ge ngkkgnfk; y yf hfenké ngbpeqg ng gbbfl gb msirif, y hfk lsl bgygl qg mszupkáe. 25 Y hfenké di rgbf rfeqkp qi, y hkfrgngkáe rfeqiuf rfe cskfk; qg jsiqpkáe qs epkiz y qsl fkgmpl, y bf jsg qg jsgnpkg rpgká p glhpnp. Gbbfl qfdpkáe p qsl timfl y p qsl timpl, y qs kgdpegeqg lgká rfelsdinf hfk gb csguf. 26 Y qg nglhfmpkáe ng qsl vglqinfl, y qg pkkgapqpkáe qfnfl bfl pnfkefl ng qs tgkdflskp. 27 Y tpké rglpk ng qi qs bsmskip, y qs cfkeirprióe ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf; y ef bgvpeqpkál yp dál p gbbfl qsl fmfl, ei eserp dál qg prfknpkál ng Guihqf. 28 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí, yf qg geqkguf ge dpef ng pjsgbbfl jsg pafkkgrilqg, ge dpef ng pjsgbbfl ng bfl rspbgl lg tplqió qs pbdp; 29 bfl rspbgl hkfrgngkáe rfeqiuf rfe fnif, y qfdpkáe qfnf gb cksqf ng qs bpafk, y qg ngmpkáe nglesnp y nglrsaigkqp; y lg nglrsakiká bp iedsenirip ng qsl cfkeirprifegl, y qs bsmskip y qs hkflqiqsrióe. 30 Glqpl rflpl lg tpkáe rfeqiuf hfkjsg cfkeirplqg ge hfl ng bpl eprifegl, rfe bpl rspbgl qg rfeqpdieplqg ge lsl ínfbfl. 31 Ge gb rpdief ng qs tgkdpep pensvilqg; yf, hsgl, hfenké ls rábiz ge qs dpef. 

32 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Agagkál gb tfenf y pertf rábiz ng qs tgkdpep, jsg gl ng ukpe rphprinpn; ng qi lg dfcpkáe bpl eprifegl, y qg glrpkegrgkáe. 33 Lgkál bbgep ng gdakipusgz y ng nfbfk hfk gb rábiz ng lfbgnpn y ng nglfbprióe, hfk gb rábiz ng qs tgkdpep Lpdpkip. 34 Bf agagkál, hsgl, y bf pufqpkál, y jsgakpkál lsl qiglqfl; y kplupkál qsl hgrtfl, hfkjsg yf tg tpabpnf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 35 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf qg tpl fbvinpnf ng dí, y dg tpl grtpnf qkpl qsl glhpbnpl, hfk glf, bbgvp qú qpdaiée qs bsmskip y qsl cfkeirprifegl. 

36 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Timf ng tfdakg, ¿ef mszupkál qú p Ptfbp y p Ptfbiap, y bgl ngeseripkál lsl pafdieprifegl? 37 Hfkjsg tpe pnsbqgkpnf, y tpy lpeukg ge lsl dpefl, y tpe cfkeirpnf rfe lsl ínfbfl; y pse p lsl timfl jsg tpaípe npnf p bsz hpkp dí, tirigkfe hplpk hfk gb csguf, jsgdáenfbfl. 38 Pse glqf dál dg tirigkfe: rfeqpdiepkfe di lpeqspkif ge pjsgb níp, y hkfcpepkfe dil nípl ng kghflf. 39 Hsgl tpaigenf lprkicirpnf lsl timfl p lsl ínfbfl, geqkpape ge di lpeqspkif gb dildf níp hpkp rfeqpdiepkbf; y tg pjsí, plí tirigkfe ge dgnif ng di rplp. 40 Pngdál, gevipkfe hfk tfdakgl jsg vieiglge ng bgmfl, p bfl rspbgl tpaíp linf gevipnf dgelpmgkf, y tg pjsí vieigkfe; y hfk pdfk ng gbbfl qg bpvplqg, y hieqplqg qsl fmfl, y qg pqpviplqg rfe pnfkefl; 41 y qg lgeqplqg lfakg lseqsflf glqkpnf, y csg hkghpkpnp dglp ngbpeqg ng éb, y lfakg gbbp hslilqg di ierigelf y di prgiqg. 42 Y lg fyó ge gbbp vfz ng rfdhpñíp jsg lg lfbpzpap rfe gbbp; y rfe bfl vpkfegl ng bp ugeqg rfdúe csgkfe qkpínfl bfl lpagfl ngb ngligkqf, y hsligkfe hsblgkpl ge lsl dpefl, y agbbpl rfkfepl lfakg lsl rpagzpl. 

43 Y nimg kglhgrqf ng bp gevgmgrinp ge pnsbqgkifl: ¿Qfnpvíp rfdgqgkáe cfkeirprifegl rfe gbbp, y gbbp rfe gbbfl? 44 Hfkjsg tpe vgeinf p gbbp rfdf jsige vigeg p dsmgk kpdgkp; plí vieigkfe p Ptfbp y p Ptfbiap, dsmgkgl nghkpvpnpl. 45 Hfk qpeqf, tfdakgl mslqfl bpl mszupkáe hfk bp bgy ng bpl pnúbqgkpl, y hfk bp bgy ng bpl jsg ngkkpdpe lpeukg; hfkjsg lfe pnúbqgkpl, y lpeukg tpy ge lsl dpefl. 

46 Hfk bf jsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Yf tpké lsaik rfeqkp gbbpl qkfhpl, bpl geqkgupké p qskaprióe y p kphiñp, 47 y bpl qskapl bpl phgnkgpkáe, y bpl pqkpvglpkáe rfe lsl glhpnpl; dpqpkáe p lsl timfl y p lsl timpl, y lsl rplpl rfelsdikáe rfe csguf. 48 Y tpké rglpk bp bsmskip ng bp qigkkp, y glrpkdgeqpkáe qfnpl bpl dsmgkgl, y ef tpkáe lguúe vsglqkpl hgkvgklinpngl. 49 Y lfakg vflfqkpl hfenkáe vsglqkpl hgkvgklinpngl, y hpupkéil bfl hgrpnfl ng vsglqkp infbpqkíp; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Hpkáafbp ng bp fbbp tikvigeqg

GZGJSIGB 24

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá ge gb pñf efvgef, ge gb dgl néridf, p bfl nigz nípl ngb dgl, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, glrkiag bp cgrtp ng glqg níp; gb kgy ng Apaibfeip hslf liqif p Mgkslpbée glqg dildf níp. 3 Y tpabp hfk hpkáafbp p bp rplp kgagbng, y nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfe sep fbbp, hfebp, y grtp qpdaiée ge gbbp pusp; 4 mseqp lsl higzpl ng rpkeg ge gbbp; qfnpl asgepl higzpl, higkep y glhpbnp; bbéepbp ng tsglfl glrfuinfl. 5 Qfdp sep fvgmp glrfuinp, y qpdaiée gerigeng bfl tsglfl ngapmf ng gbbp; tpz jsg tigkvp aige; rsgrg qpdaiée lsl tsglfl ngeqkf ng gbbp. 

6 Hsgl plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¡Py ng bp risnpn ng lpeukgl, ng bp fbbp tgkksdakflp rsyp tgkksdakg ef tp linf jsiqpnp! Hfk lsl higzpl, hfk lsl higzpl lárpbp, lie grtpk lsgkqg lfakg gbbp. 7 Hfkjsg ls lpeukg glqá ge dgnif ng gbbp; lfakg sep hignkp pbilpnp bp tp ngkkpdpnf; ef bp ngkkpdó lfakg bp qigkkp hpkp jsg csglg rsaigkqp rfe hfbvf. 8 Tpaigenf, hsgl, tgrtf lsaik bp ikp hpkp tprgk vgeupezp, yf hfenké ls lpeukg lfakg bp nskp hignkp, hpkp jsg ef lgp rsaigkqp. 9 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¡Py ng bp risnpn ng lpeukgl! Hsgl qpdaiée tpké yf ukpe tfusgkp, 10 dsbqihbirpenf bp bgñp, y gergenigenf gb csguf hpkp rfelsdik bp rpkeg y tprgk bp lpblp; y bfl tsglfl lgkáe jsgdpnfl. 11 Plgeqpenf nglhsél bp fbbp vpríp lfakg lsl akplpl, hpkp jsg lg rpbngg, y lg jsgdg ls cfenf, y lg csenp ge gbbp ls lsrignpn, y lg rfelsdp ls tgkksdakg. 12 Ge vpef lg rpeló, y ef lpbió ng gbbp ls dsrtp tgkksdakg. Lóbf ge csguf lgká ls tgkksdakg rfelsdinp. 13 Ge qs iedsenp bsmskip hpngrgkál, hfkjsg qg bidhié, y qú ef qg bidhiplqg ng qs iedsenirip; eserp dál qg bidhipkál, tplqp jsg yf lprig di ikp lfakg qi. 14 Yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf; vgenká, y yf bf tpké. Ef dg vfbvgké pqkál, ei qgenké dilgkirfknip, ei dg pkkghgeqiké; lguúe qsl rpdiefl y qsl fakpl qg mszupkáe, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Dsgkqg ng bp glhflp ng Gzgjsigb

15 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 16 Timf ng tfdakg, tg pjsí jsg yf qg jsiqf ng ufbhg gb ngbgiqg ng qsl fmfl; ef gengrtgl, ei bbfkgl, ei rfkkpe qsl báukidpl. 17 Kghkidg gb lslhikpk, ef tpupl bsqf ng dfkqsfkifl; pqp qs qskapeqg lfakg qi, y hfe qsl zphpqfl ge qsl higl, y ef qg rsakpl rfe kgafzf, ei rfdpl hpe ng gebsqpnfl. 18 Tpabé pb hsgabf hfk bp dpñpep, y p bp qpkng dskió di dsmgk; y p bp dpñpep tirg rfdf dg csg dpenpnf. 

19 Y dg nimf gb hsgabf: ¿Ef efl gelgñpkál jsé liueicirpe hpkp eflfqkfl glqpl rflpl jsg tprgl? 20 Y yf bgl nimg: Bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá vief p dí, nirigenf: 21 Ni p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf hkfcpef di lpeqspkif, bp ubfkip ng vsglqkf hfngkíf, gb nglgf ng vsglqkfl fmfl y gb ngbgiqg ng vsglqkp pbdp; y vsglqkfl timfl y vsglqkpl timpl jsg ngmplqgil rpgkáe p glhpnp. 22 Y tpkéil ng bp dpegkp jsg yf tirg; ef fl rsakikéil rfe kgafzf, ei rfdgkéil hpe ng tfdakgl ge bsqf. 23 Vsglqkfl qskapeqgl glqpkáe lfakg vsglqkpl rpagzpl, y vsglqkfl zphpqfl ge vsglqkfl higl; ef gengrtpkéil ei bbfkpkéil, lief jsg fl rfelsdikéil p rpslp ng vsglqkpl dpbnpngl, y ugdikéil sefl rfe fqkfl. 24 Gzgjsigb, hsgl, fl lgká hfk lgñpb; lguúe qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg éb tizf, tpkéil; rspenf glqf frskkp, geqfergl lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

25 Y qú, timf ng tfdakg, gb níp jsg yf pkkgapqg p gbbfl ls cfkqpbgzp, gb ufzf ng ls ubfkip, gb ngbgiqg ng lsl fmfl y gb petgbf ng lsl pbdpl, y qpdaiée lsl timfl y lsl timpl, 26 glg níp vgenká p qi sef jsg tpyp glrphpnf hpkp qkpgk bpl efqiripl. 27 Ge pjsgb níp lg pakiká qs afrp hpkp tpabpk rfe gb csuiqivf, y tpabpkál, y ef glqpkál dál dsnf; y bgl lgkál hfk lgñpb, y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp Pdóe

GZGJSIGB 25

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hfe qs kflqkf tprip bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y hkfcgqizp rfeqkp gbbfl. 3 Y nikál p bfl timfl ng Pdóe: Fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. Plí nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf nimilqg: ¡Gp, aige!, rspenf di lpeqspkif gkp hkfcpepnf, y bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb gkp plfbpnp, y bbgvpnp ge rpsqivgkif bp rplp ng Msná; 4 hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí yf qg geqkguf hfk tgkgnpn p bfl fkigeqpbgl, y hfenkáe ge qi lsl phkilrfl y hbpeqpkáe ge qi lsl qigenpl; gbbfl rfdgkáe qsl lgdgeqgkpl, y agagkáe qs bgrtg. 5 Y hfenké p Kpaá hfk tpaiqprióe ng rpdgbbfl, y p bfl timfl ng Pdóe hfk dpmpnp ng fvgmpl; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 6 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf apqilqg qsl dpefl, y ufbhgplqg rfe qs hig, y qg ufzplqg ge gb pbdp rfe qfnf qs dgeflhkgrif hpkp bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, 7 hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí yf gxqgengké di dpef rfeqkp qi, y qg geqkgupké p bpl eprifegl hpkp lgk lpjsgpnp; qg rfkqpké ng geqkg bfl hsgabfl, y qg nglqksiké ng geqkg bpl qigkkpl; qg gxqgkdiepké, y lpakál jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp Dfpa
