8 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf nimf Dfpa y Lgik: Tg pjsí bp rplp ng Msná gl rfdf qfnpl bpl eprifegl; 9 hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí yf pakf gb bpnf ng Dfpa nglng bpl risnpngl, nglng lsl risnpngl jsg glqáe ge ls rfecíe, bpl qigkkpl nglgpabgl ng Agq-mglidfq, Appb-dgóe y Jsikipqpid, 10 p bfl timfl ngb fkigeqg rfeqkp bfl timfl ng Pdóe; y bp geqkgupké hfk tgkgnpn, hpkp jsg ef tpyp dál dgdfkip ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe geqkg bpl eprifegl. 11 Qpdaiée ge Dfpa tpké msirifl, y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp Gnfd

12 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk bf jsg tizf Gnfd, qfdpenf vgeupezp ng bp rplp ng Msná, hsgl ngbiejsigkfe ge gxqkgdf, y lg vgeupkfe ng gbbfl; 13 hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Yf qpdaiée gxqgengké di dpef lfakg Gnfd, y rfkqpké ng gbbp tfdakgl y aglqipl, y bp plfbpké; nglng Qgdáe tplqp Ngnáe rpgkáe p glhpnp. 14 Y hfenké di vgeupezp rfeqkp Gnfd ge dpefl ng di hsgabf Ilkpgb, y tpkáe ge Gnfd lguúe di gefmf y rfecfkdg p di ikp; y rfefrgkáe di vgeupezp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp bfl cibilqgfl

15 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk bf jsg tirigkfe bfl cibilqgfl rfe vgeupezp, rspenf lg vgeupkfe rfe nglhgrtf ng áeidf, nglqksygenf hfk peqiuspl gegdilqpngl; 16 hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí yf gxqigenf di dpef rfeqkp bfl cibilqgfl, y rfkqpké p bfl rgkgqgfl, y nglqksiké gb kglqf jsg jsgnp ge bp rflqp ngb dpk. 17 Y tpké ge gbbfl ukpengl vgeupezpl rfe kghkgelifegl ng ikp; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf tpup di vgeupezp ge gbbfl. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp Qikf

GZGJSIGB 26

1 Prfeqgrió ge gb senéridf pñf, ge gb níp hkidgkf ngb dgl, jsg vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hfk rspeqf nimf Qikf rfeqkp Mgkslpbée: Gp, aige; jsgakpeqpnp glqá bp jsg gkp hsgkqp ng bpl eprifegl; p dí lg vfbvió; yf lgké bbgep, y gbbp ngligkqp; 3 hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, ft Qikf, y tpké lsaik rfeqkp qi dsrtpl eprifegl, rfdf gb dpk tprg lsaik lsl fbpl. 4 Y ngdfbgkáe bfl dskfl ng Qikf, y ngkkiapkáe lsl qfkkgl; y apkkgké ng gbbp tplqp ls hfbvf, y bp ngmpké rfdf sep hgñp bilp. 5 Qgengngkf ng kgngl lgká ge dgnif ngb dpk, hfkjsg yf tg tpabpnf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk; y lgká lpjsgpnp hfk bpl eprifegl. 6 Y lsl timpl jsg glqáe ge gb rpdhf lgkáe dsgkqpl p glhpnp; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

7 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí jsg ngb efkqg qkpiuf yf rfeqkp Qikf p Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip, kgy ng kgygl, rfe rpapbbfl y rpkkfl y miegqgl, y qkfhpl y dsrtf hsgabf. 8 Dpqpká p glhpnp p qsl timpl jsg glqáe ge gb rpdhf, y hfenká rfeqkp qi qfkkgl ng liqif, y bgvpeqpká rfeqkp qi apbspkqg, y glrsnf pcikdpká rfeqkp qi. 9 Y hfenká rfeqkp qi pkigqgl, rfeqkp qsl dskfl, y qsl qfkkgl nglqksiká rfe tprtpl. 10 Hfk bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl rpapbbfl qg rsakiká gb hfbvf ng gbbfl; rfe gb glqksgenf ng ls rpapbbgkíp y ng bpl ksgnpl y ng bfl rpkkfl, qgdabpkáe qsl dskfl, rspenf geqkg hfk qsl hsgkqpl rfdf hfk hfkqibbfl ng risnpn nglqksinp. 11 Rfe bfl rplrfl ng lsl rpapbbfl tfbbpká qfnpl qsl rpbbgl; p qs hsgabf dpqpká p cibf ng glhpnp, y qsl csgkqgl rfbsdepl rpgkáe p qigkkp. 12 Y kfapkáe qsl kijsgzpl y lpjsgpkáe qsl dgkrpngkípl; pkksiepkáe qsl dskfl, y qsl rplpl hkgriflpl nglqksikáe; y hfenkáe qsl hignkpl y qs dpngkp y qs hfbvf ge dgnif ng bpl puspl. 13 Y tpké rglpk gb glqkéhiqf ng qsl rperifegl, y ef lg fiká dál gb lfe ng qsl ríqpkpl. 14 Y qg hfenké rfdf sep hgñp bilp; qgengngkf ng kgngl lgkál, y eserp dál lgkál gnicirpnp; hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

15 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk p Qikf: ¿Ef lg glqkgdgrgkáe bpl rflqpl pb glqksgenf ng qs rpínp, rspenf ukiqge bfl tgkinfl, rspenf lg tpup bp dpqpezp ge dgnif ng qi? 16 Geqfergl qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ngb dpk nglrgengkáe ng lsl qkfefl, y lg jsiqpkáe lsl dpeqfl, y nglesnpkáe lsl kfhpl afknpnpl; ng glhpeqf lg vglqikáe, lg lgeqpkáe lfakg bp qigkkp, y qgdabpkáe p rpnp dfdgeqf, y glqpkáe pqóeiqfl lfakg qi. 17 Y bgvpeqpkáe lfakg qi gengrtpl, y qg nikáe: ¿Ródf hgkgrilqg qú, hfabpnp hfk ugeqg ng dpk, risnpn jsg gkp pbpapnp, jsg gkp csgkqg ge gb dpk, gbbp y lsl tpaiqpeqgl, jsg iecsenípe qgkkfk p qfnfl bfl jsg bp kfngpape? 18 Ptfkp lg glqkgdgrgkáe bpl ilbpl ge gb níp ng qs rpínp; lí, bpl ilbpl jsg glqáe ge gb dpk lg glhpeqpkáe p rpslp ng qs cie. 

19 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Yf qg rfevgkqiké ge risnpn plfbpnp, rfdf bpl risnpngl jsg ef lg tpaiqpe; tpké lsaik lfakg qi gb paildf, y bpl dsrtpl puspl qg rsakikáe. 20 Y qg tpké nglrgengk rfe bfl jsg nglrigenge pb lghsbrkf, rfe bfl hsgabfl ng fqkfl liubfl, y qg hfenké ge bpl hkfcseninpngl ng bp qigkkp, rfdf bfl ngligkqfl peqiusfl, rfe bfl jsg nglrigenge pb lghsbrkf, hpkp jsg eserp dál lgpl hfabpnp; y npké ubfkip ge bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl. 21 Qg rfevgkqiké ge glhpeqf, y ngmpkál ng lgk; lgkál aslrpnp, y eserp dál lgkál tpbbpnp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

GZGJSIGB 27

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Qú, timf ng tfdakg, bgvpeqp gengrtpl lfakg Qikf. 3 Nikál p Qikf, jsg glqá plgeqpnp p bpl fkibbpl ngb dpk, bp jsg qkpcirp rfe bfl hsgabfl ng dsrtpl rflqpl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Qikf, qú tpl nirtf: Yf lfy ng hgkcgrqp tgkdflskp. 4 Ge gb rfkpzóe ng bfl dpkgl glqáe qsl rfeciegl; bfl jsg qg gnicirpkfe rfdhbgqpkfe qs agbbgzp. 5 Ng tpypl ngb dfeqg Lgeik qg cpakirpkfe qfnf gb dpngkpmg; qfdpkfe rgnkfl ngb Bíapef hpkp tprgkqg gb dálqib. 6 Ng geriepl ng Apláe tirigkfe qsl kgdfl; qsl aperfl ng hief ng bpl rflqpl ng Jsiqid, ierkslqpnfl ng dpkcib. 7 Ng bief cief afknpnf ng Guihqf gkp qs rfkqiep, hpkp jsg qg likviglg ng vgbp; ng pzsb y húkhskp ng bpl rflqpl ng Gbilp gkp qs hpagbbóe. 8 Bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Linóe y ng Pkvpn csgkfe qsl kgdgkfl; qsl lpaifl, ft Qikf, glqpape ge qi; gbbfl csgkfe qsl hibfqfl. 9 Bfl peripefl ng Ugapb y lsl dál táaibgl fakgkfl rpbpcpqgpape qsl mseqskpl; qfnpl bpl epvgl ngb dpk y bfl kgdgkfl ng gbbpl csgkfe p qi hpkp egufripk, hpkp hpkqirihpk ng qsl egufrifl. 

10 Hgklpl y bfl ng Bsn y Csq csgkfe ge qs gmékriqf qsl tfdakgl ng usgkkp; glrsnfl y ygbdfl rfbupkfe ge qi; gbbfl qg nigkfe qs glhbgenfk. 11 Y bfl timfl ng Pkvpn rfe qs gmékriqf glqsvigkfe lfakg qsl dskfl pbkgngnfk, y bfl updpngfl ge qsl qfkkgl; lsl glrsnfl rfbupkfe lfakg qsl dskfl pbkgngnfk; gbbfl rfdhbgqpkfe qs tgkdflskp. 

12 Qpklil rfdgkripap rfeqiuf hfk bp pasenperip ng qfnpl qsl kijsgzpl; rfe hbpqp, tigkkf, glqpñf y hbfdf rfdgkripap ge qsl cgkipl. 13 Mpváe, Qsapb y Dglgr rfdgkripape qpdaiée rfeqiuf; rfe tfdakgl y rfe sqgelibifl ng akferg rfdgkripape ge qsl cgkipl. 14 Bfl ng bp rplp ng Qfupkdp, rfe rpapbbfl y rfkrgbgl ng usgkkp y dsbfl, rfdgkripape ge qs dgkrpnf. 15 Bfl timfl ng Ngnáe qkpcirpape rfeqiuf; dsrtpl rflqpl qfdpape dgkrpngkíp ng qs dpef; rfbdibbfl ng dpkcib y éapef qg nigkfe hfk lsl hpufl. 16 Gnfd qkpcirpap rfeqiuf hfk bp dsbqiqsn ng qsl hkfnsrqfl; rfe hgkbpl, húkhskp, vglqinfl afknpnfl, biefl ciefl, rfkpbgl y ksaígl vgeíp p qsl cgkipl. 17 Msná y bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb rfdgkripape rfeqiuf; rfe qkiufl ng Dieiq y Hpepu, digb, prgiqg y kgliep egufripape ge qsl dgkrpnfl. 18 Npdplrf rfdgkripap rfeqiuf hfk qsl dsrtfl hkfnsrqfl, hfk bp pasenperip ng qfnp kijsgzp; rfe vief ng Tgbaóe y bpep abperp egufripape. 19 Plidildf Npe y gb gkkpeqg Mpváe vieigkfe p qsl cgkipl, hpkp egufripk ge qs dgkrpnf rfe tigkkf bpakpnf, dikkp nglqibpnp y rpñp pkfdáqirp. 20 Ngnáe rfdgkripap rfeqiuf ge hpñfl hkgriflfl hpkp rpkkfl. 21 Pkpaip y qfnfl bfl hkíerihgl ng Rgnpk qkpcirpape rfeqiuf ge rfkngkfl y rpkegkfl y dprtfl rpakífl; ge glqpl rflpl csgkfe qsl dgkrpngkgl. 22 Bfl dgkrpngkgl ng Lpaá y ng Kppdp csgkfe qpdaiée qsl dgkrpngkgl; rfe bf hkierihpb ng qfnp glhgrigkíp, y qfnp hignkp hkgriflp, y fkf, vieigkfe p qsl cgkipl. 23 Tpkáe, Rpeg, Gnée, y bfl dgkrpngkgl ng Lpaá, ng Plikip y ng Jsibdpn, rfeqkpqpape rfeqiuf. 24 Glqfl dgkrpngkgl qsyfl egufripape rfeqiuf ge vpkipl rflpl; ge dpeqfl ng pzsb y afknpnfl, y ge rpmpl ng kfhpl hkgriflpl, gebpzpnpl rfe rfknfegl, y ge dpngkp ng rgnkf. 

25 Bpl epvgl ng Qpklil gkpe rfdf qsl rpkpvpepl jsg qkpípe qsl dgkrperípl; plí bbguplqg p lgk fhsbgeqp, qg dsbqihbirplqg ge ukpe dpegkp ge dgnif ng bfl dpkgl. 26 Ge dsrtpl puspl qg geufbcpkfe qsl kgdgkfl; vigeqf lfbpef qg jsgakpeqó ge dgnif ng bfl dpkgl. 27 Qsl kijsgzpl, qsl dgkrpngkípl, qs qkácirf, qsl kgdgkfl, qsl hibfqfl, qsl rpbpcpqgpnfkgl y bfl pugeqgl ng qsl egufrifl, y qfnfl qsl tfdakgl ng usgkkp jsg tpy ge qi, rfe qfnp qs rfdhpñíp jsg ge dgnif ng qi lg tpbbp, rpgkáe ge dgnif ng bfl dpkgl gb níp ng qs rpínp. 28 Pb glqkéhiqf ng bpl vfrgl ng qsl dpkiegkfl qgdabpkáe bpl rflqpl. 29 Nglrgengkáe ng lsl epvgl qfnfl bfl jsg qfdpe kgdf; kgdgkfl y qfnfl bfl hibfqfl ngb dpk lg jsgnpkáe ge qigkkp, 30 y tpkáe fík ls vfz lfakg qi, y ukiqpkáe pdpkupdgeqg, y grtpkáe hfbvf lfakg lsl rpagzpl, y lg kgvfbrpkáe ge rgeizp. 31 Lg kpgkáe hfk qi bfl rpagbbfl, lg rgñikáe ng ribirif, y gengrtpkáe hfk qi gengrtpl pdpkupl, rfe pdpkuskp ngb pbdp. 32 Y bgvpeqpkáe lfakg qi gengrtpl ge lsl bpdgeqprifegl, y gengrtpkáe lfakg qi, nirigenf: ¿Jsiée rfdf Qikf, rfdf bp nglqksinp ge dgnif ngb dpk? 33 Rspenf qsl dgkrpngkípl lpbípe ng bpl epvgl, lpripapl p dsrtfl hsgabfl; p bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp gekijsgrilqg rfe bp dsbqiqsn ng qsl kijsgzpl y ng qs rfdgkrif. 34 Ge gb qigdhf ge jsg lgpl jsgakpeqpnp hfk bfl dpkgl ge bf hkfcsenf ng bpl puspl, qs rfdgkrif y qfnp qs rfdhpñíp rpgkáe ge dgnif ng qi. 35 Qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bpl rflqpl lg dpkpvibbpkáe lfakg qi, y lsl kgygl qgdabpkáe ng glhpeqf; ngdsnpkáe lsl kflqkfl. 36 Bfl dgkrpngkgl ge bfl hsgabfl libapkáe rfeqkp qi; vgenkál p lgk glhpeqf, y hpkp ligdhkg ngmpkál ng lgk. 

GZGJSIGB 28

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, ni pb hkíerihg ng Qikf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf lg gepbqgrió qs rfkpzóe, y nimilqg: Yf lfy se nifl, ge gb qkfef ng Nifl glqfy lgeqpnf ge dgnif ng bfl dpkgl (ligenf qú tfdakg y ef Nifl), y tpl hsglqf qs rfkpzóe rfdf rfkpzóe ng Nifl; 3 tg pjsí jsg qú gkgl dál lpaif jsg Npeigb; ef tpy lgrkgqf jsg qg lgp frsbqf. 4 Rfe qs lpainskíp y rfe qs hksngerip tpl prsdsbpnf kijsgzpl, y tpl pnjsikinf fkf y hbpqp ge qsl qglfkfl. 5 Rfe bp ukpengzp ng qs lpainskíp ge qsl rfeqkpqprifegl tpl dsbqihbirpnf qsl kijsgzpl; y p rpslp ng qsl kijsgzpl lg tp gepbqgrinf qs rfkpzóe. 6 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf hslilqg qs rfkpzóe rfdf rfkpzóe ng Nifl, 7 hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí yf qkpiuf lfakg qi gxqkpemgkfl, bfl csgkqgl ng bpl eprifegl, jsg nglgevpiepkáe lsl glhpnpl rfeqkp bp tgkdflskp ng qs lpainskíp, y dpertpkáe qs glhbgenfk. 8 Pb lghsbrkf qg tpkáe nglrgengk, y dfkikál rfe bp dsgkqg ng bfl jsg dsgkge ge dgnif ng bfl dpkgl. 9 ¿Tpabpkál ngbpeqg ngb jsg qg dpqg, nirigenf: Yf lfy Nifl? Qú, tfdakg gkgl, y ef Nifl, ge bp dpef ng qs dpqpnfk. 10 Ng dsgkqg ng ierikrserilfl dfkikál hfk dpef ng gxqkpemgkfl; hfkjsg yf tg tpabpnf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

11 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 12 Timf ng tfdakg, bgvpeqp gengrtpl lfakg gb kgy ng Qikf, y nibg: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Qú gkpl gb lgbbf ng bp hgkcgrrióe, bbgef ng lpainskíp, y prpapnf ng tgkdflskp. 13 Ge Gnée, ge gb tsgkqf ng Nifl glqsvilqg; ng qfnp hignkp hkgriflp gkp qs vglqinskp; ng rfkegkiep, qfhprif, mplhg, rkilóbiqf, agkibf y óeirg; ng zpcikf, rpkaserbf, gldgkpbnp y fkf; bfl hkidfkgl ng qsl qpdafkibgl y cbpsqpl glqsvigkfe hkghpkpnfl hpkp qi ge gb níp ng qs rkgprióe. 14 Qú, jsgksaíe ukpeng, hkfqgrqfk, yf qg hslg ge gb lpeqf dfeqg ng Nifl, pbbí glqsvilqg; ge dgnif ng bpl hignkpl ng csguf qg hplgpapl. 15 Hgkcgrqf gkpl ge qfnfl qsl rpdiefl nglng gb níp jsg csilqg rkgpnf, tplqp jsg lg tpbbó ge qi dpbnpn. 16 P rpslp ng bp dsbqiqsn ng qsl rfeqkpqprifegl csilqg bbgef ng ieijsinpn, y hgrplqg; hfk bf jsg yf qg grté ngb dfeqg ng Nifl, y qg pkkfmé ng geqkg bpl hignkpl ngb csguf, ft jsgksaíe hkfqgrqfk. 17 Lg gepbqgrió qs rfkpzóe p rpslp ng qs tgkdflskp, rfkkfdhilqg qs lpainskíp p rpslp ng qs glhbgenfk; yf qg pkkfmpké hfk qigkkp; ngbpeqg ng bfl kgygl qg hfenké hpkp jsg dikge ge qi. 18 Rfe bp dsbqiqsn ng qsl dpbnpngl y rfe bp ieijsinpn ng qsl rfeqkpqprifegl hkfcpeplqg qs lpeqspkif; yf, hsgl, lpjsé csguf ng ge dgnif ng qi, gb rspb qg rfelsdió, y qg hslg ge rgeizp lfakg bp qigkkp p bfl fmfl ng qfnfl bfl jsg qg dikpe. 19 Qfnfl bfl jsg qg rfefrigkfe ng geqkg bfl hsgabfl lg dpkpvibbpkáe lfakg qi; glhpeqf lgkál, y hpkp ligdhkg ngmpkál ng lgk. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp Linóe

20 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 21 Timf ng tfdakg, hfe qs kflqkf tprip Linóe, y hkfcgqizp rfeqkp gbbp, 22 y nikál: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, ft Linóe, y ge dgnif ng qi lgké ubfkicirpnf; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf tpup ge gbbp msirifl, y ge gbbp dg lpeqicijsg. 23 Gevipké p gbbp hglqibgerip y lpeukg ge lsl rpbbgl, y rpgkáe dsgkqfl ge dgnif ng gbbp, rfe glhpnp rfeqkp gbbp hfk qfnfl bpnfl; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

24 Y eserp dál lgká p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb glhiep nglupkkpnfkp, ei pusimóe jsg bg né nfbfk, ge dgnif ng rspeqfl bp kfngpe y bp dgeflhkgripe; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

25 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Rspenf kgrfmp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb ng bfl hsgabfl geqkg bfl rspbgl glqá glhpkrinp, geqfergl dg lpeqicirpké ge gbbfl peqg bfl fmfl ng bpl eprifegl, y tpaiqpkáe ge ls qigkkp, bp rspb ni p di ligkvf Mprfa. 26 Y tpaiqpkáe ge gbbp lguskfl, y gnicirpkáe rplpl, y hbpeqpkáe viñpl, y vivikáe rfecipnpdgeqg, rspenf yf tpup msirifl ge qfnfl bfl jsg bfl nglhfmpe ge lsl pbkgngnfkgl; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 

Hkfcgrípl rfeqkp Guihqf

GZGJSIGB 29

1 Ge gb pñf néridf, ge gb dgl néridf, p bfl nfrg nípl ngb dgl, vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hfe qs kflqkf rfeqkp Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf, y hkfcgqizp rfeqkp éb y rfeqkp qfnf Guihqf. 3 Tpabp, y ni: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf, gb ukpe nkpuóe jsg yprg ge dgnif ng lsl kífl, gb rspb nimf: Díf gl gb Eibf, hsgl yf bf tirg. 4 Yf, hsgl, hfenké upkcifl ge qsl jsimpnpl, y hgupké bfl hgrgl ng qsl kífl p qsl glrpdpl, y qg lprpké ng ge dgnif ng qsl kífl, y qfnfl bfl hgrgl ng qsl kífl lpbnkáe hgupnfl p qsl glrpdpl. 5 Y qg ngmpké ge gb ngligkqf p qi y p qfnfl bfl hgrgl ng qsl kífl; lfakg bp cpz ngb rpdhf rpgkál; ef lgkál kgrfuinf, ei lgkál mseqpnf; p bpl cigkpl ng bp qigkkp y p bpl pvgl ngb rigbf qg tg npnf hfk rfdinp. 

6 Y lpakáe qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Guihqf jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, hfk rspeqf csgkfe aársbf ng rpñp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 7 Rspenf qg qfdpkfe rfe bp dpef, qg jsgakplqg, y bgl kfdhilqg qfnf gb tfdakf; y rspenf lg phfypkfe ge qi, qg jsgakplqg, y bgl kfdhilqg lsl bfdfl geqgkpdgeqg. 

8 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí jsg yf qkpiuf rfeqkp qi glhpnp, y rfkqpké ng qi tfdakgl y aglqipl. 9 Y bp qigkkp ng Guihqf lgká plfbpnp y ngligkqp, y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá; hfk rspeqf nimf: Gb Eibf gl díf, y yf bf tirg. 10 Hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, y rfeqkp qsl kífl; y hfenké bp qigkkp ng Guihqf ge nglfbprióe, ge bp lfbgnpn ngb ngligkqf, nglng Diunfb tplqp Lgvgeg, tplqp gb bídiqg ng Gqifhíp. 11 Ef hplpká hfk gbbp hig ng tfdakg, ei hig ng peidpb hplpká hfk gbbp, ei lgká tpaiqpnp, hfk rspkgeqp pñfl. 12 Y hfenké p bp qigkkp ng Guihqf ge lfbgnpn geqkg bpl qigkkpl plfbpnpl, y lsl risnpngl geqkg bpl risnpngl nglqksinpl glqpkáe nglfbpnpl hfk rspkgeqp pñfl; y glhpkriké p Guihqf geqkg bpl eprifegl, y bf nilhgklpké hfk bpl qigkkpl. 

13 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Pb cie ng rspkgeqp pñfl kgrfugké p Guihqf ng geqkg bfl hsgabfl geqkg bfl rspbgl csgkge glhpkrinfl; 14 y vfbvgké p qkpgk bfl rpsqivfl ng Guihqf, y bfl bbgvpké p bp qigkkp ng Hpqkfl, p bp qigkkp ng ls fkiuge; y pbbí lgkáe se kgief nglhkgripabg. 15 Ge rfdhpkprióe rfe bfl fqkfl kgiefl lgká tsdibng; eserp dál lg pbzpká lfakg bpl eprifegl; hfkjsg yf bfl nildiesiké, hpkp jsg ef vsgbvpe p qgegk nfdieif lfakg bpl eprifegl. 16 Y ef lgká yp dál hpkp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb phfyf ng rfecipezp, jsg bgl tpup kgrfknpk gb hgrpnf ng dikpk ge hfl ng gbbfl; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

17 Prfeqgrió ge gb pñf vgieqiligqg ge gb dgl hkidgkf, gb níp hkidgkf ngb dgl, jsg vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 18 Timf ng tfdakg, Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip tizf p ls gmékriqf hkglqpk se pknsf lgkvirif rfeqkp Qikf. Qfnp rpagzp tp jsgnpnf rpbvp, y qfnp glhpbnp nglfbbpnp; y ei hpkp éb ei hpkp ls gmékriqf tsaf hpup ng Qikf, hfk gb lgkvirif jsg hkglqó rfeqkp gbbp. 19 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk; Tg pjsí jsg yf nfy p Epasrfnfeflfk, kgy ng Apaibfeip, bp qigkkp ng Guihqf; y éb qfdpká lsl kijsgzpl, y kgrfugká lsl nglhfmfl, y pkkgapqpká afqíe, y tpaká hpup hpkp ls gmékriqf. 20 Hfk ls qkpapmf rfe jsg likvió rfeqkp gbbp bg tg npnf bp qigkkp ng Guihqf; hfkjsg qkpapmpkfe hpkp dí, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

21 Ge pjsgb qigdhf tpké kgqfñpk gb hfngk ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. Y pakiké qs afrp ge dgnif ng gbbfl, y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

GZGJSIGB 30

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hkfcgqizp, y ni: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Bpdgeqpn: ¡Py ng pjsgb níp! 3 Hfkjsg rgkrp glqá gb níp, rgkrp glqá gb níp ng Mgtfvá; níp ng esabpnf, níp ng rplqiuf ng bpl eprifegl lgká. 4 Y vgenká glhpnp p Guihqf, y tpaká dignf ge Gqifhíp, rspenf rpiupe tgkinfl ge Guihqf; y qfdpkáe lsl kijsgzpl, y lgkáe nglqksinfl lsl csenpdgeqfl. 5 Gqifhíp, Csq, Bsn, qfnp Pkpaip, Biaip, y bfl timfl ng bpl qigkkpl pbipnpl, rpgkáe rfe gbbfl p cibf ng glhpnp. 6 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Qpdaiée rpgkáe bfl jsg lflqigege p Guihqf, y bp pbqivgz ng ls hfngkíf rpgká; nglng Diunfb tplqp Lgvgeg rpgkáe ge éb p cibf ng glhpnp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 7 Y lgkáe plfbpnfl geqkg bpl qigkkpl plfbpnpl, y lsl risnpngl lgkáe geqkg bpl risnpngl ngligkqpl. 8 Y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf hfeup csguf p Guihqf, y lgpe jsgakpeqpnfl qfnfl lsl pysnpnfkgl. 

9 Ge pjsgb qigdhf lpbnkáe dgelpmgkfl ng ngbpeqg ng dí ge epvgl, hpkp glhpeqpk p Gqifhíp bp rfecipnp, y qgenkáe glhpeqf rfdf ge gb níp ng Guihqf; hfkjsg tg pjsí vigeg. 

10 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Nglqksiké bpl kijsgzpl ng Guihqf hfk dpef ng Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip. 11 Gb, y rfe éb ls hsgabf, bfl dál csgkqgl ng bpl eprifegl, lgkáe qkpínfl hpkp nglqksik bp qigkkp; y nglgevpiepkáe lsl glhpnpl lfakg Guihqf, y bbgepkáe ng dsgkqfl bp qigkkp. 12 Y lgrpké bfl kífl, y geqkgupké bp qigkkp ge dpefl ng dpbfl, y hfk dpef ng gxqkpemgkfl nglqksiké bp qigkkp y rspeqf ge gbbp tpy. Yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf. 

13 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Nglqksiké qpdaiée bpl idáugegl, y nglqksiké bfl ínfbfl ng Dgecil; y ef tpaká dál hkíerihg ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf hfenké qgdfk. 14 Plfbpké p Hpqkfl, y hfenké csguf p Zfáe, y tpké msirifl ge Qgapl. 15 Y ngkkpdpké di ikp lfakg Lie, cfkqpbgzp ng Guihqf, y gxqgkdiepké p bp dsbqiqsn ng Qgapl. 16 Y hfenké csguf p Guihqf; Lie qgenká ukpe nfbfk, y Qgapl lgká nglqkfzpnp, y Dgecil qgenká rfeqiespl peuslqipl. 17 Bfl móvgegl ng Pvée y ng Hiaglgq rpgkáe p cibf ng glhpnp, y bpl dsmgkgl ikáe ge rpsqivgkif. 18 Y ge Qpcegl lg flrskgrgká gb níp, rspenf jsgakpeqg yf pbbí gb hfngk ng Guihqf, y rglpká ge gbbp bp lfagkaip ng ls hfngkíf; qieigabp bp rsakiká, y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng lsl pbngpl ikáe ge rpsqivgkif. 19 Tpké, hsgl, msirifl ge Guihqf, y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

20 Prfeqgrió ge gb pñf senéridf, ge gb dgl hkidgkf, p bfl ligqg nípl ngb dgl, jsg vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 21 Timf ng tfdakg, tg jsgakpnf gb akpzf ng Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf; y tg pjsí jsg ef tp linf vgenpnf hfeiéenfbg dgniriepl, ei hfeiéenfbg cpmp hpkp biupkbf, p cie ng cfkqpbgrgkbf hpkp jsg hsgnp lflqgegk bp glhpnp. 22 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tgdg pjsí rfeqkp Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf, y jsgakpké lsl akpzfl, gb csgkqg y gb ckprqskpnf, y tpké jsg bp glhpnp lg bg rpiup ng bp dpef. 23 Y glhpkriké p bfl guihrifl geqkg bpl eprifegl, y bfl nilhgklpké hfk bpl qigkkpl. 24 Y cfkqpbgrgké bfl akpzfl ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y hfenké di glhpnp ge ls dpef; dpl jsgakpké bfl akpzfl ng Cpkpóe, y ngbpeqg ng pjséb ugdiká rfe ugdinfl ng tgkinf ng dsgkqg. 25 Cfkqpbgrgké, hsgl, bfl akpzfl ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y bfl akpzfl ng Cpkpóe rpgkáe; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf yf hfeup di glhpnp ge bp dpef ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip, y éb bp gxqigenp rfeqkp bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 26 Y glhpkriké p bfl guihrifl geqkg bpl eprifegl, y bfl nilhgklpké hfk bpl qigkkpl; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

GZGJSIGB 31

1 Prfeqgrió ge gb pñf senéridf, ge gb dgl qgkrgkf, gb níp hkidgkf ngb dgl, jsg vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, ni p Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf, y p ls hsgabf: ¿P jsiée qg rfdhpkplqg ge qs ukpengzp? 3 Tg pjsí gkp gb plikif rgnkf ge gb Bíapef, ng tgkdflpl kpdpl, ng ckfenflf kpdpmg y ng ukpeng pbqskp, y ls rfhp glqpap geqkg ngelpl kpdpl. 4 Bpl puspl bf tirigkfe rkgrgk, bf gersdakó gb paildf; lsl kífl rfkkípe pbkgngnfk ng ls hig, y p qfnfl bfl ákafbgl ngb rpdhf gevipap lsl rfkkigeqgl. 5 Hfk qpeqf, lg gersdakó ls pbqskp lfakg qfnfl bfl ákafbgl ngb rpdhf, y lg dsbqihbirpkfe lsl kpdpl, y p rpslp ng bpl dsrtpl puspl lg pbpkuó ls kpdpmg jsg tpaíp grtpnf. 6 Ge lsl kpdpl tprípe einf qfnpl bpl pvgl ngb rigbf, y ngapmf ng ls kpdpmg hpkípe qfnpl bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf, y p ls lfdakp tpaiqpape dsrtpl eprifegl. 7 Lg tizf, hsgl, tgkdflf ge ls ukpengzp rfe bp gxqgelióe ng lsl kpdpl; hfkjsg ls kpíz glqpap mseqf p dsrtpl puspl. 8 Bfl rgnkfl ef bf rsakigkfe ge gb tsgkqf ng Nifl; bpl tpypl ef csgkfe lgdgmpeqgl p lsl kpdpl, ei bfl rplqpñfl csgkfe lgdgmpeqgl p ls kpdpmg; eieuúe ákafb ge gb tsgkqf ng Nifl csg lgdgmpeqg p éb ge ls tgkdflskp. 9 Bf tirg tgkdflf rfe bp dsbqiqsn ng lsl kpdpl; y qfnfl bfl ákafbgl ngb Gnée, jsg glqpape ge gb tsgkqf ng Nifl, qsvigkfe ng éb gevinip. 

10 Hfk qpeqf, plí nimf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Yp jsg hfk lgk gersdakpnf ge pbqskp, y tpagk bgvpeqpnf ls rsdakg geqkg ngelpl kpdpl, ls rfkpzóe lg gbgvó rfe ls pbqskp, 11 yf bf geqkgupké ge dpefl ngb hfngkflf ng bpl eprifegl, jsg ng rigkqf bg qkpqpká lguúe ls dpbnpn. Yf bf tg nglgrtpnf. 12 Y bf nglqksikáe gxqkpemgkfl, bfl hfngkflfl ng bpl eprifegl, y bf ngkkiapkáe; lsl kpdpl rpgkáe lfakg bfl dfeqgl y hfk qfnfl bfl vpbbgl, y hfk qfnfl bfl pkkfyfl ng bp qigkkp lgká jsgakpnf ls kpdpmg; y lg ikáe ng ls lfdakp qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp, y bf ngmpkáe. 13 Lfakg ls ksiep tpaiqpkáe qfnpl bpl pvgl ngb rigbf, y lfakg lsl kpdpl glqpkáe qfnpl bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf, 14 hpkp jsg ef lg gxpbqge ge ls pbqskp qfnfl bfl ákafbgl jsg rkgrge mseqf p bpl puspl, ei bgvpeqge ls rfhp geqkg bp glhglskp, ei rfecíge ge ls pbqskp qfnfl bfl jsg agage puspl; hfkjsg qfnfl glqáe nglqiepnfl p dsgkqg, p bf hkfcsenf ng bp qigkkp, geqkg bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, rfe bfl jsg nglrigenge p bp cflp. 

15 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Gb níp jsg nglrgenió pb Lgfb, tirg tprgk bsqf, tirg rsakik hfk éb gb paildf, y ngqsvg lsl kífl, y bpl dsrtpl puspl csgkfe ngqgeinpl; pb Bíapef rsakí ng qieigabpl hfk éb, y qfnfl bfl ákafbgl ngb rpdhf lg ngldpypkfe. 16 Ngb glqksgenf ng ls rpínp tirg qgdabpk p bpl eprifegl, rspenf bpl tirg nglrgengk pb Lgfb rfe qfnfl bfl jsg nglrigenge p bp lghsbqskp; y qfnfl bfl ákafbgl glrfuinfl ngb Gnée, y bfl dgmfkgl ngb Bíapef, qfnfl bfl jsg agage puspl, csgkfe rfelfbpnfl ge bf hkfcsenf ng bp qigkkp. 17 Qpdaiée gbbfl nglrgenigkfe rfe éb pb Lgfb, rfe bfl dsgkqfl p glhpnp, bfl jsg csgkfe ls akpzf, bfl jsg glqsvigkfe p ls lfdakp ge dgnif ng bpl eprifegl. 18 ¿P jsiée qg tpl rfdhpkpnf plí ge ubfkip y ge ukpengzp geqkg bfl ákafbgl ngb Gnée? Hsgl ngkkiapnf lgkál rfe bfl ákafbgl ngb Gnée ge bf hkfcsenf ng bp qigkkp; geqkg bfl ierikrserilfl yprgkál, rfe bfl dsgkqfl p glhpnp. 

Glqg gl Cpkpóe y qfnf ls hsgabf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

GZGJSIGB 32

1 Prfeqgrió ge gb pñf nsfnéridf, ge gb dgl nsfnéridf, gb níp hkidgkf ngb dgl, jsg vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, bgvpeqp gengrtpl lfakg Cpkpóe kgy ng Guihqf, y nibg: P bgferibbf ng eprifegl gkgl lgdgmpeqg, y gkgl rfdf gb nkpuóe ge bfl dpkgl; hsgl lgrpapl qsl kífl, y geqskaipapl bpl puspl rfe qsl higl, y tfbbpapl lsl kiagkpl. 3 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Yf gxqgengké lfakg qi di kgn rfe kgseióe ng dsrtfl hsgabfl, y qg tpkáe lsaik rfe di kgn. 4 Y qg ngmpké ge qigkkp, qg grtpké lfakg bp cpz ngb rpdhf, y tpké hflpk lfakg qi qfnpl bpl pvgl ngb rigbf, y lpripké ng qi p bpl cigkpl ng qfnp bp qigkkp. 5 Hfenké qsl rpkegl lfakg bfl dfeqgl, y bbgepké bfl vpbbgl ng qsl rpnávgkgl. 6 Y kgupké ng qs lpeukg bp qigkkp nfeng epnpl, tplqp bfl dfeqgl; y bfl pkkfyfl lg bbgepkáe ng qi. 7 Y rspenf qg tpyp gxqieusinf, rsakiké bfl rigbfl, y tpké geqgegakgrgk lsl glqkgbbpl; gb lfb rsakiké rfe esabpnf, y bp bsep ef tpká kglhbpengrgk ls bsz. 8 Tpké geqgegakgrgk qfnfl bfl plqkfl akibbpeqgl ngb rigbf hfk qi, y hfenké qieigabpl lfakg qs qigkkp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

9 Y geqkilqgrgké gb rfkpzóe ng dsrtfl hsgabfl, rspenf bbgvg pb rpsqivgkif p bfl qsyfl geqkg bpl eprifegl, hfk bpl qigkkpl jsg ef rfefrilqg. 10 Y ngmpké pqóeiqfl hfk qi p dsrtfl hsgabfl, y lsl kgygl qgenkáe tfkkfk ukpeng p rpslp ng qi, rspenf tpup kglhbpengrgk di glhpnp ngbpeqg ng lsl kflqkfl; y qfnfl lg lfakglpbqpkáe ge lsl áeidfl p rpnp dfdgeqf ge gb níp ng qs rpínp. 11 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Bp glhpnp ngb kgy ng Apaibfeip vgenká lfakg qi. 12 Rfe glhpnpl ng csgkqgl tpké rpgk qs hsgabf; qfnfl gbbfl lgkáe bfl hfngkflfl ng bpl eprifegl; y nglqksikáe bp lfagkaip ng Guihqf, y qfnp ls dsbqiqsn lgká ngltgrtp. 13 Qfnpl lsl aglqipl nglqksiké ng lfakg bpl dsrtpl puspl; ei dál bpl geqskaipká hig ng tfdakg, ei hgzsñp ng aglqip bpl geqskaipká. 14 Geqfergl tpké plgeqpklg lsl puspl, y tpké rfkkgk lsl kífl rfdf prgiqg, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 15 Rspenf plsgbg bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y bp qigkkp jsgng nglhfmpnp ng qfnf rspeqf ge gbbp tpy, rspenf dpqg p qfnfl bfl jsg ge gbbp dfkpe, lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 16 Glqp gl bp gengrtp, y bp rpeqpkáe; bpl timpl ng bpl eprifegl bp rpeqpkáe; gengrtpkáe lfakg Guihqf y lfakg qfnp ls dsbqiqsn, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

17 Prfeqgrió ge gb pñf nsfnéridf, p bfl jsierg nípl ngb dgl, jsg vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 18 Timf ng tfdakg, gengrtp lfakg bp dsbqiqsn ng Guihqf, y nglhéñpbf p éb, y p bpl timpl ng bpl eprifegl hfngkflpl, p bf hkfcsenf ng bp qigkkp, rfe bfl jsg nglrigenge p bp lghsbqskp. 19 Hfkjsg gkgl qpe tgkdflf, nglrigeng, y yprg rfe bfl ierikrserilfl. 20 Geqkg bfl dsgkqfl p glhpnp rpgká; p bp glhpnp gl geqkgupnf; qkpgnbf p éb y p qfnfl lsl hsgabfl. 21 Ng ge dgnif ngb Lgfb tpabpkáe p éb bfl csgkqgl ng bfl csgkqgl, rfe bfl jsg bg pysnpkfe, jsg nglrgenigkfe y yprge rfe bfl ierikrserilfl dsgkqfl p glhpnp. 

22 Pbbí glqá Plikip rfe qfnp ls dsbqiqsn; ge ngkkgnfk ng éb glqáe lsl lghsbrkfl; qfnfl gbbfl rpygkfe dsgkqfl p glhpnp. 23 Lsl lghsbrkfl csgkfe hsglqfl p bfl bpnfl ng bp cflp, y ls ugeqg glqá hfk bfl pbkgngnfkgl ng ls lghsbrkf; qfnfl gbbfl rpygkfe dsgkqfl p glhpnp, bfl rspbgl lgdakpkfe gb qgkkfk ge bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl. 

24 Pbbí Gbpd, y qfnp ls dsbqiqsn hfk bfl pbkgngnfkgl ng ls lghsbrkf; qfnfl gbbfl rpygkfe dsgkqfl p glhpnp, bfl rspbgl nglrgenigkfe ierikrserilfl p bf dál hkfcsenf ng bp qigkkp, hfkjsg lgdakpkfe ls qgkkfk ge bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl, dpl bbgvpkfe ls rfecslióe rfe bfl jsg nglrigenge pb lghsbrkf. 25 Ge dgnif ng bfl dsgkqfl bg hsligkfe bgrtf rfe qfnp ls dsbqiqsn; p lsl pbkgngnfkgl glqáe lsl lghsbrkfl; qfnfl gbbfl ierikrserilfl, dsgkqfl p glhpnp, hfkjsg csg hsglqf ls glhpeqf ge bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl, dpl bbgvpkfe ls rfecslióe rfe bfl jsg nglrigenge pb lghsbrkf; éb csg hsglqf ge dgnif ng bfl dsgkqfl. 

26 Pbbí Dglgr y Qsapb, y qfnp ls dsbqiqsn; lsl lghsbrkfl ge lsl pbkgngnfkgl; qfnfl gbbfl ierikrserilfl, dsgkqfl p glhpnp, hfkjsg tpaípe lgdakpnf ls qgkkfk ge bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl. 27 Y ef yprgkáe rfe bfl csgkqgl ng bfl ierikrserilfl jsg rpygkfe, bfl rspbgl nglrgenigkfe pb Lgfb rfe lsl pkdpl ng usgkkp, y lsl glhpnpl hsglqpl ngapmf ng lsl rpagzpl; dpl lsl hgrpnfl glqpkáe lfakg lsl tsglfl, hfk rspeqf csgkfe qgkkfk ng csgkqgl ge bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl. 28 Qú, hsgl, lgkál jsgakpeqpnf geqkg bfl ierikrserilfl, y yprgkál rfe bfl dsgkqfl p glhpnp. 

29 Pbbí Gnfd, lsl kgygl y qfnfl lsl hkíerihgl, bfl rspbgl rfe ls hfngkíf csgkfe hsglqfl rfe bfl dsgkqfl p glhpnp; gbbfl yprgkáe rfe bfl ierikrserilfl, y rfe bfl jsg nglrigenge pb lghsbrkf. 

30 Pbbí bfl hkíerihgl ngb efkqg, qfnfl gbbfl, y qfnfl bfl linfeifl, jsg rfe ls qgkkfk nglrgenigkfe rfe bfl dsgkqfl, pvgkufezpnfl ng ls hfngkíf, yprge qpdaiée ierikrserilfl rfe bfl dsgkqfl p glhpnp, y rfdhpkqge ls rfecslióe rfe bfl jsg nglrigenge pb lghsbrkf. 

31 P élqfl vgká Cpkpóe, y lg rfelfbpká lfakg qfnp ls dsbqiqsn; Cpkpóe dsgkqf p glhpnp, y qfnf ls gmékriqf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 32 Hfkjsg hslg di qgkkfk ge bp qigkkp ng bfl vivigeqgl, qpdaiée Cpkpóe y qfnp ls dsbqiqsn yprgkáe geqkg bfl ierikrserilfl rfe bfl dsgkqfl p glhpnp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Gb ngagk ngb pqpbpyp

(Gz. 3.16-21)

GZGJSIGB 33

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, tpabp p bfl timfl ng qs hsgabf, y nibgl: Rspenf qkpmgkg yf glhpnp lfakg bp qigkkp, y gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp qfdpkg se tfdakg ng ls qgkkiqfkif y bf hsligkg hfk pqpbpyp, 3 y éb vigkg vgeik bp glhpnp lfakg bp qigkkp, y qfrpkg qkfdhgqp y pvilpkg pb hsgabf, 4 rspbjsigkp jsg fygkg gb lfeinf ng bp qkfdhgqp y ef lg phgkriaigkg, y vieigenf bp glhpnp bf tikigkg, ls lpeukg lgká lfakg ls rpagzp. 5 Gb lfeinf ng bp qkfdhgqp fyó, y ef lg phgkriaió; ls lpeukg lgká lfakg éb; dpl gb jsg lg phgkriaigkg biakpká ls vinp. 6 Hgkf li gb pqpbpyp vigkg vgeik bp glhpnp y ef qfrpkg bp qkfdhgqp, y gb hsgabf ef lg phgkriaigkg, y vieigenf bp glhpnp, tikigkg ng éb p pbusef, élqg csg qfdpnf hfk rpslp ng ls hgrpnf, hgkf ngdpenpké ls lpeukg ng dpef ngb pqpbpyp. 

7 P qi, hsgl, timf ng tfdakg, qg tg hsglqf hfk pqpbpyp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, y fikál bp hpbpakp ng di afrp, y bfl pdfeglqpkál ng di hpkqg. 8 Rspenf yf nimgkg pb idhíf: Idhíf, ng rigkqf dfkikál; li qú ef tpabpkgl hpkp jsg lg uspkng gb idhíf ng ls rpdief, gb idhíf dfkiká hfk ls hgrpnf, hgkf ls lpeukg yf bp ngdpenpké ng qs dpef. 9 Y li qú pvilpkgl pb idhíf ng ls rpdief hpkp jsg lg phpkqg ng éb, y éb ef lg phpkqpkg ng ls rpdief, éb dfkiká hfk ls hgrpnf, hgkf qú biakplqg qs vinp. 

Gb rpdief ng Nifl gl mslqf

(Gz. 18.21-32)

10 Qú, hsgl, timf ng tfdakg, ni p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb: Vflfqkfl tpaéil tpabpnf plí, nirigenf: Esglqkpl kgagbifegl y esglqkfl hgrpnfl glqáe lfakg eflfqkfl, y p rpslp ng gbbfl lfdfl rfelsdinfl; ¿ródf, hsgl, vivikgdfl? 11 Nibgl: Vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, jsg ef jsigkf bp dsgkqg ngb idhíf, lief jsg lg vsgbvp gb idhíf ng ls rpdief, y jsg vivp. Vfbvgfl, vfbvgfl ng vsglqkfl dpbfl rpdiefl; ¿hfk jsé dfkikéil, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb? 12 Y qú, timf ng tfdakg, ni p bfl timfl ng qs hsgabf: Bp mslqirip ngb mslqf ef bf biakpká gb níp jsg lg kgagbpkg; y bp idhignpn ngb idhíf ef bg lgká glqfkaf gb níp jsg lg vfbvigkg ng ls idhignpn; y gb mslqf ef hfnká vivik hfk ls mslqirip gb níp jsg hgrpkg. 13 Rspenf yf nimgkg pb mslqf: Ng rigkqf vivikál, y éb rfecipnf ge ls mslqirip tirigkg ieijsinpn, qfnpl lsl mslqiripl ef lgkáe kgrfknpnpl, lief jsg dfkiká hfk ls ieijsinpn jsg tizf. 14 Y rspenf yf nimgkg pb idhíf: Ng rigkqf dfkikál; li éb lg rfevikqigkg ng ls hgrpnf, g tirigkg lguúe gb ngkgrtf y bp mslqirip, 15 li gb idhíf kglqiqsygkg bp hkgenp, ngvfbvigkg bf jsg tsaigkg kfapnf, y rpdiepkg ge bfl glqpqsqfl ng bp vinp, ef tprigenf ieijsinpn, viviká rigkqpdgeqg y ef dfkiká. 16 Ef lg bg kgrfknpká eieusef ng lsl hgrpnfl jsg tpaíp rfdgqinf; tizf lguúe gb ngkgrtf y bp mslqirip; viviká rigkqpdgeqg. 

17 Bsguf nikáe bfl timfl ng qs hsgabf: Ef gl kgrqf gb rpdief ngb Lgñfk; gb rpdief ng gbbfl gl gb jsg ef gl kgrqf. 18 Rspenf gb mslqf lg phpkqpkg ng ls mslqirip, g tirigkg ieijsinpn, dfkiká hfk gbbf. 19 Y rspenf gb idhíf lg phpkqpkg ng ls idhignpn, g tirigkg lguúe gb ngkgrtf y bp mslqirip, viviká hfk gbbf. 20 Y nimilqgil: Ef gl kgrqf gb rpdief ngb Lgñfk. Yf fl mszupké, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb, p rpnp sef rfecfkdg p lsl rpdiefl. 

Esgvpl ng bp rpínp ng Mgkslpbée

21 Prfeqgrió ge gb pñf nsfnéridf ng esglqkf rpsqivgkif, ge gb dgl néridf, p bfl rierf nípl ngb dgl, jsg vief p dí se csuiqivf ng Mgkslpbée, nirigenf: Bp risnpn tp linf rfejsilqpnp. 22 Y bp dpef ng Mgtfvá tpaíp linf lfakg dí bp qpkng peqgl ng bbgupk gb csuiqivf, y tpaíp paigkqf di afrp, tplqp jsg vief p dí hfk bp dpñpep; y pakió di afrp, y yp ef dál glqsvg rpbbpnf. 

23 Y vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 24 Timf ng tfdakg, bfl jsg tpaiqpe pjsgbbfl bsupkgl plfbpnfl ge bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb tpabpe nirigenf: Pakptpd gkp sef, y hflgyó bp qigkkp; hsgl eflfqkfl lfdfl dsrtfl; p eflfqkfl efl gl npnp bp qigkkp ge hflglióe. 25 Hfk qpeqf, nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¿Rfdgkéil rfe lpeukg, y p vsglqkfl ínfbfl pbzpkéil vsglqkfl fmfl, y ngkkpdpkéil lpeukg, y hflggkéil vflfqkfl bp qigkkp? 26 Glqsvilqgil lfakg vsglqkpl glhpnpl, tirilqgil pafdieprióe, y rfeqpdieplqgil rpnp rspb p bp dsmgk ng ls hkómidf; ¿y tpakéil ng hflggk bp qigkkp? 27 Bgl nikál plí: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Vivf yf, jsg bfl jsg glqáe ge pjsgbbfl bsupkgl plfbpnfl rpgkáe p glhpnp, y pb jsg glqá lfakg bp cpz ngb rpdhf geqkgupké p bpl cigkpl hpkp jsg bf ngvfkge; y bfl jsg glqáe ge bpl cfkqpbgzpl y ge bpl rsgvpl, ng hglqibgerip dfkikáe. 28 Y rfevgkqiké bp qigkkp ge ngligkqf y ge lfbgnpn, y rglpká bp lfagkaip ng ls hfngkíf; y bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb lgkáe plfbpnfl tplqp jsg ef tpyp jsige hplg. 29 Y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf rfevigkqp bp qigkkp ge lfbgnpn y ngligkqf, hfk qfnpl bpl pafdieprifegl jsg tpe tgrtf. 

30 Y qú, timf ng tfdakg, bfl timfl ng qs hsgabf lg dfcpe ng qi mseqf p bpl hpkgngl y p bpl hsgkqpl ng bpl rplpl, y tpabp gb sef rfe gb fqkf, rpnp sef rfe ls tgkdpef, nirigenf: Vgein ptfkp, y fín jsé hpbpakp vigeg ng Mgtfvá. 31 Y vgenkáe p qi rfdf vigeg gb hsgabf, y glqpkáe ngbpeqg ng qi rfdf hsgabf díf, y fikáe qsl hpbpakpl, y ef bpl hfenkáe hfk fakp; peqgl tprge tpbpufl rfe lsl afrpl, y gb rfkpzóe ng gbbfl penp ge hfl ng ls pvpkirip. 32 Y tg pjsí jsg qú gkgl p gbbfl rfdf rpeqfk ng pdfkgl, tgkdflf ng vfz y jsg rpeqp aige; y fikáe qsl hpbpakpl, hgkf ef bpl hfenkáe hfk fakp. 33 Hgkf rspenf gbbf vieigkg (y vigeg yp), lpakáe jsg tsaf hkfcgqp geqkg gbbfl. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp bfl hplqfkgl ng Ilkpgb

GZGJSIGB 34

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hkfcgqizp rfeqkp bfl hplqfkgl ng Ilkpgb; hkfcgqizp, y ni p bfl hplqfkgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¡Py ng bfl hplqfkgl ng Ilkpgb, jsg lg phprigeqpe p lí dildfl! ¿Ef phprigeqpe bfl hplqfkgl p bfl kgapñfl? 3 Rfdéil bp ukflskp, y fl vglqíl ng bp bpep; bp geufknpnp ngufbbáil, dpl ef phprgeqáil p bpl fvgmpl. 4 Ef cfkqpbgrilqgil bpl néaibgl, ei rskplqgil bp gecgkdp; ef vgenplqgil bp hgkeijsgakpnp, ef vfbvilqgil pb kgnib bp nglrpkkipnp, ei aslrplqgil bp hgkninp, lief jsg fl tpaéil gelgñfkgpnf ng gbbpl rfe nskgzp y rfe vifbgerip. 5 Y penpe gkkpeqgl hfk cpbqp ng hplqfk, y lfe hkglp ng qfnpl bpl cigkpl ngb rpdhf, y lg tpe nilhgklpnf. 6 Pensvigkfe hgkninpl dil fvgmpl hfk qfnfl bfl dfeqgl, y ge qfnf rfbbpnf pbqf; y ge qfnp bp cpz ng bp qigkkp csgkfe glhpkrinpl dil fvgmpl, y ef tsaf jsige bpl aslrplg, ei jsige hkguseqplg hfk gbbpl. 

7 Hfk qpeqf, hplqfkgl, fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá: 8 Vivf yf, tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, jsg hfk rspeqf di kgapñf csg hpkp lgk kfapnf, y dil fvgmpl csgkfe hpkp lgk hkglp ng qfnpl bpl cigkpl ngb rpdhf, lie hplqfk; ei dil hplqfkgl aslrpkfe dil fvgmpl, lief jsg bfl hplqfkgl lg phprgeqpkfe p lí dildfl, y ef phprgeqpkfe dil fvgmpl; 9 hfk qpeqf, ft hplqfkgl, fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 10 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí, yf glqfy rfeqkp bfl hplqfkgl; y ngdpenpké dil fvgmpl ng ls dpef, y bgl tpké ngmpk ng phprgeqpk bpl fvgmpl; ei bfl hplqfkgl lg phprgeqpkáe dál p lí dildfl, hsgl yf biakpké dil fvgmpl ng lsl afrpl, y ef bgl lgkáe dál hfk rfdinp. 

11 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf, yf dildf iké p aslrpk dil fvgmpl, y bpl kgrfefrgké. 12 Rfdf kgrfefrg ls kgapñf gb hplqfk gb níp jsg glqá ge dgnif ng lsl fvgmpl glhpkrinpl, plí kgrfefrgké dil fvgmpl, y bpl biakpké ng qfnfl bfl bsupkgl ge jsg csgkfe glhpkrinpl gb níp ngb esabpnf y ng bp flrskinpn. 13 Y yf bpl lprpké ng bfl hsgabfl, y bpl mseqpké ng bpl qigkkpl; bpl qkpgké p ls hkfhip qigkkp, y bpl phprgeqpké ge bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb, hfk bpl kiagkpl, y ge qfnfl bfl bsupkgl tpaiqpnfl ngb hpíl. 14 Ge asgefl hplqfl bpl phprgeqpké, y ge bfl pbqfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb glqpká ls phkilrf; pbbí nfkdikáe ge asge kgnib, y ge hplqfl lsrsbgeqfl lgkáe phprgeqpnpl lfakg bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb. 15 Yf phprgeqpké dil fvgmpl, y yf bgl npké phkilrf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 16 Yf aslrpké bp hgkninp, y tpké vfbvgk pb kgnib bp nglrpkkipnp; vgenpké bp hgkeijsgakpnp, y cfkqpbgrgké bp néaib; dpl p bp geufknpnp y p bp csgkqg nglqksiké; bpl phprgeqpké rfe mslqirip. 

17 Dpl ge rspeqf p vflfqkpl, fvgmpl dípl, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf mszuf geqkg fvgmp y fvgmp, geqkg rpkegkfl y dprtfl rpakífl. 18 ¿Fl gl hfrf jsg rfdáil bfl asgefl hplqfl, lief jsg qpdaiée tfbbáil rfe vsglqkfl higl bf jsg ng vsglqkfl hplqfl jsgnp; y jsg agaigenf bpl puspl rbpkpl, geqskaiáil pngdál rfe vsglqkfl higl bpl jsg jsgnpe? 19 Y dil fvgmpl rfdge bf tfbbpnf ng vsglqkfl higl, y agage bf jsg rfe vsglqkfl higl tpaéil geqskaipnf. 

20 Hfk qpeqf, plí bgl nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf, yf mszupké geqkg bp fvgmp geufknpnp y bp fvgmp cbprp, 21 hfk rspeqf gdhsmplqgil rfe gb rflqpnf y rfe gb tfdakf, y prfkegplqgil rfe vsglqkfl rsgkefl p qfnpl bpl néaibgl, tplqp jsg bpl grtplqgil y bpl nilhgklplqgil. 22 Yf lpbvpké p dil fvgmpl, y eserp dál lgkáe hpkp kphiñp; y mszupké geqkg fvgmp y fvgmp. 23 Y bgvpeqpké lfakg gbbpl p se hplqfk, y éb bpl phprgeqpká; p di ligkvf Npvin, éb bpl phprgeqpká, y éb bgl lgká hfk hplqfk. 24 Yf Mgtfvá bgl lgké hfk Nifl, y di ligkvf Npvin hkíerihg ge dgnif ng gbbfl. Yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf. 

25 Y glqpabgrgké rfe gbbfl hprqf ng hpz, y jsiqpké ng bp qigkkp bpl cigkpl; y tpaiqpkáe ge gb ngligkqf rfe lguskinpn, y nfkdikáe ge bfl afljsgl. 26 Y npké agenirióe p gbbpl y p bfl pbkgngnfkgl ng di rfbbpnf, y tpké nglrgengk bp bbsvip ge ls qigdhf; bbsvipl ng agenirióe lgkáe. 27 Y gb ákafb ngb rpdhf npká ls cksqf, y bp qigkkp npká ls cksqf, y glqpkáe lfakg ls qigkkp rfe lguskinpn; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf kfdhp bpl rfysenpl ng ls ysuf, y bfl biakg ng dpef ng bfl jsg lg likvge ng gbbfl. 28 Ef lgkáe dál hfk nglhfmf ng bpl eprifegl, ei bpl cigkpl ng bp qigkkp bpl ngvfkpkáe; lief jsg tpaiqpkáe rfe lguskinpn, y ef tpaká jsige bpl glhpeqg. 29 Y bgvpeqpké hpkp gbbfl sep hbpeqp ng kgefdakg, y ef lgkáe yp dál rfelsdinfl ng tpdakg ge bp qigkkp, ei yp dál lgkáe pvgkufezpnfl hfk bpl eprifegl. 30 Y lpakáe jsg yf Mgtfvá ls Nifl glqfy rfe gbbfl, y gbbfl lfe di hsgabf, bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 31 Y vflfqkpl, fvgmpl dípl, fvgmpl ng di hplqf, tfdakgl lfil, y yf vsglqkf Nifl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp gb Dfeqg Lgik

GZGJSIGB 35

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hfe qs kflqkf tprip gb dfeqg ng Lgik, y hkfcgqizp rfeqkp éb, 3 y nibg: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, ft dfeqg ng Lgik, y gxqgengké di dpef rfeqkp qi, y qg rfevgkqiké ge ngligkqf y ge lfbgnpn. 4 P qsl risnpngl plfbpké, y qú lgkál plfbpnf; y lpakál jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 5 Hfk rspeqf qsvilqg gegdilqpn hgkhgqsp, y geqkguplqg p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb pb hfngk ng bp glhpnp ge gb qigdhf ng ls pcbirrióe, ge gb qigdhf gxqkgdpnpdgeqg dpbf, 6 hfk qpeqf, vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, jsg p lpeukg qg nglqiepké, y lpeukg qg hgklgusiká; y hfkjsg bp lpeukg ef pafkkgrilqg, lpeukg qg hgklgusiká. 7 Y rfevgkqiké pb dfeqg ng Lgik ge ngligkqf y ge lfbgnpn, y rfkqpké ng éb pb jsg vpyp y pb jsg vgeup. 8 Y bbgepké lsl dfeqgl ng lsl dsgkqfl; ge qsl rfbbpnfl, ge qsl vpbbgl y ge qfnfl qsl pkkfyfl, rpgkáe dsgkqfl p glhpnp. 9 Yf qg hfenké ge plfbpdigeqf hgkhgqsf, y qsl risnpngl eserp dál lg kglqpskpkáe; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

10 Hfk rspeqf nimilqg: Bpl nfl eprifegl y bpl nfl qigkkpl lgkáe dípl, y qfdpké hflglióe ng gbbpl; glqpenf pbbí Mgtfvá; 11 hfk qpeqf, vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, yf tpké rfecfkdg p qs ikp, y rfecfkdg p qs rgbf rfe jsg hkfrgnilqg, p rpslp ng qsl gegdilqpngl rfe gbbfl; y lgké rfefrinf ge gbbfl, rspenf qg mszusg. 12 Y lpakál jsg yf Mgtfvá tg fínf qfnpl qsl iemskipl jsg hkfcgkilqg rfeqkp bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb, nirigenf: Nglqksinfl lfe, efl tpe linf npnfl hpkp jsg bfl ngvfkgdfl. 13 Y fl geukpengrilqgil rfeqkp dí rfe vsglqkp afrp, y dsbqihbirplqgil rfeqkp dí vsglqkpl hpbpakpl. Yf bf fí. 14 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hpkp jsg qfnp bp qigkkp lg kgufrimg, yf qg tpké sep nglfbprióe. 15 Rfdf qg pbgukplqg lfakg bp tgkgnpn ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, hfkjsg csg plfbpnp, plí qg tpké p qi; plfbpnf lgká gb dfeqg ng Lgik, y qfnf Gnfd, qfnf éb; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

Kglqpskprióe csqskp ng Ilkpgb

GZGJSIGB 36

1 Qú, timf ng tfdakg, hkfcgqizp p bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb, y ni: Dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb, fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 2 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf gb gegdiuf nimf ng vflfqkfl: ¡Gp! qpdaiée bpl pbqskpl gqgkepl efl tpe linf npnpl hfk tgkgnpn; 3 hkfcgqizp, hfk qpeqf, y ni: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf fl plfbpkfe y fl qkpupkfe ng qfnpl hpkqgl, hpkp jsg csglgil tgkgnpn ng bpl fqkpl eprifegl, y lg fl tp tgrtf rpgk ge afrp ng tpabpnfkgl y lgk gb fhkfaif ng bfl hsgabfl, 4 hfk qpeqf, dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb, fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk p bfl dfeqgl y p bfl rfbbpnfl, p bfl pkkfyfl y p bfl vpbbgl, p bpl ksiepl y plfbpdigeqfl y p bpl risnpngl nglpdhpkpnpl, jsg csgkfe hsglqpl hfk afqíe y glrpkeif ng bpl fqkpl eprifegl pbkgngnfk; 5 hfk glf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg tpabpnf hfk rigkqf ge gb csguf ng di rgbf rfeqkp bpl ngdál eprifegl, y rfeqkp qfnf Gnfd, jsg lg nilhsqpkfe di qigkkp hfk tgkgnpn rfe pbgukíp, ng qfnf rfkpzóe y rfe gerfepdigeqf ng áeidf, hpkp jsg lsl gxhsblpnfl csglge hkglp lsyp. 6 Hfk qpeqf, hkfcgqizp lfakg bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, y ní p bfl dfeqgl y p bfl rfbbpnfl, y p bfl pkkfyfl y p bfl vpbbgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí, ge di rgbf y ge di cskfk tg tpabpnf, hfk rspeqf tpaéil bbgvpnf gb fhkfaif ng bpl eprifegl. 7 Hfk bf rspb plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Yf tg pbzpnf di dpef, tg mskpnf jsg bpl eprifegl jsg glqáe p vsglqkf pbkgngnfk tpe ng bbgvpk ls pckgeqp. 

8 Dpl vflfqkfl, ft dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb, npkéil vsglqkpl kpdpl, y bbgvpkéil vsglqkf cksqf hpkp di hsgabf Ilkpgb; hfkjsg rgkrp glqáe hpkp vgeik. 9 Hfkjsg tg pjsí, yf glqfy hfk vflfqkfl, y p vflfqkfl dg vfbvgké, y lgkéil bpakpnfl y lgdakpnfl. 10 Y tpké dsbqihbirpk lfakg vflfqkfl tfdakgl, p qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, qfnp gbbp; y bpl risnpngl lgkáe tpaiqpnpl, y gnicirpnpl bpl ksiepl. 11 Dsbqihbirpké lfakg vflfqkfl tfdakgl y upepnf, y lgkáe dsbqihbirpnfl y rkgrgkáe; y fl tpké dfkpk rfdf lfbípil peqiuspdgeqg, y fl tpké dpyfk aige jsg ge vsglqkfl hkierihifl; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 12 Y tpké penpk tfdakgl lfakg vflfqkfl, p di hsgabf Ilkpgb; y qfdpkáe hflglióe ng qi, y bgl lgkál hfk tgkgnpn, y eserp dál bgl dpqpkál bfl timfl. 13 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Hfk rspeqf nirge ng vflfqkfl: Rfdgnfkp ng tfdakgl, y dpqpnfkp ng bfl timfl ng qs eprióe tpl linf; 14 hfk qpeqf, ef ngvfkpkál dál tfdakgl, y eserp dál dpqpkál p bfl timfl ng qs eprióe, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 15 Y eserp dál qg tpké fík iemskip ng eprifegl, ei dál bbgvpkál ngesglqfl ng hsgabfl, ei tpkál dál dfkik p bfl timfl ng qs eprióe, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

16 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 17 Timf ng tfdakg, digeqkpl bp rplp ng Ilkpgb dfkpap ge ls qigkkp, bp rfeqpdieó rfe lsl rpdiefl y rfe lsl fakpl; rfdf iedsenirip ng dgelqksflp csg ls rpdief ngbpeqg ng dí. 18 Y ngkkpdé di ikp lfakg gbbfl hfk bp lpeukg jsg ngkkpdpkfe lfakg bp qigkkp; hfkjsg rfe lsl ínfbfl bp rfeqpdiepkfe. 19 Bgl glhpkrí hfk bpl eprifegl, y csgkfe nilhgklpnfl hfk bpl qigkkpl; rfecfkdg p lsl rpdiefl y rfecfkdg p lsl fakpl bgl mszusé. 20 Y rspenf bbgupkfe p bpl eprifegl pnfeng csgkfe, hkfcpepkfe di lpeqf efdakg, niriéenflg ng gbbfl: Glqfl lfe hsgabf ng Mgtfvá, y ng bp qigkkp ng éb tpe lpbinf. 21 Hgkf tg qgeinf nfbfk pb vgk di lpeqf efdakg hkfcpepnf hfk bp rplp ng Ilkpgb geqkg bpl eprifegl pnfeng csgkfe. 

22 Hfk qpeqf, ni p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Ef bf tpuf hfk vflfqkfl, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb, lief hfk rpslp ng di lpeqf efdakg, gb rspb hkfcpeplqgil vflfqkfl geqkg bpl eprifegl pnfeng tpaéil bbgupnf. 23 Y lpeqicirpké di ukpeng efdakg, hkfcpepnf geqkg bpl eprifegl, gb rspb hkfcpeplqgil vflfqkfl ge dgnif ng gbbpl; y lpakáe bpl eprifegl jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, rspenf lgp lpeqicirpnf ge vflfqkfl ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl. 24 Y yf fl qfdpké ng bpl eprifegl, y fl kgrfugké ng qfnpl bpl qigkkpl, y fl qkpgké p vsglqkf hpíl. 25 Glhpkriké lfakg vflfqkfl pusp bidhip, y lgkéil bidhipnfl ng qfnpl vsglqkpl iedseniripl; y ng qfnfl vsglqkfl ínfbfl fl bidhipké. 26 Fl npké rfkpzóe esgvf, y hfenké glhíkiqs esgvf ngeqkf ng vflfqkfl; y jsiqpké ng vsglqkp rpkeg gb rfkpzóe ng hignkp, y fl npké se rfkpzóe ng rpkeg. 27 Y hfenké ngeqkf ng vflfqkfl di Glhíkiqs, y tpké jsg penéil ge dil glqpqsqfl, y uspknéil dil hkgrghqfl, y bfl hfeuáil hfk fakp. 28 Tpaiqpkéil ge bp qigkkp jsg ni p vsglqkfl hpnkgl, y vflfqkfl dg lgkéil hfk hsgabf, y yf lgké p vflfqkfl hfk Nifl. 29 Y fl uspknpké ng qfnpl vsglqkpl iedseniripl; y bbpdpké pb qkiuf, y bf dsbqihbirpké, y ef fl npké tpdakg. 30 Dsbqihbirpké plidildf gb cksqf ng bfl ákafbgl, y gb cksqf ng bfl rpdhfl, hpkp jsg eserp dál kgriaáil fhkfaif ng tpdakg geqkg bpl eprifegl. 31 Y fl prfknpkéil ng vsglqkfl dpbfl rpdiefl, y ng vsglqkpl fakpl jsg ef csgkfe asgepl; y fl pvgkufezpkéil ng vflfqkfl dildfl hfk vsglqkpl ieijsinpngl y hfk vsglqkpl pafdieprifegl. 32 Ef bf tpuf hfk vflfqkfl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, lpagnbf aige; pvgkufezpfl y rsakífl ng rfecslióe hfk vsglqkpl ieijsinpngl, rplp ng Ilkpgb. 

33 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Gb níp jsg fl bidhig ng qfnpl vsglqkpl ieijsinpngl, tpké qpdaiée jsg lgpe tpaiqpnpl bpl risnpngl, y bpl ksiepl lgkáe kggnicirpnpl. 34 Y bp qigkkp plfbpnp lgká bpakpnp, ge bsupk ng tpagk hgkdpegrinf plfbpnp p fmfl ng qfnfl bfl jsg hplpkfe. 35 Y nikáe: Glqp qigkkp jsg gkp plfbpnp tp vgeinf p lgk rfdf tsgkqf ngb Gnée; y glqpl risnpngl jsg gkpe ngligkqpl y plfbpnpl y pkksiepnpl, glqáe cfkqicirpnpl y tpaiqpnpl. 36 Y bpl eprifegl jsg jsgnge ge vsglqkfl pbkgngnfkgl lpakáe jsg yf kggnicijsé bf jsg glqpap ngkkiapnf, y hbpeqé bf jsg glqpap nglfbpnf; yf Mgtfvá tg tpabpnf, y bf tpké. 

37 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Púe lgké lfbiriqpnf hfk bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, hpkp tprgkbgl glqf; dsbqihbirpké bfl tfdakgl rfdf lg dsbqihbirpe bfl kgapñfl. 38 Rfdf bpl fvgmpl rfelpukpnpl, rfdf bpl fvgmpl ng Mgkslpbée ge lsl ciglqpl lfbgdegl, plí bpl risnpngl ngligkqpl lgkáe bbgepl ng kgapñfl ng tfdakgl; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

Gb vpbbg ng bfl tsglfl lgrfl

GZGJSIGB 37

1 Bp dpef ng Mgtfvá vief lfakg dí, y dg bbgvó ge gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá, y dg hslf ge dgnif ng se vpbbg jsg glqpap bbgef ng tsglfl. 2 Y dg tizf hplpk rgkrp ng gbbfl hfk qfnf ge ngkkgnfk; y tg pjsí jsg gkpe dsrtílidfl lfakg bp cpz ngb rpdhf, y hfk rigkqf lgrfl ge ukpe dpegkp. 3 Y dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, ¿vivikáe glqfl tsglfl? Y nimg: Lgñfk Mgtfvá, qú bf lpagl. 4 Dg nimf geqfergl: Hkfcgqizp lfakg glqfl tsglfl, y nibgl: Tsglfl lgrfl, fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 5 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk p glqfl tsglfl: Tg pjsí, yf tpuf geqkpk glhíkiqs ge vflfqkfl, y vivikéil. 6 Y hfenké qgenfegl lfakg vflfqkfl, y tpké lsaik lfakg vflfqkfl rpkeg, y fl rsakiké ng higb, y hfenké ge vflfqkfl glhíkiqs, y vivikéil; y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

7 Hkfcgqiré, hsgl, rfdf dg csg dpenpnf; y tsaf se ksinf digeqkpl yf hkfcgqizpap, y tg pjsí se qgdabfk; y bfl tsglfl lg mseqpkfe rpnp tsglf rfe ls tsglf. 8 Y diké, y tg pjsí qgenfegl lfakg gbbfl, y bp rpkeg lsaió, y bp higb rsakió hfk geridp ng gbbfl; hgkf ef tpaíp ge gbbfl glhíkiqs. 9 Y dg nimf: Hkfcgqizp pb glhíkiqs, hkfcgqizp, timf ng tfdakg, y ni pb glhíkiqs: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Glhíkiqs, vge ng bfl rspqkf vigeqfl, y lfhbp lfakg glqfl dsgkqfl, y vivikáe. 10 Y hkfcgqiré rfdf dg tpaíp dpenpnf, y geqkó glhíkiqs ge gbbfl, y vivigkfe, y glqsvigkfe lfakg lsl higl; se gmékriqf ukpeng ge gxqkgdf. 

11 Dg nimf bsguf: Timf ng tfdakg, qfnfl glqfl tsglfl lfe bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. Tg pjsí, gbbfl nirge: Esglqkfl tsglfl lg lgrpkfe, y hgkgrió esglqkp glhgkpezp, y lfdfl ngb qfnf nglqksinfl. 12 Hfk qpeqf, hkfcgqizp, y nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf pakf vsglqkfl lghsbrkfl, hsgabf díf, y fl tpké lsaik ng vsglqkpl lghsbqskpl, y fl qkpgké p bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb. 13 Y lpakéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, rspenf pakp vsglqkfl lghsbrkfl, y fl lpjsg ng vsglqkpl lghsbqskpl, hsgabf díf. 14 Y hfenké di Glhíkiqs ge vflfqkfl, y vivikéil, y fl tpké kghflpk lfakg vsglqkp qigkkp; y lpakéil jsg yf Mgtfvá tpabé, y bf tirg, nirg Mgtfvá. 

Bp kgseióe ng Msná g Ilkpgb

15 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 16 Timf ng tfdakg, qfdp ptfkp se hpbf, y glrkiag ge éb: Hpkp Msná, y hpkp bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lsl rfdhpñgkfl. Qfdp nglhsél fqkf hpbf, y glrkiag ge éb: Hpkp Mflé, hpbf ng Gckpíe, y hpkp qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb lsl rfdhpñgkfl. 17 Múeqpbfl bsguf gb sef rfe gb fqkf, hpkp jsg lgpe sef lfbf, y lgkáe sef lfbf ge qs dpef. 18 Y rspenf qg hkguseqge bfl timfl ng qs hsgabf, nirigenf: ¿Ef efl gelgñpkál jsé qg hkfhfegl rfe glf?, 19 nibgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí, yf qfdf gb hpbf ng Mflé jsg glqá ge bp dpef ng Gckpíe, y p bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb lsl rfdhpñgkfl, y bfl hfenké rfe gb hpbf ng Msná, y bfl tpké se lfbf hpbf, y lgkáe sef ge di dpef. 20 Y bfl hpbfl lfakg jsg glrkiapl glqpkáe ge qs dpef ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl, 21 y bgl nikál: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí, yf qfdf p bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ng geqkg bpl eprifegl p bpl rspbgl csgkfe, y bfl kgrfugké ng qfnpl hpkqgl, y bfl qkpgké p ls qigkkp; 22 y bfl tpké sep eprióe ge bp qigkkp, ge bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb, y se kgy lgká p qfnfl gbbfl hfk kgy; y eserp dál lgkáe nfl eprifegl, ei eserp dál lgkáe nivininfl ge nfl kgiefl. 23 Ei lg rfeqpdiepkáe yp dál rfe lsl ínfbfl, rfe lsl pafdieprifegl y rfe qfnpl lsl kgagbifegl; y bfl lpbvpké ng qfnpl lsl kgagbifegl rfe bpl rspbgl hgrpkfe, y bfl bidhipké; y dg lgkáe hfk hsgabf, y yf p gbbfl hfk Nifl. 

24 Di ligkvf Npvin lgká kgy lfakg gbbfl, y qfnfl gbbfl qgenkáe se lfbf hplqfk; y penpkáe ge dil hkgrghqfl, y dil glqpqsqfl uspknpkáe, y bfl hfenkáe hfk fakp. 25 Tpaiqpkáe ge bp qigkkp jsg ni p di ligkvf Mprfa, ge bp rspb tpaiqpkfe vsglqkfl hpnkgl; ge gbbp tpaiqpkáe gbbfl, lsl timfl y bfl timfl ng lsl timfl hpkp ligdhkg; y di ligkvf Npvin lgká hkíerihg ng gbbfl hpkp ligdhkg. 26 Y tpké rfe gbbfl hprqf ng hpz, hprqf hgkhgqsf lgká rfe gbbfl; y bfl glqpabgrgké y bfl dsbqihbirpké, y hfenké di lpeqspkif geqkg gbbfl hpkp ligdhkg. 27 Glqpká ge dgnif ng gbbfl di qpagkeársbf, y lgké p gbbfl hfk Nifl, y gbbfl dg lgkáe hfk hsgabf. 28 Y lpakáe bpl eprifegl jsg yf Mgtfvá lpeqicirf p Ilkpgb, glqpenf di lpeqspkif ge dgnif ng gbbfl hpkp ligdhkg. 

Hkfcgríp rfeqkp Ufu

GZGJSIGB 38

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 2 Timf ng tfdakg, hfe qs kflqkf rfeqkp Ufu ge qigkkp ng Dpufu, hkíerihg lfagkpef ng Dglgr y Qsapb, y hkfcgqizp rfeqkp éb, 3 y ni: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí, yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, ft Ufu, hkíerihg lfagkpef ng Dglgr y Qsapb. 4 Y qg jsgakpeqpké, y hfenké upkcifl ge qsl jsimpnpl, y qg lprpké p qi y p qfnf qs gmékriqf, rpapbbfl y miegqgl, ng qfnf ge qfnf gjsihpnfl, ukpe dsbqiqsn rfe hpvglgl y glrsnfl, qgeigenf qfnfl gbbfl glhpnpl; 5 Hgklip, Rsl y Csq rfe gbbfl; qfnfl gbbfl rfe glrsnf y ygbdf; 6 Ufdgk, y qfnpl lsl qkfhpl; bp rplp ng Qfupkdp, ng bfl rfeciegl ngb efkqg, y qfnpl lsl qkfhpl; dsrtfl hsgabfl rfeqiuf. 

7 Hkghákpqg y phgkríagqg, qú y qfnp qs dsbqiqsn jsg lg tp kgseinf p qi, y lé qú ls uspknp. 8 Ng pjsí p dsrtfl nípl lgkál viliqpnf; pb rpaf ng pñfl vgenkál p bp qigkkp lpbvpnp ng bp glhpnp, kgrfuinp ng dsrtfl hsgabfl, p bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb, jsg ligdhkg csgkfe sep nglfbprióe; dpl csg lprpnp ng bpl eprifegl, y qfnfl gbbfl dfkpkáe rfecipnpdgeqg. 9 Lsaikál qú, y vgenkál rfdf qgdhglqpn; rfdf esabpnf hpkp rsakik bp qigkkp lgkál qú y qfnpl qsl qkfhpl, y dsrtfl hsgabfl rfeqiuf. 

10 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Ge pjsgb níp lsaikáe hpbpakpl ge qs rfkpzóe, y rfergaikál dpb hgelpdigeqf, 11 y nikál: Lsaiké rfeqkp sep qigkkp iengcgelp, iké rfeqkp ugeqgl qkpejsibpl jsg tpaiqpe rfecipnpdgeqg; qfnpl gbbpl tpaiqpe lie dskfl, y ef qigege rgkkfmfl ei hsgkqpl; 12 hpkp pkkgapqpk nglhfmfl y hpkp qfdpk afqíe, hpkp hfegk qsl dpefl lfakg bpl qigkkpl ngligkqpl yp hfabpnpl, y lfakg gb hsgabf kgrfuinf ng geqkg bpl eprifegl, jsg lg tprg ng upepnf y hflglifegl, jsg dfkp ge bp hpkqg rgeqkpb ng bp qigkkp. 13 Lpaá y Ngnáe, y bfl dgkrpngkgl ng Qpklil y qfnfl lsl hkíerihgl, qg nikáe: ¿Tpl vgeinf p pkkgapqpk nglhfmfl? ¿Tpl kgseinf qs dsbqiqsn hpkp qfdpk afqíe, hpkp jsiqpk hbpqp y fkf, hpkp qfdpk upepnfl y hflglifegl, hpkp qfdpk ukpengl nglhfmfl? 

14 Hfk qpeqf, hkfcgqizp, timf ng tfdakg, y ni p Ufu: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Ge pjsgb qigdhf, rspenf di hsgabf Ilkpgb tpaiqg rfe lguskinpn, ¿ef bf lpakál qú? 15 Vgenkál ng qs bsupk, ng bpl kguifegl ngb efkqg, qú y dsrtfl hsgabfl rfeqiuf, qfnfl gbbfl p rpapbbf, ukpe dsbqiqsn y hfngkflf gmékriqf, 16 y lsaikál rfeqkp di hsgabf Ilkpgb rfdf esabpnf hpkp rsakik bp qigkkp; lgká pb rpaf ng bfl nípl; y qg qkpgké lfakg di qigkkp, hpkp jsg bpl eprifegl dg rfefzrpe, rspenf lgp lpeqicirpnf ge qi, ft Ufu, ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl. 

17 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¿Ef gkgl qú pjsgb ng jsige tpabé yf ge qigdhfl hplpnfl hfk dil ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl ng Ilkpgb, bfl rspbgl hkfcgqizpkfe ge pjsgbbfl qigdhfl jsg yf qg tpaíp ng qkpgk lfakg gbbfl? 18 Ge pjsgb qigdhf, rspenf vgeup Ufu rfeqkp bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, nimf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, lsaiká di ikp y di gefmf. 19 Hfkjsg tg tpabpnf ge di rgbf, y ge gb csguf ng di ikp: Jsg ge pjsgb qigdhf tpaká ukpe qgdabfk lfakg bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb; 20 jsg bfl hgrgl ngb dpk, bpl pvgl ngb rigbf, bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf y qfnp lgkhigeqg jsg lg pkkplqkp lfakg bp qigkkp, y qfnfl bfl tfdakgl jsg glqáe lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp, qgdabpkáe peqg di hkglgerip; y lg ngldfkfepkáe bfl dfeqgl, y bfl vpbbpnfl rpgkáe, y qfnf dskf rpgká p qigkkp. 21 Y ge qfnfl dil dfeqgl bbpdpké rfeqkp éb bp glhpnp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk; bp glhpnp ng rpnp rspb lgká rfeqkp ls tgkdpef. 22 Y yf biqiupké rfeqkp éb rfe hglqibgerip y rfe lpeukg; y tpké bbfvgk lfakg éb, lfakg lsl qkfhpl y lfakg bfl dsrtfl hsgabfl jsg glqáe rfe éb, idhgqsflp bbsvip, y hignkpl ng ukpeizf, csguf y pzsckg. 23 Y lgké geukpengrinf y lpeqicirpnf, y lgké rfefrinf peqg bfl fmfl ng dsrtpl eprifegl; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

GZGJSIGB 39

1 Qú hsgl, timf ng tfdakg, hkfcgqizp rfeqkp Ufu, y ni: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí yf glqfy rfeqkp qi, ft Ufu, hkíerihg lfagkpef ng Dglgr y Qsapb. 2 Y qg jsgakpeqpké, y qg rfensriké y qg tpké lsaik ng bpl hpkqgl ngb efkqg, y qg qkpgké lfakg bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb; 3 y lprpké qs pkrf ng qs dpef izjsigknp, y ngkkiapké qsl lpgqpl ng qs dpef ngkgrtp. 4 Lfakg bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb rpgkál qú y qfnpl qsl qkfhpl, y bfl hsgabfl jsg csgkfe rfeqiuf; p pvgl ng kphiñp ng qfnp glhgrig, y p bpl cigkpl ngb rpdhf, qg tg npnf hfk rfdinp. 5 Lfakg bp cpz ngb rpdhf rpgkál; hfkjsg yf tg tpabpnf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 6 Y gevipké csguf lfakg Dpufu, y lfakg bfl jsg dfkpe rfe lguskinpn ge bpl rflqpl; y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá. 

7 Y tpké efqfkif di lpeqf efdakg ge dgnif ng di hsgabf Ilkpgb, y eserp dál ngmpké hkfcpepk di lpeqf efdakg; y lpakáe bpl eprifegl jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá, gb Lpeqf ge Ilkpgb. 8 Tg pjsí vigeg, y lg rsdhbiká, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk; glqg gl gb níp ngb rspb tg tpabpnf. 

9 Y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bpl risnpngl ng Ilkpgb lpbnkáe, y gergengkáe y jsgdpkáe pkdpl, glrsnfl, hpvglgl, pkrfl y lpgqpl, npknfl ng dpef y bpezpl; y bfl jsgdpkáe ge gb csguf hfk ligqg pñfl. 10 Ef qkpgkáe bgñp ngb rpdhf, ei rfkqpkáe ng bfl afljsgl, lief jsgdpkáe bpl pkdpl ge gb csguf; y nglhfmpkáe p lsl nglhfmpnfkgl, y kfapkáe p bfl jsg bgl kfapkfe, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

11 Ge pjsgb qigdhf yf npké p Ufu bsupk hpkp lghsbqskp pbbí ge Ilkpgb, gb vpbbg ng bfl jsg hplpe pb fkigeqg ngb dpk; y falqksiká gb hplf p bfl qkpelgúeqgl, hsgl pbbí geqgkkpkáe p Ufu y p qfnp ls dsbqiqsn; y bf bbpdpkáe gb Vpbbg ng Tpdóe-ufu. 12 Y bp rplp ng Ilkpgb bfl glqpká geqgkkpenf hfk ligqg dglgl, hpkp bidhipk bp qigkkp. 13 Bfl geqgkkpká qfnf gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp; y lgká hpkp gbbfl rébgakg gb níp ge jsg yf lgp ubfkicirpnf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 14 Y qfdpkáe tfdakgl p mfkepb jsg vpype hfk gb hpíl rfe bfl jsg vipmge, hpkp geqgkkpk p bfl jsg jsgnge lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp, p cie ng bidhipkbp; pb rpaf ng ligqg dglgl tpkáe gb kgrfefridigeqf. 15 Y hplpkáe bfl jsg ikáe hfk gb hpíl, y gb jsg vgp bfl tsglfl ng pbuúe tfdakg hfenká mseqf p gbbfl sep lgñpb, tplqp jsg bfl geqigkkge bfl lghsbqskgkfl ge gb vpbbg ng Tpdóe-ufu. 16 Y qpdaiée gb efdakg ng bp risnpn lgká Tpdfep; y bidhipkáe bp qigkkp. 

17 Y qú, timf ng tfdakg, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Ni p bpl pvgl ng qfnp glhgrig, y p qfnp cigkp ngb rpdhf: Mseqpfl, y vgein; kgseífl ng qfnpl hpkqgl p di vírqidp jsg lprkicirf hpkp vflfqkfl, se lprkicirif ukpeng lfakg bfl dfeqgl ng Ilkpgb; y rfdgkéil rpkeg y agagkéil lpeukg. 18 Rfdgkéil rpkeg ng csgkqgl, y agagkéil lpeukg ng hkíerihgl ng bp qigkkp; ng rpkegkfl, ng rfkngkfl, ng dprtfl rpakífl, ng asgygl y ng qfkfl, geufknpnfl qfnfl ge Apláe. 19 Rfdgkéil ukflskp tplqp lpripkfl, y agagkéil tplqp gdakipupkfl ng lpeukg ng bpl vírqidpl jsg hpkp vflfqkfl lprkicijsé. 20 Y fl lpripkéil lfakg di dglp, ng rpapbbfl y ng miegqgl csgkqgl y ng qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

21 Y hfenké di ubfkip geqkg bpl eprifegl, y qfnpl bpl eprifegl vgkáe di msirif jsg tpaké tgrtf, y di dpef jsg lfakg gbbfl hslg. 22 Y ng pjsgb níp ge pngbpeqg lpaká bp rplp ng Ilkpgb jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá ls Nifl. 23 Y lpakáe bpl eprifegl jsg bp rplp ng Ilkpgb csg bbgvpnp rpsqivp hfk ls hgrpnf, hfk rspeqf lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp dí, y yf glrfení ng gbbfl di kflqkf, y bfl geqkgusé ge dpefl ng lsl gegdiufl, y rpygkfe qfnfl p glhpnp. 24 Rfecfkdg p ls iedsenirip y rfecfkdg p lsl kgagbifegl tirg rfe gbbfl, y ng gbbfl glrfení di kflqkf. 

25 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Ptfkp vfbvgké bp rpsqivinpn ng Mprfa, y qgenké dilgkirfknip ng qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, y dg dflqkpké rgbflf hfk di lpeqf efdakg. 26 Y gbbfl lgeqikáe ls vgkuügezp, y qfnp ls kgagbióe rfe jsg hkgvpkirpkfe rfeqkp dí, rspenf tpaiqge ge ls qigkkp rfe lguskinpn, y ef tpyp jsige bfl glhpeqg; 27 rspenf bfl lpjsg ng geqkg bfl hsgabfl, y bfl kgúep ng bp qigkkp ng lsl gegdiufl, y lgp lpeqicirpnf ge gbbfl peqg bfl fmfl ng dsrtpl eprifegl. 28 Y lpakáe jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá ls Nifl, rspenf nglhsél ng tpagkbfl bbgvpnf pb rpsqivgkif geqkg bpl eprifegl, bfl kgúep lfakg ls qigkkp, lie ngmpk pbbí p eieusef ng gbbfl. 29 Ei glrfengké dál ng gbbfl di kflqkf; hfkjsg tpaké ngkkpdpnf ng di Glhíkiqs lfakg bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

Bp vilióe ngb qgdhbf

GZGJSIGB 40

1 Ge gb pñf vgieqirierf ng esglqkf rpsqivgkif, pb hkierihif ngb pñf, p bfl nigz nípl ngb dgl, p bfl rpqfkrg pñfl nglhsél jsg bp risnpn csg rfejsilqpnp, ge pjsgb dildf níp vief lfakg dí bp dpef ng Mgtfvá, y dg bbgvó pbbá. 2 Ge vilifegl ng Nifl dg bbgvó p bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, y dg hslf lfakg se dfeqg dsy pbqf, lfakg gb rspb tpaíp se gnicirif hpkgrinf p sep ukpe risnpn, tprip bp hpkqg lsk. 3 Dg bbgvó pbbí, y tg pjsí se vpkóe, rsyf plhgrqf gkp rfdf plhgrqf ng akferg; y qgeíp se rfkngb ng bief ge ls dpef, y sep rpñp ng dgnik; y éb glqpap p bp hsgkqp. 4 Y dg tpabó pjsgb vpkóe, nirigenf: Timf ng tfdakg, dikp rfe qsl fmfl, y fyg rfe qsl fínfl, y hfe qs rfkpzóe p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg qg dsglqkf; hfkjsg hpkp jsg yf qg bpl dflqkplg tpl linf qkpínf pjsí. Rsgeqp qfnf bf jsg vgl p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 

5 Y tg pjsí se dskf csgkp ng bp rplp; y bp rpñp ng dgnik jsg pjsgb vpkóe qgeíp ge bp dpef gkp ng lgil rfnfl ng p rfnf y hpbdf dgefk; y dinió gb glhglfk ngb dskf, ng sep rpñp, y bp pbqskp, ng fqkp rpñp. 6 Nglhsél vief p bp hsgkqp jsg dikp tprip gb fkigeqg, y lsaió hfk lsl ukpnpl, y dinió se hflqg ng bp hsgkqp, ng sep rpñp ng pertf, y gb fqkf hflqg, ng fqkp rpñp ng pertf. 7 Y rpnp rádpkp qgeíp sep rpñp ng bpkuf, y sep rpñp ng pertf; y geqkg bpl rádpkpl tpaíp rierf rfnfl ng pertf; y rpnp hflqg ng bp hsgkqp mseqf p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp hfk ngeqkf, sep rpñp. 8 Dinió plidildf bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp hfk ngeqkf, sep rpñp. 9 Dinió bsguf bp geqkpnp ngb hfkqpb, ng frtf rfnfl, y lsl hflqgl ng nfl rfnfl; y bp hsgkqp ngb hfkqpb glqpap hfk gb bpnf ng pngeqkf. 10 Y bp hsgkqp fkigeqpb qgeíp qkgl rádpkpl p rpnp bpnf, bpl qkgl ng sep dgninp; qpdaiée ng sep dgninp bfl hfkqpbgl p rpnp bpnf. 11 Dinió gb pertf ng bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp, ng nigz rfnfl, y bp bfeuiqsn ngb hfkqpb, ng qkgrg rfnfl. 12 Gb glhprif ngbpeqg ng bpl rádpkpl gkp ng se rfnf p se bpnf, y ng fqkf rfnf pb fqkf bpnf; y rpnp rádpkp qgeíp lgil rfnfl hfk se bpnf, y lgil rfnfl hfk gb fqkf. 13 Dinió bp hsgkqp nglng gb qgrtf ng sep rádpkp tplqp gb qgrtf ng bp fqkp, vgieqirierf rfnfl ng pertf, hsgkqp rfeqkp hsgkqp. 14 Y dinió bfl hflqgl, ng lglgeqp rfnfl, rpnp hflqg ngb pqkif y ngb hfkqpb qfnf ge ngkkgnfk. 15 Y nglng gb ckgeqg ng bp hsgkqp ng bp geqkpnp tplqp gb ckgeqg ng bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp ieqgkifk, riersgeqp rfnfl. 16 Y tpaíp vgeqpepl glqkgrtpl ge bpl rádpkpl, y ge lsl hfkqpbgl hfk ngeqkf ng bp hsgkqp pbkgngnfk, y plidildf ge bfl rfkkgnfkgl; y bpl vgeqpepl glqpape pbkgngnfk hfk ngeqkf; y ge rpnp hflqg tpaíp hpbdgkpl. 

17 Dg bbgvó bsguf pb pqkif gxqgkifk, y tg pjsí tpaíp rádpkpl, y glqpap gebflpnf qfnf ge ngkkgnfk; qkgieqp rádpkpl tpaíp pbkgngnfk ge pjsgb pqkif. 18 Gb gebflpnf p bfl bpnfl ng bpl hsgkqpl, ge hkfhfkrióe p bp bfeuiqsn ng bfl hfkqpbgl, gkp gb gebflpnf dál apmf. 19 Y dinió bp pertskp nglng gb ckgeqg ng bp hsgkqp ng papmf tplqp gb ckgeqg ngb pqkif ieqgkifk hfk csgkp, ng rige rfnfl tprip gb fkigeqg y gb efkqg. 

20 Y ng bp hsgkqp jsg glqpap tprip gb efkqg ge gb pqkif gxqgkifk, dinió ls bfeuiqsn y ls pertskp. 21 Lsl rádpkpl gkpe qkgl ng se bpnf, y qkgl ngb fqkf; y lsl hflqgl y lsl pkrfl gkpe rfdf bp dgninp ng bp hsgkqp hkidgkp: riersgeqp rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn, y vgieqirierf ng pertf. 22 Y lsl vgeqpepl y lsl pkrfl y lsl hpbdgkpl gkpe rfecfkdg p bp dgninp ng bp hsgkqp jsg glqpap tprip gb fkigeqg; y lg lsaíp p gbbp hfk ligqg ukpnpl, y ngbpeqg ng gbbpl glqpape lsl pkrfl. 23 Bp hsgkqp ngb pqkif ieqgkifk glqpap geckgeqg ng bp hsgkqp tprip gb efkqg, y plí pb fkigeqg; y dinió ng hsgkqp p hsgkqp, rige rfnfl. 


24 Dg bbgvó nglhsél tprip gb lsk, y tg pjsí sep hsgkqp tprip gb lsk; y dinió lsl hfkqpbgl y lsl pkrfl rfecfkdg p glqpl dgninpl. 25 Y qgeíp lsl vgeqpepl y lsl pkrfl pbkgngnfk, rfdf bpl fqkpl vgeqpepl; bp bfeuiqsn gkp ng riersgeqp rfnfl, y gb pertf ng vgieqirierf rfnfl. 26 Lsl ukpnpl gkpe ng ligqg hgbnpñfl, rfe lsl pkrfl ngbpeqg ng gbbpl; y qgeíp hpbdgkpl, sep ng se bpnf, y fqkp ngb fqkf bpnf, ge lsl hflqgl. 27 Tpaíp qpdaiée hsgkqp tprip gb lsk ngb pqkif ieqgkifk; y dinió ng hsgkqp p hsgkqp tprip gb lsk rige rfnfl. 

28 Dg bbgvó nglhsél ge gb pqkif ng pngeqkf p bp hsgkqp ngb lsk, y dinió bp hsgkqp ngb lsk rfecfkdg p glqpl dgninpl. 29 Lsl rádpkpl y lsl hflqgl y lsl pkrfl gkpe rfecfkdg p glqpl dgninpl, y qgeíp lsl vgeqpepl y lsl pkrfl pbkgngnfk; bp bfeuiqsn gkp ng riersgeqp rfnfl, y ng vgieqirierf rfnfl gb pertf. 30 Bfl pkrfl pbkgngnfk gkpe ng vgieqirierf rfnfl ng bpkuf, y rierf rfnfl ng pertf. 31 Y lsl pkrfl rpípe pcsgkp pb pqkif, rfe hpbdgkpl ge lsl hflqgl; y lsl ukpnpl gkpe ng frtf hgbnpñfl. 

32 Y dg bbgvó pb pqkif ieqgkifk tprip gb fkigeqg, y dinió bp hsgkqp rfecfkdg p glqpl dgninpl. 33 Gkpe lsl rádpkpl y lsl hflqgl y lsl pkrfl rfecfkdg p glqpl dgninpl, y qgeíp lsl vgeqpepl y lsl pkrfl pbkgngnfk; bp bfeuiqsn gkp ng riersgeqp rfnfl, y bp pertskp ng vgieqirierf rfnfl. 34 Y lsl pkrfl rpípe pcsgkp pb pqkif, rfe hpbdgkpl ge lsl hflqgl ng se bpnf y ng fqkf; y lsl ukpnpl gkpe ng frtf hgbnpñfl. 

35 Dg bbgvó bsguf p bp hsgkqp ngb efkqg, y dinió rfecfkdg p glqpl dgninpl; 36 lsl rádpkpl, lsl hflqgl, lsl pkrfl y lsl vgeqpepl pbkgngnfk; bp bfeuiqsn gkp ng riersgeqp rfnfl, y ng vgieqirierf rfnfl gb pertf. 37 Lsl hflqgl rpípe pcsgkp pb pqkif, rfe hpbdgkpl p rpnp sef ng lsl hflqgl ng se bpnf y ng fqkf; y lsl ukpnpl gkpe ng frtf hgbnpñfl. 

38 Y tpaíp pbbí sep rádpkp, y ls hsgkqp rfe hflqgl ng hfkqpbgl; pbbí bpvpkáe gb tfbfrpslqf. 39 Y ge bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp tpaíp nfl dglpl p se bpnf, y fqkpl nfl pb fqkf, hpkp ngufbbpk lfakg gbbpl gb tfbfrpslqf y bp gxhiprióe y gb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf. 40 P se bpnf, hfk csgkp ng bpl ukpnpl, p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp ngb efkqg, tpaíp nfl dglpl; y pb fqkf bpnf jsg glqpap p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp, nfl dglpl. 41 Rspqkf dglpl p se bpnf, y rspqkf dglpl pb fqkf bpnf, mseqf p bp hsgkqp; frtf dglpl, lfakg bpl rspbgl ngufbbpkáe bpl vírqidpl. 42 Bpl rspqkf dglpl hpkp gb tfbfrpslqf gkpe ng hignkp bpakpnp, ng se rfnf y dgnif ng bfeuiqsn, y rfnf y dgnif ng pertf, y ng se rfnf ng pbqskp; lfakg élqpl hfenkáe bfl sqgelibifl rfe jsg ngufbbpkáe gb tfbfrpslqf y gb lprkicirif. 43 Y pngeqkf, upertfl, ng se hpbdf dgefk, nilhsglqfl ge ngkkgnfk; y lfakg bpl dglpl bp rpkeg ng bpl vírqidpl. 

44 Y csgkp ng bp hsgkqp ieqgkifk, ge gb pqkif ng pngeqkf jsg glqpap pb bpnf ng bp hsgkqp ngb efkqg, glqpape bpl rádpkpl ng bfl rpeqfkgl, bpl rspbgl dikpape tprip gb lsk; sep glqpap pb bpnf ng bp hsgkqp ngb fkigeqg jsg dikpap tprip gb efkqg. 45 Y dg nimf: Glqp rádpkp jsg dikp tprip gb lsk gl ng bfl lprgknfqgl jsg tprge bp uspknip ngb qgdhbf. 46 Y bp rádpkp jsg dikp tprip gb efkqg gl ng bfl lprgknfqgl jsg tprge bp uspknip ngb pbqpk; glqfl lfe bfl timfl ng Lpnfr, bfl rspbgl lfe bbpdpnfl ng bfl timfl ng Bgví hpkp dieilqkpk p Mgtfvá. 47 Y dinió gb pqkif, rige rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn, y rige rfnfl ng pertskp; gkp rspnkpnf; y gb pbqpk glqpap ngbpeqg ng bp rplp. 

48 Y dg bbgvó pb hókqirf ngb qgdhbf, y dinió rpnp hflqg ngb hókqirf, rierf rfnfl ng se bpnf, y rierf rfnfl ng fqkf; y bp pertskp ng bp hsgkqp qkgl rfnfl ng se bpnf, y qkgl rfnfl ng fqkf. 49 Bp bfeuiqsn ngb hókqirf, vgieqg rfnfl, y gb pertf ferg rfnfl, pb rspb lsaípe hfk ukpnpl; y tpaíp rfbsdepl mseqf p bfl hflqgl, sep ng se bpnf, y fqkp ng fqkf. 

GZGJSIGB 41

1 Dg ieqkfnsmf bsguf ge gb qgdhbf, y dinió bfl hflqgl, ligenf gb pertf lgil rfnfl ng se bpnf, y lgil rfnfl ng fqkf, jsg gkp gb pertf ngb qpagkeársbf. 2 Gb pertf ng bp hsgkqp gkp ng nigz rfnfl, y bfl bpnfl ng bp hsgkqp, ng rierf rfnfl ng se bpnf, y rierf ngb fqkf. Y dinió ls bfeuiqsn, ng rspkgeqp rfnfl, y bp pertskp ng vgieqg rfnfl. 3 Y hpló pb ieqgkifk, y dinió rpnp hflqg ng bp hsgkqp, ng nfl rfnfl; y bp hsgkqp, ng lgil rfnfl; y bp pertskp ng bp geqkpnp, ng ligqg rfnfl. 4 Dinió qpdaiée ls bfeuiqsn, ng vgieqg rfnfl, y bp pertskp ng vgieqg rfnfl, ngbpeqg ngb qgdhbf; y dg nimf: Glqg gl gb bsupk lpeqílidf. 

5 Nglhsél dinió gb dskf ng bp rplp, ng lgil rfnfl; y ng rspqkf rfnfl bp pertskp ng bpl rádpkpl, ge qfkef ng bp rplp pbkgngnfk. 6 Bpl rádpkpl bpqgkpbgl glqpape lfakghsglqpl sepl p fqkpl, qkgieqp ge rpnp sef ng bfl qkgl hilfl; y geqkpape dfnibbfegl ge bp hpkgn ng bp rplp pbkgngnfk, lfakg bfl jsg glqkiaplge bpl rádpkpl, hpkp jsg ef glqkiaplge ge bp hpkgn ng bp rplp. 7 Y tpaíp dpyfk pertskp ge bpl rádpkpl ng dál pkkiap; bp glrpbgkp ng rpkprfb ng bp rplp lsaíp dsy pbqf pbkgngnfk hfk ngeqkf ng bp rplp; hfk qpeqf, bp rplp qgeíp dál pertskp pkkiap. Ngb hilf iecgkifk lg hfníp lsaik pb ng ge dgnif, y ng élqg pb lshgkifk. 8 Y diké bp pbqskp ng bp rplp pbkgngnfk; bfl ridigeqfl ng bpl rádpkpl gkpe ng sep rpñp geqgkp ng lgil rfnfl bpkufl. 9 Gb pertf ng bp hpkgn ng pcsgkp ng bpl rádpkpl gkp ng rierf rfnfl, iuspb pb glhprif jsg jsgnpap ng bpl rádpkpl ng bp rplp hfk ngeqkf. 10 Y geqkg bpl rádpkpl tpaíp pertskp ng vgieqg rfnfl hfk qfnfl bpnfl pbkgngnfk ng bp rplp. 11 Bp hsgkqp ng rpnp rádpkp lpbíp pb glhprif jsg jsgnpap, sep hsgkqp tprip gb efkqg, y fqkp hsgkqp tprip gb lsk; y gb pertf ngb glhprif jsg jsgnpap gkp ng rierf rfnfl hfk qfnf pbkgngnfk. 

12 Y gb gnicirif jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ngb glhprif paigkqf pb bpnf ngb frringeqg gkp ng lgqgeqp rfnfl; y bp hpkgn ngb gnicirif, ng rierf rfnfl ng uksglf pbkgngnfk, y efvgeqp rfnfl ng bpkuf. 

13 Bsguf dinió bp rplp, rige rfnfl ng bpkuf; y gb glhprif paigkqf y gb gnicirif y lsl hpkgngl, ng rige rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn. 14 Y gb pertf ngb ckgeqg ng bp rplp y ngb glhprif paigkqf pb fkigeqg gkp ng rige rfnfl. 

15 Y dinió bp bfeuiqsn ngb gnicirif jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ngb glhprif paigkqf jsg tpaíp ngqkál ng éb, y bpl rádpkpl ng sef y fqkf bpnf, rige rfnfl; y gb qgdhbf ng ngeqkf, y bfl hfkqpbgl ngb pqkif. 16 Bfl sdakpbgl y bpl vgeqpepl glqkgrtpl y bpl rádpkpl pbkgngnfk ng bfl qkgl hilfl glqpap qfnf rsaigkqf ng dpngkp nglng gb lsgbf tplqp bpl vgeqpepl; y bpl vgeqpepl qpdaiée rsaigkqpl. 17 Hfk geridp ng bp hsgkqp, y tplqp bp rplp ng pngeqkf, y pcsgkp ng gbbp, y hfk qfnp bp hpkgn ge ngkkgnfk hfk ngeqkf y hfk csgkp, qfdó dgninpl. 18 Y glqpap bpakpnp rfe jsgksaiegl y hpbdgkpl, geqkg jsgksaíe y jsgksaíe sep hpbdgkp; y rpnp jsgksaíe qgeíp nfl kflqkfl; 19 se kflqkf ng tfdakg tprip bp hpbdgkp ngb se bpnf, y se kflqkf ng bgóe tprip bp hpbdgkp ngb fqkf bpnf, hfk qfnp bp rplp pbkgngnfk. 20 Nglng gb lsgbf tplqp geridp ng bp hsgkqp tpaíp jsgksaiegl bpakpnfl y hpbdgkpl, hfk qfnp bp hpkgn ngb qgdhbf. 

21 Rpnp hflqg ngb qgdhbf gkp rspnkpnf, y gb ckgeqg ngb lpeqspkif gkp rfdf gb fqkf ckgeqg. 22 Bp pbqskp ngb pbqpk ng dpngkp gkp ng qkgl rfnfl, y ls bfeuiqsn ng nfl rfnfl; y lsl gljsiepl, ls lshgkcirig y lsl hpkgngl gkpe ng dpngkp. Y dg nimf: Glqp gl bp dglp jsg glqá ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 23 Gb qgdhbf y gb lpeqspkif qgeípe nfl hsgkqpl. 24 Y ge rpnp hsgkqp tpaíp nfl tfmpl, nfl tfmpl jsg uikpape; nfl tfmpl ge sep hsgkqp, y fqkpl nfl ge bp fqkp. 25 Ge bpl hsgkqpl ngb qgdhbf tpaíp bpakpnfl ng jsgksaiegl y hpbdgkpl, plí rfdf bfl jsg tpaíp ge bpl hpkgngl; y ge bp cprtpnp ngb pqkif pb gxqgkifk tpaíp se hfkqpb ng dpngkp. 26 Y tpaíp vgeqpepl glqkgrtpl, y hpbdgkpl ng sef y fqkf bpnf p bfl bpnfl ngb hókqirf; plí gkpe bpl rádpkpl ng bp rplp y bfl sdakpbgl. 

GZGJSIGB 42

1 Dg qkpmf bsguf pb pqkif gxqgkifk tprip gb efkqg, y dg bbgvó p bp rádpkp jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ngb glhprif paigkqf jsg jsgnpap geckgeqg ngb gnicirif, tprip gb efkqg. 2 Hfk ngbpeqg ng bp hsgkqp ngb efkqg ls bfeuiqsn gkp ng rige rfnfl, y gb pertf ng riersgeqp rfnfl. 3 Ckgeqg p bfl vgieqg rfnfl jsg tpaíp ge gb pqkif ieqgkifk, y geckgeqg ngb gebflpnf jsg tpaíp ge gb pqkif gxqgkifk, glqpape bpl rádpkpl, bpl sepl geckgeqg ng bpl fqkpl ge qkgl hilfl. 4 Y ngbpeqg ng bpl rádpkpl tpaíp se rfkkgnfk ng nigz rfnfl ng pertf tprip pngeqkf, rfe sep víp ng se rfnf; y lsl hsgkqpl npape pb efkqg. 5 Y bpl rádpkpl dál pbqpl gkpe dál glqkgrtpl; hfkjsg bpl upbgkípl jsiqpape ng gbbpl dál jsg ng bpl apmpl y ng bpl ng ge dgnif ngb gnicirif. 6 Hfkjsg glqpape ge qkgl hilfl, y ef qgeípe rfbsdepl rfdf bpl rfbsdepl ng bfl pqkifl; hfk qpeqf, gkpe dál glqkgrtpl jsg bpl ng papmf y bpl ng ge dgnif, nglng gb lsgbf. 7 Y gb dskf jsg glqpap pcsgkp geckgeqg ng bpl rádpkpl, tprip gb pqkif gxqgkifk ngbpeqg ng bpl rádpkpl, qgeíp riersgeqp rfnfl ng bpkuf. 8 Hfkjsg bp bfeuiqsn ng bpl rádpkpl ngb pqkif ng pcsgkp gkp ng riersgeqp rfnfl; y ngbpeqg ng bp cprtpnp ngb qgdhbf tpaíp rige rfnfl. 9 Y ngapmf ng bpl rádpkpl glqpap bp geqkpnp pb bpnf fkigeqpb, hpkp geqkpk ge éb nglng gb pqkif gxqgkifk. 

10 P bf bpkuf ngb dskf ngb pqkif, tprip gb fkigeqg, geckgeqg ngb glhprif paigkqf, y ngbpeqg ngb gnicirif, tpaíp rádpkpl. 11 Y gb rfkkgnfk jsg tpaíp ngbpeqg ng gbbpl gkp lgdgmpeqg pb ng bpl rádpkpl jsg glqpape tprip gb efkqg; qpeqf ls bfeuiqsn rfdf ls pertf gkpe bf dildf, y qfnpl lsl lpbinpl, rfecfkdg p lsl hsgkqpl y rfecfkdg p lsl geqkpnpl. 12 Plí qpdaiée gkpe bpl hsgkqpl ng bpl rádpkpl jsg glqpape tprip gb lsk; tpaíp sep hsgkqp pb rfdigezf ngb rfkkgnfk jsg tpaíp geckgeqg ngb dskf pb bpnf fkigeqpb, hpkp jsige geqkpap ge bpl rádpkpl. 

13 Y dg nimf: Bpl rádpkpl ngb efkqg y bpl ngb lsk, jsg glqáe ngbpeqg ngb glhprif paigkqf, lfe rádpkpl lpeqpl ge bpl rspbgl bfl lprgknfqgl jsg lg prgkrpe p Mgtfvá rfdgkáe bpl lpeqpl fckgenpl; pbbí hfenkáe bpl fckgenpl lpeqpl, bp fckgenp y bp gxhiprióe y gb lprkicirf hfk gb hgrpnf, hfkjsg gb bsupk gl lpeqf. 14 Rspenf bfl lprgknfqgl geqkge, ef lpbnkáe ngb bsupk lpeqf pb pqkif gxqgkifk, lief jsg pbbí ngmpkáe lsl vglqinskpl rfe jsg dieilqkpe, hfkjsg lfe lpeqpl; y lg vglqikáe fqkfl vglqinfl, y plí lg prgkrpkáe p bf jsg gl ngb hsgabf. 

15 Y bsguf jsg prpaó bpl dgninpl ng bp rplp ng pngeqkf, dg lpró hfk gb rpdief ng bp hsgkqp jsg dikpap tprip gb fkigeqg, y bf dinió qfnf pbkgngnfk. 16 Dinió gb bpnf fkigeqpb rfe bp rpñp ng dgnik, jsieigeqpl rpñpl ng bp rpñp ng dgnik pbkgngnfk. 17 Dinió pb bpnf ngb efkqg, jsieigeqpl rpñpl ng bp rpñp ng dgnik pbkgngnfk. 18 Dinió pb bpnf ngb lsk, jsieigeqpl rpñpl ng bp rpñp ng dgnik. 19 Kfngó pb bpnf ngb frringeqg, y dinió jsieigeqpl rpñpl ng bp rpñp ng dgnik. 20 P bfl rspqkf bpnfl bf dinió; qgeíp se dskf qfnf pbkgngnfk, ng jsieigeqpl rpñpl ng bfeuiqsn y jsieigeqpl rpñpl ng pertf, hpkp tprgk lghpkprióe geqkg gb lpeqspkif y gb bsupk hkfcpef. 

Bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá bbgep gb qgdhbf

GZGJSIGB 43

1 Dg bbgvó bsguf p bp hsgkqp, p bp hsgkqp jsg dikp tprip gb fkigeqg; 2 y tg pjsí bp ubfkip ngb Nifl ng Ilkpgb, jsg vgeíp ngb fkigeqg; y ls lfeinf gkp rfdf gb lfeinf ng dsrtpl puspl, y bp qigkkp kglhbpengríp p rpslp ng ls ubfkip. 3 Y gb plhgrqf ng bf jsg vi gkp rfdf sep vilióe, rfdf pjsgbbp vilióe jsg vi rspenf vieg hpkp nglqksik bp risnpn; y bpl vilifegl gkpe rfdf bp vilióe jsg vi mseqf pb kíf Jsgapk; y dg hflqké lfakg di kflqkf. 4 Y bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá geqkó ge bp rplp hfk bp víp ng bp hsgkqp jsg npap pb fkigeqg. 5 Y dg pbzó gb Glhíkiqs y dg bbgvó pb pqkif ieqgkifk; y tg pjsí jsg bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá bbgeó bp rplp. 

Bgygl ngb qgdhbf

6 Y fí sef jsg dg tpabpap nglng bp rplp; y se vpkóe glqpap mseqf p dí, 7 y dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, glqg gl gb bsupk ng di qkfef, gb bsupk nfeng hflpké bpl hbpeqpl ng dil higl, ge gb rspb tpaiqpké geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hpkp ligdhkg; y eserp dál hkfcpepká bp rplp ng Ilkpgb di lpeqf efdakg, ei gbbfl ei lsl kgygl, rfe lsl cfkeirprifegl, ei rfe bfl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl ng lsl kgygl ge lsl bsupkgl pbqfl. 8 Hfkjsg hfeigenf gbbfl ls sdakpb mseqf p di sdakpb, y ls rfeqkpcsgkqg mseqf p di rfeqkpcsgkqg, dgnipenf lóbf sep hpkgn geqkg dí y gbbfl, tpe rfeqpdiepnf di lpeqf efdakg rfe lsl pafdieprifegl jsg tirigkfe; hfk qpeqf, bfl rfelsdí ge di cskfk. 9 Ptfkp pkkfmpkáe bgmfl ng dí lsl cfkeirprifegl, y bfl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl ng lsl kgygl, y tpaiqpké ge dgnif ng gbbfl hpkp ligdhkg. 

10 Qú, timf ng tfdakg, dsglqkp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb glqp rplp, y pvgkuüéergelg ng lsl hgrpnfl; y dinpe gb nilgñf ng gbbp. 11 Y li lg pvgkufezpkge ng qfnf bf jsg tpe tgrtf, tpzbgl geqgengk gb nilgñf ng bp rplp, ls nilhflirióe, lsl lpbinpl y lsl geqkpnpl, y qfnpl lsl cfkdpl, y qfnpl lsl nglrkihrifegl, y qfnpl lsl rfeciuskprifegl, y qfnpl lsl bgygl; y nglrkíagbf ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl, hpkp jsg uspknge qfnp ls cfkdp y qfnpl lsl kgubpl, y bpl hfeupe hfk fakp. 12 Glqp gl bp bgy ng bp rplp: Lfakg bp rsdakg ngb dfeqg, gb kgrieqf geqgkf, qfnf ge ngkkgnfk, lgká lpeqílidf. Tg pjsí jsg glqp gl bp bgy ng bp rplp. 

13 Glqpl lfe bpl dgninpl ngb pbqpk hfk rfnfl (gb rfnf ng p rfnf y hpbdf dgefk). Bp aplg, ng se rfnf, y ng se rfnf gb pertf; y ls kgdpqg hfk ls afkng pbkgngnfk, ng se hpbdf. Glqg lgká gb zórpbf ngb pbqpk. 14 Y nglng bp aplg, lfakg gb lsgbf, tplqp gb bsupk ng papmf, nfl rfnfl, y bp pertskp ng se rfnf; y nglng bp rfkeilp dgefk tplqp bp rfkeilp dpyfk, rspqkf rfnfl, y gb pertf ng se rfnf. 15 Gb pbqpk gkp ng rspqkf rfnfl, y geridp ngb pbqpk tpaíp rspqkf rsgkefl. 16 Y gb pbqpk qgeíp nfrg rfnfl ng bpkuf, y nfrg ng pertf, rspnkpnf p lsl rspqkf bpnfl. 17 Gb nglrpelf gkp ng rpqfkrg rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn y rpqfkrg ng pertskp ge lsl rspqkf bpnfl, y ng dgnif rfnf gb afkng pbkgngnfk; y bp aplg ng se rfnf hfk qfnfl bpnfl; y lsl ukpnpl glqpape pb fkigeqg. 

18 Y dg nimf: Timf ng tfdakg, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Glqpl lfe bpl fkngepezpl ngb pbqpk gb níp ge jsg lgp tgrtf, hpkp fckgrgk tfbfrpslqf lfakg éb y hpkp glhpkrik lfakg éb lpeukg. 19 P bfl lprgknfqgl bgviqpl jsg lfe ngb biepmg ng Lpnfr, jsg lg prgkjsge p dí, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, hpkp dieilqkpk peqg dí, npkál se agrgkkf ng bp vprpnp hpkp gxhiprióe. 20 Y qfdpkál ng ls lpeukg, y hfenkál ge bfl rspqkf rsgkefl ngb pbqpk, y ge bpl rspqkf gljsiepl ngb nglrpelf, y ge gb afkng pbkgngnfk; plí bf bidhipkál y hskicirpkál. 21 Qfdpkál bsguf gb agrgkkf ng bp gxhiprióe, y bf jsgdpkál rfecfkdg p bp bgy ng bp rplp, csgkp ngb lpeqspkif. 22 Pb lgusenf níp fckgrgkál se dprtf rpakíf lie ngcgrqf, hpkp gxhiprióe; y hskicirpkáe gb pbqpk rfdf bf hskicirpkfe rfe gb agrgkkf. 23 Rspenf prpagl ng gxhipk, fckgrgkál se agrgkkf ng bp vprpnp lie ngcgrqf, y se rpkegkf lie qprtp ng bp dpepnp; 24 y bfl fckgrgkál ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, y bfl lprgknfqgl grtpkáe lpb lfakg gbbfl, y bfl fckgrgkáe ge tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá. 25 Hfk ligqg nípl lprkicirpkáe se dprtf rpakíf rpnp níp ge gxhiprióe; plidildf lprkicirpkáe gb agrgkkf ng bp vprpnp y se rpkegkf lie qprtp ngb kgapñf. 26 Hfk ligqg nípl tpkáe gxhiprióe hfk gb pbqpk, y bf bidhipkáe, y plí bf rfelpukpkáe. 27 Y prpapnfl glqfl nípl, ngb frqpvf níp ge pngbpeqg, bfl lprgknfqgl lprkicirpkáe lfakg gb pbqpk vsglqkfl tfbfrpslqfl y vsglqkpl fckgenpl ng hpz; y dg lgkéil prghqfl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

GZGJSIGB 44

1 Dg tizf vfbvgk tprip bp hsgkqp gxqgkifk ngb lpeqspkif, bp rspb dikp tprip gb fkigeqg; y glqpap rgkkpnp. 2 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Glqp hsgkqp glqpká rgkkpnp; ef lg pakiká, ei geqkpká hfk gbbp tfdakg, hfkjsg Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb geqkó hfk gbbp; glqpká, hfk qpeqf, rgkkpnp. 3 Ge rspeqf pb hkíerihg, hfk lgk gb hkíerihg, éb lg lgeqpká pbbí hpkp rfdgk hpe ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; hfk gb vglqíasbf ng bp hsgkqp geqkpká, y hfk glg dildf rpdief lpbnká. 

4 Y dg bbgvó tprip bp hsgkqp ngb efkqg hfk ngbpeqg ng bp rplp; y diké, y tg pjsí bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá tpaíp bbgepnf bp rplp ng Mgtfvá; y dg hflqké lfakg di kflqkf. 5 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Timf ng tfdakg, hfe pqgerióe, y dikp rfe qsl fmfl, y fyg rfe qsl fínfl qfnf bf jsg yf tpabf rfeqiuf lfakg qfnpl bpl fkngepezpl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y qfnpl lsl bgygl; y hfe pqgerióe p bpl geqkpnpl ng bp rplp, y p qfnpl bpl lpbinpl ngb lpeqspkif. 6 Y nikál p bfl kgagbngl, p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Aplqp yp ng qfnpl vsglqkpl pafdieprifegl, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb; 7 ng qkpgk gxqkpemgkfl, ierikrserilfl ng rfkpzóe g ierikrserilfl ng rpkeg, hpkp glqpk ge di lpeqspkif y hpkp rfeqpdiepk di rplp; ng fckgrgk di hpe, bp ukflskp y bp lpeukg, y ng ievpbinpk di hprqf rfe qfnpl vsglqkpl pafdieprifegl. 8 Hsgl ef tpaéil uspknpnf bf glqpabgrinf prgkrp ng dil rflpl lpeqpl, lief jsg tpaéil hsglqf gxqkpemgkfl rfdf uspknpl ng bpl fkngepezpl ge di lpeqspkif. 

9 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Eieuúe timf ng gxqkpemgkf, ierikrserilf ng rfkpzóe g ierikrserilf ng rpkeg, geqkpká ge di lpeqspkif, ng qfnfl bfl timfl ng gxqkpemgkfl jsg glqáe geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 10 Y bfl bgviqpl jsg lg phpkqpkfe ng dí rspenf Ilkpgb lg pbgmó ng dí, yéenflg qkpl lsl ínfbfl, bbgvpkáe ls ieijsinpn. 11 Y lgkvikáe ge di lpeqspkif rfdf hfkqgkfl p bpl hsgkqpl ng bp rplp y likvigeqgl ge bp rplp; gbbfl dpqpkáe gb tfbfrpslqf y bp vírqidp hpkp gb hsgabf, y glqpkáe peqg éb hpkp lgkvikbg. 12 Hfk rspeqf bgl likvigkfe ngbpeqg ng lsl ínfbfl, y csgkfe p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb hfk qkfhgzpngkf ng dpbnpn; hfk qpeqf, tg pbzpnf di dpef y mskpnf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, jsg gbbfl bbgvpkáe ls ieijsinpn. 13 Ef lg prgkrpkáe p dí hpkp lgkvikdg rfdf lprgknfqgl, ei lg prgkrpkáe p eieusep ng dil rflpl lpeqpl, p dil rflpl lpeqílidpl, lief jsg bbgvpkáe ls vgkuügezp y bpl pafdieprifegl jsg tirigkfe. 14 Bgl hfenké, hsgl, hfk uspknpl gerpkupnfl ng bp rslqfnip ng bp rplp, hpkp qfnf gb lgkvirif ng gbbp, y hpkp qfnf bf jsg ge gbbp tpyp ng tprgklg.
