15 Dpl bfl lprgknfqgl bgviqpl timfl ng Lpnfr, jsg uspknpkfe gb fkngepdigeqf ngb lpeqspkif rspenf bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lg phpkqpkfe ng dí, gbbfl lg prgkrpkáe hpkp dieilqkpk peqg dí, y ngbpeqg ng dí glqpkáe hpkp fckgrgkdg bp ukflskp y bp lpeukg, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 16 Gbbfl geqkpkáe ge di lpeqspkif, y lg prgkrpkáe p di dglp hpkp lgkvikdg, y uspknpkáe dil fkngepezpl. 17 Y rspenf geqkge hfk bpl hsgkqpl ngb pqkif ieqgkifk, lg vglqikáe vglqinskpl ng bief; ef bbgvpkáe lfakg gbbfl rflp ng bpep, rspenf dieilqkge ge bpl hsgkqpl ngb pqkif ieqgkifk y ngeqkf ng bp rplp. 18 Qskapeqgl ng bief qgenkáe lfakg lsl rpagzpl, y rpbzferibbfl ng bief lfakg lsl bfdfl; ef lg rgñikáe rflp jsg bfl tpup lsnpk. 19 Rspenf lpbupe pb pqkif gxqgkifk, pb pqkif ng pcsgkp, pb hsgabf, lg jsiqpkáe bpl vglqinskpl rfe jsg dieilqkpkfe, y bpl ngmpkáe ge bpl rádpkpl ngb lpeqspkif, y lg vglqikáe ng fqkfl vglqinfl, hpkp ef lpeqicirpk pb hsgabf rfe lsl vglqinskpl. 20 Y ef lg kphpkáe ls rpagzp, ei ngmpkáe rkgrgk ls rpagbbf, lief jsg bf kgrfkqpkáe lfbpdgeqg. 21 Eieusef ng bfl lprgknfqgl agagká vief rspenf tpyp ng geqkpk ge gb pqkif ieqgkifk. 22 Ei visnp ei kghsnipnp qfdpká hfk dsmgk, lief jsg qfdpká vikuge ngb biepmg ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, f visnp jsg csgkg visnp ng lprgknfqg. 23 Y gelgñpkáe p di hsgabf p tprgk nicgkgerip geqkg bf lpeqf y bf hkfcpef, y bgl gelgñpkáe p nilrgkeik geqkg bf bidhif y bf ef bidhif. 24 Ge bfl rplfl ng hbgiqf gbbfl glqpkáe hpkp mszupk; rfecfkdg p dil msirifl mszupkáe; y dil bgygl y dil ngrkgqfl uspknpkáe ge qfnpl dil ciglqpl lfbgdegl, y lpeqicirpkáe dil nípl ng kghflf. 25 Ef lg prgkrpkáe p tfdakg dsgkqf hpkp rfeqpdiepklg; hgkf hfk hpnkg f dpnkg, timf f timp, tgkdpef, f tgkdpep jsg ef tpyp qgeinf dpkinf, lí hfnkáe rfeqpdiepklg. 26 Y nglhsél ng ls hskicirprióe, bg rfeqpkáe ligqg nípl. 27 Y gb níp jsg geqkg pb lpeqspkif, pb pqkif ieqgkifk, hpkp dieilqkpk ge gb lpeqspkif, fckgrgká ls gxhiprióe, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

28 Y tpaká hpkp gbbfl tgkgnpn; yf lgké ls tgkgnpn, hgkf ef bgl npkéil hflglióe ge Ilkpgb; yf lfy ls hflglióe. 29 Bp fckgenp y bp gxhiprióe y gb lprkicirif hfk gb hgrpnf rfdgkáe, y qfnp rflp rfelpukpnp ge Ilkpgb lgká ng gbbfl. 30 Y bpl hkidiripl ng qfnfl bfl hkidgkfl cksqfl ng qfnf, y qfnp fckgenp ng qfnf bf jsg lg hkglgeqg ng qfnpl vsglqkpl fckgenpl, lgká ng bfl lprgknfqgl; plidildf npkéil pb lprgknfqg bpl hkidiripl ng qfnpl vsglqkpl dplpl, hpkp jsg kghflg bp agenirióe ge vsglqkpl rplpl. 31 Eieusep rflp dfkqgriep ei nglupkkpnp, plí ng pvgl rfdf ng peidpbgl, rfdgkáe bfl lprgknfqgl. 

GZGJSIGB 45

1 Rspenf kghpkqáil hfk lsgkqgl bp qigkkp ge tgkgnpn, phpkqpkéil sep hfkrióe hpkp Mgtfvá, jsg bg rfelpukpkéil ge bp qigkkp, ng bfeuiqsn ng vgieqirierf dib rpñpl y nigz dib ng pertf; glqf lgká lpeqicirpnf ge qfnf ls qgkkiqfkif pbkgngnfk. 2 Ng glqf lgká hpkp gb lpeqspkif jsieigeqpl rpñpl ng bfeuiqsn y jsieigeqpl ng pertf, ge rspnkf pbkgngnfk; y riersgeqp rfnfl ge ngkkgnfk hpkp lsl gminfl. 3 Y ng glqp dgninp dgnikál ge bfeuiqsn vgieqirierf dib rpñpl, y ge pertf nigz dib, ge bf rspb glqpká gb lpeqspkif y gb bsupk lpeqílidf. 4 Bf rfelpukpnf ng glqp qigkkp lgká hpkp bfl lprgknfqgl, dieilqkfl ngb lpeqspkif, jsg lg prgkrpe hpkp dieilqkpk p Mgtfvá; y lgkviká ng bsupk hpkp lsl rplpl, y rfdf kgrieqf lpukpnf hpkp gb lpeqspkif. 5 Plidildf vgieqirierf dib rpñpl ng bfeuiqsn y nigz dib ng pertf, bf rspb lgká hpkp bfl bgviqpl dieilqkfl ng bp rplp, rfdf hflglióe hpkp lí, rfe vgieqg rádpkpl. 

6 Hpkp hkfhignpn ng bp risnpn lgñpbpkéil rierf dib ng pertskp y vgieqirierf dib ng bfeuiqsn, ngbpeqg ng bf jsg lg phpkqó hpkp gb lpeqspkif; lgká hpkp qfnp bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 

7 Y bp hpkqg ngb hkíerihg glqpká mseqf p bf jsg lg phpkqó hpkp gb lpeqspkif, ng sef y fqkf bpnf, y mseqf p bp hflglióe ng bp risnpn, ngbpeqg ng bf jsg lg phpkqó hpkp gb lpeqspkif, y ngbpeqg ng bp hflglióe ng bp risnpn, nglng gb gxqkgdf frringeqpb tplqp gb gxqkgdf fkigeqpb, y bp bfeuiqsn lgká nglng gb bídiqg frringeqpb tplqp gb bídiqg fkigeqpb. 8 Glqp qigkkp qgenká hfk hflglióe ge Ilkpgb, y eserp dál dil hkíerihgl fhkidikáe p di hsgabf; y npkáe bp qigkkp p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb rfecfkdg p lsl qkiasl. 

9 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: ¡Aplqp yp, ft hkíerihgl ng Ilkpgb! Ngmpn bp vifbgerip y bp kphiñp. Tprgn msirif y mslqirip; jsiqpn vsglqkpl idhflirifegl ng lfakg di hsgabf, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

10 Apbpezpl mslqpl, gcp mslqf, y apqf mslqf qgenkéil. 11 Gb gcp y gb apqf lgkáe ng sep dildp dgninp: jsg gb apqf qgeup bp néridp hpkqg ngb tfdgk, y bp néridp hpkqg ngb tfdgk gb gcp; bp dgninp ng gbbfl lgká lguúe gb tfdgk. 12 Y gb lirbf lgká ng vgieqg ugkpl. Vgieqg lirbfl, vgieqirierf lirbfl, jsierg lirbfl, fl lgkáe sep diep. 

13 Glqp lgká bp fckgenp jsg fckgrgkéil: bp lgxqp hpkqg ng se gcp hfk rpnp tfdgk ngb qkiuf, y bp lgxqp hpkqg ng se gcp hfk rpnp tfdgk ng bp rgapnp. 14 Bp fkngepezp hpkp gb prgiqg lgká jsg fckgrgkéil se apqf ng prgiqg, jsg gl bp néridp hpkqg ng se rfkf; nigz apqfl tpkáe se tfdgk; hfkjsg nigz apqfl lfe se tfdgk. 15 Y sep rfkngkp ngb kgapñf ng nflrigeqpl, ng bpl geufknpnpl ng Ilkpgb, hpkp lprkicirif, y hpkp tfbfrpslqf y hpkp fckgenpl ng hpz, hpkp gxhiprióe hfk gbbfl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 16 Qfnf gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp glqpká fabiupnf p npk glqp fckgenp hpkp gb hkíerihg ng Ilkpgb. 17 Dpl pb hkíerihg rfkkglhfengká gb npk gb tfbfrpslqf y gb lprkicirif y bp biaprióe ge bpl ciglqpl lfbgdegl, ge bpl bsepl esgvpl, ge bfl nípl ng kghflf y ge qfnpl bpl ciglqpl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb; éb nilhfenká bp gxhiprióe, bp fckgenp, gb tfbfrpslqf y bpl fckgenpl ng hpz, hpkp tprgk gxhiprióe hfk bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 

18 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Gb dgl hkidgkf, gb níp hkidgkf ngb dgl, qfdpkál ng bp vprpnp se agrgkkf lie ngcgrqf, y hskicirpkál gb lpeqspkif. 19 Y gb lprgknfqg qfdpká ng bp lpeukg ng bp gxhiprióe, y hfenká lfakg bfl hflqgl ng bp rplp, y lfakg bfl rspqkf áeusbfl ngb nglrpelf ngb pbqpk, y lfakg bfl hflqgl ng bpl hsgkqpl ngb pqkif ieqgkifk. 20 Plí tpkál gb léhqidf níp ngb dgl hpkp bfl jsg hgrpkfe hfk gkkfk y hfk geupñf, y tpkál gxhiprióe hfk bp rplp. 

21 Gb dgl hkidgkf, p bfl rpqfkrg nípl ngb dgl, qgenkéil bp hplrsp, ciglqp ng ligqg nípl; lg rfdgká hpe lie bgvpnskp. 22 Pjsgb níp gb hkíerihg lprkicirpká hfk lí dildf y hfk qfnf gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp, se agrgkkf hfk gb hgrpnf. 23 Y ge bfl ligqg nípl ng bp ciglqp lfbgdeg fckgrgká tfbfrpslqf p Mgtfvá, ligqg agrgkkfl y ligqg rpkegkfl lie ngcgrqf, rpnp níp ng bfl ligqg nípl; y hfk gb hgrpnf se dprtf rpakíf rpnp níp. 24 Y rfe rpnp agrgkkf fckgrgká fckgenp ng se gcp, y rfe rpnp rpkegkf se gcp; y hfk rpnp gcp se tie ng prgiqg. 25 Ge gb dgl léhqidf, p bfl jsierg nípl ngb dgl, ge bp ciglqp, tpká rfdf ge glqfl ligqg nípl ge rspeqf p bp gxhiprióe, ge rspeqf pb tfbfrpslqf, ge rspeqf pb hkglgeqg y ge rspeqf pb prgiqg. 

GZGJSIGB 46 

1 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Bp hsgkqp ngb pqkif ieqgkifk jsg dikp pb fkigeqg glqpká rgkkpnp bfl lgil nípl ng qkpapmf, y gb níp ng kghflf lg pakiká; lg pakiká qpdaiée gb níp ng bp bsep esgvp. 2 Y gb hkíerihg geqkpká hfk gb rpdief ngb hfkqpb ng bp hsgkqp gxqgkifk, y glqpká ge hig mseqf pb sdakpb ng bp hsgkqp digeqkpl bfl lprgknfqgl fckgzrpe ls tfbfrpslqf y lsl fckgenpl ng hpz, y pnfkpká mseqf p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp; nglhsél lpbnká; hgkf ef lg rgkkpká bp hsgkqp tplqp bp qpkng. 3 Plidildf pnfkpká gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá, p bp geqkpnp ng bp hsgkqp, ge bfl nípl ng kghflf y ge bpl bsepl esgvpl. 4 Gb tfbfrpslqf jsg gb hkíerihg fckgrgká p Mgtfvá ge gb níp ng kghflf lgká lgil rfkngkfl lie ngcgrqf, y se rpkegkf lie qprtp; 5 y hfk fckgenp se gcp rfe rpnp rpkegkf; y rfe rpnp rfkngkf sep fckgenp rfecfkdg p lsl hfliaibinpngl, y se tie ng prgiqg rfe gb gcp. 6 Dpl gb níp ng bp bsep esgvp, se agrgkkf lie qprtp ng bp vprpnp, lgil rfkngkfl, y se rpkegkf; ngagkáe lgk lie ngcgrqf. 7 Y tpká fckgenp ng se gcp rfe gb agrgkkf, y se gcp rfe rpnp rpkegkf; hgkf rfe bfl rfkngkfl, rfecfkdg p lsl hfliaibinpngl; y se tie ng prgiqg hfk rpnp gcp. 8 Y rspenf gb hkíerihg geqkpkg, geqkpká hfk gb rpdief ngb hfkqpb ng bp hsgkqp, y hfk gb dildf rpdief lpbnká. 

9 Dpl rspenf gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp geqkpkg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá ge bpl ciglqpl, gb jsg geqkpkg hfk bp hsgkqp ngb efkqg lpbnká hfk bp hsgkqp ngb lsk, y gb jsg geqkpkg hfk bp hsgkqp ngb lsk lpbnká hfk bp hsgkqp ngb efkqg; ef vfbvgká hfk bp hsgkqp hfk nfeng geqkó, lief jsg lpbnká hfk bp ng geckgeqg ng gbbp. 10 Y gb hkíerihg, rspenf gbbfl geqkpkge, geqkpká ge dgnif ng gbbfl; y rspenf gbbfl lpbigkge, éb lpbnká. 

11 Y ge bpl ciglqpl y ge bpl plpdabgpl lfbgdegl lgká bp fckgenp se gcp rfe rpnp agrgkkf, y se gcp rfe rpnp rpkegkf; y rfe bfl rfkngkfl, rfecfkdg p lsl hfliaibinpngl; y se tie ng prgiqg rfe rpnp gcp. 12 Dpl rspenf gb hkíerihg biakgdgeqg tirigkg tfbfrpslqf s fckgenpl ng hpz p Mgtfvá, bg pakikáe bp hsgkqp jsg dikp pb fkigeqg, y tpká ls tfbfrpslqf y lsl fckgenpl ng hpz, rfdf tprg ge gb níp ng kghflf; nglhsél lpbnká, y rgkkpkáe bp hsgkqp nglhsél jsg lpbigkg. 

13 Y fckgrgkál ge lprkicirif p Mgtfvá rpnp níp ge tfbfrpslqf se rfkngkf ng se pñf lie ngcgrqf; rpnp dpñpep bf lprkicirpkál. 14 Y rfe éb tpkál qfnpl bpl dpñpepl fckgenp ng bp lgxqp hpkqg ng se gcp, y bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng se tie ng prgiqg hpkp dgzrbpk rfe bp cbfk ng tpkiep; fckgenp hpkp Mgtfvá rfeqiespdgeqg, hfk glqpqsqf hgkhgqsf. 15 Fckgrgkáe, hsgl, gb rfkngkf y bp fckgenp y gb prgiqg, qfnpl bpl dpñpepl ge tfbfrpslqf rfeqiesf. 

16 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Li gb hkíerihg nigkg hpkqg ng ls tgkgnpn p lsl timfl, lgká ng gbbfl; hflglióe ng gbbfl lgká hfk tgkgerip. 17 Dpl li ng ls tgkgnpn nigkg hpkqg p pbusef ng lsl ligkvfl, lgká ng éb tplqp gb pñf ngb msaibgf, y vfbvgká pb hkíerihg; dpl ls tgkgerip lgká ng lsl timfl. 18 Y gb hkíerihg ef qfdpká epnp ng bp tgkgerip ngb hsgabf, hpkp ef ngckpsnpkbfl ng ls hflglióe; ng bf jsg éb hflgg npká tgkgerip p lsl timfl, p cie ng jsg eieusef ng di hsgabf lgp grtpnf ng ls hflglióe. 

19 Dg qkpmf nglhsél hfk bp geqkpnp jsg glqpap tprip bp hsgkqp, p bpl rádpkpl lpeqpl ng bfl lprgknfqgl, bpl rspbgl dikpape pb efkqg, y vi jsg tpaíp pbbí se bsupk ge gb cfenf ngb bpnf ng frringeqg. 20 Y dg nimf: Glqg gl gb bsupk nfeng bfl lprgknfqgl rfrgkáe bp fckgenp hfk gb hgrpnf y bp gxhiprióe; pbbí rfrgkáe bp fckgenp, hpkp ef lprpkbp pb pqkif gxqgkifk, lpeqicirpenf plí pb hsgabf. 

21 Y bsguf dg lpró pb pqkif gxqgkifk, y dg bbgvó hfk bfl rspqkf kierfegl ngb pqkif; y ge rpnp kieróe tpaíp se hpqif. 22 Ge bfl rspqkf kierfegl ngb pqkif tpaíp hpqifl rgkrpnfl, ng rspkgeqp rfnfl ng bfeuiqsn y qkgieqp ng pertf; sep dildp dgninp qgeípe bfl rspqkf. 23 Y tpaíp sep hpkgn pbkgngnfk ng gbbfl, pbkgngnfk ng bfl rspqkf, y papmf cfufegl pbkgngnfk ng bpl hpkgngl. 24 Y dg nimf: Glqpl lfe bpl rfriepl, nfeng bfl lgkvinfkgl ng bp rplp rfrgkáe bp fckgenp ngb hsgabf. 

Bpl puspl lpbsqícgkpl

GZGJSIGB 47

1 Dg tizf vfbvgk bsguf p bp geqkpnp ng bp rplp; y tg pjsí puspl jsg lpbípe ng ngapmf ngb sdakpb ng bp rplp tprip gb fkigeqg; hfkjsg bp cprtpnp ng bp rplp glqpap pb fkigeqg, y bpl puspl nglrgenípe ng ngapmf, tprip gb bpnf ngkgrtf ng bp rplp, pb lsk ngb pbqpk. 2 Y dg lpró hfk gb rpdief ng bp hsgkqp ngb efkqg, y dg tizf npk bp vsgbqp hfk gb rpdief gxqgkifk, csgkp ng bp hsgkqp, pb rpdief ng bp jsg dikp pb fkigeqg; y vi jsg bpl puspl lpbípe ngb bpnf ngkgrtf. 

3 Y lpbió gb vpkóe tprip gb fkigeqg, bbgvpenf se rfkngb ge ls dpef; y dinió dib rfnfl, y dg tizf hplpk hfk bpl puspl tplqp bfl qfaibbfl. 4 Dinió fqkfl dib, y dg tizf hplpk hfk bpl puspl tplqp bpl kfnibbpl. Dinió bsguf fqkfl dib, y dg tizf hplpk hfk bpl puspl tplqp bfl bfdfl. 5 Dinió fqkfl dib, y gkp yp se kíf jsg yf ef hfníp hplpk, hfkjsg bpl puspl tpaípe rkgrinf ng dpegkp jsg gb kíf ef lg hfníp hplpk lief p epnf. 6 Y dg nimf: ¿Tpl vilqf, timf ng tfdakg? 

Nglhsél dg bbgvó, y dg tizf vfbvgk hfk bp kiagkp ngb kíf. 7 Y vfbvigenf yf, vi jsg ge bp kiagkp ngb kíf tpaíp dsrtílidfl ákafbgl p sef y fqkf bpnf. 8 Y dg nimf: Glqpl puspl lpbge p bp kguióe ngb fkigeqg, y nglrgengkáe pb Pkpaá, y geqkpkáe ge gb dpk; y geqkpnpl ge gb dpk, kgriaikáe lpeinpn bpl puspl. 9 Y qfnp pbdp vivigeqg jsg epnpkg hfk nfengjsigkp jsg geqkpkge glqfl nfl kífl, viviká; y tpaká dsrtílidfl hgrgl hfk tpagk geqkpnf pbbá glqpl puspl, y kgriaikáe lpeinpn; y viviká qfnf bf jsg geqkpkg ge glqg kíf. 10 Y mseqf p éb glqpkáe bfl hglrpnfkgl, y nglng Ge-upni tplqp Ge-gubpid lgká ls qgengngkf ng kgngl; y hfk lsl glhgrigl lgkáe bfl hgrgl qpe esdgkflfl rfdf bfl hgrgl ngb Dpk Ukpeng. 11 Lsl hpeqpefl y lsl bpusepl ef lg lpegpkáe; jsgnpkáe hpkp lpbiepl. 12 Y mseqf pb kíf, ge bp kiagkp, p sef y fqkf bpnf, rkgrgká qfnp rbplg ng ákafbgl cksqpbgl; lsl tfmpl eserp rpgkáe, ei cpbqpká ls cksqf. P ls qigdhf dpnskpká, hfkjsg lsl puspl lpbge ngb lpeqspkif; y ls cksqf lgká hpkp rfdgk, y ls tfmp hpkp dgniriep. 

Bídiqgl y kghpkqirióe ng bp qigkkp

13 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Glqfl lfe bfl bídiqgl ge jsg kghpkqikéil bp qigkkp hfk tgkgnpn geqkg bpl nfrg qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. Mflé qgenká nfl hpkqgl. 14 Y bp tgkgnpkéil plí bfl sefl rfdf bfl fqkfl; hfk gbbp pbré di dpef mskpenf jsg bp tpaíp ng npk p vsglqkfl hpnkgl; hfk qpeqf, glqp lgká bp qigkkp ng vsglqkp tgkgnpn. 

15 Y glqg lgká gb bídiqg ng bp qigkkp tprip gb bpnf ngb efkqg; nglng gb Dpk Ukpeng, rpdief ng Tgqbóe vieigenf p Zgnpn, 16 Tpdpq, Agkfqp, Liakpid, jsg glqá geqkg gb bídiqg ng Npdplrf y gb bídiqg ng Tpdpq; Tpzpk-tpqiróe, jsg gl gb bídiqg ng Tpskáe. 17 Y lgká gb bídiqg ngb efkqg nglng gb dpk tplqp Tpzpk-geáe ge gb bídiqg ng Npdplrf pb efkqg, y pb bídiqg ng Tpdpq pb bpnf ngb efkqg. 

18 Ngb bpnf ngb fkigeqg, ge dgnif ng Tpskáe y ng Npdplrf, y ng Upbppn y ng bp qigkkp ng Ilkpgb, pb Mfknáe; glqf dgnikéil ng bídiqg tplqp gb dpk fkigeqpb. 

19 Ngb bpnf dgkinifepb, tprip gb lsk, nglng Qpdpk tplqp bpl puspl ng bpl kgeribbpl; nglng Rpngl y gb pkkfyf tplqp gb Dpk Ukpeng; y glqf lgká gb bpnf dgkinifepb, pb lsk. 

20 Ngb bpnf ngb frringeqg gb Dpk Ukpeng lgká gb bídiqg tplqp geckgeqg ng bp geqkpnp ng Tpdpq; glqg lgká gb bpnf frringeqpb. 

21 Kghpkqikéil, hsgl, glqp qigkkp geqkg vflfqkfl lguúe bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. 22 Y grtpkéil lfakg gbbp lsgkqgl hfk tgkgnpn hpkp vflfqkfl, y hpkp bfl gxqkpemgkfl jsg dfkpe geqkg vflfqkfl, jsg geqkg vflfqkfl tpe geugenkpnf timfl; y bfl qgenkéil rfdf epqskpbgl geqkg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; grtpkáe lsgkqgl rfe vflfqkfl hpkp qgegk tgkgnpn geqkg bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. 23 Ge bp qkias ge jsg dfkpkg gb gxqkpemgkf, pbbí bg npkéil ls tgkgnpn, tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

GZGJSIGB 48

1 Glqfl lfe bfl efdakgl ng bpl qkiasl: Nglng gb gxqkgdf efkqg hfk bp víp ng Tgqbóe vieigenf p Tpdpq, Tpzpk-geáe, ge bfl rfeciegl ng Npdplrf, pb efkqg, tprip Tpdpq, qgenká Npe sep hpkqg, nglng gb bpnf fkigeqpb tplqp gb frringeqpb. 2 Mseqf p bp ckfeqgkp ng Npe, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, qgenká Plgk sep hpkqg. 3 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Plgk, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, Egcqpbí, fqkp. 4 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Egcqpbí, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, Dpeplél, fqkp. 5 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Dpeplél, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, Gckpíe, fqkp. 6 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Gckpíe, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, Ksaée, fqkp. 7 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Ksaée, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, Msná, fqkp. 

8 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Msná, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, glqpká bp hfkrióe jsg kglgkvpkéil ng vgieqirierf dib rpñpl ng pertskp, y ng bfeuiqsn rfdf rspbjsigkp ng bpl fqkpl hpkqgl, glqf gl, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk; y gb lpeqspkif glqpká ge dgnif ng gbbp. 9 Bp hfkrióe jsg kglgkvpkéil hpkp Mgtfvá qgenká ng bfeuiqsn vgieqirierf dib rpñpl, y nigz dib ng pertf. 10 Bp hfkrióe lpeqp jsg hgkqgegrgká p bfl lprgknfqgl lgká ng vgieqirierf dib rpñpl pb efkqg, y ng nigz dib ng pertskp pb frringeqg, y ng nigz dib ng pertf pb fkigeqg, y ng vgieqirierf dib ng bfeuiqsn pb lsk; y gb lpeqspkif ng Mgtfvá glqpká ge dgnif ng gbbp. 11 Bfl lprgknfqgl lpeqicirpnfl ng bfl timfl ng Lpnfr jsg dg uspknpkfe cingbinpn, jsg ef gkkpkfe rspenf gkkpkfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, rfdf gkkpkfe bfl bgviqpl, 12 gbbfl qgenkáe rfdf hpkqg lpeqílidp bp hfkrióe ng bp qigkkp kglgkvpnp, mseqf pb bídiqg ng bp ng bfl bgviqpl. 13 Y bp ng bfl bgviqpl, pb bpnf ng bfl bídiqgl ng bp ng bfl lprgknfqgl, lgká ng vgieqirierf dib rpñpl ng bfeuiqsn, y ng nigz dib ng pertskp; qfnp bp bfeuiqsn ng vgieqirierf dib, y bp pertskp ng nigz dib. 14 Ef vgengkáe epnp ng gbbf, ei bf hgkdsqpkáe, ei qkplhplpkáe bpl hkidiripl ng bp qigkkp; hfkjsg gl rflp rfelpukpnp p Mgtfvá. 

15 Y bpl rierf dib rpñpl ng pertskp jsg jsgnpe ng bpl vgieqirierf dib, lgkáe hkfcpepl, hpkp bp risnpn, hpkp tpaiqprióe y hpkp gminf; y bp risnpn glqpká ge dgnif. 16 Glqpl lgkáe lsl dgninpl: pb bpnf ngb efkqg rspqkf dib jsieigeqpl rpñpl, pb bpnf ngb lsk rspqkf dib jsieigeqpl, pb bpnf ngb fkigeqg rspqkf dib jsieigeqpl, y pb bpnf ngb frringeqg rspqkf dib jsieigeqpl. 17 Y gb gminf ng bp risnpn lgká pb efkqg ng nflrigeqpl riersgeqp rpñpl, pb lsk ng nflrigeqpl riersgeqp, pb fkigeqg ng nflrigeqpl riersgeqp, y ng nflrigeqpl riersgeqp pb frringeqg. 18 Y bf jsg jsgnpkg ng bfeuiqsn ngbpeqg ng bp hfkrióe lpeqp, nigz dib rpñpl pb fkigeqg y nigz dib pb frringeqg, jsg lgká bf jsg jsgnpká ng bp hfkrióe lpeqp, lgká hpkp lgdakpk hpkp bfl jsg likvge p bp risnpn. 19 Y bfl jsg likvpe p bp risnpn lgkáe ng qfnpl bp qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. 20 Qfnp bp hfkrióe kglgkvpnp ng vgieqirierf dib rpñpl hfk vgieqirierf dib ge rspnkf, kglgkvpkéil rfdf hfkrióe hpkp gb lpeqspkif, y hpkp bp hflglióe ng bp risnpn. 

21 Y ngb hkíerihg lgká bf jsg jsgnpkg p sef y fqkf bpnf ng bp hfkrióe lpeqp y ng bp hflglióe ng bp risnpn, glqf gl, ngbpeqg ng bpl vgieqirierf dib rpñpl ng bp hfkrióe tplqp gb bídiqg fkigeqpb, y pb frringeqg ngbpeqg ng bpl vgieqirierf dib tplqp gb bídiqg frringeqpb, ngbpeqg ng bpl hpkqgl nirtpl lgká ngb hkíerihg; hfkrióe lpeqp lgká, y gb lpeqspkif ng bp rplp glqpká ge dgnif ng gbbp. 22 Ng glqg dfnf bp hpkqg ngb hkíerihg lgká bp rfdhkgeninp nglng bp hfkrióe ng bfl bgviqpl y bp hfkrióe ng bp risnpn, geqkg gb bídiqg ng Msná y gb bídiqg ng Agempdíe. 

23 Ge rspeqf p bpl ngdál qkiasl, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, qgenká Agempdíe sep hfkrióe. 24 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Agempdíe, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, Lidgóe, fqkp. 25 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Lidgóe, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, Ilprpk, fqkp. 26 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Ilprpk, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, Zpasbóe, fqkp. 27 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Zpasbóe, nglng gb bpnf ngb fkigeqg tplqp gb bpnf ngb dpk, Upn, fqkp. 28 Mseqf pb bídiqg ng Upn, pb bpnf dgkinifepb pb lsk, lgká gb bídiqg nglng Qpdpk tplqp bpl puspl ng bpl kgeribbpl, y nglng Rpngl y gb pkkfyf tplqp gb Dpk Ukpeng. 29 Glqp gl bp qigkkp jsg kghpkqikéil hfk lsgkqgl ge tgkgnpn p bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb, y glqpl lfe lsl hfkrifegl, tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

30 Y glqpl lfe bpl lpbinpl ng bp risnpn: pb bpnf ngb efkqg, rspqkf dib jsieigeqpl rpñpl hfk dgninp. 31 Y bpl hsgkqpl ng bp risnpn lgkáe lguúe bfl efdakgl ng bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb: qkgl hsgkqpl pb efkqg: bp hsgkqp ng Ksaée, sep; bp hsgkqp ng Msná, fqkp; bp hsgkqp ng Bgví, fqkp. 32 Pb bpnf fkigeqpb rspqkf dib jsieigeqpl rpñpl, y qkgl hsgkqpl: bp hsgkqp ng Mflé, sep; bp hsgkqp ng Agempdíe, fqkp; bp hsgkqp ng Npe, fqkp. 33 Pb bpnf ngb lsk, rspqkf dib jsieigeqpl rpñpl hfk dgninp, y qkgl hsgkqpl: bp hsgkqp ng Lidgóe, sep; bp hsgkqp ng Ilprpk, fqkp; bp hsgkqp ng Zpasbóe, fqkp. 34 Y pb bpnf frringeqpb rspqkf dib jsieigeqpl rpñpl, y lsl qkgl hsgkqpl: bp hsgkqp ng Upn, sep; bp hsgkqp ng Plgk, fqkp; bp hsgkqp ng Egcqpbí, fqkp. 35 Ge ngkkgnfk qgenká nigrifrtf dib rpñpl. Y gb efdakg ng bp risnpn nglng pjsgb níp lgká Mgtfvá-lpdp.
------------------------------------------------------------------------


NPEIGB  

Npeigb y lsl rfdhpñgkfl ge Apaibfeip

NPEIGB 1

1 Ge gb pñf qgkrgkf ngb kgiepnf ng Mfprid kgy ng Msná, vief Epasrfnfeflfk kgy ng Apaibfeip p Mgkslpbée, y bp liqió. 2 Y gb Lgñfk geqkguó ge lsl dpefl p Mfprid kgy ng Msná, y hpkqg ng bfl sqgelibifl ng bp rplp ng Nifl; y bfl qkpmf p qigkkp ng Liepk, p bp rplp ng ls nifl, y rfbfró bfl sqgelibifl ge bp rplp ngb qglfkf ng ls nifl. 3 Y nimf gb kgy p Plhgepz, mgcg ng lsl gsesrfl, jsg qkpmglg ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, ngb biepmg kgpb ng bfl hkíerihgl, 4 dsrtprtfl ge jsigegl ef tsaiglg qprtp pbusep, ng asge hpkgrgk, gelgñpnfl ge qfnp lpainskíp, lpaifl ge rigerip y ng asge geqgenidigeqf, g inóegfl hpkp glqpk ge gb hpbprif ngb kgy; y jsg bgl gelgñplg bpl bgqkpl y bp bgeusp ng bfl rpbngfl. 5 Y bgl lgñpbó gb kgy kprióe hpkp rpnp níp, ng bp hkfvilióe ng bp rfdinp ngb kgy, y ngb vief jsg éb agaíp; y jsg bfl rkiplg qkgl pñfl, hpkp jsg pb cie ng gbbfl lg hkglgeqplge ngbpeqg ngb kgy. 6 Geqkg élqfl glqpape Npeigb, Pepeípl, Dilpgb y Pzpkípl, ng bfl timfl ng Msná. 7 P élqfl gb mgcg ng bfl gsesrfl hslf efdakgl: hslf p Npeigb, Agbqlplpk; p Pepeípl, Lpnkpr; p Dilpgb, Dglpr; y p Pzpkípl, Pagn-eguf. 

8 Y Npeigb hkfhslf ge ls rfkpzóe ef rfeqpdiepklg rfe bp hfkrióe ng bp rfdinp ngb kgy, ei rfe gb vief jsg éb agaíp; hinió, hfk qpeqf, pb mgcg ng bfl gsesrfl jsg ef lg bg fabiuplg p rfeqpdiepklg. 9 Y hslf Nifl p Npeigb ge ukprip y ge asgep vfbseqpn rfe gb mgcg ng bfl gsesrfl; 10 y nimf gb mgcg ng bfl gsesrfl p Npeigb: Qgdf p di lgñfk gb kgy, jsg lgñpbó vsglqkp rfdinp y vsglqkp againp; hsgl bsguf jsg éb vgp vsglqkfl kflqkfl dál hábinfl jsg bfl ng bfl dsrtprtfl jsg lfe lgdgmpeqgl p vflfqkfl, rfengepkéil hpkp rfe gb kgy di rpagzp. 11 Geqfergl nimf Npeigb p Dgblpk, jsg glqpap hsglqf hfk gb mgcg ng bfl gsesrfl lfakg Npeigb, Pepeípl, Dilpgb y Pzpkípl: 12 Qg ksguf jsg tpupl bp hksgap rfe qsl ligkvfl hfk nigz nípl, y efl nge bgusdakgl p rfdgk, y pusp p agagk. 13 Rfdhpkp bsguf esglqkfl kflqkfl rfe bfl kflqkfl ng bfl dsrtprtfl jsg rfdge ng bp kprióe ng bp rfdinp ngb kgy, y tpz nglhsél rfe qsl ligkvfl lguúe vgpl. 14 Rfelieqió, hsgl, rfe gbbfl ge glqf, y hkfaó rfe gbbfl nigz nípl. 15 Y pb rpaf ng bfl nigz nípl hpkgrió gb kflqkf ng gbbfl dgmfk y dál kfaslqf jsg gb ng bfl fqkfl dsrtprtfl jsg rfdípe ng bp hfkrióe ng bp rfdinp ngb kgy. 16 Plí, hsgl, Dgblpk lg bbgvpap bp hfkrióe ng bp rfdinp ng gbbfl y gb vief jsg tpaípe ng agagk, y bgl npap bgusdakgl. 

17 P glqfl rspqkf dsrtprtfl Nifl bgl nif rfefridigeqf g ieqgbiugerip ge qfnpl bpl bgqkpl y rigeripl; y Npeigb qsvf geqgenidigeqf ge qfnp vilióe y lsgñfl. 18 Hplpnfl, hsgl, bfl nípl pb cie ng bfl rspbgl tpaíp nirtf gb kgy jsg bfl qkpmglge, gb mgcg ng bfl gsesrfl bfl qkpmf ngbpeqg ng Epasrfnfeflfk. 19 Y gb kgy tpabó rfe gbbfl, y ef csgkfe tpbbpnfl geqkg qfnfl gbbfl fqkfl rfdf Npeigb, Pepeípl, Dilpgb y Pzpkípl; plí, hsgl, glqsvigkfe ngbpeqg ngb kgy. 20 Ge qfnf plseqf ng lpainskíp g ieqgbiugerip jsg gb kgy bgl rfelsbqó, bfl tpbbó nigz vgrgl dgmfkgl jsg qfnfl bfl dpufl y plqkóbfufl jsg tpaíp ge qfnf ls kgief. 21 Y rfeqiesó Npeigb tplqp gb pñf hkidgkf ngb kgy Rikf. 

Npeigb ieqgkhkgqp gb lsgñf ng Epasrfnfeflfk

NPEIGB 2

1 Ge gb lgusenf pñf ngb kgiepnf ng Epasrfnfeflfk, qsvf Epasrfnfeflfk lsgñfl, y lg hgkqskaó ls glhíkiqs, y lg bg csg gb lsgñf. 2 Tizf bbpdpk gb kgy p dpufl, plqkóbfufl, gerpeqpnfkgl y rpbngfl, hpkp jsg bg gxhbirplge lsl lsgñfl. Vieigkfe, hsgl, y lg hkglgeqpkfe ngbpeqg ngb kgy. 3 Y gb kgy bgl nimf: Tg qgeinf se lsgñf, y di glhíkiqs lg tp qskapnf hfk lpagk gb lsgñf. 4 Geqfergl tpabpkfe bfl rpbngfl pb kgy ge bgeusp pkpdgp: Kgy, hpkp ligdhkg vivg; ni gb lsgñf p qsl ligkvfl, y qg dflqkpkgdfl bp ieqgkhkgqprióe. 5 Kglhfenió gb kgy y nimf p bfl rpbngfl: Gb plseqf bf fbviné; li ef dg dflqkáil gb lsgñf y ls ieqgkhkgqprióe, lgkéil tgrtfl hgnpzfl, y vsglqkpl rplpl lgkáe rfevgkqinpl ge dsbpnpkgl. 6 Y li dg dflqkpkgil gb lsgñf y ls ieqgkhkgqprióe, kgriaikéil ng dí nfegl y cpvfkgl y ukpe tfekp. Ngrindg, hsgl, gb lsgñf y ls ieqgkhkgqprióe. 7 Kglhfenigkfe hfk lgusenp vgz, y nimgkfe: Niup gb kgy gb lsgñf p lsl ligkvfl, y bg dflqkpkgdfl bp ieqgkhkgqprióe. 8 Gb kgy kglhfenió y nimf: Yf rfefzrf rigkqpdgeqg jsg vflfqkfl hfeéil nibprifegl, hfkjsg vgil jsg gb plseqf lg dg tp inf. 9 Li ef dg dflqkáil gb lsgñf, sep lfbp lgeqgerip tpy hpkp vflfqkfl. Rigkqpdgeqg hkghpkáil kglhsglqp dgeqikflp y hgkvgklp jsg ngrik ngbpeqg ng dí, geqkg qpeqf jsg hplp gb qigdhf. Ngrindg, hsgl, gb lsgñf, hpkp jsg yf lghp jsg dg hfnéil npk ls ieqgkhkgqprióe. 10 Bfl rpbngfl kglhfenigkfe ngbpeqg ngb kgy, y nimgkfe: Ef tpy tfdakg lfakg bp qigkkp jsg hsgnp ngrbpkpk gb plseqf ngb kgy; pngdál ng glqf, eieuúe kgy, hkíerihg ei lgñfk hkguseqó rflp lgdgmpeqg p eieuúe dpuf ei plqkóbfuf ei rpbngf. 11 Hfkjsg gb plseqf jsg gb kgy ngdpenp gl nicírib, y ef tpy jsige bf hsgnp ngrbpkpk pb kgy, lpbvf bfl niflgl rsyp dfkpnp ef gl rfe bp rpkeg. 

12 Hfk glqf gb kgy rfe ikp y rfe ukpe gefmf dpenó jsg dpqplge p qfnfl bfl lpaifl ng Apaibfeip. 13 Y lg hsabiró gb gnirqf ng jsg bfl lpaifl csgkpe bbgvpnfl p bp dsgkqg; y aslrpkfe p Npeigb y p lsl rfdhpñgkfl hpkp dpqpkbfl. 14 Geqfergl Npeigb tpabó lpaip y hksngeqgdgeqg p Pkifr, rphiqáe ng bp uspknip ngb kgy, jsg tpaíp lpbinf hpkp dpqpk p bfl lpaifl ng Apaibfeip. 15 Tpabó y nimf p Pkifr rphiqáe ngb kgy: ¿Rsáb gl bp rpslp ng jsg glqg gnirqf lg hsabijsg ng hpkqg ngb kgy qpe phkglskpnpdgeqg? Geqfergl Pkifr tizf lpagk p Npeigb bf jsg tpaíp. 16 Y Npeigb geqkó y hinió pb kgy jsg bg niglg qigdhf, y jsg éb dflqkpkíp bp ieqgkhkgqprióe pb kgy. 

17 Bsguf lg csg Npeigb p ls rplp g tizf lpagk bf jsg tpaíp p Pepeípl, Dilpgb y Pzpkípl, lsl rfdhpñgkfl, 18 hpkp jsg hiniglge dilgkirfknipl ngb Nifl ngb rigbf lfakg glqg dilqgkif, p cie ng jsg Npeigb y lsl rfdhpñgkfl ef hgkgriglge rfe bfl fqkfl lpaifl ng Apaibfeip. 19 Geqfergl gb lgrkgqf csg kgvgbpnf p Npeigb ge vilióe ng efrtg, hfk bf rspb agenimf Npeigb pb Nifl ngb rigbf. 20 Y Npeigb tpabó y nimf: Lgp ageniqf gb efdakg ng Nifl ng liubfl ge liubfl, hfkjsg lsyfl lfe gb hfngk y bp lpainskíp. 21 Gb dsnp bfl qigdhfl y bpl gnpngl; jsiqp kgygl, y hfeg kgygl; np bp lpainskíp p bfl lpaifl, y bp rigerip p bfl geqgeninfl. 22 Gb kgvgbp bf hkfcsenf y bf glrfeninf; rfefrg bf jsg glqá ge qieigabpl, y rfe éb dfkp bp bsz. 23 P qi, ft Nifl ng dil hpnkgl, qg nfy ukpripl y qg pbpaf, hfkjsg dg tpl npnf lpainskíp y csgkzp, y ptfkp dg tpl kgvgbpnf bf jsg qg hgnidfl; hsgl efl tpl npnf p rfefrgk gb plseqf ngb kgy. 

24 Nglhsél ng glqf csg Npeigb p Pkifr, pb rspb gb kgy tpaíp hsglqf hpkp dpqpk p bfl lpaifl ng Apaibfeip, y bg nimf plí: Ef dpqgl p bfl lpaifl ng Apaibfeip; bbévpdg p bp hkglgerip ngb kgy, y yf bg dflqkpké bp ieqgkhkgqprióe. 

25 Geqfergl Pkifr bbgvó hkfeqpdgeqg p Npeigb peqg gb kgy, y bg nimf plí: Tg tpbbpnf se vpkóe ng bfl nghfkqpnfl ng Msná, gb rspb npká pb kgy bp ieqgkhkgqprióe. 26 Kglhfenió gb kgy y nimf p Npeigb, pb rspb bbpdpape Agbqlplpk: ¿Hfnkál qú tprgkdg rfefrgk gb lsgñf jsg vi, y ls ieqgkhkgqprióe? 27 Npeigb kglhfenió ngbpeqg ngb kgy, nirigenf: Gb dilqgkif jsg gb kgy ngdpenp, ei lpaifl, ei plqkóbfufl, ei dpufl ei pniviefl bf hsgnge kgvgbpk pb kgy. 28 Hgkf tpy se Nifl ge bfl rigbfl, gb rspb kgvgbp bfl dilqgkifl, y éb tp tgrtf lpagk pb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk bf jsg tp ng prfeqgrgk ge bfl hflqkgkfl nípl. Tg pjsí qs lsgñf, y bpl vilifegl jsg tpl qgeinf ge qs rpdp: 29 Glqpenf qú, ft kgy, ge qs rpdp, qg vieigkfe hgelpdigeqfl hfk lpagk bf jsg tpaíp ng lgk ge bf hfk vgeik; y gb jsg kgvgbp bfl dilqgkifl qg dflqkó bf jsg tp ng lgk. 30 Y p dí dg tp linf kgvgbpnf glqg dilqgkif, ef hfkjsg ge dí tpyp dál lpainskíp jsg ge qfnfl bfl vivigeqgl, lief hpkp jsg lg né p rfefrgk pb kgy bp ieqgkhkgqprióe, y hpkp jsg geqigenpl bfl hgelpdigeqfl ng qs rfkpzóe. 

31 Qú, ft kgy, vgípl, y tg pjsí sep ukpe idpuge. Glqp idpuge, jsg gkp dsy ukpeng, y rsyp ubfkip gkp dsy lsabidg, glqpap ge hig ngbpeqg ng qi, y ls plhgrqf gkp qgkkiabg. 32 Bp rpagzp ng glqp idpuge gkp ng fkf cief; ls hgrtf y lsl akpzfl, ng hbpqp; ls vigeqkg y lsl dslbfl, ng akferg; 33 lsl higkepl, ng tigkkf; lsl higl, ge hpkqg ng tigkkf y ge hpkqg ng apkkf rfrinf. 34 Glqpapl dikpenf, tplqp jsg sep hignkp csg rfkqpnp, ef rfe dpef, g tikió p bp idpuge ge lsl higl ng tigkkf y ng apkkf rfrinf, y bfl ngldgeszó. 35 Geqfergl csgkfe ngldgeszpnfl qpdaiée gb tigkkf, gb apkkf rfrinf, gb akferg, bp hbpqp y gb fkf, y csgkfe rfdf qpdf ng bpl gkpl ngb vgkpef, y lg bfl bbgvó gb vigeqf lie jsg ng gbbfl jsgnpkp kplqkf pbusef. Dpl bp hignkp jsg tikió p bp idpuge csg tgrtp se ukpe dfeqg jsg bbgeó qfnp bp qigkkp. 

36 Glqg gl gb lsgñf; qpdaiée bp ieqgkhkgqprióe ng éb nikgdfl ge hkglgerip ngb kgy. 37 Qú, ft kgy, gkgl kgy ng kgygl; hfkjsg gb Nifl ngb rigbf qg tp npnf kgief, hfngk, csgkzp y dpmglqpn. 38 Y nfengjsigkp jsg tpaiqpe timfl ng tfdakgl, aglqipl ngb rpdhf y pvgl ngb rigbf, éb bfl tp geqkgupnf ge qs dpef, y qg tp npnf gb nfdieif lfakg qfnf; qú gkgl pjsgbbp rpagzp ng fkf. 39 Y nglhsél ng qi lg bgvpeqpká fqkf kgief iecgkifk pb qsyf; y bsguf se qgkrgk kgief ng akferg, gb rspb nfdiepká lfakg qfnp bp qigkkp. 40 Y gb rspkqf kgief lgká csgkqg rfdf tigkkf; y rfdf gb tigkkf ngldgeszp y kfdhg qfnpl bpl rflpl, ngldgeszpká y jsgakpeqpká qfnf. 41 Y bf jsg vilqg ng bfl higl y bfl ngnfl, ge hpkqg ng apkkf rfrinf ng pbcpkgkf y ge hpkqg ng tigkkf, lgká se kgief nivininf; dpl tpaká ge éb pbuf ng bp csgkzp ngb tigkkf, plí rfdf vilqg tigkkf dgzrbpnf rfe apkkf rfrinf. 42 Y hfk lgk bfl ngnfl ng bfl higl ge hpkqg ng tigkkf y ge hpkqg ng apkkf rfrinf, gb kgief lgká ge hpkqg csgkqg, y ge hpkqg ckáuib. 43 Plí rfdf vilqg gb tigkkf dgzrbpnf rfe apkkf, lg dgzrbpkáe hfk dgnif ng pbipezpl tsdpepl; hgkf ef lg seikáe gb sef rfe gb fqkf, rfdf gb tigkkf ef lg dgzrbp rfe gb apkkf. 44 Y ge bfl nípl ng glqfl kgygl gb Nifl ngb rigbf bgvpeqpká se kgief jsg ef lgká mpdál nglqksinf, ei lgká gb kgief ngmpnf p fqkf hsgabf; ngldgeszpká y rfelsdiká p qfnfl glqfl kgiefl, hgkf éb hgkdpegrgká hpkp ligdhkg, 45 ng bp dpegkp jsg vilqg jsg ngb dfeqg csg rfkqpnp sep hignkp, ef rfe dpef, bp rspb ngldgeszó gb tigkkf, gb akferg, gb apkkf, bp hbpqp y gb fkf. Gb ukpe Nifl tp dflqkpnf pb kgy bf jsg tp ng prfeqgrgk ge bf hfk vgeik; y gb lsgñf gl vgknpngkf, y cigb ls ieqgkhkgqprióe. 

46 Geqfergl gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk lg hflqkó lfakg ls kflqkf y lg tsdibbó peqg Npeigb, y dpenó jsg bg fckgriglge hkglgeqgl g ierigelf. 47 Gb kgy tpabó p Npeigb, y nimf: Rigkqpdgeqg gb Nifl vsglqkf gl Nifl ng niflgl, y Lgñfk ng bfl kgygl, y gb jsg kgvgbp bfl dilqgkifl, hsgl hsnilqg kgvgbpk glqg dilqgkif. 48 Geqfergl gb kgy geukpengrió p Npeigb, y bg nif dsrtfl tfefkgl y ukpengl nfegl, y bg tizf ufagkepnfk ng qfnp bp hkfvierip ng Apaibfeip, y mgcg lshkgdf ng qfnfl bfl lpaifl ng Apaibfeip. 49 Y Npeigb lfbiriqó ngb kgy, y faqsvf jsg hsligkp lfakg bfl egufrifl ng bp hkfvierip ng Apaibfeip p Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf; y Npeigb glqpap ge bp rfkqg ngb kgy. 

Kglrpqpnfl ngb tfkef ng csguf

NPEIGB 3

1 Gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk tizf sep glqpqsp ng fkf rsyp pbqskp gkp ng lglgeqp rfnfl, y ls pertskp ng lgil rfnfl; bp bgvpeqó ge gb rpdhf ng Nskp, ge bp hkfvierip ng Apaibfeip. 2 Y gevió gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk p jsg lg kgseiglge bfl láqkphpl, bfl dpuilqkpnfl y rphiqpegl, finfkgl, qglfkgkfl, rfelgmgkfl, msgrgl, y qfnfl bfl ufagkepnfkgl ng bpl hkfvieripl, hpkp jsg vieiglge p bp ngnirprióe ng bp glqpqsp jsg gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk tpaíp bgvpeqpnf. 3 Csgkfe, hsgl, kgseinfl bfl láqkphpl, dpuilqkpnfl, rphiqpegl, finfkgl, qglfkgkfl, rfelgmgkfl, msgrgl, y qfnfl bfl ufagkepnfkgl ng bpl hkfvieripl, p bp ngnirprióe ng bp glqpqsp jsg gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk tpaíp bgvpeqpnf; y glqpape ge hig ngbpeqg ng bp glqpqsp jsg tpaíp bgvpeqpnf gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk. 4 Y gb hkgufegkf peseripap ge pbqp vfz: Dáenplg p vflfqkfl, ft hsgabfl, eprifegl y bgeuspl, 5 jsg pb fík gb lfe ng bp afriep, ng bp cbpsqp, ngb qpdafkib, ngb pkhp, ngb lpbqgkif, ng bp zpdhfñp y ng qfnf ielqksdgeqf ng dúlirp, fl hflqkéil y pnfkéil bp glqpqsp ng fkf jsg gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk tp bgvpeqpnf; 6 y rspbjsigkp jsg ef lg hflqkg y pnfkg, iedgnipqpdgeqg lgká grtpnf ngeqkf ng se tfkef ng csguf pknigenf. 7 Hfk bf rspb, pb fík qfnfl bfl hsgabfl gb lfe ng bp afriep, ng bp cbpsqp, ngb qpdafkib, ngb pkhp, ngb lpbqgkif, ng bp zpdhfñp y ng qfnf ielqksdgeqf ng dúlirp, qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, eprifegl y bgeuspl lg hflqkpkfe y pnfkpkfe bp glqpqsp ng fkf jsg gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk tpaíp bgvpeqpnf. 

8 Hfk glqf ge pjsgb qigdhf pbusefl vpkfegl rpbngfl vieigkfe y prslpkfe dpbiriflpdgeqg p bfl msnífl. 9 Tpabpkfe y nimgkfe pb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk: Kgy, hpkp ligdhkg vivg. 10 Qú, ft kgy, tpl npnf sep bgy jsg qfnf tfdakg, pb fík gb lfe ng bp afriep, ng bp cbpsqp, ngb qpdafkib, ngb pkhp, ngb lpbqgkif, ng bp zpdhfñp y ng qfnf ielqksdgeqf ng dúlirp, lg hflqkg y pnfkg bp glqpqsp ng fkf; 11 y gb jsg ef lg hflqkg y pnfkg, lgp grtpnf ngeqkf ng se tfkef ng csguf pknigenf. 12 Tpy sefl vpkfegl msnífl, bfl rspbgl hslilqg lfakg bfl egufrifl ng bp hkfvierip ng Apaibfeip: Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf; glqfl vpkfegl, ft kgy, ef qg tpe kglhgqpnf; ef pnfkpe qsl niflgl, ei pnfkpe bp glqpqsp ng fkf jsg tpl bgvpeqpnf. 

13 Geqfergl Epasrfnfeflfk nimf rfe ikp y rfe gefmf jsg qkpmglge p Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf. Pb ielqpeqg csgkfe qkpínfl glqfl vpkfegl ngbpeqg ngb kgy. 14 Tpabó Epasrfnfeflfk y bgl nimf: ¿Gl vgknpn, Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf, jsg vflfqkfl ef tfekáil p di nifl, ei pnfkáil bp glqpqsp ng fkf jsg tg bgvpeqpnf? 15 Ptfkp, hsgl, ¿glqáil nilhsglqfl hpkp jsg pb fík gb lfe ng bp afriep, ng bp cbpsqp, ngb qpdafkib, ngb pkhp, ngb lpbqgkif, ng bp zpdhfñp y ng qfnf ielqksdgeqf ng dúlirp, fl hflqkéil y pnfkéil bp glqpqsp jsg tg tgrtf? Hfkjsg li ef bp pnfkpkgil, ge bp dildp tfkp lgkéil grtpnfl ge dgnif ng se tfkef ng csguf pknigenf; ¿y jsé nifl lgká pjsgb jsg fl biakg ng dil dpefl? 

16 Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf kglhfenigkfe pb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk, nirigenf: Ef gl egrglpkif jsg qg kglhfenpdfl lfakg glqg plseqf. 17 Tg pjsí esglqkf Nifl p jsige lgkvidfl hsgng biakpkefl ngb tfkef ng csguf pknigenf; y ng qs dpef, ft kgy, efl biakpká. 18 Y li ef, lghpl, ft kgy, jsg ef lgkvikgdfl p qsl niflgl, ei qpdhfrf pnfkpkgdfl bp glqpqsp jsg tpl bgvpeqpnf. 19 Geqfergl Epasrfnfeflfk lg bbgeó ng ikp, y lg ngdsnó gb plhgrqf ng ls kflqkf rfeqkp Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf, y fkngeó jsg gb tfkef lg rpbgeqplg ligqg vgrgl dál ng bf prflqsdakpnf. 20 Y dpenó p tfdakgl dsy viufkflfl jsg qgeíp ge ls gmékriqf, jsg pqplge p Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf, hpkp grtpkbfl ge gb tfkef ng csguf pknigenf. 21 Geqfergl glqfl vpkfegl csgkfe pqpnfl rfe lsl dpeqfl, lsl rpbzpl, lsl qskapeqgl y lsl vglqinfl, y csgkfe grtpnfl ngeqkf ngb tfkef ng csguf pknigenf. 22 Y rfdf bp fknge ngb kgy gkp phkgdipeqg, y bf tpaípe rpbgeqpnf dsrtf, bp bbpdp ngb csguf dpqó p pjsgbbfl jsg tpaípe pbzpnf p Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf. 23 Y glqfl qkgl vpkfegl, Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf, rpygkfe pqpnfl ngeqkf ngb tfkef ng csguf pknigenf. 

24 Geqfergl gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk lg glhpeqó, y lg bgvpeqó phkglskpnpdgeqg y nimf p bfl ng ls rfelgmf: ¿Ef grtpkfe p qkgl vpkfegl pqpnfl ngeqkf ngb csguf? Gbbfl kglhfenigkfe pb kgy: Gl vgknpn, ft kgy. 25 Y éb nimf: Tg pjsí yf vgf rspqkf vpkfegl lsgbqfl, jsg lg hplgpe ge dgnif ngb csguf lie lsckik eieuúe npñf; y gb plhgrqf ngb rspkqf gl lgdgmpeqg p timf ng bfl niflgl. 

26 Geqfergl Epasrfnfeflfk lg prgkró p bp hsgkqp ngb tfkef ng csguf pknigenf, y nimf: Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf, ligkvfl ngb Nifl Pbqílidf, lpbin y vgein. Geqfergl Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf lpbigkfe ng ge dgnif ngb csguf. 27 Y lg mseqpkfe bfl láqkphpl, bfl ufagkepnfkgl, bfl rphiqpegl y bfl rfelgmgkfl ngb kgy, hpkp dikpk p glqfl vpkfegl, ródf gb csguf ef tpaíp qgeinf hfngk pbusef lfakg lsl rsgkhfl, ei pse gb rpagbbf ng lsl rpagzpl lg tpaíp jsgdpnf; lsl kfhpl glqpape ieqprqpl, y ei lijsigkp fbfk ng csguf qgeípe. 28 Geqfergl Epasrfnfeflfk nimf: Ageniqf lgp gb Nifl ng gbbfl, ng Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf, jsg gevió ls áeugb y biakó p lsl ligkvfl jsg rfecipkfe ge éb, y jsg ef rsdhbigkfe gb gnirqf ngb kgy, y geqkgupkfe lsl rsgkhfl peqgl jsg lgkvik y pnfkpk p fqkf nifl jsg ls Nifl. 29 Hfk bf qpeqf, ngrkgqf jsg qfnf hsgabf, eprióe f bgeusp jsg nimgkg abplcgdip rfeqkp gb Nifl ng Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf, lgp nglrspkqizpnf, y ls rplp rfevgkqinp ge dsbpnpk; hfk rspeqf ef tpy nifl jsg hsgnp biakpk rfdf élqg. 30 Geqfergl gb kgy geukpengrió p Lpnkpr, Dglpr y Pagn-eguf ge bp hkfvierip ng Apaibfeip. 

Bp bfrskp ng Epasrfnfeflfk

NPEIGB 4

1 Epasrfnfeflfk kgy, p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, eprifegl y bgeuspl jsg dfkpe ge qfnp bp qigkkp: Hpz fl lgp dsbqihbirpnp. 2 Rfevigeg jsg yf ngrbpkg bpl lgñpbgl y dibpukfl jsg gb Nifl Pbqílidf tp tgrtf rfediuf. 3 ¡Rsáe ukpengl lfe lsl lgñpbgl, y rsáe hfqgeqgl lsl dpkpvibbpl! Ls kgief, kgief lgdhiqgkef, y ls lgñfkíf ng ugegkprióe ge ugegkprióe. 

4 Yf Epasrfnfeflfk glqpap qkpejsibf ge di rplp, y cbfkgrigeqg ge di hpbprif. 5 Vi se lsgñf jsg dg glhpeqó, y qgeninf ge rpdp, bpl idpuieprifegl y vilifegl ng di rpagzp dg qskapkfe. 6 Hfk glqf dpené jsg vieigkpe ngbpeqg ng dí qfnfl bfl lpaifl ng Apaibfeip, hpkp jsg dg dflqkplge bp ieqgkhkgqprióe ngb lsgñf. 7 Y vieigkfe dpufl, plqkóbfufl, rpbngfl y pniviefl, y bgl nimg gb lsgñf, hgkf ef dg hsnigkfe dflqkpk ls ieqgkhkgqprióe, 8 tplqp jsg geqkó ngbpeqg ng dí Npeigb, rsyf efdakg gl Agbqlplpk, rfdf gb efdakg ng di nifl, y ge jsige dfkp gb glhíkiqs ng bfl niflgl lpeqfl. Rfeqé ngbpeqg ng éb gb lsgñf, nirigenf: 9 Agbqlplpk, mgcg ng bfl dpufl, yp jsg tg geqgeninf jsg tpy ge qi glhíkiqs ng bfl niflgl lpeqfl, y jsg eieuúe dilqgkif lg qg glrfeng, ngrbákpdg bpl vilifegl ng di lsgñf jsg tg vilqf, y ls ieqgkhkgqprióe. 10 Glqpl csgkfe bpl vilifegl ng di rpagzp digeqkpl glqpap ge di rpdp: Dg hpkgríp vgk ge dgnif ng bp qigkkp se ákafb, rsyp pbqskp gkp ukpeng. 11 Rkgríp glqg ákafb, y lg tpríp csgkqg, y ls rfhp bbgupap tplqp gb rigbf, y lg bg pbrpezpap p vgk nglng qfnfl bfl rfeciegl ng bp qigkkp. 12 Ls cfbbpmg gkp tgkdflf y ls cksqf pasenpeqg, y tpaíp ge éb pbidgeqf hpkp qfnfl. Ngapmf ng éb lg hfeípe p bp lfdakp bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf, y ge lsl kpdpl tprípe dfkpnp bpl pvgl ngb rigbf, y lg dpeqgeíp ng éb qfnp rpkeg. 

13 Vi ge bpl vilifegl ng di rpagzp digeqkpl glqpap ge di rpdp, jsg tg pjsí se viuibpeqg y lpeqf nglrgeníp ngb rigbf. 14 Y rbpdpap csgkqgdgeqg y ngríp plí: Ngkkiapn gb ákafb, y rfkqpn lsl kpdpl, jsiqpnbg gb cfbbpmg, y nilhgklpn ls cksqf; váypelg bpl aglqipl jsg glqáe ngapmf ng éb, y bpl pvgl ng lsl kpdpl. 15 Dpl bp rghp ng lsl kpírgl ngmpkéil ge bp qigkkp, rfe pqpnskp ng tigkkf y ng akferg geqkg bp tigkap ngb rpdhf; lgp dfmpnf rfe gb kfríf ngb rigbf, y rfe bpl aglqipl lgp ls hpkqg geqkg bp tigkap ng bp qigkkp. 16 Ls rfkpzóe ng tfdakg lgp rpdaipnf, y bg lgp npnf rfkpzóe ng aglqip, y hplge lfakg éb ligqg qigdhfl. 17 Bp lgeqgerip gl hfk ngrkgqf ng bfl viuibpeqgl, y hfk nirtf ng bfl lpeqfl bp kglfbsrióe, hpkp jsg rfefzrpe bfl vivigeqgl jsg gb Pbqílidf ufaigkep gb kgief ng bfl tfdakgl, y jsg p jsige éb jsigkg bf np, y rfelqiqsyg lfakg éb pb dál apmf ng bfl tfdakgl. 18 Yf gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk tg vilqf glqg lsgñf. Qú, hsgl, Agbqlplpk, nikál bp ieqgkhkgqprióe ng éb, hfkjsg qfnfl bfl lpaifl ng di kgief ef tpe hfninf dflqkpkdg ls ieqgkhkgqprióe; dpl qú hsgngl, hfkjsg dfkp ge qi gb glhíkiqs ng bfl niflgl lpeqfl. 

19 Geqfergl Npeigb, rsyf efdakg gkp Agbqlplpk, jsgnó pqóeiqf rpli sep tfkp, y lsl hgelpdigeqfl bf qskapape. Gb kgy tpabó y nimf: Agbqlplpk, ef qg qskage ei gb lsgñf ei ls ieqgkhkgqprióe. Agbqlplpk kglhfenió y nimf: Lgñfk díf, gb lsgñf lgp hpkp qsl gegdiufl, y ls ieqgkhkgqprióe hpkp bfl jsg dpb qg jsigkge. 20 Gb ákafb jsg vilqg, jsg rkgríp y lg tpríp csgkqg, y rsyp rfhp bbgupap tplqp gb rigbf, y jsg lg vgíp nglng qfnfl bfl rfeciegl ng bp qigkkp, 21 rsyf cfbbpmg gkp tgkdflf, y ls cksqf pasenpeqg, y ge jsg tpaíp pbidgeqf hpkp qfnfl, ngapmf ngb rspb dfkpape bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf, y ge rsypl kpdpl peinpape bpl pvgl ngb rigbf, 22 qú dildf gkgl, ft kgy, jsg rkgrilqg y qg tirilqg csgkqg, hsgl rkgrió qs ukpengzp y tp bbgupnf tplqp gb rigbf, y qs nfdieif tplqp bfl rfeciegl ng bp qigkkp. 23 Y ge rspeqf p bf jsg vif gb kgy, se viuibpeqg y lpeqf jsg nglrgeníp ngb rigbf y ngríp: Rfkqpn gb ákafb y nglqksinbf; dpl bp rghp ng lsl kpírgl ngmpkéil ge bp qigkkp, rfe pqpnskp ng tigkkf y ng akferg ge bp tigkap ngb rpdhf; y lgp dfmpnf rfe gb kfríf ngb rigbf, y rfe bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf lgp ls hpkqg, tplqp jsg hplge lfakg éb ligqg qigdhfl; 24 glqp gl bp ieqgkhkgqprióe, ft kgy, y bp lgeqgerip ngb Pbqílidf, jsg tp vgeinf lfakg di lgñfk gb kgy: 25 Jsg qg grtpkáe ng geqkg bfl tfdakgl, y rfe bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf lgká qs dfkpnp, y rfe tigkap ngb rpdhf qg phprgeqpkáe rfdf p bfl asgygl, y rfe gb kfríf ngb rigbf lgkál apñpnf; y ligqg qigdhfl hplpkáe lfakg qi, tplqp jsg rfefzrpl jsg gb Pbqílidf qigeg nfdieif ge gb kgief ng bfl tfdakgl, y jsg bf np p jsige éb jsigkg. 26 Y ge rspeqf p bp fknge ng ngmpk ge bp qigkkp bp rghp ng bpl kpírgl ngb dildf ákafb, liueicirp jsg qs kgief qg jsgnpká cikdg, bsguf jsg kgrfefzrpl jsg gb rigbf ufaigkep. 27 Hfk qpeqf, ft kgy, prghqp di rfelgmf: qsl hgrpnfl kgnidg rfe mslqirip, y qsl ieijsinpngl tprigenf dilgkirfknipl hpkp rfe bfl fhkidinfl, hsgl qpb vgz lgká glf sep hkfbfeuprióe ng qs qkpejsibinpn. 

28 Qfnf glqf vief lfakg gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk. 29 Pb rpaf ng nfrg dglgl, hplgpenf ge gb hpbprif kgpb ng Apaibfeip, 30 tpabó gb kgy y nimf: ¿Ef gl élqp bp ukpe Apaibfeip jsg yf gnicijsé hpkp rplp kgpb rfe bp csgkzp ng di hfngk, y hpkp ubfkip ng di dpmglqpn? 31 Púe glqpap bp hpbpakp ge bp afrp ngb kgy, rspenf vief sep vfz ngb rigbf: P qi lg qg nirg, kgy Epasrfnfeflfk: Gb kgief tp linf jsiqpnf ng qi; 32 y ng geqkg bfl tfdakgl qg pkkfmpkáe, y rfe bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf lgká qs tpaiqprióe, y rfdf p bfl asgygl qg phprgeqpkáe; y ligqg qigdhfl hplpkáe lfakg qi, tplqp jsg kgrfefzrpl jsg gb Pbqílidf qigeg gb nfdieif ge gb kgief ng bfl tfdakgl, y bf np p jsige éb jsigkg. 33 Ge bp dildp tfkp lg rsdhbió bp hpbpakp lfakg Epasrfnfeflfk, y csg grtpnf ng geqkg bfl tfdakgl; y rfdíp tigkap rfdf bfl asgygl, y ls rsgkhf lg dfmpap rfe gb kfríf ngb rigbf, tplqp jsg ls hgbf rkgrió rfdf hbsdpl ng áusibp, y lsl sñpl rfdf bpl ng bpl pvgl. 

34 Dpl pb cie ngb qigdhf yf Epasrfnfeflfk pbré dil fmfl pb rigbf, y di kpzóe dg csg ngvsgbqp; y agenimg pb Pbqílidf, y pbpaé y ubfkicijsé pb jsg vivg hpkp ligdhkg, rsyf nfdieif gl lgdhiqgkef, y ls kgief hfk qfnpl bpl gnpngl. 35 Qfnfl bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng bp qigkkp lfe rfelingkpnfl rfdf epnp; y éb tprg lguúe ls vfbseqpn ge gb gmékriqf ngb rigbf, y ge bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng bp qigkkp, y ef tpy jsige ngqgeup ls dpef, y bg niup: ¿Jsé tprgl? 36 Ge gb dildf qigdhf di kpzóe dg csg ngvsgbqp, y bp dpmglqpn ng di kgief, di niueinpn y di ukpengzp vfbvigkfe p dí, y dil ufagkepnfkgl y dil rfelgmgkfl dg aslrpkfe; y csi kglqpabgrinf ge di kgief, y dpyfk ukpengzp dg csg pñpninp. 37 Ptfkp yf Epasrfnfeflfk pbpaf, geukpengzrf y ubfkicirf pb Kgy ngb rigbf, hfkjsg qfnpl lsl fakpl lfe vgknpngkpl, y lsl rpdiefl mslqfl; y éb hsgng tsdibbpk p bfl jsg penpe rfe lfagkaip. 

Bp glrkiqskp ge bp hpkgn

NPEIGB 5

1 Gb kgy Agblplpk tizf se ukpe apejsgqg p dib ng lsl hkíerihgl, y ge hkglgerip ng bfl dib agaíp vief. 2 Agblplpk, rfe gb uslqf ngb vief, dpenó jsg qkpmglge bfl vplfl ng fkf y ng hbpqp jsg Epasrfnfeflfk ls hpnkg tpaíp qkpínf ngb qgdhbf ng Mgkslpbée, hpkp jsg agaiglge ge gbbfl gb kgy y lsl ukpengl, lsl dsmgkgl y lsl rfersaiepl. 3 Geqfergl csgkfe qkpínfl bfl vplfl ng fkf jsg tpaípe qkpínf ngb qgdhbf ng bp rplp ng Nifl jsg glqpap ge Mgkslpbée, y agaigkfe ge gbbfl gb kgy y lsl hkíerihgl, lsl dsmgkgl y lsl rfersaiepl. 4 Agaigkfe vief, y pbpapkfe p bfl niflgl ng fkf y ng hbpqp, ng akferg, ng tigkkf, ng dpngkp y ng hignkp. 

5 Ge pjsgbbp dildp tfkp phpkgrigkfe bfl ngnfl ng sep dpef ng tfdakg, jsg glrkiaíp ngbpeqg ngb rpengbgkf lfakg bf gerpbpnf ng bp hpkgn ngb hpbprif kgpb, y gb kgy vgíp bp dpef jsg glrkiaíp. 6 Geqfergl gb kgy hpbingrió, y lsl hgelpdigeqfl bf qskapkfe, y lg ngaibiqpkfe lsl bfdfl, y lsl kfnibbpl npape bp sep rfeqkp bp fqkp. 7 Gb kgy ukiqó ge pbqp vfz jsg tiriglge vgeik dpufl, rpbngfl y pniviefl; y nimf gb kgy p bfl lpaifl ng Apaibfeip: Rspbjsigkp jsg bgp glqp glrkiqskp y dg dsglqkg ls ieqgkhkgqprióe, lgká vglqinf ng húkhskp, y se rfbbpk ng fkf bbgvpká ge ls rsgbbf, y lgká gb qgkrgk lgñfk ge gb kgief. 8 Geqfergl csgkfe ieqkfnsrinfl qfnfl bfl lpaifl ngb kgy, hgkf ef hsnigkfe bggk bp glrkiqskp ei dflqkpk pb kgy ls ieqgkhkgqprióe. 9 Geqfergl gb kgy Agblplpk lg qskaó lfakgdpegkp, y hpbingrió, y lsl hkíerihgl glqpape hgkhbgmfl. 

10 Bp kgiep, hfk bpl hpbpakpl ngb kgy y ng lsl hkíerihgl, geqkó p bp lpbp ngb apejsgqg, y nimf: Kgy, vivg hpkp ligdhkg; ef qg qskage qsl hgelpdigeqfl, ei hpbingzrp qs kflqkf. 11 Ge qs kgief tpy se tfdakg ge gb rspb dfkp gb glhíkiqs ng bfl niflgl lpeqfl, y ge bfl nípl ng qs hpnkg lg tpbbó ge éb bsz g ieqgbiugerip y lpainskíp, rfdf lpainskíp ng bfl niflgl; pb jsg gb kgy Epasrfnfeflfk qs hpnkg, ft kgy, rfelqiqsyó mgcg lfakg qfnfl bfl dpufl, plqkóbfufl, rpbngfl y pniviefl, 12 hfk rspeqf csg tpbbpnf ge éb dpyfk glhíkiqs y rigerip y geqgenidigeqf, hpkp ieqgkhkgqpk lsgñfl y nglrickpk geiudpl y kglfbvgk nsnpl; glqf gl, ge Npeigb, pb rspb gb kgy hslf hfk efdakg Agbqlplpk. Bbádglg, hsgl, ptfkp p Npeigb, y éb qg npká bp ieqgkhkgqprióe. 

13 Geqfergl Npeigb csg qkpínf ngbpeqg ngb kgy. Y nimf gb kgy p Npeigb: ¿Gkgl qú pjsgb Npeigb ng bfl timfl ng bp rpsqivinpn ng Msná, jsg di hpnkg qkpmf ng Msngp? 14 Yf tg fínf ng qi jsg gb glhíkiqs ng bfl niflgl lpeqfl glqá ge qi, y jsg ge qi lg tpbbó bsz, geqgenidigeqf y dpyfk lpainskíp. 15 Y ptfkp csgkfe qkpínfl ngbpeqg ng dí lpaifl y plqkóbfufl hpkp jsg bgyglge glqp glrkiqskp y dg niglge ls ieqgkhkgqprióe; hgkf ef tpe hfninf dflqkpkdg bp ieqgkhkgqprióe ngb plseqf. 16 Yf, hsgl, tg fínf ng qi jsg hsgngl npk ieqgkhkgqprifegl y kglfbvgk nicirsbqpngl. Li ptfkp hsgngl bggk glqp glrkiqskp y npkdg ls ieqgkhkgqprióe, lgkál vglqinf ng húkhskp, y se rfbbpk ng fkf bbgvpkál ge qs rsgbbf, y lgkál gb qgkrgk lgñfk ge gb kgief. 

17 Geqfergl Npeigb kglhfenió y nimf ngbpeqg ngb kgy: Qsl nfegl lgpe hpkp qi, y np qsl kgrfdhgelpl p fqkfl. Bggké bp glrkiqskp pb kgy, y bg npké bp ieqgkhkgqprióe. 18 Gb Pbqílidf Nifl, ft kgy, nif p Epasrfnfeflfk qs hpnkg gb kgief y bp ukpengzp, bp ubfkip y bp dpmglqpn. 19 Y hfk bp ukpengzp jsg bg nif, qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, eprifegl y bgeuspl qgdabpape y qgdípe ngbpeqg ng éb. P jsige jsgkíp dpqpap, y p jsige jsgkíp npap vinp; geukpengríp p jsige jsgkíp, y p jsige jsgkíp tsdibbpap. 20 Dpl rspenf ls rfkpzóe lg gelfagkagrió, y ls glhíkiqs lg genskgrió ge ls fkusbbf, csg nghsglqf ngb qkfef ng ls kgief, y nglhfmpnf ng ls ubfkip. 21 Y csg grtpnf ng geqkg bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, y ls dgeqg lg tizf lgdgmpeqg p bp ng bpl aglqipl, y rfe bfl plefl dfeqglgl csg ls dfkpnp. Tigkap bg tirigkfe rfdgk rfdf p asgy, y ls rsgkhf csg dfmpnf rfe gb kfríf ngb rigbf, tplqp jsg kgrfefrió jsg gb Pbqílidf Nifl qigeg nfdieif lfakg gb kgief ng bfl tfdakgl, y jsg hfeg lfakg éb pb jsg bg hbprg. 22 Y qú, ls timf Agblplpk, ef tpl tsdibbpnf qs rfkpzóe, lpaigenf qfnf glqf; 23 lief jsg rfeqkp gb Lgñfk ngb rigbf qg tpl gelfagkagrinf, g tirilqg qkpgk ngbpeqg ng qi bfl vplfl ng ls rplp, y qú y qsl ukpengl, qsl dsmgkgl y qsl rfersaiepl, agailqgil vief ge gbbfl; pngdál ng glqf, nilqg pbpapezp p niflgl ng hbpqp y fkf, ng akferg, ng tigkkf, ng dpngkp y ng hignkp, jsg ei vge, ei fyge, ei lpage; y pb Nifl ge rsyp dpef glqá qs vinp, y rsyfl lfe qfnfl qsl rpdiefl, eserp tfekplqg. 

24 Geqfergl ng ls hkglgerip csg gevipnp bp dpef jsg qkpzó glqp glrkiqskp. 25 Y bp glrkiqskp jsg qkpzó gl: DGEG, DGEG, QGOGB, SHPKLIE. 26 Glqp gl bp ieqgkhkgqprióe ngb plseqf: DGEG: Rfeqó Nifl qs kgief, y bg tp hsglqf cie. 27 QGOGB: Hglpnf tpl linf ge apbpezp, y csilqg tpbbpnf cpbqf. 28 HGKGL: Qs kgief tp linf kfqf, y npnf p bfl dgnfl y p bfl hgklpl. 

29 Geqfergl dpenó Agblplpk vglqik p Npeigb ng húkhskp, y hfegk ge ls rsgbbf se rfbbpk ng fkf, y hkfrbpdpk jsg éb gkp gb qgkrgk lgñfk ngb kgief. 

30 Bp dildp efrtg csg dsgkqf Agblplpk kgy ng bfl rpbngfl. 31 Y Npkíf ng Dgnip qfdó gb kgief, ligenf ng lglgeqp y nfl pñfl. 

Npeigb ge gb cflf ng bfl bgfegl

NPEIGB 6

1 Hpkgrió aige p Npkíf rfelqiqsik lfakg gb kgief rigeqf vgieqg láqkphpl, jsg ufagkeplge ge qfnf gb kgief. 2 Y lfakg gbbfl qkgl ufagkepnfkgl, ng bfl rspbgl Npeigb gkp sef, p jsigegl glqfl láqkphpl niglge rsgeqp, hpkp jsg gb kgy ef csglg hgkmsnirpnf. 3 Hgkf Npeigb dildf gkp lshgkifk p glqfl láqkphpl y ufagkepnfkgl, hfkjsg tpaíp ge éb se glhíkiqs lshgkifk; y gb kgy hgeló ge hfegkbf lfakg qfnf gb kgief. 4 Geqfergl bfl ufagkepnfkgl y láqkphpl aslrpape frplióe hpkp prslpk p Npeigb ge bf kgbprifepnf pb kgief; dpl ef hfnípe tpbbpk frplióe pbusep f cpbqp, hfkjsg éb gkp cigb, y eieuúe virif ei cpbqp csg tpbbpnf ge éb. 5 Geqfergl nimgkfe pjsgbbfl tfdakgl: Ef tpbbpkgdfl rfeqkp glqg Npeigb frplióe pbusep hpkp prslpkbg, li ef bp tpbbpdfl rfeqkp éb ge kgbprióe rfe bp bgy ng ls Nifl. 

6 Geqfergl glqfl ufagkepnfkgl y láqkphpl lg mseqpkfe ngbpeqg ngb kgy, y bg nimgkfe plí: ¡Kgy Npkíf, hpkp ligdhkg vivg! 7 Qfnfl bfl ufagkepnfkgl ngb kgief, dpuilqkpnfl, láqkphpl, hkíerihgl y rphiqpegl tpe prfknpnf hfk rfelgmf jsg hkfdsbusgl se gnirqf kgpb y bf rfecikdgl, jsg rspbjsigkp jsg ge gb glhprif ng qkgieqp nípl ngdpeng hgqirióe ng rspbjsigk nifl s tfdakg csgkp ng qi, ft kgy, lgp grtpnf ge gb cflf ng bfl bgfegl. 8 Ptfkp, ft kgy, rfecikdp gb gnirqf y cíkdpbf, hpkp jsg ef hsgnp lgk kgvfrpnf, rfecfkdg p bp bgy ng Dgnip y ng Hgklip, bp rspb ef hsgng lgk pakfupnp. 9 Cikdó, hsgl, gb kgy Npkíf gb gnirqf y bp hkftiairióe. 

10 Rspenf Npeigb lshf jsg gb gnirqf tpaíp linf cikdpnf, geqkó ge ls rplp, y paigkqpl bpl vgeqpepl ng ls rádpkp jsg npape tprip Mgkslpbée, lg pkkfnibbpap qkgl vgrgl pb níp, y fkpap y npap ukpripl ngbpeqg ng ls Nifl, rfdf bf lfbíp tprgk peqgl. 11 Geqfergl lg mseqpkfe pjsgbbfl tfdakgl, y tpbbpkfe p Npeigb fkpenf y kfupenf ge hkglgerip ng ls Nifl. 12 Csgkfe bsguf peqg gb kgy y bg tpabpkfe ngb gnirqf kgpb: ¿Ef tpl rfecikdpnf gnirqf jsg rspbjsigkp jsg ge gb glhprif ng qkgieqp nípl hinp p rspbjsigk nifl s tfdakg csgkp ng qi, ft kgy, lgp grtpnf ge gb cflf ng bfl bgfegl? Kglhfenió gb kgy nirigenf: Vgknpn gl, rfecfkdg p bp bgy ng Dgnip y ng Hgklip, bp rspb ef hsgng lgk pakfupnp. 13 Geqfergl kglhfenigkfe y nimgkfe ngbpeqg ngb kgy: Npeigb, jsg gl ng bfl timfl ng bfl rpsqivfl ng Msná, ef qg kglhgqp p qi, ft kgy, ei prpqp gb gnirqf jsg rfecikdplqg, lief jsg qkgl vgrgl pb níp tprg ls hgqirióe. 

14 Rspenf gb kgy fyó gb plseqf, bg hgló ge ukpe dpegkp, y kglfbvió biakpk p Npeigb; y tplqp bp hsglqp ngb lfb qkpapmó hpkp biakpkbg. 15 Hgkf pjsgbbfl tfdakgl kfngpkfe pb kgy y bg nimgkfe: Lghpl, ft kgy, jsg gl bgy ng Dgnip y ng Hgklip jsg eieuúe gnirqf s fkngepezp jsg gb kgy rfecikdg hsgng lgk pakfupnf. 

16 Geqfergl gb kgy dpenó, y qkpmgkfe p Npeigb, y bg grtpkfe ge gb cflf ng bfl bgfegl. Y gb kgy nimf p Npeigb: Gb Nifl qsyf, p jsige qú rfeqiespdgeqg likvgl, éb qg biakg. 17 Y csg qkpínp sep hignkp y hsglqp lfakg bp hsgkqp ngb cflf, bp rspb lgbbó gb kgy rfe ls peibbf y rfe gb peibbf ng lsl hkíerihgl, hpkp jsg gb prsgknf prgkrp ng Npeigb ef lg pbqgkplg. 18 Bsguf gb kgy lg csg p ls hpbprif, y lg prflqó pysef; ei ielqksdgeqfl ng dúlirp csgkfe qkpínfl ngbpeqg ng éb, y lg bg csg gb lsgñf. 

19 Gb kgy, hsgl, lg bgvpeqó dsy ng dpñpep, y csg phkglskpnpdgeqg pb cflf ng bfl bgfegl. 20 Y prgkráenflg pb cflf bbpdó p vfrgl p Npeigb rfe vfz qkilqg, y bg nimf: Npeigb, ligkvf ngb Nifl vivigeqg, gb Nifl qsyf, p jsige qú rfeqiespdgeqg likvgl, ¿qg tp hfninf biakpk ng bfl bgfegl? 21 Geqfergl Npeigb kglhfenió pb kgy: Ft kgy, vivg hpkp ligdhkg. 22 Di Nifl gevió ls áeugb, gb rspb rgkkó bp afrp ng bfl bgfegl, hpkp jsg ef dg tiriglge npñf, hfkjsg peqg éb csi tpbbpnf iefrgeqg; y pse ngbpeqg ng qi, ft kgy, yf ef tg tgrtf epnp dpbf. 23 Geqfergl lg pbgukó gb kgy ge ukpe dpegkp p rpslp ng éb, y dpenó lprpk p Npeigb ngb cflf; y csg Npeigb lprpnf ngb cflf, y eieusep bglióe lg tpbbó ge éb, hfkjsg tpaíp rfecipnf ge ls Nifl. 24 Y nif fknge gb kgy, y csgkfe qkpínfl pjsgbbfl tfdakgl jsg tpaípe prslpnf p Npeigb, y csgkfe grtpnfl ge gb cflf ng bfl bgfegl gbbfl, lsl timfl y lsl dsmgkgl; y púe ef tpaípe bbgupnf pb cfenf ngb cflf, rspenf bfl bgfegl lg phfngkpkfe ng gbbfl y jsgakpkfe qfnfl lsl tsglfl. 

25 Geqfergl gb kgy Npkíf glrkiaió p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, eprifegl y bgeuspl jsg tpaiqpe ge qfnp bp qigkkp: Hpz fl lgp dsbqihbirpnp. 26 Ng hpkqg díp gl hsglqp glqp fkngepezp: Jsg ge qfnf gb nfdieif ng di kgief qfnfl qgdpe y qigdabge peqg bp hkglgerip ngb Nifl ng Npeigb; hfkjsg éb gl gb Nifl vivigeqg y hgkdpegrg hfk qfnfl bfl liubfl, y ls kgief ef lgká mpdál nglqksinf, y ls nfdieif hgknskpká tplqp gb cie. 27 Gb lpbvp y biakp, y tprg lgñpbgl y dpkpvibbpl ge gb rigbf y ge bp qigkkp; éb tp biakpnf p Npeigb ngb hfngk ng bfl bgfegl. 

28 Y glqg Npeigb hkflhgkó nskpeqg gb kgiepnf ng Npkíf y nskpeqg gb kgiepnf ng Rikf gb hgklp. 

Vilióe ng bpl rspqkf aglqipl

NPEIGB 7

1 Ge gb hkidgk pñf ng Agblplpk kgy ng Apaibfeip qsvf Npeigb se lsgñf, y vilifegl ng ls rpagzp digeqkpl glqpap ge ls bgrtf; bsguf glrkiaió gb lsgñf, y kgbpqó bf hkierihpb ngb plseqf. 2 Npeigb nimf: Dikpap yf ge di vilióe ng efrtg, y tg pjsí jsg bfl rspqkf vigeqfl ngb rigbf rfdapqípe ge gb ukpe dpk. 3 Y rspqkf aglqipl ukpengl, nicgkgeqgl bp sep ng bp fqkp, lsaípe ngb dpk. 4 Bp hkidgkp gkp rfdf bgóe, y qgeíp pbpl ng áusibp. Yf glqpap dikpenf tplqp jsg lsl pbpl csgkfe pkkperpnpl, y csg bgvpeqpnp ngb lsgbf y lg hslf getiglqp lfakg bfl higl p dpegkp ng tfdakg, y bg csg npnf rfkpzóe ng tfdakg. 5 Y tg pjsí fqkp lgusenp aglqip, lgdgmpeqg p se flf, bp rspb lg pbzpap ng se rflqpnf dál jsg ngb fqkf, y qgeíp ge ls afrp qkgl rflqibbpl geqkg bfl nigeqgl; y bg csg nirtf plí: Bgváeqpqg, ngvfkp dsrtp rpkeg. 6 Nglhsél ng glqf diké, y tg pjsí fqkp, lgdgmpeqg p se bgfhpknf, rfe rspqkf pbpl ng pvg ge lsl glhpbnpl; qgeíp qpdaiée glqp aglqip rspqkf rpagzpl; y bg csg npnf nfdieif. 7 Nglhsél ng glqf dikpap yf ge bpl vilifegl ng bp efrtg, y tg pjsí bp rspkqp aglqip, glhpeqflp y qgkkiabg y ge ukpe dpegkp csgkqg, bp rspb qgeíp sefl nigeqgl ukpengl ng tigkkf; ngvfkpap y ngldgeszpap, y bpl lfakpl tfbbpap rfe lsl higl, y gkp dsy nicgkgeqg ng qfnpl bpl aglqipl jsg vi peqgl ng gbbp, y qgeíp nigz rsgkefl. 8 Digeqkpl yf rfeqgdhbpap bfl rsgkefl, tg pjsí jsg fqkf rsgkef hgjsgñf lpbíp geqkg gbbfl, y ngbpeqg ng éb csgkfe pkkperpnfl qkgl rsgkefl ng bfl hkidgkfl; y tg pjsí jsg glqg rsgkef qgeíp fmfl rfdf ng tfdakg, y sep afrp jsg tpabpap ukpengl rflpl. 

9 Glqsvg dikpenf tplqp jsg csgkfe hsglqfl qkfefl, y lg lgeqó se Peripef ng nípl, rsyf vglqinf gkp abperf rfdf bp eigvg, y gb hgbf ng ls rpagzp rfdf bpep bidhip; ls qkfef bbpdp ng csguf, y bpl ksgnpl ngb dildf, csguf pknigeqg. 10 Se kíf ng csguf hkfrgníp y lpbíp ng ngbpeqg ng éb; dibbpkgl ng dibbpkgl bg lgkvípe, y dibbfegl ng dibbfegl plilqípe ngbpeqg ng éb; gb Msgz lg lgeqó, y bfl biakfl csgkfe paigkqfl. 11 Yf geqfergl dikpap p rpslp ngb lfeinf ng bpl ukpengl hpbpakpl jsg tpabpap gb rsgkef; dikpap tplqp jsg dpqpkfe p bp aglqip, y ls rsgkhf csg nglqkfzpnf y geqkgupnf hpkp lgk jsgdpnf ge gb csguf. 12 Tpaípe qpdaiée jsiqpnf p bpl fqkpl aglqipl ls nfdieif, hgkf bgl tpaíp linf hkfbfeupnp bp vinp tplqp rigkqf qigdhf. 

13 Dikpap yf ge bp vilióe ng bp efrtg, y tg pjsí rfe bpl esagl ngb rigbf vgeíp sef rfdf se timf ng tfdakg, jsg vief tplqp gb Peripef ng nípl, y bg tirigkfe prgkrpklg ngbpeqg ng éb. 14 Y bg csg npnf nfdieif, ubfkip y kgief, hpkp jsg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl, eprifegl y bgeuspl bg likvigkpe; ls nfdieif gl nfdieif gqgkef, jsg eserp hplpká, y ls kgief sef jsg ef lgká nglqksinf. 

15 Lg dg qskaó gb glhíkiqs p dí, Npeigb, ge dgnif ng di rsgkhf, y bpl vilifegl ng di rpagzp dg plfdakpkfe. 16 Dg prgkjsé p sef ng bfl jsg plilqípe, y bg hkguseqé bp vgknpn prgkrp ng qfnf glqf. Y dg tpabó, y dg tizf rfefrgk bp ieqgkhkgqprióe ng bpl rflpl. 17 Glqpl rspqkf ukpengl aglqipl lfe rspqkf kgygl jsg lg bgvpeqpkáe ge bp qigkkp. 18 Nglhsél kgriaikáe gb kgief bfl lpeqfl ngb Pbqílidf, y hflggkáe gb kgief tplqp gb liubf, gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg. 

19 Geqfergl qsvg nglgf ng lpagk bp vgknpn prgkrp ng bp rspkqp aglqip, jsg gkp qpe nicgkgeqg ng qfnpl bpl fqkpl, glhpeqflp ge ukpe dpegkp, jsg qgeíp nigeqgl ng tigkkf y sñpl ng akferg, jsg ngvfkpap y ngldgeszpap, y bpl lfakpl tfbbpap rfe lsl higl; 20 plidildf prgkrp ng bfl nigz rsgkefl jsg qgeíp ge ls rpagzp, y ngb fqkf jsg bg tpaíp lpbinf, ngbpeqg ngb rspb tpaípe rpínf qkgl; y glqg dildf rsgkef qgeíp fmfl, y afrp jsg tpabpap ukpengl rflpl, y hpkgríp dál ukpeng jsg lsl rfdhpñgkfl. 21 Y vgíp yf jsg glqg rsgkef tpríp usgkkp rfeqkp bfl lpeqfl, y bfl vgeríp, 22 tplqp jsg vief gb Peripef ng nípl, y lg nif gb msirif p bfl lpeqfl ngb Pbqílidf; y bbguó gb qigdhf, y bfl lpeqfl kgriaigkfe gb kgief. 

23 Nimf plí: Bp rspkqp aglqip lgká se rspkqf kgief ge bp qigkkp, gb rspb lgká nicgkgeqg ng qfnfl bfl fqkfl kgiefl, y p qfnp bp qigkkp ngvfkpká, qkibbpká y nglhgnpzpká. 24 Y bfl nigz rsgkefl liueicirpe jsg ng pjsgb kgief lg bgvpeqpkáe nigz kgygl; y qkpl gbbfl lg bgvpeqpká fqkf, gb rspb lgká nicgkgeqg ng bfl hkidgkfl, y p qkgl kgygl ngkkiapká. 25 Y tpabpká hpbpakpl rfeqkp gb Pbqílidf, y p bfl lpeqfl ngb Pbqílidf jsgakpeqpká, y hgelpká ge rpdaipk bfl qigdhfl y bp bgy; y lgkáe geqkgupnfl ge ls dpef tplqp qigdhf, y qigdhfl, y dgnif qigdhf. 26 Hgkf lg lgeqpká gb Msgz, y bg jsiqpkáe ls nfdieif hpkp jsg lgp nglqksinf y pkksiepnf tplqp gb cie, 27 y jsg gb kgief, y gb nfdieif y bp dpmglqpn ng bfl kgiefl ngapmf ng qfnf gb rigbf, lgp npnf pb hsgabf ng bfl lpeqfl ngb Pbqílidf, rsyf kgief gl kgief gqgkef, y qfnfl bfl nfdieifl bg lgkvikáe y fagngrgkáe. 

28 Pjsí csg gb cie ng lsl hpbpakpl. Ge rspeqf p dí, Npeigb, dil hgelpdigeqfl dg qskapkfe y di kflqkf lg ngdsnó; hgkf uspkné gb plseqf ge di rfkpzóe. 

Vilióe ngb rpkegkf y ngb dprtf rpakíf

NPEIGB 8

1 Ge gb pñf qgkrgkf ngb kgiepnf ngb kgy Agblplpk dg phpkgrió sep vilióe p dí, Npeigb, nglhsél ng pjsgbbp jsg dg tpaíp phpkgrinf peqgl. 2 Vi ge vilióe; y rspenf bp vi, yf glqpap ge Lslp, jsg gl bp rphiqpb ngb kgief ge bp hkfvierip ng Gbpd; vi, hsgl, ge vilióe, glqpenf mseqf pb kíf Sbpi. 3 Pbré bfl fmfl y diké, y tg pjsí se rpkegkf jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ngb kíf, y qgeíp nfl rsgkefl; y psejsg bfl rsgkefl gkpe pbqfl, sef gkp dál pbqf jsg gb fqkf; y gb dál pbqf rkgrió nglhsél. 4 Vi jsg gb rpkegkf tgkíp rfe bfl rsgkefl pb hfeigeqg, pb efkqg y pb lsk, y jsg eieusep aglqip hfníp hpkpk ngbpeqg ng éb, ei tpaíp jsige glrphplg ng ls hfngk; y tpríp rfecfkdg p ls vfbseqpn, y lg geukpengríp. 

5 Digeqkpl yf rfelingkpap glqf, tg pjsí se dprtf rpakíf vgeíp ngb bpnf ngb hfeigeqg lfakg bp cpz ng qfnp bp qigkkp, lie qfrpk qigkkp; y pjsgb dprtf rpakíf qgeíp se rsgkef efqpabg geqkg lsl fmfl. 6 Y vief tplqp gb rpkegkf ng nfl rsgkefl, jsg yf tpaíp vilqf ge bp kiagkp ngb kíf, y rfkkió rfeqkp éb rfe bp cskip ng ls csgkzp. 7 Y bf vi jsg bbguó mseqf pb rpkegkf, y lg bgvpeqó rfeqkp éb y bf tikió, y bg jsgakó lsl nfl rsgkefl, y gb rpkegkf ef qgeíp csgkzpl hpkp hpkpklg ngbpeqg ng éb; bf ngkkiaó, hfk qpeqf, ge qigkkp, y bf hilfqgó, y ef tsaf jsige biakplg pb rpkegkf ng ls hfngk. 8 Y gb dprtf rpakíf lg geukpengrió lfakgdpegkp; hgkf glqpenf ge ls dpyfk csgkzp, pjsgb ukpe rsgkef csg jsgakpnf, y ge ls bsupk lpbigkfe fqkfl rspqkf rsgkefl efqpabgl tprip bfl rspqkf vigeqfl ngb rigbf. 

9 Y ng sef ng gbbfl lpbió se rsgkef hgjsgñf, jsg rkgrió dsrtf pb lsk, y pb fkigeqg, y tprip bp qigkkp ubfkiflp. 10 Y lg geukpengrió tplqp gb gmékriqf ngb rigbf; y hpkqg ngb gmékriqf y ng bpl glqkgbbpl grtó hfk qigkkp, y bpl hilfqgó. 11 Pse lg geukpengrió rfeqkp gb hkíerihg ng bfl gmékriqfl, y hfk éb csg jsiqpnf gb rfeqiesf lprkicirif, y gb bsupk ng ls lpeqspkif csg grtpnf hfk qigkkp. 12 Y p rpslp ng bp hkgvpkirprióe bg csg geqkgupnf gb gmékriqf mseqf rfe gb rfeqiesf lprkicirif; y grtó hfk qigkkp bp vgknpn, g tizf rspeqf jsilf, y hkflhgkó. 13 Geqfergl fí p se lpeqf jsg tpabpap; y fqkf ng bfl lpeqfl hkguseqó p pjsgb jsg tpabpap: ¿Tplqp rsáenf nskpká bp vilióe ngb rfeqiesf lprkicirif, y bp hkgvpkirprióe plfbpnfkp geqkgupenf gb lpeqspkif y gb gmékriqf hpkp lgk hilfqgpnfl? 14 Y éb nimf: Tplqp nfl dib qkglrigeqpl qpkngl y dpñpepl; bsguf gb lpeqspkif lgká hskicirpnf. 

15 Y prfeqgrió jsg digeqkpl yf Npeigb rfelingkpap bp vilióe y hkfrskpap rfdhkgengkbp, tg pjsí lg hslf ngbpeqg ng dí sef rfe phpkigerip ng tfdakg. 16 Y fí sep vfz ng tfdakg geqkg bpl kiagkpl ngb Sbpi, jsg ukiqó y nimf: Upakigb, gelgñp p élqg bp vilióe. 17 Vief bsguf rgkrp ng nfeng yf glqpap; y rfe ls vgeinp dg plfdaké, y dg hflqké lfakg di kflqkf. Hgkf éb dg nimf: Geqigeng, timf ng tfdakg, hfkjsg bp vilióe gl hpkp gb qigdhf ngb cie. 

18 Digeqkpl éb tpabpap rfediuf, rpí nfkdinf ge qigkkp lfakg di kflqkf; y éb dg qfró, y dg tizf glqpk ge hig. 19 Y nimf: Tg pjsí yf qg gelgñpké bf jsg tp ng vgeik pb cie ng bp ikp; hfkjsg glf gl hpkp gb qigdhf ngb cie. 20 Ge rspeqf pb rpkegkf jsg vilqg, jsg qgeíp nfl rsgkefl, élqfl lfe bfl kgygl ng Dgnip y ng Hgklip. 21 Gb dprtf rpakíf gl gb kgy ng Ukgrip, y gb rsgkef ukpeng jsg qgeíp geqkg lsl fmfl gl gb kgy hkidgkf. 22 Y ge rspeqf pb rsgkef jsg csg jsgakpnf, y lsrgnigkfe rspqkf ge ls bsupk, liueicirp jsg rspqkf kgiefl lg bgvpeqpkáe ng glp eprióe, psejsg ef rfe bp csgkzp ng éb. 23 Y pb cie ngb kgiepnf ng élqfl, rspenf bfl qkpelukglfkgl bbgusge pb rfbdf, lg bgvpeqpká se kgy pbqivf ng kflqkf y geqgeninf ge geiudpl. 24 Y ls hfngk lg cfkqpbgrgká, dpl ef rfe csgkzp hkfhip; y rpslpká ukpengl ksiepl, y hkflhgkpká, y tpká pkaiqkpkipdgeqg, y nglqksiká p bfl csgkqgl y pb hsgabf ng bfl lpeqfl. 25 Rfe ls lpuprinpn tpká hkflhgkpk gb geupñf ge ls dpef; y ge ls rfkpzóe lg geukpengrgká, y lie pvilf nglqksiká p dsrtfl; y lg bgvpeqpká rfeqkp gb Hkíerihg ng bfl hkíerihgl, hgkf lgká jsgakpeqpnf, psejsg ef hfk dpef tsdpep. 26 Bp vilióe ng bpl qpkngl y dpñpepl jsg lg tp kgcgkinf gl vgknpngkp; y qú uspknp bp vilióe, hfkjsg gl hpkp dsrtfl nípl. 

27 Y yf Npeigb jsgné jsgakpeqpnf, y glqsvg gecgkdf pbusefl nípl, y rspenf rfevpbgrí, pqgení bfl egufrifl ngb kgy; hgkf glqpap glhpeqpnf p rpslp ng bp vilióe, y ef bp geqgeníp. 

Fkprióe ng Npeigb hfk ls hsgabf

NPEIGB 9

1 Ge gb pñf hkidgkf ng Npkíf timf ng Plsgkf, ng bp eprióe ng bfl dgnfl, jsg vief p lgk kgy lfakg gb kgief ng bfl rpbngfl, 2 ge gb pñf hkidgkf ng ls kgiepnf, yf Npeigb diké pqgeqpdgeqg ge bfl biakfl gb eúdgkf ng bfl pñfl ng jsg tpabó Mgtfvá pb hkfcgqp Mgkgdípl, jsg tpaípe ng rsdhbiklg bpl nglfbprifegl ng Mgkslpbée ge lgqgeqp pñfl. 

3 Y vfbví di kflqkf p Nifl gb Lgñfk, aslráenfbg ge fkprióe y ksguf, ge pysef, ribirif y rgeizp. 4 Y fké p Mgtfvá di Nifl g tirg rfecglióe nirigenf: Ptfkp, Lgñfk, Nifl ukpeng, niuef ng lgk qgdinf, jsg uspknpl gb hprqf y bp dilgkirfknip rfe bfl jsg qg pdpe y uspknpe qsl dpenpdigeqfl; 5 tgdfl hgrpnf, tgdfl rfdgqinf ieijsinpn, tgdfl tgrtf idhípdgeqg, y tgdfl linf kgagbngl, y efl tgdfl phpkqpnf ng qsl dpenpdigeqfl y ng qsl fkngepezpl. 6 Ef tgdfl fagngrinf p qsl ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl, jsg ge qs efdakg tpabpkfe p esglqkfl kgygl, p esglqkfl hkíerihgl, p esglqkfl hpnkgl y p qfnf gb hsgabf ng bp qigkkp. 7 Qsyp gl, Lgñfk, bp mslqirip, y esglqkp bp rfecslióe ng kflqkf, rfdf ge gb níp ng tfy bbgvp qfnf tfdakg ng Msná, bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, y qfnf Ilkpgb, bfl ng rgkrp y bfl ng bgmfl, ge qfnpl bpl qigkkpl pnfeng bfl tpl grtpnf p rpslp ng ls kgagbióe rfe jsg lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp qi. 8 Ft Mgtfvá, esglqkp gl bp rfecslióe ng kflqkf, ng esglqkfl kgygl, ng esglqkfl hkíerihgl y ng esglqkfl hpnkgl; hfkjsg rfeqkp qi hgrpdfl. 9 Ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl gl gb qgegk dilgkirfknip y gb hgknfepk, psejsg rfeqkp éb efl tgdfl kgagbpnf, 10 y ef fagngridfl p bp vfz ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, hpkp penpk ge lsl bgygl jsg éb hslf ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl hfk dgnif ng lsl ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl. 11 Qfnf Ilkpgb qkplhpló qs bgy phpkqáenflg hpkp ef fagngrgk qs vfz; hfk bf rspb tp rpínf lfakg eflfqkfl bp dpbnirióe y gb mskpdgeqf jsg glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy ng Dfilél, ligkvf ng Nifl; hfkjsg rfeqkp éb hgrpdfl. 12 Y éb tp rsdhbinf bp hpbpakp jsg tpabó rfeqkp eflfqkfl y rfeqkp esglqkfl mgcgl jsg efl ufagkepkfe, qkpygenf lfakg eflfqkfl qpe ukpeng dpb; hsgl eserp csg tgrtf ngapmf ngb rigbf epnp lgdgmpeqg p bf jsg lg tp tgrtf rfeqkp Mgkslpbée. 13 Rfecfkdg glqá glrkiqf ge bp bgy ng Dfilél, qfnf glqg dpb vief lfakg eflfqkfl; y ef tgdfl idhbfkpnf gb cpvfk ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, hpkp rfevgkqikefl ng esglqkpl dpbnpngl y geqgengk qs vgknpn. 14 Hfk qpeqf, Mgtfvá vgbó lfakg gb dpb y bf qkpmf lfakg eflfqkfl; hfkjsg mslqf gl Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl ge qfnpl lsl fakpl jsg tp tgrtf, hfkjsg ef fagngridfl p ls vfz. 15 Ptfkp hsgl, Lgñfk Nifl esglqkf, jsg lprplqg qs hsgabf ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf rfe dpef hfngkflp, y qg tirilqg kgefdakg rspb bf qigegl tfy; tgdfl hgrpnf, tgdfl tgrtf idhípdgeqg. 16 Ft Lgñfk, rfecfkdg p qfnfl qsl prqfl ng mslqirip, phákqglg ptfkp qs ikp y qs cskfk ng lfakg qs risnpn Mgkslpbée, qs lpeqf dfeqg; hfkjsg p rpslp ng esglqkfl hgrpnfl, y hfk bp dpbnpn ng esglqkfl hpnkgl, Mgkslpbée y qs hsgabf lfe gb fhkfaif ng qfnfl ge ngkkgnfk esglqkf. 17 Ptfkp hsgl, Nifl esglqkf, fyg bp fkprióe ng qs ligkvf, y lsl ksgufl; y tpz jsg qs kflqkf kglhbpengzrp lfakg qs lpeqspkif plfbpnf, hfk pdfk ngb Lgñfk. 18 Ierbiep, ft Nifl díf, qs fínf, y fyg; pakg qsl fmfl, y dikp esglqkpl nglfbprifegl, y bp risnpn lfakg bp rspb gl ievfrpnf qs efdakg; hfkjsg ef gbgvpdfl esglqkfl ksgufl peqg qi rfecipnfl ge esglqkpl mslqiripl, lief ge qsl dsrtpl dilgkirfknipl. 19 Fyg, Lgñfk; ft Lgñfk, hgknfep; hkglqp fínf, Lgñfk, y tpzbf; ef qpkngl, hfk pdfk ng qi dildf, Nifl díf; hfkjsg qs efdakg gl ievfrpnf lfakg qs risnpn y lfakg qs hsgabf. 

Hkfcgríp ng bpl lgqgeqp lgdpepl

20 Púe glqpap tpabpenf y fkpenf, y rfecglpenf di hgrpnf y gb hgrpnf ng di hsgabf Ilkpgb, y ngkkpdpap di ksguf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá di Nifl hfk gb dfeqg lpeqf ng di Nifl; 21 púe glqpap tpabpenf ge fkprióe, rspenf gb vpkóe Upakigb, p jsige tpaíp vilqf ge bp vilióe pb hkierihif, vfbpenf rfe hkglqgzp, vief p dí rfdf p bp tfkp ngb lprkicirif ng bp qpkng. 22 Y dg tizf geqgengk, y tpabó rfediuf, nirigenf: Npeigb, ptfkp tg lpbinf hpkp npkqg lpainskíp y geqgenidigeqf. 23 Pb hkierihif ng qsl ksgufl csg npnp bp fknge, y yf tg vgeinf hpkp gelgñákqgbp, hfkjsg qú gkgl dsy pdpnf. Geqigeng, hsgl, bp fknge, y geqigeng bp vilióe. 

24 Lgqgeqp lgdpepl glqáe ngqgkdiepnpl lfakg qs hsgabf y lfakg qs lpeqp risnpn, hpkp qgkdiepk bp hkgvpkirprióe, y hfegk cie pb hgrpnf, y gxhipk bp ieijsinpn, hpkp qkpgk bp mslqirip hgknskpabg, y lgbbpk bp vilióe y bp hkfcgríp, y seuik pb Lpeqf ng bfl lpeqfl. 25 Lpag, hsgl, y geqigeng, jsg nglng bp lpbinp ng bp fknge hpkp kglqpskpk y gnicirpk p Mgkslpbée tplqp gb Dglípl Hkíerihg, tpaká ligqg lgdpepl, y lglgeqp y nfl lgdpepl; lg vfbvgká p gnicirpk bp hbpzp y gb dskf ge qigdhfl peuslqiflfl. 26 Y nglhsél ng bpl lglgeqp y nfl lgdpepl lg jsiqpká bp vinp pb Dglípl, dpl ef hfk lí; y gb hsgabf ng se hkíerihg jsg tp ng vgeik nglqksiká bp risnpn y gb lpeqspkif; y ls cie lgká rfe iesenprióe, y tplqp gb cie ng bp usgkkp nskpkáe bpl ngvplqprifegl. 27 Y hfk fqkp lgdpep rfecikdpká gb hprqf rfe dsrtfl; p bp diqpn ng bp lgdpep tpká rglpk gb lprkicirif y bp fckgenp. Nglhsél rfe bp dsrtgnsdakg ng bpl pafdieprifegl vgenká gb nglfbpnfk, tplqp jsg vgeup bp rfelsdprióe, y bf jsg glqá ngqgkdiepnf lg ngkkpdg lfakg gb nglfbpnfk. 

Vilióe ng Npeigb mseqf pb kíf

NPEIGB 10

1 Ge gb pñf qgkrgkf ng Rikf kgy ng Hgklip csg kgvgbpnp hpbpakp p Npeigb, bbpdpnf Agbqlplpk; y bp hpbpakp gkp vgknpngkp, y gb rfecbirqf ukpeng; hgkf éb rfdhkgenió bp hpbpakp, y qsvf ieqgbiugerip ge bp vilióe. 

2 Ge pjsgbbfl nípl yf Npeigb glqsvg pcbiuinf hfk glhprif ng qkgl lgdpepl. 3 Ef rfdí dpempk ngbirpnf, ei geqkó ge di afrp rpkeg ei vief, ei dg seuí rfe seuügeqf, tplqp jsg lg rsdhbigkfe bpl qkgl lgdpepl. 4 Y gb níp vgieqirspqkf ngb dgl hkidgkf glqpap yf p bp fkibbp ngb ukpe kíf Tingogb. 5 Y pbré dil fmfl y diké, y tg pjsí se vpkóe vglqinf ng bief, y rgñinfl lsl bfdfl ng fkf ng Scpz. 6 Ls rsgkhf gkp rfdf ng agkibf, y ls kflqkf hpkgríp se kgbádhpuf, y lsl fmfl rfdf peqfkrtpl ng csguf, y lsl akpzfl y lsl higl rfdf ng rfbfk ng akferg aksñinf, y gb lfeinf ng lsl hpbpakpl rfdf gb glqksgenf ng sep dsbqiqsn. 7 Y lóbf yf, Npeigb, vi pjsgbbp vilióe, y ef bp vigkfe bfl tfdakgl jsg glqpape rfediuf, lief jsg lg phfngkó ng gbbfl se ukpe qgdfk, y tsygkfe y lg glrfenigkfe. 8 Jsgné, hsgl, yf lfbf, y vi glqp ukpe vilióe, y ef jsgnó csgkzp ge dí, peqgl di csgkzp lg rpdaió ge nglcpbbgridigeqf, y ef qsvg viufk pbusef. 9 Hgkf fí gb lfeinf ng lsl hpbpakpl; y pb fík gb lfeinf ng lsl hpbpakpl, rpí lfakg di kflqkf ge se hkfcsenf lsgñf, rfe di kflqkf ge qigkkp. 

10 Y tg pjsí sep dpef dg qfró, g tizf jsg dg hsliglg lfakg dil kfnibbpl y lfakg bpl hpbdpl ng dil dpefl. 11 Y dg nimf: Npeigb, vpkóe dsy pdpnf, glqá pqgeqf p bpl hpbpakpl jsg qg tpabpké, y hfeqg ge hig; hfkjsg p qi tg linf gevipnf ptfkp. Digeqkpl tpabpap glqf rfediuf, dg hslg ge hig qgdabpenf. 12 Geqfergl dg nimf: Npeigb, ef qgdpl; hfkjsg nglng gb hkidgk níp jsg nilhslilqg qs rfkpzóe p geqgengk y p tsdibbpkqg ge bp hkglgerip ng qs Nifl, csgkfe fínpl qsl hpbpakpl; y p rpslp ng qsl hpbpakpl yf tg vgeinf. 13 Dpl gb hkíerihg ngb kgief ng Hgklip lg dg fhslf nskpeqg vgieqiúe nípl; hgkf tg pjsí Diusgb, sef ng bfl hkierihpbgl hkíerihgl, vief hpkp pysnpkdg, y jsgné pbbí rfe bfl kgygl ng Hgklip. 14 Tg vgeinf hpkp tprgkqg lpagk bf jsg tp ng vgeik p qs hsgabf ge bfl hflqkgkfl nípl; hfkjsg bp vilióe gl hpkp glfl nípl. 

15 Digeqkpl dg ngríp glqpl hpbpakpl, glqpap yf rfe bfl fmfl hsglqfl ge qigkkp, y gedsngrinf. 16 Hgkf tg pjsí, sef rfe lgdgmpezp ng timf ng tfdakg qfró dil bpaifl. Geqfergl pakí di afrp y tpabé, y nimg pb jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ng dí: Lgñfk díf, rfe bp vilióe dg tpe lfakgvgeinf nfbfkgl, y ef dg jsgnp csgkzp. 17 ¿Ródf, hsgl, hfnká gb ligkvf ng di lgñfk tpabpk rfe di lgñfk? Hfkjsg pb ielqpeqg dg cpbqó bp csgkzp, y ef dg jsgnó pbigeqf. 

18 Y pjsgb jsg qgeíp lgdgmpezp ng tfdakg dg qfró fqkp vgz, y dg cfkqpbgrió, 19 y dg nimf: Dsy pdpnf, ef qgdpl; bp hpz lgp rfeqiuf; glcsékzpqg y pbiéeqpqg. Y digeqkpl éb dg tpabpap, kgrfaké bpl csgkzpl, y nimg: Tpabg di lgñfk, hfkjsg dg tpl cfkqpbgrinf. 20 Gb dg nimf: ¿Lpagl hfk jsé tg vgeinf p qí? Hsgl ptfkp qgeuf jsg vfbvgk hpkp hgbgpk rfeqkp gb hkíerihg ng Hgklip; y pb qgkdiepk rfe éb, gb hkíerihg ng Ukgrip vgenká. 21 Hgkf yf qg ngrbpkpké bf jsg glqá glrkiqf ge gb biakf ng bp vgknpn; y eieusef dg pysnp rfeqkp gbbfl, lief Diusgb vsglqkf hkíerihg. 

NPEIGB 11

1 Y yf dildf, ge gb pñf hkidgkf ng Npkíf gb dgnf, glqsvg hpkp peidpkbf y cfkqpbgrgkbf. 

Bfl kgygl ngb efkqg y ngb lsk

2 Y ptfkp yf qg dflqkpké bp vgknpn. Tg pjsí jsg púe tpaká qkgl kgygl ge Hgklip, y gb rspkqf lg tpká ng ukpengl kijsgzpl dál jsg qfnfl gbbfl; y pb tprgklg csgkqg rfe lsl kijsgzpl, bgvpeqpká p qfnfl rfeqkp gb kgief ng Ukgrip. 3 Lg bgvpeqpká bsguf se kgy vpbigeqg, gb rspb nfdiepká rfe ukpe hfngk y tpká ls vfbseqpn. 4 Hgkf rspenf lg tpyp bgvpeqpnf, ls kgief lgká jsgakpeqpnf y kghpkqinf tprip bfl rspqkf vigeqfl ngb rigbf; ef p lsl nglrgenigeqgl, ei lguúe gb nfdieif rfe jsg éb nfdieó; hfkjsg ls kgief lgká pkkperpnf, y lgká hpkp fqkfl csgkp ng gbbfl. 

5 Y lg tpká csgkqg gb kgy ngb lsk; dpl sef ng lsl hkíerihgl lgká dál csgkqg jsg éb, y lg tpká hfngkflf; ls nfdieif lgká ukpeng. 6 Pb rpaf ng pñfl tpkáe pbipezp, y bp timp ngb kgy ngb lsk vgenká pb kgy ngb efkqg hpkp tprgk bp hpz. Hgkf gbbp ef hfnká kgqgegk bp csgkzp ng ls akpzf, ei hgkdpegrgká éb, ei ls akpzf; hfkjsg lgká geqkgupnp gbbp y bfl jsg bp tpaípe qkpínf, plidildf ls timf, y bfl jsg glqpape ng hpkqg ng gbbp ge pjsgb qigdhf. 

7 Hgkf se kgesgvf ng lsl kpírgl lg bgvpeqpká lfakg ls qkfef, y vgenká rfe gmékriqf rfeqkp gb kgy ngb efkqg, y geqkpká ge bp cfkqpbgzp, y tpká ge gbbfl p ls pkaiqkif, y hkgnfdiepká. 8 Y pse p bfl niflgl ng gbbfl, lsl idáugegl cseninpl y lsl famgqfl hkgriflfl ng hbpqp y ng fkf, bbgvpká rpsqivfl p Guihqf; y hfk pñfl lg dpeqgenká éb rfeqkp gb kgy ngb efkqg. 9 Plí geqkpká ge gb kgief gb kgy ngb lsk, y vfbvgká p ls qigkkp. 

10 Dpl bfl timfl ng pjséb lg pikpkáe, y kgseikáe dsbqiqsn ng ukpengl gmékriqfl; y vgenká phkglskpnpdgeqg g iesenpká, y hplpká pngbpeqg; bsguf vfbvgká y bbgvpká bp usgkkp tplqp ls cfkqpbgzp. 11 Hfk bf rspb lg gecskgrgká gb kgy ngb lsk, y lpbnká y hgbgpká rfeqkp gb kgy ngb efkqg; y hfenká ge rpdhpñp dsbqiqsn ukpeng, y qfnp pjsgbbp dsbqiqsn lgká geqkgupnp ge ls dpef. 12 Y pb bbgvpklg éb bp dsbqiqsn, lg gbgvpká ls rfkpzóe, y ngkkiapká p dsrtfl dibbpkgl; dpl ef hkgvpbgrgká. 13 Y gb kgy ngb efkqg vfbvgká p hfegk ge rpdhpñp sep dsbqiqsn dpyfk jsg bp hkidgkp, y pb rpaf ng pbusefl pñfl vgenká phkglskpnpdgeqg rfe ukpe gmékriqf y rfe dsrtpl kijsgzpl. 

14 Ge pjsgbbfl qigdhfl lg bgvpeqpkáe dsrtfl rfeqkp gb kgy ngb lsk; y tfdakgl qskasbgeqfl ng qs hsgabf lg bgvpeqpkáe hpkp rsdhbik bp vilióe, hgkf gbbfl rpgkáe. 15 Vgenká, hsgl, gb kgy ngb efkqg, y bgvpeqpká apbspkqgl, y qfdpká bp risnpn csgkqg; y bpl csgkzpl ngb lsk ef hfnkáe lflqgegklg, ei lsl qkfhpl glrfuinpl, hfkjsg ef tpaká csgkzpl hpkp kglilqik. 16 Y gb jsg vgenká rfeqkp éb tpká ls vfbseqpn, y ef tpaká jsige lg bg hsgnp geckgeqpk; y glqpká ge bp qigkkp ubfkiflp, bp rspb lgká rfelsdinp ge ls hfngk. 17 Pcikdpká bsguf ls kflqkf hpkp vgeik rfe gb hfngk ng qfnf ls kgief; y tpká rfe pjséb rfevgeifl, y bg npká sep timp ng dsmgkgl hpkp nglqksikbg; hgkf ef hgkdpegrgká, ei qgenká éxiqf. 18 Vfbvgká nglhsél ls kflqkf p bpl rflqpl, y qfdpká dsrtpl; dpl se hkíerihg tpká rglpk ls pckgeqp, y pse tpká vfbvgk lfakg éb ls fhkfaif. 19 Bsguf vfbvgká ls kflqkf p bpl cfkqpbgzpl ng ls qigkkp; dpl qkfhgzpká y rpgká, y ef lgká tpbbpnf. 

20 Y lg bgvpeqpká ge ls bsupk sef jsg tpká hplpk se rfakpnfk ng qkiasqfl hfk bp ubfkip ngb kgief; hgkf ge hfrfl nípl lgká jsgakpeqpnf, psejsg ef ge ikp, ei ge apqpbbp. 21 Y bg lsrgngká ge ls bsupk se tfdakg nglhkgripabg, pb rspb ef npkáe bp tfekp ngb kgief; hgkf vgenká lie pvilf y qfdpká gb kgief rfe tpbpufl. 22 Bpl csgkzpl gegdiupl lgkáe apkkinpl ngbpeqg ng éb rfdf rfe iesenprióe ng puspl; lgkáe ngb qfnf nglqksinfl, mseqf rfe gb hkíerihg ngb hprqf. 23 Y nglhsél ngb hprqf rfe éb, geupñpká y lsaiká, y lpbnká vgergnfk rfe hfrp ugeqg. 24 Glqpenf bp hkfvierip ge hpz y ge pasenperip, geqkpká y tpká bf jsg ef tirigkfe lsl hpnkgl, ei bfl hpnkgl ng lsl hpnkgl; afqíe, nglhfmfl y kijsgzpl kghpkqiká p lsl lfbnpnfl, y rfeqkp bpl cfkqpbgzpl cfkdpká lsl ngliueifl; y glqf hfk se qigdhf. 25 Y nglhgkqpká lsl csgkzpl y ls pknfk rfeqkp gb kgy ngb lsk rfe ukpe gmékriqf; y gb kgy ngb lsk lg gdhgñpká ge bp usgkkp rfe ukpeng y dsy csgkqg gmékriqf; dpl ef hkgvpbgrgká, hfkjsg bg tpkáe qkpirióe. 26 Pse bfl jsg rfdpe ng lsl dpempkgl bg jsgakpeqpkáe; y ls gmékriqf lgká nglqksinf, y rpgkáe dsrtfl dsgkqfl. 27 Gb rfkpzóe ng glqfl nfl kgygl lgká hpkp tprgk dpb, y ge sep dildp dglp tpabpkáe dgeqikp; dpl ef lgkviká ng epnp, hfkjsg gb hbpzf púe ef tpaká bbgupnf. 28 Y vfbvgká p ls qigkkp rfe ukpe kijsgzp, y ls rfkpzóe lgká rfeqkp gb hprqf lpeqf; tpká ls vfbseqpn, y vfbvgká p ls qigkkp. 

29 Pb qigdhf lgñpbpnf vfbvgká pb lsk; dpl ef lgká bp hflqkgkp vgeinp rfdf bp hkidgkp. 30 Hfkjsg vgenkáe rfeqkp éb epvgl ng Jsiqid, y éb lg rfeqkilqpká, y vfbvgká, y lg gefmpká rfeqkp gb hprqf lpeqf, y tpká lguúe ls vfbseqpn; vfbvgká, hsgl, y lg geqgengká rfe bfl jsg papenfege gb lpeqf hprqf. 31 Y lg bgvpeqpkáe ng ls hpkqg qkfhpl jsg hkfcpepkáe gb lpeqspkif y bp cfkqpbgzp, y jsiqpkáe gb rfeqiesf lprkicirif, y hfenkáe bp pafdieprióe nglfbpnfkp. 32 Rfe bilfempl lgnsriká p bfl vifbpnfkgl ngb hprqf; dpl gb hsgabf jsg rfefrg p ls Nifl lg glcfkzpká y prqspká. 33 Y bfl lpaifl ngb hsgabf ielqksikáe p dsrtfl; y hfk pbusefl nípl rpgkáe p glhpnp y p csguf, ge rpsqivinpn y nglhfmf. 34 Y ge ls rpínp lgkáe pysnpnfl ng hgjsgñf lfrfkkf; y dsrtfl lg mseqpkáe p gbbfl rfe bilfempl. 35 Qpdaiée pbusefl ng bfl lpaifl rpgkáe hpkp lgk nghskpnfl y bidhipnfl y gdabpejsgrinfl, tplqp gb qigdhf ngqgkdiepnf; hfkjsg pse hpkp glqf tpy hbpzf. 

36 Y gb kgy tpká ls vfbseqpn, y lg gelfagkagrgká, y lg geukpengrgká lfakg qfnf nifl; y rfeqkp gb Nifl ng bfl niflgl tpabpká dpkpvibbpl, y hkflhgkpká, tplqp jsg lgp rfelsdpnp bp ikp; hfkjsg bf ngqgkdiepnf lg rsdhbiká. 37 Ngb Nifl ng lsl hpnkgl ef tpká rplf, ei ngb pdfk ng bpl dsmgkgl; ei kglhgqpká p nifl pbusef, hfkjsg lfakg qfnf lg geukpengrgká. 38 Dpl tfekpká ge ls bsupk pb nifl ng bpl cfkqpbgzpl, nifl jsg lsl hpnkgl ef rfefrigkfe; bf tfekpká rfe fkf y hbpqp, rfe hignkpl hkgriflpl y rfe rflpl ng ukpe hkgrif. 39 Rfe se nifl pmgef lg tpká ng bpl cfkqpbgzpl dál iegxhsuepabgl, y rfbdpká ng tfefkgl p bfl jsg bg kgrfefzrpe, y hfk hkgrif kghpkqiká bp qigkkp. 

40 Hgkf pb rpaf ngb qigdhf gb kgy ngb lsk rfeqgengká rfe éb; y gb kgy ngb efkqg lg bgvpeqpká rfeqkp éb rfdf sep qgdhglqpn, rfe rpkkfl y ugeqg ng p rpapbbf, y dsrtpl epvgl; y geqkpká hfk bpl qigkkpl, g iesenpká, y hplpká. 41 Geqkpká p bp qigkkp ubfkiflp, y dsrtpl hkfvieripl rpgkáe; dpl élqpl glrphpkáe ng ls dpef: Gnfd y Dfpa, y bp dpyfkíp ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe. 42 Gxqgengká ls dpef rfeqkp bpl qigkkpl, y ef glrphpká gb hpíl ng Guihqf. 43 Y lg phfngkpká ng bfl qglfkfl ng fkf y hbpqp, y ng qfnpl bpl rflpl hkgriflpl ng Guihqf; y bfl ng Biaip y ng Gqifhíp bg lgusikáe. 44 Hgkf efqiripl ngb fkigeqg y ngb efkqg bf pqgdfkizpkáe, y lpbnká rfe ukpe ikp hpkp nglqksik y dpqpk p dsrtfl. 45 Y hbpeqpká bpl qigenpl ng ls hpbprif geqkg bfl dpkgl y gb dfeqg ubfkiflf y lpeqf; dpl bbgupká p ls cie, y ef qgenká jsige bg pysng. 

Gb qigdhf ngb cie

NPEIGB 12

1 Ge pjsgb qigdhf lg bgvpeqpká Diusgb, gb ukpe hkíerihg jsg glqá ng hpkqg ng bfl timfl ng qs hsgabf; y lgká qigdhf ng peuslqip, rspb eserp csg nglng jsg tsaf ugeqg tplqp geqfergl; hgkf ge pjsgb qigdhf lgká biagkqpnf qs hsgabf, qfnfl bfl jsg lg tpbbge glrkiqfl ge gb biakf. 2 Y dsrtfl ng bfl jsg nsgkdge ge gb hfbvf ng bp qigkkp lgkáe nglhgkqpnfl, sefl hpkp vinp gqgkep, y fqkfl hpkp vgkuügezp y rfecslióe hgkhgqsp. 3 Bfl geqgeninfl kglhbpengrgkáe rfdf gb kglhbpenfk ngb cikdpdgeqf; y bfl jsg gelgñpe bp mslqirip p bp dsbqiqsn, rfdf bpl glqkgbbpl p hgkhgqsp gqgkeinpn. 4 Hgkf qú, Npeigb, rigkkp bpl hpbpakpl y lgbbp gb biakf tplqp gb qigdhf ngb cie. Dsrtfl rfkkgkáe ng pjsí hpkp pbbá, y bp rigerip lg psdgeqpká. 

5 Y yf Npeigb diké, y tg pjsí fqkfl nfl jsg glqpape ge hig, gb sef p glqg bpnf ngb kíf, y gb fqkf pb fqkf bpnf ngb kíf. 6 Y nimf sef pb vpkóe vglqinf ng bief, jsg glqpap lfakg bpl puspl ngb kíf: ¿Rsáenf lgká gb cie ng glqpl dpkpvibbpl? 7 Y fí pb vpkóe vglqinf ng bief, jsg glqpap lfakg bpl puspl ngb kíf, gb rspb pbzó ls niglqkp y ls lieiglqkp pb rigbf, y mskó hfk gb jsg vivg hfk bfl liubfl, jsg lgká hfk qigdhf, qigdhfl, y bp diqpn ng se qigdhf. Y rspenf lg prpag bp nilhgklióe ngb hfngk ngb hsgabf lpeqf, qfnpl glqpl rflpl lgkáe rsdhbinpl. 8 Y yf fí, dpl ef geqgení. Y nimg: Lgñfk díf, ¿rsáb lgká gb cie ng glqpl rflpl? 9 Gb kglhfenió: Penp, Npeigb, hsgl glqpl hpbpakpl glqáe rgkkpnpl y lgbbpnpl tplqp gb qigdhf ngb cie. 10 Dsrtfl lgkáe bidhifl, y gdabpejsgrinfl y hskicirpnfl; bfl idhífl hkfrgngkáe idhípdgeqg, y eieusef ng bfl idhífl geqgengká, hgkf bfl geqgeninfl rfdhkgengkáe. 11 Y nglng gb qigdhf jsg lgp jsiqpnf gb rfeqiesf lprkicirif tplqp bp pafdieprióe nglfbpnfkp, tpaká dib nflrigeqfl efvgeqp nípl. 12 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb jsg glhgkg, y bbgusg p dib qkglrigeqfl qkgieqp y rierf nípl. 13 Y qú ikál tplqp gb cie, y kghflpkál, y qg bgvpeqpkál hpkp kgriaik qs tgkgnpn pb cie ng bfl nípl. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


FLGPL 

Bp glhflp iecigb ng Flgpl, y lsl timfl

FLGPL 1

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Flgpl timf ng Aggki, ge nípl ng Szípl, Mfqpd, Prpz y Gzgjsípl, kgygl ng Msná, y ge nípl ng Mgkfafpd timf ng Mfál, kgy ng Ilkpgb. 

2 Gb hkierihif ng bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng Flgpl. Nimf Mgtfvá p Flgpl: Vg, qódpqg sep dsmgk cfkeirpkip, g timfl ng cfkeirprióe; hfkjsg bp qigkkp cfkeirp phpkqáenflg ng Mgtfvá. 3 Csg, hsgl, y qfdó p Ufdgk timp ng Niabpid, bp rspb rferiaió y bg nif p bsz se timf. 

4 Y bg nimf Mgtfvá: Hfebg hfk efdakg Mgzkggb; hfkjsg ng pjsí p hfrf yf rplqiupké p bp rplp ng Mgtú hfk rpslp ng bp lpeukg ng Mgzkggb, y tpké rglpk gb kgief ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 5 Y ge pjsgb níp jsgakpké yf gb pkrf ng Ilkpgb ge gb vpbbg ng Mgzkggb. 

6 Rferiaió gbbp fqkp vgz, y nif p bsz sep timp. Y bg nimf Nifl: Hfebg hfk efdakg Bf-kstpdp, hfkjsg ef dg rfdhpngrgké dál ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, lief jsg bfl jsiqpké ngb qfnf. 7 Dpl ng bp rplp ng Msná qgenké dilgkirfknip, y bfl lpbvpké hfk Mgtfvá ls Nifl; y ef bfl lpbvpké rfe pkrf, ei rfe glhpnp, ei rfe apqpbbp, ei rfe rpapbbfl ei miegqgl. 

8 Nglhsél ng tpagk nglqgqpnf p Bf-kstpdp, rferiaió y nif p bsz se timf. 9 Y nimf Nifl: Hfebg hfk efdakg Bf-pddi, hfkjsg vflfqkfl ef lfil di hsgabf, ei yf lgké vsglqkf Nifl. 

10 Rfe qfnf, lgká gb eúdgkf ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfdf bp pkgep ngb dpk, jsg ef lg hsgng dgnik ei rfeqpk. Y ge gb bsupk ge nfeng bgl csg nirtf: Vflfqkfl ef lfil hsgabf díf, bgl lgká nirtf: Lfil timfl ngb Nifl vivigeqg. 11 Y lg rfeukgupkáe bfl timfl ng Msná y ng Ilkpgb, y efdakpkáe se lfbf mgcg, y lsaikáe ng bp qigkkp; hfkjsg gb níp ng Mgzkggb lgká ukpeng. 

Gb pdfk ng Mgtfvá tprip ls hsgabf iecigb

FLGPL 2
