1 Ngrin p vsglqkfl tgkdpefl: Pddi; y p vsglqkpl tgkdpepl: Kstpdp. 2 Rfeqgengn rfe vsglqkp dpnkg, rfeqgengn; hfkjsg gbbp ef gl di dsmgk, ei yf ls dpkinf; phpkqg, hsgl, lsl cfkeirprifegl ng ls kflqkf, y lsl pnsbqgkifl ng geqkg lsl hgrtfl; 3 ef lgp jsg yf bp nglhfmg y nglesng, bp hfeup rfdf gb níp ge jsg eprió, bp tpup rfdf se ngligkqf, bp ngmg rfdf qigkkp lgrp, y bp dpqg ng lgn. 4 Ei qgenké dilgkirfknip ng lsl timfl, hfkjsg lfe timfl ng hkflqiqsrióe. 5 Hfkjsg ls dpnkg lg hkflqiqsyó; bp jsg bfl nif p bsz lg ngltfekó, hfkjsg nimf: Iké qkpl dil pdpeqgl, jsg dg npe di hpe y di pusp, di bpep y di bief, di prgiqg y di againp. 6 Hfk qpeqf, tg pjsí yf kfngpké ng glhiefl ls rpdief, y bp rgkrpké rfe lgqf, y ef tpbbpká lsl rpdiefl. 7 Lgusiká p lsl pdpeqgl, y ef bfl pbrpezpká; bfl aslrpká, y ef bfl tpbbpká. Geqfergl niká: Iké y dg vfbvgké p di hkidgk dpkinf; hfkjsg dgmfk dg iap geqfergl jsg ptfkp. 

8 Y gbbp ef kgrfefrió jsg yf bg npap gb qkiuf, gb vief y gb prgiqg, y jsg bg dsbqihbijsé bp hbpqp y gb fkf jsg fckgrípe p Appb. 9 Hfk qpeqf, yf vfbvgké y qfdpké di qkiuf p ls qigdhf, y di vief p ls lpzóe, y jsiqpké di bpep y di bief jsg tpaíp npnf hpkp rsakik ls nglesngz. 10 Y ptfkp nglrsakiké yf ls bfrskp ngbpeqg ng bfl fmfl ng lsl pdpeqgl, y epnig bp biakpká ng di dpef. 11 Tpké rglpk qfnf ls ufzf, lsl ciglqpl, lsl esgvpl bsepl y lsl nípl ng kghflf, y qfnpl lsl cglqivinpngl. 12 Y tpké qpbpk lsl vingl y lsl tiusgkpl, ng bpl rspbgl nimf: Di lpbpkif lfe, lpbpkif jsg dg tpe npnf dil pdpeqgl. Y bpl kgnsriké p se dpqfkkpb, y bpl rfdgkáe bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf. 13 Y bp rplqiupké hfk bfl nípl ge jsg iergelpap p bfl appbgl, y lg pnfkepap ng lsl zpkribbfl y ng lsl mfygbgl, y lg iap qkpl lsl pdpeqgl y lg fbvinpap ng dí, nirg Mgtfvá. 

14 Hgkf tg pjsí jsg yf bp pqkpgké y bp bbgvpké pb ngligkqf, y tpabpké p ls rfkpzóe. 15 Y bg npké lsl viñpl nglng pbbí, y gb vpbbg ng Prfk hfk hsgkqp ng glhgkpezp; y pbbí rpeqpká rfdf ge bfl qigdhfl ng ls msvgeqsn, y rfdf ge gb níp ng ls lsainp ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 16 Ge pjsgb qigdhf, nirg Mgtfvá, dg bbpdpkál Ilti, y eserp dál dg bbpdpkál Appbi. 17 Hfkjsg jsiqpké ng ls afrp bfl efdakgl ng bfl appbgl, y eserp dál lg dgerifepkáe lsl efdakgl. 18 Ge pjsgb qigdhf tpké hpkp qi hprqf rfe bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf, rfe bpl pvgl ngb rigbf y rfe bpl lgkhigeqgl ng bp qigkkp; y jsiqpké ng bp qigkkp pkrf y glhpnp y usgkkp, y qg tpké nfkdik lguskp. 19 Y qg nglhflpké rfediuf hpkp ligdhkg; qg nglhflpké rfediuf ge mslqirip, msirif, ageiueinpn y dilgkirfknip. 20 Y qg nglhflpké rfediuf ge cingbinpn, y rfefrgkál p Mgtfvá. 

21 Ge pjsgb qigdhf kglhfengké, nirg Mgtfvá, yf kglhfengké p bfl rigbfl, y gbbfl kglhfengkáe p bp qigkkp. 22 Y bp qigkkp kglhfengká pb qkiuf, pb vief y pb prgiqg, y gbbfl kglhfengkáe p Mgzkggb. 23 Y bp lgdakpké hpkp dí ge bp qigkkp, y qgenké dilgkirfknip ng Bf-kstpdp; y niké p Bf-pddi: Qú gkgl hsgabf díf, y éb niká: Nifl díf. 

Flgpl y bp pnúbqgkp

FLGPL 3

1 Dg nimf fqkp vgz Mgtfvá: Vg, pdp p sep dsmgk pdpnp ng ls rfdhpñgkf, psejsg pnúbqgkp, rfdf gb pdfk ng Mgtfvá hpkp rfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, bfl rspbgl dikpe p niflgl pmgefl, y pdpe qfkqpl ng hplpl. 2 Bp rfdhké geqfergl hpkp dí hfk jsierg lirbfl ng hbpqp y se tfdgk y dgnif ng rgapnp. 3 Y bg nimg: Qú lgkál díp nskpeqg dsrtfl nípl; ef cfkeirpkál, ei qfdpkál fqkf vpkóe; bf dildf tpké yf rfeqiuf. 4 Hfkjsg dsrtfl nípl glqpkáe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb lie kgy, lie hkíerihg, lie lprkicirif, lie glqpqsp, lie gcfn y lie qgkpciegl. 5 Nglhsél vfbvgkáe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y aslrpkáe p Mgtfvá ls Nifl, y p Npvin ls kgy; y qgdgkáe p Mgtfvá y p ls afenpn ge gb cie ng bfl nípl. 

Rfeqkfvgklip ng Mgtfvá rfe Ilkpgb

FLGPL 4

1 Fín hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, timfl ng Ilkpgb, hfkjsg Mgtfvá rfeqigeng rfe bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp; hfkjsg ef tpy vgknpn, ei dilgkirfknip, ei rfefridigeqf ng Nifl ge bp qigkkp. 2 Hgkmskpk, dgeqik, dpqpk, tskqpk y pnsbqgkpk hkgvpbgrge, y tfdirinif qkpl tfdirinif lg lsrgnge. 3 Hfk bf rspb lg gebsqpká bp qigkkp, y lg gxqgespká qfnf dfkpnfk ng gbbp, rfe bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf y bpl pvgl ngb rigbf; y pse bfl hgrgl ngb dpk dfkikáe. 

4 Rigkqpdgeqg tfdakg ef rfeqigenp ei kghkgenp p tfdakg, hfkjsg qs hsgabf gl rfdf bfl jsg kglilqge pb lprgknfqg. 5 Rpgkál hfk qpeqf ge gb níp, y rpgká qpdaiée rfeqiuf gb hkfcgqp ng efrtg; y p qs dpnkg nglqksiké. 6 Di hsgabf csg nglqksinf, hfkjsg bg cpbqó rfefridigeqf. Hfk rspeqf nglgrtplqg gb rfefridigeqf, yf qg grtpké ngb lprgknfrif; y hfkjsg fbvinplqg bp bgy ng qs Nifl, qpdaiée yf dg fbvinpké ng qsl timfl. 

7 Rfecfkdg p ls ukpengzp, plí hgrpkfe rfeqkp dí; qpdaiée yf rpdaipké ls tfekp ge pckgeqp. 8 Ngb hgrpnf ng di hsgabf rfdge, y ge ls dpbnpn bgvpeqpe ls pbdp. 9 Y lgká gb hsgabf rfdf gb lprgknfqg; bg rplqiupké hfk ls rfensrqp, y bg hpupké rfecfkdg p lsl fakpl. 10 Rfdgkáe, hgkf ef lg lpripkáe; cfkeirpkáe, dpl ef lg dsbqihbirpkáe, hfkjsg ngmpkfe ng lgkvik p Mgtfvá. 

11 Cfkeirprióe, vief y dflqf jsiqpe gb msirif. 12 Di hsgabf p ls ínfbf ng dpngkp hkguseqp, y gb bgñf bg kglhfeng; hfkjsg glhíkiqs ng cfkeirprifegl bf tizf gkkpk, y ngmpkfe p ls Nifl hpkp cfkeirpk. 13 Lfakg bpl ridpl ng bfl dfeqgl lprkicirpkfe, g iergelpkfe lfakg bfl rfbbpnfl, ngapmf ng bpl geriepl, ábpdfl y fbdfl jsg qsviglge asgep lfdakp; hfk qpeqf, vsglqkpl timpl cfkeirpkáe, y pnsbqgkpkáe vsglqkpl esgkpl. 14 Ef rplqiupké p vsglqkpl timpl rspenf cfkeijsge, ei p vsglqkpl esgkpl rspenf pnsbqgkge; hfkjsg gbbfl dildfl lg vpe rfe kpdgkpl, y rfe dpbpl dsmgkgl lprkicirpe; hfk qpeqf, gb hsgabf lie geqgenidigeqf rpgká. 

15 Li cfkeirpl qú, Ilkpgb, p bf dgefl ef hgjsg Msná; y ef geqkéil ge Uibupb, ei lsaáil p Agq-pvée, ei mskéil: Vivg Mgtfvá. 16 Hfkjsg rfdf efvibbp ienódiqp lg phpkqó Ilkpgb; ¿bfl phprgeqpká ptfkp Mgtfvá rfdf p rfkngkfl ge bsupk glhpriflf? 

17 Gckpíe gl npnf p ínfbfl; némpbf. 18 Ls againp lg rfkkfdhió; cfkeirpkfe lie rglpk; lsl hkíerihgl pdpkfe bf jsg pvgkuügezp. 19 Gb vigeqf bfl pqó ge lsl pbpl, y ng lsl lprkicirifl lgkáe pvgkufezpnfl. 

Rplqiuf ng bp phflqplíp ng Ilkpgb

FLGPL 5

1 Lprgknfqgl, fín glqf, y glqpn pqgeqfl, rplp ng Ilkpgb, y rplp ngb kgy, glrsrtpn; hfkjsg hpkp vflfqkfl gl gb msirif, hsgl tpaéil linf bpzf ge Dizhp, y kgn qgeninp lfakg Qpafk. 2 Y tprigenf vírqidpl tpe apmpnf tplqp bf hkfcsenf; hfk qpeqf, yf rplqiupké p qfnfl gbbfl. 

3 Yf rfefzrf p Gckpíe, g Ilkpgb ef dg gl nglrfefrinf; hfkjsg ptfkp, ft Gckpíe, qg tpl hkflqiqsinf, y lg tp rfeqpdiepnf Ilkpgb. 4 Ef higelpe ge rfevgkqiklg p ls Nifl, hfkjsg glhíkiqs ng cfkeirprióe glqá ge dgnif ng gbbfl, y ef rfefrge p Mgtfvá. 

5 Bp lfagkaip ng Ilkpgb bg ngldgeqiká ge ls rpkp; Ilkpgb y Gckpíe qkfhgzpkáe ge ls hgrpnf, y Msná qkfhgzpká qpdaiée rfe gbbfl. 6 Rfe lsl fvgmpl y rfe lsl vprpl penpkáe aslrpenf p Mgtfvá, y ef bg tpbbpkáe; lg phpkqó ng gbbfl. 7 Rfeqkp Mgtfvá hkgvpkirpkfe, hfkjsg tpe geugenkpnf timfl gxqkpñfl; ptfkp ge se lfbf dgl lgkáe rfelsdinfl gbbfl y lsl tgkgnpngl. 

8 Qfrpn afriep ge Upapp, qkfdhgqp ge Kpdá: lfepn pbpkdp ge Agq-pvée; qigdabp, ft Agempdíe. 9 Gckpíe lgká plfbpnf ge gb níp ngb rplqiuf; ge bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb tirg rfefrgk bp vgknpn. 10 Bfl hkíerihgl ng Msná csgkfe rfdf bfl jsg qkplhplpe bfl biengkfl; ngkkpdpké lfakg gbbfl rfdf pusp di ikp. 11 Gckpíe gl vgmpnf, jsgakpeqpnf ge msirif, hfkjsg jsilf penpk ge hfl ng vpeinpngl. 12 Yf, hsgl, lgké rfdf hfbibbp p Gckpíe, y rfdf rpkrfdp p bp rplp ng Msná. 

13 Y vgká Gckpíe ls gecgkdgnpn, y Msná ls bbpup; iká geqfergl Gckpíe p Plikip, y gevipká pb kgy Mpkga; dpl éb ef fl hfnká lpepk, ei fl rskpká bp bbpup. 14 Hfkjsg yf lgké rfdf bgóe p Gckpíe, y rfdf rprtfkkf ng bgóe p bp rplp ng Msná; yf, yf pkkgapqpké, y dg iké; qfdpké, y ef tpaká jsige biagkqg. 

Ieliergkinpn ngb pkkghgeqidigeqf ng Ilkpgb

15 Penpké y vfbvgké p di bsupk, tplqp jsg kgrfefzrpe ls hgrpnf y asljsge di kflqkf. Ge ls peuslqip dg aslrpkáe. 

FLGPL 6

1 Vgein y vfbvpdfl p Mgtfvá; hfkjsg éb pkkgapqó, y efl rskpká; tikió, y efl vgenpká. 2 Efl npká vinp nglhsél ng nfl nípl; ge gb qgkrgk níp efl kglsriqpká, y vivikgdfl ngbpeqg ng éb. 3 Y rfefrgkgdfl, y hkflgusikgdfl ge rfefrgk p Mgtfvá; rfdf gb pbap glqá nilhsglqp ls lpbinp, y vgenká p eflfqkfl rfdf bp bbsvip, rfdf bp bbsvip qpkníp y qgdhkpep p bp qigkkp. 

4 ¿Jsé tpké p qi, Gckpíe? ¿Jsé tpké p qi, ft Msná? Bp hignpn vsglqkp gl rfdf esag ng bp dpñpep, y rfdf gb kfríf ng bp dpnksupnp, jsg lg nglvpegrg. 5 Hfk glqp rpslp bfl rfkqé hfk dgnif ng bfl hkfcgqpl, rfe bpl hpbpakpl ng di afrp bfl dpqé; y qsl msirifl lgkáe rfdf bsz jsg lpbg. 6 Hfkjsg dilgkirfknip jsigkf, y ef lprkicirif, y rfefridigeqf ng Nifl dál jsg tfbfrpslqfl. 

7 Dpl gbbfl, rspb Pnáe, qkplhplpkfe gb hprqf; pbbí hkgvpkirpkfe rfeqkp dí. 8 Upbppn, risnpn ng tprgnfkgl ng ieijsinpn, dpertpnp ng lpeukg. 9 Y rfdf bpnkfegl jsg glhgkpe p pbuúe tfdakg, plí sep rfdhpñíp ng lprgknfqgl dpqp ge gb rpdief tprip Lijsgd; plí rfdgqigkfe pafdieprióe. 10 Ge bp rplp ng Ilkpgb tg vilqf iedsenirip; pbbí cfkeiró Gckpíe, y lg rfeqpdieó Ilkpgb. 

11 Hpkp qi qpdaiée, ft Msná, glqá hkghpkpnp sep ligup, rspenf yf tpup vfbvgk gb rpsqivgkif ng di hsgabf. 

Ieijsinpn y kgagbióe ng Ilkpgb

FLGPL 7

1 Digeqkpl rskpap yf p Ilkpgb, lg nglrsakió bp ieijsinpn ng Gckpíe, y bpl dpbnpngl ng Lpdpkip; hfkjsg tirigkfe geupñf; y geqkp gb bpnkóe, y gb lpbqgpnfk nglhfmp hfk csgkp. 2 Y ef rfelingkpe ge ls rfkpzóe jsg qgeuf ge dgdfkip qfnp ls dpbnpn; ptfkp bgl kfngpkáe lsl fakpl; ngbpeqg ng dí glqáe. 3 Rfe ls dpbnpn pbgukpe pb kgy, y p bfl hkíerihgl rfe lsl dgeqikpl. 4 Qfnfl gbbfl lfe pnúbqgkfl; lfe rfdf tfkef gergeninf hfk gb tfkegkf, jsg rglp ng pvivpk gb csguf nglhsél jsg glqá tgrtp bp dplp, tplqp jsg lg tpyp bgsnpnf. 5 Ge gb níp ng esglqkf kgy bfl hkíerihgl bf tirigkfe gecgkdpk rfe rfhpl ng vief; gxqgenió ls dpef rfe bfl glrpkegrgnfkgl. 6 Phbirpkfe ls rfkpzóe, lgdgmpeqg p se tfkef, p lsl pkqicirifl; qfnp bp efrtg nsgkdg ls tfkegkf; p bp dpñpep glqá gergeninf rfdf bbpdp ng csguf. 7 Qfnfl gbbfl pknge rfdf se tfkef, y ngvfkpkfe p lsl msgrgl; rpygkfe qfnfl lsl kgygl; ef tpy geqkg gbbfl jsige p dí rbpdg. 

8 Gckpíe lg tp dgzrbpnf rfe bfl ngdál hsgabfl; Gckpíe csg qfkqp ef vfbqgpnp. 9 Ngvfkpkfe gxqkpñfl ls csgkzp, y éb ef bf lshf; y pse rpepl bg tpe rsaigkqf, y éb ef bf lshf. 10 Y bp lfagkaip ng Ilkpgb qglqicirpká rfeqkp éb ge ls rpkp; y ef lg vfbvigkfe p Mgtfvá ls Nifl, ei bf aslrpkfe rfe qfnf glqf. 

11 Gckpíe csg rfdf hpbfdp ierpsqp, lie geqgenidigeqf; bbpdpkáe p Guihqf, prsnikáe p Plikip. 12 Rspenf csgkge, qgengké lfakg gbbfl di kgn; bgl tpké rpgk rfdf pvgl ngb rigbf; bgl rplqiupké rfecfkdg p bf jsg lg tp peseripnf ge lsl rfeukguprifegl. 13 ¡Py ng gbbfl! hfkjsg lg phpkqpkfe ng dí; nglqksrrióe vgenká lfakg gbbfl, hfkjsg rfeqkp dí lg kgagbpkfe; yf bfl kgnidí, y gbbfl tpabpkfe dgeqikpl rfeqkp dí. 

14 Y ef rbpdpkfe p dí rfe ls rfkpzóe rspenf ukiqpape lfakg lsl rpdpl; hpkp gb qkiuf y gb dflqf lg rfeukgupkfe, lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp dí. 15 Y psejsg yf bfl gelgñé y cfkqpbgrí lsl akpzfl, rfeqkp dí hgelpkfe dpb. 16 Vfbvigkfe, hgkf ef pb Pbqílidf; csgkfe rfdf pkrf geupñflf; rpygkfe lsl hkíerihgl p glhpnp hfk bp lfagkaip ng ls bgeusp; glqf lgká ls glrpkeif ge bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. 

Kghkgelióe ng bp infbpqkíp ng Ilkpgb

FLGPL 8

1 Hfe p qs afrp qkfdhgqp. Rfdf áusibp vigeg rfeqkp bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, hfkjsg qkplhplpkfe di hprqf, y lg kgagbpkfe rfeqkp di bgy. 2 P dí rbpdpká Ilkpgb: Nifl díf, qg tgdfl rfefrinf. 3 Ilkpgb nglgrtó gb aige; gegdiuf bf hgklgusiká. 

4 Gbbfl glqpabgrigkfe kgygl, hgkf ef glrfuinfl hfk dí; rfelqiqsygkfe hkíerihgl, dpl yf ef bf lshg; ng ls hbpqp y ng ls fkf tirigkfe ínfbfl hpkp lí, hpkp lgk gbbfl dildfl nglqksinfl. 5 Qs agrgkkf, ft Lpdpkip, qg tizf pbgmpkqg; lg gergenió di gefmf rfeqkp gbbfl, tplqp jsg ef hsnigkfe pbrpezpk hskicirprióe. 6 Hfkjsg ng Ilkpgb gl qpdaiée élqg, y pkqícirg bf tizf; ef gl Nifl; hfk bf jsg lgká ngltgrtf ge hgnpzfl gb agrgkkf ng Lpdpkip. 

7 Hfkjsg lgdakpkfe vigeqf, y qfkagbbief lgupkáe; ef qgenkáe digl, ei ls glhiup tpká tpkiep; y li bp tirigkg, gxqkpñfl bp rfdgkáe. 8 Ngvfkpnf lgká Ilkpgb; hkfeqf lgká geqkg bpl eprifegl rfdf vplimp jsg ef lg glqidp. 9 Hfkjsg gbbfl lsaigkfe p Plikip, rfdf plef dfeqél hpkp lí lfbf; Gckpíe rfe lpbpkif pbjsibó pdpeqgl. 10 Psejsg pbjsibge geqkg bpl eprifegl, ptfkp bpl mseqpké, y lgkáe pcbiuinfl se hfrf ng qigdhf hfk bp rpkup ngb kgy y ng bfl hkíerihgl. 

11 Hfkjsg dsbqihbiró Gckpíe pbqpkgl hpkp hgrpk, qsvf pbqpkgl hpkp hgrpk. 12 Bg glrkiaí bpl ukpengzpl ng di bgy, y csgkfe qgeinpl hfk rflp gxqkpñp. 13 Ge bfl lprkicirifl ng dil fckgenpl lprkicirpkfe rpkeg, y rfdigkfe; ef bfl jsilf Mgtfvá; ptfkp lg prfknpká ng ls ieijsinpn, y rplqiupká ls hgrpnf; gbbfl vfbvgkáe p Guihqf. 14 Fbvinó, hsgl, Ilkpgb p ls Tprgnfk, y gniciró qgdhbfl, y Msná dsbqihbiró risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl; dpl yf dgqgké csguf ge lsl risnpngl, gb rspb rfelsdiká lsl hpbprifl. 

Rplqiuf ng bp hgklilqgeqg iecingbinpn ng Ilkpgb

FLGPL 9

1 Ef qg pbgukgl, ft Ilkpgb, tplqp lpbqpk ng ufzf rfdf bfl hsgabfl, hsgl tpl cfkeirpnf phpkqáenfqg ng qs Nifl; pdplqg lpbpkif ng kpdgkp ge qfnpl bpl gkpl ng qkiuf. 2 Bp gkp y gb bpupk ef bfl dpeqgenkáe, y bgl cpbbpká gb dflqf. 3 Ef jsgnpkáe ge bp qigkkp ng Mgtfvá, lief jsg vfbvgká Gckpíe p Guihqf y p Plikip, nfeng rfdgkáe vipenp iedsenp. 

4 Ef tpkáe biaprifegl p Mgtfvá, ei lsl lprkicirifl bg lgkáe ukpqfl; rfdf hpe ng gebsqpnfl bgl lgkáe p gbbfl; qfnfl bfl jsg rfdpe ng éb lgkáe iedsenfl. Lgká, hsgl, gb hpe ng gbbfl hpkp lí dildfl; glg hpe ef geqkpká ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá. 

5 ¿Jsé tpkéil ge gb níp ng bp lfbgdeinpn, y ge gb níp ng bp ciglqp ng Mgtfvá? 6 Hfkjsg tg pjsí lg csgkfe gbbfl p rpslp ng bp nglqksrrióe. Guihqf bfl kgrfugká, Dgecil bfl geqgkkpká. Bp fkqiup rfejsilqpká bf nglgpabg ng ls hbpqp, y glhief rkgrgká ge lsl dfkpnpl. 

7 Vieigkfe bfl nípl ngb rplqiuf, vieigkfe bfl nípl ng bp kgqkiasrióe; g Ilkpgb bf rfefrgká. Egrif gl gb hkfcgqp, ielgelpqf gl gb vpkóe ng glhíkiqs, p rpslp ng bp dsbqiqsn ng qs dpbnpn, y ukpeng fnif. 8 Pqpbpyp gl Gckpíe hpkp rfe di Nifl; gb hkfcgqp gl bpzf ng rpzpnfk ge qfnfl lsl rpdiefl, fnif ge bp rplp ng ls Nifl. 9 Bbgupkfe tplqp bf dál apmf ge ls rfkkshrióe, rfdf ge bfl nípl ng Upapp; ptfkp lg prfknpká ng ls ieijsinpn, rplqiupká ls hgrpnf. 

10 Rfdf svpl ge gb ngligkqf tpbbé p Ilkpgb; rfdf bp cksqp qgdhkpep ng bp tiusgkp ge ls hkierihif vi p vsglqkfl hpnkgl. Gbbfl prsnigkfe p Appb-hgfk, lg phpkqpkfe hpkp vgkuügezp, y lg tirigkfe pafdiepabgl rfdf pjsgbbf jsg pdpkfe. 11 Bp ubfkip ng Gckpíe vfbpká rspb pvg, ng dfnf jsg ef tpaká epridigeqfl, ei gdapkpzfl, ei rferghrifegl. 12 Y li bbgupkge p ukpengl lsl timfl, bfl jsiqpké ng geqkg bfl tfdakgl, hfkjsg ¡py ng gbbfl qpdaiée, rspenf ng gbbfl dg phpkqg! 13 Gckpíe, lguúe vgf, gl lgdgmpeqg p Qikf, liqspnf ge bsupk ngbiriflf; hgkf Gckpíe lprpká lsl timfl p bp dpqpezp. 14 Npbgl, ft Mgtfvá, bf jsg bgl tpl ng npk; npbgl dpqkiz jsg pafkqg, y hgrtfl gemsqfl. 

15 Qfnp bp dpbnpn ng gbbfl csg ge Uibupb; pbbí, hsgl, bgl qfdé pvgklióe; hfk bp hgkvgklinpn ng lsl fakpl bfl grtpké ng di rplp; ef bfl pdpké dál; qfnfl lsl hkíerihgl lfe nglbgpbgl. 

16 Gckpíe csg tgkinf, ls kpíz glqá lgrp, ef npká dál cksqf; psejsg geugenkge, yf dpqpké bf nglgpabg ng ls vigeqkg. 17 Di Nifl bfl nglgrtpká, hfkjsg gbbfl ef bg fygkfe; y penpkáe gkkpeqgl geqkg bpl eprifegl. 

FLGPL 10

1 Ilkpgb gl sep ckfenflp viñp, jsg np pasenpeqg cksqf hpkp lí dildf; rfecfkdg p bp pasenperip ng ls cksqf dsbqihbiró qpdaiée bfl pbqpkgl, rfecfkdg p bp afenpn ng ls qigkkp psdgeqpkfe lsl ínfbfl. 2 Glqá nivininf ls rfkpzóe. Ptfkp lgkáe tpbbpnfl rsbhpabgl; Mgtfvá ngdfbgká lsl pbqpkgl, nglqksiká lsl ínfbfl. 

3 Lguskpdgeqg nikáe ptfkp: Ef qgegdfl kgy, hfkjsg ef qgdidfl p Mgtfvá; ¿y jsé tpkíp gb kgy hfk eflfqkfl? 4 Tpe tpabpnf hpbpakpl mskpenf ge vpef pb tprgk hprqf; hfk qpeqf, gb msirif cbfkgrgká rfdf pmgemf ge bfl lskrfl ngb rpdhf. 5 Hfk bpl agrgkkpl ng Agq-pvée lgkáe pqgdfkizpnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Lpdpkip; hfkjsg ls hsgabf bpdgeqpká p rpslp ngb agrgkkf, y lsl lprgknfqgl jsg ge éb lg kgufrimpape hfk ls ubfkip, bp rspb lgká nilihpnp. 6 Pse lgká éb bbgvpnf p Plikip rfdf hkglgeqg pb kgy Mpkga; Gckpíe lgká pvgkufezpnf, g Ilkpgb lg pvgkufezpká ng ls rfelgmf. 

7 Ng Lpdpkip csg rfkqpnf ls kgy rfdf glhsdp lfakg bp lshgkcirig ng bpl puspl. 8 Y bfl bsupkgl pbqfl ng Pvée lgkáe nglqksinfl, gb hgrpnf ng Ilkpgb; rkgrgká lfakg lsl pbqpkgl glhief y rpknf. Y nikáe p bfl dfeqgl: Rsakinefl; y p bfl rfbbpnfl: Rpgn lfakg eflfqkfl. 

9 Nglng bfl nípl ng Upapp tpl hgrpnf, ft Ilkpgb; pbbí glqsvigkfe; ef bfl qfdó bp apqpbbp ge Upapp rfeqkp bfl ieirsfl. 10 Y bfl rplqiupké rspenf bf nglgg; y hsgabfl lg mseqpkáe lfakg gbbfl rspenf lgpe pqpnfl hfk ls nfabg rkidge. 11 Gckpíe gl efvibbp nfdpnp, jsg bg uslqp qkibbpk, dpl yf hplpké lfakg ls bfzpep rgkviz; tpké bbgvpk ysuf p Gckpíe; pkpká Msná, jsgakpká lsl qgkkfegl Mprfa. 12 Lgdakpn hpkp vflfqkfl ge mslqirip, lgupn hpkp vflfqkfl ge dilgkirfknip; tprgn hpkp vflfqkfl apkagrtf; hfkjsg gl gb qigdhf ng aslrpk p Mgtfvá, tplqp jsg vgeup y fl gelgñg mslqirip. 

13 Tpaéil pkpnf idhignpn, y lguplqgil ieijsinpn; rfdgkéil cksqf ng dgeqikp, hfkjsg rfeciplqg ge qs rpdief y ge bp dsbqiqsn ng qsl vpbigeqgl. 14 Hfk qpeqf, ge qsl hsgabfl lg bgvpeqpká pbafkfqf, y qfnpl qsl cfkqpbgzpl lgkáe nglqksinpl, rfdf nglqksyó Lpbdáe p Agq-pkagb ge gb níp ng bp apqpbbp, rspenf bp dpnkg csg nglqkfzpnp rfe bfl timfl. 15 Plí tpká p vflfqkfl Agq-gb, hfk rpslp ng vsglqkp ukpe dpbnpn; p bp dpñpep lgká ngb qfnf rfkqpnf gb kgy ng Ilkpgb. 

Nifl lg rfdhpngrg ng ls hsgabf falqiepnf

FLGPL 11

1 Rspenf Ilkpgb gkp dsrtprtf, yf bf pdé, y ng Guihqf bbpdé p di timf. 2 Rspeqf dál yf bfl bbpdpap, qpeqf dál lg pbgmpape ng dí; p bfl appbgl lprkicirpape, y p bfl ínfbfl fckgrípe lptsdgkifl. 

3 Yf rfe qfnf glf gelgñpap p penpk pb dildf Gckpíe, qfdáenfbg ng bfl akpzfl; y ef rfefrió jsg yf bg rsinpap. 4 Rfe rsgknpl tsdpepl bfl pqkpmg, rfe rsgknpl ng pdfk; y csi hpkp gbbfl rfdf bfl jsg pbzpe gb ysuf ng lfakg ls rgkviz, y hslg ngbpeqg ng gbbfl bp rfdinp. 

5 Ef vfbvgká p qigkkp ng Guihqf, lief jsg gb plikif dildf lgká ls kgy, hfkjsg ef lg jsiligkfe rfevgkqik. 6 Rpgká glhpnp lfakg lsl risnpngl, y rfelsdiká lsl pbngpl; bpl rfelsdiká p rpslp ng lsl hkfhifl rfelgmfl. 7 Geqkg qpeqf, di hsgabf glqá pntgkinf p bp kgagbióe rfeqkp dí; psejsg dg bbpdpe gb Pbqílidf, eieusef palfbsqpdgeqg dg jsigkg gepbqgrgk. 

8 ¿Ródf hfnké papenfepkqg, ft Gckpíe? ¿Qg geqkgupké yf, Ilkpgb? ¿Ródf hfnké yf tprgkqg rfdf Pndp, f hfegkqg rfdf p Zgafid? Di rfkpzóe lg rfedsgvg ngeqkf ng dí, lg iecbpdp qfnp di rfdhplióe. 9 Ef gmgrsqpké gb pknfk ng di ikp, ei vfbvgké hpkp nglqksik p Gckpíe; hfkjsg Nifl lfy, y ef tfdakg, gb Lpeqf ge dgnif ng qi; y ef geqkpké ge bp risnpn. 

10 Ge hfl ng Mgtfvá rpdiepkáe; éb ksuiká rfdf bgóe; ksuiká, y bfl timfl vgenkáe qgdabpenf nglng gb frringeqg. 11 Rfdf pvg prsnikáe vgbfzdgeqg ng Guihqf, y ng bp qigkkp ng Plikip rfdf hpbfdp; y bfl tpké tpaiqpk ge lsl rplpl, nirg Mgtfvá. 12 Dg kfngó Gckpíe ng dgeqikp, y bp rplp ng Ilkpgb ng geupñf. Msná púe ufaigkep rfe Nifl, y gl cigb rfe bfl lpeqfl. 

Gckpíe kghkgeninf hfk ls cpblgnpn y fhkglióe

FLGPL 12

1 Gckpíe lg phprigeqp ng vigeqf, y liusg pb lfbpef; dgeqikp y nglqksrrióe psdgeqp rfeqiespdgeqg; hfkjsg tirigkfe hprqf rfe bfl plikifl, y gb prgiqg lg bbgvp p Guihqf. 

2 Hbgiqf qigeg Mgtfvá rfe Msná hpkp rplqiupk p Mprfa rfecfkdg p lsl rpdiefl; bg hpupká rfecfkdg p lsl fakpl. 3 Ge gb lgef dpqgkef qfdó hfk gb rpbrpñpk p ls tgkdpef, y rfe ls hfngk vgerió pb áeugb. 4 Vgerió pb áeugb, y hkgvpbgrió; bbfkó, y bg kfuó; ge Agq-gb bg tpbbó, y pbbí tpabó rfe eflfqkfl. 5 Dpl Mgtfvá gl Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl; Mgtfvá gl ls efdakg. 6 Qú, hsgl, vsébvgqg p qs Nifl; uspknp dilgkirfknip y msirif, y ge qs Nifl rfecíp ligdhkg. 

7 Dgkrpngk jsg qigeg ge ls dpef hglf cpblf, pdpnfk ng fhkglióe, 8 Gckpíe nimf: Rigkqpdgeqg tg gekijsgrinf, tg tpbbpnf kijsgzpl hpkp dí; epnig tpbbpká ieijsinpn ge dí, ei hgrpnf ge qfnfl dil qkpapmfl. 9 Hgkf yf lfy Mgtfvá qs Nifl nglng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf; púe qg tpké dfkpk ge qigenpl, rfdf ge bfl nípl ng bp ciglqp. 

10 Y tg tpabpnf p bfl hkfcgqpl, y psdgeqé bp hkfcgríp, y hfk dgnif ng bfl hkfcgqpl slé hpkáafbpl. 11 ¿Gl Upbppn ieijsinpn? Rigkqpdgeqg vpeinpn tpe linf; ge Uibupb lprkicirpkfe asgygl, y lsl pbqpkgl lfe rfdf dfeqfegl ge bfl lskrfl ngb rpdhf. 12 Hgkf Mprfa tsyó p qigkkp ng Pkpd, Ilkpgb likvió hpkp pnjsikik dsmgk, y hfk pnjsikik dsmgk csg hplqfk. 13 Y hfk se hkfcgqp Mgtfvá tizf lsaik p Ilkpgb ng Guihqf, y hfk se hkfcgqp csg uspknpnf. 14 Gckpíe tp hkfvfrpnf p Nifl rfe pdpkuskpl; hfk qpeqf, tpká kgrpgk lfakg éb bp lpeukg jsg tp ngkkpdpnf, y ls Lgñfk bg hpupká ls fhkfaif. 

Nglqksrrióe qfqpb ng Gckpíe hkgnirtp

FLGPL 13

1 Rspenf Gckpíe tpabpap, tsaf qgdfk; csg gxpbqpnf ge Ilkpgb; dpl hgró ge Appb, y dskió. 2 Y ptfkp pñpnigkfe p ls hgrpnf, y ng ls hbpqp lg tpe tgrtf lguúe ls geqgenidigeqf idáugegl ng csenirióe, ínfbfl, qfnp fakp ng pkqícirgl, prgkrp ng bfl rspbgl nirge p bfl tfdakgl jsg lprkicirpe, jsg aglge bfl agrgkkfl. 3 Hfk qpeqf, lgkáe rfdf bp eigabp ng bp dpñpep, y rfdf gb kfríf ng bp dpnksupnp jsg lg hplp; rfdf gb qpdf jsg bp qgdhglqpn pkkfmp ng bp gkp, y rfdf gb tsdf jsg lpbg ng bp rtidgegp. 

4 Dpl yf lfy Mgtfvá qs Nifl nglng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf; ef rfefrgkál, hsgl, fqkf nifl csgkp ng dí, ei fqkf lpbvpnfk lief p dí. 5 Yf qg rfefrí ge gb ngligkqf, ge qigkkp lgrp. 6 Ge lsl hplqfl lg lpripkfe, y kghbgqfl, lg gelfagkagrió ls rfkpzóe; hfk glqp rpslp lg fbvinpkfe ng dí. 7 Hfk qpeqf, yf lgké hpkp gbbfl rfdf bgóe; rfdf se bgfhpknf ge gb rpdief bfl prgrtpké. 8 Rfdf flp jsg tp hgkninf bfl timfl bfl gerfeqkpké, y nglupkkpké bpl ciakpl ng ls rfkpzóe, y pbbí bfl ngvfkpké rfdf bgóe; cigkp ngb rpdhf bfl nglhgnpzpká. 

9 Qg hgknilqg, ft Ilkpgb, dpl ge dí glqá qs pysnp. 10 ¿Nóeng glqá qs kgy, hpkp jsg qg uspkng rfe qfnpl qsl risnpngl; y qsl msgrgl, ng bfl rspbgl nimilqg: Npdg kgy y hkíerihgl? 11 Qg ni kgy ge di cskfk, y qg bf jsiqé ge di ikp. 

12 Pqpnp glqá bp dpbnpn ng Gckpíe; ls hgrpnf glqá uspknpnf. 13 Nfbfkgl ng dsmgk jsg np p bsz bg vgenkáe; gl se timf ef lpaif, hfkjsg yp tprg qigdhf jsg ef ngaigkp ngqgegklg pb hseqf dildf ng eprgk. 

14 Ng bp dpef ngb Lgfb bfl kgnidiké, bfl biakpké ng bp dsgkqg. Ft dsgkqg, yf lgké qs dsgkqg; y lgké qs nglqksrrióe, ft Lgfb; bp rfdhplióe lgká glrfeninp ng di vilqp. 

15 Psejsg éb cksrqicijsg geqkg bfl tgkdpefl, vgenká gb lfbpef, vigeqf ng Mgtfvá; lg bgvpeqpká nglng gb ngligkqf, y lg lgrpká ls dpepeqipb, y lg pufqpká ls csgeqg; éb lpjsgpká gb qglfkf ng qfnpl lsl hkgriflpl pbtpmpl. 16 Lpdpkip lgká plfbpnp, hfkjsg lg kgagbó rfeqkp ls Nifl; rpgkáe p glhpnp; lsl eiñfl lgkáe glqkgbbpnfl, y lsl dsmgkgl gerieqpl lgkáe paigkqpl. 

Lúhbirp p Ilkpgb hpkp jsg vsgbvp p Mgtfvá

FLGPL 14

1 Vsgbvg, ft Ilkpgb, p Mgtfvá qs Nifl; hfkjsg hfk qs hgrpnf tpl rpínf. 2 Bbgvpn rfe vflfqkfl hpbpakpl ng lúhbirp, y vfbvgn p Mgtfvá, y ngrinbg: Jsiqp qfnp ieijsinpn, y prghqp gb aige, y qg fckgrgkgdfl bp fckgenp ng esglqkfl bpaifl. 3 Ef efl biakpká gb plikif; ef dfeqpkgdfl ge rpapbbfl, ei eserp dál nikgdfl p bp fakp ng esglqkpl dpefl: Niflgl esglqkfl; hfkjsg ge qi gb tsékcpef pbrpezpká dilgkirfknip. 

4 Yf lpepké ls kgagbióe, bfl pdpké ng hskp ukprip; hfkjsg di ikp lg phpkqó ng gbbfl. 5 Yf lgké p Ilkpgb rfdf kfríf; éb cbfkgrgká rfdf bikif, y gxqgengká lsl kpírgl rfdf gb Bíapef. 6 Lg gxqgengkáe lsl kpdpl, y lgká ls ubfkip rfdf bp ngb fbivf, y hgkcsdpká rfdf gb Bíapef. 7 Vfbvgkáe y lg lgeqpkáe apmf ls lfdakp; lgkáe vivicirpnfl rfdf qkiuf, y cbfkgrgkáe rfdf bp vin; ls fbfk lgká rfdf ng vief ngb Bíapef. 8 Gckpíe niká: ¿Jsé dál qgenké yp rfe bfl ínfbfl? Yf bf fiké, y dikpké; yf lgké p éb rfdf bp tpyp vgkng; ng dí lgká tpbbpnf qs cksqf. 

9 ¿Jsiée gl lpaif hpkp jsg geqigenp glqf, y hksngeqg hpkp jsg bf lghp? Hfkjsg bfl rpdiefl ng Mgtfvá lfe kgrqfl, y bfl mslqfl penpkáe hfk gbbfl; dpl bfl kgagbngl rpgkáe ge gbbfl. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


MFGB  

Ngvplqprióe ng bp qigkkp hfk bp bpeuflqp

MFGB 1

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Mfgb, timf ng Hgqsgb. 

2 Fín glqf, peripefl, y glrsrtpn, qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp. ¿Tp prfeqgrinf glqf ge vsglqkfl nípl, f ge bfl nípl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl? 3 Ng glqf rfeqpkéil p vsglqkfl timfl, y vsglqkfl timfl p lsl timfl, y lsl timfl p bp fqkp ugegkprióe. 4 Bf jsg jsgnó ng bp fksup rfdió gb lpbqóe, y bf jsg jsgnó ngb lpbqóe rfdió gb kgvfbqóe; y bp bpeuflqp rfdió bf jsg ngb kgvfbqóe tpaíp jsgnpnf. 

5 Nglhgkqpn, afkkprtfl, y bbfkpn; ugdin, qfnfl bfl jsg agaéil vief, p rpslp ngb dflqf, hfkjsg fl gl jsiqpnf ng vsglqkp afrp. 6 Hfkjsg hsgabf csgkqg g ieesdgkpabg lsaió p di qigkkp; lsl nigeqgl lfe nigeqgl ng bgóe, y lsl dsgbpl, dsgbpl ng bgóe. 7 Plfbó di vin, y nglrfkqgzó di tiusgkp; ngb qfnf bp nglesnó y ngkkiaó; lsl kpdpl jsgnpkfe abperpl. 

8 Bbfkp qú rfdf mfvge vglqinp ng ribirif hfk gb dpkinf ng ls msvgeqsn. 9 Nglphpkgrió ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá bp fckgenp y bp biaprióe; bfl lprgknfqgl dieilqkfl ng Mgtfvá glqáe ng nsgbf. 10 Gb rpdhf glqá plfbpnf, lg gebsqó bp qigkkp; hfkjsg gb qkiuf csg nglqksinf, lg lgró gb dflqf, lg hgknió gb prgiqg. 

11 Rfecsenífl, bpakpnfkgl; ugdin, viñgkfl, hfk gb qkiuf y bp rgapnp, hfkjsg lg hgknió bp digl ngb rpdhf. 12 Bp vin glqá lgrp, y hgkgrió bp tiusgkp; gb ukpepnf qpdaiée, bp hpbdgkp y gb dpezpef; qfnfl bfl ákafbgl ngb rpdhf lg lgrpkfe, hfk bf rspb lg gxqieusió gb ufzf ng bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 

13 Rgñífl y bpdgeqpn, lprgknfqgl; ugdin, dieilqkfl ngb pbqpk; vgein, nfkdin ge ribirif, dieilqkfl ng di Nifl; hfkjsg jsiqpnp gl ng bp rplp ng vsglqkf Nifl bp fckgenp y bp biaprióe. 

14 Hkfrbpdpn pysef, rfevfrpn p plpdabgp; rfeukgupn p bfl peripefl y p qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y rbpdpn p Mgtfvá. 

15 ¡Py ngb níp! hfkjsg rgkrpef glqá gb níp ng Mgtfvá, y vgenká rfdf nglqksrrióe hfk gb Qfnfhfngkflf. 16 ¿Ef csg pkkgapqpnf gb pbidgeqf ng ngbpeqg ng esglqkfl fmfl, bp pbgukíp y gb hbprgk ng bp rplp ng esglqkf Nifl? 

17 Gb ukpef lg hsnkió ngapmf ng bfl qgkkfegl, bfl ukpegkfl csgkfe plfbpnfl, bfl pbcfbígl nglqksinfl; hfkjsg lg lgró gb qkiuf. 18 ¡Ródf uidigkfe bpl aglqipl! ¡rsáe qskapnfl pensvigkfe bfl tpqfl ng bfl asgygl, hfkjsg ef qsvigkfe hplqfl! Qpdaiée csgkfe plfbpnfl bfl kgapñfl ng bpl fvgmpl. 

19 P qi, ft Mgtfvá, rbpdpké; hfkjsg csguf rfelsdió bfl hplqfl ngb ngligkqf, y bbpdp pakpló qfnfl bfl ákafbgl ngb rpdhf. 20 Bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf akpdpkáe qpdaiée p qi, hfkjsg lg lgrpkfe bfl pkkfyfl ng bpl puspl, y csguf rfelsdió bpl hkpngkpl ngb ngligkqf. 

MFGB 2

1 Qfrpn qkfdhgqp ge Life, y npn pbpkdp ge di lpeqf dfeqg; qigdabge qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp, hfkjsg vigeg gb níp ng Mgtfvá, hfkjsg glqá rgkrpef. 2 Níp ng qieigabpl y ng flrskinpn, níp ng esag y ng lfdakp; rfdf lfakg bfl dfeqgl lg gxqigeng gb pbap, plí vgenká se hsgabf ukpeng y csgkqg; lgdgmpeqg p éb ef bf tsaf mpdál, ei nglhsél ng éb bf tpaká ge pñfl ng dsrtpl ugegkprifegl. 

3 Ngbpeqg ng éb rfelsdiká csguf, qkpl ng éb pakplpká bbpdp; rfdf gb tsgkqf ngb Gnée lgká bp qigkkp ngbpeqg ng éb, y ngqkál ng éb rfdf ngligkqf plfbpnf; ei qpdhfrf tpaká jsige ng éb glrphg. 4 Ls plhgrqf, rfdf plhgrqf ng rpapbbfl, y rfdf ugeqg ng p rpapbbf rfkkgkáe. 5 Rfdf glqksgenf ng rpkkfl lpbqpkáe lfakg bpl rsdakgl ng bfl dfeqgl; rfdf lfeinf ng bbpdp ng csguf jsg rfelsdg tfmpkplrpl, rfdf hsgabf csgkqg nilhsglqf hpkp bp apqpbbp. 6 Ngbpeqg ng éb qgdgkáe bfl hsgabfl; lg hfenkáe hábinfl qfnfl bfl lgdabpeqgl. 7 Rfdf vpbigeqgl rfkkgkáe, rfdf tfdakgl ng usgkkp lsaikáe gb dskf; rpnp rspb dpkrtpká hfk ls rpdief, y ef qfkrgká ls ksdaf. 8 Eieusef glqkgrtpká p ls rfdhpñgkf, rpnp sef iká hfk ls rpkkgkp; y pse rpygenf lfakg bp glhpnp ef lg tgkikáe. 9 Ikáe hfk bp risnpn, rfkkgkáe hfk gb dskf, lsaikáe hfk bpl rplpl, geqkpkáe hfk bpl vgeqpepl p dpegkp ng bpnkfegl. 

10 Ngbpeqg ng éb qgdabpká bp qigkkp, lg glqkgdgrgkáe bfl rigbfl; gb lfb y bp bsep lg flrskgrgkáe, y bpl glqkgbbpl kgqkpgkáe ls kglhbpenfk. 11 Y Mgtfvá npká ls fknge ngbpeqg ng ls gmékriqf; hfkjsg dsy ukpeng gl ls rpdhpdgeqf; csgkqg gl gb jsg gmgrsqp ls fknge; hfkjsg ukpeng gl gb níp ng Mgtfvá, y dsy qgkkiabg; ¿jsiée hfnká lfhfkqpkbf? 

Bp dilgkirfknip ng Mgtfvá

12 Hfk glf hsgl, ptfkp, nirg Mgtfvá, rfevgkqífl p dí rfe qfnf vsglqkf rfkpzóe, rfe pysef y bbfkf y bpdgeqf. 13 Kplupn vsglqkf rfkpzóe, y ef vsglqkfl vglqinfl, y rfevgkqífl p Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; hfkjsg dilgkirfkniflf gl y rbgdgeqg, qpknf hpkp bp ikp y ukpeng ge dilgkirfknip, y jsg lg nsgbg ngb rplqiuf. 14 ¿Jsiée lpag li vfbvgká y lg pkkghgeqiká y ngmpká agenirióe qkpl ng éb, glqf gl, fckgenp y biaprióe hpkp Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl? 

15 Qfrpn qkfdhgqp ge Life, hkfrbpdpn pysef, rfevfrpn plpdabgp. 16 Kgsein pb hsgabf, lpeqicirpn bp kgseióe, mseqpn p bfl peripefl, rfeukgupn p bfl eiñfl y p bfl jsg dpdpe, lpbup ng ls rádpkp gb efvif, y ng ls qábpdf bp efvip. 17 Geqkg bp geqkpnp y gb pbqpk bbfkge bfl lprgknfqgl dieilqkfl ng Mgtfvá, y niupe: Hgknfep, ft Mgtfvá, p qs hsgabf, y ef geqkgusgl pb fhkfaif qs tgkgnpn, hpkp jsg bpl eprifegl lg gelgñfkgge ng gbbp. ¿Hfk jsé tpe ng ngrik geqkg bfl hsgabfl: Nóeng glqá ls Nifl? 

18 Y Mgtfvá, lfbíriqf hfk ls qigkkp, hgknfepká p ls hsgabf. 19 Kglhfengká Mgtfvá, y niká p ls hsgabf: Tg pjsí yf fl gevíf hpe, dflqf y prgiqg, y lgkéil lpripnfl ng gbbfl; y eserp dál fl hfenké ge fhkfaif geqkg bpl eprifegl. 20 Y tpké pbgmpk ng vflfqkfl pb ngb efkqg, y bf grtpké ge qigkkp lgrp y ngligkqp; ls cpz lgká tprip gb dpk fkigeqpb, y ls cie pb dpk frringeqpb; y gxtpbpká ls tgnfk, y lsaiká ls hsnkirióe, hfkjsg tizf ukpengl rflpl. 

21 Qigkkp, ef qgdpl; pbéukpqg y uózpqg, hfkjsg Mgtfvá tpká ukpengl rflpl. 22 Peidpbgl ngb rpdhf, ef qgdáil; hfkjsg bfl hplqfl ngb ngligkqf kgvgkngrgkáe, hfkjsg bfl ákafbgl bbgvpkáe ls cksqf, bp tiusgkp y bp vin npkáe lsl cksqfl. 23 Vflfqkfl qpdaiée, timfl ng Life, pbgukpfl y ufzpfl ge Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl; hfkjsg fl tp npnf bp hkidgkp bbsvip p ls qigdhf, y tpká nglrgengk lfakg vflfqkfl bbsvip qgdhkpep y qpkníp rfdf pb hkierihif. 24 Bpl gkpl lg bbgepkáe ng qkiuf, y bfl bpupkgl kgaflpkáe ng vief y prgiqg. 25 Y fl kglqiqsiké bfl pñfl jsg rfdió bp fksup, gb lpbqóe, gb kgvfbqóe y bp bpeuflqp, di ukpe gmékriqf jsg gevié rfeqkp vflfqkfl. 

26 Rfdgkéil tplqp lpripkfl, y pbpapkéil gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, gb rspb tizf dpkpvibbpl rfe vflfqkfl; y eserp mpdál lgká di hsgabf pvgkufezpnf. 27 Y rfefrgkéil jsg ge dgnif ng Ilkpgb glqfy yf, y jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, y ef tpy fqkf; y di hsgabf eserp mpdál lgká pvgkufezpnf. 

Ngkkpdpdigeqf ngb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl

28 Y nglhsél ng glqf ngkkpdpké di Glhíkiqs lfakg qfnp rpkeg, y hkfcgqizpkáe vsglqkfl timfl y vsglqkpl timpl; vsglqkfl peripefl lfñpkáe lsgñfl, y vsglqkfl móvgegl vgkáe vilifegl. 29 Y qpdaiée lfakg bfl ligkvfl y lfakg bpl ligkvpl ngkkpdpké di Glhíkiqs ge pjsgbbfl nípl. 

30 Y npké hkfniuifl ge gb rigbf y ge bp qigkkp, lpeukg, y csguf, y rfbsdepl ng tsdf. 31 Gb lfb lg rfevgkqiká ge qieigabpl, y bp bsep ge lpeukg, peqgl jsg vgeup gb níp ukpeng y glhpeqflf ng Mgtfvá. 32 Y qfnf pjsgb jsg ievfrpkg gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá lgká lpbvf; hfkjsg ge gb dfeqg ng Life y ge Mgkslpbée tpaká lpbvprióe, rfdf tp nirtf Mgtfvá, y geqkg gb kgdpegeqg pb rspb éb tpaká bbpdpnf. 

Msirif ng Mgtfvá lfakg bpl eprifegl

MFGB 3

1 Hfkjsg tg pjsí jsg ge pjsgbbfl nípl, y ge pjsgb qigdhf ge jsg tpké vfbvgk bp rpsqivinpn ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée, 2 kgseiké p qfnpl bpl eprifegl, y bpl tpké nglrgengk pb vpbbg ng Mflpcpq, y pbbí geqkpké ge msirif rfe gbbpl p rpslp ng di hsgabf, y ng Ilkpgb di tgkgnpn, p jsige gbbpl glhpkrigkfe geqkg bpl eprifegl, y kghpkqigkfe di qigkkp; 3 y grtpkfe lsgkqgl lfakg di hsgabf, y nigkfe bfl eiñfl hfk sep kpdgkp, y vgenigkfe bpl eiñpl hfk vief hpkp agagk. 

4 Y qpdaiée, ¿jsé qgeuf yf rfe vflfqkpl, Qikf y Linóe, y qfnf gb qgkkiqfkif ng Cibilqgp? ¿Jsgkéil vgeupkfl ng dí? Y li ng dí fl vgeuáil, aige hkfeqf tpké yf kgrpgk bp hpup lfakg vsglqkp rpagzp. 5 Hfkjsg tpaéil bbgvpnf di hbpqp y di fkf, y dil rflpl hkgriflpl y tgkdflpl dgqilqgil ge vsglqkfl qgdhbfl; 6 y vgenilqgil bfl timfl ng Msná y bfl timfl ng Mgkslpbée p bfl timfl ng bfl ukigufl, hpkp pbgmpkbfl ng ls qigkkp. 7 Tg pjsí yf bfl bgvpeqpké ngb bsupk nfeng bfl vgenilqgil, y vfbvgké vsglqkp hpup lfakg vsglqkp rpagzp; 8 y vgengké vsglqkfl timfl y vsglqkpl timpl p bfl timfl ng Msná, y gbbfl bfl vgengkáe p bfl lpagfl, eprióe bgmpep; hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp tpabpnf. 

9 Hkfrbpdpn glqf geqkg bpl eprifegl, hkfrbpdpn usgkkp, nglhgkqpn p bfl vpbigeqgl, prékjsgelg, vgeupe qfnfl bfl tfdakgl ng usgkkp. 10 Cfkmpn glhpnpl ng vsglqkfl pzpnfegl, bpezpl ng vsglqkpl tfrgl; niup gb néaib: Csgkqg lfy. 11 Mseqpfl y vgein, eprifegl qfnpl ng pbkgngnfk, y rfeukgupfl; tpz vgeik pbbí, ft Mgtfvá, p qsl csgkqgl. 12 Nglhiékqgelg bpl eprifegl, y lsape pb vpbbg ng Mflpcpq; hfkjsg pbbí dg lgeqpké hpkp mszupk p qfnpl bpl eprifegl ng pbkgngnfk. 13 Grtpn bp tfz, hfkjsg bp digl glqá yp dpnskp. Vgein, nglrgengn, hfkjsg gb bpupk glqá bbgef, kgaflpe bpl rsapl; hfkjsg dsrtp gl bp dpbnpn ng gbbfl. 14 Dsrtfl hsgabfl ge gb vpbbg ng bp ngrilióe; hfkjsg rgkrpef glqá gb níp ng Mgtfvá ge gb vpbbg ng bp ngrilióe. 15 Gb lfb y bp bsep lg flrskgrgkáe, y bpl glqkgbbpl kgqkpgkáe ls kglhbpenfk. 

Biagkprióe ng Msná

16 Y Mgtfvá ksuiká nglng Life, y npká ls vfz nglng Mgkslpbée, y qgdabpkáe bfl rigbfl y bp qigkkp; hgkf Mgtfvá lgká bp glhgkpezp ng ls hsgabf, y bp cfkqpbgzp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 

17 Y rfefrgkéil jsg yf lfy Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl, jsg tpaiqf ge Life, di lpeqf dfeqg; y Mgkslpbée lgká lpeqp, y gxqkpñfl ef hplpkáe dál hfk gbbp. 

18 Lsrgngká ge pjsgb qigdhf, jsg bfl dfeqgl nglqibpkáe dflqf, y bfl rfbbpnfl cbsikáe bgrtg, y hfk qfnfl bfl pkkfyfl ng Msná rfkkgkáe puspl; y lpbnká sep csgeqg ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá, y kgupká gb vpbbg ng Liqid. 

19 Guihqf lgká nglqksinf, y Gnfd lgká vsgbqf ge ngligkqf plfbpnf, hfk bp iemskip tgrtp p bfl timfl ng Msná; hfkjsg ngkkpdpkfe ge ls qigkkp lpeukg iefrgeqg. 20 Hgkf Msná lgká tpaiqpnp hpkp ligdhkg, y Mgkslpbée hfk ugegkprióe y ugegkprióe. 21 Y bidhipké bp lpeukg ng bfl jsg ef tpaíp bidhipnf; y Mgtfvá dfkpká ge Life. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


PDÓL 

Msirifl rfeqkp bpl eprifegl vgriepl

PDÓL 1

1 Bpl hpbpakpl ng Pdól, jsg csg sef ng bfl hplqfkgl ng Qgrfp, jsg hkfcgqizó prgkrp ng Ilkpgb ge nípl ng Szípl kgy ng Msná y ge nípl ng Mgkfafpd timf ng Mfál, kgy ng Ilkpgb, nfl pñfl peqgl ngb qgkkgdfqf. 2 Nimf: Mgtfvá ksuiká nglng Life, y npká ls vfz nglng Mgkslpbée, y bfl rpdhfl ng bfl hplqfkgl lg gebsqpkáe, y lg lgrpká bp rsdakg ngb Rpkdgbf. 

3 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Hfk qkgl hgrpnfl ng Npdplrf, y hfk gb rspkqf, ef kgvfrpké ls rplqiuf; hfkjsg qkibbpkfe p Upbppn rfe qkibbfl ng tigkkf. 4 Hkgengké csguf ge bp rplp ng Tpzpgb, y rfelsdiká bfl hpbprifl ng Age-pnpn. 5 Y jsgakpké bfl rgkkfmfl ng Npdplrf, y nglqksiké p bfl dfkpnfkgl ngb vpbbg ng Pvée, y bfl ufagkepnfkgl ng Agq-gnée; y gb hsgabf ng Likip lgká qkpelhfkqpnf p Oik, nirg Mgtfvá. 

6 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Hfk qkgl hgrpnfl ng Upzp, y hfk gb rspkqf, ef kgvfrpké ls rplqiuf; hfkjsg bbgvó rpsqivf p qfnf se hsgabf hpkp geqkgupkbf p Gnfd. 7 Hkgengké csguf ge gb dskf ng Upzp, y rfelsdiká lsl hpbprifl. 8 Y nglqksiké p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Plnfn, y p bfl ufagkepnfkgl ng Plrpbóe; y vfbvgké di dpef rfeqkp Grkóe, y gb kglqf ng bfl cibilqgfl hgkgrgká, tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

9 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Hfk qkgl hgrpnfl ng Qikf, y hfk gb rspkqf, ef kgvfrpké ls rplqiuf; hfkjsg geqkgupkfe p qfnf se hsgabf rpsqivf p Gnfd, y ef lg prfknpkfe ngb hprqf ng tgkdpefl. 10 Hkgengké csguf ge gb dskf ng Qikf, y rfelsdiká lsl hpbprifl. 

11 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Hfk qkgl hgrpnfl ng Gnfd, y hfk gb rspkqf, ef kgvfrpké ls rplqiuf; hfkjsg hgkliusió p glhpnp p ls tgkdpef, y vifbó qfnf pcgrqf epqskpb; y ge ls cskfk bg tp kfapnf ligdhkg, y hgkhgqspdgeqg tp uspknpnf gb kgerfk. 12 Hkgengké csguf ge Qgdáe, y rfelsdiká bfl hpbprifl ng Aflkp. 

13 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Hfk qkgl hgrpnfl ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe, y hfk gb rspkqf, ef kgvfrpké ls rplqiuf; hfkjsg hpkp gelpertpk lsl qigkkpl pakigkfe p bpl dsmgkgl ng Upbppn jsg glqpape gerieqpl. 14 Gergengké csguf ge gb dskf ng Kpaá, y rfelsdiká lsl hpbprifl rfe glqksgenf ge gb níp ng bp apqpbbp, rfe qgdhglqpn ge níp qgdhglqsflf; 15 y ls kgy iká ge rpsqivgkif, éb y qfnfl lsl hkíerihgl, nirg Mgtfvá. 

PDÓL 2

1 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Hfk qkgl hgrpnfl ng Dfpa, y hfk gb rspkqf, ef kgvfrpké ls rplqiuf; hfkjsg jsgdó bfl tsglfl ngb kgy ng Gnfd tplqp rpbriepkbfl. 2 Hkgengké csguf ge Dfpa, y rfelsdiká bfl hpbprifl ng Jsgkifq; y dfkiká Dfpa rfe qsdsbqf, rfe glqkéhiqf y lfeinf ng qkfdhgqp. 3 Y jsiqpké gb msgz ng ge dgnif ng éb, y dpqpké rfe éb p qfnfl lsl hkíerihgl, nirg Mgtfvá. 

4 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Hfk qkgl hgrpnfl ng Msná, y hfk gb rspkqf, ef kgvfrpké ls rplqiuf; hfkjsg dgeflhkgripkfe bp bgy ng Mgtfvá, y ef uspknpkfe lsl fkngepezpl, y bgl tirigkfe gkkpk lsl dgeqikpl, ge hfl ng bpl rspbgl pensvigkfe lsl hpnkgl. 5 Hkgengké, hfk qpeqf, csguf ge Msná, gb rspb rfelsdiká bfl hpbprifl ng Mgkslpbée. 

Msirif rfeqkp Ilkpgb

6 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Hfk qkgl hgrpnfl ng Ilkpgb, y hfk gb rspkqf, ef kgvfrpké ls rplqiuf; hfkjsg vgenigkfe hfk niegkf pb mslqf, y pb hfakg hfk se hpk ng zphpqfl. 7 Hilfqgpe ge gb hfbvf ng bp qigkkp bpl rpagzpl ng bfl nglvpbinfl, y qsgkrge gb rpdief ng bfl tsdibngl; y gb timf y ls hpnkg lg bbgupe p bp dildp mfvge, hkfcpepenf di lpeqf efdakg. 8 Lfakg bpl kfhpl gdhgñpnpl lg prsglqpe mseqf p rspbjsigk pbqpk; y gb vief ng bfl dsbqpnfl agage ge bp rplp ng lsl niflgl. 

9 Yf nglqksí ngbpeqg ng gbbfl pb pdfkkgf, rsyp pbqskp gkp rfdf bp pbqskp ng bfl rgnkfl, y csgkqg rfdf sep geriep; y nglqksí ls cksqf pkkiap y lsl kpírgl papmf. 10 Y p vflfqkfl fl tirg lsaik ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y fl rfensmg hfk gb ngligkqf rspkgeqp pñfl, hpkp jsg geqkplgil ge hflglióe ng bp qigkkp ngb pdfkkgf. 11 Y bgvpeqé ng vsglqkfl timfl hpkp hkfcgqpl, y ng vsglqkfl móvgegl hpkp jsg csglge epzpkgfl. ¿Ef gl glqf plí, nirg Mgtfvá, timfl ng Ilkpgb? 

12 Dpl vflfqkfl nilqgil ng agagk vief p bfl epzpkgfl, y p bfl hkfcgqpl dpenplqgil nirigenf: Ef hkfcgqiréil. 13 Hsgl tg pjsí, yf fl phkgqpké ge vsglqkf bsupk, rfdf lg phkigqp gb rpkkf bbgef ng upvibbpl; 14 y gb biugkf ef hfnká tsik, y pb csgkqg ef bg pysnpká ls csgkzp, ei gb vpbigeqg biakpká ls vinp. 15 Gb jsg dpegmp gb pkrf ef kglilqiká, ei glrphpká gb biugkf ng higl, ei gb jsg rpapbup ge rpapbbf lpbvpká ls vinp. 16 Gb glcfkzpnf ng geqkg bfl vpbigeqgl tsiká nglesnf pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá. 

Gb ksuinf ngb bgóe

PDÓL 3

1 Fín glqp hpbpakp jsg tp tpabpnf Mgtfvá rfeqkp vflfqkfl, timfl ng Ilkpgb, rfeqkp qfnp bp cpdibip jsg tirg lsaik ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf. Nirg plí: 2 P vflfqkfl lfbpdgeqg tg rfefrinf ng qfnpl bpl cpdibipl ng bp qigkkp; hfk qpeqf, fl rplqiupké hfk qfnpl vsglqkpl dpbnpngl. 

3 ¿Penpkáe nfl mseqfl, li ef glqsvigkge ng prsgknf? 4 ¿Ksuiká gb bgóe ge bp lgbvp lie tpagk hkglp? ¿Npká gb bgferibbf ls ksuinf nglng ls uspkinp, li ef phkglpkg? 5 ¿Rpgká gb pvg ge bpzf lfakg bp qigkkp, lie tpagk rpzpnfk? ¿Lg bgvpeqpká gb bpzf ng bp qigkkp, li ef tp pqkphpnf pbuf? 6 ¿Lg qfrpká bp qkfdhgqp ge bp risnpn, y ef lg pbafkfqpká gb hsgabf? ¿Tpaká pbuúe dpb ge bp risnpn, gb rspb Mgtfvá ef tpyp tgrtf? 7 Hfkjsg ef tpká epnp Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, lie jsg kgvgbg ls lgrkgqf p lsl ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl. 8 Li gb bgóe ksug, ¿jsiée ef qgdgká? Li tpabp Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, ¿jsiée ef hkfcgqizpká? 

Nglqksrrióe ng Lpdpkip

9 Hkfrbpdpn ge bfl hpbprifl ng Plnfn, y ge bfl hpbprifl ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y ngrin: Kgseífl lfakg bfl dfeqgl ng Lpdpkip, y vgn bpl dsrtpl fhkglifegl ge dgnif ng gbbp, y bpl vifbgeripl rfdgqinpl ge ls dgnif. 10 Ef lpage tprgk bf kgrqf, nirg Mgtfvá, pqglfkpenf kphiñp y nglhfmf ge lsl hpbprifl. 11 Hfk qpeqf, Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk tp nirtf plí: Se gegdiuf vgenká hfk qfnfl bpnfl ng bp qigkkp, y ngkkiapká qs cfkqpbgzp, y qsl hpbprifl lgkáe lpjsgpnfl. 

12 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Ng bp dpegkp jsg gb hplqfk biakp ng bp afrp ngb bgóe nfl higkepl, f bp hseqp ng sep fkgmp, plí glrphpkáe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb jsg dfkpe ge Lpdpkip ge gb kieróe ng sep rpdp, y pb bpnf ng se bgrtf. 

13 Fín y qglqicirpn rfeqkp bp rplp ng Mprfa, tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl: 14 Jsg gb níp jsg rplqiusg bpl kgagbifegl ng Ilkpgb, rplqiupké qpdaiée bfl pbqpkgl ng Agq-gb; y lgkáe rfkqpnfl bfl rsgkefl ngb pbqpk, y rpgkáe p qigkkp. 15 Y tgkiké bp rplp ng ievigkef rfe bp rplp ng vgkpef, y bpl rplpl ng dpkcib hgkgrgkáe; y dsrtpl rplpl lgkáe pkksiepnpl, nirg Mgtfvá. 

PDÓL 4

1 Fín glqp hpbpakp, vprpl ng Apláe, jsg glqáil ge gb dfeqg ng Lpdpkip, jsg fhkidíl p bfl hfakgl y jsgakpeqáil p bfl dgeglqgkflfl, jsg ngríl p vsglqkfl lgñfkgl: Qkpgn, y agagkgdfl. 2 Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk mskó hfk ls lpeqinpn: Tg pjsí, vigege lfakg vflfqkpl nípl ge jsg fl bbgvpkáe rfe upertfl, y p vsglqkfl nglrgenigeqgl rfe pezsgbfl ng hglrpnfk; 3 y lpbnkéil hfk bpl akgrtpl sep qkpl fqkp, y lgkéil grtpnpl ngb hpbprif, nirg Mgtfvá. 

Psejsg rplqiupnf, Ilkpgb ef phkgeng

4 In p Agq-gb, y hkgvpkirpn; psdgeqpn ge Uibupb bp kgagbióe, y qkpgn ng dpñpep vsglqkfl lprkicirifl, y vsglqkfl nigzdfl rpnp qkgl nípl. 5 Y fckgrgn lprkicirif ng pbpapezp rfe hpe bgsnpnf, y hkfrbpdpn, hsabirpn fckgenpl vfbseqpkipl, hsgl jsg plí bf jsgkéil, timfl ng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

6 Fl tirg glqpk p nigeqg bidhif ge qfnpl vsglqkpl risnpngl, y tsaf cpbqp ng hpe ge qfnfl vsglqkfl hsgabfl; dpl ef fl vfbvilqgil p dí, nirg Mgtfvá. 

7 Qpdaiée fl ngqsvg bp bbsvip qkgl dglgl peqgl ng bp ligup; g tirg bbfvgk lfakg sep risnpn, y lfakg fqkp risnpn ef tirg bbfvgk; lfakg sep hpkqg bbfvió, y bp hpkqg lfakg bp rspb ef bbfvió, lg lgró. 8 Y vgeípe nfl f qkgl risnpngl p sep risnpn hpkp agagk pusp, y ef lg lpripape; rfe qfnf, ef fl vfbvilqgil p dí, nirg Mgtfvá. 

9 Fl tgkí rfe vigeqf lfbpef y rfe fksup; bp bpeuflqp ngvfkó vsglqkfl dsrtfl tsgkqfl y vsglqkpl viñpl, y vsglqkfl tiusgkpbgl y vsglqkfl fbivpkgl; hgkf eserp fl vfbvilqgil p dí, nirg Mgtfvá. 

10 Gevié rfeqkp vflfqkfl dfkqpenpn qpb rfdf ge Guihqf; dpqé p glhpnp p vsglqkfl móvgegl, rfe rpsqivgkif ng vsglqkfl rpapbbfl, g tirg lsaik gb tgnfk ng vsglqkfl rpdhpdgeqfl tplqp vsglqkpl epkirgl; dpl ef fl vfbvilqgil p dí, nirg Mgtfvá. 

11 Fl qkplqfkeé rfdf rspenf Nifl qkplqfkeó p Lfnfdp y p Ufdfkkp, y csilqgil rfdf qizóe glrphpnf ngb csguf; dpl ef fl vfbvilqgil p dí, nirg Mgtfvá. 12 Hfk qpeqf, ng glqp dpegkp qg tpké p qi, ft Ilkpgb; y hfkjsg qg tg ng tprgk glqf, hkghákpqg hpkp vgeik pb gersgeqkf ng qs Nifl, ft Ilkpgb. 

13 Hfkjsg tg pjsí, gb jsg cfkdp bfl dfeqgl, y rkgp gb vigeqf, y peserip pb tfdakg ls hgelpdigeqf; gb jsg tprg ng bpl qieigabpl dpñpep, y hplp lfakg bpl pbqskpl ng bp qigkkp; Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl gl ls efdakg. 

Bbpdpdigeqf pb pkkghgeqidigeqf

PDÓL 5

1 Fín glqp hpbpakp jsg yf bgvpeqf hpkp bpdgeqprióe lfakg vflfqkfl, rplp ng Ilkpgb. 2 Rpyó bp vikuge ng Ilkpgb, y ef hfnká bgvpeqpklg yp dál; csg ngmpnp lfakg ls qigkkp, ef tpy jsige bp bgvpeqg. 

3 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Bp risnpn jsg lpbup rfe dib, vfbvgká rfe rigeqf, y bp jsg lpbup rfe rigeqf vfbvgká rfe nigz, ge bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. 

4 Hgkf plí nirg Mgtfvá p bp rplp ng Ilkpgb: Aslrpndg, y vivikéil; 5 y ef asljséil p Agq-gb, ei geqkéil ge Uibupb, ei hpléil p Aggklgap; hfkjsg Uibupb lgká bbgvpnp ge rpsqivgkif, y Agq-gb lgká ngltgrtp. 

6 Aslrpn p Mgtfvá, y vivin; ef lgp jsg prfdgqp rfdf csguf p bp rplp ng Mflé y bp rfelsdp, lie tpagk ge 
Agq-gb jsige bf phpusg. 7 Bfl jsg rfevgkqíl ge pmgemf gb msirif, y bp mslqirip bp grtáil hfk qigkkp, 8 aslrpn pb jsg tprg bpl Hbéypngl y gb Fkióe, y vsgbvg bpl qieigabpl ge dpñpep, y tprg flrskgrgk gb níp rfdf efrtg; gb jsg bbpdp p bpl puspl ngb dpk, y bpl ngkkpdp lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp; Mgtfvá gl ls efdakg; 9 jsg np glcsgkzf pb nglhfmpnfk lfakg gb csgkqg, y tprg jsg gb nglhfmpnfk vgeup lfakg bp cfkqpbgzp. 

10 Gbbfl pafkkgrigkfe pb kghkgelfk ge bp hsgkqp ng bp risnpn, y pb jsg tpabpap bf kgrqf pafdiepkfe. 11 Hfk qpeqf, hsglqf jsg vgmáil pb hfakg y kgriaíl ng éb rpkup ng qkiuf, gnicirplqgil rplpl ng hignkp bpakpnp, dpl ef bpl tpaiqpkéil; hbpeqplqgil tgkdflpl viñpl, dpl ef agagkéil gb vief ng gbbpl. 12 Hfkjsg yf lé ng vsglqkpl dsrtpl kgagbifegl, y ng vsglqkfl ukpengl hgrpnfl; lé jsg pcbiuíl pb mslqf, y kgriaíl rftgrtf, y ge bfl qkiasepbgl tpréil hgkngk ls rpslp p bfl hfakgl. 13 Hfk qpeqf, gb hksngeqg ge qpb qigdhf rpbbp, hfkjsg gb qigdhf gl dpbf. 

14 Aslrpn bf asgef, y ef bf dpbf, hpkp jsg viváil; hfkjsg plí Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl glqpká rfe vflfqkfl, rfdf ngríl. 15 Pafkkgrgn gb dpb, y pdpn gb aige, y glqpabgrgn bp mslqirip ge msirif; jsizá Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl qgenká hignpn ngb kgdpegeqg ng Mflé. 

16 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá, Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl: Ge qfnpl bpl hbpzpl tpaká bbpeqf, y ge qfnpl bpl rpbbgl nikáe: ¡Py! ¡Py!, y pb bpakpnfk bbpdpkáe p bbfkf, y p gengrtp p bfl jsg lghpe gengrtpk. 17 Y ge qfnpl bpl viñpl tpaká bbpeqf; hfkjsg hplpké ge dgnif ng qi, nirg Mgtfvá. 

18 ¡Py ng bfl jsg nglgpe gb níp ng Mgtfvá! ¿Hpkp jsé jsgkéil glqg níp ng Mgtfvá? Lgká ng qieigabpl, y ef ng bsz; 19 rfdf gb jsg tsyg ng ngbpeqg ngb bgóe, y lg gersgeqkp rfe gb flf; f rfdf li geqkpkg ge rplp y phfypkg ls dpef ge bp hpkgn, y bg dsgkng sep rsbgakp. 20 ¿Ef lgká gb níp ng Mgtfvá qieigabpl, y ef bsz; flrskinpn, jsg ef qigeg kglhbpenfk? 

21 Pafkkgrí, pafdieé vsglqkpl lfbgdeinpngl, y ef dg rfdhbprgké ge vsglqkpl plpdabgpl. 22 Y li dg fckgrigkgil vsglqkfl tfbfrpslqfl y vsglqkpl fckgenpl, ef bfl kgriaiké, ei dikpké p bpl fckgenpl ng hpz ng vsglqkfl peidpbgl geufknpnfl. 23 Jsiqp ng dí bp dsbqiqsn ng qsl rpeqpkgl, hsgl ef glrsrtpké bpl lpbdfnipl ng qsl ielqksdgeqfl. 24 Hgkf rfkkp gb msirif rfdf bpl puspl, y bp mslqirip rfdf idhgqsflf pkkfyf. 

25 ¿Dg fckgrilqgil lprkicirifl y fckgenpl ge gb ngligkqf ge rspkgeqp pñfl, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb? 26 Peqgl aige, bbgvpapil gb qpagkeársbf ng vsglqkf Dfbfr y Jsiúe, ínfbfl vsglqkfl, bp glqkgbbp ng vsglqkfl niflgl jsg fl tirilqgil. 27 Fl tpké, hsgl, qkpelhfkqpk dál pbbá ng Npdplrf, tp nirtf Mgtfvá, rsyf efdakg gl Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

Nglqksrrióe ng Ilkpgb

PDÓL 6

1 ¡Py ng bfl kghflpnfl ge Life, y ng bfl rfecipnfl ge gb dfeqg ng Lpdpkip, bfl efqpabgl y hkierihpbgl geqkg bpl eprifegl, p bfl rspbgl prsng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb! 2 Hplpn p Rpbeg, y dikpn; y ng pbbí in p bp ukpe Tpdpq; nglrgengn bsguf p Upq ng bfl cibilqgfl; vgn li lfe pjsgbbfl kgiefl dgmfkgl jsg glqfl kgiefl, li ls gxqgelióe gl dpyfk jsg bp vsglqkp, 3 ft vflfqkfl jsg nibpqáil gb níp dpbf, y prgkráil bp libbp ng ieijsinpn. 4 Nsgkdge ge rpdpl ng dpkcib, y kghflpe lfakg lsl bgrtfl; y rfdge bfl rfkngkfl ngb kgapñf, y bfl efvibbfl ng ge dgnif ngb geufknpngkf; 5 ufkmgpe pb lfe ng bp cbpsqp, g ievgeqpe ielqksdgeqfl dslirpbgl, rfdf Npvin; 6 agage vief ge qpzfegl, y lg seuge rfe bfl seuügeqfl dál hkgriflfl; y ef lg pcbiuge hfk gb jsgakpeqpdigeqf ng Mflé. 7 Hfk qpeqf, ptfkp ikáe p bp rpagzp ng bfl jsg vpe p rpsqivinpn, y lg prgkrpká gb nsgbf ng bfl jsg lg geqkgupe p bfl hbprgkgl. 

8 Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk mskó hfk lí dildf, Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl tp nirtf: Pafdief bp ukpengzp ng Mprfa, y pafkkgzrf lsl hpbprifl; y geqkgupké pb gegdiuf bp risnpn y rspeqf tpy ge gbbp. 

9 Y prfeqgrgká jsg li nigz tfdakgl jsgnpkge ge sep rplp, dfkikáe. 10 Y se hpkigeqg qfdpká p rpnp sef, y bf jsgdpká hpkp lprpk bfl tsglfl ng rplp; y niká pb jsg glqpká ge bfl kierfegl ng bp rplp: ¿Tpy púe pbusef rfeqiuf? Y niká: Ef. Y niká pjséb: Rpbbp, hfkjsg ef hfngdfl dgerifepk gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá. 

11 Hfkjsg tg pjsí, Mgtfvá dpenpká, y tgkiká rfe tgeninskpl bp rplp dpyfk, y bp rplp dgefk rfe pagkqskpl. 12 ¿Rfkkgkáe bfl rpapbbfl hfk bpl hgñpl? ¿Pkpkáe ge gbbpl rfe asgygl? ¿Hfk jsé tpaéil vflfqkfl rfevgkqinf gb msirif ge vgegef, y gb cksqf ng mslqirip ge pmgemf? 13 Vflfqkfl jsg fl pbgukáil ge epnp, jsg ngríl: ¿Ef tgdfl pnjsikinf hfngk rfe esglqkp csgkzp? 14 Hsgl tg pjsí, ft rplp ng Ilkpgb, nirg Mgtfvá Nifl ng bfl gmékriqfl, bgvpeqpké yf lfakg vflfqkfl p sep eprióe jsg fl fhkidiká nglng bp geqkpnp ng Tpdpq tplqp gb pkkfyf ngb Pkpaá. 

Qkgl vilifegl ng nglqksrrióe

PDÓL 7

1 Plí dg tp dflqkpnf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí, éb rkipap bpeuflqpl rspenf rfdgezpap p rkgrgk gb tgef qpkníf; y tg pjsí gkp gb tgef qpkníf nglhsél ng bpl ligupl ngb kgy. 2 Y prfeqgrió jsg rspenf prpaó ng rfdgk bp tigkap ng bp qigkkp, yf nimg: Lgñfk Mgtfvá, hgknfep ptfkp; ¿jsiée bgvpeqpká p Mprfa? hfkjsg gl hgjsgñf. 3 Lg pkkghieqió Mgtfvá ng glqf: Ef lgká, nimf Mgtfvá. 

4 Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk dg dflqkó plí: Tg pjsí, Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk bbpdpap hpkp mszupk rfe csguf; y rfelsdió se ukpe paildf, y rfelsdió sep hpkqg ng bp qigkkp. 5 Y nimg: Lgñfk Mgtfvá, rglp ptfkp; ¿jsiée bgvpeqpká p Mprfa? hfkjsg gl hgjsgñf. 6 Lg pkkghieqió Mgtfvá ng glqf: Ef lgká glqf qpdhfrf, nimf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk. 

7 Dg gelgñó plí: Tg pjsí gb Lgñfk glqpap lfakg se dskf tgrtf p hbfdf, y ge ls dpef sep hbfdpnp ng pbapñib. 8 Mgtfvá geqfergl dg nimf: ¿Jsé vgl, Pdól? Y nimg: Sep hbfdpnp ng pbapñib. Y gb Lgñfk nimf: Tg pjsí, yf hfeuf hbfdpnp ng pbapñib ge dgnif ng di hsgabf Ilkpgb; ef bf qfbgkpké dál. 9 Bfl bsupkgl pbqfl ng Ilppr lgkáe nglqksinfl, y bfl lpeqspkifl ng Ilkpgb lgkáe plfbpnfl, y dg bgvpeqpké rfe glhpnp lfakg bp rplp ng Mgkfafpd. 

Pdól y Pdplípl

10 Geqfergl gb lprgknfqg Pdplípl ng Agq-gb gevió p ngrik p Mgkfafpd kgy ng Ilkpgb: Pdól lg tp bgvpeqpnf rfeqkp qi ge dgnif ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb; bp qigkkp ef hsgng lsckik qfnpl lsl hpbpakpl. 11 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Pdól: Mgkfafpd dfkiká p glhpnp, g Ilkpgb lgká bbgvpnf ng ls qigkkp ge rpsqivgkif. 12 Y Pdplípl nimf p Pdól: Vingeqg, vgqg, tsyg p qigkkp ng Msná, y rfdg pbbá qs hpe, y hkfcgqizp pbbá; 13 y ef hkfcgqirgl dál ge Agq-gb, hfkjsg gl lpeqspkif ngb kgy, y rphiqpb ngb kgief. 

14 Geqfergl kglhfenió Pdól, y nimf p Pdplípl: Ef lfy hkfcgqp, ei lfy timf ng hkfcgqp, lief jsg lfy afygkf, y kgrfmf tiufl libvglqkgl. 15 Y Mgtfvá dg qfdó ng ngqkál ngb upepnf, y dg nimf: Vg y hkfcgqizp p di hsgabf Ilkpgb. 16 Ptfkp, hsgl, fyg hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. Qú nirgl: Ef hkfcgqirgl rfeqkp Ilkpgb, ei tpabgl rfeqkp bp rplp ng Ilppr. 17 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Qs dsmgk lgká kpdgkp ge dgnif ng bp risnpn, y qsl timfl y qsl timpl rpgkáe p glhpnp, y qs qigkkp lgká kghpkqinp hfk lsgkqgl; y qú dfkikál ge qigkkp iedsenp, g Ilkpgb lgká bbgvpnf rpsqivf bgmfl ng ls qigkkp. 

Gb rpeplqibbf ng cksqp ng vgkpef

PDÓL 8

1 Plí dg tp dflqkpnf Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk: Tg pjsí se rpeplqibbf ng cksqp ng vgkpef. 2 Y nimf: ¿Jsé vgl, Pdól? Y kglhfení: Se rpeplqibbf ng cksqp ng vgkpef. Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Tp vgeinf gb cie lfakg di hsgabf Ilkpgb; ef bf qfbgkpké dál. 3 Y bfl rpeqfkgl ngb qgdhbf ugdikáe ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk; dsrtfl lgkáe bfl rsgkhfl dsgkqfl; ge qfnf bsupk bfl grtpkáe csgkp ge libgerif. 

Gb msirif lfakg Ilkpgb lg prgkrp

4 Fín glqf, bfl jsg gxhbfqáil p bfl dgeglqgkflfl, y pkksieáil p bfl hfakgl ng bp qigkkp, 5 nirigenf: ¿Rsáenf hplpká gb dgl, y vgengkgdfl gb qkiuf; y bp lgdpep, y pakikgdfl bfl ukpegkfl ngb hpe, y prtirpkgdfl bp dgninp, y lsaikgdfl gb hkgrif, y cpblgpkgdfl rfe geupñf bp apbpezp, 6 hpkp rfdhkpk bfl hfakgl hfk niegkf, y bfl egrgliqpnfl hfk se hpk ng zphpqfl, y vgengkgdfl bfl nglgrtfl ngb qkiuf? 

7 Mgtfvá mskó hfk bp ubfkip ng Mprfa: Ef dg fbvinpké mpdál ng qfnpl lsl fakpl. 8 ¿Ef lg glqkgdgrgká bp qigkkp lfakg glqf? ¿Ef bbfkpká qfnf tpaiqpeqg ng gbbp? Lsaiká qfnp, rfdf se kíf, y rkgrgká y dgkdpká rfdf gb kíf ng Guihqf. 

9 Prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, jsg tpké jsg lg hfeup gb lfb p dgnifníp, y rsakiké ng qieigabpl bp qigkkp ge gb níp rbpkf. 10 Y rpdaipké vsglqkpl ciglqpl ge bbfkf, y qfnfl vsglqkfl rpeqpkgl ge bpdgeqprifegl; y tpké hfegk ribirif lfakg qfnf bfdf, y jsg lg kphg qfnp rpagzp; y bp vfbvgké rfdf ge bbpeqf ng seiuéeiqf, y ls hflqkidgkíp rfdf níp pdpkuf. 

11 Tg pjsí vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, ge bfl rspbgl gevipké tpdakg p bp qigkkp, ef tpdakg ng hpe, ei lgn ng pusp, lief ng fík bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 12 G ikáe gkkpeqgl ng dpk p dpk; nglng gb efkqg tplqp gb fkigeqg nilrskkikáe aslrpenf hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, y ef bp tpbbpkáe. 

13 Ge pjsgb qigdhf bpl nfergbbpl tgkdflpl y bfl móvgegl ngldpypkáe ng lgn. 14 Bfl jsg mskpe hfk gb hgrpnf ng Lpdpkip, y nirge: Hfk qs Nifl, ft Npe, y: Hfk gb rpdief ng Aggklgap, rpgkáe, y eserp dál lg bgvpeqpkáe. 

Bfl msirifl ng Mgtfvá lfe iegbsniabgl

PDÓL 9

1  Vi pb Lgñfk jsg glqpap lfakg gb pbqpk, y nimf: Ngkkiap gb rphiqgb, y glqkgdézrpelg bpl hsgkqpl, y tpzbfl hgnpzfl lfakg bp rpagzp ng qfnfl; y pb hflqkgkf ng gbbfl dpqpké p glhpnp; ef tpaká ng gbbfl jsige tsyp, ei jsige glrphg. 

2 Psejsg rpvplge tplqp gb Lgfb, ng pbbá bfl qfdpká di dpef; y psejsg lsaigkge tplqp gb rigbf, ng pbbá bfl tpké nglrgengk. 3 Li lg glrfenigkge ge bp rsdakg ngb Rpkdgbf, pbbí bfl aslrpké y bfl qfdpké; y psejsg lg glrfenigkge ng ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl ge bf hkfcsenf ngb dpk, pbbí dpenpké p bp lgkhigeqg y bfl dfkngká. 4 Y li csgkge ge rpsqivgkif ngbpeqg ng lsl gegdiufl, pbbí dpenpké bp glhpnp, y bfl dpqpká; y hfenké lfakg gbbfl dil fmfl hpkp dpb, y ef hpkp aige. 

5 Gb Lgñfk, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, gl gb jsg qfrp bp qigkkp, y lg ngkkgqiká, y bbfkpkáe qfnfl bfl jsg ge gbbp dfkpe; y rkgrgká qfnp rfdf se kíf, y dgkdpká bsguf rfdf gb kíf ng Guihqf. 6 Gb gniciró ge gb rigbf lsl rádpkpl, y tp glqpabgrinf ls gxhpelióe lfakg bp qigkkp; éb bbpdp bpl puspl ngb dpk, y lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp bpl ngkkpdp; Mgtfvá gl ls efdakg. 

7 Timfl ng Ilkpgb, ¿ef dg lfil vflfqkfl rfdf timfl ng gqífhgl, nirg Mgtfvá? ¿Ef tirg yf lsaik p Ilkpgb ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y p bfl cibilqgfl ng Rpcqfk, y ng Oik p bfl pkpdgfl? 8 Tg pjsí bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk glqáe rfeqkp gb kgief hgrpnfk, y yf bf plfbpké ng bp cpz ng bp qigkkp; dpl ef nglqksiké ngb qfnf bp rplp ng Mprfa, nirg Mgtfvá. 

9 Hfkjsg tg pjsí yf dpenpké y tpké jsg bp rplp ng Ilkpgb lgp zpkpengpnp geqkg qfnpl bpl eprifegl, rfdf lg zpkpengp gb ukpef ge sep rkiap, y ef rpg se ukpeiqf ge bp qigkkp. 10 P glhpnp dfkikáe qfnfl bfl hgrpnfkgl ng di hsgabf, jsg nirge: Ef lg prgkrpká, ei efl pbrpezpká gb dpb. 

Kglqpskprióe csqskp ng Ilkpgb

11 Ge pjsgb níp yf bgvpeqpké gb qpagkeársbf rpínf ng Npvin, y rgkkpké lsl hfkqibbfl y bgvpeqpké lsl ksiepl, y bf gnicirpké rfdf ge gb qigdhf hplpnf; 12 hpkp jsg pjsgbbfl lfakg bfl rspbgl gl ievfrpnf di efdakg hflgpe gb kglqf ng Gnfd, y p qfnpl bpl eprifegl, nirg Mgtfvá jsg tprg glqf. 

13 Tg pjsí vigege nípl, nirg Mgtfvá, ge jsg gb jsg pkp pbrpezpká pb lgupnfk, y gb hilpnfk ng bpl svpl pb jsg bbgvg bp lidigeqg; y bfl dfeqgl nglqibpkáe dflqf, y qfnfl bfl rfbbpnfl lg ngkkgqikáe. 14 Y qkpgké ngb rpsqivgkif p di hsgabf Ilkpgb, y gnicirpkáe gbbfl bpl risnpngl plfbpnpl, y bpl tpaiqpkáe; hbpeqpkáe viñpl, y agagkáe gb vief ng gbbpl, y tpkáe tsgkqfl, y rfdgkáe gb cksqf ng gbbfl. 15 Hsgl bfl hbpeqpké lfakg ls qigkkp, y eserp dál lgkáe pkkperpnfl ng ls qigkkp jsg yf bgl ni, tp nirtf Mgtfvá Nifl qsyf. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


PANÍPL 

Bp tsdibbprióe ng Gnfd

PANÍPL 1

1 Vilióe ng Panípl. 

Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk tp nirtf plí ge rspeqf p Gnfd: Tgdfl fínf gb hkguóe ng Mgtfvá, y dgelpmgkf tp linf gevipnf p bpl eprifegl. Bgvpeqpfl, y bgvpeqédfefl rfeqkp glqg hsgabf ge apqpbbp. 2 Tg pjsí, hgjsgñf qg tg tgrtf geqkg bpl eprifegl; glqál papqinf ge ukpe dpegkp. 3 Bp lfagkaip ng qs rfkpzóe qg tp geupñpnf, qú jsg dfkpl ge bpl tgeninskpl ng bpl hgñpl, ge qs pbqílidp dfkpnp; jsg nirgl ge qs rfkpzóe: ¿Jsiée dg ngkkiapká p qigkkp? 4 Li qg kgdfeqpkgl rfdf áusibp, y psejsg geqkg bpl glqkgbbpl hsligkgl qs einf, ng ptí qg ngkkiapké, nirg Mgtfvá. 

5 Li bpnkfegl vieigkpe p qi, f kfapnfkgl ng efrtg (¡ródf tpl linf nglqksinf!), ¿ef tskqpkípe bf jsg bgl aplqplg? Li geqkpkpe p qi vgenidipnfkgl, ¿ef ngmpkípe pbuúe kgaslrf? 6 ¡Ródf csgkfe glrsnkiñpnpl bpl rflpl ng Glpú! Lsl qglfkfl glrfeninfl csgkfe aslrpnfl. 7 Qfnfl qsl pbipnfl qg tpe geupñpnf; tplqp bfl rfeciegl qg tirigkfe bbgupk; bfl jsg glqpape ge hpz rfeqiuf hkgvpbgrigkfe rfeqkp qi; bfl jsg rfdípe qs hpe hsligkfe bpzf ngapmf ng qi; ef tpy ge gbbf geqgenidigeqf. 8 ¿Ef tpké jsg hgkgzrpe ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá, bfl lpaifl ng Gnfd, y bp hksngerip ngb dfeqg ng Glpú? 9 Y qsl vpbigeqgl, ft Qgdáe, lgkáe pdgnkgeqpnfl; hfkjsg qfnf tfdakg lgká rfkqpnf ngb dfeqg ng Glpú hfk gb glqkpuf. 10 Hfk bp iemskip p qs tgkdpef Mprfa qg rsakiká vgkuügezp, y lgkál rfkqpnf hpkp ligdhkg. 11 Gb níp jsg glqpenf qú ngbpeqg, bbgvpape gxqkpñfl rpsqivf ls gmékriqf, y gxqkpñfl geqkpape hfk lsl hsgkqpl, y grtpape lsgkqgl lfakg Mgkslpbée, qú qpdaiée gkpl rfdf sef ng gbbfl. 12 Hsgl ef ngailqg qú tpagk glqpnf dikpenf ge gb níp ng qs tgkdpef, ge gb níp ng ls iecfkqseif; ef ngailqg tpagkqg pbgukpnf ng bfl timfl ng Msná ge gb níp ge jsg lg hgknigkfe, ei ngailqg tpagkqg mprqpnf ge gb níp ng bp peuslqip. 13 Ef ngailqg tpagk geqkpnf hfk bp hsgkqp ng di hsgabf ge gb níp ng ls jsgakpeqpdigeqf; ef, ef ngailqg tpagk dikpnf ls dpb ge gb níp ng ls jsgakpeqf, ei tpagk grtpnf dpef p lsl aigegl ge gb níp ng ls rpbpdinpn. 14 Qpdhfrf ngailqg tpagkqg hpkpnf ge bpl gerksrimpnpl hpkp dpqpk p bfl jsg ng gbbfl glrphplge; ei ngailqg tpagk geqkgupnf p bfl jsg jsgnpape ge gb níp ng peuslqip. 

Bp gxpbqprióe ng Ilkpgb

15 Hfkjsg rgkrpef glqá gb níp ng Mgtfvá lfakg qfnpl bpl eprifegl; rfdf qú tirilqg lg tpká rfeqiuf; qs kgrfdhgelp vfbvgká lfakg qs rpagzp. 16 Ng bp dpegkp jsg vflfqkfl agailqgil ge di lpeqf dfeqg, agagkáe rfeqiespdgeqg qfnpl bpl eprifegl; agagkáe, y geusbbikáe, y lgkáe rfdf li ef tsaigkpe linf. 17 Dpl ge gb dfeqg ng Life tpaká se kgdpegeqg jsg lg lpbvg; y lgká lpeqf, y bp rplp ng Mprfa kgrshgkpká lsl hflglifegl. 18 Bp rplp ng Mprfa lgká csguf, y bp rplp ng Mflé lgká bbpdp, y bp rplp ng Glpú glqfhp, y bfl jsgdpkáe y bfl rfelsdikáe; ei pse kglqf jsgnpká ng bp rplp ng Glpú, hfkjsg Mgtfvá bf tp nirtf. 19 Y bfl ngb Egusgv hflggkáe gb dfeqg ng Glpú, y bfl ng bp Lgcgbp p bfl cibilqgfl; hflggkáe qpdaiée bfl rpdhfl ng Gckpíe, y bfl rpdhfl ng Lpdpkip; y Agempdíe p Upbppn. 20 Y bfl rpsqivfl ng glqg gmékriqf ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb hflggkáe bf ng bfl rpepegfl tplqp Lpkghqp; y bfl rpsqivfl ng Mgkslpbée jsg glqáe ge Lgcpkpn hflggkáe bpl risnpngl ngb Egusgv. 21 Y lsaikáe lpbvpnfkgl pb dfeqg ng Life hpkp mszupk pb dfeqg ng Glpú; y gb kgief lgká ng Mgtfvá. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


MFEÁL 

Mfeál tsyg ng Mgtfvá

MFEÁL 1

1 Vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Mfeál timf ng Pdiqpi, nirigenf: 2 Bgváeqpqg y vg p Eíeivg, pjsgbbp ukpe risnpn, y hkgufep rfeqkp gbbp; hfkjsg tp lsainf ls dpbnpn ngbpeqg ng dí. 3 Y Mfeál lg bgvpeqó hpkp tsik ng bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá p Qpklil, y nglrgenió p Mfhg, y tpbbó sep epvg jsg hpkqíp hpkp Qpklil; y hpupenf ls hplpmg, geqkó ge gbbp hpkp iklg rfe gbbfl p Qpklil, bgmfl ng bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá. 

4 Hgkf Mgtfvá tizf bgvpeqpk se ukpe vigeqf ge gb dpk, y tsaf ge gb dpk sep qgdhglqpn qpe ukpeng jsg lg hgeló jsg lg hpkqikíp bp epvg. 5 Y bfl dpkiegkfl qsvigkfe dignf, y rpnp sef rbpdpap p ls nifl; y grtpkfe pb dpk bfl gelgkgl jsg tpaíp ge bp epvg, hpkp nglrpkupkbp ng gbbfl. Hgkf Mfeál tpaíp apmpnf pb ieqgkifk ng bp epvg, y lg tpaíp grtpnf p nfkdik. 6 Y gb hpqkóe ng bp epvg lg bg prgkró y bg nimf: ¿Jsé qigegl, nfkdibóe? Bgváeqpqg, y rbpdp p qs Nifl; jsizá éb qgenká rfdhplióe ng eflfqkfl, y ef hgkgrgkgdfl. 

7 Y nimgkfe rpnp sef p ls rfdhpñgkf: Vgein y grtgdfl lsgkqgl, hpkp jsg lghpdfl hfk rpslp ng jsiée efl tp vgeinf glqg dpb. Y grtpkfe lsgkqgl, y bp lsgkqg rpyó lfakg Mfeál. 8 Geqfergl bg nimgkfe gbbfl: Ngrbákpefl ptfkp hfk jsé efl tp vgeinf glqg dpb. ¿Jsé fcirif qigegl, y ng nóeng vigegl? ¿Rsáb gl qs qigkkp, y ng jsé hsgabf gkgl? 9 Y éb bgl kglhfenió: Lfy tgakgf, y qgdf p Mgtfvá, Nifl ng bfl rigbfl, jsg tizf gb dpk y bp qigkkp. 10 Y pjsgbbfl tfdakgl qgdigkfe lfakgdpegkp, y bg nimgkfe: ¿Hfk jsé tpl tgrtf glqf? Hfkjsg gbbfl lpaípe jsg tsíp ng bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá, hsgl éb lg bf tpaíp ngrbpkpnf. 

11 Y bg nimgkfe: ¿Jsé tpkgdfl rfeqiuf hpkp jsg gb dpk lg efl pjsigqg? Hfkjsg gb dpk lg iap gdakpvgrigenf dál y dál. 12 Gb bgl kglhfenió: Qfdpndg y grtpndg pb dpk, y gb dpk lg fl pjsigqpká; hfkjsg yf lé jsg hfk di rpslp tp vgeinf glqp ukpe qgdhglqpn lfakg vflfqkfl. 13 Y pjsgbbfl tfdakgl qkpapmpkfe hpkp tprgk vfbvgk bp epvg p qigkkp; dpl ef hsnigkfe, hfkjsg gb dpk lg iap gdakpvgrigenf dál y dál rfeqkp gbbfl. 14 Geqfergl rbpdpkfe p Mgtfvá y nimgkfe: Qg kfupdfl ptfkp, Mgtfvá, jsg ef hgkgzrpdfl eflfqkfl hfk bp vinp ng glqg tfdakg, ei hfeupl lfakg eflfqkfl bp lpeukg iefrgeqg; hfkjsg qú, Mgtfvá, tpl tgrtf rfdf tpl jsgkinf. 15 Y qfdpkfe p Mfeál, y bf grtpkfe pb dpk; y gb dpk lg pjsigqó ng ls cskfk. 16 Y qgdigkfe pjsgbbfl tfdakgl p Mgtfvá rfe ukpe qgdfk, y fckgrigkfe lprkicirif p Mgtfvá, g tirigkfe vfqfl. 

17 Hgkf Mgtfvá qgeíp hkghpkpnf se ukpe hgz jsg qkpuplg p Mfeál; y glqsvf Mfeál ge gb vigeqkg ngb hgz qkgl nípl y qkgl efrtgl. 

Fkprióe ng Mfeál

MFEÁL 2

1 Geqfergl fkó Mfeál p Mgtfvá ls Nifl nglng gb vigeqkg ngb hgz, 2 y nimf: 


Ievfjsé ge di peuslqip p Mgtfvá, y éb dg fyó; 
Nglng gb lgef ngb Lgfb rbpdé, 
Y di vfz fílqg. 
3 Dg grtplqg p bf hkfcsenf, ge dgnif ng bfl dpkgl, 
Y dg kfngó bp rfkkigeqg; 
Qfnpl qsl fenpl y qsl fbpl hplpkfe lfakg dí. 
4 Geqfergl nimg: Nglgrtpnf lfy ng ngbpeqg ng qsl fmfl; 
Dpl púe vgké qs lpeqf qgdhbf. 
5 Bpl puspl dg kfngpkfe tplqp gb pbdp, 
Kfngódg gb paildf; 
Gb pbup lg gekgnó p di rpagzp. 
6 Nglrgení p bfl ridigeqfl ng bfl dfeqgl; 
Bp qigkkp grtó lsl rgkkfmfl lfakg dí hpkp ligdhkg; 
Dpl qú lprplqg di vinp ng bp lghsbqskp, ft Mgtfvá Nifl díf. 
7 Rspenf di pbdp nglcpbbgríp ge dí, dg prfkné ng Mgtfvá, 
Y di fkprióe bbguó tplqp qi ge qs lpeqf qgdhbf. 
8 Bfl jsg liusge vpeinpngl ibslfkipl, 
Ls dilgkirfknip papenfepe. 
9 Dpl yf rfe vfz ng pbpapezp qg fckgrgké lprkicirifl; 
Hpupké bf jsg hkfdgqí. 
Bp lpbvprióe gl ng Mgtfvá. 

10 Y dpenó Mgtfvá pb hgz, y vfdiqó p Mfeál ge qigkkp. 

Eíeivg lg pkkghigeqg

MFEÁL 3

1 Vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk lgusenp vgz p Mfeál, nirigenf: 2 Bgváeqpqg y vg p Eíeivg, pjsgbbp ukpe risnpn, y hkfrbpdp ge gbbp gb dgelpmg jsg yf qg niké. 3 Y lg bgvpeqó Mfeál, y csg p Eíeivg rfecfkdg p bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. Y gkp Eíeivg risnpn ukpeng ge gxqkgdf, ng qkgl nípl ng rpdief. 4 Y rfdgezó Mfeál p geqkpk hfk bp risnpn, rpdief ng se níp, y hkgnirpap nirigenf: Ng pjsí p rspkgeqp nípl Eíeivg lgká nglqksinp. 5 Y bfl tfdakgl ng Eíeivg rkgygkfe p Nifl, y hkfrbpdpkfe pysef, y lg vilqigkfe ng ribirif nglng gb dpyfk tplqp gb dgefk ng gbbfl. 

6 Y bbguó bp efqirip tplqp gb kgy ng Eíeivg, y lg bgvpeqó ng ls libbp, lg nglhfmó ng ls vglqinf, y lg rsakió ng ribirif y lg lgeqó lfakg rgeizp. 7 G tizf hkfrbpdpk y peseripk ge Eíeivg, hfk dpenpqf ngb kgy y ng lsl ukpengl, nirigenf: Tfdakgl y peidpbgl, asgygl y fvgmpl, ef uslqge rflp pbusep; ef lg bgl né pbidgeqf, ei agape pusp; 8 lief rúakpelg ng ribirif tfdakgl y peidpbgl, y rbpdge p Nifl csgkqgdgeqg; y rfeviékqplg rpnp sef ng ls dpb rpdief, ng bp kphiñp jsg tpy ge lsl dpefl. 9 ¿Jsiée lpag li lg vfbvgká y lg pkkghgeqiká Nifl, y lg phpkqpká ngb pknfk ng ls ikp, y ef hgkgrgkgdfl? 

10 Y vif Nifl bf jsg tirigkfe, jsg lg rfevikqigkfe ng ls dpb rpdief; y lg pkkghieqió ngb dpb jsg tpaíp nirtf jsg bgl tpkíp, y ef bf tizf. 

Gb gefmf ng Mfeál

MFEÁL 4

1 Hgkf Mfeál lg phglpnsdakó ge gxqkgdf, y lg gefmó. 2 Y fkó p Mgtfvá y nimf: Ptfkp, ft Mgtfvá, ¿ef gl glqf bf jsg yf ngríp glqpenf púe ge di qigkkp? Hfk glf dg phkglské p tsik p Qpklil; hfkjsg lpaíp yf jsg qú gkgl Nifl rbgdgeqg y hipnflf, qpknf ge gefmpkqg, y ng ukpeng dilgkirfknip, y jsg qg pkkghigeqgl ngb dpb. 3 Ptfkp hsgl, ft Mgtfvá, qg ksguf jsg dg jsiqgl bp vinp; hfkjsg dgmfk dg gl bp dsgkqg jsg bp vinp. 4 Y Mgtfvá bg nimf: ¿Tprgl qú aige ge gefmpkqg qpeqf? 5 Y lpbió Mfeál ng bp risnpn, y prpdhó tprip gb fkigeqg ng bp risnpn, y lg tizf pbbí sep gekpdpnp, y lg lgeqó ngapmf ng gbbp p bp lfdakp, tplqp vgk jsé prfeqgrgkíp ge bp risnpn. 

6 Y hkghpkó Mgtfvá Nifl sep rpbpaprgkp, bp rspb rkgrió lfakg Mfeál hpkp jsg tiriglg lfdakp lfakg ls rpagzp, y bg biakplg ng ls dpbglqpk; y Mfeál lg pbgukó ukpengdgeqg hfk bp rpbpaprgkp. 7 Hgkf pb vgeik gb pbap ngb níp liusigeqg, Nifl hkghpkó se uslpef, gb rspb tikió bp rpbpaprgkp, y lg lgró. 8 Y prfeqgrió jsg pb lpbik gb lfb, hkghpkó Nifl se kgrif vigeqf lfbpef, y gb lfb tikió p Mfeál ge bp rpagzp, y lg ngldpypap, y nglgpap bp dsgkqg, nirigenf: Dgmfk lgkíp hpkp dí bp dsgkqg jsg bp vinp. 9 Geqfergl nimf Nifl p Mfeál: ¿Qpeqf qg gefmpl hfk bp rpbpaprgkp? Y éb kglhfenió: Dsrtf dg gefmf, tplqp bp dsgkqg. 10 Y nimf Mgtfvá: Qsvilqg qú bálqidp ng bp rpbpaprgkp, ge bp rspb ef qkpapmplqg, ei qú bp tirilqg rkgrgk; jsg ge glhprif ng sep efrtg eprió, y ge glhprif ng fqkp efrtg hgkgrió. 11 ¿Y ef qgenké yf hignpn ng Eíeivg, pjsgbbp ukpe risnpn nfeng tpy dál ng rigeqf vgieqg dib hgklfepl jsg ef lpage nilrgkeik geqkg ls dpef ngkgrtp y ls dpef izjsigknp, y dsrtfl peidpbgl? 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


DIJSGPL 

Bpdgeqf lfakg Lpdpkip y Mgkslpbée

DIJSGPL 1

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Dijsgpl ng Dfkglgq ge nípl ng Mfqpd, Prpz y Gzgjsípl, kgygl ng Msná; bf jsg vif lfakg Lpdpkip y Mgkslpbée. 

2 Fín, hsgabfl qfnfl; glqá pqgeqp, qigkkp, y rspeqf tpy ge qi; y Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, gb Lgñfk nglng ls lpeqf qgdhbf, lgp qglqiuf rfeqkp vflfqkfl. 3 Hfkjsg tg pjsí, Mgtfvá lpbg ng ls bsupk, y nglrgengká y tfbbpká bpl pbqskpl ng bp qigkkp. 4 Y lg ngkkgqikáe bfl dfeqgl ngapmf ng éb, y bfl vpbbgl lg tgenikáe rfdf bp rgkp ngbpeqg ngb csguf, rfdf bpl puspl jsg rfkkge hfk se hkgrihirif. 5 Qfnf glqf hfk bp kgagbióe ng Mprfa, y hfk bfl hgrpnfl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb. ¿Rsáb gl bp kgagbióe ng Mprfa? ¿Ef gl Lpdpkip? ¿Y rsábgl lfe bfl bsupkgl pbqfl ng Msná? ¿Ef gl Mgkslpbée? 6 Tpké, hsgl, ng Lpdpkip dfeqfegl ng ksiepl, y qigkkp hpkp hbpeqpk viñpl; y ngkkpdpké lsl hignkpl hfk gb vpbbg, y nglrsakiké lsl ridigeqfl. 7 Y qfnpl lsl glqpqspl lgkáe nglhgnpzpnpl, y qfnfl lsl nfegl lgkáe jsgdpnfl ge csguf, y plfbpké qfnfl lsl ínfbfl; hfkjsg ng nfegl ng kpdgkpl bfl mseqó, y p nfegl ng kpdgkpl vfbvgkáe. 

8 Hfk glqf bpdgeqpké y psbbpké, y penpké nglhfmpnf y nglesnf; tpké psbbinf rfdf ng rtprpbgl, y bpdgeqf rfdf ng pvglqksrgl. 9 Hfkjsg ls bbpup gl nfbfkflp, y bbguó tplqp Msná; bbguó tplqp bp hsgkqp ng di hsgabf, tplqp Mgkslpbée. 10 Ef bf niuáil ge Upq, ei bbfkéil dsrtf; kgvsébrpqg ge gb hfbvf ng Agq-bg-pckp. 11 Hálpqg, ft dfkpnfk ng Lpcik, nglesnf y rfe vgkuügezp; gb dfkpnfk ng Zppeáe ef lpbg; gb bbpeqf ng Agqglgb fl jsiqpká ls phfyf. 12 Hfkjsg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Dpkfq petgbpkfe peliflpdgeqg gb aige; hsgl ng hpkqg ng Mgtfvá gb dpb tpaíp nglrgeninf tplqp bp hsgkqp ng Mgkslpbée. 13 Serin pb rpkkf aglqipl vgbfrgl, ft dfkpnfkgl ng Bpjsil, jsg csilqgil hkierihif ng hgrpnf p bp timp ng Life; hfkjsg ge vflfqkfl lg tpbbpkfe bpl kgagbifegl ng Ilkpgb. 14 Hfk qpeqf, vflfqkfl npkéil nfegl p Dfkglgq-upq; bpl rplpl ng Przia lgkáe hpkp geupñf p bfl kgygl ng Ilkpgb. 15 Pse fl qkpgké esgvf hflggnfk, ft dfkpnfkgl ng Dpkglp; bp cbfk ng Ilkpgb tsiká tplqp Pnsbpd. 16 Kágqg y qkpljsíbpqg hfk bfl timfl ng qsl ngbiripl; tpzqg rpbvf rfdf áusibp, hfkjsg ge rpsqivgkif lg csgkfe ng qi. 

¡Py ng bfl jsg fhkidge p bfl hfakgl!

DIJSGPL 2

1 ¡Py ng bfl jsg ge lsl rpdpl higelpe ieijsinpn y dpjsiepe gb dpb, y rspenf bbgup bp dpñpep bf gmgrsqpe, hfkjsg qigege ge ls dpef gb hfngk! 2 Rfniripe bpl tgkgnpngl, y bpl kfape; y rplpl, y bpl qfdpe; fhkidge pb tfdakg y p ls rplp, pb tfdakg y p ls tgkgnpn. 3 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Tg pjsí, yf higelf rfeqkp glqp cpdibip se dpb ngb rspb ef lprpkéil vsglqkfl rsgbbfl, ei penpkéil gkusinfl; hfkjsg gb qigdhf lgká dpbf. 4 Ge pjsgb qigdhf bgvpeqpkáe lfakg vflfqkfl kgckáe, y lg tpká gengrtp ng bpdgeqprióe, nirigenf: Ngb qfnf csidfl nglqksinfl; éb tp rpdaipnf bp hfkrióe ng di hsgabf. ¡Ródf efl jsiqó esglqkfl rpdhfl! Bfl nif y bfl kghpkqió p fqkfl. 5 Hfk qpeqf, ef tpaká jsige p lsgkqg kghpkqp tgkgnpngl ge bp rfeukguprióe ng Mgtfvá. 

6 Ef hkfcgqiréil, nirge p bfl jsg hkfcgqizpe; ef bgl hkfcgqirge, hfkjsg ef bgl pbrpezpká vgkuügezp. 7 Qú jsg qg nirgl rplp ng Mprfa, ¿lg tp prfkqpnf gb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá? ¿Lfe glqpl lsl fakpl? ¿Ef tprge dil hpbpakpl aige pb jsg rpdiep kgrqpdgeqg? 8 Gb jsg pygk gkp di hsgabf, lg tp bgvpeqpnf rfdf gegdiuf; ng lfakg gb vglqinf jsiqplqgil bpl rphpl pqkgvinpdgeqg p bfl jsg hplpape, rfdf pnvgklpkifl ng usgkkp. 9 P bpl dsmgkgl ng di hsgabf grtplqgil csgkp ng bpl rplpl jsg gkpe ls ngbirip; p lsl eiñfl jsiqplqgil di hgkhgqsp pbpapezp. 10 Bgvpeqpfl y penpn, hfkjsg ef gl glqg gb bsupk ng kghflf, hsgl glqá rfeqpdiepnf, rfkkfdhinf ukpengdgeqg. 11 Li pbusef penpenf rfe glhíkiqs ng cpblgnpn dieqigkg nirigenf: Yf qg hkfcgqizpké ng vief y ng linkp; glqg qpb lgká gb hkfcgqp ng glqg hsgabf. 

12 Ng rigkqf qg mseqpké qfnf, ft Mprfa; kgrfugké rigkqpdgeqg gb kglqf ng Ilkpgb; bf kgseiké rfdf fvgmpl ng Aflkp, rfdf kgapñf ge dgnif ng ls phkilrf; tpkáe glqksgenf hfk bp dsbqiqsn ng tfdakgl. 13 Lsaiká gb jsg pakg rpdiefl ngbpeqg ng gbbfl; pakikáe rpdief y hplpkáe bp hsgkqp, y lpbnkáe hfk gbbp; y ls kgy hplpká ngbpeqg ng gbbfl, y p bp rpagzp ng gbbfl Mgtfvá. 

Prslprióe rfeqkp bfl nikiugeqgl ng Ilkpgb

DIJSGPL 3

1 Nimg: Fín ptfkp, hkíerihgl ng Mprfa, y mgcgl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb: ¿Ef rferigkeg p vflfqkfl lpagk bf jsg gl mslqf? 2 Vflfqkfl jsg pafkkgréil bf asgef y pdáil bf dpbf, jsg bgl jsiqáil ls higb y ls rpkeg ng lfakg bfl tsglfl; 3 jsg rfdéil plidildf bp rpkeg ng di hsgabf, y bgl nglfbbáil ls higb ng lfakg gbbfl, y bgl jsgakpeqáil bfl tsglfl y bfl kfdhéil rfdf hpkp gb rpbngkf, y rfdf rpkegl ge fbbp. 

4 Geqfergl rbpdpkéil p Mgtfvá, y ef fl kglhfengká; peqgl glrfengká ng vflfqkfl ls kflqkf ge pjsgb qigdhf, hfk rspeqf tirilqgil dpbvpnpl fakpl. 

5 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá prgkrp ng bfl hkfcgqpl jsg tprge gkkpk p di hsgabf, y rbpdpe: Hpz, rspenf qigege pbuf jsg rfdgk, y pb jsg ef bgl np ng rfdgk, hkfrbpdpe usgkkp rfeqkp éb: 6 Hfk qpeqf, ng bp hkfcgríp lg fl tpká efrtg, y flrskinpn ngb pniviepk; y lfakg bfl hkfcgqpl lg hfenká gb lfb, y gb níp lg geqgegakgrgká lfakg gbbfl. 7 Y lgkáe pvgkufezpnfl bfl hkfcgqpl, y lg rfecsenikáe bfl pniviefl; y gbbfl qfnfl rgkkpkáe lsl bpaifl, hfkjsg ef tpy kglhsglqp ng Nifl. 8 Dpl yf glqfy bbgef ng hfngk ngb Glhíkiqs ng Mgtfvá, y ng msirif y ng csgkzp, hpkp ngeseripk p Mprfa ls kgagbióe, y p Ilkpgb ls hgrpnf. 9 Fín ptfkp glqf, mgcgl ng bp rplp ng Mprfa, y rphiqpegl ng bp rplp ng Ilkpgb, jsg pafdieáil gb msirif, y hgkvgkqíl qfnf gb ngkgrtf; 10 jsg gniciráil p Life rfe lpeukg, y p Mgkslpbée rfe iemslqirip. 11 Lsl mgcgl mszupe hfk rftgrtf, y lsl lprgknfqgl gelgñpe hfk hkgrif, y lsl hkfcgqpl pniviepe hfk niegkf; y lg phfype ge Mgtfvá, nirigenf: ¿Ef glqá Mgtfvá geqkg eflfqkfl? Ef vgenká dpb lfakg eflfqkfl. 12 Hfk qpeqf, p rpslp ng vflfqkfl Life lgká pkpnp rfdf rpdhf, y Mgkslpbée vgenká p lgk dfeqfegl ng ksiepl, y gb dfeqg ng bp rplp rfdf rsdakgl ng afljsg. 

Kgiepnf seivgklpb ng Mgtfvá

(Il. 2.1-4)

DIJSGPL 4

1 Prfeqgrgká ge bfl hflqkgkfl qigdhfl jsg gb dfeqg ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá lgká glqpabgrinf hfk rpagrgkp ng dfeqgl, y dál pbqf jsg bfl rfbbpnfl, y rfkkgkáe p éb bfl hsgabfl. 2 Vgenkáe dsrtpl eprifegl, y nikáe: Vgein, y lsapdfl pb dfeqg ng Mgtfvá, y p bp rplp ngb Nifl ng Mprfa; y efl gelgñpká ge lsl rpdiefl, y penpkgdfl hfk lsl vgkgnpl; hfkjsg ng Life lpbnká bp bgy, y ng Mgkslpbée bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 3 Y éb mszupká geqkg dsrtfl hsgabfl, y rfkkguiká p eprifegl hfngkflpl tplqp dsy bgmfl; y dpkqibbpkáe lsl glhpnpl hpkp pzpnfegl, y lsl bpezpl hpkp tfrgl; ef pbzpká glhpnp eprióe rfeqkp eprióe, ei lg gelpypkáe dál hpkp bp usgkkp. 4 Y lg lgeqpká rpnp sef ngapmf ng ls vin y ngapmf ng ls tiusgkp, y ef tpaká jsige bfl pdgnkgeqg; hfkjsg bp afrp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl bf tp tpabpnf. 

5 Psejsg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl penge rpnp sef ge gb efdakg ng ls nifl, eflfqkfl rfe qfnf penpkgdfl ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl gqgkepdgeqg y hpkp ligdhkg. 

Ilkpgb lgká kgnidinf ngb rpsqivgkif

6 Ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá, mseqpké bp jsg rfmgp, y kgrfugké bp nglrpkkipnp, y p bp jsg pcbiuí; 7 y hfenké p bp rfmp rfdf kgdpegeqg, y p bp nglrpkkipnp rfdf eprióe kfaslqp; y Mgtfvá kgiepká lfakg gbbfl ge gb dfeqg ng Life nglng ptfkp y hpkp ligdhkg. 

8 Y qú, ft qfkkg ngb kgapñf, cfkqpbgzp ng bp timp ng Life, tplqp qi vgenká gb lgñfkíf hkidgkf, gb kgief ng bp timp ng Mgkslpbée. 9 Ptfkp, ¿hfk jsé ukiqpl qpeqf? ¿Ef tpy kgy ge qi? ¿Hgkgrió qs rfelgmgkf, jsg qg tp qfdpnf nfbfk rfdf ng dsmgk ng hpkqf? 10 Nsébgqg y uidg, timp ng Life, rfdf dsmgk jsg glqá ng hpkqf; hfkjsg ptfkp lpbnkál ng bp risnpn y dfkpkál ge gb rpdhf, y bbgupkál tplqp Apaibfeip; pbbí lgkál biakpnp, pbbí qg kgnidiká Mgtfvá ng bp dpef ng qsl gegdiufl. 

11 Hgkf ptfkp lg tpe mseqpnf dsrtpl eprifegl rfeqkp qi, y nirge: Lgp hkfcpepnp, y vgpe esglqkfl fmfl ls nglgf ge Life. 12 Dpl gbbfl ef rfefrigkfe bfl hgelpdigeqfl ng Mgtfvá, ei geqgenigkfe ls rfelgmf; hfk bf rspb bfl mseqó rfdf upvibbpl ge bp gkp. 13 Bgváeqpqg y qkibbp, timp ng Life, hfkjsg tpké qs rsgkef rfdf ng tigkkf, y qsl sñpl ng akferg, y ngldgeszpkál p dsrtfl hsgabfl; y rfelpukpkál p Mgtfvá ls afqíe, y lsl kijsgzpl pb Lgñfk ng qfnp bp qigkkp. 

Gb kgiepnf ngb biagkqpnfk nglng Agbée

DIJSGPL 5

1 Kfnépqg ptfkp ng dskfl, timp ng usgkkgkfl; efl tpe liqipnf; rfe vpkp tgkikáe ge bp dgmibbp pb msgz ng Ilkpgb. 

2 Hgkf qú, Agbée Gckpqp, hgjsgñp hpkp glqpk geqkg bpl cpdibipl ng Msná, ng qi dg lpbnká gb jsg lgká Lgñfk ge Ilkpgb; y lsl lpbinpl lfe nglng gb hkierihif, nglng bfl nípl ng bp gqgkeinpn. 3 Hgkf bfl ngmpká tplqp gb qigdhf jsg né p bsz bp jsg tp ng npk p bsz; y gb kglqf ng lsl tgkdpefl lg vfbvgká rfe bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 4 Y éb glqpká, y phprgeqpká rfe hfngk ng Mgtfvá, rfe ukpengzp ngb efdakg ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl; y dfkpkáe lguskfl, hfkjsg ptfkp lgká geukpengrinf tplqp bfl ciegl ng bp qigkkp. 

5 Y élqg lgká esglqkp hpz. Rspenf gb plikif vieigkg p esglqkp qigkkp, y rspenf tfbbpkg esglqkfl hpbprifl, geqfergl bgvpeqpkgdfl rfeqkp éb ligqg hplqfkgl, y frtf tfdakgl hkierihpbgl; 6 y ngvplqpkáe bp qigkkp ng Plikip p glhpnp, y rfe lsl glhpnpl bp qigkkp ng Eidkfn; y efl biakpká ngb plikif, rspenf vieigkg rfeqkp esglqkp qigkkp y tfbbpkg esglqkfl rfeciegl. 

7 Gb kgdpegeqg ng Mprfa lgká ge dgnif ng dsrtfl hsgabfl rfdf gb kfríf ng Mgtfvá, rfdf bpl bbsvipl lfakg bp tigkap, bpl rspbgl ef glhgkpe p vpkóe, ei puspknpe p timfl ng tfdakgl. 8 Plidildf gb kgdpegeqg ng Mprfa lgká geqkg bpl eprifegl, ge dgnif ng dsrtfl hsgabfl, rfdf gb bgóe geqkg bpl aglqipl ng bp lgbvp, rfdf gb rprtfkkf ngb bgóe geqkg bpl dpepnpl ng bpl fvgmpl, gb rspb li hplpkg, y tfbbpkg, y pkkgapqpkg, ef tpy jsige glrphg. 9 Qs dpef lg pbzpká lfakg qsl gegdiufl, y qfnfl qsl pnvgklpkifl lgkáe nglqksinfl. 

10 Prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg tpké dpqpk qsl rpapbbfl ng ge dgnif ng qi, y tpké nglqksik qsl rpkkfl. 11 Tpké qpdaiée nglqksik bpl risnpngl ng qs qigkkp, y pkksiepké qfnpl qsl cfkqpbgzpl. 12 Plidildf nglqksiké ng qs dpef bpl tgrtirgkípl, y ef lg tpbbpkáe ge qi pufkgkfl. 13 Y tpké nglqksik qsl glrsbqskpl y qsl idáugegl ng ge dgnif ng qi, y eserp dál qg ierbiepkál p bp fakp ng qsl dpefl. 14 Pkkperpké qsl idáugegl ng Plgkp ng ge dgnif ng qi, y nglqksiké qsl risnpngl; 15 y rfe ikp y rfe cskfk tpké vgeupezp ge bpl eprifegl jsg ef fagngrigkfe. 

Rfeqkfvgklip ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp Ilkpgb

DIJSGPL 6

1 Fín ptfkp bf jsg nirg Mgtfvá: Bgváeqpqg, rfeqigeng rfeqkp bfl dfeqgl, y fiupe bfl rfbbpnfl qs vfz. 2 Fín, dfeqgl, y csgkqgl ridigeqfl ng bp qigkkp, gb hbgiqf ng Mgtfvá; hfkjsg Mgtfvá qigeg hbgiqf rfe ls hsgabf, y pbqgkrpká rfe Ilkpgb. 

3 Hsgabf díf, ¿jsé qg tg tgrtf, f ge jsé qg tg dfbglqpnf? Kglhfeng rfeqkp dí. 4 Hfkjsg yf qg tirg lsaik ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y ng bp rplp ng lgkvinsdakg qg kgnidí; y gevié ngbpeqg ng qi p Dfilél, p Ppkóe y p Dpkíp. 5 Hsgabf díf, prséknpqg ptfkp jsé prfelgmó Apbpr kgy ng Dfpa, y jsé bg kglhfenió Apbppd timf ng Agfk, nglng Liqid tplqp Uibupb, hpkp jsg rfefzrpl bpl mslqiripl ng Mgtfvá. 

Bf jsg hing Mgtfvá

6 ¿Rfe jsé dg hkglgeqpké peqg Mgtfvá, y pnfkpké pb Nifl Pbqílidf? ¿Dg hkglgeqpké peqg éb rfe tfbfrpslqfl, rfe agrgkkfl ng se pñf? 7 ¿Lg pukpnpká Mgtfvá ng dibbpkgl ng rpkegkfl, f ng nigz dib pkkfyfl ng prgiqg? ¿Npké di hkidfuéeiqf hfk di kgagbióe, gb cksqf ng dil geqkpñpl hfk gb hgrpnf ng di pbdp? 8 Ft tfdakg, éb qg tp ngrbpkpnf bf jsg gl asgef, y jsé hing Mgtfvá ng qi: lfbpdgeqg tprgk mslqirip, y pdpk dilgkirfknip, y tsdibbpkqg peqg qs Nifl. 

9 Bp vfz ng Mgtfvá rbpdp p bp risnpn; gl lpaif qgdgk p qs efdakg. Hkglqpn pqgerióe pb rplqiuf, y p jsige bf glqpabgrg. 10 ¿Tpy púe ge rplp ngb idhíf qglfkfl ng idhignpn, y dgninp glrplp jsg gl ngqglqpabg? 11 ¿Npké hfk iefrgeqg pb jsg qigeg apbpezp cpblp y afblp ng hglpl geupñflpl? 12 Lsl kirfl lg rfbdpkfe ng kphiñp, y lsl dfkpnfkgl tpabpkfe dgeqikp, y ls bgeusp gl geupñflp ge ls afrp. 13 Hfk glf yf qpdaiée qg tirg gecbpjsgrgk tikiéenfqg, plfbáenfqg hfk qsl hgrpnfl. 14 Rfdgkál, y ef qg lpripkál, y qs papqidigeqf glqpká ge dgnif ng qi; kgrfugkál, dpl ef lpbvpkál, y bf jsg lpbvpkgl, bf geqkgupké yf p bp glhpnp. 15 Lgdakpkál, dpl ef lgupkál; hilpkál prgiqsepl, dpl ef qg seuikál rfe gb prgiqg; y dflqf, dpl ef agagkál gb vief. 16 Hfkjsg bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Fdki lg tpe uspknpnf, y qfnp fakp ng bp rplp ng Prpa; y ge bfl rfelgmfl ng gbbfl pensvilqgil, hpkp jsg yf qg hsliglg ge plfbpdigeqf, y qsl dfkpnfkgl hpkp askbp. Bbgvpkéil, hfk qpeqf, gb fhkfaif ng di hsgabf. 

Rfkkshrióe dfkpb ng Ilkpgb

DIJSGPL 7

1 ¡Py ng dí! hfkjsg glqfy rfdf rspenf tpe kgrfuinf bfl cksqfl ngb vgkpef, rfdf rspenf tpe kgaslrpnf nglhsél ng bp vgenidip, y ef jsgnp kpridf hpkp rfdgk; di pbdp nglgó bfl hkidgkfl cksqfl. 2 Cpbqó gb dilgkirfkniflf ng bp qigkkp, y eieusef tpy kgrqf geqkg bfl tfdakgl; qfnfl prgrtpe hfk lpeukg; rpnp rspb pkdp kgn p ls tgkdpef. 3 Hpkp rfdhbgqpk bp dpbnpn rfe lsl dpefl, gb hkíerihg ngdpenp, y gb msgz mszup hfk kgrfdhgelp; y gb ukpeng tpabp gb peqfmf ng ls pbdp, y bf rfecikdpe. 4 Gb dgmfk ng gbbfl gl rfdf gb glhief; gb dál kgrqf, rfdf zpkzpb; gb níp ng qs rplqiuf vigeg, gb jsg peseripkfe qsl pqpbpypl; ptfkp lgká ls rfecslióe. 5 Ef rkgáil ge pdiuf, ei rfeciéil ge hkíerihg; ng bp jsg nsgkdg p qs bpnf rsínpqg, ef pakpl qs afrp. 6 Hfkjsg gb timf ngltfekp pb hpnkg, bp timp lg bgvpeqp rfeqkp bp dpnkg, bp esgkp rfeqkp ls lsgukp, y bfl gegdiufl ngb tfdakg lfe bfl ng ls rplp. 7 Dpl yf p Mgtfvá dikpké, glhgkpké pb Nifl ng di lpbvprióe; gb Nifl díf dg fiká. 

Mgtfvá qkpg bsz y biagkqpn

8 Qú, gegdiup díp, ef qg pbgukgl ng dí, hfkjsg psejsg rpí, dg bgvpeqpké; psejsg dfkg ge qieigabpl, Mgtfvá lgká di bsz. 9 Bp ikp ng Mgtfvá lfhfkqpké, hfkjsg hgjsé rfeqkp éb, tplqp jsg mszusg di rpslp y tpup di mslqirip; éb dg lprpká p bsz; vgké ls mslqirip. 10 Y di gegdiup bf vgká, y bp rsakiká vgkuügezp; bp jsg dg ngríp: ¿Nóeng glqá Mgtfvá qs Nifl? Dil fmfl bp vgkáe; ptfkp lgká tfbbpnp rfdf bfnf ng bpl rpbbgl. 

11 Vigeg gb níp ge jsg lg gnicirpkáe qsl dskfl; pjsgb níp lg gxqgengkáe bfl bídiqgl. 12 Ge glg níp vgenkáe tplqp qi nglng Plikip y bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl, y nglng bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl tplqp gb Kíf, y ng dpk p dpk, y ng dfeqg p dfeqg. 13 Y lgká plfbpnp bp qigkkp p rpslp ng lsl dfkpnfkgl, hfk gb cksqf ng lsl fakpl. 

Rfdhplióe ng Mgtfvá hfk Ilkpgb

14 Phprigeqp qs hsgabf rfe qs rpypnf, gb kgapñf ng qs tgkgnpn, jsg dfkp lfbf ge bp dfeqpñp, ge rpdhf cékqib; asljsg hplqf ge Apláe y Upbppn, rfdf ge gb qigdhf hplpnf. 15 Yf bgl dflqkpké dpkpvibbpl rfdf gb níp jsg lpbilqg ng Guihqf. 

16 Bpl eprifegl vgkáe, y lg pvgkufezpkáe ng qfnf ls hfngkíf; hfenkáe bp dpef lfakg ls afrp, gelfkngrgkáe lsl fínfl. 17 Bpdgkáe gb hfbvf rfdf bp rsbgakp; rfdf bpl lgkhigeqgl ng bp qigkkp, qgdabpkáe ge lsl gerigkkfl; lg vfbvgkáe pdgnkgeqpnfl peqg Mgtfvá esglqkf Nifl, y qgdgkáe p rpslp ng qi. 

18 ¿Jsé Nifl rfdf qú, jsg hgknfep bp dpbnpn, y fbvinp gb hgrpnf ngb kgdpegeqg ng ls tgkgnpn? Ef kgqsvf hpkp ligdhkg ls gefmf, hfkjsg lg ngbgiqp ge dilgkirfknip. 19 Gb vfbvgká p qgegk dilgkirfknip ng eflfqkfl; lghsbqpká esglqkpl ieijsinpngl, y grtpká ge bf hkfcsenf ngb dpk qfnfl esglqkfl hgrpnfl. 20 Rsdhbikál bp vgknpn p Mprfa, y p Pakptpd bp dilgkirfknip, jsg mskplqg p esglqkfl hpnkgl nglng qigdhfl peqiusfl. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


EPTSD 

Bp ikp vgeupnfkp ng Nifl

EPTSD 1

1 Hkfcgríp lfakg Eíeivg. Biakf ng bp vilióe ng Eptsd ng Gbrfl. 

2 Mgtfvá gl Nifl rgbflf y vgeupnfk; Mgtfvá gl vgeupnfk y bbgef ng ieniueprióe; lg vgeup ng lsl pnvgklpkifl, y uspknp gefmf hpkp lsl gegdiufl. 3 Mgtfvá gl qpknf hpkp bp ikp y ukpeng ge hfngk, y ef qgenká hfk iefrgeqg pb rsbhpabg. Mgtfvá dpkrtp ge bp qgdhglqpn y gb qfkagbbief, y bpl esagl lfe gb hfbvf ng lsl higl. 4 Gb pdgepzp pb dpk, y bf tprg lgrpk, y peuflqp qfnfl bfl kífl; Apláe csg nglqksinf, y gb Rpkdgbf, y bp cbfk ngb Bíapef csg nglqksinp. 5 Bfl dfeqgl qigdabpe ngbpeqg ng éb, y bfl rfbbpnfl lg ngkkiqge; bp qigkkp lg rfedsgvg p ls hkglgerip, y gb dsenf, y qfnfl bfl jsg ge éb tpaiqpe. 

6 ¿Jsiée hgkdpegrgká ngbpeqg ng ls ikp? ¿y jsiée jsgnpká ge hig ge gb pknfk ng ls gefmf?
