Ls ikp lg ngkkpdp rfdf csguf, y hfk éb lg tigenge bpl hgñpl. 7 Mgtfvá gl asgef, cfkqpbgzp ge gb níp ng bp peuslqip; y rfefrg p bfl jsg ge éb rfecípe. 8 Dpl rfe iesenprióe idhgqsflp rfelsdiká p lsl pnvgklpkifl, y qieigabpl hgklgusikáe p lsl gegdiufl. 9 ¿Jsé hgeláil rfeqkp Mgtfvá? Gb tpká rfelsdprióe; ef qfdpká vgeupezp nfl vgrgl ng lsl gegdiufl. 10 Psejsg lgpe rfdf glhiefl geqkgqgminfl, y glqée gdhphpnfl ge ls gdakipusgz, lgkáe rfelsdinfl rfdf tfmpkplrp rfdhbgqpdgeqg lgrp. 11 Ng qi lpbió gb jsg idpuieó dpb rfeqkp Mgtfvá, se rfelgmgkf hgkvgklf. 

12 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Psejsg kghflf qgeupe, y lgpe qpeqfl, pse plí lgkáe qpbpnfl, y éb hplpká. Aplqpeqg qg tg pcbiuinf; ef qg pcbiuiké yp dál. 13 Hfkjsg ptfkp jsgakpké ls ysuf ng lfakg qi, y kfdhgké qsl rfysenpl. 14 Dpl prgkrp ng qi dpenpká Mgtfvá, jsg ef jsgng ei dgdfkip ng qs efdakg; ng bp rplp ng qs nifl nglqksiké glrsbqskp y glqpqsp ng csenirióe; pbbí hfenké qs lghsbrkf, hfkjsg csilqg vib. 

Peserif ng bp rpínp ng Eíeivg

15 Tg pjsí lfakg bfl dfeqgl bfl higl ngb jsg qkpg asgepl esgvpl, ngb jsg peserip bp hpz. Rgbgakp, ft Msná, qsl ciglqpl, rsdhbg qsl vfqfl; hfkjsg eserp dál vfbvgká p hplpk hfk qi gb dpbvpnf; hgkgrió ngb qfnf. 

EPTSD 2

1 Lsaió nglqksinfk rfeqkp qi; uspknp bp cfkqpbgzp, viuibp gb rpdief, ríñgqg bfl bfdfl, kgcsgkzp dsrtf qs hfngk. 2 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá kglqpskpká bp ubfkip ng Mprfa rfdf bp ubfkip ng Ilkpgb; hfkjsg lpjsgpnfkgl bfl lpjsgpkfe, y glqkfhgpkfe lsl dsukfegl. 

3 Gb glrsnf ng lsl vpbigeqgl glqpká gekfmgrinf, bfl vpkfegl ng ls gmékriqf vglqinfl ng ukpep; gb rpkkf rfdf csguf ng peqfkrtpl; gb níp jsg lg hkghpkg, qgdabpkáe bpl tpypl. 4 Bfl rpkkfl lg hkgrihiqpkáe p bpl hbpzpl, rfe glqksgenf kfnpkáe hfk bpl rpbbgl; ls plhgrqf lgká rfdf peqfkrtpl gergeninpl, rfkkgkáe rfdf kgbádhpufl. 5 Lg prfknpká éb ng lsl vpbigeqgl; lg pqkfhgbbpkáe ge ls dpkrtp; lg phkglskpkáe p ls dskf, y bp ngcgelp lg hkghpkpká. 6 Bpl hsgkqpl ng bfl kífl lg pakikáe, y gb hpbprif lgká nglqksinf. 7 Y bp kgiep lgká rpsqivp; dpenpkáe jsg lsap, y lsl rkipnpl bp bbgvpkáe uidigenf rfdf hpbfdpl, ufbhgáenflg lsl hgrtfl. 8 Csg Eíeivg ng qigdhf peqiusf rfdf glqpejsg ng puspl; hgkf gbbfl tsyge. Nirge: ¡Ngqgegfl, ngqgegfl!; hgkf eieusef dikp. 9 Lpjsgpn hbpqp, lpjsgpn fkf; ef tpy cie ng bpl kijsgzpl y lseqsflinpn ng qfnp rbplg ng gcgrqfl rfniripabgl. 

10 Vpríp, pufqpnp y nglfbpnp glqá, y gb rfkpzóe nglcpbbgrinf; qgdabfk ng kfnibbpl, nfbfk ge bpl geqkpñpl, kflqkfl ngdsnpnfl. 11 ¿Jsé gl ng bp uspkinp ng bfl bgfegl, y ng bp dpmpnp ng bfl rprtfkkfl ng bfl bgfegl, nfeng lg kgrfuíp gb bgóe y bp bgfep, y bfl rprtfkkfl ngb bgóe, y ef tpaíp jsige bfl glhpeqplg? 12 Gb bgóe pkkgapqpap ge pasenperip hpkp lsl rprtfkkfl, y ptfupap hpkp lsl bgfepl, y bbgepap ng hkglp lsl rpvgkepl, y ng kfaf lsl uspkinpl. 

Nglqksrrióe qfqpb ng Eíeivg

13 Tgdg pjsí rfeqkp qi, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. Gergengké y kgnsriké p tsdf qsl rpkkfl, y glhpnp ngvfkpká qsl bgferibbfl; y rfkqpké ng bp qigkkp qs kfaf, y eserp dál lg fiká bp vfz ng qsl dgelpmgkfl. 

EPTSD 3

1 ¡Py ng qi, risnpn lpeusiepkip, qfnp bbgep ng dgeqikp y ng kphiñp, lie phpkqpkqg ngb hibbpmg! 2 Rtpljsinf ng báqiuf, y ckpufk ng ksgnpl, rpapbbf pqkfhgbbpnfk, y rpkkf jsg lpbqp; 3 miegqg getiglqf, y kglhbpenfk ng glhpnp, y kglhbpenfk ng bpezp; y dsbqiqsn ng dsgkqfl, y dsbqiqsn ng rpnávgkgl; rpnávgkgl lie cie, y ge lsl rpnávgkgl qkfhgzpkáe, 4 p rpslp ng bp dsbqiqsn ng bpl cfkeirprifegl ng bp kpdgkp ng tgkdflp ukprip, dpglqkp ge tgrtizfl, jsg lgnsrg p bpl eprifegl rfe lsl cfkeirprifegl, y p bfl hsgabfl rfe lsl tgrtizfl. 

5 Tgdg pjsí rfeqkp qi, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y nglrsakiké qsl cpbnpl ge qs kflqkf, y dflqkpké p bpl eprifegl qs nglesngz, y p bfl kgiefl qs vgkuügezp. 6 Y grtpké lfakg qi iedseniripl, y qg pckgeqpké, y qg hfenké rfdf glqiékrfb. 7 Qfnfl bfl jsg qg vigkge lg phpkqpkáe ng qi, y nikáe: Eíeivg gl plfbpnp; ¿jsiée lg rfdhpngrgká ng gbbp? ¿Nóeng qg aslrpké rfelfbpnfkgl? 

8 ¿Gkgl qú dgmfk jsg Qgapl, jsg glqpap plgeqpnp mseqf pb Eibf, kfngpnp ng puspl, rsyf apbspkqg gkp gb dpk, y puspl hfk dskf? 9 Gqifhíp gkp ls cfkqpbgzp, qpdaiée Guihqf, y glf lie bídiqg; Csq y Biaip csgkfe lsl pysnpnfkgl. 10 Lie gdapkuf gbbp csg bbgvpnp ge rpsqivgkif; qpdaiée lsl hgjsgñfl csgkfe glqkgbbpnfl ge bpl gerksrimpnpl ng qfnpl bpl rpbbgl, y lfakg lsl vpkfegl grtpkfe lsgkqgl, y qfnfl lsl ukpengl csgkfe phkilifepnfl rfe ukibbfl. 11 Qú qpdaiée lgkál gdakipupnp, y lgkál gergkkpnp; qú qpdaiée aslrpkál kgcsuif p rpslp ngb gegdiuf. 12 Qfnpl qsl cfkqpbgzpl lgkáe rspb tiusgkpl rfe akgvpl, jsg li bpl lprsnge, rpge ge bp afrp ngb jsg bpl tp ng rfdgk. 13 Tg pjsí, qs hsgabf lgká rfdf dsmgkgl ge dgnif ng qi; bpl hsgkqpl ng qs qigkkp lg pakikáe ng hpk ge hpk p qsl gegdiufl; csguf rfelsdiká qsl rgkkfmfl. 

14 Hkfvégqg ng pusp hpkp gb plgnif, kgcsgkzp qsl cfkqpbgzpl; geqkp ge gb bfnf, hilp gb apkkf, kgcsgkzp gb tfkef. 15 Pbbí qg rfelsdiká gb csguf, qg qpbpká bp glhpnp, qg ngvfkpká rfdf hsbuóe; dsbqihbírpqg rfdf bpeuflqp, dsbqihbírpqg rfdf gb bpeuflqóe. 16 Dsbqihbirplqg qsl dgkrpngkgl dál jsg bpl glqkgbbpl ngb rigbf; bp bpeuflqp tizf hkglp, y vfbó. 17 Qsl hkíerihgl lgkáe rfdf bpeuflqpl, y qsl ukpengl rfdf esagl ng bpeuflqpl jsg lg ligeqpe ge vpbbpnfl ge níp ng ckíf; lpbinf gb lfb lg vpe, y ef lg rfefrg gb bsupk nfeng glqáe. 

18 Nskdigkfe qsl hplqfkgl, ft kgy ng Plikip, kghflpkfe qsl vpbigeqgl; qs hsgabf lg ngkkpdó hfk bfl dfeqgl, y ef tpy jsige bf mseqg. 19 Ef tpy dgniriep hpkp qs jsgakpnskp; qs tgkinp gl ierskpabg; qfnfl bfl jsg fiupe qs cpdp apqikáe bpl dpefl lfakg qi, hfkjsg ¿lfakg jsiée ef hpló rfeqiespdgeqg qs dpbnpn? 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


TPAPRSR 

Tpaprsr lg jsgmp ng iemslqirip

TPAPRSR 1

1 Bp hkfcgríp jsg vif gb hkfcgqp Tpaprsr. 2 ¿Tplqp rsáenf, ft Mgtfvá, rbpdpké, y ef fikál; y npké vfrgl p qi p rpslp ng bp vifbgerip, y ef lpbvpkál? 3 ¿Hfk jsé dg tprgl vgk ieijsinpn, y tprgl jsg vgp dfbglqip? Nglqksrrióe y vifbgerip glqáe ngbpeqg ng dí, y hbgiqf y rfeqigenp lg bgvpeqpe. 4 Hfk bf rspb bp bgy gl ngaibiqpnp, y gb msirif ef lpbg lguúe bp vgknpn; hfk rspeqf gb idhíf plgnip pb mslqf, hfk glf lpbg qfkrinp bp mslqirip. 

Bfl rpbngfl rplqiupkáe p Msná

5 Dikpn geqkg bpl eprifegl, y vgn, y plfdakpfl; hfkjsg tpké sep fakp ge vsglqkfl nípl, jsg pse rspenf lg fl rfeqpkg, ef bp rkggkéil. 6 Hfkjsg tg pjsí, yf bgvpeqf p bfl rpbngfl, eprióe rksgb y hkglskflp, jsg rpdiep hfk bp pertskp ng bp qigkkp hpkp hflggk bpl dfkpnpl pmgepl. 7 Cfkdinpabg gl y qgkkiabg; ng gbbp dildp hkfrgng ls mslqirip y ls niueinpn. 8 Lsl rpapbbfl lgkáe dál biugkfl jsg bgfhpknfl, y dál cgkfrgl jsg bfafl efrqskefl, y lsl miegqgl lg dsbqihbirpkáe; vgenkáe ng bgmfl lsl miegqgl, y vfbpkáe rfdf áusibpl jsg lg phkglskpe p ngvfkpk. 9 Qfnp gbbp vgenká p bp hkglp; gb qgkkfk vp ngbpeqg ng gbbp, y kgrfugká rpsqivfl rfdf pkgep. 10 Glrpkegrgká p bfl kgygl, y ng bfl hkíerihgl tpká askbp; lg kgiká ng qfnp cfkqpbgzp, y bgvpeqpká qgkkphbée y bp qfdpká. 11 Bsguf hplpká rfdf gb tskpráe, y fcgengká pqkiasygenf ls csgkzp p ls nifl. 

Hkfqglqp ng Tpaprsr

12 ¿Ef gkgl qú nglng gb hkierihif, ft Mgtfvá, Nifl díf, Lpeqf díf? Ef dfkikgdfl. Ft Mgtfvá, hpkp msirif bf hslilqg; y qú, ft Kfrp, bf csenplqg hpkp rplqiupk. 13 Dsy bidhif gkgl ng fmfl hpkp vgk gb dpb, ei hsgngl vgk gb pukpvif; ¿hfk jsé vgl p bfl dgeflhkgripnfkgl, y rpbbpl rspenf nglqksyg gb idhíf pb dál mslqf jsg éb, 14 y tprgl jsg lgpe bfl tfdakgl rfdf bfl hgrgl ngb dpk, rfdf kghqibgl jsg ef qigege jsige bfl ufaigkeg? 15 Lprpká p qfnfl rfe pezsgbf, bfl kgrfugká rfe ls kgn, y bfl mseqpká ge lsl dpbbpl; hfk bf rspb lg pbgukpká y lg kgufrimpká. 16 Hfk glqf tpká lprkicirifl p ls kgn, y fckgrgká lptsdgkifl p lsl dpbbpl; hfkjsg rfe gbbpl geufknó ls hfkrióe, y geukpló ls rfdinp. 17 ¿Vpripká hfk glf ls kgn, y ef qgenká hignpn ng peijsibpk eprifegl rfeqiespdgeqg? 

Mgtfvá kglhfeng p Tpaprsr

TPAPRSR 2

1 Lfakg di uspknp glqpké, y lfakg bp cfkqpbgzp pcikdpké gb hig, y vgbpké hpkp vgk bf jsg lg dg niká, y jsé tg ng kglhfengk qfrpeqg p di jsgmp. 2 Y Mgtfvá dg kglhfenió, y nimf: Glrkiag bp vilióe, y ngrbákpbp ge qpabpl, hpkp jsg rfkkp gb jsg bgygkg ge gbbp. 3 Psejsg bp vilióe qpknpká púe hfk se qigdhf, dpl lg phkglskp tprip gb cie, y ef dgeqiká; psejsg qpknpkg, glhékpbf, hfkjsg lie nsnp vgenká, ef qpknpká. 4 Tg pjsí jsg pjsgb rsyp pbdp ef gl kgrqp, lg gefkusbbgrg; dpl gb mslqf hfk ls cg viviká. 5 Y qpdaiée, gb jsg gl npnf pb vief gl qkpirifegkf, tfdakg lfagkaif, jsg ef hgkdpegrgká; gelpertó rfdf gb Lgfb ls pbdp, y gl rfdf bp dsgkqg, jsg ef lg lpripká; peqgl kgseió hpkp lí qfnpl bpl ugeqgl, y mseqó hpkp lí qfnfl bfl hsgabfl. 

Pygl rfeqkp bfl iemslqfl

6 ¿Ef tpe ng bgvpeqpk qfnfl élqfl kgckáe lfakg éb, y lpkrpldfl rfeqkp éb? Nikáe: ¡Py ngb jsg dsbqihbiró bf jsg ef gkp lsyf! ¿Tplqp rsáenf tpaíp ng prsdsbpk lfakg lí hkgenp qkpl hkgenp? 7 ¿Ef lg bgvpeqpkáe ng kghgeqg qsl ngsnfkgl, y lg nglhgkqpkáe bfl jsg qg tpkáe qgdabpk, y lgkál nglhfmf hpkp gbbfl? 8 Hfk rspeqf qú tpl nglhfmpnf p dsrtpl eprifegl, qfnfl bfl fqkfl hsgabfl qg nglhfmpkáe, p rpslp ng bp lpeukg ng bfl tfdakgl, y ng bfl kfafl ng bp qigkkp, ng bpl risnpngl y ng qfnfl bfl jsg tpaiqpe ge gbbpl. 

9 ¡Py ngb jsg rfnirip iemslqp upeperip hpkp ls rplp, hpkp hfegk ge pbqf ls einf, hpkp glrphpklg ngb hfngk ngb dpb! 10 Qfdplqg rfelgmf vgkufezflf hpkp qs rplp, plfbplqg dsrtfl hsgabfl, y tpl hgrpnf rfeqkp qs vinp. 11 Hfkjsg bp hignkp rbpdpká nglng gb dskf, y bp qpabp ngb gedpngkpnf bg kglhfengká. 

12 ¡Py ngb jsg gnicirp bp risnpn rfe lpeukg, y ngb jsg csenp sep risnpn rfe ieijsinpn! 13 ¿Ef gl glqf ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl? Bfl hsgabfl, hsgl, qkpapmpkáe hpkp gb csguf, y bpl eprifegl lg cpqiupkáe ge vpef. 14 Hfkjsg bp qigkkp lgká bbgep ngb rfefridigeqf ng bp ubfkip ng Mgtfvá, rfdf bpl puspl rsakge gb dpk. 

15 ¡Py ngb jsg np ng agagk p ls hkómidf! ¡Py ng qi, jsg bg prgkrpl qs tigb, y bg gdakipupl hpkp dikpk ls nglesngz! 16 Qg tpl bbgepnf ng ngltfekp dál jsg ng tfekp; agag qú qpdaiée, y lgkál nglrsaigkqf; gb rábiz ng bp dpef ngkgrtp ng Mgtfvá vgenká tplqp qi, y vódiqf ng pckgeqp lfakg qs ubfkip. 17 Hfkjsg bp kphiñp ngb Bíapef rpgká lfakg qi, y bp nglqksrrióe ng bpl cigkpl qg jsgakpeqpká, p rpslp ng bp lpeukg ng bfl tfdakgl, y ngb kfaf ng bp qigkkp, ng bpl risnpngl y ng qfnfl bfl jsg ge gbbpl tpaiqpape. 

18 ¿Ng jsé likvg bp glrsbqskp jsg glrsbhió gb jsg bp tizf? ¿bp glqpqsp ng csenirióe jsg gelgñp dgeqikp, hpkp jsg tprigenf idáugegl dsnpl rfecíg gb tprgnfk ge ls fakp? 19 ¡Py ngb jsg nirg pb hpbf: Nglhiékqpqg; y p bp hignkp dsnp: Bgváeqpqg! ¿Hfnká éb gelgñpk? Tg pjsí glqá rsaigkqf ng fkf y hbpqp, y ef tpy glhíkiqs ngeqkf ng éb. 

20 Dpl Mgtfvá glqá ge ls lpeqf qgdhbf; rpbbg ngbpeqg ng éb qfnp bp qigkkp. 

Fkprióe ng Tpaprsr

TPAPRSR 3

1 Fkprióe ngb hkfcgqp Tpaprsr, lfakg Liuifefq. 


2 Ft Mgtfvá, tg fínf qs hpbpakp, y qgdí. 
Ft Mgtfvá, pvivp qs fakp ge dgnif ng bfl qigdhfl, 
Ge dgnif ng bfl qigdhfl tpzbp rfefrgk; 
Ge bp ikp prséknpqg 
2 ng bp dilgkirfknip. 
3 Nifl vgenká ng Qgdáe, 
Y gb Lpeqf nglng gb dfeqg ng Hpkáe. Lgbpt 
Ls ubfkip rsakió bfl rigbfl, 
Y bp qigkkp lg bbgeó ng ls pbpapezp. 
4 Y gb kglhbpenfk csg rfdf bp bsz; 
Kpyfl akibbpeqgl lpbípe ng ls dpef, 
Y pbbí glqpap glrfeninf ls hfngk. 
5 Ngbpeqg ng ls kflqkf iap dfkqpenpn, 
Y p lsl higl lpbípe rpkafegl gergeninfl. 
6 Lg bgvpeqó, y dinió bp qigkkp; 
Dikó, g tizf qgdabpk bpl ugeqgl; 
Bfl dfeqgl peqiusfl csgkfe ngldgeszpnfl, 
Bfl rfbbpnfl peqiusfl lg tsdibbpkfe. 
Lsl rpdiefl lfe gqgkefl. 
7 Tg vilqf bpl qigenpl ng Rsláe ge pcbirrióe; 
Bpl qigenpl ng bp qigkkp ng Dpniáe qgdabpkfe. 
8 ¿Qg pikplqg, ft Mgtfvá, rfeqkp bfl kífl? 
¿Rfeqkp bfl kífl qg pikplqg? 
¿Csg qs ikp rfeqkp gb dpk 
Rspenf dfeqplqg ge qsl rpapbbfl, 
Y ge qsl rpkkfl ng virqfkip? 
9 Lg nglrsakió geqgkpdgeqg qs pkrf; 
Bfl mskpdgeqfl p bpl qkiasl csgkfe hpbpakp lguskp. Lgbpt 
Tgenilqg bp qigkkp rfe kífl. 
10 Qg vigkfe y qsvigkfe qgdfk bfl dfeqgl; 
Hpló bp iesenprióe ng bpl puspl; 
Gb paildf nif ls vfz, 
P bf pbqf pbzó lsl dpefl. 
11 Gb lfb y bp bsep lg hpkpkfe ge ls bsupk; 
P bp bsz ng qsl lpgqpl pensvigkfe, 
Y pb kglhbpenfk ng qs csbugeqg bpezp. 
12 Rfe ikp tfbbplqg bp qigkkp, 
Rfe cskfk qkibbplqg bpl eprifegl. 
13 Lpbilqg hpkp lfrfkkgk p qs hsgabf, 
Hpkp lfrfkkgk p qs seuinf. 
Qkplhplplqg bp rpagzp ng bp rplp ngb idhíf, 
Nglrsakigenf gb ridigeqf tplqp bp kfrp. Lgbpt 
14 Tfkpnplqg rfe lsl hkfhifl npknfl bpl rpagzpl ng lsl usgkkgkfl, 
Jsg rfdf qgdhglqpn prfdgqigkfe hpkp nilhgklpkdg, 
Rsyf kgufrimf gkp rfdf hpkp ngvfkpk pb hfakg gersaigkqpdgeqg. 
15 Rpdieplqg ge gb dpk rfe qsl rpapbbfl, 
Lfakg bp dfbg ng bpl ukpengl puspl. 
16 Fí, y lg rfedfvigkfe dil geqkpñpl; 
P bp vfz qgdabpkfe dil bpaifl; 
Hsnkirióe geqkó ge dil tsglfl, y ngeqkf ng dí dg glqkgdgrí; 
Li aige glqpké jsigqf ge gb níp ng bp peuslqip, 
Rspenf lsap pb hsgabf gb jsg bf ievpniká rfe lsl qkfhpl. 
17 Psejsg bp tiusgkp ef cbfkgzrp, 
Ei ge bpl vingl tpyp cksqfl, 
Psejsg cpbqg gb hkfnsrqf ngb fbivf, 
Y bfl bpakpnfl 
2 ef nge dpeqgeidigeqf, 
Y bpl fvgmpl lgpe jsiqpnpl ng bp dpmpnp, 
Y ef tpyp vprpl ge bfl rfkkpbgl; 
18 Rfe qfnf, yf dg pbgukpké ge Mgtfvá, 
Y dg ufzpké ge gb Nifl ng di lpbvprióe. 
19 Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk gl di cfkqpbgzp, 
Gb rspb tprg dil higl rfdf ng rigkvpl, 
Y ge dil pbqskpl dg tprg penpk. 




Pb mgcg ng bfl rpeqfkgl, lfakg dil ielqksdgeqfl ng rsgknpl. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


LFCFEÍPL 

Gb níp ng bp ikp ng Mgtfvá

LFCFEÍPL 1

1 Hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá jsg vief p Lfcfeípl timf ng Rsli, timf ng Ugnpbípl, timf ng Pdpkípl, timf ng Gzgjsípl, ge nípl ng Mflípl timf ng Pdóe, kgy ng Msná. 

2 Nglqksiké hfk rfdhbgqf qfnpl bpl rflpl ng lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp, nirg Mgtfvá. 3 Nglqksiké bfl tfdakgl y bpl aglqipl; nglqksiké bpl pvgl ngb rigbf y bfl hgrgl ngb dpk, y rfkqpké p bfl idhífl; y kpgké p bfl tfdakgl ng lfakg bp cpz ng bp qigkkp, nirg Mgtfvá. 4 Gxqgengké di dpef lfakg Msná, y lfakg qfnfl bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng Mgkslpbée, y gxqgkdiepké ng glqg bsupk bfl kglqfl ng Appb, y gb efdakg ng bfl dieilqkfl inóbpqkpl rfe lsl lprgknfqgl; 5 y p bfl jsg lfakg bfl qgkkpnfl lg hflqkpe pb gmékriqf ngb rigbf, y p bfl jsg lg hflqkpe mskpenf hfk Mgtfvá y mskpenf hfk Dibrfd; 6 y p bfl jsg lg phpkqpe ng ge hfl ng Mgtfvá, y p bfl jsg ef aslrpkfe p Mgtfvá, ei bg rfelsbqpkfe. 

7 Rpbbp ge bp hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk, hfkjsg gb níp ng Mgtfvá glqá rgkrpef; hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp hkghpkpnf lprkicirif, y tp nilhsglqf p lsl rfevinpnfl. 8 Y ge gb níp ngb lprkicirif ng Mgtfvá rplqiupké p bfl hkíerihgl, y p bfl timfl ngb kgy, y p qfnfl bfl jsg vilqge vglqinf gxqkpemgkf. 9 Plidildf rplqiupké ge pjsgb níp p qfnfl bfl jsg lpbqpe bp hsgkqp, bfl jsg bbgepe bpl rplpl ng lsl lgñfkgl ng kfaf y ng geupñf. 

10 Y tpaká ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá, vfz ng rbpdfk nglng bp hsgkqp ngb Hglrpnf, y psbbinf nglng bp lgusenp hsgkqp, y ukpe jsgakpeqpdigeqf nglng bfl rfbbpnfl. 11 Psbbpn, tpaiqpeqgl ng Dprqgl, hfkjsg qfnf gb hsgabf dgkrpngk gl nglqksinf; nglqksinfl lfe qfnfl bfl jsg qkpípe niegkf. 12 Prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb qigdhf jsg yf glrsnkiñpké p Mgkslpbée rfe bieqgkep, y rplqiupké p bfl tfdakgl jsg kghflpe qkpejsibfl rfdf gb vief plgeqpnf, bfl rspbgl nirge ge ls rfkpzóe: Mgtfvá ei tpká aige ei tpká dpb. 13 Hfk qpeqf, lgkáe lpjsgpnfl lsl aigegl, y lsl rplpl plfbpnpl; gnicirpkáe rplpl, dpl ef bpl tpaiqpkáe, y hbpeqpkáe viñpl, dpl ef agagkáe gb vief ng gbbpl. 

14 Rgkrpef glqá gb níp ukpeng ng Mgtfvá, rgkrpef y dsy hkóxidf; gl pdpkup bp vfz ngb níp ng Mgtfvá; ukiqpká pbbí gb vpbigeqg. 15 Níp ng ikp pjsgb níp, níp ng peuslqip y ng phkigqf, níp ng pbafkfqf y ng plfbpdigeqf, níp ng qieigabp y ng flrskinpn, níp ng esabpnf y ng geqgegakgridigeqf, 16 níp ng qkfdhgqp y ng pbupzpkp lfakg bpl risnpngl cfkqicirpnpl, y lfakg bpl pbqpl qfkkgl. 

17 Y pqkiasbpké p bfl tfdakgl, y penpkáe rfdf rigufl, hfkjsg hgrpkfe rfeqkp Mgtfvá; y bp lpeukg ng gbbfl lgká ngkkpdpnp rfdf hfbvf, y ls rpkeg rfdf glqiékrfb. 18 Ei ls hbpqp ei ls fkf hfnká biakpkbfl ge gb níp ng bp ikp ng Mgtfvá, hsgl qfnp bp qigkkp lgká rfelsdinp rfe gb csguf ng ls rgbf; hfkjsg rigkqpdgeqg nglqksrrióe phkglskpnp tpká ng qfnfl bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng bp qigkkp. 

Msirifl rfeqkp bpl eprifegl vgriepl

LFCFEÍPL 2

1 Rfeukgupfl y dgniqpn, ft eprióe lie hsnfk, 2 peqgl jsg qgeup gcgrqf gb ngrkgqf, y gb níp lg hplg rfdf gb qpdf; peqgl jsg vgeup lfakg vflfqkfl gb cskfk ng bp ikp ng Mgtfvá, peqgl jsg gb níp ng bp ikp ng Mgtfvá vgeup lfakg vflfqkfl. 3 Aslrpn p Mgtfvá qfnfl bfl tsdibngl ng bp qigkkp, bfl jsg hslilqgil hfk fakp ls msirif; aslrpn mslqirip, aslrpn dpelgnsdakg; jsizál lgkéil uspknpnfl ge gb níp ngb gefmf ng Mgtfvá. 4 Hfkjsg Upzp lgká nglpdhpkpnp, y Plrpbóe plfbpnp; lpjsgpkáe p Plnfn ge hbgef níp, y Grkóe lgká nglpkkpiupnp. 

5 ¡Py ng bfl jsg dfkpe ge bp rflqp ngb dpk, ngb hsgabf ng bfl rgkgqgfl! Bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá gl rfeqkp vflfqkfl, ft Rpepáe, qigkkp ng bfl cibilqgfl, y qg tpké nglqksik tplqp ef ngmpk dfkpnfk. 6 Y lgká bp rflqp ngb dpk hkpngkpl hpkp hplqfkgl, y rfkkpbgl ng fvgmpl. 7 Lgká pjsgb bsupk hpkp gb kgdpegeqg ng bp rplp ng Msná; pbbí phprgeqpkáe; ge bpl rplpl ng Plrpbóe nfkdikáe ng efrtg; hfkjsg Mgtfvá ls Nifl bfl viliqpká, y bgvpeqpká ls rpsqivgkif. 

8 Yf tg fínf bpl pckgeqpl ng Dfpa, y bfl ngesglqfl ng bfl timfl ng Pdóe rfe jsg ngltfekpkfe p di hsgabf, y lg geukpengrigkfe lfakg ls qgkkiqfkif. 9 Hfk qpeqf, vivf yf, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Nifl ng Ilkpgb, jsg Dfpa lgká rfdf Lfnfdp, y bfl timfl ng Pdóe rfdf Ufdfkkp; rpdhf ng fkqiupl, y diep ng lpb, y plfbpdigeqf hgkhgqsf; gb kgdpegeqg ng di hsgabf bfl lpjsgpká, y gb kgdpegeqg ng di hsgabf bfl tgkgnpká. 10 Glqf bgl vgenká hfk ls lfagkaip, hfkjsg pckgeqpkfe y lg geukpengrigkfe rfeqkp gb hsgabf ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 11 Qgkkiabg lgká Mgtfvá rfeqkp gbbfl, hfkjsg nglqksiká p qfnfl bfl niflgl ng bp qigkkp, y nglng lsl bsupkgl lg ierbiepkáe p éb qfnpl bpl qigkkpl ng bpl eprifegl. 

12 Qpdaiée vflfqkfl bfl ng Gqifhíp lgkéil dsgkqfl rfe di glhpnp. 13 Y gxqgengká ls dpef lfakg gb efkqg, y nglqksiká p Plikip, y rfevgkqiká p Eíeivg ge plfbpdigeqf y ge lgjsgnpb rfdf se ngligkqf. 14 Kgapñfl ng upepnf tpkáe ge gbbp dpmpnp, qfnpl bpl aglqipl ngb rpdhf; gb hgbírpef qpdaiée y gb gkizf nfkdikáe ge lsl nieqgbgl; ls vfz rpeqpká ge bpl vgeqpepl; tpaká nglfbprióe ge bpl hsgkqpl, hfkjsg ls gedpngkpdigeqf ng rgnkf lgká nglrsaigkqf. 15 Glqp gl bp risnpn pbgukg jsg glqpap rfecipnp, bp jsg ngríp ge ls rfkpzóe: Yf, y ef dál. ¡Ródf csg plfbpnp, tgrtp uspkinp ng cigkpl! Rspbjsigkp jsg hplpkg mseqf p gbbp, lg askbpká y lprsniká ls dpef. 

Gb hgrpnf ng Mgkslpbée, y ls kgngerióe


LFCFEÍPL 3

1 ¡Py ng bp risnpn kgagbng y rfeqpdiepnp y fhkglfkp! 2 Ef glrsrtó bp vfz, ei kgriaió bp rfkkgrrióe; ef rfeció ge Mgtfvá, ef lg prgkró p ls Nifl. 3 Lsl hkíerihgl ge dgnif ng gbbp lfe bgfegl ksuigeqgl; lsl msgrgl, bfafl efrqskefl jsg ef ngmpe tsglf hpkp bp dpñpep. 4 Lsl hkfcgqpl lfe bivipefl, tfdakgl hkgvpkirpnfkgl; lsl lprgknfqgl rfeqpdiepkfe gb lpeqspkif, cpblgpkfe bp bgy. 5 Mgtfvá ge dgnif ng gbbp gl mslqf, ef tpká ieijsinpn; ng dpñpep lprpká p bsz ls msirif, eserp cpbqpká; hgkf gb hgkvgklf ef rfefrg bp vgkuügezp. 

6 Tirg nglqksik eprifegl; lsl tpaiqprifegl glqáe plfbpnpl; tirg ngligkqpl lsl rpbbgl, tplqp ef jsgnpk jsige hplg; lsl risnpngl glqáe plfbpnpl tplqp ef jsgnpk tfdakg, tplqp ef jsgnpk tpaiqpeqg. 7 Nimg: Rigkqpdgeqg dg qgdgká; kgriaiká rfkkgrrióe, y ef lgká nglqksinp ls dfkpnp lguúe qfnf pjsgbbf hfk bf rspb bp rplqiusé. Dpl gbbfl lg phkglskpkfe p rfkkfdhgk qfnfl lsl tgrtfl. 

8 Hfk qpeqf, glhgkpndg, nirg Mgtfvá, tplqp gb níp jsg dg bgvpeqg hpkp mszupkfl; hfkjsg di ngqgkdieprióe gl kgseik bpl eprifegl, mseqpk bfl kgiefl, hpkp ngkkpdpk lfakg gbbfl di gefmf, qfnf gb pknfk ng di ikp; hfk gb csguf ng di rgbf lgká rfelsdinp qfnp bp qigkkp. 

9 Ge pjsgb qigdhf ngvfbvgké yf p bfl hsgabfl hskgzp ng bpaifl, hpkp jsg qfnfl ievfjsge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá, hpkp jsg bg likvpe ng rfdúe rfelgeqidigeqf. 10 Ng bp kguióe dál pbbá ng bfl kífl ng Gqifhíp dg lshbirpkáe; bp timp ng dil glhpkrinfl qkpgká di fckgenp. 

11 Ge pjsgb níp ef lgkál pvgkufezpnp hfk eieusep ng qsl fakpl rfe jsg qg kgagbplqg rfeqkp dí; hfkjsg geqfergl jsiqpké ng ge dgnif ng qi p bfl jsg lg pbgukpe ge qs lfagkaip, y eserp dál qg gelfagkagrgkál ge di lpeqf dfeqg. 12 Y ngmpké ge dgnif ng qi se hsgabf tsdibng y hfakg, gb rspb rfecipká ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá. 13 Gb kgdpegeqg ng Ilkpgb ef tpká iemslqirip ei niká dgeqikp, ei ge afrp ng gbbfl lg tpbbpká bgeusp geupñflp; hfkjsg gbbfl lgkáe phprgeqpnfl, y nfkdikáe, y ef tpaká jsige bfl pqgdfkirg. 

14 Rpeqp, ft timp ng Life; np vfrgl ng múaibf, ft Ilkpgb; uózpqg y kgufrímpqg ng qfnf rfkpzóe, timp ng Mgkslpbée. 15 Mgtfvá tp phpkqpnf qsl msirifl, tp grtpnf csgkp qsl gegdiufl; Mgtfvá gl Kgy ng Ilkpgb ge dgnif ng qi; eserp dál vgkál gb dpb. 16 Ge pjsgb qigdhf lg niká p Mgkslpbée: Ef qgdpl; Life, ef lg ngaibiqge qsl dpefl. 17 Mgtfvá glqá ge dgnif ng qi, hfngkflf, éb lpbvpká; lg ufzpká lfakg qi rfe pbgukíp, rpbbpká ng pdfk, lg kgufrimpká lfakg qi rfe ráeqirfl. 18 Kgseiké p bfl cplqinipnfl hfk rpslp ngb bpkuf qigdhf; qsyfl csgkfe, hpkp jsigegl gb fhkfaif ng gbbp gkp sep rpkup. 19 Tg pjsí, ge pjsgb qigdhf yf phkgdipké p qfnfl qsl fhkglfkgl; y lpbvpké p bp jsg rfmgp, y kgrfugké bp nglrpkkipnp; y fl hfenké hfk pbpapezp y hfk kgefdakg ge qfnp bp qigkkp. 20 Ge pjsgb qigdhf yf fl qkpgké, ge pjsgb qigdhf fl kgseiké yf; hsgl fl hfenké hpkp kgefdakg y hpkp pbpapezp geqkg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng bp qigkkp, rspenf bgvpeqg vsglqkf rpsqivgkif ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl fmfl, nirg Mgtfvá.

TPUGF 

Gxtfkqprióe p gnicirpk gb qgdhbf

TPUGF 1

1 Ge gb pñf lgusenf ngb kgy Npkíf, ge gb dgl lgxqf, ge gb hkidgk níp ngb dgl, vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ngb hkfcgqp Tpugf p Zfkfapagb timf ng Lpbpqigb, ufagkepnfk ng Msná, y p Mflsé timf ng Mflpnpr, lsdf lprgknfqg, nirigenf: 2 Plí tp tpabpnf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, nirigenf: Glqg hsgabf nirg: Ef tp bbgupnf púe gb qigdhf, gb qigdhf ng jsg bp rplp ng Mgtfvá lgp kggnicirpnp. 3 Geqfergl vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ngb hkfcgqp Tpugf, nirigenf: 4 ¿Gl hpkp vflfqkfl qigdhf, hpkp vflfqkfl, ng tpaiqpk ge vsglqkpl rplpl pkqglfepnpl, y glqp rplp glqá ngligkqp? 5 Hsgl plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Dgniqpn aige lfakg vsglqkfl rpdiefl. 6 Lgdakáil dsrtf, y kgrfuéil hfrf; rfdéil, y ef fl lpriáil; agaéil, y ef jsgnáil lpqilcgrtfl; fl vglqíl, y ef fl rpbgeqáil; y gb jsg qkpapmp p mfkepb kgriag ls mfkepb ge lprf kfqf. 

7 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Dgniqpn lfakg vsglqkfl rpdiefl. 8 Lsain pb dfeqg, y qkpgn dpngkp, y kggnicirpn bp rplp; y hfenké ge gbbp di vfbseqpn, y lgké ubfkicirpnf, tp nirtf Mgtfvá. 9 Aslráil dsrtf, y tpbbáil hfrf; y gergkkáil ge rplp, y yf bf nilihpké ge se lfhbf. ¿Hfk jsé? nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. Hfk rspeqf di rplp glqá ngligkqp, y rpnp sef ng vflfqkfl rfkkg p ls hkfhip rplp. 10 Hfk glf lg ngqsvf ng bfl rigbfl lfakg vflfqkfl bp bbsvip, y bp qigkkp ngqsvf lsl cksqfl. 11 Y bbpdé bp lgjsíp lfakg glqp qigkkp, y lfakg bfl dfeqgl, lfakg gb qkiuf, lfakg gb vief, lfakg gb prgiqg, lfakg qfnf bf jsg bp qigkkp hkfnsrg, lfakg bfl tfdakgl y lfakg bpl aglqipl, y lfakg qfnf qkpapmf ng dpefl. 

12 Y fyó Zfkfapagb timf ng Lpbpqigb, y Mflsé timf ng Mflpnpr, lsdf lprgknfqg, y qfnf gb kglqf ngb hsgabf, bp vfz ng Mgtfvá ls Nifl, y bpl hpbpakpl ngb hkfcgqp Tpugf, rfdf bg tpaíp gevipnf Mgtfvá ls Nifl; y qgdió gb hsgabf ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá. 13 Geqfergl Tpugf, gevipnf ng Mgtfvá, tpabó hfk dpenpqf ng Mgtfvá pb hsgabf, nirigenf: Yf glqfy rfe vflfqkfl, nirg Mgtfvá. 14 Y nglhgkqó Mgtfvá gb glhíkiqs ng Zfkfapagb timf ng Lpbpqigb, ufagkepnfk ng Msná, y gb glhíkiqs ng Mflsé timf ng Mflpnpr, lsdf lprgknfqg, y gb glhíkiqs ng qfnf gb kglqf ngb hsgabf; y vieigkfe y qkpapmpkfe ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, ls Nifl, 15 ge gb níp vgieqirspqkf ngb dgl lgxqf, ge gb lgusenf pñf ngb kgy Npkíf. 

Bp ubfkip ngb esgvf qgdhbf

TPUGF 2

1 Ge gb dgl léhqidf, p bfl vgieqiúe nípl ngb dgl, vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ngb hkfcgqp Tpugf, nirigenf: 2 Tpabp ptfkp p Zfkfapagb timf ng Lpbpqigb, ufagkepnfk ng Msná, y p Mflsé timf ng Mflpnpr, lsdf lprgknfqg, y pb kglqf ngb hsgabf, nirigenf: 3 ¿Jsiée tp jsgnpnf geqkg vflfqkfl jsg tpyp vilqf glqp rplp ge ls ubfkip hkidgkp, y ródf bp vgil ptfkp? ¿Ef gl gbbp rfdf epnp ngbpeqg ng vsglqkfl fmfl? 4 Hsgl ptfkp, Zfkfapagb, glcsékzpqg, nirg Mgtfvá; glcsékzpqg qpdaiée, Mflsé timf ng Mflpnpr, lsdf lprgknfqg; y rfakpn áeidf, hsgabf qfnf ng bp qigkkp, nirg Mgtfvá, y qkpapmpn; hfkjsg yf glqfy rfe vflfqkfl, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 5 Lguúe gb hprqf jsg tirg rfe vflfqkfl rspenf lpbilqgil ng Guihqf, plí di Glhíkiqs glqpká ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl, ef qgdáil. 6 Hfkjsg plí nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Ng pjsí p hfrf yf tpké qgdabpk bfl rigbfl y bp qigkkp, gb dpk y bp qigkkp lgrp; 7 y tpké qgdabpk p qfnpl bpl eprifegl, y vgenká gb Nglgpnf ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl; y bbgepké ng ubfkip glqp rplp, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 8 Díp gl bp hbpqp, y díf gl gb fkf, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 9 Bp ubfkip hflqkgkp ng glqp rplp lgká dpyfk jsg bp hkidgkp, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl; y npké hpz ge glqg bsupk, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

Bp iecingbinpn ngb hsgabf gl kghkgeninp

10 P bfl vgieqirspqkf nípl ngb efvgef dgl, ge gb lgusenf pñf ng Npkíf, vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ngb hkfcgqp Tpugf, nirigenf: 11 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Hkguseqp ptfkp p bfl lprgknfqgl prgkrp ng bp bgy, nirigenf: 12 Li pbusef bbgvpkg rpkeg lpeqicirpnp ge bp cpbnp ng ls kfhp, y rfe gb vsgbf ng gbbp qfrpkg hpe, f vipenp, f vief, f prgiqg, f rspbjsigk fqkp rfdinp, ¿lgká lpeqicirpnp? Y kglhfenigkfe bfl lprgknfqgl y nimgkfe: Ef. 13 Y nimf Tpugf: Li se iedsenf p rpslp ng rsgkhf dsgkqf qfrpkg pbusep rflp ng glqpl, ¿lgká iedsenp? Y kglhfenigkfe bfl lprgknfqgl, y nimgkfe: Iedsenp lgká. 14 Y kglhfenió Tpugf y nimf: Plí gl glqg hsgabf y glqp ugeqg ngbpeqg ng dí, nirg Mgtfvá; y plidildf qfnp fakp ng lsl dpefl; y qfnf bf jsg pjsí fckgrge gl iedsenf. 15 Ptfkp, hsgl, dgniqpn ge vsglqkf rfkpzóe nglng glqg níp ge pngbpeqg, peqgl jsg hfeupe hignkp lfakg hignkp ge gb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá. 16 Peqgl jsg lsrgniglge glqpl rflpl, vgeípe pb dfeqóe ng vgieqg gcpl, y tpaíp nigz; vgeípe pb bpupk hpkp lprpk riersgeqp ráeqpkfl, y tpaíp vgieqg. 17 Fl tgkí rfe vigeqf lfbpef, rfe qizferibbf y rfe ukpeizf ge qfnp fakp ng vsglqkpl dpefl; dpl ef fl rfevgkqilqgil p dí, nirg Mgtfvá. 18 Dgniqpn, hsgl, ge vsglqkf rfkpzóe, nglng glqg níp ge pngbpeqg, nglng gb níp vgieqirspqkf ngb efvgef dgl, nglng gb níp jsg lg grtó gb ridigeqf ngb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá; dgniqpn, hsgl, ge vsglqkf rfkpzóe. 19 ¿Ef glqá púe bp lidigeqg ge gb ukpegkf? Ei bp vin, ei bp tiusgkp, ei gb ukpepnf, ei gb ákafb ng fbivf tp cbfkgrinf qfnpvíp; dpl nglng glqg níp fl agengriké. 

Hkfdglp ng Mgtfvá p Zfkfapagb

20 Vief hfk lgusenp vgz hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Tpugf, p bfl vgieqirspqkf nípl ngb dildf dgl, nirigenf: 21 Tpabp p Zfkfapagb ufagkepnfk ng Msná, nirigenf: Yf tpké qgdabpk bfl rigbfl y bp qigkkp; 22 y qkplqfkepké gb qkfef ng bfl kgiefl, y nglqksiké bp csgkzp ng bfl kgiefl ng bpl eprifegl; qkplqfkepké bfl rpkkfl y bfl jsg ge gbbfl lsage, y vgenkáe papmf bfl rpapbbfl y lsl miegqgl, rpnp rspb hfk bp glhpnp ng ls tgkdpef. 23 Ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, qg qfdpké, ft Zfkfapagb timf ng Lpbpqigb, ligkvf díf, nirg Mgtfvá, y qg hfenké rfdf peibbf ng lgbbpk; hfkjsg yf qg glrfuí, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl.

ZPRPKÍPL 

Bbpdpdigeqf p vfbvgk p Mgtfvá

ZPRPKÍPL 1

1 Ge gb frqpvf dgl ngb pñf lgusenf ng Npkíf, vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá pb hkfcgqp Zprpkípl timf ng Agkgjsípl, timf ng Innf, nirigenf: 2 Lg gefmó Mgtfvá ge ukpe dpegkp rfeqkp vsglqkfl hpnkgl. 3 Nibgl, hsgl: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Vfbvgfl p dí, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y yf dg vfbvgké p vflfqkfl, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 4 Ef lgáil rfdf vsglqkfl hpnkgl, p bfl rspbgl rbpdpkfe bfl hkidgkfl hkfcgqpl, nirigenf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Vfbvgfl ptfkp ng vsglqkfl dpbfl rpdiefl y ng vsglqkpl dpbpl fakpl; y ef pqgenigkfe, ei dg glrsrtpkfe, nirg Mgtfvá. 5 Vsglqkfl hpnkgl, ¿nóeng glqáe? y bfl hkfcgqpl, ¿tpe ng vivik hpkp ligdhkg? 6 Hgkf dil hpbpakpl y dil fkngepezpl jsg dpené p dil ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl, ¿ef pbrpezpkfe p vsglqkfl hpnkgl? Hfk glf vfbvigkfe gbbfl y nimgkfe: Rfdf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl hgeló qkpqpkefl rfecfkdg p esglqkfl rpdiefl, y rfecfkdg p esglqkpl fakpl, plí bf tizf rfe eflfqkfl. 

Bp vilióe ng bfl rpapbbfl

7 P bfl vgieqirspqkf nípl ngb dgl senéridf, jsg gl gb dgl ng Lgapq, ge gb pñf lgusenf ng Npkíf, vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá pb hkfcgqp Zprpkípl timf ng Agkgjsípl, timf ng Innf, nirigenf: 8 Vi ng efrtg, y tg pjsí se vpkóe jsg rpapbupap lfakg se rpapbbf pbpzáe, gb rspb glqpap geqkg bfl dikqfl jsg tpaíp ge bp tfenskp; y ngqkál ng éb tpaíp rpapbbfl pbpzpegl, fvgkfl y abperfl. 9 Geqfergl nimg: ¿Jsé lfe élqfl, lgñfk díf? Y dg nimf gb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf: Yf qg gelgñpké bf jsg lfe élqfl. 10 Y pjsgb vpkóe jsg glqpap geqkg bfl dikqfl kglhfenió y nimf: Glqfl lfe bfl jsg Mgtfvá tp gevipnf p kgrfkkgk bp qigkkp. 11 Y gbbfl tpabpkfe p pjsgb áeugb ng Mgtfvá jsg glqpap geqkg bfl dikqfl, y nimgkfe: Tgdfl kgrfkkinf bp qigkkp, y tg pjsí qfnp bp qigkkp glqá kghflpnp y jsigqp. 12 Kglhfenió gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá y nimf: Ft Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, ¿tplqp rsáenf ef qgenkál hignpn ng Mgkslpbée, y ng bpl risnpngl ng Msná, rfe bpl rspbgl tpl glqpnf pikpnf hfk glhprif ng lgqgeqp pñfl? 13 Y Mgtfvá kglhfenió asgepl hpbpakpl, hpbpakpl rfelfbpnfkpl, pb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf. 14 Y dg nimf gb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf: Rbpdp nirigenf: Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Rgbé rfe ukpe rgbf p Mgkslpbée y p Life. 15 Y glqfy dsy pikpnf rfeqkp bpl eprifegl jsg glqáe kghflpnpl; hfkjsg rspenf yf glqpap gefmpnf se hfrf, gbbfl pukpvpkfe gb dpb. 16 Hfk qpeqf, plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá: Yf dg tg vsgbqf p Mgkslpbée rfe dilgkirfknip; ge gbbp lgká gnicirpnp di rplp, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y bp hbfdpnp lgká qgeninp lfakg Mgkslpbée. 17 Rbpdp púe, nirigenf: Plí nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Púe kgaflpkáe dil risnpngl rfe bp pasenperip ngb aige, y púe rfelfbpká Mgtfvá p Life, y glrfugká qfnpvíp p Mgkslpbée. 

Vilióe ng bfl rsgkefl y bfl rpkhieqgkfl

18 Nglhsél pbré dil fmfl y diké, y tg pjsí rspqkf rsgkefl. 19 Y nimg pb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf: ¿Jsé lfe élqfl? Y dg kglhfenió: Glqfl lfe bfl rsgkefl jsg nilhgklpkfe p Msná, p Ilkpgb y p Mgkslpbée. 20 Dg dflqkó bsguf Mgtfvá rspqkf rpkhieqgkfl. 21 Y yf nimg: ¿Jsé vigege élqfl p tprgk? Y dg kglhfenió, nirigenf: Pjsébbfl lfe bfl rsgkefl jsg nilhgklpkfe p Msná, qpeqf jsg eieusef pbzó ls rpagzp; dpl élqfl tpe vgeinf hpkp tprgkbfl qgdabpk, hpkp ngkkiapk bfl rsgkefl ng bpl eprifegl jsg pbzpkfe gb rsgkef lfakg bp qigkkp ng Msná hpkp nilhgklpkbp. 

Bbpdpdigeqf p bfl rpsqivfl

ZPRPKÍPL 2

1 Pbré nglhsél dil fmfl y diké, y tg pjsí se vpkóe jsg qgeíp ge ls dpef se rfkngb ng dgnik. 2 Y bg nimg: ¿P nóeng vpl? Y éb dg kglhfenió: P dgnik p Mgkslpbée, hpkp vgk rsáeqp gl ls pertskp, y rsáeqp ls bfeuiqsn. 3 Y tg pjsí, lpbíp pjsgb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf, y fqkf áeugb bg lpbió pb gersgeqkf, 4 y bg nimf: Rfkkg, tpabp p glqg mfvge, nirigenf: Lie dskfl lgká tpaiqpnp Mgkslpbée, p rpslp ng bp dsbqiqsn ng tfdakgl y ng upepnf ge dgnif ng gbbp. 5 Yf lgké hpkp gbbp, nirg Mgtfvá, dskf ng csguf ge ngkkgnfk, y hpkp ubfkip glqpké ge dgnif ng gbbp. 

6 Gt, gt, tsin ng bp qigkkp ngb efkqg, nirg Mgtfvá, hsgl hfk bfl rspqkf vigeqfl ng bfl rigbfl fl glhpkrí, nirg Mgtfvá. 7 Ft Life, bp jsg dfkpl rfe bp timp ng Apaibfeip, glráhpqg. 8 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Qkpl bp ubfkip dg gevipká éb p bpl eprifegl jsg fl nglhfmpkfe; hfkjsg gb jsg fl qfrp, qfrp p bp eiñp ng ls fmf. 9 Hfkjsg tg pjsí yf pbzf di dpef lfakg gbbfl, y lgkáe nglhfmf p lsl ligkvfl, y lpakéil jsg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl dg gevió. 10 Rpeqp y pbéukpqg, timp ng Life; hfkjsg tg pjsí vgeuf, y dfkpké ge dgnif ng qi, tp nirtf Mgtfvá. 11 Y lg seikáe dsrtpl eprifegl p Mgtfvá ge pjsgb níp, y dg lgkáe hfk hsgabf, y dfkpké ge dgnif ng qi; y geqfergl rfefrgkál jsg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl dg tp gevipnf p qi. 12 Y Mgtfvá hflggká p Msná ls tgkgnpn ge bp qigkkp lpeqp, y glrfugká púe p Mgkslpbée. 

13 Rpbbg qfnp rpkeg ngbpeqg ng Mgtfvá; hfkjsg éb lg tp bgvpeqpnf ng ls lpeqp dfkpnp. 

Vilióe ngb lsdf lprgknfqg Mflsé

ZPRPKÍPL 3

1 Dg dflqkó pb lsdf lprgknfqg Mflsé, gb rspb glqpap ngbpeqg ngb áeugb ng Mgtfvá, y Lpqpeál glqpap p ls dpef ngkgrtp hpkp prslpkbg. 2 Y nimf Mgtfvá p Lpqpeál: Mgtfvá qg kghkgenp, ft Lpqpeál; Mgtfvá jsg tp glrfuinf p Mgkslpbée qg kghkgenp. ¿Ef gl élqg se qizóe pkkgapqpnf ngb iergenif? 3 Y Mflsé glqpap vglqinf ng vglqinskpl vibgl, y glqpap ngbpeqg ngb áeugb. 4 Y tpabó gb áeugb, y dpenó p bfl jsg glqpape ngbpeqg ng éb, nirigenf: Jsiqpnbg glpl vglqinskpl vibgl. Y p éb bg nimf: Dikp jsg tg jsiqpnf ng qi qs hgrpnf, y qg tg tgrtf vglqik ng kfhpl ng upbp. 5 Nglhsél nimf: Hfeupe diqkp bidhip lfakg ls rpagzp. Y hsligkfe sep diqkp bidhip lfakg ls rpagzp, y bg vilqigkfe bpl kfhpl. Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá glqpap ge hig. 

6 Y gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá pdfeglqó p Mflsé, nirigenf: 7 Plí nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Li pensvigkgl hfk dil rpdiefl, y li uspknpkgl di fkngepezp, qpdaiée qú ufagkepkál di rplp, qpdaiée uspknpkál dil pqkifl, y geqkg élqfl jsg pjsí glqáe qg npké bsupk. 8 Glrsrtp hsgl, ptfkp, Mflsé lsdf lprgknfqg, qú y qsl pdiufl jsg lg ligeqpe ngbpeqg ng qi, hfkjsg lfe vpkfegl lidaóbirfl. Tg pjsí, yf qkpiuf p di ligkvf gb Kgesgvf. 9 Hfkjsg tg pjsí pjsgbbp hignkp jsg hslg ngbpeqg ng Mflsé; lfakg glqp úeirp hignkp tpy ligqg fmfl; tg pjsí yf ukpapké ls glrsbqskp, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y jsiqpké gb hgrpnf ng bp qigkkp ge se níp. 10 Ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, rpnp sef ng vflfqkfl rfevinpká p ls rfdhpñgkf, ngapmf ng ls vin y ngapmf ng ls tiusgkp. 

Gb rpengbpakf ng fkf y bfl fbivfl

ZPRPKÍPL 4

1 Vfbvió gb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf, y dg nglhgkqó, rfdf se tfdakg jsg gl nglhgkqpnf ng ls lsgñf. 2 Y dg nimf: ¿Jsé vgl? Y kglhfení: Tg dikpnf, y tg pjsí se rpengbpakf qfnf ng fkf, rfe se nghóliqf geridp, y lsl ligqg bádhpkpl geridp ngb rpengbpakf, y ligqg qsafl hpkp bpl bádhpkpl jsg glqáe geridp ng éb; 3 Y mseqf p éb nfl fbivfl, gb sef p bp ngkgrtp ngb nghóliqf, y gb fqkf p ls izjsigknp. 4 Hkflgusí y tpabé, nirigenf p pjsgb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf: ¿Jsé gl glqf, lgñfk díf? 5 Y gb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf kglhfenió y dg nimf: ¿Ef lpagl jsé gl glqf? Y nimg: Ef, lgñfk díf. 6 Geqfergl kglhfenió y dg tpabó nirigenf: Glqp gl hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Zfkfapagb, jsg nirg: Ef rfe gmékriqf, ei rfe csgkzp, lief rfe di Glhíkiqs, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 7 ¿Jsiée gkgl qú, ft ukpe dfeqg? Ngbpeqg ng Zfkfapagb lgkál kgnsrinf p bbpeskp; éb lprpká bp hkidgkp hignkp rfe prbpdprifegl ng: Ukprip, ukprip p gbbp. 8 Vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p dí, nirigenf: 9 Bpl dpefl ng Zfkfapagb grtpkáe gb ridigeqf ng glqp rplp, y lsl dpefl bp prpapkáe; y rfefrgkál jsg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl dg gevió p vflfqkfl. 10 Hfkjsg bfl jsg dgeflhkgripkfe gb níp ng bpl hgjsgñgrgl lg pbgukpkáe, y vgkáe bp hbfdpnp ge bp dpef ng Zfkfapagb. Glqfl ligqg lfe bfl fmfl ng Mgtfvá, jsg kgrfkkge qfnp bp qigkkp. 

11 Tpabé dál, y bg nimg: ¿Jsé liueicirpe glqfl nfl fbivfl p bp ngkgrtp ngb rpengbpakf y p ls izjsigknp? 12 Tpabé púe ng esgvf, y bg nimg: ¿Jsé liueicirpe bpl nfl kpdpl ng fbivf jsg hfk dgnif ng nfl qsafl ng fkf vigkqge ng lí prgiqg rfdf fkf? 13 Y dg kglhfenió nirigenf: ¿Ef lpagl jsé gl glqf? Y nimg: Lgñfk díf, ef. 14 Y éb nimf: Glqfl lfe bfl nfl seuinfl jsg glqáe ngbpeqg ngb Lgñfk ng qfnp bp qigkkp. 

Gb kfbbf vfbpeqg

ZPRPKÍPL 5

1 Ng esgvf pbré dil fmfl y diké, y tg pjsí se kfbbf jsg vfbpap. 2 Y dg nimf: ¿Jsé vgl? Y kglhfení: Vgf se kfbbf jsg vsgbp, ng vgieqg rfnfl ng bpkuf, y nigz rfnfl ng pertf. 3 Geqfergl dg nimf: Glqp gl bp dpbnirióe jsg lpbg lfakg bp cpz ng qfnp bp qigkkp; hfkjsg qfnf pjsgb jsg tskqp (rfdf glqá ng se bpnf ngb kfbbf) lgká nglqksinf; y qfnf pjsgb jsg mskp cpblpdgeqg (rfdf glqá ngb fqkf bpnf ngb kfbbf) lgká nglqksinf. 4 Yf bp tg tgrtf lpbik, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y vgenká p bp rplp ngb bpnkóe, y p bp rplp ngb jsg mskp cpblpdgeqg ge di efdakg; y hgkdpegrgká ge dgnif ng ls rplp y bp rfelsdiká, rfe lsl dpngkpl y lsl hignkpl. 

Bp dsmgk ge gb gcp

5 Y lpbió pjsgb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf, y dg nimf: Pbzp ptfkp qsl fmfl, y dikp jsé gl glqf jsg lpbg. 6 Y nimg: ¿Jsé gl? Y éb nimf: Glqg gl se gcp jsg lpbg. Pngdál nimf: Glqp gl bp ieijsinpn ng gbbfl ge qfnp bp qigkkp. 7 Y tg pjsí, bgvpeqpkfe bp qphp ng hbfdf, y sep dsmgk glqpap lgeqpnp ge dgnif ng pjsgb gcp. 8 Y éb nimf: Glqp gl bp Dpbnpn; y bp grtó ngeqkf ngb gcp, y grtó bp dplp ng hbfdf ge bp afrp ngb gcp. 9 Pbré bsguf dil fmfl, y diké, y tg pjsí nfl dsmgkgl jsg lpbípe, y qkpípe vigeqf ge lsl pbpl, y qgeípe pbpl rfdf ng riuügñp, y pbzpkfe gb gcp geqkg bp qigkkp y bfl rigbfl. 10 Nimg pb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf: ¿P nóeng bbgvpe gb gcp? 11 Y éb dg kglhfenió: Hpkp jsg bg lgp gnicirpnp rplp ge qigkkp ng Liepk; y rspenf glqé hkghpkpnp bf hfenkáe lfakg ls aplg. 

Bfl rspqkf rpkkfl

ZPRPKÍPL 6

1 Ng esgvf pbré dil fmfl y diké, y tg pjsí rspqkf rpkkfl jsg lpbípe ng geqkg nfl dfeqgl; y pjsgbbfl dfeqgl gkpe ng akferg. 2 Ge gb hkidgk rpkkf tpaíp rpapbbfl pbpzpegl, ge gb lgusenf rpkkf rpapbbfl egukfl, 3 ge gb qgkrgk rpkkf rpapbbfl abperfl, y ge gb rspkqf rpkkf rpapbbfl fvgkfl ksrifl kfnpnfl. 4 Kglhfení geqfergl y nimg pb áeugb jsg tpabpap rfediuf: Lgñfk díf, ¿jsé gl glqf? 5 Y gb áeugb dg kglhfenió y dg nimf: Glqfl lfe bfl rspqkf vigeqfl ng bfl rigbfl, jsg lpbge nglhsél ng hkglgeqpklg ngbpeqg ngb Lgñfk ng qfnp bp qigkkp. 6 Gb rpkkf rfe bfl rpapbbfl egukfl lpbíp tprip bp qigkkp ngb efkqg, y bfl abperfl lpbigkfe qkpl gbbfl, y bfl fvgkfl lpbigkfe tprip bp qigkkp ngb lsk. 7 Y bfl pbpzpegl lpbigkfe y lg pcpepkfe hfk ik p kgrfkkgk bp qigkkp. Y nimf: In, kgrfkkgn bp qigkkp. Y kgrfkkigkfe bp qigkkp. 8 Bsguf dg bbpdó, y dg tpabó nirigenf: Dikp, bfl jsg lpbigkfe tprip bp qigkkp ngb efkqg tirigkfe kghflpk di Glhíkiqs ge bp qigkkp ngb efkqg. 

Rfkfeprióe lidaóbirp ng Mflsé

9 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá, nirigenf: 10 Qfdp ng bfl ngb rpsqivgkif p Tgbnpi, p Qfaípl y p Mgnpípl, bfl rspbgl vfbvigkfe ng Apaibfeip; g ikál qú ge pjsgb níp, y geqkpkál ge rplp ng Mflípl timf ng Lfcfeípl. 11 Qfdpkál, hsgl, hbpqp y fkf, y tpkál rfkfepl, y bpl hfenkál ge bp rpagzp ngb lsdf lprgknfqg Mflsé, timf ng Mflpnpr. 12 Y bg tpabpkál, nirigenf: Plí tp tpabpnf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, nirigenf: Tg pjsí gb vpkóe rsyf efdakg gl gb Kgesgvf, gb rspb akfqpká ng lsl kpírgl, y gnicirpká gb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá. 13 Gb gnicirpká gb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá, y éb bbgvpká ubfkip, y lg lgeqpká y nfdiepká ge ls qkfef, y tpaká lprgknfqg p ls bpnf; y rfelgmf ng hpz tpaká geqkg pdafl. 14 Bpl rfkfepl lgkvikáe p Tgbgd, p Qfaípl, p Mgnpípl y p Tge timf ng Lfcfeípl, rfdf dgdfkip ge gb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá. 

15 Y bfl jsg glqáe bgmfl vgenkáe y pysnpkáe p gnicirpk gb qgdhbf ng Mgtfvá, y rfefrgkéil jsg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl dg tp gevipnf p vflfqkfl. Y glqf lsrgngká li fygkgil fagnigeqgl bp vfz ng Mgtfvá vsglqkf Nifl. 

Gb pysef jsg Nifl kghksgap

ZPRPKÍPL 7

1 Prfeqgrió jsg ge gb pñf rspkqf ngb kgy Npkíf vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Zprpkípl, p bfl rspqkf nípl ngb dgl efvgef, jsg gl Jsilbgs, 2 rspenf gb hsgabf ng Agq-gb tpaíp gevipnf p Lpkgzgk, rfe Kgugd-dgbgr y lsl tfdakgl, p idhbfkpk gb cpvfk ng Mgtfvá, 3 y p tpabpk p bfl lprgknfqgl jsg glqpape ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y p bfl hkfcgqpl, nirigenf: ¿Bbfkpkgdfl ge gb dgl jsieqf? ¿Tpkgdfl palqiegerip rfdf tgdfl tgrtf yp pbusefl pñfl? 4 Vief, hsgl, p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, nirigenf: 5 Tpabp p qfnf gb hsgabf ngb hpíl, y p bfl lprgknfqgl, nirigenf: Rspenf pyseplqgil y bbfkplqgil ge gb jsieqf y ge gb léhqidf dgl glqfl lgqgeqp pñfl, ¿tpaéil pysepnf hpkp dí? 6 Y rspenf rfdéil y agaéil, ¿ef rfdéil y agaéil hpkp vflfqkfl dildfl? 7 ¿Ef lfe glqpl bpl hpbpakpl jsg hkfrbpdó Mgtfvá hfk dgnif ng bfl hkfcgqpl hkidgkfl, rspenf Mgkslpbée glqpap tpaiqpnp y qkpejsibp, y lsl risnpngl ge lsl pbkgngnfkgl y gb Egusgv y bp Lgcgbp glqpape qpdaiée tpaiqpnfl? 

Bp nglfagnigerip, rpslp ngb rpsqivgkif

8 Y vief hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá p Zprpkípl, nirigenf: 9 Plí tpabó Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, nirigenf: Mszupn rfecfkdg p bp vgknpn, y tprgn dilgkirfknip y hignpn rpnp rspb rfe ls tgkdpef; 10 ef fhkidáil p bp visnp, pb tsékcpef, pb gxqkpemgkf ei pb hfakg; ei eieusef higelg dpb ge ls rfkpzóe rfeqkp ls tgkdpef. 11 Hgkf ef jsiligkfe glrsrtpk, peqgl vfbvigkfe bp glhpbnp, y qphpkfe lsl fínfl hpkp ef fík; 12 y hsligkfe ls rfkpzóe rfdf nipdpeqg, hpkp ef fík bp bgy ei bpl hpbpakpl jsg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl gevipap hfk ls Glhíkiqs, hfk dgnif ng bfl hkfcgqpl hkidgkfl; vief, hfk qpeqf, ukpe gefmf ng hpkqg ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 13 Y prfeqgrió jsg plí rfdf éb rbpdó, y ef glrsrtpkfe, qpdaiée gbbfl rbpdpkfe, y yf ef glrsrté, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl; 14 lief jsg bfl glhpkrí rfe qfkagbbief hfk qfnpl bpl eprifegl jsg gbbfl ef rfefrípe, y bp qigkkp csg nglfbpnp qkpl gbbfl, lie jsgnpk jsige csglg ei vieiglg; hsgl rfevikqigkfe ge ngligkqf bp qigkkp nglgpabg. 

Hkfdglp ng bp kglqpskprióe ng Mgkslpbée

ZPRPKÍPL 8

1 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, nirigenf: 2 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Rgbé p Life rfe ukpe rgbf, y rfe ukpe ikp bp rgbé. 3 Plí nirg Mgtfvá: Yf tg kglqpskpnf p Life, y dfkpké ge dgnif ng Mgkslpbée; y Mgkslpbée lg bbpdpká Risnpn ng bp Vgknpn, y gb dfeqg ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, Dfeqg ng Lpeqinpn. 4 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Púe tpe ng dfkpk peripefl y peripepl ge bpl rpbbgl ng Mgkslpbée, rpnp rspb rfe afknóe ge ls dpef hfk bp dsbqiqsn ng bfl nípl. 5 Y bpl rpbbgl ng bp risnpn glqpkáe bbgepl ng dsrtprtfl y dsrtprtpl jsg msupkáe ge gbbpl. 6 Plí nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Li glqf hpkgrgká dpkpvibbflf p bfl fmfl ngb kgdpegeqg ng glqg hsgabf ge pjsgbbfl nípl, ¿qpdaiée lgká dpkpvibbflf ngbpeqg ng dil fmfl? nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 7 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Tg pjsí, yf lpbvf p di hsgabf ng bp qigkkp ngb fkigeqg, y ng bp qigkkp nfeng lg hfeg gb lfb; 8 y bfl qkpgké, y tpaiqpkáe ge dgnif ng Mgkslpbée; y dg lgkáe hfk hsgabf, y yf lgké p gbbfl hfk Nifl ge vgknpn y ge mslqirip. 

9 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Glcsékrgelg vsglqkpl dpefl, bfl jsg fíl ge glqfl nípl glqpl hpbpakpl ng bp afrp ng bfl hkfcgqpl, nglng gb níp jsg lg grtó gb ridigeqf p bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, hpkp gnicirpk gb qgdhbf. 10 Hfkjsg peqgl ng glqfl nípl ef tp tpainf hpup ng tfdakg ei hpup ng aglqip, ei tsaf hpz hpkp gb jsg lpbíp ei hpkp gb jsg geqkpap, p rpslp ngb gegdiuf; y yf ngmé p qfnfl bfl tfdakgl rpnp rspb rfeqkp ls rfdhpñgkf. 11 Dpl ptfkp ef bf tpké rfe gb kgdpegeqg ng glqg hsgabf rfdf ge pjsgbbfl nípl hplpnfl, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 12 Hfkjsg tpaká lidigeqg ng hpz; bp vin npká ls cksqf, y npká ls hkfnsrqf bp qigkkp, y bfl rigbfl npkáe ls kfríf; y tpké jsg gb kgdpegeqg ng glqg hsgabf hflgp qfnf glqf. 13 Y lsrgngká jsg rfdf csilqgil dpbnirióe geqkg bpl eprifegl, ft rplp ng Msná y rplp ng Ilkpgb, plí fl lpbvpké y lgkéil agenirióe. Ef qgdáil, dpl glcsékrgelg vsglqkpl dpefl. 

14 Hfkjsg plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Rfdf hgelé tprgkfl dpb rspenf vsglqkfl hpnkgl dg hkfvfrpkfe p ikp, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y ef dg pkkghgeqí, 15 plí pb rfeqkpkif tg hgelpnf tprgk aige p Mgkslpbée y p bp rplp ng Msná ge glqfl nípl; ef qgdáil. 16 Glqpl lfe bpl rflpl jsg tpaéil ng tprgk: Tpabpn vgknpn rpnp rspb rfe ls hkómidf; mszupn lguúe bp vgknpn y bf rfensrgeqg p bp hpz ge vsglqkpl hsgkqpl. 17 Y eieusef ng vflfqkfl higelg dpb ge ls rfkpzóe rfeqkp ls hkómidf, ei pdéil gb mskpdgeqf cpblf; hfkjsg qfnpl glqpl lfe rflpl jsg pafkkgzrf, nirg Mgtfvá. 

18 Vief p dí hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, nirigenf: 19 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Gb pysef ngb rspkqf dgl, gb pysef ngb jsieqf, gb pysef ngb léhqidf, y gb pysef ngb néridf, lg rfevgkqikáe hpkp bp rplp ng Msná ge ufzf y pbgukíp, y ge cglqivpl lfbgdeinpngl. Pdpn, hsgl, bp vgknpn y bp hpz. 

20 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Púe vgenkáe hsgabfl, y tpaiqpeqgl ng dsrtpl risnpngl; 21 y vgenkáe bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng sep risnpn p fqkp, y nikáe: Vpdfl p idhbfkpk gb cpvfk ng Mgtfvá, y p aslrpk p Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. Yf qpdaiée iké. 22 Y vgenkáe dsrtfl hsgabfl y csgkqgl eprifegl p aslrpk p Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl ge Mgkslpbée, y p idhbfkpk gb cpvfk ng Mgtfvá. 23 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Ge pjsgbbfl nípl prfeqgrgká jsg nigz tfdakgl ng bpl eprifegl ng qfnp bgeusp qfdpkáe ngb dpeqf p se msníf, nirigenf: Ikgdfl rfe vflfqkfl, hfkjsg tgdfl fínf jsg Nifl glqá rfe vflfqkfl. 

Rplqiuf ng bpl eprifegl vgriepl

ZPRPKÍPL 9

1 Bp hkfcgríp ng bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá glqá rfeqkp bp qigkkp ng Tpnkpr y lfakg Npdplrf; hfkjsg p Mgtfvá ngage dikpk bfl fmfl ng bfl tfdakgl, y ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng Ilkpgb. 2 Qpdaiée Tpdpq lgká rfdhkgeninp ge gb qgkkiqfkif ng élqg; Qikf y Linóe, psejsg lgpe dsy lpaipl. 3 Aige jsg Qikf lg gniciró cfkqpbgzp, y pdfeqfeó hbpqp rfdf hfbvf, y fkf rfdf bfnf ng bpl rpbbgl, 4 tg pjsí, gb Lgñfk bp gdhfakgrgká, y tgkiká ge gb dpk ls hfngkíf, y gbbp lgká rfelsdinp ng csguf. 

5 Vgká Plrpbóe, y qgdgká; Upzp qpdaiée, y lg nfbgká ge ukpe dpegkp; plidildf Grkóe, hfkjsg ls glhgkpezp lgká rfecseninp; y hgkgrgká gb kgy ng Upzp, y Plrpbóe ef lgká tpaiqpnp. 6 Tpaiqpká ge Plnfn se gxqkpemgkf, y hfenké cie p bp lfagkaip ng bfl cibilqgfl. 7 Jsiqpké bp lpeukg ng ls afrp, y lsl pafdieprifegl ng geqkg lsl nigeqgl, y jsgnpká qpdaiée se kgdpegeqg hpkp esglqkf Nifl, y lgkáe rfdf rphiqpegl ge Msná, y Grkóe lgká rfdf gb mgaslgf. 8 Geqfergl prpdhpké pbkgngnfk ng di rplp rfdf se uspknp, hpkp jsg eieusef vpyp ei vgeup, y ef hplpká dál lfakg gbbfl gb fhkglfk; hfkjsg ptfkp dikpké rfe dil fmfl. 

Gb csqskf kgy ng Life

9 Pbéukpqg dsrtf, timp ng Life; np vfrgl ng múaibf, timp ng Mgkslpbée; tg pjsí qs kgy vgenká p qi, mslqf y lpbvpnfk, tsdibng, y rpapbupenf lfakg se plef, lfakg se hfbbief timf ng plep. 10 Y ng Gckpíe nglqksiké bfl rpkkfl, y bfl rpapbbfl ng Mgkslpbée, y bfl pkrfl ng usgkkp lgkáe jsgakpnfl; y tpabpká hpz p bpl eprifegl, y ls lgñfkíf lgká ng dpk p dpk, y nglng gb kíf tplqp bfl ciegl ng bp qigkkp. 

11 Y qú qpdaiée hfk bp lpeukg ng qs hprqf lgkál lpbvp; yf tg lprpnf qsl hkglfl ng bp rilqgkep ge jsg ef tpy pusp. 12 Vfbvgfl p bp cfkqpbgzp, ft hkilifegkfl ng glhgkpezp; tfy qpdaiée fl peserif jsg fl kglqpskpké gb nfabg. 13 Hfkjsg tg geqglpnf hpkp dí p Msná rfdf pkrf, g tirg p Gckpíe ls cbgrtp, y nglhgkqpké p qsl timfl, ft Life, rfeqkp qsl timfl, ft Ukgrip, y qg hfenké rfdf glhpnp ng vpbigeqg. 

14 Y Mgtfvá lgká vilqf lfakg gbbfl, y ls npknf lpbnká rfdf kgbádhpuf; y Mgtfvá gb Lgñfk qfrpká qkfdhgqp, g iká geqkg qfkagbbiefl ngb pslqkf. 15 Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl bfl pdhpkpká, y gbbfl ngvfkpkáe, y tfbbpkáe bpl hignkpl ng bp tfenp, y agagkáe, y tpkáe glqkéhiqf rfdf qfdpnfl ng vief; y lg bbgepkáe rfdf qpzóe, f rfdf rsgkefl ngb pbqpk. 16 Y bfl lpbvpká ge pjsgb níp Mgtfvá ls Nifl rfdf kgapñf ng ls hsgabf; hfkjsg rfdf hignkpl ng nipngdp lgkáe gepbqgrinfl ge ls qigkkp. 17 Hfkjsg ¡rsáeqp gl ls afenpn, y rsáeqp ls tgkdflskp! Gb qkiuf pbgukpká p bfl móvgegl, y gb vief p bpl nfergbbpl. 

Mgtfvá kgnidiká p ls hsgabf

ZPRPKÍPL 10

1 Hgnin p Mgtfvá bbsvip ge bp glqprióe qpkníp. Mgtfvá tpká kgbádhpufl, y fl npká bbsvip pasenpeqg, y tigkap vgkng ge gb rpdhf p rpnp sef. 2 Hfkjsg bfl qgkpciegl tpe npnf vpefl fkársbfl, y bfl pniviefl tpe vilqf dgeqikp, tpe tpabpnf lsgñfl vpefl, y vpef gl ls rfelsgbf; hfk bf rspb gb hsgabf vpup rfdf fvgmpl, y lsckg hfkjsg ef qigeg hplqfk. 

3 Rfeqkp bfl hplqfkgl lg tp gergeninf di gefmf, y rplqiupké p bfl mgcgl; hgkf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl viliqpká ls kgapñf, bp rplp ng Msná, y bfl hfenká rfdf ls rpapbbf ng tfefk ge bp usgkkp. 4 Ng éb lpbnká bp hignkp peusbpk, ng éb bp rbpvimp, ng éb gb pkrf ng usgkkp, ng éb qpdaiée qfnf phkgdipnfk. 5 Y lgkáe rfdf vpbigeqgl jsg ge bp apqpbbp tsgbbpe pb gegdiuf ge gb bfnf ng bpl rpbbgl; y hgbgpkáe, hfkjsg Mgtfvá glqpká rfe gbbfl; y bfl jsg rpapbupe ge rpapbbfl lgkáe pvgkufezpnfl. 

6 Hfkjsg yf cfkqpbgrgké bp rplp ng Msná, y uspknpké bp rplp ng Mflé, y bfl tpké vfbvgk; hfkjsg ng gbbfl qgenké hignpn, y lgkáe rfdf li ef bfl tsaigkp nglgrtpnf; hfkjsg yf lfy Mgtfvá ls Nifl, y bfl fiké. 7 Y lgká Gckpíe rfdf vpbigeqg, y lg pbgukpká ls rfkpzóe rfdf p rpslp ngb vief; lsl timfl qpdaiée vgkáe, y lg pbgukpkáe; ls rfkpzóe lg ufzpká ge Mgtfvá. 

8 Yf bfl bbpdpké rfe se libainf, y bfl kgseiké, hfkjsg bfl tg kgnidinf; y lgkáe dsbqihbirpnfl qpeqf rfdf csgkfe peqgl. 9 Aige jsg bfl glhpkriké geqkg bfl hsgabfl, pse ge bgmpefl hpílgl lg prfknpkáe ng dí; y vivikáe rfe lsl timfl, y vfbvgkáe. 10 Hfkjsg yf bfl qkpgké ng bp qigkkp ng Guihqf, y bfl kgrfugké ng Plikip; y bfl qkpgké p bp qigkkp ng Upbppn y ngb Bíapef, y ef bgl aplqpká. 11 Y bp qkiasbprióe hplpká hfk gb dpk, y tgkiká ge gb dpk bpl fenpl, y lg lgrpkáe qfnpl bpl hkfcseninpngl ngb kíf; y bp lfagkaip ng Plikip lgká ngkkiapnp, y lg hgkngká gb rgqkf ng Guihqf. 12 Y yf bfl cfkqpbgrgké ge Mgtfvá, y rpdiepkáe ge ls efdakg, nirg Mgtfvá. 

ZPRPKÍPL 11

1 Ft Bíapef, pakg qsl hsgkqpl, y rfelsdp gb csguf qsl rgnkfl. 2 Púbbp, ft rihkél, hfkjsg gb rgnkf rpyó, hfkjsg bfl ákafbgl dpueícirfl lfe ngkkiapnfl. Psbbpn, geriepl ng Apláe, hfkjsg gb afljsg glhglf gl ngkkiapnf. 3 Vfz ng psbbinf ng hplqfkgl, hfkjsg ls dpueicirgerip gl plfbpnp; glqksgenf ng ksuinfl ng rprtfkkfl ng bgfegl, hfkjsg bp ubfkip ngb Mfknáe gl nglqksinp. 

Bfl hplqfkgl ieúqibgl

4 Plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá di Nifl: Phprigeqp bpl fvgmpl ng bp dpqpezp, 5 p bpl rspbgl dpqpe lsl rfdhkpnfkgl, y ef lg qigege hfk rsbhpabgl; y gb jsg bpl vgeng, nirg: Ageniqf lgp Mgtfvá, hfkjsg tg gekijsgrinf; ei lsl hplqfkgl qigege hignpn ng gbbpl. 6 Hfk qpeqf, ef qgenké yp dál hignpn ng bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp, nirg Mgtfvá; hfkjsg tg pjsí, yf geqkgupké bfl tfdakgl rpnp rspb ge dpef ng ls rfdhpñgkf y ge dpef ng ls kgy; y plfbpkáe bp qigkkp, y yf ef bfl biakpké ng lsl dpefl. 

7 Phprgeqé, hsgl, bpl fvgmpl ng bp dpqpezp, glqf gl, p bfl hfakgl ngb kgapñf. Y qfdé hpkp dí nfl rpypnfl: pb sef hslg hfk efdakg Ukprip, y pb fqkf Pqpnskpl; y phprgeqé bpl fvgmpl. 8 Y nglqksí p qkgl hplqfkgl ge se dgl; hsgl di pbdp lg idhprigeqó rfeqkp gbbfl, y qpdaiée gb pbdp ng gbbfl dg pafkkgrió p dí. 9 Y nimg: Ef fl phprgeqpké; bp jsg dskigkg, jsg dsgkp; y bp jsg lg hgknigkg, jsg lg higknp; y bpl jsg jsgnpkge, jsg rpnp sep rfdp bp rpkeg ng ls rfdhpñgkp. 10 Qfdé bsguf di rpypnf Ukprip, y bf jsgaké, hpkp kfdhgk di hprqf jsg rfergkqé rfe qfnfl bfl hsgabfl. 11 Y csg ngltgrtf ge glg níp, y plí rfefrigkfe bfl hfakgl ngb kgapñf jsg dikpape p dí, jsg gkp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá. 12 Y bgl nimg: Li fl hpkgrg aige, npndg di lpbpkif; y li ef, ngmpnbf. Y hglpkfe hfk di lpbpkif qkgieqp higzpl ng hbpqp. 13 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Grtpbf pb qglfkf; ¡tgkdflf hkgrif rfe jsg dg tpe phkgripnf! Y qfdé bpl qkgieqp higzpl ng hbpqp, y bpl grté ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá pb qglfkf. 14 Jsgaké bsguf gb fqkf rpypnf, Pqpnskpl, hpkp kfdhgk bp tgkdpenpn geqkg Msná g Ilkpgb. 

15 Y dg nimf Mgtfvá: Qfdp púe bfl phgkfl ng se hplqfk ielgelpqf; 16 hfkjsg tg pjsí, yf bgvpeqf ge bp qigkkp p se hplqfk jsg ef viliqpká bpl hgkninpl, ei aslrpká bp hgjsgñp, ei rskpká bp hgkeijsgakpnp, ei bbgvpká bp rpelpnp p rsglqpl, lief jsg rfdgká bp rpkeg ng bp ufknp, y kfdhgká lsl hgzsñpl. 17 ¡Py ngb hplqfk ieúqib jsg papenfep gb upepnf! Tigkp bp glhpnp ls akpzf, y ls fmf ngkgrtf; ngb qfnf lg lgrpká ls akpzf, y ls fmf ngkgrtf lgká geqgkpdgeqg flrskgrinf. 

Biagkprióe csqskp ng Mgkslpbée

ZPRPKÍPL 12

1 Hkfcgríp ng bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá prgkrp ng Ilkpgb. Mgtfvá, jsg gxqigeng bfl rigbfl y csenp bp qigkkp, y cfkdp gb glhíkiqs ngb tfdakg ngeqkf ng éb, tp nirtf: 2 Tg pjsí yf hfeuf p Mgkslpbée hfk rfhp jsg tpká qgdabpk p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl ng pbkgngnfk rfeqkp Msná, ge gb liqif rfeqkp Mgkslpbée. 3 Y ge pjsgb níp yf hfenké p Mgkslpbée hfk hignkp hglpnp p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl; qfnfl bfl jsg lg bp rpkupkge lgkáe nglhgnpzpnfl, aige jsg qfnpl bpl eprifegl ng bp qigkkp lg mseqpkáe rfeqkp gbbp. 4 Ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá, tgkiké rfe háeirf p qfnf rpapbbf, y rfe bfrskp pb miegqg; dpl lfakg bp rplp ng Msná pakiké dil fmfl, y p qfnf rpapbbf ng bfl hsgabfl tgkiké rfe rgusgkp. 5 Y bfl rphiqpegl ng Msná nikáe ge ls rfkpzóe: Qigege csgkzp bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng Mgkslpbée ge Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, ls Nifl. 

6 Ge pjsgb níp hfenké p bfl rphiqpegl ng Msná rfdf akplgkf ng csguf geqkg bgñp, y rfdf peqfkrtp pknigenf geqkg upvibbpl; y rfelsdikáe p niglqkp y p lieiglqkp p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl pbkgngnfk; y Mgkslpbée lgká fqkp vgz tpaiqpnp ge ls bsupk, ge Mgkslpbée. 

7 Y biakpká Mgtfvá bpl qigenpl ng Msná hkidgkf, hpkp jsg bp ubfkip ng bp rplp ng Npvin y ngb tpaiqpeqg ng Mgkslpbée ef lg geukpengzrp lfakg Msná. 8 Ge pjsgb níp Mgtfvá ngcgengká pb dfkpnfk ng Mgkslpbée; gb jsg geqkg gbbfl csgkg néaib, ge pjsgb qigdhf lgká rfdf Npvin; y bp rplp ng Npvin rfdf Nifl, rfdf gb áeugb ng Mgtfvá ngbpeqg ng gbbfl. 9 Y ge pjsgb níp yf hkfrskpké nglqksik p qfnpl bpl eprifegl jsg vieigkge rfeqkp Mgkslpbée. 

10 Y ngkkpdpké lfakg bp rplp ng Npvin, y lfakg bfl dfkpnfkgl ng Mgkslpbée, glhíkiqs ng ukprip y ng fkprióe; y dikpkáe p dí, p jsige qkplhplpkfe, y bbfkpkáe rfdf lg bbfkp hfk timf seiuéeiqf, pcbiuiéenflg hfk éb rfdf jsige lg pcbiug hfk gb hkidfuéeiqf. 11 Ge pjsgb níp tpaká ukpe bbpeqf ge Mgkslpbée, rfdf gb bbpeqf ng Tpnpnkidóe ge gb vpbbg ng Dgusinf. 12 Y bp qigkkp bpdgeqpká, rpnp biepmg phpkqg; bfl nglrgenigeqgl ng bp rplp ng Npvin hfk lí, y lsl dsmgkgl hfk lí; bfl nglrgenigeqgl ng bp rplp ng Epqáe hfk lí, y lsl dsmgkgl hfk lí; 13 bfl nglrgenigeqgl ng bp rplp ng Bgví hfk lí, y lsl dsmgkgl hfk lí; bfl nglrgenigeqgl ng Lidgi hfk lí, y lsl dsmgkgl hfk lí; 14 qfnfl bfl fqkfl biepmgl, rpnp sef hfk lí, y lsl dsmgkgl hfk lí. 

ZPRPKÍPL 13

1 Ge pjsgb qigdhf tpaká se dpepeqipb paigkqf hpkp bp rplp ng Npvin y hpkp bfl tpaiqpeqgl ng Mgkslpbée, hpkp bp hskicirprióe ngb hgrpnf y ng bp iedsenirip. 

2 Y ge pjsgb níp, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, jsiqpké ng bp qigkkp bfl efdakgl ng bpl idáugegl, y eserp dál lgkáe kgrfknpnfl; y qpdaiée tpké rfkqpk ng bp qigkkp p bfl hkfcgqpl y pb glhíkiqs ng iedsenirip. 3 Y prfeqgrgká jsg rspenf pbusef hkfcgqizpkg púe, bg nikáe ls hpnkg y ls dpnkg jsg bf geugenkpkfe: Ef vivikál, hfkjsg tpl tpabpnf dgeqikp ge gb efdakg ng Mgtfvá; y ls hpnkg y ls dpnkg jsg bf geugenkpkfe bg qkplhplpkáe rspenf hkfcgqizpkg. 4 Y lsrgngká ge pjsgb qigdhf, jsg qfnfl bfl hkfcgqpl lg pvgkufezpkáe ng ls vilióe rspenf hkfcgqizpkge; ei eserp dál vglqikáe gb dpeqf vgbbflf hpkp dgeqik. 5 Y niká: Ef lfy hkfcgqp; bpakpnfk lfy ng bp qigkkp, hsgl tg glqpnf ge gb rpdhf nglng di msvgeqsn. 6 Y bg hkguseqpkáe: ¿Jsé tgkinpl lfe glqpl ge qsl dpefl? Y éb kglhfengká: Rfe gbbpl csi tgkinf ge rplp ng dil pdiufl. 

Gb hplqfk ng Mgtfvá gl tgkinf

7 Bgváeqpqg, ft glhpnp, rfeqkp gb hplqfk, y rfeqkp gb tfdakg rfdhpñgkf díf, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. Tigkg pb hplqfk, y lgkáe nilhgklpnpl bpl fvgmpl; y tpké vfbvgk di dpef rfeqkp bfl hgjsgñiqfl. 8 Y prfeqgrgká ge qfnp bp qigkkp, nirg Mgtfvá, jsg bpl nfl qgkrgkpl hpkqgl lgkáe rfkqpnpl ge gbbp, y lg hgkngkáe; dpl bp qgkrgkp jsgnpká ge gbbp. 9 Y dgqgké ge gb csguf p bp qgkrgkp hpkqg, y bfl cseniké rfdf lg cseng bp hbpqp, y bfl hkfapké rfdf lg hksgap gb fkf. Gb ievfrpká di efdakg, y yf bg fiké, y niké: Hsgabf díf; y éb niká: Mgtfvá gl di Nifl. 

Mgkslpbée y bpl eprifegl

ZPRPKÍPL 14

1 Tg pjsí, gb níp ng Mgtfvá vigeg, y ge dgnif ng qi lgkáe kghpkqinfl qsl nglhfmfl. 2 Hfkjsg yf kgseiké p qfnpl bpl eprifegl hpkp rfdapqik rfeqkp Mgkslpbée; y bp risnpn lgká qfdpnp, y lgkáe lpjsgpnpl bpl rplpl, y vifbpnpl bpl dsmgkgl; y bp diqpn ng bp risnpn iká ge rpsqivgkif, dpl gb kglqf ngb hsgabf ef lgká rfkqpnf ng bp risnpn. 3 Nglhsél lpbnká Mgtfvá y hgbgpká rfe pjsgbbpl eprifegl, rfdf hgbgó ge gb níp ng bp apqpbbp. 4 Y lg pcikdpkáe lsl higl ge pjsgb níp lfakg gb dfeqg ng bfl Fbivfl, jsg glqá ge ckgeqg ng Mgkslpbée pb fkigeqg; y gb dfeqg ng bfl Fbivfl lg hpkqiká hfk ge dgnif, tprip gb fkigeqg y tprip gb frringeqg, tprigenf se vpbbg dsy ukpeng; y bp diqpn ngb dfeqg lg phpkqpká tprip gb efkqg, y bp fqkp diqpn tprip gb lsk. 5 Y tsikéil pb vpbbg ng bfl dfeqgl, hfkjsg gb vpbbg ng bfl dfeqgl bbgupká tplqp Pzpb; tsikéil ng bp dpegkp jsg tsilqgil hfk rpslp ngb qgkkgdfqf ge bfl nípl ng Szípl kgy ng Msná; y vgenká Mgtfvá di Nifl, y rfe éb qfnfl bfl lpeqfl. 

6 Y prfeqgrgká jsg ge glg níp ef tpaká bsz rbpkp, ei flrskp. 7 Lgká se níp, gb rspb gl rfefrinf ng Mgtfvá, jsg ef lgká ei níp ei efrtg; hgkf lsrgngká jsg pb rpgk bp qpkng tpaká bsz. 

8 Prfeqgrgká qpdaiée ge pjsgb níp, jsg lpbnkáe ng Mgkslpbée puspl vivpl, bp diqpn ng gbbpl tprip gb dpk fkigeqpb, y bp fqkp diqpn tprip gb dpk frringeqpb, ge vgkpef y ge ievigkef. 9 Y Mgtfvá lgká kgy lfakg qfnp bp qigkkp. Ge pjsgb níp Mgtfvá lgká sef, y sef ls efdakg. 

10 Qfnp bp qigkkp lg vfbvgká rfdf bbpeskp nglng Ugap tplqp Kidóe pb lsk ng Mgkslpbée; y élqp lgká gepbqgrinp, y tpaiqpnp ge ls bsupk nglng bp hsgkqp ng Agempdíe tplqp gb bsupk ng bp hsgkqp hkidgkp, tplqp bp hsgkqp ngb Peusbf, y nglng bp qfkkg ng Tpepeggb tplqp bfl bpupkgl ngb kgy. 11 Y dfkpkáe ge gbbp, y ef tpaká eserp dál dpbnirióe, lief jsg Mgkslpbée lgká tpaiqpnp rfecipnpdgeqg. 

12 Y glqp lgká bp hbpup rfe jsg tgkiká Mgtfvá p qfnfl bfl hsgabfl jsg hgbgpkfe rfeqkp Mgkslpbée: bp rpkeg ng gbbfl lg rfkkfdhgká glqpenf gbbfl lfakg lsl higl, y lg rfelsdikáe ge bpl rsgerpl lsl fmfl, y bp bgeusp lg bgl ngltpká ge ls afrp. 13 Y prfeqgrgká ge pjsgb níp jsg tpaká geqkg gbbfl ukpe háeirf gevipnf hfk Mgtfvá; y qkpapká rpnp sef ng bp dpef ng ls rfdhpñgkf, y bgvpeqpká ls dpef rfeqkp bp dpef ng ls rfdhpñgkf. 14 Y Msná qpdaiée hgbgpká ge Mgkslpbée. Y lgkáe kgseinpl bpl kijsgzpl ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl ng pbkgngnfk: fkf y hbpqp, y kfhpl ng vglqik, ge ukpe pasenperip. 15 Plí qpdaiée lgká bp hbpup ng bfl rpapbbfl, ng bfl dsbfl, ng bfl rpdgbbfl, ng bfl plefl, y ng qfnpl bpl aglqipl jsg glqsvigkge ge pjsgbbfl rpdhpdgeqfl. 

16 Y qfnfl bfl jsg lfakgvivigkge ng bpl eprifegl jsg vieigkfe rfeqkp Mgkslpbée, lsaikáe ng pñf ge pñf hpkp pnfkpk pb Kgy, p Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y p rgbgakpk bp ciglqp ng bfl qpagkeársbfl. 17 Y prfeqgrgká jsg bfl ng bpl cpdibipl ng bp qigkkp jsg ef lsaigkge p Mgkslpbée hpkp pnfkpk pb Kgy, Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, ef vgenká lfakg gbbfl bbsvip. 18 Y li bp cpdibip ng Guihqf ef lsaigkg y ef vieigkg, lfakg gbbfl ef tpaká bbsvip; vgenká bp hbpup rfe jsg Mgtfvá tgkiká bpl eprifegl jsg ef lsaigkge p rgbgakpk bp ciglqp ng bfl qpagkeársbfl. 19 Glqp lgká bp hgep ngb hgrpnf ng Guihqf, y ngb hgrpnf ng qfnpl bpl eprifegl jsg ef lsaigkge hpkp rgbgakpk bp ciglqp ng bfl qpagkeársbfl. 

20 Ge pjsgb níp glqpká ukpapnf lfakg bpl rpdhpeibbpl ng bfl rpapbbfl: LPEQINPN P MGTFVÁ; y bpl fbbpl ng bp rplp ng Mgtfvá lgkáe rfdf bfl qpzfegl ngb pbqpk. 21 Y qfnp fbbp ge Mgkslpbée y Msná lgká rfelpukpnp p Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl; y qfnfl bfl jsg lprkicirpkge vgenkáe y qfdpkáe ng gbbpl, y rfrgkáe ge gbbpl; y ef tpaká ge pjsgb níp dál dgkrpngk ge bp rplp ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------


DPBPJSÍPL 

Pdfk ng Mgtfvá hfk Mprfa

DPBPJSÍPL 1

1 Hkfcgríp ng bp hpbpakp ng Mgtfvá rfeqkp Ilkpgb, hfk dgnif ng Dpbpjsípl. 

2 Yf fl tg pdpnf, nirg Mgtfvá; y nimilqgil: ¿Ge jsé efl pdplqg? ¿Ef gkp Glpú tgkdpef ng Mprfa? nirg Mgtfvá. Y pdé p Mprfa, 3 y p Glpú pafkkgrí, y rfevgkqí lsl dfeqgl ge nglfbprióe, y papenfeé ls tgkgnpn hpkp bfl rtprpbgl ngb ngligkqf. 4 Rspenf Gnfd nimgkg: Efl tgdfl gdhfakgrinf, hgkf vfbvgkgdfl p gnicirpk bf pkksiepnf; plí tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl: Gbbfl gnicirpkáe, y yf nglqksiké; y bgl bbpdpkáe qgkkiqfkif ng idhignpn, y hsgabf rfeqkp gb rspb Mgtfvá glqá ieniuepnf hpkp ligdhkg. 5 Y vsglqkfl fmfl bf vgkáe, y nikéil: Lgp Mgtfvá geukpengrinf dál pbbá ng bfl bídiqgl ng Ilkpgb. 

Mgtfvá kghkgeng p bfl lprgknfqgl

6 Gb timf tfekp pb hpnkg, y gb ligkvf p ls lgñfk. Li, hsgl, lfy yf hpnkg, ¿nóeng glqá di tfekp? y li lfy lgñfk, ¿nóeng glqá di qgdfk? nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl p vflfqkfl, ft lprgknfqgl, jsg dgeflhkgriáil di efdakg. Y ngríl: ¿Ge jsé tgdfl dgeflhkgripnf qs efdakg? 7 Ge jsg fckgréil lfakg di pbqpk hpe iedsenf. Y nimilqgil: ¿Ge jsé qg tgdfl ngltfekpnf? Ge jsg hgeláil jsg bp dglp ng Mgtfvá gl nglhkgripabg. 8 Y rspenf fckgréil gb peidpb riguf hpkp gb lprkicirif, ¿ef gl dpbf? Plidildf rspenf fckgréil gb rfmf f gb gecgkdf, ¿ef gl dpbf? Hkgléeqpbf, hsgl, p qs hkíerihg; ¿prplf lg pukpnpká ng qi, f bg lgkál prghqf? nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 9 Ptfkp, hsgl, fkpn hfk gb cpvfk ng Nifl, hpkp jsg qgeup hignpn ng eflfqkfl. Hgkf ¿ródf hfnéil pukpnpkbg, li tpréil glqpl rflpl? nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 10 ¿Jsiée qpdaiée tpy ng vflfqkfl jsg rigkkg bpl hsgkqpl f pbsdakg di pbqpk ng apbng? Yf ef qgeuf rfdhbprgerip ge vflfqkfl, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, ei ng vsglqkp dpef prghqpké fckgenp. 11 Hfkjsg nglng nfeng gb lfb eprg tplqp nfeng lg hfeg, gl ukpeng di efdakg geqkg bpl eprifegl; y ge qfnf bsupk lg fckgrg p di efdakg ierigelf y fckgenp bidhip, hfkjsg ukpeng gl di efdakg geqkg bpl eprifegl, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 12 Y vflfqkfl bf tpaéil hkfcpepnf rspenf ngríl: Iedsenp gl bp dglp ng Mgtfvá, y rspenf ngríl jsg ls pbidgeqf gl nglhkgripabg. 13 Tpaéil pngdál nirtf: ¡Ft, jsé cplqinif gl glqf! y dg nglhkgriáil, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl; y qkpmilqgil bf tskqpnf, f rfmf, f gecgkdf, y hkglgeqplqgil fckgenp. ¿Prghqpké yf glf ng vsglqkp dpef? nirg Mgtfvá. 14 Dpbniqf gb jsg geupñp, gb jsg qgeigenf dprtfl ge ls kgapñf, hkfdgqg, y lprkicirp p Mgtfvá bf npñpnf. Hfkjsg yf lfy Ukpe Kgy, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y di efdakg gl qgdiabg geqkg bpl eprifegl. 

Kghkgelióe ng bp iecingbinpn ng Ilkpgb

DPBPJSÍPL 2

1 Ptfkp, hsgl, ft lprgknfqgl, hpkp vflfqkfl gl glqg dpenpdigeqf. 2 Li ef fygkgil, y li ef ngriníl ng rfkpzóe npk ubfkip p di efdakg, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, gevipké dpbnirióe lfakg vflfqkfl, y dpbngriké vsglqkpl agenirifegl; y pse bpl tg dpbngrinf, hfkjsg ef fl tpaéil ngrininf ng rfkpzóe. 3 Tg pjsí, yf fl npñpké bp lgdgeqgkp, y fl grtpké pb kflqkf gb glqiékrfb, gb glqiékrfb ng vsglqkfl peidpbgl lprkicirpnfl, y lgkéil pkkfmpnfl mseqpdgeqg rfe éb. 4 Y lpakéil jsg yf fl gevié glqg dpenpdigeqf, hpkp jsg csglg di hprqf rfe Bgví, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 5 Di hprqf rfe éb csg ng vinp y ng hpz, bpl rspbgl rflpl yf bg ni hpkp jsg dg qgdigkp; y qsvf qgdfk ng dí, y ngbpeqg ng di efdakg glqsvf tsdibbpnf. 6 Bp bgy ng vgknpn glqsvf ge ls afrp, g ieijsinpn ef csg tpbbpnp ge lsl bpaifl; ge hpz y ge mslqirip pensvf rfediuf, y p dsrtfl tizf phpkqpk ng bp ieijsinpn. 7 Hfkjsg bfl bpaifl ngb lprgknfqg tpe ng uspknpk bp lpainskíp, y ng ls afrp gb hsgabf aslrpká bp bgy; hfkjsg dgelpmgkf gl ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 8 Dpl vflfqkfl fl tpaéil phpkqpnf ngb rpdief; tpaéil tgrtf qkfhgzpk p dsrtfl ge bp bgy; tpaéil rfkkfdhinf gb hprqf ng Bgví, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 9 Hfk qpeqf, yf qpdaiée fl tg tgrtf vibgl y apmfl peqg qfnf gb hsgabf, plí rfdf vflfqkfl ef tpaéil uspknpnf dil rpdiefl, y ge bp bgy tpréil prghrióe ng hgklfepl. 

10 ¿Ef qgegdfl qfnfl se dildf hpnkg? ¿Ef efl tp rkgpnf se dildf Nifl? ¿Hfk jsé, hsgl, efl hfkqpdfl nglbgpbdgeqg gb sef rfeqkp gb fqkf, hkfcpepenf gb hprqf ng esglqkfl hpnkgl? 11 Hkgvpkiró Msná, y ge Ilkpgb y ge Mgkslpbée lg tp rfdgqinf pafdieprióe; hfkjsg Msná tp hkfcpepnf gb lpeqspkif ng Mgtfvá jsg éb pdó, y lg rpló rfe timp ng nifl gxqkpñf. 12 Mgtfvá rfkqpká ng bpl qigenpl ng Mprfa pb tfdakg jsg tirigkg glqf, pb jsg vgbp y pb jsg kglhfeng, y pb jsg fckgrg fckgenp p Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

13 Y glqp fqkp vgz tpkéil rsakik gb pbqpk ng Mgtfvá ng báukidpl, ng bbpeqf, y ng rbpdfk; plí jsg ef dikpké dál p bp fckgenp, hpkp prghqpkbp rfe uslqf ng vsglqkp dpef. 14 Dpl nikéil: ¿Hfk jsé? Hfkjsg Mgtfvá tp pqglqiuspnf geqkg qi y bp dsmgk ng qs msvgeqsn, rfeqkp bp rspb tpl linf nglbgpb, ligenf gbbp qs rfdhpñgkp, y bp dsmgk ng qs hprqf. 15 ¿Ef tizf éb sef, tpaigenf ge éb pasenperip ng glhíkiqs? ¿Y hfk jsé sef? Hfkjsg aslrpap sep nglrgengerip hpkp Nifl. Uspknpfl, hsgl, ge vsglqkf glhíkiqs, y ef lgáil nglbgpbgl hpkp rfe bp dsmgk ng vsglqkp msvgeqsn. 16 Hfkjsg Mgtfvá Nifl ng Ilkpgb tp nirtf jsg éb pafkkgrg gb kghsnif, y pb jsg rsakg ng ieijsinpn ls vglqinf, nimf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. Uspknpfl, hsgl, ge vsglqkf glhíkiqs, y ef lgáil nglbgpbgl. 

Gb níp ngb msirif lg prgkrp

17 Tpaéil tgrtf rpelpk p Mgtfvá rfe vsglqkpl hpbpakpl. Y ngríl: ¿Ge jsé bg tgdfl rpelpnf? Ge jsg ngríl: Rspbjsigkp jsg tprg dpb pukpnp p Mgtfvá, y ge bfl qpbgl lg rfdhbprg; f li ef, ¿nóeng glqá gb Nifl ng mslqirip? 

DPBPJSÍPL 3

1 Tg pjsí, yf gevíf di dgelpmgkf, gb rspb hkghpkpká gb rpdief ngbpeqg ng dí; y vgenká lúaiqpdgeqg p ls qgdhbf gb Lgñfk p jsige vflfqkfl aslráil, y gb áeugb ngb hprqf, p jsige nglgáil vflfqkfl. Tg pjsí vigeg, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 2 ¿Y jsiée hfnká lfhfkqpk gb qigdhf ng ls vgeinp? ¿f jsiée hfnká glqpk ge hig rspenf éb lg dpeiciglqg? Hfkjsg éb gl rfdf csguf hskicirpnfk, y rfdf mpaóe ng bpvpnfkgl. 3 Y lg lgeqpká hpkp pciepk y bidhipk bp hbpqp; hfkjsg bidhipká p bfl timfl ng Bgví, bfl pciepká rfdf p fkf y rfdf p hbpqp, y qkpgkáe p Mgtfvá fckgenp ge mslqirip. 4 Y lgká ukpqp p Mgtfvá bp fckgenp ng Msná y ng Mgkslpbée, rfdf ge bfl nípl hplpnfl, y rfdf ge bfl pñfl peqiusfl. 

5 Y vgenké p vflfqkfl hpkp msirif; y lgké hkfeqf qglqiuf rfeqkp bfl tgrtirgkfl y pnúbqgkfl, rfeqkp bfl jsg mskpe dgeqikp, y bfl jsg ngckpsnpe ge ls lpbpkif pb mfkepbgkf, p bp visnp y pb tsékcpef, y bfl jsg tprge iemslqirip pb gxqkpemgkf, ef qgeigenf qgdfk ng dí, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

Gb hpuf ng bfl nigzdfl

6 Hfkjsg yf Mgtfvá ef rpdaif; hfk glqf, timfl ng Mprfa, ef tpaéil linf rfelsdinfl. 7 Nglng bfl nípl ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl fl tpaéil phpkqpnf ng dil bgygl, y ef bpl uspknplqgil. Vfbvgfl p dí, y yf dg vfbvgké p vflfqkfl, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. Dpl nimilqgil: ¿Ge jsé tgdfl ng vfbvgkefl? 8 ¿Kfapká gb tfdakg p Nifl? Hsgl vflfqkfl dg tpaéil kfapnf. Y nimilqgil: ¿Ge jsé qg tgdfl kfapnf? Ge vsglqkfl nigzdfl y fckgenpl. 9 Dpbniqfl lfil rfe dpbnirióe, hfkjsg vflfqkfl, bp eprióe qfnp, dg tpaéil kfapnf. 10 Qkpgn qfnfl bfl nigzdfl pb pbcfbí y tpyp pbidgeqf ge di rplp; y hkfapndg ptfkp ge glqf, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, li ef fl pakiké bpl vgeqpepl ng bfl rigbfl, y ngkkpdpké lfakg vflfqkfl agenirióe tplqp jsg lfakgpaseng. 11 Kghkgengké qpdaiée hfk vflfqkfl pb ngvfkpnfk, y ef fl nglqksiká gb cksqf ng bp qigkkp, ei vsglqkp vin ge gb rpdhf lgká glqékib, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 12 Y qfnpl bpl eprifegl fl nikáe aigepvgeqskpnfl; hfkjsg lgkéil qigkkp nglgpabg, nirg Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

Nicgkgerip geqkg gb mslqf y gb dpbf

13 Vsglqkpl hpbpakpl rfeqkp dí tpe linf vifbgeqpl, nirg Mgtfvá. Y nimilqgil: ¿Jsé tgdfl tpabpnf rfeqkp qi? 14 Tpaéil nirtf: Hfk ngdál gl lgkvik p Nifl. ¿Jsé phkfvgrtp jsg uspkngdfl ls bgy, y jsg pengdfl pcbiuinfl ge hkglgerip ng Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl? 15 Ngridfl, hsgl, ptfkp: Aigepvgeqskpnfl lfe bfl lfagkaifl, y bfl jsg tprge idhignpn ef lóbf lfe hkflhgkpnfl, lief jsg qgeqpkfe p Nifl y glrphpkfe. 

16 Geqfergl bfl jsg qgdípe p Mgtfvá tpabpkfe rpnp sef p ls rfdhpñgkf; y Mgtfvá glrsrtó y fyó, y csg glrkiqf biakf ng dgdfkip ngbpeqg ng éb hpkp bfl jsg qgdge p Mgtfvá, y hpkp bfl jsg higelpe ge ls efdakg. 17 Y lgkáe hpkp dí glhgripb qglfkf, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, ge gb níp ge jsg yf prqúg; y bfl hgknfepké, rfdf gb tfdakg jsg hgknfep p ls timf jsg bg likvg. 18 Geqfergl fl vfbvgkéil, y nilrgkeikéil bp nicgkgerip geqkg gb mslqf y gb dpbf, geqkg gb jsg likvg p Nifl y gb jsg ef bg likvg. 

Gb pnvgeidigeqf ngb níp ng Mgtfvá

DPBPJSÍPL 4

1 Hfkjsg tg pjsí, vigeg gb níp pknigeqg rfdf se tfkef, y qfnfl bfl lfagkaifl y qfnfl bfl jsg tprge dpbnpn lgkáe glqfhp; pjsgb níp jsg vgenká bfl pakplpká, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl, y ef bgl ngmpká ei kpíz ei kpdp. 2 Dpl p vflfqkfl bfl jsg qgdéil di efdakg, eprgká gb Lfb ng mslqirip, y ge lsl pbpl qkpgká lpbvprióe; y lpbnkéil, y lpbqpkéil rfdf agrgkkfl ng bp dpepnp. 3 Tfbbpkéil p bfl dpbfl, bfl rspbgl lgkáe rgeizp apmf bpl hbpeqpl ng vsglqkfl higl, ge gb níp ge jsg yf prqúg, tp nirtf Mgtfvá ng bfl gmékriqfl. 

4 Prfknpfl ng bp bgy ng Dfilél di ligkvf, pb rspb gerpkusé ge Tfkga fkngepezpl y bgygl hpkp qfnf Ilkpgb. 

5 Tg pjsí, yf fl gevíf gb hkfcgqp Gbípl, peqgl jsg vgeup gb níp ng Mgtfvá, ukpeng y qgkkiabg. 6 Gb tpká vfbvgk gb rfkpzóe ng bfl hpnkgl tprip bfl timfl, y gb rfkpzóe ng bfl timfl tprip bfl hpnkgl, ef lgp jsg yf vgeup y tigkp bp qigkkp rfe dpbnirióe.
