21 Hplpnpl glqpl rflpl, Hpabf lg hkfhslf ge glhíkiqs ik p Mgkslpbée, nglhsél ng kgrfkkgk Dprgnfeip y Prpyp, nirigenf: Nglhsél jsg tpyp glqpnf pbbí, dg lgká egrglpkif vgk qpdaiée p Kfdp. 22 Y gevipenf p Dprgnfeip p nfl ng bfl jsg bg pysnpape, Qidfqgf y Gkplqf, éb lg jsgnó hfk pbuúe qigdhf ge Plip. 

Gb pbafkfqf ge Gcglf

23 Tsaf hfk pjsgb qigdhf se nilqskaif ef hgjsgñf prgkrp ngb Rpdief. 24 Hfkjsg se hbpqgkf bbpdpnf Ngdgqkif, jsg tpríp ng hbpqp qgdhbgribbfl ng Nipep, npap ef hfrp upeperip p bfl pkqícirgl; 25 p bfl rspbgl, kgseinfl rfe bfl fakgkfl ngb dildf fcirif, nimf: Vpkfegl, lpaéil jsg ng glqg fcirif faqgegdfl esglqkp kijsgzp; 26 hgkf vgil y fíl jsg glqg Hpabf, ef lfbpdgeqg ge Gcglf, lief ge rpli qfnp Plip, tp phpkqpnf p dsrtpl ugeqgl rfe hgklsplióe, nirigenf jsg ef lfe niflgl bfl jsg lg tprge rfe bpl dpefl. 27 Y ef lfbpdgeqg tpy hgbiukf ng jsg glqg esglqkf egufrif vgeup p nglprkgniqpklg, lief qpdaiée jsg gb qgdhbf ng bp ukpe niflp Nipep lgp glqidpnf ge epnp, y rfdigerg p lgk nglqksinp bp dpmglqpn ng pjsgbbp p jsige vgegkp qfnp Plip, y gb dsenf geqgkf. 

28 Rspenf fygkfe glqpl rflpl, lg bbgepkfe ng ikp, y ukiqpkfe, nirigenf: ¡Ukpeng gl Nipep ng bfl gcglifl! 29 Y bp risnpn lg bbgeó ng rfecslióe, y p sep lg bpezpkfe pb qgpqkf, pkkgapqpenf p Upyf y p Pkilqpkrf, dprgnfeifl, rfdhpñgkfl ng Hpabf. 30 Y jsgkigenf Hpabf lpbik pb hsgabf, bfl nilríhsbfl ef bg ngmpkfe. 31 Qpdaiée pbusepl ng bpl psqfkinpngl ng Plip, jsg gkpe lsl pdiufl, bg gevipkfe kgrpnf, kfuáenfbg jsg ef lg hkglgeqplg ge gb qgpqkf. 32 Sefl, hsgl, ukiqpape sep rflp, y fqkfl fqkp; hfkjsg bp rferskkgerip glqpap rfecslp, y bfl dál ef lpaípe hfk jsé lg tpaípe kgseinf. 33 Y lprpkfe ng geqkg bp dsbqiqsn p Pbgmpenkf, gdhsmáenfbg bfl msnífl. Geqfergl Pbgmpenkf, hgninf libgerif rfe bp dpef, jsgkíp tpabpk ge ls ngcgelp peqg gb hsgabf. 34 Hgkf rspenf bg rfefrigkfe jsg gkp msníf, qfnfl p sep vfz ukiqpkfe rpli hfk nfl tfkpl: ¡Ukpeng gl Nipep ng bfl gcglifl! 35 Geqfergl gb glrkiapef, rspenf tpaíp phpriuspnf p bp dsbqiqsn, nimf: Vpkfegl gcglifl, ¿y jsiée gl gb tfdakg jsg ef lpag jsg bp risnpn ng bfl gcglifl gl uspknipep ngb qgdhbf ng bp ukpe niflp Nipep, y ng bp idpuge vgeinp ng Múhiqgk? 36 Hsglqf jsg glqf ef hsgng rfeqkpngriklg, gl egrglpkif jsg fl phpriuüéil, y jsg epnp tpuáil hkgrihiqpnpdgeqg. 37 Hfkjsg tpaéil qkpínf p glqfl tfdakgl, lie lgk lprkíbgufl ei abplcgdpnfkgl ng vsglqkp niflp. 38 Jsg li Ngdgqkif y bfl pkqícirgl jsg glqáe rfe éb qigege hbgiqf rfeqkp pbusef, psnigeripl lg rfergnge, y hkfróelsbgl tpy; prúlgelg bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl. 39 Y li ngdpenáil pbusep fqkp rflp, ge bguíqidp plpdabgp lg hsgng ngrinik. 40 Hfkjsg hgbiukf tpy ng jsg lgpdfl prslpnfl ng lgnirióe hfk glqf ng tfy, ef tpaigenf eieusep rpslp hfk bp rspb hfnpdfl npk kpzóe ng glqg rfersklf. 41 Y tpaigenf nirtf glqf, nglhinió bp plpdabgp. 

Vipmg ng Hpabf p Dprgnfeip y Ukgrip

TGRTFL 20

1 Nglhsél jsg rgló gb pbafkfqf, bbpdó Hpabf p bfl nilríhsbfl, y tpaiéenfbfl gxtfkqpnf y pakpzpnf, lg nglhinió y lpbió hpkp ik p Dprgnfeip. 2 Y nglhsél ng kgrfkkgk pjsgbbpl kguifegl, y ng gxtfkqpkbgl rfe pasenperip ng hpbpakpl, bbguó p Ukgrip. 3 Nglhsél ng tpagk glqpnf pbbí qkgl dglgl, y liéenfbg hsglqpl plgrtpezpl hfk bfl msnífl hpkp rspenf lg gdapkrplg hpkp Likip, qfdó bp ngrilióe ng vfbvgk hfk Dprgnfeip. 4 Y bg prfdhpñpkfe tplqp Plip, Lóhpqgk ng Agkgp, Pkilqpkrf y Lgusenf ng Qglpbóeirp, Upyf ng Ngkag, y Qidfqgf; y ng Plip, Qíjsirf y Qkócidf. 5 Glqfl, tpaiéenflg pngbpeqpnf, efl glhgkpkfe ge Qkfpl. 6 Y eflfqkfl, hplpnfl bfl nípl ng bfl hpegl lie bgvpnskp, epvgupdfl ng Cibihfl, y ge rierf nípl efl kgseidfl rfe gbbfl ge Qkfpl, nfeng efl jsgnpdfl ligqg nípl. 

Viliqp ng nglhgninp ng Hpabf ge Qkfpl

7 Gb hkidgk níp ng bp lgdpep, kgseinfl bfl nilríhsbfl hpkp hpkqik gb hpe, Hpabf bgl gelgñpap, tpaigenf ng lpbik pb níp liusigeqg; y pbpkuó gb nilrsklf tplqp bp dgnipefrtg. 8 Y tpaíp dsrtpl bádhpkpl ge gb phflgeqf pbqf nfeng glqpape kgseinfl; 9 y se mfvge bbpdpnf Gsqirf, jsg glqpap lgeqpnf ge bp vgeqpep, kgeninf ng se lsgñf hkfcsenf, hfk rspeqf Hpabf nilgkqpap bpkupdgeqg, vgerinf ngb lsgñf rpyó ngb qgkrgk hilf papmf, y csg bgvpeqpnf dsgkqf. 10 Geqfergl nglrgenió Hpabf y lg grtó lfakg éb, y pakpzáenfbg, nimf: Ef fl pbpkdéil, hsgl glqá vivf. 11 Nglhsél ng tpagk lsainf, y hpkqinf gb hpe y rfdinf, tpabó bpkupdgeqg tplqp gb pbap; y plí lpbió. 12 Y bbgvpkfe pb mfvge vivf, y csgkfe ukpengdgeqg rfelfbpnfl. 

Vipmg ng Qkfpl p Dibgqf

13 Eflfqkfl, pngbpeqáenfefl p gdapkrpkefl, epvgupdfl p Plóe hpkp kgrfugk pbbí p Hpabf, yp jsg plí bf tpaíp ngqgkdiepnf, jsgkigenf éb ik hfk qigkkp. 14 Rspenf lg kgseió rfe eflfqkfl ge Plóe, qfdáenfbg p afknf, vieidfl p Diqibgeg. 15 Epvgupenf ng pbbí, pb níp liusigeqg bbgupdfl ngbpeqg ng Jsíf, y pb fqkf níp qfdpdfl hsgkqf ge Lpdfl; y tpaigenf tgrtf glrpbp ge Qkfuibif, pb níp liusigeqg bbgupdfl p Dibgqf. 16 Hfkjsg Hpabf lg tpaíp hkfhsglqf hplpk ng bpkuf p Gcglf, hpkp ef ngqgegklg ge Plip, hsgl lg phkglskpap hfk glqpk gb níp ng Hgeqgrflqél, li bg csglg hfliabg, ge Mgkslpbée. 

Nilrsklf ng nglhgninp ng Hpabf ge Dibgqf

17 Gevipenf, hsgl, nglng Dibgqf p Gcglf, tizf bbpdpk p bfl peripefl ng bp iubglip. 18 Rspenf vieigkfe p éb, bgl nimf: Vflfqkfl lpaéil ródf dg tg rfdhfkqpnf geqkg vflfqkfl qfnf gb qigdhf, nglng gb hkidgk níp jsg geqké ge Plip, 19 likvigenf pb Lgñfk rfe qfnp tsdibnpn, y rfe dsrtpl báukidpl, y hksgapl jsg dg tpe vgeinf hfk bpl plgrtpezpl ng bfl msnífl; 20 y ródf epnp jsg csglg úqib tg kgtsinf ng peseripkfl y gelgñpkfl, húabirpdgeqg y hfk bpl rplpl, 21 qglqicirpenf p msnífl y p ugeqibgl prgkrp ngb pkkghgeqidigeqf hpkp rfe Nifl, y ng bp cg ge esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 22 Ptfkp, tg pjsí, biupnf yf ge glhíkiqs, vfy p Mgkslpbée, lie lpagk bf jsg pbbá dg tp ng prfeqgrgk; 23 lpbvf jsg gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf hfk qfnpl bpl risnpngl dg np qglqidfeif, nirigenf jsg dg glhgkpe hkilifegl y qkiasbprifegl. 24 Hgkf ng eieusep rflp tpuf rplf, ei glqidf hkgriflp di vinp hpkp dí dildf, rfe qpb jsg prpag di rpkkgkp rfe ufzf, y gb dieilqgkif jsg kgriaí ngb Lgñfk Mglúl, hpkp npk qglqidfeif ngb gvpeugbif ng bp ukprip ng Nifl. 25 Y ptfkp, tg pjsí, yf lé jsg eieusef ng qfnfl vflfqkfl, geqkg jsigegl tg hplpnf hkgnirpenf gb kgief ng Nifl, vgká dál di kflqkf. 26 Hfk qpeqf, yf fl hkfqglqf ge gb níp ng tfy, jsg glqfy bidhif ng bp lpeukg ng qfnfl; 27 hfkjsg ef tg kgtsinf peseripkfl qfnf gb rfelgmf ng Nifl. 28 Hfk qpeqf, dikpn hfk vflfqkfl, y hfk qfnf gb kgapñf ge jsg gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf fl tp hsglqf hfk failhfl, hpkp phprgeqpk bp iubglip ngb Lgñfk, bp rspb éb upeó hfk ls hkfhip lpeukg. 29 Hfkjsg yf lé jsg nglhsél ng di hpkqinp geqkpkáe ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl bfafl kphprgl, jsg ef hgknfepkáe pb kgapñf. 30 Y ng vflfqkfl dildfl lg bgvpeqpkáe tfdakgl jsg tpabge rflpl hgkvgklpl hpkp pkkplqkpk qkpl lí p bfl nilríhsbfl. 31 Hfk qpeqf, vgbpn, prfknáenffl jsg hfk qkgl pñfl, ng efrtg y ng níp, ef tg rglpnf ng pdfeglqpk rfe báukidpl p rpnp sef. 32 Y ptfkp, tgkdpefl, fl gerfdigenf p Nifl, y p bp hpbpakp ng ls ukprip, jsg qigeg hfngk hpkp lfakggnicirpkfl y npkfl tgkgerip rfe qfnfl bfl lpeqicirpnfl. 33 Ei hbpqp ei fkf ei vglqinf ng epnig tg rfniripnf. 34 Peqgl vflfqkfl lpaéil jsg hpkp bf jsg dg tp linf egrglpkif p dí y p bfl jsg glqáe rfediuf, glqpl dpefl dg tpe lgkvinf. 35 Ge qfnf fl tg gelgñpnf jsg, qkpapmpenf plí, lg ngag pysnpk p bfl egrgliqpnfl, y kgrfknpk bpl hpbpakpl ngb Lgñfk Mglúl, jsg nimf: Dál aigepvgeqskpnf gl npk jsg kgriaik. 

36 Rspenf tsaf nirtf glqpl rflpl, lg hslf ng kfnibbpl, y fkó rfe qfnfl gbbfl. 37 Geqfergl tsaf ukpe bbpeqf ng qfnfl; y grtáenflg pb rsgbbf ng Hpabf, bg aglpape, 38 nfbiéenflg ge ukpe dpegkp hfk bp hpbpakp jsg nimf, ng jsg ef vgkípe dál ls kflqkf. Y bg prfdhpñpkfe pb apkrf. 

Vipmg ng Hpabf p Mgkslpbée

TGRTFL 21

1 Nglhsél ng lghpkpkefl ng gbbfl, zpkhpdfl y csidfl rfe ksdaf nikgrqf p Rfl, y pb níp liusigeqg p Kfnpl, y ng pbbí p Háqpkp. 2 Y tpbbpenf se apkrf jsg hplpap p Cgeirip, efl gdapkrpdfl, y zpkhpdfl. 3 Pb pvilqpk Rtihkg, ngmáenfbp p dpef izjsigknp, epvgupdfl p Likip, y pkkiapdfl p Qikf, hfkjsg gb apkrf tpaíp ng nglrpkupk pbbí. 4 Y tpbbpnfl bfl nilríhsbfl, efl jsgnpdfl pbbí ligqg nípl; y gbbfl ngrípe p Hpabf hfk gb Glhíkiqs, jsg ef lsaiglg p Mgkslpbée. 5 Rsdhbinfl pjsgbbfl nípl, lpbidfl, prfdhpñáenfefl qfnfl, rfe lsl dsmgkgl g timfl, tplqp csgkp ng bp risnpn; y hsglqfl ng kfnibbpl ge bp hbpyp, fkpdfl. 6 Y pakpzáenfefl bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl, lsaidfl pb apkrf y gbbfl lg vfbvigkfe p lsl rplpl. 

7 Y eflfqkfl rfdhbgqpdfl bp epvguprióe, lpbigenf ng Qikf y pkkiapenf p Qfbgdpinp; y tpaigenf lpbsnpnf p bfl tgkdpefl, efl jsgnpdfl rfe gbbfl se níp. 8 Pb fqkf níp, lpbigenf Hpabf y bfl jsg rfe éb glqáapdfl, csidfl p Rglpkgp; y geqkpenf ge rplp ng Cgbihg gb gvpeugbilqp, jsg gkp sef ng bfl ligqg, hflpdfl rfe éb. 9 Glqg qgeíp rspqkf timpl nfergbbpl jsg hkfcgqizpape. 10 Y hgkdpegrigenf eflfqkfl pbbí pbusefl nípl, nglrgenió ng Msngp se hkfcgqp bbpdpnf Pupaf, 11 jsige vieigenf p vgkefl, qfdó gb rieqf ng Hpabf, y pqáenflg bfl higl y bpl dpefl, nimf: Glqf nirg gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf: Plí pqpkáe bfl msnífl ge Mgkslpbée pb vpkóe ng jsige gl glqg rieqf, y bg geqkgupkáe ge dpefl ng bfl ugeqibgl. 12 Pb fík glqf, bg kfupdfl eflfqkfl y bfl ng pjsgb bsupk, jsg ef lsaiglg p Mgkslpbée. 13 Geqfergl Hpabf kglhfenió: ¿Jsé tpréil bbfkpenf y jsgakpeqáenfdg gb rfkpzóe? Hfkjsg yf glqfy nilhsglqf ef lóbf p lgk pqpnf, dpl pse p dfkik ge Mgkslpbée hfk gb efdakg ngb Lgñfk Mglúl. 14 Y rfdf ef bg hsnidfl hgklspnik, nglilqidfl, nirigenf: Táuplg bp vfbseqpn ngb Lgñfk. 

15 Nglhsél ng glfl nípl, tgrtfl yp bfl hkghpkpqivfl, lsaidfl p Mgkslpbée. 16 Y vieigkfe qpdaiée rfe eflfqkfl ng Rglpkgp pbusefl ng bfl nilríhsbfl, qkpygenf rfeliuf p sef bbpdpnf Deplóe, ng Rtihkg, nilríhsbf peqiusf, rfe jsige efl tflhgnpkípdfl. 

Pkkglqf ng Hpabf ge gb qgdhbf

17 Rspenf bbgupdfl p Mgkslpbée, bfl tgkdpefl efl kgriaigkfe rfe ufzf. 18 Y pb níp liusigeqg Hpabf geqkó rfe eflfqkfl p vgk p Mprfaf, y lg tpbbpape kgseinfl qfnfl bfl peripefl; 19 p bfl rspbgl, nglhsél ng tpagkbgl lpbsnpnf, bgl rfeqó sep hfk sep bpl rflpl jsg Nifl tpaíp tgrtf geqkg bfl ugeqibgl hfk ls dieilqgkif. 20 Rspenf gbbfl bf fygkfe, ubfkicirpkfe p Nifl, y bg nimgkfe: Yp vgl, tgkdpef, rsáeqfl dibbpkgl ng msnífl tpy jsg tpe rkgínf; y qfnfl lfe rgbflfl hfk bp bgy. 21 Hgkf lg bgl tp iecfkdpnf ge rspeqf p qi, jsg gelgñpl p qfnfl bfl msnífl jsg glqáe geqkg bfl ugeqibgl p phflqpqpk ng Dfilél, niriéenfbgl jsg ef rikrseringe p lsl timfl, ei falgkvge bpl rflqsdakgl. 22 ¿Jsé tpy, hsgl? Bp dsbqiqsn lg kgseiká ng rigkqf, hfkjsg fikáe jsg tpl vgeinf. 23 Tpz, hsgl, glqf jsg qg ngridfl: Tpy geqkg eflfqkfl rspqkf tfdakgl jsg qigege fabiuprióe ng rsdhbik vfqf. 24 Qódpbfl rfeqiuf, hskicírpqg rfe gbbfl, y hpup lsl uplqfl hpkp jsg lg kplskge bp rpagzp; y qfnfl rfdhkgengkáe jsg ef tpy epnp ng bf jsg lg bgl iecfkdó prgkrp ng qi, lief jsg qú qpdaiée penpl fkngepnpdgeqg, uspknpenf bp bgy. 25 Hgkf ge rspeqf p bfl ugeqibgl jsg tpe rkgínf, eflfqkfl bgl tgdfl glrkiqf ngqgkdiepenf jsg ef uspknge epnp ng glqf; lfbpdgeqg jsg lg palqgeupe ng bf lprkicirpnf p bfl ínfbfl, ng lpeukg, ng ptfupnf y ng cfkeirprióe. 26 Geqfergl Hpabf qfdó rfeliuf p pjsgbbfl tfdakgl, y pb níp liusigeqg, tpaiéenflg hskicirpnf rfe gbbfl, geqkó ge gb qgdhbf, hpkp peseripk gb rsdhbidigeqf ng bfl nípl ng bp hskicirprióe, rspenf tpaíp ng hkglgeqpklg bp fckgenp hfk rpnp sef ng gbbfl. 

27 Hgkf rspenf glqpape hpkp rsdhbiklg bfl ligqg nípl, sefl msnífl ng Plip, pb vgkbg ge gb qgdhbf, pbafkfqpkfe p qfnp bp dsbqiqsn y bg grtpkfe dpef, 28 npenf vfrgl: ¡Vpkfegl ilkpgbiqpl, pysnpn! Glqg gl gb tfdakg jsg hfk qfnpl hpkqgl gelgñp p qfnfl rfeqkp gb hsgabf, bp bgy y glqg bsupk; y pngdál ng glqf, tp dgqinf p ukigufl ge gb qgdhbf, y tp hkfcpepnf glqg lpeqf bsupk. 29 Hfkjsg peqgl tpaípe vilqf rfe éb ge bp risnpn p Qkócidf, ng Gcglf, p jsige hgelpape jsg Hpabf tpaíp dgqinf ge gb qgdhbf. 30 Plí jsg qfnp bp risnpn lg rfedfvió, y lg pufbhó gb hsgabf; y phfngkáenflg ng Hpabf, bg pkkplqkpkfe csgkp ngb qgdhbf, g iedgnipqpdgeqg rgkkpkfe bpl hsgkqpl. 31 Y hkfrskpenf gbbfl dpqpkbg, lg bg pviló pb qkiasef ng bp rfdhpñíp, jsg qfnp bp risnpn ng Mgkslpbée glqpap pbafkfqpnp. 32 Glqg, qfdpenf bsguf lfbnpnfl y rgeqskifegl, rfkkió p gbbfl. Y rspenf gbbfl vigkfe pb qkiasef y p bfl lfbnpnfl, ngmpkfe ng ufbhgpk p Hpabf. 33 Geqfergl, bbgupenf gb qkiasef, bg hkgenió y bg dpenó pqpk rfe nfl rpngepl, y hkguseqó jsiée gkp y jsé tpaíp tgrtf. 34 Hgkf geqkg bp dsbqiqsn, sefl ukiqpape sep rflp, y fqkfl fqkp; y rfdf ef hfníp geqgengk epnp ng rigkqf p rpslp ngb pbafkfqf, bg dpenó bbgvpk p bp cfkqpbgzp. 35 Pb bbgupk p bpl ukpnpl, prfeqgrió jsg gkp bbgvpnf ge hglf hfk bfl lfbnpnfl p rpslp ng bp vifbgerip ng bp dsbqiqsn; 36 hfkjsg bp dsrtgnsdakg ngb hsgabf vgeíp ngqkál, ukiqpenf: ¡Dsgkp! 

Ngcgelp ng Hpabf peqg gb hsgabf

37 Rspenf rfdgezpkfe p dgqgk p Hpabf ge bp cfkqpbgzp, nimf pb qkiasef: ¿Lg dg hgkdiqg ngrikqg pbuf? Y éb nimf: ¿Lpagl ukiguf? 38 ¿Ef gkgl qú pjsgb guihrif jsg bgvpeqó sep lgnirióe peqgl ng glqfl nípl, y lpró pb ngligkqf bfl rspqkf dib lirpkifl? 39 Geqfergl nimf Hpabf: Yf ng rigkqf lfy tfdakg msníf ng Qpklf, risnpnpef ng sep risnpn ef ieliueicirpeqg ng Ribirip; hgkf qg ksguf jsg dg hgkdiqpl tpabpk pb hsgabf. 40 Y rspenf éb lg bf hgkdiqió, Hpabf, glqpenf ge hig ge bpl ukpnpl, tizf lgñpb rfe bp dpef pb hsgabf. Y tgrtf ukpe libgerif, tpabó ge bgeusp tgakgp, nirigenf: 

TGRTFL 22

1 Vpkfegl tgkdpefl y hpnkgl, fín ptfkp di ngcgelp peqg vflfqkfl. 

2 Y pb fík jsg bgl tpabpap ge bgeusp tgakgp, uspknpkfe dál libgerif. Y éb bgl nimf: 

3 Yf ng rigkqf lfy msníf, eprinf ge Qpklf ng Ribirip, hgkf rkipnf ge glqp risnpn, ielqksinf p bfl higl ng Updpbigb, glqkirqpdgeqg rfecfkdg p bp bgy ng esglqkfl hpnkgl, rgbflf ng Nifl, rfdf tfy bf lfil qfnfl vflfqkfl. 4 Hgklgusíp yf glqg Rpdief tplqp bp dsgkqg, hkgenigenf y geqkgupenf ge rákrgbgl p tfdakgl y dsmgkgl; 5 rfdf gb lsdf lprgknfqg qpdaiée dg gl qglqiuf, y qfnfl bfl peripefl, ng jsigegl qpdaiée kgriaí rpkqpl hpkp bfl tgkdpefl, y csi p Npdplrf hpkp qkpgk hkglfl p Mgkslpbée qpdaiée p bfl jsg glqsviglge pbbí, hpkp jsg csglge rplqiupnfl. 

Hpabf kgbpqp ls rfevgklióe

(Trt. 9.1-19; 26.12-18)

6 Hgkf prfeqgrió jsg ygenf yf, pb bbgupk rgkrp ng Npdplrf, rfdf p dgnifníp, ng kghgeqg dg kfngó dsrtp bsz ngb rigbf; 7 y rpí pb lsgbf, y fí sep vfz jsg dg ngríp: Lpsbf, Lpsbf, ¿hfk jsé dg hgkliusgl? 8 Yf geqfergl kglhfení: ¿Jsiée gkgl, Lgñfk? Y dg nimf: Yf lfy Mglúl ng Epzpkgq, p jsige qú hgkliusgl. 9 Y bfl jsg glqpape rfediuf vigkfe p bp vgknpn bp bsz, y lg glhpeqpkfe; hgkf ef geqgenigkfe bp vfz ngb jsg tpabpap rfediuf. 10 Y nimg: ¿Jsé tpké, Lgñfk? Y gb Lgñfk dg nimf: Bgváeqpqg, y vg p Npdplrf, y pbbí lg qg niká qfnf bf jsg glqá fkngepnf jsg tpupl. 11 Y rfdf yf ef vgíp p rpslp ng bp ubfkip ng bp bsz, bbgvpnf ng bp dpef hfk bfl jsg glqpape rfediuf, bbgusé p Npdplrf. 

12 Geqfergl sef bbpdpnf Pepeípl, vpkóe hipnflf lguúe bp bgy, jsg qgeíp asge qglqidfeif ng qfnfl bfl msnífl jsg pbbí dfkpape, 13 vief p dí, y prgkráenflg, dg nimf: Tgkdpef Lpsbf, kgriag bp vilqp. Y yf ge pjsgbbp dildp tfkp kgrfaké bp vilqp y bf diké. 14 Y éb nimf: Gb Nifl ng esglqkfl hpnkgl qg tp glrfuinf hpkp jsg rfefzrpl ls vfbseqpn, y vgpl pb Mslqf, y fiupl bp vfz ng ls afrp. 15 Hfkjsg lgkál qglqiuf lsyf p qfnfl bfl tfdakgl, ng bf jsg tpl vilqf y fínf. 16 Ptfkp, hsgl, ¿hfk jsé qg ngqigegl? Bgváeqpqg y apsqízpqg, y bpvp qsl hgrpnfl, ievfrpenf ls efdakg. 

Hpabf gl gevipnf p bfl ugeqibgl

17 Y dg prfeqgrió, vsgbqf p Mgkslpbée, jsg fkpenf ge gb qgdhbf dg lfakgvief se éxqplil. 18 Y bg vi jsg dg ngríp: Npqg hkilp, y lpb hkfeqpdgeqg ng Mgkslpbée; hfkjsg ef kgriaikáe qs qglqidfeif prgkrp ng dí. 19 Yf nimg: Lgñfk, gbbfl lpage jsg yf gerpkrgbpap y pzfqpap ge qfnpl bpl liepufupl p bfl jsg rkgípe ge qi; 20 y rspenf lg ngkkpdpap bp lpeukg ng Glqgape qs qglqiuf, yf dildf qpdaiée glqpap hkglgeqg, y rfelgeqíp ge ls dsgkqg, y uspknpap bpl kfhpl ng bfl jsg bg dpqpape. 21 Hgkf dg nimf: Vg, hfkjsg yf qg gevipké bgmfl p bfl ugeqibgl. 

Hpabf ge dpefl ngb qkiasef

22 Y bg fygkfe tplqp glqp hpbpakp; geqfergl pbzpkfe bp vfz, nirigenf: Jsiqp ng bp qigkkp p qpb tfdakg, hfkjsg ef rfevigeg jsg vivp. 23 Y rfdf gbbfl ukiqpape y pkkfmpape lsl kfhpl y bpezpape hfbvf pb pikg, 24 dpenó gb qkiasef jsg bg dgqiglge ge bp cfkqpbgzp, y fkngeó jsg csglg gxpdiepnf rfe pzfqgl, hpkp lpagk hfk jsé rpslp rbpdpape plí rfeqkp éb. 25 Hgkf rspenf bg pqpkfe rfe rfkkgpl, Hpabf nimf pb rgeqskióe jsg glqpap hkglgeqg: ¿Fl gl bíriqf pzfqpk p se risnpnpef kfdpef lie tpagk linf rfengepnf? 26 Rspenf gb rgeqskióe fyó glqf, csg y nif pvilf pb qkiasef, nirigenf: ¿Jsé vpl p tprgk? Hfkjsg glqg tfdakg gl risnpnpef kfdpef. 27 Vief gb qkiasef y bg nimf: Nidg, ¿gkgl qú risnpnpef kfdpef? Gb nimf: Lí. 28 Kglhfenió gb qkiasef: Yf rfe sep ukpe lsdp pnjsikí glqp risnpnpeíp. Geqfergl Hpabf nimf: Hgkf yf bf lfy ng epridigeqf. 29 Plí jsg, bsguf lg phpkqpkfe ng éb bfl jsg bg iape p npk qfkdgeqf; y pse gb qkiasef, pb lpagk jsg gkp risnpnpef kfdpef, qpdaiée qsvf qgdfk hfk tpagkbg pqpnf. 

Hpabf peqg gb rferibif

30 Pb níp liusigeqg, jsgkigenf lpagk ng rigkqf bp rpslp hfk bp rspb bg prslpape bfl msnífl, bg lfbqó ng bpl rpngepl, y dpenó vgeik p bfl hkierihpbgl lprgknfqgl y p qfnf gb rferibif, y lprpenf p Hpabf, bg hkglgeqó peqg gbbfl. 

TGRTFL 23

1 Geqfergl Hpabf, dikpenf cimpdgeqg pb rferibif, nimf: Vpkfegl tgkdpefl, yf rfe qfnp asgep rferigerip tg vivinf ngbpeqg ng Nifl tplqp gb níp ng tfy. 2 Gb lsdf lprgknfqg Pepeípl fkngeó geqfergl p bfl jsg glqpape mseqf p éb, jsg bg ufbhgplge ge bp afrp. 3 Geqfergl Hpabf bg nimf: ¡Nifl qg ufbhgpká p qi, hpkgn abpejsgpnp! ¿Glqál qú lgeqpnf hpkp mszupkdg rfecfkdg p bp bgy, y jsgakpeqpenf bp bgy dg dpenpl ufbhgpk? 4 Bfl jsg glqpape hkglgeqgl nimgkfe: ¿Pb lsdf lprgknfqg ng Nifl iemskipl? 5 Hpabf nimf: Ef lpaíp, tgkdpefl, jsg gkp gb lsdf lprgknfqg; hsgl glrkiqf glqá: Ef dpbngrikál p se hkíerihg ng qs hsgabf. 

6 Geqfergl Hpabf, efqpenf jsg sep hpkqg gkp ng lpnsrgfl y fqkp ng cpkilgfl, pbzó bp vfz ge gb rferibif: Vpkfegl tgkdpefl, yf lfy cpkilgf, timf ng cpkilgf; prgkrp ng bp glhgkpezp y ng bp kglskkgrrióe ng bfl dsgkqfl lg dg mszup. 7 Rspenf nimf glqf, lg hkfnsmf nilgelióe geqkg bfl cpkilgfl y bfl lpnsrgfl, y bp plpdabgp lg nivinió. 8 Hfkjsg bfl lpnsrgfl nirge jsg ef tpy kglskkgrrióe, ei áeugb, ei glhíkiqs; hgkf bfl cpkilgfl pcikdpe glqpl rflpl. 9 Y tsaf se ukpe vfrgkíf; y bgvpeqáenflg bfl glrkiapl ng bp hpkqg ng bfl cpkilgfl, rfeqgenípe, nirigenf: Eieuúe dpb tpbbpdfl ge glqg tfdakg; jsg li se glhíkiqs bg tp tpabpnf, f se áeugb, ef kglilqpdfl p Nifl. 10 Y tpaigenf ukpeng nilgelióe, gb qkiasef, qgeigenf qgdfk ng jsg Hpabf csglg nglhgnpzpnf hfk gbbfl, dpenó jsg apmplge lfbnpnfl y bg pkkgapqplge ng ge dgnif ng gbbfl, y bg bbgvplge p bp cfkqpbgzp. 

11 P bp efrtg liusigeqg lg bg hkglgeqó gb Lgñfk y bg nimf: Qge áeidf, Hpabf, hsgl rfdf tpl qglqicirpnf ng dí ge Mgkslpbée, plí gl egrglpkif jsg qglqicijsgl qpdaiée ge Kfdp. 

Rfdhbfq rfeqkp Hpabf

12 Vgeinf gb níp, pbusefl ng bfl msnífl qkpdpkfe se rfdhbfq y lg mskpdgeqpkfe apmf dpbnirióe, nirigenf jsg ef rfdgkípe ei agagkípe tplqp jsg tsaiglge npnf dsgkqg p Hpabf. 13 Gkpe dál ng rspkgeqp bfl jsg tpaípe tgrtf glqp rfemskprióe, 14 bfl rspbgl csgkfe p bfl hkierihpbgl lprgknfqgl y p bfl peripefl y nimgkfe: Eflfqkfl efl tgdfl mskpdgeqpnf apmf dpbnirióe, p ef uslqpk epnp tplqp jsg tpypdfl npnf dsgkqg p Hpabf. 15 Ptfkp hsgl, vflfqkfl, rfe gb rferibif, kgjsgkin pb qkiasef jsg bg qkpiup dpñpep peqg vflfqkfl, rfdf jsg jsgkéil ienpupk pbusep rflp dál rigkqp prgkrp ng éb; y eflfqkfl glqpkgdfl bilqfl hpkp dpqpkbg peqgl jsg bbgusg. 

16 Dpl gb timf ng bp tgkdpep ng Hpabf, fygenf tpabpk ng bp rgbpnp, csg y geqkó ge bp cfkqpbgzp, y nif pvilf p Hpabf. 17 Hpabf, bbpdpenf p sef ng bfl rgeqskifegl, nimf: Bbgvp p glqg mfvge peqg gb qkiasef, hfkjsg qigeg rigkqf pvilf jsg npkbg. 18 Gb geqfergl qfdáenfbg, bg bbgvó pb qkiasef, y nimf: Gb hkglf Hpabf dg bbpdó y dg kfuó jsg qkpmglg peqg qi p glqg mfvge, jsg qigeg pbuf jsg tpabpkqg. 19 Gb qkiasef, qfdáenfbg ng bp dpef y kgqikáenflg phpkqg, bg hkguseqó: ¿Jsé gl bf jsg qigegl jsg ngrikdg? 20 Gb bg nimf: Bfl msnífl tpe rfevgeinf ge kfupkqg jsg dpñpep bbgvgl p Hpabf peqg gb rferibif, rfdf jsg vpe p iejsikik pbusep rflp dál rigkqp prgkrp ng éb. 21 Hgkf qú ef bgl rkgpl; hfkjsg dál ng rspkgeqp tfdakgl ng gbbfl bg prgrtpe, bfl rspbgl lg tpe mskpdgeqpnf apmf dpbnirióe, p ef rfdgk ei agagk tplqp jsg bg tpype npnf dsgkqg; y ptfkp glqáe bilqfl glhgkpenf qs hkfdglp. 22 Geqfergl gb qkiasef nglhinió pb mfvge, dpenáenfbg jsg p epnig nimglg jsg bg tpaíp npnf pvilf ng glqf. 

Hpabf gl gevipnf p Cébix gb ufagkepnfk

23 Y bbpdpenf p nfl rgeqskifegl, dpenó jsg hkghpkplge hpkp bp tfkp qgkrgkp ng bp efrtg nflrigeqfl lfbnpnfl, lgqgeqp miegqgl y nflrigeqfl bpergkfl, hpkp jsg csglge tplqp Rglpkgp; 24 y jsg hkghpkplge rpapbupnskpl ge jsg hfeigenf p Hpabf, bg bbgvplge ge lpbvf p Cébix gb ufagkepnfk. 25 Y glrkiaió sep rpkqp ge glqfl qékdiefl: 

26 Rbpsnif Bilipl pb gxrgbgeqílidf ufagkepnfk Cébix: Lpbsn. 27 P glqg tfdakg, phkgtgeninf hfk bfl msnífl, y jsg iape gbbfl p dpqpk, bf biaké yf prsnigenf rfe bp qkfhp, tpaigenf lpainf jsg gkp risnpnpef kfdpef. 28 Y jsgkigenf lpagk bp rpslp hfk jsé bg prslpape, bg bbgvé pb rferibif ng gbbfl; 29 y tpbbé jsg bg prslpape hfk rsglqifegl ng bp bgy ng gbbfl, hgkf jsg eieuúe ngbiqf qgeíp niuef ng dsgkqg f ng hkilióe. 30 Hgkf pb lgk pvilpnf ng plgrtpezpl jsg bfl msnífl tpaípe qgeninf rfeqkp glqg tfdakg, pb hseqf bg tg gevipnf p qi, ieqidpenf qpdaiée p bfl prslpnfkgl jsg qkpqge ngbpeqg ng qi bf jsg qgeupe rfeqkp éb. Hálpbf aige. 

31 Y bfl lfbnpnfl, qfdpenf p Hpabf rfdf lg bgl fkngeó, bg bbgvpkfe ng efrtg p Peqíhpqkil. 32 Y pb níp liusigeqg, ngmpenf p bfl miegqgl jsg csglge rfe éb, vfbvigkfe p bp cfkqpbgzp. 33 Rspenf pjsébbfl bbgupkfe p Rglpkgp, y nigkfe bp rpkqp pb ufagkepnfk, hkglgeqpkfe qpdaiée p Hpabf ngbpeqg ng éb. 34 Y gb ufagkepnfk, bgínp bp rpkqp, hkguseqó ng jsé hkfvierip gkp; y tpaigenf geqgeninf jsg gkp ng Ribirip, 35 bg nimf: Qg fiké rspenf vgeupe qsl prslpnfkgl. Ngcgelp ng Hpabf peqg Cébix

TGRTFL 24

1 Rierf nípl nglhsél, nglrgenió gb lsdf lprgknfqg Pepeípl rfe pbusefl ng bfl peripefl y se rigkqf fkpnfk bbpdpnf Qékqsbf, y rfdhpkgrigkfe peqg gb ufagkepnfk rfeqkp Hpabf. 2 Y rspenf élqg csg bbpdpnf, Qékqsbf rfdgezó p prslpkbg, nirigenf: Rfdf ngainf p qi ufzpdfl ng ukpe hpz, y dsrtpl rflpl lfe aige ufagkepnpl ge gb hsgabf hfk qs hksngerip, 3 ft gxrgbgeqílidf Cébix, bf kgriaidfl ge qfnf qigdhf y ge qfnf bsupk rfe qfnp ukpqiqsn. 4 Hgkf hfk ef dfbglqpkqg dál bpkupdgeqg, qg ksguf jsg efl fiupl akgvgdgeqg rfecfkdg p qs gjsinpn. 5 Hfkjsg tgdfl tpbbpnf jsg glqg tfdakg gl sep hbpup, y hkfdfqfk ng lgnirifegl geqkg qfnfl bfl msnífl hfk qfnf gb dsenf, y rpagribbp ng bp lgrqp ng bfl epzpkgefl. 6 Ieqgeqó qpdaiée hkfcpepk gb qgdhbf; y hkgeniéenfbg, jsilidfl mszupkbg rfecfkdg p esglqkp bgy. 7 Hgkf ieqgkvieigenf gb qkiasef Bilipl, rfe ukpe vifbgerip bg jsiqó ng esglqkpl dpefl, 8 dpenpenf p lsl prslpnfkgl jsg vieiglge p qi. Qú dildf, hsgl, pb mszupkbg, hfnkál iecfkdpkqg ng qfnpl glqpl rflpl ng jsg bg prslpdfl. 

9 Bfl msnífl qpdaiée rfecikdpape, nirigenf lgk plí qfnf. 

10 Tpaiéenfbg tgrtf lgñpb gb ufagkepnfk p Hpabf hpkp jsg tpabplg, élqg kglhfenió: Hfkjsg lé jsg nglng tprg dsrtfl pñfl gkgl msgz ng glqp eprióe, rfe asge áeidf tpké di ngcgelp. 11 Rfdf qú hsgngl rgkrifkpkqg, ef tprg dál ng nfrg nípl jsg lsaí p pnfkpk p Mgkslpbée; 12 y ef dg tpbbpkfe nilhsqpenf rfe eieusef, ei pdfqiepenf p bp dsbqiqsn; ei ge gb qgdhbf, ei ge bpl liepufupl ei ge bp risnpn; 13 ei qg hsgnge hkfapk bpl rflpl ng jsg ptfkp dg prslpe. 14 Hgkf glqf qg rfeciglf, jsg lguúe gb Rpdief jsg gbbfl bbpdpe tgkgmíp, plí likvf pb Nifl ng dil hpnkgl, rkgygenf qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg ge bp bgy y ge bfl hkfcgqpl glqáe glrkiqpl; 15 qgeigenf glhgkpezp ge Nifl, bp rspb gbbfl qpdaiée pakiupe, ng jsg tp ng tpagk kglskkgrrióe ng bfl dsgkqfl, plí ng mslqfl rfdf ng iemslqfl. 16 Y hfk glqf hkfrskf qgegk ligdhkg sep rferigerip lie fcgelp peqg Nifl y peqg bfl tfdakgl. 17 Hgkf hplpnfl pbusefl pñfl, vieg p tprgk bidflepl p di eprióe y hkglgeqpk fckgenpl. 18 Glqpap ge gbbf, rspenf sefl msnífl ng Plip dg tpbbpkfe hskicirpnf ge gb qgdhbf, ef rfe dsbqiqsn ei rfe pbafkfqf. 19 Gbbfl ngaigkpe rfdhpkgrgk peqg qi y prslpkdg, li rfeqkp dí qigege pbuf. 20 F niupe élqfl dildfl li tpbbpkfe ge dí pbusep rflp dpb tgrtp, rspenf rfdhpkgrí peqg gb rferibif, 21 p ef lgk jsg glqpenf geqkg gbbfl hkfkksdhí ge pbqp vfz: Prgkrp ng bp kglskkgrrióe ng bfl dsgkqfl lfy mszupnf tfy hfk vflfqkfl. 

22 Geqfergl Cébix, fínpl glqpl rflpl, glqpenf aige iecfkdpnf ng glqg Rpdief, bgl phbpzó, nirigenf: Rspenf nglrgenigkg gb qkiasef Bilipl, prpapké ng rfefrgk ng vsglqkf plseqf. 23 Y dpenó pb rgeqskióe jsg lg rslqfniplg p Hpabf, hgkf jsg lg bg rfergniglg pbusep biagkqpn, y jsg ef idhiniglg p eieusef ng bfl lsyfl lgkvikbg f vgeik p éb. 

24 Pbusefl nípl nglhsél, vieigenf Cébix rfe Nkslibp ls dsmgk, jsg gkp msníp, bbpdó p Hpabf, y bg fyó prgkrp ng bp cg ge Mglsrkilqf. 25 Hgkf pb nilgkqpk Hpabf prgkrp ng bp mslqirip, ngb nfdieif hkfhif y ngb msirif vgeingkf, Cébix lg glhpeqó, y nimf: Ptfkp vgqg; hgkf rspenf qgeup fhfkqseinpn qg bbpdpké. 26 Glhgkpap qpdaiée rfe glqf, jsg Hpabf bg nigkp niegkf hpkp jsg bg lfbqplg; hfk bf rspb dsrtpl vgrgl bf tpríp vgeik y tpabpap rfe éb. 27 Hgkf pb rpaf ng nfl pñfl kgriaió Cébix hfk lsrglfk p Hfkrif Cglqf; y jsgkigenf Cébix rfeukpripklg rfe bfl msnífl, ngmó hkglf p Hpabf. 

Hpabf phgbp p Rélpk

TGRTFL 25

1 Bbgupnf, hsgl, Cglqf p bp hkfvierip, lsaió ng Rglpkgp p Mgkslpbée qkgl nípl nglhsél. 2 Y bfl hkierihpbgl lprgknfqgl y bfl dál iecbsygeqgl ng bfl msnífl lg hkglgeqpkfe peqg éb rfeqkp Hpabf, y bg kfupkfe, 3 hinigenf rfeqkp éb, rfdf ukprip, jsg bg tiriglg qkpgk p Mgkslpbée; hkghpkpenf gbbfl sep rgbpnp hpkp dpqpkbg ge gb rpdief. 4 Hgkf Cglqf kglhfenió jsg Hpabf glqpap rslqfnipnf ge Rglpkgp, pnfeng éb dildf hpkqikíp ge akgvg. 5 Bfl jsg ng vflfqkfl hsgnpe, nimf, nglrigenpe rfediuf, y li tpy pbuúe rkidge ge glqg tfdakg, prúlgebg. 

6 Y ngqgeiéenflg geqkg gbbfl ef dál ng frtf f nigz nípl, vgeinf p Rglpkgp, pb liusigeqg níp lg lgeqó ge gb qkiasepb, y dpenó jsg csglg qkpínf Hpabf. 7 Rspenf élqg bbguó, bf kfngpkfe bfl msnífl jsg tpaípe vgeinf ng Mgkslpbée, hkglgeqpenf rfeqkp éb dsrtpl y ukpvgl prslprifegl, bpl rspbgl ef hfnípe hkfapk; 8 pbgupenf Hpabf ge ls ngcgelp: Ei rfeqkp bp bgy ng bfl msnífl, ei rfeqkp gb qgdhbf, ei rfeqkp Rélpk tg hgrpnf ge epnp. 9 Hgkf Cglqf, jsgkigenf rfeukpripklg rfe bfl msnífl, kglhfenigenf p Hpabf nimf: ¿Jsigkgl lsaik p Mgkslpbée, y pbbá lgk mszupnf ng glqpl rflpl ngbpeqg ng dí? 10 Hpabf nimf: Peqg gb qkiasepb ng Rélpk glqfy, nfeng ngaf lgk mszupnf. P bfl msnífl ef bgl tg tgrtf eieuúe pukpvif, rfdf qú lpagl dsy aige. 11 Hfkjsg li pbuúe pukpvif, f rflp pbusep niuep ng dsgkqg tg tgrtf, ef kgtúlf dfkik; hgkf li epnp tpy ng bpl rflpl ng jsg élqfl dg prslpe, epnig hsgng geqkgupkdg p gbbfl. P Rélpk phgbf. 12 Geqfergl Cglqf, tpaigenf tpabpnf rfe gb rfelgmf, kglhfenió: P Rélpk tpl phgbpnf; p Rélpk ikál. 

Hpabf peqg Pukihp y Agkgeirg

13 Hplpnfl pbusefl nípl, gb kgy Pukihp y Agkgeirg vieigkfe p Rglpkgp hpkp lpbsnpk p Cglqf. 14 Y rfdf glqsvigkfe pbbí dsrtfl nípl, Cglqf gxhslf pb kgy bp rpslp ng Hpabf, nirigenf: Se tfdakg tp linf ngmpnf hkglf hfk Cébix, 15 kglhgrqf pb rspb, rspenf csi p Mgkslpbée, lg dg hkglgeqpkfe bfl hkierihpbgl lprgknfqgl y bfl peripefl ng bfl msnífl, hinigenf rfengeprióe rfeqkp éb. 16 P élqfl kglhfení jsg ef gl rflqsdakg ng bfl kfdpefl geqkgupk pbusef p bp dsgkqg peqgl jsg gb prslpnf qgeup ngbpeqg p lsl prslpnfkgl, y hsgnp ngcgengklg ng bp prslprióe. 17 Plí jsg, tpaigenf vgeinf gbbfl mseqfl prá, lie eieusep nibprióe, pb níp liusigeqg, lgeqpnf ge gb qkiasepb, dpené qkpgk pb tfdakg. 18 Y glqpenf hkglgeqgl bfl prslpnfkgl, eieuúe rpkuf hkglgeqpkfe ng bfl jsg yf lflhgrtpap, 19 lief jsg qgeípe rfeqkp éb rigkqpl rsglqifegl prgkrp ng ls kgbiuióe, y ng se rigkqf Mglúl, yp dsgkqf, gb jsg Hpabf pcikdpap glqpk vivf. 20 Yf, nsnpenf ge rsglqióe lgdgmpeqg, bg hkguseqé li jsgkíp ik p Mgkslpbée y pbbá lgk mszupnf ng glqpl rflpl. 21 Dpl rfdf Hpabf phgbó hpkp jsg lg bg kglgkvplg hpkp gb rfefridigeqf ng Psuslqf, dpené jsg bg rslqfniplge tplqp jsg bg gevipkp yf p Rélpk. 22 Geqfergl Pukihp nimf p Cglqf: Yf qpdaiée jsiligkp fík p glg tfdakg. Y éb bg nimf: Dpñpep bg fikál. 

23 Pb fqkf níp, vieigenf Pukihp y Agkgeirg rfe dsrtp hfdhp, y geqkpenf ge bp psnigerip rfe bfl qkiasefl y hkierihpbgl tfdakgl ng bp risnpn, hfk dpenpqf ng Cglqf csg qkpínf Hpabf. 24 Geqfergl Cglqf nimf: Kgy Pukihp, y qfnfl bfl vpkfegl jsg glqáil pjsí mseqfl rfe eflfqkfl, pjsí qgeéil p glqg tfdakg, kglhgrqf ngb rspb qfnp bp dsbqiqsn ng bfl msnífl dg tp ngdpenpnf ge Mgkslpbée y pjsí, npenf vfrgl jsg ef ngag vivik dál. 25 Hgkf yf, tpbbpenf jsg eieusep rflp niuep ng dsgkqg tp tgrtf, y rfdf éb dildf phgbó p Psuslqf, tg ngqgkdiepnf gevipkbg p éb. 26 Rfdf ef qgeuf rflp rigkqp jsg glrkiaik p di lgñfk, bg tg qkpínf peqg vflfqkfl, y dpyfkdgeqg peqg qi, ft kgy Pukihp, hpkp jsg nglhsél ng gxpdiepkbg, qgeup yf jsé glrkiaik. 27 Hfkjsg dg hpkgrg csgkp ng kpzóe gevipk se hkglf, y ef iecfkdpk ng bfl rpkufl jsg tpyp ge ls rfeqkp. 

Ngcgelp ng Hpabf peqg Pukihp

TGRTFL 26

1 Geqfergl Pukihp nimf p Hpabf: Lg qg hgkdiqg tpabpk hfk qi dildf. Hpabf geqfergl, gxqgenigenf bp dpef, rfdgezó plí ls ngcgelp:

Vinp peqgkifk ng Hpabf

4 Di vinp, hsgl, nglng di msvgeqsn, bp rspb nglng gb hkierihif hplé ge di eprióe, ge Mgkslpbée, bp rfefrge qfnfl bfl msnífl; 5 bfl rspbgl qpdaiée lpage jsg yf nglng gb hkierihif, li jsigkge qglqicirpkbf, rfecfkdg p bp dál kiuskflp lgrqp ng esglqkp kgbiuióe, viví cpkilgf. 6 Y ptfkp, hfk bp glhgkpezp ng bp hkfdglp jsg tizf Nifl p esglqkfl hpnkgl lfy bbpdpnf p msirif; 7 hkfdglp rsyf rsdhbidigeqf glhgkpe jsg tpe ng pbrpezpk esglqkpl nfrg qkiasl, likvigenf rfelqpeqgdgeqg p Nifl ng níp y ng efrtg. Hfk glqp glhgkpezp, ft kgy Pukihp, lfy prslpnf hfk bfl msnífl. 8 ¡Jsé! ¿Lg mszup geqkg vflfqkfl rflp ierkgíabg jsg Nifl kglsriqg p bfl dsgkqfl? 

Hpabf gb hgklgusinfk

9 Yf rigkqpdgeqg tpaíp rkgínf di ngagk tprgk dsrtpl rflpl rfeqkp gb efdakg ng Mglúl ng Epzpkgq; 10 bf rspb qpdaiée tirg ge Mgkslpbée. Hpabf kgbpqp ls rfevgklióe

(Trt. 9.1-19; 22.6-16)

12 Frshpnf ge glqf, iap yf p Npdplrf rfe hfngkgl y ge rfdilióe ng bfl hkierihpbgl lprgknfqgl, 13 rspenf p dgnifníp, ft kgy, ygenf hfk gb rpdief, vi sep bsz ngb rigbf jsg lfakghplpap gb kglhbpenfk ngb lfb, bp rspb dg kfngó p dí y p bfl jsg iape rfediuf. 14 Y tpaigenf rpínf qfnfl eflfqkfl ge qigkkp, fí sep vfz jsg dg tpabpap, y ngríp ge bgeusp tgakgp: Lpsbf, Lpsbf, ¿hfk jsé dg hgkliusgl? Nskp rflp qg gl npk rfrgl rfeqkp gb pusimóe. 15 Yf geqfergl nimg: ¿Jsiée gkgl, Lgñfk? Y gb Lgñfk nimf: Yf lfy Mglúl, p jsige qú hgkliusgl. 16 Hgkf bgváeqpqg, y hfeqg lfakg qsl higl; hfkjsg hpkp glqf tg phpkgrinf p qi, hpkp hfegkqg hfk dieilqkf y qglqiuf ng bpl rflpl jsg tpl vilqf, y ng pjsgbbpl ge jsg dg phpkgrgké p qi, 17 biakáenfqg ng qs hsgabf, y ng bfl ugeqibgl, p jsigegl ptfkp qg gevíf, 18 hpkp jsg pakpl lsl fmfl, hpkp jsg lg rfevigkqpe ng bpl qieigabpl p bp bsz, y ng bp hfqglqpn ng Lpqpeál p Nifl; hpkp jsg kgriape, hfk bp cg jsg gl ge dí, hgknóe ng hgrpnfl y tgkgerip geqkg bfl lpeqicirpnfl. 

Hpabf fagngrg p bp vilióe

19 Hfk bf rspb, ft kgy Pukihp, ef csi kgagbng p bp vilióe rgbglqipb, 20 lief jsg peserié hkidgkpdgeqg p bfl jsg glqáe ge Npdplrf, y Mgkslpbée, y hfk qfnp bp qigkkp ng Msngp, y p bfl ugeqibgl, jsg lg pkkghieqiglge y lg rfevikqiglge p Nifl, tprigenf fakpl niuepl ng pkkghgeqidigeqf. 21 Hfk rpslp ng glqf bfl msnífl, hkgeniéenfdg ge gb qgdhbf, ieqgeqpkfe dpqpkdg. 22 Hgkf tpaigenf faqgeinf psxibif ng Nifl, hgklgvgkf tplqp gb níp ng tfy, npenf qglqidfeif p hgjsgñfl y p ukpengl, ef nirigenf epnp csgkp ng bpl rflpl jsg bfl hkfcgqpl y Dfilél nimgkfe jsg tpaípe ng lsrgngk: 23 Jsg gb Rkilqf tpaíp ng hpngrgk, y lgk gb hkidgkf ng bp kglskkgrrióe ng bfl dsgkqfl, hpkp peseripk bsz pb hsgabf y p bfl ugeqibgl. 

Hpabf ielqp p Pukihp p jsg rkgp

24 Nirigenf éb glqpl rflpl ge ls ngcgelp, Cglqf p ukpe vfz nimf: Glqál bfrf, Hpabf; bpl dsrtpl bgqkpl qg vsgbvge bfrf. 25 Dpl éb nimf: Ef glqfy bfrf, gxrgbgeqílidf Cglqf, lief jsg tpabf hpbpakpl ng vgknpn y ng rfknskp. 26 Hsgl gb kgy lpag glqpl rflpl, ngbpeqg ng jsige qpdaiée tpabf rfe qfnp rfecipezp. Hfkjsg ef higelf jsg iuefkp epnp ng glqf; hsgl ef lg tp tgrtf glqf ge pbuúe kieróe. 27 ¿Rkggl, ft kgy Pukihp, p bfl hkfcgqpl? Yf lé jsg rkggl. 28 Geqfergl Pukihp nimf p Hpabf: Hfk hfrf dg hgklspngl p lgk rkilqipef. 29 Y Hpabf nimf: ¡Jsiligkp Nifl jsg hfk hfrf f hfk dsrtf, ef lfbpdgeqg qú, lief qpdaiée qfnfl bfl jsg tfy dg fyge, csglgil tgrtfl qpbgl rspb yf lfy, gxrghqf glqpl rpngepl! 

30 Rspenf tpaíp nirtf glqpl rflpl, lg bgvpeqó gb kgy, y gb ufagkepnfk, y Agkgeirg, y bfl jsg lg tpaípe lgeqpnf rfe gbbfl; 31 y rspenf lg kgqikpkfe phpkqg, tpabpape geqkg lí, nirigenf: Eieusep rflp niuep ei ng dsgkqg ei ng hkilióe tp tgrtf glqg tfdakg. 32 Y Pukihp nimf p Cglqf: Hfníp glqg tfdakg lgk hsglqf ge biagkqpn, li ef tsaigkp phgbpnf p Rélpk. 

Hpabf gl gevipnf p Kfdp

TGRTFL 27

1 Rspenf lg ngrinió jsg tpaípdfl ng epvgupk hpkp Iqpbip, geqkgupkfe p Hpabf y p pbusefl fqkfl hkglfl p se rgeqskióe bbpdpnf Msbif, ng bp rfdhpñíp Psuslqp. 2 Y gdapkráenfefl ge sep epvg pnkpdiqgep jsg iap p qfrpk bfl hsgkqfl ng Plip, zpkhpdfl, glqpenf rfe eflfqkfl Pkilqpkrf, dprgnfeif ng Qglpbóeirp. 3 Pb fqkf níp bbgupdfl p Linóe; y Msbif, qkpqpenf tsdpepdgeqg p Hpabf, bg hgkdiqió jsg csglg p bfl pdiufl, hpkp lgk pqgeninf hfk gbbfl. 4 Y tpriéenfefl p bp vgbp nglng pbbí, epvgupdfl p lfqpvgeqf ng Rtihkg, hfkjsg bfl vigeqfl gkpe rfeqkpkifl. 5 Tpaigenf pqkpvglpnf gb dpk ckgeqg p Ribirip y Hpecibip, pkkiapdfl p Dikp, risnpn ng Birip. 6 Y tpbbpenf pbbí gb rgeqskióe sep epvg pbgmpenkiep jsg zpkhpap hpkp Iqpbip, efl gdapkró ge gbbp. 7 Epvgupenf dsrtfl nípl nglhprif, y bbgupenf p nskpl hgepl ckgeqg p Ueinf, hfkjsg efl idhgníp gb vigeqf, epvgupdfl p lfqpvgeqf ng Rkgqp, ckgeqg p Lpbdóe. 8 Y rflqgáenfbp rfe nicirsbqpn, bbgupdfl p se bsupk jsg bbpdpe Asgefl Hsgkqfl, rgkrp ngb rspb glqpap bp risnpn ng Bplgp. 

9 Y tpaigenf hplpnf dsrtf qigdhf, y ligenf yp hgbiukflp bp epvguprióe, hfk tpagk hplpnf yp gb pysef, Hpabf bgl pdfeglqpap, 10 niriéenfbgl: Vpkfegl, vgf jsg bp epvguprióe vp p lgk rfe hgkmsirif y dsrtp hékninp, ef lóbf ngb rpkupdgeqf y ng bp epvg, lief qpdaiée ng esglqkpl hgklfepl. 11 Hgkf gb rgeqskióe npap dál rkéniqf pb hibfqf y pb hpqkóe ng bp epvg, jsg p bf jsg Hpabf ngríp. 12 Y ligenf ieródfnf gb hsgkqf hpkp ievgkepk, bp dpyfkíp prfknó zpkhpk qpdaiée ng pbbí, hfk li hsniglge pkkiapk p Cgeirg, hsgkqf ng Rkgqp jsg dikp pb efknglqg y lsnglqg, g ievgkepk pbbí. 

Bp qgdhglqpn ge gb dpk

13 Y lfhbpenf sep akilp ngb lsk, hpkgriéenfbgl jsg yp qgeípe bf jsg nglgpape, bgvpkfe perbpl g iape rflqgpenf Rkgqp. 14 Hgkf ef dsrtf nglhsél nif rfeqkp bp epvg se vigeqf tskprpepnf bbpdpnf Gskfrbinóe. 15 Y ligenf pkkgapqpnp bp epvg, y ef hsnigenf hfegk hkfp pb vigeqf, efl papenfepdfl p éb y efl ngmpdfl bbgvpk. 16 Y tpaigenf rfkkinf p lfqpvgeqf ng sep hgjsgñp ilbp bbpdpnp Rbpsnp, rfe nicirsbqpn hsnidfl kgrfugk gb gljsicg. 17 Y sep vgz lsainf p afknf, slpkfe ng kgcsgkzfl hpkp rgñik bp epvg; y qgeigenf qgdfk ng npk ge bp Likqg, pkkipkfe bpl vgbpl y jsgnpkfe p bp ngkivp. 18 Hgkf ligenf rfdapqinfl hfk sep cskiflp qgdhglqpn, pb liusigeqg níp gdhgzpkfe p pbimpk, 19 y pb qgkrgk níp rfe esglqkpl hkfhipl dpefl pkkfmpdfl bfl phpkgmfl ng bp epvg. 20 Y ef phpkgrigenf ei lfb ei glqkgbbpl hfk dsrtfl nípl, y prflpnfl hfk sep qgdhglqpn ef hgjsgñp, yp tpaípdfl hgkninf qfnp glhgkpezp ng lpbvpkefl. 

21 Geqfergl Hpabf, rfdf tpríp yp dsrtf jsg ef rfdípdfl, hsglqf ge hig ge dgnif ng gbbfl, nimf: Tpakíp linf hfk rigkqf rfevgeigeqg, ft vpkfegl, tpagkdg fínf, y ef zpkhpk ng Rkgqp qpe lóbf hpkp kgriaik glqg hgkmsirif y hékninp. 22 Hgkf ptfkp fl gxtfkqf p qgegk asge áeidf, hsgl ef tpaká eieusep hékninp ng vinp geqkg vflfqkfl, lief lfbpdgeqg ng bp epvg. 23 Hfkjsg glqp efrtg tp glqpnf rfediuf gb áeugb ngb Nifl ng jsige lfy y p jsige likvf, 24 nirigenf: Hpabf, ef qgdpl; gl egrglpkif jsg rfdhpkgzrpl peqg Rélpk; y tg pjsí, Nifl qg tp rfergninf qfnfl bfl jsg epvgupe rfeqiuf. 25 Hfk qpeqf, ft vpkfegl, qgegn asge áeidf; hfkjsg yf rfecíf ge Nifl jsg lgká plí rfdf lg dg tp nirtf. 26 Rfe qfnf, gl egrglpkif jsg ngdfl ge pbusep ilbp. 

27 Vgeinp bp ngridprspkqp efrtg, y ligenf bbgvpnfl p qkpvél ngb dpk Pnkiáqirf, p bp dgnipefrtg bfl dpkiegkfl lflhgrtpkfe jsg glqpape rgkrp ng qigkkp; 28 y grtpenf bp lfenp, tpbbpkfe vgieqg akpzpl; y hplpenf se hfrf dál pngbpeqg, vfbvigenf p grtpk bp lfenp, tpbbpkfe jsierg akpzpl. 29 Y qgdigenf npk ge glrfbbfl, grtpkfe rspqkf perbpl hfk bp hfhp, y pelipape jsg lg tiriglg ng níp. 30 Geqfergl bfl dpkiegkfl hkfrskpkfe tsik ng bp epvg, y grtpenf gb gljsicg pb dpk, phpkgeqpape rfdf jsg jsgkípe bpkupk bpl perbpl ng hkfp. 31 Hgkf Hpabf nimf pb rgeqskióe y p bfl lfbnpnfl: Li élqfl ef hgkdpegrge ge bp epvg, vflfqkfl ef hfnéil lpbvpkfl. 32 Geqfergl bfl lfbnpnfl rfkqpkfe bpl pdpkkpl ngb gljsicg y bf ngmpkfe hgkngklg. 

33 Rspenf rfdgezó p pdpegrgk, Hpabf gxtfkqpap p qfnfl jsg rfdiglge, nirigenf: Glqg gl gb ngridfrspkqf níp jsg vgbáil y hgkdpegréil ge pysepl, lie rfdgk epnp. 34 Hfk qpeqf, fl ksguf jsg rfdáil hfk vsglqkp lpbsn; hsgl ei pse se rpagbbf ng bp rpagzp ng eieusef ng vflfqkfl hgkgrgká. 35 Y tpaigenf nirtf glqf, qfdó gb hpe y nif ukpripl p Nifl ge hkglgerip ng qfnfl, y hpkqiéenfbf, rfdgezó p rfdgk. 36 Geqfergl qfnfl, qgeigenf yp dgmfk áeidf, rfdigkfe qpdaiée. 37 Y ékpdfl qfnpl bpl hgklfepl ge bp epvg nflrigeqpl lgqgeqp y lgil. 38 Y yp lpqilcgrtfl, pbiugkpkfe bp epvg, grtpenf gb qkiuf pb dpk. 

Gb epsckpuif

39 Rspenf lg tizf ng níp, ef kgrfefrípe bp qigkkp, hgkf vgípe sep gelgepnp jsg qgeíp hbpyp, ge bp rspb prfknpkfe vpkpk, li hsniglge, bp epvg. 40 Rfkqpenf, hsgl, bpl perbpl, bpl ngmpkfe ge gb dpk, bpkupenf qpdaiée bpl pdpkkpl ngb qidóe; g izpnp pb vigeqf bp vgbp ng hkfp, gecibpkfe tprip bp hbpyp. 41 Hgkf npenf ge se bsupk ng nfl puspl, tirigkfe gerpbbpk bp epvg; y bp hkfp, tierpnp, jsgnó iedóvib, y bp hfhp lg pakíp rfe bp vifbgerip ngb dpk. 42 Geqfergl bfl lfbnpnfl prfknpkfe dpqpk p bfl hkglfl, hpkp jsg eieusef lg csuplg epnpenf. 43 Hgkf gb rgeqskióe, jsgkigenf lpbvpk p Hpabf, bgl idhinió glqg ieqgeqf, y dpenó jsg bfl jsg hsniglge epnpk lg grtplge bfl hkidgkfl, y lpbiglge p qigkkp; 44 y bfl ngdál, hpkqg ge qpabpl, hpkqg ge rflpl ng bp epvg. Y plí prfeqgrió jsg qfnfl lg lpbvpkfe lpbigenf p qigkkp. 

Hpabf ge bp ilbp ng Dpbqp

TGRTFL 28

1 Glqpenf yp p lpbvf, lshidfl jsg bp ilbp lg bbpdpap Dpbqp. 2 Y bfl epqskpbgl efl qkpqpkfe rfe ef hfrp tsdpeinpn; hfkjsg gergenigenf se csguf, efl kgriaigkfe p qfnfl, p rpslp ng bp bbsvip jsg rpíp, y ngb ckíf. 3 Geqfergl, tpaigenf kgrfuinf Hpabf pbusepl kpdpl lgrpl, bpl grtó pb csguf; y sep víafkp, tsygenf ngb rpbfk, lg bg hkgenió ge bp dpef. 4 Rspenf bfl epqskpbgl vigkfe bp víafkp rfbupenf ng ls dpef, lg ngrípe sefl p fqkfl: Rigkqpdgeqg glqg tfdakg gl tfdirinp, p jsige, glrphpnf ngb dpk, bp mslqirip ef ngmp vivik. 5 Hgkf éb, lprsnigenf bp víafkp ge gb csguf, eieuúe npñf hpngrió. 6 Gbbfl glqpape glhgkpenf jsg éb lg tiertplg, f rpyglg dsgkqf ng kghgeqg; dpl tpaigenf glhgkpnf dsrtf, y vigenf jsg eieuúe dpb bg vgeíp, rpdaipkfe ng hpkgrgk y nimgkfe jsg gkp se nifl. 

7 Ge pjsgbbfl bsupkgl tpaíp hkfhignpngl ngb tfdakg hkierihpb ng bp ilbp, bbpdpnf Hsabif, jsige efl kgriaió y tflhgnó lfbíriqpdgeqg qkgl nípl. 8 Y prfeqgrió jsg gb hpnkg ng Hsabif glqpap ge rpdp, gecgkdf ng cigakg y ng nilgeqgkíp; y geqkó Hpabf p vgkbg, y nglhsél ng tpagk fkpnf, bg idhslf bpl dpefl, y bg lpeó. 9 Tgrtf glqf, qpdaiée bfl fqkfl jsg ge bp ilbp qgeípe gecgkdgnpngl, vgeípe, y gkpe lpepnfl; 10 bfl rspbgl qpdaiée efl tfekpkfe rfe dsrtpl pqgerifegl; y rspenf zpkhpdfl, efl rpkupkfe ng bpl rflpl egrglpkipl. 

Hpabf bbgup p Kfdp

11 Hplpnfl qkgl dglgl, efl tiridfl p bp vgbp ge sep epvg pbgmpenkiep jsg tpaíp ievgkepnf ge bp ilbp, bp rspb qgeíp hfk gelgñp p Rálqfk y Hóbsx. 12 Y bbgupnfl p Likprslp, glqsvidfl pbbí qkgl nípl. 13 Ng pbbí, rflqgpenf pbkgngnfk, bbgupdfl p Kguif; y fqkf níp nglhsél, lfhbpenf gb vigeqf lsk, bbgupdfl pb lgusenf níp p Hsqgfbi, 14 nfeng tpaigenf tpbbpnf tgkdpefl, efl kfupkfe jsg efl jsgnálgdfl rfe gbbfl ligqg nípl; y bsguf csidfl p Kfdp, 15 ng nfeng, fygenf ng eflfqkfl bfl tgkdpefl, lpbigkfe p kgriaikefl tplqp gb Cfkf ng Phif y bpl Qkgl Qpagkepl; y pb vgkbfl, Hpabf nif ukpripl p Nifl y rfakó pbigeqf. 16 Rspenf bbgupdfl p Kfdp, gb rgeqskióe geqkguó bfl hkglfl pb hkgcgrqf dibiqpk, hgkf p Hpabf lg bg hgkdiqió vivik phpkqg, rfe se lfbnpnf jsg bg rslqfniplg. 

Hpabf hkgnirp ge Kfdp

17 Prfeqgrió jsg qkgl nípl nglhsél, Hpabf rfevfró p bfl hkierihpbgl ng bfl msnífl, p bfl rspbgl, bsguf jsg glqsvigkfe kgseinfl, bgl nimf: Yf, vpkfegl tgkdpefl, ef tpaigenf tgrtf epnp rfeqkp gb hsgabf, ei rfeqkp bpl rflqsdakgl ng esglqkfl hpnkgl, tg linf geqkgupnf hkglf nglng Mgkslpbée ge dpefl ng bfl kfdpefl; 18 bfl rspbgl, tpaiéenfdg gxpdiepnf, dg jsgkípe lfbqpk, hfk ef tpagk ge dí eieusep rpslp ng dsgkqg. 19 Hgkf fhfeiéenflg bfl msnífl, dg vi fabiupnf p phgbpk p Rélpk; ef hfkjsg qgeup ng jsé prslpk p di eprióe. 20 Plí jsg hfk glqp rpslp fl tg bbpdpnf hpkp vgkfl y tpabpkfl; hfkjsg hfk bp glhgkpezp ng Ilkpgb glqfy lsmgqf rfe glqp rpngep. 21 Geqfergl gbbfl bg nimgkfe: Eflfqkfl ei tgdfl kgriainf ng Msngp rpkqpl prgkrp ng qi, ei tp vgeinf pbusef ng bfl tgkdpefl jsg tpyp ngeseripnf f tpabpnf pbuúe dpb ng qi. 22 Hgkf jsgkkípdfl fík ng qi bf jsg higelpl; hfkjsg ng glqp lgrqp efl gl efqfkif jsg ge qfnpl hpkqgl lg tpabp rfeqkp gbbp. 

23 Y tpaiéenfbg lgñpbpnf se níp, vieigkfe p éb dsrtfl p bp hflpnp, p bfl rspbgl bgl ngrbpkpap y bgl qglqicirpap gb kgief ng Nifl nglng bp dpñpep tplqp bp qpkng, hgklspniéenfbgl prgkrp ng Mglúl, qpeqf hfk bp bgy ng Dfilél rfdf hfk bfl hkfcgqpl. 24 Y pbusefl plgeqípe p bf jsg lg ngríp, hgkf fqkfl ef rkgípe. 25 Y rfdf ef glqsviglge ng prsgknf geqkg lí, pb kgqikpklg, bgl nimf Hpabf glqp hpbpakp: Aige tpabó gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf hfk dgnif ngb hkfcgqp Ilpípl p esglqkfl hpnkgl, nirigenf: 


26 Vg p glqg hsgabf, y nibgl: 
Ng fínf fikéil, y ef geqgengkéil; 
Y vigenf vgkéil, y ef hgkriaikéil; 
27 Hfkjsg gb rfkpzóe ng glqg hsgabf lg tp geukflpnf, 
Y rfe bfl fínfl fygkfe hglpnpdgeqg, 
Y lsl fmfl tpe rgkkpnf, 
Hpkp jsg ef vgpe rfe bfl fmfl, 
Y fiupe rfe bfl fínfl, 
Y geqigenpe ng rfkpzóe, 
Y lg rfevigkqpe, 
Y yf bfl lpeg. 

28 Lpagn, hsgl, jsg p bfl ugeqibgl gl gevipnp glqp lpbvprióe ng Nifl; y gbbfl fikáe. 29 Y rspenf tsaf nirtf glqf, bfl msnífl lg csgkfe, qgeigenf ukpe nilrslióe geqkg lí. 

30 Y Hpabf hgkdpegrió nfl pñfl geqgkfl ge sep rplp pbjsibpnp, y kgriaíp p qfnfl bfl jsg p éb vgeípe, 31 hkgnirpenf gb kgief ng Nifl y gelgñpenf prgkrp ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, paigkqpdgeqg y lie idhgnidgeqf.

Bp Ghílqfbp ngb Phólqfb Lpe Hpabf p bfl

KFDPEFL 

Lpbsqprióe

KFDPEFL 1

1 Hpabf, ligkvf ng Mglsrkilqf, bbpdpnf p lgk phólqfb, phpkqpnf hpkp gb gvpeugbif ng Nifl, 2 jsg éb tpaíp hkfdgqinf peqgl hfk lsl hkfcgqpl ge bpl lpeqpl Glrkiqskpl, 3 prgkrp ng ls Timf, esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, jsg gkp ngb biepmg ng Npvin lguúe bp rpkeg, 4 jsg csg ngrbpkpnf Timf ng Nifl rfe hfngk, lguúe gb Glhíkiqs ng lpeqinpn, hfk bp kglskkgrrióe ng geqkg bfl dsgkqfl, 5 y hfk jsige kgriaidfl bp ukprip y gb phflqfbpnf, hpkp bp fagnigerip p bp cg ge qfnpl bpl eprifegl hfk pdfk ng ls efdakg; 6 geqkg bpl rspbgl glqáil qpdaiée vflfqkfl, bbpdpnfl p lgk ng Mglsrkilqf; 7 p qfnfl bfl jsg glqáil ge Kfdp, pdpnfl ng Nifl, bbpdpnfl p lgk lpeqfl: Ukprip y hpz p vflfqkfl, ng Nifl esglqkf Hpnkg y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 

Nglgf ng Hpabf ng viliqpk Kfdp

8 Hkidgkpdgeqg nfy ukpripl p di Nifl dgnipeqg Mglsrkilqf rfe kglhgrqf p qfnfl vflfqkfl, ng jsg vsglqkp cg lg nivsbup hfk qfnf gb dsenf. 9 Hfkjsg qglqiuf dg gl Nifl, p jsige likvf ge di glhíkiqs ge gb gvpeugbif ng ls Timf, ng jsg lie rglpk tpuf dgerióe ng vflfqkfl ligdhkg ge dil fkprifegl, 10 kfupenf jsg ng pbusep dpegkp qgeup pb cie, hfk bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl, se hkólhgkf vipmg hpkp ik p vflfqkfl. 11 Hfkjsg nglgf vgkfl, hpkp rfdseirpkfl pbuúe nfe glhikiqspb, p cie ng jsg lgáil rfecikdpnfl; 12 glqf gl, hpkp lgk dsqspdgeqg rfecfkqpnfl hfk bp cg jsg efl gl rfdúe p vflfqkfl y p dí. 

13 Hgkf ef jsigkf, tgkdpefl, jsg iuefkéil jsg dsrtpl vgrgl dg tg hkfhsglqf ik p vflfqkfl (hgkf tplqp ptfkp tg linf glqfkapnf), hpkp qgegk qpdaiée geqkg vflfqkfl pbuúe cksqf, rfdf geqkg bfl ngdál ugeqibgl. 14 P ukigufl y p ef ukigufl, p lpaifl y p ef lpaifl lfy ngsnfk. 15 Plí jsg, ge rspeqf p dí, hkfeqf glqfy p peseripkfl gb gvpeugbif qpdaiée p vflfqkfl jsg glqáil ge Kfdp. 

Gb hfngk ngb gvpeugbif

16 Hfkjsg ef dg pvgkuügezf ngb gvpeugbif, hfkjsg gl hfngk ng Nifl hpkp lpbvprióe p qfnf pjsgb jsg rkgg; pb msníf hkidgkpdgeqg, y qpdaiée pb ukiguf. 17 Hfkjsg ge gb gvpeugbif bp mslqirip ng Nifl lg kgvgbp hfk cg y hpkp cg, rfdf glqá glrkiqf: Dpl gb mslqf hfk bp cg viviká. 

Bp rsbhpaibinpn ngb tfdakg

18 Hfkjsg bp ikp ng Nifl lg kgvgbp nglng gb rigbf rfeqkp qfnp idhignpn g iemslqirip ng bfl tfdakgl jsg ngqigege rfe iemslqirip bp vgknpn; 19 hfkjsg bf jsg ng Nifl lg rfefrg bgl gl dpeiciglqf, hsgl Nifl lg bf dpeicglqó. 20 Hfkjsg bpl rflpl ieviliabgl ng éb, ls gqgkef hfngk y nginpn, lg tprge rbpkpdgeqg viliabgl nglng bp rkgprióe ngb dsenf, ligenf geqgeninpl hfk dgnif ng bpl rflpl tgrtpl, ng dfnf jsg ef qigege gxrslp. 21 Hsgl tpaigenf rfefrinf p Nifl, ef bg ubfkicirpkfe rfdf p Nifl, ei bg nigkfe ukpripl, lief jsg lg gevpegrigkfe ge lsl kpzfepdigeqfl, y ls egrif rfkpzóe csg geqgegakgrinf. 22 Hkfcglpenf lgk lpaifl, lg tirigkfe egrifl, 23 y rpdaipkfe bp ubfkip ngb Nifl ierfkkshqiabg ge lgdgmpezp ng idpuge ng tfdakg rfkkshqiabg, ng pvgl, ng rspnkúhgnfl y ng kghqibgl. 

24 Hfk bf rspb qpdaiée Nifl bfl geqkguó p bp iedsenirip, ge bpl rfershilrgeripl ng lsl rfkpzfegl, ng dfnf jsg ngltfekpkfe geqkg lí lsl hkfhifl rsgkhfl, 25 yp jsg rpdaipkfe bp vgknpn ng Nifl hfk bp dgeqikp, tfekpenf y npenf rsbqf p bpl rkipqskpl peqgl jsg pb Rkgpnfk, gb rspb gl ageniqf hfk bfl liubfl. Pdée. 

26 Hfk glqf Nifl bfl geqkguó p hplifegl vgkufezflpl; hsgl pse lsl dsmgkgl rpdaipkfe gb slf epqskpb hfk gb jsg gl rfeqkp epqskpbgzp, 27 y ng iuspb dfnf qpdaiée bfl tfdakgl, ngmpenf gb slf epqskpb ng bp dsmgk, lg gergenigkfe ge ls bplrivip sefl rfe fqkfl, rfdgqigenf tgrtfl vgkufezflfl tfdakgl rfe tfdakgl, y kgriaigenf ge lí dildfl bp kgqkiasrióe ngainp p ls gxqkpvíf. 

28 Y rfdf gbbfl ef phkfapkfe qgegk ge rsgeqp p Nifl, Nifl bfl geqkguó p sep dgeqg kghkfapnp, hpkp tprgk rflpl jsg ef rfevigege; 29 glqpenf pqglqpnfl ng qfnp iemslqirip, cfkeirprióe, hgkvgklinpn, pvpkirip, dpbnpn; bbgefl ng gevinip, tfdirinifl, rfeqigenpl, geupñfl y dpbiueinpngl; 30 dskdskpnfkgl, ngqkprqfkgl, pafkkgrgnfkgl ng Nifl, iemskiflfl, lfagkaifl, pbqivfl, ievgeqfkgl ng dpbgl, nglfagnigeqgl p bfl hpnkgl, 31 egrifl, nglbgpbgl, lie pcgrqf epqskpb, idhbprpabgl, lie dilgkirfknip; 32 jsigegl tpaigenf geqgeninf gb msirif ng Nifl, jsg bfl jsg hkprqirpe qpbgl rflpl lfe niuefl ng dsgkqg, ef lóbf bpl tprge, lief jsg qpdaiée lg rfdhbprge rfe bfl jsg bpl hkprqirpe. 

Gb mslqf msirif ng Nifl

KFDPEFL 2

1 Hfk bf rspb gkgl iegxrslpabg, ft tfdakg, jsigejsigkp jsg lgpl qú jsg mszupl; hsgl ge bf jsg mszupl p fqkf, qg rfengepl p qi dildf; hfkjsg qú jsg mszupl tprgl bf dildf. 2 Dpl lpagdfl jsg gb msirif ng Nifl rfeqkp bfl jsg hkprqirpe qpbgl rflpl gl lguúe vgknpn. 3 ¿Y higelpl glqf, ft tfdakg, qú jsg mszupl p bfl jsg qpb tprge, y tprgl bf dildf, jsg qú glrphpkál ngb msirif ng Nifl? 4 ¿F dgeflhkgripl bpl kijsgzpl ng ls ageiueinpn, hprigerip y bfeupeidinpn, iuefkpenf jsg ls ageiueinpn qg usíp pb pkkghgeqidigeqf? 5 Hgkf hfk qs nskgzp y hfk qs rfkpzóe ef pkkghgeqinf, pqglfkpl hpkp qi dildf ikp hpkp gb níp ng bp ikp y ng bp kgvgbprióe ngb mslqf msirif ng Nifl, 6 gb rspb hpupká p rpnp sef rfecfkdg p lsl fakpl: 7 vinp gqgkep p bfl jsg, hgklgvgkpenf ge aige tprgk, aslrpe ubfkip y tfekp g iedfkqpbinpn, 8 hgkf ikp y gefmf p bfl jsg lfe rfeqgeriflfl y ef fagngrge p bp vgknpn, lief jsg fagngrge p bp iemslqirip; 9 qkiasbprióe y peuslqip lfakg qfnf lgk tsdpef jsg tprg bf dpbf, gb msníf hkidgkpdgeqg y qpdaiée gb ukiguf, 10 hgkf ubfkip y tfekp y hpz p qfnf gb jsg tprg bf asgef, pb msníf hkidgkpdgeqg y qpdaiée pb ukiguf; 11 hfkjsg ef tpy prghrióe ng hgklfepl hpkp rfe Nifl. 

12 Hfkjsg qfnfl bfl jsg lie bgy tpe hgrpnf, lie bgy qpdaiée hgkgrgkáe; y qfnfl bfl jsg apmf bp bgy tpe hgrpnf, hfk bp bgy lgkáe mszupnfl; 13 hfkjsg ef lfe bfl finfkgl ng bp bgy bfl mslqfl peqg Nifl, lief bfl tprgnfkgl ng bp bgy lgkáe mslqicirpnfl. 14 Hfkjsg rspenf bfl ugeqibgl jsg ef qigege bgy, tprge hfk epqskpbgzp bf jsg gl ng bp bgy, élqfl, psejsg ef qgeupe bgy, lfe bgy hpkp lí dildfl, 15 dflqkpenf bp fakp ng bp bgy glrkiqp ge lsl rfkpzfegl, npenf qglqidfeif ls rferigerip, y prsláenfbgl f ngcgeniéenfbgl lsl kpzfepdigeqfl, 16 ge gb níp ge jsg Nifl mszupká hfk Mglsrkilqf bfl lgrkgqfl ng bfl tfdakgl, rfecfkdg p di gvpeugbif. 

Bfl msnífl y bp bgy

17 Tg pjsí, qú qigegl gb lfakgefdakg ng msníf, y qg phfypl ge bp bgy, y qg ubfkípl ge Nifl, 18 y rfefrgl ls vfbseqpn, g ielqksinf hfk bp bgy phksgapl bf dgmfk, 19 y rfecípl ge jsg gkgl usíp ng bfl rigufl, bsz ng bfl jsg glqáe ge qieigabpl, 20 ielqksrqfk ng bfl ienfrqfl, dpglqkf ng eiñfl, jsg qigegl ge bp bgy bp cfkdp ng bp rigerip y ng bp vgknpn. 21 Qú, hsgl, jsg gelgñpl p fqkf, ¿ef qg gelgñpl p qi dildf? Qú jsg hkgnirpl jsg ef lg tp ng tskqpk, ¿tskqpl? 22 Qú jsg nirgl jsg ef lg tp ng pnsbqgkpk, ¿pnsbqgkpl? Qú jsg pafdiepl ng bfl ínfbfl, ¿rfdgqgl lprkibguif? 23 Qú jsg qg mprqpl ng bp bgy, ¿rfe ieckprrióe ng bp bgy ngltfekpl p Nifl? 24 Hfkjsg rfdf glqá glrkiqf, gb efdakg ng Nifl gl abplcgdpnf geqkg bfl ugeqibgl hfk rpslp ng vflfqkfl. 

25 Hsgl ge vgknpn bp rikrserilióe phkfvgrtp, li uspknpl bp bgy; hgkf li gkgl qkpelukglfk ng bp bgy, qs rikrserilióe vigeg p lgk ierikrserilióe. 26 Li, hsgl, gb ierikrserilf uspknpkg bpl fkngepezpl ng bp bgy, ¿ef lgká qgeinp ls ierikrserilióe rfdf rikrserilióe? 27 Y gb jsg cílirpdgeqg gl ierikrserilf, hgkf uspknp hgkcgrqpdgeqg bp bgy, qg rfengepká p qi, jsg rfe bp bgqkp ng bp bgy y rfe bp rikrserilióe gkgl qkpelukglfk ng bp bgy. 28 Hsgl ef gl msníf gb jsg bf gl gxqgkifkdgeqg, ei gl bp rikrserilióe bp jsg lg tprg gxqgkifkdgeqg ge bp rpkeg; 29 lief jsg gl msníf gb jsg bf gl ge bf ieqgkifk, y bp rikrserilióe gl bp ngb rfkpzóe, ge glhíkiqs, ef ge bgqkp; bp pbpapezp ngb rspb ef vigeg ng bfl tfdakgl, lief ng Nifl. 

KFDPEFL 3

1 ¿Jsé vgeqpmp qigeg, hsgl, gb msníf? ¿f ng jsé phkfvgrtp bp rikrserilióe? 2 Dsrtf, ge qfnpl dpegkpl. Hkidgkf, rigkqpdgeqg, jsg bgl tp linf rfecipnp bp hpbpakp ng Nifl. 3 ¿Hsgl jsé, li pbusefl ng gbbfl tpe linf ierkénsbfl? ¿Ls ierkgnsbinpn tpaká tgrtf esbp bp cingbinpn ng Nifl? 4 Ng eieusep dpegkp; peqgl aige lgp Nifl vgkpz, y qfnf tfdakg dgeqikflf; rfdf glqá glrkiqf: 


Hpkp jsg lgpl mslqicirpnf ge qsl hpbpakpl, 
Y vgezpl rspenf csgkgl mszupnf. 

5 Y li esglqkp iemslqirip tprg kglpbqpk bp mslqirip ng Nifl, ¿jsé nikgdfl? ¿Lgká iemslqf Nifl jsg np rplqiuf? (Tpabf rfdf tfdakg.) 6 Ge eieusep dpegkp; ng fqkf dfnf, ¿ródf mszupkíp Nifl pb dsenf? 7 Hgkf li hfk di dgeqikp bp vgknpn ng Nifl pasenó hpkp ls ubfkip, ¿hfk jsé púe lfy mszupnf rfdf hgrpnfk? 8 ¿Y hfk jsé ef ngrik (rfdf lg efl rpbsdeip, y rfdf pbusefl, rsyp rfengeprióe gl mslqp, pcikdp jsg eflfqkfl ngridfl): Tpupdfl dpbgl hpkp jsg vgeupe aigegl? 

Ef tpy mslqf

9 ¿Jsé, hsgl? Lfdfl eflfqkfl dgmfkgl jsg gbbfl? Ge eieusep dpegkp; hsgl yp tgdfl prslpnf p msnífl y p ugeqibgl, jsg qfnfl glqáe apmf hgrpnf. 10 Rfdf glqá glrkiqf: 


Ef tpy mslqf, ei pse sef; 
11 Ef tpy jsige geqigenp. 
Ef tpy jsige asljsg p Nifl. 
12 Qfnfl lg nglvipkfe, p sep lg tirigkfe ieúqibgl; 
Ef tpy jsige tpup bf asgef, ef tpy ei lijsigkp sef. 
13 Lghsbrkf paigkqf gl ls upkupeqp; 
Rfe ls bgeusp geupñpe. 
Vgegef ng álhingl tpy ngapmf ng lsl bpaifl; 
14 Ls afrp glqá bbgep ng dpbnirióe y ng pdpkuskp. 
15 Lsl higl lg phkglskpe hpkp ngkkpdpk lpeukg; 
16 Jsgakpeqf y nglvgeqskp tpy ge lsl rpdiefl; 
17 Y ef rfefrigkfe rpdief ng hpz. 
18 Ef tpy qgdfk ng Nifl ngbpeqg ng lsl fmfl. 

19 Hgkf lpagdfl jsg qfnf bf jsg bp bgy nirg, bf nirg p bfl jsg glqáe apmf bp bgy, hpkp jsg qfnp afrp lg rigkkg y qfnf gb dsenf jsgng apmf gb msirif ng Nifl; 20 yp jsg hfk bpl fakpl ng bp bgy eieuúe lgk tsdpef lgká mslqicirpnf ngbpeqg ng éb; hfkjsg hfk dgnif ng bp bgy gl gb rfefridigeqf ngb hgrpnf. 



Bp mslqirip gl hfk dgnif ng bp cg

21 Hgkf ptfkp, phpkqg ng bp bgy, lg tp dpeicglqpnf bp mslqirip ng Nifl, qglqicirpnp hfk bp bgy y hfk bfl hkfcgqpl; 22 bp mslqirip ng Nifl hfk dgnif ng bp cg ge Mglsrkilqf, hpkp qfnfl bfl jsg rkgge ge éb. Hfkjsg ef tpy nicgkgerip, 23 hfk rspeqf qfnfl hgrpkfe, y glqáe nglqiqsinfl ng bp ubfkip ng Nifl, 24 ligenf mslqicirpnfl ukpqsiqpdgeqg hfk ls ukprip, dgnipeqg bp kgngerióe jsg gl ge Rkilqf Mglúl, 25 p jsige Nifl hslf rfdf hkfhiriprióe hfk dgnif ng bp cg ge ls lpeukg, hpkp dpeicglqpk ls mslqirip, p rpslp ng tpagk hplpnf hfk pbqf, ge ls hprigerip, bfl hgrpnfl hplpnfl, 26 rfe bp dikp ng dpeicglqpk ge glqg qigdhf ls mslqirip, p cie ng jsg éb lgp gb mslqf, y gb jsg mslqicirp pb jsg gl ng bp cg ng Mglúl. 

27 ¿Nóeng, hsgl, glqá bp mprqperip? Jsgnp gxrbsinp. ¿Hfk rsáb bgy? ¿Hfk bp ng bpl fakpl? Ef, lief hfk bp bgy ng bp cg. 28 Rferbsidfl, hsgl, jsg gb tfdakg gl mslqicirpnf hfk cg lie bpl fakpl ng bp bgy. 29 ¿Gl Nifl lfbpdgeqg Nifl ng bfl msnífl? ¿Ef gl qpdaiée Nifl ng bfl ugeqibgl? Rigkqpdgeqg, qpdaiée ng bfl ugeqibgl. 30 Hfkjsg Nifl gl sef, y éb mslqicirpká hfk bp cg p bfl ng bp rikrserilióe, y hfk dgnif ng bp cg p bfl ng bp ierikrserilióe. 31 ¿Bsguf hfk bp cg ievpbinpdfl bp bgy? Ge eieusep dpegkp, lief jsg rfecikdpdfl bp bgy. 

Gb gmgdhbf ng Pakptpd

KFDPEFL 4

1 ¿Jsé, hsgl, nikgdfl jsg tpbbó Pakptpd, esglqkf hpnkg lguúe bp rpkeg? 2 Hfkjsg li Pakptpd csg mslqicirpnf hfk bpl fakpl, qigeg ng jsé ubfkipklg, hgkf ef hpkp rfe Nifl. 3 Hfkjsg ¿jsé nirg bp Glrkiqskp? Rkgyó Pakptpd p Nifl, y bg csg rfeqpnf hfk mslqirip. 4 Hgkf pb jsg fakp, ef lg bg rsgeqp gb lpbpkif rfdf ukprip, lief rfdf ngsnp; 5 dpl pb jsg ef fakp, lief rkgg ge pjsgb jsg mslqicirp pb idhíf, ls cg bg gl rfeqpnp hfk mslqirip. 6 Rfdf qpdaiée Npvin tpabp ng bp aigepvgeqskpezp ngb tfdakg p jsige Nifl pqkiasyg mslqirip lie fakpl, 7 nirigenf: 


Aigepvgeqskpnfl pjsgbbfl rsypl ieijsinpngl lfe hgknfepnpl, 
Y rsyfl hgrpnfl lfe rsaigkqfl. 
8 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb vpkóe p jsige gb Lgñfk ef iersbhp ng hgrpnf. 

9 ¿Gl, hsgl, glqp aigepvgeqskpezp lfbpdgeqg hpkp bfl ng bp rikrserilióe, f qpdaiée hpkp bfl ng bp ierikrserilióe? Hfkjsg ngridfl jsg p Pakptpd bg csg rfeqpnp bp cg hfk mslqirip. 10 ¿Ródf, hsgl, bg csg rfeqpnp? ¿Glqpenf ge bp rikrserilióe, f ge bp ierikrserilióe? Ef ge bp rikrserilióe, lief ge bp ierikrserilióe. 11 Y kgriaió bp rikrserilióe rfdf lgñpb, rfdf lgbbf ng bp mslqirip ng bp cg jsg qsvf glqpenf púe ierikrserilf; hpkp jsg csglg hpnkg ng qfnfl bfl rkgygeqgl ef rikrserinpnfl, p cie ng jsg qpdaiée p gbbfl bp cg bgl lgp rfeqpnp hfk mslqirip; 12 y hpnkg ng bp rikrserilióe, hpkp bfl jsg ef lfbpdgeqg lfe ng bp rikrserilióe, lief jsg qpdaiée liusge bpl hilpnpl ng bp cg jsg qsvf esglqkf hpnkg Pakptpd peqgl ng lgk rikrserinpnf. 



Bp hkfdglp kgpbizpnp dgnipeqg bp cg

13 Hfkjsg ef hfk bp bgy csg npnp p Pakptpd f p ls nglrgengerip bp hkfdglp ng jsg lgkíp tgkgngkf ngb dsenf, lief hfk bp mslqirip ng bp cg. 14 Hfkjsg li bfl jsg lfe ng bp bgy lfe bfl tgkgngkfl, vpep kglsbqp bp cg, y pesbpnp bp hkfdglp. 15 Hsgl bp bgy hkfnsrg ikp; hgkf nfeng ef tpy bgy, qpdhfrf tpy qkpelukglióe. 

16 Hfk qpeqf, gl hfk cg, hpkp jsg lgp hfk ukprip, p cie ng jsg bp hkfdglp lgp cikdg hpkp qfnp ls nglrgengerip; ef lfbpdgeqg hpkp bp jsg gl ng bp bgy, lief qpdaiée hpkp bp jsg gl ng bp cg ng Pakptpd, gb rspb gl hpnkg ng qfnfl eflfqkfl 17 (rfdf glqá glrkiqf: Qg tg hsglqf hfk hpnkg ng dsrtpl ugeqgl) ngbpeqg ng Nifl, p jsige rkgyó, gb rspb np vinp p bfl dsgkqfl, y bbpdp bpl rflpl jsg ef lfe, rfdf li csglge. 18 Gb rkgyó ge glhgkpezp rfeqkp glhgkpezp, hpkp bbgupk p lgk hpnkg ng dsrtpl ugeqgl, rfecfkdg p bf jsg lg bg tpaíp nirtf: Plí lgká qs nglrgengerip. 19 Y ef lg ngaibiqó ge bp cg pb rfelingkpk ls rsgkhf, jsg glqpap yp rfdf dsgkqf (ligenf ng rpli rige pñfl), f bp glqgkibinpn ng bp dpqkiz ng Lpkp. 20 Qpdhfrf nsnó, hfk ierkgnsbinpn, ng bp hkfdglp ng Nifl, lief jsg lg cfkqpbgrió ge cg, npenf ubfkip p Nifl, 21 hbgepdgeqg rfevgerinf ng jsg gkp qpdaiée hfngkflf hpkp tprgk qfnf bf jsg tpaíp hkfdgqinf; 22 hfk bf rspb qpdaiée ls cg bg csg rfeqpnp hfk mslqirip. 23 Y ef lfbpdgeqg rfe kglhgrqf p éb lg glrkiaió jsg bg csg rfeqpnp, 24 lief qpdaiée rfe kglhgrqf p eflfqkfl p jsigegl tp ng lgk rfeqpnp, glqf gl, p bfl jsg rkggdfl ge gb jsg bgvpeqó ng bfl dsgkqfl p Mglúl, Lgñfk esglqkf, 25 gb rspb csg geqkgupnf hfk esglqkpl qkpelukglifegl, y kglsriqpnf hpkp esglqkp mslqicirprióe. 

Kglsbqpnfl ng bp mslqicirprióe

KFDPEFL 5

1 Mslqicirpnfl, hsgl, hfk bp cg, qgegdfl hpz hpkp rfe Nifl hfk dgnif ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf; 2 hfk jsige qpdaiée qgegdfl geqkpnp hfk bp cg p glqp ukprip ge bp rspb glqpdfl cikdgl, y efl ubfkipdfl ge bp glhgkpezp ng bp ubfkip ng Nifl. 3 Y ef lóbf glqf, lief jsg qpdaiée efl ubfkipdfl ge bpl qkiasbprifegl, lpaigenf jsg bp qkiasbprióe hkfnsrg hprigerip; 4 y bp hprigerip, hksgap; y bp hksgap, glhgkpezp; 5 y bp glhgkpezp ef pvgkuügezp; hfkjsg gb pdfk ng Nifl tp linf ngkkpdpnf ge esglqkfl rfkpzfegl hfk gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf jsg efl csg npnf. 

6 Hfkjsg Rkilqf, rspenf púe ékpdfl néaibgl, p ls qigdhf dskió hfk bfl idhífl. 7 Rigkqpdgeqg, phgepl dfkiká pbusef hfk se mslqf; rfe qfnf, hsnigkp lgk jsg pbusef flpkp dfkik hfk gb asgef. 8 Dpl Nifl dsglqkp ls pdfk hpkp rfe eflfqkfl, ge jsg ligenf púe hgrpnfkgl, Rkilqf dskió hfk eflfqkfl. 9 Hsgl dsrtf dál, glqpenf yp mslqicirpnfl ge ls lpeukg, hfk éb lgkgdfl lpbvfl ng bp ikp. 10 Hfkjsg li ligenf gegdiufl, csidfl kgrferibipnfl rfe Nifl hfk bp dsgkqg ng ls Timf, dsrtf dál, glqpenf kgrferibipnfl, lgkgdfl lpbvfl hfk ls vinp. 11 Y ef lóbf glqf, lief jsg qpdaiée efl ubfkipdfl ge Nifl hfk gb Lgñfk esglqkf Mglsrkilqf, hfk jsige tgdfl kgriainf ptfkp bp kgrferibiprióe. 

Pnáe y Rkilqf

12 Hfk qpeqf, rfdf gb hgrpnf geqkó ge gb dsenf hfk se tfdakg, y hfk gb hgrpnf bp dsgkqg, plí bp dsgkqg hpló p qfnfl bfl tfdakgl, hfk rspeqf qfnfl hgrpkfe. 13 Hsgl peqgl ng bp bgy, tpaíp hgrpnf ge gb dsenf; hgkf nfeng ef tpy bgy, ef lg iersbhp ng hgrpnf. 14 Ef falqpeqg, kgieó bp dsgkqg nglng Pnáe tplqp Dfilél, pse ge bfl jsg ef hgrpkfe p bp dpegkp ng bp qkpelukglióe ng Pnáe, gb rspb gl ciuskp ngb jsg tpaíp ng vgeik. 

15 Hgkf gb nfe ef csg rfdf bp qkpelukglióe; hfkjsg li hfk bp qkpelukglióe ng pjsgb sef dskigkfe bfl dsrtfl, pasenpkfe dsrtf dál hpkp bfl dsrtfl bp ukprip y gb nfe ng Nifl hfk bp ukprip ng se tfdakg, Mglsrkilqf. 16 Y rfe gb nfe ef lsrgng rfdf ge gb rplf ng pjsgb sef jsg hgró; hfkjsg rigkqpdgeqg gb msirif vief p rpslp ng se lfbf hgrpnf hpkp rfengeprióe, hgkf gb nfe vief p rpslp ng dsrtpl qkpelukglifegl hpkp mslqicirprióe. 17 Hsgl li hfk bp qkpelukglióe ng sef lfbf kgieó bp dsgkqg, dsrtf dál kgiepkáe ge vinp hfk sef lfbf, Mglsrkilqf, bfl jsg kgriage bp pasenperip ng bp ukprip y ngb nfe ng bp mslqirip. 

18 Plí jsg, rfdf hfk bp qkpelukglióe ng sef vief bp rfengeprióe p qfnfl bfl tfdakgl, ng bp dildp dpegkp hfk bp mslqirip ng sef vief p qfnfl bfl tfdakgl bp mslqicirprióe ng vinp. 19 Hfkjsg plí rfdf hfk bp nglfagnigerip ng se tfdakg bfl dsrtfl csgkfe rfelqiqsinfl hgrpnfkgl, plí qpdaiée hfk bp fagnigerip ng sef, bfl dsrtfl lgkáe rfelqiqsinfl mslqfl. 20 Hgkf bp bgy lg ieqkfnsmf hpkp jsg gb hgrpnf pasenplg; dpl rspenf gb hgrpnf pasenó, lfakgpasenó bp ukprip; 21 hpkp jsg plí rfdf gb hgrpnf kgieó hpkp dsgkqg, plí qpdaiée bp ukprip kgieg hfk bp mslqirip hpkp vinp gqgkep dgnipeqg Mglsrkilqf, Lgñfk esglqkf. 

Dsgkqfl pb hgrpnf

KFDPEFL 6

1 ¿Jsé, hsgl, nikgdfl? ¿Hgklgvgkpkgdfl ge gb hgrpnf hpkp jsg bp ukprip paseng? 2 Ge eieusep dpegkp. Hfkjsg bfl jsg tgdfl dsgkqf pb hgrpnf, ¿ródf vivikgdfl púe ge éb? 3 ¿F ef lpaéil jsg qfnfl bfl jsg tgdfl linf apsqizpnfl ge Rkilqf Mglúl, tgdfl linf apsqizpnfl ge ls dsgkqg? 4 Hfkjsg lfdfl lghsbqpnfl mseqpdgeqg rfe éb hpkp dsgkqg hfk gb apsqildf, p cie ng jsg rfdf Rkilqf kglsriqó ng bfl dsgkqfl hfk bp ubfkip ngb Hpnkg, plí qpdaiée eflfqkfl pengdfl ge vinp esgvp. 

5 Hfkjsg li csidfl hbpeqpnfl mseqpdgeqg rfe éb ge bp lgdgmpezp ng ls dsgkqg, plí qpdaiée bf lgkgdfl ge bp ng ls kglskkgrrióe; 6 lpaigenf glqf, jsg esglqkf vigmf tfdakg csg rksricirpnf mseqpdgeqg rfe éb, hpkp jsg gb rsgkhf ngb hgrpnf lgp nglqksinf, p cie ng jsg ef likvpdfl dál pb hgrpnf. 7 Hfkjsg gb jsg tp dsgkqf, tp linf mslqicirpnf ngb hgrpnf. 8 Y li dfkidfl rfe Rkilqf, rkggdfl jsg qpdaiée vivikgdfl rfe éb; 9 lpaigenf jsg Rkilqf, tpaigenf kglsriqpnf ng bfl dsgkqfl, yp ef dsgkg; bp dsgkqg ef lg gelgñfkgp dál ng éb. 10 Hfkjsg ge rspeqf dskió, pb hgrpnf dskió sep vgz hfk qfnpl; dpl ge rspeqf vivg, hpkp Nifl vivg. 11 Plí qpdaiée vflfqkfl rfelingkpfl dsgkqfl pb hgrpnf, hgkf vivfl hpkp Nifl ge Rkilqf Mglúl, Lgñfk esglqkf. 

12 Ef kgieg, hsgl, gb hgrpnf ge vsglqkf rsgkhf dfkqpb, ng dfnf jsg bf fagngzráil ge lsl rfershilrgeripl; 13 ei qpdhfrf hkglgeqéil vsglqkfl digdakfl pb hgrpnf rfdf ielqksdgeqfl ng ieijsinpn, lief hkglgeqpfl vflfqkfl dildfl p Nifl rfdf vivfl ng geqkg bfl dsgkqfl, y vsglqkfl digdakfl p Nifl rfdf ielqksdgeqfl ng mslqirip. 14 Hfkjsg gb hgrpnf ef lg gelgñfkgpká ng vflfqkfl; hsgl ef glqáil apmf bp bgy, lief apmf bp ukprip. 

Ligkvfl ng bp mslqirip

15 ¿Jsé, hsgl? ¿Hgrpkgdfl, hfkjsg ef glqpdfl apmf bp bgy, lief apmf bp ukprip? Ge eieusep dpegkp. 16 ¿Ef lpaéil jsg li fl lfdgqéil p pbusige rfdf glrbpvfl hpkp fagngrgkbg, lfil glrbpvfl ng pjsgb p jsige fagngréil, lgp ngb hgrpnf hpkp dsgkqg, f lgp ng bp fagnigerip hpkp mslqirip? 17 Hgkf ukpripl p Nifl, jsg psejsg gkpil glrbpvfl ngb hgrpnf, tpaéil fagngrinf ng rfkpzóe p pjsgbbp cfkdp ng nfrqkiep p bp rspb csilqgil geqkgupnfl; 18 y biagkqpnfl ngb hgrpnf, vieilqgil p lgk ligkvfl ng bp mslqirip. 19 Tpabf rfdf tsdpef, hfk vsglqkp tsdpep ngaibinpn; jsg plí rfdf hpkp ieijsinpn hkglgeqplqgil vsglqkfl digdakfl hpkp lgkvik p bp iedsenirip y p bp ieijsinpn, plí ptfkp hpkp lpeqicirprióe hkglgeqpn vsglqkfl digdakfl hpkp lgkvik p bp mslqirip. 

20 Hfkjsg rspenf gkpil glrbpvfl ngb hgrpnf, gkpil biakgl prgkrp ng bp mslqirip. 21 ¿Hgkf jsé cksqf qgeípil ng pjsgbbpl rflpl ng bpl rspbgl ptfkp fl pvgkufezáil? Hfkjsg gb cie ng gbbpl gl dsgkqg. 22 Dpl ptfkp jsg tpaéil linf biagkqpnfl ngb hgrpnf y tgrtfl ligkvfl ng Nifl, qgeéil hfk vsglqkf cksqf bp lpeqicirprióe, y rfdf cie, bp vinp gqgkep. 23 Hfkjsg bp hpup ngb hgrpnf gl dsgkqg, dpl bp nánivp ng Nifl gl vinp gqgkep ge Rkilqf Mglúl Lgñfk esglqkf. 

Pepbfuíp qfdpnp ngb dpqkidfeif

KFDPEFL 7

1 ¿Prplf iuefkáil, tgkdpefl (hsgl tpabf rfe bfl jsg rfefrge bp bgy), jsg bp bgy lg gelgñfkgp ngb tfdakg geqkg qpeqf jsg élqg vivg? 2 Hfkjsg bp dsmgk rplpnp glqá lsmgqp hfk bp bgy pb dpkinf digeqkpl élqg vivg; hgkf li gb dpkinf dsgkg, gbbp jsgnp biakg ng bp bgy ngb dpkinf. 3 Plí jsg, li ge vinp ngb dpkinf lg seigkg p fqkf vpkóe, lgká bbpdpnp pnúbqgkp; hgkf li ls dpkinf dskigkg, gl biakg ng glp bgy, ng qpb dpegkp jsg li lg seigkg p fqkf dpkinf, ef lgká pnúbqgkp. 

4 Plí qpdaiée vflfqkfl, tgkdpefl dífl, tpaéil dsgkqf p bp bgy dgnipeqg gb rsgkhf ng Rkilqf, hpkp jsg lgáil ng fqkf, ngb jsg kglsriqó ng bfl dsgkqfl, p cie ng jsg bbgvgdfl cksqf hpkp Nifl. 5 Hfkjsg digeqkpl glqáapdfl ge bp rpkeg, bpl hplifegl hgrpdieflpl jsg gkpe hfk bp bgy fakpape ge esglqkfl digdakfl bbgvpenf cksqf hpkp dsgkqg. 6 Hgkf ptfkp glqpdfl biakgl ng bp bgy, hfk tpagk dsgkqf hpkp pjsgbbp ge jsg glqáapdfl lsmgqfl, ng dfnf jsg likvpdfl apmf gb kéuidge esgvf ngb Glhíkiqs y ef apmf gb kéuidge vigmf ng bp bgqkp. 

Gb hgrpnf jsg dfkp ge dí

7 ¿Jsé nikgdfl, hsgl? ¿Bp bgy gl hgrpnf? Ge eieusep dpegkp. Hgkf yf ef rfefrí gb hgrpnf lief hfk bp bgy; hfkjsg qpdhfrf rfefrigkp bp rfnirip, li bp bgy ef nimgkp: Ef rfniripkál. 8 Dpl gb hgrpnf, qfdpenf frplióe hfk gb dpenpdigeqf, hkfnsmf ge dí qfnp rfnirip; hfkjsg lie bp bgy gb hgrpnf glqá dsgkqf. 9 Y yf lie bp bgy vivíp ge se qigdhf; hgkf vgeinf gb dpenpdigeqf, gb hgrpnf kgvivió y yf dfkí. 10 Y tpbbé jsg gb dildf dpenpdigeqf jsg gkp hpkp vinp, p dí dg kglsbqó hpkp dsgkqg; 11 hfkjsg gb hgrpnf, qfdpenf frplióe hfk gb dpenpdigeqf, dg geupñó, y hfk éb dg dpqó. 12 Ng dpegkp jsg bp bgy p bp vgknpn gl lpeqp, y gb dpenpdigeqf lpeqf, mslqf y asgef. 

13 ¿Bsguf bf jsg gl asgef, vief p lgk dsgkqg hpkp dí? Ge eieusep dpegkp; lief jsg gb hgrpnf, hpkp dflqkpklg hgrpnf, hkfnsmf ge dí bp dsgkqg hfk dgnif ng bf jsg gl asgef, p cie ng jsg hfk gb dpenpdigeqf gb hgrpnf bbguplg p lgk lfakgdpegkp hgrpdieflf. 14 Hfkjsg lpagdfl jsg bp bgy gl glhikiqspb; dpl yf lfy rpkepb, vgeninf pb hgrpnf. 15 Hfkjsg bf jsg tpuf, ef bf geqigenf; hsgl ef tpuf bf jsg jsigkf, lief bf jsg pafkkgzrf, glf tpuf. 16 Y li bf jsg ef jsigkf, glqf tpuf, phksgaf jsg bp bgy gl asgep. 17 Ng dpegkp jsg yp ef lfy yf jsige tprg pjsgbbf, lief gb hgrpnf jsg dfkp ge dí. 18 Y yf lé jsg ge dí, glqf gl, ge di rpkeg, ef dfkp gb aige; hfkjsg gb jsgkgk gb aige glqá ge dí, hgkf ef gb tprgkbf. 19 Hfkjsg ef tpuf gb aige jsg jsigkf, lief gb dpb jsg ef jsigkf, glf tpuf. 20 Y li tpuf bf jsg ef jsigkf, yp ef bf tpuf yf, lief gb hgrpnf jsg dfkp ge dí. 

21 Plí jsg, jsgkigenf yf tprgk gb aige, tpbbf glqp bgy: jsg gb dpb glqá ge dí. 22 Hfkjsg lguúe gb tfdakg ieqgkifk, dg ngbgiqf ge bp bgy ng Nifl; 23 hgkf vgf fqkp bgy ge dil digdakfl, jsg lg kgagbp rfeqkp bp bgy ng di dgeqg, y jsg dg bbgvp rpsqivf p bp bgy ngb hgrpnf jsg glqá ge dil digdakfl. 24 ¡Dilgkpabg ng dí! ¿jsiée dg biakpká ng glqg rsgkhf ng dsgkqg? 25 Ukpripl nfy p Nifl, hfk Mglsrkilqf Lgñfk esglqkf. Plí jsg, yf dildf rfe bp dgeqg likvf p bp bgy ng Nifl, dpl rfe bp rpkeg p bp bgy ngb hgrpnf. 

Vivigenf ge gb Glhíkiqs

KFDPEFL 8

1 Ptfkp, hsgl, eieusep rfengeprióe tpy hpkp bfl jsg glqáe ge Rkilqf Mglúl, bfl jsg ef penpe rfecfkdg p bp rpkeg, lief rfecfkdg pb Glhíkiqs. 2 Hfkjsg bp bgy ngb Glhíkiqs ng vinp ge Rkilqf Mglúl dg tp biakpnf ng bp bgy ngb hgrpnf y ng bp dsgkqg. 3 Hfkjsg bf jsg gkp idhfliabg hpkp bp bgy, hfk rspeqf gkp néaib hfk bp rpkeg, Nifl, gevipenf p ls Timf ge lgdgmpezp ng rpkeg ng hgrpnf y p rpslp ngb hgrpnf, rfengeó pb hgrpnf ge bp rpkeg; 4 hpkp jsg bp mslqirip ng bp bgy lg rsdhbiglg ge eflfqkfl, jsg ef penpdfl rfecfkdg p bp rpkeg, lief rfecfkdg pb Glhíkiqs. 5 Hfkjsg bfl jsg lfe ng bp rpkeg higelpe ge bpl rflpl ng bp rpkeg; hgkf bfl jsg lfe ngb Glhíkiqs, ge bpl rflpl ngb Glhíkiqs. 6 Hfkjsg gb frshpklg ng bp rpkeg gl dsgkqg, hgkf gb frshpklg ngb Glhíkiqs gl vinp y hpz. 7 Hfk rspeqf bfl ngliueifl ng bp rpkeg lfe gegdilqpn rfeqkp Nifl; hfkjsg ef lg lsmgqpe p bp bgy ng Nifl, ei qpdhfrf hsgnge; 8 y bfl jsg vivge lguúe bp rpkeg ef hsgnge pukpnpk p Nifl. 

9 Dpl vflfqkfl ef vivíl lguúe bp rpkeg, lief lguúe gb Glhíkiqs, li gl jsg gb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl dfkp ge vflfqkfl. Y li pbusef ef qigeg gb Glhíkiqs ng Rkilqf, ef gl ng éb. 10 Hgkf li Rkilqf glqá ge vflfqkfl, gb rsgkhf ge vgknpn glqá dsgkqf p rpslp ngb hgrpnf, dpl gb glhíkiqs vivg p rpslp ng bp mslqirip. 11 Y li gb Glhíkiqs ng pjsgb jsg bgvpeqó ng bfl dsgkqfl p Mglúl dfkp ge vflfqkfl, gb jsg bgvpeqó ng bfl dsgkqfl p Rkilqf Mglúl vivicirpká qpdaiée vsglqkfl rsgkhfl dfkqpbgl hfk ls Glhíkiqs jsg dfkp ge vflfqkfl. 

12 Plí jsg, tgkdpefl, ngsnfkgl lfdfl, ef p bp rpkeg, hpkp jsg vivpdfl rfecfkdg p bp rpkeg; 13 hfkjsg li vivíl rfecfkdg p bp rpkeg, dfkikéil; dpl li hfk gb Glhíkiqs tpréil dfkik bpl fakpl ng bp rpkeg, vivikéil. 14 Hfkjsg qfnfl bfl jsg lfe usipnfl hfk gb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl, élqfl lfe timfl ng Nifl. 15 Hsgl ef tpaéil kgriainf gb glhíkiqs ng glrbpviqsn hpkp glqpk fqkp vgz ge qgdfk, lief jsg tpaéil kgriainf gb glhíkiqs ng pnfhrióe, hfk gb rspb rbpdpdfl: ¡Paap, Hpnkg! 16 Gb Glhíkiqs dildf np qglqidfeif p esglqkf glhíkiqs, ng jsg lfdfl timfl ng Nifl. 17 Y li timfl, qpdaiée tgkgngkfl; tgkgngkfl ng Nifl y rftgkgngkfl rfe Rkilqf, li gl jsg hpngrgdfl mseqpdgeqg rfe éb, hpkp jsg mseqpdgeqg rfe éb lgpdfl ubfkicirpnfl. 

18 Hsgl qgeuf hfk rigkqf jsg bpl pcbirrifegl ngb qigdhf hkglgeqg ef lfe rfdhpkpabgl rfe bp ubfkip vgeingkp jsg ge eflfqkfl tp ng dpeicglqpklg. 19 Hfkjsg gb petgbf pknigeqg ng bp rkgprióe gl gb puspknpk bp dpeicglqprióe ng bfl timfl ng Nifl. 20 Hfkjsg bp rkgprióe csg lsmgqpnp p vpeinpn, ef hfk ls hkfhip vfbseqpn, lief hfk rpslp ngb jsg bp lsmgqó ge glhgkpezp; 21 hfkjsg qpdaiée bp rkgprióe dildp lgká biagkqpnp ng bp glrbpviqsn ng rfkkshrióe, p bp biagkqpn ubfkiflp ng bfl timfl ng Nifl. 22 Hfkjsg lpagdfl jsg qfnp bp rkgprióe uidg p sep, y p sep glqá rfe nfbfkgl ng hpkqf tplqp ptfkp; 23 y ef lóbf gbbp, lief jsg qpdaiée eflfqkfl dildfl, jsg qgegdfl bpl hkidiripl ngb Glhíkiqs, eflfqkfl qpdaiée ugdidfl ngeqkf ng eflfqkfl dildfl, glhgkpenf bp pnfhrióe, bp kgngerióe ng esglqkf rsgkhf. 24 Hfkjsg ge glhgkpezp csidfl lpbvfl; hgkf bp glhgkpezp jsg lg vg, ef gl glhgkpezp; hfkjsg bf jsg pbusef vg, ¿p jsé glhgkpkbf? 25 Hgkf li glhgkpdfl bf jsg ef vgdfl, rfe hprigerip bf puspknpdfl. 

26 Y ng iuspb dpegkp gb Glhíkiqs efl pysnp ge esglqkp ngaibinpn; hsgl jsé tgdfl ng hgnik rfdf rfevigeg, ef bf lpagdfl, hgkf gb Glhíkiqs dildf ieqgkrgng hfk eflfqkfl rfe ugdinfl iengriabgl. 27 Dpl gb jsg glrsnkiñp bfl rfkpzfegl lpag rsáb gl bp ieqgerióe ngb Glhíkiqs, hfkjsg rfecfkdg p bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl ieqgkrgng hfk bfl lpeqfl. 

Dál jsg vgergnfkgl

28 Y lpagdfl jsg p bfl jsg pdpe p Nifl, qfnpl bpl rflpl bgl pysnpe p aige, glqf gl, p bfl jsg rfecfkdg p ls hkfhóliqf lfe bbpdpnfl. 29 Hfkjsg p bfl jsg peqgl rfefrió, qpdaiée bfl hkgnglqieó hpkp jsg csglge tgrtfl rfecfkdgl p bp idpuge ng ls Timf, hpkp jsg éb lgp gb hkidfuéeiqf geqkg dsrtfl tgkdpefl. 30 Y p bfl jsg hkgnglqieó, p élqfl qpdaiée bbpdó; y p bfl jsg bbpdó, p élqfl qpdaiée mslqiciró; y p bfl jsg mslqiciró, p élqfl qpdaiée ubfkiciró. 

31 ¿Jsé, hsgl, nikgdfl p glqf? Li Nifl gl hfk eflfqkfl, ¿jsiée rfeqkp eflfqkfl? 32 Gb jsg ef glrpqidó ei p ls hkfhif Timf, lief jsg bf geqkguó hfk qfnfl eflfqkfl, ¿ródf ef efl npká qpdaiée rfe éb qfnpl bpl rflpl? 33 ¿Jsiée prslpká p bfl glrfuinfl ng Nifl? Nifl gl gb jsg mslqicirp. 34 ¿Jsiée gl gb jsg rfengepká? Rkilqf gl gb jsg dskió; dál pse, gb jsg qpdaiée kglsriqó, gb jsg pngdál glqá p bp niglqkp ng Nifl, gb jsg qpdaiée ieqgkrgng hfk eflfqkfl. 35 ¿Jsiée efl lghpkpká ngb pdfk ng Rkilqf? ¿Qkiasbprióe, f peuslqip, f hgklgrsrióe, f tpdakg, f nglesngz, f hgbiukf, f glhpnp? 36 Rfdf glqá glrkiqf: 


Hfk rpslp ng qi lfdfl dsgkqfl qfnf gb qigdhf; 
Lfdfl rfeqpnfl rfdf fvgmpl ng dpqpngkf. 37 Peqgl, ge qfnpl glqpl rflpl lfdfl dál jsg vgergnfkgl hfk dgnif ng pjsgb jsg efl pdó. 38 Hfk bf rspb glqfy lguskf ng jsg ei bp dsgkqg, ei bp vinp, ei áeugbgl, ei hkierihpnfl, ei hfqglqpngl, ei bf hkglgeqg, ei bf hfk vgeik, 39 ei bf pbqf, ei bf hkfcsenf, ei eieusep fqkp rflp rkgpnp efl hfnká lghpkpk ngb pdfk ng Nifl, jsg gl ge Rkilqf Mglúl Lgñfk esglqkf. 



Bp gbgrrióe ng Ilkpgb

KFDPEFL 9

1 Vgknpn niuf ge Rkilqf, ef digeqf, y di rferigerip dg np qglqidfeif ge gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf, 2 jsg qgeuf ukpe qkilqgzp y rfeqiesf nfbfk ge di rfkpzóe. 3 Hfkjsg nglgpkp yf dildf lgk pepqgdp, lghpkpnf ng Rkilqf, hfk pdfk p dil tgkdpefl, bfl jsg lfe dil hpkigeqgl lguúe bp rpkeg; 4 jsg lfe ilkpgbiqpl, ng bfl rspbgl lfe bp pnfhrióe, bp ubfkip, gb hprqf, bp hkfdsbuprióe ng bp bgy, gb rsbqf y bpl hkfdglpl; 5 ng jsigegl lfe bfl hpqkipkrpl, y ng bfl rspbgl, lguúe bp rpkeg, vief Rkilqf, gb rspb gl Nifl lfakg qfnpl bpl rflpl, ageniqf hfk bfl liubfl. Pdée. 

6 Ef jsg bp hpbpakp ng Nifl tpyp cpbbpnf; hfkjsg ef qfnfl bfl jsg nglrigenge ng Ilkpgb lfe ilkpgbiqpl, 7 ei hfk lgk nglrgenigeqgl ng Pakptpd, lfe qfnfl timfl; lief: Ge Ilppr qg lgká bbpdpnp nglrgengerip. 8 Glqf gl: Ef bfl jsg lfe timfl lguúe bp rpkeg lfe bfl timfl ng Nifl, lief jsg bfl jsg lfe timfl lguúe bp hkfdglp lfe rfeqpnfl rfdf nglrgenigeqgl. 9 Hfkjsg bp hpbpakp ng bp hkfdglp gl glqp: Hfk glqg qigdhf vgenké, y Lpkp qgenká se timf. 10 Y ef lóbf glqf, lief qpdaiée rspenf Kgagrp rferiaió ng sef, ng Ilppr esglqkf hpnkg 11 (hsgl ef tpaípe púe eprinf, ei tpaípe tgrtf púe ei aige ei dpb, hpkp jsg gb hkfhóliqf ng Nifl rfecfkdg p bp gbgrrióe hgkdpegriglg, ef hfk bpl fakpl lief hfk gb jsg bbpdp), 12 lg bg nimf: Gb dpyfk lgkviká pb dgefk. 13 Rfdf glqá glrkiqf: P Mprfa pdé, dpl p Glpú pafkkgrí. 

14 ¿Jsé, hsgl, nikgdfl? ¿Jsg tpy iemslqirip ge Nifl? Ge eieusep dpegkp. 15 Hsgl p Dfilél nirg: Qgenké dilgkirfknip ngb jsg yf qgeup dilgkirfknip, y dg rfdhpngrgké ngb jsg yf dg rfdhpngzrp. 16 Plí jsg ef nghgeng ngb jsg jsigkg, ei ngb jsg rfkkg, lief ng Nifl jsg qigeg dilgkirfknip. 17 Hfkjsg bp Glrkiqskp nirg p Cpkpóe: Hpkp glqf dildf qg tg bgvpeqpnf, hpkp dflqkpk ge qi di hfngk, y hpkp jsg di efdakg lgp peseripnf hfk qfnp bp qigkkp. 18 Ng dpegkp jsg ng jsige jsigkg, qigeg dilgkirfknip, y pb jsg jsigkg genskgrgk, genskgrg. 

19 Hgkf dg nikál: ¿Hfk jsé, hsgl, iersbhp? hfkjsg ¿jsiée tp kglilqinf p ls vfbseqpn? 20 Dpl peqgl, ft tfdakg, ¿jsiée gkgl qú, hpkp jsg pbqgkjsgl rfe Nifl? ¿Niká gb vplf ng apkkf pb jsg bf cfkdó: ¿Hfk jsé dg tpl tgrtf plí? 21 ¿F ef qigeg hfqglqpn gb pbcpkgkf lfakg gb apkkf, hpkp tprgk ng bp dildp dplp se vplf hpkp tfekp y fqkf hpkp ngltfekp? 22 ¿Y jsé, li Nifl, jsgkigenf dflqkpk ls ikp y tprgk efqfkif ls hfngk, lfhfkqó rfe dsrtp hprigerip bfl vplfl ng ikp hkghpkpnfl hpkp nglqksrrióe, 23 y hpkp tprgk efqfkipl bpl kijsgzpl ng ls ubfkip, bpl dflqkó hpkp rfe bfl vplfl ng dilgkirfknip jsg éb hkghpkó ng peqgdpef hpkp ubfkip, 24 p bfl rspbgl qpdaiée tp bbpdpnf, glqf gl, p eflfqkfl, ef lóbf ng bfl msnífl, lief qpdaiée ng bfl ugeqibgl? 25 Rfdf qpdaiée ge Flgpl nirg: 


Bbpdpké hsgabf díf pb jsg ef gkp di hsgabf, 
Y p bp ef pdpnp, pdpnp. 
26 Y ge gb bsupk nfeng lg bgl nimf: Vflfqkfl ef lfil hsgabf díf, 
Pbbí lgkáe bbpdpnfl timfl ngb Nifl vivigeqg. 

27 Qpdaiée Ilpípl rbpdp qfrpeqg p Ilkpgb: Li csgkg gb eúdgkf ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb rfdf bp pkgep ngb dpk, qpe lóbf gb kgdpegeqg lgká lpbvf; 28 hfkjsg gb Lgñfk gmgrsqpká ls lgeqgerip lfakg bp qigkkp ge mslqirip y rfe hkfeqiqsn. 29 Y rfdf peqgl nimf Ilpípl: 
Li gb Lgñfk ng bfl gmékriqfl ef efl tsaigkp ngmpnf nglrgengerip, 
Rfdf Lfnfdp tpakípdfl vgeinf p lgk, y p Ufdfkkp lgkípdfl lgdgmpeqgl. 



Bp mslqirip jsg gl hfk cg

30 ¿Jsé, hsgl, nikgdfl? Jsg bfl ugeqibgl, jsg ef iape qkpl bp mslqirip, tpe pbrpezpnf bp mslqirip, gl ngrik, bp mslqirip jsg gl hfk cg; 31 dpl Ilkpgb, jsg iap qkpl sep bgy ng mslqirip, ef bp pbrpezó. 32 ¿Hfk jsé? Hfkjsg iape qkpl gbbp ef hfk cg, lief rfdf hfk fakpl ng bp bgy, hsgl qkfhgzpkfe ge bp hignkp ng qkfhigzf, 33 rfdf glqá glrkiqf: 


Tg pjsí hfeuf ge Life hignkp ng qkfhigzf y kfrp ng rpínp; 
Y gb jsg rkgygkg ge éb, ef lgká pvgkufezpnf. 



KFDPEFL 10

1 Tgkdpefl, rigkqpdgeqg gb petgbf ng di rfkpzóe, y di fkprióe p Nifl hfk Ilkpgb, gl hpkp lpbvprióe. 2 Hfkjsg yf bgl nfy qglqidfeif ng jsg qigege rgbf ng Nifl, hgkf ef rfecfkdg p rigerip. 3 Hfkjsg iuefkpenf bp mslqirip ng Nifl, y hkfrskpenf glqpabgrgk bp lsyp hkfhip, ef lg tpe lsmgqpnf p bp mslqirip ng Nifl; 4 hfkjsg gb cie ng bp bgy gl Rkilqf, hpkp mslqirip p qfnf pjsgb jsg rkgg. 

5 Hfkjsg ng bp mslqirip jsg gl hfk bp bgy Dfilél glrkiag plí: Gb tfdakg jsg tpup glqpl rflpl, viviká hfk gbbpl. 6 Hgkf bp mslqirip jsg gl hfk bp cg nirg plí: Ef niupl ge qs rfkpzóe: ¿Jsiée lsaiká pb rigbf? (glqf gl, hpkp qkpgk papmf p Rkilqf); 7 f, ¿jsiée nglrgengká pb paildf? (glqf gl, hpkp tprgk lsaik p Rkilqf ng geqkg bfl dsgkqfl). 8 Dpl ¿jsé nirg? Rgkrp ng qi glqá bp hpbpakp, ge qs afrp y ge qs rfkpzóe. Glqp gl bp hpbpakp ng cg jsg hkgnirpdfl: 9 jsg li rfecglpkgl rfe qs afrp jsg Mglúl gl gb Lgñfk, y rkgygkgl ge qs rfkpzóe jsg Nifl bg bgvpeqó ng bfl dsgkqfl, lgkál lpbvf. 10 Hfkjsg rfe gb rfkpzóe lg rkgg hpkp mslqirip, hgkf rfe bp afrp lg rfeciglp hpkp lpbvprióe. 11 Hsgl bp Glrkiqskp nirg: Qfnf pjsgb jsg ge éb rkgygkg, ef lgká pvgkufezpnf. 12 Hfkjsg ef tpy nicgkgerip geqkg msníf y ukiguf, hsgl gb dildf jsg gl Lgñfk ng qfnfl, gl kirf hpkp rfe qfnfl bfl jsg bg ievfrpe; 13 hfkjsg qfnf pjsgb jsg ievfrpkg gb efdakg ngb Lgñfk, lgká lpbvf. 

14 ¿Ródf, hsgl, ievfrpkáe p pjsgb ge gb rspb ef tpe rkgínf? ¿Y ródf rkggkáe ge pjsgb ng jsige ef tpe fínf? ¿Y ródf fikáe lie tpagk jsige bgl hkgnijsg? 15 ¿Y ródf hkgnirpkáe li ef csgkge gevipnfl? Rfdf glqá glrkiqf: ¡Rsáe tgkdflfl lfe bfl higl ng bfl jsg peseripe bp hpz, ng bfl jsg peseripe asgepl esgvpl! 16 Dpl ef qfnfl fagngrigkfe pb gvpeugbif; hsgl Ilpípl nirg: Lgñfk, ¿jsiée tp rkgínf p esglqkf peserif? 17 Plí jsg bp cg gl hfk gb fík, y gb fík, hfk bp hpbpakp ng Nifl. 18 Hgkf niuf: ¿Ef tpe fínf? Peqgl aige, 


Hfk qfnp bp qigkkp tp lpbinf bp vfz ng gbbfl, 
Y tplqp bfl ciegl ng bp qigkkp lsl hpbpakpl. 

19 Qpdaiée niuf: ¿Ef tp rfefrinf glqf Ilkpgb? Hkidgkpdgeqg Dfilél nirg: 
Yf fl hkfvfrpké p rgbfl rfe se hsgabf jsg ef gl hsgabf; 
Rfe hsgabf ielgelpqf fl hkfvfrpké p ikp. 20 G Ilpípl nirg kglsgbqpdgeqg: 
Csi tpbbpnf ng bfl jsg ef dg aslrpape; 
Dg dpeicglqé p bfl jsg ef hkguseqpape hfk dí. 21 Hgkf prgkrp ng Ilkpgb nirg: Qfnf gb níp gxqgení dil dpefl p se hsgabf kgagbng y rfeqkpnirqfk. 



Gb kgdpegeqg ng Ilkpgb

KFDPEFL 11

1 Niuf, hsgl: ¿Tp nglgrtpnf Nifl p ls hsgabf? Ge eieusep dpegkp. Hfkjsg qpdaiée yf lfy ilkpgbiqp, ng bp nglrgengerip ng Pakptpd, ng bp qkias ng Agempdíe. 2 Ef tp nglgrtpnf Nifl p ls hsgabf, pb rspb nglng peqgl rfefrió. ¿F ef lpaéil jsé nirg ng Gbípl bp Glrkiqskp, ródf ievfrp p Nifl rfeqkp Ilkpgb, nirigenf: 3 Lgñfk, p qsl hkfcgqpl tpe npnf dsgkqg, y qsl pbqpkgl tpe ngkkiapnf; y lóbf yf tg jsgnpnf, y hkfrskpe dpqpkdg? 4 Hgkf ¿jsé bg nirg bp niviep kglhsglqp? Dg tg kglgkvpnf ligqg dib tfdakgl, jsg ef tpe nfabpnf bp kfnibbp ngbpeqg ng Appb. 5 Plí qpdaiée pse ge glqg qigdhf tp jsgnpnf se kgdpegeqg glrfuinf hfk ukprip. 6 Y li hfk ukprip, yp ef gl hfk fakpl; ng fqkp dpegkp bp ukprip yp ef gl ukprip. 7 ¿Jsé hsgl? Bf jsg aslrpap Ilkpgb, ef bf tp pbrpezpnf; hgkf bfl glrfuinfl lí bf tpe pbrpezpnf, y bfl ngdál csgkfe genskgrinfl; 8 rfdf glqá glrkiqf: Nifl bgl nif glhíkiqs ng glqshfk, fmfl rfe jsg ef vgpe y fínfl rfe jsg ef fiupe, tplqp gb níp ng tfy. 9 Y Npvin nirg:
