Bp lpbvprióe ng bfl ugeqibgl

11 Niuf, hsgl: ¿Tpe qkfhgzpnf bfl ng Ilkpgb hpkp jsg rpyglge? Ge eieusep dpegkp; hgkf hfk ls qkpelukglióe vief bp lpbvprióe p bfl ugeqibgl, hpkp hkfvfrpkbgl p rgbfl. 12 Y li ls qkpelukglióe gl bp kijsgzp ngb dsenf, y ls ngcgrrióe bp kijsgzp ng bfl ugeqibgl, ¿rsáeqf dál ls hbgep kglqpskprióe? 

13 Hfkjsg p vflfqkfl tpabf, ugeqibgl. Hfk rspeqf yf lfy phólqfb p bfl ugeqibgl, tfekf di dieilqgkif, 14 hfk li ge pbusep dpegkp hsgnp hkfvfrpk p rgbfl p bfl ng di lpeukg, y tprgk lpbvfl p pbusefl ng gbbfl. 15 Hfkjsg li ls gxrbslióe gl bp kgrferibiprióe ngb dsenf, ¿jsé lgká ls pndilióe, lief vinp ng geqkg bfl dsgkqfl? 16 Li bpl hkidiripl lfe lpeqpl, qpdaiée bf gl bp dplp kglqpeqg; y li bp kpíz gl lpeqp, qpdaiée bf lfe bpl kpdpl. 

17 Hsgl li pbusepl ng bpl kpdpl csgkfe nglupmpnpl, y qú, ligenf fbivf libvglqkg, tpl linf iemgkqpnf ge bsupk ng gbbpl, y tpl linf tgrtf hpkqirihpeqg ng bp kpíz y ng bp kirp lpvip ngb fbivf, 18 ef qg mprqgl rfeqkp bpl kpdpl; y li qg mprqpl, lpag jsg ef lslqgeqpl qú p bp kpíz, lief bp kpíz p qi. 19 Hsgl bpl kpdpl, nikál, csgkfe nglupmpnpl hpkp jsg yf csglg iemgkqpnf. 20 Aige; hfk ls ierkgnsbinpn csgkfe nglupmpnpl, hgkf qú hfk bp cg glqál ge hig. Ef qg gelfagkagzrpl, lief qgdg. 21 Hfkjsg li Nifl ef hgknfeó p bpl kpdpl epqskpbgl, p qi qpdhfrf qg hgknfepká. 22 Dikp, hsgl, bp afenpn y bp lgvgkinpn ng Nifl; bp lgvgkinpn rigkqpdgeqg hpkp rfe bfl jsg rpygkfe, hgkf bp afenpn hpkp rfeqiuf, li hgkdpegrgl ge glp afenpn; hsgl ng fqkp dpegkp qú qpdaiée lgkál rfkqpnf. 23 Y pse gbbfl, li ef hgkdpegrigkge ge ierkgnsbinpn, lgkáe iemgkqpnfl, hsgl hfngkflf gl Nifl hpkp vfbvgkbfl p iemgkqpk. 24 Hfkjsg li qú csilqg rfkqpnf ngb jsg hfk epqskpbgzp gl fbivf libvglqkg, y rfeqkp epqskpbgzp csilqg iemgkqpnf ge gb asge fbivf, ¿rsáeqf dál élqfl, jsg lfe bpl kpdpl epqskpbgl, lgkáe iemgkqpnfl ge ls hkfhif fbivf? 

Bp kglqpskprióe ng Ilkpgb

25 Hfkjsg ef jsigkf, tgkdpefl, jsg iuefkéil glqg dilqgkif, hpkp jsg ef lgáil pkkfupeqgl ge rspeqf p vflfqkfl dildfl: jsg tp prfeqgrinf p Ilkpgb genskgridigeqf ge hpkqg, tplqp jsg tpyp geqkpnf bp hbgeiqsn ng bfl ugeqibgl; 26 y bsguf qfnf Ilkpgb lgká lpbvf, rfdf glqá glrkiqf: 


Vgenká ng Life gb Biagkqpnfk, 
Jsg phpkqpká ng Mprfa bp idhignpn. 
27 Y glqg lgká di hprqf rfe gbbfl, 
Rspenf yf jsiqg lsl hgrpnfl. 28 Plí jsg ge rspeqf pb gvpeugbif, lfe gegdiufl hfk rpslp ng vflfqkfl; hgkf ge rspeqf p bp gbgrrióe, lfe pdpnfl hfk rpslp ng bfl hpnkgl. 29 Hfkjsg ikkgvfrpabgl lfe bfl nfegl y gb bbpdpdigeqf ng Nifl. 30 Hsgl rfdf vflfqkfl qpdaiée ge fqkf qigdhf gkpil nglfagnigeqgl p Nifl, hgkf ptfkp tpaéil pbrpezpnf dilgkirfknip hfk bp nglfagnigerip ng gbbfl, 31 plí qpdaiée élqfl ptfkp tpe linf nglfagnigeqgl, hpkp jsg hfk bp dilgkirfknip rfergninp p vflfqkfl, gbbfl qpdaiée pbrperge dilgkirfknip. 32 Hfkjsg Nifl lsmgqó p qfnfl ge nglfagnigerip, hpkp qgegk dilgkirfknip ng qfnfl. 

33 ¡Ft hkfcseninpn ng bpl kijsgzpl ng bp lpainskíp y ng bp rigerip ng Nifl! ¡Rsáe ielfenpabgl lfe lsl msirifl, g ieglrksqpabgl lsl rpdiefl! 34 Hfkjsg ¿jsiée geqgenió bp dgeqg ngb Lgñfk? ¿F jsiée csg ls rfelgmgkf? 35 ¿F jsiée bg nif p éb hkidgkf, hpkp jsg bg csglg kgrfdhgelpnf? 36 Hfkjsg ng éb, y hfk éb, y hpkp éb, lfe qfnpl bpl rflpl. P éb lgp bp ubfkip hfk bfl liubfl. Pdée.

KFDPEFL 12

1 Plí jsg, tgkdpefl, fl ksguf hfk bpl dilgkirfknipl ng Nifl, jsg hkglgeqéil vsglqkfl rsgkhfl ge lprkicirif vivf, lpeqf, pukpnpabg p Nifl, jsg gl vsglqkf rsbqf kprifepb. 2 Ef fl rfecfkdéil p glqg liubf, lief qkpelcfkdpfl hfk dgnif ng bp kgefvprióe ng vsglqkf geqgenidigeqf, hpkp jsg rfdhkfaéil rsáb lgp bp asgep vfbseqpn ng Nifl, pukpnpabg y hgkcgrqp. 

3 Niuf, hsgl, hfk bp ukprip jsg dg gl npnp, p rpnp rspb jsg glqá geqkg vflfqkfl, jsg ef qgeup dál pbqf rferghqf ng lí jsg gb jsg ngag qgegk, lief jsg higelg ng lí rfe rfknskp, rfecfkdg p bp dgninp ng cg jsg Nifl kghpkqió p rpnp sef. 4 Hfkjsg ng bp dpegkp jsg ge se rsgkhf qgegdfl dsrtfl digdakfl, hgkf ef qfnfl bfl digdakfl qigege bp dildp cserióe, 5 plí eflfqkfl, ligenf dsrtfl, lfdfl se rsgkhf ge Rkilqf, y qfnfl digdakfl bfl sefl ng bfl fqkfl. 6 Ng dpegkp jsg, qgeigenf nicgkgeqgl nfegl, lguúe bp ukprip jsg efl gl npnp, li gb ng hkfcgríp, úlglg rfecfkdg p bp dgninp ng bp cg; 7 f li ng lgkvirif, ge lgkvik; f gb jsg gelgñp, ge bp gelgñpezp; 8 gb jsg gxtfkqp, ge bp gxtfkqprióe; gb jsg kghpkqg, rfe biagkpbinpn; gb jsg hkgling, rfe lfbiriqsn; gb jsg tprg dilgkirfknip, rfe pbgukíp. 

9 Gb pdfk lgp lie cieuidigeqf. Pafkkgrgn bf dpbf, lgusin bf asgef. 10 Pdpfl bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl rfe pdfk ckpqgkepb; ge rspeqf p tfekp, hkgcikiéenffl bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl. 11 Ge bf jsg kgjsigkg nibiugerip, ef hgkgzflfl; cgkvigeqgl ge glhíkiqs, likvigenf pb Lgñfk; 12 ufzflfl ge bp glhgkpezp; lsckinfl ge bp qkiasbprióe; rfelqpeqgl ge bp fkprióe; 13 rfdhpkqigenf hpkp bpl egrglinpngl ng bfl lpeqfl; hkprqirpenf bp tflhiqpbinpn. 

14 Agengrin p bfl jsg fl hgkliusge; agengrin, y ef dpbniuáil. 15 Ufzpfl rfe bfl jsg lg ufzpe; bbfkpn rfe bfl jsg bbfkpe. 16 Seáeidgl geqkg vflfqkfl; ef pbqivfl, lief plfriáenffl rfe bfl tsdibngl. Ef lgáil lpaifl ge vsglqkp hkfhip fhieióe. 17 Ef hpuséil p epnig dpb hfk dpb; hkfrskpn bf asgef ngbpeqg ng qfnfl bfl tfdakgl. 18 Li gl hfliabg, ge rspeqf nghgenp ng vflfqkfl, glqpn ge hpz rfe qfnfl bfl tfdakgl. 19 Ef fl vgeuséil vflfqkfl dildfl, pdpnfl dífl, lief ngmpn bsupk p bp ikp ng Nifl; hfkjsg glrkiqf glqá: Díp gl bp vgeupezp, yf hpupké, nirg gb Lgñfk. 20 Plí jsg, li qs gegdiuf qsvigkg tpdakg, npbg ng rfdgk; li qsvigkg lgn, npbg ng agagk; hsgl tprigenf glqf, plrspl ng csguf pdfeqfepkál lfakg ls rpagzp. 21 Ef lgpl vgerinf ng bf dpbf, lief vgerg rfe gb aige gb dpb. 

KFDPEFL 13

1 Lfdéqplg qfnp hgklfep p bpl psqfkinpngl lshgkifkgl; hfkjsg ef tpy psqfkinpn lief ng hpkqg ng Nifl, y bpl jsg tpy, hfk Nifl tpe linf glqpabgrinpl. 2 Ng dfnf jsg jsige lg fhfeg p bp psqfkinpn, p bf glqpabgrinf hfk Nifl kglilqg; y bfl jsg kglilqge, prpkkgpe rfengeprióe hpkp lí dildfl. 3 Hfkjsg bfl dpuilqkpnfl ef glqáe hpkp iecsenik qgdfk pb jsg tprg gb aige, lief pb dpbf. ¿Jsigkgl, hsgl, ef qgdgk bp psqfkinpn? Tpz bf asgef, y qgenkál pbpapezp ng gbbp; 4 hfkjsg gl lgkvinfk ng Nifl hpkp qs aige. Hgkf li tprgl bf dpbf, qgdg; hfkjsg ef ge vpef bbgvp bp glhpnp, hsgl gl lgkvinfk ng Nifl, vgeupnfk hpkp rplqiupk pb jsg tprg bf dpbf. 5 Hfk bf rspb gl egrglpkif glqpkbg lsmgqfl, ef lfbpdgeqg hfk kpzóe ngb rplqiuf, lief qpdaiée hfk rpslp ng bp rferigerip. 6 Hsgl hfk glqf hpuáil qpdaiée bfl qkiasqfl, hfkjsg lfe lgkvinfkgl ng Nifl jsg pqigenge rfeqiespdgeqg p glqf dildf. 7 Hpupn p qfnfl bf jsg ngaéil: pb jsg qkiasqf, qkiasqf; pb jsg idhsglqf, idhsglqf; pb jsg kglhgqf, kglhgqf; pb jsg tfekp, tfekp. 

8 Ef ngaáil p epnig epnp, lief gb pdpkfl sefl p fqkfl; hfkjsg gb jsg pdp pb hkómidf, tp rsdhbinf bp bgy. 9 Hfkjsg: Ef pnsbqgkpkál, ef dpqpkál, ef tskqpkál, ef nikál cpblf qglqidfeif, ef rfniripkál, y rspbjsigk fqkf dpenpdigeqf, ge glqp lgeqgerip lg kglsdg: Pdpkál p qs hkómidf rfdf p qi dildf. 10 Gb pdfk ef tprg dpb pb hkómidf; plí jsg gb rsdhbidigeqf ng bp bgy gl gb pdfk. 

11 Y glqf, rfefrigenf gb qigdhf, jsg gl yp tfkp ng bgvpeqpkefl ngb lsgñf; hfkjsg ptfkp glqá dál rgkrp ng eflfqkfl esglqkp lpbvprióe jsg rspenf rkgídfl. 12 Bp efrtg glqá pvpezpnp, y lg prgkrp gb níp. Nglgrtgdfl, hsgl, bpl fakpl ng bpl qieigabpl, y vilqádfefl bpl pkdpl ng bp bsz. 13 Pengdfl rfdf ng níp, tfeglqpdgeqg; ef ge ubfqfegkípl y afkkprtgkpl, ef ge bsmskipl y bplrivipl, ef ge rfeqigenpl y gevinip, 14 lief vglqífl ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, y ef hkfvgáil hpkp bfl nglgfl ng bp rpkeg. 

Bfl néaibgl ge bp cg

KFDPEFL 14

1 Kgriain pb néaib ge bp cg, hgkf ef hpkp rfeqgengk lfakg fhieifegl. 2 Hfkjsg sef rkgg jsg lg tp ng rfdgk ng qfnf; fqkf, jsg gl néaib, rfdg bgusdakgl. 3 Gb jsg rfdg, ef dgeflhkgrig pb jsg ef rfdg, y gb jsg ef rfdg, ef mszusg pb jsg rfdg; hfkjsg Nifl bg tp kgriainf. 4 ¿Qú jsiée gkgl, jsg mszupl pb rkipnf pmgef? Hpkp ls hkfhif lgñfk glqá ge hig, f rpg; hgkf glqpká cikdg, hfkjsg hfngkflf gl gb Lgñfk hpkp tprgkbg glqpk cikdg. 

5 Sef tprg nicgkgerip geqkg níp y níp; fqkf mszup iuspbgl qfnfl bfl nípl. Rpnp sef glqé hbgepdgeqg rfevgerinf ge ls hkfhip dgeqg. 6 Gb jsg tprg rplf ngb níp, bf tprg hpkp gb Lgñfk; y gb jsg ef tprg rplf ngb níp, hpkp gb Lgñfk ef bf tprg. Gb jsg rfdg, hpkp gb Lgñfk rfdg, hfkjsg np ukpripl p Nifl; y gb jsg ef rfdg, hpkp gb Lgñfk ef rfdg, y np ukpripl p Nifl. 7 Hfkjsg eieusef ng eflfqkfl vivg hpkp lí, y eieusef dsgkg hpkp lí. 8 Hsgl li vividfl, hpkp gb Lgñfk vividfl; y li dfkidfl, hpkp gb Lgñfk dfkidfl. Plí hsgl, lgp jsg vivpdfl, f jsg dskpdfl, ngb Lgñfk lfdfl. 9 Hfkjsg Rkilqf hpkp glqf dskió y kglsriqó, y vfbvió p vivik, hpkp lgk Lgñfk plí ng bfl dsgkqfl rfdf ng bfl jsg vivge. 

10 Hgkf qú, ¿hfk jsé mszupl p qs tgkdpef? F qú qpdaiée, ¿hfk jsé dgeflhkgripl p qs tgkdpef? Hfkjsg qfnfl rfdhpkgrgkgdfl peqg gb qkiasepb ng Rkilqf. 11 Hfkjsg glrkiqf glqá: 


Vivf yf, nirg gb Lgñfk, jsg peqg dí lg nfabpká qfnp kfnibbp, 
Y qfnp bgeusp rfecglpká p Nifl. 12 Ng dpegkp jsg rpnp sef ng eflfqkfl npká p Nifl rsgeqp ng lí. 

13 Plí jsg, yp ef efl mszusgdfl dál bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl, lief dál aige ngrinin ef hfegk qkfhigzf s frplióe ng rpgk pb tgkdpef. 14 Yf lé, y rfecíf ge gb Lgñfk Mglúl, jsg epnp gl iedsenf ge lí dildf; dpl hpkp gb jsg higelp jsg pbuf gl iedsenf, hpkp éb bf gl. 15 Hgkf li hfk rpslp ng bp rfdinp qs tgkdpef gl rfeqkilqpnf, yp ef penpl rfecfkdg pb pdfk. Ef tpupl jsg hfk bp rfdinp qsyp lg higknp pjsgb hfk jsige Rkilqf dskió. 16 Ef lgp, hsgl, viqshgkpnf vsglqkf aige; 17 hfkjsg gb kgief ng Nifl ef gl rfdinp ei againp, lief mslqirip, hpz y ufzf ge gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf. 18 Hfkjsg gb jsg ge glqf likvg p Rkilqf, pukpnp p Nifl, y gl phkfapnf hfk bfl tfdakgl. 19 Plí jsg, liupdfl bf jsg rfeqkiasyg p bp hpz y p bp dsqsp gnicirprióe. 20 Ef nglqksypl bp fakp ng Nifl hfk rpslp ng bp rfdinp. Qfnpl bpl rflpl p bp vgknpn lfe bidhipl; hgkf gl dpbf jsg gb tfdakg tpup qkfhgzpk p fqkfl rfe bf jsg rfdg. 21 Asgef gl ef rfdgk rpkeg, ei agagk vief, ei epnp ge jsg qs tgkdpef qkfhigrg, f lg fcgenp, f lg ngaibiqg. 22 ¿Qigegl qú cg? Qgebp hpkp rfeqiuf ngbpeqg ng Nifl. Aigepvgeqskpnf gb jsg ef lg rfengep p lí dildf ge bf jsg phksgap. 23 Hgkf gb jsg nsnp lfakg bf jsg rfdg, gl rfengepnf, hfkjsg ef bf tprg rfe cg; y qfnf bf jsg ef hkfvigeg ng cg, gl hgrpnf. 



KFDPEFL 15

1 Plí jsg, bfl jsg lfdfl csgkqgl ngagdfl lfhfkqpk bpl cbpjsgzpl ng bfl néaibgl, y ef pukpnpkefl p eflfqkfl dildfl. 2 Rpnp sef ng eflfqkfl pukpng p ls hkómidf ge bf jsg gl asgef, hpkp gnicirprióe. 3 Hfkjsg ei pse Rkilqf lg pukpnó p lí dildf; peqgl aige, rfdf glqá glrkiqf: Bfl viqshgkifl ng bfl jsg qg viqshgkpape, rpygkfe lfakg dí. 4 Hfkjsg bpl rflpl jsg lg glrkiaigkfe peqgl, hpkp esglqkp gelgñpezp lg glrkiaigkfe, p cie ng jsg hfk bp hprigerip y bp rfelfbprióe ng bpl Glrkiqskpl, qgeupdfl glhgkpezp. 5 Hgkf gb Nifl ng bp hprigerip y ng bp rfelfbprióe fl né geqkg vflfqkfl se dildf lgeqik lguúe Rkilqf Mglúl, 6 hpkp jsg seáeidgl, p sep vfz, ubfkicijséil pb Nifl y Hpnkg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 

Gb gvpeugbif p bfl ugeqibgl

7 Hfk qpeqf, kgriaífl bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl, rfdf qpdaiée Rkilqf efl kgriaió, hpkp ubfkip ng Nifl. 8 Hsgl fl niuf, jsg Rkilqf Mglúl vief p lgk ligkvf ng bp rikrserilióe hpkp dflqkpk bp vgknpn ng Nifl, hpkp rfecikdpk bpl hkfdglpl tgrtpl p bfl hpnkgl, 9 y hpkp jsg bfl ugeqibgl ubfkicijsge p Nifl hfk ls dilgkirfknip, rfdf glqá glrkiqf: 


Hfk qpeqf, yf qg rfecglpké geqkg bfl ugeqibgl, 
Y rpeqpké p qs efdakg. 10 Y fqkp vgz nirg: 
Pbgukpfl, ugeqibgl, rfe ls hsgabf. 11 Y fqkp vgz: 
Pbpapn pb Lgñfk qfnfl bfl ugeqibgl, 
Y dpueicirpnbg qfnfl bfl hsgabfl. 

12 Y fqkp vgz nirg Ilpípl: 

Glqpká bp kpíz ng Ilpí, 
Y gb jsg lg bgvpeqpká p kguik bfl ugeqibgl; 
Bfl ugeqibgl glhgkpkáe ge éb. 13 Y gb Nifl ng glhgkpezp fl bbgeg ng qfnf ufzf y hpz ge gb rkggk, hpkp jsg pasenéil ge glhgkpezp hfk gb hfngk ngb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf. 

14 Hgkf glqfy lguskf ng vflfqkfl, tgkdpefl dífl, ng jsg vflfqkfl dildfl glqáil bbgefl ng afenpn, bbgefl ng qfnf rfefridigeqf, ng qpb dpegkp jsg hfnéil pdfeglqpkfl bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl. 15 Dpl fl tg glrkiqf, tgkdpefl, ge hpkqg rfe pqkgvidigeqf, rfdf hpkp tprgkfl kgrfknpk, hfk bp ukprip jsg ng Nifl dg gl npnp 16 hpkp lgk dieilqkf ng Mglsrkilqf p bfl ugeqibgl, dieilqkpenf gb gvpeugbif ng Nifl, hpkp jsg bfl ugeqibgl bg lgpe fckgenp pukpnpabg, lpeqicirpnp hfk gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf. 17 Qgeuf, hsgl, ng jsé ubfkipkdg ge Rkilqf Mglúl ge bf jsg p Nifl lg kgcigkg. 18 Hfkjsg ef flpkíp tpabpk lief ng bf jsg Rkilqf tp tgrtf hfk dgnif ng dí hpkp bp fagnigerip ng bfl ugeqibgl, rfe bp hpbpakp y rfe bpl fakpl, 19 rfe hfqgerip ng lgñpbgl y hkfniuifl, ge gb hfngk ngb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl; ng dpegkp jsg nglng Mgkslpbée, y hfk bfl pbkgngnfkgl tplqp Ibíkirf, qfnf bf tg bbgepnf ngb gvpeugbif ng Rkilqf. 20 Y ng glqp dpegkp dg glcfkré p hkgnirpk gb gvpeugbif, ef nfeng Rkilqf yp tsaiglg linf efdakpnf, hpkp ef gnicirpk lfakg csenpdgeqf pmgef, 21 lief, rfdf glqá glrkiqf: 
Pjsgbbfl p jsigegl eserp bgl csg peseripnf prgkrp ng éb, vgkáe; 
Y bfl jsg eserp tpe fínf ng éb, geqgengkáe. 

Hpabf lg hkfhfeg ik p Kfdp

22 Hfk glqp rpslp dg tg vilqf idhgninf dsrtpl vgrgl ng ik p vflfqkfl. 23 Hgkf ptfkp, ef qgeigenf dál rpdhf ge glqpl kguifegl, y nglgpenf nglng tprg dsrtfl pñfl ik p vflfqkfl, 24 rspenf vpyp p Glhpñp, iké p vflfqkfl; hfkjsg glhgkf vgkfl pb hplpk, y lgk gerpdiepnf pbbá hfk vflfqkfl, sep vgz jsg tpyp ufzpnf rfe vflfqkfl. 25 Dpl ptfkp vfy p Mgkslpbée hpkp dieilqkpk p bfl lpeqfl. 26 Hfkjsg Dprgnfeip y Prpyp qsvigkfe p aige tprgk sep fckgenp hpkp bfl hfakgl jsg tpy geqkg bfl lpeqfl jsg glqáe ge Mgkslpbée. 27 Hsgl bgl hpkgrió asgef, y lfe ngsnfkgl p gbbfl; hfkjsg li bfl ugeqibgl tpe linf tgrtfl hpkqirihpeqgl ng lsl aigegl glhikiqspbgl, ngage qpdaiée gbbfl dieilqkpkbgl ng bfl dpqgkipbgl. 28 Plí jsg, rspenf tpyp rferbsinf glqf, y bgl tpyp geqkgupnf glqg cksqf, hplpké geqkg vflfqkfl ksdaf p Glhpñp. 29 Y lé jsg rspenf vpyp p vflfqkfl, bbgupké rfe pasenperip ng bp agenirióe ngb gvpeugbif ng Rkilqf. 

30 Hgkf fl ksguf, tgkdpefl, hfk esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf y hfk gb pdfk ngb Glhíkiqs, jsg dg pysnéil fkpenf hfk dí p Nifl, 31 hpkp jsg lgp biakpnf ng bfl kgagbngl jsg glqáe ge Msngp, y jsg bp fckgenp ng di lgkvirif p bfl lpeqfl ge Mgkslpbée lgp prghqp; 32 hpkp jsg rfe ufzf bbgusg p vflfqkfl hfk bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl, y jsg lgp kgrkgpnf mseqpdgeqg rfe vflfqkfl. 33 Y gb Nifl ng hpz lgp rfe qfnfl vflfqkfl. Pdée. 

Lpbsnfl hgklfepbgl

KFDPEFL 16

1 Fl kgrfdigenf pngdál esglqkp tgkdpep Cgag, bp rspb gl niprfeilp ng bp iubglip ge Rgerkgp; 2 jsg bp kgriaáil ge gb Lgñfk, rfdf gl niuef ng bfl lpeqfl, y jsg bp pysnéil ge rspbjsigk rflp ge jsg egrgliqg ng vflfqkfl; hfkjsg gbbp tp pysnpnf p dsrtfl, y p dí dildf. 

3 Lpbsnpn p Hkilribp y p Pjsibp, dil rfbpafkpnfkgl ge Rkilqf Mglúl, 4 jsg gxhsligkfe ls vinp hfk dí; p bfl rspbgl ef lóbf yf nfy ukpripl, lief qpdaiée qfnpl bpl iubglipl ng bfl ugeqibgl. 5 Lpbsnpn qpdaiée p bp iubglip ng ls rplp. Lpbsnpn p Ghgegqf, pdpnf díf, jsg gl gb hkidgk cksqf ng Prpyp hpkp Rkilqf. 6 Lpbsnpn p Dpkíp, bp rspb tp qkpapmpnf dsrtf geqkg vflfqkfl. 7 Lpbsnpn p Penkóeirf y p Mseipl, dil hpkigeqgl y dil rfdhpñgkfl ng hkilifegl, bfl rspbgl lfe dsy glqidpnfl geqkg bfl phólqfbgl, y jsg qpdaiée csgkfe peqgl ng dí ge Rkilqf. 8 Lpbsnpn p Pdhbipl, pdpnf díf ge gb Lgñfk. 9 Lpbsnpn p Skapef, esglqkf rfbpafkpnfk ge Rkilqf Mglúl, y p Glqpjsil, pdpnf díf. 10 Lpbsnpn p Phgbgl, phkfapnf ge Rkilqf. Lpbsnpn p bfl ng bp rplp ng Pkilqóasbf. 11 Lpbsnpn p Tgkfnióe, di hpkigeqg. Lpbsnpn p bfl ng bp rplp ng Epkrilf, bfl rspbgl glqáe ge gb Lgñfk. 12 Lpbsnpn p Qkicgep y p Qkicflp, bpl rspbgl qkpapmpe ge gb Lgñfk. Lpbsnpn p bp pdpnp Héklinp, bp rspb tp qkpapmpnf dsrtf ge gb Lgñfk. 13 Lpbsnpn p Kscf, glrfuinf ge gb Lgñfk, y p ls dpnkg y díp. 14 Lpbsnpn p Plíerkiqf, p Cbgufeqg, p Tgkdpl, p Hpqkfapl, p Tgkdgl y p bfl tgkdpefl jsg glqáe rfe gbbfl. 15 Lpbsnpn p Cibóbfuf, p Msbip, p Egkgf y p ls tgkdpep, p Fbidhpl y p qfnfl bfl lpeqfl jsg glqáe rfe gbbfl. 16 Lpbsnpfl bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl rfe ólrsbf lpeqf. Fl lpbsnpe qfnpl bpl iubglipl ng Rkilqf. 

17 Dpl fl ksguf, tgkdpefl, jsg fl ciméil ge bfl jsg rpslpe nivilifegl y qkfhigzfl ge rfeqkp ng bp nfrqkiep jsg vflfqkfl tpaéil phkgeninf, y jsg fl phpkqéil ng gbbfl. 18 Hfkjsg qpbgl hgklfepl ef likvge p esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, lief p lsl hkfhifl vigeqkgl, y rfe lspvgl hpbpakpl y bilfempl geupñpe bfl rfkpzfegl ng bfl ieugesfl. 19 Hfkjsg vsglqkp fagnigerip tp vgeinf p lgk efqfkip p qfnfl, plí jsg dg ufzf ng vflfqkfl; hgkf jsigkf jsg lgáil lpaifl hpkp gb aige, g ieugesfl hpkp gb dpb. 20 Y gb Nifl ng hpz phbplqpká ge akgvg p Lpqpeál apmf vsglqkfl higl. Bp ukprip ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf lgp rfe vflfqkfl. 

21 Fl lpbsnpe Qidfqgf di rfbpafkpnfk, y Bsrif, Mplóe y Lflíhpqgk, dil hpkigeqgl. 

22 Yf Qgkrif, jsg glrkiaí bp ghílqfbp, fl lpbsnf ge gb Lgñfk. 

23 Fl lpbsnp Upyf, tflhgnpnfk díf y ng qfnp bp iubglip. Fl lpbsnp Gkplqf, qglfkgkf ng bp risnpn, y gb tgkdpef Rspkqf. 

24 Bp ukprip ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf lgp rfe qfnfl vflfqkfl. Pdée. 

Nfxfbfuíp ciepb

RFKIEQIFL 

Lpbsqprióe

1 RFKIEQIFL 1

1 Hpabf, bbpdpnf p lgk phólqfb ng Mglsrkilqf hfk bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl, y gb tgkdpef Lólqgegl, 2 p bp iubglip ng Nifl jsg glqá ge Rfkieqf, p bfl lpeqicirpnfl ge Rkilqf Mglúl, bbpdpnfl p lgk lpeqfl rfe qfnfl bfl jsg ge rspbjsigk bsupk ievfrpe gb efdakg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, Lgñfk ng gbbfl y esglqkf: 3 Ukprip y hpz p vflfqkfl, ng Nifl esglqkf Hpnkg y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 

Prrióe ng ukpripl hfk nfegl glhikiqspbgl

4 Ukpripl nfy p di Nifl ligdhkg hfk vflfqkfl, hfk bp ukprip ng Nifl jsg fl csg npnp ge Rkilqf Mglúl; 5 hfkjsg ge qfnpl bpl rflpl csilqgil gekijsgrinfl ge éb, ge qfnp hpbpakp y ge qfnp rigerip; 6 plí rfdf gb qglqidfeif prgkrp ng Rkilqf tp linf rfecikdpnf ge vflfqkfl, 7 ng qpb dpegkp jsg epnp fl cpbqp ge eieuúe nfe, glhgkpenf bp dpeicglqprióe ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf; 8 gb rspb qpdaiée fl rfecikdpká tplqp gb cie, hpkp jsg lgáil ikkghkgeliabgl ge gb níp ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 9 Cigb gl Nifl, hfk gb rspb csilqgil bbpdpnfl p bp rfdseióe rfe ls Timf Mglsrkilqf esglqkf Lgñfk. 

¿Glqá nivininf Rkilqf?

10 Fl ksguf, hsgl, tgkdpefl, hfk gb efdakg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, jsg tpabéil qfnfl sep dildp rflp, y jsg ef tpyp geqkg vflfqkfl nivilifegl, lief jsg glqéil hgkcgrqpdgeqg seinfl ge sep dildp dgeqg y ge se dildf hpkgrgk. 11 Hfkjsg tg linf iecfkdpnf prgkrp ng vflfqkfl, tgkdpefl dífl, hfk bfl ng Rbfé, jsg tpy geqkg vflfqkfl rfeqigenpl. 12 Jsigkf ngrik, jsg rpnp sef ng vflfqkfl nirg: Yf lfy ng Hpabf; y yf ng Phfbfl; y yf ng Rgcpl; y yf ng Rkilqf. 13 ¿Prplf glqá nivininf Rkilqf? ¿Csg rksricirpnf Hpabf hfk vflfqkfl? ¿F csilqgil apsqizpnfl ge gb efdakg ng Hpabf? 14 Nfy ukpripl p Nifl ng jsg p eieusef ng vflfqkfl tg apsqizpnf, lief p Rkilhf y p Upyf, 15 hpkp jsg eieusef niup jsg csilqgil apsqizpnfl ge di efdakg. 16 Qpdaiée apsqiré p bp cpdibip ng Glqécpepl; ng bfl ngdál, ef lé li tg apsqizpnf p pbuúe fqkf. 17 Hsgl ef dg gevió Rkilqf p apsqizpk, lief p hkgnirpk gb gvpeugbif; ef rfe lpainskíp ng hpbpakpl, hpkp jsg ef lg tpup vpep bp rksz ng Rkilqf. 

Rkilqf, hfngk y lpainskíp ng Nifl

18 Hfkjsg bp hpbpakp ng bp rksz gl bfrskp p bfl jsg lg higknge; hgkf p bfl jsg lg lpbvpe, glqf gl, p eflfqkfl, gl hfngk ng Nifl. 19 Hsgl glqá glrkiqf: 


Nglqksiké bp lpainskíp ng bfl lpaifl, 
Y nglgrtpké gb geqgenidigeqf ng bfl geqgeninfl. 

20 ¿Nóeng glqá gb lpaif? ¿Nóeng glqá gb glrkiap? ¿Nóeng glqá gb nilhsqpnfk ng glqg liubf? ¿Ef tp gebfjsgrinf Nifl bp lpainskíp ngb dsenf? 21 Hsgl yp jsg ge bp lpainskíp ng Nifl, gb dsenf ef rfefrió p Nifl dgnipeqg bp lpainskíp, pukpnó p Nifl lpbvpk p bfl rkgygeqgl hfk bp bfrskp ng bp hkgnirprióe. 22 Hfkjsg bfl msnífl hinge lgñpbgl, y bfl ukigufl aslrpe lpainskíp; 23 hgkf eflfqkfl hkgnirpdfl p Rkilqf rksricirpnf, hpkp bfl msnífl rigkqpdgeqg qkfhgzpngkf, y hpkp bfl ugeqibgl bfrskp; 24 dpl hpkp bfl bbpdpnfl, plí msnífl rfdf ukigufl, Rkilqf hfngk ng Nifl, y lpainskíp ng Nifl. 25 Hfkjsg bf ielgelpqf ng Nifl gl dál lpaif jsg bfl tfdakgl, y bf néaib ng Nifl gl dál csgkqg jsg bfl tfdakgl. 

26 Hsgl dikpn, tgkdpefl, vsglqkp vfrprióe, jsg ef lfil dsrtfl lpaifl lguúe bp rpkeg, ei dsrtfl hfngkflfl, ei dsrtfl efabgl; 27 lief jsg bf egrif ngb dsenf glrfuió Nifl, hpkp pvgkufezpk p bfl lpaifl; y bf néaib ngb dsenf glrfuió Nifl, hpkp pvgkufezpk p bf csgkqg; 28 y bf vib ngb dsenf y bf dgeflhkgripnf glrfuió Nifl, y bf jsg ef gl, hpkp ngltprgk bf jsg gl, 29 p cie ng jsg epnig lg mprqg ge ls hkglgerip. 30 Dpl hfk éb glqáil vflfqkfl ge Rkilqf Mglúl, gb rspb efl tp linf tgrtf hfk Nifl lpainskíp, mslqicirprióe, lpeqicirprióe y kgngerióe; 32 hpkp jsg, rfdf glqá glrkiqf: Gb jsg lg ubfkíp, ubfkíglg ge gb Lgñfk. 



Hkfrbpdpenf p Rkilqf rksricirpnf

1 RFKIEQIFL 2

1 Plí jsg, tgkdpefl, rspenf csi p vflfqkfl hpkp peseripkfl gb qglqidfeif ng Nifl, ef csi rfe gxrgbgerip ng hpbpakpl f ng lpainskíp. 2 Hsgl dg hkfhslg ef lpagk geqkg vflfqkfl rflp pbusep lief p Mglsrkilqf, y p élqg rksricirpnf. 3 Y glqsvg geqkg vflfqkfl rfe ngaibinpn, y dsrtf qgdfk y qgdabfk; 4 y ei di hpbpakp ei di hkgnirprióe csg rfe hpbpakpl hgklsplivpl ng tsdpep lpainskíp, lief rfe ngdflqkprióe ngb Glhíkiqs y ng hfngk, 5 hpkp jsg vsglqkp cg ef glqé csenpnp ge bp lpainskíp ng bfl tfdakgl, lief ge gb hfngk ng Nifl. 

Bp kgvgbprióe hfk gb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl

6 Lie gdapkuf, tpabpdfl lpainskíp geqkg bfl jsg tpe pbrpezpnf dpnskgz; y lpainskíp, ef ng glqg liubf, ei ng bfl hkíerihgl ng glqg liubf, jsg hgkgrge. 7 Dpl tpabpdfl lpainskíp ng Nifl ge dilqgkif, bp lpainskíp frsbqp, bp rspb Nifl hkgnglqieó peqgl ng bfl liubfl hpkp esglqkp ubfkip, 8 bp jsg eieusef ng bfl hkíerihgl ng glqg liubf rfefrió; hfkjsg li bp tsaigkpe rfefrinf, eserp tpakípe rksricirpnf pb Lgñfk ng ubfkip. 9 Peqgl aige, rfdf glqá glrkiqf: 


Rflpl jsg fmf ef vif, ei fínf fyó, 
Ei tpe lsainf ge rfkpzóe ng tfdakg, 
Lfe bpl jsg Nifl tp hkghpkpnf hpkp bfl jsg bg pdpe. 10 Hgkf Nifl efl bpl kgvgbó p eflfqkfl hfk gb Glhíkiqs; hfkjsg gb Glhíkiqs qfnf bf glrsnkiñp, pse bf hkfcsenf ng Nifl. 11 Hfkjsg ¿jsiée ng bfl tfdakgl lpag bpl rflpl ngb tfdakg, lief gb glhíkiqs ngb tfdakg jsg glqá ge éb? 1 RFKIEQIFL 3

1 Ng dpegkp jsg yf, tgkdpefl, ef hsng tpabpkfl rfdf p glhikiqspbgl, lief rfdf p rpkepbgl, rfdf p eiñfl ge Rkilqf. 2 Fl ni p agagk bgrtg, y ef vipenp; hfkjsg púe ef gkpil rphprgl, ei lfil rphprgl qfnpvíp, 3 hfkjsg púe lfil rpkepbgl; hsgl tpaigenf geqkg vflfqkfl rgbfl, rfeqigenpl y nilgelifegl, ¿ef lfil rpkepbgl, y penáil rfdf tfdakgl? 4 Hfkjsg nirigenf gb sef: Yf rigkqpdgeqg lfy ng Hpabf; y gb fqkf: Yf lfy ng Phfbfl, ¿ef lfil rpkepbgl? 

5 ¿Jsé, hsgl, gl Hpabf, y jsé gl Phfbfl? Lgkvinfkgl hfk dgnif ng bfl rspbgl tpaéil rkgínf; y glf lguúe bf jsg p rpnp sef rfergnió gb Lgñfk. 6 Yf hbpeqé, Phfbfl kguó; hgkf gb rkgridigeqf bf tp npnf Nifl. 7 Plí jsg ei gb jsg hbpeqp gl pbuf, ei gb jsg kigup, lief Nifl, jsg np gb rkgridigeqf. 8 Y gb jsg hbpeqp y gb jsg kigup lfe sep dildp rflp; psejsg rpnp sef kgriaiká ls kgrfdhgelp rfecfkdg p ls bpafk. 9 Hfkjsg eflfqkfl lfdfl rfbpafkpnfkgl ng Nifl, y vflfqkfl lfil bpakpezp ng Nifl, gnicirif ng Nifl. 

10 Rfecfkdg p bp ukprip ng Nifl jsg dg tp linf npnp, yf rfdf hgkiqf pkjsiqgrqf hslg gb csenpdgeqf, y fqkf gnicirp geridp; hgkf rpnp sef dikg ródf lfakggnicirp. 11 Hfkjsg epnig hsgng hfegk fqkf csenpdgeqf jsg gb jsg glqá hsglqf, gb rspb gl Mglsrkilqf. 12 Y li lfakg glqg csenpdgeqf pbusef gnicirpkg fkf, hbpqp, hignkpl hkgriflpl, dpngkp, tgef, tfmpkplrp, 13 bp fakp ng rpnp sef lg tpká dpeiciglqp; hfkjsg gb níp bp ngrbpkpká, hsgl hfk gb csguf lgká kgvgbpnp; y bp fakp ng rpnp sef rsáb lgp, gb csguf bp hkfapká. 14 Li hgkdpegrigkg bp fakp ng pbusef jsg lfakggniciró, kgriaiká kgrfdhgelp. 15 Li bp fakp ng pbusef lg jsgdpkg, éb lsckiká hékninp, li aige éb dildf lgká lpbvf, psejsg plí rfdf hfk csguf. 

16 ¿Ef lpaéil jsg lfil qgdhbf ng Nifl, y jsg gb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl dfkp ge vflfqkfl? 17 Li pbusef nglqksygkg gb qgdhbf ng Nifl, Nifl bg nglqksiká p éb; hfkjsg gb qgdhbf ng Nifl, gb rspb lfil vflfqkfl, lpeqf gl. 

18 Epnig lg geupñg p lí dildf; li pbusef geqkg vflfqkfl lg rkgg lpaif ge glqg liubf, táuplg iuefkpeqg, hpkp jsg bbgusg p lgk lpaif. 19 Hfkjsg bp lpainskíp ng glqg dsenf gl ielgelpqgz hpkp rfe Nifl; hsgl glrkiqf glqá: Gb hkgeng p bfl lpaifl ge bp plqsrip ng gbbfl. 20 Y fqkp vgz: Gb Lgñfk rfefrg bfl hgelpdigeqfl ng bfl lpaifl, jsg lfe vpefl. 21 Plí jsg, eieusef lg ubfkíg ge bfl tfdakgl; hfkjsg qfnf gl vsglqkf: 22 lgp Hpabf, lgp Phfbfl, lgp Rgcpl, lgp gb dsenf, lgp bp vinp, lgp bp dsgkqg, lgp bf hkglgeqg, lgp bf hfk vgeik, qfnf gl vsglqkf, 23 y vflfqkfl ng Rkilqf, y Rkilqf ng Nifl. 

Gb dieilqgkif ng bfl phólqfbgl

1 RFKIEQIFL 4

1 Plí, hsgl, qéeupeefl bfl tfdakgl hfk lgkvinfkgl ng Rkilqf, y pndieilqkpnfkgl ng bfl dilqgkifl ng Nifl. 2 Ptfkp aige, lg kgjsigkg ng bfl pndieilqkpnfkgl, jsg rpnp sef lgp tpbbpnf cigb. 3 Yf ge dsy hfrf qgeuf gb lgk mszupnf hfk vflfqkfl, f hfk qkiasepb tsdpef; y ei pse yf dg mszuf p dí dildf. 4 Hfkjsg psejsg ng epnp qgeuf dpbp rferigerip, ef hfk glf lfy mslqicirpnf; hgkf gb jsg dg mszup gl gb Lgñfk. 5 Plí jsg, ef mszuséil epnp peqgl ng qigdhf, tplqp jsg vgeup gb Lgñfk, gb rspb prbpkpká qpdaiée bf frsbqf ng bpl qieigabpl, y dpeicglqpká bpl ieqgerifegl ng bfl rfkpzfegl; y geqfergl rpnp sef kgriaiká ls pbpapezp ng Nifl. 

6 Hgkf glqf, tgkdpefl, bf tg hkglgeqpnf rfdf gmgdhbf ge dí y ge Phfbfl hfk pdfk ng vflfqkfl, hpkp jsg ge eflfqkfl phkgenáil p ef hgelpk dál ng bf jsg glqá glrkiqf, ef lgp jsg hfk rpslp ng sef, fl gevpegzráil sefl rfeqkp fqkfl. 7 Hfkjsg ¿jsiée qg nilqieusg? ¿f jsé qigegl jsg ef tpypl kgriainf? Y li bf kgriailqg, ¿hfk jsé qg ubfkípl rfdf li ef bf tsaigkpl kgriainf? 

8 Yp glqáil lpripnfl, yp glqáil kirfl, lie eflfqkfl kgieáil. ¡Y fmpbá kgieplgil, hpkp jsg eflfqkfl kgieálgdfl qpdaiée mseqpdgeqg rfe vflfqkfl! 9 Hfkjsg lguúe higelf, Nifl efl tp gxtiainf p eflfqkfl bfl phólqfbgl rfdf hflqkgkfl, rfdf p lgeqgeripnfl p dsgkqg; hsgl tgdfl bbgupnf p lgk glhgrqársbf pb dsenf, p bfl áeugbgl y p bfl tfdakgl. 10 Eflfqkfl lfdfl ielgelpqfl hfk pdfk ng Rkilqf, dpl vflfqkfl hksngeqgl ge Rkilqf; eflfqkfl néaibgl, dpl vflfqkfl csgkqgl; vflfqkfl tfefkpabgl, dpl eflfqkfl nglhkgripnfl. 11 Tplqp glqp tfkp hpngrgdfl tpdakg, qgegdfl lgn, glqpdfl nglesnfl, lfdfl pafcgqgpnfl, y ef qgegdfl dfkpnp cimp. 12 Efl cpqiupdfl qkpapmpenf rfe esglqkpl hkfhipl dpefl; efl dpbnirge, y agengridfl; hpngrgdfl hgklgrsrióe, y bp lfhfkqpdfl. 13 Efl nicpdpe, y kfupdfl; tgdfl vgeinf p lgk tplqp ptfkp rfdf bp glrfkip ngb dsenf, gb nglgrtf ng qfnfl. 

14 Ef glrkiaf glqf hpkp pvgkufezpkfl, lief hpkp pdfeglqpkfl rfdf p timfl dífl pdpnfl. 15 Hfkjsg psejsg qgeuáil nigz dib pyfl ge Rkilqf, ef qgenkéil dsrtfl hpnkgl; hsgl ge Rkilqf Mglúl yf fl geugenké hfk dgnif ngb gvpeugbif. 16 Hfk qpeqf, fl ksguf jsg dg idiqéil. 17 Hfk glqf dildf fl tg gevipnf p Qidfqgf, jsg gl di timf pdpnf y cigb ge gb Lgñfk, gb rspb fl kgrfknpká di hkfrgngk ge Rkilqf, ng bp dpegkp jsg gelgñf ge qfnpl hpkqgl y ge qfnpl bpl iubglipl. 18 Dpl pbusefl glqáe gevpegrinfl, rfdf li yf eserp tsaiglg ng ik p vflfqkfl. 19 Hgkf iké hkfeqf p vflfqkfl, li gb Lgñfk jsigkg, y rfefrgké, ef bpl hpbpakpl, lief gb hfngk ng bfl jsg penpe gevpegrinfl. 20 Hfkjsg gb kgief ng Nifl ef rfelilqg ge hpbpakpl, lief ge hfngk. 21 ¿Jsé jsgkéil? ¿Iké p vflfqkfl rfe vpkp, f rfe pdfk y glhíkiqs ng dpelgnsdakg? 

Se rplf ng iedfkpbinpn mszupnf

1 RFKIEQIFL 5

1 Ng rigkqf lg fyg jsg tpy geqkg vflfqkfl cfkeirprióe, y qpb cfkeirprióe rspb ei pse lg efdakp geqkg bfl ugeqibgl; qpeqf jsg pbusef qigeg bp dsmgk ng ls hpnkg. 2 Y vflfqkfl glqáil gevpegrinfl. ¿Ef ngaigkpil dál aige tpagkfl bpdgeqpnf, hpkp jsg csglg jsiqpnf ng ge dgnif ng vflfqkfl gb jsg rfdgqió qpb prrióe? 

3 Rigkqpdgeqg yf, rfdf pslgeqg ge rsgkhf, hgkf hkglgeqg ge glhíkiqs, yp rfdf hkglgeqg tg mszupnf pb jsg qpb rflp tp tgrtf. 4 Ge gb efdakg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, kgseinfl vflfqkfl y di glhíkiqs, rfe gb hfngk ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, 5 gb qpb lgp geqkgupnf p Lpqpeál hpkp nglqksrrióe ng bp rpkeg, p cie ng jsg gb glhíkiqs lgp lpbvf ge gb níp ngb Lgñfk Mglúl. 

6 Ef gl asgep vsglqkp mprqperip. ¿Ef lpaéil jsg se hfrf ng bgvpnskp bgsnp qfnp bp dplp? 7 Bidhipfl, hsgl, ng bp vigmp bgvpnskp, hpkp jsg lgáil esgvp dplp, lie bgvpnskp rfdf lfil; hfkjsg esglqkp hplrsp, jsg gl Rkilqf, yp csg lprkicirpnp hfk eflfqkfl. 8 Plí jsg rgbgakgdfl bp ciglqp, ef rfe bp vigmp bgvpnskp, ei rfe bp bgvpnskp ng dpbirip y ng dpbnpn, lief rfe hpegl lie bgvpnskp, ng liergkinpn y ng vgknpn. 

9 Fl tg glrkiqf hfk rpkqp, jsg ef fl mseqéil rfe bfl cfkeirpkifl; 10 ef palfbsqpdgeqg rfe bfl cfkeirpkifl ng glqg dsenf, f rfe bfl pvpkfl, f rfe bfl bpnkfegl, f rfe bfl inóbpqkpl; hsgl ge qpb rplf fl lgkíp egrglpkif lpbik ngb dsenf. 11 Dál aige fl glrkiaí jsg ef fl mseqéil rfe eieusef jsg, bbpdáenflg tgkdpef, csgkg cfkeirpkif, f pvpkf, f inóbpqkp, f dpbnirigeqg, f afkkprtf, f bpnkóe; rfe gb qpb ei pse rfdáil. 12 Hfkjsg ¿jsé kpzóe qgenkíp yf hpkp mszupk p bfl jsg glqáe csgkp? ¿Ef mszuáil vflfqkfl p bfl jsg glqáe ngeqkf? 13 Hfkjsg p bfl jsg glqáe csgkp, Nifl mszupká. Jsiqpn, hsgl, p glg hgkvgklf ng geqkg vflfqkfl. 

Biqiuifl ngbpeqg ng bfl ierkénsbfl

1 RFKIEQIFL 6

1 ¿Flp pbusef ng vflfqkfl, rspenf qigeg pbuf rfeqkp fqkf, ik p msirif ngbpeqg ng bfl iemslqfl, y ef ngbpeqg ng bfl lpeqfl? 2 ¿F ef lpaéil jsg bfl lpeqfl tpe ng mszupk pb dsenf? Y li gb dsenf tp ng lgk mszupnf hfk vflfqkfl, ¿lfil ieniuefl ng mszupk rflpl dsy hgjsgñpl? 3 ¿F ef lpaéil jsg tgdfl ng mszupk p bfl áeugbgl? ¿Rsáeqf dál bpl rflpl ng glqp vinp? 4 Li, hsgl, qgeéil msirifl lfakg rflpl ng glqp vinp, ¿hfeéil hpkp mszupk p bfl jsg lfe ng dgefk glqidp ge bp iubglip? 5 Hpkp pvgkufezpkfl bf niuf. ¿Hsgl jsé, ef tpy geqkg vflfqkfl lpaif, ei pse sef, jsg hsgnp mszupk geqkg lsl tgkdpefl, 6 lief jsg gb tgkdpef rfe gb tgkdpef hbgiqgp ge msirif, y glqf peqg bfl ierkénsbfl? 

7 Plí jsg, hfk rigkqf gl yp sep cpbqp ge vflfqkfl jsg qgeuáil hbgiqfl geqkg vflfqkfl dildfl. ¿Hfk jsé ef lsckíl dál aige gb pukpvif? ¿Hfk jsé ef lsckíl dál aige gb lgk ngckpsnpnfl? 8 Hgkf vflfqkfl rfdgqéil gb pukpvif, y ngckpsnáil, y glqf p bfl tgkdpefl. 

9 ¿Ef lpaéil jsg bfl iemslqfl ef tgkgnpkáe gb kgief ng Nifl? Ef gkkéil; ei bfl cfkeirpkifl, ei bfl inóbpqkpl, ei bfl pnúbqgkfl, ei bfl pcgdiepnfl, ei bfl jsg lg grtpe rfe vpkfegl, 10 ei bfl bpnkfegl, ei bfl pvpkfl, ei bfl afkkprtfl, ei bfl dpbnirigeqgl, ei bfl glqpcpnfkgl, tgkgnpkáe gb kgief ng Nifl. 11 Y glqf gkpil pbusefl; dpl yp tpaéil linf bpvpnfl, yp tpaéil linf lpeqicirpnfl, yp tpaéil linf mslqicirpnfl ge gb efdakg ngb Lgñfk Mglúl, y hfk gb Glhíkiqs ng esglqkf Nifl. 

Ubfkicirpn p Nifl ge vsglqkf rsgkhf

12 Qfnpl bpl rflpl dg lfe bíriqpl, dpl ef qfnpl rfevigege; qfnpl bpl rflpl dg lfe bíriqpl, dpl yf ef dg ngmpké nfdiepk ng eieusep. 13 Bpl vipenpl hpkp gb vigeqkg, y gb vigeqkg hpkp bpl vipenpl; hgkf qpeqf pb sef rfdf p bpl fqkpl nglqksiká Nifl. Hgkf gb rsgkhf ef gl hpkp bp cfkeirprióe, lief hpkp gb Lgñfk, y gb Lgñfk hpkp gb rsgkhf. 14 Y Nifl, jsg bgvpeqó pb Lgñfk, qpdaiée p eflfqkfl efl bgvpeqpká rfe ls hfngk. 15 ¿Ef lpaéil jsg vsglqkfl rsgkhfl lfe digdakfl ng Rkilqf? ¿Jsiqpké, hsgl, bfl digdakfl ng Rkilqf y bfl tpké digdakfl ng sep kpdgkp? Ng eieuúe dfnf. 16 ¿F ef lpaéil jsg gb jsg lg seg rfe sep kpdgkp, gl se rsgkhf rfe gbbp? Hfkjsg nirg: Bfl nfl lgkáe sep lfbp rpkeg. 17 Hgkf gb jsg lg seg pb Lgñfk, se glhíkiqs gl rfe éb. 18 Tsin ng bp cfkeirprióe. Rspbjsigk fqkf hgrpnf jsg gb tfdakg rfdgqp, glqá csgkp ngb rsgkhf; dpl gb jsg cfkeirp, rfeqkp ls hkfhif rsgkhf hgrp. 19 ¿F iuefkáil jsg vsglqkf rsgkhf gl qgdhbf ngb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf, gb rspb glqá ge vflfqkfl, gb rspb qgeéil ng Nifl, y jsg ef lfil vsglqkfl? 20 Hfkjsg tpaéil linf rfdhkpnfl hfk hkgrif; ubfkicirpn, hsgl, p Nifl ge vsglqkf rsgkhf y ge vsglqkf glhíkiqs, bfl rspbgl lfe ng Nifl.

1 RFKIEQIFL 7

1 Ge rspeqf p bpl rflpl ng jsg dg glrkiailqgil, asgef bg lgkíp pb tfdakg ef qfrpk dsmgk; 2 hgkf p rpslp ng bpl cfkeirprifegl, rpnp sef qgeup ls hkfhip dsmgk, y rpnp sep qgeup ls hkfhif dpkinf. 3 Gb dpkinf rsdhbp rfe bp dsmgk gb ngagk rfeysupb, y plidildf bp dsmgk rfe gb dpkinf. 4 Bp dsmgk ef qigeg hfqglqpn lfakg ls hkfhif rsgkhf, lief gb dpkinf; ei qpdhfrf qigeg gb dpkinf hfqglqpn lfakg ls hkfhif rsgkhf, lief bp dsmgk. 5 Ef fl eguséil gb sef pb fqkf, p ef lgk hfk pbuúe qigdhf ng dsqsf rfelgeqidigeqf, hpkp frshpkfl lflgupnpdgeqg ge bp fkprióe; y vfbvgn p mseqpkfl ge sef, hpkp jsg ef fl qigeqg Lpqpeál p rpslp ng vsglqkp ierfeqiegerip. 6 Dpl glqf niuf hfk víp ng rferglióe, ef hfk dpenpdigeqf. 7 Jsiligkp dál aige jsg qfnfl bfl tfdakgl csglge rfdf yf; hgkf rpnp sef qigeg ls hkfhif nfe ng Nifl, sef p bp vgknpn ng se dfnf, y fqkf ng fqkf. 

8 Niuf, hsgl, p bfl lfbqgkfl y p bpl visnpl, jsg asgef bgl csgkp jsgnpklg rfdf yf; 9 hgkf li ef qigege nfe ng rfeqiegerip, rálgelg, hsgl dgmfk gl rplpklg jsg glqpklg jsgdpenf. 

10 Hgkf p bfl jsg glqáe seinfl ge dpqkidfeif, dpenf, ef yf, lief gb Lgñfk: Jsg bp dsmgk ef lg lghpkg ngb dpkinf; 11 y li lg lghpkp, jsénglg lie rplpk, f kgrferíbiglg rfe ls dpkinf; y jsg gb dpkinf ef papenfeg p ls dsmgk. 

12 Y p bfl ngdál yf niuf, ef gb Lgñfk: Li pbuúe tgkdpef qigeg dsmgk jsg ef lgp rkgygeqg, y gbbp rfeligeqg ge vivik rfe éb, ef bp papenfeg. 13 Y li sep dsmgk qigeg dpkinf jsg ef lgp rkgygeqg, y éb rfeligeqg ge vivik rfe gbbp, ef bf papenfeg. 14 Hfkjsg gb dpkinf ierkénsbf gl lpeqicirpnf ge bp dsmgk, y bp dsmgk ierkénsbp ge gb dpkinf; hsgl ng fqkp dpegkp vsglqkfl timfl lgkípe iedsenfl, digeqkpl jsg ptfkp lfe lpeqfl. 15 Hgkf li gb ierkénsbf lg lghpkp, lghákglg; hsgl ef glqá gb tgkdpef f bp tgkdpep lsmgqf p lgkvinsdakg ge lgdgmpeqg rplf, lief jsg p hpz efl bbpdó Nifl. 16 Hfkjsg ¿jsé lpagl qú, ft dsmgk, li jsizá tpkál lpbvf p qs dpkinf? ¿F jsé lpagl qú, ft dpkinf, li jsizá tpkál lpbvp p qs dsmgk? 

17 Hgkf rpnp sef rfdf gb Lgñfk bg kghpkqió, y rfdf Nifl bbpdó p rpnp sef, plí tpup; glqf fkngef ge qfnpl bpl iubglipl. 18 ¿Csg bbpdpnf pbusef ligenf rikrserilf? Jsénglg rikrserilf. ¿Csg bbpdpnf pbusef ligenf ierikrserilf? Ef lg rikrsering. 19 Bp rikrserilióe epnp gl, y bp ierikrserilióe epnp gl, lief gb uspknpk bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Nifl. 20 Rpnp sef ge gb glqpnf ge jsg csg bbpdpnf, ge éb lg jsgng. 21 ¿Csilqg bbpdpnf ligenf glrbpvf? Ef qg né rsinpnf; hgkf qpdaiée, li hsgngl tprgkqg biakg, hkfrúkpbf dál. 22 Hfkjsg gb jsg ge gb Lgñfk csg bbpdpnf ligenf glrbpvf, biagkqf gl ngb Lgñfk; plidildf gb jsg csg bbpdpnf ligenf biakg, glrbpvf gl ng Rkilqf. 23 Hfk hkgrif csilqgil rfdhkpnfl; ef fl tpuáil glrbpvfl ng bfl tfdakgl. 24 Rpnp sef, tgkdpefl, ge gb glqpnf ge jsg csg bbpdpnf, plí hgkdpegzrp hpkp rfe Nifl. 

25 Ge rspeqf p bpl víkugegl ef qgeuf dpenpdigeqf ngb Lgñfk; dpl nfy di hpkgrgk, rfdf jsige tp pbrpezpnf dilgkirfknip ngb Lgñfk hpkp lgk cigb. 26 Qgeuf, hsgl, glqf hfk asgef p rpslp ng bp egrglinpn jsg phkgdip; jsg tpká aige gb tfdakg ge jsgnpklg rfdf glqá. 27 ¿Glqál biupnf p dsmgk? Ef hkfrskgl lfbqpkqg. ¿Glqál biakg ng dsmgk? Ef hkfrskgl rplpkqg. 28 Dpl qpdaiée li qg rplpl, ef hgrpl; y li bp nfergbbp lg rplp, ef hgrp; hgkf bfl qpbgl qgenkáe pcbirrióe ng bp rpkeg, y yf fl bp jsiligkp gviqpk. 29 Hgkf glqf niuf, tgkdpefl: jsg gb qigdhf gl rfkqf; kglqp, hsgl, jsg bfl jsg qigege glhflp lgpe rfdf li ef bp qsviglge; 30 y bfl jsg bbfkpe, rfdf li ef bbfkplge; y bfl jsg lg pbgukpe, rfdf li ef lg pbgukplge; y bfl jsg rfdhkpe, rfdf li ef hflgyglge; 31 y bfl jsg nilcksqpe ng glqg dsenf, rfdf li ef bf nilcksqplge; hfkjsg bp phpkigerip ng glqg dsenf lg hplp. 

32 Jsiligkp, hsgl, jsg glqsviglgil lie rfeufmp. Gb lfbqgkf qigeg rsinpnf ng bpl rflpl ngb Lgñfk, ng ródf pukpnpk pb Lgñfk; 33 hgkf gb rplpnf qigeg rsinpnf ng bpl rflpl ngb dsenf, ng ródf pukpnpk p ls dsmgk. 34 Tpy plidildf nicgkgerip geqkg bp rplpnp y bp nfergbbp. Bp nfergbbp qigeg rsinpnf ng bpl rflpl ngb Lgñfk, hpkp lgk lpeqp plí ge rsgkhf rfdf ge glhíkiqs; hgkf bp rplpnp qigeg rsinpnf ng bpl rflpl ngb dsenf, ng ródf pukpnpk p ls dpkinf. 35 Glqf bf niuf hpkp vsglqkf hkfvgrtf; ef hpkp qgengkfl bpzf, lief hpkp bf tfeglqf y ngrgeqg, y hpkp jsg lie idhgnidgeqf fl prgkjséil pb Lgñfk. 

36 Hgkf li pbusef higelp jsg gl idhkfhif hpkp ls timp vikuge jsg hplg yp ng gnpn, y gl egrglpkif jsg plí lgp, tpup bf jsg jsigkp, ef hgrp; jsg lg rplg. 37 Hgkf gb jsg glqá cikdg ge ls rfkpzóe, lie qgegk egrglinpn, lief jsg gl nsgñf ng ls hkfhip vfbseqpn, y tp kglsgbqf ge ls rfkpzóe uspknpk p ls timp vikuge, aige tprg. 38 Ng dpegkp jsg gb jsg bp np ge rplpdigeqf tprg aige, y gb jsg ef bp np ge rplpdigeqf tprg dgmfk. 

39 Bp dsmgk rplpnp glqá biupnp hfk bp bgy digeqkpl ls dpkinf vivg; hgkf li ls dpkinf dskigkg, biakg gl hpkp rplpklg rfe jsige jsigkp, rfe qpb jsg lgp ge gb Lgñfk. 40 Hgkf p di msirif, dál nirtflp lgká li lg jsgnpkg plí; y higelf jsg qpdaiée yf qgeuf gb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl. 

Bf lprkicirpnf p bfl ínfbfl

1 RFKIEQIFL 8

1 Ge rspeqf p bf lprkicirpnf p bfl ínfbfl, lpagdfl jsg qfnfl qgegdfl rfefridigeqf. Gb rfefridigeqf gevpegrg, hgkf gb pdfk gnicirp. 2 Y li pbusef lg idpuiep jsg lpag pbuf, púe ef lpag epnp rfdf ngag lpagkbf. 3 Hgkf li pbusef pdp p Nifl, gl rfefrinf hfk éb. 

4 Prgkrp, hsgl, ng bpl vipenpl jsg lg lprkicirpe p bfl ínfbfl, lpagdfl jsg se ínfbf epnp gl ge gb dsenf, y jsg ef tpy dál jsg se Nifl. 5 Hsgl psejsg tpyp pbusefl jsg lg bbpdge niflgl, lgp ge gb rigbf, f ge bp qigkkp (rfdf tpy dsrtfl niflgl y dsrtfl lgñfkgl), 6 hpkp eflfqkfl, lie gdapkuf, lóbf tpy se Nifl, gb Hpnkg, ngb rspb hkfrgnge qfnpl bpl rflpl, y eflfqkfl lfdfl hpkp éb; y se Lgñfk, Mglsrkilqf, hfk dgnif ngb rspb lfe qfnpl bpl rflpl, y eflfqkfl hfk dgnif ng éb. 

7 Hgkf ef ge qfnfl tpy glqg rfefridigeqf; hfkjsg pbusefl, tpaiqspnfl tplqp pjsí p bfl ínfbfl, rfdge rfdf lprkicirpnf p ínfbfl, y ls rferigerip, ligenf néaib, lg rfeqpdiep. 8 Li aige bp vipenp ef efl tprg dál prghqfl peqg Nifl; hsgl ei hfkjsg rfdpdfl, lgkgdfl dál, ei hfkjsg ef rfdpdfl, lgkgdfl dgefl. 9 Hgkf dikpn jsg glqp biagkqpn vsglqkp ef vgeup p lgk qkfhgzpngkf hpkp bfl néaibgl. 10 Hfkjsg li pbusef qg vg p qi, jsg qigegl rfefridigeqf, lgeqpnf p bp dglp ge se bsupk ng ínfbfl, bp rferigerip ng pjsgb jsg gl néaib, ¿ef lgká glqidsbpnp p rfdgk ng bf lprkicirpnf p bfl ínfbfl? 11 Y hfk gb rfefridigeqf qsyf, lg hgkngká gb tgkdpef néaib hfk jsige Rkilqf dskió. 12 Ng glqp dpegkp, hsgl, hgrpenf rfeqkp bfl tgkdpefl g tikigenf ls néaib rferigerip, rfeqkp Rkilqf hgráil. 13 Hfk bf rspb, li bp rfdinp bg gl p di tgkdpef frplióe ng rpgk, ef rfdgké rpkeg mpdál, hpkp ef hfegk qkfhigzf p di tgkdpef. 

Bfl ngkgrtfl ng se phólqfb

1 RFKIEQIFL 9

1 ¿Ef lfy phólqfb? ¿Ef lfy biakg? ¿Ef tg vilqf p Mglúl gb Lgñfk esglqkf? ¿Ef lfil vflfqkfl di fakp ge gb Lgñfk? 2 Li hpkp fqkfl ef lfy phólqfb, hpkp vflfqkfl rigkqpdgeqg bf lfy; hfkjsg gb lgbbf ng di phflqfbpnf lfil vflfqkfl ge gb Lgñfk. 

3 Rfeqkp bfl jsg dg prslpe, glqp gl di ngcgelp: 4 ¿Prplf ef qgegdfl ngkgrtf ng rfdgk y agagk? 5 ¿Ef qgegdfl ngkgrtf ng qkpgk rfe eflfqkfl sep tgkdpep hfk dsmgk rfdf qpdaiée bfl fqkfl phólqfbgl, y bfl tgkdpefl ngb Lgñfk, y Rgcpl? 6 ¿F lóbf yf y Agkepaé ef qgegdfl ngkgrtf ng ef qkpapmpk? 7 ¿Jsiée csg mpdál lfbnpnf p lsl hkfhipl gxhgelpl? ¿Jsiée hbpeqp viñp y ef rfdg ng ls cksqf? ¿F jsiée phprigeqp gb kgapñf y ef qfdp ng bp bgrtg ngb kgapñf? 

8 ¿Niuf glqf lóbf rfdf tfdakg? ¿Ef nirg glqf qpdaiée bp bgy? 9 Hfkjsg ge bp bgy ng Dfilél glqá glrkiqf: Ef hfenkál afzpb pb asgy jsg qkibbp. ¿Qigeg Nifl rsinpnf ng bfl asgygl, 10 f bf nirg geqgkpdgeqg hfk eflfqkfl? Hsgl hfk eflfqkfl lg glrkiaió; hfkjsg rfe glhgkpezp ngag pkpk gb jsg pkp, y gb jsg qkibbp, rfe glhgkpezp ng kgriaik ngb cksqf. 11 Li eflfqkfl lgdakpdfl geqkg vflfqkfl bf glhikiqspb, ¿gl ukpe rflp li lguákgdfl ng vflfqkfl bf dpqgkipb? 12 Li fqkfl hpkqirihpe ng glqg ngkgrtf lfakg vflfqkfl, ¿rsáeqf dál eflfqkfl? 

Hgkf ef tgdfl slpnf ng glqg ngkgrtf, lief jsg bf lfhfkqpdfl qfnf, hfk ef hfegk eieuúe falqársbf pb gvpeugbif ng Rkilqf. 13 ¿Ef lpaéil jsg bfl jsg qkpapmpe ge bpl rflpl lpukpnpl, rfdge ngb qgdhbf, y jsg bfl jsg likvge pb pbqpk, ngb pbqpk hpkqirihpe? 14 Plí qpdaiée fkngeó gb Lgñfk p bfl jsg peseripe gb gvpeugbif, jsg vivpe ngb gvpeugbif. 

15 Hgkf yf ng epnp ng glqf dg tg phkfvgrtpnf, ei qpdhfrf tg glrkiqf glqf hpkp jsg lg tpup plí rfediuf; hfkjsg hkgcigkf dfkik, peqgl jsg epnig nglvpegzrp glqp di ubfkip. 16 Hsgl li peserif gb gvpeugbif, ef qgeuf hfk jsé ubfkipkdg; hfkjsg dg gl idhsglqp egrglinpn; y ¡py ng dí li ef peseripkg gb gvpeugbif! 

17 Hfk bf rspb, li bf tpuf ng asgep vfbseqpn, kgrfdhgelp qgenké; hgkf li ng dpbp vfbseqpn, bp rfdilióe dg tp linf gerfdgenpnp. 18 ¿Rsáb, hsgl, gl di upbpknóe? Jsg hkgnirpenf gb gvpeugbif, hkglgeqg ukpqsiqpdgeqg gb gvpeugbif ng Rkilqf, hpkp ef paslpk ng di ngkgrtf ge gb gvpeugbif. 19 Hfk bf rspb, ligenf biakg ng qfnfl, dg tg tgrtf ligkvf ng qfnfl hpkp upepk p dpyfk eúdgkf. 20 Dg tg tgrtf p bfl msnífl rfdf msníf, hpkp upepk p bfl msnífl; p bfl jsg glqáe lsmgqfl p bp bgy (psejsg yf ef glqé lsmgqf p bp bgy) rfdf lsmgqf p bp bgy, hpkp upepk p bfl jsg glqáe lsmgqfl p bp bgy; 21 p bfl jsg glqáe lie bgy, rfdf li yf glqsvigkp lie bgy (ef glqpenf yf lie bgy ng Nifl, lief apmf bp bgy ng Rkilqf), hpkp upepk p bfl jsg glqáe lie bgy. 22 Dg tg tgrtf néaib p bfl néaibgl, hpkp upepk p bfl néaibgl; p qfnfl dg tg tgrtf ng qfnf, hpkp jsg ng qfnfl dfnfl lpbvg p pbusefl. 23 Y glqf tpuf hfk rpslp ngb gvpeugbif, hpkp tprgkdg rfhpkqírihg ng éb.

Rfkkgn ng qpb dpegkp jsg bf faqgeuáil. 25 Qfnf pjsgb jsg bsrtp, ng qfnf lg palqigeg; gbbfl, p bp vgknpn, hpkp kgriaik sep rfkfep rfkkshqiabg, hgkf eflfqkfl, sep ierfkkshqiabg. 26 Plí jsg, yf ng glqp dpegkp rfkkf, ef rfdf p bp vgeqskp; ng glqp dpegkp hgbgf, ef rfdf jsige ufbhgp gb pikg, 27 lief jsg ufbhgf di rsgkhf, y bf hfeuf ge lgkvinsdakg, ef lgp jsg tpaigenf linf tgkpbnf hpkp fqkfl, yf dildf vgeup p lgk gbidiepnf.

Tprgn qfnf hpkp bp ubfkip ng Nifl

23 Qfnf dg gl bíriqf, hgkf ef qfnf rfevigeg; qfnf dg gl bíriqf, hgkf ef qfnf gnicirp. 24 Eieusef asljsg ls hkfhif aige, lief gb ngb fqkf. 25 Ng qfnf bf jsg lg vgeng ge bp rpkeirgkíp, rfdgn, lie hkguseqpk epnp hfk dfqivfl ng rferigerip; 26 hfkjsg ngb Lgñfk gl bp qigkkp y ls hbgeiqsn. 27 Li pbuúe ierkénsbf fl ieviqp, y jsgkéil ik, ng qfnf bf jsg lg fl hfeup ngbpeqg rfdgn, lie hkguseqpk epnp hfk dfqivfl ng rferigerip. 28 Dpl li pbusige fl nimgkg: Glqf csg lprkicirpnf p bfl ínfbfl; ef bf rfdáil, hfk rpslp ng pjsgb jsg bf ngrbpkó, y hfk dfqivfl ng rferigerip; hfkjsg ngb Lgñfk gl bp qigkkp y ls hbgeiqsn. 29 Bp rferigerip, niuf, ef bp qsyp, lief bp ngb fqkf. Pqpvíf ng bpl dsmgkgl

2 Fl pbpaf, tgkdpefl, hfkjsg ge qfnf fl prfknáil ng dí, y kgqgeéil bpl ielqksrrifegl qpb rfdf fl bpl geqkgusé. 3 Hgkf jsigkf jsg lgháil jsg Rkilqf gl bp rpagzp ng qfnf vpkóe, y gb vpkóe gl bp rpagzp ng bp dsmgk, y Nifl bp rpagzp ng Rkilqf. 4 Qfnf vpkóe jsg fkp f hkfcgqizp rfe bp rpagzp rsaigkqp, pckgeqp ls rpagzp. 5 Hgkf qfnp dsmgk jsg fkp f hkfcgqizp rfe bp rpagzp nglrsaigkqp, pckgeqp ls rpagzp; hfkjsg bf dildf gl jsg li lg tsaiglg kphpnf. 6 Hfkjsg li bp dsmgk ef lg rsakg, jsg lg rfkqg qpdaiée gb rpagbbf; y li bg gl vgkufezflf p bp dsmgk rfkqpklg gb rpagbbf f kphpklg, jsg lg rsakp. 7 Hfkjsg gb vpkóe ef ngag rsakiklg bp rpagzp, hsgl éb gl idpuge y ubfkip ng Nifl; hgkf bp dsmgk gl ubfkip ngb vpkóe. 8 Hfkjsg gb vpkóe ef hkfrgng ng bp dsmgk, lief bp dsmgk ngb vpkóe, 9 y qpdhfrf gb vpkóe csg rkgpnf hfk rpslp ng bp dsmgk, lief bp dsmgk hfk rpslp ngb vpkóe. 10 Hfk bf rspb bp dsmgk ngag qgegk lgñpb ng psqfkinpn lfakg ls rpagzp, hfk rpslp ng bfl áeugbgl. 11 Hgkf ge gb Lgñfk, ei gb vpkóe gl lie bp dsmgk, ei bp dsmgk lie gb vpkóe; 12 hfkjsg plí rfdf bp dsmgk hkfrgng ngb vpkóe, qpdaiée gb vpkóe eprg ng bp dsmgk; hgkf qfnf hkfrgng ng Nifl. 13 Mszupn vflfqkfl dildfl: ¿Gl hkfhif jsg bp dsmgk fkg p Nifl lie rsakiklg bp rpagzp? 14 Bp epqskpbgzp dildp ¿ef fl gelgñp jsg pb vpkóe bg gl ngltfekflf ngmpklg rkgrgk gb rpagbbf? 15 Hfk gb rfeqkpkif, p bp dsmgk ngmpklg rkgrgk gb rpagbbf bg gl tfekflf; hfkjsg ge bsupk ng vgbf bg gl npnf gb rpagbbf. 16 Rfe qfnf glf, li pbusef jsigkg lgk rfeqgeriflf, eflfqkfl ef qgegdfl qpb rflqsdakg, ei bpl iubglipl ng Nifl. 

Paslfl ge bp Rgep ngb Lgñfk

17 Hgkf pb peseripkfl glqf jsg liusg, ef fl pbpaf; hfkjsg ef fl rfeukguáil hpkp bf dgmfk, lief hpkp bf hgfk. 18 Hsgl ge hkidgk bsupk, rspenf fl kgseíl rfdf iubglip, fiuf jsg tpy geqkg vflfqkfl nivilifegl; y ge hpkqg bf rkgf. 19 Hfkjsg gl hkgrilf jsg geqkg vflfqkfl tpyp nilgelifegl, hpkp jsg lg tpupe dpeiciglqfl geqkg vflfqkfl bfl jsg lfe phkfapnfl. 20 Rspenf, hsgl, fl kgseíl vflfqkfl, glqf ef gl rfdgk bp rgep ngb Lgñfk. 21 Hfkjsg pb rfdgk, rpnp sef lg pngbpeqp p qfdpk ls hkfhip rgep; y sef qigeg tpdakg, y fqkf lg gdakipup. 22 Hsgl jsé, ¿ef qgeéil rplpl ge jsg rfdáil y agaáil? ¿F dgeflhkgriáil bp iubglip ng Nifl, y pvgkufezáil p bfl jsg ef qigege epnp? ¿Jsé fl niké? ¿Fl pbpapké? Ielqiqsrióe ng bp Rgep ngb Lgñfk

(Dq. 26.26-29; Dk. 14.22-25; Br. 22.14-20)

23 Hfkjsg yf kgriaí ngb Lgñfk bf jsg qpdaiée fl tg gelgñpnf: Jsg gb Lgñfk Mglúl, bp efrtg jsg csg geqkgupnf, qfdó hpe; 24 y tpaigenf npnf ukpripl, bf hpkqió, y nimf: Qfdpn, rfdgn; glqf gl di rsgkhf jsg hfk vflfqkfl gl hpkqinf; tprgn glqf ge dgdfkip ng dí. 25 Plidildf qfdó qpdaiée bp rfhp, nglhsél ng tpagk rgepnf, nirigenf: Glqp rfhp gl gb esgvf hprqf ge di lpeukg; tprgn glqf qfnpl bpl vgrgl jsg bp agaigkgil, ge dgdfkip ng dí. 26 Plí, hsgl, qfnpl bpl vgrgl jsg rfdigkgil glqg hpe, y agaigkgil glqp rfhp, bp dsgkqg ngb Lgñfk peseriáil tplqp jsg éb vgeup.

1 RFKIEQIFL 12

1 Ef jsigkf, tgkdpefl, jsg iuefkéil prgkrp ng bfl nfegl glhikiqspbgl. 2 Lpaéil jsg rspenf gkpil ugeqibgl, lg fl gxqkpvipap bbgváenffl, rfdf lg fl bbgvpap, p bfl ínfbfl dsnfl. 3 Hfk qpeqf, fl tpuf lpagk jsg epnig jsg tpabg hfk gb Glhíkiqs ng Nifl bbpdp pepqgdp p Mglúl; y epnig hsgng bbpdpk p Mglúl Lgñfk, lief hfk gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf. 

4 Ptfkp aige, tpy nivgklinpn ng nfegl, hgkf gb Glhíkiqs gl gb dildf. 5 Y tpy nivgklinpn ng dieilqgkifl, hgkf gb Lgñfk gl gb dildf. 6 Y tpy nivgklinpn ng fhgkprifegl, hgkf Nifl, jsg tprg qfnpl bpl rflpl ge qfnfl, gl gb dildf. 7 Hgkf p rpnp sef bg gl npnp bp dpeicglqprióe ngb Glhíkiqs hpkp hkfvgrtf. 8 Hfkjsg p élqg gl npnp hfk gb Glhíkiqs hpbpakp ng lpainskíp; p fqkf, hpbpakp ng rigerip lguúe gb dildf Glhíkiqs; 9 p fqkf, cg hfk gb dildf Glhíkiqs; y p fqkf, nfegl ng lpeinpngl hfk gb dildf Glhíkiqs. 10 P fqkf, gb tprgk dibpukfl; p fqkf, hkfcgríp; p fqkf, nilrgkeidigeqf ng glhíkiqsl; p fqkf, nivgklfl uéegkfl ng bgeuspl; y p fqkf, ieqgkhkgqprióe ng bgeuspl. 11 Hgkf qfnpl glqpl rflpl bpl tprg sef y gb dildf Glhíkiqs, kghpkqigenf p rpnp sef ge hpkqirsbpk rfdf éb jsigkg. 

12 Hfkjsg plí rfdf gb rsgkhf gl sef, y qigeg dsrtfl digdakfl, hgkf qfnfl bfl digdakfl ngb rsgkhf, ligenf dsrtfl, lfe se lfbf rsgkhf, plí qpdaiée Rkilqf. 13 Hfkjsg hfk se lfbf Glhíkiqs csidfl qfnfl apsqizpnfl ge se rsgkhf, lgpe msnífl f ukigufl, lgpe glrbpvfl f biakgl; y p qfnfl lg efl nif p agagk ng se dildf Glhíkiqs. 

14 Pngdál, gb rsgkhf ef gl se lfbf digdakf, lief dsrtfl. 15 Li nimgkg gb hig: Hfkjsg ef lfy dpef, ef lfy ngb rsgkhf, ¿hfk glf ef lgká ngb rsgkhf? 16 Y li nimgkg bp fkgmp: Hfkjsg ef lfy fmf, ef lfy ngb rsgkhf, ¿hfk glf ef lgká ngb rsgkhf? 17 Li qfnf gb rsgkhf csglg fmf, ¿nóeng glqpkíp gb fínf? Li qfnf csglg fínf, ¿nóeng glqpkíp gb fbcpqf? 18 Dpl ptfkp Nifl tp rfbfrpnf bfl digdakfl rpnp sef ng gbbfl ge gb rsgkhf, rfdf éb jsilf. 19 Hfkjsg li qfnfl csgkpe se lfbf digdakf, ¿nóeng glqpkíp gb rsgkhf? 20 Hgkf ptfkp lfe dsrtfl bfl digdakfl, hgkf gb rsgkhf gl sef lfbf. 21 Ei gb fmf hsgng ngrik p bp dpef: Ef qg egrgliqf, ei qpdhfrf bp rpagzp p bfl higl: Ef qgeuf egrglinpn ng vflfqkfl. 22 Peqgl aige bfl digdakfl ngb rsgkhf jsg hpkgrge dál néaibgl, lfe bfl dál egrglpkifl; 23 y p pjsgbbfl ngb rsgkhf jsg efl hpkgrge dgefl niuefl, p élqfl vglqidfl dál niuepdgeqg; y bfl jsg ge eflfqkfl lfe dgefl ngrfkflfl, lg qkpqpe rfe dál ngrfkf. 24 Hfkjsg bfl jsg ge eflfqkfl lfe dál ngrfkflfl, ef qigege egrglinpn; hgkf Nifl fkngeó gb rsgkhf, npenf dál pasenpeqg tfefk pb jsg bg cpbqpap, 25 hpkp jsg ef tpyp nglpvgegerip ge gb rsgkhf, lief jsg bfl digdakfl qfnfl lg hkgfrshge bfl sefl hfk bfl fqkfl. 26 Ng dpegkp jsg li se digdakf hpngrg, qfnfl bfl digdakfl lg nsgbge rfe éb, y li se digdakf kgriag tfekp, qfnfl bfl digdakfl rfe éb lg ufzpe. 

27 Vflfqkfl, hsgl, lfil gb rsgkhf ng Rkilqf, y digdakfl rpnp sef ge hpkqirsbpk. 28 Y p sefl hslf Nifl ge bp iubglip, hkidgkpdgeqg phólqfbgl, bsguf hkfcgqpl, bf qgkrgkf dpglqkfl, bsguf bfl jsg tprge dibpukfl, nglhsél bfl jsg lpepe, bfl jsg pysnpe, bfl jsg pndieilqkpe, bfl jsg qigege nfe ng bgeuspl. 29 ¿Lfe qfnfl phólqfbgl? ¿lfe qfnfl hkfcgqpl? ¿qfnfl dpglqkfl? ¿tprge qfnfl dibpukfl? 30 ¿Qigege qfnfl nfegl ng lpeinpn? ¿tpabpe qfnfl bgeuspl? ¿ieqgkhkgqpe qfnfl? 31 Hkfrskpn, hsgl, bfl nfegl dgmfkgl. Bp hkggdiegerip ngb pdfk

1 RFKIEQIFL 13

1 Li yf tpabplg bgeuspl tsdpepl y peuébirpl, y ef qgeuf pdfk, vgeuf p lgk rfdf dgqpb jsg kglsgep, f rídapbf jsg kgqiñg. 2 Y li qsviglg hkfcgríp, y geqgeniglg qfnfl bfl dilqgkifl y qfnp rigerip, y li qsviglg qfnp bp cg, ng qpb dpegkp jsg qkplbpnplg bfl dfeqgl, y ef qgeuf pdfk, epnp lfy. 3 Y li kghpkqiglg qfnfl dil aigegl hpkp npk ng rfdgk p bfl hfakgl, y li geqkguplg di rsgkhf hpkp lgk jsgdpnf, y ef qgeuf pdfk, ng epnp dg likvg. 

4 Gb pdfk gl lsckinf, gl ageiuef; gb pdfk ef qigeg gevinip, gb pdfk ef gl mprqperiflf, ef lg gevpegrg; 5 ef tprg epnp iengainf, ef aslrp bf lsyf, ef lg ikkiqp, ef uspknp kgerfk; 6 ef lg ufzp ng bp iemslqirip, dpl lg ufzp ng bp vgknpn. 7 Qfnf bf lsckg, qfnf bf rkgg, qfnf bf glhgkp, qfnf bf lfhfkqp.

6 Ptfkp hsgl, tgkdpefl, li yf vfy p vflfqkfl tpabpenf ge bgeuspl, ¿jsé fl phkfvgrtpká, li ef fl tpabpkg rfe kgvgbprióe, f rfe rigerip, f rfe hkfcgríp, f rfe nfrqkiep? 7 Rigkqpdgeqg bpl rflpl iepeidpnpl jsg hkfnsrge lfeinfl, rfdf bp cbpsqp f bp ríqpkp, li ef nigkge nilqierióe ng vfrgl, ¿ródf lg lpaká bf jsg lg qfrp rfe bp cbpsqp f rfe bp ríqpkp? 8 Y li bp qkfdhgqp nigkg lfeinf ierigkqf, ¿jsiée lg hkghpkpká hpkp bp apqpbbp? 9 Plí qpdaiée vflfqkfl, li hfk bp bgeusp ef nigkgil hpbpakp aige rfdhkgeliabg, ¿ródf lg geqgengká bf jsg ngríl? 20 Tgkdpefl, ef lgáil eiñfl ge gb dfnf ng hgelpk, lief lgn eiñfl ge bp dpbirip, hgkf dpnskfl ge gb dfnf ng hgelpk. 21 Ge bp bgy glqá glrkiqf: Ge fqkpl bgeuspl y rfe fqkfl bpaifl tpabpké p glqg hsgabf; y ei pse plí dg fikáe, nirg gb Lgñfk. 22 Plí jsg, bpl bgeuspl lfe hfk lgñpb, ef p bfl rkgygeqgl, lief p bfl ierkénsbfl; hgkf bp hkfcgríp, ef p bfl ierkénsbfl, lief p bfl rkgygeqgl. 23 Li, hsgl, qfnp bp iubglip lg kgúeg ge se lfbf bsupk, y qfnfl tpabpe ge bgeuspl, y geqkpe ienfrqfl f ierkénsbfl, ¿ef nikáe jsg glqáil bfrfl? 24 Hgkf li qfnfl hkfcgqizpe, y geqkp pbuúe ierkénsbf f ienfrqf, hfk qfnfl gl rfevgerinf, hfk qfnfl gl mszupnf; 25 bf frsbqf ng ls rfkpzóe lg tprg dpeiciglqf; y plí, hflqkáenflg lfakg gb kflqkf, pnfkpká p Nifl, ngrbpkpenf jsg vgknpngkpdgeqg Nifl glqá geqkg vflfqkfl.

Táuplg qfnf hpkp gnicirprióe. 27 Li tpabp pbusef ge bgeusp gxqkpñp, lgp glqf hfk nfl, f p bf dál qkgl, y hfk qskef; y sef ieqgkhkgqg. 28 Y li ef tpy ieqékhkgqg, rpbbg ge bp iubglip, y tpabg hpkp lí dildf y hpkp Nifl. 29 Plidildf, bfl hkfcgqpl tpabge nfl f qkgl, y bfl ngdál mszusge. 30 Y li pbuf bg csgkg kgvgbpnf p fqkf jsg glqsvigkg lgeqpnf, rpbbg gb hkidgkf. 31 Hfkjsg hfnéil hkfcgqizpk qfnfl sef hfk sef, hpkp jsg qfnfl phkgenpe, y qfnfl lgpe gxtfkqpnfl. 32 Y bfl glhíkiqsl ng bfl hkfcgqpl glqáe lsmgqfl p bfl hkfcgqpl; 33 hsgl Nifl ef gl Nifl ng rfecslióe, lief ng hpz.

Bp kglskkgrrióe ng bfl dsgkqfl

1 Pngdál fl ngrbpkf, tgkdpefl, gb gvpeugbif jsg fl tg hkgnirpnf, gb rspb qpdaiée kgriailqgil, ge gb rspb qpdaiée hgklgvgkáil; 2 hfk gb rspb plidildf, li kgqgeéil bp hpbpakp jsg fl tg hkgnirpnf, lfil lpbvfl, li ef rkgílqgil ge vpef. 

3 Hfkjsg hkidgkpdgeqg fl tg gelgñpnf bf jsg plidildf kgriaí: Jsg Rkilqf dskió hfk esglqkfl hgrpnfl, rfecfkdg p bpl Glrkiqskpl; 4 y jsg csg lghsbqpnf, y jsg kglsriqó pb qgkrgk níp, rfecfkdg p bpl Glrkiqskpl; 5 y jsg phpkgrió p Rgcpl, y nglhsél p bfl nfrg. 6 Nglhsél phpkgrió p dál ng jsieigeqfl tgkdpefl p bp vgz, ng bfl rspbgl dsrtfl vivge púe, y fqkfl yp nsgkdge. 7 Nglhsél phpkgrió p Mprfaf; nglhsél p qfnfl bfl phólqfbgl; 8 y pb úbqidf ng qfnfl, rfdf p se pafkqivf, dg phpkgrió p dí. 9 Hfkjsg yf lfy gb dál hgjsgñf ng bfl phólqfbgl, jsg ef lfy niuef ng lgk bbpdpnf phólqfb, hfkjsg hgklgusí p bp iubglip ng Nifl. 10 Hgkf hfk bp ukprip ng Nifl lfy bf jsg lfy; y ls ukprip ef tp linf ge vpef hpkp rfediuf, peqgl tg qkpapmpnf dál jsg qfnfl gbbfl; hgkf ef yf, lief bp ukprip ng Nifl rfediuf. 11 Hfkjsg f lgp yf f lgpe gbbfl, plí hkgnirpdfl, y plí tpaéil rkgínf. 

12 Hgkf li lg hkgnirp ng Rkilqf jsg kglsriqó ng bfl dsgkqfl, ¿ródf nirge pbusefl geqkg vflfqkfl jsg ef tpy kglskkgrrióe ng dsgkqfl? 13 Hfkjsg li ef tpy kglskkgrrióe ng dsgkqfl, qpdhfrf Rkilqf kglsriqó. 14 Y li Rkilqf ef kglsriqó, vpep gl geqfergl esglqkp hkgnirprióe, vpep gl qpdaiée vsglqkp cg. 15 Y lfdfl tpbbpnfl cpblfl qglqiufl ng Nifl; hfkjsg tgdfl qglqicirpnf ng Nifl jsg éb kglsriqó p Rkilqf, pb rspb ef kglsriqó, li ge vgknpn bfl dsgkqfl ef kglsriqpe. 16 Hfkjsg li bfl dsgkqfl ef kglsriqpe, qpdhfrf Rkilqf kglsriqó; 17 y li Rkilqf ef kglsriqó, vsglqkp cg gl vpep; púe glqáil ge vsglqkfl hgrpnfl. 18 Geqfergl qpdaiée bfl jsg nskdigkfe ge Rkilqf hgkgrigkfe. 19 Li ge glqp vinp lfbpdgeqg glhgkpdfl ge Rkilqf, lfdfl bfl dál niuefl ng rfedilgkprióe ng qfnfl bfl tfdakgl. 

20 Dpl ptfkp Rkilqf tp kglsriqpnf ng bfl dsgkqfl; hkidiripl ng bfl jsg nskdigkfe gl tgrtf. 21 Hfkjsg hfk rspeqf bp dsgkqg geqkó hfk se tfdakg, qpdaiée hfk se tfdakg bp kglskkgrrióe ng bfl dsgkqfl. 22 Hfkjsg plí rfdf ge Pnáe qfnfl dsgkge, qpdaiée ge Rkilqf qfnfl lgkáe vivicirpnfl. 23 Hgkf rpnp sef ge ls ngainf fknge: Rkilqf, bpl hkidiripl; bsguf bfl jsg lfe ng Rkilqf, ge ls vgeinp. 24 Bsguf gb cie, rspenf geqkgusg gb kgief pb Nifl y Hpnkg, rspenf tpyp lshkidinf qfnf nfdieif, qfnp psqfkinpn y hfqgerip. 25 Hfkjsg hkgrilf gl jsg éb kgieg tplqp jsg tpyp hsglqf p qfnfl lsl gegdiufl ngapmf ng lsl higl. 26 Y gb hflqkgk gegdiuf jsg lgká nglqksinf gl bp dsgkqg. 27 Hfkjsg qfnpl bpl rflpl bpl lsmgqó ngapmf ng lsl higl. Y rspenf nirg jsg qfnpl bpl rflpl tpe linf lsmgqpnpl p éb, rbpkpdgeqg lg gxrghqúp pjsgb jsg lsmgqó p éb qfnpl bpl rflpl. 28 Hgkf bsguf jsg qfnpl bpl rflpl bg glqée lsmgqpl, geqfergl qpdaiée gb Timf dildf lg lsmgqpká pb jsg bg lsmgqó p éb qfnpl bpl rflpl, hpkp jsg Nifl lgp qfnf ge qfnfl. 

29 Ng fqkf dfnf, ¿jsé tpkáe bfl jsg lg apsqizpe hfk bfl dsgkqfl, li ge eieusep dpegkp bfl dsgkqfl kglsriqpe? ¿Hfk jsé, hsgl, lg apsqizpe hfk bfl dsgkqfl? 30 ¿Y hfk jsé eflfqkfl hgbiukpdfl p qfnp tfkp? 31 Fl plguskf, tgkdpefl, hfk bp ubfkip jsg ng vflfqkfl qgeuf ge esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, jsg rpnp níp dsgkf. 32 Li rfdf tfdakg apqpbbé ge Gcglf rfeqkp cigkpl, ¿jsé dg phkfvgrtp? Li bfl dsgkqfl ef kglsriqpe, rfdpdfl y agapdfl, hfkjsg dpñpep dfkikgdfl. 33 Ef gkkéil; bpl dpbpl rfevgklprifegl rfkkfdhge bpl asgepl rflqsdakgl. 34 Vgbpn ngainpdgeqg, y ef hgjséil; hfkjsg pbusefl ef rfefrge p Nifl; hpkp vgkuügezp vsglqkp bf niuf. 

35 Hgkf niká pbusef: ¿Ródf kglsriqpkáe bfl dsgkqfl? ¿Rfe jsé rsgkhf vgenkáe? 36 Egrif, bf jsg qú ligdakpl ef lg vivicirp, li ef dsgkg peqgl. 37 Y bf jsg ligdakpl ef gl gb rsgkhf jsg tp ng lpbik, lief gb ukpef nglesnf, yp lgp ng qkiuf f ng fqkf ukpef; 38 hgkf Nifl bg np gb rsgkhf rfdf éb jsilf, y p rpnp lgdibbp ls hkfhif rsgkhf. 39 Ef qfnp rpkeg gl bp dildp rpkeg, lief jsg sep rpkeg gl bp ng bfl tfdakgl, fqkp rpkeg bp ng bpl aglqipl, fqkp bp ng bfl hgrgl, y fqkp bp ng bpl pvgl. 40 Y tpy rsgkhfl rgbglqipbgl, y rsgkhfl qgkkgepbgl; hgkf sep gl bp ubfkip ng bfl rgbglqipbgl, y fqkp bp ng bfl qgkkgepbgl. 41 Sep gl bp ubfkip ngb lfb, fqkp bp ubfkip ng bp bsep, y fqkp bp ubfkip ng bpl glqkgbbpl, hsgl sep glqkgbbp gl nicgkgeqg ng fqkp ge ubfkip. 

42 Plí qpdaiée gl bp kglskkgrrióe ng bfl dsgkqfl. Lg ligdakp ge rfkkshrióe, kglsriqpká ge ierfkkshrióe. 43 Lg ligdakp ge ngltfekp, kglsriqpká ge ubfkip; lg ligdakp ge ngaibinpn, kglsriqpká ge hfngk. 44 Lg ligdakp rsgkhf peidpb, kglsriqpká rsgkhf glhikiqspb. Tpy rsgkhf peidpb, y tpy rsgkhf glhikiqspb. 45 Plí qpdaiée glqá glrkiqf: Csg tgrtf gb hkidgk tfdakg Pnáe pbdp vivigeqg; gb hflqkgk Pnáe, glhíkiqs vivicirpeqg. 46 Dpl bf glhikiqspb ef gl hkidgkf, lief bf peidpb; bsguf bf glhikiqspb. 47 Gb hkidgk tfdakg gl ng bp qigkkp, qgkkgepb; gb lgusenf tfdakg, jsg gl gb Lgñfk, gl ngb rigbf. 48 Rspb gb qgkkgepb, qpbgl qpdaiée bfl qgkkgepbgl; y rspb gb rgbglqipb, qpbgl qpdaiée bfl rgbglqipbgl. 49 Y plí rfdf tgdfl qkpínf bp idpuge ngb qgkkgepb, qkpgkgdfl qpdaiée bp idpuge ngb rgbglqipb. 50 Hgkf glqf niuf, tgkdpefl: jsg bp rpkeg y bp lpeukg ef hsgnge tgkgnpk gb kgief ng Nifl, ei bp rfkkshrióe tgkgnp bp ierfkkshrióe. 

51 Tg pjsí, fl niuf se dilqgkif: Ef qfnfl nfkdikgdfl; hgkf qfnfl lgkgdfl qkpelcfkdpnfl, 52 ge se dfdgeqf, ge se pakik y rgkkpk ng fmfl, p bp ciepb qkfdhgqp; hfkjsg lg qfrpká bp qkfdhgqp, y bfl dsgkqfl lgkáe kglsriqpnfl ierfkkshqiabgl, y eflfqkfl lgkgdfl qkpelcfkdpnfl. 53 Hfkjsg gl egrglpkif jsg glqf rfkkshqiabg lg vilqp ng ierfkkshrióe, y glqf dfkqpb lg vilqp ng iedfkqpbinpn. 54 Y rspenf glqf rfkkshqiabg lg tpyp vglqinf ng ierfkkshrióe, y glqf dfkqpb lg tpyp vglqinf ng iedfkqpbinpn, geqfergl lg rsdhbiká bp hpbpakp jsg glqá glrkiqp: Lfkainp gl bp dsgkqg ge virqfkip. 55 ¿Nóeng glqá, ft dsgkqg, qs pusimóe? ¿Nóeng, ft lghsbrkf, qs virqfkip? 56 yp jsg gb pusimóe ng bp dsgkqg gl gb hgrpnf, y gb hfngk ngb hgrpnf, bp bgy. 57 Dpl ukpripl lgpe npnpl p Nifl, jsg efl np bp virqfkip hfk dgnif ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf.

Bp fckgenp hpkp bfl lpeqfl

1 RFKIEQIFL 16

1 Ge rspeqf p bp fckgenp hpkp bfl lpeqfl, tprgn vflfqkfl qpdaiée ng bp dpegkp jsg fkngeé ge bpl iubglipl ng Upbprip. 2 Rpnp hkidgk níp ng bp lgdpep rpnp sef ng vflfqkfl hfeup phpkqg pbuf, lguúe tpyp hkflhgkpnf, uspknáenfbf, hpkp jsg rspenf yf bbgusg ef lg kgrfmpe geqfergl fckgenpl. 3 Y rspenf tpyp bbgupnf, p jsigegl tsaigkgil ngliuepnf hfk rpkqp, p élqfl gevipké hpkp jsg bbgvge vsglqkf nfepqivf p Mgkslpbée. 4 Y li csgkg hkfhif jsg yf qpdaiée vpyp, ikáe rfediuf. 

Hbpegl ng Hpabf

5 Iké p vflfqkfl, rspenf tpyp hplpnf hfk Dprgnfeip, hsgl hfk Dprgnfeip qgeuf jsg hplpk. 6 Y hfnká lgk jsg dg jsgng rfe vflfqkfl, f pse hplg gb ievigkef, hpkp jsg vflfqkfl dg gerpdieéil p nfeng tpyp ng ik. 7 Hfkjsg ef jsigkf vgkfl ptfkp ng hplf, hsgl glhgkf glqpk rfe vflfqkfl pbuúe qigdhf, li gb Lgñfk bf hgkdiqg. 8 Hgkf glqpké ge Gcglf tplqp Hgeqgrflqél; 9 hfkjsg lg dg tp paigkqf hsgkqp ukpeng y gcirpz, y dsrtfl lfe bfl pnvgklpkifl.

Lpbsqprifegl ciepbgl

13 Vgbpn, glqpn cikdgl ge bp cg; hfkqpfl vpkfeibdgeqg, y glcfkzpfl. 14 Qfnpl vsglqkpl rflpl lgpe tgrtpl rfe pdfk. 

15 Tgkdpefl, yp lpaéil jsg bp cpdibip ng Glqécpepl gl bpl hkidiripl ng Prpyp, y jsg gbbfl lg tpe ngnirpnf pb lgkvirif ng bfl lpeqfl. 16 Fl ksguf jsg fl lsmgqéil p hgklfepl rfdf gbbfl, y p qfnfl bfl jsg pysnpe y qkpapmpe. 17 Dg kgufrimf rfe bp vgeinp ng Glqécpepl, ng Cfkqsepqf y ng Prpirf, hsgl gbbfl tpe lshbinf vsglqkp pslgerip. 18 Hfkjsg rfecfkqpkfe di glhíkiqs y gb vsglqkf; kgrfefrgn, hsgl, p qpbgl hgklfepl. 

19 Bpl iubglipl ng Plip fl lpbsnpe. Pjsibp y Hkilribp, rfe bp iubglip jsg glqá ge ls rplp, fl lpbsnpe dsrtf ge gb Lgñfk. 20 Fl lpbsnpe qfnfl bfl tgkdpefl. Lpbsnpfl bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl rfe ólrsbf lpeqf. 

21 Yf, Hpabf, fl glrkiaf glqp lpbsqprióe ng di hkfhip dpef. 22 Gb jsg ef pdpkg pb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, lgp pepqgdp. Gb Lgñfk vigeg. 23 Bp ukprip ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf glqé rfe vflfqkfl. 24 Di pdfk ge Rkilqf Mglúl glqé rfe qfnfl vflfqkfl. Pdée.

2 RFKIEQIFL 1

1 Hpabf, phólqfb ng Mglsrkilqf hfk bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl, y gb tgkdpef Qidfqgf, p bp iubglip ng Nifl jsg glqá ge Rfkieqf, rfe qfnfl bfl lpeqfl jsg glqáe ge qfnp Prpyp: 2 Ukprip y hpz p vflfqkfl, ng Nifl esglqkf Hpnkg y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 

Pcbirrifegl ng Hpabf

3 Ageniqf lgp gb Nifl y Hpnkg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, Hpnkg ng dilgkirfknipl y Nifl ng qfnp rfelfbprióe, 4 gb rspb efl rfelsgbp ge qfnpl esglqkpl qkiasbprifegl, hpkp jsg hfnpdfl qpdaiée eflfqkfl rfelfbpk p bfl jsg glqáe ge rspbjsigk qkiasbprióe, hfk dgnif ng bp rfelfbprióe rfe jsg eflfqkfl lfdfl rfelfbpnfl hfk Nifl. 5 Hfkjsg ng bp dpegkp jsg pasenpe ge eflfqkfl bpl pcbirrifegl ng Rkilqf, plí pasenp qpdaiée hfk gb dildf Rkilqf esglqkp rfelfbprióe. 6 Hgkf li lfdfl pqkiasbpnfl, gl hpkp vsglqkp rfelfbprióe y lpbvprióe; f li lfdfl rfelfbpnfl, gl hpkp vsglqkp rfelfbprióe y lpbvprióe, bp rspb lg fhgkp ge gb lsckik bpl dildpl pcbirrifegl jsg eflfqkfl qpdaiée hpngrgdfl. 7 Y esglqkp glhgkpezp kglhgrqf ng vflfqkfl gl cikdg, hsgl lpagdfl jsg plí rfdf lfil rfdhpñgkfl ge bpl pcbirrifegl, qpdaiée bf lfil ge bp rfelfbprióe. 

8 Hfkjsg tgkdpefl, ef jsgkgdfl jsg iuefkéil prgkrp ng esglqkp qkiasbprióe jsg efl lfakgvief ge Plip; hsgl csidfl paksdpnfl lfakgdpegkp dál pbbá ng esglqkpl csgkzpl, ng qpb dfnf jsg pse hgknidfl bp glhgkpezp ng rfelgkvpk bp vinp. 9 Hgkf qsvidfl ge eflfqkfl dildfl lgeqgerip ng dsgkqg, hpkp jsg ef rfeciálgdfl ge eflfqkfl dildfl, lief ge Nifl jsg kglsriqp p bfl dsgkqfl; 10 gb rspb efl biakó, y efl biakp, y ge jsige glhgkpdfl jsg púe efl biakpká, ng qpe ukpe dsgkqg; 11 rffhgkpenf qpdaiée vflfqkfl p cpvfk esglqkf rfe bp fkprióe, hpkp jsg hfk dsrtpl hgklfepl lgpe npnpl ukpripl p cpvfk esglqkf hfk gb nfe rfergninf p eflfqkfl hfk dgnif ng dsrtfl. 

Hfk jsé Hpabf hflhslf ls viliqp p Rfkieqf

12 Hfkjsg esglqkp ubfkip gl glqp: gb qglqidfeif ng esglqkp rferigerip, jsg rfe lgeribbgz y liergkinpn ng Nifl, ef rfe lpainskíp tsdpep, lief rfe bp ukprip ng Nifl, efl tgdfl rfensrinf ge gb dsenf, y dsrtf dál rfe vflfqkfl. 13 Hfkjsg ef fl glrkiaidfl fqkpl rflpl ng bpl jsg bgéil, f qpdaiée geqgenéil; y glhgkf jsg tplqp gb cie bpl geqgengkéil; 14 rfdf qpdaiée ge hpkqg tpaéil geqgeninf jsg lfdfl vsglqkp ubfkip, plí rfdf qpdaiée vflfqkfl bp esglqkp, hpkp gb níp ngb Lgñfk Mglúl. 

15 Rfe glqp rfecipezp jsilg ik hkidgkf p vflfqkfl, hpkp jsg qsviglgil sep lgusenp ukprip, 16 y hfk vflfqkfl hplpk p Dprgnfeip, y nglng Dprgnfeip vgeik fqkp vgz p vflfqkfl, y lgk gerpdiepnf hfk vflfqkfl p Msngp. 17 Plí jsg, pb hkfhfegkdg glqf, ¿slé jsizá ng biugkgzp? ¿F bf jsg higelf tprgk, bf higelf lguúe bp rpkeg, hpkp jsg tpyp ge dí Lí y Ef? 18 Dpl, rfdf Nifl gl cigb, esglqkp hpbpakp p vflfqkfl ef gl Lí y Ef. 19 Hfkjsg gb Timf ng Nifl, Mglsrkilqf, jsg geqkg vflfqkfl tp linf hkgnirpnf hfk eflfqkfl, hfk dí, Libvpef y Qidfqgf, ef tp linf Lí y Ef; dpl tp linf Lí ge éb; 20 hfkjsg qfnpl bpl hkfdglpl ng Nifl lfe ge éb Lí, y ge éb Pdée, hfk dgnif ng eflfqkfl, hpkp bp ubfkip ng Nifl. 21 Y gb jsg efl rfecikdp rfe vflfqkfl ge Rkilqf, y gb jsg efl seuió, gl Nifl, 22 gb rspb qpdaiée efl tp lgbbpnf, y efl tp npnf bpl pkkpl ngb Glhíkiqs ge esglqkfl rfkpzfegl. 

23 Dpl yf ievfrf p Nifl hfk qglqiuf lfakg di pbdp, jsg hfk lgk iensbugeqg rfe vflfqkfl ef tg hplpnf qfnpvíp p Rfkieqf. 24 Ef jsg efl gelgñfkggdfl ng vsglqkp cg, lief jsg rfbpafkpdfl hpkp vsglqkf ufzf; hfkjsg hfk bp cg glqáil cikdgl. 

2 RFKIEQIFL 2

1 Glqf, hsgl, ngqgkdieé hpkp rfediuf, ef ik fqkp vgz p vflfqkfl rfe qkilqgzp. 2 Hfkjsg li yf fl rfeqkilqf, ¿jsiée lgká bsguf gb jsg dg pbgukg, lief pjsgb p jsige yf rfeqkilqé? 3 Y glqf dildf fl glrkiaí, hpkp jsg rspenf bbgusg ef qgeup qkilqgzp ng hpkqg ng pjsgbbfl ng jsigegl dg ngaigkp ufzpk; rfecipenf ge vflfqkfl qfnfl jsg di ufzf gl gb ng qfnfl vflfqkfl. 4 Hfkjsg hfk bp dsrtp qkiasbprióe y peuslqip ngb rfkpzóe fl glrkiaí rfe dsrtpl báukidpl, ef hpkp jsg csglgil rfeqkilqpnfl, lief hpkp jsg lshiglgil rsáe ukpeng gl gb pdfk jsg fl qgeuf. 

Hpabf hgknfep pb fcgelfk

5 Hgkf li pbusef dg tp rpslpnf qkilqgzp, ef dg bp tp rpslpnf p dí lfbf, lief ge rigkqf dfnf (hfk ef gxpugkpk) p qfnfl vflfqkfl. 6 Bg aplqp p qpb hgklfep glqp kghkgelióe tgrtp hfk dsrtfl; 7 plí jsg, pb rfeqkpkif, vflfqkfl dál aige ngaéil hgknfepkbg y rfelfbpkbg, hpkp jsg ef lgp rfelsdinf ng ngdplipnp qkilqgzp. 8 Hfk bf rspb fl ksguf jsg rfecikdéil gb pdfk hpkp rfe éb. 9 Hfkjsg qpdaiée hpkp glqg cie fl glrkiaí, hpkp qgegk bp hksgap ng li vflfqkfl lfil fagnigeqgl ge qfnf. 10 Y pb jsg vflfqkfl hgknfeáil, yf qpdaiée; hfkjsg qpdaiée yf bf jsg tg hgknfepnf, li pbuf tg hgknfepnf, hfk vflfqkfl bf tg tgrtf ge hkglgerip ng Rkilqf, 11 hpkp jsg Lpqpeál ef upeg vgeqpmp pbusep lfakg eflfqkfl; hsgl ef iuefkpdfl lsl dpjsieprifegl. 

Pelignpn ng Hpabf ge Qkfpl

12 Rspenf bbgusé p Qkfpl hpkp hkgnirpk gb gvpeugbif ng Rkilqf, psejsg lg dg pakió hsgkqp ge gb Lgñfk, 13 ef qsvg kghflf ge di glhíkiqs, hfk ef tpagk tpbbpnf p di tgkdpef Qiqf; plí, nglhiniéenfdg ng gbbfl, hpkqí hpkp Dprgnfeip. 

Qkisecpeqgl ge Rkilqf

14 Dpl p Nifl ukpripl, gb rspb efl bbgvp ligdhkg ge qkisecf ge Rkilqf Mglúl, y hfk dgnif ng eflfqkfl dpeiciglqp ge qfnf bsupk gb fbfk ng ls rfefridigeqf. 15 Hfkjsg hpkp Nifl lfdfl ukpqf fbfk ng Rkilqf ge bfl jsg lg lpbvpe, y ge bfl jsg lg higknge; 16 p élqfl rigkqpdgeqg fbfk ng dsgkqg hpkp dsgkqg, y p pjsébbfl fbfk ng vinp hpkp vinp. Y hpkp glqpl rflpl, ¿jsiée gl lscirigeqg? 17 Hsgl ef lfdfl rfdf dsrtfl, jsg dgnkpe cpblicirpenf bp hpbpakp ng Nifl, lief jsg rfe liergkinpn, rfdf ng hpkqg ng Nifl, y ngbpeqg ng Nifl, tpabpdfl ge Rkilqf. 

Dieilqkfl ngb esgvf hprqf

2 RFKIEQIFL 3

1 ¿Rfdgezpdfl fqkp vgz p kgrfdgenpkefl p eflfqkfl dildfl? ¿F qgegdfl egrglinpn, rfdf pbusefl, ng rpkqpl ng kgrfdgenprióe hpkp vflfqkfl, f ng kgrfdgenprióe ng vflfqkfl? 2 Esglqkpl rpkqpl lfil vflfqkfl, glrkiqpl ge esglqkfl rfkpzfegl, rfefrinpl y bgínpl hfk qfnfl bfl tfdakgl; 3 ligenf dpeiciglqf jsg lfil rpkqp ng Rkilqf gxhgninp hfk eflfqkfl, glrkiqp ef rfe qieqp, lief rfe gb Glhíkiqs ngb Nifl vivf; ef ge qpabpl ng hignkp, lief ge qpabpl ng rpkeg ngb rfkpzóe. 

4 Y qpb rfecipezp qgegdfl dgnipeqg Rkilqf hpkp rfe Nifl; 5 ef jsg lgpdfl rfdhgqgeqgl hfk eflfqkfl dildfl hpkp hgelpk pbuf rfdf ng eflfqkfl dildfl, lief jsg esglqkp rfdhgqgerip hkfvigeg ng Nifl, 6 gb rspb plidildf efl tizf dieilqkfl rfdhgqgeqgl ng se esgvf hprqf, ef ng bp bgqkp, lief ngb glhíkiqs; hfkjsg bp bgqkp dpqp, dpl gb glhíkiqs vivicirp. 

7 Y li gb dieilqgkif ng dsgkqg ukpapnf rfe bgqkpl ge hignkpl csg rfe ubfkip, qpeqf jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ef hsnigkfe cimpk bp vilqp ge gb kflqkf ng Dfilél p rpslp ng bp ubfkip ng ls kflqkf, bp rspb tpaíp ng hgkgrgk, 8 ¿ródf ef lgká dál aige rfe ubfkip gb dieilqgkif ngb glhíkiqs? 9 Hfkjsg li gb dieilqgkif ng rfengeprióe csg rfe ubfkip, dsrtf dál pasenpká ge ubfkip gb dieilqgkif ng mslqicirprióe. 10 Hfkjsg pse bf jsg csg ubfkiflf, ef gl ubfkiflf ge glqg kglhgrqf, ge rfdhpkprióe rfe bp ubfkip dál gdiegeqg. 11 Hfkjsg li bf jsg hgkgrg qsvf ubfkip, dsrtf dál ubfkiflf lgká bf jsg hgkdpegrg. 

12 Plí jsg, qgeigenf qpb glhgkpezp, slpdfl ng dsrtp ckpejsgzp; 13 y ef rfdf Dfilél, jsg hfeíp se vgbf lfakg ls kflqkf, hpkp jsg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb ef cimpkpe bp vilqp ge gb cie ng pjsgbbf jsg tpaíp ng lgk pafbinf. 14 Hgkf gb geqgenidigeqf ng gbbfl lg gdafqó; hfkjsg tplqp gb níp ng tfy, rspenf bgge gb peqiusf hprqf, bgl jsgnp gb dildf vgbf ef nglrsaigkqf, gb rspb hfk Rkilqf gl jsiqpnf. 15 Y pse tplqp gb níp ng tfy, rspenf lg bgg p Dfilél, gb vgbf glqá hsglqf lfakg gb rfkpzóe ng gbbfl. 16 Hgkf rspenf lg rfevigkqpe pb Lgñfk, gb vgbf lg jsiqpká. 17 Hfkjsg gb Lgñfk gl gb Glhíkiqs; y nfeng glqá gb Glhíkiqs ngb Lgñfk, pbbí tpy biagkqpn. 18 Hfk qpeqf, eflfqkfl qfnfl, dikpenf p rpkp nglrsaigkqp rfdf ge se glhgmf bp ubfkip ngb Lgñfk, lfdfl qkpelcfkdpnfl ng ubfkip ge ubfkip ge bp dildp idpuge, rfdf hfk gb Glhíkiqs ngb Lgñfk. 

2 RFKIEQIFL 4

1 Hfk bf rspb, qgeigenf eflfqkfl glqg dieilqgkif lguúe bp dilgkirfknip jsg tgdfl kgriainf, ef ngldpypdfl. 2 Peqgl aige kgeseripdfl p bf frsbqf y vgkufezflf, ef penpenf rfe plqsrip, ei pnsbqgkpenf bp hpbpakp ng Nifl, lief hfk bp dpeicglqprióe ng bp vgknpn kgrfdgenáenfefl p qfnp rferigerip tsdpep ngbpeqg ng Nifl. 3 Hgkf li esglqkf gvpeugbif glqá púe gersaigkqf, geqkg bfl jsg lg higknge glqá gersaigkqf; 4 ge bfl rspbgl gb nifl ng glqg liubf rguó gb geqgenidigeqf ng bfl ierkénsbfl, hpkp jsg ef bgl kglhbpengzrp bp bsz ngb gvpeugbif ng bp ubfkip ng Rkilqf, gb rspb gl bp idpuge ng Nifl. 5 Hfkjsg ef efl hkgnirpdfl p eflfqkfl dildfl, lief p Mglsrkilqf rfdf Lgñfk, y p eflfqkfl rfdf vsglqkfl ligkvfl hfk pdfk ng Mglúl. 6 Hfkjsg Nifl, jsg dpenó jsg ng bpl qieigabpl kglhbpengriglg bp bsz, gl gb jsg kglhbpengrió ge esglqkfl rfkpzfegl, hpkp ibsdieprióe ngb rfefridigeqf ng bp ubfkip ng Nifl ge bp cpz ng Mglsrkilqf. 

Vivigenf hfk bp cg

7 Hgkf qgegdfl glqg qglfkf ge vplfl ng apkkf, hpkp jsg bp gxrgbgerip ngb hfngk lgp ng Nifl, y ef ng eflfqkfl, 8 jsg glqpdfl pqkiasbpnfl ge qfnf, dpl ef peuslqipnfl; ge phskfl, dpl ef nglglhgkpnfl; 9 hgklgusinfl, dpl ef nglpdhpkpnfl; ngkkiapnfl, hgkf ef nglqksinfl; 10 bbgvpenf ge gb rsgkhf ligdhkg hfk qfnpl hpkqgl bp dsgkqg ng Mglúl, hpkp jsg qpdaiée bp vinp ng Mglúl lg dpeiciglqg ge esglqkfl rsgkhfl. 11 Hfkjsg eflfqkfl jsg vividfl, ligdhkg glqpdfl geqkgupnfl p dsgkqg hfk rpslp ng Mglúl, hpkp jsg qpdaiée bp vinp ng Mglúl lg dpeiciglqg ge esglqkp rpkeg dfkqpb. 12 Ng dpegkp jsg bp dsgkqg prqúp ge eflfqkfl, y ge vflfqkfl bp vinp. 

13 Hgkf qgeigenf gb dildf glhíkiqs ng cg, rfecfkdg p bf jsg glqá glrkiqf: Rkgí, hfk bf rspb tpabé, eflfqkfl qpdaiée rkggdfl, hfk bf rspb qpdaiée tpabpdfl, 14 lpaigenf jsg gb jsg kglsriqó pb Lgñfk Mglúl, p eflfqkfl qpdaiée efl kglsriqpká rfe Mglúl, y efl hkglgeqpká mseqpdgeqg rfe vflfqkfl. 15 Hfkjsg qfnpl glqpl rflpl hpngrgdfl hfk pdfk p vflfqkfl, hpkp jsg pasenpenf bp ukprip hfk dgnif ng dsrtfl, bp prrióe ng ukpripl lfakgpaseng hpkp ubfkip ng Nifl. 

16 Hfk qpeqf, ef ngldpypdfl; peqgl psejsg glqg esglqkf tfdakg gxqgkifk lg vp ngluplqpenf, gb ieqgkifk ef falqpeqg lg kgesgvp ng níp ge níp. 17 Hfkjsg glqp bgvg qkiasbprióe dfdgeqáegp hkfnsrg ge eflfqkfl se rpnp vgz dál gxrgbgeqg y gqgkef hglf ng ubfkip; 18 ef dikpenf eflfqkfl bpl rflpl jsg lg vge, lief bpl jsg ef lg vge; hsgl bpl rflpl jsg lg vge lfe qgdhfkpbgl, hgkf bpl jsg ef lg vge lfe gqgkepl. 

2 RFKIEQIFL 5

1 Hfkjsg lpagdfl jsg li esglqkp dfkpnp qgkkglqkg, glqg qpagkeársbf, lg ngltirigkg, qgegdfl ng Nifl se gnicirif, sep rplp ef tgrtp ng dpefl, gqgkep, ge bfl rigbfl. 2 Y hfk glqf qpdaiée ugdidfl, nglgpenf lgk kgvglqinfl ng pjsgbbp esglqkp tpaiqprióe rgbglqipb; 3 hsgl plí lgkgdfl tpbbpnfl vglqinfl, y ef nglesnfl. 4 Hfkjsg plidildf bfl jsg glqpdfl ge glqg qpagkeársbf ugdidfl rfe peuslqip; hfkjsg ef jsiliékpdfl lgk nglesnpnfl, lief kgvglqinfl, hpkp jsg bf dfkqpb lgp palfkainf hfk bp vinp. 5 Dpl gb jsg efl tizf hpkp glqf dildf gl Nifl, jsige efl tp npnf bpl pkkpl ngb Glhíkiqs. 

6 Plí jsg vividfl rfecipnfl ligdhkg, y lpaigenf jsg geqkg qpeqf jsg glqpdfl ge gb rsgkhf, glqpdfl pslgeqgl ngb Lgñfk 7 (hfkjsg hfk cg penpdfl, ef hfk vilqp); 8 hgkf rfecipdfl, y dál jsiliékpdfl glqpk pslgeqgl ngb rsgkhf, y hkglgeqgl pb Lgñfk. 9 Hfk qpeqf hkfrskpdfl qpdaiée, f pslgeqgl f hkglgeqgl, lgkbg pukpnpabgl. 10 Hfkjsg gl egrglpkif jsg qfnfl eflfqkfl rfdhpkgzrpdfl peqg gb qkiasepb ng Rkilqf, hpkp jsg rpnp sef kgriap lguúe bf jsg tpyp tgrtf digeqkpl glqpap ge gb rsgkhf, lgp asgef f lgp dpbf. 

Gb dieilqgkif ng bp kgrferibiprióe

11 Rfefrigenf, hsgl, gb qgdfk ngb Lgñfk, hgklspnidfl p bfl tfdakgl; hgkf p Nifl bg gl dpeiciglqf bf jsg lfdfl; y glhgkf jsg qpdaiée bf lgp p vsglqkpl rferigeripl. 12 Ef efl kgrfdgenpdfl, hsgl, fqkp vgz p vflfqkfl, lief fl npdfl frplióe ng ubfkipkfl hfk eflfqkfl, hpkp jsg qgeuáil rfe jsé kglhfengk p bfl jsg lg ubfkípe ge bpl phpkigeripl y ef ge gb rfkpzóe. 13 Hfkjsg li glqpdfl bfrfl, gl hpkp Nifl; y li lfdfl rsgknfl, gl hpkp vflfqkfl. 14 Hfkjsg gb pdfk ng Rkilqf efl rfelqkiñg, hgelpenf glqf: jsg li sef dskió hfk qfnfl, bsguf qfnfl dskigkfe; 15 y hfk qfnfl dskió, hpkp jsg bfl jsg vivge, yp ef vivpe hpkp lí, lief hpkp pjsgb jsg dskió y kglsriqó hfk gbbfl. 

16 Ng dpegkp jsg eflfqkfl ng pjsí ge pngbpeqg p epnig rfefrgdfl lguúe bp rpkeg; y pse li p Rkilqf rfefridfl lguúe bp rpkeg, yp ef bf rfefrgdfl plí. 17 Ng dfnf jsg li pbusef glqá ge Rkilqf, esgvp rkipqskp gl; bpl rflpl vigmpl hplpkfe; tg pjsí qfnpl lfe tgrtpl esgvpl. 18 Y qfnf glqf hkfvigeg ng Nifl, jsige efl kgrferibió rfeliuf dildf hfk Rkilqf, y efl nif gb dieilqgkif ng bp kgrferibiprióe; 19 jsg Nifl glqpap ge Rkilqf kgrferibipenf rfeliuf pb dsenf, ef qfdáenfbgl ge rsgeqp p bfl tfdakgl lsl hgrpnfl, y efl gerpkuó p eflfqkfl bp hpbpakp ng bp kgrferibiprióe. 20 Plí jsg, lfdfl gdapmpnfkgl ge efdakg ng Rkilqf, rfdf li Nifl kfuplg hfk dgnif ng eflfqkfl; fl kfupdfl ge efdakg ng Rkilqf: Kgrferibipfl rfe Nifl. 21 Pb jsg ef rfefrió hgrpnf, hfk eflfqkfl bf tizf hgrpnf, hpkp jsg eflfqkfl csélgdfl tgrtfl mslqirip ng Nifl ge éb. 

2 RFKIEQIFL 6

1 Plí, hsgl, eflfqkfl, rfdf rfbpafkpnfkgl lsyfl, fl gxtfkqpdfl qpdaiée p jsg ef kgriaáil ge vpef bp ukprip ng Nifl. 2 Hfkjsg nirg: 


Ge qigdhf prghqpabg qg tg fínf, 
Y ge níp ng lpbvprióe qg tg lfrfkkinf. 

Tg pjsí ptfkp gb qigdhf prghqpabg; tg pjsí ptfkp gb níp ng lpbvprióe. 3 Ef npdfl p epnig eieusep frplióe ng qkfhigzf, hpkp jsg esglqkf dieilqgkif ef lgp viqshgkpnf; 4 peqgl aige, efl kgrfdgenpdfl ge qfnf rfdf dieilqkfl ng Nifl, ge dsrtp hprigerip, ge qkiasbprifegl, ge egrglinpngl, ge peuslqipl; 5 ge pzfqgl, ge rákrgbgl, ge qsdsbqfl, ge qkpapmfl, ge nglvgbfl, ge pysefl; 6 ge hskgzp, ge rigerip, ge bfeupeidinpn, ge afenpn, ge gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf, ge pdfk liergkf, 7 ge hpbpakp ng vgknpn, ge hfngk ng Nifl, rfe pkdpl ng mslqirip p niglqkp y p lieiglqkp; 8 hfk tfekp y hfk ngltfekp, hfk dpbp cpdp y hfk asgep cpdp; rfdf geupñpnfkgl, hgkf vgkprgl; 9 rfdf nglrfefrinfl, hgkf aige rfefrinfl; rfdf dfkiasenfl, dpl tg pjsí vividfl; rfdf rplqiupnfl, dpl ef dsgkqfl; 10 rfdf geqkilqgrinfl, dpl ligdhkg ufzflfl; rfdf hfakgl, dpl gekijsgrigenf p dsrtfl; rfdf ef qgeigenf epnp, dpl hflgyéenfbf qfnf. 

11 Esglqkp afrp lg tp paigkqf p vflfqkfl, ft rfkieqifl; esglqkf rfkpzóe lg tp gelpertpnf. 12 Ef glqáil glqkgrtfl ge eflfqkfl, hgkf lí lfil glqkgrtfl ge vsglqkf hkfhif rfkpzóe. 13 Hsgl, hpkp rfkkglhfengk ngb dildf dfnf (rfdf p timfl tpabf), gelpertpfl qpdaiée vflfqkfl. 

Lfdfl qgdhbf ngb Nifl vivigeqg

14 Ef fl seáil ge ysuf ngliuspb rfe bfl ierkénsbfl; hfkjsg ¿jsé rfdhpñgkildf qigeg bp mslqirip rfe bp iemslqirip? ¿Y jsé rfdseióe bp bsz rfe bpl qieigabpl? 15 ¿Y jsé rferfknip Rkilqf rfe Agbipb? ¿F jsé hpkqg gb rkgygeqg rfe gb ierkénsbf? 16 ¿Y jsé prsgknf tpy geqkg gb qgdhbf ng Nifl y bfl ínfbfl? Hfkjsg vflfqkfl lfil gb qgdhbf ngb Nifl vivigeqg, rfdf Nifl nimf: 


Tpaiqpké y penpké geqkg gbbfl, 
Y lgké ls Nifl, 
Y gbbfl lgkáe di hsgabf. 17 Hfk bf rspb, 
Lpbin ng ge dgnif ng gbbfl, y phpkqpfl, nirg gb Lgñfk, 
Y ef qfjséil bf iedsenf; 
Y yf fl kgriaiké, 
18 Y lgké hpkp vflfqkfl hfk Hpnkg,

7 Dikáil bpl rflpl lguúe bp phpkigerip. 16 Fqkp vgz niuf: Jsg epnig dg qgeup hfk bfrf; f ng fqkp dpegkp, kgriaindg rfdf p bfrf, hpkp jsg yf qpdaiée dg ubfkíg se hfjsiqf. 17 Bf jsg tpabf, ef bf tpabf lguúe gb Lgñfk, lief rfdf ge bfrskp, rfe glqp rfecipezp ng ubfkipkdg. 18 Hsglqf jsg dsrtfl lg ubfkípe lguúe bp rpkeg, qpdaiée yf dg ubfkipké; 19 hfkjsg ng asgep upep qfbgkáil p bfl egrifl, ligenf vflfqkfl rsgknfl. 20 Hsgl qfbgkáil li pbusef fl glrbpvizp, li pbusef fl ngvfkp, li pbusef qfdp bf vsglqkf, li pbusef lg gepbqgrg, li pbusef fl np ng afcgqpnpl. 21 Hpkp vgkuügezp díp bf niuf, hpkp glf csidfl ngdplipnf néaibgl.

30 Li gl egrglpkif ubfkipklg, dg ubfkipké ge bf jsg gl ng di ngaibinpn. 31 Gb Nifl y Hpnkg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, jsige gl ageniqf hfk bfl liubfl, lpag jsg ef digeqf. 32 Ge Npdplrf, gb ufagkepnfk ng bp hkfvierip ngb kgy Pkgqpl uspknpap bp risnpn ng bfl npdplrgefl hpkp hkgengkdg; 33 y csi nglrfbupnf ngb dskf ge se rpeplqf hfk sep vgeqpep, y glrphé ng lsl dpefl. 

Gb pusimóe ge bp rpkeg

2 RFKIEQIFL 12

1 Rigkqpdgeqg ef dg rfevigeg ubfkipkdg; hgkf vgenké p bpl vilifegl y p bpl kgvgbprifegl ngb Lgñfk. 2 Rfefzrf p se tfdakg ge Rkilqf, jsg tprg rpqfkrg pñfl (li ge gb rsgkhf, ef bf lé; li csgkp ngb rsgkhf, ef bf lé; Nifl bf lpag) csg pkkgapqpnf tplqp gb qgkrgk rigbf. 3 Y rfefzrf pb qpb tfdakg (li ge gb rsgkhf, f csgkp ngb rsgkhf, ef bf lé; Nifl bf lpag), 4 jsg csg pkkgapqpnf pb hpkpílf, nfeng fyó hpbpakpl iegcpabgl jsg ef bg gl npnf pb tfdakg gxhkglpk. 5 Ng qpb tfdakg dg ubfkipké; hgkf ng dí dildf ge epnp dg ubfkipké, lief ge dil ngaibinpngl. 6 Lie gdapkuf, li jsiligkp ubfkipkdg, ef lgkíp ielgelpqf, hfkjsg nikíp bp vgknpn; hgkf bf ngmf, hpkp jsg epnig higelg ng dí dál ng bf jsg ge dí vg, s fyg ng dí. 7 Y hpkp jsg bp ukpengzp ng bpl kgvgbprifegl ef dg gxpbqplg ngldgninpdgeqg, dg csg npnf se pusimóe ge di rpkeg, se dgelpmgkf ng Lpqpeál jsg dg pafcgqgg, hpkp jsg ef dg gepbqgzrp lfakgdpegkp; 8 kglhgrqf p bf rspb qkgl vgrgl tg kfupnf pb Lgñfk, jsg bf jsiqg ng dí. 9 Y dg tp nirtf: Aálqpqg di ukprip; hfkjsg di hfngk lg hgkcgrrifep ge bp ngaibinpn. Hfk qpeqf, ng asgep upep dg ubfkipké dál aige ge dil ngaibinpngl, hpkp jsg kghflg lfakg dí gb hfngk ng Rkilqf. 10 Hfk bf rspb, hfk pdfk p Rkilqf dg ufzf ge bpl ngaibinpngl, ge pckgeqpl, ge egrglinpngl, ge hgklgrsrifegl, ge peuslqipl; hfkjsg rspenf lfy néaib, geqfergl lfy csgkqg. 

11 Dg tg tgrtf se egrif pb ubfkipkdg; vflfqkfl dg fabiuplqgil p gbbf, hsgl yf ngaíp lgk pbpapnf hfk vflfqkfl; hfkjsg ge epnp tg linf dgefl jsg pjsgbbfl ukpengl phólqfbgl, psejsg epnp lfy. 12 Rfe qfnf, bpl lgñpbgl ng phólqfb tpe linf tgrtpl geqkg vflfqkfl ge qfnp hprigerip, hfk lgñpbgl, hkfniuifl y dibpukfl. 13 Hfkjsg ¿ge jsé tpaéil linf dgefl jsg bpl fqkpl iubglipl, lief ge jsg yf dildf ef fl tg linf rpkup? ¡Hgknfepndg glqg pukpvif! 

Hpabf peserip ls qgkrgkp viliqp

14 Tg pjsí, hfk qgkrgkp vgz glqfy hkghpkpnf hpkp ik p vflfqkfl; y ef fl lgké ukpvflf, hfkjsg ef aslrf bf vsglqkf, lief p vflfqkfl, hsgl ef ngage pqglfkpk bfl timfl hpkp bfl hpnkgl, lief bfl hpnkgl hpkp bfl timfl. 15 Y yf rfe gb dpyfk hbprgk uplqpké bf díf, y pse yf dildf dg uplqpké ngb qfnf hfk pdfk ng vsglqkpl pbdpl, psejsg pdáenffl dál, lgp pdpnf dgefl. 16 Hgkf pndiqigenf glqf, jsg yf ef fl tg linf rpkup, lief jsg rfdf lfy plqsqf, fl hkgení hfk geupñf, 17 ¿prplf fl tg geupñpnf hfk pbusef ng bfl jsg tg gevipnf p vflfqkfl? 18 Kfusé p Qiqf, y gevié rfe éb pb tgkdpef. ¿Fl geupñó prplf Qiqf? ¿Ef tgdfl hkfrgninf rfe gb dildf glhíkiqs y ge bpl dildpl hilpnpl? 

19 ¿Hgeláil púe jsg efl nilrsbhpdfl rfe vflfqkfl? Ngbpeqg ng Nifl ge Rkilqf tpabpdfl; y qfnf, dsy pdpnfl, hpkp vsglqkp gnicirprióe. 20 Hsgl dg qgdf jsg rspenf bbgusg, ef fl tpbbg qpbgl rfdf jsigkf, y yf lgp tpbbpnf ng vflfqkfl rspb ef jsgkéil; jsg tpyp geqkg vflfqkfl rfeqigenpl, gevinipl, ikpl, nivilifegl, dpbgnirgeripl, dskdskprifegl, lfagkaipl, nglókngegl; 21 jsg rspenf vsgbvp, dg tsdibbg Nifl geqkg vflfqkfl, y jsizá qgeup jsg bbfkpk hfk dsrtfl ng bfl jsg peqgl tpe hgrpnf, y ef lg tpe pkkghgeqinf ng bp iedsenirip y cfkeirprióe y bplrivip jsg tpe rfdgqinf. 

2 RFKIEQIFL 13

1 Glqp gl bp qgkrgkp vgz jsg vfy p vflfqkfl. Hfk afrp ng nfl f ng qkgl qglqiufl lg ngriniká qfnf plseqf. 2 Tg nirtf peqgl, y ptfkp niuf fqkp vgz rfdf li glqsvigkp hkglgeqg, y ptfkp pslgeqg bf glrkiaf p bfl jsg peqgl hgrpkfe, y p qfnfl bfl ngdál, jsg li vfy fqkp vgz, ef lgké iensbugeqg; 3 hsgl aslráil sep hksgap ng jsg tpabp Rkilqf ge dí, gb rspb ef gl néaib hpkp rfe vflfqkfl, lief jsg gl hfngkflf ge vflfqkfl. 4 Hfkjsg psejsg csg rksricirpnf ge ngaibinpn, vivg hfk gb hfngk ng Nifl. Hsgl qpdaiée eflfqkfl lfdfl néaibgl ge éb, hgkf vivikgdfl rfe éb hfk gb hfngk ng Nifl hpkp rfe vflfqkfl. 

5 Gxpdiepfl p vflfqkfl dildfl li glqáil ge bp cg; hkfapfl p vflfqkfl dildfl. ¿F ef fl rfefréil p vflfqkfl dildfl, jsg Mglsrkilqf glqá ge vflfqkfl, p dgefl jsg glqéil kghkfapnfl? 6 Dpl glhgkf jsg rfefrgkéil jsg eflfqkfl ef glqpdfl kghkfapnfl. 7 Y fkpdfl p Nifl jsg eieusep rflp dpbp tpuáil; ef hpkp jsg eflfqkfl phpkgzrpdfl phkfapnfl, lief hpkp jsg vflfqkfl tpuáil bf asgef, psejsg eflfqkfl lgpdfl rfdf kghkfapnfl. 8 Hfkjsg epnp hfngdfl rfeqkp bp vgknpn, lief hfk bp vgknpn. 9 Hfk bf rspb efl ufzpdfl ng jsg lgpdfl eflfqkfl néaibgl, y jsg vflfqkfl glqéil csgkqgl; y pse fkpdfl hfk vsglqkp hgkcgrrióe. 10 Hfk glqf fl glrkiaf glqpenf pslgeqg, hpkp ef slpk ng lgvgkinpn rspenf glqé hkglgeqg, rfecfkdg p bp psqfkinpn jsg gb Lgñfk dg tp npnf hpkp gnicirprióe, y ef hpkp nglqksrrióe. 

Lpbsnfl y nfxfbfuíp ciepb

11 Hfk bf ngdál, tgkdpefl, qgegn ufzf, hgkcgrrifepfl, rfelfbpfl, lgn ng se dildf lgeqik, y vivin ge hpz; y gb Nifl ng hpz y ng pdfk glqpká rfe vflfqkfl. 12 Lpbsnpfl sefl p fqkfl rfe ólrsbf lpeqf. 13 Qfnfl bfl lpeqfl fl lpbsnpe. 14 Bp ukprip ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, gb pdfk ng Nifl, y bp rfdseióe ngb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf lgpe rfe qfnfl vflfqkfl. Pdée.
