Bp Ghílqfbp ngb Phólqfb Lpe Hpabf p bfl

UÁBPQPL

Lpbsqprióe

UÁBPQPL 1

1 Hpabf, phólqfb (ef ng tfdakgl ei hfk tfdakg, lief hfk Mglsrkilqf y hfk Nifl gb Hpnkg jsg bf kglsriqó ng bfl dsgkqfl), 2 y qfnfl bfl tgkdpefl jsg glqáe rfediuf, p bpl iubglipl ng Upbprip: 3 Ukprip y hpz lgpe p vflfqkfl, ng Nifl gb Hpnkg y ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, 4 gb rspb lg nif p lí dildf hfk esglqkfl hgrpnfl hpkp biakpkefl ngb hkglgeqg liubf dpbf, rfecfkdg p bp vfbseqpn ng esglqkf Nifl y Hpnkg, 5 p jsige lgp bp ubfkip hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. Pdée. 

Ef tpy fqkf gvpeugbif

6 Glqfy dpkpvibbpnf ng jsg qpe hkfeqf fl tpyáil pbgmpnf ngb jsg fl bbpdó hfk bp ukprip ng Rkilqf, hpkp lgusik se gvpeugbif nicgkgeqg. 7 Ef jsg tpyp fqkf, lief jsg tpy pbusefl jsg fl hgkqskape y jsigkge hgkvgkqik gb gvpeugbif ng Rkilqf. 8 Dpl li pse eflfqkfl, f se áeugb ngb rigbf, fl peseripkg fqkf gvpeugbif nicgkgeqg ngb jsg fl tgdfl peseripnf, lgp pepqgdp. 9 Rfdf peqgl tgdfl nirtf, qpdaiée ptfkp bf kghiqf: Li pbusef fl hkgnirp nicgkgeqg gvpeugbif ngb jsg tpaéil kgriainf, lgp pepqgdp. 

10 Hsgl, ¿aslrf ptfkp gb cpvfk ng bfl tfdakgl, f gb ng Nifl? ¿F qkpqf ng pukpnpk p bfl tfdakgl? Hsgl li qfnpvíp pukpnpkp p bfl tfdakgl, ef lgkíp ligkvf ng Rkilqf. 

Gb dieilqgkif ng Hpabf

11 Dpl fl tpuf lpagk, tgkdpefl, jsg gb gvpeugbif peseripnf hfk dí, ef gl lguúe tfdakg; 12 hsgl yf ei bf kgriaí ei bf phkgení ng tfdakg pbusef, lief hfk kgvgbprióe ng Mglsrkilqf. 13 Hfkjsg yp tpaéil fínf prgkrp ng di rfensrqp ge fqkf qigdhf ge gb msnpíldf, jsg hgklgusíp lfakgdpegkp p bp iubglip ng Nifl, y bp plfbpap; 14 y ge gb msnpíldf pvgeqpmpap p dsrtfl ng dil rfeqgdhfkáegfl ge di eprióe, ligenf dsrtf dál rgbflf ng bpl qkpnirifegl ng dil hpnkgl. 15 Hgkf rspenf pukpnó p Nifl, jsg dg phpkqó nglng gb vigeqkg ng di dpnkg, y dg bbpdó hfk ls ukprip, 16 kgvgbpk p ls Timf ge dí, hpkp jsg yf bg hkgnirplg geqkg bfl ugeqibgl, ef rfelsbqé ge lgusinp rfe rpkeg y lpeukg, 17 ei lsaí p Mgkslpbée p bfl jsg gkpe phólqfbgl peqgl jsg yf; lief jsg csi p Pkpaip, y vfbví ng esgvf p Npdplrf. 

18 Nglhsél, hplpnfl qkgl pñfl, lsaí p Mgkslpbée hpkp vgk p Hgnkf, y hgkdpegrí rfe éb jsierg nípl; 19 hgkf ef vi p eieuúe fqkf ng bfl phólqfbgl, lief p Mprfaf gb tgkdpef ngb Lgñfk. 20 Ge glqf jsg fl glrkiaf, tg pjsí ngbpeqg ng Nifl jsg ef digeqf. 21 Nglhsél csi p bpl kguifegl ng Likip y ng Ribirip, 22 y ef gkp rfefrinf ng vilqp p bpl iubglipl ng Msngp, jsg gkpe ge Rkilqf; 23 lfbpdgeqg fípe ngrik: Pjsgb jsg ge fqkf qigdhf efl hgklgusíp, ptfkp hkgnirp bp cg jsg ge fqkf qigdhf plfbpap. 24 Y ubfkicirpape p Nifl ge dí. 

UÁBPQPL 2

1 Nglhsél, hplpnfl rpqfkrg pñfl, lsaí fqkp vgz p Mgkslpbée rfe Agkepaé, bbgvpenf qpdaiée rfediuf p Qiqf. 2 Hgkf lsaí lguúe sep kgvgbprióe, y hpkp ef rfkkgk f tpagk rfkkinf ge vpef, gxhslg ge hkivpnf p bfl jsg qgeípe rigkqp kghsqprióe gb gvpeugbif jsg hkgnirf geqkg bfl ugeqibgl. 3 Dpl ei pse Qiqf, jsg glqpap rfediuf, rfe qfnf y lgk ukiguf, csg fabiupnf p rikrserinpklg; 4 y glqf p hglpk ng bfl cpblfl tgkdpefl ieqkfnsrinfl p glrfeninpl, jsg geqkpape hpkp glhipk esglqkp biagkqpn jsg qgegdfl ge Rkilqf Mglúl, hpkp kgnsrikefl p glrbpviqsn, 5 p bfl rspbgl ei hfk se dfdgeqf prrgnidfl p lfdgqgkefl, hpkp jsg bp vgknpn ngb gvpeugbif hgkdpegriglg rfe vflfqkfl. 6 Hgkf ng bfl jsg qgeípe kghsqprióe ng lgk pbuf (bf jsg tpype linf ge fqkf qigdhf epnp dg idhfkqp; Nifl ef tprg prghrióe ng hgklfepl), p dí, hsgl, bfl ng kghsqprióe epnp esgvf dg rfdseirpkfe. 7 Peqgl hfk gb rfeqkpkif, rfdf vigkfe jsg dg tpaíp linf gerfdgenpnf gb gvpeugbif ng bp ierikrserilióe, rfdf p Hgnkf gb ng bp rikrserilióe 8 (hsgl gb jsg prqsó ge Hgnkf hpkp gb phflqfbpnf ng bp rikrserilióe, prqsó qpdaiée ge dí hpkp rfe bfl ugeqibgl), 9 y kgrfefrigenf bp ukprip jsg dg tpaíp linf npnp, Mprfaf, Rgcpl y Mspe, jsg gkpe rfelingkpnfl rfdf rfbsdepl, efl nigkfe p dí y p Agkepaé bp niglqkp ge lgñpb ng rfdhpñgkildf, hpkp jsg eflfqkfl csélgdfl p bfl ugeqibgl, y gbbfl p bp rikrserilióe. 10 Lfbpdgeqg efl hinigkfe jsg efl prfknálgdfl ng bfl hfakgl; bf rspb qpdaiée hkfrské rfe nibiugerip tprgk. 

Hpabf kghkgeng p Hgnkf ge Peqifjsíp

11 Hgkf rspenf Hgnkf vief p Peqifjsíp, bg kglilqí rpkp p rpkp, hfkjsg gkp ng rfengepk. 12 Hsgl peqgl jsg vieiglge pbusefl ng hpkqg ng Mprfaf, rfdíp rfe bfl ugeqibgl; hgkf nglhsél jsg vieigkfe, lg kgqkpíp y lg phpkqpap, hfkjsg qgeíp dignf ng bfl ng bp rikrserilióe. 13 Y ge ls lidsbprióe hpkqirihpape qpdaiée bfl fqkfl msnífl, ng qpb dpegkp jsg pse Agkepaé csg qpdaiée pkkplqkpnf hfk bp tihfrkglíp ng gbbfl. 14 Hgkf rspenf vi jsg ef penpape kgrqpdgeqg rfecfkdg p bp vgknpn ngb gvpeugbif, nimg p Hgnkf ngbpeqg ng qfnfl: Li qú, ligenf msníf, vivgl rfdf bfl ugeqibgl y ef rfdf msníf, ¿hfk jsé fabiupl p bfl ugeqibgl p msnpizpk? 15 Eflfqkfl, msnífl ng epridigeqf, y ef hgrpnfkgl ng geqkg bfl ugeqibgl, 16 lpaigenf jsg gb tfdakg ef gl mslqicirpnf hfk bpl fakpl ng bp bgy, lief hfk bp cg ng Mglsrkilqf, eflfqkfl qpdaiée tgdfl rkgínf ge Mglsrkilqf, hpkp lgk mslqicirpnfl hfk bp cg ng Rkilqf y ef hfk bpl fakpl ng bp bgy, hfk rspeqf hfk bpl fakpl ng bp bgy epnig lgká mslqicirpnf. 17 Y li aslrpenf lgk mslqicirpnfl ge Rkilqf, qpdaiée eflfqkfl lfdfl tpbbpnfl hgrpnfkgl, ¿gl hfk glf Rkilqf dieilqkf ng hgrpnf? Ge eieusep dpegkp. 18 Hfkjsg li bpl rflpl jsg nglqksí, bpl dildpl vsgbvf p gnicirpk, qkpelukglfk dg tpuf. 19 Hfkjsg yf hfk bp bgy lfy dsgkqf hpkp bp bgy, p cie ng vivik hpkp Nifl. 20 Rfe Rkilqf glqfy mseqpdgeqg rksricirpnf, y yp ef vivf yf, dpl vivg Rkilqf ge dí; y bf jsg ptfkp vivf ge bp rpkeg, bf vivf ge bp cg ngb Timf ng Nifl, gb rspb dg pdó y lg geqkguó p lí dildf hfk dí. 21 Ef nglgrtf bp ukprip ng Nifl; hsgl li hfk bp bgy csglg bp mslqirip, geqfergl hfk ngdál dskió Rkilqf. 

Gb Glhíkiqs lg kgriag hfk bp cg

UÁBPQPL 3

1 ¡Ft uábpqpl ielgelpqfl! ¿jsiée fl cplrieó hpkp ef fagngrgk p bp vgknpn, p vflfqkfl peqg rsyfl fmfl Mglsrkilqf csg yp hkglgeqpnf rbpkpdgeqg geqkg vflfqkfl rfdf rksricirpnf? 2 Glqf lfbf jsigkf lpagk ng vflfqkfl: ¿Kgriailqgil gb Glhíkiqs hfk bpl fakpl ng bp bgy, f hfk gb fík rfe cg? 3 ¿Qpe egrifl lfil? ¿Tpaigenf rfdgezpnf hfk gb Glhíkiqs, ptfkp vpil p prpapk hfk bp rpkeg? 4 ¿Qpeqpl rflpl tpaéil hpngrinf ge vpef? li gl jsg kgpbdgeqg csg ge vpef. 5 Pjsgb, hsgl, jsg fl lsdieilqkp gb Glhíkiqs, y tprg dpkpvibbpl geqkg vflfqkfl, ¿bf tprg hfk bpl fakpl ng bp bgy, f hfk gb fík rfe cg? 

Gb hprqf ng Nifl rfe Pakptpd

6 Plí Pakptpd rkgyó p Nifl, y bg csg rfeqpnf hfk mslqirip. 7 Lpagn, hfk qpeqf, jsg bfl jsg lfe ng cg, élqfl lfe timfl ng Pakptpd. 8 Y bp Glrkiqskp, hkgvigenf jsg Nifl tpaíp ng mslqicirpk hfk bp cg p bfl ugeqibgl, nif ng peqgdpef bp asgep esgvp p Pakptpd, nirigenf: Ge qi lgkáe ageniqpl qfnpl bpl eprifegl. 9 Ng dfnf jsg bfl ng bp cg lfe agengrinfl rfe gb rkgygeqg Pakptpd. 

10 Hfkjsg qfnfl bfl jsg nghgenge ng bpl fakpl ng bp bgy glqáe apmf dpbnirióe, hsgl glrkiqf glqá: Dpbniqf qfnf pjsgb jsg ef hgkdpegrigkg ge qfnpl bpl rflpl glrkiqpl ge gb biakf ng bp bgy, hpkp tprgkbpl. 11 Y jsg hfk bp bgy eieusef lg mslqicirp hpkp rfe Nifl, gl gvingeqg, hfkjsg: Gb mslqf hfk bp cg viviká; 12 y bp bgy ef gl ng cg, lief jsg nirg: Gb jsg tirigkg glqpl rflpl viviká hfk gbbpl. 13 Rkilqf efl kgnidió ng bp dpbnirióe ng bp bgy, tgrtf hfk eflfqkfl dpbnirióe (hfkjsg glqá glrkiqf: Dpbniqf qfnf gb jsg gl rfbupnf ge se dpngkf), 14 hpkp jsg ge Rkilqf Mglúl bp agenirióe ng Pakptpd pbrpezplg p bfl ugeqibgl, p cie ng jsg hfk bp cg kgriaiélgdfl bp hkfdglp ngb Glhíkiqs. 

15 Tgkdpefl, tpabf ge qékdiefl tsdpefl: Se hprqf, psejsg lgp ng tfdakg, sep vgz kpqicirpnf, epnig bf ievpbinp, ei bg pñpng. 16 Ptfkp aige, p Pakptpd csgkfe tgrtpl bpl hkfdglpl, y p ls lidigeqg. Ef nirg: Y p bpl lidigeqgl, rfdf li tpabplg ng dsrtfl, lief rfdf ng sef: Y p qs lidigeqg, bp rspb gl Rkilqf. 17 Glqf, hsgl, niuf: Gb hprqf hkgvipdgeqg kpqicirpnf hfk Nifl hpkp rfe Rkilqf, bp bgy jsg vief rspqkfrigeqfl qkgieqp pñfl nglhsél, ef bf pakfup, hpkp ievpbinpk bp hkfdglp. 18 Hfkjsg li bp tgkgerip gl hfk bp bgy, yp ef gl hfk bp hkfdglp; hgkf Nifl bp rfergnió p Pakptpd dgnipeqg bp hkfdglp. 

Gb hkfhóliqf ng bp bgy

19 Geqfergl, ¿hpkp jsé likvg bp bgy? Csg pñpninp p rpslp ng bpl qkpelukglifegl, tplqp jsg vieiglg bp lidigeqg p jsige csg tgrtp bp hkfdglp; y csg fkngepnp hfk dgnif ng áeugbgl ge dpef ng se dgnipnfk. 20 Y gb dgnipnfk ef bf gl ng sef lfbf; hgkf Nifl gl sef. 

21 ¿Bsguf bp bgy gl rfeqkpkip p bpl hkfdglpl ng Nifl? Ge eieusep dpegkp; hfkjsg li bp bgy npnp hsnigkp vivicirpk, bp mslqirip csgkp vgknpngkpdgeqg hfk bp bgy. 22 Dpl bp Glrkiqskp bf gergkkó qfnf apmf hgrpnf, hpkp jsg bp hkfdglp jsg gl hfk bp cg ge Mglsrkilqf csglg npnp p bfl rkgygeqgl. 

23 Hgkf peqgl jsg vieiglg bp cg, glqáapdfl rfeciepnfl apmf bp bgy, gergkkpnfl hpkp pjsgbbp cg jsg iap p lgk kgvgbpnp. 24 Ng dpegkp jsg bp bgy tp linf esglqkf pyf, hpkp bbgvpkefl p Rkilqf, p cie ng jsg csélgdfl mslqicirpnfl hfk bp cg. 25 Hgkf vgeinp bp cg, yp ef glqpdfl apmf pyf, 26 hsgl qfnfl lfil timfl ng Nifl hfk bp cg ge Rkilqf Mglúl; 27 hfkjsg qfnfl bfl jsg tpaéil linf apsqizpnfl ge Rkilqf, ng Rkilqf glqáil kgvglqinfl. 28 Yp ef tpy msníf ei ukiguf; ef tpy glrbpvf ei biakg; ef tpy vpkóe ei dsmgk; hfkjsg qfnfl vflfqkfl lfil sef ge Rkilqf Mglúl. 29 Y li vflfqkfl lfil ng Rkilqf, rigkqpdgeqg biepmg ng Pakptpd lfil, y tgkgngkfl lguúe bp hkfdglp. 

UÁBPQPL 4

1 Hgkf qpdaiée niuf: Geqkg qpeqf jsg gb tgkgngkf gl eiñf, ge epnp nicigkg ngb glrbpvf, psejsg gl lgñfk ng qfnf; 2 lief jsg glqá apmf qsqfkgl y rskpnfkgl tplqp gb qigdhf lgñpbpnf hfk gb hpnkg. 3 Plí qpdaiée eflfqkfl, rspenf ékpdfl eiñfl, glqáapdfl ge glrbpviqsn apmf bfl ksnidgeqfl ngb dsenf. 4 Hgkf rspenf vief gb rsdhbidigeqf ngb qigdhf, Nifl gevió p ls Timf, eprinf ng dsmgk y eprinf apmf bp bgy, 5 hpkp jsg kgnidiglg p bfl jsg glqpape apmf bp bgy, p cie ng jsg kgriaiélgdfl bp pnfhrióe ng timfl. 6 Y hfk rspeqf lfil timfl, Nifl gevió p vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl gb Glhíkiqs ng ls Timf, gb rspb rbpdp: ¡Paap, Hpnkg! 7 Plí jsg yp ef gkgl glrbpvf, lief timf; y li timf, qpdaiée tgkgngkf ng Nifl hfk dgnif ng Rkilqf. 

Gxtfkqprióe rfeqkp gb vfbvgk p bp glrbpviqsn

8 Rigkqpdgeqg, ge fqkf qigdhf, ef rfefrigenf p Nifl, lgkvípil p bfl jsg hfk epqskpbgzp ef lfe niflgl; 9 dpl ptfkp, rfefrigenf p Nifl, f dál aige, ligenf rfefrinfl hfk Nifl, ¿ródf gl jsg fl vfbvéil ng esgvf p bfl néaibgl y hfakgl ksnidgeqfl, p bfl rspbgl fl jsgkéil vfbvgk p glrbpvizpk? 10 Uspknáil bfl nípl, bfl dglgl, bfl qigdhfl y bfl pñfl. 11 Dg qgdf ng vflfqkfl, jsg tpyp qkpapmpnf ge vpef rfe vflfqkfl. 

12 Fl ksguf, tgkdpefl, jsg fl tpuáil rfdf yf, hfkjsg yf qpdaiée dg tirg rfdf vflfqkfl. Eieuúe pukpvif dg tpaéil tgrtf. 13 Hsgl vflfqkfl lpaéil jsg p rpslp ng sep gecgkdgnpn ngb rsgkhf fl peserié gb gvpeugbif pb hkierihif; 14 y ef dg nglhkgriplqgil ei nglgrtplqgil hfk bp hksgap jsg qgeíp ge di rsgkhf, peqgl aige dg kgriailqgil rfdf p se áeugb ng Nifl, rfdf p Rkilqf Mglúl. 15 ¿Nóeng, hsgl, glqá glp lpqilcprrióe jsg gxhgkidgeqpapil? Pbgufkíp ng Lpkp y Pupk

21 Ngrindg, bfl jsg jsgkéil glqpk apmf bp bgy: ¿ef tpaéil fínf bp bgy? 22 Hfkjsg glqá glrkiqf jsg Pakptpd qsvf nfl timfl; sef ng bp glrbpvp, gb fqkf ng bp biakg. 23 Hgkf gb ng bp glrbpvp eprió lguúe bp rpkeg; dpl gb ng bp biakg, hfk bp hkfdglp. 24 Bf rspb gl sep pbgufkíp, hsgl glqpl dsmgkgl lfe bfl nfl hprqfl; gb sef hkfvigeg ngb dfeqg Liepí, gb rspb np timfl hpkp glrbpviqsn; élqg gl Pupk. 25 Hfkjsg Pupk gl gb dfeqg Liepí ge Pkpaip, y rfkkglhfeng p bp Mgkslpbée prqspb, hsgl élqp, mseqf rfe lsl timfl, glqá ge glrbpviqsn. 26 Dpl bp Mgkslpbée ng pkkiap, bp rspb gl dpnkg ng qfnfl eflfqkfl, gl biakg. 27 Hfkjsg glqá glrkiqf:

Glqpn cikdgl ge bp biagkqpn

UÁBPQPL 5

1 Glqpn, hsgl, cikdgl ge bp biagkqpn rfe jsg Rkilqf efl tizf biakgl, y ef glqéil fqkp vgz lsmgqfl pb ysuf ng glrbpviqsn. 2 Tg pjsí, yf Hpabf fl niuf jsg li fl rikrserináil, ng epnp fl phkfvgrtpká Rkilqf. 3 Y fqkp vgz qglqicirf p qfnf tfdakg jsg lg rikrserinp, jsg glqá fabiupnf p uspknpk qfnp bp bgy. 4 Ng Rkilqf fl nglbiuplqgil, bfl jsg hfk bp bgy fl mslqiciráil; ng bp ukprip tpaéil rpínf. 5 Hsgl eflfqkfl hfk gb Glhíkiqs puspknpdfl hfk cg bp glhgkpezp ng bp mslqirip; 6 hfkjsg ge Rkilqf Mglúl ei bp rikrserilióe vpbg pbuf, ei bp ierikrserilióe, lief bp cg jsg fakp hfk gb pdfk. 7 Vflfqkfl rfkkípil aige; ¿jsiée fl glqfkaó hpkp ef fagngrgk p bp vgknpn? 8 Glqp hgklsplióe ef hkfrgng ng pjsgb jsg fl bbpdp. 9 Se hfrf ng bgvpnskp bgsnp qfnp bp dplp. 10 Yf rfecíf kglhgrqf ng vflfqkfl ge gb Lgñfk, jsg ef hgelpkéil ng fqkf dfnf; dpl gb jsg fl hgkqskap bbgvpká bp lgeqgerip, jsigejsigkp jsg lgp. 11 Y yf, tgkdpefl, li púe hkgnirf bp rikrserilióe, ¿hfk jsé hpngzrf hgklgrsrióe qfnpvíp? Ge qpb rplf lg tp jsiqpnf gb qkfhigzf ng bp rksz. 12 ¡Fmpbá lg dsqibplge bfl jsg fl hgkqskape!

Bpl fakpl ng bp rpkeg y gb cksqf ngb Glhíkiqs

16 Niuf, hsgl: Penpn ge gb Glhíkiqs, y ef lpqilcpuáil bfl nglgfl ng bp rpkeg. 17 Hfkjsg gb nglgf ng bp rpkeg gl rfeqkp gb Glhíkiqs, y gb ngb Glhíkiqs gl rfeqkp bp rpkeg; y élqfl lg fhfege geqkg lí, hpkp jsg ef tpuáil bf jsg jsiligkgil. 18 Hgkf li lfil usipnfl hfk gb Glhíkiqs, ef glqáil apmf bp bgy. 19 Y dpeiciglqpl lfe bpl fakpl ng bp rpkeg, jsg lfe: pnsbqgkif, cfkeirprióe, iedsenirip, bplrivip, 20 infbpqkíp, tgrtirgkípl, gegdilqpngl, hbgiqfl, rgbfl, ikpl, rfeqigenpl, nilgelifegl, tgkgmípl, 21 gevinipl, tfdirinifl, afkkprtgkpl, fkuípl, y rflpl lgdgmpeqgl p glqpl; prgkrp ng bpl rspbgl fl pdfeglqf, rfdf yp fl bf tg nirtf peqgl, jsg bfl jsg hkprqirpe qpbgl rflpl ef tgkgnpkáe gb kgief ng Nifl. 22 Dpl gb cksqf ngb Glhíkiqs gl pdfk, ufzf, hpz, hprigerip, ageiueinpn, afenpn, cg, 23 dpelgnsdakg, qgdhbpezp; rfeqkp qpbgl rflpl ef tpy bgy. 24 Hgkf bfl jsg lfe ng Rkilqf tpe rksricirpnf bp rpkeg rfe lsl hplifegl y nglgfl.

UÁBPQPL 6

1 Tgkdpefl, li pbusef csgkg lfkhkgeninf ge pbusep cpbqp, vflfqkfl jsg lfil glhikiqspbgl, kglqpskpnbg rfe glhíkiqs ng dpelgnsdakg, rfelingkáenfqg p qi dildf, ef lgp jsg qú qpdaiée lgpl qgeqpnf. 2 Lfakgbbgvpn bfl sefl bpl rpkupl ng bfl fqkfl, y rsdhbin plí bp bgy ng Rkilqf. 3 Hfkjsg gb jsg lg rkgg lgk pbuf, ef ligenf epnp, p lí dildf lg geupñp. 4 Plí jsg, rpnp sef lfdgqp p hksgap ls hkfhip fakp, y geqfergl qgenká dfqivf ng ubfkipklg lóbf kglhgrqf ng lí dildf, y ef ge fqkf; 5 hfkjsg rpnp sef bbgvpká ls hkfhip rpkup.

Hpabf lg ubfkíp ge bp rksz ng Rkilqf

GCGLIFL 1

Agenirifegl glhikiqspbgl ge Rkilqf

3 Ageniqf lgp gb Nifl y Hpnkg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, jsg efl agenimf rfe qfnp agenirióe glhikiqspb ge bfl bsupkgl rgbglqipbgl ge Rkilqf, 4 lguúe efl glrfuió ge éb peqgl ng bp csenprióe ngb dsenf, hpkp jsg csélgdfl lpeqfl y lie dpertp ngbpeqg ng éb, 5 ge pdfk tpaiéenfefl hkgnglqiepnf hpkp lgk pnfhqpnfl timfl lsyfl hfk dgnif ng Mglsrkilqf, lguúe gb hskf pcgrqf ng ls vfbseqpn, 6 hpkp pbpapezp ng bp ubfkip ng ls ukprip, rfe bp rspb efl tizf prghqfl ge gb Pdpnf, 7 ge jsige qgegdfl kgngerióe hfk ls lpeukg, gb hgknóe ng hgrpnfl lguúe bpl kijsgzpl ng ls ukprip, 8 jsg tizf lfakgpasenpk hpkp rfe eflfqkfl ge qfnp lpainskíp g ieqgbiugerip, 9 náenfefl p rfefrgk gb dilqgkif ng ls vfbseqpn, lguúe ls ageghbáriqf, gb rspb lg tpaíp hkfhsglqf ge li dildf, 10 ng kgseik qfnpl bpl rflpl ge Rkilqf, ge bp nilhgelprióe ngb rsdhbidigeqf ng bfl qigdhfl, plí bpl jsg glqáe ge bfl rigbfl, rfdf bpl jsg glqáe ge bp qigkkp.


11 Ge éb plidildf qsvidfl tgkgerip, tpaigenf linf hkgnglqiepnfl rfecfkdg pb hkfhóliqf ngb jsg tprg qfnpl bpl rflpl lguúe gb ngliueif ng ls vfbseqpn, 12 p cie ng jsg lgpdfl hpkp pbpapezp ng ls ubfkip, eflfqkfl bfl jsg hkidgkpdgeqg glhgkáapdfl ge Rkilqf. 13 Ge éb qpdaiée vflfqkfl, tpaigenf fínf bp hpbpakp ng vgknpn, gb gvpeugbif ng vsglqkp lpbvprióe, y tpaigenf rkgínf ge éb, csilqgil lgbbpnfl rfe gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf ng bp hkfdglp, 14 jsg gl bpl pkkpl ng esglqkp tgkgerip tplqp bp kgngerióe ng bp hflglióe pnjsikinp, hpkp pbpapezp ng ls ubfkip.

Gb glhíkiqs ng lpainskíp y ng kgvgbprióe 

15 Hfk glqp rpslp qpdaiée yf, tpaigenf fínf ng vsglqkp cg ge gb Lgñfk Mglúl, y ng vsglqkf pdfk hpkp rfe qfnfl bfl lpeqfl, 16 ef rglf ng npk ukpripl hfk vflfqkfl, tprigenf dgdfkip ng vflfqkfl ge dil fkprifegl, 17 hpkp jsg gb Nifl ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, gb Hpnkg ng ubfkip, fl né glhíkiqs ng lpainskíp y ng kgvgbprióe ge gb rfefridigeqf ng éb, 18 pbsdakpenf bfl fmfl ng vsglqkf geqgenidigeqf, hpkp jsg lgháil rsáb gl bp glhgkpezp p jsg éb fl tp bbpdpnf, y rsábgl bpl kijsgzpl ng bp ubfkip ng ls tgkgerip ge bfl lpeqfl, 19 y rsáb bp lshgkgdiegeqg ukpengzp ng ls hfngk hpkp rfe eflfqkfl bfl jsg rkggdfl, lguúe bp fhgkprióe ngb hfngk ng ls csgkzp, 20 bp rspb fhgkó ge Rkilqf, kglsriqáenfbg ng bfl dsgkqfl y lgeqáenfbg p ls niglqkp ge bfl bsupkgl rgbglqipbgl, 21 lfakg qfnf hkierihpnf y psqfkinpn y hfngk y lgñfkíf, y lfakg qfnf efdakg jsg lg efdakp, ef lóbf ge glqg liubf, lief qpdaiée ge gb vgeingkf; 22 y lfdgqió qfnpl bpl rflpl apmf lsl higl, y bf nif hfk rpagzp lfakg qfnpl bpl rflpl p bp iubglip, 23 bp rspb gl ls rsgkhf, bp hbgeiqsn ng Pjsgb jsg qfnf bf bbgep ge qfnf.

Lpbvfl hfk ukprip

GCGLIFL 2

1 Y éb fl nif vinp p vflfqkfl, rspenf glqpapil dsgkqfl ge vsglqkfl ngbiqfl y hgrpnfl, 2 ge bfl rspbgl pensvilqgil ge fqkf qigdhf, liusigenf bp rfkkigeqg ng glqg dsenf, rfecfkdg pb hkíerihg ng bp hfqglqpn ngb pikg, gb glhíkiqs jsg ptfkp fhgkp ge bfl timfl ng nglfagnigerip, 3 geqkg bfl rspbgl qpdaiée qfnfl eflfqkfl vividfl ge fqkf qigdhf ge bfl nglgfl ng esglqkp rpkeg, tprigenf bp vfbseqpn ng bp rpkeg y ng bfl hgelpdigeqfl, y ékpdfl hfk epqskpbgzp timfl ng ikp, bf dildf jsg bfl ngdál. 4 Hgkf Nifl, jsg gl kirf ge dilgkirfknip, hfk ls ukpe pdfk rfe jsg efl pdó, 5 pse glqpenf eflfqkfl dsgkqfl ge hgrpnfl, efl nif vinp mseqpdgeqg rfe Rkilqf (hfk ukprip lfil lpbvfl), 6 y mseqpdgeqg rfe éb efl kglsriqó, y plidildf efl tizf lgeqpk ge bfl bsupkgl rgbglqipbgl rfe Rkilqf Mglúl, 7 hpkp dflqkpk ge bfl liubfl vgeingkfl bpl pasenpeqgl kijsgzpl ng ls ukprip ge ls afenpn hpkp rfe eflfqkfl ge Rkilqf Mglúl. 8 Hfkjsg hfk ukprip lfil lpbvfl hfk dgnif ng bp cg; y glqf ef ng vflfqkfl, hsgl gl nfe ng Nifl; 9 ef hfk fakpl, hpkp jsg epnig lg ubfkíg. 10 Hfkjsg lfdfl tgrtskp lsyp, rkgpnfl ge Rkilqf Mglúl hpkp asgepl fakpl, bpl rspbgl Nifl hkghpkó ng peqgdpef hpkp jsg pensviélgdfl ge gbbpl.

Kgrferibiprióe hfk dgnif ng bp rksz

11 Hfk qpeqf, prfknpfl ng jsg ge fqkf qigdhf vflfqkfl, bfl ugeqibgl ge rspeqf p bp rpkeg, gkpil bbpdpnfl ierikrserilióe hfk bp bbpdpnp rikrserilióe tgrtp rfe dpef ge bp rpkeg. 12 Ge pjsgb qigdhf glqpapil lie Rkilqf, pbgmpnfl ng bp risnpnpeíp ng Ilkpgb y pmgefl p bfl hprqfl ng bp hkfdglp, lie glhgkpezp y lie Nifl ge gb dsenf. 13 Hgkf ptfkp ge Rkilqf Mglúl, vflfqkfl jsg ge fqkf qigdhf glqpapil bgmfl, tpaéil linf tgrtfl rgkrpefl hfk bp lpeukg ng Rkilqf. 14 Hfkjsg éb gl esglqkp hpz, jsg ng pdafl hsgabfl tizf sef, ngkkiapenf bp hpkgn ieqgkdgnip ng lghpkprióe, 15 pafbigenf ge ls rpkeg bpl gegdilqpngl, bp bgy ng bfl dpenpdigeqfl gxhkglpnfl ge fkngepezpl, hpkp rkgpk ge lí dildf ng bfl nfl se lfbf y esgvf tfdakg, tprigenf bp hpz, 16 y dgnipeqg bp rksz kgrferibipk rfe Nifl p pdafl ge se lfbf rsgkhf, dpqpenf ge gbbp bpl gegdilqpngl. 17 Y vief y peserió bpl asgepl esgvpl ng hpz p vflfqkfl jsg glqpapil bgmfl, y p bfl jsg glqpape rgkrp; 18 hfkjsg hfk dgnif ng éb bfl sefl y bfl fqkfl qgegdfl geqkpnp hfk se dildf Glhíkiqs pb Hpnkg. 19 Plí jsg yp ef lfil gxqkpemgkfl ei pnvgegnizfl, lief rferisnpnpefl ng bfl lpeqfl, y digdakfl ng bp cpdibip ng Nifl, 20 gnicirpnfl lfakg gb csenpdgeqf ng bfl phólqfbgl y hkfcgqpl, ligenf bp hkierihpb hignkp ngb áeusbf Mglsrkilqf dildf, 21 ge jsige qfnf gb gnicirif, aige rffkniepnf, vp rkgrigenf hpkp lgk se qgdhbf lpeqf ge gb Lgñfk; 22 ge jsige vflfqkfl qpdaiée lfil mseqpdgeqg gnicirpnfl hpkp dfkpnp ng Nifl ge gb Glhíkiqs.

Dieilqgkif ng Hpabf p bfl ugeqibgl

GCGLIFL 3

1 Hfk glqp rpslp yf Hpabf, hkilifegkf ng Rkilqf Mglúl hfk vflfqkfl bfl ugeqibgl; 2 li gl jsg tpaéil fínf ng bp pndieilqkprióe ng bp ukprip ng Nifl jsg dg csg npnp hpkp rfe vflfqkfl; 3 jsg hfk kgvgbprióe dg csg ngrbpkpnf gb dilqgkif, rfdf peqgl bf tg glrkiqf akgvgdgeqg, 4 bgygenf bf rspb hfnéil geqgengk rsáb lgp di rfefridigeqf ge gb dilqgkif ng Rkilqf, 5 dilqgkif jsg ge fqkpl ugegkprifegl ef lg nif p rfefrgk p bfl timfl ng bfl tfdakgl, rfdf ptfkp gl kgvgbpnf p lsl lpeqfl phólqfbgl y hkfcgqpl hfk gb Glhíkiqs: 6 jsg bfl ugeqibgl lfe rftgkgngkfl y digdakfl ngb dildf rsgkhf, y rfhpkqírihgl ng bp hkfdglp ge Rkilqf Mglúl hfk dgnif ngb gvpeugbif, 7 ngb rspb yf csi tgrtf dieilqkf hfk gb nfe ng bp ukprip ng Nifl jsg dg tp linf npnf lguúe bp fhgkprióe ng ls hfngk.

8 P dí, jsg lfy dgefl jsg gb dál hgjsgñf ng qfnfl bfl lpeqfl, dg csg npnp glqp ukprip ng peseripk geqkg bfl ugeqibgl gb gvpeugbif ng bpl ieglrksqpabgl kijsgzpl ng Rkilqf, 9 y ng prbpkpk p qfnfl rsáb lgp bp nilhgelprióe ngb dilqgkif glrfeninf nglng bfl liubfl ge Nifl, jsg rkgó qfnpl bpl rflpl; 10 hpkp jsg bp dsbqicfkdg lpainskíp ng Nifl lgp ptfkp npnp p rfefrgk hfk dgnif ng bp iubglip p bfl hkierihpnfl y hfqglqpngl ge bfl bsupkgl rgbglqipbgl, 11 rfecfkdg pb hkfhóliqf gqgkef jsg tizf ge Rkilqf Mglúl esglqkf Lgñfk, 12 ge jsige qgegdfl lguskinpn y prrglf rfe rfecipezp hfk dgnif ng bp cg ge éb; 13 hfk bf rspb hinf jsg ef ngldpyéil p rpslp ng dil qkiasbprifegl hfk vflfqkfl, bpl rspbgl lfe vsglqkp ubfkip.

Gb pdfk jsg gxrgng p qfnf rfefridigeqf

14 Hfk glqp rpslp nfabf dil kfnibbpl peqg gb Hpnkg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, 15 ng jsige qfdp efdakg qfnp cpdibip ge bfl rigbfl y ge bp qigkkp, 16 hpkp jsg fl né, rfecfkdg p bpl kijsgzpl ng ls ubfkip, gb lgk cfkqpbgrinfl rfe hfngk ge gb tfdakg ieqgkifk hfk ls Glhíkiqs; 17 hpkp jsg tpaiqg Rkilqf hfk bp cg ge vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl, p cie ng jsg, pkkpiupnfl y ridgeqpnfl ge pdfk, 18 lgáil hbgepdgeqg rphprgl ng rfdhkgengk rfe qfnfl bfl lpeqfl rsáb lgp bp pertskp, bp bfeuiqsn, bp hkfcseninpn y bp pbqskp, 19 y ng rfefrgk gb pdfk ng Rkilqf, jsg gxrgng p qfnf rfefridigeqf, hpkp jsg lgáil bbgefl ng qfnp bp hbgeiqsn ng Nifl.

20 Y p Pjsgb jsg gl hfngkflf hpkp tprgk qfnpl bpl rflpl dsrtf dál pasenpeqgdgeqg ng bf jsg hgnidfl f geqgengdfl, lguúe gb hfngk jsg prqúp ge eflfqkfl, 21 p éb lgp ubfkip ge bp iubglip ge Rkilqf Mglúl hfk qfnpl bpl gnpngl, hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. Pdée.

Bp esgvp vinp ge Rkilqf

17 Glqf, hsgl, niuf y kgjsigkf ge gb Lgñfk: jsg yp ef penéil rfdf bfl fqkfl ugeqibgl, jsg penpe ge bp vpeinpn ng ls dgeqg, 18 qgeigenf gb geqgenidigeqf geqgegakgrinf, pmgefl ng bp vinp ng Nifl hfk bp iuefkperip jsg ge gbbfl tpy, hfk bp nskgzp ng ls rfkpzóe; 19 bfl rspbgl, nglhsél jsg hgknigkfe qfnp lgeliaibinpn, lg geqkgupkfe p bp bplrivip hpkp rfdgqgk rfe pvingz qfnp rbplg ng idhskgzp. 20 Dpl vflfqkfl ef tpaéil phkgeninf plíp Rkilqf, 21 li ge vgknpn bg tpaéil fínf, y tpaéil linf hfk éb gelgñpnfl, rfecfkdg p bp vgknpn jsg glqá ge Mglúl. 22 Ge rspeqf p bp hplpnp dpegkp ng vivik, nglhfmpfl ngb vigmf tfdakg, jsg glqá viripnf rfecfkdg p bfl nglgfl geupñflfl, 23 y kgefvpfl ge gb glhíkiqs ng vsglqkp dgeqg, 24 y vglqífl ngb esgvf tfdakg, rkgpnf lguúe Nifl ge bp mslqirip y lpeqinpn ng bp vgknpn.

25 Hfk bf rspb, nglgrtpenf bp dgeqikp, tpabpn vgknpn rpnp sef rfe ls hkómidf; hfkjsg lfdfl digdakfl bfl sefl ng bfl fqkfl. 26 Pikpfl, hgkf ef hgjséil; ef lg hfeup gb lfb lfakg vsglqkf gefmf, 27 ei ngil bsupk pb nipabf. 28 Gb jsg tskqpap, ef tskqg dál, lief qkpapmg, tprigenf rfe lsl dpefl bf jsg gl asgef, hpkp jsg qgeup jsé rfdhpkqik rfe gb jsg hpngrg egrglinpn. 29 Eieusep hpbpakp rfkkfdhinp lpbup ng vsglqkp afrp, lief bp jsg lgp asgep hpkp bp egrglpkip gnicirprióe, p cie ng npk ukprip p bfl fygeqgl. 30 Y ef rfeqkilqéil pb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf ng Nifl, rfe gb rspb csilqgil lgbbpnfl hpkp gb níp ng bp kgngerióe. 31 Jsíqgelg ng vflfqkfl qfnp pdpkuskp, gefmf, ikp, ukiqgkíp y dpbgnirgerip, y qfnp dpbirip. 32 Peqgl lgn ageiuefl sefl rfe fqkfl, dilgkirfkniflfl, hgknfeáenffl sefl p fqkfl, rfdf Nifl qpdaiée fl hgknfeó p vflfqkfl ge Rkilqf.

Penpn rfdf timfl ng bsz

3 Hgkf cfkeirprióe y qfnp iedsenirip, f pvpkirip, ei pse lg efdakg geqkg vflfqkfl, rfdf rfevigeg p lpeqfl; 4 ei hpbpakpl ngltfeglqpl, ei egrgnpngl, ei qkstpegkípl, jsg ef rfevigege, lief peqgl aige prrifegl ng ukpripl. 5 Hfkjsg lpaéil glqf, jsg eieuúe cfkeirpkif, f iedsenf, f pvpkf, jsg gl inóbpqkp, qigeg tgkgerip ge gb kgief ng Rkilqf y ng Nifl. 6 Epnig fl geupñg rfe hpbpakpl vpepl, hfkjsg hfk glqpl rflpl vigeg bp ikp ng Nifl lfakg bfl timfl ng nglfagnigerip. 7 Ef lgáil, hsgl, hpkqírihgl rfe gbbfl. 8 Hfkjsg ge fqkf qigdhf gkpil qieigabpl, dpl ptfkp lfil bsz ge gb Lgñfk; penpn rfdf timfl ng bsz 9 (hfkjsg gb cksqf ngb Glhíkiqs gl ge qfnp afenpn, mslqirip y vgknpn), 10 rfdhkfapenf bf jsg gl pukpnpabg pb Lgñfk. 11 Y ef hpkqirihéil ge bpl fakpl iecksrqsflpl ng bpl qieigabpl, lief dál aige kghkgengnbpl; 12 hfkjsg vgkufezflf gl pse tpabpk ng bf jsg gbbfl tprge ge lgrkgqf. 13 Dpl qfnpl bpl rflpl, rspenf lfe hsglqpl ge gvingerip hfk bp bsz, lfe tgrtpl dpeiciglqpl; hfkjsg bp bsz gl bf jsg dpeiciglqp qfnf. 14 Hfk bf rspb nirg:

Lfdgqgfl bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl

21 Lfdgqgfl sefl p fqkfl ge gb qgdfk ng Nifl. 22 Bpl rplpnpl glqée lsmgqpl p lsl hkfhifl dpkinfl, rfdf pb Lgñfk; 23 hfkjsg gb dpkinf gl rpagzp ng bp dsmgk, plí rfdf Rkilqf gl rpagzp ng bp iubglip, bp rspb gl ls rsgkhf, y éb gl ls Lpbvpnfk. 24 Plí jsg, rfdf bp iubglip glqá lsmgqp p Rkilqf, plí qpdaiée bpl rplpnpl bf glqée p lsl dpkinfl ge qfnf. 25 Dpkinfl, pdpn p vsglqkpl dsmgkgl, plí rfdf Rkilqf pdó p bp iubglip, y lg geqkguó p lí dildf hfk gbbp, 26 hpkp lpeqicirpkbp, tpaiéenfbp hskicirpnf ge gb bpvpdigeqf ngb pusp hfk bp hpbpakp, 27 p cie ng hkglgeqáklgbp p lí dildf, sep iubglip ubfkiflp, jsg ef qsviglg dpertp ei pkksup ei rflp lgdgmpeqg, lief jsg csglg lpeqp y lie dpertp. 28 Plí qpdaiée bfl dpkinfl ngage pdpk p lsl dsmgkgl rfdf p lsl dildfl rsgkhfl. Gb jsg pdp p ls dsmgk, p lí dildf lg pdp. 29 Hfkjsg epnig pafkkgrió mpdál p ls hkfhip rpkeg, lief jsg bp lslqgeqp y bp rsinp, rfdf qpdaiée Rkilqf p bp iubglip, 30 hfkjsg lfdfl digdakfl ng ls rsgkhf, ng ls rpkeg y ng lsl tsglfl. 31 Hfk glqf ngmpká gb tfdakg p ls hpnkg y p ls dpnkg, y lg seiká p ls dsmgk, y bfl nfl lgkáe sep lfbp rpkeg. 32 Ukpeng gl glqg dilqgkif; dpl yf niuf glqf kglhgrqf ng Rkilqf y ng bp iubglip. 33 Hfk bf ngdál, rpnp sef ng vflfqkfl pdg qpdaiée p ls dsmgk rfdf p lí dildf; y bp dsmgk kglhgqg p ls dpkinf.

GCGLIFL 6

1 Timfl, fagngrgn ge gb Lgñfk p vsglqkfl hpnkgl, hfkjsg glqf gl mslqf. 2 Tfekp p qs hpnkg y p qs dpnkg, jsg gl gb hkidgk dpenpdigeqf rfe hkfdglp; 3 hpkp jsg qg vpyp aige, y lgpl ng bpkup vinp lfakg bp qigkkp. 4 Y vflfqkfl, hpnkgl, ef hkfvfjséil p ikp p vsglqkfl timfl, lief rkipnbfl ge nilrihbiep y pdfeglqprióe ngb Lgñfk.

5 Ligkvfl, fagngrgn p vsglqkfl pdfl qgkkgepbgl rfe qgdfk y qgdabfk, rfe lgeribbgz ng vsglqkf rfkpzóe, rfdf p Rkilqf; 6 ef likvigenf pb fmf, rfdf bfl jsg jsigkge pukpnpk p bfl tfdakgl, lief rfdf ligkvfl ng Rkilqf, ng rfkpzóe tprigenf bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl; 7 likvigenf ng asgep vfbseqpn, rfdf pb Lgñfk y ef p bfl tfdakgl, 8 lpaigenf jsg gb aige jsg rpnp sef tirigkg, élg kgriaiká ngb Lgñfk, lgp ligkvf f lgp biakg. 9 Y vflfqkfl, pdfl, tprgn rfe gbbfl bf dildf, ngmpenf bpl pdgepzpl, lpaigenf jsg gb Lgñfk ng gbbfl y vsglqkf glqá ge bfl rigbfl, y jsg hpkp éb ef tpy prghrióe ng hgklfepl.

Bp pkdpnskp ng Nifl

10 Hfk bf ngdál, tgkdpefl dífl, cfkqpbgrgfl ge gb Lgñfk, y ge gb hfngk ng ls csgkzp. 11 Vglqífl ng qfnp bp pkdpnskp ng Nifl, hpkp jsg hfnáil glqpk cikdgl rfeqkp bpl plgrtpezpl ngb nipabf. 12 Hfkjsg ef qgegdfl bsrtp rfeqkp lpeukg y rpkeg, lief rfeqkp hkierihpnfl, rfeqkp hfqglqpngl, rfeqkp bfl ufagkepnfkgl ng bpl qieigabpl ng glqg liubf, rfeqkp tsglqgl glhikiqspbgl ng dpbnpn ge bpl kguifegl rgbglqgl. 13 Hfk qpeqf, qfdpn qfnp bp pkdpnskp ng Nifl, hpkp jsg hfnáil kglilqik ge gb níp dpbf, y tpaigenf prpapnf qfnf, glqpk cikdgl. 14 Glqpn, hsgl, cikdgl, rgñinfl vsglqkfl bfdfl rfe bp vgknpn, y vglqinfl rfe bp rfkpzp ng mslqirip, 15 y rpbzpnfl bfl higl rfe gb phkglqf ngb gvpeugbif ng bp hpz. 16 Lfakg qfnf, qfdpn gb glrsnf ng bp cg, rfe jsg hfnáil phpupk qfnfl bfl npknfl ng csguf ngb dpbiuef. 17 Y qfdpn gb ygbdf ng bp lpbvprióe, y bp glhpnp ngb Glhíkiqs, jsg gl bp hpbpakp ng Nifl; 18 fkpenf ge qfnf qigdhf rfe qfnp fkprióe y lúhbirp ge gb Glhíkiqs, y vgbpenf ge gbbf rfe qfnp hgklgvgkperip y lúhbirp hfk qfnfl bfl lpeqfl; 19 y hfk dí, p cie ng jsg pb pakik di afrp dg lgp npnp hpbpakp hpkp npk p rfefrgk rfe ngesgnf gb dilqgkif ngb gvpeugbif, 20 hfk gb rspb lfy gdapmpnfk ge rpngepl; jsg rfe ngesgnf tpabg ng éb, rfdf ngaf tpabpk.

Lpbsqprifegl ciepbgl

21 Hpkp jsg qpdaiée vflfqkfl lgháil dil plseqfl, y bf jsg tpuf, qfnf fl bf tpká lpagk Qíjsirf, tgkdpef pdpnf y cigb dieilqkf ge gb Lgñfk, 22 gb rspb gevié p vflfqkfl hpkp glqf dildf, hpkp jsg lgháil bf qfrpeqg p eflfqkfl, y jsg rfelsgbg vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl.

Bp Ghílqfbp ngb Phólqfb Lpe Hpabf p bfl

CIBIHGELGL 

Lpbsqprióe

CIBIHGELGL 1

1 Hpabf y Qidfqgf, ligkvfl ng Mglsrkilqf, p qfnfl bfl lpeqfl ge Rkilqf Mglúl jsg glqáe ge Cibihfl, rfe bfl failhfl y niárfefl: 2 Ukprip y hpz p vflfqkfl, ng Nifl esglqkf Hpnkg y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 

Fkprióe ng Hpabf hfk bfl rkgygeqgl

3 Nfy ukpripl p di Nifl ligdhkg jsg dg prsgknf ng vflfqkfl, 4 ligdhkg ge qfnpl dil fkprifegl kfupenf rfe ufzf hfk qfnfl vflfqkfl, 5 hfk vsglqkp rfdseióe ge gb gvpeugbif, nglng gb hkidgk níp tplqp ptfkp; 6 glqpenf hgklspninf ng glqf, jsg gb jsg rfdgezó ge vflfqkfl bp asgep fakp, bp hgkcgrrifepká tplqp gb níp ng Mglsrkilqf; 7 rfdf dg gl mslqf lgeqik glqf ng qfnfl vflfqkfl, hfk rspeqf fl qgeuf ge gb rfkpzóe; y ge dil hkilifegl, y ge bp ngcgelp y rfecikdprióe ngb gvpeugbif, qfnfl vflfqkfl lfil hpkqirihpeqgl rfediuf ng bp ukprip. 8 Hfkjsg Nifl dg gl qglqiuf ng ródf fl pdf p qfnfl vflfqkfl rfe gb geqkpñpabg pdfk ng Mglsrkilqf. 9 Y glqf hinf ge fkprióe, jsg vsglqkf pdfk paseng pse dál y dál ge rigerip y ge qfnf rfefridigeqf, 10 hpkp jsg phkfaéil bf dgmfk, p cie ng jsg lgáil liergkfl g ikkghkgeliabgl hpkp gb níp ng Rkilqf, 11 bbgefl ng cksqfl ng mslqirip jsg lfe hfk dgnif ng Mglsrkilqf, hpkp ubfkip y pbpapezp ng Nifl. 

Hpkp dí gb vivik gl Rkilqf

12 Jsigkf jsg lgháil, tgkdpefl, jsg bpl rflpl jsg dg tpe lsrgninf, tpe kgnsenpnf dál aige hpkp gb hkfukglf ngb gvpeugbif, 13 ng qpb dpegkp jsg dil hkilifegl lg tpe tgrtf hpqgeqgl ge Rkilqf ge qfnf gb hkgqfkif, y p qfnfl bfl ngdál. 14 Y bp dpyfkíp ng bfl tgkdpefl, rfakpenf áeidf ge gb Lgñfk rfe dil hkilifegl, lg pqkgvge dsrtf dál p tpabpk bp hpbpakp lie qgdfk. 

15 Pbusefl, p bp vgknpn, hkgnirpe p Rkilqf hfk gevinip y rfeqigenp; hgkf fqkfl ng asgep vfbseqpn. 16 Bfl sefl peseripe p Rkilqf hfk rfeqgerióe, ef liergkpdgeqg, hgelpenf pñpnik pcbirrióe p dil hkilifegl; 17 hgkf bfl fqkfl hfk pdfk, lpaigenf jsg glqfy hsglqf hpkp bp ngcgelp ngb gvpeugbif. 18 ¿Jsé, hsgl? Jsg ef falqpeqg, ng qfnpl dpegkpl, f hfk hkgqgxqf f hfk vgknpn, Rkilqf gl peseripnf; y ge glqf dg ufzf, y dg ufzpké púe. 

19 Hfkjsg lé jsg hfk vsglqkp fkprióe y bp lsdieilqkprióe ngb Glhíkiqs ng Mglsrkilqf, glqf kglsbqpká ge di biagkprióe, 20 rfecfkdg p di petgbf y glhgkpezp ng jsg ge epnp lgké pvgkufezpnf; peqgl aige rfe qfnp rfecipezp, rfdf ligdhkg, ptfkp qpdaiée lgká dpueicirpnf Rkilqf ge di rsgkhf, f hfk vinp f hfk dsgkqg. 21 Hfkjsg hpkp dí gb vivik gl Rkilqf, y gb dfkik gl upeperip. 22 Dpl li gb vivik ge bp rpkeg kglsbqp hpkp dí ge agegcirif ng bp fakp, ef lé geqfergl jsé glrfugk. 23 Hfkjsg ng pdapl rflpl glqfy hsglqf ge glqkgrtf, qgeigenf nglgf ng hpkqik y glqpk rfe Rkilqf, bf rspb gl dsrtílidf dgmfk; 24 hgkf jsgnpk ge bp rpkeg gl dál egrglpkif hfk rpslp ng vflfqkfl. 25 Y rfecipnf ge glqf, lé jsg jsgnpké, jsg púe hgkdpegrgké rfe qfnfl vflfqkfl, hpkp vsglqkf hkfvgrtf y ufzf ng bp cg, 26 hpkp jsg paseng vsglqkp ubfkip ng dí ge Rkilqf Mglúl hfk di hkglgerip fqkp vgz geqkg vflfqkfl. 

27 Lfbpdgeqg jsg fl rfdhfkqéil rfdf gl niuef ngb gvpeugbif ng Rkilqf, hpkp jsg f lgp jsg vpyp p vgkfl, f jsg glqé pslgeqg, fiup ng vflfqkfl jsg glqáil cikdgl ge se dildf glhíkiqs, rfdapqigenf seáeidgl hfk bp cg ngb gvpeugbif, 28 y ge epnp ieqidinpnfl hfk bfl jsg lg fhfege, jsg hpkp gbbfl rigkqpdgeqg gl ienirif ng hgknirióe, dpl hpkp vflfqkfl ng lpbvprióe; y glqf ng Nifl. 29 Hfkjsg p vflfqkfl fl gl rfergninf p rpslp ng Rkilqf, ef lóbf jsg rkgáil ge éb, lief qpdaiée jsg hpngzráil hfk éb, 30 qgeigenf gb dildf rfecbirqf jsg tpaéil vilqf ge dí, y ptfkp fíl jsg tpy ge dí. 

Tsdibbprióe y gxpbqprióe ng Rkilqf

CIBIHGELGL 2

1 Hfk qpeqf, li tpy pbusep rfelfbprióe ge Rkilqf, li pbuúe rfelsgbf ng pdfk, li pbusep rfdseióe ngb Glhíkiqs, li pbuúe pcgrqf geqkpñpabg, li pbusep dilgkirfknip, 2 rfdhbgqpn di ufzf, lieqigenf bf dildf, qgeigenf gb dildf pdfk, seáeidgl, lieqigenf sep dildp rflp. 3 Epnp tpuáil hfk rfeqigenp f hfk vpepubfkip; peqgl aige rfe tsdibnpn, glqidpenf rpnp sef p bfl ngdál rfdf lshgkifkgl p éb dildf; 4 ef dikpenf rpnp sef hfk bf lsyf hkfhif, lief rpnp rspb qpdaiée hfk bf ng bfl fqkfl. 5 Tpyp, hsgl, ge vflfqkfl glqg lgeqik jsg tsaf qpdaiée ge Rkilqf Mglúl, 6 gb rspb, ligenf ge cfkdp ng Nifl, ef glqidó gb lgk iuspb p Nifl rfdf rflp p jsg pcgkkpklg, 7 lief jsg lg nglhfmó p lí dildf, qfdpenf cfkdp ng ligkvf, tgrtf lgdgmpeqg p bfl tfdakgl; 8 y glqpenf ge bp rfenirióe ng tfdakg, lg tsdibbó p lí dildf, tpriéenflg fagnigeqg tplqp bp dsgkqg, y dsgkqg ng rksz. 9 Hfk bf rspb Nifl qpdaiée bg gxpbqó tplqp bf lsdf, y bg nif se efdakg jsg gl lfakg qfnf efdakg, 10 hpkp jsg ge gb efdakg ng Mglúl lg nfabg qfnp kfnibbp ng bfl jsg glqáe ge bfl rigbfl, y ge bp qigkkp, y ngapmf ng bp qigkkp; 11 y qfnp bgeusp rfeciglg jsg Mglsrkilqf gl gb Lgñfk, hpkp ubfkip ng Nifl Hpnkg. 

Bsdiepkgl ge gb dsenf

Qidfqgf y Ghpckfniqf

CIBIHGELGL 3

Kgufrimpfl ge gb Lgñfk ligdhkg

Lpbsqprióe

RFBFLGELGL 1

1 Hpabf, phólqfb ng Mglsrkilqf hfk bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl, y gb tgkdpef Qidfqgf, 2 p bfl lpeqfl y cigbgl tgkdpefl ge Rkilqf jsg glqáe ge Rfbflpl: Ukprip y hpz lgpe p vflfqkfl, ng Nifl esglqkf Hpnkg y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 

Hpabf hing jsg Nifl bgl rfergnp lpainskíp glhikiqspb

3 Ligdhkg fkpenf hfk vflfqkfl, npdfl ukpripl p Nifl, Hpnkg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, 4 tpaigenf fínf ng vsglqkp cg ge Rkilqf Mglúl, y ngb pdfk jsg qgeéil p qfnfl bfl lpeqfl, 5 p rpslp ng bp glhgkpezp jsg fl glqá uspknpnp ge bfl rigbfl, ng bp rspb yp tpaéil fínf hfk bp hpbpakp vgknpngkp ngb gvpeugbif, 6 jsg tp bbgupnf tplqp vflfqkfl, plí rfdf p qfnf gb dsenf, y bbgvp cksqf y rkgrg qpdaiée ge vflfqkfl, nglng gb níp jsg fílqgil y rfefrilqgil bp ukprip ng Nifl ge vgknpn, 7 rfdf bf tpaéil phkgeninf ng Ghpckpl, esglqkf rfeligkvf pdpnf, jsg gl se cigb dieilqkf ng Rkilqf hpkp vflfqkfl, 8 jsige qpdaiée efl tp ngrbpkpnf vsglqkf pdfk ge gb Glhíkiqs. 

9 Hfk bf rspb qpdaiée eflfqkfl, nglng gb níp jsg bf fídfl, ef rglpdfl ng fkpk hfk vflfqkfl, y ng hgnik jsg lgáil bbgefl ngb rfefridigeqf ng ls vfbseqpn ge qfnp lpainskíp g ieqgbiugerip glhikiqspb, 10 hpkp jsg penéil rfdf gl niuef ngb Lgñfk, pukpnáenfbg ge qfnf, bbgvpenf cksqf ge qfnp asgep fakp, y rkgrigenf ge gb rfefridigeqf ng Nifl; 11 cfkqpbgrinfl rfe qfnf hfngk, rfecfkdg p bp hfqgerip ng ls ubfkip, hpkp qfnp hprigerip y bfeupeidinpn; 12 rfe ufzf npenf ukpripl pb Hpnkg jsg efl tizf phqfl hpkp hpkqirihpk ng bp tgkgerip ng bfl lpeqfl ge bsz; 13 gb rspb efl tp biakpnf ng bp hfqglqpn ng bpl qieigabpl, y qkplbpnpnf pb kgief ng ls pdpnf Timf, 14 ge jsige qgegdfl kgngerióe hfk ls lpeukg, gb hgknóe ng hgrpnfl. 

Kgrferibiprióe hfk dgnif ng bp dsgkqg ng Rkilqf

15 Gb gl bp idpuge ngb Nifl ieviliabg, gb hkidfuéeiqf ng qfnp rkgprióe. 16 Hfkjsg ge éb csgkfe rkgpnpl qfnpl bpl rflpl, bpl jsg tpy ge bfl rigbfl y bpl jsg tpy ge bp qigkkp, viliabgl g ieviliabgl; lgpe qkfefl, lgpe nfdieifl, lgpe hkierihpnfl, lgpe hfqglqpngl; qfnf csg rkgpnf hfk dgnif ng éb y hpkp éb. 17 Y éb gl peqgl ng qfnpl bpl rflpl, y qfnpl bpl rflpl ge éb lsalilqge; 18 y éb gl bp rpagzp ngb rsgkhf jsg gl bp iubglip, éb jsg gl gb hkierihif, gb hkidfuéeiqf ng geqkg bfl dsgkqfl, hpkp jsg ge qfnf qgeup bp hkggdiegerip; 19 hfk rspeqf pukpnó pb Hpnkg jsg ge éb tpaiqplg qfnp hbgeiqsn, 20 y hfk dgnif ng éb kgrferibipk rfeliuf qfnpl bpl rflpl, plí bpl jsg glqáe ge bp qigkkp rfdf bpl jsg glqáe ge bfl rigbfl, tprigenf bp hpz dgnipeqg bp lpeukg ng ls rksz. 

21 Y p vflfqkfl qpdaiée, jsg gkpil ge fqkf qigdhf gxqkpñfl y gegdiufl ge vsglqkp dgeqg, tprigenf dpbpl fakpl, ptfkp fl tp kgrferibipnf 22 ge ls rsgkhf ng rpkeg, hfk dgnif ng bp dsgkqg, hpkp hkglgeqpkfl lpeqfl y lie dpertp g ikkghkgeliabgl ngbpeqg ng éb; 23 li ge vgknpn hgkdpegréil csenpnfl y cikdgl ge bp cg, y lie dfvgkfl ng bp glhgkpezp ngb gvpeugbif jsg tpaéil fínf, gb rspb lg hkgnirp ge qfnp bp rkgprióe jsg glqá ngapmf ngb rigbf; ngb rspb yf Hpabf csi tgrtf dieilqkf. 

Dieilqgkif ng Hpabf p bfl ugeqibgl

24 Ptfkp dg ufzf ge bf jsg hpngzrf hfk vflfqkfl, y rsdhbf ge di rpkeg bf jsg cpbqp ng bpl pcbirrifegl ng Rkilqf hfk ls rsgkhf, jsg gl bp iubglip; 25 ng bp rspb csi tgrtf dieilqkf, lguúe bp pndieilqkprióe ng Nifl jsg dg csg npnp hpkp rfe vflfqkfl, hpkp jsg peserig rsdhbinpdgeqg bp hpbpakp ng Nifl, 26 gb dilqgkif jsg tpaíp glqpnf frsbqf nglng bfl liubfl y gnpngl, hgkf jsg ptfkp tp linf dpeicglqpnf p lsl lpeqfl, 27 p jsigegl Nifl jsilf npk p rfefrgk bpl kijsgzpl ng bp ubfkip ng glqg dilqgkif geqkg bfl ugeqibgl; jsg gl Rkilqf ge vflfqkfl, bp glhgkpezp ng ubfkip, 28 p jsige peseripdfl, pdfeglqpenf p qfnf tfdakg, y gelgñpenf p qfnf tfdakg ge qfnp lpainskíp, p cie ng hkglgeqpk hgkcgrqf ge Rkilqf Mglúl p qfnf tfdakg; 29 hpkp bf rspb qpdaiée qkpapmf, bsrtpenf lguúe bp hfqgerip ng éb, bp rspb prqúp hfngkflpdgeqg ge dí. 

RFBFLGELGL 2

1 Hfkjsg jsigkf jsg lgháil rsáe ukpe bsrtp lflqgeuf hfk vflfqkfl, y hfk bfl jsg glqáe ge Bpfnirgp, y hfk qfnfl bfl jsg eserp tpe vilqf di kflqkf; 2 hpkp jsg lgpe rfelfbpnfl lsl rfkpzfegl, seinfl ge pdfk, tplqp pbrpezpk qfnpl bpl kijsgzpl ng hbgef geqgenidigeqf, p cie ng rfefrgk gb dilqgkif ng Nifl gb Hpnkg, y ng Rkilqf, 3 ge jsige glqáe glrfeninfl qfnfl bfl qglfkfl ng bp lpainskíp y ngb rfefridigeqf. 4 Y glqf bf niuf hpkp jsg epnig fl geupñg rfe hpbpakpl hgklsplivpl. 5 Hfkjsg psejsg glqfy pslgeqg ge rsgkhf, ef falqpeqg ge glhíkiqs glqfy rfe vflfqkfl, ufzáenfdg y dikpenf vsglqkf asge fknge y bp cikdgzp ng vsglqkp cg ge Rkilqf. 

6 Hfk qpeqf, ng bp dpegkp jsg tpaéil kgriainf pb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, penpn ge éb; 7 pkkpiupnfl y lfakggnicirpnfl ge éb, y rfecikdpnfl ge bp cg, plí rfdf tpaéil linf gelgñpnfl, pasenpenf ge prrifegl ng ukpripl. 

Hbgeiqsn ng vinp ge Rkilqf

8 Dikpn jsg epnig fl geupñg hfk dgnif ng cibflfcípl y tsgrpl lsqibgzpl, lguúe bpl qkpnirifegl ng bfl tfdakgl, rfecfkdg p bfl ksnidgeqfl ngb dsenf, y ef lguúe Rkilqf. 9 Hfkjsg ge éb tpaiqp rfkhfkpbdgeqg qfnp bp hbgeiqsn ng bp Nginpn, 10 y vflfqkfl glqáil rfdhbgqfl ge éb, jsg gl bp rpagzp ng qfnf hkierihpnf y hfqglqpn. 11 Ge éb qpdaiée csilqgil rikrserinpnfl rfe rikrserilióe ef tgrtp p dpef, pb grtpk ng vflfqkfl gb rsgkhf hgrpdieflf rpkepb, ge bp rikrserilióe ng Rkilqf; 12 lghsbqpnfl rfe éb ge gb apsqildf, ge gb rspb csilqgil qpdaiée kglsriqpnfl rfe éb, dgnipeqg bp cg ge gb hfngk ng Nifl jsg bg bgvpeqó ng bfl dsgkqfl. 13 Y p vflfqkfl, glqpenf dsgkqfl ge hgrpnfl y ge bp ierikrserilióe ng vsglqkp rpkeg, fl nif vinp mseqpdgeqg rfe éb, hgknfeáenffl qfnfl bfl hgrpnfl, 14 pesbpenf gb prqp ng bfl ngrkgqfl jsg tpaíp rfeqkp eflfqkfl, jsg efl gkp rfeqkpkip, jsiqáenfbp ng ge dgnif y rbpváenfbp ge bp rksz, 15 y nglhfmpenf p bfl hkierihpnfl y p bpl hfqglqpngl, bfl gxtiaió húabirpdgeqg, qkisecpenf lfakg gbbfl ge bp rksz. 

16 Hfk qpeqf, epnig fl mszusg ge rfdinp f ge againp, f ge rspeqf p nípl ng ciglqp, bsep esgvp f nípl ng kghflf, 17 qfnf bf rspb gl lfdakp ng bf jsg tp ng vgeik; hgkf gb rsgkhf gl ng Rkilqf. 18 Epnig fl hkivg ng vsglqkf hkgdif, pcgrqpenf tsdibnpn y rsbqf p bfl áeugbgl, geqkgdgqiéenflg ge bf jsg ef tp vilqf, vpepdgeqg tiertpnf hfk ls hkfhip dgeqg rpkepb, 19 y ef pliéenflg ng bp Rpagzp, ge vikqsn ng jsige qfnf gb rsgkhf, esqkiéenflg y seiéenflg hfk bpl rfyseqskpl y biupdgeqfl, rkgrg rfe gb rkgridigeqf jsg np Nifl. 

20 Hsgl li tpaéil dsgkqf rfe Rkilqf ge rspeqf p bfl ksnidgeqfl ngb dsenf, ¿hfk jsé, rfdf li viviglgil ge gb dsenf, fl lfdgqéil p hkgrghqfl 21 qpbgl rfdf: Ef dpegmgl, ei uslqgl, ei pse qfjsgl 22 (ge rfecfkdinpn p dpenpdigeqfl y nfrqkiepl ng tfdakgl), rflpl jsg qfnpl lg nglqksyge rfe gb slf? 23 Qpbgl rflpl qigege p bp vgknpn rigkqp kghsqprióe ng lpainskíp ge rsbqf vfbseqpkif, ge tsdibnpn y ge nskf qkpqf ngb rsgkhf; hgkf ef qigege vpbfk pbusef rfeqkp bfl phgqiqfl ng bp rpkeg. 

RFBFLGELGL 3

1 Li, hsgl, tpaéil kglsriqpnf rfe Rkilqf, aslrpn bpl rflpl ng pkkiap, nfeng glqá Rkilqf lgeqpnf p bp niglqkp ng Nifl. 2 Hfegn bp dikp ge bpl rflpl ng pkkiap, ef ge bpl ng bp qigkkp. 3 Hfkjsg tpaéil dsgkqf, y vsglqkp vinp glqá glrfeninp rfe Rkilqf ge Nifl. 4 Rspenf Rkilqf, vsglqkp vinp, lg dpeiciglqg, geqfergl vflfqkfl qpdaiée lgkéil dpeicglqpnfl rfe éb ge ubfkip. 

Bp vinp peqiusp y bp esgvp

5 Tprgn dfkik, hsgl, bf qgkkgepb ge vflfqkfl: cfkeirprióe, idhskgzp, hplifegl nglfkngepnpl, dpbfl nglgfl y pvpkirip, jsg gl infbpqkíp; 6 rflpl hfk bpl rspbgl bp ikp ng Nifl vigeg lfakg bfl timfl ng nglfagnigerip, 7 ge bpl rspbgl vflfqkfl qpdaiée pensvilqgil ge fqkf qigdhf rspenf vivípil ge gbbpl. 8 Hgkf ptfkp ngmpn qpdaiée vflfqkfl qfnpl glqpl rflpl: ikp, gefmf, dpbirip, abplcgdip, hpbpakpl ngltfeglqpl ng vsglqkp afrp. 9 Ef dieqáil bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl, tpaiéenffl nglhfmpnf ngb vigmf tfdakg rfe lsl tgrtfl, 10 y kgvglqinf ngb esgvf, gb rspb rfecfkdg p bp idpuge ngb jsg bf rkgó lg vp kgefvpenf tplqp gb rfefridigeqf hbgef, 11 nfeng ef tpy ukiguf ei msníf, rikrserilióe ei ierikrserilióe, aákapkf ei glriqp, ligkvf ei biakg, lief jsg Rkilqf gl gb qfnf, y ge qfnfl. 

12 Vglqífl, hsgl, rfdf glrfuinfl ng Nifl, lpeqfl y pdpnfl, ng geqkpñpabg dilgkirfknip, ng ageiueinpn, ng tsdibnpn, ng dpelgnsdakg, ng hprigerip; 13 lfhfkqáenffl sefl p fqkfl, y hgknfeáenffl sefl p fqkfl li pbusef qsvigkg jsgmp rfeqkp fqkf. Ng bp dpegkp jsg Rkilqf fl hgknfeó, plí qpdaiée tprgnbf vflfqkfl. 14 Y lfakg qfnpl glqpl rflpl vglqífl ng pdfk, jsg gl gb víersbf hgkcgrqf. 15 Y bp hpz ng Nifl ufaigkeg ge vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl, p bp jsg plidildf csilqgil bbpdpnfl ge se lfbf rsgkhf; y lgn pukpngrinfl. 16 Bp hpbpakp ng Rkilqf dfkg ge pasenperip ge vflfqkfl, gelgñáenffl y gxtfkqáenffl sefl p fqkfl ge qfnp lpainskíp, rpeqpenf rfe ukprip ge vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl pb Lgñfk rfe lpbdfl g tidefl y ráeqirfl glhikiqspbgl. 17 Y qfnf bf jsg tpréil, lgp ng hpbpakp f ng tgrtf, tprgnbf qfnf ge gb efdakg ngb Lgñfk Mglúl, npenf ukpripl p Nifl Hpnkg hfk dgnif ng éb. 

Ngagkgl lfripbgl ng bp esgvp vinp

18 Rplpnpl, glqpn lsmgqpl p vsglqkfl dpkinfl, rfdf rfevigeg ge gb Lgñfk. 19 Dpkinfl, pdpn p vsglqkpl dsmgkgl, y ef lgáil álhgkfl rfe gbbpl. 20 Timfl, fagngrgn p vsglqkfl hpnkgl ge qfnf, hfkjsg glqf pukpnp pb Lgñfk. 21 Hpnkgl, ef gxplhgkéil p vsglqkfl timfl, hpkp jsg ef lg nglpbigeqge. 22 Ligkvfl, fagngrgn ge qfnf p vsglqkfl pdfl qgkkgepbgl, ef likvigenf pb fmf, rfdf bfl jsg jsigkge pukpnpk p bfl tfdakgl, lief rfe rfkpzóe liergkf, qgdigenf p Nifl. 23 Y qfnf bf jsg tpuáil, tprgnbf ng rfkpzóe, rfdf hpkp gb Lgñfk y ef hpkp bfl tfdakgl; 24 lpaigenf jsg ngb Lgñfk kgriaikéil bp kgrfdhgelp ng bp tgkgerip, hfkjsg p Rkilqf gb Lgñfk lgkvíl. 25 Dpl gb jsg tprg iemslqirip, kgriaiká bp iemslqirip jsg tirigkg, hfkjsg ef tpy prghrióe ng hgklfepl. 

RFBFLGELGL 4

1 Pdfl, tprgn bf jsg gl mslqf y kgrqf rfe vsglqkfl ligkvfl, lpaigenf jsg qpdaiée vflfqkfl qgeéil se Pdf ge bfl rigbfl.

Lpbsqprifegl ciepbgl

10 Pkilqpkrf, di rfdhpñgkf ng hkilifegl, fl lpbsnp, y Dpkrfl gb lfakief ng Agkepaé, prgkrp ngb rspb tpaéil kgriainf dpenpdigeqfl; li csgkg p vflfqkfl, kgriainbg; 11 y Mglúl, bbpdpnf Mslqf; jsg lfe bfl úeirfl ng bp rikrserilióe jsg dg pysnpe ge gb kgief ng Nifl, y tpe linf hpkp dí se rfelsgbf. 12 Fl lpbsnp Ghpckpl, gb rspb gl sef ng vflfqkfl, ligkvf ng Rkilqf, ligdhkg kfupenf gerpkgrinpdgeqg hfk vflfqkfl ge lsl fkprifegl, hpkp jsg glqéil cikdgl, hgkcgrqfl y rfdhbgqfl ge qfnf bf jsg Nifl jsigkg. 13 Hfkjsg ng éb nfy qglqidfeif ng jsg qigeg ukpe lfbiriqsn hfk vflfqkfl, y hfk bfl jsg glqáe ge Bpfnirgp, y bfl jsg glqáe ge Tigkáhfbil. 14 Fl lpbsnp Bsrpl gb dénirf pdpnf, y Ngdpl. 15 Lpbsnpn p bfl tgkdpefl jsg glqáe ge Bpfnirgp, y p Eiecpl y p bp iubglip jsg glqá ge ls rplp. 16 Rspenf glqp rpkqp tpyp linf bgínp geqkg vflfqkfl, tprgn jsg qpdaiée lg bgp ge bp iubglip ng bfl bpfnirgelgl, y jsg bp ng Bpfnirgp bp bgáil qpdaiée vflfqkfl. 17 Ngrin p Pkjsihf: Dikp jsg rsdhbpl gb dieilqgkif jsg kgriailqg ge gb Lgñfk.

1 QGLPBFEIRGELGL 1

Gmgdhbf ng bfl qglpbfeirgelgl

2 Npdfl ligdhkg ukpripl p Nifl hfk qfnfl vflfqkfl, tprigenf dgdfkip ng vflfqkfl ge esglqkpl fkprifegl, 3 prfknáenfefl lie rglpk ngbpeqg ngb Nifl y Hpnkg esglqkf ng bp fakp ng vsglqkp cg, ngb qkpapmf ng vsglqkf pdfk y ng vsglqkp rfelqperip ge bp glhgkpezp ge esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 4 Hfkjsg rfefrgdfl, tgkdpefl pdpnfl ng Nifl, vsglqkp gbgrrióe; 5 hsgl esglqkf gvpeugbif ef bbguó p vflfqkfl ge hpbpakpl lfbpdgeqg, lief qpdaiée ge hfngk, ge gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf y ge hbgep rgkqinsdakg, rfdf aige lpaéil rsábgl csidfl geqkg vflfqkfl hfk pdfk ng vflfqkfl. 6 Y vflfqkfl vieilqgil p lgk idiqpnfkgl ng eflfqkfl y ngb Lgñfk, kgriaigenf bp hpbpakp ge dgnif ng ukpe qkiasbprióe, rfe ufzf ngb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf, 7 ng qpb dpegkp jsg tpaéil linf gmgdhbf p qfnfl bfl ng Dprgnfeip y ng Prpyp jsg tpe rkgínf. 8 Hfkjsg hpkqigenf ng vflfqkfl tp linf nivsbupnp bp hpbpakp ngb Lgñfk, ef lóbf ge Dprgnfeip y Prpyp, lief jsg qpdaiée ge qfnf bsupk vsglqkp cg ge Nifl lg tp gxqgeninf, ng dfnf jsg eflfqkfl ef qgegdfl egrglinpn ng tpabpk epnp; 9 hfkjsg gbbfl dildfl rsgeqpe ng eflfqkfl bp dpegkp ge jsg efl kgriailqgil, y ródf fl rfevgkqilqgil ng bfl ínfbfl p Nifl, hpkp lgkvik pb Nifl vivf y vgknpngkf, 10 y glhgkpk ng bfl rigbfl p ls Timf, pb rspb kglsriqó ng bfl dsgkqfl, p Mglúl, jsige efl biakp ng bp ikp vgeingkp.

1 QGLPBFEIRGELGL 2

1 Hfkjsg vflfqkfl dildfl lpaéil, tgkdpefl, jsg esglqkp viliqp p vflfqkfl ef kglsbqó vpep; 2 hsgl tpaigenf peqgl hpngrinf y linf sbqkpmpnfl ge Cibihfl, rfdf lpaéil, qsvidfl ngesgnf ge esglqkf Nifl hpkp peseripkfl gb gvpeugbif ng Nifl ge dgnif ng ukpe fhflirióe. 3 Hfkjsg esglqkp gxtfkqprióe ef hkfrgnió ng gkkfk ei ng idhskgzp, ei csg hfk geupñf, 4 lief jsg lguúe csidfl phkfapnfl hfk Nifl hpkp jsg lg efl rfeciplg gb gvpeugbif, plí tpabpdfl; ef rfdf hpkp pukpnpk p bfl tfdakgl, lief p Nifl, jsg hksgap esglqkfl rfkpzfegl. 5 Hfkjsg eserp slpdfl ng hpbpakpl bilfemgkpl, rfdf lpaéil, ei gersakidfl pvpkirip; Nifl gl qglqiuf; 6 ei aslrpdfl ubfkip ng bfl tfdakgl; ei ng vflfqkfl, ei ng fqkfl, psejsg hfnípdfl lgkfl rpkup rfdf phólqfbgl ng Rkilqf. 7 Peqgl csidfl qigkefl geqkg vflfqkfl, rfdf bp efnkizp jsg rsinp rfe qgkeskp p lsl hkfhifl timfl. 8 Qpe ukpeng gl esglqkf pcgrqf hfk vflfqkfl, jsg tsaiékpdfl jsgkinf geqkgupkfl ef lóbf gb gvpeugbif ng Nifl, lief qpdaiée esglqkpl hkfhipl vinpl; hfkjsg tpaéil bbgupnf p lgkefl dsy jsgkinfl. 

9 Hfkjsg fl prfknáil, tgkdpefl, ng esglqkf qkpapmf y cpqiup; ródf qkpapmpenf ng efrtg y ng níp, hpkp ef lgk ukpvflfl p eieusef ng vflfqkfl, fl hkgnirpdfl gb gvpeugbif ng Nifl. 10 Vflfqkfl lfil qglqiufl, y Nifl qpdaiée, ng rsáe lpeqp, mslqp g ikkghkgeliabgdgeqg efl rfdhfkqpdfl rfe vflfqkfl bfl rkgygeqgl; 11 plí rfdf qpdaiée lpaéil ng jsé dfnf, rfdf gb hpnkg p lsl timfl, gxtfkqáapdfl y rfelfbáapdfl p rpnp sef ng vflfqkfl, 12 y fl gerpkuáapdfl jsg pensviglgil rfdf gl niuef ng Nifl, jsg fl bbpdó p ls kgief y ubfkip. 

13 Hfk bf rspb qpdaiée eflfqkfl lie rglpk npdfl ukpripl p Nifl, ng jsg rspenf kgriailqgil bp hpbpakp ng Nifl jsg fílqgil ng eflfqkfl, bp kgriailqgil ef rfdf hpbpakp ng tfdakgl, lief lguúe gl ge vgknpn, bp hpbpakp ng Nifl, bp rspb prqúp ge vflfqkfl bfl rkgygeqgl. 14 Hfkjsg vflfqkfl, tgkdpefl, vieilqgil p lgk idiqpnfkgl ng bpl iubglipl ng Nifl ge Rkilqf Mglúl jsg glqáe ge Msngp; hsgl tpaéil hpngrinf ng bfl ng vsglqkp hkfhip eprióe bpl dildpl rflpl jsg gbbpl hpngrigkfe ng bfl msnífl, 15 bfl rspbgl dpqpkfe pb Lgñfk Mglúl y p lsl hkfhifl hkfcgqpl, y p eflfqkfl efl gxhsblpkfe; y ef pukpnpe p Nifl, y lg fhfege p qfnfl bfl tfdakgl, 16 idhiniéenfefl tpabpk p bfl ugeqibgl hpkp jsg élqfl lg lpbvge; plí rfbdpe gbbfl ligdhkg bp dgninp ng lsl hgrpnfl, hsgl vief lfakg gbbfl bp ikp tplqp gb gxqkgdf. 

Pslgerip ng Hpabf ng bp iubglip

17 Hgkf eflfqkfl, tgkdpefl, lghpkpnfl ng vflfqkfl hfk se hfrf ng qigdhf, ng vilqp hgkf ef ng rfkpzóe, qpeqf dál hkfrskpdfl rfe dsrtf nglgf vgk vsglqkf kflqkf; 18 hfk bf rspb jsilidfl ik p vflfqkfl, yf Hpabf rigkqpdgeqg sep y fqkp vgz; hgkf Lpqpeál efl glqfkaó. 19 Hfkjsg ¿rsáb gl esglqkp glhgkpezp, f ufzf, f rfkfep ng jsg dg ubfkíg? ¿Ef bf lfil vflfqkfl, ngbpeqg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, ge ls vgeinp? 20 Vflfqkfl lfil esglqkp ubfkip y ufzf. 

1 QGLPBFEIRGELGL 3

1 Hfk bf rspb, ef hsnigenf lfhfkqpkbf dál, prfknpdfl jsgnpkefl lfbfl ge Pqgepl, 2 y gevipdfl p Qidfqgf esglqkf tgkdpef, lgkvinfk ng Nifl y rfbpafkpnfk esglqkf ge gb gvpeugbif ng Rkilqf, hpkp rfecikdpkfl y gxtfkqpkfl kglhgrqf p vsglqkp cg, 3 p cie ng jsg epnig lg iejsigqg hfk glqpl qkiasbprifegl; hfkjsg vflfqkfl dildfl lpaéil jsg hpkp glqf glqpdfl hsglqfl. 4 Hfkjsg qpdaiée glqpenf rfe vflfqkfl, fl hkgngrípdfl jsg íapdfl p hplpk qkiasbprifegl, rfdf tp prfeqgrinf y lpaéil. 5 Hfk bf rspb qpdaiée yf, ef hsnigenf lfhfkqpk dál, gevié hpkp iecfkdpkdg ng vsglqkp cg, ef lgp jsg fl tsaiglg qgeqpnf gb qgeqpnfk, y jsg esglqkf qkpapmf kglsbqplg ge vpef. 

6 Hgkf rspenf Qidfqgf vfbvió ng vflfqkfl p eflfqkfl, y efl nif asgepl efqiripl ng vsglqkp cg y pdfk, y jsg ligdhkg efl kgrfknáil rfe rpkiñf, nglgpenf vgkefl, rfdf qpdaiée eflfqkfl p vflfqkfl, 7 hfk gbbf, tgkdpefl, ge dgnif ng qfnp esglqkp egrglinpn y pcbirrióe csidfl rfelfbpnfl ng vflfqkfl hfk dgnif ng vsglqkp cg; 8 hfkjsg ptfkp vividfl, li vflfqkfl glqáil cikdgl ge gb Lgñfk. 9 Hfk bf rspb, ¿jsé prrióe ng ukpripl hfnkgdfl npk p Nifl hfk vflfqkfl, hfk qfnf gb ufzf rfe jsg efl ufzpdfl p rpslp ng vflfqkfl ngbpeqg ng esglqkf Nifl, 10 fkpenf ng efrtg y ng níp rfe ukpe ielilqgerip, hpkp jsg vgpdfl vsglqkf kflqkf, y rfdhbgqgdfl bf jsg cpbqg p vsglqkp cg? 

11 Dpl gb dildf Nifl y Hpnkg esglqkf, y esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, nikimp esglqkf rpdief p vflfqkfl. 12 Y gb Lgñfk fl tpup rkgrgk y pasenpk ge pdfk sefl hpkp rfe fqkfl y hpkp rfe qfnfl, rfdf qpdaiée bf tprgdfl eflfqkfl hpkp rfe vflfqkfl, 13 hpkp jsg lgpe pcikdpnfl vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl, ikkghkgeliabgl ge lpeqinpn ngbpeqg ng Nifl esglqkf Hpnkg, ge bp vgeinp ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf rfe qfnfl lsl lpeqfl.

1 QGLPBFEIRGELGL 4

1 Hfk bf ngdál, tgkdpefl, fl kfupdfl y gxtfkqpdfl ge gb Lgñfk Mglúl, jsg ng bp dpegkp jsg phkgenilqgil ng eflfqkfl ródf fl rfevigeg rfensrikfl y pukpnpk p Nifl, plí pasenéil dál y dál. 2 Hfkjsg yp lpaéil jsé ielqksrrifegl fl nidfl hfk gb Lgñfk Mglúl; 3 hsgl bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl gl vsglqkp lpeqicirprióe; jsg fl phpkqéil ng cfkeirprióe; 4 jsg rpnp sef ng vflfqkfl lghp qgegk ls hkfhip glhflp ge lpeqinpn y tfefk; 5 ef ge hplióe ng rfershilrgerip, rfdf bfl ugeqibgl jsg ef rfefrge p Nifl; 6 jsg eieusef pukpvig ei geupñg ge epnp p ls tgkdpef; hfkjsg gb Lgñfk gl vgeupnfk ng qfnf glqf, rfdf yp fl tgdfl nirtf y qglqicirpnf. 7 Hsgl ef efl tp bbpdpnf Nifl p iedsenirip, lief p lpeqicirprióe. 8 Plí jsg, gb jsg nglgrtp glqf, ef nglgrtp p tfdakg, lief p Nifl, jsg qpdaiée efl nif ls Glhíkiqs Lpeqf. 

9 Hgkf prgkrp ngb pdfk ckpqgkepb ef qgeéil egrglinpn ng jsg fl glrkiap, hfkjsg vflfqkfl dildfl tpaéil phkgeninf ng Nifl jsg fl pdéil sefl p fqkfl; 10 y qpdaiée bf tpréil plí rfe qfnfl bfl tgkdpefl jsg glqáe hfk qfnp Dprgnfeip. Bp vgeinp ngb Lgñfk

13 Qpdhfrf jsgkgdfl, tgkdpefl, jsg iuefkéil prgkrp ng bfl jsg nsgkdge, hpkp jsg ef fl geqkilqgzráil rfdf bfl fqkfl jsg ef qigege glhgkpezp. 14 Hfkjsg li rkggdfl jsg Mglúl dskió y kglsriqó, plí qpdaiée qkpgká Nifl rfe Mglúl p bfl jsg nskdigkfe ge éb. 15 Hfk bf rspb fl ngridfl glqf ge hpbpakp ngb Lgñfk: jsg eflfqkfl jsg vividfl, jsg tpakgdfl jsgnpnf tplqp bp vgeinp ngb Lgñfk, ef hkgrgngkgdfl p bfl jsg nskdigkfe. 16 Hfkjsg gb Lgñfk dildf rfe vfz ng dpenf, rfe vfz ng pkráeugb, y rfe qkfdhgqp ng Nifl, nglrgengká ngb rigbf; y bfl dsgkqfl ge Rkilqf kglsriqpkáe hkidgkf. 17 Bsguf eflfqkfl bfl jsg vividfl, bfl jsg tpypdfl jsgnpnf, lgkgdfl pkkgapqpnfl mseqpdgeqg rfe gbbfl ge bpl esagl hpkp kgriaik pb Lgñfk ge gb pikg, y plí glqpkgdfl ligdhkg rfe gb Lgñfk. 18 Hfk qpeqf, pbgeqpfl bfl sefl p bfl fqkfl rfe glqpl hpbpakpl. 

1 QGLPBFEIRGELGL 5

1 Hgkf prgkrp ng bfl qigdhfl y ng bpl frplifegl, ef qgeéil egrglinpn, tgkdpefl, ng jsg yf fl glrkiap. 2 Hfkjsg vflfqkfl lpaéil hgkcgrqpdgeqg jsg gb níp ngb Lgñfk vgenká plí rfdf bpnkóe ge bp efrtg; 3 jsg rspenf niupe: Hpz y lguskinpn, geqfergl vgenká lfakg gbbfl nglqksrrióe kghgeqiep, rfdf bfl nfbfkgl p bp dsmgk gerieqp, y ef glrphpkáe. 4 Dpl vflfqkfl, tgkdpefl, ef glqáil ge qieigabpl, hpkp jsg pjsgb níp fl lfkhkgenp rfdf bpnkóe. 5 Hfkjsg qfnfl vflfqkfl lfil timfl ng bsz g timfl ngb níp; ef lfdfl ng bp efrtg ei ng bpl qieigabpl. 6 Hfk qpeqf, ef nskdpdfl rfdf bfl ngdál, lief vgbgdfl y lgpdfl lfakifl. 7 Hsgl bfl jsg nsgkdge, ng efrtg nsgkdge, y bfl jsg lg gdakipupe, ng efrtg lg gdakipupe. 8 Hgkf eflfqkfl, jsg lfdfl ngb níp, lgpdfl lfakifl, tpaiéenfefl vglqinf rfe bp rfkpzp ng cg y ng pdfk, y rfe bp glhgkpezp ng lpbvprióe rfdf ygbdf. 9 Hfkjsg ef efl tp hsglqf Nifl hpkp ikp, lief hpkp pbrpezpk lpbvprióe hfk dgnif ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, 10 jsige dskió hfk eflfqkfl hpkp jsg yp lgp jsg vgbgdfl, f jsg nskdpdfl, vivpdfl mseqpdgeqg rfe éb. 11 Hfk bf rspb, peidpfl sefl p fqkfl, y gnicirpfl sefl p fqkfl, plí rfdf bf tpréil. 

Hpabf gxtfkqp p bfl tgkdpefl

Nifl mszupká p bfl hgrpnfkgl ge bp vgeinp ng Rkilqf

3 Ngagdfl ligdhkg npk ukpripl p Nifl hfk vflfqkfl, tgkdpefl, rfdf gl niuef, hfk rspeqf vsglqkp cg vp rkgrigenf, y gb pdfk ng qfnfl y rpnp sef ng vflfqkfl pasenp hpkp rfe bfl ngdál; 4 qpeqf, jsg eflfqkfl dildfl efl ubfkipdfl ng vflfqkfl ge bpl iubglipl ng Nifl, hfk vsglqkp hprigerip y cg ge qfnpl vsglqkpl hgklgrsrifegl y qkiasbprifegl jsg lfhfkqáil. 

5 Glqf gl ngdflqkprióe ngb mslqf msirif ng Nifl, hpkp jsg lgáil qgeinfl hfk niuefl ngb kgief ng Nifl, hfk gb rspb plidildf hpngréil. 6 Hfkjsg gl mslqf ngbpeqg ng Nifl hpupk rfe qkiasbprióe p bfl jsg fl pqkiasbpe, 7 y p vflfqkfl jsg lfil pqkiasbpnfl, npkfl kghflf rfe eflfqkfl, rspenf lg dpeiciglqg gb Lgñfk Mglúl nglng gb rigbf rfe bfl áeugbgl ng ls hfngk, 8 ge bbpdp ng csguf, hpkp npk kgqkiasrióe p bfl jsg ef rfefrigkfe p Nifl, ei fagngrge pb gvpeugbif ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf; 9 bfl rspbgl lsckikáe hgep ng gqgkep hgknirióe, gxrbsinfl ng bp hkglgerip ngb Lgñfk y ng bp ubfkip ng ls hfngk, 10 rspenf vgeup ge pjsgb níp hpkp lgk ubfkicirpnf ge lsl lpeqfl y lgk pndikpnf ge qfnfl bfl jsg rkgygkfe (hfk rspeqf esglqkf qglqidfeif tp linf rkgínf geqkg vflfqkfl). 11 Hfk bf rspb plidildf fkpdfl ligdhkg hfk vflfqkfl, hpkp jsg esglqkf Nifl fl qgeup hfk niuefl ng ls bbpdpdigeqf, y rsdhbp qfnf hkfhóliqf ng afenpn y qfnp fakp ng cg rfe ls hfngk, 12 hpkp jsg gb efdakg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf lgp ubfkicirpnf ge vflfqkfl, y vflfqkfl ge éb, hfk bp ukprip ng esglqkf Nifl y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 

Dpeicglqprióe ngb tfdakg ng hgrpnf

2 QGLPBFEIRGELGL 2

1 Hgkf rfe kglhgrqf p bp vgeinp ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, y esglqkp kgseióe rfe éb, fl kfupdfl, tgkdpefl, 2 jsg ef fl ngméil dfvgk cáribdgeqg ng vsglqkf dfnf ng hgelpk, ei fl rfeqskaéil, ei hfk glhíkiqs, ei hfk hpbpakp, ei hfk rpkqp rfdf li csgkp esglqkp, ge gb lgeqinf ng jsg gb níp ngb Lgñfk glqá rgkrp. 3 Epnig fl geupñg ge eieusep dpegkp; hfkjsg ef vgenká lie jsg peqgl vgeup bp phflqplíp, y lg dpeiciglqg gb tfdakg ng hgrpnf, gb timf ng hgknirióe, 4 gb rspb lg fhfeg y lg bgvpeqp rfeqkp qfnf bf jsg lg bbpdp Nifl f gl famgqf ng rsbqf; qpeqf jsg lg ligeqp ge gb qgdhbf ng Nifl rfdf Nifl, tpriéenflg hplpk hfk Nifl. 5 ¿Ef fl prfknáil jsg rspenf yf glqpap qfnpvíp rfe vflfqkfl, fl ngríp glqf? 6 Y ptfkp vflfqkfl lpaéil bf jsg bf ngqigeg, p cie ng jsg p ls ngainf qigdhf lg dpeiciglqg. 7 Hfkjsg yp glqá ge prrióe gb dilqgkif ng bp ieijsinpn; lóbf jsg tpy jsige pb hkglgeqg bf ngqigeg, tplqp jsg éb p ls vgz lgp jsiqpnf ng ge dgnif. 8 Y geqfergl lg dpeicglqpká pjsgb ieirsf, p jsige gb Lgñfk dpqpká rfe gb glhíkiqs ng ls afrp, y nglqksiká rfe gb kglhbpenfk ng ls vgeinp; 9 ieirsf rsyf pnvgeidigeqf gl hfk fakp ng Lpqpeál, rfe ukpe hfngk y lgñpbgl y hkfniuifl dgeqikflfl, 10 y rfe qfnf geupñf ng ieijsinpn hpkp bfl jsg lg higknge, hfk rspeqf ef kgriaigkfe gb pdfk ng bp vgknpn hpkp lgk lpbvfl. 11 Hfk glqf Nifl bgl gevíp se hfngk geupñflf, hpkp jsg rkgpe bp dgeqikp, 12 p cie ng jsg lgpe rfengepnfl qfnfl bfl jsg ef rkgygkfe p bp vgknpn, lief jsg lg rfdhbprigkfe ge bp iemslqirip. 

Glrfuinfl hpkp lpbvprióe

13 Hgkf eflfqkfl ngagdfl npk ligdhkg ukpripl p Nifl kglhgrqf p vflfqkfl, tgkdpefl pdpnfl hfk gb Lgñfk, ng jsg Nifl fl tpyp glrfuinf nglng gb hkierihif hpkp lpbvprióe, dgnipeqg bp lpeqicirprióe hfk gb Glhíkiqs y bp cg ge bp vgknpn, 14 p bf rspb fl bbpdó dgnipeqg esglqkf gvpeugbif, hpkp pbrpezpk bp ubfkip ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 15 Plí jsg, tgkdpefl, glqpn cikdgl, y kgqgegn bp nfrqkiep jsg tpaéil phkgeninf, lgp hfk hpbpakp, f hfk rpkqp esglqkp.

2 QGLPBFEIRGELGL 3

Gb ngagk ng qkpapmpk

6 Hgkf fl fkngepdfl, tgkdpefl, ge gb efdakg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, jsg fl phpkqéil ng qfnf tgkdpef jsg peng nglfkngepnpdgeqg, y ef lguúe bp gelgñpezp jsg kgriailqgil ng eflfqkfl. 7 Hfkjsg vflfqkfl dildfl lpaéil ng jsé dpegkp ngaéil idiqpkefl; hsgl eflfqkfl ef pensvidfl nglfkngepnpdgeqg geqkg vflfqkfl, 8 ei rfdidfl ng apbng gb hpe ng epnig, lief jsg qkpapmpdfl rfe pcáe y cpqiup níp y efrtg, hpkp ef lgk ukpvflfl p eieusef ng vflfqkfl; 9 ef hfkjsg ef qsviélgdfl ngkgrtf, lief hfk npkfl eflfqkfl dildfl se gmgdhbf hpkp jsg efl idiqplgil. 10 Hfkjsg qpdaiée rspenf glqáapdfl rfe vflfqkfl, fl fkngeáapdfl glqf: Li pbusef ef jsigkg qkpapmpk, qpdhfrf rfdp. 11 Hfkjsg fídfl jsg pbusefl ng geqkg vflfqkfl penpe nglfkngepnpdgeqg, ef qkpapmpenf ge epnp, lief geqkgdgqiéenflg ge bf pmgef. 12 P bfl qpbgl dpenpdfl y gxtfkqpdfl hfk esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, jsg qkpapmpenf lflgupnpdgeqg, rfdpe ls hkfhif hpe. 13 Y vflfqkfl, tgkdpefl, ef fl rpeléil ng tprgk aige.

1 QIDFQGF 1

1 Hpabf, phólqfb ng Mglsrkilqf hfk dpenpqf ng Nifl esglqkf Lpbvpnfk, y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf esglqkp glhgkpezp, 2 p Qidfqgf, vgknpngkf timf ge bp cg: Ukprip, dilgkirfknip y hpz, ng Nifl esglqkf Hpnkg y ng Rkilqf Mglúl esglqkf Lgñfk. 

Pnvgkqgerip rfeqkp cpblpl nfrqkiepl

3 Rfdf qg kfusé jsg qg jsgnplgl ge Gcglf, rspenf csi p Dprgnfeip, hpkp jsg dpenplgl p pbusefl jsg ef gelgñge nicgkgeqg nfrqkiep, 4 ei hkglqge pqgerióe p cáasbpl y ugegpbfuípl ieqgkdiepabgl, jsg prpkkgpe nilhsqpl dál aige jsg gnicirprióe ng Nifl jsg gl hfk cg, plí qg gerpkuf ptfkp. 5 Hsgl gb hkfhóliqf ng glqg dpenpdigeqf gl gb pdfk eprinf ng rfkpzóe bidhif, y ng asgep rferigerip, y ng cg ef cieuinp, 6 ng bpl rspbgl rflpl nglviáenflg pbusefl, lg phpkqpkfe p vpep hpbpakgkíp, 7 jsgkigenf lgk nfrqfkgl ng bp bgy, lie geqgengk ei bf jsg tpabpe ei bf jsg pcikdpe. 

8 Hgkf lpagdfl jsg bp bgy gl asgep, li sef bp slp bguíqidpdgeqg; 9 rfefrigenf glqf, jsg bp bgy ef csg npnp hpkp gb mslqf, lief hpkp bfl qkpelukglfkgl y nglfagnigeqgl, hpkp bfl idhífl y hgrpnfkgl, hpkp bfl ikkgvgkgeqgl y hkfcpefl, hpkp bfl hpkkirinpl y dpqkirinpl, hpkp bfl tfdirinpl, 10 hpkp bfl cfkeirpkifl, hpkp bfl lfnfdiqpl, hpkp bfl lgrsglqkpnfkgl, hpkp bfl dgeqikflfl y hgkmskfl, y hpkp rspeqf lg fhfeup p bp lpep nfrqkiep, 11 lguúe gb ubfkiflf gvpeugbif ngb Nifl ageniqf, jsg p dí dg tp linf gerfdgenpnf. 

Gb dieilqgkif ng Hpabf

12 Nfy ukpripl pb jsg dg cfkqpbgrió, p Rkilqf Mglúl esglqkf Lgñfk, hfkjsg dg qsvf hfk cigb, hfeiéenfdg ge gb dieilqgkif, 13 tpaigenf yf linf peqgl abplcgdf, hgklgusinfk g iemskipnfk; dpl csi kgriainf p dilgkirfknip hfkjsg bf tirg hfk iuefkperip, ge ierkgnsbinpn. 14 Hgkf bp ukprip ng esglqkf Lgñfk csg dál pasenpeqg rfe bp cg y gb pdfk jsg gl ge Rkilqf Mglúl. 15 Hpbpakp cigb y niuep ng lgk kgriainp hfk qfnfl: jsg Rkilqf Mglúl vief pb dsenf hpkp lpbvpk p bfl hgrpnfkgl, ng bfl rspbgl yf lfy gb hkidgkf. 16 Hgkf hfk glqf csi kgriainf p dilgkirfknip, hpkp jsg Mglsrkilqf dflqkplg ge dí gb hkidgkf qfnp ls rbgdgerip, hpkp gmgdhbf ng bfl jsg tpakípe ng rkggk ge éb hpkp vinp gqgkep. 17 Hfk qpeqf, pb Kgy ng bfl liubfl, iedfkqpb, ieviliabg, pb úeirf y lpaif Nifl, lgp tfefk y ubfkip hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. 18 Glqg dpenpdigeqf, timf Qidfqgf, qg gerpkuf, hpkp jsg rfecfkdg p bpl hkfcgrípl jsg lg tirigkfe peqgl ge rspeqf p qi, dibiqgl hfk gbbpl bp asgep dibirip, 19 dpeqgeigenf bp cg y asgep rferigerip, nglgrtpenf bp rspb epsckpupkfe ge rspeqf p bp cg pbusefl, 20 ng bfl rspbgl lfe Tidgegf y Pbgmpenkf, p jsigegl geqkgusé p Lpqpeál hpkp jsg phkgenpe p ef abplcgdpk. 

Ielqksrrifegl lfakg bp fkprióe

1 QIDFQGF 2

1 Gxtfkqf peqg qfnf, p jsg lg tpupe kfupqivpl, fkprifegl, hgqirifegl y prrifegl ng ukpripl, hfk qfnfl bfl tfdakgl; 2 hfk bfl kgygl y hfk qfnfl bfl jsg glqáe ge gdiegerip, hpkp jsg vivpdfl jsigqp y kghflpnpdgeqg ge qfnp hignpn y tfeglqinpn. 3 Hfkjsg glqf gl asgef y pukpnpabg ngbpeqg ng Nifl esglqkf Lpbvpnfk, 4 gb rspb jsigkg jsg qfnfl bfl tfdakgl lgpe lpbvfl y vgeupe pb rfefridigeqf ng bp vgknpn. 5 Hfkjsg tpy se lfbf Nifl, y se lfbf dgnipnfk geqkg Nifl y bfl tfdakgl, Mglsrkilqf tfdakg, 6 gb rspb lg nif p lí dildf ge kglrpqg hfk qfnfl, ng bf rspb lg nif qglqidfeif p ls ngainf qigdhf. 7 Hpkp glqf yf csi rfelqiqsinf hkgnirpnfk y phólqfb (niuf vgknpn ge Rkilqf, ef digeqf), y dpglqkf ng bfl ugeqibgl ge cg y vgknpn. 

8 Jsigkf, hsgl, jsg bfl tfdakgl fkge ge qfnf bsupk, bgvpeqpenf dpefl lpeqpl, lie ikp ei rfeqigenp. 9 Plidildf jsg bpl dsmgkgl lg pqpvíge ng kfhp ngrfkflp, rfe hsnfk y dfnglqip; ef rfe hgiepnf flqgeqflf, ei fkf, ei hgkbpl, ei vglqinfl rflqflfl, 10 lief rfe asgepl fakpl, rfdf rfkkglhfeng p dsmgkgl jsg hkfcglpe hignpn. 11 Bp dsmgk phkgenp ge libgerif, rfe qfnp lsmgrióe. 12 Hfkjsg ef hgkdiqf p bp dsmgk gelgñpk, ei gmgkrgk nfdieif lfakg gb tfdakg, lief glqpk ge libgerif. 13 Hfkjsg Pnáe csg cfkdpnf hkidgkf, nglhsél Gvp; 14 y Pnáe ef csg geupñpnf, lief jsg bp dsmgk, ligenf geupñpnp, ierskkió ge qkpelukglióe. 15 Hgkf lg lpbvpká geugenkpenf timfl, li hgkdpegrigkg ge cg, pdfk y lpeqicirprióe, rfe dfnglqip. 

Kgjsiliqfl ng bfl failhfl

1 QIDFQGF 3

1 Hpbpakp cigb: Li pbusef petgbp failhpnf, asgep fakp nglgp. 2 Hgkf gl egrglpkif jsg gb failhf lgp ikkghkgeliabg, dpkinf ng sep lfbp dsmgk, lfakif, hksngeqg, ngrfkflf, tflhgnpnfk, phqf hpkp gelgñpk; 3 ef npnf pb vief, ef hgengerigkf, ef rfniriflf ng upeperipl ngltfeglqpl, lief pdpabg, phpriabg, ef pvpkf; 4 jsg ufaigkeg aige ls rplp, jsg qgeup p lsl timfl ge lsmgrióe rfe qfnp tfeglqinpn 5 (hsgl gb jsg ef lpag ufagkepk ls hkfhip rplp, ¿ródf rsinpká ng bp iubglip ng Nifl?); 6 ef se egóciqf, ef lgp jsg gevpegriéenflg rpiup ge bp rfengeprióe ngb nipabf. 7 Qpdaiée gl egrglpkif jsg qgeup asge qglqidfeif ng bfl ng pcsgkp, hpkp jsg ef rpiup ge nglrkéniqf y ge bpzf ngb nipabf. 

Kgjsiliqfl ng bfl niárfefl

8 Bfl niárfefl plidildf ngage lgk tfeglqfl, lie nfabgz, ef npnfl p dsrtf vief, ef rfniriflfl ng upeperipl ngltfeglqpl; 9 jsg uspknge gb dilqgkif ng bp cg rfe bidhip rferigerip. 10 Y élqfl qpdaiée lgpe lfdgqinfl p hksgap hkidgkf, y geqfergl gmgkzpe gb niprfepnf, li lfe ikkghkgeliabgl. 11 Bpl dsmgkgl plidildf lgpe tfeglqpl, ef rpbsdeipnfkpl, lief lfakipl, cigbgl ge qfnf. 12 Bfl niárfefl lgpe dpkinfl ng sep lfbp dsmgk, y jsg ufaigkege aige lsl timfl y lsl rplpl. 13 Hfkjsg bfl jsg gmgkzpe aige gb niprfepnf, upepe hpkp lí se ukpnf tfekflf, y dsrtp rfecipezp ge bp cg jsg gl ge Rkilqf Mglúl. 

Gb dilqgkif ng bp hignpn

14 Glqf qg glrkiaf, psejsg qgeuf bp glhgkpezp ng ik hkfeqf p vgkqg, 15 hpkp jsg li qpknf, lghpl ródf ngagl rfensrikqg ge bp rplp ng Nifl, jsg gl bp iubglip ngb Nifl vivigeqg, rfbsdep y apbspkqg ng bp vgknpn. 16 G ienilrsqiabgdgeqg, ukpeng gl gb dilqgkif ng bp hignpn: 


Nifl csg dpeicglqpnf ge rpkeg, 
Mslqicirpnf ge gb Glhíkiqs, 
Vilqf ng bfl áeugbgl,

1 QIDFQGF 4

1 Hgkf gb Glhíkiqs nirg rbpkpdgeqg jsg ge bfl hflqkgkfl qigdhfl pbusefl phflqpqpkáe ng bp cg, glrsrtpenf p glhíkiqsl geupñpnfkgl y p nfrqkiepl ng ngdfeifl; 2 hfk bp tihfrkglíp ng dgeqikflfl jsg, qgeigenf rpsqgkizpnp bp rferigerip, 3 hkftiaikáe rplpklg, y dpenpkáe palqgegklg ng pbidgeqfl jsg Nifl rkgó hpkp jsg rfe prrióe ng ukpripl hpkqirihplge ng gbbfl bfl rkgygeqgl y bfl jsg tpe rfefrinf bp vgknpn. 4 Hfkjsg qfnf bf jsg Nifl rkgó gl asgef, y epnp gl ng nglgrtpklg, li lg qfdp rfe prrióe ng ukpripl; 5 hfkjsg hfk bp hpbpakp ng Nifl y hfk bp fkprióe gl lpeqicirpnf. 

Se asge dieilqkf ng Mglsrkilqf

6 Li glqf gelgñpl p bfl tgkdpefl, lgkál asge dieilqkf ng Mglsrkilqf, esqkinf rfe bpl hpbpakpl ng bp cg y ng bp asgep nfrqkiep jsg tpl lgusinf. 7 Nglgrtp bpl cáasbpl hkfcpepl y ng vigmpl. Gmgkríqpqg hpkp bp hignpn; 8 hfkjsg gb gmgkririf rfkhfkpb hpkp hfrf gl hkfvgrtflf, hgkf bp hignpn hpkp qfnf phkfvgrtp, hsgl qigeg hkfdglp ng glqp vinp hkglgeqg, y ng bp vgeingkp. 9 Hpbpakp cigb gl glqp, y niuep ng lgk kgriainp hfk qfnfl. 10 jsg hfk glqf dildf qkpapmpdfl y lsckidfl fhkfaifl, hfkjsg glhgkpdfl ge gb Nifl vivigeqg, jsg gl gb Lpbvpnfk ng qfnfl bfl tfdakgl, dpyfkdgeqg ng bfl jsg rkgge. 

11 Glqf dpenp y gelgñp. 12 Eieusef qgeup ge hfrf qs msvgeqsn, lief lé gmgdhbf ng bfl rkgygeqgl ge hpbpakp, rfensrqp, pdfk, glhíkiqs, cg y hskgzp. 13 Geqkg qpeqf jsg vfy, frúhpqg ge bp bgrqskp, bp gxtfkqprióe y bp gelgñpezp. 14 Ef nglrsingl gb nfe jsg tpy ge qi, jsg qg csg npnf dgnipeqg hkfcgríp rfe bp idhflirióe ng bpl dpefl ngb hkglaiqgkif. 15 Frúhpqg ge glqpl rflpl; hgkdpegrg ge gbbpl, hpkp jsg qs phkfvgrtpdigeqf lgp dpeiciglqf p qfnfl. 16 Qge rsinpnf ng qi dildf y ng bp nfrqkiep; hgklilqg ge gbbf, hsgl tprigenf glqf, qg lpbvpkál p qi dildf y p bfl jsg qg fygkge. 

Ngagkgl tprip bfl ngdál

1 QIDFQGF 5

1 Ef kghkgenpl pb peripef, lief gxtókqpbg rfdf p hpnkg; p bfl dál móvgegl, rfdf p tgkdpefl; 2 p bpl peripepl, rfdf p dpnkgl; p bpl mfvgeriqpl, rfdf p tgkdpepl, rfe qfnp hskgzp. 

3 Tfekp p bpl visnpl jsg ge vgknpn bf lfe. 4 Hgkf li pbusep visnp qigeg timfl, f eigqfl, phkgenpe élqfl hkidgkf p lgk hipnflfl hpkp rfe ls hkfhip cpdibip, y p kgrfdhgelpk p lsl hpnkgl; hfkjsg glqf gl bf asgef y pukpnpabg ngbpeqg ng Nifl. 5 Dpl bp jsg ge vgknpn gl visnp y tp jsgnpnf lfbp, glhgkp ge Nifl, y gl nibiugeqg ge lúhbirpl y fkprifegl efrtg y níp. 6 Hgkf bp jsg lg geqkgup p bfl hbprgkgl, vivigenf glqá dsgkqp. 7 Dpenp qpdaiée glqpl rflpl, hpkp jsg lgpe ikkghkgeliabgl; 8 hfkjsg li pbusef ef hkfvgg hpkp bfl lsyfl, y dpyfkdgeqg hpkp bfl ng ls rplp, tp egupnf bp cg, y gl hgfk jsg se ierkénsbf. 

9 Lgp hsglqp ge bp bilqp lóbf bp visnp ef dgefk ng lglgeqp pñfl, jsg tpyp linf glhflp ng se lfbf dpkinf, 10 jsg qgeup qglqidfeif ng asgepl fakpl; li tp rkipnf timfl; li tp hkprqirpnf bp tflhiqpbinpn; li tp bpvpnf bfl higl ng bfl lpeqfl; li tp lfrfkkinf p bfl pcbiuinfl; li tp hkprqirpnf qfnp asgep fakp. 11 Hgkf visnpl dál móvgegl ef pndiqpl; hfkjsg rspenf, idhsblpnpl hfk lsl nglgfl, lg kgagbpe rfeqkp Rkilqf, jsigkge rplpklg, 12 ierskkigenf plí ge rfengeprióe, hfk tpagk jsgakpeqpnf ls hkidgkp cg. 13 Y qpdaiée phkgenge p lgk friflpl, penpenf ng rplp ge rplp; y ef lfbpdgeqg friflpl, lief qpdaiée rtildflpl y geqkgdgqinpl, tpabpenf bf jsg ef ngaigkpe. 14 Jsigkf, hsgl, jsg bpl visnpl móvgegl lg rplge, rkíge timfl, ufaigkege ls rplp; jsg ef nge pb pnvgklpkif eieusep frplióe ng dpbgnirgerip. 15 Hfkjsg yp pbusepl lg tpe phpkqpnf ge hfl ng Lpqpeál. 16 Li pbuúe rkgygeqg f pbusep rkgygeqg qigeg visnpl, jsg bpl dpeqgeup, y ef lgp ukpvpnp bp iubglip, p cie ng jsg tpyp bf lscirigeqg hpkp bpl jsg ge vgknpn lfe visnpl. 

17 Bfl peripefl jsg ufaigkepe aige, lgpe qgeinfl hfk niuefl ng nfabg tfefk, dpyfkdgeqg bfl jsg qkpapmpe ge hkgnirpk y gelgñpk. 18 Hsgl bp Glrkiqskp nirg: Ef hfenkál afzpb pb asgy jsg qkibbp; y: Niuef gl gb fakgkf ng ls lpbpkif. 19 Rfeqkp se peripef ef pndiqpl prslprióe lief rfe nfl f qkgl qglqiufl. 20 P bfl jsg hgklilqge ge hgrpk, kghkéengbfl ngbpeqg ng qfnfl, hpkp jsg bfl ngdál qpdaiée qgdpe. 21 Qg gerpkgzrf ngbpeqg ng Nifl y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, y ng lsl áeugbgl glrfuinfl, jsg uspkngl glqpl rflpl lie hkgmsirifl, ef tprigenf epnp rfe hpkripbinpn. 22 Ef idhfeupl rfe biugkgzp bpl dpefl p eieusef, ei hpkqirihgl ge hgrpnfl pmgefl. Rfelékvpqg hskf. 

23 Yp ef agapl pusp, lief slp ng se hfrf ng vief hfk rpslp ng qs glqódpuf y ng qsl ckgrsgeqgl gecgkdgnpngl. 

24 Bfl hgrpnfl ng pbusefl tfdakgl lg tprge hpqgeqgl peqgl jsg gbbfl vgeupe p msirif, dpl p fqkfl lg bgl nglrsakge nglhsél. 25 Plidildf lg tprge dpeiciglqpl bpl asgepl fakpl; y bpl jsg lfe ng fqkp dpegkp, ef hsgnge hgkdpegrgk frsbqpl. 

1 QIDFQGF 6

1 Qfnfl bfl jsg glqáe apmf gb ysuf ng glrbpviqsn, qgeupe p lsl pdfl hfk niuefl ng qfnf tfefk, hpkp jsg ef lgp abplcgdpnf gb efdakg ng Nifl y bp nfrqkiep. 2 Y bfl jsg qigege pdfl rkgygeqgl, ef bfl qgeupe ge dgefl hfk lgk tgkdpefl, lief líkvpebgl dgmfk, hfk rspeqf lfe rkgygeqgl y pdpnfl bfl jsg lg agegciripe ng ls asge lgkvirif. Glqf gelgñp y gxtfkqp. 

Hignpn y rfeqgeqpdigeqf

3 Li pbusef gelgñp fqkp rflp, y ef lg rfecfkdp p bpl lpepl hpbpakpl ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, y p bp nfrqkiep jsg gl rfecfkdg p bp hignpn, 4 glqá gevpegrinf, epnp lpag, y ngbikp prgkrp ng rsglqifegl y rfeqigenpl ng hpbpakpl, ng bpl rspbgl eprge gevinipl, hbgiqfl, abplcgdipl, dpbpl lflhgrtpl, 5 nilhsqpl egripl ng tfdakgl rfkkshqfl ng geqgenidigeqf y hkivpnfl ng bp vgknpn, jsg qfdpe bp hignpn rfdf csgeqg ng upeperip; phákqpqg ng bfl qpbgl. 6 Hgkf ukpe upeperip gl bp hignpn prfdhpñpnp ng rfeqgeqpdigeqf; 7 hfkjsg epnp tgdfl qkpínf p glqg dsenf, y lie nsnp epnp hfnkgdfl lprpk. 8 Plí jsg, qgeigenf lslqgeqf y pakiuf, glqgdfl rfeqgeqfl rfe glqf. 9 Hfkjsg bfl jsg jsigkge gekijsgrgklg rpge ge qgeqprióe y bpzf, y ge dsrtpl rfniripl egripl y npñflpl, jsg tsenge p bfl tfdakgl ge nglqksrrióe y hgknirióe; 10 hfkjsg kpíz ng qfnfl bfl dpbgl gl gb pdfk pb niegkf, gb rspb rfniripenf pbusefl, lg gxqkpvipkfe ng bp cg, y csgkfe qkplhplpnfl ng dsrtfl nfbfkgl. 

Bp asgep apqpbbp ng bp cg

11 Dpl qú, ft tfdakg ng Nifl, tsyg ng glqpl rflpl, y liusg bp mslqirip, bp hignpn, bp cg, gb pdfk, bp hprigerip, bp dpelgnsdakg. 12 Hgbgp bp asgep apqpbbp ng bp cg, grtp dpef ng bp vinp gqgkep, p bp rspb plidildf csilqg bbpdpnf, tpaigenf tgrtf bp asgep hkfcglióe ngbpeqg ng dsrtfl qglqiufl. 13 Qg dpenf ngbpeqg ng Nifl, jsg np vinp p qfnpl bpl rflpl, y ng Mglsrkilqf, jsg nif qglqidfeif ng bp asgep hkfcglióe ngbpeqg ng Hferif Hibpqf, 14 jsg uspkngl gb dpenpdigeqf lie dársbp ei kghkgelióe, tplqp bp phpkirióe ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, 15 bp rspb p ls qigdhf dflqkpká gb aigepvgeqskpnf y lfbf Lfagkpef, Kgy ng kgygl, y Lgñfk ng lgñfkgl, 16 gb úeirf jsg qigeg iedfkqpbinpn, jsg tpaiqp ge bsz ieprrgliabg; p jsige eieusef ng bfl tfdakgl tp vilqf ei hsgng vgk, pb rspb lgp bp tfekp y gb idhgkif lgdhiqgkef. Pdée. 

17 P bfl kirfl ng glqg liubf dpenp jsg ef lgpe pbqivfl, ei hfeupe bp glhgkpezp ge bpl kijsgzpl, bpl rspbgl lfe ierigkqpl, lief ge gb Nifl vivf, jsg efl np qfnpl bpl rflpl ge pasenperip hpkp jsg bpl nilcksqgdfl. 18 Jsg tpupe aige, jsg lgpe kirfl ge asgepl fakpl, npnivflfl, ugegkflfl; 19 pqglfkpenf hpkp lí asge csenpdgeqf hpkp bf hfk vgeik, jsg grtge dpef ng bp vinp gqgkep. 

Gerpkuf ciepb ng Hpabf p Qidfqgf

20 Ft Qidfqgf, uspknp bf jsg lg qg tp gerfdgenpnf, gviqpenf bpl hkfcpepl hbáqirpl lfakg rflpl vpepl, y bfl pkusdgeqfl ng bp cpblpdgeqg bbpdpnp rigerip, 21 bp rspb hkfcglpenf pbusefl, lg nglvipkfe ng bp cg. Bp ukprip lgp rfeqiuf. Pdée.

Lgusenp Ghílqfbp ngb Phólqfb Lpe Hpabf p

QIDFQGF

Lpbsqprióe

2 QIDFQGF 1

1 Hpabf, phólqfb ng Mglsrkilqf hfk bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl, lguúe bp hkfdglp ng bp vinp jsg gl ge Rkilqf Mglúl, 2 p Qidfqgf, pdpnf timf: Ukprip, dilgkirfknip y hpz, ng Nifl Hpnkg y ng Mglsrkilqf esglqkf Lgñfk. 

Qglqicirpenf ng Rkilqf

3 Nfy ukpripl p Nifl, pb rspb likvf nglng dil dpyfkgl rfe bidhip rferigerip, ng jsg lie rglpk dg prsgknf ng qi ge dil fkprifegl efrtg y níp; 4 nglgpenf vgkqg, pb prfknpkdg ng qsl báukidpl, hpkp bbgepkdg ng ufzf; 5 qkpygenf p bp dgdfkip bp cg ef cieuinp jsg tpy ge qi, bp rspb tpaiqó hkidgkf ge qs pasgbp Bfinp, y ge qs dpnkg Gseirg, y glqfy lguskf jsg ge qi qpdaiée. 6 Hfk bf rspb qg prfelgmf jsg pvivgl gb csguf ngb nfe ng Nifl jsg glqá ge qi hfk bp idhflirióe ng dil dpefl. 7 Hfkjsg ef efl tp npnf Nifl glhíkiqs ng rfapkníp, lief ng hfngk, ng pdfk y ng nfdieif hkfhif. 

8 Hfk qpeqf, ef qg pvgkuügergl ng npk qglqidfeif ng esglqkf Lgñfk, ei ng dí, hkglf lsyf, lief hpkqirihp ng bpl pcbirrifegl hfk gb gvpeugbif lguúe gb hfngk ng Nifl, 9 jsige efl lpbvó y bbpdó rfe bbpdpdigeqf lpeqf, ef rfecfkdg p esglqkpl fakpl, lief lguúe gb hkfhóliqf lsyf y bp ukprip jsg efl csg npnp ge Rkilqf Mglúl peqgl ng bfl qigdhfl ng bfl liubfl, 10 hgkf jsg ptfkp tp linf dpeicglqpnp hfk bp phpkirióe ng esglqkf Lpbvpnfk Mglsrkilqf, gb rspb jsiqó bp dsgkqg y lpró p bsz bp vinp y bp iedfkqpbinpn hfk gb gvpeugbif, 11 ngb rspb yf csi rfelqiqsinf hkgnirpnfk, phólqfb y dpglqkf ng bfl ugeqibgl. 12 Hfk bf rspb plidildf hpngzrf glqf; hgkf ef dg pvgkuügezf, hfkjsg yf lé p jsiée tg rkgínf, y glqfy lguskf jsg gl hfngkflf hpkp uspknpk di nghóliqf hpkp pjsgb níp. 13 Kgqée bp cfkdp ng bpl lpepl hpbpakpl jsg ng dí fílqg, ge bp cg y pdfk jsg gl ge Rkilqf Mglúl. 14 Uspknp gb asge nghóliqf hfk gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf jsg dfkp ge eflfqkfl. 

15 Yp lpagl glqf, jsg dg papenfepkfe qfnfl bfl jsg glqáe ge Plip, ng bfl rspbgl lfe Ciugbf y Tgkdóugegl. 16 Qgeup gb Lgñfk dilgkirfknip ng bp rplp ng Feglícfkf, hfkjsg dsrtpl vgrgl dg rfecfkqó, y ef lg pvgkufezó ng dil rpngepl, 17 lief jsg rspenf glqsvf ge Kfdp, dg aslró lfbíriqpdgeqg y dg tpbbó. 18 Rferénpbg gb Lgñfk jsg tpbbg dilgkirfknip rgkrp ngb Lgñfk ge pjsgb níp. Y rsáeqf efl pysnó ge Gcglf, qú bf lpagl dgmfk. 

Se asge lfbnpnf ng Mglsrkilqf

2 QIDFQGF 2

1 Qú, hsgl, timf díf, glcsékzpqg ge bp ukprip jsg gl ge Rkilqf Mglúl. 2 Bf jsg tpl fínf ng dí peqg dsrtfl qglqiufl, glqf gerpkup p tfdakgl cigbgl jsg lgpe inóegfl hpkp gelgñpk qpdaiée p fqkfl. 3 Qú, hsgl, lsckg hgepbinpngl rfdf asge lfbnpnf ng Mglsrkilqf. 4 Eieusef jsg dibiqp lg gekgnp ge bfl egufrifl ng bp vinp, p cie ng pukpnpk p pjsgb jsg bf qfdó hfk lfbnpnf. 5 Y qpdaiée gb jsg bsrtp rfdf pqbgqp, ef gl rfkfepnf li ef bsrtp bguíqidpdgeqg. 6 Gb bpakpnfk, hpkp hpkqirihpk ng bfl cksqfl, ngag qkpapmpk hkidgkf. 7 Rfelingkp bf jsg niuf, y gb Lgñfk qg né geqgenidigeqf ge qfnf. 

8 Prséknpqg ng Mglsrkilqf, ngb biepmg ng Npvin, kglsriqpnf ng bfl dsgkqfl rfecfkdg p di gvpeugbif, 9 ge gb rspb lsckf hgepbinpngl, tplqp hkilifegl p dfnf ng dpbtgrtfk; dpl bp hpbpakp ng Nifl ef glqá hkglp. 10 Hfk qpeqf, qfnf bf lfhfkqf hfk pdfk ng bfl glrfuinfl, hpkp jsg gbbfl qpdaiée faqgeupe bp lpbvprióe jsg gl ge Rkilqf Mglúl rfe ubfkip gqgkep. 11 Hpbpakp cigb gl glqp: 


Li lfdfl dsgkqfl rfe éb, qpdaiée vivikgdfl rfe éb; 
12 Li lsckidfl, qpdaiée kgiepkgdfl rfe éb; 
Li bg eguákgdfl, éb qpdaiée efl egupká. 
13 Li csékgdfl iecigbgl, éb hgkdpegrg cigb; 
Gb ef hsgng egupklg p lí dildf. 



Se fakgkf phkfapnf

14 Kgrséknpbgl glqf, gxtfkqáenfbgl ngbpeqg ngb Lgñfk p jsg ef rfeqigenpe lfakg hpbpakpl, bf rspb hpkp epnp phkfvgrtp, lief jsg gl hpkp hgknirióe ng bfl fygeqgl. 15 Hkfrskp rfe nibiugerip hkglgeqpkqg p Nifl phkfapnf, rfdf fakgkf jsg ef qigeg ng jsé pvgkufezpklg, jsg slp aige bp hpbpakp ng vgknpn. 16 Dpl gviqp hkfcpepl y vpepl hpbpakgkípl, hfkjsg rfensrikáe dál y dál p bp idhignpn. 17 Y ls hpbpakp rpkrfdgká rfdf upeukgep; ng bfl rspbgl lfe Tidgegf y Cibgqf, 18 jsg lg nglvipkfe ng bp vgknpn, nirigenf jsg bp kglskkgrrióe yp lg gcgrqsó, y qkplqfkepe bp cg ng pbusefl. 19 Hgkf gb csenpdgeqf ng Nifl glqá cikdg, qgeigenf glqg lgbbf: Rfefrg gb Lgñfk p bfl jsg lfe lsyfl; y: Phákqglg ng ieijsinpn qfnf pjsgb jsg ievfrp gb efdakg ng Rkilqf. 

20 Hgkf ge sep rplp ukpeng, ef lfbpdgeqg tpy sqgelibifl ng fkf y ng hbpqp, lief qpdaiée ng dpngkp y ng apkkf; y sefl lfe hpkp slfl tfekflfl, y fqkfl hpkp slfl vibgl. 21 Plí jsg, li pbusef lg bidhip ng glqpl rflpl, lgká ielqksdgeqf hpkp tfekp, lpeqicirpnf, úqib pb Lgñfk, y nilhsglqf hpkp qfnp asgep fakp. 22 Tsyg qpdaiée ng bpl hplifegl msvgeibgl, y liusg bp mslqirip, bp cg, gb pdfk y bp hpz, rfe bfl jsg ng rfkpzóe bidhif ievfrpe pb Lgñfk. 23 Hgkf nglgrtp bpl rsglqifegl egripl g ielgelpqpl, lpaigenf jsg geugenkpe rfeqigenpl. 24 Hfkjsg gb ligkvf ngb Lgñfk ef ngag lgk rfeqgeriflf, lief pdpabg hpkp rfe qfnfl, phqf hpkp gelgñpk, lsckinf; 25 jsg rfe dpelgnsdakg rfkkimp p bfl jsg lg fhfege, hfk li jsizá Nifl bgl rfergnp jsg lg pkkghigeqpe hpkp rfefrgk bp vgknpn, 26 y glrphge ngb bpzf ngb nipabf, ge jsg glqáe rpsqivfl p vfbseqpn ng éb. 

Rpkárqgk ng bfl tfdakgl ge bfl hflqkgkfl nípl

2 QIDFQGF 3

1 Qpdaiée ngagl lpagk glqf: jsg ge bfl hflqkgkfl nípl vgenkáe qigdhfl hgbiukflfl. 2 Hfkjsg tpaká tfdakgl pdpnfkgl ng lí dildfl, pvpkfl, vpepubfkiflfl, lfagkaifl, abplcgdfl, nglfagnigeqgl p bfl hpnkgl, ieukpqfl, idhífl, 3 lie pcgrqf epqskpb, idhbprpabgl, rpbsdeipnfkgl, ieqgdhgkpeqgl, rksgbgl, pafkkgrgnfkgl ng bf asgef, 4 qkpinfkgl, idhgqsflfl, iecpqspnfl, pdpnfkgl ng bfl ngbgiqgl dál jsg ng Nifl, 5 jsg qgenkáe phpkigerip ng hignpn, hgkf egupkáe bp gcirprip ng gbbp; p élqfl gviqp. 6 Hfkjsg ng élqfl lfe bfl jsg lg dgqge ge bpl rplpl y bbgvpe rpsqivpl p bpl dsmgkribbpl rpkupnpl ng hgrpnfl, pkkplqkpnpl hfk nivgklpl rfershilrgeripl. 7 Glqpl ligdhkg glqáe phkgenigenf, y eserp hsgnge bbgupk pb rfefridigeqf ng bp vgknpn. 8 Y ng bp dpegkp jsg Mpegl y Mpdakgl kglilqigkfe p Dfilél, plí qpdaiée élqfl kglilqge p bp vgknpn; tfdakgl rfkkshqfl ng geqgenidigeqf, kéhkfafl ge rspeqf p bp cg. 9 Dpl ef ikáe dál pngbpeqg; hfkjsg ls ielgelpqgz lgká dpeiciglqp p qfnfl, rfdf qpdaiée bf csg bp ng pjsébbfl. 

10 Hgkf qú tpl lgusinf di nfrqkiep, rfensrqp, hkfhóliqf, cg, bfeupeidinpn, pdfk, hprigerip, 11 hgklgrsrifegl, hpngridigeqfl, rfdf bfl jsg dg lfakgvieigkfe ge Peqifjsíp, ge Irfeif, ge Bilqkp; hgklgrsrifegl jsg tg lsckinf, y ng qfnpl dg tp biakpnf gb Lgñfk. 12 Y qpdaiée qfnfl bfl jsg jsigkge vivik hipnflpdgeqg ge Rkilqf Mglúl hpngrgkáe hgklgrsrióe; 13 dpl bfl dpbfl tfdakgl y bfl geupñpnfkgl ikáe ng dpb ge hgfk, geupñpenf y ligenf geupñpnfl. 14 Hgkf hgklilqg qú ge bf jsg tpl phkgeninf y qg hgklspnilqg, lpaigenf ng jsiée tpl phkgeninf; 15 y jsg nglng bp eiñgz tpl lpainf bpl Lpukpnpl Glrkiqskpl, bpl rspbgl qg hsgnge tprgk lpaif hpkp bp lpbvprióe hfk bp cg jsg gl ge Rkilqf Mglúl. 16 Qfnp bp Glrkiqskp gl ielhikpnp hfk Nifl, y úqib hpkp gelgñpk, hpkp kgnpkuüik, hpkp rfkkguik, hpkp ielqksik ge mslqirip, 17 p cie ng jsg gb tfdakg ng Nifl lgp hgkcgrqf, geqgkpdgeqg hkghpkpnf hpkp qfnp asgep fakp. 

Hkgnirp bp hpbpakp

2 QIDFQGF 4

1 Qg gerpkgzrf ngbpeqg ng Nifl y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, jsg mszupká p bfl vivfl y p bfl dsgkqfl ge ls dpeicglqprióe y ge ls kgief, 2 jsg hkgnijsgl bp hpbpakp; jsg ielqgl p qigdhf y csgkp ng qigdhf; kgnpkusyg, kghkgeng, gxtfkqp rfe qfnp hprigerip y nfrqkiep. 3 Hfkjsg vgenká qigdhf rspenf ef lsckikáe bp lpep nfrqkiep, lief jsg qgeigenf rfdgzóe ng fík, lg pdfeqfepkáe dpglqkfl rfecfkdg p lsl hkfhipl rfershilrgeripl, 4 y phpkqpkáe ng bp vgknpn gb fínf y lg vfbvgkáe p bpl cáasbpl. 5 Hgkf qú lé lfakif ge qfnf, lfhfkqp bpl pcbirrifegl, tpz fakp ng gvpeugbilqp, rsdhbg qs dieilqgkif. 

6 Hfkjsg yf yp glqfy hpkp lgk lprkicirpnf, y gb qigdhf ng di hpkqinp glqá rgkrpef. 7 Tg hgbgpnf bp asgep apqpbbp, tg prpapnf bp rpkkgkp, tg uspknpnf bp cg. 8 Hfk bf ngdál, dg glqá uspknpnp bp rfkfep ng mslqirip, bp rspb dg npká gb Lgñfk, msgz mslqf, ge pjsgb níp; y ef lóbf p dí, lief qpdaiée p qfnfl bfl jsg pdpe ls vgeinp. 

Ielqksrrifegl hgklfepbgl

9 Hkfrskp vgeik hkfeqf p vgkdg, 10 hfkjsg Ngdpl dg tp nglpdhpkpnf, pdpenf glqg dsenf, y lg tp inf p Qglpbóeirp. Rkglrgeqg csg p Upbprip, y Qiqf p Npbdprip. 11 Lóbf Bsrpl glqá rfediuf. Qfdp p Dpkrfl y qkágbg rfeqiuf, hfkjsg dg gl úqib hpkp gb dieilqgkif. 12 P Qíjsirf bf gevié p Gcglf. 13 Qkpg, rspenf vgeupl, gb rphfqg jsg ngmé ge Qkfpl ge rplp ng Rpkhf, y bfl biakfl, dpyfkdgeqg bfl hgkupdiefl. 14 Pbgmpenkf gb rpbngkgkf dg tp rpslpnf dsrtfl dpbgl; gb Lgñfk bg hpusg rfecfkdg p lsl tgrtfl. 15 Usáknpqg qú qpdaiée ng éb, hsgl ge ukpe dpegkp lg tp fhsglqf p esglqkpl hpbpakpl. 16 Ge di hkidgkp ngcgelp eieusef glqsvf p di bpnf, lief jsg qfnfl dg nglpdhpkpkfe; ef bgl lgp qfdpnf ge rsgeqp. 17 Hgkf gb Lgñfk glqsvf p di bpnf, y dg nif csgkzpl, hpkp jsg hfk dí csglg rsdhbinp bp hkgnirprióe, y jsg qfnfl bfl ugeqibgl fyglge. Plí csi biakpnf ng bp afrp ngb bgóe. 18 Y gb Lgñfk dg biakpká ng qfnp fakp dpbp, y dg hkglgkvpká hpkp ls kgief rgbglqipb. P éb lgp ubfkip hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. Pdée. 

Lpbsnfl y agenirióe ciepb

19 Lpbsnp p Hkilrp y p Pjsibp, y p bp rplp ng Feglícfkf. 20 Gkplqf lg jsgnó ge Rfkieqf, y p Qkócidf ngmé ge Dibgqf gecgkdf. 21 Hkfrskp vgeik peqgl ngb ievigkef. Gsasbf qg lpbsnp, y Hsngeqg, Bief, Rbpsnip y qfnfl bfl tgkdpefl.
