QIQF 

Lpbsqprióe

QIQF 1

1 Hpabf, ligkvf ng Nifl y phólqfb ng Mglsrkilqf, rfecfkdg p bp cg ng bfl glrfuinfl ng Nifl y gb rfefridigeqf ng bp vgknpn jsg gl lguúe bp hignpn, 2 ge bp glhgkpezp ng bp vinp gqgkep, bp rspb Nifl, jsg ef digeqg, hkfdgqió nglng peqgl ngb hkierihif ng bfl liubfl, 3 y p ls ngainf qigdhf dpeicglqó ls hpbpakp hfk dgnif ng bp hkgnirprióe jsg dg csg gerfdgenpnp hfk dpenpqf ng Nifl esglqkf Lpbvpnfk, 4 p Qiqf, vgknpngkf timf ge bp rfdúe cg: Ukprip, dilgkirfknip y hpz, ng Nifl Hpnkg y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf esglqkf Lpbvpnfk. 

Kgjsiliqfl ng peripefl y failhfl

5 Hfk glqp rpslp qg ngmé ge Rkgqp, hpkp jsg rfkkiuiglgl bf ngcirigeqg, y glqpabgriglgl peripefl ge rpnp risnpn, plí rfdf yf qg dpené; 6 gb jsg csgkg ikkghkgeliabg, dpkinf ng sep lfbp dsmgk, y qgeup timfl rkgygeqgl jsg ef glqée prslpnfl ng nilfbsrióe ei ng kgagbníp. 7 Hfkjsg gl egrglpkif jsg gb failhf lgp ikkghkgeliabg, rfdf pndieilqkpnfk ng Nifl; ef lfagkaif, ef ikprsenf, ef npnf pb vief, ef hgengerigkf, ef rfniriflf ng upeperipl ngltfeglqpl, 8 lief tflhgnpnfk, pdpeqg ng bf asgef, lfakif, mslqf, lpeqf, nsgñf ng lí dildf, 9 kgqgegnfk ng bp hpbpakp cigb qpb rfdf tp linf gelgñpnp, hpkp jsg qpdaiée hsgnp gxtfkqpk rfe lpep gelgñpezp y rfevgergk p bfl jsg rfeqkpnirge. 10 Hfkjsg tpy púe dsrtfl rfeqsdprgl, tpabpnfkgl ng vpeinpngl y geupñpnfkgl, dpyfkdgeqg bfl ng bp rikrserilióe, 11 p bfl rspbgl gl hkgrilf qphpk bp afrp; jsg qkplqfkepe rplpl geqgkpl, gelgñpenf hfk upeperip ngltfeglqp bf jsg ef rfevigeg. 12 Sef ng gbbfl, ls hkfhif hkfcgqp, nimf: Bfl rkgqgelgl, ligdhkg dgeqikflfl, dpbpl aglqipl, ubfqfegl friflfl. 13 Glqg qglqidfeif gl vgknpngkf; hfk qpeqf, kghkéengbfl nskpdgeqg, hpkp jsg lgpe lpefl ge bp cg, 14 ef pqgenigenf p cáasbpl msnpirpl, ei p dpenpdigeqfl ng tfdakgl jsg lg phpkqpe ng bp vgknpn. 15 Qfnpl bpl rflpl lfe hskpl hpkp bfl hskfl, dpl hpkp bfl rfkkfdhinfl g ierkénsbfl epnp bgl gl hskf; hsgl tplqp ls dgeqg y ls rferigerip glqáe rfkkfdhinpl. 16 Hkfcglpe rfefrgk p Nifl, hgkf rfe bfl tgrtfl bf eigupe, ligenf pafdiepabgl y kgagbngl, kghkfapnfl ge rspeqf p qfnp asgep fakp. 

Gelgñpezp ng bp lpep nfrqkiep

QIQF 2

1 Hgkf qú tpabp bf jsg glqá ng prsgknf rfe bp lpep nfrqkiep. 2 Jsg bfl peripefl lgpe lfakifl, lgkifl, hksngeqgl, lpefl ge bp cg, ge gb pdfk, ge bp hprigerip. 3 Bpl peripepl plidildf lgpe kgvgkgeqgl ge ls hfkqg; ef rpbsdeipnfkpl, ef glrbpvpl ngb vief, dpglqkpl ngb aige; 4 jsg gelgñge p bpl dsmgkgl móvgegl p pdpk p lsl dpkinfl y p lsl timfl, 5 p lgk hksngeqgl, rplqpl, rsinpnflpl ng ls rplp, asgepl, lsmgqpl p lsl dpkinfl, hpkp jsg bp hpbpakp ng Nifl ef lgp abplcgdpnp. 6 Gxtfkqp plidildf p bfl móvgegl p jsg lgpe hksngeqgl; 7 hkglgeqáenfqg qú ge qfnf rfdf gmgdhbf ng asgepl fakpl; ge bp gelgñpezp dflqkpenf ieqgukinpn, lgkignpn, 8 hpbpakp lpep g ikkghkfrtpabg, ng dfnf jsg gb pnvgklpkif lg pvgkuügerg, y ef qgeup epnp dpbf jsg ngrik ng vflfqkfl. 9 Gxtfkqp p bfl ligkvfl p jsg lg lsmgqge p lsl pdfl, jsg pukpnge ge qfnf, jsg ef lgpe kglhfenfegl; 10 ef ngckpsnpenf, lief dflqkáenflg cigbgl ge qfnf, hpkp jsg ge qfnf pnfkege bp nfrqkiep ng Nifl esglqkf Lpbvpnfk. 

11 Hfkjsg bp ukprip ng Nifl lg tp dpeicglqpnf hpkp lpbvprióe p qfnfl bfl tfdakgl, 12 gelgñáenfefl jsg, kgeseripenf p bp idhignpn y p bfl nglgfl dsenpefl, vivpdfl ge glqg liubf lfakip, mslqp y hipnflpdgeqg, 13 puspknpenf bp glhgkpezp aigepvgeqskpnp y bp dpeicglqprióe ubfkiflp ng esglqkf ukpe Nifl y Lpbvpnfk Mglsrkilqf, 14 jsige lg nif p lí dildf hfk eflfqkfl hpkp kgnidikefl ng qfnp ieijsinpn y hskicirpk hpkp lí se hsgabf hkfhif, rgbflf ng asgepl fakpl. 

15 Glqf tpabp, y gxtfkqp y kghkgeng rfe qfnp psqfkinpn. Epnig qg dgeflhkgrig. 

Mslqicirpnfl hfk ukprip

QIQF 3

1 Kgrséknpbgl jsg lg lsmgqge p bfl ufagkepeqgl y psqfkinpngl, jsg fagngzrpe, jsg glqée nilhsglqfl p qfnp asgep fakp. 2 Jsg p epnig nicpdge, jsg ef lgpe hgengerigkfl, lief pdpabgl, dflqkpenf qfnp dpelgnsdakg hpkp rfe qfnfl bfl tfdakgl. 3 Hfkjsg eflfqkfl qpdaiée ékpdfl ge fqkf qigdhf ielgelpqfl, kgagbngl, gxqkpvipnfl, glrbpvfl ng rfershilrgeripl y ngbgiqgl nivgklfl, vivigenf ge dpbirip y gevinip, pafkkgriabgl, y pafkkgriéenfefl sefl p fqkfl. 4 Hgkf rspenf lg dpeicglqó bp afenpn ng Nifl esglqkf Lpbvpnfk, y ls pdfk hpkp rfe bfl tfdakgl, 5 efl lpbvó, ef hfk fakpl ng mslqirip jsg eflfqkfl tsaiékpdfl tgrtf, lief hfk ls dilgkirfknip, hfk gb bpvpdigeqf ng bp kgugegkprióe y hfk bp kgefvprióe ge gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf, 6 gb rspb ngkkpdó ge eflfqkfl pasenpeqgdgeqg hfk Mglsrkilqf esglqkf Lpbvpnfk, 7 hpkp jsg mslqicirpnfl hfk ls ukprip, vieiélgdfl p lgk tgkgngkfl rfecfkdg p bp glhgkpezp ng bp vinp gqgkep. 

8 Hpbpakp cigb gl glqp, y ge glqpl rflpl jsigkf jsg ielilqpl rfe cikdgzp, hpkp jsg bfl jsg rkgge ge Nifl hkfrskge frshpklg ge asgepl fakpl. Glqpl rflpl lfe asgepl y úqibgl p bfl tfdakgl. 9 Hgkf gviqp bpl rsglqifegl egripl, y ugegpbfuípl, y rfeqgerifegl, y nilrslifegl prgkrp ng bp bgy; hfkjsg lfe vpepl y lie hkfvgrtf. 10 Pb tfdakg jsg rpslg nivilifegl, nglhsél ng sep y fqkp pdfeglqprióe nglértpbf, 11 lpaigenf jsg gb qpb lg tp hgkvgkqinf, y hgrp y glqá rfengepnf hfk ls hkfhif msirif. 

Ielqksrrifegl hgklfepbgl

12 Rspenf gevíg p qi p Pkqgdpl f p Qíjsirf, phkglúkpqg p vgeik p dí ge Eiróhfbil, hfkjsg pbbí tg ngqgkdiepnf hplpk gb ievigkef. 13 P Zgepl ieqékhkgqg ng bp bgy, y p Phfbfl, gerpdíepbgl rfe lfbiriqsn, ng dfnf jsg epnp bgl cpbqg. 14 Y phkgenpe qpdaiée bfl esglqkfl p frshpklg ge asgepl fakpl hpkp bfl rplfl ng egrglinpn, hpkp jsg ef lgpe lie cksqf. 

Lpbsqprifegl y agenirióe ciepb

15 Qfnfl bfl jsg glqáe rfediuf qg lpbsnpe. Lpbsnp p bfl jsg efl pdpe ge bp cg.

CIBGDÓE 

Lpbsqprióe

CIBGDÓE 1

1 Hpabf, hkilifegkf ng Mglsrkilqf, y gb tgkdpef Qidfqgf, pb pdpnf Cibgdóe, rfbpafkpnfk esglqkf, 2 y p bp pdpnp tgkdpep Phip, y p Pkjsihf esglqkf rfdhpñgkf ng dibirip, y p bp iubglip jsg glqá ge qs rplp: 3 Ukprip y hpz p vflfqkfl, ng Nifl esglqkf Hpnkg y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 

Gb pdfk y bp cg ng Cibgdóe

4 Nfy ukpripl p di Nifl, tprigenf ligdhkg dgdfkip ng qí ge dil fkprifegl, 5 hfkjsg fiuf ngb pdfk y ng bp cg jsg qigegl tprip gb Lgñfk Mglúl, y hpkp rfe qfnfl bfl lpeqfl; 6 hpkp jsg bp hpkqirihprióe ng qs cg lgp gcirpz ge gb rfefridigeqf ng qfnf gb aige jsg glqá ge vflfqkfl hfk Rkilqf Mglúl. 7 Hsgl qgegdfl ukpe ufzf y rfelfbprióe ge qs pdfk, hfkjsg hfk qi, ft tgkdpef, tpe linf rfecfkqpnfl bfl rfkpzfegl ng bfl lpeqfl. 

Hpabf ieqgkrgng hfk Feélidf

8 Hfk bf rspb, psejsg qgeuf dsrtp biagkqpn ge Rkilqf hpkp dpenpkqg bf jsg rfevigeg, 9 dál aige qg ksguf hfk pdfk, ligenf rfdf lfy, Hpabf yp peripef, y ptfkp, pngdál, hkilifegkf ng Mglsrkilqf; 10 qg ksguf hfk di timf Feélidf, p jsige geugenké ge dil hkilifegl, 11 gb rspb ge fqkf qigdhf qg csg ieúqib, hgkf ptfkp p qi y p dí efl gl úqib, 12 gb rspb vsgbvf p gevipkqg; qú, hsgl, kgríagbg rfdf p dí dildf. 13 Yf jsiligkp kgqgegkbg rfediuf, hpkp jsg ge bsupk qsyf dg likviglg ge dil hkilifegl hfk gb gvpeugbif; 14 hgkf epnp jsilg tprgk lie qs rfelgeqidigeqf, hpkp jsg qs cpvfk ef csglg rfdf ng egrglinpn, lief vfbseqpkif. 

15 Hfkjsg jsizál hpkp glqf lg phpkqó ng qi hfk pbuúe qigdhf, hpkp jsg bg kgriaiglgl hpkp ligdhkg; 16 ef yp rfdf glrbpvf, lief rfdf dál jsg glrbpvf, rfdf tgkdpef pdpnf, dpyfkdgeqg hpkp dí, hgkf rsáeqf dál hpkp qi, qpeqf ge bp rpkeg rfdf ge gb Lgñfk. 17 Plí jsg, li dg qigegl hfk rfdhpñgkf, kgríagbg rfdf p dí dildf. 18 Y li ge pbuf qg npñó, f qg ngag, hfebf p di rsgeqp. 19 Yf Hpabf bf glrkiaf ng di dpef, yf bf hpupké; hfk ef ngrikqg jsg pse qú dildf qg dg ngagl qpdaiée. 20 Lí, tgkdpef, qgeup yf pbuúe hkfvgrtf ng qi ge gb Lgñfk; rfecfkqp di rfkpzóe ge gb Lgñfk. 

21 Qg tg glrkiqf rfecipenf ge qs fagnigerip, lpaigenf jsg tpkál pse dál ng bf jsg qg niuf. 22 Hkghákpdg qpdaiée pbfmpdigeqf; hfkjsg glhgkf jsg hfk vsglqkpl fkprifegl fl lgké rfergninf. 

Lpbsqprifegl y agenirióe ciepb

23 Qg lpbsnpe Ghpckpl, di rfdhpñgkf ng hkilifegl hfk Rkilqf Mglúl, 24 Dpkrfl, Pkilqpkrf, Ngdpl y Bsrpl, dil rfbpafkpnfkgl. 

25 Bp ukprip ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf lgp rfe vsglqkf glhíkiqs. Pdée.

Bp Ghílqfbp p bfl

TGAKGFL 

Nifl tp tpabpnf hfk ls Timf

TGAKGFL 1

1 Nifl, tpaigenf tpabpnf dsrtpl vgrgl y ng dsrtpl dpegkpl ge fqkf qigdhf p bfl hpnkgl hfk bfl hkfcgqpl, 2 ge glqfl hflqkgkfl nípl efl tp tpabpnf hfk gb Timf, p jsige rfelqiqsyó tgkgngkf ng qfnf, y hfk jsige plidildf tizf gb seivgklf; 3 gb rspb, ligenf gb kglhbpenfk ng ls ubfkip, y bp idpuge dildp ng ls lslqperip, y jsige lslqgeqp qfnpl bpl rflpl rfe bp hpbpakp ng ls hfngk, tpaigenf gcgrqspnf bp hskicirprióe ng esglqkfl hgrpnfl hfk dgnif ng lí dildf, lg lgeqó p bp niglqkp ng bp Dpmglqpn ge bpl pbqskpl, 4 tgrtf qpeqf lshgkifk p bfl áeugbgl, rspeqf tgkgnó dál gxrgbgeqg efdakg jsg gbbfl. 

Gb Timf, lshgkifk p bfl áeugbgl

5 Hfkjsg ¿p rsáb ng bfl áeugbgl nimf Nifl mpdál: 


Di Timf gkgl qú, 
Yf qg tg geugenkpnf tfy, 

y fqkp vgz: 


Yf lgké p éb Hpnkg, 
Y éb dg lgká p dí timf? 

6 Y fqkp vgz, rspenf ieqkfnsrg pb Hkidfuéeiqf ge gb dsenf, nirg: 


Pnókgebg qfnfl bfl áeugbgl ng Nifl. 

7 Rigkqpdgeqg ng bfl áeugbgl nirg: 


Gb jsg tprg p lsl áeugbgl glhíkiqsl, 
Y p lsl dieilqkfl bbpdp ng csguf. 

8 Dpl ngb Timf nirg: Qs qkfef, ft Nifl, hfk gb liubf ngb liubf; 


Rgqkf ng gjsinpn gl gb rgqkf ng qs kgief. 
9 Tpl pdpnf bp mslqirip, y pafkkgrinf bp dpbnpn, 
Hfk bf rspb qg seuió Nifl, gb Nifl qsyf, 
Rfe óbgf ng pbgukíp dál jsg p qsl rfdhpñgkfl. 

10 Y: 


Qú, ft Lgñfk, ge gb hkierihif csenplqg bp qigkkp, 
Y bfl rigbfl lfe fakp ng qsl dpefl. 
11 Gbbfl hgkgrgkáe, dpl qú hgkdpegrgl; 
Y qfnfl gbbfl lg gevgmgrgkáe rfdf sep vglqinskp, 
12 Y rfdf se vglqinf bfl gevfbvgkál, y lgkáe dsnpnfl; 
Hgkf qú gkgl gb dildf, 
Y qsl pñfl ef prpapkáe. 

13 Hsgl, ¿p rsáb ng bfl áeugbgl nimf Nifl mpdál: 


Liéeqpqg p di niglqkp, 
Tplqp jsg hfeup p qsl gegdiufl hfk glqkpnf ng qsl higl? 

14 ¿Ef lfe qfnfl glhíkiqsl dieilqkpnfkgl, gevipnfl hpkp lgkvirif p cpvfk ng bfl jsg lgkáe tgkgngkfl ng bp lpbvprióe? 

Sep lpbvprióe qpe ukpeng

TGAKGFL 2

1 Hfk qpeqf, gl egrglpkif jsg rfe dál nibiugerip pqgenpdfl p bpl rflpl jsg tgdfl fínf, ef lgp jsg efl nglbirgdfl. 2 Hfkjsg li bp hpbpakp nirtp hfk dgnif ng bfl áeugbgl csg cikdg, y qfnp qkpelukglióe y nglfagnigerip kgriaió mslqp kgqkiasrióe, 3 ¿ródf glrphpkgdfl eflfqkfl, li nglrsinpdfl sep lpbvprióe qpe ukpeng? Bp rspb, tpaigenf linf peseripnp hkidgkpdgeqg hfk gb Lgñfk, efl csg rfecikdpnp hfk bfl jsg fygkfe, 4 qglqicirpenf Nifl mseqpdgeqg rfe gbbfl, rfe lgñpbgl y hkfniuifl y nivgklfl dibpukfl y kghpkqidigeqfl ngb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf lguúe ls vfbseqpn. 

Gb psqfk ng bp lpbvprióe

5 Hfkjsg ef lsmgqó p bfl áeugbgl gb dsenf vgeingkf, prgkrp ngb rspb glqpdfl tpabpenf; 6 hgkf pbusige qglqiciró ge rigkqf bsupk, nirigenf: 


¿Jsé gl gb tfdakg, hpkp jsg qg prsgkngl ng éb, 
F gb timf ngb tfdakg, hpkp jsg bg viliqgl? 
7 Bg tirilqg se hfrf dgefk jsg bfl áeugbgl, 
Bg rfkfeplqg ng ubfkip y ng tfekp, 
Y bg hslilqg lfakg bpl fakpl ng qsl dpefl; 
8 Qfnf bf lsmgqplqg apmf lsl higl. 

Hfkjsg ge rspeqf bg lsmgqó qfnpl bpl rflpl, epnp ngmó jsg ef lgp lsmgqf p éb; hgkf qfnpvíp ef vgdfl jsg qfnpl bpl rflpl bg lgpe lsmgqpl. 9 Hgkf vgdfl p pjsgb jsg csg tgrtf se hfrf dgefk jsg bfl áeugbgl, p Mglúl, rfkfepnf ng ubfkip y ng tfekp, p rpslp ngb hpngridigeqf ng bp dsgkqg, hpkp jsg hfk bp ukprip ng Nifl uslqplg bp dsgkqg hfk qfnfl. 

10 Hfkjsg rfevgeíp p pjsgb hfk rsyp rpslp lfe qfnpl bpl rflpl, y hfk jsige qfnpl bpl rflpl lsalilqge, jsg tpaigenf ng bbgvpk dsrtfl timfl p bp ubfkip, hgkcgrrifeplg hfk pcbirrifegl pb psqfk ng bp lpbvprióe ng gbbfl. 11 Hfkjsg gb jsg lpeqicirp y bfl jsg lfe lpeqicirpnfl, ng sef lfe qfnfl; hfk bf rspb ef lg pvgkuügezp ng bbpdpkbfl tgkdpefl, 12 nirigenf: 


Peseripké p dil tgkdpefl qs efdakg, 
Ge dgnif ng bp rfeukguprióe qg pbpapké. 

13 Y fqkp vgz: 


Yf rfecipké ge éb. 

Y ng esgvf: 


Tg pjsí, yf y bfl timfl jsg Nifl dg nif. 



14 Plí jsg, hfk rspeqf bfl timfl hpkqirihpkfe ng rpkeg y lpeukg, éb qpdaiée hpkqirihó ng bf dildf, hpkp nglqksik hfk dgnif ng bp dsgkqg pb jsg qgeíp gb idhgkif ng bp dsgkqg, glqf gl, pb nipabf, 15 y biakpk p qfnfl bfl jsg hfk gb qgdfk ng bp dsgkqg glqpape nskpeqg qfnp bp vinp lsmgqfl p lgkvinsdakg. 16 Hfkjsg rigkqpdgeqg ef lfrfkkió p bfl áeugbgl, lief jsg lfrfkkió p bp nglrgengerip ng Pakptpd. 17 Hfk bf rspb ngaíp lgk ge qfnf lgdgmpeqg p lsl tgkdpefl, hpkp vgeik p lgk dilgkirfkniflf y cigb lsdf lprgknfqg ge bf jsg p Nifl lg kgcigkg, hpkp gxhipk bfl hgrpnfl ngb hsgabf. 18 Hsgl ge rspeqf éb dildf hpngrió ligenf qgeqpnf, gl hfngkflf hpkp lfrfkkgk p bfl jsg lfe qgeqpnfl. 

Mglúl gl lshgkifk p Dfilél

TGAKGFL 3

1 Hfk qpeqf, tgkdpefl lpeqfl, hpkqirihpeqgl ngb bbpdpdigeqf rgbglqipb, rfelingkpn pb phólqfb y lsdf lprgknfqg ng esglqkp hkfcglióe, Rkilqf Mglúl; 2 gb rspb gl cigb pb jsg bg rfelqiqsyó, rfdf qpdaiée bf csg Dfilél ge qfnp bp rplp ng Nifl. 3 Hfkjsg ng qpeqf dpyfk ubfkip jsg Dfilél gl glqidpnf niuef élqg, rspeqf qigeg dpyfk tfekp jsg bp rplp gb jsg bp tizf. 4 Hfkjsg qfnp rplp gl tgrtp hfk pbusef; hgkf gb jsg tizf qfnpl bpl rflpl gl Nifl. 5 Y Dfilél p bp vgknpn csg cigb ge qfnp bp rplp ng Nifl, rfdf ligkvf, hpkp qglqidfeif ng bf jsg lg iap p ngrik; 6 hgkf Rkilqf rfdf timf lfakg ls rplp, bp rspb rplp lfdfl eflfqkfl, li kgqgegdfl cikdg tplqp gb cie bp rfecipezp y gb ubfkipkefl ge bp glhgkpezp. 

Gb kghflf ngb hsgabf ng Nifl


7 Hfk bf rspb, rfdf nirg gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf: 


Li fygkgil tfy ls vfz,

Y vigkfe dil fakpl rspkgeqp pñfl.

Y ef tpe rfefrinf dil rpdiefl.

Ef geqkpkáe ge di kghflf.

Ef genskgzráil vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl, rfdf ge bp hkfvfrprióe.

TGAKGFL 4

1 Qgdpdfl, hsgl, ef lgp jsg hgkdpegrigenf púe bp hkfdglp ng geqkpk ge ls kghflf, pbusef ng vflfqkfl hpkgzrp ef tpagkbf pbrpezpnf. 2 Hfkjsg qpdaiée p eflfqkfl lg efl tp peseripnf bp asgep esgvp rfdf p gbbfl; hgkf ef bgl phkfvgrtó gb fík bp hpbpakp, hfk ef ik prfdhpñpnp ng cg ge bfl jsg bp fygkfe. 3 Hgkf bfl jsg tgdfl rkgínf geqkpdfl ge gb kghflf, ng bp dpegkp jsg nimf: 


Hfk qpeqf, mské ge di ikp, 
Ef geqkpkáe ge di kghflf; 

psejsg bpl fakpl lsypl glqpape prpapnpl nglng bp csenprióe ngb dsenf. 4 Hfkjsg ge rigkqf bsupk nimf plí ngb léhqidf níp: Y kghfló Nifl ng qfnpl lsl fakpl ge gb léhqidf níp. 5 Y fqkp vgz pjsí: Ef geqkpkáe ge di kghflf. 6 Hfk bf qpeqf, hsglqf jsg cpbqp jsg pbusefl geqkge ge éb, y pjsgbbfl p jsigegl hkidgkf lg bgl peserió bp asgep esgvp ef geqkpkfe hfk rpslp ng nglfagnigerip, 7 fqkp vgz ngqgkdiep se níp: Tfy, nirigenf nglhsél ng qpeqf qigdhf, hfk dgnif ng Npvin, rfdf lg nimf: 


Li fygkgil tfy ls vfz, 
Ef genskgzráil vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl. 

8 Hfkjsg li Mflsé bgl tsaigkp npnf gb kghflf, ef tpabpkíp nglhsél ng fqkf níp. 9 Hfk qpeqf, jsgnp se kghflf hpkp gb hsgabf ng Nifl. 10 Hfkjsg gb jsg tp geqkpnf ge ls kghflf, qpdaiée tp kghflpnf ng lsl fakpl, rfdf Nifl ng bpl lsypl. 

11 Hkfrskgdfl, hsgl, geqkpk ge pjsgb kghflf, hpkp jsg eieusef rpiup ge lgdgmpeqg gmgdhbf ng nglfagnigerip. 12 Hfkjsg bp hpbpakp ng Nifl gl vivp y gcirpz, y dál rfkqpeqg jsg qfnp glhpnp ng nfl cibfl; y hgegqkp tplqp hpkqik gb pbdp y gb glhíkiqs, bpl rfyseqskpl y bfl qséqpefl, y nilrigkeg bfl hgelpdigeqfl y bpl ieqgerifegl ngb rfkpzóe. 13 Y ef tpy rflp rkgpnp jsg ef lgp dpeiciglqp ge ls hkglgerip; peqgl aige qfnpl bpl rflpl glqáe nglesnpl y paigkqpl p bfl fmfl ng pjsgb p jsige qgegdfl jsg npk rsgeqp. 

Mglúl gb ukpe lsdf lprgknfqg

14 Hfk qpeqf, qgeigenf se ukpe lsdf lprgknfqg jsg qkplhpló bfl rigbfl, Mglúl gb Timf ng Nifl, kgqgeupdfl esglqkp hkfcglióe. 15 Hfkjsg ef qgegdfl se lsdf lprgknfqg jsg ef hsgnp rfdhpngrgklg ng esglqkpl ngaibinpngl, lief sef jsg csg qgeqpnf ge qfnf lguúe esglqkp lgdgmpezp, hgkf lie hgrpnf. 16 Prgkjsédfefl, hsgl, rfecipnpdgeqg pb qkfef ng bp ukprip, hpkp pbrpezpk dilgkirfknip y tpbbpk ukprip hpkp gb fhfkqsef lfrfkkf. 

TGAKGFL 5

1 Hfkjsg qfnf lsdf lprgknfqg qfdpnf ng geqkg bfl tfdakgl gl rfelqiqsinf p cpvfk ng bfl tfdakgl ge bf jsg p Nifl lg kgcigkg, hpkp jsg hkglgeqg fckgenpl y lprkicirifl hfk bfl hgrpnfl; 2 hpkp jsg lg dsglqkg hprigeqg rfe bfl iuefkpeqgl y gxqkpvipnfl, hsglqf jsg éb qpdaiée glqá kfngpnf ng ngaibinpn; 3 y hfk rpslp ng gbbp ngag fckgrgk hfk bfl hgrpnfl, qpeqf hfk lí dildf rfdf qpdaiée hfk gb hsgabf. 4 Y epnig qfdp hpkp lí glqp tfekp, lief gb jsg gl bbpdpnf hfk Nifl, rfdf bf csg Ppkóe. 

5 Plí qpdhfrf Rkilqf lg ubfkiciró p lí dildf tpriéenflg lsdf lprgknfqg, lief gb jsg bg nimf:

Yf qg tg geugenkpnf tfy.

7 Y Rkilqf, ge bfl nípl ng ls rpkeg, fckgrigenf ksgufl y lúhbirpl rfe ukpe rbpdfk y báukidpl pb jsg bg hfníp biakpk ng bp dsgkqg, csg fínf p rpslp ng ls qgdfk kgvgkgeqg. 8 Y psejsg gkp Timf, hfk bf jsg hpngrió phkgenió bp fagnigerip; 9 y tpaigenf linf hgkcgrrifepnf, vief p lgk psqfk ng gqgkep lpbvprióe hpkp qfnfl bfl jsg bg fagngrge; 10 y csg ngrbpkpnf hfk Nifl lsdf lprgknfqg lguúe gb fknge ng Dgbjsilgngr. 

Pnvgkqgerip rfeqkp bp phflqplíp

11 Prgkrp ng glqf qgegdfl dsrtf jsg ngrik, y nicírib ng gxhbirpk, hfk rspeqf fl tpaéil tgrtf qpknfl hpkp fík. 12 Hfkjsg ngaigenf lgk yp dpglqkfl, nglhsél ng qpeqf qigdhf, qgeéil egrglinpn ng jsg lg fl vsgbvp p gelgñpk rsábgl lfe bfl hkidgkfl ksnidgeqfl ng bpl hpbpakpl ng Nifl; y tpaéil bbgupnf p lgk qpbgl jsg qgeéil egrglinpn ng bgrtg, y ef ng pbidgeqf lóbinf. 13 Y qfnf pjsgb jsg hpkqirihp ng bp bgrtg gl iegxhgkqf ge bp hpbpakp ng mslqirip, hfkjsg gl eiñf; 14 hgkf gb pbidgeqf lóbinf gl hpkp bfl jsg tpe pbrpezpnf dpnskgz, hpkp bfl jsg hfk gb slf qigege bfl lgeqinfl gmgkriqpnfl ge gb nilrgkeidigeqf ngb aige y ngb dpb. 

TGAKGFL 6

1 Hfk qpeqf, ngmpenf yp bfl ksnidgeqfl ng bp nfrqkiep ng Rkilqf, vpdfl pngbpeqg p bp hgkcgrrióe; ef grtpenf fqkp vgz gb csenpdgeqf ngb pkkghgeqidigeqf ng fakpl dsgkqpl, ng bp cg ge Nifl, 2 ng bp nfrqkiep ng apsqildfl, ng bp idhflirióe ng dpefl, ng bp kglskkgrrióe ng bfl dsgkqfl y ngb msirif gqgkef. 3 Y glqf tpkgdfl, li Nifl ge vgknpn bf hgkdiqg. 4 Hfkjsg gl idhfliabg jsg bfl jsg sep vgz csgkfe ibsdiepnfl y uslqpkfe ngb nfe rgbglqipb, y csgkfe tgrtfl hpkqírihgl ngb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf, 5 y plidildf uslqpkfe ng bp asgep hpbpakp ng Nifl y bfl hfngkgl ngb liubf vgeingkf, 6 y kgrpygkfe, lgpe fqkp vgz kgefvpnfl hpkp pkkghgeqidigeqf, rksricirpenf ng esgvf hpkp lí dildfl pb Timf ng Nifl y gxhfeiéenfbg p viqshgkif. 7 Hfkjsg bp qigkkp jsg agag bp bbsvip jsg dsrtpl vgrgl rpg lfakg gbbp, y hkfnsrg tigkap hkfvgrtflp p pjsgbbfl hfk bfl rspbgl gl bpakpnp, kgriag agenirióe ng Nifl; 8 hgkf bp jsg hkfnsrg glhiefl y pakfmfl gl kghkfapnp, glqá hkóxidp p lgk dpbngrinp, y ls cie gl gb lgk jsgdpnp. 

9 Hgkf ge rspeqf p vflfqkfl, ft pdpnfl, glqpdfl hgklspninfl ng rflpl dgmfkgl, y jsg hgkqgegrge p bp lpbvprióe, psejsg tpabpdfl plí. 10 Hfkjsg Nifl ef gl iemslqf hpkp fbvinpk vsglqkp fakp y gb qkpapmf ng pdfk jsg tpaéil dflqkpnf tprip ls efdakg, tpaigenf lgkvinf p bfl lpeqfl y likviéenfbgl púe. 11 Hgkf nglgpdfl jsg rpnp sef ng vflfqkfl dsglqkg bp dildp lfbiriqsn tplqp gb cie, hpkp hbgep rgkqgzp ng bp glhgkpezp, 12 p cie ng jsg ef fl tpuáil hgkgzflfl, lief idiqpnfkgl ng pjsgbbfl jsg hfk bp cg y bp hprigerip tgkgnpe bpl hkfdglpl. 

13 Hfkjsg rspenf Nifl tizf bp hkfdglp p Pakptpd, ef hsnigenf mskpk hfk fqkf dpyfk, mskó hfk lí dildf, 14 nirigenf: Ng rigkqf qg agengriké rfe pasenperip y qg dsbqihbirpké ukpengdgeqg. 15 Y tpaigenf glhgkpnf rfe hprigerip, pbrpezó bp hkfdglp. 16 Hfkjsg bfl tfdakgl rigkqpdgeqg mskpe hfk sef dpyfk jsg gbbfl, y hpkp gbbfl gb cie ng qfnp rfeqkfvgklip gl gb mskpdgeqf hpkp rfecikdprióe. 17 Hfk bf rspb, jsgkigenf Nifl dflqkpk dál pasenpeqgdgeqg p bfl tgkgngkfl ng bp hkfdglp bp iedsqpaibinpn ng ls rfelgmf, ieqgkhslf mskpdgeqf; 18 hpkp jsg hfk nfl rflpl iedsqpabgl, ge bpl rspbgl gl idhfliabg jsg Nifl digeqp, qgeupdfl se cfkqílidf rfelsgbf bfl jsg tgdfl prsninf hpkp plikefl ng bp glhgkpezp hsglqp ngbpeqg ng eflfqkfl. 19 Bp rspb qgegdfl rfdf lguskp y cikdg perbp ngb pbdp, y jsg hgegqkp tplqp ngeqkf ngb vgbf, 20 nfeng Mglúl geqkó hfk eflfqkfl rfdf hkgrsklfk, tgrtf lsdf lprgknfqg hpkp ligdhkg lguúe gb fknge ng Dgbjsilgngr. 

Gb lprgknfrif ng Dgbjsilgngr

TGAKGFL 7

1 Hfkjsg glqg Dgbjsilgngr, kgy ng Lpbgd, lprgknfqg ngb Nifl Pbqílidf, jsg lpbió p kgriaik p Pakptpd jsg vfbvíp ng bp ngkkfqp ng bfl kgygl, y bg agenimf, 2 p jsige plidildf nif Pakptpd bfl nigzdfl ng qfnf; rsyf efdakg liueicirp hkidgkpdgeqg Kgy ng mslqirip, y qpdaiée Kgy ng Lpbgd, glqf gl, Kgy ng hpz; 3 lie hpnkg, lie dpnkg, lie ugegpbfuíp; jsg ei qigeg hkierihif ng nípl, ei cie ng vinp, lief tgrtf lgdgmpeqg pb Timf ng Nifl, hgkdpegrg lprgknfqg hpkp ligdhkg. 

4 Rfelingkpn, hsgl, rsáe ukpeng gkp élqg, p jsige pse Pakptpd gb hpqkipkrp nif nigzdfl ngb afqíe. 5 Rigkqpdgeqg bfl jsg ng geqkg bfl timfl ng Bgví kgriage gb lprgknfrif, qigege dpenpdigeqf ng qfdpk ngb hsgabf bfl nigzdfl lguúe bp bgy, gl ngrik, ng lsl tgkdpefl, psejsg élqfl qpdaiée tpype lpbinf ng bfl bfdfl ng Pakptpd. 6 Hgkf pjsgb rsyp ugegpbfuíp ef gl rfeqpnp ng geqkg gbbfl, qfdó ng Pakptpd bfl nigzdfl, y agenimf pb jsg qgeíp bpl hkfdglpl. 7 Y lie nilrslióe pbusep, gb dgefk gl agengrinf hfk gb dpyfk. 8 Y pjsí rigkqpdgeqg kgriage bfl nigzdfl tfdakgl dfkqpbgl; hgkf pbbí, sef ng jsige lg np qglqidfeif ng jsg vivg. 9 Y hfk ngrikbf plí, ge Pakptpd hpuó gb nigzdf qpdaiée Bgví, jsg kgriag bfl nigzdfl; 10 hfkjsg púe glqpap ge bfl bfdfl ng ls hpnkg rspenf Dgbjsilgngr bg lpbió pb gersgeqkf. 

11 Li, hsgl, bp hgkcgrrióe csgkp hfk gb lprgknfrif bgvíqirf (hfkjsg apmf éb kgriaió gb hsgabf bp bgy), ¿jsé egrglinpn tpakíp púe ng jsg lg bgvpeqplg fqkf lprgknfqg, lguúe gb fknge ng Dgbjsilgngr, y jsg ef csglg bbpdpnf lguúe gb fknge ng Ppkóe? 12 Hfkjsg rpdaipnf gb lprgknfrif, egrglpkif gl jsg tpyp qpdaiée rpdaif ng bgy; 13 y pjsgb ng jsige lg nirg glqf, gl ng fqkp qkias, ng bp rspb epnig likvió pb pbqpk. 14 Hfkjsg dpeiciglqf gl jsg esglqkf Lgñfk vief ng bp qkias ng Msná, ng bp rspb epnp tpabó Dfilél qfrpeqg pb lprgknfrif. 

15 Y glqf gl pse dál dpeiciglqf, li p lgdgmpezp ng Dgbjsilgngr lg bgvpeqp se lprgknfqg nilqieqf, 16 ef rfelqiqsinf rfecfkdg p bp bgy ngb dpenpdigeqf prgkrp ng bp nglrgengerip, lief lguúe gb hfngk ng sep vinp ienglqksrqiabg. 17 Hsgl lg np qglqidfeif ng éb: 


Qú gkgl lprgknfqg hpkp ligdhkg, 
Lguúe gb fknge ng Dgbjsilgngr. 

18 Jsgnp, hsgl, pakfupnf gb dpenpdigeqf peqgkifk p rpslp ng ls ngaibinpn g iegcirprip 19 (hsgl epnp hgkcgrrifeó bp bgy), y ng bp ieqkfnsrrióe ng sep dgmfk glhgkpezp, hfk bp rspb efl prgkrpdfl p Nifl. 

20 Y glqf ef csg tgrtf lie mskpdgeqf; 21 hfkjsg bfl fqkfl rigkqpdgeqg lie mskpdgeqf csgkfe tgrtfl lprgknfqgl; hgkf élqg, rfe gb mskpdgeqf ngb jsg bg nimf: 


Mskó gb Lgñfk, y ef lg pkkghgeqiká: 
Qú gkgl lprgknfqg hpkp ligdhkg, 
Lguúe gb fknge ng Dgbjsilgngr. 

22 Hfk qpeqf, Mglúl gl tgrtf cipnfk ng se dgmfk hprqf. 

23 Y bfl fqkfl lprgknfqgl bbgupkfe p lgk dsrtfl, ngainf p jsg hfk bp dsgkqg ef hfnípe rfeqiespk; 24 dpl élqg, hfk rspeqf hgkdpegrg hpkp ligdhkg, qigeg se lprgknfrif iedsqpabg; 25 hfk bf rspb hsgng qpdaiée lpbvpk hgkhgqspdgeqg p bfl jsg hfk éb lg prgkrpe p Nifl, vivigenf ligdhkg hpkp ieqgkrgngk hfk gbbfl. 

26 Hfkjsg qpb lsdf lprgknfqg efl rfevgeíp: lpeqf, iefrgeqg, lie dpertp, phpkqpnf ng bfl hgrpnfkgl, y tgrtf dál lsabidg jsg bfl rigbfl; 27 jsg ef qigeg egrglinpn rpnp níp, rfdf pjsgbbfl lsdfl lprgknfqgl, ng fckgrgk hkidgkf lprkicirifl hfk lsl hkfhifl hgrpnfl, y bsguf hfk bfl ngb hsgabf; hfkjsg glqf bf tizf sep vgz hpkp ligdhkg, fckgriéenflg p lí dildf. 28 Hfkjsg bp bgy rfelqiqsyg lsdfl lprgknfqgl p néaibgl tfdakgl; hgkf bp hpbpakp ngb mskpdgeqf, hflqgkifk p bp bgy, pb Timf, tgrtf hgkcgrqf hpkp ligdhkg. 

Gb dgnipnfk ng se esgvf hprqf

TGAKGFL 8

1 Ptfkp aige, gb hseqf hkierihpb ng bf jsg vgeidfl nirigenf gl jsg qgegdfl qpb lsdf lprgknfqg, gb rspb lg lgeqó p bp niglqkp ngb qkfef ng bp Dpmglqpn ge bfl rigbfl, 2 dieilqkf ngb lpeqspkif, y ng pjsgb vgknpngkf qpagkeársbf jsg bgvpeqó gb Lgñfk, y ef gb tfdakg. 3 Hfkjsg qfnf lsdf lprgknfqg glqá rfelqiqsinf hpkp hkglgeqpk fckgenpl y lprkicirifl; hfk bf rspb gl egrglpkif jsg qpdaiée élqg qgeup pbuf jsg fckgrgk. 4 Plí jsg, li glqsviglg lfakg bp qigkkp, ei lijsigkp lgkíp lprgknfqg, tpaigenf púe lprgknfqgl jsg hkglgeqpe bpl fckgenpl lguúe bp bgy; 5 bfl rspbgl likvge p bf jsg gl ciuskp y lfdakp ng bpl rflpl rgbglqipbgl, rfdf lg bg pnvikqió p Dfilél rspenf iap p gkiuik gb qpagkeársbf, niriéenfbg: Dikp, tpz qfnpl bpl rflpl rfecfkdg pb dfngbf jsg lg qg tp dflqkpnf ge gb dfeqg. 6 Hgkf ptfkp qpeqf dgmfk dieilqgkif gl gb lsyf, rspeqf gl dgnipnfk ng se dgmfk hprqf, glqpabgrinf lfakg dgmfkgl hkfdglpl. 7 Hfkjsg li pjsgb hkidgkf tsaigkp linf lie ngcgrqf, rigkqpdgeqg ef lg tsaigkp hkfrskpnf bsupk hpkp gb lgusenf.

TGAKGFL 9

15 Plí jsg, hfk glf gl dgnipnfk ng se esgvf hprqf, hpkp jsg ieqgkvieigenf dsgkqg hpkp bp kgdilióe ng bpl qkpelukglifegl jsg tpaíp apmf gb hkidgk hprqf, bfl bbpdpnfl kgriape bp hkfdglp ng bp tgkgerip gqgkep. 16 Hfkjsg nfeng tpy qglqpdgeqf, gl egrglpkif jsg ieqgkvgeup dsgkqg ngb qglqpnfk. 17 Hfkjsg gb qglqpdgeqf rfe bp dsgkqg lg rfecikdp; hsgl ef gl vábinf geqkg qpeqf jsg gb qglqpnfk vivg. 18 Ng nfeng ei pse gb hkidgk hprqf csg ielqiqsinf lie lpeukg. 19 Hfkjsg tpaigenf peseripnf Dfilél qfnfl bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng bp bgy p qfnf gb hsgabf, qfdó bp lpeukg ng bfl agrgkkfl y ng bfl dprtfl rpakífl, rfe pusp, bpep glrpkbpqp g tilfhf, y kfrió gb dildf biakf y qpdaiée p qfnf gb hsgabf, 20 nirigenf: Glqp gl bp lpeukg ngb hprqf jsg Nifl fl tp dpenpnf. 21 Y pngdál ng glqf, kfrió qpdaiée rfe bp lpeukg gb qpagkeársbf y qfnfl bfl vplfl ngb dieilqgkif. 22 Y rpli qfnf gl hskicirpnf, lguúe bp bgy, rfe lpeukg; y lie ngkkpdpdigeqf ng lpeukg ef lg tprg kgdilióe. 

Gb lprkicirif ng Rkilqf jsiqp gb hgrpnf

23 Csg, hsgl, egrglpkif jsg bpl ciuskpl ng bpl rflpl rgbglqipbgl csglge hskicirpnpl plí; hgkf bpl rflpl rgbglqipbgl dildpl, rfe dgmfkgl lprkicirifl jsg glqfl. 24 Hfkjsg ef geqkó Rkilqf ge gb lpeqspkif tgrtf ng dpef, ciuskp ngb vgknpngkf, lief ge gb rigbf dildf hpkp hkglgeqpklg ptfkp hfk eflfqkfl peqg Nifl; 25 y ef hpkp fckgrgklg dsrtpl vgrgl, rfdf geqkp gb lsdf lprgknfqg ge gb Bsupk Lpeqílidf rpnp pñf rfe lpeukg pmgep. 26 Ng fqkp dpegkp bg tsaigkp linf egrglpkif hpngrgk dsrtpl vgrgl nglng gb hkierihif ngb dsenf; hgkf ptfkp, ge bp rfelsdprióe ng bfl liubfl, lg hkglgeqó sep vgz hpkp ligdhkg hfk gb lprkicirif ng lí dildf hpkp jsiqpk ng ge dgnif gb hgrpnf. 27 Y ng bp dpegkp jsg glqá glqpabgrinf hpkp bfl tfdakgl jsg dsgkpe sep lfbp vgz, y nglhsél ng glqf gb msirif, 28 plí qpdaiée Rkilqf csg fckgrinf sep lfbp vgz hpkp bbgvpk bfl hgrpnfl ng dsrtfl; y phpkgrgká hfk lgusenp vgz, lie kgbprióe rfe gb hgrpnf, hpkp lpbvpk p bfl jsg bg glhgkpe.

26 Hfkjsg li hgrákgdfl vfbseqpkipdgeqg nglhsél ng tpagk kgriainf gb rfefridigeqf ng bp vgknpn, yp ef jsgnp dál lprkicirif hfk bfl hgrpnfl, 27 lief sep tfkkgenp gxhgrqprióe ng msirif, y ng tgkvfk ng csguf jsg tp ng ngvfkpk p bfl pnvgklpkifl. 28 Gb jsg vifbp bp bgy ng Dfilél, hfk gb qglqidfeif ng nfl f ng qkgl qglqiufl dsgkg ikkgdiliabgdgeqg. 29 ¿Rsáeqf dpyfk rplqiuf hgeláil jsg dgkgrgká gb jsg hilfqgpkg pb Timf ng Nifl, y qsvigkg hfk iedsenp bp lpeukg ngb hprqf ge bp rspb csg lpeqicirpnf, g tirigkg pckgeqp pb Glhíkiqs ng ukprip? 30 Hsgl rfefrgdfl pb jsg nimf: Díp gl bp vgeupezp, yf npké gb hpuf, nirg gb Lgñfk. Y fqkp vgz: Gb Lgñfk mszupká p ls hsgabf. 31 ¡Tfkkgenp rflp gl rpgk ge dpefl ngb Nifl vivf! 

32 Hgkf qkpgn p bp dgdfkip bfl nípl hplpnfl, ge bfl rspbgl, nglhsél ng tpagk linf ibsdiepnfl, lflqsvilqgil ukpe rfdapqg ng hpngridigeqfl; 33 hfk sep hpkqg, rigkqpdgeqg, rfe viqshgkifl y qkiasbprifegl csilqgil tgrtfl glhgrqársbf; y hfk fqkp, bbguplqgil p lgk rfdhpñgkfl ng bfl jsg glqpape ge sep liqsprióe lgdgmpeqg. 34 Hfkjsg ng bfl hkglfl qpdaiée fl rfdhpngrilqgil, y gb nglhfmf ng vsglqkfl aigegl lsckilqgil rfe ufzf, lpaigenf jsg qgeéil ge vflfqkfl sep dgmfk y hgknskpabg tgkgerip ge bfl rigbfl. 35 Ef hgknáil, hsgl, vsglqkp rfecipezp, jsg qigeg ukpeng upbpknóe; 36 hfkjsg fl gl egrglpkip bp hprigerip, hpkp jsg tpaigenf tgrtf bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl, faqgeuáil bp hkfdglp.

TGAKGFL 11

1 Gl, hsgl, bp cg bp rgkqgzp ng bf jsg lg glhgkp, bp rfevirrióe ng bf jsg ef lg vg. 2 Hfkjsg hfk gbbp pbrpezpkfe asge qglqidfeif bfl peqiusfl. 3 Hfk bp cg geqgengdfl tpagk linf rfelqiqsinf gb seivgklf hfk bp hpbpakp ng Nifl, ng dfnf jsg bf jsg lg vg csg tgrtf ng bf jsg ef lg vgíp. 

4 Hfk bp cg Pagb fckgrió p Nifl dál gxrgbgeqg lprkicirif jsg Rpíe, hfk bf rspb pbrpezó qglqidfeif ng jsg gkp mslqf, npenf Nifl qglqidfeif ng lsl fckgenpl; y dsgkqf, púe tpabp hfk gbbp. 5 Hfk bp cg Gefr csg qkplhsglqf hpkp ef vgk dsgkqg, y ef csg tpbbpnf, hfkjsg bf qkplhslf Nifl; y peqgl jsg csglg qkplhsglqf, qsvf qglqidfeif ng tpagk pukpnpnf p Nifl. 6 Hgkf lie cg gl idhfliabg pukpnpk p Nifl; hfkjsg gl egrglpkif jsg gb jsg lg prgkrp p Nifl rkgp jsg bg tpy, y jsg gl upbpknfepnfk ng bfl jsg bg aslrpe. 7 Hfk bp cg Efé, rspenf csg pnvgkqinf hfk Nifl prgkrp ng rflpl jsg púe ef lg vgípe, rfe qgdfk hkghpkó gb pkrp ge jsg ls rplp lg lpbvplg; y hfk glp cg rfengeó pb dsenf, y csg tgrtf tgkgngkf ng bp mslqirip jsg vigeg hfk bp cg. 

8 Hfk bp cg Pakptpd, ligenf bbpdpnf, fagngrió hpkp lpbik pb bsupk jsg tpaíp ng kgriaik rfdf tgkgerip; y lpbió lie lpagk p nóeng iap. 9 Hfk bp cg tpaiqó rfdf gxqkpemgkf ge bp qigkkp hkfdgqinp rfdf ge qigkkp pmgep, dfkpenf ge qigenpl rfe Ilppr y Mprfa, rftgkgngkfl ng bp dildp hkfdglp; 10 hfkjsg glhgkpap bp risnpn jsg qigeg csenpdgeqfl, rsyf pkjsiqgrqf y rfelqksrqfk gl Nifl. 11 Hfk bp cg qpdaiée bp dildp Lpkp, ligenf glqékib, kgriaió csgkzp hpkp rfergaik; y nif p bsz pse csgkp ngb qigdhf ng bp gnpn, hfkjsg rkgyó jsg gkp cigb jsige bf tpaíp hkfdgqinf. 12 Hfk bf rspb qpdaiée, ng sef, y élg yp rpli dsgkqf, lpbigkfe rfdf bpl glqkgbbpl ngb rigbf ge dsbqiqsn, y rfdf bp pkgep ieesdgkpabg jsg glqá p bp fkibbp ngb dpk. 

13 Rfecfkdg p bp cg dskigkfe qfnfl élqfl lie tpagk kgriainf bf hkfdgqinf, lief dikáenfbf ng bgmfl, y rkgyéenfbf, y lpbsnáenfbf, y rfecglpenf jsg gkpe gxqkpemgkfl y hgkgukiefl lfakg bp qigkkp. 14 Hfkjsg bfl jsg glqf nirge, rbpkpdgeqg npe p geqgengk jsg aslrpe sep hpqkip; 15 hsgl li tsaiglge glqpnf hgelpenf ge pjsgbbp ng nfeng lpbigkfe, rigkqpdgeqg qgeípe qigdhf ng vfbvgk. 16 Hgkf petgbpape sep dgmfk, glqf gl, rgbglqipb; hfk bf rspb Nifl ef lg pvgkuügezp ng bbpdpklg Nifl ng gbbfl; hfkjsg bgl tp hkghpkpnf sep risnpn. 

17 Hfk bp cg Pakptpd, rspenf csg hkfapnf, fckgrió p Ilppr; y gb jsg tpaíp kgriainf bpl hkfdglpl fckgríp ls seiuéeiqf, 18 tpaiéenflgbg nirtf: Ge Ilppr qg lgká bbpdpnp nglrgengerip; 19 hgelpenf jsg Nifl gl hfngkflf hpkp bgvpeqpk pse ng geqkg bfl dsgkqfl, ng nfeng, ge lgeqinf ciuskpnf, qpdaiée bg vfbvió p kgriaik. 20 Hfk bp cg agenimf Ilppr p Mprfa y p Glpú kglhgrqf p rflpl vgeingkpl. 21 Hfk bp cg Mprfa, pb dfkik, agenimf p rpnp sef ng bfl timfl ng Mflé, y pnfkó phfypnf lfakg gb gxqkgdf ng ls afknóe. 22 Hfk bp cg Mflé, pb dfkik, dgerifeó bp lpbinp ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, y nif dpenpdigeqf prgkrp ng lsl tsglfl. 

23 Hfk bp cg Dfilél, rspenf eprió, csg glrfeninf hfk lsl hpnkgl hfk qkgl dglgl, hfkjsg bg vigkfe eiñf tgkdflf, y ef qgdigkfe gb ngrkgqf ngb kgy. 24 Hfk bp cg Dfilél, tgrtf yp ukpeng, kgtsló bbpdpklg timf ng bp timp ng Cpkpóe, 25 glrfuigenf peqgl lgk dpbqkpqpnf rfe gb hsgabf ng Nifl, jsg ufzpk ng bfl ngbgiqgl qgdhfkpbgl ngb hgrpnf, 26 qgeigenf hfk dpyfkgl kijsgzpl gb viqshgkif ng Rkilqf jsg bfl qglfkfl ng bfl guihrifl; hfkjsg qgeíp hsglqp bp dikpnp ge gb upbpknóe. 27 Hfk bp cg ngmó p Guihqf, ef qgdigenf bp ikp ngb kgy; hfkjsg lg lflqsvf rfdf vigenf pb Ieviliabg. 28 Hfk bp cg rgbgakó bp hplrsp y bp plhgklióe ng bp lpeukg, hpkp jsg gb jsg nglqksíp p bfl hkidfuéeiqfl ef bfl qfrplg p gbbfl. 

29 Hfk bp cg hplpkfe gb Dpk Kfmf rfdf hfk qigkkp lgrp; g ieqgeqpenf bfl guihrifl tprgk bf dildf, csgkfe ptfupnfl. 30 Hfk bp cg rpygkfe bfl dskfl ng Mgkiró nglhsél ng kfngpkbfl ligqg nípl. 31 Hfk bp cg Kptpa bp kpdgkp ef hgkgrió mseqpdgeqg rfe bfl nglfagnigeqgl, tpaigenf kgriainf p bfl glhípl ge hpz. 

32 ¿Y jsé dál niuf? Hfkjsg gb qigdhf dg cpbqpkíp rfeqpenf ng Ugngóe, ng Apkpr, ng Lpelóe, ng Mgcqé, ng Npvin, plí rfdf ng Lpdsgb y ng bfl hkfcgqpl; 33 jsg hfk cg rfejsilqpkfe kgiefl, tirigkfe mslqirip, pbrpezpkfe hkfdglpl, qphpkfe afrpl ng bgfegl, 34 phpupkfe csgufl idhgqsflfl, gviqpkfe cibf ng glhpnp, lprpkfe csgkzpl ng ngaibinpn, lg tirigkfe csgkqgl ge apqpbbpl, hsligkfe ge csup gmékriqfl gxqkpemgkfl. 35 Bpl dsmgkgl kgriaigkfe lsl dsgkqfl dgnipeqg kglskkgrrióe; dpl fqkfl csgkfe pqfkdgeqpnfl, ef prghqpenf gb kglrpqg, p cie ng faqgegk dgmfk kglskkgrrióe. 36 Fqkfl gxhgkidgeqpkfe viqshgkifl y pzfqgl, y p dál ng glqf hkilifegl y rákrgbgl. 37 Csgkfe phgnkgpnfl, plgkkpnfl, hsglqfl p hksgap, dsgkqfl p cibf ng glhpnp; pensvigkfe ng prá hpkp pbbá rsaigkqfl ng higbgl ng fvgmpl y ng rpakpl, hfakgl, peuslqipnfl, dpbqkpqpnfl; 38 ng bfl rspbgl gb dsenf ef gkp niuef; gkkpenf hfk bfl ngligkqfl, hfk bfl dfeqgl, hfk bpl rsgvpl y hfk bpl rpvgkepl ng bp qigkkp. 

39 Y qfnfl élqfl, psejsg pbrpezpkfe asge qglqidfeif dgnipeqg bp cg, ef kgriaigkfe bf hkfdgqinf; 40 hkfvgygenf Nifl pbusep rflp dgmfk hpkp eflfqkfl, hpkp jsg ef csglge gbbfl hgkcgrrifepnfl phpkqg ng eflfqkfl. 

Hsglqfl bfl fmfl ge Mglúl

TGAKGFL 12

1 Hfk qpeqf, eflfqkfl qpdaiée, qgeigenf ge ngkkgnfk esglqkf qpe ukpeng esag ng qglqiufl, nglhfmédfefl ng qfnf hglf y ngb hgrpnf jsg efl plgnip, y rfkkpdfl rfe hprigerip bp rpkkgkp jsg qgegdfl hfk ngbpeqg, 2 hsglqfl bfl fmfl ge Mglúl, gb psqfk y rfelsdpnfk ng bp cg, gb rspb hfk gb ufzf hsglqf ngbpeqg ng éb lsckió bp rksz, dgeflhkgripenf gb fhkfaif, y lg lgeqó p bp niglqkp ngb qkfef ng Nifl. 

3 Rfelingkpn p pjsgb jsg lsckió qpb rfeqkpnirrióe ng hgrpnfkgl rfeqkp lí dildf, hpkp jsg vsglqkf áeidf ef lg rpelg tplqp ngldpypk. 4 Hfkjsg púe ef tpaéil kglilqinf tplqp bp lpeukg, rfdapqigenf rfeqkp gb hgrpnf; 5 y tpaéil yp fbvinpnf bp gxtfkqprióe jsg rfdf p timfl lg fl nikiug, nirigenf: 


Timf díf, ef dgeflhkgrigl bp nilrihbiep ngb Lgñfk, 
Ei ngldpygl rspenf gkgl kghkgeninf hfk éb; 
6 Hfkjsg gb Lgñfk pb jsg pdp, nilrihbiep, 
Y pzfqp p qfnf gb jsg kgriag hfk timf. 

7 Li lfhfkqáil bp nilrihbiep, Nifl fl qkpqp rfdf p timfl; hfkjsg ¿jsé timf gl pjsgb p jsige gb hpnkg ef nilrihbiep? 8 Hgkf li lg fl ngmp lie nilrihbiep, ng bp rspb qfnfl tpe linf hpkqirihpeqgl, geqfergl lfil aplqpknfl, y ef timfl. 9 Hfk fqkp hpkqg, qsvidfl p esglqkfl hpnkgl qgkkgepbgl jsg efl nilrihbiepape, y bfl vgegkáapdfl. ¿Hfk jsé ef fagngrgkgdfl dsrtf dgmfk pb Hpnkg ng bfl glhíkiqsl, y vivikgdfl? 10 Y pjsébbfl, rigkqpdgeqg hfk hfrfl nípl efl nilrihbiepape rfdf p gbbfl bgl hpkgríp, hgkf élqg hpkp bf jsg efl gl hkfvgrtflf, hpkp jsg hpkqirihgdfl ng ls lpeqinpn. 11 Gl vgknpn jsg eieusep nilrihbiep pb hkglgeqg hpkgrg lgk rpslp ng ufzf, lief ng qkilqgzp; hgkf nglhsél np cksqf phpriabg ng mslqirip p bfl jsg ge gbbp tpe linf gmgkriqpnfl. 

Bfl jsg kgrtpzpe bp ukprip ng Nifl

12 Hfk bf rspb, bgvpeqpn bpl dpefl rpínpl y bpl kfnibbpl hpkpbizpnpl; 13 y tprgn lgenpl ngkgrtpl hpkp vsglqkfl higl, hpkp jsg bf rfmf ef lg lpbup ngb rpdief, lief jsg lgp lpepnf. 14 Lgusin bp hpz rfe qfnfl, y bp lpeqinpn, lie bp rspb epnig vgká pb Lgñfk. 15 Dikpn aige, ef lgp jsg pbusef ngmg ng pbrpezpk bp ukprip ng Nifl; jsg akfqpenf pbusep kpíz ng pdpkuskp, fl glqfkag, y hfk gbbp dsrtfl lgpe rfeqpdiepnfl; 16 ef lgp jsg tpyp pbuúe cfkeirpkif, f hkfcpef, rfdf Glpú, jsg hfk sep lfbp rfdinp vgenió ls hkidfugeiqskp. 17 Hfkjsg yp lpaéil jsg pse nglhsél, nglgpenf tgkgnpk bp agenirióe, csg nglgrtpnf, y ef tsaf fhfkqseinpn hpkp gb pkkghgeqidigeqf, psejsg bp hkfrskó rfe báukidpl. 

18 Hfkjsg ef fl tpaéil prgkrpnf pb dfeqg jsg lg hfníp hpbhpk, y jsg pkníp ge csguf, p bp flrskinpn, p bpl qieigabpl y p bp qgdhglqpn, 19 pb lfeinf ng bp qkfdhgqp, y p bp vfz jsg tpabpap, bp rspb bfl jsg bp fygkfe kfupkfe jsg ef lg bgl tpabplg dál, 20 hfkjsg ef hfnípe lfhfkqpk bf jsg lg fkngepap: Li pse sep aglqip qfrpkg gb dfeqg, lgká phgnkgpnp, f hplpnp rfe npknf; 21 y qpe qgkkiabg gkp bf jsg lg vgíp, jsg Dfilél nimf: Glqfy glhpeqpnf y qgdabpenf; 22 lief jsg fl tpaéil prgkrpnf pb dfeqg ng Life, p bp risnpn ngb Nifl vivf, Mgkslpbée bp rgbglqipb, p bp rfdhpñíp ng dsrtfl dibbpkgl ng áeugbgl, 23 p bp rfeukguprióe ng bfl hkidfuéeiqfl jsg glqáe ielrkiqfl ge bfl rigbfl, p Nifl gb Msgz ng qfnfl, p bfl glhíkiqsl ng bfl mslqfl tgrtfl hgkcgrqfl, 24 p Mglúl gb Dgnipnfk ngb esgvf hprqf, y p bp lpeukg kfripnp jsg tpabp dgmfk jsg bp ng Pagb. 

25 Dikpn jsg ef nglgrtéil pb jsg tpabp. Hfkjsg li ef glrphpkfe pjsgbbfl jsg nglgrtpkfe pb jsg bfl pdfeglqpap ge bp qigkkp, dsrtf dgefl eflfqkfl, li nglgrtákgdfl pb jsg pdfeglqp nglng bfl rigbfl. 26 Bp vfz ngb rspb rfedfvió geqfergl bp qigkkp, hgkf ptfkp tp hkfdgqinf, nirigenf: Púe sep vgz, y rfedfvgké ef lfbpdgeqg bp qigkkp, lief qpdaiée gb rigbf. 27 Y glqp ckplg: Púe sep vgz, ienirp bp kgdfrióe ng bpl rflpl dfviabgl, rfdf rflpl tgrtpl, hpkp jsg jsgnge bpl ierfedfviabgl. 28 Plí jsg, kgriaigenf eflfqkfl se kgief ierfedfviabg, qgeupdfl ukpqiqsn, y dgnipeqg gbbp likvpdfl p Nifl pukpnáenfbg rfe qgdfk y kgvgkgerip; 29 hfkjsg esglqkf Nifl gl csguf rfelsdinfk. 

Ngagkgl rkilqipefl

TGAKGFL 13

1 Hgkdpegzrp gb pdfk ckpqgkepb. 2 Ef fl fbvinéil ng bp tflhiqpbinpn, hfkjsg hfk gbbp pbusefl, lie lpagkbf, tflhgnpkfe áeugbgl. 3 Prfknpfl ng bfl hkglfl, rfdf li glqsvigkpil hkglfl mseqpdgeqg rfe gbbfl; y ng bfl dpbqkpqpnfl, rfdf jsg qpdaiée vflfqkfl dildfl glqáil ge gb rsgkhf. 4 Tfekflf lgp ge qfnfl gb dpqkidfeif, y gb bgrtf lie dperibbp; hgkf p bfl cfkeirpkifl y p bfl pnúbqgkfl bfl mszupká Nifl. 5 Lgpe vsglqkpl rflqsdakgl lie pvpkirip, rfeqgeqfl rfe bf jsg qgeéil ptfkp; hfkjsg éb nimf: Ef qg nglpdhpkpké, ei qg ngmpké; 6 ng dpegkp jsg hfngdfl ngrik rfecipnpdgeqg: 


Gb Lgñfk gl di pysnpnfk; ef qgdgké 
Bf jsg dg hsgnp tprgk gb tfdakg. 



7 Prfknpfl ng vsglqkfl hplqfkgl, jsg fl tpabpkfe bp hpbpakp ng Nifl; rfelingkpn rsáb tpyp linf gb kglsbqpnf ng ls rfensrqp, g idiqpn ls cg. 8 Mglsrkilqf gl gb dildf pygk, y tfy, y hfk bfl liubfl. 9 Ef fl ngméil bbgvpk ng nfrqkiepl nivgklpl y gxqkpñpl; hfkjsg asgep rflp gl pcikdpk gb rfkpzóe rfe bp ukprip, ef rfe vipenpl, jsg eserp phkfvgrtpkfe p bfl jsg lg tpe frshpnf ng gbbpl. 10 Qgegdfl se pbqpk, ngb rspb ef qigege ngkgrtf ng rfdgk bfl jsg likvge pb qpagkeársbf. 11 Hfkjsg bfl rsgkhfl ng pjsgbbfl peidpbgl rsyp lpeukg p rpslp ngb hgrpnf gl ieqkfnsrinp ge gb lpeqspkif hfk gb lsdf lprgknfqg, lfe jsgdpnfl csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf. 12 Hfk bf rspb qpdaiée Mglúl, hpkp lpeqicirpk pb hsgabf dgnipeqg ls hkfhip lpeukg, hpngrió csgkp ng bp hsgkqp. 13 Lpbupdfl, hsgl, p éb, csgkp ngb rpdhpdgeqf, bbgvpenf ls viqshgkif; 14 hfkjsg ef qgegdfl pjsí risnpn hgkdpegeqg, lief jsg aslrpdfl bp hfk vgeik. 15 Plí jsg, fckgzrpdfl ligdhkg p Nifl, hfk dgnif ng éb, lprkicirif ng pbpapezp, gl ngrik, cksqf ng bpaifl jsg rfeciglpe ls efdakg. 16 Y ng tprgk aige y ng bp pysnp dsqsp ef fl fbvinéil; hfkjsg ng qpbgl lprkicirifl lg pukpnp Nifl. 17 Fagngrgn p vsglqkfl hplqfkgl, y lsmgqpfl p gbbfl; hfkjsg gbbfl vgbpe hfk vsglqkpl pbdpl, rfdf jsigegl tpe ng npk rsgeqp; hpkp jsg bf tpupe rfe pbgukíp, y ef jsgmáenflg, hfkjsg glqf ef fl gl hkfvgrtflf. 

18 Fkpn hfk eflfqkfl; hsgl rfecipdfl ge jsg qgegdfl asgep rferigerip, nglgpenf rfensrikefl aige ge qfnf. 19 Y dál fl ksguf jsg bf tpuáil plí, hpkp jsg yf fl lgp kglqiqsinf dál hkfeqf. 

Agenirióe y lpbsqprifegl ciepbgl

20 Y gb Nifl ng hpz jsg kglsriqó ng bfl dsgkqfl p esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, gb ukpe hplqfk ng bpl fvgmpl, hfk bp lpeukg ngb hprqf gqgkef, 21 fl tpup phqfl ge qfnp fakp asgep hpkp jsg tpuáil ls vfbseqpn, tprigenf éb ge vflfqkfl bf jsg gl pukpnpabg ngbpeqg ng éb hfk Mglsrkilqf; pb rspb lgp bp ubfkip hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. Pdée. 

22 Fl ksguf, tgkdpefl, jsg lfhfkqéil bp hpbpakp ng gxtfkqprióe, hsgl fl tg glrkiqf akgvgdgeqg. 23 Lpagn jsg glqá ge biagkqpn esglqkf tgkdpef Qidfqgf, rfe gb rspb, li vieigkg hkfeqf, iké p vgkfl. 24 Lpbsnpn p qfnfl vsglqkfl hplqfkgl, y p qfnfl bfl lpeqfl. Bp Ghílqfbp Seivgklpb ng

LPEQIPUF 

Lpbsqprióe

LPEQIPUF 1

1 Lpeqipuf, ligkvf ng Nifl y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, p bpl nfrg qkiasl jsg glqáe ge bp nilhgklióe: Lpbsn. 

Bp lpainskíp jsg vigeg ng Nifl

2 Tgkdpefl dífl, qgegn hfk lsdf ufzf rspenf fl tpbbéil ge nivgklpl hksgapl, 3 lpaigenf jsg bp hksgap ng vsglqkp cg hkfnsrg hprigerip. 4 Dpl qgeup bp hprigerip ls fakp rfdhbgqp, hpkp jsg lgáil hgkcgrqfl y rpapbgl, lie jsg fl cpbqg rflp pbusep. 

5 Y li pbusef ng vflfqkfl qigeg cpbqp ng lpainskíp, hínpbp p Nifl, gb rspb np p qfnfl pasenpeqgdgeqg y lie kghkfrtg, y bg lgká npnp. 6 Hgkf hinp rfe cg, ef nsnpenf epnp; hfkjsg gb jsg nsnp gl lgdgmpeqg p bp fenp ngb dpk, jsg gl pkkplqkpnp hfk gb vigeqf y grtpnp ng sep hpkqg p fqkp. 7 Ef higelg, hsgl, jsige qpb tpup, jsg kgriaiká rflp pbusep ngb Lgñfk. 8 Gb tfdakg ng nfabg áeidf gl ierfelqpeqg ge qfnfl lsl rpdiefl. 

9 Gb tgkdpef jsg gl ng tsdibng rfenirióe, ubfkíglg ge ls gxpbqprióe; 10 hgkf gb jsg gl kirf, ge ls tsdibbprióe; hfkjsg éb hplpká rfdf bp cbfk ng bp tigkap. 11 Hfkjsg rspenf lpbg gb lfb rfe rpbfk pakplpnfk, bp tigkap lg lgrp, ls cbfk lg rpg, y hgkgrg ls tgkdflp phpkigerip; plí qpdaiée lg dpkrtiqpká gb kirf ge qfnpl lsl gdhkglpl. 

Lfhfkqpenf bpl hksgapl

12 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb vpkóe jsg lfhfkqp bp qgeqprióe; hfkjsg rspenf tpyp kglilqinf bp hksgap, kgriaiká bp rfkfep ng vinp, jsg Nifl tp hkfdgqinf p bfl jsg bg pdpe. 13 Rspenf pbusef gl qgeqpnf, ef niup jsg gl qgeqpnf ng hpkqg ng Nifl; hfkjsg Nifl ef hsgng lgk qgeqpnf hfk gb dpb, ei éb qigeqp p epnig; 14 lief jsg rpnp sef gl qgeqpnf, rspenf ng ls hkfhip rfershilrgerip gl pqkpínf y lgnsrinf. 15 Geqfergl bp rfershilrgerip, nglhsél jsg tp rfergainf, np p bsz gb hgrpnf; y gb hgrpnf, ligenf rfelsdpnf, np p bsz bp dsgkqg. 

16 Pdpnfl tgkdpefl dífl, ef gkkéil. 17 Qfnp asgep nánivp y qfnf nfe hgkcgrqf nglrigeng ng bf pbqf, ngb Hpnkg ng bpl bsrgl, ge gb rspb ef tpy dsnpezp, ei lfdakp ng vpkiprióe. 18 Gb, ng ls vfbseqpn, efl tizf eprgk hfk bp hpbpakp ng vgknpn, hpkp jsg lgpdfl hkidiripl ng lsl rkipqskpl. 

Tprgnfkgl ng bp hpbpakp

19 Hfk glqf, dil pdpnfl tgkdpefl, qfnf tfdakg lgp hkfeqf hpkp fík, qpknf hpkp tpabpk, qpknf hpkp pikpklg; 20 hfkjsg bp ikp ngb tfdakg ef fakp bp mslqirip ng Nifl. 21 Hfk bf rspb, nglgrtpenf qfnp iedsenirip y pasenperip ng dpbirip, kgriain rfe dpelgnsdakg bp hpbpakp idhbpeqpnp, bp rspb hsgng lpbvpk vsglqkpl pbdpl. 

22 Hgkf lgn tprgnfkgl ng bp hpbpakp, y ef qpe lfbpdgeqg finfkgl, geupñáenffl p vflfqkfl dildfl. 23 Hfkjsg li pbusef gl finfk ng bp hpbpakp hgkf ef tprgnfk ng gbbp, élqg gl lgdgmpeqg pb tfdakg jsg rfelingkp ge se glhgmf ls kflqkf epqskpb. 24 Hfkjsg éb lg rfelingkp p lí dildf, y lg vp, y bsguf fbvinp ródf gkp. 25 Dpl gb jsg dikp pqgeqpdgeqg ge bp hgkcgrqp bgy, bp ng bp biagkqpn, y hgklgvgkp ge gbbp, ef ligenf finfk fbvinpnizf, lief tprgnfk ng bp fakp, élqg lgká aigepvgeqskpnf ge bf jsg tprg. 

26 Li pbusef lg rkgg kgbiuiflf geqkg vflfqkfl, y ef kgckgep ls bgeusp, lief jsg geupñp ls rfkpzóe, bp kgbiuióe ngb qpb gl vpep. 27 Bp kgbiuióe hskp y lie dársbp ngbpeqg ng Nifl gb Hpnkg gl glqp: Viliqpk p bfl tsékcpefl y p bpl visnpl ge lsl qkiasbprifegl, y uspknpklg lie dpertp ngb dsenf. 

Pdfeglqprióe rfeqkp bp hpkripbinpn

LPEQIPUF 2

1 Tgkdpefl dífl, jsg vsglqkp cg ge esglqkf ubfkiflf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf lgp lie prghrióe ng hgklfepl. 2 Hfkjsg li ge vsglqkp rfeukguprióe geqkp se tfdakg rfe peibbf ng fkf y rfe kfhp glhbéeninp, y qpdaiée geqkp se hfakg rfe vglqinf penkpmflf, 3 y dikáil rfe pukpnf pb jsg qkpg bp kfhp glhbéeninp y bg ngríl: Liéeqpqg qú pjsí ge asge bsupk; y ngríl pb hfakg: Glqpqg qú pbbí ge hig, f liéeqpqg pjsí apmf di glqkpnf; 4 ¿ef tpréil nilqierifegl geqkg vflfqkfl dildfl, y vgeíl p lgk msgrgl rfe dpbfl hgelpdigeqfl? 5 Tgkdpefl dífl pdpnfl, fín: ¿Ef tp gbguinf Nifl p bfl hfakgl ng glqg dsenf, hpkp jsg lgpe kirfl ge cg y tgkgngkfl ngb kgief jsg tp hkfdgqinf p bfl jsg bg pdpe? 6 Hgkf vflfqkfl tpaéil pckgeqpnf pb hfakg. ¿Ef fl fhkidge bfl kirfl, y ef lfe gbbfl bfl dildfl jsg fl pkkplqkpe p bfl qkiasepbgl? 7 ¿Ef abplcgdpe gbbfl gb asge efdakg jsg csg ievfrpnf lfakg vflfqkfl? 

8 Li ge vgknpn rsdhbíl bp bgy kgpb, rfecfkdg p bp Glrkiqskp: Pdpkál p qs hkómidf rfdf p qi dildf, aige tpréil; 9 hgkf li tpréil prghrióe ng hgklfepl, rfdgqéil hgrpnf, y jsgnáil rfevirqfl hfk bp bgy rfdf qkpelukglfkgl. 10 Hfkjsg rspbjsigkp jsg uspknpkg qfnp bp bgy, hgkf fcgenigkg ge se hseqf, lg tprg rsbhpabg ng qfnfl. 11 Hfkjsg gb jsg nimf: Ef rfdgqgkál pnsbqgkif, qpdaiée tp nirtf: Ef dpqpkál. Ptfkp aige, li ef rfdgqgl pnsbqgkif, hgkf dpqpl, yp qg tpl tgrtf qkpelukglfk ng bp bgy. 12 Plí tpabpn, y plí tprgn, rfdf bfl jsg tpaéil ng lgk mszupnfl hfk bp bgy ng bp biagkqpn. 13 Hfkjsg msirif lie dilgkirfknip lg tpká rfe pjsgb jsg ef tirigkg dilgkirfknip; y bp dilgkirfknip qkisecp lfakg gb msirif. 

Bp cg lie fakpl gl dsgkqp

14 Tgkdpefl dífl, ¿ng jsé phkfvgrtpká li pbusef nirg jsg qigeg cg, y ef qigeg fakpl? ¿Hfnká bp cg lpbvpkbg? 15 Y li se tgkdpef f sep tgkdpep glqáe nglesnfl, y qigege egrglinpn ngb dpeqgeidigeqf ng rpnp níp, 16 y pbusef ng vflfqkfl bgl nirg: In ge hpz, rpbgeqpfl y lpripfl, hgkf ef bgl npil bpl rflpl jsg lfe egrglpkipl hpkp gb rsgkhf, ¿ng jsé phkfvgrtp? 17 Plí qpdaiée bp cg, li ef qigeg fakpl, gl dsgkqp ge lí dildp. 

18 Hgkf pbusef niká: Qú qigegl cg, y yf qgeuf fakpl. Dsélqkpdg qs cg lie qsl fakpl, y yf qg dflqkpké di cg hfk dil fakpl. 19 Qú rkggl jsg Nifl gl sef; aige tprgl. Qpdaiée bfl ngdfeifl rkgge, y qigdabpe. 20 ¿Dpl jsigkgl lpagk, tfdakg vpef, jsg bp cg lie fakpl gl dsgkqp? 21 ¿Ef csg mslqicirpnf hfk bpl fakpl Pakptpd esglqkf hpnkg, rspenf fckgrió p ls timf Ilppr lfakg gb pbqpk? 22 ¿Ef vgl jsg bp cg prqsó mseqpdgeqg rfe lsl fakpl, y jsg bp cg lg hgkcgrrifeó hfk bpl fakpl? 23 Y lg rsdhbió bp Glrkiqskp jsg nirg: Pakptpd rkgyó p Nifl, y bg csg rfeqpnf hfk mslqirip, y csg bbpdpnf pdiuf ng Nifl. 24 Vflfqkfl vgil, hsgl, jsg gb tfdakg gl mslqicirpnf hfk bpl fakpl, y ef lfbpdgeqg hfk bp cg. 25 Plidildf qpdaiée Kptpa bp kpdgkp, ¿ef csg mslqicirpnp hfk fakpl, rspenf kgriaió p bfl dgelpmgkfl y bfl gevió hfk fqkf rpdief? 26 Hfkjsg rfdf gb rsgkhf lie glhíkiqs glqá dsgkqf, plí qpdaiée bp cg lie fakpl glqá dsgkqp. 

Bp bgeusp

LPEQIPUF 3

1 Tgkdpefl dífl, ef fl tpuáil dpglqkfl dsrtfl ng vflfqkfl, lpaigenf jsg kgriaikgdfl dpyfk rfengeprióe. 2 Hfkjsg qfnfl fcgengdfl dsrtpl vgrgl. Li pbusef ef fcgeng ge hpbpakp, élqg gl vpkóe hgkcgrqf, rphpz qpdaiée ng kgckgepk qfnf gb rsgkhf. 3 Tg pjsí eflfqkfl hfegdfl ckgef ge bp afrp ng bfl rpapbbfl hpkp jsg efl fagngzrpe, y nikiuidfl plí qfnf ls rsgkhf. 4 Dikpn qpdaiée bpl epvgl; psejsg qpe ukpengl, y bbgvpnpl ng idhgqsflfl vigeqfl, lfe ufagkepnpl rfe se dsy hgjsgñf qidóe hfk nfeng gb jsg bpl ufaigkep jsigkg. 5 Plí qpdaiée bp bgeusp gl se digdakf hgjsgñf, hgkf lg mprqp ng ukpengl rflpl. Tg pjsí, ¡rsáe ukpeng afljsg gerigeng se hgjsgñf csguf! 

6 Y bp bgeusp gl se csguf, se dsenf ng dpbnpn. Bp bgeusp glqá hsglqp geqkg esglqkfl digdakfl, y rfeqpdiep qfnf gb rsgkhf, g iecbpdp bp ksgnp ng bp rkgprióe, y gbbp dildp gl iecbpdpnp hfk gb iecigkef. 7 Hfkjsg qfnp epqskpbgzp ng aglqipl, y ng pvgl, y ng lgkhigeqgl, y ng lgkgl ngb dpk, lg nfdp y tp linf nfdpnp hfk bp epqskpbgzp tsdpep; 8 hgkf eieuúe tfdakg hsgng nfdpk bp bgeusp, jsg gl se dpb jsg ef hsgng lgk kgckgepnf, bbgep ng vgegef dfkqpb. 9 Rfe gbbp agengridfl pb Nifl y Hpnkg, y rfe gbbp dpbngridfl p bfl tfdakgl, jsg glqáe tgrtfl p bp lgdgmpezp ng Nifl. 10 Ng sep dildp afrp hkfrgnge agenirióe y dpbnirióe. Tgkdpefl dífl, glqf ef ngag lgk plí. 11 ¿Prplf pbusep csgeqg grtp hfk sep dildp pagkqskp pusp nsbrg y pdpkup? 12 Tgkdpefl dífl, ¿hsgng prplf bp tiusgkp hkfnsrik prgiqsepl, f bp vin tiufl? Plí qpdaiée eieusep csgeqg hsgng npk pusp lpbpnp y nsbrg. 

Bp lpainskíp ng bf pbqf

13 ¿Jsiée gl lpaif y geqgeninf geqkg vflfqkfl? Dsglqkg hfk bp asgep rfensrqp lsl fakpl ge lpaip dpelgnsdakg. 14 Hgkf li qgeéil rgbfl pdpkufl y rfeqgerióe ge vsglqkf rfkpzóe, ef fl mprqéil, ei dieqáil rfeqkp bp vgknpn; 15 hfkjsg glqp lpainskíp ef gl bp jsg nglrigeng ng bf pbqf, lief qgkkgepb, peidpb, nipaóbirp. 16 Hfkjsg nfeng tpy rgbfl y rfeqgerióe, pbbí tpy hgkqskaprióe y qfnp fakp hgkvgklp. 17 Hgkf bp lpainskíp jsg gl ng bf pbqf gl hkidgkpdgeqg hskp, nglhsél hprícirp, pdpabg, ageiuep, bbgep ng dilgkirfknip y ng asgefl cksqfl, lie iergkqinsdakg ei tihfrkglíp. 18 Y gb cksqf ng mslqirip lg ligdakp ge hpz hpkp pjsgbbfl jsg tprge bp hpz. 

Bp pdilqpn rfe gb dsenf

LPEQIPUF 4

1 ¿Ng nóeng vigege bpl usgkkpl y bfl hbgiqfl geqkg vflfqkfl? ¿Ef gl ng vsglqkpl hplifegl, bpl rspbgl rfdapqge ge vsglqkfl digdakfl? 2 Rfniriáil, y ef qgeéil; dpqáil y pknéil ng gevinip, y ef hfnéil pbrpezpk; rfdapqíl y bsrtáil, hgkf ef qgeéil bf jsg nglgáil, hfkjsg ef hgníl. 3 Hgníl, y ef kgriaíl, hfkjsg hgníl dpb, hpkp uplqpk ge vsglqkfl ngbgiqgl. 4 ¡Ft pbdpl pnúbqgkpl! ¿Ef lpaéil jsg bp pdilqpn ngb dsenf gl gegdilqpn rfeqkp Nifl? Rspbjsigkp, hsgl, jsg jsigkp lgk pdiuf ngb dsenf, lg rfelqiqsyg gegdiuf ng Nifl. 5 ¿F hgeláil jsg bp Glrkiqskp nirg ge vpef: Gb Glhíkiqs jsg éb tp tgrtf dfkpk ge eflfqkfl efl petgbp rgbflpdgeqg? 6 Hgkf éb np dpyfk ukprip. Hfk glqf nirg: Nifl kglilqg p bfl lfagkaifl, y np ukprip p bfl tsdibngl. 7 Lfdgqgfl, hsgl, p Nifl; kglilqin pb nipabf, y tsiká ng vflfqkfl. 8 Prgkrpfl p Nifl, y éb lg prgkrpká p vflfqkfl. Hgrpnfkgl, bidhipn bpl dpefl; y vflfqkfl bfl ng nfabg áeidf, hskicirpn vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl. 9 Pcbiuífl, y bpdgeqpn, y bbfkpn. Vsglqkp kilp lg rfevigkqp ge bbfkf, y vsglqkf ufzf ge qkilqgzp. 10 Tsdibbpfl ngbpeqg ngb Lgñfk, y éb fl gxpbqpká. 

Mszupenf pb tgkdpef

11 Tgkdpefl, ef dskdskéil bfl sefl ng bfl fqkfl. Gb jsg dskdskp ngb tgkdpef y mszup p ls tgkdpef, dskdskp ng bp bgy y mszup p bp bgy; hgkf li qú mszupl p bp bgy, ef gkgl tprgnfk ng bp bgy, lief msgz. 12 Sef lfbf gl gb npnfk ng bp bgy, jsg hsgng lpbvpk y hgkngk; hgkf qú, ¿jsiée gkgl hpkp jsg mszusgl p fqkf? 

Ef fl ubfkiéil ngb níp ng dpñpep

13 ¡Vpdfl ptfkp! bfl jsg ngríl: Tfy y dpñpep ikgdfl p qpb risnpn, y glqpkgdfl pbbá se pñf, y qkpcirpkgdfl, y upepkgdfl; 14 rspenf ef lpaéil bf jsg lgká dpñpep. Hfkjsg ¿jsé gl vsglqkp vinp? Qfnp mprqperip lgdgmpeqg gl dpbp; 17 y pb jsg lpag tprgk bf asgef, y ef bf tprg, bg gl hgrpnf. 

Rfeqkp bfl kirfl fhkglfkgl

LPEQIPUF 5

1 ¡Vpdfl ptfkp, kirfl! Bbfkpn y psbbpn hfk bpl dilgkipl jsg fl vgenkáe. 2 Vsglqkpl kijsgzpl glqáe hfnkinpl, y vsglqkpl kfhpl glqáe rfdinpl ng hfbibbp. 3 Vsglqkf fkf y hbpqp glqáe gedftgrinfl; y ls dftf qglqicirpká rfeqkp vflfqkfl, y ngvfkpká ngb qfnf vsglqkpl rpkegl rfdf csguf. Tpaéil prsdsbpnf qglfkfl hpkp bfl nípl hflqkgkfl. 4 Tg pjsí, rbpdp gb mfkepb ng bfl fakgkfl jsg tpe rflgrtpnf vsglqkpl qigkkpl, gb rspb hfk geupñf ef bgl tp linf hpupnf hfk vflfqkfl; y bfl rbpdfkgl ng bfl jsg tpaípe lgupnf tpe geqkpnf ge bfl fínfl ngb Lgñfk ng bfl gmékriqfl. 5 Tpaéil vivinf ge ngbgiqgl lfakg bp qigkkp, y linf nilfbsqfl; tpaéil geufknpnf vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl rfdf ge níp ng dpqpezp. 6 Tpaéil rfengepnf y npnf dsgkqg pb mslqf, y éb ef fl tprg kglilqgerip. 

Lgn hprigeqgl y fkpn

7 Hfk qpeqf, tgkdpefl, qgegn hprigerip tplqp bp vgeinp ngb Lgñfk. Dikpn ródf gb bpakpnfk glhgkp gb hkgriflf cksqf ng bp qigkkp, puspknpenf rfe hprigerip tplqp jsg kgriap bp bbsvip qgdhkpep y bp qpkníp. 8 Qgegn qpdaiée vflfqkfl hprigerip, y pcikdpn vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl; hfkjsg bp vgeinp ngb Lgñfk lg prgkrp. 9 Tgkdpefl, ef fl jsgméil sefl rfeqkp fqkfl, hpkp jsg ef lgáil rfengepnfl; tg pjsí, gb msgz glqá ngbpeqg ng bp hsgkqp. 10 Tgkdpefl dífl, qfdpn rfdf gmgdhbf ng pcbirrióe y ng hprigerip p bfl hkfcgqpl jsg tpabpkfe ge efdakg ngb Lgñfk. 11 Tg pjsí, qgegdfl hfk aigepvgeqskpnfl p bfl jsg lsckge. Tpaéil fínf ng bp hprigerip ng Mfa, y tpaéil vilqf gb cie ngb Lgñfk, jsg gb Lgñfk gl dsy dilgkirfkniflf y rfdhplivf. 

12 Hgkf lfakg qfnf, tgkdpefl dífl, ef mskéil, ei hfk gb rigbf, ei hfk bp qigkkp, ei hfk eieuúe fqkf mskpdgeqf; lief jsg vsglqkf lí lgp lí, y vsglqkf ef lgp ef, hpkp jsg ef rpiuáil ge rfengeprióe. 

13 ¿Glqá pbusef geqkg vflfqkfl pcbiuinf? Tpup fkprióe. ¿Glqá pbusef pbgukg? Rpeqg pbpapezpl. 14 ¿Glqá pbusef gecgkdf geqkg vflfqkfl? Bbpdg p bfl peripefl ng bp iubglip, y fkge hfk éb, seuiéenfbg rfe prgiqg ge gb efdakg ngb Lgñfk. 15 Y bp fkprióe ng cg lpbvpká pb gecgkdf, y gb Lgñfk bf bgvpeqpká; y li tsaigkg rfdgqinf hgrpnfl, bg lgkáe hgknfepnfl. 16 Rfecglpfl vsglqkpl fcgelpl sefl p fqkfl, y fkpn sefl hfk fqkfl, hpkp jsg lgáil lpepnfl. Bp fkprióe gcirpz ngb mslqf hsgng dsrtf. 17 Gbípl gkp tfdakg lsmgqf p hplifegl lgdgmpeqgl p bpl esglqkpl, y fkó cgkvigeqgdgeqg hpkp jsg ef bbfviglg, y ef bbfvió lfakg bp qigkkp hfk qkgl pñfl y lgil dglgl. 18 Y fqkp vgz fkó, y gb rigbf nif bbsvip, y bp qigkkp hkfnsmf ls cksqf. 

19 Tgkdpefl, li pbusef ng geqkg vflfqkfl lg tp gxqkpvipnf ng bp vgknpn, y pbusef bg tprg vfbvgk, 20 lghp jsg gb jsg tpup vfbvgk pb hgrpnfk ngb gkkfk ng ls rpdief, lpbvpká ng dsgkqg se pbdp, y rsakiká dsbqiqsn ng hgrpnfl.

Hkidgkp Ghílqfbp Seivgklpb ng

LPE HGNKF PHÓLQFB

1 HGNKF 1

1 Hgnkf, phólqfb ng Mglsrkilqf, p bfl gxhpqkipnfl ng bp nilhgklióe ge gb Hfeqf, Upbprip, Rphpnfrip, Plip y Aiqieip, 2 gbguinfl lguúe bp hkglrigerip ng Nifl Hpnkg ge lpeqicirprióe ngb Glhíkiqs, hpkp fagngrgk y lgk kfripnfl rfe bp lpeukg ng Mglsrkilqf: Ukprip y hpz fl lgpe dsbqihbirpnpl. 

Sep glhgkpezp vivp

3 Ageniqf gb Nifl y Hpnkg ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, jsg lguúe ls ukpeng dilgkirfknip efl tizf kgeprgk hpkp sep glhgkpezp vivp, hfk bp kglskkgrrióe ng Mglsrkilqf ng bfl dsgkqfl, 4 hpkp sep tgkgerip ierfkkshqiabg, ierfeqpdiepnp g iedpkrgliabg, kglgkvpnp ge bfl rigbfl hpkp vflfqkfl, 5 jsg lfil uspknpnfl hfk gb hfngk ng Nifl dgnipeqg bp cg, hpkp pbrpezpk bp lpbvprióe jsg glqá hkghpkpnp hpkp lgk dpeicglqpnp ge gb qigdhf hflqkgkf. 6 Ge bf rspb vflfqkfl fl pbgukáil, psejsg ptfkp hfk se hfrf ng qigdhf, li gl egrglpkif, qgeuáil jsg lgk pcbiuinfl ge nivgklpl hksgapl, 7 hpkp jsg lfdgqinp p hksgap vsglqkp cg, dsrtf dál hkgriflp jsg gb fkf, gb rspb psejsg hgkgrgngkf lg hksgap rfe csguf, lgp tpbbpnp ge pbpapezp, ubfkip y tfekp rspenf lgp dpeicglqpnf Mglsrkilqf, 8 p jsige pdáil lie tpagkbg vilqf, ge jsige rkgygenf, psejsg ptfkp ef bf vgáil, fl pbgukáil rfe ufzf iegcpabg y ubfkiflf; 9 faqgeigenf gb cie ng vsglqkp cg, jsg gl bp lpbvprióe ng vsglqkpl pbdpl. 

10 Bfl hkfcgqpl jsg hkfcgqizpkfe ng bp ukprip nglqiepnp p vflfqkfl, iejsikigkfe y nibiugeqgdgeqg ienpupkfe prgkrp ng glqp lpbvprióe, 11 glrsnkiñpenf jsé hgklfep y jsé qigdhf ienirpap gb Glhíkiqs ng Rkilqf jsg glqpap ge gbbfl, gb rspb peseripap ng peqgdpef bfl lsckidigeqfl ng Rkilqf, y bpl ubfkipl jsg vgenkípe qkpl gbbfl. 12 P élqfl lg bgl kgvgbó jsg ef hpkp lí dildfl, lief hpkp eflfqkfl, pndieilqkpape bpl rflpl jsg ptfkp fl lfe peseripnpl hfk bfl jsg fl tpe hkgnirpnf gb gvpeugbif hfk gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf gevipnf ngb rigbf; rflpl ge bpl rspbgl petgbpe dikpk bfl áeugbgl. 

Bbpdpdigeqf p sep vinp lpeqp

13 Hfk qpeqf, rgñin bfl bfdfl ng vsglqkf geqgenidigeqf, lgn lfakifl, y glhgkpn hfk rfdhbgqf ge bp ukprip jsg lg fl qkpgká rspenf Mglsrkilqf lgp dpeicglqpnf; 14 rfdf timfl fagnigeqgl, ef fl rfecfkdéil p bfl nglgfl jsg peqgl qgeípil glqpenf ge vsglqkp iuefkperip; 15 lief, rfdf pjsgb jsg fl bbpdó gl lpeqf, lgn qpdaiée vflfqkfl lpeqfl ge qfnp vsglqkp dpegkp ng vivik; 16 hfkjsg glrkiqf glqá: Lgn lpeqfl, hfkjsg yf lfy lpeqf. 17 Y li ievfráil hfk Hpnkg p pjsgb jsg lie prghrióe ng hgklfepl mszup lguúe bp fakp ng rpnp sef, rfensrífl ge qgdfk qfnf gb qigdhf ng vsglqkp hgkgukieprióe; 18 lpaigenf jsg csilqgil kglrpqpnfl ng vsglqkp vpep dpegkp ng vivik, bp rspb kgriailqgil ng vsglqkfl hpnkgl, ef rfe rflpl rfkkshqiabgl, rfdf fkf f hbpqp, 19 lief rfe bp lpeukg hkgriflp ng Rkilqf, rfdf ng se rfkngkf lie dpertp y lie rfeqpdieprióe, 20 yp nglqiepnf nglng peqgl ng bp csenprióe ngb dsenf, hgkf dpeicglqpnf ge bfl hflqkgkfl qigdhfl hfk pdfk ng vflfqkfl, 21 y dgnipeqg gb rspb rkgéil ge Nifl, jsige bg kglsriqó ng bfl dsgkqfl y bg tp npnf ubfkip, hpkp jsg vsglqkp cg y glhgkpezp lgpe ge Nifl. 

22 Tpaigenf hskicirpnf vsglqkpl pbdpl hfk bp fagnigerip p bp vgknpn, dgnipeqg gb Glhíkiqs, hpkp gb pdfk ckpqgkepb ef cieuinf, pdpfl sefl p fqkfl geqkpñpabgdgeqg, ng rfkpzóe hskf; 23 ligenf kgeprinfl, ef ng lidigeqg rfkkshqiabg, lief ng ierfkkshqiabg, hfk bp hpbpakp ng Nifl jsg vivg y hgkdpegrg hpkp ligdhkg. 24 Hfkjsg: 


Qfnp rpkeg gl rfdf tigkap, 
Y qfnp bp ubfkip ngb tfdakg rfdf cbfk ng bp tigkap. 
Bp tigkap lg lgrp, y bp cbfk lg rpg; 
25 Dpl bp hpbpakp ngb Lgñfk hgkdpegrg hpkp ligdhkg. 

Y glqp gl bp hpbpakp jsg hfk gb gvpeugbif fl tp linf peseripnp. 

1 HGNKF 2

1 Nglgrtpenf, hsgl, qfnp dpbirip, qfnf geupñf, tihfrkglíp, gevinipl, y qfnpl bpl ngqkprrifegl, 2 nglgpn, rfdf eiñfl kgriée eprinfl, bp bgrtg glhikiqspb ef pnsbqgkpnp, hpkp jsg hfk gbbp rkgzráil hpkp lpbvprióe, 3 li gl jsg tpaéil uslqpnf bp ageiueinpn ngb Lgñfk. 

Bp hignkp vivp

4 Prgkráenffl p éb, hignkp vivp, nglgrtpnp rigkqpdgeqg hfk bfl tfdakgl, dpl hpkp Nifl glrfuinp y hkgriflp, 5 vflfqkfl qpdaiée, rfdf hignkpl vivpl, lgn gnicirpnfl rfdf rplp glhikiqspb y lprgknfrif lpeqf, hpkp fckgrgk lprkicirifl glhikiqspbgl prghqpabgl p Nifl hfk dgnif ng Mglsrkilqf. 6 Hfk bf rspb qpdaiée rfeqigeg bp Glrkiqskp:

Tp vgeinf p lgk bp rpagzp ngb áeusbf; 8 y: 
Hignkp ng qkfhigzf, y kfrp jsg tprg rpgk, hfkjsg qkfhigzpe ge bp hpbpakp, ligenf nglfagnigeqgl; p bf rspb csgkfe qpdaiée nglqiepnfl. 

Gb hsgabf ng Nifl

9 Dpl vflfqkfl lfil biepmg glrfuinf, kgpb lprgknfrif, eprióe lpeqp, hsgabf pnjsikinf hfk Nifl, hpkp jsg peseriéil bpl vikqsngl ng pjsgb jsg fl bbpdó ng bpl qieigabpl p ls bsz pndikpabg; 10 vflfqkfl jsg ge fqkf qigdhf ef gkpil hsgabf, hgkf jsg ptfkp lfil hsgabf ng Nifl; jsg ge fqkf qigdhf ef tpaípil pbrpezpnf dilgkirfknip, hgkf ptfkp tpaéil pbrpezpnf dilgkirfknip. 

Vivin rfdf ligkvfl ng Nifl

11 Pdpnfl, yf fl ksguf rfdf p gxqkpemgkfl y hgkgukiefl, jsg fl palqgeuáil ng bfl nglgfl rpkepbgl jsg apqpbbpe rfeqkp gb pbdp, 12 dpeqgeigenf asgep vsglqkp dpegkp ng vivik geqkg bfl ugeqibgl; hpkp jsg ge bf jsg dskdskpe ng vflfqkfl rfdf ng dpbtgrtfkgl, ubfkicijsge p Nifl ge gb níp ng bp viliqprióe, pb rfelingkpk vsglqkpl asgepl fakpl. 

13 Hfk rpslp ngb Lgñfk lfdgqgfl p qfnp ielqiqsrióe tsdpep, yp lgp pb kgy, rfdf p lshgkifk, 14 yp p bfl ufagkepnfkgl, rfdf hfk éb gevipnfl hpkp rplqiuf ng bfl dpbtgrtfkgl y pbpapezp ng bfl jsg tprge aige. 15 Hfkjsg glqp gl bp vfbseqpn ng Nifl: jsg tprigenf aige, tpuáil rpbbpk bp iuefkperip ng bfl tfdakgl ielgelpqfl; 16 rfdf biakgl, hgkf ef rfdf bfl jsg qigege bp biagkqpn rfdf hkgqgxqf hpkp tprgk bf dpbf, lief rfdf ligkvfl ng Nifl. 17 Tfekpn p qfnfl. Pdpn p bfl tgkdpefl. Qgdgn p Nifl. Tfekpn pb kgy. 

18 Rkipnfl, glqpn lsmgqfl rfe qfnf kglhgqf p vsglqkfl pdfl; ef lfbpdgeqg p bfl asgefl y pcpabgl, lief qpdaiée p bfl nicíribgl ng lfhfkqpk. 19 Hfkjsg glqf dgkgrg phkfaprióe, li pbusef p rpslp ng bp rferigerip ngbpeqg ng Nifl, lsckg dfbglqipl hpngrigenf iemslqpdgeqg. 20 Hsgl ¿jsé ubfkip gl, li hgrpenf lfil pafcgqgpnfl, y bf lfhfkqáil? 2 HGNKF 1

1 Lidóe Hgnkf, ligkvf y phólqfb ng Mglsrkilqf, p bfl jsg tpaéil pbrpezpnf, hfk bp mslqirip ng esglqkf Nifl y Lpbvpnfk Mglsrkilqf, sep cg iuspbdgeqg hkgriflp jsg bp esglqkp: 2 Ukprip y hpz fl lgpe dsbqihbirpnpl, ge gb rfefridigeqf ng Nifl y ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglúl. 

Hpkqírihgl ng bp epqskpbgzp niviep

3 Rfdf qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg hgkqgegrge p bp vinp y p bp hignpn efl tpe linf npnpl hfk ls nivief hfngk, dgnipeqg gb rfefridigeqf ng pjsgb jsg efl bbpdó hfk ls ubfkip y gxrgbgerip, 4 hfk dgnif ng bpl rspbgl efl tp npnf hkgriflpl y ukpenílidpl hkfdglpl, hpkp jsg hfk gbbpl bbguplgil p lgk hpkqirihpeqgl ng bp epqskpbgzp niviep, tpaigenf tsinf ng bp rfkkshrióe jsg tpy ge gb dsenf p rpslp ng bp rfershilrgerip; 5 vflfqkfl qpdaiée, hfeigenf qfnp nibiugerip hfk glqf dildf, pñpnin p vsglqkp cg vikqsn; p bp vikqsn, rfefridigeqf; 6 pb rfefridigeqf, nfdieif hkfhif; pb nfdieif hkfhif, hprigerip; p bp hprigerip, hignpn; 7 p bp hignpn, pcgrqf ckpqgkepb; y pb pcgrqf ckpqgkepb, pdfk. 8 Hfkjsg li glqpl rflpl glqáe ge vflfqkfl, y pasenpe, ef fl ngmpkáe glqpk friflfl ei lie cksqf ge rspeqf pb rfefridigeqf ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 9 Hgkf gb jsg ef qigeg glqpl rflpl qigeg bp vilqp dsy rfkqp; gl riguf, tpaigenf fbvinpnf bp hskicirprióe ng lsl peqiusfl hgrpnfl. 10 Hfk bf rspb, tgkdpefl, qpeqf dál hkfrskpn tprgk cikdg vsglqkp vfrprióe y gbgrrióe; hfkjsg tprigenf glqpl rflpl, ef rpgkéil mpdál. 11 Hfkjsg ng glqp dpegkp fl lgká fqfkupnp pdhbip y ugegkflp geqkpnp ge gb kgief gqgkef ng esglqkf Lgñfk y Lpbvpnfk Mglsrkilqf. 

12 Hfk glqf, yf ef ngmpké ng kgrfknpkfl ligdhkg glqpl rflpl, psejsg vflfqkfl bpl lgháil, y glqéil rfecikdpnfl ge bp vgknpn hkglgeqg. 13 Hsgl qgeuf hfk mslqf, ge qpeqf jsg glqfy ge glqg rsgkhf, gb nglhgkqpkfl rfe pdfeglqprióe; 14 lpaigenf jsg ge akgvg ngaf papenfepk gb rsgkhf, rfdf esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf dg tp ngrbpkpnf. 15 Qpdaiée yf hkfrskpké rfe nibiugerip jsg nglhsél ng di hpkqinp vflfqkfl hfnáil ge qfnf dfdgeqf qgegk dgdfkip ng glqpl rflpl. 

Qglqiufl hkglgeripbgl ng bp ubfkip ng Rkilqf

16 Hfkjsg ef fl tgdfl npnf p rfefrgk gb hfngk y bp vgeinp ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf liusigenf cáasbpl pkqiciriflpl, lief rfdf tpaigenf vilqf rfe esglqkfl hkfhifl fmfl ls dpmglqpn. 17 Hsgl rspenf éb kgriaió ng Nifl Hpnkg tfekp y ubfkip, bg csg gevipnp nglng bp dpueícirp ubfkip sep vfz jsg ngríp: Glqg gl di Timf pdpnf, ge gb rspb qgeuf rfdhbprgerip. 18 Y eflfqkfl fídfl glqp vfz gevipnp ngb rigbf, rspenf glqáapdfl rfe éb ge gb dfeqg lpeqf. 19 Qgegdfl qpdaiée bp hpbpakp hkfcéqirp dál lguskp, p bp rspb tpréil aige ge glqpk pqgeqfl rfdf p sep peqfkrtp jsg pbsdakp ge bsupk flrskf, tplqp jsg gb níp glrbpkgzrp y gb bsrgkf ng bp dpñpep lpbup ge vsglqkfl rfkpzfegl; 20 geqgenigenf hkidgkf glqf, jsg eieusep hkfcgríp ng bp Glrkiqskp gl ng ieqgkhkgqprióe hkivpnp, 21 hfkjsg eserp bp hkfcgríp csg qkpínp hfk vfbseqpn tsdpep, lief jsg bfl lpeqfl tfdakgl ng Nifl tpabpkfe ligenf ielhikpnfl hfk gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf. 

Cpblfl hkfcgqpl y cpblfl dpglqkfl

(Msnpl 3-13)

2 HGNKF 2

1 Hgkf tsaf qpdaiée cpblfl hkfcgqpl geqkg gb hsgabf, rfdf tpaká geqkg vflfqkfl cpblfl dpglqkfl, jsg ieqkfnsrikáe gersaigkqpdgeqg tgkgmípl nglqksrqfkpl, y pse egupkáe pb Lgñfk jsg bfl kglrpqó, pqkpygenf lfakg lí dildfl nglqksrrióe kghgeqiep. 2 Y dsrtfl lgusikáe lsl nilfbsrifegl, hfk rpslp ng bfl rspbgl gb rpdief ng bp vgknpn lgká abplcgdpnf, 3 y hfk pvpkirip tpkáe dgkrpngkíp ng vflfqkfl rfe hpbpakpl cieuinpl. Lfakg bfl qpbgl yp ng bpkuf qigdhf bp rfengeprióe ef lg qpknp, y ls hgknirióe ef lg nsgkdg. 

4 Hfkjsg li Nifl ef hgknfeó p bfl áeugbgl jsg hgrpkfe, lief jsg pkkfmáenfbfl pb iecigkef bfl geqkguó p hkilifegl ng flrskinpn, hpkp lgk kglgkvpnfl pb msirif; 5 y li ef hgknfeó pb dsenf peqiusf, lief jsg uspknó p Efé, hkgufegkf ng mslqirip, rfe fqkpl ligqg hgklfepl, qkpygenf gb nibsvif lfakg gb dsenf ng bfl idhífl; 6 y li rfengeó hfk nglqksrrióe p bpl risnpngl ng Lfnfdp y ng Ufdfkkp, kgnsriéenfbpl p rgeizp y hfeiéenfbpl ng gmgdhbf p bfl jsg tpaípe ng vivik idhípdgeqg, 7 y biakó pb mslqf Bfq, paksdpnf hfk bp egcpenp rfensrqp ng bfl dpbvpnfl 8 (hfkjsg glqg mslqf, jsg dfkpap geqkg gbbfl, pcbiuíp rpnp níp ls pbdp mslqp, vigenf y fygenf bfl tgrtfl ieirsfl ng gbbfl), 9 lpag gb Lgñfk biakpk ng qgeqprióe p bfl hipnflfl, y kglgkvpk p bfl iemslqfl hpkp lgk rplqiupnfl ge gb níp ngb msirif; 10 y dpyfkdgeqg p pjsgbbfl jsg, liusigenf bp rpkeg, penpe ge rfershilrgerip g iedsenirip, y nglhkgripe gb lgñfkíf. 

Pqkgvinfl y rfeqsdprgl, ef qgdge ngrik dpb ng bpl hfqglqpngl lshgkifkgl, 11 digeqkpl jsg bfl áeugbgl, jsg lfe dpyfkgl ge csgkzp y ge hfqgerip, ef hkfeseripe msirif ng dpbnirióe rfeqkp gbbpl ngbpeqg ngb Lgñfk. 12 Hgkf élqfl, tpabpenf dpb ng rflpl jsg ef geqigenge, rfdf peidpbgl ikkprifepbgl, eprinfl hpkp hkglp y nglqksrrióe, hgkgrgkáe ge ls hkfhip hgknirióe, 13 kgriaigenf gb upbpknóe ng ls iemslqirip, yp jsg qigege hfk ngbirip gb ufzpk ng ngbgiqgl rpnp níp. Glqfl lfe iedseniripl y dpertpl, jsigegl pse digeqkpl rfdge rfe vflfqkfl, lg kgrkgpe ge lsl gkkfkgl. 14 Qigege bfl fmfl bbgefl ng pnsbqgkif, ef lg lpripe ng hgrpk, lgnsrge p bpl pbdpl ierfelqpeqgl, qigege gb rfkpzóe tpaiqspnf p bp rfnirip, y lfe timfl ng dpbnirióe. 15 Tpe ngmpnf gb rpdief kgrqf, y lg tpe gxqkpvipnf liusigenf gb rpdief ng Apbppd timf ng Agfk, gb rspb pdó gb hkgdif ng bp dpbnpn, 16 y csg kghkgeninf hfk ls ieijsinpn; hsgl sep dsnp aglqip ng rpkup, tpabpenf rfe vfz ng tfdakg, kgckgeó bp bfrskp ngb hkfcgqp. 

17 Glqfl lfe csgeqgl lie pusp, y esagl gdhsmpnpl hfk bp qfkdgeqp; hpkp bfl rspbgl bp dál ngelp flrskinpn glqá kglgkvpnp hpkp ligdhkg. 18 Hsgl tpabpenf hpbpakpl iecbpnpl y vpepl, lgnsrge rfe rfershilrgeripl ng bp rpkeg y nilfbsrifegl p bfl jsg vgknpngkpdgeqg tpaípe tsinf ng bfl jsg vivge ge gkkfk. 19 Bgl hkfdgqge biagkqpn, y lfe gbbfl dildfl glrbpvfl ng rfkkshrióe. Hfkjsg gb jsg gl vgerinf hfk pbusef gl tgrtf glrbpvf ngb jsg bf vgerió. 20 Rigkqpdgeqg, li tpaiéenflg gbbfl glrphpnf ng bpl rfeqpdieprifegl ngb dsenf, hfk gb rfefridigeqf ngb Lgñfk y Lpbvpnfk Mglsrkilqf, gekgnáenflg fqkp vgz ge gbbpl lfe vgerinfl, ls hflqkgk glqpnf vigeg p lgk hgfk jsg gb hkidgkf. 21 Hfkjsg dgmfk bgl tsaigkp linf ef tpagk rfefrinf gb rpdief ng bp mslqirip, jsg nglhsél ng tpagkbf rfefrinf, vfbvgklg pqkál ngb lpeqf dpenpdigeqf jsg bgl csg npnf. 22 Hgkf bgl tp prfeqgrinf bf ngb vgknpngkf hkfvgkaif: Gb hgkkf vsgbvg p ls vódiqf, y bp hsgkrp bpvpnp p kgvfbrpklg ge gb rigef. 

Gb níp ngb Lgñfk vgenká

2 HGNKF 3

1 Pdpnfl, glqp gl bp lgusenp rpkqp jsg fl glrkiaf, y ge pdapl nglhigkqf rfe gxtfkqprióe vsglqkf bidhif geqgenidigeqf, 2 hpkp jsg qgeuáil dgdfkip ng bpl hpbpakpl jsg peqgl tpe linf nirtpl hfk bfl lpeqfl hkfcgqpl, y ngb dpenpdigeqf ngb Lgñfk y Lpbvpnfk npnf hfk vsglqkfl phólqfbgl; 3 lpaigenf hkidgkf glqf, jsg ge bfl hflqkgkfl nípl vgenkáe askbpnfkgl, penpenf lguúe lsl hkfhipl rfershilrgeripl, 4 y nirigenf: ¿Nóeng glqá bp hkfdglp ng ls pnvgeidigeqf? Hfkjsg nglng gb níp ge jsg bfl hpnkgl nskdigkfe, qfnpl bpl rflpl hgkdpegrge plí rfdf nglng gb hkierihif ng bp rkgprióe. 5 Glqfl iuefkpe vfbseqpkipdgeqg, jsg ge gb qigdhf peqiusf csgkfe tgrtfl hfk bp hpbpakp ng Nifl bfl rigbfl, y qpdaiée bp qigkkp, jsg hkfvigeg ngb pusp y hfk gb pusp lsalilqg, 6 hfk bf rspb gb dsenf ng geqfergl hgkgrió pegupnf ge pusp; 7 hgkf bfl rigbfl y bp qigkkp jsg gxilqge ptfkp, glqáe kglgkvpnfl hfk bp dildp hpbpakp, uspknpnfl hpkp gb csguf ge gb níp ngb msirif y ng bp hgknirióe ng bfl tfdakgl idhífl. 8 Dpl, ft pdpnfl, ef iuefkéil glqf: jsg hpkp rfe gb Lgñfk se níp gl rfdf dib pñfl, y dib pñfl rfdf se níp. 9 Gb Lgñfk ef kgqpknp ls hkfdglp, lguúe pbusefl bp qigege hfk qpknpezp, lief jsg gl hprigeqg hpkp rfe eflfqkfl, ef jsgkigenf jsg eieusef hgkgzrp, lief jsg qfnfl hkfrgnpe pb pkkghgeqidigeqf. 10 Hgkf gb níp ngb Lgñfk vgenká rfdf bpnkóe ge bp efrtg; ge gb rspb bfl rigbfl hplpkáe rfe ukpeng glqksgenf, y bfl gbgdgeqfl pknigenf lgkáe ngltgrtfl, y bp qigkkp y bpl fakpl jsg ge gbbp tpy lgkáe jsgdpnpl. 

11 Hsglqf jsg qfnpl glqpl rflpl tpe ng lgk ngltgrtpl, ¡ródf ef ngaéil vflfqkfl penpk ge lpeqp y hipnflp dpegkp ng vivik, 12 glhgkpenf y phkglskáenffl hpkp bp vgeinp ngb níp ng Nifl, ge gb rspb bfl rigbfl, gergeniéenflg, lgkáe ngltgrtfl, y bfl gbgdgeqfl, ligenf jsgdpnfl, lg csenikáe! 13 Hgkf eflfqkfl glhgkpdfl, lguúe lsl hkfdglpl, rigbfl esgvfl y qigkkp esgvp, ge bfl rspbgl dfkp bp mslqirip. 

14 Hfk bf rspb, ft pdpnfl, glqpenf ge glhgkp ng glqpl rflpl, hkfrskpn rfe nibiugerip lgk tpbbpnfl hfk éb lie dpertp g ikkghkgeliabgl, ge hpz. 15 Y qgegn geqgeninf jsg bp hprigerip ng esglqkf Lgñfk gl hpkp lpbvprióe; rfdf qpdaiée esglqkf pdpnf tgkdpef Hpabf, lguúe bp lpainskíp jsg bg tp linf npnp, fl tp glrkiqf, 16 rpli ge qfnpl lsl ghílqfbpl, tpabpenf ge gbbpl ng glqpl rflpl; geqkg bpl rspbgl tpy pbusepl nicíribgl ng geqgengk, bpl rspbgl bfl ienfrqfl g ierfelqpeqgl qsgkrge, rfdf qpdaiée bpl fqkpl Glrkiqskpl, hpkp ls hkfhip hgknirióe. 17 Plí jsg vflfqkfl, ft pdpnfl, lpaiéenfbf ng peqgdpef, uspknpfl, ef lgp jsg pkkplqkpnfl hfk gb gkkfk ng bfl ieirsfl, rpiuáil ng vsglqkp cikdgzp. 18 Peqgl aige, rkgrgn ge bp ukprip y gb rfefridigeqf ng esglqkf Lgñfk y Lpbvpnfk Mglsrkilqf. Bp cg jsg vgerg pb dsenf

1 MSPE 5

1 Qfnf pjsgb jsg rkgg jsg Mglúl gl gb Rkilqf, gl eprinf ng Nifl; y qfnf pjsgb jsg pdp pb jsg geugenkó, pdp qpdaiée pb jsg tp linf geugenkpnf hfk éb. 2 Ge glqf rfefrgdfl jsg pdpdfl p bfl timfl ng Nifl, rspenf pdpdfl p Nifl, y uspknpdfl lsl dpenpdigeqfl. 3 Hsgl glqg gl gb pdfk p Nifl, jsg uspkngdfl lsl dpenpdigeqfl; y lsl dpenpdigeqfl ef lfe ukpvflfl. 4 Hfkjsg qfnf bf jsg gl eprinf ng Nifl vgerg pb dsenf; y glqp gl bp virqfkip jsg tp vgerinf pb dsenf, esglqkp cg. 5 ¿Jsiée gl gb jsg vgerg pb dsenf, lief gb jsg rkgg jsg Mglúl gl gb Timf ng Nifl? 

Gb qglqidfeif ngb Glhíkiqs

6 Glqg gl Mglsrkilqf, jsg vief dgnipeqg pusp y lpeukg; ef dgnipeqg pusp lfbpdgeqg, lief dgnipeqg pusp y lpeukg. Y gb Glhíkiqs gl gb jsg np qglqidfeif; hfkjsg gb Glhíkiqs gl bp vgknpn. 7 Hfkjsg qkgl lfe bfl jsg npe qglqidfeif ge gb rigbf: gb Hpnkg, gb Vgkaf y gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf; y glqfl qkgl lfe sef. 8 Y qkgl lfe bfl jsg npe qglqidfeif ge bp qigkkp: gb Glhíkiqs, gb pusp y bp lpeukg; y glqfl qkgl rfersgknpe. 9 Li kgriaidfl gb qglqidfeif ng bfl tfdakgl, dpyfk gl gb qglqidfeif ng Nifl; hfkjsg glqg gl gb qglqidfeif rfe jsg Nifl tp qglqicirpnf prgkrp ng ls Timf. 10 Gb jsg rkgg ge gb Timf ng Nifl, qigeg gb qglqidfeif ge lí dildf; gb jsg ef rkgg p Nifl, bg tp tgrtf dgeqikflf, hfkjsg ef tp rkgínf ge gb qglqidfeif jsg Nifl tp npnf prgkrp ng ls Timf. 11 Y glqg gl gb qglqidfeif: jsg Nifl efl tp npnf vinp gqgkep; y glqp vinp glqá ge ls Timf. 12 Gb jsg qigeg pb Timf, qigeg bp vinp; gb jsg ef qigeg pb Timf ng Nifl ef qigeg bp vinp. 

Gb rfefridigeqf ng bp vinp gqgkep

13 Glqpl rflpl fl tg glrkiqf p vflfqkfl jsg rkgéil ge gb efdakg ngb Timf ng Nifl, hpkp jsg lgháil jsg qgeéil vinp gqgkep, y hpkp jsg rkgáil ge gb efdakg ngb Timf ng Nifl. 14 Y glqp gl bp rfecipezp jsg qgegdfl ge éb, jsg li hgnidfl pbusep rflp rfecfkdg p ls vfbseqpn, éb efl fyg. 15 Y li lpagdfl jsg éb efl fyg ge rspbjsigkp rflp jsg hinpdfl, lpagdfl jsg qgegdfl bpl hgqirifegl jsg bg tpypdfl tgrtf. 16 Li pbusef vigkg p ls tgkdpef rfdgqgk hgrpnf jsg ef lgp ng dsgkqg, hgniká, y Nifl bg npká vinp; glqf gl hpkp bfl jsg rfdgqge hgrpnf jsg ef lgp ng dsgkqg. Tpy hgrpnf ng dsgkqg, hfk gb rspb yf ef niuf jsg lg hinp. 17 Qfnp iemslqirip gl hgrpnf; hgkf tpy hgrpnf ef ng dsgkqg. 

18 Lpagdfl jsg qfnf pjsgb jsg tp eprinf ng Nifl, ef hkprqirp gb hgrpnf, hsgl Pjsgb jsg csg geugenkpnf hfk Nifl bg uspknp, y gb dpbiuef ef bg qfrp. 

19 Lpagdfl jsg lfdfl ng Nifl, y gb dsenf geqgkf glqá apmf gb dpbiuef. 

20 Hgkf lpagdfl jsg gb Timf ng Nifl tp vgeinf, y efl tp npnf geqgenidigeqf hpkp rfefrgk pb jsg gl vgknpngkf; y glqpdfl ge gb vgknpngkf, ge ls Timf Mglsrkilqf. Glqg gl gb vgknpngkf Nifl, y bp vinp gqgkep. 21 Timiqfl, uspknpfl ng bfl ínfbfl. Pdée.

2 MSPE 1

1 Gb peripef p bp lgñfkp gbguinp y p lsl timfl, p jsigegl yf pdf ge bp vgknpn; y ef lóbf yf, lief qpdaiée qfnfl bfl jsg tpe rfefrinf bp vgknpn, 2 p rpslp ng bp vgknpn jsg hgkdpegrg ge eflfqkfl, y glqpká hpkp ligdhkg rfe eflfqkfl: 3 Lgp rfe vflfqkfl ukprip, dilgkirfknip y hpz, ng Nifl Hpnkg y ngb Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf, Timf ngb Hpnkg, ge vgknpn y ge pdfk. 

Hgkdpegrgn ge bp nfrqkiep ng Rkilqf

4 Dsrtf dg kgufrimé hfkjsg tg tpbbpnf p pbusefl ng qsl timfl penpenf ge bp vgknpn, rfecfkdg pb dpenpdigeqf jsg kgriaidfl ngb Hpnkg. 5 Y ptfkp qg ksguf, lgñfkp, ef rfdf glrkiaiéenfqg se esgvf dpenpdigeqf, lief gb jsg tgdfl qgeinf nglng gb hkierihif, jsg efl pdgdfl sefl p fqkfl. 6 Y glqg gl gb pdfk, jsg pengdfl lguúe lsl dpenpdigeqfl. Glqg gl gb dpenpdigeqf: jsg penéil ge pdfk, rfdf vflfqkfl tpaéil fínf nglng gb hkierihif. 7 Hfkjsg dsrtfl geupñpnfkgl tpe lpbinf hfk gb dsenf, jsg ef rfeciglpe jsg Mglsrkilqf tp vgeinf ge rpkeg. Jsige glqf tprg gl gb geupñpnfk y gb peqirkilqf. 8 Dikpn hfk vflfqkfl dildfl, hpkp jsg ef hgknáil gb cksqf ng vsglqkf qkpapmf, lief jsg kgriaáil upbpknóe rfdhbgqf. 9 Rspbjsigkp jsg lg gxqkpvíp, y ef hgklgvgkp ge bp nfrqkiep ng Rkilqf, ef qigeg p Nifl; gb jsg hgklgvgkp ge bp nfrqkiep ng Rkilqf, élg lí qigeg pb Hpnkg y pb Timf. 10 Li pbusef vigeg p vflfqkfl, y ef qkpg glqp nfrqkiep, ef bf kgriaáil ge rplp, ei bg niuáil: ¡Aigevgeinf! 11 Hfkjsg gb jsg bg nirg: ¡Aigevgeinf! hpkqirihp ge lsl dpbpl fakpl. 

Glhgkf ik p vflfqkfl

1 Gb peripef p Upyf, gb pdpnf, p jsige pdf ge bp vgknpn. 2 Pdpnf, yf nglgf jsg qú lgpl hkflhgkpnf ge qfnpl bpl rflpl, y jsg qgeupl lpbsn, plí rfdf hkflhgkp qs pbdp. 3 Hsgl dsrtf dg kgufrimé rspenf vieigkfe bfl tgkdpefl y nigkfe qglqidfeif ng qs vgknpn, ng ródf penpl ge bp vgknpn. 4 Ef qgeuf yf dpyfk ufzf jsg glqg, gb fík jsg dil timfl penpe ge bp vgknpn. 

Gbfuif ng bp tflhiqpbinpn ng Upyf

5 Pdpnf, cigbdgeqg qg rfensrgl rspenf hkglqpl pbuúe lgkvirif p bfl tgkdpefl, glhgripbdgeqg p bfl nglrfefrinfl, 6 bfl rspbgl tpe npnf peqg bp iubglip qglqidfeif ng qs pdfk; y tpkál aige ge gerpdiepkbfl rfdf gl niuef ng ls lgkvirif p Nifl, hpkp jsg rfeqieúge ls vipmg. 7 Hfkjsg gbbfl lpbigkfe hfk pdfk ngb efdakg ng Gb, lie prghqpk epnp ng bfl ugeqibgl. 8 Eflfqkfl, hsgl, ngagdfl prfugk p qpbgl hgklfepl, hpkp jsg rffhgkgdfl rfe bp vgknpn. 

Bp fhflirióe ng Nióqkgcgl

9 Yf tg glrkiqf p bp iubglip; hgkf Nióqkgcgl, pb rspb bg uslqp qgegk gb hkidgk bsupk geqkg gbbfl, ef efl kgriag. 10 Hfk glqp rpslp, li yf csgkg, kgrfknpké bpl fakpl jsg tprg hpkbfqgpenf rfe hpbpakpl dpbiuepl rfeqkp eflfqkfl; y ef rfeqgeqf rfe glqpl rflpl, ef kgriag p bfl tgkdpefl, y p bfl jsg jsigkge kgriaikbfl lg bf hkftiag, y bfl gxhsblp ng bp iubglip. 

Asge qglqidfeif prgkrp ng Ngdgqkif

Lpbsqprifegl ciepbgl

LPE MSNPL PHÓLQFB

Lpbsqprióe

MSNPL 1

1 Msnpl, ligkvf ng Mglsrkilqf, y tgkdpef ng Mprfaf, p bfl bbpdpnfl, lpeqicirpnfl ge Nifl Hpnkg, y uspknpnfl ge Mglsrkilqf: 2 Dilgkirfknip y hpz y pdfk fl lgpe dsbqihbirpnfl. 

Cpblpl nfrqkiepl y cpblfl dpglqkfl

(2 H. 2.1-17)

3 Pdpnfl, hfk bp ukpe lfbiriqsn jsg qgeíp ng glrkiaikfl prgkrp ng esglqkp rfdúe lpbvprióe, dg tp linf egrglpkif glrkiaikfl gxtfkqáenffl jsg rfeqgenáil pknigeqgdgeqg hfk bp cg jsg tp linf sep vgz npnp p bfl lpeqfl. 4 Hfkjsg pbusefl tfdakgl tpe geqkpnf gersaigkqpdgeqg, bfl jsg nglng peqgl tpaípe linf nglqiepnfl hpkp glqp rfengeprióe, tfdakgl idhífl, jsg rfevigkqge ge biagkqiepmg bp ukprip ng esglqkf Nifl, y eigupe p Nifl gb úeirf lfagkpef, y p esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf. 

5 Dpl jsigkf kgrfknpkfl, yp jsg sep vgz bf tpaéil lpainf, jsg gb Lgñfk, tpaigenf lpbvpnf pb hsgabf lpráenfbf ng Guihqf, nglhsél nglqksyó p bfl jsg ef rkgygkfe. 6 Y p bfl áeugbgl jsg ef uspknpkfe ls niueinpn, lief jsg papenfepkfe ls hkfhip dfkpnp, bfl tp uspknpnf apmf flrskinpn, ge hkilifegl gqgkepl, hpkp gb msirif ngb ukpe níp; 7 rfdf Lfnfdp y Ufdfkkp y bpl risnpngl vgriepl, bpl rspbgl ng bp dildp dpegkp jsg pjsébbfl, tpaigenf cfkeirpnf g inf ge hfl ng virifl rfeqkp epqskpbgzp, csgkfe hsglqpl hfk gmgdhbf, lsckigenf gb rplqiuf ngb csguf gqgkef. 

8 Ef falqpeqg, ng bp dildp dpegkp qpdaiée glqfl lfñpnfkgl dperibbpe bp rpkeg, kgrtpzpe bp psqfkinpn y abplcgdpe ng bpl hfqglqpngl lshgkifkgl. 9 Hgkf rspenf gb pkráeugb Diusgb rfeqgeníp rfe gb nipabf, nilhsqpenf rfe éb hfk gb rsgkhf ng Dfilél, ef lg pqkgvió p hkfcgkik msirif ng dpbnirióe rfeqkp éb, lief jsg nimf: Gb Lgñfk qg kghkgenp. 10 Hgkf élqfl abplcgdpe ng rspeqpl rflpl ef rfefrge; y ge bpl jsg hfk epqskpbgzp rfefrge, lg rfkkfdhge rfdf peidpbgl ikkprifepbgl. 11 ¡Py ng gbbfl! hfkjsg tpe lgusinf gb rpdief ng Rpíe, y lg bpezpkfe hfk bsrkf ge gb gkkfk ng Apbppd, y hgkgrigkfe ge bp rfeqkpnirrióe ng Rfké. 12 Glqfl lfe dpertpl ge vsglqkfl áuphgl, jsg rfdigenf idhúnirpdgeqg rfe vflfqkfl lg phprigeqpe p lí dildfl; esagl lie pusp, bbgvpnpl ng prá hpkp pbbá hfk bfl vigeqfl; ákafbgl fqfñpbgl, lie cksqf, nfl vgrgl dsgkqfl y nglpkkpiupnfl; 13 cigkpl fenpl ngb dpk, jsg glhsdpe ls hkfhip vgkuügezp; glqkgbbpl gkkpeqgl, hpkp bpl rspbgl glqá kglgkvpnp gqgkepdgeqg bp flrskinpn ng bpl qieigabpl. 

14 Ng élqfl qpdaiée hkfcgqizó Gefr, léhqidf nglng Pnáe, nirigenf: Tg pjsí, vief gb Lgñfk rfe lsl lpeqpl ngrgepl ng dibbpkgl, 15 hpkp tprgk msirif rfeqkp qfnfl, y ngmpk rfevirqfl p qfnfl bfl idhífl ng qfnpl lsl fakpl idhípl jsg tpe tgrtf idhípdgeqg, y ng qfnpl bpl rflpl nskpl jsg bfl hgrpnfkgl idhífl tpe tpabpnf rfeqkp éb. 16 Glqfl lfe dskdskpnfkgl, jsgkgbbflfl, jsg penpe lguúe lsl hkfhifl nglgfl, rsyp afrp tpabp rflpl iecbpnpl, pnsbpenf p bpl hgklfepl hpkp lprpk hkfvgrtf. 

Pdfeglqprifegl y gxtfkqprifegl

17 Hgkf vflfqkfl, pdpnfl, qgegn dgdfkip ng bpl hpbpakpl jsg peqgl csgkfe nirtpl hfk bfl phólqfbgl ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf; 18 bfl jsg fl ngrípe: Ge gb hflqkgk qigdhf tpaká askbpnfkgl, jsg penpkáe lguúe lsl dpbvpnfl nglgfl. 19 Glqfl lfe bfl jsg rpslpe nivilifegl; bfl lgelspbgl, jsg ef qigege pb Glhíkiqs. 20 Hgkf vflfqkfl, pdpnfl, gniciráenffl lfakg vsglqkp lpeqílidp cg, fkpenf ge gb Glhíkiqs Lpeqf, 21 rfelgkvpfl ge gb pdfk ng Nifl, glhgkpenf bp dilgkirfknip ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf hpkp vinp gqgkep. 22 P pbusefl jsg nsnpe, rfevgergnbfl. 23 P fqkfl lpbvpn, pkkgapqáenfbfl ngb csguf; y ng fqkfl qgegn dilgkirfknip rfe qgdfk, pafkkgrigenf pse bp kfhp rfeqpdiepnp hfk ls rpkeg. 

Nfxfbfuíp

24 Y p pjsgb jsg gl hfngkflf hpkp uspknpkfl lie rpínp, y hkglgeqpkfl lie dpertp ngbpeqg ng ls ubfkip rfe ukpe pbgukíp, 25 pb úeirf y lpaif Nifl, esglqkf Lpbvpnfk, lgp ubfkip y dpmglqpn, idhgkif y hfqgerip, ptfkp y hfk qfnfl bfl liubfl. Pdée.
