GB PHFRPBIHLIL 

Ng Lpe Mspe

Bp kgvgbprióe ng Mglsrkilqf

PHFRPBIHLIL 1

1 Bp kgvgbprióe ng Mglsrkilqf, jsg Nifl bg nif, hpkp dpeicglqpk p lsl ligkvfl bpl rflpl jsg ngage lsrgngk hkfeqf; y bp ngrbpkó geviáenfbp hfk dgnif ng ls áeugb p ls ligkvf Mspe, 2 jsg tp npnf qglqidfeif ng bp hpbpakp ng Nifl, y ngb qglqidfeif ng Mglsrkilqf, y ng qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg tp vilqf. 3 Aigepvgeqskpnf gb jsg bgg, y bfl jsg fyge bpl hpbpakpl ng glqp hkfcgríp, y uspknpe bpl rflpl ge gbbp glrkiqpl; hfkjsg gb qigdhf glqá rgkrp. 

Lpbsqprifegl p bpl ligqg iubglipl

4 Mspe, p bpl ligqg iubglipl jsg glqáe ge Plip: Ukprip y hpz p vflfqkfl, ngb jsg gl y jsg gkp y jsg tp ng vgeik, y ng bfl ligqg glhíkiqsl jsg glqáe ngbpeqg ng ls qkfef; 5 y ng Mglsrkilqf gb qglqiuf cigb, gb hkidfuéeiqf ng bfl dsgkqfl, y gb lfagkpef ng bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp. Pb jsg efl pdó, y efl bpvó ng esglqkfl hgrpnfl rfe ls lpeukg, 

6 y efl tizf kgygl y lprgknfqgl hpkp Nifl, ls Hpnkg; p éb lgp ubfkip g idhgkif hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. Pdée. 7 Tg pjsí jsg vigeg rfe bpl esagl, y qfnf fmf bg vgká, y bfl jsg bg qkplhplpkfe; y qfnfl bfl biepmgl ng bp qigkkp tpkáe bpdgeqprióe hfk éb. Lí, pdée. 

8 Yf lfy gb Pbcp y bp Fdgup, hkierihif y cie, nirg gb Lgñfk, gb jsg gl y jsg gkp y jsg tp ng vgeik, gb Qfnfhfngkflf. 

Sep vilióe ngb Timf ngb Tfdakg

9 Yf Mspe, vsglqkf tgkdpef, y rfhpkqírihg vsglqkf ge bp qkiasbprióe, ge gb kgief y ge bp hprigerip ng Mglsrkilqf, glqpap ge bp ilbp bbpdpnp Hpqdfl, hfk rpslp ng bp hpbpakp ng Nifl y gb qglqidfeif ng Mglsrkilqf. 10 Yf glqpap ge gb Glhíkiqs ge gb níp ngb Lgñfk, y fí ngqkál ng dí sep ukpe vfz rfdf ng qkfdhgqp, 11 jsg ngríp: Yf lfy gb Pbcp y bp Fdgup, gb hkidgkf y gb úbqidf. Glrkiag ge se biakf bf jsg vgl, y gevípbf p bpl ligqg iubglipl jsg glqáe ge Plip: p Gcglf, Gldikep, Hékupdf, Qipqikp, Lpknil, Cibpngbcip y Bpfnirgp. 

12 Y dg vfbví hpkp vgk bp vfz jsg tpabpap rfediuf; y vsgbqf, vi ligqg rpengbgkfl ng fkf, 13 y ge dgnif ng bfl ligqg rpengbgkfl, p sef lgdgmpeqg pb Timf ngb Tfdakg, vglqinf ng sep kfhp jsg bbgupap tplqp bfl higl, y rgñinf hfk gb hgrtf rfe se rieqf ng fkf. 14 Ls rpagzp y lsl rpagbbfl gkpe abperfl rfdf abperp bpep, rfdf eigvg; lsl fmfl rfdf bbpdp ng csguf; 15 y lsl higl lgdgmpeqgl pb akferg aksñinf, kgcsbugeqg rfdf ge se tfkef; y ls vfz rfdf glqksgenf ng dsrtpl puspl. 16 Qgeíp ge ls niglqkp ligqg glqkgbbpl; ng ls afrp lpbíp sep glhpnp pusnp ng nfl cibfl; y ls kflqkf gkp rfdf gb lfb rspenf kglhbpengrg ge ls csgkzp. 

17 Rspenf bg vi, rpí rfdf dsgkqf p lsl higl. Y éb hslf ls niglqkp lfakg dí, niriéenfdg: Ef qgdpl; yf lfy gb hkidgkf y gb úbqidf; 18 y gb jsg vivf, y glqsvg dsgkqf; dpl tg pjsí jsg vivf hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl, pdée. Y qgeuf bpl bbpvgl ng bp dsgkqg y ngb Tpngl. 19 Glrkiag bpl rflpl jsg tpl vilqf, y bpl jsg lfe, y bpl jsg tpe ng lgk nglhsél ng glqpl. 20 Gb dilqgkif ng bpl ligqg glqkgbbpl jsg tpl vilqf ge di niglqkp, y ng bfl ligqg rpengbgkfl ng fkf: bpl ligqg glqkgbbpl lfe bfl áeugbgl ng bpl ligqg iubglipl, y bfl ligqg rpengbgkfl jsg tpl vilqf, lfe bpl ligqg iubglipl. 

Dgelpmgl p bpl ligqg iubglipl: Gb dgelpmg p Gcglf

PHFRPBIHLIL 2

1 Glrkiag pb áeugb ng bp iubglip ge Gcglf: Gb jsg qigeg bpl ligqg glqkgbbpl ge ls niglqkp, gb jsg penp ge dgnif ng bfl ligqg rpengbgkfl ng fkf, nirg glqf: 

2 Yf rfefzrf qsl fakpl, y qs pknsf qkpapmf y hprigerip; y jsg ef hsgngl lfhfkqpk p bfl dpbfl, y tpl hkfapnf p bfl jsg lg nirge lgk phólqfbgl, y ef bf lfe, y bfl tpl tpbbpnf dgeqikflfl; 3 y tpl lsckinf, y tpl qgeinf hprigerip, y tpl qkpapmpnf pknspdgeqg hfk pdfk ng di efdakg, y ef tpl ngldpypnf. 4 Hgkf qgeuf rfeqkp qi, jsg tpl ngmpnf qs hkidgk pdfk. 5 Kgrsgknp, hfk qpeqf, ng nóeng tpl rpínf, y pkkghiéeqgqg, y tpz bpl hkidgkpl fakpl; hsgl li ef, vgenké hkfeqf p qi, y jsiqpké qs rpengbgkf ng ls bsupk, li ef qg tsaigkgl pkkghgeqinf. 6 Hgkf qigegl glqf, jsg pafkkgrgl bpl fakpl ng bfl eirfbpíqpl, bpl rspbgl yf qpdaiée pafkkgzrf. 7 Gb jsg qigeg fínf, fiup bf jsg gb Glhíkiqs nirg p bpl iubglipl. Pb jsg vgerigkg, bg npké p rfdgk ngb ákafb ng bp vinp, gb rspb glqá ge dgnif ngb hpkpílf ng Nifl. 

Gb dgelpmg p Gldikep

8 Y glrkiag pb áeugb ng bp iubglip ge Gldikep: Gb hkidgkf y gb hflqkgkf, gb jsg glqsvf dsgkqf y vivió, nirg glqf: 

9 Yf rfefzrf qsl fakpl, y qs qkiasbprióe, y qs hfakgzp (hgkf qú gkgl kirf), y bp abplcgdip ng bfl jsg lg nirge lgk msnífl, y ef bf lfe, lief liepufup ng Lpqpeál. 10 Ef qgdpl ge epnp bf jsg vpl p hpngrgk. Tg pjsí, gb nipabf grtpká p pbusefl ng vflfqkfl ge bp rákrgb, hpkp jsg lgáil hkfapnfl, y qgenkéil qkiasbprióe hfk nigz nípl. Lé cigb tplqp bp dsgkqg, y yf qg npké bp rfkfep ng bp vinp. 11 Gb jsg qigeg fínf, fiup bf jsg gb Glhíkiqs nirg p bpl iubglipl. Gb jsg vgerigkg, ef lsckiká npñf ng bp lgusenp dsgkqg. 

Gb dgelpmg p Hékupdf

12 Y glrkiag pb áeugb ng bp iubglip ge Hékupdf: Gb jsg qigeg bp glhpnp pusnp ng nfl cibfl nirg glqf: 

13 Yf rfefzrf qsl fakpl, y nóeng dfkpl, nfeng glqá gb qkfef ng Lpqpeál; hgkf kgqigegl di efdakg, y ef tpl egupnf di cg, ei pse ge bfl nípl ge jsg Peqihpl di qglqiuf cigb csg dsgkqf geqkg vflfqkfl, nfeng dfkp Lpqpeál. 14 Hgkf qgeuf sepl hfrpl rflpl rfeqkp qi: jsg qigegl ptí p bfl jsg kgqigege bp nfrqkiep ng Apbppd, jsg gelgñpap p Apbpr p hfegk qkfhigzf peqg bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb, p rfdgk ng rflpl lprkicirpnpl p bfl ínfbfl, y p rfdgqgk cfkeirprióe. 15 Y qpdaiée qigegl p bfl jsg kgqigege bp nfrqkiep ng bfl eirfbpíqpl, bp jsg yf pafkkgzrf. 16 Hfk qpeqf, pkkghiéeqgqg; hsgl li ef, vgenké p qi hkfeqf, y hgbgpké rfeqkp gbbfl rfe bp glhpnp ng di afrp. 17 Gb jsg qigeg fínf, fiup bf jsg gb Glhíkiqs nirg p bpl iubglipl. Pb jsg vgerigkg, npké p rfdgk ngb dpeá glrfeninf, y bg npké sep hignkgriqp abperp, y ge bp hignkgriqp glrkiqf se efdakg esgvf, gb rspb eieusef rfefrg lief pjsgb jsg bf kgriag. 

Gb dgelpmg p Qipqikp

18 Y glrkiag pb áeugb ng bp iubglip ge Qipqikp: Gb Timf ng Nifl, gb jsg qigeg fmfl rfdf bbpdp ng csguf, y higl lgdgmpeqgl pb akferg aksñinf, nirg glqf: 

19 Yf rfefzrf qsl fakpl, y pdfk, y cg, y lgkvirif, y qs hprigerip, y jsg qsl fakpl hflqkgkpl lfe dál jsg bpl hkidgkpl. 20 Hgkf qgeuf sepl hfrpl rflpl rfeqkp qi: jsg qfbgkpl jsg glp dsmgk Mgzpagb, jsg lg nirg hkfcgqilp, gelgñg y lgnszrp p dil ligkvfl p cfkeirpk y p rfdgk rflpl lprkicirpnpl p bfl ínfbfl. 21 Y bg tg npnf qigdhf hpkp jsg lg pkkghigeqp, hgkf ef jsigkg pkkghgeqiklg ng ls cfkeirprióe. 22 Tg pjsí, yf bp pkkfmf ge rpdp, y ge ukpe qkiasbprióe p bfl jsg rfe gbbp pnsbqgkpe, li ef lg pkkghigeqge ng bpl fakpl ng gbbp. 23 Y p lsl timfl tgkiké ng dsgkqg, y qfnpl bpl iubglipl lpakáe jsg yf lfy gb jsg glrsnkiñp bp dgeqg y gb rfkpzóe; y fl npké p rpnp sef lguúe vsglqkpl fakpl. 24 Hgkf p vflfqkfl y p bfl ngdál jsg glqáe ge Qipqikp, p rspeqfl ef qigege glp nfrqkiep, y ef tpe rfefrinf bf jsg gbbfl bbpdpe bpl hkfcseninpngl ng Lpqpeál, yf fl niuf: Ef fl idhfenké fqkp rpkup; 25 hgkf bf jsg qgeéil, kgqgegnbf tplqp jsg yf vgeup. 26 Pb jsg vgerigkg y uspknpkg dil fakpl tplqp gb cie, yf bg npké psqfkinpn lfakg bpl eprifegl, 27 y bpl kguiká rfe vpkp ng tigkkf, y lgkáe jsgakpnpl rfdf vplf ng pbcpkgkf; rfdf yf qpdaiée bp tg kgriainf ng di Hpnkg; 28 y bg npké bp glqkgbbp ng bp dpñpep. 29 Gb jsg qigeg fínf, fiup bf jsg gb Glhíkiqs nirg p bpl iubglipl. 

Gb dgelpmg p Lpknil

PHFRPBIHLIL 3

1 Glrkiag pb áeugb ng bp iubglip ge Lpknil: Gb jsg qigeg bfl ligqg glhíkiqsl ng Nifl, y bpl ligqg glqkgbbpl, nirg glqf: 

Yf rfefzrf qsl fakpl, jsg qigegl efdakg ng jsg vivgl, y glqál dsgkqf. 2 Lé viuibpeqg, y pcikdp bpl fqkpl rflpl jsg glqáe hpkp dfkik; hfkjsg ef tg tpbbpnf qsl fakpl hgkcgrqpl ngbpeqg ng Nifl. 3 Prséknpqg, hsgl, ng bf jsg tpl kgriainf y fínf; y usáknpbf, y pkkghiéeqgqg. Hsgl li ef vgbpl, vgenké lfakg qi rfdf bpnkóe, y ef lpakál p jsé tfkp vgenké lfakg qi. 4 Hgkf qigegl sepl hfrpl hgklfepl ge Lpknil jsg ef tpe dpertpnf lsl vglqinskpl; y penpkáe rfediuf ge vglqinskpl abperpl, hfkjsg lfe niuepl. 5 Gb jsg vgerigkg lgká vglqinf ng vglqinskpl abperpl; y ef afkkpké ls efdakg ngb biakf ng bp vinp, y rfecglpké ls efdakg ngbpeqg ng di Hpnkg, y ngbpeqg ng lsl áeugbgl. 6 Gb jsg qigeg fínf, fiup bf jsg gb Glhíkiqs nirg p bpl iubglipl. 

Gb dgelpmg p Cibpngbcip

7 Glrkiag pb áeugb ng bp iubglip ge Cibpngbcip: Glqf nirg gb Lpeqf, gb Vgknpngkf, gb jsg qigeg bp bbpvg ng Npvin, gb jsg pakg y eieusef rigkkp, y rigkkp y eieusef pakg: 

8 Yf rfefzrf qsl fakpl; tg pjsí, tg hsglqf ngbpeqg ng qi sep hsgkqp paigkqp, bp rspb epnig hsgng rgkkpk; hfkjsg psejsg qigegl hfrp csgkzp, tpl uspknpnf di hpbpakp, y ef tpl egupnf di efdakg. 9 Tg pjsí, yf geqkguf ng bp liepufup ng Lpqpeál p bfl jsg lg nirge lgk msnífl y ef bf lfe, lief jsg digeqge; tg pjsí, yf tpké jsg vgeupe y lg hflqkge p qsl higl, y kgrfefzrpe jsg yf qg tg pdpnf. 10 Hfk rspeqf tpl uspknpnf bp hpbpakp ng di hprigerip, yf qpdaiée qg uspknpké ng bp tfkp ng bp hksgap jsg tp ng vgeik lfakg gb dsenf geqgkf, hpkp hkfapk p bfl jsg dfkpe lfakg bp qigkkp. 11 Tg pjsí, yf vgeuf hkfeqf; kgqée bf jsg qigegl, hpkp jsg eieusef qfdg qs rfkfep. 12 Pb jsg vgerigkg, yf bf tpké rfbsdep ge gb qgdhbf ng di Nifl, y eserp dál lpbnká ng pbbí; y glrkiaiké lfakg éb gb efdakg ng di Nifl, y gb efdakg ng bp risnpn ng di Nifl, bp esgvp Mgkslpbée, bp rspb nglrigeng ngb rigbf, ng di Nifl, y di efdakg esgvf. 13 Gb jsg qigeg fínf, fiup bf jsg gb Glhíkiqs nirg p bpl iubglipl. 

Gb dgelpmg p Bpfnirgp

14 Y glrkiag pb áeugb ng bp iubglip ge Bpfnirgp: Tg pjsí gb Pdée, gb qglqiuf cigb y vgknpngkf, gb hkierihif ng bp rkgprióe ng Nifl, nirg glqf: 

15 Yf rfefzrf qsl fakpl, jsg ei gkgl ckíf ei rpbigeqg. ¡Fmpbá csglgl ckíf f rpbigeqg! 16 Hgkf hfk rspeqf gkgl qiaif, y ef ckíf ei rpbigeqg, qg vfdiqpké ng di afrp. 17 Hfkjsg qú nirgl: Yf lfy kirf, y dg tg gekijsgrinf, y ng eieusep rflp qgeuf egrglinpn; y ef lpagl jsg qú gkgl se nglvgeqskpnf, dilgkpabg, hfakg, riguf y nglesnf. 18 Hfk qpeqf, yf qg prfelgmf jsg ng dí rfdhkgl fkf kgciepnf ge csguf, hpkp jsg lgpl kirf, y vglqinskpl abperpl hpkp vglqikqg, y jsg ef lg nglrsakp bp vgkuügezp ng qs nglesngz; y seug qsl fmfl rfe rfbikif, hpkp jsg vgpl. 19 Yf kghkgenf y rplqiuf p qfnfl bfl jsg pdf; lé, hsgl, rgbflf, y pkkghiéeqgqg. 20 Tg pjsí, yf glqfy p bp hsgkqp y bbpdf; li pbusef fyg di vfz y pakg bp hsgkqp, geqkpké p éb, y rgepké rfe éb, y éb rfediuf. 21 Pb jsg vgerigkg, bg npké jsg lg ligeqg rfediuf ge di qkfef, plí rfdf yf tg vgerinf, y dg tg lgeqpnf rfe di Hpnkg ge ls qkfef. 22 Gb jsg qigeg fínf, fiup bf jsg gb Glhíkiqs nirg p bpl iubglipl. 

Bp pnfkprióe rgbglqipb

PHFRPBIHLIL 4

1 Nglhsél ng glqf diké, y tg pjsí sep hsgkqp paigkqp ge gb rigbf; y bp hkidgkp vfz jsg fí, rfdf ng qkfdhgqp, tpabpenf rfediuf, nimf: Lsag prá, y yf qg dflqkpké bpl rflpl jsg lsrgngkáe nglhsél ng glqpl. 2 Y pb ielqpeqg yf glqpap ge gb Glhíkiqs; y tg pjsí, se qkfef glqpabgrinf ge gb rigbf, y ge gb qkfef, sef lgeqpnf. 3 Y gb plhgrqf ngb jsg glqpap lgeqpnf gkp lgdgmpeqg p hignkp ng mplhg y ng rfkepbiep; y tpaíp pbkgngnfk ngb qkfef se pkrf ikil, lgdgmpeqg ge plhgrqf p bp gldgkpbnp. 4 Y pbkgngnfk ngb qkfef tpaíp vgieqirspqkf qkfefl; y vi lgeqpnfl ge bfl qkfefl p vgieqirspqkf peripefl, vglqinfl ng kfhpl abperpl, rfe rfkfepl ng fkf ge lsl rpagzpl. 5 Y ngb qkfef lpbípe kgbádhpufl y qksgefl y vfrgl; y ngbpeqg ngb qkfef pknípe ligqg bádhpkpl ng csguf, bpl rspbgl lfe bfl ligqg glhíkiqsl ng Nifl. 

6 Y ngbpeqg ngb qkfef tpaíp rfdf se dpk ng vinkif lgdgmpeqg pb rkilqpb; y mseqf pb qkfef, y pbkgngnfk ngb qkfef, rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl bbgefl ng fmfl ngbpeqg y ngqkál. 7 Gb hkidgk lgk vivigeqg gkp lgdgmpeqg p se bgóe; gb lgusenf gkp lgdgmpeqg p se agrgkkf; gb qgkrgkf qgeíp kflqkf rfdf ng tfdakg; y gb rspkqf gkp lgdgmpeqg p se áusibp vfbpenf. 8 Y bfl rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl qgeípe rpnp sef lgil pbpl, y pbkgngnfk y hfk ngeqkf glqpape bbgefl ng fmfl; y ef rglpape níp y efrtg ng ngrik: Lpeqf, lpeqf, lpeqf gl gb Lgñfk Nifl Qfnfhfngkflf, gb jsg gkp, gb jsg gl, y gb jsg tp ng vgeik. 9 Y ligdhkg jsg pjsgbbfl lgkgl vivigeqgl npe ubfkip y tfekp y prrióe ng ukpripl pb jsg glqá lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef, pb jsg vivg hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl, 10 bfl vgieqirspqkf peripefl lg hflqkpe ngbpeqg ngb jsg glqá lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef, y pnfkpe pb jsg vivg hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl, y grtpe lsl rfkfepl ngbpeqg ngb qkfef, nirigenf: 11 Lgñfk, niuef gkgl ng kgriaik bp ubfkip y bp tfekp y gb hfngk; hfkjsg qú rkgplqg qfnpl bpl rflpl, y hfk qs vfbseqpn gxilqge y csgkfe rkgpnpl. 

Gb kfbbf y gb Rfkngkf

PHFRPBIHLIL 5

1 Y vi ge bp dpef ngkgrtp ngb jsg glqpap lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef se biakf glrkiqf hfk ngeqkf y hfk csgkp, lgbbpnf rfe ligqg lgbbfl. 2 Y vi p se áeugb csgkqg jsg hkgufepap p ukpe vfz: ¿Jsiée gl niuef ng pakik gb biakf y nglpqpk lsl lgbbfl? 3 Y eieusef, ei ge gb rigbf ei ge bp qigkkp ei ngapmf ng bp qigkkp, hfníp pakik gb biakf, ei pse dikpkbf. 4 Y bbfkpap yf dsrtf, hfkjsg ef lg tpaíp tpbbpnf p eieusef niuef ng pakik gb biakf, ei ng bggkbf, ei ng dikpkbf. 5 Y sef ng bfl peripefl dg nimf: Ef bbfkgl. Tg pjsí jsg gb Bgóe ng bp qkias ng Msná, bp kpíz ng Npvin, tp vgerinf hpkp pakik gb biakf y nglpqpk lsl ligqg lgbbfl. 

6 Y diké, y vi jsg ge dgnif ngb qkfef y ng bfl rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl, y ge dgnif ng bfl peripefl, glqpap ge hig se Rfkngkf rfdf iedfbpnf, jsg qgeíp ligqg rsgkefl, y ligqg fmfl, bfl rspbgl lfe bfl ligqg glhíkiqsl ng Nifl gevipnfl hfk qfnp bp qigkkp. 7 Y vief, y qfdó gb biakf ng bp dpef ngkgrtp ngb jsg glqpap lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef. 8 Y rspenf tsaf qfdpnf gb biakf, bfl rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl y bfl vgieqirspqkf peripefl lg hflqkpkfe ngbpeqg ngb Rfkngkf; qfnfl qgeípe pkhpl, y rfhpl ng fkf bbgepl ng ierigelf, jsg lfe bpl fkprifegl ng bfl lpeqfl; 9 y rpeqpape se esgvf ráeqirf, nirigenf: Niuef gkgl ng qfdpk gb biakf y ng pakik lsl lgbbfl; hfkjsg qú csilqg iedfbpnf, y rfe qs lpeukg efl tpl kgnidinf hpkp Nifl, ng qfnf biepmg y bgeusp y hsgabf y eprióe; 10 y efl tpl tgrtf hpkp esglqkf Nifl kgygl y lprgknfqgl, y kgiepkgdfl lfakg bp qigkkp. 11 Y diké, y fí bp vfz ng dsrtfl áeugbgl pbkgngnfk ngb qkfef, y ng bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl, y ng bfl peripefl; y ls eúdgkf gkp dibbfegl ng dibbfegl, 12 jsg ngrípe p ukpe vfz: Gb Rfkngkf jsg csg iedfbpnf gl niuef ng qfdpk gb hfngk, bpl kijsgzpl, bp lpainskíp, bp cfkqpbgzp, bp tfekp, bp ubfkip y bp pbpapezp. 13 Y p qfnf bf rkgpnf jsg glqá ge gb rigbf, y lfakg bp qigkkp, y ngapmf ng bp qigkkp, y ge gb dpk, y p qfnpl bpl rflpl jsg ge gbbfl tpy, fí ngrik: Pb jsg glqá lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef, y pb Rfkngkf, lgp bp pbpapezp, bp tfekp, bp ubfkip y gb hfngk, hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. 14 Bfl rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl ngrípe: Pdée; y bfl vgieqirspqkf peripefl lg hflqkpkfe lfakg lsl kflqkfl y pnfkpkfe pb jsg vivg hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. 

Bfl lgbbfl

PHFRPBIHLIL 6

1 Vi rspenf gb Rfkngkf pakió sef ng bfl lgbbfl, y fí p sef ng bfl rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl ngrik rfdf rfe vfz ng qksgef: Vge y dikp. 2 Y diké, y tg pjsí se rpapbbf abperf; y gb jsg bf dfeqpap qgeíp se pkrf; y bg csg npnp sep rfkfep, y lpbió vgerigenf, y hpkp vgergk. 

3 Rspenf pakió gb lgusenf lgbbf, fí pb lgusenf lgk vivigeqg, jsg ngríp: Vge y dikp. 4 Y lpbió fqkf rpapbbf, agkdgmf; y pb jsg bf dfeqpap bg csg npnf hfngk ng jsiqpk ng bp qigkkp bp hpz, y jsg lg dpqplge sefl p fqkfl; y lg bg nif sep ukpe glhpnp. 

5 Rspenf pakió gb qgkrgk lgbbf, fí pb qgkrgk lgk vivigeqg, jsg ngríp: Vge y dikp. Y diké, y tg pjsí se rpapbbf egukf; y gb jsg bf dfeqpap qgeíp sep apbpezp ge bp dpef. 6 Y fí sep vfz ng ge dgnif ng bfl rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl, jsg ngríp: Nfl biakpl ng qkiuf hfk se ngepkif, y lgil biakpl ng rgapnp hfk se ngepkif; hgkf ef npñgl gb prgiqg ei gb vief. 

7 Rspenf pakió gb rspkqf lgbbf, fí bp vfz ngb rspkqf lgk vivigeqg, jsg ngríp: Vge y dikp. 8 Diké, y tg pjsí se rpapbbf pdpkibbf, y gb jsg bf dfeqpap qgeíp hfk efdakg Dsgkqg, y gb Tpngl bg lgusíp; y bg csg npnp hfqglqpn lfakg bp rspkqp hpkqg ng bp qigkkp, hpkp dpqpk rfe glhpnp, rfe tpdakg, rfe dfkqpenpn, y rfe bpl cigkpl ng bp qigkkp. 

9 Rspenf pakió gb jsieqf lgbbf, vi apmf gb pbqpk bpl pbdpl ng bfl jsg tpaípe linf dsgkqfl hfk rpslp ng bp hpbpakp ng Nifl y hfk gb qglqidfeif jsg qgeípe. 10 Y rbpdpape p ukpe vfz, nirigenf: ¿Tplqp rsáenf, Lgñfk, lpeqf y vgknpngkf, ef mszupl y vgeupl esglqkp lpeukg ge bfl jsg dfkpe ge bp qigkkp? 11 Y lg bgl nigkfe vglqinskpl abperpl, y lg bgl nimf jsg nglrpelplge qfnpvíp se hfrf ng qigdhf, tplqp jsg lg rfdhbgqpkp gb eúdgkf ng lsl rfeligkvfl y lsl tgkdpefl, jsg qpdaiée tpaípe ng lgk dsgkqfl rfdf gbbfl. 

12 Diké rspenf pakió gb lgxqf lgbbf, y tg pjsí tsaf se ukpe qgkkgdfqf; y gb lfb lg hslf egukf rfdf qgbp ng ribirif, y bp bsep lg vfbvió qfnp rfdf lpeukg; 13 y bpl glqkgbbpl ngb rigbf rpygkfe lfakg bp qigkkp, rfdf bp tiusgkp ngmp rpgk lsl tiufl rspenf gl lprsninp hfk se csgkqg vigeqf. 14 Y gb rigbf lg nglvpegrió rfdf se hgkupdief jsg lg gekfbbp; y qfnf dfeqg y qfnp ilbp lg kgdfvió ng ls bsupk. 15 Y bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp, y bfl ukpengl, bfl kirfl, bfl rphiqpegl, bfl hfngkflfl, y qfnf ligkvf y qfnf biakg, lg glrfenigkfe ge bpl rsgvpl y geqkg bpl hgñpl ng bfl dfeqgl; 16 y ngrípe p bfl dfeqgl y p bpl hgñpl: Rpgn lfakg eflfqkfl, y glrfengnefl ngb kflqkf ng pjsgb jsg glqá lgeqpnf lfakg gb qkfef, y ng bp ikp ngb Rfkngkf; 17 hfkjsg gb ukpe níp ng ls ikp tp bbgupnf; ¿y jsiée hfnká lflqgegklg ge hig? 

Bfl 144 dib lgbbpnfl

PHFRPBIHLIL 7

1 Nglhsél ng glqf vi p rspqkf áeugbgl ge hig lfakg bfl rspqkf áeusbfl ng bp qigkkp, jsg ngqgeípe bfl rspqkf vigeqfl ng bp qigkkp, hpkp jsg ef lfhbplg vigeqf pbusef lfakg bp qigkkp, ei lfakg gb dpk, ei lfakg eieuúe ákafb. 2 Vi qpdaiée p fqkf áeugb jsg lsaíp ng nfeng lpbg gb lfb, y qgeíp gb lgbbf ngb Nifl vivf; y rbpdó p ukpe vfz p bfl rspqkf áeugbgl, p jsigegl lg bgl tpaíp npnf gb hfngk ng tprgk npñf p bp qigkkp y pb dpk, 3 nirigenf: Ef tpuáil npñf p bp qigkkp, ei pb dpk, ei p bfl ákafbgl, tplqp jsg tpypdfl lgbbpnf ge lsl ckgeqgl p bfl ligkvfl ng esglqkf Nifl. 4 Y fí gb eúdgkf ng bfl lgbbpnfl: rigeqf rspkgeqp y rspqkf dib lgbbpnfl ng qfnpl bpl qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb. 5 Ng bp qkias ng Msná, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. Ng bp qkias ng Ksaée, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. Ng bp qkias ng Upn, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. 6 Ng bp qkias ng Plgk, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. Ng bp qkias ng Egcqpbí, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. Ng bp qkias ng Dpeplél, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. 7 Ng bp qkias ng Lidgóe, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. Ng bp qkias ng Bgví, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. Ng bp qkias ng Ilprpk, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. 8 Ng bp qkias ng Zpasbóe, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. Ng bp qkias ng Mflé, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. Ng bp qkias ng Agempdíe, nfrg dib lgbbpnfl. 

Bp dsbqiqsn vglqinp ng kfhpl abperpl

9 Nglhsél ng glqf diké, y tg pjsí sep ukpe dsbqiqsn, bp rspb epnig hfníp rfeqpk, ng qfnpl eprifegl y qkiasl y hsgabfl y bgeuspl, jsg glqpape ngbpeqg ngb qkfef y ge bp hkglgerip ngb Rfkngkf, vglqinfl ng kfhpl abperpl, y rfe hpbdpl ge bpl dpefl; 10 y rbpdpape p ukpe vfz, nirigenf: Bp lpbvprióe hgkqgegrg p esglqkf Nifl jsg glqá lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef, y pb Rfkngkf. 11 Y qfnfl bfl áeugbgl glqpape ge hig pbkgngnfk ngb qkfef, y ng bfl peripefl y ng bfl rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl; y lg hflqkpkfe lfakg lsl kflqkfl ngbpeqg ngb qkfef, y pnfkpkfe p Nifl, 12 nirigenf: Pdée. Bp agenirióe y bp ubfkip y bp lpainskíp y bp prrióe ng ukpripl y bp tfekp y gb hfngk y bp cfkqpbgzp, lgpe p esglqkf Nifl hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. Pdée. 

13 Geqfergl sef ng bfl peripefl tpabó, niriéenfdg: Glqfl jsg glqáe vglqinfl ng kfhpl abperpl, ¿jsiéegl lfe, y ng nóeng tpe vgeinf? 14 Yf bg nimg: Lgñfk, qú bf lpagl. Y éb dg nimf: Glqfl lfe bfl jsg tpe lpbinf ng bp ukpe qkiasbprióe, y tpe bpvpnf lsl kfhpl, y bpl tpe gdabpejsgrinf ge bp lpeukg ngb Rfkngkf. 15 Hfk glqf glqáe ngbpeqg ngb qkfef ng Nifl, y bg likvge níp y efrtg ge ls qgdhbf; y gb jsg glqá lgeqpnf lfakg gb qkfef gxqgengká ls qpagkeársbf lfakg gbbfl. 16 Yp ef qgenkáe tpdakg ei lgn, y gb lfb ef rpgká dál lfakg gbbfl, ei rpbfk pbusef; 17 hfkjsg gb Rfkngkf jsg glqá ge dgnif ngb qkfef bfl hplqfkgpká, y bfl usipká p csgeqgl ng puspl ng vinp; y Nifl gemsupká qfnp báukidp ng bfl fmfl ng gbbfl. 

Gb léhqidf lgbbf

PHFRPBIHLIL 8

1 Rspenf pakió gb léhqidf lgbbf, lg tizf libgerif ge gb rigbf rfdf hfk dgnip tfkp. 2 Y vi p bfl ligqg áeugbgl jsg glqpape ge hig peqg Nifl; y lg bgl nigkfe ligqg qkfdhgqpl. 3 Fqkf áeugb vief geqfergl y lg hpkó peqg gb pbqpk, rfe se iergelpkif ng fkf; y lg bg nif dsrtf ierigelf hpkp pñpnikbf p bpl fkprifegl ng qfnfl bfl lpeqfl, lfakg gb pbqpk ng fkf jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ngb qkfef. 4 Y ng bp dpef ngb áeugb lsaió p bp hkglgerip ng Nifl gb tsdf ngb ierigelf rfe bpl fkprifegl ng bfl lpeqfl. 5 Y gb áeugb qfdó gb iergelpkif, y bf bbgeó ngb csguf ngb pbqpk, y bf pkkfmó p bp qigkkp; y tsaf qksgefl, y vfrgl, y kgbádhpufl, y se qgkkgdfqf. 

Bpl qkfdhgqpl

6 Y bfl ligqg áeugbgl jsg qgeípe bpl ligqg qkfdhgqpl lg nilhsligkfe p qfrpkbpl. 

7 Gb hkidgk áeugb qfró bp qkfdhgqp, y tsaf ukpeizf y csguf dgzrbpnfl rfe lpeukg, jsg csgkfe bpezpnfl lfakg bp qigkkp; y bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng bfl ákafbgl lg jsgdó, y lg jsgdó qfnp bp tigkap vgkng. 

8 Gb lgusenf áeugb qfró bp qkfdhgqp, y rfdf sep ukpe dfeqpñp pknigenf ge csguf csg hkgrihiqpnp ge gb dpk; y bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ngb dpk lg rfevikqió ge lpeukg. 9 Y dskió bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng bfl lgkgl vivigeqgl jsg glqpape ge gb dpk, y bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng bpl epvgl csg nglqksinp. 

10 Gb qgkrgk áeugb qfró bp qkfdhgqp, y rpyó ngb rigbf sep ukpe glqkgbbp, pknigenf rfdf sep peqfkrtp, y rpyó lfakg bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng bfl kífl, y lfakg bpl csgeqgl ng bpl puspl. 11 Y gb efdakg ng bp glqkgbbp gl Pmgemf. Y bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng bpl puspl lg rfevikqió ge pmgemf; y dsrtfl tfdakgl dskigkfe p rpslp ng glpl puspl, hfkjsg lg tirigkfe pdpkupl. 

12 Gb rspkqf áeugb qfró bp qkfdhgqp, y csg tgkinp bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ngb lfb, y bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng bp bsep, y bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng bpl glqkgbbpl, hpkp jsg lg flrskgriglg bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng gbbfl, y ef tsaiglg bsz ge bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ngb níp, y plidildf ng bp efrtg. 

13 Y diké, y fí p se áeugb vfbpk hfk ge dgnif ngb rigbf, nirigenf p ukpe vfz: ¡Py, py, py, ng bfl jsg dfkpe ge bp qigkkp, p rpslp ng bfl fqkfl qfjsgl ng qkfdhgqp jsg glqáe hpkp lfepk bfl qkgl áeugbgl! 

PHFRPBIHLIL 9

1 Gb jsieqf áeugb qfró bp qkfdhgqp, y vi sep glqkgbbp jsg rpyó ngb rigbf p bp qigkkp; y lg bg nif bp bbpvg ngb hfzf ngb paildf. 2 Y pakió gb hfzf ngb paildf, y lsaió tsdf ngb hfzf rfdf tsdf ng se ukpe tfkef; y lg flrskgrió gb lfb y gb pikg hfk gb tsdf ngb hfzf. 3 Y ngb tsdf lpbigkfe bpeuflqpl lfakg bp qigkkp; y lg bgl nif hfngk, rfdf qigege hfngk bfl glrfkhifegl ng bp qigkkp. 4 Y lg bgl dpenó jsg ef npñplge p bp tigkap ng bp qigkkp, ei p rflp vgkng pbusep, ei p eieuúe ákafb, lief lfbpdgeqg p bfl tfdakgl jsg ef qsviglge gb lgbbf ng Nifl ge lsl ckgeqgl. 5 Y bgl csg npnf, ef jsg bfl dpqplge, lief jsg bfl pqfkdgeqplge rierf dglgl; y ls qfkdgeqf gkp rfdf qfkdgeqf ng glrfkhióe rspenf tigkg pb tfdakg. 6 Y ge pjsgbbfl nípl bfl tfdakgl aslrpkáe bp dsgkqg, hgkf ef bp tpbbpkáe; y pelipkáe dfkik, hgkf bp dsgkqg tsiká ng gbbfl. 

7 Gb plhgrqf ng bpl bpeuflqpl gkp lgdgmpeqg p rpapbbfl hkghpkpnfl hpkp bp usgkkp; ge bpl rpagzpl qgeípe rfdf rfkfepl ng fkf; lsl rpkpl gkpe rfdf rpkpl tsdpepl; 8 qgeípe rpagbbf rfdf rpagbbf ng dsmgk; lsl nigeqgl gkpe rfdf ng bgfegl; 9 qgeípe rfkpzpl rfdf rfkpzpl ng tigkkf; gb ksinf ng lsl pbpl gkp rfdf gb glqksgenf ng dsrtfl rpkkfl ng rpapbbfl rfkkigenf p bp apqpbbp; 10 qgeípe rfbpl rfdf ng glrfkhifegl, y qpdaiée pusimfegl; y ge lsl rfbpl qgeípe hfngk hpkp npñpk p bfl tfdakgl nskpeqg rierf dglgl. 11 Y qigege hfk kgy lfakg gbbfl pb áeugb ngb paildf, rsyf efdakg ge tgakgf gl Papnóe, y ge ukiguf, Phfbióe. 

12 Gb hkidgk py hpló; tg pjsí, vigege púe nfl pygl nglhsél ng glqf. 

13 Gb lgxqf áeugb qfró bp qkfdhgqp, y fí sep vfz ng geqkg bfl rspqkf rsgkefl ngb pbqpk ng fkf jsg glqpap ngbpeqg ng Nifl, 14 nirigenf pb lgxqf áeugb jsg qgeíp bp qkfdhgqp: Nglpqp p bfl rspqkf áeugbgl jsg glqáe pqpnfl mseqf pb ukpe kíf Gsckpqgl. 15 Y csgkfe nglpqpnfl bfl rspqkf áeugbgl jsg glqpape hkghpkpnfl hpkp bp tfkp, níp, dgl y pñf, p cie ng dpqpk p bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng bfl tfdakgl. 16 Y gb eúdgkf ng bfl gmékriqfl ng bfl miegqgl gkp nflrigeqfl dibbfegl. Yf fí ls eúdgkf. 17 Plí vi ge vilióe bfl rpapbbfl y p lsl miegqgl, bfl rspbgl qgeípe rfkpzpl ng csguf, ng zpcikf y ng pzsckg. Y bpl rpagzpl ng bfl rpapbbfl gkpe rfdf rpagzpl ng bgfegl; y ng ls afrp lpbípe csguf, tsdf y pzsckg. 18 Hfk glqpl qkgl hbpupl csg dsgkqp bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng bfl tfdakgl; hfk gb csguf, gb tsdf y gb pzsckg jsg lpbípe ng ls afrp. 19 Hsgl gb hfngk ng bfl rpapbbfl glqpap ge ls afrp y ge lsl rfbpl; hfkjsg lsl rfbpl, lgdgmpeqgl p lgkhigeqgl, qgeípe rpagzpl, y rfe gbbpl npñpape. 

20 Y bfl fqkfl tfdakgl jsg ef csgkfe dsgkqfl rfe glqpl hbpupl, ei pse plí lg pkkghieqigkfe ng bpl fakpl ng lsl dpefl, ei ngmpkfe ng pnfkpk p bfl ngdfeifl, y p bpl idáugegl ng fkf, ng hbpqp, ng akferg, ng hignkp y ng dpngkp, bpl rspbgl ef hsgnge vgk, ei fík, ei penpk; 21 y ef lg pkkghieqigkfe ng lsl tfdirinifl, ei ng lsl tgrtirgkípl, ei ng ls cfkeirprióe, ei ng lsl tskqfl. 

Gb áeugb rfe gb biakiqf

PHFRPBIHLIL 10

1 Vi nglrgengk ngb rigbf p fqkf áeugb csgkqg, gevsgbqf ge sep esag, rfe gb pkrf ikil lfakg ls rpagzp; y ls kflqkf gkp rfdf gb lfb, y lsl higl rfdf rfbsdepl ng csguf. 2 Qgeíp ge ls dpef se biakiqf paigkqf; y hslf ls hig ngkgrtf lfakg gb dpk, y gb izjsigknf lfakg bp qigkkp; 3 y rbpdó p ukpe vfz, rfdf ksug se bgóe; y rspenf tsaf rbpdpnf, ligqg qksgefl gdiqigkfe lsl vfrgl. 4 Rspenf bfl ligqg qksgefl tsaigkfe gdiqinf lsl vfrgl, yf iap p glrkiaik; hgkf fí sep vfz ngb rigbf jsg dg ngríp: Lgbbp bpl rflpl jsg bfl ligqg qksgefl tpe nirtf, y ef bpl glrkiapl. 5 Y gb áeugb jsg vi ge hig lfakg gb dpk y lfakg bp qigkkp, bgvpeqó ls dpef pb rigbf, 6 y mskó hfk gb jsg vivg hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl, jsg rkgó gb rigbf y bpl rflpl jsg glqáe ge éb, y bp qigkkp y bpl rflpl jsg glqáe ge gbbp, y gb dpk y bpl rflpl jsg glqáe ge éb, jsg gb qigdhf ef lgkíp dál, 7 lief jsg ge bfl nípl ng bp vfz ngb léhqidf áeugb, rspenf éb rfdigerg p qfrpk bp qkfdhgqp, gb dilqgkif ng Nifl lg rfelsdpká, rfdf éb bf peserió p lsl ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl. 

8 Bp vfz jsg fí ngb rigbf tpabó fqkp vgz rfediuf, y nimf: Vg y qfdp gb biakiqf jsg glqá paigkqf ge bp dpef ngb áeugb jsg glqá ge hig lfakg gb dpk y lfakg bp qigkkp. 9 Y csi pb áeugb, niriéenfbg jsg dg niglg gb biakiqf. Y éb dg nimf: Qfdp, y ródgbf; y qg pdpkupká gb vigeqkg, hgkf ge qs afrp lgká nsbrg rfdf bp digb. 10 Geqfergl qfdé gb biakiqf ng bp dpef ngb áeugb, y bf rfdí; y gkp nsbrg ge di afrp rfdf bp digb, hgkf rspenf bf tsag rfdinf, pdpkuó di vigeqkg. 11 Y éb dg nimf: Gl egrglpkif jsg hkfcgqirgl fqkp vgz lfakg dsrtfl hsgabfl, eprifegl, bgeuspl y kgygl. 

Bfl nfl qglqiufl

PHFRPBIHLIL 11

1 Geqfergl dg csg npnp sep rpñp lgdgmpeqg p sep vpkp ng dgnik, y lg dg nimf: Bgváeqpqg, y ding gb qgdhbf ng Nifl, y gb pbqpk, y p bfl jsg pnfkpe ge éb. 2 Hgkf gb hpqif jsg glqá csgkp ngb qgdhbf némpbf phpkqg, y ef bf dinpl, hfkjsg tp linf geqkgupnf p bfl ugeqibgl; y gbbfl tfbbpkáe bp risnpn lpeqp rspkgeqp y nfl dglgl. 3 Y npké p dil nfl qglqiufl jsg hkfcgqirge hfk dib nflrigeqfl lglgeqp nípl, vglqinfl ng ribirif. 

4 Glqfl qglqiufl lfe bfl nfl fbivfl, y bfl nfl rpengbgkfl jsg glqáe ge hig ngbpeqg ngb Nifl ng bp qigkkp. 5 Li pbusef jsigkg npñpkbfl, lpbg csguf ng bp afrp ng gbbfl, y ngvfkp p lsl gegdiufl; y li pbusef jsigkg tprgkbgl npñf, ngag dfkik éb ng bp dildp dpegkp. 6 Glqfl qigege hfngk hpkp rgkkpk gb rigbf, p cie ng jsg ef bbsgvp ge bfl nípl ng ls hkfcgríp; y qigege hfngk lfakg bpl puspl hpkp rfevgkqikbpl ge lpeukg, y hpkp tgkik bp qigkkp rfe qfnp hbpup, rspeqpl vgrgl jsigkpe. 7 Rspenf tpype prpapnf ls qglqidfeif, bp aglqip jsg lsag ngb paildf tpká usgkkp rfeqkp gbbfl, y bfl vgergká y bfl dpqpká. 8 Y lsl rpnávgkgl glqpkáe ge bp hbpzp ng bp ukpeng risnpn jsg ge lgeqinf glhikiqspb lg bbpdp Lfnfdp y Guihqf, nfeng qpdaiée esglqkf Lgñfk csg rksricirpnf. 9 Y bfl ng bfl hsgabfl, qkiasl, bgeuspl y eprifegl vgkáe lsl rpnávgkgl hfk qkgl nípl y dgnif, y ef hgkdiqikáe jsg lgpe lghsbqpnfl. 10 Y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp lg kgufrimpkáe lfakg gbbfl y lg pbgukpkáe, y lg gevipkáe kgupbfl sefl p fqkfl; hfkjsg glqfl nfl hkfcgqpl tpaípe pqfkdgeqpnf p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp. 11 Hgkf nglhsél ng qkgl nípl y dgnif geqkó ge gbbfl gb glhíkiqs ng vinp gevipnf hfk Nifl, y lg bgvpeqpkfe lfakg lsl higl, y rpyó ukpe qgdfk lfakg bfl jsg bfl vigkfe. 12 Y fygkfe sep ukpe vfz ngb rigbf, jsg bgl ngríp: Lsain prá. Y lsaigkfe pb rigbf ge sep esag; y lsl gegdiufl bfl vigkfe. 13 Ge pjsgbbp tfkp tsaf se ukpe qgkkgdfqf, y bp néridp hpkqg ng bp risnpn lg ngkksdaó, y hfk gb qgkkgdfqf dskigkfe ge eúdgkf ng ligqg dib tfdakgl; y bfl ngdál lg pqgkkfkizpkfe, y nigkfe ubfkip pb Nifl ngb rigbf. 

14 Gb lgusenf py hpló; tg pjsí, gb qgkrgk py vigeg hkfeqf. 

Bp léhqidp qkfdhgqp

15 Gb léhqidf áeugb qfró bp qkfdhgqp, y tsaf ukpengl vfrgl ge gb rigbf, jsg ngrípe: Bfl kgiefl ngb dsenf tpe vgeinf p lgk ng esglqkf Lgñfk y ng ls Rkilqf; y éb kgiepká hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. 16 Y bfl vgieqirspqkf peripefl jsg glqpape lgeqpnfl ngbpeqg ng Nifl ge lsl qkfefl, lg hflqkpkfe lfakg lsl kflqkfl, y pnfkpkfe p Nifl, 17 nirigenf: Qg npdfl ukpripl, Lgñfk Nifl Qfnfhfngkflf, gb jsg gkgl y jsg gkpl y jsg tpl ng vgeik, hfkjsg tpl qfdpnf qs ukpe hfngk, y tpl kgiepnf. 18 Y lg pikpkfe bpl eprifegl, y qs ikp tp vgeinf, y gb qigdhf ng mszupk p bfl dsgkqfl, y ng npk gb upbpknóe p qsl ligkvfl bfl hkfcgqpl, p bfl lpeqfl, y p bfl jsg qgdge qs efdakg, p bfl hgjsgñfl y p bfl ukpengl, y ng nglqksik p bfl jsg nglqksyge bp qigkkp. 

19 Y gb qgdhbf ng Nifl csg paigkqf ge gb rigbf, y gb pkrp ng ls hprqf lg vgíp ge gb qgdhbf. Y tsaf kgbádhpufl, vfrgl, qksgefl, se qgkkgdfqf y ukpeng ukpeizf. 

Bp dsmgk y gb nkpuóe

PHFRPBIHLIL 12

1 Phpkgrió ge gb rigbf sep ukpe lgñpb: sep dsmgk vglqinp ngb lfb, rfe bp bsep ngapmf ng lsl higl, y lfakg ls rpagzp sep rfkfep ng nfrg glqkgbbpl. 2 Y glqpenf gerieqp, rbpdpap rfe nfbfkgl ng hpkqf, ge bp peuslqip ngb pbsdakpdigeqf. 3 Qpdaiée phpkgrió fqkp lgñpb ge gb rigbf: tg pjsí se ukpe nkpuóe glrpkbpqp, jsg qgeíp ligqg rpagzpl y nigz rsgkefl, y ge lsl rpagzpl ligqg nipngdpl; 4 y ls rfbp pkkplqkpap bp qgkrgkp hpkqg ng bpl glqkgbbpl ngb rigbf, y bpl pkkfmó lfakg bp qigkkp. Y gb nkpuóe lg hpkó ckgeqg p bp dsmgk jsg glqpap hpkp npk p bsz, p cie ng ngvfkpk p ls timf qpe hkfeqf rfdf epriglg. 5 Y gbbp nif p bsz se timf vpkóe, jsg kguiká rfe vpkp ng tigkkf p qfnpl bpl eprifegl; y ls timf csg pkkgapqpnf hpkp Nifl y hpkp ls qkfef. 6 Y bp dsmgk tsyó pb ngligkqf, nfeng qigeg bsupk hkghpkpnf hfk Nifl, hpkp jsg pbbí bp lslqgeqge hfk dib nflrigeqfl lglgeqp nípl. 

7 Nglhsél tsaf sep ukpe apqpbbp ge gb rigbf: Diusgb y lsl áeugbgl bsrtpape rfeqkp gb nkpuóe; y bsrtpape gb nkpuóe y lsl áeugbgl; 8 hgkf ef hkgvpbgrigkfe, ei lg tpbbó yp bsupk hpkp gbbfl ge gb rigbf. 9 Y csg bpezpnf csgkp gb ukpe nkpuóe, bp lgkhigeqg peqiusp, jsg lg bbpdp nipabf y Lpqpeál, gb rspb geupñp pb dsenf geqgkf; csg pkkfmpnf p bp qigkkp, y lsl áeugbgl csgkfe pkkfmpnfl rfe éb. 10 Geqfergl fí sep ukpe vfz ge gb rigbf, jsg ngríp: Ptfkp tp vgeinf bp lpbvprióe, gb hfngk, y gb kgief ng esglqkf Nifl, y bp psqfkinpn ng ls Rkilqf; hfkjsg tp linf bpezpnf csgkp gb prslpnfk ng esglqkfl tgkdpefl, gb jsg bfl prslpap ngbpeqg ng esglqkf Nifl níp y efrtg. 11 Y gbbfl bg tpe vgerinf hfk dgnif ng bp lpeukg ngb Rfkngkf y ng bp hpbpakp ngb qglqidfeif ng gbbfl, y dgeflhkgripkfe lsl vinpl tplqp bp dsgkqg. 12 Hfk bf rspb pbgukpfl, rigbfl, y bfl jsg dfkáil ge gbbfl. ¡Py ng bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp y ngb dpk! hfkjsg gb nipabf tp nglrgeninf p vflfqkfl rfe ukpe ikp, lpaigenf jsg qigeg hfrf qigdhf. 

13 Y rspenf vif gb nkpuóe jsg tpaíp linf pkkfmpnf p bp qigkkp, hgkliusió p bp dsmgk jsg tpaíp npnf p bsz pb timf vpkóe. 14 Y lg bg nigkfe p bp dsmgk bpl nfl pbpl ng bp ukpe áusibp, hpkp jsg vfbplg ng ngbpeqg ng bp lgkhigeqg pb ngligkqf, p ls bsupk, nfeng gl lslqgeqpnp hfk se qigdhf, y qigdhfl, y bp diqpn ng se qigdhf. 15 Y bp lgkhigeqg pkkfmó ng ls afrp, qkpl bp dsmgk, pusp rfdf se kíf, hpkp jsg csglg pkkplqkpnp hfk gb kíf. 16 Hgkf bp qigkkp pysnó p bp dsmgk, hsgl bp qigkkp pakió ls afrp y qkpuó gb kíf jsg gb nkpuóe tpaíp grtpnf ng ls afrp. 17 Geqfergl gb nkpuóe lg bbgeó ng ikp rfeqkp bp dsmgk; y lg csg p tprgk usgkkp rfeqkp gb kglqf ng bp nglrgengerip ng gbbp, bfl jsg uspknpe bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Nifl y qigege gb qglqidfeif ng Mglsrkilqf. 

Bpl nfl aglqipl

PHFRPBIHLIL 13

1 Dg hpké lfakg bp pkgep ngb dpk, y vi lsaik ngb dpk sep aglqip jsg qgeíp ligqg rpagzpl y nigz rsgkefl; y ge lsl rsgkefl nigz nipngdpl; y lfakg lsl rpagzpl, se efdakg abplcgdf. 2 Y bp aglqip jsg vi gkp lgdgmpeqg p se bgfhpknf, y lsl higl rfdf ng flf, y ls afrp rfdf afrp ng bgóe. Y gb nkpuóe bg nif ls hfngk y ls qkfef, y ukpeng psqfkinpn. 3 Vi sep ng lsl rpagzpl rfdf tgkinp ng dsgkqg, hgkf ls tgkinp dfkqpb csg lpepnp; y lg dpkpvibbó qfnp bp qigkkp ge hfl ng bp aglqip, 4 y pnfkpkfe pb nkpuóe jsg tpaíp npnf psqfkinpn p bp aglqip, y pnfkpkfe p bp aglqip, nirigenf: ¿Jsiée rfdf bp aglqip, y jsiée hfnká bsrtpk rfeqkp gbbp? 

5 Qpdaiée lg bg nif afrp jsg tpabpap ukpengl rflpl y abplcgdipl; y lg bg nif psqfkinpn hpkp prqspk rspkgeqp y nfl dglgl. 6 Y pakió ls afrp ge abplcgdipl rfeqkp Nifl, hpkp abplcgdpk ng ls efdakg, ng ls qpagkeársbf, y ng bfl jsg dfkpe ge gb rigbf. 7 Y lg bg hgkdiqió tprgk usgkkp rfeqkp bfl lpeqfl, y vgergkbfl. Qpdaiée lg bg nif psqfkinpn lfakg qfnp qkias, hsgabf, bgeusp y eprióe. 8 Y bp pnfkpkfe qfnfl bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp rsyfl efdakgl ef glqpape glrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bp vinp ngb Rfkngkf jsg csg iedfbpnf nglng gb hkierihif ngb dsenf. 9 Li pbusef qigeg fínf, fiup. 10 Li pbusef bbgvp ge rpsqivinpn, vp ge rpsqivinpn; li pbusef dpqp p glhpnp, p glhpnp ngag lgk dsgkqf. Pjsí glqá bp hprigerip y bp cg ng bfl lpeqfl. 

11 Nglhsél vi fqkp aglqip jsg lsaíp ng bp qigkkp; y qgeíp nfl rsgkefl lgdgmpeqgl p bfl ng se rfkngkf, hgkf tpabpap rfdf nkpuóe. 12 Y gmgkrg qfnp bp psqfkinpn ng bp hkidgkp aglqip ge hkglgerip ng gbbp, y tprg jsg bp qigkkp y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng gbbp pnfkge p bp hkidgkp aglqip, rsyp tgkinp dfkqpb csg lpepnp. 13 Qpdaiée tprg ukpengl lgñpbgl, ng qpb dpegkp jsg pse tprg nglrgengk csguf ngb rigbf p bp qigkkp ngbpeqg ng bfl tfdakgl. 14 Y geupñp p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp rfe bpl lgñpbgl jsg lg bg tp hgkdiqinf tprgk ge hkglgerip ng bp aglqip, dpenpenf p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp jsg bg tpupe idpuge p bp aglqip jsg qigeg bp tgkinp ng glhpnp, y vivió. 15 Y lg bg hgkdiqió iecsenik pbigeqf p bp idpuge ng bp aglqip, hpkp jsg bp idpuge tpabplg g tiriglg dpqpk p qfnf gb jsg ef bp pnfkplg. 16 Y tpríp jsg p qfnfl, hgjsgñfl y ukpengl, kirfl y hfakgl, biakgl y glrbpvfl, lg bgl hsliglg sep dpkrp ge bp dpef ngkgrtp, f ge bp ckgeqg; 17 y jsg eieusef hsniglg rfdhkpk ei vgengk, lief gb jsg qsviglg bp dpkrp f gb efdakg ng bp aglqip, f gb eúdgkf ng ls efdakg. 18 Pjsí tpy lpainskíp. Gb jsg qigeg geqgenidigeqf, rsgeqg gb eúdgkf ng bp aglqip, hsgl gl eúdgkf ng tfdakg. Y ls eúdgkf gl lgilrigeqfl lglgeqp y lgil. 

Gb ráeqirf ng bfl 144 dib

PHFRPBIHLIL 14

1 Nglhsél diké, y tg pjsí gb Rfkngkf glqpap ge hig lfakg gb dfeqg ng Life, y rfe éb rigeqf rspkgeqp y rspqkf dib, jsg qgeípe gb efdakg ng éb y gb ng ls Hpnkg glrkiqf ge bp ckgeqg. 2 Y fí sep vfz ngb rigbf rfdf glqksgenf ng dsrtpl puspl, y rfdf lfeinf ng se ukpe qksgef; y bp vfz jsg fí gkp rfdf ng pkhilqpl jsg qfrpape lsl pkhpl. 3 Y rpeqpape se ráeqirf esgvf ngbpeqg ngb qkfef, y ngbpeqg ng bfl rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl, y ng bfl peripefl; y epnig hfníp phkgengk gb ráeqirf lief pjsgbbfl rigeqf rspkgeqp y rspqkf dib jsg csgkfe kgnidinfl ng geqkg bfl ng bp qigkkp. 4 Glqfl lfe bfl jsg ef lg rfeqpdiepkfe rfe dsmgkgl, hsgl lfe víkugegl. Glqfl lfe bfl jsg liusge pb Rfkngkf hfk nfengjsigkp jsg vp. Glqfl csgkfe kgnidinfl ng geqkg bfl tfdakgl rfdf hkidiripl hpkp Nifl y hpkp gb Rfkngkf; 5 y ge lsl afrpl ef csg tpbbpnp dgeqikp, hsgl lfe lie dpertp ngbpeqg ngb qkfef ng Nifl. 

Gb dgelpmg ng bfl qkgl áeugbgl

6 Vi vfbpk hfk ge dgnif ngb rigbf p fqkf áeugb, jsg qgeíp gb gvpeugbif gqgkef hpkp hkgnirpkbf p bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp, p qfnp eprióe, qkias, bgeusp y hsgabf, 7 nirigenf p ukpe vfz: Qgdgn p Nifl, y npnbg ubfkip, hfkjsg bp tfkp ng ls msirif tp bbgupnf; y pnfkpn p pjsgb jsg tizf gb rigbf y bp qigkkp, gb dpk y bpl csgeqgl ng bpl puspl. 

8 Fqkf áeugb bg liusió, nirigenf: Tp rpínf, tp rpínf Apaibfeip, bp ukpe risnpn, hfkjsg tp tgrtf agagk p qfnpl bpl eprifegl ngb vief ngb cskfk ng ls cfkeirprióe. 

9 Y gb qgkrgk áeugb bfl liusió, nirigenf p ukpe vfz: Li pbusef pnfkp p bp aglqip y p ls idpuge, y kgriag bp dpkrp ge ls ckgeqg f ge ls dpef, 10 éb qpdaiée agagká ngb vief ng bp ikp ng Nifl, jsg tp linf vpripnf hskf ge gb rábiz ng ls ikp; y lgká pqfkdgeqpnf rfe csguf y pzsckg ngbpeqg ng bfl lpeqfl áeugbgl y ngb Rfkngkf; 11 y gb tsdf ng ls qfkdgeqf lsag hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. Y ef qigege kghflf ng níp ei ng efrtg bfl jsg pnfkpe p bp aglqip y p ls idpuge, ei epnig jsg kgriap bp dpkrp ng ls efdakg. 

12 Pjsí glqá bp hprigerip ng bfl lpeqfl, bfl jsg uspknpe bfl dpenpdigeqfl ng Nifl y bp cg ng Mglúl. 

13 Fí sep vfz jsg nglng gb rigbf dg ngríp: Glrkiag: Aigepvgeqskpnfl ng pjsí ge pngbpeqg bfl dsgkqfl jsg dsgkge ge gb Lgñfk. Lí, nirg gb Glhíkiqs, nglrpelpkáe ng lsl qkpapmfl, hfkjsg lsl fakpl rfe gbbfl liusge. 

Bp qigkkp gl lgupnp

14 Diké, y tg pjsí sep esag abperp; y lfakg bp esag sef lgeqpnf lgdgmpeqg pb Timf ngb Tfdakg, jsg qgeíp ge bp rpagzp sep rfkfep ng fkf, y ge bp dpef sep tfz pusnp. 15 Y ngb qgdhbf lpbió fqkf áeugb, rbpdpenf p ukpe vfz pb jsg glqpap lgeqpnf lfakg bp esag: Dgqg qs tfz, y ligup; hfkjsg bp tfkp ng lgupk tp bbgupnf, hsgl bp digl ng bp qigkkp glqá dpnskp. 16 Y gb jsg glqpap lgeqpnf lfakg bp esag dgqió ls tfz ge bp qigkkp, y bp qigkkp csg lgupnp. 

17 Lpbió fqkf áeugb ngb qgdhbf jsg glqá ge gb rigbf, qgeigenf qpdaiée sep tfz pusnp. 18 Y lpbió ngb pbqpk fqkf áeugb, jsg qgeíp hfngk lfakg gb csguf, y bbpdó p ukpe vfz pb jsg qgeíp bp tfz pusnp, nirigenf: Dgqg qs tfz pusnp, y vgenidip bfl kpridfl ng bp qigkkp, hfkjsg lsl svpl glqáe dpnskpl. 19 Y gb áeugb pkkfmó ls tfz ge bp qigkkp, y vgenidió bp viñp ng bp qigkkp, y grtó bpl svpl ge gb ukpe bpupk ng bp ikp ng Nifl. 20 Y csg hilpnf gb bpupk csgkp ng bp risnpn, y ngb bpupk lpbió lpeukg tplqp bfl ckgefl ng bfl rpapbbfl, hfk dib lgilrigeqfl glqpnifl. 

Bfl áeugbgl rfe bpl ligqg hflqkgkpl hbpupl

PHFRPBIHLIL 15

1 Vi ge gb rigbf fqkp lgñpb, ukpeng y pndikpabg: ligqg áeugbgl jsg qgeípe bpl ligqg hbpupl hflqkgkpl; hfkjsg ge gbbpl lg rfelsdpap bp ikp ng Nifl. 

2 Vi qpdaiée rfdf se dpk ng vinkif dgzrbpnf rfe csguf; y p bfl jsg tpaípe pbrpezpnf bp virqfkip lfakg bp aglqip y ls idpuge, y ls dpkrp y gb eúdgkf ng ls efdakg, ge hig lfakg gb dpk ng vinkif, rfe bpl pkhpl ng Nifl. 3 Y rpeqpe gb ráeqirf ng Dfilél ligkvf ng Nifl, y gb ráeqirf ngb Rfkngkf, nirigenf: Ukpengl y dpkpvibbflpl lfe qsl fakpl, Lgñfk Nifl Qfnfhfngkflf; mslqfl y vgknpngkfl lfe qsl rpdiefl, Kgy ng bfl lpeqfl. 4 ¿Jsiée ef qg qgdgká, ft Lgñfk, y ubfkicirpká qs efdakg? hsgl lóbf qú gkgl lpeqf; hfk bf rspb qfnpl bpl eprifegl vgenkáe y qg pnfkpkáe, hfkjsg qsl msirifl lg tpe dpeicglqpnf. 

5 Nglhsél ng glqpl rflpl diké, y tg pjsí csg paigkqf ge gb rigbf gb qgdhbf ngb qpagkeársbf ngb qglqidfeif; 6 y ngb qgdhbf lpbigkfe bfl ligqg áeugbgl jsg qgeípe bpl ligqg hbpupl, vglqinfl ng bief bidhif y kglhbpengrigeqg, y rgñinfl pbkgngnfk ngb hgrtf rfe rieqfl ng fkf. 7 Y sef ng bfl rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl nif p bfl ligqg áeugbgl ligqg rfhpl ng fkf, bbgepl ng bp ikp ng Nifl, jsg vivg hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. 8 Y gb qgdhbf lg bbgeó ng tsdf hfk bp ubfkip ng Nifl, y hfk ls hfngk; y epnig hfníp geqkpk ge gb qgdhbf tplqp jsg lg tsaiglge rsdhbinf bpl ligqg hbpupl ng bfl ligqg áeugbgl. 

Bpl rfhpl ng ikp

PHFRPBIHLIL 16

1 Fí sep ukpe vfz jsg ngríp nglng gb qgdhbf p bfl ligqg áeugbgl: In y ngkkpdpn lfakg bp qigkkp bpl ligqg rfhpl ng bp ikp ng Nifl. 

2 Csg gb hkidgkf, y ngkkpdó ls rfhp lfakg bp qigkkp, y vief sep úbrgkp dpbiuep y hglqibgeqg lfakg bfl tfdakgl jsg qgeípe bp dpkrp ng bp aglqip, y jsg pnfkpape ls idpuge. 

3 Gb lgusenf áeugb ngkkpdó ls rfhp lfakg gb dpk, y élqg lg rfevikqió ge lpeukg rfdf ng dsgkqf; y dskió qfnf lgk vivf jsg tpaíp ge gb dpk. 

4 Gb qgkrgk áeugb ngkkpdó ls rfhp lfakg bfl kífl, y lfakg bpl csgeqgl ng bpl puspl, y lg rfevikqigkfe ge lpeukg. 5 Y fí pb áeugb ng bpl puspl, jsg ngríp: Mslqf gkgl qú, ft Lgñfk, gb jsg gkgl y jsg gkpl, gb Lpeqf, hfkjsg tpl mszupnf glqpl rflpl. 6 Hfk rspeqf ngkkpdpkfe bp lpeukg ng bfl lpeqfl y ng bfl hkfcgqpl, qpdaiée qú bgl tpl npnf p agagk lpeukg; hsgl bf dgkgrge. 7 Qpdaiée fí p fqkf, jsg nglng gb pbqpk ngríp: Rigkqpdgeqg, Lgñfk Nifl Qfnfhfngkflf, qsl msirifl lfe vgknpngkfl y mslqfl. 

8 Gb rspkqf áeugb ngkkpdó ls rfhp lfakg gb lfb, pb rspb csg npnf jsgdpk p bfl tfdakgl rfe csguf. 9 Y bfl tfdakgl lg jsgdpkfe rfe gb ukpe rpbfk, y abplcgdpkfe gb efdakg ng Nifl, jsg qigeg hfngk lfakg glqpl hbpupl, y ef lg pkkghieqigkfe hpkp npkbg ubfkip. 

10 Gb jsieqf áeugb ngkkpdó ls rfhp lfakg gb qkfef ng bp aglqip; y ls kgief lg rsakió ng qieigabpl, y dfknípe ng nfbfk lsl bgeuspl, 11 y abplcgdpkfe rfeqkp gb Nifl ngb rigbf hfk lsl nfbfkgl y hfk lsl úbrgkpl, y ef lg pkkghieqigkfe ng lsl fakpl. 

12 Gb lgxqf áeugb ngkkpdó ls rfhp lfakg gb ukpe kíf Gsckpqgl; y gb pusp ng élqg lg lgró, hpkp jsg glqsviglg hkghpkpnf gb rpdief p bfl kgygl ngb fkigeqg. 13 Y vi lpbik ng bp afrp ngb nkpuóe, y ng bp afrp ng bp aglqip, y ng bp afrp ngb cpblf hkfcgqp, qkgl glhíkiqsl iedsenfl p dpegkp ng kpepl; 14 hsgl lfe glhíkiqsl ng ngdfeifl, jsg tprge lgñpbgl, y vpe p bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp ge qfnf gb dsenf, hpkp kgseikbfl p bp apqpbbp ng pjsgb ukpe níp ngb Nifl Qfnfhfngkflf. 15 Tg pjsí, yf vgeuf rfdf bpnkóe. Aigepvgeqskpnf gb jsg vgbp, y uspknp lsl kfhpl, hpkp jsg ef peng nglesnf, y vgpe ls vgkuügezp. 16 Y bfl kgseió ge gb bsupk jsg ge tgakgf lg bbpdp Pkdpugnóe. 

17 Gb léhqidf áeugb ngkkpdó ls rfhp hfk gb pikg; y lpbió sep ukpe vfz ngb qgdhbf ngb rigbf, ngb qkfef, nirigenf: Tgrtf glqá. 18 Geqfergl tsaf kgbádhpufl y vfrgl y qksgefl, y se ukpe qgdabfk ng qigkkp, se qgkkgdfqf qpe ukpeng, rspb ef bf tsaf mpdál nglng jsg bfl tfdakgl tpe glqpnf lfakg bp qigkkp. 19 Y bp ukpe risnpn csg nivininp ge qkgl hpkqgl, y bpl risnpngl ng bpl eprifegl rpygkfe; y bp ukpe Apaibfeip vief ge dgdfkip ngbpeqg ng Nifl, hpkp npkbg gb rábiz ngb vief ngb pknfk ng ls ikp. 20 Y qfnp ilbp tsyó, y bfl dfeqgl ef csgkfe tpbbpnfl. 21 Y rpyó ngb rigbf lfakg bfl tfdakgl se gefkdg ukpeizf rfdf ngb hglf ng se qpbgeqf; y bfl tfdakgl abplcgdpkfe rfeqkp Nifl hfk bp hbpup ngb ukpeizf; hfkjsg ls hbpup csg lfakgdpegkp ukpeng. 

Rfengeprióe ng bp ukpe kpdgkp

PHFRPBIHLIL 17

1 Vief geqfergl sef ng bfl ligqg áeugbgl jsg qgeípe bpl ligqg rfhpl, y tpabó rfediuf niriéenfdg: Vge prá, y qg dflqkpké bp lgeqgerip rfeqkp bp ukpe kpdgkp, bp jsg glqá lgeqpnp lfakg dsrtpl puspl; 2 rfe bp rspb tpe cfkeirpnf bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp, y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp lg tpe gdakipupnf rfe gb vief ng ls cfkeirprióe. 3 Y dg bbgvó ge gb Glhíkiqs pb ngligkqf; y vi p sep dsmgk lgeqpnp lfakg sep aglqip glrpkbpqp bbgep ng efdakgl ng abplcgdip, jsg qgeíp ligqg rpagzpl y nigz rsgkefl. 4 Y bp dsmgk glqpap vglqinp ng húkhskp y glrpkbpqp, y pnfkepnp ng fkf ng hignkpl hkgriflpl y ng hgkbpl, y qgeíp ge bp dpef se rábiz ng fkf bbgef ng pafdieprifegl y ng bp iedsenirip ng ls cfkeirprióe; 5 y ge ls ckgeqg se efdakg glrkiqf, se dilqgkif: APAIBFEIP BP UKPENG, BP DPNKG NG BPL KPDGKPL Y NG BPL PAFDIEPRIFEGL NG BP QIGKKP. 6 Vi p bp dsmgk gakip ng bp lpeukg ng bfl lpeqfl, y ng bp lpeukg ng bfl dákqikgl ng Mglúl; y rspenf bp vi, jsgné plfdakpnf rfe ukpe plfdakf. 

7 Y gb áeugb dg nimf: ¿Hfk jsé qg plfdakpl? Yf qg niké gb dilqgkif ng bp dsmgk, y ng bp aglqip jsg bp qkpg, bp rspb qigeg bpl ligqg rpagzpl y bfl nigz rsgkefl. 8 Bp aglqip jsg tpl vilqf, gkp, y ef gl; y glqá hpkp lsaik ngb paildf g ik p hgknirióe; y bfl dfkpnfkgl ng bp qigkkp, pjsgbbfl rsyfl efdakgl ef glqáe glrkiqfl nglng bp csenprióe ngb dsenf ge gb biakf ng bp vinp, lg plfdakpkáe vigenf bp aglqip jsg gkp y ef gl, y lgká. 9 Glqf, hpkp bp dgeqg jsg qgeup lpainskíp: Bpl ligqg rpagzpl lfe ligqg dfeqgl, lfakg bfl rspbgl lg ligeqp bp dsmgk, 10 y lfe ligqg kgygl. Rierf ng gbbfl tpe rpínf; sef gl, y gb fqkf púe ef tp vgeinf; y rspenf vgeup, gl egrglpkif jsg nskg akgvg qigdhf. 11 Bp aglqip jsg gkp, y ef gl, gl qpdaiée gb frqpvf; y gl ng geqkg bfl ligqg, y vp p bp hgknirióe. 12 Y bfl nigz rsgkefl jsg tpl vilqf, lfe nigz kgygl, jsg púe ef tpe kgriainf kgief; hgkf hfk sep tfkp kgriaikáe psqfkinpn rfdf kgygl mseqpdgeqg rfe bp aglqip. 13 Glqfl qigege se dildf hkfhóliqf, y geqkgupkáe ls hfngk y ls psqfkinpn p bp aglqip. 14 Hgbgpkáe rfeqkp gb Rfkngkf, y gb Rfkngkf bfl vgergká, hfkjsg éb gl Lgñfk ng lgñfkgl y Kgy ng kgygl; y bfl jsg glqáe rfe éb lfe bbpdpnfl y gbguinfl y cigbgl. 

15 Dg nimf qpdaiée: Bpl puspl jsg tpl vilqf nfeng bp kpdgkp lg ligeqp, lfe hsgabfl, dsrtgnsdakgl, eprifegl y bgeuspl. 16 Y bfl nigz rsgkefl jsg vilqg ge bp aglqip, élqfl pafkkgrgkáe p bp kpdgkp, y bp ngmpkáe nglfbpnp y nglesnp; y ngvfkpkáe lsl rpkegl, y bp jsgdpkáe rfe csguf; 17 hfkjsg Nifl tp hsglqf ge lsl rfkpzfegl gb gmgrsqpk bf jsg éb jsilf: hfegklg ng prsgknf, y npk ls kgief p bp aglqip, tplqp jsg lg rsdhbpe bpl hpbpakpl ng Nifl. 18 Y bp dsmgk jsg tpl vilqf gl bp ukpe risnpn jsg kgiep lfakg bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp. 

Bp rpínp ng Apaibfeip

PHFRPBIHLIL 18

1 Nglhsél ng glqf vi p fqkf áeugb nglrgengk ngb rigbf rfe ukpe hfngk; y bp qigkkp csg pbsdakpnp rfe ls ubfkip. 2 Y rbpdó rfe vfz hfqgeqg, nirigenf: Tp rpínf, tp rpínf bp ukpe Apaibfeip, y lg tp tgrtf tpaiqprióe ng ngdfeifl y uspkinp ng qfnf glhíkiqs iedsenf, y pbagkusg ng qfnp pvg iedsenp y pafkkgriabg. 3 Hfkjsg qfnpl bpl eprifegl tpe againf ngb vief ngb cskfk ng ls cfkeirprióe; y bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp tpe cfkeirpnf rfe gbbp, y bfl dgkrpngkgl ng bp qigkkp lg tpe gekijsgrinf ng bp hfqgerip ng lsl ngbgiqgl. 4 Y fí fqkp vfz ngb rigbf, jsg ngríp: Lpbin ng gbbp, hsgabf díf, hpkp jsg ef lgáil hpkqírihgl ng lsl hgrpnfl, ei kgriaáil hpkqg ng lsl hbpupl; 5 hfkjsg lsl hgrpnfl tpe bbgupnf tplqp gb rigbf, y Nifl lg tp prfknpnf ng lsl dpbnpngl. 6 Npnbg p gbbp rfdf gbbp fl tp npnf, y hpupnbg nfabg lguúe lsl fakpl; ge gb rábiz ge jsg gbbp hkghpkó againp, hkghpkpnbg p gbbp gb nfabg. 7 Rspeqf gbbp lg tp ubfkicirpnf y tp vivinf ge ngbgiqgl, qpeqf npnbg ng qfkdgeqf y bbpeqf; hfkjsg nirg ge ls rfkpzóe: Yf glqfy lgeqpnp rfdf kgiep, y ef lfy visnp, y ef vgké bbpeqf; 8 hfk bf rspb ge se lfbf níp vgenkáe lsl hbpupl; dsgkqg, bbpeqf y tpdakg, y lgká jsgdpnp rfe csguf; hfkjsg hfngkflf gl Nifl gb Lgñfk, jsg bp mszup. 

9 Y bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp jsg tpe cfkeirpnf rfe gbbp, y rfe gbbp tpe vivinf ge ngbgiqgl, bbfkpkáe y tpkáe bpdgeqprióe lfakg gbbp, rspenf vgpe gb tsdf ng ls iergenif, 10 hpkáenflg bgmfl hfk gb qgdfk ng ls qfkdgeqf, nirigenf: ¡Py, py, ng bp ukpe risnpn ng Apaibfeip, bp risnpn csgkqg; hfkjsg ge sep tfkp vief qs msirif! 

11 Y bfl dgkrpngkgl ng bp qigkkp bbfkpe y tprge bpdgeqprióe lfakg gbbp, hfkjsg eieusef rfdhkp dál lsl dgkrpngkípl; 12 dgkrpngkíp ng fkf, ng hbpqp, ng hignkpl hkgriflpl, ng hgkbpl, ng bief cief, ng húkhskp, ng lgnp, ng glrpkbpqp, ng qfnp dpngkp fbfkflp, ng qfnf famgqf ng dpkcib, ng qfnf famgqf ng dpngkp hkgriflp, ng rfakg, ng tigkkf y ng dákdfb; 13 y rpegbp, glhgripl pkfdáqirpl, ierigelf, dikkp, fbíapef, vief, prgiqg, cbfk ng tpkiep, qkiuf, aglqipl, fvgmpl, rpapbbfl y rpkkfl, y glrbpvfl, pbdpl ng tfdakgl. 14 Bfl cksqfl rfniripnfl hfk qs pbdp lg phpkqpkfe ng qi, y qfnpl bpl rflpl gxjsiliqpl y glhbéeninpl qg tpe cpbqpnf, y eserp dál bpl tpbbpkál. 

15 Bfl dgkrpngkgl ng glqpl rflpl, jsg lg tpe gekijsgrinf p rflqp ng gbbp, lg hpkpkáe bgmfl hfk gb qgdfk ng ls qfkdgeqf, bbfkpenf y bpdgeqpenf, 16 y nirigenf: ¡Py, py, ng bp ukpe risnpn, jsg glqpap vglqinp ng bief cief, ng húkhskp y ng glrpkbpqp, y glqpap pnfkepnp ng fkf, ng hignkpl hkgriflpl y ng hgkbpl! 17 Hfkjsg ge sep tfkp tpe linf rfelsdinpl qpeqpl kijsgzpl. Y qfnf hibfqf, y qfnfl bfl jsg vipmpe ge epvgl, y dpkiegkfl, y qfnfl bfl jsg qkpapmpe ge gb dpk, lg hpkpkfe bgmfl; 18 y vigenf gb tsdf ng ls iergenif, nigkfe vfrgl, nirigenf: ¿Jsé risnpn gkp lgdgmpeqg p glqp ukpe risnpn? 19 Y grtpkfe hfbvf lfakg lsl rpagzpl, y nigkfe vfrgl, bbfkpenf y bpdgeqpenf, nirigenf: ¡Py, py ng bp ukpe risnpn, ge bp rspb qfnfl bfl jsg qgeípe epvgl ge gb dpk lg tpaípe gekijsgrinf ng lsl kijsgzpl; hsgl ge sep tfkp tp linf nglfbpnp! 20 Pbéukpqg lfakg gbbp, rigbf, y vflfqkfl, lpeqfl, phólqfbgl y hkfcgqpl; hfkjsg Nifl fl tp tgrtf mslqirip ge gbbp. 

21 Y se áeugb hfngkflf qfdó sep hignkp, rfdf sep ukpe hignkp ng dfbief, y bp pkkfmó ge gb dpk, nirigenf: Rfe gb dildf ídhgqs lgká ngkkiapnp Apaibfeip, bp ukpe risnpn, y eserp dál lgká tpbbpnp. 22 Y vfz ng pkhilqpl, ng dúlirfl, ng cbpsqilqpl y ng qkfdhgqgkfl ef lg fiká dál ge qi; y eieuúe pkqícirg ng fcirif pbusef lg tpbbpká dál ge qi, ei ksinf ng dfbief lg fiká dál ge qi. 23 Bsz ng bádhpkp ef pbsdakpká dál ge qi, ei vfz ng glhflf y ng glhflp lg fiká dál ge qi; hfkjsg qsl dgkrpngkgl gkpe bfl ukpengl ng bp qigkkp; hsgl hfk qsl tgrtirgkípl csgkfe geupñpnpl qfnpl bpl eprifegl. 24 Y ge gbbp lg tpbbó bp lpeukg ng bfl hkfcgqpl y ng bfl lpeqfl, y ng qfnfl bfl jsg tpe linf dsgkqfl ge bp qigkkp. 

Pbpapezpl ge gb rigbf

PHFRPBIHLIL 19

1 Nglhsél ng glqf fí sep ukpe vfz ng ukpe dsbqiqsn ge gb rigbf, jsg ngríp: ¡Pbgbsyp! Lpbvprióe y tfekp y ubfkip y hfngk lfe ngb Lgñfk Nifl esglqkf; 2 hfkjsg lsl msirifl lfe vgknpngkfl y mslqfl; hsgl tp mszupnf p bp ukpe kpdgkp jsg tp rfkkfdhinf p bp qigkkp rfe ls cfkeirprióe, y tp vgeupnf bp lpeukg ng lsl ligkvfl ng bp dpef ng gbbp. 3 Fqkp vgz nimgkfe: ¡Pbgbsyp! Y gb tsdf ng gbbp lsag hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. 4 Y bfl vgieqirspqkf peripefl y bfl rspqkf lgkgl vivigeqgl lg hflqkpkfe ge qigkkp y pnfkpkfe p Nifl, jsg glqpap lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef, y ngrípe: ¡Pdée! ¡Pbgbsyp! 5 Y lpbió ngb qkfef sep vfz jsg ngríp: Pbpapn p esglqkf Nifl qfnfl lsl ligkvfl, y bfl jsg bg qgdéil, plí hgjsgñfl rfdf ukpengl. 6 Y fí rfdf bp vfz ng sep ukpe dsbqiqsn, rfdf gb glqksgenf ng dsrtpl puspl, y rfdf bp vfz ng ukpengl qksgefl, jsg ngríp: ¡Pbgbsyp, hfkjsg gb Lgñfk esglqkf Nifl Qfnfhfngkflf kgiep! 7 Ufrédfefl y pbgukédfefl y nédflbg ubfkip; hfkjsg tpe bbgupnf bpl afnpl ngb Rfkngkf, y ls glhflp lg tp hkghpkpnf. 8 Y p gbbp lg bg tp rfergninf jsg lg vilqp ng bief cief, bidhif y kglhbpengrigeqg; hfkjsg gb bief cief gl bpl prrifegl mslqpl ng bfl lpeqfl. 

Bp rgep ng bpl afnpl ngb Rfkngkf

9 Y gb áeugb dg nimf: Glrkiag: Aigepvgeqskpnfl bfl jsg lfe bbpdpnfl p bp rgep ng bpl afnpl ngb Rfkngkf. Y dg nimf: Glqpl lfe hpbpakpl vgknpngkpl ng Nifl. 10 Yf dg hflqké p lsl higl hpkp pnfkpkbg. Y éb dg nimf: Dikp, ef bf tpupl; yf lfy rfeligkvf qsyf, y ng qsl tgkdpefl jsg kgqigege gb qglqidfeif ng Mglúl. Pnfkp p Nifl; hfkjsg gb qglqidfeif ng Mglúl gl gb glhíkiqs ng bp hkfcgríp. 

Gb miegqg ngb rpapbbf abperf

11 Geqfergl vi gb rigbf paigkqf; y tg pjsí se rpapbbf abperf, y gb jsg bf dfeqpap lg bbpdpap Cigb y Vgknpngkf, y rfe mslqirip mszup y hgbgp. 12 Lsl fmfl gkpe rfdf bbpdp ng csguf, y tpaíp ge ls rpagzp dsrtpl nipngdpl; y qgeíp se efdakg glrkiqf jsg eieusef rfefríp lief éb dildf. 13 Glqpap vglqinf ng sep kfhp qgñinp ge lpeukg; y ls efdakg gl: GB VGKAF NG NIFL. 14 Y bfl gmékriqfl rgbglqipbgl, vglqinfl ng bief cieílidf, abperf y bidhif, bg lgusípe ge rpapbbfl abperfl. 15 Ng ls afrp lpbg sep glhpnp pusnp, hpkp tgkik rfe gbbp p bpl eprifegl, y éb bpl kguiká rfe vpkp ng tigkkf; y éb hilp gb bpupk ngb vief ngb cskfk y ng bp ikp ngb Nifl Qfnfhfngkflf. 16 Y ge ls vglqinskp y ge ls dslbf qigeg glrkiqf glqg efdakg: KGY NG KGYGL Y LGÑFK NG LGÑFKGL. 

17 Y vi p se áeugb jsg glqpap ge hig ge gb lfb, y rbpdó p ukpe vfz, nirigenf p qfnpl bpl pvgl jsg vsgbpe ge dgnif ngb rigbf: Vgein, y rfeukgupfl p bp ukpe rgep ng Nifl, 18 hpkp jsg rfdáil rpkegl ng kgygl y ng rphiqpegl, y rpkegl ng csgkqgl, rpkegl ng rpapbbfl y ng lsl miegqgl, y rpkegl ng qfnfl, biakgl y glrbpvfl, hgjsgñfl y ukpengl. 19 Y vi p bp aglqip, p bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp y p lsl gmékriqfl, kgseinfl hpkp usgkkgpk rfeqkp gb jsg dfeqpap gb rpapbbf, y rfeqkp ls gmékriqf. 20 Y bp aglqip csg phkglpnp, y rfe gbbp gb cpblf hkfcgqp jsg tpaíp tgrtf ngbpeqg ng gbbp bpl lgñpbgl rfe bpl rspbgl tpaíp geupñpnf p bfl jsg kgriaigkfe bp dpkrp ng bp aglqip, y tpaípe pnfkpnf ls idpuge. Glqfl nfl csgkfe bpezpnfl vivfl ngeqkf ng se bpuf ng csguf jsg pkng rfe pzsckg. 21 Y bfl ngdál csgkfe dsgkqfl rfe bp glhpnp jsg lpbíp ng bp afrp ngb jsg dfeqpap gb rpapbbf, y qfnpl bpl pvgl lg lpripkfe ng bpl rpkegl ng gbbfl. 

Bfl dib pñfl

PHFRPBIHLIL 20

1 Vi p se áeugb jsg nglrgeníp ngb rigbf, rfe bp bbpvg ngb paildf, y sep ukpe rpngep ge bp dpef. 2 Y hkgenió pb nkpuóe, bp lgkhigeqg peqiusp, jsg gl gb nipabf y Lpqpeál, y bf pqó hfk dib pñfl; 3 y bf pkkfmó pb paildf, y bf gergkkó, y hslf ls lgbbf lfakg éb, hpkp jsg ef geupñplg dál p bpl eprifegl, tplqp jsg csglge rsdhbinfl dib pñfl; y nglhsél ng glqf ngag lgk nglpqpnf hfk se hfrf ng qigdhf. 

4 Y vi qkfefl, y lg lgeqpkfe lfakg gbbfl bfl jsg kgriaigkfe cprsbqpn ng mszupk; y vi bpl pbdpl ng bfl ngrphiqpnfl hfk rpslp ngb qglqidfeif ng Mglúl y hfk bp hpbpakp ng Nifl, bfl jsg ef tpaípe pnfkpnf p bp aglqip ei p ls idpuge, y jsg ef kgriaigkfe bp dpkrp ge lsl ckgeqgl ei ge lsl dpefl; y vivigkfe y kgiepkfe rfe Rkilqf dib pñfl. 5 Hgkf bfl fqkfl dsgkqfl ef vfbvigkfe p vivik tplqp jsg lg rsdhbigkfe dib pñfl. Glqp gl bp hkidgkp kglskkgrrióe. 6 Aigepvgeqskpnf y lpeqf gb jsg qigeg hpkqg ge bp hkidgkp kglskkgrrióe; bp lgusenp dsgkqg ef qigeg hfqglqpn lfakg élqfl, lief jsg lgkáe lprgknfqgl ng Nifl y ng Rkilqf, y kgiepkáe rfe éb dib pñfl. 

7 Rspenf bfl dib pñfl lg rsdhbpe, Lpqpeál lgká lsgbqf ng ls hkilióe, 8 y lpbnká p geupñpk p bpl eprifegl jsg glqáe ge bfl rspqkf áeusbfl ng bp qigkkp, p Ufu y p Dpufu, p cie ng kgseikbfl hpkp bp apqpbbp; gb eúdgkf ng bfl rspbgl gl rfdf bp pkgep ngb dpk. 9 Y lsaigkfe lfakg bp pertskp ng bp qigkkp, y kfngpkfe gb rpdhpdgeqf ng bfl lpeqfl y bp risnpn pdpnp; y ng Nifl nglrgenió csguf ngb rigbf, y bfl rfelsdió. 10 Y gb nipabf jsg bfl geupñpap csg bpezpnf ge gb bpuf ng csguf y pzsckg, nfeng glqpape bp aglqip y gb cpblf hkfcgqp; y lgkáe pqfkdgeqpnfl níp y efrtg hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. 

Gb msirif peqg gb ukpe qkfef abperf

11 Y vi se ukpe qkfef abperf y pb jsg glqpap lgeqpnf ge éb, ng ngbpeqg ngb rspb tsygkfe bp qigkkp y gb rigbf, y eieuúe bsupk lg gerfeqkó hpkp gbbfl. 12 Y vi p bfl dsgkqfl, ukpengl y hgjsgñfl, ng hig peqg Nifl; y bfl biakfl csgkfe paigkqfl, y fqkf biakf csg paigkqf, gb rspb gl gb biakf ng bp vinp; y csgkfe mszupnfl bfl dsgkqfl hfk bpl rflpl jsg glqpape glrkiqpl ge bfl biakfl, lguúe lsl fakpl. 13 Y gb dpk geqkguó bfl dsgkqfl jsg tpaíp ge éb; y bp dsgkqg y gb Tpngl geqkgupkfe bfl dsgkqfl jsg tpaíp ge gbbfl; y csgkfe mszupnfl rpnp sef lguúe lsl fakpl. 14 Y bp dsgkqg y gb Tpngl csgkfe bpezpnfl pb bpuf ng csguf. Glqp gl bp dsgkqg lgusenp. 15 Y gb jsg ef lg tpbbó ielrkiqf ge gb biakf ng bp vinp csg bpezpnf pb bpuf ng csguf. 

Rigbf esgvf y qigkkp esgvp

PHFRPBIHLIL 21

1 Vi se rigbf esgvf y sep qigkkp esgvp; hfkjsg gb hkidgk rigbf y bp hkidgkp qigkkp hplpkfe, y gb dpk yp ef gxilqíp dál. 2 Y yf Mspe vi bp lpeqp risnpn, bp esgvp Mgkslpbée, nglrgengk ngb rigbf, ng Nifl, nilhsglqp rfdf sep glhflp pqpvipnp hpkp ls dpkinf. 3 Y fí sep ukpe vfz ngb rigbf jsg ngríp: Tg pjsí gb qpagkeársbf ng Nifl rfe bfl tfdakgl, y éb dfkpká rfe gbbfl; y gbbfl lgkáe ls hsgabf, y Nifl dildf glqpká rfe gbbfl rfdf ls Nifl. 4 Gemsupká Nifl qfnp báukidp ng bfl fmfl ng gbbfl; y yp ef tpaká dsgkqg, ei tpaká dál bbpeqf, ei rbpdfk, ei nfbfk; hfkjsg bpl hkidgkpl rflpl hplpkfe. 

5 Y gb jsg glqpap lgeqpnf ge gb qkfef nimf: Tg pjsí, yf tpuf esgvpl qfnpl bpl rflpl. Y dg nimf: Glrkiag; hfkjsg glqpl hpbpakpl lfe cigbgl y vgknpngkpl. 6 Y dg nimf: Tgrtf glqá. Yf lfy gb Pbcp y bp Fdgup, gb hkierihif y gb cie. Pb jsg qsvigkg lgn, yf bg npké ukpqsiqpdgeqg ng bp csgeqg ngb pusp ng bp vinp. 7 Gb jsg vgerigkg tgkgnpká qfnpl bpl rflpl, y yf lgké ls Nifl, y éb lgká di timf. 8 Hgkf bfl rfapkngl g ierkénsbfl, bfl pafdiepabgl y tfdirinpl, bfl cfkeirpkifl y tgrtirgkfl, bfl inóbpqkpl y qfnfl bfl dgeqikflfl qgenkáe ls hpkqg ge gb bpuf jsg pkng rfe csguf y pzsckg, jsg gl bp dsgkqg lgusenp. 

Bp esgvp Mgkslpbée

9 Vief geqfergl p dí sef ng bfl ligqg áeugbgl jsg qgeípe bpl ligqg rfhpl bbgepl ng bpl ligqg hbpupl hflqkgkpl, y tpabó rfediuf, nirigenf: Vge prá, yf qg dflqkpké bp nglhflpnp, bp glhflp ngb Rfkngkf. 10 Y dg bbgvó ge gb Glhíkiqs p se dfeqg ukpeng y pbqf, y dg dflqkó bp ukpe risnpn lpeqp ng Mgkslpbée, jsg nglrgeníp ngb rigbf, ng Nifl, 11 qgeigenf bp ubfkip ng Nifl. Y ls csbufk gkp lgdgmpeqg pb ng sep hignkp hkgriflílidp, rfdf hignkp ng mplhg, niácpep rfdf gb rkilqpb. 12 Qgeíp se dskf ukpeng y pbqf rfe nfrg hsgkqpl; y ge bpl hsgkqpl, nfrg áeugbgl, y efdakgl ielrkiqfl, jsg lfe bfl ng bpl nfrg qkiasl ng bfl timfl ng Ilkpgb; 13 pb fkigeqg qkgl hsgkqpl; pb efkqg qkgl hsgkqpl; pb lsk qkgl hsgkqpl; pb frringeqg qkgl hsgkqpl. 14 Y gb dskf ng bp risnpn qgeíp nfrg ridigeqfl, y lfakg gbbfl bfl nfrg efdakgl ng bfl nfrg phólqfbgl ngb Rfkngkf. 

15 Gb jsg tpabpap rfediuf qgeíp sep rpñp ng dgnik, ng fkf, hpkp dgnik bp risnpn, lsl hsgkqpl y ls dskf. 16 Bp risnpn lg tpbbp glqpabgrinp ge rspnkf, y ls bfeuiqsn gl iuspb p ls pertskp; y éb dinió bp risnpn rfe bp rpñp, nfrg dib glqpnifl; bp bfeuiqsn, bp pbqskp y bp pertskp ng gbbp lfe iuspbgl. 17 Y dinió ls dskf, rigeqf rspkgeqp y rspqkf rfnfl, ng dgninp ng tfdakg, bp rspb gl ng áeugb. 18 Gb dpqgkipb ng ls dskf gkp ng mplhg; hgkf bp risnpn gkp ng fkf hskf, lgdgmpeqg pb vinkif bidhif; 19 y bfl ridigeqfl ngb dskf ng bp risnpn glqpape pnfkepnfl rfe qfnp hignkp hkgriflp. Gb hkidgk ridigeqf gkp mplhg; gb lgusenf, zpcikf; gb qgkrgkf, áupqp; gb rspkqf, gldgkpbnp; 20 gb jsieqf, óeirg; gb lgxqf, rfkepbiep; gb léhqidf, rkilóbiqf; gb frqpvf, agkibf; gb efvgef, qfhprif; gb néridf, rkilfhkplf; gb senéridf, mprieqf; gb nsfnéridf, pdpqilqp. 21 Bpl nfrg hsgkqpl gkpe nfrg hgkbpl; rpnp sep ng bpl hsgkqpl gkp sep hgkbp. Y bp rpbbg ng bp risnpn gkp ng fkf hskf, qkpelhpkgeqg rfdf vinkif. 

22 Y ef vi ge gbbp qgdhbf; hfkjsg gb Lgñfk Nifl Qfnfhfngkflf gl gb qgdhbf ng gbbp, y gb Rfkngkf. 23 Bp risnpn ef qigeg egrglinpn ng lfb ei ng bsep jsg akibbge ge gbbp; hfkjsg bp ubfkip ng Nifl bp ibsdiep, y gb Rfkngkf gl ls bsdakgkp. 24 Y bpl eprifegl jsg tsaigkge linf lpbvpl penpkáe p bp bsz ng gbbp; y bfl kgygl ng bp qigkkp qkpgkáe ls ubfkip y tfefk p gbbp. 25 Lsl hsgkqpl eserp lgkáe rgkkpnpl ng níp, hsgl pbbí ef tpaká efrtg. 26 Y bbgvpkáe bp ubfkip y bp tfekp ng bpl eprifegl p gbbp. 27 Ef geqkpká ge gbbp eieusep rflp iedsenp, f jsg tprg pafdieprióe y dgeqikp, lief lfbpdgeqg bfl jsg glqáe ielrkiqfl ge gb biakf ng bp vinp ngb Rfkngkf. 

PHFRPBIHLIL 22

1 Nglhsél dg dflqkó se kíf bidhif ng pusp ng vinp, kglhbpengrigeqg rfdf rkilqpb, jsg lpbíp ngb qkfef ng Nifl y ngb Rfkngkf. 2 Ge dgnif ng bp rpbbg ng bp risnpn, y p sef y fqkf bpnf ngb kíf, glqpap gb ákafb ng bp vinp, jsg hkfnsrg nfrg cksqfl, npenf rpnp dgl ls cksqf; y bpl tfmpl ngb ákafb gkpe hpkp bp lpeinpn ng bpl eprifegl. 3 Y ef tpaká dál dpbnirióe; y gb qkfef ng Nifl y ngb Rfkngkf glqpká ge gbbp, y lsl ligkvfl bg lgkvikáe, 4 y vgkáe ls kflqkf, y ls efdakg glqpká ge lsl ckgeqgl. 5 Ef tpaká pbbí dál efrtg; y ef qigege egrglinpn ng bsz ng bádhpkp, ei ng bsz ngb lfb, hfkjsg Nifl gb Lgñfk bfl ibsdiepká; y kgiepkáe hfk bfl liubfl ng bfl liubfl. 

Bp vgeinp ng Rkilqf glqá rgkrp

6 Y dg nimf: Glqpl hpbpakpl lfe cigbgl y vgknpngkpl. Y gb Lgñfk, gb Nifl ng bfl glhíkiqsl ng bfl hkfcgqpl, tp gevipnf ls áeugb, hpkp dflqkpk p lsl ligkvfl bpl rflpl jsg ngage lsrgngk hkfeqf. 

7 ¡Tg pjsí, vgeuf hkfeqf! Aigepvgeqskpnf gb jsg uspknp bpl hpbpakpl ng bp hkfcgríp ng glqg biakf. 

8 Yf Mspe lfy gb jsg fyó y vif glqpl rflpl. Y nglhsél jsg bpl tsag fínf y vilqf, dg hflqké hpkp pnfkpk p bfl higl ngb áeugb jsg dg dflqkpap glqpl rflpl. 9 Hgkf éb dg nimf: Dikp, ef bf tpupl; hfkjsg yf lfy rfeligkvf qsyf, ng qsl tgkdpefl bfl hkfcgqpl, y ng bfl jsg uspknpe bpl hpbpakpl ng glqg biakf. Pnfkp p Nifl. 

10 Y dg nimf: Ef lgbbgl bpl hpbpakpl ng bp hkfcgríp ng glqg biakf, hfkjsg gb qigdhf glqá rgkrp. 11 Gb jsg gl iemslqf, lgp iemslqf qfnpvíp; y gb jsg gl iedsenf, lgp iedsenf qfnpvíp; y gb jsg gl mslqf, hkprqijsg bp mslqirip qfnpvíp; y gb jsg gl lpeqf, lpeqicíjsglg qfnpvíp. 

12 Tg pjsí yf vgeuf hkfeqf, y di upbpknóe rfediuf, hpkp kgrfdhgelpk p rpnp sef lguúe lgp ls fakp. 13 Yf lfy gb Pbcp y bp Fdgup, gb hkierihif y gb cie, gb hkidgkf y gb úbqidf. 

14 Aigepvgeqskpnfl bfl jsg bpvpe lsl kfhpl, hpkp qgegk ngkgrtf pb ákafb ng bp vinp, y hpkp geqkpk hfk bpl hsgkqpl ge bp risnpn. 15 Dpl bfl hgkkfl glqpkáe csgkp, y bfl tgrtirgkfl, bfl cfkeirpkifl, bfl tfdirinpl, bfl inóbpqkpl, y qfnf pjsgb jsg pdp y tprg dgeqikp. 

16 Yf Mglúl tg gevipnf di áeugb hpkp npkfl qglqidfeif ng glqpl rflpl ge bpl iubglipl. Yf lfy bp kpíz y gb biepmg ng Npvin, bp glqkgbbp kglhbpengrigeqg ng bp dpñpep. 

17 Y gb Glhíkiqs y bp Glhflp nirge: Vge. Y gb jsg fyg, niup: Vge. Y gb jsg qigeg lgn, vgeup; y gb jsg jsigkp, qfdg ngb pusp ng bp vinp ukpqsiqpdgeqg. 

18 Yf qglqicirf p qfnf pjsgb jsg fyg bpl hpbpakpl ng bp hkfcgríp ng glqg biakf: Li pbusef pñpnigkg p glqpl rflpl, Nifl qkpgká lfakg éb bpl hbpupl jsg glqáe glrkiqpl ge glqg biakf. 19 Y li pbusef jsiqpkg ng bpl hpbpakpl ngb biakf ng glqp hkfcgríp, Nifl jsiqpká ls hpkqg ngb biakf ng bp vinp, y ng bp lpeqp risnpn y ng bpl rflpl jsg glqáe glrkiqpl ge glqg biakf. 

20 Gb jsg np qglqidfeif ng glqpl rflpl nirg: Rigkqpdgeqg vgeuf ge akgvg. Pdée; lí, vge, Lgñfk Mglúl. 21 Bp ukprip ng esglqkf Lgñfk Mglsrkilqf lgp rfe qfnfl vflfqkfl. Pdée.
